headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Kante, Ziyech, De Vrij, Ronaldo, Min-jae, Berge, Smalling
text: Barcelona irashobora guheraheza amasezerano yo kugura umufaransa akina hagati  N'Golo Kante, mu kwa mbere, ariko bikazovana n'ingene imvune yiwe yo mw'itako izoba imeze, amasezerano afitaniye na  Chelsea akaba azorangira mu ci riza. (Sport) AC Milan ishobora guhagarika urugamba rwayo rwo kurondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa  Chelsea, Hakim Ziyech w'imyaka  29, kubera ivyo uyu mukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Maroc asaba, ariko uyu murwi w'Ubutaliyano ukaba ucipfuza umusatirizi wa Albania Armando Broja w'imyaka 21 na we nyene akina muri aba ba Blues. (Gazzetta Dello Sport, via Football Italia) Tottenham ishobora kuraba ingene yogura umukinyi w'inyuma, umunya-Hollande  Stefan de Vrij w'imyaka 30 akina muri Inter Milan mu kwa mbere.  Atletico Madrid nayo nyene iripfuza uyu mukinyi azoba yirebanga mu ci riza. (Football Insider) Umumenyereza wa Manchester United  Erik ten Hag yari yashatse guha uruhusha umusatirizi wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo akigira mu kwa munani guheze ariko imirwi itari mike yaranse ayo mahirwe yo kugura uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 37 ubu yasezeye muri uyo murwi wa Old Trafford, ku mushahara wa 80.000 vy'amapawundi ku ndwi. (Athletic) Manchester United yasubiye kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Naples/Napoli Kim Min-jae ariko rero iriko imurwanira na Real Madrid, amasezerano y'uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 26 akomoka muri Korea y'Epfo akaba arimwo ingingo ivuga ko umurwi umushaka utegerezwa gutanga imiriyoni 38 z'amapawundi. (Sunday Mirror) Tottenham, Juventus, Inter Milan na  Atletico Madrid yose iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati akina muri  Brighton, umunya-Argentina Alexis Mac Allister w'imyaka 23. (Fichajes) Arsenal na Chelsea yompi yari yipfuje kugura mu mwaka uheze umusatirizi wa Côte d'Ivoire  Wilfried Zaha w'imyaka 30 asanzwe akinira  Crystal Palace. (Teamtalk) Newcastle ni wo murwi ufise amahirwe menshi yo kugura umukinyi w'inyuma akina muri Inter Milan, umunya Slovakia  Milan Skriniar w'imyaka 27. (Calciomercato) Chelsea na Liverpool yompi iripfuza umukinyi w'umunya-Norvège  akina hagati, Sander Berge, 24, akina muri  Sheffield United wo mu cicaro ca kabiri. (Jeunesfooteux). Juventus yahambije Inter Milan mu gukurikiranira hagufi  umwongereza akina inyuma  Chris Smalling w'imyaka 33, akaba ashobora kwirebanga mu ci riza mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye na Roma azoba arangiye, mu gihe yokwanka amasezerano mashasha canke akanka kwongereza ayo afitaniye n'uyu murwi w'Ubutaliyano.  (Sky Sports Italia ) Umunya-Portugal akina inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu Raphael Guerreiro w'imyaka 28, asa n'uwushobora kuva muri  Borussia Dortmund mu ci riza. (Ruhr Nachrichten) Sevilla iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Angers  Azzedine Ounahi w'imyaka 22 ariko yitwara neza mu murwi nserukira gihugu wa Maroc muri rino higanwa ry'igikombe c'isi yose 2022. (Fichajes ) Borussia Dortmund ntishaka kugurisha umubirigi akina ku ruhande rw'i buryo inyuma, Thomas Meunier, mu kwa mbere, ni mu gihe Barcelona yipfuza uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 31. (Sport ) Umukuru wa Bayer Leverkusen  Simon Rolfes avuga ko uyu murwi "ata bwoba na buke ufise" ku bijanye na kazoza k'umukinyi wayo w'inyuma, umunya-Hollande  Jeremie Frimpong w'imyaka 22,  asanzwe yipfuzwa na  Manchester United, ni mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi azorangira mu 2025. (Sky Deutschland iciye kuri Manchester Evening News)

headline: Joseph Shabalala wo muri Ladysmith Black Mambazo yari muntu ki?
text: Joseph Shabalala wo muri Ladysmith Black Mambazo yari muntu ki? Umviriza...

headline: Russia: Yerekanye ikirwanisho gishasha co mu bwoko bwa Sarmat
text: Iyi 'missile' ya Russia, yataziriwe 'Satan II' n'abakeba, irashobora gushika kuri 18.000km, inyaruka ku rugero rwa 25.560 km/h. "Yari imaze imyaka ihingurwa", yarungitswe kuri 6.073km, kuva Plesetsk gushika i Kamchatka.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru i Bulaya kuri uyu wa gatandatu: Pogba, Zaha, Aubameyang, Lampard, Falcao, Camacho
text: Arsenal iriteguye kugurisha umusatirizi wayo akomoka muri Gabon, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang w'imyaka 30, ariko atari muri Manchester United canke  Liverpool. (90min.com) Manchester United barizeye ko bazoshobora kugura abakinyi Sean Longstaff w'imyaka 21 wa Newcastle, na Bruno Fernandes w'imyaka  24  wa Sporting Lisbon ya Portugali. (Evening Standard) Umusatirizi wa Côte d'Ivoire Wilfried Zaha w'imyaka 26 asaba umurwi wiwe wa Crystal Palace kumuha uruhusha ngo yimukire muri Arsenal. Palace ivuga ko uwumukeneye ategerezwa kumugura imiliyoni 80 z'amapawundi. (Mirror) Gareth Bale w'imyaka 29 ashobora kuguma muri Real Madrid inyuma  y'aho uwo murwi uburiye uwundi murwi woshobora kumugura. (Mirror) Real Madrid itegerezwa kuzoriha imilioni 150 z'amapawundi kugira ngo ishobore kuronka umusatirizi w'umufaransa Paul Pogba w'imyaka 26 asanzwe akinira Manchester United. (Mirror) Chelsea itegura gutangaza ko Frank Lampard, yari asanzwe amenyereza umurwi Derby, nk'umumenyereza wayo mushasha imbere y'uko abakinyi bava mu buruhuko mu ndwi iza kugira ngo bitegurire amahiganwa yo mu mwaka uza. (Sun) Liverpool yashitse ku masezerano n'umurwi Sporting ku mahera ashika imilioni indwi z'amapawundi kugira ngo ishobore kugura umusatirizi Rafael Camacho w'imyaka 19. (Evening Standard) Hari inama yahuje abarongozi bakuru b'imirwi ya Atletico na Real Madrid kugira ngo bumvikane ingene umusatirizi Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 28 yokwimukira muri Real Madrid. (L'Equipe) Umusatirizi wo mu gihugu ca Kolombiya, Radamel Falcao w'imyaka 33, aripfuza ko yokwimukira mu murwi wa David Beckham muri Amerika i Miami mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n'umurwi Monaco yorangira. (Sun) Aston Villa iriteguye gusaba ko yogura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Southampton, Matt Targett. (Express na Star) Umumeyereza wa West Brom  Slaven Bilic aripfuza ko Julian Dicks bigeze gukinana muri uwo murwi yogaruka muri uwo murwi kugira ngo bafashanye mu vyo kuwumenyereza. (Express na Star) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Tottenham hotspur Christian Eriksen w'imyaka 27 akomoka muri Danemark aripfuza kuja muri Real Madrid, umuryango wiwe ukaba wabonywe mu gisagara ca Madrid bariko barondera inzu. ( (Times)) Manchester United iriko iraraba ko yogura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Barcelona, Samuel Umtiti w'umufaransa  w'imyaka 25. (Mundo Deportivo) Umusatirizi w'umurwi Manchester City,  Leroy Sane w'imyaka 23 akomoka mu Budagi, abandanya aronderwa cane n'umurwi wo muri ico gihugu Bayern Munich, n'aho wari wabanje gutenyenya. (Sky Sports) Umumenyereza wa Sporting Marcel Keizer abona ko kugumya umukinyi wo hagati wa Portugal Bruno Fernandez bitoroshe, Manchester United ni umwe mu mirwi yerekanye ko yipfuza uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 24. (Record, Manchester Evening News) Se w'umusatirizi wa Juventus Moise Kean w'imyaka 19, amenyesha ko umuhungu wiwe yipfuza kwimukira mu murwi Inter Milan. (Mirror) Atletico Madrid iriko yiyumvira ko yogura umukinyi wa Real Madrid, James Rodriguez w'imyaka 27 akomoka muri Kolombiya, asanzwe atagikenewe cane muri uwo murwi wa Real. (Cadena SER, via AS) Umwongereza Wayne Rooney yabaye rurangiranwa muri Manchester United arizeye ko azoteba aronka akazi nk'umumenyereza, akaba yanasavye Domenec Torrent yigeze kuba ari icegera ca Pep Guardiola ubu akaba arongoye umurwi New York City ko yotangura kumumenyereza muri ico gikorwa. (Sun)

headline: Pierre Webo : uwa 08/12 uzoba umusi ukomeye mu kurwanya amacakubiri ashingiye ku rukoba
text: Pierre Webo, icegera c'umumenyereza w'umurwi Istanbul Basaksehir wa Turukiya, avuga ko igenekerezo rya 08 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri rizoba umusi ukomeye mu rugamba rwo kurwanya amacakubiri ashingiye ku rukoba. Abakinyi ba Basaksehir na Paris St-Germain baravuye mu kibuga mu rukino rwo mw'ihiganwa rya Buraya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo, inyuma y'aho umuhagarikizi agira kane yagirijwe ko yabwiye Webo amajambo yo kumutyoza kubera ari umwirabure. Webo w'imyaka 38  avuga ko imisi yakurikiye "ari yo yabaye mibi cane" kuri we mu kiringo cose amaze mu mwuga w'umupira w'amaguru. Avuga ko vyabaye ngombwa ko umuganga amufasha kugira ngo ashobore gusinzira muri rirya joro ivyo biba. Ati: "Imisi ibiri canke itatu yakurikiye  niyo misi yambereye mibi cane mu mwuga wanje". Uyu yahoze ari umukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Kameruni yaragirije umuhagarikizi agira kane, Sebastian Coltescu, ko yamututse mu kumuhamagara yisunze ibara y'uruhu rwiwe, aho kumuhamagara mw'izina ryiwe. Webo yabwiye BBC ko kubw'iwe, "igenekerezo rya munani, rifise kahise na kazoza. Tuzikwama turyibuka". Uru rukino rwahagaze ku  munota wa 14 ata murwi n'umwe wari bwinjize igitsindo, rwagiye gusubirwamwo bukeye ku wa gatatu, ruhagarikiwe n'abandi bahagarikizi bashasha. Mu gihe co kwishusha, iyi mirwi yompi hamwe n'abahagarikizi, bari bambaye udupira twanditseko ngo "turiyamirije amacakubiri ashingiye ku rukoba", nayo mu bwugamo habaka hariho ivyama vyo kwiyamiriza aka kabi, mbere abakinyi n'abahagarikizi bakaba babanje gupfukama hagati mu kibuga imbere 'yuko urukino rutangura. Webo yari yirukanywe mu kibuga mu gihe ivyo vyaba ariko yahavuye yemererwa kugaruka mu kibuga, maze ikarata itukura yari yahawe irafutwa. Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru i Buraya, UEFA, ririko rirakora amatohoza ku vyabaye. Webo yamaze imyaka umunani akinira imirwi Osasuna na Majorque mw'ihiganwa rya Espagne La Liga.  Avuga ko yashigikiwe n'abantu benshi bo mu gisata c'umupira w'amaguru hamwe n'abandi bo hanze. Hagati aho, avuga ko yaronse n'ubutumwa bubi cane buvuye muri Roumanie, igihugu uyo muhagarikizi agira kane,Coltescu, akomokamwo. Ishirahamwe UEFA rivuga ko ryamaze kuronka ivyemezo, ariko ribona ko inyishu idashobora kuboneka imbere ya Noweri (Noël). Nk'uko bivugwa n'umwe mu bategetsi ba Roumanie, abari bajejwe urwo rukino rwa Champions League barahagaritswe vy'agateganyo mw'ihiganwa ry'igihugu, mu kurindira ko igisata kijejwe indero muri Uefa gifata ingingo.

headline: Vatican: Kardinali Becciu yategetswe gutanga imihoho, ibitari bimenyerewe
text: Umukardinali yari mu bari bafise amabanga akomeye i Vaticano kwa Papa, Giovanni Angelo Becciu, yatanze imihoho giturumbuka ariko akavuga ko yategetswe na Papa Francis. Avuga ko yiketswe gukoresha umutungo wa Ekleziya yihera benewabo, agahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Kardinali Becciu yari umwe mu begereye cane Papa, akaba yarigeze kuba ajejwe amabanga mu bunyamabanga bwa leta ya Vaticano. Yagiye kugira uruhara mu masezerano yateye impari yo gushora imitahe mu nyubakwa nziza ya Londres mu mafaranga ya Ekleziya. Iki gikorwa kuva ico gihe kiriko kirakorwako amatohoza. Ntibikunze kuboneka aho abantu bo ku rwego rwo hejuru i Vaticano batanga imihoho, kandi na Vaticano nta vyinshi yabivuzeko mw'itangazo ryasohowe ku wa kane. Ariko uyu mu kardinali w'imyaka 72 yabwiye ikinyamakuru co ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi Domani co mu Butaliyano ko yategetswe gutanga imihoho kuko yiketswe ko yahaye benewabo amafaranga ya Ekleziya. Avuga ati: "Nta n'urufaranga na rumwe jewe nigeze niba. Nta matohoza ndiko ndakorwako, ariko ari nka hamwe bonshira imbere y'ubutungane, nokwisigura". Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru yagiye gushikiriza mu nyuma, uyu mukardinali avuga ko ibogozwa ryiwe ryabaye giturumbuka. Avuga ko na Papa "atari agononokewe" igihe yatangaza iyi nkuru. Ati: "Ni ibisigabwenge. Gushika ejo…niyumvira ko nari umugenzi pfa mpfe wa Papa, intumwa yiwe y'umwizigirwa". "Mu nyumn rero niho Papa yambwira ko atakinyizeye kuko yaronse amakuru yahawe n'abacamanza bamubwira ko nakoze icaha co kunyuruza umutungo". Kardinali Becciu ashimangira ko habaye "ukutumvikana", akongera kandi ati: "Nditeguye gusigurira Papa vyose. Nta caha na kimwe nakoze". Uyu mukardinali Giovanni Angelo Becciu ni umutaliyano yamaze imyaka ya mbere akora mu gisata kijejwe imigenderanire i Vaticano. Papa Francis niwe yamugize umukardinali mu 2018, igihe aherewe amabanga mashasha yo kurongora igisata kijejwe ibijanye n'ubweranda. Yasubiwemwo n'ibinyamakuru vy'Ubutaliyano avuga ati: "Ni uruhombo kuri jewe, umuryango wanje, abanyagihugu b'igihugu canje. Navyemeye ku bugamburutsi n'urukundo mfitiye Ekleziya na Papa". N'aho mu vyo yagirijwe harimwo ibijanye n'amasezerano ajanye n'inyubakwa ya Londres ivugwa ko yaguzwe mu mutungo wa Ekleziya, Kardinali Becciu wewe siko abibona. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ejo ku wa gatanu, uyu mukardinali yavuze ko Papa yamwagirije ko yakoresheje nabi umutungo wa Ekleziya akawushira mu ma koperative n'urucuruza vya benewabo. Ibinyamakuru vy'Ubutaliyano kandi bivuga ko Papa atanezerejwe n'ingene imperezwa yo gufashisha abakene yiswe Peter's Pence yagiye gukoreshwa mu bindi bitari biyigenewe. Kardinali Becciu azobandanya afise iki giti n'aho yatanze imihoho. Hagati aho, nta ruhara azogira mu gutora uwundi mu Papa.

headline: Ukraine: Ibitero vya Russia vyashize abanyagihugu imiriyoni 4,5 mu kizime
text: Na Alys Davies BBC News Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine yagiriza Kremlin ko yahisemwo gukoresha  “iterabwoba rishingiye ku gusambura amasoko ntanganguvu” mu gihe intambwe iterwa n’ingabo z’Uburusiya ari ntoya. Perezida Zelensky avuga ko abanyagihugu imiriyoni 4.5 ata muyagankuba bafise inyuma y’ibitero vy’Uburusiya ku bigo vy’amasoko ntanganguvu. Mu ndwi nkeya ziheze, Uburusiya bwakoze ibitero bikomeye vya misire na za ndege zitagira abadereva (drones) ku bigo vy’umuyagankuba. Ibi bitero vyabaye mu gihe abategetsi bavuga ko ingabo z’Uburusiya zishobora kuva mu gisagara gikomeye ca Kherson kiri mu bumanuko bw’igihugu. Inyuma yo gutakaza bikomeye ku rubuga rw’intambara, Uburusiya bwaciye bwongereza ibitero  ku bigo vy’umuyagankuba mu bisagara biri kure y’urubuga rw’intambara. Mu kwezi guheze kwonyene, ica gatatu c’ibigo vy’umuyagankuba bivugwa ko vyasambuwe, nk’uko Perezida Zelensky abitangaza. Vyabaye ngombwa ko reta ya Ukraine isaba abanyagihugu kugerageza gukoresha umuyagankuba mukemuke kuri iyo mvo. Nijoro ku wa kane mw’ijambo yama ashikiriza buri ijoro, Perezida Zelensky  yavuze ati: "Muri iri joro, abanyagihugu bababa imiriyoni 4,5 nta muyagankuba bafise”. Avuga ko kubona Uburusiya buhindukirira gutera ibigo ntanganguvu ari ikimenyetso “c’inguvu zabuheranye” mu gihe ingabo zabwo zananiwe no gutera intambwe ikomeye ku rubuga rw’intambara. Ati: "Kuba Uburusiya bwahisemwo iterabwoba rishingiye ku masoko ntanganguvu vyerekana ko umwansi yatakaje inguvu. "Ntibashobora gutsinda Ukraine ku rubuga rw’intambara, rero ni co gituma bagerageza guca intege abanyagihugu bacu muri ubu buryo”. Ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw’Uburusiya bwemeje ko buriko buratera ibigo ntanganguvu vya Ukraine. Ibirego vya Zelensky ku Burusiya bije mu gihe hari amakuru avuga ko ingabo z’Uburusiya ziriko zirava mu gisagara zari zarigaruriye ca Kherson, ikimenyetso c’uko Uburusiya buriko burasubira inyuma. Umutegetsi yashizweho n’Uburusiya mu ntara ya Kherson, Kirill Stremousov, yabwiye ibinyamakuru vy’Uburusiya ko Moscou “ishobora” gukura ngabo zayo muri ako karere. Hanyuma kandi nk’uko umutegetsi umwe wo mu Burengero, ariko atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana, abivuga, intwazangabo hafi zose z’Uburusiya zirongoye urugamba zamaze kuva muri ico gisagara. Hakugerageza kugumana iki gisagara, bavuga ko ingabo z’Uburusiya, mu buryo bwo kwivuna, ziriko ziriyegeranya hakurya y’uruzi Dnipro, mu gikorwa kinini co kwubaka ibirindiro vyo kwivuna umwansi neza mu bumanuko n’ubuseruko bwa Ukraine imbere y’umuzo w’urushana. Biragoye kumenya neza na neza ibiriko birabera muri ico gisagara, ariko uyo mutegetsi avuga ko ingabo ziherutse kwinjizwa muri wa mugambi wo kwinjiza ngabo z’integabizoza mu gisirikare c’Uburusiya zarungitswe muri ico gisagara kugira ngo zihagararire igikorwa ca nyuma co kuva ku birindiro biramutse bishitse. Hejuru y’ivyo, umunyamakuru wa BBC Paul Adams amenyesha ko amabanki avugwa ko yanyazwe urukombamazi co kimwe n’amazu ndangamurage. Abategetsi bashizweho n’Uburusiya nabo bamaze amayinga atari make bahungisha abasivire ibihumbi n’ibihumbi muri ako karere. Umunyamabanga wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ajejwe kwivuna abansi Lloyd Austin avuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zifise “ubushobozi” bwo kubohoza ico gisagara co mu bumanuko. Ariko Ukraine ivuga ko ibandanya irwana muri ako karere kandi ko ibandanya yicungereye yibaza ko Uburusiya buriko butega umutego ingabo za Ukraine. Igihe Uburusiya bwigarurira Kherson – igisagara gikomeye – mu kwa gatatu, vyabonetse ko ari imwe mu ntambwe zikomeye Moscou yari iteye muri iyo ntambara. Ariko igitero co kwivuna muri ako karere kimaze ukwezi kurenga cerekana ko Uburusiya ari ngombwa ko bwihweza gushasha intumbero z’urugamba.

headline: Burundi : Emmanuella aranditswe mu vyaranze inkino z’igihugu
text: Rukundo Emmanuella, ataranashikana imyaka 20, yagiye ariha izina mu makungu, kuva mu 2021. Mu Burundi igice c’umwaka wa 2022, nta mugore aramukoreramwo. Ati “nshimira abavyeyi”.

headline: Africa muri ino ndwi mu mafoto: 30 z'ukwa cumi - 5 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe 2020
text: Ihitamwo ry'amafoto meza yo muri ino ndwi ku mugabane no hanze yawo:

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Ronaldo, Mbappe, Kane, Kounde, Traore, Aubameyang
text: Manchester City yashitse ku masezerano na Juventus yo kugura umukinyi  Cristiano Ronaldo, 36. (AS - in Spanish) Juventus ishaka imiriyoni hagati ya 25-30 z'ama euros kuri Ronaldo,  City ikaba yiteze kumuha amasezerano y'imyaka ibiri. (Guardian) Uwu murwi wo mu Butaliyano wagumye wipfuza kugumana Ronaldo ariko ubu ukaba wipfuza kugura umusatirizi wa City umunya Brésil Gabriel Jesus, 24, kugira ngo amusubirire.(Sky Sports) Ronaldo asaba umushahara wa 510.000 vy'amapawundi (yababa 698.000) ku ndwi kugira yinjire muri City, ivyomutuma aba umukinyi wa mbere ahembwa umushahara munini muri uwo murwi, ibi na vyo bigashobora gutera agashavu abandi bakinyi.  (Sun) Juventus iripfuza gusubirana nk'intizo umusatirizi w'umutaliyano Moise Kean w'imyaka 21 ubu akina muri Everton, ariko ikaronka n'akaryo ko gushobora kumugura burundu mu ci riza.  (Calciomercato in Italian) Liverpool iriko irihweza ingene yogura umukinyi wo hagati wa Brighton umunya Mali Yves Bissouma, 24, ku miriyoni zababa 55. (Express) Wolverhampton Wanderers irarahira ikarengwa ko idashobora gutiza Tottenham Hotspur umukinyi wo ku ruhande w'umunya Espagne Adama Traore, 25, kubera ikeneye kumugumana.  (Telegraph) West Ham United iriko irarondera umusatirizi wa  CSKA Moscow umunya Croatia Nikola Vlasic, 23, mu gihe ikeneye uwosubirira umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umwongereza Jesse Lingard. (Sky Sports) Watford watanguye ibiganiro na Tottenham kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi wo hagati umufaransa Moussa Sissoko, 32. (Fabrizio Romano) Paris St-Germain iriko irarondera abakinyi batari bake, harimwo umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umufaransa Paul Pogba, 28, hamwe n'umusatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund umunya Norvège Erling Braut Haaland, 21, mu gihe iriko yitegurira ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka idafise Kylian Mbappe. (L'Equipe, via Mail) Real Madrid yongereje igiciro ishaka gutanga ku musatirizi wa PSG Mbappe, 22 gushika ku miriyoni zababa 199 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, inyuma y'aho aya mbere yababa n'imiriyoni zababa 188 bayankiye.  (Sky Sports) PSG ishobora guca irondera umusatirizi wa Everton umunya Brésil Richarlison mu gihe Mbappe yogenda, ni mu gihe abaserukizi b'uyu mukinyi bamaze gushika i Paris mu biganiro.  (ESPN Brazil - in Portuguese) Manchester United vyaranse ko ironka umukinyi wo ku ruhande w'umwongereza Noni Madueke w'imyaka 19, inyuma y'aho atereye igikumu ku yandi masezerano na PSV Eindhoven. (Mirror) Kizigenza wa Tottenham umwongereza Harry Keane  ari mu biganiro vyo kurondera amasezerano yoronkamwo akarusho. Uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 28 yiteze kuronka aya masezerano ashobora kumutuma ahembwa amapawundi 400.000 (mu madorari akaba yababa 548.346) ku ndwi, inyuma y'aho yemereye kuguma muri uyo murwi muri uno mwaka.  (Times - subscription required) Chelsea iri hafi yo kuronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Sevilla umufaransa Jules Kounde, 22, ku giciro kingana n'imiriyoni  57.5 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Sky Italia, via Star) Hagati aho, umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea umufaransa Kurt Zouma, 26, yitezwe gufatwa ibipimo vyo kwa muganga kugira aje gukinira West Ham mu masezerano y'imyaka itanu, ku giciro c'imiriyoni 35.6 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Sun) Tottenham yatanguye ibiganiro vyo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Juventus  umunyamerika Weston McKennie, 22 ku giciro c'imiriyoni 54.8 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Independent) Umumenyereza wa Arsenal Mikel Arteta yamiriye kure ivy'uko kizigenza wayo, umusatirizi w'umunya Gabon  Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang ashobora gusezera uyu murwi.  (ESPN) Everton iripfuza umusatirizi wa Brighton  umufaransa Neal Maupay w'imyaka 25. (Sky Sports) Manchester United ishobora kurondera umukinyi wo hagati imbere y'uko ikiringo c'igura n'igurishwa kirangira, ariko bigashobora kuba ngombwa ko irindira kugira irabe ko yoronka umwongereza Declan Rice, 22 akinira West Ham. (Independent)

headline: Amatora mu Burundi: CNC ishima igikorwa c’abamenyeshakamuru
text: Ikigo kijejwe gucungera ingene ibimenyeshamakuru bikora mu Burundi, CNC, kirashimira abamenyeshamakuru ingene bakoze mu kubwira abanyagihugu ingene amatora aheruka yariko aragenda. Ivyo biri mw'itangazo ryasohowe na Nestor Bankumukunzi arongoye ico kigo, aho avuga ko bitanze cane, anakengurukira ibinyamakuru vyakoreye mu runani be n'abanyamakuru bari muri rwo. Amaradiyo ashika 30 yarakoranye mu runani rwateguriwe hamwe n'ubushikiranganji bujejwe kumenyesha amakuru kugira ngo bashikirize amakuru y'ikibiriraho ku ku ngene amatora yariko aragenda. Hagati aho, abanyamakuru ntibari bemerewe kuvuga ivyo babona mu biharuro vyava mu matora kiretse ivyo bahawe n'umurwi ujejwe gutegura amatora, ibitandukanye no mu yandi matora y'imbere y'aho. Mw'iryo tangazo, Nestor Bankumukunzi avuga ko abamenyeshamakuru bitanze n'umwete wose kugira ngo barere ijisho uwo wese yipfuza kumenya ingene ico gikorwa cariko kiragenda mu gihugu. Ati: "Ibikorwa baranguye mu nteguro y'amatora vyarafashije bimwe biboneka mu kumenyesha abenegihugu ingene amatora atunganijwe, ikirangaminsi cayo, inyifato yobaranga nko kwirinda imvugo ibiba urwanko canke iteranya". Bwana Bankumukunzi avuga ati:  "Barerekanye ubugira kandi ko bazi umwuga wabo n'umutima wo gushira imbere ineza ya bose". Asaba uwo koba karaciyemwo akihenda ko hanyuma yozokwikosora na kare ngo "umuntu wese arashobora kwihenda". Ati: "Uko biri kwose amategeko agenga umwuga wo kumenyesha amakuru n'ubuhinga bujanye nawo, nivyo vyonyene vyobabera ishimikiro". Kuva mu 2005, bisanzwe bimenyerewe mu Burundi ko amaradiyo akorera mu runani mu gushikiriza amakuru ku bibazo bikomeye nk'amatora. Urunani nk'uru rwatanguye mu matora yo mu 2005, aho amaradiyo atari make yagiye hamwe agashikiriza ingene ayo matora ya mbere inyuma y'intambara yari yadutse mu 1993 yariko aragenda. Uretse ko kuva uwo mwaka urwo runani rwabandanije mu gushikiriza amakuru ku bibazo bimwe bimwe bikomeye, ntirwigeze ruhara mu matora yakurikiye haba mu 2010 canke mu 2015. Hagati aho, muri aya matora y'uno mwaka, abamenyeshamakuru ntibari bemerewe gushikiriza ibiharuro vy'ivyaba bivuye mu matora iyo bihejeje kwegeranywa mu tuzu no mu bigo vy'amatora, mu gihe mu matora y'imbere y'aha ariko babikora, maze bigatuma ivyayavamwo vyizigirwa gusumba. Mu ngingo ya 10 y'itegeko ngenderwako ry'amabenyeshamakuru mu gihe c'amatora ya 2020 ryateguwe n'ikigo CNC rigaterwako igikumu n'abarongoye ibimenyeshamakuru, abamenyeshamakuru bategerezwa kuvuga ivyo bahawe n'umurwi ujejwe gutegura amatora. Iyo ngingo ivuga iti: "Kirazira gushikiriza, mu nzira iyo ari yo yose, harimwo n'imbuga ngurukanabumenyi, ibiharuro mfatakibanza canke ntabanduka vy'amatora kanaka kiretse ibizoba bitangajwe n'umurwi wigenda ujejwe gutegura amatora canke abawuserukira mu ntara no mu makomine". Ku wa 04 z'uku kwa gatandatu, niho vyitezwe ko ibiharuro ntabanduka vy'ivyavuye mu matora bizotangazwa na sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro mu Burundi.

headline: Burundi - Ingoma: Reta yahagaritse abavuzi b'ingama b'umugwi Amagaba mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu
text: Ubushikiranganji bujejwe akarere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko, urwaruka, inkino hamwe n'akaranga bwahagaritse abatimbo b'umugwo Amagaba ikiringo c'amezi atandatu bagirizwa kuvuza ingoma bahonyanze amategeko azigenga. Abo bavuzi b'ingama canke abatimbo bagirizwa kurenga kw'itegeko ryo ku wa 20 ukwezi kwa cumi mu 2017 rigena uko ingoma zivuzwa haba mu Burundi canke mu makungu. Mu ngingo y'ubwo bushikiranganji bugira buti: "Twishimikije ko dutegerezwa kugikingira no kubungabunga akaranga k'Uburundi, duhagaritse mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu abavuzi b'ingoma  bo mu mugwi Amagaba mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu. "Abo batimbo bavugije bongera batamba ingoma bahonyanze akaranga k'abarundi." Muri ico kiringo, nta muntu n'umwe wo mri abo batumbo azoba afise uburenganzira bwo kuja mu biteramo vy'akaranga canke kuja mu wundi mugwi canke abantu berekana akaranga k'abarundi. Ku musi wa mbere itariki 7 z'ukwezi kwa kabiri mu 2022, igihe hariko harugururwa igiteramo ca Buja Sans Tabou, abavuzi b'ingoma b'wumugwi Amagaba bagaragaye bavuza ingoma bambaye amakoti n'amakaruvati. Iyo nyifato ikaba yarateye impari ku mbuga hwaniro, aho bamwe babitera ivyatsi abandi bavuga ko ari ibisanzwe kuko imico igenda ihindagurika uko imisi igenda irahera. Mw'itangazo Amagaba yasohoye itangazo aho bavuga ko bakiriye nkama ibihano bafatiwe. Bagira bati: "Kubwo abatimbo b'Amagaba, turakiriye nkana igihano ubushikiranganji bwadufatiye kw'ikosa ryadushikiye ryanatirimukije abatari bake n'aho atari yo ntumbero yacu." Inyuma y'umusi umwe igiteramo Buja Sans Tabou gitanguye, ubushikiranganji bujejwe akarere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko, inkino hamwe n'akaranga bwaciye bufata ingingo yo kugihagarika kubera ivyo vyabaye.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru i Buraya kuri uyu wa gatanu: Haaland, Milenkovic, Mbappe, Nketia, Flick
text: West Ham bizeye kuzana umukinyi w'imbere wa Arsenal, Eddie Nketiah, 21 mu mpera z'uyu mwaka. Manchester United iriteguriye kugura umukinyi w'inyuma w'umugwi wa Fiorentina na Serbie, Nikola Milenkovic, n'aho amahera asabwa kuri uwo mukinyi ari imiliyoni 38. (Sun) Imigwi ikomeye cane ya Espagne, Barcelone na Real Madrid ishobora kutagira ico bahanoba mu gushaka kugura umukinyi w'imbere akomeye cane wa Borussia Dortmund n'igihugu ca Norvege Erling Braut Haaland, w'imyaka 20. Uwo mukinyi yipfuza umushahara wa miliyoni 35 ku mwaka, umushahara ushobora gutuma Barca na Madrid babanza kwiyumvira. (Goal) Paris St-Germain bahamagarira umukinyi wabo akomeye cane w'imbere Kylian Mbappe, w'imyaka 22, gushira umukono ku masezerano mashasha, mu gihe uwo mukinyi adashaka amasezerano y'igihe kirekire.  (L'Equipe - in French) West Ham bizeye kuzana umukinyi w'imbere wa Arsenal, Eddie Nketiah, 21 mu mpera z'uyu mwaka. (Evening Standard) Wolves barashaka kugerageza kugura umukinyi w'imbere wa Benfica, Carlos Vinicius w'imyaka 26 mu mpera z'uyu mwaka inyuma y'aho Tottenham ifatiye ingingo yo kutamugura mu gihe yari yatijijwe muri uwo mugwi. (TVI24 - in Portuguese) Manchester United na Arsenal baranuganugwa ko bashaka kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Rennes, umufaransa Eduardo Camavinga w'imyaka 18, yamaze gufata ingingo yo kutongereza amasezerano n'uwo mugwi arimwo muri kino gihe. (Marca) Manchester United iripfuza uukinyi w'inyuma wa Danmark, Joachim Andersen w'imyaka 24, yatijijwe n'umugwi wa Lyon muri Fulham. (B.T - in Danish) Umumenyereza wa RB Leipzig, Julian Nagelsmann yabeshuje inkuru zivugwa ko yagiriraniye ibiganiro na Bayern Munich kugira asubirire Hansi Flick. (ESPN) Bayern iriko iriyumvira kuzana umumenyereza Massimiliano Allegri mu kibanza ca Flick. Allegri nta mugwi afise amenyereza  kuva avuye Juventus mu 2019. (Sport Mediaset - in Italian) Chelsea iracabandanya kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Uruguay na Atletico, Jose Maria Gimenez w'imyaka 26, ariko uwo yipfuza cane ni umukinyi w'inyuma wa Sevilla, Jules Kounde w'imyaka 22. (La Razon - in Spanish)external-link) Barcelona ishaka kugura umukinyi w'imbere wa Manchester City Sergio Aguero w'imyaka 32 agiye kurangiza ikiringo ciwe muri uwo mugwi mu mpera z'uyu mwaka, ariko Barca ifise ikibazo co gukwiza umushahara yemerewe na Juventus wa miliyoni 10 z'ama Euro. (Sport)external-link) Tottenham iriko iragerageza kugura umukinyi w'imbere wa Autriche Sasa Kalajdzic w'imyaka 23 akinira umugwi wa Stuttgart. (Eurosport)external-link ) Manchester United inuganugwa ko ishaka kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Lazio Sergej Milinkovic w'imyaka 26. Uwo mukinyi kandi araronderwa na Real Madrid na PSG. (Gazzetta - in Italian)external-lin Juventus ifise umugambi wo kugura umukinyi w'imbere wa Barcelone Ousmane Dembele w'imyaka 23, amasezerano yiwe bafitaniye n'uwo mugwi arangiye mu 2022.  (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish)external-link

headline: Ethiopia: umuhari urwanira mu ntara ya Oromia wishize hamwe na TPLF mu kurwanya reta
text: Umuhari w'inyeshamba Oromo Liberation Army wo mu ntara ya Oromia wishize hamwe n'inyeshamba za Tigray zirwanira mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia kugira ngo barwanirize hamwe ubutegetsi bw'iki gihugu. Umuhari Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) nta tangazo urasohora kuri aya masezerano, ariko umuvugizi w'uwu muhari yemeje aya masezerano mu kiganiro yagiriraniye n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Bloomberg. Mu kwa gatanu, reta ya Ethiopia yatangaje ko iyi mihari yompi ari iy'iterabwoba, ariko ukwishira hamwe kwayo gushobora gutera ibibazo umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed. Uretse inyeshamba za TPLF zirwanira mu ntara ya Tigray, ingabo za reta ya Ethiopia zihanganye n'iyindi mirwi mu turere dutandukanye tw'igihugu. Mu ntara ya Oromia isanzwe ibamwo ubwoko bunini muri ico gihugu kandi ari nayo umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed avamwo, reta ihanganye n'uwu muhari, Oromo Liberation Army, OLA. OLA isanzwe irondera ubwigenge bw'abanyagihugu bo mu bwoko bwa Oromo nta ntambwe ya gisirikare  iboneka yigeze itera, ariko ibandanya itera umutekano muke mu turere dutandukanye tw'iyo ntara. Myinshi mu mishamirano yo hagati mu gihugu muri Ethiopia iri ku rugero ruto kandi ikaba ishingiye ku bibazo bwite vy'abanyagihugu - rero kubona OLA igiye hamwe n'inyeshamba za Tigray ibintu bishobora guhinduka. Mu misi iheze, ingabo za reta zagiye zitsindwa mu buraruko bw'igihugu gushika aho zitakaza intara ya Tigray yigaruriwe n'inyeshamba za TPLF. Vyabaye ngombwa ko reta ihagarika agahengwe yari yatangaje maze itera akamo ingabo z'igihugu n'abazishigikiye kurandurana n'imizi umuhari Tigray People's Liberation Front, TPLF.

headline: Ethiopia: Onu irasaba gushikira abakeneye imfashanyo muri Tigray
text: Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU rivuga ko rikeneye vyihuta gushikira abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari mu kangaratete muri Tigray mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia. Ishami rya ONU rijejwe abana kw'isi, Unicef, rivuga ko amabarabara akwiye kwugururwa, indege zizana imfashanyo nazo zikarekurirwa kuzana imfashanyo za nkenerwa, muri iki gihe abana barenga 30.000 bageramiwe n'urupfu. Uwuserukira Unicef, Adele Khodr yabwiye BBC ati: "Turakeneye kandi ko hasubira kuba itumatumanako, umuyagankuba ukagarukanwa kandi tugashobora gushikira abantu bakeneye imfashanyo." Umutegetsi wo muri reta ku mugwa mukuru Addis Ababa yavuze ko abasirikare bashobora gusubira kwigarurira umugwa mukuru wa Tigray, Mekelle, mu ndwi zitatu mu gihe vyoba ngombwa. Ico gisagara cafashwe n'abagwanyi ku musi wa mbere. Igisirikare kivuga ko cavuye muri ico gisagara kubera gikeneye kwitegurira ibindi bikigeramiye, kandi ko abagwanyi bo muri Tigray batakiri ikibazo.

headline: Tanzania uko ndayibona: Ivyo Prezida Samia amaze gushikako mu mwaka umwe
text: Mu makete y'abamenyeshamakuru b'abanya-Afrika, Sammy Awami arasubiza amaso inyuma ku kugene Tanzania yahindutse mu mwaka umwe kuva Samia Suluhu Hassan abaye umugore wa mbere abaye ategetse ico gihugu inyuma y'urupfu rwa prezida John Pombe Magufuli. Iyo igipimo c'umunezezo canke ukwishima gifatwa mu ndwi nkeya ziheze, cari kwerekana ko aba-Tanzania bari mu bantu ba mbere banezerewe kw'isi, nk'uko bivugwa n'aba-Tanzania bamwe bamwe ku mbuga hwaniro. Mu mayinga make aheze, prezida Samia Suluhu Hassan, azwi cane gusa nka Mama Samia, yarabonanye na babiri mu ndongozi z'umugambwe uza imbere mu yitavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi, Chadema, Tundu Lissu na  Freeman Mbowe, ibintu atawari gushobora gucisha mu mutwe haraheze umwaka. Lissu aba mu buhungiro inyuma yo kuraswa amasasu 16 mu 2007 mu kugerageza kumwica vyafashwe ko vyari bifise imvo ya poritike. Mbowe aherutse kuva mu munyororo, aho yari apfungiwe kuva afashwe yagirizwa ivyaha vy'iterabwoba mu kwezi kw'indwi igihe yari yiteguriye kugirisha ikoraniro ryo gusaba ko hagira ibihindurwa mw'ibwirizwa nshingiro. Umunyamategeko akaba n'umwe mu baharanira uburenganzira cane Fatma Karume yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "NDAKWISHIMIYE, SSH [Samia Suluhu Hassan]. Lissu nawe nyene arakwishimiye." Haraheze umwaka, Tanzania cari ikindi gihugu. Ico gihe prezida John Pombe Magufuli yabona ko abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ari ibikoresho vy'inyungu z'abanyamahanga. Ururimi rwiwe ku batavuga rumwe na reta zari inguvu, kandi yari yihaye ihangiro ryo kuzimanganya poritike ishingiye ku migambwe myinshi. Kuba ibintu vyarahindutse nta n'umwe atavyemera mu mice yose ya poritike. Lissu avuga ati: "Si ndi umuntu agenda arakoma amashi, [ariko] hari ibintu Mama Samia yatanguye gukora neza. Kandi kubera yatanguye gukora ibintu neza, tuzomushigikira abikore neza gusumba." Ikidahurizwako n'ukumenya niba prezida Samia ivyo ariko arahindura akwiye kubishimirwa vyose. Tanzania yabaye igihugu gitwazwa igitugu ku mugambwe n'ubu ariwo utwara, Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM), ubu arongoye. Yari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu muri reta yakoze uko ishobora ngo izimanganye ukutavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi no guta abantu mu munyororo ku mpamvu zo kuyinegura gusa. Kunyuruza abantu, kubura abandi irengero, ku mvo bivugwa ko ari iza poritike, vyarakozwe kuri reta yazamwo ubwa kabiri mu butegetsi bwayo. Hari n'ikibazo co kumenya niba ashaka gushira mu mategeko impinduka ziriko ziraba. Nyinshi zisa n'izishingiye ku gushaka kw'umukuru w'igihugu ubwiwe gusa. Nk'akarorero, mu gihe kubonana n'abanyaporitike batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ari intambwe nziza mu kwubaka icizere, amategeko agenga imigambwe adahurizwako ntarahinduka. Ivyo biha urwego rujejwe imigambwe ububasha bwagutse kandi budatomoye neza bwo gufuta umugambwe no guha igihano co gupfungwa gushika ku mwaka uwo ariwe wese yihaye igikorwa co kwigisha ibijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu, nko gushishikariza abanyagihugu kwiyandikisha kugira bazokwitabe amatora. Ni nk'uko, n'ubwo ibihano ku binyamakuru vyinshi vyavanyweho, itegeko ryo 2016 rigenga ibimenyeshamakuru, iryo mu 2018 rigenga ibinyamakuru vyo ku mbuga hwaniro n'iryo mu 2015 rigenga ivyaha biciye mu kwinjira mu mashini (Cybercrimes), ayo yose ntarahinduka mu gihe ariyo yakomeje ukubuza ibinyamakuru gukorera mu bwigenge akanabikwegera ibihano nko guhagarikwa canke kwugarwa. Ico prezida Samia yakoze ubu n'uguhagarika umuhindimuko wo gushika ku ntwaro y'igitugu idateye amazi. Yasubije igihugu mu gihe c'imbere ya 2015, ariko nta kinini arakora kugira ahindure amategeko yatumye uwo yasubiriye akandamiza abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi. Ariko ivyo amaze gukora mu nzira ya poritike yihanganira abandi vyerekana ko umukuru w'igihugu ashaka kugira ivyo ahindura. Ariko vyerekana kandi ko ari mu mayirabiri hagati yo kubandanya impinduka no kugumiza umugambwe arongoye ku butegetsi.  Nk'akarorero, abanyaporitike batavuga rumwe n'ubutetegetsi babonanye n'ubu ntibarekuriwe gukoresha amakoraniro. Ariko birasa n'uko ibiriko birahinduka bizorama. Ico cizere kiva mu kwibaza ko prezida Samia ubu yamaze gufata mu minwe umugambwe uri ku butegetsi. Mu mezi ya mbere Magufuli agipfa, yategerezwa kwama ariko aributsa abamwumva ko n'umukuru w'umugore ategerezwa kwubahwa no kwizerwa. Ico gihe abashikiranganji basa n'abashaka kwubaha ivyo bishakiye mu mategeko yabaha. Kimwe mu bishobora kugagaza kuba ubutegetsi bwiwe buguma bukomera n'ifungurwa rya Mbowe - inyuma y'urubanza rwiwe rwamaze amezi umunani kandi ata vyagiriji, abantu nabo badasiba gusaba ko urubanza rwiwe rwofutwa. Vyibazwa ko rwahebwe kuko yihagazeko imbere y'abasigaye bakiri ku ngendo ya Magufuli baterekwa impinduka ziwe. Bamwe bagereranya ibiriko birahinduka nko ku gihe ca prezida Jakaya Kikwete, umwe mu bo Samia yafatirako akaba ari nawe  yatwaye imbere ya Magufuli. Uburyo bwiwe bwo gutwara bwari ubwo gushira abantu hamwe,  amatati ya poritike n'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi akenshi yakemurirwa mu biganiro ku kirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu bariko barasangira icayi n'utwuzango. Ivyo vyatuma reta isa n'iyidakoresha amategeko acinyiza. Aho umuntu afatira icizere n'uko hanagarutse poritike z'ubutunzi ziha ikibanza abikorera ku giti cabo. Abanyamitahe b'abanyamahanga bariko barareshwa cane, ibihugu vya Buraya bisigaye birabwa nk'ivyo gufashanya mw'iterambere aho kuba ibishaka kwiganza canke kuba "mabeberu," ni ukuvuga amasuguru (impfizi) y'impene - ijambo ry'akagaye ryakoreshwa na Magufuli. Hamwe na kahise ke ko guharanira agateka ka zina muntu binyuze mu gukorera hamwe, n'amamuko yiwe yo muri Zanzibar aharangwa umuco wo kwicisha bugufi no kwakira abandi, nta gitangaje ko agira ingendo itandukanye mu gutwara. Ariko ashobora guhura n'abatavyuma kumwe na we bakomeye cane muri CCM, hamwe, nk'akarorero, yokwemera ko haba amatora kamarampaka ku mpinduka mw'ibwirizwa nshingiro, ikintu abatavuga rumwe na reta n'abashigikiye demokrasi baguma basaba, kuko vyogabanya ububasha bw'umugambwe wiwe ku butegetsi. Prezida Samia yashitse ku butegetsi mu bihe  vy'igitangaza, mu gihugu n'ingendo ya poritike vyiganziwe n'ijwi ry'abagabo  vyatejwe imbere cane n'uwo yasubiriye. Umunsi umwe mw'ijambo imbere y'abanyagihugu, uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu umuhisi Magufuli yavuze atebura ingene abagore bihagararako bakubitwa, mu rindi naho akekeza mu buryo bujanye n'igitsina umugore w'umushingamateka kubera inzobe y'urukoba rwiwe. Aho hompi yarakomewe amashi cane. Inyuma y'umwaka umwe, prezida Samia yashoboye kuvyura icizere c'intango nshasha. Ariko igipimo kizogaragaza ko ishaka ryiwe ryo gukora impinduka zirama kiri ku muvuduko n'aho azogarukira mu guhindura amategeko ari nayo  yoshimangira iragi ryiwe ariko kandi akanakingira ukwishira n'ukwizana kw'abanya-Tanzania, akanabera inkinzo igihugu ku bategetsi b'igitugu bozokwinjira ingoro y'umukuru w'igihugu muri kazoza.

headline: Intambara ya Ukraine: Amwe mu makuru yo ku murango wo kuri uno wa mbere
text: Abategetsi ba Ukraine bavuga ko abantu  n'imiburiburi batandatu biciwe mu gitero ku kigo c'iguriro (Centre commercial/shopping center) kandi ko n'amazu atari make yononekaye mu karere ka Podilskyi ku mugwa mukuru Kyiv. Amasanamu yasohowe n'ikigo ca Ukraine kijejwe ubutabazi yafashwe igihe iyo nyubakwa yaterwa amabombe. Abajejwe kuzimya imiriro y'ivyaduka bahavuye baboneka mu nyuma bariko bagerageza kurokora abantu babuze iyo baja n'iyo bava mu bihomoka. Abategetsi bavuga ko itangi y'itoni 50 yuzuye gaze y'ubumara yononekaye igihe ikigo ca Sumykhimprom caterwa ikibombe c'Uburusiya, ivyatumye haboneka ibicu vya ammoniaque. Ico gicu cagize ingaruka ku karere k'ibirometero 2,5, nk'uko buramatari w'iyo ntara Dmytro Zhyvytskyy abivuga. Avuga ko umuntu umwe ari we yakomerekeye muri iki gitero - uyu nawe akaba ari umukozi yakorera kuri ico kigo. Abanyagihugu baba mu gisagara kibanyi ca Novoselytsya  basabwe kwinyegeza kubera ico gicu. Ammoniaque ikoreshwa cane mu guhingura ifumbire kandi ironona ibintu. Ishobora gutera ububabare no guturira ihemero ikonona n'amaso. Amakuru ya nyuma avuga ko impunzi zihunga Ukraine zababa imiriyoni 10, bamwe bahungira hanze, abandi hagati mu gihugu. Abarenga imiriyoni 2,1 bahungiye muri Pologne  kuva intambara yaduka, nk'uko bitangazwa n'igisata kijejwe gucungera imbibe za Pologne. Hagati aho, ibitigiri vy'abajabuka biriko biragabanuka. Ku wa Mungu honyene, abantu 33.800 barajabutse urubibe, nk'uko vyandikwa n'iki gisata ku rubuga rwa Twitter, igitigiri cagabanutse kuri 16% kuva ku wa gatandatu. Gushika isaha cumi na zibiri z'agatondo mu masaha mpuzamakungu kuri uno wa mbere, abantu 5700 nibo bajabutse, igitigiri cagabanutse ku rugero rwa 17% . Bamwe mu bahungiye muri Pologne baramaze gufata inzira ibajana mu bindi bihugu. Uwahoze ari kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza mu mupira w'amaguru, David Beckham, ejo yahaye konte yiwe yo ku rubuga rwa Instagram umuganga wa Ukraine mu gisagara ca Kharkiv. Dr. Iryna, arongoye ikigo gifasha abibarutse, yasohoye amareresi yerekana ibikorwa vy'abavuzi muri ico gisagara kimaze indwi zitatu giterwa urutavanako amabombe y'Uburusiya. Imwe muri aya mareresi yerekana inzoya zari zihejeje kuvuka ziriko ziravurwa, hamwe n'icumba co mu kuzimu abarwariye muri iki kigo bahungishirijwemwo aya mabombe. Beckham w'imyaka 46 ubu afise abantu barenga imiriyoni 71 bamukurikira kuri Instagram. Dr. Iryna ari na we arongoye iki kigo avuga ati: "Imisi ya mbere niyo yari igoye cane. Vyabaye ngombwa ko twiga ingene dukorera mu mabombe n'ibitero vy'indege. "Dusa n'abashize ubuzima bwacu mu kaga, ariko ibi ntaco bitubwiye. Turakunda akazi kacu, abaganga n'abaforoma bose hano, turatekerwa n'ubwoba, turarira, ariko nta n'umwe muri twebwe twese arota aheba".

headline: 'Igituririre ni cinshi muri Afrika y'Epfo' - Akanama ka Zondo
text: Inyuma y'icegeranyo gishira ahagaragara ubusuma bw'ama miriyaridi y'amadolari mu kigega ca reta ya Afrika y'epfo ku ntwaro y'uwamubanjirije, prezida Cyril Ramaphosa yariyemeje ko "ivyo bitazosubira kuba ." Ariko abanye Afrika y'epfo ntibemera ko hari icigwa bakuyemwo. Barababajwe no kuba amahera yibwe yari gukoreshwa mu bisata vy'amagara y'abantu n'uburezi muri ico gihugu. Ayo matohoza akomeye ku giturire co ku ntwaro ya prezida Jacob Zuma yerekanye ingene nk'ibisata vyose vya reta vyanigiwe mu menshi, birononwa n'abategetsi ba ANC  (African National Congress), uri ku butegetsi kuva mu 1994 harangiye intwaro y'abazungu bari ku rushi. Iki cegeranyo cagiriza ahanini uwo mugambwe. Prezida Ramaphosa ubwiwe yabwiwe n'ako kanama karongowe n'umucamanza, ko atakoze ibikwiye mu gukumira ubwo busuma igihe yari icegera ca Zuma. Impapuro zirenga 5.000, akanama Zondo - kiswe izina ry'umucamanza wo mu rwego rwo hejuru akarongoye - karerekana ido n'ido ry'ingene ubutunzi bwa reta bwibwe. Kiranerekana ingene abagwizatunga bavukana bo mu muryango wa Gupta, bagerageje kugira uruhara mu ngingo za politike n'ubutunzi mu ntumbero yiswe  "kwigarurira reta". Zuma yirukanywe ku butegetsi mu 2018 yagirizwa igiturire caguma congerekana, hanyuma Ramaphosa aca afata ubutegetsi yiyemeje guhanagura ivyo vyose. Igice ca nyuma c'ico cegeranyo c'akanama ka Zondo cashikirijwe ku musi wa gatatu. Prezida akaba yavuze ko ivyo babonye ari "iceyi kuri demokrasi yacu kandi vyahonyanze uburenganzira bw'abanye Afrika y'Epfo bose." Ariko bimwe muvyo ico cegeranyo casozerereyeko ni gusigira ibibazo prezida ahari ubu ategerezwa kwishura vyerekeye impamvu vyabaye arorera. Ico cegeranyo kigira kiti: "Hari inkuru nyinshi zifise ifatiro zamenyekanye (...) zashobora kumutuma agira amatohoza akanafata n'ingingo kuri bimwe bivugwa bikomeye. "Nk'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu, yari afise ububasha bwo kubikora." Mu ntango ayo matohoza yategerezwa kuba mu misi 180, ariko ukurengukisha abantu vyatwaye imisi 400 aho ivyabona 300 vyabajijwe. Ico gikorwa cose catwaye imyaka ine. Ivyemezo vyarerekanye ingene abategetsi ba ANC, harimwo abashikiranganji b'ubu n'abakera bagiye canke bafashije mu busuma  vyatumye igihugu gihomba amahera menshi. Muri ivyo harimwo kubuza gukora igisata kijejwe gutoza amakori mu gihugu, gupfukama mu nda ishirahamwe ry'indege South Africa Airways, kwiba amahera mu gisata kijejwe ingendo za gariyamoshi muri ico gihugu no mu kwivanga mu biraba ikinyamakuru ca reta, SABC. Igisata kijejwe iperereza na co nyene caragabanuwe inguvu mu kugena abakozi bo mu rwego rwo hejuru babujije ko haba amatohoza babisabwe na Zuma n'abandi bantu bifatwa ko bamwegereye.

headline: Guinea-Bissau: CEDEAO iriyamiriza 'kugerageza' gutembagaza ubutegetsi
text: Ishirahamwe ry'akarere k'ibihugu vya Afrika y'uburengero, CEDEAO/ECOWAS, ryiyamirije ico ryise "kugerageza" gutembagaza ubutegetsi muri Guinée-Bissau, risaba abasirikare gusubira mu makambi. Ibi bikurikiye amakuru y'uko hari abantu bambaye impuzu z'igisivile batanguye kurasa bari hafi y'inyubakwa ya leta yaberamwo inama hagati y'umukuru w'igihugu n'umushikiranganji wa mbere b'iki gihugu, aho bari hakaba hatazwi. Ibiro ntaramakuru Reuters bisubiramwo amajambo y'itangazo rya CEDEAO agira ati: "CEDEAO iriko irakurikirana n'impungenge nyinshi ibiriko birabera muri Guinea-Bissau... aho abasirikare bariko bararasa mu micungararo y'ingoro ya leta." "CEDEAO iriyamiriza kugerageza gutembagaza ubutegetsi ikaba inashinze ijisho abasirikare ku bijanye n'umutekano wa Prezida Umaro Sissoco Embaló hamwe n'abagize leta yiwe." Muri iyi minsi ya vuba CEDEAO yahagaritse ikindi gihugu c'ikinyamuryango, Burkina Faso, aho abasirikare batembagaje ubutegetsi.

headline: Gufungura neza: Imfungurwa ntungamagara 90% y'abantu batarya bihagije
text: Nk'ubu nobereka imfungurwa z'akamaro kadasanzwe zishobora kubatuma muramba mwumva mworyoherwa? Mu bisanzwe, izi ni imfungurwa zigabanya ivyago vyo gufatwa n'indwara z'umutima (crises cardiaques), isanganya ry'ubwonko (AVC) hamwe n'izindi ndwara zidakira, nk'igisukari co ku rugero rwa kabiri. Izi mfungurwa ni izibatuma mwirinda umuvyibuho urenze urugero, umuvuduko udasanzwe w'amaraso, zikabafasha kandi kugabanya vya binure bizwi nka cholestérol. Izi mfungurwa zirasanzwe kandi ntizizimvye, mbere biroroshe no kuzironka mu masoko n'amazu adandarizwamwo imfungurwa. Zizwi nka fibres - si ikintu gihambaye cane kw'isi, ariko icigwa gikomeye cerekana urugero nkenerwa rwa fibres dutegerezwa gufungura, kikerekana kandi ko hari akarusho kadasanzwe ku magara yacu. Umwe mu bashakashatsi, Prof. John Cummings, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ubu ibimenyetso ni vyinshi kandi bikomeye: ni ngombwa ko abantu batangura kugira ico bakoze kuri iki kintu ". Ubwoko bw'izi mfungurwa burazwi cane mu kurwanya kugumirwa, ariko uturusho zizanira amagara ni twinshi cane. Abashakashatsi bo kw'ishure kaminuza ya Otago muri Nouvelle-Zélande, hamwe n'abo kw'ishure kaminuza ya Dundee, bemeza ko abantu bategerezwa gufungura n'imiburiburi 25g (garama)  za fibre ku musi. Ariko bavuga ko uru ari urugero "rubayabaye" mu kubungabunga amagara, ariko ko kurenza 30 navyo ari ngirakamaro cane. Umuhwi wonyene ukwawo upima hafi 120g, ariko rero si ukuvuga ko ufise fibres gusa. Ukuyemwo ibiwugize vyose, nk'isukari hamwe n'amazi, usigarana 3g zonyene za fibres. Abantu benshi kw'isi bafungura fibre ziri musi ya 20g ku musi. Mu Bwongereza, abantu bari musi y'umwe ku bantu cumi bakuze nibo bafungura 30g ku musi. Ugereranije, usanga abagore bafungura hafi 17g, abagabo nabo 21g ku musi. Uzozisanga mu vyamwa n'imboga, intete zimwe zimwe zikunze kwiherezwa mu gitondo, imikate n'ubutsima bikozwe mu ntete zidakoboye, intete zumye ziva  ku biharage n'ibindi bimeze nka vyo, indengu (lentilles), ubushaza, ivyema/ibiyoba  n'intete. Elaine Rush, umwigisha w'ibijanye n'imfungurwa kuri kaminuza y'ubuhinga ya Auckland, afatira kuri aka karorero mu gusigura iziri hagati ya 25g na 30g: igice c'igikombe ca avoine (oats)- 9g za fibres | agapande k'umukate usa n'ubutsima bw'ingano (pain gris) - 2 g za fibres | igikombe k'indengu zitetse  - 4 g za fibres | ikirayi gitekanye ibishishwa  - 2g za fibres | inusu y'igikombe ca betterave  - 1g za fibres | ikaroti imwe  - 3g za fibres | paume imwe iriko ibishishwa  - 4g za fibres Ariko yongerako ati: "Ntivyoroshe kwongereza urugero rwa fibre mu mfungurwa". Prof Cummings aravyemera. Ati: "Ni ikibazo gikomeye". Ikigo kijewe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza National Health Service, kirabisigura. Muri izi nzira harimwo : Ikinyamakuru gitangaza amakuru ajanye n'amagara y'abantu Lancet cashize ahabona ivyavuye mu vyigwa 185 vyakozwe hamwe n'bindi 58 vyakorewe ku mavuriro. Nk'uko ivyavuye muri ibi vyigwa bivyerekana, ufashe abantu 1000 ukabavana ku mfungurwa bahora bafungura zifise fibres nkeya ( munsi ya 15g)  ukabashira ku mfungurwa zifise fibres zikwiye (25-29g), ushobora gusanga ukijije abantu 13 bari gupfa, hamwe n'abandi batandatu bari gufatwa n'indwara z'umutima. Ibi ni ivyavuye mu vyigwa bisanzwe bikurikirana abantu mu kiringo c'imyaka kuva kw'icumi gushika kuri 20. Iki cigwa cerekana kandi ko abasanzwe bafungura fibres badakunda kurwara indwara z'igisukari co ku rugero rwa kabiri hamwe na kanseri yo mu mara, zikongera zikagabanya ibiro vy'umurengera, umuvuduko w'amaraso hamwe na vya binure cholesterol. Uko abantu bafungura indya zirimwo fibres, niko amagra yabo atera amera neza. Muri kahise, abantu bibaza ko ama fibres ata kintu kinini akora mu mubiri, ko umubiri udashobora kuzihingura, ko umuntu yazifungura akazisohora uko nyene. Ariko, fibres zituma twumva ko duhaze kandi zikagira uruhara mu guhingura imfungurwa zirimwo ibinure mu rura ruto. Ibintu bikomera cane mu gihe ziri mu rura runini, kubera bacteries  ziri mu rura runini ari zo ica yihereza. Urura runini rutunze amamiriyaridi y'a bacteries, iyo rero ufunguye fibres nyinshi nizo zica ziba imfungurwa zazo. Si ibintu bitangaje ko umubiri wacu ukeneye ama fibres, intete zidakoboye, ivyamwa n'imboga ku magara yacu. Ariko bivanye n'uko abantu benshi usanga badakunze kwihereza imfungurwa nkenerwa, hari ubwoba ko usanga badafata fibres zikwiye. Prof Nita Forouhi wo kw'ishure kaminuza ya Cambridge avuga ati: "Ni ngombwa ko dufata nka nkama ivyavuye muri kino cigwa". "Ivyavuyemwo bisigura ko, n'aho abantu benshi usanga badakunze kwihereza imfungurwa ndemamubiri, ni ngombwa ko biyumvira uruhombo bagira iyo badafunguye fibres zikomoka mu ntete zidakoboye". "Ubu bushakashatsi buremeza ko fibres hamwe n'intete zidakoboye zifise akamaro kadasanzwe ku magara yacu mu gihe kirekire". Iki cigwa cakozwe mu ntumbero yo gufasha ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO gutegura ivyemezo ku bijanye n'urugero rwa fibres abantu bakwiye gufata kugira ngo babungabunge amagara yabo. Bumwe mu buryo bwo kwongereza urugero rwa fibres mu mfungurwa zacu ni uguheba imikate ikozwe mw'ifu y'intete zikoboye tukaja ku yikozwe mu ntete zidakoboye. Ni vyo vyabaye ku masoko y'izi mfungurwa, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'urukurikirane rw'ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na reta ku bijanye n'ingene imiryango yagiye ikoresha amafaranga kuva mu 1974. Kuva hagati y'imyaka ya 1970 gushika hagati y'imyaka ya 1980, umukate wera wagiye ugabanuka, mu gihe umukate usa n'umutsima w'ingano (pain gris)  hamwe n'uwukozwe mw'ifu y'intete zidakoboye wagiye wiyongera. Kuva ico gihe, umukate wera wagiye ugabanuka kw'isoko, mu gihe imikate isa n'umutsima w'ingano n'iyikozwe mw'ifu y'intete zidakoboye yagiye yiyongera cane muri ico gihe, n'aho vyagiye bukebuke. Bigaragara rero ko, mu gihe ibitigiri vy'abarondera umukate kw'isi vyagabanutse, myinshi mu yagurishijwe yari imikate ifise urugero runini rwa fibres.

headline: Kanye West yahinduye icese izina ryiwe yiyita Ye
text: Umuririmvyi yari azwi nka Kanye West  kuva ubu agiye kwitwa icese izina rigufi rya Ye. Umucamanza wo muri Los Angeles yemereye uwo muhinga wa rap guhindura izina, nk'uko vyemejwe n'uwujejwe kumenyesha amakuru muri Sentare nkuru ya Los Angeles. Uwo rurangiranwa w'imyaka 44 yari yabisavye mu kwezi kw'umunani avuga ko ari "ku mvo ziwe bwite". Uwo mu rapper, azwi ku ndirimbo nka Gold Digger na Stronger, yari asanzwe amaze gukoresha Ye nk'iritazirano hanyuma mu 2018 arikoresha nk'umutwe w'urukurikirane rw'indirimbo.  Iyo album imaze igihe isohotse, yanditse kuri twitter ati: "N'ubwo nzwi mu buryo bwemewe nka Kanye West. Ndi YE." Ubu rero yabitangaje icese izina yari asanganywe - Kanye Omari West - ntirikiriho. Mu gihe kuri twitter yari asanzwe yitwa Ye, kuri Instagram no ku rubuga rwiwe (website) hari hagikoreshwa izina ryiwe gushika ku wa kabiri. N'ubwo ari impfunyapfunyo ya Kanye, iryo zina yihaye rifise n'ico risigura mu bijanye n'idini kuri ico camamare. Mu 2018 yavugiye mu kiganiro yahaye umuremesha-biganiro vya radio, Big Boy, ati: "Nibaza ko Ye ariryo jambo rikoreshwa cane muri Bibiriya, kandi muri Bibiriya risigura wewe. N'ukuvuga ndi wewe, ndi twebwe, ni twebwe." "Rivuye kuri Kanye, risigura we wenyene, rija kuri Ye ryerekana uko tuba tumeze, neza, nabi, tuzazaniwe, ivyo uko turi vyose." Ye yasohoye album yiwe ya vuba Donda mu kwezi kwa munani irimwo indirimbo 27 zimara amasaha abiri. Mu nyuma yaciye avuga ko abasanzwe basohora indirimbo ziwe, Universal Music Group, basohoye atabahaye uruhusha album yiwe igira 10 yari irindiriwe umwanya munini cane. Abandi baririmvyi nka Prince, Snoop Dogg na Sean Love Comb nabo baragiye barahindura  amazina yabo, bamwe mbere kenshi. Ye yaravuzwe cane mu binyamakuru muri uyu mwaka igihe yavana n'umugore wiwe bari bamaranye imyaka indwi,  Kim Kardashian. Uwo mugabo n'uwo mugore bafitaniye abana bane, bari mu bantu babaye ivyamamare cane kw'isi. Ubukwe bwabo bwabaye bumwe mu bw'abantu b'ivyamamare kw'isi bwakurikiranywe cane muri iyi myaka irenga mirongo iheze. Iyo nkuru yakurikiye umugambi  wa Ye utagenze neza wo kwitoza mu kibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu wa Amerika mu 2020.

headline: Bob Marley: Kwibuka imyaka 40 iheze iyo mboneza ipfuye
text: Imyaka 40 iraheze kuva umuririmvyi wa reggae yasize izina Bob Marley yishwe na cancer i Miami, ku myaka 36, hari ku wa 11 ukwezi kwa gatanu mu 1981. Uwo munyamuziki n'umwe mu bakundwa kandi bemewe cane muri kahise k'umuziki, ku ndirimbo nyinshi zabiciye bigacika nka No Woman No Cry, One Love, na Redemption Song. Indirimbo yiwe Buffalo Soldier niyo yabaye rurangiranwa kurusha izindi mu Bwongereza, aho yagiye mu kibanza ca kane mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu 1983. Album [urukurikirane rw'indirimbo] yo mu 1977 Exodus yiswe Album y'Ikinjana n'ikinyamakuru Time Magazine. Marley yavutse mu 1945, kuri se w'umuzungu na nyina w'umwirabure, muri Jamaica. Nk'umwana yakuriye mu bukene kandi nta migenderanire myinshi bari bafitaniye na se, uwo akaba yari asanzwe ari umusirikare wo mu mazi yakorera reta y'Ubwongereza. Yavuye iwabo ku myaka 14 aja gutangura umwuga w'umuziki i Kingston. Mu  1972, Marley yashitse mu Bwongereza n'umugwi wiwe The Wailers kuremesha ibiteramo na Johnny Nash mu ntumbero yo kugerageza kumenyekana ku rubuga mpuzamakungu. Mu mwaka ukurikira, The Wailers basohoye album yabo Catch a Fire baca bakora igiteramo cabo ca mbere kuri television kuri BBC. Ico giteramo cagize ingaruka nini cane gica kibazanira abakunzi benshi ku bo bari basanganywe. Inyuma y'urundi rugendo rw'ibiteramo mu 1975, yafashe amajwi ikibiriraho indirimbo No Woman No Cry kuri The Lyceum, i Londres, ica isohoka yonyene (single) ibera Bob Marley indirimbo yiwe mbere yagiye ku rutonde rw'izikundwa cane mu Bwongereza. Uwo muririmvyi yaciye aja mu murongo w'abaririmvyi bakomeye kw'isi aca aba izina rizwi mu aho uciye hose. Marley yari azwi ku kwemera kwiwe gushingiye kuri  Rastafarism, hamwe n'umugore wiwe, Rita, idini rikaba ryaragaragara mu ndirimbo ziwe. Uwo muririmvyi yarakunda kandi cane umupira w'amaguru, vyari bizwi ko acishamwo akaja gukina iyo afashe akaruhuko mu gihe co gutegura indirimbo (muri studio) canke imbere yo kuremesha igiteramo. Mu kiganiro mu 1980 yavuze ati: "Nkunda umuziki imbere yo gukunda umupira." "Gukina umupira w'amaguru no kuririmba n'ibintu bibangamye kuko umupira urimwo kubabazanya. Ndirimba amahoro, urukundo n'ibindi nk'ivyo, urabona uriko urakina ntawuzi igishobora gushika, "Umuntu aguteze akakubabaza umenga ibaye intambara." Igiteramo c'ikibiriraho ca nyuma ca Bob Marley mu Bwongereza cabaye itariki 13 ukwezi kw'indwi mu 1980 muri New Bingley Hall, Stafford. Marley yaciye apfa mu mwaka ukurikira ahitanywe n'indwara ya melanone acral-lentigineux yari yatowe mu 1977. Yashinguwe aho yavukiye muri Jamaica mu kigwati ca Nine Mile. Amafoto yose n'aya nyeneyo.

headline: Covid: Bolsanaro wa Brazil yise abakuru b'intara 'abanyagitugu' kubera ingingo za guma mu rugo
text: Umukuru wa Brezil Jair Bolsonaro yise "abanyagitugu" abakuru b'intara n'ibisagara bafashe ingingo z'umukwabu wo kutava mu ngo kugira bahagarike ikwirakwira rya coronavirus. Ashikiriza ijambo abayoboke biwe mu birori vyo guhimbaza isabukuru ry'amavuko yiwe, yavuze ko reta yiwe yakoze ivyo ishobora vyose ko hageze rero ko imirimo y'ubutunzi isubira gukorwa. Ku ndwi iheze, ikigo ca mbere mu bijanye n'amagara y'abantu Fiocruz cagabishije kivuga ko igisata co kwitaho amagara y'abantu muri Brezil cananiwe ku rugero rutari bwigere ruboneka. Cavuze ko  ivyumba vyo mu bitaro vyakira abaremvye cane vyarengewe. Prezida Bolsanaro, yakwije imyaka 66 ku wa mungu, yagumye yanka ingingo zo kuguma mu rugo, avuga ko ingaruka zazo ku butunzi zoba mbi cane kurusha ingaruka z'iyo ndwara ubwawo. Mu minsi iheze uwo mukuru w'igihugu yabwiye abanyaBrezil ''kureka kuboroga" kubera ico kiza. Uburyo Bolsonaro yitwara ku kibazo c'indwara ya corona bwatumye anegurwa cane mu gihugu no mu mahanga. Mu yindi nkuru itandukanye ariko ijanye n'iyo, ubushikiranganji bwa Brezil bujejwe amagara y'abantu ku wa mungu bwakuyeho ingingo yategeka kubika 50 kw'ijana y'incanco kugir  zizoterwe abamaze kuronka urwa mbere. Umushikiranganji yahahora Eduardo Pazuello yavuze ko intumbero ari ukugira igitigiri kinini gishoboka c'abantu baronke nibura urucanco rwa mbere vuba hashoboka, nk'uko bitangazwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP. Brezil iriko irita ku rutare kugira hatangwe incanco muri ico gihugu kinini cane. Gushika ubu hakoreshwa incanco za Oxford-AstraZeneca na CoronaVac rwo mu Bushinwa, zompi zikenera ko umuntu aziterwa kabiri. Brezil yanatumyeko kandi incanco za Pfizer-BioNTech, Johnson & Johnson na Sputnik V. Brezil iza ubwa kabiri kw'isi mu bihugu bifise impfu nyinshi zifatiye kuri Covid-19 - inyuma ya reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Abantu barenga 294.000 baramaze guppfa kuva ico kiza giteye, abamaze kwandura iyo ndwara gushika ubu ni miriyoni 12, hakurikijwe ibiharuro bitororokanywa na kaminuza ya Hopkins yo muri Amerika. Muri rusangi muri Brezil hapfa abantu 2.200 ku munsi  kubera Covid. Umurindi wa vuba wo kwandura bivugwa ko watewe n'ubwoko bushasha bw'uwo mugera bwandukira cane. Fiocruz kivuga ko intara 27 za Brezil havuyemwo zibiri gusa, zose zimaze kuja hejuru ya 80% y'ubushobozi bwo kwitaho abarwaye Covid-19. Muri Rio Grande do Sul, ico kigo kivuga ko ata gitanda na kinwe cari gisigaye co kwakira abaremvye cane.

headline: Tanzania-Dr Philip Mpango:Video y'umushikiranganji abeshuza ko yapfuye yaneguwe cane
text: Video ibabaje y'umushikiranganji  wa Tanzania ajejwe ikigega ari imbere y'abamenyeshamakuru kubeshuza ibihuha vy'uko yapfuye yaneguwe cane, benshi bakavuga ko bitari bikenewe kandi  ari ukumugirira nabi. Ku ndwi iheze prezida John Magufuli yari yebeshuje ivyo bihuha , avuga ko Dr Philip Mpango akiriho kandi ariko aratora mitende. Ku wa kabiri, Dr Mpango, ahagatiwe n'abakozi bo kwa muganga babiri , batambaye udufukamunwa, yasomye itangazo imbere y'abamenyeshamakuru mu bitaro vyitiriwe Benjamin Mkapa ku murwa mukuru Dodoma. Yarakoroye   aranahagirika kenshi  kugira abashe gusubira guhema neza igihe yariko arasoma iryo tangazo. Ntibizwi indwara agwaye iyariyo ariko yavuze ko yari afise "ingorane zo guhema" kandi ko yari akeneye  umwuka(oxygene). Yavuze kandi ko yakize. Uwutavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi Tundu Lisu yaneguye abategetsi baretse ngo iryo tangazo rigenewe abamenyeshamakuru risomwe. Ati: "Ninde yaretse umuntu arwaye ngo akore ivyo, yarakorora kandi ntiyari yambaye agafukamunwa. Yategerzwa kuba ariko araruhuka  anavurwa.'' Lissu yongeyeko ati uko "n'ukwigira sindabibazwa'' Dr Mpango yageze ahantu ikigumbagumba kiramufata igihe yariko arahoza ababuze yongera asaba imbabazi ko atashoboye  imigirwa yo gusezera icegera ca mbere c'umukuru wa Zanzibar Sef Sharif Hamad, yapfuye ku ndwi iheze ahitanywe na Covid-19,n'umunyamabanga mukuru mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu John Kijazi n'uwahoze ari umukuru wa banki nkuru y'igihugu Prof Benno Ndulu. Dr Mpango ati: "Narababaye kubona  ata n'umwe nashoboye guherekeza ariko ndabifuriza amahoro adashira." Hamaze kuvugwa impfu nyinshi zifatiye kuri Covid-19 muri Tanzania ariko ntizigeze zemezwa icese canke naho vyavuzwe ko umugera wa corona atari wo waziteye. Ariko ubu Tanzania  ubu bwa vuba yarahinduye imvugo, ubu abategetsi ntibakivuga koi co gihugu ata Covid-19 ikirangwamwo ahubwo bagahamiriza abanyagihugu kwubahiriza amategeko yo kwikingira harimwo kwambara agafukamunwa.

headline: Nigeria: Uyu muvugabutumwa arindiriye kwumva ijwi ry’Imana kugira yugurure urusengero
text: Umuvugabutumwa azwi cane muri Nijeriya, Temitope Balogun Joshua, azwi cane mu mpfunyapfunyo nka TB Joshua, avuga ko akirindiriye "ijwi ry'Imana" imbere y'uko yugurura urusengero rwiwe mu gisagara ca Lagos. Abategetsi ba Lagos bamenyesha ko amasengero ashobora gusubira kwugurura ku wa Mungu, akakira igice c'abo yahora yakira, inyuma y'amezi atari make yari amaze yugawe mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ikwirakwira rya coronavirus. Mw'ireresi yashize ku rubuga rwa Twitter,  TB Joshua avuga ko "inyuma y'aho abategetsi baduhereye uruhusha, uru turindiriye ico Imama itubwira". Yongeyeko ati: "Ndabasavye mwizere ko nitwamara kwumva ijwi ry'Imana, tuzobamenyesha igihe ibikorwa vy'urusengero bizotangurira icese". Uyu muvugabutumwa yigize umuhanuzi yateje impari mu gihugu mu ntango z'uyu mwaka igihe atangaza ko coronavirus yategerezwa kuba yazimanganye imbere y'igenekerezo rya 27/03/2020, hasigaye iminsi itari mike ngo ubutegetsi butangaze ingingo zo guhagarika ibikorwa mu bisagara vya Lagos, Ogun n'umugwa mukuru Abuja. Ico gihe yatangarije ishengero ryiwe ati: "Imbere y'uko uku kwezi guhera, twemera canke tutemera, ata kuraba imiti izoba yahinguwe ngo bariko baravura, iyo ndwara izoba yazimanganye uko yaje". Igihe iryo genekerezo rya 27 rirenganiye, uyo muvugabutumwa yarazomerewe yagirizwa "ubuhanuzi bwiwe bw'ikinyoma". Hagati aho, yarisiguye - kandi mbere abanywanyi biwe bamukomera amashi - mu kuvuga ati: "Ico nashaka kuvuga kwari uko uwo mugera uzozimangana harya watanguriye, kandi i Wuhan (mu Bushinwa) umugera warahagaritswe". Ivyatangajwe n'uyo muvugabutumwa TB Joshua ntawe vyatangaje kuko niko abapasitori batari bake muri ico gihugu bameze. Hari bamwe bibaza ko uyo muvugabutumwa ashobora kuba yaramaze kwumva ijwi ry'Imana rimubwira nimba ashobora kwugururua urusengero kuri uyu wa Mungu, ariko abandi nabo bariyorohereza ko ivyo ata vyabaye.

headline: Uruzuba muri Somalia: 'Gira ico mukoze ubu nyene canke abana 350.000 bapfe'
text: Mu gihe Somalia yugarijwe n'ico abahinga bita uruzuba rwa mbere rukaze cane mu myaka 10, abana nibo bariko barahasinzikarira kurusha abandi. Abavyeyi  barakenye ivyo babagaburira, gushika mu kwezi kwa gatandatu,  50% y'abana bafise munsi y'imyaka itanu mu gihugu cose bakaba bashobora kurwara indwara ziturutse ku kubura ico barya. Nimco Abdi ashize  uruyoya rwiwe rw'umukobwa rw'amezi  atandatu ku munzani, asanga rupima 4kg (ibiro bine). Ivyo  bihakwa kuba munsi y'ibiro uwo mwana yetegerezwa kuba agezeko. Ni muto cane  ugereranije n'amezi afise. Amaso yiwe yararotse,  amagufa yiwe ari hejuru, umubiri nawo wuzuye iminkanyari kandi wiraburaniwe. Nimco amuteruye amuvana ku munzani, arira ata nguvu ku buryo uhakwa kutamwumva. Nimco avuga ati: "Kare nahora ndamwonsa. Ariko nararwaye cane kubera ntagira ico ndya. Aca arananuka cane, nca mfata ingingo yo kumuzana ngaha. Nibura ngaha araronka amata hamwe n'imiti". Nimco amaze iminsi ashitse ku kigo co gufasha abafise indwara zituruka ku kubura ivyo kurya i Luuq, 500km uvuye Mogadishu muri Somalia yo mu bumanuko bushira uburengero. Yahawe igitanda muri ico kigo, ariko ategerezwa kugisangira n'uwundi muvyeyi. Ingorane ziwe zifiswe n'abandi bavyeyi benshi ubu bafise ubwoba ko bashobora kubura abana babo kubera  kubura ico barya. "Ata gikozwe, hibazwa ko gushika mu ci ryimirije, abana 350.000 kuri miriyoni 1,4 bababaye cane kubera kubura ico barya mu gihugu, bazoba bapfuye," ivyo bivugwa na Adam Abdelmoula wo mw'ishirahamwe rya ONU rihuza ibikorwa vyo kugarukira abari mu kaga, Ocha. "Muri iki gihugu, abana bashika 70% basanzwe bataja kw'ishure. Mu ntara imwe ya Juba,  uruzuba rwatumye  amashure yugarwa kandi ivyo bigiye kugenda gutyo mu ntara nyinshi zugarijwe n'uruzuba," nk'uko abandanya avuga, akongerako ko abana b'abakobwa bamwe bamwe baca barongorwa hataragera kuko imiryango idashobora kubagaburira. Fatuma Mohamed, umuforomakazi ku kigo ca Luuq co kwitaho abarwaye indwara ziturutse ku kurya nabi, avuga ko ico kigo ku bisanzwe gifise ubushobozi bwo kuryamika abantu 18, ariko ubu hari abana 50 na ba nyina babo. "Ikiduteye impungenge n'ibitigiri binini turonka. Twarengewe kandi dukoresha uburyo burengeye ubwo dufise. Ubu  imiti iraduherana," nk'uko avuga. Abana bamwe bamwe baba ari ba magoyagi ku buryo bapfira mu nzira. "Abavyeyi bazana abana bageze kure cane. Kandi benshi baba  bacibwamwo uruziruzi kandi barwaye agasama (rougeole/measles)," nk'uko abandanya avuga. Ico kigo ni nk'ikimemenyetso c'ingene ibintu vyifashe mu  Somalia. Urwo ruzuba rumaze gukora ku bantu bangana na miriyoni 4.5. Juba, ari narwo ruzi runini muri Somalia, ubu rusa n'uko ata mazi akirutembamwo. Ku bwa ONU,  abantu 700.000 barataye izabo baja kurondera ico barya n'amazi,  vyabo n'ivy'ibitungwa vyabo, kandi ico gitigiri kibandanya kwiyongera. Haciye ibiringo bine  ata mvura igwa, ubushuhe ubu bukaba ari umurengera, 90% vy'igihugu harumye. Ku mabarabara mu gihugu hagati, uhasanga ibikankara vy'ibikoko - impene, indogobwa n'ingamiya zapfuye. Ibi ni akaga ku banya-Somalia benshi bari batunzwe no kworora hamwe no kugurisha ivyo bitungwa. Ibiciro vy'ivyo kurya n'amazi vyaraduze cane. Ibigwati ubu biragaragara kuko abantu baguma bagana imicungararo y'ibisagara  baja kurondera ahosumba ahandi. Abasigaye mu bigwati n'abageze mu za bukuru, barindiriye ko imvura igwa, canke ko abakiri bato bagaruka bazanye amazi. Urwo ruzuba ntirugeramiye Somalia gusa, ruri n'ahandi mu karere k'ihembe rya Afrika mbere no mu bindi bice vya Afrika. CICR/ICRC (Internationl Committee of the Read Cross) ivuga ko nibura ica kane c'abanya-Afrika bose bahanzwe n'ikibazo c'ivyo kurya. Hari kandi ikibazo gikomeye c'igitigiri kiguma ciyongera c'abantu bata izabo. Ico kibazo c'inzara kandi gisa n'icibagizwa n'intambara y'Uburusiya na Ukraine, mu gihe utwigoro twose, imfashanyo n'uburyo ubu vyose ari yo bitumberezwa. Amakambi y'abata izabo akwiragiye mu gihugu cose. Kandi n'ayandi aguma avuka. Bamwe ntibari bwanakire imvune z'uruzuba rwo mu 2017, rwari rwatangajwe nk'akaga mu gihugu imbere y'uko uru rw'ubu narwo rwaduka. Mw'ikambi ya Galkayo, ibirometero amajana mu buraruko bwa Luuq, Hawa Fargod, umugore afise inda y'amezi indwi, yicaranye n'abana biwe babiri bakiri bato.  Akaruri kiwe, co kimwe n'abandi amajana ngaha, kubatswe mu duti kagasakazwa ibitabu vy'imifuko n'impuzu. Iziko ryiwe ntiriheruka kwakamwo umuriro. Umubanyi wa  Hawa Fargod, Hawa Sharif, aravuga ingene  yamaze iminsi itatu aja muri iyo kambi ari mu gitwazi gikwegwa n'indokobwa, we n'abana biwe batanu. Iyo ndogobwa ibashikanye mw'ikambi buno nyene yaciye ipfa. "Iyo ndogobwa yonyene niyo  yari igisigaye. Ibindi vyose vyarapfuye". Urwo ruzuba rwatumye imiryango itatana - abagabo bagiye mu bisagara kurondera ubuzima, abagore n'abana nabo baja aho hose bashobora kuronka imfashanyo. Amashirahamwe afasha avuga ko hari ikibazo gikomeye c'uburyo. Afise 3% y'ibikenewe kugira afashe mu gihugu. Agerageza gukwiragiza amakamyo y'amazi, indya hamwe n'imiti. Ariko ivyo ntibishikira bose - kandi mu minsi iza, ivyo ntibizoshoboka kiretse habonetse  ubundi buryo. Mu gihe vyitezwe ko imvura yo muri uku kwezi kwa kane izoba iyibayabaye canke iri munsi y'iyibayabaye, hari ubwoba ko imbere ari habi gusumba. Kwumva ko ibintu bigiye kuba nabi cane kuruta, ivyo kuri Hawa Fargod nta gishasha kirimwo. Mu gihe we nyene asanzwe arwaye amafyigo, akagira n'umwana arwaye, nta cizere afise kuri kazoza. Nk'uwihebuye avuga ati : "Mfitiye ubwoba abana banje." .

headline: Amerika ikeza Abarundi ku ntambwe yo guhanahana ubutegetsi mu mahoro
text: Igihugu ca Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kimenyesha ko citeguye gukorana n'umukuru w'igihugu mushasha w'u Burundi, hamwe na leta yiwe mu gutsimbataza intwaro ibereye n'inzego zishingiye ku ntwaro rusangi. Itangazo ryaraye risohowe n'ubunyamabanga bwa leta bujejwe imigenderanire rivuga ko Amerika yemeye ingingo ya sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro yo kwemeza Evariste Ndayishimiye nk'umukuru w'igihugu mushasha. Iyo sentare yaremeje ko Evariste Ndayishimiye ariwe mukuru w'igihugu yatowe, ihakana ibirego vyashikirijwe na Agathon Rwasa w'umugambwe CNL avuga ko amatora yibwe, kandi ko sentare yirengagije ivyemezo batanze. Mw'iryo tangazo, Amerika ihimiriza leta nshasha ko yohuriramwo abo bose bafise uruhara muri politike y'u Burundi kandi igatorera inyishu ibibazo vyose vyibonekeje mu matora. Rivuga riti: "Nk'abashigikiye demokarasi, dusaba leta gutorera inyishu amakuru avugwa y'ubusuma  bw'amatora, ikore amatohoza kandi ikurikirane abafise uruhara ku birego vy'iterabwoba ryakorewe abatora imbere, mu gihe n'inyuma y'amatora". "Dusaba kandi irekurwa  ry'abaserukira imigambwe hamwe n'abandi barorerezi bahagaritswe canke  bagapfungwa ku karenganyo kubera uruhara bari bafise mu gucungera amatora". Amerika ivuga ko ibibazo bihari vyotorerwa inyishu hisunwe amategeko ahari, vyotuma leta nshasha yizigirwa n'abanyagihugu kuvyo yabemereye vyo gukomeza intwaro ibereye, maze abanyagihugu bakaronka uburenganzira bungana mu biraba amatora. Irakeza Abarundi ku ntambwe bashitseko, cane cane ishaka rya Perezida Petero Nkurunziza,  ryo guhererekanya ubutegetsi mu mahoro. Mw'iryo tangazo, Amerika ivuga iti: "Ni vyaramuka bibaye, bizoba ari imbonekarimwe ku Barundi, kuko buzoba bubaye ubwa mbere mu mateka y'u Burundi aho leta yagiyeho mu mahoro izoba ishikirije ubutegetsi mu mahoro umukuru w'igihugu mushasha yatowe". Ku wa kane igenekerezo rya 04 z'uku kwa gatandatu, Evariste Ndayishimiye n'umugambwe CNDD-FDD wiwe yaremejwe na sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro ko ari we yatsinze amatora yo ku wa 20/05/2020. Iyo sentare kandi yarahakanye ibirego vyari vyashikirijwe n'umugambwe CNL utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi urongowe n'umushingamateka Agathon Rwasa, ikavuga ko bidafise ishingiro. Ku ruhande rwiwe, Bwana Rwasa avuga ko atashimishijwe n'ivyo iyo sentare yashikirije, akavuga ati "ibirego twatanze bisa n'aho batigeze banabiraba …twerekana ubusuma bwabaye mu matora". Avuga ko iyo bagafata umwanya bari kwerekana  "mu birego bishika indwi, kimwe kimwe cose ukuntu ata shingiro coba gifise". Fyonga ng'aha wumvirize ingene Agathon Rwasa avuga: Hagati aho, Inama Nkuru y'abepiskopi b'i Burundi - nayo nyene yari yamenyesheje ko amatora yo ku wa 20/25/2020 yabayemwo utunenge twari gutuma ivyatangajwe ko vyayavuyemwo bitizigirwa - yakeje Evariste Ndayishimiye  kubona yizigiwe nk'umukuru w'igihugu mushasha. Mw'itangazo iyo nama yaraye isohoye, isaba Evariste Ndayishimiye "kuba umukuru w'igihugu wa bose".

headline: US: Bane bapfuye mu migumuko y'abashigikiye Trump ku ngoro ya Capitol
text: Abantu bane bapfuye mu myiyerekano y'abashigikiye Perezida Donald Trump batera ingoro y'inama nshingamateka, Capitol. Umugore umwe yarashwe n'abapolisi, abandi bantu batatu bapfuye kubera kutaronswa "ubutabazi bwihutirwa". Uyo mugore yarashwe ibinyamakuru muri Amerika bivuga ko yahoze ari mu ngabo za US Air Force, akaba yari mu bantu bari imbere binjira ku nguvu mu cumba abashingamateka bateraniramwo. Abandi bapfuye bivugwa ko ari abagabo babiri n'umugore umwe. Igipolisi kivuga ko capfunze abantu 52  - muri bo 47 bazize kurenga ku mategeko y'umukwabu. Vyabaye ngombwa ko inama rusangi y'abashingamateka n'abakenguzamateka ibanza guhagarara inyuma y'aho abashigikiye Perezida Trump batereye ingoro y'inama nshingamateka. Igiporisi gikorera kuri Capitol cabujije uruja n'uruza ico gihe maze gisaba abari mu ngoro bose "kwinyegeza". Imbere y'uko ibi biba, Perezida Donald Trump yari yashikirije ijambo hanze y'ibiro vyiwe maze abatera intege ngo babandanye imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza ivyavuye mu matora.

headline: Coronavirus: Bane bakize mu Rwanda
text: Abantu bane bari baranduye wa mugera wa coronavirus mu Rwanda nibo barekuwe inyuma y'aho babonetse ko bakize.Abo bantu bagizwe n'abanyarwanda batatu hamwe n'umurundi umwe. Uyo munyagihugu akomoka mu Burundi yari yageze mu Rwanda ku wa 18/03 avuye i Dubai atera aja i Bujumbura, akaba yerekanye ibimenyetso ku kibuga c'indege ca Kigali.U Rwanda ruherutse gutangaza ko abantu 102 aribo bamaze kumenyekana ko bandiye uwo mugera. Bica bituma igitigiri c'abakirwaye kigabanuka gushika ku 98.

headline: Amafoto yaranze Afrika : kuva itariki 23-29 z'ukwa kane 2021
text: Amafoto meza yaranze indwi yatororokanijwe ku mugabane wa Afrika n'ahandi.: Aya mafoto yose tuyafitiye uburenganzira bwo kuyakoresha

headline: Sierra Leone: Abajejwe umupira w'amaguru baratohoza ku gutsindwa 95-0 na 91-1
text: Ishirahamwe rijejwe umupira w'amaguru muri Sierra Leone (SLFA) ririko riratohoza ukuntu vyagenze ngo inkino zibiri zivemwo ibitsindo 187. Muri izo nkino zibiri zo mu ciciro ca kabiri, Kahunla Rangers, ikipe y’i Kenema, na Gulf FC y’i Kono, zatsinze bimwe vy’ikirenga bakeba bazo mu nkino zo guhiganirwa kuja mu ciciro ca mbere kuwa Mungu. Kahunla yirengeje Lumbebu United mu kuyitsinda 95-0, nayo Gulf FC inyagira Koquima Lebanon 91-1, ziba inkino zibiri zinjijwemwo vyinshi mu mateka ya Sierra Leone. Ariko ibitsindo nyuma y’igice ca mbere vyari 2-0 na 7-1 nk’uko zikurikirana, ivyavuye muri izo nkino zose bikaba vyagizwe ubusa mu gihe bikekwa ko hoba harabayemwo amanyanga. Thomas Daddy Brima, umukuru w’ishirahamwe SLFA yabwiye BBC ati: "Ntidushobora kurera amaboko ngo tureke ibintu vy’ibiterasoni nk’ibi ngo vyijane atawuhanywe. “Tugiye gutanguza itohoza ubu bwa vuba hanyuma abo bose bagize uruhara muri aka kamaramaza babihanirwe. “Abo bose bazohamwa n’icaha bazobihanirwa hakurikijwe amategeko ya SLFA, kandi bazoshikirizwa inzego z’igihugu zijejwe kurwanya igiturire.” Umuyobozi nshingwanikorwa wa Kahunla Rangers "yiyamirije yivuye inyuma iyo nyifato itabereye mu nkino” nayo umuyobozi mukuru wa Lumbebu avuga yuko "atari azi ikintu na kimwe kijanye n’ubusuma muri izo nkino”. Hagati aho umukuru wa Koquima Lebanon yaseye n’uwuvuga yuko urukino ikipe yiwe yakinye rwari urwa kivukanyi nayo abayobozi ba Gulf FC bakaba banse kugira ico bashikiriza. SLFA yavuze ko izokora itohoza ku bakinyi n’abayobozi b’ayo makipe ane yose, abahagarikizi b’izo nkino hamwe n’ishirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru mu karere k’ubuseruko bwa Sierra Leone. Amakipe yombi, Kahunla na Gulf FC, yari afise amanoka angana imbere y’inkino zanyuma kandi yarwanira ikibanza gisigaye c’akarere k’ubuseruko mw’ihiganwa rya Super 10 League, ikaba ari yo ifatwa nk’intambwe yanyuma mu kwinjira mu ciciro cambere Premier League. Izo nkino zibiri zabereye rimwe kandi umuhagarikizi w’urukino rwa Gulf yaranse guhagarikira igice ca kabiri, aca arasubirizwa. Ibintu vyacitse urudubi mu gice cakabiri igihe vyagaragara ko ikipe irusha iyindi ibitsindo ariyo izobandanya – mu gihe Kahunla yinjije 93 na Gulf ikinjiza 84. Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa Kahunla, Eric Kaitell, ku mbuga hwaniro yiyamirije ikipe yiwe hamwe n’izindi zitatu zabigizemwo uruhara. Kaitell yagize ati: "Nashaka ntangure nsaba ikigongwe ku bakunzi b’umupira w’amaguru muri kino gihugu hamwe no kw’isi yose kubera ivyavuye mu rukino rw’ikipe yanje Kahunla Rangers. "Ndashaka kuvuga nshimitse yuko niyamirije cane iyi nyifato itabereye na gato mu nkino yerekanywe n’ikipe yanje, hamwe n’izindi kipe zabigizemwo uruhara".

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Grealish, Mbappe, Sterling, Ramos, Haaland, Gilmour
text: Chelsea iriteguye guhangana na Manchester City mu rugamba rwo kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Aston Villa umwongereza Jack Grealish w'imyaka 25. (Football Insider) Umusatirizi w'umufaransa Kylian Mbappe yasavye ko yova mu murwi wiwe Paris St-Germain. Amasezerano uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 22 afitaniye n'uyu murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubufaransa Ligue 1 azorangira mu ci ry'umwaka uza.  (RMC Sport, via Marca) Umukinyi w'imbere ku ruhande wa Manchester City  Raheem Sterling w'imyaka 26 ashobora kuba atipfuza kwimukira muri Tottenham mu masezerano ashobora gutuma aguzanya na mugenziwe bakinana mu murwi nserukiragihugu c'Ubwongereza Harry Kane w'imyaka 27. (ESPN) Chelsea iriko iragerageza kugura umukinyi w'imbere wa Villarreal, umunya Espagne Gerard Moreno w'imyaka 29 mu gihe vyokwanka ko igura umusatirizi wa Norvège Erling Haaland w'imyaka 20 asanzwe akinira Borussia Dortmund. (Fichajes, via Mirror) Real Madrid ibandanya kugira amakenga menshi ku mukinyi wayo w'inyuma umufaransa Raphael Varane w'imyaka 28 yamaze kwemera ko ashobora kwimukira muri Manchester United. Uyu murwi uriko urategura ingene womuguza n'umufaransa Paul Pogba na we nyene w'imyaka 28, akina hagati. (Metro) Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Espagne Sergio Ramos w'imyaka 35 yiteguye gutera akagere imirwi ya Manchester United na Manchester City akaja gukinira Paris St-Germain mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye na Real Madrid azoba arangiye mu mpera z'uku kwezi. (AS) West Ham United iravugwa ko yipfuza kugura umunyegori wa Fiorentina umunya Pologne Bartlomiej Dragowski w'imyaka 23 muri rino ci, ni mu gihe Tottenham na yo nyene iriko iramukurikiranira hagufi.(Viola News - in Italian) Arsenal ishobora kugurisha umukinyi w'inyuma wayo, umufaransa William Saliba w'imyaka 20 mu gihe iri hafi yo kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Brighton umwongereza Ben White w'imyaka 23. (Football London) Umumenyereza wa Leeds Marcelo Bielsa aripfuza cane umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu wa Huesca, umunya Espagne Javi Galan w'imyaka 26 ariko akaba ariko amurwanira n'imirwi ya Atletico Madrid na Sevilla. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Imirwi ya Wolves nad West Ham iripfuza umukinyi w'inyuma wa Burnley umwongereza James Tarkowski w'imyaka 28 mu gihe agira yinjire mu mwaka wa nyuma w'amasezerano yiwe afitaniye n'uyu murwi wiwe.  (Telegraph - subscription required) Ariko West Ham ifise kuba yahisemwo kuvanamwo akarenge mu kurondera Tarkowski asanzwe kandi arabwa ryiza na Leicester City. (Mail) Brighton ivuga ko itarigera ironka umuntu arondera umumenyereza wayo Graham Potter, n'aho ari ku rutonde rw'umukuru w'umurwi wa Tottenham Daniel Levy nk'umwe mu bashobora gusubirira Jose Mourinho. (Argus) Burnley yemeye igiciro c'imiriyoni zabaya 17 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo ishobore kuronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Stoke City Nathan Collins w'imyaka 20 akomoka muri République d'Irlande. (Athletic) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Liverpool Nathaniel Phillips arateye amero imirwi ya Brighton, Burnley, Newcastle United na Southampton. (Goal) Barcelona iriko iraraba ingene yorungika umukinyi wo hagati w'umunya Brésil Philippe Coutinho muri rino ci mu gihe imirwi nka Everton na Arsenal ivugwa ko iriko irakurikiranira hagufi uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 29 ariko arakira imvune.(Sport - in Spanish) Newcastle irashaka ko umukinyi wo hagati, umwongereza Jacob Murphy w'imyaka 26 yotera igikumu ku yandi masezerano y'igihe kirekire mu gihe asigaje umwaka umwe gusa mu masezerano afitaniye nayo kandi ikimukeneye. (Sky Sports) Norwich irashaka kugiriranira amasezerano n'umurwi wa Chelsea kugira ngo uyitize umukinyi wo hagati, umunya Ecosse Billy Gilmour  w'imyaka 20 mu kiringo c'umwaka umwe.  (Mail)

headline: European Super League: FIFA iragabisha abatanguje iri higanwa
text: Umukuru w'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ry'umupira w'amaguru, FIFA, asaba abateguye ihiganwa European Super League kwiyumvira neza imbere y'ugufata ingingo. Gianni Infantino agabisha ko abari inyuma yavyo bashobora kwisanga bari hanze yaryo. Mu gihe abatari bake cane cane abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru biyamiriza iyo ngingo bakavuga ko ifashwe ku ntumbero zo kurondera amaronko, Florentino Perez, umukuwu w'umurwi Real Madrid, we avuga ko iri higanwa rizorokora umupira w'amaguru. Ku mugoroba w'uyu musi, vyitezwe ko umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson agiriranira inama n'abarongoye umupira w'amaguru hamwe n'abaserukira abafana kuri iki kibazo.
