Mw'ijambo yashikirije mu nama nkuru y'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya, Gianni Infantino yavuze ko abatanguje iri higanwa, bazotegerezwa kwemera ingaruka z'iyi nzira bazoba bahisemwo. Yashimangiye cane ko FIFA idashigikiye iyo ngendo. Florentino Perez, umukuru w'umurwi Real Madrid, umwe mu mirwi 12 ya Buraya yatanguje iri higanwa, avuga ko ryashinzwe kugira ngo "rirokore umupira w'amaguru". Avuga ko iyi  ngingo yafashwe kubera urwaruka "rutari rugikunda umupira w'amaguru" kubera "ubuhinga buke burangwa mu nkino zitandukanye". Ati: "Igihe cose habaye impinduka, hama hari abantu bazirwanya". Imirwi itandatu ikomeye yo mu Bwongereza, Arsenal, Chelsea, Liverpool, Manchester City, Manchester United na Tottenham yaremeye kwinjira muri iryo higanwa. Iyi ngingo iranegurwa cane n'abarongoye umupira w'amaguru hamwe n'abashikiranganji bamwe mu Bwongereza, ikaba kandi yiyamirizwa cane n'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru i Buraya, UEFA, hamwe n'amashirahamwe y'umupira w'amaguru. Kuri uyu wa kabiri umushikiranganji wa mbere Boris Johnson yagiranye inama n'abarongoye amashirahamwe y'umupira w'amaguru muri ico gihugu kugira ngo bavugane kuri iki kibazo, mu gihe imirwi 14 ya Premier League itari muri uwo mugambi vyitezwe ko nayo nyene ikorana. Perez avuga ko imirwi mikuru mikuru iriko iratakaza amahera, ko rero inkino z'imirwi ikomeye zizoshobora kunagura ubutunzi bwayo. Perez yabwiye televiziyo yo muri Espagne El Chiringuito de Jugones ati: "Turiko dukora ibi kugira ngo turokore umupira w'amaguru muri  iki gihe gikomeye." "Tubandanije n'iri higanwa ry'imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League), ibintu bizogenda biyangara, hayuma bipfe burundu". "Iyi nteguro nshasha izotangura mu 2024 ntitomoye. Mu 2024, twese kazoba kabaye". Integuro yo gusubiramwo Champions League ku buryo izohora ihuriramwo imirwi 36 ikaba izotangura mu 2024, yaremejwe na UEFA ejo ku wa mbere. Yongerako ati: "Mu myaka ya 1950, vyari co kimwe. UEFA na FIFA zariyamirije ihiganwa rishasha rya Buraya, ariko ryarahinduye urukino rw'umupira w'amaguru". Perez avuga ko iyi ngingo yatumwe n'ikiza karanda ca coronavirus, catumye inkino zikinwa ata barorerezi bari mu kibuga. Avuga ko ibice 40% batagikunda umupira kandi ko Real ubwayo yatakaje imiriyoni 400 z'ama euros kubera ingaruka za coronavirus. Perez ati: "Iyo udafise ayandi mikoro uretse ayava kuri tereviziyo, ni ngombwa ko urondera inyishu kugira ngo haboneke izindi nkino zihuza imirwi yose ikomeye kugira abafana kw'isi yose bashobore kurorera". "Abakiri bato ntibagikunda umupira w'amaguru. Baca bigira ku zindi mbuga zibamara irungu". "Dushobora kugarura amwe mu mafaranga twatakaje kubera iki kiza. Ni ngombwa ko turondera amahera mu gutegura ayandi mahiganwa". Abatanguje iri higanwa bavuga ko imirwi yose yatakaje amafaranga kubera ikiza ca coronavirus. Ingene ubutunzi bwamanutse mu 2020 ugereranije na 2019: Ariko abanegura iyi ngingo bavuga ko ata kindi igamije atari ukurondera amahera gusa, ko izokwica amahiganwa y'ibihugu kandi ko idahesha iteka uru rukino. Uwahoze ari kizigenda w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza, Alan Shearer avuga ko yizeye neza ko imirwi y'Ubwongereza izofata nkama  ivyo abafana bazovuga, aba nabo bakaba bavyiyamiriza bikomeye. Shearer yabwiye ikiganiro Breakfast ca BBC ati:  "Imirwi yama ivuga ko ari umuryango kandi ko abafana ari wo mutima w'umurwi". "Rero, reka turabe ico biyumvira ku bafana, kubera ubu abafana bamaze kuvuga aho bahagaze". "Biraboneka neza ko iki kintu batagishaka, rero reka turabe ikibanza abafana bahabwa n'imirwi y'umupira w'amaguru". Perez avuga ko iyi mirwi yagiye hamwe yipfuza ko iri higanwa rishasha ritangura mu kw'umunani mu gihe bokwumvikana na UEFA, vyanse rikarindirizwa umwaka umwe. Umukuru wa UEFA, Aleksander Ceferin, avuga ko iri higanwa ari umugambi "uteye isoni, wo kwigungirako" kandi ko ari "ugucira amate mu maso abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru". Ceferin avuga kandi ko abakinyi bazoba bari muri iri higanwa bashobora guhagarikwa mu yandi mahiganwa ya UEFA, ivyo Perez abeshuza. Ati: "Ibi ntibizobaho, amategeko aradukingira". "Nta mpari zo mu mategeko tuzojamwo. Ntibishoboka. Abakinyi botekana kuko ibi ntibizoba". "Si ihiganwa ry'abatunzi, ni ihiganwa ryo kurokora umupira w'amaguru". Iri higanwa ritegekanywa guhuza imirwi 20 yose hamwe kandi ribangabanganwe n'ayandi mahiganwa y'ibihugu nk'akarorero Premier League.

headline: Burundi: Bunyoni na Bazombanza, aba mbere bemejwe muri leta ya Ndayishimiye
text: Inama nshingamateka y'u Burundi ihejeje kwemezwa Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni mu kibanza c'umushikiranganji wa mbere hamwe na Prosper Bazombanza mu kibanza c'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu. Abo bategetsi bompi bemejwe mu matora yabaye mu mwiherero mu nama idasanzwe y'inama nshingamateka, yo kuri uyu wa kabiri inyuma y'amakete Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yaraye yandikiye inama nshingamateka ayisaba kwemeza abo bategetsi kuri ivyo bibanza. Abashingamateka bakomoka mu rurani Amizero y'Abarundi ubu bahurikiye mu mugambwe CNL ntibitabiriye ico gikorwa, bakavuga ko canyegejwe kandi ko bakimenyeshejwe ku munota wa nyuma mu gihe ngo ari igikorwa gihambaye cane. Eka na Agathon Rwasa, icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'Inama nshingamateka akaba ari nawe arongoye umugambwe CNL, ntiyitabiriye ico gikorwa. Prosper Bazombanza yemejwe ku bashingamateka  91 kuri 94 bari bitavye ivyo bikorwa, babiri bakaba batamwemeje nayo umwe akaba ataco yabivuzeko. Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni nawe akaba yemejwe nk'umushikiranganji wa mbere n'abashingamateka 92 kuri 94. Inyuma y'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu n'umushikiranganji wa mbere hategekanyijwe kuzoca hatangazwa abazaba bagize guverinoma bose. Ico kibanza c'umushikiranganji wa mbere caheruka mu Burundi mu 1998, Pascal Ndimira Firmin akaba ari we mushikiranganji wa mbere yaheruka, ku butegetsi bugira kabiri bwa Petero Buyoya yari yashikiriye ahejeje gutembagaza ubwa Sylvetsre Ntibantunganya ku wa 25/07/1996. Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni w'imyaka 48, yari asanzwe ari umushikiranganji w'umutekano kuva mu 2015. Yavukiye muri komine Kanyosha y'igisagara ca Bujumbura. Yize ishure kaminuza y'u Burundi mu 1994 ariko akaba atayibandanije kuko yaciye yinjira mu barwanyi ba FDD mu 1994 mu ntambara yadutse mu Burundi inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye gushika umuhari CNDD-FDD ushitse ku masezerano yo guhagarika intambara mu 2003. Bwana Bunyoni yarajejwe amabanga atandukanye CNDD-FDD imaze kwinjira muri leta, mu nyuma igatsinda amatora yo mu 2005. 2004-2005, yahawe amabanga y'umugenzuzi w'ibiro bikuru vy'igipolisi gishasha cari gihejejwe gushingwa gisubiriye urwego rw'ikijandarume. Kuva mu 2005 gushika 2007 yagenywe kuba umukuru w'igipolisi c'u Burundi. Kuva 2011 gushika 2014, Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni yagenywe kuba umukuru w'ibiro bijejwe ibibazo vya gisivire (cabinet civil) mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu. Hampande y'ivyo bikorwa, Bwana Bunyoni yajejwe amabanga atandukanye mu vy'umutekano ku rwego mpuzamakungu, mu 2007 yari mu ntumwa za leta mw'ishirahamwe ONU zari zijejwe gutsimbataza amahoro n'umutekano. Muri ico gihe nyene yari arongoye komite y'abakuru b'inzego z'igipolisi muri Afrika y'Ubuseruko (OCCPAE) muri rwa rwego rw'igipolisi mpuzamakungu ( Interpol). Yabaye umushikiranganji w'umutekano incuro zibiri, ubwa mbere kuva mu 2007 gushika 2011, hanyuma kuva mu 2015 gushika ubu. Bwana Bunyoni, umwe mu bategetsi bakomeye muri CNDD-FDD, yagirizwa uruhara mu bikorwa vyo guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu mu ndyane za politike zadutse mu 2015. Ari mu bafatiwe ibihano na Amerika bijanye n'ivyo ubutegetsi bwa Pierre Nkurunziza bwagirizwa vyo guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu. Mu 2017 leta y'u Burundi yarikuye muri sentare mpuzamakungu mpanavyaha inyuma y'uko iyi sentare itanguje amatohoza ku vyaha vyakorewe kiremwa muntu mu Burundi kuva mu 2015. Ni umunywanyi w'umugambwe UPRONA, akaba avuka muri komine Rusaka y'intara ya Mwaro. Yahejeje amashure yiwe ya kaminuza mu gisata kijejwe ubufundi bw'ivyuma bikoresha umuyagankuba (Génie Electromécanique) kw'ishure kaminuza y'u Burundi. Mu mabanga yakoze, Bwana Bazombanza w'imyaka 60 yarabaye umwigisha w'ibiharuro, arakora mw'itonorero ry'ikawa SOGESTAL Kirimiro kuva mu 1990 gushika 1992. Yarabaye buramatari w'intara ya Mwaro kuva 2002 gushika 2005, aho yaca agenwa mu gisata kijejwe ubugenduzi bw'amashure y'imyuga mu ntara ya Mwaro kuva 2005 gushika 2010. Kuva 2010 gushika 2014, yakora mu murwi ujejwe ibibazo vy'amatongo gusubiza mu vyabo ababiteshejwe n'intambara (CNTB), imbere y'uko agenwa kuba icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'igihugu kuva mu kwa kabiri 2014 gushika 2015 asubiriye Bernard Busokoza yari aherutse kubogozwa n'umukuru w'igihugu w'ico gihe, Petero Nkurunziza. Yahora ari umunyamabanga mukuru w'ikigo kijejwe kugenzura ihuriro ry'amashirahamwe yo gutegekaniriza kazoza (ARCA) amabanga yashinzwe kuva mu kwa cumi na kabiri 2017. Imbere y'aho, yari  arongoye ishirahamwe rijejwe gutekaniriza kazoza abakozi, INSS, amabanga yahawe kuva 2016 gushika 2017. Aje ubwa kabiri muri ico kibanza, ariko mu gihe vyari bimenyerewe ko umukuru w'igihugu agira ivyegera bibiri mw'ibwirizwa rya 2005, ryasubiriwe n'irya 2018, ni we wenyene ari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu.

headline: Lionel Messi: Barça yipfuza kunagura umurwi ishingiye ku mukinyi wa mbere kw'isi
text: Barcelona iracipfuza ko yosubira kwiyubaka ishingiye kuri kizigenza wayo Lionel Messi, ubu abarongoye uyu murwi bakaba bariko baragerageza kumwumvisha ko yowugumamwo, nk'uko bivugwa na Ramon Planes ajejwe kwinonora imitsi muri Barça. Uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 33 akomoka muri Argentine yaratangarije uyu murwi ko yipfuza kuwusezerera. Uyu mukinyi amaze gutsindira umupira w'inzahabu incuro indwi zose niwe mukinyi wa mbere amaze gutsindira Barcelona ibitsindo vyinshi, bingana na 634. Planes ati: "Ivyabaye vyarabaye kandi intumbero yacu ni ukunagurira umurwi wacu ku mushinge w'umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi". "Dushaka kwubaka uwundi murwi utsinda urongowe n'umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi, uwa mbere mu mateka y'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi". "Barça na Leo ni nk'umugabo n'umugore, aho uruhande rumwe rwitangiye cane urundi, kandi bompi banezereje abakunzi. Nibaza ko kazoza ari keza. Ndafise viyizigiro". Messi - umukinyi amaze imyaka yose akina muri Barça - yipfuza kuja ahandi inyuma y'uko umwaka wose w'inkino urangiye ata gikombe na kimwe baronse, akamaramaza kakaba kabaye mu rukino rw'igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma ca Champions League rwagiye kurangira Bayern Munich yirahiye Barça ibitsindo 8-2. Amasezerano ya Messi na Barcelona azorangira mu 202, ariko umurwi umukeneye ukaba utegerezwa kumugura ku miliyoni 700. Planes ati: "Turakeneye abakinyi b'inararibonye nka Leo Messi, ariko kandi n'abakinyi b'integabizoza ku murwi. Turiko turita ku rutare kugira ngo imigenderanire hagati ya Messi na Barça ibandanye. Turiko turakora kugira ngo twumvishe Leo". "Barça yagiye yiyubaka incuro nyinshi muri kahise kandi yamye yivyukiranya ikaza ikomeye cane, rero muri kino gihe nivyo turimwo". Bamwe babona ko kugira ngo Messi ashobore kugondozwa ari uko umukuru wayo Josep Maria Bartomeu atanga imihoho, maze hakaba ayandi matora. Hagati aho, iki conyene gishobora kudatuma uyu murwi ugumana uyu mukinyi amaze gutsindira ihiganwa rya Espanye incuro cumi zose hamwe n'ihiganwa rya Bulaya (Champions League) incuro zine.

headline: Kerala: Menya uyu muhindikazi atereka ubwanwa
text: Ku mbuga hwaniro, uyu mugore wo mu Buhindi atereka ubwana bwiwe arashimirwa ariko kandi akanegurwa n’abantu. Ariko wewe avuga ko adahungabanywa n’ibivugwa vyose ku bwanwa bwiwe. "Ndakunda ubwanwa bwanje," Shyja w’imyaka 35 niko yanditse kuri WhatsApp, musi y’ifoto yiwe. Yama abazwa – n’abantu babona amafoto yiwe ku rubuga rwa Facebook canke bahura nawe amaso mu yandi – igituma atereka ubwanwa. Avuga ati: “Ikintu conyene novuga ni uko gusa ndabukunda. Cane”. Shyja, izina ryonyene akoresha, aba mu karere ka Kannur  mu ntara yo Kerala iri mu bumanuko bw’Ubuhindi. Nk’uko bimeze ku bagore batari bake, yaramaze imyaka itari mike atsiba ubwana bwiwe bwo hejuru. Mu gihe yama amwa ingohe ziwe, Shyja avuga ko atigeze yumva ko akeneye kumwa ubwanwa bwiwe bwo hejuru. Mu myaka itanu iheze, bwatanguye kuba bwinshi buboneka neza kandi Shyja arabureka abinezererewe cane. Ati: "Ubu si mbona ko noshobora kubaho ntabufise. Igihe ikiza ca Covid gitangura, naranka kwambara agapfukamunwa igihe cose kubera kanzibira isura”. Abantu benshi bamubona bamusaba ko yokwikurako ubu bwanwa bwo hejuru ariko Shyja ntavyumva. "Sinigeze numva ko ndi mubi kubera ndabufise canke ko ari ikintu ntategerezwa kuba mfise”. Abagore bama babwirwa ko imishatsi yo kw’isura atari myiza kuri bo, ko rero botanga amafaranga kugira ngo bayibakure – canke bakayigabanya – igihe cose. Amahinguriro akora imiti yo kubuza imishatsi kumera aregeranya amamiriyaridi n’amamiriyaridi y’amadorari mu gukora amavuta, inzembe n’ibindi bishobora kurandurana n’imizi imishatsi, bigurwa n’abagore bashoboye kubigura. Ariko muri ino myaka ya vuba, abagore benshi bahisemwo kwemera mbere no kwishimira ubu bwanwa. Mu 2016, Harnaam Kaur aharanira ukwiyemera kw’umuntu uko aba ameze kwose (Body positive body positivity) yabaye umugore wa mbere akiri muto kw’isi yose yameze ubwanwa ku munwa wose no kw’itama nk’umugabo, nk’uko bivugwa n’ikigo Guinness World Records. Mu biganiro yagiye atanga, yamye avuga ukungene ukwemera ubwanwa bwiwe kwabaye igihe gikomeye co kwiyemera imbere y’abamuzomera. Ku bwa Shyja, gutereka ubwanwa si ikintu umuntu afatira, ni kimwe mu bigize ubuzima bwiwe. Ati: "Jewe nkora ico nshatse. Iyaba nari mfise ubuzima bubiri, kumbure bumwe nari kububamwo uko abandi bashaka”. Kimwe mu vyatumye afata iyi ngendo ni ibibazo vy’amagara yahanganye navyo mu myaka itari mike. Shyja baramubaze  incuro zitandatu mu myaka cumi – rimwe kwari ukugira bamukure ikivyimba mw’ibere, irindi naryo kwari ukumukura utuvyimba mu gasaho k’imbuto. Aho aherukira kubagwa, kwari ukumukuramwo igitereko, haraciye imyaka itanu. Ati: "Igihe cose baheza kumbaga, naguma nizeye ko ntari gusubira muri ico cumba c’ibagiro”. Kubona yashoboye kurengana ibi bibazo vyose vy’amagara vyakomeje ivyiyumviro vya Shyja  ko ari ngombwa ko abaho mu buzima bwiwe bumuha umunezero. Shyja avuga ko akiri umwana yari afise isoni. Ni gake abagore mu kigwati ciwe bashobora kuboneka hanze inyuma y’isaha cumi na zibiri z’umugoroba. N’aho Kerala ari imwe mu ntara z’Ubuhindi zigenda zibaho ubuzima bwa none, kandi zifise ibimenyetso bikomeye vy’iterambere, mu turere twinshi umugabo ni we afise ijambo rya nyuma, kandi abagore bama babuzwa gufata ingendo canke kwibana. Igihe arongorwa akimukira mu ntara ya Tamil Nadu ihana urubibe n’iyo yavukiyemwo, Shyja avuga ko yaryohewe no kubona ubundi bwisanzure bushasha. Avuga ati: "Umugabo wanje yarashobora kuja ku kazi akagaruka atevye. Rero narashobora kwicara hanze ku mugoroba, rimwe na rimwe nkaja no kw’iduka ndi umwe mw’ijoro iyo hari ico nkeneye. Nta n’umwe yavyitaho. Igihe niga gukora ibintu jenyene, vyankomereje ukwiyemera”. Avuga kandi ko ariko aragerageza kuvyigisha umukobwa wiwe w’umuyabaga. Umuryango wa Shyja n’incuti ziwe bamye bamushigikira kuri buno bwanwa bwiwe. Umukobwa wiwe amubwira ko bumubereye. Ariko Shyja avuga ko yabwiwe amajambo y’ubwoko bwose avugwa n’abantu iyo bamubonye kw’ibarabara. Ati: "Abantu barantwenga bavuga ngo ‘abagabo bonyene nibo bamera ubwanwa, kubera iki umugore yobumera’?” Mu myaka itari mike, ni kenshi yagiye avugwa mu binyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu. Mu misi iheze, nk’uko abivuga, yarabonye amajambo y’agahemo yanditswe ku nkuru yamuvuga yari yacishijwe ku rubuga rwa Facebook n’ikinyamakuru co muri ico gihugu. Umuntu umwe yabajije igituma atari gufata urwembwe akamwa ubwanwa bwiwe bimaze kuboneka ko ingohe ziwe yari yazimoye. Ati:"Ariko si ikibazo kijanye n’ivyo nshaka – none ngumye iki hanyuma nikureko iki?” Abagenzi ba Shyja akenshi bishurana agashavu kuri ano majambo yandikwa kuri Facebook, ariko avuga ko ivyo ataco bimubwiye na gato. "Mu bisanzwe, kenshi ndabaraba nkabatwenga”.

headline: South Africa yashinguranye iteka Musenyeri Desmond Tutu
text: Abanya Afrika y'Epfo biriwe mu birori vyo gushingura wa musenyeri Desmond Tutu  yarwanije intwaro y'ivanguramoko ya Afrika y'Epfo, ibirori vyabereye mw'isengero nkuru ya Anglican  i Cape Town. Tutu, yagize uruhara rukomeye mu kurangiza intwaro y'ivanguramoko muri Afrika y'Epfo akanahabwa agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel, yapfuye ku wa Mungu afise imyaka 90. Perezida  Ramaphosa wa Afrika y'Epfo ni we yashikirije ijambo rikuru muri ibi birori vyo gushingura uyu musenyeri kuri uyu wa gatandatu, ibirori vyari vyitabiriwe n'abantu 100 gusa kubera amategeko yo kurwanya ikiza ca coronavirus. Mw'ijambo ryiwe, Perezida Ramaphosa  yavuze ko Tutu  ari "umuvyeyi w'imitima w'igihugu cacu gishasha". Kuva yitavye Imana ku wa Mungu uheze, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi baragiye kumwunamira kw'isengero  St George's Cathedral,  aho ikiziga ciwe cari. Tutu ni umwe mu bantu bakomeye barwanije cane intwaro y'amacakubiri n'ivanguramoko yashizweho n'inkehwa z'abazungu mw'ikubagurwa bakoreye nyarwinshi b'abirabure, kuva mu 1948 gushika mu 1991. Perezida Ramaphosa yavuze ko Tutu yari "umurwanyi mu rugamba rwo kurwanira ubwigenge, ubutungane, amahoro n'uburenganzira kuri bose. Atari muri Afrika y'Epfo honyene...ariko kandi no kw'isi yose". Ati: "Niba dushaka kumenya akarorero k'umuntu w'igihagararo kidasanzwe, w'imico idasanzwe kandi yitaho abantu, nta nkeka ko ari uyu mugabo turiko turashingura uyu musi". Mu bitabiriye ibi birori kw'ishengero rikuru rya Cape Town harimwo abagenzi, umuryango, abarongoye ishengero n'abanyaporitike. Tutu yari yasavye ashimitse ko mu kumushingura hatoba "ugusesagura canke gukoresha uburyo buhanitse", kandi bagakoresha "isandugu izimbutse ishoboka". Yasavye kandi ko amashurwe yonyene yoba ari mw'isengero yoba "urugori rw'amashure rw'umuryango wiwe", nk'uko bivugwa n'ibigo  Archbishop Tutu IP Trust hamwe na Desmond and Leah Tutu Legacy Foundation. Vyitezwe ko ibisigarira vyiwe bihambwa inyuma ya arutari mw'isengero nkuru St George's Cathedral - isengero nkuru yamaze imyaka 35 arongoye. Mu butumwa yatanze mu buryo bwa videwo, Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury yasiguye ingene Tutu "yamurikiye isi yose". Avuga ko icubahiro yahaye Tutu ari nk ' "imbeba yunamira inzovu". Umukobwa wa Tutu Mpho yavuze ko urukundo berekanye kuri se wiwe "rwatsimbataje imitima yabo". Ati: "Kubera twamusangiye n'isi, namwe muradusangije igice c'urukundo mwari mumufitiye". Igihe ikiziga ciwe cashirwa ahagaragara muri Cape Town, abantu benshi baraje kumusezera ubwa nyuma. Umugabo umwe, Wally Mdluli, yagenze ibirometero birengo 1000 kuva Bloemfontein gushika Cape Town agenda arasaba ko bamwunguruza kuri gusa (lift)  - aca mu ncuti n'abagenzi asaba ko bomufasha kugira ashobore gukora urugendo rwiwe, mbere akaryama muri station y'igitoro igihe yari ku rugendo. Yabwiye umunyamakuru wa BBC i Cape Tow ati: "Numva nuzuye umunezero inyuma y'aho mboneye isandugu y'ikiziga. Ni nk'uko umengo umutima wiwe uri muri jewe". Tutu yarakoresheje igihagararo ciwe mu kwiyamiriza agahotoro kakorerwa abirabure mu gihugu ciwe, akama avuga ko yabikora kubw'ukwemera atari ku mvo za poritike.

headline: Neymar – Alvaro Gonzalez: ikibazo c’ivanguramoko muri Ligue 1
text: Neymar , umusatirizi w'umurwi Paris-Saint-Germain wo mu Bufaransa, yahagaritswe mu nkino zibiri, inyuma y'uko ahawe ikarata itukura igihe uyu murwi wahura na Marseille. Ariko abarongoye umupira w'amaguru mu Bufaransa batangaza ko bariko barakora amatohoza ku birego vy'uko Neymar yoba yarabwiye amajambo y'ivanguramoko. Muri uru rukino rwabaye ku wa Mungu, uyu mukinyi mpuzamakungu w'umunya Brezili yahawe iyi karata itukura akubise umukinyi w'inyuma wa Marseille, Alvaro Gonzalez. Mu nyuma Neymar yagirije Gonzalez aciye ku mbuga hwaniro, aho avuga ko uyu mukinyi yamubwiye amajambo y'ivanguramoko, agasaba abategetsi kwihweza neza amasanamu yerekanwa na bwa buhinga bwa videwo (VAR). Gonzalez arahakana ivyo yagirizwa na Neymar. Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bufaransa  (Ligue de Football Professionnel, LFP) ryavuze ejo ku wa gatatu ko ryatanguye gukora amatohoza ku birego vya Neymar. Neymar yarumvirijwe, akaba yaragirije uyu mukinyi w'inyuma wa Marseille ko yamwise "inguge". Sébastien Deneux, ajejwe indero muri iryo shirahamwe avuga ati: "Turazi ko habaye uguterana amajambo, ariko ubu ntituraronka ivyemezo vy'uko twotumako abakinyi". Uyu mutegetsi avuga ko umurwi arongoye bazogerageza "kwihweza neza amajambo yavuzwe, amajambo yumvikanywe", ariko ko bazogira ico bashikirije bisunze "ivyemezo bifadika koko". Sébatien Deneux avuga kandi ko amatohoza y'umurwi wiwe ashobora no kwihweza ibijanye n'ibindi bitutsi bishobora kuba vyaravuzwe na Neymar. Ati: "Mu kuvuga ni ukwinengesera cane. Amatohoza azoshobora kwerekana nimba hari ayandi makosa ashobora gutuma hafatwa ingingo zijanye n'inyifato". Ikinyamakuru Le Parisien kivuga ko umurwi PSG ushobora kuba washizeho umurwi wo kwihweza amasanamu yerekana ivyabaye. Amakuru avuga ko uyu murwi ushobora no kwifashisha abahinga mu bijanye no kwihweza iminwa kugira bige neza amajambo yavuzwe na Alvaro Gonzalez  igihe yaterana amajambo na Neymar, nk'uko ibimenyeshamakuru vyo mu Bufaransa bibitangaza. PSG yizeye ko ifise ubushobozi bwose bwo kwerekana ko ibivugwa na Neymar ari ivy'ukuri, ikifashisha  beIN SPORTS Mena, televiziyo y'inkino yo  mu Burasirazuba bwo hagati ifise icicaro muri Qatar. Hari kamera y'iyi televiziyo yarabishijwe kuri Neymar mu buryo bwihariye, ikaba yarashoboye gufata amasanamu yose y'ingene uyu mukinyi rurangiranwa wa PSG yateranye amajambo na alvaro Gonzalez. Leta ya Brezili, igihugu Neymar akomokamwo, yasohoye itangazo ku wa kabiri, aho ivuga iti: "Kuri rino vanguramoko ku ncuro yindi mu nkino, ubushikiranganji bujejwe abagore, imiryango n'agateka ka zina muntu burifatanije na Neymar Jr". Uyo munsi nyene, umunyamabanga w'ikigo kijejwe kurwanya ivanguramoko muri Brezili yariyamirije yivuye inyuma "ihohotera iryo ari ryo ryose" hamwe kandi  "n'ivanguramoko rishingiye kw'ibara ry'uruhu". Ku ruhande rwawo, umurwi Olympique de Marseille utera intege uyu mukinyi wawo w'inyuma akomoka muri Esupanye, ukavuga ko muri we atavanguramoko rimurimwo. Uyu murwi wandika uti: "Yarabitweretse mu nyifato yiwe ya minsi yose kuva ashitse mu murwi, mbere na bagenzibe baravyemeza". Ishirahamwe LPF ryarafatiye kandi ibihano abandi bakinyi bagize uruhara muri urwo ruhagarara. Layvin Kurzawa umukinyi w'inyuma wa PSG  yahagaritswe inkino zitandatu zose kubera umugere yateye uyu mukinyi wa Marseille, co kimwe na Jordan Amavi na we nyene yahagaritswe mu nkino zitatu. Leandro Paredes, umukinyi wo hagati wa PSG hamwe na mugenziwe wa Marseille bakomoka hamwe muri Argentina, Dario Benedetto, bompi bahagaritswe inkino zitatu.

headline: Mu Burundi leta ivuga ko agateka ka muntu kubahirijwe - abatavuga rumwe nayo babibona ukundi
text: Umushikiranganji w'agateka ka zina muntu mu Burundi yemeza ko agateka ka zina muntu kubahirijwe mu gihugu, mu gihe abandi bavuga ibindi. Ivyo biri mw'itangazo yaraye ashikirije mu ntumbero yo guhimbaza imyaka 71 ishize uyu munsi habaye amasezerano mpuzamakungu y'agateka ka zina muntu. Ayo majambo atandukanye n'ivyo amashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka muntu avuga ko mu Burundi hari ihonyangwa ry'ako gateka rikorerwa cane cane abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi. Umushikiranganji Martin Nivyabandi avuga ati: "U Burundi buhimbaje uwo munsi mu gihe igihugu cose kirangwamwo amahoro n'umutekano, kandi agateka ka zina muntu kubahirijwe kuri bose". Yibutsa ko ari akaryo ko kuzirikana neza ivyo ibihugu biba vyariyemeje mu gutsimbataza no mu gukingira agateka ka zina muntu. Umugambwe CNL utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi urakunze kwerekana ko abanywanyi bawo bakorerwa ibikorwa vy'ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu. Terence Manirambona avugira uyo mugambwe yabwiye BBC ko mu gihugu hacibonekeza ibikorwa vyinshi bihungabanya uburenganzira bwa muntu. Avuga ko gushika ubu hari abantu - cane cane abanywanyi babo - bahohoterwa, baterwa ubwoba, abanyuruzwa, abategekwa kwinjira mu mugambwe batipfuza. Atanga akarorero k'umunywanyi wa CNL yitwa Berchmans Misago batazira "Cuma" yaburiwe irengero kuva ku wa 20 z'ukwezi guheze. Mu kwezi kw'icenda, ishami ry'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU rijejwe kwubahiriza agateka ka muntu ryasohoye icegeranyo kivuga ko mu Burundi abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi babandanya bakorerwa amabi atandukanye. Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko mu gihugu harangwa ubwoba n'iterabwoba ku batavuga rumwe n'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi CNDD-FDD. Rénovat Tabu aserukira u Burundi i Geneve yariyamirije ico cegeranyo avuga ko "gishingiye ku binyoma kandi ko bifise intumbero ya politike". Mu Burundi uwo munsi mpuzamakungu uzohimbazwa ku wa gatanu w'iyi ndwi igekenerezo rya 13 nk'uko bivugwa na Bwana Nivyabandi.

headline: Ukraine: Mbega OTAN/NATO ni iki, kubera iki Russia itayizeye?
text: Ibihugu bihurikiye muri OTAN/NATO biriko biriga urugero bashobora gushikako mu gufasha Ukraine guhangana n'igitero kivugwa ko gishobora gukorwa n'Uburusiya. Iri shirahamwe - rihurikiyemwo ibihugu nka Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Ubwongereza, Ubufaransa, n'Ubudagi - ririko rifasha Ukraine kwitegura gisirikare riyiha n'izindi mfashanyo. OTAN/NATO - bisigura ngo Organisation du Traité de l'Atlantique Nord/North Atlantic Treaty Organisation - ni ishirahamwe rya gisirikare ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe, ryashinzwe mu 1949 n'ibihugu 12, harimwo Amerika, Canada, Ubwongereza n'Ubufaransa. Ibihugu birihurikiyemwo vyiyemeza gutabarana mu gihe hoba igihugu na kimwe kiri muri iri shirahamwe coramuka gitewe. Mu ntango, intumbero kwari uguhangana n'akaga k'ingendo y'Uburusiya yo kwiyagurira akarere ku mugabane wa Bulaya inyuma y'intambara ya kabiri y'isi yose. Mu 1955 Reta Zunze Ubumwe z'aba Soviet, yari izwi nka URSS/USSR, nayo yaciye yihora mu gushinga ishirahamwe ryayo rya gisirikare ryari rihurikiyemwo ibihugu vya gikomunista vya Bulaya y'Ubuseruko, ishirahamwe ryari rizwi nk'Amasezerano ya Varsovie (Pacte de Varsovie/Warsaw Pact). Ibihugu vyariteyeko igikumu rigitangura vyari URSS, Albanie, Pologne, Tchechoslovakie, Hongrie, Roumanie, n'icahoze ari République Démocratique Allemande. Inyuma y'aho URSS isambukiye mu 1991, ibihugu bitari bike vyari bihurikiye muri aya Masezerano ya Varsovie vyaciye bihindukira vyinjira muri OTAN. Ubu, iri shirahamwe rihurikiyemwo ibihugu 30. None ni ikibazo nyabaki kiri hagati y'Uburusiya na OTAN ku vyerekeye Ukraine? Ukraine ni igihugu kiri mu vyahoze bigize Reta Zunze Ubumwe z'aba Soviet gihana imbibe n'Uburusiya hamwe n'Ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Bulaya (UE/EU). Nti kiri mw'ishirahamwe OTAN, ariko ni "incuti yaryo" -  ibi bigasigura ko hari umwumvikano izi mpande zompi zagiriraniye ko iki gihugu gishobora kwemererwa kwinjira muri iri shirahamwe vryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe muri kzoza. Uburusiya bushaka ko ibihugu vy'Uburengero bibwemerera ko ibi bitazokwigera biba. Hagati aho, Amerika ntishaka kubuza Ukraine kwinjira muri OTAN, ikavuga ko nk'igihugu cigenga gifise uburenganzira bwo gufata ingingo gishatse co nyene ku bijanye n'umutekano waco. Uwuserukira Ukraine mu Bwongereza, Vadym Prystaik, aherutse kuvuga ko Ukraine yari ifise ishaka ryo "kugenza buhoro" ku ntumbero yayo yo kwinjira muri iri shirahamwe rya gisirikare rihurikiyemwo ibihugu vyo mu burengero. Hagati aho, umuvugizi w'umukuru w'igihugu Volodymyr Zelensky yaramuvuguruje, mu kuvuga ko Ukraine vyanka bikunda itegerezwa kwinjira muri OTAN no mw'ishirahamwe UE/EU nk'uko biri mw'isbirizwashingiro. Ukraine ifise abanyagihugu benshi bavuga ikirusiya kandi ifitaniye ubucuti bwa hafi n'Uburusiyamu vyo imico n'imigenzo. Mu migambi yayo, Kremlin (ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu w'Uburusiya) ibona Ukraine nk'agace k'Uburusiya kari inyuma. Perezida Vladimir Putin avuga ko ibihugu vy'Uburengero biriko vyiheka inyuma y'iri shirahamwe ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe kugira ngo bikikuze Uburusiya, kandi agashaka ko OTAN ihagarika ibikorwa vya gisirikare mu buseruko bwa Bulaya. Kuva kera yamwe avuga ko Amerika yarenze ku vyo yiyemeje mu 1990 ko OTAN  itari kubandanya yiyagurira akarere amaja mu buseruko. OTAN iriyamiriza ibivugwa n'Uburusiya, ikavuga ko ibihugu biri ku rushi birihurikiyemwo ari vyo bisangiye imbibe n'Uburusiya, kandi ko ari ishirahamwe ryo kwivuna gusa. Abenshi babona ko irundarunda ry'ingabo z'Uburusiya ririko riraba ku rubibe buhana na Ukraine ari ukugerageza gutera igitsure ibihugu vy'Uburengero gufata nka nkama ivyo Ubursiya busaba. Igihe abanya Ukraine basenyura ubutegetsi bw'umukuru w'igihugu yari yegamiye ku Burusiya mu ntango za 2014, Uburusiya bwaciye bwigarurira akarere ka Crimea kari mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine. Bwaciye kandi bufata mu mugongo inyeshamba zikorana nabwo zigaruriye uturere tutari duto two mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. OTAN ntiyagiye gutabara, ariko yaciye inyanyagiza ingabo mu bihugu bitari bike vy'ubuseruko bwa Bulaya ku ncuro ya mbere. Ifise ibirindiro bine vy'ingabo zababa ibatayo (bataillon) ziva mu bihugu bitandukanye muri Estonie/Estonia, Lettonie/Latvia, Lituanie/Lithuania na Pologne/Poland hamwe n'ingabo zitari nke muri Roumanie/Romania ziva mu bihugu bitandukanye. OTAN kandi yaraguye poritike yayo yerekeye ibirere gushika mu bihugu bihurikiye ku nyanja ya Baltique (mer Baltique/Baltic Sea) bizwi nka Etats Baltes/Baltic states, hamwe no mu buseruko bwa Bulaya kugira ngo rishobore kurwanya indege iyo ari yo yose y'Uburusiya yohava ivogera imbibe z'ibihugu vyaryo. Uburusiya buvuga ko bushaka ko izi ngabo zisubira inyuma. Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika avuga ko Uburusiya "bushobora kubona ingaruka mbi zikomeye" mu gihe bworamuka buteye Ukraine kandi ariko ararungika izindi ngabo i Bulaya. Amerika iriko irarungika izindi ngabo hafi 3000 muri Pologne na Roumanie kugira ngo zishigikire inzego zo kwivuna abansi z'ibihugu vyo mu buseruko bwa Bulaya. Yaramaze gutegura izindi ngabo 8500 azibwira ko zokwama zimeze magabo. Pentagon (ibiro vy'ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bwa amerika) ivuga ko izi ngabo zishobora kurungikwa gusa mu gihe OTAN yofata ingingo yo kwishura ivyo Uburusiya bworamuka bukoze. Yongerako y'uko ata migambi ihari yo kurungika ingabo na zimwe muri Ukraine ari yonyene. Umushikiranganji w'imigenderaire w'Ubudagi Annalena Baerbock  aragabisha ko mu gihe ibintu vyokwunyuka mu bijanye na gisirikare "vyogira ingaruka mbi cane ku butegetsi bw'Uburusiya - mu vyo ubutunzi, poritike n'imigambi". Downing Street (ahari ibiro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza) ivuga ko Ubwongereza bwemera ko "ibihugu bifatanije nabwo bitegerezwa gutegura ingingo ruhasha harimwo ibihano Uburusiya butari bwigere bubona". Perezida Biden avuga ko hari "umwumvikano wose" n'abategetsi ba Bulaya ku kibazo ca Ukraine, ariko ko hari ukutumvikana ku bijanye n'ico buri gihugu cemera gutanga. Amerika ivuga ko yarungitse ibirwanisho bifise agaciro k'imiriyoni 200 z'amadorari harimwo za misire zo mu bwoko bwa Javelin zirasa vya bimodoka vy'intambara (missiles anti-chars)  hamwe n'izindi zo mu bwoko bwa Stinger zikorora indege, kandi yaremereye ibindi bihugu vya OTAN guha Ukrane ibirwanisho vyakorewe muri Amerika. Ubwongereza bwarahaye Ukraine misire 2000 zirasa vya bimodoka vyintambara (missiles anti-chars) kandi bwaranarungitse abahinga ba gisirikare kwigisha igisirikare ca Ukraine ingene bazikoresha. Bufise kandi ingabo zirenga 1000 mu buseruko bwa Bulaya, muri Estonie na Pologne. Buriko kandi burarungika izindi 350 muri Pologne, kandi buriko busaba OTAN kwongereza ingabo zayo zishika 900 muri Estonie. Buriko kadi burihweza ingene bworungika indege z'intambara zindi mu bumanuko bwa Bulaya no kurungika amato y'intambara mu buseruko bw'inyanja ya Mediterrannee. Bwarategetse kandi ingabo 1000 ko zokwama zimeze magabo kugira ngo zije gufasha mu gihe hogira  ibibazo vy'ubutabazi vyokwaduka bitewe n'igitero cokorwa n'Uburusiya. Umunyamabanga w'Ubwongereza ajejwe imigenderanire Liz Truss avuga ko "hari igihamana gito cane" co kurungika ingabo zoja kurwana muri Ukraine. Ibihugu bimwe bimwe vya OTAN harimwo Danemark, Espagne, Ubufaransa n'Ubuholande, vyarungitse indege n'amato vy'intambara mu buseruko bwa Bulaya mu gikomeza inzego zo kwivuna abansi mu karere. Abashikiranganji b'ibihugu vya OTAN bariko bariga ingene borungika izindi ngabo 4000 mu buseruko bwa Bulaya. Ariko, Ubudagi bwaranse ibisabwa na Ukraine yabusaba ibirwanisho vyo kwivuna, kubera poritike yabwo yo kutarungika ibirwanisho vyica mu turere turangwamwo intambara. ahubwo, buzorungika imfashanyi mu vyo ubuvuzi hamwe n'inkofero (casques/helmets) 5000. Perezida Macron w'Ubufaransa asaba ko hoba ibiganiro n'Uburusiya kugira ngo iki cuka kibi kirangire.

headline: Coronavirus: Ubuhindi bwahagaritse ibikoresho vyo gupima ‘bidakora’ vyaguzwe mu Bushinwa
text: Ubuhindi  bwahagaritse umuzigo w'ibikoresho vyo gupima coronavirus mu buryo bubangutse vyari vyaguzwe mu Bushinwa bingana hafi igice c'umuliyoni inyuma y'ukuboneka ko "vyapfuye". Leta y'ico gihugu kandi yaciye itegeka ko ivyari vyamaze gutangura gukoreshwa  mu ntara zitandukanye bivanwayo. Ivyo bikoresho bitanga inyishu z'ibipimo mu minota hafi 30, bigashobora kwerekana abantu bashobora kuba baramaze kwandura. Ivyo birafasha abategetsi kumenya igitigiri c'abanyagihugu baba baranduye uwo mugera mu karere kanaka. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe uno munsi, Ji Rong avugira ibiro vy'ubuserukizi bw'Ubushinwa mu Buhindi avuga ati: "Ikintu nyamukuru dushira imbere mu bidandazwa vy'ubuvuzi u Bushinwa bugurisha ni uko biba bikwije ivya ngombwa". "Sivyiza na gato kandi nta n'iteka bitanga kubona hiyadukiza abantu bubahuka kuvuga ko ibidandazwa biva mu Bushinwa 'vyapfuye' mbere ugasanga bamaze no kuvyishiramwo". Ivyo bikoresho vyo gupima mu buryo bubangutse, mu bisanzwe ntibishobora gupima coronavirus ubwayo, ari co gituma abahinga bafise amakenga ku bijanye n'ikoreshwa ryavyo. Intara zitari nke zagumye zisaba zishimitse ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe gupima indwaramu Buhindi, Indian Medical Research Council (ICMR), ko cozirekurira zigakoresha ivyo bikoresho, bitumwe n'uko abanyagihugu bari bafise amakengako igihugu cabo ata kintu kinini kiriko kirakora kugira ngo gipime abantu baco. Mu ntango, ICMR  yagumanye amakenga, ariko ivamwo iragondozwa, iratumako ivyo bikoresho mu makompanyi abiri. Hagati aho, haciye akanya gato gusa, intara zaciye zitangura kwidoga zivuga ko ivyo bikoresho vyari bifise urugero ruto cane rungana n'ibice 5% rwo gutanga inyishu zo nyazo. Izo ntara zimenyesha kandi ko zakoresheje ivyo bikoresho mu gupima abari basanzwe bazwi ko bamaze kwandura ariko inyishu z'ibipimo zisohotse zikerekana ko "ata mugera bafise". Mu nyuma n'ikigo ICMR kikaba cagiye kumenyesha ko ivyo bikoresho bidakwije ivya ngombwa. Ico kibazo cagiye kwunyuka ejo ku wa mbere, inyuma y'aho sentare nkuru igiriye umwihwezo w'amafaranga yarishwe kuri ivyo bipimo ica imenyesha ko leta yatanze amafaranga y'umurengera. Hagati aho, abategetsi babwiye ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu ko leta "atarufaranga na rumwe izotakaza" kubera ko umuzigo wose wahagaritse imbere y'uko banariha amahera.

headline: DRC:'﻿Imigwi yose yitwaje ibigwanisho itegerezwa gusubira mu bihugu vyayo' - EAC
text: U﻿muhuza w'akarere ko mu buseruko bwa Afrika EAC ku kibazo ca Congo, Uhuru Kenyatta na prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye arongoye iryo shirahamwe basavye ko imigwi yose yitwaje ibigwanisho iri muri RD Congo, isubira mu bihugu vyayo. I﻿vyo biri mw'itangazo abo bategetsi babiri basohoye inyuma y'umubonano wabereye i Bujumbura mu Burundi ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubutunzi. I﻿ryo tangazo rigira riti: "Duhamagariye imigwi yose yitwaje ibigwanisho gusubira mu bihugu yaje ivamwo ata kindi gisabwe." P﻿rezida Ndayishimiye na Uhuru Kenyatta yahora arongoye Kenya, akaba ari na we yari yanatumyeko ibiganiro vya mbere vyaheruka guhuza reta n'imigwi igwana i Nairobi muri Kenya bashinze ko hagiye kuba iyindi nama itariki 16 z'ukwezi kwa cumi na rimwe 2022. M﻿uri nama, ngo hazoba hatumiwe abantu bose bafise aho bahurira n'umutekano muke urangwa mu buseruko bwa RD Congo, harimwo n'abarongoye abandi mu mibano (Chefs traditionnels). M﻿u nama yaheruka kubera i Nairobi, yahuze ibihugu bihurikiye mw'ishirahamwe rya EAC, hari hashinzwe ko ibihugu vyose bigize iryo shirahamwe birungika ingabo zija kugwanya imigwi yitwaje ibigwanisho igisibije mu buseruko bwa Congo. G﻿ushika ubu Uburundi, Kenya na Uganda ni vyo bimaze kurungikayo abasirikare. M﻿uri uwo mubonano w'abo bategetsi babiri, bateye akamo ibindi bihugu kunyarutsa kurungika abasirikare babo. U﻿wo mubonano wabaye mu gihe prezida Etienne Tshisekedi wa Congo yaraye ashikirije ijambo abanyagihugu, aho yahamagariye urwaruka kwifatanya n'igisirikare kugwanya Urwanda. Y﻿agize ati: "Mu kwishura kuvyo urwaruka rusaba, ndabahamagariye kwiyegeraniriza mu migwi yo gukizura mu ntumbero yo gushigikira no gufasha igisirikare mu kurangura amabanga yaco ahambaye. "Aka ni na ko karyo ko kugabisha ibihemu, vyaba mu gisirikare canke abasivile bifasha umwansi, bazokurikiranwa hisunzwe amategeko, baronke igihano kijanye n’iyo nyifato. "Mu gusubiramwo gushimangira akamo nteye urwaruka rufise uwo muhamagaro, ndabasavye kwitaba ako kamo ari benshi." Y﻿agirije kandi Urwanda kwikika inyuma y'ivyitwazo ata ho bifatiye vy'uko FARDC ishigikiye umugwi w'abagwanyi b'abanyarwanda bari mu buseruko bwa Congo FDLR mu gushaka kwigarurira igihugu ciwe. Y﻿agize ati:"Mu kwikika inyuma yo kwitwaza ko FARDC ishigikiye FDLR, Urwanda muvyo ukuri rugenzwa n’agatima ko kwigarurira ikindi gihugu, rugamije kudutwara ubutare bwacu. "kugira rero bishoboke rutera akajagari mu buseruko bwa Congo, kugira ntiharangwe amahoro gutyo babandanye gukora ubwicanyi." Urwanda ruguma ruhakana ko ata ruhara rufise mu ntambara iriko irahuza abasirikare ba Congo n'umuhari witwaje ibigwanisho wa M23, uherutse kwigarurira uturere twinshi two mu karere ka Rutshuru harimwo n'umugwa mukuru waho uri ku birometero 70 uvuye i Goma, umugwa mukuru wa Nord Kivu.

headline: Bimwe mu bitsindo 10 bikomeye vyinjijwe mu nkino 10 zanyuma z'igikombe ca FA mu myaka 25 iheze
text: Raba bimwe mu bitsindo 10 bikomeye vyinjijwe mu nkino 10 zanyuma z'igikombe ca FA  mu myaka 25 iheze

headline: Ukraine: Komanda wa marine muri Mariupol aratabaza ko basigaje amasaha make
text: Umu-komanda w'abasirikare ba Ukraine  barwanira mu mazi mu gisagara cugarijwe ca  Mariupol yarungitse ubutumwa bwa video bwo gutabaza  kuri uyu wa gatatu mu gitondo avuga ko ingabo ziwe zisigaje amasaha make gusa. Muri iyo video yarungikiwe BBC n'ibindi binyamakuru, Major Serhiy Volyna avuga ko ingabo ziwe zitazomanika amaboko, ariko asaba ko amakungu afasha gutabara abasirikare biwe 500 bakomeretse n'amajana y'abagore n'abana avuga ko binyegeje hamwe na bo mu kigo c'uruganda  rw'ivyuma muri ico gisagara. "Ubu nibwo butumwa turungikiye amakungu. Bushobora kuba ari bwo bwa nyuma burundu. Birashoboka ko dusigaranye iminsi mike canke amasaha" nk'uko Major Serhiy Volyna yavuze. Yongeyeko ati: ''Dusaba abategetsi b'amakungu kudufasha. Tubasaba  kuraba uko batuvana ngaha batujane mu kindi gihugu." Azovstal, uruganda rw'ivyuma  runini cane  ruri ku buringanire burenga hegitari 1.000 -  niryo vubiro rya nyuma ry'ukwihagararako kw'abanya-Ukraine muri Mariupol. Major Volyna atwara  regiment ya Azov ati: "Ingabo z'umwansi zisumba izacu incuro mirongo, zirakomeye mu kirere, mu bisasu vya muzinga, mu ngabo zo ku butaka, mu bimashini no mu biduga ntamenwa". Yanse kuvuga igitigiri c'ingabo za Ukraine zigisigaye mu kigo c'urwo ruganda ariko yavuze ko n'ubu bagifise "akanyarigabo ko kurwana". Ariko abakomeretse bamerewe "nabi cane". "Bari mu nzu yo munsi, aho niho bariko baraborera," nk'uko yavuze. Igisagara ca Mariupol cagumye ari intego y'Uburusiya kuva ingabo zabwo ziteye Ukraine mu kwezi kwa kabiri. Prezida Volodymyr Zelensky, yabwiye BBC ko yibaza ko   abantu bashika 20.000 bashobora kuba barishwe muri Mariupol mu bitero vy'amabombe vy'Uburusiya kuri ico gisagara, abandi batazwi igitigiri nabo barajanywe ku butaka bw'Uburusiya.

headline: Afghanistan: Aba Taliban bahagaritse imyiyerekano y'abagore basaba uburenganzira bwabo
text: Abategetsi b'aba Taliban bahagaritse imyiyerekano y'abagore ku mugwa mukuru Kabul basaba uburengazira bwabo inyuma y'aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistani. Aba bagore bavuga ko aba Taliban babateye vya vyuka bikoroza amosozi n'ibindi vy'ipiripiri mu gihe bariko bagerageza kujabuka ikiraro batera baja ku ngoro y'umukuru w'igihugu. Ariko aba Taliban bavuga ko iyo myiyerekano yari yarenze inkombe, nk'uko ikinyamakuru Tolo co muri Afghanistani kibivuga. Niyo myiyerekano y'abagore yaheruka  mu yindi itari mike i Kabul na Herat. Aba bagore bari bateguye iyi myiyerekano basaba uburenganzira bwo gukora, bongere bashirwe muri reta. AbaTaliban bavuga ko mu misi iri imbere bazotangaza reta yabo, bakavuga ko bashobora kuronswa ibibanza, ariko ko badashobora kurongora ubushikiranganji. Abagore benshi baratinya ko bashobora gusubira gufatwa nabi nko  mu bihe vyaheze igihe aba Taliban bari ku butegetsi ubwa mbere, hagati ya 1996 na 2001. Ico gihe, abagore bategerezwa kwipfuka mu maso hose iyo bari hanze yo muhira, kandi bagahabwa ibihano ruhasha no ku dukosa duto. Umunyamakuru Azita Nazimi yabwiye Tolo ati: "Mu myaka 25 iheze, igihe aba Taliban baza, barambujije kuja kw'ishure". "Inyuma y'imyaka itanu y'ubutegetsi bwabo, nize imyaka 25 nongera ndakora cane. Kubwa kazoza keza kacu, ntidushobora kwemera ko ibi bisubira". Uwundi mugore yari mu myiyerekano, Soraya, yabwiye Reuters ati: "Bakubise kandi abagore mu mutwe bakoresheje igikono c'inkoho, abo bagore buzuye amaraso". Hagati aho, intambara zirabandanya mu kiyaya ca Panjshir, kiri mu buraruko bwa Kabul, aho inyeshamba zihanganye n'aba Taliban barondera gufata ako karere. Ariko buri ruhande rugenda rwemeza ko rufise ibintu mu minwe. Aba Taliban bavuga ko bigaruriye utundi turere tubiri kandi ko bariko batera baja ku mugwa mukuru w'iyo ntara. Umuvugizi w'umuhari National Resistance Front of Afghanistan (NRF) avuga ko intambara zikomeye zibandanya kandi ko ibihumbi vy'aba Taliban bazibiwe. Umukuru w'uyu muhari NRF, Ahmad Massoud, yakeje abagore bakoze imyiyerekano muri Herat, anavuga ko Panjshir ibandanya yirwanira. Ibivugwa n'umuhari  NRF canke n'aba Taliban ntibirashobora guhinyuzwa n'uruhande ataho rwegamiye.

headline: Sri Lanka: Abari mu myiyerekano batereye ikirimba c'umukuru w’igihugu, nawe agiye gutanga imihoho
text: Umukuru w’igihugu ca Sri Lanka Gotabaya Rajapaksa yatangaje ko agiye gutanga imihoho inyuma y’aho abari mu myiyerekano nijoro batereye ikirimba ciwe bakanaturira inzu y’umushikiranganji wa mbere. Yaba umushikiranganji wa mbere, yaba umukuru w’igihugu, nta n’umwe yari muhira igihe ii vyaba. Amajana n’amajana y’abari mu myiyerekano barihaye amabarabara ku mugwa mukuru Colombo, basaba ko Rajapaksa ava ku butegetsi inyuma y’imyiyerekano imaze amezi atari make biyamiriza isesagura ry’ubutunzi. Perezida Rajapaksa ategekanya gutanga imihoho ku wa 13 Mukakaro (uku kwezi kw’indwi), ni ukuvuga ku wa gatatu. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Wickremesinghe na we nyene yemeye gutanga imihoho. Umukuru w’inama nshingamateka avuga ko umukuru w’igihugu yafashe ingingo yo gutanga imihoho “kugira ngo ashikirize ubutegetsi mu mahoro” anatera akamo abanyagihugu “kwubaha amategeko”. Amaze gutangaza iyi ngingo, igisagara cose cuzuye akanyamuneza. Inyuma y’ivyaraye bibaye nijoro ku wa gatandatu, Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zasavye ubutegetsi bwa Sri Lanka gukora ningoga kugira ngo batorere umuti izi ngorane zishingiye ku butunzi muri ico gihugu. Umwe mu bari mu myiyerekano, Fiona Sirmana, yari mu bateye inkirimba, avuga ko hageze “kwikurako umukuru w’igihugu n’umushikiranganji wa mbere tugatangura ibihe bishasha muri Sri Lanka”. Yabwiye itororokanirizo ry’amakuru Reuters ati: “Numva mbabaye, ndababaye cane kubera batahavuye hakiri kare kuko iyo bagenda hakiri kare nta vyari kwononekara”. Mu myiyerekano y’ejo ku wa gatandatu, hari abatari bake bakomeretse, umuvugizi w’ibitaro bikuru vya Colombo akaba yabwiye itororokanirizo ry’amakuru AFP ko abantu batatu bariko baravurwa ibikomere vy’amasasu. Sri Lanka iri mu bibazo vy’ifaranga ryataye agaciro bikomeye, bikaba bitayoroheye kwinjiza ibifungurwa, ibitoro n’imiti, ibikuye hanze, mu gihe igihugu gihanzwe n’ingorane z’ubutunzi itari bwigere ibaho mu myaka 70. Yaherewe n’amafaranga mvamakungu, bica biba ngombwa ko ibuza igurishwa ry’iresansi (essence) n’amazutu ku mamodoka y’abigenga, ivyatumye haba imirongo miremire imaze imisi y’abarondera igitoro. Ivyaraye bibaye nijoro, ibintu bidasanzwe, bisa n’ivyerekana ko ibintu vyayangaye mu myiyerekano y’amahoro yari imaze amezi muri Sri Lanka. Isinzi ry’abantu bahuriye ku kirimba c’umukuru w’igihugu Rajapaksa, baririmba ivyivugo, bafise n’ibendera ry’igihugu imbere y’uko basenyura uruzitiro bakinjira muri iyo nyubakwa. Amavidewo yazungurutse ku mbuga hwaniro yerekana abantu bitera muri ico kirimba, boga muri pisine (piscine) y’umukuru w’igihugu, mu gihe abandi nabo bariko bayora ivyari mu bubati, basaka amatungo ya perezida mbere banakoresha ubwogero bwiwe bw’agahebuza. Ubudasa hagati y’iki kirimba giteye igomwe n’amezi iki gihugu c’imiriyoni 22 z’abantu kimaze mu bibazo ntibwaciye mu ryahumye abari mu myiyerekano. Chanuka Jayasuriya  yabwiye Reuters ati: "Abantu baje kwimara ishavu kubera igihugu kiri mu ngorane nk’izi. Iyo ubonye ivyiza vy’akaroruhore muri ino nzu, biragaragara neza ko aba bantu ata mwanya bafise wo gukorera igihugu”. Amakuru atangwa na Reuters avuga ko ku wa gatanu Perezida Rajapaksa yavuye mu kirimba ciwe mu kwicungera amaze kwumva ko hari imigumuko yari itegekanijwe, nk’uko amasoko abiri yo mu bushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi abivuga. N’aho ari ikirimba ca Rajapaksa, akunze kwirarira mu yindi nzu iri mu micungararo. BBC ntirashobora kumenya aho umukuru w’igihugu yinyegeje. Abari mu myiyerekano kandi baturiye inzu y’umushikiranganji wa mbere Wickremesinghe yiwe bwite iri muri karitiye y’abakire i Colombo. Imbere y’aho, yari yatangaje ko yari afise ishaka ryo gutanga imihoho kugira ngo abanyagihugu ntibagwe mu mporero, be no kugira ngo atange inzira yo gushinga reta ihuriyemwo imigambwe yose, ariko haciye akanya gato atangaje ibi haciye hatangura gukwiragizwa amavidewo y’inzu yiwe iriko irasha. Umushikiranganji wa mbere yabana n’umuryango wiwe mu nzu yiwe bwite akaba yari asanzwe akoresha ikirimba ciwe mu bikorwa vy’igihugu gusa. Ntibiramenyekana neza nimba iyi mihoho y’umukuru w’igihugu n’umushikiranganji wa mbere ikwiye kugira ngo imyiyerekano icurehe. Bhavani Fonseka, umunyamategeko azwi cane mu vyo guharanira agateka ka zina muntu i Colombo, avuga ati: "Imihoho y’abantu babiri bonyene ntihagije, kuko abantu basaba ko ibintu bihinduka mu butegetsi, ariko n’imiburiburi iyi ni intango mu gihe umukuru w’igihugu n’umushikiranganji wa mbere bogenda”. Uyu mupfasoni avuga ati: "Ni ngombwa ko haba uguhererekana ubutegetsi mu mahoro, ibi navyo ntavyo turabona”.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Aubameyang, Haaland, Vlahovic, Kessie, Nketiah, Dembele
text: Arsenal izokwakira uwo wese azoza arondera umusatirizi wayo, umunya-Gabon Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang w'imyaka 32, ashobora gusezera uyu murwi muri uku kwa mbere. (Sky Sports) Arsenal yemeye gutanga imiriyoni 70 z'ama euro ku musatirizi wa Fiorentina, umunya-Serbia Dusan Vlahovic w'imyaka 21 - ibi bigashobora guha akaryo umukinyi wo hagati w'umunya-Uruguay Lucas Torreira w'imyaka 25, ko kwimukira burundu muri uyu murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano Serie A. (Gazzetta dello Sport - in Italian) Umusatirizi wa Red Bull Salzburg, umudagi Karim Adeyemi w'imyaka 19, ari imbere ku rutonde rw'abaronderwa na Borussia Dortmund kugira ngo bashobore gusubirira umusatirizi wayo, umunya-Norvège Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 21. Abasatirizi Vlahovic wa Fiorentina, umunya-Autriche Sasa Kalajdzic w'imyaka 24  wa Stuttgart hamwe n'umunya-Uruguay Darwin Nunez w'imyaka 22 wa Benfica nabo bari kuri uru rutonde rw'abaronderwa n'uyo murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubudagi Bundesliga. (Marca - in Spanish) Borussia Dortmund irashaka ko ivya kazoza ka Haaland birangirana n'akadirisha k'igura n'igurisha ry'abakinyi ry'uku kwa mbere.  (Mirror) Umusatirizi wa Flamengo, umunya-Brésil Gabriel Barbosa w'imyaka 25, ariteguye kwinjira muri Newcastle United n'aho uyu murwi ugeze  ahatemba mu gihe uboneka ko ushobora kumanuka mu cicaro ca kabiri. (90min) Umukinyi wo hagati w'umunya-Hollande Donny van de Beek w'imyaka24, ariko araraba ko muri uku kwa mbere yosezera muri  Manchester United. (ESPN) Umumenyereza wa Tottenham Antonio Conte ntarashobora kubonana n'umukuru w'uyu murwi Daniel Levy kugira ngo bavugane ivyo kurondera abandi bakinyi muri uku kwa mbere. Umukinyi wo hagati wa AC Milan umunya- Côte d'Ivoire Franck Kessie w'imyaka 25, ari mu baronderwa cane n'uyo mumenyereza w'umutaliyano. (Evening Standard) Imirwi yo muri Premier League, Brighton na Crystal Palace, yompi iripfuza muri uku kwa mbere umusatirizi wa Arsenal,  umwongereza Eddie Nketiah w'imyaka 22. (Sun) Roma iriteguriye gutera igikumu ku masezerano y'intizo y'umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal, umwongereza Ainsley Maitland-Niles w'imyaka 24, muri ino ndwi. (ESPN) Paris St-Germain iripfuza umusatirizi wa Barcelona akina ku ruhande, umufaransa Ousmane Dembélé w'imyaka 24. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Barcelona iripfuza kugurisha vuba bwango Dembélé mu gihe uyu mukinyi wo ku ruhande yokwanka ayandi masezerano. (Talksport) Umumenyereza wa Manchester City Pep Guardiola arashobora kurekura umukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya-Espagne Aymeric Laporte w'imyaka 27, akinjira muri Barcelona - ariko ni mu gihe hoba amasezerano yotuma umukinyi wo hagati w'umunya Hollande Frenkie de Jong w'imyaka 24, yimukira muri uyo murwi wo muri Premier League. (El Nacional, via Teamtalk) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Barcelona umunyamerika Sergino Dest w'imyaka 21, nta ciyumviro afise co kuva muri uyu murwi n'aho imirwi ya Atletico Madrid, Bayern Munich na Chelsea imwipfuza.  (Sport - in Spanish)

headline: Umusunikano muri Israel: Ababibonye baravuga ingene abantu 'batererwa mu kirere'
text: Abantu bari ahabereye umusunikano waguyemwo abantu benshi mu rugendo rw'idini baravuga ingene ''batwawe n'umukuba w'abantu, abandi nabo batererwa mu kirere". Nibura abantu 44 bapfuye abandi benshi barakomereka mu rugendo rwo guhimbaza umunsi mukuru wa Lag B'Omer ku mucamo w'umusozi Meron. Igiporisi cabwiye ikinyamakuru Haaretz ko uwo musunikano wabaye kubera  bamwe mu bari muri urwo rugendo  banyereye ku ngazi, bituma abandi batemba. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari bitavye urwo rugendo rweranda. Umugabo yatanze izina ryiwe nka David yavuze ko yari yinjiye kuraba ingene batsa igicaniro/icoto bunonyene haza ''umupfunda uvuye hanze". Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Ynet ati: ''Batumijuye. Abantu banuzwe mu kirere - abandi  barahonyorwa'' ''Hari umwana yagumye yumiye ku kuguru kwanje, agwanira ubuzima. Twarindiriye gutabarwa iminota 15-20 muri uwo musunikano uteye ubwoba". Umwe mu barokotse yajanywe mu bitaro yabwiye television ya reta  Kan ati "Nta n'umwe yari azi ico ari bukore". "Intango n'ukubera abantu benshi cane. Hejuru yanje hari abantu benshi. Nanje nari ndamye hejuru y'uwundi atari agishobora guhema. Hari amaborogo, urudubi. Nabonye abana bari munsi yanje. Icanciye mu mutwe gusa kwari uko umwana wanje atoba impfuvyi". Uwundi yari ahari yavuze ko abantu bazungazunga iburyo n'ibubamfu. ''Inyuma y'iminota 20 nibaza ko abantu bari batanguye kutabasha guhumeka neza gutyo barondera gusohoka, ariko nta n'umwe yashoboye gusohoka. Munsi yanje hari abanrtu batari bagihema. Hari amaborogo menshi y'abavuga ngo "birasanse ko mpema". Uwundi yari ahari, Shlomo Katz,  yavuze ko yari arindiriye abagenzi biwe aca abona abaforoma biruka kandi bongera bagerageza  guhembura abana. Ati: "Ambulance zaguma zinjira zongera zisohoka". Dov Maisel, akora mu rwego rw'abatabara vyihuta rwa United Hatzalah Emergency Services yavuze ko abantu bari ''barundanyeko nk'ipaki y'ikarata''. Avuga ko abakora mu nzego zo gutabara nabo vyabaye ngombwa ko bahabwa inama zo kudahahamuka. Dov Maisel yagize ati: "Abantu benshi bakomeretse., abandi bapfuye ngaha. Abakorerabushake mubona ngaho bakoranijwe bakorerwa inama yo kubafasha kudahahamuka, - kuko babonye ibintu bigoye" Umwe mu bari bahari  yafashije abakomeretse yabwiye Haaretz ati: "Nari nicicaye ngira mfungure nca numva amaborogo. Twaciye twiruka gufasha hanyuma tubona imivyimba. Ubwa mbere bari nka 10, none ubu ni benshi".

headline: China: Umufotozi yasavye imbabazi kubera ifoto ya Dior y''amaso mato'
text: Umufotozi w'Umushinwakazi  akorana n'abanyamideri yasavye imbabazi kubera ''kutamenya" inyuma y'aho ifoto yafashe igakoreshwa na kompanyi y'imideri yo mu Bufaransa Dior yiyamirijwe n'abatari bake. Ifoto ya Chen Man yerekanye umugore bamwe mu Bashinwa bakoresha internet cane (netzens) bavuga ko ikomeza kubandanya yerekana ingene Abanyaburaya bishizemwo ingene Abanya-Asia basa. Madame Chen w'imyakab 41, yahavuye yandika ku rubuga-hwaniro rwa Weibo ati: "Ndiyagiriza jewe nyene kuba nkiri ikitazi [mu bikorwa maze gukora]." Dior yavuze ko iyo foto iherutse gukoreshwa mw'ihayanishwa i Shanghai, kuva ico gihe yaciye ivanwako. Iyo kompanyi y'ivyambarwa bigezweho yanditse kuri konte yayo ya Weibo ku wa gatatu ku mugoroba iti: "Dior, nk'uko yama, irubaha ingene Abashinwa biyumva... bishitse hakaba ukwihenda, [Dior] itegerezwa kwuguruka ikakira ivyo abantu bavuga hanyuma igakosora mu mwanya mwiza", yongerako iti "iyo foto ntiyari iyo gukoresha mu kwamamaza". Iyo foto yatanguye kuja ahabona ku wa 12 Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa  11),  ariko buno nyene ica iriyamirizwa na bamwe mu bakoresha internet cane - hamwe n'ibinyamakuru vy'aho mu Bushinwa. Urukoba rwera n'amaso manini nivyo ku bisanzwe bifatwa nk'ibimenyetso vy'ubwiza mu Bushinwa - akenshi mu kwamamaza hakaba hakunze gukoreshwa imideri iriko ivyo bimenyetso. Mu kwerekana igihushaneb, kimwe mu binyamakuru vyo mu Bushinwa, Beijing  Daily, mu nkuru y'ibanze canditse ko iyo foto ya Dior yerekana "isura yijiriwe" kandi y''amaso y'ikibi". Iyo nkuru y'ibanze yavuze iti: "Haheze imyaka myinshi abagore b'Abanya-Asia bama berekanwa bafise amaso mato  n'ikibibi (freckles) nk'uko Abanyaburaya bavyishizemwo". "Umufotozi yerekanye uko Abanyaburaya babibona." Abashinwa bakoresha imbuga hwaniro baciye bafatira ngaho,  bavuga ko amafoto ya Madame Chen ari "igitutsi" c'ingene Abanyaburaya bibaza ko abagore b'Abashinwakazi basa. Umwe mu bakoresha Weibo yavuze ati: "Uko niko Abanyaburaya bibaza ko dusa, bongerako ko Chen Man yakagoboreyemwo. Benshi bongeyeko ko batazogura ibihingurwa n'iyo kompanyi igurisha ivyo abifise. Bamwe mu Bashinwa bakoresha imbuga hwaniro bavuze ko iyo foto ya Madame Chen yibutsa urukurikirane rw'amafoto yiwe yo mu 2012, yari yafatiye i-D Magazine. Ariko si bose bavyumva uko. Bamwe barashigikiye Madame Chen, aho umwe mu bakoresha Weibo yavuze ati: "Kuki umugore w'Umushinwakazi w'amaso mato adashobra gufatwa ko ari mwiza? Je nta  ngorane n'imwe  ndabibonamwo." Mw'itangazo ryiwe ku wa gatatu, Madame Chen yavuze ko "yavyiyumviriye cane" akumva ko ategerezwa gusaba imbabazi amaze kwihweza buri "kintu cose kibi " cavuzwe ku gikorwa ciwe. Avuga ati: "Navukiye kandi nkurira mu Bushinwa. Ndakunda cane igihugu canje . Nk'umuhanzi, ndazi neza ico njejwe mu kurondera kumenya neza imico y'Ubushinwa kugira ngaragaze ubwiza bw'Ubushinwa mu vyo nkora." "Ubu ngiye kuzokwiga neza kahise k'Ubushinwa, nitabe ibiteramo bishobora kumfasha kuruta, hanyuma nteze imbere ivyiyumviro nsanzwe ngenderako...Nzokwihatira kuvuga Ubushinwa ndabicishije mu vyo nkora." Madame Chen n'umufotozi azwi cane mu gisata c'imideri mu Bushinwa. Amaze gufata amafoto menshi yakoreshejwe mu binyamakuru vy'imideri bizwi cane, yarafotoye na ba rurangiranwa nka David Beckham na Fan Bin Bing. (Uko isekeza ry'ubwiza bw'abiraburekazi hagiyemwo politikek

headline: Intambara ya Ukraine: Ibihugu vya Africa biriko biterwa igitsure ku kutagira aho bihagaze
text: Uwuserukira Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mw'ishirahamwe ONU avuga ko ibihugu vya Afrika bidashobora kubandanya vyerekana ko ataho bihagaze ku ntambara ya Ukraine. Avugana na BBC, Linda Thomas-Greenfield yavuze ko mu matora yo kwiyamiriza igitero ca Ukraine yabereye mu nama ya bose muri ONU iheruka, ibihugu 17 vyose vya Afrika vyanse kugira uruhande vyegamiye, nayo umunani bindi navyo bihitamwo kudatora. Thomas-Greenfield avuga ko ata rubuga rw'abatagira aho begamiye rushobora kubaho, mu gihe iyi atari intambara y'ukwikekana (Guerre froide/Cold War) hagati y'ibihugu vy'Uburengero n'Uburusiya. Umupfanosi Thomas-Greenfield avuga ko Amerika iriko irahiga ahandi ibihugu bisanzwe bigurira mu Burusiya bishobora kuguriramwo ivyo bisanzwe bivana hanze. Uyu aserukira Amerika muri ONU avuga kandi ko Amerika ishigikiye icipfuzo ca Afrika y'Epfo co guhuza Ukraine n'Uburusiya. Mu matora yabereye mu nama rusangi idasanzwe ya ONU yabaye ku wa 02 z'uku kwa gatatu, mu bihugu 193 bigize iri shirahamwe mpuzamakungu ibihugu 141 vyashigikiye iki cemezo, 35 biranka kugira uruhande vyegamira, bitanu biragihakana, mu gihe hari ibindi bitatoye. Uburundi bwashimye kutagira aho buhagaze, mu gihe Urwanda rwemeje iki cemezo. (tugomba kukivuga, ndibaza ko ari icyo gushyira mu kato Uburusiya no kwamagana iyi ntambara) Ibindi bihugu bitashatse kwerekana aho bihagaze ni Afrika y'Epfo, Algeria, Uganda, Senegal, Sudani, Sudani y'Epfo, Mali,  Mozambique, Namibia, Angola, Zimbabwe, Guinée équatoriale, Centrafrique, Madagascar, Tanzania na  Congo. Igihe atangaza ko Afrika y'Epfo yasabwe kugira uruhara muri iyo ntambara, Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa yavuze ko igihugu ciwe canse kugira uruhande cegamiye kubera "iki cemezo kitashize imbere ivyokworohereza impande zompi", congera cagiriza Inama Nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano kunanirwa mu mabanga yayo yo kubungabunga amahoro n'umutekano. Uganda yoyo yavuze ko yirinze kugira uruhande yegamira kugira yubahirize kuba hagati na hagati kuko ariyo igiye kurongora ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu bidafise aho vyegamiye, rizwi nka Mouvement des non-alignés/Non-Aligned Movement, NAM, rihurikiyemwo ibihugu 120 bikiri mu nzira y'amajambere.

headline: Tanzania : Samia Suluhu Hassan abona ko ata kubandanya bahakana Covid
text: Uwo yasubiriye azwi ko yavugana uburakari, ariko uyu we avuga atuje. Mu gihe hari abamubona nk'umuntu w'amahane, Perezida Samia Suluhu Hassan aboneka ko ashaka umwumvikano gusumba. Mu guhe yafatwa nk'uwutwaza umukazo, Perezida Suluhu aboneka ko ashaka guha ijambo bose. Haciye amezi ari musi y'abiri uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu ca Tanzania, John Magufuli ashengeye ku myaka 61, aca asubirirwa n'uwari icegera ciwe aboneka ko ashaka guhindura ingene abona ibintu. Haba ku kungene afata coronavirus, ubwigenge bw'ibinyamakuru canke ingene afata abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi, Perezida Samia yarahinduye ururimi, uravye ingene avugana ubwitonzi ariko ashimitse. Hagati aho, ntiyiyumva neza iyo hari abariko bamugereranya na Magufuli, mbere akaba aherutse gusaba abashingamateka ko batomugereranya na we. Amaze ukwezi arahiye, yabwiye abashingamateka ati: "Magufuli na Samia, mu bisanzwe ni umuntu umwe. Ngize imisi nihweza impari zihari, kandi ni ngombwa ko mvuga ko atari vyiza ku gihugu cacu". Ariko, umunyamakuru Jesse Kwayu akunze gukurikiranira hagufi poritike, avuga ko "bisa n'ibidakunda ko abantu bareka kubagereranya", akabona ko hari itandukaniro rinini cane hagati ya Magufuli na Samia. "Aritondera ivyo avuga. Ni umuntu atahura neza uburyo nyabwo bwo gushikiriza ijambo no gukosora". Umusi wa mbere gusa afata ijambo nk'umukuru w'igihugu, inyifato yiwe n'amajambo yashikirije vyerekanye ko azanye ubundi butegetsi butandukanye cane n'ubwahahora. Ubutegetsi Abatanzania batari bwigere babona kuva Perezida Magufuli yari yataziriwe "Tingatinga"ashitse ku butegetsi mu 2015. Umuyobozi w'ikinyamakuru Jamhuri Media Limited, Deodatus Balile, agira ati: "Aho abandi baza n'ishavu ryinshi, we avugana ubwitonzi". "Arabona ko Abatanzania badashobora kubaho nk'agati kirebanga, ko dutegerezwa kuba kumwe n'abandi, kandi tukifatanya n'amakungu mu gukemura ibibazo bimwe bimwe". Kumbure ikintu gikomeye cane atandukaniyeko n'uwo yasubiriye, ni ingene afata ikizakaranda ca Covid-19. Magufuli azwi nk'umuntu yakengera cane akamo katerwa n'amakungu ku bijanye na coronavirus yafata minenerwe, akanka ko n'incanco za Covid-19 zinjira mu gihugu. Harageze n'igihe atangaza ko umugera watsinzwe n'amasengesho muri Tanzania. Gushika ubu, nta biharuro vyo kwizera vyerekana abamaze kwandukirwa canke guhitanwa na coronavirus muri Tanzania kuko kuva mu kwa gatanu umwaka uheze, reta ya Magufuli yahagaritse gutanga ivyo bitigiri. Ku ruhande rwiwe, Perezida Samia abona ko Tanzania idashobora kubandanya ihakana uwu mugera. Haciye indwi zitatu gusa, yaciye ashiraho umurwi w'abahinga boza baramugira inama ku kungene Covid-19 yifashe mu gihugu bakanamwereka ingingo nkenerwa zikwiye gufatwa kugira akingire abanyagihugu. Aranaboneka kenshi mbere yambaye agapfukamunwa, ikintu Magufuli atigeze akora. Hasigaye kumenya nimba ivyo avuga n'ingendo nshasha yafashe hari ico biriko birahindura ku kungene Covid-19 ifatwa mu gihugu. Ikizwi kandi, ni uko gushika ubu ata ngingo nshasha zirigera zifatwa n'aba bahinga. Mu gihe ubwoko bushasha bwa Covid-19 bubandanya burandagara kw'isi yose, abenshi baripfuza cane kumenya ico avuga ku bijanye n'incanco. Abantu kandi bararindiriye kubona nimba ashobora gufata ingingo za guma mu ruko n'uguhagarika uruja n'uruza mw'ijoro mu ntumbero yo guhagarika uwu mugera, ivyo uwo yasubiriye atashaka kwumva. Ingingo nk'izi zishobora kugira ingaruka mbi cane mu mamiliyoni y'Abatanzania bakenye, harimwo n'ababandaza bato bato ari nabo mushinge w'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi - Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM). Mu gihe yoramuka afashe izi ngingo, hoba hageze ko Perezida Samia yerekana ububasha afise bwo gushobora kwumvisha abanyagihugu ko zoba zifashe ku nyungu zabo. Ariko kubwa Jesse Kwayu, ubu bubasha arabufise. Mu ngingo zikomeye ziherutse gufatwa mu ntumbero yo kurwanya Covid-19, kuwa mbere mw'ijoro reta yasohoye urwandiko rwerekana ingingo ngenderwako nshasha zitegerezwa kuja mu ngiro kuva kuri uyu wa kabiri. Muri izi ngingo harimwo ko abantu bose bazokwinjira mu gihugu bazotegerezwa gushirwa ubwabo mu kiringo c'imisi 14. Iyo ngingo izofata abanyamahanga hamwe n'abenegihugu bazotegerezwa kwerekana urukaratasi rwerekana ko bapimwe bagasanga ata mugera bafise. Uru rwandiko ruvuga kandi ko abazoba binjiye bavuye mu bihugu bibangamiwe n'uwu mugera bazotegerezwa gusubira gupimwa Covid ku buryo bwabo. Perezida Samia yatanguye kumenyekana mu gihugu mu 2014 igihe agenwa ubwa mbere kuba icegera c'umukuru w'umurwi washinzwe ngo utegure ibwirizwashingiro rishasha. Yagiye kuboneka ko ari "umutegetsi abushitse, w'ijunja n'ijambo kandi afise ubushobozi bwo kwitondera ivyiyumviro bimunegura", nk'uko bivugwa n'umunyamakuru akurikiranira hafi ivya poritike. Uku gushaka kwumviriza abo batavuga rumwe ni kwo kwamutumye afata iyindi ngendo ku bijanye n'ibinyamakuru. Ubutegetsi bwa Magufuli buzwi ko bwugaye ibinyamakuru, bukagirizwa ko bwatoteje bukanapfunga abamenyeshamakuru. Abanyaporitike hamwe nabo mu mashirahamwe adaharanira ivyicaro vya poritike bubahuka kunegura Magufuli na bo  nyene barapfunzwe. Ariko Perezida Samia aboneka ko afise intumbero yo kwugurura urubuga kuri bose. Yategetse ubushikiranganji bw'ukumenyesha amakuru gusubiramwo ingingo zari zafashwe, aho avuga ko reta "idakwiye guha akaryo abantu bavuga ko turiko turahonyanga ubwigenge bw'ukumenyesha amakuru". Uyu mukuru w'igihugu aramaze no kubonana n'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi mu ntumbero yo kuganira "ingene bakwiye gukora ibikorwa vyabo vya poritike ku nyungu z'igihugu". Yari asanzwe azwi ko ari umunyamahoro inyuma y'aho agendeye wa munyaporitike atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi Tundu Lissu mu 2017 igihe arasiwe amasasu menshi n'abantu bitwaje inkoho bashaka kumwica. Ni we mutegetsi wenyene muri reta yamugendeye. Inyuma y'amezi indwi yonyene amaze ku butegetsi, Perezida Samia yitezwe kuri uyu wa kabiri mu rugendo rugira kabiri mu makungu, aho yerekeje muri Kenya. Agereranije n'ingendo cumi zonyene Magufuli yakoze mu mahanga mu myaka itandatu yamaze ku butegetsi, Jesse Kwayu arizeye ko uyu mukuru w'igihugu mushasha azokorana cane n'amakungu. Ati: "Ndazi neza cane ko Tanzania igiye gusubira ku rubuga mpuzamakungu. Izogira uruhara mu migambi y'akarere nk'iyijanye n'ukugarukana amahoro, kandi izoserukirwa mu makoraniro mpuzamakungu, nk'Inama nkuru y'ishirahamwe ONU". Kubw'iwe, kubona Perezida Samia yafashe inzira itandukanye mu gutegeka igihugu, ntibifise intumbero yo gucafuza uwo yasubiriye, ahubwo ni ikibazo "co guhitamwo demokarasi...hamwe no gukuraho" ivyatuma igihugu kitisanzura. Abona ko agifise igikorwa co guhuza reta yahahora - nawe yari asanzwe arimwo - hamwe n'ubutegetsi bwiwe bushasha buboneka ko bwemera kwumviriza abo badahuje ivyiyumviro.

headline: Brussels: Bagiye kwitirira ibarabara indaya Eunice Osayande yishwe mu 2018
text: Igisagara ca Bruxelles kivuga ko kigiye kwitirira ibarabara rishasha indaya y'umunya Nigeria aherutse kugandagurwa, nka kimwe mu bigize isekeza ryo guha iteka abakenyezi mu Bubirigi. Abarongoye iki gisagara bavuga ko iri barabara rizokwitirirwa Eunice Osayande, yishwe acumiswe imbugita n'umwe mu bakiriya biwe mu kwa gatandatu 2018. Uyu mwigeme yari yashitse ku mugwa mukuru w'Ububirigi mu 2016 yemerewe akazi keza kugira ngo yubake kazoza kiwe i Bulaya. Yari azi ko abagabo bamutumyeko bari abakinyi b'amareresi bari bagiye kumugira igihangange mu gukina ama filime. Ariko yasanze bari abacuruza abantu. Amaze kugera i Buruseri, ubwo nyene baciye bamuhatira mu bumalaya, akaba yabwiwe ko aheraniye aba bagabo ama-euros 45.000 arimwo ay'urugendo, agashimwe kabo hamwe n'uburaro. Indwi nkeya imbere y'igandagurwa ryiwe, yarituye ishirahamwe ry'abadandaza imibiri yabo aho yaribwiye ko yakubagurwa agatotezwa muri ako kazi kiwe. Yaratinya kuja kwitura igipolisi kubera ata bimuranga yari afise. Mu kwa gatandatu 2018, afise imyaka  23, Osayande yacumiswe n'umukiriya imbugita incuro 17 zose mu karere ka Gare du Nord. Haciye haduka imyiyerekano y'abimukira badandaza imibiri i Buruseri. Abayikoze basaba kworoherezwa mu kazi kabo, banasaba n'abategetsi b'akarere gushiraho amategeko agenga ico gisata. Amategeko ntabuza ubumaraya mu Bubirigi ariko nta tegeko rihuriweko na bose mu gihugu cose. Maxime Maes, arongoye ishirahamwe UTSOPI ry'abacuruza imibiri yabo i Buruseri, ni we yateguye iyi myiyerekano. Uyu mupfasoni yabwiye BBC ati: "Urupfu rwa Eunice rwarababaje cane abantu benshi, cane cane ku bimukira bakorera mu karere yakoreramwo". "Ubugizi bwa nabi bugenda bwiyongera muri ako karere, abagore ba ntahonikora bakaba ari bo babangamiwe cane". Umusore w'imyaka 17 ni we yagirijwe urupfu rwa Osayande akaba arindiriye gucirirwa urubanza. Bane mu bagize uyu murwi w'abacuruza abantu na bo nyene barahagaritswe, mu kwa mbere kw'uno mwaka, bakaba baciriwe iminyororo ishika ku myaka ine. Mu kwitirira ibarabara rishasha umupfasoni Osayande, igisagara ca Bruxelles kivuga ko gishaka gushira ahabona "abagore bose bazira urucuruza rw'abantu, ubugizi bwa nabi bushingiye ku gitsina hamwe n'ubwicanyi bukorerwa abagore". Iri barabara ni ryo rya mbere rizoba ryitiriwe indaya muri ico gihugu, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru RTBF co mu Bubirigi. Iri barabara rishasha ririko rirubakwa mu buraruko bw'igisagara ca Bruxelles ni rimwe mu yandi ari mu twigoro tw'abarongoye iki gisagara two kwitirira abagore ibibanza vyinshi. Hari amabarabara aza yaramaze kwitirirwa abagore batari bake, harimwo Yvonne Nèvejean na Andrée De Jongh bari mu barwanije aba Nazi b'Abadagi muri ya ntambara ya kabiri y'isi yose. Hari kandi n'ikiraro citiriwe Suzan Daniel, umubirigikazi yaharaniye agateka k'abari muri wa murwi w'abahuza ibitsina babisangiye. Ans Persoons ari mu barongoye iki gisagara avuga ko ibice 42% vy'abagore mu Bubirigi bari hagati y'imyaka 16 na 69 bamaze gukubagurwa mu buryo ubu canke buriya. "Uru rugero ni runini cane mu badandaza imibiri yabo. Iki ni co neza na neza gitumye Eunice Osayande yitirirwa ibarabara". Iri barabara ricubakwa ryitezwe kwugururwa icese mu mezi make ari imbere. Abarongoye iki gisagara bavuga ko imirwi y'abadandaza imibiri yabo hamwe n'abimukira bazotumirwa kugira bashikirize ijambo ku musi wo kuryugurura.

headline: OMS/WHO igabisha ko Africa ihanzwe n'igihuhusi kigira gatatu ca Covid
text: Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO rigabisha ko Afrika iri hafi yo guhura n'igihuhusi kigira gatatu ca Covid-19, ko rero ari nkenerwa kwongereza incanco. Igitigiri c'abamaze kwandura iki kiza carenze imiriyoni zitanu mu gihe ibihugu bishika indwi vy'uwu mugabane ata ncanco bigifise. Umukuru wa OMS mu karere ka Afrika, Matshidiso Moeti, avuga ati: "Afrika irakeneye amamiriyoni yandi y'incanco muri kino gihe". Afrika y'Epfo, Maroc, Tunisia, Ethiopia na Misiri nivyo bihugu bifise abanduye benshi gusumba ibindi ku mugabane wose. Uganda na Namibia birahanzwe n'igihuhusi ca gatatu ca Covid kiriko kiriha inkumbi, aho buri musi gihitana abatari bake. OMS ivuga ko abantu 136.000 bamaze guhitanwa n'iki kiza mu bihugu bitandukanye vya Afrika. Ubwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus bwiswe Delta buramaze kwibonekeza mu bihugu 14, mu gihe ubundi nabwo bwiswe Beta bwatanguye kwibonekeza muri Afrika y'Epfo, bumaze kugera mu bihugu 25. OMS ivuga ko gushika ubu ata kirangamisi c'ingene izindi ncanco zizobonekera, ariko ko zikenewe mu buryo bwihutirwa.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Grealish, Kane, Sancho, Ronaldo, Haaland, Edouard, White
text: Umumenyereza wa Manchester City Pep Guardiola arashaka kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Aston Villa umwongereza Jack Grealish w'imyaka 25 muri rino ci. (ESPN) Tottenham Hotspur ikeneye n'imiburiburi imiriyoni 212 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika ategerezwa kurihwa 'cash' ku musatirizi w'umwongereza Harry Kane mu gihe umukuru wayo Daniel Levy yoramuka yemereye uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 27 kuva muri uyu murwi. (Sun) Manchester United iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano yo kugura umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Borussia Dortmund, umwongereza Jadon Sancho w'imyaka 21 inyuma y'aho igiciro ciwe kigabanirijwe kigashika ku miriyoni zababa113 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, ariko hariko n'uturusho.  (Times, subscription required) Umukinyi w'imbere wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo ubu afise imyaka 36, ariko arihweza nimba yoja gukinira uwundi murwi n'aho ari mu biganiro na Juventus ku bijanye na kazoza kiwe muri uyu murwi. (ESPN) Mu gihe Ronaldo yoramuka avuye muri Juve, umunya Brésil Gabriel Jesus w'imyaka 24 akina muri Manchester City niwe ashirwa imbere ku rutonde rw'abashobora kumusubirira, ari kumwe n'umunya Serbia Dusan Vlahovic w'imyaka, akaba ari umusatirizi wa Fiorentina, hamwe rero n'umunya Argentina Mauro Icardi w'imyaka 28 asanzwe akina muri Paris St-Germain. (Gazzetta dello Sport - in Italian) Chelsea yatanguye ibiganiro na Borussia Dortmund kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umusatirizi w'umunya Norvege Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 20; umwongereza akina imbere Tammy Abraham w'imyaka 23 akaba ashobora gushirwa muri ayo masezerano nk'uwokwongerwa ku mafaranga yotangwa. (Mail) Everton yakoresheje ikibazo (interview) uwahoze ari umumenyereza wa Wolves Nuno Espirito Santo w'imyaka 47 kugira ngo ashobore gusubirira Carlo Ancelotti nk'umumenyereza mushasha inyuma y'aho uyu mutariyano asubiriye mu murwi Real Madrid. (Football Insider) Brighton yiteze ko izohebuza imirwi ya Manchester United, Arsenal na Liverpool iriko irarondera umukinyi w'inyuma w'umwongereza Ben White w'imyaka 23 mu kumushira ku giciro c'imiriyoni 70 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Mail) Leicester yemeranije n'umurwi Celtic ko ushobora kuyiha umukinyi w'imbere, umufaransa Odsonne Edouard w'imyaka 23 ku miriyoni zababa 21 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Sun) Atalanta yashinze igiciro kingana n'imiriyoni zababa 73 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika ku bakeneye umukinyi w'inyuma, umunya Argentina Cristian Romero w'imyaka 23, asanzwe aronderwa na Manchester United. (Tuttosport - in Italian) Paris St-Germain iri hafi yo kuronka kuri gusa umunyegori wa AC Milan, umutariyano Gianluigi Donnarumma w'imyaka 22.  (Sky Italia) Juventus iripfuza ko umusatirizi w'umunya Espagne Alvaro Morata w'imyaka 28 ayegukira burundu, akaba yari asanzwe akina muri uyu murwi atijijwe na Atletico Madrid. (Calciomercato - in Italian) Newcastle irashaka gukubita hasi Southampton mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Leicester umwongereza Hamza Choudhury w'imyaka 23. (Football Insider) Umumenyereza wa Fulham Scott Parker arashobora kuva muri uyu murwi kugira ngo aje kumenyereza Bournemouth. (Talksport) West Ham na Aston Villa iripfuza kugura umusatirizi wa Burnley umunya Nouvelle Zelande Chris Wood w'imyaka 29, mu gihe Everton nayo nyene iriko iramukurikiranira hagufi muri kino gihe ikirindiriye kuronka umumenyereza mushasha. (Mirror) Hagati aho, West Ham yashitse ku masezerano n'umukinyi wo hagati wa Chelsea umufaransa Pierre Ekwah-Elimby w'imyaka 19. (Sky Sports) Aston Villa niyo ifise amahirwe menshi yo kuronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Fleetwood muri iri ci, umwongereza Josh Feeney w'imyaka 16, kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza w'abatarenza imyaka 16, ariko iriko iramurwanira na Manchester United. (Mail)

headline: Ghana: Abashingamateka barwanye bapfa ikori ku mahera aca ku materefone ngendanwa
text: Hadutse imishamirano mu nama nshingamateka ya Ghana mw'ijoro ryo kuwa mbere buca ari ku wa kabiri igihe abashingamateka bariko biga ikori ryotangwa ku mafaranga acishwa ku materefone ngendanwa. Abashingamateka barateranye inkokora, barasunagurana, bahana amangumi, mu gihe abandi nabo bagerageza kubanguranya. Iyi mishamirano yadutse igihe abashingamateka bo ku ruhande rutavuga rumwe n'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi bahaguruka bakaja kubuza icegera c'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka Joseph Osei Owusu ko ahaguruka ngo aje gutora, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu. Niwe yari arongoye ino nama yahavuye yunguruzwa kubera uru ruhagarara. Umugambwe National Democratic Congress (NDC) utavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi uriyamiriza iri kori ringana na 1.75% ku mafaranga acishwa ku materefone ngendanwa, harimwo no kuriha ibicuruzwa ukoresheje terefone ngendanwa. Uyu mugambwe uvuga ko iri kori rizohohotera abadafise amikoro manini hamwe n'abo bose bari hanze y'igisata c'amabanki. Ariko umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca reta Ken Ofori-Artta avuga ko ari ukwagura igisata c'abatangakori, agasigura ko mu mwaka uza igihugu gishobora kuhungukira imiriyaridi 6.9 z'amafaranga y'ama cedi akoreshwa muri Ghana (yababa hafi imiriyaridi 1.15 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika). Iri koraniro ry'inama nshingamateka ryatanguye ku wa mbere mu gatondo, rikaba ryagiye guhagarikwa inyuma y'isaha zitandatu z'ijoro (canke saa sita z'ijoro), nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru Graphic co muri ico gihugu. Iki kinyamakuru cacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter iyi reresi y'uru ruhagarara. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga. Abanya-Ghana batari bake bagaye iyi nyifato y'abashingamateka babo, bakavuga ko bategerezwa kubera akarorero keza abandi - hakwifata nk'abana. Ijwi ry'icegera c'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ryaboneka ko ari kirumara mu gihe inama nshingamateka yacanyemwo bikomeye kubera integuro y'iri kori. Ava mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi New Patriotic Party (NPP). Umugambwe NDC uvuga ko atategerezwa gutora kubera yari arongoye inama. Ikinyamakuru Graphic kivuga ko integuro y'tegeko rigenga iri kori yemejwe n'umurwi w'inama nshingamateka ujejwe ikigega, ku majwi 13 kuri 12, ariko ni inyuma y'aho umukuru w'uyu murwi atangiye ijwi ryiwe ryabanguranije. Inama nshingamateka yasubiye gukorana kandi ejo ku wa kabiri, ariko abashingamateka ntibatoye iri tegeko inyuma y'aho bumvikaniye ko inama yungururizwa mu kwa mbere. Poritike ya Ghana irangwamwo ukutumvikana kuva mu mwaka uheze, inyuma y'amatora aho imigambwe NDC na NPP yaronse intebe 137 umwe umwe. Intebe imwe ni iy'uwigenga, yagiye ku ruhande rwa NPP, agatuma uwu mugambwe uronka akarusho. Mu kwa mbere, abasirikare barinjiye mu nama nshingamateka kugira bahagarike imishamirano hagati y'abashingamateka yadutse bagomba gutora umukuru w'inama nshingamateka. Ico gihe, Alban Bagbin wa NDC niwe yatowe inyuma y'aho bamwe mu bashingamateka ba NPP bamuhereye amajwi bakayima uwo mu mugambwe wabo, Mike Oquaye. Bagbin ntiyari muri iyi nama yo kuwa mbere yadutsemwo uru ruhagarara, ari co gituma yaciye irongorwa na Owusu wo muri NPP.

headline: Papa Francis yashoboye gusoma imisa ku rubaraza rw'ibitaro inyuma yo kubagwa urura
text: Papa Francis yashoboye kwiyereka abantu ubwa mbere kuva bamukoze kubera ingorane y'urura runini, haraciye indwi. Mu gihe yaboneka ko ameze neza, uyu mupapa w'imyaka 84 yasomye imisa yo muri ino ndwi ku rubaraza rw'ibitaro  Gemelli i Roma. Abantu baharurwa mu majana bakoraniye hanze y'ibi bitaro, bamwe bakoma akaruru ngo "Viva il Papa!" (Twogereranya na "Papa, ramba"). Vaticano ivuga ko igikorwa co kuvura Papa indwara y'urura runini izwi nka "symptomatic diverticular stenosis" cagenze neza. Papa yabwiye abari aho ati: "Ndanezerewe kubona nshoboye kurangura ibanga ryanje ryo ku wa Mungu n'aho ndi ng'aha". "Narumvise ko mwambaye hafi cane kandi ko mwansengeye. Ndabashimiye n'umutima wanje wose". Ashimira abakozi bo muri ivyo bitaro, yavuze ko "yiboneye ingene ubuvuzi bwiza ari nkenerwa, kandi bose bakaburonka, mu bindi bihugu nk'uko bimeze hano mu Butariyano". Yongerako ati: "Ntidutakaze aya mahirwe. Ni ngombwa ko tuyabungabunga". Bamwe mu bana barwariye muri ivyo bitaro babonetse bari kumwe na Papa ku rubaraza. Ntibiramenyekana ikiringo azomara muri ibi bitaro mu gihe azoba ariko ararwaruka. Indwara ya Diverticular ni indwara itera ibivyimba mu rura runini, bigashobora gutuma rwipfungānya, bigatuma umuntu yuzura inda akanababara mu nda. Francis, yavutse mu  1936 i Buenos Aires, yaratakaje igice c'ihaha ry'iburyo afise imyaka 21. Afise kandi ikibazo co mu matako kimutera ububabare buhera mu gice co hasi c'umugongo bukamanuka mu maguru. Mu 2014, yagiye ahagarika ibikorwa bimwe bimwe kubera ibibazo vyo mu mushishito.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Saul, Locatelli, Haaland, Hudson-Odoi, Coman, Jesus, Ronaldo
text: Nta gishasha ku bijanye n'ivya Saul Niguez vyo kuva muri Atletico Madrid akaja muri Barcelona, umuserukizi w'uyu mukinyi w'umunya Espagne w'imyaka 26 akaba ariko aravugana n'imirwi itari mike, harimwo Liverpool na Manchester United ashobora kwimukiramwo. (AS - in Spanish) Arsenal irashaka kuriha Sassuolo imiriyoni hafi 47 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika zisabwa ku mukinyi wo hagati, umutaliyano Manuel Locatelli w'imyaka 23. (Fabrizio Romano via Sun) Chelsea "ntirota irekura" mu rugamba rwo kurondera wa musatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund umunya Norvège Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 20, n'aho bivugwa ko amahirwe ari make.  (Sky Germany - in German) Aba Blues kandi bemeye gutanga umwongereza akina ku ruhande Callum Hudson-Odoi w'imyaka 20 kuri Bayern Munich kugira ngo uyu murwi wo mu Budagi nawo ushobore kumuha umufaransa na we nyene akina ku ruhande Kingsley Coman w'imyaka 25. (L'Equipe - in French) Arsenal yinjiye mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Norwich umwongereza Max Aarons w'imyaka 21- asanzwe kandi arabwa ryiza na Bayern Munich - aba Gunners bakaba barondera uwushobora gusubirira umunya Espagne Hector Bellerin w'imyaka 26. (Express) Everton iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano yo kugura umwongereza akina ku ruhande Andros Townsend w'imyaka 30 asanzwe afise uburenganzira bwo kwigira mu murwi uwo ari wo wose ata gisabwe inyuma y'aho aviriye muri Crystal Palace. Aho rero agashobora kuba umukinyi wa mbere aguzwe n'umumenyereza Rafael Benitez w'aba Toffees. Uyu murwi kandi uriko urarondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Bayer Leverkusen umwongereza Demarai Gray w'imyaka 25. (Mirror) Everton kandi ni umwe mu mirwi ibiri, iri kumwe n'umukeba wayo wa Premier League  West Ham, imaze kwegera Barcelona kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umukinyi wayo w'inyuma, umufaransa Clement Lenglet w'imyaka 26.  (AS - in Spanish) Juventus itegerezwa gutanga imiriyoni 59 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo ishobore kuronka umusatirizi wa Brésil Gabriel Jesus akina muri Manchester City.
