Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 24 asanzwe asigaje imyaka ibiri mu masezerano afitaniye n'umurwi wiwe ari mu baronderwa cane n'uyu murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano Serie A.  (Calciomercato - in Italian) Juventus iriko kandi irarondera ingene yokwegera umurwi wo mu Bufaransa Paris St-Germain kugira ngo irabe ingene woyitiza umunya Argentina akina hagati Leandro Paredes w'imyaka 27 kugira ngo akine mu kibanza c'umunya Brésil Arthur Melo w'imyaka 24 yavunitse. (La Repubblica via Football Italia) Barcelona irarondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Lille umunya Portugal Renato Sanches nk'intizo, ariko kandi ikanashobora kumugura mu gihe yomugomwa. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 23 ari ku giciro c'imiriyoni 41 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, igiciro Barcelona idashobora kwemera. (AS - in Spanish) Barca ishobora kandi kwima ikibanza Philippe Coutinho mu murwi mukuru mu gihe yoyanirwa no kugurisha uyu mukinyi akina hagati wa Bresil muri rino ci. (AS - in Spanish) Brighton iripfuza umusatirizi wa Barcelona umunya Danemark  Martin Braithwaite w'imyaka  30, asanzwe kandi aronderwa na Wolves hamwe na West Ham. (Sport - in Spanish). Christiano Ronaldo yanditse kuri Instagram ati "umunsi w'icemezo" haciye umusi ikinyamakuru l'Equipe cari cavuze ko umunye-Argentine Mauro Icardi w'imyaka 28, ivyo kuva muri PSG aja muri Juventus bizovana n'uko Ronaldo w'imyaka 36, azoba avuye muri Juventus. (AS - in Spanish) Manchester United ni wo murwi Kieran Trippier yipfuza kwimukiramwo ariko Atletico Madrid iriko ikora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo igumane uyu mwongereza w'imyaka 30 akina inyuma ku ruhande rw'iburyo. (AS - in Spanish) Umumenyereza wa Manchester United Ole Gunnar Solskjaer avuga ko umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umwongereza Jesse Lingard w'imyaka 28 muri kino gihe ari mu bakinyi bazokoreshwa, inyuma y'umwaka wose yari amaze akina muri West Ham kandi akaba yaravyifashemwo neza. (Manchester Evening News) Arsenal iriko irarondera kugurisha umusatirizi w'umufaransa striker Alexandre Lacazette w'imyaka 30, mu ntumbero yo kurondera amahera yo kugura abandi bakinyi muri rino ci.  (Mirror) Bayern Munich iripfuza kugurisha umufaransa akina hagati Corentin Tolisso ku miriyoni hafi 24 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 26 asanzwe kandi arabwa ryiza na Juventus hamwe na Napoli, ni mu gihe asigaranye umwaka umwe gusa mu masezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi wa Bundesliga watsindiye iri higanwa. (L'Equipe via Get French Football News) Umufaransa akina ku ruhande Thomas Robert, umuhungu w'uwahoze akina ku ruhande muri Newcastle Laurent Robert, ariko yimenyereza mu murwi Burnley mu gihe uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 20 yizeye ko ashobora kwinjira muri uyo murwi ku ruhande rw'abatarenza imyaka 23.  (Sun) Burnley iriteguye kuronka umunyegori w'umunya Pays de Galles/Wales Wayne Hennessey ataco irinze gutanga inyuma y'aho uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 34 aviriye muri Crystal Palace kubera amasezerano yari afitaniye nayo yari arangiye. (Mail) Newcastle United yemeye kugurisha umufaransa akina inyuma Florian Lejeune w'imyaka 30 kuri Alaves, akaba yari amaze umwaka wose akina muri uyu murwi wa Espagne aho yari yaratijijwe. (Chronicle)

headline: Indyane hagati ya Britney Spears na murumunawe zigeze kure, aho baryanira ku mbuga hwaniro
text: Britney Spears na mushikiwe we Jamie Lynn bamaze imisi baterana amajambo biturutse ku kiganiro giheruka ku mboneshakure hamwe no ku mubano wabo wo muri kahise. Uyu muririmvyi yagiriza murumunawe ko yaciye ku kiganiro co ku wa gatatu mu kumenyekanisha igitabo ciwe "akoresheje izina ryanje". Britney avuga ko Jamie Lynn ata "kintu na kimwe yigeze akora" kandi umuryango "ukunda kunyononera no kumbabaza". Jamie Lynn avuga ko amajambo ya Britney ari "ibinyoma vyeruye" kandi ko igihe cose yamye hafi ya mukuruwe. Uyu mugore w'imyaka 30 avuga ko buri gihe yama ariko agerageza gusigurira abana biwe "igituma umuryango wacu ubandanya uterwa ubwoba bwo kwicwa, nk'ingaruka y'amajambo yandikwa na inasenge wabo yo kuwagiriza ibintu bidafashe, cane cane mu gihe tuzi ko yetegerezwa kuvugisha ukuri". Britney amaze igihe anegura umuryango wiwe ku kungene wamufashe mu myaka 13 wamaze ari wo ujejwe amatungo yiwe, igihe amafaranga n'ubuzima bwiwe vyari mu minwe ya se wa Jamie. Urubanza rwagiye kurangirira muri sentare mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Jamie Lynn Spears avuga iki? Uyu mutoyi wa Britney yatanze ikiganiro ku mboneshakure ABC mu kiganiro Good Morning America (twogereranya na Mwaramutse Amerika) mu ntango z'iyi ndwi turiko turangiza asigura igitabo ciwe Things I Should Have Said (mu kirundi twovuga tuti: Ivyo nategerezwa kuba navuze). Iki gitabo kivugwa ko gisigura ubuzima bwiwe, harimwo n'isanganya umukobwa wiwe yagize rigahakwa kumutwara ubuzima mu 2017, imigenderanire yiwe na Britney hamwe n'ikibanza yari afise mu kubungabunga umutungo w'uyu muririmvyi. Muri ico kiganiro, Jamie Lynn yiyise "umufasha wa mushikanje akomeye cane" hanyuma avuga ko "yafashe ingingo zo gufasha" guhagarika ivyo kumubikira umutungo. Ariko nk'uko bivugwa na ABC, yavuze ko inyifato ya Britney muri kahise "itari itomoye", "irangwa n'ubwoba butagira ishingiro"  kandi ko yari "mahindagu". Yabwiye iki kiganiro ati: "Igihe hafatwa ingingo yo kumubikira amatungo yiwe, jewe nari mfise imyaka 17, nari hafi yo kwibaruka, rero jewe sinatahura ivyariko biraba, kandi sinavyitaho". Jamie Lynn abandanya avuga ko mushikiwe yamwegereye akamusaba nimba "yoshobora kumukurikiranira abahungu biwe bakaronka ivyo bakeneye", ivyo yamwemereye. Abandanya ati: "Ariko, urazi ko maze kumenya ko abikiwe umutungo, numva umengo sinashaka kubigiramwo uruhara gushika kumbure aho azobiviramwo. Rero si jewe namucungira amafaranga yiwe canke ibintu nk'ivyo, rero nimba vyari bimeze uko harabaya ukutumvikana, ariko gusa uko vyoba vyaragenze kwose, nta ngingo nafashe yo kuvyinjiramwo". Aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Britney yanditse ati: "Naravye muri terefone nca mbona ko mushikanje yatanze ico kiganiro mu kumenyekanisha igitabo ciwe. "Ibintu bibiri vyambabaje mushikanje yavuze ni ingene avuga ko inyifato yanje yari iy'ubutabanga. "Ntiyigeze aba hafi yanje mu myaka 15 iheze ico gihe... none mbega ni kubera iki twobizana atari uko ashaka kugurisha igitabo ciwe akoresheje izina ryanje". Britney avuga kandi ko akibabajwe n'ingene Jamie Lynn aherutse gusubiramwo indirimbo ziwe zamamaye. Uyu muririmvyi rurangiranwa wo mu mudiho wa pop w'imyaka 40 yanditse ati: "Ndazi ko abatari bake bashobora kuvyumva nk'ibitagira mvura, ariko nanditse indirimbo zanje nyinshi kandi mushikanje yari akiri uruhinja. Nta kintu na kimwe yari ashoboye gukora. Yama ahabwa ibintu vyose". "Namye ndi umuntu mukuru. Vyose barabikoze barankinisha, nkiyicarira aho hanyuma nkabifata uko". Yongerako ati: "Jamie Lynn, ndibaza ko ibintu ari vyiza n'igitabo cane". Jamie Lynn Spears nawe yahavuye yishura ku nyishu yatanzwe wa Britney, aho abwira abamukurikirana ku rubuga rwa Instagram ati: "N'ukuri, mvugishije ukuri, ibintu bivugwa nta kuri na gutoya kurimwo". Avuga ko igitabo ciwe kiterekeye Britney gusa, ariko akongerako ati: "Gusa sinohava mpakana ngo mvuge ko ntari mwene Spears, kandi ko bimwe mu vyo nzi mushikanje abifisemwo uruhara". Jamie Lynn, yamenyekanye canke mu rukurikirane rw'ibiganiro All That and Zoey 101 vy'imboneskakure Nickelodeon akaba yaranasohoye indirimbo yiwe, agaruka ku buzima bwiwe avuga ko bwabayemwo ibibazo bikomeye igihe kitari gito. Yandika ati: "Namye nkorana umwete udasanzwe kuva mbere nkiri umuyabaga, kandi narashoboye kwubaka umwuga wanje n'aho nitwa ko ndi mutoya wa mushikanje. "Si ndiko ndiyemera canke nishira hejuru, ariko ndiko mvuga ukuri kwanje kugira ngo nkire ibisebe mfise ku mutima, kugira ngo ibi bintu birangire hanyuma mbandanye nja imbere, kandi nipfuza ko na mushikanje yokora uko".

headline: Covid: Vladimir Putin avuga ko 'incanco za Sputnik zizewe nka Kalashnikov
text: Perezida Vladimir Putin avuga ko urucanco rushasha rwahinguwe n'Uburusiya "rwizewe nka ya nkoho ya Kalashnikov". Aya majambo yayavuze nijoro ku wa kane mu nama yariko agirana n'icegera c'umushikiranganji wa mbere Tatyana Golikova ku buhinga bwa videwo. Ayavuze mu gihe abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri ico gihugu bemeje ejo ku wa kane ubundi bwoko bw'urucanco rwa Sputnik V rutangwa nka doze imwe gusa, rukaba rwahawe izina rya Sputnik Light. Perezida Putin yagereranije urwo rucanco n'iyi nkoho yahinguwe ku butegetsi bw'aba Soviyeti (Union Sovietique/ Soviet Union) yabaye rurangiranwa mbere ibandanya ikoreshwa cane gushika ubu. Yasubiyemwo amajambo yavuzwe n'umuganga wo muri Autriche/Austria mu ntango z'uno mwaka igihe yavuga ku nguvu z'uru rucanco. Urucanco rwa Sputnik V rukora co kimwe n'izindi ncanco zakozwe n'amakompanyi Oxford/AstraZeneca na Janssen/Johnson & Johnson. Abanegura ubutegetsi bwa Putin bari bafise amakenga ko abajejwe kugenzura imiti i Moscou bihuse kwemeza uru rucanco mu mwaka uheze, ariko igerageza ryakozwe mu nyuma ryerekanye ko rukingira Covid-19 ku rugero runini cane. Ubwoko bwa mbere bw'uru rucanco rutangwa incuro zibiri bumaze kwemezwa mu bihugu bitari bike kw'isi. Uru rucanco rushasha rwa Sputnik Light, ubwoko bwa Sputnik V umuntu aterwa rimwe gusa, rwemejwe mu Burusiya ejo ku wa kane. Mw'itangazo basohoye, abarukoze bavuga ko doze imwe gusa ikingira uwurutewe ku rugero rwa 79.4%, aho hari mw'isekeza ryo ucandaga riheruka mu gihugu. Iri tangazo rivuga riti: "Uru rucanco rutangwa kuri doze imwe gusa rwatumye abantu benshi bakingirwa mu mwanya muto, ivyatumye urugamba rwo kurwanya iki kiza igihe cariko kirarandagata rutera imbere". Iyi ngingo yo kwemeza uru rucanco ije mu gihe impari ari nyinshi kw'isi nimba amahinguriro y'incanco yokuraho inzitizi kugira ngo ibindi bihugu kw'isi bishobore guhingura izi ncanco kugira ngo zibe nyinshi.

headline: Ubuhinde: Uruhagarara rufatiye ku madini rurimonogoje
text: Iki gikorwa co gusambura inzu z'aba-Islamu cakurikiye imyiyerekano y'aba-Islamu biyamiriza kwifatirwa mu gahanga kw'umuhanuzi wabo Muhammad, kwagizwe n'abanyepolitike...

headline: Covid-19: ingenzi ziva muri India ntizemerewe kwinjira muri Uganda
text: Kuva kuri uyu wa 01 z'uku kwa gatanu 2021, nta muntu yemerewe kwinjira muri Uganda avuye mu Buhindi gushika igihe ingingo izohindurirwa. Ingenzi zose zoba zari zimaze imisi 14 canke zaciye mu Buhindi, ata kuraba ngo zafashe inzira iyahe, ntizemerewe kwinjira muri Uganda. Iyi ngingo ifashwe inyuma y'aho iki gihugu gitoreye umuntu wa mbere yanduye ubwoko bushasha bwa Covid-19 buriko buriha inkumbi mu Buhindi. N'aho gushika ubu ubu bwoko bwa Covid-19 butaratangazwa ko ari ikibazo gihanze isi yose, umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu ayifata nk'ubundi bwoko bwa Covid-19 burangwa muri Nigeria, Ubwongereza na Afrika y'Epfo. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Uganda, Muganga Jane Ruth Aceng, avuga ko ata ngenzi n'imwe ivuye mu Buhindi azokwemererwa kwinjira mu gihugu, ata kuraba ngo yafashe inzira iyahe. Gusa, umuntu yinjiye mu gihugu imbere y'uko iyi ngingo ifatwa, akerekana urukaratasi rwerekana ko ata mugera w'iyi ndwara afise, arashobora kwinjira, ariko naho nyene agategerezwa kubanza gusubira gupimwa ashitse. Abazopimwa bagasanga baranduye bazotegerezwa gushirwa ukwabo mu bibanza vyatunganijwe na reta kandi bakimenya muri vyose. Abenegihugu bazoba bavuye kwivuza hamwe n'indege zitwara imizigo, ariko abakozi bazo bakaba batururuka ngo binjire mu gihugu, ntibafatwa n'iyi ngingo. Mu ndwi zitandatu zirangiye, Uganga yagiye ibona ibitigiri vy'abandura bigenda vyiyongera, umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu akagabisha ko ibi bishobora kuba vyerekana ko uwu mugera ugomba usubire wake indaro mu gihugu. Abanyagihugu bo mu bihugu bimwe bimwe nka Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Tanzania, Ethiopia, Turukiya, Afrika y'Epfo na Sudani y'Epfo basabwa kwirinda ingendo zitari ngombwa muri Uganda. Uganda yatanguje umugambi wo gucandaga abanyagihugu mu kwa gatatu mu ntumbero yo kubakingira Covid-19, ariko gushika ubu abantu 300.000 nibo bonyene bamaze kuronswa urucanco rwa mbere. Abajejwe amagara y'abantu, abaporisi, abasirikare, abatama hamwe n'abari hagati y'imyaka 18 na 50 ariko baboneka ko bafise ibibazo vy'amagara, niyo mirwi yacandazwe ubwa mbere. Abanyagihugu ntibashotse biyumvamwo izo ncanco mu gihe hari ubunebwe bwo gukurikiza za ngingo zo kwikingira harimwo nk'ukwambara udupfukamunwa n'ukwirinda kwegerana.

headline: Biden: 'Trump afatiye imbugita kw'izosi rya demokrasi ya Amerika'
text: Prezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Joe Biden, yagirije uwo yasubiriye Donald Trump kuba afatiye imbugita kw'izosi rya demokrasi ya Amerika. Ibi vyavuzwe na Prezida Biden ni ko kwifatira mu gahanga kwa mbere guhambaye amaze kugirira uyu haciye hafi umwaka asubiriye. Ibi yabivugiye mw'ijambo ryo kwibuka umwaha uhaciye habaye ukwahuka ingoro ikoreramwo inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka za Amerika, vyagizwe n'abashigikiye Bwana Trump. Muri iryo jambo, Prezida Biden yagirije Trump kuba akwirakwiza uruvangatirane rw'ibinyoma akanagerageza guhindura amateka. Yavuze ko kwanka kwa Trump kwemera ko yatsinzwe amatora vyateje umugumuko w'abantu bitwaje ibirwanisho. Yahimirije abanye-Amerika kurwanira amategeko n'ubutungane bakiyamiriza gukoresha igikenya hamwe  no gushira imbere inyungu bwite. Bamwe mu mugambwe w'aba Republicain utavuga rumwe na leta bagirije umukuru w'igihugu kuba yitwaje iyi sabukuru y'umwaka uhaciye habaye iyo migumuko, mu gushira imbere inyungu z'aba-Democrate bari ku butegetsi.

headline: Cristiano Ronaldo avuga ko yumva yahemukiwe na Manchester United
text: N﻿a Simon Stone BBC Sport Cristiano Ronaldo avuga ko yumva yahemukiwe na Manchester United (Man U) kandi ko ariko arirukanwa muri uyu murwi. Muri Myandagaro (8), Ronaldo yari yemeye gusigura ubuzima bwiwe i Old Trafford (ikibuga ca Manchester United) inyuma y’aho vyankiye ko ava muri uno murwi akimukira mu murwi ukina mw’ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League), nk’uko yari avyizeye. Uyu mukinyi w’inararibonye wa Portugal  yavuye mu gacerere mu kiganiro kirekire n’umunyamakuru Piers Morgan w’imboneshakure TalkTV yo mu Bwongereza. BBC yashatse kumenya aho umurwi Manchester United uhagaze kuri ibi bivugwa na Ronaldo ariko ntaco urashikiriza. Inyuma yo gutsinda Fulham kuri 2-1 mu rukino rw’ejo ku wa Mungu, Man U iza mu kibanza ca gatanu mw’ihiganwa ry’Ubwongereza, Premier League, muri uno mwaka wa mbere w’umumenyereza Ten Hag. Abajijwe nimba abarongoye Man U bariko bagerageza kumwirukana muri uno murwi, Ronaldo yavuze ati: “Ego, si umumenyereza gusa [Erik ten Hag], hari n’abandi babiri canke batatu mu murwi. Numva ko nahemukiwe”. Asubiye kandi kubazwa nimba abategetsi bakuru b’umurwi bariko bagerageza kumwirukana, uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 37 avuga ati: “Ntaco bimbwira. Abantu bategerezwa kwumva ukuri. "Ego, numva ko nahemukiwe, kandi numva umengo hari abantu batankeneye hano, si muri uno mwaka gusa, ariko kandi no mu mwaka uheze”. Ronaldo ntarasubira gukina kubera ingwara itazwi kuva aho Man U itsindiwe na Aston Villa 3-1 ku wa 06 Munyonyo (11) akaba ari we yari kizigenza. Mu kwezi guheze, Ten Hag yaranse kumukinisha muri Premier League igihe Man U ija gukina na Chelsea, hari haciye imisi itatu yanse kuja mu kibuga nk’umusubirizi. Ronaldo yabwiye Morgan ati: "Sindamwubaha kuko ntanyubaha. Mu gihe utanyubaha, sinzokwigera ndakwubaha”. Muri iki kiganiro, Ronaldo arabwira kandi Morgan ivy’urupfu rw’umwana wiwe w’umuhungu mu kwa kane n’ingene yakozwe ku mutima n’icubahiro abafana ba Liverpool bamuhaye mu rukino rwayihuje na Man U  i Anfield (ikibuga ca Liverpool) mu misi yakurikiye. Ikiganiro cose kimara iminota 90, ariko Morgan yakuyemwo inkuru ntoya yandikiye ikinyamakuru The Sun aho biboneka neza ko Ronaldo asuzugura ingene yasanze Man U imeze kuva agarutse mu murwi n’impundu nyinshi mu kwa munani 2021. Ati: "Nibaza ko abafana bakwiye kumenya ukuri. Nipfuriza ivyiza uyu murwi. Nico gituma naje muri Manchester United. "Kuva [uwahoze ari umumenyereza] Sir Alex [Ferguson] agiye, nta terambere nigeze mbona mu murwi. Nta na kimwe cahindutse. "Ndakunda Manchester United, ndakunda abafana, igihe cose bari ku ruhande rwanje. Ariko nimba bashaka kuyihindura…bategerezwa guhindura ibintu vyinshi, vyinshi”. Ronaldo avuga ko abona ibintu co kimwe na Ferguson, ari na we yagize uruhara rukomeye kugira ngo asubire i Old Trafford avuye muri Juventus igihe vyaboneka ko yashobora kwinjira muri Manchester City. Ronaldo yongerako ati: "Arazi gusumba abandi bose ko umurwi utari aho wategerezwa kuba uri. "Arabizi. Bose barabizi. Abantu batabibona…ni uko badashaka kubibona; ni impumyi”. Ole Gunnar Solskjaer yahoze akinana na Ronaldo ni we yari umumenyereza wa Man U igihe uyu munya-Portugal asubira mu murwi, imbere y’uko asubirirwa na Ralf Rangnick hanyuma hakaza uwuhari ubu, ari we Ten Hag. Rangnick yaje kumenyereza Man U avuye muri Lokomotiv Moscow aho yari arongoye igisata kijejwe ukwinonora imitsi. Imbere y’aho, yamenyekanye igihe yari mu Budagi, ari kumwe na Jurgen Klopp ubu amenyereza Liverpool, hamwe na Thomas Tuchel yahoze amenyereza Chelsea. Kuri Rangnick, Ronaldo avuga ati: "Mu gihe utari n’umumenyereza, ni gute woza kuba umumenyereza wa Manchester United? Sinigeze numva ivyiwe". Ronaldo kandi aragira ico avuze kuri Wayne Rooney bahoze bakinana muri Man U, uyu yahoze ari umusatirizi w’Ubwongereza akaba amunegura ku nyifato yiwe muri uno mwaka. Ronaldo  ati: "Sinzi igituma anegura cane…kumbure ni uko yahagaritse umwuga wiwe kandi nanje ngikina ku rwego rwo hejuru”. "Sinshatse kuvuga ko ndi mwiza kumusumba. Iki coco ni co…”

headline: Kubera iki abagabo n'abagore batokinana umupira w'amaguru?
text: Stephanie Labbe ni umukinyi azwi cane mu mupira w'amaguru kubera ubuhinga bwiwe nk'umunyegori. Urukino rwo ku munsi wa mbere aho  Canada yatsinda Kameruni igitsindo kimwe ku busa mw'ihiganwa ry'abagore ry'igikombe c'umupira w'amaguru uno mwaka wa 2019 rwagize urwa 30 amaze adatsinzwe mu nkino 62 akiniye igihugu ca Canada, hafi igice c'inkino amaze gukinira igihugu ciwe, ibintu bidasanzwe. Ariko izina rya Labbe ryaravuzwe cane mu bimenyeshamakuru aho mu mwaka wa 2018 agerageje kwinjira mu murwi w'abagabo witwa Calgary Foothills, mw'ihiganwa USL riri mu cicaro ca kabiri muri Canada. Uyo munyegori yarashoboye kwinjira muri uwo murwi, aranakina mbere no mu rukino rwa kivandimwe imbere y'uko ihiganwa ritangura, kandi ntiyigeze atsindwa igitsindo, imbere y'uko abajejwe ihiganwa bamubuza, ku mvo z'uko ihiganwa USL "rigenewe igitsina kanaka". Labbe, ubu afise imyaka 32 y'amavuko, niwe mukinyi wundi yinuba ikumirwa rishingiye ku gitsinda muri urwo rukino ku rwego rwo  hejuru. N'aho abarongoye umupira w'amaguru bashizeho imyaka ntarengwa ku mirwi y'urwaruka igizwe n'abahungu n'abakobwa bari hamwe, umwuga w'ugukina umupira w'amaguru uguma ari akarere ntagendwa. Mu 2004, ishirahamwe rijejwe umupira w'amaguru kw'isi, FIFA, ryatangaje ko "hategerezwa kuba itandukaniro hagati y'umupira w'amaguru w'abagabo n'abagore".  Aho hari inyuma y'aho umurwi Celaya wo mu cicaro ca kabiri c'ihiganwa ryo muri Mexique wankiwe gukinisha umukinyi w'umugore yitwa Maribel Dominguez. Fifa yafuse ingingo yari yafashwe n'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Mexique yaha uburenganzira Dominguez gukinira uwo murwi. Fifa yashimangiye ko ugutandukanya ibitsina ari ingingo ngenderwako mu mupira w'amaguru. Iryo shirahamwe ryavuze riti: "Amategeko y'amahiganwa yo hagati mu bihugu na mpuzamakungu arasigura neza amahiganwa ashingiye ku butandukane bw'ibitsina, kandi amategeko y'uwo mukino hamwe n'aya FIFA ntategekanya ko ivyo vyorengwako". Ivyo kandi niko n'abantu babibona, aho bavuga ko abagabo n'abagore batandukanye ku kuntu baremwe n'ubushobozi bwabo. Mu nkizo zimwe zimwe, haribonekezamwo ubudasa hagati y'abagabo n'abagore: icigwa cakozwe mu mwaka wa 2010 gitangazwa n'ikinyamakuru Journal of Sports Science Medicine cerekanye ibiranga abagabo n'abagore hisunzwe ibipimo bifatiye ku nkino za none za Olympique, aho casanze abagabo bashobora gusumvya abagore ku rugero rugera ku bice 40 kw'ijana. Hanyuma kandi, n'inkino zihuriyemwo abagabo n'abagore ntizikunda kubaho mu "nkino zikomeye" kw'isi. Ikiriho, mu mikino ya Olympic y'ici, barashobora guhiganwa mu mikino y'ukwiruka n'indogobwe canke y'ukugendesha ubwato. Eka hariho n'imikino ihuza abagabo n'abagore bavanganye, nka za tennis na badminton. Mu mwaka wa 2017, komite mpuzamakungu y'inkino za Olympiques (Comite International Olympique) yaratangaje ko mu nkino zizobera i Tokyo mu Buyapani mu mwaka wa 2020, hariho inkino zizohuriramwo bose nk'izo mu kwinonora imitsi, kwoga, kugendesha amakinga n'ukwiruka ahantu harehare. Ariko rero abahinga bavuga ko mu rukino rw'umupira w'amaguru ata tandukaniro rinini cane riri hagati y'abagabo n'abagore. Paul Bradley, umuhinga mu vy'inkino kw'ishure kaminuza  rya John Moore mu gisagara ca Liverpool, yakoze ivyigwa vyinshi ku bagore bakina umupira w'amaguru, harimwo n'ico yakoze mu mwaka wa 2013 aho yagereranya ingene abagabo n'abagore bakinye mu mahiganwa yahuza imirwi yabo yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya. Bradley n'umurwi wiwe yasanze harimwo ubudasa bukomeye mu nkino zisaba inguvu nyinshi - cane cane nko mu bijanye n'ukwiruka imetero nkeya. Ariko rero, ico cigwa casanze hariho n'abagore basumvya kure n'iyo abagabo. Uyo muhinga akaba yasanze muri rusangi abagore bagerageza kwinanata kugira ngo bashikire urugego abagabo bashitseko. Bradley yabwiye BBC ati: "Bivanye n'amahinduka akomeye mu mahiganwa y'abagore mu myaka mike iheze, turiteze ko hazoba iterambere mu bijanye n'ubukomezi bw'imibiri yabo". "Cane cane dufatiye ku kungene ukwinonora imitsi, ibijanye n'ubukomezi, imfungurwa n'ivy'abamenyereza vyateye imbere". Mu cigwa ciwe co mu mwaka wa 2013, vyabonetse ko abagabo basumbije abagore ibice bitanu kw'ijana uburebure birutse mu nkino zose, na 30 kw'ijana mu nkino zisaba inguvu nyinshi. Abakinyi b'imbaga nto, basa n'abafise amagara make kandi batiruka cane bamye batangaza abantu. Ku bihweza ibintu n'ibindi, ubu biraboneka neza ko ikibuga gikinirwako abagabo gishobora no gukinirwako n'abagore. Marta yabaye umukinyi wa mbere w'umwaka kw'isi incuro zitandatu niwe yoba akarorero: mu kwezi kw'icumi na kabiri guheze, uyo mukinyi w'igihugu ca Brezili yamenyesheje ko yari yiteguye gukina mu murwi w'abagabo mu gihe yobisabwa. Avuga ati: "Narakinanye n'abagabo incuro nyinshi bamwe muri bo ari barebare cane kandi bakomeye cane kunsumvya. "Ndazi ko bashobora kuntera ubwoba kubera inguvu zabo mu kibuga ariko ndazi ingene nshobora kubazunguruka nkoresheje ubwenge bwanje". Avuga ku vyamushikiye mu murwi  Calgary Foothills, Stephanie Labbe yaremeye ko abagabo nka bose bamusumvya imbaga. Yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP ati: "Nk'umunyegori, nibaza ko ari vyiza kuko uterwa imipira inyaruka, ikomeye, kandi umukino ugasanga uranyaruka". Ariko, iyo abategetsi batavyisukamwo, yari kwakirwa muri uwo murwi. Labbe yavuze ati: "Biragoye kwumva bakubwira ko udashobora gukina kubera ibituma birengeye ubushobozi bwawe". "Si ikintu nshobora kugira ngo ndagiye muhira ndacicarire canke ndagihindure. Igitsina canje ni igitsina canje". Federico Luzzi, umwigisha w'icigwa ca Philosophie kuri kaminuza ya Aberdeen (Ecosse) avuga ko ikumirwa rifatiye ku gitsina rya Fifa ari "akaga  mu mukino w'umupira w'amaguru kataboneka". Yanditse ati: "N'aho vyoba ari vyo ko ata mukinyi w'umupira w'umugore akomeye nk'umukinyi uwo ari we wese w'umugabo, si amashirahamwe ajejwe umupira w'amaguru yategerezwa kubuza imirwi y'abagabo gukinisha abagore ku mvo z'uko ata bushobozi bukwiye bafise". Abashigikiye iryo kumirwa bavuga kandi ko ari "ryiza" ku bagore, ngo kubera ko hari ivyigwa vyerekana ko abakinyi b'umupira b'abagore bokwandura imvune gusumba abagabo kubera ingene baremwe. Ariko, Jean Williams, umwigisha wo kuri kaminuza ya Wolverhampton avuga ko kubona ibihugu vy'Ubwongereza, Ubuholande, Ubutaliyano n'Ubudagi vyarongereje umwanya abana b'abahungu n'abakobwa bakinira umupira hamwe bakiri bato bizotuma hashika aho iryo kumirwa ritazoba rifise ikibanza. Avuga ati: "Inkino z'umupira zihuriyemwo bose bizotuma biboneka ko abagabo n'abagore bashobora gukinira hamwe. Bizogorana muri kazoza ko abantu bihanganira ikumirwa". "Turashobora kubona abagore benshi biyamiriza ikumirwa mu mupira w'amaguru. Ibintu vyinshi bizohinduka mu myaka cumi iri imbere".

headline: Pep Guardiola arahayagiza umukinyi Raheem Sterling avuga ko adasanzwe
text: Umumenyereza  wa Manchester City, Pep Guardiola, arashimagiza uruhara rw'umukinyi "adasanzwe" Raheem Sterling yatsinze ibitsindo bitatu vyose mu rukino rwayo rwa mbere n'umurwi West Ham ejo ku wa gatandatu mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza, Premier League. Uyo mukinyi yabonywe nk'uwudasanzwe n'umumenyereza wiwe yatsinze ibitindo bitanu mu nkizo za kivandimwe ziheruka, akaba yarabandanije uwo muvuduko ku munsi wa gatandatu. Guardiola ati: "Ndazi ubuhinga budasanzwe bw'uyu mukinyi, ubwitonzi, inguvu  n'ububasha bw'ugutsinda". "Ku gitsindo ca kabiri, umupira ntiyawufashe neza ariko yatsinze igitsindo ciza, ica gatatu coco cari ciza birengeje". "Aracari mu minsi ya mbere akina nk'umusatirizi, ariko ndizeye neza ko ico kibanza azogikinamwo neza cane, n'aho nzi neza ko ashobora gukina no ku zindi nomero z'imbere". Eka na Alan Shearer yahoze ari umusatirizi w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza yishimiye ubuhinga bw'uyo muhungu w'imyaka 24. Ati: "Iyo ari imbere y'igori, igitangaza conyene ni igihe adashoboye kwinjiza. Aratekanye kandi  ariyemera. Biragoye kumwaka umupira". "Ibiharuro vyo mu myaka ibiri iheze birateye ubwoba - ibitsindo 35, yongera atanga imipira yavuyemwo ibitsindo incuro 32". Hagati aho, Guardiola ashimangira uruhara rw'abandi bakinyi bakinana, akavuga ko Sterling umupira wanka iyo abo bakinana batavyifashemwo neza. Yongerako ati: "Mu gice ca mbere, yakinye nk'uko twariko dukina muri rusangi, hanyuma mu cige ca kabiri arakina neza nk'uko umurwi wose wariko urakina". "Nivyo koko ko ari abakinyi bafise ubuhinga bwinshi, ariko barakeneraniye nk'umurwi uri hamwe. Iyo abakinyi bateye baja imbere bagasatira, nawe akina neza cane". Mu rukino rw'ejo, Man city isanzwe ariyo yatsindiye ihiganwa riheruka,  yatsinze West Ham ibitsindo bitanu ku busa, harimwo ivyo bitatu vya Sterling.

headline: Japan yabonye uducafu twirabura mu rucanco rwa Moderna
text: Ubuyapani bwabaye burashira ku ruhande intekera (lot/batch) y'urucanco rwa Covid -19 kubera  agacupa gatowemwo uducafu. Umuhinga w'imiti (pharmacien) yabonye utuntu twinshi twirabura mu gacupa kamwe k'izo ncanco mu ntara (prefecture) ya Kanagawa, nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi. Abantu bashika 3.790 bari bamaze guterwa urucanco rwo muri iyo ntekera.  Izari zisigaye muri yo zabaye zirashirwa ku ruhande. Ivyo bishitse ata n'indwi iheze Ubuyapani buhagaritse ikoreshwa ry'incanco zirenga umuriyoni n'ibihumbi 600 za Moderna kubera zarimwo ubucafu. Uwo muhinga w'imiti yabonye utwo ducafu twirabura ariko arasuzuma ko ata bintu birimwo  ataho bihuriye n'izo ncanco imbere y'uko zikoreshwa. Uwusanzwe akwiragiza izo ncanco mu gihugu yaciye atwara ako gacupa gashobora kuba karimwo ubucafu. Ibinyamukuru vyo mu gihugu bivuga ko gushika ubu ata cemeza ko hari ingaruka mbi zihari  ku buzima bw'abantu ziturutse kuri urwo rucanco rushobora kuba rurimwo utwo ducafu. Takeda Pharmaceutical, ikigo kigurisha kikanakwiragiza urwo rucanco mu Buyapani, ku ndwi iheze cari cashize ku ruhande intekera  zitatu z'urwo rucanco inyuma y'aho bigaragariye ko zarimwo "ibintu ataho bihuriye narwo" mu ducupa tumwe tumwe tw'intekera yarimwo uducupa hafi ibihumbi 560. Ikigo ca Rovi co muri Espagne, arico gishira urwo rucanco mu ducupa, cavuze  mw'itangazo ko umurongo w'ihinguriro aho muri Espagne ushobora kuba ariwo wateye iyo ngorane. Congeyeko ko kiriko kirakora amatohoza. Ku wa kabiri, umushikiranganji w'Ubuyapani ajejwe amagara y'abantu yavuze ko uducafu twatowe mu ncanco mu ntara yo mu bumanuko ya Okinawa twavuye ku nshinge zinjizwa ukutariko mu ducupa. Ubuyapani busanzwe buhanzwe n'ukwiyongera kw'abandura   indwara ya Covid mu gihe ico gihugu kiriko kiraberamwo inkino za Olympic z'abagendana ubumuga (Paralympic). Ibikorwa vyo gucandaga mu Buyapani bisa n'ivyikweze, gushika ubu urugero rw'abamaze kuronka incanzo zuzuye rungana na 40%b na 50% bamaze kuronka urwa mbere gusa.

headline: Ghana yemeje abantu ba mbere banduye umugera wa Marburg wica cane
text: Ghana yemeje abantu babiri ba mbere banduye umugera wica cane Marburg kandi wandukira cane, ukaba uri mu muryango w’umwe utera Ebola. Iki gihugu kivuga ko aba barwayi babiri bompi baherutse gupfira mu bitaro vyo mu karere ka Ashanti kari mu bumanuko. Ibipimo vyari vyafashwe kuri aba bantu vyagarutse vyerekana ko bari banduye uwu mugera mu ntango za kuno kwezi, bikaba vyarapimwe biremezwa na laboratoire yo muri Senegal. Abajejwe amagara y’abantu muri ico gihugu co muri Afrika y’Uburengero bavuga ko abantu 98 bataramuwe inyuma yo kwikekwa ko boba barakoranyeko n’aba banduye. Nta muti gushika ubu urashobora kuboneka wo kuvura uwu mugera wa Marburg – ariko abaganga bavuga ko kunywa amazi menshi no kuvura ibimenyetso bizwi bishobora guha umurwayi amahirwe menshi gukira. Uwu mugera wandukira abantu uvuye ku buhungarema burya ivyamwa, ugakwirakwira uva ku muntu n’uwundi mu mazimazi y’uruhu. Ni indwara mbi cane kandi yica, ikaba ifise ibimenyetso birimwo kumeneka umutwe, umuriro, kubabara imitsi, kudahwa amaraso no kuva amaraso. Abategetsi bagabisha abanyagihugu ko bokwirinda kwegera amasenga kandi bagateka neza ibintu vyose bikomoka ku nyama imbere y’uko babifungura. Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y’abantu kw’isi OMS/WHO rivuga ko ivyaduka vyigeze kwibonekeza muri Angola, Repubulika y’Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, Kenya, Afrika y’Epfo na Uganda.  Icaduka ca Marburg cabonetse ubwa mbere mu Budagi mu 1967 aho abantu indwi bapfuye. Uwu mugera wahitanye abantu barenga 200 muri Angola mu 2005, iki kikaba ari co kiza kimaze guhitana abantu benshi kw’isi gushika ubu, nk’uko bivugwa n’iri shirahamwe rijejwe amagara y’abantu kw’isi.

headline: C﻿ristiano Ronaldo: Manchester United yafashe ivyemezo nyuma y'ikiganiro mu binyamakuru
text: Ubuyobozi bwa Manchester United buvuga yuko buriko burafata “ingingo zibereye” nyuma y’aho Cristian Ronaldo atangiye ikiganiro akavuga yuko “yagambaniwe n’iyi kipe”. Uyu musatirizi w’umunye-Portugal yavuze yuko ata “cubahiro” afitiye umumenyereza Erik ten Hag ngo kandi ariko arahindirwa kure ya Old Trafford. Mu rwandiko handitswe hati “Manchester United muri iki gitondo yafashe ivyemezo bibereye mu gusubiza ku kiganiro Cristiano Ronaldo aheruka guha ibitangazamakuru”. Iyo kipe nta bindi izorenzako gushika “ivyemezo vyafashwe bishitse ku musozo wavyo”. Nyuma y’ikiganiro cerekeye ibintu bitandukanye yagiranye n’umunyamakuru Piers Morgna wa TalkTV, kazoza ka Ronaldo muri Man United karacumbagira. Uwo mugabo w’imyaka 37 azoba ari kapitene wa Portugal mu gikombe c’isi i Qatar, urukino rwabo rwa mbere mu mugwi H rukazobahuza na Ghana ku munsi wa kabiri. Ntarasubira gukina kubera uburwayi butatangajwe kuva aho abereye kapitene mu rukino United yatsinzwe 3-1 na Aston Villa, itariki 6 Munyonyo (11). Ten Hag ntiyashize Ronaldo mw’ikipe mu rukino rw’ihiganwa rya Premier League aho bahura na Chelsea mu kwezi guheze, nyuma y’aho yankiye kwinjira mu kibuga nk’uwusubirira uwundi mu rukino na Tottenham, iminsi itatu imbere yaho. Aba Red Devils, baheruka gutsinda Fulham 2-1 kuwa Mungu, ni aba gatanu muri Premier League mu mwaka w’inkino wa mbere wa Ten Hag nk’umumenyereza w’iyi kipe.

headline: Ibitero vyo kuwa 11/9: Perezida Joe Biden aasaba abanyamerika gufatana mu nda
text: Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika asaba abanyagihugu gufatana mu nda mu gihe bibuka abaguye mu bitero vyo ku wa 11 z'ukw'icenda 2001. Mw'ireresi yaraye asohoye buca bahimbaza imyaka 20 irangiye, yunamiye abantu 2977 baguye muri ivyo bitero. Avuga ku bakozi bo mu gisata c'ubutabazi bihutiye gutabara inyuma y'ibi bitero, Perezida Biden yavuze ati: "Turaha icubahiro abo bose bemeye kwitanga, bagatanga ubuzima bwabo mu minota, amasaha, amezi n'imyaka yakurikiye". Ibirori vyo kwibuka ibi bitero bitegekanijwe kuri uyu wa gatandatu. Perezida Biden ati: "N'ubwo hahaheze igihe kingana iki, ibirori vyo kwibuka ivyabaye bigarukana ibintu vyose bibabaje vyabaye,  nk'aho umengo ni amakuru uronse mu masegonda make aheze". Aremeza ko inyuma y'ivyo bitero hakurikiye "inguvu z'umwijima ziri muri kamere y'umuntu - ubwoba, uburakari, inzigo y'akazikira n'ubukozi bw'ikibi ku ba Islam b'abanyamerka", ariko anavuga ko ubumwe bwabandanije kuba "inguvu nyazo" za Amerika. Ati: "Twaharonkeye icigwa ko ubumwe ari co kintu conyene kidategerezwa guhara". Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson nawe yavuze ko ivyo bitero vyananiwe no "guhungabanya inzira yacu y'ubwigenge n'intwaro rusangi". Mu bapfiriye muri ivo bitero harimwo  abongereza 67. Ibi bitero vyateguwe n'umuhari al-Qaeda wari ufise indaro muri Afghanistan,  vyatumye indege zine zunguruza abantu zifatwa mpiri n'abiyahuzi  - zibiri muri zo zisekwa ku minara ibiri (Twin Towers) y'ikigo rutura ca World Trade Center mu gisagara ca New York. Iyindi ndege yasetswe ku nyubakwa y'ibiro vy'ukwivuna abansi vya Amerika, Pentagon, biri hanze gato y'umugwa mukuru wa Amerika, Washington DC, hayuma iya kane igwa mw'ishamba mu ntara ya  Pennsylvania  inyuma y'aho ingenzi zari muri yo zirwaniye n'abiyahuzi bari bayifashe mpiri. Perezida Biden yiteze kurongora ibirori vyo kwibuka ibi bitero kuri uyu wa gatandatu akaba ategekanya kugendera ibi bibanza bitatu vyatewe ari kumwe n'umutambukanyi wiwe, Jill Biden. Haza kuba kandi ibihe bitandatu vy'agacerere bihuye n'ibihe iminara ya World Trade Center yaterwa igasenyuka, hamwe n'ibihe Pentagon yaterwa,  indege Flight 93 nayo igakoroka. Ibi birori bibaye mu gihe kitoroshe kuri uyu mukuru w'igihugu anegurwa bikomeye kuva mu ndwi nke ziheze, inyuma y'ugutahukana ingabo za Amerika, ingingo yarangije intambara ya Amerika muri Afghanistan yari yatanguye haciye ikiringo kidashika ukwezi inyuma y'ibitero vya 11 z'ukwa cenda. Perezida Biden yari yemereye abanyagihugu ko yategerezwa kuva muri Afghanistan imbere y'ihimbaza ry'imyaka 20 irangiye ibi bitero bibaye, akaba yanavuze ko bitari gushoboka ko aba Taliban bigarurira igihugu. Ariko, uyu muhari ugendera ku vyiyumviro vy'idini rya Islam wabanje kwigarurira igisagara gikomeye uza kurangiza wigaruriye umugwa mukuru mu misi itarenga cumi yonyene.

headline: Barcelona: Gerard Pique avuga ko hakenewe impinduka zikomeye inyuma y'agasuzuguro ka nijoro
text: Inyuma y'igihe kitari gito Barcelona yiganje mu mupira w'amaguru, haraciye igihe itsindwa mu buryo buteye isoni, ivyaraye bibaye nijoro vyo yo bikaba ari agahomerabunwa. Urukino rwa nijoro rwayihuje na Bayern Munich mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere I Bulaya (Uefa Champions League), aho Barça yaraye ikubiswe ibitsindo 8 kuri 2 vyatumye Gerard Pique avuga ko ari ngombwa ko haba impinduka zikomeye muri uyo murwi. Uyu mukinyi w'inyuma w'imyaka 33, yashoboye gufasha Barcelona gutsindira ibikombe 20 mu myaka 12 avuga ko bibaye ngombwa "ari we azoba uwa mbere kuva muri uyo murwi" mu gihe wobona ko ari co gikenewe. Barcelona yaraye itsinzwe mu buryo butari bwigere buyishikira ku mugabane wa Bulaya kuva igihe kitari gito, inyuma y'ihiganwa ryo mu gihugu hagati La Liga ryagiye kurangira Barça itakaje igikombe catahiye Real Madrid. Pique ati: "N'ukuri twaraye twigonze ku rutare". "Ntabwo ari ubwa mbere, canke ubwa kabiri, canke ubwa gatatu. Ntabwo turi mu nzira nziza." Abandanya avuga ati: "Abamenyereza n'abakinyi baragenda hakaza abandi, ariko mvugishije ukuri haraciye igihe kirekire tudafise inguvu z'ugushobora guhangana n'iyindi mirwi ku rugero rw'umugabane w'Ubulayi". "Nibaza ko twese hamwe dutegerezwa kwicara tukiyumvira hagati yacu icokorwa ku neza y'umurwi. Ibitubayeko ntibishobora kwihanganirwa". "Biragoye cane kwemera ariko nibaza ko bizodufasha kwiyumvira icokorwa, kuneza yacu twese". "Umurwi wacu ukeneye impinduka. Sindiko mvuga umumenyereza canke abakinyi, ariko umurwi wose muri rusangi ingene utunganijwe bitegerezwa guhinduka". "Turakeneye amaraso mashasha kugira ngo ibintu bihinduke, kandi bibaye ngombwa, noba uwa mbere kuva mu murwi". Harategekanijwe amatora y'umukuru w'umurwi muri Barça mu 2021 kugira ngo barondere uwusubirira Josep Maria Bartomeu. Umumenyereza wa Barcelona Quique Setien yagiye mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma muri Champions League ibintu bitameze neza na gato kuri we, inyuma y'amezi indwi yose yari amaze kuva mu kwa mbere asubiriye Ernesto Valverde umurwi ukaba utavyifashemwo neza muri ico gihe cose. Abajijwe ivyerekeye kazoza  k'umurwi n'ivyari bihejeje gushikirizwa na Pique, Quique Setien yishuye ati: "Si nshobora kuvuga igikenewe mu murwi, urazi ko maze amezi make cane". "Nimba Gerard avuga ko hakenewe impinduka zikomeye, aya ni amajambo akomeye cane. Harageze ko twihweza ibintu tugafata ingingo zikomeye kugira ngo twubake kazoza". Abajijwe nimba ikibazo ciwe gikenewe kwigwa nk'umumenyereza wa Barca, avuga ati: "Nibaza ko ubu nyene hakiri kare cane kuvuga nimba nzoguma mu murwi canke nzogenda. Ikiriho ni uko ibiba atari jewe ndabituma". "Ni ngombwa ko twese hamwe turabira hamwe igikenewe gukorwa, tukanigira hamwe ibintu vyose vyatumye tumaramara uku". Amahirwe yo kubandanya amenyereza uyu murwi inyuma y'ibara waraye ubonye i Lisbone ni make cane, mu gihe hari amakuru abandanya azunguruka avuga ko Barça yoba yaramaze gufatna ingingo yo kumwirukana. Chris Sutton yahoze akinira umurwi Blackburn Rovers mbere uyu murwi ugatsindira ihiganwa ry'u Bwongererza mu 1995 isumbije Man U inote rimwe rudende, yabwiye radiyo BBC Radio 5 Live ati: "Aragenda nta gisivya, ntashobora kubandanya". "Ntushobora kumaramazwa gutya nk'umumenyereza wa Barca. Ibibaye ni agasuzuguro karenze urugero". Mu bantu bavugwa ko bashobora kumusubirira, harimwo Mauricio Pochettino yahoze amenyereza Tottenham, hamwe na Ronald Koeman yahoze amenyereza Everton. Koeman, umumenyereza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubuholande 2018, yamaze imyaka itandatu akinira Barça hagati ya 1989 na 1995, mu gihe Pochettino amaze igihe atakazi afise kuva yirukanywe muri Tottenham mu kwa cumi na rimwe 2019. Umwanditsi w'umunya Espanye mu bijanye n'umupira w'amaguru, Guillem Balague , avuga ati: "Pochettino nta kazi afise kandi ni umuntu azi neza uyo murwi". "Umukuru w'umurwi Josep Maria Bartomeu na Pochettino basanzwe ari abagenzi". Kuva Setien atanguye kumenyereza uyo murwi mu kwa mbere uno mwaka, ntiyiyumviswemwo n'abantu benshi muri uyo murwi, mu gihe abakinyi bakomeye muri uyo murwi harimwo na Lionel Messi batigeze biyumvamwo ubuhinga yashaka kuzana mu murwi. Nibwo bwa mbere Barça itsinzwe ibitsindo umunani mu rukino rumwe kuva mu 1946 igihe Sevilla iyitera ibitsindo 8-0.

headline: Eritrea ‘yigaruriye ibigo vy'ubuvuzi vyegukira katolika’
text: Amakuru ashikira BBC igisata c'ururimi rwa Tigrinya, amenyesha ko leta y'igihugu ca Eritrea yategetse Ekleziya Katolika gushikiriza ibigo vy'ubuvuzi vyose bisanzwe vyegukira iryo dini. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, abategetsi basavye abarongoye ivyo bigo  gutera igikumu ku rwandiko rwemeza ko babishikirije. Ariko abarongoye ivyo bigo nka bose baranse gushira umukono kuri urwo rwandiko, basaba ahubwo ko bovugana n'abarongoye iryo shengero. Inyuma y'aho, abajejwe umutekano bategetse abakozi bavyo gusohoka, baca baravyugara. Nta wuzi igituma ubutegetsi bwa Eritrea bufashe iyo ngingo. Hagati aho, mu kwezi kwa kane uno mwaka, abasenyeri ba Ekleziya Katolika muri Eritrea barasavye ko hotanguzwa umugambi w'ukunywanisha mu gihugu, ivyotuma abanyagihugu bose batunganirwa. Mu rwandiko rw'impapuro 30 rwanditswe n'abo basenyeri inyuma y'amasezerano y'amahoro hagati y'ico gihugu na Ethiopia, bamenyesheje ko ari nkenerwa ko abanyagihugu bonywanishwa kugira ngo igihugu gikire. Basavye ubutegetsi ko bwogira impinduka zotuma abanyagihugu batipfuza guhunga igihugu.

headline: Ethiopia: Igisirikare cishe abantu 40 inyuma y'igitero cahitanye hafi 100
text: Igisirikare ca Ethiopia cishe abantu barenga 40 bakekwa kugira uruhara mu bwicanyi bw'abantu hafi ijana, harimwo abana, mu karere ka Benishangul-Gumuz, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ibinyamakuru vya reta. Izo nkuru zongerako ko abategetsi b'ubu n'abakera batanu na bo nyene bafashwe bagirizwa ubwo bwicanyi. Abateye baturiye amazu y'abantu baryamye mu bigwati, barabarasa bongera barabacumita mu gitero cabaye ku musi wa gatatu. Ico gitero cabaye inyuma y'umusi umwe umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed agendeye ako karere. Ntiharamenyekana abateye abo ari bo, ariko bigaragara ko batumbereye abo mu bwoko bw'inkehwa bafatwa "nk'abakoloni" muri ako karere, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu riharanira agateka ka zina muntu, Amnesty International. Muri iyi myaka ya vuba, muri Ethiopia hongerekanye imishamirano muri politike, mu moko hamwe no mu madini. Mu 2018, ico gihugu cari gifise igitigiri kinini c'abantu bahungiye hagati mu gihugu muri Africa - hafi umuliyoni 1.8. Amatati yagiye kwongerekana bivuye ku migwi isaba kwongererezwa amatongo n'ivyicaro, ari na ko banagerageza kwirukana abantu bafata ko atari imvukira. Abiy avuga ko ubwo bw'icanyi ari nk'akaga, kandi ko reta yarungitse igisirikare muri ako gace gufasha gutora inyishu y'iyo ntambara. Ibinyamakuru vya reta ntibivuga abo bantu 42 biciwe mu bikorwa vya gisirikare kiriko kirahiga abari bateye, abo ari bo. Inkuru zivuga ko ibigwanisho, harimwo imiheto n'imyampi vyafashwe. Icegera c'umushikiranganji wa reta ari mu bantu batanu bafashwe bafitaniye isano n'ubwo bwicanyi, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vya reta. Ariko, ntiharamenyekana neza na neza ico bagirizwa.

headline: Burundi-Covid: Prezida yasavye abanyeshure bose kwipimisha imbere yo gusubira mu mashure
text: Abanyeshure bose biga mu bigo vy'amashure y'uburaro mu Burundi kuva kuri uyu wa gatanu baripimisha coronavirus  mu mwiteguro wo gusubira ku mashure ku wa mbere, nk'uko vyatangajwe n'ubushikiranganji bujejjwe amagara y'abantu. Iryo sekeza ryerekeye abanyeshure bashika 30.000, abigisha babo n'abasanzwe babakurikirana mu buraro (encadreurs). Umwe wese muri abo ''azotegerezwa kuba afise  urupapuro rwerekana ko yipimishije'' imbere yo kwinjira mu kigo c'ishure ku wa mbere, nk'uko bivugwa n'umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu, Thadee Ndikumana. Iyo ngingo yatangajwe  inyuma y'aho bisabiwe n'umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi  Evariste Ndayishimiye. Prezida Evaritse Ndayishimiye yabivugiye mw'ikoraniro ryahuje urwaruka 1500 ruva mu ntara zose z'u Burundi kugira ruvugane ikibazo c'ukurwanya ubukene. Kuva mu ntango z'uyu mwaka, abandura coronavírus bariyongeye mu Burundi inyuma y'umwaka umwe iyo ndwara ivuzwe muri ico gihugu. Abitavye iryo koraniro bamwe bagaragara mu mafoto bafise  udufukamunwa n'ubwo hari abatwambaye mw'izosi,  ariko hari n'abatatwambaye. Prezida w'Uburundi yabwiye abitavye ikoraniro ati: ''Ndasavye y'uko mu gusubira mu mashure yanyu mwese mwogenda mwipimishije kugira mumenye ko mufise amagara meza kugira ntimuzoshike mwanduza abandi". Umukuru w'u Burundi  yavuze ko ashaka kwirinda ivyashitse igihe c'inyuma y'uburuhuko bwa Noel. Yagize ati: "Mwarabonye mu kiruhuko ca Noweli ingene vyabagendeye. Benshi bagiye banduye bashika banduza abandi babana mu mashure." Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze ko yamaze kubwira umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu  gutegura isekeza ryo gupima abanyeshure bose b'amashure yisumbuye imbere y'uko basubira ku mashure. Amashure mu Burundi azokwugurura icese ku wa mbere 12/4/2021 inyuma y'uburuhuko bwa Pasika. Ingingo zo kwirinda zimwe zubahirizwa nabi nabi Mu ntango z'uwu mwaka, abandura umugera wa coronavírus bariyongeye cane mu Burundi ugereranije n'imbere yaho bituma igihugu gikaza ingingo zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera. Gushika ubu winjira mu Burundi ari uko ugiye n'indege gusa, ariko iminsi yo gushika ushirwa ukwa wenyene mw'ihoteri iherutse kugabanywa iva kuri ndwi ishirwa kuri ine gusa. Izindi ngingo nko kwambara agafukamunwa  canke kwirinda kwegerana zubahirizwa nabi nabi. Gushika ubu kandi reta y'u Burundi nta gahunda ifise yo guha incanco za coronavírus abanyagihugu. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu yatangaje ko reta y'u Burundi yahisemwo kuba  irarindiriye, ivuga ko incanco ziriko zirakoreshwa gushika ubu  zitaremezwa burundu ko ata ngaruka mbi zishobora gutera ku magara y'abazihawe. Ku biharuro bitangwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu, mu  Burundi abamaze kwandura umugera wa corona ni ibihumbi 3.017 na 6 gusa umaze kwica. Abamaze kwandura no gupfa bashobora kuba barenga aho cane kuko  hatangazwa ibitgiri vy'abaciye  mu bigo vyo gupima canke kuvura bizwi icese.

headline: Amahano yo kuribwa n'imfyisi: Aba bahungu bari mu nzira yo gukira
text: Aba bahungu bahuye n'ivyago vyo kuribwa n'imfyisi ariko bagira Imana bararusimba. Inguma zabasigiye bazimaranye imyaka...

headline: U﻿kraine ibandanya gushora intete n'aho Uburusiya bwikuye mu masezerano
text: Ikigo gihagarariwe na UN/ONU kigenzura ingene intete zishorwa ziciye mu kiyaga cirabura ki vuga ko u﻿bundi bwato butatu bwahagurutse muri Ukraine ku musi wa kabiri, n'aho uburusiya bwafashe ingingo yo kwivana muri ayo amasezerano. I﻿co kigo kivuga ko ubwo bwato 'bwemerewe kugenda na Ukraine, Turkia na Onu, mu gihe uburusiya na bwo "bwabimenyeshejwe". K﻿u musi wa mbere, amato 12 atwaye amatone 354.500 y'ibifungurwa yarahagurutse muri Ukraine. U﻿burusiya bwahagaritse gushigikira ayo masezerano ku musi wa gatandatu, bwagiriza Ukraine gukoresha inzira ubwato bucamwo mu gutera  amato yabwo y'intambara. O﻿nu ivuga ko ata bwato na bumwe bwariko buraca muri iyo nzira muri iryo joro. U﻿kraine ntiyigeze yemanga kugira uruhara muri ico gitero ca Crimme  - izinga rya Ukraine riri mu bumanuko ryigaruriwe n'Uburusiya mu 2014. P﻿rezida wa Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky yagiriza Uburusiya "gukangisha inzara amakungu" - ivyo Uburusiya buhakana. I﻿co kigo gifise icicaro I Istanbul ntikiramenyesha ivyo ubwo bwato butatu bwavuye muri Ukraine ku wa kabiri bwikoreye. U﻿burusiya nta co buravuga kuri ivyo. U﻿muzigo wo kuri uyu wa mbere ni wo wambere munini utwaye ku musi umwe kuva ayo masezerano yo gutwara intete atanguye gushirwa mu bikorwa, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuvugizi w'ubutegetsi bwa gisirikare bwa Odesa aho yasubiwemwo na Reuters. Ubwo butegetsi bwongeyeko ko bumwe mu bwato butwaye amatoni 40.000 y'intete bwari bugenewe igihugu ca Ethiopia, aho "hashobora gutera amapfa." I﻿nyuma y'aho Uburusiya butereye Ukraine mu kwezi kwa kabiri, amato yabwo yaciye yugariza ibivuko vya Ukraine vyo ku kiyaga cirabura, bwugaranirayo imiliyoni 20 z'intete zigenewe gutwarwa hagati mu gihugu, harimwo n'ibindi bifungurwa nk'ibigori n'amavuta y'ibihoke. A﻿riko mu kwezi kw'indwi harabonetse amasezerano hagati y'Uburusiya na Ukraine bafashijwe na Turkia na Onu, bituma hashobora gusubira gushorwa intete ziciye mu kiyaga cirabura. A﻿riko ku musi wa mbere, prezida w'Uburusiya Vladimir Putin yavuze ko ayo masezerano yahagaritswe , avuga ko ari kubera ibitero "vyinshi" vy'indege zitagira umudereva ku mato yabwo ku bivuko vya Sevastopol aho yavuze ko Ukraine ibifisemwo uruhara. Y﻿avuze ko hategerezwa kubanza kubaho umutekano wo mu mazi, ko kwubahiriza amasezerano yo gushora intete bikimeze uko koba ari ukwigerezako. M﻿w'ijambo ryiwe ku mboneshakure, prezida Putin yagize ati:"Ukraine itegerezwa kubanza kwemeza ko ubwato butwara abantu butazogeramigwa." U﻿kraine ntiyemeje ko yagize uruhara muri ivyo bitero, ikavuga ko Uburusiya bwateguye kuva kera kwivana muri ayo masezerano mpuzamakungu, mu kugira icitwazo ivyo bitero. U﻿muvugizi w'ibiro vya prezida w'Uburusiya, Dmitry Peskov yagize ati:"Mu gihe Uburusiya buvuga ko bidashoka kwemanga umutekano wo muri ako karere, ayo masezerano aragoye gushirwa mu bikorwa, yafashe iyindi ntumbero - harimwo ukwigerezako kurengeje. U﻿kwikura muri ayo masezerano kw'Uburusiya kwatewe ivyatsi na Amerika, yavuze ko ico ico gihugu "kiriko kirakoresha imfungurwa nk'ikigwanisho". J﻿oseph Borrell ajejwe imigenderanire y'ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Buraya EU n'amakungu, yateye akamo Uburusiya kwisubirako, avuga ko kubuza urudandazwa rw'intete n'umwavu bishobora gutera ikibazo c'inzara kw'isi. U﻿wuserukira Uburusiya muri Amerika yamiriye kure ivyo vyagiriji ko igihugu ciwe kiriko kiratuma haba inzara kw'isi, yemeza ko ari akarenganyo kunebagura igihugu ciwe. U﻿burusiya bwafashe iyo ngingo mu gihe bwemeza ko bwaguye igikorwa co gukura abantu mu karere bwigaruriye ka Kherson, n'aho bwari bwavuze, mu mpera z'iyinga, bwari bwarangije ico gikorwa.

headline: Burundi – US: Prezida Joe Biden yavanyeho ibihano vyari vyarafatiwe Uburundi
text: Umukuru wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Joe Biden ku wa kane yafashe ingingo-tegeko ivanaho ibihano ico gihugu cari cafatiye Uburundi mu 2015 gishingiye  k'uko ibintu vyari vyifashe muri ico gihe. Ingingo itavugwako rumwe ya Prezida Pierre Nkurunziza yo kwitoreza ikiringo ca gatatu c'umukuru w'igihugu mu 2015 yakurikiwe n'intureka ziturutse ku myiyerekano yo kuyanka hamwe n'ibikorwa vy'inzego z'umutekano vyo kuyitesha. Abantu amajana barishwe abandi ibihumbi barahunga igihugu. Prezida Biden avuga ko iyo ngingo yafashe ku wa kane ishingiye ku bimaze guhinduka mu nzira nziza kuva hashitse ku butegetsi umukuru w'igihugu mushasha. Prezida Biden avuga ko ibintu mu Burundi ''vyahinduwe cane n'ivyabaye mu mwaka uheze" harimwo guhererekanya ubutegetsi inyuma y'itorwa rya Evariste Ndayishimiye mu 2020, ukugabanuka kw'intureka, hamwe no "kubandanya impinduka mu bisata bitandukanye". Ku butumwa yanditse kuri Twitter, umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi Evaritse Ndayishimiye yakiriye neza iyo ngingo y'umukuru wa Amerika yo kuvana ibihano ku gihugu arongoye. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga. Ibihano ku Burundi  vyari vyafashwe ku ntwaro ya Prezida Obama mu 2015. Ico gihe hari abantu bane bari bafatiwe ibihano ku giti cabo. Barimwo Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni, ubu asigaye ari umushikiranganji wa mbere muri reta ya Evariste Ndayishimiye. Mu 2015, Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni yari umushikiranganji ajejwe umutekano. Bamwe mu bari mu nzego z'umutekano bagirijwe uruhara mu mahano atandukanye muri ico gihe c'intureka. Uwundi mutegetsi mu nzego z'igihugu yari Godefroid  Bizimana yari icegera c'umuyobozi mukuru ajejwe igiporisi. Bandi babiri bari abaza kw'isonga mu bashatse gutembagaza ubutegetsi mu 2015: Jenerari Godefroid Niyombare n'umuhisi Jenerari Cyrille Ndayirukiye. Harongeweko n'abandi mu nyuma. Barimwo  Gervais Ndirakobuca ubu ajejwe ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati , umutekano n'iterambere rusangi.  Hari na  Joseph Mathias Niyonzima azwi cane mu rwego rw'iperereza mu Burundi. Harinwo kandi  Alexis Sinduhije na Leonard Ngendakumana ku ruhara  mu guteza umutekano muke mu Burundi. Ntibari bemerewe guhabwa uruhusha rwo kwinjira muri Amerika, amatungo yabo nayo yari yarafatiriwe. Iyo nkuru nziza kuri reta y'Uburundi Amwe mu mashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka zina muntu  ashobora kutayakira neza. Ni mu gihe avuga ko Prezida Ndayishimiye ataco arakora gifadika ngo agateka ka muntu kubahirizwe, akavuga ko ivyaha birimwo kwica, kunyuruza no kwica rubozo n'ubu bikibandanga mu gihugu na cane cane ku batavuga rumwe n'iyo reta. N'ishirahamwe rya Buraya ryarafatiye ibihano Uburundi kubera ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu  ryandurutse kuri izo ntureka za poritke. Iryo shirahamwe na reta y'Uburundi bamaze umwaka urenga baganira ingene ivyo bihano vyovaho. Ishirahamwe rya Buraya rivuga ko bigeze ku "ntambwe ikomeye". Mw'itangazo, icegera c'umukuru w'urwego rw'imari muri Amerika Wally Adeyemo avuga ko "Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zibona impinduka nziza ziriko ziragirwa na prezida Ndayishimiye mu gihe zibandanya guhimiriza Uburundi guteza imbere ibijanye n'agateka ka zina muntu mu gihugu n'uko abakora amabi babibazwa."

headline: Indonesia: Abarenga 170 baraye bapfuye mu kajagari kadutse mu mupira w’amaguru
text: Abantu n’imuburiburi 174 nibo bamaze kumenyekana ko bapfiriye mu musunikano wadutse igihe hariko haba urukino rw’umupira w’amaguru, rimwe mu masanganya mabi cane kw’isi amaze kubera mu kibuga. Ababa 180 barakomerekeye muri uwo musunikano inyuma y’aho umurwi Arema FC utsindiwe muhira  2-3  n’umurwi w’abakeba ruhebwa wa Persebaya Surabaya muri ico kibuga cari carengeje  abantu mu karere ka Malanga, intara ya East Java. Ibi vyabaye igihe abapolisi batera ivyuka bikoroza amosozi abafana bari binjiye mu kibuga ku mugoroba  w’ejo ku wa gatandatu. Umwe mu mabibonye, yitwa Dwi, yabwiye ikinyamakuru Kompas co muri Indonesia gikorera ku rubugua ngurukanabumenyi  ko yabonye “abantu benshi bahonyanzwe” bariko bagerageza guhunga. Umushikiranganji ajejwe umutekano muri ico gihugu avuga ko ico kibuga, ku bantu bangana na 38.000 categerezwa kwakira carengejeko 4000. Perezida Joko Widodo yategetse ko inkino zose zitegekanijwe mw’ihiganwa ryo mu cicaro ca mbere muri Indonesia zihagarara gushika amatohoza arangiye. Ishirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru kw’isi, FIFA, rivuga ko “ata vyuka” bikwiye kwinjizwa canke gukoreshwa n’abazamu canke abapolisi mu gihe c’inkino. Amavidewo yerekana abafana biruka mu kibuga ifirimbi ya nyuma ivugijwe, ari naho igipolisi caca gisukira ivyuka bikoroza amosozi. Nico Afinta arongoye igipolisi muri East Java avuga ati: "Haciye haduka akajagari. Batanguye gutera abapolisi, bamenagura amamodoka”. Yongerako y’uko aba polisi babiri bari mu bapfuye. Ati: "Twashaka kumenyesha ko…atari bose bateye akajagari. Ni abababa 3000 gusa binjiye hagati mu kibuga”. Yongerako y’uko mu guhunga, abafana "biteye ku muryango umwe gusa w’isohokero. Abantu babaye umurengera, rero mu musunikano bamwe babuze impemu”. Amavidewo yahanahanywe ku mbuga hwaniro yerekana abafana burira ku mpome z’uruzitiro mu guhunga, ayandi mavidewo yerekana abantu bapfuye barambaraye hasi. Ishirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru rya Indonesia (PSSI) rivuga ko ryatanguje amatohoza, rikongerako y’uko iri sanganya “ryacafuje ishusho y’umupira w’amaguru muri Indonsenia”. Imigumuko mu gihe c’inkino z’umupira w’amaguru si ikintu gishasha muri Indonesia, kandi Arema FC na Persebaya Surabaya ni abakeba kuva kera. Abafana ba Persebaya Surabaya barabujijwe kugura amatike muri uru rukino ku bwoba bw’uko bari guteza akajagari. Ariko umushikiranganji w’umutekano Mahfud MD yanditse kuri Instagram ko amatike 42.000 y’urwo rukino yagurishirijwe ku kibuga ca Kanjuruhan. Perezida Widodo yasavye ko iri riba “isanganya rya nyuma mu mupira w’amaguru mu gihugu” inyuma yo gutegeka ko inkino zose zo mu cicaro ca mbere zibangira mu kurindira amatohoza. Muhamad Dipo Maulana w’imyaka 21, yari yagiye kurorera urwo rukino, nawe avuga ko yabonye ingene vyose vyatanguye n'ingene vyabandanije. Yabwiye igisata ca BBC gikoresha ururimi rw’iki-indoneziya ko inyuma y’uru rukino, abafana bababa batandatu ba Arema binjiye mu kibuga baja aho abakinyi bayo bari kugira ngo berekane akababaro kabo. Ubwo nyene igipolisi caciye kibahagarika, kirabakubita gushika aho bagwa hasi. Niho abandi bafana baca binjira mu kibuga biyamiriza ingene aba bapolisi bakubise aba bafana bagenzi babo, gushika aho ibintu biba “urudubi”, nk’uko uyu yavyiboneye abivuga. Dipo avuga kandi ati: "Abapolisi bafise imbwa n'inkinzo, hamwe n'abasirikare baciye ba banguka". Dipo avuga ko yabonye abantu bataye umutwe, buzuye ubwoba vyanka n’uko bahema mu gihe bariko bagerageza kuva mu kibuga. Avuga kandi ko hari n’abana benshi hamwe n’abatama ibi vyuka vyagizeko ingaruka mbi. Aka kajagari niko gaheruka mu rukurikirane runini rw’amasanganya mabi amaze kubera mu bibuga. Mu 1964 abantu bashika 320 barapfuye abandi nabo barenga 1000 barakomereka mu kajagari kadutse mu rukino rwo kurondera itike yo mu nkino za Olempike hagati ya Peru na Argentina rwabereye i Lima, umugwa mukuru wa Peru. Mu 1985, abantu 39 barapfuye abandi nabo 600 barakomereka ku kibuga ca Heysel i Buruseri (Bruxelles/Brussels ) mu Bubirigi, igihe abafana basunikiwe ku rukuta rugaca rubomoka, hari mmu rukino rwa nyuma rw’igikombe ca Bulaya hagati ya Liverpool yo mu Bwongereza na Juventus yo mu Butaliyano. Mu Bwongereza, harabaye uguhonyorana ku kibuga ca Hillsborough mu karere ka Sheffield, bituma abafana 97 ba Liverpool bari bagiye kurorera urukino rw’igice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma rw’igikombe ca FA (FA Cup) rwayihuza na Nottingham Forest bahasiga ubuzima.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Guardiola, Ward-Prowse, Haaland, James, De Jong, Dembele, Reguilon
text: Manchester City irizeye ko umumenyereza wayo Pep Guardiola azotera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha mu ci, mu gihe ibiganiro bibandanya n'uyu munya Espagne kugira abandanye amenyereza uyu murwi gushika mu 2015. (Sunday Mirror) Manchester City na Manchester United yompi iripfuza kugura umukinyi wo hagati w'umwongereza James Ward-Prowse asanzwe akina muri Southampton, ni mu gihe  Arsenal, Newcastle United na Tottenham ibandanya ikurikirana ingene ivy'uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 27 bigenda. (Daily Star on Sunday) Umusatirizi wa Manchester United na Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo ashobora gusubira muri  Real Madrid. Uyu murwi w'igihangange wo muri Espagne uripfuza cane kugura uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 37 yahoze awukinira kuva mu 2009 gushika 2018. (Sunday Mirror) Manchester City na Manchester United iriko irarwanira umukinyi w'inyuma wa Espagne Pau Torres w'imyaka 25 asanzwe akina muri Villarreal. (Todofichajes - in Spanish) Erik ten Hag mu misi yiteze gusezera  Ajax kugira aje kumenyereza Manchester United mu mpera z'uno mwaka w'inkino, aripfuza kugura umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu muri Feyenoord umunya Hollande Tyrell Malacia w'imyaka 22 kugira aje gukinira uyu murwi wa Old Trafford. (Sunday Mirror) Chelsea ifise impungenge ko muwongereza akina hagati Mason Mount ashobora kuva muri uyu murwi. Kubera ibihano reta yafatiye uwahoze ari nyene umurwi, aba ba Blues ntibashobora guha amasezerano mshasha uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 23, ni mu gihe Manchester City na Liverpool izwi ko imwipfuza.  (Sun on Sunday) Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa Borussia Dortmund Hans-Joachim Watzke avuga ko uyu murwi wanesheje  Manchester United mu rugamba rwo kurondera Erling Haaland muri Kigarama (12) 2019 kubera bari biteguriye gushira mu masezerano n'uyu mukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Norvège w'imyaka 21 umurongo umuha uburenganzira bwo kugenda mu gihe abishakiye.  (Goal) Chelsea iriko iraraba ingene, mu gihe yoronka abandi bayigura, yogiriranira amasezerano meza n'umwongereza Reece James w'imyaka 22 akina inyuma ku ruhande rw'i buryo, mu gihe avugwa ko aronderwa na Real Madrid. (90 Min) Umukinyi wo hagati w'umunya Hollande Frenkie de Jong avugwa ko aronderwa na Manchester United ariko umumenyereza wa  Barcelona Xavi avuga ko uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 24 ari we "kubu na kazoza" k'uyo murwi wo muri Espagne.  (Manchester Evening News) Umusatirizi w'umufaransa Ousmane Dembele w'imyaka 24 abona ko yoronka umushahara mwiza cane mu gihe yokwimukira muri Paris St-Germain gusumba uwo ahembwa muri Barcelona, ariko yipfuza kuguma muri uyu murwi wa Nou Camp aho amasezerano afitaniye nawo azorangira mu ci. (Sport) Real Madrid izohitamwo gutanga imiriyoni 40 z'ama euro kugira ngo yisubize umunya - Espagne Sergio Reguilon w'imyaka 25 akina inyuma muri  Tottenham. (Todofichajes - in Spanish) Wolves iriteguye kugurisha umunya Portugal akina hagati Ruben Neves w'imyaka 25, mu gihe irondera kugura abasatirizi n'abandi bakinyi bo hagati. (Sunday Times - subscription required) Crystal Palace iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano yo kugura umukinyi wo hagati akina muri Lens mu Bufaransa, umunya - Mali  Cheick Doucoure w'imyaka  22. (Sun on Sunday) Everton iripfuza kugura umwongereza akina inyuma  James Tarkowski w'imyaka 29 mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye na Burnley azorangira mu ci, mu gihe uyu murwi wa Goodison Park usanzwe utorohewe wokwinanata ukaguma muri Premier League. (Football Insider) Crystal Palace, Watford ma  Fulham iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi w'inyuma wa FC Koln, umudagi Timo Hubers w'imyaka 25 asanzwe kandi aronderwa na  Leeds United. (Football Insider) Newcastle United yemereye umwongereza akina hagati Sean Longstaff w'imyaka 24 amasezerano y'imyaka ine, mu gihe ayo afitaniye n'uyu muwi azorangira mu ci.  (Sunday Times - subscription required) AC Milan yemeranije na Lille kugura umunya - Portugal akina hagati Renato Sanches w'imyaka 24, ku miriyoni 20 y'ama euro be n'uturusho tugera ku miriyoni zitanu z'ama euro nyene. (Football Italia) Umunya Hollande akina inyuma Sven Botman w'imyaka 22, ariko araronderwa na Newcastle United hamwe na AC Milan mu gihe avuga ko yiteze ko uno mwaka ari wo wa nyuma kiniye Lille. (Get French Football News)

headline: Ibirenge vya kiremwa muntu vyariyongereye ubunini mu myaya 40 iheze
text: Ibirenge vya kiremwa muntu vyariyongereye ubunini mu myaya 40 iheze.

headline: Arsenal 2-0 Man U: Intsinzi ya mbere y'umumenyereza Mikel Arteta
text: Mikel Arteta yaraye aronse intsinzi ya mbere kuva atanguye kumenyereza umurwi wa Arsenal mu rukino rwa nijoro rwari rugize gatatu akinishije uwo murwi kuva abaye umumenyereza wayo. Muri urwo rukino, Manchester United, yatanguye neza, ariko ibintu bikaba vyaje guhinduka mu nyuma kuva ku munota w'umunani, aho Nicolas Pepe yatsinda igitsindo ca mbere ca Arsenal ku mupira yari ahawe na Sead Kolasinac. Igice ca mbere cagiye kurangira biboneka ko Arsenal ariyo yiganziye cane umupira, ifise ibitsindo bibiri ku busa bwa Man U, kuko ku munota wa 42 , Sokratis Papastathopoulos yatsinze igitsindo ku mupira wari utewe na Pepe mu mfuruka z'ikibuga. Arsenal yari imaze gukinira ku kibuga cayo inkino indwi zose ariko ata na rumwe ishobora gutsinda, aho vyaboneka ko yari ifise ingorane. Kuva Arteta afashe uwo murwi mu minwe, biraboneka ko hari icahindutse kuva mu nkino zitatu amaze gukinisha, zibiri zose adashobora gutsinda, ivyatuma hari abibaza nimba koko ariwe mumenyereza yari akwiriye kumenyereza Arsenal. Ku munsi wa Mungu uheze, Arsenal yatsindiwe ku kibuga cayo n'umurwi wa Chelsea, mu rukino abatari bake babona ko yari gushobora gutsinda. Mu nkino zibiri z'imbere y'aho, yanganije n'imirwi ya Everton hamwe na Bournemouth, ariko mu rukino rwa Everton akaba yari umurorerezi gusa. Mu rukino rwa nijoro abakinyi ba Arsenal baraboneka ko bari bashashaye intsinzi imbere y'umurwi wa Manchester United. Eka na Mezut Ozil yari agize iminsi atavyifatamwo neza yakinye n'ishaka ridasanzwe, akaba mbere ariwe yagize ibirometero vyinshi gusumba abandi bakinyi ba Arsenal muri urwo rukino, aho yagize ibirometero 11.54. Mi gice ca kabiri ibintu ntivyoroshe kuri Arsenal kuko abakinyi ba Ole Gunnar Solskjær basatiriye bimwe biteye ubwoba Arsenal, ariko baravyifashemwo neza cane ntivyabagendera nk'ibiheruka igihe Chelsea ibakubita ibitsindo bibiri vyose mu minota indwi ya nyuma. Manchester United yakinye ibuze umukinyi wayo ruremesha Paul Pogba, aboneka ko atorohewe kubera imvune imutumye amara amezi atatu yose adatanguzwa mu kibuga. Urwo rukino ruheze, umumenyereza wa Manchester United yamenyesheje ko uyo mukinyi akomoka mu Bufaransa yakomeretse ku jisho ry'ikirenge bigashobora kumutuma amara ikiringo c'indwi hagati ya zitatu na zine adahonyoye mu kibuga. Kuva mu mwaka wa 2017 inyuma y'imyaka ishika 20, Arsenal ntirigera isubira kurangiza ihiganwa iri muri zine za mbere, bikayituma idashobora gukina mw'ihiganwa ry'imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya (Uefa Champions League). Ibizigizi abakunzi bayo bari bafise mw'ihiganwa ry'umwaka uheze vyaje kuvamwo amarira aho mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Europa League batsindiwe bikomeye na Chelsea 4-0. Uko gutsindwa kwarababaje cane abakunzi ba Arsenal kuko iyo ikaramuka itsinze urwo rukino iba iri muri Champions League. Mu gihe hasigaye inkino 17 ngo ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza rirangire, Arsenal izoshobora kurangiza iri muri zine za mbere mu gihe ubu iri mu kibanza ca cumi n'amanota 27 gusa?

headline: Coronavirus: Impari ku muti kama wa Madagascar
text: Madagascar ivuga ko yatoye umuti uvura coronavirus ariko OMS yoyo ivuga ko gushika kuri ubu "ata cemezo na kimwe" cerekana ko uwo muti ushobora "gukinga canke kuvura" coronavirus. Ku wa mbere 20/04, umukuru w'ico gihugu Andry Rajoelina yaratangaje umuti avuga ko ushobora gukinga ukanavura umugera coronavirus. We nyene ubwiwe yaranyoye uwo muti ukozwe mu biti kama anatangaza ko uwo muti mu minsi uzoboneka mu gihugu cose kugira ngo uvure coronavirus. N'aho yawutangaje ku mugaragaro, umuryango ujejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO uvuga ko ata bushakashatsi bwakozwe n'abahinga kugira ngo bemeze nimba koko uwo muti wa Madagascar uvugwa ko uvura Covid-19 ukora vy'ukuri. Eka n'ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe ubuvuzi (ANAMEM) kirafise amakenga kuri uwo muti wakozwe n'ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe ubushakashatsi (IMRA). Ikigo NAMEM kivuga ko uwo muti - Covid-Organics - ushobora kuzogira ingaruka mbi ku magara y'abazowihereza kuko ata "bushakashatsi bwakozwe kugira ngo bwemeze uwo muti". Uyo muti kama Covid-Organics uhabwa ku buntu abantu ba ntahonikora. Uyo muti ukozwe mu giterwa citwa artémisia - igiterwa gihingurwamwo umuti uvura malaria - hamwe n'ibindi biterwa vyo muri Madagascar. Ugurishwa mu macupa nk'icayi (tisane) inyuma y'aho bawugeragereje ku bantu badashika 20 mu kiringo c'indwi zitatu, nk'uko umukuru w'ibiro vya Perezida, Lova Hasinirina Ranoromaro, yabibwiye BBC. Igihe Covid-Organics  itangazwa ku wa mbere, Perezida Rajoelina yavuze ati; "Uwo muti warageragejwe - hari babiri bari barwaye barawiherezaubu barakize". "Uwo muti wo kunywa nk'icayi uvura mu kiringo c'iminsi indwi gusa". Andry Rajoelina yasavye abanyagihugu ko bonywa uwo muti mu ntumbero yo kwikingira. Ari imbere y'abaserukira ibihugu vyabo muri ico gihugu n'abandi banyecubahiro yavuze ati: "Abanyeshure bategerezwa kuwihereza….buke buke umunsi wose". Aciye kuri Twitter, Bwana Rajoelina avuga ko yanaronse ubutumwa bwo kumukeza buvuye kwa mugenziwe wa Republika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, Félix Tshisekedi "kuri uwo muti kama Covid-Organics". Dr Charles Andrianjara arongoye ikigo IMRA, avugako Covid-Organics yokoreshwa mu buryo bwo kwikingira. Hagati aho, agumana amakenga kw'ikoreshwa ry'uwo muti mu kuvura iyo ndwara, akavuga ariko ko ubushakashatsi bw'ikiganga bwerekana ko "uwo muti usa n'uwushobora gukiza iyo ndwara", nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP risubiramwo amajambo yiwe. Iryo zinga ryo mw'ibahari Indiano rimaze kumenyesha ko abashika 121 ari bo bamaze kwandura coronavirus, ariko ko ata n'umwe irahitana. Inyuma y'itanguzwa ry'ikoreshwa rya Covid-Organics, OMS yasohoye itangazo aho ivuga ko gushika kuri ino saha "ata cemezo na kimwe" cerekana ko uwo muti wakorewe muri Madagascar ushobora "gukinga canke gukiza" coronavirus. Uyo muryango urahagarara cane ku majambo yashikirijwe n'umukuru wawo, Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, aho avuga ko "ata nzira ya hafi" iriho mu ntambara na coronavirus. Yongera ko y'uko hari ibikorwa vy'igerageza biriko biraka kw'isi mu ntumbero yo kurondera umuti nyawo. Umupfasoni Ranoromaro umukuru w'ibiro vya perezida wa Madagascar, avuga ko umukuru w'igihugu Rajoelina yari azi neza ko OMS itegerezwa kwubahiriza amategeko ayigenga, ariko y'uko ico gihugu catangaje uwo muti mu bwigenge bwaco. Ati: "Ni igikorwaciwe co kwitaho abanyagihugu ba Madagascar". Umwigisha wa kaminuza, Brian Klaas, akaba n'umuhinga ku bibazo vya Madagascar ku kigo ca  kaminuza ca Londres, abona ko ibivugwa na Bwana Rajoelina bishobora guteza ingorane ku banyagihugu hakubazanira urukiza. Yabwiye ikiganiro Newsday ca BBC ati: "Ni ingorane kubera ibituma bibiri - ica mbere ni uko abantu bazonywa Covid-Organics mu gihe bidakenewe". "Ubwa kabiri ivyo bizotuma abantu bibaza ko bakomeye, bikazobatuma bijajara bakitwara uko batategerezwa, ivyo navyo bikazobashira mu ngorane nini cane, eka banazitere na bagenzi babo". Avuga ko mu gihe iyo ndwara yokwiragira cane mu gihugu, abantu bashobora "gutikira" kubera ubuvuzi muri ico gihugu atako bwifashe, nayo igihugu kikaba gifise za mashini zifasha abarwayeguhema zitandatu gusa, ku bantu bangana n'imiliyoni 27. Mu kwa gatatu, ikigo c'igihugu citaho amagara y'abantu gifise icicaro muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, caragabishije kw'ikoreshwa ry'ivyo abantu bibaza ko ari imiti ivura coronavirus, cane cane ikozwe mu biti kama- aho cavuze ko inzira nyayo yo kwirinda kurwara ari ukwirinda kwandura uwo mugera.

headline: US yasubije igihugu ca Cuba ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bifasha iterabwoba kw'isi
text: Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zasubije Cuba ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bifasha iterabwoba kw'isi, afatiye ku ngendo y'iki gihugu c'abakomunista yo gushigikira Venezuela. Ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Donald Trump butangaje iyi ngingo mu gihe hasigaye imisi imparurwa ngo ave muri Maison Blanche/White House. Mu gihe yiteze gushikirizwa ubutegetsi ku wa 20 z'uku kwa mbere, umukuru w'igihugu aherutse gutorwa Joe Biden yaravuze ko yipfuza gukomeza imigenderanire hagati ya Amerika na Cuba. Cuba ivuga ko iyi ngingo "ifise imvo za politike". Biden avuga ko ariko ararondera ubucuti bwa hafi n'iki kihugu camaze imyaka itari mike gihanganye na Amerika, ariko rero iyi ngingo ya Trump ikaba ije gusa n'iyibangamira utwigoro two kunagura iyi migenderanire. Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko ivyo gushira Cuba kuri uru rutonde ari ibintu bishobora gufata amezi kugira ngo vyemezwe. Iri zinga ryo mu mazinga ya Karayibe ryari ryakuwe kuri uru rutonde na Perezida Barack Obama mu 2015, ariko Trump akaba yahavuye afata ingendo itoroshe na gato ku bijanye n'iki gihugu. Igihe bariko barasigura iyi ngingo, abategetsi bavuga ko yafashwe kubera Cuba ishigikiye umukuru w'igihugu ca Venezuela, Nicolas Maduro, atemerwa na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Mw'itangazo ryiwe ejo ku wa mbere, umunyamabanga wa Reta, Mike Pompeo, yavuze ati: "Muri iyi ngingo, reta ya Cuba itegerezwa kuvyishura kandi ihabwe ubutumwa: ubutegetsi bwa Castro butegerezwa guhagarika gufata mu mugongo iterabwoba mpuzamakungu kandi ikareka kugarariza ubutungane bwa Amerika". Mu nyishu yatanze, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Cuba, Bruno Rodriguez, yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Turiyamirije iyi ngendo y'ukwikunda n'ubwibone mu gufata ko Cuba ari igihugu gifasha iterabwoba nk'uko vyatangajwe na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika". Imbere y'uko iyi ngingo itangazwa, umushingamateka w'umu Democrate, Gregory Meeks yayise ko ari "akandi kigoro ka Perezida Trump na Pompeo, ko kugerageza kubohera amaboko imugongo ubutegetsi bwimirije bwa Biden mu gihe bariko baragenda". Mu nteguro za  Biden harimwo kwemerera Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Cuba gushobora kugendera imiryango yabo no kuyirungikira amahera. Perezida Obama yatanguye kunagura imigenderanire na Cuba mu 2015. Ico gihe yavuga ko utwigoro twa Amerika twamaze imyaka mirongo two kugerageza gukumira iki gihugu "ataco twashitseko". Kuva muri ca gihe c'intambara y'ukwikekana (Guerre Froide/ Cold War), Amerika yabandanije ifata ingingo zitandukanye zo gukumira Cuba yafata nk'umwansi rutura. Ubu rero Cuba ihambije ibindi bihugu biri kuri uru rutonde rw'ibihugu bifasha iterabwoba, harimwo Irani na Koreya y'Uburaruko. Mu ngaruka z'iyi ngingo kuri iri zinga, harimwo igabanuka rikomeye ry'abashoramitahe mpuzamakungu muri ico gihugu.

headline: Lionel Messi yashoboye gutsindira Copa America aho Argentina yaraye itsinze Brazil muri finale
text: Inyuma y'igihe kirekire cane yari amaze arindiriye, Lionel Messi arashoboye kwigina intsinzi y'igikombe ca mbere mpuzamakungu gikomeye, aho Argentina yaraye ikubise Brésil mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Copa America ku kibuga ca Maracana i Rio de Janeiro. Messi, umusatirizi w'imyaka 34 yarikubise hasi mu munezero ntangere ifirimbi ya nyuma ivuze, bagenziwe bamuhundarako, imbere y'uko bamuterera mu kirere bongera bamusama mu kwigina iyo ntsinzi yo ku rwego rwo hejuru  kuri we mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu. Yafashije kandi Argentina kurangiza igihe c'imyaka 28 yose yari imaze irindiriye ikindi gikombe kuva aho igiherukira, yongera agenwa nk'umukinyi w'ihiganwa inyuma y'ibitsindo bine yinjije muri iryo higanwa. Angel di Maria niwe yinjije igitsindo ciza arovye umunyegori, igitsindo cahaye intsinzi Argentina ya Messi, ku mupira yari ahawe na Rodrigo de Paul. Messi, kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina, yaranaronse akaryo ko gushimangira iyo ntsinzi ku munota wa 88 ariko rero aranyerera umupira uca uramwiyaka ari imbere y'igori. Kuri Brésil, ari nayo yari isanzwe ifise ico gikombe, ntivyari bimeze neza cane rwose, aho amahirwe yayo abiri akomeye ari aya Richarlison na Gabriel Barbosa ariko umunyegori Emi Martinez akababera ifuro ry'igiti. Umukeba wiwe Neymar, ariko bahoze bakinana muri Barcelona, yapfukamye n'akorora amosozi ifirimbi ya nyuma ivuze, mu gihe na we akirondera kwandikisha amateka ku rwego mpuzamakungu, ni mu gihe mu mwaka wa 2019 igihe  Brésil itahukana iki gikombe wewe atakinye kubera imvune. Ibi bihangange bibiri mu mupira w'amaguru, bakinanye i Nou Camp hagati ya 2013 na 2017 imbere y'uko uyu munya  Brésil yimukira muri Paris St-Germain, barahoberanye umwanya muremure mu gihe bari bakirindiriye ko Argentina ishikirizwa igikombe. Rwari urukino rwarorerewe n'abantu bake, abashika 7000, kubera ingingo zo kurwanya Covid-19. N'aho abarorerezi ba Brésil  bari bake, ijwi ryabo ryarumvikanye, cane cane igihe cose Messi yaba afashe umupira, bamuzomera banamushinyaguriza. Iri higanwa ryacerejwe umwaka wose kubera coronavirus, mbere n'ibihugu vyategerezwa kuritegurira hamwe, Colombia na Argentina, birahindurwa, maze ritegurwa na Brésil yari yateguye irya 2019, ingingo yaneguwe cane kubera naho nyene coronavirus yari yaganguye. Messi yari amaze imyaka 15 yose akinira Argentina mu mahiganwa akomeye. Inyuma y'amahiganwa ane y'igikombe c'isi yose hamwe n'ayandi atandatu ya Copa America (ihiganwa rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu ku mugabane wa Amerika), mu nkino 53 zose, ubu niho we - n'igihugu ciwe -  bagiye baronka amahirwe bari bararindiriye igihe kirekire amaso agahera mu nzira. N'aho ari umwe mu bakinyi banditse amateka kandi beza mu gihe ca none - aho yatahukanye ibikombe cumi vyose vya La Liga muri Espagne, ibikombe bine vya Champions League ku mugabane wa Buraya, hamwe n'imipira y'inzahabu (Ballons d'or) itandatu yose -  abatari bake bagumye bibaza ibibazo bitari bike ku bushobozi bwiwe kubera atari bwerekane ikibanza ciwe mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu. Messi yaragize umubabaro udasanzwe nk'umukinyi w'igihangange ariko bikanka ko igihugu ciwe gitahukana ihiganwa rikomeye nk'iri, mbere hararagera n'igihe atanga imihoho mu nkino mpuzamakungu  imbere y'uko yisubirako - aha hari mu 2016 igihe Argentina ikina finale ariko igatsindwa ku ncuro igira kabiri yikurikiranya. Mu kwa cumi na kabiri 2022, Messi arafise ayandi mahirwe yo kwerekana - ku myaka 35 - ubuhinga bwiwe mu gisa n'amahirwe ya nyuma yo kurondera gutsindira igikombe c'isi yose - Argentina ikaba iheruka kugitahukana mu 1986.

headline: Tanzania: Prezida Samia Suluhu yemeje ko hariho igihuhusi ca gatatu ca Corona
text: Prezida wa Tanzania Samia Suluhu Hassan yemeje ko  hari ibimenyetso vy'igihuhusi ca gatatu ca Corona muri  ico gihugu. Avugira mu gisagara ca Dar Es Salaam mu nama yagiranye n'abagize inama y'abasenyeri ba Katolika muri Tanzania (TEC), prezida Samia yavuze ko hari ibimenyetso hagati mu gihugu ko ico kiza kiriho. Yagize ati:"Nk'uko tubizi ubu kw'isi yose yariho igihuhusi ca gatatu ca Corona, twavuye mu gihuhusi ca mbere muri Tanzania cagiye kirahera buke buke, tuja mu ca kabiri, ubu naho twinjije mu gihuhusi ca gatatu." Prezida Samia yavuze 'ibimenyetso hagati mu gihugu vyatanguye kwibonekeza, tuza dufise abagwayi bamaze guhura n'iki gihuhusi ca gatatu'. Yasubiye kwibutsa urugendo yagize ku bitaro vya Mwananyamala mu gisagara ca Dar es Salaam. "Nimwaba mwibuka umusi nagendera ibitaro vya Mwananyamala, hari icumba umuganga yanyinjijemwo ambwira ko harimwo abagayi bafise ingorane yo guhema, ndamubwira nti dudurirako, ni Covid? "Aca ambwira ati ego ni Covid, mu gihe abafata amasanamu bari bamaze kwinjira, nca ndabahamagara nti nimuveyo n'ingoga." Uretse kuvuga ko hari igihuhusi ca gatatu ca Corona, prezida Samia, yasavye ko hoba ukwiyubara kuri ico kiza candukira cane ca corona.

headline: Umunywanyi w'umugambwe CNL mu Burundi yishwe, batandatu barakomereka
text: Umunywanyi w'umugambwe CNL yarishwe abandi batandatu barakomereka mu gitero cabaye ku banywanyi babo mu ntara ya Muyinga, mw'ijoro ry'ejo ku wa Mungu nk'uko bivugwa n'uyu  mugambwe. Terence Manirambona avugira uwo mugambwe avuga ko abo banywanyi batewe bari mu nzira bataha mu gihe bari bavuye mu birori vyo kwugurura ingoro y'uwo mugambwe ku mugwa mukuru w'intara ya Muyinga. Avuga ko batumva ingene ivyo vyama biriko biraba kandi abajejwe umutekano bakwiragiye hose, hakaba hari n'amakomite avugwa ko ahurikiyemwo bose. BBC yagerageje kuvugana n'abajejwe umutekano b'Uburundi ku vyabaye kuri aba banywanyi ba CNL ariko kugeza ubu ntibirashoboka. Umugambwe CNL uvuga ko abanywanyi bawo babandanya bakorerwa amabi atandukanye harimwo uguhohoterwa, uguterwa ubwoba, ugupfungwa ata mategeko yubahirijwe, ugusinzikarizwa ubuzima, n'amarementanya. Bwana Manirambona amenyesha ko abo banywanyi babo batewe n'abantu bafise imipanga, ibihiri n'amacupa babarengeramwo barabatemagura, bicamwo uwitwa Nsavyumwami Gregoire. Avuga ko abatewe bashika 300 bariko basubira muri komine Giteranyi, bakaba barashoboye gufatamwo batatu mu bakoze ico gitero bashikirizwa inzego z'umutekano. Bwana Manirambona avuga ko abatewe batatabawe, kuko abajejwe umutekano bagiye kuhashika ibara ryaguye. Avuga ko ivyaraye bibaye bifitaniye "isano n'ibigize iminsi biba irya n'ino mu gihugu vyo gushaka gusomborotsa no kwigenza ku banywanyi b'umugambwe CNL". Hampande y'ivyaraye bibaye i Muyinga, mu gihe hari hasanzwe hategekanijwe kwugururwa ingoro zishika icenda zo muri komine Muha mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, ico gikorwa nticabaye. Bwana Manirambona avuga ko mu gihe indongozi zariko zirategura ico gikorwa zatewe zirakubitwa, ziranyagwa n'amatelefone, ariko guca basivya ico gikorwa inyuma y'ukuvugana n'abarongoye igisagara ca Bujumbura. Avuga ati: "Twama twituye ubutungane ariko ikibabaje ni uko usanga umengo bifatwa minenerwe, ugasanga nta nyishu iboneka mu gihe bibandanya bifata umurindi". Arongera ati: "Bisa n'uko ababikora bakingiwe nk'uko umengo hari integuro kanaka, kuko biboneka ko harimwo abantu bakingirwa ikibaba". Mu mezi abiri, ingoro 18 za CNL ziramaze kwononwa, ziraturirwa, zirabomorwa, zirasigwa amadasahurwa, izindi nazo zirafutanganywa ivyandiko. Umugambwe CNL uvuga ko ivyo uriko urakorerwa vyerekana ukutihanganiranira mu vya politike. Ubutegetsi bwo buvuga ko abakora amakosa nk'ayo bayakora ku gatwe kabo, kandi ko bategerezwa guhanwa ku gatwe kabo. Terence Niyongabo avugira ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati yabwiye radiyo y'igihugu ati: "Ivyo tubona muri kino gihe, ni inkozi z'ikibi zikora ububisha irya n'ino. Asaba ko haba ugukorana mu nyabune kugira ngo abakora ayo mabi bashikanwe imbere y'ubucamanza.

headline: Passports za Covid: Zikora gute kw'isi?
text: Uko iminsi ihera, niko ibihugu biba vyinshi mu kwiyumvira gukoresha urupapuro rw'inzira, murekarengane, canke passeport ya Covid, nk'uburyo bwo kwugururira no kurekura abantu ngo batembere. Bene izo passeports zikunze kuboneka umuntu aciye kuri app (application) yo kuri telefone ngendanwa yiwe  canke hamwe hamwe hakanatangwa iz'impapuro zisanzwe. Ibihugu bimwe bimwe biramaze gushiraho passeports zavyo za Covid zemerera abantu kuja mu manza canke ibirori bihuriramwo abantu benshi. Ariko mu gihe hari ibihugu bikiri inyuma cane mu bijanye no gutanga incanco, hari ubwoba ko bimwe bizosigara inyuma.  Aha turaraba ingene ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyatunganije ikibazo c'ama passeports y'urucanco n'ibijanye nazo. Gushika ubu, "ibibanza vy'urugero runini rwo gushobora kwandura" nk'inzu z'ubutambiro ntibisaba icemeza ko watewe urucanco. Ariko, umushikiranganji wa mbere Boris Johnson yatangaje imigambi y'uko "kuba warakwije incanco bizoba ngombwa kugira winjire mu mazu y'ubutambiro n'ibindi bibanza bihuriramwo abantu benshi cane" kuva mu mpera z'ukwezi kw'icenda. Hisunzwe izo ngingo nshasha, abantu bazokwerekana ko bakwije incanco bakoresheje ikimenyetso bahabwa na app y'ikigo NHS. Ico kimenyetso ca NHS - canke ikimeze nk'ico mu bindi bice vy'Ubwongereza (UK) - kizotuma abantu bakuze bakwije  incanco badasabwa kwikumira iyo bagarutse bava mu bihugu biri ku rutonde rw'ibisaba abantu kuguma ukwa wenyene iminsi cumi no kwipimisha corona kabiri muri ico kiringo (amber-list countries).
