Ariko n'ubwo boba bafise ico kimenyetso, bazotegerezwa guca baguma ukwabonyene i muhira iwabo bashitse mu Bwongereza mu gihe  bavuye mu Bufaransa. Ku bwa reta, ibihugu birenga 30 birimwo Ubugiriki na Espagne ubu biremera ico kimenyetso ariko abagifise bategerezwa kubanza kuraba neza amategeko yo kwinjira iyo bagomba kuja imbere yo gufatisha itike kandi bakaguma basuzuma imbere yo gufata urugendo. Passeport y'urucanco y'ibihugu vya Buraya igiye gushirwaho mu bihugu 27 bigize iryo shirahamwe - hongeweko Ubuswise , Islande, Norvège na Liechtenstein. Abanyagihugu bo muri ivyo bihugu bashobora gukura iyo passport kuri app canke bakaronka iy'urupapuro - ata mafaranga batanze. Ishobora kuronkwa kandi n'abanyamahanga bafise uburenganzira bwemewe n'amategeko bwo kuba muri ivyo bihugu. Kubera Ubwongereza butakiri muri iryo shirahamwe, iyo passeport nta Bongereza benshi bashobora kuyironka. Urwo rupapuro rushobora gutangwa iyo umuntu yaronse urucanco, aheruka gupimwa bagasanga nta Covid afise canke aheruka gukira uwo mugera. Uwariwe wese afise urwo rupapuro  ubundi ntaheza ngo asubire gupimwa canke ngo ashirwe ukwa wenyene iyo ajabutse urubibe mu bihugu bigize EU. Ibindi bihugu bigize ishirahamwe navyo birafise impapuro zavyo bwite zihabwa abaronse urucanco. Abategetsi bashizeho urupapuro ruzoha uburenganzira abantu bwo kwinjira mu mazu y'uburiro, ubunywero, indege hamwe n'amatereni (gariyamoshi). Gushika ubu, ibibanza bihuriramwo abantu barenga 50 vyaratanguye gusaba icemeza ko waronse urucanco canke urupapuro rw'uko ata Covid bagusanganye mu bipimo. Iyo murekarengane (pass) izosabwa abantu bose bakuze kuva mu kwezi kw'icumi ariko harimwo n'abana barenza imyaka 12 kuva itariki 30 z'ukwezi kw'icenda. Kugira uronke urwo rupapuro, abantu bategerezwa kwerekana ko bakwije incanco, ko bapimwe mu minsi mike iheze bagasanga nta mugera bafise canke ko baherutse gukira umugera. Kw'itariki 24 ukwezi kw'indwi, hafi abantu ibihumbi 160 baragize imyiyerekano mu gihugu biyamiririza iyo murekarengane ya Covid n'ingingo y'uko abakozi bo kwa muganga bategerezwa guterwa incanco. Israel yashizeho murekarengane y'urucanco mu ntango z'uyu mwaka. Yasaba abantu kwerekana icemeza ko baronse incanco canke ko barwaye umugera mu minsi ya vuba. Iyo murekarengane yatumye ibitigiri vy'abiteza incanco vyiyongera, cane cane mu bakiri bato. Ibiharuro vy'abandura bimaze kugabanuka, abategetsi baciye bafata ingingo yo kuvanaho iyo ndinganizo. Ariko ubu reta yatangaje imigambi yo kuyisubizaho mu gihe ibiharuro vy'abandura vyasubiye kuduga. Indinganizo nshasha izotuma abantu barenza imyaka 12 baronse incanco, baherutse gukira Covid canke bapimwe ntibatorwe uwo mugera, bashobora kuja mu manza canke ibirori vy'abantu benshi no kwinjira ibibanza bimwe bimwe bigenewe bose, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru Times of Israel. Iyo murekarengane nshasha yari gutangura gukoreshwa kuva itariki 29 z'ukwezi kw'indwi. Iyo murekarengane izokora ku biteramo vy'akaranga n'inkino, inzu zo kunonoreramwo imitsi (gym), inzu z'uburiro, ahabera amanama (conference), ahagenderwa na ba mukerarugendo hamwe n'ibibanza vy'amasengesho. Ubushinwa bwashizeho indinganizo ya QR code mu mwaka uheze ishira abantu mu migwi hakoreshejwe amabara atandukanye. Ibara ry'urwatsi rubisi rirekurira abantu gutembera ata na hamwe bimiriwe, mu gihe umuntu afise ibara ry'umuhondo ashobora gusabwa kuguma i muhira mu kiringo c'iminsi indwi. Izo QR codes ziba zirimwo amakuru ku rugero rwagutse hamwe n'ayatangwa n'abazikoresha ubwabo. Vyinshi mu bibanza bigenewe uwariwe wese mu Bushinwa birasaba abantu kwerekana QR yabo kugira bemererwe kwinjira. Mu kwezi kwa gatatu Ubushinwa bwashizeho urupapuro rw'amagara rwo mu buhinga bwa none (digital) rwerekana niba uwurufise yaricandagishije canke atarabikora hamwe n'icavuye mu bipimo. Urwo rupapuro n'abanyamahanga bashobora kururonka mu Bushinwa co kimwe n'Abashinwa. Hizigiwe ko Abashinwa bazoshobora kurukoresha nka murekarengane y'urucanco mu bindi bihugu muri kazoza. Ntiharamenyekana ibihugu Ubushinwa buriko buravugana navyo kugirango urwo rupapuro rwabwo rwemerwe. Ibihugu vyinshi vyahisemwo kudashiraho murekarengane y'urucanco. Mu kwezi kwa kane, ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu (White House/Maisom Blanche) vyamenyesheje ko hatazoshirwaho passeport y'urucanco ku rwego rw'igihugu, bivuga ko uburenganzira bw'abanyagihugu ku mabanga y'ubuzima bwabo butegerezwa gukingirwa. Ariko hari ama reta ane afise apps z'urucanco zikora, nk'uko vyerekanwa na MIT Technology Review. Ariko hari n'ayandi ma reta yahisemwo gushiraho ingingo zayo zo kugerageza kuduza urugero rw'abateza urucanco. California izosaba abakozi ba reta bose hamwe n'abakozi bitaho amagara y'abantu  kwerekana ikigaragaza ko batewe urucanco canke bace bapimwa buri ndwi guhera mu kwezi kuza. Igisagara ca New York kizokurikiza ingingo isa n'iyo kuva mu kwezi kw'icenda hagati mu gusaba abakozi b'igisagara - harimwo abaporisi n'abigisha - kwiteza urucanco canke gupimwa buri ndwi. Gushika ubu, abantu batewe urucanco muri Australia barafise urupauro rwo mu buhinga bwa none (digital) mu materefone yabo ariko nta burenganzira bujanye narwo. Umushikiranganji w'ico gihugu ajejwe ubukerarugendo Dan Tehan yavuze ko passeport y'urucanco ishobora guha abantu ''uburenganzira bwo gushobora gusohoka imbibe iyo hari ingingo zo kwiyugarana canke iyo hari ibice vy'intara biri mu ngingo zo kwiyugarana, kubera icaduka c'indwara". Yanavuze ko kwongera ukwishira no kwizana abatewe urucanco bishobora gutuma abandi barwiteza.

headline: Russia: abarenga 3000 bahagaritswe mu myiyerekano yo gushigikira Navalny yabaye mu gihugu cose
text: Igiporisi c'Uburusiya cahagaritse abantu barenga 3000 mu gihe bariko bararwanya imyiyerekano yo gushigikira wa munyaporitike atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi, Alexei Navalny, nk'uko bivugwa n'abagenzuzi. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi birengagije igiporisi cari cameze magabo maze biha amabarabara mu myiyerekano minini itari iherutse yo kwiyamiriza Perezida Vladimir Putin. Ku mugwa mukuru Moscou, igiporisi kijejwe gutuza imigumuko cerekanywe kiriko kirakubita kinaburuta abari mu myiyerekano. Navalny, umunyaporitike anegura cane Perezida Putin, yarahamagariye imyiyerekano amaze guhagarikwa ku wa Mungu uheze. Yahagaritswe atahutse i Moscou avuye i Berlin mu Budagi aho yari amaze igihe kirekire avurirwa inyuma y'aho aherewe isumu mu Burusiya mu kwezi kw'umunani umwaka uheze. Ubwo nyene acururuka, yaciye ajanwa mu gasho yagirizwa ko yarenze amategeko ajanye no kurekurwa vy'agategano. Avuga ko ari irementanya kugira ngo bamuzivye. OVD Info, ishirahamwe ryigenga rikurikiranira hafi ibijanye n'imyiyerekano, rivuga ko abantu hafi 3100 ari bo bahagaritswe, abarenga 1200 bakaba bahagaritswe i Moscou. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu, Kremlin, ntaco biratangaza. Iyi myiyerekano itari yemewe yabaye mu bisagara hafi 100 mu Burusiya bwose, kuva mu buseruko na Siberia gushika i Moscou na St Petersburg. Abari muri yo ni kuva ku banyeshure bakiri bato gushika ku batama basaba ko Navalny arekurwa. Abashika 40.000 bagiye muri iyo myiyerekano hagati muri Moscou, ibiharuro bigereranywa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters. Ariko umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati avuga ko ari 4000 gusa. Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi, bavuga ko igitigiri c'abitavye iyi myiyerekano mu gihugu cose kitari bwabeho, nayo iyabereye ku mugwa mukuru ikaba ari yo minini cane mu kiringo c'imyaka hafi icumi. Mu kibanza citiriwe Pushkin ku mugwa mukuru, abari mu myiyerekano baririmba bati "Rekura Navalny" hamwe na "Putin, tuvireho!" Umugore umwe yabwiye BBC ko yafashe ingingo yo guhamvya abandi muri iyo myiyerekano kubera "Uburusiya bwahindutse ibohero". Sergei Radchenko, umwe mu bari mu myiyerekano i Moscou afise imyaka 53, yabwiye Reuters ati: "Ndarambiwe n'ukwama ndi mu bwoba.  Si naje kubw'iwanje no kubwa Navalny, ariko kubwo umuhungu wanje kubera ata kazoza kari muri kino gihugu". Lyubov Sobol, umufasha akomeye wa Navalny amaze gucibwa ihadabu kubera guhimiriza Abarusiya kuja muri iyo myiyerekano, yacishije ireresi kuri Twitter yerekana abaporisi bamuburuta mu gihe bariko bamubuza kugiriranira ikiganiro n'abanyamakuru. Umugore wa Navalny, Yulia, nawe yahagaritswe umwanya muto igihe yari muri iyo myiyerekano. Bamwe mu bari muri yo bashitse kw'ibohero Navalny apfungiwemwo kandi risanzwe ricungerewe cane, benshi muri bo bakaba bahagaritswe. Imbere y'uko iyo myiyerekano itangura, abategetsi b'Uburusiya bari bagabishije ko bayituza n'inguvu zabo zose.  Mu ntango z'ino ndwi, abatari bake mu bafasha ba hafi cane ba Navalny, harimwo n'umuvugizi wiwe, umupfasoni Kira Yarmysh, barahagaritswe. Abanywanyi biwe bahamagarira iyindi myiyerekano mu mpera z'indwi iza. Hari amakuru avuga ko ejo ku wa gatandatu amaterefone na internet vyahungabanijwe, n'aho bitazwi nimba iki cari gifitaniye isano n'iyi myiyerekano. Urubuga hwaniro TikTok rwaruzuye amareresi yahamagarira imyiyerekano hamwe n'ubutumwa bwakwiragijwe cane bwerekeye Navalny. Mu kwishura, ikigo kijejwe ibinyamakuru mu Burusiya, Roskomnadzor, yasavye TikTok gufuta ubutumwa ubwo ari bwo bwose "buhimiriza abana gukora ibitajanye n'amategeko", kigabisha ko gishobora kuyitoza ihadabu rinini. Umushikiranganji w'indero yabwiye abavyeyi ko  batokwemerera abana babo kuja mu myiyerekano iyo ari yo yose. Umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Ubwongereza, Dominic Raab, ariyamiriza "ikubagurwa ry'abari mu myiyerekano bitekaniye hamwe n'abanyamakuru" ejo ku wa gatandatu, asaba abategetsi kurekura abahagaritswe. Ubunyamabanga bw'imigenderanire bwa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika buriyamiriza ico bwise "amayeri mabi" akoreshwa ku bari mu myiyerekano n'abanyamakuru, bukavuga buti: "Dusavye abategetsi b'Uburusiya kurekura abo bose bahagaritswe bariko bakora ivyo bahabwa n'amategeko, hanyuma barekure Aleksey Navalny ubu nyene kandi ata kirinze gusabwa".

headline: Spice Diana ati 'Nsaba Imana ko twosubirana Uganda yacu nziza'
text: Igisata c'umuziki muri Uganda kiriko kiratera imbere, kandi kirimwo abacuraranzi batari bake b'abagore bamaze gutera imbere. Spice Diana afise indirimbo zitari nke amaze gusohora ubu akaba ariko aritegurira urukurikirane rwiwe rwa mbere. Aherutse kandi no gushirwa ku rutonde rw'abahiganira agashimwe kitiriwe MTV Africa Music Awards  (MAMA). "Iri genwa ryantumye mbona ko nkwiye gukora ntagoheka kubera vyanyeretse ko umuziki wanje ushimwa ku mbuga mpuzamakungu hamwe no muri Afrika". "Numva umengo bambwiye bati: 'Hey, Spicey. Usanzwe ukora ibikomeye, rero utegerezwa kwihata gusumba'." Spice Diana avuga ko ibihe bigoye Uganda yari imazemwo iminsi vyagize ingaruka mbi ku banyamuziki, akipfuza ko ibintu vyosubira mu buryo kugira ngo ibikorwa vyabo bibandanya ukuri kwamye. Spice Diana yabwiye ikiganiro This Is Africa (Iyi Ni Afrika)  ko umurwi w'abana batamba wiyise Triplets Ghetto Kids ari wo watumye ashobora gushika aho ageze. Yarabakunda cane, bimutuma abona ko akwiye kuza arabandikira indirimbo, ariko bobo bamubonyemwo ubushobozi: Ati: "Muri jewe nibwira nti: 'Oya, kuririmba ntavyo nshoboye', ariko bobo muri bo bavuga bati 'Urashobora kuririmba!' Si niyemera, ariko abo bana baranteye intege nyinshi, ku buryo nabona ntobahemukira". Umwaka uheze ntiworoheye abanyamuziki muri Uganda. Mu bitandukanye n'ibindi bihugu vyinshi byo muri Afrika, Uganda yarafashe amategeko yo kubabuza ibikorwa vyabo. Igihe abanyamuziki ba Nijeriya, Omar Ley na Tems bakora igiteramo cabo, birengagije amategeko ya Covid-19, abanyamuziki benshi ba Uganda barashavuye cane. Spice Diana ati: "Twarashavuye cane, ariko mu nyuma twamenye ko ari umunya Uganda yari yateguye ico giteramo, maze twifatanya n'aba banyanijeriya kubera twabonye ko igiporisi cakoze nabi kubahagarika mu gihe atari bo bari bagiteguye". Spice Diana  avuga kandi ko imigumuko yagiye yibonekeza mu gihugu igihe cariko citegurira amatora yagize ingaruka mbi ku banyamuziki ba Uganda. Ati: "Abantu benshi baratakaje ubuzima bwabo, abandi baratakaza ubuzi bwabo, hanyuma igihe cose ivyo bibaye, abakunzi bacu baba biteze ko hagira ico tuvuze". Ati: "Rimwe na rimwe, usanga ata vyinshi uzi muri poritike - ugaca usanga iyo ubuze ico ushikiriza, abantu baraguhevye mbere n'umuziki wawe bakawuheba". "Rero nsaba ko twosubirana Uganda yacu nziza inyuma y'ibi vyose".

headline: US: Impungenge z’uko abakobwa bomubenga ziri mu vyatumye asaba kwongererezwa uburebure
text: Buri mwaka, abantu amajana n'amajana kw'isi baribagisha amaguru kugira ngo bongererezwe uburebure, igikorwa gifata igihe kitari gito kandi kibabaza. Ariko kubera ari inzira ndende, abahinga muvyo amagara y'abantu bavuga ko bigira ingaruka mbi z'igihe kirekire. Sam Becker  yaboneka ko ari we muremure igihe yari akiri mu mashure mato, ariko amaze kurangiza amashure yisumbuye, yagiye kwisanga abo bigana  bamusumba kure. Ati: "Maze kuja kuri kaminuza, nagiye nisanga ndi mugufi gusumba abandi bahungu, mbere n'abakobwa". "Ibi biragira ingaruka ku buzima bwawe. Mvugishije ukuri, abakobwa ntibemera kureshwa n'abahungu basumvya uburebure. Ariko ikintu gikomeye cane kwari ukwama nibaza rimwe na rimwe ko ntazigera ndonka umugore". Sam w'imyaka 30 asanzwe aba mu gisagara ca New York, yibaza ko yari kubandanya aba muremure, n'aho ku mutima yari azi ko yamaze kurenza imyaka yo gukura. Ati: "Naguma nibaza ko kugira ugire aho wishikana mu buzima wategerezwa kuba uri muremure. Nico gituma rero nahavuye nigira inama". Sam yamaze igihe yibaza ingene yobigenza kugira abe muremure, akama abona ko yokwambara ibirato birebire agakora n'imyimenyerezo ngororamubiri, ariko ivyo ntivyamunyuze. Igihe amenyeye ko bashobora kumwongerereza amaguru, yaciye yumva ko ari wo muti nyawo. Amaze kuvugana na nyina wiwe, akanihweza ingaruka zishoboka kumushikira, yaciye afata ingingo ntabanduka ko umuti w'ingorane yiwe ari ukubagwa. Niho rero mu 2015 yabagwa amaguru, maze baramwongerereza uburebure, ava kuri sentimetero 162 (162cm) ashika kuri sentimetero 170 (170cm). Ati: "Igihe mbonana na muganga ubwa mbere, yaransiguriye neza ko iki gikorwa kitoroshe. Icari kimpagaritse umutima kwari ukumenya ubushobozi nzoba mfise bwo gukora ico nshaka ni namara kwongererezwa uburebure. Ubwo nzoshobora gutambuka? Ubwo nzoshobora kwiruka? "Maze gukorwa, nategerezwa kwama nja kwigoroza, nka gatatu canke kane mu ndwi, amasaha makeya buri musi. Ibi nabikoze mu kiringo c'amezi nk'atandatu. Vyari ibintu biteye isoni. Bwari nk'ubusazi...iyumvire amaguru yawe yompi bakamena, hanyuma ugasubira kwiga gutambuka gushasha". Umugirwa wo kubaga amaguru mu kwongerereza abantu uburebure usanzwe ukorwa mu bihugu bitari bike, mbere abantu bamwe bagashobora kwongererezwa uburebure gushika kuri sentimetero 13 (13cm). N'aho bigoye kumenya igitigiri c'abantu babikorerwa buri mwaka, ibigo vy'ubuvuzi bivuga ko ari umugirwa ugenda wirukirwa cane. BBC yavuganye n'ibigo vy'ubuvuzi bitari bike kw'isi ku bijanye n'icuro basanzwe babikorera abantu, ariko ibiharuro bigenda bisumbasumbana. Mu bigo bikomeye vyo muri Amerika, mu Budagi na Koreya y'Ubumanuko, uwu mugirwa ukorwa ku ncuro hagati y'100 na 200 uko umwaka utashe. Ibindi - harimwo Espagne, Ubuhindi, Turukiya n'Ubutaliyano - ni hagati ya 20 na 40 ku mwaka. Mu Bwongereza ibitigiri biracari hasi bukebuke - incuro 15 ku mwaka. Amavuriro hafi nka yose BBC yavuganye nayo yavuze ko uwu mugirwa wiyongera umwaka ku mwaka. Mu Bwongereza, bikorwa mu mavuriro make y'abigenga, ku giciro gishobora gushika ku madorari y'abanyamerika 67.000, mu gihe muri Amerika igiciro kiri hagati y'amadorari 75.000 na 280.000. Ni igikorwa gifata umwanya muremure, kizimvye kandi kibabaza. Ni igikorwa catangujwe na Gavril Ilizarov, umuganga w'umurusiya yavura abasirikare bari bakomerekeye ku rugamba mu ntambara ya kabiri y'isi yose. Batobora amagufa y'amaguru - mu nyuma agacikamwo kubiri. Baca bagushiramwo icuma  bakagifatanya n'imisumari (vis/screws). Ico cuma rero kigenda congerezwa bukebuke uburebure gushika kuri mirimetero imwe (1mm) ku munsi, bikabandanya gushika aho nyene kubikorerwa  ashikiriye uburebure yipfuza, hanyuma rero amaguru akagenda asubirana bukebuke. Nyene kubikorerwa akenera amezi atari make akorerwa ibikorwa vyo gusubirana kugira ngo asubire akomere. Uwu mugirwa urimwo ingaruka indiri n'indiri zikomeye cane,  harimwo imitsi ishobora kwononekara, kuva amaraso mbere ugasanga biranashitse bikanka ko amagufa asubira gufatana.

headline: UK mw'itohoza kw'ishure ryapfiriyeko abana batewe imiti ifise imigera, harimwo n'uwa SIDA
text: Abajejwe amatohoza batanguye kwumviriza abahoze ari abanyeshure kw'ishure ry'abamugaye mu Bwongereza inyuma y'aho abana barenga 120 kuri iryo shure bapfiriye mu ciswe ikiza kitari bwigere kibaho muri kahise k'ikigo kijejwe ivy'amagara mu gihugu (NHS). Kuva mu 1974 gushika 1987, abo bana baravuwe indwara yitwa haemophilia kw'ishure ryisumbuye rya Treloar's College. N'imiburiburi abana 72 barapfuye batewe umuti urimwo imigera ya SIDA n'indwara y'igitigu(canke umwijima mu Kinyarwanda). Imbere y'uko yumvirizwa, Richard Warwick yahoze yiga kw'iryo shure riri mu karere ka Hampshire mu mpera z'imyaka ya za 70, mu nyuma akaba yagiye gupimwa agasanga yaranduye SIDA, yabwiye BBC ati: "Twaraburiye abagenzi benshi kw'ishure rya Treloar kandi ni ibintu vy'incamugongo". Iri tohoza ry'ingene hakoreshejwe amaraso yanduye ryatanguye ku wa mbere igihe humvirizwa abantu bafitaniye isano n'iryo shure. Uwahoze arirongoye, Alec Macpherson,  ni umwe mu bategerezwa kwisigura. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Vyarateye agahinda kenshi n'umujinya mwinshi abo bahungu". "Vyabashizemwo uburakari - kubera iki jewe, kubera iki ibi vyambayeko, kubera iki nafashwe n'iyi ndwara iteye ubwoba?" Lord Mayor's Treloar's College ryari ishure ry'indaro ry'abana bafise ubumuga bw'umubiri rikaba ryari rifise ikigo kidasanzwe cegukira NHS, catwarwa n'umurwi w'abaganga b'abahinga. Hagati mu myaka ya 1970, umuti mushasha wo kuvura haemophilia wari uzwi nkafactor VIII/IX, warabonetse ubwa mbere. Uwu muti washobora gufasha abo bose bari bafise ibibazo vyo mu maraso kubaho mu buzima busanzwe ata ngorane yo kuvirirana. NHS nta plasma y'amaraso ikwiye yari ifise kugira ngo ishobore guhingura uwo muti, bikaba vyari ngombwa ko iyigura mu mahanga, cane cane muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Amaraso menshi yaguzwe yari yandujwe imigera y'igitigu (hépatite/hepatitis) co mu bwoko bwa A, B na C, mu nyuma asangwamwo umugera wa SIDA, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abafise iyi ndwara ya haemophilia mu gihugu cose bakaba barandujwe iyi migera. Ade Goodyear yinjiiye kw'iryo shure rya Treloar mu 1980 afise imyaka 10. Avuga ko ubuzima bwari "buryoshe cane" kubera abigisha, abaforoma n'abagenzi bamwitaho cane. Kumwe n'abandi banyeshure batari bake kw'iryo shuri, na we yahawe umuti factor VIII kugira ngo umugabanirize kuvirirana. Ati: "Ntewe urushinge rwa mbere gusa, naciye nandura igitigu baca banshira ukwa jenyene mu kiringo c'indwi zibiri". Mu 1985 yajanywe mu biro bitoya ari kumwe n'umurwi w'abanyeshure maze abwirwa ko yanduye umugera wa SIDA - umugera wari uherutse gutorwa ico gihe, ata muti wariho kandi wica ningoga. Ati: "Muganga yarashavuye adutuma urutoke avuga ati, urawufise, hanyuma ati ntawo ufise. Naciye nsubira mw'ishure isaha indwi n'iminota 50 [13h50]. Nta n'uko naruhutse ku mutaga". "Umwe mu bagenzi yafashe agakono k'amashurwe akamena ku ruhome rw'inyubakwa y'ikigo ca haemophilia. Wari umusi mwiza, mu ci, ndibuka ukuntu naharura imisi y'akazuba nari ngiye kumara". Bakuru ba Ade babiri bahavuye bapfa inyuma yo guterwa umuti factor VIII - Jason yahitanywe na SIDA mu 1997, Gary nawe apfa mu 2015 kubera ibibazo bijanye n'igitigu co mu bwoko bwa C (hépatite C). Ku bana nka Ade na Richard, vyasigura kubaho mu buzima buteye isoni kuba wanduye iyo ndwara itari izwi cane. Abamenyeshamakuru bakora mu binyamakuru bitandukanye barihereranije abanyeshure hanze y'ishuri, bose baguma babaza ibibazo ku bijanye n'uko boba baranduye SIDA. 32 kuri 122 bari bafise indwara ya haemophilia bize kuri iryo shure kuva mu 1974 gushika 1987 baracariho uno musi. Abandi hafi bose barafuye banduye umugera wa SIDA canke hépatite C. Abantu barizeye ko iri tohoza ririko rirakorwa rizoshobora gutanga inyishu ku bibazo vyibazwa ku bijanye n'ivyabaye kw'iryo shure rya Treloar no kuri ico kigo co kuvura iyi ndwara ya  haemophilia cegukira NHS. Imiryango yaburiye kuri iryo shure ishaka kumenya igituma itamenyeshejwe izi ngorane zashobora guterwa n'umuti factor VIII imbere y'igihe hamwe n'igituma vyafashe imyaka myinshi imbere y'uko babanza guteka iyi miti kugira ngo bice imigera yarimwo. Stephen Nicholls yahoze yiga kw'iryo shuri akandura hépatite C inyuma yo guterwa uwo muti avuga ati: "Ivyabereye kw'iryo shuri vyama bigaruka kuduhahamura imisi yose gushika ubu". "Ntituzigera twibagira namba ivyabaye kw'iryo shure rya Treloar n'ivyatubayeko vyose". Ni indwara idakunze kuboneka cane, aho amaraso adatembera neza. Akenshi ikunze gufata abagabo. Abantu bafise iyi ngorane ntibaronka indemamubiri (protéines) zitwa factor VIII na  IX zituma amaraso atembera neza. Muri ino ndwi, abahoze biga kw'iryo shure hamwe n'abavyeyi bahaburiye abana babo bariko batanga ivyemezo. Ikigo co kuvura haemophilia kuri iryo shure cari kirongowe n'abaganga hamwe n'abaforoma begukira NHS, ntibari abakozi begukira iryo shure n'ubu rikibandanya ryakira abana bafise ubumuga gushika ubu. Iri shure ryasohoye itangazo aho rivuga riti: "N'aho gushika ubu ata n'umwe aravuga ko ishure rya Treloar rifise amakosa, ni ikintu kibabaje cane muri kahise kacu". "Carabaye, kandi n'ubu kiracari igihe kibabaje cane ku banyeshure bahoze biga ng'aha, imiryango yabo n'abakozi b'ico gihe". "Turashigikiye cane iri sekeza kugira aba banyeshure bahoze biga hano bamenye ukuri, baronke inyishu ku bibazo vyabo bongere batunganirizwe".

headline: Intambara ya DR Congo: ingendo za Rwandair zahagaritswe ku butaka bw’ico gihugu kubera M23
text: Inama nkuru yo kwivuna abansi muri Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo itangaza ko kuva ubu umuhari M23 urwanya reta ari umuhari w'iterabwoba. Mw'itangazo ryasomwe na Patrick Muyaya, umushikiranganji wa Congo ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru, yavuze ko iyo nama yagiriza igisirikare c'Urwanda ko gifashe mu mugongo uyu muhari. Ati: "Amakuru atangwa n'abasirikare bari ku rubuga, amasanamu afiswe n'ingabo zacu, hamwe n'ivyemezo bitangwa n'abanyagihugu bacu, birerekana ata nkeka ko M23 ishigikiwe n'igisirikare c'Urwanda". Mu ngingo zindi zafashwe, ni uko ikompanyi y'indege ya leta y'Urwanda, Rwandair, yahagaritswe gusubira kwinjira muri Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo. Reta y'Urwanda ntaco iravuga kuri ibi biri muri iri tangazo ry'inama nkuru y'ukwivuna abansi ya Congo, ariko umuvugizi wayo Alain Mukuralinda kuwa gatanu yabwiye BBC ko ata ruhara u Rwanda rufise mu bibera muri Congo. Sibwo bwa mbere kandi RD Congo yagirije Urwanda gufasha umuhari M23, kandi si ubwa mbere u Rwanda rubihakanye. Iyo nama ya Congo iragabisha Urwanda, ikarwagiriza ko ingendo  yarwo ari iyo gutoba utwigoro two kugarukana amahoro  biciye mu biganiro biriko bibera i Nairobi muri Kenya. Iryo tangazo rivuga kandi riti: "Inama nkuru yo kwivuna abansi iriyamiriza yivuye inyuma umugambi w'ububeshi bukwiragizwa n'Urwanda, aho rwagiriza igisirikare ca Congo ko cifatanya n'imirwi y'inkorabara nk'urwitwazo mu gushigikira umurwi w'iterabwoba wa M23". Iyo nama ishimira kandi "Ubumwe bwa Afrika, Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU, Ubumwe bwa Bulaya, Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Ububirigi n'ibindi, vyiyamirije iyindi ngendo igayitse ya M23 n'abavyeyi bayo". Umushikiranganji Muyaya atera akamo abanyagihugu "kwirinda kugwa mu mutego w'umwansi" bakabandanya bafatanye mu nda, kandi bakaguma barikanuye. Iyo nama kandi yafashe ingingo yo gutumako uwuserukira Urwanda i Kinshasa kugira ngo bamumenyeshe akababaro ka Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo. Umviriza ingene Alain Mukuralinda yabwiye Prudent Nsengiyumva wa BBC Gahuzamiryango;

headline: Sport: Abakuru b'imigwi y'inkino bifatanije n'abo mu mupira w'amaguru mu kwinuba imbuga hwaniro imisi 4
text: Imigwi ikomakomeye y'umupira w'amaguru n'abakinyi bagiye kwifatanya n'inzego zirongoye inkino mu kwinuba imbuga hwaniro mu kiringo c'imisi ine kuva ku musi wa gatanu mu ntumbero yo kugwanya ifatwa nabi n'amacakubiri. "Uko gushigikirana mu kugwanya amajambo mabi aca ku mbuga hwaniro" gufise intumbero yo gutera intege izo mbuga mu gufata ingingo ruhasha ku banyamacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba no ku gitsina. Amashirahamwe ya Rugby na Cricket baraza gushigikira abo mu mupira w'amaguru muri urwo rugamba. Uko kwinuba izo mbuga kwaniro biza gutangura isaha isaha 17:00 ku musi wa gatanu gushika isaha 1:59 ku masaha yo mu Rwanda no mu Burundi. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe Kick it Out, rigwanya amacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba, Sanjay Bhandaru yavuze ati:"Uku kwinuba vyerekana agashavu kacu twese. "Mu kwinuba imbuga hwaniro, twerekanye ikimeyetso kura abo babifitiye ububasha. Dushaka ko mufata ingingo. Dushaka mufashe guhindura ibintu." Abafashe ingingo yo kwinuba Twitter, Facebook na Instagram ni: Imigwi yo mu Bwongereza y'abasiganwa ku makinga, abasiganwa ku ndogobwe, Hockey hamwe n'ishirahamwe rya Tennis na bo bari mu bitavye ako kamo. Umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi mu gusiganwa n'imodoka Lewis Hamilton co kimwe n'umudereva George Russell na bo bari mu bagiye kwinuba imbuga hwaniro muri ico kiringo c'imisi ine.

headline: Christian Eriksen: 'Yarapfuye hanyuma arazuka' - uwamuvuye aravuga ingene vyagenze
text: "Vyari vyaheze. Yarapfuye hanyuma arazuka" Muganga ajejwe kuvura umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Danemark, Morten Boesen, avuga aya majambo igihe yariko asigura ivyabaye mw'ijoro ryo ku wa gatandatu ku mukinyi Christian Eriksen. Ku munota wa 43 y'igice ca mbere mu rukino rwa mbere rw'umurwi B mw'ihiganwa rya Euro 2020 hagati ya Danemark na Finland, uyu mukinyi asanzwe akina muri Inter Milan yagiye kwakira umupira wari usubijwe mu kibuga n'amaboko. Mu gihe yari agiye kuwakira, yabanje kuzungagirika incuro zitari nke mu nyuma aca agwa bukumbi. Eriksen yarataye ubwenge mu kiringo c'iminota itari mike, akikijwe n'abakinyi bagenzibe. Iyi minota yabaye mu biringo biteye ubwoba mu mateka y'umupira w'amaguru. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru bukeye ku wa Munu, Boesen yavuze ati: "Yari yagiye, vyari vyarangiye. Yarapfuye hanyuma arazuka. Ni indwara y'umutima yari imuhitanye". "Yahatswe kutujana bigenze gute? Nta vyo nzi, ariko twarashoboye kwikora ku buhinga bwacu turamuhembura". Bifashishije ubuhinga bwo guhembura uwaravye, Eriksen yavanywe mu kibuga ari ku nderuzo aca asimbanwa mu bitaro, abarorerezi bakoma amashi mu kumutera intege". Boesen ati: "Ibipimo tumaze kumufata gushika ubu vyerekana ko ata ngorane, nta nsiguro turaronka ku vyamubayeko". Urukino hagati ya Danemark na Finland rwahavuye rubandanya haciye amasaha makeya rubanje guhagarikwa. Ku gitsindo cinjijwe na Joel Pohjanpalo, Finland yatahukanye intsinzi. Yabaye intsinzi ya mbere n'igitsindo ca mbere c'uyu murwi wa Finland mu mateka yayo mw'ihiganwa rya Buraya. Ku ruhande rwiwe, umumenyereza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Danemark, Kasper Hjulman , avuga ko yavuganye na Eriksen, akaba yamubwiye ko atibuka neza ivyabaye. Hjulmand avuga ati: "Yambwiye ko yumva akomeye kandi ko yiteguye gusubira mu myimenyerezo". Ariko, abihweza ibintu n'ibindi batari bake bavuga ko bigoye ko umukinyi ahuye n'ikibazo nk'iki cashikiye Eriksen asubira gukina umupira". Umwe muri aba ni Sanjay Sharma yari umuganga w'indwara z'umutima igihe uyu mukinyi yakina muri Tottenham mu Bwongereza kuva mu 2013 gushika 2020. Sharma  yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru PA ati: "Sinzi ko ashobora gusubira gukina umupira w'amaguru. Mvugishije ukuri, yari yapfuye (ku wa gatandatu), n'aho vyabaye ivyo iminota mikeya, ariko yari yapfuye". "None hari umuganga yosubira kumwemerera gusubira gupfa? Inyishu ni oya". Yongerako ati: "Inkuru nziza ni uko azokira, ariko inkuru mbi ni uko ashitse ku maherezo y'umwuga wiwe". Sharma aremeza ko Eriksen atigeze yerekana ko afise ikibazo na kimwe c'amagara mu gihe cose yamaze akina muri Tottenham cari gushobora gusigura ivyamubayeko i Copenhagen ku wa gatandatu. Ati: "Biragaragara ko hari ikintu cagenze nabi cane. Ariko yarashoboye kurokoka. "Ikibazo ni iki: habaye iki? Hanyuma kandi kubera iki vyabaye? Uyu mukinyi nta kibazo na kimwe yigeze agira mu bipimo vyose yafashwe gushika mu 2019, none wosigura gute iri hagarara ry'umutima?" Aho arwariye, avuga ko ameze neza kandi ko abandany atora mitende. Kuva yinjijwe ibitaro inyuma y'ivyamubayeko ku wa gatandatu, Christian Eriksen yashoboye kugira ico ashikirije ubwa mbere, aho avuga ko azobandanya atera intene bagenziwe muri rino higanwa rya Euro 2020. Yanditse kuri Instagram ati: "Ndashimye cane ku ndamutso n'ubutumwa mbandanya ndonka biva mu mpande zose z'isi". "Bisobanura vyinshi kuri jewe n'umuryango wanje". "Meze neza - inyuma y'ivyabaye. Mbandanya n'ibindi bipimo mu bitaro, ariko meze neza".

headline: Russia Vs US: aba 'hackers' bakoze ikindi gitero c'imigera ku nyabwonko z'abagiraneza - Microsoft
text: Ikompanyi ihingura inyabwonko Microsoft, ivuga ko habaye ikindi gico c'ibitero vy'abasuma bo ku nyabwonko (hackers) b'abarusiya bakoresha imigera ku nyabwonko z'amashirahamwe yegamiye reta n'amashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka zina muntu mu bihugu 24, cane cane muri Reta zunze Ubumwe za amerika. Microsoft ivuga ko amakonte muravyo (email accounts) ashika 3000 mu mashirahamwe atandukanye arenga 150 ari yo yatewe muri ino ndwi turimwo. Microsoft yagiriza abakoze vya bitero vyo mu mwaka uheze kuri kompanyi SolarWinds, aho urwego rw'Uburusiya (SVR) rujejwe igendereza rwagirijwe, ko ari rwo rwabikoze. Uburusiya burahakana ibi bitero vyompi. Kremlin (ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu w'Uburusiya) ivuga ko itazi ivy'ibi bitero bishasha, igasaba iyi kompanyi ya Amerika gutanga izindi nsiguro, harimwo ingene yagiriza Uburusiya. Mu nkuru yacishije ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi ku wa kane, Microsoft yavuze ko ibi bitero bishasha vyakozwe ku nzego za reta zijejwe imigenderanire n'amakungu mu gikorwa co "kwegeranya c'igendereza". Ivuga ko n'imiburiburi ica kane c'amashirahamwe yatewe afise uruhara mu bijanye n'ibikorwa mpuzamakungu vy'iterambere, ubutabazi hamwe n'agateka ka zina muntu. Mu gihe hafi yose ari muri Amerika, aya mashirahamwe yatewe ni ayo mu bihugu n'imiburiburi 24. Nk'uko Microsoft ibivuga, Nobelium, umurwi ukomoka mu Burusiya, niwo wakoze ibitero vyo muri ino ndwi mu kwinjira muri konte ya email ikoreshwa n'ishirahamwe rya reta ya Amerika rijejwe ugufashanya, USAID. Abo ba hackers baciye barungika ubutumwa muravyo (emails) busa nk'uko umengo ni ubw'ukuri, ariko bukaba bufise link/lien, uyifyonzeko ica yinjiza umugera mubi wiba amakuru yose ari mu nyabwonko yawe, ukongera ugaca utera imigera mu zindi nyabwonko zose ziri ku murongo umwe na rwawe (network/réseau). Umuvugizi w'urwego rwa Amerika rujejwe gukingira umutekano w'inyabwonko (Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency, Cisa) yabwiye ikinyamakuru CBS News  ko abategetsi bari bamenye iki gitero kandi ko bariko baragerageza "gutahura neza ingaruka zaco no gufasha abo bose bashobora kuba baratewe". Microsoft ivuga ko imigera y'ivyo bitero vyose ku bakiriya bayo yazibiwe mu buryo bwikora (Automatiquement). Ntibiramenyekana neza igitigiri c'izoba zarashoboye kwinjirwa n'iyo migera. Mu mwaka uheze, aba hackers barakoresheje ikompanyi ya Amerika, SolarWinds' Orion, bavogera ibisata vya reta ya Amerika, amakompanyi ategamiye reta hafi 100 hamwe n'amashirahamwe makeya y'Ubwongereza. Vyagiye kurangira abakiriya hafi 18.000 binjije iyi logiciel y'umugera. Amerika n'Ubwongereza bwagirije ikigo SVR ko ari co cari cakoze iki gitero. Kirahakana ivyo cagirizwa.

headline: Coronavirus: OMS ifise impungenge ko Afrika ishobora kuba ikiririmbiro rishasha
text: Umuryango ujejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO uragabisha ko umugabane wa Afrika ushobora kuba ikiririmbiro rishasha rya wa mugera w'icaduka coronavirus. Abategesti ba ONU bamenyesha kandi ko ico kiza gishobora kwirahira abantu baharurwa mu bihumbi 300 muri Afrika, nayo abashika imiliyoni 30 bagashobora gusigara mu kangaratete. Mu ndwi iheze, ibiharuro vy'abanduye coronavirus kuri uyo mugabane vyariyongereye bidasanzwe. Gushika ubu, hafi abashika 1000 baramaze guhitanwa n'uwo mugera, mu gihe abashika ku 19.000 bamaze kuwandura, ibitigiri biri hasi cane ugereranije n'ibirangwa mu bice bimwe bimwe vya Bulaya na Amerika. Umurwi wa ONU ujejwe ibibazo vy'ubutunzi muri Afrika - ari nawo wagabishije ko abashika ibihumbi 300 bashobora gupfa - wasavye ko hotegurwa amafaranga ashika imiliyoni 100 y'amadorari yo guha uwo mugabane, harimwo kandi n'ingingo yo guhagarika amadeni yo hanze. OMS ivuga ko uwo mugera usa n'uwuriko urakwiragira hanze y'ibisagara. Ivuga kandi ko uwo mugabane ubuze ibikoresho nyamukuru, nk'ibikoresho bifasha abarwaye guhema. Abarenga ica gatatu c'abanyagihugu ba Afrika nta mazi meza bafise, mu gihe hafi ibice 60% vy'ababa mu gisagara baba begeranye cane - ivyo navyo bigatuma umugera ushobora kukwirakwira cane. Gushika ubu abashika 19.000 baramaze gutangazwa ko banduye  coronavirus muri Afrika nzima, nayo abashika 970 bakaba aribo bamaze kumenyekana ko yabahitanye kuri uyo mugabane wose utuwemwo n'abantu hafi umuliyaridi 1.3. Akarere ka Afrika y'uburaruko niko kabangamiwe . Alijeriya, Mirisi na Maroke bifise kimwe kimwe cose abarenga 2000 bamaze kwandura, hamwe n'imiburiburi 100 bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima. Alijeriya nico gihugu kimaze kubura benshi, abashika 348. Mu bundi burere, Afrika y'Epfo nayo nyene ifise abarenga 2000 bamaze kuyandura, hamwe na 48 bamaze gupfa, mu gihe igihugu gifise abantu benshi gusumba ibindi muri Afrika, ari co Nijeriya, kimaze guharura abantu 442 bamaze kuyandura hamwe na 13 bamaze gupfa ku banyagihugu bashika imiliyoni 200. Raba ikarata y'ingene coronavirus yifashe muri Afrika Uwuserukira OMS muri Afrika Dr Matshidiso Moeti yabwiye BBC ko ingendo mpuzamakungu zifise uruhara rukomeye mw'ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera. Avuga ati: "Uravye urugero rw'abantu bafata ingendo, Afrika ifise abantu bake cane bafata ingendo mpuzamakungu". Hagati aho, mu gihe uwo mugera wamaze gushika muri Afrika, avuga ko umuryango aserukira uriko ukora utiziganya kuko uzi ko uwo mugera ushobora gukwiragira ku muvuduko munini cane gusumba ahandi. OMS iramaze kubona ko uwo mugera uriko urakwiragira uva mu bisagara binini uja hagati mu gihugu mu bihugu vya Afrika y'Epfo, Nijeriya, Cote d'Ivoire, Kameruni na Ghana, nk'uko bivugwa na Dr. Moeti. Hari ibihugu bishika 15 vya Afrika uwo mugera utarashika kure gushika ubu, akizera ko mu gihe ivyo bihugu vyofata ingingo zikomeye zituma abantu bareka kwegerana, vyoshobora gutuma ivyo bihugu biwuhagarika. OMS ifise ubwoba ko mu mezi atatu gushika kuri atandatu ari imbere abarenga imiliyoni 10 bashobora kwandura uwo mugera, ariko ivyo biharuro bikaba bidafatira ku ngingo zijanye n'isuku zigenda zirafatwa. None vyogenda gute mu gihe uwo mugera worandagara hagati mu gihugu muri Afrika? Mu gihe Covid-19 yoshinga imizi kuri uwo mugabane, inkurikizi zoba umurengera gusumba izibonekeza i Bulaya na Amerika, nk'uko bivugwa n'umunyamakuru wa BBC mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu. OMS ivuga ko mu bihugu hafi vyose vya Afrika usanga hari ibitanda hafi bitanu gusa vyo kuvurirako indembe ku bantu umuliyoni wose, igitigiri kiri hasi cane rwose ugereranije n'I Bulaya, aho hari ibitanda 4000 ku bantu umuliyoni. Dr. Moeti avuga ko OMS ishira imbere ugukinga uwo mugera hakurondera kuvura, kubera ibihugu vyinshi va Afrika bidafise ubushobozi bwo kuvura abarwayi benshi ba coronavirus. Ati:"Dushaka ko ibitigiri vy'abakenera kuvurirwa mu bibanza vy'indembe biguma hasi, kuko tuzi neza ko mu bihugu vyinshi vya Afrika ubu buryo atabwo bifise". Dr. Moeti avuga ko "imwe mu ngorane nyamukuru" ibihugu vya Afrika bifise ari ubukene bwa vya vyuma bifasha guhema abariko baravurwa uwo mugera. Ku barwaye Covid-19 baremvye, kubura ivyo bikoresho ni nk'urupfu. Mu gihe indembe zidashobora guhema neza zo nyene ukwazo, ivyo vyuma nivyo vyinjiza impwemu nziza (oxygène) mu mahaha bigasohora impwemu mbi (gaz carbonique) mu mubiri. Umwe mu bantu bahitanywe n'uwo mugera ubwa mbere muri AFrika yari umumenyeshamakuru wa Zimbabwe Zororo Makamba, hari mu kwa gatatu. Abategetsi b'umugwa mukuru Harare, bavuga ko vyatumwe n'uko batari bwaronke ico cuma co kumufahsa guhema kugira ngo bashobore kumuvura. Dr. Moeti avuga ko ibintu nyamukuru vyokorwa muri ivyo bihugu ari: Ibihugu bitari bike biramaze gufata ingingo zo kugabanya uruja n'uruza. Mu bihugu bimwe bimwe, nk'amashure yarahiduwe ibibanza vyo gufashirizamwo abanduye, aho bashobora kugumizwa ukwabo mbere no kuvurwa bakavurirwamwo. Amahinguriro ahingura impuzu yarasabwe gufasha mu guhingura ibikoresho vyo kwikingira nka ya makanzu yambarwa n'abaganga. Ikigo kijejwe gukinga indwara muri Afrika kimenyesha ko kigiye gutanga ibikoresho vyo gupima coronavirus bishika ku muliyoni kugira ngo bizibire "igihengeri kinini" cibonekeza kuri uwo mugabane.

headline: Covid-19: Hydroxychloroquine ifise kuba isongera isibe hagukiza, ubushakashatsi
text: Umuti Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika avuga ko ariko arafata mu kurwanya Covid-19  ushobora kuba ahubwo usongera isibe, nk'uko ivyigwa bivyerekana. Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe buvuga ko ata karusho bizana mu kuvura coronavirus hakoreshejwe uwo muti uvura malaria witwa hydroxychloroquine. Bwana Trump avuga ko yariko arafata uwo muti n'aho abajejwe amagara y'abantu bagabishije ko ushobora gutera ingorane z'umutima. Uyo mu perezida abandanya ahimiriza ikoreshwa ry'uwo muti, mu gihe abajejwe amagara y'abantu bavyamirira kure. Hydroxychloroquine ni nziza mu kuvura malaria, na zimwe nka za lupus na arthrite, ariko gushika ubu ntibiremezwa nimba Hydroxychloroquine ishobora kuvura coronavirus. Ico cigwa cakozwe n'ikigo Lancet gikoresheje abarwayi 96000, muri bo hafi 15.000 bakaba bahawe Hydroxychloroquine - canke umuti wo mu bwoko bwa chloroquine. Tugereranije n'abandi barwayi, ubwo bushakashatsi bwasanze ko abo bahawe Hydroxychloroquine bari bafise igihamana kibi co gupfira mu bitaro canke bakagira ibibazo vy'itera ry'umutima. Turavye ingene abarwayi bagiye bapfa, ni uko ibice 18% vy'abahawe Hydroxychloroquine ari bo bapfuye, abahawe Chloroquine isanzwe bakaba bapfuye ku rugero rwa 16.4%, nayo abandi bobo batahawe iyo miti bapfuye ku rugero rwa 9%. Abashakashatsi bakoze ico cigwa bagabisha ko Hydroxychloroquine itokoreshwa mu gihe atari mu magerageza y'imiti. Bwana Trump wewe yivugira ko gushika ubu atarigera yandura Covid-19, kandi ko abandanya afata uwo muti kuko yizera ko "ufise akarusho". Hari ibikorwa vyo kugerageza uwo muti usanzwe uvura malaria nimba ushobora gukoreshwa mu kuvura Covid-19. Abakozi bo mu gisata c'ubuvuzi barenga ibihumbi 40 ku migabane ya Bulaya, Afrika, Aziya, Amerika y'Epfo basanzwe bariko bavura abanduye Covid-19, bari mu bazohabwa uwo muti mu gikorwa co kuwugerageza. Dr Marcos Espinal, arongoye ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu muri Amerika y'Epfo (Organisation panaméricaine de la santé) risanzwe rikorana n'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS, ashimangira ko ata vyigwa na bimwe vy'ubuvuzi birigera vyemeza ko hydroxychloroquine yokoreshwa mu kuvura coronavirus.

headline: Covid-19: Ubushinwa buvuga ko urucanco rukiri mw'igeragezwa rwerekana ko rukora
text: Abashakashatsi batangaza ko urucanco rwa Covid-19 rwakorewe mu Bushinwa rwerekana ko rukora neza mu gihe rukiri mw'igeragezwa. Hari incanco zitari nke ziriko zirageragezwa mu Bushinwa, mbere zimwe muri zo zikaba ziriko zirakoreshwa. Nk'uko aba bashakashatsi babivuga, urucanco Sinovac Biotech rwatanguye gukora mu mwanya muto mu gihe rwari ruhawe abantu bashika 700. Ibi bitangajwe inyuma y'aho izindi ncanco zahinguriwe i Bulaya no muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zitangarijwe ko zikingira umuntu  inyuma y'aho zigeragerejwe ku murwi munini w'abantu. Incanco zitatu zahinguriwe muri Amerika, mu Budagi no mu Burusiya, ziramaze gutangazwa ko zikinga ku rugero ruri hejuru ya 90%, inyuma y'aho zigeragerejwe ku bantu baharurwa mu bihumbi mirongo. Nk'uko biri mu bindi bice vy'isi, Ubushinwa buri mu rugamba rwo guhingura urucanco rwa Covid, bukaba bugeze ku ncanco zine ziri mu gice ca nyuma c'igeragezwa, hakaba harimwo na rumwe rwahinguwe n'ikompanyi ihingura incanco Sinovac Biotech. Hagati aho, ivyavuye mu gice ca mbere n'ica kabiri c'igeragezwa rya rumwe gusa muri zino ncanco zine nivyo bimaze gutangazwa mu kinyamakuru c'ubuvuzi, The Lancet. Nk'uko biri muri iki cegeranyo , urucanco CoronaVac rwa Sinovac Biotech rutangura gukingira umuntu haciye akanya gato, n'aho ibi vyigwa vyakozwe mu kwa kane n'ukwa gatanu biterekana urugero rw'ubushobozi bwa runo rucanco. Zhu Fengcai, umwe mu banditse kino cegeranyo, avuga ko ivyavuye muri rino geragezwa ryakorewe ku bantu 144 mu gice ca mbere hamwe na 600 mu gice ca kabiri, vyerekana ko uru rucanco rushobora "gukoreshwa mu bihe bidasanzwe". Ivyavuye mu gice ca gatatu c'iri geragezwa ririko rirakorerwa ku murwi munini w'abantu ntibiratangura gutangazwa. Mu gihe Ubushinwa buvuga ko bwashoboye kurwanya iki kiza karanda mu gihugu cose, iki gice kigira gatatu c'igerageza ry'izi ncanco zine kiriko kibera mu bihugu vya Pakistani, Arabia Sawudite, Uburusiya, Indoneziya, hamwe na Brezili. Abategetsi bavuga ko abantu bashika 60.000 bari bamaze guhabwa urucanco gushika mu ntango z'uku kwa cumi na rimwe. Mu ndwi iheze, ibikorwa vyo kugerageza urucanco rwa Sinovac Biotech muri Brezili vyarahagaritswe umwanya muto, ariko bikaba vyaciye bibandanya bimaze kuboneka ko urupfu rw'umwe mu bakorerabushake bariko bararugeragerezwako  ata sano rufitaniye n'uru rucanco. Incanco zishika zitatu nizo zihabwa abakozi nyamukuru mu mugambi udasanzwe wo kurwanya iki kiza, mu gihe urundi rwemejwe gukoreshwa mu gisirikare mu kwa gatandatu. Kuva mu minsi mike iheze, hari amakuru ava mu mpande zitandukanye z'isi avuga ibijanye n'incanco zifise ubushobozi bwo gukingira umuntu. Ubwa mbere, hari urucanco rwahinguwe n'amakompanyi abiri Pfizer na BioNtech yo mu Budagi na Amerika ruvugwa ko rukora ku bice birenga 90% inyuma y'aho rugeragerejwe ku bantu barenga 43.000. Inyuma y'aho, ikompanyi yo muri Amerika Moderna yatangaje ko urucanco rwayo rukora ku rugero rungana hafi ibice 95%, inyuma y'aho narwo nyene rugeragerejwe ku murwi munini w'abantu. Kuri izi zompi, ibi ni ibiharuro vy'intangamarara kandi nta na rumwe ruremezwa. Mu nyuma, Uburusiya bwatangaje ko urucanco rwabwo rukora ku rugero rwa 92% inyuma y'aho rugeragerejwe ku bantu 16.000 gusa, ni mu gihe  rwari rwamaze kwemezwa ko rushobora gukoreshwa mu bihe bidasanzwe mu kwa munani. Abashakashatsi bariko bariga izi ncanco zose zitatu baramaze gutangaza ivyo batoye mw'igerageza ryo ku rwego rwo hejuru gusumba Ubushinwa. Hagati aho, Sinovac Biotech nayo iriko irakora igerageza nk'iri nyene, ariko n'aho ataco iratangaza ku bijanye na ryo, si ukuvuga ko aba bashakashatsi bandi hari ico bayisumbije. Ubu ikiriho, ni ukumenya urucanco ruzotangura gukoreshwa ku mugaragaro. Ukwemeza no guhingura uru rucanco ku rugero runini nico gikorwa nyamukuru kizokurikra, abahinga bakagabisha ko abantu batokwitega amasekeza akomeye yo gucandaga imbere y'umwaka uza.

headline: Jose Mourinho muri Tottenham: Uwusubiriye Mauricio Pochettino yoba ari we abereye?
text: Jose Mourinho ari mu mayira atamenyereye mu gihe atanguye akazi ko kumenyereza Tottenham Hotspur nyuma y'iyirukanwa rya Mauricio Pochettino. Kuja kwa Mourinho mu kipe nshasha mu bisanzwe bizana icizere kuko ni umuntu yama azana ibikombe, kandi Spurs vyarayankiye kuva yatwara igikombe ca League Cup mu 2008. Ariko ubu hoho siko biri. Ubu asubiriye umumenyereza yari akunzwe cane kandi iyirukanwa ryiwe rikaba ryashavuje abakunzi benshi ba Tottenham, baciye mbere bongera ishavu mu kubaza niba koko uyu munye Portugal abereye gusimbura Pochettino. None Mourinho ni we muntu abereye Spurs? Umuyobozi mukuru wa Tottenham Daniel Levy yakoze ibiri mu vyifuzo vyiwe mu guha akazi Mourinho, uyu nawe akaba yaratangaje ko yigeze gusabwa kuza muri Spurs mu 2007. Ico gihe yavuze ko umuyobozi w'iyo kipe yagerageje no kwemera kuriha indishi zijanye n'amasezerano yari afise y'uko avuye muri Chelsea mu 2006, yari kumara imyaka ibiri adakora muri Premier League. Birakunze aronse umuntu yarondera ariko azobona y'uko - nk'uko vyagendeye abandi - mu gihe Mourinho ashobora kuzana ibikombe banyotewe, ni umuntu kandi azimvye, atwarira hejuru kandi ukugenda kwiwe kwama kuzana amarira. Amarira menshi. Canke hoho Mourinho azovyifatamwo gute mu gihe bizwi ko Levy adapfa kurekura ifaranga? Ni ikintu camye giteza uruhagarara na Pochettino, yakora afise uburyo bukeyi cane ugereranije n'amenyereza bakeba biwe. Spurs nta mukinyi yigeze igura mu masoko abiri y'abakinyi akurikirana, kandi uyu munye Argentine yari yashikirije ko mu ntango z'iri higanwa inyito yiwe yohinduka ntibe umuyobozi ahubwo ikaba umumenyereza mukuru, vyerekana ko ata jambo rinini yari afise hanze y'umukino. Mourinho ntazimbutse guhemba. Kandi ntakoresha abakinyi bagura make. Tottenham yishimiye cane ishure ryayo ry'umupira w'amaguru kandi ikabona abakinyi nka Harri Winks akina hagati nk'ikimenyetso ca kazoza; Mourinho wewe asa nk'uko atanezwe no kubaho kw'ishure ry'umupira. Biragoye kubona ukuntu Levy yorekura amahera imiriyoni £89 kuri Paul Pogba, £75 kuri Romely Lukaku, canke £52 kuri Fred, nk'uko Ed Woodward yabikoze muri Manchester United. Igihe nashikiriza izina Mourinho ku kipe imwe ejo bundi, inyishu baciye bampa ni iyi: "Yoshaka imiriyoni £250 zo kugura abakinyi bashasha imbere y'uko twicara ku meza tukaganira." Spurs na Levy si uko bakora - canke tuvuge ko atariko bakoranye na Pochettino. Nyuma yo gushika muri Southampton mu kwa gatanu 2014, yakoresheje amahera imiriyoni £394 ku bakinyi, ariko agaruza miriyoni £295. Pochettino yari yiteguriye gukora, n'imiburiburi mu gihe c'umwanya muto, mu buryo yahawe kuko yashoboye gushikana ikipe muri zine za mbere inshuro zine yikurikiranya muri Premier League anashikana iyo kipe ku nshuro ya mbere mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Champions League. Ariko Levy arashobora gukebera Mourinho kanini kurusha Pochettino. Iyi kipe ya Tottenham ni kipe ikeneye cane guhindura kandi uyu mumenyereza mushasha akorana gusa n'abakinyi babushitse, kandi bazimvye. Baca umugani ngo ubukwe bwiza bukenera ko impande zose zakira ariko kandi zigatanga. Mu vyerekeye kugura abakinyi, Mourinho yamye ashaka ko ba nyene ikipe batanga nawe akakira - mu gihe, muri ubwo buryo, Levy yamye yiyubara gutanga. Umuyobozi mukuru wa Tottenham arashobora kuba ari mu mwuka wo gutanga ka natsinda yamye ashaka Mourinho, ariko bitwara kwiyumvira cane kugira wemere ko uku gukorana kuzoshoboka hagati y'aba babiri kuko basanzwe ari abantu badatamikwa ijambo. Icivugo ca Tottenham ni iki: "Kwubahuka ni ugukora." Vyanditse hose ku kibuga cabo gishasha ciza cane catwaye umuriyaridi umwe w'amadolari. Mourinho si umunyereza yubahuka, kandi ico ni ikintu gisanzwe kiraje ishinga abafana ba Spurs - naho yavyitwayemwo neza mu gutwara Premier League gatatu, hamwe n'ibikombe nk'ivyo mu bindi bihugu bitatu, co kimwe na Champions League. Ibibonwa nko kunanirwa muri Manchester United birimwo ibigombe vya Carabao Cup hamwe na Europa League mu mwaka wiwe wa mbere. Ubu hari ubudasa. Niko, abafana benshi ba Spurs bari batewe impungenge n'umukenyuro wa Pochettino hamwe n'uko ikipe yari ihagaze, ariko uwo mugabo w'imyaka 47 aracakunzwe cane kubera ivyo yashitseko. Kuza kwa Mourinho ntikwakirijwe gusa amakenga mu bafana benshi, ariko kandi hari n'abavyiyamirije kubera ibintu bibiri. Asubiriye umumenyereza yari umuhuza ku bafana benshi ba Spurs. Mourinho arahangana kandi ntahurizweko. Akeneye kandi kwerekana ko atari umuntu yaheze, umuntu yasizwe n'ibihe ugereranije na Pep Guardiola na Jurgen Klopp. Pochettino yari yegeranye cane n'abafana ba Spurs, bamukundiye uko ameze n'uko yifata. Mourinho ntanezwe no gukundwa canke ibishobisho - intsinzi niyo nyamukuru. Nta kinya agira kandi akora ibifatika - ibi rero bica bidushikana ku mukenyuro wiwe mu gukina. Abafana ba Tottenham bamenyereye umupira unyaruka, ufise umurindi, urimwo gusatira nk'uko Pochettino yakinisha abakinyi. Bahora bakina umupira ubereye ijisho nk'uko bavyerekanye mu makipe akomeye i Buraya. Umukenyuro wa Mourinho usa n'uwanditswe mw'ibuye kandi, ibi ni ivya nkenerwa, vyaramuhiriye - ariko ibi bihushanye na Pochettino. Gukomera, gutegura neza, akazi kakarangu bihagije. Abafana ba Spurs barashobora kwemera ibigiye kuza - ariko none bizomara igihe kingana gute?

headline: Ingabo za ONU zavuye Butembo - Buramatari
text: Ingabo za ONU/UN muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Congo (MONUSCO) zavuye mu gisagara kiri mu buseruko, Butembo, inyuma y'imyiyerekano yahitanye abantu mu kwezi guheze binubira ko bananiwe guhagarika ubwicanyi bw'imigwi yitwaje ibigwanisho, nk'uko vyavuzwe n'umutegetsi w'ico gihugu. Umukuru w'intara ya Nord Kivu, Gen Constant Kongba Ndima yagize ati:"Monusco yamaze kugenda. Kubera hari ibikoresho vyabo bisigaye mu gisagara, tugiye guhurira i Goma n'abajejwe igikorwa barimwo kugira turabe ingene twobirungika, co kimwe n'abakozi bake basigaye i Butembo." Yavuze ko ingendo z'abakozi ba Monusco hamwe n'ibikoresho vyabo bishobora gucungerwa n'inzego zijejwe umutekano za Congo. Umuvugizi wa Monusco, Ndeye Khady Lo yavuze ko "urwo rwego rwatanguye igikorwa co gukwiragiza abakozi barwo vy'imfatakibanza mu turere two mu micungararo ya Butembo ... inyuma y'ibiganiro vyabahuje n'abategetsi b'ako karere n'abo ku rwego rw'igihugu". Imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza Monusco yarabereye muri Nord Kivu mu mpera z'ukwezi kw'indwi. Abari muri  yo basaba ko izo ngabo zokura meza muri ico gihugu. Reta ya Congo yavuze ko abantu 36 ari bo bishwe abandi 170 barakomerekera muri iyo myiyerekano.

headline: Sam Allardyce: umumenyereza wa West Brom asaba ko ihiganwa rihagarara gato
text: Sam Allardyce umumenyereza wa West Brom avuga ko ihiganwa rya Premier League ryohagarara gato inyuma y'uko hasubiriye kuboneka ibiharuro vyinshi vy'abakinyi banduye coronavirus. Ejo ku wa kabiri, ibipimo vyafashwe ku bakinyi ba Premier League vyerekanye ko 18 banduye. Ibitigiri vy'abanduye umugera mushasha wa coronavirus muri Fulham bisigura ko urukino rw'uno musi ruyihuza na Tottenham ata wuzi ko ruhava ruba. Allardyce ati: "Mfise impungenge kuri jewe ubwanje hamwe no mu mupira w'amaguru muri rusangi". Sheffield United imenyesha ko abakinyi bayo batari bake baherutse gupimwa bagasanga baranduye. Ku wa mbere, urukino rwari rutegekanijwe hagati ya Everton na Manchester City rwarungurujwe hasigaye amasaha ane ngo rutangure kubera iki kiza ca coronavirus. Allardyce avuga ko "akaruhuko gato" ari co kintu gikenewe kugira ngo bahangane n'iki kiza. Inyuma y'aho umurwi wiwe ukubitiwe ku kibuga cawo ibitsindo bitanu na Leeds nijoro, yavuze ati: "Umutekano kuri bose ni co kintu nyamukuru imbere y'ibindi vyose". "Iyo numvise ko uwu mugera mushasha wandukira ningoga gusumba uwa mbere, ikintu gikenewe ubu ni ukubanza guhagarika gato". "Mfise imyaka 66, sinipfuza kwandura Covid". "N'aho twogerageza gute, n'aho twopimisha kangahe, uko twokwambara udupfukamunwa kwose, uko twokaraba kwose, turabandanya kwandura mu gihugu cose". "Mu gihe vyoboneka ko ari vyo bikenewe [akaruhuko], tubikore uko ihiganwa ripfume riba rirerire ariko tubanze duhangane n'iki kiza". Ralph Hasenhuttl umumenyereza wa Southampton yakoreye muhira yifashishije ubuhinga bwa videwo mu rukino rwarangiye ari ubusa ku bundi na West Ham nijoro ku wa kabiri inyuma y'aho umwe mu bo atunze mu nzu asanze yaranduye coronavirus. Eka n'umumenyereza wa Wolves, Nuno Espirito Santo, yagize ico avuga ku bijanye n'ibi bitigiri vy'abanduye uwu mugera muri Premier league inyuma y'aho umurwi wiwe utsindiwe na Manchester United nijoro ku wa kabiri. Ati: "Ibitigiri bigenda vyiyongera ku buryo buteye ubwoba mu gihugu kandi na twe ntaho tuyihungira". "Hariho ibintu udashobora gukwepa. Iyo hari indwara y'icaduka ije, abantu bategerezwa kwicara bakihweza igisumba ikindi". Hagati aho, ryaba ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza, ryaba ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru ku rwego rwa Buraya, yaba reta, ntaco izi nzego ziratangaza ku bijanye n'ingingo zikwiye gufatwa.

headline: Coronavirus: Umuti wa Remdesivir wariko urageragezwa kuyivura warananiwe
text: Igerageza rya mbere ry'umuti wari wizewe ko ushobora kuvura coronavirus rivugwa ko ataco ryatanze. Hari icizere c'uko umuti remdesivir wari gushobora kuvura Covid-19. Ariko igerageza ryabereye mu Bushinwa ryerekana ko uwo muti ataco washitseko, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'icegeranyo caciye mu ryahumye umuryango ujejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO. Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko uwo muti utashoboye no gutanga ka mitende kubarwayi canke ngo ubure ugabanye n'umugera mu maraso. Ihinguriro ryo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ryakoze uwo muti,  Gilead Sciences, rivuga ko iryo geragezwa ryafashwe ukurati ko. Amakuru y'uko iryo gerageza ataco ryashitseko yagiye kumenyekana inyuma y'aho OMS yerekaniye ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rwayo icegeranyo c'ivyavuye muri iryo gerageza, ariko mu nyuma ikaza kugikurako. OMS ibandanya ivuga ko habaye ukwihenda mu gushira ahabona ico cegeranyo. Ico cegeranyo cerekana ko iryo geragezwa ryakorewe ku barwayi 237, aho abashika 158 bahawe uwo muti kugira ngo barabe ko hari igihinduka bagereranije n'abandi 79 bobo bahawe iyindi yo gupfupfahaza. Inyuma y'ukwezi, ibice 13.9% vy'abarwaye bahawe uwo muti barapfuye, mu gihe ibice 12.8% vya bamwe bahabwa imiti yo gupfupfahaza aribo bapfuye. Ico cegeranyo kivuga kiti: "remdesivir nta kintu yamariye abawufashe, haba mu kubavura canke mu kugabanya ubukari". Gilead iriyamiriza ico cegeranyo ca OMS. Umwe mu bavugizi ba Gilead avuga ati: "Twibaza ko inkuru yatanzwe yarimwo ibintu bitari vyo ku vyerekeye iryo gerageza". Yongera ko y'uko iryo gerageza ryahagaritswe haciye akanya gato kubera atari benshi baryitabiriye, vyumvikana ko ibitigiri bitari bikwiye. Ati: "Ikiboneka ni uko iryo gerageza ritarangiye, kuko ibiharuro vyerekana ko remdisivir ishobora kugira akarusho, cane cane mu gihe abarwaye bivujije hakiri kare". Hagati aho, si ukuvuga ko ivy'uwo muti birangiriye aha, kuko ibikorwa vyo kuwugerageza bibandanya mu minsi iri imbere bikazoshobora kwerekana neza isanamu nyayo ku vyerekeye ikoreshwa ryawo.

headline: Biden yashigikiye ingingo ya US yo kuva muri Afghanistan, aba Taliban bobo bishimira intsinzi
text: Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika atsimbataye ku ngingo yiwe yo kuvana ingabo za Amerika muri Afghanistan - ingingo yatumye aba Taliban basubira kwigarurira ubutegetsi,. Mw'ijambo yaraye ashikirije igihugu haciye umusi umwe gusa intambara yari imaze imyaka 20 irangiye muri Afghanistan, Perezida Biden yavuze ko kuguma muri Afghanistan utari wo muti. Yarashimiye ingabo ku gikorwa bateguye co guhungisha abantu barenga 120.000 bashaka guhunga ubutegetsi bw'aba Taliban. Uyu muhari ugendera ku vyiyumviro vy'idini rya Islam babandanya bigina ico bita intsinzi. Ingabo mpuzamakungu zirongowe na Amerika zinjiye muri Afghanistan mu 2001, zomora aba Taliban inyuma y'ibitero vyo ku wa 11 z'ukw'icenda 2001 vyagirijwe al-Qaeda - umuhari w'intagondwa wari ufise icicaro muri ico gihugu co muri Aziya. Perezida Biden aranegurwa cane  - haba mu gihugu canke no mu ncuti za Amerika - akagirizwa ko yahurudutse mu kuva muri Afghanistan, ivyatumye ingabo za Afghanistan zigishijwe  zigahabwa amafaranga na Amerika nyene mu kiringo c'imyaka itari mike zikubitwa mu buryo butari bwitezwe. Abarwanyi b'aba Taliban zigaruriye igihugu cose mu misi 11 gusa - bakaba bafashe umugwa mukuru Kabul ku wa 15 z'ukwa munani. Perezida Biden yarungitse ingabo hafi 6.000 gufata ikibuga c'indege kugira ngo zihagararire ibikorwa vyo guhungisha Abanyamerika n'abandi banyamahanga, hamwe n'abanya Afghanistan bakoranye n'ingabo mpuzamakungu. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi barisutse ku kibuga c'indege mpuzamakungu ca Kabul barondera kwurira indege zariko zirahungisha abantu. Mw'ijambo ry'ejo ku wa kabiri, Perezida Biden yashimiye ingabo kuri iki gikorwa co guhungisha abantu benshi mu kiringo gito, aca yemera ko azobandanya n'utwigoro two gutahukana Abanyamerika bakiri muri Afghanistan bipfuza kuvayo- bose hamwe bakaba bashika hafi  200. Ariko, uyu mukuru w'igihugu ca Amerika yashigikiye yivuye inyuma ingingo yiwe yo gutahukana ingabo. Biden ati: "Ntabwo nari kubandanya intambara idahera. Intambara muri Afghanistan ubu irarangiye". Avuga ko Amerika itari ikeneye ingabo ku rubuga kugira ngo yirwanire. Joe Biden yagerageje "kurangiza uruyogoyogo" inyuma y'ukwezi kwaranzwe n'akajagari n'ubwicanyi muri Afghanistan, inyuma kandi y'imyaka 20 Amerika yita ku rutare ngo yigarurire ico gihugu yongere icubake gushasha. Hamwe hamwe, yasa n'uwiregura, avuga ko Abanyamerika bagabishijwe incuro 19 zose ko bova muri Afghanistan imbere y'uko ingabo za Amerika zitahukanwa mu kwa munani. Yagirije abategetsi ba Afghanistan, incuti za Amerika zagendera kuri yo, ko "baranzwe n'ibiturire n'ugusesagura ubutunzi". Yagirije kandi ubutegetsi bwa Trump ko mu biganiro bwarimwo n'aba Taliban bwateye igikumu ku masezerano adatomoye yo gukura ingabo muri Afghanistan. Avuga ko Amerika ata nyungu zikomeye ifise muri Afghanistan, anagerageza no kwerekana isura nshasha ya poritike mpuzamakungu, ko idategerezwa gushingira ku kurungika ingabo zayo mu mahanga, ahubwo ko itegerezwa gushingira ku migenderanire myiza n'ugufashanya n'amakungu kugira ngo ihangane n'abakeba bayo nk'Uburusiya n'Ubushinwa. Abanyamerika baboneka ko bashigikiye ko ingabo zivanwa muri Afghanistan, ariko abenshi ntibishimiye ingene Biden yavyifashemwo. Abategetsi bo mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu, Maison Blanche/White House, bizeye ko, uko imisi izogenda, ariko  igihugu kizogenda cishimira igikorwa cakozwe n'umukuru w'igihugu cabo bakanibagira ibivugwa ku kungene vyagenze.

headline: Urukingo rwa coronavirus: Ibipimo ku nkende bitanga icizere
text: Urukingo rwa coronavirus bisa nk'uko rwakingiye indwara ya Covid-19 inkende zitandatu zo mu bwoko bwa "rhesus macaque". Ibi vyatanze icizere kuri urwo rukingo, kuri ubu rukaba ruriko rurageragezwa ku bantu. Ariko naho biri uko, nta cemeza ko ivyashitsweko ku nkende ari vyo bizoshikwako ku bantu. Ibikoko vyahawe urwo rukingo, hanyuma bikanduzwa umugera wa SARS-Cov-2, basanze bifise umugera muke cane mu mahaha no mu mahemero. Aho bagereranije n'umugwi w'izindi nkende zozo zitahawe urwo rukingo. Ukwo kugerageza kwakorewe muri Amerika, kujamwo abashakashatsi b'ikigo ca leta ya Amerika, National Institutes of Health (NIH) hamwe n'abo kuri Kaminuza ya Oxford mu Bwongereza. Urwo rukingo vyagaragaye ko rukingira ibikoko ntibifatwe n'umusonga. Inkende z'ukwo "rhesus macaques" zifise uburyo bw'umubiri bwo kwikingira indwara bushusha nk'ubw'umuntu. Ku buryo bwokwizigirwa, ntizafashwe n'indwara zituruka ku kwirwanako kw'abasoda b'umubiri - bishika igihe urukingo rwakiriwe nabi n'umubiri ku rugero rubi cane. Ivyo vyarashitse mu magerageza ya mbere ku bikoko aho vyaterwa urukingo rwa SARS - ubundi bwoko bwa coronavirus - bica biba inkingi ikomeye mu gutunganya urukingo rw'iyo ndwara. Iki cigwa ntikirihwezwa n'abashakashatsi hanyuma ngo gishirwe ahabona mu binyamakuru, ariko Prof Stephen Evans wo kw'ishure rya London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine, yavuze ko ari ivyo "ku rwego rwo hejuru" kandi "bitera intege cane". Hagati aho mu Bwongereza abakorerabushake bashika 1000 bariko barageragerezwako urukingo kuri Kaminuza ya Oxford. Kuri ubu hari inkingo zirenga 100 za coronavirus ziriko zirageragezwa.

headline: Incanco za Covid: Unicef isaba ibihugu vya G7 gutanga incanco kugira ntizizopfe ubusa
text: Unicef igabisha ko miriyoni z'incanco za Covid zishobora gutabwa hamwe ibihugu bitunze vyorungikira ibihugu bikenye  ica rimwe izo bizoba bisigaje. Ubwongereza n'abandi baremeye gutanga incanco zirenze ku zo bakeneye - ariko basabwa gutanga nyinshi hakiri kare. Ivyamamare birimwo Billie Eilish na David Beckham bashigikiye ako kamo ka Unicef. Abo rurangiranwa bashize umukono kw'ikete bandikiye umugwi w'ibihugu indwi vya mbere bitunze cane kw'isi G7 - birimwo Ubwogereza - babisaba gutanga 20% y'incanco zavyo gushika mu kwezi kw'umunani. Beckham yavuze ati: "Ikiza ntikizorangira na hamwe gushika kirangiye hose." Abandi muri abo rurangiranwa bashize umukono kuri iryo kete barimwo Andy Murray, Olivia Colman, Ewan McGregor, Liam Payne, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Orlando Bloom, Katy Perry, Gemma Chan, Whoopi Goldberg, Claudia Schiffer na  Chris Hoy. Uwurongoye umugambi w'incanco muri Unicef Lily Caprani yabwiye ikiganiro BBC Newsnight ko ibihugu bikeneye guha urucanco abanyagihugu bavyo igihe kimwe co kimwe n'ibindi bihugu. Yavuze ati: "Hazogera igihe, aho nta nkeka, aho tuzokenera guha incanco abafise munsi y'imyaka 18, "Ariko ikiza imbere muri iki gihe n'uko abantu bafise ivyago vyinshi vyo kwandura bobanza bakaronka incanco. "Nico gituma tuvuga ko ibihugu nk'Ubwongereza na G7  bikeneye gutanga incanco zavyo ku bihugu bikenye ubu, mu gihe bibandanya gutanga incanco ku banyagihugu bavyo." Ariko ku ndwi iheze, umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu Matt Hancock yavuze ko gucandaga  abana mu Bwongereza bizoshirwa imbere  yo  kurungika incanco hanze. Bitandukanye n'ibindi bihugu, Ubwongereza ntiburavuga  incanco butegekanya guha umugambi wa Covax ingene zingana, gusa bwemeza ko buzotanga izizoba zirenzeko. Ku wa gatanu Hancock yavuze ko Ubwongereza ubu ata ncanco zirengako bufise. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi abantu 100 bahoze ari abashikiranganji ba mbere , abakuru b'ibihugu n'abashikiranganji  b'imigenderanire basavye abakuru b'ibihugu vya G7 gutanga 2/3 vya miriyaridi hafi 66 z'ama dollars zo gutanga incanco za Covid mu bihugu vy'amikoro make. Uwahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere Tony Blair yavuze ati: ''uko ibintu biri" n'uko ama reta "ategereza kubanza kwitaho abanyagihugu bayo" gutyo akazokwama abanza gutanga incanco mu bihugu vyayo ubwa mbere. Ariko yongeyeko ati:  "Ntushobora kuba ntabanduka kuri ico, hari incanco zishobora kuba zirarungikwa". Uwundi yahoze ari umushikuranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza, Gordon Brown, yavuze ko G7 n'ibindi bihugu bitunze "bitegerezwa gutanga intererano yavyo" kugira bifashe ibice vya Afrika na Asia. Madame  Caprani  wa Unicef yasavye ibihugu vya  G7 gutangura gutanga incanco ubu kandi bibandanye mu ci gushika umwaka uhere. Yavuze ati: "Ibihugu  vy'uburyo  buke bikeneye incanco ziguma ziza  zishika ubwo nyene zigaca zishikira mu minwe y'abakozi bo mu buvuzi". "Ingaruka atawifuza yo kuvuga ko izo ncanco zose zizozira icarimwe  igihe ca Noheli n'uko ibihugu bitazoshobora kuzakira no guca bizikoresha  zose ubwo nyene gutyo zihave zicika impfagusa. Dushobora gusanga miriyomi z'incanco zidakoreshejwe hanyuma zigata igihe, kandi ako  koba ari akaga." Muri iryo lkete, abo  rurangiranwa bavuze ko Unicef isanzwe yaratanguye gutanga incanco mu gihugu bikenye - ariko ko iryo shami rya ONU n'ub u rikibuze incanco zingana na miriyoni 190. Iryo kete ryavuze ko ibihugu vya G7 - Ubwongereza, Canada, Ubufaransa, Ubudagi, Ubutaliano, Ubuyapani na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika -  vuba bigiye kuzoronka izikwiye kugira bitange 20% y'incanco zavyo hagati y'ukwezi kwa gatandatu n'ukwa munani ata  ngaruka nini bigize ku mugambi wavyo mu bihugu hagati, ivyo bibaye umugambi Covax wo gusaranganya incanco woca uronka izishika miriyoni 150. Iryo  kete ryandikiwe ibihugu vya G7 rivuga riti: "Umugera uracariko urakwiragira mu bihugu vyinshi, kandi wihinduranya mu  bwoko bushasha ku buryo ushobora gutuma twese dusubira aho ku ntango. Bamwe muri abo rurangiranwa nk'umukinyi wa tennis Murray basaba kandi abantu mu Bwongereza gutanga intererano ku mugambi wa Unicef wo guterereza imfashanyo yo kurwanya Covd, VaccinAid Appeal. Mu nama ya G7 mu mpera z'iyi ndwi, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson yitezwe gusaba ko hashingwa ihangiro ryo kuba isi yose yaronse incanco gushika mu mpera za 2022. Abaharanira ko incanco zisaragwanywa kw'isi n'abaraba ibintu n'ibindi hamwe n'umugwi w'abashingamateka -  bavuga ko hakenewe icokorwa ubu kandi ko Ubwongereza bukwiye  kugaba urucanco rumwe kuri rumwe rwose ruba rwinjiye muri ico gihugu. Ubwongereza buramaze guha Covax intererano y'amafaranga arenga miriyoni 775 z'ama dorari, incanco zingana n'igice c'umuriyoni za AstraZeneza nazo zikaba zaratumweko n'ibindi bihugu kugira bizirungike hanze. Abarongoye ibihugu vy'umugwi wa G7 bazohurira mu nama i Cornwall mu Bwongereza mu mpera z'iyi ndwi. Amerika, Ubufaransa,  Ubudagi, Ubutaliano n'Ubuyapani vyose vyaramaze kumenyesha igitigiri c'incanco bizoha Covax. Co kimwe n'Ubwongereza, Canada nta gitgiri iramenyesha muri uwo mugambi wo gutanga.

headline: US yafatiye ibihano abategetsi ba Uganda bagirizwa amabi mu matora
text: Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zafatiye ibihano vyo kwimwa impusha (visas) zo kwinjira muri iki gihugu abategetsi ba Uganda bagirizwa kugira uruhara mw'ihungabanywa ry'intwaro rusangi. Ibi vyatangajwe n'umunyamabanga wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Antony Blinken inyuma y'ifatwa ry'abanywanyi b'imigambwe itavuga rumwe n'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi muri Uganda. Yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Hariho ingaruka zo kwivanga muri demokarasi". Abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bavuga ko abantu barenga 400 baburiwe irengero inyuma yo gufatwa n'inzego zijejwe umutekano imbere y'amatora yo mu kwa mbere. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, abahinga ba ONU bakurikirana ibijanye n'uburenganzira bwa muntu zahamagariye abategetsi ba Uganda kuhagarika ingendo yo kuburabuza abo bahanganye muri politike. Ku wa kane, reta ya Uganda yaremeye ko yahagaritse abantu barenga 1.000 bapfunzwe ku mvo z'amatora. Ariko nnta nsobanuro zikwiye yatanze ku mpamvu bapfunzwe n'aho bapfungiwe. Kuri bamwe, iri fatwa rikozwe ku butegetsi bwa Yoweri Museveni ryibutsa iryakorwa ku butegetsi bwa Idi Amin mu myaka yo mu 1970.

headline: Jane n'umugabo wiwe Donah Omondi bamaze imyaka 12 bubakanye, nta mwana bararonka
text: Uravye indirimbo ziwe ku mbuga hwaniro, ntushobora na gato kwibaza ko Jane Aller ari mu bibazo bingana ukuraha mu buzima bwiwe. Kuva bubakanye, we n'umugabo wiwe Donah Omondi ntaco batakoze kugira ngo bikunde baronke ikibondo. Ariko hageze neza ko Imana ibahezagira, umugisha ukabaca mu myanya y'intoke. Jane avuga ko uru ari urugendo abagore benshi bagira mu gacerere ntibubahuke kubivugira hejuru. Jane, umuririmvyi w'indirimbo zo guhayagiza Imana muri Kenya, avuga ko yafashe kuvugira ku mugaragaro amageragezwa ahura nayo kugira ngo atere intege abandi. Jane Aller amaze imyaka 12 yubatse. Imyaka ine ya mbere yaranzwe n'ibigeragezo  bidasanzwe. Ati: "Maze umwaka umwe gusa, narasamye inda, ngira umunezero udasanzwe, co kimwe n'umugabo wanje. Ariko rero ku gihamana kibi, iyi mbanyi yarikoroye yo nyene imaze amezi atatu gusa". Kubera vyari bibaye ubwa mbere, yibajije ko ryari isanganya risanzwe, nta mutima wasimvye. Yari azi ko umwanya n'umwanya yari gusama iyindi mbanyi kandi akibaruka. Mu bijanye no gusama imbanyi, mu bisanzwe igi ry'umugore rihura n'urubuto rw'umugabo mu karingoti nyabavyeyi (trompe de Fallope), maze rigaca rija mu gitereko. Nibwo umwana aba atanguye kubaho. Ariko rero kuri Jane, ivyo gusama imbanyi ya kabiri vyabereye hanze y'igitereko. Inda nk'izo zizwi nka ectopique canke extra-utérine. Ati: "Ku munsi ugira kane natanguye kuva amaraso mu gitereko, aho si nari nzi ko imbanyi yanje yari yononekaye kandi ko ndi ku manga y'urupfu". "Muri iyo minsi ine yose numva mfise ububabare butagira izina. Kubera ko umuganga yari asanzwe ankurikirana atari ho yari ari, vyabaye ngombwa ko ndindira mpaka agarutse". "Muri ico gihe cose, sinari nzi ko umwana yari yamaze gupfa, kandi ko igitereko canje cari cuzuye amaraso yari yafatanye". Vyabaye ngombwa ko uyu mugore ashirwa mu bitaro akabagwa kugira ngo bashobore kurokora ubuzima bwiwe. Avuga ko iki cabaye igihe c'ububabare budasanzwe, atari ku mubiri gusa, ariko n'umwikomo mwinshi cane kubona abuze umwana wiwe ku ncuro ya kabiri. Jane ati: "Imbere y'uko banjana mu cumba co kubaga, vyabaye ngombwa ko muganga amfata amaraso kugira ngo ampime bisanzwe. Aho rero niho yambaza ingene nari nkiri muzima mu gihe amaraso yanje yari yavuze". Ico gihe, Jane yaciye atangura kwibaza ibibazo vyinshi cane, yuzura umwikomo mwinshi abaza Imana igituma yemeye ko aca muri ayo mageragezwa. Jane avuga ko basubiye muhira ata mwana bafise. Haciye umwanya yarasubiye arasama iyindi mbanyi, ariko yoyo nta mwanya wahaciye idakorotse. Uyu mukenyezi avuga ko n'aho yari umukozi w'Imana, we n'umugabo wiwe harageze igihe bashavura cane, nawe yuzura umubabaro mwinshi. Nta nyishu baronse ku bibazo vyiwe, mbere n'abaganga nta nyishu bamuhaye kuko igihe cose yabwirwa ko igitereko ciwe ata ngorane n'imwe gifise. Ati: "Igihe imbanyi yanje ya gatatu ikoroka, nari mu bikorwa vyo kuririmba, hanyuma kubera nari nabazwe, umushono watanguye kugira ibibazo ndiko ndaririmba nyene". "Muri uwo mwanya sinatahuye igituma nariko nca muri ayo marushwa kandi ndi umukozi w'Imana, ndiko ndirimbira Imana". Uyu mukenyezi avuga ko atumva ingene Imana yamukoresha gukiza imibiri n'imitima y'abantu aciye mu kuririmba, mu gihe wewe yabandanya abura abana igihe cose asamye imbanyi. Nico gituma ico gihe, arinze afata mikoro aririmba, yari amarira gusa, amosozi akamurenga. Avuga ati: "Aho rero ndiko ndarira abantu bibaza ko nari mu mpwemu, ntibari bazi ko ndiko ndira kubera amarushwa yo kubura abana banje". Rero igihe asama imbanyi igira kane, yumvise umunezero, ariko Jane n'umugabo wiwe bahisemwo kuja kwa muganga kugira ngo bamupime barabe ko ata ngorane afise. Inyishu zavuye mu bipimo bamukoreye zarabaciye intege. Muganga yamubwiye ko imbanyi yayisamiye mu mutsi, kandi ko mu gihe uwo mutsi wosaduka, ubuzima bwiwe bwoba bugiye mu kaga. Yagiriwe inama rero ko ari ngombwa ko bakurayo iyo mbanyi kugira ngo ntapfe. "Maze gukorora imbanyi ya kane, ibintu ntivyanyoroheye, nararize iminsi myinshi cane, mbere sinshake no kuraba impuzu nagira ngo nguriye abana  banje.  Hanyuma kandi nkaguma nibaza nti kubona maze gukorora inda zine zose, ubwo uyu mugabo wanje aracankunda"? Jane avuga ko umugabo wiwe yamubereye urutare, kuko yamugumye iruhande igihe cose yagiye agira ibibazo vyo kubura abana biturutse ku mbanyi zakoroka. Bamaze kubura umwana wabo agira kane, Jane yaciye amara imyaka itari mike adasubiye gusama iyindi mbanyi. Mu mwaka uheze, niho yasubiye gusama imbanyi igira gatanu. Iyi mbanyi imaze amezi atatu gusa, yaciye ikoroka. Ikintu kidasanzwe nk'uko Jane we nyene avyivugira, ni uko bwa bubabare yagira ubwa mbere ubu atabwo yumvise. Avuga ko yaciye abona ko ata kundi ategerezwa kubifata uko biri, maze yizera ko igihe ni cagera Imana izomuha umwana. Jane Aller nk'umuririmvyi, umugabo wiwe niwe ategura akamufasha no gutunganya indirimbo ziwe. Ubuvugabutumwa be no gukunda kuririmba, ibi nivyo vyashoboye kubanywanisha. Uretse ko ari umugabo n'umugore, biyumvirira hamwe ibijanye n'ibikorwa vyabo vya minsi yose ibi navyo bikaba ari ukuririmba. Uyu mugore avuga ko umugabo wiwe yamubereye inkingi nyamukuru mu buzima bwiwe cane cane muri aya makuba y'imbanyi ziwe zikoroka. Ikibazo nyamukuru kuri we cabaye ingene ababanyi bafata ibimubako, ariko Jane avuga ko incuti ziwe za hafi nk'akarorero inabukwe wiwe yamubaye hafi cane. Kandi iyo ariko atanga impanuro ku bantu baca mu bibazo nk'ivyo acamwo abasaba kudacika intege. Ati: "Ico womenya ni uko hari abantu bahukanye kubera kubura abana, kandi n'igihe basubiriye kwubakana  gushasha bongera guhura n'ivyo bibazo nyene". "Ni nkenerwa ko abantu baca mu bibazo nk'ibi bihangana, bagakomeza urukundo rwabo bakabandanya bihanganiranira". Jane avuga ko ubuzima ari nk'ukugendesha igari, kugira ngo ntuyumbayumbe utegerezwa kubandanya urinyonga. Rero ibintu bizima biza ku bantu babandanya bizeye mu gihe ataco bafise bishimikiza mu kwizera. Jane Aller n'umugabo wiwe Donna babandanya bizeye ko umunsi umwe bazoterura umwana wabo mu maboko. Imbanyi gukoroka ni ikintu gikunze kwibonekeza cane ku bagore benshi kw'isi yose. Hari igihe ivayo hakiri kare cane mbere ugasanga n'umugore ntiyari bwamenye ko yari yaramaze gusama. Kwandura indwara zica mu mibonano mpuzabitsina, ihahamuka, ibibazo vyo mu mutwe, ibi ni bimwe mu bishobora gutuma inda zikoroka hakiri kare. Imbanyi kandi irashobora gukoroka kubera umugore yibungenze yagumye hafi y'isumu canke imiti kanaka irimwo isumu. Si ibintu vyoroshe igihe cose kumenya igituma inda zikoroka, ariko vyinshi mu bituma birashobora kwirindwa. Ingorane zo gukorora inda zirashobora gutorerwa umuti mu kuvura abagore bafise ico kibazo indwara zibibatuma, canke mu kubafasha kwirinda kwegera ahantu hari isumu canke hatameze neza. Hagati aho, hari abandi bagore inda zama zikoroka buri mwanya mbere ugasanga igituma ntikizwi. Abagore bafise ico kibazo c'imbanyi gukoroka igihe cose bategerezwa gupimwa, bakavurwa n'abahinga banonosoye ivy'izo ndwara, kugira ngo bashobore kurondera igituma biba, hanyuma bakabafasha kwibungenga gushika bashikane.

headline: Imvo n'imvano: Amateka y'umupira w'amaboko, Volley Ball na Basket Ball mu Rwanda
text: Amateka y'umupira w'amaboko, Volley Ball na Basket Ball mu Rwanda mu ruhererekane rw'ibiganiro bine twabateguriye turi i Paris, muri Studio za Radio France.

headline: Amatora ya Kenya: kurima urumogi no kugurisha ubumara bw’inzoka, imigambi ya George Wajackoyah
text: George Wajackoyah , umunyaporitike yahoze ari umwana wo mw’ibarabara muri Kenya, hanyuma akaja gukora akazi ko kwimba imva mu Bwongereza, yabaye igitangaza muri poritike ya Kenya mu kwiyamamariza ikibanza c’umukuru w’iki gihugu, aho yemerera abanyagihugu ko azokigira igihugu gikomeye gishora hanze urumogi, ubumara bw’inzoka hamwe n’amatengatwa y’imfyisi, n’aho hari ibibazo vyinshi ku kungene yoshobora gushira mu ngiro iyi migambi. Uyu mwigisha wa kaminuza afise imyaka 63, akaba yize amategeko, yiyerekanye nk’umuntu atandukanye cane mu bakandida bane bariko biyamamariza iki kibanza c’umukuru w’ico gihugu co muri Afrika y’Ubuseruko mu matora ategekanijwe kuba ku wa 9 z’ukwezi kuza kwa Myandagaro (8). Ibiharuro ngereranyo biha amahirwe make cane uyu mukandida w’umugambwe Roots Party, mu kibanza ca gatatu – ibiharuro vya nyuma biheruka gusohoka ku wa 11 z’uku kw’indwi bikaba bimuha amajwi 4% gusa. Ariko abahinga babona ko nk’umuntu ari bwo bwa mbere yiyamamaje, ariko avyifatamwo neza kandi n’abakandida babiri bakomeye barafise ubwoba bwo gutakaza ijwi rimwe gusa ryohava rimwegukira, na rirya babona ko bitazokworoha hagati y’aba babiri, ibiharuro bigashira imbere uwahoze ari umunyaporitike akomeye atavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi Raila Odinga ku majwi 43% hanyuma icegera c’umukuru w’igihugu nawe William Ruto agahabwa 39%. Macharia Gaitho, umunyamakuru yandika mu kinyamakuru Daily Nation ca Kenya, yandika ati: "Wajackoyah ariko yiyamamaza mu buryo atari ubw’igitangaza ku buryo abantu bo mu gisagara bashobora no kumutwenga, ariko ntagushidikanya ko ariko ahurumbirwa n’urwaruka rwinshi rurakaye, rutishimiye ubutegetsi haba mu bisagara canke ruguru mu mitumba ya kure muri Kenya, kuko arengera ibintu vyose bisanzwe bitandukanya abanya-Kenya nk’amoko, intara n’imigambwe”. Mu myiyamamazo, Prof Wajackoyah yiyambarira ibisanzwe, ipantaro yo kwinonora imitsi (tracksuit), agapira n’igitambara mu mutwe, hakwambara za kositime (costume) – kugira ngo yerekane ko atari mu banya-Kenya basanzwe bari ku butegetsi, aba nabo akaba abagiriza igiturire kirenze urugero. Yerekana intoke ziwe nk’uwuriko aranywa urumogi, agasarisha abantu bitabira amakoraniro yiwe mu gutamba umuziki wa reggae. Prof Wajackoyah avuga ko aramutse atsinze azorekura ukurima no kwimbura urumogi kugira ngo rukoreshwe mu mahinguriro no mu buvuzi, mu ntumbero yo gutorera umuti zibiri mu ngorane nyamukuru za Kenya – ubushomeri n’amadeni y’umurengera. Avuga ko ashobora kwinjiriza Kenya imiriyaridi zirenga ibihumbi icenda vy’amashilingi ya Kenya  (ni ukuvuga imiriyaridi 76 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika) ku mwaka, kandi ko reta itazigera “isubira gusaba ingurane y’urufaranga na rumwe”. Yongerako ati: "Ibihugu vyo mu burengero vyaramaze gutanga uburenganzira bwo kwimbura urumogi, kubera iki tweho tutobikora?” N’aho ata bushakashatsi yishimikiza mu vyo avuga, kurekura ukurima n’ukwimbura urumogi kugira rukoreshwe mu mahinguriro no mu buvuzi nico imyiyamamazo yiwe ihagazeko. Urubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw’ikigo Africa Check ruvuga ko imigambi yiwe idatomoye. Hagati aho, ibi vyamutumye avugwa cane ku mbuga hwaniro, mbere n’urwaruka rwinshi ruhanzwe bikomeye n’ubushomeri rukaba rumwirukira. Mu gihe imigambi ya Prof Wajackoyah yoshirwa mu ngiro, Kenya yoba yinjiye ku rutonde rw’ibindi bihugu vya Afrika - harimwo Lesotho, Afrika y’Epfo, Zambia na Zimbabwe – biriko biradodora kw’isoko ry’urumogi abahinga babona ko gushika mu 2028 rizoba rigeze ku miriyaridi zababa 70 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika. Prof Wajackoyah avuga ko atarigera anywa urumogi, ariko ko mu gihe rwokwemerwa n’amategeko, ko yoba uwa mbere mu kurunywa. Ati: "Nta kibi na kimwe kirimwo mu kurunywa iyo rwemewe n’amategeko kandi inzego zibijejwe zikemeza ko rushobora kunyobwa”. Ivyiyumviro vya Prof Wajackoyah biriyamirizwa na Ekleziya Katorika muri Kenya, aho ivuga ko kunywa ibiyayuramutwe vyokwunyuka mu gihe amategeko yorekura urumogi. Musenyeri James Maria Wainaina  avuga ati: "Imiryango irahanzwe n’ibiyayuramutwe biyitera gusambuka, indyane n’impfu rimwe rimwe”. Prof Wajackoyah yemereye kandi abanyagihugu gusubiramwo amasezerano yose reta ya Perezida Uhuru Kenyatta yahaye amakompanyi y’Abashinwa. Mu madeni Kenya ifitiye ibihugu n’amashirahamwe yo hanze, Ubushinwa bufisemwo 21%, ivyateje induru mu gihugu, na cane cane ko ibiri muri aya masezerano – amenshi akaba ari ay’ibikorwa remezo, nko kwubaka amabarabara hamwe n’indarayi – bitashizwe ahabona. Prof Wajackoyah abona kandi ko kworora inzoka ari irindi soko rikomeye ry’ubutunzi bwa Kenya. Avuga ko ubumara bw’inzoka – aho avuga ko “buzimvye cane gusumba inzahabu” – buzokwimburwa mu ntumbero yo kubukoresha mu buvuzi, mu gihe inyama y’inzoka nayo izoshorwa mu bihugu vyo hanze nk’Ubushinwa, aho ifatwa nk’imfungurwa ikomeye. N’aho adatanga ivyemezo ivyo ari vyo vyose, Prof Wajackoyah avuga ati: "Turashobora kwinjiza umuriyaridi w’amadorari buri mwaka tugakomeza ubutunzi bwacu”. Avuga kandi ko Kenya ishobora gushora amatengatwa y’imfyisi asanzwe akoreshwa mu buvuzi mu Bushinwa, akavuga ko ashobora kwinjiriza Kenya amafaranga menshi gusumba urumogi. Amashirahamwe ajejwe amashamba be n’ihuriro ry’abaganga b’ibikoko muri Kenya baramwiyamiriza n’uburakari bwinshi. Iri shirahamwe ry’abaganga b’ibikoko basohoye itangazo bavuga bati: "Urudandaza rw’amatengatwa y’imfyisi hamwe n’inzoka ntirwemewe kandi rwotuma ibikoko vyo mw’ishamba bihahonera”. Iri tangazo ryongerako y’uko "vyotuma haduka ikindi kiza " kuko hoba imigera ikwirakwira ivuye mu mfyinsi no mu nzoka ikabangamira kiremwamuntu. N’aho abamunegura bamwagiriza kwiyemera mu myiyamamazo yiwe (populist), abanywanyi ba Prof Wajackoyah baramwishimiye kuko yashoboye kurengana ingorane nyinshi yaciyemwo mu buzima gushika aho yiyamamariza kuba umukuru w’igihugu. Yavukiye mu mitumba ya kure mu burengero bwa Kenya. Abavyeyi biwe bamaze kwahukana, yisanzwe asigaye aba mw’ibarabara ku mugwa mukuru, Nairobi. Yagiye gutorwa n’abasenzi bo mu rugensero rwa Hare Krishna bari basanzwe bagaburira abadafise aho baba. Prof Wajackoyah yabaye mu rusengero mbere aza kuba n’umupasitori wa Hare Krishna. Yahavuye aronka ubufasha arashobora kurangiza amashure yiwe yisumbuye mu nyuma yinjira mu gipolisi ca Kenya, agenda atera imbere gushika aho yinjira mu gisata kijejwe igendereza. N'aho adatomora neza, Prof Wajackoyah avuga ko yahuye n'ikibazo inyuma yo kuronka amakuru akomeye kuri bumwe mu bwicanyi bukomeye muri Kenya, ubwakorewe umushikiranganji w’imigenderanire Robert Ouko mu 1990. Prof Wajackoyah avuga ko yahagaritswe agakorerwa iyicarubozo, amaze kurekurwa aca arahunga afashijwe n’ibiro vy’ubuserukizi bwa Amerika i Nairobi. Igandagurwa rya Ouko ryagumye ari ikinyegezwa ku banyagihugu gushika aho amatohoza y’inama nshingamateka mu 2010 yerekaniye ko yagandaguriwe kuri umwe mu mihana y’uwari umukuru w’igihugu ico gihe, Daniel arap Moi.
