Amaze guhunga Kenya, Prof Wajackoyah yaronse akaryo ko kuja mu Bwongereza, aho yakoze ubuzi bubayabaye aca aronka akaryo ko kwiga ku ma kaminuza, Soas University of London, University of Warwick hamwe na University of Wolverhampton. Igihe yiga  i Wolverhampton yakora akazi k’ubuzamu, akazi ko kwimba imva no kwoza ibiziga (imirambo mu Kinyarwanda) kugira ngo aronke ubuzima. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Daily Nation ko ubu buzi bwamuhaye "ukwicisha bugufi no gukura”. Avuga ko uku kwiga akora n’akazi vyatumye aronka amanota atari meza mu vyigwa vy’amategeko. Yagize uruhara mu masekeza ya poritike mu Bwongereza mu ntumbero yo guhimiriza impinduka mu turere dutandukanye tw’isi – akaba yaranakoranye n’uwahoze ari umukuru w’igihugu ca Ghana Jerry Rawlings, yashitse ku butegetsi abanje gutembagaza ubwari buhari mu 1981 akaba yarongoye igihugu gushika mu 2000. Prof Wajackoyah yahavuye yimukira muri Amerika, aho yagiye kubonanira n’umugore wiwe w’umunyamerikakazi akomoka muri Afrika. Bavugwa ko bafitaniye abana batatu. Yarize kandi no ku makaminuza atandukanye muri Amerika, harimwo na Walden University ikorera ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, ari nayo  yaronkeyemwo urupapuro rw’umutsindo rwa Doctorat (PhD). Avuga ko afise impapuro z’umutsindo za kaminuza zigera kuri 17, nyinshi zikaba ari izo mu bisata vy’abimukira, amategeko mpuzamakungu n’ay’impunzi, ivyatumye Gaitho avuga n’agahemo ko afise “impapuro z’umutsindo nyinshi gusumba umwanya yategerezwa kwiga kugira yige ivyo vyigwa vyose”. Prof Wajackoyah yagarutse muri Kenya mu 2010 avuga ko yashaka kwiyamamariza ikibanza c’umukuru w’igihugu. Ico gihe yaciye abivamwo, akaba asubiye kuvyura iciyumviro muri ano matora. Mu bindi bitabonwa kumwe yemerera abanyagihugu mu myiyamamazo yiwe, Prof Wajackoyah avuga ko azoteza imbere ubuzima bw’abakozi mu gushiraho imisi ine y’akazi mu ndwi kugira ngo ahe umwanya wo gusenga aba-Islam kuwa gatanu, Abasabato ku wa gatandatu abandi bakritsu nabo ku wa Mungu. Prof Wajackoyah avuga kandi ko azogarukana igihano c’urupfu, kandi ko abo bose bazokwagirwa no kurya igiturire bazohitishwamwo kwicwa barashwe, canke kumanikwa “bahejeje kurya ubugari”.

headline: Kenya: Imisi 13 niyo yahawe abakozi ba reta bataricandagisha Covid-19
text: Abakozi ba reta muri Kenya bahawe imisi 13 gusa ngo babe bahejeje kwiteza urucanco rwo kwikingira Covid-19 canke naho bafatirwe ingingo. Mw'itangazo yasohoye, umukuru w'igisata kijejwe abakozi ba reta yavuze ko iyi ngingo yafashwe kubera igitigiri gito c'abakozi ba reta baronkejwe uru rucanco, cane cane abigisha n'abo mu gisata kijejwe umutekano. Avuga ko hari abakozi ba  reta batari bake bataye akazi kugira bahunge uru rucanco. Ejo ku wa mbere, Kenya yatangaje ko abantu 745 bashasha banduye uwu mugera wa corona, bituma abamaze kwandura kuva iki kiza gishika mu gihugu bashika 212.573. Mu ndwi iheze, reta yavuze ko imaze gutanga incanco imiriyoni 1,7 za AstraZeneca, nyinshi muri izi zikaba ari doze ya mbere. Kenya itegekanya ko gushika mu mpera z'uno mwaka izoba imaze gucandaga abantu imiriyoni cumi.

headline: Ukraine: 'ntihagire ikindi mugurira muri Russia kiretse umwavu n’ingano' - niko US igabisha Africa
text: Uwuserukira Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mw’ishirahamwe ONU  yaragendeye ibihugu vya Afrika, kimwe mu vya mugenza, kwari ukugabisha ko bitohirahira ngo bigurire ikintu kindi mu Burusiya kiretse intete n’umwavu, anagabisha ko bishobora gufatirwa ibihano. Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru i Kampala muri Uganda, Linda Thomas-Greenfield yavuze ati:  “Uburusiya bwama buvuga ngo ibihano bwafatiwe ku mfungurwa no ku bindi bifitaniye isano n’uburimyi vyatumye ibiciro biduga mu bihugu bitari bike. [...] Nagomba kumenyesha ko ata bihano twafatiwe ibintu ivyo ari vyo vyose vy’uburimyi biva mu Burusiya. “Uburusiya burashobora gushora hanze ibidandazwa vyabwo vyo mu gisata c’uburimyi, harimwo umwavu n’ingano, kandi n’ibindi bihugu birashobora kubigura”. “Nayo ku bihano vyafatiwe Uburusiya”, niko Linda Thomas-Greenfield abandanya avuga, “nk’akarorero ku bitoro, mu gihe igihugu cofata ingingo yo gukorana n’Uburusiya mu bisata bwafatiwemwo ibihano, aho coba gihonyanze ibi bihano[…].  Aha rero tugabisha ibihugu ko bitohirahira ngo birenge kuri ibi bihano”. Ibihugu hafi vyose vya Afrika bishima kutegamira kuri Ukraine muri ino ntambara yayo n’Uburusiya. Ibi mu bisanzwe bisigurwa n’ukutagirira icizere Uburengero, imyaka vyamaze mu bukoloni, be n’impuhwe z’incabwenge mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika zize mu Burusiya. Aho nyene, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vya Afrika ni abakiriya bakomeye b’intete za Ukraine, bakaba bahanzwe n’ikibazo c’ubukene bw’imfungurwa kigenda ciyongera. Ni mu gihe ku rubuga, intambara zibandanya ziha inkumbi muri Ukraine. Mu turere tw’intara ya Donetsk tugenzurwa na Ukraine, abasivire batanu baraye bishwe n’ingabo z’Uburusiya, nk’uko bivugwa n’umukuru wa gisirikare muri Donetsk Pavel Kirilenko. Yanditse ku rubuga rwa Telegram ati: "Kw’igenekerezo rya 5 Myandagaro (5), Abarusiya bishe abasivire batanu ba Donbass. Abandi 14 barakomeretse”. Ni mu gihe hari amakuru avuga ko hari igice kigira kabiri c’imfashanyo Amerika iha Ukraine gifise agaciro k’umuriyaridi umwe cimirije gutangwa. Isoko ryabwiye Reuters ko ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu wa Amerika mu ndwi iza - ari nko ku wa mbere – bizotangaza iyindi mfashanyo ingana n’umuriyaridi w’amadorari y’abanyamerika izorungikirwa Ukraine. Muri ino mfashanyo harimwo ibisasu vya za muzinga zitera ibisasu vyinshi, zizwi nka HIMARS, ibirwanisho vyo gukorora indege vyo mu bwoko bwa NASAMS, hamwe n’ibimodoka ntamenwa vyo m ugisata c’ubuvuzi, bizwi nka 50 M113. Perezida Joe Biden ntaratera igikumu kuri uru rupapuro, bikaba bishoboka ko ibigize iyi mfashanyo, ibi navyo bikaba ari ibitigiri hamwe n’ubwoko bw’ibirwanisho, bishobora guhinduka. Mu gihe Biden yoterako igikumu, iyi yoba ari yo mfashanyo nini cane itangiwe icarimwe ihabwa Ukraine kuva intambara itanguye. Amerika imaze kurungikira Ukraine imfashanyo y’agaciro k’imiriyaridi 8.8 igizwe n’ibirwanisho n’ibindi vya nkenerwa. Maison Blanche/White House yanse kugira ico ishikirije ku vyerekeye iyi mfashanyo yimirije.

headline: New York 'yubatswe n'ukuboko kw'Imana' - indirimbo nshasha ya Cinjire
text: Ni umuvugizi w'Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati, umutekano n'iterambere rusangi mu Burundi, ariko kandi abatari bake bamuzi kw'izina rya CINJIRE, uyu si uwundi ni Pierre Nkurukiye, yahawe iryo ritazirano kubera ururirimbo n'urukurikirane rw'indirimbo yise CINJIRE rwasohotse mu 2019. Cinjire aherutse gusohora ururirimbo yise New York Chante Dieu (twovuga mu kirundi tuti New York, ririmba Imana), akavuga ko yaruririmvye ari muri ico gisagara gikomeye co muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Nkurikiye alias Cinjire yabwiye BBC ko mu kuririmba iyo ndirimbo yakozweko n'ukuntu New York yubatse vy'igitangaza, ariko asanga ibibanza vyo guhimbaziramwo Imana vyariyumanganijwe. Ati: "Nshitseyo naritegereje New York ndabona ko ari igisagara cubakitse koko, n'amazu maremare cane, mugabo ngiye kurondera ibibanza canke ingoro z'Imana, nasanze ari utuzu dutoduto, umengo ntaco tumaze, ari naho naciye ngira iciyumviro co kubabwira nti baririmbe Imana. "Nahisemwo New York kuko ari bwo bwa mbere nari ngiyeyo, nabonye ibintu bitangaje, na rirya ari ikirimba c'isi yose kuko ari ho hari icicaro c'ishirahamwe ONU. "Naririmvye ivyo mbona kuko vyarantangaje kubona mu gisagara nka kiriya ata ngoro z'Imana nininini zihari kugira ngo biboneke ko nabo bayihaye ikibanza. "Rero nashimye kuhatangira ubwo butumwa kugira ngo nabo koko bahe Imana ikibanza kiyibereye kuko yabahaye ivyo vyiza bagashobora gushika kuri biriya bashoboye kwubaka". Pierre Nkurikiye alias Cinjire avuga ko yatanguye kwandika indirimbo yiga mu mwaka wa kane w'amashure y'intango. Ati: "Niho natanguriye buke buke kuririmba". Yabandanije aririmba mw'isengero kubera yari mu mihari ya Gatorika, akaba yari mu muhari w'aba Scout. Ivy'umuziki ugezweho yagiye kubitangura ageze muri kaminuza y'inyamiramabi, ari ho yatanguye gukora ururirimbo rwa mbere rukozwe muri studio, asanzwe ari intwazangabo mu gipolisi c'Uburundi. Ati: "Kuririmba n'amabanga nsanzwe njejwe biranyorohera kuko ni ubutumwa bumwe. "Mu ndirimbo zanje nsaba abantu gushira imbere ineza bakarwanya ikibi, urwego ndimwo rw'inyamiramabi narwo rujejwe kurwanya ikibi, urumva rero ko ari ibintu bijanye". Yagiye gusohora urukurikirane rw'indirimbo (album) rwa mbere mu 2019 yise CINJIRE, izina rizwi cane yahavuye yitirirwa gushika ubu. Pierre Nkurikiye alias Cinjire avuga ko mu Burundi hakiri ikibazo nyamukuru ku banyamuziki kuko umuziki utaratangura guhemba neza canke kubeshaho abawukora nk'uko bimeze mu bindi bihugu. "Abumviriza imiziki ntibaturiha, haracariho ikibazo", niko avuga, akizera ariko y'uko mu misi iri imbere ibintu bishobora guhinduka kuko hari "amategeko ariko arahinyanyurwa". Hagati aho, avuga ko akarusho gakomeye ari uko ashoboye gushikiriza ubutumwa bwiwe uko abona ibintu, "hanyuma abantu bakabwakira bakagira ico babuvuzeko, kandi bukanagira ico bubahinduyeko". Ati: "Utanze ubutumwa ntihabura n'umwe buhindura. Ururirimbo rwanje ndarutanze ntirubura n'umwe ruryohera rukamunezera, kubwanje iyo niyo nyungu ihambaye". Nkurikiye aranegura ukungene abarundi bahurumbira umuziki wo hanze, ariko akavuga ko ahanini biva ku nzira uzananamwo, inzira avuga ko ari iz'abazungu bafise intumbero zabo n'uburyo bwo gukundisha ibintu vyabo. Ati: "Abarundi barakunda ivy'iwabo ariko baraneshwa n'ibiba bivuye hanze kuko akenshi biza mu nzira z'itangazamakuru atari iz'abarundi". Abona ko amaradiyo n'imboneshakure bidaha umwanya ukwiye indirimbo n'utugenegene vy'Uburundi nk'uko biri mu bindi bihugu avuga ko amaze kujamwo, aho usanga "indirimbo n'imico kama babiha 80%", akabona ko ari ukutamenya. Ati: "Uburundi burikwije haba mu mvyino, mu ntambo, mu ngoma n'ibindi bijanye n'imico n'imigenzo vy'Uburundi". Atera akamo ibimenyeshamakuru guha ikibanza kinini ivyo "ng'aha iwacu mu Burundi", akavuga ko bifise akanovera kuko biba ari ibintu bitarononwa.

headline: Espérance Mukashema uzwi kuri Radio Ubumwe yapfuye azize uburwayi mu Buholande
text: Umupfasoni Espérance Mukashema asanzwe azwi mu batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bw'u Rwanda yapfuye azize indwara aho yari yarahungiye mu Buholande. Uyu mupfasoni ari mu barokotse Jenoside yo mu Rwanda yari umwe mu basaba ko Abanyarwanda bose bumva ko bakozweko n'iyo Jenoside. Espérance Mukashema n'umugabo wiwe bompi bari abatutsi. Umugabo wiwe wa mbere yishwe n'abahutu b'intagondwa, avuga ko umuhungu wiwe nawe yishwe n'abasirikare ba FPR/RPF b'ico gihe. Mukashema asize yanditse agatabo yise "Bishe Umumalayika", karimwo igishingantahe c'ivyabaye muri ubwo bwicanyi bw'agahomerabunwa mu mwaka wa 1994 mu Rwanda. Muri ako gatabo, avuga ingene imfura yiwe yari ifise imyaka umunani yishwe n'abasirikare avuga ko bari aba FPR. Ati: "Bishe umumalayika, ni ukuvuga ngo bishe umwana yari ataramenya ubwenge, wicaye ku bibero vya Musenyeri Gasabwoya, abasirikare b'inkotanyi bari bayobowe na Fred Ibingira, baraza bamurasa mu mugongo, acikamo kabiri". "Kuba umumalayika rero, ntabwo yabonye ko ari abagizi ba nabi, ntabwo yari azi ivy'ari vyo. Ni ukwica umuntu utabarwanya, utazi ikibi n'iciza, ari umwana mutoyi". Umupfasoni Mukashema yasaba Abanyarwanda kwiyubaka, bakirinda inzika n'inzangano. Avuga mu gihe co kwibuka umwana wiwe, yagize ati: "Ibibazo vyabaye iwacu vyabaye kuri buri Munyarwanda wese, Umunyarwanda wese afite ibikomere, yarakomeretse, Umunyarwanda wese yarababaye. "Icabivura ni uko twese twafatana mu mugongo, tukabona ko ikibazo atari icumwe, ariko ko ari ica twese nk'Abanyarwanda". Mukashema yumvikanaga anenga ubutegetsi bw'u Rwanda kuri radio ikorera ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi yitwa Ubumwe. Yagiye ifatwa ko ari iy'urunani MRCD-Ubumwe rw'imigambwe itavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi mu Rwanda yose ikorera mu mahanga, ruvugwa mu rubanza rwa Paul Rusesabagina n'abandi bantu 20 rubandanya mu Rwanda.

headline: Intambara ya Ukraine: Russia irakangisha guhagarika gutanga gaz nimba itarishwe mu ma rouble
text: Uburusiya bwabwiye ibihugu vy'amahanga bitakiri "abagenzi" ko bitegerezwa gutangura kuriha gaz mu ma rouble (amafaranga y'Uburusiya) canke naho buyihagarike. Vladimir Putin yashize umukono kw'itegeko ry'umukuru w'igihugu rivuga ko abagura gaz "bategerezwa kwuguruza ama konte mu mabanki y'Uburusiya" guhera ku wa gatanu. "Nta n'umwe agurisha ikintu ku buntu, kandi ntitugiye gutanga ubugiraneza - bivuze ko, amasezerano ahasanzwe azohagarikwa," nk'uko umukuru w'igihugu yabivuze. Ivyo Putin ashaka bibonwa nk'uko ari ukugerageza kuvyura rouble, yakorowe cane n'ibihano vy'Uburaya na Amerika. Itegeko ryiwe risigura ko abanyamahanga bagura gaz  bategerezwa kwuguruza ama konte muri banki Gazprombank yo mu Burusiya hanyuma barungikeyo amafaranga mu ma dorari canke ama euro. Gazprombank  yoca ivunja ayo mafaranga mu ma rouble ariyo yoca akoreshwa mu kuriha iyo gaz. N'ubwo iryo tegeko ryerekeye gas izogurishwa kuva ku wa gatanu (uyu munsi) kubandanya, iyo gaz ntizorihwa n'abanya-Buraya  imbere yo hagati mu kwezi kwa gatanu, nk'uko Dr Jack Sharples, umushakashatsi mu kigo ca Oxford gikora ivyigwa ku masoko ntanganguvu (Oxford Institute for Energy Studies) yabibwiye BBC. Ivyo bisigura ko ata bwoba ko gaz igiye guhagarara kuboneka ubwo nyene. Prezida Putin yavuze ko kuba hagiye gukoreshwa ama rouble ari kugirango hakomezwe ubwigenge bw'Uburusiya. Ubudagi bwavuze ko ivyo Uburusiya buhinduye  ari nk'"igikangisho". Kuva Uburusiya buteye Ukraine, ibihugu vy'iburengerazuba vyarafashe ibihano vy'ubutunzi n'ivyo urudandazwa ku Burusiya, ariko ishirahamwe rya Buraya nta bihano ryashize kuri gaz n'ibitoro, bitandukanye na Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika na  Canada, kuko ibihugu birigize  gaz nyinshi bikoresha iva mu Burusiya. Ishirahamwe rya Buraya rivana mu Burusiya 40% ya gaz na 30% y'ibitoro kandi ntaho ryokura ivyobisubirira mu  buryo bworoshe hamwe hogira igihungabana mu kuyihabwa. Hagati aho Uburusiya buronka miriyoni 400 z'ama euro buri  munsi  kuri gaz bugurisha  muri iryo shirahamwe kandi ntibufise ingene bwohindukiza iyo gaz ngo buyishore ahandi. 'Ibintu bishobora gushika kure cane' Abaraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko Uburusiya buhagaritse kurungika gaz mu bihugu vya Buraya mu "guhata ikibazo" vyoshikana ibintu "kure hatanashitswe no mu bihe bikomeye cane vy'intambara yo kurabana ay'ingwe (Cold War/Guerre Froide). Abasesenguzi bo muri Fitch Solutions babona ko vyozana "izindi ngaruka mbi cane ku mafaranga y'Uburusiya". Ntibinagaragara neza kandi niba uburyo bushasha Ubususiya bushaka kurihwamwo bwotuma kuriha mu ma euro bica bivanwaho rwose. Amakompanyi  n'ama  reta y'iburengerazuba yiyamirije ivyo Uburusiya busaba vyo kuriha gaz mu ma rouble nko guhonyanga amasezerano ahasanzwe, kuko avuga ko kuriha biba mu ma dorari canke ama euro. Umushikiranganiji wa mbere w'Ubudagi Olaf Scholz yavuze ko amakompanyi yo mu Budagi azobandanya kuriha gaz y'Uburusiya mu ma euro nk'uko amasezerano abivuga. Nathan Piper, umukuru w'ubushakashatsi ku  bitoro na gaz muri Investec, yabwiye BBC ko ingingo ya Putin ari ukugerageza nawe gushira igitutu ku bihugu vy'Uburaya kandi ko rouble rirondewe cane mu makungu vyoshobora guca biduza agaciro k'iryo faranga. Ariko yongerako ati: "Uburusiya ku gihe kirekire bukeneye kuguma ari  umwizerwa mu kugurisha gaz gutyo rero  ntawomenya niba bwohagarika kurungika iyo gaz". Dr Sharples  wo muri Oxford Institute for Energy Studies avuga ko impande zompi zishobora gutora  uko zivyitwaramwo urudandazwa  ntiruhagarare, canke rumwe muri izo mpande rushobora kuvuga ko amasezerano yahonyanzwe rugashikana ibintu kure. "Ico umuntu yokwizera n'uko n'aho ibintu vyoshika kure aho rumwe canke impande zompi zisaba ko haba ukuzumvikanisha, gaz yoguma iza. Ariko ko ishobora guhagarikwa navyo ntawovuga ko bidashoboka",  nk'uko abandanya abivuga. Ubudagi, bukura ica kabiri ga gaz n'ica gatatu c'ibitoro mu Burusia, cahamagariye abanyagihugu baco n'ama kompanyi y'ico gihugu kugabanya ikoreshwa ry'ivyo bicanwa mu kwitegurira ko bishobora gukena. Autriche nayo ivana 40% ya gaz mu Burusiya,  yongereje inguvu mu gucungera ingene ikoreshwa hamwe no gukurikirana amasoko yayo. Ku nteguro y'ibihe  bigoye ihasanzwe, "intambwe ya mbere yo kugaba", Ubudagi na Autriche vyompi vyamaze gutangura, n'imwe mu ntambwe zitatu zigamije gutegura igihugu guhangana n'ikena rishoboka ryo kuronka ivyo bicanwa. Mu ntambwe ya nyuma, reta zica zitangura kutanga gaz ku gipimo.

headline: Umukinyi nserukiragihugu wa DR Congo Lukoki yapfuye ku myaka 29
text: Umukinyi nserukiraghihugu wa Repuburika ya Demokrasi ya Congo (RDC) Jody Lukoki, yatanguye gukina mu rwego rw'abakuze  mu mugwi wa Ajax wo mu Buhorandi, yapfuye ku myaka 29. Lukoki yarakiniye kandi imigwi ya PEC Zwole,  Ludogorets yo muri Bulgarie hamwe na  Yeni Malatyaspor yo muri Turkia, ubu akaba yaheruka kwinjira muri  FC Twente yo mu Buhorandi. FC Twente, mw'itangazo ku rubuga rwayo rwa internet, yavuze ko ''FC Twente yashegehswe kandi yababajwe cane n'ivyashitse.'' ''FC Twente isangiye umubabaro n'abiwe kandi ubifurije kwifata cane muri ibi bihe babuze umuntu akomeye cane''. Icatumye urupfu rwa Lukoki  ntikiramenyekana. Uwo mukinyi wo ku ruhande yari yinjiye muri FC Twente ku masezerano y'imyaka ibiri mu kwezi kwa gatandatu guheze ariko aca agira imvune ikomeye mw'ivi  mu kiringo co kwitegurira umwaka mushasha w'inkino. Amasezerano yiwe na FC Twente yahagaritswe mu kwezi kwa  Ruhuhuma (ukwa 2), kubera ivyo umugwi wise ''ibintu bijanye n'ubuzima bwiwe''. Zwolle nawo wavuze ''umubabaro n'intuntu'' inyuma y'urupfu rwa Lukoki, yinjirije igitsindo ca mbere uwo mugwi mw'ihiganwa rya Buraya kuva wakabaho. Ku ndwi iheze uwo  mukinyi yari yashize kuri Instagram yiwe ubutumwa bw'uko  yari mu cumba co kwinonora (gym) yitegurira kugaruka inyuma y'imvune. Lukoki yinjije ibitsindo bitanu mu nkino 35 na Ajax imbere y'uko yimukira muri Zwolle mu 2014. Mu mwaka ukurikira yaciye aja muri  Ludogorets aho  yamaze imyaka itanu hanyuma agakina inkino 158 yinjijemwo ibitsindo 30. Inyuma y'umwaka w'inkino wa 2020-2021 muri Turkia, yaciye asubira mu Buhorandi muri Twente. Lukoki yaraserukiye Ubuhorandi ku rugero rw'abakiri bato ariko yatanguye kuba umukinyi nserukiragihugu wa RD Congo mu 2015. Ubwa mu nyuma  mu nkino zitatu yakiniye Leopards ariko zose ari za kivamdimwe, hari mu rukino rwazihuje na Burkina Faso mu 2020.

headline: Mikel Arteta yemejwe nk'umumenyereza mushasha wa Arsenal
text: Arsenal yagenye uwahoze ari umukinyi wayo wo hagati, Mikel Arteta, ngo ayibere umumenyereza/umutoza ku masezerano y'imyaka itatu n'igice. Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 37 yatsindiye igikombe ca FA Cup kabiri mu myaka itanu yamaze akinira Gunners, akaba asubiriye umunye Espagne Unai Emery, yasezerewe mu kwezi guheze. Arteta yakora nk'umumenyereza w'icegera ca Pep Guardiola wa Manchester City, ikibanza yagiyemwo mu 2016 nyuma yo kuja mu zabukuru nk'umukinyi. Areteta yagize ati "dukeneye kuba turiko turahiganirwa ibikombe vyo ku rwego rwo hejuru muri uyu mukino. "Ivyo ni vyo namenyeshejwe neza na neza mu biganiro nagiranye na banyene ikipe Stan na Josh Kroenke hamwe n'abandi barongozi b'iyi kipe". Azotangura icese akazi nk'umumenyereza wa Gunners kuwa Mungu, areke Freddie Ljungberg abandanye nk'umumenyereza mfatakibanza mu rukino rwo ku wa gatandatu na Everton - iyindi kipe Arteta yakiniye. Arsenal ubu ni ya cumi muri Premier League n'amanota 22. Areteta yongeyeko ati "twese turazi ko akazi katurindiriye katoroshe kugira dushike ku vyo twivuza ariko ndizera ko tuzobishobora. "Sinshobora kwihenda ngo mvuge ko ari ibintu tuzoshikako mu munsi umwe, ariko ikipe dufise ubu irimwo abakinyi bafise impano kandi turafise urwaruka rwiza ruriko ruraduga mw'ishure ryacu."

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Mourinho, Ziyech, Damsgaard, Puig, Sarr
text: Umumenyereza wa Tottenham Hotspur, Jose Mourinho, ntariko arirukanwa n'aho ibintu bitifashe neza kuri uyo murwi hamwe n'ibihuha bivuga ko abakinyi bakuru bakuru muri uyo murwi bafise impungenge . (Mirror) Milan na Juventus bariko bakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Chelsea, Hakim Ziyech w'imyaka 27 akomoka muri Maroke. (Calciomercato) Leeds United, Southampton na West Ham United zishobora guhangana na Tottenham mu kurondera kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Sampdoria umunya Danemark Mikkel Damsgaard w'imyaka 20. (Star) Imbere y'uko Arsenal itizwa umukinyi wo hagati, umunya Norvege Martin Odegaard wa Real Madrid afise imyaka 22, yari yananiwe no kuronka umunya Esupanye Riqui Puig w'imyaka 21 akina mu murwi Barcelona.(Express) Umuhagarikizi wa Ismaila Sarr avuga ko ibiganiro bigeze kure kugira ngo uyu munya Senegal w'imyaka 22 akina hagati muri Watford no mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'igihugu ciwe ashobore kwinjira muri Liverpool mu kw'icenda. (Liverpool Echo) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Zenit St Petersburg, umunya Croatia Dejan Lovren w'imyaka 31 yahoze akina muri Liverpool, avuga ko umunya Misiri Mohamed Salah w'imyaka 28 bahoze bakinana kandi ari abagenzi pfa mpfe, agiye kumara iyindi myaka itari mike i Anfield. (Talksport) Manchester United ntirafata ingingo nimba yokwongereza ikiringo c'umwaka amasezerano ifitaniye n'umusatirizi w'umunya Uruguay Edinson Cavani w'imyaka 34, mu gihe umunya Esupanye akina hagati Juan Mata w'imyaka 32. hamwe n'umunyegori w'umunya Argentina Sergio Romero,w'imyaka 33 bobo bazosezererwa mu ci riza. (Manchester Evening News) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Bayer Leverkusen, Timothy Fosu-Mensah w'imyaka 22 akomoka mu Buholande avuga ko vyabaye ngombwa ko ava muri Manchester United kugira ngo ashobore kubandanya n'umugwa wiwe. (Mail) Tottenham iriko irategurira ikibanza mu murwi w'abakinyi ba mbere bayo umwongereza Oliver Skipp w'imyaka 20 akina hagati mw'ihiganwa ry'umwaka uza inyuma y'ugukora bigashimwa muri  Norwich City aho yari yatijijwe. (Football Insider) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Real Madrid na Croatia Luka Modric w'imyaka 35 yemeye ko ashobora gukatwa umushahara kugira ngo ashobore kuguma akinira uyo murwi.  (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Juventus yari yiyeyeje kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United, umufaransa Paul Pogba mu kwa kane kw'umwaka uheze wa 2020, ikaba yari yemeye gutanga umunya Brezili akina ku ruhande Douglas Costa, umunya Bosnia akina hagati Miralem Pjanic, umunya Pays de Galles akina hagati Aaron Ramsey hamwe n'umufaransa akina hagati Adrien Rabiot kugira ngo ibaguze na Pogba - ariko Man U yarakuriye inkoni ku gishitsi uyu murwi wo mu Butaliyano mu kuwusaba imiliyoni 120 y'amadorari ya Amerika kugira ngo ishobore kubaha uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 27. (Calciomercato) Umuserukiri wa Pogba, Mino Raiola, avuga ko "ategerezwa gukora mu bwitonzi bwinshi" iyo havyutse ikibazo c'uyu mukinyi wa Manchester United mu gihe hari amakuru avuga ko Juventus yipfuza kwisubiza uyu mukinyi wo hagati. (Talksport) Manchester United itegerezwa kubanza ikihangana imbere y'ugukinisha umunya Cote d'Ivoire Amad Diallo w'imyaka 18 akina ku ruhande, mu gihe acimenyereza umukino wo mu Bwongereza, ibi bikavugwa n'umumenyereza w'uyu murwi w'abatarenza imyaka 23 Neil Wood. (Goal) Uwahoze ari umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester United n'umurwi nserukira gihugu w'Ubwongereza Paul Parker avuga ko amajambo y'umumenyereza Ole Gunnar Solskjaer ko umurwi wiwe utakiri mu yihiganira gutsindira ihiganwa ryUbwongereza ari "amajambo atagira mvura".  (Sun)

headline: Amwe mu mafoto meza yaranze Afrika: Hagati y'itariki 17-23 ukwezi kw'icenda mu 2021
text: Amafoto meza yatoranijwe ku mugabane wa Afrika ano mu yindi mihingo. Izi foto zose tuzifitiye uburenganzira bwo kuzikoresha.

headline: Coronavirus - Africa: Hari icizere ko ibitigiri vy'abandura biriko biragabanuka
text: Ikigo kijejwe kurwanya no gukinga indwara muri Afrika (CDC) kimenyesha ko mu ndwi iheze ibitigiri vy'abanduye coronavirus ku munsi ku munsi vyagabanutse. Ku mugabane wose, urugero rw'abanduye ku munsi ku munsi rwageze ku bantu 10.300 mu ndwi iheze, ibiharuro biri munsi ugereranije n'ivy'abari banduye mu ndwi y'imbere yayo vyari 11.000. Dr John Nkengasong arongoye ikigo CDC avuga ko ibi "bitanga umwizero". Gushika ubu, umugabane wose wa Afrika umaze kugira abantu bashika 1,147,369 banduye coronavirus, abarenga igice c'abo bakaba ari abo muri Afrika y'Epfo, hamwe n'abashika hafi 26.000 bapfuye. Dr Nkengasong avuga ko afise icizere "ko dutanguye gutera intambwe buhoro buhoro", ariko yongerako y'uko "hakiri kare cane, cane koko - duhanganye n'umugera uteye ubwoba cane kandi ukwiragira ku muvuduko munini". Ati: "Aya makuru dutegerezwa kuyakira twiyubara cane ", agasibura ko adashaka ko abantu bijajara ugasanga bariyibagije ingingo zo kuzibira ikwirakwira ryawo. ""Ntidushaka na gato ko abanyagihugu bacu berekana ko barushe, maze ugasanga natwe turatezuye mu rugamba rwo kurwanya uwu mugera". Asaba abanyagihugu kubandanya n'utwigoro two guhagarika ikwirakwira ry'umugera. Ashimikira cane cane ko abanyagihugu bobandanya bambara udupfukamunwa, bakabandanya bakurikira ingingo yo gutandukana, kandi ibikorwa vyo gupima bikabandanya. Dr Nkengasong avuga kandi ko ku mugabane wose abarenga imiliyoni 10 bashoboye gupimwa, Afrika y'Epfo ikaba ari kimwe mu bihugu vyapimye abantu benshi. Ibitigiri vy'abanduye n'abamaze gupfa biri hasi ugereranije n'ahandi kw'isi nka Bulaya, Amerika y'Epfo na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika aho yonyene gusa ifise abarenga imiliyoni zitanu n'igice z'abanduye. Hagati aho, abahinga bamwe bamwe baragabisha ko muri Afrika ibitigiri vy'abanduye bishobora kuba bisumba ibitangazwa kubera ubushobozi buke bwo gupima. Mu ntango, vyasa n'uko umurindi w'ikwirakwira ry'uwu mugera wari ku rugero ruto, ariko rukaba rwagiye ruriyongera bukebuke, cane cane muri Afrika y'Epfo. Ishure kaminuza yo muri Amerika Johns Hopkins ikurikiranira hafi uwu mugera rivuga ko Afrika y'Epfo ifise abantu 596.060 bawanduye, igitigiri kirenga igice c'abanduye ku mugabane wose wa Afrika, ikagira gatanu kw'isi. Abandura bagiye baragabanuka, ivyo bituma ibitigiri ku mugabane wose navyo bigabanuka. Igitigiri co kw'isonga cageze ku barenga 12,000 bandura ku munsi, iki kikaba caragabanutse cane gushika ku rugero rwa 5,000. Igihugu ca Afrika gikurikira ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bifise abanduye benshi ni Misiri, ikaba iza mu kibanza ca 31 kw'isi n'abandu 96,914 banduye.

headline: Amakuru avugwa ku bakinyi Lionel Messi, Luis Suarez, na Alexis Sanchez
text: Umusatirizi rurangiranwa wa Barcelona Lionel Messi ahejeje gutangaza ko azoguma muri uyu murwi kuko "ata" murwi n'umwe ushoboye kumugura ku kiguzi gisabwa, nawe akaba atipfuza kwitwarira uyu murwi muri sentare. Uyu mukinyi yari aherutse kumenyesha ko yipfuza kuva muri uyu murwi, ariko amasezerano afitaniye na Barcelona akaba ategeka ko umurwi umukeneye utegerezwa kumugura ku giciro c'imiliyoni 700 z'ama Euro. Avugana n'ikinyamakuru Goal, Messi yavuze ati: "Naribaza kandi nari nzi neza ko nari mfise uburenganzira bwo kugenda". "Igihe cose, umukuru w'umurwi yama ambwira ko ihiganwa rirangiye nari gushobora gufata ingingo yo kuguma mu murwi cane nkagenda". "Rero nemeye kuguma muri uno murwi. Ubu rero ngiye kubandanya nkinira uyu murwi kubera umukuru wayo yambwiye ko inzira yonyene ishoboka kugira ngo ngende kwari uko uwunkeneye angura imiliyoni 700, ibi navyo bikaba bidashoboka". Messi avuga ko iyindi nzira kwari ukwitura ubutungane, ariko akaba atavyo ashaka. Ati: "Sinumva ko nashobora kuja kwitwarira Barcelona kubera ni umurwi nkunda, wampaye vyose kuva ndawushitsemwo". "Ni umurwi w'ubuzima bwanje, niwo wampaye ubuzima. Ndazi neza ko ntari kwubahuka kwitwarira Barça muri sentare". Avuga ko n'umuryango wiwe utavyumva. Ati: "Igihe mbwiriye umugore n'abana ko nshaka kuva muri uno murwi, ryabaye ibara". "Bose baciye barira, abana ntibashaka kuva i Barcelona, kandi ntibanashaka guhindura amashure". Inyuma y'iminsi icenda Barcelona yabitswe ibara na Bayern ku bitsindo 8-2 mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya (Uefa Champions League), Messi yatangaje ko yipfuza kuva muri uyu murwi inyuma y'imyaka 20 amazemwo. Barça yarangije ihiganwa ry'umwaka w'inkino uheze ata gikombe na kimwe ironse, bica biba ngombwa ko yirukana umumenyereza Quique Setien imusubiriza na Ronald Koeman yigeze kumenyereza Everton hamwe n'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubuholande. Umusatirizi wa wa Barcelona Luis Suarez yemeye kuja gukinira umurwi wa Juventus wo mu Butaliyano, nk'uko bivigwa n'umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC Radio 5 Live, Guillem Balague. Suarez ashobora kwimukira muri uyo murwi wo mw'ihiganwa Serie A kuri gusa - cane ku giciro kibayabaye - mu gihe yoshobora kwemererwa n'umurwi wiwe wa Barcelona ko ashobora kuvuwamwo akaja kuronderera ahandi. Amasezerano uyu mukinyi akomoka muri Uruguay afitaniye na Barcelona azorangira mu mwaka uza, ariko mu gihe yoshobora gukina inkino zingana n'ibice 60% mu mwaka w'inkino wa 2020-2021, ashobora kwongerwa uwundi mwaka. Mu gihe yokwimukira muri Juventus, suarez yokwisanga ariko akinana n'umukeba akomeye cane wa Messi, Cristiano Ronaldo. Alexis Sanchez yahoze akinira Manchester United avuga ko atigeze na rimwe aryoherwa no gukinira uyu murwi kuva awinjiyemwo avuye muri Arsenal. Sanchez ubu yinjiye burundu mu murwi Inter Milan inyuma y'umwaka yari amaze awukinira nk'intizo avuye muri Man United. Avuga ko amaze kwimukira muri Manchester United mu masezerano yo kuguzanya abakinyi, aho Arsenal nayo yahawe Henrikh Mkhitaryan mu kwa mbere 2018, yanasavye umufasha  wiwe nimba ashobora guhagarika amasezerano yiwe akisubirira i Londres. Mw'ireresi yacishije ku rubuga rwa Instagram, uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 31 avuga ati: "Rimwe na rimwe, hari ibintu uba utabona neza mpaka ushitseyo". "Hari ikintu ntari namenye, kandi nticari ciza". "Numva nezerewe cane , kuko nkiri muto narakunda cane uyu murwi, ari naco gituma nahemutse ndawinjiyemwo. Ariko muvy'ukuri, sinari nabwiwe ingene ibintu vyari bimeze muri uyo murwi". "Umunsi wa mbere ntashe nabwiye umuryango wanje n'umufasha wanje nti: 'Nta buryo bwo guhagarika amasezerano nkisubirira muri Arsenal?', ariko baciye bantwenga".

headline: Kenya: Abasoromyi b'icayi bajanye urubanza muri sentare ya Scotland
text: Abakozi indwi bo mu mirima muri Kenya  bitwariye muri sentare yo muri Ecosse (Scotland ) imwe muri kompanyi zikomeye cane kw'isi zimbura icayi  basaba indishi ku mvune batewe n'akazi. Abo basoromyi b'icayi bavuga ko bagize imvune nyinshi  kubera uburyo bakoramwo mu mirima ya James Finlay  Kenya Ltd. Iryo ni ishami rimwe ry'iyo kompanyi ikorera henshi kw'isi ifise amamuko muri Glasgow mu kinjana ca 18. Iyo kompanyi ntiyemera urwo rubanza mu gushigikira ingingo zayo zijanye n'amagara n'umutekano mu kazi. Finlays batanguye bacuruza ipampa muri Ecosse mu 1750 ubu bakaba bafise  ibikorwa mu migabane itanu y'isi, Starbucks ikaba ari umwe mu bakiriya babo. Iyo kompanyi ni nini  cane ku buryo yimbura icayi gikwiye igikenerwa ku mwaka mu Bwongereza bwose. Iyo kompanyi yimuye icicaro cayo gikuru ikivana Glasgow ikijana Londres haraheze imyaka 15 ariko n'ubu yanditswe ko ikorera Aberdeen, ivyo bigatuma imanza irimwo zijanwa muri sentare za Ecosse. Abo bagabo n'abagore indwi bitwaye basaba indishi ingana n'ibihumbi 15 mu mafaranga y'abongereza £15.000, umwe umwe muri sentare ya Sheriff Personal Injury muri Edinburgh. Uwubunganira muri Kenya, Isaac Okero, avuga ko bagize imvune zitandukanye harimwo no mu ruti rw'umugongo. Yabwiye BBC Scotland ati: "Abo bakozi bo mu cayi bavuga ko baravye imyaka bamaze bakorera James Finlay Kenya Ltd, n'uburyo bakoreramwo, bagiye baragira imvune buhoro buhoro gushika aho zigira ingaruka ku buzima bwabo." "Izo mvune zifatiye ku mubiri no mu mutwe." Okero avuga ko bamwe bari bagikora igihe urwo rubanza rwatanguzwa muri ico gisagara kiri ku birometero birenga ibihumbi bitandatu uvuye muri Kenya, ariko ubu umwe wenyene ni we agikora. Abandi barungitswe mu kiruhuko canke naho ntibaba bagishobora gukora. Yibaza ko urwo rubanza ruzogira ingaruko irenze aho. Yavuze ati: "Twizeye ko ruzotuma iyo kompanyi ihindura cane uburyo abakozi bakoreramwo, uru rubanza rero rukazotuma haba akarusho gafadika mu masezerano n'uburyo vy'akazi k'abasoroma icayi, hanyuma harangire ivy'uko hari abakozi b'abanyaKenya bagira invune zibakurikirana ubuzima bwose nk'uko aba bakozi indwi vyabashikiye." Umuhinga mu bijanye n'imvune z'akazi David Short wo mu kigo ca Balfour and Manson co muri Edinburgh ni we  ahagarariye abo basoromyi b'icayi. Yavuze ati: "Mu rubanza rwo muri sentare kimwe mu bintu vya mbere  ubanza kuraba n'aho witura, ni iyihe sentare izotwemerera kwakira urubanza. "Ngaha dufise kompanyi yanditswe muri Ecosse, gutyo rero ikibanza ciza c'urwo rubanza ni muri sentare yo muri Ecosse. "Twitwaye mu rubanza ku bisanzwe  rwobereye muri Kenya. Rwerekana uburyo abakozi babo bakoreramwo n'ubutunzi bwabo." Imyaka ibiri urubanza rumaze gutangura mu 2017, umucamanza yategetse ko Finlays ireka abunganira mu mategeko abo basoromyi bagashika mu mirima yayo muri Kenya, ikabareka bakaraba uburyo abantu bakoreramwo. Finlays yaciye ishingisha urubanza rwo kuvyanka mu masentare yo muri Kenya iranarutsinda ivuga ko ingingo yo muri Ecosse idashobora gushirwa mu ngiro kiretse ibanje kwemerwa na sentare yo muri Kenya. Abasoromyi b'icayi barunguruje kuri iyo ngingo, uruzocibwa rukaba rwitezwe gusohoka mu kwezi kwa gatanu. Short avuga ati: "Bitwaza ngo ntivyemewe mw'ibwirizwanshingiro. "Naho vyoba biri uko, ni kuki batatureka ngo tuje kuraba? Ndakeka ko ari uko badashaka ko tubona uburyo buteye ubwoba abo bantu bakoreramwo." Mu kwezi kwa kabiri, abo basoromyi b'icayi barerekanye uburyo abakozi bo mu yindi kompanyi yo muri Kenya bakoreramwo, abunganizi babo bo mu Bwongereza barabiraba. Gwen Morgan-Evans, wo mw'ishirahamwe ry'abashingwamanza Hugh James, avuga ati: "Twaragiye muri Kenya turi kumwe na babiri mu bahinga bo mu Bwongereza kugira barabe ingene icayi gisoromwa kugira bagire inama sentare yo muri Ecosse y'ingene ubwo buryo bwo gukora buhungabanya amagara. "Ico kibazo gishika kure. Hamwe urwo rubanza borutsinda, abarushingishije bizigiye ko vyozana akarusho ku bakora mu cayi muri Kenya." Ikinyamateka ca vuba ca Finlays 1750 cashimikiye ku bikorwa vyayo muri Kenya. Umukuru w'iyo kompanyi Guy Chambers yakibwiye ati: ''Turemera ko vyose bitera ngo de kandi ko hama hari ivyo gukora neza gusumba. "Ariko abatunegura rimwe na rimwe barirengagiza urugero rw'utwigoro twagize mu gufasha ab'aho dukorera." Mw'itangazo umuvugizi yagize ati: ''James Finlays [Kenya] Ltd  yiyemeje kwiregura ku birego vyose vyashikirijwe haba muri sentare nkuru ya Nairobi canke iya All Sheriff Personal Injury." Iyo kompanyi ivuga ko ibikorwa vyayo vyo kurima no guhingura icayi muri Kericho na Bomet birimwo abakozi ibihumbi 8 n'ubundi buzi bushamikiye ku cayi vyose ''bitanga inyungu ifadika muri ako karere". Iryo tangazo rirabandanya riti: "Twama turondera gushika ku rugero rwo hejuru rwo kwitaho amagara, umutekano n'ineza y'abantu bose dukorana. "Dufise ingingo twashizeho kuva kera zijanye n'amagara n'umutekano aho hose dufise ibikorwa kw'isi, harimwo no muri Kenya." Mu myaka ya 1980, imyiyerekano yarabaye hanze y'ahariko harabera inama rusangi ya buri mwaka ya Finlays i Glasgow ku buryo bwo gukoramwo mu mirima yayo y'icayi mu Buhindi. Umwe mu bari mu myiyerekano mu 1984 yari Roger Jeffery, ubu akaba ari umwigisha muri Kaminuza ya Edinburgh mu gisata c'ivyigwa vya poritike. Yavuze ati: "Uwurongoye iyo kompanyi ico gihe yavuze ko turi abantu bahiga isoko hose, tuja ahantu hose turondera kuronka inyungu ku banyamitahe bacu kandi avuga ata kivyerekana na kimwe ashize ahabona ko ari abakoresha beza kandi ko abantu baronkera akarusho mu bikorwa vyabo." Agira ico avuze ko urwo rubanza rw'ubu, Prof Jeffrey yavuze ati: "Uvyihweje neza muri rusangi, wokwemera ko kurima icayi ari igikorwa kibangamye,  kandi ntibashobora gutangura guha abakozi babo imishahara nk'iyitangwa i Buraya, ariko nemera ko bashobora gusumvya  uko biri ubu."

headline: Tanzania: Abashingamateka bashaka ko hasabwa imbabazi ku wasohowe kubera 'ipantaro ifata cane'
text: Abashingamateka b'abagore muri Tanzania basavye ko hasabwa imbabazi umushingamateka yasohowe mu nama nshigamateka kubera impantaro yiwe. Umushingamateka w'umugabo yavuze ko ingene abogore bamwe bambara biteza urubwa inama nshingamateka. Hussein Amar yavugiye mu nama nshingamateja ku wa kabiri ati: "Nyakwubahwa mukuru w'inama nshingamateka, akarorero n'urya mushikanje yicaye i buryo bwanje yambaye ishati y'umuhondo. Raba ipantaro yaje yambaye, Nyakwubahwa mukuru w'inama nshinganateka". Umukuru w'inama nshingamateka yaciye ategeka uwo mushingamateka w'umugore, Condester Sichwale, gusohoka. Umukuru w'inama nshingamateka Job Ndugai yamubwiye ati: "Genda wambare neza, hanyuma ugaruke". Yongeyo avuga ko butari ubwa mbere aronka imyidogo ku nyambaro y'abashingamateka b'abagore, aca abwira abajejwe kwubahiriza inyifato mu nama nshingamateka kwankira kwinjira uwo wese atozoba yambaye uko bibereye. Mu gihe Amar atasiguye amakemwa yabona ku nyambaro ya Sichwale, yaciye asoma amategeko yo mu nama nshingamateka yemerera abagore kwambara ama pantaro, ariko atomora ko impuzu zidategerezwa kuba zifata cane. BBC imurondeye ngo agire ico ashikirije ntiyamuronse. Umugwi urungowe n'abashingamateka Jacqueline Ngonyani na Stella Manyanya ushimika uvuga ko ivyo mugenzi wabo yakorerwe atari vyo kandi ko impuzu za Madame Sichwale ata makemwa zari zifise. Ivyashitse vyatumye kandi havugwa vyinshi ku mbuga hwaniro irya n'ino kw'isi, bamwe bavuga ko ari akandi karoreo k'ingene abagabo bashaka kugenzura ingene abagore  bambara.

headline: Mu Burundi havugwa umunyu mubi mu masoko. Bisigura iki?
text: Ubushikirangnji bujejwe urudandazwa mu Burundi buheruka kumenyesha ko hamaze kwibonekeza mu masoko umunyu udakwije ivyangomba ku magara y'abantu. Uwo munyu ngo nta cunyunyu ca iode gikwiye ufise, ngo ukaba ushobora kugira ingaruka ku magara y'abantu. Kugira dutahure izo ngaruka, twavuganye n'umushakashati ari mu batoye isabuni ikinga imibu itera malaria, Gerard Niyondiko.

headline: Burundi: Révérien Ndikuriyo yatowe kuba umunyamabanga mukuru wa CNDD-FDD
text: Umukenguzamateka Reveriyano Ndikuriyo niwe yemejwe n'abanywanyi ba CNDD-FDD nk'umunyamabanga mukuru mushasha w'uyo mugambwe uri ku butegetsi mu Burundi. Ni inyuma y'ikoraniro kaminuza ridasanzwe ryabereye ku mugwa mukuru wa poritike, Gitega, ku wa Mungu 24/01/2021. Umukenguzamateka Ndikuriyo asubiriye Evariste Ndayishimiye yari ajejwe ayo mabanga kuva mu 2016 igihe haba isubirwamwo ry'inzego zirongoye uyo mugambwe. Mu butumwa yacishije ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter, umushingamateka Ndikuriyo yashimiye Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye bagendanye, hamwe n'abanywanyi b'umugambwe wiwe bamwizeye. Yiyemeje kutazobahemukira. Umukenguzamateka Reveriyano Ndikuriyo yavukiye muri komine Kayogoro y'intara ya Makamba. Reveriyano Ndikuriyo yahoze ari mu banywanyi ba CNDD-FDD igihe wari ukiri umuhari warwanya ubutegetsi mu ntambara yadutse mu Burundi inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye mu 1993. Uyo muhari umaze gutera igikumu ku masezerano yo guhagarika intambara, umukenguzamateka Ndikuriyo yarasubijwe mu buzima busanzwe akaba yararanguye amabanga atandukanye mu gihugu. Kuva mu 2004 yabaye buramatari w'intara ya Makamba asanzwe avukamwo, gushika mu 2007 aho abereye umushingamateka gushika mu 2010. Mu 2010, yatowe kuba umukenguzamateka, amabanga yasubiye gutorerwa mu 2015 mu matora yabayemwo impari nyinshi, maze aca atorwa kuyirongora gushika mu 2020. Muri kino gihe, asanzwe arongoye ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu burundi, FFB kuva mu 2013.

headline: Mesut Ozil avuga ko azoguma muri Arsenal gushika amasezerano arangiye mu 2021
text: Mesut Ozil, umukinyi wo hagati w'umurwi Arsenal, avuga ko azoguma muri uyo murwi "gushika ku munota wa nyuma" w'amasezerano yiwe ategekanijwe kurangira mu kwa gatandatu 2021. Kuva inkino za Premier League zisubiriye gutangura mu kwa gatandatu, uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 31 ubu - yigeze kuba ari mpuzamakungu w'Ubudagi -  ntiyigeze akinishwa n'umumenyereza Mikel Arteta, avuga ko ari ukubera "ibibazo bijanye n'urukino". Amasezerano afitaniye na Arsenal amuha umushahara w'amapawundi 350.000 ( amadorari y'abanyamerika 458,421) ku ndwi. Ozil yahakanye amakuru avuga ko uyu murwi woba uriko urondera kumwishura umushahara wose w'umwaka umwe asigaje muri ayo masezerano. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Athletic ati: "Nivyo ibintu vyaragoranye ariko ndakunda Arsenal. Nije nzohitamwo igihe nzogira, si abandi bantu bampitiramwo umunsi wo kugenda". Yongerako ati: "Nzokwitangira umurwi uko nshoboye kwose. Ibintu nk'ibi ntaco bizongira, ahubwo bimpa ingoga. Muri kahise narashoboye kwerekana ko nshobora kwivyukiranya kandi nzosubira ndavyerekane". Ozil, umukinyi yinjiye muri Arsenal mu 2013 aguzwe muri Real Madrid ku mapawundi imiliyoni 42.4, yaramaze igihe adakina igihe uyu murwi wamenyerezwa na Unai Emery, mu nyuma arasubira mu kibuga igihe wamenyerezwa vy'imfatakibanza na Freddie Ljungberg. Igihe Arteta afatiye ibintu mu minwe mu kwa 12 kw'umwaka uheze, Ozil yarakinishijwe mu nkino zose cumi za Premier League Arsenal yakinye imbere y'uko iri higanwa rihagarikwa vy'agateganyo mu kiringo c'amezi atatu kubera coronavirus kuva mu kwa gatatu. Hagati aho, mu nkino zose 13 za Arsenal ihiganwa risubiye kwugururwa, Ozil ntiyigeze akinishwa na rimwe. Mu kwa kane Arteta n'abakinyi biwe baremeye ko bakatwa ibice 12.5%, maze Arsenal nayo itangaza ko itegura guhagarika abakozi bayo 55 kubera ibibazo vy'amafaranga vyavuye ku kiza karanda ca coronavirus. Hagati aho, Ozil wewe ntiyemeye ko umushahara wiwe ugabanywa, akavuga ko abakinyi "bafashwe gihutihuti". Amenyesha ko iyo ngingo ishobora kuba ari yo yatumye ataronswa amahirwe yo kwinjira mu kibuga. N'aho yubaha ingingo ya Arteta yo kutamukinisha, Ozil abona ko yari kuba yarahawe akaryo ko kwerekana ivyo ashoboye mu kibuga. Ati: "Urashobora kudakina mu nkino cumi zose zikurikirana kubera urwaye, ariko atari kubera ko utabishoboye canke kubera ufise ingeso mbi". Avuga kandi ko atari we wenyene yanse gukatwa umushahara, ariko ko izina ryiwe ari ryo ryabonetse gusumba.

headline: Qatar 2022: Ronaldo avugako ugucanamwo na Man U kudashobora guhungabanya Portugal
text: Cristiano Ronaldo avuga ko “avugira igihe ashakiye" kandi ko icuka kibi kiri hagati ya we na Manchester United kidashobora “guhungabanya” umurwi wiwe wa Portugal mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose. Man United iriko iraraba ico amategeko avuga mu gihe iriko irondera kurangiza igihe ca Ronaldo muri uyo murwi inyuma y’ikiganiro yagiriraniye n’imboneshakure TalkTV anegura uyu murwi. Ronaldo w’imyaka 37 yavuze ko yumva “yarahemukiwe n’uyu murwi” kandi ko “ata cubahiro” agifitiye umumenyereza Erik ten Hag. Ku wa mbere Ronaldo yavuze ati: "Mu buzima bwanje, igihe ciza ni igihe canje”. Mu kiganiro kitari citezwe yagiranye n’abanyamakuru, uyu kizigenza w’umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Portugal yavuze ati: "Si ntegerezwa kwiyumvira ku co abandi biyumvira. Mvuga igihe nshakiye. Abakinyi baranzi neza cane kuva kera kandi barazi uwo ndi we. "[Portugal] Ni umurwi ukomeye unyotewe kandi ufise ihangiro. Rero ndazi ko kirya [kiganiro] kidashobora guhungabanya abakinyi n’intumbero yabo”. Uyu mukinyi Ronaldo yatsindiye Ballon d’Or (Umupira w’Inzahabu) incuro zitanu azoba arongoye umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Portugal mu rukino rwayo rwa mbere mw’itsinda H ruzoyihuza na Ghana ku wa kane. Asigaranye amezi indwi yonyene mu masezerano yiwe y’umushahara w’ibihumbi 500 (500.000) vy’amapawundi ku ndwi i Old Trafford ariko Man U ishobora guhagarika amasezerano ifitaniye nawe. Ivyo vyotuma yidegemvya agashobora kwimukira mu wundi murwi muri ka kanya k’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi ko mu kwa mbere. Ntarasubira gukina kubera ingwara itazwi kuva aho Man U itsindiwe na Aston Villa 3-1 ku wa 06 Munyonyo (11) akaba ari we yari kizigenza, ariko avuga ko yumva ameze neza muri iri higanwa ry’igikombe c’isi rigize gatanu kuri we. Ronaldo ati: "Numva nkomeye, narakize, ndakora imyimenyerezo neza, kandi nditeguye gutangura ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose neza cane bishoboka. "Numva ko uyu murwi wa Portugal ufise ubushobozi budasanzwe. Ndibaza ko vyanse bikunze dushobora gutsinda, ariko dukeneye kwibanda cane ku rukino twimirije. Rero ni ngombwa ko twibanda kuri Ghana, dutsinde hanyuma tudugire aho. "Tuzoraba duhejeje umurwi ukomeye, ariko ndizeye ko Portugal ari wo murwi ukomeye muri rino higanwa ry’igikombe c’isi. Ariko dutegerezwa kuvyerekana mu kibuga”.

headline: Inkino mpuzamakungu z’ibihe vy’imbeho 2022: ibintu bitanu bizoziranga
text: Izi nkino, China iziteguriye mu buryo budasanzwe. Zizobera i Pékin/Beijing mu bihe bitoroshe vya Covid, hari n’ibihugu rutura bitazozitaba uko bisanzwe, kubera ingorane z’agateka ka muntu zivugwayo.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru i Buraya ku wa mbere itariki 05.04.2021: Neymar, Mbappe, Haaland, Messi, Rice, Soucek
text: Umukinyi w'imbere wa Brezil Neymar, 29, yagiriraniye amasezerano na Paris St-Germain gushika mu 2026 - ubu uwo mugwi wo mu Bufaransa ukaba uriko urita ku rutare mu kugiriranira amasezerano nkayo n'umukinyi w'imbere w'Ubufaransa Kylian Mbappe, 22.  (Telefoot, via AS). Umukinyi w'imbere wa Borussia Dortmund, Erling Braut Haaland ashobora gutwara uwo mugwi amapawundi imiliyoni 34 kubera uwumuhagarariye Mino Raiola na se wiwe Alf-Inge bakeneye amapawundi imiliyoni 20 za komisiyo ku masezerano yiwe. (RAC1, via Marca) Mu masezerano ya Haaland azorangira muri uyu mwaka, harimwo ko ashobora kuja mu wundi mugwi ku mapawundi imiliyoni 64, ariko ashobora kuva muri uwo mugwi mw'ici riza mu gihe Dortmund itobandanya kuvyifatamwo neza mu nkino za Bundesliga, ntimaje no mu gikombe c'imigwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo.  (Sun). Hari urukurukuru rwavuga ko Haaland, 20, ashobora kuja muri Barcelone, ariko umumenyereza w'uwo mugwi Ronald Koeman yavuze ko ingingo iyo ari yo yose yerekeye kugura abakinyi itegerezwa gufatwa na prezida Joan Laporta. (AS). Lionel Messi arindiriye kuraba imigambi ya Laporta ku mugwi Barcelone imbere y'uko afata ingingo yo kuguma muri uwo mugwi canke kuja muri PSG canke Manchester City. (Mundo Deportivo-in Spanish) Angel di Maria yavuze ko yonezerwa akinanye na Messi mu mugwi wa PSG mu gihe uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 33 yoba avuye muri Barcelone. (beIN Sports,via Goal). Umumenyereza wa Leicester, Brendan Rodgers, afise icizere co gusinyisha umukinyi wo hagati Mskoti Callum McGregor,27, wo mu mugwi wa Celtic. (Sun). Umumenyereza wa West Ham, David Moyes, yavuze ko uwo mugwi uzotega amatwi abashaka kugura abakinyi Declan Rice,22, hamwe n'umukinyi wo hagati  Tomas Soucek,26, mw'ici riza. (Mirror Manchester United na Juventus n'imigwi yerekana ko yipfuza cane kugura umukinyi w'imbere wa Barcelone umufaransa Ousmane Dembele, 23, ariko Liverpool na PSG na bo baguma bamukurikiranira hagufi. (Mundo Deportivo-in Spanish). Umukinyi wa Espagne ucas Vazquez,29, amasezerano afitaniye na Real Madrid agiye kurangira muri uyu mwaka, ashobora kwerekeza mu migwi ya Manchester United, Chelsea, AC Milan na Bayern Munich.  (ABC-in Spanish) Juventus nta bushobozi bafise bwo kuriha amapawundi imiliyoni 8.5 umugwi wa Athletico Madrid mu ntumbero yo kwongerereza amasezerano umukinyi w'imbere wa Espagne Alvaro Morata y'uwundi mwaka umwe kubera ikibazo c'ubukene bw'amahera. (AS) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Everton na Colombia, Yerry Mina, 26, ashaka kwungururiza mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Butaliyano mw'ici riza, aho imigwi ya Inter Milan na Fiorentina imwipfuza cane. (Sun) Umumenyereza wa Manchester United Ole Gunnar Solskjaer yavuze ko umukinyi w'imbere wa Argentine Sergio Aguero, 32, adashobora kuza muri uwo mugwi inyuma yo kurangiza ikiringo ciwe mu bakeba babo ba Manchester City muri uyu mwaka. (Goal)

headline: Umukenyezi w'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Lesotho yatawe muri yompi
text: Igipolisi camenyesheje ko umukenyezi Thabane  azosomerwa ivyaha yagirizwa na Sentare nkuru  kuri uyu wa gatatu. Hari haheze hafi ukwezi yarahunze, yinyegeje mu gihugu kibanyi ca Afrika y'epho, akaba yafashwe n'igipolisi  kuri uyu wa kabiri avuhe mu gisagara ca Maseru. Vyitezwe ko Maesiah Thabane amara ijoro rya mbere mw'ibohero inyuma yo guhatwa ibibazo bijanye n'urupfu rw'uwahoze ari umugore w'umukuru w'igihugu ariko  bahukanye. Umuyobozi mukuru w'igipolisi Holomo Molibeli  yabwiye BBC ko uyo mukenyezi  azokwitaba sentare nkuru ku musi wa gatatu, asomerwe  ivyaha yagirizwa ku rupfu rw'uwo mukenyezi mu 2017. Umukenyezi Lipolelo Thabane yagiranye ibibazo bijanye no kwahukana n'umushikiranganji wa mbere Thomas Thabane. Yarasiwe hafi y'urugo rwiwe  imisi ibiri gusa, imbere y'uko haba ibirori vy'ukwimika Thomas Thabane nk'umushikiranganji wa mbere. Amakuru ajanye n'ukwagiriza Maesiah Thabane  mu rupfu rw'uyo mukenyezi yari inkuru ikomeye mu kwezi guheze - aho benshi batangajwe no kubona yaciye ahunga. Ikindi catangaje ni ukubon vyasa nk'uko umugabo wiwe yari afise uruhara muri urwo rupfu rubabaje, ariko ntagire ico abivugako. Ntibiramenyekana neza nimba umkenyezi wa Thabane azosaba kurekurwa vy'agateganyo niyitaba sentare, ariko igipolisi kiza cavuze ko kitazobimwemerera, kuko cemeza ko ashobora gufata indege agahunga.

headline: Prince Philip yari samurarwa wa Edinburgh, umugabo w’umwamikazi Elizabeth II w’Ubwongereza, yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo
text: Prince Philip, samurarwa w’I Edinburgh akaba n’umugabo w’umwamikazi Elizabeth II w’Ubwongereza, yasandavye afise imyaka 99. Umuganwa n’umwamikazi bari bamaze imyaka 70 bubatse. Baraganye k’uwa 20 z’ukwa cumi na rimwe 1947, i Westminster Abbey, mu gisagara ca London. Kurikirana vyinshi muri iyi video ku buzima bw'uyu muhisi...

headline: Sudan y'Epfo:''Sinshaka abapatiri b'ibijuju''
text: Umu Karidinari ari mu kiruhuko c'izabukuru muri Ekleziya Katorika yaneguye ubushobozi bwa bamwe mu ndongozi za Ekleziya muri Sudan y'Epfo. Kardinari   Gabriel Zubeir Wako yahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Khartoum yavuze ati: ''Sinshaka abapatiri b'ibijuju mw'isengero'', aho hari mu rugendo yagize mu gisagara ca Wau kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero. Yavuze kuri uyu wa mungu ati: ''Mu minsi maze ngaha i Wau, hariho abapatiri twabonanye ndumva ko benshi batazi indinganizo n'inyigisho zo mw'isengero,  bigisha ibintu bidafashe. Bakeneye gusumvya aho bageza ubu ". Uwo mu karidinari azokwiza imyaka 80 y'amavuko mu kwezi kuza, , arubashwe kandi arazwi cane mu kuba yarashigikiye amashure. Yaratewe iteka na reta ya Sudan y'Epfo mu 2016 kubera uruhara rwiwe mu gushigikira indero y'abana bangana na miriyoni zibiri bari barateshejwe izabo n'intanbara muri Sudan y'Epfo. Yaranarungitse abapitiri kubandanya ivyigwa i Roma no muri Kenya , kugira bace impamyabushobozi za masters na doctorat. Mu bo yarungitse kubandanya ivyigwa harimwo uwamusubuiriye Musenyeri Mukuru Dr Michael Didi, ubu arongoye diyosezi ya Khartoum , n'uwurongoye diyosezi nkuru ya Juba, Dr Stephen Ameyu.

headline: Pierre Buyoya na bagenziwe bavuga iki ku munyororo wo guherayo baciriwe?
text: Petero Buyoya na bagenziwe baherutse kwagirwa n'icaha co kugandagura umukuru w'igihugu Melchior Ndadaye bariyamiriza urubanza rwaciwe na sentare y'u Burundi. Itangazo Bwana Buyoya wenyene yarungikiye BBC rivuga ko abafatiwe ibi bihano bavuga ko bafise uburenganzira bwo kwungururiza mu masentare yo mu gihugu canke mpuzamakungu. Sentare ntahinyuzwa mu Burundi yakatiye Bwana Buyoya - yatwaye u Burundi ubugira kabiri (1987 - 1993 na 1996 - 2003) - hamwe n'abandi bantu 15 umunyororo wo guherayo. Abandi batatu baciriwe gupfungwa imyaka 20 nayo umwe yambitswe izera. Abaciriwe urubanza bose hamwe ni 20 - benshi bahoze ari abasirikare bakuru - bane (4) muri bo ni bo basanzwe bapfunze uwundi yahora yidegemvya mu Burundi, abandi bose baba hanze. Iri tangazo rivuga ko uru rubanza rufise imvo za politiki "na rirya rwatanguye inyuma y'indyane za politike zadutse mu 2015". Rivuga ko urubanza rwabo "rwatanguye mu gihe igihugu cari mu ndyane zishingiye ku kiringo ca gatatu ca Perezida Pierre Nkurunziza cari giteye kubiri n'ibwirizwashingiro". Bavuga ko intumbero y'uru rubanza "kwari ukurondera kwiyegereza abanyagihugu ku mvo za politike n'ubwoko, bitegurira amatora aheruka ya 2020". Bavuga kandi ko uru rubanza rwaciwe kugira ngo "bace imitima abanyagihugu mu gihe bwaca bibuka igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye", igikorwa cabaye uyu munsi ku wa gatatu. Uru rubanza rwarigeze gutanguzwa mu mpera za 1998, ariko hafatwa abo benshi bavuze ko bari abantu bato bato cane batari kuba ari bo bateguye igandagurwa ry'umukuru w'igihugu. Mu 2019 Leta yasohoye imitahe yo gufata abari abasirikare bakomakomeye hamwe na Bwana Pierre Buyoya, intumwa y'ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Afrika mu karere ka Sahel, ubu uba muri Mali. Aba bipfuzwa n'ubutungane ntibigeze bafatwa n'igipolisi mpuzamakungu ngo bashikirizwe u Burundi, ntibizwi neza niba icemezo gishasha ca sentare kizotuma bafatwa. Iyi sentare yategetse kandi ko bose hamwe bishura hafi imiliyaridi 103 z'amafranga y'u Burundi, ku bushake bwabo canke ku nguvu. Aba baciriwe urubanza bavuga ko kuva mu ntango batigeze bahabwa uburenganzira bwo guserukirwa na rirya basanzwe "baba hanze kubera imvo z'umutekano wabo". Bavuga ko abashikirizwamanza mpuzamakungu babo "leta yabigije inyuma ibima impusha zo kwinjira mu Burundi kugira ngo bababuranire". Itangazo ryabo rivuga ko urwo ari urubanza ruteye kubiri n'amategeko.

headline: Ibibazo ku ntererano ya France mu ntambara ya Ukraine
text: By Hugh Schofield BBC News, Paris Niba Ubufaransa bushaka kuba indongozi  imbere y'ibindi bihugu vya Buraya muri iki kiringo gishasha co kwigwanako mu vya gisirikare, bigenda gute ngo intererano yabwo mu twigoro tw'intambara muri Ukarine ibe ari nto cane? Ico ni  ikibazo kitaryoshe kwishura cibazwa na bamwe mu bahinga b'imikenyuro muri ico  gihugu, aho bariko barasunika prezida Emmanuel Macron ngo afate ingingo yo kwongereza  ibigwanisho aha Ukraine. Isuzuma ku rubuga muri Pologne/Poland na Ukraine ryasanze intererano y’Ubufaransa mu bigwanisho biva hanze birungikwa muri Ukraine idashika na 2%, kure cane ya Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika itanga 49%, ariko kandi inyuma ya Pologne (22%) , n'Ubudagi (9%). François Heisbourg, ashobora kuba ari mu bahinga bumvirizwa cane mu bihweza ibijanye no kwivuna agira ati: “Nari mfise inpungenge ku kwizigira ibiharuro vyerekana Ubufaransa hasi cane ku rutonde rw’ibihugu biterera”. “Niho naca ngenda aho intererano ishikira muri Pologne   kuraba ibitangwa ingene bingana, ntaravye ibiba vyemewe. “Ariko ibihaururo vyaciye bivanaho impungenge nari mfise. Ubufaransa buri kure cane hasi kuri urwo rutonde -buza ubugira icenda.” Inyishu y’abategetsi i Paris yabaye: “Ego, ariko...” Ego, ibiharuro vyerekeye imfashanyo ntibibesha, ariko hari ibindi vyo gufatirako. Ubwa mbere, abategetsi bajejwe ivyo kwivuna abansi bavuga ko igipimo nyaco c’imfashanyo ya gisirikare ari ubwiza bw’igitanzwe kurusha ubwinshi. Hari ibihugu bitanga ibirundo vy’ibigwanisho vyataye igihe. Ubufaransa bwatanze ibikoho 18 vyo mu bwoko bwa Caesar birasa vya muzinga, ivyo bikaba biri mu vyo abanya-Ukraine bavuga ko biriko birabafasha cane ku rugamba. Bongerako kandi ko, Ubufaransa co kimwe n’ibindi bihugu vy’iburengrazuba, bwagabanuye kurundarunda ibigwanisho kuva intambara yo kurabana ay'ingwe irangiye. Ama Ceasar Ubufaransa bwahaye Ukraine angana n’ica kane ca bene ivyo bigwanisho Ubufaransa buja buravana aha bujana hariya. Ntibushobora gutanga ibisumba aho butishize mu ngorane  mu bindi bice vy’isi aho bufise uruhara nko muri Sahel na Indo-Pacific. Gen Jérome Pellistrandi w’ikinyamakuru mu bijanye na gisirikare ati: “Dusa n’abari inyuma y’ibindi bihugu, ariko Ubufaransa bufise ugushaka kwo kugira uruhara ruboneka.” Izo nsiguro  si izo gufata minenerwe, nk’uko bivugwa na Heisbourg. Ikibazo n’uko kutaba ugaragara cane aho bikenewe, Ubufaransa buzohava busanga bwikuye bwonyene mu bo kwerekezako amaso. “Igihe nari Kyiv, abantu bose bari bafise urupfasoni. Sinari nzi ko abanya-Ukraine babona ko ataco tubafasha. “Ubiravye  vyari bibi kurusha aho. Jewe nabonye umenga turiko turaba nk’abataco bamaze.” Heisbourg avuga ko igikurikira coroshe. Ukraine izovugana n’ibihugu izi ko bishobora kuyiha ibigwanisho ikeneye. Ubufaransa muri iki gihe ntiburi muri ivyo. Ariko hari ikindi kibangamye ku Bufaransa. Kuba Ubufaransa busa n’ubutagaragara muri Ukraine bibangamira intumbero yabwo yo kuba indongozi mu kibazo c’ukwivuna abansi i Buraya. Hari ibihugu muri Buraya y’Ubuseruko bifise impungenge kuri prezida Macron, vyibaza ko  mu mezi ya mbere y’intambara yafashe umurongo woroshe cane ku mukuru w’Uburusiya Vladimir Putin. Ubu hari abasigaye bavuga  ko Ubufaransa n’ubu bugifise udutima tubiri ku bijanye n’uko Ukraine yotsinda iyo ntambara. Kuri Pierre Haroche,  atanga ivyigwa ku mutekano mpuzamakungu kuri kaminuza Queen Mary University of London, kuvuga ivyo ni ukurenganya Ubufaransa -kandi sico gituma urugero ruto rw’ibigwanisho bihabwa Ukraine. Ariko arahuza cane n’abavuga ko  Ubufaransa bukeneye kwongereza intererano yabwo vuba hashoboka, kugira buhumurize ibuhugu vya Buraya y’Ubuseruko nka Pologne “ko turi ku murongo umwe”. Avuga ati: “Ihangiro ry’Ubufaransa ko Uburaya bwokwikwiza ku bijanye no kwivuna rishingiye ku gukomeza inganda z’ibigwanisho biciye mu gushira uburyo hamwe mu kurondera ibikoresho. “Ariko ukeneye ko haba ugushira uburyo hamwe, utegerezwa kwereka ibindi bihugu ko ufise iyo ntumbero nyene ku vyerekeye umutekano wacu”. Dr Haroche  ahamagarira Ubufaransa kurungika ibiduga  vy’intambara 50 vyo mu bwoko bwa Leclerc. Heisbourg we yoshima ko harungikwa ibikoresho vyo mu kirere avuga ko Ukraine ikeneye kurusha ibindi. Dr Haroche avuga   ati: “Ni nka kizimyamwoto. “Iyo hadutse umuriro mu nzu y’umubanyi, ni vyiza gusumba guca wihuta kumurungikira kizimyamwoto yawe , hanyuma nturindire ko umuriro ubanza gutandukira inzu yawe".

headline: Intamba z'Uburundi n'Imisambi ya Uganda ni iyihe izotsinda ikaja muri CHAN 2020?
text: Intamba mu Rugamba z'Uburundi ziteze guhura n'Imisambi ya Uganda mu nkino z'igice ca kabiri z'uguhiganirwa kuja mu gice ca nyuma c'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu igizwe n'abakinyi bakinira iwabo (CHAN 2020) rizobera muri Kameruni. Mu rukino rwabaye ejo ku wa Mungu, Intamba zatsinze  Sudani y'Epfo ibitsindo bibiri kuri kimwe mu rukino rw'ugusubiza, mu gihe mu rukino rwa mbere rwabereye i Bujumbura ku wa 27 z'ukw'indwi zari zatsinze Sudani ibitsindo bibiri ku busa. Urwo rukino rwabereye i Kampala muri Uganda kubera ikibuga ca Sudani y'Epfo kiriko gisubirwamwo. Mu rundi rukino rwabaye muri aka karere, Tanzania yasezereye Kenya kuri za penelite. U Rwanda rwo rwaronse uburenganzira bwo kubandanya mu gice ca kabiri kuko rufise amanota meza mu mahiganwa ya CHAN y'imbere, rwakinye CHAN 2011, 2016 na 2018. Mu 2016 rwageze mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma. Sudani y'Epfo niyo yatanguye kwinjiza igitsindo mu ntango z'urukino, ariko Iddy Muselemu na Olivier Dusabe batsindiye Intamba ibitsindo bibiri mu gice ca kabiri c'urwo rukino. Iyo ntsinzi yatumye Uburundi busezerera Sudani y'Epfo ku bitsindo 4-1 vyose hamwe biteranijwe. Imisambi ya Uganda yo yasezereye Somalia inyuma y'ukuyitsinda ibitsindo indwi mu nkino zibiri zahuje ivyo bihugu, urukino rw'ejo rukaba rwarangiye Uganda ikubise Somalia ibitsindo bine kuri kimwe. Kahise k'Imisambi n'Intamba. Imirwi y'ibi bihugu araheruka yompi mu nkino z'igikombe ca Afurika, n'aho muri iri higanwa iba ikinisha abakinyi barimwo n'abakina hanze y'ibihugu vy'iwabo. Intamba mu Rugamba zimaze kuja muri CHAN incuro imwe, hari mu 2014 muri Afrika y'Epfo,  Imisambi ya Uganda yoyo imaze kuja muri iryo higanwa incuro zine kuva ritanguye mu mwaka wa 2009. Kuva mu 2000, mu nkino cumi zimaze guhuza ivyo bihugu muri rusangi, Uganda imaze gutsinda incuro indwi, Uburundi butsinda incuro zibiri gusa, aho hari mu 2001 na 2011, binganya mu rukino rumwe mu mwaka wa 2017. Muri iryo higanwa rya CHAN 2020, Uburundi, Sudani y'Epfo, na Uganda bihurikiye muri Zone y'uburasirazuba bwo hagati kumwe n'ibihugu vya Somalia, Ethiopia, u Rwanda, Tanzaniya, Djibouti, Sudani na Kenya. Muri aka karere, mu gice gikurikira imirwi izohura mu kwezi kw'icenda n'ukw'icumi muri ubu buryo; Uganda v Burundi, Tanzania v Sudan,  Ethiopia v Rwanda Imirwi izotsinda muri izi nkino izoca ironka uburenganzira bwo kwitaba igice ca nyuma c'ihiganwa rya CHAN 2020.

headline: Burundi: Emmanuel Sinzohagera yatorewe kurongora Inama nkenguzamateka
text: Sinzohagera Emmanuel niwe yatowe kuri uyu wa 25/08/2020 ngo arongore inama nkenguzamateka nshasha y'u Burundi, akaba asubiriye Reverien Ndikuriyo yahora ayirongoye. Aba bakenguzamateka bashasha bari basanzwe mw'ikoraniro rya mbere ku ngoro y'inama nkenguzamateka i Gitega, kuva ku wa 20 z'uku kw'umunani, ryari rirongowe na Kurisansuma Jean Bosco, umukenguzamateka akurira abandi mu myaka, nk'uko amategeko abivuga. Mu bakenguzamateka 39 bari bahari, Bwana Sinzohagera yatowe ku majwi 38, umwe niwe atagize ico abivugako. Abakenguzamateka bemeje kandi Njebarikanuye Spes Caritas yahora ari icegera ca kabiri c'umukuru w'inama nkenguzamateka yahahora akaba ari we yatowe kuba icegera ca mbere ku majwi 38 kuri 39 batoye. Nshimirimana  Cyriaque nawe yatowe mu ntara ya Ruyigi niwe yatowe kuba icegera ca kabiri c'umukuru w'inama nkenguzamateka. Abatowe bose bava mu mugambwe CNDD-FDD. Umukenguzamateka Emmanuel Sinzohagera ni umupasitori mw'ishengero rya Methodiste Uni, akaba yatowe mu ntara ya Bujumbura. Yari asanzwe kandi ari mu barongoye umugambwe Cndd-Fdd, akaba yari umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa ajejwe ibibazo vy'iterambere kuva mu 2016 igihe uyu mugambwe utunganya gushasha inzego zawo. Mu kurongora iyo nama nkenguzamateka, Bwana Sinzohagera asubiriye umukenguzamateka Révérien Ndikuriyo yahora ayirongoye kuva mu 2015.

headline: Yakomowe n'inzoka zirenga 200 arondera umuti uvura gukomorwa
text: Buri mwaka abantu barenga imiriyoni 5,4 barakomorwa n'inzoka kandi abashika 138.000 zirabahitana, mu gihe ubuvuzi bukigoye henshi kw'isi. Mu ntumbero yo kurondera umuti uvura gukomorwa n'inzoka iyo ari yo yose, umugabo yahoze ari umushoferi w'amakamyo muri Amerika yakoresheje umubiri wiwe nk'ikigeragezo co kurondera umuti. Gushika ubu, aramaze gukomorwa ku gushaka kwiwe inshuro zirenga 200 kandi aramaze no kwitera ubumara bw'inzoka mu mubiri inshuro 700. Yavuganye na BBC imbere y'isekeza mpuzamakungu ryo guhimiriza abantu ku mabi yo gukomorwa n'inzoka ryatanguye ejo itariki 19 z'ukwa cenda. Yabwiye BBC igituma ari ngirakamara gushira ubuzima bwiwe mu kaga mu gihe hari abahinga bavuga ko ari ukwigerezako kandi bitabereye ku kiremwa muntu. Ikibazo kimeze gute? Buri minota itanu hama hari ahantu kw'isi umuntu apfa yishwe no gukomorwa n'inzoka kandi abantu bane muri uwo mwanya nyene bahakura ubumuga budakira. Ariko hari abantu bariko barashira ubuzima bwabo mu kaga mw'igerageza bakorana n'ivyo bikoko bikwega inda hasi. Tim Friede, aba muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika i Wisconsin, yafashe videwo ariko arareka n'ibigirankana inzoka z'ubumara zikamukomora, izo video agaca azishira kuri YouTube. Kubabara biza ubwo nyene Muri imwe muri izo video, nyuma yo gukomorwa vuba cane inshuro zibiri n'inzoka yitwa mamba, avuga araba kamera atanezwe amaraso ariko aratemba ku maboko yiwe. Agira ati "Iyo ari inzoka ya 'black mamba' umubabaro uza ubwo nyene. Ni nko kuribwa n'inzuki igihumbi ica rimwe. Inzuki zishobora kuba zifise mirigarama imwe canke zibiri z'ubumara, ariko 'mamba' igukomoye rimwe ikurekuriramwo mirigarama 300 gushika ku 500." Yabwiye BBC ibica bikurikira agira ati "Nyuma y'aho nca ntangura kuvyimba. Mu minsi mikeyi ikurikira mba ata ntege mfise. Ndavye ukuvyimba kwanshikiye, ndashobora kugereranya ubumara inzoka yanteyemwo uko bungana. Birababaza cane". Ni ukwigerezako kandi ntibibereye ku kiremwa muntu Ariko si bose batamarirwa iyo babonye videwo ziwe kuri YouTube nk'uko abakunzi biwe kuri urwo rubuga bibagendera. Dr Stuart Ainsworth wo mw'ishure ry'ubuvuzi bwo mu turere dushushe (School of Tropical Medicine) i Liverpool mu Bwongereza ari ati "Ntituzi na gatoyi ivyo aba bantu baba bariko barakora." Iryo shure akorako riri mu bindi bigo biriko biragerageza kuronka umuti mushasha uvura gukomorwa n'inzoka iyo ari yo yose. Mu bisanzwe inkingo nshasha zigeragezwa ku mbeba hamwe n'ibindi bikoko bikoreshwa muri za laboratware, hanyuma basanze ata ngorane niho igerageza ku bantu ritangura mu buryo bwitondewe cane. Dr Ainsworth yabandanije ati "Abantu usanga bikingira bonyene kuko ata mategeko abigenga. Ariko ibi bakora birashobora no gutuma bapfa. Nta n'umwe yari akwiye kubikora." Ariko mu gitasa c'inganda z'imiti kw'isi, nta mategeko ahari agenga ubushakashaka ku miti ivuga ubumara. Kimwe mu bigo bikorera mu Bwongereza citwa Wellcome Trust, gishaka ko hashirwa ubuhinga muri ubu bushakashatsi, kikavuga ko "Hari uburyo bumwe bwo mu guhingura, umutekano bijanye, canke ingingo ntarengwa zigenga uko bikorwa". Friede arahakana cane ko ivyo akora mu kwigerezako ku buzima bwiwe, abikora gusa kugira aronke abamukurikirana benshi ku mbuga hwaniro. Agira ati "Sinabikoze kugira nsohore videwo za YouTube - nashaka gukiza ubuzima bw'abantu hamwe no kwerekana ubudasa. Nkoresha YouTube kugira gusa ndonke abaganga nkorana nabo. Kwari nko gutomboza. Ariko vyarakunze." Mu bwoko bw'inzoka hafi 3.000, ubushika 200 gusa nibwo bufise ubumara bukomeye ku buryo bwokwica canke bukamugaza umuntu. Friede arazi neza bwinshi muri ubwo bwoko. Yaba ubwoko bwa "cobra", "vipers" canke "mamba", aramaze gukomorwa inshuro zirenga 200 mu myaka mirongo ibiri iheze. Aha uca wongerako inshuro zirenga 700 amazi kwitera we nyene ubumara bw'inzoka. Ubwinshi bw'ubumara inzoka ishobora gutera mu muntu canke igikoko buratandukanye. Rimwe na rimwe inzoka irashobora gukomora ntiyinjize ubumara na bukeyi, rero kubutera ni uburyo bwo gupima ubwinjira uko bungana. Friede agira ati "Iyo udakingiwe neza ubumara bw'inzoka nka 'black mamba', bibangamira imicungararo y'imitsi yawe yo mu bwonko. Bigasigura ko mu gikiriza hawe humagatara, guhema bikagorana, amaso agahuma kandi ntushobore kuvuga, ukagwa hasi bukebuke, ukagagara." "Ntibishikira imitsi ijana ku bwonko, bigasigura ko ushobora kugumana ubwenge gushika upfuye." Gukomorwa na "cobra" birababaza cane Friede atunze inzoka nyinshi z'ubumara mu kigo ciwe, kandi agerageza ugukomora kwazo ku mubiri wiwe. "Ndafise cobra zo mu mazi zamuka muri Afrika. Gukomora kwayo ni ibara. Irakomeye. Vyari ibintu biteye ubwoba kwumva." Cobra yo mu mazi ifise ubumara bubangamira imitsi ijana ku bwonko. "Izindi cobra zifise ubumara burimwo cytotoxins butera kubora kw'igihimba, co kimwe n'ubwoko bwa 'rattle snake'. Burashobora guca urutoke canke ukuboko kwose." Friede yibanda ku ngingo y'uko iyo winjiwe n'ubumara buke buke, ugenda uramenyereza abasoda b'umubiri, ariko ubwo buryo akoresha bwariyamirijwe cane. Uburyo busa n'ubwo - naho hakoreshwa ibikoko - bwashoboye gushikana ku muti w'ubumara umwe gusa uzwi gushika ubu. Guhingura imiti ivura ubumara biracakorwa nk'uko vyamye bikorwa kuva mu kinjana ca 19. Ubumara  bukeyi buterwa mw'ifarasi canke intama bagaca bafata abasoda b'umubiri w'ico gikoko bari mu maraso yaco. Friede arabaza ati "Urabona hari ibi bikoko bishaka kutwica, kandi sinshaka gupfa. Rero jewe nca mba iyo farasi. Kuki tutokwingira twebwe nyene ngo ntutigire ico tuba?" Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 51 yahoze ari umushoferi w'ikamyo si umuhinga mu kwirinda kw'umubiri, kandi ntiyigeze aja muri kaminuza. Gutinya kwicwa n'igikoko c'ubumara nico catumye atangura gukora ibi bintu bidasanzwe, ubu haraciye imyaka 20. Yatanguriye ku bitangurirwa hamwe n'ibikoko vya scorpion mu nyuma yungururiza ku nzoka. "Sindakoresha buri nzoka y'ubumara iriho kw'isi. Nahisemwo izishobora kwica vuba cane." Arafise inkovu nyinshi yakuye muri ubwo bushakashatsi bwiwe kandi yarahatswe gupfa ariko aragira ukwo kugerageza kwiwe. Ariko ntikimubuza kureka ngo inzoka zimukomore ata baganga bamuri impande. "Inshuro zishika 12 vyarangoye cane gukira. Mu kugerageza kwanje mu mwaka wa mbere narinjijwe ibitaro nyuma yo gukomorwa na cobras zibiri. "Utegerezwa guca muri iyo nzira igoye. Nta muganga canke Kaminuza kw'isi izokwigisha ibintu nk'ibi." Ibipimo vyo kwa muganga vyatumye arushaho kwizera ko uburyo bwiwe buriko burakora. Avuga ati "ugereranije n'abandi ndafise igitigiri kigwije na kabiri c'abasoda b'umubiri bajejwe gukingira ubumara. Ibi vyemejwe n'ibipimo vyo muri laboratware." Haciye imyaka nk'ibiri, video zo kuri YouTube za Tim Friede zakabuye ubwenge bw'umuhinga mu kwirinda kw'umubiri, Jacob Glanville, aca aheba akazi yakora nk'umuhinga mukuru mu bumenyi ku kigo gikora imiti Pfizer, aca atanguza ikigo ciwe gikora imiti ivura ubumara. Glanville agira ati: "Ivyo Tim yagize vyari bihambaye, ariko birabangamye ku buzima kandi nta n'umwe nobihanura." Ico kigo kiriko kirakoresha amaraso ya Friede mu guhingura ubwoko bushasha bw'imiti ivura ubumara. Friede agira ati "bafashe utugingo ndangamuntu twanje (DNA) n'utugingo RNA, abasoda b'umubiri banje bakoramwo ibindi bisa nkavyo (clonage). Ubu nibwo bumenyi bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru rushoboka." Nk'uko bitangazwa n'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagaro kw'isi, OMS, buri mwaka abantu imiriyoni 5,4 bakomorwa n'inzoka. Igitigiri c'abapfa kigereranywa hagati y'81.000 n'138.000. Abandi barenga 400.000 basigarana ubumuga bigatuma batabaho neza. Ariko vyarinze gushika mu mwaka w'2017 kugira OMS yemeze ko kuribwa n'inzoka ari uburwayi butitaweho bwo mu karere gashushe ko kw'isi (tropicale). Buri mwaka itariki ya 19 z'ukwa cenda ifatwa nk'itariki yo kuzirikana ikibazo co gukomorwa n'inzoka. Igikorwa nyamukuru ni kwibanda ku bibazo bibangamiye ibice vyo hagati mu gihugu muri Aziya, Afrika hamwe n'ubumanuko bwa Amerika, bitararonswa uburyo bw'ubuvuzi bwa kijambere. Mu bihugu vyinshi, umuti uvura ubumara bw'ibikoko uboneka usanga ata kamaro ugira kubera ububiko bubi canke kubera yuko ukora ku bwoko bumwe gusa bw'inzoka, ntukore ku bundi bwoko. Mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu mwaka uheze, ikigo Wellcome Trust catangaje ishingwa ry'ikigega c'amahera imiriyoni $100, yo kurondera ubuvuzi bushasha kandi bwiza bw'ubumara bw'ibikoko. Ayandi mashirahamwe menshi ariko ararondera ukuntu yohingura imiti ivura neza kandi izimbutse. Amasezerano na Glanville azotuma Friede ahabwa amafaranga atari make nibashobora guhingura urukingo. Friede agira ati "Ntukomorwa n'inzoka kugira uhabwe amahera. Ariko dukoze urukingo bizozana amahera menshi. Ndafise umushingwamanza kandi twaragiranye amasezerano." Glanville afise icizere cinshi ku vyo bazoshikako. "Ubushakashatsi bushitse kure cane - turi mu gutangura kugerageza ku mbeba." Glanville na Friede bariyamirizwa cane n'inzego z'abahinga mu bumenyi kubera uburyo bakoresha mu bushakashatsi, ariko barihagararako cane mu bushakashatsi bwabo. Glanville agira ati "twarihweje ibijanye n'inyifato yemewe ku muntu mu buvuzi. Twakoresheje uburyo busa n'ubukoreshwa mu nyigo zerekeye abashobora kubangamirwa cane n'ibindi bintu, nk'ugukomereka bijanye n'akazi, umugera wa SIDA n'ibindi." Mu gihe yemera ko uburyo akoresha butoroshe kugira abandi babukurikize, Tim Friede avuga ko umwimbu uri mu kuboneka. "Hari intumbero yinyegeje inyuma y'ubutagondwa bwanje. Nditanga nk'incungu kugira haboneke umuti uzimbutse, ushobora kuvura ubumara bw'inzoka zose."

headline: Kubera iki Esther Nish yaririmvye indirimwo "Kavorivori"?
text: Umuririmvyi w'umurundikazi azwi nka Esther Nish yaganiriye na BBC Gahuzamiryango mu kiganiro c'abakenyezi. Kiretse kuvuga ku kuntu yatanguye umuziki hamwe n'aho umushikanye ubu, yanavuze ku ndirimbo yiwe nshasha Kavorivori. Iyo ndirimbo naho irimwo amajambo asanzwe akoreshwa mu bihozo abavyeyi b'abarundikazi baririmbira abana babo, kuri we inafise insiguro yihariye.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru: Firmino, Martinelli, Van de Beek, Arthur, Toney, Iwobi, Kante
text: Atletico Madrid iripfuza kugura umusatirizi wa Liverpool umunyabrezili Roberto Firmino w’imyaka 31. (Todo Fichajes) Leicester City iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umunya-Hollande Donny van de Beek w’imyaka 25. (Ekrem Konur) Liverpool nta mugambi ifise wo kukorera ku gice kivuga ivyo gushobora kugura umukinyi Arthur Melo asanzwe yaratijijwe muri uyu murwi avuye muri Juventus.  Uyu munya-Brezili akina hagati w’imyaka 26 akeneye kubagwa kubera imvune yanduye mu gihe yari mu myimenyerezo. (CBS Sports) Umusatirizi wa Brezili Gabriel Martinelli w’imyaka 21 avuga ko yipfuza gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha y’igihe kirekire muri Arsenal akaba ari mu biganiro ku vyerekeye umushahara w’amapaundi 50.000 ku ndwi yipfuza ko wongezwa incuro zibiri. (Times) Martinelli ashaka kuja ku rugero rumwe n’aba Gunners bahembwa imishahara minini – yabaya amapawundi 200.000 ku ndwi – imbere y’uko yiyemeza gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha. (Mail) Brentford iriteguye guha Ivan Toney w’imyaka 26 amasezerano mashasha kugira ngo imirwi ya Manchester United, Leeds, Newcastle na West Ham izeruke. (Mirror) Everton yatanguye ibiganiro vy’intangamarara n’umukinyi wo hagati w’umunya-nigeria Alex Iwobi w’imyaka 26, ku vyerekeye amasezerano mashasha. (Football Insider) Umufaransa akina hagati N'Golo Kante w’imyaka 31 yipfuza kuguma muri Chelsea n’aho aronderwa na Paris St-Germain. (Le10 Sport) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Chelsea umutaliyano Jorginho w’imyaka 30, ashobora kwimukira i Nou Camp kuri gusa mu ci riza inyuma y’aho umuhagarikizi wiwe abonekeye i Barcelona. (Tuttomercato) Newcastle iracipfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Leicester umwongereza James Maddison w’imyaka 25, hamwe n’umusatirizi wa Bayer Leverkusen umufaransa Moussa Diaby w’imyaka 23. (i News) Ibiganiro hagati ya Middlesbrough hamwe na Michael Carrick kugira ayibere umumenyereza. (Football Insider) Chelsea yasubiye kuvugana n’uwahoze arongoye igisata co kwinonora imitsi muri Liverpool Michael Edwards kugira ngo afate ico kibanza muri Stamford Bridge. (90min) Tottenham iri mu biganiro na Google ku bijanye no gukoresha izina ry’ikibuga cayo. (Athletic) Romeo Beckham, umuhungu w’uwahoze ari kizigenza w’umurwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubwongereza David, ariteguye gutangura gukina mu mupira w’amaguru w’Ubwongereza mu gihe umurwi B wa Brentford uzoba ukina na Crewe mu rukino rutazoba rufise abarorerezi. (Mirror) Ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose mu mupira w’amaguru ritegekanijwe gutangura mu kwezi kuza rishobora kubamwo ibibazo kubera ikibuga c’indege gikuru ca Qatar kititeguye kwakira ingenzi nyinshi zizoba zinjira muri ico gihugu kurorera iri higanwa. (Mail) Umunyegori wa Chelsea umunyamerika Gabriel Slonina  w’imyaka 18 asanzwe yaratijijwe mu murwi Chicago Fire, azokorera imyimenyerezo i Londres mu kiringo c’indwi zibiri mu gihe bazoba bariko bihweza nimba yoshirwa burundu ku rutonde rw’abakinyi mu kwa mbere canke yosubira mw’ihiganwa MLS kugira ngo amareyo uwundi mwaka. (Football.London) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa PSV Eindhoven Cody Gakpo ntagishaka kuja muri Leeds n’aho yamaze kwumvikana n’uyu murwi ko yowimukiramwo mu ci riza. Manchester United, Arsenal na Real Madrid nayo nyene irashaka uyu mukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Hollande w’imyaka 23. (Mirror)

headline: Umuntu ashaje gusumba abandi i Buraya yarokotse Covid imbere y'isabukuru y'imyaka 117
text: Umubikira w'umufaransa, umunyabulaya ashaje gusumba abandi bose kuri uwo mugabane, yarokotse Covid-19, mu gihe hasigaye imisi mike ngo ahimbaze isabukuru y'imyaka 117 amaze avutse. Lucile Randon, yiswe izina ry'ikibikira rya Mama Andre mu 1944, yamenyekanye ko yanduye coronavirus ku wa 16 z'ukwa mbere ariko nta bimenyetso na bimwe yagaragaje. Yabwiye ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu ko ata n'uko yari azi ko yayanduye. Yaciye yitaramura mu nzu y'abakukuruke iri ahitwa Toulon mu bumanuko bw'Ubufaransa, ariko ubu aboneka ko yakize neza. Mama Andre, ubu akaba atabona kandi agendera kw'igare y'abamugaye, ariko yitegurira guhimbaza ivuka ryiwe ejo ku wa kane - n'aho azohimbaza uwo musi ari kumwe n'abantu bake cane, gusumba uko vyahora. Umuvugizi w'ikigo c'abakukuruke ca Sainte Catherine Labouré, David Tavella, avuga ati: "Yaragiriwe amahirwe menshi". Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Var Matin ati: "Ntiyambajije ibijanye n'amagara yiwe, ahubwo yambajije ibijanye n'imibereho yiwe. Nk'akarorero, yaripfuje kumenya nimba amasaha yo gufungura no kuryama bigiye guhinduka". "Ntiyigeze yerekana ko atinya iyi ndwara. Ahubwo yari afitiye impungenge abandi basanzwe babana muri ico kigo". Mamar Andre yavutse ku wa 11 z'ukwa kabiri mu 1904. Mu gihe azwi ko ari we muntu wa mbere ashaje ku mugabane wa Buraya, azwi kandi nk'umuntu agira kabiri ashaje kw'isi yose, nk'uko biri ku rutonde rw'ikigo Gerontology Research Group's (GRG) gisanzwe gikora ubushakashatsi bwo kurondera abantu bashaje kw'isi. Abajijwe n'ikinyamakuru co mu Bufaransa BFM nimba yari afise ubwoba bwo kuba yaranduye Covid, Mama Andre yishuye ati: "Oya, nta bwoba nari mfise, kubera ntatinya gupfa". "Ndanezerewe no kuba kumwe na mwe, ariko nipfuza ko mba ndi ahandi hantu - kumwe na mukuru wanje, sokuru wanje na nyokuru wanje".

headline: Kwigisha karate biciye kuri internet kubera coronavirus
text: Kwigisha karate biciye kuri internet kubera coronavirus. Niko amasomo menshi mu Bushinwa asigaye atangwa.

headline: Umukinyi wa tennis Novak Djokovic yamaze kuva mu gihugu inyuma yo gutsindwa mu rubanza rwa visa
text: Novak Djokovic yavuye muri Australia inyuma y'aho atsindiwe mu rubanza yarimwo arondera kuguma muri ico gihugu. Abacamanza banse urubanza rw'uyu mukinyi rurangiranwa wa tennis yari yuguruje inyuma y'aho reta y'ico gihugu ihagarikiye visa yiwe ku mvo zo gukingira ubuzima no gukingira umutekano kubera atari bwicandagishe. Iyo ngingo yakuye icizere c'uyu mukinyi co kurwanira igikombe ciwe yatsindiye mw'ihiganwa Australian Open. Djokovic avuga ko ababaye cane ariko yubashe ingingo ya sentare yafashwe hari hasigaye umusi umwe gusa ngo akine urukino rwiwe rwa mbere. Abakunzi biwe baguye mu gahunwe aho bari bakoraniye hanze ya sentare igihe iyi ngingo yatangazwa, mu gihe bwaca akina urukino rwa mbere rwiwe. Umugore umwe mu bafana yabwiye BBC y'uko akaruhuko kiwe ko muci kazoba impfagusa kuko uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 34 atazoba ari mw'ihuganwa rya Open. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa AustraliaScott Morrison yakirije yompi iyi "ngingo ikingira imbibe zacu igakingira n'abanya Australia". Djokovic yari yuguruje uru rubanza igihe umushikiranganji abinjira n'abasohoka Alex Hawke  akoreshereje ububasha bwiwe nk'umushikiranganji mu gufuta visa y'uyu mukinyi w'umunya Serbia, avuga ko ari nka hamwe yoramuka yemerewe kwinjira mu gihugu vyoha impigi abarwanya incanco za Covid. Bwari ubwa kabiri visa yiwe ihagaritswe, inyuma y'aho ihagarikiwe ubwa mbere kubera ukutubahiriza amabwirizwa yo kurwanya covid, ingingo yahavuye ifutwa n'uwundi mucamanza. Itegeko rimwirukana mu gihugu ririmwo ingingo imubuza gusubira kugaruka muri Australia mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu, n'aho iyi ishobora kuvanwaho mu bihwe bimwe bimwe. Mu rubanza rwa sentare yashashe uno musi ku wa Mungu, ikaba yari igizwe n'abacamanza batatu, ababuranira Djokovic basiguye bavuga ko ingingo ya reta  "itemewe kandi idafise ishingiro", ariko biba ivy'ubusa. Iyi ngingo yo kuri uyu wa Mungu irangije impari zari zimaze imisi cumi ku bijanye na Visa ya Djokovic yo kwinjira muri Australian. Vyari vyateje uburakari mu gihugu kubona uyu mukinyi yariko agerageza kwinjira adacandazwe. Reta ibandanya ivuga ko ata muntu n'umwe ari hejuru y'amabwirizwa yashinzwe mu ntumbero yo kurwanya iki kiza. Mu gihe Djokovic ataricandagisha, yaranduye Covid-19 incuro zibiri zose, ubwa nyuma hakaba hari ku wa 16 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri guheze. Imirwi ibiri y'abaganga - umwe washizweho n'igisata kijejwe tennis muri Australia, Tennis Australia, uwundi nawo washinzwe na reta y'intara ya Victoria - yari yamucishirijemwo iramuha uburenganzira bwo kwinjira muri Australia. Ariko abajejwe gucungera imbibe z'iki gihhugu, Australian Border Force, baramuhagaritse ku wa 05 z'uku kwa mbere kubera atari akwije ibisabwa mu bijanye no kurwanya coronavirus. Mu nyuma, umucamanza  yarafuse iyi ngingo, abonye ko abajejwe gucungera imbibe batari bisunze amategeko igihe yashika, ariko reta ikaba yaciye ifata mu minwe ikibazo ku wa gatanu maze ica isubira guhagarika iyi visa. Djokovic azosubirizwa ejo ku wa mbere n'umutaliyano Salvatore Caruso aza mu kibanza ca 150 kw'isi, mu rukino rwiwe n'umunya Serbia Miomir Kecmanovic.
