headline: Covid-19: Prezida Museveni avuga ko Uganda ishaka gukora urucanco
text: Reta ya Uganda yatanguye umugambi wo gukora urucanco rwa Covid-19 nk'ibindi bihugu vyo kw'isi. Mu mwaka uheze prezida Yoweri Museveni yavuze ko abahinga ba Uganda bariko baragerageza kugira ubushakashatsi bwo gukora urucanco n'umuti uvura Covid-19, vyose bikiriko birageragezwa. Prezida Museveni yagize ati:"Ndiko ndafashanya n'abantu banje gutangura kurondera urucanco rwacu, s'ukuguma turindiriye ngo badufashe. Twaracerewe ariko ubu twatanguye kurondera urucanco rwacu ruzotangwa hose kw'isi." Yabandanije avuga:"Tuzotangura kurugeragereza ku mbeba mu kwezi kwa gatandatu kugira turabe ko ata ngaruka rufise, hanyuma mu kwezi kw'umunani turugeragereze ku nkende, hanyuma turindire ko rwemezwa na WHO/OMS. Prezida Museveni yavuze ivyo igihe yari ahejeje gukingirwa Covid-19 n'urucanco rwa AstraZeneca ari kumwe n'umupfasoni wiwe Janet Museveni, ku kirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu i Nakasero mu gisagara ca Kampala. Museveni kandi yahamagariye abanyagihugu gusidukana n'iyonka kwicandagisha avuga ko urwo rucanco ata ngaruka rufise.

headline: Tiwa Savage na Burna Boy ntibazoja muri Afrika y’Epfo kubera ubwicanyi ku banyamahanga
text: Umuririmvyi rurangiranwa w'umunya Nigeria, Burna Boy, yarahiye ko atazosubira guhonyoza ikirenge muri Afrika y'Epfo, eka na mugenziwe Tiwa Savage ahagarika igiteramo yari afiseyo. Mu butumwa yacishije mu rubuga rwa Twitter, Burna Boy avuga ko yaheruka muri ico gihugu mu 2017, kandi ko atazosubirayo gushika leta ya Afika y'Epfo yisubiyeko. Tiwa Sawage nawe avuga ko ibiriko biraba bikomeye kandi ko atawungukira mu kumeneka kw'amaraso. Ati "kwica uwariwe wese w'umunyafrika bimuraba". Igipolisi c'ico gihugu carahagaritse abantu batari bake bari muri iyo migumuko imaze iminsi mu bisagara vya Johannesburg, Pretoria n'ahandi. Abantu bashika batanu baramaze kwicwa. Umukuru w'ico gihugu, Cyril Ramaphosa, n'abandi bakuru b'ibihugu vya Afrika bariyamiriza ivyo bitero. Umukuru w'igihugu ca Nigeria, Muhammadu Buhari, yarungitse intumwa muri Afrika y'Epfo itwaye "ubutumwa bwo kwerekana akababaro ku kuntu abanyagihugu baco bafashwe nabi". Umuririmvyi akomoka muri Nigeria azwi cane no muri Afrika, Tiwa Savage yanditse kuri Twitter ko yiyamirije yivuye inyuma ubwicanyi ku bantu b'iwe muri Afrika y'Epfo. Ati: "Kuri iyo mvo, sinshobora kuririmba mw'isabukuru rya DSTV ryimirije i Johannesburg ku wa 21 z'uku kwezi kw'icenda". Tiwa azwi cane mu ndirimbo nka "Eminado" na "All Over" amenyesha ko "kwica uwariwe wese w'umunyafrika bimuraba atarindiriye kuba umunyanigeria gusa". Mugenzi wiwe Burna Boy nawe akomoka muri Nigeria avuga ko ubwicanyi bushingiye ku rwanko ku banyamahanga buteye kubiri n'ivyo yarwaniye. Avuga ko Afrika yashigikiye abanya Afrika y'Epfo igihe bariko barwanya intwaro karyanishamiryango y'abazungu ya Apartheid kuva mu myaka ya 1960  gushika mu 1994 irangira. Burna Boy yanditse ati: "Ndatahura ko abanya Afrika y'Epfo bataye umutwe kubera imyaka bamaze bacurwa bufuni na buhoro, ku buryo basigaye bafata nk'abansi abantu babafashije mu gihe bariko bacurwa bufuni na buhoro, ahubwo  bagashimagiza ababahohoteye". Yongeyeko y'uko hari abanya Afrika y'Epfo "bameze neza, bafise ivyiyumviro birashe, n'aho atari benshi". Ishavu ryavuye kuri iyo migumuko ryatumye ishami rimwe ry'ikigo c'ubudandaji ca Afrika Afrika y'Epfo, Shoprite, giterwa kikanyagwa urukombamazi muri gisagara ca Lagos.

headline: Donald Trump arashaka kuvana Sudan ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bishigikiye iterabwoba
text: Umukuru wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Donald Trump avuga ko Sudani ishobora gukurwa ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bishigikiye iterabwoba mu gihe iki gihugu coramuka kirishe indishi y'akababaro ingana n'imiliyoni 335 z'amadorari  ku bakozweko n'ibitero vy'iterabwoba kuri Amerika n'imiryango yabo. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Sudani Abdalla Hamdok avuga ko aya mafaranga yamaze kurihwa ariko ko Amerika itarashobora gushoka ivyemeza. Sudani iri ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bishigikiye iterabwoba kuva mu 1993, igihe uwari umukuru w'umuhari w'iterabwoba al-Qaeda, Osama bin Laden yaba muri ico gihugu ku butumire bwa leta. Iyi ndishi y'akababaro ivugwa na Bwana Trump yerekeye ibitero vy'iterabwoba vyabaye ku biro vy'ubuserukizi bwa Amerika muri Afrika vyakozwe na al-Qaeda mu 1998. Ibitero vyakozwe i Nairobi muri Kenya hamwe n'i Dar-es-Salaam muri Tanzania vyahitanye abantu 220, iyi ndishi igategerezwa guhabwa "abahuye n'ibitero vy'iterabwoba kuri Amerika n'imiryango yabo", nk'uko Trump abivuga. Imigenderanire hagati ya Amerika na Sudani yarateye imbere kuva uwahoze arongoye iki gihugu Omar al-Bashir akuwe ku butegetsi inyuma y'imyiyerekano y'abanyagihugu yo mu mwaka uheze. Omar al-Bashir yarongoye ico gihugu mu kiringo c'imyaka 30. Mu gihe Sudani yokurwa ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bifasha iterabwoba, yoba ari inkuru nziza kuri kino gihugu, aho imfungurwa, igitoro n'imiti bibandanya bikena kandi bikagurwa ibitagenda. Mu butumwa yacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Donald Trump yanditse ati: "Inkuru nziza cane ! Leta nshasha ya Sudani, imaze gutera intambwe nini, yemeye kwishura imiliyoni 335 z'amadolari y'abahuye n'ivyago vy'iterabwoba kuri Amerika n'imiryango yabo". "Mu gihe aya mafaranga yotangwa, noca nkura Sudani ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bifashe mu mugono iterabwoba. Hanyuma, UBUTUNGANE ku banyamerika ni intambwe NINI kuri Sudani!". Umukuru w'igihugu wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arafise ububasha bwo gukura igihugu ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bishigikiye iterabwoba. Inama nshingamateka ifise ikiringo c'iminsi 45 kugira iyiburizemwo. Sudani ni igihugu kigira kane muri kino gihe - inyuma ya Irani, Koreya y'Uburaruko na Syria - kuri uru rutonde rw'ibi bihugu bifasha iterabwoba kw'isi. Haciye akanya gato yanditse ubwo butumwa, Bwana Hamdok yaciye amenyesha ko ayo mafaranga yatanzwe, nk'uko bivugwa n'imboneshakure ya leta ya Sudani. Kuriha ayo marafanra "nico ca nyuma gisabwa" kugira ngo Sudani ikurwe ku rutonde rw'ivyo bihugu bishigikiye iterabwoba. Bwana Hamdok avuga ko Sudani irindiranye igishika ubutumwa bahabwa n'abategetsi ba Amerika. Kuba iki gihugu cari kuri runo rutonde vyaragize ingaruka mbi cane. Kw'igenekerezo rya 07 z'ukwezi kw'umunani mu 1998, amakamyo yari yuzuye ibibombe yaturikiye hafi umwanya umwe ku biro vy'ubuserukizi bwa Amerika i Nairobi n'i Dar es Salaam. Abantu barenga 200 barapfuye ku mugwa mukuru wa Kenya, hamwe n'abandi  bashika 11 i Dar es Salaam, igisagara gikuru ca Tanzania. Abaharurwa mu bihumbi nabo barakomerekeye muri ivyo bitero. Abenshi muri bo bari abasivire.

headline: Uganda yabuze umuntu wa mbere ahitanywe n'ikiza ca Covid-19
text: Ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara bwemeje ko uwo yahitanywe na Covid-19 ari umugore w'imyaka 39 wo mu karere ka Namasindwa hafi y'urubibe na Kenya, nyuma yo gupima ikiza ciwe. Ariko abajejwe amagara bavuze ko naho urubibe rudakingiye, nta cerekana yuko yoba yaragiye muri Kenya, igihugu kirimwo abanduye benshi kurusha Uganda. Uwo mugore yari umufasha w'abaganga ku bitaro, akaba yashikanywe kwa muganga itariki 15 z'uku kwezi kw'indwi arembejwe n'umusonga, aca acikana haciye iminsi umunani. Ubushikirangani bujejwe amagara muri Uganda buvuga ko abantu mirongo itatu bashobora kuba baregeranye n'uwo mugore bashizwe mu kato, bakaba bakiriko bararondera n'abandi boba baramushitse hafi. Uganda yaratanguye intambwe zo gukurako amategeko ya "guma muhira" mu kwezi kwa gatanu kandi kuwa gatatu yaremereye abadandaza mu bice vyinshi bituwe cane vya Kampala, gusubira kwugurura. Gushika ubu muri Uganda haramaze kuboneka abantu 1079 banduye Covid-19.

headline: Mesut Ozil na Sead Kolasinac ntibazokina igihe Newcastle yizoba akira Arsenal kubera ikibazo c’umutekano
text: Mesut Ozil na Sead Kolasinac ntibari ku rutonde rw'abakinyi ba Arsenal bazoja guhura na Newcastle ejo ku munsi wa Mungu kubera "ibibazo vy'umutekano wabo". Abo bakinyi bompi baherutse guterwa n'akarwi nk'inkozi z'ikibi zahatswe kunyuruza amamodoka yabo, mu ndwi zibiri ziheze, mu buraruko bw'igisagara ca Londres. Arsenal ivuga ko yashikirije igipolisi ico kibazo kandi "ko ibandanya ifata mu mugongo abo bakinyi n'imiryango yabo". Iti: "Umutekano w'abakinyi n'imiryango yabo, nico gikorwa kiza imbere ya vyose". "Twafashe iyi ngingo inyuma y'aho tuvuganiye nabo hamwe n'ababaserukira". "Twibaza ko vuba bwango tuzoba turi kumwe nabo mu murwi". Igipolisi kivuga ko kiriko kirakora amatohoza ku vyabaye. Mw'itangazo casohoye, kivuga ko kiriko "kivugana na Arsenal kandi ko kizokora amatohoza ku bukozi bw'ikibi bwose bwashikirijwe". Hampande y'ivyo, ihiganwa ry'Ubwongerezwa Premier League ryaraye ritanguye icese, aho umurwi wa Liverpool waraye ukosoye umurwi wa Norwich. Hampande ya kizigenza wa Norwich Grant Hanley yiyinjije igitsindo ca mbere ca Liverpool ku munota w'indwi, Mohamed Salah, Virgil van Dijk, na Divock Origi babandanije bereka uwo murwi winjiye muri Premier League uvuye mu cicaro ca kabiri ko ibintu bitoroshe mu Bwongereza. Liverpool yarangije igikorwa mu gice ca mbere gusa, cagiye kurangira ifise ibitsindo bine ku busa bw'umurwi Norwich, n'aho yabandanije isatira ariko biranka ko ironka ikindi. Norwich yoyo yarinanase iraronka igitsindo kimwe rudende ku munota wa 64, urukino rurangira ari bine vya Liverpool kuri kimwe ca Norwich. Uno munsi ku wa gatandatu, hategekanijwe inkino zitandatu ziza gutangura isaha indwi n'igice ku masaha y'Uburundi n'u Rwanda, ku rukino ruza guhuza West Ham United iza kwakira Manchester City yatsindiye ihiganwa ry'umwaka uheze. Ejo ku wa Mungu, hampande ya Arsenal irindiriwe n'igishika cinshi kugira yerekane inguvu zayo aho zigera mu gihe izoramuka yakirwa na Newcastle, urundi rukino rurindiriwe cane ruzohuza Manchester United na Chelsea i Old Trafford isaha cumi n'imwe n'igice (17h30) mu masaha y'Uburundi nu Rwanda.

headline: DR Congo: Umuririmvyikazi rurangiranwa Tshiala Muana  yasandavye ku myaka 64
text: Umuririmvyi akongera akaba n'umutamvyi rurangiranwa wa Congo Tshala Muana yasandavye ku myaka 64, nk'uko bivugwa n’uwumufasha akongera akaba n’umugenzi wiwe, Claude Mashala. Inkuru y’urupfu rwiwe yasohorewe ku rubuga rwa Facebook rwa Claude Mashala, aho yanditse avuga ati: «Mu gatondo ka kare, Imana rugira vyose yafashe ingingo yo guhamagara Tshala Muana. "Imana ihabwe icubahiro ku bihe vyiza Tshala Muana yaduhaye kuri ino si. Igire n’amahoro Mamu». Mu kwa gatandatu 2020, haradutse igihuha cavuga ngo yapfuye, ariko ntivyari vyo, yari arajwe mu bitaro kubera indwara y’imitsi ifatira mu bwonko. Élisabeth Tshala Muana Muidikay (yavutse ku wa 13 Rusama [5] 1958), asanzwe azwi kw’izina rya Tshala Muana yari umunyamuziki azwi cane muri Repubulika y’intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, yandika indirimbo akongera agatamba. Afatwa nk’ “Umwamikazi wa Mutuashi", umudiho w’umuziki n’intambo vyo mu ntara ya Kasai asanzwe avukamwo, iri hagati mu gihugu. Akunzwe kwitwa "Mamu National”, ni ukuvuga nyina w’igihugu. Azwi cane ku ndirimbo zitari nke nka "Karibu Yangu", « Malu », «  Tshianza », « Tshibola »  n’izindi nyinshi. Yarazungurutse mu bihugu bitari bike, atsindira ubushimwe butari buke haba mu gihugu, ku rwego rw’umugabane canke ku rwego mpuzamakungu, akaba yashoboye gusohora inkurikirane (albums) zirenga 20. Umuziki wiwe urumvikana mw’ireresi y’umuziki izwi cane yo mu 1987 muri Congo  La Vie est Belle na Aya of Yop City. Yari azwi ko ashigikiye uwahoze ari umukuru w’ico gihugu Joseph Kabila n’umugambwe wiwe - Parti du peuple pour la reconstruction et la démocratie (PPRD). Mu 2020 yarahagaritswe na reta ya Perezida Félix Tshisekedi bikavugwa ko hari kubera indirimbo yiwe "Ingratitude" yavugwa ko yanegura umutegetsi atavuzwemwo izina.

headline: Uganda - Covid-19: Abantu babiri bahagaritswe kuko batanze incanco za magendu
text: Abantu babiri badandaza magendu bafatiwe muri Uganda bagirizwa gutanga icanco za Covid-19 za magendu. Uwundi umwe aracaronderwa. Bivugwa ko abo bantu babiri bari bamaze gutera izo ncanco abantu 800 bakora muri kompanyi yigenga, yari yasabiye incanco abakozi bayo. Igisata kijejwe gukurikirana ivyo amagara y'abantu mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu kivuga ko caronse inkuru ivuye ku bategetsi bo hasi ko abo bagabo babiri baguma batembera mu micungararo ya Kampala, bavuga ko ari abakozi bo mu buvuzi bo muri bimwe mu bitaro bisanzwe vyo muri ico gisagara. Dr Warren Namara wo muri ico gisata avuga ko hataramenyekana neza ibiri muri urwo rucanco bateye abantu, ariko ico gisata ngo kiriko kiragira amatohoza ku birugize. Guterwa urucanco rwa Covid-19 muri Uganda ni ku buntu, zikaba zishobora kuboneka mu bigo vya reta n'ivyigenga bijejwe gucandaga. Abantu barenga 856.000 baramaze gucandagwa. Uganda ihanganye n'umufunda wa kabiri w'ikiza ca Coronavirus, aho abantu benshi baguma bandukirwa hakaba hari n'abamaze gupfa.

headline: Thomas Tuchel avuga ko hari igipfungu muri Chelsea kubera igitero ca Russia kuri Ukraine
text: Umumenyereza wa Chelsea Thomas Tuchel avuga ko "hari igipfungu cinshi ku kungene ibintu bimeze mu murwi wacu" inyuma y'aho Uburusiya butereye Ukraine. Uyu murwi uzwi nka The Blues wegukira umutunzi ruhebwa w'umurusiya Roman Abramovich, umushingamateka wo mu mugambwe w'Abakozi mu Bwongereza akaba yavuze ko reta ikwiye gufata amatungo yiwe. Tuchel yavuze ibi mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru yagize imbere y'urukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe ca Carabao Cup aho umurwi wiwe uzotana mu mitwe na Liverpool ku kibuga ca Wembley ku wa Mungu. Tuchel. ati: "Ntiduhave twibaza ko iki atari ikibazo. "Ibintu muri rusangi [muri Ukraine] kuri jewe n'abo dukorana, mbere no kuri bose i Cobham (ikibuga Chelsea isanzwe ikorerako imyimenyerezo), abakinyi, bimeze nabi cane. "Nta n'umwe yari yiteze ibi bintu. Ni ibintu bigoye gutahura, nk'uko nabivuze biradutesheje umutwe, biratubujije umunezero wacu mu rugendo rwose twakoze gushika kuri finale. "Kandi bidushira mu mazi abira, ariko bikaba ibindi bintu ku bantu bose n'imiryango yose muri kino gihe begwa n'iki kibazo kudusumvya. "Igikenewe gusumba ibindi, ni uko twifatanije nabo kandi tubipfuriza amahirwe. "Hanyuma kandi hari igipfungu cinshi ku bijanye n'ingene ibintu bimeze mu murwi wacu no mu Bwongereza, ariko ku kintu nk'iki, numva ntakwiye kukivugako vyinshi". Abramovich ni umwe mu batunzi ruhebwa mu Burusiya kandi azwi ko ari incuti ya hafi cane ya Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya. Umushingamateka wo mu mugambwe w'abakozi Chris Bryant yabwiye abashingamateka ko hari urwandiko yaronse ruva mu bushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati ruvuga ko Abramovich adakwiye kwemererwa kuba mu Bwongereza. Downing Street  ishobora kuba itanezwe n'ivyavuzwe kuri Abramovich mu nama nshingamateka. Tuchel ati: "Turabizi, kumbure dufise kuba ata makuru menshi dufise kuri vyo nk'uko kumbure mufise kuba muvyibaza". "Ariko nibaza ko ari uburenganzira bw'umurwi, abakozi, na jewe nyene ndimwo, bwo kutagira uruhande twegamiye muri poritike, tugakora inkino gusa kandi tukibanda ku nkino gusa. "Si uko dushaka kwinyegeza, ni ikintu kiboneka, ibintu ntibimeze neza na gato, aho ntagushidikanya. Ni uko. "Kuri benshi, hari haciye igihe kirekire ata muntu yiyumvira intambara i Bulaya. "Reka turindire. Ariko ingaruka yoyo ntishobora kubura. "Ariko reka twihangane gato kandi turindire ingingo zizofatwa, hanyuma rero kumbure tuzoheza tuvyige tumenye n'ingene tuvyitwaramwo".

headline: Ukraine-Russia: Ukraine iriko iratera intambwe ku rugamba iyiha icizere
text: I﻿gisirikare ca Ukraine cemeza ko gihagaze neza ku rugamba mu ntumbero yo kwisubiza uturere cambuwe n'Uburusiya. A﻿riko ayo makuru nta buryo bwigenga BBC ifise bwo kuyemeza mu gihe abanyamakuru batemerewe gushika ku rwasiro rw'urugamba.

headline: Icegeranyo ku rwego rw'isi kivuga yuko amamiriyoni y'abantu bicwa n'ubwandu budakorwako n'imiti
text: Mu 2019, abantu barenga umuliyoni n'ibihumbi 200 bahitanywe n'ubwandu buterwa n'udukoko twa bacterie tutagikorwako n'imiti ya antibiotics, nk'uko biri mu cigwa kinini kimaze gukorwa gushika ubu. Abo bantu barenze abahitanwa na malaria canke SIDA ku mwaka. Icegeranyo kivuga yuko ibihugu bikenye ari vyo vyakozweko gusumvya, ngo ariko ikibazo c'udukoko turinda imiti gihanze amagara ya buri wese. Kwongera ubu bwa vuba amafaranga mu guhingura imiti mishasha hamwe no gukoresha iyihasanzweho mu buryo bubereye, nivyo bihanurwa gukorwa kugira twese twikingire. Gukoresha ku buryo bw'umurengera imiti ya antibiotics muri iyi myaka ya vuba mu kuvura ubwandu buto vyatumye iyo miti ata kamaro igira ku bwandu bukomeye. Abantu bariko barahitanwa n'ubwandu busanzwe bwahora buvurwa, bitewe n'uko udukoko tubutera twashitse aho turinda iyo miti. Abajejwe ivy'amagara mu Bwongereza baheruka gugabisha yuko ikibazo c'udukoko turinda imiti (antimicrobial resistance [AMR]) ari ikiza cinyegeje gishobora kuzokwiserura nyuma ya Covid-19, kiretse imiti ya antibiotic itanzwe mu buryo bubereye. Ingereranyo y'abahitanywe na AMR kw'isi, yatangajwe mu kinyamakuru the Lancet, yafatiye ku mwihwezo wavuye mu bihugu 204 wakozwe n'abashakashatsi mpuzamakungu, barongowe na Kamunuza ya Washington muri Amerika. Baharuye ko abantu bashika imiriyon zitanu bapfuye mu 2019 bahitanywe n'indwara AMR yagizemwo uruhara - bakiyongera ku muriyoni 1,2 y'impfu zatewe na AMR ubwayo. Uyo mwaka nyene, bivugwa ko SIDA yahitanye abantu 860.000, malariya nayo 640.000. Benshi mu bapfuye kubera AMR bahitanywe n'ubwandu bw'imbere mw'ihemero, nk'umusonga, hamwe n'ubwandu bw'imihora y'amaraso, ishobora gutuma umuntu agira umuriro w'umurengera (septic). Ikindi kibazo kizwi nka MRSA (methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus) carahitanye benshi kurusha, mu gihe agakoko wa E. coli, hamwe n'utundi dukoko twinshi, natwo twagize uruha mu kurinda imiti kwa cane. Hifashishijwe amakuru yakuwe ku barwayi abitswe mu bitaro, ivyigwa hamwe n'ayandi masoko y'amakuru, abashakasha bavuga yuko abana ari bo babangamiwe cane, mu gihe urupfu rumwe muri zitanu zitewe na AMR rushika mu bana bari munsi y'imyaka itanu. Impfu zitewe na AMR zigereranywa ko ari: Deaths from AMR were estimated to be: Impfu zivuye kudakora kwa antibiotic vyari vyitezwe kuba: Prof Chris Murray, wo mu kigo kijejwe ibiharuro mu vy'amagara n'ubugenduzi kuri Kaminuza ya Washington, yavuze ko ibiharuro bishasha vyerekana isura y'ukuri y'ikibazo c'udukoko turinda imiti kw'isi kandi ko ari imburi yuko hakwiye kugira igikorwa vuba "nitwaba dushaka gutsinda urugamba rw'udukoko turinda imiti". Abandi bahinga bavuga ko gukurikrana urugero rw'ukurinda imiti mu bihugu bitandukanye n'uturere ari nkenerwa. Muganga Ramanan Laxminarayan, wo mu kigo Centre for Disease Dynamics, Economics and Policy, i Washington, yavuze ko amahera atangwa ku rwego rw'isi yo guhangana n'ikibazo ca AMR akeneye kwongerwa gushika ku rugero rw'ayakoreshwa ku zindi ndwara. Yagize ati "Ubwa mbere na mbere amahera akwiye gushirwa mu gukinga ubwandu, hakarabwa ko antibiotic zihari zikoreshwa neza kandi mu buryo bubereye, hamwe no gushira ku masoko antibiotics nshasha". Muganga Laxminarayan yongeye ati henshi kw'isi hari ikibazo co kubona imiti ya antibiotic izimbutse kanyi ivura neza - kandi ivyo bikwiye gufatwa nkama n'abarongozi mu vy'amagara hamwe n'abanyepolitike aho ari ho hose.

headline: DR Congo: M23 yasubije igisagara ca Kibumba
text: Umukuru w’ingabo z’akarere  ka Afrika y’Ubuseruko ziri muri Congo yahamagariye abanyagihugu gusubira mu ngo zabo mu karere ka Kibumba avuga ko ubu gatekanye. General Major Jeff Nyagah, wo mu ngabo za Kenya ziri muri ubwo butumwa, yabivuze ubwo umugwi witwaje ibigwanisho wa M23 wari usubije ico gisagara ca Kibumba kiri ku 20km uvuye ku murwa mukuru w’intara ya Nord Kivu, Goma. Ako karere kari kw’ibarabara rikomeye rija Goma. Nk'uko biri mw'itangazo w’itangazo M23 yaraye isohoye rikaba ryagiye ahabona kuri uno wa gatanu, ni ingingo yo gusubiza Kibumba  yafashwe inyuma y’imibonano hagati ya M23  n’abaserukira ingabo z’akarere ka Afrika y’Ubuseruko (EACRF) be n’abaserukira umurwi w’ingabo zishinzwe kugenzura imipaka (Mécanisme Ad hoc de Vérification) washinzwe n’inama mpuzamakungu ku karere k’ibiyaga binini, CIRGL/ICGLR, ku magenekerezo ya 12 na 22 Kigarama (12) uno mwaka. Iri tangazo rivuga riti: “N’aho ibirindiro vyacu biguma biterwa, be n’ubwicanyi bukorerwa abantu bacu, bugakorwa n’urunani rwa reta, M23 irashigikiye utwigoro tw’akarere, ikaba yemeye kurekura ibirindiro vyayo vya Kibumba bikaja mu minwe ya EACRF”. General Major Nyagah yavuze ko mu gihe igikorwa co muri  ako karere ka Congo kitoroshe, ingabo z’akarere zizobandanya kukirangura n’ubwira n’ukwubahiriza amategeko mpuzamakugu y’abantu bari mu kaga. Amashirahamwe afasha avuga ko  intambara hagati ya M23 na reta ya Congo  yatumye nibura abantu beranga inusu y’umuriyoni bata izabo kuva mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Ku wa kane , icegeranyo ca ONU cashoboye kumenyekana kitarasohoka icese  cavuze ko reta y’Urwanda  iha imfashanyo abagwanyi ba M23. Uretse ONU, Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Ubufaransa n'Ububirigi navyo biragiriza Urwanda gushigikira M23, ivyo reta y'ico gihugu yagumye ihakana. Ico cegeranyo kivuga kandi ko ingabo za Congo zunze urunani n’iyindi migwi yitwaje ibigwanisho  mu kurwanya M23. Ico cegeranyo gishikiriza kandi amakenga ko bitero bishingiye ku moko bitota abavuga ikinyarwanda bo mu buseruko bwa Congo bakekwa kuba bashigikiye M23. Kibumba ni kamwe mu turere twari dusanzwe tugenzurwa na M23 mu ntara ya Kivu ya Ruguru. Inyuma yo kwigarurira igisagara ca Bunagana ku rubibe na Uganda muri Ruheshi(6) iturutse mu birindiro vya Tchanzu na Runyoni hafi y'ikirunga ca Sabyinyo, ahazwi nk'ivyahoze ari ibirindiro vyayo bikuru vya kera, M23 yagiye yigarurira uturere tutari duke mu ntambara yakurikiye hagati y’abarwanyi bayo n’ingabo za Congo. Ubu, igenzura igice kinini ca teritwari ya Rutshuru n’ibice vy’iya Masisi mu ntara ya Kivu ya Ruguru. Mu ntango z’uku kwezi, umuvugizi wayo yasohoye itangazo ryamenyesha ko wari witeguye “guhagarika ibikorwa no gusubira inyuma” nk’uko bisabwa n’aba bakuru b’ibihigu vy’akarere.Mu gihe itangaje ko igiye kuva i Kibumba. M23 ntivuga igihe utu tundi turere yigaruriye tuzosubizwa.

headline: Burundi - UK: Hashobora kwifashishwa itegeko ry'ingere ku yindi ku kibazo ca Covid
text: Uburundi buragabisha ko bushobora gusubiriza mu ndumane Ubwongereza mu gihe ico gihugu kitokwisubirako ku ngingo cafashe yo kubuza abantu bava mu Burundi kuja mu Bwongereza kubera Covid. Ivyo biri ku rubuga rwa Twitter rw'ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire y'Uburundi n'amakungu. Ubwo bushikiranganji bwandika ko Uburundi ari kimwe mu bihugu biriko biritwara neza mu kugwanya Covid -19 kw'isi, ko butumva rero ico bashingiyeko mu gufatirwa ibihano. Itariki 29 z'ukwezi kwa mbere, umushikiranganji ashinzwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu mu Bwongereza, Grant Shapps, yatangaje kuri Twitter ko abafise ubwenegihugu bw'Ubwongereza ari bo bonyene bemerewe kwinjira muri ico gihugu bafise urupapuro rwerekana ko batanduye, kandi bagaca bugaranwa mu kiringo c'imisi icumi. Uburundi, Urwanda na Reta zunze ubumwe z'Abarabu vyashizwe ku rutonde "rutukura" rw'ibihugu, ingenzi zibivuyemwo canke zabiciyemwo, zitemerewe kuja mu Bwongereza. Iyo ngingo ifise intumbero yo guhagarika ikwirakwizwa ry'ubwoko bwa coronavirus bwa mbere muri Afrika y'Epfo, yashizwe mu ngiro ku musi wa gatanu isaha icenda ku masaha yo mu Burundi no mu Rwanda. Ubwongereza ntibwasiguye nimba muri ivyo bihugu bitatu hamaze kugera ubwo bwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus. Mu karere ubwo bwoko bwa coronavirus bukaba bumaze kuboneka mu gihugu ca Kenya gusa.

headline: Intambara ya Ethiopia ishobora kugira ingaruka mu karere kose
text: Intwazangabo irongoye ingabo za Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu karere k'ihembe rya Afrika avuga ko ibiriko biraba muri Ethiopia bishobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku mutekano ma karere kose. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC, Jenerali William Zana yibutsa ko Ethiopia  ifise ingabo mu gihugu kibanyi ca Somalia zagiye gushigikira reta. Ati: "Mu gihe Ethiopia igize ibibazo um gihugu, ibi bisigura ko ingabo ziri muri Somalia zica zitahukanwa, ibi navyo bikagira ingaruka ku bindi bihugu bitanu vyo um karere ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko, hanyuma no muri Somalia naho ugasanga imirwi y'intagondwa iciye ironka akaryo ko kwisuganya kugira ihungabanye umutekano". Nayo ku bijanye n'uko umugwa mukuru wa Ethiopia Addis Abeba, ushobora kwigarurirwa n'inyeshamba za TPLF, Jenerali Zana avuga ko ibi bishobora gutuma iki gihugu cinjira mu makuba atagira izina. Avuga ko ingabo za Amerika ziri muri Djibuti ziteguye guhungisha abanyagihugu ba Amerika mu gihe ibintu vyoyangara. Arerekana kandi impungenge z'uko Misiri nayo ishobora gutegura ikikogrwa ca gisirikare kugira isambure rwa rugomero rutura rwa Ethiopia  Grand Renaissance Dam, mu gihe ibintu bibandanya biyangara mu bijanye n'umutekano muri Ethiopia. Mu gihe inyeshamba za Tigray zisugereje umugwa mukuru Addis Abeba, ibihugu bimwe vyamaze gusaba abanyagihugu bavyo gukura akarenge. Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU riragabisha ko igihugu gishobora kwinjira mu ntambara mu gihugu cose mu gihe ugutana mu mitwe hagati y'ingabo za Reta n'inyeshamba za TPLF zitohagarara.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Mourinho, Aguero, Messi, Cavani, Pulisic, Giroud, Sancho, Konsa, Henry
text: Umukuru w'umurwi Tottenham, Daniel Levy avuga ko yipfuza kurindira gushika iri higanwa ry'uyu mwaka rirangire imbere y'ugufata ingingo ku bijanye na Jose Mourinho ko yobandanya amenyereza uyu murwi canke agasubirizwa. (ESPN) Umusatirizi wa Argentina Sergio Aguero w'imyaka  32 avuga ko atazi nimba uyu mwaka uzoba ari wo wa nyuma akiniye  Manchester City. (Times) Umusatirizi wa Barcelona  n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina Lionel Messi w'imyaka 33 ntarafata ingingo y'umurwi azokinira mu mwaka uza mu gihe n'abamuserukira ata murwi n'umwe baratangura kuvugana.  (ESPN) Umumenyereza wa Manchester United, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer yemeje ko agiye kugiriranira ibiganiro n'umusatirizi wa Uruguay Edinson Cavani afise imyaka  34 ubu, mu ntumbero yo kuraba ingene amasezerano uyu mukinyi afitaniye n'uyu murwi yokwongerezwa ikindi kiringo. (Sky Sports) Umumenyereza wa Chelsea, Thomas Tuchel aripfuza ko umukinyi w'umunyamerika akina ku ruhande, Christian Pulisic w'imyaka 22  aguma muri Stamford Bridge, ariko akavuga ko ata ngingo irafatwa. (London Evening Standard) Tuchel avuga ko "hakiri kare cane" gufata ingingo ku bijanye na kazoza k'umukinyi Olivier Giroud, umusatirizi w'umufaransa w'imyaka 34 mu gihe yinjiye mu mezi ya nyuma y'amasezerano yiwe afitaniye na Chelsea. (Mirror) Umunyegori wa Chelsea, umunya Esupanye Kepa Arrizabalaga w'imyaka 26 avuga ko atigeze yipfuza kuva muri uyu murwi kandi ko ata bwoba afise kubona atarashobora kuba nomero ya mbere mu gusamira uyu murwi.  (Star) Borussia Dortmund iripfuza kugurisha mu ci riza umukinyi w'imbere w'umwongereza Jadon Sancho w'imyaka  20 maze ikagumana umusatirizi Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 20 ava muri Norvege. (Bild - in German) Umumenyereza wa Aston Villa, Dean Smith aramirira kure amakuru avuga ko umukinyi w'inyuma w'umwongereza Ezri Ngoyo Konsa w'imyaka 23 yoba ariko aronderwa na Liverpool hamwe na Tottenham. (Birmingham Mail) Umunyegori wa AC Milan, umutaliyano Gianluigi Donnarumma w'imyaka 21 yipfuza kuba umunyegori wa mbere kw'isi ahembwa umushahara munini.  Amasezerano yiwe n'uyu murwi azorangira mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka, kandi imirwi PSG na Chelsea iriko iramurondera. (90min) Uwahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Arsenal Thierry Henry yoba ari hafi yo kuba umumenyereza mushasha wa Bournemouth inyuma y'aho uyu murwi wo mu cicaro ca kabiri uherewe uruhusha rwo gutangura ibiganiro n'umurwi asanzwe amenyereza muri kino gihe, Montreal Impact, wo muri Canada. (TalkSport) Uwigeze gutsindira ihiganwa ryo kwoga ubu akaba ari umushikiranganji w'inkino w'Ubufaransa, Roxana Maracineanu atakambira umusatirizi w'umufaransa Kylian Mbappe ubu afise imyaka 22 ko yoguma mu murwi Paris St-Germain, ni mu gihe hari amakuru avuga ko ariko aronderwa na Real Madrid. (AS) Umuhungu w'imyaka 13 w'uwahoze ari umukinyi w'inyuma wa Everton N'Ubwongereza, Phil Jagielka, yagiriraniye amasezerano n'umurwi wa Liverpool, abakeba b'uyu murwi wahoze ukinamwo se wiwe.(Mail) Umumenyereza waEverton Carlo Ancelotti arizeye ko azogura abakinyi beza mu myaka ibiri iri imbere ata buryo bwinshi cane akoresheje. (Liverpool Echo)

headline: Aba-Taliban n'abagore: Umunyeshure wa kaminuza ya Kabul mu bwoba bwa kazoza
text: I Kabul, aya  mango abanyeshure ba kaminuza bategerezwa kuba bariko baritegurira gutangura igice/igihembwe gishasha. Ariko  ubu hari benshi bariko barata ikintu cose kigaragaza ingene babayeho muri  kahise mu guhe aba Taliban bariko barakizura hanze. Ku munyeshure umwe - umugore , akaba n'uwo mu bwoko bw'inkehwa buburabuzwa bw'aba-Hazara, abo muri bwo muri iyi myaka bahuye n'amabi yo kunyuruzwa no kwicwa n'aba Taliban - abo bagabo bari hanze bateye impungenge gusumba. Ngaha abwira BBC ingene ivyo yarota gushikako vyasubiriwe n'ubwoba bwo kuhakura agatwe mu minsi mike gusa. Ni ibintu ntabona amajambo nobivugamwo, ntabeshe. Ibintu vyose, vyose narota gushikako, ivyo nakoreye vyose. Agateka kanje, ukwiyumva kwanje, naho no kubaho kwanje nk'umukobwa, ubuzima bwanje - vyose birageramiwe. Ninde azi umwanya uzohaca kugira baze gusaka inzu ku nzu kugira batware abakobwa - kumbure banabasambanye ku nguvu. Nshobora no guhitamwo kwiyahura niyo baza mu nzu iwacu. Namye mvugana na bagenzanje, ivyo nivyo twese, twese, dutegekanya gukora. Urupfu ni rwiza gusumba gutwarwo nabo. Twese dufise ubwoba kandi dufise ubwoba gushika no mu musokoro w'amagufa. Nta n'amezi abiri aheze,  nta kindi niyumvira  atari urupapuro rwanje rw'umutsindo. Nariko ndategekanya ingene nzokwigira ibibazo vyimirije, ico gukora, ico kureka, nkora ikirangaminsi, ngerageza kuraba ko ibintu vyose vyokorwa neza. Abantu batandukanye batanguye kugira ubwoba igihe aba Taliban bariko barafata intara, ariko jewe n'abandi ntitwigeze twibaza ko vyoshitse bagafata Kabul. Ubuzima bwanje bwari busanzwe kugeza aho bafatiye Mazar-i-Sharif (igisagara kinini mu buraruko bushira uburengero bwa Kabul, cari gisanzwe kiterekwa aba Taliban). Hanyuma bashika Kabul. Harumvikanye amasasu hanyuma tuja twumva ngo aba Taliban bakwiye  mu bice vyose vy'igisagara. Kuva ico gihe, nta na kimwe casubiye kuba uko cahora. Abandi bose bo mu muryango wanje bagumye muhira. Imangazini zose zarugawe, ibiciro vyaguma biduga kw'isaha kw'isaha, n'urugero rwo kuvunja amafaranga rwaguma ruhindagurika vuba. Naciye nturira impapuro zanje zose zo kuri kaminuza. Naraturiye impapuro zanje zose zerekana amanota naronse. Nabikoreye kw'ibaraza. Nari mfise ibitabo vyinshi, ibitabo vyiza cane, nariko ndasoma. Vyose narabinyegeje. Narivanye ku mbuga hwaniro zose nariko. Nabwiwe ko vyari kumbera ikibazo kuba mfise ivyo nanditse canke nashize kuri izo mbuga canke kubandanya uri kuri zo. Aba Taliban bashobora kuba baraba ivyo twashizeko bakadutora. Facebook niyo yari ingorane ikomeye kuko nayijako cane. Nari mfise ivyo nari naranditse kera mvuga ko aba Taliban ataco bari kugira, ko nari kwihagararako imbere yabo, ko batashobora guhagarika uburenganzira bwanje bwo kwiga, ko batashobora kunyugaranira i muhira.Nabise abakora iterabwoba. Ivyo nari nanditse vyarabatyoza, nta nkeka. None vyose babikoze mu minsi mike gusa. Vyandengeye, biranteye ubwoba, birambabaje. Aba Taliban bamenyesheje ko abagore bokwambara mu buryo bw'ingene vyamye bikorwa kuva kera kandi bakambara hijab. Abantu bambara burka na hijab kubera ugutinya. Narumvise aho mu mashure amwe ya kaminuza usanga hari igitambara (rideau) hagati y'abanyeshure b'abahungu n'abakobwa. Imiryango imwe imwe ntireka abana bayo b'abakobwa ngo baje kw'ishure.  Kubera abantu bose bazi ko aba Taliban gushika ubu batarerekana isura yabo y'ukuri, ariko akaba ata nkeka ko bazoyerekana, abantu bashaka rero kwirinda ingorane niyo vyashika. Nararavye ikiganiro c'aba Taliban n'abamenyeshamakuru (ku wa kabiri -aho bemeye uburenganzira bw'abagore). Barabesha, ndazi neza ko babesha. Narasohotse  ku wa kabiri ndi kumwe na data tugiye kurondera umuti. Vyose vyari vyugaye. Nategerejwe kwambara hijab ifuka hose, hari n'abambara burka, n'abakobwa bafise hagati y'imyaka 13 na 14.Nta na hamwe bihuriye n'uko vyahora. Umenga igisagara carimutse. Aba Taliban bariko baratembera mu micungararo. Barakuraba  niyo woba wambaye hijab ikwiye hose - nk'uko umenga nturi  umuntu asanzwe, nk'uko umenga nibo baganza ubuzima bwawe, nk'uko umenga uru umucafu wo guta. Uko niko bakuraba mw'ibarabara. Igihe nari nciga, niyumvira gushika ku bintu vyinshi, imigambi n'intego z'ubuzima. Ubu none nibaza ko nzotegerezwa kuva muri iki gihugu , kuko ndi umu-Hezara. Muri kahise barateye amashure y'abakobwa b'aba-Hazara, bica amajana. Urumva nta nkeka bazotwica, kumbure badusambanye ku nguvu, batwice. Nk'umukobwa nkongera kandi mu  bwoko bw'inkehwa, nta kibanza mfise mu gihugu canje. Bose mu muryango wanje bafise ubwoba. Tuguma tugerageza kuva umunsi wa mbere aba Taliban binjira kugira turabe ingene twova muri iki gihugu, biciye mu mategeko canke bidaciye mu mategeko. Ikibuga c'indege cuzuyeko abantu benshi, nta bibanza bisigaye vyo guhungisha abantu, kandi ibihugu biriko biranka kutwakira, kandi abantu bose, bose baguma baraba nk'uko umengo nta kiriko kiraba. Ikintu gikuru  nosaba ama reta y'ibihugu vyo hanze n'uko bitokwemera aba Talaban nka reta ya Afghanistan. Kuko babikoze, tuzoba dupfuye, kumbure turi hasi kurusha abapfuye, ninde yobimenya. Ariko ikimbabaza cane kuruta kubona igisagara canje nkunda n'umutima wanje wose gifatwa - aha si ukuvuga ko ntwawe n'ikibabarwe - ariko ikimbaza gusumba n'uko amakungu ari mu gacerere. Abantu bose bibereye mu gacerere. Abo bantu bose ataco banezwe, bigira nk'uko umenga abanya-Afghanistan si abantu. Ivyo rero birambaza cane  ku mutima. Baravuga ngo , "Ubuntu ku bantu bose". Ariko nibaza ko ivyo bwikiye kuvugwa gutya, "Ubuntu kuri bose, kiretse abanya-Afghanistan".  Ariko sinigeze nibaza ko vyoshitse ngaha. Biravuna umutima kubona mu minsi mike gusa, ibintu vyose narota gushikako, ibintu vyose nibaza ko noronse, vyose vyayonze. BBC ntivuga izina ry'umugore nyene iyi  nkuru ku mvo z'umutekano wiwe

headline: Haiti: umupfakazi Martine Moïse asizwe n'umukuru w'igihugu yashoboye kuvuga ubwa mbere
text: Uyu mupfakazi asizwe n'umukuru w'igihugu ca Haiti arasigura ingene vyagenze igihe abicanyi "batabagura" umugabo wiwe n'amasasu bamaze kwinjira mu nzu yabo mw'ijoro. Martine Moïse avuga ko ico gitero cabaye mu kanya gato, ku buryo umugabo wiwe Jovenel atashoboye no "kuvuga ijambo rimwe rudende". Perezida Moïse yishwe ku wa 07 z'uku kw'indwi n'abacangero b'abanyamahanga 28. Umupfasoni Martine Moïse na we nyene yarakomeretse muri ico gitero, aca asimbanwa i Miami muri Florida kuvurwa. Ejo ku wa gatandatu, yashoboye kwifata ijwi yacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, aho yaniyemeje kubandanya igikorwa ciwe. Abantu batari bake bemeje ko koko ari umupfasoni w'umukuru w'igihugu. Asigura ingene ibintu vyagenze igihe abo bicanyi bagandagura umugabo wiwe, Martine Moïse muri iryo jwi avuga ati: "Mu kanya isase, abo bacangero biteye inzu yanje baca bamijagira amasasu umugabo wanje". Abandanya ati: "Iri shano nta zina rifise kuko utegerezwa kuba umwicanyi ruhebwa kugira wice umukuru w'igihugu nka Jovenel Moïse, utanamuhaye n'akaryo na gato ngo avuge n'ijambo na rimwe gusa". Avuga ko umugabo wiwe yishwe ku mvo za poritike - cane cane, akavuga amatora ya kamarampaka ku mpinduka z'ibwirizwashingiro ryari guha  umukuru w'igihugu ububasha busumbirije. Abo bantu atavuze, yavuze ko "bashaka kuzimanganya indoto z'umukuru w'igihugu". Yongerako ati: "Nishwe n'amarira, ni vyo, ariko ntidushobora kureka ngo igihugu cacu kibure iyo kiva n'iyo kija". "Ntidushobora kureka amaraso ya Perezida Jovenel Moïse, umugabo wanje, umukuru w'igihugu cacu dukunda cane kandi na we yadukunda, ngo asesekere ubusa". Perezida Moïse w'imyaka  53 yari umukuru w'iki gihugu ca mbere gikenye ku mugabane wa Amerika kuva mu 2017.  Ubutegetsi bwiwe ntibwari bworohewe kuko yahanganye n'ibirego vyo kurya ruswa kandi mu ntango z'uwu mwaka igihugu caranzwe n'imyiyerekano ikomeye ku mugwa mukuru no mu bindi bisagara. Amatora y'abashingamateka yari ategekanijwe mu kw'icumi 2019 ariko impari zatumye yunguruzwa, vyumvikana ko ubutegetsi bwa Moïse bwari bushingiye ku mategeko wenyene yasohora (décrets). Yategekanya gutumako amatora ya kamarampaka mu kw'icenda uno mwaka yo kwemeza canke guhakana impinduka z'ibwirizwashingiro. Mu kwa kabiri igihe abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bwiwe bamusabiye gutanga imihoho, Moïse yavuze ko haburijwemwo integuro y'abashatse kumugandagura banatembagaze na reta yiwe. Gushika ubu abateguye ico gitero co ku wa gatatu n'intumbero yabo ntibaramenyekana. Hari ibibazo abantu bibaza ariko bitararonka inyishu, harimwo ukungene abo bicanyi bashoboye kwinjira mu muhana wiwe. Mu ndwi iza, abari bajejwe kumukingira ubuzima bazorengutswa kugira ngo bisigure. Umwe mu banyaporitike bakomeye batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi afise amakenga ku bivugwa. Steven Benoit  yahoze ari umukenguzamateka wa Haiti yabwiye iradiyo yo muri ico gihugu Magik9 ku wa gatanu ko atari "abanya Colombia bamwishe", ariko nta vyemezo yatanze. Igiporisi ca Haiti kivuga ko abenshi muri abo bacangero ari abanya Colombia, mu gihe babiri ari abanyamerika bakomoka muri Haiti. 17 mu bari bagize ako kagwi barafatiwe ku mugwa mukuru Port-au-Prince inyuma yo kurasana. Batatu mu bikekwa barishwe, mu gihe abandi umunani bakiriko barahigwa. Reta ya Colombia yemeye gufasha Haiti mu matohoza yayo. Umukuru w'igiporisi ca Colombia Jenerali Jorge Luis Vargas, avuga ko abahoze ari abasirikare 17 ba Colombia bikekwa ko babigizemwo uruhara. Ubunyamabanga bwa Amerika buvuga ko budashobora kwemeza nimba hari umwenegihugu wa Amerika yahagaritswe. Ariko, ibinyamakuru vya Amerika na Canada bivuga ko umwe muri babiri bafise ubwenegihugu bubiri, James Solages w'imyaka 35, yamuka muri Florida kandi ko yahoze ajejwe umutekano ku biro vy'ubuserukizi bwa Canada muri Haiti. Umucamanza ariko arakora amatohoza yabwiye ibinyamakuru ko Solages hamwe n'uyo wundi munyamerika azwi kw'izina rya Joseph Vincent, bavuze ko bari muri ico gihugu nk'abakarimani b'abo bacangero. Umucamanza Clément Noël yabwiye ikinyamakuru Le Nouvelliste ati: "Intumbero kwari uguhagarika Perezida Jovenel Moïse... ntikwari ukumwica". Ibwirizwashingiro rivuga ko Inama Nshingamateka yategerezwa gutora uwundi mukuru w'igihugu. Ariko haracari impari ku matora yategerezwa kuba mu kw'icumi 2019. Impinduka kw'ibwirizwashingiro - izo bose badahurizako - zivuga ko umushikiranganji wa mbere ari we yaca ashikirizwa amabanga. Hagati aho, Haiti isanzwe ifise umushikiranganji wa mbere mfatakibanza, Claude Joseph, hamwe n'uwari aherutse kugenwa, Ariel Henry, ariko akaba atari bwarahire. Aba bompi bavuga ko ari bo barongoye igihugu. Ku wa gatanu, hari umurwi w'imigambwe wateye igikumu ku cemezo gitangaza umukuru w'igihugu mushasha  - Joseph Lambert - hanyuma Henry ace amubera umushikiranganji wa mbere. Ibihe igihugu kirimwo ntivyorohereza iki gihugu gutorera umuti ingorane za poritike n''z'ubutunzi zihanze Haiti.

headline: Uwahoze ari umuhuza w'Abarundi Sheikh Mohamed Rukara yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo
text: Umushingamateka Sheikh Mohamed Rukara yahoze ari umuhuza w'Abarundi yaraye aryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo. Uyo mu nyapolitike yahoze ari umunywanyi akomeye w'umugambwe CNDD-FDD yapfiriye i Bruxelles mu gihugu c'u Bubirigi. Aciye ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter, umukuru w'igihugu Petero Nkurunziza abuva ko Abarundi bazokwama iragi ry'urukundo n'ubumwe "vyamye bimuranga. Urupfu rwiwe ruravugwa cane ku mbuga hwaniro cane cane Twitter, aho abatari bake bamenyesha ko bababaye, banashimagiza ivyo yakoze. Selemani Bonke ati: "…ndamwibuka igihe yavuga ati 'Ujinga ni mzigo' (bivuga mu Kirundi ngo ubujuju ni umuzigo)". Bwana Rukara yavutse mu mwaka wa 1955, akaba yari mu banywanyi bakomeye b'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi CNDD-FDD, yigeze kuba no mu nama y'inararibonye zawo. Azwi ko yize amashure mu gihugu ca Arabia Saoudite, akaba yarabaye mu bihugu vya Costa Rica hamwe na Tanzania. Yaranakoze kw'iradiyo y'igihugu, aho yashikiriza amakuru mu rurimi rw'igi Swahili akaba ariwe yashinze radiyo na televiziyo Salama. Umuhisi Rukara yatowe mu mwaka wa 2010 kuba umuhuza w'Abarundi, ico gihe akaba yari umusenateri, aho yaciye atangura ayo mabanga mu ntango za 2011. Igikorwa ciwe nticari coroshe. Mu kwezi kwa gatanu 2012, amaze umwaka umwe urenga atanguye amabanga, yatangaje ko hari akarwi k'abantu bashaka kumugandagura, aho umuvugizi wiwe ico gihe, Jerome Ndiho, yavuze ko kari akarwi k'abiba ikigega c'igihugu. Umuhisi Rukara yagiye kurangiza amabanga yiwe nk'umuhuza w'Abarundi mu kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe umwaka wa 2016, akaba yasubiriwe na Edouard Nduwimana yahoze ari umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu.

headline: Ethiopia : Indyane z’amoko zahitanye abantu barenga 200 mu ntara ya Oromia
text: Abantu barenga 200 nibo bishwe mu ntambara z'amoko mu burengero bwa Ethiopia. Umurwi w'igihugu ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu muri Ethiopia uvuga ko inyeshamba z'umuhari Oromo Liberation Army (OLA) zishe abantu hafi 150. Abategetsi b'akarere babwiye BBC ko abarwanyi bo mu moko y'aba Oromo n'aba Amhara batanye mu mitwe mu kiringo c'imisi ibiri mu ndwi iheze mu karere ka East Wollega ko mu ntara ya Oromia. Umwe mu babibonye yabwiye BBC ko babonye ibiziga mu ruzi ruri hafi mu nyuma bigahambwa. East Wollega irarwiriyemwo abanyagihugu bo mu bwoko bw'aba Amhara kandi ikaba ifise isi y'akanovera yamye iteza indyane hagati y'aya moko abiri. Umurwi w'igihugu ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu muri Ethiopia uvuga ko ico gitero cari gishingiye ku moko, ukagiriza umuhari OLA ko ari wo wateje izi ndyane. Uwu murwi umenyesha ko abo mu bwoko bw'aba Amhara nabo baciye bihora, bakica abantu hafi 60. Abategetsi babwiye BBC ko abarwanyi b'aba Oromo n'aba Amhara ari bo bakoze ivyo bitero muri ako karere. Bivugwa ko abantu batari bake bataye izabo amazu atari make nayo nyene agasamburwa. Umuhari OLA uvuga ko urondera ubwigenge bw'abanyagihugu b'aba Oromo, urahakana ko ata basivire wishe, ukavuga ko wowo wariko urakingira abanyagihugu kugira ntibaterwe n'abarwanyi bitwaje ibirwanisho. Bivugwa ko intambara zibandanya mu karere ka East Wollega mu gihe ingabo za reta ziriko ziragerageza gusubiza ibintu mu buryo. Umuhari OLA ukorera cane cane mu burengero bwa Oromia, aho abajejwe agateka ka zina muntu bagiriza inyeshamba zawo ko muri kahise bamye batera abasivire. Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, uwu muhari waratangaje ko wishize hamwe n'umuhari Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) uri mu ntambara na reta mu buraruko bw'igihugu, ivyateje impungenge ko intambara ishobora gukwira igihugu cose. Kuva mu 2018,  indyane z'amoko zagiye ziyongera muri Ethiopia - izatumye abantu barenga imiriyoni zibiri bata izabo.

headline: Kigali n'uturere umunani birasubira muri guma-muhira kubera ukwiyongera kwa Covid-19
text: Ibiro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere w'u Rwanda bivuga ko ibikorwa nka vyose mu muji wa Kigali no muri district umunani bihagaritswe mu ntumbere yo gukumira ikiza ca Covid-19 kibandanya ciyongera mu gihugu n'ahandi mu makungu. Izo district ziyongera ku muji wa Kigali ni Burera, Gicumbi, Kamonyi, Musanze, Nyagatare, Rubavu, Rutsiro na Rwamagana. Iryo tangazo rivuga ko kuva ku tariki ya 01/07/2021 bibujijwe kuva muhira kuva isaha cumi na zibiri z'umugoroba gushika isaha cumi zo mu gitondo. Amashure, amasengero, hamwe na vyinshi mu biro birugawe (abakozi bazokorera muhira) kiretse abatanga serivisi za nkenerwa cane, nayo imanza zibera muhira canke ukundi guhurira hamwe birabujijwe. Mu rwego rw'indero iri tangazo rivuga yuko amashure yose yugawe, hakazofatwa ingingo zihariye kubategerezwa gukora ikiza mu kwezi kw'indwi 2021, aho bazomenyeshwa ikizokorwa n'ubushikiranganji bujejwe indero. Ibibanza vy'uburiro navyo birugaye, abakeneye ivyo kurya bivuye muri ivyo bibanza bakazoshobora kubigura babitahana muhira. Ingenzi zishika canke ziva ku kibuga c'indege ca Kigali zizoja zerekana ibipimo vyo kutandura (negatif) vyafashwe mu masaha 72 imbere y'uko zifata urugendo. Ibindi bibujijwe n'imanza z'ubukwe, zaba izo gukwa canke gusezerana ku kagari co kimwe n'ibikorwa vyo kwinonora imitsi mu mazu yabihariwe azwi nka gym. Ariko kwinonora imitsi umuntu ari ukwiwe hamwe n'inkino zidasaba kwegerana bizobandanya hakurikijwe amategeko yo kwirinda. Kuja ku kiriyo hazoja hemererwa abantu 10 gusa ica rimwe, nayo kuja ku maziko hazoja haremererwa abantu batarenga 30. Izi ngingo zafashwe mu muji wa Kigali no muri zo district umunani, zizosubira kwihwezwa nyuma y'indwi zibiri bivanye n'ukuntu abajejwe ivy'amagara bazoba babona uko ibintu vyifashe. Kwiyunguruza uva muri district uja muyindi birabujijwe, kiretse umuntu agiye kwivuza canke hari ibindi vya nkenerwa cane kandi vyihutirwa agiyemwo. Inama ziremewe, ariko aho abantu bahurira hazokwemererwa kwakira gusa 30% vy'abashobora kuhakwira, kandi abazokwitaba bose bazotegerezwa kwerekana ibipimo vyo kutandura vyafashwe mu masaha 72 imbere y'iyo nama. Guhurira hamwe mu kwinezereza harimwo n'imanza z'ubwoko bwose birabujijwe, yaba mu bibanza bihurwamwo ba benshi canke muhira. Ubukwe n'izindi manza zose navyo birabujijwe. Uburiro n'ubunywero butadandaza inzoga bwemerewe kwakira abantu batarenga 50% vy'abashobora kwakirwa kandi bwugare isaha cumi n'imwe z'umugoroba, nayo ububare bwobwo burabujijwe. Ibibanza biberamwo amasengesho vyubahirije amategeko yo kwirinda biremerewe kwugurura ariko bikakira abantu batarenga 30% vy'abo bishobora kwakira. Izi ngingo zizotegerezwa gukurikizwa ikiringo c'indwi zibiri. Iryo tangazo rihera ryibutsa abanyagihugu yuko bategerezwa kwubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirida arimwo kutegerana, kwambara agafukamunwa hamwe no gukaraba intoke, abatazovyubahiriza bakazofatirwa ibihano. Igihe cose hagiye haraba ingingo zo guma-muhira mu Rwanda, abanyagihugu batari bake baravyidogeye, cane cane abatunzwe n'ubuzi bwa minsi yose, bafungura ari uko bavuye muhira. Bamwe mu batavuga rumwe na leta y'u Rwanda bagiye bariyamiriza izi ngingo bakavuga yuko leta izifata itabanje kuraba ineza y'abantu bato bato batagira uko bifashe, bakavuga ko ibikora yigana ibikorwa n'ibihugu bikize. Ariko abajejwe amagara mu Rwanda bavuga yuko ingingo za guma-muhira bazifata ku neza y'igihugu n'abanyagihugu. Bavuga kandi yuko abakorwako cane na guma-muhira baronswa imfashanyo, kandi ko iyo ngingo iba ikenewe mu gukumira iki kiza kibangamiye isi. Ingingo zikaze zagiye zirafatwa ku batubahirije amategeko y'umukwabu canke yo kwikingira nko kwambara agafukamunwa, zirimwo kubafungira mu bibanza nka za stade hamwe no kubaca amande.

headline: Israel - Palestina: Abapfa biyongereye, Israel yishe intwazangabo ikomeye muri Gaza
text: Israel yishe uwundi mutegetsi mukuru w’inyeshamba zo mu muhari w’abarwanyi ba Palestina, bazwi nka Palestinian Islamic Jihad, mu gihe ibitigiri vy’abagwa muri ibi bitero vy’indege muri Gaza. Abana batandatu hamwe n’abarwanyi batari bake ba PIJ  - harimwo intwazangabo Khaled Mansour na Tayseer Jabari – bari mu banya-Palestina 32 bavugwa ko bamaze kwicwa. Ibisasu vya muzinga hafi 600 nivyo bimaze guterwa muri Israel kuva ku wa gatanu, nk’uko bivugwa n’umutegetsi bwa Israel. Israel ivuga ko ibi bitero vyaje inyuma “y’uko yari itewe” n’uyo murwi. Iyi niyo mishamirano ikomeye hagati ya Israel na Gaza, haraciye umwaka urenga. Intambara yamaze imisi 11  mu kwa gatanu kw’umwaka uheze wa 2021 yahitanye abanya-Palestina barenga 200 n’abanya-Israel bababa cumi imbere y’uko bashika ku masezerano yo guhagarika intambara. Igisirikare ca Israel kiragabisha ko iki gikorwa ca gisirikare – cataziriwe Breaking Dawn – gishobora kumara iyinga ryose. Uno musi ku wa Mungu, ibisasu vya muzinga vy’abanya-Palestina vyarasiwe mu karere ka Gaza vyaguye mu gisagara ca Jerusalem ubwa mbere kuva kuri ya ntambara yo mu 2021. Ibi bitero  bibaye inyuma y’aho Israel yiciye umutegetsi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru wa PIJ Khaled Mansour mu gitero c’indege cakozwe ku nzu iri mw’ikambi y’impuzi iri ahitwa Rafah mu bumanuko bwa Gaza. Iyi ntwazangabo yari imaze guhakwa kwicwa n’igisirikare ca Israel incuro zitanu, kikaba kimwagiriza gutegura ibitero vy’abarwanyi hanze y’akarere ka Gaza. Hampande y’ibitero vy’indege kuri Gaza, aho Israel ivuga ko mu bibanza yiziziye harimwo inzira yo mu kuzimu ikoreshwa na PIJ, abahagarikwa babandanya bahagarikwa mu karere ka Cisjordanie/ West Bank kigaruriwe na Israel. Abanywanyi ba PIJ batari bake bamaze guhagarikwa nk’uko bivugwa na Israel. Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y’abantu muri Gaza avuga ko "igitero ca Israel" cishe abanya-Palestina, gikomeretsa abanda barenga 200. Israel yagiriza abarwanyi ba PIJ ko ari bo bihekuye  mu kwihenda bakica bamwe muri abo bapfuye – ikavuga ko ejo ku wa gatandatu igisasu ca muzinga ciyatse uyo muhari kikica abana batari bake i Jabalia, mu karere ka Gaza. BBC ntiyashoboye guhinyuza yo nyene ubwayo ibi bivugwa. Ariko gushika ubu, Hamas, umuhari mukuru muri ako karere – ukaba usangiye ivyiyumviro n’umuhari Islamic Jihad mbere ukaba ukunze gukorana ibikorwa nawo – isa n’uko ata bisasu vya muzinga biriko biraraswa biva mu bubiko bwayo bunini. Ni naco gituma ata makuru avuga ko Israel yoba iriko irakora ibi bitero vy’indege kuri Hamas. Mw’ijoro ryo ku wa gatanu,  Hamas yasohoye amatangazo akomeye ivuga ko “imirwi yo kwirwanako” yishize hamwe. Ariko kubera irongoye Gaza ifise ibintu vyayo ibanza kwitondera, ibi bigashobora gutuma itinjira muri iyi mishamirano. Ibiharuro vya Hamas bishobora guhinduka, nk’akarorero mu gihe igitigiri c’abasivire bapfiriye muri Gaza cokwongerekana. Mu gihe yoramuka ifashe ingingo yo kwinjira muri iyi ntambara, aho rero ibintu bishobora guca bikomera gusumba. Ejo ku wa gatandatu, ikigo ca Gaka kimwe rudende gisanzwe gitanga umuyagankuba carugaye kubera kitigeze kironka n’ima rimwe ry’igitor, nk’uko bivugwa n’umuvugizi w’ikigo kijejwe umuyagankuba. Ibiro vy’umunyamabanga wa Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire asaba impande zompi kwifata – bikavuga ko bishigikiye ko Israel ifise uburenganzira bwo kwirwanako, mu gihe ariko bivuga ko bitewe impungenge n’abasivire bashobora kugwa mu mporero, nk’uko vyandikwa n’itirorokanirizo ry’amakuru Reuters. Mu cizere ko ishobora kuzibira iyindi mishamirano, Misiri nayo nyene yafashe umugambi wo kuja hagati y’izi mpande zibiri, mbere bikavugwa ko yoba yarungitse intumwa muri Israel ejo ku wa gatandatu kubanguranya. Iyi mishamirano ibaye inyuma gato y’aho Israel ihagarikiye Bassem Saadi avugwa ko arongoye  PIJ muri Cisjordanie, mw’ijoro ryo ku wa mbere. Yahagaritswe ari mu karere ka Jenin mu rukurikirane rwo guhagarika abikekwa inyuma y’ibitero vyakozwe n’abarabu ba Israel na Palestina vyahitanye abanya-Israel 17 n’abanya Ukraine babiri. Babiri mu bakoze ivyo bitero bavuye mu karere ka Jenin. PIJ, umwe mu mihari y’abarwanyi biyitirira Islam ikomeye irwanira muri Gaza, ishigikiwe na Irani kandi icicaro cayo kiri ku mugwa mukuru wa Syria, Damas/Damascus. Irakora ibitero bitari bike, harimwo ibisasu vya muzinga biterwa Israel. Mu kwa cumi na rimwe 2019, Israel na PIJ  vyaratanye mu mitwe mu kiringo c’imisi itanu inyuma y’aho Israel yiciye intwazangabo ya PIJ ivuga ko yariko arategura igitero. Imishamirano yahitanye abanya-Palestina 34 n’abandi 111 bakomeretse, abanya-Israel 63 nabo bikaba vyabaye ngombwa ko bajanwa kwa muganga. Israel yavuze ko 25 mu banya-Palestina bishwe bari abarwanyi, harimwo n’abatewe bariko barategura kurungika ibisasu vya muzinga.

headline: US: Ibitaro vyanse gutera umutima umurwayi aticandagishije Covid
text: Ibitaro vy'i Boston muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika vyanse kwakira umurwanyi akeneye guterwa uwundi mutima, nibura igice cawo, kubera aticandagishije covid-19. DJ Ferguson w'imyaka 31, ageze habi, akaba akeneye guterwa umutima mushasha, ariko ibitaro Brigham and Women's Hospital muri reta ya Massachusetts vyamukuye ku rutonde, nk'uko bivugwa na se wiwe, David. Avuga ko urucanco rwa Covid ruteye kubiri n'ivyo umuhungu wiwe "yemera". Ibi bitaro bivuga ko bikurikiza amategeko. Mw'itangazo, ibitaro Brigham and Women's Hospital vyabwiye BBC biti: "Kubera ibihimba vy'umubiri bisanzwe bihari ari bike, dukora uko dushoboye kwose kugira ngo umurwayi aterwa igihimba kanaka aronke amahirwe ashoboka yo kubandanya abaho". Umuvugizi amenyesha ko ibi bitaro "bisaba icemeza ko umuntu yacandazwe hamwe n'amakuru y'imibereho ku bashizwe ku rutonde rwo guterwa ibindi bihimba kugira ngo ibikorwa vyo kumukora bigende neza be no kugira umurwayi ashobore kugira amahirwe yo kubandanya abaho inyuma yo kumutera igihimba kanaka, kubera ubudahangarwa bw'umubiri wiwe buba bwononekaye cane". Iri tangazo ry'ibi bitaro ryitondewe cane rishobora kuba rivuga ko mu kwima umuntu uburenganzira bw'ukuvurwa hari n'ibindi vyisungwa hejuru y'uko atacandazwe, ariko nta nsiguro ritanga, rikavuga ko ari ibanga ry'umurwayi. Ibi bitaro vyongerako y'uko hafi abantu 100.000 bari ku rutonde rw'abarindiriye guterwa ibindi bihimba vy'umubiri batazoshobora kubironswa muri ino myaka itanu kubera ata bikwiye bihari. Uyu mugabo Ferguson ari mu bitaro kuva ku wa 26 Munyonyo (Ugushyingo mu kinyarwanda), 2021, akaba arwaye indwara y'umutima yo mu muryango (héréditaire/hereditary) ituma amahaha yiwe yuzura amaraso n'amazi, nk'uko bivugwa n'isekeza ryo kwegeranya imfashanyo GoFundMe. Iri sekeza ryo kwegeranya imfashanyo rivuga ko Ferguson afise amakenga ko umutima wiwe ushobora guterwa n'ubushe - ingaruka ishobora kuva ku rucanco rwa coronavirus ikigo ca Amerika kijejwe gukinga indwara, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), gishimangira ko idakunze kwibonekeza kandi ari iyo umwanya muto - kandi ko bishobora kumugirira ingaruka mbi kubera umutima wiwe ata nguvu ufise. Ikigo CDC gitera akamo abakeneye guterwa ibihimba vy'umubiri hamwe n'ababegereye kwicandagisha. Muganga Arthur Caplan, arongoye igisata kijejwe ibijanye n'inyifato mu vyo ubuganga (medical ethics) kw'ishure NYU Grossman School of Medicine, yabwiye imboneshakure CBS News ko iyo umuntu ahejeje guterwa igihimba ico ari co cose c'umubiri ubudahangarwa bwiwe buba bwahagaze ku buryo n'ibicurane vyonyene bishobora kumuhitana. Dr Caplan ati: "Nta bihimba vy'umubiri bikwiye dufise, rero ntidushobora kubiha umuntu ata mahirwe menshi afise yo kubaho mu gihe abandi biteje urucanco bobo baba bafise amahirwe menshi yo kubaho inyuma yo gukorwa". Ferguson, se w'abana babiri n'uwa gatatu akaba ari mu nzira, aguma kuri ivyo bitaro, nk'uko bivugwa n'abakunzi biwe. Umuryango wiwe uvuga ko ari magara make ku buryo adashobora kwungururizwa ku bindi bitaro kandi ko "n'umwanya uriko uramujana". David Ferguson ati: "Umuhungu wanje ariko arirwanako uko ashoboye kwose, ni umushingantahe afise ivyo yemera, kandi ibi nivyo bituma ndamwubaha gusumba". "Ni umubiri wiwe. Ahitamwo ico ashatse". Si bwo bwa mbere muri izi ndwi za vuba Umunyamerika atacandazwe ahura n'inzitizi ku bijanye n'ubuvuzi. Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, umugore wo muri Minnesota yaritwariye ibitaro vy'akarere inyuma y'aho abaganga bageragereje gukura umugabo wiwe muri vya vyuma bifasha abarwayi guhema yari amazemwo amezi abiri. Abanyamerika barenga 63% baramaze kuronswa incanco zibiri hanyuma abababa 40% nabo bakaba bamaze kuronswa urwa gatatu.

headline: UK: Johnson azobandanya politike yiwe yo kujana abimukira mu Rwanda
text: Umuvugizi w'umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson yavuze ko reta ifise umugambi wo kubandanya politike zumvikanyweko harimwo kurungika abimukira mu Rwanda. Ico kiganiro ku bamenyeshamakuru cabereye ku biro iwe kibaye inyuma y'aho Johnson atangiye imihoho mu mabanga yo kurongora umugambwe w'aba Conservateurs, ariko akazoguma mu mabanga y'umushikiranganji wambere gushika hatowe uwundi aramutswa ayo mabanga. Ivyo bishobora kudafata amezi menshi kubera Johnson ashobora kutazokoresha umwanya asigaranye nk'umushikiranganji wa mbere mu "kugira ico ahinduye mu ntumbero ya politike yiwe". Ni muri iyo ntumbero umuvugizi wiwe yavuze ko politike yo gutwara abimukira mu Rwanda, yamenyeshejwe  na reta mu kwezi kwa kane, ishobora kubandanya. Ifise intumbero yo gufata bamwe mu bimukira bajabutse Manche binjira mu Bwongereza kujanwa mu gihugu c'Urwanda gusabirayo ubuhungiro, hakubusabira mu Bwongereza. Ariko gushika ubu nta n'umwe ararungikwa mu Rwanda ava mu Bwongereza. Indege yategerezwa kujana abo bimukira yarasibijwe imbere y'uko ihaguruka mu kwezi guheze, bivuye ku ngingo yo ku munota wa nyuma ya sentare ya Buraya ijejwe agateka ka zina muntu. Sentare nkuru mu Bwongereza vyitezwe ko yumviriza urubanza muri uku kwezi, rwerekeye politike yo kwirukana abasaba ubuhungiro bidakurikije amategeko. Igitangazamakuru PA casubiyemwo uwo muvugizi aho yagize ati: "Umwumvikano ntubuza canke ngo ubere intambamyi reta yo kurondera gushira mu bikorwa iyo politike harimwo no gusigura iyo ngingo muri sentare nk'uko bisabwa." Uwo muvugizi yongeyeko ko vyashoboka ko indege igenda imbere y'urubanza ruba.

headline: China: Uwakoze urukino rwa video 'Game of Thrones' yishwe ahawe ishano
text: Igipolisi ca Shanghai kivuga ko umugwizatunga w'umushinwa yapfuye kuri Noheli yahawe ishano. Lin Qi w'imyaka 39 yari arongoye akaba n'umunyamabanga mukuru wa kompanyi ikora inkino zo kuri video Yoozoo izwi cane ku rukino rwa Game of Thrones: Winter is Coming. Itangazo ry'igipolisi ca Shanghai ritunga agatoke uwo bakorana na Lin - azwi kw'izina rimwe gusa rya Xu- ko ari we yikekwa. Lin yoba yarafise ubutunzi bwa miriyaridi 6.8 z'ama Yuan (imiliyoni 980 z'ama pawundi) nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo ca Hurun China Rich List. Kuri uyu wa gatanu, abakozi benshi hamwe n'abahoze bakora muri kompanyi Yoozoo bakoraniye hanze y'ibiro vyayo mu kumugandarira. Uwo mugwizatunga yari rurangiranwa kw'isoko ry'ubushinwa rigurisha inkino za video akaba yari yanatanguye urudandazwa rwo gusohora filime. Yashinze Yoozoo mu 2009, arongora neza iyo kompanyi mu gihe hariko haraba impinduka nyinshi ziganisha ku nkino zo kuri telephone ngendanwa. N'iyo kompanyi yasohoye itangazo ribabaje ku rubuga rwayo rwa Weibo Microblog. Rivuga riti:"Turikebanuye ugiye ukiri muto. Tuzokwama turi kumwe. Tuzogumana ubwitonzi, tubandanye kwemera ubugwaneza kandi tuzokwamirira kure ikintu cose kibi." Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bagize ico bavuze kuri urwo rwandiko, rwarabwe n'abantu incuro zirenga imiliyoni 290 kuri Weibo.

headline: Sudan: Reta ivuga ko yaburijemwo itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi
text: Ikinyamakuru cegamiye reta ya Sudani gitangaza ko muri kano gatondo ko ku wa kabiri hari abashatse kugerageza gutembagaza ubutegetsi bw'ico gihugu bagateshwa, ariko nticatangaje abo ari bo. Iki kinyamakuru kiti: "Habayeho kugerageza gutembagaza ubutegetsi, abanyagihugu bategerezwa guhaguruka bakabirwanya". Umuvugizi wa reta Mohamed Al Faki Suleiman avuga ko abikekwa muri iki gikorwa bategerezwa kubazwa. Amakuru ava muri Sudani avuga ko abashatse gutembagaza ubu butegetsi bagerageje kwifatira ibibanza bikuru bikuru, harimwo iradiyo, ariko bagateshwa. Amareresi yahanahanywe ku mbuga hwaniro avugwa ko ari ayo ku mugwa mukuru Khartoum yerekana abasirikare bari mu biduga vya burende mu mabarabara, bamwe bereka imiduga inzira itegerezwa gufata. Umutegetsi wo mu nama nkuru irongoye igihugu yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ko bamaze gufata ibintu mu minwe. Hari imigumuko muri Khartoum, bikaba vyari vyitezwe ko kuri uyu wa kabiri haba imyiyerekano, igisirikare kikaba cahashitse kugira gikomeze umutekano. Sudani ubu isanzwe irongowe n'umushikiranganji wa mbere Abdalla Hamdok ahagarariye reta mfatakibanza yashinzwe inyuma y'aho ubutegetsi bwa Omar al-Bashir butembagarijwe mu kwa kane 2019. Bashir yabogojwe inyuma y'imyiyerekano yari imaze amezi atari make yo kumwiyamiriza, ubu akaba akiri imbere ya sentare ku ruhara rwiwe muri coup d'Etat yamushikanye ku butegetsi mu 1989. Iyi myiyerekano yatanguye hiyamirizwa iduzwa ry'ibiciro vy'umukate n'igitoro, ikaba yagiye kuvamwo iyo kwiyamiriza uyu mukuru w'igihugu, abagore n'urwaruka bakaba barayigizemwo uruhara  rudasanzwe.

headline: Mastodynie: Menya ivy'iki kibazo gitera kubabara kw'amabere
text: Muri iki kiganiro Bazamuganga, Dr Gaspard Ntahonkiriye, arasigukira ikibazo co kuvyimba no kubabara amabere ku bagore, bizwi nka mastodynie mu gifaransa canke mastodynia mu congereza.

headline: Ikigo CDC gisaba Abanyamerika kwirinda gusoma inkoko kubera akaranda ka salmonella
text: Ikigo ca Amerika kijejwe amagara y'abantu (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, CDC) gisaba abanyagihugu kwirinda gusomana n'inkoko kubera ikiza karanda ca salmonella. Ikigo CDC n'abajejwe amagara y'abantu bariko barakora amatohoza ku kiza karanda ca salmonella inyuma y'aho abantu 163 bamenyekaniye ko banduye iyi ndwara mu mareta 43. Bandukiwe inyuma y'aho bakorakoreye inkoko boroye. Iki kigo kivuga kiti: "Ntimusomane canke ngo mwiyegereze izi nyoni, kubera ibi bishobora gutuma imigera ikwinjira mu kanwa ugaca wandura". Kigabisha ko inkoko n'imbata zishobora gukwiragiza imigera ya salmonella n'aho woba ubona ko zisa neza kandi zikomeye, kandi ni ibintu vyoroshe kuri iyi migera gukwirakwira aho zisanzwe ziba zikanatemberera. Uwu mugera utuma umuntu ameneka umutwe, agacibwamwo, akaribwa mu nda mbere akanadahwa. Abenshi iyo bayanduye barakira ata n'imiti barinze gufata, ariko iyo umuntu yasinzikaye cane ashobora n'ukuhasiga ubuzima. Nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo CDC, ica gatatu c'abantu bamaze kuyandura ni abana bari musi y'imyaka itanu. Kuva hagati mu kwa kabiri, abashika 34 ni bo bamaze kujanwa mu bitaro, ariko ntawurahitanwa n'iyi ndwara. Ikigo CDC gihanura abantu gukaraba iyo bakorakoranye n'izo nkoko, hanyuma bongere babuze abana kuzegera. Bivugwa ko umugera wa salmonella - ushobora kuboneka mu nyama mbisi canke zidatetse neza, mu magi canke mu zindi mfungurwa - wandukira abantu hafi imiliyoni 1.35 muri Amerika buri mwaka, hamwe na 420 bahitanwa nawo.

headline: Afghanistan: Igituma aba Taliban bariko barafata igihugu ku muvuduko udasanzwe
text: Umuvuduko aba Taliban bariko mu kwifatira uturere muri Afghanistan uratangaza abantu batari bake - mu gihe imigwa mikuru y'intara igenda yigarurirwa nk'uwinjira mu nzu iwe. Abarwanyi baboneka ko bafise inguvu, mu gihe reta ya Afghanistan igerageza kwita ku rutare ngo igumane ubutegetsi. Muri ino ndwi. inkuru yavuye mu gisata kijejwe igendereza ca Amerika yerekana ko umugwa mukuru Kabul ushobora guterwa mu ndwi nkeya ziri imbere, nayo reta yoyo igashobora gusenyuka mu misi itarenga 90. None ni ukubera iki ibintu binyarutse ukuraho? Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n'ibihugu bigenzi vyayo vyo mw'ishirahamwe OTAN/NATO - harimwo n'Ubwongereza - vyari bimaze imyaka 20 yose vyigisha ingabo za Afghanistan, vyongera biziha ibikoresho. Abajenerali batari bake b'abanyamerika n'abongereza bahora bivugira ko bashinze igisirikare ca Afghanistan gikomeye kandi gishoboye. Ibi bikaba muri kino gihe bisa n'uko yari amajambo gusa. Reta ya Afghanistan mu bisanzwe yategerezwa kuba ari yo ifise ibintu mu minwe uravye ibitigiri binini vy'ingabo ifise. Uravye ku mpapuro, inzego zijejwe umutekano za Afghanistan zigera ku  300.000. Aha harimwo igisirikare ca Afghanistan, ingabo zirwanira mu kirere hamwe n'igiporisi. Ariko mu vy'ukuri, igihugu camye gifise ingorane zo gushika ku ntego zaco mu bijanye no  kwinjiza abasirikare. Igisirikare ca Afghanistan  gifise kahise kabi karanzwe n'abapfa ku bwinshi, abahunga urugamba n'ibiturire - aho hari intwazangabo zimwe zimwe zidaterwa isoni no gusaba imishahara y'abasirikare batahari. - bazwi nka "soldats fantômes/ghost soldiers". Mu cegeranyo aherutse gushikiriza inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka ya Amerika, uwujejwe gukurikirana ibikorwa vyo gusanura Afghanistan (Special Inspector General for Afghanistan, SIGAR) yarerekanye "amakenga akomeye ku ngaruka mbi cane z'igiturire...hamwe n'igitigiri kidatomoye c'ingabo nyezina". Jack Watling wo mu kigo Royal United Services Institute (RUSI), avuga ko igisirikare ca Afghanistan kitigeze kimenya igitigiri nyezina c'abasirikare gifise. Hambavu y'ibi, avuga ko hamye hari ingorane yo kubungabunga ibikoresho na morale. Akenshi abasirikare bakunze kurungikwa mu turere basanzwe badakomokamwo batanafisemwo imiryango n'incuti. Iki kiboneka nka kimwe mu bishobora kuba bituma bihuta guta ibirindiro vyabo batanarwanye. Biranagoye no kumenya inguvu z'aba Taliban. Igisata ca Amerika kijejwe kurwanya iterabwoba, US Combating Terrorism Center, kiri kw'ishure rya gisirikare rya West Point, kivuga ko aba barwanyi boba bangana na 60.000. Hiyongereyeko n'iyindi mirwi y'abarwanyi n'ababashigikiye, iki gitigiri gishobora kuba kirenga 200.000. Ariko Dr Mike Martin yahoze ari intwazangabo y'umwongereza avuga ururimi rw'igi Pashto akaba yarakurikiranye intambara yo mu ntara ya Helmand akanavyandika no mu gitabo ciwe yise An Intimate War, aragabisha abafata aba Taliban nk'umurwi umwe rudende. Ahubwo avuga ko "aba Taliban ari nk'ihuriro ry'imirwi itandukanye yigenga - kandi igira ivyo ihurirako mu gihe kanaka". Avuga ko na reta ya Afghanistan nayo nyene ifise ingorane z'imirwi irondera inyungu zayo. Akahise kagenda gahindagurika karerekana ingene imiryango, imirwi y'amoko mbere n'abategetsi ba reta bagiye baba mahindagu - akenshi barondera ko boba baramaze na kabiri. Hanyuma kandi, reta ya Afghanistan yategerezwa kuba ifise akarusho gasumbirije mu bijanye n'amafaranga hamwe n'ibirwanisho. Yararonse amamiriyaridi n'amamiriyaridi y'amadorari yo kuriha imishahara y'abasirikare no kugura ibikoresho - ahanini bahabwa na Amerika. Mu cegeranyo cayo co mu kw'indwi 2021, SIGAR  ivuga ko imiriyaridi zirenga 88 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika zakoreshejwe mu bijanye n'umutekano wa Afghanistan. Ariko mu buryo buteye impungenge congera ko kiti: "Ivyo kumenya nimba ayo mafaranga yakoreshwa neza bizovana n'ingene bavyifashemwo ku rugamba". Igisirikare ca Afghanistan kirwanira mu kirere categerezwa kuvyifatamwo neza ku rugamba. Ariko camye mu ngorane zo kubungabunga no kugendesha izi ndege zingana na 211 (ikibazo kigenda gikomera mu gihe aba Taliban batera n'ibigirankana abadereva bazo). Nta n'ubwo gishobora no kuronsa ivyankenerwa intwazangabo ziri ku rubuga rw'intambara. Ari co gituma vyabaye ngombwa ko igisirikare ca Amerika kirwanira mu kirere kiza gufasha mu bisagara nka Lashkar Gah catewe n'abarwanyi b'aba Taliban. Aba  Taliban bakunze kuronka amahera bakura mu rucuruzwa rw'ibiyayuramutwe, ariko kandi bararonka n'izindi mfashanyo ziva hanze - ahanini muri Pakistan. Ubuheruka, aba Taliban barafashe ibirwanisho n'ibindi bikoresho bavyatse  ingabo za Afghanistan - bimwe muri vyo bikaba ari ivyatanzwe na Amerika - harimwo n'ibimodoka Humvees vya burende (blindés), ibikoresho bifasha kubona mw'ijoro, inkoho zikomakomeye hamwe na vya muzinga. Afghanistan yari isanzwe yuzuye ibirwanisho inyuma y'intambara yayihuje n'icahoze ari Repubulika Zunze Ubumwe y'aba Soviet (URSS), kandi aba Taliban barerekanye ko bashobora gutsinda igisirikare gikomeye cane n'aho boba bakoresha ibirwanisho bishaje. Iyumvire ingene inganda zatikiye mu ngabo za Amerika n'iz'Ubwongereza bakoresheje ya mabombe ategwa mu kuzimu ( Improvised Explosive Device, IED). Iki, gifatanye n'ingene bazi akarere, caratumye bavyifatamwo neza. N'aho aba Taliban bamye baboneka ko batari hamwe, biraboneka ko muri izi ntambara bafise integuro itomoye. Ben Barry yahoze ari intwazangabo mu gisirikare c'Ubwongereza avuga ko aba Taliban bashobora kuba bashika ku vyo bashikako giturumbuka, ariko akongerako ati: "Mu gihe wogira uti utegure ibijanye n'isekeza, vyogorana cane kuronka ikintu ciza kirenze kuri ibi". Yerekana ingene ibitero vy'aba Taliban vyibanze mu buraruko no mu burengero, hakwihutira intara zahoze ari ibirindiro vyabo vyo mu bumanuko, aho bagenda bigarurira imigwa mikuru y'intara imwe ku yindi. Aba Taliban barigaruriye imihora mikuru mikuru ijana mu bihugu vyo hanze, ibi bigatuma banyuruza amafaranga menshi ava mu makori yari kwegeranywa na reta isanzwe iri mu bukene bw'amafaranga. Barongereje akariro kandi mu kwica abategetsi bakuru bakuru, abaharanira agateka ka muntu n'abanyamakuru. Bukebuke bagenda bafuta bimwe mu vyashitsweko muri ino myaka 20 iheze. Nayo ku bijanye n'integuro ya reta - aha ntivyoroshe gusigura. Ivyo kwisubiza uturere twigaruriwe n'aba Taliban bigenda biba nk'umugani. Barry avuga ko bisa n'uko hari integuro yo gukingira ibisagara bikuru bikuru. Ariko kugeza ryari? Igitigiri c'ingabo zidasanzwe za Afghanistan ni gito cane, hafi 10.000 kandi zinyanyagijwe irya n'ino. Aba Taliban kandi baboneka ko bariko baratsinda intambara ya propagande n'iy'amajambo. Barry avuga ko inguvu zabo ku rugamba zatumye morale yabo iduga kandi bibatuma bumva ko bategerezwa gukorera hamwe. Ariko ku rundi ruhande ntibimeze uko, reta ya Afghanistan igenda isubira inyuma nk'ibirenge, baterana amajambo, birukana intwazangabo z'abajenerali. Ibintu bimeze nabi cane kuri reta ya Afghanistan. Ariko Jack Watling wa RUSI avuga ko n'aho atari heza na gato ku gisirikare ca Afghanistan, "poritike ishobora gusubiza ibintu mu buryo". Mu gihe reta yoshobora kwigarurira abarongoye amoko, abona ko reta ishobora kugira amahirwe yo kwihagararako. Ibi kandi niko Mike Martin abibona, akabona ko kubona uwahoze ari umukuru w'abarwanyi Abdul Rashid Dostum agaruka mu gisagara ca Mazar-i-Sharif kigira kane c'igihugu, ari ikintu gikomeye cane. Yanatanguye n'ibiganiro. Iyi ntambara yo mu ci mu misi irarangira mu gihe urushana ruzoba rutanguye muri Afghanistan - iki gihe kikaba kitorosha ibintu ku barwanyi. Biracashoboka ko Afghanistan ishika mu mpera z'umwaka icihagazeko, ikagumana Kabul n'ibisagara bikuru bikuru bimwe bimwe. Vyongeye, mu gihe aba Taliban boramuka bacanyemwo, ibintu bishobora kubahindukana bikaba nabi. Ariko ubu, bisa n'uko utwigoro twa Amerika na OTAN two kugarukana amahoro, umutekano n'ituze muri Afghanistan twabaye impfagusa, nk'uko vyagendeye aba Soviet imbere yabo.

headline: Umuntu wa kane agendana umugera wa SIDA biboneka ko yawukize
text: Umugabo asanzwe agendana umugera wa VIH utera SIDA kuva mu myaka ya 1980 aboneka ko yakize, akaba abaye uwa kane gusa, nk’uko bivugwa n’abaganga. Yatewe umusokoro wo mw’igufa ariko aravurwa indwara ya kanseri yo mu maraso yo mu bwoko bwa leukaemia, awuhawe n’umugiraneza asanzwe adafatwa n’umugera. Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 66 atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana, yarahagaritse gufata imiti yari amaze imyaka irenga 30 afata, yo gupfupfahaza VIH. Avuga ko afise “umunezero utagira urugero” kubona ata mugera agifise mu mubiri. Uyu mugabo azwi nk’umurwayi w’“Igisagara c’Umwizero” (City of Hope) inyuma y’ibitaro yariko aravurirwamwo vya Duarte mu ntara ya California. Abenshi mu bagenzi biwe bahitanywe na SIDA  imbere y’uko imiti yo gupfupfahaza itangura guhabwa abarwayi mu ntumbero yo kubafasha kubandanya babaho ubuzuma busanzwe. Umugera HIV/VIH (Virus de l'Immunodéficience Humaine), wica abasoda b’umubiri bigatuma umuntu arwara indwara ya SIDA kuko umubiri ntuba ugishoboye kurwanya umugera. Mw’itangazo, uyu mugabo avuga ati: "Igihe bantora umugera mu 1988, co kimwe n’abandi, nibajije ko nciriwe urwo gupfa. "Sinigeze nibaza ko noshoboye kubandanya mbaho gushika aho mbona umusi ntazoba ngifise umugera”. Ariko, ntiyakize ngo ni uko yavuwe umugera wa VIH, ahubwo vyarahuriranye kuko yariko aravurwa kanseri yo mu maraso yo mu bwoko bwa leukaemia yari yanduye afise imyaka 63. Abaganga bamukurikirana ico gihe bafashe ingingo ko yoterwa umusokoro mu ntumbero yo gusubiriza uturemangingo tw’amaraso twari dufise kanseri. Rero yagize amahirwe asanga umugiraneza yemeye kumuha utu turemangingo ari mu murwi wa ba bantu batandura umugera wa VIH. Umugera winjirira mu turemangingo twera (globules blancs/ white blood cells) tw’amaraso uciye mu muhora utaboneka n’amaso, indemamubiri (proteine) izwi nka CCR5. Hagati aho, hariho abantu, harimwo n’uyu mugiraneza yamuhaye utu turemangingo, bafise iyi CCR5 igenda ihindagurika ikazibira uwu muhora, bigatuma umugera udashobora kwinjira. Uyu murwayi 'w’Igisagara c’Umwizero' yarakurikiraniwe hagufi inyuma yo guterwa utu turemangino, haragera igihe umugera utakiboneka mu mubiri. Amaze amezi arenga 17 ata mugera umurimwo. Dr Jana Dickter, umuganga avura indwara ziterwa n’imigera kw’ico Gisagara c’Umwizero, avuga ati: "Wari umunezero kuri twebwe kumubwira ko umugera wa SIDA utakiri muri we kandi ko bitari bikenewe ko abandanya afata imiti yo gupfupfahaza yari amaze imyaka irenga 30 afata”. Ikintu nk’iki cabaye ubwa mbere mu 2011 igihe Timothy Ray Brown – azwi nk’umurwayi w’i Berlin – aba umuntu wa mbere kw’isi yakize umugera wa SIDA. Mu myaka itatu iheze, hamaze kuba abandi bantu batatu bakira muri ubu buryo. Uyu murwayi w’Igisagara c’Umwizero ni we muntu wa mbere afise imyaka myinshi avuwe muri ubu buryo akongera akaba n’uwa mbere amaze igihe kirekire agendana VIH ashoboye gukira. Hagati aho, guterwa imisokoro ntibisigura ko bigiye guhindura ibintu mu kuvura imiriyoni 38 z’abantu bagendana SIDA muri kino gihe. Dr Dickter avuga ati: "Ni uburyo bugoye cane kandi bushobora kugira ingaruka mbi zikomeye. Rero si inzira nyayo yo kuvura abantu bose bagendana SIDA”. Hagati aho, abashakashatsi bariko bararondera ingene bokwibanda kuri uwu muhora w’indemamubiri CCR5 mu gutera uturemangino nk’imwe mu nzira yo kuvura umugera. Ubu buryo bwarashikirijwe mu nama yerekeye SIDA yabaye mu 2022 i Montreal muri Canada. Avuga ku vyavuye muri ubu bushakashatsi Prof Sharon Lewin aherutse gutorwa ngo arongore ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryishinze kurwanya umugera wa SIDA, International Aids Society, avuga ati: "Umuti uracari kananirabahinga mu bushakashatsi kuri SIDA”. Avuga ko “imbere y’aha habaye abantu bake bakize” bagatanga “icizere kibandanya ku bantu bagendana umugera wa SIDA,  ndetse inaha umwizero abahinga”.

headline: ONU ivuga ko abantu 117 bishwe mu ndyane hagati y’aba Lendu n’aba Hema muri Kongo
text: Icegeranyo c'intangamarara c'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU cemeza ko ubwicanyi mu gihugu ca Republika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Kongo bumaze guhitana abantu 117 mu ntara ya Ituri. Abenshi mu bapfuye ni abo mu bwoko bw'aba Hema batunzwe cane cane n'ubworozi bw'inka, mu gihe abakoze ivyo bitero ari abo mu bwoko bw'aba Lendu batunzwe ahanini n'uburimyi. Iyo mirwi ibiri yo muri iyo ntara ya Ituri izwi ko yamye ishamirana kuva kera, ariko ico cegeranyo ca ONU kimenyesha ko hashobora kuba hariyongereyeko n'izindi mvo zishingiye kuri politike be no ku butunzi. Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko abo bantu baguye mu bitero vyabaye hagati y'amagenekerezo ya 10 na 13 z'uku kwa gatandatu muri iyo ntara iri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bw'ico gihugu. Umurwi w'abashakashatsi bakoze ico cegeranyo bamenyesha ko bamwe muri bishwe baciwe amazosi, kandi ko harimwo abagore n'abana. Mu gihe amazu n'ivyarimwo vyaturiwe, ishirahamwe ONU rivuga ko uravye ingene ivyo bitero vyari bikaze, vyaboneka ko abakoze ivyo bitero bari bafise intumbero yo kwomora abantu ntibasubire kugaruka mu zabo. Igisirikare ca Kongo kimenyesha ko umurwi wakoze ico gitero urongowe n'uwitwa Ngudjolo, kikavuka ko cafashe ikirindiro cawo inyuma y'intambara ikaze. Buramatari w'intara ya Ituri, Jean Bamanisa,  yabwiye BBC ko abajejwe umutekano babandanya bakora amatohoza kandi ko ababikoze bazorengutswa imbere y'ubucamanza. Kuva mu mwaka uheze, abantu barenga ibihumbi 300 baramaze guhunga kubera izo ndyane zo muri iyo ntara ya Ituri, bakaba baba mu makambi y'abateshejwe izabo be no mu ncuti ku mugwa mukuru w'iyo ntara, Bunia, hamwe no mu micungararo yaho. Muri ico gihugu kandi havugwa amakuru y'intambara zibera mu mitumba ya Minembwe mu ntara ya Kivu y'Ubumanuko. Mu gihe  hari ibihuha vyavuga ko hoba hari abasirikare b'u Rwanda bariko barwanira ku butaka bwa Kongo, umunyamakuru wa BBC, Gaius Kowene, akorera muri ico gihugu amenyesha ko abenshi mubo bavuganye bahakana ayo makuru. Amakuru atangwa n'inzego zitandukanye, haba mu baserukira ishirahamwe ONU, mu mashirahamwe adaharanira inyungu za politike, mu bamenyeshamakuru bakorera muri ako karere, mi gisirikare c'u Rwanda, eka mbere no mu gisirikare n'inzego zijejwe igendereza muri ico gihugu ca Kongo, yose avuga ko ayo makuru ari ibihuha.

headline: Umugwizatunga Rujugiro ashima icemezo ca sentare kuri UTC ngo ariko ntibikwiye
text: Umugwizatunga w'Umunyarwanda Tribert Rujugiro avuga ko ashima icemezo ca sentare y'akarere ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko ku vyerekeye inyubako yagurishijwe na leta y'u Rwanda. Ariko uwo mugwizatunga atakiba mu Rwanda kubera kutumvikana na leta y'ico gihugu, avuga ko kumuha amafaranga atari vyo yashaka kuko adashaka kugurisha. Iyo nyubako ivugwa ni inyubako izwi nka Union Trade Centre (UTC) iri mu muji wa Kigali iberamwo ibikorwa vy'ubudandaji, izi zizwi mu Congereza nka Shopping Mall. Sentare y'Ubutungane ya Afrika y'Ubuseruko yafashe icemezo c'uko Bwana Rujugiro ahabwa amafaranga iyo nyubako yagurishijwe akanahabwa ayo yari imaze kwinjiza igihe yari imaze ikora kuva yagurishwa. Ariko we avuga ko naho ashima ingingo ya sentare, ivyo adashobora kuvyemera kuko agaciro k'iyo nyubako ari kanini cane ugereranije n'ayo yoba ahawe. Yagize ati: "Umwanzuro narawushimye kuko weretse amakungu ko rirya tegeko bakoresheje na birya vyo kugurisha bitajanye n'amategeko. "... ngirango umuntu wese azi guharura, inzu yinjiza $1,500,000 ku mwaka, yobona agaciro kayo. Kandi amafaranga bayigurishije ni $6,800,000". Mu 2017 ikigo kijejwe amakoli mu Rwanda cafashe ingingo yo kugurisha inyubako UTC ya Bwana Rujugiro kimwagiraza ko agiheraniye amakoli. Ikigo Kigali Investment Company ni co cegukanye iyo nyubakwa cemeye gutanga amahera arusha ay'abandi (6,877,150,000). Ku vyerekeye kumwagiriza kutariha iryo koli, Bwana Rujugiro avuga ko sentare yabisiguye neza. Yagize ati: "Bwa mbere iyo nzu bari bayifise (urwego rushinzwe amakoli) kuva mu 2013. Iryo deni ry'ikoli bavuga ko mfise barizanye mu 2017, bamaranye inzu imyaka ine. "Noneho waraba amafaranga bafashe yagera ku miriyoni $5 zirenga. Kandi itegeko bagendeyeko ryavuga ko amafaranga yose avuye mu nzu bafashe, 50% bizoja bija muri Banki Nkuru akazohabwa nyene umutungo igihe yoboneka. "Urumva yuko nibaba bari bafise $2.800.000, ideni rikaba ryari $1.100.000, kuki batafashe muri ayo ngo barihe?" Abajijwe niba azokwunguruza ku ngingo ya sentare mu gihe we avuga ko adashaka kugurisha inzu yiwe, yavuze ko yabihaye abashingwamanza biwe nihafatwa ingingo akazoyitangaza. BBC yagerageje kuvugana n'uruhande rwa leta y'u Rwanda ariko batubwira ko ata co bashobora kuvuga kuri ico kibazo.

headline: Boeing na Airbus zigabisha US ku ngorane zishobora guterwa na 5G
text: Abakuru b'ikompanyi zibiri za mbere rutura mu gukora indege basavye reta ya Amerika gutevya gutangura gukoresha ubuhinga bushasha bw'ama terefone bwa 5G. Mw'ikete, abategetsi ba Boeing na Airbus bagabisha ko ubwo buhinga bushobora kugira "ingaruka mbi ku bikorwa vy'indege." Amakenga yari amaze gushikirizwa ko ubuhinga bwa 5G bushobora guhungabanya ivyuma vy'ubuhinga bwa electronic vyo mu ndege. Ibihangange vya telecoms (ubuhinga bwo gutumatumanako)  muri Amerika AT&T na Verizon  vyitezwe gutanguza ikoreshwa rya 5G itariki 5 za Nzero (ukwezi kwa  mbere). Abakuru ba Boeing na Airbus Dave Calhoun na Jeffrey Knittel, mw'ikete barungikiye hamwe uwujejwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu muri reta ya Amerika Pete Buttigieg, bamubwiye bati: "Uguhungabanya kwa 5G gushobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku bushobozi bw'indege bwo gukora mu mutekano". Iryo kete ryishingiye ku bushakashatsi bwakozwe n'umugwi w'ubucuruzi Airlines for Amerika rwatoye ko iyo amategeko y'urwego rwa Amerika rujejwe indege (FAA)  aba yagiye mu ngiro mu 2019, hafi ingendo 345.000 z'indege z'ingenzi  na 5.400 zitwara imizigo ziba zaracerewe, zarahinduriwe inzira canke zitabaye zikiba. Igisata c'indege n'urwego rwa Amerika rw'indege (FAA) barashikirije amakenga ko 5G ishobora guhungabanya ivyuma  vyo mu ndege nk'amaradiyo y'ibipimo vy'aho indege igeze mu kirere. Itangazo rya Airbus rivuga ko "Airbus na Boeing bakoranye n'abandi bafise uruhara mu gisata c'indege muri Amerika kugira batahure ihungabana rishobora guterwa na 5G ku vyuma bifata ibipimo vy'aho indege igeze mu kirere (altmeters)". "Iinteguro y'ingene ingorane zishoboka zoba nke cane ku ndege yarashikirijwe igisata ca Amerika kijejwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu kugira yigwe."
