Uku kwezi, urwego FAA rwaragabishije ko uguhungabanya ibindi vyuma guturutse kuri 5G gushobora gutuma indege zihushishwa inzira, ruvuga ko ruzotanga amakuru menshi imbere y'uko ubwo buhinga butangura gukoreshwa itariki 5 Nzero. Muri Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11), kompanyi za AT&T na Verizon  zarasibije gutanguza urudandazwa rwa 5G ikiringo c'ukwexzi gushika itariki 5 Nzero zica zifata ingingo zo kwiyubara zo kugabanya ko haba ihungabanya. Amakompanyi yo mu gisata c'indege avuga ko izo ngingo zidahagije, Boeing na Airbus zikavuga ko zaciye zitanga integuro yazo yo kugabanya imishwarara iturutse ku bikoresho vyo gutumatumanako imbere no mu micungararo y'ibibuga vy'indege no mu bindi bibanza nkoramutima. Ku ndwi iheze, umukuru wa United Airlines Scott Kirby yavuze ko ingingo za FAA zerekeye 5G zizobuza ikoreshwa z'ibipimo z'aho indege igeze mu kirere ku bibuga bishika 40 mu vya mbere binini muri Amerika. Kompanyi ya Amerika y'ubuhinga budaciye mu ntsinga CTIA ivuga ko 5G ata ngorane n'imwe iteye akagiriza igisata c'indege gutera ubwoba no kwerekana ukutariko uko ibintu  bimeze. Umukuru wa CTIA  Meredith Attwell Baker yavuze mu kwezi guheze ati: "Kuducereza bizogira ingaruka mbi ikomeye. Kurindira uwundi mwaka bizotuma habura miriyaridi 500 z'amadorari mw'izamuka ry'ubutunzi, mu gihe igihugu cacu kiriko kirivyukiranya  congera ciyubaka inyuma y'ingaruka za Covid".

headline: Umunonotsi wa BBC w'umwaka muri Afrika: Tatjana Schoenmaker
text: Tatjana Schoenmaker ari mu bahiganirwa agashimwe ka BBC k'umunonotsi w'umunye-Afrika yenuriye abandi mu 2021. Ushaka gutora tugusavye kuja ngaha https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/africa/59089895 aho unasanga amategeko ajanye n'ubuzima bwite. Gutora bizohera kuwa Mungu itariki 19/12/2021 saa 23:59 GMT.

headline: Umukinyi w'amareresi rurangiranwa Chadwick Boseman yapfuye yishwe na kanseri
text: Umukinyi w'amareresi (filime) rurangiranwa w'umunyamerika Chadwick Boseman, azwi cane mw'ireresi Black Pantheryapfuye ahitanywe na kanseri nk'uko bimenyeshwa n'umuryango wiwe. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 43 yapfiriye muhira iwe i Los Angeles, umuryango wiwe umuhagatiye. Boseman ntiyigeze avuga ku mugaragaro hejuru ibijanye n'indwara yiwe. Mw'itangazo umuryango wasohoye, wavuze uti: "Mu rugamba rudasanzwe, Chadwick yari yarwanye uko ashoboye, kandi arashobora no gukina amareresi mwakunze cane". "Kuva kuri Marshall gushika kuri Da 5 Bloods, August Wilson's Ma Rainey's Black Bottom hamwe n'ayandi - aya yose yayakinye arwaye, abagwa, afata n'imiti. Iteka ridasanzwe mu mwuga wiwe rikaba ryabaye igihe arokora Umwami T'Challa mw'ireresi Black Panther". Boseman yatanguye kumenyekana igihe asubiramwo abantu babayeho- nk'umukinyi akomeye wa baseball Jackie Robinson mu gikino '42' co mu 2013, hamwe n'umucuraranzi James Brown muri Get Get Up 2014. Hagati aho, ikintu kizokwibukwa cane kuri we ni uko yabaye umukinyi mukuru mw'ireresi ikomeye cane Black Panther. Boseman arazwi kandi mw'ireresi yakinye nk'umukuru w'igihugu ca Wakanda, igihugu ngereranyo ca Afrika gifise ubuhinga bw'akataraboneka kw'isi. Uretse ko iyo reresi yashimwe cane gusumba amareresi yandi kw'isi mu kwinjiza amadolari arenga imiliyari 1,3 z'amadolari y'Amerika, iyi reresi yabonetse cane nk'intambwe ndangamuco ikomeye irimwo abirabure benshi kandi irongowe n'umwirabure, Ryan Coogler. Mu mwaka uheze, Boseman yavuze ko iyi reresi yahinduye insiguro yo kwitwa "umusore, umuntu w'impano n'ukwitwa umwirabure". Black Panther niyo reresi ikomeye yabaye iya mbere ku mashusho meza muri Oscars. Yagize kandi uruhara mu zindi reresi, Captain America: Civil War, Avengers: Infinity War na Avengers: Endgame. Iri tangazo riza kubabaza abantu benshi kuko Boseman atigeze avugira ku mugaragaro ibijanye n'indwara yiwe kuva igihe apimwa mu 2016 agasanga ararwaye. Hagati aho, abafana bagiye gutangura kugira amakenga ku buzima bwiwe muri uyu mwaka inyuma y;aho atanguye kugabanuka ibiro. Ubutumwa bw'icubahiro bwatanguye kwisuka mu kwibuka iyi nyenyeri, harimwo umukinyi Mark Ruffalo hamwe n'umuyobozi Jordan Peele, banditse ku rubuga rwa Twitter bati "uru ni uruhombo rukomeye".

headline: Iragi rya Bob Marley ryatewe iteka n’umwuzukuru wiwe mu giteramo i Birmingham
text: Ibiserukuru bitatu vy’umuryango wa Bob Marley baza kuba bari mu giteramo co kuri uno wa kabiri mu gisagara ca Birmingham mu Bwongereza -  imyaka 50 inyuma y’igiteramo ca mbere uyu muririmvyi yagiriye muri ico gisagara. Umwuzukuru wiwe Skip Marley araza kuririmba muri kino giteramo kiza kuba gihagarariwe n’uwari umugore akongera akanafasha kuririmba uyu yahoze ari umunyamuziki rurangiranwa, Rita, ari kumwe n’umukobwa wiwe Cedella. Iki giteramo kiza kuba kigizwe n’indirimbo ziwe zisubirwamwo mu murwi w’abaririmvyi  Chineke! Orchestra  baza kuba bari kumwe na Skip n’abandi. Trevor Nelson niwe aremesha iki giteramo – kizocishwa kuri BBC hanyuma. Iki giteramo kiri mu bikorwa bitegekanijwe na BBC vyo guhimbaza imyaka 60 igihugu ca Jamaica  - ari co gihugu ciwe c’amavukiro - kimaze cikukiye, hamwe kandi no mu birori vyo gutanguza inkino za Commonwealth 2022 zitegekanijwe kubera i Birmingham. Skip Marley ati: "Nditeguye kuririmbana na Chineke! Mu gutera iteka umuziki wa Sokuru. “Kuririmba mu giteramo co mu Bwongereza aho umuziki wa sokuru usanzwe ukundwa cane rwose biza kuba ari ibintu bidasanzwe”. Skip Marley ni umunyamuziki w’imyaka 26 yavukiye muri Jamaica, nyina wiwe ni Cedella Marley umunyamuziki akomeye kandi yatsindiye  udushimwe dutatu twa Grammys awards akaba ari umukobwa wa Bob Marley. Haraciye imyaka 41 Bob Marley asandavye yishwe na kansei i Miami muri Reta Zujnze Ubumwe za Amerika, ku myaka 36.

headline: Zambia yahagaritse urukino rwa kivandimwe na Afrika y’Epfo kubera ibitero ku banyamahanga
text: Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Zambia (FAZ) ryahagaritse urukino rwa kivandimwe rwoyihuje na Afrika y'Epfo kuri uyu wa gatandatu ku mugwa mukuru Lusaka. Iyo ngingo ifashwe inyuma y'ibitero vyakozwe ku banyamahanga mu gihugu ca Afrika y'Epfo. Abanyagihugu ba Zambia baciye ku mbuga hwaniro barasavye ko iryo shirahamwe FAZ rihagarika urukino hagati ya Chipolopolo na Bafana Bafana nk'ukwerekana akababaro. Umukuru wa FAZ Adrian Kashala yemeje iyo ngingo, yongera ko y'uko urwo rukino rwungururijwe ku rindi genekerezo ritamenyekanye, inyuma y'aho babonaniye n'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika y'Epfo, SAFA. Muri uwo mwanya nyene, leta ya Zambia yahanuye abadereva b'amakamyo ko bohagarika ingendo zabo muri Afrika y'Epfo gushika umutekano ugarutse muri ico gihugu. Umushikiranganji w'ukwunguruza abantu n'ibintu, Mutotwe Kafwaya, yasavye abadereva basanzwe bari muri Afrika y'Epfo ko bobika amamodoka yabo ahantu hatekanye gushika umutekano ugarutse. Ivyo bitero ku banyamahanga vyasubiye kwiyongera vyatumye amaduka y'abanyamahanga asahurwa urukombamazi, amamodoka araturirwa, eka n'amakamyo yagendeshwa n'abanyamahanga araterwa. Eka n'ishirahamwe rijejwe iterambere rihuza ibihugu vyo mu karere ka Afrika y'Ubumanuko, SADC, ririyamiriza ivyo bitero. Aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'iryo shirahamwe,  Stergomena Tax, avuga ko SADC iteye ivyatsi ubwo bukozi bw'ikibi butagira izina bukorerwa abanyamahanga muri Afrika y'Epfo, agasaba ko ico kibazo cotorerwa inyishu irama.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Lukaku, Bernardo, Pogba, Coutinho, Messi, Kounde
text: Inter Milan yiteze ko Chelsea isubira kurondera umusatirizi w'umubirigi Romelu Lukaku w'imyaka 28 yongereje amahera ishaka gutanga, igapfuma ishikana imiriyoni zababa 153 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, inyuma y'aho yankiye imiriyoni 118 z'amadorari kwongerako ukuminyi w'inyuma wa Espagne Marcos Alonso w'imyaka 30. (Mail) Mu gihe Jack Grealish yitezwe cane muri Manchester City, bishobora gutuma Bernardo Silva agenda, mu gihe Barcelona na Atletico Madrid yipfuza uyu mukinyi wo hagati w'umunya Portugal w'imyaka 26.  (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Aston Villa yitezwe kubandanya irondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Norwich, umwongereza Todd Cantwell w'imyaka 23 mu gihe Grealish yoramuka yimukiye muri Manchester City ku miriyoni 139 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Sky Sports) Atalanta yiteze kugiriranira ibiganiro na Chelsea mu mpera z'iyi ndwi kugira bumvikane ku musatirizi w'umwongereza Tammy Abraham w'imyaka 23. (Gianluca di Marzo) Paul Pogba azotangura umwaka w'inkino wimirije mu murwi Manchester United ariko akaba yiteze gufata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe imbere y'uko ikiringo c'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi kirangira, mu gihe PSG ikirondera uyu mukinyi wo hagati w'umufaransa w'imyaka 28. (Telegraph - subscription required) Tottenham irashaka kugura umukinyi wo hagati muri rino ci, aho umwongereza Noni Madueke w'imyaka 21 akina muri PSV Eindhoven hamwe n'umunya Danemark akina ku ruhande Mikkel Damsgaard w'imyaka 21 akina muri Sampdoria, bari ku rutonde rw'abaronderwa. (Standard) Umusatirizi wa Barcelona, umunya Brésil Philippe Coutinho w'imyaka 28, ari mu bakinyi baronderwa na Tottenham mu gihe yoramuka igurishije umusatirizi wayo Harry Kane w'imyaka 28. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Lionel Messi yiteze gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha na Barcelona mu mpera z'iyi ndwi. Amasezerano yari afitaniye n'uwu murwi yarangiye mu kwezi guheze, ariko uyu musatirizi wa Argentina w'imyaka 34 asa n'uwemeye ayandi masezerano mashasha y'imyaka itanu, ariko umushakara wiwe ukagabanuka gushika ku bice 50%.  (Sky Sports) Leicester City yanse amafaranga atangwa na Arsenal ikongerako n'umukinyi mu rugamba rwo kurondera umwongereza akina hagati James Maddison w'imyaka 24. Aba Foxes bavugwa ko badashaka abakinyi batangwa n'abo ba Gunners mu kubaguranya n'uyu mukinyi.  (Football Insider) Urugamba rwa Chelsea rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Sevilla Jules Kounde rwakwamye kubera mugenziwe w'umufaransa Kurt Zouma w'imyaka 26 bari biteze kugurisha kugira ngo ahe ikibanza uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 22, yanse kwimukira muri West Ham. (Guardian) Newcastle ivuga ko yipfuza kwakira umwongereza akina hagati Oliver Skipp w'imyaka 20 avuye muri Tottenham nk'intizo.  (Mail) Sheffield United iriteze ko Liverpool ishobora kuyitiza umukinyi w'inyuma w'umwongereza Ben Davies w'imyaka 25, mu gihe atarigera akinira uyu murwi kuva aguzwe avuye muri Preston mu kwa mbere.  (Goal) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Liverpool, umuswisi Xherdan Shaqiri w'imyaka 29 araronderwa n'umurwi wo muri Serie A,  Lazio, inyuma y'aho abwiriye abarongoye Anfield ko yipfuza gusezera uwo murwi wo muri Premier League. (Corriere dello Sport - in Italian) Umumenyereza wa Crystal Palace Patrick Vieira avuga ko yagiriraniye "ikiganiro ciza" n'umusatirizi wa Côte d'Ivoire Wilfried Zaha w'imyaka 28, kandi ko yizeye ko azobandanya akinira aba ba Eagles. (Sky Sports) Palace iriko irarondera ko Arsenal yoyitiza umusatirizi Reiss Nelson w'imyaka 21, kandi bikaboneka ko aba ba Gunners bashobora kumutanga kubera bigaragara ko ashobora gukinishwa gake cane mu mwaka w'inkino wimirije. (Sky Sports) Abaserukizi b'umukinyi wo hagati wa Atletico Madrid Saul Niguez bariko baragerageza kurondera ko yokwimukira muri Liverpool, ariko Anfield ntibona ko uyu mukinyi wa Espagne w'imyaka 26 yoba ashaka kwimukira muri uyu murwi.  (CaughtOffside) Southampton iri hafi yo kugura umusatirizi w'umwongereza Adam Armstrong w'imyaka 24 asanzwe akina muri Blackburn Rovers inyuma y'aho uwo murwi ugurishirije umusatirizi w'umwongereza Danny Ings w'imyaka 29 muri Aston Villa. (Football League World) Umukinyi wo hagati, umudagi Joshua Kimmich w'imyaka 26 yemeye amasezerano mashasha y'imyaka itanu n'umurwi  wiwe wa Bayern Munich watahukanye ihiganwa ry'Ubudagi Bundesliga.(Bild, via 90 Min)

headline: Covid-19: 'Natakaje akazi kanje kubera nticandagishije'
text: Danielle Thornton yari mu kibanza basanzwe barindiriramwo abanyeshure arindiriye abana biwe igihe amenya ko ategerezwa guhitamwo ingingo ishobora guhindura ubuzima bwiwe: kwicandagisha canke gutakaza akazi kiwe amazemwo imyaka hafi icenda muri banki ya Citigroup. We n'umugabo wiwe bari bamaze amezi atari make bakurikirana ingene abakoresha bashiraho amategeko yo kwicandagisha, akaba yari azi neza ko umuryango wiwe ushobora guhura n'iki kibazo. Niho rero mu butumwa bwa email yaronse kuri terefone yiwe, yagiye abibona. Ati: "Twaragize ibiganiro vyinshi, vyinshi kuri iki kibazo, ariko twafashe ingingo ntabanduka ko uburenganzira bwacu ari bwo buri hejuru gusumba amafaranga". Danielle ni umwe mu bihumbi n'ibihumbi muri Amerika bahisemwo gutakaza akazi kabo hakwiteza incanco za covid-19. Ariko ni inkehwa. Abakoresha hafi bose barafashe izi ngingo - hafi ica gatatu c'amakompanyi manini manini mu gihugu hamwe na 15% z'amakompanyi matomato - avuga ko benshi mu bakozi babo bayakurikije. Muri Citi, yoyo isanzwe yarihanganiye abafise imvo zishingiye ku magara n'idini, abakozi bayo barenga 99% barakurikije ibisabwa n'iyo banki ifise abakozi bangana na 65.000. Abahinga bavuga ko izi ncanco ata ngorane zifise kandi ko ari yo nzira yonyene yo kurwanya ubwandu, ariko ingingo zitegeka abantu kwicandagisha - ziboneka nk'inzira yo guhatira kwiteza izi ncanco ku banyamerika bangana na 25% bataricandagisha - ziriko zirarwanywa bikomeye mu gihugu cose, aho abatari bake babona ko  ziriko zihonyanga ubwigenge bwabo. Muri kuno kwezi, sentare nkuru y'igihugu yarahagaritse ingingo ya Perezida Joe Biden yategeka ko ubuzi bwose buhuriramwo n'imiburiburi abantu ijana ababukoramwo bategerezwa kwicandagisha canke bakambara udupfukamunwa hanyuma bakama bipimisha buri ndwi ku mafaranga yabo. Abacamanza bo muri iyo sentare nkuru y'igihugu bavuze ko iyi ngingo ari "ihonyangwa rikomeye" ry'imibereho y'imiriyoni n'imiriyoni z'abakozi - maze bahagarika icizere c'uko hashobora kuba ingingo nk'izi mu gihugu cose zitegekanywa mu bihugu bimwe bimwe nk'Ubudagi. N'aho amasentare ya Amerika yagiye yemerera amareta n'amakompanyi gufata ingingo nk'izi ku giti cayo, abazirwanya baracari benshi cane. Abakozi hafi 55% barashigikiye ingingo zifatwa n'abakoresha babo zibategeka kwicandagisha, ariko abarenga ica gatatu babandanya baziyamiriza, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'icigwa cakozwe n'ikigo Gallup mu kwa cumi na kabiri. Mu gisagara ca New York mu ci riheze, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi baragiye mu myiyerekano biyamiriza ingingo z'abarongoye intara zitegeka abakozi bo mu gisata c'ubuvuzi, abigisha hamwe n'abakozi ba reta kwicandagisha. Iyi ngingo yafashwe igashika no mu gisata c'abigenga kuva ico gihe, yatumye abakozi bo muri ico gisagara baja mu karuhuko igihe yatangura gushirwa mu ngiro, mu gihe ibitaro vyo muri iyo ntara yose vyirukanye abakozi. Donna Schmidt aba mu karere ka Long Island akaba yari amaze imyaka 30 akora nk'umuforoma afasha abibarutse ariko akaba yarahagaritse akazi kiwe kubera amategeko yo kwicandagisha avuga ati: "Si nemera ko reta ari yo ifise uburenganzira bwo gutegeka ku bintu biri hagati ya kiremwamuntu n'umuremyi wabo". Uyu mupfasoni w'imyaka 52 avuga ko yakunda akazi kiwe ariko akaba aterekwa incanco ku mvo z'idini n'uburenganzira bwo kwihitiramwo ico ashatse we nyene ubwiwe. Ubu ariko yigira uwuharanira agateka ka zina muntu, akaba ariko ategura ishirahamwe New Yorkers Against Medical Mandates rihurikiyemwo abantu bangana na 26.000. Avuga ati: "Nta guhigitanya kwabayeho. Ivyabaye biteye agahinda. Ni ukuri nditaho abarwayi banje, rero kwumva ikigo ca reta kimbwira kiti: 'nta kibanza ugifise hano' - ni ibintu bitoroshe. Danielle, yari asanzwe akorera muhira i  Missouri muri banki Citigroup, avuga ko atari umunyaporitike kandi ko atari "umuntu arwanya incanco". Ariko uyu mukenyezi, nyina w'abana bane mbere yanduye Covid umwaka uheze imbere y'uko incanco zikwira hose, ntiyashatse guterwa urucanco, nk'uko we nyene abivuga, "rusa n'urutarwanya uwu mugera". Umusi wa nyuma aherukirako gutonda hari ku wa 14 z'uku kwa mbere. Avuga ko ari igihamana yagize kuba ata kibazo c'amafaranga yagize inyuma yo guhagarika akazi kiwe ata migambi yari afise yo kurondera akandi kazi ubu. Nta n'uko yigeze yiruhisha aja kurondera ko yogirirwa ubuntu ku mvo z'idini canke z'amagara. Ati: "Nategerezwa kuronswa uburenganzira bwo kwihitiramwo, ariko gusa abantu biyumvira kwinshi...ni ihinduka rikomeye ku muryango wacu". Amakompanyi yafashe izi ngingo zo kwicandagisha yemeza ko aya mategeko ari yo yafashije kwumvisha abakozi kwicandagisha. Mw'ihinguriro ry'imfungurwa Tyson Foods, abakozi bababa 60.000 - canke 40% b'abakozi baryo - baricandagishije inyuma y'aho rishingiye iyi ngino mu kwa munani, rivuga ko "ari co kintu nyaco conyene dushobora gukora kugira dukingire abakozi bacu". Mw'ikompanyi y'indege United Airlines, umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa Scott Kirby avuga ko ingingo zafashwe na kompanyi yiwe zagabanije igitigiri c'abakozi baja mu bitaro, akavuga ko n'imiburiburi umuntu umwe buri ndwi yapfa imbere y'uko bafata izi ngingo. Mu rwandiko yandikiye abakozi, yanditse ati: "N'aho nzi ko hari abantu gushika ubu batemera poritike yacu, United iriko irerekana ko gutegeka abantu kwicandagisha ari co kintu nyaco co gukora kuko urucanco rwararokoye ubuzima". Hampande y'inyungu mu bijanye n'amagara, amakompanyi afise ayandi mategeko atoroshe ashingiye ku kazi n'amafaranga. Amafaranga yo kwivuza, akenshi usanga igice kimwe kirihwa n'umukoresha, ari hejuru ku bantu baticandagishije, kandi bisanga mu gihamana kibi co gutakza akazi kubera uburwayi. Emily Dickens, umukuru w'igisata kijejwe ibibazo vya reta mw'ishirahamwe rishinzwe abakozi, Society for Human Resource Management, ryakoze icigwa rigasanga 75% y'abo ryabajije batari kwicandagisha canke ngo bame baja kwipimisha buri  ndwi iyo ritaba itegeko rya reta, avuga ko amakompanyi afise impungenge ku ngaruka z'izi ngingo zitegeka abantu kwicandagisha hamwe n'ikena ry'abakozi muri iki gihugu gisanzwe gifise akahise gashingiye kw'isoko rikomeye ry'abakozi. Muri rusangi, Abanyamerika bagera kuri 63% baramaze kwuzuza incanco, ugereranije na 84% mu Bwongereza (kuva ku myaka 12 kuduga) bamaze kwiteza incanco zibiri.

headline: Burundi - Rwanda: Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi yashikanye ubutumwa bwa Kagame kuri Ndayishimiye
text: Intumwa zidasanzwe z'Urwanda zirongowe n'umushikiranganji w'ico gihugu ajejwe kwivuna abansi ziri mu rugendo mu gihugu c'Uburundi, nk'uko umuvugizi wa prezida w'Uburundi abivuga. Maj Gen Albert Murasira n'abo bagendanye kuri uyu wa Kabiri bakiriwe n'umukuru w'Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye i Gitega, umurwa mukuru. Mw'itangazo rigufi cane umubonano urangiye, Evelyne Butoyi, umuvugizi wa prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye, yabwiye abemenyeshamakuru ko izo ntumwa zari zizanye ubutumwa prezida w'Urwanda Paul Kagame arungikiye mugenziwe w'Uburundi. Kuva prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye ashitse ku butegetsi mu 2020, hari utwigoro tw'uko Uburundi n'Urwanda bisubira kugira imigenderanire nmyiza inyuma yo gutituka cane kuva mu 2015. Mw'itangazo rigufi cane umubonano urangiye , Evelyne Butoyi , umuvugizi wa prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye, yabwiye abemenyeshamakuru ko izo ntumwa zari zizaniye ubutumwa bwa prezida w'Urwanda Paul Kagame arungikiye mugenziwe w'Uburundi. Si ubwa mbere intumwa z'Urwanda zigendeye Uburundi. Mu kwezi kw'indwi mu mwaka uheze, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Urwanda, Edouard Ngirente niwe yaserukiye Urwanda  mu kwifatanya n'abarundi mu guhimbaza imyaka 59 yari iheze igihugu cabo kironse intahe yo kwikukira. 'Ihwa ritarashinguka' N'Uburundi bumaze kurungika akatari gake intumwa mu Rwanda. Mu minsi hariyo izirongowe n'umushikiranganji w'Uburundi ajejwe  ubutungane. Rwanda - Burundi: Ba minisitiri b'ubutabera bahuriye i Kigali "Ni nk'igitangaza abarundi babonye" - Evariste Ndayishimiye Imbere yiwe hari hagiyeyo izirongowe n'umushikiranganji w'Uburundi ajejwe ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Afrika y'Ubuseruko, ECA,  zakirwa n'umukuru w'igihugu c'Urwanda, Paul Kagame. Ariko gushika ubu reta y'Uburundi iguma ivuga ko hakiri ikitarakorwa kugira imigederanire hagati y'ivyo bihugu imere neza uko vyahora. Reta y'Uburundi isaba reta y'Urwada kuyirungikira abo irondera bahungiye hakurya y'Akanyaru  inyuma y'uruhara boba baragize mu kugeregeza gutembagaza ubutegetsi mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu 2015. Zaba iz'Urwanda zigendera Uburundi, canke iz'Uburundi zigendera Urwanda, nta ntumwa na zimwe ziremeza ko iryo hwa risigaye muri iyo migenderanire rigiye gushinguka. Inyuma y'umubonano na prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye  muri uru rundi rugendo rw'intumwa z'Urwanda mu Burundi, umuvugizi w'umukuru  w'igihugu , Evelyne Butoyi, yavuze ko izo ntumwa zaganiriye   "ibijanye n'imigenderanire hagati y'ivyo bihugu uko ari bibiri". Yongeyeko ati: "Murazi ko ivyo bihugu vyompi uko ari bibiri biriko birakora kugira imigenderanire isubire kugenda neza, ku neza y'Abarundi n'Abanyarwanda, ku neza y'ibihugu vyacu uko ari bibiri."

headline: Uganda - Covid19: Ibiro vy'inama nshingamateka vyugawe indwi zibiri kugira bipompwe
text: Inama nshingamateka ya Uganda yahagaritse ibikorwa vyayo mu kiringo c'indwi zibiri mu gihe ico gihugu gihanganye n'umupfunda ugira kabiri ca Covid - 19. Mu ndwi iheze, abategetsi bavuze ko abantu barenga 100 bo mu nama nshingamateka basanze bafise coronavirus. Itangazo rivuga ko ingingo yo kwugara iyo nyubakwa izoja mu ngiro kuva kw'itariki 28 ukwezi kwa gatandatu gushika igenekerezo rya 11 z'ukwezi kwa 11 kugira habe ibikorwa vyo gupompa iyo nyubakwa. Umuyobozi ajejwe igikorwa co kumenyesha amakuru mu nama nshingamateka, Chris Obore, yavuze ko iyo ngingo yafashwe mu ntumbero yo gukumira ko ico kibanza ciganzamwo ico kiza. Urwo rwego rwaratunganije ibikorwa bikomakomeye bine kuva mu kwezi kwa gatanu, harimwo gutora mahera reta ikoresha, itorwa ry'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka hamwe n'ijambo ryashikirijwe igihugu cose. Uganda ihanganye n'igitero kigira kabiri ca Coronavirus, catumye prezida Yoweri Museveni afata ingingo zo gusubira kwiyugarana mu ntango z'uku kwezi. Hagize imisi higaragaza igitigiri kinini c'abandura iyo ngwara mu tundi duce twa Afrika y'ubuseruko. Mu ntara ya Kisumu iri mu burengero bwa Kenya, ibice 23 kw'ijana vy'abapimwe mu ndwi iheze basanze baranduye iyo ngwara.

headline: Umupira w'amaguru muri Ghana wahagaritswe vy'imfatakibanza kubera coronavirus
text: Inkino z'umupira w'amaguru muri Ghana zahagaritswe mu bice zari zigezemwo vyose inyuma y'isohoka ry'itegeko rya leta Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Ghana ryafashe iyo ngingo ku musi w'Imana, inyuma yaho umukuru w'ico gihugu Nana Akufo-Addo, ategekeye ko hahagarikwa mugihe mfatakibanza amahwaniro y'abantu benshi, harimwo itunganywa ry'imikino. Urwandiko rwasohotse rumenyesha ko hakurikijwe intumbero zatanzwe n'umukuru w'igihugu. Ishirahamwe rijewe  umupira w'amaguru muri Ghana ryahagaritse mu kiringo mfatakibanza amahiganwa yose kandi iyo ngingo yatanguye kuja mu ngiro ubwo nyene gushika habaye irindi tegeko. Iri shirahamwe ryari rifise icizere  ko rishobora kubandanya imikino, hakabandanya hisungwa impanuro z'abayozi b'igisata c'amagara y'abantu, ariko itangazo rya leta ryamenyesheje ko ritabishigikiye. Igihugu ca Ghana cakurikiye ibindi bihugu vyinshi mu guhagarika vy'imfatakibanza umupira w'amaguru. Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika, CAF, ryari mu gihugu ca Kameruni mu mpera z'indwi kugira ryihweze ibijanye na kazoza k'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika, riziga gukinwa guhera mu  kwezi kwa 4. Icegeranyo ca komisiyo kizoshikirizwa vuba CAF

headline: East Africa: Miriyoni 28 bashobora kugeramirwa n'inzara ikabije - Oxfam
text: Abantu bashika miriyoni 28 muri Afrika y'ubuseruko barashobora kugeramirwa n'inzara ikomeye cane kubera iduga ry'ibiciro bitumwe n'intambara yo muri Ukraine hamwe n'ikena ry'imvura muri uku kwezi kwa gatatu, nk'uko ishirahamwe ry'abagiraneza Oxfam rigabisha. Kenya, Somalia na Ethiopia vyugarijwe n'ikena ry'imvura rya mbere rikaze mu myaka 40, aho ni mu gihe Sudan y'Epfo yo ihanzwe n'imyuzure, nk'uko Oxfam ibandanya ivuga. Iryo shirahamwe ryerekana kandi ico ryita ugusamazwa kw'amakungu n'ingwano yo muri Ukraine, ituma hatitabwaho ikibazo c'ikena  ry'ivyo kurya mu karere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko. Itangazo rigenewe ibinyamakuru rivuga ko utwigoro mpuzamakungu two guhangana n'ico kibazo dufise uburyo budahagije na gato kuko ku miriyaridi 6 z'ama dorari ONU ikeneye mu 2022 kugira igarukire ku bari mu kaga muri Ethiopia,  Somalia na Sudan y'Epfo, 3% yonyene niyo amaze kuboneka. Madame Gabriela Bucher, umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa mpuzamakungu wa Oxfam yagabishije avuga ati: "Ibice vya Ethiopia, Kenya, Somalia, Sudan y'Epfo n'ahandi vyimirije guhura n'akaga. N'aho imvura yogwa muri uku kwezi, kwivyukiranya bizoba nk'ibidashoboka kiretse hari igikozwe  ubu nyene." Abandanya ati: "Ingaruka z'ingwano yo muri Ukraine kw'ihererekanywa ry'indya kw'isi zizoshika mu bice vyose vy'isi, ariko abasanzwe bari bakenye n'abafise intege  nke nibo zizosesereza cane kuruta abandi kandi  vyihuse kuruta." Ibihugu vya Afrika y'ubuseruko bivana  90% y'ingano bikenera muri Ukraine n'Uburusiya, nk'uko itangazo ribandanya rivuga. "Kubera uruzuba,  indogobwa zacu zarapfuye, izo dusigaranye nazo ziragoyagoya ku buryo zidashobora gukwega intunduguru  z'imizigo", ivyo bivugwa na Ahmed Mohamud Omar, umurimyi  wo muri county ya Wajiir muri Kenya. "Nguma nibaza ico umuryango wanje uzorya, aho ico bazorya ejo kizova,  niba ejo nzoronka indobo canke ibido y'amazi."

headline: Burundi: Kugira umunsi w'akaruhuko itariki Pierre Nkurunziza yashengeye vyakiriwe gute?
text: Abarundi babona ugutandukanye icemezo c'inama nshingamateka y'u Burundi yemeje ko umusi mukuru uhariwe kuzirikana,  gukunda no gukundisha  igihugu uhuzwa n'umunsi uwari prezida Pierre Nkurunziza yashengeye. Inama nshingamateka kuwa kane yatoye kuri 76,9% - amajwi 87 avyemera, 26 abihakana  - ko buri tariki ya 8 ukwezi kwa gatandatu uzohora uba umunsi w'Imboneza mu kuzirikana, gukunda no gukundisha igihugu. Uwa mbere yatewe iryo teka rwo kuba  iyo mboneza ni uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu Pierre Nkurunziza. Uwo munsi uhuriranye n'umunsi uwo yatwaye Uburundi imyaka 15 yashengereyeko mu 2020. Igihe iryo tegeko ryemezwa mu 2020, uwo munsi wari washizwe mu kwezi kw'indwi, ibirori vyawo bigahagarikikwa n'iyo mboneza nyene. Ubu rero iyo mboneza itakiriho, umushikiranganji w'ubutungane yasiguriye inama nshingamateka ko vyari ngombwa ko hagira ibihindurwa muri iryo tegeko. Ibi vyemejwe bitegerezwa guca mu nama nkenguzamateka - aho vyitezwe ko bizoshigikirwa kuko umugambwe uri ku butegetsi uhafise ubwiganze, imbere yo guterwako igikumu n'umukuru w'igihugu. Ku rubuga rwa Facebook rwa BBC Gahuza, iyo nkuru ni imwe mu zatanzweko ivyiyumviro vyinshi kandi bitandukanye mu zatangajwe muri uku kwezi. Mu kwezi kwa mbere 2020 iyo nteguro y'ingingo yo guha iteka Pierre Nkurunziza - yari akiri ku butegetsi - yashikanwa mu nama nshingamateka, yateje impari zikomeye. Abashingamateka bo mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi CNDD-FDD barashigikiye cane iyo nteguro, abo ku ruhande rutavuga rumwe nawo barayirwanije. Inyuma y'ivyemejwe n'inama nshingamateka kuwa kane, ibi ni ivyo bamwe bamwe bavuze ku rubuga rwacu rwa Facebook: Remy Muheto Sinibazako abikwiye uravye ibintu yakoze nko gukingira ikibaba umurwi w'imbonerakure,guhimiriza iyicwa ry'abatavuga rumwe na leta yiwe,mukuvuga ngo,bazohera nk'ifu y'imijira.ngo mujeri aba police bazirase...... Bénigne Niyonzima Ni igiki yakoze karuhariwe gituma ahabwa iryoteka kirenze kuba umukuru w'igihugu? Ndaziko muza kuntera amabuye ariko imbere yuko muyantera munyishure. Elie Niyonkuru Bénigne Niyonzima  yateje imbere igihugu, akuraho amacakubiri y'intara n'amoko, mbere no mumyaka itanu yanyuma harerekana ko igihugu gishobora kubaho atamfashanyo y'abazungu kironse, kikitegurira amatora atawo hanze abayemwo, ivyo kera wari nk'umugani. Etc amatora atawo hanze abayemwo, ivyo kera wari nk'umugani. Etc Bénigne Niyonzima Elie Niyonkuru urakoze kunyishura ariko ivyo umbwiye igihe mperuka i Burundi ntavyo nabonye. Ntibagirirwa Etienne Nahora nibaza igituma twagumye mu gacerere mukuterekana ko uwu muntu wacu atari asanzwe . Uburundi kuva bw kabaho bwaribwaronke umukuru w'igihugu nk'uyu ??!! Mais vaut mieux tard que jamais !! James Muligande Iryo teka mwarimuhaye kubera yishe abatutsi ,akabacinyiza ,mugabo Imana nayo ntiyemeye ko aribamwo ngo ari vive ari muzima ,kuko atari arkwiye ,iramutwara . Iyo arenga kahise agatunganiriza abarundi bose, yari kuba abikwiye,ku Mana Nta mwana n'ikinono . Ahubwo nimurihe Ndayishimiye niwe numva avuga ubumwe bw'Abarundi . Chriss John Naruhuke Amahoro Nyakubahwa ...Tuzokwama tumwibuka tunazirikane iragi ryiwe ryiza ryo gukunda igihugu cacu ...Turamwibuka avuga ati"Ntamunyamahanga azoza akunda igihugu cacu ciza kurusha twebwe Abarundi ".Rest in peace David Mushapa Yabesi Kereni Sha uti mugukunda igihugu??? Nubwo mumwita gutyo ntibikuraho ko yapfuye knd abo yishe ubu barikumwe nawe kugitanda kimwe.  2015 yabaye imboneza yo gukunda igihugu kweri? JeandeDieu Deus Nimubona Uwu yatubereye intwari, imboneza, umu leader, umuhuza...sinobidonda ngo ndangize. Yari ntagereranywa Issa Wasaf Kimwe Imana ntanzigo,muribuka2010,aba FNL batawe muri Rusizi?2015,abatutsi n'abahutu bishwe?sha imana,ica iziroranye ntihengama,himbazemwebwe muzi icoyabakoreye,jewe n'intuntu !!!!!!!!!,mwobaye abandi mukazomufasha,gusamba kumana ariko arabazwa,ivya2010,hamw na 2015 hamwe na2020 mwishomwisho. Claver Nzohayimana Sinarinzi Ndabashimiye muvyubahiro vyanyu kuciyiyumviro ciza mwagize nakare barayamaze bati lmana yirigwa i Rwanda igataha i Burundi none iryavuzwe riratashe bona bomushira mugitabu cakahise akana kanje kakazosoma inkuru y'uyomuhizi. Sibomana Adrien Nivyo nivyo kugira turushirizeho kumenya ivyamuranze n'ugukunda igihugu gusumba kandi bigafasha n'abariko barakura ubu kumumenya nk'intwari y'Uburundi nk'uko tuzi vyinshi kuncungu ya democratie  n'iya indépendance. Iamnawaar Iamnawaar Iamnawaar Ntamu perezida u Burundi bwagize w'intwari nka Petero Nkurunziza urebye ibihe yanyuzemo byose akihagararaho mpaka ageze ku ntego ye amahanga agasakuza ariko akabereka ko n'abirabura bafite ijambo ku bihugu bavukamo ko abazungu batagomba kudutegeka ibyo bashatse byose Gabriel Ndimurigo Ahubwo iyo bashiraho umusi wo kumusenga,ivyovyo birasanzwe.imboneza umuntu yamaze abantu?kubwanje ntiyokwiswe imboneza yagize impfuvyi n'abapfakazi benshi,nabo yahekuye sibake. Dismas Nibaruta Cissoko Bizatuma n'abazovuka bamenya ko higeze kubaho umugabo w'abagabo mu Burundi.Intwari ihashitse maze aze y'inspirer benshi mubazokwaruka. Remy Muheto Sinibazako abikwiye uravye ibintu yakoze nko gukingira ikibaba umurwi wimbonerakure,guhimiriza iyicwa ryabatavuga rumwe na leta yiwe,mukuvuga ngo,bazohera nk'ifu y'imijira.ngo mujeri aba police bazirase...... West Joy Mil Kevin Cane gose ntanumwe atobishima kuko yarakoze birashimwa n'intwari ibushitse kuko yitanze uko bishoboka kwose kugira Uburundi bugire aho bugeze uyu munsi , yatwaye atwarira bose, Imana ibandanye imuha igitsibo c'abahizi ahari iruhande yayo.#thank-You #Nkurunzuza

headline: China irahakana kwinjirira poritike ya UK inyuma y'aho igisata c'igendereza MI5 kigabishirije reta
text: Ubushinwa burahakana kwivanga muri poritike y'Ubwongereza inyuma y'aho igisata c'igendereza MI5 kigabishirije ko hari intumwa y'ico gihugu yavogereye inama nshingamateka. Uru rwego rujejwe igendereza ruvuga ko Christine Ching Kui Lee "yubatse ubucuti" hagati y'umugambwe urongoye Ubushinwa, Chinese Communist Party (CCP), n'abashingamateka hamwe n'abarondera kuba abashingamateka b'Ubwongereza. Ruvuga kandi ko yahaye n'imfashanyo abanyaporitike, harimwo n'umushingamateka w'umugambwe w'Abaokozi (Labour Party) Barry Gardiner, yahawe amafaranga arenga amapawundi ibihumbi 420 (ni ukuvuga amadorari arenga ibihumbi 574 ,5). Ubuserukizi bw'Ubushinwa i Londres bwagiriza MI5 "gucafuza no gutera ubwoba" Abashinwa  baba mu Bwongereza. Mw'itangazo ryacishijwe ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi bw'ubu buserukizi, umuvugizi wabwo avuga ati: "Ubushinwa bwama bugendera ku ngingo yo kutivanga mu biraba ikindi gihugu. "Ntabwo dukeneye kandi ntituzigera turondera "kugura abantu" mu nama nshingamateka y'igihugu ico ari co cose. Turarwanya dushimitse amayeri yo gucafuza no gutera ubwoba Abashinwa bari mu Bwongereza". Nk'uko MI5 ibivuga, intumbero y'uyu mupfasoni Lee mu kwivanga mu nama nshingamateka ni "uguhagararira Abashinwa bo mu Bwongereza no gutsimbataza ubudasa". Ariko MI5 ivuga ko ibi "vyakozwe mu kinyegero bihagarariwe n'igisata kijejwe igendereza (United Front Work Department, UFWD) c'umugambwe CCP, amafaranga akaba atangwa n'abanyamahanga baba mu Bushinwa no muri Hong Kong". UFWD yagirizwa kurondera "gukomeza ubucuti n'abanyaporitike bakomakomeye" mu ntumbero yo kurondera ko poritike y'Ubwongereza yokworohereza umugambwe CCP hamwe no kurwanya abo bose barwanya uyu mugambwe, harimwo n'abawagiriza guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu. Iki gisata kijejwe umutekano kivuga ko umupfasoni Lee afitaniye "imigenderanire ikomeye n'abantu batari bake muri poritike y'Ubwongereza", harimwo n'umurwi w'abashingamateka wiyita All Party Parliamentary Group (APPG) wiswe Chinese in Britain (ni ukuvuga abashinwa mu Bwongereza) ariko ubu ukaba warasambutse. MI5 igabisha ko umupfasoni Lee "ashobora kwifuza gushinga imirwi myinshi ya APPG [imirwi y'abashingamateka] kugira ngo ishobore guhagararira inyungu z'umugambwe CCP. Ku wa kane, niho umushingamateka wo mu mugambwe w'abagendera ku vya kera akaba ari na we yahoze arongoye uyu mugambwe, Sir Iain Duncan Smith, yazana mu nama nshingamateka iri tangazo ryo kugabisha, yemeza ko umukuru w'inama nshingamateka yarirungikiye abashingamateka, akoresheje ubutumwa-muravyo (email). Avuga ko ari "ikibazo gikomeye", aca asaba ko umupfasoni Lee yosubizwa iwabo kandi ko reta yogira ico ibwiye inama nshingamateka. Umunyamabanga ajejwe intwaro yo hagati Priti Patel avuga ko "biteye amakenga" kubona hari umuntu "yivanze n'ibigirankana mu bikorwa vya poritike vy'Ubwongereza kw'izina ry'umugambwe wa gikomunista w'Ubushinwa [Chinese Communist Party] agakorana n'abashingamateka". Ariko avuga ko Ubwongereza busanzwe bufise integuro "yo kubona umunyamahanga yivanga mu biraba igihugu". Umushingamateka Gardiner yatanguye kuronswa imfashanyo zitanzwe n'ikompanyi y'abanyamategeko yegukira umupfasoni Lee, Christine Lee & Co, mu mpera za 2014. Umuhungu w'umupfasoni Lee na we azwi ko yakoreye ku buntu uyu mushingamateka wo mu mugambwe w'abakozi, mu nyuma akaba yahawe akazi nk'umutunganyabikorwa wiwe. Gardiner avuga ko yari amaze imyaka itari mike avugana n'inzego zijejwe umutekano ku vyerekeye uyo mugore. Avuga ko umupfasoni Lee  ata ruhara na rumwe yigeze agira mu kugena abashakashatsi biwe kandi ko imfashanyo zose "zamenyeshejwe". Mu nyuma, umushingamateka Gardiner yabwiye imboneshakure Sky News ati: "Jewe uko ndabibona, ayo mafaranga yamfashije mu bikorwa nashoboye kurangura mu nama nshingamateka, hamwe n'ibikorwa nashoboye gukorera uturere twanje - yarishwe aba bashakashatsi kandi mu biviye mu muco, nta rufaranga na rumwe rwakoreshejwe ku nyungu zanje bwite". Umukuru w'umugambwe w'abigenga (Liberal Democrat), Sir Ed Davey, na we nyene yarahawe imfashanyo y'ibihumbi 5.000 vy'amapawundi igihe yari umunyamabanga ajejwe amasoko ntanganguvu  - ariko akavuga ko aya mafaranga yakiriwe n'ishirahamwe ryiwe kandi ko ari "bwo bwa mbere yumvise yoyagirako  impungenge".

headline: Urutonde rw'imidari ya Olempic Tokyo 2020
text: Inkino za Olempike 2020 zizoba zirimwo igitigiri kitari bwaboneke c'inkino 33 hamwe n'amahiganwa 339, bibere mu bibanza 42 mu Buyapani. Uru rupapuro, rurimwo urutonde rw'imidari iza iratsindirwa, rurivugurura rwonyene rukerekana igitigiri c'imidari y'inzahabu, umwakaka hamwe n'umujumbu imaze gutsindirwa n'imigwi Olempike ya buri gihugu citabiriye izi nkino. Imidari yambere vyitezwe ko itsindirwa itariki 24 z'ukw'indwi 2021.

headline: George Simbachawene avuga ko ari ukutubaha Tanzania kuvuga ko ihohotera impunzi
text: Umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati muri Tanzania yamirira kure icegeranyo c'abahinga ba ONU kivuga ko iki gihugu hamwe n'u Burundi bitoteza bikongera bigahungura impunzi z'abarundi ku nguvu. George Simbachawene yabwiye BBC ko umugambi wo guhungura izi mpunzi ukorwa na Tanzania ifadikanije n'amashirahamwe afasha impunzi HCR na IOM, ko rero ibiri muri iki cegeranyo ari ukwambika urubwa Tanzania. Abahinga ba ONU, bagiriza inzego z'igipolisi n'iperereza za Tanzania n'Uburundi ko zinyuruza, zisinzikariza ubuzima, zisubiza mu Burundi ku nguvu zikongera zigatera ubwoba impunzi z'abarundi ziri muri Tanzania. BBC yagerageje kuvugana n'uruhande rwa reta y'Uburundi ntivyashoboka gushika ubu. Umushikiranganji Simbachewene asigura ko umugambi wo gutahukana impunzi ubandanya gushika ubu ushingiye ku mahoro, umutekano n'ugufatana mu nda birangwa mu Burundi inyuma y'amatora, kandi ko ari reta y'Uburundi yisabiye ko abantu bayo botahukanwa. Ati: "Reta y'Uburundi harimwo n'umukuru w'igihugu we nyene w'Uburundi yaraje muri Tanzania, arasigura yongera arasaba ko abanyagihugu biwe basubira mu gihugu kubera kirangwamwo umutekano". Tanzania ihaye indaro impunzi z'abarundi zirenga 165,000 nk'uko HCR ibivuga, benshi baba mu nkambi cane cane za Nyarugusu, Nduta na Mtendeli mu burengero bwa Tanzania. Simbachawene asigura ko ingene umugambi uteguwe na reta ya Tanzania ifadikanije na HCR hamwe na IOM ari uko impunzi ziyandikisha, zigahabwa umusi wo guhunguka hanyuma zigahabwa n'uburyo butangwa n'aya mashirahamwe nyene afasha impunzi. Ati: "Rero ibivugwa ko tubahungura ku nguvu ni ukuzimiza, ikinyoma no guteza urubwa Tanzania kandi yaremeye kuja hamwe n'aya mashirahamwe ya ONU mu gufasha izi mpunzi". "Rero twebwe twibaza ko abantu bavuga Tanzania batazi. Tanzania yakiriye impunzi ziva mu bihugu bitandukanye muri kano karere". "Mwibuke ko Tanzania ari co gihugu conyene catanguye kwakira impunzi kuva n'imbere y'ukwikukira n'inyuma y'ukwikukira. Rero uno musi kwagiriza Tanzania ko iriko irirukana impunzi kandi dufashanya mu kubatahukana, ni ukutubaha Tanzania be no kuyishayako". Nayo kubivugwa ko hari abanyuruzwa bagakorerwa n'ayandi mabi, arahakana ivyo, akavuga ko ahubwo ari abava mu makambi bidaciye mu mategeko, maze bagira ibibazo iyo bari bagaca bavuga ko banyurujwe canke bakorewe ibindi vyaha. Simbachawene ati: "Umenye ko arya makambi yuguruye, ntiyugaye. Rero ziragiriranira imigenderanire n'abanyagihugu baba hanze y'amakambi co kimwe n'ababa hanze y'amakambi nabo nyene uko". "Ivyo bikorwa vy'ubudandaji n'ukwivangatiranya n'abanyagihugu, ubwa mbere biteye kubiri n'amategeko kuko impunzi ntiyemerewe gukora ikintu ico ari co cose kiretse utuntu dusanzwe ahantu yashizwe kandi ntiyemerewe gusohoka". "Rero iyo hagize ikimushikira hiyo aba ari uza wumva ngo twahohotewe, twanyurujwe, nakorewe ibi na biriya, ivyo si vyo n'ukuri". Avuga ko abahonyanga ayo mategeko bahagarikwa, bakabashira imbere y'ubutungane hanyuma bakabasubiza mu makambi canke bakabasubiza iwabo, ariko ko usanga  inyuma y'umusi umwe canke imisi ibiri ugasanga yagarutse mw'ikambi. Avuga ko ivyo aba bahinga ba ONU bagiriza Tanzania ari ibinyoma, ko ibintu bisanzwe usanga bishika ariko bitategerezwa gucafuza Tanzania ku bijanye n'iki kibazo c'impunzi. Arahakana ko ata cuka kibi kihari, ko amakambi atekanye, ubuzima bubandanya ibisanzwe. Avuga ko utubazo tuba ari udusanzwe, kandi ko ibiba mu makambi, biba n'ahandi hose mu gihugu atari mu makambi y'impunzi. Ati: "Twumvikane gato: si ukuvuga ko harya mu makambi ari mw'ijuru, kandi no mu banyagihugu bacu basanzwe hari ibiba ariko ntimubivuga". "Rero nshaka ko ubwira isi yose yumve ko Tanzania ata mpunzi iyo ari yo yose iriko irakubagura, ko Tanzania ari co gihugu c'akarorero gitunga impunzi, ko ahubwo ari impunzi zihonyanga amategeko ababuza kuva mu makambi hanyuma bahura n'ibibazo bagaca bavuga ngo batotejwe canke ngo banyurujwe". "Twebwe nka reta tubandanya dukurikiza amategeko ku bakora ayo makosa".

headline: Amatora mu Burundi: Batandatu ku ndwi batanguye imyiyamamazo
text: Uno munsi abazokwitoza mu matora ategekanijwe ku wa 20 z'ukwa gatanu, niho batanguza ibikorwa vy'imyiyamamazo mu mihingo itangukanye y'igihugu. Mu bakandida indwi bazokwitoza ku rwego rw'umukuru w'igihugu batandatu muri bo bashoboye gutanguza ibikorwa vyo kwiyamamaza, umwe akaba amenyesha ko azotangura kwiyamamaza ejo ku wa kabiri. Evariste Ndayishimiye azokwitoza kw'izina ry'mugambwe CNDD-FDD yugururiye ibikorwa vyiwe muri komine Bugendana y'intara ya Gitega asanzwe avukamwo, imigambwe ishika kuri 27 yahisemwo gushigikira uwo mugambwe ikaba yari yagiye kumushigikira. Ku ruhanderwiwe, Agathon Rwasa azokwitoza kw'izina ry'mugambwe CNL yatanguriye ibikorwa vyiwe ku kibuga ca Muremera ku mugwa mukuru w'intara ya Ngozi nawe nyene asanzwe avukamwo. Leonce Ngendakumana azokwitoza kw'izina ry'umugambwe Frodebu hamwe na Dieudonné Nahimana azokwitoza kugiti ciwe batanguriye ibikorwa vyabo mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, muri Karitiye Kinama kuruhande rwa Frodebu hamwe no muri komine Muhakuri kuri Bwana Nahimana. Domitien Ndayizeye azoserukira urunani Kira Burundi yatanguje ibikorwa vyiwe mu ntara ya Muramvya, mu gihe Gaston Sindimwo azoserukira umugambwe Uprona yatanguriye imyiyamamazo yiwe muntara ya Mwaro. Uwitashoboye kwugurura ibikorwa vyiwe uno munsi ni Francis Rohero avuga ko azovyugurura ejo ku wa kabiri. N'aho ivyo bikorwa vyashoboye gutangura, hari ibibazo vyagiye vyibonekeza irya n'ino, vyagenda bibuza abanywwanyi b'abiyamamaza gukomeza ingendo zabo. Abo ni nk'abanywanyi ba CNL bari bafashe ibarabara rya Gitega - Ngozi bavuga ko bankiwe kubandanya urugendo rwabo bageze ahitwa Bitare muri komine Bugendana hariko habera ibirori vya CNDD-FDD, iyindi nzira bari gucamwo nayo basanga ikiraro cabomotse. Bivugwa ko ku mugwa mukuru w'intara ya Kayanza gushika mu masaha icenda hari hakirengana amamodokari menshi yo mu bwoko bwa Fuso yuzuye abanywanyi b'uwo mugambwe aja i Ngozi kubera ivyo bibazo. Eka n'imodoka harimwo iyitwaye Agathon Rwasa azokwitoza kw'izina ry'uwo mugambwe, zagize ikibazo zigeze muri komine Matongo y'intara ya Kayanza, aho basanze ikamyo itwara igitoro yari yakikamye mw'ibarabara. Vyabaye ngombwa ko abanyagihugu bafasha mu kumucira inzira kugira ngo ashobore kurengana. Haravugwa kandi n'isanganya ry'imodoka  yari itwaye ivyuma vyongereza amajwi vy'umugambwe CNDD-FDD  yagize isanganya ivuye i Ngozi ija i Bugendana, bikavugwa ko hoba hari abantu babiri bahasize ubuzima,n'abandi bakomeretse. Iyo myiyamamazo yatanguye ikazobandanya gushika ku wa 17 z'ukwa gatanu hasigaye iminsi itatu ngo amatora nyezina abe.

headline: Harry Kane: Jose Morinho ati Tottenham 'ntishobora gukina neza ata musatirizi'
text: Umumenyereza wa Tottenham, Jose Mourinho, avuga ko ata mukinyi ashobora gusubirira Harry Kane, kandi ko Tottenham idashobora gukina nk'uko isanzwe ikina atarimwo. Ashikirije ivyo mu gihe umurwi wiwe witeze kwakira Liverpool mu rukino rukomeye cane rwo kuri uyu wa gatandatu ruza gutangura isaha imwe n'igice z'ijoro mu masaha y'u Burundi n'u Rwanda. Uyo musatirizi wa Tottenham, Harry Kane, ntazosubira mu kibuga imbere y'ukwa kane uno mwaka, inyuma y'aho abagiwe kubera imvune yo kw'itako. Uyo musatirizi wa Tot ariwe kandi kizigenza w'u Bwongereza amaze gutsinda ibitsindo 27 mu nkino amaze gukinira Tottenham n'umurwi nserukiragihugu muri uno mwaka w'inkino. Morihno ati: "Ngize ngo mvuge menshi kuri Harry, bintera umubabaro mwinshi". "Vyombera vyiza tuganiriye ku vyotuma ntwenga". Kane yagize iyo mvune mu rukino rwayihuje na Southampton, urukino mbere yatsinzwe, hari ku munsi wa Bonane. Morinho ati: "Ico womenya coco, ni uko tudashobora gukina nk'uko dusanzwe dukina iyo Harry Kane ari kumwe natwe". "Nta mukinyi n'umwe ariho yofata ikibanza ciwe". Danny Rose yaragarutse mu myimenyerezo, eka na  Hugo Lloris na we nyene akaba ariko agaruka buke buke inyuma y'aho avunikiye inkokora mu kw'icumi kw'umwaka urangiye. Hagati aho, ibintu ntibitomoretse neza kuri kazoza k'umukinyi wo hagati, Christian Eriksen, mu gihe amasezerano yiwe n'uyo murwi azorangira mu mpera za rino higanwa ry'uno mwaka. Morinho avuga ati: "Ari nka hamwe umukuru w'umurwi [Daniel Levy] yotorera umuti ibi bibazo kugira ngo dushobore kuvyitwaramwo neza mu mezi ari imbere, ni ukuri vyoba vyiza". "Atari uko, twotegerezwa kurindira gushika mu ci kugira dutegure neza ikipe".

headline: Saido Ntibazonkiza inyuma y'igitsindo yatsinze Tanzania, Young Africans yamutwaye
text: Saido Ntibazonkiza, yahora abarizwa mu mugwi wa Vital'o, yagiriraniye amasezerano yo gukinira umugwi wa Young Africans wo muri Tanzania nk'uko iyo kipe ibimenyesha. Uwo mukinyi rurangiranwa w'imbere w'Uburundi, agiye muri uwo mugwi inyuma yo gutsinda igitego kimwe ku busa Uburundi bwatsinze Tanzania mu rukino rwa kivukanyi ku munsi w'Imana. Amasezerano hagati y'umugwi wa Young Africans na Vital'O kuri uyu mukinyi ntarashirwa ahagaragara. Saido Ntibazonkiza yaheruka gukinira Intamba mu rugamba haraciye imyaka itanu, mu rukino rwari rwabahuje n'izinga rya Morise (Maurice), aho ivyo bihugu bibiri vyari vyanganije igitego kimwe ku kindi. Muri urwo rukino rwabereye mw'izinga rya Morise, Ntibazonkiza ari kizigenza, yaragirijwe kwitwara nabi harimwo no kubuza bagenziwe gukina, bituma ahagarikwa n'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Burundi, FFB, gusubira gukinira igihugu ciwe. Umurundi Ntibazonkiza, muri Young Africans asangayo Haruna Niyonzima wo mu gihugu kibanyi c'u Rwanda, na ho nyene Saido azwi cane n'aho atahakinye. Mu 2005, yaraguzwe n'umugwi wa Rayon Sports, we na Bernard Mwarara, ariko bankirwa gikina muri uwo mugwi. Bompi ntibahawe impapuro zibarekurira gukinira Rayon Sports, ikibazo cateje impari zikomeye ico gihe hagati y'abafana ba Rayon Sports bagiriza umugwi  bakebana wa APR FC kubigiramwo uruhara. Saido Ntibazonkiza amaze gukina mu migwi myinshi mu bihugu bitandukanye mu karere, na Buraya nko muri Holande, Polonye n'Ubufaransa. Azwi mu gihugu ciwe nk'umukinyi kizigenza yagiye afasha bagenziwe bo mu mugwi nserukiragihugu mu kubafashisha intererano y'uburyo mu gihe igihugu caba cakehaniwe.

headline: Kenya – Covid-19: Umushikiranganji Kagwe avuga ko hari ikibazo c'ibura rya 'oxygen'
text: Ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu muri Kenya buvuga ko Kenya ihanganye n'ikibazo c'ibura rya 'oxygène' mu bitaro hirya no hino mu gihugu cose. Ibi vyatumwe n'ukwiyongera kw'igitigiri c'abagwayi ba Covid-19 muri iki gihe igihugu gihanganye n'ubundi bwoko bwa Covid bukaze cane - butuma benshi mu banye Kenya n'amashirahamwe yigenga batangura kwiyegereza ibintu vya nkenerwa. Ku musi wa mbere, Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu Mutahi Kagwe yavuze ko abanye Kenya babitse ibicupa vya 'oxygène' 20.000 muhira no mu mashirahamwe. Yavuze ko ivyo bicupa bikenewe cane vyihuta mu bitaro vya reta kugira barokore ubuzima bw'abantu - agatera akamo abanye Kenya kugarukana ivyo bicupa ku mahinguriro ya 'oxygen'. Yavuze ati:"Nipfuza gutera akamo abafise ivyo bicupa, vyaba ibitaro canke abantu ku giti cabo, ndabasavye mubizane ku mahinguriro kugira basubire bavyuzuze hanyuma bikoreshwe mu bitaro bibikeneye." Abakeneye 'oxygen' bamaze kwigwiza na kabiri gushika ku matoni 880 avuye ku 410 imbere y'uko ikiza coronavirus gitera, nk'uko bivugwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga. Ibura ry'ibicupa vya 'oxygen' - ubu iboneka ari nke kandi izimvye gukora mu gihe gito - ryatumye haba ibibazo mu kuyitanga mu gihugu cose. Kenya yemeza ko abantu bamaze kwandura Covid-19 barenga 130.000, abarenga 2.000 bakaba bamaze gupfa.

headline: Mary Jackson: NASA igiye kwitirira icicaro cayo umuhinga w’umwiraburekazi
text: Ikigo kijejwe ingendo zo kwiga ikirere NASA kigiye guhindura izina ry'icicaro caco kicitirire umuhinga m'umwiraburekazi wa mbere, Mary Jackson. Uwurongoye NASA Jim Bridenstine avuga ko Jackson yafashije cane mu gukuraho inzitizi ku banyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika n'abagore mu biraba ubuhinga. Amakuru ya Mary Jackson  yavuzwe mw'ireresi yasohotse mu 2016 yiswe Hidden Figures (Abantu banyegejwe).Yari yavukiye ahitwa Hampton mu ntara ya Virginia, asandaba mu 2005. Mu mwaka uheze, NASA yaritiriye ibarabara riri hanze y'ikigo cayo Hidden Figures Way. Mw'itangazo yasohoye, Bridenstine yavuze ati: "Ntibakinyegejwe, tuzobandanya kwibuka intererano y'abagore, Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika, hamwe n'abandi bantu b'amamuko yose bitanze kugira ngo ibikorwa vya NASA vyo kwiga ikirere bishoboke". "Mary W Jackson ni umwe mu murwi w'abagore bakomeye cane bafashije NASA kugira ngo ishoboze abahinga b'ikirere ba Amerika gushobora kuzunguruka mu kirere". "Mary ntiyigeze yemera ko ibintu biguma uko vyari biri, yarafashije gukuraho inzitizi arugururira inzira Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika hamwe n'abagore mu gisata c'ubuhinga". Iyo ngingo ije inyuma y'aho Abanyamerika bakubise agatima mpembero bakihweza akarenganyo Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika bakorewe kuva kera. Urupfu ruheruka rw'umwirabure George Floyd yapfiriye mu gasho k'igipolisi rwatumye haba imyiyerekano kw'isi yose basaba ko ivanguramoko riranduranwa n'imizi. Mu myaka ya 1940, NASA niho yatanguye guha akazi abagore b'Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika bakoreshwa nk'ico bise "inyabwonko-muntu" (Human computers), ariko bakaba bagiye bahura n'ibibazo vy'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba no ku gitsina. Mary Jackson yahawe akazi mu 1951 n'ikigo National Advisory Committee for Aeronautics cagiye huginduka kikitwa NASA mu 1958. Yatwarwa na Dorothy Vaughan - nawe nyene yavuzwe muri ya reresi Hidden Figures - mu gisata cakoramwo abahinga mu biharuro bakoreshwa 'nk'inyabwonko-muntu' mu karere ka Langley k'intara ya Virginia. Jackson yapfuye mu 2005 akaba yararonkejwe ikidari c'inzahabu gihabwa ibihangange vy'itavye Imana. Umukobwa wiwe, Carolyn Lewis avuga ko ari iteka rinini ku muryango kubona NASA ibandanya kwibuka iragi rya Mary Jackson. Ati: "Yari umuhinga, umugiraneza, umugore, nyina w'abana akaba n'intwari yaciriye inzira abandi ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vyatumye bagira ico bashitseko, atari muri NASA gusa, ariko n'ahandi hose mu gihugu cose".

headline: Zlatan Ibrahimovic: Igishusho ciwe cakaswe izuru
text: Abantu batazwi baciye izuru ry'igishusho ca Zlatan Ibrahimovic kiri hampande y'ikibuga ca Malmo mu gihugu ciwe ca Suède. Ibrahimovic w'imyaka 38 yahoze ari umusatirizi w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Suède yatanguriye gukina mu murwi wa Malmo w'ico gihugu nyene imyaka 20 iheze. Umubumvyi yakoze ico gishusho, Peter Linde, asaba abanyagihugu guheba ubwo bwononyi. Uyo mukinyi yahoze akina mu mirwi ya Ajax, Juventus, Inter Milan, Barcelona, AC Milan, Paris St-Germain na Manchester United ariko arondera uwundi murwi yokinamwo mu gihe azoba asezeye mu murwi wa LA Galaxy mu mpera z'ihiganwa rya MLS ry'uno mwaka muri Amerika. Ku wa 27 z'ukwezi kwa 11, yavuzwe ko yaguze ibice 25% vy'umutahe w'umurwi Hammarby wo muri Suède, warangije ihiganwa uri mu kibanza ca gatatu mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru muri ico gihugu. Uwo munsi nyene, igishusho ciwe c'imetero 3.5, cari cakozwe n'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Suède carasutseko irangi maze bagiha umuriro, baca bafata igikono c'akazu ka surwumwe bakibohera ku kuboko. Eka n'inzu ya Ibrahimovic iri ku mugwa mukuru w'ico gihugu Stockholm barayisambuye, maze ku muryango w'imbere naho bacapura ko 'Yuda'.

headline: PSG Vs Istanbul: UEFA igiye gukora amatohoza ku macakubiri y'urukoba yatumye iyi mirwi iva mu kibuga
text: Urukino hagati ya Paris St-Germain na  Istanbul Basaksehir rurasubirwamwo kuri uyu wa gatatu inyuma y'aho n'ijoro ruhagarariye kubera umuhagarikiri yabwiye amajambo y'amacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba/ku ruhu, umwe mu bamenyereza b'uyu murwi wo muri Turukiya. Istanbul ivuga ko umwe mu bahagarikizi b'uru rukino, uwugira kane, Sebastian Coltescu, yabwiye ayo majambo  Pierre Webo, icegera c'umumenyereza wayo. Uyu yahoze ari umukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Kameruni Webo yahawe ikarata itukura inyuma yo guterana amajambo n'uyu muhagarikizi. Abakinyi ba Istanbul baciye basohoka mu kwerekana akababaro kabo, maze n'aba PSG na bo nyene baca barakurikira. Ibi vyabaye haciye iminota 14 gusa urukino rutanguye, nta murwi n'umwe wari bwinjize igitsindo. Uru rukino ruza gutangurira ku munota wa 14 kuri uyu wa gatatu, bikaba bitegekanijwe ko rutangura isaha imwe n'iminota 55 mu masaha y'Urwanda n'Uburundi (19h55). Ruza kuba ruhagarikiwe n'abahagarikizi bashasha, Danny Makkelie wo mu Buholande, niwe aza kuba ari umuhagarikizi mukuru. Mugenziwe Mario Diks na Marcin Boniek akomoka muri Pologne ni bo baza kuba abafasha biwe bo ku ruhande, na yo uwundi na we nyene akomoka muri Pologne, Bartosch Frankowsky, akaba aza kuba umuhagarikizi agira kane. PSG yoyo yamaze gushika mu gice c'umunani gishira ica nyuma, inyuma y'aho Manchester United itsindiwe na RB Leipzig 3-2. Mw'itangazo ryaryo, ishirahamwe rijejwe umupira w'amaguru i Buraya, UEFA, rivuga riti: "Uefa yafashe ingingo idasanzwe - imaze kuvugana n'iyi migwi yompi - ko iminota isigaye ikinwa kuri uyu wa gatatu n'abahagarikizi bashasha. "Amatohoza yimbitse ku vyabaye ategerezwa gutangura ubu nyene". Umukinyi w'imbere wa Istanbul, Demba Ba, yari ku ntebe y'abasubirizi, yabonetse ari inyuma y'ikibuga abaza uyu muhagarikizi ati: "Kubera iki, mu kuvuga ngo uyu mwirabure, ubikuye kuki kuvuga ngo uyu mwirabure?" Ireresi yerekanye umukinyi w'inyuma wa PSG Presnel Kimpembe avuga ati: "Ubwo arakomeye? Turigiriye. Turigiriye. Ni uko nyene, turigiriye". Haciye ikiringo c'amasaha abiri urukino rwahagaze, imbere y'uko umuhagarikizi amenyesha ko rudashobora kurangira n'ijoro ku wa kabiri. Muri uwo mwanya wose, abakinyi ba PSG bagumye bishusha mu cumba bahinduriramwo impuzi barindiriye ko urukino rusubira gutangura, ariko abo bahiganwa bobo ntibigeze basubira kuboneka. Mu nyuma, umukinyi w'imbere wa PSG Kylian Mbappe yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Twiyamirize amacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba. Webo turi kumwe nawe". Recep Tayyip Erdogan, umukuru w'igihugu ca Turukiya, avuga ko yizeye ko Uefa" ishobora gufata ingingo zikenewe". Yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Turiyamirije twivuye inyuma amacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba n'ikumira mu nkino, co kimwe no mu bindi bisata vy'ubuzima".

headline: Lil Uzi Vert: Umuririmvyi wo muri Amerika yihomye mu gahanga diyama ya miliyoni 24 $
text: Umuririmvyi wo muri Amerika Lil Uzi Vert yavuzweko vyinshi ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi inyuma yo gukoresha amadolari imiliyoni 24 mu kugura ubutare bupima kara 11 yahomye kuruhanga rwiwe. Inkuru zitangwa na BBC igisata ca Pidgin, zivuga ko yaguze ubwo butare mu nzu y'ubudandarizo ya Elliot Eliante ku madolari imiliyoni 24. Lil Uzi Vert yatumye haba amajambo menshi y'abakunzi biwe kw'isi yose igihe yerekana video y'ingene ubu asa, agaca anandika ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi ya Instagram ngo " Ubwiza burababaza" (Beauty is Pain). Izina nyaryo rya Lil Uzi Vert ni Symere Bysil Woods, umuririmvyi wo muri Amerika w'umudiho wa Rap, akaba n'umwanditsi w'indirimbo. Yavutse itariki 31 mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 1994 mu buraruko bwa Philadelphia i Francisville muri Amerika. Ikintu gituma uwo muririmvyi atandukana n'abandi, n'ibicapo afise ku mubiri (Tatoo), n'ingene yagiye aritobora mu maso, ingene agenda ahindura uko yisokoza n'inyambaro ya kera. Lil Uzi yamenyekanye cane inyuma yo gushira ahabona ururirimbo rwiwe rwa Luv is Rage mu mwaka wa 2015. Izindi ndirimbo zatumye aba rurangiranwa ni nk'ururirimbo rwiwe  Money Longer yaririmvye mu 2016, You was Right, Gucci Mane, Bad na Bouje iza mu kibanza ca 100 kuri Billboard muri Amerika hamwe na Tour Life rwatumye ahabwa agashimwe ka MTV k'ururirimbo rwa mbere mu gihe c'ubushuhe. Bivugwa ko uwo muririmvyi yoba afise ubutunzi bushika ku miliyoni 16 z'amadolari, ariko ko hagati y'umwaka wa 2017 na 2018 yoba yararonse imiliyoni 20 avuye mu ndirimbo aririmbira ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi hamwe n'ibiteramo vyiwe.

headline: Ronaldinho abandanya apfunzwe muri Paraguay yagirizwa gukoresha impapuro za magendo
text: Ronaldinho yahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Brezili hamwe na mwenewabo ejo ku wa gatandatu bahavuye barengukishwa imbere ya sentare  bagirizwa ko binjiye muri Paraguay bakoreshejeje impapuro za magendo. Abashikirizamanza bavuga ko Ronaldinho na mwenewabo bahawe impapuro za magendo mu gihe bari bashitse ku mugwa mukuru w'ico gihugu Asuncion ku wa gatatu. Abo bagabo babiri batawe muri yopmi ku wa gatanu, haciye amasaha makeya umucamanza yanse igisabo c'umushikirizamanza yari yasavye ko bohabwa ikindi gihano. Uyo mushikirizamanza yasa n'uwubavugira, aho yabwiye sentare ko abo bagabo bavukana bahenzwe. Nabo nyene barahakana ivyo bagirizwa. Muri sentare ejo ku wa gatandatu ku mugwa mukuru Asuncion, umucamanza yategetse ko Ronaldinho na mwene wabo Roberto Assis, bashirwa mw'ibohero mu kurindira ku urubanza rucibwa. Mu kw'indwi 2019, bivugwa ko uyo mukinyi yafatiwe impapuro z'inzira za Brezili na Espanye ahorwa ko hari amakori atari yarishe, hamwe n'amande yari yaciwe kubera inzu yubatse bidaciye mu mategeko. Ku wa gatatu, umushikiranganji w'ubutegetsi bw'igihugu, Euclides Acevedo, yabwiye ibinyamakuru vyo muri Paraguay ati: "Ndubaha igihagararo n'ingene akundwa n'abantu benshi muvyo inkino, ariko itegeko ritegerezwa kwubahirizwa. Itegeko ritegerezwa gukurikizwa, ata kuraba ngo uri uyu canke uriya". Ronaldinho w'imyaka 39 yari yagiye muri ico gihugu ca Paraguay mu ntumbero yo kumenyekanisha igitabo no mw'isekekeza ryo gufasha abana bantahonikora. Mu 2004 na 2005, Ronaldinho yaratsindiye ikibanza c'umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi mu gihe yakinira umurwi Barcelona wo muri Espanye. Mu 2002, yatsindiye igikombe c'isi c'umupira w'amaguru catwawe na Brezili, ari kumwe n'ibihangange bagenziwe Ronaldo na Rivaldo. Umutungo wa Ronaldinho uharurwa hagati y'imiliyoni 100  na 130 y'amadolari y'abanyamerika, mu gihe bivugwa ko iyo hagize uwukoresha izina ryiwe incuro imwe gusa ku rubuga rwa Instagram ategerezwa kumuriha hafi ibihumbi 195 vy'amadolari y'abanyamerika.

headline: Bujumbura: Abatwara moto, tuk-tuk n'amakinga bongewe iminsi
text: Abakora akazi ko kwunguruza abantu kuri moto, amakinga canke tuk-tuk mu gisagara ca Bujumbura mu Burundi bongewe ikiringo mu gihe itegeko ribabuza kuja mu bice bimwe vy'umuji ryagomba kuja mungiro kuri uyu wa 11 ukwezi kwa gatatu. Abajejwe intwaro mu Burundi bari batanze itariki yo gushika  kuri uyu wa gatanu ngo abanyonga ivyo vyuma ntibasubire kubicisha mu gice kinini c'umuji wa Bujumbura. Kiretse abanyonga ivyo vyuma babicisha amafaranga,  iryo tegeko ryaraba n'amakinga na moto vy'abiyunguruza ku giti cabo kiretse gusa moto ziriko imparati za leta. Ariko mu butumwa bwagaragaye ku rubuga twitter  ku wa kane ku muguroba, Mairie ya Bujumbura yatangaje  y'uko abatwara ivyo vyuma bahawe igihe c'ukudohorerwa. Ico gihe bahawe ni ico gushika itariki 21 Ntwarane (ukwa gatatu), ico kiringo ngo "kikazokoreshwa mu kwandika abatwara ivyo vyuma". Ubwo butumwa bwo kuri twitter kandi bunavuga yuko hafashwe ingingo yo kwugurura vya vyumba vyo kwiyubikira canke kwiyuka bita sauna hamwe n'umuziki w'ikibiriraho uzwi nka karaoke ngo kuko "ikiza ca Covi-19 cagabanutse bimwe biboneka." Mu gufata ingingo yo kubuza ivyo vyuma gushika mu gice kinini c'igisagara ca Bujumbura, ubushikiranganji bujejwe umutekano bwavuga ko ari ingingo yo kurinda umutekano w'abakoresha amabarabara bose. Ariko abo batwara ivyo vyuma bakavuga yuko ubuzima bugiye kugorana cane kuri bo, co kimwe no ku bavyikorako bibashikana hirya no hino mu gisagara mu buryo bworoshe. Kuva leta itangaje ko iyo ngingo izoja mu ngiro itariki 11/03/2022, hari haheze iminsi haba amanama yo gusigurira abo ingingo igiye gukorako igituma yafashwe n'akamaro kayo. Ariko bobo bavuga yuko abafahe iyo ngingo bari kubanza kubibamenyesha imbere yuko ifatwa bakagira ico bayivuzeko. Jado Nzitunga, umuyobozi w'ishirahamwe ry'abagendesha moto zunguruza abantu mu gisagara ca Bujumbura yabwiye BBC ko batagishijwe inama. Yagize ati: "Igihe iyo 'equipe technique' yabikora, yaba twebwe dusanzwe turongoye amashirahamwe, yaba abasanzwe biyunguruza kuri ayo mapikipiki, yaba abagendesha ayo mapikipiki n'ayo mabajaji, nta n'umwe bigeze barondera   kugira bicare hamwe barabe iyo ngingo, iciza canke ingaruka zayo". Ariko mu bushikiranganji bujejwe umutekano, bo bafashe iyo ngingo, bavuga yuko leta mu gufata icemezo kiraba ineza y'abanyagihugu iba yavyize neza. Umuvugizi w'igipolisi gikorera muri ubwo bushikiranganji, Désiré Nduwimana, yagize ati: "Ubutegetsi iyo bubona yuko hariho ikiriko kirononekara, mu kuramira abenegihugu ntubanza kubabaza ati mbega bigende gute. "Ugomba kugirira umutekano abantu ubakorera ibikenewe ntubanza kubagisha inama." Désiré Nduwimana abandaniya avuga yuko amasanganya mu mabarabara ya Bujumbura yari amaze kuba umurengera, kandi ko ivyo vyuma vy'amakinga, moto na bajaji canke tuk-tuk bibifisemwo uruhara runini. Hagati aho, abagendesha ivyo vyuma bagiye gukorwako n'iyi ngingo bavuga yuko amasanganya adatezwa gusa nabo, ko hari ikibazo c'amabarabara atameze neza hamwe n'ivyapa bibuze canke bitakigaragara neza. Uyu mukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'abagendesha amapikipiki yunguruza abantu i Bujumbura avuga yuko ingaruka zigiye kuba nyishi cane. Jado Nzitunga yagize ati: "... mw'ishirahame ryacu ngaha i Bujumbura hari amamoto ari hagati y'ibihumbi bine n'ibihumbi bitanu, urumva ayo yari asanzwe atunze imiryango. "Ugasanga hari n'igihombo kizoba kuri aba basanzwe bafise amazu y'ama restaurant hamwe bafungurira, ndetse n'abo bantu bose bahora bayikorako bafise amikoro make bizobagora." Ku mbuga hwaniro haragaragaye amasanamu y'abatanguye kujana mu yindi mihingo y'igihugu ivyo vyuma vyabo, mu gutinya ko babibaka ingingo niyamara kuja mu ngiro. Kwiyunguruza na moto, ikinga canke tuk-tuk vyari bimaze  kumenyerwa cane, kandi naho koko ayo masanganya aba, benshi bashima ivyo vyuma kubera ukuzimbuka hamwe no gushika aho baja banyarutse kurusha imiduga.

headline: DR Congo-M23: Umuriro wongeye kwaka
text: Intambara yongeye kwaduka hagati y'ingabo za reta ya Repuburika ya Demokrasi ya Congo n'izo umugwi witwaje ibigwanisho wa M23, iminsi ibiri gusa abategetsi ba Congo n'Urwanda bahuriye i Luanda muri Angola mu nama yo guhosha iyo ntambara. Muri iyo nama bahujwe n'umukuru wa Angola João Lourenço , prezida Paul Kagame na prezida  Félix Tshisekedi  basavye ko haba guhagarika  kurwana n'uko ubwo nyene M23 iva mu birindiro yafashe ubu vuba mu buseruko bwa Congo. Congo n'Urwanda birabana ribi kuva M23 isubiye kurwana n'ingabo za reta muri aya mezi makeya aheze. Congo yagiriza Urwanda gushigikira umugwi M23 ariko Urwanda rukabihakana. Urwanda na rwo rwagiriza ingabo za Congo, FARDC, n'iza ONU zo mu rwego rwa Monusco gukorana n'abagwanyi bo mu mugwi FDLR usanzwe ugwanya reta y'Urwanda. Icuka hagati y'ivyo bihugu carabaye kibi gushika aho Congo ifata ingingo zirimwo kubuza kompanyi y'indege y'u Rwanda,  Rwandair,  gusubira kuja muri Congo. Inama ya Luanda umukuru wa Angola, João Lourenço,  yari yayitumyeko ngo hahoshwe ico cuka hongere haronderwe inyishu kuri iyo ntambara. Amakuru ava muri ONU avuga ko M23 yateye ku wa kane ibirindiro vy'ingabo za reta ahitwa Kanyabusoro, ku birometero bitanu uvuye ku makambi ya gisirikare ya Rumangabo na Kazuba. Umunyamakuru ari muri ako karere avuga ko intambara zakomeje kandi ku wa gatanu mu gitondo ahitwa Rusenge , ku  10km uvuye kw'ibarabara rikuru rija mu gisagara ca Goma. Abantu benshi bahunze ingo zabo. Kuri twitter, umushikiranganji w'Urwanda ajejwe imigenderanire, Vincent Biruta, yanditse ko amakuru atari yo no kwiyerekana neza imbere y'abanyagihugu bibangamira utwigoro two kurondera amahoro muri Congo n'akarere. Yatomoye ko mu nama yahuje abakuru b'ibihugu bitatu i Luanda ku wa gatatu  ata masezerano canke kwumvikana guhagarika intambara vyigeze bishikwako. Muri iyo nama, abakuru b'Urwanda na Congo bumvikanye ku bikeneye gukorwa kugira hahoshwe ico cuka kibi hanyuma abahunze bashobore gusubira iwabo. Avuga kuri iyo nama ya Luanda, umuvugizi wa M23 yabwiye BBC ko ivyo biganiro bitazorangiza intambara mu buseruko bwa Congo. Mu kwezi guheze, intumwa idasanzwe ya ONU muri Congo, Bintou Keita, yagabishije ko umugwi M23 uriko uraba nk'igisirikare gisanzwe, ko usigaye ufise ibigwanisho bikomeye kandi ko ushobora kugeramira ingabo za ONU ziri aho muri Congo kugarukana amahoro no gufasha gukingira abanyagihugu basanzwe.

headline: Gloria Estefan avuga ko yakorewe ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina afise imyaka icenda
text: Umuririmvyi Gloria Estefan yanyeguruye ko yahohotewe bishingiye ku gitsina n'umuntu wo mu muryango igihe yari afise imyaka icenda. Uwo muririmvyi w'amamamuko ya Cuba na Amerika  w'imyaka 64 avuga ko yashurashujwe ari kw'ishure ry'umuziki n'umuntu nyina yizera. Yavuze ko "93% y'abana  bahohoterwa bazi kandi baba bizeye ababibakorera. Kandi ivyo ndabizi kuko nari umwe muri abo." Yavuze kuri iryo hohoterwa ubwa mbere mu kiganiro co kuri Facebook Watch  ari kumwe n'umukobwa wiwe akuze n'umukobwa w'uwo bavukana. Clare Crawley azwi mu biganiro vyo kuri television nawe nyene yagaragaye mu kiganiro Red Table Talk: The Estefans, nawe avuga ingene yashurashujwe n'umupatiri. Madame Crawley yavuze ko yashurashujwe "n'umujenama'' igihe yiga kw'ishure rya Katolika. Madame Estefan yamubwiye ati: "Nashaka kuvuga iki kibazo kuko birakenewe cane ko cokwirindwa. Kandi sinashaka kwicara ngaha ataco mvuze nawe uriko uratubwira ivyagushikiye kandi mu butwari". Madame Estafan yaririmvye indirimbo zizwi cane nka Conga na Rythm is Gonna Get You, yavugiye muri ico kiganiro ko incuti itari iya hafi yafatiye ku kwizerwa nyina yari ayifitiye kugira imushurashuze. Umukobwa w'uwo bavukana, Lili, w'imyaka 54 yaciye yishura uwo muririmvyi ati: "Waindiriye  uwu mwanya igihe kirekire". Yavuze ati: "Yari incuti, ariko atari iya hafi. Yari afise ububasha kuko mama yari yanshize mw'ishure ryiwe ry'umuziki aca atangura kumubwira buno nyene ingene nari mfise impano nyinshi n'uko nari nkeneye kwitabwaho bidasanzwe, nca ntangura kwumva ingene yari amahirwe kubona anyitaho gutyo." Madame Estafan , yavukiye muri Cuba hanyuma akimukira Miami n'umuryango wiwe akiri umwana w'igitambambuga, yavuze ko iryo hohoterwa ryatanguye  "buke buke hanyuma birihuta". 'Igihe kibangamye' Uwo muririmvyi amaze gutwara agashimwe ka Grammy Award gatatu yavuze ko yabona ko ari "mu gihe "kibangamye" ariko atashobora kwishitura uwo mugabo. "Naramubwiye, 'Ibi ntibibaho, ntushubora gukora ibintu nk'ibi.' Nawe agaca avuga: 'So ari muri Vietnam, nyoko ari wenyene kandi nzoca ndamwica hamwe womubwira." "Nari inzi ko uwo mugabo ari igipfu nico gituma nibaza ko vy'ukuri yashobora kugirira nabi mama." Yavuze ko ayo maganya yatumye atakaza ibice vy'umushatsi , ariko araruha arabwira nyina ivyariko biraba. N'ubwo nyima yabibwiye igiporisi, yagiriwe inama yo kudashingisha urubanza kuko yari "kurushirizaho guhahamurwa no kuja guhagarara  imbere ya sentare kuvuga ivyamushikiye".

headline: Omicron: Ubwongereza bwisubiyeko bwemerera ingenzi zo muri Afrika kwinjira
text: Ubwongereza bwakuye ibihugu 11 vyo muri Afrika ku rutonde rutukura, ibintu vyari bibangamiye cane ingendo hagati y'ivyo bihugu na UK. Abongereza gusa canke abo muri Irlande canke abafise uruhusha rwo kuba mu Bwongereza nibo gusa bari bemerewe kwinjira mu gihugu. Ukwo gukumira kwashizweko mu kwezi guheze kugira hagabanywe ukwiyongera kw'ubwoko Omicron bwa Covid-19. Bamwe mu bavyiyamirije bavuze ko iyo ngingo ari "mvangura-rukoba" kuko ibihugu vyo muri Afrika gusa ari vyo vyari kuri urwo rutonde rutukura. Mu ntango ibihugu vyose vyari ivyo mu bumanuko bwa Afrika, birimwo Afrika y'epfo na Botswana aho Omicron yatowe ubwa mbere, ariko na Nigeria yaje kwongerwako mu nyuma. Ivyo bihugu 11 ni: Angola Botswana Eswatini Lesotho Malawi Mozambike Namibia Nigeria Afrika y'epfo Zambia Zimbabwe Guhagarika ingingo yo kubikumira biraja mu ngiro kuwa gatatu itariki 15/12/2021 saa 04:00 GMT (06:00 mu Rwanda no mu Burundi). Mu gukurako iyo ngingo umushikiranganji w'Ubwongereza ajejwe amagara, Sajid Javid, yabwiye inama nshingamateka ati: "Mu gihe ubu hamaze gutangura kwanduzanya Omicron hagati mu Bwongereza kandi Omicron ikaba imaze gukwira hose mu gihugu, urutonde rutukura nta kamaro rugifise mu kugabanya Omicron yoza ivuye hanze".

headline: Antonio Guterres wa ONU yemeye gushigikira igisirikare ca DR Congo
text: Umunyamabanga mukuru w'ishirahamwe ONU yemeye ko iryo shirahamwe rizobandanya gufasha igisirikare ca Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo mu ntambara yo kurwanya imirwi irwanya ubutegetsi. Mu rugendo rwiwe  ejo ku wa Mungu mu gisagara ca Beni kiri mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu, Antonio Guterres yamenyesheje ko ari nkenerwa ko ibitero vy'ukurwanya imirwi irwanya ubutegetsi bibandanya. Inteko mpuzamakungu zigera ku 16,000 ziri muri ico gihugu (MONUSCO), kikaba ari gitigiri kinini c'ingabo za ONU kw'isi. Amafaranga zikoresha ku mwaka arenga n'umuliyaridi w'amadolari. Bwana Guterres yemeye ko ingabo za ONU zizokorana n'igisirikare be n'igipolisi vya Congo. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC akorera muri ico gihugu avuga ko abanyagihugu bo mu karere k'ubuseruko bw'ico gihugu bidoga bavuga izo ngabo ataco zimaze. Izo ngabo zimaze imyaka irenga 20 muri ico gihugu, ariko ubukozi bw'ikibi burabandanya. Asubirwamwo n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP, bwana Guterres avuga ati: "Tuzokora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo duhagarike uruhagarara". Umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU yarashitse no mu karere ka Mangina aho ikiza ca Ebola catanguriye, haciye umwaka. Umutekano muke muri ako karere watumye igikorwa c'uguhangana n'umugera wa Ebola kibangamirwa, mu gihe ukutamenya kw'abanyagihugu ku vyerekeye uwo mugera kwatumye utwigoro tw'ukurwanya ikwiragira ryawo ataho dushika. Abashika 2000 baramaze guhitanwa n'iyo ndwara. Bwana Guterres yaragendeye ikigo kivura abafashwe n'iyo ndwara, aho yabahimirije ko abafashwe bokwihutira kwa muganga aho kwinyegeza.

headline: Covid-19: Amerika ihanura kwirinda kuja muri 80% vy'ibihugu
text: Ubushikiranganji bujejwe imigenderanire muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bugiye guha inama Abanyamerika yo kwirinda 80% vy'ibihugu vyo kw'isi kubera ikiza ca coronavírus. Mu rwandiko rugenewe ibimenyeshamakuru ku mpanuro zijanye n'igihe ku vyerekeye ingendo hanze, ubwo bushikiranganji bwavuze ko ico kiza gikomeje ''gutera ingeramizi zitari bwigere zibaho ku bantu bafata ingendo". Gushika ubu impanuro yo kwirinda ibihugu bimwe bimwe  yari yerekeye ibihugu 34 ku bihugu 200. Covid-19 ubu imaze kwica abantu barenga miriyoni 3 kw'isi - abarenga ica kabiri c'umuriyoni muri abo bakaba ari abo muri Amerika. Ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi (OMS) ryagabishije ko isi iriko ''iregereza urugero rwa mbere runini rwo kwandura" gushika ubu, n'ubwo hatangujwe umugambi w'isi wo gutanga incanco. Ubuhindi - muri iki gihe bwugarijwe n'umurindi ugira kabiri - bugiye gutangura gutanga urucanco ku bantu bose barenza imyaka 18 mu ntumbero yo guhagarika  ukwiyongera kw'ibitigiri vy'abandura. Ubushikiranganji bwa Amerika bujejwe imigenderanire buvuga ko ingingo yo gusubiramwo iyo nama yabwo ari ukugira bujane n'iyigirwa n'ibigo vyo kurwanya no kugenzura indwara (CDC) ''bitavuze ko ari  ugusubiramwo kuraba ingene ibintu vyifashe mu bijanye n'amagara y'abantu  mu gihugu kanaka". Ariko, buvuga ko iyi ngingo "izotuma hiyongera ibihugu biri ku rugero rwa 4 (Level4): Do Not Travel (ntimufate ingendo),  kuri hafi 80% vy'ibihugu vyo kw'isi". Ibibanza bitatu vyonyene kw'isi ni vyo bifatwa nk'ibiri hasi cane y'ibindi ku ngero zine z'ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire - "Mwiyubare bisanzwe". Ni Macau, Taiwan na Nouvelle Zelande. Na ho na Antarctic iri ku rugero rwa kabiri -Mwiyubare cane" - mu gihe Ubwongereza buri ku rugero rwa gatatu- "Subiramwo umugambi wanyu w'urugendo" - hakongerako kwongereza kwiyubara kubera igishobora gushika bivuye kw'iterabwoba. CDC zigira inama abanyamerika kwirinda kugira ingendo hagati mu gihugu gushika bahejeje kuronka incanco zose, zikanagabisha ko ingendo mpuzamakungu zongereza ukugeramirwa no ku baba baracandazwe. N'ubwo hari  incanco miriyoni 860 za coronavirus zimaze guterwa mu bihugu 165 kw'isi, ibihugu vyinshi biracahanzwe no gushobora guhagarika  ukwiyongera kw'abandura uwo mugera. Brezil imaze gufata ikibanza ca gatatu ku bantu benshi banduye, na ho ku bantu 368.749, ikaza ubugira kabiri ku bantu benshi bamaze gupfa. Canada na yo  muri iyi misi yaragize iyongerekana ry'abandura, na yo Papouasie Nouvelle Guinee ikaba igihugu giteye impungenge. Mu gihe ibihugu -  nk'Ubwongereza  na Israel- bimaze guha incanco abanyagihugu bavyo benshi, ibindi bihugu vyinshi biracarindiriye incanco vyatumyeko ko zishika. Ivyo bituma haba ukugabisha  kw'iyongerekana ry'ubusumbasumbane mu kwicandagisha - incanco zidasabikanywa neza hagati y'ibihugu bitunze n'ibikenye.

headline: Madagascar: umuti Covid-Organics w'umukuru w'ico gihugu nturashobora guhagarika Covid-19
text: Ibitaro vyo muri Madagascar bivuga ko biriko birarengerwa n'ibitigiri vyabandura Covid-19, mu gihe umukuru w'ico gihugu wewe abandanya ahimiriza umuti utaremezwa, avuga ko ushobora gukiza iyo ndwara, n'aho ishami rijejwe amagara kw'isi OMS rigabisha kw'ikoreshwa ry'imiti itaremezwa. Ibitigiri vy'abandura coronavirus vyaraduze incuro zine mu kwezi guheze muri ico gihugu co mw'ibahari Indiano, aho abarenga 13.000 banduye, abarenga 162 nabo barapfa kubera coronavirus yakwiragiye mu ntara zose kiretse imwe gusa. N'aho ivyo bitigiri bigenda biduga, umukuru w'igihugu Andry Rajoelina abandanya yizigiye uwo muti ukozwe mu biti kama wiswe Covid-Organics, umuti watanguye gukwiragizea mu kwa kane. Uhingurwa n'ikigo ca Madagascar kijejwe ubushakashatsi mu giterwa citwa artémisia - igiti gisanzwe gihingurwamwo imiti ya malaria- hamwe n'ibindi biti vyo muri Madagascar. Ni ikinyobwa kiriko kiradandazwa nk'umuti wo kuvura no gukinga - mu gihe kuva amezi ane aheze gihabwa abana mu mashure. Mu ntango za kuno kwezi igihe yariko atanga imfashanyo igizwe n'umuceri, amavuta, isukari n'ibindi nkenerwa kuri ba ntahonikora ku mugwa mukuru Antananarivo, umukuru w'ico gihugu yaboneyeho no kubaha uwo muti, Covid-Organics. Yaraneguwe bikomeye igihe yakoranya abanyagihugu mu gihe igihugu cari mu ngingo za guma mu rugo, ariko wewe akaba yabandanije afise icizere aho avuga ati: " Iki kiza ntikizokwamaho, tuzoruhira kugitsinda". Yavuze kandi ko ibitigiri vy'abandura bitari umurengera mu burere bw'igisagara bwari buherutse kuronswa uwo muti ku buntu. Ishirahamwe OMS rivuga ko ryakiriza yompi utwigoro two kuvura iyo ndwara hakoreshejwe uburyo kama, ariko rigasaba ivyemezo bivuye mu bushakashatsi imbere y'uko imiti kama ikoreshwa. Gushika ubu nta nyishu ziratangwa ku bipimo vyakozwe, ariko ico nticabujije ko uwo muti uhabwa ibihugu biharurwa muri mirongo vya Afrika. Leta ya Madagascar yoyo ibandanya yishigikira imbere y'abayinegura, haba mu gihugu canke mu makungu. Rinah Rakotomanga ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu ati: "Si uko dufise udukingirizo ko twoca twijajara imbere ya SIDA kandi ntibivuga ngo SIDA yaraheze! Nico kimwe". "Abenshi mu bafashe uwo muti ata zindi ndwara z'ivyuririzi bafise barakize neza, turishimiye uwo muti. Ni mu mico yacu gukoresha imiti kama nk'iyi. Mu gihe bigenda neza, nta bindi vyo kugerageza uwu muti bikenewe". Hagati aho, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu burinengesera, bugahanura ibitaro guha uwo muti aberekana ibimenyetso bito bito kandi ata zindi ndwara basanzwe bafise nk'igisukari. Ni ngombwa kandi ko n'abarwaye babanza kuvyemera. N'aho umukuru w'ico gihugu wewe yerekana ko afise ivyizigiro, abapfa bahitanywe na coronavirus bama bapfa umunsi ku munsi. Mu kwezi guheze, umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu yarateye akamo amakungu ngo abafashishe ibikoresho, kuko yari afise amakenga ko ibitaro vyariko birarengerwa, ivyatumye ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu bimugabisha. Mu nyuma y'aho, ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bwaciye butera akamo ko kurondera abaganga n'abaforoma bofata mu mugongo ikigo co kuvura uwo mugera kiri ku kibuga ca  Mahamasina i Antananarivo. Ico kigo cuguruwe mu ntango z'uku kwezi kikaba kimaze kwakira abarwaye batari bake. Bimwe mu bitaro vyarengewe n'abarwayi ni ibitaro vya kaminuza vya Andohatapenaka i Antananarivo - vyakira indembe gusa za coronavirus cane cane abanduye basanzwe bafise n'izindi ndwara. Ishirahamwe rihurikiyemwo abaforoma n'abakirizi rivuga ko akakozi bo mu gisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu baharurwa muri mirongo banduye Covid-19. Ubwo bwoba bwagiye kwiyongera igihe leta ihagarikiye ingingo za guma mu rugo zari zimaze amezi atanu mu ntara ya Analamanga, isanzwe irimwo umugwa mukuru. Mw'ijambo ryiwe yashikirije kuri televiziyo y'ico gihugu, umukuru w'igihugu Rajoelina yavuze ko izo ngingo zitari kubandanya kuko zifise ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'abanyagihugu. Yavuze ko iyi ndwara yari yahagaritswe kandi ko abandura bagabanutse ku mugwa mukuru. Hagati aho, intara ya Analamanga iriziziwe cane n'iki kiza kandi kibandanya gikwirakwira mu zindi ntara z'iryo zinga.

headline: Ethiopia: Reta isaba abakukuruke gusubira mu gisirikare kugira bafashe kurwanya inyeshamba za Tigray
text: Igisirikare ca Ethiopia gitera akamo abakukuruke gusubira kwinjira mu gisirikare, mu gihe kiri mu rugamba rwo guhagarika inyeshamba. Aka kamo gatewe mu gihe inyeshamba z'umuhari Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) zitera zisugereza umugwa mukuru Addis Ababa. Ibiro vy'ubuserukizi bwa Amerika butera akamo abanyagihugu ba Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kuva muri Ethiopia vuba bwango mu gihe ibijanye n'umutekano mu gihugu bitera biyangara. Amasaha make imbere y'aha, imirwi icenda yose irwanya reta yari yatangaje ko yishize hamwe kugira ngo isambure ubutegetsi bw'umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed. Reta yoyo itangaza ko izobandanya kwigwanira. Iyi ntambara yinjiye mu mwaka ugira kabiri, aho imaze gutesha izabo abaharurwa mu mamiriyoni, nayo abarenga 400.000 bakaba basugerejwe na kigoyi. Muri ino ndwi, abategetsi ba reta batangaje ibihe bidasanzwe, banasaba abanyagihugu kwandikisha ibirwanisho vyabo, bababwira ko bitegurira kurwana kugira bakingire uturere babamwo. Mw'itangazo yasohoye, ibidakunze kuba, Inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano isaba impande zompi guhagarika intambara, inashimangira ko ishigikiye utwigoro tw'Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Afrika two kwumvikanisha abashamiranye. Eka n'incuti za Ethiopia zitera akamo ko guhagarika intambara. Umunyamabanga w'Ubwongereza ajejwe imigenderanire, Liz Truss, asaba impande zompi kwumvikana bagahagarika intambara, hari igihe yavugana kuri terefone n'icegera c'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia ejo ku wa gatanu. Uyu mupfasoni ati: "Narerekanye neza ko ata nyishu ivuye mu ntambara kandi ko ibiganiro ari ngombwa kugira ngo amaraso areke guseseka bongere bashike ku mahoro arama". Ku wa kane, umunyamabanga wa reta ya Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire Antony Blinken yasavye ko haba agahengwe kandi intambara igahagarara. Intumwa idasanzwe ya Amerika, Jeffrey Feltman, ari mu rugendo i Addis Ababa gufahsa kugira ngo habe umwumvikano. Imihari TPLF na Oromo Liberation Army (OLA) iri muri uru runani rushasha ruhuza inyeshamba. Avugira i  Washington, uwuserukira intara ya Tigray akaba yahoze anaserukira Ethiopia muri Amerika, Berhane Gebre-Christos, avuga ko intumbero ari ukubogoza reta ya Abiy ku nguvu canke biciye mu biganiro, hanyuma hagashingwa reta mfatakibanza. Ati: "Turiko turagerageza kugarukana ibintu mu buryo kuko bimeze nabi muri Ethiopia, biturutse ku butegetsi bw'ukwigungirako kwa Abiy". "Igihe kiriko kiramujana". Imihari OLA na TPLF yari yatanguye kurwanira hamwe, aho muri ino ndwi yatangaje ko yigaruriye igisagara ca Kemise kiri ku birometero  325 mu buraruko bw'umugwa mukuru Addis Ababa, kw'ibarabara rikuru riva i Tigray rija ku mugwa mukuru. Umwihwezo wa Anne Soy, umunyamakuru wa BBC Kubona abakukuruke batumwako ngo basubire mu gisirikare vyerekana ko reta ya Ethiopia yamaze kubona ko inyeshamba ziyigeramiye koko. Bibaye haciye umusi umwe gusa umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy asohoye ubutumwa bwo kwihagararako, avuga ko ingabo ziwe "zizokwemera gusesa amaraso yacu gushika zihamvye umwansi". Ariko iyi ngingo  irerekana ko reta itaciyemera. Yaramaze no gusaba abasivire kwirwanira. Hari utwigoro tw'amakungu two kurondera ingene umugwa mukuru utokwinjira mu ntambara. Ariko ibi bigenda biboneka ko biri kure, mu gihe impande zompi zibandanya zihaya intambara. Ariko abategetsi ba reta bobo barahakana ivyerekeye uru runani rushasha, bavuga ko ata bantu bazokwigera barushigikira.
