Kebede Desissa avugira reta yabwiye ikiganiro Newshour ca BBC ati: "Nta nguvu na nkeya bafise, niwo murwi wa mbere wa poritike muri Ethiopia ufise intege nke". Avuga ko ku rubuga ata kintu na kimwe cerekana ko inyeshamba ziriko zirasugereza umugwa mukuru. Haraciye umwaka iyi ntambara yadutse hagati y'ingabo za reta n'umugambwe TPLF wamaze imyaka mirongo wiganziye Ethiopia, ubu ukaba ari wo urongoye intara yaTigray.

headline: Coronavirus: Togo nayo yatangaje umurwayi wa mbere
text: Igihugu ca Togo kimenyesha ko hari umuntu wa mbere yapimwe agasanga yaranduye umugera ruhonyabantu, coronavirus. Mw'itangazo yasohoye nijoro, leta y'ico gihugu imenyesha ko uyo murwanyi ari umukenyezi asanzwe aba ku mugwa mukuru Lome n'umuryango wiwe. Rivuga ko uyo mukenyezi w'imyaka 42 yafashwe inyuma y'ingendo yakoze mu bihugu vya Benin, Ubudagi, Ubufaransa naTurukiya hagati y'amagenekerezo ya 22 z'ukwa kabiri na 02 z'uku kwa gatatu. Togo rero igize umunani mu bihugu vyo ku mugabane wa Afrika bimaze guterwa n'uwo  mugera, inyuma ya Nigeria, Senegal, Misiri, Algeria, Tuniziya,  Afrika y'Epfo na Cameroon. Gushika ubu, ibihugu birenga 80 biramaze guterwa n'uwo mugera watanguriye mu gisagara ca Wuhan c'intara ya Hubei mu Bushinwa. Ishami ry'ishirahamwe ONU ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, ritangaza ko ubu abamaze kwandura uwo mugera hafi 100.000, nayo abarenga 3000 bakaba bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima, benshi bakaba ari abo mu Bushinwa. Ku mugabane wa Bulaya, igihugu c'u Butaliyano nico kibangamiwe gusumba, aho abashika 4600 bamaze kuwandura, nayo abamaze gupfa bakaba bageze kuri 197. Abategetsi b'ico gihugu bavuga ko mu masaha 24  gusa aheze abantu 49 aribo bapfuye bishwe n'uwo mugera. Nayo mu Bwongereza aho abantu 164 bamaze kuwandura,  umuntu agira kabiri akaba yaraye apfuye yishwe na coronavirus.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru : Sterling, Vlahovic, Zidane, Pochettino, Rangnick, Perisic
text: Manchester City igiye kwongereza inguvu kugira ngo ishobore kugumana umukinyi wayo wo ku ruhande, umwongereza Raheem Sterling, 26, mu masezerano ashobora kumara igihe kirekire, ni mu gihe hari amakuru avuga ko ariko araronderwa na Barcelona. (Telegraph - subscription required) Paris St-Germain yagiriraniye ibiganiro na Zinedine Zidane mu gihe yitegurira igenda ry'umumenyereza wayo Mauricio Pochettino ariko araronderwa na Manchester United. (Le Parisien, via Metro) Ralf Rangnick ashobora kuba agiye kumenyereza vy'agateganyo Manchester United, ariko akaba yari yabanje kwanka amasezerano Old Trafford yashaka kumuha, imbere y'uko bumvikana ku yandi mashasha.  (Manchester Evening News) Manchester United yahambije iyindi mirwi itari mike, harimwo na Tottenham hamwe na Newcastle United, mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Fiorentina umunya Serbia Dusan Vlahovic w'imyaka 21. (Mail) Manchester United iracipfuza ko Pochettino ayibera umumenyereza kuva mu ci riza, n'aho yiteze umuzo wa Rangnick. (90 Min) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Lazio Sergej Milinkovic-Savic, 26, ariko araronderwa na Manchester United nk'uwushobora gusubirira umufaransa akina hagati Paul Pogba, 28, kuko amasezerano afitaniye na Old Trafford azorangira mu ci riza. (Fichajes - in Spanish) Barcelona iriko iraraba ko yogura umusatirizi wa Basel umunya Bresil Arthur Cabral, 23, ariko bikazoba ngombwa ko ibanza kugurisha bamwe mu bakinyi kugira ngo ishobore kumugura.  (Goal) Amasezerano umukinyi wo ku ruhande umunya-Croatia Ivan Perisic, 32, afitaniye na Inter Milan arangira mu kwa gatandatu 2022, uyu mukinyi akavuga ati "vyose birashoboka, tuzobiraba mu ndwi nkeya ziri imbere", aho yari abajijwe ku bijanye na kazoza kiwe.  (Mediaset Infinity, via Football Italia) Inter Milan irafise ivyizigiro ko umuninyi wayo wo hagati, umunya-Croatia Marcelo Brozovic, 29, azotera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha, ni mu gihe ayahari azorangira mu ci riza. (90 Min) Kuri uyu wa gatanu, vyitezwe ko umumenyereza wa AC Milan Stefano Pioli, 56, atera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha y'imyaka ibiri iri imbere ari kumwe n'uyu murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano, Serie A. (Calciomercato, via Football Italia)

headline: Ishirahamwe rya Africa rimaze kuronka miliyoni 300 z'inkingo za Covid-19
text: Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Associated Press rivvuga ko ryabwiwe n'umujenama mu kigo ca Africa co  kurwanya indwara( Africa Centers for Disease Control-CDC) ko ishirahamwe rya Africa rimaze kuronka hafi miliyoni 300 z'inkingo za Covid-19. Africa iharurwamwo miliyaridi 1.2 z'abantu. Nicaise Ndembi  yavuze muri ico kiganiro ko uwurongoye Ishirahamwe rya Africa muri iki gihe , umukuru wa Africa y'Epfo Cyril Rapahosa, vyitezwe ko abitangaza kuri uyu wa gatatu. Avuga kandi ko izo nkingo zabonetse mu buryo bwigenga bidaciye kuri Covax, umugambi w'isi wo kurwanya ikiza ca Covid-19. Gishika ubu muri Africa haharugwa abantu 3.085.009 bamaze kwandura umugera wa Covid-19 na 73.504 bamaze gupfa, nk'uko bishikirizwa na Africa CDC. Ku kigiti cavyo, ibihugu bime bimwe vya Africa bimaze kuvugana n'ibigo bihingura inkingo kugirango vyumvikane ku buguzi. Africa y'Epfo yamenyesheje ku ndwi iheze ko izoronka muri uku kwezi kwa mbere umuliyoni wa mbere w'inkingo iguze muri Serum Institute of India, ikiigo co mu Buhindi, mu kwa kabiri naho ikaronka izindi 500.000.

headline: Ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera wa Covid-19 mu bindi bihugu bine vya Africa
text: Ibihugu vya Botswana, Zambia, Gambia and Kenya bimaze kubona ko vyinjiranywe n'ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera wa Covid-19 watanguye gutorwa muri Afrika y'Epfo mu mwaka uheze nk'uko bitangazwa na OMS, ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi. "Bishoboka n'uko uwo mugera umaze gushika mu bihugu vyinshi muri Africa ariko bikaba bitaramenyekana. Turiko turakorana n'abahinga mu bigo vyiga ibipimo (laboratoires) bitandukanye  bifise ubushobozi bukwiye bwo kubona uwo mugera kugira birushirizeho gucungera." Ivyo Dr Moeti yabibwiye abamenyeshamakuru mu kiganiro yatanze mu buryo bwo kuri internet. Umuyobozi mukuru w'amagara y'abantu muri Kenya , Patrick Amoth , yabwiye BBC ko ubwo bwoko bwatowe ku bantu babiri bo muri Afrika y'Epfo bakoze urugendo muri Kenya harahese ukwezi. "Mu bipimo bisanzwe bikorwa ku muntu wese yinjiye mu gihugu, twarashoboye kubona uwo mugera mu bipimo twabafashe''. Abo bantu babiri ubu barasubiye muri Afria y'Epfo" mk'uko Dr Amoth abandanya abivuga. Afrika y'Epfo nico gihugu kigeramiwe n'iyo ndwara kurusha ibindi vyose muri Africa. Umugwi w'abashakashatsi bo muri kaminuza zitatu zo muri Africa y'Epfo ukorana n'urwego rw'igihugu ruraba ivy'indwara zandukira watoye ko incanco zihari gushika ubu zoba zidashobora gukinga kwandura ubwo bwoko bushaha.

headline: Abahunga Ukraine – ‘Uri umwirabure, genda n’amaguru’
text: Jessica Orakpo yahunze yariko yiga ubuvuzi mu burengero bwa Ukraine. “Nk'umwirabure, naranabeshe ko mfise inda. Ntaco vyababwiye”. Ashinga intahe ko wirabura, ata mahirwe uba ufise.

headline: Donald Trump ati ‘Kuva kuri Lincoln nije wa mbere nitayeho abirabure’
text: Donald Trump yongeye kuvuga ko ari we mu perezida wa Amerika amaze gukorera ivyiza vyinshi abirabure bo muri ico gihugu gusumba abandi ba perezida bose "kiretse kumbure uwundi mu perezida w'intwari wo mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika,  umuhisi Abraham Lincoln". Ni mu gihe ico gihugu gihanzwe n'imyiyerekano ikomeye inyuma y'urupfu rw'umunyamerika George Floyd, riboneka ko ryakozwe kubera yari umwirabure. Papa Francis ariyamiriza igandagurwa ry'uwo mwirabure, akavuga ko ivangura iryo ari ryo ryose ridashobora kwihanganirwa. Mu gihe anegurwa na Joe Biden ahanganye nawe, ku kungene ariko aravyifatamwo, Bwana Trump yishuye uwo mukeba wiwe w'umu democrate ko ari we mu perezida amaze kwitaho abirabure. Ku ruhande rwiwe, Bwana Biden aranegura Trump ku kungene ariko akoresha uruhagarara ruri mu gihugu mu guhimiriza abanywanyi biwe ngo bamufate mu mugongo, avuga ko "ariko akora ivyo abamushigikiye bipfuza". Bwana Trump yagiriza abo yita "abicanyi, abakora iterabwoba, abagumutsi, imihimbiri, abasuma, n'iyindi mirwi y'inkozi z'ikibi" ko ari bo bateye iyo migumuko. Uyu munsi ugize umunani muri Amerika hadutse imyiyerekano inyuma y'urupfu rw'umwirabure, George Floyd, yapfiriye mu gasho k'igipolisi inyuma y'aho asinzikarijwe ubuzima n'abapolisi. Papa Francia ariyamiriza igandagurwa rya George Floyd. Mw'ijambo yavugiye i Vaticano ku cicaro ciwe, Papa Francis yavuze ati: "Bavukanyi muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ndahagaritswe umutima n'imigumuko iri mu gihugu canyu muri ino minsi, iturutse ku rupfu rwa George Floyd". Avuga ko ariko arasengera "George Floyd hamwe n'abo bose batakaje ubuzima bwabo kubera icaha c'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba". Yongera ati: "Bagenzi, ntidushobora kwihanganira canke kurenza uruhu rw'amaso ku macakubiri n'ivangura irya ari ryo ryose, hanyuma ngo duce tuvuga ko turiko duharanira iteka rya kiremwa muntu". "Vyongeye kandi, dutegerezwa kumenya ko imigumuko igize iminsi iyo hageze ijoro ari ukwisamburirako.  Nta nyungu iri mu migumuko". Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'u Bwongereza na we nyene avuga ko "atahura cane" ishavu riri muri Amerika n'ahandi hose kw'isi biturutse ku rupfu rw'uyo munyamerika w'umwirabure . Abajijwe n'abashingamateka igituma leta y'u Bwongereza ataco yoba yarakoze,  Boris Johnson yishuye ati: "Nivyo, ubuzima bw'abirabure butegerezwa kwubahwa kandi ndatahura iryo shavu, be n'amarira yatewe n'urwo rupfu, haba muri Amerika  n'ahandi hose kw'isi, igihugu cacu kirimwo". Avuga ariko ko imyiyerekano itegerezwa gukorwa hisunzwe amategeko. Ku munsi wa Mungu, Abongereza ibihumbi n'ibihumbi barihaye abamarabara mu gisagara ca Londres mu ntumbero yo kwifatanya n'Abanyamerika muri iyo myiyerekano. Hari hategekanijwe n'iyindi kuri uyu wa gatatu isaha indwi mu masaha yo muri ico gihugu, mu ntumbero yo kwiyamiriza ikumira. Kuva iyo myiyerekano itanguye muri Amerika, abantu bashika 9.300 baramaze guhagarikwa mu gihugu cose, nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Associated Press.

headline: Umushakashatsi Mireille Kamariza yabwiye BBC ko yamye akunda kubaza ku bumenyi
text: Umushakashatsi Mireille Kamariza, akorera muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, yabwiye BBC mu kiganiro yuko yamye akunda kubaza ku bijanye n'ubumenyi.

headline: Megan Thee Stallion 'yakomeretse arashwe', bigasa nk'uko yakomeretse ku kirenge
text: Umuririmvyi wa  rap wo muri Amerika Megan Thee Stallion yavuze ko "ashima kuba akiri muzima" nyuma yo kuraswa mu kirenge, ariko nta vyinshi yavuze kuri ivyo bikomere hamwe n'uko vyagenze. Uyu muririmvi w'indirimbo ikunzwe cane Savage, yavuze ko "yagize ibikomere arashwe" kuwa Mungu kandi bikaba vyitezwe ko atora mitende. Hariho Video imwerekana bisa nk'uko ariko aravirirana ku kirenge igipolisi kimaze guhagarika imodoka irimwo n'uwundi muraperi Tory Lanez. Uwo muraperi mu nyuma yagirijwe icaha co kugendana ikirwanisho kinyegeje. Igipolisi cavuze ko umuntu umwe yagize "igikomere ku kuguru". Uwo muraperi yavukiye i Texas, mu bisanzwe yitwa Megan Pete, yagiye kw'isonga ry'abaririmvyi bakunzwe muri Amerika mu kwa gatanu kubera indirimbo yiwe Savage. Iyo ndirimbo, yabaye iyikoreshwa cane n'abaja ku rubuga TikTok, yanashitse mu kibanza ca gatatu mu Bwongereza, kubera kuyisubiramwo hakajamwo na Beyonce. Megan yanabaye umuraperi w'umugore yarushije abandi mu duhembo twa BET Awards mu kwezi guheze, arusha Cardi B, Nicki Minaj na Lizzo. Vyari vyavuzwe ko yakomeretse ku kirenge akomerekejwe n'ikimanyu c'ikirahure mu vyabereye i Holliwood Hills, Lanez yafatiwemwo. Ariko yagiye kuri Instagram ejo kuwa Gatatu avuga ko "ashaka gushira vyose ku mugaragaro". Yanditse ati "kuwa Mungu mu gitondo, nararashwe ku kirenge, kubera ububisha nakorewe mu ntumbero yo kungirira nabi". "Sinigeze mfatwa, abapolisi banjanye kwa muganga aho nabazwe kugira bankuremwo amasasu. "Ndashima cane kuba ndi muzima kandi bikaba vyitezwe ko nkira neza, ariko vyari ngombwa kuri jewe ko ntanga umuco ku vyabaye muri iryo joro ritari ryoroshe." Yanditse kandi ati: "Ibi vyambayeko vyambereye icigwa gikomeye hamwe n'umuhezagiro unyegeje. Birambabaza kuba nararinze kubabara gutya kugira menye kwikingira."

headline: Kenya: Umupasitori yishe umugore wiwe nawe aca ariyica bapfuye uburongozi bw'urusengero
text: Umupasitori wo muri Kenya yatangaje abakirisu igihe yacumita umugore wiwe nawe aca ariyica bari gusenga ejo ku wa Mungu, mu rusengero bafatanije gushinga mu gisagara ca Mombasa. Abakirisu bari muri urwo rusengero babwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko Elisha Misiko yari yicaye mu kibanza c'imbere, igihe umugore wiwe nawe, Ann Mghoi, yari kuri arutari ariko arasigura. Niho umugabo wiwe Misiko yamusangayo n'imbugita yari yanyegeje mw'ishati yari yambaye amucumita mu mugongo. Uyo mugabo n'umugore bapfa uburongozi bw'urwo rusengero rwitwa 3 G (Grounds for God's Gospel). Umwe mu bakirisu basengera muri urwo rusengero ati: "Twebwe twibaza ko cari ikintu yari agiye kumubwira, kumbe yari agiye kumucumita imbugita". Uwundi ati: "Uyu mugabo yari yarubakanye n'uyu mupfasoni arongoye uru rusengero, ariko bari barahukanye. Yari amaze kumutera ubwoba incuro nyinshi, kandi yari yanavuze ko azokora ivyo yakoze uno munsi". Ahejeje kumucumitaniho  nawe yaca yicumita mu nda, agerageza no kwikata izosi, mu gihe abakirisu bari bagiye gutabara. Uyo mugabo yaciye apfa ubwo nyene, mu gihe umugore wiwe yagiye gupfira mu bitaro. Uyo mugabo n'umugore bari baratandukanye bapfuye uburongozi bw'urusengero, aho umwe wese yashaka kuba ari we mukuru, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ikinyamakuru Daily Nation. Rwari rusigaye ruyobowe n'umugore, ivyo Pasitori Misiko, umugabo wiwe, atashaka kwumva.

headline: Burundi: Umuririmvyi Délégué Général arafunzwe kubera indirimbo yiwe "idahuje n'umuco"
text: Umuririmvyi Olegue Baraka azwi kw'izina rya Délégué Général afunzwe kuva ku wa mungu, ejo ku wa kane yerekanywe n'igipolisi c'Uburundi. Yagirizwa ivyaha vyo "gukwegera abantu mu buhumbu no guhungabanya imico y'ikirundi". Ibi bifatiye ku masanamu y'ururirimbo gw'iwe yise "Delegue General" bavuga ko rurimo ibiterasoni. Igipolisi kivuga ko kizokurikirana n'abandi bose bakinye muri iyo sanamu nk'abanyeshure nk'uko bivugwa n'ibimenyeshamakuru mu Burundi. Amakuru y'uko uyu muririmvyi afunzwe yavuzwe bwa mbere ku wa mbere w'iyi ndwi ku mbuga hwaniro. Ururirimbo rwiwe rurimwo urwaruka ruboneka nk'abanyeshure bakinira mu cumba c'ishure bambaye impuzu z'ishure. Uru ruririmbo rwasohotse mu kwezi gushize k'umunani, ubu kuri Youtube, aho rukigaragara kugeza mu gitondo uyu munsi, rumaze kurabwa inshuro zirenga 25,000. Ubwo yerekanwa n'igipolisi, uyu muririmvyi yumvikanye avuga ko asaba ikigongwe kuko yakoze iyi ndirimbo abakuru bakamubwira ko ari amakosa. Mu gihe we ayikora ngo yumva ko ibiyirimwo ari ibintu bibaho. Ku mbuga hwaniro, abantu bamwe bavuga ko uru ruririmbo nta kidasanzwe kirimwo kitabonetse mbere cotuma Olegue Baraka n'abagenzi biwe bafunzwe ubu. Abandi bavuga ko akwiriye guhanwa kuko ayo masanamu ahushanye n'imico y'ikirundi.

headline: Wagner: Kubera iki EU/UE ibabajwe n'uyu murwi w'abacangero ba Russia muri Centrafrique?
text: Muri ino ndwi, ishirahamwe ryUbumwe bwa Bulaya (UE/EU) ryarafatiye ibihano Wagner, umurwi w'abacangero b'Abarusiya wagirizwa ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu muri Centrafrique n'ahandi. UE ivuga ko itazosubira guha ivyigwa vya gisirikare ingabo za Centrafrique kubera zifitaniye ubucuti na Wagner. Muri Afrika, abarwanyi bayo bafise uruhara muri Libya, Sudan na Mozambique, kandi biragaragara ko no muri Mali basa n'abagiye gukorerayo. Izi nyeshamba ziri muri ico gihugu gufata mu mugongo Perezida Faustin-Archange Touadéra mu kurwanya inyeshamba zisanzwe zigenzura uturere turari duke tw'ico gihugu n'aho mu misi iheze ingabo za reta zateye intambwe. Iki gihugu kiri mu ndyane kuva reta ya Perezida François Bozizé itembagajwe mu 2013. Kuva ashitse ku butegetsi mu matora ya 2016, Perezida Touadéra ahanganye n'inyeshamba n'aho afashwe mu mugongo n'ingabo z'Ubufaransa n'iza ONU. Reta ya Centrafrique yemeza ko abacangero b'Abarusiya ari bo bakora gusumba. Wagner izwi ko yatanguye gukorera muri Centrafrique kuva mu 2017, inyuma y'aho Inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano yemereye Uburusiya kuja gutangayo inyigisho za gisirikare, ikongera igakuraho ibihano vyo mu 2013 ku bijanye no kwinjiza ibirwanisho muri ico gihugu. Mu kw'icumi 2017, Perezida Touadéra yaragendeye Uburusiya mu ntumbero yo gutera igikumu ku masezerano atari make na reta y'Uburusiya. Muri aya masezerano harimwo imfashanyo ya gisirikare, maze Centrafrique nayo ikemerera Uburusiya gucukura ubutare bwa diamant/diamond, inzahabu na uranium. ONU kandi yaremereye Uburusiya ko bworungika abigisha ba gisirikare 175 kugira bigishe igisirikare c'ico gihugu. N'aho Uburusiya buhakana, hariho ibirego, harimwo n'ibivugwa n'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya, ko hari isano hagati ya Wgner na Kremlin (ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu w'Uburusiya). Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko iri sano ryatumye abarwanyi b'uyu murwi wa gisirikare batangura gukorera muri Centrafrique inyuma y'aho amasezerano iki gihugu cagiriraniye n'Uburusiya atereweko igikumu. Kuva ico gihe, uyo murwi waciye winjira ku bwinshi muri ico gihugu gitunze ubutare bwinshi. Reta y'Uburusiya ivuga ko yarungitse abigisha ba gisirikare badafise ibirwanisho muri Centrafrique, kandi ko ata gihe na kimwe bigeze barenga 550. Hagati aho, abahinga ba ONU, bemeza ko Uburusiya bushobora kuba bwarungitse muri Centrafrique abigisha barenga 2000, harimwo n'abavuye muri Syria na Libya, aho Wagner isanzwe ikorera. Ibi biteye impungenge zidasanzwe ONU n'Ubufaransa, vyompi vyagirije uyu murwi gukokeza indyane mu guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu n'ubwicanyi ndengerabutungane ku biketswe ko ari inyeshamba. ONU hamwe n'Ubufaransa bivuga ko abarwanyi ba Wagner, co kimwe n'ingabo za reta, bafata ku nguvu, bakanyaga urukombamazi abasivire badafise ibirwanisho mu turere two mu misozi. Mu cegeranyo co mu kwa munani  ku bijanye n'ihohotera ry'agateka ka zina muntu muri Centrafrique, ishirahamwe ONU ryaharuye ubukozi bw'ikibi burenga 500 bwakozwe mu mwaka umwe, kuva mu kw'indwi 2020. Muri bwo harimwo ubwicanyi ndengerabutungane, iyicarubozo n'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina. Mu kw'icumi, umurwi w'abahinga ba ONU wavuze ko abahagaritswe n'aba bigisha b'Abarusiya hamwe n'igisirikare c'igihugu akenshi ata burenganzira bahabwa bwo kuburana. Bavuga ko abakorewe ayo mabi batubahuka kwitwara, ibi bigasigura ko aya mabi yabandanije ata camira. Mu ntango z'uko kwezi nyene, umushikiranganji w'ubutungane wa Centrafrique, Arnaud Abazene, yaremeye, ku ncuro ya mbere, ko hari  ihohoterwa ryakozwe "n'abigisha b'Abarusiya". N'aho yavuze ko menshi muri aya mabi yakozwe n'inyeshamba, bwari bwo bwa mbere reta yemeye ko hari amabi yakozwe n'ingabo zayo n'abo bafatanije ibikorwa. Umushikiranganji Abazene yavuze kandi ko abigisha b'Abasuriya barungitswe mu gihugu iwabo kugira ngo barengutswe imbere y'ubutungane. Umuvugizi w'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya Nabila Massrali yabwiye BBC ko iri shirahamwe ribandanya guterwa impungenge n'ibikorwa vy'umurwi Wagner. Hampande ya Centrafrique, ONU iragiriza kandi Wagner ivyaha vyo mu ntambara muri Libya. Itohoza ryakozwe na BBC ryerekana ko abarwanyi ba Wagner bishe abasivire n'abanyororo muri Libya, bongera batega n'ibisasu bitamenyekana. Massrali  ati: "Amategeko abagenga ntatomoye, co kimwe n'intumbero yabo". "Biragaragara ko bigoye kuzibira no gukurikirana abashobora kuba bakora ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu n'amategeko mpuzamakungu ajejwe agateka ka zina muntu mu bihe nk'ibi bidatomoye". Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya bwashaka gushimangira ko budakorana n'abacangero ba Wagner. Ubu ryahagaritse inyigisho za gisirikare muri Centrafrique kubera rifise amakenga ko abo bacangero bakoresha ingabo zigishijwe n'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya. Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya ni rimwe mu mashirahamwe atanga imfashanyo nyinshi zo kugarukira ku banyagihugu bari mu ngorane muri Centrafrique, gushika ubu rikaba rimaze gutanga izirenga ku miriyaridi 1.4 kuva mu 2014. Abategetsi bavuga ko ata sano na rimwe rihari n'uyu murwi. Ariko vyikekwa ko hari ubucuti bwa hafi cane. Umwe mu bafatiwe ibihano n'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya ni Valery Zakharov yahoze akorera igisata kijejwe umutekano w'igihugu, yahoze kandi ari umuhanuzi wa Perezida Touadéra mu vyo umutekano. Nk'uko EU ibivuga, Zakharov ni "umutegetsi akomeye mu ntwazangabo z'umurwi Wagner kandi ko abandanya afitaniye ubucuti bwa hafi cane n'abategetsi b'Uburusiya". Wagner yagiye kumenyekana cane mu 2014, igihe yarwana ku ruhande rw'abashaka kwiyonkora bafashwe mu mugongo n'Uburusiya mu ntambara yo mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Kuva ico gihe, uyo murwi warakoreye cane mu burasirazuba bwo hagati, co kimwe no muri Centrafrique hamwe no muri Afrika y'Ubumanuko. Uzwi ko uhabwa uburyo na Yevgeny Prigozhin, umurwizatunga afitaniye ubucuti na Perezida Vladimir Putin. Prigozhin abandanya ahakana ko ata bucuti na bumwe afitaniye na Wagner. Reta y'Uburusiya kandi irahakana ko reta yabwo ata ruhara ifise muri uyo murwi kandi ikabandanya ivuga ko amategeko y'igihugu atemera uyu murwi kubera imirwi ya gisirikare y'abikorera ku giti cabo itemewe n'amategeko mu Burusiya. Hampande ya Libya, ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya rivuga kandi ko abacangero ba Wagner bakorera muri Sudan na Mozambique. Muri Sudan, bazwi ko bafise uruhara mu kwigisha no gucungera abategetsi n'ibigo bicukurwamwo ubutare. Muri Mozambique, Wagner irafasha igisirikare kurwanya inyeshamba ziyitirira idini rya Islam mu buraruko bw'iki gihugu. Ubu bwa vuba, Mali, incuti ya kera y'ibihugu vyo mu Burengero bw'isi mu kurwanya abarwanyi biyitirira idini rya Islam mu karere ka Sahel, yaratangaje ko ishaka guha akazi abarwanyi ba Wagner bababa 1000 kugira bayifashe gucungera umutekano. Iyi ni ingingo yaje ikurikira itangazo ry'Ubufaransa bwavuga ko bwari bugiye kuvana igice c'ingabo zabwo muri ico gihugu zababa 5000. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zatangaje ko zitewe "impungenge" n'integuro yo kurungika abarwanyi ba Wagner muri Mali. Zavuze ko aba bacangero bashobora guhungabanya akarere mu gihe boramuka barungitsweyo. Umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Mali, Abdoulaye Diop ,yavuze ko ingabo mpuzamakungu zarungitswe muri ico gihugu ataco zashitseko, ko rero igihugu categerezwa kuronderera ahandi. Irungikwa ry'ingabo za Wagner muri Mali ryibutsa benshi mu bihweza ibintu n'ibindi ingene uyu murwi watanguye gukorera muri Centrafrique.

headline: Ingene Russia yanesheje Ukraine muri Africa
text: Na  Paul Melly Igisata ca Afrika, Chatham House, London Amajambo ashikiriza amakoraniro n’amanama nshingamateka kw’isi vyabaye umushinge wa Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine mu twigoro twiwe two gutsimbataza imigenderanire kuva mu mezi make aheze. Ariko igihe ashikiriza ijambo Ubumwe bwa Afrika (AU) ku wa mbere abakuru b’igihugu bane gusa nibo bamwumvirije, mu gihe abandi nabo baserukiwe n’intumwa. Kubona yitabwa n’abantu bake vyerekana neza ingene bitoroshe kuri Kyiv kugira ngo ijambo ryayo ryumvikane kuri uno mugabane ufise ibihugu 54 ariko Ukraine ikaba ifise ibiro vy’ubuserukizi mu bihugu cumi vyonyene, ica kane c’ivyo Uburusiya bufise. Rero mu kugerageza guhindura imbono y’abanyafrika ku ntambara yavuye ku gitero ca Perezida Vladimir Putin, Perezida Zelensky ntashobora gushinga imizi haba mu vya poritike canke umutekano ku rugero Moscou igezeko. Ukraine si igihugu gifise inguvu za gisirikare rutura kw’isi kandi si n’igihugu ntayegayezwa mu Nama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano, nk’uko biri ku Burusiya. Kubera iyi mvo, abategetsi benshi ba Afrika bafashe ingingo ko badashobora guhirahira ngo bigane ibihugu vy’Uburengero mu guhangana na Moscou. Ibintu bimeze uku mu gihe amayira yo gusohora intete ziva muri Ukraine yazibiwe, bikaba biriko birunyura ikibazo c’imfungurwa cari gisanzwe kihari, ivyatumye ibiciro vy’ibidandazwa vyinjira biduga, maze ingano n’izindi ntete hamwe n’amavuta bikena  cane mu bihugu vya Afrika vyari bisanzwe bitikwije. Mu ntango z’uku kwezi, umukuru w’igihugu ca Sénégal Macky Sall, ari na we arongoye Ubumwe bwa Afrika muri kino gihe, yarafashe urugendo rwamushikanye mu gisagara ca Sochi kiri ku nkengera y’inyanja yirabura (Black Sea/Mer noire) kugira ngo aganire na Perezida Putin ku kungene bokuraho inzitizi zituma ata bidandazwa vyinjira ku mugabane bivuye mu Burusiya hamwe no muri Ukraine. Hanyuma kandi, mu ndwi iheze, Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa wa Afrika y’Epfo yarahamagaye Putin kuri terefone kugira bavugane ingene Uburusiya bwoha Afrika ivyimburwa hamwe n’ibitabizo. Ibi biganiro vyarazanye akarusho gatoya n’aho ata nyinshu burundu yaboneste. Hagati aho, hari ibimenyetso vy’uko igitero kuri Ukraine gishobora kuba kiriko gituma haba ingorane ku bikorwa vya gisirikare vy’Uburusiya muri Afrika, aho hari ibihuha bitaremezwa bivuga ko hari zimwe mu ngabo za wa muhari w’abacangero Wagner zishobora kuba ziriko rizakurwa muri Centrafrique. Ibi ntivyotangaza cane uravye ibikenewe mu bikorwa vya gisirikare bikomeye mu karere ka Donbas. Hagati aho, nta kimenyetso na kimwe kihari cerekana ko abarwanyi ba Wagner boba bariko baragabanuka muri Mali – aho ingabo zawo zikunze kuboneka ziri kumwe n’iza reta mu bikorwa vya gisirikare. Vyongeye, amasezerano ya gisirikare no mu vyo umutekano Uburusiya bufise muri Afrika muri kino gihe ariko aratsimbatazwa, n’aho ivya nkenerwa mu ntambara yo muri Ukraine ari vyinshi. Cameroun nico gihugu kindi giherutse kwisanga muri uru rugamba rutoroshe. Umushikiranganji wa Cameroun ajejwe kwivuna abansi Joseph Beti Assomo yari i Moscou mu kwezi guheze aho yari yagiye kubonana na mugenziwe w’Uburusiya Sergei Shoigu ngo batere igikumu ku masezerano y’imyaka itanu y’ugufashanya mu vya gisirikare. Muri ano masezerano harimwo ibijanye n’igendereza, kwigisha no guhanahana ubuhinga mu kurwanya iterabwoba n’ubusuma bwo mu mazi. Harategurwa n’imyimenyerezo rusangi. Aya masezerano ntavuga ibijanye n’irungikwa ry’ibirwanisho ariko agasa n’ayerekana ko hashobora kwumvikanwako ubundi buryo bwo gufashanya. Mu vy'ukuri, amasezerano yo mu  2015 yatumye Uburusiya burungika imfashanyo y’ibirwanisho n’uburyo yabaye kirumara mu ntambara yo kurwanya inyeshamba ziyitirira idini rya Islam mu ntara y’Uburaruko muri Cameroun. N’aho gushika ubu aya masezerano mashasha na Moscou ataramenyekana neza, asa n’uko ateye impungenge ibihugu vy’Uburengero. Mu ndwi nkeya umukuru w’igisata kijejwe Afrika mu bushikiranganji bw’imigenderanire w’Ubufaransa, Christophe Bigot, yari yagiye i Yaoundé, asa n’uwugiye guhumuriza umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Cameroun Joseph Dion Ngute ko Paris nayo nyene iciyemeje gukomeza ubucuti mu vy'ubutunzi, imico no kurwanya iterabwoba. Aya masezerano na Cameroun yateweko igikumu mu gihe kitoroshe ku rwego mpuzamakungu – igihe c’intambara ivuye ku gitero c’Uburusiya kuri Ukraine. Abategetsi b’ibihugu vy’Uburengero babona ko Uburusiya ari akaga gakomeye ku mutekano wavyo, kuko burwanya umushinge w’intwaro rusangi be n'uko amategeko asanzwe agenda isi. Hagati aho, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vya Afrika bifise amadidane kuri uku kubonwa nabi kw’ubutegetsi bwa Putin. Kandi ibi si kuri Mali na Centrafrique gusa. Hariho kandi n’ibihugu bicuditse n’Uburengero kuva kera ariko vyirinda kunegura mu buryo bweruye ibikorwa vya Putin. Nk’akarorero, Sénégal yafashe ingingo yo kudashigikira iciyumviro c’inama nkuru y’ishirahamwe ONU co ku wa 02 Ntwarante (3) casaba Uburusiya guhagarika ikoreshwa ry’inguvu kuri Ukraine. Cameroun nayo nyene yafashe ingingo isa n’iyi, aho umuserukizi wayo muri ONU yahisemwo gufata indege imushikana mu gihugu ciwe mu ntango z’ukwa gatatu kugira ngo akwepe iyi nama yari ikomeye yo gutora ngo bemeze iyi ngingo. Inyuma y’aho, ku wa 07 Ndamukiza (4) iki gihugu cashimye kutagira aho cegamira igihe Inama Nkuru ijejwe Umutekano yagira amatora yo guhagarika Uburusiya mu Nama ya ONU ijejwe agateka ka zina muntu. Ivyiyumviro vyo hagati mu gihugu navyo bifise uruhara mu bihe nk’ibi. Kuja ku ruhande rw’Ubufaransa, Amerika n’Ubwongereza, si ukuvuga ko vyama bishimwa na benshi kuri uno mugabane, kandi reta ya Cameroun, co kimwe n’ibindi bihugu bigenzi vyayo, isa n’iyafashe ingingo yo gushira imbere ico abanyagihugu biyumvira. Hagati aho, Cameroun ishika kure, mu gufata ingingo yo gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha yo gufashanya mu vya gisirikare n’Uburusiya n’aho ingabo zabwo zibandanya zicucagira amabombe ku bisagara vya Ukraine. Iyi ngendo iki gihugu cisangije ifise kumbure kuba isigurwa n’ingene ibintu bimeze hagari muri Cameroun. Umukuru w’igihugu Paul Biya asanzwe avuga igifaransa ahanganye n’ibibazo vy’umutekano ku mpande zibiri: mu gihe ubutegetsi bwiwe buhanganye n’umuhari Boko Haram wiyitirira idini rya Islam ufise icicaro muri Nigeria, hamwe n’umuhari Islamic State West Africa Province (Iswap) mu ntara y’Uburaruko, iri kandi mu ntambara imaze igihe kirekire n’inyeshamba zishaka kwiyonkora mu ntara zibiri zikoresha ururimi rw’icongereza, intara y’Ubumanuko bushira uburengero hamwe n’iy’Uburaruko bushira uburengero. Hampande y’Uburusiya, Cameroun ifitaniye kandi amasezerano yo gufashanya mu vya gisirikare n’ibihugu vy’Ubufaransa, Ubushinwa, Brezili na Turukiya – kandi yarigeze no kuba ifitaniye amasezerano na Amerika. Gusa, incuti zayo nka Washington na Paris zifise impungenge ku bijanye n’agateka ka zina muntu n’intwaro, kandi mu gutanga imfashanyo zavyo hari ivyo zibanza gusaba. Mu vyo ukuri, impungenge ku kungene ibintu bimeze mu turere twa Cameroun dukoresha icongereza ziherutse gutuma Amerika ihagarika imfashanyo ya gisirikare yahora iha Cameroun. Mu gihe abanyamerika bariko bariyonjorora, bamwe mu banyakameruni bihweza ibintu n’ibindi bafise ubwoba ko reta ubu ifise kuba iriko irarondera iyindi ncuti yoyiha imfashanyo itarinze gushiramwo amananiza ashingiye ku mayeri yayo ya gisirikare, ariko uburenganzira bwa muntu bukahagirira ingorane. Mu tundi turere twa Afrika, kahise ka Moscou kerekana ko yishimira gufasha ibihugu bitorosha ibintu. Muri Centrafrique, umurwi Wagner ubandanya wigisha igisirikare kuva mu 2018 mbere n’ingabo zawo zarafashije ingabo za reta mu gutuza igitero c’inyeshamba ku mugwa mukuru Bangui mu ntango za 2021. Ariko abahinga ba ONU bagiriza Wagner ivyaha bikomeye vyo guhohotera abasivire; abarwanyi bayo baherutse kwagirizwa ko bishe abasivire hafi y’akarere ka Bria, icicaro c’uruganda rucukura ubutare bwa diyama. Wagner kandi ikorera hagati muri Mali, iri kumwe n’igisirikare, aho nk’uko bivugwa n’ishirahamwe Human Rights Watch n’abanyagihugu, izi ngabo zikorera hamwe zaboreje igufa zica n’abanyagihugu. Ingabo za reta ya Mali hamwe n’abacangero b’abarusiya bagirizwa kwica abantu barenga 300 i Moura, hagati muri Mali mu kwa gatatu. Ntivyoroshe ingene reta ya Cameroun yoha akazi uyu murwi w’abacangero utavugwako rumwe. Bisa n’uko ishira imbere cane ubucuti hagati ya reta n’iyindi  nk’uko biri mu masezerano yo mu kwezi guheze i Moscou. Ariko, ubu bucuti bushasha n’Uburusiya bushobora cane kuba ikimenyetso c’uko igisirikare casubiye kwihagararako mu gihe ubutegetsi bugerageza gutuza ibikorwa vy’inyeshamba zishaka kwiyonkora mu ntara zikoresha icongereza hamwe n’abarwanyi biyitiriria idini rya Islam mu ntara y’Uburaruko.

headline: Leta y'u Burundi ubwo ikemura neza ikibazo c'ibura ry'amadolari? Umva insiguro z'umuhinga mu butunzi.
text: Leta y'u Burundi ubwo ikemura neza ikibazo c'ibura ry'amadolari?

headline: Ibitigiri vy'abandura Covid vyiyongereye mw'ikambi ya gisirikare y'Abongereza muri Kenya
text: Igisirikare c'Ubwongereza kivuga ko abasirikare bose bashitse muri iyo kambi iri ahitwa Nanyuki mu kwezi guheze bataramuwe. Umuvugizi wa gisirikare  avuga ko abasirikare 320 gushika ubu ari bo bamaze gutaramurwa. Umukozi w'umunya Kenya asanzwe akora muri iyo kambi yabwiye BBC ko babwiwe ko boguma muhira mu mpera z'indwi iheze inyuma y'aho habonekeye abanduye muri iyo kambi. Avuga kandi ko ata bakozi b'abanya Kenya babonanye n'abo basirikare bashasha bari binjiye bavuye mu Bwongereza, ariko ko hari bamwe mu basanzwe bari muri ako karere bahawe akazi k'igihe gito. Igisirikare kivuga ko ibikorwa vyose bikorerwa muri iyo kambi bitegerezwa gukorwa hisunzwe ingingo ruhasha zo kwirinda Covid. Abo bakozi bafise amakenga menshi ko abanyagihugu baba muri ako karere ko mu buraruko bwa Nairobi bashobora kubinuba inyuma y'aho bamenyeye ko iki kiza kiri muri iyo kambi. Mu mwaka uheze, iyi kambi y'igisirikare c'Ubwongereza muri Kenya yari yugawe mu kiringo c'amezi atatu inyuma y'aho hadukiye iki kiza karanda kw'isi, ikaba yari yasubiye kwugururwa mu kwezi guheze. Abakozi barahumurizwa ko bazoronswa agashahara kabo.Igitigiri c'abandura Covid-19 mw'ikambi ya gisirikare y'Abongereza iri muri Kenya ciyongereye kuva kuri bane gushika kuri 11, abegereye iyo kambi bakaba bafise ubwoba ko ishobora kurandaranda muri bo.

headline: Abakunzi ba Real Madrid basaba ko Zinedine Zidane yirukanwa
text: Real Madrid yatsinzwe yari yakoresheje uburyo bwose bukenewe, ku bakinyi n'amahera, mu nkino za Champions League zo mur'iri ci. Iri shavu ryavuye kw'itsinda rya Paris St-Germain 3 - 0. Uru rukino rwahurije iyi mirwi ibiri mu Bufaransa, ku wa 18 z'ukw'ukw'icenda, mu mahiganwa ya Champions League. Bubaye ubwa mbere mu nkino zishika 578 zo mur'urwo rwego, uyu murwi rutura wo muri Espagne, utsindwa ku busa nk'uko. Kur'ayo makuru y'ikinyamakuru 'The Sun', Zinedine Zidane yemeye ko barushijwe ati: "Nta gihishwa kirimwo baturushije, naho mu minota 15 ya mbere ari twebwe twayobora urukino". Yerekana akababaro, Zidane yongeye ati: "Biragoye gusigura ingene vyatunaniye kwigarura, urukino rwose rugahera". Ivyo adatahura, ni navyo vyashavuje abakunzi b'umurwi wiwe, kuko ubusatirizi bwari bwakomejwe. Abazwi basatira ni nka Gareth Bale, Eden Hazard na Karim Benzema. Mur'izi nkino zo muci, Real Madrid yaziteguriye ku giciro c'amahera y'Abongereza imiliyoni 500. Ku mbuga ngurukana bumenyi, inyandiko za bamwe zemeza ko Zinedine Zidane yagarukanywe nk'umumenyereza wa Real de Madrid, kuko Florentino Perez - umuyobozi w'uwo murwi- vyamunaniye kumwirukana burundu.

headline: Ukraine: Biden avuga ko ivyago vya  nikleyeri ari vyinshi gusumba igihe ca misire za Cuba mu 1962
text: Ivyago vyo kubona isi iguye mu kaga ka nikleyeri katari bwigere kabaho biri ku rugero runini kuva kuri ca gihe ca misire za Cuba (Crise des missiles de Cuba/ Cuban Missile Crisis)  mu 1962, nk’uko Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika abivuga. Biden avuga ko Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya atariko “arayayata” igihe avuga ko ashobora gukoresha ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri (vy’ubumara) inyuma y’aho atakarije bikomeye ku rubuga rw’intambara muri Ukraine. Yongerako y’uko Amerika “iriko irihweza” inzira Putin ashobora gufata mu kwikura mu ntambara. Amerika n’Ubumwe bwa Bulaya biherutse kuvuga ko iterabwoba rya Putin kw’ikoreshwa ry’ibirwanisho vy’ubumara atari iryo gufata minenerwe. Hagati aho, umuhanuzi wa Amerika mu vyo umutekano Jake Sullivan yavuze mu ndwi iheze ko, n’aho Moscou yacishije mu kanwa ivy’ibirwanisho vy’ubumara, Amerika ata bimenyetso ibona ko Uburusiya bushobora kuba buriko bwitegurira gukoresha ikirwanisho c’ubumara. Ukraine imaze imisi ibohoza ubutaka bwari bwigaruriwe n’Uburusiya kuva butanguye igitero cabwo ku wa 24 z’ukwa kabiri, harimwo n’intara zine Uburusiya buherutse kwihagira mu buryo buteye kubiri n’amategeko. Haraciye amezi atari make abategetsi ba Amerika bagabisha ko Uburusiya bushobora kwikora ku birwanisho ruhonyanganda mu gihe bwobona ko buriko buratakaza ku rugamba. Mw’ijambo yashikirije ku wa gatanu w’indwi iheze, Putin yavuze ko Amerika ari yo “ntandaro ya vyose” mu gukoresha ibirwanisho vy’ubumara ku Buyapani mu mpera z’intambara ya kabiri y’isi yose – amajambo atari kugenda gutyo nyene mu bihugu vy’Uburengero, nk’uko bivugwa n’umwanditsi mukuru wa BBC mu rurimi rw’ikirusiya, Steve Rosenberg. Putin kandi yagabishije ko azokoresha uburyo bwose afise kugira ngo akingire ubutaka bw’Uburusiya. Perezida Biden avuga ko igituma umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya “atariko arafyinata” igihe avuga ivyo gukoresha ibirwanisho vy’ubumara, ari uko “igisirikare ciwe, nk’uko twobivuga, kiriko kiraneshwa”. Biden yabwiye bagenziwe bo mu mugambwe w’aba Democrats ati: "Ubwa mbere kuva ku kibazo ca misire za Cuba, turi imbere y’ivyago vy’ikoreshwa ry’ibirwanisho vy’ubumara, mu gihe ibintu vyobandanya uko biri”. “Ntitwari bwigere twibaza ko dushobora guhangana n’icago kiruta ibindi vyose kuva kuri Kennedy n’ikibazo ca misire za Cuba”. Mu 1962, Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika hamwe n’Ubumwe bw’Abasoviyeti  - ico gihe hari ku ba perezida John F Kennedy na Nikita Khrushchev – vyahatswe guterana ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri (vy’ubumara) biturutse ku ngingo y’Ubumwe bw’abasoviyeti yo kurungika ibirwanisho vy’ubumara muri Cuba. Abahinga batari bake babona ko iri hangana ari ryo ryonyene rikomeye ryahatswe guta isi mu ntambara ya nikleyeri. Biden yabwiye bagenziwe b’aba Democrats ko ikoreshwa ry’ibirwanisho vy’ubumara bishobora gutuma ibintu biyangara mu kanya isase. Yavuze ibi ari ku muhana wa James Murdoch i New York, umuhungu w’umutunzi karuhariwe Rupert Murdoch azwi ko yashoye imitahe myinshi mu gisata co kumenyesha amakuru, hari mu birori vyo kwegeranya uburyo bw’umugambwe w’aba-Democrats. Putin ahanganye n’ishusho igoye cane ku rugamba. N’aho yateye igikumu kw’itegeko ryihagira burundu intara zine za Ukraine - Luhansk, Donetsk, Zaporizhzhia na Kherson – ingabo za Kyiv ziriko zirasatira zinjira muri utwo turere avuga ko twamwegukiye. Ibihumbi amajana vy’abagabo bariko barahunga Uburusiya hako barindira ngo bandikwe kugira bajanwe kurwana muri Ukraine. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky  wa Ukraine yahoze afata minenerwe iterabwoba rya nikleyeri rya Moscou, akavuga ko ari "amajambo yo kwiyamamaza yama avugwa n’abategetsi b’Uburusiya”. Paul Stronski, wo mw’ishirahamwe Carnegie Endowment for International Peace, yabwiye BBC ko “amajambo y’iterabwoba” y’Uburusiya afise intumbero yo gukanga Uburengero, n’aho Uburengero busa n’ubwiyemeje guhangana naryo. Eka mbere no mu Burusiya nyene ubwabwo hari abarwanya iri terabwoba rya Moscou rishingiye ku birwanisho vy’ubumara. Inkuru yo mu kinyamakuru Nezavisimaya Gazeta co muri ico gihugu iranegura cane “abategetsi bakuru b’Uburusiya” kubera “ bakinisha ivya nikleyeri”. "Kwemera, haba mu vyiyumviro canke mu majambo,  y’uko hashobora kuba intambara ya nikleyeri ni intambwe ikomeye yo kuyitanguza mu vy’ukuri”. Umuvugizi w’ubushikiranganji bw’Uburusiya bujejwe imigenderanire yabwiye abanyamakuru ejo ku wa kane ko Moscou itari bwahindure aho ihagaze, ko intambara ya nikleyeri ari “ikizira kikaziririzwa”.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Ings, Kane, Sancho, Ramsey, Griezmann, Flick
text: Manchester United ishobora guhindukirira umusatirizi wa Southampton umwongereza Danny Ings w'imyaka 28 mu ci riza mu ntumbero yo gukomeza uruhande rw'abasatirizi b'uyu murwi wa Ole Gunnar Solskjaer. (Telegraph - subscription required) Wa musatirizi w'umwongereza Harry Kane abona ko umurwi umubereye ari Manchester City mu gihe abandanya akora ibishoboka vyose kugira asezere umurwi wiwe Tottenham mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'uwu mwaka. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 27 yemeza ko umukuru wa Tottenham yamaze kumwemerera  mu majambo gusa kuva muri uyu murwi uwu mwaka w'inkino urangiye igihe bavugana mu mwaka uheze akamugondoza ko yobandanya akinira Spurs mu kiringo c'uwundi mwaka, uwu nawo ukaba ugiye kurangira.  (Times - subscription required) Hagati aho, Manchester United irashaka gutanga umufaransa akina imbere Anthony Martial w'imyaka 25, hamwe n'umusatirizi w'umwongereza Jesse Lingard  w'imyaka 28 - asanzwe yaratijijwe muri West Ham - kugira ngo ishobore kuzana Kane muri Old Trafford. (Football Insider) Chelsea yateguye imiriyoni zababa 113 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo izane umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Borussia Dortmund umwongereza Jadon Sancho w'imyaka 21, ariko rero ikaba iriko imurwanira na Manchester United. (Sun) Imirwi itari mike ku mugabane w'Uburayi, harimwo Tottenham, Chelsea, Borussia Dortmund na AC Milan, iriko irikazanura kugira ngo ishobore kugura umunyegori w'umwongereza Dean Henderson w'imyaka 24 asanzwe ari muri Manchester United. (Sky Sports) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Juventus hamwe n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Pays de Galles (Wales) Aaron Ramsey w'imyaka 30 arashimwa cane na Liverpool, nk'uko amakuru ava mu Butariyano abivuga. Liverpool ivugwa ko yoba iriko itegura amahera kugira ngo ishobore kugura uyu mukinyi yahoze akina muri Arsenal mu gihe ca gihe c'igura n'igurisha ry'abakinyi kizoba gitanguye. (Tutto Juve - in Italian) Umurwi Chelsea urindiriye gukira urukino rwa nyuma rw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere ku mugabane wa Buraya (Champions league) uriko urakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi wo hagati wa Monaco umufaransa Aurelien Tchouameni w'imyaka 21. (Goal) Umumenyereza wa Bayern Munich Hansi Flick w'imyaka 56 ariko abonwa ko ashobora kuja kumenyereza umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubudagi amaze gusezera umurwi wiwe, araronderwa cane na  Barcelona nk'uwushobora gusubirira umunya Hollande Ronald Koeman w'imyaka 58. (RAC1 - in Spanish) Barcelona iriteguye kwumviriza abo bose boba bipfuza umukinyi w'imbere w'umufaransa Antoine Griezmann kugira ngo ishobore gukemura ibibazo vy'amafaranga biyihanze.  (Marca) Griezmann w'imyaka 30 ashobora gusubira muri  Atletico Madrid agujijwe n'umunya Portugal Joao Felix n'aho Barca itaremera neza.  (Sport - in Spanish) Umurwi Roma usanzwe umenyerezwa na Jose Mourinho ufise "amahirwe menshi" yo kuronka umusatirizi w'umutariyano Andrea Belotti w'imyaka 27 asanzwe akina muri Torino. AC Milan nayo nyene ibandanya irondera uyu mukinyi, ariko kandi ikaba iriko ikurikirana umukinyi w'imbere wa Chelsea umufaransa Olivier Giroud, mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi azorangira mu ci riza. (Calcio Mercato - in Italian) Imigwi yaEverton na Arsenal ibandanya ishinze ijisho ku mukinyi w'inyuma wa Real Betis  Emerson Royal. Uyu munya Brésil w'imyaka 22 yatijijwe na Barcelona ariko ashobora kwigira muri Premier League mu gihe gushirwa ku ruhande muri Barcelona.  (Sport - in Spanish) Leeds United na West Ham ivugwa ko ishobora guhangana na Inter Milan, Roma na Napoli mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Cagliari Nahitan Nandez afise agaciro k'imiriyoni 42 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika mu ci riza. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 25 akomoka muri Uruguay afise amasezerano n'uyu murwi wo mw'ihiganwa Serie A ry'Ubutariyano azorangira mu 2024.  (Corriere dello Sport - in Italian) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Newcastle United umufaransa Allan Saint-Maximin avuga ko uyu murwi ukwiye kugura umukinyi wa Arsenal umwongereza Joe Willock w'imyaka 21, asanzwe yatijijwe muri uyo murwi kugira ngo awegukire burundu.  (Sky Sports) Mu gihe Southampton ivugwa ko yoba iriko irondera uwundi munyegori, uyu murwi uvugwa ko woba uriko urakurikiranira hagufi umunyegori wa Lazio umunya Albania Thomas Strakosha w'imyaka 26 nk'umwe mu bo ushobora kugura. (La Repubblica, via Sport Witness)

headline: Umukinyi Ndikumana Selemani yakuwe ku rutonde rw'Intamba mu Rugamba muri CAN 2019
text: Umusatirizi Ndikumana Yamini Selemani yakuwe ku rutonde rw'abakinyi 23 bagize umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Uburundi bagiye guserukira igihugu mu nkino z'ihiganwa ry'igikombe rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu ritangura kuri uyu wa gatanu i Cairo mu Misiri. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Burundi, FFB,  rikaba ririko rirahererekanwa ku mbunga hwaniro, iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko iyo ngingo yafashwe n'abamenyereza b'umurwi kubera indero nke uyo mukinyi yerekanye. FFB ivuga ko iyo nyifato iteye kubiri  « n'ivyumvikanyweko na bose mu ntumbero yo guserukira neza igihugu guhera kuwa 22 z'uku kwa gatandatu 2019 ». Ni kuri uyo munsi umurwi w'Intamba mu Rugamba uzoba ukinye urukino rwa mbere, aho uzohura na Super Eagles wa Nijeriya. Iryo tangazo rivuga ko « abandi bakinyi 22 bose bameze neza kandi barangwa n'ishaka ryo guhangana na Nijeriya » mu gisagara ca Alexandia.  Tubandanya tubakurikiranira iyo nkuru. Nibwo bwa mbere Uburundi bwinjiye muri izi nkino za nyuma z'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu vya Afrika. Kuri uyu wa gatanu, niho ryugururwa, aho igihugu ca Misiri cakiriye izo nkino kiza gutana mu mitwe n'igihugu ca Zimbabwe isaha zine mu masaha y'Uburundi n'u Rwanda. Akarere ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko kaserukiwe n'ibihugu vya Uganda, Kenya, Uburundi na Tanzaniya.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Pjanic, Camavinga, White, Umtiti, Ronaldo, Mendy, Ryan, Willock
text: Barcelona irashaka kurekura umukinyi wayo wo hagati umunya Bosnia Miralem Pjanic w'imyaka 31 hamwe n'umufaransa akina inyuma  Samuel Umtiti w'imyaka 27 kubera bompi ata n'umwe ashimwa n'umumenyereza Ronald Koeman mu nteguro ziwe. (Goal) Pjanic avugwa ko aronderwa na Tottenham ikaba yiteguye gukubita hasi Manchester United imaze igihe kirekire cane imurondera. (Express) Chelsea ishobora kugerageza gutesha umutwe umukeba wayo wa Londres Arsenal mu kwinjira mu rugamba rwo kurondera kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Brighton umwongereza Ben White w'imyaka 23. (Transfer Window Podcast, via Sun) Tottenham na Barcelona yompi irashaka kizigenza wa Napoli umutariyani Lorenzo Insigne w'imyaka 30 ariko aravyifatamwo neza mw'igihanwa ry'imirwi nserukiragihugu ya Buraya, Euro 2020, ni mu gihe atarashobora gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha kubera ayo afitaniye n'umurwi wiwe azorangira mu 2022. (Corriere dello Sport - in Italian) Barcelona ubu iriteguye kwemera igiciro gito ku mukinyi wayo wo hagati, umunya Brésil Philippe Coutinho ku giciro kiri musi y'uturusho yarishe  Liverpool igihe uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 29 yinjira muri uyo murwi wa La Liga, ni mu gihe igiciro ciwe kibandanya kimanuka. (Mirror) AC Milan iripfuza Coutinho ariko ku ntizo gusa hako imugura burundu kubera akahise kiwe k'invune.  (Mail) Umukinyi w'umufaransa akina hagati Eduardo Camavinga w'imyaka 18 aboneka ko vyanka vyakunda ategerezwa kugenda muri rino ci inyuma y'aho ibiganiro hagati y'uyu mukinyi na Rennes ataco bishikiyeko. Hagati aho, uyu murwi nturaronka umurwi wundi n'umwe urondera uyu muyabaga. (Le Parisien - in French) Manchester United irategura ibindi biganiro na Rennes kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka Camavinga, ariko aya Mashetani Atukura ahanganye na  Real Madrid, Paris St-Germain na Bayern Munich. (Mail) Manchester United irashobora gutiza umunyegori wayo, umunya Espagne David de Gea w'imyaka 30 muri rino ci. (Manchester Evening News) Umuserukizi wa Cristiano Ronaldo Jorge Mendes ariko arakora uko ashoboye kugira ngo arabe ko amasezerano afitaniye na Juventus yokwongerwako uwundi mwaka, ivyotuma uyu musatirizi wa Portugal w'imyaka 36 abandanya gukina mw'ihiganwa Serie A gushika mu 2023.  (Gazzetta dello Sport - in Italian) Manchester United iriko irategura amasezerano mashasha n'umukinyi w'inyuma wayo, umwongereza Luke Shaw w'imyaka 25. (Mail) Kazoza k'umukinyi wo hagati wa Everton, umunya Colombia James Rodriguez w'imyaka 29 karimwo igipfungu, inyumas y'aho uyo murwi ugeneye Rafael Benitez nk'umumenyereza wayo. (Liverpool Echo) Tottenham iriteguye kurekura umukinyi wayo w'inyuma, umubirigi Toby Alderweireld w'imyaka 32 muri rino ci, ikaba iriko irarondera abakinyi babiri b'inyuma mu mugambi wo kwiyubaka. (Football London) Umunyegori wa Brighton umunya Australia Mat Ryan w'imyaka 29 yari amaze umwaka yaratijijwe muri  Arsenal, ari hafi yo gutera igikumu ku masezerano na Real Sociedad inyuma y'aho bumvikaniye ku giciro kitarashirwa ahabona. (Sky Sports) Uwahoze akina inyuma muri Newcastle Steve Howey  avuga ko uyu murwi utegerezwa kugura umwongereza akina hagati Joe Willock w'imyaka 21 muri rino ci atari uko uyu mukinyi wa Arsenalarashobora kuduzwa igiciro. (Chronicle) Umukinyi w'inyuma  ku ruhande rw'iburyo wa Manchester City umufaransa Benjamin Mendy w'imyaka 26 avugwa ko yoba ari ku rutonde rw'abaronderwa na Inter Milan muri rino ci. (Manchester Evening News) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Sevilla umufaransa Jules Kounde w'imyaka 22 niwe Manchester United ishobora guhindukirira mu gihe uyu murwi wa Premier League wonanirwa no kugura mugenziwe Raphael Varane w'imyaka 28 asanzwe akina muri Real Madrid. (AS - in Spanish) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Barcelona ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu Junior Firpo w'imyaka 24 ari hafi yo kwimukira burundu mu murwi Leeds United. (The Athletic - subscription required)

headline: UN-UKraine: Prezida Zelensky yashikirije ijambo "kw'izina ry'abazira amahano y'Uburusiya"
text: Zelensky yabwiye inama ya ONU ijejwe umutekano ko ariko arayishikiriza ijambo kw'izina ry'abahura n'amahano y'Uburusiya. Mw'ijambo rya mbere  muri ONU kuva Uburusiya bugavye igitero ku gihugu ciwe, Zelesnky yavuze ko Abarusiya bica abanyagihugu basanzwe kandi bagasambanya ku nguvu. Zelensky ivyo abivuze inyuma yo kugendera igisagara ca Bucha  ku wa mbere aho ibiziga vy'abantu bishwe vyabonetse. Yagirije Uburusiya gukora jenoside. Uwuhagarariye Uburusiya mu nama ya ONU ijejwe umutekano  Vasily Nebenzya, yiyamirije ivyaha vy'intambara vyagirijwe  ingabo z'Uburusiya muri Bucha, avuga ko hari "ibihushane bigaragara mu bintu vyerekanywe n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri Ukraine n'Iburaya". Yavuze ko ibiziga vyabonywe n'abamenyeshamakuru muri ico gisagara co muri Ukraine bitari bihari buno nyene ingabo z'Uburusiya zikihava -avuga ko ivyo "vyemezwa   n'ama video menshi." Nebenzya  yongeyeko ati: "Ivyo biziga nta na hamwe bisa n'ibishobora kuba bimaze iminsi itatu canke ine birambaraye mw'ibarabara". Ariko amasanamu ya satellite yahinjujwe akemezwa na BBC yerekana ibiziga kw'ibarabara rya Bucha hafi indwi zibiri imbere y'uko ingabo z'Uburusiya ziva muri ico gisagara. Amasanamu ya satellite yatanzwe n'ikigo c'abanyamerika Maxar - hanyuma agahinyuzwa na BBC- yerekana ko hari ibiziga kuri iryo barabara nyene muri Bucha itariki 19 Ntwarante/Werurwe. Ingabo z'Ubusiya nazo zahavuye mu mpera z'uko kwezi kwa gatatu. Umukuru wa Ukraine yakomeje kugira urutonde rw'amabi  avuga ko yakozwe n'ingabo z'Uburusiya muri ico gitero. Mw'ijambo yavuze asubirwamwo n'abahindura indimi, yavuze ko muri Bucha ''ata caha na kimwe ingabo z'Uburusiya zitakoze". Avuga ko abatantu barasiwe mu mabarabara, mu mazu yabo, baratabwa mu binogo abandi bahonyorwa n'ibiduga vy'ingwano hagati mw'ibarabara "mu kwinezereza gusa" kw'ingabo z'Uburusiya. Yongeye kuvuga ko ibikorwa vy'Uburusiya ataho bitaniye n'ibikorwa n'umurwi w'iterabwoba, Islamic State, kandi ko prezida Putin ashaka kujana urwanko rwiwe gushika mu bindi bihugu. Umutekano inama ya ONU ijejwe umutekano itegerezwa kuzana uri he, ni uko yabajije. ''Amahoro ari he? Ibikenewe ONU ishaka guhagararira birihe?" Yavuze ko isi igiye kubona ibindi vyaha vyo mu ntambara igisirikare c'Uburusiya gishobora kuba carakoze mu bindi bice vya Ukraine, birenze ivyo bivugwa muri Bucha. Inyuma y'ingorane z'ubuhinga, umukuru wa Ukraine Volodymir Zelensky yeretse inama ya ONU ijejwe umutekano video yafashwe muri Ukraine. Iyo video yamaze nk'umunota umwe yerekana isanamu ku yindi z'abanya-Ukraine bishwe harimwo abahiye n'abatakimenyekana isura. Dame Barbara Woodward -  ahagarariye Ubongereza (UK) muri ONU, akaba ari nawe mukuru w'inama ya ONU ijejwe umutekano yashimiye prezida Zelenshky kuba yeberetse iyo video. Yavuze ko ayo masanamu ateye ubwoba. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zasubiye gushimika zisaba ko Uburisya bwohagarikwa mu rwego rwa ONU rujejwe agateka ka zina muntu -zivuga ko zatahuye ko ivyaha vy'intambara vyakozwe muri Ukraine. Linda Thomas-Greenfield, uwuhagarariye Amerika muri ONU yabiye inama ya ONU ijejwe umutekano ko ''Uburusiya budakwiye kuba bufise ijambo mu rwego intego yabwo nyamukuru ari uguteza inbere ukwubahiriza uburenganzira bwa zina muntu". Yavuze ko kuba Uburusiya  burimwo ''bikomeretsa" izina ry'urwo rwego, biturutse kuri iyo ntambara ''itasomborokejwed hamwe n'akaga [yateye]". Ahindukiriye ku mukuru wa Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky Thomas-Greenfield yamubwiye ati: ''Turi kumwe n'abanya-Ukraine mu gihe muhanzwe n'ico gitero ku bwigenge bwanyu, demokrasi yanyu n'ukwishira no kwizana kwanyu."

headline: Ibibazo vyanyu kuri coronavirus: Urukingo pfizer rukingira n'ubundi bwoko
text: Tubandanya kubashikiriza inyishu ku bibazo vyanyu ku kiza ca coronavirus, uno munsi muganga akaba asubiza bibazo ku rukingo rwa pfizer hamwe n'ukwanduzanya hagati y'umugore yibungenze n'umwana wiwe. Ni ibibazo vyabajijwe n'abitwa Welsh Man na Mugisha Peter, bikaba vyishurwa na Muganga Leonard Nduwayo. Mubandanye kuturungikira ibibazo vyanyu kuri coronavirus ku rubuga rwaru rwa facebook (bbcgahuza), uko bishoboka Muganga azoja arabisubiza.

headline: Coronavirus: Ibihugu vyo muri Afrika biriteguriye kurwanya coronavirus?
text: Afrika ni umwe mu migabane ibiri ata bantu baramenyekana ko banduye ikiza ca koronavirus,  ariko abahinga baragabisha ko hakiri kare  kugira havugwe ko ata muntu n'umwe arafatwa n'ico kiza, umuntu aravye imigenderanire ikomeye hagati y'uyu mugabane n'u Bushinwa. Abantu barenga 900 baramaze gupfa , abantu barenga 40.000 kw'isi, benshi muri bo abashinwa,  baramaze kumenyekana ko banduye ico kiza. Mu ndwi iheze, ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi (OMS) ryaremeje ko coronavirus ari ikiza gihanze - ahanini kubera ubwoba  ku bihugu bikenye bitoshobora kumenya ingene bivyifatamwo ico kiza kirinze kibishikamwo. Umukuru wa OMS Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus ati: "Imvo nini y'urwo rwandiko si ibiriko birabera mu Bushinwa,  ariko ni ibindi bibera mu bindi bihugu. Amatohoza yacu akomeye n'uko uyo mugera woshobora gukwiragira mu bindi bihugu bidafise ubushobozi bukomeye bwo kuvura'. Ibisata vy'amagara y'abantu vy'ibihugu vyinshi vya Afrika bisanzwe bihanzwe n'umuzigo uremereye, vyoshoboka gute  ko bigwanya ikindi kiza c'ingwara  gifise ubukari nk'ubwo? Michael Yao ajejwe ibikorwa bidasanzwe muri Afrika mw'ishirahamwe OMS, avuga ko hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe, bifise uburyo bubayabaye - ko bitohera ku busa mu kuvura. Ati: "Turazi ingene igisata c'amagara y'abantu ku mugabane wa Afrika gifise ubushobozi buke kandi ibi bisata nyene vyararengewe n'ibindi biza, rero ni nkererwa kuri twebwe kumenya iki kiza hakiri kare kugira dukinge kitarahashika". Ni ubuhe bushobozi buriho muri kino gihe mu kuvura iki kiza ? Mu ntango y'iyi ndwi , hari hamaze kuboneka ibibanza vyo gupimiramwo abantu  2 bita laboratoire ku mugabane wa Afrika.- kimwe muri Senegal ikindi muri Afrika y'epfo- vyose bifise imiti yo gupima iyo ndwara. Ivyo bibanza biriko bikora nk'ivyo kwakira   abagwayi bavuye mu turere dutandukanye tw'uyu mugabane. Bimwe muri ivyo bibanza vyo gupimiramwo,  nka Institut Pasteur de Dakar  muri Senegal,  vyarafashe iya mbere muri Afrika mu guteza imbere mu kurondera uburyo bugezweho mu bujanye n'ubuvuzi, harimwo n'ubushakashatsi ku ndwara y'ubushuhe bita fievre jaune. Ariko muri iyi  ndwi ibihugu nka Ghana, Madagascar, Nigeria na Sierra Leone vyamenyesheje ko bishobora gupima. OMS kandi yarungitse ibikoresho mu bindi bibanza 29 vyo ku mugabane wa Afrika, kugira bigire ubushobozi bwo kurwanya uyo mugera,  vyongere kandi binafashe gupima abo mu bindi bihugu, bibaye nkenerwa. Hari icizere ko mu ntango z'uku kwezi ibihugu bitari munsi ya 36 vyo ku mugabane wa Afrika bizoronka cane cane  ibikoresho vyo gushobora  gupima uyu mugera wa coronavirus. Muganga Yao avuga ko ibihugu vya Afrika  bishobora kugira ubushobozi bwo gupima uyu mugera mu gihe bizoba bimaze kuronswa imiti mishasha yo gupima izoboneka ivuye mu Bushinwa no mu bihugu vya Bulaya. Umuryango Croix Rouge utabara imbabare muri Nigeria wategekanije abakozi bitanga bangana umuliyoni kugira bafashe. Umunyamabanga mukuru wawo Abubakar Ahmed Kende yamenyesheje ko iyo  ngingo igamije gukinga kugira ngo uwo mugera ntukwiragire hose mu gihugu mu gihe woboneka, hamwe kandi no kuzibira ikiza ca ''Lassa fever''. Muri Tanzaniya , umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu  Ummy Mwalimu atangaza ko hamaze gutunganywa ibibanza vyo kwakiriramwo  abantu ukwa bonyene mu buraruko, mu buseruko no mu burengero bw'igihugu. Harategekanijwe ibikoresho vyo gupima ubushuhe hamwe n'abakozi bo kwamuganga ibihumbi 2 bahawe inyigisho. Ibihugu vyinshi harimwo Kenya , Ethiopia, Côte d'Ivoire, Ghana na Botswana vyarasuzumye  abantu  bikekwako boba banduye uwo mugera, mu kubashira mu bibanza vya bonyene. Gushik'ubu bose ntanumwe muribo yabonetse ko yanduye. Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu wa Uganda yemeje ko yashize abantu barenga 100 mu kibanza ca bonyene bashitse ku kibuga c'indege mpuzamakungu ca Entebbe. Bamwe muribo bashizwe mu kibanza ca bonyene mu bitaro 2 vyo muri Entebbe na Kampala , mugihe abandi basabwe kuguma mu mazu yabo. Muganga  Yao yagize uruhara mu kurwanya ikiza ca Ebola mu burengero bwa Afrika hagati y'2014 n'2016, n'ubu vuba mu Buseruko bwa  Republika ya Democrasi ya Kongo. avuga ko afise impungenge ko ata buryo bukwiye bwo kuvura abnduye coronavirus bamaze kuremba. Avuga ati: ''Turiko duhanura ibihugu kwigora  gupima uyu mugera hakiri kare kugira ntukwire hose mu gihugu - kuko vyotugora kuwugwanya''. Iciza kiriho ni uko ibihugu vyinshi vya Afrika biza biriko birapima ingenzi zishika  mu bivuko ikiza ca Ebola cinjiriramwo. Ibihugu vyagwanije  ikiza ca Ebola, biracafise ibibanza vyo gushira abantu ukwa bonyene hamwe n'ubuhinga bwo gucungera  indwara zandukira. Ariko mugihe hageze ibijanye n'ugupima umugera w'ico kiza, usanga bitandukanye na Ebola.  Ebola igera aho yandukira mugihe ibimenyetso biboneka, ariko hari amakuru avuga ko hari abarwayi bandukije abandi imbere y'uko baboneka ko barwaye. Imigenderanire ikomeye ihagaze ku rudandazwa hagati y'u Bushinwa n'ibihugu vya  Afrika ituma impungenge ziba nyinshi ko uwo mugera ushobora gukwiragira hose. Igihugu c'ubushinwa gifise ubucuti bunini cane buhagaze ku rudandazwa mu gihe amakompanyi ashika 10.000 y'abashinwa akorera muri Afrika Hari kandi abanyeshure barenga 80.000 b'abanyafrika, biga mu Bushinwa , nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru The Guardian. Umunyeshure w'imyaka 21 wo muri Kameruni yaravuzwe ko yanduye uwo mugera inyuma y'urugendo rwiwe mu ntara ya  Wuhan akaba ariko aravurirwa mu bitaro. Hari kandi n'abanyeshuri b'abashinwa baja kwiga kuri uwomugabane wa Afrika. Mu gihe imigenderanire ishingiye ku rudandazwa igenda ikomera, n'urugero rw'uruja n'uruza hagati hagati ya Afrika n'Ubushinwa narwo nyene rugenda rwiyongera. Ibitigiri vyinshi vy'ingenzi biteye impungenge. Muganga John Nkengasong, umuyobozi w'ikigo ca Afrika gikurikirana kikongera  kigakinga  ingwara, yanditse mu kinyamakuru citwa Nature,  ko Afrika ikwiye kuraba neza ingene ikiza ca coronavirus cakwiragiye muri Aziya bivuye ku rudandazwa hamwe n'uruja n'uruza rw'abantu. Mu 2002, Imana yarakinze Afrika ntiyashikirwa na ca kiza ca SARS kiretse umuntu umwe gusa yavuzwe muri Afrika y'epfo yijiye ayirwaye, "ariko ingendo zo mu kirere zaraduze gushika ku bice birenga 600 % mu myaka 10  iheze kubera Ubushinwa bwongereje imitahe yabwo muri Afrika''. Indege nyinshi kw'isi zarahagararitse vy'imfatakibanza ingendo ziva  zikongera zikagenda mu Bushinwa. Nico gituma indege zo ku mugabane wa Afrika zimaze imisi zisugerezwa n'abanyagihugu kugira zihagarike ingendo. Amakompanyi y'indege yo mu Misiri, Kenya, Maroc n'u Rwanda yarahagaritse ingendo zayo n'ico gihugu, ikompanyi ya mbere ifise indege nyinshi ku mugabane wa Afrika, Ethiopian Airlines - yoyo ytiyahagaritse. OMS yarasavye ama kompanyi y'indege ko atohagarika ingendo zayo mu Bushinwa, ariko irerekana ibihugu 13 vyo ku mugabane wa Afrika bikwiye kwitondera izo ngendo kubera  bifitaniye imigenderanire ikomeye n'ico gihugu. Itegekanya kurungika abakozi bayo baja gufasha muri ivyo bihugu 13  gushika muri mpera z'iyi ndwi. Muganga Matshidiso Moeti, atwara akerere ka Afrika muri OMS ati: ''Umugera mushasha uwo ari wo wose kubera uba utazwi utera ubwoba''. Ivyo bihugu 13 vyerekanwa na OMS muri Afrika ku bijanye n'uwo mugera ni ibi:

headline: Burundi - Amatora2020: Umurwi wa ONU ujejwe amatohoza utewe amakenga n’icuka kibi
text: Umurwi w'ishirahamwe ONU ujejwe gukora amatohoza ku Burundi umenyesha ko imyiyamamazo ibandanya mu gihugu irangamwo ukutihanganiranira hamwe n'ibikorwa vy'ubugizi bwa nabi bijanye n'ihohotera ry'agateka ka zina muntu. Mw'itangazo wasohoye ejo ku wa kane, uwo murwi umenyesha ko muri kino kiringo c'imyiyamamazo habaye ugushamirana bikomeye hagati y'abanywanyi b'imigambwe CNDD-FDD na CNL, ivyatumye abantu bakomereka abandi bagapfa. Uwo murwi wagiriza abanywanyi ba CNDD-FDD 'gukwiragiza amajambo y'urwanko no guhohotera abatavuga rumwe', mu gihe igitigiri kinini c'abanywanyi ca CNL, harimwo n'abazokwitoza kw'izina ry'uwo mugambwe be n'abazowuserukira mu guhagarikira amatora bahagaritswe bagapfungwa. Uvuga ko abanywanyi b'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi bakora amabi ntibigere bakorwako'. Iryo tangazo risohotse inyuma y'aho leta y'u Burundi iherutse kwagiriza umugambwe CNL ko ari bo nkwezi y'amarere mu gutera abanywanyi b'umugasmbwe CNDD-FDD, ibiherutse gusubirwamwo n'umuvuguzi w'igipolisi. Umugambwe CNL wamirira ivyo vyagiriji, ukagiriza urwaruka rw'umugambwe uru ku butegetsi,  Imbonerakure, ko ari zo zitera umudugararo, ubutegetsi nabwo bukazikingira ikibaba. Mw'iryo tangazo, umurwi wa ONU ujejwe gukora amatohoza ku Burundi umenyesha ko wari wagabishije leta y'u Burundi n'amakungu ku bikorwa bibi biriko biraba muri kino kiringo c'amatora. Uyo murwi wari wagabishije ko iburabuza ry'abatavuga rumwe n'ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu bishobora kuba inzitizi zikomeye mu gihe c'amatora. Uwo murwi umenyesha ko hari utunenge twibonekeje mw'itegurwa ry'amatora cane cane mw'itangwa ry'amakarata y'itora hamwe n'intonde z'abazotora zitamanitswe, ibiteye amakenga ku bwigenge bw'umurwi ujejwe gutegura amatora. Uwo murwi uvuga uti: "Kubona urwego rw'ubutungane ruriko rurakoreshwa mw'ihohotera ry'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi, ata ndorerezi z'amatora zigenga, n'uko atacizere kuri sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro, bituma abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi hamwe n'igice c'abanyagihugu babona ko amatora ashobora kuzokwibwa, maze ibizova mu matora bigashobora kutizerwa". Usaba leta gufata ingingo zotuma uburenganzira bwa kiremwa muntu bwubahirizwa, ico cuka kibi naco kigahagarara kugira ngo Abarundi bashobore kuzokwizera ibizotangazwa ko vyavuye muri ayo matora. Isaba kandi leta guhana abakora ibibi, "cane cane bamwe bamwe mu begereye umugambwe uri ku butegetsi, harimwo imbonerakure na bamwe mu bategetsi". Uyo murwi uhamagarira abarongoye imigambwe gukora uko bashoboye kugira ngo bahagarike icuka kibi, bongere batorere umuti ibibazo hagati yabo babicishije mu nama n'ingingo. Leta y'u Burundi yagiriza abanywanyi b'umugambwe CNL kudurumbanya umutekano w'amatora mu gushotora abo mu yindi migambwe, cane cane abo mu mugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi. Ku ncuro zitatu kuva imyiyamamazo itanguye, umuvugizi w'igipolisi yaragirije uyo mugamwe ko ari wo nkwezi y'imishamirano ivugwa irya n'ino mu gihugu, yagirije umukuru wa CNL ko yahamagariye abanywanyi biwe gutera abo mu yindi migambwe, cane cane CNDD-FDD. Ibirego nk'ivyo kandi ku mugambwe CNL vyarashikirijwe kandi n'umushikiranagnji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu bagabisha ko badashobora kubandanya babihanganira. Ku ruhande rwayo, CNL yoyo iramirira ibiyivugwako n'abo bategetsi b'igihugu, ikanabagiriza ko bakingira ikibaba abanywanyi b'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi bagirizwa ko ari bo ntandaro y'ingorane zose. Terence Manirambona avugira uyo mugambwe aheruka kubwira BBC ko abo bategetsi bahengamiye ku mugambwe uri ku butegetsi, akavuga ko barenza uruhu rw'amaso ku mabi abanywanyi bawo bakorerwa n'abo muri CNDD-FDD, bamwe mu bategetsi n'abajejwe umutekano. Avuga ko ibitero abanywanyi babo bakorerwa n'abo mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi bituma haba ubuhangana n'imishamirano, aho hari abanyuruzwa bakaburirwa irengero, abandi bakicwa, ingaruka zavyo zikaba ari uko abanywanyi b'umugambwe CNL ari bo baca bahagarikwa bakongera bagafungwa. Mu gihe hasigaye iminsi itanu ngo amatora y'umukuru w'igihugu, abashingamateka n'abahanuzi b'amakomine ategekanijwe ku wa 20 z'ukwa gatanu, abariko barondera kwitoza mu bibanza bitandukanye barabandanya kuzunguruka irya n'ino mu gihugu mu myiyamamazo izorangira kuwa Mungu igenenekerezo rya 17/05.

headline: Tokyo Paralympics: Abanonotsi bagendana ubumuga ba Afghanistan bahungishijwe
text: Komite mpuzamakungu y'inkino z'abagendana ubumuga iremeza ko abanonotsi babiri b'abanye Afghanistan bahungishijwe igihugu cabo. Vyari bitegekanijwe ko abo banonotsi bakina taekwondo, Zakia Khudadad na Hossain Rasouli, bahiganwa mu nkino z'abagendana ubumuga i Tokyo zatanguye kuri uyu wa gatatu. Ariko abo babiri bari mu bantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi batari bwashobore kuva muri ico gihugu inyuma y'aho aba Talibani bafatiye ubutegetsi. Ibendera rya Afghanistan ryatwawe n'umukorerabushake mu birori vyo kwugurura izo nkino ku musi wa kabiri. Umuvugizi wa komite mpuzamakungu y'inkino z'abagendana ubumuga (IPC) Craig Spence yagize ati: "Harakozwe utwigoro kugira tubakure muri Afghanistan, ubu bari mu kibanza gitekanye". "Sinshobora kubabwira aho bari kuko ibi ntibiraba ukwinonora imitsi, ibi vyerekeye ubuzima bw'abantu no gukingira abantu. "Ni vyo baciye mu bihe bikomeye, barabandanya gukurikiranwa no gufashwa mu bibazo boba baragize mu mutwe. "Tuguma tumenyeshwa umwanya ku mwanya aho bari n'ingene ubuzima bwabo bwifashe". Khudadadi w'imyaka 23, yari kuba umupfasoni wa mbere aserukiye Afghanistan mw'ihiganwa ry'abagendana ubumuga, kandi yari yasavye ubufasha bwo guhunga inyuma y'aho abatalibani bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan.

headline: Hari ubwoko bwa Covid bungana gute, incanco zihasanzwe zizokora?
text: Hadutse ubwoko bwa coronavirus bwihinduye cane abahinga bavuga ko "buteye umutima uhagaze". Kimwe mu bibazo vyihutirwa cane n'ukumenya niba incanco zizobandanya zikora? Hari ubwoko ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bwa Covid butembera mw'isi. Ivyo ni ukuvyitega kuko imigera (virus) irihindura buri gihe. Ariko ubwo bwoko bushasha, bwitwa B.1.1.529 cane  Omicron, bwatumye abahinga bagira umutima uhagaze cane kuko butandukanye n'ubwo mu ntango, ari nabwo incanco zakozwe kugira zirwanye. Bufise ubushobozi bwo kwihundura kenshi -gashika 50.  Muri ako kose, 32 kari mu murongo w'izo incanco zishobora kurwanya. Ariko haracari kare cane kugira hamenyekane ingene bubangamye. Incanco zihari gushika ubu ntizihuye cane nabwo bishoboka rero ko zidakora, nk'uko bivugwa n'abahinga. Ariko ivyo ntibisigura  ko ata gukinga zotanga na gato. Mwibuke, incanco zifise akamaro cane mu gukingira ubuzima mu kugabanya ivyago vyo kurwara ukaremba kubera ubundi bwoko bwa Covid, harimwo  Delta, Alpha, Beta na Gamma. Abaganga bavuga ko ari nkenerwa cane ko abantu baronka  igitigiri c'incanco zitegerezwa kugira baronke ubudahangarwa bukwiye ku bwoko buhasanzwe n'ubushobora kwaduka. Abahinga bagiye gukora ibipimo vyinshi kugira barabe ko incanco zizokora kuri ubwo bwoko bwadutse ubu vuba. Haracari kare, ariko abahinga bazokwiga ukwihindura gushoboka kwotuma ubwo bwoko  bwandukira kurusha kandi bukagira impfagusa ubudahangarwa bwari bwatanzwe n'incanco. Kandi bazokwiga kugira bamenye niba butera kuremba kurusha ubundi bwari buhasanzwe, Incanco  zijanye n'aho uwo  mugera wa Covid ugeze zija ziriko zirigwa kandi zigeragezwa, hamwe vyoshika zigakenerwa. Hamwe ico gihe coshika, urucanco rushasha rwoshobora kuboneka mu kiringo c'amayinga kugira rurabwe ko rukora. Abakora incanco barashobora kandi guca banyarutsa cane kuzigwiza kandi abagenzura ingene zikora baramaze kuvugana ingene boca bihutisha inzira bicamwo kugira zemezwe. Amakenga ntiyoba aheze, ariko iyo nzira yose -kuva kurukora gushika rwemezwe- yonyaruka kurusha igihe incanco za mbere za Covid zatangura gukoreshwa. Ababijejwe hari ubwo  bashinze ijisho. Ubushobora kubangama cane bawitwa  ubwoko buteye impungenge  hanyuma bukaba burimwo: Mu Bwongereza hari n'ubundi bwamuka kuri Delta bashinze ijisho, ubwo nabwo bukitwa  AY.4.2 canke "Delta plus". Nta kigaragaza ko hari na bumwe muri ubwo butera kuremba kurusha ku bantu benshi. Naho ku bwoko bwa Covid bwo mu ntango, ivyago vyinshi biri ku bantu bageze mu za bukuru canke basanzwe bagendana izindi ndwara zikomeye. Ariko naho biri uko, iyo ubwoko bwandukira cane, bwongereza igitigiri c'abapfa mu bantu baba bataronse incanco. Incanco zikingira umuntu ku rugero rwo hejuru kuremba kubera Covid-19, harimwo n'indwara zivuye ku bwoko bw'impungenge. Incanco zigabanya kandi ivyago vyo kwandura. Ariko ntizikura ivyago vyose. Impanuro yo kwirinda kwandura iguma ari imwe ku bwoko ubwaribwo bwose: gukaraba intoke, kuja kure y'abandi, kwambara agafukamunwa uri mu bantu benshi hanyuma no kwiyubara ko aho uri haca akayaga. Kuki haboneka ubwoko bushasha? Imigera (virus) ikora nka kurya kwa kopi ya carbone (carbon copy) mu kugwira, ariko ntibikora  neza. Hari igihe hajamwo ikosa gutyo igaca ihindura uko uturemangingo dupanze, bigaca bivamwo ubwoko bushasha. Iyo ivyo bihaye umugera amahirwe yo kubandanya ubaho, ubwoko bushasha buratera imbere. Uko umugera wa coronavirus uronka amahirwe yo kwikorera kopi muri twebwe -tuwuhaye indaro- niho hongerekana amahirwe ko haboneka  ubwoko bushasha. Nico gituma kugabanya kwandura ari nkenrwa cane. Incanco zifasha guhagarika guhanahana umugera kandi zikabuza ko umuntu aremba iyo arwaye Covid. Abahinga bavuga ko bishoboka ko ubwo bwoko bwihinduye cane B.1.1.529 bushobora kuba bwavuye ku murwayi umubiri wiwe utashobora kwikura indwara ya Covid vuba, gutyo biha uwo mugera uwundi mwanya wo kwihindura.

headline: Burundi: Francine Niyonsaba yakiriwe nk’intwari i Bujumbura ashikanye umuhigo w'isi
text: Francine Niyonsaba, umugore anyaruka cane kurusha abandi ku isi mu imetero 2,000 yatewe iteka n'abantu isinzi ubwo yari ashitse ku kibuga c'indege mpuzamakungu ca Bujumbura uyu munsi kuwa gatatu. Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru yagize ati: "Ndumva yuko nakoze ibisadanzwe ... nanjye ubu ndavuga ko ntasanzwe ku isi." Nubwo haherutse kuvugwa ibitero ku kibuga c'indege ca Bujumbura, n'amagrenade yatewe ku wa mbere muri ico gisagara, abantu benshi cane baje gutera iteka Francine Niyonsaba ku kibuga c'indege no ku mabarabara ya Bujumbura. Mu ndwi iheze i Zagreb muri Croatia Niyonsaba yanditse amateka mu gusiganwa 2,000m aho yaciye umuhigo ku isi akoresheje iminota 5:21'56''. Francine Niyonsaba w'imyaka 28, ari mu banonotsi benshi babujijwe guhiganwa ku metero hagati ya 400 na 1,500 kubera ko baremanywe imisemburo (testosterone) myinshi. Abo mu ntara y'iwabo, ku kibuga c'indege bari bafise icapa canditseko ngo "Abanya Ruyigi n'Abarundi twese turaguhaye ikaze kandi turagukeje kw'iteka waraye uteye igihugu cacu n'intara". Niyonsaba yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ati: "Ni amateka, ni umugisha ku Burundi kuba mvuye mu mahanga aho nari maze iminsi guhiganwa mu bihugu bitandukanye". Yababariye uko yagiye asiganwa ahereye muri Amerika, mu Bufaransa, mu Bubiligi, mu Busuwisi, Croatia na Espagne. Ati: "Aho hose nagiye ndaca nongera ntsinda, kwari ukongera amanota ashobora kunshikana muri finale kugira mpiganirwe iki gikombe mubona natsinze mu 5000m [Diamond League i Zurich] akaba ari igikombe kidasanzwe. Ni igikombe gitashe ubwa mbere mu Burundi, ni umugisha ku muryango, ni umugisha ku gihugu ciwanje." Niyonsaba avuga ko atagarukiye aho kuko yagiye muri Croatia aho yaciye urya muhigo w'isi. Ati: "Ababonye uko nakoze ihiganwa barabonye yuko ubu umurundikazi ari we afise umwanya w'uwunyaruka kw'isi ku metero 2,000 mu minota 5 amasegonda 21 n'ibice 56. "Ivyo ntivyari bwabeho ngaha kw'isi, ni record mondial itashe mu Burundi kuva bwitwa Uburundi." Francine avuga ko vyamunezereye rwose kubona abarundi bo mu gihugu no mu makungu bose baranezerewe n'intsinzi yiwe. Ati: "Ivyo bikantera intege bikantera kwishima. Ndumva yuko nakoze ibidasanzwe kandi koko nyene ivyo nakoze ntibisanzwe, nanje ubu ndavuga ko ntasanzwe ku isi." Francine avuga ko ibi ari intango kandi bitumye agiye gukora gusumba kuko ashaka kwongera kunezereza abarundi umwaka uza. Ati: "Nozonezerwa cane umwaka uza ngarutse mfise igikombe nk'iki muri shampionat du monde izobera muri Amerika, nkashobora guha umunezero Abarundi".

headline: Erling Haaland: Manchester City iguze uyu munye-Norvege avuye muri Borussia ku miriyoni £51,2m
text: Manchester City yashitse ku masezerano yo kugura umusatirizi w'igihangange ava muri Norvege, Erling Haaland, imukuye muri Borussia Dortmund. Haaland w'imyaka 22, azotangura gukinira City muri Mukakaro (7), mu gihe iyo kipe yamaze kwemera kurekura imiriyoni 60 z'ama euro yasabwa mu masezerano yiwe. Aya masezerano aheraheje umwete w'iyi kipe wo kurondera umusatirizi asubirira uwayinjirije vyinshi bimaze kuboneka, Sergio Aguero, yagiye muri Barcelona ici riheruka. City yagize iti "Turashobora kwemanga yuko twashitse ku mwumvikano wo kugura umusatirizi Erling Haaland". "Kuza kw'uyu mukinyi kurindiriye kwuzuzwa kw'ibisabwa vyose mu vyumvikanywe nawe." Haaland yarinjije ibitsindo 85 mu nkino 88 amaze gukinira Dortmund kuva yaza muri iyo kipe avuye muri Red Bull Salzburg muri Nzero (1) 2020. Ibihangange vyo muri La Liga, Real Madrid na Barcelona, navyo vyari vyavuganye na Haaland bishaka kumugura, ariko aca ahitamwo kuja Etihad Stadium. Aho yavuga kare kuri uno wa kabiri, umumenyereza wa Manchester City, Pep Guardiola, yavuze ko adashobora kuvuga ku bakinyi bari mu gusinya kubera imvo z'amategeko. Yongeyeko ati "Abantu bose barazi uko bimeze. Sinshobora kuvuga kuko sinkunda kuvuga kuri kazoza canke ku mwaka w'inkino ukurikira". Abajijwe akamaro umusatirizi mushasha yogirira iyi kipe isanzwe ari yo ifise igikompe ca Premier League, Guardiola yagize ati: "Abakinyi bashasha bama bafasha mu gukomeza ikipe. Ariko nta musatirizi umwe canke myugariro yokemura ibibazo vyo kuzibira canke kwinjiza. "Ikipe itegerezwa kwama ifise intumbero ya kazoza. Ivyemezo ikipe ifata ndabizi kandi ndabishigikiye 100%." Kugurwa kw'uyu mukinyi nikwo kuzoba gukomeye kurusha ukundi kwose muri rino ci.

headline: Dar es Salaam: Kwinonora imitsi birabujijwe ku misi yo gusenga
text: Umukuru w'igipolisi mu gisagara ca Dar es Salaam muri Tanzania, Lazaro Mambosasa avuga ko kuva ubu, kizira ko abantu bagira imyiyerekano canke kwinonora imitsi ku misi hategekanijwe amasengesho, ko igipolisi kitazotanga impusha kuri iyo misi. Mambosasa avuga ko kugira imyiyerekano ku misi yo gusenga bituma abasenga bacererwa gushika ahabera amasengesho. "Ku misi yo gusenga, ntituzemera abaca muri izo nzira mu kubima uruhusha, nta mugwi n'umwe urekuriwe guca muri ivyo bibanza, abaja gusenga i Dar Es Salaam bagenda n'imodoka, rero urekuriye abagira imyimeneyerezo mu mabarabara canke abagira imyiyerekano iyo ari yo yose, bituma amabarabara yugarwa, kandi amasengesho ajana n'umwanya." Yongeyeko ko imisi yo gusenga ari ku wa gatanu, ku wa gatandatu no ku wa mungu. Muri iyi myaka ya vuba, abantu benshi basigaye binonora imitsi mu mabarabara mu gisagara ca Dar Es Salaam. Ukwinonora imitsi bitegurwa n'amashirahamwe atandukanye ariko rimwe na rimwe bafise ihangiro ryo gufasha abantu bafise ingorane bari mu turere dutandukanye. Uko kwinonora imitsi kenshi kuba mu mpera z'iyinga kugira haboneke abantu benshi bavyitaba kuko baba bari mu karuhuko.

headline: Covid: Hari ibihugu bifise amakenga ko bitazoronka incanco z'iki iza karanda
text: Amasanamu y'abantu ba mbere bariko baraterwa incanco za Covid-19 si ukuvuga ko zanezereje bose mu mpande z'isi. Hari ibihugu bimwe bibona ko urugamba rwo kuzoronka izi ncanco ruzoba rurerure kandi rutazokworoha. Igihe Lois Chingandu  wo muri Zimbabwe yabona ingene Ubwongereza butanguza uru rucanco, ntaco vyamubwiye - ahubwo yagize agahinda. Co kimwe n'abatari bake muri twebwe, aripfuza cane gucandagwa kugira no ubuzima busubire ku murongo, ariko ntabona neza ingene ivyo bizoshoboka. Ntabona neza ingene igihugu ciwe, zimbabwe, kizohava kironka uru rucanco. Avuga ati:  "Ubu nguma nibaza nimba tuzohava tururonka nkiri muzima". "Ndi mu bwoba ko nzohava nandura Covid kandi ikanampitana kubera aho mbaye". Kumbure abantu bohava babona ko ariko arashikuza, ariko avuga ibi afatiye kuvyo yabonye muri kahise bisa n'ibi. Umupfasoni Chingandu akora mu gisata kijejwe kurwanya ikiza SIDA, akaba yibuka ingene mu mpera z'imyaka 1990 i Harare, umugwa mukuru wa Zimbabwe, abantu bagandagurika buri musi bahitanywe na SIDA. Imiti yo gupfupfahaza yari isanzwe iriho, ariko yahabwa abari bifise. Ati: "Haciye igihe abifise bakiyumvira ko hageze gutabara ba nyarucari, aho niho tuzoronka urucanco". Umupfasoni Chingandu ari mw'ishirahamwe ryiswe People's Vaccine Alliance, ishirahamwe rinegura cane ibihugu bitunze - , cane cane Amerika, Ubwongereza, ibihugu vy'umuryango w'Ubumwe bw'Uburayi, hamwe na Canada - ko biriko birigungirako incanco. Nk'uko bivugwa n'abashakashatsi bo kuri kaminuza ya Duke muri Amerika basanzwe bakurikirana ingene amareta ahana amasezerano n'amahinguriro akora izi ncanco, ibihugu biri ku rushi vyarigaruriye izi ncanco mbere bigura izirengeye izo abanyagihugu vyavyo bakeneye. Canada yo nyene ubwayo, yaramaze kugura incanco ku buryo ishobora gucandaga abanyagihugu bayo incuro zitanu zose. Ibi bihugu vyaremeye bigura izi ncanco zitaranaheza guhingurwa, maze bica biraterera amafaranga menshi kugira ngo zitungane n'ingoga. Umupfasoni Chingandu n'abo bari kumwe mw'isekeza People's Vaccine babona ko ibi ari akarenganyo. Bavuga ko izi ncanco zirengako zari zikwiye guhabwa ibihugu bizikeneye. Gushika ubu, ibihugu 189 biramaze kwiyandikisha muri wa mugambi Covax ufashwe mu mugongo n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO hamwe n'ihuriro ry'amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu aharanira ko incanco zotangwa ata bugunge. Umu mugambi Covax ufise intumbero yo kwegeranya ibihugu bikaja hamwe, gutyo bikagira inguvu mu gihe bizoba biri mu biganiro n'amakompanyi ahingura imiti. Muri ivyo bihugu, 92 - vyose bikenye canke bikiri mu nzira y'amajambere - vyiteze kugura izi ncanco vyifashishije ikigega gifashwe mu mugongo ku mfashanyo itangwa n'abagiraneza. Ubwongereza buraramaze gutanga igice c'umuriyaridi w'amadorari muri iki kigega. Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n'Uburusiya biri mu bihugu bike bidatanga imfashanyo muri iki kigega. Ibihugu bisigaye bizoronka izi ncanco biciye muri uwu mugambi wa Covax. Gushika ubu, Covax iramaze kuronka umuhango w'incanco zitatu. Ariko ubu, uwu mugambi uzofasha ibice 20% vyonyene vy'abanyagihugu bose mu gihugu. Lois Chingandu n'abo bari kumwe mw'isekeza People's Vaccine babona ko hakwiye gukorwa ikintu gifadika atari mu majambo gusa, canke mbere kirengeye na Covax. Bashaka ko amakompanyi ahingura izi ncanco ahereza abandi ubu bumenyi (propriété intellectuelle), kugira ngo hashobore guhingurwa izindi zisa n'izimaze guhingurwa. Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ry'ubudandaji OMC/WTD ntirirafata ingingo ku bijanye n'uko ryokuraho amategeko ajanye n'ugutanga ubumenyi ku ncanco za Covid. Iki ciyumviro kirashigikiwe n'ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyo mw'ishirahamwe OMC, ariko ibihugu vyinshi vyo mu burengero bw'isi ntibicerekwa. Rero mu bihugu vyinshi, kuronka urucanco rwa Covid biracari kure nk'ukwezi. Umupfasoni Chingandu ati: "Abantu bagiye kubandanya bagandagurika kubera na Covid, mu gihe abandi bo mu bindi bihugu bazoba bibereyeho ataco binona".

headline: Rwanda-UK: 'A﻿badatinya gupfa ntibazotinya kurungikwa mu Rwanda' -uwurungika abantu mu kinyegero
text: Jane Corbin BBC Panorma Umuntu akora  urudandazwa rwo kwinjiza abantu mu kinyegero avuga ko umugambi w’Ubwongereza wo kurungika mu Rwanda  abajabuka kurondera ubuhungiro muri ico gihugu utazoca intege abakiriya biwe. Jane Corbin yagiye kumuraba aho akorera muri Turkia. Ni ku mugoroba w’ijoro ubwo ndiko ndurira ingazi zinjana mu nzu ikoreraa mu kinyegero  iri ku kabarabara katagira izina muri Istanbul, muri Tirkia. Ndi ngaha kugira mbonane n’umwe mu bakora urudandazwa rw’abantu mu kinyegero – vyasavye amezi n’ayandi kugira hatunganywe uwu mubonano, biciye ku wundi muntu w’umwizigirwa. Ni umusozo w’igikorwa c’amatohoza ya BBC Panorama ku kugene bigenda ngo abantu ibihumbi n’ibihumbi bajabuke bashike  ku nkengera z’ubumanuko bw’Ubwongereza kurondera ubuhungiro. Uwo muntu akora urwo rudandazwa aturuka mu Burasirazuba bwo hagati- akiri muto kandi avuga bukebuke, yambaye neza impuzu zirabura.  Yemeye kumbwira ivyerekeye urudandazwa rwiwe twemeye kudashira ahabona umwidondoro wiwe. Abamucungerera umutekano bari hanze baraba agakoma kose, ariko atawomenya ko arico bajejwe.
