Ndamubwiye ko kwinjiza abantu mu kinyegero biteye kubiri n’amategeko, ati : ”Ndazi ko ivyo bitemewe n’amategeko, ariko kuri jewe, ivyo bijanye n’ubuntu -kubikora bikenewe kuruta kwubaha amategeko. "Dufasha abantu, tubafata neza, turubaha  abagore -nta n’umwe dusuzugura canke ngo tugirire nabi.” Mu mwaka uheze hafi abantu 2.000 barapfiriye mu kiyaga Mediterranee. Mu kwezi kwa Ndamukiza (4), reta y’Ubwomgereza yumvikanye n’Urwanda ku masezerano aciye miriyoni 120 z’amafaranga y’abongereza canke pound (£), yo kurungika abarondera ubuhungiro cane cane abakiri  bonyene (batagira abagore, abagabo canke abana) kugira ivy’ubuhungiro bwabo bikorerwe mu Rwanda. Reta yavuze ko intumbero ari uguca intege urwo rudandazwa rw’abinjiza abantu mu kinyegero no guhagarika ingendo zibangamye  zo kujabuka ikiyaga Manche (English Channel). Gushika ubu muri uyu mwaka,  abantu barenga 30.000 baramaze kujabuka n’ubwato, abo  bahakwa kungana n’abajabutse mu mwaka uheze wose. Uwo muntu arungika abantu mu kinyegro arungika amajana mu Bwongereza. Ntateba kwemera ko urwo rudandazwa rwiwe rwinjiza amafaranga menshi kandi ko arufata nk’uko yoba ari ucucuruzi. Avuga ati: “Sindaba ko ari umuryango canke umuntu umwe, umuntu wese ariha  amafaranga angana n’ayo abandi. “Urugendo rwo gushika Bwongereza rusaba amadorari 17.000 [mu mafaranga y’Uburundi arenga 34.000.000] muri rusangi. None asigura gute ingene ashira ubuzima bw’abantu mu kaga mu kubajabutsa mu buryo bubangamye mu bwato  budafashe? Avuga ati: “Amasanganya arashobora gushika. Turagerageza kubatera ubwoba kugira tubace intege. “Ndababwira nti, ‘Iyo nzira irabangamye cane, ntakwigerezako. Mushobora gupfa. Nkabibwira nyina, nkabibwira na se.’” Yatweretse urupapuro - buzuza kugira bemere ko ataco azobazwa, kandi bemere ko bazi ko birimwo ingeramizi. Istambul ni mu  masanganiro hagati  ya Asia, Uburasirazuba bwo hagati, Afrika na Buraya- kandi uru rudandazwa rwo mu kinyegero rurateye imbere cane  ngaha. Kuronka abakiriya ni ihiganwa. Ku mbuga hwaniro, abinjiza abantu mu kinyegero batanga ibiciro bitandukanye bivanye n’iyo umuntu ashaka kuja. Hariho impapuro z’inzira za megendo (passports) n’impusha zo gutwara imodoka z’Ubwongereza zigurishwa. Hariho  mbere n’ibibazo vy’ubushikiranganji bw’Ubwongereza bujejwe intwaro yo  hagati kugira  bategure abaja kurondera ubuhungiro kwimenyereza kuvyishura. Uwo ajana abantu mu kinyero akura abakiriya biwe mu mazu akorera mu kinyegero muri iki gisagara, gisanzwe kirimwo impunzi zishika ku 5.000.000. Barundanirizwa mu twumba  duto duto, aho bashobora kurindirira amezi mu gihe urugendo rwabo ruba ruriko ruratunganywa. Abakozi biwe barabazanira ivyo kurya baguze mu masoko ya kijambere  (supermarkets) yo ngaho. Asigura ati: “Tubashira mu nzu tukarindira ko vyose bitungana. Vyose bikwiye, duca tukaba ama terefone yabo  kugira abaporisi ntibamenye ivyacu.” Abo barondera ubuhungiro baca burizwa imodoka mw’ijoro kuva Istanmbul bakajanwa mu misozi. Bagenda mu migwi y’abantu batandatu batandatu canke cumi cumi, gushika ku kiyaga Mediterranee, kuri bumwe mu bwato bw’uyo abajana mu kinyegero. Aho baca berekeza mu Butaliano canke mu Buguriki. Reta yavuze ko intumbero ari uguca intege urwo rudandazwa rw’abinjiza abantu mu kinyegero no guhagarika ingendo zibangamye  zo kujabuka ikiyaga Manche (English Channel). Gushika ubu muri uyu mwaka,  abantu barenga 30.000 baramaze kujabuka n’ubwato, abo  bahakwa kungana n’abajabutse mu mwaka uheze wose. Uwo muntu arungika abantu mu kinyegro arungika amajana mu Bwongereza. Ntateba kwemera ko urwo rudandazwa rwiwe rwinjiza amafaranga menshi kandi ko arufata nk’uko yoba ari ucucuruzi. Avuga ati: “Sindaba ko ari umuryango canke umuntu umwe, umuntu wese ariha  amafaranga angana n’ayo abandi. “Urugendo rwo gushika Bwongereza rusaba amadorari 17.000 [mu mafaranga y’Uburundi arenga 34.000.000] muri rusangi. None asigura gute ingene ashira ubuzima bw’abantu mu kaga mu kubajabutsa mu buryo bubangamye mu bwato  budafashe? Avuga ati: “Amasanganya arashobora gushika. Turagerageza kubatera ubwoba kugira tubace intege. “Ndababwira nti, ‘Iyo nzira irabangamye cane, ntakwigerezako. Mushobora gupfa. Nkabibwira nyina, nkabibwira na se.’” Yatweretse urupapuro - buzuza kugira bemere ko ataco azobazwa, kandi bemere ko bazi ko birimwo ingeramizi. Uwo ukora urwo rudandazwa arabihakana, ariko biravugwa ko hari uwapfiriye mu bwato bwiwe. Aratwereka amwe mu ma video -abantu bakiri bato baharurwa mu mirongo buzuye ubwato bazungagiza ibiganza, basemerera, bamushimira. Ivyo ni icemezo ko bajabutse. Amafaranga baba barishe urwo rugendo aba afiswe n’abantu bari hagati y’uwo mudandaza n’abo barungikwa, akaba atangwa ari uko imiryango ibonye ko bashitse amahoro. Uwo mudandaza aranafise n’ingene arungika abifise bashobora kuriha menshi kuruta. Abo barondera ubuhungiro rero baca bafata inzira baca i Buraya gushika ku nkengera z’uburaruko bw’Ubufaransa, hanyuma bamwe, bagaca bajabuka Manche (English Channel) kugira bashike mu Bwongereza. Hari urufatangane rw’abantu bakwiragiye ku 100km mu micungaro ya Calais bo gufasha uwo ajana abantu mu kinyegro wo muri Turkia kujabuka imitego ya nyuma. Avuga ati: “Tugura ubwato butoya. Butwara hagati ya $10.000 na $20.000. “Umwe mu babugendamwo aca aronka urugendo rwa gusa kuko yemeye kubutwara. Baca bagenda ata handi baciye, bashitse bagaca bishikana ku giporisi.” Asa n’uwufise amakenga, abamucungera bibaza ko bahava bamenyekana. Iryanyuma nabonye uwo atwara abantu mu kinyegero yariko aragura ubundi bwato nk’ubwo kugira bajabuke. Urundazwa rwiwe, aho gusamburwa, ruguma rukomera. Ibitigiri vy’abantu bajabuka biguma  vyiyongeraa kurusha, mu gihe reta y’Ubwongereza yasubiye muri sentare gusigura ko umugambi wo mu Rwanda ata kibazo uteye kandi uhuye n’amategeko. Ingingo ya sentare yo kumenya niba iyo reta yotangura kurungika abo bantu mu Rwanda  yitezwe mu kwezi kuza. Uwo mukenyuro wa reta hari ico uzohindura? Ndamubajije. Ati: “N’aho borungika abantu 1.000 mu Rwanda buri munsi, abantu ntibazohagarika canke ngo  bahindure ingingo yabo. “Niba badatinya gupfa, ntibazotinya kurungikwa mu Rwanda.”

headline: Germany: Igarariza rya Katolika mu guhezagira ababana basangiye igitsina, n'abagore basoma misa
text: Ng'izo inkengeri ziravuze, inanga ziratangura gusamirana, maze Patiri Jan Korditschke na we araduga kuri Arutari kugira ahereze inkuka y'imisa. Vyose bisa nk'uko vyahora bimeze iyo hageze imisa ku wa Mungu muri Katolika. Ariko muri ako kanya nyene, hari ikintu kidasanzwe kiri mu mitima ya bamwe kandi kibateye impungenge. Ikintu kigomba kibe ni ikidasanzwe na gato. Patiri Korditschke arafashe ijambo, ati "uwo wese yipfuza umuhezagiro w'Imana ni ahaguruke". Hafi abari mw'isengero bose barahaguruka, harimwo n'abatari bake basanzwe bubakanye basangiye ibitsina. Ng'ako akaririmbo karatanguye, patiri na we aregera, maze abaza umwe umwe ico yipfuza gusaba Imana mu bisabisho vyabo. Hanyuma niko kuganzura ibiganza yubika ku mitwe yabo asengera umwe umwe. Hari benshi bakoroye amosozi. Aba rero si abandi, ni ba bandi bubakanye basangiye ibitsina, inyuma y'imyaka itari mike nibwo bwa mbere bakiriwe ukuri kwamye muri Ekleziya. Umwe muri bo Sangha, umukatolika kuva avuka ari kumwe n'uwo bubakanye, Frieda kuva imyaka 25 yose, ati: "Ni ibintu bibabaje cane kandi ubu niho mbonye ingene nakomerekejwe ku mutima". "Mu myaka 49 yose, sinigeze nakirwa. Ariko rero impera n'imperuka, abantu baratanguye kuvuga bati: 'kuba uri ng'aha nta ngorane'". Ku bwa Matthias, na we nyene yavutse ari umukatolika akaba yaronse uwo muhezagiro ari kumwe n'uwo bubakanye Thomas, kuja mu misa ntiyigeze iba ingorane. Ariko avuga ko amajambo ashikirizwa n'abategetsi ba Katolika yamutumye yiyumvira guhindura idini. Ati: "Igihe cose namye nibaza nimba ari ngombwa ko nguma mw'idini ritanyemera. Ariko rero, Ekleziya 'nyayo' hano ku rubuga, irongeye kugarura ukwemera kwanje". Mu buryo bw'agahemo, ijambo nk'iri rishikirizwa n'abategetsi ni ryo ryatumye iyi misa igenda uko yagenze. Mu kwa gatatu, Vaticano yasohoye itangazo rikomeye rivuga ko ukwubakana hagati y'abasangiye igitsina ari "icaha", rinashimangira ko abapatiri bose bazohirahira bagahezagira abubakana basangiye igitsina bashirwa ku ruhande. Iki ni ikintu abapatiri bo nyene ku giti cabo bakora - ariko ni gake biba ku mugaragaro. Iri jambo rikarishe rya Vaticano ryashavuje abakatolika bashaka ko ibintu bihinduka mu Budagi. Mu kwishura, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abapatiri, ababikira n'abakirisu baciye batanguza isekeza bise Liebe gewinnt (Urukundo Ruratsinda/l'Amour Triomphe/Love Wins), kugira bemeze ku mugaragaro ko ababana basangiye ibitsina bemewe mu masengero yabo. Patiri Korditschke ati: "Narashavuye numva n'isoni kubera nibaza ko ari ijambo ribabaje cane". Ni umwe mu bapatiri hafi  120 bo mu Budagi bafashe ingingo yo kugarariza ku mugaragaro iri tegeko rya Vaticano. Mu kiringo c'indwi imwe gusa abapatiri baremesheje ibisabisho mu masengero ya Katolika mu gihugu cose c'Ubudagi bahezagira abantu abo ari bo bose babisavye, harimwo n'abubakanye mu buryo Vaticano ibona ko ari icaha, nk'abubakanye n'abahukanye, hamwe n'abubakanye basangiye igitsina. Umunyamakuru wa BBC abajije Patiri Korditschke ingene asigura igituma aja kubiri n'itegeko rya Vaticano, yishuye akorora amosozi. Guhezagira abubakanye basangiye ibitsina biri mu bintu bigenda vyiyongera mu bakatolika bashaka ko ibintu bihinduka mu Budagi. Amashirahamwe aharanira agateka k'abagore, nka Maria 2.0, nayo nyene asaba uburenganzira bungana muri Ekleziya. Haciye umusi umwe inyuma y'iki gisabisho ca Patiri Korditschke i Berlin, abagore baragiye ku ruhimbi basigura ijambo ry'Imana mu masengero ya Katolika 12 atandukanye y'Ubudagi - na vyo nyene Vaticano ikaba itavyemera. Ulrike Göken-Huismann umugore yashikirije ijambo mw'isengero asengeramwo mu karere ka Düsseldorf, avuga ati: "Ekleziya yahora itwigisha ko Isi iringaniye kandi yatwigisha ko twategerezwa kuvyemera uko. Ariko rero vyabaye ngombwa ko Ekleziya ihindura. Canke kandi wibuke ko wategerezwa kwemwera ko Adamu na Eva ari abantu babayeho. Ntibivuga y'uko Ekleziya idategerezwa guhindura ivyo yigisha". Abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika mu Budagi ntibahuza: hari uruhande rumwe rw'abasenyeri  rushigikiye ko ibintu bihinduka, mu gihe urundi ruhande rw'abarongoye Ekleziya ruryumako, rukaba rushigikiye intumbero ya Vaticano itarota iva kw'izima . Hagati aho, ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko hari abakatolika ku giti cabo mu Budagi bashaka ko ibintu bihinduka. Icigwa kimwe cakozwe n'amashure kaminuza yo mu bisagara vya Berlin na Münster cerekana ko ibice 70% vy'abakatolika mu Budagi bashigikiye ko abubakanye basangiye ibitsina bahezagirwa, 80% nabo bakaba ata ngorane babona ku bantu babanye batarahezagirwa, hanyuma 85% nabo bakaba babona ko abapatiri nabo bokwemererwa kurongora. Inyuma y'igisabisho co guhezagira abubakanye basangiye igitsina i Berlin, abantu baharurwa mw'ijana baciye bakoranira hamwe hanze y'isengero biha agacupa mu buryo bwo kwigina kuri iyo ntambwe. Ariko kw'irembo ry'isengero, abantu bashika cumi bakoze imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza iyi ngendo, bafise icapa canditseko ngo "Imana ntihezagira icaha". Nta mishamirano iri hagati y'izi mpande ariko zompi zigizwe n'abantu bakomeye muri Ekleziya Katolika badahuriza hamwe. Amwenyura, Patiri Korditschke  wewe yivugira ati "ivyo na vyo ni sawa." Papa avuga iki ku bijanye n'abahuza ibitsina babisangiye? Mu kw'icumi 2020: Papa Francis yabwiye umuhinga akora amareresi ko abashaka kwubakana basangiye ibitsina "bokwemererwa imbere y'amategeko".  "Abahuza ibitsina babisangiye ... ni abana b'Imana kandi bafise uburenganzira bwo kuba mu muryango. Nta n'umwe yokwirukanwa canke ngo agirirwe nabi kubera ico". Mu kw'icumi  2014: Ikoraniro ry'abasenyeri b'Ekleziya (synod) bahakanye ivyipfuzo vyari bishigikiwe na Papa ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye bokwemerwa. Mu kw'indwi  2013: Ari mu ndege ari ku rugendo, Papa yabwiye abanyamakuru ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye batokumirwa ahubwo ko boshirwa mu muryango. Yavuze ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye basanzwe bari mu barongoye Ekleziya bogirirwa imbabazi, ivyaha vyabo bigaharirwa. 2013:Mu gitabo On Heaven and Earth (Ku vyerekeye Ijuru n'Isi), Papa avuga ko gufata ku rugero rumwe abahuza  ibitsina babisangiye n'abubakana badasangiye ibitsina kwoba "ari ugusubira inyuma nk'ibirenge". 2010: Igihe yari musenyeri mukuru wa Buenos Aires yariyamiriza ko amategeko yemerera abashaka kwubakana basangiye ibitsina ariko agashigikira ko abasanzwe bubakanye basangiye ibitsina bokingirwa n'amategeko ku rugero kanaka.

headline: USA: Imyiyerekano muri Wisconsin irabandanya inyuma y'aho abapolisi barashe umwirabure
text: Mu ntara ya Wisconsin muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika hadutse imyiyerekano inyuma y'aho igipolisi kirasiye amasasu menshi umwirabure. Uyo mugabo yarashwe azwi kw'izina rya Jacob Blake, araremvye aho ariko aravurirwa. Ireresi yerekanywe ku mbuga hwaniro yerekana bwana Blake ariko araraswa amasasu mu mugongo igihe yariko agerageza kwinjira mu modoka mu gisagara ca Kenosha. Abategetsi b'ico gisagara bamenyesha ko haciye hafatwa ingingo zo kuguma muhira mu masaha y'ijoro kubera imyiyerekano yadutse inyuma y'ako kabi. Abantu baharurwa mu majana mw'ijoro ryakeye bugarije ibiro vy'igipolisi. Amamodoka yaturiwe mu gihe abari mu myiyerekano nabo bumvikana bakoma induru bavuga bati: "Ntidushobora gusubira inyuma". Mw'itangazo ryo kugabisha abanyagihugu, igipolisi gisaba abacuruza bakora amasaha 24 kuraba ingene bokwugara kubera hashobora kuba ubusuma bukorwa n'abitwaje ibirwanisho. Abapolisi bakoresheje vya vyuka bikoroza amosozi mu kugerageza gushwiragiza amajana n'amajana y'abari mu myiyerekano barenze ku mategeko yo kutava muhira gushika isaha imwe z'igitondo uno munsi ku wa mbere. Buramatari w'intara ya Wisconsin Tony Evers ariyamiriza iraswa rya bwana Brake avugwa ko ata kirwanisho yari afise. Mw'itangazo yasohoye yavuze ati: "N'aho tutararonka amakuru arambuye ku vyabaye, ico tuzi neza ni uko atari umwirabure wa mbere arashwe canke akomerekejwe canke yishwe bunyamaswa kandi ari mu minwe y'abajejwe umutekano mu ntara yacu canke mu gihugu cacu". "Turiyamirije ikoreshwa ry'inguvu z'umurengera rituma ibintu biyangara iyo habaye ikibazo ku birabure wa Wisconsin". Izina rya Jacob Blake ryazungurutse cane ku mbuga hwaniro maze abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi batera igikumu ku rwandiko rusaba ko abapolisi bakoze iryo shano bashirwa imbere y'ubutungane. Igipolisi co mu gisagara ca Kenosha kimenyesha ko "umupolisi yarashe" inyuma y'isaha cumi n'imwe zo ku mugoroba ejo ku wa Mungu. Kivuga kandi ko abapolisi baciye banyarukana Bwana Blake kwa muganga mu gisagara ca Milwaukee. Nta nsiguro catanze ku vyatumye uyo mwirabure araswa. Igisata kijejwe ubutungane mu ntara ya Wisconsin kiriko kirakora amatohoza. Kimenyesha ko abapolisi bakoze ivyo baciye bategekwa kuja mu karuhuko k'igihano. Mw'ireresi yahanahanywe ku mbuga hwaniro, abapolisi batatu baboneka barabishije iminwa y'inkoho zabo kuri bwana Blake mu gihe yariko aja ku mudoka yiwe. Mu gihe yari yuguruye umuryango agaca yegamira ku modoka, umupolisi umwe aboneka amufashe ishati kandi ariko aramurasa. Iyo reresi yerekana ko harashwe amasasu indwi, mu gihe abari ng'aho bariko bakoma induru. Abapolisi bakoze ivyo ntibamenyekanye amazina. Ben Crump, umunyamategeko aharanira ubutungane kuri bose, yabwiye tereviziyo CNN ko abana b'abahungu batatu ba bwana Blake bari mu modoka igihe yari agiye kwinjiramwo igihe yaraswa. Yanditse ku rubuga rwiwe rwa twitter ati: "Bariboneye ingene umupolisi yarashe se wabo. Ivyo bizobahahamura ubuzima bwabo bwose. Ntidushobora kwemera ko abapolisi bahonyanga amabanga yabo bajejwe yo KUDUKINGIRA". Avuga ko bwana Blake yarashwe igihe yari ahejeje kubanguranya abariko bararwana. Eka n'ababonye ivyabaye babwiye ikinyamakuru ngurukanabumenyi Kenosha News ko Blake yari ahejeje kubanguranya abagore babiri bariko bararwana imbere y'uko igipolisi gishika. Ibi bibaye mu gihe habandanya imishamirano ikomeye muri Amerika ivuye ku bugome bw'igipolisi inyuma y'iyicwa ry'umwirabure George Floyd mu kwa gatanu. Urupfu rwiwe rwatumye haduka imyiyerekano ikomeye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika no mu zindi mpande z'isi,  mw'isekeza ryiswe Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'umwirabure ni kirumara).

headline: Ikigo kijejwe kurwanya indwara CDC kirashima ingene Africa yarwanije coronavirus
text: Umuyobozi w'ikigo ca Afrika gishinzwe kurwanya indwara (CDC) yashimiye ibihugu vy'Afrika ku kungene vyashoboye guhagarika ikwirakwira rya coronavirus. Ku mugabane wose wa Afrika, abantu umuliyoni 1.4 nibo banduye, abashika ibihumbi 34 bakaba ari bo bapfuye kuva mu kwa gatatu. Ibi biharuro biri hasi cane ugereranije n'ivya Bulaya, Aziya, Amerika, kandi bikaba bigenda bigabanuka. John Nkengasong arongoye ikigo CDC yabwiye BBC ko ingingo zafashwe hakiri kare muri Afrika zafashije cane mu kurwanya ikwirakwira ry'uwu mugera. Ikigo CDC ni ikigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu kikaba cegukira umuryango w'ibihugu vya Afrika AU. Uyu mugabane utuwemwo n'abantu barenga gato umuliyaridi ufise ibice biri munsi ya 5% vy'abanduye umugera kw'isi yose, hamwe na 3.6% vy'abapfuye. Muganga Nkengasong avuga ko amakuru avuga ko abandura umugera hamwe n'abo uhitana atavugwa ko ari "ibinyoma". Ati: "Kumbure birashoboka ko hari abandura ntitubamenye, nk'uko biri no mu bindi bice vy'isi…ariko ntabo tubona bapfira ku mabarabara canke bahambwa mu binogo rusangi muri Afrika". Kuva habonetse umurwayi wa mbere mu kwa gatatu, ibihugu vyose vya Afrika vyaciye vyihutira gufata ingingo mu ntumbero yo kurwanya uwu mugera. Vyinshi muri vyo, harimwo na Afrika y'Epfo, vyarafashe ingingo za guma mu rugo mu gihugu cose, ariko hari n'ibindi vyovyo nka za Etiyopiya vyafashe ingingo zibayabaye. Hagati aho, Muganga Nkengasong avuga ko kubona ibitigiri vy'abanduye vyagumye hasi vyavuye "ku gukorera hamwe kw'ibihugu vyose vy'umugabane", vyaciye vyitaho "gupima ku murindi munini kandi bigaca bihimiriza abantu kwambara udupfukamunwa". Ati: "Mu bihugu vyinshi, harimwo na Etiyopiya nsanzwe nkomokamwo, winjiye mu mabarabrara ya Addis-Abeba uzosanga hafi 100% bose bambaye udupfukamunwa". Muganga Nkengasong avuga kandi ko kubona abenshi mu batuye ku mugabane wa Afrika ari abakiri bato ko navyo vyafashije. Avuga kandi ko hampande y'ibi, utwigoro two gushigikira abanyagihugu be n'uburambe mu guhangana n'indwara z'ivyaduka nka Ebola, vyarafashije cane guhangana na coronavirus.

headline: Ibihugu bitunze biriko vyikwegerako incanco za Covid
text: Ibihugu bitunze biriko birigungirako incanco za covid mu gihe abanyagihugu bo mu bihugu bikenye bobo bazoburiramwo, nk'uko ihuriro ry'amashirahamwe ajejwe guhimiriza rigabisha. Ihuriro People's Vaccine Alliance, rivuga ko ibihugu hafi 70 bifise amikoro make ari vyo bizoshobora gucandaga 1/10 c'abantu bavyo. Ibi biri uko mu gihe uruganda Oxford - AstraZeneca rwemeye ko ruzotanga ibice 64% vy'urucanco rwayo mu bihugu bikiri mu nzira y'amajambere. Hari ngingo ziriko zirafatwa kugira ngo ibihugu vyose kw'isi bishobore kuronswa izi ncanco. Ariko n'aho biri uko, ihuriro People's Vaccine Alliance - ihuriro ry'amashirahamwe atari make harimwo Amnesty International, Oxfam na Global Justice Now - rivuga ko ata ncanco ziriho zokwira bose, rigasaba ko amakompanyi ahingura imiti yokwereka ayandi ubuhinga bwayo kugira ngo hashobore guhingurwa incanco zikwiye. Ubushakashatsi bw'aya mashirahamwe bwerekanye ko ibihugu bitunze bimaze kugura incanco zihagije zo gukingiza abanyagihugu bavyo incuro zitatu zose mu gihe incanco zose zoba zemewe gukoreshwa. Akarorero, ubu bushakashatsi buvuga ko Canada yatumyeko inkingo zikenewe zo gukingira Umunyacanada wese incuro zitanu. N'aho ibihugu bitunze bifise ibice 14% vy'abantu bose kw'isi, amakuru ava mu bihugu biriko birageragerezwamwo izi ncanco ku rugero rwa gatatu ari rwo rwa nyuma avuga ko bimaze kugura ibice 53% vy'incanco ziboneka ko umwanya n'umwanya zishobora kwemezwa. Anna Marriott, umuyobozi w'igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu mw'ishirahamwe Oxfam, agira ati: "Nta muntu n'umwe akwiye kwimwa urucanco rurokora ubuzima bwiwe kubera igihugu abayemwo canke ata mafaranga akwiye afise. "Ariko, kiretse hagize igihindutse koko, amamiriyaridi y'abantu kw'isi nta rucanco rwiza kandi nyarwo bazoronka rwa Covid-19 mu kiringo c'imyaka itari mike iri imbere". Ihuriro People's Vaccine Alliance ritera akamo ibigo bihingura imiti, bikaba biriko birahingura incanco za Covid-19, ko vyoshira ahabona ubuhinga bwavyo kugira ngo incanco zikwiye zishobore guhingurwa maze buri muntu arukeneye aruronswe. Rivuga ko ibi bishobora gukorwa biciye mw'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi mu gisata caryo kijejwe Covid-19. Urucanco Pfizer-BioNTech rumaze kwemezwa mu Bwongerezwa kandi ababangamiwe gusumba abandi bakaba baratanguye gucandagwa muri ino ndwi. Umwanya n'umwanya, rushobora kwemezwa n'abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Amerika n'i Buraya. Izindi ncanco zibiri zahinguwe n'amakompanyi Moderna hamwe na Oxford-AstraZeneca zirarindiriye kwemezwa mu bihugu bitari bike. Iri huriro rivuga ko gushika ubu, incaco zose za Moderna n'ibice 90% vy'incanco za Pfizer/BioNTech zaguzwe n'ibihugu bitunze. AstraZeneca, ikompanyi iriko irahingura urucanco rwatowe n'ishure kaminuza ya Oxford, yariyemeje ko izorutanga ku buntu mu bihugu bikiri mu nzira y'amajambere. Ni urucanco ruzimbutse gusumba izindi kandi rugashobora kubikwa mu vyuma bikanyisha bisanzwe (frigo), ibi bikaba bituma rushobora gukwiragizwa mu mpande zose z'isi. Urucanco rw'Uburusiya, Sputnik, narwo nyene rumaze kuboneka ko rumeze neza, mu gihe hari izindi zine ziri mu gice ca nyuma c'igeragezwa.

headline: Afghanistan: Impunzi zizotahira he inyuma y'aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi?
text: Ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abantu bariko barahunga Afghanistan kuva aho aba Taliban bigaruriye ubutegetsi, inyuma y'imyaka hafi 20 babwomoweko n'ingabo mpuzamakungu zirongowe na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Ibi bitigiri biguma biduga vy'abantu barondera kuva mu gihugu, vyiyongera ku miriyoni 2.2 z'izindi mpunzi zari zisanzwe ziba mu bihugu bibanyi, hamwe n'abanyagihugu imiriyoni 3.5 bahungiye hagati mu gihugu kubera indyane zibandanya hamwe n'imidugararo ishingiye kuri poritike. Muri kino gihe, igitigiri ntikiratomoka neza. Aba Taliban bagenzura imihora yose ijana mu bihugu bibanyi, kandi bakavuga ko badakeneye ko abanya-Afghanistan bava mu gihugu. Amakuru avuga ko abadandaza canke abafise impapuro z'inzira ari bo bonyene bemerewe kujabuka. Ku wa gatanu, umuvugizi w'ishami rya ONU rijejwe impunzi kw'isi (UNHCR) yavuze ati: "Abenshi mu ba nya Afghanistan ntibashobora kuva mu gihugu mu nzira zizwi. Gushika uno musi, abantu bashobora kuba bageramiwe nta buryo bafise bwo kuva mu gihugu". Ariko n'aho bimeze uko, hari impunzi zimwe zashoboye kuronka inzira zo kuva mu gihugu. Abanya-Afghanistan baharurwa mu bihumbi bavugwa ko bashoboye guhungira muri Pakistan haciye akanya gato aba Taliban bigaruriye Kabul, mu gihe abababa 1500 nabo bavugwa ko binjiye muri Uzbekistan, ubu bakaba baba mu mahema hafi y'urubibe. I Kabul, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abanyagihugu babandanya bisuka ku kibuga c'indege mpuzamakungu - muri kino gihe kikaba ari co conyene kiriko kirakora - mu kugerageza kurondera ingene bohunga. Ku wa Mungu, umutegetsi wo mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vya Amerika (Maison Blanche/White House) yavuze ko Amerika n'incuti zayo gushika ico gihe bashoboye kuvana i Kabul abarenga 30.000 kuva ku wa 14 z'uku kwezi kwa munani, n'aho muri bo igitigiri c'abanya-Afghanistan kitazwi neza. Ibitigiri vy'abanya Afghanistan bariko barahunga muri kino gihe biri mu bitigiri binini bidakunze kuboneka vy'abarondera ubuhungiro bava muri kino gihugu kimaze imyaka itari mike carasinzikajwe n'umutekano muke n'indyane. N'imbere y'uko aba Taliban basubira kwigarurira ubutegetsi, abantu barenga 550.000 bari bamaze guteshwa izabo muri uno mwaka kubera intambara, nk'uko bivugwa na UNHCR. Ibi bivuga ko hafi Abanya-Afghanistan imiriyoni 3.5 bahungiye hagati mu gihugu. Kuri aba bahungiye hagati muri Afghanistan, hafi imiriyoni 2.2 z'impunzi n'abasaba ubuhungiro bariko bararondera aho bakika umusaya mu bihugu bibanyi mu mpera z'umwaka uheze. Muri uno mwaka, Abanya-Afghanistan barahuye n'ikibazo c'uruzuba rwinshi n'ubukene bw'imfungurwa mu gihugu hafi cose. Icegeranyo casohowe mu kwa gatandatu n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe imfungurwa kw'isi PAM/WFP, kivuga ko abantu imiriyoni 14 - abarenga ica gatatu c'abanyagihugu bose - bari basinzikajwe n'inzara. Mu mwaka uheze, ibihugu bibanyi Pakistan na Iran, ni vyo vyakiriye ibitigiri binini vy'Abanya-Afghanistan b'impunzi n'abarondera ubuhungiro. Hafi abantu imiriyoni 1.5 ni bo bahungiye muri Pakistan mu 2020, mu gihe Iran yakiriye 780.000, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'ibiharuro vya UNHCR. Ubudagi bugira gatatu, n'impunzi zirenga 180.000, mu gihe Turukiya yakiriye hafi 130.000. Turavye ku bitigiri vy'abarondera ubuhungiro - ni ukuvuga abasavye ko bajanwa ahandi ariko bakirindiriye - Turukiya, Ubudagi n'Ubugiriki biza imbere, uko bikurikirana bikaba bifise ibitigiri hafi 125.000, 33.000 na 20.000. N'aho muri Iran ata bariyo barondera ubuhungiro, abasanzwe barahungiyeyo bakaba bafise amakarata y'impunzi bashobora kugira uburenganzira bwo kuvurwa no kwiga muri ico gihugu. N'aho hari ibihugu vyatangaje ko bidashobora kwakira Abanya-Afghanistan bahunga, hari ibindi vyemeye kubaha ubuhungiro, ibi navyo ni: Iran, Pakistan, Tajikistan, Uzbekistan, Ubwongereza, Amerika, Canada, Australia,  ibihugu vyo mw'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya (EU/UE), Ubudagi, Ubufaransa, Autriche/Austria, Ubuswisi, Turukiya, North Macedonia, Albania na Kosovo. Ku mugabane wa Afrika, Uganda nayo yaremeye kwakira impunzi z'abanya-Afghanistan 2000, iki gihugu kikaba ari co gifise ibitigiri binini vy'impunzi ku mugabane wose wa Afrika, kikaba kigira gatatu kw'isi.

headline: Burundi: Kwugara ububare 21h 'birababaje kubura ico ukeneye mu mwanya wipfuza'
text: Inyuma y'igisagara ca Bujumbura, ubu na Gitega eka no mu ntara ya Muyinga - ihana urubibe n'u Rwanda -  ububare bwose butegerezwa gupfunga isaha zitatu z'ijoro, abanyagihugu bamwe barabishimye abandi bavuga ko ari ihohoterwa. Buramatari w'intara ya Muyinga na musitanteri wa komine Gitega intara ya Gitega ubu nabo nyene batangaje izi ngingo bavuga ko ari izo kubungabunga umutekano. Abo bategetsi bompi batangaza ko "amasaha yo kwugurura ubunywero ku minsi y'ikirimo ari kuva isaha cumi n'imwe z'umuhingamo gushika isaha zitatu z'ijoro". Izo ngingo ziriko zirafatwa mu gihe ubutegetsi bw'u Burundi bubandanya bumenyesha ko igihugu cose kirangwa mwo umutekano. Izo ngingo zifashwe inyuma y'igitero mu ntara ya Cibitoke, abategetsi bavuze ko cagizwe n'abavuye mu Rwanda bateye ikirindiro c'abasirikare bagasubira muri ico gihugu. Abo bategetsi ntibavuga nimba izo ngingo zifitaniye isano n'ico gitero co mu ntara ya Cibitoke. Umukuru w'igisagara ca Bujumbura wewe, Freddy Mbonimpa, avuga ko ata sano rihari, ahubwo izo ngingo zatangajwe bahejeje ukwisuzuma bagasanga harabayeho ukudebukirwa mu gucungera umutekano. Ku biraba ivyo kwugara akabare vyovyo, Bwana Mbonimpa yavuze ko yafashe izo ngingo kubera ko hari abantu bata akazi, bakigira mu kabare aho kuba bari ku kazi. Muri Komine Gitega bamwe bishimira izo ngingo mu gihe abandi babona ko bahotowe. Ntibipfuje gutangazwa amazina yabo. Umunyagihugu umwe avuga ko izo ngingo zari zaratevye, akabona ko zigiye gushira ku murongo ibitari bike, hampande y'umutekano. Agira ati: "Ubu nta muntu azokwiraza ahantu atamvo iboneka ihari, nta n'uwuzoraza umuntu mukinyegero, ahubwo lmana yakoze gukoresha izo ndongozi kugira bagire ico ciyumviro ". Uwundi abona ko gufata izo ngingo bifise imvo, ariko kwugara akabare isaha zitatu hakiri kare cane. Ati: "Ntivyumvikana ukungene isaha zitatu ubunywero bwose buzoba bwugaye. Izo ni ingorane kandi abantu benshi bagiye guherera mu gasho". Eka n'abadandaza inzoga babona ko bagiye kuhahombera, na rirya ngo isaha betegekwako kwugara ariho abakiriya baba batanguye kunywa. Uwundi munyagihigu abona ko abafashe iyo ngingo bibagiye ko hari vyinshi bituma umuntu aja mukabare, atari uko aba agira ate umwanya gusa. Ati: "Murashobora kuba muri no kwi'jambo ryofasha benshi, canke uvuye ahantu. "Ubundi twizera abarongozi bacu ko ingingo badufatira baba babona ko ari zo zikwiriye, ariko si ukuvuga ko bihimbaye kubura ico ufata wari ugikeneye mu mwanya wipfuza".

headline: Africa yahomvye miriyoni z'ama dorari kubera ihagarara rya Facebook, Instagram na Whatsapp
text: Abifashisha  imbuga hwaniro muri Afrika kugira bagurishe ibicuruzwa bitandukanye bariko baraharura igihombo baraye bagize mu masaha atandatatu Facebook, Instagram na Whatsapp vyamaze bidakora. Ikigo kigenzura ingene internet ikora Netblocks kigereranya ko iryo hagarara rishobora kuba ryateye ubutunzi bwa Africa yo munsi y'ubugararwa (ubutayu)  bwa Sahara igihombo ca miriyoni 19,8 z'ama dorari (miriyaridi hafi 40 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi). Abahinga bavuga ko ibigo vyari vyarateye imbere cane  muri urwo rudandazwa rwo kuri internet na cane cane muri ibi bihe vya Covid arivyo vyakozweko cane n'ico gihombo. Kuri bamwe bamwe iryo hagarara ryashitse mu masaha arijo haba hageze ko bagurisha cane. Kafui Adza  atwara kompanyi ya Akosombobar, inzu y'uburiro igurisha ivyo kurya kuri internet no ku bahishikiye hagati mu gisagara ca Accra AirportCity, irabana n'ikibuga mpuzamakungu c'indege ca Kotoka. Avuga ko izo mbuga hwaniro zabaye mu masaha yo kurya ivyo ku murango. Kafui avuga ati: "Nico cari igihe cacu ciza kuko 80% y'ivyo tugurisha ni ku  bakiriya baciye kuri internet. Abakiriya bake bashoboye kuza n'imiduga muri ico gihe c'urutavanako mu mabarabara nibo bonyene bashitse ku buriro. Igihe izo mbuga zahagarara , abakozi banje baciye babona ko tutariko turaronka abadusaba kubarungikira ivyo kurya uko twahora. Benshi baca barungika ubutumwa busanzwe bwa telefone, ariko ingorane ni uko udaheza ngo urungike igoto y'ivyo kurya ushaka". Kafui yabwiye BBC ko akoresha amadorari hafi 3.200  (miriyoni zirenga 6 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) ku mwaka kugira amenyekanishe ivyo akora kuri Facebook na Instagram. Ahandi nko muri Afrika y'ubuseruko, , Richard Gikonyo  afise Rickys Home Interiors. N'urudandazwa rushingiye i Nairobi, umurwa mukuru wa Kenya, rukoresha internet  mu gushira abakiriya ibikoresho bitandukanye vyo mu mazu mu gihugu cose. Ihagarara ry'imbuga hwaniro ryabaye mu gihe ku munsi usanzwe ariho akazi kaba gashushe. Gikonyo avuga ati: "Buno nyene naciye mbona ko habaye ikibazo kuko nama ndi ku murongo. Hagati y'isaha cumi z'umuhingamo n'isaha imwe y'ijoro, niho turonka abantu benshi ku mirongo yacu, kuko abantu baba bari mu rutavanako rwo mu mabarabara baca baja ku mbuga hwaniro bagatangura kugura ibintu". Yagiye kumenya ko vyahagaze atanguye kuronka ama terefone menshi y'abakiriya bidoga bamuhamagara  bavuga ko abakozi biwe batariko barishura ubutumwa bwabo. Avuga ati: "Tugereranya ko hari abakiriya 50 tutatunganirije, none uyu munsi (ku wakabiri), imirimo iri hasi cane". Karen Wambugu, umuhinga mu kugurisha kuri internet avuga ati: "Abakozweko cane n'abahembwa kuri buri kintu bagurishije hamwe n'imangazini ntonto, kuko nini nini zo zifise imbuga zazo (websites). Iyo imbuga hwaniro nka Facebook na Instagram zihagaze, imangazini ntonto ntizishobora kugurisha kuko nta yindi  nzira zifise" Aho iryo hagarara ribereye, abantu baciye baja ku zindi mbuga hwaniro nka Twitter kugira baronke umurongo. Ariko nko muri Nigeria, Twitter ntaco yafashije. Reta y'ico gihugu yarayihagaritse mu ntango z'ukwezi kwa gatandatu inyuma y'aho ikuriye ku rubuga rwayo ubutumwa bwa prezida Muhammadu Buhari imwagiriza kurenga ku mategeko yayo agenga "inyifato itari nziza". Ariko abanya-Nigeria bamwe babandanije kwandika kuri Twitter baciye ku buhinga buziguye bwa Virtual Private Networks (VPN).

headline: Ukraine-Russia: Igihe abashigikiye Ukraine bashwiragizwa n'inguvu nyinshi
text: Abashigikiye Ukraine bari mu myiyerekano mu muji uri mu bumanuko bashwiragijwe n'inguvu nyinshi hakoreshejwe ibiturika...

headline: Russia - Ukraine : Ibikuru biri imbere ya Africa, nk’inkurikizi z’intambara
text: Mu mashusho, ni uko iyi ntambara ya Russia na Ukraine igiye guhindura itunganywa ry’isi. Kuri Africa, abahinga bashira imbere ko, muri rusangi, ubuzima bugiye kuzimba kurusha. Ingaruka zifatiye kuri ibi vya ngombwa bigize ubuzima.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Mbappe, Ndombele, Bergwijn, Fernandes, Digne, Schick, Mateta
text: Umukinyi wa mbere wa Tottenham amaze kugurwa amafaranga menshi gusumba abandi bose muri uyo murwi, umufaransa Tanguy Ndombele, 25, yaguzwe imiriyoni zirenga 73 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, arizeye ko ashobora gusezera uyu murwi muri uku kwa mbere. (The Athletic - subscription required) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa  Tottenham umunya Hollande Steven Bergwijn, 24, asa n'uwuri mu nzira ava muri uyu murwi, Ajax ikaba ari umwe mu mirwi imwipfuza. (Fabrizio Romano on Twitter) Umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain umufaransa Kylian Mbappe, 23, ashobora gutera akagere Real Madrid hanyuma agatera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha muri uno murwi w'ihiganwa ry'Ubufaransa.  (Le Parisien - in French) Umusatirizi wa Bayer Leverkusen Patrik Schick, 25, akomoka muri République tchèque avuga ko ata ngorane afise muri uno murwi wo mu Budagi n'aho hari  amakuru avuga ko ashobora kugenda muri uku kwezi.  (Bild - in German) Aston Villa iri mu biganiro vyo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Everton umufaransa Lucas Digne, 28, avugwa ko yipuza kwigira muri uyo murwi umenyerezwa na Steven Gerrard. (Sky Sports) Newcastle iramaze kuvugana na Burnley kugira ngo irabe ko yoshobora kugura umusatirizi Chris Wood, 30, akomoka muri Nouvelle Zelande. (Telegraph - subscription required) Newcastle yongeye ku rutonde rw'abasatirizi yipfuza muri kuno kwezi umunya Suisse Noah Okafor, 21, asanzwe akinira RB Salzburg. (Teamtalk) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umunya-Portugal Bruno Fernandes, 27, aramirira kure amakuru avuga ko muri uku kwa mbere ashobora kwimukira muri Barcelona, akabigereranya na vya bindi vy'itariki ya mbere z'ukwa kane ifatwa ko ari umusi wo kubesha (Sun via Instagram) Uwahoze ari umunyegori wa Newcastle Shay Given wo muri Irlande ahanura mugenziwe Caoimhin Kelleher, 23, kuva muri Liverpool muri uku kwezi kugira ngo ashobore kuronka akanya ko gukina. (Premier Sport via Liverpool Echo) Umusatiri w'umufaransa Jean-Philippe Mateta ari hafi yo gusezera Crystal Palace muri kuno kwezi. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 24 asanzwe yatijijwe muri Mainz yo mu Budagi, yiteguriye kuja gukina mu Bufaransa, mu murwi St Etienne. (Standard) Umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu wa Arsenal Sead Kolasinac yatanguye ibiganiro na Marseille kugira ngo arabe ko yokwimukira muri uyu murwi wo mu Bufaransa mu ci riza igihe amasezerano afitaniye na  Emirates Stadium azoba arangiye, na rirya adakunzwe gukinishwa. (L'Equipe via Sun) Umumenyereza wa Chelsea Thomas Tuchel aripfuza ko umukinyi wo hagati w'umwongereza Ross Barkley, 28, ashobora gutizwa mu wundi murwi muri kuno kwezi.  (90 Min) Newcastle iripfuza kugura umunya Côte d'Ivoire Ibrahim Sangare, 24, akina hagati, akaba asanzwe akinira PSV Eindhoven. (Mail) Newcastle kandi yagiriraniye ibiganiro na Monaco ku bijanye n'umukinyi w'inyuma Benoit Badiashile, 20, akaba ashirwa ku giciro c'imiriyoni zirenga 47 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Mail) Manchester United ntirigera ironka umurwi n'umwe ushaka umufaransa akina hagati Paul Pogba, 28, akaba yiteze kurangiza amasezerano afitaniye nayo mu ci riza. (Mail)

headline: Zelensky abwira ingabo za Russia ati: ‘Vyobabera vyiza kurokoka muri muri Russia hako muza kugwa iwacu’
text: Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine avuga ko Uburusiya buriko bugerageza gusatira ingabo za Ukraine nu ntara ya Donbas iri mu buseruko. Mw'ijambo yashikirije nijoro ku wa gatandatu mw'ijoro, yavuze ko bariko "begeranya izindi ngabo mu ntumbero yo gukora ibitero bishasha muri ako karere" ariko akaba yatanze  ubutumwa bw'agasuzuguro ku ngabo z'Uburusiya. Ati: "Vyobabera vyiza murondeye kubandanya mubaho mu Burusiya gusumba gutikirira ku butaka bwacu". Ati: "Turazi ko intwazangabo z'Uburusiya ziriko zitegura abandi benshi bashasha baza guhona. Muri aba bantu, bamwe muri bo bacitse intege mu kwa gatatu n'ukwa kane, hari benshi bariko barinjizwa ariko batavyishimiye cane, mbere batamenyereye n'intambara". "Buri Murusiya arashobora kurokora ubuzima bwiwe". Zelensky avuga ko Ukraine iriko irakora "ibishoboka vyose" kugira ngo habe igikorwa co guhungisha abasirikare n'abasivire amajana n'amajana bagotewe mu gisagara ca Mariupol. Avuga ko Ukraine iriko irakorana n'incuti zayo mu gufatira Moscou ibindi bihano kandi ko yizeye y'uko ingingo yo gufatira ibindi bihano ku gitoro igihe gusohoka "vuba cane". Avuga ko ibarabara ry'ikibuga c'indege ca Odesa ryabomowe rigiye gusanurwa, yongera yemerera igihugu ko ibisagara vyigaruriwe n'ingabo z'Uburusiya, harimwo Kherson, Melitopol na Berdyansk bigiye kubohorwa. Ni mu gihe ariko Uburusiya bubandanya bushinga imizi mu gisagara ca Kherson, nk'uko umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi w'Ubwongereza abivuga, aho amenyesha ko Uburusiya bugomba gutsimbara mu nzira ya poritike n'ubutunzi muri ako karere. Iki gisagara co mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine cigaruriwe   n'ingabo z'Uburusiya mu ntango z'ukwa gatatu, kikazofasha Uburusiya gukomeza ubutegetsi bwabwo muri Crimée/Crimea, bwongere bworoherwe mu bitero amaja mu buraruko no mu burengero, nk'uko ubutumwa bw'ubushikiranganji bwacishijwe ku rubuga rwa Twitter bubivuga. Kuva uno musi, mu ntumbero yo gutsimbataza ubutegetsi bwabwo muri ako karere, Uburusiya bwatanze ikiringo c'amezi ane kugira ngo ifaranga ryabwo, rouble, rizobe ryasubiriye irya Ukraine, hryvnia. Ni mu gihe bivugwa ko Ingabo za Ukraine zasubije inyuma iz'Uburusiya mu micungararo ya Kharkiv. Igisirikare ca Ukraine gitangaza ko ejo ku wa gatandatu cigaruriye uturere tune turi mu buraruko no mu buseruko bw'igisagara ca Kharkiv, ari two agace ka Roganka, Ruska Lozova, Slobidske na Prelesne. Ikigo Institute for War Studies, gikora ubushakashatsi ku bijanye n'ivyo kwivuna abansi hamwe n'imigenderanire, kivuga ko ibi biri mu rukurikirane rw'ibitero vyo kwivuna ingabo za Ukraine zagize hanze y'ico gisagara. Ingabo za Ukraine "zarigaruriye uduce tutari duke mu buraruko no mu buseruko mu micungararo y'igisagara", kikavuga ko ibi bizotuma uturere dutuwemwo n'abanyagihugu tumaze igihe duterwa ama bombe turonka akoyoko. Ibi bivugwa mu gihe Ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw'Uburusiya butangaza ko ingabo zabwo zirwanira mu kirere zakoroye indege z'intambara zibiriza Ukraine Su-24m mu kirere ca Kharkiv mw'ijoro ryakeye, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters. Ubu bushikiranganji buvuga kandi ko bwakoze igitero ku birwanisho Amerika n'ibihugu vya Bulaya vyari bihaye Ukraine, kandi ko bwasambuye ibarabara ry'ikibuga c'indege ca gisirikare hafi y'igisagara ca Odesa. Ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko bwakoresheje misire zidahusha, zizwi nka Onyx, mu gutera ico kibuga c'indege, inyuma y'aho Ukraine ikaba yaciye yagiriza ko yateye ibarabara rishasha ku kibuga c'indege ca Odesa. Umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ya Amerika Nancy Pelosi yagize urugendo giturumbuka i Kyiv aho yabonanye na Perezida Zelensky ejo k uwa gatandatu. Mw'ireresi yacishijwe ku rubuga rwa Twitter yerekana Pelosi mu mabarabara y'umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine, Perezida Zelensky avuga ko "Amerika ari yo ifata iya mbere mu gushigikira Ukraine mu ntambaraya yayo yo kurwanya igitero c'Uurusiya". "Turabashimiye cane ku kungene mufahsa mu gukingira ubwigenge n'ubusugire bw'igihugu cacu". Uyu mukuru w'Inama nshingamateka ya Amerika avuga ko we n'intumwa yari arongoye batewe  "iteka rinini ryo kubonana n'umukuru w'igihugu wa Ukraine ejo". Avuga ko ibiganiro vyabo vyibanze ahanini "ku mfashanyo mu vyo umutekano, ubutabazi n'ubutunzi, ariko kandi no gusanura igihugu mu gihe intambara izoba irangiye".

headline: Coronavirus: Afrika y'Epfo yavanyeho ingingo ibuza inzoga mu kworosha ingingo za Covid
text: Umukuru wa Afrika y'Epfo Cyril Rmaphosa yatezuye ingingo zari zarafashwe mu ntumbero yo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Covid-19, harimwo  no kuvanaho ingingo ibuza kugurisha inzoga abantu baterekwa na gato. Ibibanza vyo gufatiramwo akayaga ku nkengera z'ibahari (plages) bizokwugurura, no guhurira mu masengesho biremewe ariko ku bitigiri bifise urugero bitarenza. Ivyo vyamenyeshejwe ubwo prezida Ramaphosa yanatangaza ugushika kw'inkingo za mbere-umuriyoni w'incanco za Astra-Zeneca-nk'amahirwe yo guhagarika ikiza ca Covid-19 cari kibarembeje. Afrika y'Epfo nico gihugu gifise abanduye n'abamaze kwicwa na Covid-19 benshi kurusha ibindi muri Afrika. Abarenga umuriyoni 1.4 baramaze kwandura uwo mugera kuva  wadutse, abashika 44.164 nabo baramaze gupfa hakurikijwe ibiharuro vy'ubushakashatsi bwa  kamimunuza ya Hopkins Ibihugu vyinhsi vyarabujije ingendo z'abavuye muri Afrika y'Epfo kugira bihagarika ikwirakwira ry'ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera wa Covid-19 bwandukira cane 501Y.V2, vyibazwa ko bwatanguriye  muri ico gihugu kandi bukekwa ko bwoba bufise inguvu ku nkingo zimaze kuboneka. Igihugu kizoguma mu citwa urugero rwa gatatu rwa ''guma mu rugo'', ariko hari ingingo zahahora zizovanwaho. Ubu abagurisha inzoga basubiye kwemerwa gucuruza hagati y'isaha zine zo mu gitondo gushika isaha 12 z'umugoroba kuva ku wa mbere gushika ku wa kane , ibirabo bifise impusha navyo bishobora kwugurura kuva isaha zine zo mu gitondo gushika isaha zine z'ijoro aho bitegerezwa guca vyugara. Amasaha y'umukwabu (couvre-feu) ubu ni kuva isaha zitanu z'ijoro gushika isaha 10 zo mu gutondo. AbanyaAfrika y'Epfo bamaze gufatirwa ingingo yo kubuza inzoga incuro zitatu kuva ico kiza giteye mu kwezi kwa gatatu, ubwa nyuma ingingo yafashwe hakaba hari kuva itariki 28 ukwezi kwa 12. Reta ivuga ko vyari bikenewe kugira hagabanuke abantu birukira kwa muganga. Izo ngingo ntizaguye neza abanyagihugu benshi n'igisata c'inzoga zikaze (liqueurs) kivuga ko ubuzi buharurwa muri za miriyoni bwari bugiye gutakara. Atangaza izo ngingo nshasha, Prezida Cyril Ramaphoza yavuze ati : ''Ndasavye umwe umwe wese muri twebwe anywe yigerera kugira ntituduze ibitigiri vy'amasanganya canke vy'abandura kubera ukwigenza nabi.'' Muri uko kworosha ingingo, ubu abantu 50 barashobora gusengera hamwe ahantu hugaye, n'ijana hanze. Plage, inzuzi, ibibanza vyo gusamiramwo akayaga (parcs) n'ivyo kwoga (piscine) navyo bizokwugururwa. Prezida Ramaphosa yavuze ko urugero rwo hejuru rw'umuvuduko wa kabiri w'ikwirakwira  rwarenganywe, "kandi ko muri rusangi ugurero rwo kwandura rwagumye rumanuka muri izi ndwi zitatu ziheze". Yavuze ati: ''Ibi bihindutse vyashobotse kubera ukugabanuka biboneka kw'ibitigiri vy'abinjira ibitaro kubera Covid-19 mu ntara zose z'igihugu, bikaba vyagabanije isugerezwa ku baganga n'ibitaro." Imbere y'aho yari yagiye ku kibuga ca OR Thambo I Johannesburg kwakira incanco za Oxford-AstraZeneca zakozwe n'ikigo co mu Buhindi Serum Institute. Yavuze ati : ''Umuzo w'izi nkingo utanze icizere ko dushobora guhwamika  iyi ndwara yateye amakuba menshi muri iki gihugtu cacu no kw'isi'' Uwo muriyoni w'incanco uzohabwa  abakora kwa muganga  n'ubwo ata tariki iramenyeshwa y'umunsi isekeza rizotangurira, kandi izo zikaba zidakwiye abo bakozi bangana na miriyoni 1.25 mu gihugu cose. Igihugu kivuga ko casavye kuronswa incanco zingana na miroyoni 50 kikaba cihaye ihangiro zo gukingira uyu mwaka abantu bangana na miroyoni 40, 2/3 mu baba muri ico gihugu. Prezida Ramaphoza yavuze ko  ata kitazokorwa kugira ''dushike ku budahangarwa''

headline: Intambara ya Ukraine: Ni bande bari mu karwi gatoya ka Putin karongoye intambara?
text: Vladimir Putin aboneka umengo arirebanga, mu gufata ingingo yo gushora Uburusiya mu ntambara ya gisirikare ishobora gutuma ubutunzi bw'igihugu ciwe butembagara. Ntiyari bwigere aboneka yirebanga nk'incuro zibiri ziherutse, aho yabonetse ari kumwe n'akarwi kiwe, yicaranye n'abahanuzi biwe ariko hagati ya we na bo hari intambwe nini. Nk'umugaba w'ingabo, niwe abazwa iki gitero, ariko yamye yiheka cane ku bantu bamwegereye kandi bamuyoboka cane, abenshi muri bo bakaba batanguriye amabanga yabo mu nzego z'Uburusiya zijejwe umutekano. ikibazo ni ukumenya ni nde amuhanura muri kino gihe kitoroshe c'ubutegetsi bwiwe. Nimba hariho n'umwe, ni uyu mwizigirwa wiwe w'igihe kirekire cane Sergei Shoigu, ari we yama ariko arasubiramwo amajambo ya Putin yerekana intumbero yiwe yo gusambura igisirikare ca Ukraine be no gukingira Uburusiya abansi babwo bo mu bihugu vy'Uburengero. Uyu ni umuntu yama ajana na Perezida iyo agiye guhiga canke kuroba mu ntara ya  Sibérie iri mu buseruko bw'igihugu, muri kahise akaba yaboneka ko yari we ashobora kumusubirira. Vera Mironova,  umuhinga mu bijanye n'intambara za gisirikare , ati: "Shoigu yategerezwa gufata Kyiv; ni umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi kandi yategerezwa gutsinda intambara". Azwi ko ari we yafashe ka karere ka Crimea mu 2014. Niwe kandi yari arongoye ishami rijejwe igendereza rya gisirikare, GRU, ryagirizwa ibitero bibiri vy'isumu  - ica mbere co mu 2018 cahitanye umuntu i Salisbury mu Bwongereza, ikindi cahatswe kugandagura wa munyaporitike arwanya ubutegetsi bwa Putin, Alexei Navalny, muri Sibérie mu 2020. Umwanditsi w'umurusiya Andrei Soldatov akongera akaba n'umuhinga mu bijanye n'umutekano yemeza ko uyu mushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi ari we muntu wa mbere avuga rikijana kwa Perezida Putin. "Shoigu uretse ko ari we ajejwe igisirikare, ni nawe ajejwe inyigisho (ideology) ku rugero rutari ruto - hanyuma inyigisho mu Burusiya zishingiye cane cane kuri kahise, niwe ategura vyose". Nk'umukuru w'ibiro bikuru vya gisirikare, yari afise igikorwa co gutera Ukraine kandi akarangiza intambara ningoga na ningoga, aha rero aboneka ko atararangura igikorwa ciwe. Afise uruhara rudasanzwe mu bikorwa vya gisirikare vya  Vladimir Putin kuva igihe yari arongoye ingabo muri ya ntambara ya Chechnya mu 1999, akaba mbere yari imbere mu gutegura iyi ntambara ya Ukraine, anahagarikiye imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare muri Biélorussie/Belarus mu kwezi guheze. Umuhinga w'umurusiya Mark Galeotti avuga ko, nk'umuntu "adatwenga kandi w'iminkanyari", Jenerali Gerasimov yagize uruhara rudasanzwe mu ntambara yo kwigarurira akarere ka  Crimea. Hari amakuru avuga ko ubu yoba ashirwa ku ruhande kubera uguhigimanga kwiwe mu gutanguza igitero ca Ukraine be n'amakuru avuga ko igisirikare gifise intege nke. Ariko Andrei Soldatov abona ko ibi ari ivyipfuzo vya bamwe. Ati: "Putin ntashobora kugenzura hose n'ingabo zose, rero iki ni co gikorwa ciwe". Avuga kandi ko n'aho akunda kwambara umwambaro wa gisirikare, nta nyigisho za gisirikare afise ari co gituma ari ngombwa kuri we kwiheka ku bahinga. Ben Noble, umwigisha wa kaminuza ya Londres yigisha poritike y'Uburusiya, avuga ati: "Nikolai Patrushev ni we muntu wa mbere akokeza intambara, kubera yiyumvira ko ibihugu vy'Uburengero bimaze imyaka n'imyaka bihiga Uburusiya". Ni umwe mubayoboke batatu ba Putin bakoranye na we kuva mu myaka ya 1970 i St Petersburg, igihe iki gisagara kigira kabiri c'Uburusiya cari kicitwa Leningrad. Abandi babiri basigaye ni Alexander Bortnikov arongoye igisata c'umutekano hamwe na Sergei Naryshkin arongoye igisata kijejwe igendereza ryo hanze. Abari muri aka karwi k'abegereye Putin bose bazwi kw'izina rya siloviki, ariko aba batatu nibo bari hafi yiwe gusumba. Ni bake cane bafise ijambo rikomeye ku mukuru w'igihugu nka Nikolai Patrushev. Uretse ko yakoranye na we muri KGB mu gihe c'ubutegetsi bwa gikomunista, niwe yamusubiriye mu rwego rwayisubiriye, ari rwo FSB, kuva mu 1999 gushika 2008. Mu mubonano w'inama nkuru ijejwe umutekano w'Uburusiya yabaye hasigaye imisi itatu ngo igitero gitangura, Patrushev yageze kure mu kuvuga ko "intumbero nyayo" ya Amerika ari ugusambura Uburusiya. Abakurikiranira hagufi Kremlin bavuga ko umukuru w'igihugu yemera inkuru ahawe n'inzego z'umutekano gusumba izindi zose, Alexander Bortnikov afatwa nk'umwe mu bantu begereye cane Perezida Putin. Nk'uwundi yakoranye na we muri KGB i Leningrad, niwe yahawe uburongozi bw'urwego FSB asubiriye Nikolai Patrushev. Aba bompi bazwi ko begereye cane umukuru w'igihugu, ariko nk'uko Ben Noble abivuga: "Ntitwovuga ko ari bo bonyene bafise ibintu mu minwe kandi ko ari bo bonyene bafata ingingo zose". Nk'uwungirije aba batatu bahoze ari abakozi ba Leningrad, Sergei Naryshkin ari kumwe n'umukuru w'igihugu mu gihe kitari gito amaze arangura amabanga yiwe. Arongoye urwego rujejwe igendereza ryo hanze (SVR). Sergei Naryshkin yamaze igihe kirekire ari kumwe na Putin, i St Petersburg mu myaka ya 1990, hanyuma no mu biro kwa Putin mu 2004 gushika n'aho aba umukuru w'inama nshingamateka. Mu mwaka uheze yahaye ikiganiro umunyamakuru wa BBC i Moscou Steve Rosenberg aho yahakanye ko Uburusiya ata bitero ku nyabwonko n'ibindi vy'isumu bwakoze, kandi ko butivanga mu matora y'ibindi bihugu. Imyaka 18 yose ayimaze ari we mutegetsi mukuru ajejwe imigenderanire y'Uburusiya, ashikiriza aho Uburusiya buhagaze n'aho afatwa nk'uko ata ruhara runini afise mu gufata ingingo. Sergei Lavrov w'imyaka 71 , ni ikindi cemezo gikomeye c'uko Vladimir Putin yiheka cane ku bantu bakomeye bakoranye muri kahise. Ni umuhinga afise amayeri menshi: mu kwezi guheze yarashatse kumaramaza umunyamabanga w'Ubwongereza ajejwe imigenderanire Liz Truss mu kumubaza ivyo azi ku ndondagihugu y'Uburusiya, hanyuma mu mwaka uheze naho ashaka kumaramaza umukuru w'igisata kijejwe imigenderanire y'umuryango w'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya, Josep Borrell. Ariko, yamye ashirwa kure ku kintu cose cerekeye Ukraine, kandi n'aho azwi ko ari umuntu agumye, yabandanije ashira imbere ibiganiro ku kibazo ca Ukraine, bituma Perezida Putin amwihoza. Bisa n'uko ataco vyamubwiye igihe abenshi mu bagize Inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe agateka ka zina muntu biyonjorora igihe yariko agerageza gusigura ingingo y'Uburusiya yo gutera Ukraine, hari mw'ijambo yariko ashikiriza hifashishijwe ubuhinga bwa videwo. Ari mu bagore bake cane begereye Putin, akaba ari we yahagarariye amatora mu nama nkenguzamateka yo kwemeza irungikwa ry'ingabo z'Uburusiya hanze, ivyaciriye inzira igitero kuri Ukraine. Valentina Matviyenko ni uwundi muntu ayoboka cane Putin yakoranye na we i St Petersburg akaba na we nyene yaranagize uruhara runini mu kwigarurira Crimea mu 2014. Ariko ntafatwa ko ari mu bantu bari imbere mu gufata ingingo. Nk'uko bimeze ku bandi bagize inama y'igihugu ijejwe umutekano, uruhara rwiwe ni urwo kwerekana ko ingingo ifashwe yaciye mu mwumvikano n'aho biba biboneka ko bisa nk'aho umukuru w'igihugu aba yamaze gufata ingingo. Nk'uwahoze ari we amucungereye ubuzima, ni we arongoye igisata ca gisirikare kijejwe umutekano w'igihugu kizwi nka, Rosgvardia,  cashinzwe na Perezida Putin nk'igisirikare ciwe bwite, haraciye imyaka itandatu gusa. Mu kurondera abajejwe umutekano biwe bwite, yashatse ko aronka abamuyoboka koko, Viktor Zolotov akaba yarongereje igitigiri cabo gushika ku 400.000. Vera Mironova yemeza ko integuro ya mbere y'Uburusiya kwari ugufata ubutegetsi bwa Ukraine mu misi mike cane, hanyuma bimaze kugaragara co igisirikare cariko kirananirwa, izi ngabo nizo zaciye zifata ibintu mu minwe. Ingorane gusa ni uko umukuru w'iki gisata ata nyigisho za gisirikare afise, kandi kubera ingabo ziwe ata bifaru zifise zirakunzwe guterwa bikomeye. Ni abahe bantu bandi bumvirizwa na Putin? Umushikiranganji wa mbere Mikhail Mishustin afise igikorwa kitoroshe co kunagura ubutunzi bw'igihugu ariko nta jambo rinini afise ku ntambara. umukuru w'igisagara ca Moscou Sergei Sobyanin hamwe n'umukuru w'igiko c'igihugu gicukura igitoro Rosneft, Igor Sechin, nabo nyene ni abantu begereye umukuru w'igihugum, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuhinga mu vya poritike Yevgeny Minchenko. Abatunzi ruhebwa babiri bavukana  Boris na Arkady Rotenberg, abantu bakuranye n'umukuru w'igihugu kuva mu bwana, ni abantu bamye ari abizigirwa kuri we. Mu 2020, ikinyamakuru Forbes cavuze ko ari wo muryango utunze gusumba iyindi yose mu gihugu cose c'Uburusiya.

headline: Olempike Tokyo 2020: Abanonotsi b'Abanyafrika bo kurabira hafi
text: Abanonotsi b'Abanyafrika bahiganwa mu kwiruka barazwi cane ku kuntu biharira amahiganwa ya Olempike mu gusiganwa ahantu hagereranye canke harehare. Uno mwaka, inkino zitanu zongewe mu zikinwa muri Olempike - kunyerera ku mazi, umukino wo kwurira ahahanamye, baseball/softball, skateboarding na karate - kandi abanonotsi b'Abanyafrika baraserukiwe. Mu gihe ihiganwa Olempike ritangura i Tokyo ku tariki 23 z'ukw'indwi, turaraba abanonotsi b'Abanyafrika bo gukurikiranira hafi muri iri higanwa - kuva kuri bashasha baje ubwa mbere gushika ku babirambiyemwo barondera kwiyongera ishema.

headline: Uganda: Bituye sentare kubera bahawe udukingirizo tudakomeye tugatabuka mu mibonano
text: Abaganda batatu bitwariye ikigo kijejwe kugenzura imiti mu gihugu hamwe n'ishirahamwe Marie Stoppes, bakavuga ko babahaye udukingirizo tubadokeme twabateye kwandura umugera wa SIDA  no gusama inda batipfuza. Umwe muri abo bagabo avuga ko yakoresheje udukingirizo twitwa Life Guard, ariko tukaba twarapasutse mu gihe yariko agira imibonano mpuzabitsina, vyatumye yandura umugera wa SIDA, mu gihe uwundi nawe yanduye agashangaza (blennorragie). Uwundi mugore nawe avuga ko yasamye inda kandi yakoresheje ako gakingirizo. Mu kwa cumi na rimwe 2019, abategetsi ba Uganda barategetse ko udukingirizo twari tumaze gutangwa incuro zibiri n'iryo shirahamwe Marie Stopes Uganda rijejwe irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza dukurwa kw'isoko. Urwandiko rwabo ruvuga ko utwo dukingirizo tutapimwe kugira twemezwe ko dukwije ibisabwa n'amategeko imbere y'uko duhabwa abanyagihugu. Ishirahamwe Marie Stoppes yatanze udukingirizo tungana n'imiliyoni zibiri ku kwezi mu gihugu. Muri urwo rubanza, abitwaye basaba ko uruhusha rwo kwinjiza no gutanga utwo dukingirizo ruhagarikwa. Basaba ko ikigo kijejwe imiti mu gihugu, ari naco gitegerezwa gupima imiti yose n'ibindi vyose bikoreshwa mu buvuzi imbere y'uko bishirwa kw'isoko, ko cemera ko cananiwe mu mabanga yaco. Utwo dukingirizo tungana n'umuliyoni twavanywe kw'isoko na leta mu kwa cumi na rimwe 2019, kubera imyidogo y'abanyagihugu. Ico gihe ikigo kijejwe imiti muri Uganda (NDA) cari giherutse gusohora urwandiko kivuga ko ibipimo vyerekana "udutoboro n'ibimenyetso bigaragaza ko utwo dukingirizo dushobora guturika". Ariko kuva ico gihe, hari bwinshi bwari bumaze kugurishwa, ubugera ku bice 70% bwonyene bukaba ari bwo bwonyene bwavanywe kw'isoko. Abagabo babiri bitwariye ishirahamwe Marie Stoppes mu rubanza rundi bari bunguruje mu kwa kabiri uno mwaka, basaba indishi y'akababaro.

headline: Kenya-Covid-19: Amerika yahanuye kureka ingendo zo muri ico gihugu
text: Ikigo co kugwanya ingwara muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (CDC) kiragabisha abanyagihugu b'ico gihugu kudahirahira ngo baje muri Kenya kivuga ko ico gihugu kirimwo abantu benshi bandura umugera wa Covid-19, ku rugero rwa 4 (a level 4 alert). Iryo gabisha ryabaye itariki 7 z'ukwezi kwa kane, rivuga ku kibazo c'amagara y'abantu bivuye ku murindi wo kwandura corona muri Kenya hamwe n'ukwiyongera kw'ubugizu bwa nabi, iterabwoba hamwe no kunyuruzwa. Abanyamerika bafata ingendo bahanuwe na CDC kubanza gusoma ibijanye no gufata ingendo imbere yo kuzifara kubera ikibazo c'ikiza Covid-19. N'aho habaye iryo gabisha, indege ziva mu mahanga zirabandanya kuja muri Kenya. Mu mpera z'ukwezi kwa gatatu, prezida Uhuru Kenyatta yahagaritse uruja n'uruza mu ntara zitanu zo muri Kenya harimwo n'igisagara ca Nairobi, Kajiado, Machakos, Kiambu na Nakuru mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ikwirakwira ry'umugera wa Corona. Iyi ngingo yafashwe kubera igitigiri  c'abantu bandura iyo ngwara ciyongereye incuro cumi nk'uko bivugwa na prezida Kenyatta. Nta ruja n'uruza mw'ibarabara, indege canke gariyamoshi rwemerewe hagati y'ibindi bice vy'igihugu n'utwo turere tuvugwa  ko turimwo ibitigiri vyinshi  vy'abanduye Corona.

headline: Ivyo tuzi gushika ubu kw'igandagurwa ry'umukuru w'igihugu wa Haiti
text: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Haiti Jovenel Moïse yagandaguwe n'abicanyi bateye ku muhana iwe ku mugwa mukuru , Port-au-Prince, ku wa 07 z'uku kw'indwi. Ng'ibi ibizwi gushika ubu. Akarwi k'abantu bitwaje inkoho karateye ku muhana wa Perezida Moïse uri muri karitiye Pelerin, hari isaha indwi z'ijoro mu masaha yo muri ico gihugu, aho hakaba hari isaha imwe mu gatondo mu masaha yo mu Burundi no mu Rwanda, ku wa gatatu 07 z'uku kw'indwi. Barashe uyu mukuru w'igihugu amasasu 12 yose. Perezida Moïse basanze agaramye hasi, ishati yiwe yuzuye amaraso, ijisho ryiwe ry'ibubamfu barinokoye, nk'uko bivugwa n'umucamanza.  Yari afise ibikomere vy'amasasu mu ruhanga, n'ayandi menshi yarashwe mu gikiriza no mu nda. Yapfiriye aho nyene. Umutambukanyi wiwe, Martine Moïse, na we nyene yararashwe ariko ntiyacikana. Yaciye anyarukanwa n'indege kuvurirwa muri Florida, muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, kandi amakuru avuga ko yoba ameze neza. Umukobwa wabo mukuru, Jomarlie Moïse, yinyegeje munsi y'igitanda ca musazawe kandi ntaco yabaye. We na basazawe babiri bari "ahantu bacungerewe umutekano" nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi. Ireresi itaremezwa neza n'uruhande rwigenga ariko ivugwa ko yafashwe igihe abo bicanyi binjira muri uwo muhana, yerekana umurwi w'abantu bafise inkoho bashika bari mu mamodoka yera yo mu bwoko bwa  SUV . Hari umugabo aboneka ko yategetswe kuryama hasi yubitse inda, mu gihe hari uwundi nawe yumvikana avuga cane mu congereza akoresheje ivyuma vyongereza amajwi ati "Ni igikorwa ca DEA [US Drug Enforcement Administration}, mwese hasi!" DEA [US Drug Enforcement Administration} rero ni igisata ca Amerika kijejwe kurwanya ibiyayuramutwe. Uwuserukira Haiti muri Amerika, Bocchit Edmond, avuga ko n'aho abateye bari bambaye impuzu z'abajejwe kurwanya ibiyayuramutwe ba Amerika, yemera ko ata kuntu boba koko ari abanyamerika. Abategetsi bavuga ko ikibanza kiri hagati ya bariyeri y'inzu yiwe cari cuzuye ibirombora vy'amasasu, ivyerekana ko hari amasasu menshi cane yarashwe, Abo bakoze ico gitero baraboshe babiri mu bakozi bo mu nzu, mu gihe babandanya bavuza induru bavuga ngo "DEA operation" (igikorwa ca DEA). Barasahuye ibiro vya Perezida Moïse baca biba n'igitabo ca banki (carnet de chèques) carimwo amazina yiwe n'umugore wiwe, banatwara kandi imashini z'ububiko nyabwonko (serveurs) zarimwo amasanamu ya kamera zikoreshwa mu gucungera urugo (camera de surveillance). Abategetsi babiri b'igisata kijejwe gucungera umutekano wa Perezida Moïse bariko barakorwako amatohoza, bikaba bitegekanijwe ko bumvirizwa na sentare ku magenekerezo ya 13 na 14 z'uku kw'indwi. Gushika ubu, hari amakuru make cane ku vyerekeye amasaha yakurikiye ico gitero. Umukuru w'igiporisi ca Haiti yatangaje haciye amasaha 24  Moïse agandaguwe ko hari ukurasana gukomeye muri karitiye Pelerin . Léon Charles ati: "Twarazibiye [abakoze iki gitero]  bariko barasubira inyuma bahejeje gukora iri shano. Kuva ico gihe, turacarasana nabo". Uyu mukuru w'igiporisi avuga kandi ko bashoboye kurokora abaporisi batatu bari bafashwe mpiri n'abagirizwa gukora iki gitero. Mu ntango yavuze ko bane muri abo bicanyi bishwe muri uko kurasana, ariko ico gitigiri caragabanijwe gushika kuri batatu. Hari amakuru yavuze ko 11 mu bikekwa ko ari bo bakoze ico gitero bahungiye mu rupangu rw'ibiro vy'ubuserukizi bwa i Port-au-Prince. Abategetsi ba Taiwan bavuga ko igiporisi ca Haiti cabamenyesheje ko abo bagirizwa ubu bwicanyi bari binyegeje muri urwo rupangu ku wa 08 z'uku kw'indwi, inyuma y'amasaha 24 bakoze ico gitero. Taiwan yarahaye uburenganzira igiporisi kwinjira muri urwo rupangu maze gihagarika "ata ngorane" abo bantu bose 11 bikekwa bari binyegejeyo. Babiri muri abo bagirizwa ubu bwicanyi bari binyegeje mu kabande barafashwe n'abanyagihugu bariko barafasha abajejwe umutekano guhiga izo nkorabara. Ikiziga c'umwe mu bikekwa ko ari bo bakoze ico gitero cagiye gutorwa mu gisenge c'inzu, aho yari yinyegeje maze akavirirana gushika n'aho apfa. Abandi babiri muri bo basanze bapfiriye hafi y'umuhana wa Perezida  Moïse. None ni bande bakoze ico gitero? Igiporisi ca Haiti kivuga ko: Umukuru w'igiporisi Charles avuga ko 26 ari abanya Colombia, abandi babiri nabo bakaba ari Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Haiti. Abo banyamerika bakomoka muri Haiti bamenyekanye ku mazina ya James Solages w'imyaka 35, na Joseph Vincent w'imyaka 55. Bompi barapfunzwe. Umucamanza ariko akora amatohoza avuga ko aba babiri babwiye abajejwe amatohoza ko bahawe akazi nk'abakarimani ku rubuga rwa internet. Aba babiri bavuga ko batari bazi ko hari integuro yo kwica umukuru w'igihugu, ariko bemera ko bari gukora nk'abakarimani igihe bafatwa. Indimi zivugwa muri Haiti ni igi Creole n'igifaransa, mu gihe aba bicanyi bo muri Colombia bobo bavuga iki Espanyole. Aba banya Colombia bahagaritswe, barerekanywe imbere y'abamenyeshamakuru aho abategetsi ba Haiti banerekanye ibitabo vyabo vy'inzira hamwe n'ibirwanisho bari babafatanye. Colombia yemeje ko n'imiburiburi batandatu muri abo bantu bayo bafashwe bahoze mu gisirikare c'igihugu. Aba banya Colombia babiri basanze bapfiriye hafi y'urugo rwa Perezida bamenyekanye ku mazina ya Mauricio Javier Romeo Medina na Duberney Capador Giraldo. Ikinyamakuru ca  Colombia El Tiempo kivuga ko bompi bahoze ari abasereja (sergeants), bafise imyaka 45 na 40. Abategetsi ba Haiti bavuga ko umwe mu bafashwe yavuze ko uyu murwi wari umaze "amezi atatu" muri Haiti, ariko amatohoza yakozwe na El Tiempo yerekana ko bamwe muri bo bari binjiye muri Haiti ku wa 06 z'ukwa gatandatu, bajabuka urubibe bavuye muri République Dominicaine/Dominican Republic ihana urubibe na Haiti. Nk'uko bivugwa n'ico kinyamakuru, bamaze imisi ibiri muri République Dominicaine, aho mbere banagendeye n'imiburiburi ikibanza kimwe c'iratiro. Amasanamu yashizwe ku mbuga hwaniro zabo aberekana bariko bifotoreza ku cibutso c'umurondezi Christopher Columbus. Abategetsi ba Haiti baremeza neza ko aba bantu bahagaritswe ari abacangero kandi ko bari bahawe amafaranga ngo bice umukuru w'igihugu. Bavuga ko igikorwa nyamukuru ari ukumenya "abateguye" iri gandagurwa ry'umukuru w'igihugu. Umushikiranganji wa mbere mfatakibanza Claude Joseph avuga ko Perezida Moïse aterekwa ''bamwe mu bashaka kurengera inzego mu gihugu, kandi turemeza ko ibintu nk'ibi bidashobora kubura ingaruka mbi". Gusa ntavuga vyinshi kuri ibi yikeka. Nta gukekeranya ko Perezida Moïse, yari asanzwe ashorera hanze ibitoke imbere y'uguhabwa ayo mabanga, yagize abansi benshi mu gihe yari umukuru w'igihugu. Abamunegura bamwagiriza gusesagura itunga ry'igihugu no gukoresha ututrwi tw'inkorabara mu gutera ubwoba abatavuga rumwe nawe, ivyo yagumye yiyamiriza. Mu 2018, harabaye imyiyerekano mu gihugu igihe ashakiye kuduza igiciro c'igitoro, mu ntango z'uno mwaka naho haraba impari zikomeye zishingiye ku kiringo c'ubutegetsi bwiwe zatumye abanyaporitike bakomeye bamusaba gutanga imihoho. Kubona ubutegetsi bwiwe bwari bushingiye ku mategeko wenyene yasohora (décrets) mu kiringo c'umwaka wose n'igice inyuma y'aho igihugu kinaniriwe no gutegura amatora y'abashingamateka yari ategekanijwe mu kw'icumi 2019, vyatumye yagirizwa ko yariko ategura intwaro y'igikenye. Umugambi wiwe wo gutegura amatora ya kamarampaka kw'ibwirizwashingiro wabandanije utera inzigo abo bamwagiriza ko yashaka kwongereza ububasha bw'umukuru w'igihugu. Ariko igihe mu kwa kabiri amenyeshereje ko hari umugambi wo kumwica no gutembagaza reta yiwe waburijwemwo, benshi baranse kuvyemera bavuga ko ari amayeri yo kurondera ingene ahendahenda abanya Haiti benshi bari bashavuye. Ariko gusa, n'aho Haiti yagiye ica mu bibazo vya poritike, umukuru w'igihugu yaheruka kwicwa ari ku butegetsi yihswe mu 1915, hari haciye imyaka irenga ijana.

headline: US: Biden yateye igikumu ku mategeko asubiza hamwe imiryango y'abimukira
text: Umukuru wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Joe Biden yateye igikumu ku mategeko atatu mu ntumbero yo gusubiza hamwe imiryango y'abimukira yari yatanye ku butegetsi bwa Trump. Yategetse kandi gusubiramwo integuro ijanye n'abimukira yasizwe n'uwo yasubiriye. Mu kugerageza kurwanya abimukira mu buryo buteye kubiri n'amategeko, ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Donald Trump bwari bwatandukanije abakuze batagira ivya ngomwa n'abana babo binjiye baciye ku rubibe rwa Amerika na Mexique. Aya mategeko yateweko igikumu na Perezida Biden agiye gushiraho umurwi uzosubiza mu miryango yabo abana baharurwa hagati ya 600 na 700 batandukanijwe n'abavyeyi babo. Ubutegetsi bwa Trump bwaratandukanije abana n'imiburiburi 5.500 n'abakuze kuri urwo rubibe hagati ya 2017-2018. Abaharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu bavuga ko ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Barack Obama - Perezida Biden akaba yari icegera ciwe - na bwo bwatandukanije abana batari bafise ivya ngombwa n'abavyeyi kuri urwo rubibe, n'ubwo vyabaye gake cane. Rimwe muri aya mategeko ya Biden rizoshinga umurwi uhuriyemwo ibisata bitandukanye - ukazoba urongowe n'umunyamabanga mushasha w'umutekano w'igihugu Alejandro Mayorkas - kugira ngo ahagarikire ibikorwa vy'ugusubiza hamwe imiryango. Itegeko rya kabiri n'irya gatatu yateweko igikumu ma Biden ejo ku wa kabiri ategeka ko hasubirwamo politike y'abinjira n'abasohoka ya Trump yagabanije uburenganzira bwo kuronswa ubuhungiro, igabanya umuvuduko w'abinjira muri Amerika, kandi ihagarika intererano yahabwa ibihugu vy'amahanga. Mw'ijambo yashikirije mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu, Biden yavuze ati: "Tugiye gukora kugira ngo dukureho iceyi twatewe n'ubutegetsi buheruka, tuvugishije ukuri, bwatandukanije abana bubavana mu minwe y'imiryango yabo, ba nyina na ba se babo, ku rubibe ata nteguro n'imwe yo kuzosubiza hamwe abana bakiri mu basho n'abavyeyi babo". Biden asaba kandi ko hashirwaho itegeko riha uburenganzira bwo kuba mu gihugu, rikaba n'inzira yo gushobora kuronsa ubwenegihugu abimukira badafise ivya ngombwa bashika imiriyoni 11 muri Amerika. Ariko, abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko uyu mukuru w'igihugu mushasha yirinze guhindura poritike igumye ya Trump yafashwe mu ntumbero yo kugabanya ibitigiri vy'abinjira mu gihugu mu buryo butemewe n'amategeko ku rubibe rwo mu bumanuko. Ejo kuwa kabiri, mu nama mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu, umunyamabanga ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru Jen Psaki yavuze ko ubutegetsi bwiyemeje gushiraho integuro ishira imbere iteka ry'umuntu ijanye n'ubwimukira. Yavuze ariko ko mu gihe iyo nteguro itarajaho, si igihe "co kwinjira muri Amerika". Muri politike yo "kutihanganirana na gato" abimukira yemejwe mu kwa kane 2018, abimukira bakuze badafise ivya ngombwa binjiriye ku rubibe rwa Amerika na Mexique bafashwe nk'inkozi z'ikibi bacirwa urubanza barapfungwa. Imbere y'aha, ibi vyaha ntivyafatwa nk'ubukozi bw'ikibi. Kubera abana bari kumwe n'abo bapfunzwe batashobora gucirwa urubanza ngo bagirwe n'icaha, ntibemerewe gupfunganwa n'abavyeyi babo, maze bituma bashirwa mu bibanza vyo kubakurikiraniramwo. Amasanamu n'amareresi y'abana bari baryamye ku birago muri ivyo bigo vyari vyarengewe yarateye uburakari mu gihugu, bica bituma Trump ahagarika iyi poritike mu kwa gatandatu uwo mwaka. Mu ndwi iheze, igisata ca Biden kijejwe ubutungane carakuyeho iryo tegeko ku mugaragaro. Hagati aho, ivyo bigo bizibije iminyororo bisanzwe bipfungiwemwo abo bana vyari vyubatswe n'ubutegetsi bwa Obama. Abana baharurwa mu 60.000 bahagaritswe ku rubibe rwo mu bumanuko batari kumwe n'abavyeyi babo barapfungiwe muri ibi bigo mu ci ryo mu 2014. N'aho ibitigiri bidatomotse neza, abategetsi b'igihe ca Obama bavuga ko ivyo gutandukanya imiryango vyari ibintu bitari bikunze kuba mu gihe c'ubutegetsi bwiwe, nk'akarorero, ni mu gihe wasanga hari abiketswe ko bariko bakora magendo. Uwari umuhanuzi mukuru wa Obama ajejwe abinjira n'abasohoka, Cecilia Munoz - akaba mu 2011 yashigikiye cane iyi poritike yo gutandukanya imiryango y'abimukira - yari mu murwi wa Biden wari ujejwe ibikorwa vy'uguhanahana ubutegetsi.

headline: Amananiza abafise ubumuga bwa 'albinism' babamwo
text: Amaso yabo siyo gusa abangamirwa. Uko bafatwa mu kibano binunyurwa n'uko umubiri wabo ubangamirwa, cane cane ubu ubushuhe bwiyongera kubera ihinduka ry'ikirere.

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Foden, Vardy, Traore, Ronaldo, Gomez, Maddison
text: Umurwi wo mw’ihiganwa rya Arabia Saoudite Pro League umenyesha ko uzobandanya urondera umusatirizi wa Manchester United, umunya- Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w’imyaka 37 mu gihe ikibazo ca kazoza kiwe kitotorerwa umuti inyuma y’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose. (CBS Sports) Umukinyi wo hagati, umwongereza Phil Foden w’imyaka 22, yemeye amasezerano mashasha y’igihe kirekire muri Manchester City aho azohembwa amapawundi 225.000 ku ndwi. (Mail) Manchester United na Chelsea iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umusatirizi wa Leicester City Jamie Vardy w’imyala 35 yahoze akinira umurwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubwongereza, akaba asigaje umwaka umwe gusa mu masezerano yiwe. (90min) Tottenham ishobora kuvuvudikira umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Wolves  Adama Traore w’imyaka 26, mu gihe yonanirwa no kuronka umukinyi wo hagati wa Roma umutaliyano Nicolo Zaniolo w’imyaka 23. (90min) Sampdoria yemeye igiciro c’imiriyoni 16,7 z’amapawundi ku mukinyi wo hagati wa Brentford umunya Danemark, Mikkel Damsgaard w’imyaka  22. (Sky Sports) Manchester City yatanguye ibiganiro na Anderlecht ku munya-Espagne akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu Sergio Gomez w’imyaka 21, mu gihe yobura Marc Cucurella w’imyaka 24 asanzwe akinira Brighton. (Times) Brighton iriko kandi iraraba ko yorondera umukinyi w’inyuma wa RB Leipzig umunya-Espagne Angelino kugira ishobore gusubiriza Cucurella asanzwe ariko araronderwa na Chelsea. (Sky Sports Germany iciye kuri Mail) Sergio Aguero ntatahura igituma umurwi yahoze akinira Manchester City wafashe ingingo yo guha Chelsea umusatirizi w’umwongereza Raheem Sterling w’imyaka 27. (Metro) Leicester yanse igiciro kigira kabiri c’imiriyoni 40 z’amapawundi gitangwa na Newcastle ku mwongereza akina hagati James Maddison w’imyaka 25. (Sky Sports) Newcastle iriko kandi irarondera umwongereza Harvey Barnes w’imyaka 24 akina hagati muri Leicester . (Guardian) Umukinyi w’inyuma wa Leicester Wesley Fofana yerekanye ko ashobora kuva muri King Power Stadium mu gukura Leicester City mu bimuranga ku mbuga hwaniro. Chelsea irarondera uyu mufaransa w’imyaka 21 muri rino ci. (Leicester Mercury) Fulham yegereye umunya-Côte d’Ivoire akina muri Manchester United  Eric Bailly w’imyaka 28 imusaba ko yoja kuyikinira. (Football Insider) Chelsea iripfuza kugura umwongereza akina inyuma muri Southampton  Kyle Walker-Peters w’imyaka 25. (Guardian) Everton ntiriko irarondera kugarukana umwongereza akina hagati Ross Barkley w’imyaka 28, canke umusatirizi w’umubirigi Michy Batshuayi w’imyaka 28, n’aho yipfuza aba bakinyi bompi bakina muri Chelsea. (iSport) Sevilla iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano n’umunya-Brezili akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu muri Manchester United  Alex Telles w’imyaka 29. (Fabrizio Romano) Umufaransa akina inyuma muri Chelsea  Malang Sarr ashobora guhitamwo kwimukira muri Monaco hakuja muri Fulham isanzwe iriko irarondera uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 23. (Standard) West Ham yasubiye kurondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Burnley umunya- Côte d’Ivoire Maxwel Cornet w’imyaka 25, mu gihe ikiri mu rugamba rwo kurondera umunya-Serbia akina muri  Eintracht Frankfurt Filip Kostic w’imyaka 29. (Mail) Umukinyi w’inyuma wa Arsenal umunya-Espagne Pablo Mari w’imyaka 28 ari hafi yo kwimukira mu murwi Monza wo mu Butaliyano. (Mail) Sheffield United yagiye imbere y’imirwi ya Brighton, Southampton na Leicester mu rugamba rwo kurondera umwongereza James McAtee w’imyaka 19 akina muri Manchester City. (Athletic)

headline: France: Umuriro wadutse mw’isengero nkuru rya Nantes
text: Isengero rikuru Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul  ryo mu gisagara ca Nantes mu Bufaransa ryatewe n'umuriro w'icaduka. Abajejwe kuzimya imiriro y'ivyaduka barenga 60 nibo bashitse kuri iryo sengero kugira bagerageze kuwuzimya nk'uko bivugwa n'ibiyamakuru vyaho. Nta wuzi icateye uwu muriro. Amasanamu ava aho ivyo biriko biba yerekana umuriro n'umwotsi biva muri iyo nyukabwa. Uyu muriro wadutse haciye umwaka umwe gusa uwundi muriro ukoze ibara kw'isengero rikuru Notre-Dame mu gisagara ca Paris, rimwe mu mitungo ya kahise k'u Bufaransa. Televiziyo BFM TV, itangaza ko abapolisi muri ico gisagara ca Nantes kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw'u Bufaransa batumweko hafi isaha imwe n'iminota 44 mu gatondo. Umwe mu babibonye avuga ko yashobora kubona uwo mucanwa ari muhira, hafi y'iryo sengero. Avuga ko yakanguwe n'urwamo rudasanzwe rw'inkengeri. Ati: "Ku vyo mbona, ni uko umwotsi utera wongerekana". Iryo sengero sibwo bwa mbere riterwa n'umucanwa. Mu 1972, umuriro warasambuye igisenge caryo, bituma ryugarwa mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu ririko rirasubirwamwo.

headline: South Africa: Hoba hagire haze umupfunda wa 5 wa Covid-19?
text: Abandura Covid muri Afrika y'epfo ku munsi bariyongereye gushika ku rugero rwa 60% hagati yo kuwa gatatu no kuwa kane bigatera impungenge z'uko hoba hagire haze umupfunda ugira gatanu w'iyo ndwara muri ico gihugu. Haraharuwe abantu 9.757 bashasha banduye mu gihe kwandura no kwinjira ibitaro biriko biriyongera ku rugero ruri hejuru, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ikigo c'ico gihugu kijejwe indwara zandukira. Ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara buvuga yuko ubwoko bubiri bwamuka kuri Omicron ari bwo buriko buratuma ibitigiri biduga, bikigaragaza mu ntara nini zitatu - Gauteng, Western Cape na KwaZulu-Natal. Bamwe mu bahinga b'indwara zandukira bavuga yuko bafatiye ku ruhande rw'ubuhinga, bovuga yuko Afrika y'epfo imaze gushikirwa n'umupfunda wa gatanu wa Covid, kandi bikaba bibaye kare kurusha uko vyategekanywa. Kuwa kane, ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe ivy'amagara, National Department of Health, congeye amezi atatu ku ngingo zimwe zo gukumira iyo ndwara; zirimwo kwambara agapfukamunwa mu mazu, kugabanya igitigiri c'abemerewe guhurira ahantu hamwe co kimwe n'ic'abinjira mu gihugu. Ico kigo cigije inyuma itariki ntarengwa yo gutangaza ingingo zivuguruwe zijanye n'ivy'amagara, kugira habe ukundi kuganira kwa bose nyuma y'ikurwako ry'ibihe bidasanzwe vy'ikiza bimaze imyaka ibiri kubera Covid. Abanye-Afrika y'epfo bari biteze kuja mu bihe vy'ukwisanzura nyuma y'ikurwako ry'amategeko adasanzwe, ariko leta iracariko iragerageza guhangana n'ubuzima busanzwe bushasha. Iki gihugu nico cashegeshwe cane na covid kurusha ibindi ku mugabane kandi cararanzwemo amategeko akomeye cane ajanye no gukumira ikiza. Ariko abajejwe intwaro barahanganye cane n'igitigiri c'abapfa, ubu kikaba kiri ku rugero rw'indwi mu masaha ari hagati ya 24 na 48 aheruka.

headline: Russia: abitwaje inkoho bishe 11 bari mu myimenyerezo ya gisirikare i Belgorod
text: Abagabo bitwaje inkoho bishe abantu 11 ejo ku wa gatandatu mu gitero cabaye ahariko hatangirwa inyigisho za gisirikare mu Burusiya . Mu gihe bariko bigishwa gukoresha inkoho, abagabo babiri barugururiye umucanwa ku murwi w’abiyandikishije ngo baje ku rugamba muri Ukraine, nk’uko bitangazwa n’itororokanirizo ry’amakuru rya reta, Ria. Ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw’Uburusiya butangaza ko abakoze iki gitero ari abava muri kimwe mu vyahoze bigize Ubumwe bw’Abasoviyeti, ariko nta zindi nsiguro bwatanze. Aba bantu kandi biciwe mu karere k’Uburusiya ka Belgorod, gahana urubibe na Ukraine. Abandi bantu 15 bakomeretse. Ria  isubiramwo itangazo ry’ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi rivuga riti: "Mu gihe abemeye kwitanga ngo baje gufasha mu gikorwa kidasanzwe ca gisirikare [muri Ukraine] bariko bahabwa inyigisho zo gukoresha inkoho, izi nkorabara zabugururiyeko umucanwa n’inkoho ntonto”. "Ibi vyatumye abantu 11 bicwa. Abandi 15 bakomeretse ku ngero zitandukanye baciye banyarukanwa kw’ivuriro”. Umukuru w’iyi ntara avuga ko ata munyagihugu wa Belgorod yishwe canke ngo akomereke. Mu kwezi guheze, Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya yategetse ko Abarusiya 300.000 bigeze kuja mu myimenyerezo ngombwa ya gisirikare batumwako. Iri tegeko ryatumye haduka imyiyerekano mu Burusiya, hamwe n’indiri y’abantu bagerageza guhunga igihugu. Haciye akanya gato iri tegeko risohotse, umusirikare yandika abinjira ku kigo kimwe co muri Siberia yararashwe. Hirya y’ejo, Putin yavuze ko abarenga 200.000 bari bamaze kwinjizwa, akabona ko ata kandi kamo kari gakenewe.

headline: OMS itewe impungenge n'ikiza gishasha ca Ebola muri Kongo
text: Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara kw'isi OMS rivuga ko ritewe impungenge n'ikiza ca Ebola casubiye kwaduka muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo. OMS ivuga ko ico kiza ari co gikomeye kimaze kuboneka mu karere k'uburaruko bushira uburengero bwa Kongo. Abantu mirongo itanu na batandatu ni bo bimaze kumenyekana ko banduye Ebola mu ntara ya Equateur kuva ikiza giheruka catangazwa mu kwezi kwa gatandatu. Umuyobozi wa OMS mu karere ka Afrika, Dr Matshidiso Moeti, avuga ko bamwe mu banduye bari mu duce twa kure tugoye gushikamwo. Uwo mudamu yavuze ko bakuye icigwa mu biza biheruka muri iyo ntara nyene mu 2018, ngo kandi abantu barenga 12.000 barahawe urukingo mu ndwi zitandatu ziheze. Mu kwezi kwa gatandatu, abajejwe ivy'amagara batangaje ko ikiza ca mbere kibi muri ico gihugu caheze, mu ntara zitatu zo mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko, cahitanye abantu bashika 2287.

headline: Umunonotsi wa BBC w'umwaka muri Afrika: Ntando Mahlangu
