headline: Kardinali Fridolin Ambongo wa Kinshasa agabisha ko hari umugambi wo kwikebera agace ka DR Congo
text: Musenyeri mukuru wa Kinshasa muri DR Congo aragabisha ko hari umugambi wo gushaka kwikebera agace k'ico gihugu uriko utegurwa n'abantu barondera amaronko muri ico gihugu. Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru inyuma y'urugendo yakoze mu karere k'Ubuseruko bw'ico gihugu mu ndwi iheze, Kardinali Fridolin Ambongo, avuga ko igice cegwa n'uyo mugambi ari igice kiva muri Bunia, ukagenda muri Beni, Butembo, Goma gushika mu misozi ya Fizi. Kardinali Ambongo avuga ko hari ibihugu bifise uruhara muri uyo mugambi, ariko ntabidomako urutoke. Ahamagarira abanyagihugu bose guhaguruka bakiyamiriza abo bantu bagomba kwikebera agace k'igihugu cabo biyise abakongomani. Muri ico kiganiro, Kardinali Ambongo aremeza ko hari abakongomani bakomoka mu bihugu bibanyi nk'u Rwanda na Uganda basanzwe banavuga indimi zivugwa muri ivyo bihugu baje bavamwo. Aravuga abitwa aba Nyamulenge basanzwe baba mu karere ka Fizi na Rutshuru bakomoka mu Rwanda; Abanande baba mu burere bwa Beni  na Butembo, hamwe n'aba Hema baba mu karere ka Ituri, bompi bakomoka muri Uganda. Ku bwiwe, abo bantu nta ngorane kuko babaye mu gihugu imyaka myinshi cane, akemeza ko ari abakongomani mu bandi. Ati: " Kuri aba bakongomani bavuye mu Rwanda no muri Uganda babaye ng'aha imyaka myinshi, nta muntu n'umwe yoharira ku bwenegihugu bwabo. Ingorane ni abandi baza biyongerako, bagaca bashaka kwiyita abakongomani". "Akarorero gaheruka ni abimukira b'abanyarwanda birukanywe muri Tanzania mu myaka iheze bakaruhira kurungikwa muri Congo, ivyo navyo bigatera amakenga n'ishavu, bikerekana kandi ko hari umugambi wo kwigarurira agace k'igihugu". Kardinali Ambongo avuga ko iyo ngorane yibonekeza no mu gisirikare. Ati: "Iyo muvuganye n'abasirikare, ubwo nyene uca utahura ko igisirikare cacu cinjiranywe n'abanyamahanga". Avuga ko ikibabaje ari uko usanga hari bamwe mu bakongomani bari ku butegetsi, haba mu banyepolitike bari ku butegetsi canke mu gisirikare, babibafashamwo. Asaba leta ya Kongo gukora ibishoboka vyose mu rwego rw'imigenderanire  hagati y'ibihugu kugira ngo "yumvishe ibihugu bibanyi, cane cane u Rwanda, Uganda n'u Burundi ko vyohagarika kurungika abantu bavyo muri Congo". Kuva ico gihugu cahoze citwa Zaire cadukamwo intambara mu 1996, sibwo bwa mbere cagiriza ibihugu bibanyi kugira uruhara mu ngorane zaco. Ivyo bihugu vyamye bivuga ko ata ruhara zifise mu bibera muri Congo, ko ahubwo ari ibibazo biraba abanye Congo ubwabo. Hampande y'ivyo, Kardinali Ambongo avuga ko n'imirwi isanzwe iriko irarwanira mu karere k'Ubuseruko bwa Congo nayo nyene iri muri uyo mugambi. Atanga akarorero k'umurwi ADF uzwi ko wavuye mu gihugu ca Uganda umaze igihe uriko uhigwa buhongo n'igisirikare ca Congo. Ati: "ADF y'ubu siyo ADF yo nyayo ya kera twari tuzi. Ni izina bita abo bantu bose bafise umugambi wo kwigarurira agace k'igihugu cacu. Muri abo twasanzemwo abanya Sudani, abanya Centrafique, abantu bava mu bihugu vyose duhana imbibe mu gice co mu buseruko. Kardinali Ambongo asaba abakongomani kurikanura kuko kubw'iwe, uyo mugambi ntushobora kuja mu ngiro badaciye ku bakongomani bo nyene ubwabo. Ati: "Nivyo ko hari amahanga harimwo n'ibihugu bimwe bimwe bibanyi bishigikiye uwo mugambi, ariko ntiwoja mu ngiro twebwe abakongomani ubwacu tutabishatse". "Amakungu ntiyigeze amenyeshwa ko tudashigikiye uyo mugambi. Ndibaza ko twebwe nk'ama congomani duhagurutse, tugafata mu minwe ikibazo co mu buseruko, tukereka ayo makungu ko tutarota dushigikira uyo mugambi, ntushobora kuja mu ngiro". Amenyesha ko yabonye neza ko abakongomani bo mu karere k'ubuseruko, avuga ko ariko gashaka kwigarurirwa, badashigikiye ko igihugu cabo gisamburwa. Ati: "Barasambuye Yougoslavie kubera uburere bwashaka kwigenga, baragabura Sudani, kubera Sudani y'Epfo yashaka kwikukira, ivyo navyo nta hantu na hamwe wobisanga muri Congo".

headline: Uwahoze ari Pope Benedict ntaco yakoze kw'ihohoterwa, biri mu cegeranyo gishasha
text: Uwahoze ari Papa Benedicto XVI yarananiwe  no kugira ico akoze ku mabi yo guhohotera abana igihe yari akiri musenyeri mukuru i Munich , nk'uko bivugwa n'amatohoza yo mu Budagi ku bijanye na Ekereziya Katorika. Papa Benedicto, ico gihe yari azwi nka  Josef Ratzinger, yari muri ico kibanza hagati ya 1977 na 1982. Yarahakanye ko ivyo vyabaye. Ariko icegeranyo gishasha ku mabi avugwa ko yakozwe muri kahise cakozwe n'ikigo c'amategeko co mu Budagi kiragiriza uwo yahoze ari umwungere mukuru. Ihohoterwa ryarabandanije igihe yari musenyeri mukuru, nk'uko bivugwa, kandi abapatiri bagirizwa bagumye mu mabanga bari bafise mu masengero bakoramwo. Uwo yahoze ari papa, ubu afise imyaka 94, yabaye indongozi ya mbere ya Ekereziya yatanze imihoho (yeguye)  mu myaka irenga 600 mu 2013, avuga ko arushe. Kuva ico gihe, abayeho mu buzima buhwekereye i Vaticano aho azwi nka papa 'emerite'. Ico cegerenyo gishasha c'ico kigo c'amategeko co mu Budagi citwa Westpfahl Spilker Wastl  casabwe na Ekereziya Katorika. Umunyamategeko Martin Pusch  ashikiriza ico cegeranyo yavuze ati: "Habiri  muri aho vyabaye  vyakozwe  ku gihe ciwe hanyuma birenzwako amaso na reta." "Kuri vyompi, ababikoze bagumye bakora amabanga y'ubupatiri yo kwitaho abantu." Hari hamwe bivugwa ko yari azi umupatiri yagirizwa guhohotera abana b'abahungu yimuriwe muri diyoseze yiwe, ariko abandanya gukora amabanga yo kwitaho abakristu  - aho hakaba harimwo rimwe na rimwe kugendera no gushigikira  abantu mu kibano iwabo. Uwo yahoze ari Papa bivugwa ko yarungitse impapuro nyinshi z'inyishu ku bibazo vy'ico kigo, aho yerekanye ko ashigikiye iryo tohoza ariko agahakana kuba yarigeze amenya canke yanka kugira ico akoze kuri iryo hohoterwa rivugwa. Ico cegeranyo, yamara, kirimwo  inyandiko zisa n'izerekana bikomeye ko yari ari mu nama aho ico kibazo cavuzwe. Vaticano yavuze mw'itangazo ko izokwihweza ido n'ido ry'ico cegeranyo niyo camara gusohoka. Vaticano yongeyeko iti: "Nk'uko twongeye guterwa  isoni n'ukwicuza twatewe n'amabi yakorewe abana bakiri bato n'abapatiri, Icicaro Ceranda kirashikirije ko gishigikiye abahuye n'ayo mabi bose kandi kiremeza inzira yo gukingira abatarakura n'uko haba ibibanza vy'aho ata kibi bashobora gukorerwa". Icegeranyo caheruka ku mabi yakozwe muri kahise mu Budagi cerekanye ko abantu bashika 3.600 mu gihugu cose bari barakorewe amabi n'abantu bo mu mu nzego za ekereziya  hagati ya 1946 na 2014. Benshi mu bayakorewe bari abana bakiri bato kandi bakora nk'abahungu b'abakorezi kuri arutari. Ico cegeranyo gishasha cibanze ku turere twa Munich na Freising  catoye vyihariye ko nibura abantu 497 bakorewe ihohoterwa kuva mu 1945 gushika mu 2019. Uretse uwo yahoze ari papa, ico cegeranyo kiranegura abandi bantu bo muri  ekereziya, harimwo umusenyeri mukuru w'iyo ntara muri iki gihe, Cardinal Reinhard Marx. Abakoze amatohoza basanze nawe hari aho ataco yakoze ku hantu  habiri havugwa ihohoterwa. Uwo mu karidinari aramaze gusaba  Papa François gutanga imihoho mu kwezi kwa gatandatu mu 2011 avuga ko akwiye kwumva nawe hari ico yobazwa ku "kaga" k'ihohoterwa riguma rishirwa ahabona. Papa François ariko yaranse ubusabe bwiwe bwo gutanga imihoho. Imbere yaho, papa yari yahinduye amategeko ya Vaticano ajanye n'ivyaha, aho yakajije cane aho ekereziya ihagaze ku vyerekeye ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina.

headline: Ubuvyibuhe bukabije ngo 'ntaho buhuriye no kunebwa kw'umuntu'
text: Kuvyibuha bikabije si ivyo umuntu ahitamwo kandi kumaramaza umuntu kubera ko avyibushe bituma yiyumva nabi gusumba, nk'uko icegeranyo cakozwe n'abahinga mu vy'inyifato kibimenyesha. Gihamagarira abantu guhindura imvugo, nk'akarorero bakavuga ko umuntu afise 'obesite' ubuvyibuhe bukabije, aho kumwita 'obese'. Ico cegeranyo kivuga kandi ko abahinga mu bijanye n'amagara y'abantu bari bakwiye guhabwa inyigisho zibafasha gufasha no gushigikira abakeneye kugabanya ibiro. Hari isekeza ryakozwe mu minsi iheze n'ishirahamwe rifasha kurwanya cancer ryaneguwe kubera kumaramaza abantu bafise ubuvyibuhe bukabije. Urugero rw'ubuvyibuhe bukabije rwageze kuri 18% hagati ya 2005 na 2017 mu Bwongereza, eka no muri Ecosse, Pays des Gales hamwe na Irlande y'uburaruko. Ibi bisigura ko abantu batari munsi y'umwe kuri bane mu bakuze muri ivyo bihugu bigize Ingoma y'Ubwongereza bafise ubuvyibuhe burenze urugero. Ariko rero iduga ry'urwo rugero ntirishobora gusobanurwa n'uko abantu mu Bwongereza boba baradebukiwe, ahubwo n'izindi mpamvu zigoye gusobanura gusumba nk'uko bivurwa n'abahinga mu nyifato n'ivyiyumviro. Icegeranyo c'ishirahamwe ry'abo bahinga cerekana ko ubuvyibuhe bukabije budaturuka ku bushake buke bwa muntu. Ico cegeranyo cerekana ko abantu bafise ivyago kuruta abandi, vyo kugira ubuvyibuhe bukabije, ari ababa baravukanye kamere yo kuvyibuha, canke ababa mu buzima butuma barya birenze canke bakoresha inguvu gake. Uwundi mugwi ico cegeranyo kivuga ni abantu baba mu bice birangwamwo ubukene usanga bafise umwitwarariko urenze, ibibazo vy'ubuzima vyinshi canke ihungabana. Ngo usangakandi ari abantu bataronka amahirwe yo gukora ibikorwa bituma ingingo z'umubiri wabo zinonoka, canke ndetse ngo bagire uburyo bukwiye bwo gufungura ibifitiye umubiri akamaro. Ivyo umuntu aba yaraciyemwo bishingiye ku vyiyumviro n'inyifato navyo nyene  birafise uruhara muri iki kibazo c'ubuvyibuhe bukabije, aho usanga hafi ica kabiri c'abantu bakuze bavyibushe birenze, usanga baraciye mu bibazo mu buto bwabo. Umwitwarariko uturutse ku kumaramazwa kubera ubuvyibuhe, aho usanga gutwenga umuntu avyibushe bimutera kwiyanka, ivyo ibigo vy'amagara y'abantu, abaganga, abaforoma n'abajejwe gufata ingingo bavuga, bitera uwuvyibushe kurya no kurushaho kwongereza ibiro. Umwongereza akora ibiganiro vyo gutwenza James Corden aherutse  kunegura abamaramaza abafise ubuvyibuhe bukabije, agira ati, "iyiba gutwenga abavyibushe vyatuma umuntu atakaza ibiro, nta bana bavyibushe baba basigaye mu mashure" . Dr Angel Chater, niwe yanditse ico cegeranyo c'abahinga akaba akurikira inyigisho z'amagara n'inyifato muri Kaminuza ya Bedfordshire. Avuga ko abahinga mu bijanye n'inyifato bashobora gukoresha ubumenyi bwabo mu kwigisha abaganga n'abandi bakozi bo mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu, kugirango bamenye uko bafata abafise ikibazo c'ubuvyibuhe bukabije. Yagize ati 'iyo aba kuvura abafise ubuvyibuhe bukabije vyari ibintu vyoroshe, nta mpamvu twoba twaranditse iki cegeranyo'. Kubwa Dr Angel Chater, ngo ushobora kuba ufise ubushake bwose, ariko biturutse ku kutabona ibifungurwa nyavyo, kubaho nabi no kutaba waragize intango nziza mu buzima, ugasanga biragoye kugabanya ibiro. Abahinga bavuga ko leta zari zikwiye kwitaho ikibazo c'ubuvyibuhe bukabije nk'ico kunywa itabi. Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa w'umugwi w'abahinga mu nyigisho z'inyifato n'ivyiyumviro mu Bwongereza Sarb Bajwa, avuga ko hashize imyaka harabaye utwigoro dutandukanye kuri leta. Utwo twigoro ngo ni utwo gufasha abanywi b'itabi kuriheba, kandi ngo hariko haribonekeza igabanuka ry'ibitigiri vy'abarinywa, ndetse n'ivy'ingwara riteza. Agira ati: "Abahinga mu bijanye n'inyifato barafise ubuhinga bwo gufasha leta gukora nk'ivyo ku bafise ikibazo c'ubuvyibuhe bukabije". Ku bwiwe ngo bashobora gufasha, "atari gusa mu kwerekana amayira umwe wese abikeneye ashobora gufashwamwo, ariko kandi no mu kugira leta inama yo gushiraho imigambi izofasha abantu kworoherwa mu kwirinda ico kibazo c'ubuvyibuhe kitarabashikira". Mugabo rero, abahinga mu bijanye n'inyifato ntibemeranya n'iciyumviro co gufata ubuvyibuhe bukabije nk'ingwara kuko, nk'uko babivuga, ngo bishobora kugabanya inguvu zikwiye gushirwa mu guhindura inyifato, kandi arico gishobora gufasha gusumba.

headline: Incanco za Covid: Ikinyoma 'kiranyaruka gusumba umugera'
text: Mu gihe incanco za Covid zugururiwe abanyagihugu bose mu Bwongereza, hari bamwe - cane cane abirabure bakiri bato - bakizifiseko amadidane. Abirabure bakuze nibo cane cane bakunze kugira amadidane, mu gihe abari hagati y'imyaka 18-21atari benshi bemera guterwa urucanco, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo kijejwe kwegeranya ibiharuro (ONS). Umurwi w'abanyamakuru bategura ikiganiro If You Don't Know (nimba utazi) c'iradiyo yegukira BBC, BBC Radio 1Xtra, baganiriye na bamwe muri bo bavuga ko bimwe mu vyabitumye ari ibihuha. Urubuga rwa YouTube rwarafuse amareresi arenga ibihumbi 900 mabi canke akwiragiza ibihuha kuri Covid kuva mu kwa kabiri 2021, nk'uko biri mu cegeranyo cashikirijwe iki kiganiro. Umwe mu bantu bagize amadidane yo kwakira urucanco kubera ibihuha bica ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi kuri rwo ni Grace. Ni umuforoma w'indwara zifatira mu mutwe mu kigo kijejwe ubuvuzi mu Bwongereza NHS, bivugwa ko wewe yaronkejwe urucanco zigitangura gutangwa. Uyu mugore  w'imyaka 25 wo mu karere ka Milton Keynes avuga ati:  "Nari maze igihe kirekire ntashaka no kurwumva". "Izi mbuga hwaniro zavuga ayamuhe, zibwira abirabure ko bazoba ingumba, bashaka kutumara twese". Uretse ko ata vyemezo ko izi ncanco zitera ibibazo mu bijanye n'ivyo irondoka haba ku bagore canke ku bagabo, abahinga bavuga ko ivyo bidashoboka. Ibivugwa ku mbuga hwaniro bitandukanye n'ibi  ni ibinyoma. N'aho ivyo bihuha vyamutesheje umutwe cane, Grace ntiyatevye kubona ko ata bundi buryo bwo gusubira mu buzima busanzwe utaronse urucanco - ari co gituma yahavuye yemera kuruterwa. Sharnie Crooks ni umunyeshure ava i Londes, akaba yafashe ingingo yo kwirengagiza urucanco muri uyu mwanya, "kubera gusa rumaze igihe gito". Uyu mwigeme w'imyaka 19 aratinya ko rushobora kuzomugirira ingaruka mbi muri kazoza kubera rukozwe ningoga rugashirwa kw'isoko gihutihuti. Ati: "Jewe ku bwanje numva umengo igihugu carihuse cane kwemeza uru rucanco, rero nico gituma nahisemwo kurindira kugira ngo habanze hakorwe ubundi bushakashatsi". Avugira muri iki kiganiro, Tosin Sotubo, umuganga w'umwiraburekazi, avuga ko yumvise ibintu nk'ibi vyose bivugwa ku rucanco kandi ko yumvise abafise amakenga nk'aya Sharnie. Ati: "abantu bafise amakenga ko uru rucanco rwihutishijwe cane, bibaza nimba tutariko turarugerageza, nimba koko tuzi ingaruka mbi rushobora kugira, mu gihe abandi nabo bafise amakenga ashingiye ku kwemera". Muganga Tosin aremeza ko vyabaye ngombwa ko abanza akicara akiyumvira we nyene ubwiwe ku bijanye n'ingene uru rucanco rwihutishijwe. Ariko avuga ko abantu bakwiye gutahura ko "ubushakashatsi n'ishingiro ry'urucanco vyari bisanzwe biri mu vyariko birakorwa imyaka itari mike" ibihugu vyo kw'isi bikaba vyaciye bishiramwo amafaranga menshi kugira ngo hahingurwe incanco za Covid kandi ku murindi munini. "Izi ncanco nta ntambwe n'imwe zasimvye, zaraciye mu nzira zose zikenewe ku bijanye n'umutekano wazo nk'uko bigenda ku zindi ncanco zose". Kandi uru rumaze kwemezwa igenzura rirabandanya kugira ngo barabe ko rutohava rugira izindi ngaruka mbi canke ingorane zindi muri kazoza. Avuga ko ikindi kintu gitera amadidane, ari ubudasa bumaze igihe kirekire mu bijanye n'amagara y'abantu hagati y'abazungu n'inkehwa atari abazungu, nk'ibijanye n'urugero rw'impfu z'abavyeyi bapfa bariko baribaruka. Abakenyezi b'abirabure mu Bwongereza barakunze gupfa bivuye ku ngorane bagira mu gihe co kwibungenga no kuvyara ugereranije n'abagore b'abazungu nk'uko vyerekanwa n'icegeranyo cakozwe mu 2019. Dr Tosin agira ati: "Rero iyo ubonye ubwo budasa n'ingene abirabure ari bo bakunze kugira ibibazo ugereranije na bagenzi babo b'abazungu, uteregerwa kwibaza nimba koko turiko turakora uko twategerezwa gukora". "Dutegerezwa kuvugana n'abirabure tukabigisha, tukabereka aho ukuri kuri". Avuga ko rimwe na rimwe bisa nk'aho "ibinyoma bikwiragira cane gusumba uwu mugera", akongerako ati: "Biratangaje ingene ikinyoma gishobora guhanahanwa kugera kure kandi ugasanga ari co cabaye 'ukuri'." Hagati aho, arahimiriza abantu kwakira izi ncanco: "Uterwa uru rucanco ku nyungu z'isi yose".

headline: Burundi: Rusansuma y’abashomeri, bamwe barizeye akazi abandi bati ‘nta gishasha’
text: Igikorwa catanguye ku wa gatandatu uheze co kwandika urwaruka rwahejeje amashure rudafise akazi kizobandanya kubera ubwinshi bwabo, ni mu gihe vyari vyitezwe ko kirangira kw'isaha zitandatu ejo ku wa mbere. Mu minsi itatu, leta y'u Burundi ivuga ko yashoboye kwandika abashika 245.000, ariko kandi ko gushika ejo ku wa mbere hari hakiri benshi bakirindiriye kwandikwa. Abandikwa bavuga ko babazwa vyinshi harimwo ibijanye n'amashure bize hamwe impamyabushobozi bafise, igihe bayizonkeye, n'ibindi. Ntaco babwirwa uretse ko ari rusansuma rw'abashomeri bariko barakora. Bamwe bavuga ko ibi nyene vyabaye no mu myaka myinshi bandikwa buri mwaka, bakabona ko ata gishasha, ariko ubu bamwe barizigiye ko leta ishobora kubafasha. Igihe arahiza abashikiranganji ba leta yiwe, Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yatangaje ko yiyemeje gushigikira urwaruka "cane cane bamwe bafise impapuro z'umutsindo ariko batararonka ico bakora". Umwe mu bavuganye na BBC, hampande y'amashure n'impamyabushozobi, avuga ko yabajijwe ubwoko bw'akazi yipfuza canke umutahe abona yoshobora gukoresha mu gihe yoba afise umugambi wo kurangura. Mu gihe abiyandikisha ari abahejeje amashure bakirondera akazi nk'uko binavugwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati, uyu mushomeri avuga ko ataco babwirwa kuri iki. Ati: "Nta wuzi ko bagomba kuduha akazi, canke imitahe, gushika ubu turarindiriye". Uwundi mukenyezi atipfuje kuvugwa amazina yavuganye na BBC, avuga ko ico babwiwe conyene ari uko hariko hakorwa rusansuma y'abashomeri. Ati: "Jewe sinibaza ko ari akazi bashaka kuduha, kuko ivy'akazi baheruka gukoresha ikibazo, abaronse bararonse. Ariko baratubwira ko bibaye ngombwa tuzoja hamwe hanyuma bakaduha imitahe tugakorera hamwe". Uyu afise icizere gito kuko ngo sibwo bwa mbere yandikwa kuva ahejeje amashure. Ati: "Nama mbona batwanditse bigaherera iyo, turamenyereye kwiyandikisha. "Kuva umwaka wa mbere mpejeje amashure mu 2014 nta mwaka urengana batatwanditse. Maze imyaka itandatu nguma nandikwa, ariko nta cahindutse". Hagati aho, aremeza ko iri yandikwa ry'ubu ritandukanye n'iryari risanzwe rihari afatiye kuvyo yabajijwe. Yongerako ati: "Mfise icizere ko nzohava nkaronka umutahe kuko muvyo bambajije barambajije umutahe noba nkeneye kugira nshobore kurangura umugambi wo kwiteza imbere". BBC yashatse kuronka insiguro kuri kino gikorwa kimaze iminsi ine co kwandika abahejeje amashure ariko batigeze baronka akazi, uruhande rwa leta ntaco rwashimye gutangaza bikiriko birakorwa. Hagati aho, mw'ijambo ryiwe arahiza leta nshasha Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze ko mu migambi yiwe itandatu yihutirwa harimwo kuzamura urwaruka, cane cane abahejeje amashure batararonka akazi. Bwana Ndayishimiye yagize ati:"Abo nibo cane cane nshaka ko bazoba intwazangabo zirongora abandi mu rugamba rwo kugwanya ubukene ku rwego rw'intango". "Aho bukera tugira dushware mu makomine yose agize Uburundi, tuje kwegeranya urwo rwaruka mu kibiri, batwereke imigambi bafise, bashaka gukora. "Aho tuzosanga batoye kworora tuzobafasha kworora, aho tuzosanga batoye uwundi mugambi, tuzowubafasha". Ikiriho ni uko biboneka ko abashomeri biyandikisha ari benshi cane mu gihugu, nk'uko vyemezwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati, umutekano n'iterambere ku rubuga rwabwo rwa Twitter. Ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko ku munsi wa mbere gusa batanguye ico gikorwa handitswe abashika 45.000. Mu gihe gushika ku mugoroba w'ejo ku wa mbere, abashika 245.000 ari bo bari bamaze kwandikwa mu gihugu cose, abandi barenga 35,000 bari baraye bategerejwe kwandikwa.

headline: Afghanistan: Abamenyeshamakuru bavuze uko bakubiswe n'aba Taliban
text: Muri Afghanistan bamenyeshamakuru bavuga ko bakubiswe, barapfungwa n'aba Taliban igihe bariko baragerageza kwegeranya amakuru yerekeye imyiyerekano. Ifoto ziriko zirakwiragizwa ku mbuga hwaniro zerekana abamenyeshamakuru babiri b'ikinyamakuru Etilaatroz bafise imiramu inyuma yo guhagarikwa ku mugwa mukuru i Kabul. Umwe muri bo, Taqi Daryabi, yabwiye BBC ko yajanywe ku gituro c'igipolisi aho yasunaguwe yongera arakubitwa. Ku musi wa gatatu, Abamenyeshamakuru ba BBC barankiwe gufata amasanamu. Daryabi ari kumwe n'uwufata amasanamu Nematullah Naqdi, barakurikiranye imyiyerekano y'abapfasoni i Kabul kuri uyu wa gatatu. Mu nyuma, bajanywe ku gituro c'igipolisi aho bavuga ko bakubiswe hakoreshejwe inkoni, intsinga z'amatara hamwe n'indembo. Inyuma y'amasaha make, bararekuwe n'aba Taliban ata nsiguro zitanzwe. Yabwiye umumenyeshamakuru wa BBBC i Kabul, Secunder Kermani ati:"Banjanye mu kindi cumba baca bambohera amaboko i mugongo. Naciye nigira inama yo kutabagwanya kuko nibajije ko bashobora guca bankubita gusumba. Naciye ndyama hasi kuburyo nkingira isura. "Umunani muri bo baciye baza batangura kunkubita --- bakoresheje inkoni, indembo z'igipolisi hamwe n'intsinga - ikintu cose bari bafise mu minwe. Ibi bikomere vyo mu maso vyavuye ku migere y'ibirato bankubise. "Nataye ubwenge hanyuma baca barahagarika. Baciye banjana mu yindi gorofa ahari agasho baca bansigayo." Daryabi yavuze ko yataye ubwenge inyuma yo gukubitwa, hanyuma inyuma y'amasaha nk'abiri yaciye arekurwa. "Sinari nkibasha gutambuka ariko baguma batubwira ngo tunyaruke. Nababara cane gose." Nematullah Naqdi yavuze ko abagwanyi b'aba Taliban bagerageje kumutwara kamera agitangura gufata amasanamu y'abari mu myiyerekano. Naqdi yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru rya AFP ati:"Umwe mu ba Taliban yamponyoye mu mutwe aca afyonyorera isura yanje kw'isima. Bankubise mu mutwe ... niyumviriye ko bashaka kunyica." Yabajije igituma bariko barakubitwa, baca bamwishura:"Ugira imana ko udaciwe umutwe." Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru rya Tolo rivuga ko umumenyeshamakuru waryo afata amasanamu yahagaritswe arapfungwa n'aba Taliban mu kiringo c'amasaha atatu. Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ata ho ryegamiye rya CPJ rivuga ko abamenyeshamakuru 14 ari bo bafashwe mu nyuma baza kurekurwa muri iyi misi ibiri iheze. Umuhuzabikorwa w'ishirahamwe CPJ mu karere ka Aziya  Steven Butler agira ati:"Aba Taliban ntibatevye kwerekana ko ivyo bari bemeye ko bazoreka abimenyeshamakuru vyigenga bigakora mu bwigenge rwari uruhendo." "Dyhamagarira aba Taliban kwubahiriza ivyo bemeye, guhagarika gukubita no gupfunga abamenyeshamakuru bari mu kazi kabo, no kureka ibimenyeshamakuru bikore mu bwigenge ata bwoba." Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi,aba Taliban, bigaruriye igihugu cose ca Afghanistan mu kiringo c'indwi zitatu, bamenyesheje abagize reta bose b'abagabo bagiye kurongora ico gihugu. Kuva ico gihe, baciye babuza imyiyerekano, bavuga ko itemewe kiretse habonetse uruhusha bwo mu bushikiranganji bw'ubutungane.

headline: Haribonekeza ubukene bwa Amstel ndende na bock mu Burundi
text: Haraciye igihe mu Burundi hibonekeza ubukene bw'ikinyobwa ca Amstel ndende, hamwe na Amstel ngufi bita bock nk'uko abakunzi b'izi nzoga babivuga. Abihereza ivyo binyobwa bavuga ko bisigaye ari umuzi w'ibuye, bikaba ngombwa ko bihereza Primus canke Royal badakunda, canke bakanywa za skol bavuga ko ziva mu gihugu c'u Rwanda, zigurishwa ku giciro kiri hejuru. Umwe ati: "Si benshi bashoboye kwigurira skol kuko zirazimvye". Hampande y'inzoga za Amstel, haranavugwa kandi n'ikena ry'amafanta yo mu bwoko bwa coca. Ikompanyi Brarudi iremera ko izo nyobwa zikenye, ariko ko ikibazo kiri ahanini ku bakiriya b'umurengera muri kino gihe. Aho ni mu gihe hari abibaza ko vyoba bitumwa n'ikena ry'amafaranga y'agaciro. Remy Ndayishimiye ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mw'ihinguriro ry'inzoga Brarudi, aremeza ko iyo ngorane iriho ariko ko bakora ibishoboka kugira ngo bayitorere umuti. Ati: "Mu gihe nk'iki, turonka abanywanyi b'umurengera, ariko Brarudi iriko irakora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo ishobore gushimisha abakiriya bayo". Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu biteye imbere bimwe vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco. Ibanki y'isi ivuga ko mu 2015 ubutunzi bw'Uburundi bwagabanutse ku rugero rwa -3.9%, mu 2016 bukagabanuka ku rugero rwa -0.6%, mu 2017, ariko bukaduga kuri 0.5% nayo mu 2018 bukaduga kuri 1,6%. Iyi banki ariko ivuga ko iri duga ryo mu myaka ibiri iheze ari rito cane ugereranyije n'ivyo igihugu gikenera, ikena rikomeye ry'amafaranga y'agaciro, ihagarikwa ry'intererano z'amakungu ivyo bikagira ingaruka mbi ku rudandazwa rw'ibiva hanze.

headline: MISS KAYANZA: Neilla Mutoniwimana niwe yatsinze, imbonekarimwe ku Batwa mu Burundi
text: "Ni iteka rinini kuri jewe nk'umukobwa w'umutwakazi kubona narashoboye gutsinda ihiganwa rya Miss Kayanza, ibitari bimenyerewe mu gihugu ko ubwoko bw'abatwa buja mu mahiganwa nk'ayo". Uyo ni Neilla Mutoniwimana, umwigeme w'umutwakazi yatsindiye ihiganwa rya Miss Kayanza, aho avuga ko yiteguriye no kuja mu yandi mahiganwa ku rwego rw'igihugu. Miss Kayanza ni ihiganwa rihuza abigeme bo mu ntara ya Kayanza ryatanguye kuva mu mwaka wa 2012 rikaba ritegurwa n'umurwi Umuco w'aba SCOUT. Yatowe mu bandi umunani bari muri iryo higanwa rigize icenda ryabaye ku wa 01 /01/2020, inyuma y'amezi atatu yose bari bamaze bitegura. Kubwo ishirahamwe ryateguye uyo mwigeme, intsinzi ya Neilla Mutoniwimana, ni amateka adasanzwe muri kahise k' u Burundi. Neilla Mutoniwimana ni umutwakazi yiga mu mwaka wa 12 kw'ishure ryisumbuye rya Muhanga avuka ku mutumba wa Gashibuka, ya zone na komine Muhanga  mu ntara ya Kayanza. Avugana na BBC, umwigeme Mutoniwimana ahanura abandi bigeme b'abatwakazi kureka kwikumira bakaja hamwe n'abandi, maze bashobore kugira uruhara mu kintu ico ari co cose giteguwe mu Burundi. Kubw'iwe, iyo wikumiriye, n'abandi baragukumira. Ati: "Narerekanye neza ko na twebwe dushoboye mu bintu vyose. Jewe sinikumira, iyaba narikumiriye sinari gushobora kuja muri iri higanwa. Nagize umwete kugira ngo nshobore kuvyifatamwo neza". Ku bateguye ihiganwa, uyo mwigeme yerekanye ubukerebutsi budasanzwe. Gilbert Biziyaremye arongoye  umuhari wa SCOUT mu ntara ya Kayanza ariwo wateguye iryo higanwa avuga ko vyabanezereje kuko bwari ubwa mbere babonye umwigeme w'umutwakazi asumbije abahutukazi n'abatutsikazi bari basanzwe batsindira iryo higanwa. Ati: "Mu gihe turiko turabategura twabona umengo ntavyo azoshobora, vyabonetse ko yari yibitse, maze ibintu bikomeye cane aca avyerekanira imbere y'abarorerezi". "Nivyo ko hahora hatsinda abahutukazi n'abatutsikazi gusa, ariko abibaza ko twoba twashize imbere ivyo ubwoko kugira ngo nabo baserukirwe sivyo na gato, yarabasumbije". Neilla Mutoniwimana yateguwe n'ishirahamwe Fondation FEMIDEJABAT risanzwe ririko rirategura ihiganwa MISS INAKARANGA  rizohuza abigeme b'abatwakazi mu gihugu cose. Nk'uko bivugwa na Isaac Bakanibona, umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa wa FEMIDEJABAT akaba kandi ariwe ahagarariye MISS INAKARANGA, iryo higanwa rifise intumbero yo guhimiriza abigeme b'abatwa no kubategura kugira ngo bazoshobore kwitabira ihiganwa rya MISS BURUNDI. Bwana Bakanibona  yabwiye BBC ko ari ibintu bihimbaye kubona umwana bateguye ashoboye guhiganwa n'abandi mbere akanabatsinda. Ati: " Twaramuhimirije twongera turamurungika kuja guhiganwa n'abandi bigeme bo mu Kayanza, arashikiriza imigambi y'imbonekarimwe yatangaje abari aho bose ku buryo yabonetse ko ari intwari n'incabwenge idasanzwe". Ahimiriza Abarundi n'amakungu ko boshigikira abigeme b'abatwakazi, eka n'abandi bigeme bose baboneka ko basigaye inyuma mu mateka kugira ngo nabo bashobore gufashwa, maze batere intambwe bashike ku rugero abandi bariko. Ati: "Kuko birerekana neza ko ata muntu n'umwe, iyo ashigikiye canke afashwe mu mugongo, atoshobora ikintu ico ari co cose". Mutoniwimana yarushije abariko bahiganwa nawe mu migambi yashikirije yo guteza imbere abigeme b'abatwakazi hamwe n'abandi bigeme muri rusangi, mu kubahimiriza kuja hamwe n'abandi, bakaja mu mashure bakirinda imbanyi z'ishushu zituma abigeme bamwe batabandanya amashure. Bwana Bakanibona avuga ko muri rusangi abigeme b'abatwa bakwije ibisabwa vyose muri ayo mahiganwa ahuza abigeme, ariko ko igikenewe ari ukubafata mu mugongo. Ati: "Twebwe nta bwoba dufise, no mw'ihiganwa rya MISS BURUNDI, ni ryategurwa neza, turizeye neza ko abo bana bacu tubandanya dutegura bazovyifatamwo neza bagatahana ikibanza ciza". Mu Burundi, Abarundi bo mu bwoko bw'Abatwa ni inkehwa zari zaribagiwe mu buzima bw'igihugu kuva imyaka itari mike, bamye bikumira, aho wasanga no mu kugabangana ubutegetsi bataharurwamwo. Hagati aho, amasezerano y'amahoro yateweko igikumu mu mwaka wa 2000 agatuma intambara yari yari yadutse hagati y'Abahutu n'Abatutsi mu 1993 igaharara, yarategekanijwe ibibanza vy'Abatwa mu bisata bitandukanye bigize ubuzima bw'igihugu. Haranatangujwe mbere n'amashirahamwe afise intumbero yo guhimiriza Abatwa kugira ngo bikangure baje hamwe n'abandi. Hagati aho, n'aho bamwe bariko barajijuka, haracibonekeza abatari bake bikumira, bakabona ko bobo atari nk'abandi barundi bagenzi babo b'Abahutu n'Abatutsi.

headline: Burundi: Isabukuru Buja Sans Tabou yahagaritswe kubera "abatimbo bambaye ikoti"
text: Ubushikiranganji bufise urwaruka mu nshingano zabwo mu Burundi bwahagaritse isabukuru yariko irabera mu gisagara ca Bujumbura kubera umugwi w'abavuzi b'ingomba bambaye umwambaro uzwi nka "costume". Amasanamu yahanahanywe ku mbuga hwaniro yerekana abatimbo bari bitabiriye isabukuru Buja Sans Tabou, bavuza ingomba bambaye amakoti n'amapantalo na karuvati bashizeko. Bisanzwe bizwi ko mu muco w'ikirundi ingomba zivuzwa n'abantu bambaye umwambaro w'imbega. Ku mbuga hwaniro bamwe baguye mu gahundwe bakagira bati ivyo ni uguta umuco, abandi nabo bati nkumbure ni iterambere, ntawogaya ikitarageragezwa. Ariko mu gihe isabukuru yitwa "Buja Sans Tabou", canke "Buja itagira umuziro" ugenekereke mu kirundi, hari abibajije igituma bobuzwa kwambara uko bashatse naho boba bariko baravuza ingoma z'ikirundi. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'umushikiranganji ajejwe ivy'ishirahamwe ry'akarere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko, urwaruka, inkino hamwe n'umuco ryasohotse uno munsi, uushikiranganji Ezechiel Nibigira amenyesha ko iyo ngingo yafashwe mu ntumbero yo gukingira "Umurage w'Umuco kama w'u Burundi". Yongeye ko yuko vyavuye "ku nyifato yerekanywe itubahirije intambo yubashwe cane y'Umurisho w'Ingoma z'Ikirundi, yigaragaje ku munsi wo kwugurura isabukuru Slam Buja Sans Tabou". Ngo muri iyo sabukuru "abavuzi b'ingomba barihaye uruhusha rwo kwiyereka bambaye 'tenue de ville (costume)' " ku bw'izo mpangu ngo Ubushikiranganji bujejwe ivy'ishirahamwe ry'akarere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko, urwaruka, inkino hamwe n'umuco "buhagaritse ubu nyene ibikorwa vya Buja Sans Tabou". Haraciye imyaka irenga itandatu ingoma z'u Burundi zishizwe ku rutonde rw'umurage w'isi n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe umuco n'inyigisho, UNESCO. Abatunganije iyo sabukuru yagomba kumara iminsi itanu kuva ku tariki 7 gushika ku tariki 11 z'uku kwezi, ntaco barabivugako.

headline: Mali: Umugore yavyaye abana icenda, Dr Rurangwa ati: 'Ntabwo bintangaje'
text: Umugore w'umunya Mali yaraye avyaye abana icenda, kimwe mu bintu vy'imbonekarimwe. Halima Cissé w'imyaka 25 yavyaye ejo ku wa kabiri abakobwa batanu n'abahungu bane mu bitaro vyo muri Maroc aho yari asanzwe arwarijwe, nk'uko bivugwa n'umushikiranganji wa Mali ajejwe amagara y'abantu, Fanta Siby. Yavyaye abo bana bose abanje gukorwa (césarienne). Ibipimo vya échographie yafashwe muri Mali no muri Maroc vyerekana ko umupfasoni Cissé yari kuvyara abana indwi, ivyuma bikaba bitashoboye kubona abandi bana babiri. Ejo ku wa kabiri, Dr. Siby yavuze ko izi nzoya na nyina wabo "bameze neza". Ariko bazosubira muhira inyuma y'ikiringo c'indwi zitari nke. Arakengurukira cane abaganga ba Mali na Maroc "berekanye ubuhinga budasanzwe maze uyu muvyeyi agashobora kwibaruka aba bana". Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters rivuga ko iyi mbanyi y'umupfasoni Cissé yatangaje cane ico gihugu co mu burengero bwa Afrika n'abategetsi baco - ivyatumye igihe cose hari akagoranye aba bategetsi baca bihutira kumusimbana muri Maroc. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu muri Maroc, Rachid Koudhari, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP ko atari yiteze ko hari umuntu ashobora kuvyara abana benshi nk'abo mu gihugu. Dr Rurangwa Théogène, muganga w'abagore ku bitaro vya gisirikare vy'u Rwanda (Rwanda Military Hospital), yabwiye BBC ko atatangajwe n'uko uyu muvyeyi wo muri Mali yavyaye abana icenda, kuko ari ibintu bishoboka n'aho bidakunze kubaho. Dr. Rurangwa avuga ati: "Akenshi biba muri 'artificial fecundation' [uburyo bwo gusama butari ubwa kamere], [ariko] na 'division' [kwicamwo ibice kw'intanga] isanzwe [birashoboka]". "...nk'uko umuntu avyara amahasa [impanga mu Kinyarwanda], bishobora kuba ko umuntu avyara amahasa menshi". "Hari urubuto rumwe rushobora kuvyara benshi mu gitereko c'umugore iyo rwahuye n'intanga imwe y'umugabo..." "Canke urubuto rumwe rumwe rw'umugore rugahura n'intanga imwe imwe y'umugabo..."

headline: Covid: India yagize igitigiri ca mbere kinini kw'isi c'abanduye mu gihe oxygene nayo ikenye
text: Ubuhindi bwatangaje  abantu bashasha 314.385 batowe  coronavírus mu masaha 24 - igitigiri ca mbere kini gitowe ku munsi umwe ata handi na hamwe cari bwashikweko kw'isi. Abapfa biyongeyeko 2.104 muri ico kiringo, naco nyene nico gitigiri ca mbere kinini Ubuhindi bushitseko ku munsi umwe. Bitumye ico gihugu gishika  hafi ku miriyoni 16 z'abantu bazwi icese ko banduye, ikibanza ca kabiri inyuma ya Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zigeze  ku miriyoni 31.9 bazwi. Ubuhindi bwugarijwe n'umurindi ugira kabiri wo kwandura, nabwo ubukene bukabije bw'umwuka wo guhumeka (oxygene) bukaba bwongereje ubwoba ku nzego  z'ubuvuzi zarengewe. Vyatumye sentare nkuru  y'i Dehli igera aho iruha ikanegura ingene reta mpuzantara iriko iritwara muri ico kibazo ca oxygene muri ico gisagara. Igihe bariko barasoma urubanza rwazanywe n'umuntu afise ibitaro bitandatu vyigenga, abacamanza bavuze bati: "Ibi  biteye isoni. Dukeneye kumenya ico reta iriko irakora ku bijanye  n'uko haboneka oxygene mu Buhindi". Sentare yategetse reta gukora ku buryo oxygene iva aho ihingurirwa igashikira neza ibitaro mu gihugu cose. Hari abantu benshi bamaze gupfa muri ico gihugu barindiriye kuronka umwuka , n'ubwo bitoroshe kumenya ingene igitigiri cabo kingana. N'imbuga  hwaniro aho mu Buhindi zuzuyeko ubutumwa  bw'abatabaza basaba umwuka. Abantu isinzi usanga bakoraniye  imbere y'ibitaro mu bisagara bikuru bikuru vyuzuye abarwayi gushika aho ata kibanza na kimwe gisigara. Hagati aho abategetsi bo mu ntara ikomerewe cane kurusha izindi ya Maharashtra  batangaje ko  hongeweko izindi ngingo zo kugerageza kwirinda ikwirakwira ry'iyo ndwara kuva kuri uyu wa kane ku mugoroba, mu gihe ihanganye n'iyongerekana rikomeye ry'abafatwa. Iyo ntaya yari isanzwe iri muri gahunda yo kuguma mu rugo amasaha atari make y'umunsi kuva itariki 14 z'ukwezi kwa kane. Maharashtra niyo ntara ya mbere itunze cane mu Buhindi ikaba ari nayo irimwo igisagara c'ivyashara vyinshi vy'amafaranga, Mumbai. Ninayo yagumye ari ikirimbiro rikomeye rya Covid kuva ico kiza  cadutse,  yonyene ikaba irimwo ica kane c'abandura uwo mugera mu gihugu. Maharashtra ni nayo ntara imaze  gupfamwo abantu benshi kurusha izindi ntara zose, bagera ku 67. 468. Ariko n'ubwo impfu zakomeje kwiyongera, urugero rw'abapfa ugeraranije ruracari hasi. Vikas Pandey, umunyamakuru wa BBC News i  Delhi avuga ko telefone yiwe buri igihe iba iriko irahamagarwa n'abagenzi bihebuye basaba ico yobafasha mu kurondera igitanda mu bitaro hamwe n'imiti. Avuga ko  hari bamwe ashobora gufasha n'abandi atako ari bugire. Ati : " Ndazi ubwanje abarwayi benshi bamaze gupfa kuko batashoboye kuronka oxygene hakiri kare. N'ibintu bibabaje cane ku miryango kwumva ko ibitaro ababo baba bariko baravurirwamwo  vuba bigiye  kuba ata mwuka bifise". Vikas Pandey avuga ko gushika ubu reta yakoze ku buryo ata kaga gokomeye karaba, ariko biruhuta cane ko ibitaro bironswa oxygene kugira bishobore kwitaho ibitgiri vy'abarwayi biguma vyiyongera. Avuga ko abahinga bibaza igituma ibintu bimeze uko mu gihe mu kwezi kwa mbere umuvuduko w'iyo ndwara wasa n'uwahagaritswe. Asigura ko ako kanya k'agahengwe katakoreshejwe kugira hongerezwa uburyo bwo kwitaho abarwayi. Avuga ko ubu rero abanttu bariko baravyishura ku rugero aho ''twese dusanga ataco turi bufashe". Icateye uwo murindi mushasha ni igiki? Ubuhndi bwugarijwe y'iyongerekana rinyaruka cane ry'abandura mu kwezi guheze, ryatewe no gufata minenerwe ingingo zo kwirinda, hamwe n'isabukuru ry'aba Hindu ryitabiriwe na miriyoni z'abantu ukongerako amoko mashasha y'uwo mugera, harimwo ubumaze kwihindura kabiri. Ubwo bwatowe muri 61% y'ibipimo vyafashwe muri Maharashtra , nk'uko vyerekanwa n'ikigo c'igihugu kiraba indwara z'imigera. N'amakoraniro y'amatora - arimwo na ministre wa mbere Narendra Modi - nayo ntiyahagaritswe mu ntara ya West Bengal, ahabaye amatora ku bice ku bice  mu ndwi ziheze. N'uyu munsi hari ahari kuba amatora ariko reta yahagaritse ingingo yo kuyabandanya.

headline: Ntahokatarondererwa: Josiane Kwizera yahisemwo gufotora, abavyeyi bashaka ko yiga kuvura
text: Uwo mwigeme w'imyaka 27 yahejeje amashure yisumbuye mu gisata c'ubumenyi (scientifique), abavyeyi biwe bipfuza ko abandanya mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu ariko we ahitamwo kwiyigisha gufotora. Avuga ko yakunze umwuga wo gufotora kuva akiri umwana. Ati: "Kuva nkiri umwana narakunda gufotora. Narakina ibintu vyo gufotora nkoresheje telefone canke ibindi bikoresho". Josiane avuga ko ahejeje amashure yisumbuye yinginze abantu benshi ngo bamwigishe uwo mwuga ariko benshi baramwankira. Umwe gusa ni we yamwemereye mu 2018. Josiane Kwizera avuga ko yatanguye kubikora nk'umwuga mu 2019, n'aho abavyeyi biwe bo bipfuza ko yokora umwuga wo kuvura abantu. Agira ati: "Abavyeyi bashaka ko mbandanya kwiga ivyo kuvura, ariko jewe nahisemwo gufotora kuko ari vyo nkunda. "Ubu ndaronka amasoko yo gufotora abana, mu manza z'isabukuru n'iz'ubugeni. "Ndaniyigisha nkoresheje inyabwonko kandi maze kumenya vyinshi." Kwizera avuga ko ubu, afashijwe n'uwo mwuga wo gufotora, hari vyinshi atakizera ku bavyeyi. Agira ati: "Ubu ndirihira inzu nkoreramwo, nariguriye camera-foto yo mu bwoko bwa Canon izimvye cane, ndagura akamoto n'inyabwonko. "Ndafasha n'abavukanyi banje nanje nkifasha ntarinze kugora abavyeyi." Josiane Kwizera ahanura urwaruka gukura amaboko mu mpuzu ngo bironderere akazi. Ati: "Ubu si nka kera aho abavyeyi bacu baheza ishure basanga akazi kabarindiriye, akazi n'ukukarondera. "Ugaye akazi, ntuba uzi ico ushaka gukora."

headline: Burundi: Umugambwe CNL uvuga ko abawo bariko barapfungwa ikivunga ku karenganyo
text: Umugambwe CNL utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi mu Burundi uvuga ko abanywanyi bawo benshi bamaze gupfungwa kuva aho abitwaje ibigwanisho batanguriye gutera Uburundi, mu gihe uvuga ko ataho bahuriye n'abo bakora ivyo bitero. Agathon Rwasa arongoye CNL yabwiye BBC ko abo mu butegetsi bavuga ngo "abarobere ntibaza mu Burundi CNL itabizi, itabirimwo", bikaba impamvu yo guhohotera abanywanyi babapfunga. Gushika mu ndwi iheze CNL ivuga ko abantu bayo barenga 50 bari bamaze gupfungwa, mu gihe gupfunga n'abandi bavuga ko bibandanya hirya no hino mu gihugu. Kuva kuwa mbere w'iyi ndwi, BBC yagerageje kuvugana n'ubushikiranganji bujejwe ubutungane hamwe n'ubujejwe umutekano, gushika ubu ntibirashoboka. Umugambwe CNL watsinzwe amatora y'umukuru w'igihugu n'ay'abashingamateka yabaye mu mezi aheze, ufatwa nk'umukeba akomeye w'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi. Bwana Rwasa agira ati: "Dutangazwa rero nuko abitwa ko boba barateye bemanga ivyo bintu mugabo bakaja gufata aba CNL kandi ataho duhuriye navyo." Bwana Rwasa avuga ko abarongoye CNL mu ntara ya Bururi mu ndwi iheze bakoze inama ku murango, aho basanzwe bayikorera ariko baza kwagirizwa gukora inama mu buryo butemewe n'amategeko. Ati: "Ku munsi wa mbere baciye bafata babiri mu nyuma baja guhiga n'abandi, ubu abahagarariye umugambwe mu makomine yose [ya Bururi] barapfunzwe. Abo n'abandi bose ba CNL bamaze gupfungwa muri ico bo bita uruhigi, Bwana Rwasa avuga ko bakorerwa irementanya ariko benshi ntibanashikirizwe ubutungane. Umushikiranganji ajejwe ubutungane ntiyasubije BBC ku cifuzo co kumubaza ku bivugwa na Bwana Rwasa, we avuga ko niba hari abantu bakoze ibitero bidakwiye kubazwa "abantu bitekaniye ngo ni uko gusa utabiyumvamwo." CNL ivuga ko hafi abantu 100 bayo bapfunzwe mu ndwi zidashika zibiri ziheze. Bwana Rwasa yabandanije agira ati: "Ico dusaba ni uko umwe wese yokubahirizwa mu burenganzira bwiwe, bakumva ko Uburundi atari ubw'aba CNDD-FDD gusa, n'uwundi Murundi uwo ari we wese afise uburenganzira yaba ari mu mugambwe canke atari mu mugambwe. "Kandi ko ata muntu yozizwa umugambwe arimwo kuko umuntu aja mu wo ashaka." Bwana Rwasa, yagize amajwi 24% mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu mu kwezi kwa gatanu, asaba ko ata Murundi akwiye kurementanirizwa kandi uwagirizwa icaha akwiye kugezwa muri sentare. Ati: "Mugabo ibihimbano ngo abarobere ntibaza mu Burundi CNL itabizi itabirimwo, CNL si yo ijejwe umutekano, si yo ijejwe imbibe, no mu ntwaro ntiturimwo, intwaro bayigungiyeko bibananiye nibemere ko bibananiye mugabo bareke guhohotera abantu." Uruhande rujejwe umutekano hamwe n'ubutungane ntaco bishuye BBC ku bivugwa na CNL.

headline: Russia nayo yirukanye abakora mu buserukizi bwa US mu kuyisubiriza mu ndumane
text: Uburusiya bwirukanye abakora mu buserukizi bwa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika 10, abategetsi bakuru umunani ba Amerika nabo bashirwa ku rutonde rw'abatemerewe kwinjira muri ico gihugu, ingingo yafashwe mu kwihora Amerika ku bihano yabufatiye ku wa kane. Muri abo bantu batemerewe kwinjira mu Burusiya harimwo umukuru w'igisata kijejwe igendereza FBI hamwe n'umushikirizamanza mukuru wa Amerika. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vya Amerika, Maison Blanche/White House bivuga ko Amerika yafatiye ibi bihano Uburusiya kubera igitero co ku nyabwonko za "Solarwinds" mu mwaka uheze, itoteteza buriko bukorera Ukraine hamwe rero no kwivanga mu matora ya 2020. Ibi bihano bije mu gihe hari icuka kibi hagati ya Washington na Moscou. Uburusiya buherutse kwegereza abasirikare ibihumbi n'ibihumbi hafi ya Ukraine, mu gihe Amerika nayo iriko yegereza ibikoresho vy'intambara ku kiyaga cirabura (Mer Noire/Black Sea), ivyatumye umushikiranganji ajejwe imigenderanire w'Uburusiya agabisha Amerika. Mu kwezi guheze, Amerika yaragirije abategetsi indwi b'Uburusiya hamwe n'ibisata birenga cumi vya reta ko bifise uruhara mu guha isumu wa munyaporitike atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bwa Vladimir Putin, Alexei Navalny. Uburusiya buvuga ko ata ruhara bubifisemwo. Hagati aho, Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika aherutse gusaba mugenziwe w'Uburusiya Vladimir Putin ko bobonana - iciyumviro Moscou yakiriye neza ubu ikaba iriko iracihweza. Moscou yategetse abakora mu buserukizi bwa Amerika cumi kuva mu gihugu. Yabujije kandi abategetsi umunani kwinjira mu gihugu. Muri aba harimwo: Abakora mu buserukizi bwa Pologne batanu nabo nyene bategetswe gutekera imizigo yabo bakagenda, inyuma y'aho ico gihugu naco cirukaniye abategetsi batanu b'Uburusiya. Hampande yo kwirukana cumi bakora mu buserukizi bw'Uburusiya, Amerika kandi iragiriza abategetsi hamwe n'inzego zegamiye reta 32 zagirizwa kugerageza kwivanga mu matora ya Amerika mu 2020 "no gukwiragiza amakuru atari yo". Ibigo vya Amerika bijejwe ubutunzi navyo nyene vyabujijwe gusubira kugiriranira imigenderanire y'ubucuruzi n'ibigo bikoresha amafaranga y'ama 'roubles' (akoreshwa mu Burusiya) kuva mu kwa gatandatu.

headline: Aurlus Mabele: Rurangiranwa mu muziki wa Congo (Brazzaville) 'yahitanywe na coronavirus'
text: Umunyamuzika rurangiranwa wo muri Kongo (Brazzaville) Aurlus Mabele yaguye mu bitaro ku murwa mukuru w'Ubufaransa, Paris, afise imyaka 67. Ubutumwa bwashizwe ku mbuga hwaniro n'abagenzi hamwe n'umuryango wiwe buvuga ko yahitanywe na coronavirus ariko ibi ntibiremezwa. Abafana biwe bamwita umwami wa soukous - umuziki w'umudiho unyaruka wo muri Kongo ukundwa hose muri Afrika. Umukobwa wiwe, umuririmvyi w'umufaransakazi Liza Monet, yanditse ubutumwa kuri twitter kuwa kane avuga ko se yahitanywe na coronavirus. Yanditse ati "nishwe n'amarira." Uwari mu mugwi umwe nawe wa Loketo, Mav Cacharel, nawe yanditse kuri Facebook ko yahitanywe na coronavirus. Umutunganya-bikorwa wiwe (manager), Kimmy Ouetenou, ariko yabariye BBC Afrique ko  bitaremezwa ko yahitanywe na coronavirus kandi ko yari afise ibibazo vy'amagara amaranye igihe. Yinjijwe ibitaro ejo kuwa kane aca acikana uwo munsi nyene. Mabele, azina ryiwe ry'ukuri ari Aurélien Miatshonama, yavukiye Brazaville aca yimukira mu Bufaransa mu myaka y'1980. Indirimbo ziwe zakunzwe zirimwo iyitwa Embargo. Bwana Ouetenou yavuze ko batanguye kuganira na leta ya Kongo kugira barabye ko yoshingurwa mu gihugu ciwe. Hagati aho, isandugu yiwe izoshirwa mu kibanza izobikwamwo gushika ingendo zahagaritswe kubera coronavirus zisubiriye, nk'uko bivugwa na Rose-Marie Bouboutou wa BBC Afrique. Mabele yashikanye injana ya soukous kw'isi yose Vyashikirijwe na Gaïus Kowene, BBC News, Kinshasa Akoresheje izina ryiwe Aurélien Miatshonama, Mabele yashinze umugwi Les Ndimbola Loketo ari kumwe n'abagenzi biwe i Brazaville basohora zimwe mu ndirimbo zakunzwe cane muri Afrika mu myaka 1970, nk'indirimbo Embargo, Zebola na Waka Waka. Mu nyuma, yaje kwimukira i Paris aho yashinze uwundi mugwi, Loketo, bisigura amafyinga mw'ilingala - ururima bakoresha kenshi mu ndirimbo za soukous, rukanavugwa cane mu burengero bwa Kongo-Kinsasa na Kongo-Brazzaville. Mu gihe yagurishije inkurikirane z'indirimbo (albums) zirenga imiriyoni 10 mu mwuga yari amazemwo imyaka irenga 30, Aurlus Mabele yashikanye soukous hanze y'imbibe za Afrika, ayishikana kure kw'isi.

headline: Kuki abasaba ubuhingiro bariko barungikwa mu Rwanda, hagenda bangahe?
text: Bamwe mu bashika kurondera ubuhungiro muri UK bazorungikwa mu Rwanda kugira ivyabo vyo gusaba ubuhungiro vyigwe n’ico gihugu. Uwo mugambi ugiye kugeragezwa ku kiringo c’imyaka itanu uzorungika bamwe mu mpunzi mu Rwanda, kugira baje gusaba ubuhungiro muri ico gihugu. Aba mbere bitezwe kurungikwa kuri uyu wa kabiri itariki 14 ukwezi kwa Ruheshi (kwa 6). Uwo mugambi werekeye cane cane abimukira bakiri bato kandi bakiri bonyene (celibataires) bashika baciye mu buryo reta ivuga ko  ‘’bunyuranye n’amategeko, bubangamye canke budakenewe,” nko mu bwato canke mu kwinyegeza mu ma kamyo. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w’Ubwongereza Boris Jonhson yavuze ko Urwanda arirwo ruzokwitaho abarungitsweyo, rubahe amahirwe angana mu kuronka ubuzi  n’ibindi vya nkenerwa. Uwari we wese yinjiye mu Bwongereza inyuma y’itariki ya 1 Nzero (ukwezi kwa mbere) ashobora kurungikwa, ataho kugarukiriza ku gitigiri, nk’uko umushikiranganji wa mbere yavuze. Ubwa mbere abantu 37 ni bo bari kurungikwa ku wa kabiri, ariko ubushikiranganji bw’intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu bwabwiye BBC ko intambamyi zifatiye ku mategeko zagabanuye cane ico gitigiri. Ubushikiranganji bw’intwaro yo hagati buvuga ko abantu umunani aribo baja kurungikwa muri iyo ndege, ariko ishirahamwe ry’abagiraneza Care4Calais rivuga ko abo bantu ari indwi gusa. Umunyamabanga wa reta ajejwe imigenderanire Liz Truss yashimangiye ko indege yo ku wa kabiri ija guhaguruka, n’aho yoba itwaye abantu bari ku rushi. Yongeyeko ati: ‘’N’ubwo boba batari ku ndege y’uyu munsi, bazogenda mu ndege zikurikira zizoja mu Rwanda.” Amashirahamwe y’abagiraneza n’abashingwamanza bahagarariye  abarondera ubuhungiro batanguje urugamba rushingiye ku mategeko rwo kurwanya uwo mugambi , bavuga ko bafise amakenga ku gateka ka zina muntu. Ku wa mbere sentare isubiramwo imanza  yanse kubuza indege kujana mu Rwanda aba mbere mu basaba ubuhungiro ku rubanza rwari rwashingishijwe na  sendika Public and Commercial Services Union hamwe n’amashirahamwe y’abagiraneza Care4Calais na Detention Action. Hari n’izindi ntambamyi zishingiye ku mategeko nazo zija kwumvirizwa muri sentare imbere y’uko indege ihagaruka. Asylum Aid ivuga ko ukurungika abarondera ubuhungiro ari akarenganyo kuko ata mwanya ukwiye uhari kugirango baronke ubwunganizi mu mategeko kandi bunguruze urubanza rw’uburenganzira bwo kuguma mu Bwongereza. Ayandi mashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka zina muntu afise amakenga niba Urwanda koko ari igihugu gitekanye co kurungikamwo abo bantu, akagabisha ko uwo mugambi uteye kubiri n’amasezerano y’ishirahamwe rya Buraya yerekeye agateka ka zina muntu. Umushikirangani wa mbere yavuze ko reta yari yabonye hakiri kare ko hazoba ‘’abashingwamanza bakerebutse” bazobera intambamyi uwo mugambi. Yagirije abaharanira uburenganzira kurondera ko  “ikibazo c’abimukira  kirabwa imiryango yuguruye”, avuga ko   bikenewe cane ko ”hahagarikwa ibikorwa vy’imigwi vy’inkozi z’ikibi” vyo kujabutsa abantu mu kinyegero. Amakuru avuga ko Urwanda rwasubiyemwo amazu y’uburaro hafi y’umurwa mukuru Kigali kugura azokwakire abo bimukira barungikwa bavuye mu Bwongereza. Ico gihugu gisanzwe gihaye indaro impunzi 150.000 ziva mu  bihugu bibanyi vy’Uburundi  na Repuburika ya Demokrasi ya Congo. Rusanzwe ruhaye indaro kandi abimukira bagerageje kujabuka Mediterranee baja i Buraya baciye muri Libya. Bamwe bakora nk’abarimyi, abandi nk’abakozi bo mu ngo. Benshi nta kazi bafise, babeshejweho n’imfashanyo ya reta y’ama pound 35 (arenga ibihumbi 40 vy’amafaranga y’Urwanda) ku kwezi. Reta y’Urwanda ivuga ko igihugu cakoze ‘’igitangaro’’ c’iterambere kuva mu 1994, igihe jenoside yahitana abantu barenga 800.000. Amafaranga umunyagihugu yinjiza ku mwaka yariyongeye cane kuva ico gihe. Imyaka yo  kuramba  yiyongeye incuro icumi kuva mu 1990 ishika ku 69. Ariko abashika 70 kw’ijana ku  banyagihugu miriyoni 13, babeshejweho n’ukurima, bisigura ko barya, badashora ivyo bimbura. Reta ivuga ko ugusaba ubuhungiro mu Bwongereza ubu bitwara miriyaridi 1,5 z’ama pound ku mwaka, ayarenga miriyoni 4,7 z’ama pound akaba akoreshwa buri munsi mu kuriha amahoteri abimukira batagira uburaro  bashirwamwo. Kubakura mu Bwongereza n’indege zakoteshejwe vyatwa ama ama pound arenga 13.000 ku muntu mu 2020. Umushikiranganji w’intwaro yo hagati Tom Pursglove yavuze ko amafaranga angana miriyoni 120 z’ama pound y’ibanze azoheza agakurikirwa n’ayandi azohabwa Urwanda mu gihe ruzoba rubandanya kwakira abandi. Ubwongereza bugiye gushira kandi miriyoni 120 z’ama pound mw’iterambere n’izamuka ry’ubutunzi vy’Urwanda. Yavuze ko amafaranga azosohoka “asa n’ayangana n’ayo dusanzwe dusohora muri iki gihe ku basaba ubuhungiro”, kandi ko “ku gihe kirekire, mu kugabanya umuzo, ivyo bizodufasha kubika amafaranga”. Ariko, uwukurikirana ibibazo vyo mu ntwaro hagati mu mugambwe utavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi Yvette Cooper yavuze ko “amafaranga yose azokoreshwa azoba menshi kurusha”. Habaye igereranywa n’amafaranga Austrialia isohora kugira ama dosiye y’abarondera ubuhungiro muri ico gihugu yigirwe hanze, ayo nayo akaba yangana na miriyoni 546 z’ama pound mu 2021-22. Liz Truss  yanse kuvuga amafaranga indege yo ku wa kabiri izotwara, ahubwo avuga ko ikiguzi ku gucuruza abantu no kurondera ubuhungiro mu buryo butemewe n’amategeko bitwara amafaranga  “menshi cane” umutangakori. Uwo mugambi wo mu Rwanda wamenyeshejwe ubwa mbere na reta y’Ubwongereza itariki 14 Ndamukiza (ukwezi kwa kane). Hagati y’itariki 18 Ndamukiza na 5 Ruheshi (ukwa gatandatu), abarondera ubuhungiro bashika 3.599 nibo bizwi ko bajabutse mu bwato buto buto, hakurikijwe ibitigiri bitangwa n’ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi. N’ubwo abo bantu ari bake ugereranije na 4.554 binjiye hagati ya Ndamukiza na Ruheshi 2021, igitigiri gishobora kwiyongera  niyo haboneka  ibiharuro vyose vy’ikiringo co hagati ya Ndamukiza na Ruheshi. Mu mwaka wose wa 2021, abantu 28.526 bazwi ko bajabutse mu bwato buto buto – bavuye ku 8.404 mu 2020. Igitigiri cose c’uyu mwaka citezwe ko kizoba kiri hejuru cane kuruta mu mwaka uheze, nk’uko bivugwa  n’abarongoye sendika Border Force. Mu 2021, 75 kw’ijana y’abaje bari abagabo bari hagati y’imyaka 18 na 39. Abashika 5 kw’ijana bari abagabo bafise imyaka irenga 40, 7 kw’ijana bari abagore bafise imyaka irenga 18, abana bafise munsi y’imyaka 18 bangana na 12 kw’ijana (muri abo batatu kuri bane bakaba bari abahungu). Imbere y’aho abanya-Iran nibo bari benshi mu baza - 80 kw’ijana mu 2018, na 66 kw’ijana mu 2019. Ubu vuba abantu barushirijeho kuba uruvange rw’ibihugu barurukamwo. Abanya-Iran bashika 30 kw’ijana y’abaza mu bwato buto buto mu mwaka uheze, mu gihe 21 kw’ijana bari abanya-Iraq, 11 kw’ijana abanya-Eritrea na 9 kw’ijana b’abanya-Syria hakuwrikijwe ibiharuro bitangwa n’ubushikiranganji bw’intwaro yo hagati.

headline: Covid-19: umushikiranganji wa mbere wa France avuga ko Omicron igenda nk'umuravyo
text: Ubwoko bushasha bwa Covid-19, buzwi kw'izina rya Omicron buriko "burakwiragira ku muvuduko w'umuravyo" i Bulaya, kandi buboneka ko ari bwo bugiye kwiganza mu Bufaransa gushika mu ntango z'umwaka uza, nk'uko umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubufaransa Jean Castex agabisha. Aya majambo yayashikirije ku wa gatanu hasigaye amasaha makeya ngo Ubufaransa bufate ingingo zo kuzibira ingenzi zinjira zivuye mu Bwongereza. Gushika ubu, Ubwongereza nico gihugu ca mbere kibangamiwe gusumba ibindi mu karere, aho ejo ku wa gatandatu, abashika hafi 25.000 ari bo bamenyekanye ko banduye Omicron. Ku mugabane wose, abajejwe amagara y'abantu bahanganye bikomeye n'igihuhusi c'abandura ku bwinshi. Ingingo zindi ziramaze gufatwa mu Budagi, muri Irlande no mu Buholande, mu gihe abategetsi b'ibi bihugu bariko bita ku rutare ngo bahagarike iki kiza. Abarenga imiriyoni 89 nibo bamaze kumenyekana ko banduye Covid-19 i Bulaya nayo imiriyoni 1.5 bakaba bamaze guhitanwa n'iki kiza, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'ibiharuro vya vuba i Bulaya. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu w'Ubudagi Karl Lauterbach yabwiye abanyamakuru ko igihugu "gitegerezwa kwitegura guhangana n'ikiza tutari bwigere duhura", mu gihe igisata c'amagara y'abantu camaze kumenyesha ko Ubufaransa, Norvège  na Danemark ari "ibihugu bibangamiwe cane" kubera ibitigiri vy'abandura bigenda vyiyongera cane muri vyo. Ejo ku wa gatandatu, abashikiranganji bajejwe amagara y'abantu ku rwego rw'uturere basavye reta ya Berlin gufata ingingo ruhasha ku binjira bavuye mu Bwongereza kubera ibitigiri vy'umurengera vy'abandura Omicron muri iki gihugu. Ubwongereza bwatangaje ibitigiri binini gusumba vy'abandura Covid ku musi ugira gatatu bwikurikiranya - aho abarenga 93.000 banduye - abenshi muri bo bakaba banduye Omicron. Ku wa gatanu, Ubufaransa bwarugaye imbibe zabwo ku ngenzi ziva mu Bwongereza. Si co gihugu conyene kiriko kirafata ingingo ruhasha zo kuzibira. Mu ntango z'ino ndwi turiko turangiza, Ubutaliyano, Ubugiriki na Portugal vyatangaje ko ingenzi ziva mu bihugu vy'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya zishitse zitegerezwa kwerekana ibipimo vyerekana ko batanduye  - baba mbere n'abakingiwe. Mw'ijambo yashikirije imbere y'uko izi ngingo nshasha zitangura gushirwa mu ngiro, umushikiranganji Castex yavuze ko izi ngingo zerekeye ingenzi ziri mu zindi nyinshi zafashwe mu ntumbero yo guhagarika iki kiza. Zimwe muri zo harimwo kugabanya umwanya uri hagati y'urucanco rwa kabiri n'urwa gatatu, gutegeka amazu y'uburiro ko abinjira muri yo bategerezwa kuba baricandagishije mu buryo bwuzuye, hamwe no gutandukana mu modoka zunguruza abantu. Vyongeye, ibirori vyose bijanye no guhimbaza umwaka mushasha vyarahagaritswe. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu avuga kandi ko reta igiye gutangaza ingingo nshasha mu mwaka uza ku bagihigimanga kwicandagisha, akavuga ko ari ibintu "bidashobora kwihanganirwa ko imiriyoni nkeya z'Abafaransa banka kwicandagisha bata ubuzima bw'igihugu cose mu kaga". Ejo ku wa gatandatu, umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu w'Ubufaransa Olivier Veran yavuze ko gushika kuri 10% vy'abanduye mu gihugu  banduye ubu bwoko bwa Omicron. Nk'uko ibiharuro bitangwa n'ikigo kijejwe kurwanya coronavirus muri ico gihugu kivyerekana, Ubufaransa bufise urugero rw'abandi bashasha bandura barenga 48.000 ku musi. Hagati aho, mu Buholande, abahinga mu vyo amagara y'abantu bavuga ko igihugu ari ngombwa ko gifata ingingo "ruhasha" za guma mu rugo, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Mark Rutte avuga ko Omicron ari bwo bwoko bushobora kuba bwiganje mu gihugu gushika mu kwa mbere, nk'uko bimeze mu Bufaransa. Kuva mu mpera z'ukwa cumi na rimwe, ububare, amazu y'uburiro hamwe kandi n'amaduka hafi yose vyategetswe kwugara gushika isaha cumi n'imwe z'umugoroba gushika isaha cumi n'imwe z'agatondo. Iyi ngingo yategerezwa gukurikizwa gushika imbere ya Noweli/Noheli, ariko ikazotegerezwa kubandanya gushika ku wa 14 z'ukwa mbere. Igisata c'ingenzi muri Irlande kivuga ko kibabajwe n'amategeko mashasha agiye gushirwa mu ngiro kuva ku wa mbere avuga ko ububare, amazu y'uburiro, amazu y'ibikino na za sinema, vyose bizotegerezwa kwugara isaha zine z'ijoro. Iyi ngingo iranegurwa na bamwe mu banyaporitike barongoye igihugu, bakavuga ko aya mabwirizwa mashasha ashobora gutuma haduka amakoraniro abera mu mihana y'abantu. Ibigo vyo kwinonora imitsi bitegerezwa kwakira 50%,  ibibuga navyo vyakire abatarenga 5000. Ibirori vy'ubugeni ntibizorenga isaha zitandatu z'ijoro - bikazotegerezwa kwitabirwa n'abatarenga 100.

headline: Wari uzi ko ushobora kwandurira coronavirus mu kazu ka surwumwe?
text: Abashakashatsi berekana ko, mu bakoresha twa tuzu twa surwumwe twa none, kurya gusunika amazi yo mu gikono umufuniko wuguruye bituma haba umwuka uja mu mpwemu duhema maze umuntu agashobora kwinjiza imigera nk'iya coronavirus  biciye mu guhema. Abahinga b'abashinwa bavuga ko kurya gusunika amazi gushobora gutuma umwuka urimwo amazimazi uvuye muri kirya gikono ushobora kuduga ukagera ku burebure bwo gushika ku mutwe canke no kurenga. Uwo mwuka ugizwe n'amazimazi ushobora kuguruka gushika hafi mu metero yose uja mu kirere nk'uko abahinga bo kuri kaminuza ya Yangzhou babisigura. Basaba ko mu gusunika amazi iyo umuntu ahejeje kwituma ari ukubanza gupfundikira kirya gikono. Coronavirus ikwirakwizwa n'imphwemu iyo umuntu akoroye canke yasamuye, canke agakora ku bikoresho vyasizweko imigera. Abantu basanzwe baranduye uwo mugera nabo nyene bashobora kugira iyo migera mu mazirantoke abavamwo, n'aho bitererekanwa neza nimba iyo nayo ishobora kuba inzira yo kwanduza abandi. Abahinga kw'isi yose bariko barapima neza amazi atwara imicafu kugira ngo bamenye nimba koko hari abantu boba baranduye coronavirus biciye kuri ayo mazi. Hari iyindi migera ishobora gukwirakwira bivuye kw'isuku rike ry'utuzu twa surwumwe. Rero ngo iyo amazi asunitswe avuye mu ngunguru ya karya kazu ka surwumwe, akubita kunkuta z'igikono, bigatuma haba uruvangatirane n'uwo mwuka uva mu gikono. Uwo mwuka ugizwe n'utubumbe duto cane rwose tw'amazi ku buryo dushobora kuguma mu kirere mu kiringo kirenga umunota wose, nk'uko Ji-Xiang Wang na bagenzi biwe bo kuri kaminuza ya Yangzhou mu Bushinwa babisigura. Ku ruhande rwiwe, Dr Bryan Bzdek wo mu kigo kijejwe ubushakashatsi ca Bristol kw'ishure kaminuza rya Bristol, avuga ko n'aho bitaboneka neza ko coronavirus ishobora gukwirakwira muri ubu buryo, birumvikana neza ko ari vyiza kuba magabo. Ati: "Abakoze ubwo bushakashatsi bavuga ko ari iyo umuntu ahejeje kwituma ari vyiza kwugara kirya gikono c'akazu ka surwumwe mu gihe co gusunika amazi, kugirira isuku imbuga za kirya gikono n'ahandi hose umuntu ashobora gukorakora, kandi agakaraba neza iyo avuye mu kazu ka surwumwe". Abona ko n'aho bitaboneka neza ko ivyo bishobora kugabanya ikwirakwira ry'imigera ya Covid-19 na SARS, ni vyiza ko izo ngingo zerekeranye n'isuku ry'akazu ka surwumwe zikurikizwa ngo kuko hari n'iyindi migera myinshi cane yandukira iciye mu mazirantoke.

headline: U﻿muyagankuba wacitse muri Ukraine na Moldavie kubera ibitero vya misile
text: Mu gisagara cose ca Lviv kiri mu burengero bwa Ukraine nta muyagankuba ukiharangwa inyuma yo kuvugwa ko habaye ibitero hirya no hino mu gihugu - harimwo n'umugwa mukuru Kyiv. I﻿gihugu kibanyi ca Moldavie na co nyene kivugwamwo ibura ry'umuyagankuba "hose", n'aho kitatewe co ubwaco. Umukuru w'igisagara ca L﻿viv yasavye abantu kwinyegeza, mu gihe uwurongoye akarere ka Kyiv kose  avuga ko inyubakwa za nkenerwa n'amazu yo kubamwo vyatewe. U﻿burusiya buherutse kwongereza ibitero vyabwo ku bibanza bitanga umuyagankuba muri Ukraine. Icegera c'umushikiranganji wa mbere Andrei Spinu akaba yanditse kuri Twitter ati:"I﻿gice kirenga ca Moldavie ntikigira amatara." Yagize ati:"Umwijima henshi muri Moldavie inyuma y'ibitero vy'uyu musi vy'Uburusiya ku bibanza bitanga umuyagankuba muri Ukraine." Imbere y'uko haba ibitero, inzamba zo kugabisha ibitero vyo mu kirere zavuze muri Ukraine hose, zica zikurikirwa n'inkuru zerekeye ibitero vyakozwe mu bibanza bimwe bimwe. U﻿mukuru w'igisagara ca Lviv, Andriy Sadovy, yavuze ko abana n'abigisha bajanywe mu kibanza co kwikingira - aca asaba abavyeyi kutaza kubatora imbere y'uko inzaba zo kugabisha ibitero zinuma. G﻿ato imbere yo kumenya ivyabaye i Kyiv na Lviv, abategetsi bavuze ko ubumanuko bwa Ukraine bwasubiye kandi guterwa. U﻿mukuru w'intara ya Mykolaiv yagabishije "ku rufaya rwa rokete" ruriko rurava mu bumanuko no mu buseruko. M﻿u karere kahegereye ka Zaporizhzhia, umwana w'uruyoya yishwe igihe misile yagwa ku bitaro vy'abana, nk'uko vyamenyeshejwe n'abajejwe ibikorwa vyo gutabara. I﻿bitero vyagirijwe Uburusiya ariko nta co buravuga ku bitero vyo kuri uyu wa gatatu. I﻿bura ry'amatara ritunganijwe canke ritari ku kirangamisi risigaye ari irisanzwe mu turere twinshi twa Ukraine inyuma y'ibi bitero vya vuba. U﻿turere twinshi twa Ukraine twatewe kuri uyu wa gatatu twegereye ibihugu bibanyi, harimwo Lviv kari ku birometero 50 uvuye muri Pologne, aho igisase gitegera misile zo mu kirere cahitanye abantu babiri mu ndwi iheze. I﻿bisagara vya Chervonohrad na Yavoriv na vyo vyegereye urubibe Ukraine ihana na Pologne, na ho nta matara aharangwa. I﻿bitero vy'Uburusiya vyarononye hafi igice c'ibibanza bitanga umuyagankuba muri Ukraine, abantu imiliyoni n'imiliyoni bakaba batagira umuyagankuba mu gihe ibipimo vy'ubushuhe bibandanya bimanuka muri iki gihe c'imbeho. Mu misi iheze, umukuru w'ishirahamwe ryigenga ritanga umuyagankuba muri Ukraine yavuze ko abantu bategerezwa kwitegurira kuva mu gihugu kugira bagabanye abakenye umuyagankuba mu gihugu.

headline: Ukraine: Korea ya Ruguru  irungikira Russia ibirwanisho mu mpisho - US
text: Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zasubiye kwagiriza Korea ya Ruguru ko irungikira Uburusiya ibirwanisho mu ntambara yabwo na Ukraine. Imboneshakure CNN isubiramwo amakuru y’igendereza rya Amerika yerekana ko Korea ya Ruguru ifasha Uburusiya mu ntambara yabwo muri Ukraine, mu kurungika vya muzinga itavuze aho bigiye. Aya makuru agiye gusohoka amezi abiri inyuma y’aho inzego zijejwe igendereza za Amerika zitanguriye kwerekana ko Uburusiya bushobora kuba bugurira amabombe na za misire muri Korea ya Ruguru, nk’uko aya makuru abivuga. John Kirby, umuvugizi w’inama nkuru y’igihugu ijejwe umutekano, yabwiye CNN ati: “Mu kw’icenda, Korea ya Ruguru yarahakanye ku mugaragaro ko ata mugambi ifise wo kurungikira amasasu Uburusiya. “Ariko aho nyene, igashaka kwerekana ko ivyo birwanisho birungitswe mu burasirazuba bwo hagati canke muri Afrika y’Uburaruko”. Abategetsi ntibarashobora guha CNN icemezo na kimwe c’ivyo bavuga, kandi n’inzego zijejwe igendereza ntizishira ahabona igitigiri c’ibirwanisho bimaze gutangwa canke ingene ibi bihugu vyarihanye mu masezerano yavyo. Hagati aho, abanyamerika babona ko ibi birwanisho bitangwa na Korea ya Ruguru, biri kumwe na za ndege zitagira abadereva (drones) ziva muri Irani, vyerekana ko inyuma y’amezi umunani y’intambara, ububiko bw’Uburusiya bw’ibirwanisho vyemewe gukoreshwa butanguye guhererwa, nk’uko abavyandika babivuga. Haraheze amayinga yababa abiri umukuru w’igendereza rya Amerika Euryl Haynes avuze ko “igenzurwa ry’ibidandazwa bishorwa hanze ririko rihatira Uburusiya guhindukirira ibihugu nka Irani na Korea ya Ruguru kugira buronke za drones, ibisasu vya muzinga hamwe n’ibisasu vya misire”. Ku ruhande rwiwe, Kirby yavuze ejo ku wa gatatu ko imfashanyo Irani na Korea ya Ruguru biha Uburusiya zidashobora guhindura inzira y’iyi ntambara. Gusa, ibi birwanisho burungikirwa bishobora kubufasha kubandanya intambara yo gukoresha vya muzinga ku rugamba. "Tuzobandanya dukurikiranira hagufi ingene ibi birwanisho bitangwa”, niko avuga, agashimangira ko Uburusiya buriko bugerageza kurondera gufatwa mu mugongo n’ibihugu nka Korea ya Ruguru na Irani mu ntumbero yo kubandanya intambara kuri Ukraine “mu gihe uburyo buriko bubuherana ibihano mpuzamakungu na vyo bikora akazi kavyo”. Imbere y’aha, ibinyamakuru vy’Uburengero vyatangaje ko Irani yariko irategura kurungikira Uburusiya ibindi birwanisho hafi 1.000, harimwo ibisasu vya misire biraswa ku ntera ngufi hamwe na drones zo gukora ibitero. Isubiramwo abategetsi bo mu Burengero, CNN ivuga iti: "Ubu buzoba bubaye ubwa mbere Irani irungikiye Uburusiya misire zidahusha, bigashobora guha akoyoko Kremlin ku rugamba”. Nk’uko abategetsi babivuga, mu birwanisho Irani iherutse kurungikira Uburusiya harimwo drones zababa 450 Uburusiya bumaze gukoresha mu bitero muri Ukraine.

headline: Ghana: Igiporisi cabujije ihishurwa ry'Umwaka Mushasha ritera ibibazo
text: Dickens Olewe BBC News Igiporisi muri Ghana cagabishije abarongoye ukwemera n’amashengero ko batokora ihishurwa basanzwe bakora ku Mwaka Mushasha kuko hari abo ritera ubwoba, abandi umwitwarariko, mbere abandi bagapfa. Uburenganzira bwo gusenga ntibutegerezwa kurengera uburenganzira bw’abandi, nk’uko igiporisi cavuze mw’itangazo. Abanegura iyo ngingo bavuga ko iteye kubiri n’uburenganzira butangwa n’ibwirizwa shingiro mu kwishira no kwizana ku bijanye no kwemera  ko rero iteye kubiri n’amategeko. Aba-Kristu baharurwa muri za miriyoni akenshi barakoranira mu masengero kugira bumve ivyo  abapasitori  babahishurira ku vyo beretswe ku bizobashikira mu mwaka mushasha. Hari abahishurirwa ivyiza bibarindiriye ariko hari n’abagabishwa ko barindiriwe n’ivyago. Iyo ngingo y’igiporisi yatanguye gusohoka mu mwaka uheze igihe abantu bari barengewe n’ukugabishwa kw’impfu n’akaga, nk’uko ikinyamakuru co kuri internet My Joy Online kivyandika. Mw’itangazo, igiporisi casavye amadini atandukanye”gafashanya” na co no “gukoresha uburyo bwemewe n’amategeko um gushurira ivyo beretswe”. Ariko umunyamategeko Sammy Sarko yavuze ko  iyo ngingo y’igiporisi “iteye kubiri n’amategeko.” Yanditse ati: “Ntikeneye no kubanza kwihwezwa na sentare ya mbere nkuru muri Ghana. Nta tegeko muri Ghana riha igiporisi ububasha bwo kugenzura ingene ivyahishuwe bimenyeshwa mu gihugu”. Yongeyeko ati : “Ubwisanzure bw’idini burenze ubwisanzure bwo gusenga muri sinagoga, isengero canke umusigiti. Bisigura ko abantu badategerezwa guca kubiri n’ivyo bemera kugira bisunge umuco canke reta kiretse buteye kubiri n’itegeko  iri canke irindi.” Igiporisi cavuze co cashinze itariki ya 27 Kigarama (12) nk’umunsi wo gutangura kwubahiriza ingingo zijanye no kumenyesha ivyahishuwe. Iryo tangazo ryavuze riti: “Uyu munsi ni uwo kutwibutsa twese, gukora ibikorwa bijanye n’ukwemera hatarenzwe akarimbi k’amategeko kugira hubahirizwe  ituze ridahungabanywa n’umwitwarariko uvuye ku mburi y’ibibi canke urupfu bigiye gushika”.

headline: Afghanistan: Uwahoze atwara igihugu Ashraf Ghani yasavye imbabazi z'uko yahuze
text: Uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu ca Afghanistan Ashraf Ghani yasavye imbabazi abanya-Afghanistan inyuma yo kuva mu gihugu akaja mu buhungiro muri Emirats Arabes Unis (United Arab Emirates). Yavuze ari : "Kuva muri Kabul niyo yabaye ngingo ya mbere  igoye cane mu buzima bwanje," aca yongerako ko asavye imbabazi kuko "ntabona ukundi ryari kurangira". Uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu Ghani yahunze Afghanistan ubutarariye igihe aba-Taliban bari basugereje umurwa mukuru Kabul ku wa 15 ukwezi kw'umunani. Avuga ko atifuza guheba abanyagihugu ariko ko "yari yo nzira yonyene". Mw'itangazo yashize no kuri  Twitter ku wa gatatu, Ghani yavuze ko ata kundi yari afise yari kugira atari ukuva mu gihugu kugira ntihabe intureka mu gihugu cose. "Nahavuye ndabisabwe n'bajejwe umutekano ku kirimba, bangiriye inama ko kugumaho vyotuma haba intambara yo mu mabarabara nk'uko vyagenze mu gisagara igihe c'intambara yo hagati mu gihugu mu myaka ya 1990", abandanya avuga ko yabikoze kugira "akize   Kabul n'abantu imiriyoni 6 bayibamwo". Yavuze ko yari amaze imyaka 20 yitanga kugira Afghanistan kibe igihugu kirangwa na "demokrasi, kiroraniwe kandi cigenga". Uyo yahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu yongeye guhakana "ibitagira aho bishingiye" bivugwa ko yahunganye amafaranga angana na miriyoni 169  z'ama dorari (hafi miriyaridi 338 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi). Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 72, yaneguwe cane n'abandi banyaporitike bo muri Afghanistan kubera guta igihugu, yavuze ko azosigura "ingene ibintu vyagenze gushika aho ata akagenda"  mu minsi mike iri imbere. Mw'ijambo ry'ikibiriraho kuri Facebook ku wa 18 ukwezi kw'umunani, Ghani yavuze ko "yahatiwe" kuva muri Afghanistan n'abamucungerera umutekano kuko "hari ivyago vyinshi ko nashobora gufatwa nkicwa". Yavuze ko igihe aba-Taliban binjira ku kirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu i Kabul, "batanguye kundondera icumba ku kindi". Ahakana ibivugwa ko yagiye atwaye amafaranga menshi mu guhunga igihugu, Ghani yavuze ko "atemerewe no gukura isandari ngo yambare ibirato". Muri iyi ndwi, aba-Taliban bamaze indwi zitatu bafashe  igihugu,  baratangaje abagize reta ata mugore n'umwe arimwo. Ku wa gatatu, abagore baharurwa mu mirongo muri Kabul no mu ntara ya Badakhshan yo mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Afghanistan baragize imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza iyo reta nshasha bavuga ko batazokwemera reta itagiramwo   abashikiranganji b'abagore.

headline: Ibibazo vyanyu kuri Covid-19: Kuki bakoze urucanco aho gukora umuti?
text: Jean Yves Habimana arabaza ati: Kubera iki abahinga mu bushakashatsi bahereye ku kurondera urucanco aho guhera ku kurondera umuti wa corona? Ingwara nka Sida, Malaria, Tuberculose zihitana abantu benshi, kubera iki batarazironderera umuti canke urucanco vyihuta? Umva aho hejuru inyushu za Dr Leonard Nduwayo, avugana na Prudent Nsengiyumva

headline: Perezida Nkurunziza w'u Burundi hari ivyo asaba amadini kwirinda, rimwe rivuga ko 'rizovuga ukuri'
text: Perezida Petero Nkurunziza w'Uburundi asaba abarongoye amadini ko bokwirinda kugwa mu mutego muri kino gihe u Burundi buriko bwitegurira amatora yo mu mwaka uza wa 2020. Amwe mu madini nka Ekleziya Katolika yoyo ivuga ko bigisha iyobokamana ariko ryerekeye n'ivyo abantu barimwo. Mw'ijambo ryiwe yashikirije yibuka imyaka ine amaze atowe n'abanyagihugu ubwabo ku ncuro ya kabiri, Bwana Nkurunziza avuga ko bokwirinda "kugwa mu mutego w'abahanuzi b'ibinyoma n'inyigisho zikomoka hanze" avuga ko zitajanye n'ivy'Imana. Bwana Nkurunziza avuga ati: "Si ivy'imbeshere, bamwe mu bakozi b'Imana baraguye, abandi barakomereka bongera bakomeretsa abayoboke babo; babera umuzimagiza abo bajejwe aho kubabera urumuri n'icitegererezo". Ntadoma urutoke kw'idini iri canke ririya, gusa Ekleziya Katolika ni yo ikunze kwagirizwa ko yivanga mu vya politike. Bavuga ko ibi ibikora cane cane mu gihe ishikiriza aho ihagaze ku biraba ubuzima bw'igihugu mu butumwa bukunda gusomwa mu masengero yose ya Katolika mu gihugu. Abasenyeri ba Katolika bobo bamenyesha ko ata nyigisho za politike batanga, ahubwo ko bigisha iyobokamana ariko ryerekeye n'ivyo abantu barimwo "kuko iyobokamana rirangukira mu buzima bw'abantu". Mu ndwi iheze, mu birori vy'uguhimbaza umunsi mukuru wa Assomption, Pascal Nyabenda arongoye inama nshingamateka, yasavye abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika kuguma hagati na hagati, ntiberekane aho bahagaze mu vya politike kuko ngo bitsitaza abakirisu. Mu kumwishura, Umuvugizi w'inama y'abepiskopi mu Burundi, Yohakimu Ntahondereye, yamenyesheje ko bazovuga ijambo ry'Imana uko riri ata gucisha iruhande, "n'aho hari aho rigera rikababaza".

headline: Coup d’Etat Burkina Faso: intwazangabo za gisirikare zabogoje perezida Damiba
text: Umukapiteni mu gisirikare ca Burkina Faso yatangaje  ku mboneshakure y’igihugu ko yabogoje indongozi y’igihugu, Liyetena-Koloneli (Lt Col ) Paul-Henri Damiba. Ibrahim Traore avuga ko yatembagaje intwaro ya  Lt Col Damiba kubera adashoboye kurwanya inyeshamba ziyitirira idini rya Islam. Atangaza kandi ko imbibe z’igihugu zugaye mu gihe kitazwi kandi ko ibikorwa vyose vya poritike bibaye birahagarikwa. Mu kwa mbere, akarwi k’abasirikare kari karongowe na Lt Col Damiba katembagaje reta yari yitorewe n’abanyagihugu, kavuga ko yananiwe no gutuza ibitero vy’izo nyeshamba. Ariko reta yiwe nayo nyene ntiyashoboye kurwanya imigumuko iterwa n’izi nyeshamba ziyitirira idini rya Islam. Ku wa mbere, abasirikare 11 barishwe igihe bari baherekeje imodoka za gisivire mu buraruko bw’igihugu. Mu gatondo k’ejo ku wa gatanu, Lt Col Damiba yasavye abanyagihugu kuguma batekanye inyuma y’aho humvikaniye inkoho zikomakomeye mu bice vy’umugwa mukuru. Abasirikare barenga 20  - benshi muri bo bambaye ibitambara bibapfuka mu maso – bagiye kuboneka ku mboneshakure imbere gato y’isaha zibiri z’ijoro mu masaha y’ico gihugu. Itangazo ryateweko igikumu na Traore  rivuga riti: "Mu gihe ibintu vyabadanya vyunyuka, twaragerageje incuro nyinshi kwumvisha  Damiba ko yotunganya gushasha intwaro yiwe ikitaho gusumba ikibazo c’umutekano. "Ibikorwa vya Damiba vyagiye bitwereka ko intumbero ziwe zari ziteye kubiri n’ivyo twumvikanye. Uno musi twafashe ingingo yo kubogoza Damiba”. Hatangajwe kandi amasaha ya guma mu rugo yo kuva isaha zitatu z’ijoro gushika isaha cumi n’imwe z’agatondo. Nta wuzi aho Lt Col Damiba aherereye. Amerika ivuga ko itewe amakenga cane n’ibibera muri Burkina Faso igasaba abayo kwirinda ingendo zo hagati mu gihugu. Umuvugizi w’umunyamabanga wa reta avuga ati: "Dusaba ko ituze rigaruka ababifisemwo uruhara nabo bakigumya”. Ishirahamwe ry’ubutunzi rihuza ibihugu vya Afrika y’uburengero CEDEAO/ECOWAS  ririyamiriza iri tembagazwa ry’ubutegetsi, rikavuga ko “rishimangiye ryivuye inyuma ko ridashigikiye na gato ugushikira canke ugushaka kugumana ubutegetsi mu nzira iteye kubiri n’ibwirizwashingiro”. Mu bucagucagu bw’ejo ku wa gatanu, amabombe n’amasasu vyarasiranye ku mugwa mukuru, Ouagadougou, bimwe biva hafi y’ikirimba c’umukuru w’igihugu no mu makambi makuru makuru. Imbere y’uko izuba riseruka, iki gisagara mu bisanzwe kiba cuzuye abantu casa n’icera, abasirikare bazibira  amabarabara, bacungereye n’ibibanza bikuru bikuru. Imboneshakure y’igihugu yarahagaritse ibiganiro vyayo, inkoho zikaba zabandanije zumvikana umusi wose. Lt Col Damiba yavuga ko hari “ibintu bidatomoye” bitewe “agashavu” kari mu basirikare bamwe bamwe, mu gihe ibihuha vy’itembagazwa ry’ubutegetsi vyaguma vyiyongera. Mu gihe yasaba abanyagihugu kuguma batekanye bakirinda gukokeza baciye ku mbuga hwaniro, uyu mutegetsi wa gisirikare yavuga ko “hari ibiganiro vyariko biraba mu ntumbero yo kugarukana ituze”. Mu kwa mbere, Lt Col Damiba yatembagaje Perezida Roch Kaboré, avuga ko yari yananiwe no kurwanya imigumuko y’inyeshamba ziyitirira Islam. Igihe ashikirizwa ubutegetsi mu kwa kabiri, akarwi k’abasirikare kasenyuye ubutegetsi kavuze kati: “Dufise ibikoresho vyose bisabwa kugira dutsinde iyi ntambara”. Ariko abanyagihugu ntibacizeye umutekano mbere muri ino ndwi habaye imyiyerekano mu turere dutandukanye tw’igihugu. Ku muhingamo w’ejo ku wa gatanu, bamwe mu bari mu myiyerekano barihaye amabarabara yo ku mugwa mukuru basaba ko Lt Col Damiba yirukanwa ku butegetsi. Imigumuko y’abiyitirira idini rya Islam yadutse mu 2015 muri Burkina Faso, ihitana ibihumbi n’ibihumbi bishwe abandi nabo baharurwa mu miriyoni zibiri bata izabo. Kuva iki gihugu cikukira mu 1960, iki gihugu kimaze kubamwo ama coups d’Etat umunani.

headline: Ubumwe bwa Afrika bushaka kwagura ibikorwa vya AMISOM
text: Ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Afrika, AU, rivuga yuko rigiye kwagura ibikorwa vya gisirikare muri Somalia, aho abasirikare baryo bamaze imyaka 14 barwanya abarwanyi ba ki Islam. AU yavuze yuko ubwo butumwa bushasha izobukorera hamwe n'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU. Iryo shirahamwe ryavuze yuko kwagura ubutumwa bwaryo bwa gisirikare muri Somalia, AMISOM, bizokenera abasirikare b'inyongera bo mu bindi bihugu vya Afrika. Uwo mugambi ariko utegerezwa kwemweza na ONU hamwe na leta ya Somalia, mu gihe yigezwe kwanka umugambi wa AU nk'uwo mbere. Ethiopia, igihugu gitanga ibihumbi vy'abasirikare muri AMISOM, ifise ibibazo bikomeye vy'umutekano w'imbere mu gihugu. Kenya, nayo isanzwe iterera abasirikare, kiretse kuba itarabana ryiza na Somalia kubera ikibazo c'imbibe, isanzwe inafise umugambi wo kugabanya abasirikare bayo muri AMISOM. Ibindi bihugu vy'akarere biterera ibihumbi vy'abasirikare muri AMISOM ni Uganda n'u Burundi.

headline: Tigray: Urwikekwe no kwitanga mu gihe intambara iriko irakwiragira hose muri Ethiopia
text: Hageze mw'ijoro, mu micungararo y'umugwa mukuru wa Ethiopia, Addis Ababa, abasivile barenga mirongo ibiri bariko barakizura mu mabarabara yaho mw'ijoro rimwe mu ndwi iheze, bahagarika bongera basaka imodoka n'indangamuntu. Umugabo umwe ashaje bisa n'uko ari we arongoye ico gikorwa c'isaka yagize ati:"Abari muri kino gikorwa aha mu micungararo barashika 180. Turamaze gufata abantu benshi. Turamaze no gutora ibikoresha vyinsi biteye amakenga, harimwo inkoho n'ibintu biturika." Abo bakorerabushake barondera abagwanyi b'aba Tigray n'ababashigikiye, hisunzwe itegeko nk'iryo ibihe vy'intambara ryashizweho na reta ya Ethiopia mu ntumbero yo guhangana n'ibitero vya gisirikare vy'aba Tigray. Abatavuga rumwe na reta bavuga ko abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bapfunzwe ata co bazira, ariko ko uruhigi rusa n'ugwakwiragiye mu gisagara hose. Uwundi mugabo avugira kuri telefone ngendanwa, twagiye twumva avuga:"Nimunyaruke, ariko aragerageza kudutoroka." Ku yandi mabarabara hirya, uwundi mugwi ugizwe ahanini n'abitanga ku bushake bakuze, bari biyegeranirije hamwe mu myimenyerezo, batambukira hamwe ari na ko bumviriza amategeko. Hose mu gisagara bisa n'uko hatekanye. N'aho Ubwongereza hamwe n'ibindi bihugu bagabishije umutekano ugenda "ugabanuka cane", mu gihe abagwanyi b'aba Tigray n'iyindi migwi bavuga ko bariko baregereza Addis, ubuserukizi bw'Uburusiya butanga ubutumwa butandukanye n'ubwo ku mbuga hwaniro. Bwavuze ko "itegeko nk'iryo igihugu kiri mu ntambara ata kintu kinini ryahinduye ku buzima bwa misi yose ku mugwa mukuru wa Ethiopia." Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia, Abiy Ahmed, aherutse kumenyesha ko agiye ku rubuga rw'intambara kurongora ingabo ku rugamba. Vedeo yashizwe ahabona na reta iramwerekana mu mpuzu za gisirikare akikijwe n'abasirikare, ari aahasa n'akarere ko mu bugaragwa ka Afar mu buraruko bw'umugwa mukuru Addis Ababa. Muri iyo video umushikiranganji wa mbere agira ati:"Ubu twashoboye kwigarurira aka karere kose." Abandanya avuga ati:"Ingabo z'igihugu zifise ishaka ridasanzwe. Tuzobandanya gushika Ethiopia ironse ukwishira n'ukwizana." Umushikiranganji wa mbere yavuze ko ingabo ziwe ziri mu gikorwa co kwigarurira ibisagara vyinshi vyigaruriwe n'umuhari Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF). Ariko ivyo bivugwa biragoye guhinyuza mu gushika canke guhanahana inkuru ku turere tuberamwo iyo ntambara bigoye, no mu gihe hari itegeko rishasha ribuza kuvuga inkuru yerekeye aho igisirikare giteye canke "ibiriko birabera ku rubuga rw'intambara" reta itabitangiye uruhusha. Abategetsi ba TPLF - baherutse kwerekana amasanamu y'indege itagira umudereva y'ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'impfungwa z'intambara za Ethiopia - bavuga ko babandanya gutera intambwe mu duce dutandukanye, inguvu nyinshi zikaba zashizwe ku gisagara ca Debre Birhan, kibonwa nk'ikibanza Ethiopia yiteguriye kugwanira kiri inyuma y'umugwa mukuru. Ariko bamwe mu baraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko ingabo za Tigray zishobora kurengerwa no kugabanuka inguvu mu gihe zogirwako mibitero n'igihe hoba ibitero vy'igihugu ibanyi ca Erythrea. Utaravye uruhande ruriko ruratahukana intsinzi, biragaragara ko iyi ntambara iriko ikwiragira hose, ari na ko izana akaga ku banye Ethiopia. Ishami rya Onu ritanga imfashanyo kw'si (WFP/PAM) ubu rigereranya ko abantu imiliyoni 9.4 bakeneye imfashanyo vyihuta. Umutegetsi wa PAM ari Addis Ababa, Claire Neville yavuze ati:"Mu gihe intambara ariko irakwiragira hose mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia, tuguma tubona abantu benshi bagenda bongerekana baja mu buzima bubi cane." Avuga ko "ibintu bitandukanye"ari vyo bituma badashikira abamerewe nabi, harimwo ibitero vy'abagwanyi b'aba Tigray, umutekano muke hamwe n'impusha z'abategetsi ba Ethiopia ziteba gutangwa.
