Ariko PAM iherutse gushobora gushikira ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abantu bo mu bisagara bibiri vyo muri Amhara vyigaruriwe n'abagwanyi b'aba Tigray. I Addis, umugambwe uri ku butegetsi wa Prosperity Party ubandanya gutunganya ibirori vyo gshimira abariko baritaba urugamba ku bushake bwabo. Etisa Deme, umwe mu bagize akanama karongoye igisagara avuga ati:"Turi mu ntambara n'ibihemu vyo hagati mu gihugu n'abanyamahanga babasgikikiye." Babush Sitotaw, umusore w'imyaka 22 yagize ati:"Naratewe akamo ko kuja kugwanira agateka k'igihugu canje. Urashobora kurira mu gihe umuryango wawe wishwe, ariko uja he mu gihe utakaje igihugu cawe? Ni co gituma nitegye gutanga ubuzima bwanje. Nta bwoba mfise ko gushika ubu ata myimenyerezo turaronka." Umupfasoni w'imishatsi isa n'uruvuzo, Dinkinesh Nigatu, nawe yaje imbee aca ereka isinzi ry'abantu. Yavuze ati:"Ndakunda igihugu canje. Nashaka kuja ku rugamba ariko yaba umuhungu wanje n'umugabo wanje bose bansavye kuguma muhira na bo bagende kungwanira." Yabwiye BBC ati:"Naragize imyimeyerezo nk'umukorerabushake ubu ndakizura mu mabarabara mu gihe abahungu banje n'umugabo wanje bari ku musitari w'imbere muri iyo ntambara. Ahantu hose mbonye abantu mw'ibarabara, ndabahimiriza kuja kugwana. Ntidushobora kurindira gushika umwansi adusange kutwicira ngaha twese." Umutegetsi wo mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi Prosperity Party, Ayda Awol, yashize ku bitugu vya Dinkinesh Nigatu ukuboko, yagize ati:""Ni rurangiranwa. Itara rituboneshereza twese." Ayda Awol yabandanije avuga ati:"Twiteze urwaruka rwinshi rukurikiza aka karorero. Ethiopia iri hamwe k buryo butari bwigere buboneka. Abarenga ibihumbi indwi (bava mu karere ka Arada ku mugwa mukuru) baramaze kwitaba akamo ku gushaka ko kuja kugwanira igihugu." Reta ya Ethiopia yaridogeye isekeza ry'ibihugu vya Buraya n'ibimenyeshamakaru ryo kuvuga ukutariko n'ibigirankana intandaro y'iyo ntambara. Ku mbuga hwaniro, abaye Ethiopia bariyamiriza ukugerageza kw'abakoloni kuvuga nabi gihugu cabo no kurenza rugero mu kuvuga intsinzi TPLF imaze kugira ku rugamba. Umusesenguzi muri politike ya Ethiopia, Achamyeleh Ewunetu, avuga ko nawe atavuga rumwe na reta ya Ethiopia, ariko aharanira ubwigenge bw'igihugu ciwe yavuze ati:"Turi mu ntambara ku mpande zibiri. ububeshi bw'ubukoloni bushasha n'inkuru zitari zo zitangwa n'ibinyamakuru vy'i Buraa, harimwo BBC, hamwe n'intambara ya genocide yatangajwe na TPLF." Reta ya Ethiopia yagumye yanka incuro nyinshi guha BBC ijambo. Ariko reta yaranebagwe cane kubera ugucinyiza itangazamakuru ryo hagati mu gihugu na mpuzamakungu mu gukoresha amajambo akarishe no mu kubabuza gushikira inkuru. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed yashimagijwe cane imbere y'uko haduka iyo ntambara kubera kurekura imfungwa za politike n'abamenyeshamakuru, aherutse kwagirizwa kugarukana icuka c'iterabwoba ku bamenyeshamakuru. Muri ico gihe nyene, BBC yemeza ko ibandanya gutanga inkuru ata ho mu bwigenge, nyazo kandi ata ho zegamiye zo mu karere no kw'isi yose.

headline: FBI yatanguye kunyegurura inzandiko z'ibitero vyo ku wa 11/9 vyagiriza Saudi Arabia
text: Ikigo kijejwe igendereza FBI cashize ahabona urwandiko rwerekana ko hari abanya Arabia Saoudite bari bafitaniye imigenderanire kandi bavuganye na babiri mu bakoze ibitero vyo ku wa 11 z'ukwa cenda 2001 muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Ababuriye muri ibi bitero bamye basaba kuva kera ko izi nzandiko zishirwa ahabona, zikaba zerekana ko hari abategetsi ba Arabia Saoudite bari bazi ivy'ibi bitero imbere y'igihe ariko bakaba ataco bakoze kugira ngo babihagarike. Ariko uru rwandiko ntirushira ahabona ikintu na kimwe cerekana ko reta ya Arabia Saoudite ifise uruhara mu nteguro ry'ibi bitero vyo ku wa 11/9. 15 muri 19 banyuruje indege zakoreshejwe muri birya bitero bari abanya Arabia Saoudite. Imbere yo gushira ahabona aya makuru, ibiro vy'ubuserukizi bwa Arabia Saoudite muri Amerika bwakirije yompi iyi ngingo, bwongera busubira kwamirira kure amakuru avuga ko reta y'iki gihugu yari izi ibijanye n'aba banyuruje indege, bikavuga ko aya makuru ari "ibinyoma bifise intumbero mbi". Uru rwandiko rwashizwe ahabona ejo ku wa gatandatu, umusi Amerika yari mu birori vyo kwibuka imyaka 20 ihaciye ibi bitero bibaye ku butaka bwa Amerika - aho abababa 3000 bapfuye mu bitero vyakozwe hifashishijwe indege zine zafashwe mpiri - rukaba ari urwa mbere mu zindi zitezwe gushirwa ahabona. Imiryango imwe y'ababuriye muri ibi bitero yabandanije itera igitsure Perezida Joe Biden imusaba gushira ahabona izi nzandiko, ikavuga ko atari akwiye kwitaba ibi birori vy''ejo ku wa gatandatu i New York mu gihe yoba adashatse kuzishira ahabona. Uru rwandiko rw'impapuro 16 rwa FBI ruracasubirwamwo bikomeye. Rushingiye ku biganiro yagiranye n'umuntu atavuzwe umwidondoro, rwerekana ibiganiro abanya Arabia Saoudite batari bake bagiranye na babiri mu banyuruje izi ndege, Nawaf al-Hazmi na Khalid al-Midhar. Aba bantu babiri bigize abanyeshure kugira binjire muri Amerika mu 2000. Urwandiko rwa FBI ruvuga ko bahawe ubufasha bukomeye na Omar al-Bayoumi, ivyabona bavuga ko yakunda kuja  ku biro vy'ubuserukizi bwa Arabia Saoudite i Los Angeles n'aho ico gihe yari azwi nk'umunyehure. Uyu muntu yabwiye FBI ko Bayoumi "yari afise ikibanza gikomeye cane" kuri ivyo biro. Uru rwandiko ruvuga ruti: "Mu vyo Bayoumi yafashijemwo Hamzi na Midha harimwo ubukarimani (traduction/translation), ukwiyunguruza, uburaro n'amafaranga". Uru rwandiko rwa FBI ruvuga kandi ko hari isano hagati y'aba bagabo babiri banyuruje indege na Fahad al-Thumairy, umu imam agendera ku vyiyumviro vya kera ku musigiti wa King Fahad uri i Los Angeles. Afatwa nk'umuntu "agendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze". Bayoumi na Thumairy bompi bavuye muri Amerika hasigaye indwi nke ngo ibi bitero bibe, nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AP. Iri tororokanirizo ry'amakuru risubiramwo kandi amajambo ya Jim Kreindler,  umwe mu baburanira imiryango yaburiye muri ivyo bitero, aho avuga ko uru rwandiko rwashizwe ahabona ruje "rwemeza ivyo twamye tuvuga muri uru rubanza ku bijanye n'uruhara rwa reta ya Arabia Saoudite mu bitero vyo ku wa 11/9". Mu kwezi guheze, urubanza rwashinzwe n'imiryango yaburiye muri ibi bitero rwatumye abahoze ari abategetsi ba Arabia Saoudite barengutswa kwisigura. Ubutegetsi bwa George W Bush, Barack Obama na Donald Trump bwose bwaranse gushira ahabona izi nzandiko, ku mvo bavuga ko ari iz'umutekano w'igihugu. Ariko mu ndwi iheze, Joe Biden  yategetse ko inzandiko zijanye n'amatohoza kuri ibi bitero zihwezwa gushasha, aho yabwiye abategetsi b'uru rwego rujejwe igendereza gushira ahabona ivyo bashoboye kwerekana mu mezi atandatu ari imbere. Kuva kera hamye havugwa uruhara Arabia Saoudite ifise muri ibi bitero, bivanye n'igitigiri c'abanya Arabia Saoudite bari muri vyo hamwe n'uko umukuru wa al-Qaeda Osama Bin Laden yari afise amamuko muri ico gihugu. Ariko, umurwi washizweho kugira ngo wihweze ivy'ico gitero wasanze ata kintu na kimwe cerekana ko reta ya Arabia Saoudite canke abategetsi bakuru b'ico gihugu boba barabigizemwo uruhara. Amerika na Arabia Saoudite bifitaniye ubucuti bumaze imyaka myinshi cane, n'aho hari ibihe bwagiye butosekara. Donald Trump yaratsimbataje ubu bucuti ariko Joe Biden aherutse kuvuga ko Arabia Saoudite "yaciwe" kubera uruhara yagize mu bwicanyi bw'agahomerabunwa bwakorewe umumenyeshamakuru w'iki gihugu Jamal Khashoggi muri Turukiya. Umunyamakuru wa BBC, Frank Gardner, avuga ko kuva ico gihe Perezida Biden yahavuye yorosha imvugo ku mutegetsi w'ikirenga w'ico gihugu, igikomangoma Mohammed bin Salman, icerekana ko atari ikintu coroshe kwikurako iki gihugu.

headline: Patrice Motsepe kuva kuri uyu wa gatanu niwe aramutswa Caf
text: Patrice Motsepe wo muri Afrika y'Epfo kuva uwu munsi niwe aramutswa Caf, urwego rujejwe umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika inyuma yo gutorwa atagira uwo bahiganwa. Inzira yo gushikira ico kibanza ntiyagoye uwo mugabo w'imyaka 59 mu gihe ku ndwi iheze abo bari guhiganwa basokoye, uwundi nawe yari kuba umukeba - Ahmad wo muri Madagascar - akagira intambamyi zo guhiganwa. Ashikiriza ijambo abakuru b'amashirahamwe y'umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika ahabereye amatora,  ku murwa mukuru wa Maroc Rabat, Motsepe yavuze ingene ubumwe bushobora kuba imburi y'ikiringo  c'ibihe bishasha mu mupira w'amaguru. Motsepe yavuze ati: "N'iteka rikomeye cane kuri jewe [kuba umukuru wa Caf]. Aza  ubugira icenda mu bantu bakize cane muri Afrika, ku bwa Forbes. ''Reka nshimire umuvukanyi [Umukuru wa FIFA] Gianni [Infantino] ku cerekezo no gutera intege ubumwe. Tuzohangana n'ibibazo vya Afrika kandi tuzobishobora, ariko ivyo tuzobishikako ari uko twunze ubumwe." Mu nyuma Motsepe yahindukiriye abagize abakuru b'amashirahamwe y'umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika n'inama nshingwabikorwa mu gihe yerekeza  kuri kazoza keza  gusumba. ''Uburongozi dufise muri Afrika (hamwe)  n'uburongozi dufise mu mupira w'amaguru muri buri gihugu  bimpa  kurema no kumpa urufatiro. "Ndaremye cane ko dukoreye  hamwe, koko tuzoshobora ivyo twiyemeje mu gutuma umupira w'amaguru udashika kw'isonga gusa ariko ube mu ya mbere myiza kw'isi." Motsepe, asanzwe afise  umugwi Mamelodi Sundowns watsindiye igikombe ca Afrika c'imigwi co mu 2016 , yari amaze gushikiriza icifuzo ciwe co kubona umugwi wo muri Afrika utsindiye igikombe c'isi. Muri iyo nama ya bose, abayigize 52 - uretse Chad, ishirahamwe ryayo ryafuswe na reta ku wa kane, na Eritrea arivyo bihugu bibiri bititavye - batoye kwongereza ibibanza vy'ivyegera vy'umukuru wa Caf kuva kuri batatu bakaba batanu.

headline: Commonwealth ituma turaba imbere - Kagame
text: Inama y'abakuru b'ibihugu bihurikiye mw'ishirahamwe ry'abakoresha ururimi rw'icongereza, Commonwealth, yatanguye icese i Kigali ku mugwa mukuru w'Urwanda. Prezida Paul Kagame agiye kurongora uwo mugwi w'ibihugu 54 - birimwo ica gatatu c'abantu bose baba kw'isi, yavuze ko indangagaciro ari zo ziranga abagize iryo shirahamwe. Ivyo birimwo intwaro ibereye, kwubahiriza amategeko n'agateka ka zina muntu. Kwakira iyo nama vyatumye haba abanebagura reta yiwe ku vyo imaze gushikako ku gateka ka zina muntu. Yabwiye ishengero ryitavye iyo nama ati: "Igihe cose tuzonanirwa, tuzotora inyishu biciye mu mwumvikano n'ibiganiro. N'ugushigikirana hagati yacu no gutera intambwe imbere turi kumwe". Yavuze ko igihugu ciwe kimaze kugira urugendo rurerure kuva habaye jenoside mu 1994, aho abantu barenga 800.000 bishwe. Yongeyeko  ati: "Ariko uyu musi turi abantu bahindutse ku mutima, ku mushaha no ku mubiri." Igice kinini c'abagize ishirahamwe Commonwealth kigizwe n'ibihugu vyahoze bikoronijwe n'Ubwongereza, ariko hagiye hiyongeramwo ibindi harimwo n'Urwanda. Prezida Kagame yavuze ko kuja muri iryo shirahamwe vyari bifise intumbero y'uko "abanyagihugu bacu baja hamwe, biyumvanamwo hanyuma bakaraba imbere muri kazoza". Gabon - igihugu cahoze gikoronijwe n'Ubufaransa - citeze kwemererwa kwinjira muri iryo shirahamwe muri iyi nama.

headline: Britney Spears yagiriza nyina "gutabagaza ubuzima bwiwe"mu kubushira mu minwe y'uwundi muntu
text: Britney Spears avuga ko nyina ariwe yatumye ubuzima bw'uwo muririmvyi buja mu minwe y'uwundi muntu mu kiringo c'imyaka 13. Jamie, se w'ico camamare, niwe yamaze iyo myaka yose ariwe ajejwe mu mategeko ibijanye n'ubuzima bw'umukobwa wiwe, bisigura ko ico gihe cose yari afise ijambo rito  cane ku biraba ubuzima bwiwe bwite n'amafaranga yiwe. Ariko ku vyo yanditse ku mbuga hwaniro, uwo muririmvyi avuga ko ico ciyumviro cazanywe na nyina wiwe, Lynne. Ati: "Ico abantu batazi `n'uko mama ariwe yamuhaye ico ciyumviro. Iyo myaka sinzokwigera nsubira kuyironka ... yaratabagaje ubuzima bwanje mu mpisho." Muri ivyo yari yanditse kuri Instagram ariko ubu vyafuswe, abandanya ati: "Urazi neza ivyo wakoze. Data nta bwenge afise bwo gupfa yariyumviriye ibintu nk'ivyo vyo gushira ubuzima bwanje mu minwe y'uwundi muntu, ariko muri iri joro, ndaja kumwenyura kuko nzi ko nimirije ubuzima bushasha." Ivyo Spears yanditse bisa n'uko vyoba vyatewe n'uko se yasavye ko hahagarara "ubwo nyene" kandi "ata gisabwe" ivy'uko ariwe abazwa ivy'ubuzima bwiwe. Uko vyari bitunganijwe  kwari nk'uguhabwa uwukujejwe mu mategeko ku bisanzwe bikorerwa abantu badashoboye kwifatira ingingo, nk'ababa bafise indwara zo mu mutwe. Mu nyandiko zo muri sentare BBC yaronse, abashingwamanza biwe bavuze bati:  "Jamie arakunda  kandi arashigikira umukobwa wiwe ata gisabwe. Nta kindi." "Icabaye n'uko mu myaka 13 iheze, ugushira ubuzima bwiwe mu minwe y'uwundi muntu vyari bikenewe kugira Britney akingirwe  mu nsiguro zose iryo jambo rishobora kugira. Ubuzima bwiwe bwari  mu rudubi kandi yari yugarijwe n'ibibazo bikomeye ku mubiri, mu mutwe, mu kibabarwe no mu mafaranga". "Hamaze kujaho uwubazwa ubuzima bwiwe, Britney yarashoboye kugaruka mu nzira yo kugira amaragamo muri ivyo bisata vyose vy'ubuzima. Ico gikorwa cagenze neza cane, ubu rero hakaba hageze ko Britney asubira gufata ubuzima bwiwe mu minwe." Abunganizi ba Spears bavuga ko ivyo yabisavye atawe abanje kubimenyesha kandi ko azotanga inyandiko zose zijanye n'ivyo yahora akora vyo  kubazwa ubuzima bw'umukobwa wiwe, avuga ko ata "na kimwe" afise "co kunyegeza". Mu vyo yanditse kuri Instagram ku wa kabiri, Britney yanadomye urutoke ku wahora atunganya imirimo yiwe Lou Taylor avuga ko yagize uruhara mu vyo gushira ubuzima bwiwe mu minwe  y'uwundi muntu. Yaba we yaba na Lynne Spears nta n'umwe aragira ico abivuzeko. Ubuzima bwa Britney Spears  bwabazwa se wiwe kuva mu 2008 igihe ibibazo vy'amagara yiwe yo mu mutwe vyatuma se asaba sentare ububasha bw'amategeko bwo kugenzura ubuzima bw'umukobwa wiwe. Inyuma y'imyaka y'agacerre , uwo muririmyi amaherezo  yahavuye ashira ku mugaragaro ico avyibazako mu majambo akomeye cane yavuze mu minota 23 imbere ya sentare y'i Los Angeles mu kwezi kwa gatandatu. Uwo mukobwa w'imyaka 39 yavuze ko  ubwo buzima bwo kugenzurwa bwabaye "ihohotera" kuko ngo yahawe ibiyayuramutwe, akanahatirwa  kuririmba atabishaka kandi akankirwa kuvyara abana. Yabwiye umucamanza Brenda Penny kuri terefone ati : "Ubu nshaka gusubizwa ubuzima bwanje". Se wiwe mu kwezi kw'icenda niho yashikiriza inyandiko zisaba ko ivy'uko abazwa  ubuzima bw'umukobwa wiwe bihagarara, ariko ntiyavuze umwanya  vyofata kugira ivyo bikorwe intambwe ku yundi. Uko kwezi,  umucamanza Penny yaciye aba aramuhagaritse vy'igihe  mu kuba ariwe abazwa ubutunzi bwa Britney (nta bintu vyiwe yabazwa kuva mu 2019). Intahe ikurikira muri urwo rubanza itegekanijwe kuba ku wa 12 uku kwezi kwa 11. Ariko n'aho uwo muririmvyi w'icamamare yokurwako ivy'uko ubuzima bwiwe bubazwa uwundi muntu, ibibazo vyiwe n'ubucamanza bishobora kutazoba birangiye. Umushingwamanza wiwe  Mathew Rosengart yagirije se wiwe  ko yitwaye nabi ku bijanye n'amafaranga kandi ko "yononye miriyoni z'ama dorari z'ubutunzi bw'umukobwa wiwe." Mu kwezi kw'icenda yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko afise "ibibazo bikomeye" ku "bishobora kuba vyarabaye ukwitwara nabi , hamwe n'ibikorwa vy'inyungu zidashbora kubangabanganwa, gukoresha nabi ububasha bwo kubazwa ubuzima bw'uwundi hamwe no kwonona bigaragara ubutunzi bwa Britney Spears" aca arahira ko " azokwihweza gushika mu mizi" inyandiko zose zijanye n'ico kibazo. Mu nyandiko yashikirije sentare muri iyi ndwi,  Rosengart yagirije kandi se wa Britney kugerageza kwirengagiza kwishura ibibazo ku bivugwa ko uwo muririmvyi yacungwa gushika no mu nzu iwe imbere mu buryo bwo kumufata amajwi canke kumwumviriza. Uwo mushingwamanza asaba ivyoba vyarafashwe vyose n'ibikoresho vyakoreshejwe. Jamie Spears  arahakana ivyo yagirizwa vyose, akavuga ko yamye akora mu nyungu z'umukobwa wiwe. Ivyo we nyene yashikirije sentare  vyerekana ko azotanga inyandiko zose zijanye n'ico kobazo.

headline: Iran: Televiziyo ya leta itangaza ko indege ya Ukraine yarashwe “ata gushaka”
text: Igisirikare ca Irani kivuga ko carashe "kitabishaka"  ya ndege ya Ukraine yari itwaye ingenzi 176, nk'uko bivugwa na televiziyo ya leta ya Irani. Iryo tangazo rivuga ko "habaye ukwihenda" inyuma y'aho iyo ndege yariko igendera hejuru y'ikibanza gikomeye cane hafi y'ikigo c'ingabo zijejwe gukingira ubutegetsi bwa ki Islamu. Irani yari yahakanye ivyavugwa ko imwe muri misire zayo ariyo yakoroye iyo ndege hafi y'umugwa mukuru, Tehran, ku wa gatatu. Ariko, amakuru yava mw'igendereza rya Amerika na Canada yaguma yerekana ko Irani ariyo yarashe iyo ndege, kumbure ku kwihenda. Iyo ndege y'ikompanyi ya Ukraine yakorotse haciye amasaha makeya  Irani iteye ibisasu vya misire ku birindiro bibiri vy'ingabo za Amerika muri Iraq, ingenzi 176 barimwo nta n'umwe yarokotse. Irani yateye ivyo bisasu mu guhora umutegetsi mukuru mu gisirikare ca Irani Qasem Soleimani  yari yishwe na drone y'abanyamerika ku wa 03 z'ukwa mbere. Ibinyamakuru vya Amerika vyatangaje ko Irani yoba yarashe iyo ndege yihenze mu gihe yariko yitegura ko Amerika ishobora kwishura ivyo bitero. Abicishije kuri Twitter uno munsi ku wa gatandatu, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Irani, Mohammad Javad Zarif, yavuze ko "akigenzo ka Amerika" kari mu vyatumye iyo ndege iraswa. Mu gihe ivyemezo vy'uko iyo ndege yashobora kuba yarashwe na misire vyariko birigaragaza, Irani yemeye ko amatohoza akwiye azokorwa. Ariko ku wa kane, amasanamu yerekanywe kuri televiziyo ava aho iryo sanganya ryabereye, yerekanye ingene umwe mu bariko bagerageza kurondera ivyatumye iryo sanganya riba anyegeza bimwe mu bisigarira, bica bituma haba amakenga ko bimwe mu vyemezo bishobora kuba vyaranyegejwe. Ejo ku wa gatanu, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Canada Francois-Philippe Champagne yagabishije Irani ko "amakungu yariko arayihweza", ayigabisha ko imiryango y'ababuze ababo "ikeneye kumenya ukuri". Imbere y'aho, umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Canada, Justin Trudeau, yamenyesheje ko yari yaronse amakuru y'ukwizera yemeza ko iyo ndege ishobora kuba yarashwe n'igisasu ca misire ca Irani. Ireresi yashikiriye mu minwe y'ikinyamakuru New York Times isa n'iyerekana igisasu ca misire caturitse gisetse iyo ndege, ica ifatwa n'umuriro n'aho yabandanije igenda. Iryo tangazo rimenyesha ko abarashe iyo ndege bategerezwa gukurikiranwa.

headline: Tanzania: Basaba ko Diamond Platnumz akurwa mw'ihiganwa rya BET kubera avugira Magufuli
text: Abantu barenga 18.000 muri Tanzania bateye igikumu ku rwandiko (petition) rusaba ko wa muririmvyi rurangiranwa Diamond Platnumz akurwa ku rutonde rw'ihiganwa rya Amerika, bamwagiriza ko "yakingira ikibaba" uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu. Diamond, umwe mu baririmvyi rurangiranwa muri Afrika, ari ku rutonde rw'abahiganirwa agashimwe gahabwa abanyatugenegene bakomeye kw'isi kiswe Best International Act, gatangwa n'imboneshakure BET (Black Entertainment Television). Ariko abateguye uru rwandiko bagereranya uyu muririmvyi mu buryo butabereye n'abaherutse gutahukana ihiganwa rya BET bo muri Nigeria Davido na Burna Boy, abaririmvyi bazwi cane muri ico gihugu. Ku bw'aba bateguye uru rwandiko, aba baririmvyi babiri "bakoresha inguvu zabo bafise n'ubuhangange bwabo mu gutera amashurwe akarenganyo" muri ca gihe c'imyiyerekano yitiriwe #EndSARS mu mwaka uheze yari ifise intumbero yo gusaba ko reta ifuta ca gipolisi citswe SARS. Ikinyamakuru NairobiNews co muri Kenya, candika ko Diamond Platnumz yari ashigikiye cane uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu ca Tanzania, John Pombe Magufuli, kandi ko umwe mu miziki yiwe wakoreshejwe n'umugambwe CCM uri ku butegetsi mu gihe c'imyiyamamazo y'umwaka uheze. Gisubiramwo ivyanditse muri uru rwandiko, iki kinyamakuru candika kiti: "Diamond Platnumz ni umuririmvyi rurangiranwa wa Tanzania azwi cane kw'isi yakoresheje ukumenyekana kwiwe n'ubuhinga bwiwe mu kuvugira no gukingira ikibaba itoteza ribi cane ry'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu yatwaza umukazo John Magufuli n'ubutegetsi bwiwe". "Diamond kandi ni incuti pfa mpfe kandi akorana urudandaza na Paul Makonda yahoze ari umukuru w'igisagara ca Dar-es-Salaam yatoteje ku mugaragaro kandi akanahiga buhongo abahuza ibitsina babisangiye (LGBTI)". Magufuli, yasandavye mu kwa gatatu haciye imisi mike ashikirijwe amabanga yo kurongora Tanzania mu kiringo kigira kabiri, yaragirijwe ko yahonyanga uburenganzira bwo gushikiriza ivyiyumviro no gutoteza abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bwiwe. Iki kinyamakuru  gikorera ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi candika ko n'abo bimeze uko, hari n'imiburiburi umushingamateka umwe - Nusrat Hanje - yamuguye inyuma aramuvugira, ati "turamusengera kugira ngo atahukane aka gashimwe".

headline: Ingene ibintu bimeze muri Ukraine: Ubuzima i Mariupol buri mu minwe ya Putin – umukuru w’igisagara
text: Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters, umukuru w'igisagara ca Mariupol Vadym Boychenko yavuze ko ubuzima bw'abanyagihugu bazibiriwe muri ico gisagara kigeze ahatemba buri mu minwe ya Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya. Boychenko yerekanye akababaro kiwe ku bikorwa vyo guhungisha abantu i Mariupol kuva intambara itanguye. Avuga ko Uburusiya "bwaburijemwo iri hungisha", bari batanguye "mu misi ya mbere y'ukwezi kwa Ntwarante (3)". "Badusavye ko tubaha ikarata y'aho iri hungisha rizotangurira - twarabahaye ikarata. "Baratubajije igitigiri c'amamodoka dufise, turabaha igitigiri c'amamodoka. "Ariko barononye bongera barasambura ivyo bibanza vyose, barasambuye n'amamodoka yacu". Boychenko avuga ko hakiri abantu 100.000 bakizibiriwe muri ico gisagara mu gihe abasirikare bari mu ruganda rw'ivyuma rwa Azovstal batariko barishikana. Yongerako ati: "Ni ngombwa gutahura ko hari abagifise ubuzima bakiriyo, kandi buri mu minwe y'umuntu umwe rudende - Vladimir Putin". Kuri uwu wa gatanu, yateye akamo gashasha ko hoba ibikorwa vyo guhungisha abantu bose muri ico gisagara co mu bumanuko Perezida Putin avuga ko hafi cose kigenzurwa n'ingabo z'Uburusiya. "Dukeneye ikintu kimwe gusa - guhungisha abantu bose. Hafi 100.000 baracari i Mariupol", niko yavugiye ku mboneshakure y'igihugu, nk'uko vyandikwa na Reuters. Ejo ku wa kane, Putin yategetse ingabo ziwe kuzibira rwose akarwi ka nyuma k'abarwanyi ba Ukraine bakiri muri urwo ruganda rw'ivyuma. Mariupol imaze amezi abiri icucagirwa ibibombe vy'urutavanako kandi ata kintu na kimwe kirangwayo kuko Abarusiya bazibiye amayira y'imfungurwa, bakata amazi n'umuyagankuba. Vya muzinga nivyo bibandanya bikora mu ntambara yo mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Nivyo vyaraye birasirana mw'ijoro ryakeye. Abanyamakuru bamaze ijoro bari ahitwa Sloviansk ku birometero birenga 20 uvuye ku rwasiro. Mu gihe bibazako bari ahantu hatekanye, inyuma y'isaha indwi z'ijoro, bavyuwe n'ikibombe c'Uburusiya caturitse cane batari banaciteze, bica biba ngombwa ko bahungira mu nzu yo mu kuzimu. Bukeye bihweje ivyononekaye, aho basanze ibibombe vyaguye ku metero 200 y'abo bari binyegeje. Intsinga zitwara umuyagankuba zari hasi, vyumvikana ko ata muyagankuba uhari. Uko niko ibintu bimeze mu bisagara vy'intara ya Donbas. Ingabo z'Uburusiya zibandanya zugariza Kharkiv, nk'uko bivugwa n'igisirikare ca Ukraine kuri uwu wa gatanu. Ingabo z'Uburusiya zariko zigerageza kumenera mu bumanuko zivuye mu gisagara ca Izyum kiri mu ntara ya Kharkiv, kugira ngo zizingurize ingabo za Ukraine ziri mu ntara ya Donbas, nk'uko igisirikare ca Ukraine kibivuga. Mu bice vyose vy'ubuseruko, ingabo z'Uburusiya zongereje akariro muri ano masaha 24 arangiye, cane cane mu turere twa Zarechny, Rubezhny, Popasnaya, Novotoshkovsky na Marinka, nk'uko kibandanya kibivuga. Ukraine ivuga ko yakoroye indege 15 z'Uburusiya mu masaha 24 aheze. BBC ntishobora guhinyuza aya makuru. Uburusiya buvuga ko bwateye ibibanza 58 vya gisirikare muri Ukraine mw'ijoro ryakeye, harimwo ivyari vyuzuyemwo ingabo, ibitoro n'ibikoresho vya gisirikare, nk'uko bivugwa n'ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw'Uburusiya. Buvuga kandi ko bwateye ibibanza bitatu vya gisirikare bikoresha ibisasu vya misire bidahusha, harimwo misire S-300 ya Ukraine irasa indege, ivyo bibanza kandi bikaba vyari vyuzuye ingabo nyinshi za Ukraine zifise n'ibikoresho vyazo. BBC ntishobora guhinyuza aya makuru. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson yamenyesheje ko ingabo za Ukraine ziri mu Bwongereza mu nyigisho z'ukungene bakoresha imodoka z'intambara iki gihugu gitanga mu ntumbero yo kwirukana ingabo z'Uburusiya. Ari ku rugendo atera aja mu Buhindi, yabwiye abanyamakuru bari kumwe ati: "Ndashobora kumenyesha ko turiko turigisha abanya Ukraine muri Pologne ingene bakoresha ibikoresho vyo gukorora indege, mu Bwongereza naho tukabigisha ingene bakoresha imodoka z'intambara". Umunyamabanga ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mu biro kwa Johnson avuga ko abanya-Ukraine "baharurwa muri mirongo" bari mu Bwongereza mu nyigisho. Ingabo za Ukraine zatanguye inyigisho ku modoka z'intambara zatanzwe n'Ubwongereza muri kuno kwezi, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuvugizi wa Johnson. Uyo muvugizi avuga ko Ubwongereza n'incuti zabwo bariko baraha abasirikare ba Ukraine ibikoresho vy'ubwoko bushasha bashobora kuba batari bwigere bakoresha imbere y'aha. Avuga ati: "Birumvikana ko baronswa inyigisho nkenerwa z'ingebe bikoreshwa. Igihe cose twama tuzi ikintu ico ari co cose gishobora gutuma ibintu vyunyuka ariko ibintu biratomoye neza ko igituma ibintu vyunyuka ubu ari intwaro ya Putin".

headline: Misophonia: Abarwaye iyo ndwara bamererwa nabi n'amajwi asohorwa n'abantu
text: Misophonia: Abarwaye iyo ndwara bamererwa nabi n'amajwi asohorwa n'abantu

headline: Greece: Umupatiri i Athens yafashwe inyuma y'uko ateye aside abasenyeri
text: Umupatiri yahagaritswe ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubugiriki Athens/Athènes inyuma yo gutera aside abasenyeri indwi bo mw'idini ry'aba Orthodox, nk'uko bivugwa n'igiporisi. Ibi vyabaye igihe uyu mupatiri w'imyaka 36 yariko yumvirizwa n'urwego rujejwe indero inyuma y'umutaga w'ejo ku wa gatatu, nk'uko bibandanya bivugwa n'igiporisi. Abasenyeri batatu bariko baravurirwa mu bitaro kubera ubushe batewe n'iyi aside, bakaba bahiye mu maso. Umuporisi yirutse aja gutabara abo basenyeri, na we nyene ari mu bitaro. Uwagirizwa gukora aka kabi - umupatiri ashobora kwirukanwa muri iryo dini - yagirizwa ko afise uruhara mu rudandaza rw'ibiyayuramutwe, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru ANA. Nk'uko ibimenyeshamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu bibitangaza, abo basenyeri bari bakoranye kugira ngo baganire ingene bomwirukana - bakamwambura ubupatiri - inyuma y'aho bivugiwe ko mu kwa gatandatu mu 2018 yafatanywe amagarama 1,8 y'urumogi. Ikinyamakuru Ta Nea kivuga ko uyo mupatiri yinjiye mu kigo c'ababihebeye Imana ca Petraki kiri i Athènes agiye kwumvirizwa, akaba yinjiranye "icupa rinini ririmwo iyo aside". Umuzamu yashoboye gufata uyo mupatiri ageze kw'irembo ry'ico kigo, na we nyene yaraturiwe n'iyo aside, akaba yaciye asimbanwa kwa muganga. Umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubugiriki Katerina Sakellaropoulou ariyamiriza iki gitero, nayo umushikiranganji wa mbere Kyriakos Mitsotakis akaba yavuganye n'uwurongoye iryo dini mu Bugiriki, Musenyeri mukuru wa Athènes, Ieronymos II. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Mitsotakis avuga ko ababajwe cane n'iki gitero, akaba yijeje uyu musenyeri ko "reta izokora uko ishoboye mu kuvura abakomeretse kugira bashobore gukira ningoga".

headline: South Africa: Kwivuza uri umunyamahanga ntivyoroshe
text: Umushikiranganji wa Afrika y’Epfo ajejwe amagara y’abantu yagabishije abanyagihugu ko atari bo bajejwe kwubahiriza amategeko agenga abanyamahanga. Joe Phaahla yabivuze igihe yagendera ibitaro vyo ku murwa mukuru, Pretoria, aho abantu bo mu mugwi wiyita Operation Dudula bagize  imyiyerekano bagerageza kubuza abanyamahanga kwivuza. Uwo mugwi Operation Dudula wagirizwa kwanka abanyamahanga, ariko abanywanyi bawo bavuga ko abanyamahanga batuma  amavuriro n’ibitaro vy’igihugu cabo birengerwa. Phaahla yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko abantu bava mu bihugu bibanyi – eka mbere no mu vya kure nk’Ubuhindi – baza kwivuza muri Afrika y’Epfo. Yavuze ko ivyo bibandanije gutyo, Afrika y’Epfo izoshika aho irengerwa. Ariko yashimangiye ko ibwirizwa nshingiro ritomoye ku burenganzira bwo kwivuza ku muntu wese aba muri Afrika y’Epfo. Abagiye mu myiyerekano babandanije gusaba ko abantu babanza kwerekana ubwenegihugu bwabo imbere y’uko binjira ibitaro n’ubwo hari ingingo ya sentare ibihagarika. Bivugwa ko abantu b’urukoba (uruhu) rwirabura aribo batotwa hanyuma bagahatirwa kwerekana ko bazi kuvuga rumwe mu ndimi zisanzwe zivugwa aho muri Afrika y’Epfo. Ku wa kane hadutse intureka hagati y‘abanywanyi ba Operation Dudula n’abadashigikiye iyo myiyerekano hanze y’ivyo bitaro. Igiporisi carashe amasasu ya caoutchouc kugira gishwiragize  iyo migwi ibiri. Reta ya Afrika y’Epfo ntisanzwe iharura abanyamahanga baja kwivuza mu mavuriro y’igihugu. Ariko hari impungenge ku ngaruka abanyamahanga b’abimukira batagira ibibaranga bashobora kugira ku nzego z’ubuvuzi muri ico gihugu. Muri Afrika y'Epfo si ubwa mbere havuzwe ikibazo co kwanka abanyamahanga. Mu kwezi kwa gatatu uyu mwaka, abanywanyi ba Alexandra Dudula Movement bagize imyirekano bavuga ko abanyamahanga bigaruriye amazu ya reta. Muri iyo myiyerekano bari bafise ivyapa bimwe bivuga ngo   "tahe iwanyu" .

headline: Francine Niyonsaba avuga iki inyuma yo kuba uwa mbere ku metero 3000 i Lausane?
text: Umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba yatahukanye ikibanza ca mbere mw'ihiganwa rya Diamond League ryariko rirabera i Lausane mu Buswisse ku metero 3000. Uwo murundikazi aherutse guhabwa icubahiro co kwitwa ambasaderi yasize isegunda imwe gusa umunye Amerika Alicia Monson. Francine Niyonsaba yagize iminoto 8:26:80 na we Monson agira iminota 8:26:81. Ihiganwa rya nyuma rya Diamnond League ritegekanijwe itariki 6 z'ukwezi kw'icenda mu 2022.

headline: Rwanda: FLN irahakana gukora ibitero iva ku butaka bw'u Burundi
text: Umuhari CNRD-UBWIYUNGE wemeza ko usanzwe uri ku butaka bw'Urwanda kandi ko mu bitero wakoze kw'itariki 23 z'uku kwezi, wishe abasirikare b'Urwanda 21 ubatwara n'ibikoresho vyinshi vya gisirikare. Umuvugizi w'uwo muhari, S-Lt Irambona Steven Tamboula, yanditse mw'itangazo rigenewe abamenyeshamakuru ko bateye mu karere ka Nyaruguru mu murenge wa Nyabimata hamwe no mu Karere ka Rusizi mu murenge wa Bweyeye, hamwe bahica abasirikare 6 b'Urwanda ahandi 15. Avuga ati: "Ingabo za FLN, kw'itariki 23 z'ukwezi kwa gatanu mu 2021 zagavye ibitero bibiri bikomeye ku ngabo za RDF. "Igitero ca mbere cabereye mu karere ka Nyaruguru mu murenge wa Nyabimata, mu kagari ka Ruhinga  mu misozi ya Nyanzare, RDF ihatakariza abasirikare 6 abandi benshi barakomereka. Ariko FLN nta kibazo na kimwe yagize. Imigwano yatanguye [kw'isaha ya] 11h40 iheza 12h10. "Igitero ca kabiri cabereye mu karere ka Rusizi mu murenge wa Bweyeye mu kagari ka Nyamuzi, RDF ihatakariza abasirikare 15 n'ibikoresho vyinshi vya gisirikare. "Imigwano ikomeye cane yatanguye i saa tatu zijoro (21h00) iheza i saa yine z'ijoro". Abagwanyi ba FLN barahakana bivuye inyuma gukora ivyo bitero bavuye ku butaka bw'Uburundi, bakavuga ko basanzwe bafise ibirindiro vyabo mu Rwanda kuva mu 2018. Bavuga kandi ko batambara impuzu z'igisirikare c'Uburundi, ahubwo bakavuga ko ingabo za RDF zerekana impuzu z'abasirikare b'Uburundi bahunze bamaze kunanirwa gutembagaza ubutegetsi mu 2015, ubu ngo bakaba babarizwa mu muhari RED-TABARA ugwanya reta ya Gitega ukoresheje ibigwanisho. Uwo muhari urangiza itangazo ryawo usaba akanama ka ONU kajejwe umutekano kw'isi, ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU hamwe n'ubumwe bwa Afrika kugondoza reta y'Urwanda ngo yemere ibiganiro n'abo batavuga rumwe, ngo bitabaye ivyo FLN izobandanya ibitero ku bo yise "reta y'agatsiko n'igisirikare c'ubwoko bumwe". Kuri uyu wa mbere, igisirikare c'Urwanda cari casohoye itangazo aho cagiriza umuhari wa FLN kugira igitero mu karere ka Rusizi mu murenge wa Bweyeye baje bava mu Burundi. Igisirikare c'Uburundi casohoye itangazo ciyamiriza ivyo bivugwa n'Urwanda.

headline: South Africa: ingene abanyagihugu bashavuriye abanyamahanga
text: Igipolisi ca Afrika y'Epfo kirameze magabo mu gihe horamuka hasubiye kwaduka imishamirano mu karere ka Alexandra no ku bandariza ku mabarabara mu gisagara ca Johannesburg. Alexandra ni kamwe mu turere dukenye cane mu gihugu ariko ababa mu tuzu twako bashobora kubona amazu maremare cane ya  Sandton, kamwe mu turere tw'ubucuruzi dutunze cane ku mugabane wose, ku birometero bikeya gusa. Ibi rero bituma abanyagihugu bava mu turere dutandukanye twa Afrika y'Epfo no mu bihugu bibanyi bisukira ku bwinshi muri aka karere kurondererayo ubuzima. Hari imihari ibiri itabonwa kumwe ifise intumbero yo kurwanya abanyamahanga badafise vya ngombwa iherutse kuvuka - uwa mbere witwa Alexandra Dudula Movement uwa kabiri nawo Operation Dudula -  kandi ikaba igenda ishigikirwa cane n'abanya Afrika y'Epfo babona ko bakumiriwe. Hari ubwoba ko ibikorwa vyayo bishobora gutuma haduka izindi ndyane zo kurwanya abanyamahanga muri ico gihugu. Ubukene nibwo ntandaro y'icuka kibi kubera abanya Afrika y'Epfo bazi ko - biba vyo canke atari vyo -  abanyamahanga ari bo batumye baba mu ngorane. Dudula ni ijambo ryo mu rurimi rw'ikizulu risigura "gusubiza inyuma"  - ibi birerekana ico bashaka neza na neza. N'aho iyi mirwi itandukanye, yose iharanira ikintu kimwe - yose yibaza ko ishobora gusubiza abanyamahanga b'abanyafrika badafise ibibaranga iwabo. Yibaza ko mu gukora ibi ishobora gutuma ubuzi n'ibikorwa vy'ubudandaji bishobora kuja mu minwe y'abanya Afrika y'Epfo. Umuhari Alexandra Dudula Movement washinzwe mu mwaka uheze. Abanywanyi bawo bavuga ko abanyamahanga babaye mu mazu ya reta mu buryo budaciye mu mategeko mu karere ka Alexandra, gafatwa ko ari aka ba nyarucari. Ariko iri sekeza ryarageze kure gushika aho babuza abimukira b'abanyafrika badafise ibibaranga gukora urudandazwa muri Alexandra. Mu kwezi guheze, uyu muhari warugaye utuzu tw'idandarizo twose twegukira abanyamahanga batashoboye kwerekana impapuro z'ukuri zibaha uburenganzira bwo kudandaza kandi bakaba bafise igitabo c'inzira kitarata igihe. Baciye bafata utu tuzu baduha abanya Afrika y'Epfo, nka Wendy Sithole aba aho nyene i Alexandra, yaciye atangura kudandaza imboga aho abanyamahanga baburijwe kuhadandariza. Uyu mugore yabwiye BBC ati: "Twebwe nk'abanya Afrika y'Epfo turashomye kandi turashonje. Ico dushaka kandi ni uko turonka ubuzi. None bashaka tubeho gute mu gihugu cacu?" Ivyo uyu murwi ukora vyose ntibiciye mu mategeko, abategetsi bakaba bariko barakora amatohoza ajanye n'utugeza imvururu n'ugutera ubwoba. Umuhari Operation Dudula ufise icicaro mu karere ka Soweto muri Johannesburg  - ku birometero birenga 25 ku rundi ruhande rw'igisagara. Inyuma yo gushingwa na Nhlanhla Lux Dlamini w'imyaka 33, uyu muhari wagiye kumenyekana cane mu ka gatandatu kw'umwaka uheze igihe abanyagihugu baba i Soweto bagira imyiyerekano muri aka karere basaba ico bita ibikorwa vyo "gukura umwanda". Barwanya abikekwa kudandaza ibiyayuramutwe hamwe n'abantu baba mu nyubakwa za reta bidaciye mu mategeko. Ariko nk'uko vyagenze i Alexandra, uyu muhari nawo nyene warageze kure mu  vyo uharanira. Abanywanyi bawo ubu bashaka ko abanyamahanga bafise amaduka muri Afrika y'Epfo kandi bakaba ari benshi bugara kandi bakava mu gihugu. Bashaka kandi ko abadandaza bato bato, nk'abacuruza mu mazu y'uburiro n'amaduka, bakoresha abanya Afrika y'Epfo gusa. Ibi bitumwa n'uko bene gukora uru rudandazwa binuba abanya Afrika y'Epfo, bagashima gukoresha abanyamahanga badafise ivya ngombwa kubera bashobora kubaha agahembo kari musi y'ako bategerezwa kubahemba. Abategetsi bavuga ko atari ikibazo gikwiye mu gihugu cose, ko ahubwo ari ikibazo gishobora kuba cibonekeza mu turere tumwe tumwe. Iyi mihari yose irahakana ivyo yagirizwa ko yanka abanyamahanga, ko ahubwo ishaka gusa gukingira imibereho y'abanya Afrika y'Epfo, ibakavuga ko reta y'umugambwe African National Congress (ANC) iriko irananirwa kubikora. Yompi ivuga ko ata mugambwe n'umwe yegamiye. Abanyamahanga bobo bavuga ko bahamwa bahorwa ibibazo vyinshi. Sam Manane, umunya Mozambike amaze imyaka cumi acuruza imfungurwa muri Alexandra yabwiye BBC ati: "Nta kazi k'umuntu n'umwe twiba, vyose turavyironderera, nta munya Afrika y'Epfo tubuza gukora nk'ivyo dukora". "Baraduhohotera gusa". Reta y'ico gihugu ntaco iragira ariko umukuru w'intara ya Gauteng, ari nayo igisagara ca Johannesburg kirimwo, David Makhura wo mu mugambwe ANC, avuga ko ahagaritswe umutima n'iyi migumuko yo kurwanya abanyamahanga i Alexandra. Asaba amashirahamwe adaharanira ivyicaro vya poritike gukorana na reta mu gutsimbataza amahoro no gukomeza ukwihanganiranira. Ariko imigambwe imwe imwe itavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi iriko igerageza gukamisha iki kibazo. Uumugambwe utavyorosha na gato ni uwuherutse gushingwa witwa Patriotic Alliance (PA) urongowe n'uwahoze ari impfungwa, Gayton McKenzie. Uyu mugambwe PA usanzwe ufise abahanuzi mu nama mpanuzwajambo y'akarere ariko ukaba utaritoza ku rwego rw'igihugu, ushaka ko abimukira bose badafise ivya ngombwa bava mu gihugu. Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, abanywanyi b'umugambwe Economic Freedom Fighters utavuga rumwe n'uruwi ku butegetsi waragendeye giturumbuka amazu y'uburiro muri Johannesburg kugira urabe abanyamahanga bayakoramwo wongere utere igitsure abadandaji guha akazi abanya-Afrika y'Epfo benshi. Ku kijanye n'indangamuntu, reta ivuga ko iriko irakora uko ishoboye kugira ngo abantu bagire ivya ngombwa vy'ukuri - ariko ibi bizofata igihe kitari gito. Si bwo bwa mbere haduka urwanko ku banyamahanga muri Afrika y'Epfo. Mu 2008, harabaye ibitero bitari bike mu gihugu cose ku mpunzi no ku bimukira - aho abarenga 60 bavugwa ko bishwe, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi nabo barata baromoka. Mu 2015 harabaye ibi bitero ku banyamahanga, cane cane mu bisagara vya  Durban na Johannesburg, ivyatumye reta igomora ingabo kugira ngo zibuze ntihaduke iyindi migumuko. Haraciye imyaka itatu kandi habaye ibindi bitero ku banyamahanga vyatumye abanya Nigeria amajana n'amajana bava mu gihugu. Ntibiramenyekana igitumye iki kibazo gisubira kuvyuka ariko ibibazo indiri n'indiri vy'ubutunzi muri Afrika y'Epfo vyarunyuwe n'ingingo zo kuzibira ikiza ca Covid-19 zatumye abantu badaharurwa batakaza ubuzi maze ubuzima nabwo buca burushirizaho kuzimba.

headline: Covid-Kenya: Umugore yanse gutsindwa n'uwo mugera
text: Aho hadukiye ikiza ca coronavirus, Josephine Muchiliwa yari umunyagikoni, ariko co kimwe n'abandi benshi muri Kenya n'ahandi kw'isi, akazi kiwe karahagaze. Muri uyu mwaka uheze, umunyamakuru w'ikiganiro ca BBC Business Daily Ed Butler yarakurikiranye ingene uwo mugore yavyifashemwo. "Nta kazi ngira, nta buzima ngira, ntaco mfise ngaburira abana". Uko kuri kweruye kuri mu buryo Josephine avuga ingene abayeho biturutse ku  ngaruka z'ingingo zo kwirinda coronavirus guhanze abatari bake. Mu gihe haheze imisi reta ifashe ingingo zikomeye zo kugabanya uruja n'uruza kugira ihagarike ikwirakwira rya Covid-19, uwo mugore areze abana wenyene, wo muri quartier ya Kibera ibamwo abantu benshi cane, arigana amagume yaguye kuri benshi bukwi na bukwi. Akazi kiwe k'umushahara muto cane mu gikoni c'ishuri karangiye aho abanyeshure babwiriwe kwigira i muhira. Yasigaye aribaza aho azokura ivyo agaburira abana biwe bane. Uwo mugore w'imyaka 31 yabwiye Business Daily ati: "Ubu nitura Imana gusa. Sinzi ico ndi bukore". Ariko bamaze kwumva amarushwa y'uwo mugore, hari abantu b'umutima mwiza baciye bamuha imfashanyo. Ntiyari amafaranga menshi - hafi ama dolari 150 (arenga 300.0000 vy'amarundi)  - ariko yari akwiye kugira afashe Josephine gutangura urudandazwa rw'imboga n'ivyamwa. Yaciye aja kurangura kw'isoko hagati ku murwa mukuru wa Kenya, agura ibiro 25 vy'ibitunguru, itomati n'ibindi, abizana i Kibera aho yaciye akotesha kiosk ntoya y'ibiti. Josephine yaciye aja ararungika amajwi y'ubuzima bwiwe bwa minsi yose yafata ari mu kazu kiwe k'icumba kimwe kubatse mu vyondo, avuga ingene agerageza ngo urudabndazwa rwiwe rukunde. Aho Kibera, quartier nini cane yubatswe mu buryo budakurikije amategeko ku murwa mukuru Nairobi , benshi mu bahaba barahura n'ibibazo nk'ivya Josephine. Mu gihe abenshi mu baba Kibera  bakora ubuzi bwo mu ngo (ikiboyi canke ikiyaya) ,  barakozweko  kurusha abandi n'ingaruka z'ikiza ca coronavirus ku butunzi, kuko abakoresha babo bifise gusumba baciye bababuza kubandanya baza kubakorera ku bwoba bw'uko bohava babanduza umugera. Ariko , mu ntango , nabi nabi, urudandazwa rwa Josephine rwasa n'urugenda neza. Yararonka abakiriya umunani canke 10 ku munsi. Umunsi umwe mu kwezi kwa gatanu guheze yambariye ati: ''Nibura uyu munsi naronse inyungu y'ama shilingi 170. Abana bamerewe neza, baranezerewe, kuko nibura bararya." Ariko n'ubundi ivyago ntaho vyaja. Josephine nta rudandazwa yari asanzwe amenyereye, quartier yabo na yo yarimwo umukwabu,  abapolisi bama bariko bariruka kuri uwo wese afashwe inyuma y'amasaha yo gutembera. Kurenga imbibe z'igisagara navyo vyari bibujijwe. Aho hose abana biwe bane yategerezwa kumenya aho bari buri gihe kuko hari ububisha bwinshi n'ubwoba ko bashobora kugirirwa ubukozi bw'ikibi bufatiye gu gitsina. Yavuze ati : ''Ibitigiri vy'abantu basambanywa ku  nguvu biguma biduga. Nsize abana bonyene, uwariwe wese ashobora kuza akabagirira nabi." Kandi nta bantu benshi bari  bafise amafaranga yo kuza kugura ivyo acuruza. Ababanyi na bo bari batakaje akazi, batunzwe n'utwo boba bari baraziganije. Bati amagorwa ntasiga ayandi. Josephine yafashwe na malaria, biba ngombwa ko agurana amafaranga yo kwivuza, ayaka umwe mu basanzwe batanga ideni mu kibano. Gusaba ideni n'ibintu bikorwa cane mu ma quartier  nka Kibera. Umwe mu batanga ideni, azwi nka Rodgers, yabwiye BBC ko hageze aho atakironka amafaranga yo gutangako ideni kuko yaronderwa na benshi cane. Kandi yavuze ko abenshi batashobora kuririha, aho rero yaca agurisha ibikoresho vyo mu nzu baba batanzeko ingwati. Josephine we, nta n'ico kugwatiriza yari afise. Kiosk irabomowe Gushika no kuri uyu musi, aracafise ubwoba ko ideni atarariha, ry'ama dolari 30 (arenga 60.000 mu marundi), rishobora kumutera ingorane zikomeye. Icizigire c'uko ashobora kuriha iryo deni cayoyotse mu kwezi kwa gatandatu mu mwaka uheze igihe tingatinga za reta zaharura  igice ca Kibera carimwo kiosk yiwe. Bavuga ko bariko barategura ahazoca inzira nshasha ya gariyamoshi. Reta yavuga ko abahaba bahawe umwanya ukwiye wo kubimenyeshwa ngo hahave. Ariko Josephine, nk'umupangayi, avuga ko atigeze abimenya. Aho bibabarije n'uko yari amaze iminsi yaranguye ibintu vyinshi, vyose hamwe n'iyo kiosk y'imbaho, bisenyurwa na tingatinga. Aca asubira kwifumbereza, indoto yo kuba umucuruzi iba igarukiye aho. "Uwo munsi narakomye induru, mara iminsi itatu ndira. Mbabaye cane. Sinashobora no kurya. Kuva ico gihe ubuzima bwaciye bungora cane. " Bishoboka ko ikiza ca coronavírus kimaze gukora ku banya Kenya baharurwa muri za miriyoni, nk'uko kwa Josephine. Gushika ubu ibiharuro vy'icese vyerekana ko muri Kenya hamaze gupfa abantu berenga 2100 bahitwanywe na Covid, n'ubwo abahinga bavuga ko ibitigiri bishobora kuba birenga ngaho kure. Ariko ababa muri Kibera, babona ko bo bakozweko kurusha abandi n'ingingo za reta zo kurwanya ico kiza kandi ko igipolisi gihohotera abantu mu bikorwa vyo kwuzubahiriza. Kennedy Odeke, uwavukiye muri Kibera aharanira ineza y'iyo quartier,  yashinze ishirahamwe ry'ubugiraneza, Shining Charity, avuga ati: ''Abo bantu babayeho ku ma dolari adashika abiri ku munsi, barazi ko urwaye uca upfa. "Dushaka ko reta yitaho ama quartiers y'abakene nka Kibera, turonke amabarabara, ubuvuzi, n'amazi meza." Ariko reta ntiyimirije kuvanaho ingingo zigabanya uruja n'uruza rw'abantu. Mu kwezi guheze, amasaha yo kudatembera mw'ijoro yarongerejwe kuko ibiharuro vy'abandura vyaduze cane. Umwaka umwe kuva ico kiza cadutse mu gihugu, Josephine n'ubu aracagwana. N'ubu nta hantu hafashe akura uburyo bwo kubaho, abana biwe batunzwe n'igikombe kimwe c'ubuyi ku munsi. Umwana wiwe w'umukobwa mukuru w'imyaka 11 Shamim yambwiye ati: "Hari aho nibaza ko umunsi umwe nzoba umuganga. "Ariko uyu munsi nibajije ivyo kurya." Josephine hari aho aronka akazi ka rimwe rimwe ko gukora isuku, ariko yambariye ko hari umugore umwe, ataramuhemba ibikorwa vy'iminsi itatu. Ariko kubera ishirahamwe Shining Hope, afise icizere ko hagiye kugira igihinduka mu buzima bwiwe. Ubu ariko ariga gushona, akazi abamaze kukamenyera bavuga ko kinjiza amafaranga atari make ku munsi. N'ubwo ivyigwa muri aya mezi 12 aheze vyari bigoye cane, Josephine apfanye icizere ko we n'abana biwe bazova muri izo ngorane neza baravye ivyo bamaze gucamwo.

headline: Lionel Messi: Ibi bintu bitanu wari ubizi kuri we?
text: Na Ciaran Varley BBC Sport Lionel Messi nta nkeka, ni we mukinyi rurangiranwa mu mupira w’amaguru. Ku myaka 35, uyu musatirizi wa Argentina amaze gutsindira hafi ubushimwe bwose muri uru rukino. Yatsindiye Umupira w’Inzahabu (Ballon d'Or) – agashimwe gahabwa umukinyi wa mbere mwiza kw’isi – aho yaciye umuhigo mu kugatsindira incuro indwi, yongera atsindira agashimwe ka FIFA  k’umukinyi mwiza ku ruhande rw’abagabo rimwe. Mu bundi bushimwe harimwo ibikombe bine vy’ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Ligue des Champions/ Champions League), atsindira ibikombe 11 vy’ihiganwa ryo mu gihugu, yongera atsindira igikombe c’ihiganwa rya Amerika (Copa America) mu 2021.  Ico abuze conyene. Ni igikombe c’isi yose. Hagati aho ariko, tuzi bike cane ku bijanye n’uyu muntu w’imbaga ntoya ariko atera akukuruka. Mw’ireresi nshasha y’isaha yakorewe BBC, benshi mu bahoranye nawe mu murwi be n’abakinyi bigeze guhangana nawe, hamwe kandi n’abanyamakuru bakoze amakuru kuri we, barinjira muri kino gitangaza, ari we Messi. Ng’ibi bike mu vyo twokuramwo. Messi yinjiye mw’ishure ry’umupira w’amaguru rya Barcelona, La Masia, afise imyaka 13. Iri ni ishure ry’umupira w’amaguru ryasohoye ibihangange nka Xavi, Andres Iniesta, Gerard Pique na Cesc Fabregas. Fabregas yahoze akina hagati muri Barcelona, Arsenal na Chelsea avuga ko ikintu ca mbere yabonye ku muyabaga Messi  ni uko “yari umwana muto, atavuga, yari afise isoni nyinshi”. Isoni ni ikintu kiguma kigaruka cane, aho umunyamakuru w’ikinyamakuru Guardian, Jonathan Wilson, avuga ko Messi yahora yihindurira mu gasimbaryango (corridor) hakwinjira mu vyumba vyo kwihinduriramwo. Fabregas abandanya asigura ingene uyu muyabaga yitonda cane yatangaje abantu bose mu myimenyerezo. Avuga ati: "Mu myimenyerezo ya mbere twagiranye na Leo, nakina cane ku ruhande rwo hagati amaja inyuma (milieu défensif /defensive midfielder), kandi tukaba twahura turi umwe kuri umwe. "Mu mutwe iwanje, nibaza ko ndamwaka umupira ata ngorane kuko nakunda gukinira hasi kandi nkunda 'tackle', ariko rero mbona afise umuvuduko udasanzwe. Naratangaye, kuko ndibuka nikubise hasi ngo ndawumwake ariko aransiga aca arinjiza”. Fabregas avuga ko, kuva ico gihe, yaciye abona ko “dukwiye kwitwararika cane uyu muhungu”. Imbere y’uko ava mu murwi mu 2021, Messi yafashije Barcelona gutsindira ihiganwa rya La Liga incuro cumi, ibikombe bine vya Ligue des Champions, ibikombe indwi vya Copa del Rey hamwe n’ibikombe umunani vya super coupes muri Espagne. Messi mu kwimukira muri Barcelona vyasigura impinduka zikomeye ku muryango wiwe. Umunyamakuru Guillem Balague yanditse igitabo ndangakahise kuri Messi, arasigura ingene vyamugoye gufata ingingo. Nk’uko abisigura, inyuma y’amezi atandatu ashitse muri Barcelona, abavyeyi ba Messi batumyeko inama y’umuryango. Mushikiwe Maria, ntihari hamuguye neza, mu gihe mwenewabo nawe Matias yari afise umukunzi yasize i Rosario. Balague ati: "Cari igihe co gufata ingingo, ‘tugume i Barcelona canke dusubire i Rosario'? “Bicaye ku meza bamubaza bati, 'Leo, wipfuza gukora iki?' Leo avuga ati, 'Nshaka gutera imbere. Nshaka kuba muri Barcelona, nshaka kuba umukinyi rurangiranwa'." Balague asigura ko ico Messi atari yabwiwe zari inkurikizi z’ibi – nyina wiwe yategerezwa gusubiza mushikiwe na benewabo babiri i Rosario hanyuma se wiwe akagumana nawe. Balague ati: " Akenshi, yarinjira mu cumba ciwe agashira umutwe munsi y’umusego akarira. "Yakora ivyo kugira ngo se wiwe ntamwumve. Afise myaka 14 gushika kuri 15, niho yabona ko, kubera ingingo yiwe, yategerezwa kubitahura”. Rio Ferdinand yagize igihamana kibi co guhura na Lionel Messi n’abandi bakinyi ba Pep Guardiola bari bateye ubwoba muri Barcelona mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Ligue des Champions, atari incuro imwe gusa, ariko zibiri. Manchester United yahuye n’aba ba Catalans mu 2009 hanyuma mu 2011 – aho hompi itsindwa. Mu 2009, Barcelona yatsinze 2-0 aho Messi yinjije igitsindo kigira kabiri ciza cane n’umutwe. Ferdinand yahushije umupira wari utewe na Xavi imbere y’igori. Ferdinand  ati: "Messi yinjije n’umutwe, bose wamengo bambaza ngo ‘raba ingene ungana, n’ingene angana. Nta vyinshi yinjije nk’ivyo kuva atanguye gukina, ariko yabikoze mu gihe kidasanzwe”. Messi yarinjije kandi yongera aba umukinyi w’urukino (man of the match) mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa 2011 Barcelona yatsinze 3-1. "Messi wamengo, nta guhuza amaso, nta kintu na kimwe, ari ukwiwe, nta n’uko akwegereye, hanyuma ubwo nyene ukaza wumva ng’uyo, ‘aragusetse’. Iryo joro baratwishe pe”. Mu kiringo cose amaze akina umupira, haba neza canke nabi, yagiye agereranywa n’ikindi gihangange ca Argentina: Diego Maradona. Iyi reresi yerekana ingene Messi atorohewe mu kwikorera umuzigo w’iri gereranya. Maradona yabaye ntibagiranwa igihe atsindira igikombe c’isi yose mu 1986. Messi yamenyekanye mu rukino rwa nyuma rw’igikombe c’isi yose mu 2014 akaba yari amaze gukina inkino za nyuma za Copa Amerika ariko aho hose nta gikombe yari bwatsindire igihugu ciwe gushika mu 2021 aho batahukaniye igikombe ca Copa Amerika. N’aho hari ibintu bisa mu buhinga bwabo bwo gukina, umunyamakuru wa Guardian Marcela Mora y Araujo arerekana ubudasa mu nyifato hagati ya Messi na Maradona. Avuga ati: "Maradona yamenyekanye cane kubera impari. Nibaza ko Messi ateye imbere gusumba, aho kudugira ku mpari, yadugiye ku kwifatanya n'abandi. Messi akeneye kuba mu murwi umeze neza, kandi ukorera hamwe”. Uwundi mukinyi Messi akunze kugereranywako igihe cose ni Cristiano Ronaldo. Be na we, bamaze imyaka irenga cumi bahurira ku bushimwe nyamukuru hafi bwose mu mupira w’amaguru. Messi afise Ballon d'Or indwi, mu gihe Ronaldo afise zitanu, akaba kandi afise ibikombe vya Ligue des Champions bine Ronaldo nawe afise bitanu. Ariko none ubu bushamirane si bumwe bukokezwa n'abakora imyihwezo, abanyamakuru n'abafana? Xavi, yahoze akinana na Messi abona ko ivyo ari ukuri. Ati: "Cristiano yamuteye intege zo kuba umukinyi rurangiranwa. "Kumbure Cristiano na Leo bashobora kutavyemera uko. Ariko ndazi neza ko bagumye barabana ku kajisho. Iyo uriko urahiganwa, uba ushaka kuba uwa mbere”.

headline: Intambara yo muri Ethiopia : Abaganga mu basaba ivyo kurya
text: Bamwe mu baforoma n'abaganga kuri bimwe mu bitaro vya mbere binini mu ntara ya Tigray yugarijwe n'intambara muri Ethiopia bageze aho basaba ivyo barya, nk'uko umwe mu baganga  yabibwiye BBC. Bamaze amezi umunani badahembwa, bigatuma biba ngombwa ko barondera izindi nzira z'ingene babeshaho imiryango yabo, nk'uko abivuga. Ivyo uwo muganga abivuze mu gihe ONU ivuga ko inzara ikomeye yarushirije kwugariza abantu benshi gusumba. Iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko abantu bashika miriyoni 2,2 "bakenye bikabije ivyo kurya". Ica kabiri c'abagore bose bafise inda canke bonsa barwaye indwara zo kurya nabi, nk'uko biri  mw'itohoza ry'ishami rya ONU riraba indya kw'isi PAM/WHO. Ethiopia mu ndwano yo mu gihugu hagati Kubera iki intambara ya Ethiopia iteye impungenge isi yose? Muri rusangi, muri Tigray hamwe n'izindi ntara zibiri zimaze amezi mu ntambara, Amhara na Afar, abantu miriyoni icenda bakeneye imfashanyo y'ivyo kurya, nk'uko PAM ibandanya ivuga. Ingabo za reta mpuzantara ya Ethiopia zimaze umwaka urenga zirwana n'abayigumukanye mu ntara ya Tigray iri mu buraruko kuva mu kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe 2020 mu ntambara imaze kurwamwo abantu ibihumbi. Muri ico gihe cose , intara ya Tigray ahanini irugaranywe, bigatuma bigorana gushikanayo imfashanyo hamwe n'imiti n'ibikoresho vyo kwa muganga. Banki nazo zarugawe, bisigura ko abantu badashobora gushikira amafaranga baziganije canke amafaranga yo guhemba abandi. Abaganga n'abaforoma ntibasigaye inyuma muri ayo makuba. Yemeye kuvuga ari uko izina ryiwe ritamenyekana, umwe mu baganga bo ku bitaro vya Ayder ku murwa mukuru wa Tigray, Mekelle, yabwiye BBC ko kubona abaganga n'abaforoma batondeye guhabwa ivyo kurya bisigaye ari ibintu bisanzwe muri aya mezi indwi iheze. Ntibarahembwa kuva mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu mwaka uheze. Uwo muganga yavuze ati: "Benshi baragabanuye incuro barya ku munsi. Amavuta yo guteka, imboga, intete -ibiciro vyaraduze cane ku buryo atawucibaza kubigura. Bamwe baratanguye gusaba ivyo kurya." Yavuze kandi ingaruka z'ubukene bw'ibikoresho vyo kwa muganga  ku buvuzi. Aho gukoresha pansuma zisukuye, zikenewe cane mu guhanagura inguma n'ibisebe  mu gihe n'inyuma yo gukora (kubaga), ibitaro vya Ayder vyikora ku mpuzu bihabwa n'abantu  zitaburwmwo  udutambara duheza tugategurwa neza hanyuma akaba aritwo dukoreshwa. Uwo muganga yavuze kandi ko  Surafeal Mearig, umwana w'amezi atatu BBC yanditseko mu minsi iheze mu nyuma yaciye apfa. Yari yarungitswe imuhira kuko yari yatanguye kuduza ibiro ariko kubera ata vyo kurya bikwiye vyari bihari, yaciye apfa ku wa 13 Nzero ( ukwezi kwa mbere). BBC ntishobora guhinyuza mu buryo bwigenga ibivugwa vyose n'uwo muganga kuko Tigray isanzwe ahanini yaraciriwe uburyo bwo gutumatumanako kuva intambara itanguye. Muri iyi ndwi hari imfashanyo yatanguye gushika, ishirahamwe CICR rikaba ryarashoboye  gutwara n'indege imfashanyo y'imiti i Mekelle ubwa mbere kuva muri Nyakanga (ukwezi kw'icenda). Nta miduga ya ONU itwaye indya irashika muri Tigray kuva hagati muri Kigarama (ukwezi kwa 12), ariko PAM ivuga ko hakenewe ikamyo 100 kugira ntihabe amapfa. ONU ivuga ko ikeneye miriyoni 337 z'amadorari  yo gukoresha mu bikorwa vyayo mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia ku mezi atandatu yimirije. Intambara ya Tigray yadutse mu 2020 igihe umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed yagomora ingabo kurwanya ingabo z'iyo ntara. Yavuze ko yabikoze kubera izo ngabo zari zateye ikambi ya gisirikare irimwo ingabo za reta muri iyo ntara. Intambara yahavuye ikomera gusumba inyuma y'amezi yo guterana amajambo hagati ya reta ya Abiy na  Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF), umugambwe wahora utwara iyo ntara. Muri aya mezi aheze, reta yarasubije inyuma cane umurindi abayirwanya bariko ariko intambara irabandanya hafi y'urubibe hagati ya Tigray n'intara bihana urubibe ya Afar. Hari icizere ko ibiganiro bishobora kuba biri mu nzira. Intumwa idasanzwe nshasha ya Amerika mu karere k'ihembe rya Afrika, David Satterfield, aherutse kugira urugendo i Addis Ababa, mu gihe umuhuza w'ishirahamwe rya Afrika, uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu ca Nigeria, Olusegun Obasanjo, nawe aherutse kubonana n'indongozi za Tigray.

headline: Liberia: Indirimbo 'Mr Liar Man' ya George Weah yateye ibibazo vyinshi abanyagihugu
text: Muri Liberiya haravugwa vyinshi ku muntu yoba yagiriye nabi Perezida George Weah ku buryo vyamutumye yerekana akababaro n'uburakari mu ndirimbo nshasha yasohoye muri iyi ndwi. Mr Liar Man (Nyakwubahwa Mubeshi), indirimbo igize kane isohowe n'uyu mukuru w'igihugu yahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa w'umupira w'amaguru yahavuye aba umunyapolitike - rimwe na rimwe agacishamwo n'ivy'umuziki, iri mu mudiho wa reggae Bimwe mu biri muri iyo ndirimbo, harimwo nka: "Mu gihugu canje, bariko bagerageza kumpiga mu vyo ntazi…Ariko Mr. Liar Man (Nyakwubahwa Mubeshi), urazi neza ko ntigeze nkora ivyo unyagiriza". Abraham Darius Dillon, umukenguzamateka azwi cane atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi yibaza ko umukuru w'igihugu yariko avuga umunyamakuru yakora kw'iradiyo y'igihugu aherutse kwirukanwa kubera yaneguye ingene Perezida Weah arongoye igihugu, mu butumwa yacishije ku rubuga rwa Facebook. Eka n'abandi batari bake mu basanzwe bakurikiranira hafi ivya politikie hamwe n'ibimenyeshamakuru bavuga ko Perezida Weah yariko yihora uyo yahoze ari umukozi wa reta. Ariko ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu hamwe n'abanywanyi biwe babandanya bahakana mbere batera ivyatsi ibi bimuvugwako. Perezida Weah yahoze ari umusatirizi mu mirwi ya AC Milan, Chelsea na Paris Saint Germain, yaragiye asohora indirimbo. Mu ntango za 2000, yarasohoye ururirimbo yaririmbanye n'abahoze bakina umupira w'amaguru i Buraya yavuga ku rukundo n'ubumwe muri Afrika. Mu 2014, yararirimbanye n'umucuraranzi w'umunya Ghana, Sidney, mu ndirimbo yo guhimiriza abanyagihugu ku kiza ca Ebola mu gihe cariko kiratema gitongora mu karere ka Afrika y'Uburengero. Mu mezi aheze, aherutse gusohora n'iyindi, aho yavugamwo ibijanye no kurwanya ikiza karanda ca Covid-19. Ariko ndirimbo yateye ibibazo abantu ni iyi ya kane, aho gushika ubu abanyagihugu babandanya bibaza bati: uyu Mr Liar Man ( Nyakwubahwa Mubeshi) ni nde?

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru : Zaha, Richarlison, Nuno, Buendia, Moriba, Raphinha, Guendouzi
text: Umukinyi w'imbere wa Côte d'Ivoire Wilfried Zaha w'imyaka 28 yabwiye  Crystal Palace ko ashaka kugenda imbere y'uko imyimenyerezo yo kwitegurira amahiganwa y'umwaka w'inkino uza atangura. (Times - subscription required) Tottenham iri hafi yo kugena Antonio Conte nk'umumenyereza mushasha wayo, mu gihe Fabio Paratici na we yiteguye kwinjira muri uyu murwi kugira ngo arongore igisata c'ukwinonora imitsi inyuma y'aho aviriye muri Juventus mu kwezi guheze. (Talksport) Amasezerano Conte yogiriranira na Tottenham ashobora kumwinjiriza imiliyoni zirenga 21 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, ni mu gihe uyu yahoze amenyereza Chelsea yamaze kwemererwa n'umukuru w'uyu murwi Daniel Levy igifovya c'amafaranga yo gutunganya gushasha uyu murwi. (Mirror) Umumenyereza mushasha wa Real Madrid Carlo Ancelotti aripfuza cane gutera Everton, umurwi yahora amenyereza, akawutwara umukinyi w'imbere, umunya Brésil Richarlison w'imyaka 24. (Football Insider) Everton iriteguriye kugiriranira amasezerano y'imyaka itatu n'uwahoze ari umumenyereza wa  Wolves Nuno Espirito Santo w'imyaka 47. (Nicolo Schira, via Star) Everton ishobora gushira inguvu mu rugamba rwo kurondera umunkinyi wo ku ruhande wa  Wolve umunya Portuga Pedro Neto w'imyaka  21 mu ghie Nuno yoba umumenyereza wayo mushasha. (Liverpool Echo) Arsenal na Aston Villa iriko irarondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Norwich, umunya Argentina Emi Buendia w'imyaka 24 afise agaciro k'imiliyoni 56.5 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika . (Sun) Barcelona ivugwa ko yoba yiteguriye kugurisha umukinyi wayo wo hagati umunya Espagne Ilaix Moriba w'imyaka 18 mu gihe imirwi Manchester United, Manchester City na Chelsea, ivugwa ko imurondera (Mail) Liverpool niyo iri imbere mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Brésil Raphinha akinira Leeds ariko Manchester United na Manchester City nayo nyene iramushaka. (Gianluigi Longari via Express) Ariko, Manchester United ntirigera ibitangaza ku mugaragaro canke ngo ibaze Leeds nimba Raphinha ari kw'isoko, n'aho isa n'iyishaka uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 24. (Yorkshire Evening Post) Arsenal iriteguye kugurisha umukinyi wo hagati w'umufaransa Matteo Guendouzi w'imyaka 22 ku giciro c'imiliyoni 12 zonyene z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Le10Sport, via Calciomercato) Everton iriko irihweza ingene yogura umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'iburyo asanzwe akinira PSV Eindhoven umunya Hollande Denzel Dumfries w'imyaka 25. (Voetbal International - in Dutch) Norwich iriteguye gutanga imiliyoni zababa 14 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Celtic Kristoffer Ajer, mu gihe uyu munya Norvege  w'imyaka 23 agiye kwinjira mu mwaka wa nyuma w'amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi wo muri Ecosse/Scotland. (Sun) Ajax yaciye imbere Manchester United mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande w'umunya Ghana Kamaldeen Sulemana w'imyaka 19 asanzwe akinira FC Nordsjaelland yo muri Danemark. (Football Insider) Umusatirizi w'umufaransa Olivier Giroud w'imyaka 34 ariteguye kuja gukinira AC Milan mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye na Chelsea agiye kurangira. (Gazzetta dello Sport - in Italian) Sead Kolasinac w'imyaka 27 araciteze ko azogurishwa n'umurwi wiwe Arsenal inyuma y'aho Schalke ivugiye ko muri iri ci idashobora kugura uyu mukinyi w'umunya Bosnia akina inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu yari yatijijwe muri uyu murwi. (Football London) Atletico Madrid iriteguriye kwumviriza umurwi uwo ari wo wose wokenera kugura umunya Espagne akina hagati Saul Niguez w'imyaka 26, akaba mu misi iheze yarigeze kuba aronderwa na Manchester United. (Marca - in Spanish) Fiorentina iripfuza kugura muri iri ci umukinyi w'umufaransa akina hagati Tiemoue Bakayoko w'imyaka 26 asanzwe yatijijwe muri Chelsea. (Fabrizio Romano) Massimiliano Allegri yasubiye kumenyereza Juventus ejo k uwa kane yabonanye n'abakozi, aho ikibazo ca kazoza k'umukinyi w'imbere wa Portugal Christiano Ronaldo w'imyaka 36 cari mu bibazo bikuru bikuru bihweje.  (Goal) Tottenham iracari mu biganiro n'umukinyi w'imbere wo muri Korea y'Epfo Son Heung-min w'imyaka 28 kugira ngo bagiriranire ayandi masezerano, kandi irizeye ko izoshika ku masezerano mu gihe izoba imaze kuronka uwundi mumenyereza. (Fabrizio Romano) Douglas Luiz yiteze kuguma muri Aston Villa mu gihe bititezwe ko Manchester City itanga amafaranga asabwa kugira ngo igure uyu munya Brésil w'imyaka 23 akina hagati. (Express & Star) Umumenyereza wa Atletico Madrid umunya Argentina Diego Simeone ari hafi yo gushika ku masezerano mashasha  azomutuma abandanya kumenyereza uyo murwi gushika mu 2024. (Cadena Cope, via Mundo Deportivo) Umurwi  Lille uherutse gutahukana ihiganwa ry'Ubufaransa uripfuza ko Patrick Vieira yosubirira uwahoze awumenyereza Christophe Galtier. (L'Equipe - in French) Uwahoze ari umusatirizi wa Arsenal Nicklas Bendtner ategura kubandanya n'ivyigwa vyiwe vy'ubumenyereza inyuma y'aho amenyeshereje ko ahagaritse gukina ku myaka 33, hakaba hari haciye amezi 17 uyu munya Danemark akinye urukino rwa nyuma mu murwi FC Copenhagen. (Ekstra Bladet - in Danish)

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Torres, Mbappe, Sanches, Vlahovic, Eriksen, Isco, Benitez
text: Manchester City iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umusatorizi wa  Fiorentina umunya-Serbia Dusan Vlahovic, 21 amaze kwinjiriza umurwi wiwe n'igihugu ciwe ibitsindo 19 vyose hamwe muri uno mwaka w'inkino. (La Repubblica) Barcelona yagiranye ibiganiro na Manchester City mu buryo bwo kurondera ingene yoronka umusatirizi w'umunya Espagne Ferran Torres, 21, mu kwa mbere. Torres amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo icenda yongera atanga imipira itatu yavuyemwo ibitsindo mu nkino 28 amaze gukinira City muri Premier League. (ESPN) Ariko, umukuru wa Barcelona Joan Laporta avuga ko ikibazo c'ubutunzi kitabemerera kugura umukinyi n'umwe mu gihe ibintu bikimeze uko bimeze.  (Marca) Umukuru wa Everton Bill Kenwright yahamagaje inama yihuta y'abarongoye uyu murwi, aho biteze kwiga ku kibazo ca kazoza k'umumenyereza Rafael Benitez.(Mirror) Liverpool iripfuza kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Lille umunya-Portugal Renato Sanches, 24, asanzwe afise igiciro c'imiliyoni zababa  45 z'amadolari y'abanyamerika.  (Fichajes - in Spanish) Umumenyereza wa Liverpool Jurgen Klopp yumvikanye avuga ko umukinyi w'inyuma umwongereza Nat Phillips, 24, ashobora kuva muri uyu murwi mu kwa mbere. (Goal) Umusatirizi wa Lille umunya-Canada Jonathan David, 21, ariko arakurikiranirwa hagufi na Arsenal. Aba Gunners basanzwe bariko bararondera umusaturizi wa Everton umwongereza Dominic Calvert-Lewin ariko David  na we nyene ari mu bujuje ibisabwa n'aba Gunners, na rirya ari we amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo vyinshi mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubufaransa Ligue 1. (London Evening Standard) Everton iriko irihweza nimba yorondera umusatirizi wa Zenit St Petersburg umunya-Iran Sardar Azmoun, 26, yieze kuba aronderwa n'imirwi ya West Ham, Tottenham na Arsenal. (90min) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Inter Milan umunya-Danemark Christian Eriksen, 29, ari hafi yo kurangiza amasezerano n'uyu murwi wo mu Butaliyano. Eriksen ntarigera asubira mu kibuga kuva ca gihe afatwa n'indwara y'umutima muri rya higanwa ryahuza imirwi nserukirabihugu rya Bulaya, Euro 2020. (Calciomercato) Real Madrid iremeza neza ko izoruhira kuronka umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain umufaransa Kylian Mbappe, 22, na rirya amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi azorangira mu ci riza. (AS) Hagati aho, Real, iriteguriye kugurisha umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umunya-Espagne Isco, 29, amaze gutsindira ihiganwa ry'imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya, Uefa Champions League,  incuro zine mu myaka umunani amaze muri uyu murwi.  (90min) Manchester United ishobora kurondera umumenyereza wa New York Red Bulls umunya-Autriche Gerhard Struber kugira ngo abe icegera ca Ralf Rangnick. Bompi barakoranye mu murwi Red Bull Salzburg wo muri Autriche. (Sun) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona umunya-Hollande Frenkie de Jong, 24, ntazova muri uyu murwi mu kwa mbere. De Jong yariko araronderwa n'imirwi itari mike harimwo na  Manchester City. (Sky Sport Italy) Umurwi Wrexham wo muri Pays de Galles uriko uraraba ko wozana umukinyi wo hagati yahoze akina muri Arsenal, West Ham no mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza Jack Wilshere. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 29 nta murwi afise akinira kuva asezeye muri Bournemouth mu mpera z'umwaka w'inkino uheze. (Football Insider)

headline: Afghanistan: Ifatwa ry'akabande ka Panjshir ni intambwe nini ku ba Taliban
text: Ifatwa ry'akabande ka Panjshir, kari gasigayemwo abarwanya aba Taliban, ni intambwe ikomeye kuri uyu muhari usubiye kwigarurira Afghanistan nyuma y'imyaka 20 womowe na Amerika n'abo bari bafatanije.

headline: U﻿mushikiranganji wa mbere mushasha Gen Gervais Ndirakobuca ni nde?
text: Lieutenant G﻿eneral de Police  Gervais Ndirakobuca yahoze ari umugwanyi mu muhari wa CNDD-FDD ni we yasubiriye Gen Alain Guillaume Bunyoni mu mabanga y'umushikiranganji wa mbere. A﻿shinzwe ayo mabanga inyuma y'imyaka ibiri aramutswa ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu n'umutekano. G﻿en Ndirakobuca azwi cane mu bikorwa vyo kugwanya abari mu myiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza ikiringo ca gatatu c'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu, umuhisi Pierre Nkurunziza mu 2015. Ico gihe, u﻿wo mupolisi batazira Ndakugarika yari umujanama  mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu ajejwe ibibazo vy'igipolisi. Yashizwe ku rutonde rw'abantu bafatiwe ibihano n'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Buraya, EU, yagirizwa kuba intambamyi ku nyishu ya politike ku bibazo vyo mu Burundi, mu gutanga amategeko yo gukoresha inguvu z'umurengera. Yagirizwa ahanini ivyabaye itariki 26, 27 na 28 mu makaratiye ya Nyakabiga na Musaga. G﻿en Ndirakobuca ari mu barokotse ubwicanyi bw'abanyeshure b'abahutu kuri kaminuza y'Uburundi mu 1995, aho yiga mu mwaka wa kabiri mu gisata ca Chimie. A﻿riko mu nyuma yarasubiye mw'ishure, yiga amategeko kuri kaminuza Hope y'i Bujumbura aho yaronse urupapuro rw'umutsindo rwa Licence mu 2013. I﻿co gihe niho yaca agenda kugwana mu muhari CNDD FDD. I﻿nyuma y'imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare, yaciye ku mapeta yose gushika ku rwego rwo kurongora ingabo nka komanda ku rugamba. A﻿zwi kandi nk'umuntu bemera cane mu bikorwa vyo kugendereza. G﻿en Ndirakobuca ari mu mugwi w'abasirikare ba CNDD-FDD yarungitse gukorana n'abo mu ngabo za reta y'ico gihe, FAB, mu gikorwa co kuvanga ingabo z'izo mpande zibiri zari zimaze imyaka 10 zitana mu mitwe. Y﻿agiye aja mu nzego zitandukanye z'igipolisi: G﻿en Gervais Ndirakobuca afise umuryango ugizwe n'umupfasoni wiwe n'abana 7, abahungu batatu n'abakobwa bane. Y﻿avutse mu 1970 ku musozi wa Kibaya, komine Bukinanyana mu ntara ya Cibitoke.

headline: Barcelona yemeje ko Xavi Hernandez yagarutse nk'umumenyereza
text: Uwahoze akina hagati muri Barcelona Xavi Hernandez yagarutse muri uyu murwi wo muri Espagne nk'umumenyereza mu masezerano yo gushika mu 2024. Uyu munya Espagne w'imyaka 41 yahora amenyereza umurwi Al Sadd  wo muri Qatar kuva mu 2019, ariko ejo ku wa gatanu uyu murwi waremeye kumurekura kugira agende muri Barcelona inyuma y'aho iyi mirwi ishikiye ku masezerano. Barcelona ivuga ko aya masezerano azotangurana n'igice gisigaye c'umwaka w'inkino 2021-22 abandanye mu yindi myaka ibiri izokurikira. Yitezwe muri Espagne muri iyi misi y'impera z'iyi ndwi, akaba yiteze kwerekanwa ku mugaragaro i Nou Camp ku wa mbere. Mw'ireresi yarungikiye abafana, uyu yahoze ari umukinyi yafashije igihugu ciwe gutahukana igikombe c'isi yose mu 2010 hamwe n'ibikombe vya Bulaya incuro zibiri yavuze ati: "Si nari nasezeye burundu, nari navuze nti 'tuzosubira vuba'.  Nou Camp hamye ari muhira kuri jewe". "Muri abafana banje, abantu banje, uyu murwi nkunda cane. Ubu rero ndagarutse muhira. Vuba turi kumwe bagenzi.  Forca Barca." Inyuma y'inkino 767 agatsindira ibikombe 25 mu myaka 17 yose yamaze muri Barcelona, Xavi yasezeye uyu murwi mu 2015 aja muri Al Sadd, aho yashikiye ubwa mbere nk'umukinyi. Yahavuye aba umumenyereza wayo mu 2019 inyuma y'aho akukurukiye nk'umukinyi, akaba yarawufashije mu mwaka w'inkino uheze gutahukana igikombe c'ihiganwa. Mu nkino 36 zose Al Sadd ntirigera itsindwa. Kuva Barcelona yirukanye Ronald Koeman ku wa 27 z'ukwa cumi, Xavi yaravuzwe cane ko yashobora gusubira i Nou Camp ari na ho yamaze igihe kinini cane mu mwuga wiwe w'umupira w'amaguru. Barcelona ubu iza mu kibanza c'icenda mw'ihiganwa La Liga  rya Espagne, imaze gutsinda inkino zine gusa mu nkino cumi na rumwe za mbere imaze gukina, ikaba isumbwa na Real Sociedad iza mu kibanza ca mbere amanota icenda yose. Uyu murwi wo mu ntara ya Catalonia ihanganye n'ikibazo c'ubukene bw'amafaranga, mbere ukaba waranananiwe no kugumana umukinyi rurangiranwa yahoze akinana na Xavi, Lionel Messi, kubera ikibazo c'umushahara wiwe. Barcelona yarananiwe no gusohora ayandi mafaranga kugira ngo igure abandi bakinyi mu ci riheze, ikaba yaronse Memphis Depay, Sergio Aguero na Eric Garcia kuri gusa, hanyuma umusatirizi Luuk de Jong nawe akinjira avuye muri Sevilla nk'intizo. Imbere y'umuzo wa Xavi, umukuru wa Barcelona Joan Laporta yigeze kuvuga ati: "Namye ndabivuga kuva kera ko impera n'imperuka (Xavi)  azoba umumenyereza wa Barcelona, ariko sinzi igihe".

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Ramos, Varane, Camavinga, Coman, Messi, Ronaldo, Griezmann
text: Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Espagne Sergio Ramos w'imyaka 35 yiteze gupimwa kwa muganga kuri uwu wa kabiri i Paris imbere y'uko yinjira muri Paris St-Germain ata kirinze gusabwa inyuma y'aho amasezerano yari afitaniye na Real Madrid arangiriye. (ESPN) Manchester United iriteguye gutanga imiriyoni hafi 70 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Real Madrid umufaransa Raphael Varane w'imyaka 28, hamwe n'izindi hafi 35 kugira ngo ironke umukinyi wo hagati wa Rennes umufaransa Eduardo Camavinga w'imyaka 18, kandi iracabandanya irondera n'abandi muri rino ci. (Marca via Mail) Umukuru wa Bayern Munich Oliver Kahn afise "icizere" ko umufaransa akina imbere ku ruhande Kingsley Coman w'imyaka 25 ashobora kuguma muri uyu murwi n'aho Liverpool imwipfuza.  (Mirror) Paris St-Germain yemereye Lionel Messi amasezerano ashobora gutuma uyu musatirizi yimukira mu Bufaransa inyuma y'uko amasezerano yari afitaniye na Barcelona arangiriye mu ndwi iheze. Messi yakoze amateka adasanzwe i Nou Camp yafashije igihugu ciwe gushika mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mw'ihiganwa ry'ibihugu vyo muri Amerika Copa America ni mu gihe bitaboneka neza umurwi ashobora kuja gukinira. (Mail) Tottenham iramaze kuvugana na Southampton kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Danemark Jannik Vestergaard w'imyaka 28. (Mail) Umusatirizi wa Atletico Madrid umufaransa Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 30 niwe aboneka ko ashobora kugurwa na Manchester City muri rino ci mu gihe vyokwanka ko ironka umwongereza Harry Kane w'imyaka 27 akina muri Tottenham Hotspur. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Ariko kandi umumenyereza wa Manchester City Pep Guardiola avuga ko hari amahirwe make y'uko uyu murwi ushobora kugura uwundi musatirizi.  (Mundo Deportivo - via Manchester Evening News) Cristiano Ronaldo ari mu biganiro na Juventus kugira ngo abandanye ayikinira. Hagize imisi hari amakuru yavuga ko uyu munya Portugal w'imyaka 36 aronderwa na Manchester United.(Gazzetta dello Sport - via Mirror) Juventus irashaka kwisubiza umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United Paul Pogba w'imyaka 28 muri rino ci, inyuma y'imyaka itanu avuye muri uyu murwi w'Ubutariyano ku giciro kitari bwigere kibaho ico gihe.  (90Min) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal umufaransa Matteo Guendouzi w'imyaka 22 aboneka ko ashaka gusezera uyu murwi, ni mu gihe Marseille imwipfuza cane. (Mirror) AC Milan iriteguye kuganira na Chelsea kugira ngo ishobore kuyitiza umufaransa akina hagati Tiemoue Bakayoko w'imyaka 26. (Corriere dello Sport - in Italian) Liverpool iri imbere mu mirwi irondera umusatirizi wa PSG umufaransa Kylian Mbappe w'imyaka 22, ni mu gihe kazoza kiwe muri uyu murwi kataboneka neza na rirya amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi asigaje umwaka umwe gusa. (ESPN) Umumenyereza mushasha wa Crystal Palace Patrick Vieira arizeye ko umukinyi wa mbere azoshobora kugura ari umunya Ecosse akina hagati muri Celtic Ryan Christie. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 26 kandi ariko arakurikiranwa n'umurwi Vieira yahoze akinamwo mu Bufaransa, Nice. (Daily Record) Umumenyereza wa Arsenal Mikel Arteta aripfuza kugumana umukinyi wo hagati Emile Smith Rowe n'aho yipfuzwa cane na Aston Villa. Uyu murwi witeguye kwongereza amafaranga kugira igure uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 20, inyuma y'aho itangiye imiriyoni zirenga 41.5 z'amadorari ariko bakayiraba utw'ininga.  (Mirror) Umumenyereza mushasha wa Tottenham Hotspur Nuno Espirito Santo ariko ararondera umusatirizi w'Ubuswisi Haris Seferovic w'imyaka 29, mu gihe umurwi wiwe Benfica ushaka kumugurisha muri rino ci. (Mirror) Inter Milan irafise icizere co kugura umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu, umugiriki Kostas Tsimikas wo muri Liverpool. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 25 yinjiye muri uyu murwi mu ci riheze, ariko yashoboye gukinishwa mu nkino indwi zonyene gushika ubu mu mahiganwa yose uyu murwi warimwo.  (Calciomercato, in Italian) Umusatirizi Mario Balotelli w'imyaka 30 yahoze akina muri Manchester City aboneka ko yiteguye kuja gukinira umurwi Adana Demirspor wo muri Turukiya, akaba afise icizere ko ashobora gukinishwa mu nkino mpuzamakungu imbere y'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi yose ryitezwe mu mwaka uza. (Goal)

headline: Menya umushakashatsi Mireille Kamariza, yatoye DMN-Tre.
text: Mireille Kamariza ni umushakashatsi muri kaminuza ya Harvard muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, yatoye ubuhinga bworoshe kandi bunyaruka mu gupima ingwara y'igituntu. Yanonosoye ubumenyi mu bijanye n'ibinyabuzima ku rwego rwa doctorat muri kaminuza ya Standford. Akwirikirana cane cane ingwara zandukira, zirimwo malariya, igituntu, na SIDA. Muri kino gihe yongeyeko na coronavirus. Impamvu, Mireille Kamariza yabonye ko ari ingwara muri kazoza nayo nyene izoba ibangamiye ibihugu bikene gusumba ibindi. Yamenyekanye cane kuva mu mwaka wa 2018 aho amariye gutora uburyo bwo gupima igituntu akoresheje umwanya muto n'ibikoresho biciririkiye, bufatiye kw'irangi rya DMN-Tre. Bwabaye ubwa mbere, haboneka uburyo bwo gupima igituntu mu minota itarenga 15, hifashishijwe irangi uyu mushakashatsi yakoreye muri 'laboratoire' ya kaminuza ya Standaford muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, mu 2018. Aho ni mu gihe uwukekwa ko akirwaye yahora arindirira indwi zitatu mu kuronka inyishu y'ibipimo vyo kwa muganga. Uburyo Doctor Mireille Kamariza yatoye bwo gusuzuma ingwara y'igituntu -DMN-Tre (4-N,N-Dimethylamino-1,8-naphthalimide conjugate of trehalose), buhagaze ku guha ibara ridasanzwe imigera itera iyo ingwara y'igituntu (Mycobacterium tuberculosis), rituma yigaragaza bitagoranye muri rugagamisha (Microscope). Ni uburyo bushobora gutanga inyishu mu minota igera kuri icumi n'itanu, kandi iryo rangi rishobora kubikwa  ku  rugero rusanzwe rw'ubushuhe. Uburyo busanzwe bukoreshwa bwo kuvura igituntu, busaba kubanza gutegura igikororwa umurwayi aba yatanze, mu ntambwe zigera kuri 11, kikamara iminsi 21 muri 'laboratoire' kugirango bashobore gusuzuma ko hari imigera y'igituntu (Mycobacterium tuberculosis) yoba irimwo. Ubu buryo bwa Mireille Kamariza, burorosha kumenya nimba igituntu kigaragaye ku murwayi ari ikigatu (kitumva imiti isanzwe), canke gisanzwe. Ikindi kandi ngo bushobora gufasha kumenya nimba umurwayi ari ku miti iriko iramufasha, ko acandukiza canke atacandukiza. Ibi kandi ngo ntivyari vyoroshe gusuzuma hakoreshejwe uburyo bwari buhasanzwe bwo gupima iyo ngwara, nk'uko abashakashatsi bashigikiye ikoreshwa rya DMN-Tre babivuga. Ku bijanye n'igihe yibaza ubu buryo bworoshe bwo gupima igituntu buzoshikirira ibihugu bibukeneye nk'Uburundi, Dr Mireille Kamariza nta gihe atanga, ariko ngo ariko akora uko ashoboye n'ubwo ubu amaso yose yahindukiriye ikiza ca coronavirus. Uyu mushashatsi yimukiye muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika akiri umwana muto, ntiyibagiye ibibazo yabonye mu Burundi, igihugu ciwe c'amavuko. Avuga ko igituntu catwaye abantu yari azi, harimwo n'incuti, kandi ari ingwara ishobora kuvugwa igakira. Igituntu n'ingwara yandukira cane n'ubwo ishobora kwirindwa canke gukira iyo ivuwe. Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi rimenyesha ko iyo ngwara ifata abantu bagera ku miriyoni icumi buri mwaka, muri abo igahitana umuriyoni n'igice. Aho ni mu gihe abagera ku ca kane ( 25%) c'abatuye isi baba bahuye n'uwo mugera, ariko 5-15% akaba aribo bawugaragaza nk'ingwara. Dr Mireille Kamariza avuga ko ubushakashatsi bwiwe yabuhebeye ingwara zifata cane cane abo mu bihugu bikene, izo ahandi basigaye bita 'ingwara za kahise'. Uretse ingwara y'igituntu, yitaho n'ubushakashatsi ku ngwara za Malariya na SIDA. Hejuru y'izi ngwara, yamaze kwongera mu bushakashatsi bwiwe, ingwara ya Covid-19. Agira ati: "Mu gihe bigaragara ko ibihugu bitunze biriko biratera intambwe mu kurwanya ikiza ca coronavirus mu gukwiragiza incanco mu banyagihugu bavyo, muri Afirika n'ibindi bihugu bikenye biraboneka ko bitazokworoha kuronka uburyo bwo kuyirwanya. "Nta nkeka ko muri kazoza na Coronavirus izosigara ari ikibazo muri ivyo bihugu cane cane." Intego ya Dr Mireille Kamariza, ni ukuronkera inyishu ibibazo birangwa mu gice c'abatuye isi kititaweho n'abandi bashakashatsi bakomakomeye. Ngo kuva akiri muto, yamye afise umwete n'ubwira vyo kubaza ibibazo no kubironderera inyishu, n'ubwo kuri bimwe bamubwira ko atazihari. Agira ati: "Naraba hejuru, nabona inyenyeri nkabaza abavyeyi igituma zitonze ukwo, bati nta nyishu zihari, nanje nti kabuki… reka tuzirondere?" Inyuma yo gutora irangi rya DMN-Tre rifasha gupima igituntu bitagoranye, Dr Kamariza yashinze ishirahamwe 'Olilux Biosciences Inc', yifatanije na Dr Carolyn Bertozzi yamubereye nk'umuhetsi (mentor) muri ubu bushakashatsi muri kaminuza ya Stanford. Intumbero ya Olilux Biosciences Inc, n'ukumenyekanisha ubu buryo bushasha bwo gupima igituntu hakoreshejwe irangi rya DMN-Tre, aba bahinga babona buzimbutse, bunyaruka, bushobora gukoreshwa aho ariho hose kw'isi no mu bice vya kure y'imiji n'ibisagara, bifise uburyo buciririkiye cane. Ikoreshwa ry'ubu buryo ngo rishobora kugabanya cane impfu ziturutse ku ngwara y'igituntu, ifatwa nk'iya mbere kw'isi ihitana abantu benshi mu ngwara zandukira, kuko bufasha abaganga gushoka bafata ingingo yo gushira umurwayi ku miti ubwo nyene mu gihe basanze yaranduye. Uyu mushakashatsi amaze gukorana n'umugambi ushigikiwe n'umurwizatunga Bill Gates mukurwanya iyo ngwara y'igituntu. Ku ntambwe amaze kugerako, avuga ko yatewe intege n'abavyeyi, abigisha, incuti n'abagenzi bamubonamwo impano idasanzwe y'umwete n'ubwenge bwo kurondera inyishu z'ibibazo. Ariko rero intambamyi ngo ntizibuze, ahanini akavuga ko zishingiye k'uko abantu bamufata, iyo babonye ivyo akora n'uwo ari. Gufata ko umuntu hari ivyo atoshobora kubera ico ari, ngo bituma benshi bataniyemera, ngo bashobore gukwirikira indoto zabo. Ni ibintu avuga ko atahura kuko nawe yabishiciyemwo, ariko agasaba abakiri bato kudateshwa intege n'ivyo abandi babibazako. Ati: "Kenshi iyo bantumiye kuvuga ijambo, baba biteze umugabo akuze w'umuzungu". Ku bwiwe ngo igikenewe n'umwete wo gukora ubushakashatsi, ntibisaba igitsina, ibara ry'uruhu canke ibindi vyose biranga abantu mu butandukane bwabo. Icifuzo ca Mireille Kamariza ngo ni ukubona abakiri bato bari inyuma yiwe baronka uburyo bwo kwiga bagashika kure. Ikimuraje ishinga ni ukubona abana b'Abarundi  bifuza kunonosora ubushakashatsi batabishobora kiretse barinze kuja mu mahanga.

headline: Amahasa canke impanga: Bigenda gute ngo basamwe?
text: Bigenda gute ngo amahasa canke impanga asamwe? Umviriza insiguro za Muganga Salvator Harerimana yavuganye na Florentine Kwizera
