headline: Tony Blair avuga ko ingingo ya US yo gukura ingabo muri Afghanistan ari 'ubujuju'
text: Tony Blair yahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza avuga ko ingingo ya Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yo gukura ingabo muri Afghanistan ari iy'"ubujuju", ibi yabivuze mw'ijambo yashikirije ubwa mbere kuva Kabul yigaruriwe n'aba Taliban ku wa Mungu uheze. Aciye ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rwiwe, yavuze ko guta Afghanistan n'abanyagihugu bayo "biteye agahinda, ni akaga kandi ntivyari bikenewe". Blair ni we yari umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza igihe iki gihugu gitera Afghanistan, kiri kumwe na Amerika mu 2001, inyuma y'ibitero vyo ku wa 11 z'ukw'icenda 2001. Avuga ko imirwi  y'abarwanyi yose yiyitirira idini irya Islam izoryoherwa cane kubona ingabo mpuzamakungu zivuye muri Afghanistan. Blair avuga ko ari "nkenerwa ko ingabo z'Ubwongereza ziguma muri Afghanistan "gushika abo bose bipfuza guhunga bavanywe muri ico gihugu". Uyu yahoze arongoye umugambwe w'Abakozi (Labour) avuga ati : "Dutegerezwa guhungisha kandi tugaha indaro abo bose  dufiseko ububasha - abo banya Afghanistan badufashije kandi twakoranye,  kandi bafise uburenganzira bwo gukingirwa". Yongerako y'uko ibi bidategerezwa gukoranwa "akarigangamuhogo, ahubwo bikorwe mu bugwaneza nk'igikorwa ngombwa". Blair avuga ko ingingo yo kuva muri Afghanistan yatumwe n'imvo za poritike, akayifata ko yafashwe "hisunzwe icivugo ca poritike c'ubujuju co kurangiza 'intambara zidahera'" - icivugo cakoreshwa na Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika mu gihe yari mu myiyamamazo y'amatora. Amerika ifise integuro yo kugeza ku wa 31 igikorwa co kuva muri Afghanistan  - ariko Perezida Biden avuga ko ingabo za Amerika zishobora kuguma muri ico gihugu inyuma y'iryo genekerezo kugira zifashe guhungisha abantu. Blair aremera ko hari amakosa yakozwe kuri Afghanistan, ariko ko "ku gihamana kibi hakozwe ayandi makosa mu gukosora aya makosa". Avuga ko n'ubwo hari "utunenge, inyungu nyazo zashitsweko mu myaka 20 iheze" zisa n'uko zipfuye ubusa. Avuga ko "imirwi  y'abarwanyi yose yiyitirira idini irya Islam kw'isi yose iri mu munezero". Yongerako y'uko Uburusiya, Ubushinwa na Irani ari vyo bigiye kuhungukira. Perezida Biden yiyemeje ko "umunyamerika uwo ari we wese ashaka gutaha, tuzogutahana", ariko akaba yemeza ko iki gikorwa co guhungisha abantu  ari co "gikorwa ca mbere kigoye gushika ubu".

headline: Abarongozi ba EAC bahuriye Nairobi ngo bige ku kibazo ca DR Congo
text: Umukuru w’igihugu ca Kenya, Uhuru Kenyatta yatumyeko inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu bigize ishirahamwe rya Afrika y’Ubuseruko (EAC) kuri uno wa mbere kugira bavugane ku kibazo c’amahoro n’umutekano  muri Repubulika y’Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo (DRC), nk’uko biri mw’itangazo rya reta. Uhuru, ari nawe arongoye ishirahamwe EAC ku wa gatatu yasavye ko horungikwa umurwi w’ingabo za EAC guhagarika imigumuko irangwa mu buseruko bw’iki gihugu giherutse kwinjira muri iri shirahamwe. Hagati aho, DR Congo ntishaka kwumva ko Urwanda ruri mu bagize izi ngabo, ikaba mbere yarahagaritse imigenderanire na Kigali. Iki gihugu cagiriza Urwanda ko rufasha umuhari w’inyeshamba M23 ziherutse kwigarurira igisagara ca Bunagana kiri ku rubibe. Urwanda Ruhakana ivyo rwagirizwa. Mw’itangazo yasohoye, Pereziza Felix Tshisekedi yagiriza Uwanda ko rurondera kwigarurira igihugu ciwe kugira ngo rwiyimbire ubutare, mbere akaba yasavye Ubwongereza gutera igitsure Kigali kugira ngo ihagarike agasotoro kayo. Mu ndwi nkeya ziheze, icuka kibi hagati y’ibi bihugu carunyutse, mbere haraduka n’imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza Urwanda i Kinshasa no mu buseruko bwa Congo. Haciye imisi ibiri, umusirikare wa Congo yarugururiye umucanwa ku bajejwe umutekano b’Urwanda ku rubibe rwa Bukavu, akomeretsa abapolisi babiri. Kenya niyo ihagarariye ikongera ikaba n’umuhuza mu biganiro hagati ya reta ya Congo n’imihari y’inyeshamba itandukanye. Hagati aho, ibi biganiro ntaco birashikako.

headline: Ronaldo na Messi babaye abagenzi inyuma y'aho Van Dijk abakubitiye hasi
text: Rimwe na rimwe amatombora mu mupira w'amaguru canke iminsi mikuru y'ugutanga ubushimwe birashobora kutaryoha kubera amajambo menshi y'umwanya muremure, ugasanga abariko babikurikira bararambiwe. Ariko iyo ubonye babiri mu bihangange kw'isi - Lionel Messi na Cristiano Ronaldo - bemeye ubwa mbere gusangirira umukate hamwe, ni ibintu bidasanzwe. Kari akamwemwe gusa hagati y'umusatirizi wa Juventus Ronaldo na mugenziwe wa Barcelona Messi igihe bari bicaranye batebura eka banatwenga. Hari igihe batangaza ko Virgil van Dijk ari we atahukanye agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza i Bulaya mu 2018/2019. Vyari ibintu bigoye kwiyumvira ko abo bantu babiri bigeze kuba ari abakeba mu kiringo c'imyaka icenda Ronaldo yamaze mu murwi Real Madrid, banarwanira umupira w'inzahabu, ubu bariko batebura. Ronaldo ati: "Twari tumaze imyaka 15 yose duhurira hano. Sinzi ko ivyo vyari bwigere bibabo mu myaka iri inyuma - abantu babiri bakama bahurira ng'aha igihe cose". "Nivyo ko dufise ubucuti bwiza. Ntiturigera dusangirira hamwe, ariko ndibaza ko bizotinda bigashika muri kazoza". "Twarahanganye cane muri Espanye. Naramuhenuye, nawe arampenura. Nico gituma biryoshe kuba mu bagize amateka y'umupira w'amaguru". Uravye ingene bari bakundanye muri ako kanya, ni nde yokwiyumvira ko hari ukutumvikana hagati y'abo? Igihe c'abo bakeba babiri c'ukwiganzira umupira w'amaguru gitera kirangira, aho muri iri joro ryakeye ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya, Uefa, ryatangaje umwami mushasha w'umupira w'amaguru ku mugabane wa Bulaya Uyo nawe si uwundi ni Virgil van Dijk, umukinyi w'inyuma wa Liverpool. Uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 28 akomoka mu Buholande yahawe agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza gusumba abandi i Bulaya mu mwaka w'inkino wa 2018/2019. Van Dijk yafashije Liverpool gutahukana igikombe c'igihanwa ry'umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya, Liverpool yatsinze Tottenham ibitsindo 2-0 mu rukino rwa nyuma rwabereye i Madrid mu kwa gatandatu guheze. Van Dijk abaye umukinyi agize kabiri atsinze ivyo bihangange inyuma y'aho mu mwaka uheze, Luka Modric wa Real Madrid atahukaniye ako gashimwe ashize hasi Ronaldo na Messi. Van Dijk kandi niwe mukinyi w'inyuma wa mbere atsindiye ako gashimwe, katanguye guhiganirwa mu mwaka wa 2010/2011. Ati: "Si noreka gushimira bagenzanje dukinana, kuko iyo ataba bo sinari gushika ku ntambwe ngezeko. Rwabaye urugendo rurerure".

headline: Amafoto yaranze indwi muri Afrika: 1-7 Ndamukiza 2022
text: Amafoto meza yo hirya no hino muri Afrika n'ahandi yaranze indwi: Izi foto zose zirafise uburenganzira bwo gukoreshwa.

headline: Ethiopia: Ibitaro vyo muri Tigray vyaheranywe n'indya z'abana bishwe n'inzara
text: Surafeal Mearig w'amezi atatu aryamye  mu bitaro  vya mbere binini mu ntara ya  Tigray yo muri Ethiopia yugarijwe. Amaso yiwe aruguruye cane, imbavu ziwe nazo zisa n'iziri hejuru kubera kwonda cane. Uwo n'umwe mu bana benshi barwaye indwara zo gufungura nabi kubera iyo ntambara mu yo muri Ethiopia imaze amezi 14 ubu yatandukiriye intara bihana urubibe za Afar na Amhara. Umuganga w'abana avura Surafeal mu bitaro  bikuru vya Ayder ku mugwa mukuru wa Tigray, Mekelle, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ko apima 2,3kg, ikiro kimwe munsi y'ivyo yavukanye. Kugabisha:  Bamwe mu basomyi bashobora kubabazwa n'ifoto iri aho munsi. Ku bw'amakuru yo kwa muganga atangwa n'abakozi bo mu bitaro, amaberebere (amashereka)  ya nyina yarakamye nabo abavyeyi biwe, ubu ata n'umwe akora, ntibashobora kumugurira amata y'ifu. Na cane cane, abakozi bo ku bitaro bavuga ko ubu bariko barahererwa n'ivyo kurya bifasha mu  kuvura abana nka Surafeal. Umwe mu baganga yabwiye BBC ariko asaba kutamenyekana kuko umuryango wiwe wohava ugira ingorane  ati: "Ubu haciye amezi atandatu ata miti canke ibikoresho turonka biva i Addis Ababa (umurwa mukuru w'igihugu). Yongerako ati: "Dusa n'abahejeje ivyo twari dufise kuva turonse ivya nyuma mu kwezi kwa gatandatu. Ibintu vyose vyaheze". Muri iyi ndwi abakozi bo mu bitaro vya Ayder barashikirije icegeranyo amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu afasha basaba gufashwa. Surafeal yabaye umwe mu bana barekanywe. Abakozi bo mu bitaro bavuze ko 40% b'abana bafise munsi y'imyaka itanu bazanwa ku bitaro barwaye kubera ukurya nabi- ni incuro zibiri urugero rwo mu 2019. Medhaniye  w'imyaka ine asigaye ku magufa gusa, nawe nyene aryamye mu gitanda co kwa muganga, umuringoti umugaburira ucometse mu zuru . Icegeranyo ciwe co kwa muganga cerekana ko yatanguye kurwara kubera kurya nabi kuva aho abasirikare batereye urugo rwabo bakica  inka zabo, bagasambura bakongera bagasahura ivyo bari batunze. BBC ntishobora guhinyuza mu buryo bwigenga ibiri  muri ico cegeranyo ca muganga vyose kuko Tigray isanzwe yarugariwe uburyo bwo gutumatumanako kuva mu kwezi kwa 11, 2020 igihe intambara yaduka hagati ya Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF), isanzwe igenzura igice kini c'iyo ntara, na reta mpuzantara. Abanyamakuru nabo ntibemerewe gushika muri Tigray kuva mu kwezi kw'indwi. Guhagarika kuva amaraso n'ibiganza bigaragara Mu cegeranyo cabo abaganga bavuga ko iyugaranwa rimaze amezi atandatu ryagizwe n'ingabo za reta mpuzantara n'abazifasha urugamba ariryo rituma habura imiti n'ibikoresho vyo kwa muganga bavuga ko bituma hari abapfa kandi batopfuye. Icegeranyo kivuga ko "kuva intara yugarijwe, abandi barwayi 35 batakaje ubuzima kubera dialyse itagikora." Abanganga bavuga ko hari igihe biba ngombwa ko bahagarika ukuva kw'amaraso n'intoke zigaragara, bakamesa kugira basubire  gukoresha udufuka-ntoke canke bakikorera bonyene imiti yo kwica imicafu. Agira ico avuze kuri ivyo, umuvugizi wa reta Legesse Tulu  yabwiye BBC ko ico cegeranyo "kirondera kuvugira " TPLF  kandi  cigana ivyo ivuga ko Tigray yugaranywe. Yavuze ati : "Ku ruhande rwa reta, nta yugaranwa ry'ibigirankana rigirirwa Tigray  ngo ribangamire abanyagihugu bacu". Ariko kuva intanbara itanguye, amashirahamwe afasha yagumye yidoga ko ata mfashanyo nyinshi  ashobora gushikana muri Tigray. Ku bw'icegeranyo c'urwego rwa ONU ruhuza ibikorwa vyo gufasha abari mu kaga (Ocha) co  ku wa 30 ukwezi kwa 12,  imiduga itwaye imfashanyo muri Tigray ntirashobora kwinjira muri iyo ntara kuva hagati muri uko kwezi kubera amananiza y'intwaro n'umutekano muke. Ishami rya ONU ryitaho imfungurwa PAM/WFP rigeraranya ko amakamyo 100 atwaye imfashanyo akeneye gushika muri Tigray buri ndwi kugira hafashwe abantu barenga imiriyoni zitanu, ariko ku bwa Ocha, 12% vy'ibikenewe nivyo vyonyene bimaze gushika muri iyo ntara. Kuri ico kibazo co  kujana imfashanyo, Legesse yavuze ati: "Imiduga irenga 840 ku 1.100 itanga imiti n'ivyo kurya ntirasubizwa, ikekwa kuba ikoreshwa na TPLF mu gutwara abo yinjiza mu ngabo mu buryo bunyuranye n'amategeko, abasirikare hamwe n'ibikoresho vya gisirikare." TPLF irahakana ibivugwa ko ibangamira imfashanyo, ariko nayo nyene ingabo zayo ziramaze kwagirizwa ko zisahura ububiko bw'imfashanyo n'amavuriro mu turere zigenzura muri Amhara na Afar. Uyo muganga wo mu bitaro vya Ayder yabwiye BBC ko n'imiryango y'abakozi nayo nyene ikorwako n'ico kibazo. Yavuze ati: "Umwana wanje arwaye appendicite kandi ntashobora kuronka ingene avurwa". Kandi mu gihe imiti n'ibikoresho bibandanya gukena, avuga ko ata kundi bazogira, impera n'imperuka bazotegerezwa guhagarika ibikorwa vyo kubaga vyose kuva ku ndwi iza. "Nta bikoresho n'imiti turonka. Aho niho tugeze, ari naco gituma twashaka isi ibimenye. Ibitaro vyinshi bigiye kwugara."

headline: Mu mafoto: Umusi mukuru wa Christmas hirya no hino kw'isi
text: Abantu hirya no hino kw'isi bariko barahimbaza kimwe mu biringo vyeranda ku kirangamisi c'abakristu. Ariko inkuka z'imisa n'imisi mikuru vy'uyu mwaka vyitabwe n'abantu bake cane kubera ikiza ca coronavirus. Ukutegerana no kwambara agapfukamunwa ni vyo bintu bishasha bitegerezwa kwubahirizwa. All pictures copyright

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru kuri uyu wa Mungu: Aubameyang, Cavani, Mata, Mbappe, Alli, Raphinha
text: Juventus irashaka umusatirizi wa Arsenal umunya Gabon Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, 32, mu gihe kazoza kiwe muri uyu murwi wa Emirates Stadium karimwo igipfungu inyuma y'aho yakiwe ikibanza ca kizigenza. (Tuttosport - in Italian) Leeds United iriko irarondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Juventus umunyamerika Weston McKennie, 23, ariko igategerezwa kuzoriha amafaranga yababa imiriyoni 26.5 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Sun) Umusatirizi wa Manchester United umunya Uruguay Edinson Cavani, 34, araronderwa cane na Barcelona mu kwa mbere ariko ikeneye kubanza kuronka icemezo c'uko yakize imvune yiwe imbere y'uko igiranira amasezerano nawe.  (Sport - in Spanish) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande Juan Mata, 33, abandanya aronderwa na Barcelona, mu gihe uyu munya Espagne adakunze kuronka amahirwe yo gukina muri Manchester United. (Star) Manchester United iriteguye guhangana na Chelsea mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma w'umufaransa Jules Kounde, 23, asanzwe akinira Sevilla. (AS - in Spanish) Umumenyereza wa Liverpool Jurgen Klopp avuga ko umurwi wiwe utaragera ku mugambi wo kurondera abakinyi muri uku kwa mbere kuza, ariko akavuga ko, mu gihe vyoramuka bishitse, afise impungenge zo kuzana umukinyi ataricandagisha Covid-19.  (Mirror) Newcastle irashaka cane ko Manchester United yoyitiza umusatirizi wayo w'umufaransa Anthony Martial, 26, muri uku kwa mbere, ni mu gihe kandi ishaka n'uwundi musatirizi wa Inter Milan umunya Bosnia Edin Dzeko, 35.. (Sun) Uwujejwe kwinonora imitsi muri Paris St-Germain Leonardo ntarota aheba umusatirizi w'umufaransa Kylian Mbappe, 22, kugira atere igikumu ku masezerano mashasha n'aho Real Madrid imurondera. Mu kwa mbere, Mbappe arashobora gutangura kuvugana n'imirwi imushaka hanze y'Ubufaransa.  (AS, via Sky Sports) Paris St-Germain iriko iritegura kugerageza Barcelona kugira irabe koko ko yiteguye kugumana umukinyi wo hagati wa Espagne Gavi, 17. (El Nacional - in Catalan) Hagati aho, umumenyereza wa  Barcelona Xavi avuga ko Gavi ari we "kazoza k'umurwi" kandi ko uyu musore ata kiguzi ntarengwa kuri we kirashingwa.  (Marca, via 90 Min) Newcastle iravugwa ko izoruhira kuzana umukinyi wo hagati wa Tottenham umwongereza Dele Alli, 25, mu gihe bokwemera kumutiza mu kwa mbere.  (Football Insider) Uwundi mukinyi aronderwa na Newcastle umunya Hollande akina inyuma muri Lille Sven Botman, 21, ntazi nimba mu kwa mbere ashobora kuva muri uyu murwi ufise igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'ubufaransa.  (90min) Manchester City igiye gutangura ibiganiro ku mukinyi w'inyuma wa Portugal Joao Cancelo mu mwaka buca utangura mu ntumbero yo kugiriranira nawe amasezerano yisumbirije n'uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 27.  (Star) Umumenyereza wa Tottenham Antonio Conte yavuganye na Inter Milan be n'umunya Chili akina hagati Arturo Vidal, 34, kugira ngo arabe ko yomuzana muri uyu murwi wa Londres/London. Aba bompi baratsindiye ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano Serie A igihe bari kumwe muri Juventus na Inter. (La Tercera - in Spanish) Napoli yamaze gutegura urutonde rw'abo ishobora kurondera mu kwa mbere, harimwo n'umukinyi w'inyuma wa Tottenham umunya  Colombia Davinson Sanchez, 25. (Corriere dello Sport - in Italian) Bayern Munich igiye kwinjira ku rutonde rw'imirwi irondera umusatirizi wa Leeds umunya Brésil Raphinha, 24, mu ci riza. (TodoFichajes - in Spanish) Arsenal irarondera kugura umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Juventus, umunya Suède Dejan Kulusevski, 21. (CalcioMercato - in Italian) Umumenyereza wa Roma Jose Mourinho asaba Tammy Abraham, 24, gufasha kwumvisha mugenziwe w'umwongereza Ruben Loftus-Cheek, 25 bahoze bakinana muri Chelsea ko yoja gukinira uyo murwi wo mu Butaliyano. (Star) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Danemark Christian Eriksen, 29, afise "indoto" zo gusubira gukina umupira w'amaguru inyuma y'aho asezereye muri Inter Milan, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuserukizi wiwe. (Mail) Watford iracarondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Sampdoria umunya Gambia Omar Colley, 29, mu gihe umumenyereza w'aba Hornets Claudio Ranieri ariko arondera gukomeza uruhande rw'inyuma muri uku kwa mbere. (Tuttomercatoweb - in Italian)

headline: Burundi – Amagara: Sendika z'abavuzi zanditse zirega umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara
text: Amashirahamwe abiri akomeye y'abakozi (sendika) bo mu bushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu mu Burundi aranegura ingene ubwo bushikiranganji butwawe nabi nk'uko bigaragara mw'ikete  izo sendika ziherutse kwandikira umushikiranganji wa mbere hamwe n'itangazo rigenewe ibinyamakuru zasohoye mu kwezi guheze. SNTS na SYNAPA mw'itangazo zashize ahabona zivuga ko  ryari rigenewe gutanga umuco ku nkomoko y'ikibazo kiri mw'itunganywa ry'uburuhukiro (morgues mu gifaransa). Imbere y'iryo tangazo zari zandikiye umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Uburundi, Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni, zimudondagurira ingendo nyinshi zigaragaza ico zita  intwaro mbi ''imaze kwonona imigenderanire n'abasanzwe bafashanya n'ubwo bushikiranganji'' burongowe na Dr Thadée Ndikumana. Uwo mushikiranganji nawe yandikiye umushikiranganji wa mbere nyene ahakana kimwe kimwe cose mu vyashikirijwe n'izo sendika yagiriza ''ibinyoma no gushaka kumwambika iceyi''. Itangazo rigenewe abanyamakuru SNTS na SYNAPA zarisohoye mu nyuma y'aho ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara y'abantu n'ubujejwe inyigisho bugirishirije inama abajejwe uburuhukiro mu bitaro bitandukanye ubwo hari hamaze kwumvikana ijwi ry'umuntu yidoga ko yimwe uburuhukiro bw'umuntu wiwe yapfuye. Uwo muntu yavuga ko ibitaro vyamutererekanywe bimurungika ku wikorera ivyiwe kugira aronke ikibanza muri 'morgue' ari uko abanje kumugurako ikibanza co gushinguramwo uwiwe n'ibindi bijana nk'isandugu n'ubwugamo mu gihe c'amaziko. Izo sendika zivuga muri iryo tangazo ko inyanduruko y'ivyo yoba ari uko umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu Thadée Ndikumana mu mpera z'umwaka wa 2019 yahaye isoko uwikorera ivyiwe ngo abe ari we akurikirana  ibibanza vy'uburuhukiro vyose n'ibijanye no gushingura abapfuye. Izo  sendika zitangazwa n'ingene ayo masezerano atarafutwa kandi reta y'imbere y'iyihari ubu yari yasavye ko yofutwa iravye ingene ico kibazo ari nkoramutima ku mico, imigenzo n'imibereho y'abantu mu Burundi. Mw'ikete yandikiye umushikiranganji wa mbere kugira yisigure kuri kimwe kimwe mu bivugwa n'izo sendika, uwo mushikiranganganji aremera ko ayo masezerano yari yahabaye. Dr Thadée Ndikumana avuga yamara ko ayo masezerano yafuswe mu kwezi kwa kane mu 2020. Ati: ''Ivyo izo sendika rero zivuga n'ibinyoma kandi biteye isoni." Mw'ikete yandikiye umushikiranganji wa mbere, Dr Thadée Ndikumana yagiriza izo sendika ''ingendo yinyegeje yo gukorera inyungu z'abazihagarikiye batagomba kwiserura ku mugaragaro". SNTS na SYNAPA zandikiye umushikiranganji wa mbere zivuga kandi ko gutanga akazi canke guhindurira ibibanza vy'akazi abakozi bikorwa ku kimenyane canke ku biturire ata kwitaho irangurwa ryiza ry'akazi, ababineguye nabo bakabizira. Anavuga ko hafuswe ibiganiro vyategerezwa kwamaho hagati y'abakoresha n'abakozi kandi vyatorera ''inyishu ibibazo bitari bike bijanye n'akazi". Izo sendika ziranavuga ko n'uburyo bwo kurwanya Covid-19 bukoreshwa nabi. Zagiriza kandi umushikiranganji guhubisha ku nyungu z'incuti yiwe umukuru w'igihugu yahahora mu gusohora ingingo irungika umuntu kuja gukora mu kigo c'ubuvuzi cigenga ata bubasha abifitiye, icatumye ''iyo ngingo itigeze ija mu ngiro". Kuri ico umushikiranganji Thadée Ndikumana ntaco yashimye kukivugako kuko ngo cizwe mu mwiherero w'abashikiranganji. Ibindi vyose aravyiyamiriza ko ari ibinyoma no gushaka kumwambika iceyi. Ico yemenga n'uko batumvikana n'izo sendika ku buryo ivy'abakozi bitunganywa, ari naco ngo ''kiyashavuza''. Aha avuga ko ''atazokwigera yemera guhesha ku bubasha igihugu kimuha'' mu kwanka ko sendika zivanga mw'itunganywa ry'ibijanye n'abakozi no kutemera ko abo muri sendika barondera kurungikwa mu bibanza vy'akazi bo nyene bishakiye.

headline: AUKUS: France yakuye akarenge mu biganiro na UK kubera ivyo batumvikanako
text: Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi w'Ubufaransa yahagaritse ibiganiro na mugenziwe w'Ubwongereza kubera impari ku masezerano mashasha y'umutekano hagati y'Ubwongereza, Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika hamwe na Australia. Paris irarakaye inyuma y'aho Australia itereye igikumu ku masezerano mashasha azwi nka AUKUS afise intumbero yo kuyubakira ubwato bwo musi y'inyanja bukoresha inguvu za nikleyeri, ivyatumye iheba amasezerano nk'ayo yari ifitaniye n'Ubufaransa. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson avuga ko aya masezerano ata kibazo na kimwe ateye Ubufaransa. Ariko inama yategerezwa guhuza Florence Parly n'umunyamabanga w'Ubwongereza ajejwe kwivuna abansi Ben Wallace i Londres yahagaritswe. Lord Ricketts yahoze aserukira Ubwongereza mu Bufaransa akaba yari yiteze kuba mu barongoye ibi biganiro vy'imisi ibiri yemeje ko iyi uwu mubonano "wungururijwe ku rindi genekerezo". Amasezerano ya Aukus yateweko igikumu mu ndwi iheze, abatari bake bakaba babona ko afise intumbero yo kubuza Ubushinwa kwiganza mu nyanja y'Ubushinwa (Mer de Chine méridionale/South China Sea), yahagaritse ayandi yari ategekanijwe gutwara imiriyaridi 37 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika yari yateweko igikumu na Australia mu 2016, aho Ubufaransa bwotegerejwe kuyubakira ubwato 12 bukorera musi y'inyanja. Umushikiranganji w'Ubufaransa ajejwe imigenderanire Jean-Yves Le Drian avuga ko aya masezerano  ari "amasezerano y'incamugongo" yerekana "ingendo mbi idashobora kwihanganirwa hagati y'ibi bihugu bicuditse". Mu bintu bitari bwigere bibaho muri ibi bihugu bisanzwe ari incuti, Perezida Emmanuel Macron w'Ubufaransa yategetse ko abaserukira iki gihugu i Washington na Canberra (umugwa mukuru wa Australia) batahukanwa. Mu kiganiro yatanze igihe yagomba yurire indege imutwara i New York aho agiye kwitabira inama nkuru ya ONU, Boris Johnson yavuze ko Ubufaransa butari bukwiye kugira "ubwoba" kuri aya masezerano, anashimangira ko imigenderanire y'Ubwongereza n'Ubufaransa idashobora na gato "guhagarara". Uyu mushikiranganji wa mbere avuga ko Ubwongereza n'Ubufaransa bifise "imigenderanire myiza cane" avuga ko afise "akamaro kanini". Yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: "Urukundo dufitiye Ubufaransa ntirushobora gusenyuka". "Aukus ntabwo ifise intumbero yo gusamburana, ntifise intumbero yo kwigizayo bamwe n'abandi. Si ikintu umuntu akwiye gutinya cane cane nka bagenzi bacu b'abafaransa". Umushikiranganji wa mbere Johnson yajanye n'umunyamabanga mushasha ajejwe imigenderanire, Liz Truss ashigikira akanavugira cane aya masezerano. Mu nkuru yaciye mu kinyamakuru co mu Bwongereza Sunday Telegraph, umupfasoni Truss avuga ko aya masezerano yerekanye ko Ubwongereza bwiteguye guhagararira inyungu zabwo "n'inguvu zabwo zose" kandi ko azotanga ubuzi ku bahinga batari bake. Australia yoyo irisigura ku ngingo yayo yo guhagarika amasezerano n'Ubufaransa igahitamwo aya Aukus. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Scott Morrison arahakana ibirego vy'uko Australia yabeshe, akavuga ko Ubufaransa bwategerezwa kumenya y'uko Australia yari yiteguye guhagarika aya masezerano umwanya uwio ari wo wose. Ejo ku wa Mungu, Morrison yavuze ati: "Iyi ni ingingo ishingiye ku kumenya nimba koko aya mato yariko arubakwa ku mafaranga menshi cane ava mu makori atangwa n'umunyagihugu wa Australia yari gukora igikorwa tuyakeneyeko mu gihe yari kuba atanguye gukoreshwa, umwihwezo wacu twakoze twisunze impanuro twahawe n'abajejwe igendereza n'ukwivuna abansi watweretse ko ataco yari gushikako". Aya masezerano asigura ko Australia izoba ibaye igihugu kigize indwi kw'isi gifise amato y'intambara akoresha inguvu za nikleyeri, inyuma ya Amerika, Uburusiya, Ubushinwa, Ubwongereza, Ubufaransa n'Ubuhindi. Yiteze kandi gufasha ibi bihugu bicuditse guhanahana ubuhinga bwa none butandukanye mu bijanye n'ibikorwa vyo musi yinyanja. Ariko, aya masezerano aranegurwa n'Ubushinwa bwagiriza ibi bihugu bitatu gufata "ingendo ya ca gihe c'intambara y'ukwikekana" (Guerre froide/Cold War). Korea ya Ruguru nayo, igihugu gisanzwe gifise umugambi wo guhingura ibirwanisho vy'ubumara ukurikiranirwa hagufi cane, iragabisha ko aya masezerano ashobora gutuma haba "ugusiganwa mu guhingura ibirwanisho vy'ubumara". Ikinyamakuru ca reta KCNA casubiyemwo umutegetsi wo mu bushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire avuga ati: "Ibi ni ibikorwa bibi cane bishobora gutuma ubwumvikane mu karere ka  APAC (Asia-Pacific)buhungabana".

headline: USA: Intara ya Oregon yitwariye ubutegetsi bw'igihugu kw’ihohotera rikorerwa abari mu myiyerekano
text: Umushikirizamanza mukuru mu ntara ya Oregon muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yitwariye ubutegetsi bw'igihugu, abwagiriza ko buriko burahohotera abari mu myiyerekano . Kuva umwirabure George Floyd yicwa, igisagara ca Portland muri iyo ntara kiri mu myiyerekano y'urutavanako y'ijoro. Muri ino ndwi, abapolisi barungitswe n'ubutegetsi bw'igihugu bari mu mamodoka atamenyekana barabonetse bariko bacakira abari mw'ibarabara banabapfunga ataco babagirije. Ubutegetsi bw'igihugu ca Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika buvuga ko buriko bugerageza kugarukana umutekano muri ico gisagara. Izo ngabo z'ubutegetsi bwa Amerika zarungitswe na Perezida Donald Trump ziratera abari mu myiyerekano vya vyuka bikoroza amosozi be n'amasasu ya plastiki. Mu minsi iheze, umushikiranganji mfatakibanza w'intwaro yo hagati Chad Wolf yavuze ko abari mu myiyerekano ari imirwi y'abagumutsi. Ejo ku wa gatandatu mu masaha yo ku mugoroba, abari mu myiyerekano barerekanywe bariko basambura uruzitiro ruri hafi ya sentare y'igihugu, ariko haciye amasaha make rurasanurwa. Ibiro vy'umushikirizamanza wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika muri Oregon bwatangaje ku rubuga rwa Twitter ko urwo ruzitiro rwari rufise intumbero yo "kugabanya icuka kibi hagati y'abari mu myiyerekano n'abashinzwe kwubahiriza amategeko, maze asaba abantu kubireka bonyene. Abapolisi batangaje ko hanze y'inyubakwa y'ishirahamwe ry'abapolisi ba Portland mu mburaruko bw'igisagara hateye imidugararo. Igipolisi kivuga ko iyo nyubakwa yaturiwe ariko ko bashoboye kuzimya umucanwa. Muri uru rubanza, umushikirizamanza mukuru wa Oregon, Ellen Rosenblum, asaba ko hafatwa ingingo yo kubuza izi ngabo gusubira guhagarika abantu muri ico gisagara. Mw'itangazo yasohoye, umupfasoni Rosenblum  yavuze ati: "Ibi bintu bitegerezwa guhagarara. Uretse ko vyaka uburenganzira abanyagihugu bwo gukora imyiyerekano, biriko biteza uruhagarara mu mabarabara". Yongerako y'uko uburyo bakoresha "budakenewe namba kandi ntibujanye n'imico y'ubuntu biranga Oregon". Abona ko ubutegetsi bwa Amerika bwahisemwo ico gisagara kugira ngo butere ubwoba abanyagihugu bashe coba, maze bahebe kwiyamiriza ubugome bw'igipolisi n'ugushigikira rya sekeza ryiswe Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'Abirabure ni nkenerwa). Asaba buri munyamerika kwiyamiriza ibi bintu igihe cose abibonye. Ati: "Nimba biriko biraba hano muri Portland uno munsi, ejo bishobora kuba n'ahandi". Mu ntango z'ino ndwi, buramatari w'intara ya Oregon, Kate Brown, yaragirije abajejwe umutekano barungitswe na leta ya Amerika "gukoresha vyenyuje  igikenye". Inkuru yatangajwe n'ikigo ntangamakuru Oregon Public Broadcasting (OPB) mu ntango z'ino ndwi, yari igizwe n'abiboneye ubwabo ingene abo bajejwe umutekano barungitswe n'ubutegetsi bw'igihugu, bambaye impuzu zo kwiyoberanya, bakoroka bava mu mamodoka yiyoberanije, bayora abantu baterera mu modoka baca babatwara igikubikubi. Indwi iheze yaranzwe n'imidugararo ikomeye hagati y'abari mu myiyerekano n'abo bajejwe umutekano barungitswe  mu ndwi zibiri ziheze na Perezida Trump kugira ngo bahagarike iyo myiyerekano. Ireresi yasohowe na OPB yerekana umwe mu bari mu myiyerekano, Mark Pettibone, asigura ingene ku wa 15 z'uku kw'indwi "yajugunywe" mu modoka yarimwo abantu bitwaje ibirwanisho. Bwana Pettibone yavuze ko bamujanye mu gasho ka sentare y'igihugu, aho yasomewe ibijanye n'uburenganzira afise nk'impfungwa. Amaze kwanka kwishura ibibazo, yararekuwe ata dosiye bamwugururije. Nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo ntangamakuru OPB, abajejwe umutekano ku rwego rw'igihugu baramaze gucira urubanza abantu n'imiburiburi 13 ku vyaha bijanye n'iyi myiyerekano. Igihe ashika muri ico gisagara ku wa kane aje kubonana n'abajejwe umutekano, umushikiranganji mfatakibanza w'intwaro yo hagati n'umutekano yavuze ko abajejwe umutekano barungitswe ngo bahagarike "akajagari". Mw'itangazo yasohoye, bwana Wolf yaragirije abategetsi b'intara n'ico gisagara ko bananiwe no "kugarukana umutekano". Avuga ati: "Haciye iminsi 47 yose igisagara ca Portland kirangwamwo uruhagarara" "Buri joro abatera imidugararo baronona amatungo y'igihugu, harimwo n'inyubakwa za sentare, bakanatera n'abajejwe umutekano basanzwe bayacunze". Amajambo ya Wolf niyo asanzwe avugwa na Perezida Trump. Muri ino ndwi nyene, umukuru w'igihugu yashimagije utwigoro tw'izo ngabo z'igihugu zijejwe umutekano i Portland, avuga ko bakoze igikorwa gikomeye.

headline: Africa-Ukraine: Ingaruka z'intambara ziguma zigaragaza uko bukeye uko bwije
text: Gaz (umwuka)  yo gutekesha (Liquified Petroleum  Gas, LPG)  yaduze igiciro muri Kenya  gushika kuri 11 kw'ijana mu ndwi imwe gusa, mu gihe intambara Uburusiya bwateye muri Ukraine iriko iragira ingaruka ku biciro v'ibitoro kw'isi. Ubu igiciro ca gaz yo gutekesha muri Kenya kimaze kuduga gushika kuri 50 kw'ijana mu kiringo c'umwaka, ubu kikaba congeye umuzigo ku banyagihugu bari bahanzwe  n'uburyo bwagabanutse kubera ingaruka z'ikiza ca Covid. Ubu igiciro co kwuzuza icupa rya gaz ry'ibiro 13 ciyongeyeko 11 kw'ijana muri iyi ndwi n'ukuvuga ko bica bisaba amafaranga angana n'ama dorari ($) 29.30 (hafi 60.000 mu marundi canke 30.000 mu manyarwanda) rivuye ku ma dorari 26.26 ku ndwi iheze. Ubu icupa ry'ibiro 6 ryuzuzwa kuri $13.68 kare ryari kuri $12.43. Ni  ikimenyetso ko ibihe biri imbere bitagiye kworoha ku bantu b'uburyo bubayabaye basanzwe bari bahanzwe n'ibiciro vy'ivyo kurya vyaduze cane. Bitandukanye n'ibindi bikomoka ku bitoro  nka essence, amazutu na kerosene, muri Kenya ibiciro vya gaz yo gutekesha ntibishingwa na reta, bisigura ko abaguzi baca bahura n'ingaruka uko ibiciro bihindutse kw'isoko mpuzamakungu. Kuri uyu wa mbere igiciro c'ibitoro bitayunguruye caduze gushika ku $140 ku kagunguru (barril)  kw'isoko mpuzamakungu. Ibihugu vyinshi vya Afrika biramaze kuduza ibiciro vy'ibitoro. Mu Rwanda havugwa kuduga kw'igiciro c'ibitoro... No mu Rwanda kuva kuri uyu wa mungu hari ibiciro bishasha vy'ibitoro. Mazutu yavuye kuri 1.140Frw ija kuri 1.201Frw, essence iva kuri 1.225Frw ija kuri 1.256Frw. Itangazo ry'ubuyobozi bubijejwe rivuga ko n'aho ryirinze kuduza igiciro uko vyategerezwa kugenda kugirango ibiciro  muri rusangi ntibice biduga cane ngo vyonone umurindi wo kwivyukiranya ingaruka z'ikiza ca Covid. Ariko abaraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko  ibintu bishobora kwunyuka hamwe ihererekanywa ry'ivyo bitoro ryohungabana. Rolake  Akingube-Filani wo muri  Africa Energy Chamber avuga ati: "Amaherezo ingaruka zizova i Buraya zishike muri Afrika  aho ibiciro bishobora kuduga kurusha aho bigeze ubu." Yongerako ati: "Dukeneye kurondera uburyo bwo kwikwiza ku bitoro muri Afrika. Aho niho dushobora kwihagararako habaye ihungrana nk'iryo muri kazoza."

headline: Africa -Covid: U Burundi mu bihugu OMS igiye gufasha gupima ku bwinshi
text: Batandatu ku bantu indwi bandura umugera wa corona muri Afrika ntibamenyekana, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi OMS/WHO. Ico giharuro yagitoye ifatiye ku gitigiri c'abantu  bizwi ko bishwe n'iyo ndwara hamwe n'ingero z'abo yica. Gushika ubu abantu miriyoni umunani nibo bonyene bazwi icese ko bamaze kwandura Covid-19 muri Afrika, ariko OMS igereranya ko igitigiri nyaco ari miriyoni 59. Muri rusangi, abantu bonyene bapimwa n'abijana ku bigo vy'ubuvuzi kuko baba bafise ibimenyetso hamwe n'ababa bashaka gufata ingendo zo hanze y'igihugu. Ivyo bisigura ko abantu benshi batagaragaje ibimenyetso batigera bamenyekana, gutyo ikwiragira ry'umugera rigaca rikomeza. Kugira ico kibazo gitore inyishu, OMS ifise umugambi wo kwongereza ibikorwa vyo gupima abantu mu kibano mu bihugu umunani aho yifuza gushikira abantu bagera ku miriyoni indwi mu mwaka uza. U Burundi buri muri ivyo bihugu. Ibindi ni Cote d'Ivoire, RD Congo, Guinea Bissau, Mozambique, Congo-Brazzaville, Senegal na Zambia. Umuyobozi wa OMS ku mugabane wa Afrika Dr Matshidiso Moeti avuga ati: "Iyo hapimwa abantu bake cane, duca dukorera ku biharuro bitari vyo muri Afrika… "Gupima abantu benshi bivuga ko uwurwaye aca yishira ukwiwe hakiri kare, gukwirakwiza indwara bikagabanuka, ubuzima bw'abantu benshi bukarokoka biciye muri ico gikorwa gifasha kumenya igikenewe n'aho gikenewe gukorwa". Ibiharuro vy'abantu bashasha bandura bigize igihe vyagabanutse, ariko ku bwa OMS, hari amakenga ko kubera urugero rw'abaronka urucanco rukiri hasi cane, Covid iracari ingeramizi kuri benshi. Mu Burundi, gushika ku mugoroba w'ejo ku wa kane itariki 14/10/2021, abari bamaze kwandura Covid-19 bari 19.513, nayo abo imaze guhitana bakaba ari 14 nk'uko bitangazwa na OMS.

headline: Coronavirus: Boris Johnson, Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza, araremvye cane
text: Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson yashizwe mu gisata c'abaremvye cane kwa muganga nyuma y'aho ibimenyetso vya coronavirus yari afise vyunyukiye. Umuvugizi yavuze ko yimuriwe muri ico gisata ku mpanuro z'umugwi w'abaganga kandi ko ariko araronka ubuvuzi "bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru". Bwana Johnson yasavye umushikiranganji ajejwe imigenderanire Dominic Raab ngo amusubirire "aho bikenewe", nk'uko uwo muvugizi yabandanije avuga. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Johnson w'imyaka 55, yinjijwe ibitaro i London afise "ibimenyetso vy'urutavanako" ku wa mungu. Urwandiko rwo mu biro vyiwe rwagize ruti: "Kuva kuwa Mungu mw'ijoro, umushikiranganji wa mbere ariko aravurwa n'abaganga ku bitaro vya St Thomas, i London, nyuma yo kwakirwa afise ibimenyetso vy'urutavanako vya coronavirus. "Ku muhingamo wose w'uno munsi, umushikiranganji wa mbere yabandanije kuremba kandi, ku mpanuro y'umugwi w'abaganga, yimuriwe mu gisata c'abaremvye cane muri ibi bitaro." Urwo rwandiko rwabandanije ruti: "Umushikiranganji wa mbere ariko araronka ubuvuzi bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru, kandi agashimira abavuzi bo mu gisata c'ubuvuzi NHS, ku kazi gakomeye bariko barakora hamwe no kwitanga kwabo." Umushikiranganji ajejwe ubutunzi, Rishi Sunak, yavuze ko ivyiyumviro vyiwe vyerekeye umushikiranganji wa mbere hamwe n'umutambukanyi wiwe yibungenze, Carrie Symonds, kandi ko Bwana Johnson "azosimba iyi manga aze akomere gusumvya." Umukuru w'umugambwe mukuru utavuga rumwe na leta, Labour, Sir Keir Stamer yavuze ko ivyashikiye umushikiranganji wa mbere ari "amakuru y'incamugongo." Bwana Johnson yabanje gutwarwa kwa muganga gupimwa bisanzwe nyuma yo gufatwa na coronavirus haraciye iminsi 10. Ibimenyetso yari afise vyarimwo kugira umuriro hamwe no gukorora.

headline: Gukorera mu bushuhe bw'ikirenga birananiza umwana ari mu nda
text: Na Naomi Grimley Umunyamakuru mu gisata c'amagara Ukurengerwa n'ubushuhe  birashobora kugira ingaruka ku mwana ari mu nda y'umugore mu gihe aba ariko arakorera ahantu hashushe vy'ikirenga, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'icigwa gishasha. Ingaruka zirimwo gutuma umutima w'umwana utera cane nayo amaraso aca mu ruzogi akagabanuka. Abashakashatsi bavuga ko hazokenerwa igikorwa kibereye kugira hakingirwe abagore  bafise inda mu gihe  ihindagurika ry'ibihe ririko rirongereza ubushuhe kw'isi yose. Ico cigwa, cakozwe n'ishure kaminuza rya  London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine (LSHTM), cakurikiranye abarimyi 92 muri Gambia. Ico cigwa casohotse mu kinyamakuru c'ubuganga n'amagara  The Lancet Planetary Health, cerekana ko kuri buri degre Celsius yongeye ku bushuhe bwari buhasanzwe, umunaniro ku mwana ari mu nda  wiyongera ku rugero rwa 17%. N'ubwo ibindi vyigwa vyari bimaze kuraba ingaruka z'ubushuhe ku bagore bafise inda ariko bikorewe muri laboratoire mu bihugu biteye imbere, iki vyibazwa ko arico cigwa ca mbere cize ingaruka ku bantu bari mu buzima bwa minsi yose mu bihugu biri mu nzira y'iterambere. Abo bagore bafise inda bariko barakora mu mirima y'umuceri ya West Kiang muri Gambia. Bakora mu mirima ku zuba mu kiringo c'amasaha ari hagati y'abiri na munani. Ubushuhe bwinshi bwabonetse muri ico gihe icigwa cariko kirakorwa bwabaye degre Celsius 45 ariko igihe c'imvura hari aho catuma bitumvikana ko hashushe gusumba. Abo bagore basuzumwa hakoreshejwe akuma ngendanwa gafata ibipimo vy'umutima w'abana bari bibungenze. Ibipimo vyafatwa bagira batangure gukora, umunsi w'akazi ugeze hagati hanyuma uheze. Abo bagore bafise inda nabo nyene barakurikiranywe ku bimenyetso vyabo vy'ingene  bananizwa n'ubushuhe  nko kumeneka umutwe, kugira intege nke no kugira iseseme. Muganga Ana Bonell,  yari arongoye ico cigwa muri  LSHTM, avuga ko ivyemeza vy'uko umwana ari mu nda yagizweko ingaruka vyatowe ku rugero rwa 33% rw'imgendo bagize muri iyo mirima. Yavuze ati: "Twaratangaye cane tubonye ko abana bari mu nda bagirwako ingaruka n'uko ba nyina biriwe ku zuba." "Ku mwana ari mu nda twarabonye ko  umurindi wo gutera kw'umutima waduga cane ku rugero  rubangamye hamwe twoba turi kwa muganga. Twarabonye kandi ko hari ingaruka kw'itembera ry'amaraso kuko ingovyi nayo yagirwako ingaruka n'ubushuhe." Avuga ko bitaba aho habereye icigwa gusa kubera ihindagurika ry'ibihe. "Ivyo birahambaye cane ku bijanye n'uko abagore kw'isi yose bashobora gutwara inda ata ngorane bahuye. Hagiye kubandanya hashuha gusumba kandi turazi ko iyo abagore bahuye n'ubushuhe bwinshi, ivyo bifise ingaruka zikomeye cane ku kwibaruka haba mu kuvyara  abatageze canke kuvyara abapfuye (kuruhira ubusa). "Twizeye ko ico cigwa kizotuma  hatahurwa neza gusumba  bimwe mu biba kugira bigende uko twabibonye, hanyuma hagire igikozwe mu kugabanya izo ngaruka ziva ku bushuhe bw'ikirenga. " Muganga Bonell avuga ko hakenewe gukorwa ibindi vyigwa kugira hihwezwe ingene ubushuhe bw'ikirenga bugira ingaruka mu gutesha inzira amaraso aja ku mwana ari mu nda, co kimwe n'ingene ugushuhirwa kwa nyina bishobora kugira ingaruka ku buryo umwana ari mu nda atera imbere.

headline: Inama ya AU/UA: Abategetsi ba Afrika baridogera 'igihuhusi c'ama coups d'Etat'
text: Abategetsi ba Afrika baridogera "igihuhusi" co gutembagaza ubutegetsi, inyuma y'aho mu mwaka uheze igisirikare cigaruriye ubutegetsi mu bihugu bitanu. Igitigiri c'ama coups d'Etat cagiye kigabanuka muri Afrika, aho amatora yagiye aba ahatari hake, agatuma haba ihererekanywa ry'ubutegetsi mu mahoro. Ibihugu bibiri aho igisirikare giheruka gufata ubutegetsi - Burkina Faso na Mali - bimaze igihe bihanganye n'inyeshamba ziyitirira idini rya Islam. Mu ndwi iheze, Guinea-Bisau yaratesheje abashaka gutembagaza ubutegetsi, umukuru w'ico gihugu akavuga ko vyari vyateguwe n'imirwi idandaza ibiyayuramutwe. Iki gihugu ni ihuriro ry'inzira ihuza ibihugu vyimbura urumogi rwo mu bwoko bwa cocaine vyo muri Amerika y'Ubumanuko hamwe n'amasoko y'i Bulaya. Mu ndwi iheze, umukuru w'igihugu ca Ghana Nana Akufo-Addo yavuze ko itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi bwa Mali "ryandukiye", rigatera impigi abategetsi ba gisirikare mu bihugu bibanyi vya Afrika y'Uburengero, ivyatumye Guinea na Burkina Faso na vyo bifata iyo nzira. Mu gihe abenshi mu banyagihugu bo muri Afrika y'Uburengero bakiranye igishika aya ma coups d'Etat, ifatwa ry'ubutegetsi n'igisirikare ca Sudani mu kw'icumi ryatumye haduka imyiyerekano itari mike mu gihugu, aho abari muri yo basaba ko hagarukanwa ubutegetsi bwa gisivire. Iyi myiyerekano irarwanywa bikomeye, aho abaharurwa muri mirongo mu bari muri yo bamaze kwicwa. Buri mutegetsi yari muri iyo nama y'Ubumwe bwa Afrika (AU/UA) mu mpera z'indwi iheze i Addis Abeba muri Ethiopia yariyamirije ata kurya umunwa ..."igihuhusi co guhindura ubutegetsi hatisunzwe ibwirizwashingiro", nk'uko bitangazwa n'umukuru w'Inama nkuru y'Ubumwe bwa Afrika ijejwe amahoro n'umutekano, Bankole Adeoye, aho yongerako y'uko ubutegetsi bwa gisirikare budashobora kwihanganirwa. Inyuma y'aho igisirikare gifatiye ubutegetsi, ibihugu vya Burkina Faso, Guinea, Mali na Sudan vyose vyarahagaritswe mu Bumwe bwa Afrika. Adeoye avuga ko ubu ari bwo bwa mbere ingingo nk'iyi ifatirwa ibihugu vyinshi nk'ibi mu kiringo c'amezi 12 gusa. Hagati aho, hari bamwe bidogera AU ko igira nkunzi kubera itahagaritse igihugu ca Tchad gihana urubibe na Sudani, inyuma y'aho igisirikare gifatiye ubutegetsi, igihe Perezida Idriss Déby yicirwa ku rugamba rwo kurwanya inyeshamba mu kwa kane kw'umwaka uheze. Inama nkuru ya gisirikare yaciye igena umuhungu wiwe, Mahamat nk'umukuru w'igihugu mushasha. Mu myaka yakurikiye ukwikukira mu myaka ya 1960 na 70, ibihugu bitari bike vya Afrika vyagiye bihura n'urukurikirane rw'ama coups d'Etat ariko akaba yagiye agabanuka kuva mu myaka ya 1990. Imyaka 20 yakurikiye yabayemwo ama coups d'Etat umunani muri buri kiringo kimwe kimwe c'imyaka cumi, ariko kuva mu 2020 gusa hamaze kuba ama coups d'Etat atandatu. Umunyamakuru wa BBC Kalkidan Yibeltal ari ku mugwa mukuru wa Ethiopia Addis Abeba ahariko habera iyi nama, avuga ko ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Afrika rinegurwa kubera ritakoze ibikwiye kugira ngo ritorere umuti ibibazo vy'umutekano birangwa ku mugabane, harimwo n'intambara yo muri Ethiopia imaze guhitana abanyagihugu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi, abandi nabo baharurwa mu bihumbi amajana bakaba bahanzwe na kigoyi. Adeoye ariyamiriza ibi, akavuga ko AU yitanze kuva umusi wa mbere kandi ko yariko irakora uko ishoboye kwose  mu guhuza impande zompi kugira ngo intambara ihagarare. Mu bindi bibazo, AU yahagaritse ibiganiro vyerekeye ukwinjiza Israel muri iri shirahamwe rya Afrika rigizwe n'ibihugu 55. Mu mwaka uheze, Israel yahawe uburenganzira bwo kwitaba inama nk'umurorerezi - ingingo yateye uburakari mu bihugu bitari bike harimwo Algeria na Afrika y'Epfo. Hari ibindi bihugu bitari bike n'amashirahamwe atari make, harimwo Ubutegetsi bwa Palestina n'Ubushinwa, bisanzwe bifise uburenganzira bwo kwitaba amakoraniro ya AU nk'abarorerezi, ibi bikumvikana ko bidashobora kuja mu matora yo kwemeza canke guhakana ivyemezo vyafashwe.

headline: Burundi-Amatora y'abakenguzamateka: CNL ivuga ko abantu bayo babandanya batotezwa
text: Umugambwe CNL utavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi mu Burundi uvuga ko ibikorwa vy'iterabwoba bibandanya ku banywanyi babo, ingoro zawo nazo zikabandanya zisamburwa. Kubw'abarongoye uyo mugambwe, ivyo bikorwa vy'iterabwoba n'ubwononyi bifise intumbero za politike mu gihe kuri uyu wa 20/07/2020 buca haba amatora y'abakenguzamateka. BBC yagerageje kuvugana numuvugizi w'igipolisi ariko ntibirashoboka gushika ubu. hagati aho, umuvugizi w'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi usaba umugambwe CNL kwitura inzego kugira ngo ushikirize ibibazo vyawo. Umugambwe CNL uza ubugira kabiri mu matora aheruka y'umukuru w'igihugu, abadhingamateka n'abahanuzi b'amakomine yabaye ku wa 20/05/2020, uyu mugambwe ukavuga ko utemera ivyatangajwe n'umurwi CENI. Umuvugizi w'uyo mugambwe, Terence Manirambona, yabwiye BBC ko ibiriko biraba ubu bidatandukanye n'ivyabaye mu matora, aho avuga ko abantu babo bahohotewe, bagapfungwa barementanirijwe. Avuga ko kuva inyuma y'amatora , abanywanyi bawo babandanya batotezwa, bagahagarikwa bagapfungwa ataco bazira,  amazu yabo aturirwa, ingoro zawo nazo zigasamburwa. Avuga ko gushika ubu, ingoro zishika zitanu mu gihugu zimaze kubomorwa mu ntara za Gitega, Rumonge na Muyinga kuva inyuma y'amatora yo ku wa 20/05/2020. Ati: "Muri kino gihe hasigaye iminsi ibiri kugira ngo habe amatora y'abakenguzamateka, abatowe ku rwego rw'abahanuzi b'amakomine, ari nabo bazotora abakenguzamateka, bariko barirukwako, cane cane mu burere umugambwe CNL aho bigaragara ko ushobora kugira ijambo". Atanga akarorero ko muri komine Kayanza y'intara ya Kayanza aho avuga ko hamaze gupfungwa babiri, hamwe no mu gusagara ca Bujumbura avuga ko "babaterefona babategeka ingene bategerezwa gutora". Avuga ko ejo ku wa gatandatu "hari umukenyezi bagiye kurondera, bamubuze baca banyuruza umwana wiwe yagiye gutorwa mu nyuma mu ruzi Kivoga ari ikururuma". Avuga ko abariko bakora ivyo bakoreshwa amanomero atazwi, ariko ko "hari n'ababaterefona bakababwira ko ari abo mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi, bakabwira ko batabatoye bazokwibonerako". Umuvugizi wa CNL avuga ko gushika ubu abanywanyi babo barenga 200 bagipfunzwe, benshi bugururijwe urubanza ariko ata vyagiriji bihari. Mu gihe c'amatora, harabaye uguterana amajambo hagati y'abategetsi hamwe n'abajejwe umutekano ku ruhande rumwe, n'umugambwe CNL ku rundi ruhande. Ubutegetsi bwaragirije abanywanyi b'umugambwe CNL ko bashatse guhungabanya ibikorwa vy'imyiyamamazo n'amatora, ivyo uyo mugambwe wamiriye. Umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri kubutegetsi wowo ubandanya uvugako ibibazo hagati y'imigambwe biganirwako mu nama zihuza abarongoye imigambwe zitegurwa buri kwezi n'ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati. Nancy Ninette Mutoni yabwiye BBC ko ivyo atavyo bazi, kandi ko iyo habaye ingorane vyiza ari uko bokwitura inzego zibijejwe. Ati: "Mu ndwi iheze twari kumwe mu nama i Ngozi, ivyo bibazo ntavyo bashikirije, rero nimba vyabaye inyuma y'iyo nama, barazi inzira bategerezwa kubicishamwo". Hagati aho, CNL yoyo ibona ko ari uruhendo kuko kuko kuri yo imvugo ishikirizwa n'abarongoye umugambwe uri ku butegetsi ntijana n'ingiro ku rubugua. Ku munsi wa mbere, niho abatowe ku rwego rw'abajenama b'amakomine bazokorana kugira ngo bazotore abakenguzamateka.

headline: Italy 0-1 North Macedonia: Giorgio Chiellini ati 'turasambuwe kandi turahonyanzwe'
text: Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru mu Butaliyano Giorgio Chiellini yavuze ko abo bakinana 'bacitse intege' inyuma yo gutsindwa na Macedoine ya ruguru bakananirwa kuja mu gikombe c'isi co mu 2022. Uwo mugwi usanganywe igikombe c'ihiganwa rya Buraya ntuzitaba inkino z'igikombe c'isi ubwa kabiri wikurikiranya inyuma yo kunanirwa kuja mu zabereye mu Burusiya mu 2018. Aleksandar Trajkovski yinjije igitego mu mwanya w'agasunuzo, yatumye haba ku ruhande rumwe umunezero ku rundi na ho amarira. Uwo mukinyi w'inyuma wa Juventus yagize ati: "Igihengeri kinini kizoguma muri twebwe. "Nta hantu na hamwe baturushije muri iri joro kiretse ico gitego. Twaronse amahigwe menshi, ariko ku bw'Imana mbi, ntitwashoboye kwinjiza. Hari umwikomo munini. Kuva mu kwezi kw'icenda gushika ubu, twagiye dukora amakosa, none raba aradukozeko. "Ndishimiye uyu mugwi wakoze uko ushoboe. Nta nkeka ko twasambuwe turanahonyangwa. Nizeye ko iki gihengeri kizoduha inguvu kugira dusubire gutangura bushasha. Umumenyereza w'Ubutaliyano Roberto Mancini yashikanye igihugu ciwe ku munezero ukomeye i Buraya mu gutsinda Ubwongereza mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'ihiganwa rya Buraya ryo mu 2020 mu kwezi kw'indwi, ivyashimiwe cane uwo mumenyereza umugwi wiwe utahabwa amahirwe muri iryo higanwa. Uwo mugwi Azzuri wari wahejeje mw'itsinda ari uwa kabiri inyuma y'Ubusuwise, ugutsindwa na Macedoine ya ruguru bikaba bisigura ko uwo mugwi ufise igikombe ca Buraya ugiye kumara imyaka 12 utagaragaye mu nkino zikomeye z'igikombe c'isi mu mupira w'amaguru. Mancini yagize ati: "Muri iri ci narishimye cane, ubu na ho n'akababaro gakomeye. Biragoye kuvuga. "Ndifadikanije n'abakinyi mu mubabaro. Ni umugwi wakinye neza kandi watsindiye igikombe ca Buraya mw'ici riheze kandi babikwiye. Ndababajwe no kuba batazoja mu gikombe c'isi ku ncuro igira kabiri. "Uwo ni wo mupira w'amaguru. Utsinzwe, utegerezwa kubabara mu gacerere, nta kintu ushobora gukora. "Biragoye kuvuga ku rukino twateye mw'igoli incuro 40 tutinjiza, hanyuma tugatsindwa igitego ku munota wa 92. N'uko bimeze." "Abakinyi bafise kazoza keza, barakomeye kandi bafise na kazoza mu mugwi nserukiragihugu. Ni ibihe bigoye, kandi no muri iyi misi igiye gukurikira ni ko bizoba bimeze. Ni yo mategeko y'umupira." Abajijwe kuri kazoza kiwe, Mancini yagize ati: "Ubu haracari kare kuvuga kuri kazoza. Turacari mu kigandaro. "Nk'umuntu, nshobora kuvuga ko nakunze aba basore uyu munsi gusumba igihe twatsinda mu kwezi kw'indwi. Akababaro ni kenshi." Umukinyi wo hagati w'Ubutaliyano akina muri Chelsea Jorgino yemeye ko bafise uruhara ku vyavuye muri urwo rukino, avuga ati: "Birababaje cane. Ndemeza ko twakinye neza, kuko twatembereje umupira neza kandi turanabarusha gukina, ariko ntitwashoboye kwinjiza. Nta we twotako umwikomo ariko ni ko kuri. "Mu nkino zike ziheze, ntitwashoboye kwinjiza kandi twagiye turakora amakosa yadukozeko, kuko abo twakina baronka igitego bateye mw'igoli gake. Biragoye kuko dutegerezwa kuvyakira. Ntitwashoboye gukora neza - ndabifisemwo uruhara kandi birababaje." Umukinyi wo hagati w'Ubutaliyano Marco Verrati yongeyeko ati: "Biragoye gutegera ivyashitse, kuko birababaje cane. Igitego cabo mu minota y'agasunuzo ni nk'indoto. Uyu mugwi wari ufise amahigwe yo kuja mu gikombe c'isi, rero biragoye gutahura ivyashitse muri iri joro. Twe turazi ko twitanze, ubu mu vy'ukuri ni igihe c'uko twibaza twebwe nyene ibibazo bimwe bimwe." Ubutaliyano bubaye igihugu kigira kane gitwaye igikombe ca Buraya ariko kikananirwa kuja mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi, kikaba gikurikiye Tchécoslovaquie, le Danemark na Grèce.

headline: Qatar 2022: Umubabaro muri Maroc kubera indege zasivye kujana abafana
text: Abafana amajana n'amajana bo muri Maroc  bababajwe cane n'uko indege zari kubajana kurorera  demi-finale  y'igikombe c'isi muri Qatar zankiwe ku munota wa nyuma kuri uyu wa gatatu. Kompanyi y'indege y'igihugu - Royal Air Maroc - yari yategekanije kwongerako izindi ngendo indwi imbere y'urwo rukino. Yari yafashe iyo ngingo inyuma y'aho urwego rw'umupira w'amaguru muri ico gihugu rwemereye guha abafana itike za gusa 13.000 zo kuja kuraba urwo rukino ruhuza Maroc n'Ubufaransa. Ariko ku wa gatatu, yamenyesheje ko abategetsi ba Qatar banse ko izo ngendo zikorwa. Mw'itangazo yarungikiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters, iyo kompanyi yavuze iti : "Royal Air Maroc  iri n'umubabaro wo kumenyesha abakiriya  ifutwa ry'ingendo zayo zikorwa na Qatar Airways". Ntibiramenyekana icatumye abategetsi ba Qatar banka izo ngendo, kandi ibiro bijejwe amakuru muri reta ntibirishura ubusabe bwa BBC bwo kugira ico bivuze. Mu butunwa bwo ku mbuga hwaniro, iyo kompanyi yari yavuze ko izokwiyambaza izindi ngendo 30  'ku kirangaminsi kidasanzwe" zo gufasha abafana gushika muri Qatar. Ariko ibigo vy'ingendo bikorana n'iyo kompanyi mu nyuma vyamenyesheje ko hazoba ingendo indwi gusa. Guhagarika izo ngendo  vyavunye umutima abafarana bari bamaze kugura ama tike bakanafatisha ivyumba vy'amahoteri. Kompanyi yasavye imbabazi yongera yemera gusubiza amafaranga abari barishe ama tike. Hagati aho abanya-Maroc baba hanze bagumye bashika muri Qatar bashwangamuwe no kuba urwego rw'umupira w'amaguru rwemeye ama tike ya gusa yo kwinjira kuraba urwo rukino. Hagereranywa ko abanya-Maroc bashika 5.000.000  (miriyoni 5) baba mu oahanga, benshi muri abi bakaba baba mu Bufaransa. Ariko benshi mu bashitse mu bibanza vy'abafana kuri stade ya Al Janoub - benshi bitwikiriye amabendera y'igihugu  ca Maroc n'inkofero kugira bikingire izuba n'ubushuhe - barakajwe n'uko ama tike bari bemerewe atabonetse. Umwe mu bafana, Zineb Nfati, yabwiye BBC ko yavuye i Paris aje kuraaba urwo rukino, ariko ko atashoboye kuronka itike. Ati: "Uru ni urukino rw'ikimenyetso gikomeye -n'Ubufaransa bukina na Maroc, nanje ndi  inusu y'umufaransa nkaba inusu y'umunya-Maroc. "Ikibi n'uko ata makuru yo kwizera ahari. Naje ndi kumwe na muszanje none sinzi ico ndi bukore...ndavunitse umutima." Ni ubwa mbere igihugu co muru Afrika gishitse kuri urwo rugero, n'ubwo abakurikirana ivy'umupira w'amaguru baha amahirwe menshi Ubufaransa mu kuzokina urukino rwa nyuma na Argentine. Ariko umumenyereza wa Maroc  Walid Regragui - yakuriye i Paris - avuga ko abakinyi biwe biyumva, kandi badakeneye "kurindira iyindi myaka 40 kugira umugwi wo muri Afrika" usanyangane  mu makungu.

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Pogba, De Ligt, Neymar, Torres, Solomon, Diaby
text: Juventus yageze ku mazeserano yo kugarukana umukinyi wo hagati umufaransa Paul Pogba w’imyaka 29 mu masezerano y’imyaka ine inyuma y’aho amasezerano yari afitaniye na Manchester United arangiriye. (Sky Sports) Chelsea yizeye gushika ku masezerano y’umwe mu bakinyi b’inyuma babiri irondera mu gihe ibiganiro bibandanya kuri aba bakinyi mpuzamakungu ba Hollande, Matthijs de Ligt w’imyaka  22 akina muri Juventus, hamwe na Nathan Ake w’imyaka 27 akina muri Manchester City. (Standard) Hahati aho, Bayern Munich yageze ku masezerano yo ku munwa na De Ligt iyi ikaba atari inkuru nziza ku vyo Chelsea yari yizeye. (Sport1 mu kidagi) Umumenyereza Paris St-Germain mushasha Christophe Galtier avuga ko yipfuza y’uko Neymar aguma muri uyu murwi, n’aho hari vyinshi bivugwa kuri kazoza k’uyu musatirizi wa Brezili w’imyaka 30 muri uno murwi. (Metro) Tottenham iracipfuza kugura umukinyi w’inyuma wa Villarreal umunya-Espagne Pau Torres w’imyaka 25, n’aho bakirindiriye ko umufaransa akina inyuma  Clement Lenglet w’imyaka 27 ashika avuye muri Barcelona. (Mirror) Ajax yemereye Tottenham imiriyoni 28 z’amapawuni mu kugerageza kugura umukinyi wo muri Hollande akina ku ruhande Steven Bergwijn w’imyaka 24 muri uyu murwi w’i Londres. (Mail) Fulham iri hafi yo kuronka umukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Israel akina ku ruhande Manor Solomon w’imyaka 22 nk’intizo avuye muri Shakhtar Donetsk. (Athletic) Newcastle nta mugambi ifise wo gutanga imiriyoni 60 z’amapawuni zisabwa na Bayer Leverkusen ku mufaransa akina ku ruhande Moussa Diaby w’imyaka  22. (Telegraph) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Chelsea umwongereza Callum Hudson-Odoi hamwe n’umusatirizi wa Everton umwongereza Anthony Gordon, bompi b’imyaka 21, bararonderwa na Newcastle.(90 Min) Brentford yizeye kwemeza ko yaguze umukinyi w’inyuma wa Ecosse ku miriyoni 18.9 z’amapawundi Aaron Hickey w’imyaka  20 imukuye muri Bologna mw’iyi ndwi. (Guardian) Nottingham Forest yagiriraniye ibiganiro na Bayern Munich mu ntumbero yo kugura umwongereza akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu Omar Richards w’imyaka  24 asanzwe ari ku giciro c’imiriyoni 8.5 z’amapawundi. (Telegraph iciye kuri Nottingham Post) Southampton iri mu biganiro kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi wo hagati wa Nigeria Joe Aribo w’imyaka  25 asanzwe akinira Rangers ku miriyoni 10 z’amapawundi. (Athletic ) Leicester yatanguye ibiganiro na Feyenoord kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi mpuzamakungu wo hagati wa Turukiya Orkun Kokcu w’imyaka 21. (Mail) Bournemouth irarondera umukinyi w’inyuma, umwongereza Nathaniel Phillips w’imyaka  25, ko yosubira muri uyo murwi avuye muri Liverpool ku ntizo. (Football Insider) Everton yatanguye kubaza nimba umukinyi mpuzamakungu w’umusatirizi wa Albania asanzwe akinira Chelsea Armando Broja w’imyaka 20, mu ntumbero yo gusubiriza Richarlison yamaze kwimukira muri Tottenham. (Telegraph) Uwahoze ari umumenyereza wa Tottenham Mauricio Pochettino w’imyaka 50, ariko araraba ingene yosubira muri Premier League inyuma yo kwirukanwa na Paris St-Germain. (Sun) Amasezerano y’umukinyi wo hagati w’Ubutaliyano Jorginho w’imyaka 30 muri Chelsea azorangira mu ci rya 2023, umuserukizi wiwe akavuga ko ibiganiro ku bijanye n’amasezerano mashasha vyiteze gutangura mu kw’icenda. (Tuttomercatoweb kibicishije muri Goal)

headline: Ubwato bubiri bw'intambara bwa Amerika bwaciye mu micungararo ya Taiwan
text: Igisirikare kigwanira mu mazi ca Amerika camenyesheje ko ubwato bubiri bw'intambara bwaco buriko buraca mu micungararo ya Taiwan. Ni ubwa mbere igikorwa nk'ico kibaye kuva habaye imishamirano hagati ya Taiwan n'Ubushinwa bivuye ku rugendo umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ya Reta zunze Ubumbwe za Amerika yagize muri Taiwan mu ntango z'uku kwezi. Mu kwishura, Ubushinwa bwaciye bukoresha imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare muri ako karere. Muri iyi myaka ya vuba, igisirikare ca Amerika n'ica Buraya bigwanira mu mazi vyagumye bifata iyo nzira ica mu micungararo ya Taiwan. Amerika ivuga ko ayo mato abiri yose atera misile zeretswe inzira - USS Antietam na USS Chancellorsville - ariko arerekana uburenganzira bwo guca mu mazi mpuzamakungu. Ubushinwa bufata ibikorwa nk'ivyo nk'agasotoro kandi bukabandanya bwemeza ko iryo zinga rya Taiwan ari igice c'ico gihugu. Ku musi w'Imana, igisirikare c'Ubushinwa cavuze ko kiriko kirakurikiranira hagufi ingendo z'ayo mato, ko kigavye kandi ko citeguriye kwivuna igihe cosotorwa, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru rya Reuters. Mw'itangazo, igisirikare kigwanira mu mazi ca Amerika  cavuze ko guca mu micungararo ya Taiwain vyerekana ko " Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika" zishigikiye ukwishira n'ukwizana no kwisanzura mw'ibahari Pacifique. Iryo tangazo ryongerako riti:"Aya mato yaciye mu muhora uca kure yahagenzurwa n'igihugu ico ari co cose." Umushikiranganji wa Taiwan ajejwe wivuna abansi yavuze ko ayo mato yariko aragenda yerekeza mu bumanuko kandi ko ingabo z'ico gihugu ziriko zirayakurikirana, ariko ko "ibintu vyifashe neza". Taiwan n'igihugu gifise intwaro yaco, ariko Ubushinwa bukibona nk'intara yabwo ishobora kuzosubira kwiyunga na bwo, binakenewe ku nguvu. Taiwan yabaye iyindi ngorane ikomeye hagati ya Amerika n'Ubushinwa muri iyi myaka iheze, aho Amerika igenda yinengesereye kuri ico kibazo. Amerika irubaha politike "y'Ubushinwa bumwe" - umushinge wa diplomasi hagati y'ivyo bihugu bibiri, aho yemera reta imwe y'Ubushinwa - ikaba ifitaniye n'imigenderaniye ku mugaragaro n'Ubushinwa hamwe na Taiwan. Ariko kandi irafitaniye ubucuti "butari ku mugaragaro" n'iryo zinga. Ivyo bikaba birimwo kugurisha ibigwanisho kuri Taiwan kugira ishobore kwivuna.

headline: Umugwi w'abanyepolitike bo mu Bwongereza wasavye irekurwa rya Byabagamba na Rusagara
text: Umugwi ugizwe n'abashingamateka hamwe n'abakenguzamateka batandatu b'Abongereza wandikiye ikete umukuru w'igihugu c'u Rwanda, Paul Kagame, umusaba kurekura abahoze ari intwazangabo babiri bari mw'ibohero. Frank Rusagara - yigeze kuba ajejwe kwivuna abansi mu biro biserukiye u Rwanda mu Bwongereza - na Tom Byabagambe, haciye imyaka itanu bafashwe. Bagirijwe gukwirakwiza ibihuha hamwe no gucafuza isura y'igihugu c'u Rwanda na leta yaco. Sentare ya gisirikare yabakatiye ibifunga vy'imyaka 20 na 21 uko bakurikirana. Aba banyepolitike bo mu Bwongereza, bagizwe n'abashingamateka hamwe n'abakenguzamateka, bavuga ko ivyo bipfungo bikabije ugereranije n'ivyo baregwa. Bavuze ko batewe impungenge n'amagara y'abapfunzwe, bagasaba Prezida Kagame kubarekura ku bw'ikigongwe. Ibicishije ku bushikiranganji bujejwe ubutungane, leta y'u Rwanda yanditse ikete isubiza uwaserukiye umugwi w'abo bashingamateka b'Ubwongereza. Mw'iryo keye, ubwo bushikirangani bwavuze ko mu gihe ivyo basaba vyokurikizwa hoba habaye kwivanga mu biraba ubutungane. Ngo ivyo navyo leta canke umukuru w'igihugu ntibashobora kubikora kuko kwoba ari guhonyanga amategeko. Iryo kete risoza rivuga ko ku vyerekeye kurekurwa ku bw'ikigongwe, amategeko y'u Rwanda abitegekanya mu gihe uwuregwa abisavye.

headline: T﻿anzania: Reta isaba amakungu kuyifasha kugira ihungure impunzi z'Abarundi
text: Tanzania iriko isaba amakungu n’amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu ko yoyifasha kugira ngo ishobore guhungura impunzi z’Abarundi zirenga 120.000. Abegwa n’umugambi wo guhungurwa ni abari mu makambi yo mu ntara ya Kigoma ihana urubibe n’Uburundi, mu burengero bwa Tanzania. Izi mpunzi ziri mu makambi ya Nduta na Nyarugusu zozo zivuga ko zimaze igihe zitorohewe kubera igitsure zivuga ko ziterwa kugira ngo zitahuke. Mw’ijambo yashikirije mw’ikoraniro rigira 73 ya komite nshingwabikorwa y’ishami rya ONU ryitaho impunzi kw’isi (UNHCR) i Geneva mu Buswisi, umushikiranganji ajejwe intwaro yo hagati wa Tanzania, Hamad Masauni, yavuze ko Uburundi bukeneye gufatwa mu mugongo mu ntumbero yo guhimiriza no kworohereza abashaka guhunguka ku bushake bwabo. Ati: “Kugira ngo uwu mugambi ushoboke, ni ngombwa ko ibintu vyose bimera neza mu Burundi. “Ikintu nyamukuru ni ugushigikira Uburundi kugira ngo abarondera ubuhungiro muri Tanzania bumve ko igihugu cabo ari bwo bukiriro bwabo”. Mu myaka ya 2006 na 2007, Tanzania yarahaye ubwenegihugu impunzi zababa 160.000 ziri mu makambi ya Katumba, Ulyankulu na Mishamo mu ntara za Tabora na Katavi, harimwo impunzi zahunze indyane zo mu 1972, abatari bake usanga batazi iwabo mu Burundi. Impunzi ziri mu makambi ya Kigoma zirwiriyemwo izahunze indyane za poritike zadutse mu 2015  biturutse ku ngingo y’uwahoze ari umukuru w’igihugu ico gihe, Perezida Petero Nkurunziza, yo kwitoreza ikiringo kigira gatatu. Ariko abatari bake baramaze gutahuka mu mugambi wo guhungura impunzi ku bushake bwabo, ariko hari n’abandi babona ko hataragera ko bahunguka. Mu gihe abatari bake muri bo bafise ubwoba ko bashobora guhungurwa ku nguvu, reta ya Tanzania yoyo gushika ubu ivuga ko umugambi wo guhungura impunzi ubu ukorwa ku bushake bwabo. Hagati aho, impunzi zivuga ko imigambi zafatiwe mu makambi be n’amajambo zibwirwa n’abategetsi batandukanye b’iki gihugu kibahaye indaro bitabahumiriza. Babona ko bashobora guhungurwa ku nguvu mu gihe bo babona hatari bwagere ko bahunguka, kuko bavuga ko ubutegetsi bahunze ari bwo bugihari. Umwe mu mpunzi wo mw'ikambi ya Nduta yabwiye BBC ati: “Ntitwanka igihugu, kuko nico catuvyaye, ariko ntidushaka kuja kwisuka ku risongoye. "Dusaba ko izi nguvu bagomba gukoresha mu kuduhungura ku nguvu ko bozijana mu Burundi bakagondoza irya reta kugira ngo ishireho icizere, maze dushobora gutahuka ata bwoba”.

headline: Lionel Messi: kubera iki uyu kizigenza avuga ko yarambiwe na Barcelona?
text: Nk'uko bivugwa n'iradiyo yo muri Espanye, Cadena Ser, kizigenza w'umurwi wa Barcelona yahagaritse ibiganiro vyo kwongereza amasezerano kubera yananiwe n'ukwihanganira ibihuha n'amajambo avuga ko ari umwe mu batera imigumuko muri uyo murwi. Messi ababajwe n'ibintu bitari bike bivugwa mu murwi wiwe wa Barcelona muri kino gihe. Yumva y'uko yaruhijwe n'uko yagirizwa ko ari we atwara uyo murwi, ko ari we atanga akazi kandi akabogoza abamenyereza, ko ari we atanga amategeko mu bijanye no kugura abakinyi kandi ko ari we ahitamwo abakina, aruhishijwe n'uburongozi bw'uyo murwi muri rusangi hamwe n'amakosa bakora mu bijanye no kugura abakinyi. Ngo iyo vyakabereye ni kera! Ikiganiro c'iyo radio El Larguero  kimenyesha ko uyu mukinyi yamaze kumenyesha uyu murwi ko ihiganwa ryo mu mwaka uza rirangiye azoca agenda. None ni ibiki biri muri uyo murwi? Nivyo tugiye guca irya n'ino. Messi aragirizwa ko yari yashatse ko umurwi wiwe ugura umukinyi w'umufaransa Antoine Griezmann yakinira Atletico Madrid, ariko y'uko muri kino gihe adashaka kumubona. Ibi ngo si vyo. Twirengagije ivyo umupira, Griezmann yama ari kumwe na Messi hamwe na Luis Suarez, bari kumwe n'abagore babo kugira basangirire hamwe, kandi imigenderanire yabo ni myiza cane, n'aho Griezmann atarashobora kuronka amahirwe menshi yo gutsinda ibitsindo vyinshi. Ahubwo ikiriho Messi na Suarez babandanya bamufasha kugira ngo amenyere umukino wa Barcelona. Ku bijanye n'uburongozi, yagirizwa ko ari we yatumye uwahoze amenyereza uyo murwi Tata Martino yirukanwa maze uwusanzwe awumenyereza muri kino gihe, Quique Setien, aronswa akazi ngo kuko yiyumvamwo umukino wiwe. N'ibi ngo sivyo. Nk'umukinyi wa mbere ahembwa neza muri uyo murwi, ibihuha nk'ibi vyama bivyuka kandi nivyo y'uko iyo hageze ko hafatwa ingingo zikomeye zerekeye imishahara, abakinyi rurangiranwa barababaza. Ivyo rero niko bimeze, kandi si ikintu kidasanzwe muri Barcelona, mbere bitagenze uko hoba habayemwo ugufata ibintu minenerwe.' Ariko ukuri ni uko hari ingorane zigoye gutorerwa umuti. Kimwe mu bibazo nyamukuru ni uko umukuru w'uyo murwi Josep Maria Bartomeu hari ivyo yemeye gukora ariko yananiwe n'ugushitsa. Ubwa mbere, yari yemeye ko yari kugarukana mu murwi umukinyi Neymar, mu gihe ahubwo yari azi neza ko yari agiye kugura umukinyi Griezmann. Ikindi, yemeye ko yari kwirukana Ernesto Valverde kugira ngo azanye Xavi, ariko ikiriho ni uko impande zompi, ni ukuvuba Barca na Xavi bari bamaze kwemeranya ko badashobora gusubira gukorana. Amasezerano Messi afitaniye n'uyo murwi muri kino gihe asanzwe afise ikigabane kimwemerera gushobora kuva muri uyo murwi mu gihe azorangirira. N'aho muri rusangi amerewe neza mu mibereho yiwe muri kino gihe - kumbure mbere no gusumba no mu myaka iheze - umutima nturi mu nda ku burongozi bw'uyo murwi. Wewe ashaka ko umurwi wiwe utsinda cane cane ku rwego rw'umugabane wa Bulaya. Rero mu gihe yokwerekana amadidane kuri kazoza kiwe, ni ngombwa ko uburongozi bwicara bugatora inyishu - iyo nayo si iyindi, ni ugukerebuka bakagura abakinyi beza. Ibiganiro vyo kwongereza amasezerano vyariko biragenda neza. Ariko uyo mukinyi akomoka muri Argentine ntiyishimiye umwimbu mubi mu kibuga, mbere n'icizere kuri Setien kigenda kigabanuka mu gice kinini c'abakinyi. Ibintu vyagiye kwunyuka inyuma y'urukino rwo ku wa gatandatu w'indwi iheze na Celta Vigo rwagiye kurangira iyo mirwi yompi inganije 2-2, ivyatumye intumbero yo gutsindira ihiganwa ija muri kabaza. Harabaye uguterana amajambo hagati ya Setien na bamwe mu bakinyi bakomakomeye ba Barcelona. Asa n'uwihebuye kubera atashoboye gukora vyinshi muvyo yari yiteze gukora igihe ashika muri uyo murwi, uyo mumenyereza, yarashwanye cane. Yabwiye abakinyi ko ibintu bidashobora kubandanya uko bimeze, kandi ko nimba babishatse bomubwira akigira mu gihe ibintu bitohinduka. Si ukuvuga ko yashatse gutanga imihoho, ariko ni inzira yo gusaba ko hotorwa inyishu. Inyishu yahavuye iboneka. Haciye hatangura ibiganiro hagati ya Setien na ba kizigenza, hamwe kandi na Bartomeu, kandi ibintu vyaciye bitangura gufata umurongo. Gerard Pique, umwe muri ba  kizigenza akaba mbere n'umuntu w'umwizigirwa, yacishije ubutumwa kuri Twitter asaba ubumwe mu bagize umurwi hamwe no mu bakunzi bawo. Hagati aho, mu gihe hakiri icuka atari ciza mu burongozi mbere n'umumenyereza agashobora wirukanwa, mu gihe co kugiriranira amasezerano n'abakinyi, mu gihe ibindi biganiro vyari vyitezwe, Messi wewe ntiyavyoroheje mu kwerekana amakenga yiwe, n'aho vyavuzwe n'iradiyo. Ico kwibuka ni uko uyo murwi atari bwo bwa mbere uja mu mayira abiri kuva muri kahise iyo bishitse Messi agashaka kuwuvamwo. Mu ntango z'umwuga wiwe, umurwi Inter Milan w'Ubutaliyano habuze gato ngo umunyakure igihe umenyesha ko igiciro ciwe c'imiliyoni 150 y'amadorari kitari ikibazo, kandi ko yari yiteguye kugwiza incuro zitatu umushahara wiwe. Ico gihe mbere yari agikwegana amatwi n'abategetsi ba Espanye arondera ibimuranga kugira ngo ashobore gukinira muri ico gihugu, kandi ntiyari bwanabe umukinyi yizigiwe muri Barcelona. Amajambo ya gishingantahe w'uwari arongoye umurwi ico gihe, Joan Laporta, yahinduye ibintu. Messi, we nyene ubwiwe akaba atashaka kugenda, yagumye muri uwi murwi. Ku ncuro igira gatatu, Barcelona yinjiye mu kibazo gikomeye mu gihe abayirongoye babuze ico bafata n'ico bareka, Messi nawe akaba yarabamenyesheje neza icipfuzo ciwe. Nk'uko yari yavyiketse mu ntango, Barcelona iboneka ko ata nguvu yari ifise yo gutsindira ihiganwa rya Bulaya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Eufa Champions League). Hampande y'ico, vyaranse ko igura umusatirizi wa Argentine Lautaro Martinez, n'aho aboneka ko asa n'umukinyi Barcelona ikeneye kugira ngo igume ku rugero rwo hejuru. Mu murwi hoho gushika ubu baracafise icizere ko bashobora kumuronka. Mu gihe hari iciyumviro kibandanya ko Xavi ashobora kugaruka muri Barcelona kugira ngo awubere umumenyereza, Victor Font ashaka kwitoza kurongora uyo murwi mu 2021, yaratangaje izuba riva ko ikintu ca mbere yokora ari ukuzana Xavi kugira amenyereze Barcelona. N'aho Xavi aboneka ko ashobora kwakirizwa yompi kugira ngo anagure umukino wa Barcelona, igikorwa nyamukuru coba kirindiriye uyo yahoze ari kizingenza wayo kwoba ukuraba nimba ashobora gutorera umuti ibibazo biyihanze, nk'umurwi wabaye rurangiranwa kw'isi ariko uriko utera wegereza iminsi yawo yanyuma. Mu kurindira, Messi wewe abandanya abihweza, akaba arindiriye amaherezo yavyo.

headline: Abanyagihugu ba Bujumbura bazindukiye mu myiyerekano biyamiriza umurwi w'abatimbo bari mu Rwanda
text: Abatimbo b'abarundi bavuga ko biyamiriza u Rwanda bakarwagiriza ko rwabivye ingoma zagiye kuvugirizwa mw'ihiganwa "East Africa's Got Talent" mu gihugu ca Kenya. Mu myiyerekano yatumweko n'umukuru w'igisagara ca Bujumbura kuri uyu wa gatandatu, abari muri yo bagiriza ico gihugu ko civye akaranga n'imico vy'Uburundi. Mu mpera z'indwi iheze, umurwi witwa Himbaza Club ugizwe n'Abarundi bahungiye mu Rwanda bari kumwe na bamwe mu banyarwanda basanze bazi kuvuza ingoma,  wabonetse uri muri iryo higanwa uvuza ingoma z'Uburundi. Abatunganije iryo higanwa bavuga ko abaryitavye bataserukiye igihugu na kimwe, ko ahubwo bagiye ku gatwe kabo. Abari muri iyo myiyerekano  barenga 50.000, bari bitwaje ivyandiko vyiyamiriza u Rwanda. Bimwe biti: "Twebwe abatimbo turiyamirije umurwi w'igihugu c'Urwanda wivye ingoma z'Uburundi ukongera ukaja kuzivugiriza mu mahiganwa hahonyanzwe amategeko ndangakaranga". Abatimbo bo mu Burundi batazoshobora kwihanganira umuntu uwo ari we wese canke igihugu ico ari co cose kizoshaka kwiyitirira ingoma z'Uburundi habanje guhonyangwa amategeko azigenga. Dunia Abedi yaserukiye abatimbo bari muri iyo myiyerekano, avuga ko uyo murwi utitavye iryo higanwa ufise intumbero y'ukwerekana ishusho y'Uburundi biciye mu migirwa ijanye n'ingoma z'Uburundi, haba mu nyambaro no mu bindi bijanye. Bwana Abedi avuga ko umurwi wagiye kuvuza izo ngoma wagiye k'uwuserukira u Rwanda, aho guserukira Uburundi. Leta y'Uburundi yagirije igihugu c'u Rwanda ko ryarungitse uyo murwi hatisunzwe amategeko agenga ingoma z'u Burundi. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'umushikiranganji w'inkino n'imicokama, Pelate Niyonkuru, leta ivuga ko ingoma z'u Burundi ari itunga kama  ryitirirwa Uburundi, "ridatizwa canke ngo rigurishwe" kandi ko "ata n'umwe arekuriwe kugerageza kuryiyitirira ndetse ngo yihe ububasha bwo kurikoresha mu nzira zidahuye n'imico n'imigenzo y'abarundi". Hagati aho, Alphonse Rugambarara yigeze kuba umushikiranganji w'inkino n'imicokama, avuga ko ivyo vyatumwe n'ingorane za politike, akavuga mu bihugu vyose birimwo Abarundi benshi usanga hariyo imirwi y'abavuzi b'ingoma nk'iyo. Abatunganije ihiganwa East Africa's Got Talent bavuga ko bafashe nka nkama umubabaro werekanywe n'Abarundi kuri uyo murwi w'impunzi z'Abarundi bavugije umurisho w'ingoima w'ico gihugu muri iryo higanwa. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe na Clouds Media International FZ LLC rihagarikiye iryo higanwa, hamwe na Rapid Blue iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko iryo higanwa ryari ryugururiwe uwo ari we wese aba mu bihugu vya Kenya, Uganda, u Rwanda na Tanzania bataravye ibihugu bavamwo. "Abo batimbo babaye mu Rwanda hakurikijwe amategeko, rero bakaba bemerewe kwinjira muri iryo higanwa". Iryo tangazo rivuga ko imirwi yinjira muri ku gatwe kayo, kandi ko bemeza neza y'uko ata gikino na kimwe cigeze gikinwa ku gatwe k'igihugu kanaka.

headline: Germany: uyu musi ni amatora yo kurangiza imyaka 16 y’ubutegetsi bwa Angela Merkel
text: Ubutegetsi bwari bumaze imyaka 16 yose bugiye kurangira mu Budagi. Abadagi bari mu matora y'inama nshingamateka mu rugamba rutoroshe rwo kurondera umusubirizi w'umushikiranganji wa mbere yari amaze igihe kinini ku butegetsi. Kuri uyu wa Mungu, igenekerezo rya 26 z'ukw'icenda, Abadagi bari mu matora arangiza ubutegetsi bwa reta yari irongowe na Angela Merkel. Amatora yatanguye isaha zibiri z'igitondo (8:00) bikaba vyitezwe ko arangira isaha icumi na zibiri z'umugoroba (18:00). Hari vyinshi biteye inkeke ku vyerekeye ibizova mu matora,  ariko ikizwi coco ni kimwe: uwuzotsinda amatora uwo ari we wese, ni ngombwa ko ashinga reta ihuriwemwo na bose. Vyitezwe ko imigambwe ishika itatu ari yo ishobora kuronka ibibanza bikwiye mu nama nshingamateka y'Ubudagi, izwi nka Bundestag, ari nayo ishobora kuzotora umushikiranganji wa mbere mushasha (chancelier/chancellor). Dutahuzanye mu majambo make kandi aciriye hagufi ingene amatora agenda mu Budagi n'ingene bigenda gushika hashingwe reta nshasha. Abadagi baja mu matora kugira ngo batore abashingamateka mu nama nshingamateka y'igihugu, Bundestag. N'aho kuri uyu musi buri muntu yitaba ku biro vy'itora kugira ngo atange ijwi ryiwe, itora hakoreshejwe amabahasha riza ryaramaze gutangura. Abadagi bashika imiriyoni 60.4 bakwije imyaka 18 ni bo bashobora gutora. Bundestag igizwe n'imiburiburi n'abashingamateka 598, ariko akenshi bararenga. N'aho mw'ijoro ry'uyu musi umugambwe uzotahukana intsinzi uza kumenyekana, gushinga reta nshasha bizofata umwanya utari muto kuko bisaba ko umugambwe watsinze amatora uzobanza kurondera iyindi migambwe igiranira urunani na wo kugira ngo ushobore kugira ubwiganze mu nama nshingamateka. Ibi bizotuma habanza guca igihe kitari gito kugira ngo izina ry'umushikiranganji wa mbere mushasha azosubirira Angela Merkel rimenyekane. Mu bisanzwe, umugambwe ufise intebe nyinshi mu yigize urunani ni wo ugena umushikiranganji wa mbere. Ariko gushinga urunani birafata umwanya kuko imigambwe yose irugize itegerezwa kubanza kwumvikana igashika ku masezerano y'ingene abashikiranganji bazogenwa. Bamaze kwumvikana ku bintu vyose, niho rero abagize inama nshingamateka baca bakorana kugira ngo bemeze umushikiranganji wa mbere mushasha. Iyo Abadagi bagiye mu matora, batora ibintu bibiri. Ica mbere, batora umushingamateka w'akarere. Hari uburere bw'amatora (circonscriptions électorales/ electoral districts) bushika ku  299 ; ibi bivuga ko umushingamateka umwe aserukira hafi abantu 250.000. Umukandida yaronse amajwi menshi ni we atsindira intebe mu nama nshingamateka. Aya yitwa "amatora ya mbere". Mu matora agira kabiri, azwi nk' "amatora ya kabiri", abatora batora intonde z'imigambwe muri buri reta. Rero ibi bibanza 299 bisigaye bigenda bigabaganywa bivanye n'amajwi muri mugambwe wagiye uronka. Rero umukandida ari ku rutonde aronka ikibanza mu nama nshingamateka hakurikijwe urutonde rwatanzwe n'umugambwe wiwe. Uku rero niko Bundestag ishingwa. Kugira ngo umugambwe uronke ikibanza mu nama nshingamateka utegerezwa kuronka n'imiburiburi amajwi 5% mu matora agira kabiri. Ibi vyateguwe uku kugira ngo imigambwe mito mito, akenshi usanga igendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze ntije mu yigize ubutegetsi. Rero, ufatiye ku kungene amatora ateguwe mu Budagi, inama nshingamateka ishingiye ahanini ku vyavuye mu matora agira kabiri. Kuri ivyo rero, amatora agira niyo yerekana ibibanza buri mugambwe ushobora kugira muri Bundestag hamwe n'amahirwe ushobora kugira muri reta. Iki ni igice kitoroshe gutahura. Igitigiri c'intebe mu nama nshingamateka kirashobora kwiyongera iyo hari ubusumbane hagati y'ivyavuye mu matora ku mugambwe umwe umwe muri ano matora abiri. Aha rero, aho kugirwa n'abashingamateka 598, ishobora kugirwa n'abashingamateka 709. Inama nshingamateka ya kino gihe yari igizwe n'abashingamateka 730. Dufatire ku karorero k'ibishobora gushika mu mugambwe kanaka: Nk'akarorero, umugambwe CDU uronse intebe 110 mu matora ya mbere yo mu burere, hanyuma ugaca uronka intebe 100 mu matora agira kabiri y'intonde z'imigambwe. Muri iki gihe, CDU izosanga ifise intebe 10 irengeje ku zo yategerezwa kuronka, ufatiye ku matora agira kabiri, ari yo akomeye cane. Rimwe na rimwe, abatora barashobora gushima umukandida, ari na we atorwa mu ya mbre, ariko ugasanga ntibashimye umugambwe wiwe ntibawutore mu matora agira kabiri. Dufatiye kuri aka karorero, vyumvikana ko CDU izogumana izi ntebe 10 zirenzeko, zizwi nka Überhangmandate, canke "intebe z'inyongera". Kuri ivyo, CDU izosanga ifise intebe 10 zirenze ku zo yategerezwa kugira nk'umugambwe, bikayiha akarusho gasa n'uko umengo irenganije iyindi. Rero kugira no ntihabe nkunzi, iyindi migambwe ica ironswa icitwa Ausgleichsmandate, canke "intebe z'indishi y'akababaro". Ibi bica bituma ibitigiri vy'abashingamateka bava mu yindi migambwe vyiyongera bivanye n'amajwi baronse. Dufatiye kuri aka karorero, ibibanza bitegerezwa kwiyongera ku rugero rwa 10% vy'ivyavuye mu matora kugira ngo bakosore ubu busumbane. Abatsinze n'abatsinzwe baza kumenyekana inyuma y'amasaha make ibiro vy'amatora vyugaye. Ni nako vyagenze mu matora y'inama nshingamateka aheruka mu 2017, igihe Angela Merkel ashikiriza ijambo ritaryoshe yerekana ko umugambwe wiwe waronse amajwi make. Ariko gushinga reta bishobora kurangwamwo impari nyinshi bigatuma ibiganiro bifata indwi zitari nke kugira ngo bashike ku masezerano. Ni nako vyagenze mu 2017, igihe umugambwe CDU, umugambwe L'Alliance 90/Les Verts ukunze kwitwa The Greens,  hamwe n'uumgambwe FDP inaniriwe no gushinga urunani.

headline: Francine Niyonsaba, umwe mu bagore 30 b'ibihangange muri Afrika
text: Francine Niyonsaba, umwe mu bagore 30 b'ibihangange muri Afrika, yavuganye na BBC Gahuzamiryango. Kurikirana ikiganiro c'Abakenyezi aho Francine Niyonsaba, Umurundikazi rurangiranwa mu kwiruka imetero 800, aganira na Florentine Kwizera.

headline: Ingene twumva ico dukozeko n'ubushuhe vyaronse agashimwe ka Nobel
text: Abahinga batoye ingene imibiri yacu yumva ubushuhe canke uguhoberwa n'uwo ukunda batsindiye agashimwe ka Nobel. David Julius na Ardem Patapoutian bo muri reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, basangiye ako gashimwe ko mu gisata c'ubuvuzi n'ico kwiga ingene ingingo z'umubiri zikora (physiologie) kubera igikorwa cabo ku kwumva ico ukozeko canke kigukozeko  hamwe n'ubushuhe. Batoye ingene bigenda kugira imibiri yacu ihindure ico umubiri wumva hari ikiwukozeko mu butumwa bw'umuyagankuba (amashanyarari) buca buja mu nzira z'ubwonko. Ivyo batoye bishobora gushika ku nzira nshasha z'ingene hagwanywa ububabare. Ubushuhe, imbeho (ubukonje) bifise ikibanza gikomeye mu kwumva ibiri iruhande yacu kugira dushobore  kubaho. Ariko ingene umubiri wacu ubikora canke ubigenza vyari bikiri  amayobera mu cigwa c'ubuzima (biologie). Abavumbuye Hepatite C bahawe igihembo cya Nobel Igihembo cy'amahoro cya Nobel cyahawe PAM Thomas Perlman, wo mu mugwi w'abatanga agashimwe ka Nobel, yavuze ati: "Ivyatowe ni ibintu bikomeye kandi vyimbitse cane." Yongerako ati: "Ibi vy'ukuri vyuguruye bimwe mu vyari bikiri ibinyegezwa ku bibaho". Ivyo Professeur David Julius yashitseko kuri kaminuza ya California, San Fransisco, vyavuye mu bushakashatsi ku bubare twumva iyo turiye ipiripiri ibaba, ico umuntu yovuga nk'ubumara (chemical ) bwitwa capsaicin. Yakoze ku nkomoko canke isoko ry'ukubaba mw'ipiripiri. Yatoye igice cihariye cakira/cumva  (recepteur) (nk'ikigize  uturemangingo  twacu twumva ibintu biri iruhande yacu)   ari naco giheza kigatanga ubutumwa ko  cumvise capsaicin. Ibindi bipimo vyerekanye ko iyo recepteur itanga ubutumwa ko yumvise ubushuhe kandi bubaye bwinshi ikabimenyesha. Ibi nivyo bishika , nk'akarorero, iyo intoke zituriwe n'igikombe c'icayi. Ivyo yatoye vyamushikanye ku  gutora utundi duce twinshi twakira canke twumva ubushuhe. Iyo uriko uraca ku musenyi ukawumva munsi y'ibirenge vyawe - izo 'recepteurs' nizo ziba zirungitse ubutumwa mu bwonko. Umugwi utanga agashimwe ka Nobel wavuze ko "Ubwo bumenyi buriko burakoreshwa mu kurondera ingene hovurwa ibiva ku ndwara zitandukanye harimwo ububabare buguma bugaruka." Abo babiri bazogabura ako gashimwe gaciye miriyoni cumi z'amafaranga ya Suede ( arenga umuriyoni w'ama dorari). Agashimwe ka Nobel gahabwa umuntu yagize igikorwa gifasha abantu mu kubaho kwabo. Ako gashimwe kitiriwe Alfred Nobel, umunya-Suede yatoye dynamite (bakoresha nko  mu guturitsa ibibuye binini binini nk'iyo bariko baraca/barubaka  amabarabara.

headline: Ibihugu vya Afrika vyumvikanye gukorera hamwe mu guhangana na coronavirus
text: Mu gihe abahitanwa n'umugera wa coronavirus bagenda biyongera kw'isi, abashikiranganji bari bateranije i Addis-Abeba ku cicaro c'umuryango wa ibihugu vya Afrika bavuyeho bumvikanye  gukorera hamwe mu guhanahana amakuru be no gucungera uruja n'uruza. Gushika ubu, umuntu umwe gusa akomoka muri Misiri niwe amaze kumenyekana ko yanduye coronavirus ku mugabane wa Afrika, ariko na we nyene ubu yarakize. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, umukuru w'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, yaribukije abari bakoraniye i Addis-Abeba ati: "Ikituraje ishinga ni uko coronavirus itoshika mu bihugu atako vyifashe mu bijanye n'amagara y'abantu". Ikigo ca Afrika kijejwe gukinga indwara kimenyesha ko ubu umugabane wa Afrika witeguye neza guhangana n'uwo mugera gusumba uko vyari bimeze haciye ukwezi. Muganga Tedros yanatangarije abari muri iyo nama ko John Nkengasong, arongoye ikigo kijejwe kurwanya indwara muri Afrika, hamwe na Samba Sow, arongoye ikigo kijejwe gukora imiti y'urukingo muri Mali, bagenywe nk'intumwa zidasanzwe mu kurwanya umugera coronavirus. Gushika ubu mu bihugu birenga 25 vya Afrika, hari abaganga barenga ibihumbi cumi bamaze kuronswa inyigisho, haratangwa n'ibikoresho vyo gupima, nayo ugucungera uruja n'uruza bikaba vyarakomejwe.
