Harashinzwe kandi n'umurwi w'abahinga karuhariwe muvyo ubuvuzi ujejwe gutabara mu buryo bwihuse cane mu gihe hogira umuntu amenyekana ko yanduye uwo mugera. Muganga Tedros yavue ko ishirahamwe OMS rifishe ishaka ryinshi ryo gukorana n'ibihugu vyose vya Afrika kugira ngo ibishoboka vyose bikorwe mu ntumbero yo kurwanya uwo mugera ruhonyabantu.

headline: Anglican ya UK yabujije umukobwa wa Desmond Tutu kuyobora ibirori vyo gushingura
text: Ishengero rya Anglican ishami ry’Ubwongereza ryabujije umukobwa w’umuhisi Desmond Tutu kuyobora ibirori vyo guhamba kubera yubakanye n’umugore nka we. Mpho Tutu van Furth ni umupasitori mw’ishengero Anglican muri diyoseze ya Washington, akaba yari yasabwe kuyobora imisa yo guhamba uwari umuvyeyi wiwe w'ibatisimu, Martin Kenyon, ahitwa Shropshire mu Bwongereza ejo ku wa kane. Tutu van Furth yabwiye BBC ko kumwankira “bisa n’ubugome kandi bibabaje”. Diyoseze ya Hereford ivuga ko vyari "ibintu bitoroshe". Ishengero rya Anglican ishami ry’Ubwongereza (Church of England) ntiryemerera abavugabutumwa baryo ko barongorana n’abo basangiye ibitsina kuko inyigisho ritanga ari uko ukwubakana biba hagati y’umugabo n’umugore. Hagati aho, ishengero rya Anglican rigenzi ryaryo muri Amerika, rizwi nka Église épiscopalienne des États-Unis /The Episcopal Church, riremerera abavugabutumwa baryo kwubakana n’abo basangiye ibitsina. Itangazo rya Diyosezi ya Hanoford rivuga riti: "Hatanzwe impanuro hisunzwe aho inama y’Abepiskopi ihagaze ku bijanye n’abarongorana basangiye ibitsina”. Uwahoze ari musenyeri wa Liverpool, Paul Bayes asanzwe ari mu bahimiriza ko ishengero rihindura aho rihagaze ku bijanye n’igitsina, avuga ko “atari vyiza kuvuga ngo ibintu ntivyoroshe”. "Ni ngombwa ko vuba bwango kami ka muntu, umwitwarariko mu butumwa, hamwe n’urukundo, bihabwa ikibanza”. Umuryango wa Kenyon umaze kubwirwa iyi ngingo y’Urusengero, waciye wimura igisabisho co gusezera ikivana kw’isengero St Michael ikijana kuri All Angels ahitwa Wentnor, hafi y’ikigo ca Musenyeri, ahantu hazwi cane, hafi y’aho uyu muvugabutumwa aba kugira ngo umupfasoni Tutu van Furth ashobore guhagarikira iki gisabisho avuge n’ubutumwa. Tutu van Furth  yabwiye BBC ati: "Birababaje cane. Vyumvikana ko ari ingingo y’abategetsi ba ruburakigongwe." Kenyon yari incuti ya hafi cane n’uwahoze ari musenyeri mukuru muri Afrika y’Epfo umuhisi Desmond Tutu. Tutu van Furth yategetswe guhagarika ivyo kuvuga ubutumwa nka pasitori muri Afrika y’Epfo inyuma y’aho yubakaniye n’umugore nkawe, Marceline van Furth, umwigisha wa kaminuza wo mu Buholande, mu 2015. Se wiwe Desmond Tutu - yitavye Imana muri Kigarama (12) 2021 - yaratsindiye agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel mu 1984 kubera  uruhara yagize mu kurwanya ya ntwaro y’ivangura ya apartheid muri Afrika y’Epfo. Nawe nyene yararwaniye uburenganzira bw’abahuza ibitsina babisangiye yongera ashigikira ukurongorana hagati y’abasangiye ibitsina. Mu 2013 yavuze ati: Nopfuma mpeba kuja mw’ijuru ryanka abatinganyi. Oya, novuga nti mbabarira, nshaka kuvuga ko nopfuma nja mu kindi kibanza. “Sinosenga Imana yanka abatinganyi kandi uku niko ndavyumva cane”. Yongeyeko ati: " Muri rino sekeza, mfise ishaka nk’iryo nari mfise mu kurwanya apartheid. Kuri jewe, bimeze co kimwe”.

headline: Coronavirus: Igituma gukaraba intoke bigoye mu bihugu bimwe bimwe
text: Mu gihe mu bihugu vya Buraya hamwe n'ibindi bikize ubuzima busa n'ubwahagaze mu ntumbero yo guhangana na coronavirus, ku ma miriyoni y'abantu nta cizere c'uko bazoshobora gukurikirikiza impanuro za OMS nko gukaraba intoke no kutegerana. Abantu baharugwa ku muriyaridi baba mu tuzu tw'utururi bakaba bagize 30% vy'ababa mu bisagara kw'isi. Ayo mazu babamwo atanga akayaga gake, kandi nta  nzira y'imicafu afise, bigatuma ingwara zikwiragira vyoroshe. Celestine Adhiambo, w'imyaka  43 aba mu gace ka Mukuru karimwo amazu aciriritse cane i Nairobi n'umugabo wiwe hamwe n'abana 6. Inzu y'umuryango igizwe n'icumba kimwe abamwo ntifise amazi n'umuyagankuba. Avuga ko abana biwe badashobora kuyigendagendamwo badacanyeko. Yabariye BBC ati: ''Ntivyodushobokera ko umwana atandukanywa n'uwundi mu gihe hokwaduka ubwandu. Nta kibanza dufise. Nta cumba kiri ngaha. Leta yari ikwiye gutwara kwa muganga abanduye." Umugabo wiwe akora nk'umubaji kandi ku minsi akora yinjiza amashilingi 400 y'ama Kenya, n'ukuvuga amahera y'amongereza 3,15 kandi umuryango wiwe ukoresha amashilling 50 mu kugura utudobo cumi tw'amazi. Ariko ibigo bitanga amazi ntibimenyerwa,  kandi mu misi ata mazi abonetse, umuryango usanga uhevye kwoga kwo gucishako wari ubimenyereye. Mu gace ka Mukuru haba abantu igice c'umuliyoni kirenga. Amazu yaho akozwe mu bipukuru canke ibikoresho vya plastike mugihe abifise bubakisha amabati. Nta gukusanya umucafu ngo uje gutabwa kubaho, mwinshi muri wo ukaba ukaba utabwa mu ruzi. Ishirahamwe ridaharanira inyungu ryo muri ako karere ryitwa Mercy Mukuru, rihafise amashure ane y'intango arimwo abanyeshure 7.000. Hafi y'icakabiri c'abo ntibashobora kuronka isabuni, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuyobozi w'iryo shirahamwe, Mary Killeen. Madamu Adhiambo yagize ati: "Mfise umwitwarariko. Uyu mugera niwakwiragira muri aka karere, ibara rizogwa." Muganga Pierre Mpele, yahoze aserukira ikigo mpuzamakungu kijejwe amagara y'abantu mu bihugu vyinshi vya Afrika y'uburengero yavuze ko amazu yo muri Afrika ashobora kurangwamwo abantu benshi, aho binashika ko abantu 12 basangira inzu y'icumba kimwe. Yagize ati ''gushira abantu mu kibanza ca bonyene ntibizokunda ahantu henshi''. Si amazu gusa y'abantu baciciriritse ariko aragira ikibazo c'ubukene bw'amazi. Ibisagara vya Johannesbourg na Chennai vyose vyarahatswe gukamamwo amazi mu mwaka uheze. Shanthi Sasindranath, Nyina w'abana 2, aba mu micungararo y'igisagara ca Chennai yabariye BBC ati: "Nihaba ubukene bw'amazi nko mu mwaka uheze, bizogorana kuronka amazi yo gukaraba intoke incuro nyinshi. " Mugihe c'ubukene bw'amazi mu mwaka uheze, umuryango wiwe warashoboye kubaho nabi nabi ugura amazi adasukuye ava mu mariba y'abarimyi ku  bilometero birenga 50. Hari utuzu twa surwumwe twagenewe bose duke cane kandi abanyagihugu ntibakurikiza impanuro zitangwa n'abaganga. "Mw'igaliyamoshi, abantu bakorora  bari hafi yawe, ata na kimwe bikingirije ku munwa. Bishitse nkabishira hejuru, bamwe muri bo barasaba ikigongwe, abandi bakeyi nabo bagatangura gushwana." Incuti n'abagenzi bagenda inzu yiwe imisi yose kandi Sasindranath ntaramenya ingene yogabanya kubonana n'abantu. "Ndiko mbarira abana banje ko bakaraba intoke kenshi kandi buke buke. Nababariye ko bategerezwa kwoga mu minwe iyo boba bavuye hose, naho boba bamazeyo iminuta 5. Nk'umuryango ntidutembera cane nk'uko twahora tubikora." Muganga Poppy Lamberton, yigisha ibikorwa birangurigwa kwa Muganga muri Kaminuza ya Glasgow mu Bwongereza yavuze ko amaleta ategerezwa kwongera utwigoro. "Amaleta amwe amwe arakenye, ariko ntakenye nk'abantu. Mugihe hoba ikiza yari akwiye gushobora gushira ikibano cose ahaconyene." Ikigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, kiriko kirarondera ingene gifasha amaleta mu ntumbero yafashe mu  kurwanya uyu mugera, ariko Muganga Mpele ashaka ko hashirwaho intumbero  zo  gufasha ibihugu biri mu nzira y'amajambere. Ariko kandi asaba inguvu mu guhamagarira abayobozi kugira umwete imbere y'uko iki kiza gikwiragira hose ku mugabane wa Afrika. Yagize ati ''Iciza n'uko uyu mugera utariko urakwiragira cane ku mugabane wa Afrika. Ibitigiri vyinshi vy'abantu bamaze kumenyekana ko banduye uyo mugera bigizwe n'abagendeye mu Bushinwa no mu Bulaya. Ntituzi igituma utariko urakwiragira cane. OMS ivuga ko kwanduzanya ku batagize ingendo biri ku rwego rwo hasi cane ku mugabane wa Afrika kandi yuko gukumira ico kiza ari yo ntambwe nziza. Tugarutse mu karere ka Mukuru bisa n'uko ata na kimwe cahidutse muri izi ndwi ziheze. Madamu Adhiambo avuga yumva ata bushobozi na bumwe afise, akaba ariko arakora ikintu kimwe gusa ashoboye. Yagize ati: ''Ndiko nsenga Imana ngo idukingire uyu mugera twebwe n'ikibano cacu''.

headline: Afghanistan: Aba Taliban bagiye kugarukana ibihano vyo kunyonga no guca ibihimba vy'umubiri
text: Uwahoze arongoye igipolisi c'idini azwi cane mu ba Taliban atangaza ko muri Afghanistan hagiye kugarukanwa ibihano ruhasha nko kunyonga no guca ibihimba vy'umubiri muri ico gihugu. Mullah Nooruddin Turabi, ubu arongoye amabohero yabwiye ikinyamakuru AP ko "igihano co guca ibihimba vy'umubiri ari nkenerwa ku mutekano w'igihugu". Avuga ko ibi bihano bishobota kutazotangirwa ku mugaragaro nk'uko vyari bimeze ku butegetsi bwa mbere bw'aba Taliban mu myaka ya 1990. Ariko ariyamiriza  uburakari bwatewe n'ibihano vyabo  vyo kunyonga muri kahise: "Nta n'umwe azotubwiriza ingene amategeko yacu ategerezwa kumera". Kuva bashitse ku butegetsi muri Afghanistan ku wa 15 z'ukwa munani, aba Taliban bagumye bemerera abantu ko bazoshinga ubutegetsi bworoshe gusumba ubwa mbere. Ariko hamaze kuba ibikorwa bitari bike  vyo guhohotera kiremwamuntu mu gihugu cose. Ku wa kane, ishirahamwe Human Rights Watch ryagabishije ko aba Taliban muri Herat bariko "barahiga buhongo abagore bakomeye, babuza abagore kuva mu mihana, banabategeka kwitwikira umubiri wose". Ni inyuma y'aho mu kwa munani ishirahamwe Amnesty International ritangarije ko aba Taliban ari bo bishe abantu icenda bo mu nkehwa z'aba Hazara. Ico gihe, umunyamabanga mukuru wa Amnesty Agnès Callamard yavuze ko "ubwo bwicanyi bw'agahomerabunwa bwibutsa kahise kabi k'aba Taliban, hamwe n'isura mbi y'ubutegetsi bw'aba Taliban bushobora kugarukana". Imisi mike imbere y'uko aba Taliban bafata Kabul, umucamanza w'umu Taliban mu karere ka Balkh, Haji Badruddin, yabwiye umunyamakuru wa BBC Secunder Kermani ko yari ashigikiye ishirwa mu ngiro ry'itegeko ruhasha rya Islam. Badruddin ati: "Biratomoye muri Sharia, kuri abo bose bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina batarubaka, yaba umukobwa canke umuhungu, igihano ni ibikomo ijana akubitirwa ku mugaragaro". "Ariko iyo ari uwubatse afashwe arenga ibigo, uyo ategerewa kwicishwa amabuye...nayo ku wufashwe ari kwiba, naho nyene biratomoye, ategerezwa gucibwa ibikonjo". Ibi vyiyumviro ni vyo biri mu mitwe y'abanya Afghanistan bagendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vya kera. Hagati aho, uyu muhari uriko urihweza ikiruta ikindi hagati yo kugendera kuri ibi vyiyumviro vya kera no kuraba ukuntu bokorana n'amakungu - arico gituma kuva bashitse ku butegetsi aba Taliban bagerageza kwerekana ishusho y'ubwitonzi. Turabi, azwi cane mu gutanga ibihano vy'ubugome ku bantu bafashwe bariko bumviriza imiziki itari iyo guhayagiza Imana canke bamoye ubwanwa mu myaka ya 1990, yabwiye AP ko, n'aho ibi bihano ruhasha bizobandanya, uyu muhari ushobora kuzokwemerera abanyagihugu gutunga amateleviziyo, amaterefone ngendanwa no kuraba amareresi. Turabi - ubu asanzwe ari ku bihano yafatiwe na ONU kubera ivyaha vyo muri kahise - avuga ko ubu inama nshikiranganji y'aba Taliban iriko irihweza nimba ibihano bikwiye gutangirwa ku mugaragaro, kandi ko bazoshiraho amategeko abigenga. Mu myaka ya 1990, ibihano vy'urupfu vyatangirwa ku mugaragaro ku kibuga c'umupira i Kabul, canke mu bibuga bisanzwe vyagutse vy'umusigiti wa Eid Gah. Ico gihe, Turabi yari umushikiranganji w'ubutungane akaba yari arongoye igisata kijejwe gukwiragiza imico myiza no kurwanya ingeso mbi - ari co gipolisi c'idini c'aba Taliban. Muri iki kiganiro yavuze ati: "Bose baradutera ivyatsi kuri ibi bihano vyatangirwa mu bibuga, ariko twebwe nta na kimwe twigeze tuvuga ku mategeko yabo n'ibihano vyabo". Mu ntango z'ino ndwi, aba Taliban barasavye ijambo mw'ikoraniro ry'ishirahamwe ONU ririko ribera i New york. Umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Ubudagi Heiko Maas avuga ko n'aho ari ngombwa kuvugana n'aba Taliban, "ikoraniro rya ONU siho bikwiye kubera". Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zisanzwe ziri mu murwi ujejwe kwakira abantu, ivuga ko idashobora gufata ingingo imbere y'uko ikoraniro rirangira mu ndwi iza.

headline: Burundi: Abantu 40 bashasha banduye coronavirus
text: Ibitigiri vy'abandura umugera wa coronavirus mu Burundi bibandanya vyiyongera, ni inyuma y'aho ejo ku wa gatandatu leta itangarije ko abandi bantu 40 banduye uwo mugera. Mw'itangazo ryaraye risohowe n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu, abo barwayi bashasha bari mu bantu 531 bapimwe bose hamwe. Gushika ubu mu Burundi, abamaze kwandura uwo mugera ruhonyabantu baciye bagera kuri 144. Mw'iryo tangazo, ubushikiranganji bumenyesha ko abo 40 bari muri 25 bapimwe biketswe ko boba baranduye uwo mugera, hamwe na 487 bamaranye umwanya munini n'abasanzwe barawanduye. Ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu bumenyesha ko igikorwa co kurondera abantu bamaranye umwanya munini n'abo barwayi bashasha 40 kibandanya. Butangaza kandi ko 18 muri 28 bari basanzwe bariko baravurwa uwo mugera, cumi muri bo bapimwe bagasanga bakize kandi baronkejwe uruhusha rwo gusubira mu miryango yabo. Hagati aho, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu ntibutanga umwidondoro w'abo bantu bashasha banduye iyi ndwara ya Covid-19. Mu gihe ibihugu bitari bike vyo mu karere vyafashe ingingo ruhasha mu ntumbero yo kugerageza guhagarika ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera, leta y'u Burundi yoyo gushika ubu, nta ngingo zikomeye irafata. Ibandanya isaba abanyagihugu gukurikiza impanuro zo kwikingira no gukingira abandi, izo nazo zikaba zijanye ahanini n'isuku hamwe no kwirinda gukorakorana. Leta y'u Burundi yaraneguwe n'amashirahamwe amwe amwe ko yafashe minenerwe ikiza ca coronavirus, cane cane bagafatira ku bikorwa vy'amatora yatunganijwe, bakaba bari bafise amakenga ko ivyo bishobora gutuma abantu benshi bandura uwo mugera. Hagati aho, leta yoyo yagumye yihagararako, mbere ikanagiriza amwe muri ayo mashirahamwe yayiyenura ko yagomba gutoba amatora. Umugera wa coronavirus watanguye kumenyekana mu mpera z'umwaka uheze mu gisagara ca Wuhan mu Bushinwa, ubu ukaba ubarizwa kw'isi yose. Ku wa 31 z'ukwezi kwa gatatu niho leta y'u Burundi yatangaza umuntu wa mbere yanduye uwo mugera. Gushika ubu mu gihugu ca Kenya abashika 4478 nibo bamaze kumenyekana ko banduye coronavirus, ni inyuma y'aho ejo ku wa gatandatu leta itangarije ko hari abandi 104 bari banduye. Muri Uganda, abashika 763 nibo bazwi ko banduye uwo mugera, mu Rwanda hoho bakaba bagera kuri 702 babiri bakaba bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima, nayo muri Tanzania bakaba ari 509 na 21 bahitanywe nayo. Muri Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya congo, abashika 5.672 baramaze kwandura uwo mugera, muri bo 125 ukba warabahitanye.

headline: China: Shanghai yakajije ingingo za guma-muhira kubera Covid
text: Abategetsi ba Shanghai mu Bushinwa bavuga ko bagiye gukomeza ishirwa mu ngiro ry'ingingo za guma mu rugo, mu gihe abandura ca kiza karanda ca Covid muri uwo mugwa mukuru w'ubutunzi bibandanya vyiyongera ku muvuduko. Mu ngingo nshasha harimwo gushiraho imiryango ifise inkengeri za elektroniki zizobuza abanduye gusohoka, co kimwe no kuvana abantu mu mazu yabo kugira ngo apompwe imiti yica imigera. Mu ntango y'iyi ndwi, amajana n'amajana barakuwe mu mihana yabo kugira ngo amazu yabo apompwe imiti yica imigera. Izi ngingo zigiye gushira Shanghai muri guma mu rugo mu ndwi igira gatanu. Abategetsi b'igisagara ca Shanghai bavuga ko abantu bose banduye, hamwe n'incuti zabo za hafi, bazoshirwa mu kibanza reta yateguye co kubugaraniramwo. Hampande y'ivyo, ingingo zo gupompa imiti yica imigera zizokomezwa mu bibanza bimwe bimwe vy'ico gisagara bisinzikaye. Ibi bisigura ko bishoboka ko bamwe mu bahaba bazotegerezwa kuhava mu kiringo gito - harimwo n'abazoba bapimwe bagasanga ntibanduye. Iyi ngingo ije inyuma y'imisi mike abanyagihugu bo mu yindi mirwi ibiri y'i Shanghai  - Beicai na Pingwang - bategetswe kuva mu mihana yabo mu kiringo gito bakimukira mu bibanza vyateguwe. I Beicai, urwandiko rw'ubutegetsi rwahawe abanyagihugu rwabategeka gutekera ibintu vyabo kandi bagasiga ububati bwabo bwuguruye. Basabwa kandi gusiga umuryango w'imbere wuguruye, Amasanamu yo ku mbuga hwaniro y'abantu batonze imirongo n'amasakoshi yabo mw'ijoro yerekana ko ibintu bitari vyoroshe. Izi ngingo ni ikimenyetso c'uko abategetsi b'Ubushinwa bafise ishaka ryo guhagarika ikwirakwira rya Covid i Shanghai - igisagara gifatwa n'ikigega c'ubutunzi bw'igihugu. Uturere tumwe tw'igisagara mu twugawe dufise ikibazo co kuronka imfungurwa, bikaba ngombwa ko abanyagihugu barindira imfashanyo ya reta igizwe n'imboga, inyama n'amagi. Abategetsi baracagerageza poritike yo kurwanya Covid bagashira imbere gutuza burundu uwu mugera aho guhitamwo kubana nawo nk'uko mu bindi bihugu bahisemwo uko. Iki kiza karanda i Shanghai, catanguye kwibonekeza mu mpera z'ukwa gatatu, kimaze kwandurwa n'abantu barenga 400.000 bamenyekanye gushika ubu hamwe na 36 bapfuye. Hafi bose ni abantu bafise imyaka yitereye, abatacandazwe bafise ibibazo vy'amagara, nk'uko abategetsi b'Ubushinwa babivuga. Ibi vyatumye imiriyoni 25 z'ababa muri  iki gisagara bategekwa kuguma muhira.

headline: US: umuporisi w'umwirabure yankiwe guhambwa mw'itongo ry'abapfuye rigenewe abazungu gusa
text: Abarongoye itongo ry'abapfuye riri i Louisiana muri Amerika barasaba imbabazi inyuma y'aho umuporisi w'umwirabure yankiwe kurihambwamwo kubera itegeko rimaze imyaka mirongo ritegeka ko abazungu bo nyene ari bo bafise uburenganzira bwo kurihambwamwo. Vyabaye ngombwa ko abarongoye iri tongo ryitwa Oaklin Springs bicara ku wa kane kugira ngo bahindure iri tegeko ryiswe "white human beings" (Abazungu) riha uburenganzira abazungu bo nyene kurihambwamwo. Umupfakazi asizwe n'uyu muporisi Darrell Semien avuga ko ari "akagaye" kwimwa uburenganzira bwo guhamba umuntu wabo "kubera ari umwirabure". Uwurongoye iri tongo avuga ko batari bazi iri tegeko "ry'agahomerabunwa". Semien w'imyaka 55 yari icegera c'umukuru w'igiporisi c'akarere yaba ahitwa Oberlin, igisagara kiri ku birometero 320 mu burengero bw'igisagara ca Nouvelle-Orléans (New Orleans). Yishwe na kanseri ku wa Mungu. Igihe umusigwa wiwe Karla Semien n'abana biwe bari bagiye gusaba ikibanza co kumuhambamwo kw'itongo rya Oaklin Springs, umukozi yababwiye ko ryari itongo  "rihambwamwo abazungu gusa". Umupfasoni  Semien yanditse ku rubuga rwa Facebook ati: "Yari afise n'urukaratasi rwerekana ko abazungu bonyene ari bo bemerewe guhambwa aho hantu", yongerako y'uko ibi ari ibintu bigoye gutahura mu 2021. Umupfasoni Semien yabwiye ikinyamakuru CBS News ati: "Kari akagaye karenze urugero, agahomerabunwa. Kwari ukumukengereza. Iyumvire, ngo ntidushobora kumuhamba kubera ari umwirabure!" Umukuru w'iryo tongo ry'abapfuye H Creig Vizena avuga ko iri tegeko ari "agahomerabunwa" kandi ari "iryo ubujuju", ari ho yaciye abwira ibinyamakuru vya Amerika ko ata muntu n'umwe mu bakozi biwe yari azi ivy'iri tegeko. Ahanura n'abandi barongoye amatongo y'abapfuye mu karere k'ubumanuko kwihweza neza amategeko yabo kugira ngo barabe ko atoba arimwo amategeko y'ivangura ruhu asa n'iri. Uyu mukozi yanse gutanga ikibanza co guhambamwo uyu mwirabure ni inasenge wa Vizena, umutamakazi w'imyaka 81 "yari yahagaritswe mu mabanga yiwe", nk'uko yabibwiye ikinyamakuru Atlanta Journal-Constitution co muri Atlanta. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'imyaka irenga 50 kuva habaye itegeko ribuza ivangura iryo ari ryo ryose ( Civil Rights Act) muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Iri tegeko ryemejwe mu 1964 ribuza ivangura iryo ari ryo ryose, rikaba ryafuse amategeko yitiriwe Jim Crow yategeka ivanguraruhu mu mareta yo mu bumanuko harimwo na Louisiana. Semiens yari amaze imyaka 15 ari umuporisi w'akarere. nk'uko urwandiko ruvuga ubuzima bwiwe rubivuga. Yari atunze n'abandi bana bashika 72 mu kiringo c'imyaka 16. Umuryango wa Semien wanse iciyumviro ca Vizena yashaka kubaha ikibanza mu gace k'iryo tongo ripima imetero kwadarato zirenga 8000, bakavuga ko bopfuma bamuhamba ahandi, kure y'umuryango wabo. Bavuga ko iyo bahamagaye ku yandi matongo y'abapfuye basaba aho bohamba Semien, ikibazo ca mbere biba ngombwa ko babaza ari: "Abirabure boba bemerewe guhambwa mu kaburi kawe?".

headline: U Burundi bugiye guhura na Nigeria muri CAN2019, abakinyi ngo baratekanye
text: Robert Patrick Misigaro, BBC. Ikipe nserukiragihugu y'u Burundi, Intamba Mu Rugamba, ejo kuwa gatandatu izokina na Nigeria mu rukino rwayo rwa mbere rw'igikombe ca Afrika 2019, abayigize bavuga nta bwoba bafitiye ico gihangange mu mupira w'amaguru. Mu zuba rimena imbwa agahanga kuri Alexandria Stadium mu muji wa Alexandria mu Misiri, umumenyereza w'Intamba ahejeje kugenzura ikibuga zizokinirako na Nigeria, yemeza ko ata bwoba bafise. Olivier Niyungeko yabwiye BBC ko ica nkenerwa ari uko Abarundi benewabo babafata mu mugongo aho bari hose, naho batoshika i Alexandria. Yagize ati: "Nka kurya bamenyereye gushigikira umurwi wabo w'Intamba Mu Rugamba, twobasaba ko babandanya badushigikira aho bari hose, kuko iyo umuntu ashigikiwe aravyiyumvamwo agakora cane. "Twaje ngaha kuduza ibendera ry'igihugu cacu kandi abakinyi baravyumva, hasigaye ko umuntu wese yumva ko ari Umurundi avuga ati 'ndashigikiye Intamba Mu Rugamba'". Abajijwe niba ikibazo c'ubushuhe bose bikugura ata ngorane kibateye, bwana Niyungeko yavuze ko abona ivyo gukina mu ma saa kumi bobireka bagakina ku kagoroba izuba ritanguye kurenga,  kanatsinda ngo amatara arahari ku bibuga ngo rero ntabona igituma batobigenza uko. Kizigenza w'Intamba Mu Rugamba, Saido Berahino, yatanguye gukinira iyi kipe igaca inaronka itike yayo ya mbere yo kuja muri iri higanwa, ari mu bakinyi bazeweko vyinshi. Kiretse ko ari muri bake bamaze gukina mu mahiganwa akomeye, nk'ihiganwa ryo mu Bwongereza Premier League, ni nawe azwi cane ku rwego mpuzamakungu. Yavuze ko ari amahirwe adasanzwe kuba akinira ikipe y'igihugu ciwe, ibintu yamye yipfuza kuva kera. Agira ati: "Naragize amahirwe yo gukina mu Bwongereza kandi vyarahinduye ubuzima bwanje. Ariko nk'uko namye ndabivuga, u Burundi niko gataka kanje, namye nshaka gukinira u Burundi. "Kuba noneho ndi  na kapitene w'u Burundi mw'ihiganwa rikomeye nk'iri ni iteka rihambaye kuri jewe." Naho icizere ari cose, u Burundi ntibworohewe na gato kuko Nigeria atari ikipe yo gupfa guta mu ndasa. Imaze kuja muri iri higanwa inshuro nyinshi mbere iranaritwara, eka mbere ikaba imaze no guserukira Afrika mu gikombe c'isi. Ariko naho biri uko, umumenyereza wa Nigeria, Gernot Rohr, avuga ko adashobora gufata minenerwe ikipe y'u Burundi naho ari ubwa mbere igiye mw'ihiganwa rikomeye nk'iri. Bwana Rohr yagize ati: "Twiteguriye u Burundi nk'uko twitegurira ikipe iyo ari yo yose. Twitegurana ukwicisha bugufi, ata gukengera uwo tuza gukina nawe. "U Burundi ni ikipe itigeze itsindwa mu nkino zose zo guhiganirwa itike yo kuza muri iki gikombe. Yaba Gabon, yaba Mali, nta n'imwe yigeze ishobora gutsinda iyi kipe y'u Burundi. "Twarabaravye kuri za video, turabaraba kandi mu rukino rwa nyuma rwo kwitegura, aho bari banganije na Tuniziya ikaza gutsinda mu minota yanyuma." U Burundi buri mu mugwi B kumwe n'amakipe ya Nigeria, Madagascar na Guinea. Urukino rwa mbere ni kuwa gatandatu itariki 22/06/2019 igihe c'isaha 19h00. Ushaka kumenye imigwi amakipe arimwo, amanota aronka hame n'uko atsindana ushobra kuja ngaha

headline: Africa-Covid: Amerika yemeye kwongera miriyoni 17 z'incanco
text: Reta Zunzwe Ubumwe za Amerika ziyemeje guha Afrika izindi miriyoni 17 z'incanco za Covid-19 , mu gihe uwo mugabane gushika ubu uri inyuma y'iyindi kw'isi mu gucandaga abawubamwo. Izo ncanco zizotangwa biciye kw'ishirahamwe rya Afrika, Union Africaine/African Union. Ivyo vyamenyeshejwe n'umukuru wa Amerika ku wa kane ahejeje kubonana n'umukuru wa Kenya, Uhuru Kenyatta. Uwo mubonano wabereye ku biro vy'umukuru wa Amerika, White House, wari wo wa mbere Joe Biden ahaye umukuru w'igihugu wo muri Afrika kuva aho abereye Prezida wa Amerika. Gushika ubu abantu badashika 4% ku mugabane wa Afrika nibo bamaze kuronka incanco zikwiye za Covid -19  bivanye no gukeherwa, kutihutira kuziteza canke kubera uburyo bugoye bwo kuzishikana  ku banyagihugu, na cane mu bihugu biherutse kuva mu ntambara. Prezida Biden yavuze ko izo ncanco za Jonhson & Johnson umuntu aterwa rimwe gusa zizoca zitangwa ubwo nyene cane cane mu bihugu vya Afrika  vyakehewe. Yaniyemeje kandi  gufasha kugira incanco zikorerwe muri Africka. Gushika ubu Amerika imaze kwemera gutanga incanco zingana na miriyoni 500 kw'isi yose. Hagati aho Prezida Biden na Kenyatta bavuze ko bazofashanya mu gutorera inyishu intambara yo muri Tigray mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia aho abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi babayeho nko mu  mapfa nayo abaharurwa muri za miriyoni bakaba bari mu kaga ko kuronswa imfasanyo. Kenya muri iki gihe niyo irongoye inama ya ONU ijejwe umutekano kw'isi. Reta ya Biden yagabishije gufatira ibihano bikomeye reta ya Ethiopia, mu gihe ahubwo ingabo za reta y'ico gihugu  ziherutse kugaba igitero gishasha muri iyo ntara ya Tigray iri mu buraruko.

headline: Burundi: Ishusho babona kuri perezida mushasha inyuma y'iminsi 100
text: Uyu munsi haheze iminsi 100 Gen. Major Evariste Ndayishimiye arahiriye kurongora u Burundi, mu gihugu hariho ababona ko ivyo amaze gukora bitanga icizere n'abo ataraha icizere kuko ku bwabo ata kintu kinini arakora. Iminsi 100 ntishobora kurabirwako ibikorwa yemeye gukora mu kiringo c'iminsi ishika 2,556 yatorewe gushika mu kwezi kwa gatandatu 2027, ariko iyi minsi y'intango kuri bamwe itanga ishusho y'ejo hari imbere. Kuva Bwana Ndayishimiye arahiriye amabanga y'umukuru w'igihugu akanashinga leta nshasha, hariho impinduka zimaze kwibonekeza. Uwo yasubiriye yari yarumvikanye avuga ko "ata coronavirus ikirangwa mu Burundi", ashitse ku butegetsi, yihutiye gutangaza ko coronavirus "ari umwansi wa mbere w'Abarundi". Kwegera amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu, ingendo n'ibikorwa imbere mu gihugu, amajambo akomeye ku Rwanda, itahuka ry'impunzi, icizere gikeya afitiwe n'umurwi wa ONU ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu, urugendo muri Tanzania n'amajambo yahavugiye… ni bikeya mu vyaranze iyi minsi 100 iheze. Appolinaire Nishirimbere, umukozi w'inama nshingamateka kandi umuhinga mu vy'ubutungane bw'amakori n'amatagisi, aba i Bujumbura, avuga ko kuva hajaho perezida mushasha impinduka zibonekeza mu bisata vyinshi mu buzima busanzwe mu gihugu. Ati: "Muri iyi minsi iheze haramaze kuboneka cane cane mu gipolisi, abapolisi n'abacamanza mu gisata c'ubutungane bafatwa kubera bariye ibiturire, kandi ivyo ntitwari tubiherutse mu Burundi. "Ubu n'aho uca ku mabarabara urabona ko abapolisi batinya bimwe bita 'petite corruption' kuko batazi uwoshobora kubatanga, ariko kera wamenga ni ibintu bisanzwe, umuntu yahagarara bakamwaka amahera. "Ndabona ko ari ikintu gikomeye cane gitanga icizere muri kazoza, n'aho muri ico gisata hariho ivyo guhindura cane cane mu giturire kinini kuko ntiturabona umuntu n'umwe yariye igiturire c'amahera menshi." Bwana Nishirimbere abona kandi kuba perezida mushasha yarasohoye itegeko ko abakukuruke batangura kuvurwa ku buntu ari ikintu gikomeye yashize mu ngiro ningora mu vyo yari yarasezeranye. Ishirahamwe rirwanya ibiturire n'isesagurwa ry'amatungo ya leta OLUCOME, rikorera mu Burundi, rivuga ko rizirikana ko Bwana Ndayishimiye yavuze ko azoshira inguvu cane mu kurwanya igiturire n'isahurwa ry'amatungo ya leta, ariko ngo ntarakora ibitegetswe n'itegeko. Gabriel Rupfiri arongoye OLUCOME avuga ko bamaze kwumva ivyo yashikirije baciye bamuha dosiye zimwe bamaze gukora z'abantu bari muri leta bakekwa gusahura leta. Avuga ko ababijejwe bemereye iryo shirahamwe ko "bagiye kubikurikirana kandi bitazoteba". Amategeko avuga ko abategetsi berekana amatunga yabo n'imvo yayo mu gihe kitarenga iminsi 15 bashizweko. Ati: "Twaranditse amabaruwa atatu dusaba ko hari igikorwa, mu nyuma igenekerezo rya 23/08 yatanze indwi zibiri ko agiye kubikurikirana, ubu ni itariki 23/09 [ku wa gatatu w'iyi ndwi] nta kintu na kimwe muri ubwo buryo cigeze gikorwa. "Twebwe rero dusanga ibintu vyotera bisubira inyuma mu gihe atoramuka ariye umutima amenyo kuko impinduka zose hama hari abantu batagomba ko zishoboka". Yongerako ati: "Mu ncamake tubona ko atabanje kwinyugutura, kwikurako ababandi bari mu ruhande rwiwe n'abari muri leta bizomugora ko ashobora gutera intambwe." Mu ijambo yashikirije inama rusangi ya ONU yatangaje uyu munsi, ku rubuga hwaniro rwa Twitter, Perezida Ndayishimiye yavuze bimwe bimwe muvyo ariko ararangura muri iki kiringo ciwe ca mbere. Aha avugamwo ko akomeje politiki yo kurwanya igiturire, akarenganyo no kwiba amatunga ya leta. Hariho abari biteze impinduka mu migenderanire y'u Burundi n'u Rwanda yabaye mibi kuva habaye igerageza ryo gutembagaza ubutegetsi mu 2015. Mu ntango z'ukwezi guheze k'umunani Bwana Ndayishimiye, avuga ku kibazo bafitanye n'u Rwanda, yagize ati: "Ntitwifuza yuko tugirana imigenderanire n'igihugu gikoresha uburyarya, igihugu c'iciyorobetsi". Ivyo vyatumye bamwe bamwe babona ko impinduka bari biteze zitagiye kwibonekeza vuba. Ariko mu mpera z'ukwo kwezi nyene hatewe intambwe ikomeye. Ubwa mbere muri ayo matati amaze imyaka, abarongoye igendereza (ubutasi) mu ngabo z'ibihugu vyompi bahuriye ku mupaka wa Nemba, eka n'ibihugu vyompi bikorana inama bumvikana ingene botahukana impunzi ziva mu Rwanda. Onesphore Sematumba, umusesenguzi wa politi yo mu karere k'ibiyaga binini wo mw'ishirahamwe International Crisis Group, abona mu minsi 100 iheze Bwana Ndayishimiye yabandanije politike yari isanzweho. Ati: "Hari abari biteze ko ashobora kuza agakora iyo twokwita nka 'révolution' ariko usanga yabandanije politike yari isanzweho cane cane mu migenderanire n'amakungu. "Ubona ko adashaka kwihutisha ibintu ngo nk'uwugiye kubiri n'inzira yamugejeje aho ari, ariko hari utuntu twagiye duhinduka twerekana ko atari uwundi Nkurunziza yaje". Bwana Sematumba abona ijambo Bwana Ndayishimiye yavugiye i Kigoma muri Tanzania - aho yavuze ko Tanzania ari nk'umuvyeyi w'Uburundi naho Perezida Magufuli ari nka Papa wiwe - vyerekana gushimangira politiki yaje asanga. Ati: "Naho ku rwego rwo kubana n'u Rwanda haracari ukwikekana n'ubwo hari intambwe yatewe kuko kuba abakuriye ingabo barahuye ni ikintu gitanga icizere." Muri iki gihe giheze Bwana Ndayishimiye hamwe n'umushikiranganji ajejwe imigenderanire n'amakungu, bariko barakira abahagarariye imiryango mpuzamakungu itandukanye, Ubumwe bw'Uburayi n'iyindi. Ivyo bamwe bamwe babona ko ari ukwugurura bushasha umubano n'amakungu uyu mukuru w'igihugu yasezeranye, mw'ijambo ryiwe amaze kurahira, ko uzoba ushingiye ku bwubahane. Umurwi wa ONU ujejwe amatohoza ku Burundi uvuga ko utabona icizere mu butegetsi bwiwe, ukavuga ko hari ivyaha vyo guhonyanga agateka ka muntu bibandanya, eka na bamwe mu bagirijwe ivyaha vyakozwe hambere uyo murwi uvuga ko ubu bakomeye muri leta. Bwana Nishirimbere avuga ko amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu amwe atobura ico avuga ku gihugu nk'Uburundi caciye mu bibazo bikomeye kuva cikukira, ariko ubu abona impinduka zimuha n'icizere. Ati: "Agahaze koko ntigashobora kubura mu gihugu caciye mu ngorane, gusa ntibiba ari umugambi wa leta. Ayo maraporo atangwa nibaza ko abayakora bataba bageze hano ngo babaze abo biraba. "Iyi minsi 100 irampa icizere kuko mbona afise [Perezida Ndayishimiye] ugushaka kwa politike, arashaka kwiyegereza abantu bose, ivyo rero bituma mbona ko mu myaka indwi hari aho azotugeza". Bwana Rupfyiri we abona ko Perezida Ndayishimiye akeneye kugendera ku mategeko y'igihugu akubahiriza agateka ka buri wese no gucungera itunga ry'igihugu kugira ngo kazoza k'igihugu kabe keza. Agira ati: "Ntabwo turiko turagaya vyose, oya, ahubwo turiko turakebura kuko no mu 2005 burya vyatanguye gutya, abantu bavuga ngo Nkurunziza ibintu biriko biragenda neza, mu nyuma ngo abantu bari impande yiwe ni bo bamuboheye amaboko imugongo, harazamwo ivya Rajabu [Hussein] aragenda. "Mugabo twarabonye ko vyagumye biyangara kugeza aho u Burundi bwahavuye buja inyuma mu bintu vyose, ivyo rero ni vyo tudashaka ni co gituma tuguma dukebura hakiri kare." Bwana Rupfyiri yongeraho ati: "Mu Kirundi baravuga ngo 'Inda n'ibanga ntibibangikanywa', umuntu w'umusuma, umuntu atigeze yiyambura umunoho iyo agiye gutwara abantu nta kindi abona azobanza kubona inda yiwe. "Ni co gituma ikintu tuguma tumusaba kugeza n'iyi saha, abo bantu ba mpemazuzuye, nibave muri leta tubone leta ifise ishusho itanga akarorero, twarabamuhaye kuva kera kandi na we arabazi. "Ibwirizwashingiro rivuga ko umutegetsi agiyeho kuva kuri perezida gushikana ku wutunganya ivy'amahera kw'ikomine, umwe wese ategerezwa guhita yerekana ubutunzi bwiwe, none abasuma badasumvya inguvu leta wosigura gute ko amezi atatu ashobora guhera ata na kimwe barakora?" Bwana Sematumba wewe avuga ko uko u Burundi buriko buriyegereza imiryango mpuzamakungu bizotuma "buzogenda bwemerwa, bwizerwe gusumba". Ati: "Uko bagenda begerana n'umuryango mpuzamakungu buhoro buhoro bazogenda banahuzwa n'abandi bari bafitaniye ibibazo kugira ngo ntitugere ku bushamirane bweruye bwo gutana mu mitwe. "N'ubwo hari imbogamizi zigihari hari icizere ko bizogenda biba vyiza."

headline: Karim Benzema: Uwo mukinyi w'Ubufaransa yagiriwe n'icaha co gukangisha video y'igitsina
text: Karim Benzema, umukinyi w'imbere w'Ubufaransa na Real Madrid yagiriwe n'icaha co kuba yaragize uruhara ku gukangisha umukinyi mugenziwe w'Umufaransa hakoreshejwe video y'igitsina (y'ibishegu). Umucamanza yaciriye Benzema umunyororo udashirwa mu ngiro w'umwaka anategekwa kuriha ihadabu y'amafanga angana na  €75,000 (84.000 mu ma dorari, arenga miriyoni 167 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) Benzema, w'imyaka 33, yari umwe mu bantu batanu barengukijwe mu rubanza mu kwezi guheze kubera kugerageza gusokora amafaranga muri Mathieu Valbuena. Ako kamaramaza karashegeshe umuryango w'umupira w'amaguru mu Bufaransa, abakinyi bompi bakaba baratakaje ibibanza vyabo mu mugwi w'igihugu. Ivy'urwo rubanza bihera muri  Ruheshi (ukwezi kwa 6) mu 2015, igihe abo bakinyi babiri bari mw'ikambi yo  kwimenyererezamwo. Muri iyo kambi, Benzema yokeje igitutu  Valbuena ngo  ahe amafaranga abariko baramukangisha, yari yakoranye nabo kugira agire uruhara rwo kuja hagati, nk'uko bivugwa n'abashikirizamanza. Benzema yagumye ahakana ibivugwa  ahubwo akemeza ko yariko aragerageza gufasha Valbuena kugira agarure iyo video yari kumutera ingorane. Uwo mukinyi ubu yarasubiye mu  mugwi w'Ubufaransa akaba yitezwe gutangura gukinira Real Madrid ku wa gatatu mw'ijoro aho baja gukina na FC Sheriff Tiraspol muri Champions League. Benzema ntiyari muri sentare i Versailles igihe urubanza rwasomwa, na Valbuena siho  yari ari, we nawe akaba akinira umugwi Olympiakos wo mu Bugiriki. Bane mu bagirizwa hamwe na Benzema muri urwo rubanza nabo bahamijwe icaha. Abunganira Benzema mu mategeko bavuga ko badamwe n'urwaciwe bavuga ko bazokwunguruza. Umushingwamanza wiwe yabwiye abanyamakuru hanze ya sentare ati: "Twakiranye ishavu urwo rubanza rurimwo ibihushane". Ariko igihe yariko arasoma urubanza, umucamanza yavuze ko Benzema yagize "uruhara ubwiwe" muri uwo mugambi wo gusokora amafaranga muri Valbuena. Ivy'urwo rubanza vyatanguye mu 2015 igihe Valbuena, ubu afise imyaka 37, yasaba umugabo w'i Marseille , Axel Angot,  kuvana ivyari muri telephone yiwe ngo avyimurira muri nshasha. Angot yasanze muri iyo telephone video igaragara ko ari y'ibishegu, hanyuma we n'uwundi  bakurikiranwa hamwe, Mustapha Zouaoui, bakaba bagirizwa ko bakangishije Valbuena mu kumubwira ko  bazoyishira ahabona atabahaye ivyo basaba. Zouaoui yabwiye abamenyamakuru ko iyo video hari abandi yayihaye, ariko hatigeze haba kugerageza gusokora amafaranga muri Valbuena. Valbuena avuga ko yegerewe n'uwundi nawe yaregwa muri urwo rubanza,  Younes Houass, yabwiye sentare ko yari yagabishije uwo mukinyi kuri ico kibazo, ariko ata mafaranga asavye. Igihe uwo mukinyi yaja kubibwira abaporisi, baciye  bakora umukenyuro wo gushiramwo umuntu akora yihishije. Abashikirizamanza bavuga ko hari uwundi yakurikiranwa muri urwo rubanza yaciye  yinjira muri ako kamaramaza - Karim Zenati, asanzwe ari umugenzi wo mu bwana wa Benzema. Aho niho Benzema yaca asabwa gufasha "nkw'uwoja hagati " muri uwo mupango. Muri Gitugutu (ukwezi kw'icumi)  mu 2015, Benzema yaregereye mugenziwe w'Umufaransa mu cumba iwe mw'ikambi aho bariko barimenyerereza. Benzema avuga ko we ico yariko aragerageza kwari ukugira mugenziwe arabe ingene iyo video yofutwa, amugabisha ati : "Uragaba, barakomeye, n'abasuma bakomeye." Yaciye amubwira ko yomuha uwo bavugana kandi yizeye - umugenzi wiwe wo kuva mu bwana , Zenati. Ico gihe igiporisi caguma gifata amajwi y'ivyo Benzema abwira umugenzi wiwe kuri terefone: "Ntafata ko ibintu bikomeye." Zenati bivugwa ko yaciye yishura ati: "Turi ngaha kugira ico kibazo tukirangize; niba atabishaka azohangana na piranhas [ibifi  bifise amenyo akarishe cane]" Ari imbere ya sentare, Valbuena avuga ko atigeze yishiramwo gutanga amafaranga kugira iyo video ntije ahabona. Bitandukanye na mugenziwe, Valbuena ntarasubira gukinira umugwi w'Ubufaransa kuva hatanguye ivy'iyo video. Valbuena yabwiye sentare ko umupira w'amaguru aribwo buzima bwiwe. Yavuze ati : "Nari nzi ko hamwe iyo video yoja ahabona nzogira ikibazo gikomeye n'umugwi w'Ubufaransa".

headline: Umurwi Man Utd uvuga ko 'ubabajwe cane' n'ityozwa rishingiye ku rukoba ryakorewe Paul Pogba
text: Manchester United ivuga ko iriko "irakora amatohoza kugira imenye" abakwiragije ku mbuga hwaniro inzandiko z'amacakubiri y'urukoba ku mukinyi Paul Pogba akina hagati muri uwo murwi. Pogba w'imyaka 26 yahushije penalty ejo ku wa mbere mu rukino rwahuje Man United na Wolves, ruza kurangira ari igitsindo kimwe ku kindi. Agize umukinyi wa gatatu mu kiringo c'indwi imwe gusa akorewe ityozwa rishingiye ku rukoba ku mbuga hwaniro kubera yahushije penalty, inyuma ya Yakou Méïté wa Reading na Tammy Abraham wa Chelsea. Umurwi wa Man United uvuga ko "ubabajwe cane" n'iryo tyozwa kandi ko "uryiyamirije wivuye inyuma". Mw'itangazo wasohoye uvuga uti: "Abo bantu banditse ivyo baciye kubiri n'akaranga k'umurwi wacu rurangiranwa kandi urahimiriza abakunzi bawo ko bokwiyamiriza ivyo bintu ku mbuga hwaniro ari benshi". "Manchester United ntishobora kwihanganira na gato amacakubiri canke ikumira iryo ari ryo ryose kandi itanguje isekeza #AllRedAllEqual initiative rizomara igihe kirekire ry'ukurwanya ako kabi". "Tuzokora ibishoboka vyose kugira tumenye abo bose babigizemwo uruhara twongere dufate n'ingingo ruhasha zose zishoboka. Dusavye kandi n'amakompanyi y'imbuga hwaniro gufata ingingo muri iyi ntumbero". Ku munsi wa Mungu, umusatirizi Yakou Méïté wa Reading yariyamirije ityoza rifatiye ku rukoba yakorewe ku mbuga hwaniro inyuma y'aho ahushirije penalty. Uyo mukinyi akomoka muri Côte d'Ivoire w'imyaka 23, yinjiye ku munota wa 80 igihe Reading yahura na Cardiff aca ahusha penalty ku munota wa 91. Mu ndwi iheze, Chelsea yariyamirije "inzandiko z'urwanko" ku mukinyi Tammy Abraham inyuma y'aho uyo murwi utsindiwe na Liverpool mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Super Cup. Umumenyereza wa Chelsea  Frank Lampard avuga ko "yababajwe cane" n'ityozwa ry'uyo mukinyi w'imbere w'imyaka 21. Asaba amakompanyi y'imbuga hwaniro gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ahagarike ingeso y'ukwifatira mu gahanga abakinyi. Eka n'abandi bakunzi ntibatevye kwiyamiriza ama tweet yarimwo amajambo y'amacakubiri yanditswe kuri Pogba - yari yaronse penalty kw'ikosa yakorewe mu nyuma arayihusha - ejo ku munsi wa mbere. Ama tweets amwe amwe yarafuswe, mu gihe n'ama "comptes" atari make nayo nyene yasa n'ayari yafuswe. Amategeko ngenderwako ya Twitter avuga ko "ishobora gufata ingingo ku nyifato y'ugutyoza abantu". Mu kwezi kw'indwi, ishirahamwe rirwanya amacakubiri y'urukoba, Kick It Out, ryarasohoye icegeranyo cerekana ko amakuru ajanye n'amacakubiri y'urukoba yiyongereye ku bice 43% mu mwaka w'inkino uheze, aho yabonetse incuro 274 ugereranije na 192 yari yabonetse mu mwaka waheruka.

headline: AstraZeneca: Ubugenduzi bw'Uwongereza na EU ku kuvurirana kw'amaraso ryasanze ata ngorane
text: Abagenduzi bo mu Bwongereza (UK) hamwe n'ishirahamwe rya Buraya (EU) basanze ata kimenyetso na kimwe cerekana ko urukingo rwa Covid, AstraZeneca, rutera kuvurirana kw'amaraso (coagulation du sang) nyuma "y'ukwihweza kwitondewe cane". Ikigo MHRA gikora ubugenduzi bw'imiti mu Bwongereza na  EMA gikora ubugenduzi muri EU bivuga yuko abantu bashobora kugirira icizere inyungu z'uru rukingo kandi ko bakwiye kwikingiza, naho hari ibihugu vyaruhagaritse. Ariko uwo wese agize umutwe umurya ukamara iminsi ine nyuma yo guhabwa urukingo ngo akwiye guca aja kwa muganga, nk'uburyo bwo kwiyubara. Impanuro niyo nyene kuri uwo wese yogira umuraba ku mubiri nyuma yo guterwa urushinge. Ivyo ni kubera yuko abagenduzi baronse amakuru amwe atari menshi y'ibishika gake cane aho haba ukuvurirana kw'amaraso mu Bwonko. Ni ubu bwoko bw'ukuvurirana kw'amaraso kwatumye ibihugu bimwe vyo muri EU bihagarika itangwa ry'urukingo rwa Oxford-AstraZeneca. Mu Bwongereza, abantu batanu nibo bafashwe n'ukuvurirana kw'amaraso kuzwi nka cerebral sinus vein thrombosis (CSVT), mu bantu imiriyoni 11 batewe urwo rukingo, bishika mu magabo bafise imyaka iri hagati ya 19 na 59. Umwe gusa niwe yahasize ubuzima. Ikigo EMA caronse amakuru y'abandi bantu 13 bashikiwe na CSVT. CSVT ishobora gushika bukwi kandi nta sano n'urukingo ryigeze rigaragara. Abo bantu kandi bari bafise uturemangingo tw'amaraso (tuzwi nka blood platelet) duke - utwo turemangingo nitwo tugira uruhara mu kuvurirana. Ubwandu bwa Covid burashobora gutuma gushikirwa n'ukuvurirana bishoboka cane. Muganga June Raine, umuyobozi-nshingwabikorwa wa MHRA, yavuze yuko abagenduzi bazobandanya gukurikiranira hafi uko vyifashe kandi ko abantu bari bakwiye gukingirwa nibashikirwa. Yagize ati: "Uravye ukuntu gushikirwa n'ibi bibazo bisa n'ibidashoboka, inyungu z'urukingo AstraZeneca, mu gihe ibiharuro biheruka vyerekana ko rugabanya kuja mu bitaro ku rugero rwa 80%  hamwe no guhitanwa na Covid, izo nyungu zirengeye kure ingorane iyo ari yo yose yoshika." Amakuru atangwa kuri uru rukingo azovugururwa hongerwemwo yuko kuvurirana kw'amaraso bishoboka gake cane. Umuyobozi nshingwa-bikorwa wa EMA, Emer Cooke yagize ati: "Dufatiye kuri ibi bishobora gushika gake cane hamwe no guha amakuru abakora mu vy'amagara co kimwe n'abantu bakingirwa bizofasha kurereka no guhagarika ingaruka izo ari zo zose." Ubugenduzi bwa EMA bwisunze amakuru yavuye ku bantu imiriyoni 20 bakingiwe, bwasanze: Ico kigo cavuze yuko ibimenyetso bikurikira bigaragaye nyuma yo guterwa urushinge, mu buryo bwo kwiyubara umuntu akwiye guca aja kwa muganga: Ibi birashobora gushika gake cane kandi biratandukanye n'ibimenyetso bisanzwe umuntu yokwitega iyo yakingiwe, nko kworoha kw'igice c'umubiri cateweko urushinge.

headline: Novak Djokovic: Umucamanza yategetse ko uyu mukinyi wa tennis arekurwa ubwo nyene
text: Umucamanza yumvirije urubanza rwa Novak Djokovic ku ngingo ya reta ya Australia yo guhagarika visa yiwe yo kwinjira mu gihugu yatesheje agaciro iyi ngingo. Umucamanza Anthony Kelly yategetse ko uyu mukinyi wa tennis arekurwa aho yugaraniwe, aca ategeka reta kuriha ivya nkenerwa vyose. Uyu mukinyi w'umunya Serbia w'imyaka 34 yari yagiye i Melbourne mu ndwi iheze, aho yiteze kurwanira igikombe ciwe c'ihiganwa Australian Open. Hagati aho, umushikiranganji ajejwe abimukira Alex Hawke arashobora guhagarika uru ruhusha afatiye ku bindi bituma. Reta yemeye imbere ya sentare ko Djokovic ata mwanya ukwiye yahawe wo kwisigura igihe amenyesherejwe ko visa yiwe yari ihagaritswe. Uyu mukinyi yabwiwe ko yari afise gushika isaha zibiri n'igice zo mu gitondo ku wa kane uheze kugira agire ico ashikiriza ku vyerekeye icemezo co guhagarika visa yiwe hisunzwe ingingo ya 116 y'itegeko rya Australia rigenga abimukira, ariko abajejwe imbibe bakaba bagiye gufata ingingo ntabanduka haciye akanya gato isaha imwe n'iminota 40. Uyo mucamanza yavuze ko Djokovic yategerezwa kuba yahawe umwanya ukwiye wo kwerekana igituma visa yiwe itategerezwa guhagarikwa iyo abategetsi bafatira ku kiringo ca mbere yari yahawe. Umucamanza Kelly ati: "Twese tugendera ku mategeko amwe. Mu yandi majambo: ayo mategeko ntiyubahirijwe". Uru rubanza rwatanguye ku wa mbere mu gatondo rucerewe kubera ingorane z'ubuhinga bwa none mu gihe rwategerezwa kwerekanwa ikibiriraho ingene ruriko ruragenda. Abashingwamanza ba Djokovic bavuga ko uyu mukinyi amaze gutwara igikombe ca Grand Slam incuro 20 yinjiye mu gihugu bizwi ko ubudahangarwa ku mabwirizwa ategeka ingenzi kubanza kwicandagisha Covid-19 bwari bugifise agaciro. Nick Wood yabwiye sentare ko ubudahangarwa bwari bwahawe uyu mukinyi n'imirwi ibiri y'abaganga itandukanye inyuma y'aho aherukira kwandura coronavirus kandi ko yari yeretse abategetsi inkaratasi zose nkenerwa zo kwa muganga. Wood ati: "Yari yakoze ibisabwa vyose. Yari yubahirije ivyo yasabwa vyose n'abajejwe Tennis muri Australia". Vyabonetse ko umucamanza Kelly yemeye ibivugwa na Wood aca abwira abashingwamanza ba reta ko atangajwe n'ivyo yari amaze kwumva gushika ubwo. Yabajije ati: "None hari ikindi uyu mugabo yategerezwa kuba yakoze?". Abashingwamanza ba Djokovic bavuga kandi ko ingene abajejwe imbibe bamufashe ari "akarenganyo keruye". Abategetsi bamaze kuvugana nawe ku kibuga c'indege, yasavye ko borindira gushika mu gitondo kugira ngo avugane n'abantu biwe ku bijanye n'ingingo yofata nimba ari iyo kuva mu gihugu. Ibi abategetsi bari bavyemeye. Yaciye aja kuryama, ariko aza kuvyurwa n'abategetsi isaha cumi na zibiri z'agatondo bavuga ko bamutegetse kwishura ku nguvu, bamubwira ko hari ku nyungu ziwe mu gihe bofata ingingo yihuta. Umushingwamanza wa reta Christopher Tran wewe yavuga ko Djokovic atari kuronswa ubu budahangarwa bwo gufata urugendo kubera yari aherutse kurwara Covid, anahakana ko ata karenganyo canke ibindi bintu bitumvikana vyahabaye mu gufata iyi ngingo. N'aho Djokovic ataco arashikiriza ku mugaragaro ku vyerekeye ivyo kwicandagisha, mu kiganiro yagiranye n'abajejwe imbibe yaravuze ko ataricandagisha. Yabwiye uwamubaza ko yari amaze kwandura Covid incuro zibiri - mu kwa gatandatu 2020 no mu kw'icumi na kabiri 2021. Impapuro zerekana ko yipimishije yarazeretse uwariko aramubaza - rumwe akaba yaruronse ku wa 16 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri 2021, umusi umwe imbere y'uko Djokovic aja ahabona atambaye agapfukamunwa.

headline: South Africa: Amasanamu y'ibinyoma ku migumuko ishingiye kw'ifungwa rya Jacob Zuma
text: Mu gihe Afrika y'Epfo irangwamwo imigumuko inyuma y'ipfungwa rya Jacob Zuma yahoze arongoye ico gihugu, imbuga hwaniro zimwe zimwe zagiye zikwiragiza amasanamu n'amareresi y'ububeshi. Umukuru w'igihugu, Cyril Ramaphosa, yahamagariye abanyagihugu ba Afrika y'Epfo "kwirinda gukwiragiza ubutumwa buturira ku mbuga hwaniro, no kwirinda ibihuha n'amakuru y'ibinyoma". Twakoze amatohoza ku turorero tumwe tw'ivyakwiragijwe cane ariko bikayovya abantu. Iyi sanamu yarementanijwe isa n'iyerekana Zuma yambaye impuzu y'umutugutu yambarwa n'abapfungwa yarakwiragijwe cane. Imaze gushirwa ku rubuga rwa Facebook yanditseko ngo "Jacob Zuma deluxe", yarahanahanywe n'abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi, aho abaharurwa mu majana bayitanzeko ubutumwa buvuga aho bahagaze, bamwe muri bo bamuhoza, abandi nabo bavuga ko yari akwiye gupfungwa. Ariko, hari abantu benshi bibajije nimba koko iyo sanamu yari rwiwe. Iyi sanamu iriko ikimenyetso cerekana ko ari yavuye ku rubuga rwa Twitter ku wa 08 z'ukw'indwi. Wihweje neza urabona umurongo werekana ko umutwe wa Zuma uteretse ku kibiribiri c'uwundi. Iyi shusho ishizwe mu buhinga bukoreshwa mu kwihweza isanamu (reverse images search), haboneka iyindi sanamu ishaka gusa n'iyi - ariko itarimwo uyu yahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu - kandi yari imaze igihe ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi. Twaciye tuyirondera mu bubiko bw'amasanamu ya AFP bwerekanye ko yafashwe mu 2002 mw'ibohero rya Pollsmoor mu gisagara ca Cape Town. Ikindi ari ngombwa kumenya ni uko n'aho uyu yahoze arongoye ari mw'ibohero, ingingo ngenderwako zo kwirinda Covid-19 muri Afrika y'Epfo zitegeka ko abapfungwa batemerewe kwivangatiranya. Umukobwa wa Zuma yakwiragije amasanamu ya kera Ubutumwa bwacishijwe ku rubuga rwa Twitter n'umwe mu bana ba  Zuma, Dudu Zuma-Sambudla, bwarimwo abantu bagandagaje kw'ibarabara rimwe rikomeye mu gisagara ca Durban, bamwe muri bo baryamye hasi mu gihe c'imyiyerekano. Iyo sanamu yari ifise amajambo ndondafoto (caption) ngo: "Durban City, We See You! Amandla," (ni ukuvuga Igisagara ca Durban. Turababona! Amandla), ifise n'urufunguruzo (hashtag) with the hashtag #FreeJacobZuma. Ijambo Amandla - ryogereranywa na 'komera'  - ryari ijambo bakoresha nk'icivugo mu myiyerekano yakorwa ca gihe ca ya ntwaro karyanishamiryango apartheid. Ariko, isanamu yakoreshejwe ntijanye n'ivyakurikiye ipfungwa ry'uyo yahoze arongoye ico gihugu, kandi iboneka ko yari iyo mu myiyerekano yabaye mu mwaka uheze itandukanye n'iyi. Twabonye iyindi isa n'iyi mu nkuru yasohowe n'ikinyamakuru ku wa 25 z'ukw'icenda 2020, aho aba bantu nyene n'izi modoka nyene ari vyo biboneka mw'ibarabara. Yafashwe mu gihe c'imyiyerekano yateguwe n'ishirahamwe ryari rifise urutonde rw'ivyo ryashaka ko bihinduka mu bijanye n'imibereho n'ubutunzi. N'aho uwafashe iyi sanamu yari ahagaze ku ruhande rutandukanye gato cane n'aho yari ahagaze igihe yafata iyi, uravye ingene amamodoka ahagaze, ingene abantu baryamye mw'ibarabara n'ingene bambaye, birasa neza muri iyi yazanywe na Dudu Zuma-Sambudla. Ireresi yerekana umurwi w'abirabure uhanganye n'abazungu yararabwe cane n'abantu barenga 300.000 kuri Twitter, ivugwa ko yerekana igice kimwe c'imigumuko ya kino gihe. Ubu butumwa bwashizwe kuri Twitter ku wa 13 z'ukw'indwi, buvuga buti:  "Abarimyi b'abazungu muri Afrika y'Epfo bariko barakubitwa amamodoka yabo asahurwa mu gihe igihugu kiriko kiratembagarira mu manga y'ubusahuzi". Konte ya Twitter yayishizeko iri muri Pologne, eka izwiko ivy'ububeshi bikorerwa ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, ikunze gushirako kandi inkuru zirwanya abimukira n'iziha ikuzo abazungu. Iyi reresi yashizwe ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi imbere y'uko iyi migumuko yaduka ku wa 09 z'uku kw'indwi. Hari amakuru yasohowe ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi kuva ku wa 25 z'ukwa gatandatu afise iyi reresi nyene, yerekana impari zishingiye ku madeni, bisigura rero ko ata sano na rimwe riri hagati y'iyi reresi n'ino migumuko ya kino gihe, n'aho tutashoboye kubihinyuza. Oya, yororero ry'ibikoko ntiruguruwe Ireresi imwe yakwiragijwe cane ibesha ngo abari mu myiyerekano babomoye uruzitiro rw'ikigo c'iyororero ry'ibikoko ry'ahitwa Hluhluwe mu ntara ya KwaZulu-Natal, intambwe n'ibindi bikoko bica biratoroka. Konte yacishijweko Twitter iyi reresi igabisha abantu "kuba maso" bakirinda intambwe n'ibindi bikoko, kandi abantu batari bake bagize ico babivugako, babishirako akamenyetso ko kubukunda (like) bongera barabukwiragiza ku ma konte yabo. Ariko rero ubu butumwa burayovya kuko iyi reresi ni iya kera cane. Ezemvelo KZN Wildlife, ikigo ca reta kijejwe iri yororero ry'ibikoko, kivuga ko iyi reresi yafashwe hagati mu kwa gatanu mu gihe c'imyiyerekano idasa na gato ata n'isano ifitaniye n'uyu yahoze ari umukuru w'ico gihugu. Iyi myiyerekano yari yatunganijwe n'abanyagihugu bari barakaye kubera kubura akazi muri ako karere. Ku wa 12 z'uku kw'indwi, abarongoye ico kigo banditse kuri Twitter bati: "Gushika ubu nta kintu kibi na kimwe kirigera gishikira uwu mutungo wacu". Read more from Reality Check Send us your questions

headline: DRC: Delcato Idengo yafatiwe i Butembo n'abajejwe umutekano
text: Umuririmvyi akunzwe muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo, Delcato Idengo, yafashwe yagirizwa guhamagarira abantu kugirira nabi abajejwe umutekano Uyu munyamuzika yafashwe ejo kuwa mungu ari mu muji wa Butembo uri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko. Abakunzi biwe bakoze imyiyerekano basaba yuko yorekurwa. Igipolisi cavuze yuko Idengo azoshinjwa ivyaha vyo kugomorera abantu kugirira nabi abapolisi n'abasirikare. Ariko uyu munyamuzika ntararenguka imbere ya sentare. Indirimbo za Idengo kenshi zinegura abajejwe intwaro, cane cane ingene bananiwe kugarukana umutekano mu buseruko bwa Kongo. Yarigeze kwagiriza igipolisi kuba ata na kimwe gikora ngo gihagarike ubwicanyi.

headline: Africa mu mafoto muri iyi ndwi: 20-26 Ukwezi kw'umunani 2021
text: Amwe amwe mu mafoto meza cane muri Afrika n'ahandi. Amafoto yose afitiwe uruhusha rwo kuyakoresha.

headline: Afrika yasezeye ihiganwa mpuzamakunu ry’igikombe c'umupira w’amaguru rihuza imirwi y’abagore
text: Ibihugu vya Nijeriya na Kameruni vyari bisigaye mw'ihiganwa mpuzamakungu ry'igikombe c'umupira w'amaguru rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu y'abagore vyasezeye iryo higanwa inyuma y'aho bitsindiwe mu gice c'umunani gishira ica nyuma. Nijeriya yatsinzwe ibitsindo bitatu n'umurwi w'Ubudagi mu rukino rwahuje iyo mirwi ku munsi wa gatandatu, aho vyabonetse ko Nijeriya yarushijwe. Igitsindo ca mbere cinjijwe n'umukinyi Alexandra Popp ku munota wa 20 ku mupira wari uterewe mu mfuruka z'ikibuga. Inyuma y'iminota itarenga itandatu, Nijeriya yari itsinzwe ica kabiri ku mupira waterewe ku metero 11, bivuye kw'ikosa umukinyi  Evelyn Nwabuoku wa Nijeriya yakoreye umudagi Lina Magull muri ca gice ca mukorumbone, ikosa ryagiye kuboneka hakoreshejwe bwa buhinga bwa videwo bufasha umuhagarikizi (VAR). Mu gice ca kabiri, Nijeriya yaragerageje kurondera gutsinda ariko biranka, niho ku munota wa 82 umukinyi Lea Schuller w'Ubudagi yatsinda igitsindo ca gatatu bivuye ku bakinyi b'inyuma ba Nijeriya bahanye umupira nabi. Eka na Kameruni ibintu ntivyoroshe, aho ubwo buhinga bwa VAR bwakoreshejwe  mu kwemeza igitsindo ca kabiri c'Ubwongereza, ariko kandi bukoreshwa mu guhakana igitsindo ca Kameruni. Inyuma y'aho umukinyi w'Ubwongereza Steph Houghton atsindiye igitsindo ca mbere ku munota wa 14, Kameruni yagerageje gusatira kugira ngo ikigombore, ariko biranka. Ku munota wa nyuma w'igice ca mbere, umukinyi Ellen White yatsinze igitsindo ca kabiri c'Ubwongereza cagiye kwemezwa habanje gukoreshwa bwa buhinga bwa videwo, kuko cari cabanje guhakanwa yiketswe ko yari yaraririye. Mu gice ca kabiri Kameruni yaje ifise ishaka ryo kurondera ibitsindo, mbere ku munota wa gatatu gusa w'igice ca kabiri, umukinyi Ajara Nchout yari yinjije igitsindo, ariko cagiye guhakanwa inyuma y'uko hakoreshejwe VAR bagasanga yari yaraririye. Abakinyi ba Kameruni barerekanye agashavu kabo ku ngingo zagiye zifatwa n'umuhagarikizi, bakavuga ko barenganijwe, mbere bakaba barashatse no kwanka gukina incuro zibiri zose. Iyo nyifato ikaba itanezereje umumenyereza w'Ubwongereza, Phil Neville, avuga ko abakinyi biwe bigenjeje neza. Mu rundi rukino, igihugu ca Brezili naco nyene caraye gisezeye iryo higanwa inyuma y'aho gitsindiwe n'Ubuifaransa ibitsindo bibiri kuri kimwe. Rwari urukino rutari rworoshe kuko  iminota 90 yose yagiye kurangira iyo mirwi inganije igitsindo kimwe kuri kimwe, bica biba ngombwa ko bongera ya minota 30. Ku munota ugira 106, niho umukinyi Amandine Henri yadadanura ibintu, mu gutsinda igitsindo catumye Ubufaransa bubandanya iryo higanwa, Brezili nayo igasezererwa. Mu nkino zitegekanijwe kuri uyu wa mbere, Espanye iza gutana mu mitwe na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, isaha cumi na zibiri (18h),  Suwede nayo ihure na Kanada isaha zitatu z'ijoro, ni mu masaha y'Uburundi n'u Rwanda.

headline: Red Flo Bio ya John Chris yamuronkeje ikidari c'inzahabu k'inzoga iryoshe cane ya 2021
text: Mw'ihiganwa ry'inzoga nziza riba buri mwaka ritegurwa n'ikigo Monde Selection, muri iyi ndwi inzoga yengwa n'umurundi John Chris Kavakure yatahukanye ikidari c'inzahabu c'inzoga ya mbere iryoshe cane muri uyu mwaka. Iyo nzoga yitwa Red Flo Bio yahiganishijwe n'ubundi bwoko bw'inzoga 3,100 zivuye mu bihugu 90 vyo mu mihingo itandukanye y'isi muri iri higanwa ryaba ku ncuro ya 60. Inzoga ziza muri iryo higanwa ziba zifise urugero rwo gukara rwa 7.5 Ihiganwa Monde Selection ni iry'ikompanyi yitwa International Quality Institute yo mu Bubiligi, ivuga ko ifise uburambe mu kuraba no kumva neza ibikorwa bifise akanovera kandi vyiza mu guteka, kwenga, amagara, eka n'ubwiza bw'imico kw'isi. John Chris Kavakure umubiligi kandi w'umurundi ashima ico kidari ngo kuko cerekanye ko abanye Afrika muri rusangi n'abarundi vy'umwihariko bashoboye. Yagize ati:"Kuba ndonse ico kidari ndi umurundi, avuka mu Bwiza, biha inguvu urundi rwaruka ko mu bikorwa bakora, ko ejo hashobora kuboneka umu John Chris mu burimyi, mu gushona, mu kworora." Kavakure amaze gukora ubwoko burenga 20 bw'inzoga mw'ihinguriro ryiwe rya Les Brasseries de Flobecq riri mu Bubiligi, akaba ashobora gukora ama 'hectolitres' 30.000 ku mwaka. John Chris avuga ko umwuga wo kwenga inzoga yawukundishijwe na nakuru wiwe. Ati:"Nyokuru ni we yatumye nkunda kwenga inzoga kuko namubona ariko arenga impeke ngaca nkurikirana ingene abigenza n'ivyo ashiramwo." Ivyo vyatumye agira ishaka ryo kwiga ubuhinga bwo kugana inzoga ziryoshe muri kaminuza aho yaronkeye impapuro z'imitsindo. Avuga ko umwambiro akoresha kugira inzoga iryohe ari ibanga ryiwe, ariko ko hariho iyo akura muri Afrika. John Chris ntakora inzoga gusa, aranubaka amahinguriro y'inzoga, aho hirya no hino kw'isi amaze gufasha kwubaka ayashika umunani harimwo n'ihinguriro ry'inzoga rigira kabiri mu Burundi riri mu ntara ya Ngozi muburaruko ryitwa Burundi Brewery rikora inzoga zitwa Soma Burundi. Ibindi bihugu birimwo amahinguriro yubatse ni nko muri Amerika, Ubuhinde, Ubudagi, Ubutaliyano no mu Bubiligi aho asanzwe aba nk'uko abivuga. Ikindi kidari c'inzahabu yaheruka kukironka mu 2018 ku nzoga yahinguye yitwa Flo58.

headline: Aung San Suu Kyi: Uwo yatembagajwe ku butegetsi bwa Myanmar yaciriwe iyindi myaka ine yo gupfungwa
text: Sentare yo muri Myanmar yaciriye Aung San Suu Kyi yakuwe ku butegetsi iyindi myaka ine yo gupfungwa, mu rubanza rwa vuba muri nyinshi zimurindiriye. Yahamijwe icaha co gutunga no kwinjiza mu gihugu  bitemewe n'amategeko amaradiyo yo gutumatumanako (talkie-walkies) hamwe no kurenga ku ngingo za Covid-19. Madame Suu Kyi yagiriwe n'icaha ubwa mbere mu kwezi kwa 12, aca acirirwa igihano kigufi  c'imyaka ibiri yo gupfungwa. Asanzwe apfunzwe kuva mu kwezi kwa kabiri igihe igisirikare catembagaza ubutegetsi bwiwe ubu akaba ahanganye n'ibirego vy'ivyaha birenga 10, vyose akaba abihakana. Vyariyamirijwe cane nk'akarenganyo. Vyibazwa ko ivyaha vyo kuri uyu wa mbere vyavuye mu gihe abasirikare basaka inzu yiwe ku munsi haba itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi n'ingabo zari zirongowe na jenerari  Min Aung Hlaing, uwo munsi akaba ariho bavuze ko batoye ivyo ibintu muri iyo nzu. Urubanza rwo kuri uyu wa mbere ku murwa mukuru Nay Pyi Taw nta binyamakuru vyemerewe kurukirira, abacamanza ba Madame Suu Kyi nabo bakaba barabujijwe kuvugana n'abamenyeshamakuru. Ico gihano ca vuba giciye kimushikana  ku myaka itandatu yo gufungwa. Mu kwezi guheze uwo yatsindiye agashimwe k'amahoro ka Nobel yahamijwe  guhamagarira abantu kutumvira ubutegetsi no kurenga ku mategeko ya Covid-19, mu ciyamirijwe n'umukuru w'urwego rwa ONU  rw'agateka ka zina muntu Michelle Bachelet nk'"urubanza rw'akamaramaza". Human Rigjhts Watch  nayo  yavuze ko izo manza ari "ikinamico ya sentare y'imanza zo mu kinyegero ku vyaha vy'irementanya… kugirango (Aung San Suu Kyi) azohere mw'ibohero". Itangazo ry'icegera c'umuyobozi w'iryo shirahamwe muri Asia, Phil Robertson, ryagirije kandi igisirikare "kumuhamya ivyaha muri sentare ijejwe kumuhezayo ku birego bidafashe kandi bishingiye ku mvo za poritike", rivuga ko "cirengagiza uburenganzira bw'abantu bose, kuva kuri Suu Kyi… gushika ku mihari y'abatayoboka ubutegetsi  mu mabarabara." Ifatwa ry'ubutegetsi n'igisirikare muri Myanmar (kizwi kandi nka Birmanie/Burma) mu kwezi kwa kabiri ryabaye haheze  amezi umugambwe wa San Suu Kyi, National League for Democracy (NLD), utsinze urukombamazi amatora yo mu kwezi kwa 11 mu 2020. Igisirikare cavuze  ko amatora yabayemwo ubusuma, ariko abakurikirana amatora bavuze ko muri rusangi yagenze neza. Itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi ryakiriwe n'imyiyerekano mu gihugu cose, igisikare ca Myamar kikaba kitihanganiye abitaba iyo myiyerekano basaba demokrasi, abaharanira uburenganzira hamwe n'abamenyeshamakuru. Madame Suu Kyi ni umwe mu bantu barenga 10.600 bafashwe n'igisirikare kuva mu kwezi kwa kabiri, mu gihe abandi barenga 1.303 bishwe mu myiyerekano nk'uko bivugwa n'umugwi ubikurikirana, Assistance Association for Political Prisoners.

headline: France bari kwibaza abashaka gutyoza Pfizer
text: Benshi mu  bantu bafise ababakurikira benshi ku mbuga hwaniro mu Bufaransa bavuga ko baronse ubutumwa batazi  uwaburungitse bwo kubemerera amafaranga kugira bavuge nabi urucanco rwa Pfizer. Bavuga ko ikigo kivuga ko gikorera mu Bwongereza cabarondeye kuri email (uburyo bwo kurungika ikete kuri internet)  kibasaba ko "bokorana". Léo Grasset afise abamukurikira kuri You Tube miriyoni 1,17 yanditse kuri twitter ko "hemewe amafaranga menshi" n'umukiriya "yashatse ko umwidondoro wiwe utamenyekana". Yavuze ko imyidondoro yo  kuri Linkln y'abiyita ko ari abakozi baco yari yashoboye kubona mu nyuma yanyitse , ariko yari yamaze kubona ko ''bose bakoze mu Burusiya". Léo Grasset yashize ku rubuga ivyo avuga ko ari ingingo  zo gukurikiza z'ico kigo , zamusaba kudakoresha amajambo nko "kwamamaza" canke "video yarishwe" hamwe yokwemera ko bakorana. Email yamubwira ngo: "Uzokwerekane ko ari  ingene wewe nyene ubona ibintu". Canamusaba gukwiragiza mu bamukurukira ku  mbuga hwaniro icemezo c'ububeshi ko  urugero rwo gupfa mu bantu baba batewe urucanco rwa Pfizer ruhakwa gusumba incuro zitatu ababa batewe urwa AstraZeneca. Ibigo n'bandi bantu benshi bafise ababakurikira benshi ku mbuga hwaniro mu Bufaransa, bose bari mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu n'ubuhanga (science), bavuze ko nabo baronse ubutumwa nk'ubwo. Et Ça Se Dit Médecin, yimenyereza mu bitaro akaba afise abamukurikira 85.000 kuri Instagram, yabwiye television yo mu Bufaransa BFMTV ko yemerewe ama Euros 2.050 (miriyoni hafi 5 z'amafaranga y'Uburundi) kugira ashire inkuru y'ama sekunda 30 ku rubuga rwiwe. Hagati aho umushikiranganji w'Ubufaransa ajejwe amagara Olivier Véran yabwiye BFMTV ati: "Ivyo bintu sinzi iyo bizanana, ko ari mu Bufaransa canke hanze. "Birababaje, birabangamye, uwubikora ntaco anezwe kandi ntibishobora gukora." Urucanco rwa Pfizer ruterwa incuro zibiri (izina ryose ni Pfizer-BioNtech) nirwo rukoreshwa cane mu Bufaransa. Rukorwa n'ikompanyi za  Pfizer muri Amerika na BioNTech mu Budagi. AstraZeneca, narwo ruterwa kabiri kandi rukoreshwa mu Bufaransa, rwo rukorwa n'ihinguriro ry'imiti i ry'Ubwongereza na Suede. Mu kwezi kwa kane, icegeranyo c'ishirahamwe rya Buraya cavuze ko ibinyamakuru vyegamiye reta mu Busiya no mu Bushinwa bigerageza kubiba mu bantu kwinuba incanco za Covid zikorerwa mu bihugu vya Buraya - ikirego Uburusiya bwahakanye.

headline: Coronavirus - Burundi: Leta imenyesha ko hari abandi batanu basanzemwo uwo mugera
text: Itangazo ryasohowe n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu n'ukurwanya SIDA uyu munsi kuwa kabiri, rivuga ko abo bantu batanu bari mu bantu 198 bapimwe kubera bazwi ko bari bamaranye umwanya n'abandi batanu baherutse gutorwa uwo mugera. Gushika ubu, abashika 11 nibo bamaze kumenyekana ko banduye uwo mugera kuva umuntu wa mbere atowe ko yanduye muri ico gihugu. Mw'iryo tangazo, ubwo bushikiranganji bumenyeshako babandanya bakurikirana « abantu bamaranye umwanya munini n'abo barwayi bashasha batowe coronavirus mu ntumbero yo kumenya abandi boba baranduye ». Hagati aho, ubwo bushikiranganji ntibutanga umwidondoro w'abo bantu bashasha banduye Covid-19. Busaba abanyagihugu kubandanya bakurikiza impanuro zo kwikingira no gukingira abandi uwomugera. Ibiro vy'ubwo bushikiranganji bivuga ko bane muri ba barwayi batanu ba mbere batangura gufatwa n'uwomugera bapimwe ku magenekerezo ya 18 na 19 z'uku kwa kane bagasanga nta migera bagifise, bakaba bahawe uruhusha rwogusubira mu miryango yabo kuri uyu wa 21/04. Umugera wa coronavirus watanguye kumenyekana ko winjiye mu Burundi ku wa 31 z'ukwezi kwa gatatu guheze. Gushika ubu mu Burundi nta mategeko abuza abantu gusohoka arafatwa nk'uko biri mu bimwe cyo mu karere, kiretse gusa kubaha impanuro zo kugira isuku. Eka n'amashure n'abasengero arabandanya ibikorwa vyayo ukuri kwamye. Ingendo z'indege zunguruza ingenzi nizo zahagaritswe, imbibe nazo zikaba zugaye ku ruja n'uruza rusanzwe. Gushika ubu Afrika niyo irangwamwo abanduye coronavirus bake ugereranije n'iyindi migabane, ariko hakaba ubwoba ko mu minsi uyu mugabane ushobora kuba ikiririmbiro rishasha ry'uwu mugera.

headline: USA itegura kugabanya ikiringo ca viza gushika ku myaka ibi ku banyeshure bava muri Africa
text: Amategeko mashasha yerekeye abimukira muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ashobora gutuma abanyeshuri benshi bo muri Afurika muri iki gihugu bisanga mu kangaratete bikaba ngombwa ko bategerezwa gusaba ayandi ma viza batararangiza amashure yabo. Integuro yashikirijwe n'ubunyamabanga bujejwe umutekano mu gihugu (DHS), iriko irigwa muri kino gihe, yerekana impinduka ku bijanye n'ama viza y'abanyeshuri yahora atangwa afise ikiringo cose bazomara bariko bariga. Mu gihe abanyeshuri bakomoka mu bihugu vyinshi bazoronswa ama viza y'imyaka ine, hari abandi atazorenza imyaka ibiri gusa. Ubunyamabanga bujejwe umutekano mu gihugu buvuga ko  iyi ngingo ifashwe kubera impungenge nyinshi zijanye na "magendo, ubugizi bwa nabi hamwe n'umutekano w'igihugu". Abantu bakomoka mu bihugu, harimwo na Sudani, bashizwe ku rutonde na Amerika nk'ibihugu bifasha abakora iterabwoba nibo ahanini bazokorwako n'iyi ngingo. Ariko kugeza ubu, igice kinini ni abava mu bihugu bifise abantu bavyo barenga 10% bafise amaviza yabo yarengeje ikiringo. Muri ibi harimwo Nijeriya aho mu 2019 yari ku rugero rwa 13% rw'abarengeje iminsi yo kuba muri ico gihugu nk'uko vyerekanwa mu biharuro bitangwa na leta. Ibindi bihugu bifatwa n'iyi ngingo harimwo:

headline: Umutegetsi wa Arabia Saoudite yaronse ubudahangarwa bwa US kw'iyicwa ry'umumenyeshamakuru
text: Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zashinze ko, uwo mu vy’ukuri ari we mutegetsi wa Arabia Saoudite-Umuganwa Samuragwa Mohammed bin Salman -afise ubudahangarwa ku rubanza yashingishirijwe n’umu- fiancée w’umunyamakuru yagandaguwe Jamal Khashoggi. Khashoggi, yari azwi  cane nk’umuntu anegura ubutegetsi bwa Arabia Saoudite, yagandaguriwe mu biro vy’ubuserukizi bw’ico gihugu muri Istambul mu kwezi kw’icumi mu 2018. Iperereza rya Amerika ryavuze ko ryibaza ko Umuganwa Mohammed ari  we yategetse ko uwo mumenyeshamakuru yicwa. Ariko mu nyandiko bwarungitse muri sentare, ubushikiranganji bujejwe imigenderanire ya Amerika n’amakungu bwavuze ko afise ubudahangarwa bivanye n’amabanga mashasha afise y’umushikiranganji wa mbere. Uwari umu- fiancée wa Khashoggi, Hatice Cengiz, yanditse kuri Twitter ko “Jamal yongeye gupfa uyu munsi” kubera iyo ngingo. We- hamwe n’ishirahamwe riharanira uburenganzira bwa zina muntu Democracy for the Arab World Now (Dawn), ryashinzwe na Khashoggi – bariko bararondera indishi itamenyeshejwe uko ingana muri Amerika kuri uwo muganwa  samuragwa kubera urupfu rw’umu- fiancé wiwe. Ico kirego cagiriza uwo mutegetsi n’abo bafashanya kuba "baranyuruje, baraboha, barakwega, barica urubozo, hanyuma baragandagura Jamal Khashoggi", yari umumenyeshamakuru n’uwurwanira demokrasi yaba muri Amerika. Umunyamabanga mukuru wa Amnesty International , Agnes Callamard, yavuze ati: “Uyu munsi ni ubudahangarwa. Vyose biganisha ku kudahana.” Umuganwa Mohammed yagenywe kuba umuganwa samuragwa na se, Umwami Salman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud, mu 2017. Uwo mugabo w’imyaka 37 yaciye ahabwa amabanga y’umushikiranganji wa mbere mu kwezi kw’icenda uyu mwaka. Arahakana uruhara urwari rwo rwose mw’iyicwa rya Khashoggi. Abashingwamanza b’ubushikiranganji bw’ubutungane bavuze ko “nk’umukuru wa reta y’ikindi gihugu ari mu mabanga ,”umuganwa samuragwa afise ubudahangarwa bw’umukuru w’igihugu hisunzwe amategeko ya sentare za Amerika nk’ingaruka z’ayo mabanga.” Ariko reta ya prezida Biden  yashatse gusigura ko iyo ngingo itavuze ko ari ukwemeza ko ata caha cakozwe. Arabia Saoudite yavuze ko uwo yahoze ari umumenyeshamakuru wa Washington Post yari yishswe mu “gikorwa kitazwi n’abategetsi” n’umugwi w’abakozi bari barungitswe kumwumvisha ko yotaha mu gihugu. Ariko, abategetsi ba Amerika bavuga ko iperereza rya CIA ryanzuye, “ku rugero ruri hagati no hejuru rw’uko ari vyo”, ko MBS – nk’uko uwo muganwa azwi – yari abifisemwo uruhara. Iryo gandagurwa ryarababaje amakungu hanyuma ryonona rinacafuza ishusho ry’umuganwa Mohammed n’iy’igihugu ciwe. Ryatumye kandi imigenderanire ya Amerika na Arabia Saoudite isubira hasi, aho prezida Biden yarahiye ko “azoharira ivomo” ico gihugu igihe yariko ariyamamariza ikibanza c’umukuru w’igihugu mu 2019. Biden yaranse kuvugana na Mohammed bin Salman akiba umukuru w’igihugu. Ariko muri iri ici, prezida Biden yavuze ko ashaka “gusubiramwo intumbero” y’imigenderanire, imbere y’urugendo yagize muri Arabia Saoudite mu kwezi kw’indwi. Urwo rugendo, aho yafotowe ariko aramukanya n’uwo muganwa bakozanyako ibipfunsi – rwaraneguwe ko ari nk’urwo gushigikira reta ya Arabia Saoudite inyuma y’igandagurwa rya Khashoggi. Sarah Leah Whitson, umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa Dawn, yanditse kuri Twitter ati “birenze agashinyaguro kuba prezida Biden we wenyene  yatumye MBS akwepa kubazwa ivyo yakoze mu gihe ari prezida Biden ubwiwe yari yemereye abanyamerika ko azokora ibishoboka vyose kugira yishure ivyo yakoze. Ingingo yo ku wa kane yahaye uwo mutegetsi wo mu Arabia Saoudite “uruhusha rwo kwica”, ku bw’umuhungu w’umunya-Arabia Saoudite yahoze ari mu bajejwe umutekano ubu akaba ari mu buhungiro Saad al-Jabri, yagirije umushikiranganji wa mbere gutota umuryango wiwe no kurungika muri Canada abantu bo kuja kumwica. Nihad Awad, umoyobozi ku rwego rw’igihugu muri  Council on American-Islamic Relations [Inama ku migenderanire ya Amerika na Islam], yavuze ati ubutegetsi bwa Biden bwagujije amaraso ya  Jamal Khashoggi n’ibitoro vya Arabia Saoudite”.

headline: Umviriza Domitien Ndayizeye ingene avuga ku matora yo ku wa 20 z'ukwa gatanu 2020
text: Domitien Ndayizeye avuga ko mu gihe Evariste Ndayishimiye yokwemezwa burundu ntacobuza ko amwemera. Ni mu kiganiro yagiranye na Prudent Nsengiyumva wa BBC Gahuzamiryango, wokumviriza ufyonze aho ruguru kw'ifoto.

headline: Umunsi wahariwe isi: Umurundi Yves Kami mu bakoze indirimbo iwuhimbaza
text: Umuririmvyi w'Umurundi Yves Kami ari mu bandi 200 bo hirya no hino kw'isi bahinyanyuye indirimbo Resolution Song, igamije guhimiriza abatuye isi kuyikingira. Itariki ya 22/04/2022 ni umunsi mpuzamakungu wahariwe kwita ku si dutuye mu gukingira ibidukikije, ukaba wahuriranye n'ishirwa ahabona icese ry'umugambi Resolution Project. Uwo mugambi ni uw'indirimbo yiswe Resolution Song yerekeye gukingira ibidukikije, yagomba kuririmbwa mu ndimi 200 zo hirya no hino kw'isi. Umugambi Resolution Project watangujwe n'ikigo Tackroom Theatre, gifadiganije n'ibigo bihinyanyura umuziki hamwe n'ivy'imbuga hwaniro birimwo Deccca Records, WWF International, Tik Tok, Acccenture n'abandi baririmvyi batandukanye bo kw'isi yose. Muri abo baririmvyi, harimwo Umurundi Yves Kami, akaba ari we yatowe mu Burundi ngo akore iyo ndirimbo ashizemwo ikirundi akanayiha umudiho w'ikirundi. Ku bw'ukwo gutoranywa, Kami yabwiye BBC ati: "Jewe ndi umu 'artiste' akora umudiho wisunze imidiho yo ngaha iwacu. Nkora afro ndayicanze n'ingoma nzo ngaha mu Burundi. "Burya ivyo umuntu aba ariko arakora barabikurikirana. Nagiye mbona umuntu andondeye, arambarira umugambi nanje numva neza ko ari umugambi mwiza. "... umuziki wacu tuwukoresha kugira [duhimirize] abantu [...] tuwukoresha kugira ngo ushobore gufasha [ikibano] tubayemwo." Umugambi Resolution Project watangujwe mu 2019 ku cicaro ca ONU, ukaba ushigikiwe na ba rurangiranwa ba Hollywood nka Emma Thomson, Naomi Harris, Keira Knightly, Marc Rylance na Bill Bailey. Intumbero yari uko itariki ya 22/04/2022 ishika izo ndirimbo zose 200 hamwe na video zazo vyamaze gushirwa ahabona bishobora kwumvirizwa. Izo ndirimbo zose zifise amajambo amwe hamwe n'injana (melodie) imwe, ariko buri muririmvyi akaza arashiramwo akiwe kajanye n'umuco wiwe. Kami avuga ko bitari vyoroshe guhindura mu kirundi indirimbo isanzwe iriho ngo ariko baroroherejwe. Yagize ati: "Cabaye igikorwa kitoroshe ariko baraduhaye umwidegemvyo wo gukora irya ndirimbo twisunze ama 'realites' yacu yo mu Burundi. "Nico gituma muri irya ndirimbo murumvamwo inanga y'ikirundi, murumvamwo ingoma, murumvamwo akazehe, murumvamwo umudiho w'amayaya." Urashobora kwumva ukanaraba amashusho y'indirimbo Resolution Song ya Yves Kami ngaha.

headline: BBC Gahuzamiryango yabateguriye amwe mu makuru makuru makuru yavuzwe cane mu Rwanda
text: Mu Rwanda haravuzwe cane umubano mubi n’igihugu c’u Rwanda, inyuma y’aho impande zompi zibandanije ziterana amajambo, u Rwanda rwagiriza Uganda ko ibandanya ifasha imirwi ishaka guhungabanya umutekano w’igihugu, kandi ko ihohotera abanyarwanda bari ku butaka bwayo. Uganda nayo yagiriza u Rwanda gukorera ibikorwa vy’igendereza ku butaka bwayo. Imigenderanire hagati y'u Rwanda na Uganda yagiye kuba nabi gusumba kuva mu mpera z'ukwezi kwa kabiri uno mwaka, aho u Rwanda rufatiye ingingo yo kwugara umupaka wa Gatuna hagati y'ivyo bihugu bibiri, rukabuza amakamyo guca kuri uwo mupaka kubera ibikorwa vy'urwubako. Haravuzwe kandi vyinshi mu biraba umutekano muri ico gihugu, aho Perezida Kagame atarya umunwa mu kuvuga ko uwuzohirahira akarondera guhungabanya umutekano bazomuhigisha uruhindu. Bimwe ni nk’ ibitero bibiri vy’inyeshamba vyakozwe mu kibira ca Nyungwe hafi y’umupaka n’u Burundi, ivyatumye u Burundi bushirwa mu majwi n’u Rwanda ko bufasha abashaka guhungabanya u Rwanda. Umuhari FLN niwo watangaje ko ariwo wakoze ivyo bitero, uciye ku wari umuvugizi wawo majoro Callixte Nsabimana "SANKARA". Mu nyuma niho uyo majoro Sankara yahavuye afatwa, amakuru akavuga ko yafatiwe mu birwa vya Comores. Haravuzwe umuhari RNC uyobowe na Jenerali Kayumba Nyamwasa, aho abarwanyi bawo 15 bashikanywe muri sentare ya gisirikare bagirizwa ivyaha bitari bike harimwo gukorana n’igihugu c’amahanga mu ntumbero yo guhungabanya umutekano. Ibihugu vya Uganda n’u Burundi vyaravuzwe ko vyariko bifasha uwu murwi. Haravuzwe kandi ifatwa ry’abahoze ari abategetsi b’umuhari w’inyeshamba FDLR, aribo koroneri Jean Pierre Nsekanabo alias Abega yari ashinzwe igendereza muri uyo muhari, hamwe na Ignace Nkaka alias La Forge Fils Bazeye yari umuvugizi. Bafashwe n’gisirikare ca DR Congo ku mupaka wa Bunagana bavuye muri Uganda mu kwezi kwa 12 umwaka uheze bavuye mu gihugu ca Uganda, bakaba barengukishijwe mu bucamanza ubwa mbere. Muri politike, haravuzwe ivyerekeye Victoire Ingabire yahoze ayoboye umugambwe (Ishyaka) FDU – Inkingi, akaba yarasezeye uwo mugambwe atanguza uwundi yise (Development and Liberty For All), DALFA - Umurinzi. Iyo ngingo yatangaje benshi, aho bamwe bavuze ko agurishije bagenziwe bahoze basangiye kuyobora umugmbwe FDU, abandi nabo bati yaguzwe n’umugambwe uri ku butegetsi, ivyo ahakana. Mu biraba inkino, haravuzwe ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’umupira w’amaguru ca Afrika, aho ibihugu vy’akarere, Tanzania, Kenya, Uganda, Uburundi na Repubulika y’Itwaro Rusangi ya Congo vyashoboye kuronka uburenganzira bw’ukwitabira izo nkino, ariko u Rwanda rukaba rutashobore kuronka ayo mahirwe. Hagati aho, rurishimira ko rwashoboye kwubaka inyubakwa y’agatangaza, Kigali Arena, mu ntumbero yo guteza imbere  umupira w’amaboko (Basketball). Perezida Kagamwe ati: “Ntabwo iyi nyubako twayikoreye kubera ko isa neza gusa canke kuza kuyiraba gusa (…) tukishima, twayikoze kugira ngo ibihangange vy’u Rwanda, vya Afrika muri uyu mukino bishobore kuhitoreza, kuhakinira, kuhatsindira…”. BBC Gahuzamiryango yarabashikirije kandi ibiganiro vyinshi bivuga ku bikorwa n’ubuzima bw’abagore. Umviriza amakuru aramvuye aho hejuru.

headline: Covid: DR Congo iriko yiruka n'umwanya mu kwihutira gucandaga abanyagihugu
text: Umuforomakazi Jeanne Dusungu ariko aracandaga Covid-19 uwari we wese aje mw'ihema rya Unicef ryera riri ku bitaro vyo mu karere ka Kivu ya ruguru, i Goma - ariko abaza bo muri ako karere ni bake. Avuga ati:"Hari ibihuha bimwe bimwe biriko birakwiragizwa ko uru rucanco atari rwo, ko ruzotuma tutavyara. Hari abantu biyumvira gutyo." "Nguma mbwira abantu ngo baze kwicandagisha - ruragukingira wewe nyene hamwe n'abandi, umuryango wawe hamwe n'igihugu cose." Ariko mu gihugu ca RD Congo, ica kabiri mu bunini muri Afrika, gifise ubunini busa n'ubungana n'Uburaya bwo mu burengero, bisa n'intambara itoroshe. Abantu 5.000 bonyene ni bo bamaze kwicandagisha ku bantu bashakakungana n'imiliyoni 90. Hanyuma mu gisagara ca Goma, aho gucandaga kwatanguye inyuma yo guceregwa igihe kitari gito, hari amakenga yo kutitaho ico gikorwa. Bisigura ko incanco imiliyoni 1.3 kuzishika imiliyoni 1.7 zatanzwe mu ntango z'ukwezi kwa gatatu biciye mu mugambi wa Covax - umugambi mpuzamakungu wo kuronka incanco ku rugero rumwe - ziriko ziratangwa mu bindi bihugu vya Afrika imbere y'uko ikiringo zategekanirijwe gukoreshwa kirangira mu mpera z'ukwezi kwa gatandatu. Impamvu ni nyinshi: Hari kandi icizere gike muri ico gikorwa no ku mareta hakaba hari abumva ko Covid ari ikintu gito ugereranije n'izindi ngwara zica nka Ebola n'agasama. Ingwara y'agasama yaheruka kwaduka muri RD Congo yahitanye abantu barenga 7.000 -benshi muri bo bari abana, mu gihe Ebola yo iguma igenda igaruka. Kuri bamwe mu bantu baba i Goma, Covid ntigaragara. Claudine w'imyaka 40, akora akazi ko gukubura, avuga ko atarigera abona umuntu ahitanywe n'iyo ngwara, kandi ntayitinya, bitandukanye n'uko abona Ebola. Ku bandi bari muri ico gihugu ca RD Congo ciziziwe n'intambara, hari ibindi vyihuta gukorwa gusumba Covid-19. Gabriel w'imyaka 46 akora akazi ko kwunguruza abantu kw'ikinga agira ati:"Intambara yahitanye abantu benshi gusumba abahitanwa na Covid." Josue, umunyeshure w'imyaka 23 yahisemwo kutitaho ibivugwa ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi ahubwo ashira inguvu ziwe mu vyigwa no kurondera akazi. John Remi Bahati w'imyaka 35 atagira akazi avuga ati:"Twarumvise ko Covid-19 ishobora kwica abantu benshi ariko ibibazo bikomeye cane ni umutekano muke hamwe n'ibura ry'akazi kubera tutazi neza nimba n'ejo tuzoba tugihema." Muri Afrika, ibihugu 42 ku 54 vyaragiye mu mugambi Covax bironswa incanco imiliyoni 18.3 , izababa imiliyoni 8 zikaba ari zo zimaze gukoreshwa. Uwo mugambi ufise intumbero yo gusaranganya incanco za Covid kw'isi hose ku rugero rumwe. Urucanco rwa Oxford-AstraZeneca ni rwo rwatanzwe ku rugero rw'ibice 90% ku mugabane wa Afrika, rukaba rukorerwa mu gihugu c'Ubuhinde. Covax ishaka gucandaga n'imiburiburi ibice 20% vy'abantu baba muri Afrika gushika mu mpera z'umwaka wa 2021, ibice 3% - n'ukuvuga incanco imiliyoni 90 - bikaba bigenewe abakozi bo kwa muganga hamwe n'iyindi migwi igeramigwa n'iyo ngwara gusumba abandi.

headline: LONG WAY yaririmbwe na Rist Shimwa Muyizere: umuhungu wa Victoire Ingabira
text: LONG WAY yaririmbwe na Rist Shimwa Muyizere:  umuhungu wa Victoire Ingabire

headline: Umunonotsi Olivia Breen yashavuriye umutegetsi yamubwiye ko yambara udukariso tugufi cane
text: Uyu munonotsi amaze gutsindira imidari y'inzahabu incuro zibiri mu mikino y'abafise ubumuga (Paralympics), Olivia Breen avuga ko yashavuye cane abura n'ico avuga inyuma y'aho abwiriwe ko yokwambara agakabutura "kabereye gusumba". Breen w'imyaka 24 avuga ko umutegetsi wo mu gisata kijejwe amahiganwa mu Bwongereza yamubwiye ku wa Mungu ko udukariso yambara ari "tugufi cane kandi tumugaragaza cane". Uyu munonotsi yiruka ku metero ngufi akongera agasimba ku ntera ndende (saut en longueur/long-jump) avuga ko yashize ahabona ibi kugira ngo ntibize bishikire n'abandi. Breen ati: "Ibi vyanshavuje cane kandi si vyiza na gato". "Erega tahura ko ata burenganzira bafise bwo kuvuga ku vyo dushobora canke tudashobora kwambara". Breen yatsindiye umudari w'inzahabu mu mahiganwa ahuza abafise ubumuga kanaka ya ralley (T35-38 4x100m) mu 2015, hamwe no mu 2017 mw'ihiganwa ryo gusimba ku ntera ndende, kandi yamye yambara uducupi tumwe ari mu mwuga wiwe. Yabwiye ikiganiro Woman's Hour ca BBC Radio 4 ati: "Zimeze nka bikini zigera hejuru". "Ndazambaye  mu kiringo c'imyaka icenda, nta ngorane nigeze ngira kandi twategerezwa kwumva ko ata ngorane dufise ku vyo twambaye". "Dushaka kwumva ko tubangukiwe uko bishoboka kwose iyo turi mu mahiganwa, ntitwumve ko turemerewe, kandi tutisanzuye". "Ni uburenganzira bwacu kwambara uko twiyumva". Breen - yatsindiye kandi umudari wa bronze mu mikino ya Paralempike yabereye i Londres mu 2012, avuga ko ivyamushikiye vyabaye ahejeje guhiganwa mu gusimba ku ntera ndende i Bedford.
