Ati: "Nari mpejeje ihiganwa ryanje ndiko nshimira abategetsi kubona baramfashije bakamba hafi ariho rero uyu mutegetsi yanyegera akambwira ati 'ndashobora kuvugana nawe?' nanje nti ego nta ngorane, hari ikibazo nyabaki'?". "Yambwiye ati 'nibaza ko agakariso wambaye kakwerekana cane, nibaza ko ukwiye kuraba ingene wogura agakabutura'. Narabuze ico mvuga, icanjemwo kwabaye kumubaza nti 'uriko urifyinatira?'." Breen avuga ko abanonotsi b'abagabo/abahungu badashobora gukurikiranwa gutyo canke ngo banegurwe, amaze kwandika ku mbuga hwaniro ivyo yabwiwe, yavuze ko n'abandi banonotsi b'abagore bamubwiye ko na bo nyene bahuye n'ivyo bibazo. Yongera ko ati: "Nta ngorane nari bwigere numva, ariko ivyabaye ejo vyaranshavuje cane, kandi ndavye inyishu naronse kuri  Instagram na Twitter, vyarabaye no ku bandi bakobwa benshi ndetse n'abanonotsi bakiri bato, kandi ibi bitegerezwa guhinduka". "Nibaza ko abantu batubahuka kubishira ahabona kubera batinya, nipfuza ko abantu biyemera bakabishira ahabona kuko ivyabaye si vyo kandi ni ngombwa ko bihagarara". "Ibi nzobigeza kure hashoboka, ngomba gutanga ubutumwa kugira ngo mpindure ibintu mu bijanye n'ukwinonora imitsi ku bagore n'abakobwa kugira ngo abantu bareke kuvuga ku vyo dushobora canke tudashobora kwambara". Uwundi munonotsi w'umwongerezakazi nyene, Amelia Stricker atera ibiremereye (lanceuse de poids/shot putter), avuga ko uyu mutegetsi yavuze aya majambo "atagira akamaro" atari akwiye guhagarikira inkino, iciyumviro asangiye na Breen. Ati: "Egooo, ndavyemera cane". "Bakora igikorwa kidasanzwe kandi ndashima ingene badufasha, ariko ntibategerezwa kudutegeka ivyo twambara. Bari ng'aho ku kazi kabo no kudufasha, ariko atari kuvuga ubujambojambo ku vyo twambaye, ntibibaraba". Umuvugizi w'igisata kijejwe ukwinonora imitsi yavuze ko bazi ico kibazo kandi ko bagiye gukora amatohoza. Ati: "Ni ngombwa ko abari mu mahiganwa bose bumva ko bagononokewe kugira ngo bashobore guhiganwa neza".

headline: Russia-Ukraine: umugambi wa UK wo kwigisha ingabo za Ukraine watanguye
text: Umurwi wa mbere w’ingabo za Ukraine watanguye inyigisho za gisirikare nshasha mu Bwongereza mu ntumbero yo gufasha ico gihugu kurwanya ingabo z’Uburusiya zateye igihugu cabo. Abasirikare ba Ukraine bagera kuri 10.000 nibo bazoronswa izi nyigisho ku birindiro bitandukanye vy’ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi mu gihugu cose mu mezi make ari imbere. Uyu mugambi uzofasha abitangira igihugu cabo kuronka ubuhinga bukenewe bwo kurwana ku rubuga rw’intambara, nk’uko ubu bushikiranganji bubivuga. Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi Ben Wallace avuga ko iyi yari yo “ntambwe ikurikira” mu twigoro tw’Uwongereza two gufata mu mugongo ingabo za Ukraine. Abasirikare bababa 1050 b’Ubwongereza nibo bahawe iki gikorwa co kwigisha ingabo za Ukraine ku bigo bitandukanye mu gihugu cose – ku birometero birenga 1600 uvuye ku rubuga rw’intambra mu karere ka Donbas mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Uwu mugambi w’Ubwongereza ufise intumbero yo kwigisha abanya-Ukraine gushika ku 10.000 mu misi 120, ariko “bibaye ngombwa bazokwiyongera”, nk’uko umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi abivuga. Ati: "Turi mu minwe y’abanya -Ukraine. "Dukoresheje ubuhinga karuhariwe kw’isi bw’igisirikare c’Ubwongereza, tuzofasha Ukraine kunagura igisirikare cayo tubongerereze n’ubushobozi bwo kwivuna mu gihe bariko bararwanira ubwigenge bw’igihugu cabo be n’uburenganzira bwo kwihitiramwo ku vyerekeye kazoza kabo”. Ibi vyigwa bishingiye ku nyigisho shingiro z’igisirikare c’Ubwongereza, harimwo gukoresha ibirwanisho, ubutabazi bwihuta ku rubuga rw’intambara, kwiga akarere, amayeri yo gukizura hamwe n’amategeko ajanye n’intambara ya gisirikare. Ingabo za Ukraine zababa 22.000 ziramaze kwigishwa n’Ubwongereza mu ciswe, Operation Orbital, hagati ya 2015 na 2022. Gushika ubu, Ubwongereza bumaze guha Ukraine imfashanyo ya gisirikare ifise agaciro k’imiriyaridi 2.3 z’amapawundi mu guhangana n’igitero c’Uburusiya, harimwo ibirwanisho birenga 5000 bisambura vya bimodoka ntamenwa (NLAW) hamwe na vya muzinga vyo mu bwoko bwa M270 birasa ibisasu vya rokete vyinshi ica rimwe. Umushikiranganji  Wallace, mu gihe afatwa nk’uwushobora kuba ari imbere mu bazosubirira Boris Johnson nk’umushikiranganji wa mbere n’umukuru w’umugambwe w’aba Convervateurs /Conservative, avuga ko uwuzomusubirira mu kibanza c’umushikiranganji wa mbere w’’Ubwongereza azokenera kwiyemeza gushira uburyo mu gisata co kwivuna abansi. Abanya-Ukraine kandi bariko barahabwa inyigisho zidasanzwe muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Intwazangabo nkuru nkuru ziriko ziriga ku kigo ca Fort Leavenworth mu ntara ya Kansas, abahinga bakavuga ko inyigisho bahakura zizobaha ubushobozi bwo gutegura urugamba rukomeye rwo kwivuna umwansi ateye igihugu cabo.

headline: Russia ifise umugambi wo kwigarurira ubutaka bwa Ukraine – US
text: Uburusiya bufise umugambi wo kwigarurira ubundi butaka bwa Ukraine bukoresheje “amayeri” nk’ayo bwakoresheje mu kwigarurira akarere ka Crimea/Crimée, nk’uko Amerika ibivuga. Yisunze amatohoza ya Amerika, umuvugizi w’Inama nkuru y’igihugu ijejwe umutekano John Kirby avuga ko Uburusiya buriko burategura inzira yo kwigarurira ubutaka. Uturere twa Ukraine tumaze kwigarurirwa dushobora kubamwo amatora ya kamarampaka “y’uruhendo” yo kwegekwa ku Burusiya imbere y’ukwezi kw’icenda, nk’uko abivuga. Uburusiya bwarigaruriye Crimea buyonkoye kuri Ukraine mu 2014 inyuma ya kamarampaka yabonetse cane ko itari yemewe. Kirby yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: "Turashaka kubisigurira neza abanyagihugu ba Amerika. Nta n’umwe ashobora kwihenda. [Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya] ariko arakoresha amayeri yo mu 2014". Yagiriza Uburusiya gushira intwaro mu minwe y’abategetsi batemewe begamiye ku Burusiya mu burongozi bw’uturere twa Ukraine twigaruriwe, mu ntumbero yo gutegura amatora ya kamarampaka yo kwegukira Uburusiya. Kirby avuga ko ibizoba muri ano matora bishobora gukoreshwa n’Uburusiya mu “kugerageza gusaba ko ubutaka bwa Ukraine bubwegukira”. Uburusiya bwaramaze gushiraho abategetsi b’uturere babwo mu bice vya Ukraine bumaze kwigarurira. Crimea yigaruriwe n’Uburusiya mu 2014 inyuma y’amatora ya kamarampaka yateguwe gihutihuti - amatora amakungu yafashe ko ateye kubiri n’amategeko, aho abatoye bahisemwo kwegukira Uburusiya. Abenshi mu bari bashigikiye Kyiv baranse kuja muri ayo matora kandi n’imyiyamamazo ntiyabaye mu muco. Amatora asa n’ayo mu tundi turere twa Ukraine nta nkeka ko ashobora kuba nk’aya nyene, aho uwo ari we wese yorwanya umugambi wo kwegukira Uburusiya yorwanywa bikomeye. Kirby avuga ko ashize ahabona imigambi y’Uburusiya “kugira ngo isi imenye ko umugambi uvugwa wo kwigarurira ubutaka bwa Ukraine ari ikintu categuwe imbere y’igihe, kandi ko kitemewe n’amategeko”, mbere akaba yavuze ko Amerika n’incuti zayo bizotegerezwa kwihora vuba bwango. Avuga ko mu turere dushobora kwigarurirwa harimwo Kherson, Zaporizhzhia, Donetsk na Luhansk.

headline: UK: Abanye-Kenya bariko barashaka kwitwara kubera amabi bakorewe ku bukoloni
text: Umugwi w'abanye-Kenya bitwariye reta y'Ubwongereza muri sentare y'agateka ka zina muntu ya Buraya (ECHR) ku mabi bakorewe mu gihe c'ubukoloni. Muri yo harimwo kwibwa amatongo, n'ubu akirimwamwo n'amakompanyi y'icayi. Iyo miryango yemeza ko kunanirwa gutorera inyishu ico kibazo mu gutanga impozamarira bihonyanga amasezerano ya Buraya yerekeye agateka ka zina muntu. Ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire bw'Ubwongereza bwabwiye BBC ko "atari vyiza kuvuga ku rubanza ruri mu matohoza". Abaserukira imiryango y'aba Talai n'aba Kipsigis, bakomoka mu karere ka Kericho, bavuga ko bagerageje guhura n'umushikiranganji w'Ubwongereza ajejwe imigenderanire Liz Truss mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu 2022 ariko ko batavyemerewe. Umuryango w'aba Talai uvuga ko abawugize birukanywe mu matongo amera mu mitumba ihanamye muri Rift Valley kugira bahashire imirima y'icayi. Aba Talai baragwanije cane  ko abanye-Buraya baza muri ako karere. Mu kubahana, umuntu wese wo muri uwo muryango yatwawe ku nguvu mw'ibohero mu karere kagwiriyemwo imibu n'isazi yitwa tse-tse (mouche tse-tse) kegereye ikiyaga ubu citwa Victoria. Bivugwa ko aho ibintu vyari vyifashe nabi cane ku buryo benshi muri bo bahasize ubuzima, imbanyi z'abagore na zo zaguma zikoroka. Ibitungwa na vyo vyabo vyarahahoneye ku bwinshi. Igihe Kenya yikukira mu 1963, abarokotse baciye bava mw'ibohero basubira ku butaka bwa ba sokuru babo. Ariko ntibigeze babusubirana. Bavuga ko kuva ico gihe baba mu micungararo y'imirima y'icayi ata ruhusha babifitiye. Uwuburanira abareze yabwiye radio BBC igisata ca Focus on Africa ko bashaka "impozamarira" muri ako karere ingana na miliyaridi 200 z'amadolari, no "gusaba imbabazi" hanyuma hatangure imigenderanire mishasha ifatiye "ku kwubahana". Joel Kimutai Bosek agira ati: "Ayo mabi yatanguye mu 1902 arabandanya gushika 1962." Yabandanije agira ati: "Turiko turavuga ivyerekeye gutandukanya imiryango. Abantu bamwe barazimiye ntibasubira kuboneka. Turiko turavuga ivyerekeye guturira amazu, turiko tuvuga ivyerekeye gukura abantu ku butaka bwa ba sokuru babo." Abaserukira aba Kipsigis n'aba Talai bavuga ko uko kwitwara ari "intambwe ikomeye" n'"inyishu ku myaka myinshi yari ihaciye hageragezwa ko hoba umubonano na reta y'Ubwongereza imbona nkubone kugira haboneke inyishu ya kivandimwe" uhereye mu 2019. Ukwitwara muri ECHR ntibisigura ko iyo sentare izoburanisha urwo rubanza, ariko izofata ingingo ko ishobora kurwakira imbere yo gufata ingingo. Umwe mubakorewe amabi, Kibore Cheruiyot, yari afise imyaka 10 igihe umuryango wiwe wirukanwa ku nguvu, ari kumwe n'abandi bantu bo mu muryango wiwe bimurirwa kure y'aho baba. Agira ati: "Ubuzima bwari bumeze nabi cane. Narokotse ku bw'Imana. Mwenewacu nta mahirwe yagize. Yakomowe n'inzoka  aca arapfa. Abantu indwi bo mu muryango wanje na bo barapfuye." Yabandanije avuga ati: "Hari isazi zitwa tse-tse zarya abantu n'ibikoko, abandi benshi barapfuye." Ugushingisha urwo rubanza muri ECHR si ubwa mbere ko ivyabashikiye bivugwa ku rwego mpuzamakungu. Mu 2021, abajejwe amatohoza ya ONU/UN baranditse itangazo berekana "amakenga ku bivugwa vyo kutabazwa no kudatora inyishu ku bakoreye amabi aba Kipsigis n'aba Talai bo mu karere ka Kericho". Mu nyishu, reta y'Ubwongereza yavuze ko yamaze gusaba ikigongwe ku mugaragaro iranatora inyishu mu 2013 y'ivyasabwa n'abakenya babaye muri ivyo bihe bitoroshe hamwe n'imigumuko y'aba Mau Mau, kuva mu 1952 gushika mu 1963, igihe Kenya yikukira. Ariko abo mu bwoko bw'aba Kipsigis na Talai bemeza ko ivyo reta y'Ubwongereza ivuga muri iyo nyishu, bidasa n'ivyabo. Hagati aho, hari ivyagiriji vyo guhonyanga bikomeye agateka k'abantu bo muri iyo miryango, harimwo ubwicanyi bw'indengera butungane, amabi afatiye ku gitsina, gusinzikaza ubuzima hamwe no gupfunga bidakurikije amategeko hamwe no gutuza abantu mu vyabo. Mu kwezi kwa gatanu uyu mwaka, umugwi w'abanye Kenya barenga 100.000 bo mu bwoko bw'aba Talai barandikiye Prince William  basaba ko haba gusaba imbabazi hamwe n'impozamarira.

headline: Perezida Trump ariyamiriza ijambo 'ry’ ubujuju n’ibitutsi' rya Perezida Rouhani wa Irani
text: Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika ariyamiriza ico yise "itangazo ry'ubujuju n'ibitutsi" ryasohowe na Irani inyuma y'aho atangarije ibindi bihano kuri ico gihugu co mu burasirazuba bwo hagati. Bwana Trump yiyamirije ayo majambo aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, inyuma y'aho Perezida wa Irani Hassan Rouhani amenyeshereje ko iyo ngingo yerekana ko abakora mu biro vya Maison Blanche (White House) "bafise ingorane zo mu mutwe". Bwana Trump avuga ko ayo majambo yerekana ko abategetsi ba Irani "badatahura ukuri". Yatangaje ivyo bihano ku munsi wa mbere, avuga ko vyari inyishu ku "nyifato y'agasotoro" yerekanywe na Irani. Ivyo bihano vyafatiwe abantu batari bake, cane cane umutegetsi w'ikirenga, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, yagirizwa na Trump ko ariwe "atuma ubutegetsi bwa Irani bugira inyifato itabereye". Amerika ivuga ko Ayatollah Ali Khamenei afise amatungo menshi afasha mu guhemba abasirikare bo mu murwi karuhariwe w'igisirikare ca Irani wa Islamic Revolution Guard Corps (IRCG). Ku ruhande rwiwe, Bwana Rouhani ntatahura igituma Amerika ifatira ibihano umuntu umwe gusa avuga ko yifitiye "inzu isanzwe n'ikibanza c'ugusengeramwo", akavuga ko ivyo bihano "biteye isoni kandi bifatiye ku bujuju". Avuga kandi ko Amerika ibesha iyo iriko ivuga ko yipfuza ibiganiro. Ariko Bwana Trump avuga ko Irani izi neza ko gushika ubu Amerika ariyo ya mbere ikomeye gisirikare kw'isi. Yongeyeko ati: "Igitero ico ari co cose ca Irani ku nyungu za Amerika kizokwishurwa hakoreshejwe inguvu nyinshi kandi zirenze". "Rimwe na rimwe, inguvu zirenze bishobora kuvuga ko igihugu gishobora gufutwa". Hampande ya Ayatollah Khamenei, hari n'abakuru mu gisirikare bashika umunani, hamwe n'umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Irani, Mohammad Javad Zarif, nabo bashobora gufatirwa ibihano. Ukutumvikana hagati y'ivyo bihugu vyompi kwatanguye mu kwezi kwa gatanu kw'umwaka uheze wa 2018, igihe Trump yivumbura mu masezerano yo mu mwaka wa 2015 hagati ya Irani n'ibihugu bitandatu vya rutura, ku vyerekeye umugambi wayo w'uguhingura ibirwanisho vy'ubumara. Ibintu vyagiye kwunyuka kuva mu ndwi ziheze, cane cane kuva aho Irani irasiye indege (drone) ya Amerika mu ndwi iheze, ivuga ko yari yavogereye ikirere cayo, ivyo Amerika yiyamirije ivuga ko drone yayo yari mu kirere mpuzamakungu. Bwana Trump abandanya avuga ko afise ishaka ryo gutangura ibiganiro na Irani kugira habe ayandi masezerano mashasha yotuma Irani yemera guheba umugambi wayo w'uguhingura ibirwanisho vy'ubumara, be n'ico yise ibikorwa vy' "agakengere" mu karere k'uburasirazuba bwo hagati. Avuga ati: "Niba batabishaka, naho nyene nta ngorane. Ariko twipfuza ko twoganira. Ariko kandi vy'ukuri, boshaka boza vuba".

headline: US: Inyabwonko z'ibisata vy'ikigegan'ubudandaji vyatewe n'imigera yo ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi
text: Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zasohoye itegeko ridasanzwe inyuma y'aho inyabwonko z'ibisata vy'ikigega n'ubudandaji ziterewe n'imigera yo ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi. Inzego zose za gisivire za reta zategetswe kuva ku rubuga rwa SolarWinds Orion, uburyo bwo gufatanya inyabwonko bwatewe n'iyi migera. Amerika ntiratangaza abakoze ubu busuma. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'ikiringo kiri musi y'indwi imwe gusa ikigo FireEye  kijejwe gucungera umutekano w'inyabwonko gitangaje ko ubuhinga bwaco bwo gufata ubusuma bukorerwa ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi bwibwe. Muri iri tegeko, ikigo kijejwe kurwanya ubusuma bukorerwa ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi (CISA) kivuga ko ubu busuma bw'ubu bushobora guhungabanya inyabwonko zikoreshwa n'ibisata vya reta. Ikompanyi SolarWinds, ari nayo yakoze ubu buhinga, yacishije ubutumwa ku rubuga rwa Twitter ihamagarira abakoresha uburyo bwa Orion kubushira ku gihe (update) vyihuta kugira ngo ntibahave bagira ibibazo. FireEye yaratangaje ko yashoboye kubona "umugambi mubi" watanguye mu ntango z'uno mwaka wo kwinjirira inyabwonko, zaba izo abikorera utwabo canke iza reta, hakoreshejwe iyi migera muri ubu buhinga. Iyi kompanyi, ivuga ko mu mbuga zari zigeramiwe harimwo urubuga rwa SolarWinds Orion, ibi bigaha akaryo abakoze ubu busuma gushobora kwinjira mu nyabwonko zatewe kandi  bari kure. Yongerako y'uko vyabonetse neza ko ibi bikorwa ari ivyo ku rwego rwo hejuru kandi bishigikiwe n'amareta kanaka y'ibihugu. Abantu batatu bari mu batoye ubu busuma babwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ko Uburusiya ari bwo buzwi ko bwakoze ibi bitero ku nyabwonko za Amerika. Mw'itangazo ryacishijwe ku rubuga rwa Facebook, ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire y'Uburusiya burahakana ibi bivugwa kuri iki gihugu, bukavuga ko "bidafise ishingiro".

headline: Intambara yo muri Ukraine: Putin asabwa kuja mu biganiro 'amaso mu yandi' na Zelensky
text: Abakuru b'igihugu vy'Ubufaransa n'Ubudagi  basavye Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya kuja mu biganiro "amaso mu yandi kandi ashimitse", n'umukuru w'igihugu ca Ukraine, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibiro vy'umukuru wa reta y'Ubudagi. Emmanuel Macron, umukuru w'igihugu  c'Ubufaransa, hamwe na Olaf Scholz umukuru wa reta y'Ubudagi (Chancelier/Chancellor) bavuganye na Perezida Putin kuri terefone mu kiringo c'iminota 80. Aba bategetsi babiri "bashimangiye ko ari ngombwa ko intambara ihagarara vuba bwango kandi ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zitahukanwa", nk'uko bivugwa n'ibiro vy'umukuru wa reta y'Ubudagi. Nk'uko bivugwa na Kremlin (ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya), Perezida Putin yababwiye ko Moscou yiteguriye gusubira mu biganiro na Kyiv. Ntivuga ariko ko ibiganiro amaso mu yandi bishoboka hagati ya Perezida Putin na mugenziwe wa Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelensky. Imbere y'aha, Perezida Zelensky yari yavuze ko ata shaka afise ryo kuja mu biganiro, ariko akavuga ko ari vyo bishobora kuba inzira nyyo yo kurangira intambara. Intumwa z'Uburusiya n'iza Ukraine ziramaze kubonana incuro zitari nke amaso mu yandi canke bari kure na kure  kuva Uburusiya butanguye igitero ku wa 24 Ruhuhuma (2), ariko utu twigoro twahavuye duhagarara. Ubufaransa n'Ubudagi kandi vyasavye Putin kurekura abarwanyi ba Ukraine 2500 bafashwe mpiri ku rugamba bakagirwa imbohe z'intambara kuri rwa ruganda rw'ivyuma rwa  Azovstal i Mariupol. Uru ruganda runini rwabaye agace ka nyuma k'isekaniro muri ico gisagara kiri ku nkengera y'inyanja, camaze igihe cose gicucagirwa amabombe y'urutavanako n'ingabo z'Uburusiya ubu kikaba ari umusaka. Mu ntango za kuno kwezi, abategetsi ba Moscou bavuze ko abarwanyi ba nyuma bariko barwanira uru ruganda bamanitse amaboko, mu gihe Perezida Zelensky avuga ko bahawe uruhusha rwo kuhava. Uburusiya bwari bwavuze ko abarenga 900 muri abo barwanyi batwawe mw'ibohero ryuguruwe rya Olenivka, ikigwati kiri mu karere kari mu minwe y'Uburusiya muri Donesk. Bakeya muri bo bakomeretse cane batwawe mu bitaro mu gisagara ca Novoazovsk, muri Donesk nyene. Ukraine yizeye ko bazorekurwa mu mugambi wo guhanahana impfungwa - ariko Uburusiya ntiburavyemeza. Bamwe mu bashingamateka bavuga ko aba barwanyi bakwiye kurengutswa mu bucamanza canke mbere bakanyongwa. Muri ico kiganiro nyene, aba bategetasi b'Ubufaransa n'Ubudagi basavye kandi Putin kwugurura ikivuko ca Odesa muri Ukraine cugawe n'Uburusiya, kugira ngo intete zishobore gushorwa hanze. Kremlin ivuga ko Perezida Putin yemeye ko agiye kuraba icokorwa, kugira ngo ntihahave haba ikibazo c'imfungurwa kw'isi - ariko akaba yasavye Uburengero ko bwokuraho ibihano bwafatiye igihugu ciwe. Uburusiya kandi bwagabishije Ubufaransa n'Ubudagi ku ngendo yavyo yo kwongereza ibirwanisho biha Ukraine, akavuga ko bishobora gutuma indyane ziyongera kandi zikamara igihe kirekire. Abategetsi ba Ukraina bavuga ko intambara zibandanya mu mabarabara y'igisagara ca Severodonetsk kiri mu buseruko, akarere ko hirya cane mu buseruko kakiri mu minwe ya Ukraine. Buramatari w'intara ya Luhansk, Serhiy Haidai, avuga ko Abarusiya babandanya bacucagira amabombe ico gisagara, n'aho ingabo zabo zahatakarije ibitari bike. Ku wa gatanu, abategetsi bavuze ko bibiri vya bitatu vyaco vyagoswe n'ingabo z'Uburusiya. Buramatari Haidai yamenyesheje ko ingabo za Ukraine zashobora kuva muri Severodonetsk, mu kuvuga ati: "Birashoboka ko biba ngombwa ko bavayo kugira ngo ntibahave bugaranirwayo". Avugana na BBC ejo ku wa gatandatu, umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ukraine, Denys Shmyhal yavuze ko igitero c'Uburusiya ku gihugu ciwe cabomoye ibirometero 25.000 vy'amabarabara, ibiraro bitari bike, hamwe n'ibibuga vy'indege 12. Ibigo birenga 100 vy'amashure, amavuriro arenga 500, hamwe n'amahinguriro 200, navyo nyene vyaratikiye canke birononwa, nk'uko abivuga. Asaba ko Uburusiya bwotegekwa kuriha ivyo "bwasambuye", akavuga ko amatungo y'Uburusiya yafashwe yorungikwa muri Ukraine kugira ngo akoreshwe mu bikorwa vyo gusanura igihugu.

headline: UNICEF yatse DR Congo inkingo umuriyoni 1.3 za Covid kugira ntizite igihe
text: Ishami rya ONU ryitaho abana kw'isi, UNICEF, rigiye gusubira kugaburira ibindi bihugu doze zirenga umuriyoni za Covid zari zigenewe Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo kugira ngo ntizihave zirenza itariki ntarengwa. Izi ncanco zari zatanzwe mu mugambi mpuzamakungu wa Covax, zizorangiza igihe cazo ku wa 24 z'ukwa gatandatu, nk'uko UNICEF ibivuga. Hafi doze imiliyoni 1.3 kuri miliyoni 1.7 zigiye guhabwa ibindi bihugu harimwo Senegal, Amazinga ya Comores, Ghana na Angola. Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo yaratevye gutanguza isekeza ryo gutanga incanco za AstraZeneca yari yaronse mu kwa gatatu kubera impungenge z'uko zishobora gutera ivura ry'amaraso. Yagiye gutangura iri sekeza ryo gucandaga ku wa 19 z'uku kwa kane ariko abantu 1.265 ni bo bonyene bamaze guhabwa uru rucanco.

headline: Celine Dion yatangaje ko afise ingwara idakira
text: Uyu muririnvyikazi avanze akabira k’Ubufaransa na Canada, yabwiye abakunzi biwe bagera ku miliyoni 5.2 bamukwirikira ku rubuga rwa Instagram ivy’iyo ngwara yiwe imutuma adashobora kugenzura ikoreshwa ry’imitsi yiwe, aho ishobora kwidadarika canke ikanyiganyiga. Iyi ngwara kandi ituma adashobora gutambuka neza canke kuririrmba, ivyo bikaba vyateye ikibazo c’uko atakigiye mu biteramo yari yarateganije ku mugabane wa Bulaya mu mwaka uza. Celine Dion avuga ko amaze ‘igihe kire kire anigana n’ingwara’. Uyu mugore w’imyaka 54 agira ati: "Kandi bisigaye bigoye kuri jewe guhangana n’ ibibazo mfise canke kuvuga ivyo naciyemwo vyose." Yongeye ko ‘yasuzumwe ingwara ituma imitsi yiwe nsozabwenge idakora nk’uko bisanzwe, ari nayo bita ‘stiff person syndrome’, ifata abantu ku rugero rutari hejuru y’umwe kuri miliyoni  (0.0001%) Avuga ko iyo ngwara yiwe imutera ibibazo igihe ariko aratambuka kandi itamukundira gukoresha imirya y’umuhogo kugirango aririmbe nk’uko yamye. Ati: "Birambabaza kubabwira ko ibi bisobanura ko ntakije mu biteramo nari narateganije kuva mu kwezi kwa kabiri”. Mu 2014, Celine Dion, ari nawe yatahanye agashimwe ka Oscar ku ndirimbo ‘My Heart Will Go On’ yabaye inziza gusumba izindi, yavuze ko agiye kuba arahagaritse umwuga wiwe wo kuririmba mu gihe atamenyesheje iherezo, kugirango yiteho umugabo wiwe Rene Angelil yari afise ingwara ya Cancer N’ubwo yasubiye muri ivyo biteramwo inyuma y’umwaka, yasubiye guhagarika uwo mwuga wiwe wo kuririmba mu 2016, inyuma y’urupfu rwa Angelil hamwe na musazawe Daniel Dion. Yasubiye kuboneka muri studio mu 2019, igihe yakorana na Sia, Sam Smith na David Guetta album bise ‘Courage’. Uyu mu ‘star’ yayishigikije ibiteramo hirya no hino kw’isi igihe yasohoka, vyinshi muri vyo bikaba vyarasivye kubera ikiza ca Covid-19. Vyabaye ngombwa n’uyu mwaka nyene, kwimurira ku yandi masango ivyo biteramo, inyuma yo guhura n’iyo ngwara itera imitsi yiwe kwinyiganyiza, yanatumye adasubira ku gihe muri Las Vegas aho asanzwe aba. Kuri uyu wa kane, Dion yaremesheje abafana biwe ababwira ko afise ‘umugwi mwiza w’abaganga bariko barakorana' kugirango bamufashe gutora mitende, mu gihe  n’abana biwe bariko baramufasha bamutera intege’. Uyu muririnvyikazi avuga ko atari bwumve ko hageze kuvuga ivy’iyi ngwara yiwe kugeza ubu. Yagize ati: “ndiko ndakorana n’umugwi w’abanonotsi uriko uranfasha kugirango ndabe ko noshobora gusubira kuronka utuguvu two kuriririmba, ariko ndababwiye ko bitari vyoroshe”. Avuga ko ikintu conyene azi mu buzima ari ukuririrmba, ko ata wundi murimo yigeze akora kandi ko arivyo akunda gusumba ikintu ico arico cose. Ati: “Ndabakumbuye cane, ndakumbuye kubabona mwese no kubateramisha.” Yongeye ko yama yitanga 100% igihe aba aremesha igiteramo ariko ngo iki gihe ivyo ntashobora kubikora muri kino gihe kubera ingwara yiwe. Ntiyabaye agishobora kumira amosozi igihe yasezera abafana, abashimira ku buryo bamufata mu mugongo, ababwira ko igisigaye ubu ari ukwitaho ubuzima bwiwe, kandi yizeye ko ‘azotera yoroherwa’. SPS ni ingwara idakunze kuboneka, kandi benshi badatahura. Nk’uko bivugwa n’ikigo the National Institute for Neurological Disorders, irangwa n’imitsi yidadarika canke ikijugumiza mu buryo umugwayi adashobora kugenzura, haba mu gice c’umutumba canke mu ngingo z’amaguru n’amaboko. Mu bindi bimenyetso umugwayi agira harimwo kutihanganira urwamo, gukorwako, canke ikindi gishobora kuvyura amarangamutima y’umugwayi, ibi vyose bigashobora gutuma imitsi yiwe itangura kunyiganyiga bitavuye ku bushake bwiwe. Iyi ngwara irangwa n’uko umugwayi ahagarara canke yicara adatumbereye mu buryo busanzwe, nk’akarorero atunye igongo, canke imitsi yiwe ikaguma akamera nk’uwatetagaye. Abantu bafise iyo ngwara ya SPS, bashobora kunanirwa gutambuka canke kwiyunguruza ukundi, canke bagatinya kuva mu nzu ngo baje mw’ibarabara ahari urwamo, nk’amahoni y’imidokari, bishobora gutuma umuntu aca afatwa no kunyeganyega agatemba. Abenshi mu bafise SPS bakunda kugwa hasi, kandi kubera badafse ubushobozi bwo kwiramira, barashobora gukomereka cane. N’ubwo SPS ata muti ifise, hariho ibifasha umurwayi - harimwo imiti ipfupfahaza ikibazo co kugabanya umwitwarariko, abantu bakagira imitsi yorohewe – bigatuma iyo ngwara idatera ikara.

headline: Ntahokatarondererwa: Ornella Uwimana yize ivyo kuvura kuri kaminuza ariko akora intebe mu mapine
text: Umwigeme Ornella Uwimana yahejeje ivyigwa vy'amagara y'abantu muri kaminuza mu 2020 ubu akaba akora akazi ko gukora intebe mu mapine. Intebe za mbere yazikoze mu 2016 akiri ku ntebe y'ishure, umuvyeyi wiwe aca arazimugurira kugira amutere intege. Agira ati:"Naguze amapine umunani ku bihumbi mirongo ine, hanyuma nca ndayakoramwo intebe. "Mu kuntera intege, umuvyeyi wanje arazishima aca arazingurira azishira kw'ibaraza" Ornella avuga ko akunda kwiyigisha gukora ibintu bitandukanye kuri YouTube. Ahejeje kaminuza mu gisata c'ivy'amagara y'abantu "Sante Publique" mu 2020, ivyo gukora intebe mu mapine yaciye abigira umwuga. Avuga ko abona ko amaze gutera imbere ugereranije n'aho yatanguriye. Agira ati: "Natanguye nkorera muhira ariko ubu narakotesheje ikibanza nkoreramwo ndiha ku kwezi. "Nkoresha abakozi batatu baza buri musi, n'abandi bane baza igihe mba ndabakeneye." Gushika ubu avuga ko yoba ageze ku mutahe wa miliyoni zine z'amarundi. Ornella Uwimana ahanura urwaruka kwubahuka gukora ico ari co cose rubona gishobora kuruteza imbere. Avuga ko hari benshi bagaya akazi canke ntibashiruke umwete wo kugakora. Ati: "Hari abambona ndiko ndahiga amapine bagatangara. Bakanayanyima nkarinda guca ku bafundi b'imodoka "Hari n'abantwenga bambonye ndiko ndatobora amapine kandi baheruka nari nagiye gusigisha inzara. "Ubu ariko batanguye gutahura kuko babona ntanguye gutera imbere. Uburundi buherutse gushinga umugambi wa PAEEJ (Programme d'Autonomisation Economique et d'Emploi des Jeunes Diplômés), werekeye urwaruka ruhejeje amashure kugira rwishingire imigambi yo gukora. Uwo mugambi reta yawuhaye imiriyaridi 48 z'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ariko n'ubu hari abacibaza uruhara nyarwo rwa PAEEJ, mu gihe abandi bafise amakenga ko bashobora gufasha koko urwaruka kwigenga mu butunzi rukareka kuzera inze.

headline: Burundi – Covid: Incanco z’iki niba leta itazihimiriza?...Impari ku ngingo ya reta
text: Ingingo ya reta y'Uburundi yo kwemera kuronswa incanco za Covid-19 ariko itazohimiriza abantu kwicandagisha irabonwa ugutandukanye mu benegihugu. Bamwe bagaragaza ko bari kumwe na reta y'Uburundi kuri iyi ngingo igihe abandi babona ko ataco bimaze kuba reta yemera kuronswa incanco idafise umugambi kuri zo. Izo ncanco ntizirashika mu Burundi. Abategetsi bajejwe amagara y'abantu bamenyesha ko poritike ya reta ihari kuri iki kiza ari ukugipima, kuvura abakirwaye no guhimiriza abantu kucirinda, ariko ko ivyo kwicandagisha bitarimwo. Reta ariko ubu yugururiye imiryango incanco ishobora kuronswa na Banki y'isi kugira ngo "uwuzoshaka ariwe azokwicandagisha", nk'uko umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu yabivuze. Gushika ubu reta y'Uburundi ntishigikiye ivyo gucandaga Covid nk'uko vyumvikana mu mvugo z'abategetsi, ibi vyongereza amadidane mu benegihugu batari bake ku bushobozi bw'incanco za Covid zemejwe n'abahinga. Ingingo yo kwemera kuronswa incanco ariko reta ntizihimirize abenegihugu benshi bayivuzeko ibitandukanye ku rubuga rwa Facebook rwacu. Bimwe bimwe ni ibi ngaha: Japhet Céle Abafash iy ngingo bubahwe baciye ubwenge. Icambere hari igihe bokwanka bagasanga bahomvye uruncanco rumeze neza. Ku rundi ruhande hari igihe bokwemera bagasanga bemeye ibitwicira ubuzima. Rero ndakunze ukuntu batabaye nk'imbata imenya ko imize ikintu kitarika aruko camaze gushika mu muhogo. Umurundi wese ahari afate kamwe ndaje kuriha kuko kirazira kwigerezako Fabien Ndayizeye Novuga ko biteye isoni kuri Leta Mvyeyi    !Wemere ko bakuzanira urucanco,hanyuma ngo sinzosaba abantu banje kwicandagisha?Quelle irresponsabilité !!!Hari amaleta yemeye neza izo ncanco,kandi n'abakuru b'ibihugu bakaziterwa.Hako basesaguza Banque mondiale ng'izane incanco batazozikoresha,nibazihe abazikeneye bareke kwigenza nk'abariko bakina comédie !!! Stany Barutwanayo Ni vyiza kubanza kuraba uko ziriko zirakora, bongere basuzume neza ko izo batuzaniye arizo bariko baha ab'iwabo. Kuko urazi ko abazungu ata rukundo bafitiye Africa Mubindi Wirabura Urugendo rwa samia suluha hasaan biragaragay ko yaratumw kur mugnzi w ko ategerezw kwemeer icanco bitabay ivy tanzania ikugara frontiere nibivayo vyos. Imana idutabare 666 iratanguy Etienne Nsanzamahoro Kuzaruntera bizabasaba kubanza kumboha naho ubundiho mbona abazungu ivyo bateguye bagira babishikeko, ndashimiye indongozi zacu kuba ruziteza uwushatse none ko bobo batavyiteza ?? Harakaza Jackson Twee tumaza kwa applying covid vaccine knd na appointment twayihawee buja Banabimana Balthazar Uko bemeye kuzitora ninako bazohatara abantu kuziteza. Gusa ntaho woshobora gukwepera umuzungu ntanahamwe. Abashatse kubigerageza urabona kobahise basezera isi vyihuse, Kandi bose urabona kobapfuye impfu zimwe bose imitima yarahagaze Magufuri, Peter. Abo nibo bagabo Africa yarisigaranye Kizigenza Tuyishime Putin Abarundi bakwiye kuva mu bintu bidasobanutse nk' Abana batoya none bumva bazakiriye ngo zimare iki? mu gihe badakingira abanyagihugu babo. Sibori Callixte Ubarundi ndabemera cyane bameze kakagasimba gakandagira kumviriza ngo ntawamenya isi yarashaje! (Chameleon zubahwe kweli) Ntirushwa Samuel Nibindi byose bazabyemera kuko basa nabatazi ibyo barimo nimagufuri wabashukaga Egide Nzambi Abazungu bakumbuye KO tubiyamiriza ndabibona. Burya ministre wacu yarengewe ndabibona, abanegihugu tuvire hasi rimwe tumushigikikize imyigaragamvyo, bagira batumarishe incanco! Mutabazi Fabrice Burya ngo twarikukiy?iki sikimenyetso ko tukiri mubukoroni!nimba reta itegekwa gutanga inkingo nayo ubwayo ifiseko amakenga ikemera kubera indonk zamadorari twikukiy gut?utigaba ntiyigaburira nuguca bugufi umuzungu aducinyiz!ntabugabo kuwushonj kabisa! Frederic Niyonsaba La nuit porte conseil !burya gufata icemezo wihuse,hari Aho usanga waguye mw'ikosa.reka abazikeneye cane babanze bazifate kuko igihe uburundi bwafatiye ingingo KO abenegihugu Bose bicandagisha,izoba campagne de vaccination de cinq jours gusa Aho abandi biriko bitwara imisi myinshi kuko ntabenshi bazoba bakizikeneye. Muhirwa Gitambwe Chimpesh Reta y'Uburundi ifise ubwenge burenze pe. Ndashimye kuba bafashe ingingo nkiyo yo kudasaba abantu kwicandagisha. Uwubishaka agende, uwutabishaka areke! Théo Walcott Kabirigi Niyonkuru Umuvyeyi wacu Suhulu yararutewe ejo urumva natwe abana ntitwogambararira umuvyeyi !!!Tanzania iradufise muminwe !!! Rémy Citegetse Bizoteb biba itegeko.kuko bazoc bavug ngo service kanak ntuzokwijir uterekany ko wicandagishije.munyum batangur gufat ab muri bus.bizob vyaheze kuba itegeko.muzob mumbwira Salvatore Ndi Ne Non yazisabiy iki ? Ziz ziborre ngaho munyuma baj kuzita baturir kand hariho ibihugu bizikeney haricihishij inyuma Leta yingomber irya mfashanyo gusa yamadolari 78 million !!! EL Chebazz Nkimara kubona Tanzania izifashe nahise mbona ko hasigaye U Burundi... Erega ntiwarwanya gahunda yi isi..

headline: Ukraine - Russia: Abasirikare 10.000 ba Ukraine bamaze kwicwa, Kyiv niko ivuga
text: Ukraine ivuga ko ingabo zababa 10.000 z’igisirikare cayo bamaze gupfira muri ino ntambara kuva igitero c’Uburusiya gitanguye mu mpera z’ukwa kabiri. Umuhanuzi w’umukuru w’igihugu  Oleksiy Arestovych yatangaje ibi mu kiganiro cacishijwe ku mbuga hwaniro, igihe yari abajijwe igitigiri c’abasirikare Ukraine imaze gutakaza mu misi 100 ya mbere y’intambara – ni ukuvuga, gushika ku wa 03 Ruheshi (6). Ukraine ivuga ko itakaza hafi abasirikare 100 bari ku rugamba buri musi, abandi baharurwa mu majana nabo bagakomereka. Arestovych avuga ko abo Uburusiya bumaze gukataza bobo barenga kure n’iyo incuro zitari nke. Reta ya Ukraine ivuga ko ingabo z’Uburusiya zirenga 30.000 zimaze gupfa, ariko ibitigiri ngereranyo bitangwa n’igendereza ry’Ubwongereza biri hasi – abarenga 15.000. Intambara yose ya Afghanistan yo kuva mu 1979 gushika 1989 yahitanye ingabo z’icahoze ari Reta zunze Ubumwe z’abasoviyeti zababa 15.000. Abategetsi b’Uburusiya ntibaratanga igitigiri nyaco ico ari co cose ku vyerekeye n’abo bamaze gutakariza muri iyi ntambara ya Ukraine kuva ku wa 25 Ntwarante (3), aho bavuze ko abasirikare n’intwazangabo 1351 ari bo bari bamaze gupfa. Igisata ca BBC gikoresha ururimi rw’ikirusiya cemeza ko abasirikare b’Uburusiya 3502 bapfuye – ariko aba bakaba ari babamenyekanye kandi bahamwe mu matongo y’abapfuye. Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika avuga ko mugenziwe wa Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky  atashatse kwumvira Amerika igiye yariko igabisha ko Uburusiya bwariko butegura igitero ku gihugu ciwe. Mw’ijambo yashikirije mu gihe yari mu gikorwa co kegeranya uburyo ejo ku wa gatanu, afatira ku mburi z’uko Uburusiya bwoba bwariko butegura igitero, Biden yavuze ati: “Ndazi ko abantu benshi bibaza ko nariko ndashikuza”. “Ariko nari nzi ko dufise amakuru yose yavyerekana”. Yongera ko y’uko ata nkeka zari zihari ko umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya Vladimir Putin yariko atera “aja ku mupaka” ariko “Zelensky ntiyashatse kuvyumva, co kimwe n’abanyagihugu benshi”. “Ndatahura igituma batashatse kuvyumva, ariko yarinjiye”. Amerika yatanguye kugabisha ko Uburusiya bwariko butegura igitero kuri Ukraine imisi itari mike imbere y’uko Putin atangaza “igikorwa kidasanzwe” kuri iki gihugu ku wa 24 Ruhuruma (2) . Izi mburi zafashwe nk’ugushikuza mbere ziranegurwa bikomeye n’ibihugu bimwe bimwe vy’incuti za Amerika i Bulaya, vyafashe ico gihe ko Amerika yariko irashikuza. Kuva iyi ntambara itanguye, Uburusiya buramaze kwigarurira ibisagara bikeya, ubu ikaba yashize inguvu zose mu buseruko aho iriko irondera kwigarurira intara za Luhansk na Donesk ziri mu karere ka Donbas. Ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw’Ubwongereza buvuga ko igisagara ca Severodonetsk kiriko kiberamwo intambara z’urutavanako. Buvuga ko bisa n’uko impande zompi ziriko ziratakaza igitigiri kinini c’ingabo muri izi ntambara zikomeye zibera ku mabarabara y’ico gisagara. Hagati aho, ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko ingabo z’Uburusiya ata ntambwe ziratere utera uja mu bumanuko bw’iki gisagara. Buvuga kandi ko Uburusiya buriko buregeranya invugu zo hasi no mu kirere kugira ngo bushobore gucuvya burundu ingabo za Ukraine. Mu buseruko bwa Ukraine, itsinzi ku rugamba ibandanya ironkwa n’uwufise ibikoho binini binini. Ni vya muzinga n’ibindi birasa ibisasu kure – bishobora gutera ibirindiro vy’umwansi. Iyi ni intambara – bisa nk’aho – Uburusiya ari bwo bworohewe ubu. Umwe mu bategetsi bo hejuru mu gisata c’umutekano yabwiye ikinyamakuru co mu Bwongereza, Guardian ko uruhande rwiwe ubu ruriko ruraherezwa n’amasasu. Vadym Skibitsky avuga ko abarusiya ubu basumvya ibikoresho abanya Ukraine incuro kuva kuri cumi gushika kuri cumi na zitanu, ko rero ingabo za Ukraine zikeneye vuba bwango ibindi bikoresho. Hari vyinshi bimaze kwemerwa – cane cane vya muzinga bigezweho vyo mu bwoko bwa HIMAR na M270 vyo muri Amerika no mu Bwongereza – ibi bikaba ari ntahusha. Ariko ntibirashika ku rubuga rw’intambara  igenda iba nabi. Bimwe mu bisagara biherutse kwigarurirwa n’ingabo z’Uburusiya harimwo Mariupol, igisagara kiri ku nkengera y’inyanja mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Ukraine, ubu kikavugwa ko gishobora kwadukamwo ikiza ca cholera, nk’uko bivugwa n’ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw’Ubwongereza. Inyubakwa hafi zose zo muri iki gisagara zarononekaye canke zirasenyurwa, amazi akaba yavanganye n’imyanda iva mu tuzu twa surwumwe nk’uko bivugwa n’ishirahamwe ONU. Iki kiza caribonekeje i Mariupol imbere y’aha, kandi abarwayi bakaba baribonekeje irya n’ino mu kwezi guheze. Umukuru w’igisagara wo ku ruhande rwa Ukraine, Vadym Boychenko, yabwiye BBC ko “cholera, amacinya n’izindi ndwara zandukira zamaze gushika mu gisagara”, kandi ko cugawe kugira ngo ntihaduke akaranda gakomeye. Aya makuru ntashobora guhinyuzwa na BBC, mbere umukuru w’iki gisagara yagenywe n’Uburusiya avuga ko ibipimo vyama bikorwa igihe cose kandi ko ata muntu n’umwe arwaye cholera arigera aboneka.

headline: Africa mu mafoto meza y'indwi duhejeje: 8-14 Ndamukiza 2022
text: Amwe mu mafoto meza yo muri Afrika n'ahandi: Amafoto yose afitiwe uruhusha

headline: Umuririmvyi w'Umurundi Kidum ngo yabwiwe ko atemerewe kuririmbira mu Rwanda
text: Umuririmvyi w'Umurundi rurangiranwa mu karere k'ubuseruko bwa Afrika, Jean Pierre Nimbona azwi cane nka Kidum, yabwiye BBC ko yabujijwe kuremesha ibiteramo mu Rwanda. Kidum yategerezwa kuririmba mu giteramo Kigali Jazz Junction itariki 27/09/2019 ari kumwe n'abandi baririmvyi nka Johnny Drille wo muri Nigeria. Ariko ku buryo atari yiteze ngo yabwiwe ko atacemerewe kuririmba muri ico giteramo. BBC yegereye Kidum tumubaza icatumye abuzwa kuja muri ico giteramo kandi amatangazo yaco hamwe n'amatike vyari bimaze gusohoka. Kidum yagize ati: "Nta mpamvu n'imwe nabwiwe. Abateguye igiteramo bambwiye ko ubuyobozi bwa Kigali bwababwiye ko ntemerewe kuja muri ico giteramo. "Nta ngorane nari bwagire mu Rwanda, itariki zitandatu nariyo, kiretse mu kwezi kwa 12 aho nari mvuye mu Burundi, umuntu aravuga ati sinshobora kuririmba. Ariko nta kindi gihe vyari bwashike." Kidum ari mu baririmvyi rurangiranwa mu karere k'ubuseruko bwa Afrika, akaba amaze imyaka irenga 20 aremesha ibiteramo mu bihugu vy'ako karere agendera buri mwaka. Yabandanije agira ati: "Mu Rwanda ndahinjira nk'uwugiye muhira, nta visa, nta ruhusha ikintu kimwe bambaza gusa ni aho nshikira." BBC yashatse kumenya ico abatumiye Kidum bavuga, atubwira ko bobo bakiriko baringinga ubuyobozi bwa Kigali ngo barabe ko bwotanga uruhusha. Abajijwe niba hari iyindi mpamvu yoba ibiri inyuma Kidum yavuze ko ata mpamvu yindi n'imwe we ku bwiye yumva yoba yabiteye ngo ariko hatanguye kuvugwa vyinshi. Yagize ati: "Hari abari kuvuga ko vyoba bitewe n'umubano mubi hagati y'ibihugu vyombi (u Burundi n'u Rwanda), ngo vyoba bifise imvo za politike. "Jewe simba mu Rwanda canke mu Burundi, mba muri Kenya. Nta politike ndimwo. Ku vy'umutekano navyo, nta mutekano w'umuntu n'umwe mbangamiye, nta n'ubushobozi mfise bwo kubangamira umutekano." Kidum yari amaze kuremesha ibiteramo vyinshi mu Rwanda mu myaka 16 iheze, akaba yararirimvye ahantu henshi harimwo n'umuhango wo Kwita Izina. BBC iracakurikirana aya makuru.

headline: Covid: Afrika y’Epfo ihamagarira abagabo kwicandagisha ku bwinshi
text: Afrika y'Epfo itera akamo abagabo ko bokwitabira ku bwinshi igikorwa co kwicandagisha Covid kuko ibitigiri vyabo biri hasi ugereranije n'ivyabagore. Hafi ibice 60% vy'incaco nivyo bimaze guhabwa abagore, nk'uko bivugwa n'abajejwe amagara y'abantu kuri uwu wa gatanu mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ku  vyerekeye utwigoro twa reta two kurwanya iki kiza. Ibi bibaye mu gihe reta ifise intumbero yo kuzoba yacandaze n'imiburiburi ibice 70% vy'abanyagihugu b'ico gihugu gushika mu kw'icumi na kabiri. Nicholas Crisp, umutegetsi wo muri ubwo bushikiranganji, avuga ko kugira ngo bashike kuri iyo ntumbero, abantu imiriyoni 28 nibo bazotegerezwa kuba bamaze gucandagwa, mu gihe gushika ubu hamaze kwicandagisha imiriyoni zine gusa. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, Joe Phaahla, ntarota atezura ingingo zafashwe mu number yo kuzibira ikwirakwira rya covid n'aho ibitigiri vy'abandura "biriko biragabanuka". Avuga ko urugero rw'ubwandu rukiri hejuru kandi ko ibitaro bigifise ibibazo kubera ubwinshi bw'abanduye. Afrika y'Epfo gushika ubu imaze kugira abantu 2.568.511 banduye ikiza karanda ca Covid, kikaba kimaze guhitana ubuzima bw'abantu 76.243. Nico gihugu ca mbere gifise igitigiri kinini c'abanduye ku mugabane wa Afrika.

headline: DRC: umutegetsi mukuru wa Isilamu yaraye yishwe arashwe i Beni
text: Umwe mu bategetsi bakuru b'idini rya Isilamu yaraye agandaguwe, arashwe n'abantu bataramenyekana mu buseruko bwa Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo (DRC). Sheikh Ali Amini yarashwe amasasu menshi mu gihe yari arongoye amasengesho y'ejo ku mugoroba mu musigiti mukuru w'igisagara ca Beni mu ntara ya Kivu ya Ruguru. Ubu bwicanyi bwabaye haciye amasaha make Perezida Félix Tshisekedi w'ico gihugu atangaje ko intara zibiri zigoswe kuva ku wa gatanu. Iki gitero cakozwe mu gihe c'Ukwezi Kweranda kwa Isilamu, Ramadan, cateye ubwoba bwinshi mu bantu. Nta murwi n'umwe uriyitirira ubu bwicanyi, ariko vyinshi mu bitero nk'ibi bimenyerewe bikorwa n'inyeshamba z'umurwi ADF zirwanya ubutegetsi bwa Uganda. Umurwi Etat Islamique (IS) nawo wariyitiriye bimwe mu bitero vyayo, ariko gushika ubu ntibiratomoreka neza imigenderanire ufitaniye na ADF. Imbere y'uko iki gitero kiba, ibigwati bibiri vyo muri ako karere vyari vyatewe n'abikekwa ko ari izo nyeshamba za ADF, umurwi umaze igihe ukiririmbira muri ako karere, kuva mu myaka ya 1990. Ibi bibaye mu gihe abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu bafise impungenge ku ngingo ya Perezida Tshisekedi yo gutangaza ko intara zibiri - Kivu ya Ruguru na Ituri - zigoswe n'ingabo z'igihugu. Bafise ubwoba ko igisirikare kigiye kwongererezwa ububasha mu gihe kivugwa ko gifise amateka mabi cane y'ihohotera.

headline: Ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko urugero rw'inda zikoroka rurenga 40% ku bagore b'abirabure kurusha abandi
text: Abagore b'abirabure bafise ivyago vyinshi vy'uko inda zikoroka kurusha abazungukazi, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'icigwa. Umwihwezo w'ikinyamakuru Lancet ku bagore imiriyoni 4.6 bafise imbanyi  mu bihugu 7 werekana ko ivyago ku bagore b'abirabure   biri ku rugero rwa 43% kurusha ivy'abazungukazi. Ico cigwa gisaba ko abantu bo mu Bwongereza bofatwa mu mugongo iyo inda ya mbere imaze gukoroka. Gushika ubu, abagore barungikwa ku muganga w'umuhinga iyo inda zikorotse  gatatu gakurukirana. Mu bihugu vyinshi, harimwo n'Ubwongereza,  nta biharuro bitororokanywa. Ariko abahinga bagereranya ko Bimwe mu biharuro ngereranyo vy'inda zikoroka usanga biri hejuru, ariko ibi bivana n'ingene igihugu kimwe kimwe  gifata ico arico inda yakorotse, ivyo navyo bishobora guhera ku gipimo cerekana ko umugore yasamye canke igipimo c'iradiyo (scan) cerekana umwana ari mu nda. Ico cegeranyo cerekana ko abagore inda zakorotse, mu bwoko bwose, bagira ivyago vyo gushobora kugira ingaruka z'igihe kirekire ku magara yabo, nk'ivura ry'amaraso, indwara z'umutima canke akabonge (depression). Doreen Thompson-Addo n'umugabo wiwe  Reggie bahuye n'ivyago vy'inda  zakorotse indwi. Doreen avuga ati: "Igihe natwara inda ya mbere, nari naryohewe cane" "Narabibwiye abagenzi n'umuryango, ntangura kwibaza amazina nzokwita uwo mwana, ntangura no kwiyumvira umunsi mukuru wo kwitegurira kuronka umwana (baby shower). " Ariko haheze amezi abiri abwiwe ko yasamye, Doreen yaciye atangura  kuva amaraso mu nyuma inda irakoroka. Avuga ati: "Urumva bivugwa ko bishika kenshi inda zigagoroka, ariko ntiwigera wibaza ko nawe vyogushikira". Doreen , yahavuye avyara  umukobwa wiwe Arielle mu 2017, inda yiwe ya mbere imaze gukoroka impanuro yonyene yaronse ni "ugusubira kugerageza". Hamaze gukoroka zitatu, yaciye arungikwa ku bitaro bikurikirana abo inda zimaze gukoroka kenshi, ariko ntiyigeze amenya icatumye inda ziwe ziguma zikoroka. Ubushakashatsi bwa Lancet buhanura : Aho bivuye: The Lancet Ahanini ubwo bushakashatsi bwakorewe muri Suede, Finlande, Danmark, bimwe mu bihugu bike bitororokanya ibiharuro. Ariko n'amakuru yo mu bihugu nka  Amerika, Ubwongereza, Canada na Norvege yarakoreshejwe. Siobhan Quenby , umushakashatsi akaba n'icegera c'umuyobozi w'ikigo Tommy's National Centre for Miscarriage Reasearch co muri Kaminuza ya Warwick avuga ati: "Turazi ko hari ivyago vyinshi vy'uko umugore w'umwirabure ashobora gupfa mu gihe  afise inda''. "Narushirijeho kubabazwa no kumenya kandi ko   banafise urugero runini rw'ivyago vy'uko inda zikoroka". Abirabure bafise ivyago vyinshi vyo kurwara diabete  y'ubwoko bwa kabiri hamwe n'indwara y'umutima, kandi izo uko ari zibiri zongereza ivyago vy'uko inda zikoroka. Ariko umwigisha Quenby avuga ko abahinga bariko barakora amatohoza yo kuraba niba ivyago vyo kugira izindi ngorane z'amagara, nk'ukugira ibivyimba mu gitereko canke indwara z'aho abasirikare b'umubiri bigwanya bo nyene (maladies auto immunes), bishobora gusigura urugero runini. Avuga ko ubundi bushakashatsi bukenewe vyihuta. Doreen avuga ko ivyo ico cigwa catoye  bivuna umutima. ''Iyo numvise ivyo biharuro, nca nibaza niba hari imvo z'ubusumbane zituma abagore b'abirabure bagira  ivyago vyinshi kurusha iyindi migwi." "Niba ari uko bimeze rero , hakenewe igikorwa gikomeye kugira hakosorwe ubwo busumbane." Hafi 75% y'abagore inda zikoroka mu nyuma baratwara inda  bakavyara,  , ari naco gituma mu ruhande rumwe abubakanye kenshi bagirirwa inama yo  gusubira kugerageza kurondera uwundi mwana atayandi matohoza abaye. Quenby , atwara kandi ibitaro bikurikirana abakunze guhura n'ivyago vy'inda gukoroka,  avugako ati: "Hari ibintu dushobora  gukora kugira tubuze inda gukoroka. '' Si ibintu ruhebwa''. Guhindura imibereho bishobora gufasha - hafi 30% y'abantu barungitswe  ku bitaro vyiwe  banywa itabi,  bakagira diabete batagenzura neza, ibiro vy'umurengera n'umuvuduko munini w'amaraso. Quenby avuga ati: "Ivyo bisigura ko inzego z'amagara hari ibintu bitatu zitabakoreye zari kubatuma bitegurira neza gusama inda ikurikira". Avuga ko hari kanewe ''inyishu y'urukurikirane'' yari gutanga: Nadine Dorries , umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abagore avuga ati: "Ukubura umwana n'akaga katagira izina, arico gituma turiko turakora vyihuta  kugira dutahure hanyuma dutore inyishu ku bituma  inda zikoroka, no kuguma dushigikira imiryango.'' Avuga kandi ko hariko haraba igikorwa co kuraba ingene uwabuze akurikiranwa, hanyuma hagabanywe ubusumbane mu kwitaho abavyeyi baheruka canke biteze kwibaruka. Mw'ijambo ry'intangamarara riherekeza ico cegeranyo, Lancet ivuga iti: "Ugukoroka kw'inda kuva kera vyamye bifatwa nk'ibintu bisanzwe, mbere rimwe na rimwe bakavyirengagiza. "Kuba   ubuvuzi butaratera imbere muri iyo nzira vyari bikwiye kubabaza "Ahubwo hari ukuvyakira nk'ibisanzwe "Igihe co kubwira abagore ngo ''wewe gerageza kandi" cararangiye." Ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko ivyago vyo kwiyahura,  kurwara akabonge (depression) n'ukugira ubwoba (anxiety) vyiyongera kuri abo bamaze gutakaza mbanyi kandi bukavuga ko ingaruka ku  bubakanye zikeneye amatohoza asumbirije. Hamaze gukoroka inda umunani, Charlotte yasamye inda y'amahasa ariko igipimo c'iradiyo (scan)  gisanga nayo yaravuyeyo. Yagize ati: "Numvise ntakiri umuntu". "Umugabo wanje yaragerageza kunyegeranya "Naguma nihagira kandi nkoma induru ''Sinari ngishaka kubaho." Ubwa mbere Charlotte yari yahawe agapapuro gusa kariko impanuro. Amaze gutangura kuvuga ko ashaka kwiyahura niho batangura kumukurikirana gusumba, mu nyuma araruha araronka ubuvuzi bw'indwara zo kubura amahoro (trauma) inyuma y'ibiba vyagushukiye. Mu nyuma yahavuye atwara iyindi nda ayivyaramwo umwana w'umuhungu w'amagara meza, Ansel, mu mwaka uheze, ubu akaba yumva ashobora kwuguruka akavuga ivyo yaciyemwo. Yavuze ati:  "Mfise akanyamuneza kenshi kuba mfise umwana" "Ndazi ko ari amahirwe nagize kuba nageze aho. "Si bose bahashika." Kurikira  @Tulip Mazumdar kuri Twitter.

headline: None ko u Burundi n’u Rwanda bibandanya vyagirizanya, ivya vyo bizoherera he?
text: Leta y 'u Rwanda ivuga ko gushika ubu abavuga ko ico gihugu arico gihungabanya umutekano w'u Burundi bapfa kubivuga gusa ariko ata bimenyetso bafise. Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru i Kigali ejo ku wa gatatu, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire y'u Rwanda n'ibindi bihugu, Dr. Vincent Biruta, yavuze ko ahubwo u Rwanda rwo rufise ibimenyetso vyose vyerekana ko abahungabanya umutekano warwo bavuye mu Burundi. Ku ruhande rwabwo, u Burundi ni uko nyene. Bwagiriza u Rwanda ko ari rwo nkwezi y'amarere mu bibazo burimwo. Kuva u Burundi bwinjira mu bibazo vya politike mu mwaka wa 2015, u Burundi n'u Rwanda vyamye vyagirizanya guhungabanya umutekano w'igihugu n'ikindi mu guha indaro no mu gufasha abashaka guteza umudugararo mu gihugu n'ikindi. Igitero giherutse kuba muri komine Mabayi mu ntara ya Cibitoke kwabaye ugukoza agati mu ntozi, aho Perezida Petero Nkurunziza yemeje adakekeranya ko igihugu c'u Rwanda ariko cakoze ico gitero. Muri ico kiganiro c'ejo ku wa gatatu, Bwana Biruta yasubiye gushimangira ko u Rwanda ata ruhara na rumwe rufise muri ico gitero, eka mw'ihungabana ry'umutekano mu gihugu kibanyi c'u Burundi muri rusangi, akavuga ko ata n'ivyemezo biriho. Ati: "Mwarumvise mu minsi ishize ko twagiye duhura n'ibirego hirya no hino vy'u Burundi bivuga ko twabateye, ariko ntabwo ari vyo, u Rwanda ntirwigeze rutera u Burundi kandi n'ababivuga nta kimenyetso na kimwe bigeze berekana". "Ibi birego rero tugize iminsi duhura navyo ahantu hose iyo tugiye mu nama, ariko ntabwo ari ukuvuga gusa ngo u Rwanda rwarateye, bagomba n'ukwerekana ibimenyetso". Nk'uko bimenyerewe, yagirije ahubwo u Burundi ko ari bwo bucumbikiye inkozi z'ibibi zamye zitera u Rwanda, akavuga ko bafise n'abafashwe bavyiyemerera. Ati: "Ahubwo nagomba kubibutsa ko ku ruhande rwacu, hari ibikorwa vy'iterabwoba vyagiye biba mu gihugu cacu mu bihe bitandukanye kandi bikagaragara ko ababikoze ari abantu bari baturutse i Burundi cangwa se bahungiyeyo inyuma y'ugukora ivyo bikorwa igihe ingabo zacu zabarwanya". "Tukaba dufise n'abafashwe muri ivyo bikorwa bafunze kandi batanga ubuhamya bwose bw'ingene u Burundi bwabafashije mu gutegura ibikorwa vyabo no kubishira mu bikorwa". Ku ruhande rwiwe, mu kiganiro aherutse kugiriranira n'abamenyeshamakuru, Perezida Nkurunziza yumvishije ko u Rwanda kuva mu mwaka wa 2014 gushika ubu rwamye rurajwe ishinga no kudurumbanya u Burundi. "Tuvuze tuti abadutera baturuka mu Rwanda, abaza guhinyuza baraje mu Burundi barabona ko ivyo u Rwanda rwagiriza u Burundi atari vyo, hama natwe dusaba ko bogenda mu Rwanda kuturabira ko ivyo tuvuga atari vyo, ariko u Rwanda rwaranse". Hagati aho, inyuma y'igitero cabereye ku mutumba Marura ya komine Mabayi y'intara ya Cibitoke u Burundi bwemeza ko cakozwe n'igisirikare c'u Rwanda, vyabaye ngombwa ko Inama mpuzamakungu ijejwe akarere k'ibiyaga binini (CIRGL/ICGLR) ishinga umurwi wo gukora amatohoza  mu bihugu vyompi. Gushika ubu, icegeranyo cawo kiracarindiriwe. Ingingo ya Perezida Petero Nkurunziza w'u Burundi yo kwitoreza ikiringo we avuga ko ari ica kabiri, abatavuga rumwe nabo bakavuga ko ari ica gatatu giteye kubiri n'ibwirizwashingiro be n'amasezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha, yatumye u Burundi bwinjira mu ndyane za politike. Izo ndyane zatumye impunzi ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bahungira mu bihugu bibanyi harimwo n'u Rwanda, ruvugwa ko rucumbikiye izirenga 70.000. Kuva ico gihe, u Burundi, mbere n'ibihugu bimwe bimwe hamwe n'amashirahamwe amwe amwe mpuzamakungu, vyaragirije u Rwanda ko rwahaye imyimemenyerezo ya gisirikare zimwe muri izo mpunzi mu ntumbero yo kurzitegura kugira ngo zije gusenyura ubutegetsi bw'u Burundi. U Rwanda rwamye rwamirira kure ivyo birego. U Rwanda ntirufitaniye ibibazo n'u Burundi gusa. Haraciye umwaka urenga ico gihugu kidacana uwaka n'igihugu ca Uganda, ivyatumye mbere u Rwanda rwugara umupaka ruhana n'ico gihugu. Ariko hari icizere kinini ko ico cuka kibi gishobora guhera hagati y'u Rwanda na Uganda, na rirya hari ibiganiro bibandanya hagati y'abategetsi b'ivyo bihugu kugira ngo ibintu bisubire ku murongo. Hagati aho, siko bimeze mu migenderanire n'u Burundi, aho Bwana Riruta yerekana neza ko u Burundi butipfuza kuganira n'u Rwanda kugira  ngo bisubize hamwe. Avuga ati: "Ukurikije ivyagiye bivugwa, imyigaragamvyo yagiye ikorwa, ibitutsi bagiye badutuka, ibirego bagiye baturega bidafise ishingiro kuva mu mwaka wa 2015, vyagaragara ko atacofatirwako kugira tuganire". "Ariko twebwe turiteguye, igihe bazabishakira twebwe twaganira kuri ivyo bibazo vyose bikabonerwa umurongo wo kubikemura".

headline: Igisirikare c’Ubushinwa cavogereye  Taiwan, niko reta yayo ivuga
text: Na Raffi Berg BBC News Ubushinwa  bwavogereye ku rugero rutari bwigere rubaho amazi n’ibirere  vya Taiwan, nk’uko reta yayo ibivuga. Ivuga ko indege 71 z’igisirikare kirwanira mu kirere, harimwo iz’intambara na zimwe zitagira abadereva (drones), zinjiye mu citwa akarere ka Taiwan ko gucungereramwo ikirere. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zivuga ko iki gikorwa ca gisirikare c’Ubushinwa ari ico “guhungabanya” kandi gitosekaza “amahoro n’umutekano mu karere”. Taiwan irigenga – ariko Ubushinwa buyifata nk’intara ishaka kwiyonkora, kandi ko impera n’imperuka izosubizwa mu ruhongore. Muri ano mezi ya vuba, icuka kibi cariyongereye hagati y’izi mpande zibiri. Muri Myandagaro (8), Pékin/Beijing (umugwa mukuru w’Ubushinwa) yararakajwe n’urugendo umukuru w’inama nshingamateka ya Amerika Nancy Pelosi yakoze muri iryo zinga, umutegetsi wa mbere mukuru wa Amerika yari agendeye Taiwan mu myaka 25. Mu kwihora kuri urwo rugendo, Ubushinwa bwakoze imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare ya mbere ikomeye mu mazi akikuje Taiwan, yongera ihagarika n’ubudandaji bumwe bumwe n’iryo zinga. Umushikiranganji wa Taiwan ajejwe imigenderanire Joseph Wu yariyamirije ico gikorwa c’Ubushinwa ico gihe, aho yavuze ko ari agasotoro ko ku rwego rwo hejuru. Ubushinwa ntiburigera buvuga ko butazohava bukoresha inguvu kugira ngo bwigarurire Taiwan. Ejo ku wa mbere, umushikiranganji wa Taiwan ajejwe kvivuna abansi yavuze ko indege 43 zajabutse umurongo wo hagati, akarere kigenga kagabura impande zibiri. Ubushinwa buvuga ko bwakoze “imyimenyerezo yo kurasa” mu micungararo ya Taiwan ku wa Mungu mu kwihora ico buvuga ko kari agasomborotso k’iryo zinga na Amerika. Umutegetsi wa Maison Blanche/White House ari mu Nama nkuru y’igihugu ijejwe umutekano avuga ko Amerika irajwe ishinga n’ibi bintu biherutse kuba, akongerako y’uko “izobandanya ifasha Taiwan mu gukomeza ubushobozi bwayo bwo kwirwanako”. Washington yamye na ntaryo yinengesera kuri kino kibazo ca Taiwan. Ku ruhande rumwe, irashigikira poritike y’igihugu kimwe c’Ubushinwa, inkingi y’ubucuti na Pékin. Muri ino poritike, Amerika iremera ko hari reta imwe y’Ubushinwa, kandi ikaba ifitaniye ubucuti buzwi na Pékin hakubugiriranira na Taiwan. Hagati aho, ibandanya ifitaniye ubucuti bwa hafi cane na Taiwan, mbere ikanayigurishako ibirwanisho mu masezerano yiswe Taiwan Relations Act ( mu Kirundi twogereranya na ‘Itegeko rigenga imigenderanire na Taiwan’), akaba avuga ko Amerika itegerezwa guha iryo zinga uburyo bwo kwivuna umwansi.

headline: Africa mu mafoto muri iyi ndwi: 7-13 Nzero 2022
text: Amwe mu mafoto ya mbere meza yo muri Afrika n'ahandi muri iyi ndwi duhejeje. Amafoto yose aba afitiwe uruhusha

headline: US - Covid: CNN yirukanye abakozi bagiye mu biro batacandazwe
text: Ikinyamakuru co muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika CNN cirukanye abakozi batatu kubera bagiye mu biro batacandazwe ngo bakingirwe ca kiza karanda ca Covid, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vya Amerika. Ni  kamwe mu turorero twa mbere tw'amakompanyi ya Amerika yirukana abakozi kubera barenze ku mategeko yayo ategeka abakozi kwicandagisha. Ubu amategeko muri Amerika aha uburenganzira amakompanyi gutegeka abakozi bayo kwicandagisha. Amakompanyi menshi akomeye - harimwo Facebook na Google - avuga ko agiye gutegeka abakozi bayo kwicandagisha mu gihe ibiro vyayo bizoba vyuguruwe burundu mu mezi ari imbere. Umukuru wa CNN Jeff Zucker yameshejeje iri bogoza mu butumwa bwarungikiwe abakozi (memo) ku wa kane, ibinyamakuru bitari bike bikaba vyarabuhawe. Asubirwamwo ivyo yanditse muri uru rwandiko aho avuga ko urucanco ari ngombwa ku muntu uwo ari we wese aja kurondera amakuru, akorana n'abandi bakozi canke agiye mu biro. Mu majambo yiwe, Zucker yavuze ati: "Reka mvuge neza - dufise poritike yo kutihanganirana kuri iki kibazo". Mu kwa gatanu, reta ya Amerika yatangaje ko abakoresha bafise uburenganzira bahabwa n'amategeko bwo gutegeka abakozi baja ku kazi kubanza kwicandagisha Covid-19. Amakompanyi makuru makuru yunguruza abantu n'indege, Delta hamwe na United Airlines, asaba abakozi bashasha kwerekana icemeza ko bakingiwe, mu gihe ibanki ya Goldman Sachs isaba kumenyesha ibijanye n'icandagwa, n'aho idategeka abakozi bayo kwicandagisha, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru Associated Press. Perezida Joe Biden yategetse ko abakozi ba reta imiriyoni zibiri bategerezwa kwerekana icemeza ko bacandazwe canke naho atari uko bagategerezwa gupimwa no kwambara udupfukamunwa, banka bemera.

headline: Saudi Arabia: Abagore n'abagabo ubu bemerewe guca mu muryango umwe wa 'restaurants'
text: Leta ya Arabia Saoudite itangaza ko ico gihugu kitazosubira gusaba amazu y'uburiro kugira ubwinjiriro bubiri ku bagabo n'abagore. Imbere y'aho, hari ingingo itegeka ko abagore bari kumwe n'abana binjirira mu muryango wabo, abagabo nabo bakinjirira mu wundi. Ayo mategeko asa n'ayariko aribagirwa buke buke, kuko wasanga amazu atari make y'uburiro n'ayandi ahurirwamwo n'abantu benshi atari akiyashira mu ngiro. Haheze igihe hafatwa amategeko ajanye n'uguhindura ibintu mu mibereho y'abantu muri Arabia Saoudite, aherekejwe n'igingo zo guhasha abatayashigikiye. Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, umwami yarasohoye itegeko ryemerera umukenyezi gutembera mu bihugu vyo hanze ataruhusha arinze gusaba umuntu w'igitsina-gabo. Mu mwaka uheze, ico gihugu kandi carakuyeho itegeko ryari rimaze imyaka ishika cumi ryabuza abagore kugendesha imodokari. Hagati aho, abarwanira agateka k'abakenyezi bavuga ko hakiri amategeko akumira abakenyezi. Bavuga kandi ko hari abaharanira agateka k'abakenyezi babandanya bapfungwa mu gihe leta ibandanya ifata amategeko ajanye n'uguhindura ibintu mu mibereho y'abantu. Ejo ku wa Mungu, umushikiranganji ajejwe ibisagara yatangaje ko atari ngombwa ko amazu y'uburiro agira imiryango itandukanya abagabo n'abagore. Gushika ubu, hagati mu mazu y'uburiro hari uruhome rutandukanya abagore bari kumwe n'abana ku ruhande rumwe, abagabo bonyene ku rundi ruhande. Kuva Mohammed bin Salman abaye igikomangoma mu 2017, yagiye afata ingingo zihindura amategeko akandamiza abanyagihugu muri ico gihugu. Izo mpinduka zakiriwe neza n'amakungu ariko zica ziherekezwa n'ingingo z'uguhasha abatumva umugambi. Iyicwa ry'umumenyeshamakuru yari azwi cane, Jamal Khashoggi mu 2018 mu biro vy'ubuserukizi bw'ico gihugu muri Turukiya ryariyamirijwe bikomeye n'amakungu. Ariko abategetsi b'ibihangange kw'isi, harimwo na Donald Trump wa Amerika, babandanya bashigikiye Arabia Saoudite. Abategetsi b'ico gihugu bavuga ko Khashoggi yishwe mu "gikorwa c'uguhiga inkozi z'ikibi". Hagati aho, abanegura leta siko babibona, mbere n'umuhinga w'ishirahamwe ONU akaba yatangaje ko ubwo bwari "ubwicanyi ndengerabutungane".

headline: ‘Kutavyara ni indwara ishobora kuvurwa’ - Dr. Innocente Irakoze
text: Iyo umugabo n'umugore bubakanye, ikintu ca mbere baba bitezweko ni ukwibaruka abana. Iyo bishitse hagaca igihe kirekire bataravyara, ibibazo biba vyinshi, bakaba uruvugo mu babanyi, nabo nyene ubwabo bagashobora no gutangura gutanako umwikomo. Iyo abubakanye bashikiwe n'iki kibazo, akenshi usanga hari bamwe birukira kwa rumenyi/mu bapfumu, abandi nabo bakaja mu masengesho, batabanje kurondera kumenya ingorane aho iri. Muganga Innocente Irakoze umuhinga mu bijanye n'irondoka avuga ko ibi "kuba ari uguta umwanya" kuko ni ingorane ishobora gutorerwa umuti. Iki kiri mu bibazo biriko birigishwa abakenyezi b'Abarundikazi mu ciswe Inama Mpuzamakungu y'Abakenyezi b'Abarundi (International Burundian Women Conference 2022 ), yatanguranye n'umusi mpuzamakungu wahariwe abagore. Mu gihe akenshi usanga umugore akunze gutabwako umwikomo, Irakoze asigura ko ivyo kutavyara bishobora kuva no ku mugabo ku rugero rwa 50%, nk'uko icigwa aherutse gukora kivyerekana. Muri ico cigwa yerekanye mu nama yo ku wa 02 z'uku kwa kane, Dr. Irakoze asigura ko hari igihe usanga abubakanye vyaranse ko bavyara kubera, hampande y'ingorane zishobora kuba ziva ku mukenyezi, ushobora gusanga umugabo ata ntanga n'imwe afise, canke ugasanga izo ntanga n'aho yoba azifise ntizikomeye, canke naho ugasanga amatengatwa (testicules) z'umugabo ari nto canke zirwaye. Dr. Irakoze yasiguriye BBC ko, iyo hari ibibazo nk'ibi, hari igihe bashobora kumuvura agakira, agashobora kuvyara. Inkabuzo FSH na LH zikorerwa mu mutwe. Ku mugabo ni zo zituma amatengatwa yiwe aba manini, akamera neza, nayo ku mugore zikaba ari zo zikora kuri turya duhimba (ovaires) duhingura urubuto rw'umugore (canke igi), zikaba kandi ari zo zituma umugore aja mu gasamo, nk'uko Dr. Irakoze abisigura. Avuga ko iyo izo nkabuzo zikwiye, zikaba zishika ku matengatwa y'umugabo, ziyatuma akora iyindi nkabuzo yitwa testosterone, iyi ikaba ari yo iza gufasha ko haba imbuto z'umugabo. Avuga ko urugero rwiza ku mugabo ari hagati ya 1 na 14, bigiye musi canke hejuru y'ibi ntashobora kuvyara. Iyo umugabo yigeze kurwara indwara kanaka muri kahise, nk'akarorero amasambambwika akiri umwana, Dr. Irakoze avuga ko ingorane zica zihera kuri ayo matengatwa, ugasanga umugera utera aya masambambwika wihomye ku matengatwa yiwe, ugatangura kuyarya canke kuyarwaza ukayababaza. Ati: "Iyo rero amatengatwa yasinzikaye kandi akiri umwana, ya testosterone ntisubira gukorwa, canke ikozwe naho ugasanga ikozwe ari nke cane." Asigura ingene izi nkabuzo zikorana kugira ngo umugabo ashobore gusohora imbuto zikomeye, Dr. Irakoze avuga ati: "Iyo testosterone ikwiye, ica imanura FSH bigatuma umugabo ashobora gusohora intanga zikomeye, ariko iyo ari nke cane, bica bituma ya nkabuzo FSH iduga birenze urugero, ntishobore kumanuka, aha rero umugabo ntashobora kuronka intanga zifise ubushobozi bwo gutuma umukenyezi wiwe yosama". Hampande y'iyi ndwara y'amasambambwika, itabi, inzoga, indwara zitwa Syndrome de Kallmann, Syndrome de Klinefelter na varicoceles, kuvyibuha cane, ibidukikije…., navyo biri mu bituma umugabo agira intanga zidakomeye "kuko bishobora gutuma inkabuzo FSH na testosterone, zifasha kugira intanga zikomere, zigabanuka canke zikaduga", nk'uko bisigurwa n'uyu muhinga. Dr. Irakoze avuga ko iyo izi nkabuzo FSH na LH ziduze, kugira umugabo n'umugore baronke imbanyi, umugabo  akenera imbuto z'uwundi mugabo kuko adashobora kuronka imbuto ziwe, ariko ko iyo zimanutse, bashobora kumuvura mu kumutera  inshinge zitwa Gonadotrophines maze agashobora kubona imbuto ziwe. Dr. Irakoze ahanura ko iyo umugabo amenye kare ko ata ntanga n'imwe afise canke ko inkabuzo FSH iri hejuru, kimwe mu kuvurwa, bokwumvikana n'umukenyezi bakarera umwana akeneye abamurera adafise abavyeyi canke ntaho-nikora mu gihe uwo muryango watevye gusama udafise uburyo bwo kwivuza bakoresheje icitwa Fecondation in vitro (FIV). Hampande y'iki kibazo c'inkabuzo za FSH na LH, Dr. Irakoze avuga kandi ko ikibazo c'abagabo usanga bafise amatengatwa mato canke akagira izindi ndwara naco nyene giteye isibe. Mu cigwa ciwe, avuga ko ku bagabo 100 bapimye, 11 ari bo basanze bafise amatenganwa akomeye, abo bandi bose bari bafise ingorane, harimwo 27 bari bafise amatengatwa mato. Ku bijanye n'inkabuzo za FSH, iyo umugore agiye mu gasamo, zica ziduga zikaja hejuru rwose. Ariko, iyo afise ikibazo c'uko zama ziri hejuru ata kizimanura, uyu mugore ntashobora kuja mu gasamo n'aho yogira gute. Aca amera nk'urya muntu yamaze guca imvyaro, nk'uko Dr. Irakoze abisigura. Avuga ko bishobora gushika umukenyezi akiri muto abona ko aja mu butinyanka bisanzwe, ariko izo nkabuzo zikama ziri ku rugero rwo hejuru cane, ikizwi mu gifaransa nka hypergonadisme. Ati: "Muri iki gihe, umukenyezi biragoye kumuvura, kugira ngo ashobore kuronka umwana, bisaba ko aronka iż'uwundi mugore kuko wewe ntazo aba afise ziba zaraheze kandi abona ko akiri muto". Dr. Irakoze avuga ko umugore ategerezwa kugira urugero rwa FSH iri hagati ya 3 na 8, ko iyo zigiye hejuru biba vyatanguye kugorana ko asama. "Guhera kuri 10 gushika kuri 20, aha ubushobozi bwo kumuvura buba bwamaze no kugabanuka". Avuga ko iyo izi nkabuzo ari nke, hari inshinge zo kumutera kugira ngo urugero rwazo ruduge, ibidashoboka iyo zisanzwe ziri ku rugero rwo hejuru. Dr. Innocente Irakoze arasigura imvo zitari nke zituma umugore adashobora kuvyara, agasigura uko yibaza zigenda zisumbasumbana. Imvo ya mbere atanga, avuga ko ingorane zikunze kwibonekeza ku bakenyezi batari bake ari uko usanga bafise utuvyimba dutoduto ku gihimba cabo kizana urubuto, ikaba ari indwara yitwa ovaire micropolykystique, bigakunda kuboneka ku bagore bavyibushe, abafise ubwanwa, usanga bataja mu kwezi kenshi canke bakabona amaraso imisi myinshi, ugasanga baramaze n'ukwezi kwose bakiri mu butinyanka. Imvo igira kabiri ituma abagore bateba gusama ni iyijanye n'indwara yitwa endométriose, ituma baribwa cane bari mu butinyanka, kandi no kuva bakiri bato bakaba bararibwa cane bakiri mu kwezi. Abandi bagira ingorane zo kutavyara avuga ko hari abagore usanga uturingoti dutwara imbuto twarazivye, abandi ugasanga bafise utuvyimba mu gitereko - indwara yitwa fibrome. Abandi avuga ko bashobora kugira ingorane zo gusama ni abakenyezi usanga bariko barakura barenza imyaka 35 kubera bobo imbuto zabo usanga zaragabanutse. Ati: "Abo mu kubavura duca turaba no mu bipimo vy'amaraso, kuko akenshi usanga na za nkabuzo bita FSH nabo zaraduze cane, ugasanga, n'aho baba bakija mu kwezi, basa n'abagore baba baraciye imvyaro". Dr. Irakoze avuga kandi ko hari abakenyezi bafise amaberebere (amashereka mu Kinyarwanda) kandi batarigera bavyara bashobora kugira ingorane yo gusama, agahanura abatevye gusama kuza barafyonda kugira ngo barabe ko batoba bafise iyi ngorane. Avuga ko hari n'igihe umugore aba afise iki kibazo ariko kitibonekeza "tukaza kubibona mu maraso, dupimye amaraso tukabona ko koko hari ibimenyetso vy'iyi ngorane y'amaberebere ituma batazigera baja mu gasamo co kimwe n'abandi". Iyindi ngorane ikunda gufata abagore baba bakiri bato ni indwara izwi nka hypogonadisme, aho usanga za nkabuzo FSH zaramanutse cane rwose, ugasanga afise urugero ruri musi ya 3, ugasanga afise nk'ubusa. Avuga ko aba bashobora kumara n'umwaka urenga batagiye mu butinyanka. Dr. Irakoze avuga ko abakunze guhura n'iyo ngorane ari nka barya usanga iyo bahejeje kwibaruka banduriyemwo indwara (infection), "ugasanga baciye batangura kuzana ibintu binuka bagiheza kwibaruka, canke ugasanga igikomere cabo carabayemwo imicafu, canke ugasanga igihe cose bagumye bamusubiramwo, hakazamwo amashira bigasaba ko baguma bahanagura". Ati: "Aha rero urashobora gusanga no mu nda vya bisogi vyaciye bifatana, twa turingoti dusohora imbuto dutuma asama tukarwara canke tukaziba, kandi bikaba ahejeje kwibaruka". Avuga kandi ko iki kibazo gishobora gushikira barya bantu bahejeje kwibaruka bagaca bashiramwo akanyuzi ari inda ya mbere, maze ugasanga gaciye kajako imicafu, "uyo muntu rero kenshi hari igihe adasubira gusama". Eka ngo n'abantu baba barakoroje inda bashobora guhura n'iki kibazo, "ibi tukaba dukunze kubibona ku bakobwa, aho usanga avyaye irya mbere, hanyuma asamye ubugira kabiri ugasanga agiye kuyikoroza mbere bigakorwa nabi... uyo kenshi biramushikira ntashobore gusubira gusama". Dr. Irakoze avuga kandi ko gukoresha za nshinge zo gutandukanya imvyaro ku bagore bahejeje kuvyara inda ya mbere bashobora kugira iyi ngorane. Ati: " Urushinge si urwo umuntu yoherako atararonka n'abana babiri". Iyi ngorane kandi ngo irashobora kuva ku bagabo baguma banywa inzoga nyinshi, itabi ryinshi, "ibi bigatuma imbuto ziwe zidakomera, canke ugasanga umugabo amaze kwubaka aciye aguma avyibuha", co kimwe n'umugore usanga aciye avyibuha cane ahejeje kwibaruka, aho usanga za nkabuzo zica zigabanuka. Dr. Irakoze avuga ko ingorane ikunze kwibonekeza ku bagabo ari uko hari abo usanga nk'intanga ziwe zifise inguvu nke, zidakwiye canke zimugaye, aha "duca tubanza kuraba ko amatengatwa yiwe akomeye, kuko bishobora kuba bitumwe n'uko amatengatwa yiwe aba afise ibivyimba, yaronze akagabanuka, canke ugasanga uturingoti turimwo amaraso menshi". Mu kuvura abagabo nk'aba bafise iyi ngorane avuga ko bashobora kubabaga canke bakabaha "imiti itandukanye kugira ngo turabe ko izi mbuto ziwe zigira inguvu, rimwe na rimwe tukamubuza inzoga, itabi, akirinda kuvyibuha, bivanye n'ingorane z'intanga ziwe". Dr. Irakoze avuga ko hariho abo bitoroshe kuvura, nk'umuntu avukana indwara zimwe zimwe nk'izituma adashobora kumoterwa, canke akaba afise ibindi bimenyetso vy'izindi ndwara yavukanye. "Uyo muntu ntivyoroshe kumuvura kuko usanga atagira n'urubuto na rumwe". Ku bantu nabo barwaye za kanseri ugasanga barakorewe bwa buvuzi bita chimiotherapie, baba abagabo canke abagore, bakaba batari bwaronke umwana n'umwe, "imbuto ziragenda aho tudashobora kuzigarukana". Ati: "Vyari vyiza y'uko uyo mugabo, imbere y'uko akorerwa ubwo buvuzi abikisha intanga, ahantu bashobora kuzibika kuko imbuto z'umugabo zirashobora kubikwa imyaka ijana". Mu kuvura umugore Dr. Irakoze avuga ko iyo basanze za nkabuzo zimeze neza, ama trompe akomeye, ibivyimba barabikuyeho, nta cobuza ko atangura gufata imiti ishobora kumufasha kugira agasamo kameze neza. Iyo ivy'imiti vyanse, uyu muganga ahanura ko yoca agirirwa ico bita insémination intra-utérine, "aho bafata imbuto z'umukenyezi, bakazitegura, bakongera bagategura n'iz'umugabo. Hageze ko umukenyezi aja mu gasamo, izo mbuto zikaba zateguwe neza hanyuma zigaterekwa mu gitereko c'umugore". Iyo iyi nzira yanse, ashobora kuja ku citwa fécondation in vitro, ubu bukaba ari ubuhinga bwo guhuza igi ry'umugore n'urubuto rw'umugabo bikabera hanze y'igitereko, bagakorerayo umwana, hanyuma "agitangura kubaho imisi itatu ya mbere, bagaca bamutereka mu gitereko c'umugore ashaka gutwara iyo nda". Dr. Innocente Irakoze, ahanura umugabo n'umugore ko iyo babonye bamaze igihe babana, nk'umwaka urenga batararonka imbanyi, ica mbere ni uko bompi bitura abaganga kugira ngo bamenye ingorane bafise, hanyuma bashobore kuvurwa.

headline: Trump yifatiye mu gahanga mugenziwe McConnell ko ari 'umunyaporitike atagira ubwenge'
text: Donald Trump yahoze ari umukuru wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yatanguye urugamba rwo kurwanya mugenziwe w'umuRepubulika Mitch McConnell yahora arongoye nyarwinshi mu nama nkenguzamateka. Trump ati: "Mitch ni akaga muri poritike, w'umutima mubi kandi w'umujinya, kandi n'abakenguzamateka b'aba Repubulika bagumana nawe ntibazigera basubira kuronka itsinzi". Umukenguzamateka McConnell yamaze imyaka arongoye inama nkenguzamateka, yagiye ku ruhande rw'abeza Trump mu rubanza rwiwe rwo mu ndwi iheze. Ariko rero, mu nyuma yaciye amwihinduka mu kuvuga ko Trump ari we "nyanduruko" y'igitero co ku ngoro y'amakoraniro Capitol ya Amerika kubera "ibinyoma" vyiwe ko amatora yibwe. Mw'ijambo yigeze gushikiriza imbere y'inama nkenguzamateka, yavuze ko Trump yoshirwa imbere y'ubutungane "ku vyaha vyose yakoze igihe yari akiri ku butegetsi". Ejo ku wa kabiri, Trump yashikirije itangazo rirerire kuva avuye ku butegetsi haraciye ukwezi. Mw'iryo tangazo harimwo ngo "Umugambwe w'aba Repubulika nta cubahiro ushobora gusubira kuronka canke ngo ukomere mu gihe uzoba ukigendera ku 'bategetsi' bameze nk'umukenguzamateka Mitch McConnell ". Yavuze ko kuba Bwana McConnell "ata ntumbero ya poritike afise, ata bwenge, ubuhinga ndetse n'ubuntu afise" vyatumye aba Repubulika batakaza inama nkenguzamateka mu matora aheruka mu kw'icumi na rimwe. Trump avuga ko igihe uyu mutegetsi wo mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika yariko yitoreza ikibanza mu nama nkenguzamateka "yamutakambiye" ko yomushigikira, mbere akavuga ko iyo atamushigikira, McConnell atari gutorwa. Trump yifatiye mu gahanga McConnell inyuma y'aho yerekaniye ivyipfuzo vyiwe vyo kuzorwanya abantu bose bazorondera kwitoza bashigikiwe na Trump. Uyu yahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu avuga ko azoshigikira abazoshaka kwitoza bafise intumbero isa na rwiwe yo "gusubira gukomeza Amerika na poritike yacu yo gushira Amerika imbere y'ibindi vyose". Trump ati: "McConnell ntazigera akora ibikenewe gukorwa, canke ngo ashire imbere ineza y'igihugu cacu". "Turazi ko poritike yacu ya 'Amerika imbere ya vyose' ari yo yatsinze, si poritike za McConnell na Biden zidusubiza inyuma". Mu kiringo cose c'ubutegetsi bwa Trump, aba bategetsi babiri bakomeye b'umugambwe w'aba Repubulika bari soma mbike. Ariko ibintu vyagiye guhinduka igihe Trump atsindiwe mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu. McConnell avuga ko atarigera avugisha Trump kuva hagati mu kw'icumi na kabiri. Ibintu vyagiye kwunyuka inyuma y'igitero ku ngoro ya Capitol ku wa 06 z'ukwa mbere, caguyemwo abantu batanu harimwo umuporisi. N'aho yari yaterewe icizere n'inama nshingamateka mu kwa mbere yagirizwa guteza iyi migumuko, Trump yarejejwe n'inama nkenguzamateka ku wa gatandatu uheze. Aba Repubulika indwi bonyene nibo bagiye ku ruhande rw'abo mu mugambwe w'abaharanira demokarasi (Democrats) kugira bakubite intahe mu gahanga Trump. McConnell hamwe n'abandi bakenguzamateka 42 batoye ko Trump yambikwa izera. Hari hakenewe bibiri vya bitatu kugira ngo uyu yahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu akubitwe intahe mu gahanga. N'aho yagiye ku ruhande rw'abamwambika izera, yaramutyoje mu nama nkenguzamateka ayo matora aheze. Yavuze ati: "Nta gushidikanya na guto kuhari ko Perezida Trump ari we ntandaro y'ivyabaye kuri uwo musi". Ati: "Akarwi k'abagumutsi kateye Capitol kw'izina ryiwe. Izi nkozi z'ikibi zari zitwaje ivyapa vyiwe, bamanitse amabendera yiwe kandi baririmba ko ari we bagamburukira". Imigenderanire ntiyatosekaye hagati ya Trump na McConnell gusa mu kwezi guheze. Ejo ku wa kabbiri, umuhanuzi wa Trump yavuze ko Rudy Giuliani yahoze ari umukuru w'igisagara ca New york yahagaritse amabanga yiwe yo guserukira Trump imbere y'amategeko. Jason Miller yabwiye televiziyo CNN ati: "Giuliani ntagiserukira Perezida Trump imbere y'amategeko". Mu kwa mbere ibinyamakuru vya Amerika vyavuze ko Trump yagerageje guhagarika agashirukabute ka Giuliani mu kwerekana akababaro kiwe ko kubona yari asubiye kubogozwa ku ncuro ya kabiri. Ariko inyuma y'ico kiganiro na CNN, Miller yasobanuye kuri Twitter ko Giuliani aguma ari "incuti n'umugenzi". Avuga ko batagikorana ubu kubera "ata bibazo bikihari vyotuma Giuliani aserukira Perezida Trump".

headline: Kenya: Hari amashirahamwe asaba ihagarikwa ry'amategeko yo gukumira Covid
text: Amwe mu mashirahamwe ataho yegamiye muri politike muri Kenya yakoze imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza amategeko yo gukumira ikiza Covid-19. Mu ndwi iheze, prezida Uhuru Kenyatta yarahagaritse uruja n'uruza mu ntara zitanu zivugwa ko zirimwo ibitigiri binini vy'abantu bandura iyo ngwara harimwo n'igisagara ca Nairobi. Iyo ngingo ikaba ari iyo guhagarika ikwiyongera kw'ikiza Covid-19. Prezida Kenyatta kandi yarahagaritse ububare bw'inzoga muri utwo turere twashizwemwo umukwabu, anategeka ko abafise amazu y'uburiro badandaza indya abantu batahana muhira gusa. Amashirahamwe Bunge la Mwananchi na Muungano wa wananchi wa Citizen Alliance avuga ko izo ngingo zigira ingaruka mbi ku banyagihugu basanzwe, mu gihe ibikorwa vya politike ari vyo vyatumye ico kiza "gikwiragira".

headline: U﻿N: Abantu benshi bariko barahunga imigwano hagati ya FARDC na M23 muri Rutshuru
text: U﻿N/ONU ivuga ko abantu benshi bamaze guta izabo kubera imigwano iriko ibera muri Rutshuru, harimwo n'abamaze guhungira muri Uganda. Ku rubuga rwa Twitter, O﻿CHA, ishami rya ONU rijejwe kugenzura itangwa ry'imfashanyo ivuga ko bakiriko baragenzura neza uko abamaze guta izabo bangana n'ivyo bakeneye. Nta co F﻿ARDC na M23 baravuga kuvyerekeye iyo ntambara. M﻿u kwezi kwa gatandatu mu 2022, umuhari wa M23 warigaruriye igisagara ca Bunagana kiri ku rubibe Republika ya Demokrasi ya Congo ihana na Uganda. I﻿co gihe umuvugizi wa M23 yabwiye BBC Gahuzamiryango ati:“Yose [Bunagana] nta kuvanaho na hamwe, twayifashe”. I﻿shirahamwo Barometre securitaire du Kivu rikunze kwandika ku mutekano muri ako karere, rivuga ko intambara yasubiye gusutuma mu turere twinshi twa Rutshuru kuva ku musi wa kane. U﻿two turere tukaba ari Muhimbira, Kabindi, Rangira, muri Rutshuru na Nord Kivu. H﻿avugwa abasivile babiri boba bamaze kwicwa nabandi barenga mirongo ibiri bakomeretse, nk'uko biri ku rubuga rwa Twitter rw'iryo shirahamwe. I﻿tariki 20 z'ukwezi kwa gatandatu 2022 umukuru w’igihugu ca Kenya, Uhuru Kenyatta yaratumyeko inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu bigize ishirahamwe rya Afrika y’Ubuseruko (EAC) kugira bavugane ku kibazo c’amahoro n’umutekano  muri Repubulika y’Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo (DRC), nk’uko biri mw’itangazo rya reta. Uhuru, ari na we yari arongoye ishirahamwe EAC yasavye ko horungikwa umurwi w’ingabo za EAC guhagarika imigumuko irangwa mu buseruko bw’iki gihugu giherutse kwinjira muri iri shirahamwe. M﻿u kwezi kw'umunani ingabo z’Uburundi ni zo zabaye iza mbere kwinjira icese ku butaka bwa Repuburika ya Demokrasi ya Congo mu rwego rw’ishirahamwe rya Afrika y’Ubuseruko, EAC. Mu nyuma na Kenya yararungitse ingabo zayo muri ico gihugu mu gihe Uganda yo yavuze ko zisanzweyo. Izo ngabo zagiye mu ntumbero yo kugwanya imigwi yitwaje ibigwanisho iri mu buseruko bwa DR Congo, ariko gushika ubu nta nkuru ziravugwa ko boba bamaze gutana mu mitwe na M23.

headline: Ivana Trump, umugore wa mbere wa Donald Trump, yapfuye ku myaka 73
text: Ivana Trump, umugore wa mbere wa Donald Trump akongera akaba na nyina w’abana biwe batatu, yasandavye ku myaka 73. Aciye ku rubuga hwaniro rwiwe bwite, Truth Social, Trump yanditse ti: “Yari umugore w’intore, mwiza kandi atangaje, yabayeho mu buzima bukomeye kandi bwigisha”. Ivana Trump, umugore yavukiye mu citwa République tchèque, yarongowe n’uyu yahoze ari umukuru w’igihugu ca Amerika mu 1977. Bagiye kwahukana inyuma y’imyaka 15 mu 1992. Bavyaranye abana batatu - Donald Jr, Ivanka na Eric Trump. Igipolisi kivuga ko ashobora kuba yahitanywe n’isanganya, nk’uko vyandikwa n’ikinyamakuru Assiciated Press. Amasoko yabwiye iki kinyamakuru ko umupfasoni Trump yatowe yataye ubwenge ku ngazi i muhira iwe mu gisagara ca New York, bikavugwa ko yoba yaguye. Donald na Ivana Trump baramenyekanye cane mu myaka ya 1980 na 1990, mbere ukwahukana kwabo kwaravuzweko vyinshi. Bamaze kwahukana, Ivana yaciye atanguza urudandaza rwiwe rw’ibimoga, impuzu n’ibisharizo vy’umubiri (bijoux). Mu gitabo ciwe co mu 2017 yise Raising Trump, Ivana arishimira kuba yarareze abana babo, akavuga ko "yafashe ingingo ku bijanye n’indero yabo, ibikorwa vyabo, ingendo, mu kubitaho no kubaha ivya nkenerwa” gushika muri kaminuza. Muri iki gitabo, avuga ko ubucuti bwiwe na Trump bwiyongereye cane kuva bahukanye, akavuga ko yama avugana nawe rimwe mu ndwi. Mw’itangazo wasohoye, umuryango wa Trump wamukengurukiye mu kuvuga ko yari “inguvu mu bikorwa, umunonotsi wo ku rwego mpuzamakungu, ubwiza bw’agahorurore, umugenzi, akaba n’umuvyeyi yitaho umuryango”. “Ivana Trump ni umucikacumu. Yahunze ubutegetsi bw’igikomunista ahungira muri iki gihugu ”, niko itangazo rivuga. “ Yarigishije abana biwe ubutwari n’ubwira, kugira impuhwe no kudacika intege”. Umwana wiwe mukuru, Ivanka avugwa ko yari yegereye cane nyina wiwe, yanditse mu butumwa bwiwe yacishije ku rubuga rwa Instagram ko ababaye cane. Yanditse ati: "Mama yari incabwenge, afise igikundiro, afise ishaka kandi atwenza cane. Yarerekanye inguvu, ubutwari n’ishaka mu bikorwa vyiwe vyose. Yabayeho ubuzima bwuzuye - ntiyigeze atakaza amahirwe yo gutwenga no gutamba ”. Donald Trump yabaye umugabo wiwe wa kabiri. Uwa mbere, Alfred Winklmayr, yari umunya-Autriche yigisha urukino rwa ski n’umugenzi wiwe, akaba yari yemeye kurongorwa nawe kugira ngo aronke ubwenegihugu bwa Autriche. Ibi vyamufashije kuva mu gihugu ciwe ca gikomunista  - ico gihe kikaba citwa Tchécoslovaquie  - atari uko yari ahunze. Igihe yaba muri Canada mu myaka ya 1970, yakoze nk’umwigisha w’urukino rwa ski akongera akaba n’umunyamideri. Igihe yari mu rugendo rw’akazi mu gisagara ca New York mu 1976, yabonanye na Trump ari mu murwi w’abanyamideri. Baciye barongorana mu mwaka wakurikiye, ubwo nyene baca batangura kuvugwa cane mu binyamakuru.
