Igihe yari akiri kumwe na Trump, Ivana yaranguye amabanga atandukanye mw’ishirahamwe rya Trump (Trump Organization), harimwo no kuba umukuru w’ihoteri Plaza Hotel i Manhattan. Ariko bivugwa ko Trump yamwugaraniye hanze y’ibiro vyiwe kuri iyo hoteri mu 1990 bivuye ku kutumvikana ku bintu bine vyari mu masezerano bagiriraniye imbere y’uko barongorana. Igihe bahukaniye, Ivana yarongowe incuro zibiri, ubwa mbere n’umurwizatunga w’umutaliyano Riccardo Mazzucchelli, kuva 1995-97;  hanyuka kandi n’umukinyi w’amareresi w’umutaliyano nyene Rossano Rubicondi, kuva 2008-09. Umukenguzamateka w’umu Repubulika Lindsey Graham, incuti ya hafi cane ya Donald Trump, ati : “ Yarabayeho mu buzima bw’ikinyamerika ”. Mu 2017, Ivana yabwiye ikiganiro ca ABC, Good Morning America, ko atagomvye gutera ubwishime umugore wiwe w’ubu Melania amuhamagaye muri Maison Blanche/White House. Yavuze ati : “ Ni jewe ndi umugore mukuru wa Trump. Uravyumva ? Ni jewe ndi First Lady ”. Ni amwe mu majambo menshi akomeye uyu yahoze ari umunyamideri yasubiwemwo. Mu gakino yagizemwo uruhara mu 1996 kiswe The First Wives Club, yabwiye abagore bari bahukanye ati: "Bapfasoni, mutegerezwa kwihagararako kandi mukigenga. Kandi mwibuke, ntimushavure, rondere vyose”.

headline: Umunonotsi wa Afrika 2021: Urutonde rwa BBC rw’abazotorwamwo rwasohotse
text: Urutonde rwa BBC rw'abazotorwamwo umunonotsi yenuriye abandi mu 2021 mu banonotsi b'abanye-Afrika (BBC African Sports Personality of the Year) rwashizwe ahabona - kandi urashobora gutora uwo ubona ko ariwe yofata ico kibanza. Abo bahiganirwa iryo teka uko ari batandatu batowe n'umugwi w'abamenyeshamakuru bo hirya no hino muri Afrika hamwe no mu Bwongereza. Uwo mugwi watoye urutonde ushingiye ku ho Afrika yashitse ku rugero rwiza kurusha ahandi mu nkino ku rwego mpuzamakungu mu 2021 (hagati y'ukwezi kwa mbere n'ukwezi kw'icenda). Ico umukinyi yafashije birenze kuba ubwiwe yashitse kure mu nkino navyo vyarashingiweko. Ubandanije usoma hari ayandi makuru menshi kuri abo batoranijwe, aho nawe ushobora gutora uwo ushaka ko atsinda. Gutora bizorangira 23:59 GMT (ni ukuvuga 21:59 mu masaha yo mu Burundi no mu Rwanda)  ku wa mungu , itariki 19 ukwezi kwa 12  hanyuma uwatsinze atangazwe ku wa gatanu,  itariki 7 ukwezi kwa mbere  2022 mu kiganiro  Focus On Africa ca BBC kuri television no kuri radio hamwe no ku rubuga rw'inkino rwa BBC Sport. Iguhugu:  Kenya Imyaka: 37 Ico akinamwo: Yiruka marathon Ashobora kuba ari we mwirutsi wa mbere anyaruka kuri marathon mu bihe vyose hanyuma uyu mwaka,  Eliud Kipchoge yashimangiye ikibanza ciwe  inyuma yo gutahukana umudari w'inzahabu ugira kabiri yikurikiranya mu nkino za Olympic. Mu gihe yabaye uwugira gatatu mu kugwanira kugumana umudari wa Olympic muri marathon, uwo munya-Kenya mu nyuma yaciye ahabwa igihagararo c'umunonotsi  w'umugabo w'urwego mpuzamakungu rw'inkino za Olympic (International Olympic Committee). Gutahukana umudari i Tokyo vyasiguye ko atsinze 13 kuri marathon 15 amaze kwiruka kuva atanguye kwiruka kuri ico kirere mu 2013, mu vyo amaze gushikako  hakaba harimwo umwanya wa mbere mwiza kw'isi wa  2:01:39  yagize i Berlin mu  2018. Ku myaka 36,  yabaye uwutsinze marathon muri Olympic w'imyaka myinshi kurusha abandi kuva umunya-Portugal Carlos Lopez ayitsinze ku myaka 37 mu 1984 kandi akaba yatsinze ku budasa bw'umwanya bwa mbere bunini kuva mu 1972. Igihugu: Kenya Imyaka: 27 Ico akinamwo: Yiruka ibirere biri hagati na hagati Faith Kipyegon yagize umwanya wa mbere mwiza wa Olympic igihe yagwanira kugumana umudari wiwe yari yatsindiye ubwa mbere mu nkino za Rio mu 2016. Uwo mugore w'umunya-Kenya yageneye intsinzi yiwe umwana wiwe w'umukobwa w'imyaka itatu, avuga ko ariwe yatumye agira umwete inyuma yo gufata ikiruhuko  c'amezi 21 ataja mu nkino. Kugenera umwana wiwe iyo ntsinzi vyarushirije kugira insiguro kuko Kipyegon niwe mu kinyi   wa Olympic agira gatatu yagumije umudari wiwe inyuma yo kuvyara hagati y'inkino (abandi n'umunya-Australia Shirley Strickland, mu 1956, n'umunya-Cameroun Francoise Mbango, mu 2008). Imbere y'uko abica bigacika mu Buyapani, yari yagize umwe mu myanya  y'imbere y'isi ku 3:51.07 - umwanya ugira kane kw'isi muri kahise - i Monaco mu kwezi kw'indwi  muri Diamond League - ari naho yavanye iteka ryo kuba umuhizi w'umwaka mu kwezi kw'icenda. Kuva agize umwanya wa mbere wa Olympic, ubu arondera umwanya wa mbere w'isi. Ntando Mahlanguu Igihugu:Afrika y'EpfoImyaka: 19  Ico akina: gusimba ubukika no kwiruka 200m Ntando Mahlangu yaronse umudari wiwe wa mbere w'inkino za Olympic agifise imyaka 14 igihe yaronka ifeza ku 200m mu nkino za Rio mu 2016 - amaze imyaka ibiri yonyene atanguye kwiruka. Uyu mwaka yarongereje igitigiri c'imidari mu gutwara inzahabu ku  200m no gusimba ubukika mu bagabo i Tokyo. Gusimba ubukika vyamuhaye inzahabu anaca umuhigo w'isi ku 7,17m - n'ubwo yari yatanguye kwimenyereza gusimba amayinga atandatu imbere y'uko inkino ziba. Uwu muyabaga afise kazoza mu kwiruka - amaguru yiwe yaciwe kuko atatera imbere, agifise imyaka 10 - afatanya ubunonotsi n'ivyigwa. Mu kwezi kwa kane, yashinze umwanya wa mbere mwiza kw'isi ku masekunda 22.4 ku 200m mu bagabo. Igihugu: Namibia Imyaka: 18 Ico akina: yiruka ikirere kigufi "Ukwiruka kwa mbere kwiza mu buzima bwanje" - uko niko  Christine Mboma  yavuze ingene yirutse mu nkino za  Tokyo 2020 mu kuba umugore wa mbere wo muri Namibia  yatahanye umudari wa Olympic. Uwo mudari wabaye uwa mbere wa Namibia mu myaka 25, uwo muyabaga akaba yatahukanye ifeza ku 200m mu gushika inyuma y'umunya-Jamaica amaze gutwara umudari wa Olympic gatanu  Elaine Thompson-Herah. Umwanya w'amasekunda  21,81 yagize niwo wari uwa mbere muto ugizwe n'umugore afise munsi y'imyaka 20. Mu nyuma yabandanije mu gutsinda ihiganwa rya Diamond League  mu kwezi kw'icenda i Zurich, aho umwanya wiwe w'amasekunda 21,78 wongeye gushinga umwanya wa mbere muto kw'isi w'abafise munsi y'imyaka 20 uba n'uwa mbere muri Afrika. Uwo mukobwa w'imyaka 18 yatanguye kwihatira ku 200m mu ntango z'uyu mwaka aho amariye kwakwa amahirwe yo kwiruka 400m n'urwego rw'isi ruraba inkino z'ubunonotsi kubera asanzwe afise urugero ruri hejuru rw'inkabuzo ya testosterone. Igihugu: SenegalImyaka: 29 Ico akina: umunyegori mu mupira w'amaguru Edouard Mendy aratamarirwa i Stamford Bridge kuva atanguye gukinira Chelsea avuye muri Rennes yo mu Bufaransa mu kwezi kw'icenda 2020 akaba yabaye kirumara mu vyo uwo mugwi wo mu burengero bwa Londres washitseko muri Champions League mu kwezi kwa gatanu. Yashitse ku muhigo w'inkino icenda atinjijwe igitsindo mu rugendo rwo gutwara ico gikombe mu mwaka w'inkino wiwe wa mbere muri iryo higanwa. Mendy kandi yanditse amateka mu kuba umunyegoli wambere w'umunye-Afrika akinye mu rukino rwanyuma rwa Champions League aba kandi uwa mbere akinye mu rukino ruhambaye ku mugabane wa Buraya kuva aho umunye-Zimbabwe Bruce Grobbelaar abonekeye mu kibuga mu 1985 mu rukino rw'ihiganwa rya European Cup (igikombe ca Buraya), ryabanjirije Champions League, akaba yakinira Liverpool. Inkino 19 Mendy yamaze atinjijwe igitsindo mu mwaka w'inkino uheruka yaba muri Champions League canke muri Premier League, zatumye atwara agashimwe k'umunyegoli yenuriye abandi i Buraya mu mwaka w'inkino 2020-21 (Uefa Goalkeeper of 2020-21). Uyu munonotsi yanatsindiye Uefa Super Cup, yaranashizwe mu bahiganirwa agashimwe ka Fifa k'umunyegoli yenuriye abandi mu 2021, ariko uyu mugabo yatahukanye umudari w'ikibanza ca kabiri mu gikombe ca FA mu kwezi kwa gatanu, yahushije gutsindira Yashim Trophy ihabwa umunyegoli yenuriye abandi i Buraya, igikombe gitangwa n'ikinyamakuru France Football. Iguhugu: Afrika y'Epfo Imyaka: 24 Ico akina: Breaststroke (ubwoko bwo kwoga) Tatjana Schoenmaker yarabiciye biracika i Tokyo aho uretse gutahana inzahabu n'ifeza mu gihugu ciwe ca Afrika y'Epfo, yanaciye umuhigo w'isi n'uwo mu nkino  za Olynpic ku 200m no ku 100m mu kwoga ivyo bita brasse canke  breaststroke. Mu gukora ivyo yaciye aha Afrika y'Epfo umudari wa mbere wa Olympic mu kwoga mu rwego rw'anbagore kuva mu 2000 aca arangiza imyaka 25 Afrika y'Epfo yari imaze irindiriye umudari w'inzahabu mu nkino za Olympic mu kwoga kuko yahejeje ari uwa mbere ku 200m. Schoenmaker yarahatswe guheba inkino mu 2016 igihe yabura amanota yo kuronka itike yo kwitaba inkino za Rio abuze ic'ijana c'umusekunda. Ariko ntiyataye hasi maze kuva ico gihe amaze guca imihigo yo mu gihugu no ku mugabane, inzahabu zibiri mu nkino za Commonwealth hamwe n'umudari w'ifeza  ku rwego rw'isi. Yavuze ati: "Ubu ihangiro rikurikira ni irihe, ingene notera imbere kurusha? Nkeneye kubona iyo ukwoga kwanje kuzotera kuja." Ushaka gutora tugusavye kuja ngaha https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/africa/59089895 aho unasanga amategeko ajanye n'ubuzima bwite. Gutora bizohera kuwa Mungu itariki 19/12/2021 saa 23:59 GMT.

headline: AUKUS: US na UK biranegurwa ku amasezerano yo kwivuna umwansi vyagiriraniye na Australia
text: Amerika n'Ubwongereza biriko biriyamirizwa n'ibihugu bitari bike ku masezerano yavyo vyagiriraniye na Australia mu bijanye n'umutekano. Aya masezerano - afatwa nk'umugambi wo guhangana n'Ubushinwa - azotuma Amerika n'Ubwongereza biha Australia ubuhinga bwo guhingura amato y'intambara yo musi y'inyanja akoreshwa n'inguvu za nikleyeri. Ariko igihugu kibabaye cane ni Ubufaransa buvuga ko ari "amasezerano y'incamugongo", mu gihe Ubushinwa nabwo bwagiriza ibi bihugu bitatu ko vyafashe "ingendo ya ca gihe c'intambara y'ukwikekana" (Guerre froide/Cold War). Hari ubwoba ko aya masezerano ashobora gutuma Ubushinwa bwinjira mu ntambara. Aya masezerano azwi nka Aukus, yatangajwe na Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson hamwe na mugenziwe wa Australia Scott Morrison hirya y'ejo ku wa gatatu. N'aho batavuzemwo Ubushinwa, Aukus ifatwa nk'umugambi wo kubuza Ubushinwa kwiganza  mu nyanja y'Ubushinwa (Mer de Chine méridionale/South China Sea). Boris Johnson yabwiye abashingamateka ko aya masezerano "atagamije guhangana" n'Ubushinwa. Ariko uyu mushikiranganji wa mbere yabajijwe n'uwo yasubiriye, Theresa May, nimba aya masezerano adashobora gutuma Ubwongereza bwisanga mu ntambara bwinjijwemwo n'Ubushinwa. Uyu mupfasoni yabajije umushikiranganji wa mbere "ingaruka" aya masezerano ashobora kugira mu gihe Ubushinwa bwotera izinga rya Taiwan. Boris Johnson yishuye ati: "Ubwongereza buraciyemeje gukingira amategeko mpuzamakungu, niyo mpanuro ikomeye twoha incuti zacu kw'isi, kandi ni na yo mpanuro ikomeye twoha reta y'Ubushinwa". Taiwan ifata ko ari igihugu cigenga, ariko Ubushinwa bubandanya bwongereza igitsure iri zinga bubona ko ari intara yabwo yiyonkoye. Hagati aho,  Washington iriko irondera guhumuriza Ubufaransa ku bijanye n'aya masezerano yaje gutoba amasezerano y'amamiriyaridi menshi cane yo kwubaka ubwato bwo musi y'inyanja Ubufaransa bwari bwagiriraniye na Australia. Umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Ubufaransa Jean-Yves Le Drian avuga ko iri tangazo ari "incamugongo". Avuga ko ari "Ingingo mbi, yafashwe n'uruhande rumwe kandi amaherezo yayo ataboneka neza", yamwibukije Donald Trump yahoze arongoye Amerika. Mu kwihora, abaserukira Ubufaransa muri Amerika bahagaritse ibirori vyari bitegekanijwe vyo kwigina ubucuti hagati ya Amerika n'Ubufaransa. Uwahoze aserukira Ubufaransa muri Amerika, Gérard Araud, yabwiye ikiganiro World Tonight ca BBC ati: "Ni ingendo itabereye. Amerika yari izi ko aya masezerano akomeye ari inyungu z'igihugu c'Ubufaransa, ariko Amerika yarayirengagije". Umunyamabanga wa Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire Antony Blinken avuga ko Ubufaransa ari "incuti ikomeye" kandi ko Washington izobandanya "ikorana cane" na Paris. Jen Psaki ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru muri Maison Blanche/White House avuga ko ibivugwa n'Ubufaransa ataco bimaze. Ati: "Hari amasezerano y'ubufatanyabikorwa menshi arimwo Ubufaransa hamwe n'ayandi butarimwo, kandi na bo nyene barafise amasezerano y'ubufatanyabikorwa batadushizemwo. Uko niko bimeze mu migenderanire mpuzamakungu". 'Impinduka zikomeye' Umuhanuzi mukuru w'Ubwongereza ajejwe umutekano Stephen Lovegrove avuga ko aya masezerano - yiteze gufasha ibi bihugu bicuditse guhanahana ubuhinga bwa none butandukanye mu bijanye n'ibikorwa vyo musi yinyanja - yerekana "impinduka zikomeye". Aya masezerano  asigura ko Australia izoba ibaye igihugu kigize indwi kw'isi gikoresha amato y'intambara akoresha inguvu za nikleyeri, inyuma ya Amerika, Uburusiya, Ubushinwa, Ubwongereza, Ubufaransa n'Ubuhindi. Umuhanuzi mukuru w'Ubwongereza ajejwe umutekano Stephen Lovegrove avuga ko aya masezerano "ashobora kuba ari yo ya mbere akomeye kw'isi mu myaka 60 iheze". Ubushinwa ku ruhande rwabwo, rwagiriza ibi bihugu bitatu gufata "ingendo ya ca gihe c'intambara y'ukwikekana" (Guerre froide/Cold War) ishobora kubangamira inyungu zavyo bwite. Ikinyamakuru cegamiye reta y'Ubushinwa Global Times kigabisha ko hashobora kuba ugusiganwa mu guhingura ubwato bwo musi y'inyanja bukoresha inguvu za nikleyeri, congerako y'uko ingabo za Australia ari zo zishobora kuba "iza mbere zipfa" mu gihe Ubushinwa "bwokwivuna". Ariko umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi wa Australia, Peter Dutton, aramirira kure ibivugwa n'Ubushinwa. Ati: "Ubu si bwo bwa mbere Ubushinwa buvugije induru ku bijanye n'aho Australia ihagaze". "Turishimiye demokarasi yacu mu karere kacu. Turi kumwe n'ababanyi bacu mu karere ka Indo-Pacifique mu guharanira amahoro arama, kandi aya masezerano azotuma akarere gatekana. Ukuri ni uku kandi na bijambojambo vyo kwishongora bishobora kuzimanganya ukuri".

headline: China: Ikirere kibi cahitanye abanonotsi 21 biruka ibirometero vyinshi
text: Abanonotsi bapfuye inyuma yo kubangamirwa n'ikirere igihe bariko bariruka ibirometero birebire mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw'Ubushinwa. Imiyaga ikaze n'imvura ivanze n'imbeho yabangamiye abariko bariruka ibirometero 100 mw'ishamba rya Yellow River Stone, ikibanda c'ingenzi kiri mu ntara ya Gansu ku musi wa gatandatu. Iryo siganwa ryahagaritswe igihe abanonotsi 172 baburirwa irengero, hanyuma ibikorwa vyo gutabara bica biratangura. Benshi mu banonotsi bivugwa ko bari bakanye cane. Liang Jing, rurangiranwa mu kwiruka ivyo birometero birebire, hamwe na Huang Guanjun, yabaye uwa mbere mu bagabo bagendana ubumuga bwo kutumva mw'ihiganwa rya Olempike ryo mu Bushinwa mu 2019, bari mu bapfuye, nk'uko bimenyeshwa n'ikinyamakuru ca reta. Abategetsi bavuga ko abanonotsi 151 vyemezwa ko bakomeye, ariko ko umunani muri bo bakomeretse. Isiganwa ryari ryatanguye isaha 09:00 yo mu Bushinwa (01:00 GMT) ku musi wa gatandatu, bamwe mu basiganwa bakaba bari bambaye amabutura gusa n'udupira. Abarokotse bavuga ko ibipimo vyerekana ko haza kuba imvura n'umuyaga, ariko ko bitari kuba bibi cane nk'ivyo babonye. Inyuma y'amasaha atatu isiganwa ritanguye, igice kimwe co mu misozi c'ahabera iryo siganwa caguyemwo urubura, imvura nyinshi hamwe n'umuyaga vyatumye hakanya cane, nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi b'igisagara kihegereye ca Baiyin city. Umunonotsi umwe, Mao Shuzhi, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru rya Reuters ko yaciye asubira inyuma abonye ikirere gihindutse. Umwigeme Mao, yari amaze kugira ibirometero 24 ico gihe, kandi akaba atari bwashikiri iyo misozi, yavuze ati:"Imvura yaguma yongerekana." Yaciye afata ingingo yokwisubirira mw'ihoteli amaze kwumva akanye cane, ariko abandi babandanije canke bari bamaze gushika ahameze nabi cane. Bivugwa ko abanonotsi benshi bazimiye kubera ko bitakunda ko babona aho baca. Abashinzwe gutabara1.200 ni bo barungitswe, bafashijwe n'indege zitagira umudereva nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru ba reta. Ibikorwa vyarabandanije mw'ijoro gushika ku w'Imana mu gitondo, aho imbeho yongerekanye bituma ibikorwa vyo gutabara bigorana gusumba, nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru ry'Ubushinwa, Xinhua. Urwo rupfu rwatumye haba ishavu ryinshi ku mbuga hwaniro zo mu Bushinwa, aho batunga agatoka cane cane abarongoye akarere ka Baiyin, bakaba banashavujwe no kuba hatabaye imyiteguro ikwiye. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru kuri uyu w'Imana, umukuru w'igisagara ca Baiyin, Zhang Xuchen yavuze: Nk'abatunganije ibi birori, ni twebwe twobazwa ivyabaye kandi turababaye. Turahojeje imiryango yabuze ababo n'abakomeretse."

headline: Khadar Ahmed: Ingene uwabuze aho yiga gukora film ubu ariko aratahukana udushimwe no gukundwa na benshi
text: Film 'The Gravedigger's Wife' (umugore w'umwimvyi w'imva), yatahanye agashimwe, wogira ngo yatunganijwe n'umuntu abifisemwo uburambe, ariko niyo film ya mbere ya Khadar Ahmed. Ingene igenda, umwanya imara n'ubwiza bwayo vyerekana ukwiyemera gufiswe n'uwo mugabo w'imyaka 40 atagira uburambe muri uwo mwuga. Yahunze n'umuryango wiwe  intambara yo muri Somalia amaherezo baruhukira muri Finlande afise imyaka 16 - kandi ntiyigeze ahonyoza ikirenge mw'ishure ryo kwiga gukora no gutunganya film (cinema). Yabwiye BBC ati: "Imana yonyene niyo izi kangahe nasavye ishure ryo kwiga film ariko nkaba ntigeze ndarironka." Ariko guteza imbere film ziri mu rurimi rw'igi-Somali yabigize ihangiro - kugira yerekane akaranga n'amamuko vyiwe abicishije muri film. Ku bwa Ahmed, kubona yatahanye agashimwe ka mbere mw'ihiganwa rya Afrika ry'ama film Fespaco mu kwezi guheze, vyerekana ko inkuru mu rurimi rwiwe zishobora  gukundwa n'ahandi. Bitandukanye na Bollywood The Gravedigger's Wife ni inkuru y'urukundo irimwo hamwe hamwe hababaje ariko mu buryo butwenza y'aho umuntu ashobora gushika kugira arokore ubuzima bw'uwo akunda. Uwo mwimvyi w'imva - Guled, akinwa na Omar Abdi - yicaye imbere y'ibitaro ari kumwe na bagenziwe,  afise igipawa, arindiriye ko hagira umurwayi apfa. Aho bibabarije, n'uko kugira  Nasra,  umugore wiwe arwaye, abandanye kubaho,  Ahmed ategerezwa kuronka  amafaranga, ayo nayo akaboneka ari uko hagize abapfa. Uwo mugore akinwa na Yasmin Warsame, ari ku mpfiro kubera amafyigo yiwe atagikora. Kubera amafaranga menshi akenewe kugira   abaganga bamwiteho abandanye kubaho, bisaba Guled gufata ingingo zikomeye cane. Iyo nkuru ata  bintu vyinshi vyo kuyiryohora birimwo, yakorewe amasanamu arimwo ibice vyinshi ata  majambo wumva n'ibirere vyagutse cane, ntaho ihuriye n'inkuru Ahmed yakuriyemwo. Yibutsa film za Bollywood ziba zirimwo umuziki, ugutamba n'ukurangira mu kanyamuneza.   Ahmed avuga ati: "Ntaco nari nzi kuri izo film, nta film nari mfise kugira ndabireko mu gukora iyi. "Gutyo rero nayikoze uko jewe nyene binjemwo n'uko ndabibona". Mu vy'ukuri, ntaho yibuka yoba yarabonye film y'igi-Somali ikozwe hakurikijwe ubuhinga nyabwo bw'umwuga. Nyina wiwe yagumye  akorora amasozi  mu mwanya wose bamaze bariko bararaba The Gravedigger's Wife ubwa  mbere mw'ihiganwa rya sinema rya Cannes mu kwezi kw'indwi.  Ahmed avuga ati nyina "yararengewe. Hari benshi batigeze baronka urweze n'amahirwe yo kwibona muri film. N'ivyo nashaka gushikako." 'Kwumva wishimye' The Gravedigger's Wife ibera, kandi amasanamu yayo yafatiwe ku rubuga, muri Djibouti, bihana urubibe na Somalia, ariko ntirerekanwa muri ivyo bihugu. Avatar yongeye kuba film yinjiza cyane ku isi Abantu benshi b'aba-Somali, n'abandi bafise amamuko yo muri Somalia, barabonye iyo film mu kwezi kw'icenda mw'ihiganwa mpuzamakungu ry'ama film i Toronto muri Canada. Ahmed avuga ko "bose bumvise bishimye. Vyari biryoshe kubaraba ingene baryohewe no kuyiraba hanyuma bagaca banzako". Uwo atunganya ama fiml avuga ko inzira yaciyemwo mu gukora iyo film ishobora gutanga icitegererezo. Ntiyigeze aja mw'ishure ryigisha ivya film, nta n'aho yigeze aronka uwumwigisha ivyo gutunganya ama film, nta na film y'uwundi muntu yari bwigere akorako. Yatanguye urugendo rwiwe rwo gutunganya iyo film mu myaka 10 iheze igihe yandika integuro yayo. Yari afise ishaka ryo kuba ariwe ubwiwe yoyitunganiriza mu gi-Somali ku buryo yabanje kubika  iyo nteguro  kugira yige ingene bikorwa mu kurabira ku ma film yakunda. Amaze kuraba Bollywood, yaciye azunguruka amazu y'ama cinema kw'isi, harimwo muri Korea y'Epfo na Iran. Ariko izamutereye ivyiyumviro cane ni fim zakorewe muri Afrika. Arakunda cane cane igikorwa c'umunya-Mauritania Abderrahmane Sissako, yari umukuru w'umugwi w'abatanga udushimwe twa Fespaco uyu mwaka. Umunya-Chad  Mahamat-Saleh Haroun nawe ari mu bo Ahmed yafatiyeko, akaba yibuka ingene yatangariye ubwiza bwa film yiwe yo mu 2010, A Screaming Man. Amaze  kwiga izo film akagerageza kwuva ubuhinga bw'ingene zikorwa, yaciye atunganya film zibiri ngufi mu  hanyuma yandika mu ki-Finlande imbere y'uko akora  The Gravedigger's Wife. Ubu rero aribaza niba iyo aba yaragiye kw'ishure ryo kwiga ingene film zikorwa  hari ico kuba  vyahinduye mu nzira mbi canke nziza. "Nshaka gutera intege abanya-Afrika bakiri bato bakora film, abadasanganywe amahirwe menshi, gufata camera hanyuma bakore film zabo, bandike inkuru zabo, bafate amasanamu yabo kandi bavyikorere bo nyene, kuko si bose baronka basanganywe ubushobozi bwinshi." We nyene avuga ko afise ishaka ryo kubandanya akora ama film muri Afrika: "Namuka muri Afrika kandi nemera ko kazoza k'ama film ari muri Afrika. Hari inkuru nyinshi zidashobora gukinirwa mu bihugu vya Buraya."

headline: Caster Semenya yise abarongozi ba 'athletisme' muri Africa ba 'niryo' ku ngingo ya sentare ya siporo.
text: Uwigeze gutwara umudari wa olempike incuro zibiri n'uwo ihiganwa ry'isi yose incuro zitatu, Caster Semenya, yise abategetsi ba Afrika muvyo kwinonora imitsi, ba "niryo" kuba barananiwe guhagarara bakagwanira abanonotsi b'abapfasoni bahanganye n'ikibazo co gukurwa mu mahiganwa. Uwo munonotsi w'imyaka 31  yarakuwe ku rutonde rw'abahiganwa ku metero akunda gusiganwako 800 hisunzwe amategeko  agenga inkabuzo ya "testostérone" umuntu aba afise mu mubiri, y'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryo kwinonora imitsi mu 2019. Abanonotsi bafise inkabuzo nyinshi za "testostérone" basabwa gukoresha umuti mu kuzigabanya kugira bashobore guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya 400 na 1500. Semenya yagize ati: "Nibaza ko, kuri uyu musi, dufise abategetsi ba 'niryo'". "Kuri uyu mugabane, abantu baranumye. Sintahura igituma batavuga. Ntibagwanira abanonotsi babo. "Mutegerezwa guseruka mugakora, mukagwanira abanonotsi banyu, gutyo abanonotsi ba Afrika bazoba beza cane. Ubu uko bimeze birababaje." Igihe BBC Sport Africa yabaza Maboum Kalkaba, prezida w'urunani rw'amashirahamwe yo kwinonora imitsi muri Afrika (CAA), ivyerekeye ivyo Semanya avuga, n'uko abategetsi barongoye ishirahamwe ryo kwinonora imitsi muri Afrika bakoreye ibikwiye abo barongoye, yishuye ati: "Nimundeke, nta nyishu mfise". Abanonotsi benshi bo muri Afrika barakozweko n'iyo ngingo, harimwo umunonotsi w'umurundikazi yatahukanye umudari w'ifeza mu nkino za olempike, Francine Niyonsaba, hamwe na mugenzi we wo muri Kenya bahiganwa ku metero 800. Mu mwaka uheze, abayabaga babiri bo muri Namibia, Christine Mboma na Beatrice Masilingi, barahatiwe kuva mw'ihiganwa rya metero 400, imbere y'imisi mike ngo habe inkino za olempike za Tokyo inyuma yo kumenyeshwa ko bafise urugero runini rw'inkabuzo za testostérone. Bompi Mboma na Masilingi batinze bahiganwa mu metero 200 mu Buyapani, aho Mboma yatahukanye umudari w'ifeza wa mbere wa olempike w'ico gihugu. Ariko Semenya, ubu ahiganwa ku metero 5000, yaranebaguye ingene abategetsi b'ishirahamwe rya Afrika riraba abanonotsi bitwaye kuri ico kibazo c'abo bayabaga co kimwe n'"agacerere" ku ngingo yafashwe yo kubabuza guhiganwa muri rusangi. Uwo munye Afrika y'epfo yagize ati: "Igihe nari mfise imyaka 18, sinashobora kuvuga. Ubu ndakuze bikwiye, ndashobora kuvuga. "Nimwiyumvire ivyaciye mu mitwe y'iyo miyabaga. Nta co bashobora gukora, ariko abategetsi bariyicariye gusa binezerererwa gusa n'uturusho bafise, mu bibanza biberamwo amanama. Umuyobozi mukuru wa CAA, Lamine Faty yavuze ko Semenya "afise uburenganzira bwo gushikiriza ivyo yiyumvira" kandi ko ibibazo ku ngingo zatumye bakurwa mw'ihiganwa vyashikirijwe n'iryo shirahamwe "kera cane" kandi ko vyaganiriweko mu misi ya vuba mu kanama ka CAA  mu nama yabereye muri Ile Maurice. Impari kw'itorwa ry'abagore bagira uruhara muri siporo zabaye nyinhsi, na cane cane zikaba zashimikiye ku banonotsi bameze nk'abagabo kandi ari abakobwa. Mu ndwi iheze, prezida w'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryo kwinonora imitsi, Seb Coe, yavuze ko iryo shirahamwe rishobora gukurikizako igisata co kwoga, mu kubuza abagore biyumva nk'abagabo kuja mw'ihiganwa, avuga ashimitse ko "kutarenganya bidashobora guharirwako". Yabwiye BBC Sport ati: "Tubandanya twiga, tugira ubushakashatsi ku bwinshi bw'inkabuzo ya testostérone ko ari kimwe mu bituma umuntu akomera gusumba , tukaba twarategekanije ibiganiro ku mategeko yacu mu kanama kacu mu mpera y'umwaka." Semenya, yatwaye umudari w'inzahabu ku metero 800 mu myaka ya 2012 na 2016 mu nkino za olempike, yari yunguruje ku ngingo zafashwe n'ishirahamwe ry'abanonotsi kw'isi, ariko aratsindwa muri sentare ica imanza z'inkino mu 2019. Yaratsinzwe kandi muri sentare y'iyungururizo no muri sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise mu mwaka wakurikiye, imbere yo kwitura sentare ya Buraya ijejwe agateka ka zina muntu aho urwo rubanza rutarumvirizwa. Yagize ati: "Ntituzigera duhagarika uru rugamba." "Ubu ibi ntibiraba jewe gusa, biraba abana bakiri bato ubu bariko baravuka bazohangana n'iki kibazo. "Hari abana benshi bipfuza guhiganwa ku metero 400, 800 na 1500, ariko ntibashobora kubemerera. Bavuga ko siporo ari iya bose, ariko ubu si iya bose."

headline: Ukraine: Kyiv irarahira ko itarota ihebera ubutaka Russia kugira habe amahoro
text: Reta ya Ukraine ivuga ko itazokwemera amasezerano y'amahoro n'Uburusiya arimwo ivyo kubuhebera ubutaka. Iyi ngingo isa n'ukwihagararako kwa Ukraine ije inyuma y'umusi umwe Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky avuze ko inzira yonyene yo guhagarika iyi ntambara ari ibiganiro. Umuhanuzi w'umukuru w'iki gihugu Mykhaylo Podolyak avuga ko mu gihe Ukraine yogira ivyo iheba vyotuma Uburusiya bukora igitero gikomeye kandi cosesa amaraso menshi. Avuze aya majambo mu gihe Uburusiya bubandanya bugerageza kugota ingabo za Ukraine ziriko zirarwanira Severodonetsk mu buseruko. Mu yandi makuru, umukuru w'igihugu ca Pologne Andrzej Duda yabaye umutegetsi wa mbere mvamakungu ashikirije ijambo inama nshingamateka ya Ukraine amaso mu yandi. Yakomewe amashi menshi igihe yavuga ko abanya Ukraine bonyene ari bo bazokwihitiramwo kazoza kabo. Yongerako y'uko Pologne izokora ivyo ishoboye vyose mu gufasha Ukraine kwinjira mw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya. Hagati aho, umushikiranganji w'Ubufaransa ajejwe ibibazo vya Bulaya, Clément Beaune, yavuze ko bishobora gufata nk'imyaka "15 cane 20" kugira ngo Ukraine yemererwe nk'umunywanyi w'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya. Mu gihe intambara zibandanya, ibiro bikuru vy'igisirikare ca Ukraine bivuga ko ingabo z'Uburusiya ziriko ziragerageza kumera uruhome rw'ingabo za Ukraine kugira ngo zishike ku mbibe z'intara ya Luhansk mu buseruko. Buramatari wa Luhansk, Serhiy Haidai, avuga ko Uburusiya bwagerageje kumenera muri Severodonetsk buciye mu mpande zine zitandukanye. Mu butumwa yacishije kuri Telegram, yavuze ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zagerageje bikazita ku w'amazi, ariko ko zibandanya zicucagira ibibombe mu turere turimwo imihana y'abantu. Yongerako y'uko ikiraro gifatanya iki gisagara n'ikindi cegeranye naco ca Lysychansk  cabomowe. BBC ntiyashoboye guhinyuza ivyo avuga. Hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyo mu Burengero bisaba ko hoba amasezerano yo guhagarika intambara yotuma ingabo z'Uburusiya ziguma mu turere tumwe tumwe zimaze kwigarurira mu bumanuko no mu buseruko bwa Ukraine kuva Moscou iteye iki gihugu ku wa 24 Ruhuhuma (2). Ku wa kane w'indwi iheze, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubutaliyano, Mario Draghi yabwiye inama nkenguzamateka y'igihugu ko "hategerezwa kuba amasezerano yo guhagarika intambara vuba bishoboka". Ariko wa muvugizi wa Perezida Zelensky, Mykhaylo Podolyak, avuga ko iyo ngendo yogira ingaruka mbi. Ati: "Intambara ntizohagarara. Kazoba agahengwe k'umwanya muto. Bazoca batanguza ikindi gitero, mbere kizosesa amaraso menshi kandi gikomeye". Umunyamakuru wa BBC i Kyiv Joe Inwood avuga ko muri kino gihe Uburusiya na Ukraine bitarahuriza hagati ku vyo kimwe kimwe cose gishobora kwemera. Avuga ko mu gihe buri ruhande rukibona ko rugifise amahirwe yo kubandanya intambara, ibiganiro bisa n'ibidashoboka.

headline: Ashley ati: ‘Nari nzi ko SIDA ari indwara ifata abakiri bato’
text: Igihe Ashley, umugore w'imyaka 59, yinjizwa ibitaro afise ingorane y'urura, yaba we canke abaganga nta n'umwe yibaza ko wari umugera wa SIDA. Mu vyo yibuka, avuga ati: "Bambwiye ko ata ngorane n'imwe mfise, ariko ko nari mfise umugera - gusa sinamenye ko nari mfise umugera ukomeye ushobora kubaho". Haciye imyaka itatu Ashley apimwe bagasanga yaranduye umugera wa SIDA,  inyuma y'aho akoreye imibonano mpuzabitsina atikingiye. Ariko kubona bawutoye baratevye bivuga ko uwo mugera wari wamaze gutangura kwonona ubushobozi bw'umubiri bwo gushibira kwikingira indwara. Ivyashikiye Ashley si ibintu bidasanzwe kuko abantu batandatu kuri cumi bafise imyaka irenga 50 banduye umugera wa SIDA ni abagiye kumenya ko banduye batevye mu 2018, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza, PHE. Abahinga muvyo amagara y'abantu hamwe n'amashirahamwe y'abagiraneza bavuga ko kubera batitabwaho, kandi bagafatwa ko atamibonano mpuzabitsina bakora, bituma batamenya ko banduye. Ashley ati: "Abantu barengeje imyaka 50, canke abahukanye, bobo bibaza ko badashobora kwandura". "Kubera bazi ko badashobora kwibungenga, bavuga bati 'nta ngorane' canke bati 'izi ni indwara z'abakiri bato'. Ariko sivyo, uwo ari we wese arashobora kuyandura". Ibiharuro bitangwa n'ikigo PHE vyerekana ko igitigiri c'abanduye indwara zifatira mu bihimba vy'irondoka kuva ku myaka 45 kuduga vyiyongereye gushika hafi ku bice 35% mu myaka itanu iheze. Icigwa casohowe mu kinyamakuru c'amagara yabantu The Lancet mu 2017, cerekana ko umuntu umwe kuri batandatu bagendana umugera wa SIDA i Bulaya ari kuva ku myaka 50 kuduga, kandi ko ibitigiri vy'abawandura vyaduze mu bihugu 16 vy'i Bulaya mu myaka cumi iheze. Norah O'Brien, umuhinga mu bijanye n'irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza mu kigo PHE, avuga ko abafise imyaka yitereye na bo nyene ubwabo bibaza ko badashobora kwandura. Nivyo vyari mu mutwe wa Karen Norton w'imyaka 63, yanduye umugera mu myaka mike iheze muri Afrika. Ati: "Abenshi twibaza ko ivyo kwandura bidashobora kudushikira". "N'abaganga basa n'abibaza ko umuntu arenza imyaka 50 adashobora kwandura uwu mugera". "Twese dusa n'uko twiyumvira gutyo ku bantu barenza imyaka 50. Ntushobora kwibaza ko nyoko wawe canke so wawe ashobora kuwandura - ariko ni ikintu gishoboka cane". Vyafashe igihe kirekire kugira ngo Karen yimenyekanishe ko yanduye, kuko yatinya ko bohava bamucira urubanza. Ati: "Wumva umengo wikoreye umucafu utegerezwa kunyegeza". "Mu gihe ukoze imibonano mpuzabitsina utikingiye, ushobora kwandura. Akarorero ni jewe". Mu kwezi guheze, ibiharuro vyerekanye ko igitigiri c'abanduye umugera wa SIDA mu Bwongereza cagabanutse bimwe biboneka kuva mu 2012 - cane cane mu bantu bahuza ibitsina babisangiye. Ishirahamwe ry'abagiraneza ryo mu Bwongereza, Terrence Higgins Trust, rivuga ko igikenewe ubu ari uko igice c'abantu batitaweho, nk'abo barengeje imyaka 50, bokwitabwaho gusumba. Aled Osborne nawe wo mw'ishirahanwe Brigstowe ryo mu Bwongereza nyene avuga ko abantu bafise imyaka yitereye bagifise mu mutwe ivyavugwa ku mugera wa SIDA mu myaka ya 1980 na 90, akabona ko bashobora kuba batashoboye kuronswa amakuru nyayo kuva ico gihe. Ati: "Kugendana umugera wa SIDA si igihano c'urupfu nk'uko vyari bimeze mu myaka ya 80 na 90. Ubu imiti ikora neza iriho". "Abantu bagendana umugera wa SIDA ariko basanzwe bafata iyo miti ntibashobora kwanduza uwo mugera". Imyaka yo kubaho ku bantu bagendana umugera wa SIDA ariko basanzwe bafata iyo miti nico kimwe n'iy'abandi bose muri rusangi. Hagati aho, ugereranije n'abatanguye kuyifata bakimenya ko banduye uwo mugera, amahirwe si menshi ku bacerewe kuyifata. Ashley vyaramugoye kuko yagiye kumenya ko yanduye yatevye. Ati: "Jewe nta ngorane vyantera kugendana umugera wa SIDA. Nta ngorane bintera n'ukuri. Gusa kubona batashotse bawutora, vyatumye nteba kubimenya". " Vyafashe igihe kirekire…kandi umubiri wanje warononekaye - numva bimbabaje".

headline: Intambara ya Tigray muri Ethiopia: Ubuzima muri Mekelle, igisagara cugaranywe
text: Agahengwe katangajwe  na Ethiopia mu ndwi iheze kugira ngo imfashanyo zishobore kwinjira mu ntara ya Tigray iri mu buraruko bw'igihugu katanze icizere ko iyi ntambara imaze amezi 17 kumbure ishobora kuba iriko ija ku musozo. Iyi ntara imaze amezi atari make yugaranywe, ivyatumye amamiriyoni y'abantu batagira c'epfo n'ica ruguru, ata mfungurwa n'ibindi nkenerwa bashoroa kuronka. Umunyagihugu wa Mekelle, umugwa mukuru wa Tigray ugenzurwa n'inyeshamba za Tigray, yashoboye kuvugana na BBC ayibwira ingene ubuzima bumeze. Ikituraje ishinga ni ingene tworonka kuronka ikitubeshaho mu buzima bwa misi yose. Nka se w'abana babiri bakiri bato, numva intege zacitse kuko ntashobora gusumira umuryango. Ibi ahanini ni uko ntashobora gukoresha amafaranga mfise kubera amabanki yose arugaye. Abenshi muri twebwe duhanzwe n'iyi ngorane kandi nta mafaranga dufise mu minwe. Kuva mu kwa gatandatu kw'umwaka uheze, sinshobora gushikira konte yanje muri banki, ico nkora ni ukwikora ku ncuti n'abagenzi ndabagurana kugira ngo ndabe ko noshobora gusumira umuryango. Incuti ziri mu mahanga nabo nyene barashatse kumfasha ariko kubera amaterefone na internet vyugawe, nta kintu na kimwe gishoboka. Hejuru y'ibi, ibiciro vy'imfungurwa vyaraduze bimwe biteye ubwoba. Intete nyamukuru, teff, co kimwe n'ifu y'ingano, ipiripiri n'amavuta ni ibintu bisigaye bigoye kuronka. Haraciye umwaka ibiro 100 (100kg) vya teff bigurwa amadorari y'abanyamerika 80, ariko ubu kugira uyironke utegerezwa gutanga $146. Ababishoboye, bagura teff nkeya bakayivanga n'amasaka hamwe n'ingano bizimbutse kugira ngo bashobore gukora injera (icapati), iyi ikaba iri mu bigize imfungurwa nyamukuru za buri musi. Ariko hari benshi badashobora kwigurira teff. Twasabwe kurima imboga ku muhana kandi nivyo turiko turakora. Ingorane gusa ni uko tubura amazi. Hari igihe twahora turonka ingunguru y'amazi twakoresha indwi yose, ariko ubu nta buryo dusfise bwo gushobora kuyigura, duca twikora ku mazi yo mu binogo. Ubu abana kwambara uturato canke uduhuzu dushasha, canke kuronka akanyama, ni ivy'abifise. Kuronka amazi meza n'amatara bisigaye ari ingorane, umusi wose vyama biriko biracikagurika - harashobora guca n'imisi tutaronse na mba. Abantu benshi nta buzi bagifise, amaduka n'ibigo vy'ubudandaji i Mekelle vyarugaye kubera bidashoboye kuriha amazu canke bikabura ibidandazwa vyo kugurisha. Inkurikizi y'ibi ni uko abantu batanguye kugurisha ivyo batunze nk'amamodoka, intebe, imeza n'ibindi, kugira ngo bashobore kuronka ico bafungura. Kandi rero biba ngombwa ko babigurisha ku mafaranga make cane. Umuringa w'inzahabu wahora ugurwa amadorari y'abanyamerika 64 ubu ushobora kugurishwa musi y'amadorari 12. Imodoka yahora igurishwa amadorari 16.000. ubu ishobora kugurishwa ku madorari 7000. Iyo abantu baherewe n'ivyo bashobora kugurisha baca batangura gusegerereza, ari co gituma ubu abasegerereza ku mabarabara barwiriye cane - abenshi muri bo bakaba ari abagore n'abana babo. Ibigo vy'ubuvuzi navyo nyene vyaherewe n'imiti. Abarwanye indwara zidakira bariko barapfa kubera ata miti ihari. Abantu bagendana umugera wa SIDA  ni ingorane kuko batakironka neza vya binini vyo gupfupfahaza. Imisi mikuru nk'iy'idini n'iy'ubugeni yigeze kuba ishingiro ry'ubumwe mu miryango ubu isigaye ari umugani. Ubu kubera umwana wanje yasubiye kw'ishure, ndatambuka n'amaguru akuma. Nkora urugendo rw'ibirometero bibiri n'amaguru kugira ndamushikane kw'ishure. Umugore wanje nawe akaja kumutora n'amaguru nyene mu mwanya wo gufungura. Nahora ngenda n'imodoka, ariko ubu imaze amezi 18 arenga ibitswe kuko ntagishoboye kugura igitoro. Igitoro urashobora kukironka, ariko kuri magendo. Iritiro imwe ubu igurwa amadorari 10 mu gihe, imbere y'intambara, twahora tukigura amadorari 0,42 ku ma station. Gufata itagisi canke bajaj navyo nyene bisigaye ari umugani, kuko, ari ukugenda gusa, usanga utegerezwa kuriha amadorari abiri. Ubu abantu mu kwiyunguruza basigaye bakoresha za nkorofani zikwegwa n'indogobwe. Abantu benshi batanguye gukoresha amakinga, ariko nayo nyene yarazimye cane. Abanyagihugu hano barashaka ko intambara irangira mu mahoro, bakaba baranezerewe cane igihe baronka amakuru mu ndwi iheze y'uko agahengwe kagarutse. Ntibari bizeye ko ivyo bumvise vyari vyo gushika aho baboneye imodoka za mbere zizanye imfashanyo zinjiye ku wa gatanu, inyuma y'amezi atari make, ibi bikaba vyaberetse ko ibintu bishobora guhinduka. Ndishimye ko nkiri muzima ngashobora gutanga amakuru yanje, ariko hari benshi cane bagowe kunsumvya, mbere bamwe bashobora kuba bari ku mpfiro. Ariko kumbure iciza coco ntikibuze muri ibi vyose: abantu babandanya bafashanya. "Abarya bonyene, bazopfa bonyene", uwu ni umugani wo mu rurimi rwacu rw'igi Tiryinya kandi abantu barawukurikiza. Barasangira n'abandi utwo bafise n'aho vyoba bisigura ko ejo bazotubika umukanda. Abantu barafatanye mu nda cane kugira babandanye babaho bari kumwe.

headline: Covid-19: Ubufaransa, Ubudage n'Ubutaliyano vyahagarise urukingo rwa AstraZeneca
text: Ubugage, Ubufaransa n'Ubutaliyano vyahagaritse itangwa ry'urukingo rwa Oxford-AstraZeneca, nyuma y'ivyagiye birashika i Buraya vyerekeye kuvurirana kw'amaraso (coagulation du sang). Ivyo bihugu vyiyongeye ku bindi vyinshi bito vyo ku mugabane wa Buraya navyo vyahagaritse urwo rukingo mu buryo bwo kwiyubara mu gihe hakorwa isuzuma. Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS, ryavuze yuko ata cemeza y'uko ivyo vyashitse biterwa n'urwo rukingo. OMS yavuze yuko iriko irihweza amakuru yavuzwe ajanye n'urukingo, ngo ariko ni ivya nkenerwa cane yuko gutanga urukingo bibandanya. OMS yongenyeko yuko ari vyiza gutohoza ingorane izo ari zo zose zishobora gushika. Abahinga ku buziranenge ba OMS bazohura ejo kuwa kabiri baganire kuri urwo rukingo. Ishirahamwe rya Buraya ry'ubuvuzi bw'imiti, EMA, rizohura kuri uwo munsi nyene rikaba rizogira ico rishikirije kuwa Kane. Ryavuze kandi yuko urwo rukingo rukwiye kubandanya kuroreshwa. Ariko, abahinga bavuga yuko igitigiri c'ukuvurirana kw'amaraso cashikirijwe nyuma y'urukingo, ataho gitaniye n'igihora kiboneka mu bantu muri rusangi. Abantu bashika imiriyoni 17 mu karere k'ishirahamwe rya Buraya hamwe no mu Bwongereza baramaze guhabwa urwo rukingo, ariko abari munsi ya 40 gusa nibo vyavuzwe ko bagize ikibazo c'ukuvurirana kw'amaraso, nk'uko vyavuzwe na AstraZeneca. Hariko harafatwa izihe ngingo? Ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara mu Budage kuri uno wambere bwatangaje ko buhagaritse gutanga urukingo rwa Oxford-Astrazeneca ubu nyene, ku mpanuro z'ikigo Paul Ehrlich Institute (PEI), kijejwe ivy'inkingo mu gihugu. Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara Jens Spahn yagize ati: "Icabanjirije iyi ngingo ni amakuru y'ingorane zashitse ku mutsi ujana mu bwonko zitewe n'urukingo rwa AstraZeneca. "Hafatiwe kuri ayo makuru mashasa, ikigo Paul Ehrlich Institute uno munsi casubiye kuvyihweza gica gitanga impanuro yo guhagarika uru rukingo, hagakorwa uwundi mwihwezo." Yavuze ko iyo ngingo ata "mvo za politike" ziyiri inyuma. Yongeyeko ati "twese turazi neza ingaruka z'ingingo nk'iyi, kandi ntitwayifashe ku buryo bworoshe". Haciye umwanya mutoyi, umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubufaransa Emmanuel Macron, yavuze ko Ubufaransa buhagaritse uru rukingo gushika EMA itanze ayandi makuru. Yagize ati: "Dufise intambwe dukurikiza zisanzwe, dukurikiza ivyo twerekwa n'ubumenyi hamwe n'abakozi bo mu gisata c'amagara bashoboye akazi cane, kandi tukabikorera hamwe nk'umugambi wa Buraya." Ikigo c'Ubutariyano kigenzura imiti naco congeye ikiringo co kubuza kwinjiza urwo rukingo mu gihugu, naho nyene harindiriwe ingingo ya EMA. Guhagarika ikoreshwa ry'uru rukingo bibaye nyuma y'ikiringo kiri munsi y'umunsi umwe Ubuholandi bugize uko nyene. Ingingo y'iki gihugu izoshika ku tariki 29 z'ukwa gatatu.

headline: Ukraine-Russia: umuhanuzi wa Zelensky avuga ko intambara imaze kwica abashika 13.000
text: N﻿a Elsa Maishman na Jaroslav Lukiv B﻿BC News Abasirikare ba Ukraine bashika 13.000 nibo bamaze gupfa kuva igitero c’Uburusiya gitanguye, nk’uko bivugwa n’umutegetsi wo hejuru. Mykhailo Podolyak, umuhanuzi wa Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine, avuga ko ingabo ziri hagati ya 10.000 na 13.000 zimaze gupfa. Ni ibintu bidakunze gushika aho Ukraine itanga ibitigiri vy’abamaze gupfa, kandi n’ibivugwa na Podolyak ntibiremezwa n’igisirikare c’igihugu. Mu kwa gatandatu yavuze ko abasirikare ba Ukraine bari hagati ya 100 na 200 bapfa buri musi. Mu kwezi guheze, intwazangabo nkuru yo mu gisirikare ca Amerika, Mark Milley,  yatangaje ko abasirikare bababa 100.000 b’Uburusiya hamwe na 100.000 ba Ukraine bari bamaze gupfa canke gukomereka kuva intambara itanguye. Mu butumwa yacishije muri videwo ku wa gatatu, umukuru w’Inama y’Ubumwe bwa Bulaya Ursula Von der Leyen yavuze ko abasirikare 100.000 bamaze kwicwa. Hagati aho, umuvugizi w’Inama y’Ubumwe bwa Bulaya yaratanze umuco avuga ko iryo ryari ikosa, ko ibi bitigiri vyari ivyo abamaze gupfa no gukomereka. Umupfasoni von der Leyen kandi yavuze ko abasivire ba Ukraine 20.000 bari bamaze kwicwa. N’aho ico gitigiri kitavugurujwe n’Inama y’Ubumwe bwa Bulaya, carakuwe mu bundi butumwa bwa videwo bwakurikiye, kumwe n’ikindi cavuga ko ingabo 100.000 zimaze kwicwa. Avugana n’imboneshakure yo muri  Ukraine, Channel 24, Podolyak yavuze ko Kyiv "ivugira ku mugaragaro ivyerekeye igitigiri c’abamaze kwicwa”. Ati: "Dufise  ibiharuro bitangwa n’ibiro bikuru vya gisirikare, ibiharuro bitangwa n’umugaba mukuru w’ingabo [Perezida Zelensky], kandi biva kuri 10.000 gushika ku 12.500-13.000 vy’abishwe". Yongerako y’uko igitigiri c’abasivire bamaze kwicwa gishobora kuba ari “kinini”. Gushika hagati mu kwa gatandatu, BBC yari imaze kumenya ko abasivire 3600 bari bamaze gupfa. Iki gitigiri gishobora kuba kimaze kuduga cane. Podolyak avuga kandi ko abasirikare b’Uburusiya bashika 100.000 bamaze kwicwa kuva igitero gitanguye ku wa 24 Ruhuhuma (2), abandi nabo bari hagati ya 100.000 na 150.000 bakomeretse, canke bakaburwa irengero canke bakaba badashobora gusubira ku rugamba. Igisata ca BBC gikoresha ururimi rw’ikirusiya kivuga ko abasirikare b’Uburusiya nibura 9311 ku nzego zose bamaze kwicwa kuva igitero gitanguye ku wa 24 z’ukwa kabiri, mu gihe igiharuro nyezina c’abamaze kwicwa gishobora kuba kirenga 18.600.

headline: Kenya igiye kuronka miriyoni zafatiwe muri Jersey zifashe kugwanya Covid
text: Miriyoni z'ama dorari z'amafaranga y'igihugu bivugwa ko zibwe n'abanya-Kenya babiri ba mbere batunze cane zigiye kugarukanwa mu gihugu zigurwemwo ibikoresho  vyo kurokora ubuzima mu kugwanya  indwara ya Covid-19 hisunzwe  amasezerano y'imbonekarimwe yashitsweko i Londres. Ayo mazezerano na Jersey, izinga ryigenga mu ntwaro mu  kiyaga ca Manche (Ensglish Channel) yakiriwe nk'"intsinzi ku banya-Kenya" n'uwuhagarariye ico gihugu mu Bwongereza, Manoah Esipisu. Urufatangane rwahavuye ruvamwo  ayo masezerano rwatanguriye ku rubanza rwo kwahukana. Mu 2006, Samuel Gichuru, umuntuzi afise kompanyi y'umuyagankuba muri Kenya,  n'umugore wiwe Salome Njeri barahukanye. Hageze kugabura ivyo batunze, Madame Njeri yabonye ko ataronse ibikwiye. Yaciye avuga ko bimwe  mu vyo umugabo wiwe atunze vyanyegejwe hanyuma, sentare, ica ikora urutonde rw'ama konte yose umugore yavuze ko ari  aya Gichuru muri Jersey, izinga risanzwe rizwi gushingwamwo amakompanyi ba nyeneyo batamenyekana kandi rigatangisha amakori ari hasi cane. Ivyo vyatumye haba amatohoza yamaze imyaka icenda akorwa n'abategetsi ba Jersey. Muri ayo matohoza, mu 2011, bagirije Gichuru n'uwahoze ari umushikiranganji ajejwe ikigega ca reta kujana muri kompanyi yari yanditswe muri Jersey amafaranga ya "commissions" bahabwa n'amakompanyi mpuzamakungu. Abategetsi ba Jersey baciye basohora imitahe yo gufatisha abo bagabo bompi,  kuva ico gihe bakaba bakirinridiye ko barungikwa bava aho bari muri Kenya. Ivyaha vy'ubutunzi bagirijwe vyarimwo amasezerano na kompamyi yo muri Finlande yo kwubaka uruganda rw'umuyagankuba hafi ya Mombasa, igisagara kiza ubwa kabiri mu bunini muri Kenya, aho ngo bahawe miriyoni na miriyoni z'amafaranga y'abongereza ya 'commissions'  bayahawe n'amashirahawe yo kwubakisha yo mu Bwongereza, Norvege, Ubudagi na kompanyi y'igihangange mu gutumatumanako yo muri Amerika. N'ubwo BBC yagerageje kenshi kubarondera, abo bagabo bompi n'abashingwamanza babo ntibashimye kugira ico bavuze kuri ivyo bagirizwa. Ariko iyo kompamnyi yanditswe muri Jersey Windward Trading Limited yahavuye yemera ivyaha bine vyo kugira amafaranga y'inkomoko mbi muri sentare yo muri Jersey. Sentare yaciye ishinga ingingo, ko iyo kompanyi, nyeneyo asanzwe ari Gichuru, itegerezwa kwakwa amafaranga arenga miriyoni 4,9 z'ama dorari mu vyo itunze kubera  amafaranga y'inkomoko mbi. Menshi muri ayo mafaranga niyo bivugwa ko yavuye mu biturire muri Kenya hagati ya 1999 na 2002 ubu ariyo agiye kugarukanwa mu gihugu. Ivyo vyashobotse kubera amasezerano yo mu 2018  yashizweko umukono na ministre wa mbere w'Ubwongereza w'ico gihe Theresa May, umukuru wa Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta hamwe na reta za Jersey n'Ubuswise.  Ayo masezerano yavuga ko amatungo yibwe ashobora gusubizwa muri Kenya ariko agakoreshwa  gusa ku bijanye n'imigambi y'iterambere. Ayo masezerano azwi nka Return of Assets from Corruption and Crime to Kenya (Fracck) aha abategetsi ba Jersey uburenganizra bwo kurekura amafaranga bazi ko yibwe hanyuma akarungikwa imbere y'uko abagirizwa kwiba bashikanwa imbere ya sentare. Ikoreshwa neza ry'ayo mafaranga kizoba ari igikorwa ca Crown Agents, ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ridaharanira inyungu ryitaho iterambere. Umukuru waryo Fergus Drake, yabwiye BBC  ko avugana n'abategetsi bajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Kenya kugira bavugane ibikenewe mu kurwanya Covid -19. Drake yiteze gushikiriza ibikoresho vya nkenerwa cane ku bitaro birenga 10 mu mezi ari imbere. Yavuze ko gupima neza bizofasha abanya-Kenya kurwanya ico kiza neza no kumenya ibice bikeneye incanco kurusha ibindi. Gushika ubu  muri Kenya abantu bamaze kuronka incanco ntibarenga 20% mu gihugu cose. Hasigaye amezi make ngo prezida Uhuru ave ku butegetsi, agishika ku butegetsi akaba yari yiyemeje kurwanya ibiturire. Muri iyo ntumbero abategetsi n'abanyaporotike bariko barasabwa kuvuga amatungo  bafise, hagakorwa isuzumwa ry'uko ata biturire yaciyemwo. Drake yavuze ko ayo mafaranga agiye gusohora -miriyoni 3.5 z'ama dorari - atazokora ''ibintu vyinshi cane'' mu gikorwa c'igihugu co kurwanya Covid-19 , ariko yibaza ko bene iyo mfashanyo igenewe ahantu runaka izogira ingaruka zishika kure mu kurwanya uwo mugera. Abaharanira uburenganzira bavuga ko akarorero ka Fracck ari inzira nshasha yo kwerekana ko amafaranga abantu baba baronse mu buryo butari bwiza ashobora gusubizwa. Ubwongereza busanzwe bwaremeje kandi ayandi masezerano -amasezerano ya ONU yo kurwanya ibiturire -gutyo bukaba butegerezwa gusubiza amafaranga yaciye mu vyaha aho ibikenewe biba vyakwiye kugira asubizwe. Ariko ku bwa Steve Goodrich, umukuru w'ubushakashatsi n'amatohoza muri Transparency International (TI) UK, amafaranga asubijwe ava mu Bwongereza akenshi ntaja mu bikorwa vy'iterambere ata handi aciye. Atanga akarorero k'amafaranga yigeze gusubizwa yari ayo inkomoko mbi y'uwahoze ari umukuru w'intara ya Delta muri Nigeria  James Ibori mu 2012 agahabwa reta ya Nigeria. Afise amakenga ko amafaranga asubijwe ashobora guherera mu biturire. Goodrich  avuga ko ivyo vya Jersey ari intambwe mu nzira nziza. Ariko yongerako ko kugirango hajeko "igitururuza cizewe" ku bantu bibaza kuja kunyegeza amafaranga bivye mu Bwongereza, reta "vy'ukuri ikeneye gukaza umukono wayo" ku gusubira ku matungo (aba yibwe). Nk'akarorero, avuga ko Ubwongereza bukwiye gutangura gusuzuma ivyo yibaza ko ari "ibibanza/amazu biciye amafaranga arenga miliyaridi 5 z'ama pound (£ canke pound:amafaranga y'abongereza)  vyaguzwe mu Bwongereza n'amafaranga yo kwinuba. Aha rero hari n'ukuraba neza ikibazo c'ibiturire muri Kenya. Kenya kiza ubugira 128 ku rutonde rwa Transparency International rw'igipimo c'ibiturire kw'isi, abategetsi n'abagwizatunga bakaba  bavugwa cane mu biturire. Hasigaye amezi make ngo prezida Uhuru ave ku butegetsi, agishika ku butegetsi akaba yari yiyemeje kurwanya ibiturire. Muri iyo ntumbero abategetsi n'abanyaporotike bariko barasabwa kuvuga amatungo  bafise, hagakorwa isuzumwa ry'uko ata biturire yaciyemwo. Uwuhagarariye Kenya mu Bwongereza, Esipisu, yigeze kuba umuvugizi w'umukuru w'igihugu, yabwiye BBC ko amasezerano ya Fracck ari "intererano ikomeye cane" ku mugambi w'umukuru w'igihugu kuko atanga ubutumwa ko "abantu bivye amafaranga " batazotekanirwa ngo n'uko gusa banyegeje amafaranga yabo mu mahanga". Yongerako ati "ayo ni amafaranga yibwe abanya-Kenya, yasahuwe abanya-Kenya, kubera ayo masezerano ayo mafaranga agiye kugaruka gufasha abanya-Kenya ari nabo ubwa mbere na mbere yari asanzwe agenewe. Rero iyo ni intsinzi ku banya-Kenya". Ubu amafaranga ari mu nzira ava muri Jersey aja muri Kenya, ubu abantu bazoca bahindukirira kuraba ko abo bagabo bagirizwa barungikwa muri Jersey. Mu kwezi kwa kabiri,  ibikeneye gukorwa kugira barungikwe vyaratanguye gukorwa muri sentare ya Nairobi City  Magistrates Court, inyuma y'imyaka 10 y'impari zo kumenya urwego rwoja imbere mu kubikora. Ubu igisata c'ubushikirizamanza nico kiriko kirabikora kandi icegera c'umuyobozi waco  Victor Mule yavuze ko intahe yitezwe mu kwezi kwa gatanu. Yavuze ko yizeye ko bitazosubira gufata iyindi myaka 10. Igihe BBC yabarondera, abashingwamanza ba Gichuru bahisemwo kutagira ico bavuze ku biriko birakorwa. Umukenguzamateka Ian Gorst, umushikiranganji wa Jersey ajejwe imigenderanire,  aremera ko ubwa mbere hoho hari ibitagenze neza  kugira ayo mafaranga bivugwa ko yibwe abe yarashitse muri iryo zinga. Agabisha abandi bashobora gukora gutyo muri kazoza ko amategeko y'iryo zinga ubu yakajijwe cane ariko kandi ko amafaranga yose yashitseyo aciye mu nzira zitari zo azoronderwa iyo ari kandi ko "tuzoyasubiza ku banyagihugu bo beneyo".

headline: Paul Pogba wa Manchester United bamusanzemwo coronavirus
text: Umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United Paul Pogba yapimwe asanga yanduye wa mugera wa coronavirus, nk'uko bivugwa na Didier Deschamps, umumenyereza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'u Bufaransa asanzwe akinira. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 27 yaciye ashirwa ukwiwe mu kiringo c'iminsi 14. Ntazoshobora gukina mu rukino rw'ihiganwa ry'Ubufaransa ruzobera muri Suwede ku wa gatandatu 05 z'ukwezi kw'icenda, hamwe n'urundi ruzohuza u Bufaransa na Croatia inyuma y'iminsi itatu. Hagati aho, Pogba arashobora gukina urukino rwa mbere rwa Manchester United mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza mu mwaka w'inkino wimirije ruzoyihuza na Crystal Palace ku wa 19 z'ukw'icenda. Umurwi wiwe wasohoye itangazo aho uvuga ko "Bose muri Man U baripfuriza Paul ko yokira ningoga kugira aze atangure ihiganwa riza ameze neza". Mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'u Bufaransa, Pogba azosubirirwa n'uwitwa Eduardo Camavinga, umukinyi w'imyaka 17 asanzwe akina mu murwi Rennes. Deschamps ati: "Namaze guhindura, ku munota wa nyuma, urutonde rw'abakinyi". Avuga ko ejo ariho Pogba yafatwa ibipimo vya coronavirus, inyishu zikaba zagiye kuja ahabona uno munsi, zerekana ko yanduye.

headline: Habonetse umurwayi mushasha wa ebola muri Kongo vyagire bitangazwe ko yaheze
text: Abajejwe intwaro muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo bavuga ko habonetse umurwayi mushasha wa Ebola mu buseruko bw'igihugu. Iyi ni intambwe itewe inyuma mu gihe hari haciye indwi zitari nkeyi ata wundi muntu yanduye uwo mugera, hakaba mbere hari hitezwe ko ku munsi wa mbere hatangazwa ko ico kiza kitakirangwa muri Kongo. Ikiza ca Ebola catanguye mu kwezi kwa munani 2018, kikaba kiza ubwa kabiri mu vyahitanye abantu benshi. Abantu barenga ibihumbi bibiri barahasize ubuzima. Abanyamakuru bavuga ko abajejwe intwaro bafise ikibazo gikomeye mu gisata c'amagara, mu gihe bahanganye ica rimwe na Ebola, coronavirus hamwe n'agasama.

headline: Uganda: Dominic Ongwen wa LRA yahamijwe ivyaha 61 na ICC
text: Sentare mpuzamakungu y'i La Haye mu Buholandi yahamije ivyaha vyo mu ntambara n'ivyaha vyakorewe zina muntu uwahoze ari umukomanda mukuru w'umuhari Lord's Resistance Army, LRA, wo muri Uganda. Abacamanza bavuze ko basanze ahamwa n'ivyaha 61, harimwo ivyo kwica, kwica urubozo, gufata ku nguvu n'ubuja bufatiye ku gitsina. Abaye umunywanyi wa mbere wa LRA aciriwe urubanza na sentare. Ongwen yari akiri umwana igihe yanyuruzwa n'abagwanyi b'uwo muhari hanyuma aza kuba umwe mu bawurongoye. Abacamanza bavuze ko ivyo yakoze atawamuhase kandi ata kinya yagira, akaba rero ashobora gucibwa umunyororo wo guherayo. Umuhari wa LRA, urongowe na Joseph Kony, warateye intambara mu bihugu bitanu vyo mu karere ko mu buseruko no hagati ku mugabane wa Afrika. Dominic Ongwen yafatiwe muri Republique Centre Africaine mu ntango z'ukwezi kwa mbere mu 2015, haciye imyaka cumi ICC imusohoreye umutahe wo kumufata. Umukuru wa LRA, Joseph Kony, we gushika ubu ntarafatwa. Dominic Ongwen yabariye umucamanza ko nawe nyene yanyurujwe na LRA akiri umwana muri Uganda. Mu kwumvirizwa kugufi imbere y'uko urubanza rutangura i La Haye, Ongwen yavuze ko yari afise imyaka cumi n'ine igihe yaba umusirikare. Yagirizwa ivyaha vyo mu ntambara hamwe n'ivyo guhohotera ikiremwa muntu, bijanye n'igitero cagabwe mu nkambi y'impunzi muri Uganda.

headline: Abanduye coronavirus muri Afrika y’Epfo barenze igice c’umuliyoni
text: Abantu barenga igice c'umuliyoni nibo bamaze kumenyekana k banduye wa mugera coronavirus muri Afrika y'Epfo, nk'uko umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu w'ico gihugu abivuga. Zwelini Mkhize amenyesha ko ejo ku wa gatandatu abantu bashasha10.107 ari banduye, igitigiri cashikanye abantu 503.290 bamaze kwandura, nayo 8.153 bakaba bamaze guhitanwa nawo. Afrika y'Epfo nico gihugu ca mbere gisinzikajwe n'uwu mugera muri Afrika yose, igice c'abamaze kwandura ku mugabane wose bakaba ari abo muri ico gihugu. Kw'isi yose kigira gatanu mu bihugu bifise abarwayi benshi b'iyo ndwara inyuma ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Brezili, Uburusiya hamwe n'Ubuhindi. Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi babona ko ibitigiri vy'abahitanywe n'uwu mugera bishobora kuba birengeye kure ibitangazwa. Abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Afrika y'Epfo bagabisha ko ibitigiri vy'abandura bigenda vyiyongera ku murindi uteye ubbwoba, abenshi muri bo bakaba baba ku mugwa mukuru Pretoria. Ica gatatu c'abamaze kwandura bose hamwe bari mu ntara ya Gauteng, intara bukiriro bw'ubutunzi bwa Afrika y'Epfo, ikaba ari nayo ntara yabaye iyinjiriro ry'uwo mugera mu gihugu cose. Hagati aho, hari icizere ko ibiharuro bishobora kutaduga ku rugero runini mu kwezi kuri imbere. Leta ya Afrika y'Epfo yarafashe ingingo ruhasha za guma mu rugo mu kwa kane n'ukwa gatanu, ivyatumye umurindi w'ikwirakwira ugabanuka. Mu kwa gatandatu, yaciye itangura gutezura izo ngingo, ariko mu kwezi guheze hari izasubiye gushirwa mu ngiro, harimwo niyo kubuza kudandaza inzoga, kubera ibitigiri vyasubiye gufata umurindi udasanzwe. Harafashwe kandi n'ingingo zisa n'izo igihugu kiri mu ntambara, zikazobandanya gushika ku wa 15 z'uku kw'umunani. Ubwinshi bw'abandura bwatumye ibitaro vya Afrika y'Epfo birengerwa. Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa w'ico gihugu mu kwezi guheze yatangaje ko ibitaro vyaronkejwe ibitanda 28.000 kugira bishobore kwakira abandura Covid-19, ariko ico gihugu kikaba kigihanganye n'ikibazo c'ikena ry'abaganga n'abaforoma. Mu ndwi iheze, ishami ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, ryaragabishije ko ibiriko biba muri Afrika y'Epfo bishobora kuba biriko vyerekana ibishobora gushika mu bindi bice vy'umugabane wa Afrika.

headline: Burundi: BBC yemerewe gusubira gukorera mu ico gihugu
text: Radiyo BBC yemerewe gusubira gukorera mu Burundi, nk'uko bihejeje gutangazwa n'urwego rw'Uburundi rujejwe gucungera ibimenyeshamakuru, Conseil National de la Communication (CNC). Uwurongoye urwego CNC, Madame Vestine  Nahimana, yabimenyesheje mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru inyuma y'inama y'abagize urwo rwego. BBC yari imaze neza na neza imyaka itatu yafatiwe ingingo yo guhagarikwa mu Burundi. Ingingo yari yafashwe itariki 29 ukwezi kwa gatatu mu 2019. Madame Nahimana yavuze ko mu rwego CNC baronse ikete rya BBC isaba gusubira gukorera mu Burundi  baca basanga "nta kindi gisigaye atari ukuyakira kugira ngo isubire gushira ahabona ibiganiro vyayo". CNC yari yatse BBC uruhusha rwo gukorera mu Burundi iyagiriza kurenga amategeko agenga umwuga  wo kumenyesha amakuru muri ico gihugu  hamwe n'inyafato itajanye n'umwuga. Nta biganiro yari irekuriwe gushikiriza mu Burundi, nta n'umunyamakuru yari yemerewe kuyikorera canke kuyiha inkuru mu buryo ubwaribwo bwose muri ico gihugu kuva ico gihe. BBC yari yatswe uruhusha rwo gukorera mu Burundi yagirizwa  gutosekaza izina rya reta yari irongowe ico gihe na prezida Pierre Nkurunziza. Na cane cane inyanduruko yavuye ku matohoza ku vyavugwa ko ari ibibanza abantu bapfungirwamwo mu kinyegero  kandi bakaborezwamwo igufa mu ntumbero yo gucecekesha abatavuga rumwe na reta, ivyo reta yiyamirije nk'"inkuru z'ibinyoma". Ico gihe BBC yumvirizwa n'abantu bangana na miriyoni 1.3 mu Burundi. Hemerewe ibinyamakuru bishasha vyinshi Ibinyamakuru bitari bike birimwo n'Ijwi rya Amerika (VOA),  Iwacu, radiyo Bonesha FM, Ikiriho n'ibindi vyarafatiwe ibihano mu bihe n'imvo bitandukanye vy'inyuma y'intureka za poritike zo mu 2015. Ivyo bihano vyari vyiyamirijwe n'amashirahamwe haranira uburenganzira bwa zina muntu nka Amnesty International yavuze ko vyari ingingo "zeruye z'abategetsi b'Uburundi mu gucecekesha ibimenyeshamakuru". Kuva presida Evariste Ndaishimiye ashitse ku butegetsi inyuma y'amatora yo mu 2020,  imwe mu ntumbero yashize imbere n'ukunagura imigendeneranire myiza n'ibihugu canke amashirahamwe atarabana ryiza na reta y'Uburundi kuva mu 2015. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n'ishirahamwe rya  Buraya biherutse gufuta ingingo z'ibihano  vyari vyarafatiye Uburundi. Bimwe bimwe nka Iwacu, Ikiriho na Bonesha FM  haheze igihe vyarahawe uruhusha rwo gusubira gukora. Madame Nahimana yavuze ko CNC yumviye akamo k'umukuru w'igihugu yasavye urwo rwego kuvugana n'ibinyamakuru vyari vyarafatiwe ibihano kugirango bisubire guhabwa impusha zo gukora. Muri iyo nama yemereye BBC gusubira gukorera mu Burundi, CNC yemereye kandi ama radiyo n'ama television mashasha: Dosiye y'iyindi radiyo, Radio Voix de Developpement Communautaire de Bubanza yasubijwe inyuma  kugira ije guhinyanyura ivyo  CNC yayisavye. Atangaza ko BBC yemerewe gusubira gukorera mu Burundi, umukuru wa CNC yagize ati:  "Twizeye ko tugiye kubandanya dukorana n'iyo radiyo mu ntumbero yo kubandanya twubahiriza umwuga w'abamenyeshamakuru n'ibimenyeshamakuru."

headline: Coronavirus - Burundi: Leta imenyesha ko hari abandi 20 banduye
text: Ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu n'ukurwanya SIDA mu Burundi bumenyesha ko hari abantu 20 babonywe ko banduye umugera coronavirus. Mw'itangazo bwaraye busohoye, ubwo bushikiranganji bumenyesha ko abo 20 bari mu bantu 98 bapimwe uwo mugera kuva ku wa 01 gushika ku wa 04 z'uku kwa gatandatu. Ibi biharuro bishasha bitangajwe inyuma y'aho ishirahamwe OLUCOME rimenyeshereje amakenga yaryo ku bijanye n'amakuru ashikirizwa na leta y'u Burundi kuri mugera uriko urakora ibara kw'isi yose. Nk'uko vyama, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu ntibutanga umwidondoro w'abo bantu bashasha banduye iyi ndwara ya Covid-19. Iryo tangazo rimenyesha ko mu bari basanzwe bakirwaye iyo ndwara bashika 29, 12 muri bo bapimwe bagasanga barakize, kandi ko baronkejwe uruhusha rwo gusubira mu miryango yabo. Gushika ubu, ibiharuro vyerekana ko abantu 83 aribo bamaze kwandura uwo mugera; muri abo 45 bakaba bamaze gukira, nayo 37 bakaba ari bo bakirwaye, umwe akaba yaritavye Imana. Gushika ubu, nta ngingo zirafatwa na leta y'u Burundi mu ntumbero yo kuzibira ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera nk'uko vyagenze mu bindi bihugu vyo mu karere. Hari bamwe babona ko amakuru atangwa na leta ku vyerekeye iyo ndwara yoba atajanye n'ukuri ku kungene yifashe mu gihugu. Ishirahamwe ryigenga OLUCOME ryiyemeje kurwanya igiturire n'isesagurwa ry'ubutunzi bwa leta, riherutse gusohora itangazo aho rinegura leta ko ititayeho uko bikwiye ikiza ca Covid-19. Olucome yibaza ko amakuru atangazwa ashobora kuba ari kure y'ukuri kw'ivyo Abarundi bibaza, ikanasaba leta y'u Burundi kureka kwizimagiza imbere y'iki kiza kiriko kiriha inkumbi kw'isi. Mu minsi iheze hari amakuru yakwiriye ku mbuga ntangamakuru ko hari bamwe mu bategetsi muri leta y'u Burundi boba baranduye iyi ndwara, ibihakanwa n'umuvugizi wa leta. Ayo makuru akaba yakwiragiye inyuma y'aho umutambukanyi w'umukuru w'igihugu, Denise Nkurunziza agiriye muri Kenya kuvurwa indwara itaramenyekana gushika ubu. Vyaravuzwe cane ko yagiye i Nairobi kwivuza uwu mugera, ariko ayo makuru akaba yarahakanywe n'umwe mu bakozi bo mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu BBC yabajije ariko atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana . Umugera wa coronavirus watanguye kumenyekana mu mpera z'umwaka uheze mu gisagara ca Wuhan mu Bushinwa, ubu ukaba ubarizwa kw'isi yose. Ku wa 31 z'ukwezi kwa gatatu niho leta y'u Burundi yatangaza umuntu wa mbere yanduye uwo mugera.

headline: US: Imigumiko inyuma y'aho umuporisi yiciye umwirabure Daunte Wright hafi ya Minneapolis
text: Igiporisi cakoresheje ivyuka bikoroza amosozi gihagarika uruja n'uruza mw'ijoro kugira gicureshe  imigumuko yadutse inyuma y'aho umuporisi arasiye umwirabure mu gisagara ca Brooklyn Center, hafi ya Minneapolis muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Umuryango w'uyu musore yagandaguwe uvuga ko azwi kw'izina rya Daunte Wright, akaba afise imyaka 20. Umukuru w'igisagara ca Brooklyn Center yaciye afata ingingo yo kubuza uruja n'uruza mu gisagara cose mu masaha y'ijoro gushika isaha cumi na zibiri z'agatondo mu masaha yo muri ako karere, asaba abanyagihugu "gutaha muhira ku mutekano wabo". Hari icuka kibi cane muri Minneapolis mu gihe urubanza rw'uwahoze ari umupolisi yagirizwa kwica George Floyd rubandanya. Buramatari wa Minnesota, Tim Walz avuga ko ariko arakurikiranira hafi ingene ibintu bimeze, yongera asengera umuryango wa Wright. Ejo ku wa Mungu, abantu baharurwa mu majana bagenda baririmba izina rya  Daunte Wright baciye biyegeranya hanze y'ibiro vy'igiporisi mu gisagara ca Brooklyn Center, ku birometero bike uvuye hagati mu gisagara ca Minneapolis uja mu buraruko. Icuka kibi cadutse igihe igiporisi cashirako umwambaro wo mu gihe co kurwanya imigumuko n'igihe  imodoka zibiri zashika zigaca ziterwa amabuye, nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters. Abari muri iyo myiyerekano banditse ivyandiko hasi n'ingwa bongera batsa n'amabuji, ariko igiporisi mu nyuma kikaba cabategetse kuvaho, ireresi ikerekana abo baporisi bariko batera vya vyuka bikoroza amosozi  n'ama grenades yo gushwiragiza abari mu myiyerekano. Ibinyamakuru bikorera muri ako karere bivuga ko habaye n'ibikorwa vyo gusahura mu turere tutari duke, Mike Elliott arongoye igisagara ca Brooklyn Center agaca atangaza ingingo yo kubuza uruja n'uruza aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter. Yanditse ati: "Dushaka ko umutekano w'abantu bose wubahirizwa. Ndasavye ko mwese muba mu mutekano kandi ndasavye ko mutaha muhira". Bamwe mu basirikare b'igihugu ba (Minnesota National Guard) bari basanzwe bararungitswe gucungera urubanza rwa Derek Chauvin yagirizwa urupfu rwa George Floyd, barungitswe mu gisagara ca Brooklyn Center. Brooklyn Center yugaye inyubakwa z'amashure yose ihagarika n'ivyigwa hamwe n'ibindi bikorwa kuri ayo mashure kuri uno wa mbere, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru bikorera muri ako karere. None ni ibiki vyashikiye Daunte Wright neza na neza? Mw'itangazo casohoye, igiporisi ca Brooklyn Center kivuga ko cahagaritse umugabo yari yarenze amategeko y'ibarabara ku muhingamo w'ejo ku wa Mungu, kandi ko yari asanzwe afise umutahe wo kumuhagarika. Igiporisi kivuga ko abaporisi bagerageje kumuhagarika yaciye asibimra mu modoka. Niho umwe mu baporisi yaca amurasa, ariko abandanya anyonga imodokari yiwe agenda aca ku zindi, imbere y'uko ayita ku yindi modoka. Mu nyuma niho yatangazwa ko yapfuye. Umugore yari muri iyo modoka yakomeretse buke buke. Igiporisi kivuga ko abo baporisi bari bambaye bafise camera  zabo kandi ko na kamera y'imodoka nayo nyene yariko irakora. Nyina wiwe Katie avuga kpo umuhungu wiwe yamuhagamaye igihe imodoka yiwe yahagarikwa akamubwira ko yahagaritswe kubera "ibimotesho vyari kuri retroviseur". Avuga ko mu nyuma yumvise uruhagarara terefone ica iracika. "Haciye umunota, nahamagaye hanyuma umukunzi wiwe bari kumwe muri iyo modoka aca avuga ko yarashwe....umuhungu wanje yari aryamye hasi yapfuye". Avuga ko abo baporisi basize ikiziga c'umuhungu wiwe kiryamye hasi, yongerako ati: "Nta n'umwe azotubwira na kimwe. Nta n'umwe azotuvugisha...navuze nti ndabasavye mukure ikiziga c'umuhungu wanje hasi". Umukuru w'igisagara Elliott yavuze ko ivyabaye ari "agahomerabunwa", buramatari  Walz  nawe ati : "Reta yacu iragandariye uwundi  mwirabure yishwe n'abajejwe kwubahiriza umutekano". Igisagara ca Minneapolis gisanzwe kirangwamwo icuka kibi inyuma y'urupfu rwa wa mwirabure George Floyd rwatumye haduka imyiyerekano mu gihugu,, ahanini yakozwe mu mahoro n'aho hari ahandi yabayemwo imigumuko, inyubakwa zimwe zimwe zirononekara.

headline: USA itangaza ko abasirikare bayo 34 bagize ibibazo vyo mu bwonko mu gitero ca Irani
text: Ubunyamabanga bwo kwivuna abansi bwa Amerika, Pentagone, bumenyesha ko abasirikare 34 b'ico gihugu bagize ibibazo vyo mu bwonko (TBI)  bivuye kuri ca gitero ca Irani ku kirindiro cazo muri Irak. Umuvugizi w'ubwo bunyamabanga avuga ko gushika ubu, abashika 17 aribo bakiriko baravurwa. Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yari yatangaje ko ata musirikare wa Amerika n'umwe yigeze agira ingorane muri ico gitero ca Irani co ku wa 08 z'uku kwa mbere, mu kwihora igandagurwa ry'umusirikare mukuru wa Irani. Bwana Trump akaba yavuze ivyo ashaka gusigura ingingo yafashe yo kudasubiza ico gitero. Hagati aho mu ndwi iheze, Pentagon yari yamenyesheje ko abasirikare 11 bariko bavurwa kubera ibibazo vyo mu mutwe bagize bivuye kuri ico gitero. Abajijwe uko kuvuguruzanya mu gihe yari mu nama yerekeye ubutunzi kw'isi mu Buswisi, Bwana Trump yishuye ati: "Narumvise ko hari abari bamenetse umutwe, n'ibintu ataco bivuze, ariko mvuga nti, kandi ndavyemeza, si ibintu bikomeye". "Si mfata ko ari ububabare bukomeye nk'ubwo nabonye". Pentagone ivuga ko ata musirikare n'umwe yapfuye muri ico gitero ca Irani c'igisasu ca misire ku kirindiro ca Ain al-Asad, kuko hafi bose bari mu buraro bwo mu kuzimu igihe ivyo bisasu vyaterwa. Ejo ku wa gatanu, umuvugizi w'ubunyamabanga bujejwe kwivuna abansi, Jonathan Hoffman, yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko abasirikare umunani mu bagize ibibazo batahukanywe muri Amerika kugira ngo babandanye bavurwa, mu gihe abandi icenda nabo batwawe mu Budagi. 16 bavuriwe muri Irak uwundi umwe nawe muri Koweit imbere y'uko abo bose 17 basubira ku bikorwa vyabo, k'uko abategetsi babivuga. Bwana Hoffman avuga ko umunyamabanga ajejwe kwivuna abansi, Mark Esper atashotse aronka amakuru y'uko hoba hari abasirikare bari bagize ibibazo mu minsi yakurikiye ico gitero. Ishirahamwe ry'abakukuruke bahoze barwana mu ntambara za Irak na Afghanistani, riranegura ubutegetsi bwa Trump kubona butashotse bumenyesha ko hari abasirikare bagize ibibazo. Paul Rieckhoff, uwatanguje iryo shirahamwe avuga ati: "ico ni ikintu gikomeye. Leta ya Amerika yategerezwa guha Abanyamerika amakuru ku vyerekeye ubuzima bw'abana babo. Nta kindi kintu gisumba ico". Igisirikare ca Amerika kimenyesha ko izo ngorane zikunda gushika mu burere bw'intambara. Ejo ku wa gatanu, abanyagihugu ba Irak ibihumbi n'ibihumbi barihaye amabarabara ku mugwa mukuru Baghdad biyamiriza abasirikare mvamakungu baharurwa mu 5000. Inama nshingamateka ya Irak iherutse gusaba abarwanyi mvamakungu bose - harimwo n'abanyamerika - kuva muri ico gihugu.

headline: Imvo n'imvano ku mishamirano hagati ya Russia na Ukraine
text: Mu kiganiro c’uyu musi, tuganira ku nkuru imaze iminsi ivugwa kw'isi y'igihugu ca Ukraine aho amakuru avuga ko gishobora guterwa umwanya uwo ari wo wose n’igihugu kibanyi c’Uburusiya. Ukraine cahoze ari kimwe mu bihugu bigize Reta Zunze Ubumwe z’ Abasoviete (URSS/USSR) imbere y’uko ivyo bihugu vyiyonkora mu 1991 bica birikukira. Intara ya Crimée/Crimea ibamwo abarusiya benshi yaciye yegukira Ukraine, ariko umugwa mukuru wayo, Sebastopol, ugumamwo ibirindiro vya gisirikare vy’Uburusiya. Mu 2014, Uburusiya bwarigaruriye iyo ntara bukoresheje inguvu, bugirako buratangaza ko ibaye iyabwo bwite, inyuma y’imyiyerekano yatumye prezida yari yatowe Viktor Ianoukovich, yagirizwa kuba mu kwaha k’Uburusiya, ata agahungira muri ico ihugu. Ivyo bihugu vyagumye birabana ribi, ibintu bikaba vyagiye kwunyuka aho Ukraine isabiye kwinjira mw’ishirahamwe ryo kugwaniriza umwansi hamwe ry’abanyaburaya, OTAN/NATO, ivyo Uburusiya buterekwa na gato. Inyuma y’amatora yo 2019 muri Ukraine yashikanye ku butegetsi prezida Volodymyr Zelensky, hari icizere ko hashobora kuba agahengwe, mbere n’umukuru w’Uburusiya Vladimir Putin aravuga ko yiteguye gusubira kugirana imigenderanire myiza n’ico gihugu. Ibintu vyasubiye kuba ndanse mu mpera z’umwaka uheze, aho Uburusiya bwarunze ingabo zirenga 100.000 ku rubibe bihana na Ukraine. Ukraine na yo yaciye ihamagaza igitigiri nk’ico c’abasirikare bama bagavye mu kwitegurira ibitero vy’Uburusiya bishobora kuba umwanya uwo ari wo wose. Ku ruhande rumwe hari Uburusiya, ku rundi ruhande Ukraine n’ibihugu vya Buraya hamwe na Amerika bihurikiye mw’ishirahamwe Otan, ubu biguma bishigikira mu majambo no mu bikoresho vya gisirikare biguma birungika muri Ukraine no mu bihugu vy’incuti vyegereye Uburusiya. Hagiye haba ibiganiro bihuza impande zose ariko gushika ubu nta co birashikako. Uburusiya buguma buhakana ko ata mu gambi bufise wo gutera Ukraine, ariko ibihugu vyo bishigikiye Ukraine bivuga ko ari umwanya n’umwanya ibitero bigatangura, mbere bimwe bimwe bikaba bimaze gutahukana ababiserukira bahora muri ico gihugu, bikanasaba abanyagihugu bavyo kuva muri Ukraine. Inyuma y’imyimenyerezo Uburusiya bwari bumazemwo imisi ku rubibe buhana na Ukraine, inkuru zivuga ko zimwe mu ngabo zabwo zitanguye kuva muri ako karere mugabo umukuru wa Ukraine n'ishirahamwe rya OTAN bakavuga ko Ata bimenyetso bifatika barabona vyemeza ko izo ngabo z'Uburusiya zatanguye kuvayo. None mu vyo ukuri Uburusiya na Ukraine bipfa iki? Uburaya na Amerika bufise izihe nyungu murI Ukraine? Kubera iki Uburusiya butipfuza ko Ukraine ija muri Otan? Mu gihe iyo ntambara yokwaduka, yogira izihe nkurikizi mu karere ivyo bihugu birimwo no hirya no hirya no hino kw’isi, dore ko hari n'abamaze kuvuga ko yaba intambara ya gatatu y'isi ? Ivyo ni bimwe mu bibazo tugiye guca hirya no hino muri kino kiganiro c’imvo n’imvano mwateguriwe na Cyriaque Muhawenayo.

headline: Ethiopia: Inyeshamba za Tigray ziti 'emera ubutegetsi bwacu canke tubandanya intambara'
text: Inyeshamba z'intara ya Tigray muri Ethiopia zivuga ko ubutegetsi bwazo butegerezwa kubanza kwemerwa imbere y'uko zemera guhagarika intambara. Mu bindi vyinshi zisaba, zivuga kandi ko ingabo za Eritrea zitegerezwa kubanza kuva mu gihugu. Ubutegetsi bwa Addis Abeba buherutse gutangaza ko buhagaritse intambara ku ruhande rwabwo, inyuma y'aho izi nyeshamba zifatiye igice kinini c'iyi ntara, ingabo z'igihugu nazo zikayanyaga. Iyi ntambara imaze amezi umunani hagati y'izi nyeshamba n'ingabo za reta imaze guhitana ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abanyagihugu. Ishirahamwe ONU rimenyesha ko abarenga imiriyoni zibiri bataye izabo, nayo abantu 400.000 bakaba bahanzwe na kigoyi gishobora gutera abarenga imiriyoni 1.8. Inyeshamba z'umuhari Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) zabanje kuvuga ko ivyo guhagarika intambara vyatangajwe na reta ya Ethiopia ari "ukujajura" zica ziyemeza kwirukana "abansi" bazo muri iyo ntara. Muri bo harimwo ingabo za Eritrea hamwe n'ingabo za Ethiopia ziva mu ntara ya Amhara iri mu bumanuko bwa Tigray. Ariko basohoye urutonde rw'ibindi vyinshi bisabwa kugira ngo bemere guhagarika intambara, harimwo gukora amatohoza ku vyaha vyo mu ntambara bivugwa, gutanga imfashanyo z'ubutabazi hamwe no gusanura ibintu shingiro vyo mu buzima bwa misi yose, harimwo umuyagankuba. Ejo ku wa Mungu, "reta ya Tigray" yasohoye itangazo rivuga riti: "Mu gihe tuzoba twijejwe neza ko umutekano w'abanyagihugu utazohungabanywa n'igitero ca kabiri, twemeye guhagarika intambara". Umunyamakuru wa BBC World Service Africa Will Ross avuga ko mu gihe reta ya Addis Ababa yoramuka yemeye ibi bisabwa n'inyeshamba ko ubutegetsi bwazo bubanza kwemerwa, yoba yerekanye neza ko yatsinzwe intambara kandi ko yananiwe no kwikurako umwansi wayo. Avuga ko amakungu abandanya atera akamo ko intambara zihagarara kugira ngo imiriyoni z'abantu basinzikajwe n'intambara bashobore kuronswa imfashanyo, ariko ko bisabwa ko impande zompi zibanza kwumvikana neza kugira ngo amahoro agaruke. Iyi ntambara yatanguye ku wa 04 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe umwaka uheze, igihe umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia Abiy Ahmed agomorera ingabo za reta ku ngabo z'intara ya Tigray. Ico gihe yatangaje ko yafashe iyo ngingo inyuma y'igitero cakozwe ku kirindiro c'igisirikare ca reta muri iyo ntara. Ibintu vyagiye kuyangara haciye amezi atari make hari icuka kibi hagati ya reta ya Abiy n'abategetsi ba TPLF. Inyuma y'intsinzi zitari nke cagiye kigira harimwo ugufata umugwa mukuru wa Tigray Mekelle, ibintu vyagiye biba nabi ku gisirikare ca Ethiopia gifashwe mu mugongo n'ingabo za Eritrea n'iz'intara ya Amhara mu ntambara n'inyeshamba za TPLF . Mu ndwi iheze, ingabo za Tigray zasubiye kwigarurira umugwa mukuru Mekelle. Impande zompi muri iyo ntambara ziragirizwa ko zagandaguye abantu zinahonyanga uburenganzira bwa kiremwa muntu. Ku wa gatanu, ingabo ziharurwa mu bihumbi za Ethiopia zafashwe mpiri zarazungurukanywe mu mabarabara ya Mekelle. Gushika ubu, reta ya Abiy i Addis Abeba yaranse kuganira n'abategetsi ba TPLF, mbere akaba yavuze ko uwu ari umuhari w'iterabwoba.

headline: Intambara ya Ukraine: Ingene Russia yarushirije mu kwunga imigenderanire na Africa
text: Uburusiya muri iyi myaka ya vuba buguma  bwongereza uruhara rwabwo muri Afrika none kuva buteye Ukraine, bwiteze ivyo bihugu bishasha bicuditse kubushigikira, canke nibura kutagira uruhande vyegamira mu nzego mpuzamakungu nka ONU. Kuva muri Libya ukaja muri Mali, Centrafrique, Mozamibque n'ahandi, Uburusiya bwagumye bwongereza uruhara -rimwe na rimwe mu buryo bwa gisirikare mu gufasha kurwanya imigwi yitwaje ibigwanisho canke intagondwa z'aba Djihadists. Mu nama ijejwe umutekano ya ONU, igihugu ca Kenya kiyirimwo mu buryo butari  ntayegayezwa, cariyamirije mu majambo atomoye igitero c'Uburusiya kuri Ukraine. Ariko gushika ubu ibindi bihugu ntivyitabiriye cane mu gushigikira aho Kenya ihagaze. Ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Afrika, AU/UA ryashikirije "impungenge zikomeye" ku biriko biraba, ariko ntaco cashikirije mu kunegura Uburusiya". Afrika y'Epfo, isanzwe icuditse n'Uburusiya bisangiye ishirahamwe rya Brics, yasavye ico gihugu kuvana ingabo zaco muri Ukraine, ariko ico gihugu kimenyesha ko kiguma cizeye ko hoboneka inyishu iciye mu mahoro. Hagati aho, umukuru wa Centrafrique, Faustin-Archange Touadéra bivugwa ko yashigikiye ingingo y'Uburusiya yo kwemera intara za Ukraine za Donetsk na Luhansk nk'intara zigenga. Ku wa gatatu, umukuru w'abasirikare bigaruriye ubutegetsi muri Sudan  Mohamed Hamdan Dagalo, yagize urugendo i Moscou mu kimenyetso c'imigenderanire irushirije gukomera hagati y'ivyo bihugu vyompi. Kamwe mu turorero tugaragara neza tw'ingene ubucuti bwahindutse muri Afrika kabaye indwi imwe imbere y'uko Uburusiya butera Ukraine mu kurangiza uruhara rw'Ubufaransa mu gukorwa co kurwanya intagondwa muri Mali. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Mali  Choguel Maiga yemeje, mu kiganiro na France24, ko igihugu ciwe cagiraniye amasezerano yo gufashanya mu vya gisirikare n'Uburusiya. Ariko yarahakanye ibivugwa ko kompanyi ya gisirikare yo mu Rusiya iteje impari, Groupe Wagner, irimwo muri ayo masezerano. Ubwo bufasha bw'Uburusiya muri Mali, n'ubwo Uburusiya nyene bwoba bwemereye abasirikare bafashe ubutegetsi muri Burkina Faso, biri mu ngendo imaze imyaka itanu iheze aho Uburusiya bwakomeje inzira yo kwongereza uruhara rwabwo muri Afrika, mu buryo butandukanye. Mu gihe ugufashanya hagati y'Uburusiya na Afrika kwariko kuratera imbere, inama kaminuza yo mu 2019 yabereye mu gisagara ca Sochi co mu bumanuko bw'Uburusiya yitabwe n'intumwa zivuye mu bihugu vya Afrika birenga 50, harimwo abakuru b'ibihugu 43. Prezida  Vladimir Putin yarashikirije ijambo abategetsi, yibutsa kahise ko gushigikira imihari yo guhabuza intahe yo kwikukira anemera kwongereza urudandazwa hamwe n'imitahe. Ariko hari n'urundi ruhara: gucungera mu buryo butagaragara umutekano w'ama reta mu bihugu bimwe bimwe vya Afrika, biciye mu kwigisha, mw'iperereza no mu bikoresho, hamwe rero n'ikoreshwa ry'abacangero b'abarusiya mu ntambara zo muri Afrika. Nk'uko Putin yabivuze, hari imigenderanire ya kera kuva ku gihe ca URSS, igihe Afrika kari akarere ko kunyinyaniramwo na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Ariko kuva URSS isenyutse mu 1991 gushika mu ntango z'imyaka 10 iheze, igihe Uburusiya bukiri ku nzira yo gusubira gufata umurongo, imigenderanire na Afrika nticari icihutirwa. Ico gihe, gusubira kuba igihugu c'igihangange vyaciye biba intego nyamukuru ya poritike yo hanze y'umukuru w'Uburusiya. Mu 2014, Uburusiya bumaze kwigarurira agace ka Ukraine ka Crimee, hamwe n'ibihano mpuzamakungu vyaciye bikurikira, haciye haba itituka rikomeye ry'imigenderanire na Amerika hamwe n'Ishirahamwe rya Buraya. Bubonye ko bushobora kugeramirwa no gukumirwa n'amakugu, Ubususiya bwaciye butangura kuronderera incuti nshasha ahandi. "Kubera ingaruka z'ibihano, Uburusiya bwategerezwa kurondera amasoko mashasha ku bihingurwa vyabwo" nk'uko bivugwa na  Irina Abramova, umuyobozi w'igisata ca Afrika mu kigo Russian National  Academy of Sciences. Ariko Uburusiya bwarondera ibirenze amasoko - bwari bukeneye kwongereza ijambo ryabwo kw'isi. Mu 2014 bwaragiye mu ntambara yo muri Syria, bushigikira Prezida Bashar al-Assad, imwe mu mvo kukaba kwari ukugira bwerekane akajagari Ibihugu vya Buraya vyariko biratera kandi bwerekane ingene Uburusiya bushobora kugakosora. Mu nyuma ya Syria bwaciye bugana umugabane wa Afrika. Irina Filatova, umwigisha w'iteka kuri kaminuza ya Kwa-Zulu Natal  muri Afrika y'Epfo, avuga ko igikorwa ca mbere gikomeye c'Uburusiya muri Afrika kwari ugutesha agaciro uruhara rw'ibihugu vyo mu Burengero, nk'uko vyagenze muri Syria. Bwashaka kwerekana ko abanaya-Buraya, nk'akarorero, bananiwe no gutuza aba-djihadist muri Sahel. Ivyo bwabikora mu nzira zibiri muri Afrika, bufatanya kurungika abigisha ba gisirikare b'igihugu  gufasha mu bihugu bimwe bimwe, hamwe n'amakompanyi yigenga, nka Groupe Wagner, agwana mu bindi. Centrafrique cabaye igihugu ca mbere co muri Afrika aho abacangero b'abarusiya bo muri Wagner bagaragaye mu 2017. Mu nyuma bakurikiwe n'umugwi w'abasirikare urungitswe na reta kuja  gukarihiriza ubwenge abo muri Centrafrique. Intego yabo kwari ugufasha prezida  Touadéra kuguma ku butegetsi. Vyagumye bivugwa cane ko abo bacangero bakora amarorerwa, ariko Uburusiya bwagumye buhakana ko ata muntu n'umwe wabwo yagize uruhara mu vyaha canke intureka ku banyagihugu basanzwe. Abacangero b'abarusiya barakora kandi muri Libya, Sudan, Mozambique na Mali, ku ngero zitandukanye z'ivyo bashikako. Ikindi kimenyetso c'akamaro ka Afrika ku Burusiya, ni uko uwo mugabane wabaye isoko rikomeye ry'ibigwanisho vy'Uburusiya. Hafi ica kabiri c'ibigwanisho vyose vyinjira muri Afrika biva mu Burusiya, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo c'igihugu kiraba ivyo gushohora hanze. Abagura cane ibigwanisho ni Algeria na Misiri (Egypt), ariko hari n'amasoko mashasha muri Nigeria, Tanzania na Cameroun. Ariko hari akandi kunguko k'ubucuti bukomeye mu vy'imigenderanire. Afrika muri rusangi ifise ikirenga ica kane c'amajwi mu nama ya bose ya ONU, kandi rishobora kuba ijwi rya rusangi rikomeye mu zindi nzego mpuzamakungu.
