Mu 2021 icegeranyo ku migenderanire ya Africa n'Uburusiya, casohowe n'ishure rya kaminuza Higher School of Economics rya Moscou, kivuga ko ibihugu vya Afrika akenshi muri kahise vyakunze kutagira uruhande vyegamira iyo hageze ku bikorwa vy'Uburusiya. "Nta gihugu na kimwe cigeze gifatira ibihano Uburusiya (inyuma ya 2014). Mu gutora muri ONU ku bibazo vyerekeye Ukraine, vyinshi mu bihugu vyo kuri uwo mugabane bifata ingingo yo kutagira aho vyegamiye," nk'uko icegeranyo kibivuga. Ubu habaye igitero kuri Ukraine, hamwe uko kutagira aho vyegamiye kwobandanya, canke bikerura mu gushigikira, aho utwigoro tw'Uburusiya muri iyi myaka iheze vyoboneka ko twavuyemwo umusaruro.

headline: Habonetse uwundi muntu yanduye coronavirus mu Burundi, 22 bandi bapimwe ntayo bafise
text: Ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara mu Burundi bumenyesha ko uwundi muntu yatowemwo umugera corona ubu abanduye bakaba babaye batatu muri ico gihugu. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu n'ukurwanya ikiza SIDA mu Burundi, niwe yabitangaje kuri uno wa kane. Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru i Bujumbura kuri uyu mugoroba, umushikiranganji Thaddée Ndikumana  amenyesha ko uyo muntu mushasha ari umurundikazi w'imyaka 26. Abandi 22 bapimwe basanze batanduye uwo mugera, umushikiranganji Ndikumana agasaba abanyagihugu kubandanya bakurikiza ingingo zafashwe zo kurwanya no gukinga ico kiza. Amakuru y'uko hoba hari abanduye coronavirus mu Burundi yavugwa, hakaba mbere n'abagiriza leta kubinyegeza. Umuvugizi w'umukuru w'igihugu c'u Burundi yaheruka kubwira BBC ko u Burundi burinzwe n'Imana, ari yo mpamvu ico kiza kitari bwahashike. Ivyo vyatumye hari amashirahamwe yiyamiriza ingene u Burundi bufata ikibazo ca coronavirus, akavuga ko bugifata minenerwe. Gushika ubu mu Burundi nta mategeko abuza abantu gusohoka yari bwafatwe nk'uko biri mu bihugu bibanyi, kiretse gusa kubaha impanuro zo kugira isuku. Ingendo z'indege zarabujijwe ikiringo c'iminsi cumi n'ine, imbibe nazo zikaba zugaye ku ruja n'uruza rusanzwe. Gushika ubu Afrika niyo irangwamwo abanduye coronavirus bake ugereranije n'iyindi migabane, ariko abajejwe ivy'amagara ku rwego mpuzamakungu bavuga ko abandura n'abapfa kuri uwo mugabane bagenda bariyongera.

headline: Iminsi 100 intambara itanguye: Ingene ibinyamakuru biyivuga muri Ukraine no mu Burusiya
text: Gushika ku mutaga hagati imboneshakure (television) y’Uburusiya ntaco yari bwavuge ku c’uko iminsi 100 irumanye kuva Uburusiya buteye Ukraine. Nyinshi mu mboneshakure zikurikirwa cane mu Burusiya zataganguye amakuru yazo yo um gitondo zagiriza Ukraine gutera ata gutoronya  ibisasu ku turere tutagenzurwa na reta. Imboneshakure igenzurwa na Kremlin (ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu), Rossiya1, yavuze ko aba-nationalists bateye Mariupol na Donetsk’’ um gihe Channel One nayo, nayo nyene igenzurwa na reta, itanga uburorero bushasha bw’ubunyamwuga n’ukwitanga   vyerekanwa n’igisirikare c’Uburusiya um kugwanira Donbas’’. Nta n’imwe ivuga ko ‘igikorwa ca gisirikare  kidasanzwe’ c’Uburusiya muri UKraine  conjiye um munsi waco ugira 100. Imbere y’uko intambara itangura, abasigura uko ibintu biriko biragenda bari babwiye ababakurikira ko vyashoboka ko  bitwara  Uburusiya iminsi mike gusa kugira bwifatire Ukraine. Ku wa kane, urubuga rwigenga Meduza rwanditse ko hari abarubwiye ko reta yari yategegetse ibinyamakuru kudacisha um kanwa ivy’uko  ivy’iminsi 100. Rimwe mu masoko ya Meduza muri Kremlin ryayibwiye riti: ‘’ Guhagarara cane ku matariki ajanye bn’intambara bishobora gutuma abarusiya bibaza ivyari bigamijwe n’ico gitero n’ingene coba kimaze gushobora canke kunanirwa kubishikako.’’ Ibi bihushanye cane n’ibivugwa n’ibinyamakuru muri Ukraine aho imboneshakure iriko ikravuga ibiba uyu munsi ku civugo ‘Iminsi 100 yo kurya umutima amenyo’’. Uwushikiriza amakuru ku mboneshakure yigenga Prymy TV yavuze ati: ‘’Uyu si umunsi wo kwigina kandi twizeye ko ata minsi 200 tuzokwibuka kuva intambara itanguye. Amezi arenga atatu araheze kuva intambara itanguye. Iyi ni amwe mu matariki akomeye muri iyo ntambara:

headline: OMS/WHO ivuga ko intambara yo kurwanya malaria itava aho iri
text: Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi WHO/OMS riragabisha ko ata ntambwe iraterwa mu ntambara yo kurwanya malaria. Mu cegeranyo c'umwaka kuri iyo ndwara, iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko ibitigiri vy'abayirwaye n'abamaze gupfa atacahindutse muri iyi myaka ibiri iheze, bikaba bitandukanye n'ingene vyari vyakorotse bitangaje twinjira muri iki kinjana. Malaria yica abantu 400.000 buri mwaka, benshi muri bo bakaba ari abo musi y'ubugaragwa bwa Sahara muri Afrika. Hari ubwoba ko imfashanyo mu migambi yo kurwanya malaria zizogabanuka kubera amarorerwa ikiza ca coronavirus kiriko kirakora. Utwigoro two kurwanya iyo ndwara iterwa n'imibu kandi tugenda tuburizwamwo  n'ingene iyo ndwara itakivurwa n'imiti imwe imwe. Icegeranyo c'igisata ca ONU kijejwe ubutabazi, OCHA co mu 2019, kivuga ko abantu imiliyoni zitanu n'ibice indwi banduye malariya muri uwo mwaka mu Burundi, igitigiri kingana hafi igice c'abanyagihugu bose bo muri ico gihugu. Muri abo bantu bose, abangana 1801 barahitanywe n'iyo ndwara iterwa n'umubu kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere gushika ku wa 21 ukwezi kw'indwi mu 2019.

headline: Russia - Ukraine: Hatanguye ibiganiro ku ntambara iri hagati y'ivyo bihugu
text: Amafoto yatanguye guhererekanywa mu gihe abategetsi b'Uburusiya na Ukraine bari mu biganiro ku ntambara iriko irabahuza, ivyo biganiro bikaba biriko birabera  ku rubibe igihugu ca Ukraine gihana na Belarus. Imbere y'uko iyo nama itangura, prezida wa Ukraine yavuze ko igihugu ciwe cipfuza ko intambara zica zihagarara ubwo nyene n'ingabo z'Uburusiya zikava muri ico gihugu. Hagati aho, Uburusiya bwo buvuga ko hoshikwako amasezerano impande zose zifisemwo inyungu. Ku musi ugira gatanu inyuma y'aho ingabo z'Uburusiya zinjiriye muri Ukraine, intumwa z'ivyo bihugu bibiri zatanguye ibiganiro bigamije kurangiza iyo ntambara. Ibiro vya prezida wa Ukraine bivuga ko bishaka ihagarikwa ry'intambara ubwo nyene hamwe n'ivanwa ry'ingabo z'Uburusiya muri ico gihugu. Hagati aho, Vladimir Medinsky arongoye intumwa z'Uburusiya mu biganiro avuga ko bashaka amasezerano afitiye inyungu impande zose. Imbere y'uko iyo nama itangura, prezida Volodymyr Zelensky yahamagariye ingabo z'Uburusiya gushira hasi ibigwanisho, aca atera akamo ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Buraya kwemerera Ukraine kwinjira muri iryo shirahamwe ubwo nyene.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Lukaku, Pogba, Doku, Abraham, Lingard, Sterling
text: Sergio Aguero aherutse kugurwa na Barcelona yahinyagaye, ibizomutuma adakina mu kiringo c'indwi cumi (amezi arenga atatu). Mw'itangazo uwo murwi wo muri La Liga wasohoye, Barcelona ivuga ko yahinyagaye mu kuguru kw'iburyo. Aguero w'imyaka 33 yinjiye muri  Barcelona ku masezerano y'imyaka ibiri yateyeko igikumu mu kwa gatandatu, avuye muri Manchester City aho yari amaze imyaka cumi, aho yaciye umuhigo mu bakinyi bamaze kwinjiriza ibitsindo vyinshi uwu murwi, akaba yatsinze ibitsindo 260 mu nkino 390. Kugira ngo PSG ishobore kwigarurira iki gihangange co muri Argentina, iriteguye kugurisha abakinyi cumi bose harimwo uwahoze akina hagati muri  Everton umunya Senegal Idrissa Gueye w'imyaka 31. (Athletic) Uwu murwi wo mu Bufaransa kandi wahagaritse ivyo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umufaransa Paul Pogba w'imyaka 28. (Le Parisien - in French) Inyuma yo gufatwa ibipimo vya mbere vyo kwa muganga muri Chelsea, umusatirizi wa Inter Milan,  umubirigi Romelu Lukaku w'imyaka 28 ashobora gukinira uwo murwi urukino rwayo rwo kwugurura Premier League aho uzohura na Crystal Palace ku wa gatandatu. (Daily Star) Lyon yamaze kwemerera umushahara wa musatirizi wa  Liverpool umuswisi  Xherdan Shaqiri w'imyaka 29. (L'Equipe - via Get French Football News) Manchester United iriteguye kwemeza ko yamaze kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Real Madrid umufaransa Raphael Varane w'imyaka 28 kuri uwu wa gatatu  - bikazomuha akaryo ko kuzokina urukino rwa mbere muri Premier League ku wa gatandatu, aho uwo murwi uzotana mu mitwe na Leeds. (Daily Star) Liverpool ihanze amaso umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Rennes umubirigi Jeremy Doku w'imyaka 19. (Voetbal 24 - in Dutch) Umusatirizi wa Chelsea umwongereza Tammy Abraham w'imyaka 23 ariko araronderwa na Arsenal, Roma hamwe na Atalanta. (Goal) Roma iriko iregereza igiciro c'imiriyoni zababa 47 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika gisabwa kuri Abraham, ni mu gihe Chelsea iriko irarondera ingene yotanga nk'intizo uyu musatirizi ata kibanza kinini agifise, harimwo n'igice cemeza ko uwomutwara afise n'amahirwe yo kuzomugura burundu.  (Mail) Umumenyereza wa Roma Jose Mourinho aripfuza umusatirizi wa  Arsenal umufaransa  Alexander Lacazette w'imyaka 30. (Gazzetta dello Sport - via Boot Room) Leicester iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umwongereza Jesse Lingard w'imyaka 28 mu gihe uwundi mwongereza mugenzi we James Maddison w'imyaka 24 yova muri uwo murwi. (Football London) Aba Foxes (ni ukuvuga Leicester) baravugwa kandi ko bashaka umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Schalke umunya Turukiya Ozan Kabak w'imyaka 21 - yamaze igice ca nyuma c'umwaka w'inkino uheze muri Liverpool aho yari yaratijijwe - hamwe n'umufaransa na we nyene akina inyuma muri West Ham  Issa Diop w'imyaka 24. (Leicester Mercury) Everton iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Newcastle United umwongereza Sean Longstaff w'imyaka 23. (Athletic) Bayern Munich iriko irihweza nimba yogarukana umukinyi wo ku ruhande, umufaransa Franck Ribery w'imyaka 38 amaze igihe yimenyereza hamwe n'uwu murwi kuva avuye muri  Fiorentina. (Gazzetta dello Sport - in Italian) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Manchester City umwongereza Raheem Sterling w'imyaka 26 ariteguye kugiriranira ibiganiro n'uwu murwi wiwe kugira ngo ashobore gutera igikumu ku yandi masezerano yo kubandanya ayikinira. (Sun) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Tottenham umufaransa Tanguy Ndombele w'imyaka 24 ariko arihweza kazoza kiwe muri uwu murwi.  (Athletic)

headline: DRC: Van Damme atera akamo ba rurangiranwa gutemberera ico gihugu
text: Umukinyi rurangiranwa wa filime w'Umubiligi Jean Claude va Damme, batazira 'Mitsi ya Bruxelles' avuga ko anejerejwe no kuba yahawe igitabo c'inzira ca Congo - avuga kandi ko afise intumbero yo guhamagarira abandi bantu bamenyekana cane gutemberera Republika ya Demokrasi ya Congo. Ari i Kinshasa ku mugwa mukuru w'ico gihugu, igihe yariko arashikirizwa ico gitabo c'inzira n'akazi ko guserukira ico gihugu mu karanga, urwaruka n'ibidukikije, uwo mugabo w'imyaka 61 yagize ati: "Ngiye kugondoza abandi bantu rurangiranwa kw'isi nka Stallone, Schwarzenegger, Jacky Chan hamwe n'abandi benshi." "Hari kandi n'abaririmvyi nka Jennifer Lopez  hamwe n'abakinyi b'umupira nka Messi, Ronaldinho, Cristiano Ronaldo. Bategerezwa kuza muri iki gihugu kwerekana ko kigendwa, kwerekana ko Congo ishobora gukingira umutekano abantu bari muvyo kuremesha ibiro vyinjiza amahera (Showbiz). Igihugu ca RD Congo kimaze imyaka irenga 30 kiri mu ntambara, aho imigwi myinsi yitwaje ibigwanisho ibica bigacika mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu hagwiriye ubutare, aho yica, ifata ku nguvu ikanasahura. Uwo yigeze kuba rurangiranwa mu buhinga bwo kwivuna umwansi ata kigwanisho (arts martiaux), Van Damme yarakinye mu mafilime y'ingwano i Hollywood y'amafaranga menshi nka Cyborg, Kickboxer na Universal Soldier - ubu vuba na ho akaba aherutse gusubiramwo Master Croc mu mafilime ya Kung Fu Panda. Azwi nk'umuntu akaze cane. Yatangaje abantu mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru aho yavuga ko yavukiye muri RD Congo, avuga ko "avuka i Likasi", igisagara kiri mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bw'ico gihugu. Aho hashobora hari mu mwaka ico gihugu ciganzura intwaro y'Ububiligi. Yanashimitse cane ku kamaro ko kuzana abashora imitahe mu gihugu ca RD Congo. "RD Congo ifise ubutare buciye imiriyaridi ibihumbi 36...akazi kanje n'ukurondera abazana imitahe, bazi neza ko ari ukubanza gutanga imbere yo kuronka, hanyuma no guha icizere prezida Felix Antoine Tshisekedi." Ariko benshi bibajije ikibazo kuri ico gitabo c'inzira gishasha c'uwo mukinyi wa Filime mu gihe ibwirizwa shingiro rya RD Congo  ribuza kugira ubwenegihugu bubiri.

headline: Manchester City hanze: uko umwaka utashe amagorwa ni ya yandi– Kevin de Bruyne
text: Umukiyi wo hagati wa Manchester City Kevin de Bruyne avuga ait "dukeneye gusubira kwiga neza", inyuma y'aho bakuriwe mw'ihiganwa ku ncuro ya gatatu yose bageze mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma muri Champions League. Mu rukino rwaraye rubaye mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, Lyon yaraye imaramaje Man City mu kuyitsinda ibitsindo bitatu kuri kimwe. Moussa Dembele niwe yabakoreye ibara, mu kwinjiza ibitsindo bibiri vyose mu minota ya nyuma, kuwa 79 hanyuma ku wa 87, mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya. Uyu murwi Lyon wo mu Bufaransa witeze guhura na Bayern Munich wo mu Budagi mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma, uyu nawo weretse Barcelona ico imbwa yaboneye ku mugezi mu rukino rwo ku wa gatanu. Lyon niyo yabanje kubona igori ku gitsindo catsinzwe na Maxwel Cornet, mu nyuma De Bruyne aragikurayo, ariko ibintu bikaba vyaciye bibabana urudubi. Avugana na BT Sport De Bruyne yagize ati: "Amagorwa ni ya yandi, imyaka yose". Mw'ihiganwa ryaraye rirangiye mu Bwongereza, City yahejeje ari iya kabiri inyuma ya Liverpool yatahukanye iryo higanwa, Pep Guardiola n'abakinyi biwe bavuvudikira igikombe c'ihiganwa ryu Bwongereza (EFL Cup). Kuva uyu murwi utanguye kumenyerezwa na Guardiola, City yari imaze  gutsindwa na Monaco igeze mu gice c'umunani gishira ica nyuma, hanyuma mu myaka iheze ibiri ikurikirana naho ikurwamwo na Liverpool na Tottenham igeze mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma. De Bruyne ati: "Igice ca mbere nticatugendeye neza. Ariko mu gice ca kabiri twakinye urukino rwiza cane turabasatira bikomeye. Tuvugishije ukuri Lyon nta bintu bihambaye bakoze kuko twarabarushije umupira, ariko dukeneye gusubira kwiga neza". Man city yararonse amahirwe menshi yo gushobora kwinjiza ariko biranka. Inkokora zagiye gucika igihe Raheem Sterling, bamaze gutsindwa ica kabiri, ahushirije igitsindo imbere y'igori wenyene, igitsindo cari gutuma iyo mirwi inganya 2-2. Ariko rero Moussa Dembele amaze gutsinda ica gatatu. Ibintu vyari birangiye muri city. Pep ati: "Sintahura neza. Ndaza kumuvugisha ni twashika mw'ihoteri. N'ukuri abakinyi barashavuye, ariko ni kimwe mu bigize urukino". Umumenyereza wa Manchester City yamye yagirizwa ko yama atsindwa muri Champions League kubera yama ahindagura imikenyuro, ugasanga bitumye abakinyi bata umutwe. Umuhinga muvyo inkino Pat Nevin yigeze gukinira Chelsea n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Ecosse (Scotland) yabwiye iradiyo BBC Radio 5 Live ko uravye City yitaye mu ngorane yo nyene. Ati: "Iminota 22 ya mbere yabaye akaga. Pep Guardiola yagiye kwikangura haciye iminota 60. Urumva ko iyo minota yose uba wayipfishije ubusa kandi wari kuyikoresha". "Uno munsi vyari vyamwankiye. Wewe yipfuza abantu biwe ko bafata urukino mu minwe, ariko uravye urukino rusa n'urwari rwabananiye". "Nta nguvu bari bafise nk'uko dusanzwe tubamenyereye". Umumenyeshamakuru w'inkino w'umufaransa Julien Laurens, wewe, abona ko Lyon yaronkeye akoyoko ku "mikenyuro y'uburofa" ya Pep. Ati: "Niwe yananiwe. Yavyifashemwo nabi kuva mu ntango mbere no mu gice ca kabiri". "Yama ahindagura cane imikenyuro iyo ageze muri Champions League. Nivyo rimwe na rimwe birashobora kumuzanira akarusho, twarabibonye nk'igihe ahura na Real Madrid. Koko vyaragize akamaro. Ariko akenshi vyama vyanka". "Yarahinduye umukenyuro ariko biranka igihe yahura na Tottenham umwaka uheze, co kimwe n'igihe ahura na Monaco imyaka itatu iheze". "Kubera iki utokoresha umukenyuro abakinyi bawe bawe basanzwe bamenyereye mu gihe uzi neza ko uwo mugiye guhura umusumba kure? Kubera iki urondera kwisunga uwo muhiganwa?". "Uko siko bigenda. Amakosa ni rwiwe. Bimaze kuba kenshi". "Nibaza ko yotera intambwe akemera agasaba imbabazi. Yarishe umukino".

headline: 'Gwanya amacakubiri y'urukoba nka Logan' - Reta ya Afrika y'Epfo
text: Reta ya Afrika y'Epfo yateye akamo abantu ko bategerezwa gukurikiza akarorero k'umugabo w'umuzungu yafashwe video yakwiragiye henshi, ariko ariyamiriza amacakubiri ashingiye ku rukoba. Iyo video imwerekana ahanganye na ba nyene akabare b'abazungu mu gisagara ca Cape Town, ababaza impamvu babujije mugenzi we w'umwirabire kukinjiramwo. Itangazo rya reta ryasohotse ku musi wa kabiri, ririyamiriza ryivuye inyuma "iyo nyifato y'amacakubiri ashingiye ku rukoba yabaye igihe Thabiso Danca w'imyaka 25 yabuzwa kwinjira mu bunywero w'aba Irlandais, Hank's Olde, mu gisagara ca Cape Town, kubera gusa ari umwirabure, kandi akaba adaherekejwe n'umuzungu". Iyo video ubu imaze kurabwa n'abantu ibihumbi amajana, yatanguye gukwiragizwa ku musi wa gatanu. Yerekana umugenzi wa Danca, Christopher Logan, aja muri ubwo bunywero guhangana n'umwe muri banyene akabare kuri ivyo vyavugwa ko ari amacakubiri ashingiye ku rukoba. Yabwiye nyene akabare ko uwucungera umutekano yabwiye umugenzi wiwe: "Ntushobora kwinjira ngaha, atawuguherekeje, ata muzungu muri kumwe." Nyene ubunywero yishuye ko ivyo ata kibazo vyari bwatere mu myaka 18 amaze adandaza. Ubwo bunywero bwaciye busohora itangazo buhakana kugira inyifato y'amacakubiri ashingiye ku rukoba, bashira n'ikimenyetso hanze  cerekana ko ata macakubiri n'amwe aharangwa. Ico kimenyetso canditseko: "Dushaka kwemeza  ko mu myaka 30 iheze dukorera urudandaza aha muri Cap Town, twebwe nka banyene aka kabare, tutarigera, canke ngo dutegeke abakozi bacu, kwinuba umuntu hitwaje ikintu ico ari co cose, haba igitsina, kamere k'uburyo umuntu ahuza igitsina n'uwundi,  canke urukoba." Reta yasavye ko haba "amatohoza yihuta kuri ivyo vyabaye, kandi n'ubutungane bukore." Reta "yahamagariye abanye Afrika y'epfo bose gukurikiza akarorero ka Logan no kwiyamiriza amacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba".

headline: Swiss bemeje kubuza kwamamaza itabi inyuma cane y'ibihugu bibanyi
text: Aba-Swisse batoye bemeza kubuza kwamamaza itabi ahantu hose abakiri bato bashobora kubibona. Mu vy'ukuri, kuba Ego ariyo yiganje muri ayo matora ya kamarampaka mu gihugu cose bizotuma kwamamaza itabi bicibwa burundu. Ivyo bizotuma Swisse ija ku murongo w'ibindi bihugu bibanyi vy'i Buraya, vyinshi vyashitse ku ngingo zikomeye zibuza canke zigabanya kwamamaza itabi haraheze imyaka itari mike. N'ubwo ari igihugu gisanzwe kizwi neza ku bijanye n'amagara meza n'ugukingira ibidukikije, Swisse yari igifise amwe mu mategeko yerekeye itabi  yoroshe cane i Buraya. Mu gihe haheze imyaka myinshi kunywera itabi mu nzu z'uburiro n'ubunywero vyari vyaraciwe mu Bwongereza, mu Bufaransa, canke mu Budagi, muri Swisse bari bakihanywera itabi. Mu masoko ya kijambere (supermarches/supermartkets), abariko barasuma hari igihe bakirwa n'abagore bakiri bato babamwenyurira mu gihe babaha imponjo za gusa z'itabi riba riherutse gusohoka. Mu gihe ivyo haheze imyaka bibujijwe, kwamamaza itabi vyari bikibandanya. Ashima ivyavuye mu matora yo ku wa mungu, umushingamateka w'umu-social democrat  Flavia Wasserfallen yakeje igikorwa c'amashirahamwe y'abaganga n'abigisha bakoze isekeza ryo guca ivyo kwamamaza itabi. Yabwiye television ya Swisse ati: "Abantu barakoze cane kugira haboneke  poritike yo gushira imbere ineza y'abakiri bato". Ingingo z'ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi OMS zijanye n'itabi  - Framework Convention on Tobacco Control- zimaze imyaka hafi 20 zishitsweko mu gisagara ca Geneve. Swisse yarazishizeko umukono, ariko ntiyari bwazemeze mu mategeko -kikaba arico gihugu ca Buraya co nyene cari gisigaye - kuko gushika habe amatora yo ku wa mungu, amategeko y'ico gihugu yerekeye kwamamaza, ntiyisunga izo ngingo. Ugereranije no mu bindi bihugu vy'i Buraya, itabi muri Swisse rirazimbutse kandi 27% y'abantu bakuze muri ico gihugu baranywa itabi - urugero ruri hejuru y'urw'i Buraya muri rusangi. Ni kenshi amategeko agamije kugabanya canke guca kwamamaza itabi yari amaze kunanirwa kurengana mu nama nshingamateka. N'igihe abagira isekeza baba baronse imikono ikwiye yo gusaba ko haba amatora kamarampaka yo guca kwamamaza, reta yaca ibwira abanyagihugu gutora Oya. Abashigikiye ko kwamamaza bicibwa, bavugako ivyo biterwa n'uko muri ico gihugu hariyo amwe mu ma kompanyi akomeye cane kw'isi mu rudandazwa rw'itabi. Philip Morris, British American Tobacco na Japan Tobacco yose afise ivyicaro vyayo bikuru muri Swisse. Urudandazwa rw'itabi bigereranywa ko rwinjiriza ubutunzi bwa Swisse amafaranga arenga miriyaridi 6 z'amadorari ku mwaka, rugakoresha abantu 11.000 muri ico gihugu. Imbere y'uko amatora aba vyaragaragaye ko -nk'uko benshi bavyikeka - ko ama kompanyi y'itabi yahora asuka amafaranga mw'isekeza ryo gutora Oya. Abagwanya ko hacibwa kwamamaza, bavuga ko kubuza kwamamaza ikintu cemewe n'amategeko bidakwiye kwemerwa, kandi ko ivyo vyokwugururira imyango  ingingo ku bindi bicuruzwa, nk'isukari n'inzoga, navyo bibonwa nk'ibibangamira amagara y'abantu. Ivyapa biriko  zimwe mu mfungurwa aba-Swisse bakunda cane - vyerekanywe vyandiseko amajambo y'igabisha rikomeye ngo "ibi ni vyo bizoca bikurikira". Ariko abitavye amatora ivyo ntaco vyababwiye. Muri Swisse haharurwa abantu bashika 9.000 bapfa buri mwaka bahitanywe n'indwara zifatiye kw'itabi kandi  igisata c'amagara y'abantu gisohora amafaranga menshi yo kuvura bene izo ndwara. Biduza kandi amafaranga y'ubwishingizi, uwariwe wese ategerezwa gutanga, yaba anywa canke atanywa itabi. Imbere y'uko amatora aba, ibiharuro vyo kugereranya amajwi vyerekana ko 60% bari gushigikira  guca kwamamaza. Amaherezo babaye 56%, ariko n'ubundi bagumanye ubwiganze buhagije. Stefanie de Borba wo nw'ishirahamwe rya Swisse ryo kurwanya cancer yabwiye AFP ati: "Abantu baratahuye ko amagara ahambaye kuruta inyungu z'ubutunzi." Ubundi muri Swisse iyo abatora badatahura neza ico bahamagariwe gutora, baca bakurikiza impanuro ya reta. Ku yandi mategeko abiri bari bahamagariwe kwerekana aho bahagaze co kimwe no kuri iryo ryo guca kwamamaza itabi, reta yari yabahanuye gutora Oya, yamara yaratsinzwe. Ubu  abagize reta bakeneye akanya ko kwisuzuma niba bakiri ku murongo umwe n'abatora. Nk'uko umwe mu bandika uko babona ibintu aho muri Swisse yabivuze ku wa mungu: "Hageze guhitamwo hagati y'ubwigenge bw'ubutunzi n'amagara, abatora benshi bahisemwo ico ca nyuma…Haba uguca ukwamamaza, guca kunywa itabi canke itabi rizimvye, kunywa itabi ubu ntibigifise uruvugiro mu banyagihugu -bitandukanye no mu banyeporitike."

headline: Samuel Eto'o yahoze akinira Barcelona yemeye ko yanyereje ikori ry’imiriyoni 3.2 z’ama pawundi
text: Samuel Eto'o  yahoze ari umusatirizi wa Kameruni yemeye icaha co kunyereza umusoro ungana n’imiriyoni 3,2 z’amapawundi yakuye mw’igurisha ry’isanamu yiwe (droit à l'image /image rights) igihe yakinira Barcelona. Uyu yabaye umukinyi wa mbere wa Afrika w’umwaka incuro zine yaciriwe umunyororo urindirijwe (suspended prison/sursis) w’amezi 22 igihe yarengutswa imbere ya sentare muri Espagne ejo ku wa mbere. Ategerezwa kuriha aya mafaranga yose aheranye, hamwe n’ihadabu ry’imiriyoni 1.55 z’amapawundi. Abashingwamanza bagiriza Eto'o ko yananiwe no kumenyesha amatungo yiwe yavuye mw’igurishwa ry’isanamu yiwe hagati ya 2006 na 2009. Eto'o ni we mukinyi wundi aherutse gushirwa ku rutonde rurerure rw’abakinyi mvamahanga bakurikiranwa ku caha co kunyereza amakori muri Espagne muri ino myaka, harimwo Cristiano Ronaldo, Lionel Messi, Jose Mourinho na Neymar. Uyu munya-Kameruni w’imyaka 41, ubu akaba ari we arongoye ishirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru rya Kameruni, yinjiye muri Barcelona mu 2004 afise imyaka 23. Yarakiniye kandi Real Madrid, Inter Milan, Chelsea na Everton mu kiringo ciwe cose yamaze akina umupira w’amaguru, imbere y’uko akukuruka mu 2019. Yarengukishijwe muri sentare Ciudad de la Justicia i Barcelona ari kumwe n’uwahoze ari umuhagarikizi wiwe, Jose Maria Mesalles, nawe akaba yahawe umunyororo urindirijwe w’amezi 12 hamwe n’ihadabu. Sentare yabwiwe ko Eto'o yagurishije isanamu yiwe mw’ikompanyi ifise icicaro muri Hongrie/Hungary ariko yoyo ikaba yaramenyesheje amatungo yayo muri ico gihugu gifise amakori ari hasi. Eto'o yabwiye sentare ati: "Ndemera ivyo nagirizwa kandi nzoriha ivyo nishuzwa, ariko reka menyeshe ko nari nkiri umwana kandi ko nakurikiza ivyo uwahoze ari umuhagarikizi wanje Jose Maria Mesalles, nafata nka dawe, yansaba gukora ico gihe”.

headline: Colombia: kajugujugu y'umukuru w'igihugu Iván Duque yatewe amasasu
text: Kajugujugu yari ireruye umukuru w'igihugu ca Colombia yatewe amasasu igihe yariko izunguruka hafi y'urubibe ico gihugu gihana na Venezuela. Perezida Iván Duque yariko azunguruka mu karere ka  Cúcuta kari mu ntara ya Norte de Santander, ari kumwe n'umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi, uw'intwaro yo hagati, hamwe na buramatari w'iyo ntara. Umuvugizi w'ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu avuga ko ata n'umwe yahasize ubuzima canke yakomeretse. Perezida Duque ariyamiriza ico yita "igitero c'ubuhemu", anavuga ko ata bwoba atewe "n'ibi bikorwa bibi vy'iterabwoba". Mw'ireresi yacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, yavuze ati: "Igihugu cacu kirakomeye kandi Colombia irafise inguvu zihagije zo guhangana n'iterabwoba nk'iri". Yongerako y'uko inzego z'umutekano zahawe itegeko ryo guhiga abakoze iki gitero. Ikinyamakuru co muri ico gihugu Semana, candika ko abari muri iyo ndege bumvise ikintu gikubita imoteri y'iyo kajugujugu igihe yariko irururuka. Umuhari Armée de libération nationale/National Liberation Army (ELN) uzwi ko ari wo usanzwe urwanira mu karere ka Catatumbo kari ku rubibe Colombia ihana na Venezuela. Uyu muhari ELN washinzwe mu 1964 mu ntumbero yo kurwanya ubusumbane buri mw'isaranganya ry'ubutaka n'ubutunzi bw'ico gihugu umutungo, niho muhari w'inyeshamba ukomeye muri ico gihugu. Colombia, Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika hamwe n'Ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Buraya bifata ELN  nk'umuhari w'iterabwoba. Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, ELN yariyamirije amakuru yavuga ko ari yo yakoze igitero c'ubwiyahuzi hakoreshejwe ibibombe bitezwe mu modoka kw'ikambi ya gisirikare iri ahitwa Cúcuta. Ico gitero cakomerekeyemwo abantu 36, harimwo n'abahanuzi ba gisirikare b'abanyamerika.

headline: Marie-Louise Sibazuri: "Amasezerano y'ubumwe bw'Abarundi yaragize ico amara"
text: Uno munsi mu Burundi wari umunsi w'akaruhuko hibukwa imyaka 30 iheze hemejwe amasezerano y'ubumwe bw'Abarundi yari afise intumbero yo kurangiza indyane zishingiye ku bwoko, intara na politike. Ayo masezerano yashitsweko hamaze kuba ubwicanyi i Ntega na Marangara mu 1988. Ayo maseserano yemejwe itariki 05/02/1991, ni kimwe mu nkingi zigize ibwirizwa shingiro ry'u Burundi. Ariko kuva ico gihe ayo masezerano ntiyabujije ko izo ndyane ziguma zigaruka mu gihugu mu myaka yayakurikiye. Umwe mu bari mu mugwi wateguye ayo masezerano ni Madame Marie-Louise Sibazuri, azwi cane nk'umuhinga mu kwandika ivyese, ubu aba muri Australia. Yaganiriye kuri telephone na Cyriaque Muhawenayo, atangura amubaza niba asubije amaso inyuma abona hari ico ayo masezerano yamariye u Burundi n'Abarundi? (Umva ico kiganiro aho hejuru) Urashobora kandi gushima n'ibi:

headline: Igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi ku mugabane wa buraya 29.07.2022
text: Everton iriko iravugana na Paris St-Germain kugira igure umukinyi wo hagati wo muri Senegal Idrissa Gueye w'imyaka 32, bikaba vyitezwe ko ivyo biganiro bibandanya mu misi mike iri imbere.  (Fabrizio Romano) Nuno Tavares w'imyaka 22 arakorerwa ibipimo kuri uyu wa gatanu n'umugwi wa Marseille inyuma y'aho uwo mugwi wo mu Bufaransa ushitse ku masezerano yo kumutizwa na Arsenal.  (Fabrizio Romano). Marseille kandi yaratanguye ibiganiro vyo kuzana muri uwo mugwi umunye Chili Alexis Sanchez w'imyaka 33 ava muri Inter Milan. (L'Equipe) West Ham irabandanya ibiganiro na Eintracht Frankfurt ku mukinyi wabo w'umunye Serbia Filip Kostic, 29, ashobora gukina inyuma mu bubamfu. (90 min) Tottenham iriko iragerageza gutwara umukinyi w'imbere w'Ubutaliyano Nicolo Zaniolo, 23 akinira umugwi wa Roma,  yaronderwa kandi na Juventus. (Tuttosport) Barcelone ifise umugambi wo kugura umukinyi Sergio Reguilon, 25 wo mu mugwi wa Tottenham  mu gihe batoshobora kugura umukinyi w'inyuma mu bubamfu wo muri Espagne Marcos Alonso, 31, ari muri Chelsea. (AS) AC Milan yagiriraniye amasezerano na Charles de Ketelaereyahora ari mu mugwi wa Club Bruges, mu gihe uwo mukinyi w'umubiligi w'imyaka 21 yahora aronderwa kandi n'imigwi ya Leeds na Leicester. (90min) Umugwi wa Palmeiras uramaze kwankira incuro zibiri zose umugwi wa Ajax kugura umukinyi w'umunye Brezil Giovani w'imyaka 18. Uwo mugwi wo muri Hollande ukaba umugwanira na Newcastle hamwe Bayern Leverkusen. (ESPN) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Newcastle United n'Ubwongereza Kieran Trippier, 31, avuga ko yari kwimukira mu mugwi wa Manchester United mw'ici riheze, imbere yo gufata ingingo yo kuva muri Atletico Madrid akerekeza muri muri Newcastle mu kwezi kwa mbere. (Mirror) Umumenyereza wa Arsenal Mikel Arteta ntibagiye mu rukino rw'imbere y'uko ihiganwa nyezina ritangura rwabahuje na Brentford abikinyi Bernd Leno,30 wo mu Budagi ahamwe n'abanye  Espagne Pablo Mari,28 na Hector Bellerin, 27. Aho ni mu gihe vyitezwe ko abo batatu bimukira mu yindi migwi muri iri ci. (The Mirror) Umumenyereza wa Liverpool Jurgen Klopp yamiriye kure ibivugwa ko umukinyi w'imbere wa Brezil Roberto Firmino ashobora kuva muri uwo mugwi muri rino ci inyuma y'aho binuganugiwe ko uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 30 ashobora kuja mu migwi ya Juventus na Newcastle. Tottenham iriteguye kugurisha umukinyi Giovani lo Celso igihe hotangwa imiliyoni 17 z'amapawundi muri iri ci. Aho ni mu gihe imigwiVillarreal na Fiorentina iriko irerekana ko ikeneye uwo munye Argentine w'imyaka 26. (Athletic - subscription required). Manchester City yahaye uburenganzira umukinyi w'umwongereza w'imyaka 19, James McAtee bwo kwimukira mu wundi mugwi kw'ideni mu gihe imigwi ya Leeds United na Nottingham bivugwa ko imurondera. Kubera kubura amahera, Leicester yatsinzwe na Naples mu rugamba rwo kugura  umukinyi wa Korea y'Epfo Kim Min-jae w'imyaka 25 yahora akinira umugwi Fenerbahce.  (Football Insider) Umugwi wa Burnley uriko urarondera umukinyi wo hagati w'umunye Scotland Jack Hendry w'imyaka 27 akinira Club Bruges yo mu Bubiligi.

headline: Amakuru avugwa ahandi kw'isi kuri Covid-19
text: Ikompanyi y'u Bushinwa ihingura imiti, Sinopharm, itangaza ko yiteze kuba yakoze urucanco imbere 'yuko uyu mwaka urangira. Umukuru w'iyi kompanyi, Liu Jingzhen, yabwiye abanyamakuru ko uru rucanco ubu rugeze ku ntambwe ya gatatu rugeragezwa kandi ko ruzoshobora kuja kw'isoko imbere 'y'uko ukwa cumi  na kabiri kurangira. Gushika ubu incanco zirenga 200 ziriko zirageragezwa kw'isi, kandi izirenga 20 ubu ziri ku ntambwe yo kugeragerezwa ku bantu. OMS/WHO igabisha ko 'incanco ziriko zigunganywa n'ibihugu bimwe' Iki kiza kiriko kirunyurwa n'uko hari ibihugu biriko birigungana urucanco rwa Covid-19, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishami ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi. Mu nama yakorewe ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, umukuru wa OMS,  yavuze ati: "Muri kino gihe, igikenewe ni uko ibihugu vyose bikorera hamwe ku nyungu za buri gihugu - mu gihe hazoba hari uwudatekaniwe, nta n'umwe azoba atekaniwe". "Dukeneye kurwanya ko urucanco rwa Covid-19 rwigunganwa n'ibihugu kanaka". Urukino rwa mbere rwo kwugurura ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bufaransa, Ligue 1 rwari rutegekanijwe kuri uyu wa gatanu rwungururijwe ku wa 16 canke 17 z'ukw'icenda. Iyo ngingo ifashwe inyuma y'aho hari abandi bakinyi batatu ba Olympique de Marseille (OM) batangajwe ko banduye umugera, bakaba babaye bane bo muri uyo murwi banduye, vyumvikana ko urukino rwari rutegekanijwe n'umurwi wa Saint Etienne vyabaye ngombwa ko rwunguruzwa. Brezili ni kimwe mu bihugu bibangamiwe n'ikiza ca coronavirus, aho abamaze kuwandura baharurwa mu miliyoni zitatu n'inusu, nayo abarenga 100.000 bamaze gupfa. Umukuru w'ico gihugu Jair Bolsonaro yafashe minenerwe ingaruka z'iki kiza, aho yagifashe n'ibicurane bisanzwe. Mu kiganiro na BBC, icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu, Hamilton Mourão, yashigikiye ingendo yafashwe na leta, avuga ko n'aho igihugu catakaje abanyagihugu baco, leta iriko irakora igikorwa gikomeye. Abandanya avuga ko ubugaba buri mu banyabrezili aribwo bwatumye ingingo zo gutandukana zidakurikizwa. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi muri Argentine birengagije ingingo za guma mu rugo ku mugwa mukuru Buenos Aires  baja mu myiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza leta ejo ku wa mbere. No mu bindi bisagara kwari uko. Abari muri iyo myiyerekano bari bafise uburakari, bamwe biyamiriza ingene leta yafashe iki kiza. Leta y'ico gihugu yarafashe ingingo za guma mu rugo kuva ku wa 20 z'ukwa gatatu, ariko zikaba zagiye ziratezurwa mu gihugu hagati, ariko umukuru w'ico gihugu Alberto Fernández akaba yarakomeje izo ngingo ku mugwa mukuru Buenos Aires no mu micungararo yaho gushika ku wa 30 z'uku kw'umunani.

headline: Lionel Messi yaraye anganije na Pele ku gitsindo ca 643 atsindiye muri Barcelona
text: Lionel Messi yaraye yinjije igitsindo catumye anganya n'uwahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Brezili Pele ku bitsindo 643 mu murwi umwe gusa, igitsindo yinjirije Barcelona ejo ku wa gatandatu mu rukino rwarangiye uyu murwi unganya na Valencia ku bitsindo 2-2. Uyu musatirizi wa Argentine w'imyaka 33 yashitse kuri iyi ntambwe ku gitsindo yinjije n'umutwe imbere y'uko igice ca mbere kirangira, haciye akanya isase umunyegori Jaume Domenech wa Valencia akuyemwo penalty yiwe. Messi yinjije igitsindo ciwe ca mbere muri Barcelona mu mwaka wa 2005 igihe uyu murwi wariko ukina na Albacete. Pele yinjirije umurwi wa Brezili Santos ibitsindo 643 mu myaka y'inkino 19  hagati ya 1956 na 1974. Ariko rero ikibabaje kuri Messi, uwu munezero wari uvanze n'umubabaro kuko Barcelona yananiwe no gutsinda uyu murwi bari bahanganye. Ibi vyatumye uyu murwi umaze gutsindira ihiganwa rya Espagne La Liga incuro 26 zose urangiza urukino uri mu kibanza ca gatanu, ukaba uri inyuma ku manota umunani yose usumbwa na Atletico Madrid uri mu kibanza ca mbere, inyuma yo kwirahira Elche ku bitsindio 3-1. Umukeba wayo ruhebwa Real Madrid ari nayo ifise igikombe c'iri higanwa, isumvya Barcelona amanota atanu, ariko ikaba yiteze guhura na Eibar kuri uyu wa Mungu. Barcelona yabanje gukorwa mu maso ku munota wa 29 igihe umukinyi w'inyuma Mouctar Diakhaby abaciriye mu ryahumye akinjiriza Valencia igitsindo ca mbere ku mupira wari uterewe mu mfuruka z'ilkibuga. Valencia yabandanije ikingira urugo rwayo gushika mu minota yanyuma y'igice ca mbere aho Barca ironkeye penalty bigaragaye ko umukinyi Jose Gaya yasunitse Antoine Griezmann muri ca gice ca mukore umbone. Hagati aho, vyabaye ngombwa ko umuhagarikizi Alejandro Hernandez yifashisha bwa buhinga bwa videwo imbere y'uko yemeza ko koko habaye ikosa, maze Messi aca aja gutera uwu mupira wari kumwandikishiriza amateka. Ibi ntivyabaye muri ako kanya kuko umunyegori Domenech yari yahumaganye, akurayo iyo penalty. vyabaye ngombwa ko Messi arindira amasegonda makeya kugira ngo ashikie ku ntego yiwe, mu kwinjiza iki gitsindo mu minota imbere y'uko ifirimbi yo kurangiza igice ca mbere ivuga. Barcelona yariyongeye ica kabiri mu gice ca kabiri nyene, ku munota wa 52,cinjijwe ku buhinga bukomeye n'umukinyi wa Uruguay Ronald Araujo. Aba bakinyi ba Ronald Koeman babandanije basatira bikomeye kugira ngo barabe ko bokwiyambura Valencia, ariko rero ibintu vyagiye kwononekara ku mupira w'umuvuduko (contre-attaque) wa Valencia, watumye Maximiliano Gomez Gonzalez yinjiza igitsindo ca kabiri, ku munota wa 69,  gutyo baba baranganije 2-2, urukino rurinda rurangira ari uko.

headline: Amashirahamwe mvamakungu asabwa kwerekara ingene ubwoko buserukiwe, Amnesty International ifise amakenga
text: Ishirahamwe Amnesty International risaba leta y'u Burundi guhagarika ingingo yo gusaba amashirahamwe mvamakungu kwerekana ubwoko bw'abakozi bayo mu buryo bwo kwerekana ingene amoko aserukiwe. Kuri uyu wa gatanu, nico kiringo ntarengwa catanzwe n'ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati kuri ayo mashirahamwe ngo yerekane ingene bagiye baratanga akazi hisunzwe uburinganire hagati y'ibitsina n'amoko. Kubwa Amnesty International, ryaba ibwirizwashingiro canke amasezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha yo mu 2000, nta na hamwe havugwa ivyo uburinganire hagati y'amoko canke y'igitsina mu gisata cigenga. Avugana na BBC, Rachel Nicholson ajejwe ubushakashatsi muri iryo shirahamwe, avuga ko bafise amakenga kuko "ari ubwa mbere basavye ivyo biharuro bimenyerewe mu bisata vya leta n'umutekano". Wewe abona ko ari ukwinjirira birenze urugero itunganywa ry'ayo mashirahamwe mpuzamakungu. Ati: "Ikiduteye amakenga cane kurusha  ni uko umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati, hampande y'ugusaba ibiharuro vy'ingene amoko aserukiwe mu bakozi b'ayo mashirahamwe, yanasavye ko imbere y'amazina berekana ubwoko bw'umwe umwe wese mu bakozi bayo". Ku bw'iwe, "ko haba umugambi wo gukura ubwo busumbasumbane mu mashirahamwe ni ikintu ciza cane, kuko niyo ntumbero y'iyi ngingo". Ati:  "Ariko dufatiye ku ndyane n'amacakubiri vyagiye vyibonekeza muri kahise, gusaba ubwoko bw'umwe umwe wese ni ukurenga umurongo utukura". Mu 2017, leta y'u Burundi yarasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga amashirahamwe mvamakungu akorera mu Burundi, kandi yose yarateye igikumu kuri iryo tegeko, mu kwiyemeza ko agiye gukurikiza ibiri muri ryo. Kimwe mu vyo yiyemeje, harimwo ingingo ya 18 ivuga ko "Mu gutanga akazi ku bakozi bo mu gihugu ayo mashirahamwe azokwama yubahiriza ubungane hagati y'amoko n'igitsina, nk'uko biri mw'Ibwirizwashingiro ry'u Burundi". Umupfasoni Rachel avuga ko iryo tegeko riterekana neza ingene iyo ngingo itegerezwa gushirwa mu ngiro, n'aho leta yagiye ifata ingingo zitandukanye muri iyo ntumbero. Rachel ati: "Mu 2018, amashirahamwe mvamakungu yose yarahagaritswe ikiringo c'amezi atatu, asabwa gusaba no kwiyandikisha gushasha kugira ashobore kubandanya akorera mu gihugu. "Kimwe mu vyasabwa harimwo ko yerekana ingene mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu azoba yakosoye ubusumbasumbane hagati y'amoko mu gihugu". "Aho bitandukaniye muri kino gihe, ni uko umushikiranganji yategetse ko buri mukozi wese ategerezwa kwerekanwa ubwoko bwiwe, ivyo navyo bikaba bitari muri iryo tegeko rigenga amashirahamwe mvamakungu". Umupfasoni Rachel avuga ko leta iterekana neza ico izokoresha ayo makuru, akaba afise ubwoba ko ashobora gukoreshwa mu "kuvangura abantu mu buryo butandukanye". Mu masezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha yo mu 2000, abari mu biganiro barumvikanye ingene ubwoko bwoserukirwa mu nzego z'igihugu, cane cane mu butegetsi no mu gisirikare. Ivyo vyari kugira ngo ntihagire ubwoko na bumwe bwiganzira urwego kanaka nk'uko vyari bimeze mu butegetsi bw'imbere y'aho bwari bwiganziwe n'ubwoko bw'abatutsi. Hagati aho, mu gisata cigenga ntaco ayo masezerano yakivuzeko, ivyatumye ubusumbasumbane bwama bwibonekeza. Imwe mu ntumbero y'itegeko rishasha rigenga amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu akorera mu Burundi ryo ku wa 23/01/2017 ni ugukosora ubwo busumbasumbane bwibonekeza muri ayo mashirahamwe. Inyuma y'iryo tegeko, leta y'u Burundi yaremeje mu kwa gatanu kw'umwaka uheze integuro y'itegeko-bwirizwa rishinga umurwi uzoba ujejwe gutora abakozi bakora muri ayo mashirahamwe, mu ntumbero yo gukosora ubwo busumbasumbane. Kuva ubu, mu maraporo ayo mashirahamwe agiye kuza  aratanga uko amezi atandatu aheze, azokwama yerekana abakozi bayo, akazi kabo mw'ishirahamwe, igihugu avamwo, igitsina hamwe rero n'ubwoko. Ivyo vyerekanwa n'urwandiko ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati bwarungikiye ayo mashirahamwe kuwa 13 z'uku kwa kabiri ruvyerekana.

headline: Andy Mwag: Ivyo ndirimba muri 'Nisaidie Papa' vyambayeho
text: Umuririmvyi w'Umurundi Andy Mwag, aheruka gusohora indirimbo ziryoheye ugutwi, avuga ko mu vyo aririmba harimwo ubuzima bubi yaciyemwo. Ni indirimbo zivanzemwo ikirundi, ikinyarwanda igifaransa, icongereza hamwe n'igiswahiri, vyumvikana ko zitondewe muri studio wumvirije ingene zivuga. Andy Mwaga, asanzwe yitwa Ndabaneze Andre, yatanguye kuririmba mu mwaka w'2007. Kuri ubu aba mu gihugu c'u Rwanda kuva mu 2015 akaba yubatse afise n'abana babiri. Igihe yatangura kuririmba, yatanguriye mw'isengero, hanyuma nk'uko avyivugira aca aja muri "bands zisanzwe", n'ukuvuga imigwi y'umuziki itaririmba indirimbo z'Imana. Wumvirije neza indirimwo za Andy Mwaga, nk'indirimbo Get There canke Amarira, wumva umudiho ukwibutsa abaririmvyi ba rurangiranwa nka Lokua Kanza wo muri Kongo canke Ismael Lo wo muri Senegal. Kanatsinda Andy Mwag we nyene arivugira ko Lokua Kanza ari mu baririmvyi bamuhaye ingoga zo kuririmba, anafatirako mu kwandika ibihangano vyiwe. Wumvirije indirimbo nyinshi zisohoka muri iki gihe yaba mu Burundi canke mu Rwanda, usanga ahanini zibanda ku mudiho utambika, indirimbo za Andy Mwaga ziruhura amaguru kuko uca wumva ushaka kwicara ukumviriza, zigashika ku mutima. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC, Andy Mwaga avuga ko indirimbo yiwe ikunzwe Nisaidie Papa, yayanditse afatiye ku buzima bwiwe bwite. Nta vyinshi yabivuzeko ariko ababaye mu Burundi mu mpere y'imyaka y'1990, baribuka ko hibonekeje abana benshi bo mw'ibarabara ahanini kubera intambara. Ico gihe mu gisagara ca Bujumbura haradutse abana benshi baza barasaba mw'ibarabara uwo bahuye nawe wese, bavuga mu giswahili bati "Nisaidie papa" bisigura mu kirundi ngo "mfasha papa". Si kenshi mu karere haza abaririmvyi baririmba bigashika ku mutima, bazi umuziki (kuvuza ivyuma bitandukanye) kandi bafise igihagararo n'igikundiro. Niyabandanya ku murindi ariko, abakunzi b'umuziki nabo bakemera kumutiza ugutwi, nta nkeka ko Andy Mwaga ari mu bahagarariye kazoza keza k'umuziki wo mu Rwanda no mu Burundi.

headline: US na China bateranye amajambo akarishe mu biganiro barimwo muri Alaska
text: Intumwa za Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n'izo Ubushinwa zateranye amajambo akarishe mu biganiro vya mbere vyo ku rwego rwo hejuru hagati y'ubutegetsi bwa prezida Joe Biden n'Ubushinwa , biriko birabera Alaska. Intumwa z'Ubushinwa zagirije Amerika gukaburira ibihugu "gutera Ubushinwa", Amerika na yo ivuga ko Ubushinwa bushitse aho "kwiyerekana cane". Haheze imyaka imigenderanire hagati y'ivyo bihangange bibiri  imeze nabi cane. Amerika yiyemeje kuvuga ku bibazo biteye umutima uhagaze nk'ingene ubutegetsi bw'Ubushinwa bufata aba Islam b'aba Uighur  muri Xinjiang. Ivyo biganiro  vyatanguriye kw'isemo mbi  mu gisagara ca Anchorage birimwo umunyamabanga wa reta wa Amerika Antony Blinken n'umujenama ajejwe ibibazo vy'umutekano w'igihugu Jake Sullivan ku ruhande rwa Amerika, ku ruhande rw'Ubushinwa na ho hari uwuza imbere mu bategetsi bajejwe poritike yo hanze, Yang Jiechi n'umushikiranganji ajejwe imigenderanire Wang Yi. Ariko, umwe mu ntumwa za Amerika yavuze ko ibiganiro vyabandanije mu mw'ihererero vyari ''bifashe, bikomeye kandi bidaca irya n'ino" kandi bimara amasaha abiri yari ategekanijwe. Mw'ijambo ryeruye ryo kwugurura imbere y'uko ibiganiro bibandaniriza mu mw'iherero, Blinken yavuze ko Amerika ija "kuvuga amakenga dufise ku bikorwa vy'Ubushinwa , harimwo muri Xinjiang, Hong Kong, Taiwan, ubukozi bw'ikibi buciye kuri internet bukorerwa Amerika,  agacinyizo k'ubutunzi ku bihugu dukorana". Yavuze ati:"Kimwe kimwe cose muri ivyo bikorwa kibangamira ingendo ishingiye ku mategeko ituma isi igira amaragamo." Amwishura, Yang yagirije Amerika gukoresha ububasha bwayo bwa gisirikare n'amafaranga mu gucinyiza ibindi bihugu. Yongeyeko ati:"Irikika mu kiza ku citwazo c'umutekano w'igihugu kugira ibangamire urudandazwa rusanzwe, no gukaburira ibihugu bimwe bimwe guhanga Ubushinwa." Wang yavuze ko agateka ka zina muntu kari hasi cane muri Amerika, aho abirabure "bicwa". Sullivan yasubije, avuga ko ubutegetsi bwa Amerika butarondera intambara n'Ubushinwa, ariko yongerako ati: "Tuzokwama duhagararira ingingo tugenderako ku neza y'igihugu cacu, no ku neza y'abagenzi bacu." Uko guterana amajambo kwabaye imbere y'ibinyamakuru vy'isi yose, kwabandanije mu kiringo kirenga isaha. Ni kwo kwuguruye ibikorwa biba mu ncuro  zitatu, bikarangira kuri uyu wa gatanu (mu gitondo mu masaha ya Amerika). Ni vyo bikorwa vya mbere vy'intumwa zo mu rwego rwo hejuru bibaye hagati ya Amerika n'Ubushinwa kuva mu kwezi kwa gatandatu guheze - ku ntwaro y'uwahora ari umukuru w'igihugu , Donald Trump. Mu nyuma , intumwa za Amerika zagirije Ubushinwa guca kubiri n'ivyo bari bumvikanye ko amajambo yo kwugurura ibiganiro atorenza iminota ibiri kuri buri ruhande. Umwe mu bategetsi bo mu ntwaro yavuze ati:"Intumwa z'Ubushinwa… umenga zaje zifise intumbero yo kwiyerekana, zishira imbere ikinamico  aho kuja ku bintu bifadika". Uwo mutegetsi yavuze ko Amerika ija kubandanya ibiganiro nk'uko bitegekanijwe, yongerako ati  "gukavya mu gushikiriza amajambo  mu vy'imigenderanire akenshi biba bigenewe abo mu gihugu[c'uwuba ariko aravuga]". Mu nyuma mu kinyamakuru ca reta, intumwa z'ubushinwa zavuze ko ari Amerika, atari Ubushinwa, itubahirije ivyo bumvikanye mu kurenza iminota ibiri yo gushikiriza ijambo ryo kwugurura. Bwagirije abanyamerika "kubuvogera ata shingiro, muri poritike yabwo yo mu gihugu hagati no mumahanga". Mu ruhande rwiza, ico kinyamakuru casubiyemwo amajambo ya Yang avuga ko "ingorane zikomeye hagati y'Ubushinwa na Amerika zo muri kahise zidategerezwa kubandanya". Umunyamakuru wa BBC Barbara Plett Usher avuga ko ivyo biganiro ari akaryo ka mbere kuri prezida Biden ko kwerekana ingene agiye gukemura ikibazo Blinken yise "ikibazo ca mbere gikomeye c'inyungu n'imigenderanire mu kinjana ca 21". Uwo munyamakuru abandanya avuga ko Ubushinwa burondera ko ibintu vyosubira itoto inyuma y'aho imigenderanire ishikiye ku rugero rwa mbere rwo hasi ku ntwaro ya Trump. Wang yavuze ko ubutegetsi bw'Ubushinwa bwiteguriye kwugurura ''ibiganiro vyubaka." Ni vyinshi. Urudandaza nk'akarorero. Amerika yagiriza Ubushinwa ingendo itariyo, nko mu gufasha amahinguriro, kwiba ubuhinga bwakozwe n'abandi, kugumiza hasi agaciro k'ifaranga ryabwo no gushira inzitizi mu rudandaza. Ubushinwa na bwo bushaka ko ama taxes yashizweho n'intwaro ya Trump ku bidandazwa vy'Ubushinwa avanwaho. Bwagiriza kandi Amerika gucinyiza  ama kompanyi y'Ubushinwa ateye imbere mu buhinga bwa none, nka Huawei. Agateka ka zina muntu na demokrasi. Amerika yagiriza Ubushinwa ihonyabwoko ku ba Uighur mu ntara ya Xinjiang, guhonyanga demokrasi muri Hong Kong biciye ku mategeko mashasha y'umutekano. Ariko Ubushinwa busaba Amerika kureka kwivanga mu co bwita ibibazo vy'imbere mu gihugu, bukagiriza Amerika  ''kugaya" umugambwe w'aba Communiste uri ku butegetsi muri ico gihugu. Ubushinwa bushaka kandi ko ingabo za Amerika zo mu mazi zitabandanya kwinjira mu mazi y'ikiyaga ca  South China Sea , ubutegetsi bw'Ubushinwa bufata nk'igice c'igihugu cabwo.

headline: Iron Biby: umunya Burkina Faso yanditse amateka kw’isi mu guterura ikibuye kiremereye yakiriwe nk’intwari
text: Kuri uyu wa mbere, umunonotsi wa Burkina Faso yanditse amateka kw'isi yose mw'ihiganwa ryo guterura ibibuye biremereye ku wa gatandatu yakiriwe nk'intwari ku kibuga c'indege ca Ouagadougou, nk'uko iradiyo y'abafaransa RFI ibitangaza. Sheick Ahmed al-Hassan Sanou - azwi kw'izina rya Iron Biby - yiremetse ikibuye  gipima ibiro 229 (229Kg) yikoreye ku mutwe mu rukino rwa nyuma wa Giants Live World Tour Final muri Ecosse/Scotland, akaba yarushije uw'imbere y'aho yari yiremetse icapima 228kg. N'akamwemwe kenshi, Iron Biby igikombe ciwe yagituye Burkina Faso, akaba asubirwamwo na RFI avuga ko intsinzi yiwe itanga ubutumwa bw'umwizero. Ati: "Ni ikintu gikomeye kuri jewe, kubera namye ngerageza kwandika aya mateka kuva mu 2018". RFI isubiramwo amajambo asa n'aya nyene y'umushikiranganji w'inkino Dominique Nana. "Ibendera rya Burkina Faso ryatsinze."

headline: Uyghurs: ONU ivuga ko Ubushiwa bushobora kuba bwarakoze ivyaha vyo guhohotera ikiremwa muntu i Xinjiang
text: Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU riheruka kwagiriza Ubushinwa uguhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu gukomeye mu cegeranyo kirekire cari kirindiriwe igihe kinini kirimwo ibirego vy’ubugizi bwa nabi mu ntara ya Xinjiang. Ubushinwa bwihutiye gusaba ONU ko itosohora ico cegeranyo bwise ''ikinamico" ryateguwe n’ibihugu vya Bulaya bikomeye. Ico cegeranyo cihweza ivyagiriji vy'ihohotera rikorerwa abantu bo mu bwoko bw’aba Uyghur bo mw’idini rya Islamu n’abandi bantu bo mu bwoko bwa banyamuke ariko Ubushinwa burabihakana. Ariko abakoze amatohoza bavuga ko babonye "ivyemezo bidakekeranywa" vy'ikubagurwa bishobora gufatirwa ku rwego rw'ivyaha bihohotera ikiremwa muntu. Abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu bari bamaze imyaka baguma batabariza ku bibera mu ntara yo mu buraruko bushira uburengero, bavuga ko abantu barenga umuliyoni bo mu bwoko bw’aba Uyghur  bafunzwe ku nguvu mu rukurikirane rw’ico leta yise "ikambi irera igasubiza abantu mu ntumbero nziza’’. Mu makuru ya BBC ubwayo yo muri iyi myaka ya vuba, harabonetse impapuro - zirimwo n'iz'igipolisi zerekeye abo bapfunzwe - zisa n'izemanga ivyo bivugwa, hamwe n'ivyagiriji vyo gufata ku nguvu, kuboreza igufa hamwe no gucira umuntu imvyaro ku nguvu. Ariko icegerano ca ONU casanze "urugero rw'ifatwa ridakurikije amategeko hamwe no gupfunga hafatiwe ku bwoko abo mu moko y'aba Uyghur n'iyindi migwi igizwe ahanini n'aba-Islamu... rushobora gushirwa mu rwego rw'ivyaha mpuzamakungu, ku buryo bwihariye, ivyaha bihohotera ikiremwa muntu".  Babonye kandi ko: Ico cegeranyo gisaba Ubushinwa "gutanguza ubu bwa vuba intambwe zo gurekura abo bantu bafashwe bidakurikije amategeko bakakwa ukwishira ukizana kwabo". Beijing iza yamaze kwiyamiriza ibiri muri ico cegeranyo, umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bujejwe imigenderanire Wang Wenbin akaba yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko "ivyo vyitwa ko ari ivyashikirijwe ari irempenkanya rishingiye ku makuru atariyo ku mvo za politike". Inama mpuzamakungu y’aba-Uyghur yashimye ico cegeranyo yongera isaba ko amakungu yofata ingingo zihuta. "Naho leta y'Ubushinwa ihakana yivuye inyuma, ONU ubu yemeje icese y'uko ivyaha vy'agahomerabunwa biriko birakorwa", nk'uko vyavuzwe n'umuyobozi w'ikigo giharanira agateka k'aba-Uyghur (Uyghur Human Rights Project), Omer Kanat. Umunyamabanga w’ishirahamwe rijejwe agateka k’aba-Uyghur yavuze ko naho leta y’Ubushinwa yanka bikomeye kwemera ibiri mu cegeranyo, ONU yaremeje ku mugaragaro ko ivyaha bibabaje biriko biraba . Hariho abantu imiliyoni 12 bo mu bwoko bw’aba-Uygyur, bagizwe ahanini n’abari mw’idini rya Islamu baba muri Xinjang. ONU ivuga ko n’abatari mw’idini rya Islamu bashobora kuba barashikiwe n’ibibazo bivugwa muri ico cegeranyo. Amerika n’abashingamateka bo mu bihugu vyinshi bitandukanye baheruka kwiyamiriza ibikorwa vy’Ubushinwa bibera muri Xinjiang bavyita ihonyabwoko, ariko ONU ntiyashikanye aho. U﻿bushinwa - bwabonye iki cegeranyo kitarasohoka - buhakana ivyagiriji vyo guhohotera bukavuga ko ayo makambi ari uburyo bwo kurwanya iterabwoba. Ubushinwa bwamye buvuga ko impirimbanyi z’aba-Uyhgur ziri mw'isekeza ry’ubugizi bwa nabi mu kurondera kuba igihugu cigenga, ariko bwagirizwa gukavya mu kuvuga amabi bakora kugira bubone akaryo ko kubakandamiza. Abaserukiye Ubushinwa mu kanama kajewe agateka kazina muntu i Geneve ku musi wa kane barahakanye ibiri muri ico cegeranyo, bavuga ko kigayisha kikongera kigateza urubwa Ubushinwa, kikivanga no mu bikorwa vyo hagati mu gihugu.  The Xinjiang Police Files (Amadosiye y’igipolisi co muri Xinjiang) - izina ryahawe izo mpapuro n'ihwaniro ry’abanyamakuru mpuzamakungu barimwo n'aba BBC- nizo zashingiweko mu gukora igice kinini c'inkuru yakozwe na BBC ku ba Uyghur muri iyi myaka ya vuba. Aha, uwahoze ari umunyamakuru wa BBC mu Bushinwa John Sudworth aravuga bimwe mu vyo izi mpapuro zatumye bija ahabona. Ku ﻿rupapuro ruhambaye kurusha izindi muri izi zose, harimwo ko abapolisi bategetswe gukoresha ibirwanisho mu gihe hari uwutorotse. I﻿nkengeri igabisha iramutse ivuze, nk'uko izo mapuro zibivuga, amabarabara akikuje inkambi ategerezwa guca yugarwa, inyubako zose zikugarwa hanyuma abapolisi bafise ibirwanisho b'iyo nkambi "b'umugwi utera" bakarungikwa. I﻿sasu rigabisha rimaze kuraswa, hanyuma "umunyeshure" akabandanya agerageza gutoroka, itegeko riratomoye: rasira kwica. U﻿bushinwa burashimangira yuko buha aba-Uyghur babishaka kandi babishima hamwe n'izindi nkehwa z'aba-Turkic, inyigisho zibakura mu nzira y'iterabwoba hamwe n'ubutagondwa. U﻿biravye, ibi barimwo bihabwa isura y'ishure, aho usanga bafata ku mutwe inyigisho z'igishinwa hamwe no gusubiramwo amajambo ya propaganda (yerekana isura nziza y'igihugu). A﻿riko izi mpapuro zishitsa kure mu kwerekana ububi n'agahato bikoreshwa muri izi nkambi, bigamije gufata ico ari co cose cerekeye umuco w'aba-Uyghur, bakagisubiriza mu buryo bw'inguvu, no kwitangira umugambwe w'aba-Communistes. Ico cegeranyo camaze igihe kire kire gihanzwe amaso n'amakungu, ku buryo umukuru w'urwego rujejwe agateka ka zina muntu muri ONU, Michelle Bachelet, mu ndwi iheze yemeye ko "ingingo yo kugisora canke kutagisohora wari umutwaro uremereye cane". I﻿migwi imwe y'i Buraya na Amerika iharanira agate ka zina muntu yaravuze yuko Beijing yamuhimirije gukura muri ico cegeranya ibigaragara nabi, cane cane nyuma yaho gisibijwe gusohoka inshuro nyinshi. Bachelet yarashigikiye ukwo kugitevya avuga ko kurondera kuganira n'Ubushinwa ku bijanye n’ico cegeranyo bidasigura ko yari yirengagije ibiri muri co. Ariko Amnestie Internationale yavyise ikitababarirwa. Impera n'imperuka, ico cegeranyo carasohowe hasigaye iminota 13 ngo hahere ikiringo c'iwe c'imyaka ine mu mabanga. Kandi mugihe cakiriwe neza na benshi, hari abandi caciye intege - barimwo ikoraniro mpuzamakungu ry’aba-Uyghur. Zumretay Arkin umuvugizi waryo yavuze ko bari biteze ko Michelle ahagarara rugabo imbere y’Ubushinwa muri rusange. Olaf Wientzek, umuyobozi w’ishami ry'i Geneve ry'ikigo German Konrad Adenauer Foundation yagirije Bachelet ko "yirinze ingaruka" z’ishirwa ku mugaragaro ry’ico cegeranyo. Bachelet, hagati aho, yaragirije ibihugu bimwe kuba vyarahinduye iki kibazo kikaba politike, akavuga ko vyatumye "gukorana kugorana cane kandi... kuzana ukwizerana hamwe no kugira icoshikwako ku rubuga bigorana gusumba". U﻿bu amaso  ahanzwe ku bizokurikira mu nyuma. Impirimbanyi z’aba-Uyghur zasavye ko hajaho comisiyo itohoza, basaba kandi abakora urudandaza bose kw'isi guhagarika imigenderanire n'uwo wese afasha leta y'Ubushinwa mu bikorwa ikorera ba Uyghur. Tom Tugendhat, umushingamateka akaba n’umukuru w’umugwi w’inama nshingamatela y’Ubwongereza ujejwe ivy’imigenderanire n’amakungu, yavuze yuko ivyo iki cegeranyo cabonye birimwo "ibirego bikomeye cane" aniyamiriza ibivugwa na Beijing vy’uko ivyo vyagiriji birondera urwanko ku Bushinwa. Ubudage bwasavye irekurwa ry’aba-Uyghur bapfunzwe ata caha bagirijwe. Ariko, nta cizere c’uko hashobora kuba igitsure giturutse hagati mu Bushinwa: ikibazo c’ihonyangwa ry’uburenganiza bw’aba-Uyghur camye ari ikintu kitavugirwa ahabona kandi kigakumirwa cane mw’itangazamakuru – gushika ku wa kane w’indwi iheze, icegeranyo ca ONU nticari bwavugwe mu bitangazamakuru bikomeye mu Bushinwa canke ku mbuga nkoranyambaga.

headline: Eliud Kipchoge: Ashaka kuba uwa mbere yirutse marathon munsi y'amasaha 2
text: Umunonotsi rangiranwa wo muri Kenya Eliud Kipchoge, ashaka kuba umuntu wa mbere kw'isi yirutse marathon (42Km) munsi y'amasaha 2. Uwo muhigo azowugeragereza mu muji wa Vienne muri Autriche.

headline: Ku bakunzi b’amavuta y’amamesa, ibikuru vyo kumenya
text: Ni imfunguro itoroshe kwimbura, ariko kandi ubu ibangamiwe, nk'ibindi bidandazwa vyinshi, kubera intambara za Russia - Ukraine.

headline: Mali: Ama coups d'Etat yoba ariko yiyongera muri Africa?
text: Kuva Afrika yikukira,  igihe cose hagiye hibonekeza ingendo y'ugutembagaza ubutegetsi (coups d'Etat) vyamye bikorwa n'igisirikare mu bihugu bitandukanye. Ibiherutse kuba muri Mali ni akarorero ka hafi kerekana ingene igisirikare kigenda kigira uruhara mu biba - aho giherutse gutembagaza ubutegetsi ku ncuro ya kabiri mu kiringo kidashika n'umwaka. Mu gihugu kibanyi ca Niger, harabaye itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi ryaburujwemwo mu kwa gatatu hasigaye imisi mike ngo uwatsinze amatora y'umukuru w'igihugu yimikwe. None twohava tuvuga ko ingendo nk'iyi ya gisirikare ari yo yiganje kuri uyu mugabane? Zimwe mu nsiguro zitangwa kw'itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi ni uko ari igikorwa kitemewe n'amategeko gikozwe n'igisirikare (canke abandi bategetsi ba gisivire) mu kugerageza gukuraho abategetsi basanzwe bahari. Icigwa cakozwe n'abashakashatsi babiri bo muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Jonathan Powell na Clayton Thyne, cerekana ko kuva mumpera z'imyaka ya 1950 muri Afrika hamaze kuba ama coups d'Etat arenga 200. Hafi igice mu aya ma coups d'Etats zarakunze (réussis/successful) - izi nazo zikaba ari izashoboye kurenza imisi indwi. Burkina Faso muri Afrika y'Uburengero, nico gihugu kimaze kubamwo ama coups d'Etat menshi yakunze, aho indwi yose yakunze, imwe nayo ikaba ari yo yapfuvye/yaburijwemwo. Rimwe na rimwe, ababa bakoze ico gikorwa bakunze guca bihutira kuvuga ko atari itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi. Mu 2017 muri Zimbabwe, coup d'Etat ya gisirikare yomoye ku butegetsi Robert Mugabe ihagarika intwaro yiwe yari imaze imyaka 37. Umwe mu bari bayirongoye, Jenerali Majoro Sibusiso Moyo, yashikirije ijambo ku mboneshakure ahakana yivuye inyuma ko atari coup d'Etat ya gisirikare. Mu kwa kane uno mwaka, inyuma y'urupfu rwa Perezida Idriss Deby wa Tchad, igisirikare caciye gishiraho umuhungu wiwe nk'umukuru w'igihugu mfatakibanza arongoya intwaro mfatakibanza ya gisirikare. Abamurwanya bavuga ko ari "itembagazwa ryakozwe hagati y'abanyamuryango" (dynastic coup/coup d'État dynastique). Jonathan Powell avuga ko "Abarongoye iki gikorwa hafi ya bose bahakana ko igikorwa bakoze ari itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi mu ntumbero yo kwerekana ko biri mu mategeko". Mu myaka 40 hagati ya 1960 na 2000, ibitigiri vy'ama coups d'Etats ntivyahindutse aho hagiye haba ayababa ane buri mwaka. Kuva ico gihe, ibi vyaragabanutse aho mu myaka hafi 20 hagiye haboneka nka nk'abiri buri mwaka gushika 2019. Jonathan Powell avuga ko ibi bidatangaje uravye ingene ibihugu vya Afrika vyagiye bihura n'umutekano muke mu myaka yakurikiye ukwikukira. "Ibihugu vya Afrika vyagiye bica mu bihe vyorohereza ama coups d'Etat, nk'ubukene n'ubutunzi bwasubiye inyuma. Iyo mu gihugu habaye coup d'Etat, ni ikimenyetso ko n'izindi ziri inyuma" Ndubuisi Christian Ani wo kw'ishure kaminuza ya KwaZulu-Natal avuga ko imigumuko yo kwiyamiriza abategetsi baba bamaze igihe kirekire ku butegetsi batwaza umukazo yakunze kuba akaryo keza ko gutembagaza ubutegetsi muri Afrika. Ati: "N'aho imyiyerekano y'abanyagihugu yemewe n'amategeko kandi ari bo nyene baba bayirongoye, akenshi usanga kugira ngo ishike ku kintu bivana n'ingingo ifashwe n'igisirikare". Sudan nico ca mbere cabayemwo ama coups d'Etat menshi aho habayemwo 15 - atanu muri yo arakunda. Iyiheruka yabaye mu 2019 yakuye ku butegetsi Omar al-Bashirinyuma y'amezi atari make ico gihugu kirangwamwo imyiyerekano. Bashir we nyene ubwiwe yari yashitse ku butegetsi atembagaje ubwahahora mu 1989. Kuva 2015, mu ma coups d'Etat icenda yaharuwe kw'isi,  yose,  kiretse abiri gusa - Turquie (2016) na Myanmar (2021)-yabaye muri Afrika. Muri rusangi Afrika niyo yabayemwo ama coups d'Etat menshi gusumba iyindi migabane kw'isi. Ikurikirwa ka amerika y'ubumanuko habaye 95, muri yo 40 akaba yarashobotse.

headline: Burundi: Impano zinyegeje za Prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye
text: Abakoresha imbuga hwaniro benshi batamariwe babonye umukuru w'u Burundi, Evariste Ndayishimiye, mu mwambaro w'abatimbo, atera imvyino yongera avuza umurisho. Ku mafoto na za video vyahanahanywe ku mbuga hwaniro, Prezida Ndayishimiye aboneka ari ku nkiranya (ingoma ija imbere hagati) yambaye umwambaro ukwiye w'abatimbo (abakarazi mu kinyarwanda). Yambaye kandi n'ibisharizo bijana birimwo n'ikirezi, afise n'imirisho hanyuma agatera abandi batimbo nabo bakitabira. Umurisho uraheza ugatangura, Prezida Ndayishimiye, biboneka ko akanyamuneza kari kose, agatamba atarika agacishamwo akanasimba. Ku rubuga twitter rw'ikirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu, Ntare Rushatsi House, basiguye yuko Prezida Ndayishimiye yariko "arasozera akaruhuko ka leta". Ubwo butumwa bugira buti "mu gusozera akaruhuko ka leta, Prezida wa Republika aherekejwe n'umutambukanyi wiwe yagendeye ikibanza ca Gishora kugira ashike mu kibanza cubashwe c'Ingomba z'u Burundi zashizwe mu murage w'isi." Iyo nyandiko ibandanya igira iti "nk'umuvuzi w'ingoma abikunda kuva akiri muto, Prezida Ndayishimiye ntiyingingiwe kwifatanya n'abavuzi b'ingoma ba Gishora mu kuvuza umurisho kama w'akataraboneka." Ikibanza c'iteka ku ngoma z'u Burundi ca Gishora nico kibitswemo ingoma za Ruciteme na Murimirwa zimaze imyaka 119. Ico kibanza kandi carakoreshejwe nk'ingoro y'Umwami hakaba ari naho Umwami Mwezi Gisabo yashinze ibirindiro ariko arategura kwivuna igitero c'Abadage. Ingoma za Gishora kandi ziri muri bimwe biratirwa ijisho mu bukerarugendo mu Burundi. Muri urwo rwego nyene, Prezida Ndayishimiye yaheruka kugaragara kandi ku mbuga hwaniro, ari kumwe n'umuryango wiwe, agendera ibibanza bitandukanye vy'ubukerarugendo vyo mu Burundi, harimwo n'ibiyaga vyo mu buraruko bw'igihugu.

headline: Korea ya Ruguru ivuga ko misire zarashwe kwari ukwigana igitero ca nikleyeri kuri Korea y’Epfo
text: Korea ya Ruguru ivuga ko urukurikirane rw’ibisasu vya misire iherutse kurasa kwari “ukwigana” igitero ca nikleyeri kuri Korea y’Epfo. Ibi bibaye mu gihe igendereza rivuga ko Korea ya Ruguru iriko itegura kugerageza ikirwanisho cayo ca nikleyeri mu myaka itanu. Mu ndwi ziheze, Pyongyang (umugwa mukuru wa Korea ya Ruguru) yarashe ibisasu vya misire incuro indwi mu kwihora imyimenyerezo rusangi yariko ikorwa na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika iri kumwe na Korea y’Epfo. Kuri uno wa mbere, ibinyamakuru vya reta vyatangaje amakuru aramvuye avuga ko izo misire zari izo gutwara ibirwanisho bito bito vy’ubumara. Izi ni misire ziraswa hafi zikoreshwa ku rugamba. Bivuga ko abasirikare  bashoboye kwigana ibitero vyo ku birindiro vya gisirikare, ibivuko n’ibibuga vy’indege vya Korea y’Epfo, kandi ko ibi bisasu kwari ukugabisha Amerika na Korea y’Epfo. Itororokanirizo ry’amakuru KNCA ryegukira reta ryasohoye amasanamu y’indongozi Kim Jong-un ahagarikiye ibi bikorwa vyo kurasa ibi bisasu. Abategetsi barongoye ibisata vy’igendereza vya Amerika na Korea y’Epfo bavuga ko vuba Korea ya Ruguru ishobora kugerageza ikirwanisho c’ubumara ubwa mbere kuva mu 2017. Mu kwezi guheze, KimJong-un yatangaje ko Korea ya Ruguru ari igihugu gitunze ibirwanisho vy’ubumara “ubutagisubira inyuma” ica isubiramwo n’amategeko yayo, kugira ayihe uburenganzira bwo gukoresha ibirwanisho vy’ubumara mu kwikingira igitero kitaraba. Amategeko yahahora yavuga ko ishobora gukoresha ibirwanisho nk’ibi mu gihe honyene yoterwa. Vyinshi mu bisasu vyarashwe mu ndwi zibiri ziheze vyari bigizwe na za misire ziraswa hafi, vyaguye mu Nyanja iri hagati ya Korea ya Ruguru n’Ubuyapani. Ariko Korea ya Ruguru yararashe kandi ku wa kabiri  igisasu ca misire iraswa kure gica hejuru y’Ubuyapani. Muri uno mwaka, Korea ya Ruguru yageragereje misire ku birindiro bitandukanye harimwo ibitererwa kuri gari ya moshi no ku modoka ziri ku rugendo – ibi bigashobora gutuma bitoroha gusambura ibi birwanisho hakoreshejwe ibitero vy’indege, nk’uko abihweza ibintu n’ibindi babivuga. Ibisasu vyarashwe hagati ya 25 Nyakanda (9) na 09 Gitugutu (10) kwari ukwihora Amerika  yari yarungitse ubwato bwa nikleyeri USS Ronald Reagan mu mazi yo mu kigwa ca Korea, igakorana imyimenyerezo rusangi na Seoul hamwe na Tokyo. Abihweza ibintu n’ibindi bavuga ko Korea ya Ruguru iriko yihora Perezida Yoon Suk-yeol wa Korea y’Epfo yatowe mu kwa gatanu akaba yabandanije poritike yo guhangana na Korea ya Ruguru hamwe no gukomeza imigenderanire na Amerika.

headline: Isi iri mu bibazo bikomeye vya Covid, monkeypox n'intambara - OMS/WHO
text: Umukuru w'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi (OMS/WHO)  agabisha ko isi ihanganye n'ibibazo "bitoroshe", harimwo Covid, intambara yo muri Ukraine hamwe na monkeypox/variole du singe. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus yashikirije ibi mw'ijambo yavugiye i Genève/Geneva, aho abahinga b'iri shami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu bariko baganira ku ngwara y'icaduka ya monkeypox/variole du singe (ubundi variole mu kirundi n'ikinyarwanda ni ibihara, monkey/singe nayo ni inkende), imaze kwibonekeza mu bihugu 15 hanze ya Afrika. Abantu barenga 80 nibo bamaze kumenyekana ko banduye iyi ndwara i Bulaya, muri Amerika, Canada, Australia na Israel. Hagati aho, ingaruka ku banyagihugu benshi bivugwa ko zikiri hasi. Monkeypox/variole du singe - umugera ukunze kwibonekeza mu turere two mu misozi muri Afrika yo hagati n'iy'uburengero  - isa n'uko itoroherwa gukwirakwira hagati y'abantu kandi mu bisanzwe ni indwara itabangamye. Abantu bose bandura iyi ndwara bakira mu ndwi nkeya, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo c'Ubwongereza kijejwe amagara y'abantu, NHS. Iki kiza cahababuye abahinga, Ubwongereza bukaba bwasohoye ibwirizwa rishasha, aho buvuga ko abikekwa ko babonanye n'abanduye bokwitaramura mu kiringo c'indwi zitatu. Ku wa gatanu, Ububirigi cabaye igihugu ca mbere catangaje ikiringo c'indwi zitatu co kwitaramura ku bantu banduye. Ikinyamakuru Guardian kivuga ko mu Bwongereza hitezwe ko abandi banduye batangazwa kuri uno wa mbere. Mw'ijambo ryo kwugurura ikoraniro ry'ishiraahamwe OMS arongoye ku wa Mungu, Dr Tedros yavuze ati: "Ni vyo koko, ikiza karanda ca Covid si co kibazo conyene gihanze isi yacu. "Muri kano kanya turiko turavuga bagenzacu kw'isi yose bahanganye n'ibiza vya Ebola muri Repuburika ya Demokrasi ya Congo, monkeypox n'indwara y'igitigu tutazi ico ivako hamwe n'ibibazo vy'imibereho y'abanyagihugu muri Afghanistan, Ethiopia, Somalia, Sudani y'Epfo, Syria, Ukraine na  Yemen. "Duhanganye n'uruvangatirane rw'indwara, kigoyi n'intambara,  bitewe n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere, ubusumbasumbane n'ugukebana muri poritike z'igihugu". OMS yari yavuze ko hari abandi bikekwa kwandura monkeypox bariko bakorwako amatohoza  - ariko akaba ata bihugu yavuze  - ikagabisha ko hashobora gutangazwa n'abandi banduye. Inyuma y'aho habonekeye umuntu wa mbere yanduye iyi ndwara mu Bwongereza, umugera waciye utangura gutorwa i Bulaya hose - aho ibisata bijejwe amagara y'abantu muri Espagne, Portugal, mu Budagi, mu Bubirigi, mu Bufaransa, mu Buholande, mu Butaliyano no muri Suede vyatangaje ko vyatoye abanduye. Abandi banduye batangajwe muri Autriche n'Ubuswisi ejo ku wa Mungu. Igisata kijejwe gukinga indwara mu Bwongereza (Health Security Agency, UKHSA) kivuga ko kimaze gutora abantu 20 banduye gushika ubu, umuhanuzi mukuru waco ajejwe ubuvuzi Dr Susan Hopkins akaba yabwiye ikiganiro Sunday Morning  ca BBC  ati:  "Tubandanya dutora abandi banduye ku musi ku musi". Avuga ko uwu mugera uriko urakwiragira mu bantu - aho abatowe banduye batigeze babonana n'umuntu n'umwe yagendeye Afrika y'Uburengero, aho iyi ndwara isanzwe yariraye. Ariko, Dr Hopkins avuga ko ingaruka ku banyagihugu muri rusangi zikiri "ntoya cane", aho abenshi mu bamaze gusanga baranduye ari abo mu bisagara bimwe bimwe hamwe n'abo muri wa murwi w'abahuza ibitsina babisangiye. N'aho ata rucanco rwihariye rwa monkeypox ruraboneka, ibihugu bitari bike bivuga ko biriko biregeranya incanco z'ibihara, zikora ku rugero rwa 85% mu gukingira umuntu kuko iyi migera ibiri isa. Ntibiratomoka neza igitumye iki kiza caduka ubu. Kimwe mu bishoboka ni uko umugera ufise kuba warihinduye ukuntu, n'aho ata vyemezo bikomeye vy'uko ari umugera wihinduye. Iyindi nsiguro ni uko umugera wisanze mu kibanza nyaco mu gihe nyaco co kugwirirana. Monkeypox ishobora kandi kwiyongera mu buryo bworoshe gusumba uko vyari bimeze muri kahise, igihe urucanco rw'ibihara rwakoreshwa ahantu henshi.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Kane, Neymar, Ronaldo, Varane, Aguero, Bailly, Martinez
text: Umusatirizi w'Umwongereza  Harry Kane w'imyaka 27 yipfuza kuguma mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza, Premier League, ariko agashaka kuja muri  Manchester United canke Manchester City mu gihe yoshaka kuva muri Tottenham. (Independent) Umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Brésil/Brazil, Neymar ubu afise imyaka 29, avuga ko amasezerano yomutuma abandanya akinira Paris St-Germain "atakiri ikibazo" kandi ko yumva "amerewe neza cane" muri uno murwi watsindiye ihiganwa ry'umwaka uheze mu Bufaransa. (ESPN Brazil, via Goal) Manchester United iripfuza kugarukana umusatirizi wa  Portugal Christiano Ronaldo ubu afise imyaka 36 akaba asanzwe akinira Juventus, ikabona ko yoshobora kumuguza n'umukinyi wo hagati w'umufaransa Paul Pogba w'imyaka 28 agasubira muri Juventus. (Calciomercato - in Italian) Manchester United kandi irashaka ko mu ci yoshika ku masezerano yoyituma igura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Real Madrid n'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubufaransa Raphael Varane. Real iharura ko uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 27 ari ku giciro c'imiriyoni hafi 83 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Mail) Manchester United na Chelsea ziripfuza kugura umukinyi w'imbere wa Juventus, umunya Argentine Paulo Dybala w'imyaka 27. (Tuttosport - in Italian) Tottenham iribaza ko umumenyereza wa Wolves Nuno Espirito Santo ashobora gusubirira Jose Mourinho asanzwe ayimenyereza muri kino gihe. (Express) Chelsea iripfuza cane kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Atletico Madrid umunya Uruguay Jose Maria Gimenez w'imyaka 26, ariko kandi ikipfuza umufaransa Jules Kounde w'imyaka 22 asanzwe akina muri Seville. (La Razon - in Spanish) Real Madrid iracafise icizere ko izoshobora kugura umusatirizi w'umufaransa Kylian Mbappe mu ci riza, ariko uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 22 ntakibuza ko ashobora kwigumira mu mugwi wiwe Paris St-Germain. (Goal) Barcelona igiye kurondera umusatirizi wa Manchester City Sergio Aguero w'imyaka 32, amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi akaba azorangira mu ci riza, ariko ntibona ko izoshobora kumuriha umushahara yipfuza w'imiriyoni 10 z'ama Euros ku mwaka ziriko zitangwa na Juventus.(Sport) Everton irashaka kugura umukinyi Max Aarons akina muri Norwich City no mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza w'abatarenza imyaka 21, ariko rero irashaka ko igiciro ciwe kingana n'imiriyoni 41 z'amadorari kigabanuka. (Times - subscription required) TottenhamSpurs iriko irarondera umusatirizi wa Autriche Sasa Kalajdzic w'imyaka 23 ubu asanzwe akina muri Stuttgart. (Eurosport) Boca Juniors iriko irarondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal Lucas Torreira. Uyu munya Uruguay w'imyaka  25 ubu asanzwe akina muri  Atletico Madrid aho yatijijwe akaba adashaka kwimukira burundu muri uwo murwi. (TyC Sports - in Spanish) Leeds iriko irarondera kugura umukinyi w'umufaransa Romain Perraud w'imyaka 23 asanzwe akina inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu mu mugwi  Brest, ariko iriko imurwanira na  Lyon. (Mail) Leeds iriko irihweza ingene yogura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Sampdoria umunya Gambia Omar Colley w'imyaka 28.. (Tuttomercato - in Italian) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Côte d'Ivoire Eric Bailly ubu afise imyaka 27 nta mugambi afise wo gutera igikumu ku yandi masezerano na  Manchester United akaba ashaka kuva muri uyu mugwi mu ci riza. Amasezerano yiwe n'uyu mugwi azorangira mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'umwaka uza.  (ESPN) Aston Villa iriko yitegura kwakira ibifaranga vyinshi ku munyegori wayo Emiliano Martinez mu ci riza. Uyu munya Argentine w'imyaka 28 avugwa ko yoba ariko araronderwa na Manchester United. (Football Insider) Valencia yemeye guha Wolves umukinyi wayo akina ku ruhande, umunya Portugal Goncalo Guedes w'imyaka 24. (Mail) Fulham, Monaco na Genk ziriko rirarondera umusatirizi wa Chelsea umwongereza Ike Ugbo w'imyaka 22, asanzwe yaratijijwe muri Cercle Bruges yo mu Bubirigi. (Goal)

headline: Covid-19: Ubwoko bwayo bwo mu Buhinde bwashitse muri Uganda
text: Uganda yatangaje ko yagaragayemwo ubwoko bushasha bwa Covid-19 bwo mu gihugu c'Ubuhinde, uwuyirwaye akaba ariko aravurwa. Ibipimo vyafashwe kuri uwo muntu itariki 26 z'ukwezi kwa gatatu, akaba ariko aravurirwa mu bitaro vya Mulago National Referral Hospital. Uganda iramaze kugaragaramwo kandi ubwoko bushasha bw'ico kiza bwo muri Nigeria, Ubwongereza na Afrika y'epfo. Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa w'ikigo co muri Uganda kijejwe indwara zandukira, Dr. Pontiano Kaleebu, yavuze yuko gushika ubu Uganda imaze kubonekamwo umuntu umwe gusa afise ubwo bwoko bushasha  bwa Covid-19 bwo mu Buhinde. Ubu bwoko bushasha vyemejwe ko bwatowe muri Uganda mu gihe igihugu c'Ubuhinde co muri Aziya bukomakomwo  gihanganye n'umupfunda wa Covid-19 ugira kabiri, umaze gusasika inganda mu miji minini minini. Vyateje ikibazo gikomeye c'amagara mu gihe ibitaro vyaherewe n'ibibanza vyo kwakira abarwayi, gufuba abahasize ubuzima navyo ubu bikaba bibera mu bibanza vy'ahasanzwe hasigwa imiduga (parking). Kaleebu yavuze yuko ubu bagiye kwibanda ku gukumira hamwe no gupima cane  ku mbibe za Uganda. Iki gihugu caratanguje umuce wambere wo gukingira abanyagihugu  Covid-19 mu kwezi kwa gatatu, nyuma yo kuronswa inkingo 864.000 za AstraZeneca zivuye mu mugambi wa Covax, hamwe n'izindi 100.000 zavuye mu Buhinde. Abahereweko gukingirwa mu muce wambere ni abakora akazi gatuma bagira ivyago vyinshi vyo  kwandura barimwo abakora mu vy'amagara y'abantu, abasirikare, abapolisi hamwe n'abigisha. Harimwo kandi n'abafise indwara zituma abasoda b'umubiri bagabanuka, kuva ku myaka 18 kurenga co kimwe n'abakuze cane. Ariko abemera kwikingiza ni bakeyi cane. Abashika 304.000 gusa nibo bamaze kwiteza urukingo rwa mbere gushika ubu. Uganda yatanguye kworosha amategeko ya guma-muhira mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu mwaka uheze, ariko ingingo zo kwikingira nko kwambara agapfuka-munwa hamwe no kutegerana cane, zubahirizwa gake cane.

headline: Woba utewe impungenge n'urukingo rwa Covid-19? Izi ni inyishu ku bibazo woba ufise
text: Ibibazo vyibazwa kenshi n'abatinya urukingo rwa Covid-19 hamwe n'inyishu zogutuma ugabanya impugenge.

headline: Raheem Sterling asaba ko ubwoko bw'inkehwa buserukirwa mu bamenyereza n'abarongozi ba FA
text: Raheem Sterling, umukinyi rurangiranwa w'umurwi Manchester City be na nserukiragihugu w'u Bwongereza avuga ko mu gihe abirabure bataragira ikibanza gikwiye mu mupira w'amaguru urugamba rwo kurwanya ivangura ataho ruzoshika. Avuze ivyo inyuma y'urupfu rw'umunyamerika w'umwirabure George Floyd rwatumye no mu Bwongereza abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi biha amabarabara mu myiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza ivanguramoko. Sterling avuga ati: "Imyiyerekano ni intango ikomeye kugira ngo akamo kawe kumvirwe". "Ariko kwiha amabarabara vyonyene ntibihagije kugira ngo muri kino gihugu habe ihinduka". Avugana na BBC mu kiganiro Newsnight, uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 25 yongeyeko ati: "Vyose bivana n'ingene tuvyifashemwo kuva ubu". "Ikintu nyamukuru ni ugushira ibintu ku mugaragaro, ihinduka rikenewe mu gihugu, hanyuma rero tugakora kugira ngo ribe. Twavugije induru kuva kera, ubu hageze aho tubishira mu ngiro". Sterling avuga ko ari nkenerwa ko Abirabure, Abanyaziya hamwe n'izindi nkehwa baserukirwa bikwiye mu nzego nyobozi no mu nzego z'abamenyereza mu mupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza. Avuga ko n'abahoze ari abakinyi muri uyo murwi  nabo boronswa ku rugero rungana ikibanza muri ico gisata. Agira ikigereranyo ku bahoze ari abakinyi b'u Bwongereza ingene bahawe akaryo ko kumenyereza: Frank Lampard amenyereza Chelsea, Steve Gerard amenyereza Rangers abo bakaba ari abazungu, hamwe n'abirabure Sol Campbell na Ashley Cole. Uyu mukinyi yabaye icugazo c'umurwi Arsenal, Sol Campbell yabaye umumenyereza w'imirwi yo mu vyicaro vyo hasi, Macclesfield na Southend  imirwi itanazwi. Mugenziwe Ashley Cole bakinanye muri Arsenal yagenywe kumenyereza umurwi w'abana bari musi y'imyaka 15 ba Chelsea aho ahagarikiye gukina. Sterling avuga ati: "Abamenyereza dufise mu mupira w'amaguru: hari Steven Gerrard, ng'uyo Frank Lampard, ng'abo Sol Campbells na Ashley Cole. Bose bari abakinyi rurangiranwa, kandi barakiniye umurwi nserukiragihugu w'u Bwongereza". "Kandi rero bose, bararonkejwe inyigisho zo gushobora kumenyereza ku rwego rwo hejuru, ariko abataronkejwe akaryo nyako ko kuba abamenyereza ni abo birabure". "Ihinduka rikomeye, ni uko abantu bokwubahuka kuvuga mu nama nshingamateka, mu nzego zirongoye imirwi y'umupira w'amaguru mu gihugu, inzego zirongoye umurwi nserukiragihugu, kugira ngo habe impinduka zotanga akaryo ko kuba abamenyereza, atari ku birabure gusa, ariko no ku zindi nkehwa". "Guha akaryo nyako, atari abamenyereza gusa b'abirabure, ariko n'abo bose bakora no mu bindi bisata. Nibaza ko ari co kibuze hano, si ukuja mw'ibarabara gusa, ni no guha abantu ivyo bafitiye uburenganzira". "Mw'ihiganwa rya Premier League, turi hafi abakinyi 500 kandi ica gatatu c'abo ni abirabure mu gihe atabo dufise baduserukira mu nzego, nta n'abo dufise baduserukira mu bamenyereza". "Nta bantu benshi mushobora kwunga imigenderanire ya hafi kugira ngo muganire muhuza". Mu 2018, ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza, FA , ryamenyesheje ko ibice 5% mu nzego hamwe na 13 % mu bamenyereza vyari bigizwe n'abakozi b'abirabure, abanyaziya n'izindi nkehwa. Mu mugambi wo kurwanya ubusumbasumbane, FA itegura ko uwo murwi woba userukirwa ku bice 11% mu nzego nyobozi, hamwe na 20% mu nzego z'abamenyereza gushika mu 2021.

headline: Theodore McCarrick yahoze ari kardinali muri US arahakana ivyo gufata ku nguvu yagirizwa
text: Uwahoze ari kardinali wa Ekleziya Katorika muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arahakana ivyaha yagirizwa vyo gufata ku nguvu umwana w'umuhungu w'imyaka 16 mu myaka ya 1970. Theodore McCarrick, 91, yarengutse imbere ya sentare i Massachusetts kugira yisigure ku vyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu no gukubagura (coups et blessures) yagirizwa ko yakoze mu 1974. Uyu mu kardinali yahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Washington DC azwi ko ari we mutegetsi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru wa Ekleziya Katorika muri Amerika yagirijwe ivyaha vy'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina. Imbere y'aho yahora avuga ko atibuka ko hoba hari ivyo guhohotera yoba yarakoze. Mu rubanza rwashinzwe mu kw'indwi, McCarrick yaragirijwe ivyo gukwegakwegera uyo mwana w'umuhungu - ariko atavuzwe izina -  mu buhumbu, mu kiringo c'imyaka itari mike. Uyu mugabo avuga ko yakorewe aya mabi yavuze ko igihe kimwe vyabaye mu gihe yari mu bugeni bwa mwenewabo kuri kaminuza ya Wellesley muri Massachusetts mu 1974. Nyene gukorerwa aya mabi avuga ko McCarrick yamukwegeye mu cumba kimwe co muri iyo kaminuza aca atangura kumukuyakuya. Inyuma yaho, uyo mupatiri avugwa ko yaciye abwira uyu mugabo kuvuga ibisabisho kugira ngo akire "ibicumuro". Muri sentare ku wa gatanu, McCarrick yategetswe kutavugana n'uyu nyene guhohoterwa canke n'umwana n'umwe. Yasabwe gutanga ingwati y'ibihumbi 5000 vy'amadorari y'abanyamerika, mu gihe bitegekanijwe ko asubira kwumvirizwa ku wa 28 z'ukw'icumi. Buri caha gishobora guhanishwa umunyororo wo gushika ku myaka itanu, kandi agategerezwa kwandikwa ku nguvu nk'umusambanyi (délinquant sexuel/sex offender) McCarrick ni umwe mu bategetsi ba Ekleziya Katorika bagirizwa gushurashuza abana mu kiringo c'imyaka mirongo. Mu 2019, yarakuwe mu mabanga inyuma y'amatohoza yakozwe na Vaticano ku vyaha yagirizwa vyo gufata ku nguvu mu myaka itari mike. Yaragirijwe kandi ko yafashe ku nguvu umuyabaga i New York hagati mu myaka ya 1970, yongera ahatira abagabo kuryamana nawe mu rugo i New Jersey mu gihe bariko bigira ubupatiri. Icegeranyo c'impapuro 450 ca Vaticano casanze Papa Yohani Paulo wa kabiri yarabwiwe ivyerekeye ibi vyagirizwa McCarrick, ariko agahitamwo kwizera abepiskopi ba Amerika bamukingiye ikibaba. Casanze kandi Papa Benoit/Benedict XVI - yatanze imihoho mu 2013 - ashobora kuba yaranse iciyumviro co gukora amatohoza kubera ata "vyemezo vyari bihari" ku vyo yagirizwa.

headline: Burundi: Fabien Banciryanino yagirijwe amajambo mabi cane kuri Nkurunziza
text: Uwahoze ari umushingamateka Fabien Banciryanino yarengukishijwe imbere y'umushikirizamanza mukuru i Bujumbura, yagirizwa amajambo mabi cane 'kuri perezida Nkurunziza',  imbere yo kujanwa mw'ibohero rya Mpimba nk'uko umushingwamanza abivuga. Banciryanino yari mu nama nshingamateka yahejeje ikiringo, azwi cane ko atarya umunwa mu kunegura ubutegetsi bw'Uburundi mu vyiyumviro yashikiriza muri iyo nama. Umushingwamanza wiwe, Christophe Nkeringanji, yabwiye BBC ko yagirijwe ivyaha bitatu birimwo amajambo yashikirije mu nama nshingamateka "y'uko abategetsi bishe abantu ku ntwaro y'umuhisi prezida Pierre Nkurunziza". Uruhande rwa reta nta co ruravuga kw'ipfungwa n'ivyaha uyu yahoze ari umushingamateka yagirizwa.
