Banciryanino yahagaritswe ku wa gatanu w'indwi iheze afatiwe ku muhana iwe muri zone Ngagara mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, aho yari agiye kugirana ikiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru. Gushika kuri uyu wa kane yari akiri mu gasho arindiriye ko amatohoza arangira. Inyuma yo kwumvirizwa n'umushikirizamanza, umushingwamanza wiwe Christophe Nkeringanji yabwiye BBC ati: "Bamaze kumuhagarika, baramupfunze vy'agateganyo, ubu bamujanye ku Musaga [mw'ibohero rya Mpimba]." Bwana Nkeringanji avuga kandi ko bamwagirije ivyaha bitatu ari vyo; "Rébellion (ikirobere), gushaka guhungabanya umutekano w'igihugu, n'amajambo mabi cane ahungabanya uwundi." Ati: "Mu bisanzwe ntiyashobora gukurikiranwa ku bintu yavuze ari mu mirimo yo guserukira abanyagihugu kuko amategeko ategekanya ko ata mushingamateka ashobora gukurikiranwa ku kintu yavugiye mu nama nshingamateka kuko aba ariko avugira abantu bamutoye." Igihe inama nshingamateka yariko iriga integuro igenera uturusho n'icubahiro umuhisi prezida Pierre Nkurunziza mu mpera z'ubutegetsi bwiwe, Banciryanino yavuze ko Nkurunziza adakwiriye ivyo vyubahiro, ko ahubwo "akwiriye gushikirizwa ubutungane" akabazwa amabi yabaye ku ntwaro yiwe. Mu gihe yari akiri mu mabanga y'ubushingamateka, Fabien Banciryanino kandi yaranditse amakete amenyesha reta urutonde rw'abantu banyurujwe n'abandi bishwe, asaba ko hokorwa amatohoza ata ho ahengamiye. Uwumuburanira avuga ko imbere y'umushikirizamanza, Banciryanino yabajijwe ibintu bitandukanye birimwo ikiganiro yari agiye kugirana n'abanyamakuru kigahagarikwa n'umukuru wa zone ya Ngagara. Nkeringanji avuga ko Banciryanino yari yandikiye inzego zose zibijejwe asaba uburenganzira bwo gutanga ico kiganiro anamenyesha aho cari kubera, ariko ko batamwankiye kandi batamwemereye. Uyu amwunganira avuga ko ubu hazoca n'imiburiburi iminsi 14 kugira ngo "ashikirizwe abacamanza bemeze niba azoguma aburana yidegemvya canke azoburana apfunzwe."

headline: Tokyo Olympics: Umunonotsi w'umunya-Namibia avuga ati 'Ntushobora kumbwira ngo ubu sindi umugore'
text: Beatrice Masilingi  w'umunya-Namibia ariko aritegurira igihe ciwe ca mbere gikomeye cane mu mwuga wiwe w'inkino  ubwo amaze gusubiza umutina hamwe inyuma yo guhungabana cane. Uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 18 avuga ko anezerewe cane no kuzohiganwa ku metero 200 mu bagore mu nkino za Tokyo 2020 aho isemo ya mbere yo kurobanura  iba kuri uyu wa mbere. Ariko kwiruka imetero 200 yabihisemwo ubugira kabiri yari asanzwe yiteguriye 400 aho yagaragara nk'umwe mu bohiganirwa umudari inyuma yo kugira umwanya wa gatatu wa mbere mwiza cane uyu mwaka ku ma sekunda 49,53. Ariko  akanyamuneza k'uko azokwitaba inkino Olympics ntikatevye kuko urwego ruraba inkino z'abanonotsi kw'isi World Athletics rwaciye rumumenyesha ko atazohiganwa kuri  400m kubera urugero rwiwe runini rw'inkabuzo (umusemburo) ya testosterone. Yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati: ''Mu ntango vyarampungabanije cane. Ntushobora kuza ngo umbwire ngo ubu si nndi umugore. Birababaza cane kandi biranshavuza ariko ntaco turi bubikoreko muri uyu mwanya". "Vyaranciye intege, kandi vyari bibabaje cane. Nari niteguriye ihiganwa ryanje rya mbere rya Diamond Leagye igihe namenya iyo nkuru." "Ni akarenganyo kuko ntushobora kwitega ko abantu bose bamera kumwe, abantu bose ngo bagire ubushobozi bumwe, tuvuka dufise ubushobozi butandukanye, ntiduhobora kumera co kimwe, ntibigira umutwe n'amaguru". Masilingi yamenyeshejwe muri  kwezi kw'indwi na World Athletics ko urugero rwiwe rwa testosterone rurenze urwemewe ku bakinyi b'abagore bashaka guhiganwa ku birere  biri hagati ya 400m na mile imwe (1600m), kiretse bemeye gufata imiti  igabanya iyo nkabuzo  mu kiringo c'amezi atari munsi y'atandatu. Ariko n'uho vyamugendeye uko, uwo muyabaga  yiteguriye gukora ibishoboka vyose muri izo nkino za Olympics. Masilingi yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati: "Ndaryohewe cane, n'ikintu nashaka gushikako cane ariko sinari niteze ko nogishikako ku myaka mfise". Kugira  icifuzo ciwe c'inkino za Olympic ntikumujane Masilingi na mugenziae Christine Mboma nawe yakozweko n'izo ngingo, baciye bafata ingingo yo kwitegurira guhiganwa kuri 200m n'ubwo hari hasigaye amayinga make gusa ngo inkino zibe. Umumenyereza w'abo bakobwa babiri Henk Botha avuga ati: "Birumvikana ko ivyo vyadusubije inyuma cane. Vyabaye ngombwa ko  dukora cane kugira tumenyere gushasha kandi tugerageze uko dushobora kwose kandi ndashima cane ingene abo bakobwa bariko baravyitwaramwo n'ingene bariko barakora". Masilingi ntashaka kuvuga ico yibaza kuzoshikako mu nkino za Olympic ariko aranezerewe cane no kuzohiganwa n'ubwo ivyashitse vyari vyabanje kumuca intege. Avuga ati: "Ndacafise ayandi mahirwe. Ndacafise 200m nshobora guhiganwako, urumva rero sinokwiyica ngo n'uko hari ihiganwa banyatse. Nditeguye nk'uko nari nitegeruiye 400m". "Ngerageza kutaja cane ku mbuga hwaniro kuko ndazi ko ivyo vyoza kundemera cane, ubu nkaba ngerageza kugabanya ivyo nkora vyose muri iki gihe kuko ata burambe nsanganywe bw'imgene novyitwaramwo."

headline: Hungary v England: FIFA yatanguye kwiga ibihano bibereye kw'ivanguramoko ryakorewe abakinyi
text: Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi, FIFA, ryatanguye kwiga ibihano bibereye ku nyifato y'ivanguramoko ryakorewe abakinyi b'abongereza mu rukino rw'umupira w'amaguru rwo ku wa kane batsinze Hongrie 4-0 i Budapest mu nkino zo kurondera itike yo kuja mu gikombe c'isi. Raheem Sterling na Jude Bellingham ni bo batyogejwe. Abakinyi bw'Ubwongereza kandi baratewe ibintu mu gice ca kabiri c'urukino, abafana batera n'ikintu caka kirekura n'umwotsi mu kibuga ca Puskas Arena. Ubwongereza buriyamiriza iri tyozwa bukavuga ko ari "ikintu kidashobora kwihanganirwa". Umukinyi wo hagati wa Borussia Dortmund Bellingham, 18, yanditse kru Twitter ejo ku wa gatanu ati: "Bimaze kuba ibigize urukino kandi bizokwama biri uko gushika ababifitiye ububasha bafashe ibihano nyavyo. Ntidushobora kureka ngo urwanko rwiganze". Umukinyi wo hagati wa Chelsea, Mason Mount., na we ati: "Birateye isoni kubona ibi bintu bibandanya". "Iyo ibintu nk'ibi bibaye, bitegerezwa kugira inkurikizi, ni ngombwa ko FA ivugana na FIFA kuri iki kibazo kandi nizere ko bazokwama baronka ibi bibazo, impera n'imperuka bagafata ibihano". "Ariko ni ngombwa ko bihagarara kandi dutegerezwa kurandurana n'imizi ibi bintu mu rukino rw'umupira w'amaguru". Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson asaba FIFA "gufata ingingo ruhasha kuri abo bantu babikoze kandi ikore ibishoboka vyose kugira iyi ngeso iteye isoni iranduranwe n'imizi burundu muri uru rukino". Ku mugoroba w'ejo ku wa gatanu, iri shirahamwe rijejwe inkino kw'isi ryavuze ko ririko ririhweza ibihano bibereye  "inyuma y'umwihwezo wakozwe kuri urwo rukino". Ryongerako riti: "FIFA irasubiriye kumenyesha ko yiyamiriza yivuye inyuma kandi mu buryo ntasubirwamwo ivangura n'ihohoterwa ivyo ari ryo ryose co kimwe n'ikumira canke itoteza iryo ari ryo ryose. "Ntidushobora kwihanganira na gato ingeso nk'izo ziteye isoni mu mumpira w'amaguru". Mu gihe ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru ku mugabane wa Bulaya, UEFA, ryari ryategetse Hongrie gukina inkino zitatu ata barorerezi inyuma y'inyifato ishingiye kw'ivanguraruhu ryerekanywe n'abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru, abafana baremerewe kwinjira mu kibuga ku wa kane kubera rwari urukino rwa FIFA. Iyi ngingo ya UEFA  yari yerekeye ivanguraruhu n'iyindi nyifato ishingiyehe kw'ikumira yerekanywe mw'ihiganwa rya Euro 2020 mu kwa gatandatu. N'aho UEFA ari yo ijejwe inkino zo kurondera itike y'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi yose kubera zirimwo imirwi yo ku mugabane wa Bulaya, FIFA irashobora gufata ingingo kubera ari inkino z'ihiganwa ryayo. Fifa na  Uefa ziranegurwa kubera zaretse abafana bakinjira Amashirahamwe arwanya ikumira Kick It Out, Show Racism the Red Card hamwe na Fare aranegura Fifa na Uefa kubera ingene bafashe iminenerwe itegeko ryari risanzwe rihari ryo gukumira abafana. Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa wa Kick It Out Tony Burnett avuga ati: "Ikibazo dufise ni ukumenya igituma FIFA itafashe ingingo kugira ibi ntibibe, n'igituma abajejwe inkino batakoranye kugira ngo babizibire". Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa Fare, Piara Powar, avuga ko kureka abarorerezi bakinjira mu kibuga i Budapest ari akarorero k'ukungene  "ibintu biriko birayangara" mu gihe Uefa na Fifa bagerageza guhangana n'ivanguraruhu. Powar avuga ko The Fare Network - ishirahamwe ririko riragerageza kurwanya ubusumbane mu mupira w'amaguru  - rizoha abategetsi icegeranyo caryo kuri urwo rukino, harimwo na videwo. Ged Grebby, umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa Show Racism the Red Card, yabwiye BBC Radio 5 Live ko umumenyereza w'Ubwongereza Gareth Southgate ari mu kuri mu kuvuga ko Ubwongereza bwobanza kwitunganya imbere y'ukunegura abandi ku nyifato yabo, inyuma y'ibihe bitari bike vyaranzwe n'ivanguraruhu muri uru rukino. Grebby yongerako ko hakenewe "integuro ndende yo kwigisha abanyagihugu" mu ntumbero yo gufasha kurwanya ivanguramoko mu rukino rw'umupira w'amaguru muri Hongrie. Abakinyi b'Ubwongereza barazomerewe igihe bapfukama imbere 'yuko urukino rutangura mu ntumbero yo kwiyamiriza ivanguramoko, umunyamakuru wa BBC Radio 5 Live Juliette Ferrington nawe akavuga ko ivyakozwe n'abarorerezi ari nk'"uruhome rw'induru". Avuga ko indirimbo z'ivanguramoko zumvikanye muri urwo rukino kandi ko Sterling na Bellingham ari bo bariko baratyozwa. Mu gice ca kabiri, Sterling yaratewe ibikombe n'amacupa vyo mu bikarato igihe yari yinjije igitsindo ca mbere c'Ubwongereza. Mu nyuma hatewe mu kibuga ikintu kirekura umuriro n'umwotsi inyuma y'aho Harry Maguire yinjirije ica gatatu. Ishirahamwe rijejwe umupira w'amaguru muri Hongrie (MLSZ) rivuga ko abo batovye urwo rukino "bategerezwa kuronderwa kandi bagahanwa bikomeye", ariko nta kintu na kimwe ryavuze ku bijanye n'uko ivyakozwe vyari bishingiye kw'ivanguramoko. Eka n'umumenyereza w'Ubwongereza Gareth Southgate yaratewe ibarafu n'abafana mu gihe yariko atanga ikiganiro na BBC Radio 5 Live. Ati: "Bose barazi ico duhagarariye nk'umurwi, kandi ibi ntibishobora kwihanganirwa. Uwujejwe umutekano wacu yavuganye n'abakinyi baramubwira ivyari vyo. Tuzobitorera umuti biciye mu nzira nyazo". Umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Hongrie wewe, Peter Szijjarto, ntatahura imyidogo y'Abongereza ku bijanye n'izomerwa ryabereye i Budapest, akaba yabicishije ku rubuga rwa Facebook ruriko amashusho y'abafana b'abongereza i Wembley bashinyagurira abataliyano mu gihe bariko baririmba ururirimbo rw'igihugu imbere y'urukino rwa nyuma wa Euro 2020.

headline: Umuganwa Philip yabonye vyinshi, vyiza na bibi, ibisanzwe n’ibidasanzwe mu myaka hafi 100
text: Umuganwa Philip yabonye vyinshi, vyiza na bibi, ibisanzwe n'ibidasanzwe mu myaka 100 ari kw'isi. Ng'ibi ibikuru vy'akahise, bimwe vyigishwa mu mashule.

headline: S Africa: Ramaphosa arashikiriza ivyo azi ku biturire mu gihe ca Zuma
text: Umukuru wa Afrika y'Epfo Cyril Ramaphosa yahakanye ibineguro vy'uko ataco yakoze ku vyavugwa ku biturire mu gihe c'intwaro c'uwo yasubiriye ku butegets bw'igihugu, Jacob Zuma. Yariko aravuga ivyo azi imbere y'umugwi w'igihugu wiswe Zondo Commission, ukora amatohoza ku biturire mu nzego z'igihugu. Uwo mugwi washinzwe kugirango  ukore amatohoza mu bivugwa ko Zuma yaretse umuryango utunze cane w'aba Gupta ukanyonyeza itunga ry'igihugu igihe yari ku butegetsi, ivyatumye Afrika y'Epfo ihomba miriyaridi 81 z'ama dorari mu kigega ca reta ikongera igatakaza amahirwe atari make. Cyril Ramaphosa yari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu n'umugambwe ANC uri  ku butegetsi ku gice kimwe c'ico kiringo c'ubutegetsi bwa Jacob Zuma. Uwo mukuru w'igihugu w'imyaka 68 yabwiye uwo mugwi ko amaze kumenya ko hari abagirizwa ibiturire yaciye afata ingingo yo kuguma mu nzego z'umugambwe kugira agwanye ibiturire ahereye imbere. Mu nyuma yahavuye yitoza kuba umukuru w'igihugu yemera kuzorwanya ibiturire muri reta no muri ANC. N'amajambo akomeye yashikirijwe na Ramaphosa - amajambo azotuma habazwa ibibazo vyinshi muri uwo mugwi w'amatohoza. Pumza Fihlani, umunyamamkuru wa BBC ari Johannesburg, avuga ko benshi muri ico gihugu biteze ko hari vyinshi bizoja ahabona muri iyo minsi ibiri umukuru w'igihugu azoba ariko arashikiriza ivyo azi. ANC, uvuga ko ari umugambwe  w'uburongozi rusangi, ubu nawo  ushinzwe ijisho. Pumza Fihlani avuga ko abanya-Afrika y'Epfo bifuza kumenya  abazobazwa ibiturire vyaranze imyaka 10 iheze, vyatumye reta idashitsa ivya nkenrwa ku bakene, bituma kandi ubuzi butakara mu mahinguriro amwe amwe. Yaba Zuma, waba n'umuryango w'aba Gupta , bose  barahakana ko ata caha bakoze.

headline: Tanzania ivuga ko itazongera guha impunzi z’Abarundi ubwenegihugu mu kivunga
text: Umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati wa Tanzania abwira Abarundi bahungiye muri ico gihugu ko Tanzania itagisubira gutanga ubwenegihugu ku mpunzi nk'uko vyagenze mu myaka mike iheze. Ivyo biri mu butumwa umushikiranganji George Simbachawene ariko ahereza impunzi z'Abarundi ziri mu makambi ya Tanzania mu rugendo arimwo mu ntara za Kigoma, Tabora na Katavi basanzwe batuyemwo. Uyu munsi kuwa kabiri, igihe yagendera ikambi y'impunzi ya Mtendeli iri muri District ya Kakonko, Bwana Simbachawene yashoboye kwibonera impunzi zariko zitekera imigizo yazo kugira ngo zitahuke. Avugana n'Abarundi basanzwe baba mw'ikambi ya Nyarugusu iri muri District ya Kasulu ejo ku wa mbere, bwana Simbachawene yabibukije icatumye bahungira muri Tanzania mu 2015, ko wari umutekano muke warangwa mu gihugu. Abibutsa inzira zitatu zo kurangiza ikibazo c'impunzi izo nazo zikaba ari ugutahuka mu gihugu c'amavukiro, uguhabwa ubwenegihugu iyo wahungiye, canke guhabwa ubuhungiro mu kindi gihugu kigira gatatu. Ahimiriza izo mpunzi guhitamwo uguhunguka bagasubira mu gihugu cabo, Bwana Simbachawene yumvikana avuga ati: "Muri izo nzira zitatu rero, wewe ufise ubwenge, uzi ko wipfuza gutegura imigambi ya kazoza kawe, uzi ko kuba mu mahanga hari uburenganzira uba udafise, ukabandanya uri umwana muto arindirije kugaburirwa, utazi ingene uzobaho ejo, ni vyiza ko wiyumvira ugahitamwo inzira ibereye". Yongerako ati: "Nobasaba ko mwiyandikisha muri benshi kugira muje kwubaka igihugu canyu, kuko kuguma ng'aha ni uguta umwanya, n'aho mwoba mu munezero umeze gute". Asigura ku bijanye n'uguhabwa ubwenegihugu mu gihugu wahungiyemwo, Bwana Simbachawene yibukije ko hari impunzi zahunze mu 1972 zirenga ibihumbi ijana bahawe ubwenegihugu bwa Tanzania, ariko ko "ivyo bitazigera bisubira". Ati: "Leta ya Tanzania ku bushake bwayo hariho abo yahaye ubwenegihugu, ariko hari n'abatarashobora kuburonka gushika ubu". "Nagomba ndababwire, ibi ntituzobisubira. Birya vyo gutanga ubwenegihugu mu kivunga ntibizigera bisubira, kuko n'abo twahaye ubwo bwenegihugu ntibashoboye kuja kuba hamwe n'abandi banyagihugu, bagumye mu makambi". Mu gihe muri izo mpunzi hari abipfuza kuronswa ubuhungiro bugira gatatu, cane cane mu bihugu vya Bulaya, Bwana Simbachawene abahanura ko ivyo bobivana mu mutwe "na rirya n'ikiza ca coronavirus atawuzi ngo kizohera ryari". Ku ruhande rw'u Burundi, leta imenyesha ko ibandanya yakira abahunguka bavuye mu makambi atandukanye muri Tanzania. Kuri uyu wa kabiri, Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu, umutekano n'iterambere ry'amakomine bumenyesha ko bwakiriye abashika 376 batashe mu gihugu baciye muri komine Gisuru mu ntara ya Ruyigi mu buseruko bw'igihugu.

headline: Ingabo za Ukraine zateye intambwe mu bumanuko zitera zisugereza Kherson
text: Ingabo za Ukraine zatoboye ibirindiro vy’ingabo z’Uburusiya ku ruzi Dnieper mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bw’igisagara ca Kherson, igisagara ngirakamaro ku ngabo z’Uburusiya zikigenzura, mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine. Igisirikare c’Uburusiya n’abategetsi bashizweho n’Uburusiya nyene muri ako karere nibo batangaje aya makuru y’iyi ntambwe yatewe nabasirikare ba Ukraine, bakavuga ko ingabo z’Uburusiya zihanganye nabo bikomeye. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine avuga ko “hari uduce dushasha twabohojwe mu turere tutari duke”. Mu buseruko, ingabo za Ukraine zarasatiriye gushika mu ntara ya Luhansk iri mu minwe y’Uburusiya. Perezida Zelensky avuga ko "intambara zikomeye zibandanya mu turere twinshi", aho hari mw’ijambo yama ashikiriza buri mugoroba ku gihugu, ariko nta nsiguro yatanze. Ku wa gatandatu, ingabo ziwe zarabohoje igisagara gikomeye ca Lyman mu buseruko, kikaba kiri hafi y’urubibe rw’intara ya Luhansk. Uburusiya bwari bwagize Lyman ikirindiro co gushikizamwo uburyo nkenerwa bw’urugamba.. Abarwanyi begamiye Uburusiya mu ntara ya Luhansk bemeza ko ingabo za Ukraine zinjiye ibirometero bikeya hagati mu ntara ya Luhansk. Amakuru avuga ko abanya-Ukraine bariko batera basatira ibisagara biri mu minwe y’Uburusiya vya Kremenna na Svatove muri Luhansk. Mu bumanuko, Vladimir Saldo, umukuru wa Kherson yashizweho n’Uburusiya, avuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zatoboye zigashika hafi ya Dudchany, igisagara kiri ku ruzi Dnieper, ku birometero hafi 30 uvuye ahahora habera urugamba. Abanya-Ukraine uru ruzi barwita Dnipro. Saldo  ati: "Hari ibigwati biri mu minwe y’ingabo za Ukraine”. Ni mu gihe hari amakuru amwe avuga ko abanya-Ukraine ubu bafashe Dudchany. Umuvugizi w’ubushikiranganji bw’Uburusiya bujejwe kwivuna abansi, Igor Konashenkov, avuga ko vya bimodoka ntamenwa “vyinshi kudusumba vyinjiye hagati”, mu bumanuko bwa Zolota Balka, ikigwati cahoze kiberamwo urugamba ku ruzi Dnieper. Avuga ko Abarusiya bishe abasirikare ba Ukraine hafi 130 muri iyo ntambara. Nk’uko Saldo abivuga, ibatayo (bataillons) zibiri za Ukraine zagerageje kwinjira ku rugomero rw’umuyagankuba rwa Kakhovka, ku birometero hafi 70 mu buseruko bwa Kherson. Uru rugomero ruri mu gisagara ca Nova Kakhovka  kiri ku nkengera. Ingabo za Ukraine ziriko zisatira mu ntumbero yo kuraba ingene zozibira amayira ajana uburyo ku ngabo zishika 25.000 z’Uburusiya ziri mu burengero bw’uruzi Dnieper, nk’uko vyandikwa n’itororokanirizo ry’amakuru Reuters. Utera uva mu buraruko bushira uburengero bwa Kherson, vya muzinga vya Ukraine vyononye cane ikiraro ca Antonivsky, ikiraro gikomeye ku ngabo z’Uburusiya ziri muri ico gisagara. Kherson na Luhansk ziri mu ntara zine Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya aherutse gutangaza ko zegukira Uburusiya, inyuma y’icitwa amatora ya kamarampaka yiyamirijwe na Kyiv n’intuci zayo zo mu Burengero. Uburusiya ntibugenzura intara n’imwe yose muri izo zine. Ibintu vyagiye gukomerana igisirikare c’Uburusiya inyuma y’amasaha make gusa y’ijambo rya Putin ryo ku wa gatanu hamwe n’ibirori bikomeye mu kibanza c’amakoraniro (Place Rouge/Red Square ) i Moscou mu kwigina intambwe Uburusiya bwari buhejeje gutera yo kwihagira ubutaka bwa Ukraine. Kyiv yariyemeje ko izoruhuka ibohoje ubutaka bwose bwihagiwe n’Uburusiya, harimwo mbere na ka karere ka Crimée/Crimea kigaruriwe n’ingabo z’Uburusiya mu 2014. Ubushikiranganji bw’Uburusiya bujejwe kwivuna abansi bumenyesha ko abanditswe kugira ngo binjire mu gisirikare ku kamo katewe na Putin mu kwezi guheze ubu bariko bahabwa imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare y’urutavanako mu turere tugenzurwa n’Uburusiya tw’intara za Luhansk na Donetsk. Kremlin itegura kwinjiza izindi ngabo zababa 300.000 – n’aho Putin ata gitigiri ntabanduka yashinze.

headline: Mohamed Amissi w'Intamba z'u Burundi yaguzwe n'umurwi wo mu cicaro ca mbere mu Buholande
text: Umukinyi Mohamed Amissi asanzwe akinira umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Uburundi yaguzwe n'umurwi Heracles Almelo wo mu kicaro cya mbere mu Buholande. Uyo mukinyi yari mu batoya cane mw'ihiganwa rya CAN 2019 yasinyiraniye amasezerano y'imyaka ibiri n'uyo murwi ejo ku wa kabiri, amasezerano ashobora kwongerezwa. Uyo mukinyi w'Intamba mu Rugamba aheruka gukinira Uburundi mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu CAN 2019 riheruka mu kwezi guheze kw'indwi. Imbere y'aho yari ku rutonde rw'abakinyi b'Intamba mu Rugamba mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika ry'abatarenza imyaka 20 ryabereye muri Niger mu kwezi kwa kabiri uno mwaka. Vyitezwe ko mu ntango azokina mu murwi ugira kabiri w'abatarenza imyaka 23 wa Heracles Almelo isanzwe iri mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru ry'Ubuholande, Eredivisie. Mohamed Amissi w'imyaka 19 yahora akinira umurwi NAC Breda wo muri ico gihugu c'Ubuholande, yari yinjiyemwo mu mwaka wa 2014, avuye mu murwi w'urwaruka wa Anderlecht mu Bubirigi. Tim Gilissen, umumenyereza w'uwo murwi muvyo ubuhinga arishimiye uyo mukinyi, akavuga ko bazomufasha gutera imbere. "Mo ni umukinyi wo ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu afise ubuhinga bwinshi. Tuzomuha akaryo ko gutera imbere kugira ngo arabe ko yoshika mw'ihiganwa ryo mu cicaro ca mbere, Eredivisie". Uyo mukinyi afise se w'umubirigi na nyina w'umurundikazi yari mu bakinyi bane batoya gusumba abandi mw'ihiganrwa rya CAN 2019 riheruka mu Misiri, yari atarakwiza imyaka 19.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Varane, Bellerin, Kane, Haaland, Jesus, Griezmann
text: Manchester United iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano n'umukinyi w'inyuma wa Real Madrid umufaransa Raphael Varane w'imyaka 28 amaze igihe kirekire aronderwa kugira ngo afashanye na Harry Maguire. (Mail) Hector Bellerin yabwiye  Arsenal ko yipfuza kugenda muri rino ci. Uyu mukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Espagne w'inyaka 26, umukinyi amaze igihe kirekire gusumba abandi muri uyo murwi wa Mikel Arteta, yizeye ko ashobora kwimukira muri Inter Milan. (Metro) Manchester City yakuye akarenge mu ruhigi rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Barcelona umufaransa  Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 30, ariko ikaba igiye guhindukirira umusatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund umunya Norvege Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 20 hamwe na Harry Kane w'imyaka 27 akinira Tottenham akongera akaba kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza.  (Sun) Chelsea yiteguye gutanga "igifovya" c'amafaranga kugira irabe ko yoronka Haaland. (Star) Griezmann ashobora kuba ariko arasubira mu murwi yahoze akinira Atletico Madrid, biciye mu kumuguzanya n'umukinyi wo hagati wa Espagne Saul Niguez w'imyaka 26. (Express) Bayern Munich iriko irarondera uwosubirira umusatirizi wa Pologne Robert Lewandowski w'imyaka 32 ashobora kuba yipfuza kwimukira muri  Real Madrid mu ci ry'umwaka uza mu gihe asigaje umwaka umwe gusa mu masezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi wo mu Budagi. (AS - in Spanish) Ubutumwa yacishije kuri Twitter ariko agaca abufuta, umukinyi wo hagati wa Real Madrid  Isco buvuga ko uyu mukinyi w'umunya Espagne azova muri uyu murwi mu gihe amezi 12 asigaje mu masezerano afitaniye n'umurwi wiwe azoba arangiye, mu gihe imirwi ya Arsenal, Tottenham Hotspur na Napoli imwipfuza. (Mirror) Manchester City na Wolverhampton Wanderers yompi iripfuza umukinyi w'inyuma wa Fulham Antonee Robinson w'imyaka 23. (Mirror) Juventus iriko irarondera umusatirizi wa Manchester City umunya Brésil Gabriel Jesus w'imyaka 24. Uyu murwi w'Ubutaliyano urarondera kandi n'umusatirizi wa Everton umutaliyano Moise Kean w'imyaka 21. (Tuttosport, via Mail) Arsenal iriko iregereza amasezerano n'umukinyi wo hagati wa Lyonumufaransa Houssem Aouar w'imyaka 23 hamwe n'umubirigi akina hagati Albert Sambi Lokonga w'imyaka 21 asanzwe akina muri Anderlecht.Iriko kandi irakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi wo hagati wa Leicester City umwongereza James Maddison w'imyaka 24. (Sun) Umumenyereza mushasha wa Crystal Palace Patrick Vieira ariko ararondera umunyegori w'umwongereza Remi Matthews w'imyaka 27 aherutse kuronka uburenganzira bwo kuva mu murwi Sunderland wo mu cicaro ca kabiri asanzwe asamira. (Mirror) West Brom iriko iragerageza kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Chelseaumwongereza Trevoh Chalobah w'imyaka 22, ariko iriko imurwanira n'uwundi murwi uvugwa ko woba iri Brentforduherutse kuduga muri Premier league, hamwe n'umurwi w'Ubufaransa Lorient, iyi ikaba ari imwe mu yiriko iramurondera. (Express & Star)

headline: DR Congo-Rutshuru: HCR ivuga ko abantu ibihumbi 11 bahungiye muri Uganda
text: Umuvugizi w'umukuru w'intara ya Kivu ya ruguru muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Congo aremeza ko umuhari M23 wateye mu turere twa Chanzo na Runyoni muri Rutshuru mw'ijoro ryo ku wa mungu, bituma abantu benshi guhunga, harimwo n'abajabutse muri Uganda. Ishami rya ONU riraba impunzi HCR rivuga ko gushika kuri uyu wa kabiri riharura abantu ibihumbi 11 bajabutse umupaka bagahungira muri Uganda. Ubu babaye baracumbikirwa ahitwa Nyakabande. Ariko umuvugizi w'umukuru w'intara ya Kivu ya ruguru, jenerari Sylvain Ekenge avuga ko bamwe batanguye guhunguka. Avuga ko "umurindi ukiri muto, ariko nibaza ko mu masaha ari imbere baja gutahuka ku bwinshi". Umuvuguzi wa HCR mu karere ka Afrika yo hagati, y'ubuseruko n'ihembe rya Afrika,  Faith Kasima, avuga ko bigoye kumenya ibitigiri bishasha "ariko ico tuzi n'uko abari bajabutse umupaka bose bari ibihumbi 11". Madame Kasina avuga ko ico abo bantu babwira abakozi ba HCR ari uko bakeneye ahantu hatekanye. Ati: "Benshi muri bo ubu nta ngingo ntabanduka bashobora gufata, yo kuguma ngaha canke gusubira inyuma." Ico bashaka muri uyu mwanya ni ahantu hatekanye no kuronka imfashanyo - nk'ivyo kurya, ivyo kwifuka - ivyo nivyo HCR ifatanije n'ubutegetsi bwa Uganda turiko turagerageza kubakorera" Mu kiganiro na BBC, ku wa mbere,  jenerari Ekenge yavuze ati: "Nk'igihe c'isaha zine z'ijoro (ku wa mungu), umuhari w'abagarariji ba M23, canke ibisigarira vyawo, warateye uturere twa Chanzo na Runyoni  ufise umugambi wo guhanganya n'ibindi bice vy'intara". Jenerari Ekenge yavuze ko abateye ari abo mw'ishami ryategekwa na Sultani Makenga. Umuhari M23 wo urabihakana. Avuga ko baje bava "mu karere k'imipaka itatu " kari hagati ya Congo, Uganda n'Urwanda mw'ishamba rya Virunga". Jenerari Ekenge avuga ko abateye bikitse mu kiza c'uko ata ngabo nyinshi za Congo zari zisanzwe muri ako gace kuko hari hatekanye ku buryo  "bitari bikenewe gushira ingabo nyinshi  hafi y'umupaka w'ibihugu mufitaniye umubano mwiza". Mu kiganiro co kuri uyu wa kabiri, jenerari Ekenge yavuze ko ubu ingabo za Congo zagaruje ibirindiro vyose vyari vyatewe. Yabwiye BBC Gahuzamiryango ati: "Kuva ejo mu masaha y'umuhingamo, ingabo zacu zaragaruje ibirindiro vyose. Ubu nizo zigenzura uruhande rwa Congo rw'umupaka bihana na Uganda n'Urwanda". Avuga ko adashobora kwemeza niba abateye baje bava hakurya y'umupaka mu Rwanda canke muri Uganda. Ati "Gusa ico twemeza n'uko ari aba M23. Ntibinyegeza. Barigaragaza, bashize no ku mbuga hwaniro ama video yabo". Ku kibazo co kumenya iyo abari bateye baroye, jenerari Ekenge yasubije ati "hari aho bari bazananye, ni naho basubiye". Hagati aho yavuze ko umukuru wabo mu ngabo yagize ingendo muri Uganda no mu Rwanda, "aho niho bazovugana hakaboneke umuco kuri ico kibazo". M23 irahakana kugaba igitero i Rutshuru Umuhari M23 waheruka kuvugwa mu 2013 ugwanya reta ya Congo uvuga ko itubahiriza amasezerano bari baragiraniye. Uburongozi bw'umugwi M23 buhakana kugira uruhara na rumwe mu gitero cagabwe i Rutshuru ngo kuko bidashobora kwumvikana. Mw'itangazo wasohoye ku mugoroba w'ejo kuwa mbere, umuhari M23 uvuga ko umaze umwaka mu biganiro na leta ya Congo bigamije gutunganiriza abahoze ari abarwanyi bawo. Iryo tangazo ribandanya rivuga yuko mu gihe ivyo biganiro biriko biraba kandi ngo bikaba bigenda neza, ata kuntu M23 yaco ica inyuma ngo yiyononere. Ngo ariko bihora bishika ko ingabo za FARDC zitagenzurwa zija gusotora abarwanyi ba M23 bari i Rutshuru kuva mu 2017, ngo ukwo gusotorwa kukaba kwatanguye mu mwaka wa 2020 ngo ariko baririnze gusubiza. Iryo tangazo rirangiza risaba ko ingabo zitagenzurwa za FARDC zokurwa mu turere twa Rutshuru zirimwo kugira ivyo bikorwa vyo gusotorana bihagarare. Ayobangira Safari, umushingamateka wa Masisi muri Kivu ya ruguru, yabwiye BBC Gahuzamiryango ko  ibikorwa vy'inyeshyamba bimaze iminsi biri mu burasirazuba bwa DR Congo ari "ingaruka za gahunda yo gusubiza abari abarwanyi mu buzima busanzwe canke mu ngabo, idakora neza." Agira ati: "Nta kintu cakozwe mu gufasha abavuye mu mitwe y'inyeshamba, ico tuzi ni uko ubu benshi muri abo bantu bari hafi ya Bunagana ari abahoze muri M23 bagitegereje gusubizwa mu buzima busanzwe. "Turasaba leta gukora ku buryo aba basore bose bakiri mu murongo wo gusubira mu nyeshamba bafashwa gusubira mu buzima bwa gisivile canke bagashirwa mu gisirikare". Intara za Kivu uko ari zibiri zirangwamwo imigwi yitwaje ibigwanisho irenga 100 imaze imyaka mirongo  ihungabanya ako karere k'ubuseruko bwa Repuburika y'intwaro ya demokrasi ya Congo.

headline: Lalibela- Ethiopia: Inyeshamba za Tigray ntizumva akamo ko kuva mu gisagara zafashe muri Amhara
text: Inyeshamba zo muri Tigray banse kwumvira akamo ka Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ko kuva mu ntara zihana urubibe n'iyabo, umunsi umwe inyuma y'aho zifatiye ikibanza kiri mu mirage y'isi ya ONU mu ntara ya Amhara. Abo bagwanya reta ya Ethiopia bo mu ntara ya Tigray ku wa kane  bigaruriye igisagara ca Lalibela, umurage w'isi wa Unesco mu ntara ya Amhara ihana urubibe na Tigray. Lalibela, ahabarizwa amasengero yo mu kinjana ca 13 asaruwe mu mabuye, ni ikibanza cerenda ku bakristu b'aba Othodoxe baharurwa muri za miriyoni. Abahaba bari bamaze igihe bahunga umusugerezo w'inyeshamba, nk'uko abategetsi b'aho babibwiye BBC. Abantu ibihumbi baramaze kwicwa kuva intambara yadutse mu kwezi kwa 11. Ubu intambara iriko irakwira mu ntara za Amhara na Afar, iyindi ntara ihana urubibe na Tigray. Abantu baharurwa muri za miriyoni nabo baramaze guteshwa izabo. Zaba inyeshamba za Tigray, zaba n'ingabo za reta mpuzantara ya Ethiopia n'abazishigikiye, izo mpande zompi ziraregwa ibikorwa vyo guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu n'ivyaha vyo mu ntambara. Icegera c'umukuru w'igisagara ca Lalibela, Mandefro Tadesse, yabwiye BBC ko igisigara kigenzurwa n'inyeshamba zo muri Tigray. Yavuze ko ata rusasu rwigeze ruraswa, ariko ko abanyagihugu bariko barahunga igisagara kandi ko afise amakenga y'ayo masengero mbonekarimwe. Hari amasezengero 11 yasaruwe mu masenga y'amabuye mu binjana vya 12 na 13. Yubatswe nk'ayo gusubirira Ihanga Ryeranda, abakora urugendo rweranda batashobora gushikamwo ico gihe. Mandefro yavuze ati: "Uwu n'umurage w'isi, kandi duteregerezwa gufashanya kugirango iryo tunga rikingirwe." Iyo ntambara iriko irakwira izindi ntara ikurikiye ukwigarurira uturere inyeshamba za Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) zagize mu kwezi ka gatandatu, harimwo gufata umurwa mukuru w'intara ya Tigray Mekelle inyuma y'aho ingabo za Ethiopia zihaviriye  hanyuma zigantangaza zonyene ihagarikwa ry'intambara. TPLF niyo yari irongoye reta y'intara ya Tigray gushika yirukanywe n'ingabo za Ethiopia mu kwezi kwa 11. Reta ya Ethiopia yayise umugwi w'iterabwoba. Ariko izo nyeshamba zivuga ko arizo reta yemewe y'intara ya Tigray. Muri iyi ndwi, umu jenerari wo muri izo nyeshamba yabwiye BBC ko uwo mugwi ufise intumbero yo kugondoza reta kuvanaho ukwugarana iyo ntara no kwemera inyishu ya poritike  kuri ico kibazo. Reta irahakana kuba yarugaranye iyo ntara kandi ivuga ko ata biganiro bizoba. Ariko kubona TPLF igeze muri Amhara na Afar vyatumye amakungu anegura ibiriko biraba, ONU na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bakaba basavye impande zose  guhagarika intambara. Reta ya Ethiopia ivuga ko abantu ibihumbi 300 bateshejwe izabo muri Amhara na Afar. Hagati aho ONU yo ivuga ko amakamyo 175 arimwo imfashanyo yashitse muri Tigray. Ariko umukuru w'ishami rya ONU riraba indya kw'isi (PAM/WFP) yagabishije avuga ko hakenewe amakamyo arenga 100 ku munsi kugira hagarukirwe abantu baharurwa muri za miriyoni bakeneye imfashanyo. Abakozi b'amashirahamwe afasha bafise ikibazo co gushika mu  gice kinini ca Tigray kubera ikibazo c'umutekano n'izindi ntambanyi zo kuronka impusha.

headline: Newcastle 2-0 Arsenal: Nta kibanza dukwiye muri Champions League ku rukino nk'uru - Granit Xhaka
text: Umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal Granit Xhaka aranegura abakinyi bagenziwe inyuma yo gutsindwa na Newcastle 2-0 mu rukino rwa nijoro ku wa mbere, akavuga ati: "Iyo wumva ubwoba guma muhira". Uyu mukinyi wo hagati ku ruhande rw'inyuma abona ko umurwi wiwe wananiwe no guhangana n'ibihe bitoroshe mu rugamba rwo kurondera kuba muri ine ya mbere mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Bwongereza. Iyo iramuka itsinze yari kuja imbere ya Tottenham, gutyo ikabandanya ifise amahirwe yo kuronka ikibanza mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya (Ligue des Champions/Champions League)  mu gihe hasigaye urukino rumwe. Ati: "Iyo umuntu yumva afise ubwoba mu rukino nk'uru, guma muhira. "Nta kuraba imyaka. Iyo wumva ufise ubwoba, guma hanze canke ugume muhira. Hakenewe abantu baza ngaha biteguye gukina. Rwari rumwe mu nkino nyamukuru kuri twebwe. Twumva ducitse intege ku bantu baje ngaha". Hagati aho, mu kiganiro n'imboneshakure y'inkino Sky Sports, uwahoze akina inyuma muri  Manchester United Gary Neville aranegura amajambo ya  Xhaka. Ati: "Yama ashwanira abakinyi mu cumba co kwihinduriramwo. "Nibaza ko atari akwiye kunegura aba bakinyi bakiri bato kuko na we nyene yagiye abateza urubwa kenshi, ahabwa amakarata atukura n'ibindi. Aho yarabashize mu ngorane". Kugira ngo Arsenal igire amahirwe yo kuja muri zine za mbere, itegerezwa gutsinda umurwi wa Everton ku kibuga cayo ku wa Mungu hanyuma Tottenham nayo -  iyisumvya amanota abiri ikanayirusha n'ibitsindo vyinshi - itsindwe na Norwich yamaze kumanuka mu cicaro ca kabiri. Xhaka yabwiye BBC Sport ati: "Twashaka gukina urukino rwiza ariko vyanse. "Abantu bama bata ishavu ku burongozi. Ntituriko dukina tennis, turiko dukina umupira w'amaguru. Iyo umuntu yumva afise ubwoba mu bihe bigoye nk'ibi, guma muhira. "Ntushobora kuza ngaha hanyuma ngo ukine nk'uku. Twakinye nabi cane uno musi. Integuro zacu twari dufise ziratandukanye  rwose n'ingene twakinye. Twakinye urukino atari rwo na gatoya. "Batunesheje kuva ku munota wa mbere gushika ku wa 96. Ukina gutya, ntukwiye kuja muri Champions League. "Ikibazo ni uko turi mu bihe bigoye. Iyo udashoboye kwifata neza mu bihe bigoye, ibintu birangira nk'uko vyarangiye uno musi. Biboneka ko ata kintu dushoboye iyo turi mu bihe bigoye". Igitsindo Ben White yitsinze mu minota ya mbere y'igice ca kabiri c'uru rukino catumye Newcastle irusha Arsenal imbere y'uko Bruno Guimaraes atera ica kabiri mu minota ya nyuma. Xhaka yongerako ati: "Mu gihe Tottenham yotsindwa natwe tugatsinda, ivy'umupira ni akananirabahinga". "Ni ngombwa ko twizera. Imbere y'urukino, ibintu vyose twari tubifise mu minwe. Twakinye urukino rutari rwo na gato". Uru rukino rwabaye urwa gatandatu Arsenal itsinzwe mu nkino 11 za Premier League  - hakaba hari haciye imisi ine itsinzwe 3-0 na Tottenham - mbere n'umumenyereza Mikel Arteta akaba yemera ko Newcastle yarushije umurwi wiwe mu bice vyose. Ati: "Ni ibintu bitoroshe kwemera, ariko nta nkeka Newcastle yari ikwiriye iyi ntsinzi mu buryo bwose. "Vyari ngombwa ko duhangana n'aya majoro [harimwo n'iryo twatsinzwe na Tottenham] ariko vyanse. "Newcastle badusumbije incuro 100 zose.  Mu bice vyose, utegerezwa kuvyifatamwo neza, ariko ntavyo twashoboye. "Dutegerezwa kwigora tukemera ko umukino wacu ataho uhuriye na gato n'uwa Champions League. "Nacitse inguvu bidasanzwe. Ni ikintu kibabaje cane. Ibintu vyari mu minwe yacu uno musi ariko vyaducitse. Ni ngombwa ko dutsinda Everton hanyuma tukarindira ko Norwich yotsinda Spurs. Igihe cose hama hari amahirwe matoya mu mupira w'amaguru. "Kuva ku wa kabiri, tuzoba turiko twitegurira Everton. Vyose birashoboka mu biharuro". Newcastle yagiye ivyifatamwo neza kuva igihe iguriye abakinyi bashasha mu kwa mbere, ariko kandi n'umumenyereza wayo Eddie Howe yarahinduye abakinyi batari bake yasanzeho.

headline: Umunyamabanga mukuru wa FIFA aje kuyobora ibikorwa vyose vya CAF
text: Ishirahamwe rijejwe umupira w'amaguru kw'isi, FIFA, hamwe na CAF ijejwe umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika vyumvikanye kugena umunyamabanga mukuru wa FIFA, Fatma Samoura, nk' "umugenzuzi mukuru ajejwe Afurika" kubera ibibazo vy'uburongozi kuri uyu mugabane. Samoura azorangura ayo mabanga mu kiringo n'imiburiburi c'amezi atandatu, kuva kw'igenekerezo rya mbere ukwezi kw'umunani gushika ku wa 31 z'ukwa mbere 2020. Ico kiringo gishobora kwongerezwa mu gihe aho mashirahamwe yompi yovyumvikanako. Afatanije n'umukuru w'ishirahamwe CAF Ahmad na komite yiwe, uyo munyasenegali Samoura azokorana n'umurwi w'abahinga mu bikorwa bitandukanye, harimwo: Iyo ngingo ifashwe inyuma y'inama ya komite nyobozi ya CAF yabaye ejo ku wa gatatu i Cairo mu Misiri. Muri iyi nama Ahmad Ahmad arongoye CAF yasavye ko FIFA yorungika abahinga boza gufasha kwihweza ingene ibintu bimeze muri iryo shirahamwe. Ishirahamwe CAF rigize iminsi mu bibazo, aho umukuru waryo, Ahmad yarengukishijwe n'abategetsi b'Ubufaransa mu ntango za kuno kwezi "mu matohoza ya ruswa, gukora impapuro za magendo no gukoresha ububasha afise mu bitajanye n'amategeko". Uyo mutegetsi w'imyaka 59 y'amavuko yararekuwe ata caha yagiriwe, inyuma y'ibiganiro i Paris. Ahmad Ahmad yarahakanye ivyo yagirizwa vyose avuga ko ari "ibinyoma". Hagati aho, komite ijejwe inyifato mw'ishirahamwe FIFA iriko imukorako amatohoza. Mu bindi bibazo bihanze CAF, harimwo ingingo y'ugusubiramwo urukino rwa nyuma rw'igihanwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere muri Afrika muri uku kwezi. Uru rukino ntirwashoboye kurangira inyuma y'aho bwa buhinga bwa videwo bufasha mu buhagarikizi (VAR) bwankiye. Hariho kandi n'ikibazo c'isubirwamwo ry'ikirangaminsi c'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu y'umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika ryo mu 2019, 2021 na 2023. Impuzamashirahamwe FIFA na CAF yariyemeje gukorera hamwe ku nyungu z'amashirahamwe y'umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika mu ntumbero y'ukugarukana icizere n'uguteza imbere umupira w'amaguru ku mugabane wa Afrika.

headline: Afghanistan: Aba-Taliban bisubiyeko ntibugurura amashue ku bakobwa
text: Aba-Taliban bisubiyeko ku ngingo yo kwemerera abakobwa bo muri  Afghanistan gusubira ku mashure yisumbuye, bavuga ko  hakiriko harafatwa ingingo y'umwambaro (uniformes) bategerezwa kwambara. Amashure vyari bitegekanijwe ko asubira kwugururwa  kuri uyu wa gatatu inyuma y'amezi yugawe kuva aba-Taliban bafashe ubutegetsi mu  kwezi kw'umunani. Ariko umushikiranganji ajejwe amashure yamenyesheje giturumbuka ko amashure yisumbuye ategerezwa kuguma yugaye ku bakobwa, bituma abantu bajuragirika. Abakobwa bamwe baciye baduka bararira, abavyeyi n'abanyeshure nabo barashavura kandi barababazwa n'iyo ngingo yo ku munota wa nyuma. Imbere  yaho benshi bari bavuze ingene banezerewe kandi bishimiye ko basubiye kuja mw'isomero. Iyo ngingo yaje  haheze indwi umushukiranganji ajejwe amashure amenyesheje ko amashure agiye kwugururwa ku banyeshure bose harimwo n'abakobwa ku wa gatatu. Ariko itangazo  kuri uyu wa gatatu ryaciye riza rivuga riti: "Turamenyesheje amashure yose y'abakobwa n'ayafise abanyeshure b'abakobwa hejuru y'umwaka wa gatandatu ko yugawe gushika haje iyindi ngingo." Iryo tangazo ribandanya rivuga ko amashure azokwugururwa ingingo kuri uniforme z'abanyeshure b'abakobwa  imaze gufatwa hisunzwe "Itegeko rya Sharia hamwe n'imigenzo ya Afghanistan." Iyi ngingo ya giturumbuka yababaje cane abavyeyi b'abana b'abakobwa. Umugabo umwe atashatse ko umwidondoro wiwe umenyekana yabwiye BBC ko umukobwa wiwe yaciye yaduka ararira kuva yankiwe n'aba-Taliban  kwinjira mw'ishure kuri uyu wa gatatu mu gitondo. Yavuze ati: "Hamwe hogira igishikira umukobwa wanje, sinzobabarira aba-Taliban." Ku ntwaro y'aba-Taliban mu myaka ya 1990, abakobwa ntibari benerewe kuja mu mashure. None kuva aba-Taliban bongeye gufata ubutegetsi mu kwezi kw'umunani, amashure  y'abakobwa y'intango n'ayo abahungu niyo yonyene yagumye yuguruye henshi mu gihugu. Amashure  yisumbuye y'abakobwa vyari bitegekanijwe ko yugurutrwa uyu munsi. Umwe umwe ku giti ciwe,  abakuru b'aba-Taliban baremera ko amashure y'abakobwa ari ikibazo kidahurizwako na bamwe mu ndongozi zabo z'umurongo ukaze. Uku kumenyesha ingingo giturumbuka ku munota wanyuma biragaragaza ukutumvikana muri uwo mugwi - kandi vyerekana ingene bamwe mu ndongozi batitayeho ivyifuzo vy'abanya-Afghanistan ba none. Umwe mu baharanira uburenganzira Mahouba Seraj, yashinze urunani rw'abagore muri Afghanistan (Afghan Women's Network), yumiwe n'uko kwisubirako. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Ico bitwaje ngo ni uko "mudafise hijab ibereye'. Nta ngingo ya sentare yahabaye, bifatiye iyo ngingo mu gitondo, ku mvo iyari yo yose." Yavuze ko uniforme z'ishure z'abakobwa muri Afghanistan zama zifuka hose, imimsi yose". Bimwe mu vyo amakungu yasavye n'uko aba-Taliban  bemerera abagore n'abakobwa kuja mu mashure imbere y'uko bahabwa imfashanyo zo hanze. Madame Seraja yavuze ati: "Ico nshaka kwumva canke kubona kuri bo n'uko bahagaruka bakavuga bati 'okay, iki nico mwahisemwo gukora? Emwe, natwe iki nico duhisemwo gukora: nta kubemera, nta mafaranga. Nta kindi!'"

headline: DR Congo: Inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano ifise impungenge kuri M23
text: Abagize Inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano kw’isi basubiriye gushikiriza impungenge bafise kw’ivyuka ry’umuhari w’inyeshamba wa M23 n’iyindi mirwi y’inyeshamba irangwa mu buseruko bwa Repubulika y’Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo. Mw’itangazo iyo Nama yaraye isohoye, yasubiye kwiyamiriza yivuye inyuma imirwi y’inyeshamba ikiyogoza muri ico gihugu, yaba iyo hagati mu gihugu canke iyiva hanze. Amakuru ava mu karere k’Ubuseruko bwa Congo avuga ko intambara zibica bigacika hagati y’ingabo za Congo (FARDC) n’umuhari M23 mu micungararo ya Rutshuru no mu bindi bisagara. Abagize iyo Nama basaba imirwi yose  yitwaje ibirwanisho guhagarika ubugizi bwa nabi idatevye hanyuma imihari y’inyeshamba  ya Congo nayo ikitabira, ataco irinze gusaba, umugambi wo gusubiza ibirwanisho no gusubira mu buzima busanzwe. Isaba kandi imirwi y’inyeshamba iva hanze gushira ibirwanisho hasi idatevye hanyuma igasubira mu bihugu yaje ivamwo. Basubiye kumenyesha ko bashigikiye « ubwigenge, ubumwe n’ubusugire bw’igihugu ca Repubulika y’Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo ». Ni mu gihe intambara zibica bigacika mu turere tw’intara ya Kivu, aho amakuru avuga ko intambara zabandanije mu gatondo ko kuri uno wa gatandatu mu micungararo y’igisagara ca Rutshuru na Kiwanja mu ntara ya Kivu ya Ruguru, nk’uko vyandikwa n’iradiyo Okapi y’aho muri Congo. Isubiramwo ababibonye bavuga ko izo ntambara zibera kw’ibarabara No 2 rihuza Rutshuru n’igisagara ca Goma ritakirengana kuva ejo ku wa gatanu kubera intambara. Abasirikare bavugwa ko babonywe bariko basubira inyuma bava mu gisagara ca Kiwanja, mu gihe abanyagihugu bafise ubwoba ko ico gisagara gishobora kuba camaze gufatwa n’umuhari M23, ibitarashobora kwemezwa gushika ubu n’abategetsi. Gushika ejo ku wa gatanu, nk’uko vyandikwa na Radio Okapi, M23 yari yamaze kwigarurira uturere hafi twose twa Busanza, Jomba, Bweza et Kisigari, hamwe n’ibigwati bimwe bimwe vy’akarere ka Rugari, kari ku birometero 30 mu buraruko bw’igisagara ca Goma. G﻿ushika ubu, ntaco abategetsi ba gisirikare barashikiriza ku kungene ibintu bimeze kuri uno wa gatandatu muri Rutshuru.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Aubameyang, Raphinha, Sterling, Eriksen, Loftus-Cheek, Nketiah
text: Imirwi ya Barcelona na Juventus yatangaje ku mugaragaro ko iriko irarondera ko Arsenal  yoyitiza umusatirizi wayo w'imyaka 32, umunya Gabon Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang mu gihe gisigaye c'ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka. (Athletic - subscription required) Umumenyereza wa West Ham David Moyes aripfuza umusatirizi wa  Leeds United Raphinha, akaba ariko aragerageza kugura uyu munya Brésil w'imyaka 25 imbere y'uko akadirisha k'igura n'igurisha ry'abakinyi ka nzero (mutarama mu kinyarwanda) kugara. (Mirror) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande, umwongereza Raheem Sterling w'imyaka 27 ariteguye gusubira gutangura ibiganiro na Manchester City kugira abandanya ayikinira, ni mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye nayo azorangira mu ci ryo mu 2023, kandi imirwi ya Barcelona, Paris St-Germain na Real Madrid yose iramwipfuza. (ESPN) Newcastle United titeze kwongereza amafaranga yemeye gutanga ku mukinyi w'inyuma wa Brighton  umwongereza Dan Burn  w'imyaka 29, ikaba yipfuza kandi na mugenziwe Eddie Nketiah w'imyaka 22 akina muri Arsenal. Amasezerano uyu musatirizi afitaniye n'uyu murwi azorangira mu ci riza. (Guardian) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United Paul Pogba ariteguye kubandanya akinira uyu murwi mu gihe umumenyereza mfatakibanza Ralf Rangnick yoguma i Old Trafford. Uyu mufaransa w'imyaka 28 yari yiteguye gusezera uyu murwi mu ci riza mu gihe amaszerano afitaniye n'umurwi wiwe azoba arangiye, ariko ubu akaba avugwa ko yiteguriye ibiganiro. (Sun) Brentford yizeye ko mu muri ino mpera z'iyi ndwi ishobora gutangaza ko yaronse umukinyi wo hagati, umunya Danemark Christian Eriksen. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 29 yashizwemwo agakaburamutima (pacemaker/stimulateur cardiaque) inyuma y'ingorane z'umutima yagize, igihe uhagarara umwanya muto mu gihe yariko akinira igihugu ciwe mw'ihiganwa rya Euro 2020 mu kwa gatandatu kw'umwaka uheze. (Times - subscription required) Umukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Pays de Galles/Wales Aaron Ramsey asa n'uko yiteguye kuguma muri Juventus,  ni inyuma y'aho uyu mukinyi wo hagati w'imyaka 31 yankiye imirwi yamurondera muri uku kwezi ari yo  Aston Villa, Burnley, Crystal Palace, Newcastle United na Wolves. (Calciomercato, via Football Italia) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United Donny van de Beek asaba umurwi wiwe ko womureka akava i Old Trafford muri kano kadirisha k'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi. Uyu mukinyi w'umunya-Hollande amaze gutanguzwa mu nkino zine gusa muri uno mwaka w'inkino, mu gihe Crystal Palace iri kw'isonga ry'imirwi imurondera ku ntizo.  (Mirror) Everton iripfuza kugura umukinyi wo hagati, umwongereza Ruben Loftus-Cheek w'imyaka 26 asanzwe akinira Chelsea. (Mail) West Ham iri mu biganiro na  Reims kugira irabe ko yoronka umusatirizi w'imyaka 19, umufaransa Hugo Ekitike asanzwe kandi aronderwa na Brentford, Brighton hamwe na Newcastle United. (Sky Sports) West Ham kandi iracari mu biganiro na Marseille mu rugamba rwo kurondera ko uyu murwi wo mu Bufaransa woyitiza umukinyi w'inyuma wa Croatia, Duje Caleta-Car w'imyaka 25, hamwe n'umunya Senegal akina imbere  Bamba Dieng w'imyaka 21. (90 Min) Aston Villa yari yemeye gutanga imiriyoni 20.8 z'ama euro ku mukinyi wo hagati w'umunya Uruguay Rodrigo Bentancur 24 ariko umurwi wiwe Juventus wayanse. (Guardian) Tottenham nayo nyene irashaka Bentancur ariko ikaba imushaka nk'intizo, ivyo Juventus iterekwa. (Sky Sports) Atletico Madrid yavuganye n'abaserukizi b'umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'iburyo wa  Aston Villa umunya Pologne Matty Cash w'imyaka 24 ikaba iboneka ko izogerageza kumugura mu ci riza, n'aho uyu murwi wa Espagne udashira kure iciyumviro co kumurondera muri uku kwezi kugira kurangire.  (Sky Sports) Juventus iriko iraraba ingene yozogura mu ci riza umukinyi wo hagati, umutaliyano Jorginho w'imyaka 30, mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye na Chelsea azorangira mu 2023. (Gazzetta dello Sport, via Mirror) Monaco ikeneye imiriyoni hagati ya 80 na 100 z'ama euros ku mukinyi wo hagati Aurelien Tchouameni w'imyaka 22, asanzwe ariko araronderwa na Real Madrid ariko kandi n'imirwi ya Chelsea na Manchester United ikaba imukanuriye amaso.(Marca) Wolves yemera gusa abashobora kwemera gutanga imiriyoni zababa 53, 6 zamadorari y'abanyamerika ku mukinyi wayo wo hagati, umunya Portugal  Ruben Neves w'imyaka 24, ateye amero imirwo ya  Manchester United na Arsenal. (Sun)

headline: Burundi: 'Turiyamirije abatwitiranya n'umugambwe' - Abepiskopi gatolika
text: Inama y'Abepiskopi b'i Burundi imenyesha ko ibabajwe n'uko hari bamwe bashaka kuyitiranya n'umugambwe biturutse ku gikorwa bakoze mu matora aheruka nk'indorerezi, mbere bakanashikiriza amahinyu bayabonyewo. Biri mw'itangazo ryasomwe n'umukuru w'iyo nama musenyeri Joachim Ntahondereye atanga umuco ku ruhara rwayo muri ayo matora. Iyo nama imenyesha ko itishimiye ingene sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro yavuze ivyo yashikirijwe "nk'uko yoba yaritwaye ku vyerekeye amatora". Ku wa 04 z'uku kwa gatandatu, iyo sentare niho yashikiriza ivyavuye mu matora yo ku wa 20/05/2020, aho yanavuze ko utunenge twashikirijwe n'inama y'abepiskopi b'i Burundi, co kimwe n'ibirego vyatanzwe n'umugambwe CNL utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ata shingiro bifise. Mw'iryo tangazo, musenyeri Joachim Ntahondereye  arongoye inama y'abepiskopi amenyesha ko itigeze yitwara muri sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingio. Ati: "Ico yakoze kwabaye ukugira ico ishikirije icese ku vyerekeye igikorwa c'uburorerezi yari yaronkeye uruhusha". Abasenyeri b' i Burundi bavuga ko ata mvo n'imwe yari ihari y'uko bitwara ngo kuko uruhara rwabo muri ayo matora cari igikorwa c'umurorerezi kandi bakagendera ku ngingo ngenganyifato y'abarorerezi b'amatora. Avuga ko igikorwa c'abarorerezi kwari ukwandika n'ukugumya gusa amahinyu y'ivyabaye yiboneye n'amaso yiwe gusa. Musenyeri Ntahondereye ati: "Turababajwe n'uko Inama y'abepiskopi yafashwe mu buryo butumvikana nk'uko yoba yaritwaye , ivyo navyo bigatera agapfungu mu mitima y'abantu". "Turanse ko twitiranywa n'umugambwe canke n'umuntu uwo ari we wese yahiganywe mu matora". Inama nkuru y'abepiskopi b'i Burundi, CECAB, yararungitse abarorerezi bayo barenga 2,700 mu makomine yose bashoboye kuja mu tuzu tw'amatora bahisemwo, nk'uko babivuga mw'itangazo ryabo ryo ku wa 26/05, iminsi ine inyuma y'ayo matora. Mw'iryo tangazo bari bamenyesheje ko ayo matora yabayemwo utunenge twari gushobora gutuma ivyari gutangazwa ko vyayavuyemwo bishobora kutizigirwa. Inyuma y'iryo tangazo, hari bamwe babonye ko Ekleziya Gatorika mu Burundi itari yishimiye ivyari vyaraye bitangajwe n'umurwi CENI ko ari vyo vyavuye mu matora. Hagati aho, inyuma y'aho Evariste Ndayishimiye w'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi atangarijwe burundu na sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro ko ari we yatsinze ayo matora, iyo nama y'abepiskopi yaranamukeje mw'itangazo ryayo ryo ku wa 05/06, inamusaba kuba "umukuru w'igihugu wa bose".

headline: Menya umushakashatsi wa Kaminuza ya Harvard yahagurukiye indwara zibonwa 'nk'izo abakene'
text: "Nahereye ubushakashatsi bwanje ku ngwara zisigaye zibonwa nk'iza 'kahise' mu bihugu bitunze, ubu naho ngiye gushira inguvu kuri Coronavirus", Mireille Kamariza, umushakashatsi wo muri Kaminuza ya Harvard yibanda ku ngwara zibangamiye ibihugu bikenye.

headline: Kenya: Bimwe mu vyaranze Dr Stephen Karanja yarwanya incanco za Covid ikaza kumwica
text: Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi Katorika muri Kenya yaritandukanije na Muganga Stephen Karanja  yari akomeye muri Ekleziya, inyuma y'aho batumvukaniye ku bijanye n'incanco za Covid-19. Muganga Karanja aherutse kwicwa na Covid-19 haciye indwi zitari nke yiyamiriza urucanco rw'iyi ndwara, aho yavuga ko "rutari rukenewe na gato". Uyu muganga yari arongoye ishirahamwe ry'Abaganga b'Abagatorika muri Kenya (Kenya Catholic Doctors Association) yahimiriza abantu kwiyuka hamwe n'ibinini hydroxychloroquine. Abajejwe amagara y'abantu hamwe n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi WHO/OMS bariyamiriza ivyo yavuga. Mu kwa gatatu, OMS yavuze iti: "Urucanco ruriko ruratangwa muri Kenya, rwarihwejwe neza kandi hampande ya OMS, n'izindi nzego zijejwe amahaga y'abantu barabonye neza ko ata ngorane rufise". Ntiyahuriza hamwe na Ekleziya Katorika ku bijanye n'umutekano w'incanco za Covid-19. Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi Katorika muri Kenya yariyamirije ivyavugwa na Muganga Karanja ku bijanye n'izi ncanco, aho yoyo yemeza ko "zemewe kandi zikurikije ibisabwa". Kenya yahawe doze zirenga umuriyoni z'incanco za Covid-19 muri wa mugambi mpuzamakungu wa Covax, igice kinini cazo kikaba kimaze gutangwa. Mw'ikete yanditse ku wa 03 z'ukwa gatatu uno mwaka wa 2021, Muganga Karanja yavuze ko "hari imiti yahawe iyindi ntumbero maze ikoreshwa mu kuvura Covid-19", yongera ko ati "turazi kandi ko incanco kuri iyi ndwara zidakenewe". Yaritabiriye amakoraniro atandukanye aho yagenda yerekana ko hari ubundi buryo bwo kuyivura, harimwo ukwiyuka n'iyindi miti myinshi harimwo hydroxychloroquine na Ivermectin, imiti itaremezwa na OMS ko ishobora kuvura Covid-19. Muganga Karanja, umuhinga mu bibazo vyerekeye kwibaruka n'ibindi bibazo bishingiye ku bihimba vy'irondoka vy'abakenyezi (obstétricien/gynécologue), yapfuye ku wa kane inyuma y'indwi yari amaze mu bitaro aho yariko aravurirwa Covid-19. Imbere y'uko atandukana na Ekleziya Katorika ku bijanye n'umutekano w'urucanco rwa covid-1, Muganga Karanja yagiye yifatanya n'abarongoye amadini mu kurwanya incanco zitandukanye. Mu 2019 yafashe iya mbere mu kwiyamiriza umugambi wo gucandaga abakobwa bari mu mashure mu ntumbero yo kubakingira kanseri yo mu gitereko, akavuga ko urucanco rw'umugera Human Papilloma Virus (HPV)  rutari rukenewe kandi ko rwari kugira ingaruka mbi "kuri abo bari bafise imibereho itabereye mu bijanye n'imibonano mpuzabitsina". Mu 2014, ishirahamwe ryiwe ryararwanije umugambi wa reta wo gucandaga abagore mu kubakingira tetanos, avuga ko wari umugambi wo kubagira ingumba, n'aho abajejwe amagara y'abantu mu gihugu, OMS hamwe n'ishirahamwe ryitaho ibibondo kw'isi, Unicef, basiguye ko urwo rucanco ata ngorane rwari rufise. Muri ivyo bihe vyose, reta yaribandanirije n'integuro zayo, ariko abategetsi bavuze ko bahuye n'inzitizi zivuye ku makenga abanyagihugu bagize bisunze inyigisho za Muganga Karanja. Yari kandi umuntu yafata iya mbere mu kurwanya ugukorora inda, aho mu 2018 yarengutse nk'umuhinga muri sentare mu rubanza rw'aho reta yaburanywa ku ngingo yo gufuta amabwirizwa ajanye no gukoroza inda. Sentare yemeje ko ingingo ya reta yari iteye kubiri n'amategeko. N'aho ryiyamirijwe n'abatari bake mu bahinga mu vyo ubuvuzi, ishirahamwe ryiwe yyaremewe na Ekleziya Katorika, ariko kenshi yama yihutira kumenyesha ko Muganga Karanja atavuga kw'izina rya Ekleziya Katorika. Patiri Ferdinand Lugonzo, umuvugizi w'Inama y'Abepiskopi Katorika muri Kenya, yabwiye BBC ati: "Igikorwa ca Ekleziya gishingiye ku nyifato n'ukwemera. Igikorwa c'abaganga naco gishingiye ku kungene batahura ibintu bafatiye ku buhinga bwabo. Ntabwo dutandukanye".

headline: Inama yohuje abakuru b'igihugu vy'akarere i Goma yasivye
text: Ya nama yari itegekanijwe hagati y'abakuru b'ibihugu vy'akarere k'ibiyaga binini kuwa Mungu 20/09/2020 i Goma mu buseruko bwa Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo yasivye. Ibi ni ivyamenyeshejwe n'ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire bwa Congo, ariko bukaba butamenyesha itariki iyi nama izoberako nk'uko bivugwa n'ibimenyeshamakuru vyo muri Congo. Iyi ngingo ije inyuma y'aho u Burundi bumenyeshereje ko butari kwitaba iyi nama, bukabuva ko abategetsi b'iki gihugu bafatiriwe n'ayandi mabanga y'igihugu. Ije kandi inyuma y'aho ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire y'u Rwanda nabwo nyene bwari bwandikiye bugenzi bwabwo bwa Congo, bubumenyesha ko bwipfuza ko inama yoba "hakoreshejwe bwa buhinga bwa videwo kw'itariki yokwumvikanwako n'abo vyega". Mw'itangazo yasohoye nijoro ku wa 17/09, Marie Tumba Nzeza, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Congo, amenyesha ko iyi nama izoba kw'itariki bazomenyesha, kandi ko "izoba hakoreshejwe ubu buhinga bwa videwo kubera ikiza ca Covid-19". Iyi nama yari yatumweko na Perezida Félix Tshisekedi ikaba yohuje abakuru b'igihugu vya Congo, u Rwanda, Uganda, Angola n'u Burundi kugira bigire hamwe ibibazo bihanze akarere. Muvyokwizwe muri iyi nama, harimwo ibibazo vy'amahoro n'umutekano mu karere k'ibiyaga binini, imigenderanire hagati y'ibihugu vyo kuri aka karere, hamwe no kunagura ibikorwa vy'ubutunzi hisunzwe utwigoro two kurwanya ca kiza karanda ca Covid-19. U Burundi bwari bwamaze kumenyesha ko budashobora kwitaba iyi nama kuri iryo genekerezo rya 20 nk'uko biri mu rwandiko Ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire yabwo bwarungikiye ubwa Congo. Leta y'u Burundi yipfuza ko hobanza hakaba inama yohuza abashikiranganji b'ibi bihugu bibiri, u Burundi na Congo, kugira ngo babanze baganire ku bibazo nyamukuru, harimwo umutekano ku rubibe hagati yavyo.

headline: Jurgen Klopp amenyereza Liverpool ati kwimurira CAN mu kwa mbere ni ingorane kuri twebwe
text: Umumenyereza wa Liverpool, Jurgen Klopp, avuga ko ari "akaga gakomeye" kubona ihiganwa ry'igikombe  c'umupira w'amaguru ry imirwi nserukirabihugu ya Afrika (CAN) rya 2021 ryimuriwe mu kwa mbere. Izo nkino za CAN 2021 zimuriwe mu kwa mbere kubera ikirere "kitoroshe" muri Cameroun izozitunganya, bikaba vyari bitegekanijwe ko ziba mu kwa gatandatu n'ukw'indwi. Ivyo bivuga ko hari imirwi myinshi y'ibihugu vya Bulaya, harimwo n'iy'Ubwongereza, izotakaza abakinyi bakomeye mu gihe gikomeye c'amahiganwa. Kuri Klopp, umurwi wiwe Liverpool uzobura abakinyi bakomeye, aribo Sadio Mane wa Sénégal, Mohamed Salah wa Misiri hamwe na Naby Keita wa Guinée. Ati: "Ivyo bivuga ko bizogorana cane kugira ngo dushobore kugura umukinyi wa Afrika". "Ibaze mu kiringo c'indwi zine zose utababona. Nk'umurwi utegerezwa kuvyitondera cane. Ivyo ari vyo vyose ku bakinyi ba Afrika si ingingo iborohereza". Ihiganwa rya 2019 ryabereye mu Misiri ryabaye irya mbere riteguwe mu ci, inyuma y'imyaka itari mike ryari rimenyerewe rikinwa mu kwa mbere no mu kwa kabiri. Ingingo yo mu mwaka wa 2017 yo kwimurira iryo higanwa mu ci yarakiriwe neza  cane, cane cane n'imirwi mikuru mikuru yo ku mugabane wa Bulaya. Iyi ngingo yo kwimurira izo nkino mu kwa mbere itumye zitazogongana n'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi rihuza imirwi itandukanye y'umupira w'amaguru rizoba mu kwa gatandatu 2021 mu Bushinwa. Ariko Liverpool iri mu mirwi ya mbere ya Premier League izotakaza abakinyi bayo rurangiranwa. Klopp yongera ati: "Iri higanwa ndarikunda cane rwose kandi namye ndarikurikirana kuva kera. Ni ihiganwa riryoshe cane". "Ariko, ni ingorane ikomeye iyo riteguwe umwaka w'inkino utararangira, n'aho ari ibintu vyumvikana ko abakinyi bazokina mu gihe ciza iwabo, mu gihe iwacu ikirere kiba kitoroshe". "Ariko nta bushobozi dufise bwo guhindura iyo ngingo - kuko iyo tuvuze tuti 'Nta mukinyi wacu turungika', uyo mukinyi aca ahagarikwa vy'agateganyo". Ku wa gatatu w'iyi ndwi, niho ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Afrika (CAF)  ryafata ingingo yo kwimurira iryo higanwa rya CAN 2021 mu kwa mbere. Cameroun niyo yabisavye kubera ivuga ko ikirere kitazoba cifashe neza mu kwa gatandatu n'ukw'indwi. Inyuma y'inama yabaye kuri uwo munsi, icegera c'umunyamabanga mukuru wa CAF, Tony Baffoe, avuga ati: "Tumaze kwihweza ivyashikirijwe n'abatari bake - cane cane abajejwe ikirere muri Cameroun, abamenyereza n'abakinyi - abaserukira umurwi ujejwe gutegura iryo higanwa ryemeye ivyo Cameroun yasavye". Iryo higanwa ritegekanijwe gutangura ku wa 09 z'ukwa mbere rirangire ku wa 06 z'ukwa kabiri.

headline: Ingaruka y’ibitero vy’abitwaje ibirwanisho kuri Ebola muri Kongo
text: Imirwi y'abaganga bariko barafasha guhangana n'ikiza ca Ebola muri Republika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Kongo bavuga ko utwigoro twabo tuburizwamwo n'ibitero bikorwa ku bakozi babo. Umugera w'iyo ndwara uriziziye intara zo mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu za Kivu y'Uburaruko hamwe na Ituri, uturere twiganjemwo imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho. Ishirahamwe Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) rivuga riti: "Nta cizere ko ukutizerwa be n'ibitero bikorwa ku bigo bijejwe kurwanya Ebola biriko birahagarara". Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, rirakurikirana ibitero bikorwa ku bajejwe amagara y'abantu n'ibigo vy'ubuvuzi. Uno mwaka wa 2019, muri ico gihugu ca Kongo niho habaye ibitero vyinshi gusumba, aho bimaze gushika ku 174, mu gihe mu gihugu ca Afghanistani ivyo bitero vyabaye 41, nayo muri Syria haba 35. Muri ivyo bitero, hariho ibikorwa ku bigo vy'ubuvuzi/amavuriro, ku bakozi, ku barwaye hamwe no ku miduga ikoreshwa muri ico gikorwa. OMS ivuga ko abantu batanu bamaze kwicwa uno mwaka, abandi 51 barakomeretswa. Muri ivyo bikorwa vy'iterabwoba n'ivyo bitero, abakozi baterwa amabuye, mu gihe ibigo vy'ubuvuzi navyo biterwa n'abitwaje ibirwanisho bakongera bakanabiturira. Biribonekeza ko abanyagihugu batizeye abakozi b'abanyamahanga hamwe n'ivyo babwirwa ku vyerekeye iki kiza ca Ebola. Icigwa casohotse mu mwaka wa 2018 mu kinyamakuru c'ubuvuzi, Lancet, cerekana ko "amakuru atari yo yakwiragijwe" ku vyerekeye ikiza ca Ebola mu ntara ya Kivu y'Uburaruko. Ica kane c'ababajijwe muri ico cigwa bavuga ko Ebola itabaho, abenshi muri bo bakavuga ko ikiza ca Ebola cakozwe ku nyungu z'amahera canke kugira ngo bahungabanye ako karere. Mu ntara ya Kivu y'Uburaruko, umurwi witwaje ibirwanisho witwa Mai-Mai, niwo wakoze ibitero ku bigo n'abakozi bajejwe ubuvuzi. Hari uwundi murwi urwanya ubutegetsi bwa Uganda usanzwe ukorera mu gihugu ca Kongo, Allied Defence Forces (ADF), nawo nyene ukaba wagirizwa gutera ibigo bijejwe ubuvuzi. Hampande y'iyo mirwi, hariho n'iyindi itazwi ikora ibitero ku bigo bijejwe ubuvuzi. Hari ikindi kintu kidasanzwe giherutse gushika mu kwezi guheze ka gatanu, aho abo mu muryango wari wapfishije umuntu basimbiye ku baganga bari baherekeje uwo muryango mu bikorwa vyo gushingura uwabo yari yasandavye. Amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu ajejwe ubutabazi avuga ko abanyagihugu banse kuyizera. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe MSF, Meinie Nicolai , avuga ati: "Ico tuzi ni uko abariko bafasha kurwanya Ebola - MSF  irimwo - batizewe n'abanyagihugu batari bake". MSF ivuga ko mu gihe ibihuha n'ibinyoma arivyo bikwiragizwa, abantu bafise kugira amakenga ku twigoro two kurwanya uwo mugera.

headline: Ronald Koeman: Barcelona yirukanye umumenyereza mukuru inyuma yo gutsindwa na Rayo Vallecano
text: Ronald Koeman yirukanywe mu kazi nk'umumenyereza mukuru wa Barcelone inyuma y'amezi 14 i Nou Camp. Barca ifise amanota 15 yonyene mu nkino 10 mw'ihiganwa rya La Liga kandi imaze gutsindwa kabiri mu nkino zo gukuranamwo muri  uyu mwaka w'inkino (saison) wa Champion's League Ku rutonde iri mu kibanza c'icenda,  ikaba irushwa amanota atandatu na zibiri zirongoye urwo rutonde inyuma yo gutsindwa na Rayo Vellecano  ku wa gatatu. Ryabaye irya gatatu Barca itsindwa mu nkino  zine za vuba kandi  vyabaye ku  wa mungu naho yari yatsinzwe muri  Clasico na Real Madrid. Mw'itangazo, uwo mugwi wo muri Espagne wavuze uti: "Umukuru w'umugwi,  Joan Laporta, yamumenyesheje [Koeman] iyo ngingo inyuma yo gutsindwa na Rayo Vallecano. "Ronald Koeman aja gusezera abakinyi kuri uyu wa kane." Uwo munya-Hollande w'imyaka 58, yakiniye igihugu, Everton na Southampton, , we na Barca ntibarenze ikibanza ca gatatu muri La Liga muri saison iheruka. Ibibazo  vy'amafaranga muri Barca navyo ntaco vyafashije Koeman, vyatumye  Lionel Messi  ava  muri uwo mugwi  akaja muri Paris St-Germain mu kwezi  kw'umunani. Barcelone  ntiyashoboye kugura umukinyi n'umwe mushasha mu ci riheze,  Memphis Depay, Sergio Aguero na Eric Garcia  bakaba baje bataguzwe nawe rutahizamu Luuk de Jong aza nk'intizo avuye muri  Seville. Bamaze gutsindwa ku wa gatatu, Koeman yavuze ati: "Ibi bivuze ko tudahagaze neza". "Umugwi nta reme ugira mu bakinyi, waratakaje abakinyi bakomeye, biri n'ico vyerekana. Iyindi migwi yagiye iriyubaka gusumba, twebwe si uko vyagenze, n'ivyo biri n'ico vyerekana." Xavi, yabaye rurangiranwa muri uwo mugwi ubu akaba ari umumenyereza wa Al Sadd yo muri Qatar, ari mu bafise amahirwe menshi yo gusubirira Koeman. N'ubwa mbere kuva mu kwezi kw'icenda mu 1987 Barca itsindirwa hanze gatatu yikurikiranya kandi itinjije - igihe vyashika bikaba vyari vyatumye umumenyereza w'umwongereza Terry Venables  yirukanwa. Koeman yaratahukanye igikombe ca Copa del Rey mu mwaka wiwe wa mbere ariko Barca yahejeje ari iya gatatu muri La Liga n'amanota ya mbere make kuva mu 2008. Uwo yahora akinira Hollande mu kibanza c'inyuma hagati yakiniye Barca hagati ya 1989 na 1995, ayifasha gutsindira ibikombe bine vy'ihiganwa ryo muri Espagne hanyuma yinjiza igitsinfo cahaye intsinzi uwo mugwi mu gikombe ca Coupe d'Europe co mu 1992. Yagarukanywe muri uwo mugwi mu kwezi kw'umunani mu 2020 nk'umumenyereza mukuru n'uwahoze ari umukuru wawo  Josep Maria Bartomeu. Ariko umukuru mushasha  Laporta, yaravuze kenshi ko uwo mugabo atariwe yamushizeho. Abo bagabo ntibabanye neza, gushika aho mu kwezi kw'icenda Koeman asohora itangazo avuga ko yohabwa umwanya wo gusubira kwubaka umugwi inyuma yo gutakaza Messi na mugenzi w'imbere  Antoine Griezmann mu ci. Inyuma yo gutsindwa  na Real Madrid ku wa mungu, imodoka ya Koeman yarakikujwe na bamwe mu bafana ba Barcelone,  Koeman mu nyuma akaba yabise "abantu batarezwe " Ni iki kitagenze neza muri  Barcelona? Kimwe mu bikorwa vya Koeman nk'umumenyereza kwabaye   guhamagara kuri terefone  Luis Suarez bitarengeje ama sekunda 40 aho yabwira uwo mukinyi w'imbere aturuka muri Uruguay ko atagikenewe afise umwidegemvyo wo kuva muri uwo mugwi. Iyo ngingo yari yafashwe n'uburongozi bw'umugwi kandi ubu birazwi ko vyavuye ku bibazo vy'amafaranga vyatumye bikura umukinyi w'imbere yari yatsinze ibitsindo 21 ku ncuro 29 yatanguye mu rukino muri saison yaheruka. Barca yaciye itangura gutakaza inguvu kuva ku mugwi wahora uhiganwa mu ya mbere i Buraya gushika aho bitaworohera kuronka ikibanza muri Champions League. Kuva ku murongo w'imbere ugizwe na Messi, Suarez na  Griezmann ukaja k'uwugizwe na  Depay, De Jong n'uwuriko arasaza Aguero vyerekana muri make akazi katoroshe  Koeman yari afise, kandi n'uwugiye kumusubirira niko kamurindiriye.

headline: Big Fizzo yoba yariganye indirimbo ya Diamond Platnumz?
text: Umuririmvyi rurangiranwa mu Burundi, Desire Mugani, azwi cane kw'izina rya Big Fizzo, avuga ko atiganye indirimbo ikunzwe cane ya Diamond Platnumz wo muri Tanzania. Big Fizzo yatanguye kumenyekana mu Burundi mu myaka 1996 aho yaririmba mu mugwi wavuza injana ya rap witwa N***a Soul. Ico gihe, naho igihugu cari mu bibazo bitoroshe vy'intambara, ari mu baririmvyi bake baremesha ibiteramo bihimbaye mu Burundi. Nyuma y'imyaka irenga mirongo ibiri ari muri uyu mwuga, Fizzo aracari ku rwego rwo hejuru mu muziki ndundi uvuzwa henshi wokwita pop music mu Congereza. Indirimbo ziwe zigezweho ubu nka Konzi, You na Sugua, zirirwa zisamirana ku maradiyo mu Burundi n'ahandi, mu butambiro eka mbere no ku mbuga nka Youtube, aho usanga zinaherekejwe n'amasanamu ahinguye bigezweho. Ariko bamwe mu bakunzi b'umuziki hamwe n'ababikurikiranira hafi, batanguye kwibaza niba Big Fizzo atoba ariko arafata inzira ya hafi mu kwandika indirimbo ziwe. Indirimbo Tetema y'umuririmvyi Diamond Platnumz yaririmbanye na Rayvanny imaze kurabwa kuri Youtube inshuro zirenga imiriyoni 27, kuri ubu ikaba iri mu zirabwa cane z'uwo munyamuzika. Uyumvirije ugaca unumviriza Sugua ya Big Fizzo yaririmbanye na Elly's Boy, Double Jay na Kirikou A-Kili bo mu kigo c'umukizi Bantubwoy, ntiwogenda udakozweko n'ugusa kwazo. Uhereye ku mudiho, ku ntambo co kimwe na hamwe hamwe mu majambo, ufise ugutwi kw'umuziki urashobora kwumva ko harimwo ibija gusa. BBC Gahuza yashatse kumenya ico uwo muririmvyi avuga kuri ukwo gusa kw'izo ndirimbo, ica ivugana nawe aho asanzwe ari mu gihugu c'Ubutariyano. Big Fizzo yatanguye ahakana ko ata ntumbero n'imwe yigeze agira yo kwigana iyo ndirimbo Tetema ya Diamond Platnumz. Yagize ati: "Abantu bavuga ivyo amatwi yabo agomba kuba atumva neza. Ntushobora kuvuga ko indirimbo zisa kubera ko gusa zifise umudiho umwe. "None duce tuvuga ko zouk zose zisa? Canke ko reggae zose zisa? Ku ntambo naho, imiziki myinshi abantu batamba bimwe, none ni kangahe batamba ndombolo mu miziki yo muri Kongo?" Fizzo kandi abandanya avuga ko mu ndirimbo nyinshi abantu bandika bimwe, gusa bigatandukanywa n'umudiho w'indirimbo canke injana. Ati: "None nk'ubu noreka kuririmba ngira nti 'ndagukunda' kuko hari uwundi yabivuze? Ivyo ntibishoboka. Amajambo ategerezwa gusa, ariko uburyo tubiririmba nibwo buzana ubudasa". Iyindi ndirimbo bivugwa ko Big Fizzo yiganye ni indirimo You, aririmba asa n'uwiyama abamuzanako ingorane mu buryo butandukanye. Iyi ndirimbo nayo uyumvirije, hanyuma ugaca wumviriza indirimbo yitwa F*** You y'umuririmvyi Kizz Daniel wo muri Nigeria, uca umengo hahindutse ururimi n'umurindi gusa. Fizzo yagize ati: "Kuri iyi ndirimbo yoyo sinobesha, kuko Kizz Daniel yampaye 'inspiration'. Harimwo vyinshi bisa muri izo ndirimbo zibiri. Wumvirije nko ku gitari hoho uravyumva." Big Fizzo yabandanije avuga ko ari ibintu bisanzwe kwisunga abandi baririmvyi, mu gihe ugerageje ukazanamwo umwihariko wawe. Abaririmvyi basubiramwo indirimbo z'abandi canke bifashisha bimwe mu biri mu ndirimbo z'abandi bariho, kandi si ibintu vya vuba eka mbere na barurangiranwa mu muzi barabikoze. Aha twotanga nk'akarorero ka Michael Jackson ku ndirimbo ya Manu Dibango yitwa Soul Makossa. Umuhisi Michael Jackson yafashe amajambo "ma-mako, ma-ma-sa, mako-mako ssa", ari mu iyo ndirimbo, ayakoresha mu ndirimbo yiwe "Wanna be starting something". Michael Jackson yaremeye ko yitije ayo majambo ayashira mu ndirimbo yiwe, aca yemera kuriha amahera Dibambo bitarinze guca muri sentare. Mu mwaka uheze, vyaramenyekanye ko hatanguye urubanza rwarezwemwo Ed Sheeran ku ndirimbo yiwe "Thinking Out Loud", urubanza rukibandanya. Umuryango wa Ed Townsend, yandikiye hamwe na Marvin Gay indirimbo rurangiranwa "Let's Get it On", wareze Ed Sheeran kwigana iyo ndirimbo ntegerwa yo mu 1973. Gutera imbere kw'ikintu ico ari co cose kuvana n'ubwira abagikora bagishiramwo hamwe n'umwihariko gifise mu kwitandukanya n'ibindi bikorerwa ahandi. Mu gihe vyotangura kwibazwa ko abaririmvyi mu Burundi atakindi bakora atari gukoporora indirimbo z'abandi, kazoza k'umuziki wo mu Burundi koba kageramiwe. Vyoba ari ibintu bitangaje kuko u Burundi bwamye bufise abaririmvyi bandika indirimbo nziza zibereye ugutwi nka ba Canco Amisi, Christophe Matata, Africa Nova, Kidumu eka mbere na Big Fizzo. Mu gutera imbere kw'umuziki ni ngombwa ko urwaruka rugitangura kwumva imuziki mu gihugu kinaka, rwumvishwa umuziki wihariye wo muri ico gihugu. Iki ni igikorwa cega abanyamuziki bo nyene, ariko cane cane amaradiyo ategura ibiganiro vy'urwaruka harimwo umuziki.

headline: R﻿eta y'Uburundi iragabisha abatimbo bari muri Nyege Nyege
text: Ubushikiranganji bw’Uburundi bujejwe Afrika y’Ubuseruko, Urwaruka, inkino n’imico kama "buriyamiriza ikoreshwa nabi ry’ingoma z’Uburundi" mw’isabukuru Nyege Nyege ririko ribera muri Uganda. Amasanamu y’abavuzi b’ingoma z’Uburundi bambaye umwambaro w’ibendera ry’Uburundi bariko baravuza ingomba muri iri sabukuru yarakwiragijwe cane ku mbuga hwaniro. Ubu bushikiranganji bushira ku rubuga rwa Twitter amasanamu yerekana abagore bariko batamba, bavuza n’ingoma z’Uburundi mu buryo butamenyerewe mu bijanye n’umurisho w’ingoma z’Uburundi. Isabukuru ry’indirimbo n'intambo, Nyege Nyege, ririko ribera mu gisagara ca Jinja mu buseruko bwa Kampala muri Uganda kuva ku wa 16 z’uku kw’icenda, inyuma y’aho reta y’iki gihugu itangiye uruhusha ko rishobora kuba habanje kuba impari. Isoko ryo muri ubwo bushikiranganji ryabwiye BBC ko umurwi w’aba batimbo bari muri iyi sabukuru batazwi na reta y’Uburundi kandi ko atari yo yabarungitse. Buciye ku rubuga rwabwo rwa Twitter, ubu bushikiranganji bumenyesha ko budashobora “kwihanganira umuntu uwo ari we wese acafuza imico n’akaranga vy’Uburundi”. Bwandika buti: “Uburundi burazi ko ingoma z’Uburundi ziriko zirakoreshwa nabi mw’isabukuru Nyege Nyene 2022 muri Uganda”. Ingoma z’Uburundi zanditswe mu murage ndangakaranga mw’ishirahamwe UNESCO kuva mu 2014, kandi ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko kuzikoresha binyuranyije n’amategeko bihanwa. Si bwo bwa mbere reta y’Uburundi yiyamiriza abavuza ingoma z’Uburundi reta itabitangiye uruhusha, cane cane abarundi b’impunzi ziba hanze. Mu 2019, reta y’Uburundi yamenyesheje ko hari abantu bashatse kwiba no kwiyitirira umurisho w’ingoma z’Uburundi mw’ihiganwa "East Africa's Got Talent" ryariko ribera i Nairobi. Ni inyuma y’aho umurwi witwa Himbaza Club wari ugizwe ahanini n’abarundi b’impunzi baba mu Rwanda witabiriye iri higanwa wambaye impuzu reta y’Uburundi ivuga ko zitemewe mu kuvuza ingoma.

headline: Coronavirus: Umunyeshure w’umunyakameruni asigura ingene yakize uwo mugera
text: Igihe Kem Senou Pavel Daryl, umunyeshure w'umunyakameruni w'imyaka 21, afatwa n'umugera wa coronavirus, nta ciyumviro c'ukuva mu Bushinwa camujemwo, n'aho yari kuba abifitiye ubushobozi. Ari mu cumba ciwe kw'ishure aho amaze iminsi 14 aba ukwiwe wenyene mu gisagara ca Jingzhou mu Bushinwa, yagize ati: "Uko vyongendera kwose, sinshaka gutwara ubu bugesera muri Afrika". Igihe yatangura kurwara, yaciye yibuka amagorwa yabonye akiri umwana igiye yafatwa na malaria. Yatinya ko ibintu vyoyangara. Ati: "Igihe nariko nja kwa muganga ubwa mbere, nabona urupfu imbere yanje nkaguma niyumvira ingene vyari kungendera". Mu kiringo c'iminsi 13, yagumye mu cumba ca wenyene kw'ivuriro ryo mu karere abamwo mu Bushinwa. Yahawe imiti ya antibiotiques hamwe n'iyindi miti  iri mu bwoko bw'iyisanzwe ihabwa abarwaye umugera wa SIDA. Inyuma y'indwi zibiri afata iyo miti, yaciye atangura kwerekana ibimenyetso vy'uko yariko aratora mitende. Ibipimo vyerekana ko ata ndwara arwaye. Yabaye umunyafrika wa mbere yamenyekanye ko yanduye uwo mugera ruhonyanganda, aca aba n'uwa mbere ayikize. Mirisi nico gihugu ca mbere ku mugabane wa Afrika catangaje ko hari umunyagihugu wayo yawanduye. Abahinga muvyo ubuvuzi baragabisha ko mu bihugu bisanzwe bitifashe neza mu vyerekeye ubuvuzi vyogorana cane kugira ngo bihangane n'uwo mugera umaze guhitana abantu barenga 1600, abandi nabo barenga 68.000 bakaba barawanduye, abenshi bakaba bari mu Bushinwa. Senoua ati: "Si nshaka gutaha ntahejeje amashure yanje. Sinibaza ko bikenewe ko nsubira mu gihugu kuko amafaranga yose nakoresheje mu kwivuza yarishwe na leta y'Ubushinwa. Kuva mu kwa mbere, ibihugu bitari bike kw'isi, birongowe na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, vyatanguye gutahukana abanyagihugu bavyo bibakura mu gisagara ca Wuhan no mu micungararo yaco. Ariko abanyeshure, abakozi n'imiryango y'abanyafrika ibihumbi n'ibihumbi, baracari mu kangaratete mu ntara ya Hubei aho iyo ndwara yatanguriye, bamwe bakabona ko ibihugu vyabo vyari bikwiye kubagarukirako. Tisiliyani Salima, umunyeshure yiga ivy'ubuvuzi akaba anarongoye ishirahamwe ry'abanyeshure bakomoka muri Zambia ati: "Turi abana ba Afrika ariko Afrika nta shaka ifise ryo kudutabara iyo tuyikeneye". Uyo mwigeme Salima amaze hafi ikiringo c'ukwezi yiyugaraniye mu cumba ca wenyene. Uyo mwigeme amaze guta icizere. Umwanya wose awumara aryamye arondera amakuru ajanye n'ico kiza mu Bushinwa ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi. Yicwa n'agahinda ariko abona ingene abanyeshure bagenziwe bo mu bindi bihugu bariko bahungishwa bavanwa mu gisagara ca Wuhan mu gihe bagenziwe bava mu gihugu kimwe batawe nk'akanuka. Umwe mu banyeshure atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana avuga ati: "Ibihugu hafi vyose vya Afrika yo munsi y'ubugaragwa bwa Sahara bafise ingorane nk'iyo". "Ibihugu vya Afrika, haba mu ntamatama canke ku mugaragaro, vyivugira ko Ubushinwa bushobora gufata ibintu mu minwe. Ariko ibintu biracagoranye. Iyo wumvirije abategetsi bakubwira ko badashaka gushavuza Ubushinwa." Ku wa 30 z'ukwa mbere, ishirahamwe ry'abanyakameruni  ryarandikiye umukuru w'igihugu cabo risaba ko leta yohungisha abantu bayo bari mu kangaratete muri ico gisagara kigeramiwe n'uwo mugera. Dr Pisso Scott Nseke, umwe mu barongoye abandi muri Wuhan, avuga ko  abanyakameruni bamaze indwi zitari nke bakirindiriye inyishu. Hagati aho, yemeza ko bose batumva kumwe ibijanye n'uko bohungishwa, ariko ko bababajwe n'ingene leta yabo ata na kimwe iriko irabafasha. Muri kuno kwezi kwa kabiri, ibihugu vya Mirisi, Algeria, Iles Maurice, Maroc n'amazinga ya Seychelles  vyarakuye abanyagihugu bavyo mu ntara ya Hubei. Hari ibindi bihugu nka Ghana na Kenya biriko vyihweza ingene vyohungisha abanyagihugu bavyo. Abanyafrika benshi bafitiye ishavu amaleta y'ibihugu vyabo babona ko yabahevye, bamwe bagasaba ko ibihugu vyose vya Afrika vyokwigira hamwe ingene vyofasha abanyafrika bari mu Bushinwa. Kuri Senoua wewe, nta mugambi afise wo gusubira muri Cameroun, akabona ko gusubira mu gihugu ashobora gusanga agiye atwaye uwo mugera.

headline: Ukraine: Abahinga ba Irani mu vya drone ‘ku rubuga’ muri Crimea – niko US ivuga
text: N﻿a George Wright George Wright Iran yarungitse abahinga ba gisirikare mu karere ka Crimée/Crimea kari mu minwe y’Uburusiya mu ntumbero yo gufasha kurungika za ndege zitagira abadereva, drones, mu bitero kuri Ukraine, nk’uko bivugwa na Maison Blanche/White House. Umuvugizi wa Amerika avuga ko aba ari abigisha n’abafasha mu vyo ubuhinga. Ku wa mbere, umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine, Kyiv, waratewe na drones “z’ubwiyahuzi” zarungitswe n’Uburusiya ariko zizwi ko zikorwa na Irani. Ubwongereza bwatangaje ibihano ku makompanyi n’abantu bafise uruhara mu gutanga izi drones. Umuvugizi w’igisata kijejwe umutekano w’igihugu muri Maison Blanche, John Kirby, yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: "Turabona ko abasirikare ba Irani bari ku rubuga muri Crimée kandi ko bafasha Uburusiya muri ivyo bikorwa". Avuga ko “igitigiri gito”c’abanya-Irani bafasha mu vyo ubuhinga, Abarusiya nabo bagatwara izi ndege zitagira abadereva muri Ukraine. Kirby ati: "Tehran ubu ifisemwo uruhara mu kuba iri ku rubuga be no mu gutanga ibirwanisho bigira ingaruka mbi ku basivire no ku bigo vya gisivire muri Ukraine”. Avuga kandi ko Amerika “izokoresha uburyo bwose” mu “gushira ahabona, kuzibira no guhangana n’ibikorwa vya Irani vyo gutanga ibi birwanisho birwanya abanyagihugu ba Ukraine”. Ukraine yabonye ko izi drones – canke indege zitagira abadereva (UAVs) – zakoreshejwe ku wa mbere, ko ari ibirwanisho vya Irani vyo mu bwoko bwa Shahed-136. Zizwi ko ari iz’ “ubwiyahuzi” kuko zisambuka iyo zikoze igitero – zikaba zitiriwe ba badereva b’indege b’Abayapani bakoze ibikorwa vy’ubwiyahuzi mu ntambara ya kabiri y’isi yose. Uburusiya bwakoresheje izi drones n’ibisasu vya misire mu gutera ibibanza bikomakomeye muri Ukraine mu misi iheze, busambura hafi ica gatatu c’amasoko ntanganguvu kuva ku wa mbere w’indwi iheze. Ibi vyatumye muri Ukraine, ku ncuro ya mbere, haba amabwirizwa asaba abanyagihugu gukoresha umuyagankuba muke ejo ku wa kane. Ubwongereza bwatangaje ibihano ku bajenerali batatu ba Irani hamwe n’uruganda ruhingura ibirwanisho kubera izi drones za Irani zakoreshejwe n’Uburusiya mu gutera Ukraine. Umunyamabanga w’Ubwongereza ajejwe imigenderanire James Cleverly  yagirije abo bafatiwe ibihano “gukokeza intambara” no kwikika inyuma y’ibitero “vy’agahomerabunwa” vya Moscou. Muri abo bafatiwe ibihano harimwo umukuru w’igisirikare ca Irani Jenerali-Majoro Mohammad Hossein Bagheri, hamwe kandi n’uruganda ruhingura drone ruzwi nka Shahed Aviation Industries. Hagati aho, Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine yagirije Moscou gutega ibibombe ku rugomero rukomeye mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine. Mu gihe urugomero rw’umuyagankuba rwa Kakhovka rwokwononekara cane, ibisagara 80 bishobora guterwa n’imyizurira, mbere n’ikigo ca nikleyeri ca Zaporizhzhia kikabura amazi yo guhoza, nk’uko Zelensky abivuga. Bishobora kandi gutuma ubumanuko bwose bwa Ukraine, harimwo na Crimea, bubura amazi. Ku wa gatatu, umurwi w’abahinga wo ku kigo cigisha ibijanye n’intambara, Institute for the Study of War, bavuze ko Moscou ishobora kuba iriko irategura igitero kuri uru rugomero igaca icegeka kuri Ukraine, yizeye ko umwuzurira wokwaduka woha akaryo keza ingabo z’Uburusiya ko kuva mu turere tw’intara ya Kherson ata nkomanzi. Uru rugomero rupima ibirometero 70 rukaba ruri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Kherson. Uburusiya buriko burahungisha abasivire bubakura mu turere twa Kherson bugenzura, mu gihe bwiteze igitero gikomeye ca Ukraine mu ntumbero yo kwisubiza iki gisagara.

headline: Ukraine: Perezida Zelensky yagize isanganya ry’imodoka ariko ‘ntiyakomeretse cane’
text: Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine yagize isanganya ry’imodoka nk’uko umuvugizi wiwe abitangaza. Imodoka yunguruza abantu yagonganye n’imodoka y’umukuru w’igihugu n’iz’abamugendanira ku mugwa mukuru Kyiv, nk’uko Sergii Nykyforov yabitangaje mw’itangazo rito. Ati: "Umukuru w’igihugu yapimwe n’umuganga, ntiyakomeretse cane”. Umushoferi w’iyo modoka yagonganye n’iy’umukuru w’igihugu yaciye avurirwa aho nyene hanyuma aca arunguruzwa na rusehabaniha. Nykyforov avuga ko inyamiramabi ziriko zirakora amatohoza ku bintu vyose bijanye n’iri sanganya. Nta zindi nsiguro yatanze. Ibi bibaye inyuma y’aho Perezida Zelensky, ubu afise imyaka 44, yari yagendeye igisagara giherutse kubohozwa ca Izyum, ikirindiro gikomeye co gushikana uburyo ku ngabo  kiri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Ukraine, ejo ku wa gatatu. Yashimiye ingabo zagize uruhara muri iki gitero co kwivuna Abarusiya banyaze ubutaka bwabo, mbere anahagarikira iduzwa ry’ibendera. Mu misi iheze, igisirikare ca Ukraine catangaje ko cabohoje uturere tw’ubutaka bwanyazwe, maze ingabo z’Uburusiya zisubira inyuma.

headline: DRC: Intara za Kivu ya Ruguru na Ituri ubu ziragoswe
