text: Reta ya Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo itangaza ko intara za Kivu ya Ruguru na Ituri mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu ubu zigoswe. Iyi ngingo ifashwe biturutse ku bwicanyi bubandanya bwiyongera muri izi ntara zibiri bukorwa n'inyeshamba zirwanya ubutegetsi bw'igihugu bibanyi hamwe n'izirwanya ico gihugu nyene, ziyogoza ako karere. Icegera c'umushikiranganji wa mbere akaba n'umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu, Daniel Aselo Okito, yabwiye abanyamakuru ko iyi ngingo ifise intumbero yo kugarukana umutekano muri ako karere. Avuga kandi ko yafashwe n'umukuru w'ico gihugu, Felix Tshisekedi, mu nama yari ahejeje gukorana n'Inama nkuru ijejwe kwivuna umwansi nijoro ku wa gatanu. Hari hajejeje kandi kuba inama ya mbere y'abashikiranganji  iherutse kwemezwa n'inama nshingamateka ku wa mbere uheze. Itangazo ry'ibiro vy'umukuru w'ico gihugu rivuga ko mu masaha ari imbere kuri uyu wa gatandatu umukuru w'igihugu aza gusohora itegeko bwirizwa risigura neza iyi ngingo. Muri DR Congo, ibitigiri bifiswe n'ishami rya ONU ryitaho impunzi kw'isi, UNHCR, vyerekana ko abantu imiriyoni 5.2 bataye izabo bagahungira hagati mu gihugu, igitigiri ca mbere kinini muri Afrika, kikongera kikaza ubwa kabiri kw'isi yose.

headline: Sharia: kubera iki iri tegeko rya Islam ribuza umuzik? Haruna Nkunduwiga arasigura
text: Inyuma y’aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan, ikintu ca mbere batangaje ni uko iki gihugu gitegerezwa kugendera kw’itegeko rya Islam, rizwi nka Sharia. Muri iri tegeko, hari vyinshi bibujijwe, kimwe muri vyo ni  umuziki. Mu ndwi iheze, umuvugizi w’aba Taliban Zabihulah Mujahid yabwiye ikinyamakuru New York Times ko umuziki ubujijwe mw’idini rya Islam. Mu gihe c’ubutegetsi  bw'aba Talibani mu myaka ya 1990, umuziki hafi ya wose, televiziyo n'amazu ya sinema vyari bibujijwe kandi kubirengako vyashoboraga kugira ingaruka zikomeye. Iri tegeko Sharia ririmwo ibifatwa nk’indenzarugero. BBC yashatse kumenya ico iri tegeko rivuga n’uko Islam ifata umuziki muri rusangi, ikaba yavuganye na Haruna Nkunduwiga yigeze kurongora umuryango w’aba-Islam mu Burundi. Haruna Nkunduwiga avuga ko iri tegeko ari itegeko ngenderwako rikunze gukurikizwa mu bihugu vya Islam, ariko ridakoreshwa mu bindi bihugu nk’Uburundi kubera Islam iri kumwe n’ayandi madini. Fyonda aho hejuru wumvirize ingene Haruna Nkunduwiga avuga.

headline: FAO: Ata mafaranga abonetse indege zo kurwanya inzige zirahagarara
text: Ishami rya ONU rikurikirana uburimyi n'ivyo kurya kw'isi FAO riragabisha ko indege zaryo zose zafasha mu kurwanya inzige zongeye gutera muri Afrika y'ubuseruko zishobora kudasubira gukora hamwe ritoronka amafaranga angana na miriyoni 38 z'ama dolari ($38 million). Izo nzige zitema zigatongora imirima zongeye gutera muri Ethiopia, Kenya na Somalia aho zigeramiye imibereho y'abarimyi n'abarozi basanzwe bahanzwe n'ingaruka z'izikiza ca Covid-19 n'imyuzure muri ako karere. Ku mwihwezo wa vuba, FAO isanga izo nzige zimaze gutera mu ntara 11  muri Kenya kandi ko ziriko zitera zija mu ntara zo kw'ibahari z'ico gihugu hamwe no muri Tanzania. Zimaze kwonona kandi imirima muri Ethiopia na Somalia uyu mwaka. Ribaye irya  gatatu  muri aka karere hatera inzige mu kiringo c'umwaka umwe. Inzige zateye: Aho ziva, ibyo zangiza, uko zirwanywa...ibyo ukeneye kumenya Icyorezo cy'inzige cyageze muri Uganda na Tanzania FAO iragabisha ko hagiye kuba ikindi gitero c'inzige Izo nzige nshasha zafashijwe gushwara akarere n'igihuhusi Gati  catumye mu minsi mike hagwa imvura ingana n'iyoguye mu kiringo c'imyaka ibiri. Vyatumye inzige zoroherwa mu kugwirirana. Umuhuzabikorwa w'ibikorwa vyihuta muri FAO muri Somalia, Ezana Kassa, avuga ati: "Ingaruka n'uko uburimyi n'ubworozi bihungabana cane mu gihugu kidasanganywe amaragamo mu vyerekeye ivyo kurya'' Iryo shami rya ONU rivuga ko gupompa imiti mu kirere no hasi , vyakozwe kuva izo nzige ziteye ubwa mbere mu kwezi kwa mbere mu 2020, vyari vyatumye hakizwa ibitegwa n'ibitungwa biciye amafaranga aharugwa muri miriyaridi 1.2 z'ama dolari. "Aho inzige zaheruka gutera ku rugero rusa n'uru rw'ubu, mu karere ka Sahel, vyasavye imyaka ibiri n'amafaranga arenga miriyoni 500 z'ama dolari kugira zishobore gutuzwa. Iki gitero kirakomeye gusumba, ariko ibihugu vy'a Afrika y'ubuseruko bisa n'ibizogitsinda-gusa ni bitange amafaranga y'igitoro kugira indege zigume zikora'',  bivugwa n'icegera c'umuyobozi mukuru wa FAO Laurent Thomas.

headline: Trump aranegura uwuserukira Ubwongereza ku butumwa bw'ibanga bwagiye ahabona
text: Perezida Donald Trump wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, aranegura uwuserukira Ubwongereza muri ico gihugu yavuze mu butumwa bwa email ko ubutegetsi bwiwe "ataco bushoboye". Bwana Trump avuga ati: "Jewe nokubwira ko uwuserukira Ubwongereza atakoreye igihugu ciwe neza". Ubwo butumwa bwa Sir Kim Darroch yanditse kuri email  bwavuga ko abagize ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vya Amerika (Maison Blanche) kuri Trump "ataco bashoboye" kandi ko "batumvikana". Umunyamabanga ajejwe ubudandaji, Liam Fox, yabwiye BBC ko kubona ubwo butumwa bumenyekana ari "ubumenyi buke, ingeso y'ukumena amabanga y'akazi kandi ari ukudakunda igihugu". Yavuze ko uwo ari we wese yashize ahabona izo emails yari afise "intumbero mbi" y'ugusambura imigenderanire mu vyo umutekano hagati ya Amerika n'Ubwongereza. Yavuze ati: " Ndizeye ko mu gihe twomenya uwabikoze, twokoresha inguvu zose tukamushira ku murongo, bibaye ngombwa n'amategeko akajamwo". Ubunyamabanga bujejwe imigenderanire buriko burakora amatohoza kugira bumenye ingene ubwo butumwa bwashikiriye ikinyamakuru Daily Mail co mu Bwongereza ejo ku wa Mungu. Ku ruhande rwiwe, Bwana Trump yabwiye abanyamakuru i New Jersey ati: "Twebwe si ukuvuga ngo turashima cane rwose urya muntu, kandi yarakoreye nabi Ubwongereza". "Rero ndashobora kumutahura kandi ndafise n'ivyo nomuvugako, ariko ntaco bimbwiye". Muri ubwo butumwa bwari ibanga ariko bugashirwa ahabona, Sir Kim yanditse ati: "Mu vy'ukuri nta cizere dufise ko ubu butegetsi buzoshika aho buja ku murongo; bugakora neza, bugafata intumbero  nziza; ntibucanemwo; bukagira imigenderanire myiza; bukerekana ko bushoboye". Umunnyamabanga ajejwe imigenderanire y'Ubwongereza, Jeremy Hunt, avuga ko ivyo Sir Kim yanditse biri "ku gatwe kiwe", atari kubw'ubutegetsi bw'Ubwongereza. Bwana Hunt asanzwe ariko ahiganirwa kuba umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza, avuga ko cari igikorwa ca ambasaderi gutanga "ivyiyumviro vyiwe", ariko ko bitavuga ko ari ho leta ihagaze. Avuga ko ubutegetsi bwa Bwana Trump "budakomeye gusa, ahubwo ko ari incuti ya mbere y'Ubwongereza kw'isi".

headline: Abantu bakomakomeye Africa yabuze mu mwaka urangiye: abaperezida, abahoze ari abaperezira n'abandi
text: Mu gihe umwaka waraye urangiye uwundi nawo ukaba utanguye, turabire hamwe bamwe mu bantu bakomeye bapfuye kuri uno mugabane wa Afrika. Turabe cumi muri aba bantu tutakiri kumwe. Mamma Sarah, nk'uko bamutazira, yagiye kumenyekana cane kw'isi igihe umwuzukuru wiwe Barack Obama abaye umukuru w'igihugu wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 2009, ariko imbere y'aho, yari azwi cane mu karere yamukamwo mu burengero bwa Kenya aho yari yarongowe n'umugabo yari akuze cane nawe akiri umuyabaga - nk'uko imico n'imigenzo yabitegeka. Mu myaka mirongo, yari arongoye ikigo co gufasha kwigisha impfuvyi n'abakobwa, ikintu yiyumvamwo cane kubera we nyene ubwiwe atari azi gusoma. Mu 2014, ONU yaramuhaye agashimwe ku gikorwa ciwe. Barack Obama  yavuze ko kwitangira indero vyatanguriye ku bana biwe, ati: "N'ubwo atari nyina wiwe w'amaraso, Nyokuru yarareze dawe nk'umwana wiwe, kandi urukundo rwiwe ruri mu vyatumye dawe ashobora guhangana n'ingorane aritwara neza mw'ishure gushika aho aronka uburenganzira bwo kuja kwiga kw'ishure kaminuza ryo muri Amerika". Barack Obama yavuze ko mu buzima bwiwe, Sarah Obama yagiye abona impinduka zitari nke uko ibihe vyagenda "ariko ubutwari bwiwe  - kugira umutima rugabo, yiyemera, akunda ibikorwa, adatwarwa n'ibihuhusi hamwe n'ubugwaneza vyiwe - ntibwigeze buhungabana". Sarah Obama yapfuye ku wa  29 z'ukwa gatatu 2021 Urupfu rw'uyu yari umukuru w'igihugu ca Tanzania rwatangajwe mu kwa gatatu inyuma y'indwi zirenga zibiri zari ziheze ataboneka. Reta yatangaje ko yahitanywe n'indwara y'umutima, ariko rero abakeba biwe bamwe bamwe ba poritike bavuze ko yari yanduye Covid-19. John Magufuli, uwakuriye mu muryango w'abarimyi, yagiye kuba umukuru w'igihugu mu 2015 akaba yari mu bategetsi bari bubashwe muri Afrika. Kw'izina ry'iritazirano nka Tingatinga (The Bulldozer), abamurwanya bamwagiriza ko yari umutegetsi yatwaza umukazo yarwanije ibinyamakuru, agatera ubwoba abatavuga rumwe nawe, yongera atuma abantu benshi bahitanwa na ca kiza ca coronavirus kubera yafashe minenerwe imigambi yo kukirwanya. Muri iki gisata, twatakaje kandi : Umukuru w'igihugu wa Tchad Idriss Déby, yiciwe ku rugamba, hamwe n'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Côte d'Ivoire Hamed Bakayoko, yahitanywe na kanseri. Abahoze ari abakuru b'ibihugu vya Algeria - Abdelaziz Bouteflika, Madagascar - Didier Ratsiraka, Somalia - Ali Mahdi Mohamed na Chad - Hissène Habré, nabo nyene barapfuye. Icegera c'umukuru w'izinga rya Zanzibar Seif Sharif Hamad, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Zimbabwe Sibusiso Moyo hamwe n'umushikiranganji yari ajejwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu Joel Biggie Matiza nabo bose barapfuye bahitanywe na  Covid-19. UMUNYAMUZIKI Alemayehu Eshete, 80 Uyu azwi nka Elvsi wa Ethiopia, Alemayehu yabaye rurangiranwa muri Ethiopia mu muziki wo mu mudiho wa jazz kuva mu myaka ya 1960 akaba yabandanije aryohera abantu gushika umwaka wanyuma w'ubuzima bwiwe. Kuva akiri muto, yari azwi cane mu gusubiramwo indirimbo za Elvis Presley, ariko mu 2008 yabwiye ikinyamakuru Guardian ko James Brown ari we yahavuye aba icitegererezo kuri we. Ati: "Nambara nk'umunyamerika, ndatereka imishatsi yanje, nkama ndirimba Jailhouse Rock na Teddy Bear - rimwe na rimwe twararirimba Strangers in the Night. Ariko kuva igihe ntanguriye kuririmba indirimbo z'iki amharic, abantu barankunze bimwe bidasanzwe". Alemayehu Eshete yapfuye ku wa 02 z'ukw'icenda, abanya Ethiopia bakimukunda cane. Muri iki gisata c'abanyatugenegene, twaratakaje kandi : umunyamuziki wa Afrika y'Epfo Sibongile Khumalo, yaririmvye kuva ku midiho ya jazz gushika ku midiho kama; umucuraranzi w'itarumbeta wa Afrika y'Epfo Jonas Gwangwa;  umuririmvyi w'indirimbo zihayagiza Imana n'umudiho wa jazz  Wambali Mkandawire; umwe mu banyamuziki ba Senegal bakomeye cane Thione Seck; umunyamuziki wa Cameroun  Wes Madiko; umunyamuziki w'umunyarwanda wo mu mudiho wa rap Jay Polly, yari yapfunzwe yagirizwa gutunga ibiyayuramutwe; umunya Namibia yaririmba mu mudiho wa hip-hop Kanibal hamwe n'umwe mu baririmvyi ba Algeria  bakunzwe cane Rabah Deriassa UMUHINGA mu kuremura ibihimba vy'umubiri Matolase Mtonga, 34 Nk'umwe mu bahinga ba Zambia mu vyo kubaga mu kuremura ibihimba vy'umubiri vyonionekaye  (chirurgie plastique/plastix surgery),  Mtonga yagiye kubona umuhamagaro wiwe igihe yariko aravura abarwayi bahiye, ico gihe akaba yari umunyeshure yiga ivy'ubuganga. Ishirahamwe ReSurge ryanditse riti: "Ni ukuri yari icitegererezo c'umugore w'akarorero, kandi yari mu nzira yo kuba umugore wa mbere muri Zambia yose w'umuhinga mu bijanye no kuremura ibihimb vy'umubiri vyononekaye. Uru ni uruhombo rukomeye cane, atari gusa kuri twebwe twari tumuzi, ariko kandi no kuri kazoza muri iki gisata, haba mu gihugu ciwe eka mbere no kw'isi yose". Mtonga yapfuye mu kwa cumi na kabiri haciye igihe gito avuye mu nama ya chirurgie plastique yari yabereye muri Amerika. Rwabaye urupfu rubabaje cane. Ubutumwa bwacishijwe kuri Facebook ni ubwo umugabo umwe yavuriye umugore wiwe mu myaka mike iheze, aho yanditse ati: "Dr Mtonga yageze kure akoresha amafaranga yiwe kugira agure ivyari bikenewe kugira ngo ashobore kuvuga umugore wanje, aho hose yashaka ko umugore wanje akira ukuboko kwiwe kw'iburyo n'intoke". Twatakaje kandi: Umwigisha wa kaminmuza wa Nigeria akongera akaba n'umuhinga mu bijanye n'imigera David Olufemi Olaleye hamwe na John Baptist Mukasa, umwe mu bahinga bake ba Uganda mu bijanye n'ukubaga imitsi, yari yiyemeje kwigisha abandi baganga ku nyungu za kazoza. Uyu munya Afrika y'Epfo yahanganye n'ubutegetsi bw'ivanguramoko bwa apartheid muri Afrika y'Epfo, yinjiye mw'ishengero rya Anglican  aratera imbere gushika aho aba umwirabure wa mbere abaye Musenyeri mukuru  wa Cape Town mu 1986  - haciye imyaka ibiri ahawe ka gashimwe k'amahoro kitiriwe Nobel ku ruhara rwiwe mu kurwanya intwaro y'inkehwa z'abazungu. Kw'izina ry'iritazinaro rya The Arch, yahavuye agenwa kurongora umurwi wo kumenya ukuri n'ukurekuriranira inyuma y'aho Nelson Mandela atsindiye amatora ya mbere y'inyuma ya apartheid mu 1994. Nk'umuntu yafatwa nk'umuhanuzi muri Afrika y'Epfo, Tutu ntiyatinya kunegura bikomeye ubutegetsi bw'inyuma ya apartheid muri ico gihugu yataziriye The Rainbow Nation.  Tutu yapfuye mu kwezi guheze kwa cumi na kabiri, iyi ndwi yose ikaba iheze bariko baramwunamira, bikaba bitegekanijwe ko ashingurwa kuri uyu wa gatandatu. Twatagkaje kandi : FW de Klerk, umukuru w'igihugu wa nyuma w'ubutegetsi bwa apartheid muri Afrika y'Epfo, yasangiye agashimwe ka Nobel na Mandela mu 1993 kubera yafashije mu biganiro vyarangije ubutegetsi bwa apartheid. TB Joshua yapfuye ku wa 05 z'ukwa gatandatu. Ubutumwa bwacishijwe ku rubuga  rwa Facebook rw'uyu muvugabutumwa wa Nigeria  bwavuga buti: "Imana yisubije Umukozi wayo". Bwatumye imiriyoni n'imiriyoni y'abanywanyi b'ihsengero ryiwe kw'isi yose Synagogue Church of All Nation baja mu kigandaro. Uyu muvugabutumwa yari asanzwe afise abanyaporitike bo hejuru mu banywanyi biwe, yagiye kuba rurangiranwa kubera "ibitangaro" vyiwe, mbere akaba yatangaje ko yari afise ububasha bwo gukiza indwara z'ubwoko bwose, harimwo n'umugera wa SIDA. Muri iki gisatan yene twaratakaj: Umukardinali wa Cameroun Cardinal Christian Tumi, aho urupfu rwiwe rwashize hamwe mu mubabaro iki gihugu kirangwamwo indyane,  Alexandre José Maria dos Santos, umupatiri wa mbere w'umwirabure wa Mozambike yagiye kuba mu nyuma umu kardinali wa mbere w'ico gihugu, umutegetsi wo mw'idini rya Islam muri Tunisia  Hichem Djait hamwe n'umusenyeri mukuru wa Katorika muri Sudani y'Epfo Paulino Lukudu Loro. Abanonotsi ba Kenya baracitse intege bamaze kwumva ko mugenzi wabo yaciye umuhigo kw'isi yacumiswe imbugita gushika yitabe Imana mu kw'icumi. Umugabo wiwe, Ibrahim Rotich, avuga y'uko ata ruhara afise muri ubu bwicanyi. Tirop yaboneka ko yari agiye kuba umwirutsi rurangiranwa inyuma yo guca umuhigo ku birometero 10 ku ruhande rw'abagore mu kw'icenda, mbere akaba yaraserutse mu nkino za Olempike i Tokyo. Twatakaje kandi: Umunyonzi w'ikinga wa Eritrea Desiet Kidane, yapfuye agonzwe n'imodoka igihe yari mu myimenyerezo, umunya Senegal yahoze arongoye ishirahamwe ry'abanonotsi kw'isi (IAAF) Lamine Diack, umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru wa Afrika y'Epfo Ryder Mofokeng yabaye kizigenza w'umurwi Kaizer Chiefs mu kiringo c'imyaka 11, hamwe n'umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru wo muri Nigeria Yisa Sofoluwe, yari azwi mu murwi nserukiragihugu nka "Defence Minister" (umushikiranganji w'ukwivuna abansi). Uyu mwami w'Abazulu muri Afrika y'Epfo, yari umuntu akomeye cane yaharanira akaranga n'imico kama mu myaka 50 yose yari amaze ku butegetsi. Yari uwo mu muryango w'Umwami Cetshwayo, yayoboye Abazulu muri ya ntambara yabahuza n'igisirikare c'Ubwongereza mu 1879. N'aho uyu mugabo, se w'abana 28 yavyaye ku bagore batandatu, ata butegetsi bwa poritike bwite yari afise, yaserukira abafise ivyiyumviro vy'uko Afrika y'Epfo itiyigeze yibagira akahise kayo, n'aho yahindutse ikaba igihugu ca none. Umwe mu bagore biwe, umwamikazi Queen Mantfombi Dlamini-Zulu, yaramusubiriye mu kwa gatatu, ariko yaciye apfa haciye ukwezi kumwe gusa. Twatakaje kandi: Sulutani Sultan El-Hadj Ibrahim Mbombo Njoya w'umunya Cameroun, umwami w'abanyagihugu bo mu bwoko bw'aba Pedi muri Afrika y'Epfo, Victor Thulare III na Kefa Sagbadjou Glele, umwami w'aba Abomey muri Benin. Uyu mukinyi w'amareresi wo mu Misiri yamaze imyaka 50 akina amareresi. Yarakinye amareresi ateye ubwoba ariko kumbure yari azwi cane kandi akundirwa ubuhinga bwiwe bwo gutwenza. Kuri bamwe, izina rya El-Bably ryibutsa imyaka ya 1950 na 1960 igihe sinema yabica bigacika. Mu nyuma yahavuye amenyekana cane kuri televiziyo akina udukino mu mareresi yakunzwe cane mu buzima bwa buri muryango igihe cose ca Ramadani. Soheir El-Bably yapfuye k uwa 21 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe. Twatakaje kandi : Umunyarwenya w'umusomalia Ibrahim Ismail, azwi cane ku ritazirano rya  Soran, hamwe na Abdi Muridi Dhere uwundi munyarwenya w'umunyasomalia nyene. Uwundi umwe mu banyarwenya ba Nigeria rurangiranwa Baba Suwe na we nyene yarapfuye. Uyu yarwaniye ukwikukira kwa Zambia yapfuye mu kwa gatandatu, yari umwe mu bategetsi ba nyuma ba Afrika barwanije intwaro za gikoloni. Yavuga ko icipfuzo ciwe ari ukubona buri munya Zambia afise igi ku meza mu mfungurwa ziwe zo mu gitondo, agacupa k'amata - kandi buri munya Zambia akambara ibirato. Kw'izina ry'iritazirano rya KK, yarakunda kuvuza igitari, akaba yari umwigisha imbere y'uko yinjira mu rugamba rwo kurwanira ukwikukira, mbere akaba yari mu bantu bari bafashe mu mugongo utwigoro two kurandurana n'imizi ubutegetsi bwa apartheid muri Afrika y'Epfo, yongera afata mu mugongo imihari yo kwibohora muri Mozambike no muri Zimbabwe.

headline: Ba basirikare b’u Rwanda bari bapfungiwe muri DR Congo barekuwe
text: Igisirikare cy’u Rwanda kivuga ko banyurujwe ku mupaka bari mu kazi kabo ko gukizura. Igisirikare cya DR Congo kivuga ko bafatiwe hafi y’ikambi ya gisirikare ya Rumangabo mu ntara ya Kivu ya Ruguru ku birometero birenga 20 uvuye ku rubibe rw’u Rwanda. Aba basirikare bafashwe ku wa 23 Rusama (5) bazwi ku mazina ya Nkundabagenzi Elysee na Ntwari Gad. Bafashwe mu gihe hari intambara zikomeye hagati y’igisirikare ca Congo (FARDC) hamwe n’inyeshamba z’umuhari M23, reta ya Congo ikagiriza Urwanda ko rufasha uyu muhari watangajwe ko ari uw'iterabwoba, ivyo ruhakana. Itangazo rihejeje gusohorwa n’igisirikare c’u Rwanda rivuga riti: “Inyuma y’inyuruzwa ry’abasirikare babiri ba RDF bariko barakizura ku rubibe hagati y’u Rwanda na DRC ku wa 23 Rusama 2022, n’ibiganiro vyakurikiye hagati y’abakuru b’ibihugu vya Angola, DRC n’u Rwanda, RDF iri n’munezero wo kumenyesha ko aba basirikare babiri bagarukanywe neza mu Rwanda. “RDF irashima utwigoro twakozwe kugira ngo izi ngabo zayo zibiri zirekurwe”. Ifatwa rya Kaporari Nkundabagenzi Elysee na Private Ntwari Gad ryashingiweko n'igisirikare ca DR Congo, nk'ikimenyetso c’ivyo bagiriza u Rwanda ko rwinjiye muri ico gihugu gufasha M23. Reta y’u Rwanda irahakana yivuye inyuma ivyo yagirizwa, ahubwo ikagiriza igisirikare ca Congo ko gikorana n'umuhari FDLR wagirizwa ihonyabwoko ryo mu Rwanda mu 1994 mu guhingabanya iki gihugu. Reta y’u Rwanda yabandanije isaba ko yosubizwa abasirikare bayo bari mu minwe ya Congo. Vyabaye ngombwa ko Perezida wa Angola João Lourenço aja hagati, ari ho mu ntango z’uku kwezi Perezida Felix Tshisekedi yemeye kubakura, hari mu nama yabahuje kuwa kabiri i Luanda, nk'uko vyatangajwe n'itororokanirizo ry’amakuru rya reta ya Angola, Angop.

headline: Finland, igihugu gitwawe n'abagore
text: Finland, igihugu gitwawe n'abagore kikaba ari naco kirangwamwo umunezero kurusha ahandi kw'isi mu mwaka w'2019 nk'uko icegeranyo ca ONU kibivuga. Umushikirangani wa mbere ni umugore, akaba ari we mushikiranganji wa mbere akiri muto kurusha abandi kw'isi.

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Ronaldo, Messi, Kimpembe, Traore, Neymar, Lingard, De Ligt
text: Paris St-Germain yavuganye n’umusatirizi wa Argentina Lionel Messi w’imyaka 35 mu ntumbero yo kurondera ko yozotera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha y’umwaka umwe maze akaguma muri uno murwi gushika mu 2024. (Marca) Umusatirizi wa Manchester United  umunya-Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w’imyaka 37, yemerewe umushahara w’imiriyoni 300 z’ama euro kugira aje gukinira umurwi wo muri Arabia Saoudite mu kiringo c’imyaka ibiri y’inkino. (TVI na CNN Portuguesa ziciye kuri AS – muki espagnol) Ajax yemeye ko yatsinzwe mu rugamba rwo kurondera kuzibira Martinez ngo ntagende muri rino ci – ariko uno murwi wo muri Hollande umushakako imiriyoni 46 z’amapawundi. (Times) Chelsea iriko irarondera umukinyi w’inyuma wa Paris St-Germain umufaransa Presnel Kimpembe w’imyaka 26, inyuma yo kwemeranya na Napoli ku giciro c’umukinyi w’inyuma wa Senegal Kalidou Koulibaly w’imyaka 31. (Guardian) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande, umudagi Serge Gnabry araronderwa na Chelsea ariko uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 27 ari hafi yo gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha muri Bayern Munich. (Kicker iciye kuri Mail) Everton  yabwiwe na Wolves ko ishobora kwemera imiriyoni cumi z’amapawundi ku mukinyi wo ku ruhande  Adama Traore w’imyaka 26, muri rino ci. (Football Insider) Umukinyi w’inyuma wa Hollande Matthijs de Ligt w’imyaka 22 ariteguye kwemera kugabanirizwa umushahara kugira yinjire muri Bayern Munich avuye muri Juventus. (Bild – mu kidagi) Barcelona iriteguye kwongereza amafaranga gushika ku miriyoni 50 z’ama euros ku musatirizi wa Bayern Munich umunya-Pologne Robert Lewandowski w’imyaka 33. (£42m). (Bild – mu kidagi) Manchester City iriko irakurikiranira hagufi ikibazo c’umufaransa Jules Kounde w’imyaka 23 akina inyuma muri Sevilla, mu gihe iriko irondera abashobora  gusubirira umunya-Hollande Nathan Ake w’imyaka 27, ashobora kwimukira muri  Chelsea. Barcelona nayo nyene iripfuza Kounde. (Mail) Leeds United iracarindiriye inyishu iva muri Club Brugge inyuma yo kuyisaba umusatirizi w’umubirigi Charles de Ketelaere. Ariko uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 21 ashobora guhitamwo kuja muri AC Milan, na yo nyene ikaba isanzwe iri mu biganiro n’uyu murwi wo mu Bubirigi. (Fabrizio Romano - Twitter) AC Milan yemeye gutanga imiriyoni 30 z’ama euro kuri De Ketelaere, ariko Leeds yoyo yemeye kumutangako imiriyoni 37 z’ama euros. (Calciomercato) Leeds iripfuza kwakira umukinyi wo hagati wa Espagne Juan Mata w’imyaka 34, ubu yigenga inyuma yo kuva muri Manchester United mu mpera z’umwaka w’inkino urangiye. (AS – mu ki espagnol) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Chelsea umwongereza Mason Mount w’imyaka 23, arashaka ko ibiganiro bitangura ku masezerano mashasha y’igihe kirekire. (Athletic) Umusatirizi wa Brezili Neymar w’imyaka 30, ntiyipfuza kuva muri Paris St-Germain muri rino ci, n’aho hari amakuru avuga ko ashobora kuva muri uno murwi wo ku mugwa mukuru w’Ubufaransa. (Goal) Bitegekanijwe ko umukinyi wo ku ruhande, umufaransa Ousmane Dembele w’imyaka 25, atera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha y’imyaka ibiri muri  Barcelona inyuma y’aho ayari ahasanzwe arangiriye. (Sport – mu ki espagnol) Arsenal iriko iradindiza ivyo kugenda kwa Lucas Torreira inyuma y’aho uyu munya-Uruguay w’imyaka 26 akina hagati yemereye kwimukira muri Valencia. (Sport 890 iciye kuri Mirror) Umurwi uherutse kwimukira mu cicaro ca mbere c’ihiganwa ry’Ubutaliyano Serie A, Monza, iripfuza kuzana umusatirizi wa Uruguay  Edinson Cavani  w’imyaka 35 inyuma yo kuva muri Manchester United amasezerano yiwe arangiye. (Sky Sport Italia via Mail) Manchester City yemeye kuzana umukinyi wo hagati Emilio Lawrence asanzwe ari muri Everton. Uyu munya-Ecosse w’imyaka 16 ariko kandi arakurikiranirwa hagufi na Manchester United hamwe na  Chelsea. (Football Insider)

headline: Kwibaruka umuvyeyi abanje gukorwa 'akenshi ni yo nzira nziza' ku bakozwe muri kahise
text: Ubushakashatsi bushasha bwerekana ko ukwibaruka babanje gukorwa (cyangwa kubagwa mu Kinyarwanda) bavyiteguriye bushobora kuba ari bwo buryo bwiza ku bagore baba bari bamaze gukorwa muri kahise. Kuri abo bavyeyi, ukugerageza kwibaruka mu buryo busanzwe vyabonetse ko bifise ingaruka atari nziza ugereranije n'ukwibaruka babanje gukorwa ('césarienne'), nkuko biri muri ubu bushakashatsi bwatangajwe mu kimenyeshamakuru c'ubushakashatsi mu vy'ubuvuzi, PLOS Medicine. Abahinga bavuga ko vyiza ari uguhitishamwo igihe bishoboka - umuvyeyi agahitamwo kwibaruka mu nzira zisanzwe, canke akabanza gukorwa. Iperereza riherutse gukorwa n'ikiganiro Victoria Derbyshire ca BBC, rirerekana ko ivyo bidahuta birashika, kuko abavyeyi benshi basaba ko babanza gukorwa ariko ntibavyemererwe. Umukenyezi kwibaruka abanje gukorwa akenshi biba igihe habaye ingorane, canke iyo bibonetse ko hashobora kuba ingorane mu gihe yogerageza kwibaruka mu nzira zisanzwe. Hagati aho, hariho n'abavyisabira. Mu gihugu c'Ubwongereza, abagore barenga ica kane bibaruka babanje gukorwa. Muri abo, igice cabo ni mu gihe haba habaye ingorane, ikindi gice naco ni abagore bavyihitiramwo canke baba babiteguye. Muri rusangi, ukwibaruka ntibishobora kubura ingaruka mbi, haba igihe bibaye mu nzira zisanzwe, canke umuvyeyi abanje gukorwa. Ubwo bushakashatsi bwakorewe mu gihugu ca Écosse (Scotland) bwagereranije ingaruka ziba iyo  ku ruhande rumwe, umuvyeyi yibarutse akozwe yavyisabiye canke bisanzwe biteguye, ku rundi ruhande, umuvyeyi yibarutse mu buryo busanzwe yarigeze kwibaruka abanje gukorwa muri kahise. Ubwo bushakashatsi bwasanze : Nk'uko ikigo c'abahinga mu vyerekeye irondoka co mu Bwongereza (Royal College of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists) kibivuga, ni vyiza ko buri gihe abagore bohitishwamwo uburyo bwo kwibaruka butobateza ingorane. Muri rusangi, abakenyezi batatu kuri bane bamaze gukorwa incuro imwe, iyo bagerageje kwibaruka mu buryo busanzwe birakunda, ariko ica kane cabo babigerageje baruhira gukorwa mu buryo bwihuta. Abavyeyi bakwiye kumenya ko iyo bibarutse babanje gukorwa batari bavyiteze, akenshi birabagirira ingaruka mbi, gusumba iyo baba bavyiteguriye imbere y'igihe. Iyo umuvyeyi yibarutse abanje gukorwa, birashobora gufata igihe kirekire kugira ngo ashobore gukira. Ashobora n'ukuhandurira indwara canke agatakaza amaraso menshi cane. Iyo umuvyeyi akozwe, arakira ariko agasigarana inkovu mu gitereko, ivyo navyo bigashobora kuzomutera ingorane muri kazoza mu gihe asamye iyindi mbanyi. Abahinga bavuga kandi ko n'umwana hari igihe ashobora kugira ikibazo c'uguhema mu kiringo gito, canke ugasanga baramukevye batabibonye (ivyo birashika ku bana babiri ku bana ijana, ariko kenshi akira ningoga kandi ata zindi ngorane zihabaye). Iyo umuvyeyi yibarutse mu nzira zisanzwe, bisigura ko ataguma mu bitaro umwanya muremure, agakira ningoga agaca asubira ku bikorwa vyiwe vya minsi yose, kandi biratuma atanarinda gukorwa muri kazoza. Hagati aho, birashobora gutuma atabuka umubiri uri hagati y'igihimba c'irondoka n'ikibuno (périnée/perineum). Vyongeye, ku bagore bigeze kwibaruka bakozwe: Si vyiza ko umugore amaze kwibaruka abanje gukorwa nk'incuro zitatu canke zine yorondera kwibaruka mu nzira zisanzwe, nkuko bivugwa n'ikigo c'abahinga mu vyerekeye irondoka co mu Bwongereza. Muganga Pat O'Brien, umuhinga mu vy'irondoka akaba n'umuvugizi w'ikigo kijejwe irondoka, avuga ati: "Abagore bohumurizwa ko igihe cose bishoboka kandi ari vyiza kwibaruka mu buryo busanzwe, canke akitegura kwibaruka akozwe iyo aheruka kwibaruka abanje gukorwa". "Ni vyiza ko haba ibiganiro bikwiye hagati y'umuvyeyi n'uwumukurikirana kugira ngo ashobore guhitamwo neza uburyo yokwibarukamwo, kandi abahinga bakanamuba hafi".

headline: Kenya igiye guhererwa n'inkingo za Covid-19
text: Uwujejwe umugambi wo gukingira ikiza ca Covid-19 muri Kenya yabwiye BBC ko ububiko bw'inkingo Kenya yahawe buzoba bugaragara mu ntango z'indwi iza. Dr Willis Akhwale yavuze ko Kenya yari yaronse inkingo zirenga umuriyoni mu nkingo imiriyoni 3,5 za AstraZenea ico gihugu cari casavye umugambi Covax (ujejwe kuronsa inkingo ibihugu). Yagize ati "twateye incanco abanye Kenya bashika hafi 940.000, rero nta zindi nkingo dusigaranye." Ibi bisigura yuko abanye Kenya bari munsi ya 2% ari bo baronse urukingo rwa mbere. Abajejwe ivy'amagara bari bizigiye gutangura gutanga urukingo rwa kabiri kuva mu ndwi yambere y'ukwezi kwa gatandatu, ariko iyo gahunda isa n'iyitagikunze. Guhagarika kurungika hanze inkino vyagizwe n'Ubuhinde mu gihe bugeramiwe n'ikiza ca Covid-19, kwabangamiye imigambi yo gukingira hirya no niho kw'isi, cane cane mu bihugu vyikora ku rukingo rwa AstraZeneca. Dr Akhwale yavuze ko Kenya yari yatumije inkingo imiriyoni 30 za Johnson & Johnson bikaba vyitezwe ko zishika mu kwezi kwa munani. Abahinga bagabisha yuko kubura inkingo zikwiye mu bihugu vyo muri Afrika bishobora kuzotuma coronavirus yihindukiranya, hakaza ikibazo gikomeye nk'icibonekeje mu Buhinde. Dr Akhwale yavuze ko gusabikanya inkingo ku buryo bungana "bitegerezwa kuba". Yongeyeko ati "'ntushobora gutekana gushika abandi bose batekanye' kigomba kuguma ari icivugo ngenderwako".

headline: Australia - Djokovic: Abimukira nabo barasaba kurekurwa
text: Kurekurwa kwa rurangiranwa muri tennis Novac Djokovic nyuma yo gupfungwa kubera kwinjira muri Australia atarikingije Covid, kwatumye abimukira bamaze imyaka bapfunzwe nabo basaba kurekurwa.

headline: I﻿gikombe c'isi 2022: Abakinyi ba Pologne baherekejwe n'indege z'intambara
text: M﻿u migwi iza gukina uyu musi mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi mu gihugu ca Qatar harimwo umugwi nserukiraagihugu wa Poligne wavuzweko vyinshi n'ibinyamakuru mpuzamakungu igihe wahaguruka mu gihugu cawo uherekejewe n'indege z'intambara. N﻿'ubu haracavugwa ingene abantu batangajwe n'ingene umugwi nserukiragihugu wa Pologne wavuye muri ico gihugu werekeza mu gisagara ca Doha muri Qatar, mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi. I﻿ndege yatwaye abo bakinyi ba Pologne ku musi wa kane yagaragaye iri hagati y'indege z'intambara zo mu bwoko bwa F-16. K﻿u rubuga rwayo rwa Twitter, uwo mugwi washizeko video y'indege za F-16 ziherekeje indege itwara abantu abakinyi barimwo. K﻿uri iyo video banditse bati:"Gushika mu bumanuko bwa Pologne twaherekejwe n'indege z'intambara za F-16." M﻿uri iyo video, banditse bashimira abadereva ba gisirikare b'izo ndege za Pologne bafashe ingingo nk'iyo. A﻿mafoto na yo nyene yerekanywe umwe mu baderevaa w'indege ya F-16 afise ikimenyetso c'umugwi w'igihugu ca Pologne kw'idirisha. I﻿vyo vyabaye inyuma y'imisi mike abantu babiri bishwe n'igisasu kitaramenyekana caguye ku butaka bwa Pologne, mu gihe Uburusiya bwariko buratana mu mitwe na Ukraine. K﻿uva habaye ico gitero, igisirikare ca Pologne kiguma kigavye. Ibitangazamakuru vya Pologne vyakwiragije  inkuru y'ingingo y'igisirikare ca Pologne yo gucungerera umutekano umugwi w'ico gihugu gushika muri Qatar. U﻿mugwi wa Pologne uza gutana mu mitwe na Mexique yo muri Amerika y'ububumanuko  kuri uyu mugoroba isaha cumi na zibiri z'umugoroba (6:00 PM), kw'isaha yo mu Rwanda no mu Burundi. I﻿nyuma y'imisi ine, Pologne izokina na Arabia Saoudite basangiye itsinda. U﻿rukino rwa nyuma rwo muri iryo tsinda izohura na Argentine kw'itariki 30 z'uku kwezi. U﻿mukinyi rurangiranwa wa Barcelone, ​​Robert Lewandowski , n'abandi bakinyi bagenziwe bipfuza gushika kure muri iryo higanwa.

headline: Afghanistan -Taliban: Urwamo rw'amasasu rwo kwigina itaha ry'Abanyamerika
text: Mu gisagara ca Kabul humvikanye urwamo rw'amasasu menshi rwo kwigina ukuva mu gihugu kw'ingabo za nyuma za Amerika mw'ijoro ryakeye - ikiringo caranze irangira ry'imyaka 20 izo ngabo zari zimaze muri ico gihugu. Umunyamakuru wa BBC Lyse Ducet ari i Kabul yakurikiye ingene vyari vyifashe igihe inkuru yamenyekana ko indege ya nyuma y'Abanyamerika ihagurutse, yabwiwe mugenziwe yariko aramubaza ikibiriraraho kuri mboneshakure (television) ati : "Wewe umviriza ibiriko biraba mu kirere hejuru yacu mu gisagara ca Kabul. Niba atari ikimenyamenya [ko abanyamerika bavuye burundu mu gihugu] sinzi icari co. Wewe umviriza urwo rwamo rw'amasasu". Aba Taliban n'ababashigikiye mu gisagara co mu bamuko ca Kandahar biriwe barigina inyuma y'aho ingabo za Amerika ziviriye muri ico gihugu. Kandahar nico gisagara kiza ubugira kabiri mu bunini muri Afghanistan. Ni naco gifatwa nk ''iwabo w'umutima w'aba Taliban". Abantu muri ico gisagara biriwe barazunguka mu mabarabara bazungagiza amabendera y'aba Taliban mu kwigina irangira ry'imyaka 20 ingabo za Amerika zari zimaze muri ico gihugu. ukwigina muri Kandahar Yakejewe kuba yavuye  ku butaka bwa Afghanistan ubwa nyuma Gen Major Chris Donahue niwe yabaye umusirikare wanyuma wa Amerika mu kuva ku butaka bwa Afghanistan. Niwe yuriye ubwa nyuma indege C-17   yatahukanaye ingabo za nyuma za Amerika mw'ijoro ryakeye. Uwo mu komanda wa division y'indege  ya 82 yashimagijwe cane ku mbuga hwaniro. Alex Plitsas yanditse kuri twitter ati: " Ico niko uburungozi busa… yabanje kuraba ko abasirikare bose binjiye mu mutekano". Uwundi akoresha twitter iblondeitall ati: "Niwe akoza ikirenge hasi ubwa mbere, niwe wa nyuma mu kuva ku butaka" Intwazangabo yavyigiye muri kaminuza ya gisirikare ya West Point , Donahue- jenerari w'inyenyeri zibiri - afise uburambe kandi bw'amateka meza mu ngabo za Amerika. Yaranagwanye mu ntambara ya Iraq mu 2003-11. Niwe yatwaye ingabo za Delta Force squadron muri Afghanistan mu gihe cataziriwe ''isugerezwa " mu  2011, hanyuma aba umukuru w'ibikorwa vya gisirikare mu 2019-20. Abategetsi ba Amerika bavuga ko bafatanije n'ibihugu bacuditse , bashoboye kuvana muri Afghanistan abantu bashika ibihumbi 123 imbere y'umunsi ntarengwa wa  31 isaha zitandatu z'ijoro. Ariko haracasigayeyo abanyamahanga benshi, barimwo amajana y'Abongereza n'Abanyamerika bari hagati ya 100 na 250, nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi. Ministre w'Ubwongereza ajejwe imigenderanire Dominic Raab yavuze ko Ubwongereza bukeneye guhangana n''uko ibintu bisigaye vyifashe'' muri Afghanistan hanyuma bakorane n'ibindi bihugu kugira botse igitutu aba Taliban ariko mu buryo bworoheje. Hamaze igihe atawuzi iyo ibintu biva n'iyo bija kuva aba Taliban  bigaruriye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan hakaba hagumye ibibazo vyo kumenya ingene reta nshsaha igiye kuba imeze. Ariko umushikiranganji bwa Pakistan ajejwe  imigenderanire  yavugiye mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ko "reta yumvikanyweko igiye gushingwa mu minsi ya vuba" muri Afghanistan. Aba Taliban bari bavuze ko bari mu biganiro n'imigwi yose kugira bashike ku mwumvikano wo gushinga reta. Ingene uwo mugwi uzotwara igihugu n'ico intwaro yabo izoba ivuze ku bagore, uburenganzira bwa muntu  n'ubwisanzure muri poritike gushika ubu ntibiramenyekana.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Kane, Areola, Smith Rowe, Zouma, Coutinho, Damsgaard, Umtiti
text: Manchester United iri imbere ya Chelsea n'umukeba wayo Manchester City mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi w'umwongereza Harry Kane w'imyaka 27, ariko Tottenham isaba imiriyoni 139 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika hamwe n'abakinyi babiri bakina mu murwi A wa Man U. (Football Insider) Manchester City yavuganye n'umusatirizi w'umufaransa Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 30 akina muri Barcelona kugira ngo irabe ko yomugura. (Footmercato - in French) West Ham iri mu biganiro na  Paris St-Germain kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umunyegori w'umufaransa Alphonse Areola w'imyaka 28 yari amaze umwaka wose akina muri Fulham iyo yari yaratijijwe. (Mail) Tottenham yahambije Arsenal, PSG na Atletico Madrid mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa  Lyon umufaransa Houssem Aouar w'imyaka 23. (Le10 Sport, via Metro) Arsenal  yongereje amafaranga kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Brighton umwongereza Ben White w'imyaka 23, aho yemeye ko ishobora gutanga imiriyoni 66.7 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika hamwe n'uturusho dushobora kwiyongerako duharurwa mu mamiriyoni umunani z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Star) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal Emile Smith Rowe w'imyaka 20 amaze kutangirwa amafaranga incuro zibiri na Aston Villa ariko bikanka, ariteguye gutera igikumu ku yandi masezerano y'imyaka itanu n'abarashi (Gunners). (Birmingham Mail) Napoli na Roma iripfuza kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea, umutariyano Emerson Palmieri w'imyaka 26, ariko iyo mirwi ikaba idashaka kurekura imiriyoni 20 z'ama euro zisabwa kuri uyu mukinyi afise amasezerano azorangira mu kwa gatandatu 2022.  (Calciomercato, via Football Italia) Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umufaransa Kurt Zouma w'imyaka 26  yiteze kuva muri  Chelsea muri rino ci, mu gihe  Everton, Tottenham na Roma ya Jose Mourinho yose imwipfuza, akaba aherutse kwanka kuja gukinira Wolves.(Telefoot on Twitter)ya Newcastle United, Tottenham, Wolves na Southampton iriko iregeranya amafaranga mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Schalke umunyamerika Matthew Hoppe w'imyaka 20. (90min) Sampdoria yiyemeje kugumya umusatirizi wayo, umunya Danemark  Mikkel Damsgaard w'imyaka 21 n'imiburiburi mu kiringo w'uwundi mwaka, mu gihe Liverpool na Tottenham, co kimwe na Juventus hamwe na Barcelona iri mu mirwi itari mike imwipfuza.  (Gazzetta dello Sport - in Italian) Umukuru w'igisata kijejwe umupira w'amaguru ca Tottenham Fabio Paratici abona ko kimwe mu bikorwa nyamukuru ari uko agiriranira ayandi masezerano y'igihe kirekire n'umusatirizi Son Heung-min w'imyaka 29 akomoka muri Korea y'Epfo.  (90min) Manchester United ivugwa ko ifise umunoho mwinshi cane wo kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Barcelona, umufaransa Samuel Umtiti w'imyaka 27 mu gihe na Arsenal nyo nyene imwipfuza. (El Gol - in Spanish) Everton iri hafi kuronka umukinyi w'inyuma Ryan Bertrand ata mafaranga itanze, inyuma y'aho uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 31 yankiye kubandanya akinira Southampton. (Fabrizio Romano, via Leicester Mercury) Barcelona na Tottenham zahambiije Manchester United mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Juventus umunya Argentina Cristian Romero w'imyaka 23 asanzwe akina muri Atalanta iyo yatijijwe. Ariko Atalanta nayo ifise uburenganzira bwo gushobora kumugura. (Calciomercato - in Italian) Tottenham na Manchester United iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi w'inyuma wa Lyon umunya Danemark Joachim Andersen w'imyaka 25, yari amaze umwaka akina muri Fulham iyo yari yaratijijwe.  (Footmercato - in French) Uwahoze ari umusatirizi wa  Manchester City, West Ham hamwe na Manchester United umunya Argentina Carlos Tevez w'imyaka 37, avuga ko ashaka kurangiriza umwuga wiwe w'umupira w'amaguru muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kandi akavuga ko amaze kuronka imirwi itatu imwipfuza, ni inyuma y'aho aviriye mu murwi  Boca Juniors wo mu gihugu ciwe mu kw'indwi.  (ESPN Deportes - in Spanish) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Liverpool  Ben Davies w'imyaka 25 ntashaka kuva muri uyu murwi n'aho aronderwa n'imirwi Celtic na Bournemouth. (Mail) Uwahoze akina ku ruhande mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubufaransa, Franck Ribery w'imyaka 38,avuga ko bibabaje kubona Fiorentina itashatse kumwongera ayandi masezerano ngo abandanye ayikinira inyuma y'aho ayo yari afitaniye nawe arangiriye mu mpera z'ukwa gatandatu akavuga ko yipfuza kugumua muri uwu murwi w'ihiganwa ry'Ubutariyano, Serie A.  (Toscana TV, via Football Italia)

headline: Yoshiro Mori: Umukuru wa Olympic za Tokyo aratanga imihoho kubera kuvuga 'ibitabereye' ku bagore
text: Umukuru w'umugwi utegura inkino za Olympic zizobera Tokyo agiye gutanga imihoho inyuma yo kunegurwa ko yavuze ibintu "bitabereye" ku bagore. Yoshiro Mori, w'oimyaka 83, vyanditswe ko yavuze ngo abagore bavuga menshi kandi ko inama n'abagore bo mu nama nyobozi ''zitwara umwanya muremmure''. Ayo majambo yaradugije ifurufumbi ry;abavyiyamiriza none Mori yarasavye imbabazi ico gihe ariko avuga ko atazotanga imihoho. Ariko  yagumye yotwa igitutu co gutanga imihoho. Mori, yahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere, yitezwe gutanga imihoho  ku mugaragaro mu nama idasanzwe izoba ku wa gatanu inyuma yo  kuvuga ivyo ku ndwi iheze. Ibigo bikomeye bishigikira izo nkino navyo vyari vyashize amajwi hejuru mu kunegura ivyo yavuze harimwo na Toyota, iri mu bakomeye bshigikira cane inkino za Olympic. Umukuru wa Toyota, Akio Toyota yavuze ko iyo kompanyi "yababajwe'' n'ivyashikirijwe. Ku wa kabiri umugwi w'abashingwamanza b'abagore bambaye impunzu zera mu kwiyamiriza ivyavuzwe na Mori, hari n'abagabo bashigikiye mu kwambara uko nyene. Ku bw'ibinyamakuru vyo mu Buyapani, abantu bashika 400 nabo baranditse bavuga ko bahagaritse gusaba gukorera ubushake mu nkino za Olympic, zitegekanijwe mu bihe biri imbere uyu mwaka. Inama y'abarongoye umugwi utegura inkino ubu igizwe n'anbantu 24, batanu muri bo bakaba ari abagore. Mu 2019,inama y'abaronmgoye uwo mugwi-ujejwe guhitamwo abayapani bazokwitaba inkino,yihaye ihangiro ryo kwongereza igitigiri c'abagore bayigize gushika ku 40 kw'ijana. Mori bivugwa ko yagize ati: "Turamutse tudugije igitigiri c'abnagore bagize inama nyobozi, dutegerezwa kubasha kugabanya umwanya bafata mu kuvuga, barafise ingorane yo kurangiza, ivyo navyo bikaba bishavuza." Mori arazwi mu gihugu kuba yakuze kugwa mu rudubi no kuvuga ibitabereye abashitsi igihe yari mu nabanga hagati ya 2000 na 2001. \yabwiye ikinyamakuru co mu Yapani Mainichi ko abagore bo mu muryangoi wiwe nabo bamuryagaguye kubera ivyo yavuze.

headline: Manchester City 4-3 Real Madrid: ubwo City izoshobora gusezerera Real?
text: Igihe Carlo Ancelotti ahura ubwa nyuma na Manchester City ku kibuga cayo, vyabaye ibiterasoni kuri we mu gukubitwa 5-0 muri urwo rukino rwabaye urwa nyuma kuri we nk'umumenyereza wa Everton, hari ku wa 23 rusama (5) 2021. Igihe uyu mutaliyano  w'umukambwe mu vyo ubumenyereza, ubu afise imyaka 62, aramvuriye amaboko araba abo bakorana, akaraba kw'isaha yiwe afise amakenga ko inyuma y'iminota 11 gusa umurwi wiwe wari umaze gukubitwa 2-0 mu gihe yari asubiye kuri ico kibua ca Etihad Stadium, kumbure ubwoba bwaramurenze ko yagomba abone nk'ayo yabonye kuri uwo musi. City yaraguruka mu kirere! Real yari yarengewe. Uyo murwi wa Premier League umaze igihe urondera gutsindira iki gikombe ca Bulaya waboneka ko wari wigaruriye urukino bimwe ntasubirwamwo. Ariko rero impera ya vyose, mu buryo butangaje kuri abo bose bashoboye kurorera urwo rukino rw'umupira w'amaguru rwari ruteye igomwe, Ancelotti aho yibereye ku mpande z'ikibuga yari yuzuye akamwemwe, mu maso aboneka ko yishimiye cane ingene uru rukino rwa mbere rurangiye atsinzwe kuri 4-3. Si ukuvuga ko yabonetse nk'uko ari kibirengeye nk'abandi kubona Real itagiye akagirire, muri uru rugamba rwo kurondera gukina urukino rwa nyuma rw'iri higanwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champons League). Abakinyi ba City nta mubabaro bari bafise - ivyo ntivyari kuba kuko berekanye urukino rwiza cane mbere rurangira barutsinze. Hagati aho, baraboneka mu maso ko ibintu vyari kuba ibindi iyo bagashobora kurushiriza aho bagatsinda vyinshi nk'uko bavyibaza, imbere y'urukino rwo gusubiza ruzobera ku kibuga ca Real Madrid, Bernabeu. Ijoro ryakeye ryari iridasanzwe, aho vyose vyari biryoheye ijisjo mu bijanye n'umupira w'amaguru wo kuri uru rugero rudakunze kuboneka, aho City, igihe cose, yari iteye ubwoba. Ariko rero... Iyo hageze muri Champions League, Bernabeu yama ikora ibitangaza kandi n'aho kumbure City ishobora kudaterwa inkokora nk'izo yatewe bigakomera igihe ihura na Atletico Madrid  mu rukino rugira kabiri rw'igice ca nyuma gishira ica kane, kizoba ikibazo gikomeye kuri bo ni bashobora kubandanya mu gihe bafise igitsindo kimwe gusa basumvya Real. City barasamaye barareka Real ibaca mu ryahumye, kahise kagashobora kutwereka ko iri rishobora kuba ikosa riremereye cane. Ancelotti, co kimwe n'abandi benshi muri Real, baramaze guca mu bintu nk'ibi bakarengana, n'aho kumbure bazotegerezwa kwemera ko barushijwe bimwe biteye ubwoba mu kiringo kitari gito c'uru rukino. Ariko kandi ntibashobora kubura ivyizigiro ko impera n'imperuka bashobora kurengana bagahura na Liverpool canke Villarreal mu rukino rwa nyuma ruzobera i Paris. Inkuru nziza kuri City ni uko, n'aho ata ntsinzi nini baronse, baramaze igihe kitari gito basumvya cane urukino Real, aho na Luka Modric n'ubuhinga bwiwe hagati yananiwe kwerekana ibidasanzwe. City bari babangutse, berekana ubuhinga bwinshi, bagakina neza, kandi bafashe umupira bari abantu bateye ubwoba. Ibi ni vyo bizoba biri mu mitwe yabo mu gihe bazoba bari mu rugendo ruzobashikana i Madrid. Ariko kandi ... Ni nde yoshobora kumenya urugero Real ikwiye gutsindwa kugira ngo itahe, mu gihe mu rukino ruzokurikira izoba ashigikiwe n'isinzi ry'abakunzi i Bernabeu muri uno murwi ufise kahise gakomeye muri iri higanwa? Mu rukino urwo ari rwo rwose ruhambaye nk'uru muri iki kibuga c'amateka, uyu murwi wama ukora ibitangaza. Guardiola yarerekanye icari mu mutwe igihe City iteye ica kabiri, Real iboneka koko ivyayo birangiye. Uyu munya Espagne yatewe n'uburakari igihe Riyad Mahrez akoze icaha gikomeye cane mu kwigungirako umupira, aza kuwutera inyuma kandi Phil Foden yari wenyene imbere y'igori arindiriye ko amuha umupira ngo atereremwo. Kuri 3-0, nta wuzi ko ibintu bitari kuba birangiye. N'uburakari bwinshi, Guardiola yakome induru ati: "Riyad. Riyad". Arazi neza ko ari ikosa rinini guha akanya na gato Real, kandi uyu murwi rutura wa Espagne waravyerekanye koko. City binjije ibitsindo bibiri vyose ku ncuro zitatu gusa bateye mw'igori, bakinye neza, urukino ruryoheye ijisho. Ariko, ifirimbi ya nyuma ivuze, bashobora kuba baricujije kuri ayo mazinda atari akenewe bagiye bagira muri urwo rukino rwa nijoro.

headline: Ubuhindi bwategetse Google kuriha irindi hadabu ry’imiliyoni $113
text: Ikigo c’Ubuhindi kijejwe kugenzura ihiganwa ku masoko caciye Google ihadabu ry’imiriyoni 113 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika kubera ibikorwa biteye kubiri n’amategeko ajanye n’ihiganwa mu gisata c’itumatumanako, igihano kigira kabiri mu kiringo kiri munsi y’indwi imwe. Ico kigo cagiriza Google gukoresha ubwiganze ifise mu bubiko bwayo bw’ama Apps (applications)  mu guhatira abahingura ama Apps kuriha bakoresheje app yayo. Iki kigo gisaba iyi kompanyi rutura y’ubuhinga kutazibira abahingura ama Apps kuriha bakoresheje ubundi buryo canke baciye mu zindi nzira. Google yavuzeko iriko irihweza ivyo birego. Umuvugizi wa Google avuga ati: “Mu kugumiza ku giciro gito,  vyatumye ubuhinga bwa digital (numérique) bukomera mbere bwugururira imiryango amamiriyoni amajana n’amajana y’Abahindi”. Uyo muvugizi yagize ati: “Tubandanya kwitaho abakoresha n’abahingura ama Apps, tukaba turiko turihweza iyi ngingo kugira ngo turabe intambwe zikurikira”. Muri iki cemezo canditse ku mpapuro 199 casohowe ku wa kabiri, ikigo c’Ubuhindi kijejwe kugenzura ihiganwa ku masoko, (Competition Commission of India, CCI) kivuga ko Google iriko ikoresha amategeko amwe amwe mu bubiko bwayo bwa Play Store ategeka abahingura ama Apps “gukoresha gusa” ubuhinga bwayo mu gutanga canke kugurisha ama Apps. Ikinyamakuru Reuters kivugako ico kigo kijejwe ubugenzuzi gisaba Google gufata ingingo umunani zikosora ibi bintu mu mezi atatu, harimwo kutazibira abahingura ama Apps gukoresha ubundi buryo bwo kuriha, haba mu kugura ikibanza muri Apps zisanzwe zirimwo canke kugura ama Apps. CCI  ivuga kandi iti: “Google itegerezwa gukorera mu muco iyo ivugana n’abahingura ama Apps kandi igatanga insiguro ku mafaranga basabwa”. Iyi ni ingingo y’incamugongo ya vuba kuri Google isanzwe ihanzwe n’ibirego bituma itakaza icizere mu Buhindi. Mu ndwi iheze iyi kompanyi yatangishijwe ihadabu ry’imiliyoni 161 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika kubera yakoresheje urubuga rwa Android kugira yiganzire isoko. CCI  ivuga ko Google iriko ikoresha amasezerano y’agahato ku bakoresha ububiko bwayo kugira ngo imbuga zayo – nka Google Chrome, YouTube, Google Maps  n’izindi – zikoreshwe. Itohoza rijanye na Android ryaratangujwe mu 2019, inyuma y’imyidogo y’abakoresha Telefone zo mu buhinga bwa Android.

headline: Jus za pomme zikorwa na Ceres zisabwa kuvanwa mw'icuruzwa
text: Umutobe (jus/juice)  wa pomme (apple) ukorwa na kompanyi yo muri Africa y'Epfo Ceres vyasabwe ko uvanwa mw'icuruzwa  mu bihugu indwi vyo muri Afrika vyawuranguye kubera ufise urugero runini rwa patulin  ishobora gutera kudahwa no gusesemwa. Patulin n'ubumara buterwa n'ifira ry'ubwoko butandukanye  usanga mu ma pommes canke mu bikozwe mu ma pommes. Ibipimo vyo muri laboratoire  vyerekanye ko imitobe ya Ceres irimwo patulin ku rugero ruri hejuru cane y'urwemewe rwa microgrammes 50 kuri ritiro imwe. Iyo mitobe igurishwa muri Kenya, RDC (Congo Kinshasa), Zambia, Zimbabwe, Uganda, Seychelles n'izinga rya Maurice. Ariko no mu bihugu bibanyi vy'ivyo vyaranguye  iyo mitobe ishobora kuba ishikayo. Urwego rw'isoko rusangi rw'ibihugu vyo muri Afrika y'Ubuseruko n'iy'ubumanuko (Comesa)  rwahimirije abaguzi gusubiza imitekero yose ifise amatariki yo hagati ya 14 na 30 ukwezi kwa gatandatu 2021.

headline: Yabazwe ikivyimba mu bwonko ariko aravuza violon

headline: Coronavirus: Ibihugu vyugaye imbibe kubera ubwoko bushasha bwa Covid
text: Ibihugu biriko biraba vyinshi mu gukaza ingingo zavyo zo kugabanya ingendo inyuma y'aho hagaragariye ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera wa corona muri Afrika yo mu bumanuko muri iyi ndwi. Ubwongereza na Singapour vyabaye ivya mbere mu kwihuta gufata ingingo  zikaze zo gushira abantu ukwa bonyene  canke kubuza indege zivuye muri Afrika y'Epfo n'ibihugu  vyegeranye. Ishirahamwe rya Buraya naryo ryagiriye inama ibihugu vyose birigize guhagarika izo ngendo z'indege. Abahinga baracafise igikorwa gikomeye co kumenya ibijanye n'ubwo bwoko, ariko bavuga ko bubateye umutima uhagaze cane. Ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi (OMS) rivuga ko bizofata amayinga kugira hamenyekane ubukari  bw'ubwo bwoko bushasha , mu gihe abahinga bariko bariga ingene bwandukira. Ubwo bwoko buratandukanye cane n'ubwari bumaze kwaduka gushika ubu. Abahinga bavuga ko aribwo bwa mbere bwihindura cane gushika ubu, bisigura ko incanco, zari zahinguwe hisunzwe ubwoko bwo mu ntango bw'i Wuhan, zishobora kudakora. Ubwo bwoko bushasha ntiburahabwa izina ryoroshe gufatata, nka Delta canke Beta, gushika ubu bukaba buzwi nka  B.1.1.529. OMS yitezwe kubuha izina kuri uyu wa gatanu, hanyuma imenyeshe niba ari ubwoko buteye impungenge cane canke ko ari ubwoko bwo kurabira hafi gusa. Ni hehe hamaze kuboneka abanduye ubwo bwoko bushasha ? OMS ivuga ko gushika ubu abantu bari munsi y'ijana babupimwe. Abamaze kwemezwa ko babwanduye bari cane cane muri Afrika y'Epfo, ariko kandi baramaze no kuboneka muri Hong Kong, Israel, Botswana n'Ububirigi. Ministre w'Ubwongereza ajejwe amagara Sajid Javid yavuze ku wa gatanu ko "bishoboka cane" ko buja bwaramaze gukwira mu bindi bihugu. Benshi mu bamaze kwandura muri Afrika y'Epfo bari mu ntara yayo ibamwo abantu benshi cane ya Gauteng, Johannesburg akaba ariwo murwa mukuru wayo. 24% bonyene mu bantu bagize Afrika y'Epfo nibo bamaze kuronka incanco zikiwye, ivyo bikaba bishobora gutuma ugukwirakwira kw'uwo mugera kunyaruka cane, nk'uko Dr Mike Tildesley, umwe mu bahinga ba  Scientific Pandemic Influenza Modelling group, yabibwiye BBC ku wa gatanu. Muri Hong Kong, ubwo bwoko bwakwiragiye hagati y'abantu babiri bari bashizwe ukwabo mw'ihoteri,  umwe akaba yari avuye muri Afrika y'Epfo, uwo wundi akaba haheze iminsi yaciye atorwa ko yanduye  nk'uko vyahishuwe n'igisata kijejwe amagara. Bompi bari bararonse incanco zikwiye. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Israel Naftali Bennett  yavuze ku wa gatanu ko igihugu "kiri hafi y'igihe  c'amategeko adasanzwe" ku bijanye n'ubwo bwoko bushasha, kandi ko ''agiye gufata  ingingo , ikomeye kandi ubu". Umuntu umwe yaratowe ubwo bwoko atashe avuye muri Malawi, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri Israel bisubiramwo ivyavuzwe n'umushikiranganji w'ico gihugu ajejwe amagara. Hari n'abantu babiri bikekwa kuba baranduye ariko bataremezwa n'ibipimo. Abo bose uko ari batatu bivugwa ko bari bararonse incanco zikwiye. OMS iragabisha ibihugu bifata ingingo za gihutihuti zo kubuza ingendo, ivuga ko vyofata ingingo zishingiye ku nsiguro z'abahinga no ku rugero rwo kugeramirwa. Naho biri uko ibihugu biriko biraba vyinshi birimwo Ubwongereza n'Ubuhorandi vyabaye birafata ingingo mfatakibanza yo guhagarika indege zivuye muri ibi bihugu vyo muri Afrika y'Ubumanuko: Singapore, Ubutariano , France na  Israel biri mu bihugu vyashize na  Mozambique, ku rutonde rwavyo rutukura. Ubuyapani   bwamenyesheje ko kuva ku wa gatandatu, ingenzi zivuye muri Afrika y'Ubumanuko zizotegerezwa kumara iminsi 10 ukwa zonyene kandi zigapimwa incuro zine muri ico kiringo. Guhagarika indege bishobora kuzotandukanya imiryango muri ibi bihe vy'iminsi mikuru ya Noel na Bonane. Ruth Daines-Slack, w'imyaka  70, yari yatabuje itike yo kuva Cape Town aja mu Bwongereza ku ndwi iza guhimbaza Noel n'isabukuru y'imyaka 100 ya nyina wiwe. Yabwiye BBC ko yarengewe kandi ko atagishoboye gukora urwo rugendo anegura cane ingingo y'Ubwongereza yo kubuza ingendo. Ubwongereza bwabaye ubwa mbere mu gufata ingingo yo kubuza ingendo , ingingo umushikiranganji wa Afrika y'Epfo ajejwe imigenderanire yavuze ko ari "ingingo ya gihutihuti" yafashwe imbere y'uko OMS igira ico ishikirije kuri ubwo bwoko bushasha.

headline: Tanzania yashizeho ingingo zo kurwanya Covid-19
text: Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu wa Tanzania vyashizeho ingingo zo gupima ubushuhe no gukaraba n'umuti mu gihe igihugu cafashe ingingo yo kwambara udupfukamunwa, nka zimwe mu ngingo zo guhagarika ikwirakwira ry'umugera wa coronavirus. Ejo ku wa mbere, Perezida Samia Suluhu yarakiriye intumwa mvamakungu zikaba zabanje gupimwa imbere y'uko zinjira. Izi ntumwa zose zategetswe kwambara udupfukamunwa, mbere n'ifoto yafashwe ari kumwe nazo yerekana umukuru w'igihugu we nyene ubwiwe akambaye. Ku wa gatanu, Perezida Samia yabonetse yambaye agapfukamunwa iri rikaba ari irya mbere ari muri Tanzania, aho yavuze ko ari ngombwa kukambara mu ntumbero yo gukingira abatama yariko abonana nabo. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'imisi mike agize urugendo muri Kenya, ico gihe akaba yagiye yambaye agapfukamunwa. Yateye inkuru mu gutwenza abanu avuga ko kwambara agapfukamunwa ari nk'umwungere azibira umunwa w'impene kugira ayibuze kwona, ariko ko vyari ngombwa. Ubutegetsi bwahahora bwa Perezida John Magufuli aherutse kwitaba Imana ku wa 17 z'ukwa gatatu, bwafata minenerwe akamo katerwa n'amakungu ku bubi bwa coronavirus. Kuva mu ntango y'iki kiza, Tanzania yashira imbere kwiyuka n'ubundi buryo kama nk'inzira zo kwikingira Covid, kandi kuva mu kwa gatanu kw'umwaka uheze, nta bitigiri vy'abanduye uwu mugera yasubiye gutangaza. Inyuma y'urupfu rwa Magufuli, Perezida Samia yavuze ko yashizeho umurwi ujejwe gukurikirana ikibazo ca Covid-19 mu gihugu.

headline: Menya abakinyi 5 bashobora guhindura imigwi ku musi wa nyuma w'igura n'igurishwa 01.09.2022
text: Arsenal iriteguye guheraheza umwumvikano wo kuzana umukinyi wo hagati wa Aston Villa Douglas Luiz yari muri Aston Villa. Douglas yipfuza kuva muri uwo mugwi ariko Villa iri mu madidane yo kumurekura batabanje kuronka uwusubira mu kibanza ciwe.  (The sunFootball) Muri iri joro Pierre Aubameyang arafata urugendo rumushikana i Londres guheraheza ibiganiro vyo kwimukira mu mugwi wa Chelsea avuye mu mugwi wa Barcelone, mu gihe Marcos Alonso nawe agiye iyo avuye.  (Romano) A﻿rsenal yarekuye umukinyi wayo w'inyuma mu buryo Hector Bellerin kwimukira muri Barcelone. Uwo mukinyi w'inyuma wo muri Espagne ntaronka umwanya wo gukina muri uwo mugwi akaba yariko aragerageza kwimukira muri Barca Umukinyi wo hagati wa Juventus Arthur Melo  ari mu Bwongereza guheraheza ibiganiro vyo kwimukira mu mugwi wa Liverpool. Azoshira umukono ku masezerano yo gutizwa umwaka umwe gushika mu 2023.

headline: Harageze ko ONU imenya ko igihugu canje cateye intambwe – Ndayishimiye
text: Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye w’Uburundi asaba ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU ko ryotahura y’uko Uburundi bwateye intambwe mu vyo umutekano kandi ko kitakiri igihugu kigoyagoya. Mw’ijambo yashikirije mu nama ya bose igira 77 y’iri shirahamwe, Perezida Ndayishimiye yaragirije abakozi bamwe bamwe ba ONU baca intege iterambere igihugu kigezeko bagacuvya ibikorwa vyiwe bitwaje imvo za poritike. Kubw’iwe, ntibigikenewe ko umurwi wa ONU ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu urungika imirwi n’intumwa zidasanzwe, reta y’Uburundi itigeze iha nirwere kuko yabagiriza ko bakorera ku makuru y’ibinyoma. Kuva mu 2015, imigenderanire hagati ya reta y’Uburundi n’amakungu be n’amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu amwe amwe yagiye itosekara. Bamwe mu bategetsi b’igihugu, inzego z’umutekano n’iz’igendereza, hamwe n'urwaruka rw'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi bagirizwa guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu, ivyo reta yamye kandi ibandanya yiyamiriza. Mw’iryo jambo, Ndayishimiye, n’aho ashimira amakungu ku kigoro yagize mu kugarukana amahoro n’umutekano mu gihugu ciwe, ntarya umunwa mu kwagiriza abakoziba ONU ko baca intege intambwe imaze gushikwako. Ati: “Mu bihugu bimwe bimwe harimwo na rwanje, iyo intwaro rusangi uko tuyumva ishinze imizi, bamwe mu bakozi b’ishirahamwe ONU barayisibanganya mu kuvuga ko itizewe kandi ko idahuza bose mu ntumbero yo kutugumiza mu cuka kibi kidagira mvura. “Iyo turi mu rugamba rwa misi yose rwo kurwanya ukudahana, bamwe mu bakozi ba ONU barondera gutesha agaciro ibikorwa vyacu”. Ndayishimiye abona ko igihe kigeze ko ishirahamwe ONU ryemera intambwe igihugu ciwe “kigezeko kuva imyaka 17 iheze kandi rigatahura ko ivy’uko kikiri igihugu kigoyagoya bitagifise ikibanza mu Burundi”. Ati: “Rero harageze (...) ko Umurwi ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu wicara hamwe n’ibihugu vyacu kugira ngo tubone kumwe ukungene poritike y’ibihugu vyacu yogenda, aho gushaka kuyobora ibikorwa vyawo iciye ku mirwi n’intumwa zidasanzwe ukwa wonyene”. Mu gihe mu Burundi abatari bake, cane cane abatavuga rumwe n’umugambwe uri ku butegetsi, bidogera ubutungane kandi bakavuga ko agateka ka zina muntu kabandanya gahonyangwa, Perezida Ndayishimiye yabwiye abari muri iyo nama ko “ubutungane kuri bose ubu butakiri umugani" Yavuze kandi ko "n’agateka ka zina muntu, harimwo uburenganzira bwo gushikiriza akari ku mutima n’ugushikiriza amakuru, kubahirijwe ku butaka bwose bw’Uburundi”. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ndyane za poritike mu 2015 biturutse ku ngingo y’umuhisi Perezida Petero Nkurunziza yo kwitoreza ikiringo ca gatatu, imigenderanire hagati yabwo n’ibihugu bimwe bimwe, cane cane vy’Uburengero, hamwe n’amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu amwe amwe, yaratosekaye. Ibi vyatumye Uburundi hamwe na bamwe mu bategetsi bakuru b’igihugu bamwe bamwe bafatirwa ibihano. Hagati aho kuva Evariste Ndayishimiye ashitse ku butegetsi inyuma y’amatora ya 2020, harabaye ukuganira n’impande zompi mu ntumbero yo gusubiza ibintu mu buryo, akaba mw’ijambo ryiwe ashima intambwe igezweko. Ati: “Turashima kubona imigenderanire myiza (...) yari yahagaritswe n’ibihugu bimwe bimwe n’amashirahamwe amwe amwe yarasubiye kunaguka. “Icipfuzo cacu nyamukuru ni ugukomeza imigenderanire myiza kandi ikomeye n’ibihugu hamwe n’amashiramahwe mpuzamakungu ishobora kuzana akarusho muri kazoza k’Uburundi n’ibindi bihugu”.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Zaha, Pochettino, Martinez, Conte, Neves, Coutinho, Willian
text: Tottenham na Everton ziripfuza kugura umukinyi w'imbere wa Crystal Palace umunya Côte d'Ivoire Wilfried Zaha w'imyaka 28 ku miriyoni zirenga 56.5 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Goal) Umumenyereza wa Paris St-Germain Mauricio Pochettino ariko arihweza nimba ari ngombwa ko yosubira mu murwi Tottenham yahoze amenyereza. (Sun) Hagati aho, Tottenham iri mu biganiro n'umumenyereza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ububirigi, yahoze kandi amenyereza imirwi ya  Everton na Wigan  Roberto Martinez w'imyaka 47,  mu gihe igikorwa co kurondera umusubirizi wa Jose Mourinho kibandanya. (Sky Sports) Umumenyereza wa Inter Milan Antonio Conte yarafashije uyu murwi gutahukana igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano Serie A, ariko uyu mugabo yahoze amenyereza Chelsea ategerezwa kuva muri uyo murwi mu masaha 48 ari imbere.  (La Gazzetta dello Sport, via Metro) Wolves iriteguye kugurisha umukinyi wo hagati, umunya Portugal Ruben Neves ku miriyoni hafi 50 z'amadorari kugira ngo ishobore kuronka amahera yo kwiyubaka ku muntu uwo ari we wese yosubirira umumenyereza Nuno Espirito Santo amaze kugenda. (The Athletic - subscription required) Wolves si ngombwa ngo igurishe uyu mukinyi Neves w'imyaka 24 ari muri uyu murwi kuva mu 2017, ariko izokwakiriza yompi abo bose bazomurondera mu gihe amafaranga bazoshaka gutanga yoba ashobora gufasha mu kwiyubaka.  (Express & Star) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Brazil Philippe Coutinho w'imyaka 28 azoba ari mu bakinyi 10 bari ku rutonde rw'abazogurishwa  n'umurwi Barcelona mu ci riza.  (Star) Barcelona na Manchester City ziri mu mirwi irondera umukinyi wo hagati wa  Atalanta umudagi Robin Gosens w'imyaka 26. (Sport) Arsenal na Aston Villa igiye guhangana bikomeye mu kurondera kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa  Norwich City umunya Argentine Emiliano Buendia w'imyaka 24 . (Telegraph - subscription required) Umukinyi w'imbere wa Arsenal umunya Brazil Willian w'imyaka 32 aripfuza gusubira muri  Chelsea - inyuma y'amezi ari musi ya 12 avuye muri uyu murwi yari amazemwo imyaka indwi.  (Sky Sports) Chelsea ishobora kuba ishaka kugurisha umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umwongereza Callum Hudson-Odoi w'imyaka 20, agashobora kuja mu murwi  Borussia Dortmund wo mu Budagi. Dortmund ishobora kandi kurondera umukinyi w'imbere wa  Leeds United umunya Brazil Raphinha w'imyaka 24. (Eurosport) West Ham iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa  Spartak Moscow wo muri République tchèque, Alex Kral w'imyaka  23 . (Sky Sports) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Villarreal umunya Espagne Pau Torres w'imyaka 24 yanse kuvuga ku bijanye n'amakuru avuga ko ashobora kwimukira muri Manchester United mu ci riza, imbere y'urukino rwa nyuma rw'ihiganwa Europa League ruhuza iyi mirwi ibiri kuri uyu wa gatatu.  (Metro) Manchester United yashitse ku masezerano n'umunyegori wa Aston Villa umwongereza Tom Heaton w'imyaka 35 akazoshobora kuja muri uyo murwi mu kwezi kuza ataco urinze gutanga. (Express) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Liverpool umwongereza Rhys Williams w'imyaka 20, ashobora gutizwa mu mwaka w'inkino uza n'aho yari yashoboye gukina mu murwi mukuru w'uyu murwi mw'ihiganwa rirangiye rya 2020-21. (Star) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal umunya Uruguay Lucas Torreira avuga ko azofata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe inyuma y'inkino zo kurondera uburenganzira bwo gukinira igikombe c'isi yose mu kwezi kuza. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 25 vyari amaze umwaka wose wa 2020-2021 akina muri Atletico Madrid aho yari yaratijijwe. (Express) Arsenal ishobora kuvyura urugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa  Lyon umufaransa Houssem Aouar w'imyaka 22. (Mirror) Roma irashaka kugura umukinyi wo ku ruhande umwongereza Demarai Gray w'imyaka 24 yari yinjiye mu murwi Bayer Leverkusen mu kwa mbere mu masezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi hakaba harimwo umurongo uvuga ko uwumukeneye ategerezwa gutanga imiriyoni zibiri z'ama euro.  (Roma Press, via Sky Germany) Umukinyi wo hagati umufaransa Eduardo Camavinga arashaka kuja gukinira umurwi Paris St-Germain, umurwi wiwe Rennes ukaba umushakako imiriyoni 100 z'ama euros , mu gihe amasezerano ifitaniye n'uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 18 azorangira mu ci ry'umwaka uza. (RMC Sport)

headline: Kardinali Burke anegura Papa Francis ku vyo aherutse gushikiriza ku bubakana basangiye ibitsina
text: Umwe mu bategetsi bakomeye ba Ekleziya Gatolika aranegura amajambo Papa Francis aherutse gushikiriza ku vyerekeye abakundanye basangiye igitsina, akavuga ko ari ivyiyumviro vyiwe bwite bidashobora gukurikizwa n'Abagatolika. Kardinali Raymond Burke abonwa na benshi ko atava kw'izima ku mico ya Ekleziya Gatolika yavuze ibi mw'ijambo yashikirije haciye umunsi umwe Papa yerekanywe ariko ashigikira ko abubakanye basangiye ibitsina bokwemerwa n'amategeko. Yari amajambo atari bwaje ku mugaragaro. Ku wa gatatu w'ino ndwi, niho Papa Francis yumvikanye ashikiriza ayo majambo. Bivanye n'aho umuntu ahagaze muri Ekleziya, Kardinali Burke ni ihwa kuri Papa, canke naho umwe muri bake bazovugisha ukuri ku butegetsi. Kurwanya Papa ku bijanye no gushigikira ko abubakanye basangiye igitsina bemerwa imbere y'amategeko ni ibintu bidatangaje, ariko amajambo yabivuzemwo niyo kumbure yotangaza. Mu gihe Raymond Burke avuga ko amajambo ya Papa Francis ari "iciyumviro ciwe bwite", yongera ko y'uko abagatolika badategetswe kwumvira uyu mukuru wa Ekleziya kuri iki kibazo, ariko ko abayobozi ba Ekleziya basanzwe bafise igikorwa co gukora ico yise 'gutanga umuco ukenewe'. Arongera agashimangira y'uko ibikorwa vy'abahuje ibitsina babisangiye 'biteye kubiri n'imico' ishingiye ku kwemera kwa Gatolika, akavuga ko amajambo yavuzwe na Papa adahuye n'inyigisho za Ekleziya kandi ko ziteye umubabaro. Mw'ireresi ivuga ku buzima n'ibikorwa vyiwe, Papa Francis yumvikanye ashigikira ko abubakanye basangiye igitsina bakwiye kwemerwa imbere y'amategeko. Ati: "Ni abana b'Imana kandi bafise uburenganzira bwo kugira umuryango. Nta n'umwe akwiye gutabwa canke ngo agirirwe nabi kubera ico. "Ico tugomba gushiraho ni itegeko ribaha uburenganzira bwo kubana. Gutyo bakaba bakingiwe n'amategeko". Mu nyigisho za Gatolika, imibonano mpuzabitsina hagati y'abasangiye igitsina ifatwa 'nk'ukugoka'. Aya majambo yavuzwe na Papa yateye impari, aho hari bamwe bashigikiye ivyo yavuze, abandi nabo babirwanya cane. Gusa impungenge zibandanya zibonekeza ni ingaruka aya majambo ashobora kugira ufatiye aho Ekleziya Gatolika ihagaze kuri iki kibazo. Massimo Faggioli, umuhinga mu vyigwa bijanye n'ivy'Imana akaba n'umwanditsi w'igitabo Pope Francis: Tradition, yabwiye BBC ati: "Nta gushidikanya ko ivyo Francis yavuze ari ikintu gishasha muri Ekleziya. Hagati aho, ni ikibazo yagiye agarukako cane kuva muri ino myaka mike iheze".

headline: Ni nde yanditse Bibiliya ?
text: Na Edison Veiga BBC News Brazil Kuba Katolika, Bibiliya igizwe n’ibitabo 73. Ku baporoti hari 66, nayo aba-orthodoxe bavuga ko hari 78. Ni mu gihe Abayahudi bemera ibitabo 39 gusa, ibi bikaba ari ivyo abakirisu bavuga ko ari ivyo mw’isezerano rya kera. Aha turiko tuvuga igitabo kigurishwa cane gusumba ibindi vyose muri kahise k’isi, Bibiliya Nyeranda, ikonganirizo ry’ibitabo vyahinduwe mu ndimi zababa 3.000 – aho ibirenga imiriyaridi 3.9 bimaze kugurishwa kw’isi yose, nk’uko bivugwa n’umuryango wa Bibliya wa Brezili (Société biblique du Brésil). Ariko none, ni bande banditse ibi bitabo? Dufashe ko ari ibitabo vya kera cane, imbere y’uko abanditsi ba none batangura kwandika uko bandika, biragoye kuronkera iki kibazo inyishu nyayo. Intango y’iki kiyago ni ukubanza kumenya nimba ari ukugifatira ku bijanye n’idini gusa, canke nimba gikwiye gufatira ku buhinga n’ubumenyi. Umuhinga mu vya kahise no mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana Gerson Leite de Moraes asanzwe yigisha kuri kaminuza Mackenzie Presbyterian University avuga ati: "Ni ikibazo kitoroshe kubera hari imbono zibiri. Imbono ya mbere ishingiye ku kwemera Imana gushingiye ku masengero, aha tukaba dufise abiga ibijanye no kwemera Imana kubera bashaka kuba abapasitori/abapatiri mu muryango kanaka, imbono kama ». Kubw’iwe, inyigisho z’amasabamana ziganisha ku busaseredoti/ubupasitori, zitegerezwa « kugendera ku nyigisho z’uko ivyanditswe vyavugishijwe, ni ukuvuga ko ari ivyavuzwe n’Imana yo nyene ubwayo, iciye kuri Mutima Mweranda/Mpwemu Yera ». Avuga ati : "Ku rundi ruhande, inyigisho ku bijanye no kwemera Imana zishingiye ku buhinga ntizirajwe ishinga n’iyo mbono, ahubwo zozo zirondera kwihweza uko izi nyandiko zaje ufatiye ku bihe vya kahise ». Muri iyi nzira, turashobora gutahura ibitabo vya mbere vya Bibiliya, ibigize vya bitabo bitanu vya mbere bizwi nka Pentateuque (canke nka Torah y’Abayahudi), ko ari icegeranyo c’inyandiko zanditswe ubwa mbere imyaka hafi 1.000 imbere y’umuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Ibi ni Amamuko/Itanguriro, Ihunga, Abalewi, Guharura/Kubara  hamwe na Gutegeka kwa Kabiri  (Deuteronome)  - ibitabo bivuga ivyerekeye kuva kw’irema ry’isi gushika ku rupfu rwa Musa. Kubera ari ivya kera, abahinga bavuga ko bigoye kumenya neza na neza abavyanditse. Kubw’amayagwa y’idini, ibi bitabo bitanu vyanditswe n’umuntu umwe, Musa. José Luiz Goldfarb, umwigisha wa kaminuza ya Katorika y’i São Paulo akaba arongoye n’igisata c’imico y’ikiyahudi mu murwi A Hebraica, avuga ati : "Nsomye nkongera nkavugana n’umusiguzi akongera akaba n’umukinyi w’ivyese, Haroldo de Campos (1929-2003), nahakuye icigwa ko hari inzira zibiri zishoboka. Iyo yo mw’isinagoga ivuga ko Musa ari we yanditse Torah. Tubifata nk’uko twama ‘twumviriza’ Musa buri ndwi [ibisomwa], kandi ibi bifise agaciro mu mico y’abantu ». Ihengama ry’abahinga ntiryemera ibivugwa ko ibi bitabo vyanditswe n’umuntu umwe. Ati : "Ku bijanye n’inyigisho za Bibiliya, tuvuga ibitabo vyanditswe mu myaka irenga 600 ». "Uku niko umwihwezo wa Harold urangira hampande y’ubushakashatsi yagize kuri Bibiliya, kubisigarira vy’ivya kera (archeoloie), ku bisigarira no ku nzandiko zo guhayagiza ». Avuga ko umwihwezo wimbitse w’izi nzandiko ufasha kubitadukanya ufatiye ku nyubako, amajambo azigize, n’ibirimwo ufatiye ku banditsi mu bihe bitandukanye vyo muri kahise. Ni iciyumviro cemerwa neza. Uri Lam wo mu muryango Templo Beth-El w’abanya-Israel muri São Paulo asigura ati: "Biragoye cane kuvuga ivy’ibihe canke abanditsi kuko umuntu atakara. Amatohoza y’abahinga yemeza ko izi nyandiko zifise imyaka iri hagati ya 2.700 na 3.000 canke gusumba aho kubera vyahererekanwa ku munwa ». Kubw’iwe, izo nyandiko zaratagatifujwe – ni ukuvuga ko zegeranijwe hanyuma zifatwa ko ari izigize Bibiliya y’Abahebreyi– amaja mu kinjana ca IV imbere y’umuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Lam yemera ati : "Ariko n’aho nyene, hari impari nyinshi, kandi ntidushobora kurangiza iki kibazo ». Goldfarb abona akarusho muri ibi vyo gufatira hamwe izi nyandiko hamwe no kuzifatira mu mice itandukanye. Yibaza ati : "Nimba ari inyandiko zamaze imyaka 600, ibi ni vyiza ku bantu bakunda ibikorwa. Ni bangahe bashoboye gusohora inyandiko mu karere kamwe canke akandi ? ». Muri ico gihe nyene ivy’abanditsi bitandukanye n’ivy’ubu, ingorane nk’izi nyene zo kumenya koko uwanditse zirabandanya mu bindi bitabo biri muri Bibiliya y’Abayahudi – ikonganirizo ry’ibitabo bigize isezerano rya kera muri bibliya ya gikirisu. Goldfarb ati: "Nk’akarorero, zaburi za Dawudi. Ni agatabo gato abantu bakoresha cane mu bisabisho n’indirimbo vya misi yose kegeranya indirimbo Dawudi yakunda kuririmba mw’isinagoga. "Tuvuga ko yari umuririmvyi kandi ko ibi bisabisho vyaririmbwa. Ni nde abizi ? Ni ikibazo ciza:  ku vyo nize ngasoma, jewe ntavyo nokwemeza… ». Moraes nawe ati: "Ikiri ukuri ni uko habaye benshi banditse ibiri muri Bibiliya ». "Igishoboka cane ni uko inkuru ziri mu vyanditswe muri bibiliya muri kino gihe imbere y’aha vyahanahanwa ku munwa igisekuru ku kindi. Kandi iri ryagumye ari itunga karanga ry’idini ry’aba bantu ». Uyu mwigisha wa kaminuza ati: "Ni ukumenya kandi ko ivyo abitirirwa inyandiko mu gihe ca kera bitandukanye n’ivyo dufise ubu. Ico gihe, vyari bikunze kuba ko inyandiko kanaka yitirirwa umutware mukuru, umutegetsi akundwa, umuntu akomeye ». Aha niho rero, abanywanyi b’inyigisho zimwe zimwe, iyo bahinduye ivyo bazi bakabishira mu nyandiko, bakunda kuzitunganya nk’uko umengo ni ikintu canditswe na ba shebuja. Moraes  yongerako ati : "Kubiraba Torah, ushaka kuvuga ko izi nzandiko zanditswe na Musa? Bishobora kuba atari vyo. Kumbure afise kuba yarabigizemwo uruhara. Hari bamwe bavuga ko ata ruhara na rutoya yagize. "Ariko ni inyandiko zitirirwa Musa." Kubw’iwe, igikenewe ni uko izi nyandiko nyeranda birangira zitiriwe amadini. Moraes yibaza ko ari ibintu vyumvikana ko ibitabo vyeranda vyanditswe, nk’akarero, inyuma y’ishingwa ry’igihugu ca Israel gusumba ibihe bivugwamwo, nk’ibijanye n’ihunga ry’Abayahudi bava mu Misiri, barongowe na Musa. Ati: "Iyumvire igico c’abantu bayerera mu bugaragwa. Ivyo kwicara ngo bandike si vyo bibaraza ishinga. Ikiraje ishinga uwuriko arayerera mu bugaragwa ni ukurondera ingene abaho. Mu myaka itari mike, vyabaye ngombwa ko bategura intambara kugira ngo baronke ubutaka…nta n’umwe yari anezwe ivyo kwandika ibitabo." Uyu mushakashatsi ati: "Ikintu kinini gishoboka, ni uko ibi vyagiye kuba hashinzwe umuryango wiyubatse neza." Ariko zari inkuru zidakomeye cane, z’ubwoko butandukanye, vyarangiye zegeranijwe zigashirwa  hamwe n’umwanditsi umwe canke benshi. Umuhinga mu nyandiko nyeranda, Thiago Maerki akaba n’umushakashatsi kw’ishure kaminuza rya São Paulo (Unifesp), akaba kandi ari mw’ishirahamwe Hagiography Society, muri Amerika, arashima cane iciyumviro co gukoresha ubumenyi bwa none mu vy’indimi mu kugerageza gushira hamwe canke gutandukanya inyandiko zigize Bibiliya. Kubw’iwe, abanditsi nk’umwigisha wa kaminuza Robert Alter, umunyamerika yigisha kw’ishure kaminuza ya California, "babivuga neza ", nk’igihe avuga ko ari vyiza "gukoresha uburyo bumwe bumwe bukoreshwa mu kwiga ibijanye n’ivya kahise k’indimi n’inyandiko mu kwiga inyandiko za Bibiliya". Maerki ati: "Arihweza ubuhinga bw’inyandiko, impinyanyuro z’amajambo yakoreshejwe, ubudasa mu gushikiriza ivyiyumviro, imyumvikano ikurikizwa mu bwoko bumwe bumwe bw’inyandiko ya Bibiliya, na buri mwanditsi. "Igihe cose kugira ngo ntihabe kuzana ivyataye igihe." Indinganizo y’amayagwa nayo nyene ishobora kwisungwa mu mwihwezo w’ibitabo bine vy’injili, ibitabo bivuga ubuzima bwa Yezu, bikaba vyitirirwa Matayo, Mariko, Luka na Yohani. Umushakashatsi kuri kahise k’idini rya Gikristu kw’ishure kaminuza Université pontificale grégorienne i Rome akongera akaba n’umuhinga ku bijanye na Vaticano Mirticeli Medeiros, arabishingira intahe ko, ata gukekeranya, abanditse ibi bitabo bine ari abo bagabo bane. Asigura ati : "Ku vy’Injili, nta mpari zihari [kuba zitirirwa], n’imiburiburi ufatiye ku bushakashatsi bwa vuba. Aha ni ukwibuka ko babiri mu banditsi bazo, Matayo na Yohani, bari abatumwa ba Yezu/Yesu. Aba bandi babiri, Mariko na Luka, ku ruhande rwabo, bateguye inyandiko zabo bisunze ivyo abatumwa bashingiye intahe." Maerki arasangamwo ubudasa mu mpinyanyuro z’amajambo muri ibi bitabo bine. Asigura ati : "Matayo afatwa nk’umwanditsi adakoresha impinyanyuro itaziguye, akoresha impinyanyuro isanzwe. Yohani akoresha ururimi rugoye, rwuzuye imizunguruko, imvugo ngereranyo. Luka akoresha imvugo inonosoye, ihanitse." Nimba mw’isezerano rya kera hari ibibazo vyinshi gusumba ibizwi ku bijanye n’abitirirwa ibitabo, inyandiko zo mw’isezerano rishasha, n’aho ari iza vuba kandi n’abazitirirwa bavugwa hafi muri zose, naho nyene harimwo ibibazo. Birazwi ko bimwe muri vyo vyatanguye kwandikwa imyaka 30 canke 40 inyuma y’urupfu rwa Yezu. Moraes avuga ko "bishoboka cane ko aya mazina yose [y’aba banditsi b’Injili bane] yaje biciye mu mico n’imigenzo." Ashimangira ati : "Nta zina ry’umuntu yitirirwa ibi bitabo vya kera cane." Igisa n’uko ata mpari gitera ni uko iya mbere muri izi njili ari iya Mariko. Ati: "Mu gihe hari igisekuru, igisekuru cakurikiranye ubuzima bwa Yezu gushika apfe, ni ngombwa ko kigumana inyandiko ku vyabaye. Rero nico gitangura ubwoko bushasha bw’impinyanyuro y’amajambo, ari yo Njili." Mu gushira hamwe imico n’imigenzo hamwe n’ivyahanahanwa ku munwa, uyu mwanditsi w’injili arandika neza ivy’ubuzima bwa Yezu. Ariko ahagarara cane ku gice yashaka guhagararako ico gihe: aha ni ukuvuga ko ata kigoro agira ko kuvuga ku vyerekeye ivuka canke ubwana bwa Yezu, ahagarara cane cane ku gikorwa ciwe, ku rupfu rwiwe, ku butumwa bwiwe bwa Pasika. None uyu Mariko yari umuntu ki ? Umuhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana (théologien) arerekana ko yari umwigishwa w’intumwa Petero. Ati: "Ariko abandi bazokubwira ko yari umwigishwa wa Paulo. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, ico tuzi ni uko atari umwigishwa wa Yezu." Injili ya Yohani nayo nyene irimwo amakenga. Ahari amakenga ni aho avuga  «umwigishwa yakundwa cane», aha amayagwa akerekana ko yari Yohani. Moraes ati : "Ariko hariho abahinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana babona ahubwo ko yashobora kuba ari Lazaro, kuko mu njili harimwo umurongo [mu gice kivuga urupfu rwa Lazaro] uvuga ko Yezu yarize,  ‘hanyuma raba ingene yamukunda." Mu kinjana ca 20 ni ho abakristu batanguye kmwemeza ko Yohani ari we yanditse iyi Njili. "Amayagwa yabigize uko nyene, tubandanya tumwita Yohani. Ariko ntivyoroshe kumenya uwayanditse, ishobora mbere kuba yanditswe n’umurwi wa benshi." Kubw’uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana, ni vyiza ko tugumana iciyumviro c’uko ari « Injili zanditswe na» ugaca ushirako izina rimwe rimwe muri ayo, hakubafata nk’abanditsi b’ibitabo nk’uko bafatwa mu gihe ca none. Ariko nimba ikibazo ari Isezerano rishasha, ni ukwerekana uruhaha rwa Paulo, intumwa yandikiye amabaruwa menshi imiryango ya mbere ya gikristu. Medeiros avuga ati : "Amabaruwa ya Paulo, nk’uko iri zina ribivuga, [yanditswe] na Paulo hamwe n’abigishwa biwe. Nk’akarorero, ibaruwa ryandikiwe Timoteyo, rishobora kuba ryanditswe na Paulo, rero abahinga bamwe baryita Deutéro-Paulin". "Hagati aho, hari impari ku vyerekeye amabaruwa yitirirwa Petero, kandi ashobora kuba atanditswe na we nyene ubwiwe. Co kimwe kandi n’irya Paulo yandikiye abahebreyi, rishobora cane kuba ryagiye kurangizwa n’umwe mu bigishwa biwe ». Paulo yumvikana ko ari we yatanguye kwandika kuri Yezu, kuva mu mwaka wa 57 canke 58. Moraes  avuga ati : "Ikibazo nyamukuru ni ukumenya nimba yari azi ko yariko yandika inyandiko nyeranda. Ashobora kuba atari abizi." "Hari uburyo yakoresha mu kuvugana n’amasengero hanyuma agasiga amakete. Amwe muri yo yaratakaye, amwe muyo twita ko ari amabaruwa yiwe yanditswe kumbure n’abigishwa biwe, ariko ashirwa mu murwi w’ayanditswe na Paulo." Uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana avuga ati: "Iyo tuvuga amabaruwa ya Petero, kumbure yanditswe n’abamwegereye, kuko Petero ntiyari azi kwandika, kandi arabitomora mw’ibaruwa ryiwe [rya mbere].  Yakoresha umwanditsi mu kwandika. Kumbure afise kuba yabwira icegera ciwe, yitwa Silvano, ivyo yandika."

headline: Ukraine - Russia: Abategetsi b'Uburengero baremera ko Putin afise amahirwe yo gutsinda intambara
text: Abategetsi bo mu bihugu vy'Uburengero bavuga ko babona ibimenyetso ko Uburusiya buriko buratorera inyishu ibibazo bimwe bimwe vyabaye inzitizi mu ndwi za mbere z'igitero cabwo muri Ukraine. Kubona ubu ingabo z'Uburusiya ziriko zigerageza gutera intambwe mu duce twinshi vyerekana ko ibibazo nk'ivy'intwazangabo zihagararira zikagenzura urugamba biriko biratorerwa umuti. Ariko aba bategetsi bavuga ko Abarusiya bakirwanira ku mirongo miremire mu mabarabara yirebanga, ibi bigasigura ko babandanya baterwa. Ingabo za Ukraine nk'uko babivuga, "zibandanya zirwana n'ubwenge bwinshi kandi mu buryo bumeze neza". Imwe mu mirongo y'ingabo z'Uburusiya iracari miremire (cane cane mu bumanuko uvuye i Kharkiv) aha zigashobora guhura n'ibitero bivuye mu burengero. Aba bategetsi bavuga ko Vladimir Putin "agifise amahirwe yo gutsinda", agashika ku bintu bitandukanye, ariko babona ko ata na kimwe muri vyo gishobora gushikwako vuba. Ibihugu vyo mu Burengero birabandanya bisuka imfashanyo za gisirikare muri Ukraine "muri ino ntambara imaze igihe kirekire ...kumbure mbere igashobora kumara uno mwaka wose". Intambara yo muri Donbas ishobora kugenda neza ku Burusiya kandi, icoba kibi gusumba,  ibi bigashobora gutuma busubira kuraba ingene bufata ibisagara bwari bwipfuje imbere y'intambara, nka Kyiv na Odesa. Abategetsi bavuga ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zifise amahirwe menshi kuko ziruta ingabo za ukraine incuro zitatu zose, ariko vyinshi biva ku kungene Moscou ikoresha izi nguvu mu bwenge be n'ubushobozi bw'ingabo za Ukraine mu kwivuna - ari naco gituma ibihugu vyo mu Burengero birungika n'ibirwanisho bikomeye gusumba. Uburusiya buracafise igitigiri kinini c'ingabo - hagati ya 5000 na 10.000 - mu karere ko mu micungararo ya Mariupol, ibi bigasigura ko habaye uruja n'uruza ruto canke rukaba rutanabaye ku ruhande rw'ingabo z'Uburusiya mu bumanuko, zari zitezwe ko zija gufasha gusatira ingabo za Ukraine i Donbas. Abategetsi bavuga ko nimba Putin ashaka kwugara rwose Mariupol, ntibizoba ari ibintu vyoroshe kandi bizotuma izi ngabo zigira uruhara ruto mu rugamba rwo muri Donbas. Abategetsi bavuga ko Uburusiya bwagabanije gukoresha misire zirasa kure za Iskander mu ndwi iheze, bakavuga ko Moscou ifise impungenge ku rugero zikoreshwako n'ubushobozi bwo kuzisubiriza.

headline: Icegeranyo kivuga ko Diego Maradona yapfuye kubera ugusamara kw'abaganga
text: Umurwi w'abahinga mu vyo buvuzi wemeje ko uwahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Argentine mu mupira w'amaguru Diego Maradona "atitaweho kandi habaye urwangara" imbere 'yuko asandaba. Abashikirizamanza muri Argentina bari basavye uyo murwi gukora amatohoza ku bari bajejwe gukurikirana amagara ya Maradona inyuma y'aho apfiriye mu kw'icumi na rimwe umwaka uheze. Maradona yahitanywe n'indwara y'umutima muhira iwe i Buenos Aires afise imyaka 60. Mu ntango z'ukwa cumi na rimwe yari yabazwe mu bwonko ikivyimba cari cavuye kw'ivura ry'amaraso, akaba yagomba abandanye avurwa ingaruka z'inzoga.
