Nk'umwe mu bakinyi babaye rurangiranwa mu bihe vyose, Maradona yahavuye agira ubuzima bubi bwaranzwe no kunywa ibiyayuramutwe n'inzoga nyinshi. Urupfu rwa Maradona yabaye kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina igihe iki gihugu gitahukana igikombe c'isi yose mw'ihiganwa mpuzamakungu ry'umupira w'amaguru  mu 1986, rwababaje abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi, bakaba bibajije vyinshi ku bijanye n'abari bajejwe kumuvura. Haciye imisi mike apfuye, abashikirizamanza baciye batangura amatohoza ku baganga n'abaforoma bari bajejwe kumuvura. Mu kwa gatatu, abo bashikirizamanza batumyeko abahinga 20 muvyo ubuvuzi  kugira ngo bihweze icatumye Maradona apfa bongere bihweze nimba harabaye urwangara. Ivyavuye mu matohoza y'abo bahinga vyatangajwe n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri Argentina ku wa gatanu. Mu cegeranyo c'impapuro 70, uyo murwi werekana ko Maradona yasinzikaye cane hafi amasaha 12 imbere y'uko apfa. Muri iki gihe, "ntiyakurikiranywe bikwiye", nk'uko iki cegeranyo kibivuga. Gisubiramwo ibiri muri ico cegeranyo, ikinyamakuru Clarin co muri Argentina kivuga ko uyo murwi wagiriza abaganga bari bajejwe kuvura Maradona "bamutanye wenyene" Abo bahinga bavuga ko Maradona yari gushobora kuronka amahirwe yo gukira iyo ajanwa kuvurirwa kw'ivuriro hakumugumiza muhira, nk'uko ico kinyamakuru kibivuga. Uyo murwi uvuga ko abari bajejwe kuvura Maradona batamuvuye neza kandi baranzwe n'urwangara, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters naryo ryaronse ico cegeranyo. Umuganga bwite wa Maradona Leopoldo Luque w'imyaka 39 hamwe n'uwari ajejwe gukurikirana ubuzima bwiwe bwo mu mutwe, bari mu baganga bariko barakorwako amatohoza n'aho bashikirizamanza. Umurwi w'abahinga washikirije icegeranyo cawo, hasigaye ko abashikirizamanza bafata ingingo ku bijanye no kurengutsa abagirizwa. Ikinyamakuru Clarin kivuga ko bimwe muvyo bashobora kwagirizwa harimwo ubwicanyi. Uru rupfu rwakozweko amatohoza inyuma y'uko babiri mu bakobwa ba Maradona bitwaye. Bavuze ko bagize amakenga ku kungene se wabo yakurikiranywe amaze kubagwa mu bwonko. Muganga Luque wewe nta caha camwagiriye. Arahakana ko ataruhara yabigizemwo. Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'abanyamakuru akorora amosozi mu kwa cumi na rimwe, Muganga Luque yararize, avuga ko yakoze uko ashoboye kugira arokore ubuzima bw'umugenzi wiwe. Uyu muganga yavuze ko yakoze "ivyo yari ashoboye vyose gushika aho ananirwa".

headline: Umwamikazi Elizabeth II na Africa: Ibihe bikomeye vy'ingoma yiwe
text: Umwamikazi Elizabeth II yagendeye ibihugu birenga 20 vyo muri Afrika ku ngoma yiwe, igihe ingoma y'Ubwongereza yariko irarangira, ukwikukira nakwo kuriko kurashwara Afrika. Ubucuti budasanzwe bwarabandanije biciye mw'ishirahamwe rya Commonwealth, umwamikazi yari arongoye. Yari imigenderanire ikomeye - rimwe na rimwe igoye - imigenderanire iri hagati y'ingoma y'Ubwongereza  hamwe n'igihe c'ubukoloni. Umuganwakazi Elizabeth yavugiye ijambo imbere y'inzu ya reta i Cape Town, muri Afrika y'Epfo igihe yashikana imyaka 21, yiyemeza ko ubuzima bwiwe bwose azokorera ishirahamwe rya Commonwealth. "Ahantu hose nagiye muri iki gihugu ciza ca Afrika y'Epfo.... abavyeyi banje, mwenewacu nanje nyene twarakunzwe cane n'abanyagihugu baco, gushika aho twiyumva nk'abantu bari muhira ngaha, nk'uko umenga twabanye na bo ubuzima bwabo bwose. Umuganwakazi Elizabeth agaragara ngaha mw'ihoteli Treetops muri Kenya ari kumwe n'umugabo wiwe, Duke wa Edinburgh. Mu nyuma akiri muri urwo rugendo, yumvise amakuru ko se wiwe, Umwami George VI yatanze kandi ko ategerezwa kuba umwamikazi. Uru ni rumwe mu ngendo zibiri umwamikazi Elizabeth yagize muri Nigeria. Yafashwe ifoto ngaha ari kumwe n'umutegetsi Oba Adenji-Adele II i Lagos. Yaragendeye kandi Calabar, Enugu, Jos, Kaduna, Kano na Port Harcourt. Umwamikazi Elizabeth ariko aratambana na Kwame Nkrumah, prezida wa mbere wa Ghana inyuma yo kwikukira, yaza n'imbere mu muhari w'abashaka kwikukira. Yatamvye umuziki wateguriwe urwo rugendo wiswe Welcome Your Majesty. Umwamikazi Elizabeth n'umuganwa Philip bafashwe ifoto bari kumwe n'igikomangoma Haile Selassie wa Ethiopia i Addis Abeba, mu rugendo rw'akazi. Ico gikomangoma carahungiye mu Bwongereza hagati ya 1936 na 1941 inyuma y'aho Ubutaliyano bwigaruriye igihugu ciwe aza kugaruka ku ngoma mu 1941 igihe Ubwongereza na Commonwealth batsinda Ubutaliyano. Umwamikazi Elizabeth na prezida El Tigani El-Mahi bariko barava ku kibuga c'indege ca Khartoum mu modoka. Urugendo rwiwe muri Sudani harimwo n'umuhingamo w'isiganwa ku ngamiya hamwe n'urugendo rwo kuraba ibikorwa vyo kwubaka urugomero rw'umuyagankuba rwa Roseires kuri Nil Bleu, rwarangiye mu mwaka ukurikira. Umwamikazi ari kumwe na prezida Julius Nyerere atanguye urugendo rw'akazi rw'imisi itatu. Imyaka 18 imbere y'aho, Dr Nyerere yari yashikanye Tanganyika yahoze ikoronijwe n'Ubwongereza ku ntahe yo kwikukira, aca aba uwa mbere akibereye umushikiranganji wa mbere hanyuma aba prezida w'ico gihugu wa mbere. Uko imyaka yagenda, yagiye yanka cane Ubwongereza n'Uburaya. Ariko, reta y'Ubwongereza yamubona nk'umuntu afise inguvu zo guhoyahoya mu karere karimwo ibihuhusi vyinshi. Prezida wa Zimbabwe yarahawe ikidari n'umwamikazi mu 1994. Ariko igihe imishamirano yongerekana hagati ya Zimbabwe na reta y'Ubwongereza ku mugambi w'isubirwamwo ry'itangwa ry'amatongo, Zimbabwe yarikuye muri Commonwealth mu 2003 - hanyuma Mugabe aca yakwa ico kidari mu 2008. Umwamikazi Elizabeth yafashwe ifoto ashitse ku kibuga c'indege ca Durban. Yari mu rugendo rw'akazi rw'imisi itandatu muri Afrika y'Epfo, hakaba habaye igihe c'imvura ciza mu myaka 10, aho yaciye atazirwa Motlalepula canke "umwamikazi w'imvura". Umwamikazi ari kumwe n'umukuru w'igihugu wa mbere wa Afrika y'Epfo w'umwirabure, Nelson Mandela, bivugwa ko bakundana cane. Umwamikazi yarandikiye amakete prezida Mandela aho yakoresha "Umugenzi wawe  nyawe, Elizabeth R" kandi bisa n'uko yamuhamagara "Nelson", mu gihe bivugwa ko na we yamuhamagara bisanzwe "Elizabeth" aciye ku ruhande amategeko agenga ubwami. Umwamikazi yaragendeye Nigeria ubugira kabiri mu 2003. Ico gihugu cari carahagaritswe muri Commonwealth kubera kutubahiriza agateka ka zina muntu ku butegetsi bwa gisirikare bwa Sani Abacha mu 1995, gisubira kwemererwa kugaruka mu 1999, hagarutse ubutegetsi bwa gisivile. Umwamikazi na prezida Obasanjo bagaragara ngaha mu birori vyo kwugurura inama y'abakuru b'ibihugu bihurikiye mw'ishirahamwe Commonwealth i Abuja. Mu rugendo rwa nyuma ku mugabane wa Afrika, uwo mwamikazi amaze umwanya muremure ku butegetsi yarahuye n'umwe mu baprezida bamaze imyaka myinshi ku butegetsi, Yoweri Museveni, na we ari ku butegetsi kuva mu 1986. Yari yarigeze kugendera Uganda imbere y'aho - mu rugendo rwa mbere rw'akazi muri Afrika nk'umwamikazi mu 1954.

headline: China: Umukuru w’igihugu aragabisha ko wa mugera corona ukwiragira cane
text: Inyuma y'inama y'abashikiranganji ku munsi mukuru w'umwaka mushasha mu Bushinwa, umukuru w'ico gihugu Xi Jinping  aragabisha ko wa mugera ruhonyabantu corona uriko urakwiragira bidasanzwe. Perezida Xi yabwiye abategetsi bakuru ko igihugu ciwe "kiri mu gihe kidasanzwe". Umugera corona gushika ubu, umaze guhitana abantu 56  abandi nabo bashika 2000 baramaze kuwandura kuva wadutse. Ibi bimeze uku mu gihe abashakashatsi b'abongereza bagabisha ko Ubushinwa bushobora kunanirwa no kurwanya uwo mugera. Mui bisagara bimaze kwandukirwa n'uwo mugera, hari amategeko yafashwe yo kugabanya uruja n'uruza. Kuva uno munsi ku wa Mungu, amamodokari y'abigenga ntiyemererwe kuja mu gisagara ca Wuhan aho uwo mugera watanguriye. Ibirori vy'umunsi mukuru w'umwaka mushasha vyatanguye ejo ku wa gatandatu vyarahagaritswe mu bisagara bitari bike. Hagati mu gihugu, ingenzi zitegerezwa kubanza gupimwa ubushuhe, mu gihe ingendo z'amatereni mu bisagara bitari bike zahagaritswe. Mu ntara ya  Hong Kong imaze igihe iri mu migumuko ikomeye hatangajwe ibihe bidasanzwe, ikiringo c'uburuhuko bw'abanyesure naco kirongerezwa. Hari n'ibihugu bimaze kwandukirwa n'uwo mugera, aho abanduye bashizwe mu bibanza vya bonyene kugira ngo bavurwe. Uwo mugerawa corona uri mu muryango w'imigera itera ibicurane bisanzwe, ariko ukabangamira cane ibihimba vy'ihemero. Mu kumenya ko umuntu yafashwe, atangura kwumva amenetse umutwe, mu nyuma agakorora cane, inyuma y'indwi agatangura kugira ingorane zo guhema. Gushika ubu nta muti canke urucanco rurashobora kuboneka. Abategetsi b'Ubushinwa bikeka ko uyo mugera woba wanduwe uvuye ku bifungurwa vyo mu kiyaga vyinjijwe mu kinyegero. Uwo mugera urateye umutima uhagaze abahinga bavuga ko bishobora kugorana ko igihugu c'Ubushinwa  kuwuhagarika. Abahinga bo mu kigo MRC bo mu Bwongereza kijejwe kwihweza indwara zandukira kw'isi kivuga ko umuntu yawanduye ashobora kuwandukiza abantu hafi batatu. Ico kigo kirashima utwigoro abategetsi b'Ubushinwa bariko barakora mu guhangana n'uwo mugera, ariko bakavuga ko hakenewe ko uwo mugera ubu urwanywa gushika ku bice 60% kugira ngo bashobore kuwuhagarika. Ibihugu vya Thailand, Singapore, Ubuyapani, Taiwan, Malaysia, Vietnam, Koreya y'Epfo, na Nepal biramaze gutangaza ko bifise abanduye uwo mugera. Ejo ku wa gatandatu, Australia yatangaje ko abantu bane bamaze kwandura, mu bisagara vya Melbourne na Sydney. Eka no ku mugabane wa Bulaya uramaze gushikayo, aho u Bufaransa bumenyesha ko umaze gufata abantu batatu. Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika nazo nyene ntiziri kure kuko zivuga ko abantu babiri bamaze kuwandura, harimwo umukenyezi ari mu myaka 60 wo muri Chicago yawanduye avuye mu karere ka Wuhan.

headline: Intambara ya Ukraine: kubera iki Russia vyanse ko igumana izinga Snake Island?
text: Ukraine irishimira intsinzi ikomeye inyuma y’aho Uburusiya bukuriye ingabo zabwo mw’izinga ryitwa Snake Island (Izinga ry’Inzoka), zari zigaruriye ku musi wa mbere nyene zitangura igitero. Rishobora kuba ari akantu gato, ariko iri zinga ry’urutare rifise uruhara rukomeye muri ino ntambara y’Uburusiya muri Ukraine – aha wokwibuka inkuru y’ingabo za Ukraine kuri rino zinga zibwira n’agasuzuguro ubwato bw’intambara bw’Uburusiya ngo “vaho” – igihe bwazisaba kwishikana. Ubu, inyuma y’amezi arenga ane Ukraine itera amabombe y’urutavanako, ingabo z’Uburusiya zahevye iri zinga Snake Island, rizwi nk’izinga rya Zmiinyi muri Ukraine. Iri zinga ry’urutare riri ku birometero 35 uvuye ku nkengera y’inyanja muri Ukraine – intera ntoya ishobora gushikirwa n’ibisasu vya misire, vya muzinga n’ibitero vya za ndege zitagira abadereva (drones) bivuye ku butaka. Ingabo za Ukraine niko zakora, ibitero bikomeye kuri iri zinga hamwe no ku bwato ubwo ari bwo bwose buhirahiriye ngo bwegere. Uburusiya bwobwo buvuga ko bwavuye kuri ico kirindiro “ku gatima keza” kugira ngo bwerekane ko ata ntumbero bufise yo kuzibira ishorwa ry’intete, ariko Ukraine yoyo iriyamiriza ibi, na rirya Moscou ibandanya icucagira ibisasu ububiko bw’intete. Iri zinga Snake Island ni akarere kari ahantu ngirakamaro, hakaba hari haciye amezi atari make harangwa intambara. Iri zinga ry’urutare rito cane riri mu buraruko bushira uburengero  bw’Inyanja Yirabura (Mer Noire/Black Sea) ryari ryafashwe n’Uburusiya ku musi wa mbere w’igitero cabwo kuri Ukraine, kandi ryagize uruhara rudasanzwe muri ino ntambra kuva ico gihe. Iri zinga riroroshe guterwa uciye ku mpande zose, mu kirere no mu mazi, mu gihe ikirindiro gito cari kiricungereye – ubwa mbere cari ic’abanya-Ukraine hanyuma ic’Abarusiya – abahinga ba gisirikare bakaba barifata nk’akarere kirebanga, kadashobora gukingirwa. Mu kwa kane, inguvu z’Uburusiya zo kwivuna ibitero vy’indege mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw’inyanja Yirabura zaragabanutse cane igihe bwa bwato bw’intambara Moskva butwarwa. Kremlin yagumye igerageza kuraba ingene yogarukana ibirwanisho vyo guhangana n’ibitero vy’indege n’ibindi vyo kurwana intambara za elektroniki kuri iri zinga. Ariko vyabaye ivy’ubusa ku Burusiya, kuricungera biranka kubera ryari kure y’ibirindiro bikuru bikuru vyo mu Nyanja yirabura. Mu bitero vyose vyayo, Ukraine nta mato menshi ifise, ari co gituma itashoboye gutwara ingabo zayo kuri iri zinga. Umuhinga wa gisirikare w’umunya-Ukraine Oleh Zhdanov avuga ko gushinga ikirindiro c’ingabo kuri iri zinga ataco bimaze ku mpande zompi kuko vyoroshe guterwa. Zhdanov abona ko ahubwo igikenewe ari ukugira ubushobozi bwo gutera ikintu ico ri co cose cokwegera iri zinga. Ibi bishobora guha ubushobozi Ukraine bwo gukingira ikivuko cayo kinini gusumba ibindi vyose ku Nyanja Yirabura, hamwe no mu gace kose k’uburaruko bushira uburengero bw’inyanja Yirabura. Uburusiya ubu buragenzura akarere katari gato ka Ukraine ku nkengera y’Inyanja Yirabura, hamwe n’ikigwa ca Crimea be n’inyanja yose ya Azov. Mu kwigarurira iri zinga vyatumye Odesa yugaranwa burundu, ibisigura ko bitashoboka ko Ukraine ishora intete zayo hanze. Vyasigura kandi ko inkengera y’Inyanja Yirabura yashobora guterwa, abahinga ba gisirikare i Kyiv bakaba berekanye ubwoba bari bafise ko Uburusiya bushobora kuhashinga ikirindiro c’ibirwanisho birasa kure, nk’ibitera za misire zo mu bwoko bwa S-400. Uravye kw’isanamu, biboneka kandi ko Uburusiya kwigarurira iri zinga vyari bibangamiye umutekano wa Roumanie, umunywanyi wa OTAN/NATO – haba ku kivuko cayo ca Constanta  canke mu ngendo zo mu mazi y’uruzi Danube. Uretse ko iri zinga riri ahantu hakomeye cane, ni akarere gatunze igitoro hamwe na gaze. Iyi si intsinzi ikomeye kuri Ukraine, ariko ni intambwe ikomeye. Ku Burusiya, ni uruhombo ku rugamba rwabwo kandi ni ugutsindwa mu buryo buteye isoni. Ariko ibi ntibishobora gutuma intambara ihindura isura. Uburusiya ubu burajwe ishinga no kwigarurira akarere kose ka Donbas kari mu buseruko bwa Ukraine be no kugumana uturere bwigaruriye igihe butangura intambara. Izinga Snake Island rishobora kuba ari ikibanza gikomye cane mu Nyanja yirabura kandi hakaba n’ahantu heza ho gushinga ibirwanisho bikomeye birasa ibisasu vya misire, ariko ni akarere gato cane k’urutare. N’aho Abarusiya bahirukanywe, ikibazo nyamukuru ni ukumenya nimba Ukraine ishobora gusubira gushora intete hanze kugira ngo inagure ubutunzi bwayo bwishwe n’intambara. Ata mato afise ubushobozi ifise, hari igihamana gito, na rirya amato y’intambara y’Uburusiya ari yo yiganje mu Nyanja Yirabura. Andrew Wilson, umwigisha kw’ishure kaminuza rya Londres ku bijanye n’ibibazo vya Ukraine, avuga ati: "Mu bisanzwe hari ibintu cumi bikenewe kugira ngo ushobore gushora hanze izi ntete ata ngorane, hamaze kuba iki kimwe gusa”. Ukraine yamiriye kure ibisabwa n’Uburusiya ko bwoherekeza amato y’intete avuye i Odesa kuko bisaba ko ibisasu vya mine hanze y’ikivuko bibanza gutegurwa. Turukiya iriko irakora uko ishoboye mu guhuza impande zompi kugira bashike ku masezerano ariko ibi bisa n’ibikiri kure nk’ukwezi. Indwi nkeya ziri imbere zifatwa ko ari ikiringo gikomeye cane ku rudandazwa rwo hanze rwa Ukraine – kubera isarura ryimirije ritangura muri kuno kw’indwi.

headline: Sengazi, umuhinga wa mbere mu gutwenza w'i Burundi n'i Rwanda' aronse 'RFI Talent du Rire'
text: Michael Sengazi niwe muhinga wa mbere mu gutwenza mu Burundi no mu Rwanda ubu yatsindiye igihembo citiriwe 'RFI Talent du Rire' gitanzwe ku ncuro ya gatanu. Sengazi ni umuhinga mu gutwenza yavukiye i Gitega mu Burundi kuri se w'Umurundi na nyina yavukiye i Burundi ariko akomoka mu Rwanda. Igihembo RFI Talent du Rire catangujwe n'umuhinga mu gutwenza yitwa Mamane akomoka muri Niger, asanzwe kandi ategura amakuru y'ugutwenza kw'iradiyo y'abafaransa RFI Gondwana. Ni igihembo kironswa umuhinga muvyo gutwenza yabaye uwa mbere mu bandi. Iki gihembo kijana n'ama €4 000 azokironswa mu kwezi kuza kwa umi na kabiri. Bwana Sengazi ati: "Kano gashimwe rero kuri jewe ni ikintu gikomeye, cerekana ko babonye kandi bemeye ko akazi kanje ndagakora neza, kandi ko nshobora n'ukugera kure gusumba ng'aha". Muri Afrika, aka gashimwe gatanzwe ku ncuro igira gatanu, Michael Sengazi rero akaba ariwe yatowe ku rwego rwa Afrika yose. Bwana Sengazi yize amashure y'intango mu Burundi n'ayisumbuye kuri Michel Archange i Bujumbura, yiga amategeko muri Kaminuza ya ULK i Kigali mu Rwanda. Ahejeje ivyigwa yahisemwo gukora umwuga wo gutwenza. Ati: "Nacaguye gukora ibijanye na comedie kuko nabona ko ariyo mpano Imana yampaye". Avuga ko hari abantu badatahura ko uyu nawo ari umwuga. Ati: "Ndabumva cane kuko ni ibintu batamenyereye, badasanzwe bakora canke babona". Michael yinjiye neza na neza muri ico gisata mu 2010 akina theatre, mu nyuma ahura na bagenzi we baciye batanguza umugambi w'ugukora ivyo gutwenza i Kigali. Agitangura abavyeyi biwe nabo ntibavyumva ariko mu nyuma baramufata mu mugongo. "Umuvyeyi yumvise ko mvuye mu vy'amategeko ngiye gukina ivyo gutwenza, yaciye abona ko ngiye kwonona amafaranga y'ishure yantangiye" - Bwana Sengazi. "Ku muvyeyi, kugira ngo umuntu atere imbere ni uko akora akazi nyene k'abantu bakomeye, bwa buzi nyene buzwi n'abantu benshi. Ako kazi gashasha rero gashasha ntibashoboye kugasobanukirwa canke ngo bakumve, ariko naragerageje kubibumvisha". Michael atera akamo abandi bavyeyi gushigikira abandi bana bashobora kuba bafise intumbero bashaka kujanamwo ubuzima bwabo, mu gihe atari ikintu kimwicira ubuzima canke gituma amera nabi. Agira ati: "Ni ukumuba hafi kuko ni yatsitara ni wewe uzohangayika kuko ni umwana wawe".

headline: Uwurinda David Cameron yahagaritswe azize kwibagirira imbunda muri WC y'indege
text: Umupolisi yakora akazi ko kurinda uwahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza, David Cameron, yahagaritswe nyuma yo kwibagirira inkoho muri WC y'indege. Igipolisi c'Ubwongereza cemeje ko uwo mupolisi yakuwe mu kazi kandi akaba ariko aragirwako itohoza nyuma y'aho ivyo yakoze bimenyekaniye. Iyo nkoho bivugwa ko yari yuzuye amasasu, yatowe n'ingenzi hasigaye umwanya muto ngo indege ihagurutse, ayitora iri kumwe na passport ya Bwana Cameron. Indege barimwo y'ikompanyi British Airways yaratebejwe ikiringo c'isaha imwe, kuko umupilote yariko araremesha ingenzi azibwira y'uko abarinda vya hafi abategetsi bemerewe kwinjirana inkoho mu ndege. Bivugwa ko mu nyuma iyo nkoho yaciye ikurwa muri iyo ndege. Iyo nkoho, vyibazwa ko yari iyo mu bwoko 9mm Glock 17 pistol, bivugwa ko yasizwe muri iyo WC n'umupolisi acunga abantu vya hafi wo mu rwego rwa Met's Specialist Protection, akaba yari yayikuye mu rwubati rwayo ariko arihagarika. Passport ya Bwana Camero hamwe n'iy'uwo mupolisi, basanze ziri kumwe n'iyo nkoho, nk'uko bitangwaza n'ikinyamakuru co mu Bwongereza, The Sun. Umuvugizi w'igipolisi c'Ubwongereza yagize ati: "Turazi neza ivyo vyabereye mu ndege yari ije mu Bwongereza itariki zitatu z'ukwa kabiri kandi uwo mupolisi yakuwe mukazi. "Ibi vyabaye twabifashe nk'ibihambaye cane kandi twatanguje itohoza ry'indani." Bwana Cameron yahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza ikiringo c'imyaka itandatu gushika mu kwezi kw'indwi 2016, aho yatanga imihoho kubera ivyavuye mu matora ya kamarampaka yo kuva kw'Ubwongereza mw'ishirahamwe rya Buraya.

headline: Burundi: Gen. Maj. Evariste Ndayishimiye azoserukire CNDD-FDD mu matora ni inde?
text: Kuri uyu wa Mungu 26/01/2020 niho Jenerali Majoro Evariste Ndayishimiye yemezwa n'abanywanyi b'umugambwe CNDD-FDD ngo azoserukire uwo mugambwe mu matora ategekanijwe mu kwa gatanu uno mwaka. Yatowe mw'ikoraniro kaminuza ridasanzwe ry'uwo mugambwe ryabereye i Gitega, umugwa mukuru wa politike w'u Burundi, inyuma y'igikorane cari kimaze minsi itatu kibera muri iyo ntara. Iryavuzwe riratashe kuko izina rya Evariste Ndayishimiye ryari rimaze iminsi rizunguruka ku mbuga hwaniro zitandukanye ko ari we afise amahirwe yo guhiganirwa ico kibanza kugira ngo asubirire Perezida Petero Nkurunziza. Evariste Ndayishimiye yinjiye mu rutonde rw'abandi ba candida bamaze kumenyesha ko bemejwe n'imigambwe yabo kugira ngo bayiserukire muri ayo matora ategurwa ko azoba ku wa 20/05/2020. Mu mwaka wa 2018, u Burundi bwarahinduye ibwirizwashingiro, ivyanuganurwa ko yari amayeri ya Perezida Nkurunziza yo kurondera kwigumiza ku butegetsi, nk'uko abakuru b'ibihugu vyinshi vya Afrika basanzwe babigira. Hagati aho, umunsi ariterako igikumu yatangaje abatari bake aho amenyeshereje ko atazokwisubirako ku vyo yari yemeye igihe yitoza mu 2015, ko cari ikiringo ciwe ca nyuma. Ariko kuri benshi, amazinda ntiyaheze n'aho yagumye abisubiramwo igihe cose. Rero, ayo matora abaye mu mugambwe CNDD-FDD amaze amazinda ku bibaza ko Perezida Nkurunziza yari agifise umugambi wo gusubira kwitoza ngo abandanye atwara igihugu. Ingingo yo kwitoreza ikindi kiringo mu 2015 yatumye u Burundi bwinjira mu ndyane za politike, maze imigenderanire y'u Burundi n'ibihugu bitari bike iratoseraka. Evariste Ndayishimiye ni umunyamabanga mukuru w'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi CNDD-FDD  kuva mu kwezi kw'umunani 2016, aho uwo mugambwe usubiriyemwo itunganywa ryawo, asubirira Pascal Nyabenda yari umukuru wawo. Yavukiye muri komine Giheta y'intara ya Gitega ubu isigaye ari umugwa mukuru wa politike w'u Burundi kuva mu 2018. Jenerali Ndayishimiye azwi ko yarwanye muri uwo mugambwe ucitwa umuhari, mu ntambara yadutse mu Burundi inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye yari amaze amezi atatu ku butegetsi. Melchior Ndadaye yari yatowe ku wa 01/06/1993, ashikirizwa ubutegetsi ku wa 10/07/1993.  Inyuma y'amezi atatu gusa, ni ukuvuga ku wa 21/10/1993, yaragandaguwe n'igisirikare c'ico gihe, bica bituma igihugu cinjira mu ntambara hagati y'Abarundi bo nyene yamaze imyaka irenga cumi. Jenerali Ndayishimiye ari mu bacitse kw'icumu mu bwicanyi bwakorewe abanyeshure b'Abahutu kuri kaminuza y'u Burundi mu kwa gatandatu 1995. Yaciye ahamvya abandi barwanyi b'umuhari, ico gihe wari ucitwa CNDD ishami ryawo rikitwa FDD, urongowe na Leonard Nyangoma yawutanguje mu 1994. Uyo muhari, mu nyuma wagiye kwitwa CNDD-FDD, umaze kwinjira mu masezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha yo mu 2000 ugashira ibirwanisho hasi mu 2003, Jenerali Ndayishimiye yarakoze mu biro bikuru vya gisirikare. Inyuma y'amatora y'umukuru w'igihugu ya 2005 yatsinzwe na CNDD-FDD, Jenerali yaragenywe nk'umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu 2006-2007, imbere y'uko agenwa kuba umuhanuzi wa gisirikare mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu. Ku myaka 52 y'amavuko, Evariste Ndayishimiye aharurwa mu bategetsi bakomeye b'igihugu.

headline: Umunyapolitike Jérémie Ngendakumana araguma Kampala gushika Bujumbura yemeye ko ataha
text: Uwahoze ari umukuru w'umugambwe CNDD FDD, Jérémie Ngendakumana, yabwiye BBC ko azoguma i Kampala gushika leta y'u Burundi yikubise agashi ikamuha uruhusha rwo gutahuka. Vyari vyitezwe ko Jérémie  Ngendakumana, yari amaze imyaka hafi itanu yarahungiye mu Bubirigi, atahuka mu mpera z'indwi iheze mu ntumbero yo kuja mu matora yo mu kwezi kwa gatanu. Ivyo ariko ntivyamukundiye we n'abandi batanu bari kumwe nawe, kuko ubuserukizi bw'u Burundi mu muji wa Kampala butabahaye impapuro za mureke-arengane. Vyari vyavuzwe henshi ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ko Bwana Ngendakumana na bagenzi biwe batanu bashika mu Burundi mu mpera z'indwi. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Nibaza ko tuzobanza tukamara umwanya ngaha kugira turabe ko bokwikubita agashi bakatureka tugatahuka mu Burundi. "Twashikije ibisabwa kugira duhabwe impapuro mureke-arengane ku wa kane, batubwira kugaruka kuwa gatanu, tuje dusanga hamanitswe itangazo rivuga ko tutemerewe kwinjira mu biro biserukiye u Burundi". Bwana Ngendakumana avuga ko uwuserukiye u Burundi yari yababwiye ko abanza kubaza i Bujumbura niba boronswa izo mpapuro. Kuba atarasubiye kubakira rero, ku bwiwe abona ko ari amabwiriza yatanzwe n'abajejwe intwaro mu Burundi. BBC ntirashobora kuvugana n'uwuserukiye u Burundi i Kampala ngo atubwire icatumye izo mpapuro zidatangwa. Jeremie Ngendakumana yaheruka gushinga umugambwe mushasha yise PDG-Girubuntu, ariko yabwiye BBC ko ivy'uwo mugambwe no guterera mu matora ataho bihuriye. Yagize ati: "Ivyerekeye umugambwe n'ivyerekeye amatora ntibisa kuko umugambwe uracari mu vyiyumviro nturemererwa. Mugabo kugira umuntu agire ico aterera ntabwirizwa kuba afise mugambwe. "Abwirizwa kuba ari umurundi afise ivyangomba vyo gutora no kwitoza, hanyuma rero agaterera muri ubwo buryo". Jérémie Ngendakumana yavuye mu Burundi mu 2015 nyuma yo kutumvikano n'abo bari kumwe mu mugambwe wa CNDD FDD bapfuye kugena Pierre Nkurunziza ngo aserukire uwo mugambwe mu matora y'uwo mwaka. Yari umwe mu banyepolitike bakomeye mu Burundi bafashe ingingo yo kwerekeza iy'amahanga mu kwiyamiriza ikiringo kindi ca Prezida Nkurunziza. Nyuma y'imyaka itanu ari mu buhungiro mu Bubirigi, yari yafashe icemezo co gutahuka "guterera" mu matora yitezwe mu kwezi kwa gatanu.

headline: Umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba yaciye umuhigo ku metero 2000 mu mahiganwa ya Zagreb
text: Umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba yanditse amateka mashasha ku metero 2000 mw'ihiganwa Continental Tour Gold ryabera i Zagreb mu gihugu ca Croatia. Ku mwanya yakoresheje w'iminota itanu n'amasegonda 21.56, yasumbije Genzebe Dibaba yaheruka guca umuhigo mu mahiganwa yo mu kibuga cugaye (indoors) mu 2017, akaba yamusize amasegonda abiri. Inyuma y'umudari w'ifeza kw'isi no muri Olempike ku metero 800, Niyonsaba ni umwe mu banonotsi batari bake babujijwe guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya 400 na 1.600 kubera urugero rw'inkabuzo (umusemburo) ya testosterone ruri hejuru. Uyu munonotsi w'imyaka 28 avuga ko yahisemwo kubandanya amahiganwa kugira ngo abere akarorero abandi. N'aho ari mu murwi w'abanonotsi bategetswe guhindura ibisata bahiganwamwo ku ngingo yafashwe n'urwego mpuzamakungu rujejwe ukwinonora imitsi mu 2019, Niyonsaba ntaco yabaye kuko arabikora bigacika mu mahiganwa yo ku ntera ndende. N'akamwemwe kenshi, Niyonsaba ati: "Numva mfise umunezero udasanzwe. Si nari nzi ko nshobora kwandika amateka nk'aya kw'isi yose, kuko ni bwo bwa mbere nari nje hano. Naje hano gukora ivyo nategerezwa gukora". "Nabikoze. Ni vyiza kandi biraryoshe. Ndashimiye abo bose baje kudutera intege". Aya mateka mashasha yanditse, mbere akaba yanasumbije umunya Ireland Sonia O'Sullivan yari yaciye umuhigo mu mahiganwa yo hanze mu 1994, ayashitseko haciye indwi imwe gusa atsindiye ihiganwa ryo gusiganwa ku metero 5000 mu mahiganwa ya Diamond League yabereye i Zurich mu Busuwisi (Suisse). Mu nkino za Olempike ziheruka kubera i Tokyo mu Buyapani, yahejeje ari mu kibanza ca gatanu mw'ihiganwa rya nyuma (finale) ku metero 10.000, ariko imbere y'aho akaba yari yakuwe mw'ihiganwa ku metero 5000 yagirijwe ko yaciye mu nzira itari rwiwe. Yaheruka kandi kuba umunonotsi agize gatanu kw'isi avuduka cane ku metero 3000 mu rwego rw'abagore/abakobwa. Gusiganwa ku metero 2000 ntibirigera biba mu nkino za Olempike canke mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu (World Championships), ariko bikunze kuba mu mahiganwa asanzwe yo gusiganwa.

headline: Uwagandaguye John Lennon yasavye imbabazi ku 'caha c’agahomerabunwa' yakoze haciye imyaka 40
text: Mark Chapman, umugabo yishe John Lennon, yasavye imbabazi umupfakazi, Yoko Ono w'imyaka 40, yasizwe n'uyu yahoze ari muririmvyi rurangiranwa, inyuma y'imyaka 40 apfuye. Uyu mucuraranzi w'umwongereza John Lennon azwi ko yashinze umurwi w'abanyamuziki Beatles wabikoze bigacika kuva utangujwe mu ntango za 1960. Chapman yarashe Lennon amasasu ane amusanze hanze y'inzu yabamwo mu karere ka Manhattan mu gisagara ca New York, amurasira mu maso y'umugore wiwe Ono, hari mu 1980. Yarankiwe kurekurwa vy'agateganyo igihe yari arengukishijwe ku ncuro ya cumi na rimwe mu kwezi guheze. Igihe yariko arumvirizwa, Chapman yavuze ko yishe uyu munyamuziki rurangiranwa wo mu bwoko bwa rock arondera gusa icubahiro, akavuga ko mu bisanzwe yari akwiye igihano c'urupfu. Yongera ko y'uko igihe cose aguma yicuza iki "caha c'agahomerabunwa", akemera ko ashobora kumara ubuzima bwiwe mw'ibohero. Ari imbere y'abacamanza i New York, Chapman yavuze ati: "N'ukuri nongeye gusaba imbabazi kuri iki caha". "Nta citwazo na kimwe mfise. Ibi vyari ivyo kwihesha agaciro. Nibaza ko iki ari icaha kitagira urugero gishobora gukorerwa umuntu w'intungane". "Yari rurangiranwa. Ntabwo namwishe kubera imico yiwe canke uko yari ameze. Yari umugabo w'intungane afise umuryango. Yari umuntu w'akarorero. Yari umuntu yavuga ibintu turiko turavuga ubu kandi ni ikintu gikomeye". "Nkoresheje amajambo yanyu, naramwishe, kubera yari umuntu azwi cane, cane, cane rwose, nico cabintumye, kandi nabikoze nshaka cane, cane, cane rwose icubahiro, ukwikunda birengeje". "Ndashaka kongerako iki kintu, kandi ndagishimangire cane. Narakoze icaha c'ukwikunda. Ndababajwe n'umubabaro nateye umugore wiwe Ono. Ni ikintu kitarigera kimva mu mutwe". Abandanya avuga ko mu bisanzwe yari akwiye igihano c'urupfu - igihano cagiye gukurwaho mu ntara ya New York mu 2007 - n'aho ata wari bwigere anyongwa kuva mu 1963. Ati: "Iyo uzi neza ko uriko utegura umugambi wo kwica umuntu ukamenya ko ari bibi kandi ukabikora wewe nyene ubwawe, kubwanje ico ni igihano c'urupfu". Abajijwe nimba ubutungane bwakoze neza, Champan yishuye ati: "Eka ntaco maze, ntaco". "Mu gihe amategeko hamwe na mwebwe mwofata ingingo yo kungumiza hano mu minsi nsigaje kubaho, si noja ng'aho ngo ndiko ndaharira n'ukuri". Mu 2015, uyu munyatugenegene Yoko Ono akomoka mu Buyapani, akaba yagumye arwanya Chapman igihe cose yarondera ko yorekurwa vy'agateganyo, yabwiye ikinyamakuru Daily Beast co ku ngurukanabumenyi ko yumva ubwoba bwinshi cane mu gihe Chapman yorekurwa. Ati: "Ico nguma niyumvira ni uko yabikoze rimwe, ariko kandi ashobora gusubira kubikorera uwundi muntu - ico ni ukukimenya. Ashobora kubikorera jewe, canke Sean [umwana wiwe], eka ashobora kubikorera uwo ari we wese, rero iyi niyo ngorane". Impapuro z'urubanza zashitse mu minwe y'ishirahamwe ry'ibinyamakuru Press Association zerekana ko abacamanza banse ko Chapman arekurwa, bavuga ko "bishobora guhungabanya umutekano w'abanyagihugu". Igihe akora iki caha, Chapman yari afise imyaka 25. Ubu afise 65, yararongoye umugore wiwe akaba aba hafi y'aho amaze imyaka umunani apfungiwe. Mu nama y'abacamanza bariko bariga nimba yari akwiye kurekurwa vy'agateganyo, Chapman yasiguwe nk'umuntu asigaye yarihebeye cane Imana kandi ko ari "umukirisu akomeye". Urubanza rwo kwiga nimba ashobora kurekurwa vy'agateganyo ruzosubira mu kiringo c'imyaka ibiri.

headline: Intamba mu Rugamba zifise urukino ruhambaye kurusha izindi zose zimaze gukina
text: Robert Patrick Misigaro, BBC. Intamba ziri mu mugwi B muri izi nkino z'igikombe ca Afrika zibera mu Misiri aho ziri kumwe na Madagascar, Nigeria na Guinea. Nyuma yo gutsinda Guinea 1-0 mu rukino rw'ejo, Nigeria yarabandanyije mu gice c'ijonjora mu gihe izindi kipe zitatu zo mu mugwi B zitaramenya uko bigiye kugenda. U Burundi buramaze gutsindwa rimwe na Nigeria nyene, bukaba ari bwo bugise amanota ubusa mu mugwi kuko Guinea na Madagascar zifise inota rimwe rimwe nyuma yo kunganya mu rukino rwa mbere. Gutsindwa ni ikintu intamba zitohirahira ngo zishire mu mutwe kuko kiretse ku  bw'amahirwe, biragoye kugira zishobore kubandanya, naho zotsinda urukino rwa nyuma na Guinea ku munsi wa Mungu. Intamba zitsinzwe kabiri zikurikiranya bishobora kuzica intege zikaja mu rukino rwa nyuma na Guinea zaradebukiwe, naho kurutsinda vyoziha itike yo kubandanya mw'ijonjora. Kunganya naho ni hahandi kuko bigumiza intamba mu kibanza kitari ciza. Amahirwe meza rero yo kubandanya mw'ijonjora ni gutsinda urukino rwo mukanya na Madagascar, kuko kiretse amanota atatu zica zironka, biranazongera ingoga no kwigirira icizere. Intsinzi kandi yoba ari iya mbere u Burundi bugize mw'ihiganwa nk'iri, ikintu ngirakamaro cane ku mupira w'amaguru mu Burundi, kuko hari ibihugu vyinshi bija mu gikombe ca Afrika bikavayo bidatsinze na rimwe. Mu mupira w'amaguru nta kidashoboka, kandi uravye abakinyi Madagascar ifise n'abo Intamba zifise, ntacobuza ko zitsinda. Ariko Madagascar ifise umukino unyaruka kandi urimwo inguvu nk'uko vyigaragaje mu rukino na Guinea, kandi abakinyi bayo b'imbere ntibatinya kwitanga kugira batsinde. Intamba mu Rugamba zitegerezwa gushira Madagascar ku murundi wazo, ntizireke ngo izinyarukane nk'uko ibigenza. Abakinyi b'imbere kandi bategerezwa gutera kenshi kandi imipira ikomeye. U Burundi burazwi mu kuzibira neza, ibintu vya nkenerwa, ariko mu rukino rw'uno munsi gusatira bitegerezwa gushirwa imbere kugira iyo ntsinzi iboneke. BBC Gahuzamirango irabashikiriza ibikuru bikuru vy'uru rukino kuri facebook.

headline: Abarokotse kanseri ‘barakarirwa n’indwara z’umutima’
text: Hari icigwa giherutse kwerekana ko abarenga umwe kw'icumi mu barwayi ba kanseri baruhira gupfa bahitanywe n'indwara z'umutima hamwe n'ukuziba kw'imitsi, gusumba uko bicwa n'iyo ndwara. Ikinyamakuru European Heart Journal candika ku vyerekeye indwara z'umutima cakoze icigwa ku barwayi imiliyoni zitatu muri Amerika, barwaye ubwoko 28 butandukanye bwa kanseri, mu kiringo c'imyaka irenga 40. Abashakashatsi bavuga ko kubona ibitigiri vy'abarwaye kanseri vyiyongera bivuga ko bokwitwararikwa cane gusumba kugira ntibandure indwara z'umutima zifatira mu bwonko. Abahinga b'abongereza bavuga ko abaganga bakwiye kubimenya gusumba bagakurikirana abarwayi uko bikwiye. Mu barwayi imiliyoni zirenga zitatu bagizweko ubushakashatsi, ibice 38% nibo bahitanywe na kanseri abandi 11% nabo bahitanwa n'indwara z'umutima zifatira mu bwonko (AVC) - muri bo, bitatu vya bine bikaba vyavuye kuri iyo ndwara y'umutima. Igitigiri c'abarwaye kanseri bapfa bahitanywe na AVC cari kinini cane mu bantu barwaye indwara z'amafyigo, imihogo, udusaho tw'intangangabo, igitereko, amara n'amabere. Ku mwaka wa mbere, ivyo bishobora gutumwa n'ingaruka z'imiti ya kanseri canke ibipimo vya radiyo mu mibiri y'abantu. Ico cigwa kivuga ko abarwayi ba kanseri "bagumye babangamirwa gusumba" abantu basanzwe. Muganga Nicholas Zaorsky, umuhinga mu kuvura indwara za kanseri mu kigo Penn State Cancer Institute kijejwe kvura iyo ndwara niwe yari arongoye ico cigwa. Avuga ko iyo umuntu amenye ko ashobora kubangamirwa n'iyo ndwara bishobora gutuma abaho igihe kirekire. "Mu gihe abarwayi ba kanseri bomenya ko bashobora kubangamirwa gusumba bishobora kubatuma bafata ingendo y'ukwinengesera ishobora gutuma batandura AVC, ariko kandi ishobora gutuma batongera kurwara kanseri". Naho Martin Ledwick wo mu kigo Cancer Research UK kijejwe ubushakashatsi mu Bwongereza avuga ati: "Abaganga bategerezwa kumenya ibiri muri buno bushakashatsi busaba ko abarwayi bakeneye gukurikiranwa gusumba inyuma y'ugufata imiti, kugira barabe ntibahave bandura indwara z'imitima". "Hagati aho, ico cigwa ntikitubwira igituma abarwayi bamwe bamwe ba kanseri bashobora guhitanwa n'izo ndwara z'imitima". "Kuri bamwe, bishobora kuba ari ingaruka z'ukuvura iyo ndwara - ibipimo vya radiyo mu gikiriza n'imiti imwe imwe bishobora gutuma bafatwa n'indwara z'umutima. "Hagati aho, hari ubwoko bwa kanseri bwakozweko amatohoza buboneka ko bufatanya  n'imibereho y'abantu mu gutera indwara z'imitima - nk'akarorero ubuvyibuhe burenze n'itabi, navyo bishobora gutuma kanseri yiyongera. "Ni naco gituma ari nkererwa ko umwe umwe wese yokwitaho imibereho yiwe yotuma agira amagara meza".

headline: Burkina Faso: Abacangero b’Abarusiya biteguye gufasha abatembagaje ubutegetsi
text: Umurwi w'abacangero b'Abarusiya bandikiye abategetsi ba gisirikare ba Burkina Faso baherutse gutembagaza ubutegetsi ko biteguye kuja gufasha mu kwigisha igisirikare c'iki gihugu co muri Afrika y'Uburengero mu rugamba rwaco rwo kurwanya inyeshamba ziyitirira idini rya Islam. Uyu murwi wiyita "Community of Officers for International Security" (mu Kirundi twovuga tuti "Umurwi w'abasirikare bitaho umutekano mpuzamakungu), usanzwe uri muri Centrafrique ni wo watangaje ibi wandikiye aba bategetsi  ryahawe BBC. Ntibiramenyekana nimba Burkina Faso yaremeye ubu bufasha canke nimba izobwemera. Burkina Faso ubu irongowe n'akarwi k'abasirikare katembagaje reta ya Perezida Roch Kaboré ku wa mbere. Ibiri muri iryo kete biratomoye neza: "Mu gihe mwotumira abigisha b'Abarusiya kugira ngo bigishe igisirikare ca Burkina Faso, barashobora kubikora neza cane". Iri kete ryemejwe n'umuhanuzi w'Umurusiya mu vyo umutekano mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu wa Centrafrique ni ingorane ku rugamba rurongowe n'Ubufaransa mu karere ka Sahel. N'aho uru rugamba rumaze imyaka irenga cumi, iri kete rivuga ko "ataco rwashitseko", rikongerako y'uko uyu murwi ushobora gufasha abasirikae ba Burkina Faso "gufata ibintu mu minwe mu kanya gato cane mu ijanye n'umutekano". Ibihugu vyo mu Burengero vyaraneguye irungikwa ry'abacangero b'abarusiya mu gihugu kibanyi ca Mali mu kw'icumi na kabiri bikaba vyavuga ko rishobora gutuma ibintu vyunyuka gusumba mu bijanye n'umutekano.

headline: Intamba mu Rugamba zikeneye intsinzi kuri Guinea vyanka bikunda, ariko none yova hehe?
text: Robert Patrick Misigaro, BBC. Intamba zirahura na Guinea muri uwo mukino zizi neza yuko kiretse intsinzi yoziha amanota 3, ata kindi gishobora kuzihesha amahirwe y'itike yo kuguma mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika 2019. Iyo ntsinzi yoca ituma u Burundi buheza ari ubwa gatatu mu mugwi B, hagaca rero hasigara kwizera ya mahirwe, aza kuvana n'ukuntu izindi kipe ziza kwitwara mu migwi zirimwo. Guinea nayo nyene ntihagaze neza mu mugwi B mu gihe imaze kunganya rimwe (na Madagascara 2-2), itsindwa irindi rimwe na Nigeria (1-0). Iyi kipe nayo ikeneye intsinzi cane muri uno mukino kugira ishobore kubandanya. Urundi rukino mu mugwi B rurahuza Nigeria na Madagascar ziza gukinira mu muji wa Alexandria, narwo rukaza kuba ari urukino rutoroshe kuko Nigeria, naho imaze kuronka itike yo kubandanya, ishaka guheza ari iya mbere, kanatsinda ni nayo irusha uburambe izo biri kumwe mw'ihiganwa. Madagascar nayo iraza kuba irondera n'imiburiburi inota rimwe kugire yizere ko ijana na Nigeria mu muce w'ijonjora mu kibanza ca kabiri. Guinea ni ikipe itoroshe kandi imenyereye rino higanwa, ikaba kandi nayo ikeneye cane amanota atatu kuko itsinze u Burundi ibitsindo vyinshi hanyuma Madagascar igatsindwa na Nigeria, yoca iheza ari iya kabiri igaca ironka itike. Guinea rero ntiza kworohera u Burundi na gato kuko ikipe zose zirondera itike, bigasigura ko ruza kuba ari urukino rubereye ijisho. U Burundi ariko, kiretse urukino na Madagascar rutagaragayemwo ishaka ryinshi, urukino bwakinye na Nigeria rwari urwo ku rwego rwo hejuru ku buryo bakinye nk'uko uno munsi hogira ikivamwo. U Burundi kandi muri izi nkino zibiri bwakinye bwarabonye ko bukeneye gutumbereza mw'igoli, bisigura ko abasatirizi bategerezwa gutera cane kandi kenshi mw'igoli rya Guinea kugira biyongere amahirwe yo kwinjiza. Aha niho biza gukenerwa ko barutahizamu Saido Berahino na Fiston Abdul Razak bamera magabo bakerekana koko ico bamaze. Berahino akeneye guhindukiza amaso inyuma akibuka ivyo yakorera ikipe West Brom yo mu Bwongereza, aho yaharurwa muri barutahizamu bakomeye mu Bwongereza. Mu gihe bitamworoheye mw'ikipe akinira ubu ya Stock City, urukino rw'uyu munsi rutegerezwa kumubera akaryo ko kwerekana ko agifise umupira w'amaguru mu maraso kandi ko agifise vyinshi vyo kwerekana. Niyumvikana neza na Fiston imbere, barashobora guteza ibibazo ikipe ya Guinea iza gushira abakinyi imbere irondera igitsindo. Kandi mu gihe vyigaraje ko abakinyi b'inyuma no hagati b'u Burundi bahagaze neza, na cane cane umunyegoli Jonathan Nahimana, imyugariro imeze neza. Ikindi coshigikira u Burundi, ni uko Guinea ishira icizere cane ku mukinyi wayo rurangiranwa akina hagati, Naby Keita, ariko mu gihe afise ikibazo c'imvune birashobora kubagora. Ni ukuyita amahirwe kuko ubiravye ni ibintu bigoye cane kiretse amahirwe gusa, ariko nk'uko bikunze kuvugwa, ntakidashoboka mu mukino w'umupira w'amaguru. Ica nkenerwa ca mbere n'uko u Burundi butsinda Guinea, bikaba vyoba vyiza buyitsinze nk'ibitsindo birenga kimwe ariko kandi ntibusubire kwinjizwa. Kubera amakipe mw'ihiganwa ari 24, kandi mu bisanzwe mw'ijonjora hagomba kugenda amakipe abiri ku mugwi, bisigura ko zoca ziba ikipe 12. Ariko umuce w'ijonjora ukenera ikipe 16, bisigura y'uko hari ibibanza bine bizorwanirwa n'amakipe yabaye aya gatatu mu migwi ariko yavyifashemwo neza kurusha ayandi (mu gifaransa bita meilleurs perdants). Aha rero niho u Burundi bushobora kugirira amahirwe kuko buramutse buronse amanota atatu kuri Guinea, mu gihe kandi bumaze kwinjizwa ibitsindo bibiri gusa bukaba kandi bwaritwaye neza mu kibuga, burashobora kuronka kimwe muri ivyo bibanza bine mw'ijonjora. BBC iraza kubashikiriza ibikuru bikuru ry'urukino hagati ya Guinea n'u Burundi kuri Facebook, turangura isaha 18h00.

headline: Africa – Covid-19: Menya ibihugu bimaze gutangura gutanga incanco
text: U Rwanda, Kenya na Nigeria vyatanguje ku munsi umwe ku wa gatanu  isekeza ryo gutanga incanco za Covid zavuye muri Covax, umugambi wa ONU wo gusabikanya neza kw'isi inanco zo gukinga indwara ya Covid-19. Kenya n'u Rwanda  bibaye ibihugu vya mbere vyo mw'ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Africa y'Ubuseruko (EAC) bitanguje iryo sekeza. Mu Rwanda gukingira Covid-19 vyatanguye ku mugaragaro mu bitaro bitandukanye haciye umunsi umwe incanco za mbere zishitse mu gihugu. Abakingiwe bemeje inyandiko ko atawe bazokurikirana ku ngaruka urukingo rushobora kubagirako. U Rwanda rwaronse ku wa gatatu incanco zirenga ibihumbi 300 za AstraZeneca na Pfizer zitanzwe muri uwo mugambi wa Covax. Hari n'izindi ncanco 50.000 rwaronse zitanzwe n'Ubuhindi. Intego y'ico gihugu n'ugukingira 30% by'abanyagihugu uyu mwaka na 60% gushika mu 2022. Muri  Kenya, umutegetsi wo mu bushikiranganji bw'amagara, Patrick Amoth, ni we yabaye uwa mbere mu guterwa urwo rucanco. Ku wa gatatu niho Kenya yaronka incanco zirenga gato umuriyoni za AstraZeneca zakozwe n'ikigo co mu Buhindi, Serum Institute of India, nazo nyene zitanzwe n'umugambi Covax. Co kimwe n'u Rwanda na Kenya, Nigeria nayo yatanguje isekeza ryo gucanca ku wa gatanu. Muri ivyo bihugu uko ari bitatu, abakozi bo kwa muganga bari mu baza imbere mu kubanza kuronswa urucanco. Ghana na Côte d'Ivoire navyo nyene vyatanguye gutanga incanco muri iyi ndwi. Ikindi gihugu ca EAC kimaze kuronka incanco ni Uganda. Ku wa gatanu Uganda niho yakira incanco za  mbere zirenga ibihumbi 860 nazo zivuye muri uwo mugabmbi wa Covax. Ibindi bihugu bitatu vya EAC, Uburundi, Tanzania na Sudan y'Epfo, gahunda zavyo zo kuronka incanco no gutangura kuzitanga ntiziramenyekana. Abategetsi ba Tanzania bo basanzwe baramenyesheje ko ata mugambi w'incanco bihutira. Ibindi bihugu bimaze kuronka incanco muri uwo muganbi mpuzanakungu ni  Angola, DR Congo na Gambia. Afrika y'Epfo  yo yatanguye gutanga incanco haraheze indwi zibiri, ni naco gihugu cabaye ica mbere mu gukoresha urucanco rwa Johnson & Johnson. Izashitse ubwa mbere zari ibihumbi 80 ariko ngo izitezwe zishika umuriyoni. Urwa AstraZeneca ico gihugu cari  cabanje kuronka cararetse kurukoresha kuko rwoba rudakinga neza ubwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus bwatowe ubwa mbere aho muri Africa y'Epfo. Afrika y'Epfo, igihugu ca mbere kirimwo abanduye corona benshi kuruta ibindi muri Afrika, yizigiye kuronka incanco zikwiye 10 kw'ijana y'abanyagihugu baco biciye mu mugambi Covax, kikaba cahawe isango ryo kuzironka hagati y'ukwezi kwa kane n'ukwa gatandatu. Senegal nayo nyene imaze  hafi indwi zibiri itanguye gutanga incanco za Sinopharm yahawe n'igihugu c'Ubushinwa. Yiteze kuronka kandi izirenga umuriyoni zitanzwe mu mugambi wa Covax.

headline: Umunyamuziki Neil Young, yitwariye Trump kubera akoresha umuziki wiwe atabimusavye
text: Neil Young yitwariye abajejwe imyiyamamazo ya Donald Trump ariko yiyamamariza ikindi kiringo kubera bakoresha umuziki wiwe batamusavye uruhusha. Uyo muririmvyi rurangiranwa wo mu mudiho wa rock avuga ko uyo mukuru w'igihugu ca Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yahonyanze amategeko akingira umuziki mu gukoresha indirimbo ziwe mu myiyamamazo n'amakoraniro ya politike. Uyo mucuraranzi akomoka muri Canada yanse ko babandanya bakoresha indirimbo ziwe Rockin' in the Free World na Devil's Sidewalk kubera ico yise "isekeza ry'ubujuju n'urwanko, ibintu bitari mu mico y'Abanyamerika". Abajejwe imyiyamamazo ya Trump ntaco barashikiriza kuri ivyo birego. Young yavuze ko yitwariye Bwana Trump amwagiriza ko yakoresheje umuziki wiwe kuva mu 2015, ariko akinumya "n'ibigirankana". Uyo mucuraranzi, ubu afise ubwenegihugu bwa Amerika inyuma yo kuba muri iki gihugu imyaka iharurwa muri za mirongo, arasaba indishi y'amadolari agera ku 150.000 aho hose bagiye bakoresha umuziki wiwe. Aha harimwo ikoraniro rya Trump i Tulsa mu ntara ya Oklahoma mu kwa gatandatu, hamwe n'urugendo Trump yagize kuri Mount Rushmore mu kw'indwi. indirimbo ijanye n'icivugo Muri ino dosiye bashize ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'uyu mucuraranzi, abunganizi ba Young banditse bati: "Uru rubanza ntirufise intumbero yo gusuzugura uburenganzira n'ivyiyumviro vy'abanyagihugu ba Amerika kuko ni uburenganzira bwabo gushigikira umukandida bipfuza". "Hagati aho, nyene kwitwara ntashobora kwemerera ko umuziki wiwe ukoreshwa nk'  'indirimbo y'icivugo' mu ntumbero yo kubiba amacakubiri, 'ingendo y'ubujuju n'urwanko, ibintu bitari mu mico y'Abanyamerika". Uyu mucuraranzi w'imyaka 74 siwe munyamuziki wenyene ashavuriye Perezida Trump kubera akoresha indirimbo ziwe. Mu kwezi guheze, umurwi The Rolling Stones wo mu Bwongereza waragabishije Perezida Trump ko ashobora kwitwarirwa mu butungane mu gihe yobandanya akoresha imiziki yabo mu myiyamamazo yiwe. Abanyamuziki Mick Jagger na Keith Richards baragiye hamwe n'abandi banyamuziki barimwo Aerosmith na Elton John mu gutera igikumu ku rwandiko bandikiye abanyapolitike babahamagarira kubanza gusaba uruhusha imbere y'uko bakoresha imiziki yabo mu myiyamamazo n'amakoraniro ya politike. Ishirahamwe rishinzwe guharanira uburenganzira muvyo umuziki, BMI, rivuga ko impusha zitangwa ku bijanye n'ikoreshwa ry'umuziki mu biteramo n'ayandi makoraniro, zitaraba amakoraniro ya politike. Abakora imyiyamamazo ya politike bategerezwa gusaba uruhusha rusabwa n'amashirahamwe ya politike (Political Entities Licence) rubaha uburenganzira bwo gukoresha indirimbo zishika imiliyoni 15. Rero abajejwe imyiyamamazo ba Trump urwo ruhusha ntarwo bafise. Ariko abacuraranzi bafise uburenganzira bwo gukura indirimbo zabo kuri urwo rutonde. The Rolling Stones barabikoze, ariko Young ntatomora nimba nawe yoba yarabikoze.

headline: Africa mu mafoto muri iyi ndwi: Kuva 27 z'ukwa munani gushika 2 z'ukwa cenda 2021
text: Ihitamwo ry'amafoto meza kurusha ayandi yo muri Africa n'ahandi. Amafoto yose yitirwa bene yo

headline: Burundi: Abantu 40 batowe umugera Corona inyuma y'amezi abiri ata bwandu mu gihugu
text: Umushikiranganji w'Uburundi ajejwe amagara y'abantu Thadée Ndikumana yatangaje ko abantu 40 batowe umugera wa corona mu bipimo vyakozwe mu minsi ibiri iheze. Ni ubwa mbere abantu bangana gutyo batorewe umugera icarimwe kuva hamenyekanye abantu babiri ba mbere batowe uwo mugera mu kwezi kwa gatatu mu mwaka uheze. Mw'itangazo yasomeye abamenyeshamakuru Dr Ndikumana yavuze ko 10 ba mbere batowe uwo mugera ku wa mbere mu bantu bipimisha mu mw'iteguro wo gufata urugendo mu mahanga. Yagize ati: ''Guhera uwo munsi nyene, umugwi ujejwe kugwanya indwara z'ibiza n'ivyaduka vyihuta waciye urondera abo bose boba bagiye hamwe canke boba baregeranye n'abo 10 bari bahejeje gutorwa uwo mugera''. Haciye hapimwa abantu 284, muri abo 30 baca basanganwa umugera wa corona ''vyumvikana ko muri iyi minsi ibiri iheze abanduye umugera wa corona bashika kuri 40''. Umushikiranganji Ndikumana yamenyesheje ko igitigiri kinini nk'ico c'abantu batowe umugera wa corona cabonetse hari haheze hafi amezi abiri ata muntu yanduye hagati mu gihugu. Yasiguye ko kimwe mu bituma umugera ukwiragira cane ariko hari abantu binjira mu gihugu baciye mu nzira zitazwi. Yamenyesheje ko abo bantu bose baherutse kwandura baba mu gisagara ca Bujumbura n'imicungararo yaco, kandi ko "bariko barakurikiranwa n'abaganga babijejwe kandi amagara yabo yifashe neza." Ndikumana asaba abarundi kwubahiriza ingingo zo kwirinda gukwirakwiza uwo mugera harimwo gukaraba neza intoke kenshi gashoboka, kugira umuziro kuramukanya "dukorana mu minwe canke tugwana mu nda." Izo ngingo zisabwa kwubahirizwa na cane cane ahantu hahurira abantu benshi nk'ibibuga vy'inkino, amashengero, amashuri, uburiro n'ubunywero. Gushika ubu Uburundi buciye buharura abantu barenga 840 bamaze gutorwa umugera wa corona na babiri umaze guhitana, hakurikirijwe ibiharuro bitangwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu.

headline: Umunonotsi wa BBC w'umwaka muri Afrika: Eliud Kipchoge
text: Eliud Kipchoge ari mu bahiganirwa agashimwe ka BBC k'umunonotsi w'umunye-Afrika yenuriye abandi mu 2021. Ushaka gutora tugusavye kuja ngaha https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/africa/59089895 aho unasanga amategeko ajanye n'ubuzima bwite. Gutora bizohera kuwa Mungu itariki 19/12/2021 saa 23:59 GMT.

headline: Kenya -Covid: Abasanze ubuzima bubaye bwiza aho bahungiye igisagara
text: Iyo coronavirus idatera,  bishoboka cane ko Jack Onyango aba akiba wenyene, akora ku murwa mukuru wa Kenya hanyuma arungikira amafaranga umugore n'abana biwe iyo baba  kw'itongo kure cane. Nk'abandi banya-Kenya benshi, yagiye Nairobi akiri muto, azi ko ariho hari amahirwe menshi yo kuronka ikikubeshaho kurusha ahandi hose mu gihugu. Ariko ubuzima mu gisagara ntibwamworoheye. Onyango yashobora gufata urugendo rwo kuja kuraba umuryango mu ntara ya Kisumu mu burengero bw'igihugu rimwe ryonyene mu mwaka. Yagenda igihe ca  Noeli, urugendo rwa bisi akaruriha  2.000 vy'amashiringi ya Kenya (hafi 40.000 vy'amarundi)   - aho kandi bakitega ko agenda  agemuye vyinshi, birimwo nk'isukari. Aho coronavirus itereye mu 2020, abategetsi baciye bashiraho ingingo zikaze  zo kutava i muhira. Co kimwe n'abandi benshi, Onyango aca asanga ata kazi agifise. Mu gihe ama reta mu bindi bihugu yahemba igice c'imishasha abantu baba batakaje ubuzi kubera ikiza, muri Kenya iyo mfashanyo ntiyigeze ibaho. Avuga ati:  "Ntaho nashobora kuvana amafaranga yo kuriha inzu n'ayo gutunga umuryango." Amaze kubona ko atagishoboye kuba mu gisagara, yaciye afata ingingo yo gusubira ku gatumba iwabo mu kwezi kw'indwi uwo mwaka. Onyango avuga ati: "Nari mfise ubwoba ariko narahitishijemwo. "I muhira nta mafaranga yo kuriha inzu, nta matara n'amazi bariha, bitandukanye na Nairobi aho vyose bisaba amafaranga." Yaciye atangura kurima itomati hamwe n'imboga kw'itongo risumba gato inusu y'ihegitari (0,6ha) ryahora ari irya sekuru. Ivyo yejeje akabigurisha ku babanyi n'abacuruza, nabo bakaja kubidandaza kw'isoko. Yambwiye ko ivyashitse atari yavyiteguriye vyahavuye bimuviramwo vyiza. "Amafaranga nkura mu vyo ndiko ndakora aruta kure ayo naronka mu kazi nakora i Nairobi. "Umukobwa wanje mukuru afise imyaka 16. Nahora ndababona rimwe gusa mu mwaka. Ubiravye, corona kuri jewe yabaye umuhezagiro." Kw'itongo yabaye inzira yo kubaho. Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu rifasha mw'iterambere World Neighbours rivuga ko ivyo Onyango ariko aracamwo  biriko birashikira abandi benshi mu muhindo wo gusubira iyo bavuye bitewe n'ikiza ca  Covid. Chris Macoloo, umuyobozi w'iryo shirahamwe ku mugabane wa Afrika avuga ati: "Covid-19 twese yaduteye giturumbuka. "Abantu benshi baciye bakurwa mu kazi, kubera  baba babayeho ku munsi ku munsi, ntibashobora kuronka ivyo barya, ntibashobora kuriha inzu kandi ntibaronke amafaranga barungikira imiryango yabo. Bamwe muri bo rero baciye bava mu bisagara basubira ku gatumba (mu cyaro)  iyo bari baje bava." Avuga ko ku gatumba  kuri benshi haciye habaha inzira yo kubaho. "Muri Afrika tubaho dutambikije. Dufise ukuguru kumwe mu gisagara, ukundi nako ku gatumba. Ivyo vyarafashije kuko iyo twaba tutahafise , bari kuba bahuye n'ibibazo bikomeye." Hafi  ubuzi 750.000 bwarugawe muri Kenya mu 2020, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'urwego rw'igihugu rujejwe gutororokanya ibiharuro (National Bureau of Statistics). Icegerenyo ca vuba c'urwo rwego kivuga ko ibisata bitandukanye vy'ubutunzi vyashegeshwe cane n'ingingo za Covid zo kutava muhira, ku buryo akazi ka minsi yose,  uretse ako kurima no kworora ku rugero rubayabaye, kagabanutse ku rugero rwa 4,1%, ni ukuvuga ubuzi burenga miriyoni 17. Mu bihe vya   mbere vyo kutava i muhira, reta ya Kenya  yarabujije uruja n'uruza hagati y'ibisagara binini bimwe bimwe,  bica bitera impungenge zo kuronka ivyo kurya ku turere tutimbura vyinshi. Vyaciye bituma bamwe mu bari bavuye mu bisagara bagasubira ku gatumba nabo baca bijukira kurima imboga. Geoffrey Barasa n'uwundi munya-Kenya yahevye ubuzima bwo mu gisagara. Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 40 yahora abeshejejweho n'ubuzi bubiri i Nairobi. Yakora ubuzi bw'ibiraka muri karitye y'amahinguriro yo muri ico gisagara, akongera agakora urudanzwa rutoya rw'inyama z'inkoko yarangura kw'isoko akaza kuzironderako inyungu mu ka butike gato kiwe. Yari yaje mu gisagara agiheza ishure   avuga ati "gukora mu gisagara ico gihe cari ikintu co kwishimira." Barasa yarashinze urugo akaba yaba Nairobi n'umugore n'abana bane. Ariko aho hatangirijwe abantu ba mbere bafashwe na corona muri Kenya, ibintu vyose vyaciye bigenda nabi. Nta kazi yasubiye kuronka, butike yiwe y'inkoko nayo aca arugara. Barasa avuga ati: Muri ico gihe, nta ruja n'uruza rw'abantu rwariho, nta bakiriya bakwiye naheza ngo ndonke. Nta kundi nari mfise nogira atari ukwugara iyo butike nkagaruka ku gatumba." "Ico gihe cari kigoye cane." Mu kwezi kw'icenda yafashe ingingo yo kujana umuryango wiwe kw'itongo iyo avuka mu ntara ya Busia, hafi y'ikiyaga Victoria. Yaciye atangura kurima imyungu, uburo, itomati n'amashu, ivyo yejeje agaca agurisha ku babanyi. Ubu asigaye yorora kandi ingurube n'inkoko. "Ubwa mbere nari mfise ubwoba bw'ingene nzoba mu buzima bwa ruguru, ariko ubu merewe neza. Mbayeho neza kuruta igihe nari Nairobi. Ndanezerewe cane no kuba naragarutse ku gatumba iwacu." Barasa avuga ko yohanura abandi basubiye ku gatumba muri iki gihe c'ikiza kugumayo burundu. "Sinobahanura gusubira mu gisagara." Nta kibura uruhande rwiza Ku bwa Macoloo, ikiza ca coronavirus gitumye buba ubwa kabiri muri iyi myaka ya vuba abanya-Kenya bafata akanya ko gusubira kwibaza neza ivyo "kwishiramwo ko ibintu vyera de mu gisagara". "Mu gihe c'intureka y'inyuma y'amatora mu 2007-08, abantu benshi barasubiye ruguru kugira barabe ko boronka ingene babaho. Avuga ati: "Ariko ibibazo vy'amatora vyaranyarutse gutorerwa inyishu gusumba kandi  imirimo y'ubutunzi ntiyahagaze co kimwe n'ubu." "Umutekano umaze kugaruka, ntibatevye gusubira kwivyukiranya." Yongerako ati : "Nta n'umwe yokwiteze ko hari ivyiza vyovuye ku kiza ca coronavirus." "Ntawari avyiteze, vyarashitse uko, kandi nibaza ko bitoducika. Bavuga ko burya igicu cose naho cirabura kitabuze aho gisa n'umwakaka. "

headline: Sergio Aguero: Uyu yahoze ari umusatirizi wa Barcelona na Man City arakukurutse
text: Sergio Aguero avuga ko yishimiye ivyo yashitseko mu mupira w'amaguru inyuma yo kwemera gufata iyi "ngingo igoye cane" yo gusezera muri uru rukino kubera ikibazo c'umutima. Kuri uyu wa gatatu, uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 33 yarize igihe yatangaza iyi nkuru, hari haciye amezi atarenga atandatu yinjiye muri Barcelona. Mu rukino rwiwe rwa nyuma ku wa 30 z'ukwa cumi rwarangiye Barca inganya na Alaves 1-1, yavanywe mu kibuka ajanwa mu bitaro inyuma y'aho agiriye "ibibazo vyo mu gikiriza". Aguero ati: "Iyi ngingo mfashe, ndayifashe bivuye ku bibazo vy'amagara". Umumenyereza wa Manchester City Pep Guardiola ni umwe mu bantu bake bariko bakurikirana Aguero igihe atangaza iyi nkuru hafi y'ikibuga ca Barcelona, Nou Camp. Inyuma y'ibitsindo 427 yinjije mu nkino 786, Aguero vyamufashe umwanya kugira fiyate mu marira yari afise imbere y'uko atangura ikiganiro, hanyuma avuga ati: "Iki kiganiro ni ico kumenyesha ko nafashe ingingo yo guhagarika gukina umupira w'amaguru. Ni igihe kitoroshe. "Igihe bampima ubwa mbere kwa muganga, abaganga barampamagaye bambwira ko bishoboka cane ko ntazoshobora kubandanya nkina. Kuva ico gihe, naciye ntangura kwitegura ariko ntivyari vyoroshe. Umwe mu baganga yarambwiye amenya ati 'aho birarangiye'. "Ndashaka kubwira bose ko nakoze ibishoboka vyose. Natanguye kugira indoto zo gukina football mfise imyaka itanu nkaba ari ho natanguriye gukora ku mupira. Sinibaza ko nari gushika i Bulaya, rero nashaka gushimira cane uwo ari we wese ntaravye aho nakoreye imyimenyerezo. "Ndishimira ivyo nashitseko kandi ni igihamana ciza kubona ibi bimbayeko ubu bitambayeko imbere y'aha. Sinzi ikindindiriye mu buzima bw'imbere, ariko ndazi ko hari abantu benshi bankunda kandi banyipfuriza ineza". N'aho igihe amaze muri Barcelona kitamwereye, nta nkeka ko yabaye umwe mu basatirizi b'ibihangange mu kinjana ca 21. Yatanguriye mu murwi witwa Independiente wo muri Argentina, mu nyuma yimukira muri Atletico Madrid, aho yatsindiye ihiganwa rya Europa League mu 2010, yongera yinjiza ibitsindo 101 mu nkino 234. Ibi vyateye amero menshi Manchester City yahavuye itanga imiriyoni hafi  50 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira imuzane i Etihad Stadium (ikibuga ca Man City). Kuva ico gihe, yanditse izina mu murwi no mw'ihiganwa Premier League mu kiringo c'imyaka cumi yose yamaze mu Bwongereza. Aguero yavuye muri City mu ci riheze ari we mukinyi wa mbere yinjije ibitsindo vyinshi gusumba abandi bose, aho yinjije  ibitsindo 260 mu nkino 390, harimwo 16 yatsinzemwo bitatu bitatu (ibizwi nka hat-tricks). Ni we mukinyi wa mbere mvamahanga muri Premier League yinjije ibitsindo vyinshi bigera kuri 184, akaba asumvya umufaransa Thierry Henry wa Arsenal ibitsindo icenda. Abahoze ari abasatirizi  Alan Shearer (260), Wayne Rooney (208) na Andrew Cole (187) ni bo bazwi ko bamaze gutsinda ibitsindo vyinshi muri iri higanwa. Ariko nta n'umwe muri bo anganya na Aguero urugero rw'iminota yinjirizako ibitsindo muri Premier League. Ibiharuro vyerekana ko yagiye yinjiza igitsindo uko iminota 107.9 iheze. Akurikirwa na Thierry Henry, aho azwi ko yinjije igitsindo uko iminota 121.8 iheze. Uyu munya Argentina kandi aribukwa cane muri Premier League mu mwaka w'inkino wa 2011-2012, igihe yinjiza  igitsindo mu misegonda ya nyuma mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Premier League catumye Manchester City  itsinda umurwi Queens Park Rangers, gica kiyiha igikombe ca mbere ca Premier League kuva mu 1968, igikombe yatwaye isumbije ibitsindo gusa umukeba wayo ruhebwa, Manchester United. Kuva ico gihe, Aguero yatsindiye ibikombe bitanu vya Premier League, igikombe kimwe ca FA, hamwe n'ibindi bitandatu vya League Cups muri ico gihe cose yamaze mu Bwongereza. Ubugenzi budasanzwe Aguero yari afitaniye  na Lionel Messi bwamutumye agira umunezero udasanzwe igihe yemererwa kuva muri Manchester City. Yari yashoboye kwereka umumenyereza wa City Pep Guardiola ko ari igihangange, na rirya mu ntango yari afise amakenga ko uyu musatirizi atari gushobora kujana n'ubuhinga yari azanye mu murwi, n'aho imvune zamubereye inzitizi mu mwaka wa nyuma i Etihad Stadium. Ariko, kuva yimukiye muri Barcelona ibintu vyatanguye nabi cane. Ibibazo vy'amafaranga vyari bihanze uyu murwi vyasigura ko wari ufise ingorane zo kudashobora kwakira abandi bakinyi, harimwo mbere na Aguero. Ni ibi bibazo nyene vyanatumye Messi asezera uyu murwi akimukira muri Paris St-Germain. Aguero amaze kwakirwa, yagize ibibazo vyo ku nyama ya kibizi, bituma adahonyoza ikirenge mu kibuga gushika mu kwezi kw'icumi. Igihe Barcelona itsindirwa ku kibuga cayo n'umukeba wayo ruhebwa, Real Madrid, Aguero yagiye kwinjiza igitsindo kimwe co kwihanagura amosozi ku munota wa nyuma, aha hari ku wa 24 z'ukwa cumi, haciye imisi itatu abona gutanguzwa mu kibuga. Ariko igihe Barcelona ihura na Alaves ku wa 30 z'ukwa cumi, Aguero yavanywe mu kibuga mbere biba ngombwa ko akorerwa "ibipimo vy'umutima", akaba yavuze ko yategerezwa gukurikiza impanuro y'abaganga ku bijanye na kazoza kiwe. Yavuze ko yategerezwa kumara imisi 90 ataco akora kugira arabe ingene bizomugendera, ico gihe hakaba hari amakuru yavuga ko bamusanganye ingorane z'umutima watera nabi, ibizwi nka arythmie cardiaque/cardiac arrhythmia. Gusa ingingo yiwe yitezwe gutangazwa muri ino ndwi, ishitse imbere y'igihe. Urukino rwa nyuma yakiniye umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina, La Albiceleste,  ni urwa Copa America, aho yinjiye asubiriye uwundi mukinyi, hari mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, Argentina ikaba yatsinze Ecuador/Equateur, biyituma ibandanya gushika itsindire iki gikombe, ubwa mbere inyuma y'imyaka 28 yose.

headline: Russia yoba iriko irategura gutera Ukraine? Ni kimwe mu bibazo
text: Ingabo z'Uburusiya zoba ziriko zitegurira intambara muri Ukraine? Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yiteze ibikorwa kanana vya gisirikare. Uburusiya bushaka ko ibihugu vyo mu Burengero bibwemerera ko Ukraine itazokwinjira mw'ishirahamwe ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe OTAN/NATO, ariko rero n'aho impande zompi ziri mu biganiro, ibi ntibizoshoboka. Ivyoba mu nyuma birashobora gushira mu kaga umutekano w'umugabane w'Uburayi wose. Uburusiya burahakana ko ata gitero buriko butegura, ariko imbere y'aha bwarigaruriye ubutaka kwa Ukraine kandi bwaregeranirije ku rubibe rwayo ingabo zababa 100.000. Uburusiya bumaze imyaka itari mike burwanya ko Ukraine yinjira mu nzego za Bulaya, cane cane muri OTAN. Ukraine isangiye imbibe n'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya (EU) hamwe n'Uburusiya, ariko, nk'icahoze ari Repubulika y'aba Soviet, ifise ubucuti budasanzwe n'Uburusiya mu bijanye n'imico n'imigenzo, kandi ururimi rw'ikirusiya ruravugwa cane muri ico gihugu. Igihe Abanya-Ukraine babogoza umukuru w'igihugu yari yegamiye ku ruhande rw'Uburusiya mu 2014, Uburusiya bwaciye bwigarurira akarere ka Crimea kari mu bumanuko, buca bufata mu mugongo inyeshamba zirondera kwiyonkora zigaruriye uturere tutari duto mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Kuva ico gihe, izi nyeshamba zihanganye n'igisirikare ca Ukraine mu ntambara imaze guhitana ubuzima bw'abantu barenga 14.000. Uburusiya buvuga ko ata mugambi bufise wo gutera Ukraine: mbere n'umukuru w'ingabo Valery Gerasimov  yaraniyamirije ko ibivugwa ko hari igitero cimirije ari ikinyoma. Ariko icuka kibi ni cinshi mbere Perezida Vladimir Putin aragabisha ko "azotegerezwa gufata ingingo za gisirikare zikenewe zo kwihora" mu gihe ivyo yita ingedo y'agasotoro y'ibihugu vyo mu Burengero yobandanya. Umunyamabanga mukuru wa OTAN aragabisha ko intambara imota, mbere na Perezida Biden abona ko Uburusiya buzoruhira gutera.. Amerika ivuga ko izi neza ko Uburusiya butegura kwongereza ingabo hafi ya Ukraine mu mwanya muto. Amerika ivuga ko Uburusiya budasigura igituma bwarungitse inabo hafi ya Ukraine - mu gihe ingabo n'ibimodoka vy'intambara vy'Uburusiya vyagiye muri Belarus mu myimenyerezo. Icegera c'umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Uburusiya agereranya ingene ibintu bimeze muri iki  gihe n'ikibazo ca misire za Cuba  (missiles de Cuba/Cuban missiles) mu 1962 igihe Amerika n'Ubumwe bw'aba Soviet bihatswe kwinjira mu ntambara ya nikleyeri. Igendereza ryo mu bihugu vyo mu Burengero ryerekana ko Uburusiya bushobora gutera umwanya kanaka muri ino ntango ya 2022. Uburusiya buvuga ko iki ari "igihe c'ukubwirana ukuri" mu migenderanire yabwo na OTAN: "Kuri twebwe ni ugukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo Ukraine, ntihirahire ngo ibe umunywanyi wa OTAN", ibi bikavugwa n'icegera c'umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire Sergei Ryabkov. Moscou/Moscow (umugwa mukuru w'Uburusiya) yagiriza ibihugu vya OTAN "kurundarunda" ibirwanisho muri Ukraine Amerika nayo ko ikokeza indyane. Perezida Putin avuga ko Uburusiya "ata handi bufise buja - bibaza ko tuzokwicara tukarera amaboko?" Mu vyo ukuri, Uburusiya bushaka ko OTAN  isubira ku mbibe zayo imbere ya 1997. Busaba ko ivyo kubandanya isatira uburengero bihagarara kandi igahagarika ibikorwa vya gisirikare mu buseruko bw'Ubulaya. Ibi bisigura ko imirwi y'abasirikare biteguriye intambara barungitswe muri Pologne no mu bihugu vya Estonie, Lettonie na Lituanie mu karere ka Baltique bavanwayo, kandi ko ata misire zosubira kurungikwa mu bihugu nka Pologne na Roumanie. Uburusiya kandi busaba ko hoba amasezerano na Amerika abuza ko hosubira kuba ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri birungikwa hanze y'imbibe zavyo. Uburusiya bwarigaruriye Crimea mu 2014, buvuga ko aka karere kari akabwo kuva muri kahise.  Ukraine yari imwe mu bihugu vyari bigize Ubumwe bw'aba Soviet bwagiye gusambuka mu kwa cumi na kabiri 1991, ivyo Putin avuga ko ryabaye "isambuka ry'Uburusiya bwo kuva muri kahise". Ikimenyetso c'ico Perezida Putin yiyumvira kuri Ukraine cagiye kwibonekeza mu nkuru ndende yasohotse mu mwaka uheze, aho yavuze ko Abarusiya n'abanya -Ukraine bagize "igihugu kimwe". Yavuze ko abategetsi ba Ukraine ba kino gihe bafise "umugambi wo kurwanya Uburusiya". Uburusiya kandi burababajwe n'uko ishirwa mu ngiro ry'amasezerano y'amahoro ya Minsk yo mu 2015 ku bijanye n'ubuseruko bw'Ubulayi riri kure nk'ukwezi. Nta n'integuro zihari zo gutegura amatora mu turere dushaka kwiyonkora. Uburusiya burahakana ivyo bwagirizwa ko ari bwo buri inyuma y'indyane zibandanya. Perezida Vladimir Putin aramaze kuvugana incuro zitari nke na mugenziwe wa Amerika Joe Biden kandi ibiganiro vyo ku rwego rwo hejuru birabandanya, ariko abategetsi b'Uburusiya  baragabisha ko kubona Uburengero bwaranse ibintu nyamukuru iki gihugu gisaba biriko "vyica ibiganiro". Ikibazo ni ukumenya aho Uburusiya buzogarukira. Perezida Biden agabisha ko mu gihe hoba igitero ceruye muri Ukraine Uburusiya bwobona ibara. Ariko kandi, yongeye avuga ko mu gihe hoba igitero gito, ibihugu vyo mu burengero "vyokwisanga mu mpari ku co vyokora", amajambo yateye impari. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vya Amerika Maison Blancher/White House bishimangira ko mu gihe hoba ivogerwa ry'imbibe rya Ukraine vyofatwa nk'igitero - ariko bikavuga ko Uburusiya bufise ibindi birwanisho, harimwo ibitero nyabwonko hamwe n'amayeri yandi ya gisirikare. Pentagon (ibiro vyo kwivuna abansi vya Amerika) yagiriza Uburusiya ko buriko butegura igitero c'ikinyoma, ko abantu babwo bajejwe igendereza biteguye gukora ibikorwa vyo gutoba ku nyeshamba zishigikiwe n'Uburusiya zigomba kwiyonkora, kugira ngo kibe inyendamuvano y'ingene bwokwinjira. Uburusiya burahakana ibi. Uburusiya kandi bwaratanze ibitabo ndangamuntu 500.000 mu turere turi mu minwe y'inyeshamba, rero mu gihe bwobura ivyo burondera, bushobora kwitwaza iki mu gukora igitero ico ari co cose bugasigura ko bushaka gukingira abanyagihugu babwo. Hagati aho, nimba intumero yonyene y'Uburusiya ari ukwigiza inyuma OTAN ngo ntiyegere ku mbibe zabwo, nta kintu na kimwe cerekana ko buzobishobora. Ibihugu 30 bihurikiye muri OTAN birarahira bikarengwa ko bidashobora kwemerera muntu n'umwe yogerageza kubibohera amaboko imugongo ku bijanye na kazoza kavyo. Icegera c'umunyamabanga wa reta wa Amerika Wendy Sherman, ati: "Ntituzigera twemerera umuntu n'umwe kwugara imiryango ya OTAN yugururiwe uwo ari we wese". Ukraine iriko irarondera igihe ntarengwa co kwinjira, mu gihe OTAN ivuga ko Uburusiya budashobora guhagarika, kandi ko ata burenganzira bufise bwo kuzibira uwu mugambi. Mbere n'ibihugu vya  Suède na Finland bitari no muri OTAN biriyamiriza Uburusiya mu mugambi wabwo wo kugerageza kubizibira mu nteguro zavyo yo gutsimbataza ubucuti n'iri shirahamwe. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Finland ati: "Ntiturota duhagarika umugambi wacu". Uburengero buzogera he ku kibazo ca Ukraine? Amerika iratomora neza ko ata mugambi ifise wo kurungika ingabo zija kurwana muri Ukraine, ariko ikaba yiyemeza gufasha ico gihugu gukingira "ubusugire bw'ubutaka" bwaco. Pentagon yateguye ingabo zigera ku 8600 zimeze magabo, zishobora kurungikwa mu bihugu vya OTAN mu buseruko bwa Bulaya mu kanya isase. Ikirwanisho nyamukuru mu bihugu vy'Uburengero gisa n'uko ari ibihano hamwe n'imfashanyo ya gisirikare igizwe n'abahanuzi hamwe n'ibirwanisho. Perezida Biden aragabisha umupuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya ko ashobora kufata ingingo "atari bwigere abona" mu gihe Ukraine yoterwa. None izi ngingo zoba zirimwo ibiki? Igihano nyamukuru kijanye n'ubutunzi coba ico gukura amabanki y'Uburusiya mu buhinga mpuzamakungu bwo guhanahana amafaranga (Swift). Iyi yamye ibonwa ko yoba ingingo yofatwa ubwa nyumamu gihe izindi zose zanse, kandi hari amakenga ko ishobora kugira ingaruka mbi cane ku butunzi bwa Amerika na Bulaya. Perezida Biden aragabisha kandi ko ashobora gufatira ibihano Vladimir Putin ku giti ciwe, mu gihe Uburusiya bwotera Ukraine. Ubundi bwoba buhari ni ihagarikwa ry'iyugururwa ry'umuringoti w'Uburusiya Nord Stream 2 wa gaze mu Budagi, igisata c'amasoko ntanganguzu c'Ubudagi kikaba kiriko kiriga iyi ngingo. None ibihugu vy'Uburengero vyoba bivuga rumwe ku cokorwa? Umukuru w'igihugu wa Amerika avuga ko ko we n'abategetsi ba Bulaya "bavyumva kumwe bose" ku kibazo ca Ukraine, ariko hari ukutumvikana hagati ya Amerika n'Ubulaya. Abategetsi ba Bulaya bashimangira ko Uburusiya na Amerika bidashobora gufata ingingo vyonyene kuri kuri kazoza. Ubufaransa bwobwo bwanasavye ko abanyabulaya bokorera hamwe muri OTAN hanyuma bakagiranira ibiganiro ukwabo n'Uburusiya. Umukuru w'igihugu wa ukraine asaba ko hoba inama mpuzamakungu kugira ngo hatorwe umuti w'iki kibazo, yoba irimwo Ubufaransa n'Ubudagi biri kumwe n'Uburusiya.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Varane, Camara, Nagelsmann, Willock, Azpilicueta
text: Chelsea iri imbere ya Manchester United na Paris St-Germain mu rugamba rwo kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Real Madrid Raphael Varane ubu afise imyaka 28. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Guinee, Ali Camara w'imyaka 23 asanzwe akina mu murwi Young Boys wo mu Buswisi, yateye amero imirwi itari mike yo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza Premier League, harimwo Liverpool, Arsenal, Crystal Palace, West Ham na Norwich. (Team Talk) Bayern Munich yatanguye ibiganiro vyo kurondera umumenyereza wa RB Leipzig Julian Nagelsmann kugira ngo ayibere umumenyereza wayo mushasha. (Independent) Arsenal iri mu mayira abiri kuri kazoza k'umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umwongereza Joe Willock w'imyaka 21 ubu akaba akina muri Newcastle United iyo yatijijwe, ni mu gihe uyu murwi ukeneye kugurisha abakinyi kugira ngo ushobore kuronka amahera. (Football London) Arsenal kandi iriteguye kugurisha umukinyi wayo w'inyuma Ainsley Maitland-Niles w'imyaka 23 ubu asanzwe akina muri West Brom, hamwe kandi na Eddie Nketiah w'imyaka 21 akina imbere. Abarashi bakeneye imiriyoni hafi 28 z'ama dodari y'abanyamerika kuri umwe umwe wese. (Sun) Arsenal ifise amakenga nimba koko umutunzi ruhebwa ajejwe ikompanyi y'umuziki Spotify ikorera ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi umunya Suède Daniel Ek, ari mu kugura uyu murwi. (Times - subscription required) Umumenyereza wa Manchester City Pep Guardiola avuga ko umukinyi w'inyuma wa Espagne Eric Garcia w'imyaka 20 yiteguye kuja gukinira  Barcelona atarinze kugurwa mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n'umurwi wiwe azoba arangiye mu ci riza.  (Metro) Umumenyereza wa Atletico Madrid Diego Simeone aripfuza kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea, umunya Espagne Cesar Azpilicueta w'imyaka 31. (El Gol Digital - in Spanish) Manchester United na Liverpool ziriko rirondera umusatirizi ariko ararwanirwa cane, umutariyano Andrea Belotti w'imyaka 27 asanzwe akina muri Torino, akaba kandi ariko aronderwa n'imirwi AC Milan, Roma na Inter Milan.Torinoyaramaze no kubona umukinyi w'imbere wa Cagliari, umunya Bresil Joao Pedro w'imyaka 29 nk'uwuzoca amusubirira. (Tuttosport) Wolves niwo wundi murwi winjiye ku rutonde rw'imirwi iriko irondera umusatirizi wa Chelsea, umwongereza Tammy Abraham w'imyaka 23. Aston Villa, West Ham na Leicester City nayo kandi iramwipfuza. (Football Insider) Uwahoze ari umumenyereza wa Tottenham Harry Redknapp ariteze ko umusatirizi w'umwongereza Harry Kane w'imyaka 27 ashobora kuguma muri uyu murwi n'aho hari ibihuha vyinshi bivuga ko ashobora kugenda. (Goal) Manchester City yatanguye ibiganiro n'umurwi Red Star Belgrade/Étoile rouge de Belgrade kugira ngo irabe yo yoronka umukinyi w'imbere wa Serbia, Andrija Radulovic w'imyaka 18 asanzwe akina mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'abatarenza imyaka 19. (Sun) Umusatirizi wa Espagne Alvaro Morata w'imyaka 28 avuga ko yipfuza kubandanya akinira  Juventus ariko ko atari we afata ingingo, ni mu gihe amasezerano y'intizo hagati y'uyu murwi n'umurwi wiwe, Atletico Madrid, ari hafi kurangira. (Sky Italia via Goal)

headline: Coronavirus: Papa asaba ko urucanco n'imiti bishikira bose kw'isi
text: Papa Francis yateye akamo abategetsi bo kw'isi ngo bafashe kugira abantu bose bashobore kuronka urucanco rwa coronavirus ata nzitizi. Mw'ijambo rya Noheli yashikirije ku rubuga rwa internet ubwa mbere, Papa yagabishije kudashiraho "uruhome" kubakeneye imiti. Ico kiza catumye ubutumwa bwa Urbi na Orbi budatangirwa ku rubaraza rwa Bazelike St Pierre ku bantu benshi, nk'uko vyari bimenyerewe. Ahubwo Papa yatanze ubwo butumwa ari mu cumba i Vatikano. Uko kugabisha kwa papa kuje inyuma y'amakenga y'ingene ibihugu bitunze  bigura incanco zitagira uko zingana gusumba ibihugu bikenye. Yavuze ati:"Ese umwana w'Imana yogarukana mu bategetsi ba politike n'amareta agatima ko gufashanya n'amakungu, bahereye ku magara y'abantu, kugira ngo bose boshobore gushikirwa n'urucanco hamwe n'imiti. "Imbere y'iki kibazo kitagira imbibe, ntidushobora kwiyubakirako uruhome. Twese hamwe turi mu bwato bumwe." Papa yavuze ko ingaruka y'iki kibazo c'amagara y'abantu zerekanye ko ubumwe bw'amakungu bukomeye cane. "Muri iki gihe c'akahise, tugeramiwe n'ibibazo vy'ibidukikije hamwe n'ubusumbasumbane mu butunzi no mu mibano vyagiye kunyurwa n'ikiza coronavirus, birakenewe cane ko twemerana nka benewacu na bashiki bacu." Papa yateye akamo ngo habe umutima wo gufasha no gushigikira abakozweko n'ico kiza, adoma urutoke cane cane ku bapfasoni bahohotewe muri iki gihe abantu bugaranywe. Avuga ku zindi ngorane ziri kw'isi, yahamagariye abantu gukomeza ubumwe no gusubiza hamwe muri Syria, Yemen, Libya, Nagorno-Karabakh, Sudan y'epfo , Nigeria, Cameroun na Irak. Vyitezwe ko azogira urugendo muri Irak mu kwezi kwa gatatu, urugendo rushobora kuba rubaye urwa mbere rwa Papa mu gihugu cazahajwe n'intambara.

headline: Uganda: Abanye-Kongo bari bahungutse basubiye i Bunagana nyuma y'iminsi ibiri
text: Abajejwe intwaro mu karere ka Bunagana mu burengero bwa Uganda bavuga yuko impunzi z'Abanyekongo zari zahungutse nyuma yo guhunga imirwano ya M23 na FARDC, nyinshi zagarutse muri Uganda nyuma y'iminsi ibiri. Mu ndwi iheze imirwano yarasubiye kwaduka hagati y'umugwi M23 n'ingabo za leta ya Republika ya Demokra ya Kongo, FARDC. Iyo mirwano yatumye ibihumbi vy'abantu bahungira hakurya y'urubibe, i Bunagana muri Uganda, ariko ntibatevye baca basubira iwabo muri Kongo bumvise ko agahengwe kagarutse. Ariko ako gahengwe ntikatevye, kuko kuwa Mungu, nyuma y'iminsi ibiri gusa bahungutse, abashika ku bihimbi mirongo itanu baciye bagaruka i Bunagana muri Uganda nk'uko abajejwe ako karere babibwiye BBC. Umuyobozi wa Bunagana, Ismail Ndayambaye, yabwiye BBC ko batangaye babonye ku wa Mungu impunzi nyinshi z'abanye-Kongo zabashwayemwo. Bwana Ndayambaje yagize ati: "Ku wa Mungu bacise bagaruka bose baza umubare ari mwishi bashitse ngaha muri Bunagana tubona amashure yacu [bahuzuye] tubona n'ahantu hose ari imyanda yuzuyeho. "Vyabaye ngombwa ko dusaba ubuyobozi bwa District na HCR kuba botuzanira imodoka ikabajana mu nkambi y'agateganyo i Nyakabande muri Kisoro. "Baje ari umubare mwinshi, mwinshi cane [...] kuko n'abari basigayeyo baciye baza muri uwo mubare. Nk'abantu barenga nk'ibihumbi mirongo itanu ugereranije kuko sindaronka umubare uvuye muri HCR." Uwo muyobozi yabandanije avuga yuko benshi muri abo bahunze bamaze gushirwa mu nkambi aho bariko bararonswa imfashanyo. Mu mpera z'indwi iheze umugwi M23 watangaje yuko uhagaritse imirwano, ariko nta tangazo nk'iryo ryagaragaye ku ruhande rwa FARDC, kandi abari mu karere ka Rutsuru bavuga yuko hacumvikana rimwe na rimwe ukurasa.

headline: OMS - COVAX: Birakenewe ko incanco zishika mu minwe y'abari muri Afrika
text: Ishami rya Onu rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, WHO/OMS, rivuga ko ivyo amakungu yemeye vyo gutanga incanco za Covid muri Afrika bikeneye gushirwa mu bikorwa mu 'gutanga' izo ncanco kuri uwo mugabane. Uwurongoye OMS mu karere ka Afrika Dr Richard Mihigo yabwiye BBC Newsday ati: "Twagiye tubona imihango myinshi batanga muri kahise… yose yari myiza ariko ico dukeneye cane n'uko incanco zishika mu minwe y'abantu bari ku rubuga." Ivyo bivuzwe mu gihe Onu isigura ko uko ibintu vyifashe ari nko 'kwitako umwikomo', mu gihe abarenga ibice 90% vy'abanye Afrika bataracandagwa. Ashikiriza ijambo inama ya bose kuri uyu wa mbere, umunyamabanga mukuru wa Onu, António Guterres yagize ati: "N'ibiterasoni. Twaratoye ubuhinga bwo gupima. Ariko turi ku rudome F uravye inyifato." Dr Mihigo avuga ko Afrika yavyifashemwo neza mu gusaranganya incanco nke yaronse, n'aho zimwe zashitse hasigaye akanya gato ngo zirenze ikiringo. Abategetsi ba OMS bavuga ko umugambi mpuzamakungu wa Covax wo gutanga incanco, ufise intumbero yo gufasha ibihugu bikenye, wagenze neza n'aho utashoboye kuronka incanco zikwiye. Umugambi wa Covax watanze ibice 37% vy'incanco imiliyoni 177 zatanzwe muri Afrika, izindi zikaba zabonetse biciye mu migenderanire n'imfashanyo zivuye ahantu hatandukanye. Dr Mihigo yateye akamo ibihugu gushigikira uwo mugambi mu gucisha imfashanyo yavyo muri Covax.

headline: Nigeria: Uyu mupatiri yiyemeje gukingira ibigirwamana vy'aba Igbo biriko biraturirwa
text: Mu gihe abavugabutumwa bo mw'ishengero rya Pentecôte mu buseruko bwa Nigeria bagenda baturira ibishusho n'ibindi bibumbano vyo muri kahise babona ko ari ibigirwamana, umupatiri umwe w'umukatorika wewe abandanya avyegeranya. Ibi bibumbano bifise ikibanza gikomeye mu madini kama yo muri ako karere kabamwo abo mu bwoko bw'aba Igbo, basanzwe babifata nk'imana zabo kandi bemera ko bifise ubushobozi ndengakamere. Gusa abanywanyi b'aya madini kama bagenda bagabanuka kubera idini rya Gikristu - ahanini rigizwe n'amashengero ya Pentecote - rigenda ryigarurira abatari bake. Abanyamakuru ba BBC Igbo Chiagozie Nwonwu na Karina Igonikon barerekana utwigoro tw'uyu mupatiri two gukingira kahise kariko karatokombera kubera ibikorwa vy'abavugabutumwa bamwe bamwe. N'aho bamwita "umuriro waka", nta kintu giteye ubwoba kuri Patiri Paul Obayi arongoye inzu ndangamurage ishinguwemwo ibigirwamana mu gisagara ca Nnsuka kiri mu buseruko bwa Nigeria. Iyi nzu ndangamurage y'ivyumba bitatu iherereye mu kigo c'Isengero nkuru ya Katorika yitiriwe umweranda Tereza (Saint Theresa), irimwo amajana n'amajana y'ibigirwamana bitandukanye, ikibumbano c'intambwe hamwe n'ibishusho vy'imana z'aba Igbo. Iyo hagize abava inyuma y'izi mana kama, cane cane kubera inyigisho z'amashengero ya Pentecôte bamwe mu bavugabutumwa baca baturira ibi bibumbano, bavuga ko biteye kubiri n'ukwemera gushingiye ku Mana imwe, kandi ko ari "impwemu mbi zitera imikoshi". Rimwe na rimwe, hari n'abemera izo mana kama bo nyene ubwabo bavyituririra bishimikije umugani wo mu migenzo y'aba Igbo uvuga ngo: "Iyo imana ibangamye cane, icika urukwi rwo guturira". Ariko Patiri Obayi wewe yafashe iyindi nzira mu gukingira izo mana n'imanakazi, akavuga ko akoresha ububasha ahabwa n'Imana kugira ngo azake izo nguvu ndengakamere. Ibi vyamutumye bamutazira Okunerere - "umuriro uturira ibigirwamana muri mutima". Ari kuri iyo nzu ndangamurage, yavuze ati: "Naramaze gusambura izi mpwemu". "Iki ubona hano ni ikibarara. Nta kintu na kimwe kirimwo". Patiri Obayi avuga ko ahanini yigiye ku mazu ndangamurage yo mu bihugu vyo mu burengero bw'isi biriko biraterwa igitsure kugira ngo bigarukane ibibumbano vyanyazwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni, aho atanga akarorero k'ivyitwa Benin Bronzes/Bronzes du Bénin (ibibumbano vy'ivyuma birenga igihumbi vyari bishashije ingoro y'umwami w'icitwa Ubwami bwa Benin, ari yo Nigeria ya kino gihe). "Naragendeye amazu ndangamurage yo mu burengero nca nsangayo ibi bibumbano, harimwo mbere n'ivyavuye muri Benin, ariho naca nigira inama yo kubibungabunga". Uwurongoye iyi sengero nkuru, Patiri Eugene Odo, arashigikiye aka kigoro kiwe, aho agereranya iyi nzu ndangamurage n'iyindi yegukira Katorika mu Butaliyano. Ati: "I Roma nk'akarorero, hari inzu ndangamurage ibitsemwo ibintu vyahinguwe mu gihe c'ubutegetsi bwa gipagani bw'Abaromani, kandi ingenzi zama zigendera iyo nzu mu ntumbero yo kwiga ingene umuntu yagiye atera imbere". N'aho iyi nzu ndangamurage ibitse ibi bigirwamana yakira ingenzi ziva kure mbere n'i Lagos, irakeneye kugarukirwa. Ibibumbano, bimwe mbere bimaze ibinjana, bisanzaye irya n'ino hasi muri iyo nzu, vyuzuye inkungugu. Hari mbere n'ivyamaze kuribwa n'umuswa.
