Ibi vyose ni ivyo yegeranije mu "butumwa amaze akora mu kiringo kirenga imyaka 20 aho agenda yigisha mu bisagara no mu mitumba itandukanye mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nigeria. Ati: "Abantu barandikira isengero ryanje bansaba ko ngenda kubakuriraho ibi bigirwamana bibabujije amahoro". Ni itunga rikomeye ryerekana imana z'aba Igbo z'ubwoko bwinshi. Ariko iyikomeye muri izi zose ni Adaada leja, ikigirwamana cambitswe inkofero y'injishano yasengwa n'abarondera kuvyara. Patiri Obayi avuga ko iyi imaze imyaka hafi 200. Odinani, idini kama ry'aba Igbo, ryariho imbere y'umuzo y'idini rya Gikristu n'ubukoloni.  Ni uburyo bwo guterekera aho abantu basenga umuzimu userukiwe n'igishusho kizwi kw'izina rya chi, kugira ngo ubasabire kuri Rugira Vyose, bita Chukwu. Izindi mana basenga harimwo: Si benshi bagisenga izi mana kama, kandi abenshi barahamwa cane n'abakirisu basanzwe ari na bo benshi. Imisi mikuru yabo irasuzuguritse, kandi n'imigirwa imwe imwe isa no kubandwa ibonwa nabi mbere birashika n'utuzu tw'indaro tugaterwa mu bikorwa bijanye n'ubukristu. Muri kino gihe, abenshi mu bakigendera muri aya madini kama ni abatama, n'aho ubu hari bamwe mu rwaruka bagenda bagarariza ubukristu bagashira imbere imigirwa barazwe n'abakurambere. Chinasa Nwosu, umusenyeri w'ishengero rya Pentecôte mu rusengero rwa Royal Church ruri mu gisagara Port Harcourt kiri mu buseruko, ararwanya bikomeye uku kwemera kama. Musenyeri Nwosu yatanguye kumenyekana mu ntango z'imyaka ya 1990 igihe yasambura utuzu tw'indaro, aturira ivyitwa ibigirwamana, anarandura ibiti avuga ko vyari "ibiti vya shetani/satani". Ibi biti, bimwe muri vyo bikaba ari ivya kera cane, bizungurutswe hasi n'ibitambaro vy'amabara atukura canke yera, bigafatwa nk'ivyeranda ku bayoboke bavyo babisenga bakanabitambira. Hari bimwe usanga biri ku mihana y'abantu ariko vyinshi biri mu mashamba. Ati: "Imana ntishaka ko dusenga ibigirwamana. Idini kama rya Afrika akenshi rishingiye ku gusenga ibigirwamana". Asubiramwo amajambo yo muri Bibiriya, yongerako ati: "Imihezagiro uyironka mu gihe utaye ivyo bintu vyavumwe". Avuga ko ibishusho n'ibindi bibumbano vyanyazwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni mu burengero bwa Nigeria ubu bikaba bibarizwa mu mazu ngandamurage yo mu bihugu vy'uburengero, bitirirwa Imana iyo ari yo yose, akaba ashigikiye ko bigarukanwa mu gihugu. Hagati aho, aragabisha reta ya Nigera ko mu gihe yogarukana ibibumbano bishobora kuba vyaragizwe ibigirwamana, agatanga akarorero k'ivyitwa Ikenga biri mu nzu ndangamurage y'Ubwongereza, ko bikwiye guturirwa. Ibi vyiyumviro birarwanywa bikomeye na Patiri Obayi yiyemeje gukingira ibi bibumbano mu nzu yiwe ndangamurabe. Ati: "Ibi ni ibibumbano abana bacu bazokwigirako kugira ngo batahure neza ingene abakurambere babo bari babayeho".

headline: Coronavirus -Burundi: Bavuze ivyavuye mu gupima abantu benshi
text: Ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu mu Burundi bumenyesha ko mu bantu bashika 670 bafashwe ibipimo ku wa mbere w'iyi ndwi 28 banduye wa mugera ruhonyabantu wa coronavirus. Nibwo bwa mbere mu Burundi hari hafashwe ibipimo vyinshi ku munsi umwe mw'isekeza ryatangujwe ryo kuraba uko iciza Covid-19 gihagaze mu gihugu. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu mu Burundi, Dr Jean-Bosco Girukwishaka, abicishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, amenyesha ko ivyo bipimo vyafashwe mu bigo bitatu vyo gupimiramwo uyo mugera no mu bitaro bitandukanye, mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Iryo sekeza ryatanguriye i Bujumbura bikaba bitegekanijwe ko kuva mu ndwi iza kizobandaniriza mu zindi ntara zo hagati. Dr Girukwishaka avuga ko ku munsi ugira kabiri w'iryo sekeza, abashika "593  aribo bafashwe ibipimo" , bakaba barindiriye inyishu. Avugana na BBC Gahuzamiryango ejo ku wa kabiri, Bwana Girukwishaka yavuze ko iri sekeza rizomara amezi atatu rizofasha leta kumenya ingene ikiza ca coronavirus cifashe mu gihugu cose. U Burundi buzwi ko buri mu bihugu bitafashe ingingo ruhasha mu ntumbero yo kurwanya ikwirakwira ry'umugera wa coronavirus, harimwo ingingo zo kuguma mu rugo, nk'uko vyagenze mu bindi bihugu vyo mu muryango wa Afrika y'Ubuseruko. Hari amashirahamwe amwe amwe yagiriza leta ko igiharuro vyatangwa na leta ku bijanye n'uwo mugera bitari vyo, ibirego vyiyamirijwe. Umukuru w'igihugu mushasha Evariste Ndayishimiye wewe aherutse gutangaza ko agiye kurwanya bikomeye iki kiza gushika gitujijwe. Mw'ijambo yashikirije igihe abagize leta yiwe barahira, ku wa 30 z'ukwa gatandatu guheze, Perezida Ndayishimiye yatangaje icese ko agiye guhagurukira uwo mugera gushika utujijwe. Mu gihe ico gikorwa kibandanya, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu busaba abanyagihugu kubandanya bakurikiza ingingo zafashwe mu ntumbero yo kwikingira, izo nazo hakaba harimwo gukaraba igihe cose, kwirinda gukorana mu minwe canke kugwana mu nda, hamwe no kwisiga ya miti yica imicafu. Ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu kandi busaba ishirahamwe Atrabu ryo kwunguruza abantu kwama bapompa imiduga yabo, abakiriya nabo bagasabwa kwambara udupfukamunwa.

headline: Burundi -Kenya: Jules Ndayishimiye yakora ijoro n'umutaga mu kurondera umutahe wiwe
text: Umusore Jules Ndayishimiye adandaza amandazi, ibiyoba n'ikawa muri Kenya, umutahe akaba yawukuye mu kazi ko kudandaza ifi ku murango n'ubuzamu mw'ijoro. Yavuye mu Burundi arangije kaminuza mu gisata c'uburunzi. Avuga ko yatahuye kare ko ata kazi reta igifise itanga, afata ingingo hakiri kare kukironderera. Agira ati:"Kuva ndi muri kaminuza, nari namaze gutahura ko akazi ari jewe ntegerezwa kukironderera. "Narabona abahejeje imbere yanje ko ata kazi baronka." Jules Ndayishimiye avuga kandi ko kuva aheza amashure yisumbuye yari yaciye atangura kurondera ico akora. Avuga ati:"Nahejeje amashure yisumbuye nca ntangura gukorera abantu. Narabadandariza. "Mu nyuma naramanutse i Bujumbura nsaba akazi ko gukora ijoro nkaca niga kaminuza ku murango. "Vyari bigoye, kuko nataha nk'isaha icenda z'ijoro, isaha zibiri nkaba ntonze kw'ishure." Uwo musore avuga ko yagerageje no kworora inkoko biranga, araonka umutahe wo kudandaza ntivyagenda neza ariko ko atacitse intege. Jules Ndayishimye avuga ko umugenzi wiwe asanzwe aba i Nairobi muri Kenya, ari we yamuriye akara ko ashobora kuronka akazi kotuma aronka umutahe kuko amahera yo muri ico gihugu ari hejuru gusumba amarundi. Avuga ati:"Naraje uwo mugenzi aranyakira. Nca ndonka akazi ko gukora mw'ishirahamwe rihingura amafi. "Kubera iwacu twakuze batigisha ibintu vy'imyuga, narafasha gusa ababizi bakabikora, ku mugoroba bagaca bampemba. "Sinaca ntaha, ahubwo naca ntonda ku kandi kazi k'izamu iwacu bita akazi k''ubu city'." "Inyuma y'amezi atatu, naciye mfata ingingo yo kwikorera ivyanje ndi kumwe n'uwundi mugenzi wanje. "Tudandaza ibintu bitandukanye harimwo ikawa, amandazi n'ibiyoba. Kandi bigenda neza turashima." Jules Ndayishimiye ahanura urundi rwaruka gukura amaboko mu mpuzu bagakora akazi kose kabonetse, kuko kuri we, ngo n'aho wobura, uba warondeye ntuheza ngo witeko umwikomo. Urwaruka rwinshi ruturuka mu Burundi rwaje muri kenya kurondera ubuzi, benshi bakora muvyo kwubaka, abandi mu kudandaza amandazi n'ibiyoba mu mabarabara. Hari n'abakora akazi k'izamu kazwi nk''igi city'. "

headline: Ubwo koko Ukraine irashobora gutsinda iyi ntambara? iki be n’ibindi bibazo bine ku gitero ca Russia
text: Abanya Ukraine barabandanya binanata mu guhangana bikomeye n'Uburusiya inyuma y'ukwezi kurenga Perezida Vladimir Putin agomoreye ingabo kuri iki gihugu. Ingabo za Ukraine zatanguye kwisubiza uturere tumwe tumwe twari twigaruriwe n'ingabo z'Uburusiya. Ku ruhande rwabwo, Uburusiya muri ino ndwi bwari bwatangaje ko bugiye kugabanya ibikorwa vyabwo vya gisirikare mu micungararo y'umugwa mukuru Kyiv be no mu gisagara ca Chernigov kiri mu buraruko. Reta ya Volodymyr Zelensky itangaza ko ingabo za Ukraine zirukanye iz'Uburusiya mu micungararo y'umugwa mukuru Kyiv kandi ko zigaruriye akarere kose ka Kyiv. Perezida Zelensky arakeza kandi ingabo za Ukraine zimaze indwi zitari nke zihanganye n'iz'Uburusiya mu gisagara ca Mariupol kibandanya gicucakirwa ibibombe kuva intambara itangura. Muri iki gisagara ingabo za Ukraine zararahiye zirarengwa ko zitarekura. Abantu baharurwa mu miriyoni zine baramaze guhunga Ukraine mu gihe abandi bagera ku ca kane c'abanyagihugu bavugwa ko bahungiye hagati mu gihugu. Ibi nivyo bituma abatari bake mu bumviriza canke basoma amakuru y'iyi ntambara bibaza ibibazo vyinshi ariko ntibaronke inyishu ku bijanye n'ingene ibintu bimeze ku rubuga rw'intambara hamwe n'ingene bishobora kugenda mu gihe gito canke kirekire kiri imbere. Abanyamakuru babiri ba BBC Orla Guerin na Jenny Hill baragerageza kwishura bimwe mu bibazo bikuru bikuru abantu bibaza. Guerin akaba ari i Kyiv, umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine, nayo Hill akaba ari i Moscou, umugwa mukuru w'Uburusiya. Orla Guerin: Mu mvugo ya gisirikare, umuntu yovuga ko "vyose gushika ubu bigenda neza" kuri Ukraine. Putin n'amakungu baguye mu gahundwe babonye ingene abanya Ukraine bihagazeko bagahangana n'igisirikare gikomeye kandi gifise ibikoresho vya rutura. Aho nyene, niko kandi n'amakungu atangazwa n'akajagari karangwa mu ngabo z'Uburusiya mbere ziboneka ko ata buhinga bwinshi zifise. Akarorero ni ako mu ndwi iheze aho ingabo za Ukraine zaneshejeje iz'Uburusiya mu micungararo ya Kyiv zikigarurira uturere. Ingabo za Ukraine zatubwiye ko Abarusiya bagerageje kuzomora incuro zine zose mu kwezi guheze, ariko ko buri gihe cose babigerageje zashoboye kubasubiza inyuma. Iki kirerekanwa n'ibifaru n'amamodoka y'intambara vy'Uburusiya vyaturiwe. Iki gitero c'Uburusiya ubu kiri mu ndwi igira gatandatu kandi Abarusiya hari ahatari hake hakomeye bananiwe: barananiwe no gufata umugwa mukuru, bananirwa gusenyura reta, mbere ubu bakaba ata gisagara gikuru na kimwe barashobora kwigarurira kiretse Kherson mu bumanuko. Ikintu conyene kigaragara, ni uko  Uburusiya gushika ubu bumaze kwonona vyinshi gusumba ivyo bumaze kwigarurira, ni igitero gitwara uburyo bwinshi ariko inyungu kimaze gushikako zikaba ata kintu kirimwo. Ariko n'aho biri uko, ubu haracari kare kwibaza iherezo ry'iyi ntambara. Kumbure dushobora kuba turi ku ntango y'intambara igiye kumara igihe kirekire cane. Ubu Uburusiya buvuga ko bugiye gushira inguvu zose ku ntara ya Donbas iri mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Kumbure bwahisemwo gukora gutyo kubera ahandi vyanse. Ariko muri kazoza bushobora gusubira kugerageza kwigarurira ubundi butaka mu tundi turere. Biboneka ko Putin ahanze amaso cane kuri iki gitero. Birashoboka ko ashobora kubandanya arungika ingabo n'ibirwanisho bikomakomeye mu misi iza. Jenny Hill: Kremlin (ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya) ntishobora kwemeza ibintu nk'ivyo, ariko n'imiburiburi biragaragara ko bamwe mu ngabo z'Uburusiya ata buhinga bunini bafise kandi ko batari biteguriye iyi ntambara. Mu misi iheze, vyabaye ngombwa ko ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bwemeza ko hari abarikiri binjizwa mu gisirikare kw'itegeko barungitswe kurwana muri Ukraine, ibi bikaba bitandukanye n'ivyo Putin avuga. Moscou ivuga ko ifise "abakorerabushake" 16.000 bo mu Burasirazuba bwo hagati, abenshi muri bo barwanije wa muhari wiyita Reta ya ki Islam (Etat Islamique) mu myaka cumi iheze, biteguriye kwinjira mu ngabo z'Uburusiya. Aba bashobora kuba bafise uburambe mu ntambara gusumba bamwe muri bagenzi babo b'Abarusiya, mbere bamwe mu bahinga bemeza ko bashobora kuba bafise ubuhinga bwinshi mu ntambara zo mu bisagara, ikintu nkenerwa mu ntambara yo kwigarurira ibisagara. Hari bamwe kandi bavuga ko aba "bakorerabushake" bashobora kuba ata kinya bogira mu gutera canke kwica abasivire ba Ukraine (ni mu gihe Abarusiya benshi bafitaniye ubucuti bwa hafi cane na Ukraine, mbere bakabona abanya Ukraine nka "benewabo"), kandi bazwi ko ari ba ruburakigongwe, ibi bigashobora kugira ingaruka mbi mu mitwe y'ingabo za Ukraine. Kremlin ishobora kuba izi ibi vyose. Nico gituma yamye ivuga ko yipfuza kurondera abarwanyi bo mu Burasirazuba bwo hagati, n'aho gushika ubu itaremanga ku mugaragaro ko ishobora kubarungika muri Ukraine. Orla Guerin: Impande zompi ziri mu ntambara y'amajambo. Mu ntambara iy'ari yo yose, amakuru ava kuri buri ruhande yerekeye abasivire bahasiga ubuzima, uturere twigaruriwe canke abansi bishwe, ni amakuru ategerezwa kwitonderwa. Ibi birasiguritse, cane cane ku Burusiya bukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo abanyagihugu bame baronka amakuru atangwa na Kremlin gusa ku bijanye n'iyi ntambara. Gushika ubu, ntiyemera ko yateye Ukraine, ivuga gusa ko ari "ibikorwa bidasanzwe vya gisirikare". Dukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo dutange amakuru ashikirizwa n'abavyiboneye, ari naco gituma BBC yarungitse abantu mu turere twinshi twa Ukraine, ikegeranya ivyemezo vy'abantu bari ku rubuga, harimwo abasivire, abakora mu buvuzi, abategetsi b'uturere hamwe n'igisirikare ca Ukraine. Ukraine iremeza ko yatakaje, mbere n'abanyamakuru ba BBC mu bisagara bitandukanye barashoboye kwiboneka abasirikare ba Ukraine baguye ku rugamba bariko barahambwa. Gusa ntituzi nimba koko abaguye ku rugamba bose bamenyekana. Jenny Hill: Turazi neza ko Putin ashaka ko amakungu yemeza ko Crimea, intara yigaruriwe mu 2014, ari iy'Uburusiya. Mu biganiro vyabaye mu ntango z'ino ndwi, uruhande rwa Ukraine rwasavye ko kazoza ka Crimea koganirwako mu myaka 15 nka kimwe mu vyotuma haba amasezerano y'amahoro arama, n'aho Putin asa n'uwuterekwa ibi. Ashaka kandi ko amakungu yemeza (nk'uko aherutse kuvyemeza) ko intara za Donetsk na Lugansk ari ibihugu vyigenga (n'aho bigaragara neza ko vyoba ari "ibigenzurwa" n'Uburusiya). Kubera ubu Kremlin ifise integuro yo gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo "ibohoze" intara yose ya Donbas, turashobora gufata ko Putin ashaka kugerageza gufata no kwigarurira iyo ntara. 5. Abanyagihugu boba bafise ubushobozi bwo gutembagaza Putin canke guhamagaza iyindi myiyerekano mu gihe intambara yobandanya Jenny Hill: Ntawovyizera. Kremlin ntishobora kwihanganira na gato umuntu uw'ari we wese adashigikiye intambara, kandi benshi mu Barusiya bayirwanya barahunze. Ya myiyerekano yahora ari urutavanako ubu isa n'iyagabanutse. Ibiva mu matora ngereranyo (sondages d'opinion/ opinion polls) bikwiye kwitonderwa, ariko bibandanya vyerekana ko benshi (mbere bagenda biyongera) bashigikiye Putin n'"ibikorwa vyiwe bidasanzwe vya gisirikare". Mu gihe ibinyamakuru vyigenga hafi vyose mu Burusiya vyugawe canke bigategekwa guhagarika ibikorwa, ni hake umuntu ashobora kuronderera ayandi makuru uretse mu binyamakuru vya reta, ibi navyo bikaba bishikiriza ibitanzwe na Kremlin gusa. Bitangaza ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zinjiye muri Ukraine mu ntumbero imwe rudende yo gukingira abanya Ukraine bavuga Ikirusiya kugira ngo ntibaterwe canke ngo bakorerwe "ihonyabwoko" n'abanya Ukraine banka abanyamahanga hamwe n'abagendera ku vyiyumviro vy'aba Nazi (neo-Nazi). Umuntu akurikira imboneshakure y'igihugu yonyene, biroroshe kuvuga ko ibi bikorwa bidasanzwe ari ibikorwa vy'iteka kandi nkenerwa mu gukingira abavuga Ikirusiya be n'Uburusiya bwo nyene ubwabwo kugira ntibuhave buterwa na Ukraine iriko irahingura ibirwanisho vy'ubumara ifashijwe na Amerika, mbere ikaba iriko ikora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo ironke ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri. Ibihano bwafatiwe biratanguye kugira ingaruka mbi ziboneka mu gutuma ibiciro biduga, ariko Kremlin isigura ibi nk'ikindi cemezo c'agasomborotso k'ibihugu vyo mu Burengero. Ibintu bimeze uku, biragoye kwiyumbira ko abanyagihugu bashobora gushavurira reta yabo gushika aho borondera kuyisenyura.

headline: Covid: France yategetse ko urucanco rwa AstraZeneca ruhabwa abari musi y'imyaka 65 gusa
text: Abajejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bufaransa bavuga ko urucanco rwa Covid-19 rwahinguwe na AstraZeneca rwohabwa abari munsi y'imyaka 65. Iki gihugu co mu muryango w'ibihugu vya Buraya kivuga ko ata vyemezo bikwiye ko uru rucanco rushobora gukora ku bantu bageze mu zabukuru. Ikigo kijejwe kugenzura imiti mu muryango w'Ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Buraya caremeje urucanco rwa AstraZeneca ku bantu bose bakuze, ariko buri gihugu gifata ingingo y'ingene kizorukoresha. Ubudagi na Autriche/Austria vyaramaze gutegeka ko ruhabwa abari munsi y'imyaka 65. Mu ndwi iheze, umuryango w'Ubumwe bw'igihubu vya Buraya waragiye mu mpari na AstraZeneca, inyuma y'aho iyi kompanyi itangarije ko idashoboye gukora incanco gushika ku rugero rwari rwitezwe mu kiringo categekanijwe. Umukuru w'uyu muryango, Ursula von der Leyen ubwiwe aranegurwa cane akagirizwa ko yafashe minenerwe iri sekeza ryo gucandaga, ariko ejo ku wa kabiri yarireguye. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru co mu Bufaransa Le Monde ati: "Ndizeye neza ko inzira yafashwe n'Uburaya ku bijanye no gucandaga ari yo nziza". Eka n'umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubudagi Angela Merkel na we nyene yarashigikiye inzira yafashwe n'umuryango wa Buraya, hari mu kiganiro ku mboneshakure. Ikigo kijejwe kugenzura ibijanye n'amagara y'abantu kivuga ko ata vyemezo bikwiye bafise vyerekana ko urucanco rwakozwe n'ikompanyi AstraZeneca rukora ku bantu barenza imyaka 65. Iki kigo kivuga kiti: "Ibi vyemezo bizoboneka mu ndwi ziri imbere. Mu kurindira, dusavye ko rwohabwa abantu bari munsi y'imyaka 65". Categetse ko ruhabwa abakozi bo mu gisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu hamwe n'abatishoboye bari hagati y'imyaka 50 na 65. Gushika ubu, abantu barenga umuriyoni n'igice mu Bufaransa ni bo bamaze kuronswa urucanco rwa Covid. Mu Bwongereza hoho, abamaze kuronswa urucanco barenga imiriyoni cumi, mu gihe ibi bihugu bifise ibitigiri vy'abantu vyababana. Mu ndwi iheze, umurwi w'Ubudagi ujejwe gucandaga wavuze ko udashobora kwemera ko uru rucanco ruhabwa abantu barenga imyaka 65. Ejo ku wa kabiri, abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Suwede na Polonye, nabo nyene barafashe iyo ngingo, mu gihe umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu w'Ububirigi nawe avuga ko muri kino gihe, bazoruha abatarenza imyaka 55 gusa. Eka n'Ubutariyano nabwo nyene ku wa gatandatu uheze bwaremeje ko uru rucanco rwokoreshwa, ariko rugahabwa abatarenza 55 bo nyene. Hagati aho, mu cigwa batarashira ahabona, abahinga bo kuri kaminuza ya Oxford, bavuga ko uru rucanco rushobora kugabanya "bimwe biboneka" ikwirakwira ry'uwu mugera. Ibihugu vya Buraya birafise uburenganzira bwo kwifatira ingingo ku gatwe kavyo ku bantu bohabwa incanco kanaka mu gihe zimaze kwemezwa ku rwego rw'umugabane. Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'imboneshakure ejo ku wa kabiri, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubudagi yavuze ko "urucanco urwo ari rwo rwose ruhawe ikaze mu muryango wa Buraya". Avuga kandi ko hari amakuru ahumuriza cane ku rucanco rw'Uburusiya Sputnik V. Mu mugambi wabwo wo gucandaga umaze indwi zitari nke, Ubwongereza bumaze igihe bukoresha uru rucanco rwakozwe na AstraZeneca, ikompanyi ihingura imiti yegukira Ubwongereza na Suwede. Abajejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza bavuga ko uru rucanco ata ngorane rutera kandi ko "rukingira ku rugero runini" abantu ku myaka itandukanye. Icigwa cerekana ko uru rucanco rukora neza cane. Mu gihe rwariko rurageragezwa, nta n'umwe mu baruhawe yigeze ajanwa mu bitaro canke ngo arembe kubera Covid. Uru rucanco rutangwa mu nshinge zibiri ziterwa ku ncuro zibiri nyene ku kuboko, urwa kabiri rugaterwa inyuma y'indwi hagati ya 4 na 12 kuva umuntu atewe urwa mbere. Igihe ishirahamwe rijejwe imiti mu muryango w'Ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Buraya ryemeza uru rucanco mu ndwi iheze, ryavuze ko abenshi mu barugeragerejweko bari munsi y'imyaka 55. Ryavuze ko mu gihe ata vyemezo bihagije vyerekana ko uru rucanco rushobora gukora ku bantu bakuze, "rurakora neza ku bantu bari muri uyu murwi kubera abasoda b'umubiri bakora neza ". AstraZeneca ivuga ko icigwa giherutse gukorwa na Amerika kizotanga ibindi vyemezo kuri uru rucanco ku bantu bageze mu zabukuru.

headline: DRC Vs Rwanda: 'Dushaka abasirikare bacu' - RDF
text: Igisirikare c'Urwanda (RDF) gisaba igisirikare ca Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo (FARDC) kurekura abasirikare baco baherutse gufatwa mpiri, nk'uko biri mw'itangazo rigufi ryaraye risohowe na RDF. Ni nyuma y'aho abakoresha imbuga hwaniro  bahanahaniye amasanamu y'abasirikare babiri b'Urwanda bavugwa ko bafatiwe muri Congo bariko barwana ku ruhande rw'umuhari  w'inyeshamba M23 uhanganye n'igisirikare ca DR Congo. Reta y'Urwanda yoyo ivuga ko  aba basirikare banyurujwe "inyuma y'agasomborotso" k'igisirikare ca Congo ku wa mbere w'iyi ndwi, aho "vya muzinga bitari bike vyatewe ku butaka bw'u Rwanda". Mw'iri tangazo, RDF ivuga ko aba basirikare bayo bafashwe bari mu bikorwa vyo gucungera umutekano inyuma ya vya muzinga vyarashwe ku butaka bw'u Rwanda ku wa 23 Rusama (5). Rivuga riti: "FARDC hamwe na FDLR bakoze igitero kuri RDF ku mupaka wacu, kandi abasirikare babiri b'ingabo z'u Rwanda baranyurujwe igihe bari mu bikorwa vyo gucungera umutekano". Aba basirikare bazwi ku mazina ya Cpl Nkundabagenzi Elysee and Pte Ntwari Gad. Rirangiza rivuga riti: "Turasavye abategetsi ba Repubulika y'intwaro Rusangi ya Congo bakorana cane n'imirwi y'inyeshamba yakoze jenoside gukora kugira ngo abasirikare ba RDF barekurwe". Reta ya Congo iherutse kwagiriza Urwanda ko rufasha umuhari M23 watangajwe ko ari uw'iterabwoba, ivyo Urwanda Ruhakana, ahubwo, nk'uko vyasubiriye kugaragarira muri uru rwandiko, rukagiriza Congo ko ikorana n'umuhari FDLR wagirizwa ko wakoze ihonyabwoko ryo mu Rwanda mu 1994. Reta ya congo yoyo ivuga ko ibi yagirizwa n'Urwanda ari ivyitwazo kugira ngo ishigikire M23. Ntaco igisirikare ca Congo kiratangaza ku bisabwa n'igisirikare c'Urwanda kuri aba basirikare babiri bafashwe bakaba bari mu minwe ya FARDC.

headline: Tanzania-Covid : Prezida mushasha wa Tanzania asabwa na OMS kurwanya coronavirus
text: Umukuru w'ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi OMS/WHO, umunye Ethiopia Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, yarungitse ubutumwa bwo gukeza umukuru  mushasha wa Tanzania, avuga ko yizeye ko bazokorana mu kurwanya  umugera wa Covid-19. Umukuru wa OMS yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Niteze ko tugiye gukorana kugira dukingire abantu indwara ya Covid-19, turangize ikiza hanyuma Tanzania kibe igihugu c'amagara meza gusumba. Dufashanije." Samia Suluhu Hassan kuri uyu wa gatanu ni ho yarahirira amabanga yo kuba umukuru w'igihugu mushasha wa Tanzania - iminsi ibiri inyuma y'urupfu rwa prezida John Pombe Magufuli. Uwo muhisi yaramenyekanye cane mu makungu muri uyu mwaka uheze ku buryo yitwaye ku kibazo ca coronavirus. Tanzania ntirasubira gutangaza ku mugaragaro amakuru yerekeye ico kiza kuva mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu mwaka uheze, kandi reta yaranse kurondera incanco n'ubwo OMS yagumye isaba ko abanyeTanzania bakingirwa. Ahubwo prezida Magufuli yahamagarira abanyagihugu gusenga no kwiyuka kugira bikingire uwo mugera. Magufuli yarakekeza kandi akamaro k'udufukamunwa, ikintu umwanditsi w'umuganda Charles Onyango-Obbo yavuze kuri Twitter ko kitaciye mu ryahumye Gado mu gicapo ciwe ca politike ca nyuma. Uwo munye Tanzania aba muri Kenya, Godfrey Mwampembwa  azwi cane kw'izina rya  Gado, yandika ibineguro yishimikije ibicapo  (Caricaturiste /cartoonist)   yerekana Magufuli, umukatolika yabigendera, ari ku bw'injiriro bw'ijuru yakiriwe n'umumarayika amubwira ati: "Nagira ndakumenyeshe ko udashobora kwinjira utambaye agafukamunwa!" Havuzwe vyinshi ku magara ya Magufuli imbere y'uko apfa ku wa gatatu, urupfu vyavuzwe ko rwatewe n'ukwunyuka kw'ikibazo c'umutima yari asanganywe. Yari amaze indwi zirenga zibiri ataboneka ahagaragara, abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bakaba bavuze ko yari agwaye Covid-19.

headline: Umupfakazi wa TB Joshua mu rugamba rwo kurongora ishengero yasize muri Nigeria
text: Evelyn Joshua yabaye umurongozi w'imwe mu mashengero akomeye y'abarokore muri Afrika, ariko uwo mupfasoni w'imyaka 52 ahanganye n'ikibazo co kubungabunga iragi ry'umugabo wiwe. Urupfu rwa Joshua rwabaye giturumbuka mu kwezi kwa gatandatu afise imyaka 57 rwatumye hatangura intambara yo kumusubirira yamaze amezi n'amezi kugira ironke inyishu. Ariko imiryango y'iryo shengero ryiwe rya Synagogue Church of All Nations (SCOAN), iri mu gisagara kinini cane muri Nigeria, yasubiriye kwugurugwa kugira yakire abayoboke baryo ubwa mbere mu mezi atanu. Yari rurangiranwa kubera imburi ziwe n'inyigisho, vyatumye ahurumbirwa n'ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abayoboke bavuye hirya no hino kw'isi baja Lagos, harimwo n'abanyepolitike bakomeye bo muri Afrika na Amerika y'epfo. Ni gake haba ibiganiro vy'isubirizwa mu mashengero y'abarokore muri Nigeria mbere kenshi uburongozi buca buhabwa umupfakazi w'uwuba yarashinze ishengero. Ariko muri SCOAN, umupfasoni wa Joshua, yari umupasitori yatiwe, ahanganye n'abandi kubera atari mu rwego rukuru rurongoye iryo shengero. Ibi bifatwa n'abo bahanganye ko ari ikimenyetso c'uko umugabo wiwe atigeze amufata nk'uwushobora kumusubirira. Bitandukanye n'abandi bagore b'abapasitori  bo muri Nigeria, ntiyiyerekana cane mu myaka irenga mirongo itatu bari bamaze bubakanye. TB Joshua afatwa n'abayoboke ba SCOAN nk'"intumwa", yakorana n'umugwi  umwegereye cane yita "inararibonye" - umwe muri bo bikaba vyari vyitezwe ko ari we azomusubirira. Ariko inyuma y'urupfu rwiwe, abari begereye umupfasoni wa Joshua barahawe uburenganzira na sentare bwo kumugira umwe mu bagize urwego nshingwantwaro, bica vyorosha kugera ku ntambwe yo gushika kuri ayo mabanga. Iryo shengero ryaciye rimenyesha ko umupfasoni wa Joshua  abaye umurongozi mushasha "Arongowe n'Imana", ivyababaje ayandi mashami ari muri iryo shengero ku kungene bitabaye mu muco. Cane cane umugwi uzwi kw'izina rya Global Congress of SCOAN Members (GCSM), vyitwa ko ushigikiwe n'abayoboke bo mu rwego rwo hejuru, warerekanye amakenga kuri iyo ngingo. Ariko nta madidane yabaye ku mukuru yari kurongora amasengesho ubwa mbere ya SCOAN itariki 7 z'ukwezi kwa cumi na rimwe kuva umugabo wiwe apfuye. Bivugwa ko atahemye kugira yerekane ubutegetsi bwiwe muri iryo shengero, mu gukoresha amezi make ya nyuma mu gusukura iryo shengero. Hari ama Video yagiye ahabona y'abayoboke, benshi b'abanyamahanga, bamaze imyaka baba  muri urwo rupangu runini, bariko baravayo bariko barabazomera. Umwe mu bayoboke yakoresheje imvugo ngereranyo ko "cari icigwa". Abakuwe muri ico kibanza vyavuzwe ko bari abadashigikiye ubutegetsi bw'umupfasoni wa Joshua. Patrick Iwelunmor, yahoze ajejwe kumenyeshamakuru ku muhisi Joshua, yabwiye BBC ati:"Inyuma y'urupfu rw'intumwa, bamwe mu bamugendanira ntibavugisha Evelyn mu rupfasoni." Hari n'inkuru kandi yerekeye igiturire, mbere igisata ca Nigeria kijejwe kugwanya igiturire, EFCC, cemereye BBC ko kiriko kiragira amatohoza ku bivuga ko habaye ubusuma muri iryo shengero. Ntibiramenyekana nimba ibi ari vyo biriko biragirwako amatohoza, kuko ikinyamakuru co muri Nigeria The Punch cari canditse ko iki ari co gituma bamwe mu bayoboke b'iryo shingiro boba banyegeye. Ubu ikigiye kugora cane umupfasoni Joshua n'ugukora ku buryo abayoboke ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bakunda umugabo wiwe biyumvamwo ukwemera kwiwe. Baje kubera igihagararo ciwe n'ubwitonzi hakaba ata co biteze ku mutegetsi mushasha. Gbenga Osinaike, arongoye uruganda rw'abamenyeshamakuru mu kinyamakuru Church Times Nigeria, aremeza ko igenwa ryiwe ryaje giturumbuka. Yabwiye BBC ati:"Yahora asengesha rimwe na rimwe arik TB ntiyigeze amuha icizere." Ariko nk'umuntu atigeze yitabwaho  na benshi, "harimwo n'umugabo wiwe", umupfasoni Joshua yarerekanye " inguvu n'ubushobozi afise mu gutwara iryo shengero." Yaranse ko ahabwa icubahiro c'umugabo wiwe ca " uwujejwe gucungera vyose", avuga ko ari we akibarongoye, ko gusa "atanguriye urugendo aho data yashikanye inkino". Kandi TB Joshua aracafise ikibanza gikomeye muri iryo shengero, amafoto yiwe amanitse hose mu nzu, inyigisho ziwe na zo ziguma zica ku mbuga hwaniro ziwe. Bisa kandi n'uko umupfasoni Joshua yasigaranye iragi ry'ingene umugabo wiwe yigisha - aho yaguma acishamwo indirimbo zo guhimbaza Imana - aho n'umudiho usa n'uwo umugabo wiwe aho yariko arahereza inkuka ari wenyene. Ko ari babiri bahuye ubwa mbere mu 1990 aho yamutangaza mu kumubwira ivyerekeye ubuzima bwiwe, yandika n'izina ryiwe ku rupapuro ata jambo na rimwe amubwiye. Bamaranye iminota 45 incuro ya mbere babonana, aho inyuma y'aho yaciye amusaba ko bokwubakana. 'Impano yo kunywanisha' Ni ihasa akaba n'imfura mu muryango w'abana indwi, yakuriye i Okala Okpuno mu ntara ya Delta mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nigeria. N'aho atatanguye ari umupasitori, yaramenyerejwe hanyuma arabuhabwa n'umugabo wiwe. Mu 2009, yavuze ko ari umuntu afise impano zidasanzwe mu kunywanisha - "imigenderanire y'abavyeyi n'abana, abubakanye n'ibindi bintu nk'ivyo." Abasitori bakuru muri Nigeria kenshi bavuga ko baronse umuhamagaro uva muri bibiriya - nk'abahanuzi Samuel na Paul - kugira bakorere Imana. Nk'uko bivugwa na Joshua, umuhamagaro wiwe waje igiye yerekwa mu kiringo c'imisi itatu aho yumva ijwi rigira riti:"Ndi Imana yawe. Ndaguhaye ubutumwa bweranda bwo kugenda gukora igikorwa ceranda c'Imana." Umupfasoni Joshua ntaravuga ko yaronse umuhamagaro nk'uwo, ariko kuri bamwe, kuba bakorana n'umugabo wiwe birakwiye. Iwelunmo agira ati:"TB Joshua yari intumwa kuva avuka, ariko umugore wiwe yamubaye kubera we. Umugabo n'umugore babaye umwe, kubera ubwo bumwe yaciye na we asigwa amavuta." N'aho bamwe mu bapfakazi b'abakuru b'amashengero muri Nigeria, nka Janet Onaolapo wa Abundant Life Gospel Mission na Margaret Idahosa wa Church of God Mission International , barongoye neza amashengero yabo, s'ibintu bisanzwe. Amashengero y'abapantekoti muri Nigeria yubakiye ku gihagararo c'abayashinze, akaba asambuka bamaze gupfa. Osinaike avuga ko ivyo bishobora gushikira na SCOAN. Avuga ati:"Iyo hageze ku bibazo vy'ishengero, abantu baza kurondera inyishu, kurondera ibitangaro, kuraba uwoba yareretswe ibiberekeye. "Icuka gitegerezwa kuzosubira hasi."

headline: Coronavirus-Kenya: igipolisi cafashe umudereva agiye guhamba isandugu y’abapfuye igaragara
text: Igipolisi muri Kenya caraye gihagaritse umudereva yanduye coronavirus n'abandi batatu babesha ko batwaye ikiziga. Abo bantu bahagaritswe bamaze kugenda ibirometero 370 batorotse bavuye ku mugwa mukuru Nairobi, batwaye isandugu y'ikiziga ariko iri gusa, imbere y'uko bahagarikwa bageze mu karere ka Homa Bay. Ivyo vyatangajwe n'umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Kenya Mutahi Kagwe, aho yamenyesheje kandi ko ako karwi kigize abapolisi bafise iyo sandugu iri gusa, bikaba vyabatumye bashobora kurengana ibirindiro vy'abapolisi bitari bike. Bageze muri ako karere ka Homa Bay, abajejwe umutekano baragize amakenga biba ngombwa ko bugurura iyo sandugu basanga nta kirimwo. Umushikiranganji Kagwe avuga ko uyo mudereva yaciye ashirwa ukwiwe, maze abo bandi nabo bari kumwe nawe bashirwa mu kibanza categuriwe abikekwa ko banduye kugira ngo bakurikiranwe. Haraciye ukwezi kumwe Kenya itangaje umuntu wa mbere yanduye coronavirus, igitigiri c'abandura kikabandanya congerekana ku minsi ku munsi. Kubera ikiza ca coronavirus kwinjira Nairobi canke gusohoka birabujijwe. Haraciye hafi indwi zibiri leta y'ico gihugu itangaje ingingo zibuza ukwinjira n'ugusohoka umugwa mukuru Nairobi be n'ibindi bisagara bitatu bifatwa ko vyinjiranywe na Covid-19. Umushikiranganji Kagwe avuga ko leta iriko irakora amatohoza ku makuru avuga ko abapolisi bajejwe uruja n'uruza ku mabarabara boba barya ibiturire kugira abantu barengane. Kenya imenyesha ko gushika ubu abashika 262 ari bo bamaze kwandura uwo mugera inyuma y'aho ejo umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu atangarije abandi 16 banduye. Uwo mugera watumye hafatwa ingingo yo guhagarika ibikorwa vyose vy'ubudandaji mw'isoko rizwi cane riri muri karitiye ya Eastleigh mu gisagara ca Nairobi. Abarongoye ishirahamwe ry'abadandaza bakorera muri iyo soko bavuga ko abadandaza bananiwe n'ugukurikiza ingingo zafashwe n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu, nko kutegerana, kwambara twa dutambara dupfuka amazuru n'umunwa be no gukaraba. Iryo soko rizwi ko rifise amaduka abayabaye ashika 18.000 hamwe n'ayandi manini cane ashika 60, agurisha ibidandazwa bitandukanye harimwo impuzu ziva mu Bushinwa, mu karere k'ubuseruko bwo hagati hamwe n'i Bulaya. Iryo soko kandi ni ihuriro ry'ingenzi ziva mu bihugu bitandukanye vya Afrika y'Ubuseruko no hagati bakora ibikorwa vy'ubudandaji. Umugera wa coronavirus ubandanya ukwiragira mu bundi burere bwa Kenya, umushikiranganji w'umutekano mu gihugu hagati, Dk Fred Matiang'i , akagabisha ko mu minsi iri imbere hashobora gufatwa n'izindi ngingo ruhasha mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera.

headline: Malawi: Ishavu kubera ikigongwe ku bategetsi bariye ibiturire
text: Umushikirizamanza mukuru muri Malawi yagirijwe gukingira abanyaporitike bo muri ico gihugu inyuma yo gutangaza  ikigongwe ku bantu bivye reta  canke bariye ibiturire. Thabo Chakaka-Nyirenda  yavuze ko mu mezi abiri ari imbere umuntu wese azokwemera ko yivye canke yariye igiturire/ruswa atazojanwa mu bucamanza mu gihe azoba yasubije amafaranga yagirizwa. Ivyo bishitse um gihe ibiro vya Malawi bigwanya ibiturire biriko biragerageza gufata umushikiranganji ajejwe ubutaka, Kezzie Msukwa, kubera ubusuma buvugwamwo amafaranga aharurwa muri miriyoni z'amadorari  burimwo umugwizatunga w'umwongereza  aba muri Malawi, Zuneth Sattar. Abo bagabo bompi  bavuga ko ata caha bakoze. Umukuru w'ikigo ca Malawi ca Demokrasi n'iterambere ry'ubutunzi, Sylvester Namiwa, yavuze ko gutangaza ico kigongwe vyerekanye ko uwo mushikirizamanza mukuru yitesheje agaciro ka poritike aca amusaba gutanga imihoho. Amaze kubona ko ariko aranegurwa cane, uwo mushikirizamanza mukuru yahaye ikiganiro abamenyeshamakuru avuga ko ico kigongwe kitazoba cerekeye ibintu vyoze bijanye no kwiba canke n'ibiturire.

headline: Tanzania: Perezida Magufuli yirukanye umukozi wa leta yatabuye Ikorowani
text: Perezida John  Magufuli wa Tanzania amenyesha ko yirukanye burundu mu kazi umukozi wa leta yatabuye igitabo ceranda c'Ikorowani, maze akwiragiza isanamu ku mbuga hwaniro ariko arayitabura. Yatangaje iyo ngingo uno munsi mu gihe yari mu birori vyo kwugurura ibiro vy'akarere ka Kigamboni mu gisagara ca Dar es Salaam. Ati: "Nyakwubahwa Jafo, hirya y'ejo niho numva, ko hari umuntu hariya i Kilosa yatabuye igitabo ceranda". "Ndagushimiye cane kubona warafashe ingingo yo kuba uramuhagarika, ariko jeho ndamwirukanye burundu. Mwandikire ikete ko yirukanywe burundu". "Atsinda urubanza canke atsindwa, uyo ntakiri umukozi wa leta, ntidushobora kubandanya dukorana n'abakozi b'ibijuju nk'abo muri ino leta". Mu ndwi iheze, umushikiranganji ajejwe ubutegetsi bw'intara n'amakomine, Selemani Jafo, yategetse ko umukozi w'ibiro vy'akarere ka Kilosa mu ntara ya Morogoro, Daniel Elimringi, ahagarikwa, ku caha co gutabura igitabu c'idini rya Isilamu, Ikorowani. Jafo ati: "Ni ukuri, iki kintu cakozwe n'umukozi nk'uyu nta ciza kizanira igihugu cacu kubera abanyagihugu bacu mu madini yose basanzwe babanye mu mahoro kandi bubahana mu butandukane". Iyo ngingo ya Jafo yafashwe inyuma y'aho isanamu yerekana uyo mukozi wa leta mu gisata c'ubudandaji mu biro vy'akarere ka Kilosa ariko aratabagura ico gitabo, ikwiragijwe ku mbuga hwaniro zitandukanye. Ikinyamakuru Mtanzania co muri ico gihugu kimenyesha ko uyo mukozi yamaze kurengutswa muri sentare, kandi ko yankiwe kuburana yidegemvya. Ico kinyamakuru gitangaza ko urwo rubanza ruzosubira kwumvirizwa ku wa 20 z'uku kwa kabiri.

headline: UN / ONU : Inama nkuru ijejwe umutekano isaba ihagarikwa ry’ivyegeranyo vyihariye ku Burundi
text: Inama nkuru ijejwe umutekano mw'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU isaba umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU gukura Uburundi ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bitegerezwa kwigwako mu buryo bwihariye. Mw'itangazo yasohoye, iyi Nama  irashima intambwe imaze gushikwako na reta y'Uburundi mu bijanye n'umutekano, ukurwanya ukudahana no mu bisata bitandukanye, ariko ikavuga ko hakiri vyinshi bigikenewe mu bijanye no kunywanisha abarundi, ubutungane, intwaro rusangi hamwe no kwubahiriza uburenganzira bwa kiremwa muntu. Irerekana kandi impungenge ifise ku bijanye n'ihohoterwa ry'uburenganzira bwa muntu, igasaba reta y'Uburundi gukorana n'ishirahamwe ONU kugira ngo itorere umuti ibi bibazo. Uburundi bwarinjiye mu ndyane za politike mu 2015 ziturutse ku ngingo ya Nyakwigendera Perezida Petero Nkurunziza yo gusubira kwitoreza ikindi kiringo, abamurwanya bavuga ko cari giteye kubiri n'ibwirizwa shingiro, ariko ubutungane bw'akarere bukaba bwavuze ko itari iteye kubiri n'itegeko na rimwe. Mw'iryo tangazo, umukuru w'inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano, arashima intambwe reta irongowe na Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye imaze gushikako mu bisata bitandukanye, ndetse no mu bijanye n'ibikorwa nyamukuru yashize imbere igihe ahikiriza reta yiwe. Hagati aho, avuga ko hari ibikorwa vy'ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu bibandanya guhagarika umutima, agasaba reta kubihagarika kandi igashengeza ababikora. Inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano iragaruka ku masezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha yateweko igikumu n'abanyeporitike ku wa 28 z'ukwa munani 2000, igasaba ko yubahiriwa. Mw'iryo tangazo ryayo ivuga iti: "Inama nkuru ijejwe umutekano kw'isi isaba ishirahamwe ONU, Umuryango w'ubumwe bwa Afrika, Umuryango w'ibihugu vya Afrika y'Ubuseruko, Inama mpuzamakungu ku karere k'ibiyaga binini (CIRGL/ICGLR) hamwe n'abo bose bafise uruhara mu masezerano ya Arusha gushira hamwe inguvu zabo bagafasha impande zose gushira mu ngiro amasezerano ya Arusha, yafashije gutsimbataza amahoro mu Burundi". Abanyepolitike batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi babona ko reta ya CNDD-FDD yahonyanze aya masezerano. Iyi nama irasaba umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU kwihweza gushasha ingingo yo kwama ishikiriza raporo y'ingene ibintu vyifashe mu Burundi uko amezi atatu aheze, ingingo yari yafashwe mu 2017 inyuma y'aho igihugu cinjiriye mu ndyane za politike mu 2015. Iti: "Inama isaba umunyamabanga mukuru guhagarika ivyegeranyo vya buri gihe ku kibazo c'Uburundi kandi ikipfuza ko Uburundi bwoza buraza mu vyegeranyo bisanzwe ku karere k'ibiyaga binini no kuri Afrika yo hagati". Muri Reta y'Uburundi, ni umunezero udasanzwe kuri iri jambo ryashikirijwe n'umukuru w'Inama ya ONU ijejwe umutekano, ku bijanye no gusaba ko Uburundi bwokurwa kuri urwo rutonde. Umukuru w'igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye yanditse ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter ati: "Ndashimiye Inama Nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano kubona yakirije yompi akamo nayiteye mu Nama ya bose. Kubwiwe, gukura Uburundi ku rutonde rwa ONU bifasha iki gihugu, incuti n'abagenzi kwitaho iterambere n'imibereho myiza y'abenegihugu. Eka n'umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire y'Uburundi n'ayandi makungu arashima aka kamo katewe n'iyi Nama ya ONU ijejwe umutekano. Albert Shingiro, ari nawe yahoze aserukira Uburundi muri ONU igihe iyi ngingo ifatwa, ashimira ibihugu avuga ko vyaterereye.

headline: North Korea: Kim Jong-un yiyemeje gukomeza guhingura ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda
text: Mw'ijoro ry'ejo ku wa mbere, indongozi ya Korea ya Ruguru Kim Jong-un yashikirije ijambo ry'ugusotorana kw'idefire y'igisirikare, aho yiyemeje kwongereza ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda vya nikleyeri. Iyi defire yo guhimbaza isabukuru y'igisirikare yashize kandi ahabona ibisasu vya misire birasa kure (intercontinental ballistic missiles, ICBM), bisanzwe bibujijwe. Mu kwa gatatu, Korea ya Ruguru yagerageje misire ya mbere nini ya ICBM, ubwa mbere kuva mu 2017. Amakungu yariyamirije bikomeye igerageza ry'ico gisasu. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kandi zarafatiye ibihano bitari bike ico gihugu inyuma yo kugerageza ico gisasu. ICBM, igisasu kigenewe kwikorera ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri, catumye Koreya ya Ruguru igira ubushobozi bwo kurasa kure cane gushika ku butaka bwa Amerika. Iyi defire kandi yerekanye misire zirasa kure zitererwa mu mazi, hampande ya za misire zinyaruka gusumba ijwi. Hagati aho, Kim ntiyigera ajugumizwa n'abamwiyamiriza gushika ubu. "Tuzobandanya dufata ingingo zo gukomeza no kwongereza inguvu za nikleyeri z'igihugu cacu", niko avuga, yongerako y'uko inguvu za nikleyeri "zitegerezwa kwama ziteguwe" kugira zikoreshwe umwanya n'umwanya, nk'uko biri mu nkuru y'ikinyamakuru ca reta, Korean Central News Agency (KCNA). Avuga ko ibirwanisho vya nikleyeyi vya Korea ya Ruguru mu bisanzwe ari igikoresho co kuzibira intambara, ariko ko bishobora gukoreshwa mu bundi buryo, aha agashaka gusubiramwo amajambo yahoze avuga, ko igihugu gishobora kwivuna mu gihe coramuka gitewe. Amasanamu y'iyo defire yasohowe n'ibinyamakuru vya reta yerekana igisasu Hwasong-17 kiri mu bindi birwanisho vyerekanywe muri iyo defire. Korea ya Ruguru ivuga ko yagerageje ubwa mbere igisasu ca misire ICBM mu kwa gatatu. Abahinga ba Korea y'Epfo bagumanye amakenga nimba iri gerageza ryagenze neza. Mu bisanzwe, Pyongyang (umugwa mukuru wa Korea ya Ruguru) yama yerekana ibirwanisho vyayo bishasha ku madefire ya gisirikare aho kenshi aba agizwe n'imirongo miremire ya vya bimodoka ntamenwa, vya muzinga n'abasirikare. Idefire ya gisirikare y'ejo ku wa mbere yarakurikiraniwe hagufi kuko uno mwaka Korea ya Ruguru imaze kugerageza ibisasu vya misire bitari bike, ivyatumye icuka kibi ciyongera kuri iki kirwa. Itorwa riheruka rya Yoon Suk-yeol nk'umukuru w'igihugu mushasha wa Korea y'Epfo, na we nyene yiyamiriza bikomeye ibikorwa vya Korea ya Ruguru, na ryo ryaratosekaje imigenderanire. Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi wa Korea y'Epfo Suh Wook yavuze ko Korea y'Epfo ifise ubushobozi bwo gutera ibirindiro vya misire vya Korea ya Ruguru - ivyatumye Pyongyang iterwa n'uburakari. Mu 2018 Kim Jong-un yashizeho ingingo ihagarika igeregeza rya misire zirasa kure n'ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri, inyuma y'ibiganiro hagati ya Donald Trump yari arongoye Amerika ico gihe. Ariko mu 2020, Kim yavuze ko atari akigendera ku vyo yiyemeje. Hagati aho, ubutegetsi bwa Biden bubandanya buvuga ko bwipfuza gusubira  gutangura ibiganiro ataco burinze gusaba, ariko gushika ubu nta shaka bwerekana ryo kuvugana na Korea ya Ruguru isaba ko ibihano ruhasha yafatiwe bifutwa. Ahubwo, Perezida Biden ashira imbere imigenderanire na Korea y'Epfo hamwe n'Ubuyapani, mbere akaba ashigikiye utwigoro tw'umukuru w'igihugu wa Korea y'Epfo, Moon Jae-In, two kworosha imigenderanire hagati y'ibi bihugu bibiri. Hampande y'urukurikirane rw'ibikorwa vyo kugerageza za misire mu ntango z'uno mwaka, amasanamu y'ibigendajuru yarerekanye Korea ya Ruguru iri mu bikorwa vy'igerageza ry'ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri ku kigo ca Punggye-ri mu kwa gatatu, ivyatumye haba ubwoba ko ico gihugu gishobora gusubira gutangura kugerageza ibirwanisho vya nikleyeyi hamwe na misire zirasa kure.

headline: R. Kelly ‘yarahohoteye Aaliyah afise imyaka 13 canke 14’, vyavugiwe muri sentare
text: R. Kelly yarahohoteye mu bijanye n'igitsina umuhisi yari umuririmvyi wa R&B Aaliyah igihe yari afise imyaka 13 canke 14, nk'uko umwe mu bahora ari abatamvyi biwe yabibwiye sentare. Uwo mugore, yasuye (yatanze ubuhamvya) kw'izina rya Angela, yabwiye intahe y'urubanza rwa Kelly ko yabonye uwo muririmvyi yabaye rurangiranwa akora ibijanye n'igitsina kuri Aaliyah bari muri bisi. Ivyo ngo vyoba vyabaye umwaka umwe imbere y'uko Kelly yubakana mu buryo bunyuranye n'amategeko n'uwo muririmvyikazi, igihe yari afise imyaka 15. Kelly, w'imyaka 54, arahakana ivyo yagirizwa vyose. Birimwo icaha kimwe c'imirimo iciye mu nzira z'ubukozi bw'ikibi - kimuvuga nk'uwari kw'isonga ry'ibikorwa vyari bifise intumbero igaragara yo  "guta mu mutego abagore bakiri bato n'abakobwa b'imiyabaga" ku mvo z'imibonano mpuzabitsina. Yanagirijwe ivyaha umunani vyo kurenga ku mategeko abuza urudandazwa rushingiye ku gitsina. Uwo muririmvyi, ku mazina yiwe yose ni Robert Kelly, ntiyagirizwa gusambanya ku nguvu canke kuburabuza, ariko abashikirizamanza barafise uburenganzira bwo kwerekana ivyemeza ivyaha bishoboka vy'ukwagirizwa imirimo iciye mu bukozi bw'ikibi, hatarabwe igihe vyabereye. Ivyashikirijwe na Angela bishitse ku munsi ugira 15 w'urubanza ruriko rurabera  Brooklyn i New York. Niwe yari uwagiriza Kelly agira cumi, akaba yavuze ivyari bimaze kuvugwa n'abandi vy'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina ku muntu agifise imyaka y'umwana. Yavuze ko yatanguye kugira imibonano mpuzabitsina na Kelly mu 1991, igihe yari akiri kw'i shure. Bahuriye mu giteramo mu nzu iwe igihe yari afise imyaka 15. Hari igihe kimwe, nk'uko yabivuze, yamutumiye kwinjira mu cumba c'uburyamo hanyuma amubwira "kwurira ngo ndamuje hejuru". Yaragonanywe, ariko mu nyuma aremera hanyuma bagirana imibonano mpuzabitsina. Kelly mu nyuma yamutumiye ngo aje mu bamuherekeza iyo agiye kuremesha ibiteramo. Yavuze ko uwo muririmvyi hari igihe yashira  igitutu ku bamwegereye kugira ngo bagirane imibonano mpuzabitsinna nawe, kandi agahana abadakurikiza ivyo yababwiye. Ivyashikiye Aaliyah  vyabaye mu 1992 canke mu 1993, igihe Angela n'uwundi mugore akiri muto bafata ingingo yo kuja  gukanga Kelly, nk'uko yabibwiye sentare. Amaze gusunika umwango wiwe w'icumba ukuguruka, yavuze ati: "Nabonye Robert na Aaliyah bari mu bihe vy'imibonano mpuzabitsina." Yongerako ati: ''Naciye nugara umwango buno nyene nca nsunika umukobwa yari inyuma yanje ndamwigiza kure y'umwango." Uwo yahora ari umutamvyi yavuze ko ivyo yabonye atigeze asubira kubivugana na Kelly. Imigenderanire ya Kelly na Aaliyah niyo yabaye ishimikiro ry'urubanza. Abari bamaze gusura bashikirije  ko bahinduye impapuro kugirango abo babiri bagire ubukwe igihe Aaliyah atari bwakwize imyaka. Ariko, Angela, abaye umuntu wa mbere yabwiye  abashashe muri urwo rubanza ko yabonye abo babiri bari mu bikorwa mpuzabitsina. Ivyo yavuze imbere ya sentare bitumye Aaliyah aba ariwe mugore wa mbere akiri muto Kelly yagirizwa kuba yarahohoteye. Uwo rurangiranwa,  yahavuye ava mu kwaha kwa Kelly akaba umuririmvyi akomeye ku giti ciwe, yapfuye mw'isangana ry'indege mu 2001. Ku wa mbere hasuye kandi umugabo agira kabiri mu bagiriza R Kelly. Kw'izina ritari ryo rya Alex, yavuze ingene Kelly yamufashe amajwi ahura n'abagore incuro "zidaharurwa ", rimwe na rimwe na Kelly arimwo. N'ubwo bahura ubwa mbere yari afise imyaka 16, yavuze ko Kelly yamushizeko igitutu co kugirana imibonano mpuzabitsina afise imyaka 20. Alex yavuze ati: "Ndibuka amvugisha, hanyuma akansoma ku  nguvu anamfyeta mu maso". Yavuze ko Kelly yamubwiye ngo "Ba umuntu yugurutse." N'uwahoze ari umwunganizi wa Kelly nawe yasuye ku wa mbere avuga ko atigeze abona iyo nyifato yo guhohotera yagirizwa n'ayandi masura. Ariko, Diana Copeland, yakoranye n'ico camamare imyaka 15, yerekanye ishusho yiwe nk'umuntu yari azi kwigumya, navyo bihurirana n'ivyari bimaze kuvugwa. Urubanza rurabandanya.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Diaz, Ronaldo, Longstaff, Origi, Cantwell, Coutinho, Traore
text: Liverpool iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano yo kugura umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa  Porto, umunya Colombia  Luis Diaz, 24, ku miriyoni zirenga 81 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Sun) Umusatirizi w'umunya-Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo, 36, ashobora kuva muri Manchester United mu ci riza mu gihe atokwishimira umumenyereza uyu murwi uzohitamwo burundu. (Star) Manchester United yemereye umukinyi wayo wo hagati Paul Pogba amasezerano mashasha y'igihe kirekire - ashobora kumuha umushahara w'ibihumbi birenga amajana 540 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika ku ndwi - kugira ngo uyu mufaransa w'imyaka 28 ntazohave agenda kuri gusa mu ci riza mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye na'uyu murwi azoba arangiye.  (Sun) Newcastle yanse ivyo yemerewe na Everton ku mukinyi Sean Longstaff.  Uyu mwongereza w'imyaka 24 akina hagati azorangiza amasezerano afitaniye n'aba Magpies mu mpera z'iri higanwa ry'uno mwaka, bakaba bizeye ko bazokwumvikana ku masezerano mashasha.  (Shields Gazzette) Newcastle n'uwundi murwi wa Premier League nyene iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Norwich Todd Cantwell, 23. (Sky Sports) Newcastle iripfuza kandi umukinyi w'inyuma wa West Ham umufaransa Issa Diop, 24, kandi iriko irategura imiriyoni zababa 13,5 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo batangure urugamba rwo kumugura. (L'Equipe via Hammers News) Umusatiri wa Liverpool umubirigi Divock Origi, 26, hamwe n'umusatirizi wa Bournemouth umwongereza Dominic Solanke, 24, bari mu bakinyi bariko barakurikiranirwa hagufi na  Newcastle mu gihe iriko irondera uwosubirira Callum Wilson yavunitse. (Telegraph - subscription required) Imirwi ibiri yo muri Premier League iriko irarwanira kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona umunya Brésil Philippe Coutinho, 29, akaba yiteze gufata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe kuri uwu wa gatanu.  (Sky Sports) Umumenyereza wa Paris St-Germain Mauricio Pochettino ariteguye kwakira ico bomwemerera cose kugira ngo abe umumenyereza wa Manchester United. (Sun) Tottenham iriteguye gusubira gutangura urugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Wolves umunya-Espagne Adama Traore, 25. (Athletic - subscription required) Chelsea nta mugambi ifise wo gutanga amafaranga akenewe kugira ngo igumye burundu umukinyi wo hagati yatijijwe ava muri Atletico Madrid Saul Niguez, 27.  (Express) Manchester United ifise amahirwe make yo kugura umukinyi n'umwe muri kuno kwezi ariko ifise umugambi wo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati mu ci riza, igashobora kuzorondera Declan Rice, 22, wa West Ham.  (Talksport) Arsenal yemeye kuzotanga umukinyi azokwiyongera ku mafaranga yemeye gutanga kugira ngo ironke umusatirizi wa Fiorentina umunya-Serbia Dusan Vlahovic, 21. (Ben Jacobs - CBS) Watford yemeye kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Liverpool umwongereza Nathaniel Phillips, 24, yamaze kubwirwa ko afise uburenganzira bwo gusezera uyu murwi muri uku kwezi.  (Football Insider) Aba ba Hornets kandi bamenyesheje umukinyi wabo w'inyuma w'umwongereza Danny Rose, 31, ko atazosubira gukinira uyu murwi kandi ko afise uburenganzira bwo kwigira muri kano kadirisha k'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi. (Sky Sports) Leicester City n'iyindi mirwi itari mike ya Premier League izotegerezwa gutanga imiriyoni zababa 45 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika nimba ishaka kugura umusatirizi wa Club Bruges, Charles de Ketelaere, ariko yipfuza cane kwimukira muri Premier League muri uku kwa mbere. (Voetbal Nieuws - via Leicester Mercury) Barcelona iriko iraraba ko yotira umusatirizi wa Manchester United umufaransa Anthony Martial, 26, harimwo n'umugambi wo kuzoshobora kumugura burundu mu mpera z'iri higanwa.  (Sport - in Spanish) Newcastle nayo nyene iripfuza gutira Martial kugira ngo ashobore gusubirira umusatirizi Callum Wilson yavunitse. (Times - subscription required) Barca kandi iripfuza umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea umunya Danemark Andreas Christensen, 25. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Everton na Newcastle yahambije Arsenal mu rugamba rwo kurondera umunya Brésil Bruno Guimaraes, 24, asanzwe akina hagati muri Lyon mu Bufaransa.  (Standard) Umunyegori wa Liverpool  Loris Karius, 28, vyanse ko yimukira muri Greuther Furth, inyuma y'aho uyu murwi wa Bundesliga mu Budagi unaniriwe no kuronka amafaranga asabwa kugira ngo imukure i  Anfield. (Fussball Transfers via Daily Star) Umusatirizi wa Jamaica Michail Antonio, 31, yateye igikumu ku masezerano mashasha muri  West Ham azomushikana mu ci rya 2025. (90 Min)

headline: Omicron - USA: Biden yakajije ingingo z'ingendo kubera abagwayi bashasha
text: Prezida Joe Biden yashize ahabona ingingo zikaze zishasha  ku ngendo mu ntumbero yo kugwanya Covid-19 mu gihe Amerika yemeza ko hariho abantu bari ku rushi banduye ubwoko bushasha bwa Omicron mu gihugu cose. Kuva mu ndwi iza, abantu bavuye mu bindi bihugu baja muri Amerika, harimwo n'abanyamerika, bategerezwa kwipimisha Covid umusi umwe imbere yo gufata urugendo, n'aho boba bararonse urucanco. Abaheruka gukira bashobora kwerekana "icemeza ko bakize". Kwambara agapfukamunwa mu ndege, mw'igariyamoshi n'imodoka rusangi zunguruza abantu bizobandanya gushika hagati mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Incanco imiliyoni n'imiliyoni  zitangirwa muhira kandi zirihwa n'amazu y'ubwishingizi zizobandanya kuboneka. Abantu cumi banduye  Omicron baragaragaye muri Amerika: California, Colorado, Minnesota, New York, no muri  Hawai aho abategetsi bavuga ko uwo muntu yayitowe ata rugendo yari aherutse kugira. Abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri ico gihugu bamenyesheje ko babonye ibimenyetso bidahambaye cane kuri abo bagwayi. Ubwo bwoko bushasha bwa corona gushika ubu bumaze gutorwa mu bihugu 30 nk'uko vyandikwa mu cegeranyo. Ntibiramenyekana nimba Omicron, ubwoko bwa corona bwihinduye cane, bwoba bwandukira cane canke ko bushobora kuba butumva urucanco. Amerika iriko irahimiriza  abantu bakuze bose kwongera gufata urucanco kugira rwongerereze inguvu umubiri, mu gihe hari imburi ko abazokwandura uwo mugera wa Covid bazokwongerekana muri iki gihe c'ubukonje (winter/hiver). Mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu i Maryland, Biden yavuze ati: "Tugiye kugwanya ubu bwoko bushasha dukoresheje ubuhinga n'ukwihuta, nta kajagari no guta umutwe." Yaheruka gusubiramwo kwemeza ko uwo mugambi "utarimwo gusubira kwugaranwa". Abanyamerika barenga imiliyoni 40 baramaze kwongerwa urucanco rwongerereza inguvu umubiri, ariko abashika hafi imiliyoni ijana  bandi barashobora kuruhabwa nk'uko bivugwa na prezida. Ibigo vyo gucandagiramwo  imiryango amajana n'amajana bizoshirwaho mu gihugu cose mu kugerageza kwongereza igitigiri c'abicandagisha mu bana n'urwaruka. Abategetsi bavuga ko amazu y'ubwishingizi ashobora gutegekwa gusubiza abakiriya babo bashika imiliyoni 150 incanco baguze baronkeye muhira, kandi ko incanco imiliyoni 50 zishobora gutangwa ku buntu ku bantu batagira ubwishingizi biciye mu mavuriro n'ibitaro vyo hagati mu gihugu. Hagati aho, gusubizwa amahera y'incanco ntibizoba biratangura gushika mu kwezi kwa mbere, inyuma y'ikiringo c'akaruhuko kariko karabamwo ingendo nyinshi. Amerika n'ibindi bihugu vyinshi vyarahagaritse ingendo ziva mu bihugu umunani vyo mu bumanuko bwa Afrika. Abahinga muvyo amagara y'abantu bavuga ko kubuza ingendo bizobatwara umwanya wo kwiga ubwo bwoko bushasha bwa Covid. Ku musi wa kane, umukuru w'igisagara ca New York Kathy Hochul yavuze ko hatowe abantu batanu bafise Omicron mu ntara yiwe. Umugabo  yari yitavye inama i Manhattan mu mpera z'ukwezi kwa cumi na rimwe, bamutoye Omicron. Umwe muri abo banduye  n'umugore w'imyaka 67 yari amaze gucandagwa wo mu karere ka Suffolk yari amaze imisi afise ibimenyetso vyo gukorora no kumeneka umutwe, nk'uko bivugwa na Hochul. Abandi bane bari mu gisagara ca New York. Uwundi vyemejwe ko yanduye ku wa gatatu n'uwo i California, hanyuma i Colorado ku musi wa kane habonetse ingenzi zine zaheruka kuva muri Afrika y'Epfo. Uwasanganywe Omicron i Minnesota yaheruka mu rugendo rw'imisi itatu mu gisagara ca New York ahariko harabera inama. Uwo i Hawai, atari bwacandagwe kandi yigeze kugwara coronavirus mu 2020, nta rugendo yaheruka kugira. Ibi vyerekana ko ukwandukizanya mu mibano bishobora kuba vyaratanguye nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi muvyo amagara y'abantu. Uwo i Hawai yari afise ibimenyetso bibayabaye kandi yari yarafashe ingingo yo kutava muhira nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi.

headline: Russia yasubiye kwemerera North Korea incanco za Covid-19 mu gihe ibintu bimeze nabi
text: Uburusiya bwasubiye kwemerera Korea ya Ruguru incanco za Covid, mu gihe bivugwa ko ingingo zikomeye zo kuzibira coronavirus ziriko zituma abanyagihugu baterwa n'inzara ruhebwa. Pyongyang (umugwa mukuru wa Korea ya Ruguru) yaranse incanco hamwe n'imfashanyo yari yemerewe n'ibihugu bitari bike. Ahubwo yahisemwo kwugara imbibe zayo mu ntumbero yo kugerageza kuzibira uwu mugera ariko ibi vyagize ingaruka mbi ku bucuruzi yakorana n'Ubushinwa. Imfungurwa, ifumbire n'ibitoro vyari bisanzwe biva muri iki gihugu. Kim Jong-un yaramaze kwemera ko igihugu ciwe gihanzwe n'ubukene bw'imfungurwa, akavuga ko ibintu "bimeze nabi". Yavuze ibi mu kwezi guheze yongera abwira abanyagihugu kwitegurira "ibihe bibi cane" vyibutsa ikigoyi cihaye inkumbi mu myaka ya 1990. Ibihano iki gihugu cafatiwe mu vyo ubutunzi na vyo bizwi ko vyunyuye ibintu ku bijanye n'ubukene bw'imfungurwa. Uburusiya bwarabwiye Korea ya Ruguru ko "atari bose bashobora kwihanganira izi ngingo nk'izi zitari bwigere zibaho kandi zikomeye gutya ", hanyuma ejo ku wa gatatu umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire, Sergey Lavrov, akaba yavuze ko Moscou yemereye incuro zitari nke Pyongyang incanco. Yasubiye kandi kwemera guha izo ncanco ico gihugu mu gihe cozikenera. Korea ya Ruguru ivuga ko ata muntu n'umwe mu gihugu arandura Covid, ariko abahinga bafise amakenga. Mu ndwi iheze, umutegetsi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru yarabogojwe yagirizwa "ikosa rikomeye" ariko ritamenyeshejwe, bikikekwa ko ryoba rifitaniye isano n'ivy'uwu mugera. Ibimenyeshamakuru vyo muri Korea ya Ruguru vyagiye kumenyesha mu nyuma ko uyo mutegetsi yari Ri Pyong Chol, umwe mu bategetsi bakuru ba gisirikare. Kim Jong-un yaridogeye kandi abategetsi bakuru ku tunenge tujanye na Covid-19, nk'uko ikinyamakuru ca reta ya Korea ya Ruguru cabitangaje mu kwezi guheze. Cari ikintu kidakunze kuboneka cerekana ko iki kiza giteye isibe muri Korea ya Ruguru. Ubushinwa na Korea y'Epfo biri mu bihugu bitari bike biherutse kwemerera Pyongyang incanco.

headline: DR Congo: Ekleziya Gatorika isaba abapatiri bavyaye kuva mu mabanga
text: Urwandiko rw'Inama y'Abepiskopi ba Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, CENCO, rwanyereye rugashika mu minwe y'ibinyamakuru rusaba abapatiri bo muri Congo bavyaye abana gutanga imihoho mu mabanga yabo y'ubusaserdoti, nk'uko vyandikwa n'ikinyamakuru RFI. Inama y'abepiskopi CENCO, itegeka ko kizira y'uko abapatiri barangura amabanga y'abubatse. Urwo rwandiko rusohotse mu gihe Papa Francis yimirije kugendera Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo muri Mukakaro (7) uyu mwaka. Muri uru rwandiko rw'impapuro 19 rwiswe "A l'école de Jésus-Christ. Pour une vie sacerdotale authentique" (ni ukuvuga: Kw'ishure rya Yezu/Yesu Kristu/Kristo. Ubuzima nyabwo bw'ukwihebera Imana), abasenyeri bavuga ko ubuzima bw'igipatiri budashobora kubangikanwa n'ubuzima bw'ukuba serugo. CENCO isaba uwihebeye Imana uwo ari we wese afise umwana "gusaba uruhusha Papa rwo kuva muri ayo mabanga", nk'uko bisubirwamwo na RFI. Uru rwandiko ruvuga ko mu gihe hogira abihebeye Imana bovyanka, musenyeri ashobora kwitura Vaticano kugira ngo ifate ibihano vyo ku rwego rwa nyuma, ibi bigasigura kwirukanwa burundi muri Ekleziya. Hari igice kimwe muri uru rwandiko rwa CENCO kivuga ibijanye n'abana b'aba bapatiri hamwe na ba nyina babo. Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi ivuga ko ishaka "gushira ibintu ahabona" ku bijanye n'ingene ibintu bimeze kuri bo, ikibutsa ko muri rusangi usanga "banenwa mu kibano". Ico gice kigira kiti: "Ni ngombwa kuri twebwe ko twemeza ko abo bantu bariho kandi ko bababarira ku mutima".i: "Ni ngombwa kuri twebwe ko twemeza ko abo bantu bariho kandi ko bababarira ku mutima". Ikibazo c'abihebeye Imana bavyara abana muri Ekleziya Gatorika ni ikibazo giteje impari no mu bindi bihugu vy'akarere no kw'isi. Mu mpera z'umwaka uheze uwari Musenyeri mukuru wa Paris, Musenyeri Michel Aupetit, yasavye imbabazi aca atanga n'imihoho mu mabanga yiwe kubera "umubano udasanzwe n'umugore". Ico gihe kandi, Patiri Wenceslas Munyeshyaka w'umunyarwanda, yahagaritswe ku kuba padiri wa paruwasi ya Brionne mu Bufaransa inyuma y'uko bimenyekanye ko yemeye mu nzego z'ubutegetsi ko ari se w'umuhungu yavutse mu kw'indwi 2010.

headline: New York: Urubanza rwa R Kelly kw'ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina rwatanguye
text: Urubanza rw'uyu muririmvyi wo muri Amerika aririmba umudiho wa R&B rwatanguriye muri sentare yi Brooklyn i New York. Iki camamare cagirizwa amagendu, guhohotera bifatiye ku gitsina hamwe no gutanga igiturire; ivyaha amaze guhakana inshuro nyinshi. Bimwe mu vyaha bishinjwa uyu muririmvyi - asanzwe yitwa Robert Sylvester Kelly - ni ivyo kuva mu myaka 20 iheze. Niyahamwa n'ivyaha vyose yagirizwa arashobora gupfungwa imyaka mirongo. Amajambo atanguza urubanza yasomewe amugwi w'abanyagihugu baca urubanza (jury) ugizwe n'abagabo indwi hamwe n'abagore batanu, bakazofata icemezo ku coshikira uyu muririmvyi w'imyaka 54. Kelly yagirizwa kuba yari kizigenza mu gikorwa camaze imyaka mirongo ibiri aho haronderwa abagore hamwe n'abakobwa badakwije imyaka bagashorwa mu busambanyi. Icegera c'umushinjacaha Maria Melendez mw'ijambo ritanguza urubanza yavuze yuko "uru rubanza rwerekeye "inyamaswa y'impigi". Yavuze ko R Kelly "ari umuntu yakoresheje ibinyoma, kuryosharyosha, gutera ubwoba hamwe no gukoresha inguvu mu kuganza abo yahohotera kandi abikora yidegemvya mu kiringo c'imyaka myinshi". Kelly yagirizwa kuba yarabwiriza abo yahohotera kwerekana ko "bamwihaye rwose" kandi bakubaha ataguharira amategeko yiwe yose, harimwo yuko bafungura canke bakaja mu bwiherero ari uko abahaye uruhusha, ntibarabe abandi bagabo, kandi bakamwita "Daddy" (Papa). R Kelly yavuze ko ari umwere kuri ivyo vyose yagirizwa kandi ahakana yivuye inyuma ko ata kibi na kimwe yakoze. Uru rubanza, rwasibijwe kenshi kubera ikiza ca covid kandi rukaba rwitezwe kumara nk'ukwezi kumwe, vyitezwe ko ruvugirwamwo ivyagiriji vy'ihohotera ryakozwe na Kelly, harimwo ubuhamya bwa bamwe mu bagore hamwe n'umugabo ashika kuri umwe bamwagiriza. Naho yogirwa umwere, Kelly arindiriwe n'ibidi vyagiriji bifatiye ku gitsina muri Illinois na Minnesota, aho naho akaba yarahakanye ivyo ahagirizwa. Kelly amaze imyaka ibiri mw'ibohero. Yimuriwe i Brooklyn mu kwezi kwa gatandatu akuwe i Chacago ku bw'uru rubanza. Uyu mugabo w'imyaka 54 azwi cane ku ndirimbo ziwe zakunzwe zirimwo Ignition (Remix), I Believe I can Fly, Bump n'Grind na If I Could Turn Back the Hands of Time. Ari mu nzira yerekeza aho urubanza rubera, umuhinguzi w'ibiganiro wa BBC, Monica Miller yagize ati; "Ni umunsi wa gatatu udasanzwe i Brooklyn. Abashigikiye R. Kelly bariko bararengana bavugira hejuru bati "Rekura R Kelly". Kelly hamwe n'abakorana nawe bagirizwa kurondera abagore n'abakobwa batarakwiza imyaka bakabashora mu busambanyi budakurikije amategeko hamwe n'uwo muririmvyi. Ivyo vyagiriji ni ivyo kuva mu myaka y'1990, vyinshi bikibanda ku bifatwa nk'uruhigi rwarondera abakobwa b'imiyabaga. Kuri ubu R Kelly akurikiranywe mu maleta menshi agize Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ivyagiriji bikaba birimwo guhohotera bifatiye ku gitsina, guhohotera uwutarakwiza imyaka, gufata amasanamu y'urukozasoni y'abatarakwiza imyaka, igiturire hamwe no kunaniza ubutungane. Ubushinjacaha bwashingiye urubanza ku bagore batandatu batavuzwe amazina. Ivyagiriji icenda vyashizwe imbere bivuga ku kugirira nabi abantu bo mu ciswe Jane Doe, batatu muri bo bikavugwa ko bari batarakwiza imyaka y'ubukuru igihe bahohoterwa. Abashingwamanza ba Kelly vyitezwe ko bavuga yuko bimwe muri ivyo vyagiriji ari ivy'abagore bari baramukunze ariko ntibaronke ico bashaka, mu gihe mu ntango bari bemeye guhuza ibitsina nawe.

headline: Igikombe c’isi Qatar 2022: Twigire kuri kahise ibishobora gushika
text: Na  Rob Haywood U﻿munyamakuru w'inkino wa BBC Ni iki ibikombe vy'isi vy'imbere y'aha bishobora kutwigisha ku vyo twokwitega muri  Qatar? Igikombe c'uno mwaka coba kigoye? Ibihugu vyaronse itike yo kuja muri iri higanwa bibanje gukina urukino rwa play-off vyohebuzwa ubu nyene? Ubwo gukinira muri Asia vyoba bizokworohera ibihugu bimwe bimwe? Turaraba ibi vyose - hamwe n'ibindi vyinshi - kugira turabe ibihugu bishobora guhabwa amahirwe muri kino gikombe c'isi yose c'uno mwaka. Hamaze kuba amahiganwa atandatu ahuriyemwo igitigiri nk'iki c'ibihugu 32 bigabuwe mu mirwi umunani umwe umwe ufise ibihugu bine bine , akaba ari ayo mahiganwa atandatu aduha inkino 384 tugiye kwihweza kugira turabe niba hari ibija biragaruka. Mu mwihwezo ukurikira, tugiye kurabiha hamwe aya mahiganwa atandatu - kuva mu 1998 gushika 2018 - - kiretse bibaye ngombwa ko tuja hanze y’aho. Mu mahiganwa atatu aheruka kubera i Bulaya, mu bibanza 16 vyo muri ca gice co gukuranamwo (canke igice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma), imigwi y'i Buraya yafashemwo 10. Iyo ihiganwa ribereye hanze y'Ubulaya, iki gitigiri caramanuka nko gushika ku ndwi. Imirwi yo muri Amerika y'Ubumanuko niyo ica ihatomborera, mu gihe igitigiri c'imigwi ya Asia ishike muri ico gice yigwiza na kabiri  iyo ihiganwa ribereye hanze y'Ubulaya. Ibikombe bitanu  ku mahiganwa atandaatu aheruka vyatwahanywe n'ibihugu vy'i Buraya -  kandi uretse Ubufaransa bwatsinze iri higanwa mu 1998 buronse itike kubera ari bwo bwari bwaryakiriye, ibindi vyose vyari vyitwaye neza mu mahiganwa yo kurondera itike. Ibindi bihugu bine vyatahukanye iki gikombe - Ubutaliyano mu 2006, Espagne mu 2010, Ubudagi mu 2014 be n'Ubufaransa mu 2018 - wasanga birangije bidatsinzwe na rimwe canke ugasanga bitsinzwe nka rimwe gusa mu nkino cumi zo kurondera itike. Urugero rw'izi nstinzi (mu gihe iyo banganije biharurwa nk'inusu y'intsinzi) rwari ku 80% no kurenga. Mu nkino zo kurondera itike mw'ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka, ibihugu vyinshi vya Bulaya vyarashitse kuri uru rugero: Danemark (95%), Ubwongereza n'Ubudagi (90%), Serbia n'Ububirigi (87.5%), Espagne, Ubuswisi n'Ubufaransa ( 81.3%) hanyuma Croatia n'Ubuholande ( 80%). Twisunze urutonde rwa FIFA rw'ingene ibihugu bikurikirana kw'isi, turashobora kubona ingene iri higanwa rishobora kuzoba rikomeye.  Raba ubutandukane bw'ingene ibi bihugu 32 bihagaze kuri buri higanwa: Kubera amategeko ya FIFA agena igitigiri c'imirwi iva kuri buri mugabane, hari ibihugu bitari muri iri higanwa kandi ku rutonde rwa FIFA biri imbere ya bimwe mu vyaronse itike. Ibihugu bikomeye bitazokwitabira iri higanwa ry'uno mwaka ni Ubutaliyano - buza mu kibanza ca gatandatu - ariko  Colombia (17), Peru (23), Suède (25), Ukraine (27), Chili (29) na Nigeria (32) vyari kuba vyararonse itike iyaba urutonde rw'isi ari rwo rwakurikizwa mu kugena abaryitabira hatarabwe aho igihugu giherereye. Mu gihe ibihugu indwi vyo ku rugero rwo hasi biri muri rino higanwa bishobora kuboneka ko ari vyinshi, uravye ahubwo ni igitigiri gito kuva iri higanwa ritanguye guhuriramwo ibihugu 32. Hari amahiganwa yagiye yitabirwa n'ibihugu bishika 11 biri inyuma ya 32 vya mbere. Rero iki gihe ni ihiganwa rizoba rikomeye cane. Hanyuma turavye ingene ibihugu bihagaze, biboneka ko Ubwongereza na Pays de Galles (Wales) biri mu murwi utoroshe na gato muri  Qatar - ni wo murwi wonyene uhuriyemwo imirwi iri muri 20 ya mbere dufatiye kuri uru rutonde rwo ku wa 30 z'ukwa cumi. Imirwi yo mu gikombe c'isi yose ca 2022  n'ingene ibihugu bihagaze kw'isi (Gushika   ku wa 30 z'ukwa cumi. ) Pays de Galles mu mahiganwa ya mbere yitabiriye mu myaka 64, yamye ironka itike ibanje gukina play-offs  kumwe na Pologne hamwe na Portugal. Ukibibona ubwa mbere, womenga vyaciye mu canzo - ariko akahise ka vuba kerekana ko ibihugu bironka itike muri iyo nzira bikora ibintu bikomeye. Tugereranije imirwi ya Bulaya, 67% y'ibihugu bironka itike biciye muri play-offs  birashika mu gice co gukuranamwo, ugereranije na 57% gusa biba vyaronse itike mu buryo bworoshe. Inkino zibiri za nyuma (finales)  z'amahiganwa atandatu aheruka zahuje ibihugu vya Bulaya vyaronse itike mu ma play-offs - ibi bikaba ari Ubudagi mu 2002 hamwe na Croatia mu 2018. Vyongeye, Croatia (1998) na Turukiya (2002) vyashitse mu  gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma (demi-finales) , mu gihe ibindi bihugu bitatu navyo vyashitse mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma (quart de finales). Kuva mu myaka ya 1990, mu bihugu biba bifise igikombe, ikimaze gutsinda muri  gice c'inkino zo gukuranamwo (knockout) ni kimwe gusa, iki naco ni Ubudagi igihe butsinda Ghana mu 2006. Mu vy'ukuri, kuva mu 1962, nta gihugu kirashobora kugumana igikombe, mu gihe mu mahiganwa 14  kuva ico gihe, ibihugu bibiri ari vyo  vyonyene bimaze kugera mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma. Ibihugu biba bifise igikombe kenshi bitangura kugira ingorane ku rukino rwa mbere. Mu mahiganwa 12 kuva Ubwongereza butsinze urukino rwa mbere aho bwahura na Roumanie mu 1970, ibihugu bitatu vyonyene biba bifise igikombe ni vyo bimaze gutsinda urukino rwa mbere. Mbere bine muri bitanu biba bifise igikombe nta n'uko vyavuye mu nkino zo mu mirwi (phase des groupes). Kubera iki? Imyaka ine ni igihe kirekire mu mupira w'amaguru. Uravye, usanga 50% vy'abakinyi batsindiye ico gikombe ari bo batangura urukino rwa mbere rwo mu mirwi mw'ihiganrwa rikurikira. Igihe Ubutaliyano bukina urukino rwa mbere bukanganya na Paraguay mu 2010, bwakinishije batatu gusa mu bari batsindiye igikombe ca 2006. Nimba witeze ko imirwi ibiri ya mbere ari iyizoba ihagaze neza ku rutonde mpuzamakungu muri buri murwi, uzotangara. Ni ibisanzwe ko bitandatu muri 16 bikina inkino zo gukuranamwo usanga bigira gatatu na kane mu mirwi yavyo. Ni urugero rutangaje rwa 32%. Muri ano mahiganwa atandatu nyene, imirwi yo hasi yatsinze inkino zo gukuranamwo ku rugero rwa 34%. Inkino zitatu muri zine zababaje ni izatsinzwe n’ibihugu vyakiriye amahiganwa - ku ncuro zibiri biciye ku ma penalties, incuro imwe nayo biciye ku gitsindo c'inzahabu. Uko bizogenda kwose mu ndwi zitanu ziri imbere, hashobora kuba ibintu bizobabaza abantu, bitangaza, eka ibintu bizoteza impari.

headline: Kardinari w'i Vatican Becciu mu rubanza rwo kunyonyeza miriyoni 412 z'ama dorari
text: Umukardinari  w'ishengero Katorika yigeze kuba akorana hafi cane na Papa François agiye gucirirwa urubanza i Vaticano, yagirizwa gukoresha nabi amafaranga y'ishengero mu kamaramaza kahombesheje amafaranga menshi mu mugambi wo kugura inyubakwa i Londres/London. Kardinari Angelo Becciu, w'imyaka 73, niwe mwubahwa  akomeye cane mu barongoye Ekereziya Katorika  mu bihe vya none agiye imbere y'ubucamanza  kubera gukekwako ivyaha bijanye n'amafaranga. Yagirizwa gusohora amafaranga y'amanyaburaya, Euro, angana na miriyoni 350 (arenga miriyaridi 800 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) y'ishengero mu mugambi utagenze neza  wo kugura inyubakwa  muri Chelsea watumye hatakara amafaranga menshi cane. Arahakana kuba hari icaha yakoze. Abandi bantu icenda bakurukiranwa muri urwo rubanza nabo bagirizwa ivvyaha birimwo kuronka amafaranga ku nguvu canke kw'iterabwoba, kunyuruza no gukoresha nabi ububasha bw'akazi. Kardinari Becciu yirukanywe mu kazi na Papa François mu kwezi kw'icenda igihe amakuru y'ugukoresha nabi amafaranga yaja ahabona. Amatohoza yamaze imyaka ibiri yerekanye ingene Vaticano yatakaje miriyoni z'ama euro, arimwo amashikanwa, inyuma yo kugura inyubakwa  yahora ari ububiko bwa Harrods kuri Sloane Square  Avenue muri Chelsea, mu 2014. Uwo mukardinari yahora  araba amashikanwa mu biro bijejwe amafaranga ya  Vaticano. Ivyaha akurikiranwako birimwo kurungika amafaranga mu rudandazwa rwari rurongowe n'abavukanyi biwe mu ntara y'amavukiro yabo muri Sardaigne. Urwo rubanza rwitezwe kumara amezi menshi. Intahe zibiri zizosasa muri iyi ndwi - ku bibazo  vy'ubuhinga - zishobora kwungururizwa mu kwezi kw'icumi. Abandi icenda bagirizwa barimwo: Abagirizwa bose barahakana kuba barakoze icaha. Hamwe bokwagirwa n'ivyaha, bashobora guhanishwa umunyororo canke ihadabu, canke vyompi. Abashikirizamanza bavuga ko umuranzi  akorera Londres, Gianluigi Torzi,  yanyonyeje Vaticano mu gukoresha amafaranga yayo mu kugura imitahe yo muri iyo nyubakwa yo muri Chelsea yari guca isubirwawo ngo ivemwo amazu y'agaciro yo kubamwo. Torzi avuga ko ibivugwa bishingiye ku kwumva ibintu ukutariko. Ubutariyano buriko buragerageza ngo burabe ko  Ubwongereza bumubarungikira. Mu kwezi kwa kane Papa yafashe ingingo ko aba kardinari n'abepiskopi bagirijwe ivyaha bashobora gukurikiranwa n'abacamanza basanzwe - aho gucirirwa imanza n'aba kardinari nk'uko vyahora. Umukuru mushasha ajejwe amafaranga muri Vaticano, Juan Antonio Guerrero, avuga ko Vaticano iriko irashiramwo inguvu zitari bwigere ziboneka kugira ikorere ku mugaragaro mu bijanye n'amafaranga. Ku wa 24 ukwezi kw'indwi, ku ncuro ya mbere Vaticano yashize ahabona ido n'ido ry'imitahe yayo: amazu 4.051 mu Butariyano n'izishika 1.120 i Londres, Paris, Geneve  na Lausane. Furera Guerreo yagize ati: ''Twamenyereye gukorera mw'ibanga, ariko twamenye ko mu vyerekeye ubutunzi, gukorera ku mugaragaro bidukingira kurusha gukorera nw'ibanga."

headline: Africa: Aho abantu biyahura cane kurusha ahandi kw’isi
text: Ishami rya ONU riraba amagara y’abantu kw’isi OMS/WHO  rivuga ko Afrika ifise urugero rwa mbere runini rw’abantu bicwa no kwiyahura kw’isi. Mw’itangazo, OMS yavuze ko Africa irimwo ibihugu bitandatu kuri 10 biza kw’isonga ry’aho abantu biyahura cane kw’isi. Umugabane wa Afrika bivugwa ko ufise umuganga umwe w’indwara zo mu mutwe ku bantu 500.000 – incuro 100 munsi y’urugero rusabwa na OMS. Hafi abantu 11 ku bantu 100.000 barapfa biyahuye buri mwaka muri Afrika, urugero ruri hejuru y’urw’isi aho bigereranywa ko abantu icenda ku 100.000  ari bo bapfa biyahuye buri mwaka, nk’uko OMS ivuga. Indwara zo mu mutwe zifise uruhara rungana na 11%  mu bishobora gutuma umuntu kwiyahura, ku bw’iryo shami. OMS ivuga ko n’abaganga b’indwara zo mu mutwe bake bahari ubasanga mu bisagara. Uwumuyobozi wa OMS muri Afrika  Matshidiso Moeti, avuga ko kwiyahura ari ikibazo gikomeye c’amagara y’abantu n’ubwo ari gake usanga cahawe ikibanza c’imbere mu migambi y’amagara y’abantu. Iryo shami ubu ryataguje isekeza ryo ku mbuga hwaniro ryo gukinga kwiyahura muri Afrika  kugira abantu bakangurirwe kumenya ico kibazo no kucirinda. Iryo sekeza ryo kumbuga hwaniro ryatangujwe mu mwiteguro wo guhimbaza umunsi  mpuzamakungu wahariwe amagara yo mu mutwe, uba buri tariki ya 10 Gitugutu (10).

headline: Ndayishimiye: ‘Karashize ingani, abakozi ba Reta bitwe abatishoboye?’
text: Umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko ibibazo Uburundi bwagiye buracamwo vyatumye igihugu gisigara inyuma mu bisata bitandukanye. Akebura  abakozi gukura amaboko mu mpuzu kugira bagwize umwimbu. Mw'ijambo yaraye ashikirije Abarundi buca bahimbaza umusi mpuzamakungu wahariwe abakozi, Perezida Ndayishimiye ahamagarira Abarundi kwemanga ko basamaye hanyuma bafate ingingo yo gukura amaboko mu mpuzu. Mu gihe abakozi ba reta bari biteze ko umusi nk'uwu ari akaryo keza ko kwongerwa imishahara, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko batokwitega ko bahava bongerwa agashirukabute mu gihe "n'umwenda Reta yafashe mu myaka iheze kugira ihembe abakozi utararihwa". Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko gushika ubu hari abakozi bironderera kwongerezwa impembo mu gihe ataco bariko bafasha reta kugira ironke uburyo bukwiye, bakagomba ko reta isaba imfashanyo kugira ngo ibahembe. Ati: "Uno musi urasanga umukozi wa Reta ashaka agashirukabute gakirurutse ariko we nyene abona abanyonora ikigega ca reta akihorera canke akabakingira ikibaba. Mbere hari naho usanga ari we nyene ariko aranyonora agaca asaba impembo irengeye. "Hari abandi bareka ibidandazwa vyari gutanga amakori bigaca ku ruhande ariko ukwezi kwahera agasaba impembo. None yibaza ko iyo mpembo ica iva hehe, ko hari aho nyene?" Perezida Ndayishimiye ntiyumva ivyo gusaba imfashanyo, kuko kubw'iwe, abakeneye imfashanyo ni abatishoboye. Ahamagarira  abarundi gutahura ko ivyo bagiye baracamwo  vyatumye basamara. Ati: "None ko umuntu wo gufashwa ari uwutishoboye, koko karashize ingani, abakozi ba Reta bitwe abatishoboye?  Jewe si uko ndavyumva; sindanavyemera; ni co gituma bintera isoni gusega". Perezida Ndayishimiye abona ko uwutakoze atari akwiye guhembwa ukwezi guheze kuko ku bw'iwe, "ni we ngumba y'ukuri kuko imana yamuhaye ubwenge n'inkomezi hanyuma abipfisha ubusa". Avuga ko muri kino gihe igihugu kirangwamwo amahoro, agasaba Abarundi guhaguruka bakiyishura ivyo bataye, bakarangura imigambi yo kwiteza imbere. Ati: "Twarabuze vyinshi, twarataye umwanya mwinshi kubera ububegito bwa benshi muri twebwe bwatumye tubura amahoro. "Muri uwo mwanya twataye, ibikorwa bitakozwe ni vyinshi kandi biraturindiriye. "Kurima, tukworora kijambere ntavyo twitaho; twarira ikija mu nda gusa, umusesekara ntiwotubajije, tukitwaza imyibutsa yataye igihe ngo ivy'ejo biraba ab'ejo. "Guhingura itunga kama uwo wari umugani kuko biteba kwimbuka ... gutunganya aho abamukerarugendo ... vyari umugani." "Ivyo vyose vyari akazi koduha itunga dukeneye kandi n'ubu karacaturindiriye".Atera akamo abarundi ko bova hasi bagakora kugira ngo bahamvye ibindi bihugu kuko vyovyo vyamaze kugera kure. Ati: "Abandi barakamaze. Barubatse amabarabara, barubaka amashure, barubaka ingomero z'umuyagankuba, barubaka ivyo ba mukerarugendo bakenera, barubaka ibikoresho vy'ubuhinga ngurukanabumenyi, barubatse amahinguriro, ubu ntaco basigaje. "Twebwe, ivyo vyose biracaturindiriye, dukure amaboko mu mpuzu dukore".

headline: Burundi - AMB: Umukuru mushasha Bright Ndayishimiye avuga ko guterana amajambo bigiye guhagarara
text: Bright Olivier Ndayishimiye yatorewe kurongora ishirahamwe ry'abaririmvyi mu Burundi, Amical des Musiciens du Burundi, AMB, mu kiringo c'imyaka itanu,  avuga ko bagiye gukorera hamwe mu guteza imbere umuziki. Umuhinyanyuzi w'umuziki Bright Olivier Ndayishimiye agiye kurongora iryo shirahamwe mu kiringo c'imyaka itanu, icegera ciwe akaba ari umupfasoni Kimana Edith, umupfasoni w'umuririmvyi Mugani Desire azwi kw'izina ry'ubuhizi rya Big Furious. Uwo mukuru mushasha wa AMB avuga ko azi ingorane zihanze umuziki w'i Burundi kandi bigiye gutorerwa inyishu. Agira ati: "Kugira ibintu bigende neza, dukeneye gusa kumenya ico [dushaka], aho tukironderera n'ingene tukirondera. "Tugiye guhanahana ivyiyumviro n'abo dukorana mu mwuga nk'abahinyanyuzi b'umuziki, abamenyeshamakuru eka mbere n'abawumviriza kugira dusenyere ku mugozi umwe. Bright Olivier Ndayishimiye avuga ko ivyadindije umuziki w'i Burundi ari umwumvikano muke urangwa mu baririmvyi no guterana amajambo ku mbuga hwaniro. Avuga ko bigiye gutora inyishu. Ati: "Tugiye guhimiriza abaririmvyi kuza baraganirira muri AMB ivyo batumvikanako batarinze kwararazanya ku mbuga hwaniro. "Ingorane zirabaho ariko si vyiza ko zandagara mw'ibarabara." Ikibazo gikomeye gihanze umuziki w'i Burundi, n'uko utungisha abandi abawukora ataco bawukuramwo. Haraciye imyaka itari mike hari ikigo kijejwe gukingira ivyahinguwe n'abantu, OBDEA (Office Burundaise des Droits d'Auteurs), ariko ntikibuze ko abantu baguma bavuza banashiramwo indirimbo z'abandi. Uwo aramutswa AMB mushasha avuga ko ivyo biri muri bimwe bagiye gutorera inyishu. Ati: "Vyari bigoye kugira dukingire ivyacu twese kandi na twebwe ubwacu tutumvikana. Habura aho tuganirira neza ico kibazo kitwega twese. Ubu ko habonetse abarongozi bashasha ba AMB, bemewe na bose, ico kibazo kizova mu nzira. Bright Olivier Ndayishimiye avuga kandi ko bagiye gushira inguvu mu kwunga ubucuti n'abandi baririmvyi bo mu bindi bihugu, kugira umuziki ndundi umenyekane mu makungu. Agira ati: "Tuzogendera amashirahamwe y'abaririmvyi yo mu bindi bihugu, tugiriranire amasezerano azotuma bavuza imiziki yacu ku buryo hari uwugiye kugirisha igiteramo muri ico gihugu, azosanga izo ndirimbo bazizi. Kuva ishirahamwe AMB rishingwa mu 1986, n'ubwa mbere abaririmvyi bo mu Burundi bategura amatora ya bose, inyuma y'imyaka myinshi batwarwa mu biringo mfata kibanza. Bright Olivier Ndayishimiye asanzwe azi ivyerekeye umuziki kuko yatanguye ari umutamvyi, imbere y'uko aba DJ. umumenyeshamakuru hanyuma umuhinyanyuzi (Producteur). Yize ivyo gufata amajwi muri Cinema, ubu akaba ari mu batunganya agakino 'Agashi' gaca ku maradiyo amwe amwe yo mu Burundi gatanga inyigisho ku nyifato ijanye n'amagara meza.

headline: Sentare ntahinyuzwa mu Burundi yanse ibisabwa n'abaregwa kwica Ndadaye, ariko ngo bazunguruza
text: Abunganira abaregwa kugandagura Ndadaye avuga ko bazunguruza

headline: Intambara ya Russia na Ukraine: Umukuru w'umutumba n'umuryango wiwe wose barishwe n'Abarusiya
text: Abategetsi ba Ukraine bavuga ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zagandaguye umukuru w'umutumba, umugabo wiwe n'umuhungu wabo. Ibi - hamwe n'ibindi biziga vyatowe vy'abagabo batanu bari bambaye impuzu zisanzwe - vyiyongereye ku bimenyetso vy'ivyaha vy'agahomerabunwa bibandanya vyibonekeza muri Ukraine. Umunyamakuru wa BBC Yogita Limaye  yarishikiye muri ivyo bibanza bibiri vyabereyemwo ubu bwicanyi. Mu gisagara ca Bucha, hanze gato ya Kyiv, amahano yabaye mu gihe Uburusiya bwari bwigaruriye iki gisagara aratanguye kuja ahabona. Mu nzu yo mu kuzimu y'inyubakwa yahoze ari ikigo c'irerero ry'abana, ibiziga vy'abantu batanu birambaraye hasi - abagabo batanu bambaye impuzu zisanzwe, amaboko aboheye mu mugongo. Bamwe bari barashwe mu mutwe, abandi nabo mu gikiriza. Ntibari bwamenyekane, ariko abategetsi ba Ukraine bavuga ko aba bagabo bari bafashwe bugwati n'ingabo z'Uburusiya zica zirabica. Vlad, umwe mu baduganye ibi biziga babivana muri iyo nzu yo mu kuzimu, avuga ati: "Twarumvise baraswa. Twarumvise ama mines aturika muri ako karere. Aha mu micungararo yacu huzuye ama mines. Ni igihamana kubona tukiri bazima". Vlad avuga ko yumvise umugabo ahamagara umugore wiwe yari yasohotse hanze kurondera amazi, hanyuma yumva amasasu menshi.
