Mu nyuma yasanze uyo mugabo n'umugore bapfuye. Ati: "Ni ibintu vyinshi nshobora kukubwira ariko reka ndabireke. Ndipfuza kuvyibagira". Hafi yaho gato, ku mutumba wa Motoyzhyn, ibiziga bine bihambwe mu mva ntoya mw'ishamba. Bitatu vyaramenyekanye - Olha Sukhenko w'imyaka 51, umugabo wiwe Igor n'umuhungu wabo Oleksander yari afise imyaka 25. Olha yari umukuru w'umutumba. Bizwi ko we n'umuryango wiwe bishwe bagirizwa ko bafasha abasirikare ba Ukraine, baca batabwa ku nkengera y'ishamba, bahambwe igice, ukuboko kwa Ohla no mu maso h'umuhungu wiwe biboneka mw'ivu. Umukuru w'igihugu ca Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky  yaragendeye Bucha ejo ku wa mbere. Yagize ati: "Dushaka kwereka amakungu ivyabereye hano, ivyo igisirikare c'Uburusiya cakoze, ivyo Uburusiya bwakoreye Ukraine yari yibereye mu mahoro. Vyari ngombwa ko mubona ko aba bantu bari abasivire". Avuga ko Ukraine yiteguriye kuganira n'Uburusiya. Yabwiye BBC ati:  "Ukraine ikeneye amahoro. Ntidushobora kuba mu ntambara. Imisi yose igisirikare cacu cama kiriko kirarwana, ariko ntidushaka ko ubuzima bw'amamiriyoni y'abantu buzimangana. Nico gituma dutegerezwa kuganira n'Uburusiya". Mu tundi turere twa Bucha, hari amakuru y'ibinogo rusangi vyimbwe kugira bihambwemwo ibiziga vyarengeye ivyumba vy'uburuhukiro. Amasanamu n'amareresi yerekana abasivire bishwe babohewe amaboko mu mugongo. Ibimenyetso vy'ivyaha vy'agahomerabunwa muri kino gisagara cigeze kuba kirangwamwo ituze vyabandanije vyiyongera ejo kuwa mbere. Umukuru w'igisagara, Anatoliy Fedoruk, avuga ko abasivire n'imiburiburi 300 bagandaguwe. Nta bitigiri ntabanduka biramenyekana. Uburusiya burahakana ko ata ruhara bubifisemwo, bukavuga ko ibi bimenyetso vyose vyerekanywe ari irementanya, ariko aya majambo yiyamirijwe n'uburakari bwinshi. Ibimodoka vy'intambara vyabwo vyaturiwe vyuzuye ibarabara rimwe rya Bucha. Ubu turazi bimwe mu vyabereye hano, mu burengero gato bwa Kyiv. Ariko hari ibisagara bitari bike muri Ukraine bikiri mu minwe y'Uburusiya. Hari ubwoba ko ivyabonetse hano bishobora no kuboneka n'ahandi, ko hashobora kwibonekeza ibindi biziga mu vyumba vyo mu kuzimu no mu mva ntoya.

headline: Ingene Caf yahagaritse pansiyo ya Hayatou hanyuma ikaza kumutera iteka
text: Niyo yashikirizwa iryo teka ryo  kuba umukuru w'iteka w'urwego rujejwe umupira w'amaguru muri Africa (Caf) kuri uyu wa gatanu, bishobora kuba intango nshasha y'ingene iryo shirahamwe rifata Cameroun kuva akuwe mu kwezi kwa gatatu mu 2017. Iryo teka aja kuritererwa mu gihugu ciwe c'amavukiro Cameroun mu birori vyihariye buca ico gihugu cakira inkino z'ihiganwa ry'imigwi y'ibihugu-Championnat d'Afrique des Nations. Hayatou w'imyaka 74 yatwaye Caf kuva mu 1988 gushika mu 2017, imyaka yamaze yubaka ishirahamwe atako ryari ryifashe akarishikiriza umusubirizi wiwe Ahmad rifise amahera angana  na miliyoni 130 z'ama dollar  kuri konte n'igitigiri c'amahiganwa kiguma ciyongera. MU kwezi guheze Caf yanditse iti: ''iyo ndongozi yakoze bigashimwa yatwaye Caf imyaka 30.Iri teka niryo kwemera uruhara yagize mw'iterambere ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Africa''. N'ubwo biri uko, hahesze amezi ane gusa akuwe, umugwi nshingwabikorwa (ExCo) w'ubutegetsi  bushasha bwa  Caf bwahisemwo guhagarika guhemba pansiyo ''indongozi yakoze bigashimwa''. ''Ku bwanje, kwari ukwihora,'' n'uko Suketu Patel, yabaye icegera ca mbere ca Hayatou imyaka myinshi  yabwiye BBC Sport Africa. ''Bashaka guhana abatwaye kera ku mvo ntazi''. Mu nama yabereye muri Maroc mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 2017, ExCo yemeje ingingo ko abayigize bose, bafata ikiruhuko c'izabukuru canke bagikora-badashobora kuronka pansiyo kuko batigeze bayiziganiriza. Mu kanya gato, impembo y'imyaka hafi 30 y'akazi ka Hayatou, yari yaranse umushashara ufadika wa Caf gushika atange imihoho, yaciye igwizwa n'ubusa. Ariko iyo ngingo ntiyakoze kuri Hayatou gusa, yakoze no ku bandi basezeye amabanga muri ExCo bari basanzwe kuba boronse pansiyo  mu kuba bararangeje imyaka 8 bakora, muri abo harimwo  Patel, yahoze ari umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'umupita w'amaguru muri Seychelles. Hayatoyu na Patel-yari yinjiye muri ExCo mu 2004,  bompi bavuye muri Caf mu 2017 mu kwezi umunye Madagascar Ahmad yatangaza abakurikirana ivy'umupira w'amaguru muri Africa mu kwegura uwari amaze imyaka myisnhi ariwe aramutswa iryo shirahamwe. Amatora amaze kuba muri Ethiopia, abarongoye Caf n'urwego rw'umupira kw'isi Fifa ntibavyakiriye kumwe, Mu 2017, Fifa yahaye  Hayatou igiti c'iteka c'icegera c'umukuru wayo -igiti yari  amaranye imyaka myinshi kuko umukuru wa Caf asanzwe aca afata ico kibanza-mu nama yayo yabereye Bahrain. Haheze amezi abiri, ubwo bemeza uturusho ku bagize komite gushika ku $60.000 ku bagize ExCo, $70.000 ku vyegera vy'umukuru wa Caf, na $80.000 ku mukuru wa Caf , komite nshingwabikorwa ya Caf yaciye ihagarika pansiyo ya Hayatou. Patel  avuga ko bimaramaje kubona badaha ikibanza uruhara umuntu yagize muri kjahise k'ishirahamwe. ''Iyo aba jewe  iryo teka ryabo sinari kuryemera'' ''Ni ibara kuri Caf. Kuki bemeye ko Fifa imutera iteka  amaezi atatu inyuma yo kuva mu mabanga? Kuri Caf nico kintu categerezwa guca kigirwa amatora aheze,'' ''None ubu ko bagiye muri Cameroun, baramuhaye iryo teka. Mbabarira ariko baracerewe''. Ahmad ntaco yashimye kuvuga igihe BBC Sport Africa yamubaza igituma Caf yahisemwo guhagarika pansiyo ya Hayatou amaze gufata ubutegetsi. Ariko yari yabwiye BBC mu kwezi jwa gatandatu  ko yibaza ko uwo munye Cameroun akwiye kuba umukuru w'iteka-''ivyo ni ngombwa''-ariko ko ingingo y'urwego nshingwabikorwa itegerezwa kubanza kuboneka. Bompi Hayatou na Patel barashingishije urubanza kuri iyo ngingo yo kubima agahembo ko mu kiruhuko c'izabukuru. Ariko izo mpari uyu munsi zirashirwa ku ruhande.

headline: AC-Génocide ivuga ko icegeranyo ca CVR ari 'ikinyoma'
text: Emmanuel Nkurunziza arongoye ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya ihonyabwoko, AC-Génocide, ariyamiriza icegeranyo c’umurwi CVR, akavuga ko ari "ikinyoma".

headline: DR Congo: Umukuru w'umugwi ujejwe amatora atanguye akazi mu mpari
text: Umukuru w'umugwi ujejwe amatora muri Repuburika y'Intwaro ya Demokrasi ya Congo (RDC) yarahiriye amabanga mu mpari nyinshi kw'igenwa ryiwe. Denis Kadima, agiye kuyobora umugwi ujejwe amatora CENI,  afise igikorwa gikomeye co gutunganya amatora yimirije kuba mu 2023. Igenwa ryiwe ntiryahurijweko na bose, imigwi y'amadini - ariyo yitwa ko igena abagize CENI - ntiyumvikanye. Itandatu muri iyo migwi umunani  yaratoye Kadima - ariko ishengero katorika hamwe n'ishengero ry'abaporoti rinini rya ECC (Église du Christ au Congo), aravyanka avuga ko igenrwa ridaciye mu nzira yo. Ibihugu bifashanya na RD Congo birimwo ahanini ibigize ishirahamwe rya Buraya, n'iryo shirahamwe nyene hamwe kandi na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Ubuyapani, Ubwongereza na Korea y'Epfo, birababazwa no kubona igenwa ry'abagize CENI ritumvikanyweko n'abo biraba kandi ari ''ikintu gikomeye mu gutanga icizere ku matora yimirije". Ivyo ayo mashengero avuga bishigikiwe n'abashingamateka batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi nabo batemeje Kadima mu nama nshingamateka. Inama nshingamateka ya RDC yemeje igenwa rya Kadima ku wa 16 ukwezi kw'icumi n'ubwo imigwi y'amadini itari yamwumvikanyeko. Mu mpera z'indwi iheze, prezida Félix Tshisekedi yaciye yemeza igenwa rya Kadima n'abandi bantu 12 bagize uwo mugwi n'ubwo hakiri izo mpari. Batatu bategerezwa guserukira uruhande rutavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ntibaragenwa ariko umukuru w'igihugu Tshisekedi yavuze ko yizeye ko bazosanga abandi. Abagize umugwi CENI bategerezwa kuva mu migambwe iri mu nama nshingamateka, nk'uko amategeko abitegekanya. Mw'itangazo vyasohoreye hamwe, Amerika, ibihugu vyinshi bigize ishirahamwe rya Buraya, Ishirahamwe rya Buraya nyene, Ubuyapani, Korea y'Epfo n'Ubwongereza, bisaba abategetsi babijejwe kurondera ko urwo rwego rw'amatora rwitabwa n'abo biraba bose cane cane imigambwe ya poritike n'amashirahamwe adaharanira inyungu za poritike (société civile) no gukomeza ko barugirira icizere. Ivyo bihugu vyibutsa ko biha agaciro cane ugukorera  mu muco, ubwigenge, ukudakumira, ukudahengama n'ugutanga icizere ku matora yimirije. Amatora aheruka muri Congo yabaye mu 2018. Ay'umukuru w'igihugu yatsinzwe na Félix Tshisekedi mu mpari zatumye uwatangajwe ko yatsinzwe, Martin Fayulu, atemera ivyayavuyemwo.

headline: Inama ya G7 yemeje integuro yo gusohora amafaranga kugira ihangane na China
text: Abategetsi b'ibihugu bitunze kurusha ibindi kw'isi bihurikiye mu citwa G7 bemeje integuro yo gufasha ibihugu bikenye n'ibiri mu nzira y'amajambere mu bikorwa vy'iterambere, ni mu ntumbero yo guhangana n'Ubushinwa. Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika avuga ko ashaka ko umugambi wo gufasha ibihugu bikenye ushigikiwe na Amerika, wiswe Build Back Better World (B3W), uba uwo ku rwego rwo hejuru ugasubirira umugambi nk'uwo w'Ubushinwa. Umugambi w'Ubushinwa uzwi nka Belt and Road Initiative (BRI), uramaze gufasha ibihugu bitari bike mu kubironsa amagari ya moshi, kwubaka amabarabara n'ibivuko. Ariko ni umugambi unegurwa cane, uvugwa ko winjije ibihugu mu madeni y'umurengera. Mw'itangazo basohoye inyuma y'inama yariko ibera mu karere ka Cornwall mu Bwongereza, abategetsi ba G7 bavuga ko bazoshira imbere ubucuti bushingiye ku "kwubahiriza indangagaciro, bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru hamwe no gukorera mu muco". Hagati aho, ntibatomora iyo amafaranga azova mu gushira mu ngiro uwu mugambi. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubudagi Angela Merkel avuga ko batari bwagere ku gihe co gusohora amafaranga. Amerika iranegura cane Ubushinwa ku nteguro yabwo y'ugukomeza igifatwa nk'imigenderanire "ishingiye ku madeni". Abategetsi ba G7, umurwi w'ibihugu indwi bitunze kurusha ibindi kw'isi bivuga ko bishira imbere intwaro rusangi, bavuga kandi ko biyemeje gushiraho iyindi nteguro y'ingingo zo kurwanya ibindi biza bishobora kwiyadukiza muri kazoza. Muri izi ngingo harimwo kugabanya ikiringo co gukora no kwemeza incanco n'imiti yo kurwanya Covid-19 kikaja musi y'imisi ijana. Kuri uyu wa Mungu niho bategekanya gutangaza iyi nteguro, hampande y'itangazo rirangiza iyi nama barimwo. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson niwe arongoye iyi nama y'imisi itatu iriko ibera mu karere ka Carbis Bay. Ni ibiki ibihugu vy'uburengero bw'isi vyoba bimaze gukorera Ubushinwa gushika ubu ? Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, Amerika, Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya, Ubwongereza hamwe na Canada vyafatiye ibihano Ubushinwa. Ibi bihano vyafatiwe abategetsi bo hejuru mu ntara ya Xinjiang bagirizwa ihonyanga ry'agateka ka zina muntu bakorera aba Islam  bo mu bwoko bw'aba Uyghur, muri vyo hakaba harimwo ukubuza ingendo muri ivyo bihugu hamwe no gufata amatungo yabo. Abantu barenga umuriyoni bo  mu bwoko bw'aba Uyghur z'izindi nkehwa nibo bazwi ko bapfungiwe mu makambi ari muyi iyo ntara yo mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw'Ubushinwa. Reta y'Ubushinwa yagirizwa gutera ubugumba abagore b'aba Uyghur no gusambura imiryango, mu gutandukanya abana n'abavyeyi babo. Itohoza ryakozwe na BBC ryashizwe ahabona mu kwa kabiri ririmwo amakuru yemeza ivyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu, ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina hamwe n'iyicarubozo bikorerwa abapfungiwe muri ayo makambi. Ubushinwa bwaciye bwihora mu gufatira ibihano abategetsi b'aba nya Burayi.

headline: Ihiganwa rya mbere rya Basketball Africa League ryasibijwe muri Senegal kubera coronavirus
text: Intango y'ihiganwa ku nshuro ya mbere rya Basketball Africa League (BAL) yasibijwe kubera ubwoba bw'ikiza ca coronavirus. Ihiganwa rya mbere rya BAL ryagomba gutangura ku murwa mukuru wa Senegal, Dakar, itariki 13 z'ukwa gatatu, kandi nta tariki nshasha yatanzwe. Iri higanwa rishasha ry'ababigize umwuga, ryavutse ku gufashanya hagati y'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu rya basketball, International Basketball Federation, na NBA ryagomba kwitabirwa n'amakipe 12 yo muri Afrika. Umukuru wa BAL, Amadou Gallo Fall yagize ati: "Twisunze impanuro za leta ya Senegal mu bijanye n'umwitwarariko utewe n'ugukwiragira kw'ikiza ca coronavirus, inkino zitanguza ihiganwa BAL zigijwe inyuma. "Birambabaje kuba tudashoboye gutanguza iri higanwa ry'amateka nk'uko twari twabiteguye ariko turindiranye igishika ko BAL itangura ku tariki izoza hanyuma." Abateguye ihiganwa bavuga ko umutekano w'abafana, abakinyi, amakipe hamwe n'abakozi ari kirumara cane kandi ko bazovyihweza neza imbere y'uko batangaza iyindi tariki mu minsi iri imbere. Gushika isaha 08:00 ku masaha mpuzamakungu ya GMT, hari hamaze kwemezwa abantu babiri banduye coronavirus muri Senegal. Inkino hirya no hino kw'isi zarahuye n'ibibazo kubera coronavirus, ariko BAL ibaye ihiganwa rya mbere rikomeye muri Afrika ryigijwe inyuma kubera iki kiza. Ahandi, ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Tanzania, TFF, ryabujije abakinyi guhana amaboko imbere y'uko inkino zitangura. TFF ivuga ko iriko irakurikiza impanuro z'ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara zo kwirinda guhana amaboko mu ntumbero yo kubuza iki kiza gukwiragira mu gihugu. Kuwa kabiri, haragaragaye amafoto yerekana umukuru w'igihugu ca Tanzania John Magufuli akozanyako ibirenge mu kuramukanya n'uwundi munyepolisi hako bohanye ibiganza. Ntawanduye coronavirus araboneka muri Tanzania gushika ubu, mu gihe abakekwa bose basanze atayo bafise nyuma yo gupimwa.

headline: Burundi: CNDD-FDD yemejwe burundu ko yatsinze amatora yo ku wa 20/05/2020
text: Kuri uyu wa kane igenekerezo rya 04/06/2020, sentare ijejwe kwibahiriza ibwirizwashingiro mu Burundi ihejeje kwemeza ko umugambwe uri ku butegetsi mu Burundi CNDD-FDD ari wo watahukanye intsinzi mu matora yabaye ku wa 20 z'ukwezi kwa gatanu guheze. Iyo sentare yari ifise iminsi itarenga icenda kugira ngo yemeze ivyavuye muri ayo matora nk'uko yabishikirijwe n'umurwi ujejwe gutegura amatora muri ico gihugu. Iyo sentare yatangaje ko ibirego vyatanzwe n'umukuru w'umugambwe CNL utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi Agathon Rwasa ari nawe yari yawuserukiye mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu bidafise ishingiro. Uyo mugambwe wariyamirije ibiharuro vyatangajwe na CENI ukaba waritwaye uvuga ko ivyo biharuro, kuva ku rwego rwa komine gushika ku rwego rw'igihugu, ari ivy'ubusuma, ukavuga ko ari wo watsinze amatora yose. Ibiheje gutangazwa n'iyo sentare rero bihejeje kwemeza icese ko Evariste Ndayishimiye, yitoje ku giti c'umukuru w'igihugu kw'izina rya CNDD-FDD ari we agiye kurongora igihugu mu myaka indwi iri imbere. Uyu mukuru w'igihugu ahejeje kwemezwa akaba agiye kurongora igihugu yisunze bwirizwashingiro rishasha ryemejwe mu 2018, ritandukanye n'iryo mu 2005 ryakomotse ku masezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha yo mu 2000, ryategekanya ikiringo c'imyaka itanu. Ku munsi wa mbere w'indwi iheze, umurwi CENI umaze gutangaza ibiharuro vy'imfatakibanza vyerekana ko uwo mugambwe uza ubwa kabiri, umushingamateka Agathon Rwasa yabwiye BBC ko mu gihe iyo sentare itotunganiriza umugambwe wiwe ko bazoca bitura sentare y'umuryango wa Afrika y'Ubuseruko. BBC yashatse kumubaza igihe azokwiturira iyo sentare ariko ntiyashoboye kumuronka.

headline: Centrafrique: UN yisubije igisagara cari cafashwe n'abagwanyi
text: Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU rivuga ko ryisubije igisagara ca Bambari co muri Republika ya Centrafrique (CAR) cari casubiye kwigarurirwa n'abagwanyi ku musi wa kabiri. Umuvugizi wa ONU yavuze ko ingabo zagiye kugarukana amahoro hamwe n'abajejwe umutekano b'ico gihugu ari bo bahagenzura, abitwaje ibigwanisho bakaba bahungiye mw'ishamba. Yavuze ko abasivire bari bahunze intambara batanguye kugaruka. Bitegekanijwe ko haba amatora rusangi muri ico gihugu ca Centrafrique ku musi w'Imana. Reta yagirije uwahoze arongoye ico gihugu, Francois Bozize, ko yishize hamwe n'imigwi yitwaje ibigwanisho mu ntumbero yo gutembagaza ubutegetsi - ivyo we ahakana. Uburusiya n'Urwanda vyararungitse abandi basirikare baharurwa mu majana mu gufata mu mugongo reta, mu gihe abitwaje ibigwanisho bariko baragerageza gushika ku mugwa mukuru Bangui.

headline: Ibintu bitanu bisigura Messi avavanura na Barcelona
text: Ivya Messi muri FC Barcelona birarangiye. Inyuma y'imyaka 21 muri uno murwi wo mu ntara ya Catalan, uyu musatirizi nta yandi masezerano agiye kuronka, n'aho impande zompi zari zamaze gushika ku masezerano y'intangamarara, hasigaye akanyuma gusa. Ariko hari akantu kabaye mu minota ya nyuma. Ico Barcelona yakoze conyene, kwabaye ukumenyesha ko ata masezerano mashasha "ashobora kuba kubera inzitizi zishingiye ku mafaranga n'inzego". Ivuga iti: "Impande zompi zirababajwe n'uko ivyipfuzo vy'uyu mukinyi be n'umurwi bidashobora kuja mu ngiro". "Barça irakengurukiye n'umutima wayo wose uruhara rw'uyu mukinyi mu gukomeza uwu murwi, ikaba imwipfurije kuroranirwa mu buzima bwiwe bwite, ndetse no mu mwuga wiwe". Messi ntaco yashimye gushoka atangaza. Nk'uko amakuru aca mu kinyamakuru ca Catalan,  Mundo Deportivo, abivuga, "uyu musatirizi wa Argentina arababaye cane", ku buryo ata mugambi afise wo kugira ico abivuzeko. Ariko none, ni ibiki vyoba vyatumye iyi migenderanire, imwe mu yikomeye cane mu gisata c'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi muri kino gihe, itabandanya? Nta kintu Messi atatsindiye mu gihe cose amaze muri Barca: ibikombe cumi vyose vya La Liga, ibikombe bine vyose vya Champions League/Ligue des Champions (Ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere ku mugabane wa Buraya), ibikombe indwi vy'ihiganwa ryitiriwe umwami (Copa del Rey), ibikombe bitatu vya European Super Cup/ Supercoupe d'Europe (urukino ruhuza imirwi yatsindiye Champions League na Europa League), hamwe na bitatu vya Club World Cup (ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere ku migabane). Ku gatwe kiwe, avuye muri uwu murwi awutsindiye ibitsindo 672 vyose, bikiyongera ku mupira w'inzahabu (Ballon d'Or ) yatahukanye incuro zitandatu zose. Messi, ubu afise imyaka 34, yaboneka ko yorangirije umwuga wiwe muri uwu murwi yinjiyemwo afise imyaka 13. Ariko rero, Messi nta munezero yari agifise muri Barcelona. Mu mwaka uheze, yariyamirije uburongozi bw'uwu murwi, anamenyesha ko yipfuza kuwusezerera, mu kuvuga ati: "Haciye igihe ata nteguro ihari kandi nta kintu, babandanya bafyinata bapfukapfuka gusa". Ico gihe, mu kiganiro n'ikinyamakuru ngurukanabumenyi, Goal, yavuze ati: "Umukuru w'umurwi [Josep María Bartomeu] yahora avuga ko ihiganwa rirangiye nshobora guhitamwo niba nshaka kugenda canke niba nshaka kubandanya, amaherezo yiwe ni uko ivyo yiyemeje ata na kimwe yakurikije". Kugira ngo yirinde impari mu butungane, uyu munya Argentina yahisemwo kwihangana mu bubabare hamwe no kwinumira kugira ngo ntahangane n'umurwi wamukujije. Igenda rya Josep María Bartomeu n'umuzo wa Joan Laporta ku burongozi bw'uwu murwi wa Catalan, vyahinduye imigambi ya Messi. Uyu mukinyi yari yishimiye imigambi ya Laporta yo kunagura uyu murwi. Mw'ihiganwa rirangiye, uwu murwi ntiwashoboye gushika ku ntego zawo zose: waratsindiye Copa del Rey, ariko warangije ihiganwa rya La Liga ari uwa gatatu, unatsindwa mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Spanish Super Cup (ruhuza umurwi watahukanye ihiganwa La Liga rya Espagne n'umurwi watsindiye igikombe ca Espagne), unatsindirwa mu gice ca kabiri ca Champions League. Ariko n'aho vyagenze uko, Messi na Laporta barumvikanye ko bogiriranira amasezerano agira 11 n'uyu mukinyi. Ariko ibibazo vy'amafaranga uwu murwi ufise vyaje kwica vyose. Nk'uko bimeze no mu yindi mirwi, FC Barcelona iri mu bibazo vy'amafaranga vyatewe n'ikiza karanda ca coronavirus, bituma ubutunzi bugabanuka. Messi yari yemeye kugabanirizwa umushahara yari asanzwe ahembwa gushika ku bice 50% - akaba yari asanzwe ahembwa hafi imiriyoni 165 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika nk'uko ibinyamakuru vyandika amakuru y'inkino bibivuga - akabandanya akinira FC Barcelona gushika mu 2026. Haciye imisi yicandagishije, Messi yasubiye i Barcelona, aho ku wa kane yari yiteze gutera igikumu kuri aya masezerano mashasha. Ariko si ko vyagenze. Guha amasezerano mashasha Messi vyasigura ko Barça yategerezwa kwongereza amafaranga yo kuriha imishahara y'abakinyi, ivyari gutuma yisanga yarengeje urugero rw'amafaranga imirwi yemerewe gukoresha mw'igihangwa rya Espagne. Ibi navyo biva ku mafaranga yinjizwa, aya nayo akaba ari make kubera iki kiza karanda ca corona. Mu gihe mu mwaka w'inkino wa 2020-2021 yari yemerewe gukoresha amafaranga agera ku miriyoni 600 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, mu mwaka uza yemerewe kutarenza imiriyoni zababa 410. Hanyuma kandi, kugira ngo Messi ashobore gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha, vyari ngombwa ko haba abakinyi bagurishwa kugira ngo uwu murwi ushobore kuriha imishahara y'uyu kizigenza wa Argentina. Aha rero, mw'itangazo ryo ku wa kane, uwu murwi watangaje ko hari "inzitizi zishingiye ku butunzi n'inzego", wisunze "amategeko ngenderwako ya La Liga", aya nayo akaba ajanye n'urugero ntarengwa rw'imishahara. Aha, La Liga ntaco yashotse itangaza. Mu gihe bari bakiri mu biganiro, ku wa gatatu hatangajwe amasezerano hagati ya La Liga n'ikompanyi iguriha imitahe, CVC Capital Partners. Aya masezerano, ataremezwa n'inama nkuru y'uwu murwi gushika mu misi iri imbere, ashobora gushiramwo imiriyoni 3000 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika mu mupira w'amaguru muri Espagne, muri yo ibice 90% bikagabanganwa hagati y'imirwi. N'aho igice gito cane (15%) ari co gishobora gukoreshwa mu kuriha imishahara, uwu mutahe ushobora gufasha kwongereza urugero rw'umushahara. N'aho uwu mutahe utarangije ibibazo vy'imishahara uwu murwi ufise, abihweza ibintu n'ibindi babona ko bwari uburwo bwo gutorera inyishu ikibazo c'amasezerano ya Messi. Kuri FC Barcelona, iyo ntiyariyo nyishu, kuko ku wa kane yamenyesheje - haciye amasaha ivya Messi bishikirijwe - ko itemera aya masezerano. Barça yavuze ko idakwiye gutera igikumu kuri aya masezerano kubera impungenge zibonekeza mu gisata c'umupira w'amaguru muri kino gihe. N'aho Messi yari yemeye umushahara yari guhabwa kugira ngo abandanye akinira FC Barcelona, hari ibindi bintu uwu murwi udashobora kumuha. Ibinyamakuru vyo muri Espagne vyemeza ko uyu munya Argentina yasavye ko bagura mugenziwe Cristian Romero, ariko uwu murwi ntiwashoboye gushika ku masezerano n'uyu mukinyi w'inyuma. Mu ndwi ziheze, warashoboye kugura  Sergio Kun Agüero na Memphis Depay, ariko Messi yabandanije avuga ko batari bahagije kugira ngo uwu murwi ushobore guhangana n'iyindi mirwi ikomeye. Laporta yari yatangaje ko ejo ku wa gatanu yari kubonana n'abanyamakuru kugira ngo asigure vyinshi ku bijanye n'itangazo yasohoye ryateje nyamugigima mu gisata c'umupira w'amaguru. N'aho vyagenze uko vyagenze, umuhinga Andy West  abona ko ibi bishobora kuba bidasigura ko imigenderanire hagati ya Messi na FC Barcelona irangiriye aha. Uyu muhinga mu bijanye n'umupira w'amaguru muri Espagne yabwiye igisata ca BBC kijejwe inkino, BBC Sport, ati: "Mu vy'ukuri, n'aho ari ingingo ya nyuma, ishobora gutuma umurwi utakaza igihagararo mw'ihiganwa rya La Liga". "Impera n'imperuka turashobora gusubira kubona Lionel Messi mu mwambaro wa Barcelona". Kuva mu mwaka uheze igihe atangaza ko yipfuza gusezera uwu murwi, Manchester City na Paris Saint Germain, yompi ni yo mirwi yaboneka ko uyu musatirizi wa Argentina ashobora kwimukiramwo. N'aho imiryango yasubiye kwugururwa kuva iri tangazo rishizwe ahabona ku wa kane, Manchester City, ihejeje kwerekana uwundi musatirizi, Jack Grealish,  azoba yambaye inomero 10 mw'ihiganwa buca ritangura. Messi  avuga kandi ko yamye afise icipfuzo co kuba muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kugira ngo akine mw'ihiganwa ryo muri ico gihugu MLS Uko vyogenda kwose kuri kazoza kiwe, ikizwi ni uko ubu Messi ari umukinyi yedegemvya, inyuma y'aho amasezerano yari afitaniye na FC Barcelona arangiriye, hari ku wa 30 z'ukwa gatandatu, 2021.

headline: Ibibazo vyanyu kuri Coronavirus: Inkingo batanga zikingira ubwoko bwose bwayo?
text: Muri rwa rukurikirane rw'inyishu ku bibazo vyanyu ku kiza ca Coronavirus, muganga Leonard Nduwayo akorera mu Bufaransa atangura yishura ku kibazo ca Bigirimana Aloys abaza ati: Incanco batanga zikingira ubwoko bwa Coronavirus bwose?

headline: DR Congo: abantu 33 bishwe mu gitero c’inyeshama mu karere ka Beni
text: Abantu mirongo itatu na batatu abagore n'abana nibo bimaze kumenyekana ko bishwe mu gitero c'inyeshama ku kigo kivura indwara ya Ebola mu karere ka Beni, nk'uko bivugwa n'ababibonye hamwe n'abategetsi. Abategetsi bamenyesheje ko hariho abandi bantu 11 babonetse bishwe bituma igitigiri kigera ku bantu 33 bishwe mu masaha 24 kuva mu gitero co kuwa gatanu. Ico gitero gishasha cabaye ku munsi wa gatanu mw'ijoro mu gihe igisirikare ca Congo congereje ibitero ku mirwi y'inyeshamba iri mu buseruko bwa DR Congo, harimwo n'umuhari Allied Democratic Forces. Abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri DR Congo bavuga ko ibitero vy'imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho muri ako karere k'intara ya Kivu y'Uburaruko vyatumye ico kiza gikwiragira cane, mu mezi 16 aheze cadutse. Nk'uko vyandikwa n'ikinyamakuru Associated Press, abarwanyi ba ADF nibo bagirizwa ico gitero muri ako karere gasanzwe gasinzikajwe n'ikiza ca Ebola. Omar Kavota arongoye ishirahamwe riharanira agateka ka muntu muri ako karere rizwi nka CEPADHO, avuga ko catanguye hafi isaha zibiri n'igice zo mw'ijoro ryo ku wa gatanu. Ni inyuma y'aho kuri uwo munsi Perezida Felix Tshisekedi atangarije ko bagiye gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo bahagarike ibitero vy'uyo muhari be n'iyindi mihari imaze imyaka itari mike irwanira mu buseruko bwa Congo. Mw'ijambo yashikirije abanyagihugu yavuze ati: "Turafise ishaka rikomeye kandi ntituzodohoka tutayihanaguye yose". Ivyo bitero vy'inyeshamba vyiyongereye mu ntara ya Beni vyatumye abanyagihugu biha amabarabara kubera ishavu ry'uko badakingirwa. Mu kwezi guheze, abanyagihugu baturiye ibiro vya komine ya Beni be n'ibiro vy'ingabo za MONUSCO biri ahitwa Boikene. Ivyo bitero vyaratumye kandi utwigoro tw'ukurwanya ikiza ca Ebola imaze guhitana abantu barenga 2200 ataco dushikako. Abajejwe gutanga urucanco rw'ico kiza barananiwe n'ugushika mu turere turangwamwo uruhagarara kubw'umutekano wabo.

headline: Gutwaririza: Mbe ni kubera iki abagore bibungenze bifuza cane ivyo kurya bimwe bimwe?
text: Twese turamaze kwumva inkuru y'umugore iyo yibungenze usanga hari indya imwe gusa canke zibiri ashaka kuguma afungura, akavyura umugabo hagati mw'ijoro ngo azimuronderere. Canke na twebwe ubwacu turamaze gushikirwa no gushaka cane ikintu kinaka co kurya. Kenshi biravugwa ko gutwaririza indya iyi canke iriya ari uburyo bwo kwironsa ingaburo umugore n'umwana yibungenze bakeneye, kandi hari n'ikiganisha ku ciyumviro c'uko vyoba biterwa n'ingene umubiri uremye. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, ni igice kigoye gutegera c'ikintu rimwe na rimwe kitoroha. Kwirema kw'umuntu mu nda y'uwundi bisanzwe bitwara igihe, bikarusha, bikagora umubiri, kandi iyo hari impamvu yo gushaka cane kurya tacos (indya zo muri Mexique zikundwa cane), ntibikunda kwiyima. Ariko, iyo wihweje ico ubushakashatsi mu bumenyi bubivugako, uhasanga inkuru itangaje kandi isa n'iyisiga ubwenge. Gutwaririza nk'ikintu kiri aho ntibishikira bose mu mico itandukanye, nk'uko abashakashatsi babibonye. Kandi mu bihugu vy'imico y'abatavuga icongereza aho bivugwa ko abagore batwaririza, usanga ivyo batwaririza bitandukanye cane n'ivy'abagore bo muri Amerika canke mu Bwongereza, nk'akarorero. Nko mu Bayapani, iyo bavuze ivyo gutwaririza, usanga umuceri ari co gifungurwa kivugwa cane. Twegeye imbere, ivyigwa vyo kumenya nimba ivyo kurya bitwaririzwa cane hari ingaburo zihariye bitanga zifasha imbanyi, vyasanze ivyo vyo kurya ata ngaburo nk'izo bifise. Mu bisanzwe, abagore batwaririza usanga bagira umuvyibuho kurusha uko biba vyitezwe ku mbanyi y'umugore afise amagara meza, ivyo navyo bigashobora guteza ibibazo. Ariko ntibisigura yuko abagore batwaririza ari ivyo bigira, gusa ni uko ukwo gutwaririza gushobora kuba guterwa n'ikindi kintu ataho gihuriye n'ibibera mu mubiri. Kurabira hamwe muri rusangi igituma abantu bashaka cane ibifungurwa bimwe bishobora gutanga icerekezo, nk'uko bivugwa na Julia Hormes, umwigisha w'inyifato kuri kaminuza ya State University of New York, Albany, yize ibijanye no gushaka cane ivyo kurya mu buryo butandukanye. Nk'akarorero, Hormes avuga ko hafi ya 50% vy'abagore muri Amerika bavuga ko bashaka cane shokola mu ndwi ibanziriza kuja mu butinyanka. Abahinga barihweje niba ukwo gushaka cane shokola gufitaniye isano n'ingaburo ngirakamaro ziyirimwo, canke niba bijanye n'uko haba hari uguhindagurika kw'imisemburo mu mubiri. Mu cigwa kimwe, umuhinga mu nyifato yasavye umugore kwugurura agasaho bahawe agafungura ibirimwo niyasubira kwumva ashaka cane ico arya. Tumwe mu dusaho twarimwo shokola ikoranye amata (ifise ingaburo zose usanga muri shokola hamwe n'uburyo ishongera mu kanwa). Utundi twarimwo shokola yera, itarimwo igiterwa ca cocoa kigumye gisanzwe giha shokola ikoranye amata ibara ryayo ry'umugina, ariko ikagira imfato nziza. Hanyuma, udusaho dusigaye twarimwo ibinini vya cocoa, birimwo ibigize cocoa bigumye ariko bidateye nka shokola isanzwe iribwa. Shokola yera niyo yashoboye cane guhaza abifuza kuyirya, bigasigura rero ko atari ingaburo ngirakamaro canke ibindi birungo vya cocoa igumye bitera ukwo kuyishaka cane. Ibindi vyigwa vyibanze ku kwifuza cane shokola vyasanze ata sano ririho n'urugero rw'imisemburo mu mubiri. Mu bisanzwe, abagore baciye imvyaro babandanya kuvuga ko bakigira ukwifuza kwa cane kwa shokola, nk'uko Hormes abisigura. Ico ibi vyose vyerekana ni uko ukwo kwifuza kwa cane igifungurwa guterwa n'imico hamwe n'ibiri mu mutwe. Kwifuza cane igisuguti c'amavuta menshi canke akamanyu ka shokola, amafiriti, bishobora kuza nk'iciyumviro gisanzwe, kigacikamwo buke buke ukwifuza kwa cane kugoye kwiyumanganya. Muri ico gihe nyene, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, hamwe n'ahandi hatandukanye, kwiyumvira ivyo kurya bikwega ijisho - amajambo akoreshwa n'abashakashatsi mu kuvuga ivyo kurya birimwo kuva kuri ice cream gushika ku makaroni atekanya foromaji - bizanana no kwicuza. Hormes agira ati "haraba kwijijanya imitima. "Biraryohera umubiri, ariko kandi nkaba mba ahari umuco umbwira ko ntategerezwa kurya iyi shokola." Yongerako ati "Ndayishaka cane, ariko sinarinkwiye kuyirya - twibaza ko urwo ari rwo ruhande rw'umuco rutuma haba ico gikorwa." Ku buryo bwihariye, iyo wari umaze igihe wiyima - waramaze gushira mu mutwe ko utazosubira kwiha igifungurwa kinaka - birakugora cane kwihangana iyo ufise ico gifungurwa. Rero nyuma yo kwihereza ikimanyu ca keke, aho kwumva unyuzwe ubuzima bukabandanya, uca urya ibindi bimanyu bitatu. Vyongeye, abagore barashobora kwiyima ibifungurwa bimwe iyo bibungenze, nkumbure barondera amagara meza kubera impanuro za muganga ku bijanye n'indya nka sushi, inyama za deli hamwe n'ibindi bifungurwa. Ibi vyose bituma, n'imiburiburi mu bice bimwe vyo kw'isi, gushaka ibifungurwa cane bishika kandi bikagorana kuvyirinda, bigashobora no gutuma haba kwongera ibiro kwa cane. Kwibungenga navyo birashobora gufatwa nk'igihe kwifuza cane ibifungurwa binaka bishobora kwihanganirwa. Hormes agira ati "Uyu muco kandi uratuma tumenya ibihe hamwe n'inyendamuvano aho usanga vyihanganirwa ko abagore barya ibintu mu bisanzwe babwirizwa kwigira kure". "Guca imvyaro no kwibungenga ni ibihe ikibano gisa n'icemerera abagore kwirekura." Hormes ahanura yuko mu gihe ushaka cane shokola, wari ukwiye gufata iyo ku rwego rwo hejuru, ukarya utumanyu nka tubiri ku munsi, ubuzima bukabandanya - ivyo birashobora gutuma ingaruka zavyo zivaho. Uburyo bumwe ni ubwo gukoresha kwisamaza - hari ivyigwa vyakozwe hakoreshejwe ibisamaza vyo kuraba canke kwimotereza. Ubundi buryo ni kwita ku bibera mu mutwe hamwe no kubaza umutima nama, ukemera ko ukwo kwifuza ugufise ukakureka kukakuvamwo. Iyo ari ibijanye no gutwaririza, harashobora kuba hari ikindi kijanye n'umuco: kwibungenga biragora, kandi birashobora kunanirana iyo ata bufasha buhari. Icigwa cibanze ku bagore bo mu caro muri Tanzaniya bavuze ko batwaririza inyama, ifi, intete, ivyamwa, imboga, casanze kubaronsa ivyo vyo kurya bashaka ari ikimenyetso co gushigikirwa n'umugabo hamwe n'umuryango. Kandi koko, gusaba inkoko yokeje saa saba z'ijoro bisaba ukwitanga gukomeye ku wutumwe kuyirondera, rero bitanga icizere ko uwo muntu koko ahari kugira afashe. Mu gihe amababa y'inkoho asanzwe aryoha ubwayo, kuba hari umuntu ukunda ayakuzaniye biyongera agaciro karengeye ingaburo afise.

headline: Jérémie Ngendakumana yahoze arongoye CNDD-FDD yashinze umugambwe mushasha PDG-Girubuntu
text: Jérémie Ngendakumana yahoze arongoye umugambwe uri ku butegetsi mu Burundi amenyesha ko yatanguje umugambwe mushasha, ni inyuma y'imyaka hafi itanu avuye muri CNDD-FDD. Bwana Ngendakumana yavuye muri CNDD-FDD mu kwa kane 2015 biyuye ku kutumvikana kwibonekeje muri uwo mugambwe, kwaturutse ku ngingo ya Perezida Petero Nkurunziza yo gusubira kwitoza mu kibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu ico gihe. Umugambwe PDG-Girubuntu ugize kabiri ushinzwe n'abahoze ari abategetsi CNDD-FDD, inyuma ya PPD-Giriteka washinzwe na Léonidas Hatungimana, yahoze ari mu bavugizi ba Perezida Nkurunziza. Avugana na BBC, Ngendakumana avuga ko kuva avuye muri CNDD-FDD, yahoze anarongoye, ata wundi mugambwe yigeze ajamwo. Mu gihe u Burundi bwimirije amatora mu kwezi kwa gatanu uyu mwaka, Ngendakumana ntiyemeza nimba azotaha kugira ngo yitabe amatora. Jérémie Ngendakumana, ni umwe mu bahoze ari abanywanyi bakomeye ba CNDD-FDD bahunze kubera batari bashigikiye ko Perezida Petero Nkurunza asubira kwitoza mu matora ya 2015. Abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi, amwe mu mashirahamwe adaharanira ivyicaro vya politike, hamwe rero na bamwe mu banywanyi ba CNDD-FDD, bavuga ko iyo ngingo ya Perezida Nkurunziza yari iteye kubiri n'ibwirizwashingiro, hamwe n'amasezerano y'amahoro y'i Arusha. Abo banyepolitike bashitse hanze baciye batanguza urunani bise CNARED, rwagiye rurahura n'ibibazo bivuye ku kutumvikana kw'abarugize. Abanyepolitike bamwe, n'imigambwe yariyonkoye kur'urwo runani. Ni nk'imigambwe FRODEBU, RDB, CNDD wa Léonard Nyangoma, Kaze-FDD wa Jean-Bosco Ndayikengurukiye, na UPD-Zigamibanga. Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'ihuriro CNARED, Anicet Niyonkuru, aherutse gushika i Bujumbura mu ntumbero yo kwitegurira amatora mu mugambwe wiwe  CDP.

headline: Covid: Biden avuga igitigiri ca 500.000 bamaze gupfa ari ''intambwe ivuna umutima''
text: Prezida Joe Biden yashikirije ijambo igihugu ubwo Amerika yarenganye igitigiri c'abantu ibihumbi amajana 500 bamaze guhitanwa n'impfu zifatiye kuri Covid, igitigiri ca mbere kinini mu bihugu vyose vyo kw'isi. Biden yavuze ati: ''Nk'igihugu, ntidutegezwa kwemera akaga kariko karadushikira.Dutegerezwa kwanka gutimbishwa n'intuntu.'' Umukuru w'igihugu n'icegera ciwe, n'abo bubakanye,baciye bamara akanya mu gacerere hanze ya Maison Blanche(White House) mu birori vyo kwatsa buji. Ubu abantu banduye umugera wa corona muri Amerika  ni miriyoni 28,1. Naco nyene nico gitgiri ca mbere kinini kw'isi. . Biden yavuze ati: "Uyu munsi nsavye Abanyamerika bose kwibuka. Kwibuka abo twabuze no kwibuka abo twasize inyuma", anasaba abanyamerika kugwaniriza Covid hamwe. Biden yavyifashemwo gute kuri uwo munsi? Prezida yategetse amabendera yose yo mu bibanza mpuzantara kuduzwa gushika hagati muri iyi minsi itanu iri imbere. Ku ngoro y'umukuru w'igihugu, yuguruye ijambo ryiwe yerekana ko igitigiri c'Abanyamerika bamaze kwicwa na Covid kiruta abishwe mu ntambara ya mbere y'isi , intabara ya kabiri y'isi n'intambara yo muri Vietnam ubafatiye hamwe. Yavuze ati : ''Uyu munsi vy'ukuri n'umunsi mubi, umunsi w'intambwe ivuna umutima-abantu 500.071 bamaze gupfa.'' Yabandanije ati: ''Hari aho twumva abantu bavugwa ngo Abanyamerika basanzwe. Ikintu nk'ico ntikibaho. Nta kintu cari gisanzwe kuri bo. Abantu  twabuze ntibari basanzwe. Bari mu myaka myinshi y'urunganwe. Bavukiye muri Amerika, bimukiye muri Amerika. None benshi muri bo bahemye irya nyuma bonyene muri Amerika'' Yafatiye ku vyamushikiye mu buzima bwiwe mu kwerekana akababaro-umugore wiwe n'umukobwa wiwe baguye mw'isanganya ry'imodoka mu 1972 hanyuma umwe mu bahungu biwe yicwa na cancer yo mu bwonko mu 2015. At: "Ndazi ico arico kuba utari hafi iyo bishitse. Ndazi icari co iyo uhari ukabafata ibiganza; urabona ingene bakuravye hanyuma bakigira.'' "Kuri jewe, inzira yo kurwanya intuntu n'ugutora ico tugamije". Intumbero ya Biden itandukanye n'iyo uwo yasubiriye, Donald Trump yari afise kwijijanya ingaruka z'uwo mugera kandi yabonwa nk'uwagize ikibazo ca poritike ukwambara agafukamunwa n'izindi ngingo zo kwirinda gukwirakwiza uwo mugera. Ku wa 19 ukwezi kwa mbere, buca Biden atangura amabanga, yarakoze umugirwa wo kwibuka abanyamerika 400.000 bari bamaze guhitanwa n'iyo ndwara. Umunsi wo kuri uyu wa mbere washitse haheze hafi ukwezi. Ahandi mu gisagara ca Washington, amakengeri kuri National Cathedral yavuze incuro amajana atanu, rimwe rimwe ryose ku bantu 1.000 bamaze gupfa muri iki kiza. Dr Ashish Jha, umukuru w'igisata c'magara y'abanyagihugu kuri kaminuza ya Brown yabwiye BBC News  ati  : "Haraheze umwaka ntibaza ko  inusu y'umuriyoni w'abantu bashobora gutakaza ubuzima kubera iyo ndwara. Dufise ubushobozi bwinshi, dufise uburyo bwinshi…ibi vyose twari kuvyirinda,ntivyari gushika. Ariko none raba aho tugeze.'' Igihe co  kubaho muri Amerika ubu cagabanutseko umwaka wuzuye kubera Covid-19,nk'uko vyavuzwe ku ndwi iheze n'ikigo ca Amerika kijejwe kurwanya no gukinga indwara. Ico gihe cagabanutse cane mu bo mu bwoko bwa banyamuke ari nabo uwo mugera wasinzikaje cane ugereranije n'abandi. Ibirabure bataje imyaka itatu ku gihe cabo co kubaho hagati y'ukwezi kwa mbere n'ukwa gatantatu mu 2020. Abagabo bakomoka muri Amerika y'Epfo (Hispanic) nabo batakaje imyaka 2,4 muri ico kiringo.

headline: Burundi: Umukandida Dieudonné Nahimana asaba CENI kwemera ko amatora yabayemwo utunenge
text: Uwitoje nk'uwigenga mu kibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu mu matora aheruka mu Burundi, Dieudonné Nahimana, asaba umurwi ujejwe gutegura no guhagarikira amatora kwemera ko ayo matora yabayemwo utunenge. Ivyo yabivuze mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru kuri uyu wa gatanu aho yari aramutse ashikiriza ingene abona ku kungene amatora yagenze. Dieudonné Nahimana yaronse amajwi adashika 1%, ariko akamenyesha ko n'aho hari ibitagenze neza, abona ko atavyinshi afise vyotuma yitura sentare ijejwe kwubahirizwa ibwirizwashingiro. Umurwi CENI wowo uvuga ko amatora yagenze neza. Muri ico kiganiro, Bwana Nahimana, avuga ko bashoboye kurungika ababahagararira muri ayo matora barenga ibihumbi bitandatu, akaba yari afise babiri babiri muri buri komine. Mu tunenge avuga twibonekeje, hariho ko bamwe mu babaserukira bankirwa abandi bakabatevya kwinjira mu biro vy'amatora kandi bari bafise amakete abemerera kumuserukira yatanzwe n'umurwi CENI. Avuga ko we nyene ubwiwe yihahamagariye abajejwe amatora, bakamwishura ko batari bazi ko abigenga bafise uburenganzira bwo kurungika abaserukira ku biro vy'amatora. Ati: "Vyari bitangaje kuko mu bintu CENI yamye yigisha, baramenyesha y'uko uwitoza wese afise uburenganzira bwo kuronka uwumuserukira kandi yaba afise urupapuro ruvyerekana rwatanzwe na CENI". Avuga kandi ko hari ahandi wasanga bamwe mu ntwaro biha ububasha nk'ubwo abakozi ba CENI mu gihe amatora yariko araba, akavuga ko wasanga harimwo cane cane abacamanza, abasitanteri, eka mbere na ba buramatari. Akandi kanenge Bwana Nahimana yerekana avuga ko hariho abandi wasanga bagenda batera ubwoba abantu bagiye gutora bakabategeka gutora uyu canke uwundi. Abandi nabo banaherekeza abagiye gutora mu bwiherero kugira ngo babategeke gutora uwo bobo bashaka babeshe ko bagiye kubereka ingene bazinga ikarata y'amatora. Hari kandi ibice bimwe bimwe mu gihugu aho abajejwe intwaro batoye mu kibanza c'abanyeshure nk'uko abivuga. Aravuga kandi ko hari abantu wasanga hari abatoreye abandi ariko ugasanga ni benshi canke ugasanga batwaye amakarata yo gutora menshi arengeye ayo bafitiye impapuro zibaya uburenganzira. Mu gihe avuga ko utunenge twababayeko tudashobora kumutuma yitura sentare yubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro, Dieudonné Nahimana asaba ko twozokosorwa muri kazoza kugira ngo ntihazohave haba abahakana ibizoba vyavuyemwo bisunze utwo tunenge. Ati: "Twashaka gusaba CENI ko yokwemera ko hariho bimwe bitagenze neza mu matora aheruka kandi bakagerageza kubikosora". Asaba abatangajwe na CENI ko batsinze amatora abandi nabo ko batsinzwe, ko botahura ko ikintu nyamukuru ku gihugu ari umutekano hagati y'Abarundi, rero ko ata murundi yopfa canke yogirirwa nabi azira ico ari canke azira ico yiyumvira. Evariste Ndayishimiye yaserukiye umugambwe uri ku butegetsi CNDD-FDD niwe yatangajwe n'umurwi CENI ko yatahukanye intsinzi muri ayo matora ku bice 68%, akurikirwa na Agathon Rwasa wo mu mugambwe CNL utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi wabonye 22%. Umugambwe CNL umenyesha ko ayo matora yabayemwo utunenge twinshi n'ubusuma, mbere ukemeza ko ari wo watahukanye intsinzi ku bice birenga 58%. Ejo ku wa kane Agathon Rwasa yashikiriza ibirego muri sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro, iyi nayo ikaba itegerezwa gushikiriza ibiharuro ntabanduka ku wa 04 z'ukwezi kwa gatandatu, ni ukuvuga ku wa kane w'indwi iza.

headline: Qatar 2022: Messi, Ronaldo, Mbappé, Neymar n’ibindi bihangange vyiteguriye inkino za 1/4
text: Na Shamoon Hafez BBC Sport i Doha Imirwi umunani gusa niyo isigaye mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose ca 2022 muri Qatar, yose ifise indoto imwe yo guterura igikombe ku wa 18 z’uku kwa cumi na kabiri. Inyuma y’ihiganwa ryo mu matsinda ryabereyemwo ibitangaza, ubu turi mu nzira y’igikorwa nyaco, igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma kikaba cuzuye abakinyi b’ibihangange. Itandatu mu mirwi isigaye ni iyigeze gutsindira iri higanwa canke yashitse muri finale – kandi hagati yayo imaze gutsindira iki gikombe incuro cumi. Ariko gusa ibitangaza vyovyo bishobora gushika, aho Maroc ubu irondera kuba igihugu ca mbere ca Afrika coba gishitse mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma, inyuma yo gushika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma ku ncuro ya mbere muri kahise k’umupira w’amaguru muri ico gihugu. BBC Sport, igisata ca BBC gikurikirana inkino, irihweza bimwe mu vyitezwe, mu gihe abakinyi barondera kwerekana ubuhinga bwabo muri uru rubuga rw’umupira w’amaguru. Ku wa gatanu: Croatia v Brezili (17:00 mu masaha y’Uburundi n’Urwanda), Ubuholande v Argentina (21:00 mu masaha y’Uburundi n’Urwanda). Ku wa gatandatu: Maroc v Portugal (17:00 mu masaha y’Uburundi n’Urwanda), Ubwongereza v Ubufaransa (21:00 mu masaha y’Uburundi n’Urwanda). Kubona ibihugu nk’Ubudagi n’Ububirigi bisezererwa mu nkino z’amatsinda mu buryo butangaje  - hamwe n’ugutsindwa kwa Espagne mu gice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma – ni ibintu bizoguma mu mitima y’abantu igihe kirekire kubona ibihugu nk’ibi binanirwa no gushika muri iki gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma. Lionel Messi na Cristiano Ronaldo ni amazina agaruka cane mu binyamakuru, ariko ibihangange nka Neymar, Harry Kane, Kylian Mbappe na Luka Modric baracahagaze. Ubwongereza n’Uburafansa – igihugu gisanzwe gifise iki gikombe – bigiye guhurira mw’ihiganwa rikomeye ku ncuro ya mbere mu myaka cumi, ikaba ari n’incuro ya mbere mu gice co gukuranamwo. Iyi mirwi yaheruka guhura muri Euro 2012 mu nkino zo gukuranamwo aho yanganije 1-1, ariko ubwa nyuma iheruka guhura mu gikombe c’isi yose hakaba hari mu 1982. Bryan Robson yateye ibitsindo bibiri mu rukino Ubwongereza bwatsinze 3-1, ico gihe kizigenza w’Ubufaransa akaba yari igihangange Michel Platini. Umurwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubwongereza, uzwi nka, Three Lions, ntiwashoboye kubandanya ngo utsindire ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose uwo mwaka muri Espagne, ariko igihe conyene baherukira kugitwara – ni ukuvuga mu 1966 – umwe mu mirwi batsinze mu rugendo rwabo, kumbure ushobora kuba uwikeka, ni Ubufaransa. Si ikimenyetso kibi. Hagati aho, bafise igikorwa kitoroshe co guhura n’umusatirizi rutura Mbappé, ari na we ari imbere mu bitsindo muri rino higanwa, aho amaze kwinjiza bitanu, akaba akinana n’umukinyi mugenziwe ari na we amaze kwinjiriza Ubufaransa ibitsindo vyinshi gusumba abandi muri kahise k’umupira w’amaguru muri ico gihugu, Olivier Giroud. Kizigenza w’Ubwongereza, Kane, ati: "Ku wa gatandatu ntibizoba vyoroshe. Ubufaransa ni umurwi ukomeye, ari na wo ufise igikombe, rero turazi ko uzoba ari umugoroba utoroshe na gato. "Nibaza ko nimba ushaka gutsindira igikombe c’isi yose, utegerezwa guhura n’imirwi y’ibihangange kw’isi, Ubufaransa rero buri imbere”. Ku wa Mungu, igenekerezo rya 18 Kigarama. Urugamba rutoroshe ku kibuga ca Lusail i Doha. Ibihangange bibiri kw’isi mu gihe cabo bararwanira ubugabo, akaryo kabo ka nyuma  ko kurwanira iri teka ry’igikombe c’isi yose. Ubutigu bwageze. Messi wa Argentina hamwe na Ronaldo wa Portugal bamaze imyaka baterana inkokora umwe wese arondera kwandika amateka. Muri rino higanwa ryonyene, Messi yinjije igitsindo ku rukino rwiwe rwari rugize 1000 igihe bahura na Australia mu gice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma, mu gihe Ronaldo nawe yabaye umukinyi wa mbere yinjije ibitsindo mu mahinganwa atanu yose y’igikombe c’isi yose. Bompi baramaze gutsindira igikombe c’amahiganwa ku migabane yabo – Messi yatsindiye Copa America mu mwaka uheze, mu gihe Ronaldo yari yatsindiye ihiganwa rya Bulaya mu 2016 – ariko iki gikombe ca mbere nyamukuru kw’isi kiracari umugani kuri bo. Ku myaka 35 Messi aboneka ko ari ryo higanwa rya nyuma ry’igikombe c’isi yose kuri we, mu gihe Ronaldo wewe azoba afise imyaka 41 mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose kizokurikira. Aha ata nkeka biraboneka ko ari yo mahirwe ya nyuma kuri bo yo gushobora guterura iki gikombe c’iteka. Hagati aho, vyabaye ngombwa ko Ronaldo yemera ko yari afise uruhara ruto mu rukino rwa Portugal rw’igice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma - aho yashizwe ku rutonde rw’abagombora, mu gihe uwamutwaye ikibanza Goncalo Ramos w’imyaka 21 yakoze ibintu bidasanzwe mu gutera bitatu wenyene mu rukino rwabo n’Ubuswisi. Nko mu gihe vyoshika ibi bihangange bigahurira muri finale, ivy’ari vyo vyose n’abatagira aho begamire bogira amero. None twizere ko impari kuri ‘GOAT’ (impfunyapfunyo ya Greatest Of All Time, twogereranya na ‘Igihangange c’ibihe vyose) zishobora kuba zigiye guhera? Imbere y’aho, birashoboka ko turorera urukino ruryoheye ijisho rwo mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma. Mu gihe yompi yorengana Croatia n’Ubuholande uko ikurikirana, urugamba rw’agakura muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko ni rwo rwokurikira hagati ya Brezili na Argentina ku kibuga ca Lusail. Brezili, igihugu kimaze gutahukana iri higanwa incuro zitanu kandi kikaba ari co gihabwa amahirwe menshi, yarerekanye ubuhinga bwayo mu kwirahira bikomeye Korea y’Epfo, mu gihe Argentina yari ikeneye ubuhinga bwa kizigenza wayo Messi kugira ngo ishire Australia ku ruhande. Iyi mirwi imaze guhura incuro zine mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose, ariko ubwa nyuma iheruka guhura hakaba hari mu 1990, igihe igitsindo ca Claudio Caniggia mu minota ya nyuma y’urukino cahaye akaryo Argentina ko kwinjira mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma. Amahirwe yo kuvana iki gikombe i Bulaya ari cane cane mu minwe y’ino mirwi ibiri, Brezili ikaba ari co gihugu ca nyuma kitari ico ku mugabane wa Bulaya giheruka gutsindira iki gikombe, hari mu 2002. Igihangange Neymar yarakize imvune yo mw’ivi yari yanduye mu rukino rwabo rwa mbere, yongera araninjiza igitsindo mu gice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma na Korea y’Epfo, ubu akaba akeneye igitsindo kimwe gusa kugira ngo anganye n’igihangange Pele ku bitsindo 77 mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Brezili, uzwi nka Selecao. Ariko Croatia ya Luka Modric hamwe n’Ubuholande bwa Virgil van Dijk navyo bifise ijambo rikomeye mu kwemeza nimba iki kirori kizoshoboka canke kitazoshoboka. Tugiye ku Buholande, uyu murwi wa Louis van Gaal hamwe na Argentina ni abakeba bamenyeranye cane muri rino higanwa, biteze guhura ku ncuro ya gatandatu barwanira itike yo mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma. Ni isubiramwo rya finale yo mu 1978, aho uyu murwi wo muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko ari wo watahukanye intsinzi, mu gihe urukino rwa nyuma iyi mirwi yaheruka guhuriramwo ari urwabaye mu myaka umunani iheze, Argentina ikaba ari yo yatsinze ku ma penalties. Ariko kimwe mu bihe ntibagiranwa - atari gusa hagati y’ibi bihugu ariko muri kahise k’igikombe c’isi yose – ni icabaye mu 1998 igihe Dennis Bergkamp yinjiza igitsindo ciza cane cahaye akaryo Ubuholande kubandanya mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma. "Dennis Bergkamp, Dennis Bergkamp, Dennis Bergkamp," niko umunyamakuru w’Ubuholande yiha karuru avuga igihe uyu mukinyi yakinira Arsenal yakubita icenga n’ubuhinga bwinshi ku mupira yari ahawe na Frank de Boer, aca aroba Roberto Ayala maze yinjiza igitsindo ciza cane. None Cody Gakpo arashobora gukora nk’ibi muri kino gihe...? Penalty ya Achraf Hakimi muri wa mwanya w’ama penalties ari nayo yahaye intsinzi Maroc kuri Espagne yatewe neza cane, umupira uca neza neza hagati mw’igori aho umunyegori yari avuye, uva mw’igitsindo casarishije abarorerezi mu kibuga ca Education City. Itsinzi yabo yatumye bashika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yashimagijwe n’ubwami bw’ico gihugu, aho umumenyereza Walid Regragui yahamagawe kuri terefone n’umwami  wa Maroc Mohammed VI urukino ruheze. Umurwi upanze neza kandi ugoye gutsinda, Maroc ni urutare,  ntirigera itsindwa na rimwe muri rino higanwa ry’iki gikombe c’isi yose, ikaba imaze kwinjizwa igitsindo kimwe gusa mu nkino zabo indwi ziheruka. Maroc kibaye igihugu ca kane c’umugabane wa Afrika gishitse mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, kikaba kiriko kirondera itike yo gushika mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma. Hagati aho, ni ikindi gipimo gikomeye kiyirindiriye imbere y’uyu murwi w’i Bulaya – na rirya Portugal nayo iriko irondera kwandikisha amateka mu kurondera gushika mu gice ca nyuma ku ncuro ya mbere.

headline: Vladimir Putin yiyumvira iki agategura iki?
text: N﻿a Steve Rosenberg Umwanditsi mukuru mu gisata c'Ikirusiya, i Moscow Iki ni ikibazo tumaze igihe kitari gito tubaza, n’imbere y’uko Uburusiya butera Ukraine. Vladimir Putin yoba yiyumvira iki agategura iki? Ariko reka mbe ndabibamenyesha. Nta sindagura. Kandi sinavuganye na Putin. Uwahoze ari umukuru w’igihugu ca Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika George W Bush igihe kimwe niho yigeze kuvuga ko yaravye Vladimir Putin mu maso aca abona akari ku mutima wiwe. Raba ingene vyarangiye neza mu migenderanire hagati y’Uburusiya n’Uburengero. Rero, kwinjira mu mutwe w’uyu mutegetsi wa Kremlin si igikorwa coroshe. Ariko ni vyiza kugerageza. Kumbure iki gihe nico gikomeye co kugerageza gusumba ibindi vyose, dufatiye kw’ikangisha riheruka kugirwa na Moscou ku bigwanisho nikleyeri. Nta gukekeranya cane ko umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya ubu atorohewe. Ico yita “igikorwa ca gisirikare kidasanzwe” muri Ukraine ntikiriko kimugendera neza. Cari citezwe kumara imisi mike. Ariko ubu turi mu mezi hafi umunani kandi nta kimenyetso ko kigiye kurangira. Kremlin iremera ko yatakaje “bikomeye”; mu ndwi nkeya za vuba, igisirikare c’Uburusiya cagiye gitakaza ubutaka cari carigaruriye muri Ukraine. Mu ntumbero yo kwongereza igitigiri c’ingabo, mu kwezi guheze Perezida Putin yateye akamo ko guhamagaza ingabo, ico yahora avuga ashimitse ko atari gukora. Ni mu gihe ibihano bibandanya bigira ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw’Uburusiya. Reka tugaruke ku coba kiri mu mutwe wa Putin. Ubwo yoba yibaza ko yihenze cane? Ko ingingo yo gutera Ukraine ryabaye ikosa rikomeye? Ntuhave uvyemeza gutyo. Konstantin Remchukov, umwanditsi mukuru akongera akaba nyene ikinyamakuru co mu Burusiya Nezavisimaya Gazeta, avuga ati: "Ivyo Putin yiyumvira ni vyo vyerekana ingene ibintu bimeze muri ino ntambara”. "Ni umutegetsi atwaza umukazo igihugu rutura ca nikleyeri. Ni umutegetsi atavuguruzwa muri kino gihugu. Arafise ivyiyumviro n’ibintu bikomeye yemera bimusarisha. Yatanguye kwemeza ko ari ku nyungu zo kubaho. Atari kuri we gusa. Ariko kuri kazoza k’Uburusiya”. Mu gihe ino ntambara yoba ari iyo kurwanira ukubaho kw’igihugu, Putin yoba yiteguye gute kuyitsinda? Mu mezi ya vuba, abategetsi b’Uburusiya (na Putin we nyene ubwiwe arimwo) bagiye bumvikana mu buryo budatomoye berekana ko uyu mukuru wa Kremlin ashobora kuba yiteguriye gukoresha ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri muri ino ntambara. Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika abwira CNN ati: "Sinibaza ko azohava abikoresha. Ariko nibaza ko kubona avuga ibintu nk’ibi ko ata mutima agira”. Amabombe y’urutavanako yacucagiwe mu gihugu cose mu ndwi iheze yerekana ko nibura Kremlin yiteguye kwunyura ibintu hagati y'Ubususiya na Ukraine. N'uburengero nyene? Grigory Yavlinsky, inararibonye muri poritike nk’uwigenga, avuga ati: "Ariko aragerageza kwirinda ko hatoba ugutana mu mitwe amaso mu yandi n’Uburengero, ariko akaba anavyiteguriye”. "Mfise ubwoba ko hohava haduka intambara ya nikleyeri. Hanyuma ubwa kabiri, ntinya intambara itagira iherezo”. Ariko "intambara itagira iherezo" isaba uburyo butagira iherezo. Iki ni ikintu Uburusiya busa n’ubudafise. Igihuhusi c’ibisasu vya misire vyacucagiwe ku bisagara vya Ukrane ni ukwerekana inguvu zidasanzwe, ariko none Moscou yobibandanya mu gihe kingana iki? Remchukov ati: "None woshobora kubandanya utera izi misire mu kiringo c’imisi, c’amayinga, c’amezi? Abahinga benshi bafise amakenga ko tutoba dufise misire zikwiye. "Hanyuma kandi, turavye ku ruhande rwa gisirikare, nta n’umwe gushika ubu arerekana icoba ikimenyetso kirengeye vyose c’intsinzi [y’Uburusiya]? Ni ikihe kimenyetso c’intsinzi? Mu 1945 cabaye ibendera hejuru ya Berlin. None ubu icokwerekana intsinzi ni igiki? [Ibendera] hejuru ya Kyiv? Hejuru ya Kherson? Hejuru ya Kharkiv? Si nzi. Nta n’umwe abizi”. Nta n’uwuzi nimba na Vladimir Putin we nyene ubwiwe abizi. Mu kwa kabiri, intumbero ya Kremlin  yasa n’ugutsinda Ukraine vuba bwango, hanyuma uyu mubanyi w’Uburusiya agasubira mu muryango w’ibihugu bicuditse na Moscou ata ntambara ndende ihabaye. Aha yaharuye nabi. Uretse ko atiyumviriye ko igisirikare ca Ukrane n’abanyagihugu bayo bari biyemeje kurwanira igihugu cabo gushika ku ka nyuma, ntiyibaza ko igisirikare cayo cari gifise uburyo bwo guhangana n’Uburusiya. None ubu yoba yiyumvira iki? Ubwo ubu Vladimir Putin yoba  afise integuro yo gutsimbataza igenzura ry’ubutaka bwa Ukraine avuga ko aherutse kwihagira hanyuma agahagarika intambara? Canke ubwo yoba yariyemeje kubandanya asatira gushika Ukraine yose ayigarukanye mu ruhongore rw’ibihugu bigenzurwa na Kremlin? Mu ndwi iheze, Dmitry Medvedev  yahoze arongoye Uburusiya yanditse ati: "Igihugu ca Ukraine, uravye ukungene cubatse  ubu...kizokwama ari intambamyi ikomeye ku Burusiya. Mbona ko intego y’ibikorwa vyacu vya kazoza yoba ugusenyura burundu ubutegetsi bwa poritike bwa Ukraine”. Mu gihe amajambo ya Medvedev ari yo yoba ari mu mutwe wa Putin, aha rero mwitege intambara ndende cane kandi izosesekamwo amaraso menshi. Ariko, vyanka bikunda, ivyo Putin akora hanze biriko bigira ingaruka mu gihugu.  Kuva mu myaka itari mike, Kremlin yarubatse ishusho ya Putin nka "Mr Stability" (ni ukuvuga “Umugabo-buragamo"), ihimiriza Abarusiya kwizera ko igihe cose azoba arongoye igihugu ko bazoba bari mu mutekano utagira agahonzi. Ubu biragoye kwumvisha abantu ko ari vyo. Remchukov ati: "Amasezerano yari hagati ya Putin n’abanyagihugu yari ‘Ndagukingira’. "Mu kiringo c’imyaka itari mike, icivugo nyamukuru cari ‘ukubona kure’. None ukwo kubona kure muri kino gihe ni ukuhe? Ico carataye igihe. Nta kintu na kimwe co kwizera muri kazoza. Uno musi abanyamakuru banje ntibazi nimba badashika muhira basanga urwandiko rubahamagarira kwinjira mu gisirikare”. Ingingo ya Vladimir Putin yo gutera Ukraine yatangaje benshi. Ariko Yavlinsky ntarimwo. Yavlinsky  ati: "Nibaza ko [Putin] yamaze igihe yitegurira iyo nzira – umwaka ku mwaka yariko yubaka ivyo turimwo ubu”. "Akarorero, gusambura ibinyamakuru vyingenga. Ivyo yabitanguye mu 2001. Gusambura igisata c’abikorera utwabo. Yabitanguye mu 2003. Hanyuma mu 2014 ivyabaye muri Crimea na Donbas. Umuntu atabibona ni uko yari impumyi. "Ingorane z’Uburusiya ni intwaro yacu. Intwaro yashinzwe hano ikarema uyu muntu  [nka Putin]. Ikibazo c’uruhara rw’Uburengero mu gushinga iyi ntwaro ni ikibazo gikomeye cane. "Ikibazo ni uko iyi ntwaro itaremye abantu. Hari abantu benshi cane b’intungane mu Burusiya. Ariko mu bantu nta gatima ko guharanira uburenganzira  kahari. Nico gituma Uburusiya bunanirwa kwihagararako”.

headline: India: Amashusho asobanura ikibazo ca coronavirus
text: Kuva mu misi iheze, Ubuhindi buhanganye bikomeye n'iyongerekana ry'abandura Covid-19 ku rugero ruteye ubwoba, aho ibitaro bitandukanye vyo ku mugwa mukuru no mu bundi burere bw'igihugu cose bisubiza inyuma abarwayi kubera ubukene bw'impwemu ya oxygène n'ibitanda. Za rusehabaniha zifise oxygène zirakenye mu gihe biriko bigorana ubwayo  imiryango ingene ishikana abarwayi bayo ku bitaro n'aho hoboneka igitanda. Ibintu bimeze nabi cane ku mugwa mukuru Delhi, aho abantu babandanya bapfa kubera ukubura oxygène. Abandi basubizwa inyuma kubera ibitaro vyuzuye, mbere n'abaganga bakaba barengewe. Ibi biraboneka cane mu mashusho ava mu bibanza vyategekanirijwe iki gikorwa mu gihugu cose - aho imiryango ibabaye irindira amasaha n'amasaha kugira ngo ishobore kurangura uwu mugirwa wo gusezera ubwa nyuma ababo, mu bindi bisagara navyo ugasanga ibiziga bishirwa mu kibanza kimwe kugira bituririrwe hamwe kubera ibibanza vyabuze. Abanyamakuru mu bisagara bitandukanye barabeshuza ibitigiri bitangwa n'ubutegetsi, akenshi bakamara imisi itari mike ku bibanza vyo gutuririramwo ibiziga biharurira bonyene abapfuye. Ibiharuro bitangwa vyerekana ko abapfa mu bisagara bimwe bimwe basumba incuro cumi ibitangwa n'ubutegetsi. Aya mashusho yose yatangiwe uburenganzira.

headline: Coronavirus: Dr Tedros wa OMS ati: "reka kugira Covid-19 ikibazo ca politike"
text: Umukuru w'umuryango ujejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO asaba ko abantu bagira ubumwe mu kurwanya ikiza ca coronavirus, ni mu gihe uwo muryango waneguwe n'umukuru wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Donald Trump. Mw'ijambo yaraye ashikirije, umukuru wa OMS Tedros Ghebreyesus, yarashimagije igikorwa kiriko gikorwa n'uwo muryango, anasaba ko abantu boreka kugira covid-19 ikibazo ca politike. Bwana Trump avuga ko agiye kwihweza ingene yohagarika imfashanyo itangwa na Amerika muri uwo muryango. Trump yagiriza OMS ko "yegamiye cane ku ruhande rw'u Bushinwa". Dr. Tedros ariyamiriza ayo majambo, agashimangira ati "Turi kumwe n'ibihugu vyose, kandi nta vangura rituranga". Inyuma y'aho yifatiye mu gahanga OMS ku wakabiri, Bwana Trump yarasubiye aranegura kandi ejo ku wa gatatu uwo muryango mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru, avuga ko uwo muryango "utegerezwa kwerekana neza ibikorwa ushira imbere". Avuga ko Amerika igiye gukora umwihwezo kugira ngo ifate ingingo nimba ishobora kubandanya itanga intererano yayo muri OMS. Ati: "Babanje kuvuga ko ari ibinyoma. Tugiye guhagarika amahera dutanga muri OMS". Eka n'umunyamabanga ajejwe imigenderanire w'ico gihugu Mike Pompeo na we ejo ku wa gatatu yabwiye abanyamakuru ko ubutegetsi bwariko "bwihweza intererano yacu duha OMS". Pompeo ati: "Amashirahamwe ategereza gukora. Ategerezwa kwerekana ko ariko akora ivyo yiyemeje". Coronavirus yatanguye kwibonekeza mu kwa 12 kw'umwaka uheze mu gihasagara ca Wuhan mu Bushinwa, ababa muri ico gisagara ubu basubiye kwemererwa gusohoka inyuma y'ivyumweru 11 bugaranywe. Umwe mu bahanuzi b'umukuru wa OMS yari yavuze ko kubona  barakoranye cane n'u Bushinwa "vyabaye ngirakamaro cane" mu gushobora gutahura ivy'iyo ndwara kuva icaduka. Ayo majambo anegura OMS yashikirijwe na Perezida Trump aje mu gihe ubutegetsi bwiwe bunegurwa cane ko bwavyifashemwo nabi mu guhangana n'ico kiza. Tedros ntafise ubwoba ko Amerika yohagarika intererano yayo Ejo ku wagatatu, Dr Tedros yavuze ati: "Ndabasavye, mugire ubumwe mu gihugu cose, reka kugira Covid-19 ikibazo ca politike". "Ubwa kabiri, isi yose ifatane mu nda. Hanyuma n'ubutegetsi bwa Amerika n'u Bushinwa bube ubutegetsi bwizigiwe". Yishura ku majambo yavuzwe na Trump, Dr. Tedros yateye akamo ati: "Ibihugu bikomeye vyategerezwa gufata iya mbere, kandi ndabasavye mureke gukorera politike kuri Covid-19". Amerika ni kimwe mu bihugu bitanga intererano nini muri uwo muryango, ibiharuro vya OMS bikerekana ko itanga ibice 15% vy'amahera yose akoreshwa. Dr. Tedros ejo ku wagatatu yavuze ko ata bwoba afise kuri ayo majambo yo guhagarika intererano, akavuga ko yizeye ko Amerika izobandanya iyitanga. Imbere y'aho, umunyamabanga w'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU, António Guterres, yari yashikirije ijambo ashigikira uwo muryango. Yavuze ko coronavirus ari ikiza "kitari bwaboneke", amenyesha ko ivyo kwihweza ingene isi yahanganye naco vyoba ivyo muri kazoza. Ati : "Ubu ni umwanya wo kuja hamwe, aho isi yose itegerezwa gukorera hamwe, dufatane mu nda kugira ngo duhagarike uwu mugera n'inkurikizi zawo". Abategetsi b'ibihugu vya Afrika nka Paul Kagame w'u Rwanda, Cyril Ramaphosa wa Afurika y'Epfo na Hage Geingob wa Namibia batangaje ko bashigikiye OMS mu rugamba irongoye rwo kurwanya Covid-19.

headline: Burundi: OLUCOME iriyamiriza ingingo yo kwugara ibiryo vy'abavunjayi (bureau de change)
text: Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya igiturire n'isesagurwa ry'itunga ry'igihugu, OLUCOME, aranegura ingingo y'Ibanki Nkuru y'u Burundi yo kwugara amazu adandaza amafaranga  mvamakungu. Mw'itangazo yasohoye kuri uyu wa kabiri, Gabriel Rufyiri arongoye Olucome avuga ko iyo ngingo itazotorera umuti ikibazo c'ikena ry'amafaranga mvamakungu cibonekeza mu gihugu. Ku wa 07 z'uku kwa kabiri, Ibanki Nkuru y'Uburundi, BRB, yarafashe ingingo yo kwaka impusha amashirahamwe yose acuruza amafaranga mvamakungu mu Burundi. Iyagiriza ko atashoboye gukurikiza ibiri mu rwandiko rwerekana ingene amafaranga mvamakungu avunjwa, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'igihugu, nk'uko BRB ibivuga. Mw'iryo tangazo, Bwana Rufyiri avuga ati: "Iyo ata mafaranga y'agaciro ahari, ingingo nk'iyo siyo iza gukemura ikibazo kuko ibiciro vy'amafaranga y'agaciro bivana n'ingene aboneka kw'isoko ryayo". Yibutsa ko iryo kena ry'amafaranga y'agaciro rituma ibidandazwa bimwe bimwe mu gihugu bikena kubera hakenerwa ayo mafaranga kugira ngo hagurwe ibikoresho nkenerwa mu guhingura ivyo bidandazwa. Atanga akarorero k'isima, amafanta, ibiyeri n'ibindi, avuga ko "iyo bibonetse usanga bigurishwa ku biciro vy'umurengera". Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyarahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kandi amafaranga y'agaciro akena. Leta y'u Burundi yagiye ifata ingingo mu ntumbero yo kugenzura ko urudandazwa rw'amafaranga mvamakungu, ariko cagumye ari ikibazo ngorabahizi, arico catumyeIbanki Nkuru y'igihugu yugara amashirahamwe yose adandaza ayo mafaranga. Olucome isaba leta kuvyura imigenderanire n'ibihugu bitanga imfashanyo, kwongereza ibidandazwa bishorwa hanze, guhimiriza abarwizatunga b'banyamahanga kuzana imitahe yabo mu gihugu, kunagura igisata c'ingenzi, ivyo vyose kugira ngo amafaranga mvamakungu yinjire mu Burundi.

headline: Abashingamateka ba Bulaya basaba irekurwa ry'abamenyeshamakuru b'ikinyamakuru Iwacu
text: Hari abashingamateka ba Bulaya bandikiye umushikiranganji w'ubutungane w'u Burundi bamusaba kurekura abamenyeshamakuru b'ikinyamakuru Iwacu bapfunzwe. Térence Mpozenzi, Agnès Ndirubusa, Egide Harerimana, Christine Kamikazi barapfunzwe kuva ku wa 26 z'ukwezi kw'icumi bagirizwa "kugira uruhara mw'ihungabanywa ry'umutekano w'igihugu". Bafashwe mu gihe bariko bakurikirana igitero c'abitwaje ibirwanisho mu ntara ya Bubanza cabaye ku wa 22 z'ukwezi kw'icumi. Ku wa 20/11 Sentare isubiramwo imanza ya Ntahangwa mu gisagara ca Bujumbura yafashe ingingo yo kubandanya ipfunze abo bamenyeshamakuru. Mu kwezi guheze, Umushikirizamanza mukuru wa Repubulika y'u Burundi yatangaje ko abo bamenyeshamakuru badapfunzwe kubera umwuga wabo ahubwo kubera ivyaha bagirizwa. Abo bashingamateka ba Bulaya bamenyesha ko abamenyeshamakuru badategerezwa gufatwa nk'inkozi z'ikibi kubera bashitse ahariko habera imidugararo mu ntumbero y'ukumenya ukuri. Muri iryo kete ryanditswe n'abashingamateka 38 bari mu nama nshingamateka ya Bulaya, bamenyesha umushikiranganji Aimée Laurentine Kanyana ko batewe impungenge n'uko abo bamenyeshamakuru babandanya bapfunzwe, bahorwa igikorwa cabo co kurondera amakuru. Ibiro vy'umwe mu bariteyeko igikumu vyemereye BBC ko iryo kete ari iry'aba bashingamateka. BBC ntirashobora kuvugana n'ubushikiranganji bw'ubutungane w'u Burundi kuri iri kete. Aba bashingamateka bibutsa ko ari uburenganzira bw'abamenyeshamakuru kurondera n'ukumenyesha abanyagihugu ibijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu. Bavuga ko ipfungwa ryabo rishobora gutuma abamenyeshamakuru badashobora gushikiriza amakuru ajanye n'ibibazo nkoramutima. Muri ivyo bavuga ivyerekeye imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho, ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu canke ihotorerwa rishingiye ku vyiyumviro vya politike. Bibutsa ko ibwirizwashingiro ry'u Burundi riha Abarundi uburenganzira bw'ugushikiriza ivyiyumviro vyabo, harimwo n'uburenganzira bw'ukumenyesha amakuru. "Kuri ivyo, ipfungwa ryabo rirateye amakenga kandi riteye kubiri n'ivyo u Burundi bwiyemeje mw'ibwirizwashingiro n'amasezerano mpuzamakungu". Basaba ko ikibazo cabo cosubirwamwo, bakarekurwa ata kirinze gusabwa, kandi bakareka abamenyeshamakuru bagakora umwuga wabo badatinya gufatwa canke gukubagurwa.

headline: Ethiopia: Gukoresha gusambanya ku nguvu nk'ikigwanisho mu ntambara ya Tigray - Amnesty
text: Igisirikare ca  Ethiopia n'izindi ngabo zigishigikiye zirakorera abagore  amabi ashingiye ku gitsina harimwo kubasambanya ku nguvu nk'umukenyuro w'intambara, nk'uko bivugwa na Amnesty International. Intera y'amabi mu kiringo c'amezi icenda intambara imaze mu buraruko bw'igihugu iri ku rugero rw'ivyaha vyo mu ntambara, nk'uko iryo shirahamwe mpuzamakungu ribivuga. Umugore umwe yavuze ingene yasambanijwe n'umugwi w'abantu benshi imbere y'abana biwe. Abategetsi ba Ethiopia ntaco baravuga kuri ivyo birego. Amnesty ivuga ko "ivyemezo bikomeye" vyerekana ko ubukozi bw'ikibi bufatiye ku gitsina bwakozwe kuva mu minsi ya mbere y'intambara. Yatanguye mu kwezi kwa 11 igihe umugambwe Tigray People's Liberation Front  watera ikambi ya gisirikare ubwo wari umaze kutumvikana n'umushikiranganji wa mbere ku vyerekeye impinduka za poritike. Muragaba: abantu bamwe bashobora gusanga ibiri muri iyi nkuru bibabaza cane Iryo shirahamwe ryavuganye n'abagore n'abana 63  bo muri Tigray bavuga ko basambanijwe ku nguvu n'ingabo za Ethiopia canke iza Eritrea canke abagwanyi bo ku ruhande rwa reta bo mu migwi n'ingabo zo  mu ntara bihana urubibe ya Amhara. Uwanditse icegeranyo yabwiye BBC ko  ivyo yabwiwe n'abo bavuganye biri mu vya mbere bibi cane yumvise mu kazi kiwe. Madame Donatella Rovera yagize ati: "Urugero rw'ukuryoherwa no gukora ikibi no guhutaza abantu ataco bahorwa hongeyeko gusambanya ku nguvu vyavuna umutima." Umugore w'imyaka 39 yavuze ingene yafashwe n'abasirikare b'abanya Eritrea ari mu rugendo ari kumwe n'abana biwe babiri. Yabwiye Amnesty ati: "Batanu muri bo baciye bansambanya ku nguvu imbere y'abana banje". "Bakoresheje ikigegene c'icuma, basanzwe bakoresha mu kwoza inkoho, mu kunturira. Barungika ibigegene vy'ivyuma mu gitereko canje; ivyo nivyo vyambaje cane. Hanyuma baca banta ngaho kw'i barabara." Bamwe mu bagore Amnesty yabajije bavuze ko babagumije ikiringo c'indwi nyinshi basambanywa mu buryo bwisubiriza, rimwe na rimwe n'abagabo benshi. Abarenga 50 kw'ijana muri abo bagore bagirije ingabo za Eritrea gukora ayo mahano, babamenyera ku buryo bavuga ururimi rw'igi-Tigrinya hamwe n'imyambaro yabo ya gisirikare. Amnesty isaba ONU kurungika vyihuta umugwi w'abahinga muri Tigray gukora amatohoza asumba ngaho ku bishobora kuba ivyaha bikorewe zina muntu. Abategetsi ba Ethiopia BBC yarondeye ntibishuye kugira  hagire ico bavuze. N'akamo ka Amnesty  ku bategetsi ba Ethiopia na Eritrea nako karirengagijwe. Uburyo ubwo bubisha bwakozwe henshi bisigura ko abategetsi ba gisirikare bashobotra kuba bari bazi ibiriko biraba kandi ko abategetsi bo hejuru muri Ethiopia na Eritrea birabira hirya. Icegerenyo kivuga kiti: "Uburyo amabi yakorwa ufatiye ku bishikirizwa n'abayakorewe bwerekana ko ayo mabi yabaye kimwe mu mikenyuro yo gutera ubwoba, gutesha agaciro no kumaramaza baba abayakorerwa waba n'umugwi w'ubwoko bwabo." Madame Robera avuga ko abakorewe ayo mabi bataronse ingene bashikira ububasha bakeneye kugira bakire kandi benshi ubu babaye mu bukene mu makambi y'impunzi muri Sudan canke muri Tigray. Ku wa kabiri, igihe umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia yahamagarira abanyagihugu basanzwe (aba Civil)  kuja mu ngabo kugwana muri Tigray, yagirije ingabo za Tigray, zigizwe n'iza TPLF n'abafatanya nazo, kwinjiza abana mu ngabo, gusambanya abagore ku nguvu no kuzibira imfashanyo. Amnesty ivuga ko ata mugore n'umwe baravugana yagiriza ingabo za Tigray gusambanya ku nguvu, ariko ivuga ko igiye kubikurikiranira hafi mu gihe ubu intambara yarenze imbimbibe z'iyo ntara. Uwo mugambwe, ubu wiswe umugwi w'iterabwoba na reta, ariko wo ukabandanya uvuga ko ariwo reta yemewe ya Tigray, wagiriza reta gukoresha "amajambo y'uburozi" ku banya-Tigray hamwe no kuzibira imfashanyo.

headline: Amafoto meza ya Afrika muri iyi ndwi:12-18 Munyonyo 2021
text: Amafoto meza yatoranijwe ku mugabane wa Afrika no mu yindi mihingo. Amafoto yose afise uburenganzira bwo gukoreshwa.

headline: Amakenga ajanye n'ubuhinga bwo kwigiza inyuma guca imvyaro (menopause)
text: Abahinga bakomeje kwerekana amakenga, ajanye n'ubuhinga bushasha  bwo kuvura, bwemeza ko bishoboka kwigiza inyuma guca imvyaro ku bakenyezi canke menopause, gushika ku myaka irenga 10. Abakenyezi bamwe baramaze kuriha amafranga angana hafi ibihumbi 6 vy'amapoundi yo kwivuza muri ubwo buryo. Umwigisha wo muri Kaminuza Simon Fishel, arongoye umugwi w'abaganga ujejwe ubuhinga bwo guhuza intanga y'umugabo n'igi ry'umugore bibereye hanze y'igitereko bita IVF, avuga ko uyo mugambi utuma amahirwe yo kuronka ikibondo mu buzima bw'abakenyezi, yiyongera. Utuma kandi ibibazo bishikira amagara bivuye ku guca imvyaro - nk'indwara ziva ku mero y'umutima n'amagufa adakomeye - zigwanywa. Ubuhinga Ubwo buhinga burimwo kubaga agace gatoyi k'akagi kamwe kari mu gitereko - kagizwe n'agace gatoyi cane, kandi gakanyishwa ahakanye cane. Dushobora gukanyishwa cane,  mu nyuma tugaterwa mu mubiri. Inkuru zitangwa n'abaganga bigenga bakora ubwo buvuzi  zivuga ko iyo umukenyezi akeneye ko bamubaga kugira ako kagi gasubire mu mubiri, ashobore kuronka ikibondo, gashobora gusubizwa mu karingoti kajamwo igi mu gitereko, igihe kigeze. Iyo intumbero yiwe ari  ukwigiza inyuma guca imvyaro, kugira bishoboke ngo gashobora gushirwa mu kibanza kirimwo amaraso akwiye gashobora gukenera - akenshi  ni mu kwaha. Uko ukurayo ako kagi hakiri kare, biciye ku bikorwa vyo kwa muganga,  nk'uko Fishel abivuga, niko gashobora kugira akamaro cane - kandi niko haba n'imisemburo myinshi. Ariko gushika ubu abakenyezi 11 gusa nibo bamaze kuvugwa biciye muri ubu buryo. Muganga Fishel aremera ko ubu buhinga bukiriko burageragezwa uko buri bwose, ariko  ko  ibice bimwe bimwe vyabwo bitariko birigwa. Ubundi buhinga bwo kuvura bwashoboye gukoreshwa n'abaganga mu gufasha abakanyezi ngo amagi yo mu gitereko yabo ntareke gukora kubera kuvurwa ingwara ya kanseri. Ubu rero hariho amakuru akwiye yerekana ko  uburyo bwo kuvura nk'ubu budafise ingaruka mbi. Ariko Muganga Melanie Davies ajejwe kubungabunga  umugambi wo kurondoka mu Bwongereza,  aragabisha abakenyezi bafise amagara meza, ko kugenda kwibagisha mugihe bidakenewe,  mu ntumbero yo kwizera kugumana ubushobozi bwo kurondoka muri kazoza,  no gusubiriza imisemburo. Avuga ati: ''Turazi ko gusubizaho ubushobozi bwo kurondoka bishoboka, mu rugero rw'abakenyezi bagwaye indwara ya kanseri''. ''Ariko, nta mukenyezi n'umwe arahura n'iki kibazo gushika ubu, kandi nta vyemezo ko aho hantu babaze hazoguma hameze neza gushika ku myaka irenga 10. Rero bizofasha gakeyi cane  gusubiriza imisemburo. ''Ugusubiriza imisemburo bisanzwe biriho kwa muganga,  birakorerwa ubushakashatsi cane,  kandi biri henshi kugira abakenyezi bemere gutora gufata iyo misemburo''. Muganga Davies, umukuru w'umugwi w'ubuhanuzi  bujejwe imiti ijanye no guca imvyaro mu Bwongereza, avuga ko ingaruka zijanye no gushobora gukura akagi, n'ivyo kabitswemwo mu kibanza cako, mu ntumbero yo kudukoresha haheze igihe kinini, harimwo ukurondoka, bisaba ukundi gusuzumwa Si abakenyezi bose bakeneye imiti igabanya ibimenyetso vyo guca imvyaro, ariko hari inzira zitandukanye zishoboka. Ukuvyivuza neza ni ugusubiriza imisemburo, bigabanya ibimenyetso vyinshi bifitaniye isano, na cane cane ubushuhe mw'ijoro, n'ukugira utuvyimbe mu maso - naho bitohanurwa kuri bamwe. Izindi ntambwe zishobora gukoreshwa ni izi:

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Ramos, Bale, Camavinga, Patricio, Belotti, Gilmour, Greenwood
text: Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Espagne Sergio Ramos w'imyaka 35 ariko arihweza ivyo yemerewe na Manchester City, Paris St-Germain na Bayern Munich imbere y'uko afata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe. (ESPN) Tottenham Hotspur nta buryo ifise yo kwongereza amasezerano y'intizo ifise ku mukinyi Gareth Bale wo muri Pays de Galles/Wales kugira ngo irabe ko yokwongera ikamugumana mu kindi kiringo c'umwaka ugira kabiri mu gihe uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 31 yiteze gusubira mu murwi wiwe wa  Real Madrid, aho asanzwe afise amasezerano asigaje amezi 12. (Evening Standard) Rennes ivuga ko itarigera ibona umurwi urondera umukinyi wo hagati, umufaransa Eduardo Camavinga w'imyaka 18, n'aho hari amakuru avuga ko arongerwa na Manchester United hamwe na Paris St-Germain. (Metro) Roma iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano n'umunyegori w'umunya Portugal Rui Patricio w'imyaka 33 asanzwe akina muri Wolves. (Sky Sports) Chelsea iriko irihweza ko yogura umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona Miralem Pjanic w'imyaka 31 akomoka muri osnia and Herzegovina, ariko ishobora kumurwanira na Juventus hamwe na Paris Saint-Germain. (Sun) Arsenal iripfuza umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu, umunya  Portugal Nuno Tavares w'imyaka 21 asanzwe akina muri Benfica. (Sky Sports) AC Milan yahawe amahirwe yo kugura umusatirizi  w'umunya Colombia James Rodriguez w'imyaka 29 akina muri Everton, hamwe n'umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona, umunya Brésil Philippe Coutinho w'imyaka 29. (Tuttosport - in Italian) Newcastle igiye guhiganwa n'umurwi uherutse gutahukana ihiganwa ry'Ubufaransa Lille mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma w'umufaransa William Saliba w'imyaka 20 asanzwe yaratijijwe na Arsenal. (Mail) Chelsea ntirota irekura umunya Espagne akina inyuma Marcos Alonso w'imyaka 30 muri rino ci n'aho Barcelona na Inter Milan yompi imwipfuza. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Arsenal irarondera cane umusatirizi wa  Torino umutariyano Andrea Belotti w'imyaka 27, ariko AC Milan, Fiorentina, Napoli na Roma nayo nyene iriko iramukurikirana.  (Tuttosport, via 90Min) Umusatirizi wa Inter Milan umunya Uruguay Martin Satriano w'imyaka  20 aripfuzwa n'imirwi ya Arsenal, Everton, Tottenham. (Mail) Leicester City ni umwe mu mirwi irondera muri rino ci umusatirizi w'umutariyano Domenico Berardi w'imyaka 26 asanzwe akina muri Sassuolo. (Gazzetta Dello Sport, via Leicester Mercury) Norwich City iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano y'intizo ku mukinyi wo hagati w'umunya Ecosse Billy Gilmour w'imyaka 20 asanzwe akina muri Chelsea. (Sky Sports) Liverpool ishobora kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Porto umunya Brésil Otavio w'imyaka 26 imbere y'uko ingingo yemeza ko uwumukeneye ategerezwa gutanga imiriyoni 47 arangira ku wa gatatu.  (Star) Aston Villa na Norwich yompi iriko iragerageza kugura umunyegori w'umwongereza Matthew Cox  w'imyaka 18 asanzwe asamira AFC Wimbledon yo mw'ihiganwa  League One. (Football Insider) Barcelona iriko irihweza ingene yogiriranira amasezerano mashasha y'imyaka ibiri n'umukinyi w'umunya Espagne Sergi Roberto w'imyaka 29, ni mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi azorangira mu 2022. (Marca) West Ham United ishobora kugena Alan Irvine yahora aci icegera c'umumenyereza wayo David Moyes kugira abe umukuru w'igisata kijejwe umupira w'amaguru muri uyo murwi.  (Football Insider)

headline: Austria: Umuganga yaciwe ihadabu kubera ukwihenda agaca umurwayi ukuguru kutariko
text: Umuganga abaga muri Autriche (Austria) yaciwe ihadabu kubera yaciye ukuguru kutariko umurwayi mu munsi iheze. Ukuguru kw'i buryo k'uwo murwayi ageze mu za bukuru kwaraciwe kandi yagomba gucibwa ukw'i bubamfu, ikosa rija kubonwa haheze iminsi vyabaye. Ku wa gatatu, sentare yo muri Linz yasanze uwo muganga w'imyaka 43 yagize ikosa ryo gufata ibintu minenerwe cane aca acibwa ihadabu ry'ama dorari hafi 3000 (hafi miriyoni 6 z'amafaranga y'Uburundi). Umupfakazi w'uwo murwayi, yapfuye imbere y'uko urubanza rushika muri sentare, yanahawe amadorari ashika hafi 6.000 y'indishi. Uwo murwayi yagiye muri ivyo bitaro vyo muri  Freistadt mu kwezi kwa Rusama (ukwezi kwa gatanu) kugira acibwe ukuguru ariko umuganga yashize ikimenyetso ku kuguru kwo gucibwa kutariko, nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AfFP. Iryo kosa ryagiye kugaragara mu gikorwa ca minsi yose co guhindura pansuma hanyuma umurwayi aca abwirwa ko n'ukundi kuguru gutegerezwa gucibwa. Ico gihe, ibitaro vyari vyavuze ko iryo kosa ryari ryabaye  "biturutse ku rukurikirane rw'ivyashitse bibabaje". Umuyobozi wavyo yarasavye imbabazi  icese mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru. Muri sentare, uwo muganga abaga yavuze ko  habaye ikosa  ku murongo w'ingene hahererekanywa ivyo gukora mu cumba co kubaga. Abajijwe igituma yashize ikimenyetso ku kuguru kw'i buryo aho kugishira ku kuguru kw'i bubamfu, uwo muganga w'umugore yavuze yavuze ati "Ntavyo nzi". Kuva ivyo bibaye, uwo muganga yimukiye mu bindi bitaro. Iigice c'amafaranga y'ihadabu yaciwe yarahagaritswe. Amakosa nkayo  ntakunze gushika ariko vyari bimaze kuba muri kahise. Mu 1995, umuganga wo muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yamenye agejeje hagati kubaga ko yariko araca ukuguru kutariko umuntu yari arwaye diabete. Vyabaye  ngombwa ko abandanya kuko yari amaze guhimbura ibitari bike.

headline: Filime ivuga ku mukobwa w'umuhanuzi Muhammad yahagaritswe mu Bwongereza
text: Ikigo cerekana za filime co mu Bwongereza, Cineworld, cahagaritse kwerekana mu mazu ya filime (cinema) yaco yose muri ico gihugu filime ivuga ku mukobwa w'umuhanuzi w'idini rya Islamu, Muhammad, nyuma y'imyiyerekano yadutse hanze y'ama-cinema amwe amwe. Ico kigo ca cinema cavuze yuko cafashe iyo ngingo "ku bw'umutekano w'abakozi n'abakiriya bacu". Abantu barenga 120.000 bashize umukono ku nyandiko isaba ko filime yitwa The Lady of Heaven (Umudamu w'Ijuru) itokwerekanwa muri za cinema zo mu Bwongereza. Ihuriro ry'imisigiti, The Bolton Council of Mosques, ryavuze ko iyo filime ari sakirirego kandi irimwo amacakubiri afatiye kw'idini. Ariko umukenguzamateka Baroness Claire Fox yavuze ko iyo ngingo "ari icago ku bugenegene kandi ikaba ari mbi cane ku bwigenge bwo gushikiriza iciyumviro". Nayo umushikiranganji w'Ubwongereza ajejwe amagara y'abantu, Sajid Javid, yavuze yuko "atewe umwitwarariko cane n'umuco wo kwiyamiriza uriko uragwirirana" mu Bwongereza. Iyo filime yakuwe mu bigo vya cinema vy'ikigo Cineworld nyuma y'amakuru y'imyiyerekano mu miji wa Bolton, Birmingham na Sheffield. I Bolton, abantu barenga ijana bagize imyiyerekano hanze ya cinema, nk'uko vyatangajwe n'ikinyamakuru caho, Bolton News. Mu butumwa bwa email bugenewe Cineworld bwashizwe ahabona na Bolton News, umukuru w'urwego Bolton Council of Mosques, Asif Patel, yavuze ko iyo filime "irimwo ingengabitekerezo y'amacakubiri afatiye ku dini" kandi yuko "ivuga ukutari ko kahise k'idini ikanasuzuguza icubahiro Islamu ihabwa n'amateka yayo". Igitangazamakuru cegamiye idini rya Islamu co kuri internet, 5Pillars, catangaje kuri Twitter amafoto y'abo cavuze ko ari aba-Islamu 200, bari mu myiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza iyo filime imbere y'inyubakwa ya Cineworld i Birmingham ku munsi wa Mungu. Video yahanahanywe kuri internet isa n'iyerekana umuyobozi w'inyubakwa ya Cineworld i Sheffield ariko arabwira abari mu myiyerekano ko iyo filime yahagaritswe kwerekanwa, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ikinyamakuru Guardian. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Umuhinguzi mukuru (executive producer) ari mu bateguye iyi filime, Malik Shlibak, yabariye BBC ko abari mu myiyerekano bigenza "nk'amabandi arenganya abandi, bakisuka muri za cinema banatera ubwoba abahakora". "Ibi ni ibintu bitari bikwiye kwihanganirwa mu Bwongereza", nk'uko yabandanije avuga, aca agabisha yuko guhagarika kwerekana iyi filime bizoha ingoga abakoresha ukwiyamiriza nk'uko muri kazoza.
