Yabandanije agira ati "ibi birarengeye filime. Uno munsi hifatiwe mu gahanga filime Lady of Heaven, ejo harashobora kwiyamirizwa ikindi kigushika ku mutima kurusha". Yavuze kandi yuko abakora imyiyerekano batazoshobora kubuza kubaho kw'iyi filime.

headline: Covid-19: Tanzania ivuga ko idakeneye incanco za corona ubu, ihimiriza imiti kama
text: Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Tanzania Muganga Dorothy Gwajima, avuga ko iki gihugu ata mugambi gifise wo gutumako incanco za coronavirus. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ku mugoroba wo ku wa mbere ku mugwa mukuru Dodoma, umushikiranganji Gwajima yavuze ko muri Tanzania ata Covid-19 iriyo, akaba yasavye abanyagihugu gufata ingingo zo kwikingira harimwo no gukoresha imiti kama. Ati: ''Muri uno mwanya ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu nta mugambi wo kwakira urucanco rwa corona canke Covid-19, ruvugwa ko rumaze kuboneka rukaba ruriko rurakoreshwa mu bindi bihugu". Aya majambo ayashikirije mu gihe icegera ca mbere c'umukuru wa Zanzibar, Maalim Seif Hamad Sharif, umugore wiwe hamwe na bamwe mu bafasha biwe banduye coronavirus. Avuga ko reta iciye mu bushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu ifise inzira yayo ikurikiza iyo ishaka kwakira ibidandazwa ivyo ari vyo vyose mu gisata c'ubuvuzi. Ari kumwe n'icegera ciwe hamwe n'umuhinga mu bijanye n'imiti kama wo mw'ishirahamwe rikora ubushakashatsi ku miti muri Tanzania, National Institute for Medical Research (NIMR), umupfasoni  Gwajima yerekanye ingene uwu muti kama utegurwa hakoreshejwe tangawizi, ibitunguru, indimu hamwe n'ipiripiri. Umushikiranganji Gwajima avuga ko igihugu gitekanye ariko agatera akamo abanyagihugu gufata ingingo zo kwikingira bivanye n'uko iki kiza kibandanya gikwirakwira mu bihugu bibanyi. Ati: " Rero ico ngomba kuvuga,igihugu cacu kiratekanye; turumva ko mu bihugu bibanyi hari ingorane, nturindire ngo iyi ndwara ive ku mubanyi yinjire iwawe kuko dusanzwe tugenderanira, rero twebwe turiteguye". Yongerako ati: "Iki nico kirwanisho utegerezwa gukora hanyuma ukanywa, ukinonora imitsi, ukanywa amazi menshi, ukaruhuka, ubuvuzi kama". Mu misi iheze, umushikiranganji w'ubutegetsi bw'igihugu, Selemani Jafo, yavuze ko iki gihugu cari cimirije gutanguza isekeza ryo kurwanya ikwirakwira ry'umugera wa coronavirus guhera  ku wa mbere igenekerezo rya 01/02/2021. Ahawe ijambo mu rugendo yarimwo ari kumwe n'umukuru w'ico gihugu John Pombe Magufuli mu ntara ya Tabora, yavuze ko iki kiza ata kibanza gifise mu gihugu kandi ko abanyagihugu bazobandanya batakambira Imana. Aya majambo ashikirijwe mu gihe havugwa ubundi bwoko bushasha bw'umugera wa coronavirus muri Afrika y'Epfo no mu Bwongereza, uriko urakwirakwira mu bihugu vya Afrika. Ku wa gatanu w'indwi iheze, umuvugizi wa reta ya Tanzania, Hassan Abbas, yavuze ko igihugu kibandanya gikurikiza ingingo zose zo kwikingira iki kiza, cane cane muri kino gihe isi ihanganye n'umurindi wa kabiri w'iki kiza. Avugana n'iradiyo EFM iri mu gisagara ca Dar es salam, Abbas yavuze ati: "Twebwe muri Tanzania duhagaze ha handi nyene, turazi ko hari ikibazo kw'isi, kandi isi iri mu rugamba rutoroshe, ariko ica mbere Abatanzania batsinde ubwoba, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu bwaratanze amabwirizwa ngenderwako". Umusi umwe inyuma y'aho Perezida Magufuli asabiye ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu kwihoza izi ncanco za corona, ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi ryahamagariye iki gihugu kwitegurira urucanco rwa corona nk'ibindi bihugu vyo kw'isi. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru hifashishijwe ubuhinga ngurukanabumenyi, umukuru wa OMS mu karere ka Afrika, Muganga Matshdiso Moeti , avuga ko ari ngombwa ko Tanzania ifata aka kanya habonetse urucanco ku nyungu z'abanyagihugu n'akarere kose ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko. Ati: "Twatanguye kuvugana n'abategetsi bo hejuru, kandi tubandanya dutanga intererano yacu nk'uko vyari bimeze kuva kera, kandi dushaka gukorana na Tanzania kw'izina ry'abanyagihugu ba Tanzania, ibihugu bibanyi n'isi yose muri rusangi". "Kimwe mu vyo tubwira Tanzania ni ukwibutsa reta ko ibi ari ibiri mu masezerano mpuzamakungu ajanye n'amagara y'abantu, aho ibihugu biri muri iri shirahamwe vyiyemeje vyose hamwe kurwanya ikwirakwira ry'indwara". Muganga Moeti avuga ko OMS yamye itanga intererano yayo ikanavugana na reta ya Tanzania kuva iki kiza karanda ca corona kigitangura. Iri shirahamwe kandi rirashimangira ko ari ngombwa ko Tanzania yama itanga ibiharuro vy'ingene corona yifashe mu gihugu kugira ngo vyorohe guhangana nayo no kuzibira kugira ngo ntihagire abandi bantu bandura. Muganga Moeti ati: "Kimwe mu vyo ibihugu bihurikiye muri iri shirahamwe vyumvikanyeko ni ugutanga ibiharuro vy'ingene iyi ndwara yifashe, iki nacibukije reta ya Tanzania kandi ndafise urwandiko rwerekana neza ko bategerezwa gukurikiza aya masezerano. Turizeye ko ivyo twumvikanye ku bijanye n'incanco bizokurikizwa kugira ngo turwanye uwu mugera".

headline: Burundi: CVR yatahuye ibinogo rusangi birenga 4000 vyahambwemwo abantu
text: Umurwi wo kumenya ukuri n'ukunywanisha Abarundi, CVR, umenyesha ko umaze guharura ibinogo rusangi 4,163 vyahamwembwo abantu bishwe mu magume u Burundi bwagiye bucamwo kuva bwikukira. Ivyo biri mu cegeranyo ca mbere c'umwaka uwo murwi washikirije inama nshingamatekan na nkenguzamateka kuri uyu wa kabiri. Kubwo umurwi CVR, ico gitigiri gishobora no kuzokwiyongera kubera gushika ubu hari "Abarundi benshi bataravuga ibinogo boba bazi n'aho biherereye". Ejo ku wa mbere, uyo murwi washize ahabona  amagufa y'abantu bari hagati ya 250 na 270 yabonywe muri karitiye Kamenge iri mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, bagandaguwe mu 1993. Muri ico cegeranyo, Pierre-Claver Ndayicariye arongoye uwo murwi yabwiye abashingamateka n'abakenguzamateka ko hari ibitaravugwa. Ati: "Ibinogo vyatawemwo abishwe mu gihugu ni vyinshi, hari ivyo Abarundi bataratumenyesha kubera ubwoba canke agahinda bibibutsa. Abarundi benshi bazi vyinshi ntibaravuga ivyo babonye canke bazi". Avuga ko hafi ivyo binogo vyose vyagiye kumenyekana ari uko aho biri "hariko harakorerwa ibikorwa vy'iterambere vy'igihugu, nko kubaka amabarabara, imiserege canke amashure. Icegeranyo cabo cerekana ko mu ntara zose uko ari 18 zirangwamwo ibinogo nk'ivyo, aho intara ya Gitega, ubu ariwo mugwa mukuru mushasha w'u Burundi, yabonywemo ibinogo bishika 640. Intara ya Cankuzo mu buseruko bw'igihugu niyo maze gutorwamwo bike, aho CVR imaze kuronka ibishika 41. Mu gihe ibitigiri vy'abahitanywe n'ayo magume yagiye asinzikaza u Burundi bitazwi neza, Bwana Ndayicariye avuga ko umugwi arongoye  "umaze gutohoza no kumenya ku buryo mfatakibanza igitigiri c'abantu bashika 142,505 bishwe canke bagiye mazi mayongo". Avuga ko ico gitigiri ari ico abantu bafitiye amazina kandi berekana iyo baturuka uhereye ku ntara, ikomine, umutumba canke ikaritiye. Asaba Abarundi bose ko botinyuka bakamenyesha abagize uyo murwi aho bazi hose hari ibinogo vyatawemwo Abarundi n'abanyamahanga muri ayo makuba. Kuva u Burundi bwikukira mu 1962, bwamye burangwamwo ubwicanyi bwa politike bushingiye ku moko, cane cane hagati y'abahutu n'Abatutsi. Ubuzwi cane bukaba ari ubwabaye mu myaka ya 1965, 1969, 1972, 1988, na 1993. Bwana Ndayicariye avuga ko ayo makuba yahitanye abantu benshi n'ibintu vyinshi, asiga mu miryango amaganya, intuntu n'akabonge. Avuga ko kurondera ukuri kuri ayo makuba yose vyofasha Abarundi gushinga inkingi z'ukunywanisha Abarundi ku buryo burama. Avuga ko ibi bizofasha abasaba ikigongwe kwiha  umwanya wo kugisaba, abatanga ikigongwe nabo bakiha umwanya wo kugitanga. Ati: "Ni yo nzira ibereye yo gutegura kazoza keza k'abariho uno musi n'abazovuka. Ivyo tubikora munzira yo kunywanisha atari munzira yo guca imanaza kuko umugwi CVR atari Sentare".

headline: Burundi: Uko Gynette Kamwemwe abasha gukina imikino itatu mu mirwi yo mu gice ca mbere
text: Inkuru ya Marc NIYONKURU Gynette Kamwemwe batazira Ngorore akina mu mirwi yo mu gice ca mbere mu mikino ya Football, Volleyball na Basketball, eka akanaba mu mirwi nserukiragihugu. Bakeya cane nibo bashobora ivyo nk'uko umumenyereza abivuga. Gynette w'imyaka 20 gusa, ni kizigenza w'umurwi w'umupira w'amaguru Faufila-PF, ni umusatirizi mu muri Aigre noir ya Volleyball, akaba n'icegera ca kizigenza mu murwi wa Basketaball wa Muzinga. Avuga ko akiri muto yatanguye gukina umupira abonye wose. Umumenyereza amuzi avuga ko bidasanzwe kubona abakinyi nk'uyu, bashobora no kubifatikanya n'amashure. 'Ngorore' ukunda cane umupira w'amaguru, yishimira cane ko yamaze kuduza ibendera ry'u Burundi mu makungu, kandi ngw'arakeneye gushika kure kuruta. Mu 2013, mu ihiganwa mpuzamakungu rya Volley beach, umurwi nserukiragihugu w'u Burundi yarimwo wararonse ikibanza ca kabiri. Gynette ariko ubu yabaye ahagaritse amahiganwa muri Basketaball kubera "utubazo duto duto turi mu gisata kijejwe amahiganwa ku rwego rw'igihgu" twatumye amahiganwa adindira umwaka wose. Yakuriye mu Ngagara mu mujyi wa Bujumbura aho yahora abona abasirikare bakina mu mugwi wa Muzinga. Ati: "Bahejeje gukina baca batwigisha gukina umupira". Mu nyuma niho yagiye agerageza iyindi mikino. Ati: "Ukwo mbonye umukino nagira nti 'Reka ndabe ko ntashobora uwu nawo kandi'." Gynette Kamwemwe avuga ko kubera imigenzo itorohereza rimwe na rimwe Abarundikazi ubwa mbere abavyeyi biwe batagomba ko aja gukina kuko bikeka ko vyomubuza kwiga. Avuga ko mu nyuma bamuretse kuko babona ko atunganya neza umwanya wa buri kimwe, akabasha kubikora vyose. Daniella Niyibimenya, umumenyereza mu mupira w'amaguru, avuga ko Kamwemwe afise impano yo kumenyera n'ingoga umukino uwariwo wose. Yemeza ko bidakunze kuboneka ko abigeme bakina imikino itandukanye ku rwego rukuru nka 'Ngorore'. Niyibimenya avuga ko igihambaye ku banyeshule bakina imipira itandukanye vyama bikenewe ko bakuriranwa cane kugira amahiganwa ntabasubize inyuma mu vyigwa. Ashima ko Gynette Kamwemwe yisigura neza muri kaminuza yigamwo.

headline: Imvo n'imvano ku Barundi baba mu karere ka Kwale muri Kenya bamaze imyaka irenga 60
text: Mu kiganiro c’imvo n’imvano c’uyu musi, tuja mu karere ka Kwale, mu bumanuko bwa Kenya, aho tuza kuganira n’abarundi bahaba haraciye imyaka irenga 60. Abo barundi bashitse muri Kenya mu myaka ya za 1950 bagiye gukora mu mirima ya makonge, y’ingatane mu rurimi rw’ikirundi, ibiterwa bakuramwo ubugwegwe. Benshi mubaje ico gihe baramaze gushengera, abana babo bari mu myaka 70. Na bo barashaje. Ikirundi kirabagora ariko barakivuga. Hari n’abacibuka iyo baje bava, abavukanyi eka mbere n’imico hamwe n’imigenzo vy’abarundi.  Bavuga ko ababamukako bose barenga igihumbi, ufatiye kubamaze kwiyandikisha baba muri ako karere ka Kwale gusa. Bose ntibagira ibibaranga. Ico kikaba ari co kibazo nyamukuru kibahanze kuko nta burenganzira na bumwe basa n’uko bafise. Ivyo batunze vyose bavyandika ku bo bubakanye b’abanye Kenya, ntibavuzwa, ntibashobora kudandaza, kwiga n’ikibazo mbere rimwe na rimwe baribwa ivyabo harimwo n’uruvyaro. Haraheze imyaka indwi bashikirije ico kibazo prezida wa Kenya Uhuru Kenyata, mu rugendo bagize bari kumwe n’abamakonde bamuka mu gihugu ca Mozambike, bobo bakaba bamaze kuronka ubwenegihugu, bava Kwale gushika ku kirimba ciwe i Nairobi, mu 2015. Kuva ico gihe bari mu muhango. Ishirahamwe riharanira agateka ka zina muntu muri Kenya, Haki Center, riri mu yafashije kugira ikibazo c’abo barundi kije ahabona, rivuga ko ikibazo cabo kizwi kuva hasi gushika hejuru mu butegetsi bwa kenya kandi ko ryizeye ko vuba kizotorerwa inyishu. Muri iki kiganiro rero mugiye kuba hamwe na Cyriaque Muhawenayo

headline: Kenya: Umukenguzamateka wa US yabonanye na Ruto na Raila, 'nta kijanye n'amatora cavuzwe'
text: Umukenguzamateka wa Amerika yabonanye na William Ruto aherutse gutsinda amatora y’umukuru w’igihugu muri Kenya, yongera abonana na Raila Odinga  yanse ivyavuye mu matora. Ibiro vy’uwuserukira Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika muri Kenya vyanditse kuri twitter ko  Chris Coons na William Ruto bavuganye "ugufashanya kw’imikenyuro hagati ya Amerika na Kenya, guteza imbere amahoro n’umutekano mu karere, n’inzira zo gukomeza ubutunzi [bw’ivyo bihugu vyompi]”. Nk’icegera c’umukuru w’igihugu, William Ruto aracafise ivyo arangura, ariko muri tweet y’ubuserukizi bwa Amerika, nta cavuwe ku ntsinzi ya Ruto canke ku mpari ziyerekeye. Ubuserukizi bwa Amerika muri Kenya gushika ubu ntiburakeza icegera c’umukuru w’igihugu ku ntsinzi yiwe mu matora. Ariko inyuma y'aho  umugwi ujejwe amatora muri Kenya utangarije ku wa mbere ko Ruto yatsinze amatora, ubuserukizi bwa Amerika muri Kenya bwarakiriye ko yatangajwe ko ariwe yatsinze amatora hanyuma bukeza umugwi ujejwe amatora n’abanya-Kenya ku matora yabaye mu mahoro no mu nteguro nziza. Umukenguzamateka Coons yabonanye kandi na Raila Odinga kugira bavugane ”imico myiza ya demokrasi bahuriyeko” nk’uko biri kuri twtter y’ubuserukizi bwa Amerika.   N’aho nyene nta na hamwe havugwa ko ibijanye n’amatora boba babivuganye. Uwo mukenguzamateka  yabonanye kandi n’umukuru w’igihugu, Uhuru Kenyatta, aho bivugwa ko  kwari "ukumuramutsa”.

headline: Pierre Nkurunziza: Umutambukanyi wiwe yashimye ibikorwa vyiwe n'iherezo ryiza
text: Umupfasoni Denise Nkurunziza asizwe na Pierre Nkurunziza yahoze arongoye u Burundi yagize inkomezi zo kuvuga ijambo mu kumusezera ubwa nyuma kuri uyu wa 26/06/2020 mu kibuga Ingoma c'i Gitega, avuga ko umugabo wiwe aherekejwe n'imirimo myiza yakoze. Umupfasoni Nkurunziza mu kwezi guheze yari yajanywe muri Kenya kuvurwa indwara itatangajwe agaruka mu gihugu haciye umunsi umwe leta imenyesheje ko umutambukanyi wiwe yashengeye mu ndwi zibiri ziheze. Ku kibuga ingoma cuzuye abantu ibihumbi, umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Tanzania Kassim Majaliwa eka n'umutambukanyi wa perezida wa Zambia mu bashitsi bakuru, Madamu Nkrunziza yabashije kugira ico ashikirije mu izina ry'umuryango. Yavuze ko ijambo ryiwe ari "ugukengurukira Imana ku gitangaza yadukoreye inyuma y'uko tubuze, ubwanje umukunzi, abana bakabura umuvyeyi". Yashimye Imana ko yabahaye inkomezi kuko ari igitangaza mu bihe bigoye nk'ivyo barimwo. Ati: "Kubura umuntu mu mwanya mutoya wari ugikunze kubana nawe ntibiba vyoroshe, ariko mu muryango Imana yaduhaye inkomezi zo guhagarara muri bino bihe". Yashingiye ku majambo yo muri Bibiliya avuga aho bakuye inkomezi, avuga ko iki cari igihe ciwe co kugenda akaba mbere asaba buri wese gutegura nawe igihe ciwe. Umupfasoni Nkurunziza yasubiyemo amajambo yavuzwe na Bwana Nkurunziza ati: "Yakunze kuvuga ko ikibi atari ugupfa ahubwo ari ugupfira igihugu nabi umuryango ukawupfira nabi". Ati: "Nimureke dushime Imana kuko agiye atigeze aduhemukira kandi ntiyahemukiye n'igihugu, kuko iyo ahemukira igihugu twari kuba hano ariko kandi tumaramaye...". Abanenga ubutegetsi Bwana Nkurunziza hamwe n'abaharanira agateka ka muntu, bakunze kunenga ubutegetsi bwiwe babwagiriza guhonyanga bikomeye uburenganzira bwa muntu. Umupfasoni Nkurunziza yavuze ati: "Indi dushimira Imana  uko arangije amahoro, atapfuye urupfu rw'agashinyaguro...ikindi naco yapfiriye mu mwami, yarangije neza". Yavuze ko Bwana Nkurunziza yakoze ibikorwa vyiza vyinshi bimuherekeje, eka mbere ko yagize n'urupfu mu mahoro. Umukuru w'igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko we n'Abarundi bose bazokwama bakurikiza iragi abasigiye, ryo gukunda igihugu nk'uko nawe yabikoze, yishimikije abamutanguriye. Ati: "Ntituzokumaramaza. Tuzogumiza ikirenge mu makanda ywe. Kurya nawe wagumye mu makanda y'abatuboneye izuba nka Ntare Rushatsi, Mwezi Gisabo, Rwagasore, Ndadaye n'izindi mfura z'u Burundi". "Jewe ubwanje ndahomvye, umuhanuzi mukuru, umwe abazwa vyose, akaba azi n'akari mu nda y'ingoma nk'uwayikanye, wa wundi amenya icasongoye ihwa". Bwana Kassim Majaliwa yagarutse ku bikorwa avuga ko vyakozwe na Perezida Nkurunziza, cane cane "mu kuvukanisha ibi bihugu vyompi". Yagarutse ku gikorwa yagiye atarangije kijanye n'ukwinjiza u Burundi mu muryango w'ibihugu vya Afrika y'ubumanuko, SADC. Bwana Majaliwa yagize ati: "Kimwe mu bikorwa yatanguye ariko agiye atarangije, ni igihe avugana n'umukuru w'igihugu John Pombe Magufuli wa Tanzania, umukuru w'umuryango wa SADC, asaba ko u Burundi nabwo bwokwinjira muri uyo muryango". "Turababaye kubona yigiriye iki gikorwa atakirangije". Yijeje Bwana Ndayishimiye ko Tanzaniya izomufasha kugira ngo "u Burundi nabwo bube kimwe mu bihugu bigize umuryango wa SADC. Inyuma y'imihango yabereye mu kibuga Ingoma, ikiziga ca Nkurunziza gishingurwa mu irimbi ry'umwihariko rimaze iminsi ricubakirwa aha i Gitega. Namara gushingurwa uyu munsi amabendera y'ibihugu vya Kenya, Rwanda, Tanzania na Uganda arongera kuduzwa gushika hejuru inyuma y'indwi zibiri aduzwa gushika mu ca kabiri mu kwifatanya n'u Burundi mu kigandaro.

headline: Yoshiro Mori: Umukuru wa Olympic za Tokyo yatanze imihoho kubera kuvuga 'ibitabereye' ku bagore
text: Umukuru w'umugwi utegura inkino za Olympic zizobera Tokyo yatanze imihoho inyuma yo kunegurwa ko yavuze ibintu "bitabereye" ku bagore. Yoshiro Mori, w'imyaka 83, vyanditswe ko yavuze ngo abagore bavuga menshi kandi ko inama n'abagore bo mu nama nyobozi ''zitwara umwanya muremmure''. Ayo majambo yaradugije ifurufumbi ry'abavyiyamiriza none Mori yarasavye imbabazi ico gihe ariko yaruhiye gutanga imihoho. Mori,yatanze imihoho  ku mugaragaro mu nama idasanzwe yabaye ku wa gatanu inyuma yo  kuvuga ivyo ku ndwi iheze. Yabwiye inama idasanzwe yabaye ku wa gatanu ati : "Igihambaye n'uko haba  inkino za Olympic kuva mu kwezi kw'indwi. Ntibikwiye ko kuba ndimwo bibera intambamyi ivyo," ari naho yaca atangaza ko atanze imihoho. Ntivyashotse bimenyekana uwugiye gusubirira Mori yahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere, . Ubwa mbere yari yahisemwo umuntu azwi cane mu gutunganya inkino Saburo Kawabuch w'imyaka 84 ngo amusubirire ariko n'ibi hari abavyiyamirije. Ibigo bikomeye bishigikira izo nkino navyo vyari vyashize amajwi hejuru mu kunegura ivyo yavuze harimwo na Toyota, iri mu bakomeye bshigikira cane inkino za Olympic. Umukuru wa Toyota, Akio Toyota yavuze ko iyo kompanyi "yababajwe'' n'ivyashikirijwe. Ku wa kabiri umugwi w'abashingwamanza b'abagore bambaye impunzu zera mu kwiyamiriza ivyavuzwe na Mori, hari n'abagabo bashigikiye mu kwambara uko nyene. Ku bw'ibinyamakuru vyo mu Buyapani, abantu bashika 400 nabo baranditse bavuga ko bahagaritse gusaba gukorera ubushake mu nkino za Olympic, zitegekanijwe mu bihe biri imbere uyu mwaka. Inama y'abarongoye umugwi utegura inkino ubu igizwe n'anbantu 24, batanu muri bo bakaba ari abagore. Mu 2019,inama y'abaronmgoye uwo mugwi-ujejwe guhitamwo abayapani bazokwitaba inkino,yihaye ihangiro ryo kwongereza igitigiri c'abagore bayigize gushika ku 40 kw'ijana. Mori bivugwa ko yagize ati: "Turamutse tudugije igitigiri c'abnagore bagize inama nyobozi, dutegerezwa kubasha kugabanya umwanya bafata mu kuvuga, barafise ingorane yo kurangiza, ivyo navyo bikaba bishavuza." Mori arazwi mu gihugu kuba yakuze kugwa mu rudubi no kuvuga ibitabereye abashitsi igihe yari mu nabanga hagati ya 2000 na 2001. \yabwiye ikinyamakuru co mu Yapani Mainichi ko abagore bo mu muryangoi wiwe nabo bamuryagaguye kubera ivyo yavuze.

headline: La Haye: Kabuga Felicien yasubiye kumenyesha ko adashaka uwumwunganira
text: Felicien Kabuga akekwa uruhara muri jonoside yo mu Rwanda yasubiye kubwira sentare ko adashaka uwumwunganira, Maitre Emmanuel Altit. Yabivugiye mu kwumvirizwa kw'uno munsi kwabaye hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa none, kwari ukwo kuraba nimba uruhande rurega n'ururegwa ata nzitizi bagifise zotuma urubanza rudatangura ukuri kwamye. Umucamanza w'igisata c'i La Haye mu Buholandi c'urwego rwasigaranye imanza zasizwe na Sentare Mpanavyaha Mpuzamakungu yashiriweko u Rwanda, Iain Bonomy, yabanje gusubiramwo intambwe zose uru rubanza rumaze gucamwo kuva uwuregwa agifatwa. Yibukije yuko yemerewe kuburanira i La Haye hako yojanwa i Arusha muri Tanzania kubera imvo z'amagara, anavuga yuko sentare ishikirizwa ivyegeranyo vy'ukuntu amagara y'uwuregwa yifashe. Ku nshuro zibiri zose kwumvirizwa kwagomvye gushirwa mu mwiherero bisabwe n'uwunganira Bwana Kabuga ari we Maitre Emmanuel Altit. Ku nshuro ya mbere urubanza rwashizwe mu mwihero igihe umucamanza Iain Bonomy yabaza niba hari inzitizi Bwana Kabuga yoba agise zobuza urubanza gutangura. Maitre Altit yavuze ko hari ikibazo c'amagara adashobora kuvugira ahabona, umucamanza aca ashira urubanza mu bwiherero. Kwumvirizwa kwashizwe mu mwiherero ubugira kabiri nyuma y'aho Kabuga aherewe ijambo ngo avuge inzitizi we abona zoba zikiriho, akavuga yuko gushika ubu atavugana n'uwumwunganira Maitre Altit, ko atamushikiriza amakuru n'amwe akaba ahubwo ashaka yuko yosubirizwa n'uwitwa Peter Robison. Maitre Altit abajijwe ico abivugako, yaciye abwira umucambanza yuko impungenge Bwana Kabuga amufiseko atozivugira ahabona, gutyo ukwumvirizwa gushirwa kandi mu mw'iherero. Twokwibutsa ko iki kibazo co kwanka kwunganirwa na Maitre Altit, Felicien Kabuga be n'umuryango wiwe bagishikirije kuva yashikamwa imbere ya sentare ku nshuro ya mbere mu kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe 2020, bakavuga yuko ata kwumvikana n'uwo mushingwamanza kuriho. Bwana Kabuga, yarengutse hakoreshejwe uburyo bwa video, yongeyeko yuko kiretse uwo mwunganizi wiwe adashaka, yumva ata kindi comubuza kwitabira urubanza rwiwe. Ubushinjacaha nabwo bwahawe ijambo, buvuga yuko ata nzitizi bobo bafise, kiretse kumenyesha ko hari ingingo zibiri batazokurikirana, ingingo bise ko ari izo mu muce wa 45 A, E hamwe na 64 A mu kirego bashikirije. Kwumvirizwa kwaciye kwimurirwa ku tariki itaciye imenyeshwa. Kabuga Felicien yafatiwe mu Bufaransa itariki 16/05/2020, nyuma y'imyaka irenga 20 aronderwa n'ubutungane ku ruhara yagirizwa muri jenoside yo mu Rwanda mu 1994.

headline: Uganda irarondera abashitse hafi y'umugore adandaza ifi yishwe na Ebola
text: Abategetsi ba Uganda bariko bararondera abantu boba barakoze ku mugore yerekanye ibimenyetso vya Ebola mu ndwi iheze, imbere yuko apfira mu karere ka Beni muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo. Uyo mukenyezi azwi nk'umudandaza w'ifi, nk'uko bivugwa n'abayobozi ba disctrict mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu,  yarayozwe (kuruka) ari kw'isoko rya Mpondwe ku rubibe rwa Uganda na Kongo ku munsi wa kane uheze,  imbere yo gusubizwa muri Kongo agahava yicwa n'ikiza ca Ebola. Bivugwa ko yajabutse muri Uganda ava muri Kongo aciye ku rubibe rutemewe n'amategeko. Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS, hamwe n'ubushikiranganji bwa Uganda bujejwe amagara y'abantu vyemeje ko uyo mukenyezi yadandaza ifi yishwe n'umugera wa Ebola. Abantu bacuruza  ifi baharugwa hafi amajana atandatu hamwe n'abavunjayi bo kw'isoko rya Mpondwe bariko bararonderwa kugira bahabwe urukingo. Mu kwezi kwa gatandatu, hari abantu babiri bishwe n'ingwara ya Ebola ku rubibe rwo mu burengero bwa  Uganda na Kongo. Kuva ico gihe, nta muntu n'umwe afise umugera wa Ebola arasubira kuvugwa muri Uganda. Kubona uyu muntu yahitanywe na Ebola vyateje impungengenge kw'ikwiragira ry'ikiza ca Ebola muri Uganda ariko abayobozi bo hasi barahumuriza abavuga ko batazokwegera isoko riri ku mupaka. Abantu barenga 6.000, benshi muribo bagizwe n'abakozi bo mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu, baracandazwe umugera wa Ebola muri Uganda kuva mu kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe mu 2018. Kuva ikiza ca Ebola gitanguye kuvugwa muri Kongo, abantu barenga 2000 baravuzwe ko banduye uyo mugera, kandi wahitanye abarenga 1500.

headline: Mikel Arteta yizeye ko Aubameyang yemeye kubandanya akinira Arsenal
text: Umumenyereza wa Arsenal, Mikel Arteta, afise icizere ko Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang "yagondojwe akemera kuguma muri uyo murwi" inyuma y'uruhara rukomeye yagize mu gutsinda Liverpool mu gikombe Community Shield. Aubameyang, kizigenza w'uyu murwi akaba afise amasezerano na Arsenal azorangira mu ci riza, yinjije igitsindo giteye igomwe - imbere y'uko Takumi Minamino akigaruza. Uru rukino rwa nijoro rwagiye kurangira iyi mirwi yompi inganya 1-1 biba ngombwa ko bayibangurukanya biciye kuri ya mipira itererwa ku metero 11, ariho Aubameyang yagiye kwinjiza igitsindo cahaye intsinzi Arsenal kuri 5-4. Arteta yabwiye iradiyo  BBC Radio 5 Live ati: "Ikikorwa canje ni ukumwumvisha ko ari mu kibanza nyaco mu mwanya nyawo". "Nibaza ko ico twagishitseko, hasigaye gusa kubishira ku rukaratasi, ibi navyo bikaba bisaba akanya". Haciye igihe Arsenal igerageza kugiriranira ayandi masezerano na Aubameyang. Uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 31 akomoka muri Gabon  amaze gutsinda ibitsindo 71 mu nkino 110 amaze gukinira uyu murwi kuva awushitsemwo mu kwa mbere 2018, aguzwe imiliyoni hafi 75 z'amadolari. Ni kizigenza w'uyu murwi kuva mu kwa cumi na rimwe asubiriye Granit Xhaka. Igitsindo ca nijoro yatsinze ku mupira yateye ari ku metero 20 cagize gatanu Aubameyang atsindiye ku kibuga ca Wembley. Igihe Arsenal ihura na Manchester City mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma c'igikombe ca FA, Aubameyang yateye ibitsindo bibiri vyose muri urwo rukino rwarangiye uyu murwi wa Arteta wirahiye Man City  2-0. Eka n'igihe Arsenal ihura na Chelsea mu gice ca nyuma ca FA (final), Aubameyang yarongeye atera ibindi bibiri muri uru rukino rwarangiye Arsenal itsinze Chelsea 2-1. Abajijwe ibijanye na kazoza kiwe inyuma yo gutahana igikombe ca Community Shield, Aubameyang yavuze ati: "Tuzoraba muri ino minsi. Uno munsi ni ukwigina igikombe. Nta bindi". "Turiko turatera imbere. Nivyo ko hakiri vyinshi vyo gukora, ariko dishimye rwose kandi ni igihe gishimishije co kuba umukinyi wa Arsenal". Igihe yakina mu murwi Dortmund mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Budagi, Aubameyang yatsindiye ikirato c'inzahabu mu 2017.

headline: Musenyeri mukuru wa Anglican muri UK arasaba imbabazi ku ruhara rw'Ishengero mu bucakara
text: Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury yasavye imbabazi inyuma y’aho amatohoza yerekaniye ko ikigega c’imitahe y’Ishengero rya anglicane mu Bwongereza gifitaniye isano n’ubucakara. Aya matohoza yakozwe asabwe n’ishami ry’iri shengero, Church Commissioners, rijejwe amatungo yaryo, yerekana ko mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 100 iki kigega cashize amafaranga menshi cane mw’ikompanyi yari ijejwe gutwara abantu mu bucakara. Ico kigega cari kizwi mu kinjana ca 18 kw’izina rya Queen Anne’s Bounty, cahavuye gihinduka ikigo c’imitahe ishika ku miriyaridi 10,1 z’amapawundi. Musenyeri mukuru Justin Welby avuga ko yababaye cane kwumva ishengero arongoye rifitaniye isano n’ubucakara. Ikigega Queen Anne's Bounty cashinzwe mu 1704 mu ntumbero yo gufasha abakozi b’Imana bari bakenye. Itohoza ku makonte yaco mu 1739 ryerekana ko umutahe  w’amapawundi 204.000 (ubu yababa imiriyoni 443 y’amapawundi nyene) washowe mw’ikompanyi South Sea Company yagurisha abacakara b'abanye-Afrika. South Sea Company yari ifise amasezerano yihariye yo kuvana abacakara muri Afrika ibatwara mu bihugu vyatwarwa na Espagne muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 30 kuva mu myaka ya 1710. Yatwaye ibihumbi mirongo vy’abacakara, amatohoza akerekana ko hafi 15% yabo bapfiriye mu nzira. Ishengero rya Anglicane mu Bwongereza ryabandanije rishora imitahe muri South Sea Company gushika mu kinjana ca 19. Uyu musenyeri mukuru avuga ati: “Uru rudandaza rw’agahomerabunwa rwafashe abagabo, abagore n’abana baremwe mw’ishusho y’Imana rubaka agateka kabo n’ubwigenge bwabo. “Birateye isoni kubona hari bamwe mw’Ishengero bashigikiye bikomeye bakegeranya amatungo muri uru rudandaza. “Inzira yonyene yo gukira koko kunywanisha – ari yo Yezu Kristu/Yesu Kristo aduhamagarira gufata – ni uko duhangana n’uku kuri kubabaje hanyuma tugafata ingingo”. Ku ruhande rumwe, Ishengero ry’Ubwongereza ririshimira uruhara ryagize mu guhagarika ubucakara, rigafatira ku ruhara umuvugabutumwa wa Anglicane, William Wilberforce, yagize. Ku rundi ruhande, ni ngombwa ko ryemera ko ryagiye ryungukira mu bucakara. Mu myaka iheze, Ishengero rya Anglicane mu Bwongereza riherutse gusaba imbabazi ku bakozi baryo batari bake babonetse ko bari bafise abacakara. Ryasavye imbabazi kubera ishami ryaryo rijejwe ubutumwa, The Society for the Propagation of the Gospel (twogereranya mu kirundi tuti “Umuryango wo gukwiragiza Inkuru nziza”), ryari rifise itongo ahitwa Barbados, maze rishira ikimenyetso ku bacakara ryakoresha mu gikiriza cavuga ngo SOCIETY (twogereranya n’ijambo UMURYANGO). Ubu rero, ku matohoza yaryo ryo nyene, ryemeye ko mu kiringo c’imyaka mirongo ikigega caryo cashoye imitahe y’amafaranga hafi yaryo yose – hampande y’ayo ryakoresheje mu kugura amatongo – mw’ikompanyi yari ifise uruhara yiharije rwo gutwara abacakara muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko. Mu gihe abarenga inusu y’abanywanyi b’Ishengero rya Anglicane kw’isi yose bari ku mugabane wa Afrika, iyi nkuru ishobora kutorosha ibintu. Ishengero rya Anglican mu Bwongereza ryatanguje aya matohoza mu ntumbero yo gushira ahabona kahise karyo rikavuga ko hagiye gutumwako umurwi wo kwiga inyishu ikwiriye. Ariko umuvugizi ntazi nimba ibi bisigura ko hagiye kuba ayandi matangazo n’amasengesho, canke nimba hashobora kubamwo n’ibiganiro ku bijanye n’indishi y’akababaro mu buryo bw’amafaranga. Aya matohoza yerekana kandi ko iki kigega cahawe intererano z’abantu bungukiye canke bafitaniye isano n’ubu bucakara bwabaye hagati y’imigabane hamwe n’ibikorwa vy’ubutunzi bwari bushingiye ku burimyi muri uru rudandaza rw’abantu. Uyu musenyeri mukuru yongerako ati: “Ndasabiye abo bose bakozweko n’iyi nkuru kandi nibaza ko dushobora gukorera hamwe tukihweza iyindi nzira twofata”.

headline: Omicron: Icigwa twokura ku biriko birashikira South Africa
text: Afrika y'Epfo ni ho ubwo bwoko bushasha bwa Omicron bwatowe ubwa mbere, ibitigiri vy'abandura muri ico gihugu bikaba vyaciye biduga cane. Ivyo biratanguye no kugenda gutyo mu bindi bihugu, kandi  ishami rya ONU riraba amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO rivuga ko "buriko burakwirakwira  ku rugero tutari bwigere tubona ku bundi bwoko bwari bumaze kuboneka". Ibindi twokwigira ku biriko birashikira Afrika y'Epfo ni ibihe? Amakuru y'abinjira ibitaro kubera Covid muri Afrika y'Epfo yerekana ko baguma baba benshi cane mu ntara zose. Ariko ntibiyongera ku murindi munini cane nk'uko umuntu yovyiteze uravye abandura ingene bangana. Bake mu bafashwe ni bo bakenera umwuka wo guhumeka wa oxygene, kandi mu bitaro bahamara umwanya muto gusumba. Discovery Health, kimwe mu bigo bikomeye vy'ubuvuzi ngaho, caharuye ko abantu bakuze banduye Omicron igitangura kumenyekana bashobora kutaja mu bitaro ku rugero rwa 30% kurusha abari banduye mu gihe c'umupfunda wa mbere muri Afrika y'Epfo. Ariko, abahinga bakomeye b'aho muri Afrika y'Epfo bavuga ko ivyo bidasigura ko ubwo bwoko bwa coronavirus bworoshe gusumba ubundi. Ubudasa n'iyindi mipfunda yari imaze kuba n'urugero rw'abamaze kwicandagisha hamwe n'ubudahangarwa kama bw'umubiri  mu bantu. N'ubwo kuba waratewe incanco zibiri canke kuba warigeze kwandura bisa n'ibitabuza abantu kwandura Omicron,  ariko biboneka ko bisa n'ibikingira abantu kurwara bakaremba. Dr Vicky Baillie, umuhinga mukuru mu bitaro vya Chris Hani Baragwanath i Johannesburg, avuga ko urugero ruri hasi rw'abakenera kwinjizwa ibitaro bishobora kuba biterwa n'uko abantu bafise ubudahangarwa bwiyongeye gusumba. Avuga ati: "Nta cerekana ko ubwo bwoko butababaza kurusha ubundi." OMS igabisha ko ibiharuro vyerekana ko ubwo bwoko bushobora kuba bworoshe gusumba bishobora kutaba vyerekana ukuri kwose kuko ibitigiri vy'abaja mu bitaro ari bito, kandi benshi mu baja mu bitaro bafise munsi y'imyaka 40 - ni ukuvuga abafise ivyago bike vyo kurwara bakaremba. Bashobora kuba bari mu bitaro ku zindi mvo - ariko ibitaro vyo muri Afrika y'Epfo bipima uwari we wese ari mu bitaro, gutyo hagaca hajamwo benshi bataremvye. Bishobora guterwa kandi n'uko abarenza imyaka 60 muri Afrika y'Epfo bashora kuba barusha abandi  muri rusangi kuba baricandagishije, gutyo bakaba barikingiye kuremba iyo bishitse bakarwara. Kandi Afrika y'Epfo igizwe n'abantu bakiri bato, ku rugero rwo hagati na hagati rw'imyaka 27,6 ugereranije na 40,4 mu Bwongereza nk'akarorero - bisigura ko ingene Omicron iriko irigenza muri ico gihugu bishobora kutaba co kimwe no mu bihugu bifise abantu bashaje gusumba. Amakuru ava mu bitaro vyo mu turere turangwamwo Omicron nyinshi kuruta ahandi muri Afrika y'Epfo - harimwo intara ya Gauteng - yerekana ukwiyongera kw'abana binjizwa ibitaro. Hari abavuze ko ibi biteye impungene cane, kuko bishobora kuba vyerekana ko ubwo bwoko bushobora kubangamira cane ku  bakiri bato. Ariko ivyo bifatiye ku bitigiri vy'abantu bake cane, co kimwe no ku bakuze, biragoye gutandukanya abana bagiye mu bitaro kubera Covid, n'ababa batowe ko banduye uwo mugera ariko bari bajanywe mu bitaro ku zindi mvo, nk'uko bivugwa na Helen Rees wo kuri kaminuza ya  Witwatersrand i Johannesburg. Dr Baillie yabwiye BBC ko ibitaro vyiwe vyakiriye ibitigiri bito vy'abana bari bashizwe mu bitaro  barwaye  cane kubera Covid ariko ko baciye bakira mu kiringo c'iminsi ibiri canke itatu. Avuga kandi ko ayo makuru ava mu karere aho abana benshi basanzwe babayeho mu bukene, bashobora kuba batarya bikwiye gutyo bakaba bogira ivyago vyo gukarirwa n'uwo mugera kurusha abandi muri rusangi. Urugero rw'abana bajanwa mu bitaro  kubera Covid muri Gauteng n'aho ruguma rugabanuka, rwavuye kuri 14% mu ndwi  ya mbere ruja ku 8% mu ndwi ya gatatu. Ugereranije, Afrika y'Epfo ntifise urugero runini rw'abamaze gucandagwa, 26% vy'abanyagihugu bayo ni bo bamaze kuronka incanco zose,  vyumvikana ko ibiriko biraba muri ico gihugu bitogereranywa n'ivyoshika mu gihugu aho abantu benshi gusumba bacandazwe. Ariko  muri ico gihuugu abantu basanzwe bafise urugero ruri hejuru rw'ubudahangarwa kama. Dr Muge Cevik, wo kuri kaminuza ya St Andrews, avuga ko ivyago vyo kwanduza abandi bigabanurwa cane n'ugucandagwa kuko abantu baheza bakarwara igihe kigufi gusumba kandi bagakira vuba, gutyo igihe c'uko umugera ushobora gukwirakwira kigaca kiba kigufi. Ariko biraboneka ko ubu bwoko bukiriko burihuta gukwirakwira - no mu  bihugu aho abantu bacandazwe cane. N'incanco nke zishobora kubuza burundu kwandura, ariko iyo hageze kubuza ko umuntu aremba iyo arwaye, biramaze kugaragara ko urucanco ako kazi rugashoboye no kuri ubwo bwoko bwihindaguye. Ikitaramenyekana ni ku rugero rungana gute. Ivyigwa vya mbere muri Afrika y'Epfo vyerekana ko urucanco rwa Pfizer rutuma umuntu adakenera kuja mu bitaro gushika ku rugero rwa 70%  amezi menshi yaramaze guterwa incanco zibiri, urwo rugero rukaduga gushika ku 90% iyo waronse urucanco rugira gatatu rwo gushimangira ubudahangarwa. Ariko Afrika y'Epfo yarakoresheje izindi ncanco, benshi bakaba baronse urwa Johnson & Johnson, gutyo rero haracakenewe ubundi bushakashatsi bwo kumenya akamaro k'incanco zitandukanye ku mirwi itandukanye 'abantu.

headline: Abanganga bateye ifyigo ry'ingurube ku muntu umubiri wiwe ntiwaryanka
text: Abanganga babaga muri Amerika bavuga ko bashoboye guha ifyigo ry'ingurube umuntu mu gikorwa gikomeye co gutera umuntu ingingo zikomotse ahandi bizigiye ko kizofasha gutorera inyishu ubukene bw'ingingo zikekenewe na benshi. Uwo yatewe iryo fyigo ubwonko bwiwe bwari bwamaze gupfa, bisigura ko bifashisha imashini zo kugumiza ibice bimwe kubandanya ari bizima ariko ata mahirwe y'uko umuntu wese yari gusubira kuba muzima. Iryo fyigo ryavuye mu ngurube yahinduriwe bimwe muri kamere kayo (génétiquement modifié/genetically modified) kugira babuze ko "rimenyekana nk'irinyamahanga" hanyuma ngo umubiri uryanke. Ico gikorwa ntikirihwezwa n'abandi baganga canke ngo gisohoke ku mugaragaro ariko bitegekanijwe ko ivyo bikorwa. Abahinga bavuga ko ariryo gerageza rya mbere riteye imbere cane muri ico gisata gushika ubu. Ibipimo nk'ivyo vyari bimaze gukorwa ku bikoko bitari abantu, ariko gushika ubu nta muntu yari bwageragerezweko. Ariko gukoresha  ingingo zivuye ku ngurube si icuyumviro gishasha. Uduce tw'umutima twitwa valves dusanzwe dukoreshwa cane ku bantu. Kandi ingingo z'ingurube zirahura neza cane n'izo abantu ku vyerekeye ubunini. Ico gikorwa co kubaga camaze amasaha abiri n'inusu mu kigo c'ubuvuzi ca kaminuza ya New York University Langone. Abo baganga bafatanije iryo fyigo ry'ingurube n'inzira z'amaraso z'uwo muntu yari yamaze gupfa ubwonko kugira barabe ko ryokora hamwe boritera umuntu canke ko umubiri woryanka. Ku minsi ibiri n'igice ikurikira baciye bakurikiranira hafi iryo fyigo, basuzuma cane banakora ibipimo vyinshi. Umushakashatsi yari arongoye abandi Dr Robert Montgomery yabwiye BBC ati: "Twabonye ifyigo ahanini ryakoze nk'ifyigo ryatewe rivuye mu wundi muntu, ivyo vyagaragaye nk'ibihuye co kimwe n'uko vyagenze no ku bindi vyose vyokorwa n'ifyigo ry'umuntu risanzwe. "Ryarakoze uko bisanzwe, kandi ntavyabonetse ko umubiri waryanka". Abo baganga babaga bateye kandi agace k'iyindi ngingo y'ingurube yitwa glande thymus hamwe n'iryo fyigo. Bibaza ko iyo ngingo ishobora gufasha guhagarika ko umubiri w'umuntu amaherezo wokwanka iryo fyigo mu gukukumba uturemangingo two kwigwanira twoba twagiye ku ruhande ubundi  dushobora kurwanya iyo ngingo ivuye ku ngurube. Umuntu nawe asanzwe yaratewe uwundi mutima, Dr Montgomery avuga ko hakenewe vyihuta ko haboneka uburyo bwo kurondera ingingo zo guha abantu bari ku rutonde rwo kurindira kuzironka, n'ubwo yemera ko igikorwa ciwe kidahurizwako. "Ic'uko nk'uko vyamye kuva kera hari uwubanza gupfa kugira uwundi muntu abeho ntikizokwigera gitanga inyishu ikwiye. "Nta nkeka ko numva impungenge, kandi ico novuga ni uko gushika ubu 40% abantu barindiriye guterwa ingingo bapfa batarazironka. "Ingurube turazirya, turakoresha ingurube mu buvuzi - ku duce tw'umutima bita valve, ku miti. Nibaza ko no kuri ivyo bidatandukanye cane." Yavuze ko ubushakashatsi bukiri mu ntango ko rero hakenewe gukorwa ibindi vyigwa vyinshi, ariko yongerako ati: "Biduha, uko ndavyibaza, icizere ko ata kibazo mu minsi tubijanye  mu bitaro". Umuryango w'uwo yagiriweko ibipimo, yari asanzwe yarifuje ko yotanga ingingo, waratanze uruhusha rw'uko abo baganga bakora ico gikorwa. Urwego rwa Amerika rugenzura bene ivyo bikorwa FDA narwo rwaremeye ko hakoreshwa ingingo y'ingurube yahinduriwe kamere  mu  bushakashatsi nk'ubwo. Dr Montgomery yizeye ko mu myaka cumi,  izindi ngingo z'ingurube - imitima, amahaha n'ibitigu (imyijima) - bishobora kuzohabwa abantu bakeneye  guterwa ingingo. Dr Maryam Khosravi, umuganga w'amafyigo no gukurikirana abantu bategerezwa kwitabwo cane mu bitaro (intensive care) akorera urwego ruvuza abantru mu Bwongereza, NHS, avuga ati: "Gutera abantu ingingo z'ibikoko n'ibintu tumaze imyaka myinshi twiga, kandi ni vyiza kubona abo bantu bateye iyindi ntambwe imbere muri iyo nzira." Ariko ku karangumutima k'ibirekurwa n'umwugwa gukorwa avuga ati: " Kuba twobishobora ntibisigura ko dutegerezwa kubikora. Nibaza ko umuryango w'abakora muri ico gisata ariwo utegerezwa kwishura ivyo bibazo." Umuvugizi w'igisata c'amaraso n'ugutera ingingo zivuye ahandi, avuga ko gutanga ingingo zivuye ku bandi bantu arivyo bishirwa imbere gushika ubu. "Haracari inzira ndende imbere y'uko ingingo bene izo zija mu buzima bwa minsi yose. "Mu gihe abashakashatsi n'abavura tubandanya dukora ibishoboka vyose kugira twongereze amahirwe y'abarwayi bakeneye kuronka ingingo, turacakeneye ko umwe umwe wese mu batanga ingingo afata icemezo co kubikora hanyuma akamenyesha umuryango wiwe ico yifuza ko coba hamwe ibihe vyo gutanga ingingo vyoshoboka."

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Salah, Jesus, Saka, Bale, Mane, De Ligt
text: Umusatirizi w’umunyamisiri Mohamed Salah w’imyaka 29, yabwiye bagenziwe ko yipfuza kubandaniriza kazoza kiwe muri Liverpool ariko yakubise ikorosi inyuma y’aho Barcelona imwemereye ko imukeneye i Nou Camp mu ci riza. (Mirror) Real Madrid ishobora kurondera  gukubita hasi Arsenal mu rugamba rwo  kurondera Gabriel Jesus wa Manchester City muri rino ci. Atletico Madrid nayo nyene iripfuza uyu musatirizi wa Brezili. (Sun) Manchester City yongereje umurindi mu kurondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Arsenal n’umurwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubwongereza Bukayo Saka w’imyaka 20, ikaba ishaka kwitanga umukeba wayo Liverpool nayo nyene imaze kubona ko izomukenera muri kazoza. (Mail) Tottenham nta igambi ifise yo kuzana kizigenza wa Pays de Galles/Wales, Gareth Bale, ku ncuro ya gatatu mu gihe uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 32 ariko arihweza aho azokwitegurira inkino z’igikombe c’isi yose. (Telegraph) Umusatirizi wa Senegal Sadio Mane w’imyaka 30, amaze kubaza mugenziwe wa Liverpool yahoze akina hagati muri Bayern Munich  Thiago Alcantara nimba ashobora gusubira mu ruhongore i Munich mu gihe yoramuka yinjiye muri uno murwi watahukanye ihiganwa ry’Ubudagi, Bundesliga, muri rino ci. (Mail) Barcelona iriteguye kuganira na Manchester United kugira ngo irabe ko uyu  munya Hollande akina hagati Frenkie de Jong w’imyaka 25, yokwimukira i Old Trafford (ikibuga ca Man United) ariko uyu murwi wa Espagne nta rwandiko iraronka ruva muri Man U rusaba icese uyu mukinyi. (Sport) Umumenyereza w’umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Hollande Louis van Gaal avuga ko umusatirizi Steven Bergwijn w’imyaka 24, akeneye kuva muri Tottenham akimukira muri  Ajax "vuba bwango". (De Telegraaf ibicishije muri Evening Standard) Tottenham ikeneye imiriyoni 30 z’ama euro kugira ngo ishobore kurekura Bergwijn muri rino ci. Uyu mukinyi kandi araronderwa n’abandi bakeba bo muri Premier League, Everton, mu gihe umurwi uherutse gutsindira ihiganwa rya Hollande, Ajax, ukiriko urategura urwandiko rwo kumusaba ku mugaragaro. (Fabrizio Romano) Chelsea iripfuza umukinyi w’inyuma wa Juventus, umunya-Hollande Matthijs de Ligt w’imyaka  22, ariko umumenyereza w’uyu murwi w’aba Blues,Thomas Tuchel, aracashira imbere Jules Kounde w’imyaka 23, umufaransa akina inyuma muri Sevilla no mu murwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubufaransa. (talkSPORT) Angel di Maria w’imyaka 34 aboneka ko ashobora kuronderwa na Barcelona hadakoreshejwe uburyo bwinshi mu gihe uyu munya Argentina yiteze gusezera Paris St-Germain igihe amasezerano yiwe azoba arangiye mu ci. Barcelona kandi iripfuza Raphinha w’imyaka 25 ariko iramirira kure igiciro c’imiriyoni 60 z’ama euros asabwa na Leeds kuri uyu mukinyi wo ku ruhande w’umunya Brezili. (Marca) Newcastle nta mugambi ifise wo kugura Dean Henderson w’imyaka 25 asamira  Manchester United  muri rino ci n’aho amakuru abandanya yemeza ko uyo murwi urondera uyu mwongereza. Ivyo kurondera umwongereza Dominic Calvert-Lewin w’imyaka  25 akinira  Everton be n’umunya Hollande Nathan Ake w’imyaka 27 akina inyuma muri Manchester City bisa n’ibitariko biroroha. (Telegraph ) AC Milan, Inter Milan, na Arsenal yose iriko irarondera umusatirizi wa Sassuolo umutaliyano Gianluca Scamacca w’imyaka 23, yinjije ibitsindo 16 muri Serie A (ihiganwa ry’Ubutaliyano) mu gice giheze. (Football Italia) Manchester United na Bayern Munich yompi iriko irarwanira umukinyi w’inyuma wa Inter Milan, umunya Hollande Denzel Dumfries w’imyaka 26 muri rino ci. (Calciomercato via Mail) Umukuru w’igisata kijejwe kwinonora imitsi wa Newcastle Dan Ashworth avugwa ko ashaka gukora ibishoboka vyose ngo azane uwundi mukinyi wo ku ruhande rw’i buryo muri rino ci, umufaransa Moussa Diaby w’imyaka 22 akina muri Bayer Leverkusen, hamwe n’umunya Senegal Ismaila Sarr w’imyaka 24 akinira Watford, bakaba ari bo bakinyi babiri bari ku rutonde rw’abaronderwa. (Sky Sports) Umukinyi w’inyuma w’umunya Hollande Sven Botman w’imyaka 22 yavugwa ko aronderwa na Newcastle, avuga ko AC Milan ikiriko irategura amasezerano kugira ngo imugure burundu imukuye muri Lille. (Football Italia) Umukinyi w’inyuma w’umwongereza James Tomkins w’imyaka 33 avugwa ko yateye igikumu ku masezerano mashasha y’umwaka umwe muri Crystal Palace, mu gihe umukinyo wo hagati w’umunya-Ecosse James McArthur w’myaka 34 na we nyene avugwa ko yemeye amasezerano mashasha i Selhurst Park(ikibuga ca Crystal Palace). (Sun)

headline: Israel-Palestine Nakba: Umunsi, umwaka aba nye Palestina bahunga ari benshi
text: Nakba, niryo zina aba nye Palestina bahaye italiki ya 15 z’ukwa gatanu. Israel yaraye yikukiye, italiki 14-05-1948, hadutse intambara, aba nye Palestina indiri barahunga. Uwo munsi uba ntibagiranwa.

headline: Igitero kuri Ukraine: EU yugaye ikirere cayo ku ndege z'Uburusiya
text: Ishirahamwe rya Buraya ryugaye ikirere caryo ku ndege z'Uburusiya nk'uko vyamenyeshejwe n'umukuru w'urwego rutwara iryo shirahamwe, Ursula von der Leyen. Yavuze ati: "Twugaye ikirere c'Ishirahamwe rya Buraya ku ndege z'Uburusiya, indege  zifise ibiziranga vy'Uburusiya canke indege zigenzurwa n'Uburusiya". Izo ndege zose, harimwo n'iz'abantu ku giti cabo z'abatunzi ruhebwa, ubu ntizizoshobora kugwa, canke kuguruka ziva  mu gihugu icarico cose c'Ishirahamwe rya Buraya canke ngo zice hejuru yaco. Indege z'Uburusiya zarankiwe kandi guca mu kirere c'Ubwongereza. Kompanyi ya mbere nini y'indege y'Uburusiya, Aeroflot, yavuze ko ica ifuta ingendo zose zo kuja i Buraya gushika ibintu bihindutse mu nzira yo kugera ingere ku yindi. Imbere y'iyo ngingo, ibihugu vya Buraya vyari vyatanguye, kwugara ibirere vyavyo  kimwe kimwe. Ubudagi bwavuze ko ingingo yabwo izomara amezi atatu. Ivyapa vyerekana urutonde rw'ingendo mu bibuga vy'indege vya  Domodedovo na Sheremetyevo vyerekanye ingendo ziharugwa mu mirongo zafuswe ku wamungu, harimwo izaja i Paris, Vienne na Kaliningrad. Kompanyi y'Uburusiya S7 Airlines yavuze kuri Facebook ko izofuta ingendo mu bihugu vya Buraya vyinshi gushika nibura itariki 13 za Ntwarante (ukwezi kwa gatatu). Uburusiya buguma bugera ingere ku yindi ku bihugu biba vyafashe ingingo. Umukuru w'urwego rutwara Ishirahamwe rya Buraya yamenyesheje ko iryo shirahamwe rigiye kandi guhagarika imirongo y'ibinyamakuru bigenzurwa na reta y'Uburusiya Sputnik na Russia Today bibonwa nk'urubuga rw'ukuvugira Kremlin. Yavuze ati: "Turiko turarondera uburyo bw'ingene duhagarika amakuru yabo yo kuyovya no guhumanya i Buraya." Izo ngingo ku ndege zizotuma  indege z'Uburusiya zifata ingendo zo kuzigura/guca kure, bituma amasaha y'urugendo aba  menshi gusumba. Indege zisanzwe zitwara abantu n'ibintu ziririnda kandi guca mu kirere ca Ukraine, Moldova na Belarus kubera igitero c'Uburusiya. Muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Delta Air Lines yavuze ko izohagarika amasezerano bari bafitaniye na Aeroflot y'Uburusiya yo gufatisha ibibanza vy'urugendo. Indege zose zifise ibiziranga vy'Uburusiya zizokorwako n'izo ngingo. Ingingo y'Ubwongereza yatumye Moscou nayo igera ingere ku yindi ku ndege z'Ubwongereza. Virgin Atlantic yavuze ko kudaca hejuru y'Uburusiya bizokwongereza hagati y'iminota 15 n'isaha ku mwanya w'ingendo zayo hagati y'Ubwongereza n'Ubuhindi na Pakistan. Kompanyi ya Australia Qantas yavuze ko izokoresha inzira ndende gusumba ku ngendo zayo ata handi ziciye  hagati ya Darwin na Londres  n'ubundi zitari zisanzwe zikoresha inzira yo guca hejuru y'Uburusiya.

headline: Africa na internet: ni ibihe bihugu vyayiciye,vyabikoze gute?
text: Nta Facebook, Twitter canke WhatsApp. Ivyo bimaze kuba ibintu bimenyerewe mu bihugu bimwe bimwe vya Afrika aho ama reta yagiye arugara ku kiringo runaka internet canke imbuga hwaniro. Uganda nico gihugu ca vuba kibikoze buca haba amatora ku wa 14 uku kwezi kwa mbere. Abaharanira uburenganzira bwo gukoresha ubuhinga bushasha bwo guhanahana ubutumwa bavuga ko ari ukubuza ubwisanzure, ariko ama reta yo avuga ko bifasha mu kwubahiriza umutekano. Ukuzibira imihora bigenda gute? Reta ishobora kuzibira imihora mu gutegeka ibigo bitanga internet ngo vyime inzira abanywanyi bavyo. Mu ntango, ibi bishobora gukora mu kwugara imbuga zisanze zikoreshwa cane. Ariko hari igihe hafatwa ingingo zikomeye gusumba aho reta itegeka ibigo bitanga internet kwugara amayira yose. Ibihugu bimaze kwugara internet ni ibihe? Igitigiri c'ibihugu bimaze kwugara internet kiguma kiduga. Uganda yategetse ibigo bitanga internet kwugara imbuga hwaniro zose hamwe n'uburyo bwo guhanahana ubutumwa. Abakoresha ubwo buryo bari basanzwe bidoga ko bagize iminsi bibagora gushikira bumwe muri ubwo buhinga n'imbuga zimwe zimwe. Tanzania yazibiye imihora ya internet mu matora aheruka mu kwezi kw'icumi. Mu kwa gatandatu mu mwaka uheze, Ethiopia yetegetse ko internet yugarwa mu kiringio camaze hafi ukwezi biturutse ku ruhagarara rwakurikiye iyicwa ry'umuririmvyi rurangiranwa w'umu Oromo anaharanira agateka ka zina muntu Hachalu Hundesa. Zimbabwe, Togo, Burundi, Chad, Mali na Guinea navyo nyene vyarazibiye internet canke imbuga hwaniro mu bihe bitandukanye mu mwaka uheze. Mu 2019 vyagaragaye ko habaye iyugarwa rya internet ku rugero canke burundu agashika 25 mu gihe kari 20 mu 2018 na 12 mu 2017, nk'uko bimenyeshwa na Access Now, ikigo cigenga kibikurikirana. Ico kigo kivuga ko mu 2019, ibihugu indwi muri 14 vyugaye internet bitari vyarabikoze mu myaka ibiri yari iheze. Ibihugu bishasha vyabaye Benin, Gabon, Eritrea, Liberia, Malawi, Mauritania na Zimbabwe. Ni ingendo yibonekeza n'ahandi kw'isi aho ibihugu vyugara imihora ya internet biguma biba vyinshi, mu gihe yugawe agashika 213 uyu mwaka mu 2017 kari 106 gusa. Ico kigo kivuga ko muri Africa akenshi iyugarwa riba ku gihugu cose aho kuba ku ntara zimwe zimwe canke ku migwi runaka y'abantu. Mu 2019, ku gashika 21 kuri 25 internet yugawe, ico kigo casanze vyakwiye igihugu cose canke ibice binini vyaco. Sudan na Ethiopia nivyo vyonyene vyugariye ibice runaka. Mu gihugu kimwe kimwe, ikigo ca internet cose nico kimenya ingene gishira mu ngiro amabwirizwa yo kuzibira imihora. Bumwe mu buryo bikorwa n'ukuzibira gushikira ico bita URL. Ako ni nk'akayunguruzo kabuza gushikira urutonde rw'imbuga zimwe zimwe ziba zabujijwe. Uwarasanzwe azijako aronka ubutumwa butandukanye nk'ubuvuga ngo ''uru rubuga rwarugawe n'uwubijejwe''. Ubundi buryo bwitwa ''throttling''(kuniga). Ubwo ni uburyo bwo kugabanya cane umuhora uja ku mbuga zimwe zimwe, bigatuma umengo ni internet yikwega, gutyo abantu bagacika intege zo kuja kuri izo mbuga. Ubwo buryo rero butuma bigora kumenya niba koko amayira yugawe canke niba ari internet iba itameze neza. Ingingo ya nyunma ishobota kuba iyo gutegeka abatanga internet kwugara ntihagire n'umwe ashobora gukora icarico cose. None abatanga internet barashobora kwanka? Ubushobozi bw'ama reta bwo guhagarika internet buvana n'ubushobozi aba afise bwo kugenzura ibigo vyo gutumatumanako. Bene ivyo bigo bihabwa impusha n'ama reta, bisigura ko bishobora gucibwa ihadabu canke gufutirwa amasezerano(contrat). Ivyo bigo birashobora kwitwara mu ma sentare, ariko ni gake babikora. Mu 2019, ama sentare muri Zimbabwe yarategetse ko internet yugururwa n'aho reta yari yataze itegeko ko ihagarikwa. Ariko reta nayo yaciye ishirahako amategeko ayiha uburenganzira bwo kugenzura ikoreshwa rya internet. Hari n'aho vyoroshe gukora nko muri Ethiopia aho  hari umuryango umwe gusa ujana ku muhora wa interenet, nawo ukaba uri mu minwe y'ikigo ca reta. Ariko iyo internet itugawe burundu, haraba inzira zindi zo gucamwo. Uburyo buzwi cane n'ubwo bita VPNs(Virtual Private Networks). Izo nzira ntizorohera ibigo bitanga internet kuzugara. Reta zirashobora kwugara n'izo VPN ariko akenshi ntibihuta kubikora kuko bibangamira abaserukira ibihugu vyabo n'ibigo binini binini bazikoresha. Ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyo muri Africa vyitwaza ko hari amakuru y'ibinyoma aca ku mbuga hwaniro na internet mu gusigura iyugarwa ry'iyo mihora. Ariko bamwe mu bihweza ibintu n'ibindi n'abatavuga rumwe n'ama reta babona ko ico ari icitwazo co gucecekesha abanegura izo reta akenshi baheza bakabikorera ku mbuga nka Facebook. Bikorwa akenshi imbere n'inyuma y'amatora.

headline: Imiti 2 yageragejwe ishorora gukiza ingwara ya Ebola
text: Abahinga bavuga ko Ebola igiye kuba mu misi ya vuba  ingwara ikingwa ikongera ikavugwa inyuma y'igeragezwa ry'imiti 2 yerekanye impinduka nziza ku bagwayi. Ubwoko bw'imiti 4 bwageragejwe ku bagwayi ba Ebola mu Republika ya Democrasi ya Kongo, ahantu ikiza ca Ebola gikomeye. Ubu buhinga bwerekana ko abagwayi barenga 90% bashobora gukira bafashe iyo miti hakiri kare. Abayobozi b'abaganga bavuga ko iyo miti izokoreshwa mu kuvura abagwayi bose ba Ebola muri  Republika ya Democrasi ya Kongo. Ku musi wa kabiri  ikigo co muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe bwa Amerika kigwanya ingwara zandukira  n'ukuziriranirwa, US National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, kiri mu vyafashije mw'igeragezwa ry'uyo muti, camenyesheje ko igeragezwa ry'iyi miti ryatanze ''inyishu nziza cane'' mu kugwanya ikiza ca Ebola. Imiti bita REGN-EB3 na  mAb114, ikora abasirikare bica  umugera wa Ebola, bigatuma  uturemangingo  dutoyi turanga umuntu ataco tuba. Muganga Anthony Fauci, umukuru w'ikigo ca Leta Zunze Ubumwe bwa Amerika kigwanya ingwara zandukira  n'ukuziriranirwa yavuze ko iyi  miti ari iya mbere mu bushakashatsi bukomeye bwerekanywe mu kugabanya abagwayi  bicwa na Ebola. Imiti REGN-EB3 na  mAb114 yageragejwe hakoreshejwe  abasirikare batera umugera wa Ebola ku bayigwaye. Umugera wahitanye abantu barenga 1800 muri Rpublika ya Democrasi ya Kongo kuva mu mwaka uheze. Iyindi miti ibiri ZMapp na  Remdesivir yarakuwe mu yokoreshwa  kubera basanze ifasha bisanzwe cane. Ubwo bushashatsi bwo ku rwego mpuzamakungu bwari buhagarikiwe n'ikigo mpuzamakungu kijejwe amagara y'abantu, bwatanguye mu kwezi kwa 11  mu mwaka uheze. Kuva ico gihe, imiti 4 yariko irageragezwa ku bagwayi  hafi 700  biraheza bitanga ivyegeranyo vya mbere ku bagwayi bamenyekanye  499. Kuri abo bantu bose bafashe iyo miti, ico kigo cakoze ubushakashatsi kivuga ko 29% bafashe imiti  REGN-EB3 na 34% bafashe  mAb114 baphuye. Iki kigo c'abashakashatsi kivuga  ariko ko 49% b'abafashe umuti  ZMapp hamwe na 53% b'abafashe umuti  Remdesivir baphuye . Ico kigo kimenyesha kandi  ko abantu,  bari  banduye ku rugero rusanzwe  ico kiza,  barokotse  bashika   94%  mugihe  bafashe umuti REGN-EB3 hakiri kare hamwe  na  89% ku bafashe umuti witwa  mAb114. Muganga Sabue Mulangu yavuze ko ubushashatsi bw'ingwara ziva ku micafu bwasanze  abategetsi b'amagara y'abantu bashobora guhumuriza abantu ko abarenga 90% bashobora kurokoka  ikiza ca Ebola bacivuje hakiri kare. Hakurikijwe ivyiza ubu bushakashatsi bwashitseko, umuyobozi k'ikigo c'abagiraneza Wellcome Trust global health charity Jeremy Farrar,  yavuzeko ata nkeka ko iyi miti izokiza  abantu. Bwana  Farrar yavuze ko bwerekana ko abashakashatsi bariko baregera intambwe y'uko ikiza ca Ebola gikingwa. Yongeye avuga ati: ''Ntituzokuraho rwose  Ebola ariko dushobora guhagarika ibiza vya Ebola bikwiragira ku rwego rw'igihugu canke  mu turere''. Iciyumviro c'uko Ebola idakira, ikongera igakwiragira  bivuye ku kutizera abakozi bajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Republika ya Democrasi ya Kongo vyaragabanije inguvu zo  guhagarika ikwiragira ry'iyi ngwara. Muganga Fauci yavuze ati hari icizere c'uko iyi miti, yakozwe n'ububiko bw'imiti bukora imiti buri muri  Amerika  bufasha mu kuvura iyi ngwara, igiye kwongera icizere ku  bagwayi bigatuma baja kwa muganga hakiri kare. Yongeye agira ati: ''Ariko inzira nziza yo guherengeteza iki kiza ni urucanco rwiza''. Urucanco ni ubwoko bw'umuti bwongerera inguvu abasoda bo mu mubiri ku ngwara kanaka,   mu nzira yo kuyikinga. Ikigo mpuzamakungu kijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi  kivuga ko incanco zikinga ikiza ca Ebola zemewe ko zishobora gukoreshwa, ku mpuhwe z'abagwayi imbere y'uko zemegwa biciye mu mategeko zerekanye ko zivura neza. Iki kiza catanguye mu buseruko bwa Republika ya Democrasi ya Kongo mu kwezi kwa 8  kw'umwaka uheze kandi kiza kw'isonga mu bihugu 10  vyashikiwe n'ico kiza kuva mu 1976, igihe ico kiza catorwa. Mu kwezi kwa 7 ikigo mpuzamakungu kijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi camenyesheje ko Ebola ari ikiza giteye amakenga ku rwego mpuzamakungu. Ariko ni bake ugereranije n'abaguye muri Afrika y'uburengero hagati yo mu 2014 na 2016, igihe abantu 28.816 bandura ico kiza cane cane mu bihugu vya Gwine, Siera Leone na Liberia. Abantu 11.310 basize ubuzima muri ico kiza ca Ebola kitari bwigere kiboneka.

headline: "Ndimbati" wo muri "PAPA SAVA" ari gufasha abatishoboye mu bihe bya coronavirus mu Rwanda
text: Benshi bamuzi kw'izina ryiwe ry'umunyatugenegene mu gutwenza ari ryo Ndimbati, bakamuraba mu gakino gaca kuri YouTube kitwa Papa sava. Uwo ni Uwihoreye Jean Bosco Mustafa. Mustafa rero canke Ndimbati, yatanguje igikorwa co kugarukira ku bakozweko n'ingamba zo kurwanya ikiza ca coronavirus mu Rwanda, zirimwo kubwiriza abantu kuguma muhira mu kwirinda kwanduzanya. Benshi mu bari batunzwe n'ubuzi bw'umunsi ku munsi, kuronka ivyo kurya gisigaye ari ikibazo, kiretse baronse uwubafasha. Robert Patrick Misigaro yavuganye na Uwihoreye Jean Bosco Musfata, azwi kandi nka Ndimbati, amubaza aho yakuye iciyumviro co gufasha muri ubwo buryo (umviriza ico kiganiro aho hejuru).

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Ramos, Nkunku, Vlahovic, Moukoko, Gakpo, Ounahi, Felix
text: Manchester United iriteguye kuraba nimba ishobora kuronka umusatirizi wa Benfica umunya-Portugal Gonçalo Ramos w’imyaka 21, n’aho umumenyereza Erik ten Hag amaze kubwirwa ko bitazwi neza niba hari umusatirizi azogurwa mu kwa mbere. (ESPN) Chelsea nta mugambi ishira imbere wo kugura mu ci riza umusatirizi w’Ubufaransa Christopher Nkunku w’imyaka 25, asanzwe akinira RB Leipzig,  n’aho umusatirizi wayo, umunya-Albania Armando Broja w’imyaka 21 yakomeretse ku buryo atazosubira gukina gushika uno mwaka w’inkino uhere. (Fabrizio Romano, iciye kuri  CaughtOffside) Ni ikintu "gishoboka cane rwose " ko umusatirizi wa  Serbia Dusan Vlahovic w’imyaka 22 azova muri Juventus mu 2023, n’aho bitabujijwe ko ashobora gusezera mu kwa mbere. Chelsea iri mu mirwi iriko iravugana n’umuserukizi wiwe. (Ben Jacobs, Twitter) Chelsea ihanganye n’imirwi Manchester United na Liverpool mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund Youssoufa Moukoko, ariko iyi mirwi imurondera ni ngombwa ko ibanza kwumvisha uyu Mudagi w’imyaka 18 ko atazoza kwicara ku ntebe y’abasubirizi. (Times) Borussia Dortmund irizeye ko ubucuti  Moukoko  afitaniye n’umumenyereza Edin Terzic buzofasha mu kwumvisha uyu musatirizi, mu gihe amasezerano yiwe azorangira mu ci riza, ko yotera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha muri kuno kwa cumi na kabiri, na rirya imirwi yo mu Bwongereza na Espagne yiteguye kurondera abakinyi mu kwa mbere mu gihe wa mwanya w’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi uzoba wuguruwe. (Fabrizio Romano, Twitter) Real Madrid iripfuza kugura umusatirizi w’Ubuholande Cody Gakpo w’imyaka 23 asanzwe akinira PSV Eindhoven kugira ngo asubirire umusatirizi w’Ubufaransa Karim Benzema w’imyaka 34. (AS) Leicester ishobora kuba ifise ishaka ryo gutanga imiriyoni zingana na 45 z’ama-euro yo kugura Azzedine Ounahi asanzwe akinira Angers, n’aho Barcelona nayo nyene imaze imisi ikurikiranira hagufi uyu mukinyi wo hagati wa Maroc w’imyaka 22. (L'Equipe) Umusatirizi wa Portugal Joao Felix w’imyaka 23 araronderwa n’imirwi ya Premier League mu gihe ariko arondera kuva muri Atletico Madrid mu kwa mbere, agashobora kwimukira muri Manchester City, Manchester United, Arsenal canke Aston Villa. (Mail) Manchester United na Arsenal isa n’uko ari yo Felix yipfuza kwimukiramwo, Atletico ikaba yiteguye kwumviriza imirwi yokwemera kumugura ku miriyoni zirenga 100 z’ama-euro. (AS ) Umumenyereza wa Manchester United Erik ten Hag yemerewe amafaranga menshi yo kunagura umurwi – n’aho hari imigambi y’umuryango wa Glazer yo kugurisha uyu murwi. (Sun) Manchester United iriko irakora ibishoboka kugira ngo igure umukinyi w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’i buryo, umunya-Hollande Denzel Dumfries w’imyaka  26 asanzwe akinira Inter Milan, ibi bigashobora kwugururira imiryango Barcelona kugira ngo ishobore kugurira Man U umukinyi w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’i buryo, umunya-Portugal Diogo Dalot w’imyaka 23. (Sport) Enzo Fernandez w’imyaka 21 asanzwe aronderwa na Liverpool ntazova mu murwi wiwe Benfica kiretse umurwi womurondera wemeye gutanga imiriyoni 123 z’ama-euro kuri uno munya-Argentina akina hagati. (90min) Fulham iripfuza kugura umunya-Portugal akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’i buruo muri Arsenal Cedric Soares w’imyaka 31, mu kwa mbere. (Sky Sports) Mu kwa mbere, Arsenal izogerageza kugura Youri Tielemans akinira Leicester City, ariko icizere kinini igifise mu ci riza, mu gihe uyu mubirigi akina hagati azoba arangije amasezerano afitaniye n’umurwi wiwe. (90min) Ajax yemeye guha uburenganzira bwo kugenda umunya-Hollande akina inyuma Daley Blind w’imyaka 32 akimukira mu wundi murwi mu kwa mbere ata kirinze gusabwa. (De Telegraaf) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande umwongereza Samuel Iling-Junior w’imyaka 19 yemeye gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha y’imyaka ine muri Juventus, mu gihe amasezerano yari asanzwe afise yiteze kurangira mu ci riza. (Gianluca di Marzio) Barcelona iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Boca Juniors umunya-Argentina Alan Varela w’imyaka 21, ariko Ajax na Benfica nayo nyene iriko irarondera kugura uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 21, ashobora kugurwa imiriyoni 15 z’ama-euro. (Sport) Bayern Munich iri mu biganiro vyo kurondera ingene umunyegori wayo, umudagi Alexander Nubel w’imyaka 26 yogaruka akava iyo yatijijwe muri Monaco, hakurondera kugura uwundi mushasha yosubirira Manuel Neuer aherutse gukomereka. (Sky Sport Germany)

headline: France: François Fillon yari umushikiranganji wa mbere yaciriwe umunyororo
text: Uwahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubufaransa François Fillon n'umugore wiwe baciriwe umunyororo kubera ubunyonyezi. Uyo mu nyapolitike yagirijwe ko yarishe umugore wiwe amafaranga angana n'imiliyoni 1.3 z'amadolari ku kazi atigeze akora igihe yakora mu nama nshingamateka. Yaciriwe umunyororo w'imyaka itanu mu gasho, itatu muri yo ikaba irindirijwe. Umugore wiwe wewe yaciriwe umunyororo w'imyaka itatu ariko irindirijwe. Ico caha catumye ibikorwa vyo kurondera kwitoza mu 2017 bihagarara. Bompi bunguruje urubanza, bituma Fillon adatabwa muri yompi. Uyo mugabo w'imyaka 66 niwe munyapolitike wo ku rwego rwo hejuru w'Umufaransa aciriwe umunyororo kuva Repubulika ya gatanu itanguye mu 1958. Udupfukamunwa bari bambaye kubera coronavirus twatumye bitaboneka mu maso ingene bakiriye uru rubanza igihe rwasomwa. Igihe sentare yasoma urwo rubanza uno munsi ku wa mbere, umucamanza yari arongoye intahe yavuze ati: "Amahera yarishwe ntiyari ajanye na gato n'akazi kakozwe. Umupfasoni wa Fillon yahawe akazi ataco kari kamaze". Uyo mukenyezi yagirijwe ko yafashije mw'inyuruzwa n'isesagurwa ry'umutungo w'igihugu. Bompi baciwe ihadabu ry'amahera $423.000. Hampande y'ivyo, bategetswe kugarukana umuliyoni 1.12 w'amadorari ya Amerika mu kigega c'inama nshingamateka yari yahaye akazi Penelope Fillon kuva 1998 gushika 2013. Umugabo wiwe kandi yabujijwe gusubira kurangura amabanga y'igihugu mu kiringo c'imyaka 10. Francois Fillon amaze imyaka mirongo n'iyindi muri politike. Yarabaye umushingamateka, umukenguzamateka mbere aranaronswa n'amabanga y'ubushikiranganji, imbere y'uko aba umushikiranganji wa mbere w'u Bufaransa hagati ya 2007 na 2012 igihe hatwara Perezida Nicolas Sarkozy. Imbere y'amatora y'umukuru w'igihugu yo mu 2017, yatsinze mu matora ntangamarara mu mugambwe w'abaharanira Repubulika, aho gushika mu kwa mbere kwa 2017 yahabwa amahirwe menshi yo gutorwa. Hagati aho, ibintu vyagiye kuyangara haciye iminsi muri uko kwezi nyene kubera ivyo yagirijwe vyo kunyuruza itunga ry'igihugu. Yagumye ahakana ivyo yagirizwa avuga ko ari umugambi w'abahiganwa nawe ico gihe wo gucafuza izina ryiwe. Hagati aho, ibibazo vyagumye biba ndanse gushika aho asaba imbabazi yemera ko yakoresheje abo mu muryango iwe, ati "n'aho bidateye kubiri n'amategeko vyatumye ntakaza icizere".

headline: Sri Lanka: Ko igihugu kigeze habi vyavuye kuki?
text: Ubutunzi bwa Sri Lanka bwari bufatiye ku gisata c’ingenzi, ivyo yashora hanze, ku mahera yarungikwa n’ababa hanze. Ng’ibi ibikuru vyabangamiye ubuzima bw’igihugu.

headline: Haiti: Imigumuko niyo yaranze ishingurwa rya Jovenel Moïse aherutse kugandagurwa
text: Urusaku rw'amasasu rwahagaritse gato ibikorwa vyo gushingura wa mukuru w'igihugu wa Haiti aherutse kugandagurwa, Jovenel Moïse, yishwe n'abamuteye ku muhana iwe, haraciye indwi zibiri. Intumwa za Amerika n'izo ibindi bihugu zaciye zihava ayo masasu atanguye mu gihe ibirori vyariko birabandanya. Hari imyiyerekano aho abari muri yo bagiriza bamwe mu bari muri ivyo birori ko ari bo bishe umukuru w'igihugu cabo. Abategetsi bagiriza abacangero ko ari bo bamwishe, ariko hari ibibazo bicibazwa gushika ubu bitararonkerwa inyishu. Umupfakazi asizwe na nyakwigendera Moise, Martine yari yakomerekeye muri ico gitero aca ajanwa kuvurirwa muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, na we nyene niho yari ari, ari kumwe na batatu mu bana  biwe. Ati: "Ni murondere ubutungane. Ntidushaka kwihora, dushaka ubutungane", nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters. Ariko ibi birori vyo kumushingura vyahuye n'imigumuko imaze igihe muri Haiti. Abari mu myiyerekano batanye mu mitwe n'igiporisi hanze y'aho bariko bashingura Perezida Moise, abari muri ivyo birori bakaba bashikiriwe n'ivyuka bikoroza amosozi, ariko bikaboneka ko ata n'umwe yahakomerekeye. Bamwe mu bategetsi bataweko ishavu ry'abari mu myiyerekano, aho mbere n'umukuru w'igiporisi Leon Charles yagirijwe ko ari "umwicanyi". Igiporisi ca Haiti cagiriza umurwi w'abantu 26 b'abanya Colombia hamwe n'abanyamerika babiri bafise amamuko muri Haiti, ko ari bo bakoze ubu bwicanyi. N'imiburiburi 20 muri bo barapfunzwe, batatu bakaba barishwe nayo abandi batanu bakaba bagihigwa. Moïse w'imyaka 53 yari umukuru w'igihugu ca Haiti, igihugu ca mbere gikenye ku mugabane wa Amerika, kuva mu 2017. Igihe cose yamaze ku butegetsi ntiyorohewe kubera ubutegetsi bwiwe bwagirijwe igiturire, mbere mu ntango z'uno mwaka hakaba harabaye n'imyiyerekano yo kumwiyamiriza. Mu ntango z'ino ndwi, umushikiranganji wa mbere mushasha, Ariel Henry, yararahijwe inyuma y'impari zamuhuje n'umukeba wiwe. Atera akamo abanyagihugu kubana mu bumwe, akavuga ko agiye gushinga reta mfatakibanza gushika habaye amatora ategekanijwe mu kw'icenda.

headline: Izinga rya Man ryahaye u Burundi imiriyoni £1.3 nk'imfashayo yo kurwanya ihindagukira ry'ibihe
text: Reta y'izinga rya Man yahaye ishirahamwe ry'abagiraneza imfashanyo  ingana n' imiriyoni 1.3 z'amapawundi ( yababa imiriyaridi 3 .5 mu mafaranga y'amarundi) mu ntumbero yo gufasha kurwanya "ingaruka z'ihindagurika ry'ibihe". Iri shirahamwe International Development Partnership (IDP) ryacishije iyi mfashanyo mu rindi shirahamwe Send a Cow risanzwe rirangurira imigambi mu Burundi. Richard Granville ajejwe ibijanye n'imfashanyo muri iryo shirahamwe, avuga ko aya mafaranga yatanzwe agiye gufasha "umugambi w'imyaka ibiri" mu "ntara ya Mwaro". Reta y'iryo zinga ryo ku mugabane w'Uburayi isanzwe yarategekanijwe amafaranga y'ama pawundi agera ku miriyoni 2.5 y'imfashanyo mpuzamakungu. Igisata c'ihindagurika ry'ibirere ni kimwe mu bisata bibiri iri shirahamwe  IDP ryahisemwo gufasha mu kiringo ca 2021-2023. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Howard Quayle avuga ati: "Ikiza karanda ca coronavirus carerekanye ingene twese dukeneraniye kw'isi yose kandi ndanezerewe kubona iri zinga rya Man rishobora gufasha muri iki gikorwa kidasanzwe". Granville avuga ko Uburundi bwama "buhura n'ingaruka zikomeye z'ihindagurika ry'ikirere" mu gihe ibice 94% vy'abanyagihugu "babeshejweho n'uburimyi bwo ku rugero ruto kandi bushingiye ku mvura". Domothile Niyonzima w'imyaka 43 asanzwe aba i Mwaro, avuga ati: "Ikibazo nyamukuru ni uko ata mfungurwa zikwiye turonka, kubera tudafise intabire yo gutabira isi yacu". Unicef ivuga ko abantu barenga 114.000 mu Burundi bataye izabo kubera ibiza bishingiye kw'ihindagurika ry'ibihe. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe Send a Cow mu Burundi Gloria Nimpundu avuga ko iri shirahamwe rifasha abarimyi mu  "kubaha amazi n'isi ndimwa nziza" kandi ko "akarusho kariko karibonekeza". Avuga ko "ikibazo c'imvura igwa nabi nabi kandi itizewe kigenda ciyongera" gituma bigorana "kwitegurira irima n'iyimbura". "Muri iyi myaka iheze, izuba ryaratikije ibiterwa mu nyuma naho imyuzure iratikiza imirima". Yongerako y'uko uwu mugambi uriko urarangurirwa i Mwaro uzofasha imiryango ishika 5250 "kwikenura mu buryo bw'amafaranga mu guhangana n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere, biciye mu kurima n'ukworora kijambere".

headline: Covid: WHO/OMS igabisha ko ikiza kizobandanya gushika kure mu 2022
text: Ikiza ca Covid "kizobandanya mu kiringo c'uwundi mwaka kitari ngombwa" bitewe n'uko ibihugu vy'amikoro make bitariko biraronka incanco bikeneye, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi OMS/WHO. Dr Bruce Aylward, umwe mu bayobozi muri OMS, avuga ko akaga ka Covid "gashobora rero  kubandanya mu gice kinini c'umwaka wa 2022". Abantu badashika 5% muri Afrika nibo bamaze kuronka incanco, ugereranije na 40% ku yindi migabane myinshi. Mu ntango, umugambi wa Covax wo gusabikanya ata buryarya incanco kw'isi, wategekanya ko ibihugu vyose vyoronka incanco biwuciyeko, harimwo n'ibikize cane. Ariko ibihugu vyinshi vy'umugwi w'ibikize cane G7 ntivyabaye bigica muri iyo nzira kuva bitanguye kwumvikana kimwe kimwe ukwaco n'ama kompanyi akora incanco. Incanco nyinshi za Covid zahavuye zikoreshwa rero n'ibihugu vyifise. Afrika gushika ubu iharurwa kuba imaze gukoresha 2.6% y'incanco zose zimaze  gutangwa kw'isi. Uwo mugwi w'amashirahamwe y'ubugiraneza urimwo Oxfam na UNAids, unegura kandi Ubwongereza na Canada kuronka incanco ubicishije muri Covax, umugambi ushigikiwe na ONU wo gusabikanya no gukwiragiza  incanco kw'isi atawusizwe inyuma. Ibiharuro vyerekana ko muri uyu mwaka Ubwongereza bwaronse incanco za Pfizer 539.370 mu gihe Canada nayo yafashe hafi umuriyoni wa Astra-Zeneca. Dr Aylward yasavye ibihugu bitunze  guhebera ibibanza vyavyo ku murongo w'abarindiriye kuronka incanco kugirango ama kompanyi akora incanco ahubwo ashire imbere ibihugu vy'amikoro make. Avuga ko ibihugu bitunze bikwiye kwikora ku bubiko bifise kugira vyuzuze inshingano vyiyemeje mu nama ya G7 i St Ives mu ci riheze. Yavuze ati "Nobabwira ko tutari mu nzira nziza". "Vy'ukuri dukeneye kwihuta, canke naho murabizi? Iki kiza kizobandanya ikiringo c'uwundi mwaka kandi bitari ngombwa." People's Vaccine - urunani rw'amashirahamwe y'ubugiraneza - rwasohoye ibiharuro vyerekana ko rumwe (doze imwe)  ku  ncanco indwi zemewe n'ibigo bizikora hamwe n'ibihugu bitunze arirwo rushika iyo rugenewe mu bihugu bikenye kurusha ibindi. Umujenama wa Oxfam ku bibazo vy'amagara  ku rwego rw'isi, Rohit Malpani, aremera ko Canada n'Ubwongereza vyari bifise uburenganzira bwo kuronka incanco biciye muri iyo nzira kuko vyari vyaratanze amafaranga muri Covax, ariko yavuze ko "bitoshigikirwa  nk'ibikwiye gukorwa" bivanye n'uko vyompi vyari vyaronse miriyoni z'incanco biciye mu masezerano yavyo n'amakompanyi azikora. Yavuze ati: "Ntivyari kuba vyaronse incanco biciye muri Covax". "Ntaho bitaniye n'amayeri yo kuronka incanco mu nzira zibiri, ivyo rero bigaca bisigura ko ibihugu bikenye kurusha ibindi vyari bisanzwe biri inyuma  ku murongo wo kurindira amaherezo bizotegerezwa kubandanya birindiriye ikindi gihe kirekire." Reta y'Ubwongereza yavuze ko buri mu bihugu vyatumye Covax itangura gukora mu mwaka uheze mu kuyiha ayangana na miriyoni 548 z'amafaranga y'Abongereza (miriyoni zirenga 750 z'ama dorari). Reta ya Canada yo yihutiye kuvuga ko  ubu yahevye gukoresha incanco zivuye muri Covax. Covax mu ntango yari yiyemeje kuba yatanze miriyaridi zibiri gushika mu mpera z'uyu mwaka, ariko gushika ubu imaze gukwiragiza incanco zingana na miriyoni 371 gusa.

headline: Man U: Ralf Rangnick avuga ko ivyo kuwanira ubukapiteni hagati ya Maguire na Ronaldo ari 'ibinyoma'
text: Umumenyereza mfatakibanza wa Manchester United Ralf Rangnick avuga ko amakuru y'ukutumvikana kuri hagati ya kizigenza Harry Maguire na Cristiano Ronaldo ari "ikinyoma ceruye". Inkuru yanditswe n'ikinyamakuru Mirror ivuga ko aba bakinyi babiri "bai mu rugamba rukomeye" barwanira kuba kizigenza. Rangnick avuga ko yabwiwe ivy'iyo nkuru yanditswe ariko ko itamuhagaritse umutima "kuko ndazi ko atari iy'ukuri". Uyu Mudagi ati: "Iki ni ikinyoma ceruye - sindigera mvugana n'aba bakinyi ibijanye n'ikibanza ca kizigenza". "Ico nta ngorane cigeze kintera. Harry ni we kizigenza wacu kandi azobandanya ari kizigenza wacu". Maguire yagenywe kuba kizigenza n'uwahoze ari umumenyereza w'uyu murwi Ole Gunnar Solskjaer. haraciye imyaka ibiri, ariko iyo nkuru yanditswe muri ico kinyamakuru ivuga ko igaruka rya Ronaldo w'imyaka 27 muri uyu murwi ritamworohereje. Aciye ku mbuga hwaniro, uyu mukinyi w'inyuma w'Ubwongereza avuga ko iyi nkuru atari yo kandi ko we na bagenziwe "banama rimwe kandi bafise intumbero imwe" yo kwitegurira urukino rw'ejo ku wa Mungu na Leeds United. Rangnick yongerako ati: "Ni ukuri nta mutima usimba kuko ndazi ko ari ikinyoma. Ivyo sinigera navyumviriza kuko ikindaje ishinga ari ugutegura umurwi wanje". "Numvise ivyanditswe. Ni vyo, hariho abakinyi batanezerejwe n'ingene akadirisha k'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi ryaheze. Ibi vyararenganye kandi icuka mu murwi ni ciza ugereranije no mu ndwi nkeya ziheze". "Ikituraje ishinga ni ugukina neza kandi tukerekana ubumwe ku kibuga. Ico ni co twokwitaho". Rangnick avuga ko yari aherutse kubwirwa ibijanye n'ubushamirane busanzwe buri hagati ya Manchester United na Leeds kandi ko arindiranye igishika no gukinira kuri Elland Road (ikibuga ca Leeds United) yuzuye. "Twari dufise imirwi mikeya ihangana bikomeuye mu Budagi. Ariko, umurwi wacu ufise uburambe bukomeye  bwo buhangana n'imrwi mu bihe nk'ibi. "Uko ndabizi, ni rwo rukino rwa mbere [kuri Manchester United] ikibuga ca Elland Road  cuzuye, haraciye igihe. tuarurindiranye igishika".

headline: Kurt Zouma: West Ham iriyamiriza uyu mukinyi wayo inyuma y'ireresi imwerekana akubita inyabu
text: West Ham United "iriyamiriza yivuye inyuma" umufaransa Kurt Zouma inyuma y'ireresi yamwerekanye atera imigere yongera akubita  inyabu (injangwe mu kinyarwanda) yiwe. Iyi reresi yerekana uyu mukinyi w'inyuma w'imyaka 27 atera imigere iyi nyabu iri hasi ayikubita n'amakofe mu maso. Yasavye imbabazi, ariko umurwi wiwe uvuga ko uzokwiga ikibazo ciwe hagati mu murwi. Mw'itangazo yasohoye, avuga ati: "Nashaka gusaba imbabazi ku vyo nakoze. Nta nsiguro notanga ku nyifato nagize, kandi birambabaje cane". "Nshaka kandi gusaba imbabazi kuri uyo wese yababajwe n'iyi reresi. Nohumuriza buri muntu wese ndamubwira ko inyabu zibiri zacu zompi zimeze neza kandi ko zifise amagara meza". "Zirakundwa zigakundwakazwa cane mu muryango wose, kandi ibi vyabaye ni ibintu bitari bikunze kuba, mbere ntibizosubira". Iyindi reresi yasohowe ubwa mbere n'ikinyamakuru The Sun ivugwa ko yafashwe na mwenewabo wa Zouma, Yoan, yerekana uyu mukinyi atera ibitaro iyi nyabu yongera ayirukana. Uyu murwi waguze uyu mukinyi mu ci riheze  umukuye muri Chelsea ku miriyoni zirenga 40 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika uvuga uti: "West Ham United iriyamiriza yivuye inyuma inyifato ya Kurt Zouma muri iyi video izunguruka". "Twavuganye na Kurt kandi ikibazo tuzogitorera umuti hagati yacu, ariko twashaka kumenyesha ko tudashobora kwihanganira na gato ubugome bukorerwa inyamaswa". Umuvugizi w'ishirahamwe riharanira agateka k'ibikoko, Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals, RSPCA, avuga ati: "Iyi reresi irababaje cane. Gutera imigere, gukubita inkoni canke amakofe inyamaswa, haba mu kuyihana canke ku yindi mvo iyo ari yo yose, ni ibintu bidashobora kwihanganirwa. "Turashimira cane abantu batabariza ibikoko vyiketswe ko biriko birakorerwa amarorerwa kandi twashaka kwemerera abanyagihugu ko tuzokwama tubikurikirana, bibaye ngombwa dukore n'amahotoza ku birego batuzaniye ku bijanye n'imibereho y'inyamaswa". Nta matohoza igipolisi  kizokora kuri ibi vyakozwe na Zouma.

headline: US iriko izibira Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala, umunyafrika wa mbere kurongora WTO
text: Igenwa ry'uwahoze ari umushikiranganji w'ikigega wa Nijeriya kurongora  ishirahamwe rijejwe ubudandaji kw'isi, OMC/WTO, rishobora kuburizwamwo inyuma y'aho Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zankiye iki cemezo. Ejo ku wa gatatu, umurwi ujejwe kugena abashaka kurongora iri shirahamwe wasavye ibihugu 164 bihurikiye muri iri shirahamwe gushigikira umupfasoni Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala. Yoba abaye umugore wa mbere kandi umunyafrika wa mbere arongoye WTO. Ariko Amerika isanzwe inegura imikorere ya WTO mu budandaji mpuzamakungu, ishaka ko iri shirahamwe rirongorwa n'uwundi mugore, umunya Koreya y'Ubumanuko, Yoo Myung-hee, ivuga ko yozana impunduka muri iri shirahamwe. Umupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala avuga ko "ari iteka rinini cane" kuri we kubona yizigirwa. Ariko iki gikorwa kimaze amezi ane yose co kugena uwushobora kurongora WTO cahuye n'inzitizi zikomeye igihe Amerika ivugiye ko izobandanya ishigikira uyu mushikiranganji w'ubudandaji wa Koreya y'Ubumanuko. Mw'itangazo rinegura WTO, ibiro vya Amerika bijejwe ubudandaji, ari navyo bihanura Perezida Donald Trump ku bijanye na politike y'ubudandaji, bivuga ko iri shirahamwe "ritegerezwa kurongorwa n'umuntu nyawe afise uburambwe muri kino gisata". Umupfasoni Yoo afise "ubuhinga yisangije" nk'inzobere mu bijanye n'ubudandaji kandi "afise ubumenyi bukwiye bwo kurongora neza iri hirahamwe" nk'uko tubisoma muri iryo tangazo. Ryongerako riti: "Iki ni igihe kigoye kuri WTO n'ubudandaji mpuzamakungu. Mu myaka 25 yose iheze nta biganiro vyigeze bihaba ku bijanye n'ibiciro, integuro yo gukemura ibibazo nta kigenda, hanyuma kandi ibihugu bike cane biri muri iri shirahamwe nivyo vyashoboye gukurikiza ingingo shingiro zijanye no gukorera mu muco. WTO irakeneye cane rwose impinduka". Hagati aho, muri iri tangazo, nta na hamwe harimwo izina ry'uyu mupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala. Mu gatondo k'ejo ku wa gatatu, inyuma y'umubonano w'intumwa za WTO  wo guhanahana ivyiyumviro ku bijanye n'iri genwa, umuvugizi waryo Keith Rockwell yavuze ko igihugu kimwe gusa ari co kitashigikiye umupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala. Ati: "Uno munsi, intumwa zose zashigikiye cane rwose ingene igikorwa cagenze ...n'ivyakivuyemwo. Kiretse iz'igihugu kimwe". 'Igikorwa kidasanzwe' Bwana Trump avuga ko WTO ari "akaga" kandi ko yegamiye ku ruhande  rw'Ubushinwa, ni mu gihe hari bamwe bari bagenywe muri iri shirahamwe bamaze guhagarikwa. WTO yaciye itumako iyindi nama ku wa 09 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe - inyuma y'amatora ya Amerika - kugira ngo basubire bahanahane ivyiyumviro kuri iki kibazo. Kubona Amerika yanka igenwa ry'uyu munya Nijeriya si ukuvuga ko adashobora kugenwa, ariko Washington ishobora kugira uruhara rukomeye mu gufata icemezo ntabanduka. Bwana Rockwell yabwiye abanyamakuru ko hashobora gusabwa igikorwa kidasanzwe kugira ngo igenwa ry'uyu mupfasoni  Okonjo-Iweala rishigikirwe na bose. Gushika ubu, arashigikiwe n'umuryango w'ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Bulaya. Iri shirahamwe ryatakaje uburongozi bwaryo igihe uwari arirongoye Roberto Azevedo  atangiye imihoho mu kw'umunani kw'umwaka uheze. Kuva ico gihe, ivyegera bine nibo bafise ibintu mu minwe. Umupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala w'imyaka 66 niwe mupfasoni wa mbere yabaye umushikiranganji w'ubutunzi hamwe n'uw'imigenderanire wa Nijeriya kandi akaba yaramaze imyaka 25 yose ajejwe ibibazo vy'iterambere mw'Ibanki y'isi yose. Muri kino gihe, ari mu barongoye urubuga rwa Twitter, akaba arongoye ihuriro rya GAVI rijejwe incanco, kandi akaba n'intumwa idasanzwe y'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO mu rugamba rwo kurwanya Covid-19. Mu gihe umupfasoni Okonjo-Iweala yogenwa, azoba afise igikorwa kidasanzwe. WTO isanzwe ihanganye n'ikibazo c'ibiganiro vy'ubucuruzi vyahagaze hamwe n'icuka kibi hagati ya Amerika n'Ubushinwa. Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, yavuze ko uburambe bunini afise mu mu guhindura imikorere bwamutumye aboneka ko ari we nyawe ashoboye gufasha WTO kusubira ku murongo.

headline: Ubugumba: Ingorane zo kutavyara ziterwa n'iki ku mugabo canke umugore?
text: Muganga Innocente Irakoze, umuhinga mu bijanye n'irondoka aratuganiriza ku kibazo c'ubugumba ku mugore no ku mugabo.

headline: Burundi: Ibiharuro vya Covid-19 vyongerekanye
text: Reta y’Uburundi itera akamo abanyagihugu kubandanya bakurikiza amabwirizwa yo kwirinda ikiza karanda ca Covid-19 kuko “ibiharuro vy’abantu batorwa Covid-19 vyongerekanye”. Inyuma y’inama yahuje abajejwe kurwanya iki kiza ejo ku wa kabiri 26 Mukakaro (7) 2022, umushikiranganji w’amagara y’abantu Sylvie Nzeyimana yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko haheze “ikiringo nk’ico indwi zitatu … dusanga nko ku musi hatorwa abantu bashika 200” baba baranduye mu baba bipimishije. Ati: “Ico kiza kiracariho, kirirabika ariko iyo dusamaye ntidukurikize impanuro zo kwigikngira, gica kigaruka kikaduhwibira, abantu bakandura”. Umushikiranganji Nzeyimana ntatanga ibiharuro vy’abapimwa buri musi ariko avuga ko ibiharuro vy’abandura vyiyongereye ugereranije n’ingene vyari bimeze inyuma y’amezi atari make vyari vyaragabanutse cane.
