Mu ntara ntara zigeramiwe nk’uko abimenyesha harimwo igisagara ca Bujumbura, intara za Bujumbura, Gitega, Bururi mu bunamuko bw’igihugu, Muyinga na Kirundo mu buraruko. Sylvie Nzeyimana avuga kandi ko hari n’abinjira bavuye hanze bapimwa bagasanga baranduye. Ati: “Muri ino misi, abapimwa ku mipaka Uburundi busangiye n’ibindi bihugu, harimwo no ku kibuga c’indege, twasanze ko ingenzi ziza ziciye mu ndege harimwo abatari bake baza barwaye … aho nk’akarorero mu ndwi yose iheze, abashika 80 barapimwe basanga bararwaye uwo mugera”. Abinjiye mu gihugu bategerezwa gupimwa. Abasaba kwihutira kuraba inyishu hanyuma basanze barwaye bakitura amavuriro bwango. Nta ngingo ruhasha zifatirwa abinjira bavuye hanze nk’uko vyigeze kuba muri kahise. Igicapo cerekana ingene iki kiza cifashe mu gihugu cerekana ko ku bantu 7.483 bapimwe ku magenekerezo ya 23, 24 na 25 uku kw’indwi, 423 basanze baranduye, muri bo 39 bakaba bari bavuye hanze. Ibiharuro bitangwa n’ishami rijejwe amagara y’abantu kw’isi OMS/WHO vyerekana ko mu Burundi abantu 44.437 aribo bamaze kwandura,  kuva iki kiza gishika mu gihugu mu 2020, 15  bakaba ari co gitigiri OMS yahawe c'abamaze  gupfa. Ibi biharuro vyarakemanzwe n’ammwe mu shirahamwe ategamiye kuri leta ko bitavuga ukuri kw’ingene Covid yari yifashe mu gihugu. Ibiharuro kandi vyerekana ko abagera kuri 0,1 % bonyene nibo bamaze kwicandagisha mu gihugu.

headline: France: Abapolisi batatu bahagaritswe mu kazi i Paris bazira gukubita umwirabure
text: Abategetsi b'Ubufaransa bahagaritse abapolisi batatu inyuma yo kuboneka kuri video bariko barakubita umwirabure akora mu vy'umuziki hagati mu gisagara ca Paris. Ivyo vyashitse ku musi wa gatandatu vyatumye haduka agashavu ku nyifato y'abajejwe umutekano mu Bufaransa. Ku musi wa mbere, igipolisi cagirijwe gukoresha inguvu nyinshi zidakenewe mu gihe cariko kirasambura ikambi y'abimukira i Paris. Ivyo bishitse mu gihe reta iriko iragerageza gushiraho itegeko ribuza kwerekana isura z'abapolisi. Abaterekwa iryo tegeko bavuga ko iyo ataba ayo masanamu ata kintu na kimwe muri ivyo vyabaye mu ndwi iheze cari kumenyekana. Ku musi wa kane, umukinyi rurangiranwa w'umupira w'amaguru, Kylian Mbappe, na we nyene w'umwirabure, yarifatanije na bagenzi we b'umurwi nserukiragihugu hamwe n'abandi banonotsi mu kwiyamiriza inyifato y'abo bapolisi. Iruhande y'ifoto y'uwo mugabo  yiswe Michel yuzuye amaraso mu maso, yanditse ati:" Video ibabaje, ubunyamaswa budakwiye kwihanganirwa. Iyamirize amacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba!" Kuri uyu wa kane  ni ho amasanamu ya video yashirwa ku rubuga rwa Loopsider. Yerekana abapolisi batatu bariko basunagura, bakubita ingumu banakoresha n'indembo kuri uwo mugabo amaze kwinjira muri 'studio' yiwe. Loopsider ivuga ko ubwa mbere yari yahagaritswe yagirizwa kuba atambaye agapfukamunwa. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Michel kandi avuga ko yatutswe ivyerekeye urukoba rwiwe mu minota itanu yamaze ariko arakubitwa. Yarapfunzwe  anagirizwa kurwana no kwanka guhagarikwa, ariko abashikirizamanza bamirira kure ivyo birego, ahubwo bakaba baciye batanguza amatohoza kuri abo bapolisi. Igihe yashika ku cicaro gikuru c'igipolisi ku wa kane, ari kumwe n'uwumuburanira kugira buguruze urubanza, Michel yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ati: "Abantu bategerezwa kunkingira bangizeko igitero. Nta kintu na kimwe nari nakoze ngo nkorerwe ibintu nk'ibi.  Nshaka ko gusa abo bantu batatu bahanwa hakurikijwe amategeko." Uwurongoye igisagara ca Paris, Anne Hidalgo, yavuze ko "ababajwe cane" n'ico "gikorwa kidakwiye kwihanganirwa". Umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu Gérald Darmanin yabwiye televiziyo y'Ubafaransa ko ashobora gusaba ko abo bapolisi bahagarikwa mu kazi, avuga ko "bacafuje umwambaro w'igihugu". Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, Darmanin yari yategetse igipolisi kumushikiriza icegeranyo inyuma y'aho basamburiye ikambi y'abimukira ku mugwa mukuru, bagatana mu mitwe na bo hamwe n'abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu. Yanditse kuri Twitter ko bimwe muvyahabereye "Biteye isoni".

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru i Bulaya ku wa gatatu 25.12.2019: Werner, Pogba, Neymar, Haaland, Alonso, Cavani
text: Barcelona irashaka gusubira kugerageza kurondera umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain, umnya Brezili Neymar w'imyaka 27, mu kiringo gito c'igura n'igurisha mu kwezi kwa mbere kuza. (Goal) Chelsea iriko irondera kugura mu kwa mbere kuza umusatirizi wa RB Leipzig, umudagi Timo Werner w'imyaka 23. (Express) Umukinyi wo hagati wa  Man United  Paul Pogba w'imyaka 26, aripfuza gusezera muri uyo murwi kugira ngo asubire mu murwi wiwe wa kera Juventus. (Calicomercato - in Italian) Mario Mandzukic yahora akina mu murwi Juventus yahagaritse ibihuha vyari bigize iminsi kuri we mu gushira umukono ku masezerano n'umurwi Qatari ya Al-Duhail n'aho Manchester United yari yaramwipfuje cane. (Mail) Manchester United iriteguye kugura umusatirizi w'umunya Norvège Erling Haaland w'imyaka 19 igategura kumuhemba umushahara w'amafaranga 200,000 vy'amapawundi kugira ngo yemere ahebe umurwi wiwe wa Red Bull Salzburg. (Sun) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea, umunya Espanye Marcos Alonso w'imyaka  28, ariko araronderwa cane na  Inter Milan yo mu Butaliyano. (Calciomercato) Umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain, umunya Uruguay Edinson Cavani w'imyaka 32, ari hafi y'ugushika ku masezerano ashobora gutuma muri uku kwa mbere yimukira muri Atletico Madrid ya Espanye. (Marca) Arsenal yiteze kugurisha umwe mu basatirizi bayo kugira ngo ishobore kugura umusatirizi wa Lyon, umufaransa Moussa Dembele w'imyaka 23. (Le10Sport - in French) Everton na Atletico Madrid bariko bararwanira umusatirizi wa River Plate, umunya Colombia Rafael Santos Borre w'imyaka 24. (AS) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester United, Chris Smalling w'imyaka 30 yipfuza kuguma muri Roma yatijijwemwo mu gihe amasezerano y'intizo yiwe yorangira mu mpera z'iri higanwa ry'uno mwaka. (Roma Press) AC Milan irizigiye ko ishobora gushika ku masezerano y'ukuzana umusatirizi wa Suède Zlatan Ibrahimovic w'imyaka 38 muri uku kwezi kwa mbere. (Mail) West Ham iriko irarondera ingene yogura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Espanye Unai Nunez w'imyaka 22 asanzwe akinira Athletic Bilbao. (AS in Spanish) Juan Sebastian Veron avuga ko ibiganiro bibandanya hagati y'umurwi Estudiantes na Andres Iniesta w'imyaka 35 (yahoze akinira Barcelona) ubu akina hagati mu murwi Vissel Kobe wo mu Buyapani kugira ngo ashobore kwimukira muri uyo murwi wo muri Argentine . (La Oral Deportivo, via Marca) Umukuru w'umurwi Wolves Nuno Espirito Santo yahaye akaruhuko abakinyi biwe kugira babe kumwe n'imiryango yabo mu guhimbaza Noel imbere y'urukino rwo ku wa gatanu n'umurwi Manchester City. (FourFourTwo) Chelsea yemerewe ko ishobora kugura umukinyi w'umunya Espoanye Isco w'imyaka 27 asanzwe akinira Real Madrid ku miliyoni 44 z'amapawundi. Ivyo vyoha akaryo Real Madrid gushobora kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Tottenham, Christian Eriksen. (Mirror) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Arsenal, umunya Bosnie-Herzegovine Sead Kolasinac w'imyaka 26 ariko araronderwa na Napoli hamwe na Roma. (Sky Sports) Lyon iriko irarondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Atletico Madrid, umufaransa Thomas Lemar w'imyaka 24. (L'Equipe - in French)

headline: Obiang: P﻿rezida amaze imyaka 43 ku butegetsi agira asubire kwitoza muri Guinee Equatoriale
text: U﻿mukuru w'igihugu wa mbere arambiye ku butegetsi kw'isi ariko ararondera gusubira kw'itoza inyuma y'imyaka 43 amaze ku butegetsi muri Guinee Equatoriale. P﻿rezida Teodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo w'imyaka 80 afise intwaro ivugwamwo guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu, cane cane kuboreza igufa abantu no kubanyuruza. B﻿amwe mu batavuga rumwe na reta bari muri aayo matora ariko ntibiteze kuyatsinda. U﻿wo muprezida yagize icibare ciwe ico gihugu kirangwamwo ubutunzi bw'igitoro, aho abo mu muryango wiwe bari mu bibanza bikomakomeye. U﻿muhungu wiwe, ari mu kibanza c'icegera ca prezida, Teodoro "Teodorin" Nguema Obiang Mangue, yaragize ubuzima buzimvye cane muri Amerika n'i Buraya, akaba mbere anafise ibirato vy'intoke bizimvye cane biriko amabuye y'agaciro vyahoze ari ivyo umuririmvyi rurangiranwa Michael Jackson, nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi b'Ubwongereza. Prof Ana Lúcia Sá yabwiye BBC ati:"Ayo matora nta co aje guhindura." Prof  Sá umuhinga mu vya politike n'intwaro z'agahahazo zo muri Afrika kuri kaminuza ya Lisbon yagize ati:"﻿Ntakizohinduka". Y﻿ongeyeko ko "azi nezako Obiang azotorwa n'amajwi arenga 95%". I﻿bi kandi babihurirako n'uwuharanira agateka ka zina muntu Tutu Alicante, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amaakuru rya Reuters:"Ku musi wa Mungu abantu bazotora uko reta ibibitezeko, kubera ntushobora kuvuga wisanzuye ico wiyumvira muri Guinee Equatoriale." A﻿licante abandanya avuga ati:"Abatavuga rumwe na reta nta maahirwe bafise. Araza kugira ibishoboka vyose kugira ntave ku butegetsi." I﻿migambwe itavuga rumwe na reta barapfa kuyireka igakora ariko ikagira ikibazo c'uko ata tangazamakuru ryigenga rihari, kuko ibinyamakuru vyose, bitari mu minwe ya reta, biba ari ivyo abayishigikiye. V﻿yibazwa ko prezida Obiang yaheruka guhakana ivyo guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu n'ubusuma mu matora, ariko aragerageza kugira isura nziza mu makungu. M﻿u kwezi kw'icenda, reta yarakuyeho igihano co gupfa, ingingo yashimwe na Onu.

headline: Gambia: Uwahoze arongoye igendereza yaciriwe urwo gupfa
text: Umucamanza wo muri Gambia yaciriye urubanza rwo gupfa uwahoze arongoye  igendereza ry’iki gihugu, Yankuba Badjie, hamwe n’abandi bane bari mu bajejwe umutekano, ku caha co kwica umunyaporitike mu 2016, mu misi ya nyuma y’ubutegetsi bw’agahotoro bw’uwahoze ari umukuru w’ico gihugu, Yahya Jammeh. Uyu munyaporitike, Ebrima Solo Sandeng – yari imbere mu mugambwe United Democratic Party utavuga rumwe n’uwari ku butegetsi – yari yahagaritswe mu myiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza reta. Yapfiriye mw’ibohero haciye imisi ibiri, abanje gukubitwa no kuborezwa igufa. Urupfu rwiwe rwatumye abanyagihugu baterwa n’uburakari. Inyuma y’imyaka 22 yari amaze ku butegetsi, Perezida Jammeh yagiye kubuvako yari yanse kugenda inyuma yo gutsindwa mu matora yo muri Kigarama 2016, kubera igitsure c'ibihugu vyo mu karere. Mu 2017, Jammeh yahungiye muri Guinée équatoriale, ari naho akiri mu buhungiro.

headline: Igikombe c'isi 2022: Qatar ifashe gute abakozi ikoresha mu kwubaka ibibuga vy'umupira?
text: Ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi 2022 mu mupira w'amaguru ryiteze gutangura ku wa 21 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe muri Qatar, rizoba ari ryo rya mbere ribereye mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo hagati. Ni ihiganwa kandi rya mbere riteye impari nyinshi, aho hari ibibazo vyibazwa ku kungene iki gihugu co mu Kigobe gitunze cane cashoboye kuronka uburenganzira bwo gutegura iri higanwa, ingene gifata abakozi bubaka ibibuga, hanyuma kandi nimba kizoshobora kwakira abantu bari muri wa murwi w'abahuza ibitsina babisangiye, canke LGBT. Qatar iriko irubaka ibibuga indwi bizoberako izo nkino, ikibuga c'indege gishasha, igituro gishasha c'itereni/gari ya moshi hamwe n'amabarabara mashasha. Urukino rwa nyuma ruzobera mu kibuga kizokwakira izindi icenda, kikaba ari naco kiranga igisagara gishasha. Ariko iki gihugu kiranegurwa cane ku kungene gifata abakozi mvamahanga 30.000 bakora muri ibi bikorwa. Mu 2016, ishirahamwe riharanira agateka ka zina muntu Amnesty International ryaragirije Qatar ko ikoresha abantu ku nguvu. Ryavuze ko abakozi benshi bari babayeho nabi cane, ko ikoresha amafaranga menshi cane mu kurondera abakozi kandi ko itabahemba, mbere ikanabafatira ibitabo vyabo vy'inzira. Kuva mu 2017, reta yarashizeho amategeko akingira abakozi b'abimukira akazi ko mu bushuhe burenze urugero, kugabanya amasaha y'akazi, no guteza imbere imibereho yabo aho bakorera. Hagati aho, ishirahamwe Human Rights Watch riharanira agateka ka zina muntu mu cegeranyo caryo ca 2021 ryavuze ko abacangero mvamahanga bari bagihanzwe "n'ibihano vyo gukatwa imishahara biteye kubiri n'amategeko", mbere "bakamara amezi n'amezi badahembwa mu kazi kabo k'amasaha menshi katoroshe". Amnesty International ivuga kandi ko n'aho icitwa "kafala" cakuwe - ikintu kizibira abakozi mvamahanga kuva ku buzi bwabo abakoresha babo batavyemeye - abakozi baracaturubikwa. Umuvugizi wa reta yabwiye BBC ati: "Harabaye akarusho gakomeye mu bijanye no gushira mu ngiro izi mpinduka". Avuga ko igitigiri c'amakompanyi arenga amategeko "kizobandanya kigabanuka uko ingingo zizogenda zubahirizwa". Mu kwa kabiri 2021, ikinyamakuru Guardian cavuze ko abakozi mvamahanga 6.500 bava mu Buhindi, Pakistan, Nepal, Bangladesh na Sri Lanka bari bamaze gupfira muri Qatar kuva itangajwe ko ironse uburenganzira bwo kwakira inkino z'igikombe c'isi yose. Izi mpfu zagiye gutangazwa n'abategetsi b'ibihugu bitanu vya Aziya, ntivyerekana ko zabaye kubera akazi canke aho bakorera. Ariko ishirahamwe riharanira agateka k'abakozi FairSquare ryavuze ko abenshi muri abo bapfuye basa n'uko bari abakozi bo muri ico gisata co gutegura ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi. Reta ya Qatar ivuga ko hari indenzarugero mu biharuro bitangwa, kubera harimwo n'ibihumbi vy'abanyamahanga bapfuye bamaze imyaka myinshi baba kandi bakora muri ico gihugu. Ivuga ko benshi bashobora kuba bahoze bakora ubuzi butari muri iki gisata c'ubwubatsi. Qatar ivuga ko hagati ya 2014 na 2020, habaye abantu 37 bakora muri ibi bibuga vy'igikombe c'isi bapfuye. Ivuga ko 34 muri bo batahitanywe "n'akazi bakora". Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ry'akazi BIT/ILO rivuga ko Qatar itaharuye abakozi bapfuye giturumbuka no mu buryo butari bwitezwe. Rivuga ko muri aba hari abahitanywe n'indwara z'umutima n'iz'ihumekero zitewe n'ubushuhe, aba bagaharurwa ko "bahitanywe n'urw'akarago" kandi ko ata sano rihari n'akazi bakora. BIT yaregeranije ibitigiri vyayo vy'abapfuye ikuye mu bitaro vya reta hamwe no mu mashirahamwe akoresha za rusehabaniha muri Qatar, ibi bigo vyose bikaba vyakira abantu bose bahitanywe n'ibikorwa bifitaniye isano n'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi. Ivuga ko abakozi 50 bapfuye abarenga 500 nabo barakomereka cane muri Qatar mu 2021 honyene, abandi 37.600 nabo barakomereka bukebuke. Aba bantu bapfuye abandi bagakomereka cane cane bakorotse bava hejuru, abandi bagwa mu masanganya y'imodoka abandi nabo bakaba baguweko n'ibintu. Qatar ni heza ku bantu bahuza ibitsina babisangiye (LGBT )? Qatar ni igihugu ca Islam kigendera ku mico ya kera kandi guhuza ibitsina hagati y'ababisangiye biteye kubiri n'amategeko. Amashirahamwe aharanira uburenganzira bw'aba LGBT asaba ishirahamwe rijejwe umupira w'amakuru kw'isi, FIFA, hamwe n'abajejwe gutegura iri higanwa muri Qatar, gukora impinduka imbere y'uko iri higanwa ritangura. Muri izi mpinduka harimwo kubahumuriza kandi bakizezwa ko umutekano wabo utazohungabana, kugira ngo baronke uburenganzira bwo kwinjira muri Qatar, kandi ntihabe ivyo gukurikirana abavugana ibijanye n'abahuza ibitsina babisangiye. Abajejwe gutegura iri higanwa ry'igikombe c'isi muri Qatar baherutse kuvuga ko abantu bose bahawe ikaze, ariko "ivyo kwiyerekana ku mugaragaro ku bahuza ibitsina babisangiye canke ku babihuza batabisangiye, ntibiri mu mico n'imigenzo yacu". Qatar 2022 yatanguye guteza impari kuva bitangajwe na FIFA, mu 2010. Nk'igihugu gito cane (n'aho gitunze cane) ariko ata kahise k'urukino rw'umupira w'amaguru gifise, kandi itari bwigere ironka itike yo kwinjira mu nkino za nyuma z'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi, wabaye umubabaro kuri benshi igihe Qatar itsinda ibihugu vyariko bihiganwa nayo ari vyo Amerika, Australia, Koreya y'Epfo n'Ubuyapani. Iyi ngingo yatumye haduka ibirego ko abategetsi ba FIFA  bahawe igiturire kugira ngo bemerere Qatar gutegura ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi, n'aho amatohoza y'umurwi w'abigenga washizweho na FIFA ata vyemezo bikomeye vyo gushigikira ibi  birego. Qatar iriyamiriza ivyo yagirizwa ko yaguze amajwi y'intumwa zatora, ariko amatohoza y'ibiturire akorwa n'abategetsi b'Ubufasransa arabandanya, ni mu gihe mu 2020 Amerika yagirije abategetsi babatu ba FIFA ko bahawe amafaranga. Mu bisanzwe ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'umupira w'amaguru riba mu kwa gatandatu gushika mu kw'indwi, ariko muri Qatar ubushuhe muri iki kiringo c'umwaba buba bugera kuri degre 41 mbere bugashobora no kugera kuri 50 - ubushuhe bwinshi ku buryo ata muntu yosohoka, tureke rero gukina umupira iminota n'imiburiburi 90. Mu gihe yariko iraharanira ubu burenganzira, Qatar yaremeye gushiraho ubuhinga bwo gukanyisha buzotuma ibibuga bihabwa akayaga, haba mu gice abakinyi bakiniramwo canke mu ruhande rw'abarorerezi. Hagati aho, mu 2015, FIFA  yafashe ingingo yo gutegura iri higanwa mu gihe c'ubukonje. Ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi rizotangura ku wa 21 Munyonyo (11), urukino rwa nyuma rukaba ruzokinwa ku wa 18 Kigarama (12). Ibi bisigura ko iri higanwa rizoba mu gihe umwaka w'amahiganwa y'imirwi mu bihugu vyinshi uzoba ugeze hagati kandi rikazotuma aya mahiganwa atoroherwa. Ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza Premier League, nk'akarorero, ntirizobona inkino zizokinwa hagati y'itariki 13 Munyonyo na 26 Kigarama. Kugira ngo bashobore kugarura umwanya uzotakara, umwaka w'inkino wa 2022/2023 uzotangura indwi imwe imbere y'aho wategerezwa gutangurira hanyuma uzorenzeko indwi imwe mu mpera zawo.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru: Mbappe, Costa, Guimaraes, Lukaku, Yerry Mina
text: Real Madrid ntiriyumvira ivyo gusubira kurondera umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain umufaransa Kylian Mbappe  w’imyaka 23, hagati aho, uyu murwi wo muri Espagne uriko ukurikiranira hagufi ingene uwahoze ari umukinyo wo hagati Xabi Alonso  yitwara nk’umumenyereza wa Bayer Leverkusen . (ESPN) Mbappe ariko arihweza ingene yohagarika amasezerano yiwe mu kwa mbere. (L'Equipe iciye kuri Mail) Hagati aho, PSG iripfuza kugura umukinyi w’inyuma wa Real Madrid umunya-Espagne Rafa Marin  w’imyaka 20. (Marca mu ki espagnol) Inter irashaka gusinyisha Romelu Lukaku amasezerano kugira ngo yimukire burundu muri uyu murwi. Uyu mubirigi w’imyaka 29 yatijijwe uyo murwi wo mu Butaliyano avuye muri Chelsea. (Calciomercato mu gitaliyano) Inter kandi iripfuza umukinyi w’inyuma wa Everton umunya-Colombia Yerry Mina  w’imyaka 28. (Calciomercato mu gitaliyano) Manchester United niyo ifise amahirwe yo gutahukana umunyegori wa Porto umunya-Portugal Diogo Costa  w’imyaka 23. (Diario de Noticias, iciye kuri TeamTalk) United igiye gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo yongereze amasezerano ifitaniye na Diogo Dalot kugira ngo izibire Barcelona iriko irahiga ingene yoronka uyu munya-Portugal w’imyaka 23 akina inyuma. (ESPN, iciye kuri Mirror) Newcastle United irashaka gushika ku masezerano y’igihe kirekire n’umunyabrezili akina hagati Bruno Guimaraes w’imyaka 24 imbere y’uko uyu mwaka w’inkino urangira. (90min) Arsenal  bihobora kuyibera ngombwa ko iriha amafaranga menshi kugira ironke umunya-Ukraine akina ku ruhande  Mykhaylo Mudryk w’imyaka 21, mu kwa mbere, mu gihe umurwi wiwe Shakhtar Donestk wobandanya mw’ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League). (Football.London) Tottenham itegura gutangura ibiganiro ku vyerekeye amasezerano ifitaniye n’umumenyereza wayo Antonio Conte mu kwezi kuza. Amasezerano y’uyu mutaliyano w’imyaka 53 azorangira mu mpera z’uyu mwaka w’inkino. (Mail) Umusatirizi wa Atletico Madrid umunya-Portugal Joao Felix w’imyaka 22  aripfuza gusezerera uyu murwi mu kwa mbere kubera icuka kibi kiri hagati ya we n’umumenyereza Diego Simeone. (A Bola mugi portugal) Manchester United ishobora kuba umwe mu mirwi yiteguriye guciria inzira Felix yo kuva muri Atletico Madrid. (A Bola iciye kuri Express) Umuserukizi w’umusatirizi w’umunya-Autriche Marko Arnautovic akina muri Bologna avuga ko uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 33 ari we yanse kwimukira muri Manchester United, aho kuba uyu murwi wa Premier League wamwanse. (Gianluca di Marzio via Sport Witness) Real Madrid irashaka kurondera umunya-Canada Alphonso Davies w’imyaka 21 akina inyuma muri Bayern Munich. (Marca mu ki-Espagnol ) Umukinyi w’inyuma wa Leicester City umubirigi Wout Faes w’imyaka 24 avuga ko yanse amasezerano yamusaba kuja gukinira Chelsea mu ci, imbere y’uko afata ingingo yo kwimukira kuri King Power Stadium (ikibuga ca Leicester). (Telegraph ) Chelsea yagenye uwujejwe kugura abkinyi mushasha, Joe Shields, imuvanye mu murwi Mugenzi wawo wo muri Premier League,  Southampton. (Sun) Manchester City ni umwe mu mirwi iriko irarwanira umukinyi w’inyuma w’umunya- Ireland, Sam Curtis w’imyaka 16, asanzwe akina mu murwi St Patrick's Athletic. (Football Insider)

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru ku wa gatanu 05.07.2019: Maguire, Fernandes, Niguez, Marcelo, Lukaku, Gomez
text: Umukinyi Bruno Fernandes arashashaye cane kwimukira muri Manchester United. Bitegekanijwe ko uyo mukinyi wo hagati w'imyaka 24 asanzwe akina muri Sporting Lisbon no mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Portugal afata urugendo rumushikana Old Trafford gupimwa kwa muganga. (Sport Witness) Man U irarondera kandi umunyegori wa Atletico Madrid Saul Niguez w'imyaka 24 kugira asubirire Paul Pogba mu gihe uyu mukinyi w'umufaransa w'imyaka 26 yoramuka avuye i Old Trafford. (Express) Manchester City ntiyiteguye kuriha amahera asabwa na Leicester ku mukinyi Harry Maguire  w'imyaka 26, akaba ari amahirwe kuri Manchester United yo gushobora kugura uyo mukinyi mpuzamakungu w'umwongereza. (90Min) Arsenal nta mahirwe bagize y'ukuronka umunyegori w'umudagi w'imyaka 21, Markus Schubert, yafashe ingingo yo kuja gukinira Schalke avuye muri Dynamo Dresden. (Sport1) Arsenal bariko bakora hasi hejuru kugira bagure Marcelo inyuma y'aho uyo mukinyi w'umunya Brezili asavye ko yova muri Real Madrid. (Sport - via Metro) Arsenal yatanguye kuvugana n'umurwi Gremio kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Argentine, Walter Kannemann w'imyaka 28. (Globo Esporte - via Metro) Inter Milan biriko birayigora kugura umusatirizi wa Manchester United akinira umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ububirigi, Romelu Lukaku w'imyaka 26. (Sun) Uwahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Tottenham, Ossie Ardiles, avuga ko kugerageza kubuza Christian Eriksen w'imyaka 27 kugenda ari "uguta umwanya". (Talksport - via Goal) West Ham United iriko irarwanira na Valencia umusatirizi wa  Celta Vigo Maxi Gomez w'imyaka 22 akinira kandi n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Uruguay . (Sky Italia - via Inside Futbol) Leicester umutima wayo wose uri ku mukinyi w'inyuma wa Burnley, James Tarkowski, ari nka hamwe Harry Maguire yokwimukira muri Man United. Hagati aho, Leicester izomurwanira na Wolves nayo nyene yipfuza uyo mukinyi. (Birmingham City) Man United iriteguriye kugiriranira amasezerano mashasha n'umunyegori David de Gea akaba yohembwa imiliyoni 85 z'amapawundi milioni 85, aho yoronka umushahara w'ibihumbi 350  ku ndwi. (Star) Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Croatia, Dejan Lovren ashobora kuva muri Liverpool akaja muri AC Milan yipfuza cane uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 30, ikaba yoba iriko irategura amahera ngo imushikane i San Siro. (Mirror) Manchester City na Barcelona iriko irarwanira umukinyi w'inyuma wa Juventus,  Joao Cancelo w'imyaka 25, akaba kandi akinira n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Portugal. (Sport English - via Mirror) Frank Lampard yifotoreje mu kibuga ca Stamford Bridge aho yakirwa nk'umumenyereza mushasha wa Chelsea. (Mail) Arsenal yugururiwe inzira y'ukugura umusatirizi w'umunyabrezili akinira Barcelona, Malcom w'imyaka 22, ariko ico irondera ahanini  kukaba ari ukugura umusatirizi wa Cote d'Ivoire Wilfred Zaha  w'imyaka 26 akina muri Crystal Palace. (Mirror) Aba Gunners bariko bategura imiliyoni 70 bashaka gutanga kuri Zaha, n'aho Palaceyoyo ivuga ko uyo mukinyi afise agaciro kangana n'imiliyoni 80 z'amapawundi. (Sky Sports) Tottenham yahagaritse ibiganiro vyayihuza na Real Betis ku mukinyi wo hagati akomoka muri Argentina, Giovani Lo Celso w'imyaka 24 inyuma y'aho iyo mirwi inaniranye kwumvikana ku mahera. (Sky Sports)

headline: Uburusiya na Ukraine: Intambara irashobora gusubira kwaduka
text: Ibihugu vy'uburengero bw'Uburaya bihanze amaso uruhagarara hagati ya Ukraine n'Uburusiya, mu gihe hari impungenge z'icoba biramutse bitanye mu mitwe

headline: WHO 'ibabajwe cane' nuko abakozi bayo bwankiwe kwinjira mu Ubushinwa
text: Umugwi w'intumwa za WHO/OMS zari gutohoza amamuko ya Covid-19 mu gisagara ca Wuhan wankiwe kwinjira mu Bushinwa. Babiri muri bo bari bamaze gufata urugendo - umwe aza yamaze gusubira inyuma, uwundi aracari aho arindiririye indege mu kindi gihugu. OMS ivuga ko vyatumwe n'ikibazo co kuronka impusha zo kwinjira(visa). Ayo matohoza arindiriwe kuva kera yari yemewe n'abategetsi b'Ubushinwa mu kwezi kwa 12 inyuma y'amezi menshi babivugana na OMS. Uwo mugera watowe ubwa mbere muri Wuhan mu mpera za 2019 ucaduka, bikaba vyibajijwe ko wazananye mw'isoko. Umukuru wa OMS Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus ''yababajwe cane'' n'uko Ubushinwa butaheraheje ibijanye no gutanga impusha z'uko abo bantu bashika muri ico gihugu''kandi babiri muri bo bari bamaze gufata urugendo hanyuma abasigaye na bo bakaba basivye ku munota wa nyuma''. Yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru i Geneve  ku wa kabiri ati:''Ubushinwa bwari bwanyemereye ko buriko burakora ibikenewe vyose kugira abo bantu bashikeyo vuba hashoboka'', asigura ko yari yavuganye n'abategetsi bo hejuru b'Ubushinwa abumvisha ko ''ubwo butumwa buza imbere kuri OMS no ku makungu''. OMS yari imaze amezi n'amezi itegura kurungika umugwi w'abantu 10 b'abahinga mpuzamakungu mu Bushinwa kugira baje gutohoza ivy'uko ikiza camutse ku gikoko n'ingene uwo mugera wahejeje ugashikira abantu. Mu kwezi guheze vyari vyatangajwe ko ayo matohoza azotangura mu kwezi kwa mbere mu 2021. Babiri mu bagize uwo mugwi mpuzamakungu bari bafashe urugendo bagana Ubushinwa ku wa kabiri nk'uko bimenyeshwa na OMS. Covid-19 yatowe ubwa mbere mu gisagara ca Wuhan co mu ntara ya Hubei yo mu Bushinwa, mu mpera za 2019. Vyatanguye kwibazwa ko uwo mugera wandurutse mw'isoko rigurisha ibikoko vyo mw'ishamba vyo kubaga. Aho ni ho vyibazwa ko uwo mugera ariho wava ku bikoko ukandukira abantu. Ariko hari impari nyinshi ku mamuko y'uwo mugera. Hari abahinga bibaza  ko isoko atari yo mamuko yawo, ko gusa ariho wagwiriraniye. Hari ubushakashatsi buvuga ko imigera ya corona ishobora kwandukira abantu imaze imyaka igendagenda ivuye ku buhungarema atawurayitora. Ariko ntibizwi igikoko yoba  yaraciyeko kugira abantu bandukirwe.

headline: Mu Burundi malaria yoba yabaye ikiza?
text: Abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Leta y'Uburundi bafadikanije n'abaserukira ishami ry'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu rijejwe amagara y'abantu OMS, bariko barihweza icatumye ingwara ya malaria ifata abantu benshi muri uyu mwaka kuruta uko vyahora. Ibiro vya ONU bijejwe gutunganya ibikorwa vy'ubutabazi OCHA, bimenyesha ko ibitigiri vya malaria yabonetse ku barwayi kuva mu ntango z'uyu mwaka, bigeze kuri 5 700 000, nayo abo yahitanye bagera ku 1800. Nimwumvirize uwuserukira  OMS mu Burundi, Kazadi Mulombo. Avuga ko bariko bafashanya na leta gukora ibishoboka ngo iyo ngwara igabanuke, ariko yirinze kuvuga ko igeze ku rugero rwo kwitwa ikiza canke kwemeza ibiharuro bivugwa, kuko leta ari yo ibishinzwe.

headline: Brexit: Boris Johnson arashima amasezerano y'ubudandaji hagati ya UK na EU
text: Ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Buraya, EU, n'Ubwongereza bashitse ku masezerano azogenga ubudandaji inyuma ya Brexit, aje kurangiza amezi yo kutumvikana ku burenganzira bwo kuroba n'amategeko agenga ubudandaji. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ku biro iwe, Boris Johnson yagize ati:"Twasubiranye ubwigenge ku mategeko yaco hamwe na kazoza kacu." Umushikiranganji wa mbere yongeyeko ko, n'aho ibiganiro "vyari bigoye" ari "amasezerano meza ku Buraya bwose" azotanga akazi n'iterambere. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe rya Buraya Ursula Von der Leyen yavuze ko ari amasezerano "ata ho yegamiye". Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru I Bruxelles, umukuru w'akanama k'ubumwe bwa Buraya yavuze ati:"Rwari urugendo rurerure rurimwo ibihuhusi ariko twaronse amasezerano meza twerekana. "Ni nyayo, nta ho yegamiye, kandi n'ikintu ciza cari gikwiriye gukorwa ku mpande zose." Yongeyeko ko ubu ari "igihe co kwibagira kahise tukaraba muri kazoza" kandi ko Ubwongereza "buguma ari ncuti nyakuri". Yavuze ko hazoba ikiringo mfatakibanza c'imyaka itanu n'igice mu bakora mu gisata c'uburovyi. Hanyuma imigenderanire izobandanya ku bibazo bijanye n'ihindukagurika ry'ibihe, amasoko ntanganguvu, umutekano hamwe no mu gutwara abantu n'ibintu. Mw'itangazo, ibiro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere mu Bwongereza bigira biti:"Turagarukanye amahera yacu, imbibe, amategeko, ubudandaji hamwe n'amazi turobamwo," Risubiramwo icivugo ca Johnson co kwiyamamaza mu matora, ryongeyeko  "Brexit iragiye mu bikorwa". Johnson yashize kuri Twitter ifoto yiwe ariko aramwenyura, yashize intoke z'ibikumu hejuru. Mu kiganiro yatanze, yavuze:"Turarangije amasezerano akomeye aciye imiriyaridi 668 y'amapawundi ku mwaka. "Amasezerano yumvikana ameze nk'aya Canada hagati y'Ubwongereza na EU. Amasezerano azokingira ubuzi muri iki  gihugu cose, azotuma ibidandazwa vyo mu Bwongereza bigurishwa ata makori, ata n'ibice bitanzwe kw'isoko rya Buraya. "Amasezerano azoha uburenganzira amakompanyi gukorana n'ibihugu vy'incuti vy'i Buraya."

headline: Burundi - Rwanda: CIRGL igiye gukora itohoza ryayo ku gitero c'i Mabayi
text: Inama mpuzamakungu ijejwe akarere k'ibiyaga binini (CIRGL/ICGLR) yashinze umurwi ugiye gukora amatohoza ku gitero giheruka ku kirindiro c'ingabo z'u Burundi muri komine Mabayi mu ntara ya Cibitoke. Umunyamabanga mukuru w'iyo nama, Zachary Muburi-Muita, yabwiye BBC ko uwo murwi washinzwe, ariko nta nsiguro yatanze kuri wo. Ikirindiro ca gisirikare c'i Marura caratewe n'umurwi witwaje ibirwanisho ku wa 17 z'ukwezi kwa 11 uyu mwaka wa 2019, leta y'u Burundi ikaba yavuze ko abagize ico gitero bavuye mu Rwanda bakongera bagasubirayo. Urwandiko rugena uyo murwi rwateweko igikumu na koloneli Léon Mahoungou arongoye umurwi uhuriyemwo bose ujejwe ubugenzuzi muri iyo nama (MCVE) ruvuga ko ico gikorwa categerezwa gutangura kuri uyu wa kabiri itariki 03/12/2019 kikarangira ku itariki 10/12/2019. Uyo murwi w'abantu 17 ugizwe n'abasirikare 13 n'abasivire 4, uzotegerezwa gushika ahabereye ico gitero ku ruhande rw'Uburundi, ushike no mu Rwanda. U Burundi bwaragabishije u Rwanda ko ''buzofata ingingo zikwiye kuko budashobora kwihanganira ibitero vyisubiriza n'agasomborotso'' buvuga ko bikorwa n'u Rwanda. Leta y'u Rwanda yoyo ivuga ko ibivugwa n'u Burundi bifise intumbero y'ugusamaza amakungu ku kibazo nyamukuru kiri mu karere, kandi ko atari ubwa mbere. Kuva mu mwaka wa 2015 aho hadukiye uruhagarara rwa politike mu Burundi, u Burundi n'u Rwanda vyakomeje kwagirizanya kimwe cose ku ruhande rwaco, ko mukeba afasha imirwi y'inyeshamba ishaka guhungabanya umutekano kubutaka bwaco.

headline: North Korea yagirizwa kwiba ubuhinga bwo gukora urucanco rwa Pfizer rwa Covid-19
text: Abajejwe igendereza muri Koreya y'Ubumanuko bavuga ko Korea y'Uburaruko yagerageje kwiba ubuhinga bwo gukora urucanco rwa Covid-19 rwakozwe n'ikompanyi ya Amerika ikora imiti Pfizer. Gusa gushika ubu ntibiratomoreka neza urugero yoba yari imaze gushikako mu kwiba ubwo buhinga. Ikinyamakuru Yonhap gitangaza ko igisata kijejwe igendereza ca  Koreya y'Ubumanuko cashikirije ico kibazo abashingamateka. BBC yashatse kumenya ico Pfizer ivuga kuri ubu busuma ariko ntirishura. Koreya y'Uburaruko ivuga ko ata munyagihugu n'umwe wayo arigera yandura coronavirus. Hagati aho, iki gihugu citeze kuronswa incanco zingana na miriyoni zibiri z'urucanco rwa AstraZeneca-Oxford mu ndwi ziri imbere. Kuva umugera wa coronavirus utanguye kwibonekeza mu kwa mbere kw'umwaka uheze mu Bushinwa, Koreya y'Uburaruko yaciye yugara imbibe zayo. Mu kwa cumi na rimwe, ikompanyi Microsoft ihingura inyabwonko yatangaje ko n'imiburiburi amakompanyi icenda ahingura imiti harimwo na Pfizer yinjiriwe n'amashirahamwe yegukira reta z'ibihugu vya Koreya y'Uburaruko n'Uburusiya. Microsoft yavuze ko hari amashirahamwe yo muri Koreya y'Uburaruko azwi nka Zinc na Cerium, hamwe n'irindi ryo mu Burusiya ryitwa Fancy Bear, abifisemwo uruhara. Uburusiya burahakana ko butinjirira ubushakashatsi bw'ibindi bihugu ku vyerekeye incanco. N'aho utwigoro twinshi two kugerageza kwiba ubu buhinga ataco twashitseko, Microsoft yagabishije ico gihe ko hari hamwe hamwe vyashobotse. Kuva iki kiza caduka hari ibihugu vyagumye birungika aba hackers babo mu rwego rwo guhangana na coronavirus. Kimwe muri ibi harimwo kwegeranya amakuru y'igendereza hakaba kandi no kwiba ubuhinga kugira babukorereko. Korea y'Uburaruko yamye iboneka ko ari kimwe mu bihugu bikomeye cane muri iki gisata. Ni igihugu ciyugaye ariko gifise abahinga bakomeye mu busuma bwo mu nyabwonko bamye barondera kwinjirira ibindi bihugu, atari ukwiba amabanga gusa, ariko kandi no kurondera amafaranga. Mu mwaka uheze mu Bwongereza, vyabaye ngombwa ko ikigo kijejwe umutekano w'inyabwonko ( National Cyber Security Centre) gishiraho uburyo bwo gukingira ubushakashatsi ku ncanco. Ntagushidikanya ko kubera ibikorwa bihari bikomeye, inzego zijejwe imiti n'amagara y'abantu zigiye kwitaho gusumba umutekano w'inyabwonko kugira zikingire kazoza.

headline: BAL2022: Umugwi New Star usaba urundi rukino inyuma yo kwirukanwa mw'ihiganwa
text: Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaboko Basketball mu Burundi FEBABU ryandikiye ishirahamwe ry'isi yose ry'urwo rukino FIBA risaba ko umugwi wa New Star urenganurwa ku ngingo wafatiwe zo kwirukanwa mw'ihiganwa kubera Covid. Umugwi wa New Star wahagaritswe mw'ihiganwa inyuma yo gusanga abakinyi bane b'uwo mugwi n'ababaherekeje babiri bafise umugera wa Covid-19. Mu rwandiko rwa FIBA ruvuga ko uwabanduje ari umukinyi yitwa Brian Kavakure. FIBA ikavuga ko, hishimikijwe amategeko y'iryo shirahamwe, abakinyi bose bategerezwa guca bashirwa mu kibanza ca bonyene. Banditse kandi ko "kubera abanduye bashobora kwanduza abandi ku kibuga, hafashwe ingingo ko umugwi wa New Star wirukanywe mw'ihiganwa." Urukino rwategerezwa guhuza New Star na Cape Town Tigers rwaciye rufutwa, New Star ica itsindwa impaga. Baba abarongozi b'umugwi wa New Star canke ba FEBABU ishavu riraniga, bavuga ko barenganijwe. Bagiriza umugwi wa Afrika y'Epfo, Cape Town Tigers, wari watsinzwe na New Star mu rukino rwa mbere ko ari wo woba uri inyuma y'uko kwirukanwa mw'ihiganwa. New Star ntihakana ko ari abakinyi bayo basanganywe Covid ariko bagatangazwa n'uko umugwi wa Cape Town Tigers na wo wasanganywe umukinyi afise uwo mugera ata ngingo n'imwe wafatiwe. Aho ni mu gihe ari wo bategerezwa gutana mu mitwe. FEBABU iranibaza iti: "Bigenda gute ngo FIBA ivuge ko umukinyi wacu Brian Kavakure ari we yanduje abandi ariko akaba ata Covid bamusanganye, mbere akanahabwa n'uburenganzira bwo gutahana n'abandi mu Burundi?" Ikindi ishirahamwe rya Basketball mu Burundi rivuga n'ingene umugwi bari baraye bakinye na New Star wa Cobra Sport bawuretse urabandanya ihiganwa. New Star kandi, n'aho yari ibuze abakinyi bakomakomeye, yaratonze ku kibuga kugira bakine na Cape Town Tigers, ariko abo na bo ntibitaba. Ivyo ngo bikagaragara ko ari ivyari vyateguwe ko babakubita impaga babagiriza ko bamwe muri bo batowe Covid. Kubera izo mvo zose, FEBABU isaba ko New star yobandanya ihiganwa hisunzwe amanota iyo migwi ibiri yari imaze kuronka, canke hatunganywe urundi rukino rwobahuriza ku kindi kibuga.

headline: Premier League: Ni nde azohagarika Liverpool?
text: Umurwi wa Liverpool waraye werekanye ko utarota urekura mu rugamba rw'uguharanira igikombe mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza, mu kwirahira Leicester ibitsindo bine vyose ku busa, mu gihe wari wayisanze ku kibuga cayo. Uyo murwi wa Jurgen Klopp watanguye urukino uri imbere amanota cumi yose usumvya Leicester iri mu kibanza ca kabiri, mu gihe mbere ugisigaranye urundi rukino. Liverpool yarerekanye urukino rukomeye cane ku buryo bigoye kwiyumvira ko itazoshobora gutahukana intsinzi y'iryo higanwa inyuma y'imyaka 30 yose ihaciye itazi ingene igikombe ca Premier League kimeze. Mu gice ca mbere si ukuvuga ko Liverpool yerekanye ibintu bikomeye cane rwose, n'aho cagiye kurangira ifise igitsindo kimwe cinjijwe na Roberto Firmino ku munota wa 31, ku mupira yari ahawe na Trent Alexander-Arnold. Ariko rero igice ca kabiri niho yagiye kwerekana ko yakenyeye zikaguma mu gutsinda ibitsindo bitatu vyose, urukino rurangira ari bine ku busa bwa Leicester. Urukino rurangiye, umumenyereza wayo Jurgen Klopp  yabwiye BBC ati: "Numva mfise umunezero udasanzwe, ndabona abahungu banje badafyinata. Twaronse imyanya yo kwinjiza kuva mu ntango y'urukino, ntitwashoboye kwinjiza ariko abakinyi baragumanye urukino mu maboko yabo". "Igice ca kabiri gitanguye vyagomvye kutugora gato, ariko twaciye dufata urukino mu minwe, twinjiza igitsindo ca kabiri, kuva ubwo abahungu bakoze ibintu biteye ubwoba. N'ukuri vyari biryoshe cane". Nayo ku ruhande rwa Leicester, umumenyereza wayo, Brendan Rodgers, aremeza ko vy'ukuri barushijwe. Ati: " Abakinyi baritanze uko bashoboye ariko vyaranse, twamaze igihe kirekire ducunga izamu ryacu. Liverpool yakinye neza cane n'ukuri, mbere ndayikeje". "Nta mupira twashobora kugumana umwanya muremure. Iyo rero udashoboye kuwugumana uriko ukina n'umurwi ukomeye - umurwi urimu mirwi  ikomeye kw'isi - n'ukuri birakugora". Gushika ubu, mu nkino 18 zose imaze gukina, Liverpool imaze gutakaza amanota abiri gusa mu rukino rwayihuje na Manchester United  ku wa 20 z'ukw'icumi, rwagiye kurangira imirwi yose inganaya igitsindo 1 kuri 1. Liverpool niwo murwi wonyene gushika ubu utarigera utsindwa na rimwe kuva rino higanwa ritanguye mu kwezi kw'umunani. Mw'ihiganwa ry'umwaka uheze, Liverpool yatakaje urukino rumwe rudende itsinzwe na Manchester City yatahukanye ikibanza ca mbere c'iryo higanwa ryagiye kurangira City irusha inota rimwe gusa Liverpool (98 kuri 97).

headline: Covid-19: Uganda yatumyeko incanco imiliyoni zibiri
text: Uganda yatumyeko incanco zirenga imiliyoni zibiri za covid mu gihe abandura iyo ngwara baguma bongerekana muri ico gihugu, ubu bakaba bashitse ku 25.000. Inkuru ziva ku rubuga rwigenga zisubiramwo uwurongoye ibikorwa vy'amagara y'abantu muri Uganda,Henry Mwebesa, avuga ati:" Ubushikiranganji bwasavye incanco za covid-19 za AstraZeneca buciye mw'ishirahamwe Global Vaccine Alliance (GAVI), ico gikorwa kikaba giteye ku ntambwe ya nyuma." Dr Mwebesa yongeyeko ati:"Uru n'urucanco  (AstraZeneca)  reta izi neza ko rwagenzuwe n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi WHO/OMS riranarwemeza… Birahambaye kumenya ko incanco zonyene zemejwe n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu hamwe na WHO ari zo zonyene zoshobora guhabwa abanyagihugu ba Uganda." Uganda yiteze kugabirwa incanco imiliyoni zibiri n'ishirahamwe GAVI mu ntango z'umwaka wa 2021 ariko "iriko iregeranya amahera yo kugura nyinshi z'abanyagihugu bose". Igitigiri c'abandura ku musi kiguma ciyongera, mu gihe ico gihugu kiriko kiritegurira amatora rusangi azoba itariki 14 z'ukwezi kwa mbere mu 2021. Bamwe mu banyepolitike baragirijwe ko banse gukurikiza amategeko yo kwikingira mu gihe c'imyiyamamazo.

headline: Covid-19: US yemeje Moderna nk’urucanco rugira kabiri
text: Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zemeje urucanco rugira kabiri rwa Covid-19, Moderna, ubu hakaba hagiye gusohoka amamiriyoni y'amadoze yarwo. Igisata kijejwe imfungurwa n'imiti muri Amerika (FDA) catanze uburenganzira bwo gukoresha uru rucanco rwakorewe muri ico gihugu inyuma y'indwi imwe gusa yemeje urwa Pfizer/BioNTech ruriko ruratangwa mu gihugu. Amerika yaciye yiyemeza kugura doze imiriyoni 200 za Moderna, muri zo imiriyoni zitandatu zishobora kuba ziri aho, zirindiriye gutangwa umwanya n'umwanya. Amerika nico gihugu ca mbere kw'isi gifise ibitigiri binini vy'abanduye n'abamaze guhitanwa na Covid-19. Ishure kaminuza Johns Hopkins risanzwe rikurikiranira hagufi ingene iki kiza karanda cifashe kw'isi rivuga ko muri Amerika abamaze kwandura Covid-19 ari imiriyoni 17.5, ikaba imaze guhitana abarenga 313.500. Umukuru w'ikigo FDA Stephen Hahn avuga ko iyemezwa ry'uru rundi rucanco nijoro ku wa gatanu ari intambwe ikomeye cane mu kurwanya iki kiza karanda gihanze isi. Umukuru w'ico gihugu aherutse gutorwa, Joe biden, yiteze gucandagwa ku wa mbere, avuga ko izi ncanco zibiri Pfizer na Moderna "zitanga umwizero  ko imbere ari heza", ariko akagabisha ko "intambara yo kurwanya Covid-19 itararangira". Mw'itangwa rya Moderna bisaba ko ishirwa mu vyuma bikanyisha gushika ku bushuhe bwa degré 20 musi y'ubusa (-20C) - vyumvikana ko ishobora kubikwa muri firigo isanzwe. Ariko Pfizer ni ngombwa ko ishirwa ku bushuhe bungana na degré 75 musi y'ubusa (-75C), ibi bigatuma bitoroha kuyishikana aho itegerezwa gushikanwa. Co kimwe na Pfizer, urucanco rwa Moderna na rwo nyene rukenera ko umuntu aterwa urundi rushinge rugira kabiri kugira rugire inguvu. Kuri Pfizer, umuntu atewe urwa mbere, bisaba imisi 21 kugira aterwe urwa kabiri, ariko kuri Moderna  uru rwa kabiri umuntu ategerezwa kurutera haciye imisi 28.

headline: Charles agiye kuba Umwami bwoko ki?
text: Charles, umuntu wa mbere amaze igihe kirekire ari samuragwa muri kahise k'Ubwongereza, ubu ni umwami. Imyaka 70 amaze yiga nka samuragwa, yamutumye aba umwami wa mbere yimitswe yiteguye kandi akaba ari we mwami wa mbere  yimitswe afise imyaka myinshi. Uyu mwami w'imyaka 73 yamanye na nyina wiwe mu kiringo cose yari amaze ari ku ngoma, abategetsi b'isi baza bakagenda, harimwo abashikiranganji ba mbere b'Ubwongereza 15 hamwe n'apaperezida 14 ba Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Inyuma y'ingoma y'akaroruhore, rurangiranwa, ya Elizabeth II, dushobora kuba twiteze umwami w'ubwoko ki? Ni gute kandi umuganwa azwi ko atarya umunwa ku bibazo bimubakiye azomenyera kuvuga ataho yegamiye nk'Umwami? Nk'umwami, Charles ntazoba agifise igitabo c'inzira canke uruhusha rwo kugendesha imodoka vyiwe bwite -  canke ngo ashikirize ku mugaragaro ivyiyumviro vyiwe bikomeye. Kuba umwami birasumba umuntu ku giti ciwe. Ni amabanga atandukanye, intwaro zitandukanye, nk'uko umuhinga mu bijanye n'amategeko ajanye n'ibwirizwashingiro akaba umwigisha wa kaminuza Vernon Bogdanor abisigura. Prof Bogdanor ati: "Azwi kuva kera cane ko ingendo yiwe itegerezwa guhinduka. Abanyagihugu ntibakeneye umwami aza kwiyamamaza". Umwami Charles arazi neza ko ari ngombwa kwinengesera. Mu kiganiro na BBC mu 2018, yavuze ati: "Si ndi ikijuju. Ndazi ko kuba umwami ari igikorwa gitandukanye. Kwibaza ko nzokora nk'uko nkora ni uguhuba cane". Igihugu Umwami Charles  agiye kurongora kiratandukanye cane n'ico nyina wiwe yarazwe, mbere Prof  Bogdanor abona ko umwami mushasha azoyobora Ubwongereza burangwamwo imico n'imigenzo bitandukanye, abanyagihugu bari mu madini atandukanye. Amubonamwo nk'umuntu azogerageza kuba umuhuza, azokora uko ashoboye kwose kugira ngo yiyegereze inkehwa hamwe na ba ntahonikora. Prof Bogdanor amubonamwo kandi nk'uwuzoshigikira abanyamyuga, umuziki n'imicokama - abe cane nka Shakespeare ha kwishinga gusiganwa ku mafarasi. Ariko Sir Lloyd Dorfman yakoranye n'umwami Charles mu kiringo c'imyaka itari mike mw'ishirahamwe ryiwe Prince's Trust, ntabona ko azohava yirengangiza ibibazo nkoramutima nk'ivyerekeye ihindagurika ry'ikirere n'uburimyi bukingira isi (Agriculture biologique/Organic farming). Sir Lloyd ati: "Abifisemwo ubumenyi bwinshi, kandi abikora neza cane. Biragoye kwiyumvira ko yoca abiheba ubwo nyene ku musi azoba abaye Umwami". Havugwa vyinshi ku bijanye n'uko Umwami yoba yipfuza ingoma ya cami "iciriritse". Ibi bisa n'uko yokwitaho kugira ab'ingoma y'ibwami bake bazezwa amabanga, aho Charles na Camilla, umuganwa William na Catherine ari bo boba inkingi. Umusiguzi ku vyerekeye amakuru y'i bwami,  Victoria Murphy, avuga ko n'aho bimeze uko, ubutumwa nyamukuru buzoba gukomeza amahoro n'ituze. Ati: "Ntimwitege ubudasa bunini kandi buteye ubwoba. Azokwinengesera cane". Umwanditsi Robert Hardman na we ati: "Twamye twiyumvira ko Umwamikazi ari umuntu azokwama ari mu bintu biraba ubuzima bw'igihugu vyose, ariko uretse we, uyu mwami yamye aseruka gusumba umuntu uwo ari we wese mu buzima bw'igihugu, gusumba umunyaporitike uwo ari we wese". Umwanditsi akaba n'umuhinga mu vya kahise, Sir Anthony Seldon abona ko Umwami Charles aterwa intege n'uko yabonetse ko afise ukuri ku bibazo nyamukuru, nk'igihe agabisha ku bijanye n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere. Nk'akarorero, mw'ikoraniro ry'i Glasgow ryari ryarekeye ibidukikije mu 2021, Charles yarashimagijwe cane n'abategetsi bakomeye nka Perezida  Joe Biden wa Amerika aho,  nk'uko bivugwa na  Hardman, yavuze ko igihagararo afise kw'isi kizomufasha cane nk'Umwami. Ati: "Ntivyari inkuru gusa. Aba bategetsi babiri baricaranye ahantu, hanyuma biden avuga ati: 'Watumye ibi vyose biba',". Ariko ni igiki witeze kubona muri uno mwami mushasha ? Abamuzi bavuga ko muri we afise agasoni, kandi avuga make. "Umutima wumva" ni kimwe c'ukungene bamudondora. Hariho ikimenyetso nk'umuhungu yahoze yidoga ko bamutyekeza kandi bamukumira kw'ishure. Igihe kimwe yanditse ikete rija muhira ari kw'ishure avuga ingene atuntuzwa mu buraro bw'ishire, avuga ati: "Bama bantera ikandambiri ijoro ryose canke bakankubita n'imisego canke bakanterera hanze, bakankubita cane uko bashoboye kwose". Umugore wiwe Camilla, amuvuga nk'umuntu "atihangana. Ashaka ko ibintu vyose birara bikozwe. Uko niko akora ibintu". Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'imboneshakure kw'isabukuru igira 70 ya Charles, yavuze ko hejuru y'ubwitonzi abantu bamubonamwo, arimwo akantu ko gukina. Camilla ati: "Bamubona nk'umuntu atafyinata, kandi nivyo. Ariko nagomba kwereka abantu ikintu c'ukwiyorosha kiri muri we. Arashira amavi hasi agakina n'abana, akabasomera udukuru wa Harry Potter mbere akaganira nabo". Charles arisanzura kandi akiyorosha iyo ari mu bantu, akiyegereza abantu mu kubatera udukuru dutwenza. Kumbure ibi bizohinduka nk'umwami, ariko igihe yri umuganwa wa Wales, yaritwaye nk'umugenzi wa bose, nka sekuru, kandi ataco yisigarije. Nk'umugabo ari mu myaka ya 70, nta kintu na kimwe cerekana ko Umwami azohava ahinduka. Chris Pope yakoranye na  Charles ku kigo Prince's Teaching Institute, asigura uyu mwami mushasha nk'umuntu yama afise akazi kenshi, afise umwete kandi akora cane. Pope ati: "Ni umuntu yitaho cane kazoza keza k'abari imbere. Ibi uzobibonera mu bikorwa vyinshi akora". Mu bikorwa vy'ubugiraneza nk'umuganwa harimwo gukingira iragi no kubungabunga ubuhinga kama - ariko kandi agahimiriza impinduka n'iterambere". Pope ati: "Yama afise umwitwarariko ko akaranga katotakara, ariko ibi ntibisigura ko avuga ko dukwiye gusubira ku vya kera". Inyifato y'uyu Mwami mushasha  isa n'iyishaka gufatira ibi vyose hamwe , ikintu gishobora kuboneka nko kutagira aho ahagaze, gushaka ihinduka mu gihe ashaka kubungabunga akaranga. Rimwe na rimwe, asa n'umuntu yahoze ari umurimyi wo mu kinjana ca 18. Ikindi gihe, akumvikana nk'umuntu ashavuriye ihinduka, ababajwe n'ukungene abantu bamwe bamwe batitaweho kandi bibagiwe. Hari vyinshi azokora yarazwe na nyina wiwe mu gukunda ibikorwa, ariko kandi Umwami Charles  yaratoranye ukwemera n'uburwaneza vya nyina wiwe. Hitan Mehta yarakoranye nawe kuva igihe amufasha gushinga ishirahamwe British Asian Trust  mu 2007. Mehta avuga ati: "Umutima wiwe wuzuye ubugiraneza. Nibaza ko abantu batazi urugero rw'ukungene yitaho abantu. Igihe cose yama ariko aravuga ku vyerekeye isi ashaka gusigira abuzukuru  biwe. Ni ikibazo kimuhagaritse umutima". Ibi bishobora kubonekera ku kungene ahamagarira abantu kugira ico bakoze. Mehta ati:  "Hategerezwa kuba hari nk'isaha zitatu umusi umwe, hari ku wa gatanu mw'ijoro, aho naza numva terefone yiwe akambwira ati: 'Mpejeje kwumva imyuzurira yateye muri Pakistan. None turiko dukora iki'?  Ibi ntibisigura ko ata kintu yari afise akora. Ariko yumvise ikibazo kandi ariko aragikorerako. Ni ukuri ni umuntu yitaho abandi". Avuga kuri se wiwe, umuganwa Harry avuga ati: "Uyu ni umugabo ashobora gufungura ijoro ryitereye, yaheza agaca asubira ku meza kwandika, akavamwo asinzirira kw'ikaye". Charles Philip Arthur George yavukiye ku kirimba ca  Buckingham ku wa 14 z'ukwa 11 mu 1948. Igihe BBC imenyesha ivuka ryiwe, inkuru ntiyari iy'uko Umwamikazi yavyaye umwana w'umuhungu, ahubwo yari iy'uko nyina wiwe "yibarutse umuganwa". Haciye imyaka ine, yaciye aba samuragwa. Mu kiganiro co mu 2005, Charles yavuze ati: "Nisanze navutse mfise iki kibanza. Rero ni ngombwa ko ndagikamisha. Kandi ngakora ico nshoboye cose kugira mfashe". Arongoye amashirahamwe arenga 400, hanyuma mu 1976 yatanguje ishirahamwe ryiwe bwite, Prince's Trust, akoresheje amafaranga yatekerewe avuye mu gisirikare kirwanira mu mazi (Royal Navy). Rimaze gufasha ba ntahonikora bakiri bato bababa 900.000 bava mu bice bimwe bimwe bikenye cane mu gihugu, rikaba kandi ryamutumye ashobora kubona ingorane zitari nke zijanye n'imibereho y'abantu. Imigambi yari afitiye ishirahamwe Prince's Trust kugira rishobore gushikira ico yise "abagoye gushikirwa" ntiyaguye neza abategetsi. Mu 2018, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati ntibwabona ko ari iciyumviro ciza. Vyaragoranye gutangura". Igikorwa ciwe catumye yagirizwa gutoba no kwivanga muri poritike, ibi birego bikaba vyari bishingiye cane cane  ku ciswe "black spider memos" (twogereranya mu kirundi nka Inzandiko zirabura z'igitangurirwa ). Iri zina barifatiye ku nyadiko ya Charles y'igitangurigwa, aya akaba yari amakete Charles yandikira abashikiranganji bari muri reta kuva mu 2004 no kubandanya. Aya makete yinuba inzira reta yakoresha mu guhangana n'ibibazo nk'uburimi, gutunganya ibisagara, inyubako,  indero n'ibindi. Uwahoze ari umushikiranganji yarungikiwe aya makete ya Charles avuga ko atumva ko atewe igitsure cinshi, ariko abona ko umwami mushasha ari umuntu afise ivyiyumviro ntabanduka. Abona ko aje afise ivyiyumviro vyiwe ashaka kubandanya, aho kwemera kwakira ivyiyumviro bidasa n'ivyiwe. Ati: "Si numva ko mbangamiwe. Yarashikiriza ivyiyumviro vyiwe hanyuma ukaronka amakete. Si wa muntu yategeka canke yakara, ni umuntu yubaha". Ku vyo yagirizwa ko yariko aratoba, mu kiganiro yatanze mu 2006,  Charles yavuze ati: "Nimba uko ari ko kwivanga mu bintu, aho rero ndavyishimiye". Ariko aremeza ko yari mu bintu atabona "amaherezo yavyo". Ati: "Iyo ata kintu na kimwe ukoze, ata kintu na kimwe, bazokwidogera. Uhagurutse ukagerageza kugira ico ukoze kugira ngo ufashe, naho nyene barakwidogera". Mu kiganiro cakurikiye, yavuze ko yagerageje kwirinda imigambwe, ariko ko hageze aho bimubera ngombwa ko aterera ijwi hejuru ku vyerekeye "ingene abantu bari babayeho". None abanyagihugu bazoshigikira umwami Charles ku rugero rungana gute? Charles  avuga ati: "Ikintu nk'ingoma ya cami ntigishobora kumara kabiri mu gihe utokwishimikiza ivyiyumviro vy'abanyagihugu. Erega abanyagihugu batagishatse, ntaco bazobona". Nk'uko ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n'ikigo YouGov muri Kigarama (12) 2021 kivyerekana, abantu baramukunze cane, aho hafi bibiri vya bitagu vy'abanyagihugu bamubonamwo umuco mwiza. Ariko amatora ngereranyo abandanya amwerekana ko adakunzwe nk'uko nyina wiwe, Umwamikazi Elizabeth II, canke umuhungu wiwe umuganwa William, bakunzwe, rero haracari benshi ategerezwa kwiyegereza. Cane cane, abakiri bato ntibamwiyumvamwo cane. Victoria Murphy avuga ko ibi bishobora kuba vyerekana ingaruka y'amashusho mabi ya Charles mu mareresi no mu biganiro vy'imboneshakure ku vyerekeye umubano wiwe n'umugore wiwe wa mbere , Diana, Umuganwakazi wa Wales, yapfiriye mw'isanganya ry'imodoka mu kwa munani 1997. Aya mashusho afise kuba ari uruvangatirane rw'ay'ukuri hamwe n'amakorano, ariko afise ingaruka zikomeye. Umupfasoni Murphy ati: "Ikintu gitangaje kuva mu myaka mike iheze ni ukungene Diana abandanya agaruka mu biyago vyerekeye umuryango w'i bwami". Mu gihe Charles yariko atera yegereza ingoma, habaye ukugerageza guhindura ivyiyumviro biri mu mitwe y'abantu, nk'uko umwigisha wa kaminuza, Pauline Maclaran, abivuga. Kuva batanguye kumucisha mu dukino dutandukanye nk'akitwa Spitting Image, bukebuke yagiye yerekanwa nk'umunyacubahiro, "umushingantahe" afise ibintu ngirakamaro avuga ku vyerekeye ibidukikije, nk'uko Prof Maclaran abivuga. Kumbure ivyo abanyagihugu bipfuza na vyo nyene si ukuvuga ko vyera. Hanyuma we nk'umukuru w'umuryango w'i bwami, azotegerezwa guhangana n'ikibazo giteye inambu isi ku bivugwa ku Muganwa Harry, na Meghan, umgore wiwe, hamwe n'iimgenderanire yabo n'umuryango w'i bwami. Umwami Charles azohangana n'ibindi bibazo vyo mu muryango, nk'ivyerekeye ikibazo c'uko Umuganwa Andrew ashobora guhabwa amabanga canke ntayahabwe, ni inyuma y'umwumvikano wabaye inyuma y'ibirego vyo gufata ku nguvu vyatanzwe na Virginia Giuffre. Hanze y'Ubwongereza, ikibazo nyamukuru kizoba ugutunganya gushasha imigenderanire igezweho n'ishirahamwe Commonwealth. Nk'umukuru mushasha waryo,  ni gute mu ngendo ziwe mu bihugu vya Commonwealth azoshobora guhangana n'ibibazo vy'umurage ugoye w'ubukoloni canke ibibazo nk'ubucakara? Umwami Charles abaye umukuru w'ibihugu 14 hamwe kandi n'Ubwongereza. Bimwe muri ibi bifise kurondera ubwigenge ariko biri muri Commonwealth, mbere umwami Charles aramaze gusigura neza ko yiteguriye ibiganiro nk'abantu bakuze ku bijanye n'ivyohinduka. Hari ingingo zimaze gufatwa zoroheje inzira y'ingoma yiwe nshasha. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, yaranezerewe cane igihe nyina wiwe yafata ijambo akavuga ko Camilla akwiye kwitwa Umutambukanyi w'umwami, hakwitwa umuganwakazi. Camilla azoba kirumara cane mu gihe Charles atanguye amwe mu mabanga akomeye cane kw'isi, ku myaka y'aho hafi abantu bose baba bakukurutse. Iki ni igihe camye kimurindiriye ubuzima bwiwe bwose. Ku Mwami Charles, ik ini igihe ciwe.

headline: Saudi Arabia: Mustafa al-Darwish yanyonzwe ku vyaha yakoze akiri umwana
text: Umugabo wo muri Arabia Saoudite yanyonzwe ku vyaha abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu bavuga ko yakoze agifise imyaka 17, n'aho iki gihugu cari camenyesheje ko cahagaritse igihano co gupfa ku bana. Mustafa Hashem al-Darwish yahagaritswe mu 2015 yagirijwe ivyaha bijanye n'imyiyerekano. Abategetsi ba Arabia Saoudite bavuga ko yagiriwe n'icaha co gushinga umurwi w'iterabwoba no kugerageza guteza imigumuko akoresheje ibirwanisho. Ariko abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu bari basavye ko inyongwa ryiwe rihagarikwa, bakavuga ko yarenganijwe. Ishirahamwe Amnesty International hamwe na Reprieve, ishirahamwe rirwanya igihano co gupfa, avuga ko Darwish w'imyaka 26 yari yahakanye ivyo yemeye, bikavugwa ko yari yavyemeye abanje kuborezwa igufa. Abategetsi ba Arabia Saoudite ntaco barashikiriza ku mugaragaro ku vyerekeye ibi birego. Nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters, mu vyaha Darwish yagirijwe harimwo "gushaka guhungabanya umutekano" no "guteza  indyane". Mu vyemezo ku vyo yagirizwa harimwo isanamu "ityoza abajejwe umutekano" hamwe n'uruhara yagize mu "migumuko" irenga 10 mu 2011 na 2012. Umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati wa Arabia Saoudite avuga ko al-Darwish yagerageje no kugandagura abajejwe umutekano, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru cegukira reta. Hagati aho, inzandiko za sentare ntizerekana neza itariki n'imwe yoba yarakoreyeko ivyo vyaha, nk'uko Reuters ibivuga. Ishirahamwe Reprieve rivuga ko umuryango wa al-Darwish utigeze umenyeshwa ivy'iri nyongwa, ko wabimenyeye ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi. Itangazo ry'umuryango wiwe ryasohowe na Reprieve rivuga riti: "Ni gute wonyonga umwana kubera isanamu iri muri terefone yiwe? Kuva ahagaritswe, ntitwigeze tumenya na kimwe uretse umubabaro. Ni umubabaro udashobora guhera mu muryango wose". Asubirwamwo n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru SPA, umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati wa Arabia Saoudite avuga ko al-Darwish yanyongewe i Dammam, igisagara gitunze ibitoro kiri mu ntara yo mu buseruko. Mu mwaka uheze, abategetsi ba Arabia Saoudite batangaje ko bahagaritse inyongwa ry'abantu bakoze ivyaha bakiri bato, ko ahubwo bazohanishwa umunyororo w'imyaka itarenga cumi. Itegeko bwirizwa ry'umwami rivuga ko iri tegeko rishasha ryaraba kandi n'abari bakoze ivyaha imbere y'aho barindiriye kunyongwa. Amnesty na Reprieve avuga ko urubanza rwa al-Darwish rwategerezwa kuba rwarasubiwemwo hisunzwe iri tegeko rishasha. Aya mashirahamwe, co kimwe n'ayandi aharanira gataeka ka muntu avuga ko afise impungenge ku bijanye n'ikurikizwa ry'izi mpinduka. Umunyamabanga w'Ubwongereza ajejwe imigenderanire, Dominic Raab, na we nyene yaragarutse ku kibazo kijanye n'izi mpinduka mu rwego rw'ubutungane igihe yari mu rugendo i Riyadh mu kwezi guheze, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibiro vy'ubunyamabanga bw'imigenderanire y'Ubwongereza. Mu ntango z'uwu mwaka, umurwi ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu wa Arabia Saoudite wavuze ko iki gihugu kigendera ku ntwaro ya cami cagabanije "bimwe biboneka" igitigiri c'abantu baciriwe urwo gupfa mu 2020. Hagati aho, Reprieve ivuga ko Arabia Saoudite mu mezi atandatu ya mbere y'uwu mwaka wa 2021 imaze kunyonga abantu bangana n'abanyonzwe mu mwaka wose wa 2020.

headline: Tanzania: Perezida Samia Suluhu Hassan ariyama abamunegura ku madeni yo hanze
text: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Tanzania Samia Suluhu Hassan ariyamiriza akarwi k'abategetsi bo hejuru b'ico gihugu banegura reta yiwe ku madeni yasavye mu mashirahamwe yo hanze mu ntumbero yo kurangura imigambi y'iterambere. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ari mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu rigacishwa ku mboneshakure, Perezida Samia Hassan arasigura akamaro k'amadeni mu kurangura imigambi y'iterambere ya reta. Yariko arakira icegeranyo kivuye mu bushikiranganji butandukanye c'ukungene amafaranga agenewe kurwanya ikiza ca Covid-19 igihugu cahawe n'abatanga imfashanyo y'iterambere ariko arakoreshwa. Perezida Samia avuga ko mu gihe ibindi bihugu bikoresha ayo mafaranga mu kugura ibikoresho vyo kwikingira nk'udupfukantoke n'udupfukamunwa, Tanzania yoyo yakoresheje mu bwitonzi ayo mafaranga mu gukomeza igisata c'amagara y'abantu no mu kwubaka amavuriro mashasha. Aya mafaranga yafashije kandi kwubaka amasomero mashasha y'amashure n'ibigo vy'ukwigiramwo mu turere dutandukanye tw'igihugu. Avuga ko yumva ko yahemukiwe n'abanegura reta yiwe kubona yakiriye aya madeni mvamahanga. Ati: "Birababaje kubona umuntu wari wizigiye afise amabanga nk'ayo akomeye muri reta agukorera ivyo". Ashikirije aya majambo inyuma y'umusi umwe umukuru w'inama nshingamateka, Job Ndugai, asavye imbabazi ku mugaragaro ku majambo yari aherutse gushikiriza, yafashwe ko yayabwiye reta ya Samia Hassan ku bijanye n'amadeni yo hanze. Mu gihe yariko ashikiriza iri jambo, Perezida Samia Hassan yavuze ko amwe mu majambo yo kumunegura afitaniye isano n'amatora yo mu 2025, abatari bake bakaba babona ko azorondera kwitoreza ikindi kiringo. Samia Hassan yashitse ku butegetsi mu ntango z'umwaka uheze inyuma y'urupfu rwa Perezida John Pombe Magufuli yari atanguye ikiringo ciwe kigira kabiri kikaba n'ica nyuma gitegekanywa n'ibwirizwashingiro.

headline: South Africa yemeje ikoreshwa ry'umuringa ukingira abagore umugera wa SIDA
text: Afrika y'Epfo yemeje uburyo bushasha bwo kwirinda umugera wa SIDA mu ntumbero yo gukingira abagore kugira ntibandure. Ni umuringa ukozwe muri silicone winjizwa mu gitsina c'umugore maze ukarekura umuti witwa dapivirine urwanya umugera. Iyi ni intambwe ikomeye muri ico gihugu aho bibiri vya bitatu vy'abandura ari abagore. Uwu muringa - wemejwe mu mwaka uheze muri Zimbabwe ukaba ukigeragezwa mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika - werekana ko ufise ubushobozi bwo gukingira ku rugero rwa 50%. Ni bwo buryo bwa mbere bukoreshwa igihe kirekire mu gukinga umugera wa SIDA cane cane bugenewe abagore. Uwu muringa ni ubundi buryo buje busubirira ibinini vya PrEP bifatwa buri musi ugategerezwa gusubirizwa buri kwezi. Igisata ca Afrika y'Epfo kijejwe amagara y'abantu cemeje uwu muringa ku bagore bafise imyaka kuva kuri 18 kuduga. Uwu muringa wahinguwe n'ikigo International Partnership for Microbicides (IPM). Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO rirashigikiye iyi ngingo. Hagati aho, ibikorwa vyo gutanguza ubu buryo bizotegerezwa kubangira kubera iki gisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu kiciga urugero rwo gukora neza rw'uwu muringa n'igiciro cawo. ONU ivuga ko Afrika y'Epfo ari yo ifise ibitigiri binini vy'abagendana umugera wa SIDA  kw'isi yose.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Kane, Rodriguez, Traore, Romero, Zouma, Lookman
text: Manchester City ishobora guhagarika urugamba rwo kurondera wa musatirizi wa Tottenham Harry Kane w'imyaka 27, mu gihe yoramuka ironse umwongereza mugenziwe Jack Grealish w'imyaka 25 asanzwe akina muri Aston Villa. (Manchester Evening News) Umukinyi wo hagati, umunya Colombia James Rodriguez w'imyaka 30 yabwiwe ko atari mu nteguro ya Rafael Benitez, umumenyereza wa Everton akaba afise uburenganzira bwo kwigira mu gihe hoboneka umurwi umwipfuza ukemera gutanga igiciro gisabwa kuri we. (Liverpool Echo) Atletico Madrid iri imbere ya Arsenal mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Inter Milan umunya Argentina Lautaro Martinez w'imyaka 23, igiciro ciwe kikaba kingana n'imiriyoni 90 z'ama Euros. (Tuttosport - in Italian) Inter Milan yanse icipfuzo ca Arsenal c'uko, hampande y'amafaranga ishaka gutanga, yoshirako umukinyi w'inyuma wa Espagne Hector Bellerin w'imyaka 26, canke umusatirizi w'umufaransa Alexandre Lacazette w'imyaka 30 kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka Martinez. (Gazzetta dello Sport, via Metro) Atalanta yemeye kwakira imiriyoni hafi 60 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika zitangwa na Tottenham ku mukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Argentina Cristian Romero w'imyaka 23.  (Talksport) Leeds United iripfuza umukinyi wa Wolves wo ku ruhande, umunya Espagne Adama Troare w'imyaka 25, ari ku giciro c'imiriyoni hafi 42 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Goal) Tottenham, ubu umenyerezwa n'uwahoze amenyereza Wolves Nuno Espirito Santo, nayo nyene iriko iraraba ko yogura Traore. (Mail) Umumenyereza wa Bayern Munich Julian Nagelsmann avuga ko yizeye y'uko umuminyi wayo wo hagati umudagi Leon Goretzka w'imyaka 26 amaze igihe avugwa ko aronderwa na Manchester United, azoshobora gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha yomutuma abandanya akinira uwu murwi wabaye uwa mbere mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubudagi Bundesliga. (Metro) Umusatirizi w'umufaransa Karim Benzema w'imyaka 33 yiteze gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha yo kwongerezako umwaka umwe ku yo afinatiye n'umurwi wiwe Real Madrid, ibizomutuma abandanya akinira uwu murwi gushika mu 2023. (ABC - in Spanish) West Ham iracabandanya ibiganiro na Chelsea ku mukinyi w'inyuma w'umufaransa Kurt Zouma w'imyaka 26, ariko biracagoranye ko bashika ku masezerano, ikabona ko vyanse ishobora guca ihindukirira umunya Serbia akina muri Fiorentina, Nikola Milenkovic.  (Sky Sports) Umumenyereza wa Chelsea Thomas Tuchel avuga ko kazoza k'umwongereza akina hagati Ruben Loftus-Cheek w'imyaka 25 muri uwo murwi kari mu minwe y'uyu mukinyi we nyene. (Eurosport) Crystal Palace iriko irarondera ko RB Leipzig yoyitizaumusatirizi w' umwongereza Ademola Lookman w'imyaka 23, ariko rero ishobora kumurwanira na  Burnley hamwe na Watford. (Sun) Umuserukizi w'umukinyi w'inyuma Davinson Sanchez wa Tottenham yagiranye ibiganiro na Sevilla, uyu munya Colombia w'imyaka 25 akaboneka ko ashobora gusubirira umufaransa Jules Kounde w'imyaka 22 ariko araronderwa na Chelsea. (Caracol Radio via Mail) Wolves ivuga ko yipfuza kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Juventus unumya Pays de Galles/Wales Aaron Ramsey w'imyaka 30 n'aho yumva umengo ntashaka kwimukira muri uwo murwi wo mu Bwongereza.  (Calciomercato - Italian) Sheffield United irashaka ko Manchester United iyitiza umwongereza akina hagati James Garner w'imyaka 20. (Sun) Burnley na Watford irahanganye bikomeye mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'ububamfu wumurwi wo muri  Ecosse/Scotland, Hibernian, umunya Ecposse Josh Doig w'imyaka 19 ari ku giciro c'imiriyoni 5.5 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Mail) Southampton iriko iragurisha umusatirizi wa Ireland Michael Obafemi w'imyaka 21, ku giciro c'imiriyoni zababa umunani, Blackburn ikaba imwipfuza. (Sun)

headline: Manchester United: Cristiano Ronaldo avuga ko yasubiye mu ruhongore, akabikesha Sir Alex Ferguson
text: Cristiano Ronaldo yasubiye muri Manchester United inyuma y'imyaka irenga icumi ayivuyemwo, akaba aje ava muri Juventus yo mu Butaliyano yahora akinira. United yatanze imiriyoni 15 z'ama euros - hamwe n'inyongera ishobora kuba igera ku miriyoni umunani - kuri uno mukinyi w'imyaka 36. Ronaldo yateye igikumu ku masezerano y'imyaka ibiri yo gukina muri uno murwi wa Old Trafford, akaba mbere ahabwa n'akaryo ko gushobora kwongererezwa uwundi mwaka umwe. Igihe yakinira ubwa mbere uyu murwi, Ronaldo, umukinyi yatahukanye agashmwe ka Ballon d'Or (umupira w'inzahabu) incuro zitanu, yinjije ibitsindo 118 mu nkino 292, imbere y'uko yimukira muri Real Madrid mu 2009, mu mwaka uheze naho akaba ari mukinyi yinjije ibitsindo vyinshi muri Serie A, aho yijiirije Juventus ibitsindo 29. Ronaldo ati: "Manchester United ni umurwi wamye ufise ikibanza kidasanzwe mu mutima wanje, kandi nararengewe n'ubutumwa bwinshi cane naronse kuva batangaje ko ngiye kugaruka". "Ndindiranye igishika cinshi co gukira i Old Trafford, ngasubira kubona abafana buzuye ikibuga. "Ndizeye gutangurana n'uyu murwi inyuma y'inkino mpuzamakungu, kandi ndizeye ko ibintu bizogenda neza muri uno mwaka dutanguye". Ole Gunnar Solskjaer ati: "Biragoye kuronka amajambo wokoresha mu gusigura Cristiano. Uretse ko ari umukinyi w'igihangange, ni umuntu akomeye cane". "Kugira ngo ushobore gukira ku rwego rwo hejuru mu gihe kirekire nk'iki cose bisaba ko uba uri umuntu adasanzwe". "Nta nkeka mfise ko azobandanya kuvyifatamwo neza kandi ubuhinga bwiwe ni ngirakamaro ku bakinyi bakiri bato mu murwi". Ronaldo yaravuzwe cane ko yari kwimukira muri Manchester City ariko yahisemwo gusubira muri United, aho yamaze imyaka itandatu yose agatsindira ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza (Premier League) incuro zitatu, ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya (UEFA Champions League), ibikombe bibiri vya League Cup/Coupe de la ligue, hamwe na kimwe ca FA - ndetse n'igikombe ca Coupe du monde des clubs de la FIFA/ FIFA Club World Cup hamwe na Community Shield - ico gihe umurwi ukaba wamenyerezwa na Sir Alex Ferguson. Bivugwa ko yavuganye na Ferguson imbere y'uko asubira muri United. Ronaldo ashobora kuba mu murwi uzokwakira Newcastle United  ku wa 11 z'ukw'icenda. Ronaldo yambara inomero indwi igihe yakina ubwa mbere muri United, ariko ubu iyo ifiswe na Edinson Cavani, kandi n'aho uyu musatirizi wa Uruguay yoshaka kuyimuha, amategeko ya Premier League ntiyemera kuguranya inomero mu gihe ihiganwa ryamaze gutangura kiretse ari igihe ata kundi vyogenda.

headline: Interbank Burundi yagirizwa kurekura amahera $1.500.000 yo gufasha imirwi y'abarwanyi
text: Ubushikirizamanza bw'Uburundi buragiriza ibanki Interbank Burundi ko yoba ifasha mu buryo bw'amafaranga imirwi ihungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Ni inyuma y'aho abakozi b'ishami ry'ibanki Trust Merchant Bank riri Uvira muri Kongo bafatanywe amahera angana na 1.500.000 y'amadolari kw'ibarabara Bujumbura-Katumba mu ndwi iheze. Interbank Burundi yamirira kure ivyo yagirizwa. Mu rubanza rw''ikibiriraho rwabaye ejo ku munsi wa gatatu muri sentare y'iyungururizo ya Mukaza i Bujumbura, umushingwamanza yaragirije Interbank ko iriko ihungabanya ubutunzi bw'igihugu mu bikorwa vy'uguhanahana amafaranga y'agaciro na Trust Merchant Bank. Interbank Burundi yagirizwa ko ihonyanga amategeko yashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu ku biraba ikoreshwa ry'amafaranga y'agaciro mu gihugu. Ubushikirizamanza buvuga ko amakuru bufise yerekana ko amahera yafatiwe mu Gatumba yoba yari agiye gufasha imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho iri mu gihugu ca Kongo, ariko ko ari amakuru bagitohoza. Busaba ko iyo banki yotangishwa ihadabu y'imiliyaridi 44, ikongera igatanga n'indishi y'akababaro ingana n'imiliyaridi 50 z'amafaranga y'amarundi yohabwa leta y'Uburundi. Interbank Burundi irahakana ivyo birego, ikavuga ko igikorwa cayo ari kuba umuhuza hagati y'ibanki Trust Merchant Bank isanzwe iri i Kinshasa n'ishami ryayo riri Uvira. Ivuga ko ari igikorwa yari isanzwe ikora kuva mu mwaka wa 2014. Nayo kuvyo yagirizwa ko ihungabanya ubutunzi bw'igihugu, abunganirizi ba Interbank Burundi muvyo amategeko barabihakana, bakavuga ahubwo ko ivyo bituma igihugu kironka amafaranga y'agaciro. Vyitezwe ko urubanza ruzosomwa mu kiringo kitarenze iminsi cumi.

headline: CAN 1996: Intsinzi ya South Afrika n'uruhara yagize mu mpinduka z'inyuma ya apartheid
text: Ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika ryo mu 1996 ntiryari ryitezwe kubera muri Afrika y'Epfo. Kenya nico gihugu cari catowe ko cari kuritegura, ariko hasigaye amezi 14 yarakuyemwo akarenge, ivuga ko vyari kuyisaba uburyo busumba incuro zitandatu ubwari bwitezwe. Niho mu kwa cumi na rimwe 1994, ishirahamwe rya Afrika rijejwe umupira w'amaguru (CAF) ryaca rirondera ahandi iri higanwa ryari kubera. Mu ntango z'uwo mwaka, mu kwa kane, Nelson Mandela yari yatowe nk'umukuru w'igihugu mu matora ya mbere ya demokarasi muri kahise ka Afrika y'Epfo. Niho umurwi nserukiragihugu wari ucemererwa kwinjira mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu, usubijwe mu rwego mpuzamashirahamwe y'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi, FIFA, inyuma y'aho hashingiwe ishirahamwe rishasha ry'umupira w'amaguru (FA) ry'ico gihugu rihurikiyemwo amoko atandukanye mu 1991, igihe bwa butegetsi mvanguramoko bwa apartheid bwari butanguye gusenyuka. Afrika y'Epfo niyo yatowe ngo itunganye iri higanwa. Ariko nta muntu yari yiteze ko bari kubishobora. Mu vy'ukuri, ibintu ntivyagenze neza mu ntango inyuma y'aho basubirijwe mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu mu 1991 gushika n'aho umunyamabanga mukuru wa FA Solomon Morewa yihaye iryosozi. Iri higanwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika (CAN/AFCON) ryagiye kuba ikindi kintu. Ivyabaye mu myaka ya 1990 bigahindura ibintu, maze bigasambura ubutegetsi bw'abazungu muri Afrika y'Epfo bwari bumaze ibinjana birenga bitatu, navyo vyarahinduye urwego rw'umupira w'amaguru wariko urakomera mu buryo budasubira inyuma. Hari ikintu kidasanzwe cari giherutse kuba muri ico gihugu, iki naco ni ugutsindira igikombe c'isi yose mu rukino rwa Rugby (Rugby World Cup) mu buryo butangaje mu 1995. Ariko, nk'uko bivugwa n'abaserukiye iki gihugu cari kivutse bushasha mu kwinjira mu ntwaro rusangi mu nkino za CAN 1996 catsindiye, iyi ntsinzi yagize ingaruka zikomeye gusumba. Cameroun niyo yahuye ubwa mbere na Afrika y'Epfo. Ku wa 13 Nzero/Mutarama, imirwi nserukirabihugu yavyo yaratanye mu mitwe ku kibuga Soccer City, hanze gato y'igisagara ca Soweto, hamwe habera ya myiyerekano y'ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abanyeshure biyamiriza intwaro y'inkehwa z'abazungu, aho abaharurwa mu majana bagandaguwe n'igipolisi cariko kirwanya iyi myiyerekano, imyaka 20 yari iheze. Neil Tovey yari afise imyaka 33.  Uyu mukinyi w'inyuma yakinira umurwi wo muri ico gihugu Kaizer Chiefs, yatanguye gukina ku rwego mpuzamakungu mu kw'indwi 1992, inyuma y'isabukuru yiwe y'imyaka 30 y'amavuka. Uru ni rwo rwabaye urukino rwiwe rwa mbere mu murwi nserukiragihugu uhuriyemwo koko amoko menshi - rwawuhuje kandi na Cameroun ruza kurangira bayitsinze 1-0. Tovey yabwiye BBC ati: "Imbere y'iri higanwa, iyo ubaza abagize umurwi mbere na jewe nimba twari gushobora kuritsindira, sinzi nimba twari kwishura ko twari kubishobora". "Baba abafana, baba twebwe abakinyi, nta na bamwe bari bamenyereye amahiganwa mpuzamakungu y'umupira w'amaguru. Ariko uko ihiganwa ryagiye ritera imbere, niko igihugu cagiye gikomera". Umusi umwe imbere y'uko urukino rwa mbere rutangura, Perezida Mandela, kw'izina kama ryiwe nka Madiba, yaragendeye ubwa mbere uyu murwi mu ngendo zitari nke yagize muri uyu murwi. Lucas Radebe, ico gihe yakinira Leeds United, ni uwundi mukinyi yari mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Afrika y'Epfo. Ku bwiwe, kubonana na Mandela casa n'uko coba ari igikorwa c'Imana. Ati: "Igihe twari tugikura, ntitwigeze tumenya ngo yasa gute". "Twari dufise isanamu yiwe ya kera yamwerekana akiri muto, ariko igihe aza kuturaba aho twari turi mw'ikambi, aha niho twabonye  "Madiba Magic". Yari afise igihagararo kidasanzwe. Twarabuze ico tuvuga". "Uwo musi, n'iyo tugahura na Brésil twari kuyikubita. Uko rero niko twatewe intege. Umuzo wiwe wadushikanye ku rugero rwo hejuru cane, aho urukino rwose twakina, twabona ko turiko dukinira Madiba na Afrika y'Epfo". 'Madiba Magic' cari iciyumviro cari mu mitwe y'abantu ko Mandela yatera imigisha ku mirwi y'umupira w'amaguru. Ni iciyumviro cavutse ku wa 10 Rusama/Gicurasi 1994 - umusi Mandela yimikwa - ico gihe Afrika y'Epfo ikaba yatsinze Zambia ku ncuro ya mbere, umukuru w'igihugu mushasha ari ho ari. Vyasa n'uko iki ciyumviro cariko kirakora kandi. Cameroun yatsinzwe 3-0, iki kikaba cabaye ikimenyetso c'ivyari bigiye gukurikira. Umukinyi Phil Masinga wa Leeds niwe yateye ica mbere amaze amasaha 24 gusa avuye mu Bwongereza. Nk'uko bivugwa na Shaun Bartlett yahoze ari umusatirizi wa Charlton, igihe Afrika y'Epfo ifata ikibanza ca mbere mu murwi yarimwo maze ikinjira mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, umurwi waciye umenyekana kw'izina rya Madiba's Boys (Abahungu ba Madiba). Ati: "Gushika n'ubu, kuvuga gusa izina ry'igihangange Mandela nca numva merereje. Igihe cose twabonanye na we, agukoze mu miwe gusa, wamengo hari ikintu aguhaye. "Ikintu kibi conyene gusa ni uko wategerezwa kuvyuka isaha cumi n'igice mu gatondo, kubera ni vyo bihe yari akirimwo vyo kuva igihe yinjira ibohero. Yavyuka mu gaturuturu agatembera. Rero twategerezwa kuvyuka kugira tubonane na we isaha cumi n'imwe z'agatondo". Ariko Afrika ntiyatsindiye iri higanwa rya Afrika ku kigumbagumba gusa, canke kumbure kubera yari ifise izindi nguvu ikuye ku yindi si. Umupira bari bawuzi, kandi bari bafise umumenyereza mwiza Clive Barker. Tovey, umukinyi yinjirije igihugu ciwe ibitsindo vyinshi gusumba abandi mu nkino 29, avuga ati: "Yarabonye ubuhinga muri buri mukinyi wese aca arabukorerako mu kubagira abakinyi bakomeye abagira ico babaye". Imbere y'uko baja mw'ihiganwa, bari bamaze gukina inkino 13 badatsindwa, muri zo harimwo zibiri banganije n'Ubudagi hamwe na Argentina. Iciyongereye kuri izi nguvu, ni ubuhinga bw'abakinyi Radebe na Phil Masinga bakuye i Bulaya mu murwi wa Leeds, co kimwe n'umusatirizi wa Wolves, Mark Williams. Hariho kandi n'umukinyi w'inyuma Mark Fish yariko arakurikiranirwa hagufi na Manchester United, akaba muri uwo mwaka nyene yategerezwa kuja gukinira Lazio, imbere y'uko yijira muri Bolton mu 1997. Inyuma y'intsinzi idasanzwe y'umurwi wa rugby mu mwaka w'imbere y'aho, itsinzi y'umurwi wari ugizwe ahanini n'abazungu yashize hamwe igihugu, bari baronse ikindi bagenderako. Tovey ati: "Iyi yari imwe mu ntego twavuga". "Twari tuzi ko dufise kandi uruhara mu gusubiza hamwe igihugu, kandi Madiba yari azi ko mu gihe twari kuvyifatamwo neza vyari gutuma ubumwe butsimbatara mu gihugu. "Umunezero waranze intsinzi y'umurwi wa rugby wari 10% gusa w'uwari kubaho mu gihe twari kuramuka natwe dutahukanye intsinzi". Itsinzi itangaje yagize kuri Algeria mu kuyitsinda 2-1 mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, ivuye ku gitsindo ca John 'Shoes' Moshoeu ku munota wa 86, yatumye yinjira mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma aho yahura na Ghana. Iki gihugu nico cahabwa amahirwe, nk'umurwi wa mbere wa Afrika, umurwi umwe rudende utigeze utsindwa na rimwe muri iryo higanwa. Umurwi wa Ghana wari ukomeye cane kuko wari wishimiye umukinyi w'inyuma wa Bayern Munich Samuel Kuffour, umukinyi wo hagati wa Torino Abedi Pele - se wa Andre na Jordan Ayew - hamwe n'uwundi musatirizi wa Leeds yariko araduga cane Tony Yeboah. Ariko aba banya Ghana batashe zirayoye muri uru rukino bakubiswe 3-0. Tovey ati: "Urukino rwa Ghana ni rumwe mu nkino zacu zari zikomeye gushika ubwo". "Harabaye uguhangana bikomeye hagati ya Lucas na Yeboah. Hose mu kibuga, umupira wari rwacu". Amakuru y'intsinzi muri uru rukino yaravuzwe cane mu binymakauru bukeye. Ikinyamakuru Business Day canditse kiti: "Igihe Afrika y'Epfo ikubitiye Ghana, uturere twari twiganjemwo abazungu twaritabiriye umupira w'amaguru ku rugero rutari bwigere rubaho mu myaka 20 yose mu gihe c'amahiganwa yaba ay'igihugu canke aya Afrika". Buca haba urukino rwa nyuma, umutwe w'inkuru nyamukuru y'ikinyamakuru gikuru Beeld casohoka buri musi mu rurimi rw'iki afrikaans yari yanditswe mu kizulu ngo: 'Yebo Bafana Bafana!' (Yeah, The Boys! twogereranya mu kirundi tuti "Komera mwa bahungu mwe!") Bategerezwa guhura na Tunisia. Isinzi ry'abantu bangana na 80.000, harimwo Perezida Mandela, umwami w'abaZulu Goodwill Zwelithini hamwe n'uwahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Brésil Pele, bari bakubise harazima mu kibuga ca Soccer City, amasaha atatu imbere y'uko urukino rutangura. Mandela yari yambaye agapira kanditseko inomero 9 yambarwa na Neil Tovey, mu gihe abafana benshi bari biyanditse ku bikiriza vyabo mu marangi atandukanye ubutumwa bwavuga ngo 'Make Madiba Magic'. Mu gice ca mbere c'urukino, uretse umupira watewe mw'igori na Bartlett ariko umunyegori wa Tunisia akawukurayo, umupira ntiwigeze urenga hagati mu kibuga. Ariko, mu vyaboneka ko bananiranywe, hagati mu gice ca kabiri, Williams yari yasubiriye Masinga yerekanye ubudasa. Uyu musatirizi yinjie ibitsindo bibiri mu minota ibiri nyene - ica mbere cari ic'umutwe, ica kabiri kiva mu mupira ukomeye yateresheje ibamfu - maze aha Afrika y'Epfo intsinzi idasanzwe. Ivyakurikiye wabaye umunezero utagira urugero. Radebe ati: "Ndacavyibuka neza nk'uko umengo ni ivyabaye nijoro. Mu gihugu cose nta muntu yakoza ukuguru hasi. "Ico wumva yari Soweto. Nta bantu wumva biruka, kiretse abafana hanze y'ikibuga barira, baboroga. "Igihe twariko tuva mu kibuga, twabona abantu bikubita hasi. Bamwe bari bafise ikirato, abandi nabo bafise ifi ikanura (mu kwigina 'Shoes' Moshoeu na Mark Fish). "Vyari ibintu koko bigoye kwumva. Nibaza ko ryabaye iteka ku gihugu cose". Mw'ijambo yavuze imbere y'uko apfa mu 2015 ku myaka 49 ihitanywe na kanseri yo mu mushishito, Moshoeu yibutse ingene yaturitse akarira igihe umufana w'umuzungu amusavye ko yomuterera igikumu (autograph). Afrika y'Epfo yari ikiri mu bibazo bikomeye cane, inkino zonyene ntizishobora gutorera umuti ibibazo vyose. Ariko Mandela yarizeye ubushobozi bwazo. Ati: "Inkino zirafise ubushobozi bwo guhindura isi. Zifise inguvu zo kwigisha. Zifise ubushobozi bwo gushira hamwe abantu gusumba uko ibindi vyose vyobikora. "Inkino zirafise ubushobozi bwo kuzana icizere ahahoze harangwa umwiheburo. Zisumvya inguvu reta mu gusambura imitego ishingiye ku moko". Radebe yabonye impinduka mu kanya isase. Ati: "Kwumva abazungu bavuga ngo 'uri incungu yanje, ni wewe gusa nibonamwo' vyantumye nkorora amosozi kuko nibuka ivyo twari duhitiyemwo muri iyo myaka yose. Iyi yari yo Afrika y'Epfo nshasha". "Ubwenge bwacu bwarugurutse. Amaso yacu yariko abona ibintu birengeye ivyo twari tumaze imyaka n'imyaka tubona. Vyari koko ibintu biteye igomwe. Kubera gusa umupira w'amaguru". Tovey avuga ko uwu munezero wabandanije gushika ku rugero rurengeye iyi misi yakurikiye yo kwigina intsinzi. "Kuva ubwo abazungu benshi baciye batangura kuja barinjira mu bibuga kurorera inkino z'imirwi ikomakomeye na mpuzamakungu. Abantu b'ingeri zose babandanije badufata mu mugongo uko bukeye uko bwije. "Ivyo twakoreye igihugu vyabaye ibintu bidasanzwe. Abanyagihugu 10% canke 12% bakunda rugby, ariko umupira w'amaguru wakundwa ku rugero rwa 95%. Eka n'abazungu kuva ico gihe baciye bamenya Bafana Bafana. "Ariko uku si ugukengera ivyo abakinyi ba rugby bakoreye igihugu. Ni bo babaye aba mbere kubikora mu 1995, kandi bakoze ibikorwa vyinsha cane bidasanzwe". Iragi umupira w'amaguru wasize ni ingene Afrika y'Epfo yashoboye kuronka itike yo kuja mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'umupira w'amaguru c'isi incuro zibiri yikurikiranya. Mu mahiganwa abiri yakurikiye y'igikombe ca Afrika, Afrika y'Epfo yatahukanye ikibanza ca kabiri n'ica gatatu. Mu bajejwe gufata ingingo, uwari arongoye FIFA ico gihe Joao Havelange yari yemereye Afrika ko ari yo yari gutegura ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi mu 2006. Impera n'imperuka vyahavuye biba mu 2010 muri Afrika y'Epfo. Nayo ku vyerekeye Tovey, Radebe na Bartlett - bazokwama baboneka  nk'intwari ku banyagihugu b'igihugu cabo. Tovey yarahawe agashimwe na Mandela. Avuga ati: "Nk'umukinyi, ukora ivyo utegerezwa gukora. Ariko inyuma y'imyaka 26 ngeze kuri iyi ntambwe, uwu mwanya namaranye nawe wari udasanzwe, udasanzwe na gato". "Amasanamu yiwe mu kabare kanje. Ni ikintu kidashobora kwibagirwa muri kahise k'igihugu. "Ntitwari gupfa dushitse aho twashitse iyo atava mw'ibohero ngo adusubize ku rubuga mpuzamakungu rw'umupira". Kubwa Radebe, iragi riza mu mutwe ningoga ni ihadabu yatangishijwe na muri Leeds.
