Ati:  "Inyuma ya finale, umumenyereza wa Leeds Howard (Wilkinson) yarampamagaye ambwira ati 'nkeneye kukubona muri irya ndege'. Nshitse i Yorkshire, mu mbeho izura inzara yo mu gihe kibi c'ubukonje. Oh, Mana yanje". "Twategerezwa kuva twashitse bukeye. Naciwe ihadabu y'umushahara w'indwi yose kubera nashitse harenzeko umusi umwe. Maze gushika muri Leeds nkabona ku mboneshakure imodoka itugaye iriko irazunguruka n'igikombe, mvugishije ukuri narababaye cane". "Abakinyi bagiye ku kibuga ca Sun City bari kumwe n'abagore babo hamwe n'abakunzi babo, nanje ndiko ndakina muri Leeds mu mbeho y'ubugesera yo mu kwa kabiri izura inzara, ntivyanyoroheye. "Nari ndindiriye ko ici rishika kugira ngo ihiganwa riheze nanje nshobore kuja muhira nkigina intsinzi". Hagati aho, intsinzi yaronse mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika si yo yabaye iya nyuma yamushize hamwe na Mandela. 'Madiba' yari mu batumire ku bugeni bwiwe. Ati: "Nta muntu n'umwe twigeze tubwira ko yari kuza. Jewe gusa n'umugore wanje ni twe twari tubizi. Nibaza ko nari mfise umunezero gusumba uwo nagize igihe mbwira umugore wanje ko twokwubaka". "Umugore yashitse isaha icenda, ariko Mandela we yari yashitse isaha umunani n'iminota 45 kuko atashaka ko abashitsi bitaho we aho kwitaho umugore wanje. Uyo ni we mugabo, umugabo yama akora ibintu vyose mu bushingatahe, ibi ni vyo bintu bikeya nshobora kugumana mu buzima bwanje. "Aha nta nkeka ko ndamufise mu mafoto. Ntushobora kubwira abantu ngo yaraje ku bugeni bwawe hanyuma ngo ubure ivyemezo".

headline: Covid: Ico kiza cagabanije umunezero w'umwaka mushasha hirya no hino kw'isi
text: Amategeko yo kwikingira mu misi mikuru y'umwaka mushasha ariko arashirwaho hirya no hino kw'isi mu gihe ibihugu vyinshi bihanganye n'iyongerekana ry'abagwayi ba coronavirus. Ukurasa ibintu biturika kandi vyakaka mu kirere hamwe n'ayandi makoraniro ntibirekuwe kuva i Sydney gushika i New York. Ibirori ntibizoba na cane cane i Buraya, mu gihe hari ubwoba ko hari ubundi bwoko bwa coronavirus bwadutse. Ubufaransa bwategekanije abapolisi 1000.000 bo kugenzura imisi mikuru y'umwaka mushasha no kwubahiriza amasaha y'umukwabu. Abantu barenga umuliyoni 1.8 baramaze gupfa bahitanywe na coronavirus hirya no hino kw'isi kuva ico kiza giteye haraciye umwaka. Abantu barenga imiliyoni 81 baramaze gufatwa n'iyo ngwara. Ingene ibihugu vya Aziya na Pacifique vyabangamiwe? Kimwe mu bihugu vya mbere vyashikiriye umwaka mushasha ni Australia. Ibintu biturika kandi vyakaka birabandanya kuraswa mu kirere, ariko nta bantu baza kwemererwa gukoranira ku kivuko co muri ico gisagara mu kuwigina. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa New South Wales, Gladys Berejiklian avuga ati:"Ntidushaka gutuma haba imisi mikuru ikwiragira hose ku mugoroba w'umwaka mushasha." Benshi mubaba i Sydney baza kuguma imbere y'imboneshakure, aho abantu bazoba barekuriwe kuja hamwe batarenga batanu, nk'uko umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC ari muri ico gisagara, Phil Mercer abivuga. Mu Bushinwa, ibirori vy'umuco w'amatara vy'umwaka mushasha mu gisagara ca Pekin vyahagaritswe. Imisi mikuru yagabanuwe cane mu bisagara vyo muri ico gihugu. Ubuyapani bwahagaritse umusi mukuru usanzwe uhimbazwa buri mwaka mushasha aho igikomangoma Naruhito n'abandi bo mu muryango wiwe baramutsa isinzi ry'abantu. Mu Buhinde, i Delhi no mu bindi bisagara vyinshi hashizweho umukwabu hamwe n'izindi ngingo zibuza amakoraniro y'abantu benshi ku mwaka mushasha. I Buraya ho gute? Mu Bufaransa, reta yategetse ko haba abajejwe umutekano bagaragara mu bisagara hose kuva isaha zibiri z'ijoro ku musi wa kane, isaha umukwabu utangurirako. I Paris, igice c'itereni zica mu kuzimu kizoba cugaye ku mugoroba. Ubufaransa bumaze kwiyugarana incuro zibiri, ububare, inzu z'uburiro hamwe n'ibibanza vy'akahise bizoguma vyugawe ku musi mukuru w'umwaka mushasha. Mu Bwongereza - aho coronavirus nshasha iriko irakwiragira vyihuta kandi abantu imiliyoni 20 bamerewe nabi cane  mu turere dusinzikaye cane,  bategetswe kuguma mu mihana yabo - Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson yahamagariye abantu gukurikiza amategeko yo kwikingira Covid. Ku musi wa gatatu yavuze ati:"Ibi ntibisigura ko mubonana n'imiryango hamwe n'incuti mu mazu yanyu, kiretse igihe musanzwe mubana, kandi mukwiye kwirinda amakoraniro y'abantu benshi ayo ari yo yose." Igipolisi co mu bisagara cateye akamo abakunda kugira imisi mikuru i Londres "ko bohimbariza umwaka mushasha mu mazu yabo." Irlande irongereza ingingo zo kwikingira kuri uyu wa kane, ibuze imigenderanire hagati y'amazu, yugare ubuguriro budakenewe cane ihagarike no kuja ku birometero bigera kuri bitanu mu kiringo c'amezi atatu. Ubudagi buri mu mategeko yo kugaranwa gushika itariki 10. Reta yahagaritse ibintu biturika birwaswa mu kirere, ishiraho n'ingingo zindi zikomeye ku gitigiri c'abantu bashobora guhurira hamwe. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu Jens Spahn yavuze ko igihugu gishobora "kugira umusi mukuru w'umwaka mushasha w'agacerere" utazopfa wibagiwe. Holande na yo nyene iri mu ngingo zo kutava ku muhana, zitegekanijwe kurangira itariki 19 z'ukwezi kwa mbere. Uguharura umwanya usigaye ngo umwaka mushasha ushike, kuza kubera ku kibuga ca Amsterdam, ata mu ntu n'umwe ahari. Turkia kiratangura imisi ine yo kwiyugarana kuva ku mugoroba w'umwaka mushasha. Muri Amerika, abategetsi bashizeho ingingo zo guhagarika imisi mikuru mu ntara no mu bisagara vyinshi. I new York, umupira wakaka uri mu kibanza ca Times Squares uraza kururutswa mu mihango y'umugenzo wo guharura umwanya usigaye ngo isaha zitandatu z'ijoro zishike, ariko nta bantu bazoba barekuriwe kuza muri ico kibanza. Ibintu biturika kandi bica ibibatsi biraswa mu kirere vyahagaritswe mu bisagara harimwo San Francisco na Las Vegas.

headline: Amatora mu Burundi 2020: Menya abakandida bitoza hamwe n'ivyo bashira imbere
text: Ku tariki 20/05/2020 abarundi babifitiye uburenganzira bazokwihitiramwo umukuru w'igihugu azobarongora mu myaka indwi iri imbere. Uru ni urutonde rw'abakandida indwi bazokwitoza muri ayo matora y'umukuru w'igihugu, hamwe n'imigabo n'imigambi yabo. Ingene bakurikirana muri ino nkuru bijanye na nimero baronse mw'itombola yakozwe n'umugwi w'igihugu wigenga ujejwe amatora, CENI. Evariste Ndayishimiye ni umunyamabanga mukuru w'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi CNDD-FDD kuva mu kwezi kw'umunani 2016, aho uwo mugambwe usubiriyemwo itunganywa ryawo, asubirira Pascal Nyabenda yari umukuru wawo. Yavukiye muri komine Giheta y'intara ya Gitega mu mwaka wa 1968. Azwi nk'umwe mu bari intwazangabo zikomeye muri uwo mugambwe ucitwa umuhari, mu ntambara yadutse mu Burundi inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye yari amaze amezi atatu ku butegetsi. Ndayishimiye ari mu bacitse kw'icumu mu bwicanyi bwakorewe abanyeshure b'Abahutu kuri kaminuza y'u Burundi mu kwa gatandatu 1995, bituma ahamvya abandi barwanyi b'umuhari, ico gihe wari ucitwa CNDD ishami ryawo rya gisirikare rikitwa FDD, urongowe na Leonard Nyangoma yawutanguje mu 1994. Uyo muhari, mu nyuma wagiye kwitwa CNDD-FDD, umaze kwinjira mu masezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha yo mu 2000 ugashira ibirwanisho hasi mu 2003, Jenerali Ndayishimiye yarakoze mu biro bikuru vya gisirikare, mu nyuma aragenwa nk'umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu 2006-2007, imbere y'uko agenwa kuba umuhanuzi wa gisirikare mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu. Imigambi yiwe nyamukuru ishimikiye ku gukomeza inzego z'umutekano no kwivuna abansi,  gukomeza igisata c'ubutungane,  intwaro ibereye, imibereho y'abanyagihugu, ibijanye n'amagara y'abantu, gutegekaniriza kazoza abenegihugu, indero, kurwanya ubushomeri, uburaro bwiza, ibidukikije, imico kama n'inkino. Imigambi y'ubutunzi ishingiye ku burimyi n'ubworozi, ubutare n'agataka, ubudandaji, ingenzi n'amahinguriro, hamwe no kwunguruza abantu n'ibintu. Evariste Ndayishimiye ategura kandi gukomeza  imigenderanire no gufashanya n'amakungu, aho avuga ko  ishingiye ku kwuzuzanya n'ugutsimbataza umwumvikano hagati y'u Burundi n'amakungu be n'amashirahamwe atandukanye. Gaston Sindimwo ni icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'igihugu kuva agenywe, hari ku wa 20 z'ukwa munani 2015 ku butegetsi bwa Petero Nkurunziza, inyuma y'amatora yateye amahane mu Burundi. Yavukiye muri karitiye Bwiza mu gisagara ca Bujumbura mu mwaka w'1965, akaba kandi ari umunyamabanga mukuru w'umugambwe w'abadasigana UPRONA, imbere y'aho akaba yari umunyamabanga w'icegera c'uwo mugambwe. Mu vya politike, yemerera abarundi guteza imbere intwaro rusangi, kurwanya ibiturire, ashigikire ubwigenge bw'urwego rw'ubucamanza, yongere anagure ubucuti bw'u Burundi n'ayandi makungu. Yemerera Abarundi kandi gukomeza inzego z'umutekano. Mu vy'ubutunzi, imigambi yiwe ihagaze ku gusubiramwo intererano ihabwa amakomine, ku gutunganya gushasha ivy'amabanki cane cane ku bijanye n'ingurane, ashigikire uburimyi n'ubworozi, yubake amabarabara, gushigikira amahinguriro, kunagura igisata c'ingenzi, umuyagankuba, ubutare n'indero. Nayo ku bijanye n'imibano, akaranga n'imico, imigambi yiwe ihagaze ku kworohereza abarundi mu vyo ubuvuzi be no mu gushigikira imico n'akaranga k'u Burundi harimwo gusubiza iteka Ikirundi. Léonce Ngendakumana ni umunyapolitike wo mu mugambwe Sahwanya-Frodebu, umugambwe wa Perezida Melchior Ndadaye yagandaguwe mu 1993 haciye amezi atatu gusa ashikirijwe intwaro inyuma yo gutsinda amatora yo ku wa 01 z'ukwa gatandatu 1993. Léonce Ngendakumana  yavukiye mu ntara ya Bujumbura mu mwaka wa 1954. Yatanguye ibikorwa vya politike akiri muto, akaba yabitanguriye mu muhari witwa BAMPERE washinzwe na Ndadaye mu Rwanda mu mwaka wa 1976. Mu nyuma yahavuye yinjira mu muhari w'abakozi witwa UBU washinzwe mu 1979. Bwana Ngendakumana ari mu batanguje umugambwe Sahwanya Frodebu mu 1986 mu mpisho. Mu matora yo mu kwa gatandatu 1993, yaratowe ngo abe mu bashingamateka ba Frodebu baserukira intara ya Bujumbura. Mu 1995, yabaye umukuru w'Inama Nshingamateka, mu bihe bitari vyoroshe na gato, gushika mu 2002. Mu matora yo mu 2005, Bwana Ngendakumana yarongeye aratorwa nk'umushingamateka w'umugambwe Frodebu n'aho watsinzwe n'umugambwe CNDD-FDD. Mu mwaka wa 2014, igihe yari arongoye urunani rw'imigambwe itavuga rumwe na leta rwari rwiswe ADC-Ikibiri yaraciriwe igihano co gupfungwa umwaka,  yagirijwe gutyoza no gukwiza urwanko rufatiye ku moko inyuma y'ikete yandikiye mu kwezi kwa kabiri uwari umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU ico gihe, Ban Ki Moon. Iryo kete yanditse kw'izina rya ADC-Ikibiri, Leonce Ngendakumana yagabisha ONU ko mu Burundi hashobora kuba ihonyabwoko kubera urwaruka rw'umugambwe CNDD-FDD yavuga ko rwariko ruhabwa ibigwanisho nayo iradiyo television yegereye uwo mugambwe Rema FM akayagiriza kwitwara nka RTLM yo mu Rwanda imbere y'uko ibara rigwa mu 1994. Léonce Ngendakumana, avuga ko ashaka kugarukira demokarasi, intwaro ibereye n'agateka ka zina muntu, gukingira Abarundi bose,Uburundi n'ababubamwo, aho avuga ko azogarukira igisata c'umutekano yisunze intumbero ya Melchior Ndadaye. Avuga kandi ko azogarukira imigenderanire myiza hagati y'u Burundi  n'amakungu mu gukuraho icuka kibi kihari, ko azorwanya ubushomeri n'ubukene. Avuga ko azokomeza igisata c'amagara y'abantu, indero y'abana n'abanyeshure hamwe n'agateka k'abarezi. Léonce Ngendakumana avuga kandi ko afise umugambi wo kugarukana abarundi bose bavyipfuza bahunze igihugu cabo, be no kugarukira agateka n'iterambere ry'abakenyezi. Agira ati: "Utora nabi ugatwarwa nabi, upfa uko utoye ugapfa uko utwawe, hanyuma watora neza ugatwarwa neza". Nahimana Dieudonné yavukiye muri komine Gasorwe mu ntara ya Muyinga mu mwaka w'1974, akaba agiye guhiganirwa ikibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu ku giti ciwe. Mu vyo yaranguye, haciye imyaka 25 atanguje umuhari w'urwaruka rw'imboneza mw'ikanguro ryo mu mitima mu mico no mu mibereho, witwa NEW GENERATION. Yari awurongoye gushika mu mwaka w'2019. Ari mu batanguje kandi yahora arongoye Ihuriro ry'amashirahamwe y'urwaruka ruri mu bikorwa: Réseau des organisations des Jeunes en Action - REJA mu majambo ahinahinye. Yatanguje igikorwa cigisha ivy'uburongozi kigashigikira imigambi ifise intumbero yo kwigisha uburongozi nkorerabandi citwa Dieudonne Nahimana Foundation - DNF. Nahimana Dieudonné Yaronse ubushimwe butari buke, harimwo: Bimwe mu vyamutumye ashaka kwitoza nk'uwigenga, avuga ko ababazwa n'amacabubiri, ka mwana wa mama, igiturire no kwikunda avuga ko vyagiye vyibonekeza ku barongozi, bikaba vyarazingamitse igihugu. Avuga ko ashaka guha ikibanza ca mbere urwaruka. Ibindi ashira imbere ni: Francis rohero yavutse ku wa 16 z'ukwa mbere mu mwaka wa 1972, avukira muri Zone Rohero, karitiye Rohero iri mu gisagaraca Bujumbura, abavyeyi biwe bose bakaba bamuka muri komine Bugendana y'intaraya Gitega. Francis Rohero yavutse ari umwe mu muryango. Abavyeyi biwe Rohero Majoric, hamwe na  Rohero Hélène Ntawuyankira, bubakanye ku wa 19 z'ukwa 11 mu 1970, maze bibaruka umwana wa mbere, Francis, kuwa 16/01/1972. Haciye amezi ane gusa, se wiwe, ico gihe yari icegera c'umukuru w'igisata c'ingenzi, yaragandaguwe muri bwa bwicanyi bwo mu 1972, gutyo arerwa na nyina wiwe ari we mwana w'ikinege. Francis Rohero yagiye guhereza amashure yisumbuye kw'iseminari y'i Buta i Bururi, mu nyuma yinjira iseminari nkuru ya Burasira hanyuma iya Bujumbura, imbere y'uko yinjira kuri kaminuza y'u Burundi, nayo nyene yahavuye ahunga atarangije mu 1997 kubera indwano. Yahungiye muri Kameruni, akaba  ariho yagiye kurangiriza ivyigwa vya kaminuza. Avuga yuko nyina wiwe yamureze amwigisha kwirinda igikenye, inyigisho yamye agendera no kuva kw'ishure i Buta, mu gihe igihugu cose carangwamwo amacakubiri hagati y'Abahutu n'Abatutsi. Avuga ko yigiye cane ku bantu karuhariwe  muri kahise mu bijanye no kwirinda igikenye, nka Gandhi, Martin Luther King n'abandi, cane cane Yezu Kristu. Amaze guhunguka, Francis Rohero arazwi cane mu biganiro yakunda gushikiriza ku maradiyo yerekana ingene ibintu bikwiye kugenda ku neza y'u Burundi n'Abarundi, rimwe na rimwe ntibamutahure, ari naco catumye aruhira gutanga imihoho akava muri CNDD-FDD mu 2006 Inyuma y'aho niho yatanguje ico yise "Mouvement Orange" nk'inzira yoza aracishamwo ivyiyumviro vyiwe. Ivyiyumviro vyiwe vyatumye mu kwa cumi na rimwe 2018 apfungwa, aho yamaze indwi yose mu gasho, ariko agahava apfungurwa igipolisi kimaze kubona ko ata kabi kiwe. Mu kwezi kw'icumi 2019, niho yamenyesha ko ashaka kwitoza kuba umukuru w'igihugu, imigambi yiwe nyamukuru ikaba ihagaze ku gukomeza intwaro ibereye abicishije mu gutunganya gushasha ubutegetsi, gukomeza inzego z'umutekano no kuzironsa ivyo zikeneye, gutunganya igisata c'ubutungane, kworohereza ibinyamakuru kugira ngo bakore mu mwidegemvyo, aho avuga ko azokuraho amategeko yose abuza abamenyeshamakuru gukora bisanzuye. Avuga kandi ko ashaka gukomeza imigenderanire myiza y'u Burundi n'amakungu, gutunganya gushasha amategeko, aho avuga ko azonahindura ibwirizwashingiro kugira ngo hajeho iryubahiriza bose. Afise kandi  n'imigambi ijanye no kurwiza umwimbu no gukomeza ubutunzi bw'igihugu (ikigega, uburimyi n'ubworozi, ubudandaji n'ibindi), gukomeza imico kama, indero, amagara y'abantu… hamwe kandi n'ibijanye no gutumatumanako n'ukwiyunguruza, n'ibindi. Agathon Rwasa arongoye umugambwe Congrès National de Liberté, CNL, inyuma y'igihe kitari gito yatswe uburongozi bw'umugambwe FNL. Yavukiye muri komine Kiremba y'intara ya Ngozi mu mwaka wa1964. Mu 1988 biturutse ku bwicanyi bwa Ntega na Marangara, yararokotse ahungira mw'ikambi ya Kirwa iri mu ntara ya Tabora muri Tanzania, ari naho yinjiriye mu muhari PALIPEHUTU wari washinzwe na Rémy Gahutu mu 1980, uja guhinduka PALIPEHUTU-FNL  mu mahinduka yabaye muri uwo muhari mu 2001, amahinduka yatumye awurongora asubiriye uwari umukuru wawo, Cossan Kabura. Agathon Rwasa mu nyuma yinjiye mw'ishami rya gisirikare rya FNL ryegukira PALIPEHUTU, ari naho yahavuye aja ku rugamba rwashirwa imbere na PALIPEHUTU. Inyuma y'aho atahiye mu gihugu mu 2008 inyuma y'ibiganiro na PALIPEHUTU-FNL, Agathon Rwasa yarongoye umugambwe FNL kuva mu 2009 gushika mu 2010 inyuma y'aho umuhari PALIPEHUTU-FNL uhinduriye izina kugira ngo wisunge amategeko y'u Burundi abuza imigambwe ishingiye kw'ivangura. Muri ico gihe yahawe kurongora ishirahamwe INSS ryo kuziganiriza kazoza abakozi. Inyuma y'amatora yabaye mu 2010 Agathon Rwasa yarahunze yagiriza leta ko yashaka kumugandagura kubera yiyamirije ivyari bihejeje kuva muri ayo matora, ariko yakwa uburongozi bw'uwo mugambwe mu buryo burimwo igipfungu, uhabwa Jacques Bigirimana, uwo mugambwe muri kino gihe ukaba ari pfa mpfe na CNDD-FDD. Amaze kugaruka mu gihugu mu 2013, Agathon Rwasa yinjiye mu nama nshingamateka mu matora yo mu 2015 yaranzwe n'ukutumvikana gukomeye biturutse ku ngingo ya CNDD-FDD yo gushira imbere Petero Nkurunziza ngo yitoze mu kiringo kigira gatatu abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bavuga ko cari giteye kubiri n'amategeko. N'aho urunani  Amizero y'Abarundi rwari ruhurikiyemwo abigenga rutagiye muri ayo matora, Agathon Rwasa n'abiwe bafashe ingingo yo kwinjira mu nama nshingamateka. Inyuma y'ugukwegana amashati hagati y'ubushikiranganji bw'intaro yo hagati nawe ku kibazo c'ugushinga umugambwe, ku wa 14 z'ukwa kabiri 2019 umugambwe wiwe CNL wahavuye wemererwa gukorera ku mugaragaro, akaba ari nawe yagenywe ngo azowuserukire mu matora y'umukuru. Imigambi  ashira imbere ishingiye ku guteza imbere uburimyi n'ubworozi, kunagura indero mu mashure yaba matomato, ayisumbiye na kaminuza, aho nk'akarorero avuga ko azogarukana uburaro mu mashure yisumbuye. Agathon Rwasa kandi  ashira imbere ukunagura ibisata vy'ubuvuzi n'amagara y'abantu, gutunganya ibisagara n'uburaro, amasoko ntanganguvu, ubutare n'agataka, kwiyunguruza no kwunguruza abantu n'ibintu, intwaro ibereye, imigenderanire, ubutunzi, ibidukikije, be no kwitaho no gukomeza inzego z'umutekano. Domitien Ndayizeye niwe arongoye urunani KIRA BURUNDI akaba ari nawe azokwitoza mu kibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu kw'izina ry'urwo runani. Yavukiye muri komine n'intara ya Kayanza mu mwaka wa 1953. Mu buzima bwa politike Domotien Ndayizeye yarabaye mu muhari MEPROBA washinzwe inyuma y'ubwicanyi bwa 1972, aho yari mu buhungiro mu gihugu c'u Rwanda, azezwa amabanga atandukanye. Mu nyuma yahavuye yinjira mu mugambwe Sahwanya Frodebu mu 1992. Amaze guhunguka, mu kw'icenda 1993, Bwana Ndayizeye yarajejwe amabanga atandukanye haba mu mugambwe Frodebu canke mu butegetsi bw'igihugu. Mu gihe u Burundi bwari mu ntambara yadutse inyuma y'aho umugwi w'abasirikare ico gihe ugandaguriye umukuru w'igihugu Melchior Ndadaye, Bwana Ndayizeye yarapfunzwe incuro zibiri. Ubwa mbere, yapfunzwe  kuva mu kwa kabiri 1995 aza kurekurwa mu kwa gatatu 1996, yagirijwe ko yari yifananije n'umuhari CNDD warwanya ubutegetsi. Yasubiye gupfungwa  mu kwa kabiri aho yamaze indwi imwe mu gasho k'igipolisi kijejwe umutekano mu gihugu (police de Sécurité Publique, PSP), yagirizwa guhungabanya umutekano w'igihugu, bitumwe n'uko umugambwe Frodebu wiyamirije itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi bwa Sylvestre Ntibantunganya ryakozwe na Petero Buyoya ku wa 25 z'ukw'indwi 1996. Domitien Ndayizeye yaragize uruhara mu biganiro vy'amahoro vyatanguye mu 1998 birangira mu 2000. Ivyo biganiro ni vyo vyatumye aronswa amabanga y'ukurongora igihugu mu buryo bw'imfatakibanza, aho yabaye icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu kuva 01/11/2001 gushika ku wa 30/04/2003. Uwo munsi nyene niho yaca arahira kuba umukuru w'igihugu, amabanga yaranguye  gushika ku wa 26 z'ukwa munani 2005. Hagati aho, inyuma y'ukugira uruhara mw'ishirwa mu ngiro ry'amasezerano hagati ya leta n'umuhari CNDD-FDD, harimwo n'iyinjizwa ry'abarwanyi bawo mu nzego z'umutekano w'igihugu, ubutegetsi bwa CNDD-FDD bwaramupfunze kuva kuwa 21/08/2006 gushika ku wa 17/01/2007, aho we n'abo bari bapfunganywe bagirijwe ko bari bateguye gutembagaza ubutegetsi. Mu migambi yiwe, Domitien Ndayizeye mu vyerekeye ubutunzi n'iterambere ategura guteza imbere uburimyi n'ubworozi, guhimiriza urwaruka kwijukira gukora utwabo mu bisata bitandukanye, gusubiramwo itunganywa ry'amakori, guteza imbere ibisagara bitobito, kurwiza amasoko ntanganguvu n'ibindi. Nayo mu vyerekeye imibano, Domitien Ndayizeye ategura gusubiramwo inyigisho, ibijanye n'imishahara, kurwiza ubuzi, gusubiramwo ivyo ubuvuzi n'ibindi. Mu bijanye na politike, Domitien Ndayizeye ategura gusasagaza intwaro ibereye, guhagararira ubutungane bubereye, gukomeza ubuhinga bw'inzego z'umutekano, no kunagura imigenderanire.

headline: 'Cristiano Ronaldo ntagurishwa' - Erik ten Hag
text: Umumenyereza wa Manchester United Erik ten Hag avuga ko umukinyi w'imbere wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo ari "mu mugambi wabo" mu mwaka ugira utangure ko rero "atagurishwa". Uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 37 ntazokina inkino z'igice ca mbere zibaziriza ihiganwa zizobera muri Thailand kandi yashaka kuva muri uwo mugwi. Yari yagarutse muri United mu mwaka uheze inyuma yo gukinira Real Madrid na Juventus. Uwo yahoze amenyereza Ajax, Ten Hag agira ati:"Ntari kumwe nacu kubera imvo bwite ziwe. Tumufiseko umugambi muri uyu mwaka. Ni ko biri." "Mfise igishika co gukorana na we. Cristiano si uwo kugurisha. Ari mu mugambi wacu. Dushaka amahirwe turi kumwe." Isiba ry'uwo munye Portugal muri urwo rugendo ryatumye haba ibihuha kuri kazoza kiwe, inyuma kandi yo kutagaragara mu myimenyerezo y'uwo mugwi   yo kwitegurira ihiganwa ryimirije i Carrington. Ahubwo Ronaldo yagize imyimenyerezo n'umugwi nserukiragihu wa Portugal aho basanzwe bimenyerereza. Manchester United izotana mu mitwe na Liverpool muri Thailand  ku musi wa kabiri imbere yo kwurira indege baja muri Australia, Ten Hag akavuga ko ataramenya nimba Ronaldo azobasangayo mu nyuma. Uwo mumenyereza w'umudagi yongeyeko ko yavuganye na Ronaldo imbere y'urwo rugendo, asigura:"Twayaze neza. Ivyo biri hagati yanje na Ronaldo, ico nokwemeza n'uko twagiraniye ibiganiro vyiza cane." Ten Hag  yagize kandi ico acuga kuvyerekeye uwoba kizigenza, cabaye ikibazo kuva mu mwaka uheze kubera Harry Maguire adahagaze neza. Yagize ati: "Harry Maguire azoba kizigenza. Amaze umwaka urenga ari kizigenza. Amaze gushika kuri vyinshi. Nta nkeka mfise kuri ivyo." Umukinyi wenyene United imaze kuzana muri iri ci n'umukinyi w'inyuma Tyrell Malacia yakuye mu mugwi wa Feyenoord. Biteze kunaza umukinyi w'inyuma Christian Eriksen ata n'urumeya bamutanzeko, bakaba kandi begereje kugiriranira amasezerano na Barcelone ku mukinyi Frenkie de Jong. Ten Hag yacishijemwo avuga ko United izozana abakinyi mu gihe ibonye ko bahuje uko bakina. Yongeyeko ati:"Dushaka kwongeramwo abakinyi babikwiye. Dufise umugwi mwiza cane, turiko turakora mu guteza imbere uburyo dukina, kandi akaryo karahari tuzotsinda."

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Pulisic, Bereton Diaz, Phillips, Dembele, Origi, Danjuma, Cook
text: Barcelona iriko irategura urugamba rwo kurondera umunyamerika Christian Pulisic, 23 akina ku ruhande, umudagi Antonio Rudiger, 28,  akina inyuma hamwe n'umunya Espagne akina inyuma nyene Cesar Azpilicueta, 32, bose basanzwe bakina muri Chelsea. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Leeds United iracarondera umusatirizi wa Chili Ben Brereton Diaz, 22, n'aho Blackburn Rovers imushakako imiriyoni 33 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Sun) West Ham iriko irarondera umukinyi w'inyuma w'umwongereza Nathaniel Phillips, 24, kugira ngo asubirire umutaliyano Angelo Ogbonna, 33, ariko rero Liverpool iriko imuronderako imiriyoni zababa 13 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira imurekure. (Sun) Umufaransa akina ku ruhande muri Bayern Munich  Kingsley Coman, 25, aracanana gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha n'uyu murwi, bikaboneka ko, mu gihe yokwanka, mugenziwe Ousmane Dembele, 24, basanzwe bakinana mu murwi nserukiragihugu akaba ariko ararangiza amasezerano afitaniye na Barcelona, ari we ashobora kumusubirira. (Christian Falk) Real Madrid nta mugambi ifise wo kugurisha umusatirizi wa Bresil Rodrygo, 20, n'aho hari amakuru avuga ko ariko araronderwa na Liverpool.(Fabrizio Romano) Tottenham yatanguye ibiganiro n'umunyegori wayo, umufaransa Hugo Lloris, 34, akaba ari na we kizigenza, imbere y'uko amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi arangira mu ci riza. (Football Insider) Umusatirizi wa Liverpool umubirigi Divock Origi, 26, ariko araronderwa n'imirwi yo mu Butaliyano AC Milan - isanzwe iriko irarondera abakinyi bashobora gusubirira  Zlatan Ibrahimovic - hamwe na Atalanta. (Tutto Mercatao - in Italian) Imirwi ya Paris St-Germain na Lyon iriko irarondera ingene yoronka umusatirizi w'umufaransa Anthony Martial, 26, ni mu gihe umuserukizi wiwe avuga ko uyu mukinyi yipfuza kuva muri Manchester United. (90 Min) Lyon iripfuza kuronka umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Villarreal umunya Hollande Arnaut Danjuma, 24. Manchester United na Barcelona nayo nyene izwi ko iriko iramukurikiranira hagufi.  (TodoFichajes - in Spanish) Chelsea iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano n'abakinyi Andreas Christensen, 25, umunya Danemark akina inyuma, hamwe na Thiago Silva, 37, umunya Bresil na we nyene akina inyuma.  (Metro) Arsenal iriko irakora uko ishoboye kugira ngo irabe ko yogumana umusatirizi wayo, umwongereza Khayon Edwards, 18, amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo 14 vyose mu murwi w'abakiri bato muri uno mwaka w'inkino, ni mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye nayo asigaje amezi atandatu gusa. Chelsea, Leeds, Southampton, Brighton naNewcastle yose iriko irakurikiranira hagufi ingene ivyiwe biriko biragenda, hampande y'imirwi itari mike yo mu Budagi. (Mail) Newcastle United igiye kuronderera muri Bournemouth umukinyi w'inyuma, Umwongereza Steve Cook, 30, inyuma y'aho isabiwe amahera y'umurengera ku mukinyi w'inyuma wa Burnley, James Tarkowski, 29. (Sun) Everton, Leicester City na Newcastle iripfuza umukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Suwede Pontus Jansson, 30, ni m ugihe amasezerano afitaniye na Brentford azorangira mu ci riza. (Guardian) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester United umunya Portugal  Diogo Dalot, 22, yariko araronderwa na Roma ariko bivanye n'ingene agize imisi avyifatamwo neza igihe Man U itanguriye kumenyerezwa na Ralf Rangnick amahirwe ni make cane, ibi bikavugwa ko uyo murwi wa Serie A uriko uronderera ahandi, harimwo n'umwongereza Max Aarons, 21 wa Norwich hamwe n'umudagi Benjamin Henrichs, 24 wa RB Leipzig.(Corriere Dello Sport - in Italian) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Arsenal umufaransa William Saliba, 20, avuga ko atipfuza "kuvuga ibijanye" na kazoza kiwe, ni mu gihe hari ibihuha bivuga ko ashobora gutera igikumu ku masezerano yo kwinjira burundu mu murwi Marseille asanzwe akinamwo nk'intizo kuva igihe kitari gito. (RTL, via Mirror)

headline: US: Babona ko ihinduka ry’itegeko rijanye no gukorora inda 'rizorokora ubuzima bwa benshi muri Africa'
text: Abarongoye ibisata vy'irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza bakiranye igishika inkuru ivuga ko umukuru w'igihugu wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Joe Biden, yafuse itegeko ryari ryahagaritse imfashanyo zahabwa amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu yafasha canke akagira inama abipfuza gukorora inda. Amavuriro amwe amwe yigisha ibijanye n'irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza muri Afrika vyabaye ngombwa ko yugara inyuma y'aho mu 2017, uwari umukuru w'igihugu ico gihe Donald Trump ahagarikiye imfashanyo zahabwa amashirahamwe yafasha abantu mu bijanye n'ukudasama imbanyi batipfuza hamwe n'ugukorora inda. Nelly Munyasia, arongoye ikigo c'irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza muri Kenya (Reproductive Health Network Kenya) avuga ko iyi ngingo ya Amerika yiswe "global gag rule" yatumye ishirahamwe ryiwe rinanirwa no gufasha abakenyezi muri ino myaka mikeya iheze. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Abagore n'abakorwa barahasize ubuzima nk'inkurikizi z'iyi ngingo - barya barwaye umugera wa SIDA hamwe na kanseri  batari bagishoboye gukurikiranwa, canke abatari bagishoboye kuronswa uburyo bwo kwirinda imbanyi batipfuza hamwe n'impanuro ku bijanye n'irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza,  wasanga bagiye gukoresha uburyo butabereye bwo gukorora imbanyi. "Guhindura iyi ngingo bizorokora ubuzima kandi ni ingingo yategerezwa kubandanya". Moses Mulumba wo mu kigo citaho ubuzima, uburenganzira bwa muntu n'iterambere muri Uganda, yavuze ko iyi ngingo yerekanye ingaruka z'ingingo z'agahotoro ku bindi bihugu n'ingaruka zagize ku banyagihugu bo mu bihugu bikenye. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Nk'ingaruka ya 'global gag rule', vyabaye ngombwa ko ishirahamwe ryanje … rihagarika ibikorwa vyaryo mu kiringo c'imyaka ine iheze, rihagarika umugambi wafashwa na USAID waharanira amagara meza, n'aho ryariko rirakora ibikora inka". Kuvanaho iyi ngingo bivuga ko abagore benshi bazokwitabwaho mu vyerekeye irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza, harimwo kuronswa uburyo bwo kuzibira imbanyi batipfuza, be no gupimwa umugera wa SIDA na kanseri hamwe n'ibindi.

headline: Papa asaba ko haboneka inyishu "ruhasha" ku bihe mu butumwa kuri BBC yonyene
text: Mu butumwa bw'ijwi yahaye BBC yonyene, Papa François asaba abategetsi b'isi bazohurira  ku ndwi iza mu nama ya ONU  ku bihe i Glasgow (muri Ecosse), gutanga "inyishu ziri n'ico zishikako" ku vyihutirwa ku bidukikije no guha "icizere gifadika" abariko bararuka. Muri ubwo butumwa bwafatiwe amajwi i Vaticano  bugahabwa ikiganiro Thought for the Day ca Radio 4 ya BBC, Papa yagarutse ku bihanze isi birimwo ikiza ca Covid -19, ihindagurika ry'ibihe hamwe n'ibibazo vy'ubutunzi, aca asaba abarongoye isi kubitorera inyishu mu buryo bw'icerekezo n'ingingo ruhasha , kugira "amahirwe" atangwa n'ivyo bihanze isi "ntatakare". Umwungere wa Ekereziya Katorika yavuze ati: "Duhangana n'ivyo vyugarije isi mu nzira za  nyamwigendako, kwigumizako ivyacu no gukoresha ivy'abandi, canke tukabibonamwo amahirwe nyayo y'impinduka". Yagarutse ku kuba hakenewe "ugusubira kwumva uruhara dusangiye rwo kwitaho isi yacu", yongerako ati "umwe wese muri twebwe - uwo ari we wese n'aho ari hose - ashobora kugira  ico aterereye mu guhindura inyishu ya twese ku ngeramizi zitari bwigere ziboneka  kw'ihindagurika ry'ibihe n'itituka ry'inzu dusangiye." Papa mu mwanya uza aja kubonana na prezida wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Joe Biden. Imigambi ya Biden ku bijanye n'ibihe mu gihugu iwe iracari mu mayira abiri inyuma y'aho umugambwe wiwe wigirije inyuma gutora itegeko rigenda  integuro z'amafaranga yo gukoresha. Ubwo butumwa n'ubwibutsa ingene Papa François yashize imbere ibijanye no gukingira ibidukikije mu burongozi bwiwe bwa Ekereziya. Mu majambo ashikiriza, aramaze kugaruka kenshi ku kaga k'ibihe, mu 2015 akaba yasohoye ikete rya  Papa (enciclyque), ryitwa  Laudato Si' rishimikiye kuri ico kibazo. Muri iyo nyandiko inyito yayo yahinduwe mu zindi ndimi nka "Ku kwitaho inzu dusangiye" , yiyamirije ugusambura ibidukikije, yerekana ko hakenewe ingingo zofasha  kugabanya iryo hindagurika, aca yemeza ata guca hirya no hino ko ihindagurika ry'ibihe ahanini riterwa n'ibikorwa vy'umuntu. Iryo kete ryasohotse imbere y'uko haba inama ya ONU y'i Paris mu 2015, COP21, rikaba ryabonywe nk'iryagize ico rifashije mu gutuma abategetsi bashika ku masezerano. Inyuma y'imyaka itandatu, abategetsi b'isi bariko baritegurira gukoranira i Glasgow mu nama y'uyu mwaka, COP26. Mu gihe biguma bigaragara ko ivyiyemejwe i Paris bitariko birashikwako kugira  ukwiyongera kw'ubushuhe bw'isi ntikurenge 1.5C, ugereranije n'urugero rw'imbere y'uko hatagura amahinguriro,  Papa François yasubiye gushimika kuri ico kibazo  yizigiye ko ijambo ryiwe rizosubira kugira ico rifashije nka mbere.

headline: Reggae: Ivyo kumenya kuri The Wailers ubwo uwanyuma muri bo yashengeye
text: Bunny Wailer niwe yari aramvye cane mu bo bashinze hamwe umugwi The Wailers, abandi babiri, Bob Marley na Peter Tosh barapfuye, uwa mbere muri 1981 ahitanywe na cancer ku myaka 36, uwa kabiri mu 1987 agandaguwe n'abasuma ku myaka 43. Bunny Wailer w'i Kingston, yakuranye na Bob Marley. Bafatanije bararimvye indirimbo zabaye rurangiranwa mu makungu nka Simmer Down na Stir Up, imbere y'uko Wailer afata inzira yo kuririmba ukwa wenyene mu 1974. Ntiyahagaritse gutera imbere kuko yararonse incuro zitatu zose agashinmwe gakomeye cane mu muziki Grammys aranambikwa ikidari ca Jamaica ca Ordre de Merite mu 2017. Yapfuye ku wa kabiri mu gitondo, ariko icateye urupfu rwiwe nticamenyekanye n'ubwo yari mu bitaro kuva agize AVC mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 2020. Nta nkeka, abashimagiza uwo muririmvyi bashwaye imbuga hwaniro bakimenya urupfu rwiwe, abanyamuziki nkawe nabo bavuga ko yari "harabaye". Umuririmvyi azwi mu gutamba cane aririmba Shaggy yanditse kuri Facebook ati: "Iki ni kimwe mu bihe bibi muri kahise k'akaranga kacu. Waduteye kwishima mwami. Ruhuka neza." "Oh yemwe, Imana ihezagire Bunny Wailer," uwo nawe n'uwo muri Redd Hot Chili Peppers avuza guitare bass, Flea. Andrew Holness ministre wa mbere wa Jamaica ntiyatanzwe mu gushimagiza uwo muririmvyi, yavuze ko urupfu rwiwe ari "agahombo kanini kuri Jamaica na reggae". Bunny Wailer izina ryiwe ry'ukuri ryari Neville O'Riley Livingston. Yari yavutse ku wa 20/4/1947, amara imyaka yiwe ya mbere mu kigwati ca Nine Miles aho yarezwe na se Thaddeus yacuruza imangazini y'ivyo kurya. Aho niho yahuriye ubwa mbere na Bob Marley, ivyo bitambambuga badatevye baca baba abagenzi bakomeye, bakorana umuziki wabo ubwa mbere bari kumwe kw'ishure ry'intango n'iryisumbuye rya Stepney. Se wa Bob Marley amaze gupfa mu 1955, nyina, Cedella, yaciye abana na se wa Livingston. Abo bahungu bakuze barezwe nk'abavukana na cane cane aho cedella na Thaddeus bavyariye umukobwa, Pearl. Bamaze kwimukira Trenchtown muri Kingston, baciye bahura na Peter Tosh baca bashinga umugwi wo kuririmbira hamwe witwa The Wailing Wailers - kuko, nk'uko Bob Marley yabivuze: "Twatanguye dusemerera." Aho baba harangwa n'ubukene n'ubukozi bw'ikibi. Livingston mu nyuma yibutse ingene yakoze igitari ciwe ca mbere akoresheje "imigano, imirya akuye mu ntsinga z'amatara, n'igikopo kinini cavuyemwo sardines". Ariko umuririmvyi Joe Higgs batazira "the Godfather of Reggae" (umuhagarikizi wa reggae), yaba hafi yaciye ashira abo bahungu mu kwaha kwiwe. Abafashije, baciye  banonosora umuziki wabo, bongeramwo ijwi rya Junior Braithwaite n'abaririmvi basasira Beverly Kelso na Cherry Green imbere y'uko bagabanya izina ry'umugwi wabo ugasigara witwa The Wailers. Mu kwa 12 mu 1963, uwo mugwi wagiye muri Studio One ya Coxsone Dodd gufata amajwi y'indirimbo Simmer Down, indirimbo Bob Marley yari yanditse asaba amahoro mu ma quartiers y'abakene ya Kingston. Iyo ndirimbo ntiyatevye gukundwa, iraduga gushika ku nomero ya mbere muri Jamaica. Baciye bayikurikiza Duppy Conqueror, imbere y'uko basohora  urukurikirane rwabo rwa mbere (album) The Wailing Wailers, mu 1965. Bidatevye mu nyuma y'aho, hari akaciyemwo mu mugwi, aho Bob Marley amariye kurongora akimukira muri Amerika, nawe Livingston akamara umwaka mu munyororo kubera gufatanwa urumogi. Ariko barashoboye gusohora single (urukurikirane rw'indirimbo zitarenga 3) 28 hagati ya 1966 na 1970 imbere y'uko basohora album yabo ya kabiri, Soul Rebels. Izina rikomeye mu makungu barironse imyaka itatu inyuma y'aho kuri Catch A Fire  -indirimbo ya mbere bakoreye inzu yo gusohora indirimbo ya Chris Blackwell, Island Records. The Wailers bari  bamaze igihe baremesha ibiterambo mu Bwongereza bari kumwe na Johnny Nash, mu nyuma babura amafaranga yo kuriha ama tike yo kubasubiza iwabo. Blackwell aca yemera kubaha contrat ya Island, aca abaha ingurane (avance) yo kugura ama tike n'ayo gukora album muri Jamaica. Ariko ntibanezerejwe n'ingene indirimbo zabo zongeye guhingurwa kugira zihabwe akabirya ku bazumva mu makungu. Ariko iyo album ntiyaguzwe cane haba mu Bowngereza canke muri Amerika naho yahavuye ifatwa nk'imwe muri rurangiranwa. Mbere ikinyamakuru Rolling Stone Magazine ubu vuba cayigize iya 140  ku rutonde rwaco rwa albums 500 zirengeye ibihe (albums of all time) gifatiye ku ndirimbo zayo Concrete Jungle na Slave Driver. Ikibanza ciza kw'isoko caciye gikurikira na Burnin' yo mu 1973 ku ndirimbo nka I shot the Sheriff, Small Axe hamwe na Get Up Stand Up. Ariko niyo yabaye album ya nyuma ya The Wailers isohowe n'abatanguye uwo mugwi bari kumwe bose. Ukutumvikana kwari kwatanguye igihe Island yagurisha indirimbo zabo kw'izina rya Bob Marley and The Waliers, hamwe n'ikirangaminsi co kuzunguruka baririmba catumye Livingston amara igihe atari kumwe n'umuryango wiwe. Yaciye agenda mu 1973, avuga ko ubuzima bwo kuzunguruka budahuye n'ukwemera kwiwe kw'umu Rasta - avuga nko kurya indya zihinguwe hamwe no kuririmba mu bibanza bitabereye. Mu nyuma yavuze ko kumenyekana cane ari umwansi wo kwiyumvira ibishasha. "Umuziki uhagaze ku kugira ico ufatiyeko, iyo rero uri ahantu uri epfo na ruguru, aha na hariya, n'umuziki wawe niko uzokwumvikana," niko Livingston yabwiye The Los Angeles Times mu 1986. "Abantu baratwarwa no kuba rurangiranwa kandi ivyo bitandukanye no kuba umwanditsi, umunyamuziki, uwufasha abandi gutunganya umuziki wabo n'uwushira umuziki mu buhinga mwiza." Amaze kuva muri uwo mugwi, yaciye atangura gukora kuri album ya wenyene , Blackheart Man, yarimwo indirimbo zizwi nka Dreamland na Fighting Against Conviction, yiyumviriye igihe yari mw'ibohero. Yabandanije asohora album zakunzwe cane harimwo Rock 'n' Groove yo mu 1981 na Bunny Wailer Sings The Wailers yo mu 1980, aho yasubiyemwo zimwe mu ndirimbo bari bararirimbanye n'abandi mu mugwi. Mu myaka ya 1990 yaronse Grammy award ya album za reggae za mbere nzinza kurusha izindi incuro zitatu, aho hose akaba yagumye akomeza kandi agumya iragi rya Bob Marley na Wailers: iyo mu 1991, Time Will Tell: A Tribute to Bob Marley; iyo mu 1995, Crucial! Roots Classics; n'iyo mu 1997, A Tribute to Bob Marley's 50th Anniversary (guhimbaza imyaka 50 y'isabukuru ya Bob Marley). "Ndanezerezwa no kumenya ko ndiko ndafasha inzira yo gushikana reggae aho igeze. Ndashimishwa no kubigiramwo uruhara'', ivyo yabibwiye Washinton Post mu 2006.

headline: CEDEAO/ECOWAS yafatiye ibihano reta ya gisirikare ya Mali
text: Abategetsi b'ibihugu vyo mu karere ka Afrika y'uburengero bafatiye ibihano Mali inyuma y'aho reta ya gisirikare itangarije ko amatora yari ategekanijwe mu kwezi kwa kabiri kuza yungurujwe igihe kirekire. Abategetsi b'ibihugu bigize ishirahamwe ry'ubutunzi rihuza ibihugu vyo muri ako karere, CEDEAO/ECOWAS, aho bari bakoraniye i Accra muri Ghana ejo ku wa Mungu bumvikanye ko ibihugu vyabo vyugara imbibe bihana na Mali, hamwe no gushira mu ngiro ibihano bitari bike mu bijanye n'ubutunzi. Abategetsi b'akarere ka Afrika y'uburengero basaba ko ubutegetsi busubizwa mu minwe y'abasivire kuva aho akarwi k'intwazangabo gatembagarije ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Ibrahim Boubacar Keïta inyuma y'imyiyerekano yo kumwiyamiriza mu kwa munani 2020. Hampande yo kwugara imbibe, CEDEAO kandi yafashe ingingo yo gufata amatungo ya Mali ari mw'ibanki nkuru ihuza ibi bihugu, BCEAO. Ibi bihugu kandi vyafashe ingingo yo gutahukana ababiserukira muri Mali. Reta ya gisirikare ya Mali nayo mu kwihora yaciye itangaza ko yugaye imbibe z'ikirere n'iz'ubutaka isangiye n'ibihugu vya CEDEAO/ECOWAS mbere ica itumako abayiserukira muri ivyo bihugu. Mw'itangazo aba bategetsi ba gisirikare basohoye, bavuze ko biyamiriza "bivuye inyuma" ibi bihano "biteye kubiri n'amategeko" vyafatiwe iki gihugu. Aba bategetsi ba gisirikare ba Mali ubu bavuga ko amatora ashobora kuba mu myaka itanu iri imbere - ivyo ishirahamwe rihuza akarere ritarota ryemera. Muri kahise, ibihano vyaragize akamaro, ariko rero mu mwaka uheze, igisirikare casubiye gutembagaza ubutegetsi bwa gisivire, ibihugu vy'akarere bikaba biri mu mageragezwa yo kwerekana ko koko bishobora guhagarara ku ngingo yavyo.

headline: Aliko Dangote na Mohammed Dewji bari mu batunzi ba mbere muri Afrika mu 2021
text: Nk'uko biri mu kinyamakuru ca Forbes co mu 29021, ubutunzi bw'abagwizatunga 18 bo kuri uyu mugabane bwiyongereye imiriyaridi 4.1 z'amadolari, n'ukuvuga ku bice 12 kw'ijana gusumba mu mwaka uheze. Mu myaka cumi yikurikiranya, Aliko Dangote wo mur Nigeria ni we muntu atunze cane ku mugabane wa Afrika, akaba afise ubutunzi buharurwa ku miriyaridi 12.1 z'amadolari. Ubwo butunzi bwiyongereyeko amadolari imiriyaridi 2, ugereranije no mu mwaka uheze bivuye kw'iduga gushika ku bice 30 kw'ijana vy'igiciro c'isima ya Dangote nk'uko vyandikwa na Forbes. Umuntu agira kabiri mu butunzi muri Afrika ni Nassef Sawiris wo mu Misri, ubutunzi bwiwe  bwinshi ni ibice bitandatu kw'ijana y'umutahe afise muri Addidas. Mu kibanza ca gatatu haza Nicky Oppeheimer wo mu gihugu ca Afrika y'epfo, yarazwe umutahe wo muri kompanyi  ya Debeers, akaba yari anahagarariye iyo kompanyi gushika mu mwaka wa 2012 aho yaca agurisha ibice 40 kw'ijana vy'umutahe w'umuryango wiwe kuri kompanyi yimba ubutare ya AngloAmerican ku miriyaridi 5.1 z'amadolari. Uwundi yatunze cane muri uyu mwaka ni umudandaza wundi w'isima, Abdulsamad Rabiu. Imitahe yiwe muri kompanyi ikora isima ya BUA PLC, yashizwe ku rutonde kw'isoko ry'abagurisha imitahe muri Nigeria mu kwezi kwa mbere, yaduze igiciro biteye ubwoba mu kiringo c'uyu mwaka uheze. Vyatumye ubutunzi bwa Rabiu bwongerekana ku bice 77 kw'ijana, gushika ku miriyaridi 5.5 vy'amadolari. Ikintu gikomeye cane n'uko Rabiu n'umwana wiwe bafise ibice 97 kw'ijana vy'iyo kompanyi bagaca batuma imenyekana cane. Umuvugizi w'isoko ry'imitahe muri Nigeria yabwiye Forbes ko ikompanyi y'isima ya BUA  ishitse ku ntambwe ya kabiri - ko Forbes igabanya agaciro k'imitahe mu gihe iyo mitahe yagurishijwe ku banyagihugu ifise agaciro kari muri y'ibice 5 kw'ijana. Umugwizatunga wenyene ava mu karere k'ubuseruko bwa Afrika ari kuri urwo rutonde rwa Forbes ni umudandaza wo muri Tanzania, Mohammed Dewji, aza mu kibanza ca 13. Dewji afise ubutunzi bufise agaciro k'imiriyaridi 1.6 z'amadolari, nk'uko vyandikwa n'ico kinyamakuru c'ubutunzi ca Forbes. Urutonde rw'abantu batunze cane kw'isi mu mwaka wa 2021: 1. Aliko Dangote     afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 12.1 $ 2. Nassef Sawiris     afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 8.5  $ 3.  Nicky Openheimer  afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 8  $ 4. Johann Rupert  afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 7.2  $ 5. Mike Adenuga   afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 6.7  $ 6. Abdulsamad Rabiu  afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 5.5  $ 7. Issad Rebrad afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 4.8  $ 8. Naguib Sawiris   afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 3.2  $ 9. Patrice afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 3  $ 10. Koos Bekker afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 2.8  $ Mu gihe bamwe bongereje ubutunzi bwabo ku miriyaridi n'imiriyaridi, ubutunzi bw'abagwizatunga babiri bari ku rutonde rwo mu mwaka wa 2020, bwaragabanutse gushika baje musi y'umuriyaridi umwe. Abapfasoni babiri bonyene ni bo bari ku rutonde rw'abatunzi bakomeye mu mwaka wa 2020, ubu bakorotse ntibakiri kuri urwo rutonde. Nk'uko bivugwa na Forbes, ubutunzi bwa Folonrusho Alakija wo muri Nigeria, afise ikompanyi yo kwimba igitoro bwaramanutse musi y'umuriyaridi umwe kubera igiciro c'ibitoro camanutse. Isabel dos Santos, kuva mu 2013 yari umupfasoni atunze cane ku mugabane wa Afrika, ubutunzi bwiwe bwaragabanutse kubera ingingo nyinshi zitandukanye zitumbereye ivyo atunze muri Angola na Portugal. Abo bagwizatunga batunze cane ku mugabane wa Afrika bava mu bihugu indwi bitandukanye. Afrika y'Epfo na Misri bifise abagwizatunga batanu, bigakurikirwa na Nigeria ifise batatu hamwe na Maroc ifise babiri.

headline: Impunzi z’Abarundi muri Tanzania ‘zibwirwa ko zishobora guhungurwa ku nguvu’
text: Impunzi z'abarundi ziri muri Tanzaniya zivuga ko zabwiwe ko hari umugambi wo kuzihungura ku nguvu, kandi zitizeye umutekano mu gihe zosubizwa mu Burundi. Bamwe mu mpunzi zo mu nkambi ya Nyarugusu iri mu ntara ya Kigoma babwiye BBC ko bakoreshejwe inama n'umukuru w'ikambi ku wa 04 z'uku kwezi kw'indwi akababwira ko ata kamaro ko kuguma mu buhungiro kuko mu Burundi ari amahoro. Ishirahamwe rijejwe impunzi  kw'isi rivuga ko Tanzania ihaye indaro impunzi zirenga 200 000 z'abarundi. Aba bagizwe ahanini n'abahunze uruhagarara rwo mu 2015 mu Burundi. Mu majwi yafatiwe muri iyi nama mw'ikambi ya Nyarugusu, umuyobozi w'iyi kambi, Jumanne Singani, yumvikana avuga ko izi mpunzi zatumye umutekano w'abanyagihugu ba Tanzaniya uhungabana, ku buryo batinya n'ugufata ingendo. Yibutsa izi mpunzi ko hariho inyishu zitatu ku kibazo c'impunzi: guhunguka ku gushaka kwabo, guhabwa ubwenegihugu canke kurondererwa ubuhungiro mu kindi gihugu. Muri buno buryo butatu, Bwana Singani yababwiye ko inyishu ku mpunzi z'Abarundi ziri muri Tanzaniya ubu ari uko zitegerezwa guhunguka. Yavuze ati: "Turavye ingene ibintu bimeze ubu, ikiriho ni uko muhunguka kuko mu Burundi amahoro arasasagaye". Yabwiye impunzi kandi ko hari n'uburyo butatu bwo guhunguka. Ati:"Ubwa mbere ni guhunguka ku gushaka kwanyu, ubwa kabiri guhunguka muhimirijwe (promoted repatriation), ubwa gatatu guhunguka hakoreshejwe inguvu". Bwana Singani yumvikana abwira izi mpunzi z'abarundi ko vyoba vyiza bahungutse ku gushaka kwabo, batarindiriye ko hakoreshwa inguvu. Mu 2012, impunzi z'Abarundi zari mw'ikambi ya Mtabila iri muri District ya Kasulu intara ya Kigoma, barahunguwe ku nguvu. Uyu muyobozi w'ikambi yabwiye impunzi ko ingingo yo kubahungura yafashwe inyuma y'inama yahuje abategetsi ba Tanzaniya, b'Uburundi n'ishirahamwe HCR rijejwe impunzi. Tumubajije kuri ibi yabwiye impunzi, Bwana Singani yabwiye BBC ko ataco yobivugako, adusaba kuvugisha abakoresha biwe, ubushinkiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati ari nabwo bujejwe impunzi muri Tanzania. Umwe mu mpunzi atashatse gutangazwa, avuga ko bama baterwa ubwoba iyo bariko basabwa gutahuka, mu "gufatira ku vyabaye mu 2012 ku mpunzi zari mw'ikambi ya Mtabila, no ku mpunzi z'abanyarwanda muri Kagera (1996)". Ati: "Iyo badukoranije mu manama, nta bindi batwibutsa atari ivyo, kuko basanze umengo ni akanyegeri gahonyowe ntihagire ikintu na kimwe gikorwa". Asaba amakungu ko amategeko agenga impunzi yokurikizwa bagakingirwa. Kuri ibi vyabwiwe izi mpunzi, ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati muri Tanzaniya buvuga ko ata mugambi leta y'ico gihugu ifise wo kubahungura ku nguvu. Umupfasoni Christina Mwangosi, umuvugizi mfatakibanza w'ubwo bushikiranganji yabwiye BBC ati: "Leta ya Tanzaniya ifasha impunzi ziyandikishije gusubira mu bihugu vyabo. "Nico conyene gikorwa na leta ya Tanzaniya, igihari ni uko impunzi zihunguka ku gushaka kwazo". Impunzi z'Abarundi muri Tanzania ziba mu makambi ya Nyarugusu mu karere ka Kasulu, Nduta na Mtendeli mu karere ka Kibondo, ni mu ntara ya Kigoma.

headline: Urucanco Ervebo rwa Ebola rwemewe muri RD Congo, mu Burundi, muri Ghana no muri Zambia
text: Ibihugu bine vya Afrika- Repubulika y'intwaro rusangi ya Congo, u Burundi, Ghana na Zambia - vyemeje urucanco rwa Ebola rukaba rushobora gutangura gutangwa. Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu, OMS/WHO rimenyesha ko iyo ari intambwe ikomeye mu rugamba wo kurwanya ico kiza. Ivyigwa vy'intangamarara vyerekana ko urwo rucanco, Ervebo rwakozwe n'ikompanyi Merck rushobora gukinga gushika ku rugero rwa 97,5%. Ivyo vyigwa vyerekana kandi ko urwo rucanco ruhawe abamaze kwandura rushobora kubongerereza amahirwe yo kubandanya babaho. Igihugu ca RD Congo  gihanzwe n'ico kiza kuva mu kwezi kw'umunani 2018 kikaba kimaze guhitana abantu bagera ku 2.249. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe OMS, Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, ati: "Ni intambwe nshasha  kubona urwo rucanco rwemewe muri ivyo bihugu mu rugamba rwo kurwanya ico kiza ruburakigongwe". "Afrika yarashize inguvu hamwe kugira ngo ikomeze intambwe imaze gushikwako bigoranye mu gukingira abanyagihugu bayo umugera wa Ebola". Nivyo ko igitigiri c'abandura Ebola muri RD Congo cagabanutse bimwe bishimishije, ariko umutekano muke n'amayira ameze nabi mu burere bubangamiwe bibandanya kuba ibibazo ngorabahizi. Ivyo ni ibishikirizwa na muganga Michel Yao ajejwe ibikorwa vy'ubutabazi ku rwego rwa Afrika mw'ishirahamwe OMS, igihe yavugana na BBC ejo ku wa Mungu. Avuga ko muri ino minsi hibonekeje abantu bake cane banduye uwo mugera. Ati: "Twari dufise uburere bw'ubuvuzi bbubangamiwe bushika 29. Ubu dufise uburere bw'ubuvuzi bubiri gusa bubangamiwe, kamwe muri bwo kamaze iminsi ine ata wanduye, akandi nako haheze iminsi 17". Avuga kandi ko igitigiri c'abandura ku ndwi "cagabanutse bimwe biboneka", akavuga ko ubu ku ndwi hashobora kuboneka hagati ya bane na batanu banduye uwo mugera. Muri kino gihe, hari abashika 1800 bakurikiranirwa hafi, bitandukanye no mu kwa kane kw'umwaka uheze aho babarirwa mu 20.000, ico kibaba ari ikimenyetso ko habaye intambwe, nk'uko bivugwa na bamwe mu bahinga mu vyo amagara y'abantu muri Congo. Abajijwe ko kutoba ari ukwihuta mu kuvuga ko habaye iterambere mu kurwanya ico kiza, siko abibona, akavuga ko ibiharuro vyonyene arivyo bivyerekana.

headline: France: Benzema ntazokinira igikombe c'isi kubera igikomere co kw'itako
text: U﻿mukinyi w'imbere w'Ubufaransa ntazoja mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi ca 2022 muri Qatar inyuma yo gukomereka kw'itako ari mu myimenyerezo. B﻿enzema yatsindiye 'Ballon d'Or' ya 2022, agashimwe gahabwa umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi buri mwaka mu mupira w'amaguru, inyuma yo gufasha umugwi wiwe wa Real Madrid gutwara igikombe c'imigwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo n'ico ihiganwa ryo muri Espagne, La Liga. U﻿mugwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubufaransa uvuga ko yagize ikibazo kw'itako, ko hari igihe atoshobora kuja muri iryo higanwa. W﻿ongeyeko uti:"Umugwi wose usangiye umubabaro na Karimi kandi umwipfurije gukira vuba." I﻿shirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru ry'Ubufaransa rivuga ko ibipimo vyemeje ko yakomeretse kw'itako "bikaba bimusaba kumara indwi zitatu kugira atore mitende". U﻿bufaransa buri mu mugwi wa D, bukaba buzokina na Australia itariki 22 z'ukwezi kwa Munyonyo (11), na Danmark itariki 26 z'ukwezi kwa Munyonyo (11) hamwe rero na Tunisia itariki 30 z'uko kwezi nyene. U﻿mumenyereza mukuru Didier Deschamps afise gushika ku wa mbere ngo abe yatanze izina ry'uwumusubirira, kandi ikikomere ca Benzema w'imyaka 34, amaze gutsindira Ubufaransa ibitego 37 mu nkino 97, n'ikindi gihombo gikomeye kuri uwo mugwi waheruka gutwara ico gikombe c'isi. B﻿ari basanzwe badafise abakinyi bo hagati Paul Pogba na N'Golo Kante kubera gukomereka, aho ni mu gihe n'umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester United Raphael Varane ariko aragerageza kwimenyereza kugira azoshobore gukina inyuma yo kutagaragara mu nkino z'itanu z'umugwi wiwe. K﻿u musi wa gatatu, umukinyi w'imbere wa RB Leipzig Christopher Nkunku yarakuwe muri mu mugwi w'abazokina muri iryo higanwa inyuma yo gucumbagira bari mu myimenyerezo, aho haciye hahamagarwa umukinyi wa Frankfurt Randal Kolo Muani ngo amusubirire. U﻿mukinyi w'imbere wa Manchester United Anthony Martial n'umwe mu bashobora guhamagarwa kuza gusubirira Benzema, yari amaze imisi afise ikibazo co mw'itako kuva mu kwezi kwa cumi. U﻿wo mukinyi wa Real Madrid amaze gukinira uwo mugwi iminota idashika 30  mu nkino zitandatu ziheze. Y﻿aciye aja gupimwa inyuma y'imyimenyerezo yo ku wa gatandatu - Bwari bubaye ubwa mbere agize imyimenyerezo akayirangiza kuva abagize umugwi uzoja mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi bagiye hamwe bose mu ndwi iheze. D﻿eschamps yagize ati:"Ndatewe ikigongwe cane na Karim yari yagize intumbero nya mukuru iki gikombe c'isi. "﻿N'aho ibi bibaye, ndacafitiye icizere umugwi wanje. Tuzokora uko dushoboye kugira turangize igikorwa kitoroshe kiturindiriye."

headline: Amnesty International itewe impungenge n’umugambi w'ihungurwa ku nguvu ry’impunzi z’abarundi
text: Ishirahamwe Amnesty International rivuga ko ritewe impungenge n'umugambi w'ibihugu vya Tanzania n'u Burundi rivuga ko bigiye gutahukana ku nguvu impunzi z'abarundi ziri muri Tanzania. Mw'itangazo ryasohoye ejo ku wa gatanu, iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko ryaronse urwandiko rwo mw'ibanga rwerekana ko abashikiranganji b'intwaro zo hagati ba Tanzania n'u Burundi bumvikanye ko ico gikorwa bagitangura mu ndwi igira kabiri y'uku kwezi kw'icenda bakakirangiza ku wa 31 z'ukwezi kwa 12 uyu mwaka. Seif Magango icegera c'umukuru w'iryo shirahamwe ajejwe akarere ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko, ibiyaga binini n'ihembe rya Afrika ati: "Birababaje cane kubona leta ya Tanzania ishaka kurungika abantu batavyiyumvamwo ahantu ishirahamwe ONU rivuga ko ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu ribandanya kakaba akamizwe n'ingoma". Umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati w'u Burundi Pascal Barandagiye, yagiriza ishirahamwe HCR rijejwe impunzi kw'isi ko ridashaka guhungura impunzi ku nyugu zaryo. Mw'iryo tangazo, Amnesty International  ivuga ko abo bategetsi babiri bumvikanye ko bategerezwa kwihoza akamo katewe n'ishirahamwe HCR bakibandaniriza umugambi wabo w'uguhungura izo mpunzi. Isubiramwo ibiri muri urwo rwandiko ivuga, Amnesty International imenyesha ko bumvikanye bati: " N'aho HCR yokwerekana ko ishobora gufasha canke igashaka kudindiza umugambi, ibihugu bibiri bizobandanya uyu mugambi mpaka aba Barundi basubiye mu gihugu cabo". Bwana Magango ati: "Amaleta ya Tanzania n'u Burundi ategerezwa guhagarika vyihuta umugambi wabo w'uguhungura impunzi z'abarundi ku nguvu". "Mu gihe ibikorwa bikomeye vy'ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu  bibandanya, ni nkererwa ko imiryango yobandanya yuguruwe ku barundi bakiri mu gihugu, hamwe n'abo bandi bahunze". Asaba ko impande zose zitatu, Uburundi, Tanzania na HCR zokwumvikana ku buryo uwushaka guhunguka wese yotahukanwa ku gushaka kwiwe kandi bigakorwa mw'iteka n'itekane hisunzwe amasezerano mpuzamakungu. Uburundi buti 'HCR yishakira akazi' Ishirahamwe HCR rivuga ko ridashigikiye na gato ko impunzi zitahukanwa zitavyiyumvamwo. Rivuga ko ingene ibintu bimeze ubu mu Burundi  hataragera ko bahimiriza ko impunzi z'Abarundi zihunguka. Ku ruhande rwiwe, umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati w'u Burundi, Pascal Barandagiye, avuga ko kubona ishirahamwe HCR ridashaka ko impunzi zihunguka ari uko ryishakira akazi. Avugana n'abamenyeshamakuru ku wa 27 z'ukwezi kw'umunani i Bujumbura inyuma y'urugendo rwiwe mu makambi ya Nduta na Mtendeli ku wa 25 z'uko kwezi nyene, bwana Barandagiye yavuze ati: "Wonsigurira gute ingene impunzi iza kwiyandikisha mu nkambi ukamusubiza inyuma ngo ntakwije imyaka". "Urudandazwa rurimwo kubera ata mpunzi zihari bazoca bataha kuko nta kazi bosubira kuronka". "Ntidushobora kwemera abantu bagira urudandaza ku barundi bacu, uno munsi tubabwira tuti hagarika urwo rudandazwa, abarundi bacu turabatahana". Rachel Nicholson, umushakashatsi mw'ishirahamwe Amnesty International ku Burundi n'u Rwanda, avuga ko ivyo umushikiranganji yagirije ishirahamwe HCR bidafashe kuko ngo risanzwe rinafise ingorane, akavuga ko gushika mu mpera z'ukwezi kw'indwi ryahawe ibice 22 % ryamahera akenewe kugira rifashe impunzi z'abarundiu muri kano karere. Izo mpunzi zozo zisaba ko amakungu yofata mu minwe ikibazo cazo, zikavuga ko Tanzania ishaka kubirukana kuko ngo idakeneye "kubona umuntu wese yitwa Umurundi ku butaka bwayo". Amashirahamwe agera kw'13 atacemerewe gukorera ku butaka bw' Burundi yarandikye ishirahamwe HCR arisaba gukingira Abarundi bahungiye muri Tanzania, inyuma y'aho bumvitiye ko Uburundi na Tanzania bumvikanye kubahugura ku nguvu. Maitre Armel Niyongere arongoye ACAT rimwe muri ayo mashirahamwe, avuga ko basaba HCR ko yohanura Tanzania igahagarika uwo mugambi. Amenyesha ko bariko bategura kwitwarira leta ya Tanzania yagiriza ko iriko irenga ku masezerano mpuzamakungu yo mu mwaka wa 1951 agenga impunzi.

headline: DR Congo: Umunyamuziki General Defao yapfuye
text: Umunyamuziki rurangiranwa wo muri Repubulika ya Demokrasi ya Congo Lulendo Matumona azwi kw'izina rya General Defao yapfuye. Defao, yari afise imyaka 62, yapfiriye aho yari asanzwe arwariye mu bitaro vya Laquintinie i Douala, muri Cameroun ejo ku wa mbere. Uyu munyamuziki yavutse mu 1958 azwi mu ndirimbo n'intambo zaryoheye abakunzi b'umuziki batari bake. Abaririmvyi Ferre Gola na Fally Ipupa bari mu banyamuziki ba mbere batanze ubutumwa bw'akababaro, bavuga  ko uru rupfu ari uruhombo runini kuri Afrika. General Defao yavukiye i Kinshasa ku wa 31 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri 1958, akaba yatanguye kuririmba mu 1978 mu murwi wa Suka Movema. Yararirimvye mu gihe gito mu mirwi Fogo Stars na Somo West imbere y'uko yinjira muri  Grand Zaiko Wawa, mu nyuma akaba yagiye kwimukira mu murwi Choc Stars wari watangujwe mu 1983 n'abaririmvyi Ben Nyamabo hamwe na Bozi Boziana, ari naho yerekaniye ubuhinga bukomeye aranamenyekana cane. Defao yahavuye ava mu murwi Choc Stars mu mpera za 1990 aca atanguza umurwi Big Stars ari kumwe na Djo Poster. Hagati aho, ibintu ntivyagenze uko yavyipfuza, biba ngombwa ko arondera abandi baririmvyi Djo amaze kugenda. Defao yari yashitse muri Cameroun mu ndwi iheze akaba mbere yaragiye mu myimenyerezo y'igiteramo ciwe c'Umwaka Mushasha, ari naho yatanguye kwumva atameze neza, nk'uko amakuru ava i Douala abivuga. Defao yahavuye asimbanwa ku bitaro Laquintinie ari naho yahavuye asandabira.

headline: Thérèse Miburo, umwe mu Barundikazi bake bakora ivyo gutwenza aba muri Australia
text: Aho  igiteramo co gutwenza yariko araremesha muri Australia caboneka ku rubuga rwa Youtube, benshi ntibashobora kwemera ko ari umurundikazi ariko arakora ivyo bariko bararaba. Muri ico giteramo Thérèse Miburo agaragara ariko aratwenza abantu benshi bagizwe ahanini n'abazungu, abatera inkuru zimwerekeye we nyene canke zo mu buzima busanzwe. Avuga mu congereza cumvikana ko atari ic'uwavukiye muri Australia, ariko biboneka ko abo abwira ataco bibabwiye ahubwo bahimbawe. Mu nkuru ababwira zitwenza hari nk'aho agira ati: "... ndi uwo mu Burundi mu buseruko bwa Afrika. Mu Burundi usanga kenshi twishura ikibaza n'ikindi kibazo. Nk'akarorero ushobora kumbaza uti 'urashonje?' Nanje ngaca ngusubiza  nti 'ushaka kumpa ivyo kurya?'..." Abantu bagaca batwenga cane! Mu karere haba mu Rwanda canke mu Burundi, abakora umwuga wo gutwenza, bita stand up comedy mu congereza, baramaze kuba benshi. Nta nkeka ko no mu yandi makungu Abarundi n'Abanyarwanda bakora ivyo gutwenza bariyo, ariko ata gukekeranya abagore muri bo ni bake cane. Nico gituma BBC yashatse kumenya neza Therese Miburo uwo ariwe n'icatumye akunda ivyo gutwenza, tuvugana nawe tugirana ikiganiro gikurikira mu nyandiko: BBC Gahuza: Twibwire uwo uri we? Therese Miburo: NitwaThérèse Miburo, mfise imyaka 33, ndi Umurundikazi nkaba mba muri Australia. Amazina y'ubuhizi na yo ni Mukundabantu na Mutimukeye. Ndi umumararungu n'umuremesha kiyago. Nkunda abantu n'ubuntu mu bantu. BG: Washitse muri Australia ryari/gute? TM: Nashitse muri Australia muri 2007. Naje nk'impuzi mvuye mw'ikambi y'impunzi muri Tanzania. BG: Ufise umuryango? TM: Egome. Ndubatse mfise n'abana bane bakiri bato. BG: Ukora iki? TM: Mu buzima busanzwe ndi umwigisha w'ubuhinga bwa none (Information Technology) mu mashule yisumbuye ya hano muri Queensland, Australia aho nsanzwe mba. Ndi kandi umusiguzi w'indimi (Ikirundi, Igiswahili n'Icongereza). BG: Gutwenza abantu wabitanguye ryari? TM: Namye ntwenza ariko nkabikora mu muryango, sinari bwabishire ahabona. Mu 2019 ni ho natanguye kubishira ahabona; ntangura gusetsa abantu benshi no kubishira kuri Youtube na Facebook. BG: Ni iki catumye utangura kugira ivyo gutwenza ? TM: Ndakunda iyo mbona abantu banezerewe. Ndabikora kubera binezereza kubona nokora ibintu bigatuma abandi banezerwa. BG: Ubifata nk'umwuga canke ni uburyo bwo kwinezereza? TM: Muri uyu mwanya biracari ivyo kwinezereza ariko bishobora kuzoba n'umwuga muri kazoza ka hafi. BG: Ni abahe bakora umwuga wo gutwenza ufatariko urugero, yaba abo mu Burundi canke ayandi mahanga? TM: Buri muntu wese ndafise ico ndamwigirako ariko novuga nka Kigingi mu Burundi na Trevor Noah muri Afrika y'Epfo hari vyinshi ndabafatirako urugero, kimwe muri vyo ni uko atakidashoboka mu gihe ukora ivyo ukunda. BG: Muri iki gihe ca Covid-19 birakworohera kugira ivyo gutwenza? TM: Oya ntivyoroshe kuko abantu ntibemerewe gukoranira hamwe ari benshi. Ariko umwanya nokoresheje mu gutwenza abantu ndawukoresha mu kwandika ivyese nkabisangiza abandi kuri Youtube (Tereza Mukundabantu). BG: Ni iki wipfuza muri kazoza? TM: Muri kazoza ndipfuza kubandanya ibi vyo gutwenza abantu nshimikira cane cane mu ntumbero yo gukeburana. Ndipfuza kuzokoresha ibiteramo abantu bakaza bakanezerwa. Ndipfuza kandi no kuzofasha abakenyezi haba mu buryo no mu kubahimiriza gukoresha ingabirano zabo izo ari zo zose. Kanda ngaha urabe kimwe mu biteramo vya Tereza Mukundabantu kuri Youtube

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Mbappe, Laporte, Ndombele, Sarr, Duarte, De Jong, Diallo
text: Umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain umufaransa Kylian Mbappe w'imyaka 22 ari ku rutonde rw'abakinyi bashobora kuronderwa na Manchester Uniteds mu ci ry'umwaka uza. (ESPN) Manchester City yemeye kurekura Aymeric Laporte ku miriyoni zababa 82 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika mu gihe hogira umurwi woza urondera uyu mukinyi w'inyuma w'imyaka 27 akomoka muri Espagne. (Mail) Umukinyi wo hagati, umufaransa Tanguy Ndombele w'imyaka 24 yabwiye  Tottenham ko yipfuza kuva muri uwu murwi wiwe.  (The Athletic - subscription required) Mu misi mike iri imbere Chelsea izofata ingingo yo kurondera uwundi mukinyi wo hagati canke yo kuvyihoza, ni mu gihe umunya Espagne akinira Atletico Madrid  Saul Niguez w'imyaka 26 aboneka ko ari we ashobora kuronderwa.  (Fabrizio Romano via Twitter) Thomas Tuchel amenyereza aba Blues aripfuza cane umukinyi w'inyuma. Umufaransa Jules Kounde w'imyaka 22 akinira Sevilla hamwe na mugenziwe  Aurelien Tchouameni w'imyaka 21 wa Monaco ni bo bari ku rutonde rw''abashobora kuronderwa na Chelsea. (Mirror) Tottenham iri hafi yo kuronka umukinyi wo hagati wa Metz umunya Senegal Pape Matar Sarr, w'imyaka 18. (90min) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Granada umunya Portugal Domingos Duarte w'imyaka 26, na we nyene araronderwa na  Tottenham. (Express) Amakuru ava i Old Trafford avuga ko Manchester United ata mugambi ifise wo kugurisha canke gutiza umukinyi wayo wo ku ruhande umunya Pays de Galles Daniel James w'imyaka 23 muri rino ci. (The Athletic - subscription required) West Ham iiriko iraraba ko yogura umusatirizi wa  Sevilla umunya Hollande Luuk de Jong w'imyaka 30. (90min) Aba ba Hammers bavugwa kandi ko bariko bararondera umusatirizi w'umufaransa Mohamed Bayo w'imyaka 23 asanzwe akina muri Clermont, umurwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubufaransa, Ligue 1. (Le10Sport - in French) Umukinyi wo hagati, umudagi Leon Goretzka w'imyaka 26 yiteze guhagarika ibimuvugwako vy'uko ashobora kwimukira muri Manchester United aho yiteze gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha muri Bayern Munich. (Goal) Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umwongereza Nat Phillips w'imyaka 24 yiteze kuronka uruhusha rwo kuva muri Liverpool mu gihe hogira umurwi wemera kumugura ku miriyoni 20 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Liverpool Echo) Sheffield United ihanganye na  Atalanta yo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutariyano Serie A mu rugamba rwo kurondera ko Manchester United yoyitiza umunya Côte d'Ivoire akina ku ruhande Amad Diallo w'imyaka 19. (TuttoAtalanta, in Italian) Manchester United iri mu biganiro n'abaserukizi b'umukinyi wo hagati wa  Monaco  umufaransa Aurelien Tchouameni w'imyaka 21 kugira ngo irabe ko yomuronka muri rino ci. (Mirror) Umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu muri Manchester United  umwongereza Brandon Williams w'imyaka 20 avugwa ko yafashwe ibipimo ku wa gatanu  kugira yimukire muri Norwich . (Football Insider)

headline: Uganda irahakana kuba iriko irigisha abagwanya reta ya  Ethiopia
text: Igisirikare muri Uganda cabeshuje inkuru z’uko ico gihugu kriko kiragerageza guhungabanya Ethiopia mu guha inyigisho za gisisirikare no gushigikira umuhari wa  Tigray People’s Liberation Front, TPLF, uriko uragwanya reta ya Ethiopia kuva mu 2020. Izo nkuru ziboneka nk’izatanguye kuja ahabona mu kwezi kwa gatanu ku mbuga hwaniro za Ethiopia. Umuvugizi w’igisirikare ca Uganda Brigadier Felix Kulayigye yanditse kuri Twitter ku wa Mungu ko ibivugwa ko Uganda iriko iragerageza guhungabanya Ethiopia bitagira ishingiro na gato. Inkuru y’ido n’ido yasohotse ku ndwi iheze ku rubuga rwo muri Nouvelle Zelande (New Zealand) hamwe n’amazina y’abasirikare n’abandi bajejwe umutekano bakuru bavugwa ko ari bo bahagarariye ico gikowa muri district ya Masaka. Iyo nyandiko ivuga ko abasirikare 4000 b’aba-Tigray bari guhabwa ivyo vyigwa mu bibanza bine bitandukanye. Iyo nkuru ivuga kandi ko ico gikorwa co kwigisha gishigikiwe na reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika na Misiri. Umwe mu bantu bakomeye avugwa muri iyo nkuru n’umuhungu w’umukuru w’igihugu ca Uganda, jenerari Muhoozi Kainerugaba, yanditse kuri twitter ko ashigikiye ingabo za Tigray, abita "abavukanyi" mu 2021. Ntibizwi niba iyo nyandiko ari iyo ukuri, kandi urwo rubuga rwo muri Nouvelle Zelande rwavuze ko rutashoboye guhinyuza isoko ryarwo canke ibirimwo. Ariko harimwo bimwe bimwe bidahuye n'ukuri. Haravugwamwo James Kabarebe nk'uwabaye umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi wa Uganda, ariko ico gihugu nta mushikiranganji yitwa gutyo cigeze kigira muri ico kibanza. Brigadier Kulayigye yanditse kandi kuri twitter ko ugufashanya kuvugwa hagati ya Uganda na Sudan y'Epfo muri ico gikorwa atari ukuri. Avuga ko uwuhagarariye Uganda muri Sudan y'Epfo, avugwa mu guhuza bimwe muri ico gikorwa, atigeze abonana n'umujenerari wo muri Sudan y'Epfo avugwa muri iyo nkuru. Ariko igihugu ca Uganda kirafise kahise ko kugira uruhara mu ntambara zo mu karere. Ubu ingabo zabwo ziri mu buseruko bwa Repuburika ya Demokrasi ya Congo no muri Somalia, kandi caragize uruhara mu gutabara reta ya Sudan y’Epfo igihe intambara yaduka muri ico gihugu mu 2013.

headline: Amatora ya US: Abarepubulika bisubije Inama nshingamateka
text: Abarepubulika baronse intebe igira 218 yari isigaye kugira ngo biganzire Inama nshingamateka inyuma y’indwi imwe habaye amatora yo hagati muri manda, nk’uko bitangazwa n’ikinyamakuru CBS News gikorana na BBC muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. N’aho ubwiganze bw’uyu mugambwe mu nama nshingamateka ari buto cane, burahagije kugira ngo uhagarike imigambi ya Perezida Joe Biden mu myaka ibiri iri imbere. Ariko aba-Democrats bazobandanya biganziye inama nkenguzamateka. Haracasigaye intebe nkeya zo guhiganira. Abarepubulika ntibavyifashemwo neza muri ano matora yabaye mu ndwi iheze, mu gihe bari bizeye ko bari gushobora kwiganzira inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka. Ariko ejo ku wa gatatu baratsindiye intebe bari bakeneye kugira biganzire inama nshingamateka igihe Mike Garcia asubiriye gutsindira intebe y’akarere ka 27 k’intara ya California. Ubu umugambwe w’Abarepubulika witeze gutsindira intebe hagati ya 218 na 223 muri ino nama nshingamateka igizwe n’abantu 435, nk’uko CBS ibitangaza. Ariko, mu gihe ivyavuye mu matora bitaramenyekana mu turere tutari duke, ubwiganze bwabo bushobora kutaboneka neza mu kiringo c’imisi canke amayinga. Kevin McCarthy yatowe ku wa kabiri n’abanywanyi basanzwe b’umugambwe w’Abarepubulika kugira ngo azosubirire umu-Democrat Nancy Pelosi nk’umukuru w’inama nshingamateka, yishimiye kubona inama nshingamateka ihindutse. Ku wa gatatu mw’ijoro, uyu mushingamateka wo muri California yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Abanyamerika bariteguriye inzira nshasha, kandi abashingamateka b’Abarepubulika bariteguye kubakorera”. Kugira ngo ashobore gutorwa nk’umukuru w’inama nshingamateka, uyu mukuru w’inkehwa z’abarepubulika ategerezwa gushigikirwa na benshi muri ino nama nshingamateka yose igizwe n’abashingamateka 435. Ariko umupfasoni Pelosi avuga ko adashobora kurekura uko nyene, aho mw’itangazo ry’ejo ku wa gatatu yavuze ko umugambwe wiwe uzotera “igitsure gikomeye bano ba Repubulika babasumba gato cane”. Umupfasoni Pelosi, umugore wa mbere yagenywe muri iki kibanza, ntavuga muri iryo tangazo nimba ategura kubandanya nk’umukuru w’inkehwa, mu gihe i Washington havugwa vyinshi kuri kazoza kiwe. Perezida Biden yakeje McCarthy amwemerera ko azokorana n’Abarepubulika ku nyungu z’Abanyamerika. Ati: "Nk’uko nabivuze mu ndwi iheze, kazoza ni keza ku buryo kadashobora kugwa mu mutego w’intambara”. "Abanyagihugu ba Amerika bakeneye ko tubakorera. Bakeneye ko twitaho ibibazo vyabo ngirakamaro no kubaha ubuzima bwiza”. Umugambwe wa McCarthy wari wizeye ko, kubona umukuru w’igihugu yari yataye icizere, ibiciro bibandanya biduga, vyari kubongerereza amajwi mu matora yo hagati muri manda. Donald Trump  yahoze arongoye igihugu hamwe na Mitch McConnell  arongoye inkehwa z’Abarepubulika mu nama nkenguzamateka nibo bagirizwa ko batumye umugambwe wabo utavyifatamwo neza. Ari iwe i Mar-a-Lago muri Florida, ku wa kabiri mw’ijoro, uyu yahoze ari umukuru w’igihugu yaratangaje ku mugaragaro ko azosubira kwitoza mu kibanza c’umukuru w’igihugu mu 2024. I Washington ejo ku wa gatatu, McConnell yasubiye kugenwa nk’umukuru w’inkehwa mu nama nkenguzamateka, maze abona kwikiza mugenziwe Rick Scott, umurepubulika wo muri Florida. Amajwi atari ay’abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka arabandanya ashika buke buke inyuma y’indwi irenga habaye amatora. Ejo ku wa gatatu, Karen Bass yaratsindiye ikibanza c’umukuru w’igisagara ca Los Angeles, igisagara kigira kabiri mu bunini muri Amerika, atsinze umutunzi ruhebwa Rick Caruso. Uyu mu-Democrat agiye kuba umugore wa mbere atsindiye iki kibanza hamwe kandi n’umwirabure agize kabiri arongoye iki gisagara.

headline: South Africa: Perezida Ramaphosa yatangaje ingingo ruhasha kubera Covid yasubiriye kugangura
text: Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa wa Afrika y'Epfo yatangaje izindi ngingo ruhasha nshasha za coronavirus, inyuma y'umusi umwe iki gihugu kirengeje umuriyoni w'abanduye Covid-19. Amakoraniro, yaba ayo mu mazu canke hanze, arabujijwe, uruja n'uruza rurabujijwe kuva isaha zitatu z'ijoro gushika isaha cumi na zibiri z'agatondo, kandi n'urudandazwa rw'inzoga rurabujijwe. Perezida Ramaphosa avuga ko igihugu kiri mu gihe kigoye cane rwose kubera iki kiza karanda, ko rero ari ngombwa gufata ingingo. Hari haciye imisi abategetsi batangaje ubwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus kandi ikwiragira ku rugero runini cane. Ibitaro n'ibigo vy'ubuvuzi bimwe bimwe bitangaza ko ibitigiri vy'abinjizwa ibitaro biduga cane, ibituma uburyo bwavyo bugenda bugabanuka. Mw'ijambo ryiwe yashikirije nijoro ku mboneshakure, Perezida Ramaphosa yavuze ko uwu mugera mushasha 501.V2 wamaze gushinga imizi muri Afrika y'Epfo, kandi ko bategerezwa "kumera magabo" kubera iyongerekana ry'abandura. Ati: "Twarijajajye ku mutekano wacu turasamara". Yongera ko y'uko izi ngingo zategarezwa kuja mu ngiro kuva isaha zitandatu z'ijoro nijoro nyene ku wa mbere gushika n'imiburiburi ku wa 15 z'ukwa mbere. Avuga ko amakoraniro y'abantu benshi, kiretse amaziko n'ayandi amwe amwe azogirirwa amahirwe, ategerezwa guhagarara, kandi ko ata muntu n'umwe yemerewe kuva muhira hagati y'isaha zitatu z'ijoro n'isaha cumi na zibiri z'igitondo ata ruhusha afise. Avuga kandi ko amaduka yose, ububare hamwe n'ibindi bibanza, bitegerezwa kwugarwa kuva isaha zibiri z'ijoro. Yongera ko y'uko urudandaza rwose rw'izoga rubujijwe, kandi ko uwuzofatwa atambaye agapfukamunwa mu bibanza bihuriramwo abantu benshi ashobora gucibwa iharabu canke agapfungwa. Ku wa Mungu, Afrika y'Epfo yabaye igihugu ca mbere muri Afrika kirengeje umuriyoni w'abanduye Covid-19, ikaba yaharurwamwo abanduye 1,004,413, hamwe na 26,735 bapfuye. Ubu bwoko bwa coronavirus bushasha, buzwi nka 501.V2, buzwi ko ari bwo buriko buratuma ibitigiri vy'abandura biduga ku rugero ruteye ubwoba. Yagiye gutorwa n'umurwi w'abahinga bo muri Afrika y'Epfo mu ntara ya Eastern Cape, ikaba yaciye ikwiragira ku muvuduko munini mu bindi bice vy'igihugu.

headline: Abajejwe amagara mu Burundi bemeje ko abantu babiri banduye coronavirus
text: Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara no kurwanya ikiza ca sida mu Burundi yatangaje ko mu gihugu ku nshuro ya mbere habonetse abantu banduye umugera corona. Umushikiranga Dr Thaddée Ndikumana yavuze ko abo banduye ari abantu babiri, u Burundi bukaba bwari mu bihugu bike bitari bwagaragaremwo uwanduye coronavirus. Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru kuri uyu mugoroba wo ku wa kabiri, umushikiranganji Ndikumana amenyesha ko ari abagabo b'imyaka 56 na 42. Ngo binjiye mu Burundi bava mu Rwanda n'i Dubai, bose bakaba ari Abarundi. Amakuru y'uko hoba hari abanduye coronavirus mu Burundi yavugwa, hakaba mbere n'abagiriza leta kubinyegeza. Umuvugizi w'umukuru w'igihugu c'u Burundi yaheruka kubwira BBC ko u Burundi burinzwe n'Imana, ari yo mpamvu ico kiza kitari bwahashike. Ivyo vyatumye hari amashirahamwe yiyamiriza ingene u Burundi bufata ikibazo ca coronavirus, akavuga ko bugifata minenerwe. Gushika ubu mu Burundi nta mategeko abuza abantu gusohoka yari bwafatwe nk'uko biri mu bihugu bibanyi, kiretse gusa kubaha impanuro zo kugira isuku. Ingendo z'indege zarabujijwe ikiringo c'iminsi cumi n'ine, imbibe nazo zikaba zugaye ku ruja n'uruza rusanzwe. Gushika ubu Afrika niyo irangwamwo abanduye coronavirus bake ugereranije n'iyindi migabane, ariko abajejwe ivy'amagara ku rwego mpuzamakungu bavuga ko abandura n'abapfa kuri uwo mugabane bagenda bariyongera.

headline: Ibibazo vyanyu kuri Coronavirus: Yoba ifitanye isano n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere?
text: Muganga Leonard Nduwayo akorera mu Bufaransa arasubiza ikibazo ca Shema Olivier, abaza ati "mbe Covid-19 yoba ifitaniye isano n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere?"

headline: Burundi: Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko ata muntu n'umwe aburirwa irengero mu gihugu
text: Perezida w'Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko mu gihugu ata muntu n'umwe aburirwa irengero, ko ahubwo abahagarikwa ari inkozi z'ikibi. Yabivuze mu kiganiro yahaye iradiyo y'Abafaransa RFI, mu rugendo aheruka kugira muri Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo. Abivuze mu gihe umugambwe CNL ubandanya uvuga ko abanywanyi bawo, harimwo n'indongozi zawo bagenda baburirwa irengero, ukavuga ko rimwe na rimwe bahagarikwa n'abambaye impuzu z'abajejwe umutekano, canke bahagarikwa n'abatabifitiye uburenganzira. Ngomirakiza Elie arongoye CNL muri komine Mutimbuzi y'intara ya Bujumbura yabuze kuva ku wa 09 z'uku kw'indwi, umuvugizi wa CNL yabwiye BBC ko baronse amakuru ko yoba yarishwe. Perezida Ndayishimiye we yabwiye RFI ko hari ikibazo c'uko inkozi z'ibibi zinyegeza inyuma y'imigambwe. Ati "Iyo umuntu ari inkozi y'ikibi, ni inkozi y'ikibi, nta mugambwe igira. "Ahubwo bari bakwiye kuvuga bati 'urya yarahagaritswe, none ni ukubera poritike canke ni inkozi y'ikibi'?" "Ico dukora ni ugukurikiza amategeko. Nimba uri inkozi y'ikibi dufise uburenganzira bwo gukingira abanyagihugu, gukurikirana no gushengeza inkozi z'ibibi". Perezida Ndayishimiye ntiyemera ko hari ababurwa irengero, akavuga ko ahubwo hari abaheza gukora ivyaha bagaca bahungira mu gihugu kibanyi c'u Rwanda. Ati: "Ku vyo nzi, nta muntu aburirwa irengero mu Burundi. Canke naho umpe izina rimwe gusa ry'umuntu yoba yarabuzwe irengero". "Ico nzi kindi gusa ni uko hari inkozi z'ibibi iyo bahejeje gukora icaha baca baja mu Rwanda, kandi nta burenganzira dufise bwo kuja kubahiga mu Rwanda". Atanga akarorero k'inkozi z'ikibi 19 avuga ko bateye umuryango bakica abantu mu ntara ya Kayanza, akavuga ko baciye bahungira mu Rwanda kandi ko gushika ubu ari yo bakiri. Ati: "Abantu bavuga ko baburiwe irengero, ariko ndazi ko bari ahantu". Ubutegetsi bw'u Rwanda ntaco buratangaza ku vyashikirijwe na Perezida Ndayishimiye yari ahejeje kubwira umumenyeshamakuru wa RFI ko imigenderanire hagati y'Uburundi n'u Rwanda iriko iramera neza.

headline: Idrissa Gueye yanse gukina yambaye impuzu ya PSG ishigikira aba LGBTQ+
text: Umukinyi wa Paris St-Germain Idrissa Gueye yanse gukina mu kwanka kwambara impuzu iriko ikimenyetso c'umunywamazi mu ntumbero yo gushigikira uburengenzira bw'aba LGBTQ+ nk'uko BBC yashoboye kubimenya. Uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 32 yahoze akina hagati muri Aston Villa na Everton ntiyari mu rukino rwo ku wagatandatu batsinzemwo Montpellier ibitego 4-0. Umumenyereza wa PSG Mauricio Pochettino yavuze gusa ko Gueye atakinye ku "mpamvu ziwe bwite". Bivugwa ko ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bufaransa (FFF) ryandikiye Gueye kugira asigure impamvu atakinye. BBC Sport yegereye abahagarariye inyungu za Gueye kuri ico kibazo. Umukinyi wa Crystal Palace Cheikhou Kouyate n'uwa Watford, Ismaila Sarr barungitse ubutumwa ku mbuga hwaniro mu cabonetse nko gushigikira mugenzi wabo. Kouyate yashize ifoto kuri Instagram ari kumwe na Gueye, yanditseko ngo "umugabo nyawe".  Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Watford yashizeko ifoto yiwe na Gueye ayikurikiza ibimenyetso vy'imitima aca yandikako ngo "100%". Mu kwishura ku butumwa bwa Sarr, Watford yashimangiye ku bunganangane no ku budasa, yongerako iti "ibi bikaba birimwo n'ubushake bwo kwigisha no guhanura uwo ari we wese mu bakozi babo". Kugiriranira imigenderanire ishingiye ku gitsina n'abo mugisangiye ntibirekuwe muri Senegal, kandi birahanishwa igipfungo co gushika ku myaka itanu. Ku mwaka ugira kabiri yikurikiranya, imigwi yo mu Bufaransa yarahamagariwe guhimbaza itariki ya 17 z'ukwezi kwa gatanu wahariwe kugwanya ikumira ry'abafitaniye ubucuti bufatiye ku gitsina kandi bagisangiye, mu kwambara impuzu ziriko inomero zanditse mu mabara y'umunywamazi mu mugongo. Uretse kudakina urukino rwo ku wa gatandatu batsinzemwo Montpellier, Gueye, yashitse muri PSG mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 2019 aguzwe imiliyoni 30 z'ama Euro, yaranasivye urukino nk'urwo mu mwaka uheze avuga ko agwaye mu nda, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru ca Le Parisien, ryavuze ubwa mbere icatumye adakina. Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru rya AFP rivuga ko ku musi wa gatatu ryabonye ikete rivuye mu kanama kajejwe kugenzura inyifato mw'ishirahamwe FFF risaba Gueye kwisigura impamvu atakinye mu rukino rwo ku wa gatandatu. Iryo kete, nk'uko AFP ivuga, rimuhamagarira "gusaba ikigongwe ku mugaragaro", canke avuge ko ivyo  bivugwa ku mpamvu yanse gukina ko "ata shingiro bifise". Bivugwa ko iryo kete ryongeyeko ko nimba yaranse gukina bishobora gufatwa " nk'inyifato y'ikumira". PSG yavuze ku musi wa gatatu ko "bishimira kwambara izo mpuzu". Yongeyeko:"Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru, ku musi wa gatandatu  bari ku kibuga baranerekana ishaka ryo kugwanya ikumirwa ry'abafitaniye ubucuti bushingiye ku gitsina bagisangiye hamwe n'irindi kumira iryo ari ryo ryose." Inyifato ya Gueye yarashigikiwe n'ibihangange muri politike mu gihugu ca Senegal. Prezida w'ico gihugu Macky Sall yanditse kuri Twitter ko ukwemera kwa Gueye nk'umu Islam gutegerezwa kwubahirizwa, mu gihe umushikiranganji wo kwinonora imitsi na we Matar Ba yanditse ko Gueye ashigikiwe n'abanye Senegal aho yashizeko ifoto y'uyo mukinyi wo hagati ari mu rugendo rweranda ima Maka.

headline: Evariste Ndayishimiye yizeza Abarundi ko azoshinga leta yumviriza bose
text: Mw' ijambo ryiwe rya mbere nk'umukuru  igihugu inyuma  yo kurahira, Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze ko aje gushinga leta mvyeyi, itunganyiriza kandi yumviriza bose, ahimiriza Abarundi bahunze gutahuka, mbere akizeza umubano n'amahanga ariko ushingiye ku kwubahana. Bwana Ndayishimiye yijeje ukwishira n'ukwizana kwa bose no gukingira agateka ka buri wese. Agira ati: "Ntimugire ubwoba ndazi ibindindiriye…Kugira nemere ko Uburundi bwikukiye koko ni uko Umurundi wese agira ijambo. Ndayishimiye: 'Gushika ubu ntituramenya inguvu ziwe' - Filip Reytjens Menya 'Neva', umujenerali 'aciye bugufi' agiye gutwara Uburundi "Kugira ijambo ariko si ukuja mu mpari canke kugumuka mu mabarabarara, ivyo bavyita kwiha ijambo kandi mu mico y'ikirundi kirazira,  Abarundi bahana ijambo bakaganira". Bwana Ndayishimiye yasavye ko ata mahanga yosubira kwivanga mu biraba Abarundi ngo abaronderera ibiganiro na leta, ahubwo bo boja bitura leta bonyene. Ati: "Abashaka ibiganiro n'ejo baratonda ariko bibuke umwibutsa ngo 'tuyaga dukora, dukora tuyaga'". Yijeje Abarundi bose abari mu gihugu n'impunzi kugira ijambo mu gihugu. Ati: "Guhera ubu ivy'ingimba nibihagarare…None abagiye kuturega mu makungu bageze kuki? Nibagaruke nyabuna bareke kwiha amenyo y'abatwenzi". Yijeje impinduka mu butegetsi, avuga ko abanyagihugu badategerezwa kwumva ko abanyepolitiki aribo babashikirayo. Ati: "Ntihagire uwiyumvira ko hari uwishikirayo kurusha uwundi, Abarundi bose barangana imbere y'amategeko natwe turi ng'aha guhagararira ayo mategeko". Yavuze ko hagiye kungenwa indongozi zo gutunganiriza abenegihugu, ngo "ntihagire Abarundi bagwa mu mutwego w'abanyepolitikie ngo ejo niwe azonshikana aho nifuza". Ati: "Ndabamenyesheje ko uba mu mugambwe canke utawubamwo, ufise uburenganzira bwo kugira uruhara mw'itunganywa ry'ibikorwa vy'igihugu, haba mu burongozi canke mu bikorwa ivyo ari vyo vyose". Bwana Ndayishimiye avuga ko imvugo 'imigambwe itavuga rumwe na leta' itosubira kuronka ikibanza mu Burundi. Ati: "Utavuze rumwe na leta y'Uburundi wovuga ururimi rw'iyihe leta?". Yagabishije ko ibimenyeshamakuru n'imiryango iharanira agateka ka zina muntu itazokwipfuza kwegera leta ngo baganire "izoba ifise uwundi shebuja".
