Mu migambi y'imibereho myiza y'abanyagihugu, yijeje abakukuruke ko bagiye kuja bavuzwa ku buntu banaronswe agashahara kangana n'imiburiburi n'ako bahora baronka bakiri ku kazi Yijeje ko hazokwubakwa ibitaro muri buri komine eka no kwitwararika umwimbu w'uburimyi "ntube gusa uwo gufungura gusa ahubwo kudandaza" Yavuze ko yafashe vyiza mu migambi y'abo bahiganwa mu matora, ko mbere azobahamagara ngo yumve ivyo yoranguranana nabo ku neza y'Abarundi. Bwana Ndayishimiye yavuze ko amakungu akwiriye kumenya ko Uburundi ari igihugu gifise ivyo gikeneye ariko naco gifise ivyo gitanga. Yaneguye inyifato y'ibihugu vy'igihagararo vyafatiye ingingo z'ibihano u Burundi, avuga ko ivyo leta yabivanyemwo icigwa co kwongereza umwimbu w'igihugu. Yagize ati: "Hatariho imigenderanire ishimikiye ku kwubahana, kwuzuzanya… ivyo twokora vyose mu vyo gufashanaya mw' iterambere vyoguma bigoye". Bwana Ndayishimiye yashimye imigenderanire n'imikorere y'amashirahamwe ahuza ibihugu vy'akarere, eka akengurukira ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Afrika ku kwugurura isoko rusangi ry'umwimbu w'Abanyafrika. Ati: "Natwe ivyo dukora vyose dukeneye  gukorana n'amakungu mu bisata bitandukanye.. .ivyo tutumva kumwe ntivyotorerwa umuti mu gukoresha igihagararo, ibiganiro niyo nzira yonyene yo gutahurana no guhanurana". "Imigenderanire twipfuza ni uko ata bihugu vyoza biriyitirira amakungu, kugira ngo bikumire ibindi no kubifatira ingingo z'agahotoro". Asaba ibihugu vya Afrika kwirinda inyosha mbi zobaryanisha na benewabo. "Ku bwacu twifuza kubonana nk'Abanyafrika aho kuba abanyamahanga, tukugurura amaremba, tukubaka amabarabara adufatanya". Bwana Ndayishimiye yasavye amakungu kudafasha Abarundi bafise imigambi yo gusambura Uburundi. Ati: "Dusavye ibihugu bibanyi kuba abazimyamuriro koko 'kuko umugabo umumwera ubwanwa bwaca akakumwera ubundi', tubasavye rero kuba abazimyamuriro". Bwana Ndayishimiye yavuze ko bashimira Imana ko abantu benshi batarafatwa n'ico kiza ko na bamwe mu bafashwe bamaze gukira. Ati: "Turasaba Abarundi gufata ingamba zose zishoboka ngo ntihagire uwusubira kwandukira ico kiza".

headline: Dolly Parton: ‘Nivyo, ubuzima bw’abirabure ni kirumara”
text: Umunyamuziki rurangiranwa wo mu mudiho wa country music, Dolly Parton, nawe yifatanije n'abandi mu gushigikira isekeza Black Lives Matter (ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara), mu gihe yariko ashikiriza aho ahagaze ku bijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu, ibidakunze kuba. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru c'utugenegene Billboard ati: "Mbega burya wibaza ko aba bazungu bacu ari bo bonyene bafise akamaro? Oya". Uyu muririmvyi aasanzwe afise  abakunzi mu mpande zose, asanzwe adakunda kugira ivyo avuga ku bijanye na politike. Aya majambo yiwe aje mu gihe igihugu cose kiri mu bihe bidasanzwe mu bijanye n'umubaho hagati y'abadasangiye ubwoko vyagize ingaruka mu bice vyose vy'ubuzima muri Amerika, harimwo na country music. N'aho umupfasoni Parton atashoboye kuja mu myiyerekano muri rya sekeza rya Blakc Lives Matter, avuga ko ashigikiye uburenganzira bw'abiyamiriza ivanguramoko rishingiye ku rukoba. Yabwiye ico kinyamakuru ati: "Ndatahura neza ko ari uburenganzira bw'abantu guserura akari ku mutima no kwumvirizwa". Urupfu rwa wa mwirabure George Floyd hamwe n'imyiyerekano yaciye ikurikira vyaragize ingaruka mbi mu bisata bitandukanye, haba mu nkino canke no mu muziki, ivyatumye abanyamuziki bamwe baja muri iyo myiyerekano, abandi nabo biba ngombwa ko basubiramwo bakihweza ibijanye n'imigenderanire yabo n'abandi badasangiye urukoba. Perezida Donald Trump wewe abona ukundi iyo myiyerekano, aho afata abari muri yo nk'abagumutsi, mbere yiyamiriza bikomeye abari bafashe ingingo yo gupfukama igihe ururirimbo rw'igihugu ruriko ruraririmbwa mu kwerekana akababaro kabo. Umupfasoni Parton yashikirije ayo majambo mu gihe imyiyamamazo mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu yimirije yashushe, ingendo itandukanye n'iyo yari afise mu myaka ine iheze aho  yirinda cane kunegura Bwana Trump igihe yahiganwa na Hillary Clinton. Eka no mu 2017 yashimye kutagira ico avuze mu gihe we na bagenziwe Emmys, Lily Tomlin na Jane Fonda bari mu giteramo, aho aba bandi bobo bafashe akanya ko kwiyamiriza Perezida Trump. Ubu bwa vuba naho ati: "None nimba wanka urunuka umukuru w'igihugu, kubera iki tutomusengera?" Sibwo bwa mbere uyu muririmvyi w'imyaka 74 - aboneka nk'umwe mu bashigikiye abagore bagendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vy'ukwigenga (feministes) akaba kandi anashigikiye abahuza ibitsina babisangiye - ashigikira abipfuza ko ibintu bihinduka. Mu 2014, yarashigikiye abubakana badahuje ibitsina, umwaka umwe imbere y'uko itegeko ribirekura mu gihugu cose. Hagati aho, ariyubara cane muvyo ashikiriza mu ntumbero yo kwirinda uko bishoboka kugira uwo ababaje, akenshi akama ahanura abantu "kwirinda gucira abandi imanza kugira ngo nabo ntibahave bacirwa izindi".

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Mbappe, Damsgaard, Kounde, Vlasic, Icardi, Sabitzer
text: Mu gihe ikiringo c'igura n'igurisha ry'abakinyi kiri hafi kurangira, Liverpool, Leeds na Aston Villa ishobora kuba iriko irarondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Sampdoria umunya Danemark Mikkel Damsgaard, ariko Tottenham yoyo ikaba yarakuye akarenge mu rugamba rwo kurondera uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 21 yakoreye ibikomeye cane igihugu ciwe mu mahiganwa aheruka ya Euro 2020. (La Repubblica via Sport Witness) Paris St-Germain ntirashobora kwishura umurwi wa Real Madrid uriko urarondera umusatirizi w'umufaransa Kylian Mbappe, 22, uyu musi wa mbere ukaba ari wo musi ntarengwa washinzwe n'uyu murwi wo muri La Liga kugira ngo PSG iwemerere canke iwuhakanire. (Marca) Sevilla ntirota yemera amafaranga y'ama euros ari musi y'imiriyoni 80 ku barondera umukinyi w'inyuma, umufaransa Jules Kounde. Chelsea niyo iriko irarondera uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 22 inyuma y'aho igurishirije mugenziwe bakinana mu murwi nserukiragihugu Kurt Zouma, 26, muri West Ham. (Marca - in Spanish) Juventus nta nteguro ifise yo kurondera Sergio Aguero, 33, Eden Hazard, 30, canke Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, 32, kugira isubirize Cristiano Ronaldo. (Fabrizio Romano) West Ham iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano yo kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa CSKA Moscow umunya Croatia Nikola Vlasic, 23 ku miliyoni zababa 34 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Guardian) Aston Villa iriko irategura amafaranga agera ku miriyoni zababa 20 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi wo hagati wa  Liverpool umwongereza  Curtis Jones, 20, atarashobora kuronka akaryo ko gukinira aba Reds  mw'ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka. (Sun) Tottenham iriko irarondera abandi bakinyi babiri imbere y'uko ikiringo c'igura n'igurisha ry'abakinyi kirangira, uwuri kw'isonga ry'abaronderwa  akaba ari umukinyi w'inyuma wa Barcelona Emerson Royal, 22. (Express) Everton, Brighton, Leeds na Crystal Palace yose iri mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa  Manchester United umunya Pays de Galles/Wales Daniel James, 23, yahawe uburenganzira bwo kuva i Old Trafford mu gihe wa musatirizi wa Juventus umunya Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo, 36, arindiriwe n'igishika cinshi. (Star) Umugambi wa Manchester United wo gutiza  Feyenoord umukinyi wo ku ruhande Amad Diallo uboneka ko wahagaze inyuma y'aho uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 19 yanduriye imvune. (AD via Goal) Everton iri mu biganiro vyo kurondera umusatirizi w'umunya Venezuela Salomon Rondon,31, asanzwe akina mu murwi wo mu Bushinwa Dalian Professional.  Umumenyereza w'aba Toffees Rafael Benitez asanzwe amuzi kuko yamubereye umumenyereza mu Bushinwa no muri  Newcastle. (Sky Sports) Watford iri mu biganiro na  Birmingham kugira ngo uyu murwi wo mu cicaro ca kabiri (Championship ) mu Bwongereza urabe ko woyigurira kizigenza wayo Troy Deeney. (Athletic - subscription required) Torino iriko irarondera ko Leicester yoyitiza umukinyi wayo wo hagati umubirigi Dennis Praet, 27, atarashobora gukinishwa muri uno mwaka.  (Tuttomercatoweb, via Sport Witness) Juventus yiteguye kubandanya urugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Borussia Dortmund umubirigi Axel Witsel, 32, mu gihe umumenyereza Massimiliano Allegri ariko ararondera gukomeza uruhande rwo hagati rw'umurwi wiwe. (Sky Sport - in Italian) Uyu murwi wa Serie A ushobora kandi kurondera umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain umunya Argentine Mauro Icardi, 28, amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo 124 mu nkino  219 amaze gukina mu myaka itandatu amaze mu bakeba ba Juve, Inter Milan. (Tuttosport - in Italian) Bayern Munich yageze ku masezerano yo kugura umukinyi wo hagati Marcel Sabitzer, 27, wo mu murwi w'abakeba bayo muri Bundesliga, RB Leipzig,  ku miriyoni 16 z'ama euros. (Bild - in German)

headline: Umwambaro wa Ukraine mu nkino za Euro 2020 wateje uburakari Russia
text: Umwambaro mushasha w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Ukraine werekana ikarata iriko akarere ka Crimea/Crimée, wateje uburakari i Moscou. Ukraine yerekanye umwambaro wayo mu nkino z'ihiganwa ry'ibihugu vya Bulaya (Euro 2020), ucapuyeko imbibe z'iki gihugu ariko hariko akarere ka Crimea n'icivugo ngo "Ukraine ishimagizwe!" (Glory to Ukraine!) Mu 2014, Uburusiya bwigaruriye akarere ka Crimea kari gasanzwe ari intara ya Ukraine, bukaba bugafata nk'igice c'ubutaka bwabwo, ikintu ciyamirizwa n'amakungu. Umushingamateka w'Uburusiya yavuze ko iyi ngendo ari "agasotoro ka politike". Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Ukraine, Andriy Pavelko, yerekanye uwu mwambaro mw'ireresi yacishije ku rubuga rwa Facebook ejo ku wa Mungu, mu gihe hasigaye imisi mike ngo iri higanwa ritangure. Uruhande rw'imbere rw'agapira gasa n'umuhondo rwerekana imbibe za Ukraine zifise ibara ryera, harimwo na Crimea hamwe n'uturere dushaka kwiyonkora  twa Donetsk na Lugansk  dushigikiwe n'Uburusiya. Icivugo kiri ku ruhande rw'inyuma kivuga ngo "Ukraine ishimagizwe!" (Glory to Ukraine!) - Amajambo yo kwishongora mu kwerekana ingene bakunda igihugu cabo, akaba ari yo yaririmbwa mu gihe c'imyiyerekano yomoye umukuru w'igihugu yari ashigikiwe na Moscou, Viktor Yanukovych, mu 2014. Pavelko ati: "Twizeye ko iki gicapo ca Ukraine kizoha inguvu abakinyi kuko bazorwanira Ukraine yose". Ariko umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'Uburusiya bujejwe imigenderanire, Maria Zakharova ariyamiriza uwu mwambaro, akavuga ko umurwi w'umupira w'amaguru "wafatanije ubutaka bwa Ukraine na Crimea yegukira Uburusiya", ivyatumye haba "ukwihenda ku kintu kidashoboka". Avuga ko iki civugo cerekana urwanko kandi ko ari amajambo yakoreshwa n'Abanazi (abanywanyi w'umugambwe wa Adolph Hitler yahoze atwara Ubudagi, yagira ku vyiyumviro bikaze vy'amacakubiri) . Umushingamateka Dmitry Svishchev avuga ko aka gapira "kadashobora kwihanganirwa", aca asaba abateguye igihangwa rya Euro 2020 mw'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru i Buraya, Uefa, gufata ingingo. Iri higanwa ryari ryungurujwe kubera Covid-19 ryitezwe gutangura ku wa 11 z'uku kwa gatandatu rirangire ku wa 11 z'ukw'indwi mu bisagara 11 vyo mu bihugu bitandukanye, harimwo na Saint Petersburg mu Burusiya nyene izokwakira inkino zo mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma.

headline: Tigray: umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia yashitseyo kuva haduka intambara
text: Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopa yagendeye umugwa mukuru w'intara ya Tigray ku ncuro ya mbere kuva ategetse igisirikare c'igihugu gutera iyo ntara yari yigumuye. Abiy Ahmed yitavye inama ya mbere y'abajenama bashasha b'iyo ntara. Ku wa 29 z'ukwezi guheze, reta ya Ethiopia yatangaje ko intambar yari yadutse mu ntango z'uko kwezi hagati y'abarwanyi begukira umugambwe Tigray's People Liberation Party n'ingabo za reta yarangiye. Mu butumwa yacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy yavuze ko yabonanye kandi n'abakuru b'ingabo za reta ya Ethiopia muri ako karere. Yavuze kandi ko muri kino gihe hari ibikorwa vyo gusanura itumatumanako hamwe n'umuyagankuba vyari vyacitse kuva iyo ntambara yanduka. Uru rugendo rubaye haciye iminsi mike abonanye n'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Sudani ihaye indaro impunzi zishika 50.000 za Tigray zari zahungiyeyo kubera iyo ntambara. Umutegetsi wa Sudani yatangaje ko umushikiranganji wa mbere w'iki gihugu Abdalla Hamdok yari yiteguriye kuba umuhuza muri iyo ntambara. Ariko itangazo rya Abiy Ahmed ntiryigeze rivuga na kimwe kuri ibi bitangazwa na Sudani, arikoyavuze ko intumwa z'iki gihugu kibanyi zari zishigikiye ibikorwa vya gisirikare muri Tigray. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia yaramiriye kure akamo yatewe n'ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Afrika vyipfuza ko haba ibiganiro hagati ya reta ya Ethiopia n'abari barongoye intara ya Tigray.

headline: Korea ya Ruguru: war’uzi Kim Yo-jong, mushiki wa Perezida Kim Jung-un
text: Kim Jung-un afise mushikiwe muto, bakuranye no mu mashule, hanze ya Korea. Afatwa nk’ “ikinyegezwa” mu ngingo afata, kandi niwe nyene ubutegetsi iyo musaza wiwe atari hafi.

headline: Papa Bouba Diop yahoze akinira Senegal n'imirwi yo mu Bwongereza yapfuye ku myaka 42
text: Papa Bouba Diop yahoze akina hagati mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Senegal, be no mu mirwi ya Fulham na Portsmouth yapfuye afise imyaka 42. Diop yakinye inkino 129 mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza Premier League, mbere akaba yaranakiniye n'imirwi ya West Ham United na Birmingham City mu Bwongereza. Diop yarakiniye umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Senegal mw'igihanwa ry'igikombe c'isi mu 2002, akaba ari we yinjije igitsindo catumye iki gihugu gitsinda Ubufaransa 1-0. Fifa yanditse ku mbuga hwaniro iti: "Warabaye intwari mu gikombe c'isi, uzokwama uri intwari". Ubutumwa bw'umurwi Fulham yacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, buvuga ko uyu murwi "wababaye cane". Iki gihe Senegal ija muri rino higanwa ry'igikombe c'isi mu 2002, niho yashika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, Diop akaba yashoboye kwinjiza ibitsindo bibiri mu rukino rwo gukuranamwo rwayihuje na Uruguay, rukarangira ari 3-3. Yakiniye kandi Senegal mu mahiganwa ane y'igikombe ca Afrika, harimwo igihe Senegal irangiza ihiganwa ari iya kabiri mu 2002. Diop yasezeye mu mupira w'amaguru mu 2013. Diop yarafashije umurwi wa Portsmouth gutwara igikombe ca FA mu 2008, igihe wari usanzwe umenyerezwa na Harry Redknapp. Redknapp yabwiye iradiyo BBC Radio 5 Live ati: "Yari umuntu ameze neza cane". "Yambereye umuntu mwiza cane, umuntu w'imico ikomeye, yama anezerewe kandi yarangwa n'akamwemwe mu maso. Yari umuntu w'igihangange". "Nta mutima mubi yari afise. N'aho yaboneka ko umengo ateye ubwoba mu kibuga kuko yari afise igihagararo kinini, nta kabi kari muri we". "Nifatanije n'umuryango wiwe". Umukuru w'igihugu ca Senegal, Macky Sall,  avuga ko urupfu rwa Diop "ari incamugongo kuri Senegal", nayo Sadio Mane akina hagati muri Liverpool yanditse ku rubuga rwa Instagram ati: "Papa Bouba, Turababaye cane twumvise urupfu rwawe. Tukwemereye ko uzoguma mu mitima yacu n'aho ugiye utadusezeye".

headline: Burundi-CAN: Intamba z'abagore muri CAN 'tugiye guhura n'ibihugu bikomeye'
text: Umukuru w'igisata c'abagore mu rwego rujejwe umupira w'amaguru mu Burundi avuga ko bagiye gutumako abakinyi bari mu bihugu vyo hanze kugira baze gufasha mu mwiteguro wo kuja mu gice ca nyuma c'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Africa, CAN. Eugenie Kabura avuga ko hari abakinyi baziga mu Amerika, Ubufaransa na Swede. Madame Kabura yabwiye BBC Gahuzamiryango ko intsinzi ya 11-1 mu nkino zibiri na Djibouti yabahaye ''icigwa co kugira twitegure cane [...] kuko tugiye guhura n'ibihangange." Kuri Stade Urukundo i Ngozi kuri uyu wa mbere, urukino rwa kabiri na Djibouti rwarangiye ari 5-0 vy'Uburundi. Mu rwa mbere, Uburundi bwari bwatahukanye intsinzi ya 6-1. Ni ubwa mbere umugwi nserukira-gihugu w'Uburundi mu  gisata c'abagore mu mupira w'amaguru ushika mu gice ca nyuma c'ihiganwa rya  CAN; bagenzi babo b'abagabo bagishitsemwo mu 2019. Ico gikombe kizokinirwa uyu mwaka mu gihugu ca Maroc mu kwezi kw'indwi, ariko ingene imigwi izohura ntibiramenyekana. Eugenie Kabura avuga ko ati: "Umunezero... intsinzi ku gihugu cacu c'Uburundi, intsinzi ku bakenyezi n'abigeme b'igihugu c'Uburundi." Mu mugwi Uburundi bwarimwo, Intamba zarangije mu kibanza ca gatatu inyuma ya Maroc na Uganda inyuma y'aho Kenya yikuriyemwo imbere y'uko batana mu mitwe. Ibihugu 12 nivyo bizohiganirwa ico gikombe ca Afrika hagati y'itariki 2 na 23 z'ukwezi kwa Mukakaro/Nyakanga(ukwa 7). Imigwi ine izoshika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma ikazoca ironka amahirwe yo kuzoserukira Afrika mu gikombe c'isi kizobera muri Australia na Nouvelle Zelande mu mwaka uza. Eugenie Kabura avuga ko mu kwitegurira iryo higanwa rikomeye Intamba z'abagore zishitsemwo ubwa mbere, bagiye gutumako abakinyi bose bazi b'abarundikazi bakina mu bindi bihugu kugira baze kubafasha. Avuga ko no muri iyo ntsinzi ibashikanye ngaho, abakina mu migwi yo mu bindi bihugu bagize uruhara rukomeye. Harimwo batandatu bakina mu Rwanda, Ubwongereza na Tanzania. Mu rukino rwo ku wa mbere, Aniella Uwimana akina muri Tanzania yinjije ibitsindo bitatu. Ahandi baziga abikinyi ngo ni muri Amerika, Ubufaransa na Swede. Eugenie Kabura ati: "Kuja muri CAN si ikintu coroshe. Tugiye guhura n'ibihugu bikomakomeye. "Hariho aho tubona hadakinwa neza, tugiye kurondera abamenyereza babizi cane, kurondera ubumenyi [...] kugira umugwi uzohaguruke uja mu gihugu ca Maroc ari umugwi ukomeye kandi wizeza kugira vyiza." Inkino za kabiri zo gukuranamwo mu kurondera itike yo kuja muri CAN mu rwego rw'abagore: Izimaze gukinwa n'izitegekanijwe Ku wa mbere, 21/02 Ku wa kabiri, 22/02 Ku wa gatatu, 23/02

headline: Burundi: Vyinshi kuri kahise ka Pierre Buyoya yashengeye ku myaka 71
text: Majoro Petero Buyoya yashengeye ku myaka 71, yari mu basirikare bakuru b'icahoze ari igisirikare c'Uburundi kizwi nka FAB (Forces Armées Burundaises). Yashitse ubwa mbere ku butegetsi mu 1987, atembagaje ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Jean-Baptiste Bagaza na we nyene yari yashitse ku butegetsi abanje gutembagaza ubutegetsi bwa Michel Micombero mu 1976. Mu myaka itandatu ubutegetsi bwiwe bwamaze, bwibukirwa ku bintu bitari bike vyahinduye isura y'igihugu, nk'ubwicanyi bwa Ntega-Marangara mu 1988, amasezerano y'ubumwe bw'abarundi yemejwe mu 1991, umuzo w'intwaro ishingiye ku migambwe myinshi mu 1993, n'ibindi. Yagiye kuva ku butegetsi mu 1993 atsinzwe mu matora ya mbere ashingiye ku migambwe myinshi kuva mu myaka ya 1960. Ico gihe, Prezida Melchior Ndadaye wo mu mugambwe Frodebu ni we yatahukanye intsinzi y'amajwi arenga 65% na yo Pierre Buyoya yari yitoje kw'izina ry'umugambwe Uprona aronka amajwi yababa 33%. Buyoya yasubiye kugaruka ku butegetsi mu kwezi kw'indwi 1996, asubiriye kandi gutembagaza ubutegetsi bwa Prezida mfatakibanza Sylvestre Ntibantunganya, uyu na we akaba yari yasubiriye Cyprien Ntaryamira yaheruka guhitanwa n'isanganya ry'indege i Kigali mu Rwanda ari kumwe na mugenzi we Gen Juvénal Habyarimana. Prezida Ntaryamira yari amaze amezi abiri ashikirijwe ayo mabanga, inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Prezida Ndadaye. Igandagurwa rya Prezida Ndadaye ryatumye igihugu cinjira mu ntambara yari ifise isura y'ubwoko, hagati y'abahutu n'abatutsi. Vyabaye ngombwa ko Perezida Buyoya aganira n'abariko bararwanya reta, mu biganiro vyamaze imyaka ibiri kuva mu 1998 gushika bashike ku masezerano y'amahoro yateweko igikumu mu kwezi kw'umunani 2000. Kuva ico gihe, Prezida Buyoya yaciye yemezwa kurongora igice ca mbere c'intwaro mfatakibanza categekanywa n'amasezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha, maze aza kuva ku butegetsi mu 2003 abishije Prezida Domitien Ndayizeye. Amaze kuva ku butegetsi inyuma y'amasezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha, Buyoya yari afise ikibanza mu nama nkenguzamateka ubuzima bwiwe bwose nk'uko vyategekanywa n'amasezerano ya Arusha. Mu mwaka wa 2008, yagenwe kurongora umurwi w'intumwa za ONU zari zirungitswe muri Tchad mu ntumbero yo gutorera umuti icuka kibi cari hagati y'ico gihugu n'igihugu kibanyi ca Sudani. Mu kwa mbere 2013, niho Prezida Buyoya yasubira akagenwa n'umuryango w'Ubumwe bwa Afrika kuwuserukira nk'intumwa idasanzwe muri Mali no mu karere ka Sahel. Mu 2014, yashatse kwitoza ngo arongore ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu bivuga ururimi rw'igifaransa, kandi ico gihe reta y'Uburundi yaramushigikiye kuko imigenderanire yari ikiri myiza. Ibintu vyagiye guhinduka kuva mu 2015, igihe haduka mu Burundi indyane za politike zishingiye ku ngingo y'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu, nyakwigendera Perezida Petero Nkurunziza, yo kwitoreza ikiringo kigira gatatu c'umukuru w'igihugu. Ico gihe, abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bavuga ko giteye kubiri n'amategeko, ariko Perezida Nkurunziza n'umugambwe wiwe CNDD-FDD, bobo bavuga ko ico kiringo cubahirije ibwirizwa shingiro. Kuri ico kiringo Buyoya yari yavuze ko amasezerano ya Arusha atomoye, ko ibiringo ari bibiri gusa. Kuva ico gihe, imigenderanire hagati yiwe n'ubutegetsi yaciye itosekara, akaba atasubiriye guhonyoza ikirenge mu Burundi. Mu mpera z'umwaka wa 2018, Buyoya yashizwe ku rutonde rw'abantu 17 baronderwa n'ubutungane bw'Uburundi bagirizwa kugira uruhara mw'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye. Buyoya ntavyo yari yiteze kuko yabona ko amasezerano ya Arusha amukingira, aho yamenyesha ko ikibazo c'iyicwa rya Ndadaye gitegerezwa gutorerwa inyishu biciye mu murwi wo kumenya ukuri no kurekuriranira.  Wewe rero yabona ko rwari urubanza rushingiye kuri politike. Mbere yaranagabishije ko rushobora gutuma hasubira kwaduka amacakubiri y'amoko mu gihugu. Ivyo ntivyabujije ubutungane bw'Uburundi kumucira umunyorororo wo guherayo, mu kwezi kw'icumi, we n'abo bagirizwa hamwe urupfu rwa Prezida Melchior Ndadaye. Buyoya n'abo bari kumwe bavuga ko bunguruje urubanza.

headline: Africa mu mafoto muri iyi ndwi: Itariki 1-7 z'ukwa cumi 2021
text: Amafoto yatoranijwe meza yo muri Afrika hamwe n'ahandi. Amafoto yose arafise uburenganzira bwo gukoreshwa.

headline: Syllart Records: Kuki uno mugore yegeranije umuziki ny’Africa wa kera?
text: Syllart Records, ni ikigo cashinzwe i Paris n’Umunyafrika yitwa Ibrahima Sylla. Yatanguye kwegeranya izari ziharawe kuva mu 1978. Naho atakiriho, iyo nzu ni urwego rw’umuziki kuko “abanyamuziki ni ikiraro c’imico hagati y’abimukira be n’imico bavamwo”. Umukobwa wiwe yanatubwiye n’ibindi bikomeye.

headline: Burundi: Umugambwe CNL waronse amakuru ko Ngomirakiza Elie yagandaguwe
text: Umugambwe CNL utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi mu Burundi uvuga ko uwari awurongoye muri commune Mutimbuzi mu ntara ya Bujumbura yoba yaragandaguwe. Itangazo rya CNL rivuga ko Ngomirakiza Elie yahagaritswe ku wa 09 z'uku kw'indwi n'abantu bambaye impuzu za gisirikare bari muduga ufise plaque A 031A utwarwa ahantu hatazwi gushika ubu. Uyu mugambwe uvuga ko wituye ubutegetsi, abarongoye igisirikare n'igiporisi hamwe n'umurwi ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu, ariko ubu wumva ko Manirakiza yoba yaragandaguwe. BBC yagerageje kuvugana n'umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bujejwe umutekano, n'umukuru w'umurwi w'igihugu ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu, ariko ntibishuye. Térence Manirambona avugira CNL yabwiye BBC ko bababajwe n'uko abo bituye bose baciye binumira, baca babona ko amakuru y'igandagurwa ryiwe yoba ari yo. CNL ni umugambwe wafashe ikibanza ca kabiri mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu n'abashingamateka aheruka mu mwaka uheze mu Burundi. CNL ivuga ko itewe impungenge n'ihagarikwa ry'agasakisaki ry'abanywanyi bawo mu gihugu cose, ivuga ko rimwe na rimwe bikorwa n'abatabifitiye uruhusha bikavamwo inyuruzwa. Manirambona avuga ko ivyo kubafatira abanywanyi babo vyatanguye n'imbere y'amatora, bikabandanya n'ubu bikaba bikibandanya. Ati: "Twebwe tukavuga turi 'kubera iki abantu baguma bicwa kakaba akamizwe n'ingoma? Kubera iki abantu baguma banyuruzwa kakaba akamizwe n'ingoma'?" Bikorwa na bande ko bamwe bafatwa n'inzego z'igihugu, ko bamwe banyuruzwa ahantu havugwa ko inzego z'umutekano zikora ijoro n'umutaga? "Kubera iki ? Kubera iki inzego zibijejwe zidakora amatohoza ngo zerekane ziti 'abakora ibi ni ba naka', kugira ngo tumenye abariko baracafuza igihugu?" Manirambona abona ko umutekano w'abanywanyi babo utifashe neza mu gihugu, kuko banaburagizwa kugira inama mu ngoro zabo. Ati: "Burya umutekano si ukwicwa canke uguhunga gusa, ni ico kintu cose gituma umuntu yumva ko adatekaniwe neza. Muri kino gihe rero, turabona y'uko ivyaba mu misi yahera n'ubu biracahari. "Inzego z'igihugu rero ni zihaguruke, zive mu gacerere, zitubwire neza ibiriko biraba muri kino gihe, boye kwama baririmba amahoro, baririmba iterambere kandi twumva ko hari ibintu bitameze neza biguma bicapfuza ishusho y'igihugu". Mu gihe uwu mugambwe uvuga ko abanywanyi bawo babandanya baburirwa irengero , Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye aherutse kubwira RFI ko mu Burundi ata muntu n'umwe aburirwa irengero, ko ahubwo hari abaheza gukira ivyaha bagaca bahungira mu Rwanda.

headline: Tokyo 2020: 'Gushingira ku gutsina mu buryo bweruye' – amategeko y'imyambaro y'abagore mu nkino
text: "Tuzofashanya kubandanya urugamba rwo guhindura amategeko ajanye n'inyambaro, kugira abakinyi bashobore gukina bambaye impuzu biyumvamwo neza". Ivyo vyashikirijwe n'ishirahamwe rya Norvège rw'umupira wa Handaball (NHF), inyuma y'aho umugwi w'abagore w'ico gihugu muri handball yo ku musenyi uciriwe ihadabu rya 1.500 mu mafaranga y'abanyaburaya, Euro. Ico bacumuye? Banse kwambara utubutura twa bikini mu nkino z'ihiganwa rya Buraya. Vyashitse  umunsi umwe imbero yaho, umunonotsi agendana ubumuga yari yabwiwe ko akabutura kiwe kari ''kagufi  kandi hari ivyo kerekana cane". Ikibabaje n'uko gushinga uko abakinyi b'abagore [n'abagore muri rusangi] bategerezwa kwambara atari  bishasha. Aha turasubiza amaso inyuma turaba aho vyashitse bikavugwako vyinshi n'urugamba rwo kubigwanya. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga. Abakinyi b'umugwi wa handball wa Norvège baridoze bavuga  ko bikini bari bahawe ngo bambare mw'ihiganwa rya Buraya baherukamwo zabafata cane, zikozwe mu  buryo bushingiye ku gitsina birengeje, kandi batumva bazisanzuyemwo. Niko guca bahitamwo kwambara amabutura [nk'uko bigaragara kw'ifoto aho haruguru] igihe bariko barakina na Espagne baziga amahirwe yabo yo kuronka umudari wa bronze. Imbere y'uko inkino zitangura, Norvège yaregereye ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu rya Handball isaba ko abakinyi bayo bokwambara amabutura. Ivyo basavye ntivyanswe gusa, baciye bibutswa  ko kurenga amategeko bihanwa, kandi aho abakinyi bahiteyemwo kwambara amabutura mu rukino rwabo, baciye bahanishwa ihadabu ry'amafaranga angana na Euro 177 ku mukinyi umwe umwe. Ishirahamwe rya Handball rya Buraya (EHF) ryaciye iryo hadabu kubera ''umwambaro utabereye", rica rivuga ko abakinyi ba Norvège bambaye amabutura ''atajanye n'amategeko y'ingene abakinyi bambara nk'uko bitomorwa na IHF (Interenational Handaball Federation) mu mategeko ya handaball yo ku musenyi". Ariko iryo hadabu ryabaye mukorumbone. Abantu benshi baciye babaza bati niba abakinyi b'abahungu bashobora kwambara udupira tureture kandi twagutse n'amabutura amanuka gushika ku matako, kuki abagore batokwambara izimeze nk'uko? Umukuru w'ishirahamwe rya Norvège rya handaball , Kåre Geir Lio, avuga ati: "Igihambaye n'ukwambara mu buryo umukinyi yumva ko amerewe neza". Uretse gushigikira abakinyi, umukuru w'ishirahamwe ryabo yanemeye kuriha iryo hadabu. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe rya Norvège rya Volleyball Eirik Sordahl yavuze ati: "Mu 2021 nticari gikwiye no kuba ikibazo." Nawe umushikiranganji w'ico gihugu ajejwe imico n'akaranga Abid Raja yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Birateye isoni - harakenewe impinduka mu buryo kigabo no kugendera ku vya kera mu biranga itunganywa ry'inkino kw'isi". N'umuririmvyi wo muri Amerika P!nk yemeye gutanga iryo hadabu. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga. Haheze imyaka myinshi abakinyi b'abagore bidogera ubwo budasa mu nkino zibera ku musenyi, kandi bakaba bavuze ko babona bikini ibatesha agaciro kandi  bitoroha kuyikinamwo. Umunyamakuru akurikirana inkino, Renata Mendonca, yabwiye BBC ati: "Urukino rwose rukeneye amategeko. Ariko iyo hari amategeko yerekeye abagore gusa, aho haca haba ikibazo." Tova Leigh yahoze ari umushingwamanza ubu akaba atunganya ibica ku mbuga mu buryo bwa 'digital', yabwiye BBC ati: "Uko ni ukuvangura bifatiye ku gitsina mu buryo bweruye. Ikibabaje ivangura rifatiye ku gutsina mu nkino riraba cane kandi rirafise ingaruka nini ku gituma abakinyi benshi b'abagore baheba amahiganwa." "Ikibazo si amabutura. Ikibazo n'uko no mu 2021 abagore bakibwirwa ivyo bashobora canke badashobora kwambara kuko imibiri y'abagore igifatwa nk'ibintu vy'inyungu z'abagabo, ivyo bigaca biha uburenganzira umwe wese bwo kugira ico abivuzeko n'ico asaba no kugira." Leigh yakunze kwandika no kugira ico avuze ku mbuga hwaniro ku bijanye n'ingene imibiri y'abagore iba ikibazo uko iminsi yaharuwe, yongerako ati: "Abagore mu nkino ntibahabwa agaciro, bafatwa nk'abaryosha ibirori gusa, ntibafatwa nk'abagize umwuga urwo rukino". Mendonca nawe barahuza, ati: "Nta nsiguro yumvikana ihari kuri bikini, inkino nta na kimwe zizoba hamwe abagore bokwemererwa gukina bambaye amabutura - ikizoba conyene n'uko bazokina bumva bamerewe neza." Mendonca, ari mu bashinze urubuga rwa Dibradoras mu buryo bwa 'digital', rufise intumbero yo gutuma abagore bamenyekana gusumba mu nkino mu kubaha umwanya wo kugaragara, avuga ko babikwiriye ariko akenshi badahabwa akaryo ko kumenyekana ku mbuga zimenyerewe cane. Avuga ati: "Amahiganwa mu nkino yashiriweho abagabo - nk'uko ivyo biherutse gushika bivyerekana." "Mu 2021, abantu barongoye amashirahamwe y'inkino, akenshi abagabo b'abazungu, baracabona abakinyi b'abagore nk'ibisharizo, biri ngaho kugira binezereze abagabo." "Abagore ni bo bategerezwa kuvuga ivyo babona bibabereye kwambara. Ariko kubera ata bagore benshi barongoye amashirahamwe y'inkino mbere akenshi ugasanga ata n'umwe, amajwi y'abagore mu nkino ntiyumvirwa." "Kuko amajwi y'abagore mu nkino atumvirwa, kandi kuko ingene abagore bategerezwa kugaragara n'ingene bambara mu nkino bitegerezwa kugenzurwa n'abandi bari iruhande yabo". BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga. Ariko umugwi wa Norvège si wo wa mbere w'abagore mu nkino uhuye n'iki kibazo kandi bishoboka cane ko utazoba uwa nyuma. Mu vy'ukuri,  umunsi umwe imbere y'uko bacibwa ihadabu, umukinyi w'Ubwongereza agendana ubumuga amaze guca umuhigo w'isi kabiri, Olivia Breen, ''yarabuze ico avuga'' igihe yabwirwa ''akabutura kabereye gusumba'' mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Bwongereza. Ivyo vyavuzwe n'umutegetsi mu nkino, yagize ati, ''akabutura kiwe" kari ''kagufi kandi kagaragaza cane". [Murashobora kubona ingene yari yambaye muri iyo 'tweet' iri haruguru.] Uwo mwirutsi anasimba uburebure (longueur), ari mu barindiriye guhiganwa mu bagendana ubumuga mu nkino za Tokyo mu kwezi kuza, avuga ko intumbero yiwe mu kugira ico avuze ari ukugira ahagarike ko bishikira abandi. Breen avuga ko bikini yari yambaye ''yashika haruguru y'ikiyunguyungu nk'izindi bikini z'inkino''. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Tuba dushaka guhwahuka uko bishoboka kwose iyo turi mu mahiganwa, ntitwumve ko turemerewe, kandi twumve tumerewe neza. "Maze imyaka icenda nambara gutyo, nta na rimwe nari bwagire ikibazo. Dutegerezwa kwambara ivyo turekuriwe kwambara." Leigh avuga ati: "Ubwo burorero bubiri womenga buravuguruzanya, ariko ku bisanzwe n'impande zibiri z'ikingorongoro kimwe." "Imibiri y'abagore ifatwa kandi ibonwa 'nk'ingorane'. Imibiri yacu ibonwa nk'iyagaragaye 'ukutariko' canke nk''iyidahimbaye bikwiye." Iki kibazo naco caje mu 2016 igihe isanamu yo muri Olympic za Rio yahanahanwa cane ikongera ikavugwako vyinshi. Ifoto y'abakinyi babiri ba volleyball yo ku musenyi - umwe wo mu Misiri n'uwundi wo mu Budagi [raba aho haruguru], yatumye havugwa vyinshi atari ukubera ubukerebutsi bwabo mu rukino ariko kubera ivyabonwa nk''igihushane mu myambaro' yabo, aho hari ibinyamakuru vyavuze ko iyo foto yagaragaza ''ugusekana'' kw'akaranga. Ayo majambo yariyamirijwe cane abenshi bavuga ko ahubwo ko iyo foto yerekana ''ubushobozi bw'inkino bwo kwunga ubumwe''. Doaa Elghobashy wo mu Misiri [aboneka aho kw'ifoto] yari umukinyi wa mbere muri volleyball yo muri Olympics yakinye yambaye hijab. Iico gihe yavuze ati: ''Maze imyaka 10 nambara hijab…Ntimbuza gukora ibintu nkunda gukora, kandi volleyball yo ku musenyi ni kimwe muri ivyo". Ariko ivyavuzwe kuri iyo foto imwe, vyerekanye ikibazo kinini gusumba ku bantu benshi. Ico gihe umumenyeshamakuru wo mu Bwongereza Hannah Smith yanditse ati: "Hatarabwe aho uturuka, imibiri y'abagore n'ingene iba yambaye iracari icibare ca bose - canke bivuzwe neza gusumba, icibare c'abagabo." "Ico wambara cose kugira ukine nk'umugore, uzokwama ugira ico uvuzweko n'abagabo baravye urwo rukino." 'Umwambaro' wa Serena Umukinyi rurangiranwa wa tennis wo muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yageneye umwambaro wiwe wo muri French Open mu 2018 ''abavyeyi bose bagize imbanyi (inda) zibagoye'', igihe yagaruka avuye mu karuhuko ko kuvyara. Uwo mukinyi amaze gutsindira Grand Slam incuro 23 yavuze ko umwambaro wiwe watumye yumva ko ari ''umwamikazi wo muri Wakanda'', afatiye  kw'isinema (film/movie) Black Panther. Yabwiwe ko uwo mwambaro utazosubira kwemerwa kandi, aho umukuru w'ishirahamwe rya tennis mu Bufaransa, Bernard Giudicelli, yabwiye ikinyamakuru Tennis magazine ati: "Nibaza ko hari igihe twarengeje urugero. Utegerezwa kwubaha urukino n'aho rubera''. Williams  yavuze ko uwo mwambaro wamufasha guhangana n'ikibazo c'ivura ry'amaraso cahatswe kumuhitana mu gihe co kuvyara. Ariko avuga ko yabibwiye  Giudicelli ico gihe, ashimika ko iyo ngingo "kitari ikibazo gikomeye" kandi ko "iyo bazi ko ibintu bimwe bitumwa n'ikibazo c'amagara ko batoheza ngo bavyemere". None mu gihe hari abakinyi benshi b'abagore bihagararako abantu nabo bakomeza kuvuga ari benshi - ibintu vyoba bitanguye guhinduka? Abagira gymnastic b'abadagi bambaye umwambaro ubakwiye hose mu gice co gukuranamwo mu gisata c'abagore muri Olympics aho babandanije kwihagararako mu kurwanya ko urukino rwabo rurabwa mu ntumbero z'igitsina. Bamwe bari bambaye umwambaro usa n'uwo bambaye mu nkino za Buraya uyu mwaka, Sarah Voss akaba avuga ko we na bagenziwe bashatse ko abakiri bato bumva ko batekaniwe muri urwo rukino. Uwo mwambaro [nk'uko Pauline Schaefer-Betz yambaye aho haruguru] ntaho uhuriye n'ivyari bimenyerewey, bamwe bakaba bahisemwo kwambara 'collant' abandi nabo bahitamwo kwambara uwubafuka ku maguru mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu bakaba babigira ku mvo z'idini. Abagize umugwi w'Ubudagi barambaye umwambaro nk'uwo bariko barimenyereza mu ndwi iheze, uwumaze gutwara umudari wa Olympic gatatu Seitz akaba yavuze ico gihe ko ari ukubera "kwiyumva ko umerewe neza''. Yavuze ati: "Twashaka kwerekana ko umugore wese, uwariwe wese, ari we yohitamwo ico yambara." N'ubwo Soul Cap ata gahengwe iraronka - ibintu bisa n'ibiriko birahinduka. Ingingo yo kubuza kwambara udukofero abagore bafukisha umushatsi mwinshi cane w'abirabure - Afro - mu kwoga mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu, ishobora gusubirwamwo kubera ivyashitse. Soul Cap yavuze ko FINA, urwego rw'isi mu nkino zo mu mazi, yababwiye ko inkofero zabo zidakwiriye kubera zidahuye ''n'imforo ndemanwa y'umutwe''. Ariko ayo majambo yaraneguwe cane na benshi bitaba inkino zo mu mazi, bamwe bavuga ko azoca inkokora abakinyi b'abirabure mu kwitaba izo nkino. Ubu FINA ivuga ko "iriko irasubiramwo uko ibintu bimeze" ku vyerekeye izo nkofero. Ntivyitezwe ko inkuru z'abakinyi b'abagore banegurwa kubera ingene bambaye zitazobandanya kuvugwa cane muri kazoza. Ariko ku bwa Leigh, hari ikintu kimwe dushobora gukora twese kugira dufashe, ico naco kikaba ari ''ukuvyiyamiriza igihe cose tubibonye''. Kubera iki? Kuko ''dukeneye kwereka abakobwa, kuva bakiri bato, ko inkino ari ikibanza c'abagore".

headline: Uyu muririmvyi wo muri Afrika y'epfo yahuye n'ikibazo co guhohoterwa
text: Zahara, umuririmvyi azwi muri Afrika y'epfo, avuga ko yashikiwe ubwiwe n'ihohoterwa rikorerwa abagore muri ico gihugu. Muri iyi ndwi yahariwe kurwanya amabi akorerwa abapfasoni, aratuyagira ku vyamushikiye hamwe n'ingene afasha ngo ntibishikire abandi.

headline: Rwanda - Burundi: "Ivyo twasavye Urwanda ntirurabishitsa" - Alain Guillaume Bunyoni
text: Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Uburundi  Alain Guillaume Bunyoni  yavuze ko imigederanire n'igihugu c'Urwanda itaraba myiza inyuma yo gutosekera kuva mu 2015. Yabivuze yishura ibibazo vy'abamenyeshamakuru mu kiganiro yatanze ahejeje kuraba aho  abashikiranganji biwe bagejeje gushira mu ngiro imigambi ya reta. Alain Guillaume Bunyoni avuga ko iyo migenderanire "itaragenda neza kuko ivyo twasavye Urwanda n'ubu ntirurabishitsa." Mu kwezi kw'indwi, umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze ko ari "igitangaro" kubona Urwanda rwarungitse umushikiranganji warwo wa mbere Edouard Ngirente kuruhagarira mu birori vyo guhimbaza imyaka 59  Uburundi buronse intahe yo kwikukira. Alain Guillaume Bonyoni yagarutse ku vyo Uburundi bwamye bwagiriza Urwanda kuva mu 2015 harimwo: . Alain Guillaume Bunyoni yavuze ko abari bateguye  gutembagaza  ubutegetsi "guhera kuri General Godefroid Niyombare bashikiye mu Rwanda bakirwa nk'abami, ivyo birazwi". "Ntaco bokora harya mu Rwanda ngo bavuge  ngo twebwe abarundi ntitwokimenya kuko dufiseyo incuti, tuvuga ururimi rumwe, ivyo rero ni ibintu bisanzwe bigaragara." Ivyo Urwanda rwagirizwa n'Uburundi rwagumye rubihakana, ahubwo narwo rukagiriza Uburundi ko abarurwanya bo mu muharui witwaje ibigwanisho wa FLN batera bava mu Burundi aho bafise ibirindiro. Haheze igihe hari intambwe zo kunagura imigenderanire ziterwa hagati y'Uburundi n'Urwanda. Kimwe mu vyabaye nk'ikimenyetso gikomeye ni urugendo rw'umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Urwanda i Bujumbura. Edouard Ngirente niwe yahagarariye igihugu ciwe mu birori vy'imyaka 59 Uburundi bwari bumaze buronse intahe yo kwikukuira itariki ya mbere ukwezi kw'indwi. Mu vyo reta y'Uburundi isaba Urwanda harimwo kubushikiriza abo buvuga ko ruhaye indaro kandi baronderwa n'Ubutungane ku vyaha boba bahunze bahejeje gukora. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Uburundi Alain Guillaume Bunyoni yavuze ko atari "gupfa kuvuga ngo imigenderanire igende neza icari  catumye itosekera kitaratora umuti".

headline: ‘Vyanka vyakunda’ Mohamed Salah azoguma muri Liverpool
text: Umusatirizi wa  Liverpool Mohamed Salah avuga ko "ivyo ari vyo vyose" mu mwaka w'inkino uza azoba ari muri Liverpool, ariko ko adashaka kujanwa mu mpari z'amasezerano mashasha. Amasezerano ya Salah azorangira muri Ruheshi (6) 2023, ibituma haduka amajambo menshi ko ashobora kugurishwa mu gihe atotera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha kuko inyuma y'umwaka yoca yigira ahandi ata rufaranga na rumwe aguzwe. Abajijwe kuri kazoza kiwe imbere y'urukino rwa nyuma rwa Ligue des Champions/Champions League ku wa gatandatu, avuga ati: "Si nshaka kuvuga kuri ibi bintu. "Ico nipfuza ni ukubona Hendo [Jordan Henderson] ateruye igikombe". Uyu musatirizi w'umunyamisiri w'imyaka 29 avuga kandi ati: "Sinitaho ivy'amasezerano ubu. Si nshaka kwigungirako. "Ivyo ari vyo vyose ndacari ng'aha mu mwaka uza w'inkino". Mugenziwe Sadio Mane, wewe avuga ko azoshikiriza ingingo ku bijanye na kazoza kiwe inyuma y'urukino rwa nyuma na  Real Madrid i Paris. Uyu mukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Sénégal  amaze kwinjiriza ibitsindo 120 mu nkino 268 amaze gukinira Liverpool, na we nyene mu kwa gatandatu yinjira mu mezi 12 ya nyuma y'amasezerano yiwe. Yabwiye imboneshakure Sky Sports News ati: "Iki kibazo [kuri kazoza kanje] nzocishura inyuma ya Champions League. Nimba nzoguma aha canke ntazoguma aha, nzovyishura inyuma ya Champions League". Umumenyereza wa Liverpool Jurgen Klopp ntabona ko ibizova mu rukino rwo ku wa gatandatu ari rwo fatiro ku bakinyi bamwe bamwe mu gufata ingingo yo kwongereza amasezerano canke kuyahagarika. Ati: "Oya, oya na gato. None, mu gihe twotsinda, boca bashaka kugenda ? Turiko turaganira n'abakinyi bose, ubu si igihe co kuvuga ibijanye n'ivyavuye muri ibi biganiro. Nta n'umwe azi ivyo turiko turategura. "Gusa nta mwanya uhari, buri misi itatu turakina. Abakinyi barabizi, turabizi, rimwe na rimwe turahuza, ikindi gihe ntiduhuze, hanyuma rero tugakorera hamwe. "Turazinanye kuva kera". Salah yinjiye muri Liverpool avuye muri Roma mu 2017 akaba amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo 156 mu nkino 253 amaze gukinira Liverpool. Yarafashije uyu murwi gutsindira ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza (Premier League) mu 2019-2020, igikombe c'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League) mu 2019, igikombe FA Cup hamwe n'igikombe c'ihiganwa (League Cup) uno mwaka w'inkino, igikombe c'isi yose gihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere  (FIFA Club World Cup)  be n'igikombe ca Uefa Super Cup mu kiringo amaze muri Liverpool. Mu kwa gatatu, Klopp yavuze ko Salah ari we wenyene azofata ingingo ku vyerekeye  gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha. Uyu musatirizi yahoze akinira Chelsea aherutse kuvuga ko ashaka kuguma muri Liverpool, ariko ko kazoza kiwe kari mu minwe y'uyu murwi kandi ko atariko arasaba "ibitagenda". Ku wa Mungu, Liverpool yarangije ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza isumbijwe inota rimwe ritarenga ntirirenguke na Manhester City, ivyarangije ibizigizigi bari bafise vyo gutsindira ibikombe bine mu mwaka w'inkino umwe, ibitarigera bibaho mu Bwongereza. Urukino rwo ku wa gatandatu ruzoyihuza na Real Madrid i Paris mu Bufaransa ruzokwibutsa urundi rwa Champions League rwo mu 2018 aho uyo murwi wo muri Espagne watsinze 3-1, Salah akaba atarurangije kubera yavunitse mu gice ca mbere agonganye na Sergio Ramos mu buryo bwateje impari nyinshi. Salah yongerako ati: "Numva mfise ishaka, ishaka ryinshi cane, inyuma y'ivyabaye igihe giheze [mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa 2018], kandi ku wa Mungu - bose bafise ishaka kuri iki". "Iki turakirwanira kandi bose barabishashaye".

headline: UK: Boris Johnson ntiyorohewe muri poritike mu gihe hari abashikiranganji batanze imihoho
text: Umushikiranganji wa mbere w’Ubwongereza ari mu rugamba rutoroshe rwa poritike inyuma y’aho babiri mu bashikiranganji biyamirije ubutegetsi bwiwe bagaca batanga imihoho. Umushikiranganji w’ikigega ca reta (imari mu Kinyarwanda) Rishi Sunak hamwe n’uw’amagara y’abantu Sajid Javid batanze imihoho mu kiringo c’iminota cumi hagati yabo, bakurikirwa n’abashikiranganji bato bato be n’ivyegera. Abamunegura bavuga ko ivy’iwe “birangiye”, mu gihe umugambwe w’abakozi uvuga ko umugambwe wiwe wiziziwe n’igiturire. Ariko umushikiranganji Johnson yamenyesheje neza ko ategura kubandanya n’amabanga yiwe mu gihe yitegura guhindura reta. Yaciye agena Nadhim Zahawi nk’umushikiranganji w’ikigega ca reta mushasha, mu gihe umukuru w’ibiro vy’umushikiranganji wa mbere, Steve Barclay, yabaye umushikiranganji w’amagara y’abantu. Mu gihe yiteze kwishura ibibazo vy’abashingamateka kuri uno wa gatatu, umushikiranganji wa mbere Johnson ntaza kworoherwa - mu gihe ubutegetsi bwiwe buri mu ngorane zikomeye atari bwigere agira gushika ubu. Yaba Javid canke Sunak, nta n’umwe aragira ico ashikirije ku mugaragaro kuva batanze imihoho, ariko amakete yabo y’ejo ku wa kabiri aranegura cane umushikiranganji wa mbere. Javid yagabishije ko ubutegetsi butariko “burakora ku nyungu z’igihugu”, mu gihe Sunak avuga ko abanyagihugu bari biteze ko reta irongorwa “neza, mu buhinga kandi n’umwitwarariko wose”. Abategetsi b’imigambwe itavuga rumwe n’uwuri ku butegetsi basaba abashikiranganji kwifatanya na bagenzi babo bagatanga imihoho, nayo umukuru w’umugambwe w’abakozi Sir Keir Starmer avuga ko yiteguriye amatora yihuse. Umushingamateka wo mu mugabwe w’abagendera ku vya kera Conservateur/Conservative) akaba yahoze ajejwe inyifato, Andrew Mitchell, yabwiye ikiganiro ca BBC Newsnight ko ivya Johnson “birangiye”, akavuga ko “ ingendo n’inyifato vyiwe ntibishobora kumwemerera ko abandanya ari umushikiranganji wa mbere wacu” – ikibazo gisigaye kukaba ari ukumenya igihe ibi bizofata. Ariko nta mushingamateka n’umwe wo mu ba Conservateurs arahangara ubutegetsi bw’uyu mushikiranganji wa mbere, mbere abashikiranganji batari bake baramushigikiye, harimwo n’uw’imigenderanire Liz Truss – umwe mu bashobora kuzomusubirira ku burongozi bw’uyu mugambwe. Avuga ko ashigikiye “umushikiranganji wa mbere 100% ", mu gihe abandi bashikiranganji ba reta yiwe harimwo Dominic Raab, Michael Gove, Thérèse  Coffey na Ben Wallace na bo nyene batangaza ko bazoguma muri reta. Umushingamateka w’umu Conservateur Daniel Kawczynski abona ko gutanga imihoho kw’aba bashikiranganji babiri gushobora gutuma Johnson agira inguvu, akavuga kandi ko “bari gushobora gutuma umushikiranganji wa mbere atembagara, ariko vyanse”. Vyose vyatanguye ejo ku wa kabiri ku mugoroba, haciye iminota mike Johnson ahaye ikiganiro BBC akemera ko yakoze “ikosa ribi” mu kugena Chris Pincher nk’icegera c’umukuru w’igisata kijejwe inyifato mu kwa kabiri kw’uno mwaka n’aho yari azi ivyo yagirizwa bijanye n’inyifato mbi. Muri ano mezi ya nyuma, reta ya Johnson yagiye ihura n’urukurikirane rw’ingorane, cane cane itohoza ry’igipolisi ku misi mikuru yabereye muri biro vyiwe vya Downing Street muri ca gihe ca guma mu rugo. Hari bamwe mu bashingamateka b’umugambwe w’aba conservateurs berekanye ko batishimiye iduzwa ry’amakori, inyishu ya reta ku buzima buzimvye n’ingene arongoye igihugu. Ibintu vyatanguye kwunyuka ku ruhande rw’uyu mushikiranganji wa mbere igihe atsindiwe mu matora y’akarere muri Tiverton na Honiton hamwe na Wakefield, be n’itanga ry’imihoho ry’umukuru w’umugambwe w’aba Conservateurs Oliver Dowden. Hanyuma kandi, imihoho y’aba bashikiranganji ije haciye indwi nkeya gusa arokotse amatora y’abashingamateka yashaka kumwegura. Umushikiranganji wa mbere ni ntayegayezwa ku burongozi bw’umugambwe w’aba Conservateurs gushika mu kwa gatandatu kw’umwaka uza nk’uko amategeko y’umugambwe abitegekanya, inyuma yo gutsinda ku majwi 59%. Ariko abarwanya  uburongozi bwiwe bariko barondera ko amategeko y’umugambwe ahinduka kugira bakureho igihengeri kimaze umwaka wose mu burongozi. Umushingamateka w’umu Conservateur Andrew Bridgen yabwiye BBC ko umushikiranganji wa mbere akwiye gutanga imihoho, atari uko naho “umugambwe umukureho ku nguvu”. Hagati aho, umukuru w’umugambwe w’abakozi, Sir Keir, avuga ko yokwakiriza yompi amatora yihuse kandi ko igihugu gikeneye ko reta ihinduka. Avuga ati: "Inyuma y’amabwa yose, intege nke zose, biragaragara ko reta y’aba Conservateurs iriko iratembagara ubu”. Amatora rusangi yitezwe mu 2024, ariko ashobora kuba imbere y’aha mu gihe Johnson yokoresha ubutegetsi bwiwe akayatumako. Umukuru w’umugambwe w’abigenga, Liberal Democrats, Sir Ed Davey, avuga ko reta y’uyu “mushikiranganji wa mbere yuzuye akajagari yahemukiye igihugu”, aca amutera akamo ko yova ku butegetsi. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ecosse/Scotland akaba arongoye umugambwe SNP, Nicola Sturgeon, avuga ko "umurwi wose uboze " muri reta ya Johnson ukwiye kugenda, akagiriza abashikiranganji ko “babeshe abanyagihugu”.

headline: Ubukritsu - Isilamu: hoba hari isano hagati ya Isilamu hamwe na Yezu/Yesu na Maria
text: Mu bihugu birwiriyemwo Abakristu, muri kino gihe ikintu kivugwa ni Noweri/Noheli, mu ndimi mvamahanga naho ni Noel canke Christmas. Biragoye kwibaza ko hoba hari ibihugu uyu munsi mukuru utazwi na gato, bobo usanga ari umunsi usanzwe nk'iyindi. Igituma nyamukuru ni uko uyu munsi ari umunsi wo kwibuka ivuka rya Yezu, umunsi wubahwa cane rwose mu mashengero y'abakristu. Mu bihugu uyu munsi mukuru wa Noweri utazwi, canke udahimbazwa harimwo ibihugu bigendera kw'idini rya Isilamu, Nk'akarorero muri Turukiya, iri genekerezo rya 25 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri ni umunsi usanzwe ku kirangamisi cayo. Uyu munsi mukuru ntawuriho ku birangamisi ry'abayahudi, Abahindi canke vy''Abasilamu. Mu bihugu vy'Abasilamu, uyu munsi mukuru usa n'iminsi mikuru ya Eid, ariho Abasilamu baja hamwe, bagatumirara, bagateka, bakagenderanira, bagatanga ishikanwa, bakambara bakaberwa bakaja gusenga mu misigiti. Nimba ushaka gutahura itandukanirizo riri hagati y'aya madini, ntuze wigere wipfuriza Umusilamu Noweri nziza. Ariko rero, si ukuvuga ko Yezu/Yesu atazwi mw'idini rya Isilamu. Yezu/Yesu canke Jesus, uba uvuze Issa? Ibi rero biratangaza abantu benshi batabizi. Abasilamu ntibahimbaza ivuka rya Yezu, ariko barakurikiza inyigisho ziwe. Abasilamu barubaha cane uyu bita intumwa y'Imana kandi afise ikibanza kidasanzwe mu kwemera kwabo. Igitabo c'Ikorowani gifata Yezu nk'umwe mu ntumwa z'Imana zubahwa cane zaboneye izuba Intumwa Muhammad (S.A.W.- Sallā Allāhu ʿalayhi Wa-sallam). Yezu mu rurimi rw'icarabu ni ukuvuga Issa, kandi aravugwa incuro nyinshi cane mw'Ikorowani, mbere aravugwa cane gusumba na Muhammad muri iki gitabo ceranda. Si ivyo gusa, harimwo n'umugore umwe rudende izina ryiwe rivugwa mw'ico gitabu ceranda c'idini rya Isilamu. Maria canke Mariam, Ikorowani imusigura gute? Uyo mugore ni Bikira Maria, mu rurimi rw'icarabu akaba azwi kw'izina rya Mariam/Maryam. Mw'Ikorowani, hari igice cose kimuvuga, kigasigura ingene yavyaye umwana kandi yari asanzwe ari isugi. Gusa iyo iriko irasigura ivy'ivuka rya Yezu, Isilamu ntiyigera ivuga ivya Yozefu, canke ba ba majusi baza bavuye mu buseruko, canke ngo bavuge ingene yaryamitswe mu bwato bw'inka. Maria yibarutse ari wenyene mu bugaragwa, ari musi y'igiti c'umunazi cumye. Aho nyene haciye haba igitangaro, inazi zihiye neza zaciye zitangura gukoroka ziva kuri ico giti cumye maze ziba imfungurwa yiwe. Hanyuma kandi, mu maguru yiwe haciye havuka umugezi w'amazi meza cane maze aba inyobwa yiwe. Umukobwa atararongorwa iyo avyaye bitera ibibazo vyinshi cane ku bijanye n'indero yiwe. Ariko uyo mwana  - Yezu/Issa - amaze kuvuka, yaciye atangura kuvuga nk'intumwa y'imana. Iki gitangaro nico gikura iceyi nyina wiwe. Iyo Abasilamu bavuga Yezu, bategerezwa gushirako Alayhi Salaam- Imigisha y'Imana ibane na we, nk'uko babivuga ku Ntumwa Muhammad n'abandi bahanuzi. Hanyuma kandi, ni nde arindiriwe ku munsi w'iherezo ku munsi w'urubanza no kugarura amahoro kw'isi, kubw'idini rya Isilamu? Ni Yezu, aho azogarukira ubugira kabiri, kandi uku kuninahazwa kwiwe kuri no mu bindi bitabo vya Isilamu, si mw'Ikorowani gusa. Umuhinga w'Umusufi, Al-Ghazali, amusobanura "nk'Intumwa ityorora imitima y'abantu". Ibn Arabi aramwandikako aho avuga ko ari "ikimenyetso c'ubweranda". Mu gihugu vyose birimwo Abasilamu, hari abahungu bahabwa izina rya Issa (Yezu), abakobwa nabo bagahabwa amazina ya Maryam (Maria). Aha urashobora kwibaza nk'umuntu ava mu muryango w'abakristu yokwita umwana wiwe Muhammad ingene vyomugendera? Idini rya Isilamu rirazi neza Yezu, kubera igihe rivuka, mu kinjana c'indwi, idini ry'Ubukristu ryari rishinze imizi mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo Hagati. Muhammad nta hantu na hamwe avugwa muri Bibiriya. N'aho idini rya Isilamu riha icubahiro Yezu, si ukuvuga ko mu binjana vyakurikiye iri dini rya Gikristu naryo ryabasubirije mu ndumane. Ahubwo, mu gicapo kinini co mu kinjana ca 15 kiri mw'isengero nkuru ya San Petronio mu gisagara ca Bologne mu Butariyano, uyu muhanuzi mukuru wa Isilamu yerekanwa ari mu muriro udahera, ariko arababazwa n'amashetani. Harabaye ibishushanyo vyinhi vyerekana nabi cane Intumwa Muhammad. Umuhinyanyuzi w'umutariyano Giovani da Modena yarashingiye cane ku munyavyese azwi cane Dante Alighieri, yashize Muhammad ku muzingi w'icenda w'ikuzimu mu gitabo ciwe c'ivyese citwa Divine Comedy. Iki gitabo carakoreshejwe cane n'abanyatugenegene n'abahinyanyuzi benshi ba Bulaya gushika mu kinjana ca 18 mu gushushanya Intumwa Muhammad bamwerekana ariko arahanwa mu muriro udahera. Kimwe muri ivyo bishushanyo, ni ica William Blake, umunyatugenegene akomeye cane w'umwongereza mu masanamu n'inzandiko ziwe. Mw'isengero imwe yo mu Bubirigi, hari ibishushanyo vyo mu kinjana ca 17 vyerekana iyi ntumwa ya Isilamu aryamitswe hasi ariko ahonyangwa n'abamarayika. Ibintu vyagiye guhinduka mu nyuma ku bijanye n'ingene idini rya Gikristu rifata Intumwa muhammad. Ariko gusa gushika muri kino gihe, haracari icuka kibi. Mu mwaka wa 2002, imirwi y'intagondwa ya Isilamu yaragirijwe ko yashatse kubomora ico gishushanyo co mw'isengero ya Bologne. Kuva ico gihe, harabaye ibitero vyinshi vyahitanye abantu, ibitero vyakozwe kw'izina ry'idini rya Isilamu mu bihugu bitari bike vya Buraya n'ibirwiriyemwo Abasilamu. Ibi bitero vyatumye icuka kibi hagati y'ama madini abiri kibandanya ciyongera. Hari ababona ko kumenya isano riri hagati ya Yezu n'idini rya Isilamu, hamwe n'ikibanza afise muri iri dini, bishobora gufasha Abakristu n'Abasilamu kunywana. Babona ko kwibanda ku vyo basangiye hakwibanda ku bibatandukanya bishobora gufasha gukuraho iki cuka kibi kihari.

headline: Burundi: Abarongoye Islam bavuga ko ata ngorane ihari hagari ya Islam na reta
text: Abakuru b'idini rya Islam bavuga ko biyamiriza amajambo yashikirijwe na Ndikumana Rashid, umusilamu aherutse kwifatira mu gahanga umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu, iterambere rusangi n'umutekano. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'ihuriro ry'imisigiti riri kumwe n'ihuriro ry'aba-Imam mu Burundi, bamenyesha ko ivyo Ndikumana yavuze yabivuze ku gatwe kiwe bitega aya mahuriro canke "umuryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi". Ndikumana arapfunzwe inyuma y'uko yumvikanye ahamagarira umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati n'umutekano, Ndirakobuca Gervais, gusaba ikigongwe, hari mu musigiti wa Madina uri muri zone Buterere mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Umwe mu bakuru b'idini rya Islam mu Burundi yabwiye BBC ko gushika ubu nta kibabuza gusenga uko bamye basenga na mbere. Abakuriye Islam mu Burundi mw'itangazo ryabo, bamenyesha abanywanyi babo ko "ata matati ari hagati y'umuryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi" na reta y'igihugu. Zuberi Mohamed, Umukuru w'inama ya bose mu muryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi, yabwiye BBC ko bakira nk'abandi bose ivyashikirijwe na Ndirakobuca, kuko "vyaraba bose ntivyaraba aba Islam gusa". Avuga ko ivyo yavuze bitababuza gusenga uko bahora basenga. Ati: "Nta tegeko na rimwe rirasohoka ritubuza gusenga canke ritubuza guhamagarira abantu kuja gusenga. "Twebwe dufata y'uko yariko ashikiriza amakenga yoba afise canke uko abona ibintu". Zuberi avuga ko iyo habaye ingorane hagati ya reta no mu muryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi "hariho inzira bicamwo kugira ngo tuvugane, nk'uko biri mu yandi madini". Abajijwe niba ivyasabwe n'umushikiranganji Ndirakobuca bidashobora guhungabanya umutekano, Rashidi abona ko ata ngorane bishobora gutera. Ati: "Abatovyi mu mpande zose ntibabuze, ariko twebwe turazi ko aba Islam bahagaze neza, kandi ko ata ngorane zihava ziva muri ivyo gushika kuri uno munota nta kibazo kihari hagati ya reta n'aba Islam mu Burundi".

headline: Umwamkazi Elizabeth: Abaganwa William na Harry bahujwe n’urupfu rwa inakuru wabo
text: Abandika amakuru bashobora kuba bariko bibaza ibintu vyinshi bokwandika ku bijanye “n’aba bantu bavukana bankana urunuka” canke “abavukana bahuriye mu mubabaro”. Kuba abantu babonye abaganwa bavukana, William na Harry, baramukanya n’isinzi ry’abantu bari kumwe kizoba ikintu ntibagirwa kandi kitari citezwe muri ino misi y’umubabaro. Bari kumwe n’abagore babo, Catherine na Meghan, baramukanije n’abantu i Windsor, mu buryo butari bwitezwe mu ndwi iheze, igihe aba basamuragwa basubira mu Bwongereza. Ico gihe havugwa indyane n’ukudacana uwaka hagati y’imiryango ya William na Harry . Bavugwa ko bari mu nzu zegeranye i Windsor, ariko imitima yabo iri kure na kure. Iyi miryango ntiyari bwigere ibonwa iri kumwe ku mugaragaro mu kiringo kirenga imyaka ibiri. Ibi vyose vyagiye guhinduka ku wa kane. Nimba William na Harry ata mugambi wo kubonana bari bafise, bisanze bahuriye hamwe mu buryo ata muntu n’umwe yari avyiteze. Bisa n’uko hari haciye igihe kirekire, ariko inyuma y’aho Umwamikazi, inakuru wabo, vyankiye, igihugu cose kiriko kibaza amakuru y’amagara yiwe, aba bavukanyi vyabaye ngombwa ko bompi bafata ingendo bakaja i Balmoral aho yari arwariye. Imiryango irashobora gucanamwo mu bihe vy’umubabaro. Ivyiyumviro bikaba vyinshi kandi bigahakwa no kuja ahabona. Biroroshe ko impari za kera zivyurwa n’umubabaro. Ariko kandi kubura umukunzi gushobora kugarukana umwumvikano, mukararabira hamwe ibintu hanyuma mugashira ku ruhande ibibatandukanya. Gishobora kuba igihe ciza co gusubirana. Nivyo, ku muntu atabizi, nta n’umwe yomenya ivy’ari vyo akurikiranye imboneshakure yonyene. Mbega uku kwari ukwiyerekana gusa? Boba bari babwiwe ko bategerezwa kunyegeza ibibatandukanya hanyuma bakerekana ubutumwa bwiza? Ibintu ntibigiye kworoha ariko bizoguma hagati y’aba bavukayi.  William na Harry bari bamaze kuba mu bihe bigoye cane bakiri abana, igihe nyina wabo, Umuganwakazi Diana apfa ahitanywe n’isanganya mu 1997. Ku banyagihugu bari babirindiranye igishika, mu ntumbero yo kwerekana ko bifatanije umubabaro n’umuryango w’ibwami, bararyohewe cane babonye William na Catherine, Harry na Meghan, baseruka bari kumwe. N’imiburiburi mu kiringo c’iminota mikeya, ibi bihangange bine vy’ibwami vyarasubiranye. Barifatanije n’abanyagihugu. Nk’uko amakuru ava ibwami abivuga, Umuganwa William niwe yasavye Umuganwa Harry na Meghan ko bojana muri uru rugendo. Nivyo ko iki gihe bagiye hamwe, ariko nta nkeka ko ari kandi igihe co kutumvikana gukomeye. Aba bavukanyi bari hafi yo gufata inzira zitandukanye. Igihe Umwamikazi asandavye, William yaciye aba samuragwa w’ingoma. Azotegerezwa kumenya neza igikorwa kimurindiriye. Ari ku rwego rushasha kandi rukomeye gusumba murumunawe. William ubu ni Umuganwa wa Wales, izina bompi, gushika ejo bakoresha mu guhamagara se wabo. Igihe ingoma y’Umwami Charles III itangazwa ejo ku wa gatandatu, William yari ahagaze neza inyuma y’umwami mushasha, ari we se wabo. Bisa n’uko Umwami hamwe na Camilla, uyu nawe ubu akaba ari Umutambukanyi w’Umwami, hamwe na William na Catherine, ari bo bagiye kuba inkingi y’ingoma. Aba bantu bane nibo bari bakunze kuboneka bari kumwe igihe Charles yaserukira nyina wiwe. Umuganwa Harry wewe yafashe inzira itandukanye, aho we na Meghan n’umuryango wiwe bibera muri California  mu vyabo. Bategerezwa gutangura ubuzima bwabo inyuma y’aho bavavanuriye n’ubuzima bw’ibwami, bakaba batakiri kumwe n’umuryango w’i bwami. Baravugwa cane mu banyagihugu, ariko atari neza igihe cose, bikaba bisa n’uko ibinyamakuru bibakorerako cane.

headline: Isi ihanzwe n'akaga katari bwigere kabaho kuva ku ntambara ya kabiri y’isi yose - Putin
text: N﻿a  Yaroslav Lukov BBC News Perezida Vladimir Putin  w’Uburusiya agabisha ko isi ishobora kuba ihanzwe "n'akaga katari bwigere kabaho" kuva intambara ya kibiri y’isi yose irangiye. Mw’ijambo rirerire yashikirije ku wa kane, yagerageje gusigura igitero c’Uburusiya kuri Ukraine, ingingo yatumye amakungu abukumira. Putin kandi yagiriza ibihugu vy’Uburengero gutera ubwoba Uburusiya vyihishije inyuma y’ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda vya nikleyeri mu ntumbero yo kubwonkora ku ncuti zabwo. Uburengero buriyamiriza amajambo y’iterabwoba rya nikleyeri aherutse gushikirizwa na Kremlin (Ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu w’Uburusiya). Mu ntango z’ino ndwi, ishirahamwe ryo kwivunira umwanshi hamwe OTAN/NATO ryariyamirije ibirego bitagira ishingiro vy’’Uburusiya bivuga ko Ukraine ishobora gukoresha “ibombe y’umwanda”  - amabombe yemewe gukoreshwa ariko avanze n’ubumara. Umunyamabanga mukuru wa OTAN Jens Stoltenberg avuga ko ibihugu bihurikiye muri uru runani vyiyamiriza ibi birego, kandi ko “Uburusiya butohirahira ngo bugikoreshe nk’icitwazo co kugira ibintu vyunyuke”. Perezida Putin yavuze ibi mw’ijambo yashikirije ikoraniro ry’umwaka rya Valdai inyuma y’imisi ingabo ziwe zimaze zitsindwa ku rugamba muri Ukraine n’ishavu ribandanya ryiyongera mu banyagihugu ritewe n’ingingo yo kwinjiza mu gisirikare Abarusiya bandi 300.000 mu twigoro tw’iyi ntambara. Umusi umwe imbere y’ijambo ryiwe i Moscou, yari yagaharikiye imyimenyerezo ya buri mwaka y’ingabo z’igisata ca nikleyeri mu gisirikare c’Uburusiya, yarimwo ukwimenyereza gukora igitero ca nikleyeri mu gihe umwansi yoramuka akoze igitero ca nikleyeri ku gihugu ciwe. Yabwiye abari aho ati: "Ntabwo twigeze tuvuga ikintu kijanye n’uko Uburusiya bushobora gukoresha ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri busotowe. Twishuye gusa ku majambo yavuzwe n’abarongoye ibihugu vy’Uburengero”. Perezida Putin yahagaze ku wahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere w’Ubwongereza Liz Truss ku majambo yavuze ari mu myiyamamazo mu kw’umunani ko yari yiteguye gutera ibisasu vya nikleyeri mu gihe vyoba ngombwa ko akora gutyo. Avuga ko yatangajwe n’ingene incuti z’Ubwongereza zitavyiyamirije: "None twari kugira gute? Kunuma? Kwigira nk’uko ataco twumvise”? Hagati aho, abandanya agabisha ko Uburusiya buzokoresha “uburyo bwose bufise” mu kwikingira, amajambo afatwa nk’iterabwoba rya nikleyeri ryeruye. Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yagiriza umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya gukinisha amajambo “mabi cane” kw’ikoreshwa ry’ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri. Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru ba Amerika, Biden yabajije ati: "Kubera iki aririmba ivy’ubushobozi bwo gukoresha ibirwanisho vy’ubumara? Nimba ata mugambi afise, kubera iki yama ariko arabivuga?”. Yasubiyemwo amajambo yo kwifatira mu gahanga Uburengero, n’ico yita “umukino wiwe mubi, ucafuye kandi wo gusesa amaraso” wo kwaka ibihugu ubusugire n’ubwigenge bwavyo. Ico gihe, Putin yari yavuze ko “ukwiganza kutagira urugero”  kw’Uburengero mu buzima bw’isi ubu kuriko kurarangira. "Turi ku musozo mu mateka y’isi. Igihe kiri imbere kumbure nico gihe c’akaga gakomeye, kidatomoye kandi aho nyene gikomeye cane kuva intambara ya kabiri y’isi yose irangiye”. "Uburengero nta bushobozi bugifise bwo kwiganzira isi – ariko 'buriko bwita ku rutare ngo bufate ibintu mu minwe'”. Avuga ko “iyindi ntumbero ya kazoza k’isi iriko irategurwa turorera”, aca yagiriza Uburengero burongowe na Amerika ko buriko bugerageza gusambura Uburusiya, ariko akaba atatanze ivyemezo. Ijambo ryiwe ryerekana isi uko Vladimir Putin ayibona, isi aho Uburusiya butagira akanenge, akagiriza Uburengero ko ari bwo ntandaro ya vyose, kuva ku ntambara yo muri Ukraine gushika ku ngorane z’imfungurwa zihanze isi, nk’uko umunyamakuru Steve Rosenberg, umwanditsi mukuru ku Burusiya abivuga. Mw’iryo jambo, Putin ntiyigeze yicuza ku ntambara yatanguje muri Ukraine.

headline: Coronavirus: hatangujwe ubushakashatsi bwo gukoresha imbwa mu gupima uwo mugera
text: Mu Bwongereza himirije gutangura ubushakashatsi bwo kuraba nimba imbwa zisanzwe zararonkejwe ubuhinga bujanye n'ugupima indwara zishobora gutora umuntu yanduye umugera wa corona. Imbwa nk'izo zisanzwe zarahawe ubuhinga bwo gutora umuntu arwaye ubwoko bumwe bumwe bwa kanseri, malaria hamwe n'indwara ya Parkinson ku kamoto gusa, ubuhinga zahawe n'shirahamwe Medical Detection Dogs. Igice ca mbere c'ubwo bushakashatsi kizoba kirongowe n'ishure kaminuza London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine, ishirahamwe Medical Detection Dogs hamwe n'ishure kaminuza rya Durham. Leta yemeye gushigikira ako kigoro mu guterera amafaranga yo gukora ubwo bushakashatsi ibihumbi 500 vy'amapawundi (amafaranga y'u Bwongereza). Umushikiranganji w'ico gihugu ajejwe ubuhinga, Lord Bathel, avuga ko afise icizere ko izo ntozo zizoshobora gutanga inyishu mu bubangutsi ko umuntu arwaye, mu mugambi wa leta wo gupima abanyagihugu benshi bashoboka. Ubwo bushakashatsi bushaka kumenya nimba izo ntozo ziswe "Covid Dogs" - zishobora gutora  uwo mugera mu mubiri w'umuntu zimwimotereje gusa imbere y'uko ibimenyestso bitangura kwigaragaza. Ubwo bushakashatsi buzofasha kumenya nimba izo mbwa zizwi nka bio-detection dogs (imbwa zo gupima umubiri w'umuntu) - zikaba zishobora gupima abantu bashika 259 kw'isaha -  zizoshobora  gukoreshwa mu gukinga Covid-19 muri kazoza ibara ritaragwa. Igice ca mbere c'ubwo bushakashatsi, kizokoresha abaganga bo mu mavuriro ya Londres bazofata ibipimo vy'akamoto ku bazoba baramaze kwandura be n'abandi batazoba barandura. Ibipimo vy'impwemu hamwe n'akamoto kava mu mubiri w'umuntu (audeur humain) bizokwegeranywa mu bice bitandukanye, harimwo no muri twa dutambara two kwikingira tuzoba twakoreshejwe. Imbwa zitandatu - Norman, Digby, Storm, Star, Jasper nq Asher - nizo zizobanza kwigishwa kugira ngo zishobore gutora coronavirus muri ivyo bipimo bizoba vyafashwe. Ishirahamwe Medical Detection Dogs rizozigisha rivuga ko ico gikorwa gishobora gufata indwi zitarenga zitandatu gushika ku munani. Mw'igerageza ry'intangamarara rizomara amezi atatu, leta izoshobora gufata ingingo y'ukungene izo ntozo zokoreshwa n'aho zishobora gukoreshwa. Imwe mu ngingo zishobora gufatwa, ni uko izo ntozo zishobora gukoreshwa ku bwinjiriro, nko ku bibuga vy'indege, kugira ngo zishobore kumenya abantu bashobora kuba bafise uwo mugera. Izo ntozo kandi zishobora gukoreshwa ku bigo vyo gupima, hampande y'ibipimo bisanzwe. Claire Guest, arongoye iryo shiramahwe avuga ko yizigiye neza ko "izo ntozo zizoshobora gutora akamoto ka Covid-19". Imbwa nk'izo zarakoreshejwe muri kahise mu gutora abarwaye malaria zimotereje ivyambawe mu birenge - ico gihe zikaba zakoreshejwe mu kwimotereza amashesheti yambawe n'abana basa n'abari bakomeye muri Gambia. Umwigisha James Logan wo kuri kaminuza London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine, avuga ati: "Ubushakashatsi bw'imbere y'aha bwarerekanye ko malaria ifise akamoto yisangije, kandi twifashishije imbwa zikoreshwa mu buvuzi, twarashoboye kuzigisha ingene zishobora gutora neza umuntu arwaye malaria". "Iki rero, tugifatiye hamwe n'ibisanzwe bizwi ko indwara zifatira mw'ihemero zishobora gutuma umubiri w'umuntu uhindura akamoto, kiduha umwizero ko izi ntozo zoshobora gutora umuntu yanduye Covid-19". Abashakashatsi barashoboye kandi kwigisha imbwa gutora abantu barwaye kanseri hamwe na Parkinson.

headline: Leta y'u Burundi ihanura abashaka kuza mu gihugu gutenyenya kubera coronavirus
text: Umushikiranganji ajejwe imigenderanire y'u Burundi n'amakurungu, Ezechiel Nibigira, yabwiye BBC ko bahagaritse gutanga impusha zo kwinjira, visa, mu ntumbero yo gukumira ikiza ca coronavirus. Umushikiranganji Nibigira yavuze kandi ko bariko barakorana n'amakungu mu rugamba rwo kurwanya iki kiza. Yavuze ko n'Umurundi yoba ashaka gutahuka yoba aratenyenya ngo kuko amagara ari yo aza imbere ya vyose. Mu gihe naho hogira uwubirengako akaza mu Burundi, ngo azokwakirwa ariko ace ashirwa ahawenyene ikiringo c'iminsi cumi n'ine. U Burundi ni co gihugu conyene mu karere kitaragaragaramwo uwanduye coronavirus, ariko hari abakekwa bamaze gufatwa ibipimo. Co kimwe no mu bindi bihugu, abari mu Burundi bahanurwa gukaraba intoke kenshi no kwirinda kwegerana ari benshi. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na Prudent Nsengiyumva wa BBC, umushikiranganji Ezechiel Nibigira yatanguye asigura icatumye iyo ngingo yo guhagarika gutanga visa ifatwa (ushobora kwumva ico kiganiro aho hejuru). Ushobora gusoma kandi:

headline: Ukraine ni nzima kandi ihagaze neza, niko Zelensky abwira Abanyamerika
text: Ukraine ni "nzima kandi ihagaze neza” kandi ntizigera imanika amaboko, niko Perezida Volodymyr yavuze, mw’ijambo yashikirije imbere y’inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka za Amerika mu rugendo rwiwe rwa mbere rwo hanze y’igihugu kuva Uburusiya butanguye igitero cabwo ku gihugu ciwe. Ku bwa Zelensky, imfashanyo ya gisirikare Amerika iha Ukraine si ubutabazi, ahubwo ni umutahe ku mutekano wa kazoza. Ateye aka kamo mu gihe hari ibimenyetso ko imfashanyo ya Amerika ishobora kwihwezwa cane n’abo mu mugambwe w’Abarepubulika mu nama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka. Ariko Perezida Biden yiyemeje gushigikira Ukraine “mu gihe cose bizoba nkenerwa”. Biden yaremereye ico gihugu iyindi mfashanyo y’imiriyaridi zibiri z’amadorari, aca yiyemeza ko hazoboneka n’iyindi y’imiriyaridi 45 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika. Mu kiganiro rusangi n’abamenyeshamakuru, Perezida Biden yavuze ko ata mpungenge namba afise zo gukomeza urunani mpuzamahanga. Mu gihe hari amakenga ko bimwe mu bihugu bicuditse na Amerika bishobora kuba vyumva biruhishijwe n’iyi ntambara n’ingorane z’imfungurwa be n’igitoro kw’isi, umukuru w’igihugu ca Amerika avuga ko ashima cane ingene bafatanye mu nda mu gushigikira Ukraine. Nk’incuti ikomeye ya Ukraine, Amerika imaze guha ico gihugu gihanganye n’Uburusiya imiriyaridi 50 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika nk’imfashanyo y’ubutabazi n’umutekano – isumba kure cane iy’igihugu kindi ico ari co cose. Perezida Zelensky – ari mu mwambaro w’intambara usanzwe umuranga, ugizwe n’agapira gasa n’urwatsi n’ibirato vy’intambara – yavuze ko yizeye ko inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka zizokwemeza imfashanyo y’inyongera y’imiriyaridi 45 z’amadorari y’Abanyamerika - ubu ikaba iri imbere y’inama nshingamateka – kugira ngo “idufashe kurwanira agateka n’ubwigenge vyacu”. Abarepubulika – mu gihe biteze gufata uburongozi bw’inama nshingamateka mu kwa mbere – baragabisha ko batazopfa kwemera vyose kuri Ukraine. Mu vy’ukuri, ugushaka kw’Abarepubulika mu gufasha Ukraine kugenda kugabanuka. Mu mwihwezo wakozwe mu kw’icumi na rimwe, inusu y’abanywanyi b’umugambwe w’Abarepubulika nibo bashigikiye ko Ukraine ibandanya ihabwa imfashanyo – ikaba yakorotse kuva ku rugero rwa 80% mu kwa gatatu. Ariko, Perezida Zelensky - yashitse muri Amerika ari mu ndege y’igisirikare ca Amerika kirwanira mu kirere avuye mu gisagara ca Rzeszow  muri Pologne -  avuga ko “n’aho mu nama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka himirije impinduka”, yizeye ko imigambwe yompi izoshigikira igihugu ciwe. Yashikirije ibi mu majambo ateye ibigumbagumba imbere y’inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka zikoraniye hamwe – ijambo ryaciriwemwo incuro 18 n’abagize izi mpande hafi bose bamukomera amashi, havuyemwo Abarepubulika bamwe bamwe batakomye amashi. Mu congereza, yababwiye ko igihugu ciwe kigihagaze neza mu “guhangana n’amabi yose”, anavuga ko abona y’uko “ibintu bizohinduka” muri ino ntambara mu mwaka uza. Mu kwerekana ubugome bw’ino ntambara, Zelensky yibukije ingene ingabo za Amerika zarwanije Aba-Nazi mu gihe c’intambara ya kabiri y’isi yose. "Uburyo Abarusiya barwana intambara ni ubwataye igihe. Baraturira bakabomora ico babonye cose. Barungika impfungwa ku rwasiro, mu ntambara". Ati: "Nka kurya nyene abasirikare ba Amerika barinze ku rwasiro bagahangana n’ingabo za Hitler kuri Noël ya 1944, abasirikare b’inshirwarimenetse ba Ukraine bariko bakora nk’uko nyene ku ngabo [z’umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya Vladimir Putin] kuri ino Noël”. "Ukraine ihagaze neza kandi ntizokwigera imanika amaboko”. Mu kurangiza ijambo ryiwe, Zelensky yashikirije inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka ibendera ririko amazina y’abasirikare bariko bararwanira Bakhmut, igisagara kiberamwo intambara mu buseruko bwa Ukraine yagendeye imbere y’uko afata urugendo rwa Washington. Iyi mfashanyo yo mu rwego rw’umutekano yatangajwe na Washington ejo ku wa gatatu irimwo misire zo mu bwoko bwa Patriot, izofasha Ukraine gukingira ibisagara vyayo ibitero vya misire na za ndege zitagira abadereva (drones) bikorwa n’Uburusiya ku bibanza bikomakomeye. Umushikiranganji w’Uburusiya ajejwe imigenderanire avuga ko guha Ukraine misire zo muri ubu bwoko bizofatwa nk’agasomborotso.

headline: UK: Abarongoye amakompanyi bemeye kwongereza abakozi b'abirabure
text: Amakompanyi Barclays na Deloitte hamwe n'ayandi atari make mu Bwongereza yiyemeje kwongereza igitigiri c'abakozi b'abirabure, ni mu ntumbero yo kurwanya akarenganyo gakorerwa abirabure. Mw'ikete ryateweko umukono n'abarongoye amakompanyi 40, basavye n'ayandi makompanyi gukora gutyo. Umukuru w'umurwi witaho Uburinganire n'Uburenganzira bwa Muntu mu Bwongereza yabwiye BBC  ko amakompanyi ategerezwa kwiha intumbero yo kwongereza abakozi batari abazungu mu nzego zo hejuru. David Isaac avuga ko amakompanyi akeneye "kugira uruhara rukomeye" mu guha ikibanza gikomeye abantu mu butandukane bwabo. Avuga ko urupfu rwa George Floyd muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika rwashize ahabona akarenganyo gakorerwa abantu atari abazungu. Icegeranyo ciswe Colour of Power 2020, cakozwe n'ikigo Green Park gitanga ubuhanuzi ku bijanye n'ubutandukane, kivuga ko mu nzego zo hejuru mu makompanyi atari make mu Bwongereza, muri leta no mu bundi butegetsi bw'igihugu, inkehwa zingana n'ibice bidashika 5%. Kivuga ko ibiharuro bisa n'ivyagumye uko muri ino myaka mike iheze. Umukuru wa kompanyi E.On UK, Michael Lewis, yagize ico avuga ku vyo ayo makompanyi yiyemeje akavuga ati: "Tuzokwama duharanira ivyo twemera kandi twerekane ko dushize hamwe mu kurwanya ivanguramoko, kwigisha abandi no kwishimira ubudasa, ivyo bikazoduha inguvu zo guhindura isi ". Mu gutera igikumu kuri urwo rwandiko, abarongoye amakompanyi biyemeje gufata ingingo ziboneka mu ntumbero yo kwongereza igitigiri c'abirabure mu bakozi bayo. Zimwe muri izo ngingo harimwo: Suki Sandhu, uwatanguje akaba ari nawe arongoye ishirahamwe Imvolve ryishinze guhimiriza ubutandukane mu buzi, ni umwe mu bari muri iryo sekeza, avuga ko yatewe intege n'igitigiri c'abemeye gushira igikumu kuri urwo rwandiko. Avuga ati: "Akamo katewe n'isekeza Black Lives Matter ntikagiye uko, kandi amakompanyi akeneye guhaguruka agafata iya mbere mu mpinduka zigamije kwongereza abirabure mu buzi". "Ndafise icizere ko, mu gihe abayobozi benshi bateye igikumu kuri iri kete, dushobora gufatira ku ngingo biyemeje tukazana impinduka mu kazi kandi tukaguma dukurikirana ingene biguma bigenda, kuko amakompanyi ategerezwa kwama atanga ivyageranyo  buri mwaka ". Hagati aho, amakenga ntabura mu bakozi bamwe bamwe b'abirabure. Umwe mu bakozi ba Barclays atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana, yabwiye BBC ati: "Nzovyemera ndabibonye". Icegeranyo Colour of Power 2020 kivuga ko mu bantu 1,097 barongoye inzego nkuru nkuru mu Bwongereza, 1,046 bose ari abazungu.

headline: Ebola - Uganda: uturere tubiri turataramuwe mu kiringo c’indwi zitatu
text: N﻿a Elsa Maishman BBC News Reta ya Uganda yatangaje ingingo zo kwugara uturere tubiri tubangamiwe n’ikiza karanda ca Ebola, mu gihe ico gihugu kiriko gikora uko gishoboye kugira gituze iki kiza. Ububare, amazu y’ubutambiro y’ijoro, ibibanza vyo gusengeramwo be n’ivyo kwinezereza vyugawe i Mubende na Kassanda bihana urubibe, kandi hashizweho n’amategeko yo kutava muhira(couvre-feu/curfew). Iyi ngingo ni ukwisubirako ku mukuru w’igihugu ca Uganda yari aherutse kuvuga ko ingingo nk’izi zidakenewe. Iki giza kimaze guhitana ubuzima bw’abantu 19 muri 58 bamaze kumenyekana ko banduye. Gusa, igitigiri nyezina c’abanduye n’abamaze gupfa gishobora kuba kirenga aho. Iki kiza catanguye mu ntango z’ukw’icenda i Mubende akarere kari ku birometero vyababa 80 uvuye ku mugwa mukuru Kampala, kandi kabandanya ari ikiririmbiro ryaco. Imbere y’aha, Perezida Museveni yari yiyamirije ivyo gutaramura, avuga ko Ebola atari umugera uca mu muyaga, ko rero idasaba ingingo nk’iza Covid-19. Ariko nijoro ku wa gatandatu yahagaritse uruja n’uruza rwose mu turere twa Mubende na Kassanda mu kiringo c’imisi 21. Avuga ariko ko amakamyo atwara ibintu azobandanya yinjira asohoka muri utwo turere, ariko ko ibindi bikorwa vyose vyo kwunguruza abantu bizotegerezwa guhagarara. Muri iryo jambo yacishije ku mboneshakure, yavuze ati: "Izi ni ingingo z’igihe gito kugira ngo duhagarike ikwirakwira rya Ebola. "Dutegerezwa gukorana n’abategetsi kugira ngo duhagarike iki kiza mu gihe gito gishoboka”. Perezida Museveni yari yamaze gutegeka igipolisi guhagarika umuntu uwo ari we wese yiketsweko uwu mugera ariko akanka kwitaramura. Yabujije kandi na ba rumenyi/abapfumu kudahirahira ngo barondere kuvura abanduye uwu mugera. Mu biza vy’imbere y’aha, ba rumenyi bagiye bagirizwa ko bari mu batuma umugera ukwirakwira. Umuntu wa mbere yishwe n’iki kiza ni umugabo w’imyaka 24 w’i Mubende. Abantu batandatu bo mu muryango wiwe nabo nyene barapfuye. Cahavuye gishika no ku mugwa mukuru Kampala, aho umwe aherutse gupfa muri kuno kw’icumi. Ariko abajejwe amagara y’abantu bavuga ko ata mugera uranwa muri iki gisagara, kuko uyo mugabo yapfuye yari avuye i Mubende. Iki kiza c’ubu giterwa n’umugera wamuka muri Sudani, uwu nawo ukaba ata rucanco rwawo ruraboneka. Umugera uzwi “nk’umugera wa Zaire” - umugera wahitanye abantu 11.000 mu kiza karanda cadutse muri Afrika y’Uburengero kuva 2013 gushika 2016 - wowo urucanco rwawo ruriho. Ebola yandukira iyo umuntu akorakoye amazimazi y’umubiri w’uwanduye canke ikintu canduye. Mu bimenyetso vyayo harimwo kudahwa, gucibwamwo, rimwe na rimwe kandi no kuvira amaraso imbere canke hanze. Igihe co kwibonekeza gishobora kuva ku misi ibiri gushika ku ndwi zitatu, kandi uwu mugera ushobora kugiriranira isano n’izindi ndwara nka malaria na typhoid.

headline: HIV: Umugore wa mbere kw'isi yakize umugera wa SIDA atewe uturemangingo
text: Umugore wo muri Amerika abaye umuntu agize gatatu kw'isi, akongera akaba umugore wa mbere, akize umugera wa SIDA atewe uturemangingo. Uyu mugore yari asanzwe ariko avurwa indwara ya kanseri yo mu maraso (leucémie/leukaemia), aca aterwa uturemangingo tw'ikinyinanyina (stem cells/cellules souches) tw'umuntu asanzwe afise ubudahangarwa ndemanwa bwo kutandura umugera utera SIDA. Uyu mugore ubu amaze amezi 14 ata mugera umurimwo. Ariko abahinga bavuga ko ubu buhinga bwo gutera uturemangingo, hakoreshejwe amaraso yo mu ruzogi, bushobora kuvamwo ingorane ku bantu benshi bafise umugera wa Sida. Ivyabaye kuri uyu mugore vyashikirijwe mu nama y'ubuvuzi yabereye i Denver ku wa kabiri, rikaba ari irya mbere ubu buhinga bukoreshejwe nk'uburyo bwo kuvura umugera wa SIDA. Uyu murwayi yatewe amaraso yo mu ruzogi nk'imwe mu nzira yo kumuvura kanseri kandi kuva ico gihe ntiyigeze akenera ya miti yo gupfupfahaza ihabwa abarwaye umgera wa Sida. Ibi biri mu bushakashatsi bukomeye buriko burakorwa muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ku bantu bagendana umugera wa SIDA bakaba barahawe ubwoko nk'ubwo nyene bw'amaraso mu kuvura kanseri n'izindi ndwara zikomeye. Utu turemangingo (cellules/cells) twatewe uyu muntu dufise ubushobozi bwo guhindagura kamere (mu gifaransa mutation génétique) ku buryo tudashobora kwandura umugera wa SIDA. Abahinga bemeza ko abasoda b'umubiri bongereza ubudahangarwa umuntu ntashobore kwandura uwu mugera. Amakuru yose avuga ibijanye no kuvura umugera wa SIDA ni amakuru akomeye cane kandi yo kwishimira cane - yerekana ko hazogera igihe hakaboneka umuti wo kuwuvura. Ariko gusa, ubu buryo ntibusigura ko turi hafi yo kuronka umuti wo kuvura imiriyoni 37 zose z'abagendama umugera wa SIDA kw'isi, abenshi muri aba bakaba baba musi y'ubugaragwa bwa Sahara ku mugabane wa Afrika. Ukuvura hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bw'uturemangingo bwatanguye kwerekanwa mu 2007 igihe Timothy Ray Brown yaba umuntu wa mbere kw'isi "yavuwe agakira" umugera wa SIDA. Yatewe uturemangingo tw'umuntu yari asanzwe afise ubudahangarwa ndemanwa bwo kutandura umugera. Kuva ico gihe, ikintu nk'iki kimaze gusubirwamwo incuro zibiri gusa kuri Adam Castillejo hanyuma rero n'ubu kuri uyu mugore w'i New York. Aba batatu bose bari bafise kanseri bakaba bari bakeneye guterwa utu turemangingo kugira bashobore kurokoka. Kuvura umugera wa SIDA ntiyari yo ntumbero ya mbere kandi ubu ni uburyo bushobora guteza ibibazo bikomeye ku buryo budashobora gukoreshwa ku bantu bose barwaye umugera wa SIDA. Ico abantu bokwibuka ni uko imiti yo gupfupfahaza iha akaryo abagendana umugera wa SIDA ko kubaho ubuzima busanzwe nk'abandi bose. Ivyizigiro nyamukuru biri ahanini ku ncanco canke ibinini bishobora kwirukana uwu mugera mu mubiri. Mu kuvura uyu mugore hakoreshejwe amaraso yo mu ruzogi, ariko siko vyari vyagenze kuri aba barwayi babiri b'imbere yiwe bobo bahawe uturemangingo two mu misokoro yo mu magufa. Amaraso yo mu ruzogi niyo aboneka cane gusumba uturemangingo tw'ikinyinanyina twakoreshejwe imbere y'aha kandi ubu buryo bukaba budasaba ko amaraso y'uwutanga nay''uwakira aba yegeranye cane. Sharon Lewin, aherutse gutorwa ngo arongoye ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya umugera wa SIDA kw'isi, aragabisha ko ubu buhinga bwo gutera ubu bwoko bw'uturemangingo bwakoreshejwe kuri uyu mugore atari bwiza ku bantu bose bagendana umugera wa SIDA. Ariko, yongerako y'uko ivyabaye kuri uyu mugore "vyerekana ko umuti wo kuvura umugera wa SIDA ushobora kuboneka kandi bugatanga icizere ko kuwuvura hakoreshejwe uturemangingo ari uburyo bukomeye mu kuvura uwu mugera". Ivyavuye muri ubu bushakashatsi bwa vuba ntiburahinyurwa ngo bushirwe ahabona mu kinyamakuru, vyumvikana rero ko ata vyinshi biramenyekana kuri bwo.

headline: Lady Gaga n'umufana bituye hasi bavuye hejuru ku butambiro i Las Vegas, batanguza imitwe
text: Lady Gaga yaraguye atanguza umutwe amaguru aja hejuru agwa mu barorerezi mu giteramo giheruka mu muji wa Las Vegas. Uwo 'musani' yari yahamagaye umufana wiwe azwi nka Jack ngo aze ku butambiro, aca asimbira mu maboko yiwe - ariko uwo mufana abura intege bose baca batembera hasi. Umwe mu bariko bararorera igiteramo yanditse agira ati "n'ukuri twari tuzi yuko apfuye". Ahubwo Gaga yaciye agaruka ku butambiro aririmba indirimbo Million Reasons na Jack amuri impande.
