Yagize ati "Birahimbaye. Turakundana cane ku buryo twaguye twese tuva ku butambiro." "Twagwanye mu maboko. Turi nka Jack na Rose bo muri Titanic. "Ndibaza ko tuza gusangira icayi nyuma y'aha." Abafana bari bagize ubwoba bibaza ko Gaga yababaye kuko asanzwe afise uburwayi buzwi nka fibromyalgia, uburwayi amaranye igihe butuma ababara umubiri wose. Ubwo burwayi bushobora kandi gutuma ababa birengeje, akaruha, inyama z'umubiri zikagumirwa, kwibuka bikamugora kandi akabura itiro. Mu 2013, yahagaritse ibiteramo vy'urukurikirane Born This Way amaze kuvunika ikiyunguyungu. Ariko uwo muririmvyi kugwa kw'ejo kuwa kane ntaco kwamutwaye, ahumuriza abarorerezi hamwe n'abajejwe umutekano bamufashije guhaguruka. Kanda ngaha urabe ingene Lady Gaga n'umufana baguye Yagize ati: "Vyose ni sawa. Ikintu kimwe kitagenda ni uko dukeneye ingazi kuri ubu butambiro kugira nsubire hejuru." Uwo 'musani' yanahojeje Jack, yari yarenzwe n'umwosori kubera ivyari bihejeje kuba. Gaga yagize ati: "Ntugire ingorane, vyose ni sawa. Si ikosa ryawe. Urashobora kunyemerera ikintu? Urashobora kwibabarira ubu nyene kubera ibihejeje gushika?" Nyuma muri ico giteramo, Gaga yarerekanye yuko ukwo kugwa ata na kimwe kwamutwaye aca akora ikarasisi rikomeye ariko araririmba indirimbo yiwe ikunzwe, Bad Romance.

headline: Diego Maradona: Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru apfuye ku myaka 60
text: Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru Diego Maradona yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo ku myaka 60. Uyu yahoze ari rutahizamu wo hagati wa Argentine akanaba umumenyereza, yarabazwe ubwonko kandi bigenda neza, igihe yagira ikibumbe c'amaraso mu bwonko mu ntango za kuno kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe. Vyaciye bitangazwa ko azovurwa ku kibazo yari afise co kwihebera inzoga. Maradona yari umwe mu bakinyi bakomeye isi imaze kubona, akaba yarabaye kapitene wa Argentine igihe yatwara igikombe co mu 1986, akina ku buryo buteye igomwe kandi bucibukwa n'ubu. Mu rwandiko rwashizwe ku mbuga hwaniro, ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Argentine ryavuze ko "tubabajwe cane n'urupfu rwa rurangiranwa wacu", ryongerako riti: "Uzokwama mu mitima yacu." Maradona yakiniye Barcelona na Napoli mu gukinira amakipe kwiwe, atwara ibikombe vya Serie A mu Butariyano. Yinjije ibitsindo 34 mu nkino 91 za Argentine, ayiserukira mi bikombe vy'isi bine. Maradona yashikanye igihugu ciwe mu rukino rwa nyuma mu gikombe c'isi co mu Butaliyano mu 1990, igihe batsindwa n'Ubudage bw'Uburengero, imbere y'uko asubira kuba kapitene mu gikombe c'isi muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 1994, ariko aza gusubizwa muhira kubera gufata imiti yongera inguvu. Mu muce wa kabiri w'ugukina kwiwe, Maradona vyaramugoye kwihanganira ikiyovyabwenge ca cocaine aranahagarikwa gukina amezi 15 nyuma yo gusanganwa mu maraso ico kiyovyabwenge mu 1991. Yagiye mu bukukuruke mu mupira w'amaguru mu 1997, ku munsi yakwiza imyaka 37 y'amavuko, mu kiringo ca kabiri akinira ikipe ikomeye yo muri Argentine, Boca Juniors. Nyuma yo kumenyereza igihe gito amakipe abiri muri Argentine igihe yari agikina, Maradona yagenywe kuba umumenyereza w'ikipe y'igihugu mu 2008 aca ava muri ako kazi nyuma y'gikombe c'isi co mu 2010, igihe ikipe yiwe yatsindwa n'Ubudage mu ca kane c'ihiganwa. Mu nyuma yaje kumenyereza amakipe muri United Arab Emirates na Mexique, anamenyereza Gimnasia y Esgrima, ikipe ikomeye cane muri Argentine, gushika ku gihe c'urupfu rwiwe.

headline: Sadio Mane: iki gihangange ca Liverpool yitiriwe ikibuga muri Senegal
text: Sadio Mané yaronse ikibuga kimwitiriye mu gisagara ca Sedhiou  muri Sénégal inyuma yo gufasha igihugu ciwe gutahukana igikombe c'ihiganwa rya Afrika mu mupira w'amaguru. Uyu musatirizi wa Liverpool yinjije penalty yavuyemwo itsinzi igihe umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Sénégal Lions de la Teranga ( Intambwe za Teranga) zatsinda Misiri ku ma penalty 4-2, maze utahukana ku ncuro ya mbere ihiganwa rya Afrika mu mupira w'amaguru, ni inyuma y'urukino rwa nyuma rwarangiye ari 0-0. Ibitsindo bitatu yinjije akongera agatanga imipira ibiri yavuyemwo ibitsindo kuri uyu murwi w'iki gihugu co muri Afrika y'uburengero muri iryo higanwa vyatumye aronka agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza (Most Valuable Player, MVP), ubu naho umukuru w'igisagara ca Sedhiou, Adboulaye Diop, akaba yavuze ko ikibuga c'umupira kigiye kwitirirwa uyu mwana wabo akundwa cane. Diop yasubiwemwo n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu avuga ati: "Mu kwitirira Sadio Mané iki kibuga Stade de Sédhiou, nashaka gushimira abahungu n'abakobwa bose bo muri ino ntara, ndabicishije ku mugabo amenyekanishije kw'isi yose, Bambali n'umugwa mukuru wayo Sédhiou". "Ni ukuri Sadio Mané arakwiye guhabwa iri teka". Mané yarakunzwe n'amamiriyoni y'abantu kubera ibikorwa vyiwe vyo gufasha mu karere avukamwo inyuma yo kubemerera amafaranga yo kwubaka ibitaro n'ishure, anatanga n'intererano zo kwubaka imisigiti, yongera atanga amafaranga yo gufasha kurwanya Covid-19. Imbere y'urukino rwa nyuma rw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya mu kwa gatanu 2018, Sadio Mané yahaye imipira ya Liverpool abafana ba Bambali kugira ngo bazobe bayambaye igihe urwo rukino rwariko ruraba. Ico gihe, Mané yavuze ati: "Hari abantu bashika 2000 mu kigwati. Naguze imipira 300 ya Liverpool ndayirungikira abantu mu kigwati kugira ngo abafana bayambaye igihe bazoba bariko bararorera urukino rwa nyuma". Bambali niho Mané yarabiye urukino rwa nyuma rwabaye rurangiranwa hagati ya Liverpool na AC Milan mu 2005, aho Liverpool yivyukiranya yari yatsinzwe 3-0 mu gice ca mbere, ariko vyose irabikurayo mu gice ca kabiri, mbere iruhira gutahukana iri higanwa, ico gihe Mané yari afise imyaka 13. Ntiyigera yibagira i muhira. Urugendo rwa Mané rwabaye rurerure gushika aho aba umukinyi rurangiranwa kw'isi yose, atanguriye muri Metz mu Bufaransa gushika muri Liverpool abanje guca muri RB Salzburg yo muri Autriche/Austria no muri Southampton. Uyu mukinyi w'umwaka ku mugabane wa Afrika yaripfuza cane gutahukana iki gikombe muri Sénégal inyuma yo gutsindira ihiganwa ry'Ubwongerza Premier League hamwe n'ihiganwa rya Bulaya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Uefa Champions League) na Liverpool. Inyuma y'intsinzi y'umurwi wiwe muri Cameroun/Cameroon, Mané avuga ko gutsindira Sénégal mu gikombe ca mbere ca Afrika mu mupira w'amaguru ari co kintu ca mbere gikomeye ashitseko mu mwuga wiwe wo gukina umupira.

headline: Arsenal: Ibintu ntivyoroshe, ibiriko biyibako vyaheruka mu 1913
text: Mu nkino 25 umaze gukina, umurwi wa Arsenal umaze gutsindamwo zitandatu gusa, unganya mu nkino 13 utsindwa zitandatu, ibitari bwigere biwubako kuva mu mwaka w'inkino wa 1912/1913. Ejo ku wa Mungu, urukino rwayihuje na Burnley rwarangiye ari 0-0, inyuma y'aho umunyegori wa Arsenal akuriyemwo imipira ikomeye yari guha intsinzi Burnley. Arsenal ibaye umurwi wa mbere mu mateka y'ihiganwa ryumupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza, Premier League, unganije mu nkino zishika 13 kuri 25 zimaze gukinwa mu mwaka w'inkino umwe. Muri urwo rukino, n'aho Burnley yashoboye kwiganzura Arsenal inyuma y'inkino 11 zose iyitsinda, yabuze amahirwe menshi yo kwihaniza uwo murwi umenyerezwa na Mikel Arteta. Abakinyi Jeff Hendrick na James Tarkowski  bahushije ibitsindo vy'umutwe, nayo  Jay Rodriguez wewe akaba yari yizeye ko atsinze, ariko umupira ukubita umwamba musi, uca usubira mu kibuga. Vyabaye ngombwa ko ubuhingwa bwa none bwerekana ko umupira utashoboye umurongo ngo winjire mw'igori. Arsenal iba ironse ayo mahirwe yo guheza inkino indwi zikurikirana mu mahiganwa atandukanye idatsindwa, hamwe n'izindi indwi nyene imaze idatsinzwe mu nkino imaze gukinira hanze. Kuva uno mwaka wa 2020 utanguye, imaze gukina inkino zine za Premier League inganya, ibitari biherutse kuva mu kwa kabiri 2009. Kizigenza wayo Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang yagarutse inyuma y'igihano yahawe c'ukudakina inkino zitatu, ariko Arsenal nta kintu kinini yerekanye n'aho kenshi wasanga ari yo igumije umupira umwanya muremure. Mw'ihiganwa rya Premier League ry'uno mwaka w'inkino 2019/2020, Arsenal imaze gutsinda inkino zitandatu gusa, urukino rw'ejo rukaba rwari rugize 13 ruhera inganije. Mu rukino rwayo rw'imbere yaho ku wa 21/01, yavuye aho rwotera izuba inganije na Chelsea ibitsindo 2-2 kandi yamaze iminota hafi 70 yose ikina idakwiye ku kibuga ca Chelsea, inyuma y'aho David Luiz aherewe ikarata itukura kw'ikosa yakoreye umusatirizi Tammy Abraham. Kuva  ku wa 20/12/2019,  Mikel Arteta yagenywe nk'umumenyereza wa Arsenal inyuma y'aho yirukanye umunya Espagne Unai Emery mu kwa 11. Amaze gutsinda urukino rumwe gusa muri Premier League, n'aho abihweza ibintu n'ibindi babona ko hari icahindutse kuva atanguye amabanga muri uwo murwi.

headline: Umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru, Zlatan Ibrahimovic ngo yoba agira agaruke muri Manchester United
text: Manchester United ngo yoba iri mu biganiro n'umukinyi Zlatan Ibrahimovic mu ntumbero yo kumugarukana Oldtrafford, nyuma y'aho aviriye muri LA Galaxy n'igihuha c'uko agira ahebe gukina, nk'uko vyatangajwe n'ikinyamakuru MailOnline. Uwo mukinyi rurangiranwa w'imyaka 38 yavuye Old Trafford aja mw'ikipe LA Galaxy yo mw'ihiganwa MLS ryo muri Amerika mu 2018, nyuma yo kwinjiza ibitsindo 29 mu myaka ibiri yakiniye United. Kandi ikinyamakuru candikirwa kuri internet co mu Butariyano, TuttoMercatoWeb, kivuga ko United ishobora kumuha akazi mu gihe irondera inguvu mu bakinyi b'imbere. Ibrahimovic yatwaye ibikombe vya Europa League na Carabao Cup akinira United igihe yamenyerezwa na Mourinho, kandi yinjiza igitsindo c'intsinzi mu rukino rwa nyuma na Southampton. United ubu imenyerezwa na Ole Gunnar Solskhaer, imaze iminsi ifise ibibazo vyo kwinjiza ibitsindo, kandi kugerageza kugura Mario Mandzukic wo muri Juventus vyigijwe mu ci riza. Kandi nyuma yo kugenda kwa Romelu Lukaku na Alexis Sanchez muri Inter Milan, Ibrahimovic asa n'uwigaragaje nk'uwuronderwa bwa mbere na United.

headline: Coronavirus: Putin avuga ko urucanco rwemejwe ko rushobora gukoreshwa
text: Umukuru w'igihugu c'u Burusiya, Vladimir Putin, avuga ko urucanco rwakorewe muri ico gihugu rwo gukinga Covid-19 rwamaze kwemezwa ko ari nyarwo inyuma y'amezi adashika abiri ruriko rurageragerezwa ku bantu. Perezida Putin avuga ko urwo rucanco rwakorewe umwihwezo wose utegerezwa, yongerako y'uko n'umukobwa wiwe yamaze kuruhabwa. Abategetsi bavuga ko bafise integuro yo gucandaga abanyagihugu mu kivunga kuva mu kwezi kw'icumi. Abahinga berekanye amakenga ku kuntu urwo rukingo rwihutishijwe n'Uburusiya, bakabona ko abashakashatsi bashaka gufata inzira ya hafi. Mu gihe hari ubwoba ku ngaruka zarwo, umuryango witaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, mu ndwi iheze wasavye Uburusiya gukurikiza amategeko mpuzamakungu ku bijanye no gukora urucanco rwa Covid-19. Urwo rucanco rw'Uburusiya ntiruri ku rutonde rw'incanco zitandatu za OMS zemewe kugeragezwa ku rugero rwa gatatu, harimwo no kuzigeragereza ku bantu. Mu gihe avuga ko ari urwa mbere kw'isi, Perezida Putin amenyesha ko uru rucanco rwakozwe n'ikigo Gamaleya c'i Moscou, ari "urukingo nyarwo" rwo kurwanya coronavirus. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, Mikhail Murashko, avuga ko uru rucanco "rwerekanye ko rukora neza kandi ko ata ngaruka rufise", akavuga ko ari intambwe ikomeye mu nzira yo gutsinda Covid-19. Urwo rucanco rwiswe Sputnik V,  izina rifatiye ku kigendajuru ca mbere c'igihingurano cabaye kw'isi, rigafatwa n'Uburusiya nk'intsinzi kuko kibaye igihugu ca mbere kwemeza urucanco, nk'uko bivugwa n'umwe mu bategetsi b'iki gihugu asubirwamwo n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters. Kirill Dmitriev arongoye ikigega c'Uburusiya, RDIF,  avuga ko iki gihugu kimaze kuronka ibihugu birenga 20 vyamaze gusaba urwo rucanco ku rugero runganga n'umuliyaridi. Mu ndwi iheze, leta y'Uburusiya yatangaje ko yariko irategura gutangura gucandaga abanyagihugu mu kivunga inyuma y'aho imenyeshereje ko yakoze igerageza ry'urwo rucanco. Kw'isi hari incanco zirenga 100 ziriko zirakorwa, zimwe muri zo zikaba ziriko zirageragerezwa ku bantu. N'aho urwo rucanco rwihuse, abahinga nka bose babona ko ata rucanco ruriko ruraboneka kw'isi yose imbere ya 2021 hagati. Kw'igenekerezo rya kane rya kuno kwezi kw'umunani, umuvugizi wa OMS, Christian Lindmeier, yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: "Rimwe na rimwe abashakashatsi ku giti cabo baravuga ko babonye ikintu, ni vyo ko ico kiba ari ikintu gikomeye". "Ariko ikibazo nyamukuru ni ukuronka urucanco rukora, kandi bibanje guca mu nzira zose zikenewe".

headline: Mason Greenwood: Uyu muyabaga rutahizamu wa Man Utd azoshikana hehe?
text: "Ntafyinira imbere y'igoli." "Kwinjiza ibitsindo bimuri mu maraso." "Ni icago ku kipe ihura nawe." Abamukeza babaye benshi mu gihe Mason Greenwood yanditse ayandi mateka ku wa kane, mu gukina kwiwe kugitangura. Ku myaka 18 n'iminsi 72, uyu rutahizamu yabaye umukinyi wa Manchester United akiri muto kurusha abandi atsinze ibitsindo bibiri mw'ihiganwa rya Buraya aho United yatsinda 4-0 AZ Alkmaar mw'ihiganwa rya Europa League. Vyabaye ibitsindo vyiwe bigira gatanu na gatandatu mw'ikipe y'abakuze bikaba vyigaragaza ko azoba uwundi rurangiranwa avuye mw'ishure ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Manchester United. Mu vy'ukuri, Greenwood yarigaragaje cane mu bakiri bato, umumenyereza Ole Gunnar Solskjaer akaba yari amaze imyaka 11 amureretse ijisho. Solskjaer yahagaritse gukinira United mu 2007 yagize ati: "Ahubwo ndibuka aho nahura nawe ubwa mbere kuko umuhungu wanje nawe yagirira imyimenyerezo i Chill mu bafise imyaka umunani. Mason yari afise indwi." "Ndamubona ubwa mbere yaraboneka ko arusha abandi kandi twarifotoje hamwe. None ubu ari ngaha. Ibi nivyo dukora. "Namusavye ko twifotoza kuko nari nzi yuko azoba umukinyi. Nibaza ko iyo foto ayifise, canke se niwe ashobora kuba ayifise." None mu gihe yari umukinyi mwiza akiri muto cane uko, urwego ashobora gushikako ni uruhe? 'Ni icago ku bakinyi b'inyuma' - uko abonwa n'abamwegereye muri Man Utd Hari abatangaye igihe Solskjaer yemera ko Alexis Sanchez na Romelu Lukaku bagenda mw'ici riheruka kandi, hako azana abandi bakinyi bazimvye bo kubasubiriza, yashize icizere muri Greenwood. Iyo ngingo yafashe ubu isa nk'iyifise ishingiro, kuko Greenwood ubu amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo vyinshi kurusha ivyo Sanchez yinjije igihe cose yamaze Old Trafford. Solskjaer yagize ati "Twari tuzi ko afise impano". "Ku bwanje, guteza imbere umuntu afise impano nk'izi, nta handi wobikorera hasumvya ngaha (muri United)." Ku bitsindo vyiwe bibiri yinjije ejo, Solskjaer yongeyeko ati: "Birya ni vyo akora. Arabikora mu myimenerezo - kuri we ni ibisanzwe kandi uko asatira igoli niko asumbiriza gukara. Ni icago ku bakinyi b'inyuma." Mugenzi wa Greenwood bakinana, Juan Mata, ntatangara iyo abonye uyu muhungu avyifatamwo neza ku rwego rwo hejuru. Uwo munye Espagne agira ati "Igihe cose iyo akinye, aratsinda." "Turiko turimenyereza, ashobora kudakora ku mupira kenshi ariko arakomeye mu kwinjiza kandi ntafyina imbere y'igoli. Ni umwana mwiza kandi ndahimbawe ku bwiwe." Uwahoze ari umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United Owen Hargreaves ntakekeranya ko Greenwood ashitse aho yokina ku rwego rwo hejuru mu mupira w'amaguru naho akiri muto. Hargreaves yabariye BT Sport ati: "Ibitsindo yinjiza, sinzi ingene abigenza ariko atera umupira neza cane. Ndakunda kuraba ingene atsinda kuko aravyorosha cane. Ntahatiriza. "Afise uwo arabirako vyiza ari we Marcus Rashford, ico akeneye gusa n'ukumwigirako. Ku myaka yiwe, 18, nibaza ko ari umuntu yaremewe kwinjiza ibitsindo. Azoba rurangiranwa, nta nkeka." Uwahoze ari rutahizamu wa Manchester United Michael Owen avuga ko Greenwood afise ubushobozi bwo kumara imyaka myinshji ari umukinyi akomeye - mu gihe atoreka uku kuduga kwiwe kunyaruka kukamusindisha. "Uraba ko babishoye iyo bakiri bato cane, ariko ubu igikenewe ni guhagarara neza mu mutwe. "Niyabandanya muri ino nzira mw'ikipe nziza imaze kurerura urwaruka rutari rukeyi, urashobora kwizera ko vyose bikwiye. Nta nkeka azomara igihe kinini ari umukinyi akomeye."

headline: Umugambwe CNL mu Burundi urongowe na Agathon Rwasa usaba ko amabi uvuga ko ukorerwa ahagarara
text: Umugambwe CNL uriyamiriza ingendo y'ukutihanganiranira mu vya politike uvuga ko ikorwa na "bamwe bamwe mu bategetsi bo mu ntwaro n'umutekano" mu Burundi. Ivyo nivyo biri mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'uwo mugambwe ejo ku wa gatanu i Bujumbura, ni mu gihe havugwa ko abanywanyi b'uwo mugambwe baburabuzwa irya n'ino mu gihugu. Muri iryo tangazo ryatewe ko igikumu n'umushingamateka Simon Bizimungu, umunyamabanga mukuru w'uwo mugambwe ari nawe yarisomye, umugambwe CNL urashikiriza ivyo uvuga ko ari intambamyi zidasanzwe ugira mu bikorwa vyawo mu gihugu. Bimwe mu bibazo abanywanyi bawo bahanganye navyo ku rubuga harimwo "kwandika ibiranga umunywanyi wese agendeye ingoro y'umugambwe ku rwego rw'igihugu, Bwana Bizimungu akavuga ko ivyo bikorwa n'abajejwe umutekano, kandi ko biteye amakenga. Eka ngo umugambwe ntazi intumbero y'izo ntonde n'iherezo ryayo. CNL ivuga kandi ko abanywanyi bayo "bahohoterwa, baterwa ubwoba, bafatwa bagapfungwa ata mategeko yubahirijwe, bagasinzikarizwa ubuzima, eka bagakorerwa amarementanya". Umushingamateka Bizimungu avugako umugamwe CNL "wama uriko urabuzwa uburenganzira bwo kwugurura ingoro zawo mu ntara zimwe zimwe no mu ma komine". Hampande y'ivyo vyose, CNL iriyamiriza ingendo yo "gusibanganya ingoro zawo", umushingamateka Bizimungu akamenyesha ko iyo ngendo yibonekeje mu ma komine Muhuta mu ntara ya Rumonge, Buganda mu ntara ya Cibitoke, be no muri komine Gashikanwa, ni mu ntara ya Ngozi. Kuri ivyo, iryo tangazo ryongera ko riti: "Uko gusibanganya ingoro z'umugambwe vyarenze urugero aho haturiwe hongera harasamburwa ingoro y'umugambwe ku rwego rw'intara ya Bujumbura iri i Nyabiraba mw'ijoro ryo ku wa 15 rishira 16 ruheshi 2019 buca yugururwa". Ivyo biri uko mu gihe Uburundi bwitegurira amatora ategekanijwe mu mwaka uza wa 2020, amatora azotangura ku wa 20 z'ukwezi kwa gatanu nk'uko vyaraye bishikirijwe n'umukuru w'umurwi ujejwe gutuganya amatora muri ico gihugu. Aha, umugambwe CNL ukabona ko ivyo vyose uriko urakorerwa bifise intumbero yo "kugabanya canke kwugara urubuga rwa politike bifise intumbero yo gutoteza abatavuga rumwe na reta muri rusangi, cane cane CNL". Uwo mugambwe urongowe na Agathon Rwasa, icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'Inama Nshingamateka, usaba reta y'Uburundi kurekura abanywanyi bawo uvuga ko bafashwe bagapfungwa  "bazira ivyiyumviro vyabo vya politike". Abajijwe n'abamenyeshamakuru igitigiri c'abapfunzwe gushika ubu mu kiganiro yagiranye nabo kuri uyu wa gatanu ku ngoro yawo i Bujumbura, umushingamateka Bizumungu avuga ko abanywanyi b'uwo mugambwe barenga 60 ari bo bapfungiwe mu busho butandukanye mu gihugu. Bwana Bizimungu yagiriza bamwe mu batware ko bahungabanya ibikorwa vy'imigambwe yemewe n'amategeko kubera ukudatahura ibwirizwa ryerekeye imyiyerekano iba ku mugaragaro, agasaba reta ko yorikwiragiza hose. Abarongoye umugambwe CNL basaba reta ko yohagarika ico bise "ihohoterwa rikorwa na bamwe mu bagize ama komite y'umutekano ahurikiyemwo bose". Umugambwe CNL kandi usaba amakungu n'akarere gukurikiranira hafi uko ibintu vyifashe mu Burundi muri bino bihe. Leta y'Uburundi ntaco irashikiriza kuri ivyo bivugwa n'umugambwe CNL uherutse kwemererwa mu kwezi kwa kabiri uno mwaka, ukaba uboneka ko uri mu migambwe ifise igihagararo kini mu gihugu.

headline: 'Karibu sana Jangwani' - umumenyereza Kaze Cedric yageze muri Young Africans
text: Umugwi Young Africans wahaye ikaze umumenyereza w'umurundi Kaze Cedric yashitse muri  Tanzania kuwa kane aje kuba umumenyereza wayo. Young Africans yamenyesheje iyo nkuru ku rubuga rwawo rwa Twitter, kuwa gatanu yashize umukono ku masezerano y'imyaka ibiri nk'uko uyu mugwi nyene wabitangaje. Kaze aje gukorera mu ngata umunye Serebiya, Zlatko Krmpotic yari amaze muri uwo mugwi imisi 37 gusa. Muri uyu mugwi ahasanze umukinyi w'imbere w'umurundi Saido Ntibazonkiza wawujemwo muri iyi ndwi. Eka n'umunyarwanda Haruna Niyonzima wawugiyemwo ku mpera y'umwaka uheze. Ku myaka 40, ni umwe mu batoza b'abarundi bakiri bato agiye kumenyereza umwe mu migwi izwi cane mu karere k'ibiyaga binini. Afise 'licence' ya FIFA yo kumenyereza yo ku rwego rwa A. Yahora ari umukinyi wo hagati wa Prince Louis Rwagasore FC i Bujumbura, hanyuma aza no kuyibera umumenyereza. Yagaragaje ubuhinga mu kumenyereza ari muri Atletico Olympic FC aho yatwaye ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Burundi, mbere aba umumenyereza w'umwaka 2010/2011. Hanyuma yagiye mu Rwanda aba umumenyereza wa Mukura VS (2013 - 2014) imbere yo kuja kuba umumeyereza mw'ishure ry'umupira rya Barcelone (FC Bescola Soccer School) i Edmonton muri Canada. Yaramenyereje kandi imigwi nserukiragihugu y'Uburundi y'urwaruka, eka n'umugwi nserukiragihugu w'abakuze, akaba yahagarariye inkino z'iyo migwi zishika 70 hagati y'umwaka wa 2009 na 2015. Young Africans batazira 'Yanga' canke 'Wana Jangwani' ni wo mugwi watwaye ibikombe vya shampiyona ya Tanzania vyinshi, 22, ariko kuva mu 2017 nturasubira gukoza iminwe ku gikombe. Umukeba wawo Simba Sport Club ni wo umaze iyo myaka itatu wikurikiranya gutwara ico gikombe. Uvuga ko witeze vyinshi ku mukinyi w'imbere, Saido Ntibazonkiza eka n'umumnyereza Kaze Cedric. Mu kumuha ikaze iyi kipe yanditse kuri Twitter iti: "Karibu sana Jangwani..."

headline: I﻿kirimba ca Buckingham Palace catangaje ko Umwamikazi Elizabeth II yashengeye
text: Umwamikazi Elizabeth II, yari arambiye ku ngoma kurusha abandi mu mateka y'Ubwongereza, yashengeye ari i Balmoral ku myaka 96, nyuma yo kumara ku ngoma imyaka 70. Umuryango wiwe wahuriye ku kirimba kiri muri Ecosse nyuma yaho amagara yiwe atereye impungenge nyinshi mu gitondo co kuri uno wa kane. Umwamikazi yimye mu 1952, ku ngoma yiwe hakaba harahindutse vyinshi cane mu buzima bw’igihugu. Mu gihe atabarutse, umuhungu wiwe mukuru Charles, uwahoze ari Umuganwa wa Wales, azorongora umuhango wo kumwunamira nk’Umwami mushasha akaba n’umukuru w’amaleta 14 y’urunani Commonwealth. Mu rwandiko, ikirimba ca Buckingham cagize giti: "Umwamikazi yapfuye mu mahoro ari Balmoral ku muhingamo w’uno munsi. "Umwami n’Umwamikazi wiwe baraguma i Balmoral kuri uno mugoroba bakazosubira i London ejo mu gitondo." Abana bose b’Umwamikazi bari bagiye i Balmoral, hafi ya Aberdeen, nyuma y’aho abaganga bashiriye Umwamikazi mu bugenduzi bukomeye bw’abaganga. Umwuzukuru wiwe, Umuganwa William, nawe ni ho ari, hamwe na mwene wabo, Umuganwa Harry. Ingoma y’Umwamikazi Elizabeth II yabonye ibihe nka vyose vy’intambara, guhinduka kw’ubwami bw’ubwami (Empire) hakaza Commonwealth, kurangira kw’intambara iteruye izwi nka Guerre Froide/Cold War hamwe n’ukwinjira kw’Ubwongereza – no kuva kwabwo – mw’Ishirahamwe rya Buraya. Ingoma yiwe yabayemwo abashikiranganji ba mbere 15 guhera kuri Winston Churchill, yavutse mu 1874, hamwe na Liz Truss, yavutse imyaka 101 nyuma mu 1975, akaba yaragenywe n’Umwamikazi mu ntango z’ino ndwi. Yaraha imibonano umushikiranganji wa mbere buri ndwi igihe cose yamaze ku ngoma. Ku kirimba ca Buckingham Palace i London, isinzi ry’abantu bari barindiriye kumenya amakuru y’Umwamikazi baciye biha amosozi bamaze kumenya inkuru y’urupfu rwiwe. Umwamikazi yavutse yitwa Elizabeth Alexandra Mary Windsor, avukira i Mayfair, London, itariki 21 Ndamukiza (4) 1926.

headline: Igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi rikomeye kuri uyu mugoroba (19.08.2022)
text: Umumenyereza wa Arsenal Mikel Arteta yavuze ko umukinyi w'imbere ku ruhande w'uwo mugwi, Bukaya Saka, yimirije gushira umukono ku masezerano mashasha. Yagize ati:"Mfise icizere kinini ko uruhande rwacu n'urwa Bukayo tuvyumva kumwe - igisigaye n'ukubishira mu nyandiko", (Romano via Arsenal.com) Arteta yavuze kandi ko umugwi wiwe ushaka kwihweza neza abakinyi ufise ubu imbere yo kwiyumvira kugura abandi bashasha mu mwanya usigaye w'igura n'igurishwa. "Ategerezwa kuba umukinyi mwiza, dushaka kuzana umukinyi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru, atari kuba ari umukinyi gusa." Umukinyi wa Real Madrid, Casemiro muri iki gitondo yasezeye abo bahora bakinana muri uwo mugwi inyuma yo kwemera kuja gukinira umugwi wa Manchester United. Umumenyereza wa Madrid, Carlo Ancelotti yemeje mu gitondo ko uwo mukinyi yimirije gusezera ikibuga ca Bernabéu. (Skysport) Umuyobozi mukuru wa Borussia Dortmund Hans-Joachim Watzke yamiriye kure inkuru zivuga ko uwo mugwi ushobora ugura Cristiano Ronaldo. Bivuye ku nkuru z'ikinyamakuru BILD co mu Budagi cavuze ko Dortmund ishobora kuzana uwo mukinyi wa Manchester United. Watzke yagize ati:"Ndamukunda, kuvugisha ukuri n'iciyumviro ciza - kubona Cristiano akinira kuri Signal Iduna Park. Ariko nta masezerano n'amwe dufitaniye, kuri ivyo rero tureke kubandanya tubivuga." (Sky sport football) Umumenyereza wa Newcastle Eddie Howe yabwiye Real Madrid ko yokwibagira kugerageza kugura umukinyi Bruno Guimaraes  bivuye ku nkuru zivuga ko bariko baragira inguvu zo kumugura. Uwo munye Brezil w'imyaka 24 yari yaguzwe amapawundi imiliyoni 40 mu kwezi kwa mbere mu mugwi wa Lyon, bamubona nk'uwushobora gusubirira Casemiro ariko arerekeza muri Machester United.

headline: Kenya hatowe ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera utera Covid-19
text: Ubundi bwoko bwa coronavirus bwatowe muri Kenya, nk'uko bigaragazwa n'ivyambere vyavuye mu bushakashatsi buriko burakorwa n'ikigo c'ubushakashatsi mu buvuzi gikorana na reta, Kenya Medical Research Institute,Kemri. Ubwo bwoko Kenya yisangije, bwari bwatowe mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bw'igihugu ku cigwa cakozwe hagati y'ukwezi kwa gatandatu n'ukwezi kw'icumi, nk'uko vyavuzwe na Kemri. Hari hagikenewe gukorwa ubundi bushakashatsi  kugira hamenyekane ingaruka z'ubwo bwoko bushasha, nk'uko kibandanya kibivuga. Kenya gushika ubu haharurwa hafi abantu 100.000 bamaze kwandura umugera wa Covid-19 n'abarenga 1.700 iyo ndwara imaze kwica. Hagati aho bwa bwoko bunyaruka kwandukira cane bwatowe muri Africa y'epfo bumaze gutorwa mu bindi bihugu bitatu vyo muri Africa-Botswana bihana urubibe,Zambia na Gambia muri Africa y'Uburengero, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi, OMS. Ubu Africa imaze kurengana igitigiri c'umuliyoni w'abantu bamaze kwandura uwo mugera, abandura ku munsi akaba ari benshi gusumba umurindi wa mbere, nk'uko OMS ibandanya ivuga. Muri rusangi abantu bashika 25.223 nibo bavugwa ko bandura ku munsi hagati y'itariki 28 z'ukwezi kwa cumi na kabiri mu 2020 n'itariki 10 z'ukwa mbere uyu mwaka  muri Africa, igitigiri kiri kuri 39% hejuru y'icashitse kw'isonga mu ndwi zibiri zo mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 2020, aho abandura bashika 18.104 ku munsi, nk'uko bivugwa na OMS.

headline: OMS ivuga ko ikiza ruhonyanganda ca Ebola atari akaga gahanze isi yose
text: Ishami rya ONU ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi , OMS, ryafashe ingingo yo kudafata ikiza ca Ebola kiri mu gihugu ca Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi nk'ikibazo gihanze isi yose. OMS ivuga ko Ebola "ari ikiza gihanze cane" akarere, ariko ko atari ingorane y'isi yose. Hagati aho, rirababazwa n'uko ibihugu bitanga amahera make cane, angana n'igice gusa, c'amahera akenewe kugira ngo bashobore guhangana n'iyo ndwara. Ico kiza kimaze guhitana abantu barenga 1400 muri ico gihugu, kikaba kigize kabiri muri kahise. Muri iyi ndwi, hari abarwaye babonetse mu gihugu ca Uganda, mbere batatu muri bo barahasiga ubuzima, n'aho uwo mugera utarakwiragira hose. Ingingo y'ugutangaza ko indwara kanaka ko ari ingorane iahnze isi yose, iri mu  ngingo zikomeye cane zishobora gufatwa n'ishirahamwe OMS. Rimaze kubikora incuro zine gusa, harimwo iyafashwe ku kiza ca Ebola cari ciziziye akarere ka Afrika y'Uburengero, kigahitana abantu barenga ibihumbi 11. Mu bisanzwe ingingo nk'iyo isigura ko haca haboneka ayandi mahera n'abandi bakozi kugira ngo bashobore kurwanya ikiza kanaka - canke ingingo za politike zishobora guhagarika intambara kugira ngo abavuzi bashobore guhangana naco. Ntiyabaye ingingo yoroshe gufata. Dr Preben Aavitsland arongoye vy'imfatakibanza umurwi wa OMS ujejwe ibibazo bidasanzwe, avuga ko habaye impari ndende  n'ukutumvikana mu nama yihutirwa yabereye i Geneve ejo ku munsi wa gatanu kuri ico kiza. Ico kiza kirakwije ibikenewe kugira ngo citwe ko ari ikiza c'isi yose kuko ari ikibazo kidasanzwe kandi ko gishobora gukwiragira no mu bindi bice vy'isi. Ariko, utwigoro turiko dukorwa n'abari ku rubuga "ntidushobora gutsimbatazwa" mu kuvuga ko ari ikiza kidasanzwe. Dr Aavitsland avuga ati: "Iki si ikibazo gihanze isi yose, gihanze igihugu ca Kongo, kandi kirakomeye". Ariko, amenyesha ko ugutangaza ko ari ingorane ihanze isi yose bishobora gutuma n'imbibe zugarwa, eka n'indege zigahagarika ingendo zazo muri Kongo, ivyo navyo bikaba vyokwica gusumba gukiza. Avuga ati: "Nta nyungu yoboneka, ahubwo uruhombo rwoba runini". OMS yari imaze kugira inama zibiri zose yiga nimba ikiza ca Ebola muri Kongo gishobora gutangazwa nk'ingorane ihanze isi yose. Kuri izo ncuro zompi, iyo ngingo ntiyashoboye gufatwa kubera cari ikiza kiri mu karere gusa, kitari mu bindi bihugu. Ico kiza catanguye muri ico gihugu mu kwezi kw'umunani umwaka uheze wa 2018 kikaba ciganje mu ntara zibiri, Kivu y'Uburaruko na Ituri. Abarenga 2100 baramaze kuyandura, abarenga nabo 1400 ikaba yarabahitanye. Muri iyi ndwi, hari abarwaye babonetse mu gihugu ca Uganda, mbere babiri muri bo barahasiga ubuzima, n'aho uwo mugera utarakwiragira hose. N'aho OMS ivuga ko ivyo "biteye ubwoba", ivuga ko ata cemezo na kimwe cerekana ko umugera uriko urakwiragira muri Uganda . Abantu 27 nibo bikekwa ko boba barashikiranye n'umuryango wabonetsemwo iyo ndwara, bakaba bugananiwe ku mihana yabo aho bazoronkera urucanco rwa Ebola. OMS ivuga ko impinga ikiri ndende, ikamenyesha ko igikeneye imiliyoni 54 z'amadolari  mu miliyoni 98 ivuga ko yari ikeneye hagati y'ukwezi kwa kabiri n'ukw'indwi  kugira ihangane n'ico kiza.

headline: Burundi – Rwanda: Imvo n'Imvano ku nkino ngororamubiri mu biyaga binini
text: Ndabaramukije nongera ndabaha n'ikaze muri iki kiganiro c'Imvo n'Imvano co kuri uyu wa gatandatu igenekerezo ry'icenda ukwezi kwa cumi mu 2021.  Ikiganiro c'uyu musi cerekeye inkino za athlétisme mu bihugu vy'ibiyaga binini. Haraciye amezi abiri habaye inkino za Olympike zabereye i Tokyo mu Buyapani aho Uburundi bwari bwaserukiwe n'abanonotsi batandatu harimwo umwigeme rurangiranwa Francine Niyonsaba, Urwanda na rwo ruserukirwa n'abanonotsi batanu. Nta munonotsi n'umwe w'ivyo bihugu yashoboye gutahukana umudari muri izo nkino. Ariko inyuma y'izo nkino za Olympike, umwigeme Francine Niyonsaba yagirijwemwo kugira amakosa ariko ariruka imetero 5000, bigatuma ahagarikwa muri iryo higanwa, uwo mwigeme yabandanije guhiganwa mu zindi nkino mpuzamakungu zari zitunganijwe muri Amerika n'i Buraya. Aho mbere yashoboye kugira umwanya wa mbere mwiza kw'isi mu kwiruka imetero 2000 i Zagreb ku mugwa mukuru w'igihugu ca Croatia, mu gihe hari haheze imisi mike abaye uwa mbere ku metero 5000 i Zurich mu Busuisse. Uwo mwigeme yakiriwe nk'intwari atahutse mu Burundi kw'itariki 22 z'ukwezi guheze kwa 9. Umunonotsi yaheruka gutahukana umudari wo mu rwego rwo hejuru mu Burundi ni Vénuste Niyongabo, yatahukanye umudari w'inzahabu mu nkino za Olympike zabereye i Atlanta muri Amerika, mu 1996. Muri kahise, ibihugu vy'Uburundi n'Urwanda vyamye bigira abanonotsi bashika kure mu mahiganwa atandukanye ariko bakabura amahirwe yo gutahukana imidari ya Olympike. Iyindi midari ariko barayitsindiye bagenda banaca n'imihigo mu mahiganwa atandukanye. Aho twavuga nka Mukamurenzi Marcianna yatanguye kumenyekana ubwa mbere mu Rwanda aho yaca umuhigo mu 1977. Kuva ubwo atangura kuza aja guserukira Urwanda mu mahiganwa yo muri Afrika no mu yandi marushanwa yo ku rwego rw'isi harimwo n'inkino za Olympike yagiyemwo ubwa mbere i Los Angeles muri Amerika mu 1984. Yatsindiye imidari myinshi n'ibikombe vyinshi. Hari ivyo yatakaje kubera ibihe vya jenoside yabaye mu Rwanda muri 94, mugabo ivyo afise ubu bishika kw'i 180. Ubu aba mu gihugu c'Ubufaransa aho avuga ko aciruka n'aho ashitse mu myaka 62. Kubera iki ata banonotsi benshi bo mu Rwanda no mu Burundi bashika kure ngo batahukane imidari? Reta yogira uruhe ruhara muri iyo nzira? Uruhara rw'inararibonye mu kwinonora imitsi rwoba uruhe? Amakompanyi y'ubudandaji atandukanye aramaze kumenya akamaro ko gushigikira abanonotsi? Ivyo ni vyo bibazo tugiye guhigira inyishu muri kino kiganiro c'Imvo n'Imvano, mukaba muri kumwe na Cyriaque Muhawenayo muri studios za BBC i Nairobi. Uretse Francine Niyonsaba, acaruka, muri kino kiganiro tugiye kuba hamwe n'inararibonye mu vyo kwinonora imitsi zabaye rurangiranwa cane. Francine Niyonsaba nyene, n'aho ari we muto mu batumire b'uyu musi, tumutere iri teka kuko aherutse na we kuritera igihugu ciwe c'Uburundi, akarere n'umugabane wa Afrika. BBC iboneyeho n'akaryo ko kugukeza aho uri mu karuhuko mu Burundi. Uwundi tugiye kuba hamwe kandi ni inararibonye Dieudonné Kwizera batazira Muvuduka, nawe uri mu Burundi. Turi kumwe kandi n'umutegarugori Mukamurenzi Marcianna na we nyene mu gihe ciwe yabiciye biracika mu gihugu c'Urwanda, ubu uri i Bordeaux mu Bufaransa. Hamwe rero na Mathias Ntawurikura na we nyene wo mu Rwanda, ari i Kigali.

headline: Covid: South Africa yakoze ubwoko bwayo bw'urucanco Moderna
text: Abahinga mu bumenyi bo muri Afrika y'epfo barakoporoye urukingo Moderna rwa Covid, ikintu bavuga yuko kizofasha kwongera igitigiri c'abicandagisha muri Afrika. Uwo mugabane kuri ubu ni wo ufise igitigiri gito kw'isi c'abicandagisha Covid. Ikigo cahinguye uru rukingo rushasha - Afrigen Biologics - kivuga yuko cizera gutangura kugeragereza uru rukingo ku bantu mu kwezi kwa Munyonyo (11). Moderna mu ntango yaravuze yuko itazoshira inzitizi ku kwigana urukingo rwayo, bituma abahinga mu bumenyo b'i Cape Town baronka akaryo ko kwikorera ubwoko bwabo bw'urwo rukingo. Abo bashakashatsi bari bashigikiwe n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS. Petro Terblanche, umuyobozi wa Afrigen Biologics, yavuze ko batanguye buhoro, ariko ko bari bafise umugambi wo kwagura ibikorwa vuba cane. Yabariye BBC ati: "Twakoresheje impinyanyuro isa nk'iyakoreshejwe ku rukingo Moderna 1273. "Ibi biri mu mugambi w'utwigoro two ku rwego rw'isi two kurondera uburyo no kwubaka ubushobozi mu bihugu bifise ubutunzi bubayabaye, kugira bishobore kwirwanako." Uru rukingo ruriko ruriganwa ni urwo mu bwoko RNA messenger / ARN messager rwakozwe n'ikigo Moderna co muri Amerika. Pfizer-BioNTech nayo yarakoze urukino ikoresheje ubuhinga nk'ubwo nyene. Ni zimwe mu nkingo abajejwe intwaro hirya no hino kw'isi, batanguye kwemerera gukoreshwa. Ubu bwoko bw'urukingo bwigisha uturemangingo tw'umubiri ukuntu duhingura umusemburo ukabura ubwirinzi bw'imbere mu mibiri yacu, hako hashirwa mu mubiri agakoko katswe ubukana. Uwujejwe ubuhinga n'ubumenyi muri ico kigo, Dr Caryn Fenner, yavuze ko ivyashitsweko "ari ngirakamaro cane." Yongeyeko ati "Bishira ububasha mu maboko yacu bwo gushobora guhingura inkingo zacu bwite muri kazoza, tugashobora kwitegurira ibindi biza bizoshika, tukageragereza inkingo ku butaka bwa Afrika hanyuma tukaraba n'izindi ndwara zikora kuri Afrika." Vyinshi mu bihuru vyo muri Afrika bimaze gukingira 10% gusa vy'abanyagihugu bavyo, ugereranije na 60% mu Amerika y'uburaruko, 63% i Buraya hamwe na 61% muri Aziya. Naho Afrika y'epfo ari yo ifise ibitigiri vyiza kurusha ibindi bihugu ku mugabane, imaze gukingira gusa 27% vy'abanyagihugu bayo. Vyaratangajwe yuko BioNTech - ikigo cafashanije na Pfizer mu guhingura urukingo rw'ubwoko mRNA - kinafise imigambi yo kwugurura amahinguriro y'inkingo ku mugabane wa Afrika. Hariho n'iyindi migambi yo kwubaka amahinguriro y'inkingo muri Arika, yibanda cane cane ku nkingo zakorewe mu Burusiya no mu Bushinwa. Umwihwezo wa Naomi Grimley, umunyamakuru araba ibijanye n'amagara kw'isi Iyi irashobora kuba ari intambwe ikomeye cane ku mugabane wa Arika. Nyinshi mu nkingo z'ubwoko mRNA zajanywe mu bihugu bikize kandi imigambi yo kwubaka amahinguriro yazo ku butaka bwa Afrika yamye idashemeye. Bitewe n'uko Moderna yavuze ko itazoshira inzitizi ku kwigana urukingo rwayo, abahinga mu bumenyi barashoboye kurwigana bifashishije ikigo cihariye cashinzwe na OMS i Cape Town. Naho igitigiri bamaze gukora gushika ubu ari gito, vyaranyarutse cane gusumvya uko benshi babiziga. Kwongera ibitigiri nivyagenda neza kandi igerageza rigatanga inyishu nziza, birashobora kuzoba intango y'ukungana mu kuronka inkingo zo ku rwego rwo hejuru. Haritezwe kandi kuzoraba ingene Moderna izovyifatamwo mu gihe abahinga mu bumenyi batahuye ubufindo bw'umukenyuro w'urukingo rwayo. Igisata c'ibigo bihingura imiti muri rusange vyariyamirije umugambi wo gukurako inzitizi zibuza kwigana inkingo zavyo, bikitwaza ko zigoye cane guhingura kugira habe hari uwozikorera ukwiwe, ngo kandi vyoca intege ubuhinyanyuzi mu gisata c'abigenga. Abashigikiye ico gikorwa bobo bavuga yuko ivyo bigo vyakoresheje amahera menshi y'abanyagihugu yatanzwe n'amaleta kugira bishobore gutunganya imigambi yavyo y'inkingo.

headline: Michelle Obama yumviye impuhwe Meghan ku macakubiri afatiye ku rukoba
text: Umugore w'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu wa Amerika Michelle Obama yavuze ko "bitatangaje cane" kwumva Duchesse wa Sussex  avuga ibijanye n'amacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba mu kiganiro giherutse guca  kuri television. Umupfasoni wa Obama yavugiye  mu kiganiro Today ca NBC ku kiyago ca Meghan na Harry na Oprah Winfrey. Meghan na Harry barugurutse baravuga ibintu bitari bike bijanye n'ubuzima bwabo  bwite, harimwo ibijanye n'amagara yo mu mutwe. Meghan yavuze ko Harry  yabajijwe n'umuntu atavuzwe izina wo mu muryango w'i bwami ingene urukoba rw'umuhungu wabo Archie rushobora kuzoba ruzize. Ikirimba ca Buckingham cavuze ko ibibazo vy'amacakubiri ashingiye ku rukoba vyavuzwe na Meghan na Harry, b'imyaka 39 na 36, biteye ''impungenge'', kandi ko "bizofatwa nkama" kandi vyigirwe mu muryango. Mu  kiganiro ciwe na NBC, Madame Obama yabajijwe icaciye mu mutwe wiwe igihe yariko araraba ikiganiro co guserura akari ku mutima Meghan yagiranye na Oprah. "Kuba mu mabanga y'igihugu n'uguhagarara ahantu habona cane, hakarishe kandi hashushe'' nk'uko bivugwa na Madame Obama yamaze imyaka umunani muri Maison Blanche (White House) igihe umugabo wiwe, Barack Obama, yari umukuru w'igihugu. "Kandi abantu benshi ntibavyumva, kandi ntibanategerezwa no kuvyumva. Ikintu ngumiza mu mutwe n'uko ivyo vyose biterekeye twebwe mu mabanga y'igihugu, vyerekeye abo dukorera." Umupfasoni wa Obama, w'imyaka 57, yabajijwe ico avuga igihe yumva Meghan abwiye Oprah ko ''yahuye n'amacakubiri ashingiye ku rukoba". Yishuye ati: "Nk'uko nigeze kubivuga, ibibazo vy'urukoba si bishasha muri iyi si ku bantu b'urukoba rutera, nta kinini cantangaje rero kwumva ivyamushikiye kandi akabivuga ku mugaragaro". Mu kindi kiganiro na  Access Hollywood, Madame Obama yavuze ko afise icizere ko Meghan na Harrry bazoronka inzira y'ingene basubiza hamwe n'umuryango w'i bwami. Madame Obama yavuze ati: "Ico nizeye n'uko, iyo niyumviriye ibihe barimwo, nca niyumvira akamaro k'umuryango, ngaca nsenga ko hoba ikigongwe hakaba gushira umuco mu bintu n'urukundo n'ugufata ingingo igihe runaka". Madame Michelle Obama ari mu bantu bashigikiye Meghan kuva kera,  aho amwita "umugenzi" n'"umuntu w'icitegererezo" nk'uko yavyanditse kuri Instagram mu 2019. Harry n'umugenzi wa ba Obama kuva kera, bahuriye ku bikorwa vy'ubugiraneza. Umuryango wa Obama washigikiye mu ba mbere ibikorwa vya Harry mu mugambi wiwe wa Invictus Games Foundation. Meghan yarahaye ikiganiro Obama ariko ategura inomero y'ikinyamateka ca British Vogue yari mu bagihagarariye mu 2019. Muri uwo mugambi, uwo mu Duchesse yavuze ko mu bamufashije harimwo Madame Obama, avuga ko ari umuntu "yugurutse kandi yicisha bugufi". Umupfasoni wa Obama yaratanguje imigambi itari mike igihe yari muri Maison Blanche ishingiye cane cane ku ngaburo n'amagara vy'abana. Ubu ariko aramenyekanisha urukurikirane rw'ibiganiro vy'abana ku vyerekeye guteka Waffles+Mochi. Ariko ku ndwi iheze, Madame Obama yavuze ko agire afate ikiruhuko c'izabukuru ko rero asigaye yemera imigambi mike yo gushigikira.

headline: Sylvana Ntiyibagira, azwi ku ndirimbo yiwe izwi cane WIBUKE USHIME yitavye Imana
text: Sylvana Ntiyibagira, azwi ku ndirimbo yiwe izwi cane WIBUKE USHIME yaritavye Imana mw’ijoro ryo ku wa kane rishira ejo ku wa gatanu. Indirimbo yiwe yaramenyekanye cane mu myaka ya 1980, akaba yararirimbanye n’abaririmvyi batandukanye bo mu murwi rurangiranwa witwa AMABANO. Hagati aho, nk’uko bivugwa n’umwe mu baririmvyi amuzi, Sylvana Ntiyibagira ntiyigeze aja muri iyo mirwi y’abaririmvyi yari ikomeye nka za AMABANO, NAKARANGA, n’iyindi. Yari mu baririmvyi bakunda kuririmba ari bo nyene (solo). Sylvana yavukiye mu Kabezi mu ntara ya Bujumbura mu mwaka wa 1965, akaba yatanguye kuririmba mu murwi w’abaririmvyi ba paroisse kubera yavuka mu muryango w’abakirisu, mu gasengero ka Irtyazo Sylvana ahanura abaririmvyi ba kino gihe kwitonda bagategura neza indirimbo zabo kugira ngo koko bashobore gutanga inyigisho kubera, nk’uko yabivugiye mu kiganiro yari yahaye Radio Isanganiro ikorera mu Burundi, indirimbo za kino gihe usanga ata kanovera zigifise. Sylvana asize aban batatu. Umviriza indirimbo yiwe  WIBUKE USHIME

headline: Caster Semenya agiye kwungururiza muri sentare ya Bulaya urubanza rw'abanonotsi b'igitsinagore bafise testosterone irenze urugero
text: Umunonotsi  wa mbere mu kwiruka 800m Caster Semenya agiye kwunguruza urubanza muri sentare ya Bulaya y'agateka ka zina muntu ku ngingo ibuza guhiganwa abagore n'abakobwa bafise urugero runini rw'inkabuzo/umusemburo (hormone) ya testosterone. Semenya ntiyemerewe guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya 400 na mile (1.609,34m) atabanje gufata imiti igabanya testosterone, kuva urwego rw'ubunonotsi World Athletics rubihinduye mu 2019. Uwo munya-Africa y'Epfo yatsinzwe urubanza yunguruje muri sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise mu kwezi kw'icenda ariko n'ubu aracafise icizere ko ashobora kwemererwa kuhiganwa mu nkino zo mu Buyapani uyu mwaka kugira  arwanire  kugumana ikibanza ca mbere muri Olympic. Yavuze ati: "Nta kindi dusaba atari kutureka,rimwe kandi rizima,  tukiruka ata nkomanzi, nk'abagore b'inguvu kandi badatinya nk'uko twamye na mbere hose." Abashingwamanza biwe bazosigura ko Ubuswise bwananiwe mu nshingano zabwo zo kumukingira ihonyangwa ry'uburenganzira bwiwe. Urwego rw'ubunonotsi rwashinze ingingo ivuga ko abanonotsi bafise uko bateye kurenze urugero rusanzwe rw'abandi bahuje igitsina (differences of sex development,DSD) bategerezwa gufata imiti kugira bahiganwe hagati ya 400m na mile canke  biruke ku zindi metero. Abanonotsi bafise DSD bagira urugero ruri hejuru rwa testosterone kama, urwego rw'ubunonotsi rukavuga ko  ivyo bibaha ico barusha abandi  mw'ihiganwa. Sentare ijejwe amatati mu nkino yimye agaciro urubanza rwungurujwe na Semyenya kuri iyo ngingo mu 2019. Sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise yaciye iba irahagaritse iyo ngingo vy'agateganyo, ariko mu nyuma yisubirako. Vyasigura ko Semenya yabaye uwa mbere  ku 800m mu nkino za Olympic za 2012 na 2016 , yaciye yamburwa uburenganzira bwo gusubira guhiganwa mu nkino z'isi za Doha kuko atari yatsinze urubanza rwo guhagarika iyo ngingo y'urwego rw'ubunonotsi. Mw'itangazo inyuma y'ingingo ya sentare  y'Ubuswise mu  kwezi kw'icenda, World Athletics yagize iti : "Mu myaka itanu ishize, World Athletics yaragwaniye ukungana kw'uburenganzira n'amahirwe ku bagore  n'abakobwa bose mu nkino zacu ubu no muri kazoza. "Nico gituma dushimye ingingo y'uyu munsi ya sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise yo kwemeza amategeko yacu ajanye na DSD nk'uburyo bubereye kandi buri hagati na hagati bwo gukingira uburenganzira bw'abanonotsi bose b'igitsinagore mu kwitaba inkino zacu mu buryo atawe burenganya kandi bwumvikana." Sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise yavuze ko: "kugra amahirwe amwe mu nkino n'umwitwarariko wumvikana kandi kugize ishingiro ryo guhigana mu nkino.Ni kimwe mu nkingi ihiganwa rishingiyeko." Mu kwezi kwa gatatu mu 2020, Semenya yavuze ko ashaka kwiruka 200m i Tokyo , ico gihe akaba  atokenera kwirirwa arafata imiti. Kugira ashobore guhiganwa, yotegerezwa kubanza kwiruka izo metero mu mwanya w'ama sekunda 22,80 umuha uburenganzira bwo guhiganwa  mu gihe gushika ubu umwanya mwiza afise ari amasekunda 23,49. Itangazo ry'abunganira Semenya, Norton Rose Fulbright, ryo kuri uyu wa kane rivuga riti: "N'ubwo sentare ariyo izotanga ikirangaminsi y'aho izocira urubanza rwacu, Caster agumana icizere kuruta na mbere ko vuba azokwemererwa gusubira kwiruka 800m mu mahingwanwa mpuzamakungu."

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Gundogan, Rashford, Semedo, Saliba, de Jong, Tielemans, Saka
text: Manchester City ifise ubwoba ko Ilkay Gundogan ashobora kuzokwimukira mu wundi murwi mu ci riza kuri gusa. Uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 32 w’umudagi akina hagati ntaremera amasezerano mashasha, mu gihe ayo asanzwe afitaniye n’uyu murwi azorangira mu kwa gatandatu. (Football Insider) Manchester United irashaka gutunganya kazoza ka Marcus Rashford i Old Trafford imbere y’uko umwaka urangira kugira ngo izibire imirwi yohava imurondera. Uyu musatirizi w’umwongereza w’imyaka 25 azoba afise uburenganzira bwo kuvugana n’imirwi yomushaka mu kwa mbere kiretse ari nka hamwe yotera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha canke naho bagashira mu ngiro ingingo imurindiriza mu kiringo c’umwaka umwe. (Daily Mail) Manchester United iripfuza kugura umwongereza Max Aarons w’imyaka 22 akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’i buryo muri Norwich kugira ngo ahiganwe n’umukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Portugal Diogo Dalot, w’imyaka 23; Jeremie Frimpong, umunya-Hollande w’imyaka 21 akina muri Bayer Leverkusen nawe kandi agashobora kwikorwako. (Sun) Umusatirizi wa Pologne Robert Lewandowski, 34, avuga ko “amerewe neza kandi aryohewe” muri Barcelona, kandi ko kubona uyu murwi warananiwe no gushika mu gice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma c’ihiganwa rya Bulaya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere (Ligue des champions/ Champions League) bizotuma muri kazoza bagira inguvu gusumba  (La Vanguardia – mu ki espagnol) Arsenal ivugwa ko yarungitse mu ndwi iheze ba maneko kwihweza umunya-Brezili akina hagati muri Palmeiras Danilo, mu gihe aba ba gunners bipfuza kuzana uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 21 mu kwa mbere. (Sun) Arsenal ivugwa kandi ko iri mu biganiro n’umunya-Uruguay akina ku ruhande Facundo Torres w’imyaka 22 asanzwe akinira Orlando City yo muri Amerika. (Evening Standard) Manchester United iracipfuza umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa PSV Cody Gakpo w’imyaka 23, inyuma y’aho mu ci riheze uyu munya-Hollande habuze gato ngo ashike ku masezerano n’aba ba Red Devils. (GiveMeSport) Chelsea iriko iraraba ko yorondera umukinyi w’inyuma wa Wolves umunya-Portugal Nelson Semedo w’imyaka 28, kugira ngo asubirire umwongereza aherutse kuvunika Reece James w’imyaka 22. (Express) Umumenyereza wa Brighton Roberto de Zerbi aripfuza umukinyi w’inyuma w’umunya-Ukraine Mykola Matviyenko w’imyaka 26, umurwi wiwe Shakhtar Donetsk ukaba umushakako imiriyoni 17.2 z’amapawundi. (Athletic) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Flamengo umunya-Brezili Joao Gomes w’imyaka 21 avuga ko Liverpool ari umurwi yipfuza gukinira, n’aho Real Madrid nayo nyene imuraba ryiza. (ESPN – mu giportugal) West Ham ibandanya ikurikiranira hagufi umukinyi w’inyuma ku ruhande wa Middlesbrough, umwongereza Isaiah Jones w’imyaka 23, asanzwe kandi ateye amero Crystal Palace. (GiveMeSport) Ubwongereza bufise icizere ko umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Arsenal  Bukayo Saka azoshobora gukinira igikombe c’isi yose inyuma yo kuvugana n’aba ba Gunners inyuma y’aho uyu mukinyi yanduriye imvune mu rukino rwo ku wa Mungu aho uyu murwi wirahiye Nottingham Forest 5-0. (Mail) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Barcelona umunya-Hollande Frenkie de Jong w’imyaka 25 yipfuza kwigumira muri uyo murwi wa Catalan n’aho Manchester United ibandanya imurondera. (Sport) Juventus iripfuza kugura umunya-Serbia akina hagati Sergej Milinkovic-Savic w’imyaka 27, asanzwe akina muri Lazio be n’umutaliyano Alessandro Bastoni w’imyaka 23 asanzwe akina muri Inter Milan, mu ntumbero yo kurondera guhendahenda umumenyereza wa Tottenham Antonio Conte kugira agaruke mu murwi. (Calciomercato) Arsenal yemereye umukinyi w’inyuma umufaransa William Saliba w’imyaka 21, amasezerano mashasha. (Athletic) Leicester ntiriko yiyumvira kugurisha umubirigi akina hagati Youri Tielemans mu kwa mbere mu gihe amakuru avuga ko Arsenal icipfuza kugura uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 25. (90min)

headline: RD Congo: Intambara zasubiye kwaduka muri Minembwe, abantu bataye izabo
text: Mu karere ka Minembwe muri Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo haravugwa ingwano zongeye kwaduka abantu benshi barata izabo bahunga. Gad Mukiza arongoye ako karere, avuga ko izo ntambara ziri hagati y'imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho y'abanyamulenge ku ruhande rumwe, n'abo mu bwoko bw'Abafulero, Ababembe, n'Abanyindu ku rundi ruhande. Bwana Mukiza avuga ko zatanguriye muri Segiteri ya Tombwe iri muri 'Territoire ya Mwenga,  hari kw'igenekerezo rya ndwi uku kwezi kw'icenda. Ubu zikaba zasubiriye. Bwana Mukiza avuga ko Leta yarungitse ingabo muri ako karere kugira ngo zigarukane ituze, akibaza ko mu minsi mikeya abahunze bashobora gusubira mu zabo. Umunyamakuru wa Radio Televiziyo y'igihugu ca Congo, Mahoye Madiba Issa, ari mu karere ka Fizi, avuga ko izo ntambara zari zacureshe. Ibi vyabaye inyuma y'aho abategetsi batari bake, harimwo abaserukira MONUSCO bagendeye ako karere kugira ngo basukemwo mabisi. Ingwano ariko avuga ko zasubiriye busha muri iyi minsi n'abantu bakaba bataye ivyabo barahunga. Aka gace kama mu ruhagarara rushingiye ku moko kuva mu myaka ya 1960. Bwana Mukiza avuga ko kuva kera ubutegetsi butashoboye guhagarika izo ntambara. Ati: "Ni Abanyamulenge barwana n'abaturanyi babo b'Abafulero, Ababembe n'Abanyindu. Ni ikibazo kigenda kigaruka kigafata isura y'amoko". "Ibintu bija kwunyurwa n'abanyepolitike babironderamwo inyungu zabo ari nabo bateranya abanyagihugu bafatiye ku moko". Iyo mirwano yasubiye kwaduka yatumye abantu ibihumbi bahungira mu bice bitandukanye vy'igihugu, abandi nabo bahungira mu bihugu bibanyi. Bwana Mukiza avuga ko ku mugwa mukuru wa komine Minembwe honyene habarizwa impunzi zingana na 49.500 ahanini bagizwe n'Abanyamulenge. Avuga ko hari n'igitigiri kitari gito kigizwe n'Abafulero, Ababembe  n'Abanyindu bahungiye mu karere ka Fizi. Avuga ko izo mpunzi ziri mu ngorane zikomeye kubera bigoye ko imfashanyo zibashikira kubera amabarabara atameze neza.

headline: Ukraine: Moscou ivuga ko Russia izohagarika intambara igihe OTAN/NATO itazoba ikiyibangamiye
text: Ibikorwa vya gisirikare vya Moscou bizorangira mu gihe OTAN/NATO izohagarika gukoresha ubutaka bwa Ukraine mu kubangamira Uburusiya, niko Alexey Polishchuk, umutegetsi mukuru wo mu bushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire w'Uburusiya yabwiye ikinyamakuru cegamiye reta, Tass. Polishchuk ati: "Igikorwa kidasanzwe kizohagarara mu gihe intumbero zaco zizoba zishitsweko. Muri zo harimwo gukingira abanyagihugu bibereyeho mu mahoro ba Donbas, gusambura igisirikare hamwe no gukura ivyiyumviro vy'iki-NAZI muri Ukraine, co kimwe no gukuraho ikintu cose cobangamira Uburusiya kivuye ku butaka bwa Ukraine kubera bwifatiwe n'ibihugu vya OTAN". Hagati aho, nta nsiguro atanga z'ukungene OTAN ibangamiye Uburusiya ku butaka bwa Ukraine. Uyu mutegetsi wo mu bushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire yongerako y'uko iki gikorwa ca gisirikare "kibandanya uko categuwe" kandi ko "intumbero zaco zose zizoshikwako". Avuze aya majambo mu gihe ingabo z'Uburusiya zibandanya ibitero mu bice bitandukanye vy'igihugu, aho zivugwa ko ejo ku wa gatatu zateye intambwe ntoya muri iyo ntambara. Umutegetsi wo mu kigo gikora ubushakashatsi ku ntambara, Institute for the Study of War, ca Amerika yavuze ko ejo ku wa gatatu Uburusiya bwateye intambwe ntoya mu bitero vyo hasi no mu kirere ku ruganda ruhingura ivyuma rwa ca gisagara ca Mariupol kigoswe. Abarwanyi ba Ukraine muri ico gisagara co ku nkengera y'ibahari cugarijwe n'Abarusiya bugaraniwe muri urwo ruganda rwa Azovstal. Ico kigo kivuga kandi ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zigaruriye uduce duto dukomeye tw'ibisagara vya Rubizhne na Popasna mu buseruko. Congerako y'uko ata kintu kinini ingabo z'Uburusiya zirashikako, ariko ko zibandanya ibitero mu turere turwiriyemwo abantu twa Kharkiv na Kherson. Uwuserukira Ukraine mu biganiro, Mykhailo Podolyak, avuga ko afise umunezero wo kuja "mu biganiro bidasanzwe" n'Uburusiya mu gisagara ca Mariupol kigoswe ata kirinze gusabwa. Podolyak yanditse kuri Twitter ko yemeye ivyo mu ntumbero yo "kurokora abantu bacu, batayo ya Azov, abasirikare, abasivire, abana, abakiriho n'abakomeretse". Mariupol iracagoswe n'ingabo z'Uburusiya. Bamwe mu basivire bamaze amayinga bazibiriweyo barashoboye kuvayo ejo ku wa gatatu  - ariko abategetsi bavuga ko ari bake cane gusumba abari bitezwe. Hagati aho, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza avuga ko ibiganiro n'Uburusiya bivugwa vyo kurangiza intambara biboneka ko ataco bizoshikako. Boris Johnson avuga ko kuganira na Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya ari nk'uguharira "n'ingona iyo yamaze kugucakira ukuguru". Avugana n'abanyamakuru mu gihe yagomba yurire indege imushikana mu Buhindi, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza yavuze ko Putin ashobora kuganira mu gihe gusa yamaze gushinga rukaguma muri Ukraine. Aragabisha ko uyu mukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya ashobora gusubira gutegura igitero ku mugwa mukuru Kyiv. Nayo ku ruhande rwa Ukraine, Boris Johnson yibaza ko Perezida Zelensky yipfuza kubona ingabo z'Uburusiya zirukanywe mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubushinwa Xi Jinping yasubiye kwiyamiriza ibihano nk'ivyo ibihugu vyo mu Burengero vyafatiye Uburusiya. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ikoraniro ry'akarere ryo kwiga ibibazo vy'ubutunzi, Xi yavuze ko Ubushinwa budashigikiye amategeko y'igikenye, kandi ko amayeri yo gutera igitsure kirenze urugero no kuzibira imihora ataco bizoshikako. Ariyamiriza ico yise "ivyiyumviro vyo mu gihe c'intambara yo kwikekana", kutaja inama no kwigira kibirengeye - amajambo Ubushinwa bukunze gukoresha mu kunegura ingingo za Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Hagati aho, Pekin/Beijing yanse kwiyamiriza igitero c'Uburusiya kuri Ukraine, mbere ica yiyemeza kubandanya ukuri kwamye imigenderanire y'ubudandaji n'iki gihugu ivuga ko ari umufatanyabikorwa ngirakamaro. Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika avuga ko atangazwa n'ingene igisirikare ca Ukraine cihagazeko mu guhangana n'umwansi. Mu nama y'ejo ku wa gatatu yamuhuje n'abategetsi bakuru bo mu gisata co kwivuna abansi, yavuze ati: "Barakomeye kandi bariyemera gusumba uko navyiyumvira". Perezida Biden yongerako y'uko "ubumwe, kuguma ku ntumbero imwe hamwe n'ishaka" vya OTAN vyataye mu gahundwe Perezida Vladimir Putin  w'Uburusiya. "Ibirwanisho bibandanya vyisukira buri musi ubu tukaba turiko turabona akamaro k'ubucuti n'ubufatanyabikorwa kw'isi yose". Amerika yiteze gutanga iyindi mfashanyo ya gisirikare mu misi iza, inyuma yo kwemerera Ukraine imiriyoni 800 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika mu ndwi iheze. Umunyamabanga ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru muri Maison Blanche/White House, Jen Psaki, ntavuga ibizoba biri muri iyi mfashanyo yindi. Ariko avuga ko ubutegetsi "buzokora uko bushoboye kwose mu guha inguvu reta ya Ukraine n'abategetsi ba Ukraine kugira ngo yivune mu ntambara yayo ya gisirikare". Mu yandi makuru Uburusiya bwasohoye ireresi buvuga ko yerekana igerageza rya misire irasa kure (missile balistique intercontinental/intercontinental ballistic missile). Perezida Putin avuga ko iri gerageza ry'iki gisasu ca misire, Sarmat, kirasa kure, rizotuma abo bose barondera kubangamira igihugu ciwe babanza kuzungurutsa umutwe. Raba ingene vyagenze:

headline: Prezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yatangaje iduzwa ry’amakori mu kwihora Ubushinwa
text: Prezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yatangaje ko agiye kwihora igihugu c'Ubushinwa mu kuduza amakori ku bidandazwa biva muri ico gihugu, ivyatumye ibintu biyangara mu ntambara y'ubutunzi hagati y'ivyo bihugu vyompi. Hari haciye amasaha make Ubushinwa butangaje integuro y'ukuduza amakori ku bidandazwa biciye  imiliyoni 75 z'amadolari vyinjiye muri ico gihugu bivuye muri vya Amerika, ivyo Perezida Trump yiyamiriza. Bwana Trump avuga ko iyo ngingo y'Ubushinwa ari iya "politike", akabwagiriza ko bushaka "kugendera" kuri Amerika. Ubushinwa bwatangaje integuro y'ukuduza amakori kuva ku bice 5% gushika kuri 10% ku bidandazwa birenga 5000 biva muri Amerika, harimwo ivyimburwa vyo mu burimyi, indege n'ibitoro bitarahingura. Butegura kandi gutoza ikori ryari ryarabangiriweko ry'ibice 25% ku mamodokari ava muri Amerika. Abicishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter ejo ku wa gatanu, Bwana Trump yatangaje iduzwa ry'ayo makori ku bice 5% ku bidandazwa vyinjira bivuye mu Bushinwa. Avuga ko kuva kw'igenekerezo rya 01 ukwezi kw'icumi, Amerika izoduza amakori kuri ivyo bidandazwa biciye imiliyoni 250 y'abanyamerika, kuva kuri 25% gushika kuri 30%. Avuga kandi ko ibidandazwa biciye amadolari 300 vyari vyitezwe gutozwako ikori ingana n'ibice 10% rizoduga gushika kuri 15%. Ati: "Ikibabaje, ni uko ubutegetsi bw'inyuma bwaretse Ubushinwa bukarengera inyungu za Amerika muvyo ubudandaji, ku buryo bwabaye umuzigo ku mutangakori wa Amerika. Jewe nk'umukuru w'igihugu, sinshobora kwemera ko ivyo bisubira". Bwana Trump amenyesha ko "kuri iyo mvo, yategetse" amakompanyi ya Amerika kuvavanura n'Ubushinwa bakarondera abandi bakorana, agapfuma arondera ingene yokorera muri Amerika. Izo ngingo zerekana ukutumvikana hagati y'ivyo bihugu bibiri ku vyerekeye ubudandaji zatumye ibintu biba nabi ku masoko y'ivunja n'ivunjwa ry'amafarangam haba muri Amerika, canke i Bulaya. Ku munsi wa gatanu, Bwana Trump yarifatiye mu gahanga umukuru w'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu ca Amerika, Jerome Powell, inyuma y'aho avugiye ko iyo ntambara y'ubudandaji ishobora gutuma ubutunzi bwa Amerika bugira ibibazo. Aciye kuri Twitter, Perezida Trump yashitse kure, aho yibajije nimba uyo mukuru w'ibanku nkuru y'igihugu atoba ari "umwansi" mukuru gusumba umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubushinwa, Xi Jinping.

headline: Abagore babiri barwaye kanseri y’ibere batanguje ishirahamwe ry’ugufasha abandi barwayi nkabo
text: Abagore babiri barwaye kanseri y'ibere idakira bashinze ishirahamwe bise Secondary Sisters kugira ngo bafashe abandi, ni inyuma y'aho baronkeye ibipimo vyabaciye umutima. Abongerezakazi Nicky Newman na Laura Middleton-Hughes, bompi b'imyaka 31, bafise kanseri igeze ku rugero rugira kane. Bisigura ko igeze ku rugero rwo gukwiragira mu bindi bice vy'umubiri nk'amagufa, amahaha, igitigu (canke umwijima mu Kinyarwanda) canke ubwonko. Igihe Nicky wo mu karere ka Guildford yabwirwa ko kanseri yiwe idashobora gukira kubera yari igeze ku rugero rwo hejuru, avuga ko vyatumye agira "ubwoba budasanzwe". Abo bagore bompi bizeye ko iryo shirahamwe ryabo rikorera ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rizofasha abandi bazoronka inkuru mbi nk'iyi guhangana nayo. Laura ava i Norwich avuga ko gushinga iryo shirahamwe vyabahaye "akaryo keza k'ukuganira ku vyerekeye kanseri yacu". Ati: "Twempi tubona ko dufise kazoza kadatomoye, ariko turafise kazoza kandi tuzobaho uko nyene". "Rero mu gihe twoshobora gufasha n'umuntu n'umwe gusa kwumva amahoro, akumva ko ari umuntu nk'abandi, ico kirahagije". Abo bagore bompi, bakorana n'umugambi wiswe Stand Up To Cancer. Ni umugambi w'isekeza ry'ukwegeranya amahera watunganijwe n'ikigo co mu Bwongereza ca Cancer Research UK kijejwe kurwanya kanseri, hamwe na televiziyo Channel 4. Nicky yagiye kumenya ko afise ikivyimba mw'ibere igihe yari yagiye kwivuza ari kumwe n'umugabo wiwe. Avuga ko yari yavyiketse n'imbere y'uko abimubwira, aravye ingene muganga yahindutse mu maso. Mu gihe yariko arapimwa, yavuze ko yumva ababara mu mugongo, ariho yaca arungikwa ku muhinga afotora mu mubiri. Ati: "Umuganga yambwiye ati: 'Sha nta kundi, ntaco nshobora kugufasha'. Vyaciye bintera ubwoba bwinshi". Ariko, yaciye amuha umuti witwa Palbociclib wari uherutse kwemerwa n'ikigo NHS kijejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza. Imiti bariko barafata ishobora kuba yaratumye iyo ndwara itabandanya ikwiragira mu mubiri, ariko ikaba yatumye batazigera bavyara. Nicky avuga ko igihe yava kwa muganga, yari ababajwe cane n'uko atazoronka akaryo ko kwitwa umuvyeyi gusumba kurwara kanseri. Mugenziwe Laura yagiye kumenya ko arwaye kanseri yo mw'ibere mu mwaka wa 2014 mu gihe yari mu karuhuko bakamutora ikivyimba. Baciye bamukura ibere rimwe baranamuvura, kandi arakira neza. Hagati aho, mu kwezi kwa kane 2016, niho yumva ububabare ku rutugu i buryo bwaguma bwongerekana, baca bamurungika gucishwa mu cuma agapimwa. Niho basanga afise ikivyimba ku mutwe w'igufa bita 'humerus' rifatanya urutugu n'inkokora. Ati: "Nagize ubwoba budasanzwe, 2016 wambereye umwaka mubi, umwaka mubi n'ukuri!" Laura afise ibimenyetso vya kanseri y'amabere vyakwiragiye mu ruti rw'umugongo, mu magufa afatanye narwo no mu gice c'urukenyerero n'amayunguyungu. Avuga ati: "Hagati aho, ndashima ko imiti ndiko ndafata iriko iramfasha kubandanya mbaho".

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Saka, Kounde, Saint-Maximin, Bellingham, Depay
text: Inyuma yo kugura umukinyi Oleksandr Zinchenko yahora akina muri Manchester City, Arsenal yemereye umusatirizi wayo, umwongereza Bukayo Saka w’imyaka 20, ayandi masezerano mashasha y’igihe kirekire ashobora kumutuma yongererezwa umushahara incuro zibiri ku wo asanzwe ahembwa, kugira ngo iyindi mirwi y’abakeba nka Manchester City ntihave imutwara. (Mail) Chelsea yakubise hasi Barcelona mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w’inyuma wa Sevilla umufaransa Jules Kounde w’imyaka 23, ikaba igiye kumuha amasezerano y’imyaka itanu. (Telegraph) Umumenyereza wa Ajax Alfred Schreuder avuga ko umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Brezili Antony w’imyaka 22 yiteguye kuguma muri uno murwi n’aho Manchester United imurondera muri rino ci. (ESPN) Chelsea na Tottenham iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umufaransa akina ku ruhande muri Newcastle United  Allan Saint-Maximin w’imyaka  25. (Athletic) Mu kwa gatandatu, Liverpool yarakurikiranye umukinyi wo hagati wa Borussia Dortmund umwongereza Jude Bellingham ariko uyu murwi wo mu Budagi ufata ko uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 19 ari ntakorwako muri rino ci. (Fabrizio Romano) Umusatirizi wa Barcelona umunya-Hollande Memphis Depay w’imyaka 28 asa n’uwanse ivyo kwimukira muri Newcastle. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) West Ham iri hafi yo kuronka umusatirizi w’umutaliyano Gianluca Scamacca w’imyaka 23, inyuma yo gushika ku masezerano y’imiriyoni 30.5 z’amapawundi na Sassuolo. (Guardian) Aba Hammers kandi bariko bararaba ko boshika ku masezerano na Eintracht Frankfurt ku munya-Serbia akina inyuma ku ruhande Filip Kostic w’imyaka 29. (Fabrizio Romano) Umwongereza Luke Thomas w’imyaka 21 akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu muri  Leicester City ariko kandi araronderwa na West Ham. (Guardian) Arsenal na Everton yanse amahirwe yahabwa yo kugura umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Atletico Madrid umufaransa Thomas Lemar w’imyaka 26. (L'Equipe, iciye kuri Express) Newcastle, Everton na West Ham yahawe amahirwe yo kuronka umusatirizi w’umutaliyano Andrea Belotti w’imyaka 28, asanzwe yidegemvya inyuma y’’aho aviriye muri Torino mu kwezi guheze. (Sun) Leeds United iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano na n’umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain umufaransa Arnaud Kalimuendo w’imyaka 20. (Express) Crystal Palace iripfuza umwongereza akina hagati Morgan Gibbs-White w’imyaka 22, ariko wewe yipfuza kwigumira muri Wolves kugira abandanye n’urugamba rwo kurondera ikibanza muri uyu murwi. (Guardian) AC Milan yahambije Borussia Dortmund na Barcelona mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Aston Villa umwongereza Carney Chukwuemeka w’imyaka 18. (Athletic) Everton yashize ku rutonde rw’abo irondera muri rino ci umukinyi wo hagati wa Wolverhampton Wanderers umubirigi Leander Dendoncker w’imyaka 27. (Fabrizio Romano) Everton iriko irihweza umukinyi w’inyuma wa Norwich City umwongereza Max Aarons w’imyaka 22 ariko kandi akaba arabwa ryiza na Borussia Monchengladbach, Wolfsburg hamwe na Marseille. (Sun) Bournemouth iri mu biganiro bigeze ku ntambwe ikomeye mu ntumbero yo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati umwongereza Marcus Tavernier w’imyaka 23 akinira Middlesbrough. (Football Insider) Newcastle yiteze ko abandi bakinyi bagenda imbere y’uko umwaka w’inkino utangura, harimwo umwongereza yari amaze igihe kinini Matt Ritchie w’imyaka 32 akina ku ruhande. (Chronicle)

headline: Stella Tushabe, umwe mu bakobwa bake bavuze saxophone mu Rwanda
text: Stella Tushabe, umwe mu bakobwa bake bavuze saxophone mu Rwanda. Mwumve mu kiganiro na Yvette Kabatesi, aho atubwira uko yatangiye kwiga kuvuza iki gicurarangisho.

headline: Alexei Navalny: Uwunegura Putin yapfunzwe iminsi 30
text: Uwuzwi cane mu batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi mu  Burusiya yapfunzwe iminsi 30, inyuma yo gutaha mu gihugu  c'amavukiro  ubwa mbere kuva ahawe uburozi mu mwaka uheze, Navalny w'imyaka 44 yavuze ko  ingingo y'urwo rubanza rwabereye ku gituro c'igipolisi ari agashinyaguro, ahamagarira abantu kwihereza amabarabara. Yafashwe indege yari imuzanye imukura mu Budagi ikimara gushika i Moscou ku wa mungu. Abashikirizamanza bo mu Burusiya bamwagirije ko yarenze ku ngingo zo gupfungwa icamaso ku caha co kunyuza amafaranga. Navalny avuga ko kwagirizwa ico caha bifise imvo  ya poltike. Navalny yahatswe gupfa ahawe uburozi bwonona imitsi nsozabwenge bwitwa Novichok mu kwezi kw'umunani, ico gikorwa  akaba acagiriza ubutegetsi bw'Uburusiya. Ubwo butegetsi burahakana kuba bwarabigizemwo uruhara. Ariko ibivugwa n'uwo aterekanwa n'ubutegetsi bw'Uburusiya vyarashigikiwe n'ivyatowe n'abamenyeshamakuru bakora amatohoza. Intahe  ya sentare yashashe uwu munsi ku gituro c'igiporisi  i Khimki,mu nkengera za Moscou, aho Navalny yari yamaze ijoro. Umucamanza yashinze ko Navaly apfungwa kugeza itariki 15 ukwezi kwa kabiri kubera ukurenga ku ngingo z'ugutegezurirwa. Azosubira kwitaba sentare ku wa 29 ukuwezi kwa mbere kugira hashingwe niba umunyororo  wiwe w'icamaso w'imyaka itatu n'igice wosubirizwa n'ikiringo co gupfungwa. Navalny yavuze ko ivyo yakorewe birenze agashinyaguto ku butungane aca avuga ko iyo ntahe yari ''iteye kubiri n'amnategeko mu rwego rwo hejuru''. Muri video y'ivyo yavugiye kuri ico gitiuo c'igiporisi yagize ati: ''Ntimutinye. Ihereze amabarabara, mutabikorera jewe, ahubwo muvyikorera mwebwe nyene ku neza ya kazoza kanyu.'' Abantu baharurwa muri mirongo bashigikiye Navalny bari bakoraniye hanze y'ico gituro c'igiporisi mu bukonje bwinsi, basaba ko yorekurwa ubwo nyene. Indege yamutahanye yari yuzuye abamenyeshamakuru harimwo n'aba BBC. Imbere gato y'uko yururuka umudereva yaciye avuga ko ku mvo ''z'ubuhinga'' indege itacururukiye ku kibuga ca Vnukovo, aho abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bashigikiye Navalny bari bamurindiriye, ica ija kwururukira ku kibuga ca Sheremetyevo, bihungabanya abari muri iyo ndege.

headline: Ukraine: Kyiv iriyamiriza ivyo yagirizwa na Russia ko igomba gutera ‘ibombe y’umwanda’
text: Ukraine iriyamiriza ibivugwa n’Uburusiya ko Kyiv (umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine) ishobora gukoresha “ibombe y’umwanda”  - ibibombe bisanzwe bivangwa n’ubumara (matières radioactives). Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky avuga ko ibi vyerekana ko Uburusiya bwonyene bushobora kuba buriko butegura gukora igitero nk’iki. Incuti za Ukraine nazo nyene ziriyamiriza ibi bivugwa n’Uburusiya, mbere Amerika ikiyamiriza “icitwazo ico ari co cose cotuma ibintu biyangara”. Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi w’Uburusiya Sergei Shoigu yavuze ivy’amabombe y’umwanda mu gihe yavugana na mugenziwe w’Ubwongereza Ben Wallace kuri terefone. Yavuze ko afise “amakenga ku gishobora kuba agasotoro ka Kyiv karimwo ikoreshwa ry’ibombe y’umwanda”. Ku wa Mungu, Shoigu yagiranye kandi ibiganiro n’abashikiranganji bo kwivuna abansi ba Amerika, Ubufaransa na Turukiya, abashikiriza impungenge za Moscou. Nta vyemezo yatanze bishigikira ivyo yagiriza Ukraine. Mu kwishura kuri ibi, Perezida Zelensky yagiriza Uburusiya ko ari bwo “ntandaro y’ibintu vyose vy’umwanda bishobora kuba muri ino ntambara”. Avuga ko Uburusiya buriko butera ubwoba isi bukoresheje “akaga k’inguvu z’ubumara” ku kigo ca nikleyeri ca Zaporizhzhia bwigaruriye. Anavuga kw’iterabwoba rya Moscou ryo kumena urugomero rukomeye rwo mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine. Kremlin (ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya) iriyamiriza ibi birego. Umukuru wa Ukraine kandi arashimangira ko “amakungu yofata ingingo zose zikomeye zishoboka”. Hagati aho, Wallace avuga ko yamiriye kure ibivugwa na Shoigu ko "Ukraine iriko itegura imigambi ifashwe mu mugongo n’ibihugu vy’Uburengero, harimwo n’Ubwongereza, yo gutuma ibintu biyangara muri Ukraine”. Yagabishije kandi ko ibirego nk’ibi "bitoba icitwazo co gukora ikintu cotuma ibintu vyunyuka”. Amajambo nk’ayo kandi niyo yavuzwe n’umunyamabanga wa Amerika ajejwe kwivuna abansi, Lloyd Austin, igihe yavugana na Shoigu ejo ku wa Mungu, mu kiganiro kigira kabiri nawe kuri terefone mu misi mike cane. Mw’itangazo rusangi, abashikiranganji bajejwe imigenderanire b’ibihugu vy’Ubufaransa, Ubwongereza na Amerika bavuze ko ibihugu vyabo “vyiyamirije amajambo y’ikinyoma ceruye ko Ukraine iriko itegura gukoresha ibombe y’umwanda ku butaka bwayo”, banavuga ko bazobandanya bafata mu mugongo Ukraine "muri ino ntambara y’ubugome ya Perezida Putin". Abihweza ibintu n’ibindi mu gisirikare bavuga ko ivyo Uburusiya bwagiriza Ukraine bije inyuma y’aho bugize imisi butsindwa ahatari hake, be no mu gihe ingabo za Ukraine zibandanya ibitero vyo kwivuna mu buseruko no mu bumanuko bw’igihugu. Mu rukurikirane rw’ubutumwa cacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, ikigo ca Amerika cigisha ivy’intambara, Institute for the Study of War (ISW), kivuga ko Shoigu "asa n’uwariko arondera guhagarika canke kugabanya umurindi w’imfashanyo za gisirikare Uburengero buha Ukraine, hamwe kandi kumbure no kurondera ingene aca intege urunani rwa OTAN/NATO  mu kurutera ubwoba”. Hagati aho, ISW yongerako iti: "Kremlin ntavyo irimwo vyo gutegura igitero ca vuba ca bombe y’umwanda. Ibivugwa na Shoigu bije gukomeza isekeza ry’akarimi Uburusiya bumazemwo igihe kirekire”. Mu bindi vyabaye ejo ku wa Mungu:

headline: Coronavirus: Afrika y’Epfo yatezuye ingingo za guma mu rugo
text: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Afrika y'Epfo avuga ko ibitigiri vy'abandura coronavirus mu gihugu bisa n'ivyageze kw'isonga, aca atangaza ingingo yo gutezura ingingo za guma mu rugo. Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa amenyesha ko hafi ingingo zose zafashwe mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ikwirakwira ry'uwu mugera zizotangura gutezurwa kuva ejo ku wa mbere. Eka n'ingingo yateye impari cane yo kubuza urudandaza rw'inzoga n'itabi izovaho. Ingendo zo hagati mu gihugu, amakoraniro mato mato y'imiryango hamwe n'ibikorwa vy'ubutunzi bizosubira kwemererwa. Hagati aho, avuga ko hariho zimwe zimwe zizogumaho, harimwo izijanye n'abinjira mu gihugu bavuye hanze, amakoraniro y'abantu barenga 50  hamwe n'amakoraniro y'inkino. Mw'ijambo ryiwe rya nijoro ku wa gatandatu kuri televiziyo, Bwana Ramaphosa avuga ko iryo tezurwa rizotuma ubutunzi bw'ico gihugu busubirana itoto inyuma y'igihe kirekire igihugu kiri mu bihe bigoye. Hagati aho, asaba abanya Afrika y'epfo ko batokwijajara imbere ya Covid-19 n'aho hari ibimenyetso "vy'agahengwe", akanagabisha ko ibintu bishobora kuba nabi mu minsi iri imbere. Gushika ubu, iki gihugu gifise abarenga igice c'abanduye coronavirus ku mugabane wose wa Afrika, aho abarenga 570.000 ari bo bamaze kwandura, nayo 11,500 bakaba bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima. Afrika y'Epfo kandi nico gihugu kigira gatanu kw'isi mu bitigiri vy'abanduye uwu mugera, inyuma ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Brezili, Uburusiya n'Ubuhindi, ariko abandura bakaba batanguye kugabanuka mu minsi iheze. Bwana Ramaphosa avuga ko ibitigiri biherutse gutangazwa vyamanutse biva ku 12.000 bishika ku 5000 mu ndwi iheze. Ibiharuro vy'abakirwaye vyaragabanutse gushika ku 105.000 kandi ibitigiri vy'abakira bikaba vyaraduze gushika ku bice 80%, nk'uko bimenyeshwa n'umukuru w'ico gihugu. Mu kwa gatatu, leta ya Afrika y'Epfo yarafashe ingingo za guma mu rugo zikomeye cane, aho imbibe z'igihugu zugawe, amashure arugarwa, urudandazwa rw'inzoga rurahagarikwa, maze abanyagihugu bategekwa kuguma muhira. Izo ngingo zizwi ko zatumye umugera wa coronavirus udakwirakwira n'umurindi munini, bituma ibisata bijejwe amagara y'abantu vyoroherwa mu kwakira abarwaye. Agahengwe kamaze kuboneka, leta yaciye itangura gutezura buke buke mu kwa gatandatu, ariko ingingo ruhasha zikaba zasubiriye gufatwa mu kwezi guheze inyuma y'aho ibitigiri vy'abanduye bisubiriye kuduga. Igihugu caciye gishirwa mu mategeko adasanzwe gushika ku wa 15 z'ukwa munani. Ingingo zafashwe zariyamirijwe n'abanyagihugu, mbere n'abafise amazu y'uburiro n'inyobwa bakaba bariyamirije cane iyo ngingo yo kubuza urudandaza rw'inzoga. Intara ya Gauteng, umushinge w'ubutunzi bw'ico gihugu, niyo yasinzikaye cane gusumba izindi.

headline: Umunyakameruni Samuel Eto'o yatangaje ko ahagaritse gukina umupira
text: Samuel Eto'o yahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa, yatangaje ko ahagaritse akazi kiwe inyuma y'imyaka 22 amaze akina umupira w'amaguru. Eto'o  w'imyaka 38 yahoze akinira umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Kameruni hamwe n'umurwi wa Barcelona yarabaye umukinyi wa mbere ku mugabane wa Afrika, incuro zine zose. Umukinyi yatsindiye umurwi nserukiragihugu ibitsindo 56 mu nkino 118, ibitari bwabeho, yaraciye no mu mirwi ya Chelsea na Everton yo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza, Premier league. Umwaka uheze wa 2018, inyuma y'umwanya muto yamaze mu murwi wa Konyaspor muri Turukiya, yahavuye aja gukinira umurwi Qatar Sports Club, akaba ariwo arangirijemwo. Samuel Eto'o   yinjiye mu murwi Real Madrid mu 1996 afise imyaka 16, ariko akaba atahawe amahirwe menshi y'ugukina kuko yakinishijwe incuro zitatu gusa, imbere y'uko atizwa mu mirwi ya Leganes, Espanyol na Mallorca. Inyuma y'aho aguriwe n'umurwi wa Mallorca mu 2000, yinjije ibitsindo 54 mu nkino 133, ivyamutumye aba umukinyi wa mbere yinjirije uwo murwi ibitsindo vyinshi. Mu mwaka wa 2004, uyo mukinyi yavukiye i Douala muri Kameruni niho yinjira mu murwi wa Barcelona yafashije gutsindira ihiganwa ryo muri Espanye, La Liga, incuro zitatu. Yafashije kandi Barcelona gutsindira ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Ligue des Champions/Champions League), incuro zibiri zose, mu mwaka wa 2006 na 2009, kandi hose yagenda atsinda. Mu 2006, Eto'o niwe yabaye umunya Afrika wa mbere kandi wenyene yatsindiye ikirato c'inzahabu muri La Liga, igihe yinjiza ibitsindo 26 mu nkino 34. Uyo munya Kameruni yinjirije Barcelona ibitsindo 109 mu nkino 144 imbere y'uko yinjira mu murwi Inter Milan mu 2009. Muri uyo murwi mushasha, yarawufashije gutsindira ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League) uwo mwaka nyene, yongera itsindira n'ihiganwa ryo muri ico gihugu Serie A. Eto'o kandi yafashije Inter Milan gutsindira ihiganwa mpuzamakungu rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere ku migabane yabo, Fifa Club World Cup mu 2010. Inyuma y'aho, Eto'o yamaze imyaka ibiri mu murwi Anzhi Makhachkala  wo mu Burusiya, imbere y'ukwinjira mu murwi Chelsea mu 2013. Yarakinye kandi umwanya muto mu mirwi ya Everton, Sampdoria na Antalyaspor, imbere y'uko yinjira muri Konyaspor, hanyuma muri Qatar SC ariho arangirije. Samuel Eto'o yatanguye gukinira umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Kameruni, Lion Indomptable, igihe ico gihugu gihura na Costa Rica mu 1996. Mu Mwaka wa 1998, yakinyi mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi yose afise imyaka 17 n'amezi atatu, akaba ari we mukinyi yari muto mu bakinyi bose bari muri iryo higanwa. Eto'o yakinye incuro zitatu muri iryo higanwa ry'igikombe c'isi yose, akaba yabaye kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu mu 2010 na 2014, aho mbere yashoboye gutsinda ibitsindo bibiri. Eto'o kandi yari mu bakinyi bari bagize umurwi watsindiye ihiganwa rya Afrika incuro zibiri wikurikiranya mu 2000 na 2002, akaba yabaye umukinyi yinjije ibitsindo vyinshi muri iryo higanwa, 18 vyose. Eto'o afise umudari w'inzahabu wa Olempike yaronkeye mu murwi wa Kameruni mu 2000, akaba yaranabaye umukinyi agira gatatu kw'isi mu mwaka wa 2005.

headline: Ibibazo vyanyu kuri Covid-19: Gufungura ibikwiye vyoba birinda kuyandura?
text: Kurikirana insiguro za Muganga Leonard Nduwayo ku kibazo co kumenya nimba gufungura ibikwiye bikingira kwandura Covid-19

headline: Funke Abimbola: ‘Izina ryanje ry’ikinyafrika ryambujije kuronka akazi’
text: Umunyamategeko akongera akaba n'umwe mu baharanira uburenganzira bw'inkehwa, Funke Abimbola,  avuga ko "yamye arenganywa" igihe cose yagerageje kurondera akazi. Hafi icagatatu c'ama kompanyi 100 adandaza imitahe (FTSE) nta nkehwa afise mu nzego zifata ingingo, nk'uko icegeranyo kibivuga. Ikigo kijejwe kwihweza ingene ubwoko buserukiwe mu ma kompanyi atandukanye, Parker Review Committee, mu gihugu c'Ubwongereza, kimenyesha ko inkehwa zidaserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo mu makompanyi atari make. Umupfasoni Abimbola avuga ati: "Nahuye n'inzitizi nyinshi  igihe nariko ndondera akazi kubera nari mfise izina ry'ikinyafirika, kandi kubera ndi umwirabure, nta gukekeranya". Yabwiye BBC ko yaterefonye incuro zirenga ijana kugira ngo ashobore guhonyoza ikirenge  mu kazi. Ati: "Baranyinuvye, barankarira cane gusumba abandi  kubera kwitwa umugore w'umwirabure". "Biroroshe kukubona uwo uri we kandi biroroshe cane rwose kukurenganya iyo uri mu nkehwa". Icegeranyo c'ikigo Parker Review Committee  cerekana ko mu makompanyi adandaza imitahe ashika 250 casanze inkehwa zidaserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, aho 119 kuri 179 amoko adaserukiwe. Umupfasoni Abimbola avuga ati: "Ico cegeranyo ntikintangaza. Hari inzitizi nyinshi  cane kugira ngo inkehwa zishobore kuronka ikibanza mu nzego zo hejuru". Ico kigo Parker Review Committee cashinzwe kugira ngo gikore ubushakashatsi ku kungene amoko atandukanye aserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo  mu makompanyi atandukanye, casohoye icegeranyo caco kuri ico kibazo mu 2017. Ico gihe, mu makompanyi 51 kw'ijana adandaza imitahe inkehwa ntizari ziserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, ugereranije n'ubu ari 33%. Ico cegeranyo gisaba ko gushika mu 2021 buri kompanyi mu makompanyi 100 ya FTSE yoba ifise n'imiburiburi indongozi imwe iva mu nkehwa, hanyuma gushika mu 2024 naho mu makompanyi 250 ya FTSE yoba yamaze gukora gutyo. Mu ntumbero yo gufasha kugira ngo inkehwa ziserukirwe, ico cegeranyo gisaba ko buri kompanyi yokwama itanga icegeranyo c'ingene inkehwa ziserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, n'ingene ubwoko butandukanye buserukiwe. Umupfasoni Abimbola arizeye ko mu gihe hoba integuro yoha ibibanza kanaka inkehwa vyofasha mu gutorera inyishu ico kibazo. Ati: "Hariho amashirahamwe makeya mu Bwongereza aha akazi amoko atandukanye. "Ayo mashirahamwe yama ategura intonde z'abantu bafise ubuhinga butandukanye muy bwoko butandukanye buri mwaka, rero iyo wipfuza kurondera abirabure, abanyaziya hamwe n'inkehwa, biba ngombwa ko uja kuronderera muri izo ntonde". Umushikiranganji w'ubudandaji, Andrea Leadsom, avuga ko ico cegeranyo cerekana ko "amakompanyi agifise igikorwa kitari gito" kugira ngo ashobore guhimiriza abakozi b'abirabure, Abanya Aziya hamwe n'inkehwa.

headline: Afghanistan: Inkuru y'uwakorotse ku ndege ya Amerika ahunga aba-Taliban
text: Benshi baribuka mu mwaka uheze igihe Kabul, umurwa mukuru wa Afghanistan, yahungwa na benshi imaze gufatwa n'aba-Taliban. Inkuru y'abantu bakorotse bava ku ndege y'igisirikare ca Amerika iratanguye kumenyekana...

headline: Premier League: Imirwi igiye kuvugana uko ihiganwa ryorangira ku wa 30/06
text: Imirwi iri mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza, Premier League, itegekanya kuganira ejo ku wa gatanu ingene iryo higanwa borirangiza ku wa 30 z'ukwa gatandatu. Imirwi yose ntiyashoboye kugira ico ishikirije mu mibonano yagiye iraba gushika ubu, ariko beneyo bariko bihweza ingene hatoba ingorane mu masezerano bafitaniye n'abakinyi. Ivyo biri uko mu gihe icizere c'uko iryo higanwa rishobora gusubira gutangura mu kwa gatanu kiri kure nk'ukwezi. Hari abakinyi batari bake amasezerano bafitaniye n'imirwi yabo azorangira ku wa 30 z'ukwa gatandatu. Abo ni nka Willian akina hagati muri Chelsea, hamwe na Jan Vertonghen akina ku ruhande rw'inyuma muri Tottenham. Hambavu y'ivyo, hariho nka Liverpool itegekanya guhagarika amasezerano ifitaniye na New Balance yo kubakorera impuzu, ikagiranira ayandi masezerano na Nike. Eka n'imirwi ya Watford na NewCastle nayo nyene itegekanya guhindura amakompanyi asanzwe abakorera impuzu. Ishirahamwe FIFA risanzwe rizi ico kibazo, rikaba ririko ririhweza ingingo zofatwa, nk'ukongereza ibiringo vy'amasezerano, kubera amahiganwa yahagaritswe mu kiringo kitazwi biturutse ku kiza ca coronavirus.
