Ariko rero mu mategeko, abakinyi ntibashobora gusinyishwa amasezerano ku nguvu, ivyo bigashobora gutuma hari imirwi itakaza abakinyi babo bakomeye imbere y'uko ihiganwa rirangira. Ni naco gituma habaye ivyiyumviro vyinshi aho abatari bake bashikirije ko, uko bizoba bimeze kwose muri Premier League, iyo tariki ya 30/06 itegerezwa kuba ntarengwa. Ivyo bizotuma haboneka umuco kw'ihiganwa riza rya 2020/2021 rifatwa ko ariryo rizoba rikomeye gusumba iry'uyu mwaka, nk'uko abatari bake babibwiye BBC Sport. Gushinga igenekerezo ntarengwa ry'iryo higanwa birimwo ibibazo vyinshi, cane cane bishingiye ku kungene imirwi iduzwa mu gice ca mbere, hamwe n'iyimanurwa mu gice ca kabiri. Hari n'abandi babona ko icoba ciza ari uko boduza imirwi ya Leeds na  West Brom iri imbere mu gice ca kabiri, gutyo Premier League ikazoba igizwe n'imirwi 22, ariko ngo ivyo navyo vyozana izindi ngorane. Ivyo nivyo bibazo bizokwigwa n'abarongoye ihiganwa rya Premier League muri iyo nama itegekanijwe kuri uyu wa gatanu. Hagati aho, nta nyishu ntabanduka yitezwe kuko ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya,UEFA, ryasabiye abajejwe amahiganwa mu mirwi y'ibihugu vya Bulaya ko bohabwa umwanya ukwiye kugira ngo bazoshikirize aho bahagaze kubijanye n'ingene borangiza amahiganwa yabo i Bulaya, ivyo navyo bikaba vyitezwe hagati mu kwa gatanu. Ku ruhande rwiwe, umukuru w'umuri Sheffield United, Chris Wilder, abona ko ata tariki ntarengwa y'ihiganwa izohava ishingwa. Mu kiganiro Today ca Radio 4 yegukira BBC, yavuze ati: "Ndazi neza ko tuzokwitunganya dufatiye ku bihe turimwo. Ndazi ko, ku neza y'iri higanwa nyamukuru ry'u Bwongereza be n'ayandi mahiganwa makuru makuru ya Bulaya, bose bazokwipfuza ko amahiganwa arangira neza". "Ndizera ko bizokunda ko twitunganya ukundi mu  mahiganwa y'umwaka uza, dufatiye ku bihe vy'amahiganwa mpuzamakungu, be n'uko inkino zimwe zimwe zishobora gushirwa hagati mu ndwi". "Turashobora gutegura tukarangiza ihiganwa neza, vyose bivana n'integuro be n'ingene twitunganije". "Ariko nk'uko n'abandi bose babivuga, kandi ndabihagararako, aho ni mu gihe ibihe vyoba vyorohereza bose. Kandi dutegerezwa kugendera ku vyo leta idusaba".

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru 07/09/2019: Messi, Neymar, Smalling, Rojo, Eriksen, Mbappe, Coutinho
text: Lionel Messi arashobora kuva muri Barcelona mu mwaka uza akaja gukinira ahandi atarinze kugurishwa , mu gihe uyo mukinyi wa Argentine w'imyaka 32 yovyiyumvamwo, nk'uko amasezerano abimwemerera. (El Pais, via L'Equipe) Messi azoba afise uburenganzira bw'ukugiriranira amasezerano n'umurwi uwo ari wo wose kuva ku wa 01 z'ukwezi kwa mbere umwaka uza wa 2020.  (Marca - in Spanish) Mu mwaka uza w'inkino, Real Madrid ishobora kurondera umukinyi wa Paris St-Germain, umufaransa akina imbere Kylian Mbappe w'imyaka 20.  (Sport - in Spanish) Umukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Brezili Neymar ashobora kuzoguma mu murwi wa  PSG kiretse ari nka hamwe yokwemera kugabanya umushahara asaba, nk'uko bivugwa na  Javier Tebas, umukuru w'ihiganwa ryo muri Espanye, La Liga. (Mail) Chris Smalling ariteguye kuva burundu muri  Manchester United inyuma y'aho uyo mukinyi w'inyuma w'imyaka 29  atijirijwe  mu murwi Roma wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano Serie A. (Mirror) Eka n'umukinyi w'inyuma nyene wa Manchester United, umunya Argentina  Marcos Rojo w'imyaka 29, ariteguye gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo mu kwezi kwa mbere ave muri uyo murwi bibaye ngombwa,  inyuma y'aho utwigoro tw'ukwimukira muri Everton muri iri ci riheze ataco twashitseko.  (Ole - in Spanish) Umurwi Juventus wo mu Butaliyano uriko wihweza ingene wogura  abakinyi babiri ba Tottenham, umubirigi akina inyuma Toby Alderweireld w'imyaka 30, be n'umunya Danemark akina hagati Christian Eriksen w'imyaka 27. Inter Milan nayo nyene ikaba yipfuza umukinyi Alderweireld. (Mail) Manchester City yashitse ku masezerano n'umurwi wo mu gihugu ca Serbia FK Cukaricki y'ugushobora kugura mu kwezi kwa mbere umukinyi w'imbere Slobodan Tedic w'imyaka 19 akomoka muri  Montenegro. (Manchester Evening News) D'Margio w'imyaka 17, umuhungu wa Shaun Wright-Phillips yigeze kuba umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester City be n'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza, yateye igikumu ku masezerano ya mbere yo gushobora gukinira uyo murwi. (Manchester Evening News) Umumenyereza wa Manchester City, Pep Guardiola, yari yanse kurondera umunya Brezili Philippe Coutinho wa Barcelona  imbere y'uko uyo mukinyi wo hagati w'imyaka 27 aja gukinira Bayern Munich nk'intizo. (Marca - in Spanish) Chelsea iriteguye kugiriranira ayandi masezerano na Emerson Palmieri, umutaliyano yavukiye muri Brezili, bigashobora gutuma amasezerano y'uyo mukinyi w'inyuma w'imyaka 25 afitaniye n'uyo murwi yongerezwa uwundi mwaka inyuma ya 2022.  (Gazzetta dello Sport, via Mail) Henrikh Mkhitaryan umukinyi wa Arsenal w'imyaka 30 akomoka muri Armenia, ntamenya neza nimba azoshobora gusubira muri uyo murwi wiwe inyuma y'aho agiriye gukina mu murwi Roma wo mu Butaliyano nk'intizo gushika mu mpera z'uno mwaka w'inkino. (Sun) Sir Alex Ferguson yaragerageje guhendahenda uwahoze ari umusatirizi w'umurwi w'Ubwongereza Michael Owen ngo yinjire muri Manchester United igihe yari akiri umukangara imbere y'uko yinjira muri  Liverpool. (Mail) Umukuru w'umurwi wa Paris St-Germain,Thomas Tuchel, aracari mu biganiro n'umukinyi w'imbere wa  Barcelona, umufaransa Ousmane Dembele w'imyaka 22, n'aho bisa n'uko ataco biriko birashikako . (Express) Bobby Duncan, umwongereza w'imyaka 18 yahoze ari mu murwi w'imikangara ya Liverpool yaranse kuja mu murwi Manchester United  akaba yashimye kwimukira mu murwi wa Fiorentina wo mu Butaliyano. (Mail)

headline: Ikibumbano ca Cristiano Ronaldo ntikivurwako rumwe mu Buhindi
text: Ikibumbano gishasha  c'umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru w'umunya-Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo kirateye impari mu bantu mu Buhindi. Ico kibumbano kiri mu ntara y'uburengero ya Goa, aho umupira w'amaguru ukundwa cane, abategetsi bizeye ko kizotera intege abakiri bato. Ariko si bose bishimiye ico kibumbabo kirekire gikozwe muri bronze ubu gishinzwe muri park y'ikigwati kiri ku nkengera. Abakinegura bavuga ko abakinyi b'umupira w'amaguru b'aho muri iyo ntara  bari bakwiye kuba ari bo baterwa  iteka na cane cane ko mu bakinyi bagize umurwi nserukiragihugu mu Buhindi, aba kera n'abo ubu benshi ari abaturuka mu ntara ya Goa. Portugal ni umugwi ukundwa cane mu ntara ya Goa, yahoze itwarwa gikoroni n'ico gihugu,   abatari bake mu banya-Goa bakaba barabaye muri Portugal canke bahafise imiryango. Ariko bamwe muri iyo ntara y'Ubuhindi babona ko ari igitutsi gushiraho ico kibumbano mu gihe hariko harahimbazwa imyaka 60 iheze Goa ironse ubwigenge kuri Portugal, ivyo bikaba vyabaye haheze imyaka 14 izindi ntara z'Ubuhindi zose zarikuyeko intwaro y'Ubwongereza Manchester United yagarukanye Cristiano Ronaldo Michael Lobo, umushingamateka wo  mu mugwambwe uri ku butegetsi muri iyo ntara Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) yashize kuri twitter ifoto yiwe ari iruhande y'ico kibumbano, avuga ko cahashizwe "bisabwe n'urwaruka rwacu" kugira "kirubere icitegererezo  rushikane umupira w'amaguru ku ntera yo hejuru". N'ubwo cricket arirwo mukino ukundwa kurusha iyindi mu Buhindi, umupira w'amaguru - na cane cane Premier League y'Ubwongereza - urakundwa cane mu bice bimwe bimwe vy'ico gihugu - Kerala mu bumanuko, Goa mu burengero, West Bengal mu buseruko hamwe n'intara zose zo mu buseruko bushira uburaruko uko ari umunani. Cristiano Ronaldo, ubu akinira Manchester United,  arakundwa n'abafana benshi, akaba abonwa cane  nk'umwe mu bakinyi ba mbere beza muri kahise k'uwo mukino. Uwo mukinyi w'imbere w'imyaka 36 ntaco aravuga ku mugaragaro kuri ico kibumbano. Si ubwa mbere ikubumbano ciwe gitera  utubazo - mu 2017, ikibumbano c'umutwe gushika ku bitugu (bust)  ca Ronaldo  caraneguwe gushika aho gisubirizwa ku kibuga c'indege ca Maderira muri Portugal.

headline: Abayabaga bari barihebuye ko batazokwigera basubira gutambuka
text: Na Naomi Grimley Umunyamakuru mu gisata c'amagara, Dakar Mu gihe Afrika yagize inama ya mbere ku bugaru (ibirenge by’indosho) -ubumuga buvukana umwe ku bantu 800 kw’isi – BBC yagendeye ibitaro vyo muri Senegal kuraba aho  ukuvura ubwo bumuga bihindura ubuzima. Mu minsi iheze, Serigne w‘imyaka 14 ntiyubahuka kuva mu nzu. Yarashobora gutambuka buke buke atanyaruka, ariko – kubera yavukanye ibirenge vyompi biraba inyuma – vyaramutera isoni cane. Bamwe baratwenga ingene atambuka, abandi bakamutinya bagatangura no kumwita amatazirano. Ariko ubu inyuma y’amezi atandatu, ibirenge vyiwe vyarahindutse, ubu indoto ziwe zo gukinira Senegal umupira w’amaguru zisa n’izishoboka. Serigne  afise ubugaru, ubu akaba ari mu rugendo rwo kubukosora. Buri mwaka, abana 200,000 baravukana ubugaru. Ku bw’ishirahamwe ry’abagiraneza MiracleFeet, ku bantu miriyoni 10 bakiriho bavukanye ubugaru,  abashika miriyoni 8 ntibigeze baronka amahirwe y’uko bukosorwa. Senegal iri mu bihugu bitanguye gukoresha vuba Ponseti – ubuhinga  bwo gukosora ubugaru bwiswe gutyo  hafatiwe kw’izina ry’umuganga w’umu-Espagnol yabutoye – ugereranije n’ibindi bihugu. Malawi na Uganda, nk’akarorero, biri mu bihugu vyatanze na bimwe bimwe vy’i Buraya kwemera ko ubwo buhinga bushobora gufasha. Ariko abanganga b’abanya-Senegal ubwo buhinga barabunonosoye gusumba uko bwari mu ntango, ubu bakaba babukoresha mu gukosora ubugaru ku bana b’imiyabaga mbere n’abakuze bari bazi ko bamaze kurenza imyaka yo gukosorwa. Nyina wa Serigne aranezerewe cane n’ingene umuhungu wiwe ariko aratera imbere. Nta muntu amurusha kumenya  umubabaro n’ububabare biterwa n’ubwo bumuga. “Umunsi umwe yarigeze kwanka kuva i muhira iminsi itatu.  Vyarambabaje cane ku mutima. Ariko ubu turanezerewe.” Hakoreshejwe ubwo buhinga, buri indwi, umuntu baramushirako isima kugira ihindukize buke buke ikirenge gitumbere neza. Ariko kubera we ubugaru bwiwe bwari bukaze cane, yashizweko isima incuro 20 mu mayinga nk’ayo nyene, ariko ubundi muri rusangi ni hagati ya gatanu n’umunani. Nk’uko bigenda kenshi iyo gukosora biri hafi kurangira, biba ngombwa ko abagwa kugira babohore “Tendon d’Achilles” [Ikigango) yiwe ariko ubundi ubwo buhinga ntibusaba kubagwa. Iciza gusumba, burazimbutse, ntiburinda gukoreshwa n’abaganga karuhariwe, kandi bukora neza cane – 90 % y’abana bakosowe imbere y’uko barenza imyaka ibiri bagira ikirenge gikora neza, mu gihe kubagwa bishobora kuzana izindi ngorane. Ubudasa buratangaje cane iyo uravye  amasanamu ya video ya Serigne imbere y’uko atangura gukosorwa. Mu minsi iheze, Serigne yarashizweko isima ya nyuma. Inyuma y’aho, azokenera kugirishwa ibikorwa ngoraramubiri kugira afashwe kumenyera guhagarara ku maguru yiwe Kandi mu minsi ya mbere azokwambara urwego  ku maguru kugira agumize ibirenge uruhande rumwe, ariko kazoza kiwe kerekeza heza. Fatou, uwundi mwana ariko aravurwa muri ivyo bitaro vya Dakar, yakoze urugendo rwa 400km kugira nawe akosorerwe ikirenge ciwe  c’i buryo. Ubu ageze ku myaka 13 ariko umuforoma mukuru, Nicanor Manga, aramwizeza ko  ikirenge ciwe kizokosorwa mu nyuma agatambuka neza.  Fatou avuga ko kubera aba kure cane, ntiyigeze yishiramwo ko ikirenge ciwe cokosowe. Kuba bizofata umwanya avyakira neza. Kuja kw’ishure ntivyoroshe – kubona abandi bana bari kumwe basimbasimba -mu gihe Fatou nawe yaba agendera ku bibando (bequilles). “Ivyo nifuza vyose, nta na kimwe nashobora. Ariko ni nakira, nzoshobora gukora ivyo nshaka.” Aho harimwo gukora kugira ashike ku ndoto yiwe yo kuba umuganga. Ariko si bose bagira amahirwe. Fata nka Oumou Barry w’imyaka 32, nk’akarorero. Igihe twamugendera muri Lac Rose, akarere ko mu nkengera y’umurwa mukuru wa Senegal, Dakar, yatweretse ikirenge ciwe gihetamye kandi kimeze nk’ikigaramye. Agendera ku ruhande rw’ikirenge kandi ububabare butuma adashobora gushika kure. Ubuzima bwiwe bwarabaye iciro ry’umugani kubera ubugaru, ariko aravuga ubwana bwiwe amasozi amutanga hasi. “Nahora mbaza mama igituma meze gutyo? Akanyishura ati: ‘Niko Imana yabishatse’ hanyuma uvuka gutyo.’” Oumou yaciye  mu bituma n’abandi benshi muri Senegal  bihebura ntibarondere ubuvuzi. Yavuze ko igihe ciwe camugoye cane ari igihe yari imyaka y’ubuyabaga, igihe abagenzi biwe batangura kwambara ibirato birebire, nawe agategerezwa kwama yambaye isandare gusa. Amaherero, yaruhiye guheba ishure- kuko ntiyaragishoboye kwihanganira kwama ariko araterwa amajambo. Yahavuye anaheba icigwa co kubarira kuko yasanzwe guhonyora ipedali y’imashini (icarahani) bibabaza cane. Oumou  afise umugabo n’abana babiri, ubuzima bwiwe si nyamwigendako nk’uko hari abaciye baharirwa ivomo kubera ubugaru, ariko n’ubu arumva ko abuze vyinshi kubera ubwo bumuga bugaragara butuma adashibora gukora akazi. Arira yagize ati: “Nta kintu gifadika mfise”. Aho bibabarije, kubera imyaka afise kandi  akaba yarabazwe ntivyagenda neza, Oumou ntashobora gukosorwa hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa Ponseti. Abakuze barashobora gukosorwa neza na Ponseti, ariko biragira cane gusumba kuko ibirenge vyabo bitaba bicoroshe cane Kenshi, ibituma umuntu avukana ubugaru ntibitahurwa neza, n’ubwo abahungu bafise ivyago biruta incuro zibiri ivy’abakobwa vyo kubuvukana. Benshi mu babuvukana kw’isi bari mu bihugu bikenye n’ibifise amikoro abayabaye, kubera urugero runini rw’abavuka, kandi mu bihugu bikenye ni ho akenshi ubwo bumuga budakosorwa. Umwe mu bagore yiyemeje guhebera ubuzima bwiwe gufasha kugira ntihagire abantu benshi  bakurana ubugaru ni  Aisha Mballo. Twahuriye w’isoko ryo mu gisagara ca Thies. Agendana igitabo kinini kirimwo amafoto. Ico gitabo gisigura ico arico ubugaru n’ingene ubuhinga bwa Ponseti bushobora kubukosora. Yaje ngaha kurondera aboba bafise ubugaru ubundi bashobora kuba ngaho bagakura atawubitayeho. Aisha avuga ko na we nyene ibirenge vyiwe bwari ubugaru gushika aho, mu myaka ya 1990 ari um myaka yiwe y’ubuyabaga, yarungikwa muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kubagwa. Ubu n’umukorerabushake  aserukira ishirahamwe ry’abagiraneza MiracleFeet, rihimiriza gupima, kuraba hakiri kare umwana ko atavukanye ubugaru. “Abantu bemeye ko umwana afise ubugaru hanyuma bakareka kumunyegeza, turashobora kubajana mu bitaro bagakosorwa.” Rosalind Owen wa Global Clubfoot Initiative, yize ibijanye n’ingene ubugaru bubonwa muri Afrika, avuga ko mu mico ya kera hari ingorane zikomeye nyinshi  zo kwigizayo uwufise  ubugaru”. Abantu bibaza ko wavumwe, canke ko warozwe, canke ko abavyeyi bawe hari ikintu kibi bakoze.” Aho harimwo kuvuga ko nyoko wawe yarenze ibigo kw’ico rero ari igihano. N’ubu abadashika 20% y’abafise ubugaru ni bo bakosorwa bakivuka muri Senegal , bivuze ko hakiri vyinshi vyo gukorwa. Imbere y’uko tuva Thies,  twaciye mu bindi bitaro kuraba uruyoya rw’umukobwa rw’indwi zibiri rwariko rurashirwako isima. Abaganga n’abaforoma bariko barabohera ama pansuma ku tuguru twiwe hanyuma bashirako isima itose hejuru. Iki nico gihe ciza co gukosora ubugaru. Mu cumba co kurindiriramwo, umwana w’umuhungu w’imyaka ibiri, ariko aratera igikarato cavuyemwo umutobe (jus/juice). Hari n'aho azohava avamwo umukinyi w’umupira w’amaguru. Ntashingura neza -  kuko ikirenge kimwe kiracari ubugaru – ariko nibura ariko arakosorwa.

headline: CVR Burundi: "Inzego za leta zagize uruhara runini mu bwicanyi bwo mu 1972"
text: Umugwi ujejwe kurondera ukuri ku bihe vy'ubwicanyi bukabije vyagiye birashikira Uburundi muri kahise usanga inzego za leta yari ihari ico gihe zaragize uruhara runini mu bwicanyi bwo mu 1972. Ushikiriza inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka icegeranyo ca buri mwaka c'aho ugejeje ibikorwa, umugwi CVR wasavye  leta ihari ubu gusaba ikigongwe  ku bantu bose bahuye n'ivyo vvago. N'icegeranyo giteye ubwoba nk'uko vyashikirijwe n'umukuru w'umugwi CVR Pierre Claver Ndayicariye. Kivuga ido n'ido ry'ingene abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bagizwe ahanini n'abo mu bwoko bw'abahutu bishwe muri uwo mwaka w' 1972 bagatabwa mu binogo rusangi  na cane cane mu bibanza bitatu vy'intara ya Gitega ari naho ahanini uwo mugwi wakoreye mu mwaka uheze. Wamenyesheje ko ku binogo 8 washoboye kuzuramwo ibisigarira muri commune za Shombo, Giheta no ku ruzi Ruvubu, umugwi CVR waharuye abantu bahatawe barenga ibihumbi indwi n'amajana atatu na 40, abahicirwa bakaba begeranirizwa ku mugwa mukuru wa Gitega bakuwe cane cane mu ntara zihana urubibe n'iyo ntara. Benshi ngo bari abanyeshure, abarimu, abadandaza n'abihebeye imana. Umugwi CVR uvuga ko  abaja kwicwa batangwa canke bakegeranywa n'abakuru b'imitumba, abakuru b'ama commune canke b'intara, imodoka zabatwara nazo zari iz'igisirikare canke izo cahamagaje. Izo mbere ngo ni  nazo zongera zikaja kwimba ibinogo zigatwara abo bantu kubitabwamo bahejeje kwicwa bakubwiswe inyundo canke ibindi vyuma, barashwe canke bapfiriye mu twumba batsindagirwamwo ari benshi cane batabona izuba kandi badahabwa amazi, rimwe na rimwe mbere ngo hari abasukwa mu binogo bagihema. Ivyo vyose umugwi CVR uvuga ko wabibwiwe n'abakiriho mu babibonye, abacitse kw'icumu, apfakazi canke impfuvyi. Ngo hari n'abari mu nzego za reta ico gihe  bakiriho kandi bavuganye n'uwo mugwi. Umugwi CVR mu mwaka uheze warakoreye kandi ugiye kuzobandanya ukorera mu ntara za Rumonge na Makamba ari naho  bivugwa ko ubwicanyi bwatanguriye itariki 29 ukwezi kwa kane mu 1972 butumbereye abatutsi. Uwo mugwi ukibaza gusa ingene bwanyarutse gukwira igihugu cose kandi abavugwa ko bari bateye igihugu muri izo ntara  batarenze aho. Pierre Claver Ndayicariye arongoye umugwi wo kurondera ukiri ku vyago vyashikiye Uburundi yavuze ko naho ico cegeranyo giteye ubwoba intumbero yaco ari  ugukiza abarundi biciye mu kumenya ukuri benshi gushika ubu batigeze bamenya. Ibikorwa vy'uwo mugwi umaze imyaka irenga itandatu ushinzwe birabandanya, mu myaka ibiri iheze ukaba mbere warongerejewe ibikorwa kuko ubu utohoza gushika mu 1885 kare wageza kuva Uburundi bucikukira gushika mu 2008. Kuva wongewe ibikorwa ukaba usigaje imyaka ibiri ku kiringo c'imyaka ine wahawe ariko gishobora kwongerwa.

headline: Iran: Fifa isabwa kuvana ico gihugu mu gikombe c'isi kubera uburenganzira bw'abagore
text: Ishirahamwe riharanira uburenganzira  ryasavye Fifa kuvana Iran mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi mu mupira  bw’amaguru inyuma yo kwankira abagore kurorera inkino mu gihugu cabo. Iryo shirahamwe, Open Stadiums, ryabajije igituma igihugu cemererwa kuja mu mahiganwa mu gihe  abategetsi “n’ubu batarekurira abagore b’abanya-Iran kuraba urwo rukino rwiza.” Ako kamo gatewe haheze amayinga abagore bemerewe kuraba urukino rwo mu gihugu ubwa mbere kuva mu 1979. Ariko iryo shirahamwe ntiryaheze amakenga ko ibibuga vy’umupira bizoguma vyuguruwe ku bagore. Open Stadiums ryanditse mw’ikete yarungukiye umukuru wa Fifa  Gianni Infantino riti: “Abagore bo muri Iran ntibizeye baba abategetsi ba reta baba n’abategetsi b’ishirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru  ko ikibuga ca Azadi kizoguma cuguruye  ku bagore   igikombe c’isi ca Fifa 2022  ni camara kurangira itariki 18 Kigarama (12)". Rivuga kandi ko n’abazoja Qatar kuraba inkino bashobora kugira ingorane ku bategetsi ba Iran kuko bashobora kuguma bakurirana uwo wese azoba yagiye kuziraba. Kubuza abagore kwitaba inkino biteye kubiri  n’amategeko mpuzamakungu y’umupira w’amaguru, nk’uko iryo kete ribivuga, rigashimika rivuga ko rero Fifa ikwiye guca ivana Iran mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe 2022 muri Qatar. Imbuga z’amakuru muri Iran zanditse ibivugwa ko abagore bemerewe kuraba urukino mu kwezi kw’umunani inyuma y’aho Fifa irungikiye ikete abategetsi ibasaba kwemerera abagore kwinjira mu bibuga vy’umupira. Fifa yari imaze kubwira BBC ko itazoraba hirya kuri ico kibazo. Nta tegeko rihari ribuza abagore kuja kuraba inkino  muri Iran, ariko ni imbonekarimwe kuko kenshi batemererwa kwinjira. Imbere y’aho abagore ntibemererwa kuraba inkino zo mu gihugu aho abagabo baba bariko barakina kuko abajejwe kwigisha ijambo ry’imana batavyemera kw’izina rya Islam y’aba Shia. Abagore baramaze kurorera inkino mpuzamakungu nkeya harimwo rumwe mu kwezi kwa gatatu uyu mwaka, nk’uko bivugwa n’itororokanirizo ry’amakuru, Reuters. Iryo shirahamwe riharanira uburenganzira rivuga kandi ko umugwi w’abakinyi uzoja muri Qatar mu mpera z’uyu mwaka wihanijwe kutagira ico uvuze ko myiyerakano iriko irwagwamwo abantu muri iyi minsi muri Iran. Yatewe n’urupfu rwa Mahsa Amini, umugore yapfuye ari mu minwe y’abaporisi inyuma yo gufatwa n’igiporisi kijejwe kwifata uko bibereye. Iryo kete rivuga ko aho yapfiriye ari co kigo nyene “abafana b’abagore bakunze kujanwa bakaborezwa igufa iyo bubahutse bakaja kuraba urukino rw’umupira w’amaguru”.

headline: Qatar 2022: Bukari avuga ko atasuzuguye Ronaldo mu kumwigana
text: Umusatirizi wa Ghana Osman Bukari avuga ko atasuzuguye Cristiano Ronaldo igihe yigana iki gihangange ca Portugal mu kwigina igitsindo yari ahejeje kwinjiza mu rukino rwahuje Ghana n’ico gihugu ku wa kane mw’itsinda H. Bukari yinjije igitsindo ku munota wa 89 aca yiruka aja ku kabendera ko mu mfuruka z’ikibuga kwigina, yigana Ronaldo. Uyu yahoze ari umusatirizi wa Manchester United niwe yinjije igitsindo ca mbere ca Portugal ariko igihe Bukari yinjiza iki gitsindo wewe yari yamaze kuva mu kibuga. Uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 23 yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Narabonye ko ingene niginye igitsindo canje vyateje amajambo menshi, bavuga ko nasuzuguye Ronaldo". "Ibi si vyo. Nararengewe n’umunezero nagize kirya gihe wo kubona ninjirije igihugu canje igitsindo mu rukino rwanje rwa mbere mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose, ari co gituma niginye kurya. "Indero nahawe ntishobora kunyemerera gusuzugura abankurira, tube turareka umwe mu bantu nkunda cane”. Iki gihugu catahukanye ihiganwa ry’igikombe ca Bulaya mu 2016 carashoboye gukingira intsinzi yaco ya 3-2, bica bituma Ghana ija mu kibanza ca nyuma mw’itsinda ryayo inyuma y’aho urundi rukino hagati ya Uruguay na Korea y’Epfo rwari rwarangiye ari 0-0, hari ku wa kane. Ronaldo yabaye umukinyi wa mbere ku ruhande rw’abagabo yinjije mu mahiganwa atanu atandukanye y’igikombe c’isi yose, igihe yinjiza igitsindo kuri penalty ku munota wa 65 kw’ikosa yari ahejeje gukoregwa n’umukinyi wa Ghana, Mohammed Salisu. Umumenyereza w’umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Ghana uzwi nka Black Stars, Otto Addo, ntiyishimiye ingene umuhagarikizi w’urukino Ismail Elfath yavyifashemwo. Addo  ati: "Nibaza ko ari ingingo yafashwe mu makosa, kuko twariko turakina umupira. Sinzi igituma  bwa buginga bwa videwo VAR (Video Assistant Referee) butakoreshejwe, nta nsiguro yahabaye”. "Yabaye ingingo itari yo. Mu vy’ukuri ni twebwe twakorewe ikosa”. Addo avuga ko yarondeye ingene yovugana n’umuhagarikizi ku ngingo zimwe zimwe inyuma y’urukino. "Nashaka kubigira mu bwitonzi ariko nabwiwe ko yari mu nama. Yaraturwanya. Twararonse amakarata makeya y’umuhondo twari dukwiriye ariko baradukoreye amakosa yategerezwa gutangirwa amakarata y’umuhondo ariko ntayo bahawe”. Abajijwe ivy’igitsndo ca Ronaldo cahinduye ibintu, Addo yavuze ati: "Iyo umuntu yinjije igitsindo, ni ukumukeza. Ariko kirya ni ico bahawe, koko ni ico bahawe”. Umukinyi w’inyuma wa Brighton Tariq Lamptey na we nyene yarinjiye mu gice ca kabiri ariko yavuze ko urukino rwiwe rwa mbere mu gikombe c’isi yose rwabaye igihe c’ “umubabaro”. Ghana izohura na Korea y’Epfo mu rukino rugira kabiri mw’itsinda H ku wa mbere isaha cumi, urwa nyuma rukazoyihuza na Uruguay ku wa gatanu igenekerezo rya 02 kigarama (12).

headline: Burundi - Miriyaridi 7 ziranyuruzwa buri mwaka mu matagisi y'amasoko ya Bujumbura
text: Umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati, umutekano n'iterambere rusangi mu Burundi agabisha abatoza amakori (taxes) mu masoko y'igisagara ca Bujumbura ko bagiye gufatirwa ingingo hamwe bobandanya kuba intambamyi mu kwinjiza mu kigega c'igisigara amafaranga yose ategegerezwa gutozwa mu masoko. Ingingo ya mbere ija imaze gufatwa. Inyuma y'inama bagirishijwe mu gisagara ca Bujumbura na General Gervais Ndirakobuca, hafashwe ingingo yo guhagarika abari bajejwe gutoza amakori n'ama taxe mu masoko y'igisagara ca Bujumbura. General Ndirakobuca yavuze ko  ubushikiranganji bwo nyene bwitoreje ayo mafaranga buca burenzako miriyoni 121 ku ndwi, ''kandi aba commaissaires b'amasoko ntibigeze batworohereza''. Ati: "Mwonsigurira gute ko amafaranga atozwa muri mairie mu ndwi imwe, turavye n'inzitizi twahuye nazo, ubushikiranganji buriko buratoza burenzako miriyoni 121? Ntimwumva ko igihugu capfuye?" Yavuze ko ashobora no gushika miriyoni 150 ku ndwi, bisiguye ku mwaka ko arenga  miriyaridi ndwi (ashika miliyoni $3.5). Mu ma komine yo hagati mu gihugu ho ,  umushikiranganji Ndirakubuca yavuze ko basanze muri rusangi reta itakaza miriyaridi 40  ku mwaka. Yabwiye ibitavye iyo nama harimwo abajejwe gutoza amakori mu masoko y'igisagara ca Bujumbura ati: "Inyuma y'iyi nama, uwusubira kuvyivangamwo, ibimushikira ntagire ngo n'ubushikiranganji…..ntavuge ngo reta mvyeyi itwara abantu ku Musaga'', imvugo iciye hirya yo kubagabisha ko bazofatwa, bagapfungwa-ku  Musaga niho hari ibohero rikuru rya Mpimba. Reta y'Uburundi isanzwe ishigikira imirimo y'amakomine ku mafaranga angana na miriyaridi 63  ku mwaka. Umushikiranganji Ndirakobuca  avuga ko hamwe ama komine yokwinjiza amafaranga yose ategerezwa kuboneka, ayo reta itanga yoheza agakora ibindi. Uburundi buri mu bihugu vya mbere kw'isi birangwamwo ibiturire cane, hakurikijwe icegeranyo c'uwu mwaka ca Transparency International, ikigo gikurikirana ibijanye n'ibiturire mu bihugu vyose vyo kw'isi.

headline: Umugore w'Umutalianokazi yikanguye amaze amezi 10 muri coma
text: Umugore w'umutalianokazi yavuye muri  koma (coma)  inyuma y'amezi 10, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu. Cristina Rosi, w'imyaka 37, yari afise inda y'amezi indwi igihe yagira ikibazo c'umutima mu  kwezi nkw'indwi mu mwaka uheze. Umukobwa wiwe, Caterina, yavutse nyina abanje gukorwa (Caesarean). Ariko nyina yaciye aguma muri koma bikekwa ko  ubwonko bwari bwononekaye. Ubu yikanguye avuga ijambo ryiwe rya mbere, "Mamma", nk'uko umugabo wiwe yabivuze. Gabriele Succi yabwiye ikinyamakuru La Nazione ati: "Ntavyo twari twiteze, kari akanyamuneza vy'ukuri inyuma y'ayo marushwa." Madame  Rosi yimuriwe mu bitaro muri Autriche  mu kwezi kwa kane kugira  akurikiranwe mu buryo budasanzwe . Nyina n'umugabo wiwe bompi bari iruhande yiwe igihe yavuga. Amafaranga yo kuvurwa kwiwe yatanzwe n'urubuga rwo kwegeranya imitahe mito mito ariko itanzwe n'abantu benshi (crowdfunding) gushika ubu rumaze kuronka amadorari 208.000  yo kubandanya avurwa harimwo `n'ukugororwa ingingo z'umubiri (physiotherapie). Urubuga rwa internet rwa Arezzo Notizie ruvuga ko Succi yavuze ati "Cristina ubu biragoye kumumenya. "Arisanzuye gusumba, ubu baramukuyemwo umuringoti bari batobereye inzira mu muhogo kugira ashobore guhema (thracheostomy), ubu bacishije mw'ipompo bariko baramuha umuti uzotuma haba irindi terambere mu ngingo ziwe." Umukobwa wiwe nawe yaramaze amezi atari make mu  mu bitaro kubera ubukene bw'umwuka wa oxygene igihe yavuka.

headline: Covid-19: Papa Francis ahagaritswe umutima n'abatinya incanco muri Ekleziya
text: Papa Francis avuga ko atabona ingene yosigura igituma bamwe mu bakardinali muri Ekleziya Katolika batinya gufata urucanco rwa Covid-19. Avugana n'abanyamakuru igihe yagira yurire indege ava muri Slovakia asubira mu Butaliyano, Papa Francis yavuze ati: "Ntivyumvikana kuko kahise k'isi kerekana ko umuntu afitaniye ubucuti n'incanco". Papa atera akamo abantu kwicandagisha "ku neza y'abandi", ni mu gihe na we nyene yamaze kwiteza urucanco rwa Covid-19. Avuga ko umukardinali umwe yisanze ari mu cumba c'indembe kubera Covid-19. Francis ntiyadomyeko urutoke uyo muntu, ariko umukardinali w'umunyamerika agendera ku vyakera Raymond Burke w'imyaka 73, aherutse kumara imisi mu bitaro ari muri ca cuma gifasha guhema inyuma yo kwandura uwu mugera. Ntibizwi neza nimba Kardinali Burke yaricandagishije canke aticandagishije, ariko muri kahise yagiye yumvikana anegura cane ivyo kwicandagisha. Papa Francis yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: "No mu nama nkuru y'abakardinali, harimwo abarwanya incanco. Ariko umwe muri bo, ibibabaje cane, yararajwe mu bitaro kubera uwu mugera. Ni ibintu bitangaje mu buzima". Yongerako ko hafi bose i Vaticano ubu bamaze gucandagwa, kandi ko bariko bariga ingene bofasha abo bagifise ubwoba. Atangara cane, yavuze ati: "Tukiri abana, twaracandazwe agasama n'ubukangwe - abana bose baracandazwe kandi nta n'umwe yigeze avuga na kimwe". Hagati aho, Papa aremera ko impari zimwe zimwe kuri izi ncanco zishobora gutuma haba ubwoba bwinshi n'amadidane ku bijanye n'izi ncanco, akavuga ko ari ngombwa ko "twerekana aho ukuri kuri kandi tukavugana umutima mu nda". Bamwe mu bayobozi b'Ekleziya, cane cane muri Amerika, bemeza ko abakatolika bakwiye kwemererwa kwanka izi ncanco za Covid-19 bisunze ukwemera kwabo. Ariko, Papa Francis ntahuza nabo, akavuga ko izi ncanco "ata ngorane ziteye ku kwemera kw'umuntu", ko rero zokoreshwa ku neza.

headline: Novak Djokovic: Singwanya kwicandagisha ariko nemeye guheba ibikombe haguhatirwa kwiteza urucanco
text: Novak Djokovic  avuga ko yopfuma aheba gukinira ibikombe vyo muri kazoza haguhatirwa kwiteza urucanco rwa Covid -19. Mu kiganiro cihariye na BBC, yavuze ko ataho ahuriye n'abagwanya incanco, ariko ko ashigikiye uburenganzira bw'umuntu bwo guhitamwo ico ashaka. Djokovic yabajijwe niba yohitamwo guheba amahiganwa nka Wimbledon na French Open haguheba aho  ahagaze ku vyerekeye incanco. Nawe ati : "Ego, ico nico kiguzi niteguriye kuriha." Uwo mukinyi amaze gutsinda Grand Slam incuro 20 yarirukanywe muri Australia mu kwezi guheze reta y'ico gihugu imaze gufuta  visa yiwe ku mpari zijanye no kuba aticandagishije. Djokovic, asanzwe ariwe wa mbere kw'isi  muri tennis y'abagabo, avuga ko yari yarasonse uruhusha rudasansazwe rwo kwinjira muri ico gihugu gukina mw'ihiganwa rya Australian Open kubera yari amaze iminsi aheruka gukira Covid-19. Ariko umushikiranganji wa Australia ajejwe abasohoka n'abinjira , Alex Hawke, ubwiwe yaciye afuta visa y'uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 34, ku mvo z'uko kuba ari muri Australia vyari gushobora "kugumura" bigaha intege  agatima ko kugwanya incanco. Yabwiye BBC ati "Sinigeze ngwanya incanco", yemeza ko yatewe incanco akiri umwana, "ariko namye nshigikira uburenganzira bwo guhitamwo ico ushira mu mubiri wawe." Mu kiganiro caciye irya n'ino ibibazo vyinshi, ica mbere kuva apfungiwe i Melbourne muri Nzero (ukwa 1), Djokovic yisiguye ku bijanyue n'igihe yatorwa ko yanduye umugera wa corona muri Kigarama (ukwa 12) hamwe n'ingene abona incanco. Djokovic  yavuze ko yizeye ko ingingo zijanye n'ukwicandagisha ku mahiganwa amwe amwe zizohinduka,  anavuga ko yizeye ko "ashobora kuzokina iyindi myaka myinshi". Ariko yanemeje kandi ko yiteguriye guheba amahirwe yo kuba umugabo wa mbere w'ibihe vyose muri tennis kubera uko yumva ibintu. Umukeba wa Djokovic, Rafael Nadal, amaze gutahukana intsinzi 21 za Grand Slam, gutyo akaba ariwe mugabo wa mbere afise intsinzi nyinshi za wenyene kurusha abandi bose. Abajijwe igituma, yishuye ati: "Kubera ica ngenderwako mu gufata ingingo ku vyerekeye umubiri wanje kirakomeye kuruta igikombe canke ikindi kintu ico arico cose. Jewe ngerageza gukurikiza ivyo umubiri wanje ushaka uko bishoboka kwose." Djokovic  yavuze ko yamye ari umuntu ashira imbere "kumererwa neza, amagara, kurya neza," kandi ko ingingo yiwe ku ruhande rumwe yatumwe n'ingaruka nziza ibintu bimwe bimwe nko guhindura ingene arya n'ingene aryama, vyagize ku bushobozi bwiwe nk'umunonotsi. Avuga ko aguma "ari maso" ku bijanye no gushobora kuzokwicandagisha muri kazoza "kuko  turiko turagerageza gutora, twese hamwe, inyishu nziza ishoboka yo kurangiza Covid". "Sinigeze ngwanya kwicandagisha. Ndatahura ko, kw'isi yose, abantu bose bariko baragerageza gushira inguvu mu kurwanya uwo mugera, kandi bizeye ko ugiye kurangira vuba." Umwihwezo w'umunyamakuru Fergus Walsh Incanco (doses) zirenga  miriyaridi 10 za Covid ziramaze guterwa kandi abantu hafi batandatu kuri 10 kw'isi yose baramaze kuronka nibura rumwe. N'ukuvuga ko hari amakuru menshi. Nko ku yindi miti myinshi, incanco za Covid zirashobora kugira ingaruka, ariko integuro yazo ku mutekano ni nziza cane. Zimaze gukiza ubuzima bw'abantu badaharurwa, zakingiye abantu kurwara bakaremba, kandi zishobora kubuza kurwara Covid igihe kirekire. Izi ncanco zakozwe mu mwanya muto cane, ubundi gukora urucanco bikunze guteba kubera ibibazo vyo kuronka uburyo. Abahinga bagize uruhara mu kugerageza incanco za Covid, hamwe n'inzego zijejwe  kuzemeza, bavuga ko ataco birengangije mu bijanye n'umutekano wazo. Hari ingaruka zishika gake cane zibonekeje hagitangura gutangwa izo ncanco ku bantu ama miriyoni, ari naco gituma abagenzura bama bariko barabikurikirana indwi ku ndwi. Biragoye kumenya ibindi Djokovic akeneye canke yifuza kumenya.  Avuga ko adafise amakuru akwiye ku "rucanco" nk'uko umenga hari rumwe gusa. Hari nyinshi.  Nk'umunonotsi,  ivyago vyo kurwara Covid ni bike. Ariko ntibingana n'ubusa. Kanatsinda amaze kuyirwara kabiri. Uruhusha rudasanzwe rwo kwemererwa kwinjira muri Australia kandi aticandagishije rwasabwe hatavuzwe uwurusavye uwari we, kandi rwemewe n'imigwi y'inzego zibiri zigenga zo muri Australia. Ariko hari n'urundi rupapuro rw'urugendo, rwagiyemwo ikosa. Djokovic aremera ko "vy'ukuri, iryo kosa ku rupapuro rwo gusaba visa ntiryakozwe ibigarankana." "Ryaremewe kandi riremezwa na sentare y'igihugu mbere n'umushikiranganji ubwiwe mu bushikiranganji bw'abinjira n'abasohoka muri Australia. "Ico abantu bashobora kuba batazi ni uko  ntirukanywe muri Australia ku mvo z'uko ntari naracandazwe, canke ko hari amategeko narenze canke ko nagize ikosa mu kwuzuza urupapuro rwo gusaba visa. Ivyo vyose vyaremejwe na sentare y'igihugu n'ubushikiranganji bw'abasohoka n'abinjira. "Igituma nirukanywe muri Australia n'uko umushikiranganji ajejwe abasohoka n'abinjira yakoresheje ububasha bwiwe mu gufuta visa yanje agendeye ku kwibaza ko nshobora guha intege abafise agatima ko kurwanya incanco mu gihugu canke mu gisagara, ivyo navyo nkaba ntavyemera na gato."

headline: Umuyabaga wa Barcelona ava Guinée-Bissau, Ansu Fati w’imyaka 16, yahawe ubwenegihugu bwa Espagne
text: Umuyabaga Ansu Fati w'imyaka 16 akinira Barcelona yahawe ubwenegihugu bwa Espanye, ikaba ari inzira yuguruwe ngo ico gihugu gishobore kumukinisha mu nkino mpuzamakungu. Uyo muyabaga w'imyaka 16 afise kandi uburenganzira bw'ugukinira igihugu ciwe c'amavukiro ca  Guinée-Bissau , ariko kandi agashobora n'ugukinira Portugal aho sekuru na inakuru basanzwe bari. Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati nibwo bwafashe ico cemezo c'ukumwemerera igisabo ciwe inyuma y'aho akwirije imyaka 10 aba muri ico gihugu nk'uko bisabwa n'amategeko. Ivyo bivuga ko Fati ashobora gukinira umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Espanye mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi c'umupira w'amaguru w'abatarenza imyaka 17 ryimirije gutangura muri Brezili ku wa 26 z'ukwezi kw'icumi uno mwaka. Ariko n'aho azokinira Espanye mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'abatarenza imyaka 17, amategeko agenga ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi FIFA avuga ko ashobora guhindura agakina mu murwi w'abakuze. Ku munsi wa kabiri w'iyi ndwi, Fati yabaye umukinyi wa mbere muto cane akiniye Barcelona mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere mu bihugu vyabo (Champions League), mu rukino rwayihuje na Borussia Dortmund rukarangira ari 0-0. Uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 16 ariko yerekana ibintu bidasanzwe mu mupira w'amaguru mu murwi wiwe Barcelona, ibitangaza abatari bake ku myaka yiwe. Mu nkino zine gusa za mbere Barcelona imaze gukina mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Espanye, La Liga, Fati amaze gutsinda ibitsindo bibiri. Yatanguye gukinira Barcelona igihe uyo murwi wahura na Real Betis, akaba yagiye kwinjira mu kibuga ku munota wa 78 asubiriye umukinyi yitwa Perez. Fati yatangujwe mu kibuga ubwa mbere igihe Barcelona yatana mu mitwe na Valencia ku wa gatandatu w'indwi iheze, aho yataye abantu mu gahundwe mu gutsinda igitsindo ca mbere ku munota wa kabiri gusa urukino rutanguye, rukaba rwagiye kurangira Barcelona inyagiye Valencia ibitsindo 5 kuri 2.

headline: Tokyo 2020: Ornella Havyarimana yipfuza guha u Burundi umudari olempike wa gatatu
text: Ornella Havyarimana ariteguye kuba umurundi wa mbere akina umukino wa Boxe agiye guserukira igihugu ciwe mu mahiganwa olempike azobera i Tokyo mu kwezi kuza. Kw'igenekerezo 25/07 Havyarimana azotangura guhiganwa n'abigeme bashika 25 bo mu bihugu 25, barimwo na Christine Ongare umunyakenya baheruka kurushanywa  mu kwezi kwa gatatu i Kinshasa. Havyarimana, yaronse ikibanza mu mahiganwa olempike ku butumire mu gihe atari yashoboye kuronka ico kibanza mu mahiganwa yo kukironka muri Africa. Umumenyereza wiwe avuga ko ico kibanza bakimenyeshejwe muri iyi ndwi "bisa n'ibitevye gatoya" ariko Ornella n'ubundi yari asanzwe abandanya imyimenyerezo. Inkuru y'uko Ornella azoja i Tokyo yaramuryoheye cane, kuko yasanze ari mu myiteguro yo kurondera ikibanza mu mahiganwa nk'aya azobera i Paris mu 2024,  ati: "Nari nagumye ku kivi, n'ubu nguma mbandanya". Ornella yabariye BBC ko guserukira Uburundi ubwa mbere muri Boxe mu mahiganwa olempike ari intango izobera abandi barundikazi akarorero keza. Ati: "Ni irya mbere ngiye muri Jeux Olympiques, kuva boxe itangura mu Burundi ntiyari bwinjire muri ayo mahiganwa ni jewe ngiye gutangura, ni umunezero ntangere." Eric Ndayishimiye arongoye ishirahamwe ry'urukino rwa Boxe mu Burundi avuga ko ari "iteka n'akanyamuneza" ko bashoboye kuronka umuntu azoserukira urwo rukino muri izo nkino. Azohiganwa n'abakomeye Kuva igenerekezo rya 23 z'ukwezi gutaha abanonotsi beza kw'isi barenga 11,000 bo mu bihugu 205 baritezwe guhiganwa i Tokyo mu nkino zishika 50 zitandukanye. Buri munonotsi ashika hariya ni uko aba afise ivyo yerekanye ko ashoboye nk'uko Eric Ndayishimiye abivuga, ariko kandi ngo arizeye ko Ornella azoseruka neza. Joseph Nkamicaniye umumenyereza wiwe avuga ko Ornella yabandanije yitegura n'aho atari yaronse 'qualifications' y'aya mahiganwa ya Tokyo. Ati: "Ntiyari yigeze ahagarika imyimenyerezo kuko no mu mezi abiri aheze yaheruka mw'ihiganwa rya Africa ryabereye i Kinshasa urumva ntiyigeze ahagarika imyimenyerezo. "Mu ndwi zisigaye turiko tumutegura kugira 'endurance, souffle na technique', twongera kandi tumuha na morale kuko abo bazohura i Tokyo bahora bahurira mu mahiganwa y'isi'. Ndayishimiye nawe avuga ko ata nkeka afise ko Ornella ashobora "kuvyitwaramwo neza i Tokyo kuko ni ibintu amenyereye". Ati: "Yaragiye mu mahiganwa y'isi muri Korea, n'i Delhi mu Buhinde, yaragiye i Thailand, yaragiye mu Burusiya, yarahiganywe no mu mahiganwa ya Africa muri Gabon na Kinshasa". Azovana umudari  w'umwakaka i Tokyo? Mu 1996, ubwa mbere Uburundi buseruka mu mahiganwa olempike i Atlanta muri Amerika, Vénuste Niyongabo yateye iteka igihugu ciwe atahukana umudari w'inzahabu mu gusiganwa 5,000m. Imyaka 20 inyuma yaho Francine Niyonsaba yabaye uwa kabiri mu gusiganwa 800m mu bigeme mu mahiganwa olempike ya Rio de Janeiro 2016, atahukana umudari w'ifeza. Ornella yiyumvira ko bishoboka ko uretse kuba uwa mbere aserutse muri boxe yonaba uwa gatatu ateye iteka Uburundi agatakana umudari wa wa olempike. Ati: "Hariya nzokora vyose bishoboka kugira ntahane umudari  kubera bariya tuzohura bose ndabazi, dusanzwe duhurira mu mahiganwa y'isi." Nkamicaniye amumenyereza avuga ko hariya haseruka abantu bakomeye ariko na Ornella "azoseruka yazikenyeye". Ati: "Nubwo usanga hatabuze intambamyi zimwe zimwe, turiko turamutegura mu buryo bwose. Turavuga ngo ntiworirimba intsinzi utarashika ku kivi, ariko umudari nawo ashobora kuwutahukana." Ndayishimiye wewe ati: "Turanezerewe cane haba twebwe muri federation canke Abarundi bose ko Ornella agiye kuduserukira, twogira Imana akazana umudari  vyotuma igihugu kigira izina ryiza gusumba."

headline: Ukraine: Kyiv ivuga ko yateye intambwe ikomeye mu gihe Russia iriko iva muri Kherson
text: Igisirikare ca Ukraine kivuga ko cateye intambwe zikomeye ku musi w’ejo mu micungararo ya Kherson, inyuma y’aho Uburusiya butangarije ko buriko burakura ingabo muri ico gisagara co mu bumanuko. Ingabo za Ukraine zivuga ko zabohoje igisagara gikomeye ca Snihurivka kiri ku birometero 50 mu buraruko bwa Kherson. Kyiv (umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine) ivuga kandi ko iriko irasatira bikomeye ku mpande zibiri hafi ya Kherson, harimwo gutera intambwe y’ibirometero indwi mu turere tumwe tumwe. Uburusiya buvuga ko bwatanguye kuva muri ico gisagara – igisagara gikomeye cane bwari bwigaruriye muri ino ntambara – ariko iki gikorwa gishobora gufata amayinga. Itangazo ryo ku wa gatatu ryabonetse nk’inzitizi zikomeye ku ntambara ya Moscou muri Ukraine, n’aho abategetsi ba Ukraine bari bagifise impungenge – bagabisha ko ayo ashobora kuba ari amayeri yo kubatega umutego. Nta cemezo cashotse kiboneka ko Uburusiya buriko burakura ingabo ku bwinshi muri Kherson. Ejo ku wa kane, umukuru w’ingabo za Ukraine, Valeriy Zaluzhny, yavuze ko adashobora kwemeza canke guhakana ivyo kuva muri Kherson – ariko akavuga ko ingabo ziwe zateye intambwe. Jenerari Zaluzhny avuga ko ingabo ziwe zateye intambwe zikomeye ku mpande zibiri ku ruhande rw’uburengero bw’uruzi Dnipro – akarere karimwo Kherson – mu kwigarurira ibibanza 12. Ejo ku wa kane nyene, yavuze ko akarere k’ibirometero indwi kabohojwe “muri uno musi uheze”, mu gihe ingabo zariko zisatira amaja ku ruhande rwo mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko hamwe no ku ruhande rw’uburengero. Amashusho ya videwo yerekana abanyagihugu bariko baramutsa abasirikare mu kibanza c’ihuriro, bigaragara ko bari bahejeje kwinjira mu gisagara ca Snihurivka. Snihurivka iri ku masanganzira y’amabarabara akomeye kandi ni igituro ca gari ya moshi c’intara ya Mykolaiv, ihana urubibe na Kherson mu buraruko no mu burengero. Ubutegetsi bw’intara ya Mykolaiv bwacishije ubutumwa ku rubuga hwaniro rwa Telegram buvuga buti “amakuru menshi meza uno musi”. Bwaciye butuma haba ibihuha vyinshi mw’ijoro ry’ejo ku wa kane vyavuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zashitse mu nkengera za Kherson. Iki cafashwe nk’ikimenyetso c’uko ingabo zishobora kuba zari zashitse mu kigwati ca Chornobayivka kiri mu micungararo ya Kherson. BBC ntivyayishobokeye guhinyuza aya makuru y’uturere twabohojwe n’utwatakaye – ariko aya makuru aje inyuma y’amayinga ingabo za Ukraine zivuga ko zari zimaze zisatira. Kherson ni wo mugwa mukuru wa mbere kandi wonyene w’intara waguye mu minwe y’Uburusiya kuva butanguye igitero kuri Ukraine ku wa 24 ruhuhuma (2). Kuva mu mpera z’ukw’icenda, yafatwa na Kremlin nk’Ubutaka bw’Uburusiya  - inyuma y’iciswe “amatora ya kamarampaka” mu turere twa Ukraine twigaruriwe n’Uburusiya, amatora yiyamirijwe cane n’amakungu. Ku wa gatatu, Moscou yavuze ko bitari bigishoboka gukorera muri ico gisagara, ikavuga ko yategerezwa kwimuka ikava mu burengero bw’uruzi Dnipro - uruzi rucamwo kubiri Ukraine. Jenerari Zaluzhny, umukuru w’igisirikare ca Ukraine, avuga ko ata kundi Uburusiya bwari kugira atari uguhunga, inyuma y’aho amayira yo gushikana uburyo asenyuriwe, uburyo bwo kurongora urugamba nabwo bukononekara. Mu masaha yitereye y’ejo ku wa kane, umushikiranganji wa Ukraine ajejwe kwivuna abansi yavuze ko bizofata n’imiburiburi indwi yose kugira ngo Uburusiya bukure ingabo zabwo zose muri Kherson kandi ko bitoroshe kumenya ivyo umwansi ategekanya. Jens Stoltenberg, umukuru w’urunani rwa gisirikare OTAN/NATO ruhurikiyemwo ibihugu vy’Uburengero, avuga ko biboneka ko Uburusiya “buri ku gitsure gikomeye” ariko ko bikenewe kuraba “ingene ibintu bigenda ku rubuga”. Umushikiranganji w'Ubwongereza wo kwivuna abansi, Ben Wallace, avuga ko Uburusiya buriko busa n’ubwubaka uruzitiro rwo kwivuna umwansi ku rundi ruhande rw’uruzi Dnipro bukoresheje ibikoresho bikomeye. Avuga kuri iyi ngingo yo gusubira inyuma, Wallace avuga ko "amakungu adategerezwa gushimira Uburusiya ko buriko burasubiza amatungo bwanyaze”. Umuhanuzi wo mu biro vya perezida wa Ukraine avuga ko hakiri kare kwigina  - akagiriza umwansi wiwe ko ariko ashaka guhindura Kherson akayigira “igisagara c’urupfu” mu gusiga ateragiye ama mine no mu gutegura kuyitera amabombe ari kure. Ibi bishobora gutuma igitigiri c’abagwa muri ino ntambara ciyongera, mu gihe imaze guhitana canke gukomerekeramwo abasirikare 100.000 kuri buri ruhande n’abasivire 40.000, nk’uko biherutse gushikirizwa mu biharuro ngereranyo  bitangwa n’intwazangabo yo mu gisirikare ca Amerika. Mu yandi makuru, Amerika yatangaje iyindi mfashanyo ya gisirikare igenewe Ukraine ifise agaciro k’imiriyoni 400 z’amadorari y’amanyamerika – harimwo ubuhinga bwa Avenger bwo gucungera ikirere hamwe n’ibisasu vya misire vyo mu bwoko bwa Hawk. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine avuga ko yavuganye kandi n’umushikiranganji wa mbere w’Ubwongereza Rishi Sunak ku vyerekeye imfashanyo bwoha Ukraine mu rwego rwo kwivuna umwansi.

headline: 'Umukuru wa Twitter Elon Musk 'ntari hejuru y’amategeko'' - Umugenzuzi wa US
text: Kimwe mu bigo vy’ubugenzuzi vya Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kivuga ko kiriko kirakurikiranira hagufi ingene ibintu biriko biragenda muri Twitter "n’impungenge nyinshi". Ni inyuma y’aho hari abakozi bo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu bajejwe amabanga hamwe no kwubahiriza amategeko bavugwa ko batanze imihoho. Umurwi w’igihugu ujejwe ubucuruzi (Federal Trade Commission,FTC) uvuga ko umukuru w'urwo rubuga mushasha Elon Musk atari  "hejuru y’amategeko ". Mu yandi makuru, Musk avugwa ko yoba yarabwiye abakozi ko n’ivyo kwugara bishoboka. Iyi kompanyi iri mu mayira abiri kuva aho Musk atanguriye kwirukana ibihumbi n’ibihumbi vy’abakozi mu ndwi iheze. Ubushobozi bwo kugura 'status' ku bakoresha uru rubuga mu gihe ari uwiyandikishije gushasha bwongereje impungenge ko Twitter ishobora kwuzura ama konte y’ibinyoma. Ejo ku wa kane, Yoel Roth, yari arongoye igisata ca Twitter kijejwe umutekano yashize umwidondoro mushasha kuri runo rubuga hwaniro amenyesha ko atakiri muri ico kibanza. Amakuru avuga ko umukuru w’igisata kijejwe amakuru y’ibanga Damien Kieran be n’umukuru w’igisata kijejwe ivyo kwubahiriza amategeko Marianne Fogarty batanze imihoho. N’uwujejwe umutekano muri iyo kompanyi Lea Kissner na we nyene yaratanze imihoho. Kubona aba bantu baragiye bishobora kwongereza ivyago vya Twitter vyo guhonyanga amabwirizwa y’ubugenzuzi. Mu kwezi kwa gatanu, iyi kompanyi yaraciwe ihadabu ry’imiriyoni 150 kubera kugurisha amakuru y’abayikoresha, bikaba vyabaye ngombwa ko yemera ko hashingwa ayandi mabwirizwa mashasha ajanye no gucungera amakuru y’ibanga. Douglas Farrar, umukuru w’igisata kijejwe imigenderanire muri FTC, avuga ati: "Turiko turakurikirana ibiherutse kuba kuri Twitter n’impungenge nyinshi”. "Nta muyobozi canke ikompanyi iri hejuru y’amategeko, kandi amakompanyi ategerezwa gukurikiza ivyo twemeranije”. Farrer avuga ko FTC ifise “ibikoresho bishasha biyiha ubushobozi bwo kugenzura ko kompanyi iriko ikurikiza ivyo yiyemeje kandi turiteguye kubikoresha”. Twitter yarishe ihadabu mu kwezi kwa gatanu inyuma yo kwagirizwa ko yari yagurishije mu buryo buteye kubiri n’amategeko amakuru y’ibanga y’abayikoresha kugira biyifashe kugurisha amatanganzo yo kwamamaza. Iruhande y’iri hadabu, yategerejwe kwemera amabwirizwa mashasha, kandi ikemera gushiraho umugambi  ukomeye wo gucungera amabanga n’umutekano vy’abayikoresha – bigenzurwa n’aba bategetsi bavugwa ko batanze imihoho. Kuva afashe mu minwe Twitter, Musk yarirukanye uwahoze ari umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa Parag Agrawal hamwe n’abandi bategetsi bo hejuru, mbere n’abajejwe ibikorwa vyo kwamamaza n’amasoko na bo nyene baragiye. Ibi vyose biza kwongereza amakenga kuba Twitter idafise abantu bakwiye bashobora gucungera nimba ibandanya igendera ku mategeko ngenderwako. Vyongeye, amwe mu makompanyi makuru makuru yamamaza yaratewe ubwoba n'inzira Musk ariko atwaramwo iyi kompanyi y’urubuga hwaniro. Twitter yinjiza amafaranga yayo hafi yose biciye mu kwamamaza, ariko amakompanyi amwe amwe yabaye arabangira kurekura amahera yayo, mu gihe acihweza impinduka Musk ariko arazana. Amakompanyi amwe amwe avugwa ko afise amakenga ko Musk azodegura mu mategeko yo kugenzura ibica ku rubuga rwiwe mbere anahindure ingingo zo kwugara imbuga z’abantu bamwe bamwe bateje ibibazo, harimwo na Donald Trump yahoze arongoye Amerika. Bivugwa ko Musk yoba yarabwiye abakozi bari mu nama ko atabona neza kazoza k’ingene ubutunzi bwiyongera muri iyo kompanyi, kandi ko atawoshira kure guhomba burundu. Twitter yarasabwe kugira ico ishikirije. Urubuga ngurukanabumenyi The Verge ari na rwo rwasohoye ijambo ryose Musk yashikirije abakozi, ruvuga ko Twitter itagifise igisata c’ukumenyesha amakuru.

headline: Ubumwe bwa Afrika - AU - bwahagaritse igihugu ca Guinea kubera kudeta
text: Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Afrika, canke AU, ryahagaritse mu banyamuryago igihugu ca Guinea nyuma y'itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi nk'uko bigaragara mu butumwa bwa twitter. Prezida Alpha Condé yatembagajwe n'umugwi w'abasirikare bayobowe na Col Mamady Doumbouya ku munsi wa Mungu uheruka. Iyo kudeta yariyamirijwe n'abarongozi b'akarere co kimwe n'ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Afrika, umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU hamwe na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Ishirahamwe ry'akarere Ecowas ryahagaritse Guinea kuwa gatatu nayo abashikiranganji bajejwe imigenderare bo mu karere k'uburengero bwa Afrika bakaba barashitse i Conakry ngo baganire n'abatembagaje ubutegetsi. Abariko abarongozi ba gisirikare bakirijwe impundu n'isinzi ry'abantu mu mabarabara ku murwa mukuru Conakry. Benshi bavuga yuko bari baraseserejwe na Prezida Condé, yari mu kiringo kigira gatatu c'ubutegetsi, bakidogera kandi igiturire, ubutunzi bwifashe nabi hamwe n'intwaro mbi.

headline: Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Israel yarengukishijwe mu butungane
text: Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Israyeli, Benjamin Netanyahu, agiye kuburanywa muri sentare, ibitari bwigere bibaho ku mutegetsi nk'uyu asanzwe akiri mu mabanga. Bwana Netanyahu yagirizwa igiturire, magendo hamwe no guhemuka. Ashitse muri sentare i Yerusalemu, uyo mutegetsi w'imyaka 70 yongeye guhakana ivyo yagirizwa,  avuga ko abamurwanya barondera "kumubogoza mu buryo bwose bushoboka". Ivyo bibaye inyuma y'indwi imwe gusa asubiye kwimikwa ngo arongore leta y'ubumwe igiyeho bigoranye. Uwo bahanganye, Benny Gantz, yaremeye gusangira ubutegetsi nawe inyuma y'amatora atatu mu mwaka umwe gusa yahera ataco ashitseko. Bwana Netanyahu ariyamiriza ivyo asabwa n'abo batavuga rumwe bashaka ko atanga imihoho mu gihe akiriko araburana. Bwana Netanyahu afise imanza zitatu zizwi nka 1000, 2000, na 4000. Urubanza 1000- magendo no guhemuka :  yagirizwa ko yahawe igipfukamunwa  n'umurwizatunga akomeye kugira ngo nawe amworohereze. Urubanza 2000 - yagirizwa magendo no guhemuka : yagirizwa ko yemeye gufasha mw'igurishwa ry'ikinyamakuru ca Israyeli, Yediot Ahronot, maze naco kikamwamamaza Urubanza 4000 - igiturire, magendo no guhemuka : Igihe yari umushikiranganji wa mbere hanyuma n'umushikiranganji wo guhanahana amakuru, bwana Netanyahu yagirizwa gushinga amategeko yorohereza uwutwara ikompanyi Bezeq yo gutumatumanako, Shaul Elovitch, maze nawe akaronka akaryo ko kwamamazwa mu kinyamakuru ngurukanabumenyi Walla ca bwana Elovitch. Bwana Netanyahu arajhakana yivuye inyuma ivyo yagirizwa, akavuga ko ariko "atotezwa" n'abo batavuga rumwe muri politike, aba arahira akarengwa ko ategerezwa gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo izina ryiwe ntiricafuzwe. Ntivyari bwigere bibaho muri ico gihugu aho umushikiranganji wa mbere akiri mu mabanga arengutswe imbere y'ubutungane. Uwuheruka kurengutswa Ehud Olmert, yabanje gutanga imihoho ku burongozi bw'umugambwe mu gihe yariko akorwako amatohoza ajanye n'ukurya igiturire mu 2008, n'aho asa n'uwagumanye amabanga yiwe gushika habaye amatora mu mwaka wakurikiye - amatora yatumye Benjamin Netanyahu ashika kubutegetsi. Itegeko rya Israyeli rivuga ko umushikiranganji wa mbere akurikiranwa ku vyaha asabwa gutanga imihoho. Abanyagihugu ba Israyeli ntibavuga rumwe ku bijanye n'uko yobandanya ari umushikiranganji wa mbere canke ko akwiye gutanga imihoho. Abamunegura bavuga ko ibiriko biramubako vyo gukurikiranwa n'ubutungane bidashobora kubangikanwa n'amabanga yiwe, mu gihe abamushigikiye bobo - harimwo n'umugambwe wiwe - bavuga ko yatowe n'abanyagihugu, rero ko adashobora guhatwa gutanga imihoho.

headline: Russia: habonetse abantu ba mbere banduye umugera H5N8 w’akamangu k’inkoko
text: Uburusiya bumenyesha ko abantu ba mbere banduye umugera wa H5N8 utera indwara y'akamangu (ibicurane) k'inkoko. Abategetsi bavuga ko abantu indwi bakora mw'iyororero ry'inkoko riri mu bumanuko bw'ico gihugu banduye uwu mugera wadutse mu kwa cumi na kabiri kw'umwaka uheze. "Aba bantu bose indwi …bameze neza", ibi bikavugwa n'umuganga akaba n'umuhanuzi mu vyo amagara y'abantu mu Burusiya, Anna Popova. Avuga ko haciye hafatwa ingingo zikenewe kugira ngo ntihagire abandi bantu bandura. Umupfasoni Popova avuga ko ata kintu na kimwe cerekana ko iyo ndwara yashobora kwinjira mu bantu, akavuga ko bamaze kubimenyesha mw'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO. Arashimira laboratoire Vektor yo muri ico gihugu yashoboye gutora uwo mugera muri abo bakozi. Popova ati: "Kubona uwu mugera watowe hakiri kare utarashobora kugira ububasha bwo kuva mu muntu uja mu wundi, biduha, twese kw'isi yose, akaryo ko kwitegura neza kugira ngo dushobore guhangana nawo". Avuga ko abahinga b'Uburusiya ubu baca batangura kwiga ingene bashobora gupima abantu. Hari ubundi bwoko bw'ibicurane vy'inkoko bwandukira abantu rimwe na rimwe mbere abapfa bagapfa - ariko ubu nibwo bwa mbere uwu mugera wa H5N8 wasimvye ukinjira mu kiremwa muntu.

headline: Burundi: CNL ivuga ko integuro y'amatora irangwamwo utunenge
text: Umugambwe utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi CNL uridogera umurwi ujejwe amatora mu Burundi CENI ko ataco uriko urakora kugira ngo utunenge tubandanya twibonekeza mu nteguro y'amatora ategekanijwe ku wa 20/05/2010. Mw'itangazo wasohoye ejo ku wa gatandatu,  uwo mugambwe umenyesha ko amategeko agenga amatora ariko arahonyangwa, kandi ko CENI ataco ishaka kubivugako. Haciye indwi abashaka kwitoza mu bibanza bitandukanye vy'igihugu batanguye kwiyamamaza, hakaba kandi haciye iminsi ine igikorwa co gutanga amakarata y'itora gitanguye, aho abanwanyi b'uwo mugambwe berekana imyidogo ko batariko baroroherezwa. Umurwi CENI ntaco urashobora kubwira BBC, ariko umukuru wayo aherutse gusaba abari muri ivyo bikorwa gukurikiza no kwisunga itegeko rigenga amatora n'amakoraniro mu bikorwa vy'imyiyamamazo barimwo. Mw'iryo tangazo ry'umugambwe CNL, uwo mugambwe uvuga ko hari ibibazo bitari bike bigenda vyibonekeza mu bice bitandukanye, bakanagiriza mbere abaserukira CENI mu ntara no mu makomine ko babirenzako uruho rw'amazi. Tumwe mu tunenge CNL yerekana, iravuga ko amakarata ariko atangwa ata ntonde z'abatorera ku biro vy'amatora runaka zatangajwe, kugira ngo abazahatorera bamenyekane. CNL kandi uvuga ko hari abatorera amakarata abandi batarinze no kwerekana ibibaranga, ivyo navyo ngo bigashobora gutuma haba abanyururizwa amakarata yabo. Ivyo ngo bigatuma bamwe babwirwa ko amakarata yabo ataboneka mu gihe bari bariyandikishije, mbere no mu matora y'ibwirizwashingiro rya 2018 baranatoye. CNL inagiriza CENI ko mu gushiraho umurwi ujejwe amatora mu ntara, CEPI, be no mu makomine, CECI , batakurikije ukunganisha hagati y'abanyamigambwe nk'uko amategeko abivuga. CNL ivuga ko abanywanyi bayo mu ntara zitari nke z'igihugu bahohoterwa kandi bakanaburagizwa n'abanywanyi hamwe n'abategetsi bakomoka mu mugambwe uri kubutegetsi  mu bikorwa vyabo vyo kwiyamamaza. Térence Manirambona avugira uwo mugambwe akaba ari we yasohoye iryo tangazo, atanga akarorero ka buramatari w'intara ya Kayanza asanzwe kandi azokwitoza nk'umushingamateka w'umugambwe CNDD-FDD akamwagiriza ko "abandanya akora ibikorwa bigenewe CEPI mu kuburagiza aba CNL", aho avuga ko nko ku wa 30/04 yirukanye abanywanyi ba CNL gukorera mu kibanza bari bahawe. BBC yashatse kumenya ico umurwi CENI uvuga ko kuri ivyo vyagiriji vyose bishikirizwa n'umugambwe CNL ariko abawurongoye bakaba ataco bashimye kuyimenyesha. Hagati aho, umuvugizi w'uwo murwi, Philippe Nzobonariba, yabwiye iradiyo y'igihugu, RTNB, ko ibibazo bijanye n'utugorane twibonekeza mw'itangwa ry'amakarata bamaze kutwumva, agasaba ko hagize uwubura ikarata yoca abimenyesha CECI hanyuma nayo ice imenyesha CEPI, iyi nayo imenyeshe CENI kugira ngo barabe ko mu mamashini yabo iyo karata atayiriyo. Nayo ku kibazo c'uko hari abatora amakarata y'abandi baba batanabatumye, Bwana Nzobonariba amenyesha ko ivyo bamaze no kuvyibonera, akibutsa ko "umuntu kugira ngo atorere uwundi aba yamuhaye uburenganzira bwo kumutorera". Ati: "Rero hari aho twamaze kubona, aho usanga hari nk'uwuza akavuga ngo naka yantumye atacemeza ko yamutumye, uyo ntushobora kumuha ikarata yiwe". Yanavuze ko n'abari hanze nabo nyene bashobora kurungikira urwandiko ruteyeko  umukono uwo bipfuza ko bobatorera. Ati: "Andika 'procuration', utereko umukono, hanyuma urungikire uyo muntu azogutorera, aheze agutorere". Mu gihe hari bamwe bafise amakenga ko ku munsi w'amatora hashobora kuba abantu batorera abandi benshi, Bwana Nzobonariba yibutsa ko umuntu afise uburenganzira bwo gutorera umuntu umwe rudende.

headline: Russia nta birwanisho ruhonyanganda buzokoresha muri Ukraine, bivugwa n'umuserukizi bwabwo muri UK
text: Umuserukizi w'Uburusiya mu Bwongereza yabwiye BBC ko atibaza ko igihugu ciwe kizohava gikoresha ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda mu ntambara na Ukraine. Andrei Kelin avuga ko amategeko ya gisirikare y'Uburusiya atemera ko ibirwanisho nk'ibi  bikoreshwa mu ntambara nk'iyi ya Ukraine. Avuga ko Uburusiya bufise amategeko akaze cane ajanye n'ikoreshwa ry'ibi birwanisho, cane cane mu gihe ukubaho kw'igihugu kugeramiwe. Yabwiye ikiganiro Sunday Morning ati: "Ntaco bisa bisana n'igikorwa kibandanya". Igihe Vladimir Putin ahamagarira igisirikare kumera magabo zigategura ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda mu mpera z'ukwa kabiri, haciye imisi mike igitero gitanguye, isi yose yafashe ko yari agabishije ko yashobora kubikoresha. Perezida Putin avuga ko ivyo yavuze vyavuye ku gasomborotso k'ibihugu vyo mu Burengero hamwe n'ishirahamwe OTAN ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe rihurikiyemwo ivyo bihugu. Ariko umushikiranganji w'Ubwongereza ajejwe kwivuna abansi Ben Wallace yavuze ko uko kwari ugushaka kuzimagiza abantu ku "biriko biragenda nabi muri Ukraine". Yavuga ko igitero c'Uburusiya kitariko kiragenda uko categuwe, kandi ko Putin yashaka no  "kwibutsa amakungu" ko Uburusiya bufise ibikoresho vyo kuzibira aboshaka kubutera. Muri ico kiganiro yagiranye na  Clive Myrie wa BBC rimwe na rimwe akaza arishura ibidahuye, uyu aserukira Uburusiya yahakanye amakuru avuga ko ingabo z'Uburusiya ziriko ziratera amabombe abasivire kandi ko ivyaha vy'intambara bwagirizwa mu gisagara ca Bucha ari "irementanya". Abajijwe ati "Kubera iki Uburusiya buriko bukora iyi ntambara nk'uku, bukora ivyaha vyo mu ntambara?",  Kelin yishuye ati: "Umukuru w'igisagara ca Bucha mw'itangazo ryiwe aremeza ko ingabo z'Uburusiya yagiye, vyose bimeze neza kandi haratekanye, igisagara kiri mu buzima busanzwe. "Nta na kimwe kiriko kiraba, nta biziga biri ku mabarabara. Ariko hanyuma, vyose bimaze gukorwa - ariko..." Ariko rero Myrie yahavuye amusatira : "None nyakwubahwa, ibi vyose ni irementanya? Vyose ni irementanya gusa? Ibi vyemezo vyose ni irementanya?" Uyu muserukizi yaciye yishura ati: "Twebwe tubona ko ari irementanya. Rikoreshwa mu gutoba ibiganiro". Uburusiya bwarigeze kuvuga ibi imbere y'aha, aho umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire Sergei Lavrov yavuze ko amashusho y'ibiziga i Bucha vyari "irementanya" , igihe ingabo z'Uburusiya ziviriyeyo. Aya majambo yarabeshujwe n'abatari bake bavyiboneye babwiye BBC ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zabiciye ababo. Avuga ku mukwe wiwe, umugabo umwe yavuze ati: "Yari umugabo w'umunyamahoro, se rugo, yari abeshejweho n'ugusudira, yari afise ingorane z'uruti rw'umugongo kandi yari yaramugaye ubuzima bwiwe bwose". Amasanamu y'ibigendajuru nayo nyene asa n'ayabeshuza ibivugwa na Moscou, akerekana ibiziga birambaraye mw'ibarabara hasigaye indwi zibiri ngo Abarusiya bave muri ico gisagara.

headline: Tanzania: Imvo n'Imvano kw'iragi rya Prezida John Magufuli
text: Ndabaramukije nongera ndabaha n'ikaze muri iki kiganiro c'Imvo n'Imvano co kuri uyu wa gatandatu igenekerezo rya 27 ukwezi kwa gatatu mu 2021. Iki kiganiro cerekeye urupfu rwa Prezida John Pombe Magufuli wa Tanzania aherutse kwitaba Imana mu mpera z'indwi iheze, kikaba kibaye inyuma y'umusi umwe ashinguwe ku mavuko yiwe mu karere ka Chato mu ntara ya Geita. John Pombe Magufuli, umuhungu yavutse ku murimyi-mworozi mu nyuma agatorerwa kuba Prezida wa Tanzania mu mwaka wa 2015, yitavye Imana afise imyaka 61. Reta yaciye isohora itangazo ivuga ko azize ingwara y'umutima. Imbere yo kuba Prezida, Magufuli yari yataziriwe izina rya 'Tingatinga' - mwene vya bimodoka bikora amabarabara - kubera ibikorwa vyiwe vyo kwubaka amabarabara igihe yari umushikiranganji w'ibikorwa vya reta. Azwi cane kandi mu bikorwa vyo kugwanya igiturire n'isesagurwa ry'itunga ry'igihugu. Ibikorwa vyiwe vyari bigamije gutanga umwimbu uboneka, vyabonetse nk'akarorero gashobora gukurikizwa no mu bindi bihugu vya Afrika nk'umuti uyu mugabane ukeneye mu guhangana n'ikibazo c'intwaro ibereye. Muri bimwe mu bikorwa yakoze, harimwo kwugarura amahera yahembwa abakozi batabaho, kwirukana abakozi barya ibiturire canke badatanga umwimbu ushimishije ku mugaragaro rimwe na rimwe ku mboneshakure, anafuta imisi mikuru harimwo uwo kwikukira, ahubwo asaba ko haba umusi wo gukora ibikorwa rusangi. Magufuli kandi yarahagaritse ingendo zose z'abategetsi baja mu bindi bihugu, kandi na we ntiyakunda kugira ingendo mu makungu. Mu kiringo ca mbere c'ubutegetsi bwiwe, izo ngingo yagiye arafata zatumye akundwa cane. John Pombe Joseph Magufuli yarakunzwe cane kubera ingene atarya umunwa, ariko mu gihe ciwe ca nyuma hari abamunegura na cane cane ku vyerekeye ikiza ca coronavirus. Aha yigeze kuvuga ko ico kiza caranduranywe n'imizi muri Tanzania, ahandi agahimiriza abantu gukoresha imiti kavukire. Igihe yitoreza kuba umukuru w'igihugu mu kiringo ca kabiri mu 2020, abo batavuga rumwe bamwagirije kwiba amajwi kandi ko yaguma abatera ubwoba. Nka Prezida, yaragirijwe guturubika abatavuga rumwe na reta no kubangamira uburenganzira bwo gushikiriza ivyiyumviro n'itangazamakuru. Ubutegetsi bwa Magufuli bwarahagaritse ibinyamakuru bimwe bimwe. Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu riharanira agateka ka zina muntu Amnesty International ryavuze ko abanyamakuru batewe ubwoba. Mu 2017, umushingamateka Tundu Lissu, yaje guhangana na Prezida Magufuli mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu yo mu 2020, yararashwe ari imbere y'umuhana wiwe, arakomereka bikomeye. Lissu yagirije reta ko ari yo yagerageje kumwica kuko yavuga ko ari reta y'umukazo. Reta ariko yarabihakanye. Ariko n'abo batavuga rumwe hari bimwe bashimira Prezida John Pombe Magufuli, nk'uruhara yagize mw'iterambere rya Tanzania mu gushira imitahe mu migambi myinshi nko mu mabarabara y'indarayi azohuza ico gihugu n'ibihugu bibanyi, kwagura amabarabara hamwe n'inzira z'imodoka zunguruza abantu zihuta mu gisagara ca Dar es Salaam. Yongereje kandi umuyagankuba yongera agarukana kompanyi y'indege Air Tanzania. None vy'ukuri Prezida Magufuli asize irihe ragi? Kugira tuganire kuri ibi vyose, ku murongo wa telephone turi kumwe na Baraka Marembo ari mu gisagara ca Tabora ashigikiye ivyiyumviro vy'abakebura reta ya Tanzania. Turi kumwe kandi na Alfred Bishundu  ashigikiye umugambwe uri ku butebetsi wa CCM ari mu gisagara ca Kahama mu ntara ya Shinyanga. Iki kiganiro mwagiteguriwe kandi murakigezwaho na Cyriaque Muhawenayo ari muri studios za BBC i Nairobi muri Kenya.

headline: Abasirikare ba Mali bishwe inyuma y'aho France itangarije ko igomba itahukane ingabo zayo
text: Igisirikare ca Mali kivuga ko abasirikare baco umunani bishwe abandi batanu nabo baburwa irengero mu gitero cakozwe n'inyeshamba mu ntara ya Archam iri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bw'ico gihugu. Iki gitero kibaye inyuma y'imisi mike Ubufaransa n'incuti zabwo bitangaje ko bigiye gukura ingabo zavyo muri Mali. Itangazo ryasohowe n'igisirikare rivuga ko mu kwihora kuri iki gitero, igisirikare ca Mali kirwanira mu kirere naco cishwe inyeshamba 57. Rivuga ko aba basirikare bishwe bariko barahiga aho inyeshamba zinyegeje igihe baraswa "n'abantu bitwaje ibirwanisho batamenyekanye". Hari amakenga mu karere no mu makungu ku bijanye n'umutekano wa Mali inyuma yo kwirukana ingabo z'Ubufaransa, hamwe n'umuzo w'abacangero b'Abarusiya mu karere. Muri ino ndwi yonyene, abanyagihugu babwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP ko abasivire 40 bishwe muri iyo ntara nyene ya Archam isanzwe ari ikiririmbiro ry'imirwi yiyitirira idini rya Islam ariko itavuga rumwe, harimwo na Etat Islamique/Islamic (IS). Mali imaze imyaka itari mike ihanganye n'izi nyeshamba, ivyatumye mu 2020 haduka imyiyerekano ikomeye yo kwiyamiriza uwari umukuru w'iki gihugu Ibrahim Boubacar Keïta yahavuye akurwa ku butegetsi n'abasirikare bijeje abanyagihugu ko bazogarukana mutekano. Kuva ico gihe abategetsi bashasha ba gisirikare ntibumvikana n'Ubufaransa bwahoze butwara Mali mu gihe c'ubukoloni, vyatumye mbere bafata ingingo yo kudategura amatora muri uno mwaka nk'uko vyari mu masezerano, banirukana n'uwuserukira Ubufaransa igihe yankiye iyi ngingo. Ibi vyahavuye bituma Mali itegeka Ubufaransa kuvana ingabo zabwo mu gihugu, inyuma y'imyaka cumi zari zimaze zitana mu mitwe n'izi nyeshamba. Bashigikiwe n'izindi ngabo zo mu bihugu vyo mu Burengero mu butumwa bwa gisirikare muri Mali - buzwi nka Takuba Task Force - zizokwimukira hirya gato, mu gihugu ca Niger. Ku wa gatanu, umukuru w'igihugu ca Niger yavuze ko umutekano ku mbibe z'igihugu ciwe uzohungabana gusumba inyuma yo gukura ingabo z'Ubufaransa n'iz'ibihugu bifatanije nabwo muri Mali. Mu ntango z'ino ndwi we n'abandi bakuru b'ibihugu vyo muri Afrika y'Uburengero barabonanye n'umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubufaransa Emmanuel Macron imbere y'uko Ubufaransa butangaza ikurwa ry'ingabo zabwo muri Mali, bakaba bemeranije ko ahubwo zimurirwa mu bindi bihugu vyo muri ako karere.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru i Bulaya 18.07.2019: Pogba, Koscielny, Zaha, Maguire, Sane
text: Real Madrid itegura gutanguza urugamba yise ''Operation 200'' aho bashaka kugurisha abakinyi Gareth Bale w'imyaka 30 na James Rodriguez w'imyaka 28, kugira ngo bashobore kuronka amahera akenewe y'ukugurua umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United, Paul Pogba. (Marca, via Sun) Neymar yugururiye imiryango Manchester United  mu gihe uyo mukinyi wa Brezili yipfuza cane kuva mu murwi Paris Saint-Germain. (Mundo Deportivo, via Sun) Barcelona iriko yihweza uburyo bushoboka bwo gusubira kugarukana Neymar, bumwe muri bwo bukaba ari kumuzana nk'intizo muri rino ci, ariko bagashobora kumugura mu kiringo c'umwaka. (Sport, via Express) Umumenyereza wa Chelsea, Frank Lampard, ategerezwa gufata ingingo nimba yokwongera gusinya amasezerano n'umukinyi Willian. Uyo munya Brezili w'imyaka 30 asigaje ikiringo c'umwaka umwe gusa ngo amasezerano yiwe na Chelsea arangire, Barcelona ikaba yipfuza kumugura ku miliyoni 30 z'amapawundi. (Express) Umumenyereza mukuru wa Newcastle, Steve Bruce, ashobora guhabwa imiliyoni 90 z'amapawundi kugira ngo agure abakinyi muri iki kiringo. (Sky Sports) Hoffenheim yemeje ko umusatirizi Joelinton w'imyaka 22, ari mu "biganiro bikomeye" n'umurwi wo muri Premier League - Newcastle United ikaba ifise icizere ko ishobora kugura uyo musatirizi w'umunya Brezili ku giciro kitari bwigere kibaho muri uwo murwi. (Chronicle Live) Umumenyereza wa Leicester City, Brendan Rodgers, yagabishije Manchester United ko ifise ikiringo ntarengwa nimba yipfuza kugura umukinyi w'inyuma Harry Maguire w'imyaka 26. (Star) Rodgers arashima ubuhinga bwa Maguire, akavuga ko "atekanye" ku bijanye n'icipfuzo ca Manchester United co kugura uyo mukinyi w'inyuma. (Independent) Liverpool nta mugambi ifise w'ukugurisha umunyegori Simon Mignolet w'imyaka 31, kandi nta n'umugambi ifise wo gutiza uyo mukinyi imbere y'uko ikiringo c'ukugura n'ukugurisha abakinyi kirangira. (Liverpool Echo) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Arsenal, Laurent Koscielny w'imyaka 33 yiteze ibiganiro bitoroshe kandi n'umushahara wiwe ushobora kugabanywa inyuma y'aho yankiye kujana n'abandi bakinyi mu mikino y'ukwitegurira ihiganwa ryimirije. (L'Equipe) Manchester United  yahambije iyindi mirwi iriko irondera kugura umukinyi wo hagati w'umurwi wa Roma, Nicolo Zaniolo, w'imyaka 20. (Mirror) Umusatirizi Romelu Lukaku, 26, aripfuza kuva mu murwi wiwe wa Manchester United akaja gukinira  Inter Milan wo mu Butaliyano. (Times) Amasezerano hagati ya Tottenham n'umusatirizi wa Espanye, Fernando Llorente, yaraheze, ubu akaba ariko yihweza nimba yokwimukira mu murwi wa Fiorentina wo mu Butaliyano imurondera. (Mail) Unai Emery arashimangira ko Arsenal iriko ikora ivyo ishoboye vyose kugira igure abakinyi ''batatu canke bane" imbere y'uko ihiganwa ryimirije ritangura. (Independent) Umukinyi wo hagati Granit Xhaka ari mu kibanza ciza c'ugusubirira Koscielny nka kizigenza wa Arsenal. (Telegraph) Amakuru yuko Arsenal iriko irondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Celtic, umunya Ecosse Kieran Tierney, ari mu bivugwa cane muri kino gihe, ariko uwo murwi ukaba ushobora guhangana n'abakeba barondera uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 22. (Scotsman) Arsenal iragabishwa ko "ata n'uko yegereje" igiciro gisabwa n'umurwi Crystal Palace ku musatirizi Wilfred Zaha w'imyaka 26.  (Mirror) Pep Guardiola yugururiye imiryango umukinyi Leroy Sane w'imyaka 23 ari ku giciro c'imiliyoni 100 z'amapawundi, amubwira ko ashobora kwigira mu gihe yoba yumva bitamushimisha kuguma muri Manchester City. (Mirror) Burnley irashaka kugurisha umunyegori wayo Umwongereza Tom Heaton w'imyaka 33 ku miliyoni 12 z'amapawungi. (Birmingham Mail) Hari amakuru ariko akwiragizwa ko Ashley Cole ashobora kuba umwe mu bamenyereza b'umurwi Chelsea, inyuma y'aho yerekaniye ifoto yiwe ari ku kibuga c'indege aho yatera aja mu gihugu c'Ubuyapani iyo uwo murwi usanzwe uri mu myimenyerezo. (Mirror)

headline: 338 barishwe muri Ethiopia mu ndyane z'amoko kuno kwezi
text: Leta ya Ethiopia ivuga yuko abantu amajana atatu na mirongo itatu n'umunani bishwe mu ntango za kuno kwezi. Ni bwo bwicanyi bwa mbere bubi bushingiye ku moko butaheruka muri ico gihugu mu kiringo c'imyaka myinshi. Vyari vyavuzwe mbere yuko abantu bashika n'imiburiburi amajana abiri na mirongo itanu, bagizwe ahanini n'abo mu bwoko bw'aba-Amhara, biciwe mu gitero mu ntara ya Oromia. Umuvugizi wo mu biro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere yavuze yuko igipolisi kikiriko kirakora amatohoza. Leta yanse ivyasabwe - na ONU irimwo mu babisaba - vy'uko hakorwa itohoza ryigenga kuri ubwo bwicanyi. Umugwi witwaje ibirwanisho uzwi nka Oromia Liberation Army waragirijwe kugaba ico gitero ariko warabihakanye. Mu myaka ibiri iheze, iyindi ntara ya Tigrinya nayo yarabayemwo imirwano ikomeye hagati y'abarwanyi b'umuhari TPLF wo muri ako karere n'abasirikare ba leta. Naho ubu hasa n'ahari agahengwe, umutekano nturahagaruka neza kandi iyo mirwano yasizemwo ubuzima ibihumbi vy'abantu abandi benshi barahunga.

headline: Maroc iri mu bihugu vya mbere bishora cannabis i Buraya
text: Maroc iri mu bihugu vya mbere bishora cannabis i Buraya naho ico kiyovyabwenge kitemwe n'amategeko muri ico gihugu

headline: Coronavirus: Ibintu bitanu ukwiye kumenya
text: Hari ibintu vyinshi bigenda bivugwa kuri coronavirus mu Bwongereza. Reka rero turabe ukuri kuri vyo. Mu bihugu bimwe bimwe nk'u Bwongereza, ushobora kubona abantu batari bake batanguye kutwambara, ariko nta kintu kinini cerekana ko koko dukora ico twagenewe. Ivyo ni ukubera usanga tutagumye, kandi ntidupfuke amaso, mu gihe kandi udashobora kutwambara umwanya muremure. Utwo dutambara dukeneye kwama duhindurwa (kubera kubira icuya), kugira ngo koko tugire akamaro. Kugira ngo wikingire, ni nkenerwa ko : Ntute umwanya ngo: Muri ivyo vyose nta na kimwe gifasha kuzibira uwo mugera. Nta kintu na kimwe cerekana ko imbwa canke akayabu  gashobora kwandura uwo mugera. Hagati aho, ivyo ntibivuga ko utokwama ukaraba n'isabuni mu gihe wabikorakoye. Uwo mugera mushasha wa coronavirus uzwi ko wavuye mw'isoko rigurisha ibitungwa i Wuhan, mu Bushinwa - arico gituma uvugwa ko wavuye mu bikoko. Uwo mugera ushobora kuba utashotse uboneka mu bikoko imbere y'uko usimba ukandukira abantu, kandi ni ko n'iyindi migera itangura, nk'akarorero ibicurane, Ebola, SARS. Ariko ivyo ntibivuga ko ibikoko muri rusangi biteye ubwoba canke ko ari vyo bikwiragiza uwo mugera. Abantu nka bose batangura kwerekana ibimenyetso bisanzwe (inkorora, ubushuhe) kandi barakira. Hagati aho, uwo mugera urashobora gutuma abantu bamwe bamwe basinzikara (bagafatwa n'imisonga, canke bakagira ingorane zo guhema), ariko abahitanwa nawo usanga ari bake (kubera bagize ingorane zikomeye z'amahaha) mu Bushinwa. Ntiwibagire kandi ko hari indwara y'ibicurane igihe cose mu rushana (mu gihe c'imvura), kandi vyica abantu - mu Bwongereza, abantu bashika 600 bama bahitanwa n'ibicurane buri mwaka. Nko mu Bwongereza, kubera ingingo nyinshi zafashwe, hari igihamana kibi co gufatwa n'ibicurane gusumba coronavirus. Hanyuma kandi, ingingo yo gushira ukwabo abantu bose bavuye i Wuhan ituma uwo mugera utagira ingaruka mbi. Igisabwa ubu muri ico gihugu, ni uko abantu bokwicandagisha ibicurane muri kino gihe. Video : uko uwu mugera urwanywa nk'umwansi rutura w'Ubushinwa: Nta muti canke urucanco ruriho gushika ubu. Hari ho uburyo bwo kuyivura ariko abantu benshi barakira uko nyene atabwo barinze gukoresha. Hari abahinga bariko bita ku rutare kugira barondere urucanco, ariko ruzotegerezwa kubanza kugeragezwa, vyumvikana ko rushobora gufata igihe kirekire imbere y'uko rutangura gukoreshwa. Hari abantu bafise ibibazo vy'amagara, cane cane nk'abarwaye asima, indwara z'imitima, kanseri hamwe n'igisukari, bashobora kumererwa nabi gusumba. N'aho umuntu uwo ari we wese ashobora kuwandura - mbere ikaba igenda yiyongera umunsi ku munsi mu Bushinwa - ariko ni abantu bake cane bicwa n'uwo mugera. Nta mvo n'imwe yotuma uheba gufata imfungurwa usanzwe umenyereye canke uheba kugura imfungurwa canke inzoga zo mu Bushinwa. Eka ntunatinye no kwakira umuzigo canke amakete avuye mu Bushinwa. Uwo mugera nta mahirwe ufise wo kumara umwanya muremure kuri ivyo bintu, co kimwe n'ibindi nk'ibikombe n'ibindi. Kugira ngo wandure, ni uko uba wegeranye n'umurwayi - nko ku metero zibiri mu minota 15 canke irenga. Ibihugu bitari bike vyashize mu kibanza cabo abantu bavuye mu gisagara ca Wuhan no mu ntara ya Hubei mu ntumbero yo kubakurikirana.

headline: Argentine: Inama nkenguzamateka yemeje gukorora inda mu ngingo y'akataraboneka
text: Inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka za Argentine zemeje itegeko rirekura gukorora inda ifise  gushika ku mayinga 14 , ingingo yanditse y'akataraboneka muri ako karere gafise amwe mu mategeko agumye cane kw'isi  mu bijanye no kurangiza ubuzima . Abashingamateka batoye  iryo tegeko inyuma y'impari ndende ku majwi 38 y'abarishigikiye, 29 y'abaryanse n'umwe ata co yarivuzeko. Gushika ubu gukorora inda vyari vyemewe gusa iyo habaye gusambanywa ku nguvu canke ubuzima bw'umuvyeyi bugeramiwe. Iryo tegeko ryari ryemejwe n'inama nshingamateka mu misi iheze. Ekleziya Katolika, isanganywe ijambo rikomeye muri America y'Epfo, yari yiyamirije  iyo ngingo, isaba abakenguzamateka kudatora ingingo yari ishigikiwe na prezida Alberto Fernández. Abaharanira gukorora imbanyi bizigiye ko iyemezwa ry'iryo tegeko muri Argentine - igihugu kibamwo abantu benshi kurusha ibindi kandi c'igihagararo gikomeye muri America y'Epfo-bizotuma ibindi bihugu bigira gutyo. Isinzi ry'abaharanira  haba kwanka canke gushigikira gukorora inda bari bakoraniye imbere y'inama nshingamategeko ku mugwa mukuru Buenos Aires, bakurikira impari  ku ma television manini manini cane. Aho itegeko riruhiye rikemezwa mu masaha ya kare yo kuri uyu wa gatatu, habaye akanyamuneza kenshi mu ruhande rw'abari barishigikiye. Mu gihe Ekleziya Katolika ikomeye cane muri ico gihugu yari yarwanije cane integuro y'iryo tegeko, umuhari w'abagore ukomeye cane ''green wave'' ni wo wagiye imbere mu kurwanira ko ibintu bihinduka. Uwo muhari w'abagore basanzwe wagiye urakomera muri iyi myaka iheze utumye hahinduka itegeko ryariho kuva mu 1921. Ibibaye muri Argentine bishobora gutuma Brezil na Chilli na vyo bisubiramwo amategeko yavyo kugira vyongere  abagore uburenganzira bujanye no kurondoka. Inyuma y'iryo tora, prezida  Fernández yanditse kuri twitter ati :"Uyu munsi tubaye igihugu ciza gusumba, congera abagore uburenganzira kikanaduha uburenganzira  ku magara meza'' Abarwanya gukorora inda, bakurikiye impari mu nama shingamateka ariko batandukanijwe n'ababishigikiye, bacitse intege. Ku bwa  Inés Blas umukenguzamateka yatoye kwanka iryo tegeko  ''Gukorora inda n'akaga. Bihagarika giturumbuka ubundi buzima bwariko buratera imbere''. Ariko umushikiranganji wa Argentine ajejwe abagore, Elizabeth Gómez Alcorta yavuze ati ''twubatse amateka'' kandi benshi mu bashigikiye guhitamwo bavuze ko bizeye ko bizobera ikimenyetso abandi  bashingamateka mu bihugu vya America y'Epfo.

headline: Rwanda-Paralympics: Ikipe ya sitting volley ball y'abagore yitwaye gute i Tokyo?
text: Ikipe ya sitting volley ball y'abagore yitwaye gute i Tokyo? Kapiteni wayo Liliane Mukobwankawe yavuganye na Jacques Niyitegeka

headline: Zinedine Zidane avuye muri Real Madrid ubugira kabiri nk'umumenyereza
text: Umumenyereza wa Real Madrid yatanze imihoho ubugira kabiri kuva atangiye ako kazi. Umugwi wa Real wananiwe gutahukana igikombe na kimwe muri uyu mwaka, ukaba uheruka gutwagwa igikombe ca La Liga n'umukeba wawo Atletico Madrid ku musi wa nyuma wa shampiyona wo ku wa gatandatu. Mw'itangazo ryayo, Real yavuze ko "bategerezwa kwubahiriza" ingingo ya Zidane. Bashimiye Zidane w'imyaka 48 ku "buhinga, ukwitanga n'urukundo yerekanye muri Real Madrid hamwe n'ico amariye uwo mugwi." Uwo yahoze ari umukinyi w'imbere w'Ubufaransa, yakiniye Real Madrid kuva mu 2001 gushika mu 2006, yatwaye igikombe ca Champions League  incuro zitatu yikurikiranya hamwe n'igikombe ca La Liga igihe yamenyereza ubwa mbere uwo mugwi hagati ya 2016 na 2018. Yavuye muri uwo mugwi mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu 2018, ariko aca agaruka inyuma y'amezi cumi, akaba yaciye anatwara igikombe ca La Liga co mu mwaka uheze. Real yavuze iti: "Zidane n'umwe muri rurangiranwa ba Real Madrid kandi iragi ryiwe riruta kure ivyo yashitseko nk'umumenyereza n'umukinyi mu mugwi wacu. "Arazi neza ko afise ikibanza mu mitima y'abakunzi ba Real Madrid kandi ko azoguma yisanga muri Real Madrid." Real yarangije ihiganwa irushwa na Atletico amanota abiri muri La Liga, ibura igikombe gutyo incuro ya mbere kuva mu 2009-2010. Bavuye mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe citiriwe umwami (Copa del Rey) kare cane bakuwemwo n'umugwi wo mu cicaro ca gatatu Alcoyano, banatsindwa na Chelsea mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mw'ihiganwa rya Champions League. Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, Zidane, yari asigaje umwaka umwe ku masezerano yiwe, yarahakanye yivuye inyuma ivyavugwa ko yamenyesheje abakinyi biwe ko ashobora gukura meza mu mpera z'uyu mwaka w'inkino. Kazoza kiwe ni ko kaguma kagaruka mu bimenyeshamakuru vyo muri Espagne, bituma haba no guterana amajambo, aho Zidane yavuze ko we n'abakinyi biwe bakwiye icubahiro. Ni we mumenyereza wenyene amaze gutwara igikombe ca Champions League incuro zitatu, akaba yaranatwaye ibikombe bibiri vy'imigwi ya mbere kw'isi, bibiri vya UEFA Super Coupe na bibiri vya Super Coupe ya Espagne.

headline: Kenya iragabisha ko hadutse ikiza ca cholera muri ico gihugu
text: Kenya itangaza ko ikiza ca cholera cibonekeje mu turere dutandatu kuri 46 tugize igihugu, inyuma y’aho abantu 61 banduriye iyi ndwara yo gucibwamwo. 13 barwariye mu bitaro mu gihe abandi umunani bamaze gutaha, nayo 40 bavurwa bataha, nk’uko ubushikiranganji bw’amagara y’abantu bubivuga. Ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko uruzuba rurangwa mu bice bitari bike vy’igihugu rushobora gutuma ivy’iki kiza biyangara, bugatera akamo uturere twose kumera magabo. Abarwayi hafi bose barangwa ku mugwa mukuru Nairobi be no mu karere gahana urubibe nayo ka Kiambu, aho hamaze gutorwa 48 barwaye. Abasigaye bari mu turere two muri Rift Valley nka Nakuru, Kajiado na Uasin Gishu, uwundi umwe akaba yatowe mu karere ka Muranga kari hagati na hagati mu gihugu. Ubu bushikiranganji bwarungitse abahinga muri utwo turere tumaze gufatwa kugira ngo bahangane n’iki kiza. Cholera yandukira biciye mu kurya imfungurwa canke kunywa ibinyobwa vyanduye, ikaba ifitaniye isano rya hafi cane n’isuku rike.
