headline: Astro azwi mu ndirimbo nka Kingston Town, Red Red Wine ari muri UB40 yashengeye
text: Umunyamuziki w'umwongereza akongera akaba n'umwe mu batanguje umurwi UB40 Terence Wilson, azwi cane kw'izina rya Astro, yapfuye ku myaka 64. Astro umuririmvyi yaririmbanye n'uyu murwi wo mu mudiho wa reggae mu kiringo c'imyaka irenga 30 yahitanywe n'indwara y'igihe gito, nk'uko vyemezwa n'umurwi yari asanzwe aririmbamwo. Itangazo ryacishijwe ku rubuga n'umurwi Ali Campbell and Astro rivuga riti:  "Turababaye cane. Isi yose irabuze intwari". Astro yasezeye mu murwi UB40 mu 2013 akaba yagiye kubandanya n'umurwi wiyonkoye UB40 featuring Ali Campbell and Astro, ukaba wari umaze kuremesha ibiteramo bitari bike muri uno mwaka. Wari witeze kuzunguruka ugenda uremesha ibiteramo mu mwaka uza wa 2022. Umurwi wiwe wa mbere watangujwe mu ntango z'imyaka ya 1980 n'umudiho wa reggae wisangije kamere, ukaba waramenyekanye cane mu miziki itari mike harimwo nka Red Red Wine na Can't Help Falling In Love. Uyu murwi wa Birmingham wagurishije ama casettes arenga imiriyoni 70 kandi imiziki yawo iraba iya mbere mu Bwongereza ku ncuro zitatu zose. Itangazo ry'abagize umurwi UB40 wa kino gihe wanditse kuri twitter uti: "Wiruhukire mu mahoro Astro. "Muri iri joro twumvise inkuru y'umubabaro ko uwahoze mu murwi UB40, Terence Wilson, azwi kw'izina rya  Astro, yasandavye inyuma y'indwaya y'igihe gito. Turahojeje umuryango wiwe". Muri rusangi, UB40 yasohoye indirimbo 39 muri 40 za mbere mu Bwongereza, yongera isohora album 28 muri 40 za mbere mu gihugu, na Astro akaba ari we yari umuririmvyi mukuru mu ndirimbo Rat In Mi Kitchen yabaye iya 12 mu 1987. Uyu murwi kandi waramenyekanye cane kw'isi yose, harimwo no muri Amerika, aho indirimbo Red Red Wine yabaye iya mbere, nk'uko vyagenze no ku yindi yitwa, Can't Help Falling in Love with You, yamaze amayinga indwi yose ari yo yiganje mu 1993. Aba mbere mu bagize uyu murwi baramaze imyaka 30 yose baririmbira hamwe imbere y'uko Ali Campbell  awusezera mu 2008. Mu kiganiro Astro yagiranye na The Guardian mu kwa gatanu, yavuze ko uyu murwi umaze gushingwa mu 1978 wahindutse ijwi ry'abanyagihugu batishimiye ibijanye na poritike hamwe n'ibibazo bihanze isi. Yabwiye iki kinyamakuru ko nawe yabonye "amabwa nk'ayo abandi birabure bose bahuye nayo mu mpera z'imyaka ya 1970", aha akaba yashaka kuvuga itegeko ryaha uburenganzira igipolisi guhagarika no gusaka abantu bafatwa ko bateye amakenga - ivyo Astro avuga ko vyama biba buri ndwi. Ati: "Twabonye vyari bigoye kwandika indirimbo z'urukundo gusumba indirimbo z'abarwanira agateka kabo, kubera vyari vyoroshe cane kwandika ku bintu wewe nyene wiboneye canke wasomye ahantu. Yari kamere yacu". Mu 2016, uyu munyamuziki yabwiye urubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'Ubwongereza UK Music Reviews ko iri ritazirano yarironse akiri umwana kubera yambara ibirato vya Dr Martens vyari bizwi nka "Astronaut". Yongeyeko ati: "Ku gihamana ciza, nta muntu yigeze anyita astronaut kuko ari ijambo rirerire, ari naco gituma baciye barigabanya bafata Astro, kandi kuva ubwo ryaciye ringumako". Abajijwe ingene yiyumva iyo ariko arazunguruka aremesha ibiteramo, Astro yavuze ati: "Nta kazi kuri iyi si koguha umunezero nk'uwo ndonka. Jewe ndiho kugira ngo ndirime". Mu kw'umunani, uwundi mugenzi bakoranye muri UB40 batangranye uyu murwi Brian Travers yarapfuye ahitanywe na kanseri ku myaka 62.

headline: Ibivugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Mbappe, Grealish, Barkley, Raphinha, Musa, Shawcross
text: Umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain Kylian Mbappe ashobora gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha muri uyo murwi mu kurindira ko yimukira muri Real Madrid mu kiringo c'imyaka ibiri mu gihe akirindiriye ko ikigega c'uyu murwi wa Esupanye cisununura. (AS - in Spanish) Real Madrid ntizorondera yuy mukinyi Mbabe gushika aho PSG izokwerekanira ko yipfuza kumugurisha, ariko kandi PSG ishobora gufata ingingo yo kureka uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 22 akagenda mu ci mu gihe atotera igikumu ku masezerano yo kwongereza ikiringo. (Marca) Aston Villa iriteguye gutanga umukinyi wayo wo hagati Jack Grealish w'imyaka 25, mu gihe hogira uwongereza amahera, ikaba ishaka kugiriranira amasezerano ya burundu n'umukinyi w'intizo Ross Barkley w'imyaka 27 wo muri Chelsea. (90 Min) Liverpool iriko ikurikiranira hagufi umunya Brezili akina ku ruhande Raphinha w'imyaka 24 inyuma y'uruhara rukomeye amaze kwerekana muri Leeds United mw'ihiganwa ry'uyu mwaka.  (Football Insider) West Bromwich Albion iriko iregeranya uburyo kugira ngo irabe ko yogura umusatirizi w'umunya Nijeriya Ahmed Musa, ariko kandi imirwi Brighton, Burnley, Southampton na CSKA Moscow nayo iriko irarondera uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 28. (Mail on Sunday) West Ham iriko irarondera umusatirizi wa Blackburn akomoka mu Bwongereza Adam Armstrong w'imyaka 23 ikaba iriko irategura gutanga amahera mu ci. (Sun on Sunday) Umukinyi w'inyuma w'Ubwongereza, Ryan Shawcross w'imyaka 33 ari mu biganiro na Stoke City mu ntumbero yo guhagarika amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi kugira ngo aje gukinira umurwi Inter Miami ukina mw'ihiganwa rya Amerika Major League Soccer (MLS). (90 Min) Barcelona ntirota yemera amafaranga ari musi y'imiriyoni 15 z'ama euro mu gihe vyoba ngombwa ko igurisha umunyegori Neto Murara w'imyaka 31 akomoka muri Brezili mu ci.  (Marca) Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umufaransa William Saliba w'imyaka 19 ntarashobora kuronka ikibanza muri Arsenal ariko yatsindiye agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza w'ukwezi mu murwi Nice inyuma y'aho atijirijwe muri uyo murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubufaransa, Ligue 1, mu ntango z'ukwa mbere. (Metro) Uwahoze akina hagati mu murwi Chelsea, Michael Ballack, avuga ko Timo Werner "kumbure ategerezwa gukora uko ashoboye agahindura umukino wiwe", hari mu gihe yariko avuga ku ngorane uyu mukinyi w'umudagi w'imyaka 24 afise imbere y'igori. (Omnisport, via Metro) Manchester City ivuga ko mu gihe yoshobora gutsinda iri higanwa rya Premier League ry'uno mwaka vyoyorohera gutsinda Chelsea mu rugamba rwo kugura umusatirizi wa Borussia Dormund ava muri Norvege Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 20. (Star) Umumenyereza wa Manchester United Ole Gunnar Solskjaer avuga ko umukinyi wo hagati w'umufaransa Paul Pogba ubu afise imyaka 27 ashobora kuba yiteguriye gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha n'uyu murwi wiwe.  (Guardian) Umusatirizi Mohamed Salah w'imyaka 28 akomoka mu Misiri ashobora kuba ari we ashobora kugenda mu gihe umurwi wiwe Liverpool wotegura kugura umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain, umufaransa Kylian Mbappe w'imyaka 22 mu ci riza. (Marca) Chelsea na Real Madrid  ziriko zirarwanira kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Bayern Munich David Alaba w'imyaka 28 akomoka muri Autriche, akaba yiteguye kuva muri uyu murwi w'Ubudagi mu gihe amasezerano yiwe azoba arangiye mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'uyu mwaka. (Guardian) Umukinyi wo hagati w'umunya Norvege Martin Odegaard w'imyaka  22 aboneka ko ashobora kwimukira burundu muri Arsenal asanzwe akinamwoi nk'intizo mu gihe Zinedine Zidane yobandanya kumenyereza umurwi wamureze Real Madrid. (Eurosport) Marc Overmars yahoze akinira Arsenal aripfuza kugaruka muri uyu murwi kurongora igisata kijejwe umupira w'amaguru. Nyo mabanga ajejwe mu murwi Ajax. (De Telegraaf, in Dutch) Ibintu ntivyoroshe ku mumenyereza Jose Mourinho muri Tottenham ariko biboneka ko ivyo kumwirukana  bitari hafi. (Telegraph) Chelsea iripfuza kugarukana mu ci riza umusatirizi w'umubirigi Eden Hazard w'imyaka 30 yari yagurishije muri Real Madrid. (Defensa Central - in Spanish)

headline: DR Congo igiye kwubaka intatemwa ya Lumumba
text: Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo igiye kwubaka intatemwa y'uwiguze ukwikukira kw'ico gihugu, Patrice Lumumba, nk'uko vyaraye bitangajwe na Perezida Félix Tshisekedi. Perezida Tshisekedi avuga kandi ko Ububirigi buzosubiza ibisigarira vy'iyi ncungu yari umushikiranganji wa mbere igihe Congo yikukira. Vyitezwe ko iyi ntatemwa yubakwa imbere y'uko igi gihugu gihimbaza imyaka 61 y'ukwikukira, mu kwa gatndatu 2021. Mw'ijambo ryiwe, Perezida Tshisekedi yavuze ati: "Mu bikorwa vyo guhimbaza isabukuru y'imyaka 61 tumaze turonse intahe y'ukwikukira, igihugu kizokengurukira Umushikiranganji wa mbere Patrice Emery Lumumba, umwe mu ntwari z'igihugu, ibisigarira vyiwe bikazotahukanwa kugira ngo bishinguranwe iteka ry'uwiguze igihugu". Patrice Lumumba yagandaguwe mu kwezi kwa mbere 1961. Ikiziga ciwe nticigeze kiboneka, ariko umwe mu bamugandaguwe yashoboye kubika iryinyo ryiwe i Buruseri mu Bubirigi. Mu kw'icenda uno mwaka, sentare yo muri ico gihugu camaze imyaka itari mike gikoroniza Congo yategetse ko iryo ryinyo risubizwa umukobwa wa Lumuba, Juliana Lumumba, inyuma y'aho yandikiye ikete umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ububirigi amusaba ko yorisubiza.

headline: Leta y'Ubwongereza iti 'abafise ubumenyi buto ntibazohabwa viza'
text: Leta y'Ubwongereza imenyesha ko mu nteguro  y'ico gihugu yerekeye uruja n'uruza inyuma y'ukwiyonkora ku muryango w'ibihugu vya Bulaya ari uko abakozi bazoba bafise ubumenyi buto batazoronswa uburenganzira bwo kwinjira muri ico gihugu. Leta ihimiriza ko abatanga ubuzi "boheba" ingendo y'ugukoresha "abakozi bazimbutse" bava mu bihugu vya Bulaya, bakimenyereza ahubwo guteza imbere abakozi bogumya bakanamenyera gukoresha ubuhinga bwa none budasaba abantu. Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati muri ico gihugu bumenyesha ko abanyagihugu bava mu muryango wa Bulaya no hanze yawo bazoja gukorera mu Bwongereza bazofatwa co kimwe. Ivyo bizoba inyuma y'igenekerezo rya 31  z'ukwa 12 uno mwaka, ikiringo c'uruja n'uruza mu mwidegemvyo kizoba kirangiye hagati y'Ubwongereza n'umuryango w'Ubulayi. Umugambwe w'abakozi uvuga ko "gushinga amategeko atorohereza abantu" bizotuma habura abakozi. Ariko umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati, Priti Patel, yabwiye BBC mu kiganiro Breakfast ko leta yashatse "gutera intege abantu bafise ubumenyi nyabwo" hamwe no "kugabanya ibitigiri vy'abantu binjira mu Bwongereza ata bumenyi bukwiye bafise". Avuga kandi ko amakompanyi azoshobora kuronderera abakozi mu "bantu badafise ubuzi" bashika imiliyoni umunani mu Bwongereza. Hagati aho, umugambwe SNP uvuga ko iyo ari "ingingo iteye isoni kandi mbi cane". Muri iyo nteguro, abitwa ko bafise ubumenyi bukwiye bazoshobora no kuba abahejeje igice ca kabiri c'amashure yisumbuye, aho kuba abahejeje kaminuza gusa nk'uko bisanzwe bimeze ubu. Ubuzi bubayabaye hamwe n'ubuzi bumwe bumwe ku barimyi buzovanwa muri iyo nteguro, ariko hongerwemwo ububaji, ugutera amarangi, n'ukurera abana. Leta ishaka gutanguza integuro ishingiye "ku manota" nk'uko yavyemereye abanyagihugu mu gitabo c'imigambi y'umugambwe w'aba Conservateur. Muri iyi nteguro, abanyamahanga bazotegerezwa  gushikana amanota 70 kugira ngo bashobore kwemererwa gukora mu Bwongereza. Kuba uzi icongereza no kuba wemerewe akazi ufitiye ubumenyi buhagije bizoguha amanota 50. Ayandi manota azotangwa harabwe impamyabushobozi, umushahara w'akazi, n'uko uzoba ukora mu gisata gifise ubukene bw'abakozi. Abakozi bava mu bihugu vyo mu karere k'ubutunzi ka Bulaya (Espace économique européen, EEE) ubu bafise uruhusha rwo kubandanya baba kandi bakora mu Bwongereza hatarinze kurabwa imishahara canke ubumenyi bwabo. Leta ivuga ko ivyo bizorangirana n'igenekerezo rya 31 z'ukwa 12 uno mwaka, aho ikiringo c'imfatakibanza c'amezi 11 inyuma ya Brexit kizoba kirangiriye. Umushahara w'intango ku mukozi azoba afise ubumenyi bukwiye akeneye kuza mu Bwongereza uzogabanywa uve ku 30.000 vy'ama pawundi ushike kuri 25.600. Hagati aho, leta ivuga ko uwo mushahara ushobora kuzogabanywa gushika ku 20.480  ku bantu bazoba bakora mu "bisata kanaka bidafise abakozi b'imvukira" - harimwo abaganga, abubatsi, abahinga mu nyifato hamwe n'abatamba, canke bakaba bafise impamyabushobozi ya Doctorat yerekeye akazi kanaka. Ariko, nta gitigiri ntarengwa c'abakozi babifitiye ubumenyi bazoba bashobora kwinjira mu Bwongereza. Leta ivuga ko ata ntumbero izotanga ku bakozi bazofa bafise ubumenyi buto canke bahembwa agashahara gato, igasaba amakompanyi ko "yokwitunganya" afatiye ku kiringo ntarengwa c'uruja n'uruza kuri gusa hagati y'Ubwongereza n'ibihugu vy'umuryango w'Ubulaya. Ahubwo, ivuga ko abanyagihugu bo mu bihugu vyo mu muryango wa Bulaya bashika imiliyoni 3.2 basavye ko boguma mu Bwongereza bashobora gufasha gutorera umuti ikibazo c'abakozi. Ariko abaserukira abakora mu vy'uburimyi, mu mahoteri be no mu buvuzi baragabisha ko ku nteguro nshasha bizogorana kuronka abakozi. Ikigo cigisha ibijanye n'ubuvuzi (Royal College of Nursing) kivuga ko iyo nteguro "itazoshobora gukwiza ivyo abanyagihugu bakeneye mu vy'ubuvuzi". Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'abarimyi Minette Batters ashikiriza "amakenga y'inkoramutima"  ku bijanye "n'uko leta yananiwe no kubona ivya nkenerwa mu bijanye n'uburimyi hamwe n'imfungurwa mu Bwongereza". Eka n'ishirahamwe rihurikiyemwo abahingura imfungurwa n'inyobwa (Food and Drink Federation) ryerekana amakenga ku bakora imikate, abahingura inyama hamwe n'abandi bahingura imfungurwa zimwe zimwe nk'amaforomaji n'ibindi bikozwe mw'ifu, batazoba bakwije ibisabwa n'amategeko muri ino nteguro nshasha. Hagati aho, leta ivuga ko izokworohereza abakozi b'igihe gito mu gisata c'uburimyi  gushika ku 10.000,  kandi ko "izokworohereza uruja n'uruza rw'urwaruka", aho abashika 20.000 bashobora kwemererwa kwinjira mu Bwongereza buri mwaka. Kuri iyo nteguro, abanyamahanga bazoba bafise gusa uburenganzira bwo kuronswa ibibategekanirijwe bafatiye ku mishahara bahembwa gushika baronkejwe uruhusha rw'ukuba mu gihugu burundu, rutangwa inyuma y'imyaka itanu. Muri kino gihe, abanyagihugu bo mu bihugu vyo mu muryango wa Bulaya barashobora gusaba ubwo burenganzira mu gihe boba "bariko barinjiriza igihugu". Abanyagihugu baba hanze y'umuryango w'Ubulayi bashobora kuronswa ibitegekanirijwe abakozi  mu gihe baronkejwe uruhusha rwo kuba mu gihugu burundu, ivyo navyo bigasaba kuba bamaze imyaka itanu baba mu Bwongereza. Mu mugambwe w'abakozi, umunyamabanga wawo, Diane Abbott, avuga ko leta "isa n'uko itabanje kwihweza ingaruka z'iyi nteguro ku butunzi muri rusangi hamwe n'ubutumwa yari ikwiye guha abimukira basanzwe baba kandi bakora ngaha". Naho mu mugambwe w'Abigenga, umuvugizi wawo  avuga ko iyo nteguro ishingiye ku rwanko ku banyamahanga. Muri Ecosse hoho, umushikiranganji wa mbere akaba anarongoye umugambwe SNP, Nicola Sturgeon, avuga ko iyo nteguro izogira "ingaruka mbi cane" ku butunzi bwa Ecosse.

headline: Uko abahinga babaze umwana akiri mu mbanyi, nyina wiwe yamwise 'Igitangaro'
text: "Ikintu ico ari co cose kibi gishobora gushika, ariko rero kubona nashoboye gukora (kubaga) uyu mwana, nibaza ko ari co kintu ciza nashoboye kumukorera. Mu mutwe wanje, nta kundi vyari kugenda - nategerezwa kumubaga". Inyuma y'incuro indwi zose bagerageza kumutera urubuto rwamaze guhura n'intanga (fécondation in vitro, IVF), Helena yari yamaze kwihebura ko ata wundi mwana wa kabiri azigera aronka. Ariko rero ku ncuro igira indwi, yashoboye gusama imbanyi mbere ibintu bibandanya neza gushika ku ndwi igira 20 aho bamupima bakabona ko hari ikibazo. Ico gihe, Helena yabwiwe ko umwana wiwe w'umukobwa yari yibungenze yari afise ikibazo c'uruti rw'umugongo (spina bifida). Avuga ingene bamubwiye, Helena avuga ati: "Yari afise intoboro nini ku mugongo kandi igice c'uruti rw'umugongo cari hanze. Bambwiye ko yari afise igihamana kibi co kumugara, ntashobore kwifata mu gusohora umwanda mukuru na muto, akaba kandi inyuma y'aho yategerezwa guterwa akaringoti ko kuvoma amazi yaboneka mu bwonko". "Narataye umutwe bambwiye ingaruka zose zishobora kumubako kubera izi ngorane, igihe cose nama mu marira". "Bamwiye ko amahirwe yo gutambuka yari make , make cane rwose - numva n'inguvu zose zimperanye". Mu misi yakurikiye, Helena yarungitswe ku bipimo bamwemerera ko bashobora kumubaga. Amaze indwi 23 yibungenze, yarungitswe ku bitaro vy'abahinga mu Bubirigi, bikorana n'ikigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu c'Ubwongereza, NHS. Umurwi w'abahinga ugizwe n'abantu hafi 25 nibo bakoze ico gikorwa kidasanzwe kandi kigoye, bashobora kubaga uyo mwana yari mu nda barakora urwo ruti rw'umugongo banazibira intoboro yari mu mugongo wiwe. Helena ati: "Nari nzi ko ni batambaga ubuzima bwiwe buzoba ukundi". Umwigisha wa kaminuza Anna David, akaba n'umuhanuzi ku bijanye n'amagara y'impinja kw'ishure kaminuza y'ubuvuzi ya Londres (University College Hospital), avuga ati: "Mu myaka iheze, uru ruhinja rwari gutegerezwa kubagwa kugira rusanasanwe rumaze kuvuka - ariko rero kubera ubu dushobora kubaga umwana ari mu nda ya nyina, iyo ntoboro twashoboye kuyizibira hakiri kare cane, bisigura ko ata ngorane nyinshi uruti rw'umugongo ruzogira". "Ibi biha amahirwe menshi uyu mwana gushobora gutambuka akanagenzura gusumba uruhago n'urura vyiwe". Haciye amezi atatu akozwe, Helena yahavuye yibaruka umukobwa wiwe Mila - impfunyapfunyo ya milagro, bisigura igitangaro mu rurimi rw'iki espangol - ku bitaro vyegukira iri shure kaminuza rya Londres. Mila aracafise uruziruzi mu bwonko, ariko gushika ubu ibimenyetso vyerekana ko abandanya akura neza. Helena ati: "Arashobora kuzungagiza amaguru we nyene, kandi umukoze ku mano aravyuma neza, n'ukuri ni ibintu bitangaje cane". "Nshimira cane aba baganga bakoze iki gikorwa co kumubaga kuko iyo bitagenda uko, ubuzima bwiwe bwari kuba ukundi". Iyi ndwara Spina bifida y'uruti rw'umugongo ikaba ifata abana bari mu mbanyi bashika hafi 1,500 ku mwaka mu Bwongereza, ituma uruti rw'umugongo rudakura neza. Ishobora gutera ubumuga, canke ibibazo vy'uruhago, urura n'amafyigo. Ariko iyo abaganga bashoboye kumubaga imbanyi imaze indwi hagati ya 22 na 26 hakurindira avutse, umwana ashobora kubaho neza. Iki gikorwa gisanzwe gikorwa n'abahinga bo mu bitaro vy'ishure kaminuza ya Londres (University College London), ibitaro vy'abana Great Ormond Street Hospital, hamwe n'ibitaro vyegukira Ishure kaminuza ya Louvain mu Bubirigi. Impinja 32 ziramaze gukorwa muri ubu buryo kuva mu kwa mbere 2020. Prof Stephen Powis, arongoye igisata c'ubuvuzi mu kigo NHS c'Ubwongereza, avuga ko aka ari akarorero kamwe mu buhinga bugezweho mu vyo ubuvuzi bikorwa n'ikigo NHS. "Hampande yo kurwanya ikiza karanda gihanze isi, NHS irabandanya ibi bikorwa bidasanzwe no kwitaho abarwaye". Kate Steele, arongoye ikigo Shine gifata mu mugongo imiryango yashikiwe n'iyi ndwara spina bifida ifata uruti rw'umugongo, hamwe n'indwara yo kuvyimba umutwe (hydrocéphalie), avuga ati: "Turizeye ko umuryango uwo ari wo wose ushobora gukenera ubu buhinga bwo gukora uruhinja ruri mu mbanyi uronswa akaryo ko gutahuzwa ko iyo nzira ari yo nyayo kandi bakabona ko bafashwe mu mugongo, nk'uko vyabaye kuri Helena".

headline: Abahinga bavuga ko kunywa itabi bitonona amahaha gusa ahubwo n'amaso
text: Abahinga baragabisha amamiliyoni y'abanywi b'itabi ko bariko bariyononera mu kubandanya barinywa. Icigwa cakozwe n'ishirahamwe ry'abaganga bavura amaso, Association des optométristes (AOP) ryo mu Bwongereza, cerekana ko umwe kuri batanu ari bo bemera ko kunywa itabi bishobora gutera uruhumyi. Ikigo kijejwe abafise ubumuga bw'amaso (Royal National Institute of Blind People, RNIB ) muri ico gihugu kivuga ko abanywa itabi bashobora kugira ibibazo vy'uguhuma amaso canke bikunyuka. Ivyo ni ukubera umwotsi w'itabi ushobora kwonona ibice bimwe bimwe vy'amaso. Umwotsi w'itabi ufise ubumara bubi bushobora gutuma amaso yononekara. Nk'akarorero, urya mwotsi urimwo ubumara bushobora kwirundanya mu mbonero, bigatuma umuntu ashobora kwandura ya ndwara ya cataracte. Itabi rishobora kandi gutuma indwara y'amaso iturutse ku gisukari yunyuka mu kwonona udutsi tw'amaraso two mu maso. Abanywa itabi barashobora kugira ingorane z'ukutabona neza kubera ubusaza ku ncuro hafi zitatu gusumba abatarinywa. Abanywa itabi barashobora kwandura indwara z'uruhumyi ku ncuro 16 gusumba abatarinywa, bivuye kw'iyononekara ry'umutsi winjiza amaraso mu jisho, bigatuma amaraso adashobora gushika mu jisho, ivyo navyo bigashobora gutuma umuntu yandura uruhumyi. Mu matohoza yakozwe ku bantu bakuze 2006, ibice 18 kw'ijana (18%) bavuze atagushidikanya ko itabi rishobora gutuma, ku rugero runini, umuntu ahuma canke atakaza ubushobozi bw'ukubona, mu gihe ibice 76 kw'ijana bari bazi ko itabi rishobora gutera kanseri. Ishirahamwe AOP rimenyesha ko guheba kunywa itabi ari imwe mu nzira nyazo z'ugukingira amaso, hampande y'ukwipimisha buri igihe. Aishah Fazlanie, umuhanuzi ku vyerekeye amaso muri iryo shirahamwe, avuga ati: "Abantu basa n'abatahura isano riri hagati y'itabi na kanseri, ariko abenshi ntibabona ingaruka zishobora guterwa n'itabi ku maso". "Itabi rishobora gutuma ingorane z'ukutabona neza bivuye ku busaza ziyongera, arico gituma abanywa itabi bakwiye kuraba ingene boriheba". Mu Bwongereza, ibice 17 kw'ijana vy'abagabo, na 13 kw'ijana vy'abagore - ni ukuvuga imiliyoni 7 n'ibice bine - ni abanywi b'itabi. Ibice birenga 61 kw'ijana muri bo bavuga ko bipfuza kuriheba. Ibitigiri bitangwa n'ikigo kijejwe kwegeranya ibiharuro muri ico gihugu vyerekana ko igitigiri c'abanywa itabi kigenda kigabanuka, aho mu mwaka wa 2011 ariho vyakorotse gusumba ku bari hagati y'imyaka 18 na 24. Mu mwaka wa 2017, hafi imiliyoni zitatu - ibice 5,5 kw'ijana vy'Abongereza - barakoresha isigareti ry'ubuhinga bwa none (e-cigarette), abenshi muri bo bakavuga ko vyobafasha guheba itabi burundu.

headline: Zinedine Zidane avuga ko rutahizamu Gareth Bale yimirije kugenda
text: Rutahizamu wa Real Madrid na Wales, Gareth Bale, ntakiri mu bakinyi bashimwa n'umumenyereza Zinedine Zidane kandi bisa nk'aho agire ave mw'iyo kipe. Uwo mukinyi wa Wales w'imyaka 30 ntiyashizwe mu kibuga mu rukino rwo kwitegurira amahiganwa aza, aho Real yatsindwa 3-1 na Bayern Munich muri Amerika. Aho yavuga nyuma y'urukino, Zidane yagize ati: "Turizera ko azogenda vuba. Vyoba ari vyiza kuri twese. Turiko turaraba ko yoronka ikipe nshasha. "Ntaco mpfa nawe ku buryo bwihariye, ariko haragera igihe ibintu bigakorwa nk'uko biba bikeneye gukorwa." Bale asigaje imyaka itatu mu masezerano yagiranye na Real, yatsindiye Champions League inshuro zine kuva aho aguriwe imiriyoni 85 z'amahera y'Ubwongereza avuye muri Tottenham mu 2013, igiciro caruta ibindi vyose ico gihe. Biravugwa ko aronderwa n'amakipe ya Manchester United na Spurs yo muri Premier League mu Bwongereza, Bayern yatwaye igikombe mu Budage co kimwe n'ikipe zo mu Bushinwa. Asubiza ku vyavuzwe na Zidane, uwuhagarariye inyungu za Bale, Jonathan Barnett, yabwiye AFP ati: "Zidane ateye isoni - nta cubahiro na kimwe aha umukinyi yakoreye vyinshi cane ikipe ya Real Madrid." Ingorane z'imvune zatumye uwo mugabo yamuka muri Wales akina gusa inkino 79 muri La Liga mu myaka ine iheze. Yakinye inkino 42 za Real mu mwaha uheze, igice cazo azikina asimbura.

headline: Tokyo Olympics: umu kenya Eliud Kipchoge yashoboye kurwanira umudari wiwe wa marathon
text: Umukenya Eliud Kipchoge avuga ko yagumanye iragi ryiwe inyuma y'aho abereye umunonotsi wa mbere atsindiye ku ncuro ya kabiri yikurikiranya ikibanza ca mbere muri marathon mu nkino za olempike i Tokyo, kuva mu 1980. Kipchoge, uwa gatatu yikurikiranije mu gutsindira umudari w'inzahabu mw'ihiganwa rya marathon mu nkino za olempike, yirutse mu kiringo c'isaha, n'iminota umunani hamwe n'amasegonda 38. Uyu mukenya w'imyaka 36 afatwa nk'umwirutsi wa mbere w'ibihe vyose muri marathon, yasize uwamukurikiye, umunya Hollande Abdi Nageeye, umunota wose n'amasegonda 20. Mu bariko barwanira umudari wa bronze, umubirigi Bashir Abdi yasize umukenya Lawrence Cherono. Kipchoge ati: "Nibaza ko nagumanye umurage mu gutsinda marathon ku ncuro ya kabiri nikurikiranya. Ubu rero ndibaza ko ngiye gufasha abo muri kazoza". Yabwiye BBC Sport ati: "Tokyo 2020 yabaye, bisigura vyinshi. Bisigura ko hari icizere. Bisigura ko turi mu nzira nziza tugana mu buzima busanzwe". "Turi mu nzira nziza tugana mu buzima busanzwe, iyi niyo nsiguro y'izi nkino za olempike". "Ndaryohewe kubona nashoboye kurwanira umudari wanje no kwereka abo muri kazoza ko iyo wubashe inkino ukagira indero, urashobora gushika kw'ihangiro". Ni umudari wiwe ugira kane mu nkino za olempike kuri Kipchoge, umunonotsi yaciye umuhigo mu 2019, igihe arangiza marathon mu kiringo kiri musi y'amasaha abiri, ibitari bwigere bibaho mu mateka ya marathon. Mu kw'icumi umwaka uheze, Kipchoge niho yatsindwa ubwa mbere mu myaka indwi yose, hari i Londres, ariko mw'ihiganwa ryabereye i Sapporo mu Buyapani, yabonetse ko yari afise ibintu mu minwe, amaze kwiruka ibirometero 30 akaba ari ho yaca yerekana ubudasa. Uyu mukenya asanzwe ari we yatsindiye marathon mu masaha abiri n'umunota umwe hamwe n'amasegonda 39 i Berlin mu 2018 - yatahukanye ubwa mbere umudari wa bronze mu 2004 ku metero 5000 yongera atsindira umudari w'ifeza mu 2008, imbere 'yuko atsindira umudari w'inzahabu wa mbere muri olempike i Rio muri Brésilmu myaka itanu iheze. Ku wa gatanu, umukenyakazi Peres Jepchirchir nawe yari yatsindiye marathon ku ruhande rw'abagore. Ibintu ntivyagenze neza kuri ba banonotsi bo mu Burundi no mu Rwanda, kuko Olivier Irabaruta yarangije ari mu kibanza ca 39, aho yakoresheje amasaha abiri n'iminota 17 hamwe n'amasegonda 44 (2h17'44"). Umunyarwanda John Hakizimana yari mu bahiganwa na Kipchoge wewe ntiyashoboye kurangiza ihiganwa., ku mpamvu zitaramenyekana. Ejo ku wa gatandatu, Francine Niyonsaba yarangije mu kibanza ca gatanu mw'ihiganwa ryo kwiruka ku metero 10000 ku ruhande rw'abagore, akaba yakoresheje iminota 30 n'amasegonda 41 n'ibice 93 (30:41.93). Muri ibi bihugu bibiri, nta munonotsi n'umwe ashoboye gutahukana umudari muri izi nkino za olempike zariko zibera i Tokyo, mu mwanya uri imbere hakaba hitezwe ibirori vyo kuzirangiza.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru: Lewandowski, Kane, Lampard, Neto, Raul, Ginter, Zerkane, Berge
text: Chelsea yatanguye imibonano na Bayern Munich kugira ngo irabe ingene yogura umusatirizi Robert Lewandowski, umunya Pologne w'imyaka 32, ariko uyu murwi wo muri Premier League uhanganye bikomeye na Paris St-Germain hamwe na Barcelona. (Sky Sport Germany - in German) Umusatirizi w'umwongereza Harry Kane yiteze kwimukira muri Manchester City ku giciro c'miriyoni zirenga 140 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika mu ci riza inyuma y'aho amenyesherejeTottenham Hotspur ko ashaka kugenda. Manchester United nayo nyene iriko irakurikiranira hagufi ingene ibintu bigenda kuri uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 27, ni mu gihe Tottenham yijijanya imitima ku bijanye no kugurisha uyu mukinyi ku bakeba bayo bo mu gisagara ca London,Chelsea. (Mirror) Kane ashaka ko ikibazo co kwimuka kirangira imbere y'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Buraya rihuza imirwi nserukiragihugu (Euro 2020 ) ritegekanijwe gutangura ku wa 11 z'ukwa gatandatu, ariko Tottenham yoyo ibona ko ibi bidashoboka. (Guardian) Tottenham yatanguye kwitegurira igenda rya Kane mu kwa kabiri, ica itangura kurondera ingene yogura umusatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund, umunya Norvège Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 20. (Mail) Umumenyereza wa Manchester United Ole Gunnar Solskjaer avuga ko uyu murwi ugura umusatirizi mu ci riza, n'aho umukinyi w'imbere Edinson Cavani, umunya Uruguay w'imyaka 34 aherutse gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha n'uyu murwi. (Goal) Liverpool igiye kwugurura ibiganiro ku bijanye n'amasezerano mashasha n'umunyegori Alisson Becker, w'imyaka 28, hamwe n'umukinyi wo hagati Fabinho w'imyaka 27, mu ci riza, ikaba itegura ibi biganiro igihe aba bakinyi bompi bakomoka muri Brésil (Brazil) bazoba bagarutse mu kw'indwi, mu myimenyerezo yo kwitegurira ihiganwa ry'umwaka w'inkino. (Mail) Crystal Palace iri mu biganiro n'uwahoze amenyereza Chelsea mbere yahoze akina hagati muri uyu murwi no mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza, Frank Lampard w'imyaka 42, kugira ngo ashobore gusubirira Roy Hodgson. (Talksport) Uwahoze amenyereza Bournemouth  Eddie Howe w'imyaka 43 na we nyene ari ku rutonde rw'abaronderwa cane kugira ngo  basubirire Hodgson w'imyaka 73, ni mu gihe kandi umumenyereza wa Swansea Steve Cooper w'imyaka 41 hamwe n'uwa  Barnsley umufaransa Valérien Ismaël w'imyaka 45, na bo nyene baboneka ko bashobora guhiganira ico kibanza. (Sky Sports) Umumenyereza wa Everton  Carlo Ancelotti avuga ko umukinyi wese yumva ko "atagononokewe" muri uyo murwi ashobora kugenda, ni mu gihe uyu mutariyano yamiriye kure amakuru avuga ko ashobora gusubirira Zinedine Zidane nk'umumenyereza wa Real Madrid. (Guardian) Real Madrid iriko irabaza uwahoze ari rurangiranwa muri uyu murwi yanabaye umusatirizi w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Espagne Raul w'imyaka 43, niba ashobora kwemera gusubirira Zidane nk'umumenyereza. (AS) Hagati aho, icizere c'uko uyu murwi wo muri Espagne ushobora kugura umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain, umufaransa Kylian Mbappé w'imyaka 22, gishobora kutagera kure mu gihe Zidane yova i Bernabeu. (Eurosport) Umukinyi wa Arsenal,umunya Brazil Willian w'imyaka 32, aripfuza kuva muri uyu murwi akaja gukinira umurwi wa David Beckham Inter Miami muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. (Sun) Barcelona ishobora kurekura umunyegori wayo, umunya Brazil, Neto akagenda mu ci riza, ni mu gihe Arsenal ishaka gusubira kurondera uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 31. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Southampton iriteguye kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Borussia Dortmund, umunya Danemark Thomas Delaney w'imyaka 29. (ESPN) Tottenham yamaze gusaba umukinyi w'inyuma wa Borussia Monchengladbach, umudagi Matthias Ginter w'imyaka 27, ariko ikaba iriko imurwanira naLiverpool hamwe na Inter Milan. (Bild - in German) Aston Villa yatanguye kuvugana n'abaserukizi b'umukinyu wo ku ruhande wa Bordeaux,umunya Algeria Mehdi Zerkane w'imyaka 21, inyuma y'amezi atari make imukurikiranira hagufi. (L'Equipe - in French) Leeds United iriko irarondera umukinyi w'imbere wa Hertha Berlin, Matheus Cunha, umunya Brazil w'imyaka 21, ariko arakurikiranwa kandi n'imirwi Napoli, Atalanta yo mu Butariyano, hamwe na Monaco wo mu Burafansa. (Leeds Live) Southampton yashize ku rutonde rw'abakinyi ishobora kurondera, umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'i bubamfu wa Reims,umunya Cote d'Ivoire Ghislain Konan w'imyaka 25, nk'uwushobora gusubirira umukinyi w'inyuma w'umwongereza Ryan Bertrand w'imyaka 31, amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi akazorangira mu ci. Aston Villa nayo nyene iriko iramurondera. (Mail) Southampton ishobora kandi kurondera umunyegori wa Lazio, Thomas Strakosha, umunya Albania w'imyaka 26. (Tuttomercatoweb - in Italian) Chelsea irashaka umukinyi wo hagati wa Atalanta, Ruslan Malinovskyi, umunya Ukraine w'imyaka 28, ariko kandi araronderwa na Inter Milan hamwe na Paris St-Germain. (Sun) Chelsea yerekanye kandi ko ishaka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Wolfsburg, Maxence Lacroix, umufaransa w'imyaka 21. (Sky Germany, via Sky Sports) Arsenal yatanze amafaranga yababa imiriyoni 24  z'amadorari y'abanyamerika ku mukinyi wo hagati, umunya Norvège Sander Berge w'imyaka 23, ariko umurwi Sheffield United wamanutse mu cicero ca kabiri wowo umushakako n'imiburiburi imiriyoni 36.5 z'amadorari hamwe n'agashirukabute ko kumugurisha. (London.Football) Newcastle United yongereje amezi 12 ku masezerano ifitaniye n'umukinyi w'inyuma wa Pays de Galles/Wales Paul Dummett w'imyaka 29.(Football Insider) Umukinyi w'inyuma Diogo Dalot aripfuza kuvavanura burundu n'umurwi wiwe Manchester United kugira yinjire burundu muri AC Milan mu gihe amasezerano y'intizo afitaniye n'uyu murwi w'i San Siro azoba arangiye mu ci riza. (Calcio Mercato - via Sun) Liverpool yongereje akariro mu kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Portugal Pedro Goncalves w'imyaka 22, ikaba yamaze gushikira umurwi wiwe Sporting Lisbon kugira ngo ishobore kumugura. (Record, via Team Talk) Arsenal yakuwe mw'ihiganwa ryo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Rennes  Eduardo Camavinga w'imyaka 18, n'aho yari yerekanye ishaka rinini ryo kurondera uyu mufaransa akina mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'abatarenza imyaka 21. (Express)

headline: PSG iri mu biganiro na Lionel Messi inyuma y'aho aviriye muri Barcelona
text: Paris St-Germain iri mu biganiro n'abaserukizi ba Lionel Messi kugira barabe ingene yokwimukira muri uwo murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubufaransa Ligue 1 inyuma y'aho aviriye muri Barcelona. BBC Sport yabwiwe ko abaserukizi ba Messi baciye bavugana na PSG ku wa kane aho bimenyekaniye ko FC Barcelona itakimuhereye amasezerano mashasha nk'uko yari yabimwemereye. Ibiganiro biriko birabandanya kuri uwu wa gatandatu hakaba hari icizere ko impande zompi zishobora gushika ku masezerano. Ku wa kane, Barça yatangaje ko Messi, ubu ata murwi n'umwe arimwo, adashobora kubandanya akinira uwu murwi wo muri La Liga kubera inzitizi zishingiye ku mafaranga n'inzego. Ejo ku wa gatanu, umukuru wa Barça Joan Laporta yavuze ko kugumana Messi vyari gutuma uwu murwi usubira inyuma nk'imyaka 50 mu butunzi. Abantu benshi bibaza ko Messi yakiriza nka nkama icipfuzo co kwinjira muri PSG kubera asanzwe azinanye n'abakinyi bayo batari bake. Neymar yakinaye na we muri Barcelona kuva mu 2013 gushika 2017 imbere y'uko aja muri PSG ku giciro kitari bwigere kibaho c'imiriyoni zirenga 277  z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, kandi Messi yagumye ari hafi cane n'uyu munya Brésil. Mu gihe c'akaruhuko mu ntango z'uku kwezi, Messi yarifotoje ari kumwe na Neymar, hamwe n'abandi bakinyi bagenziwe ba Argentina Angel di Maria na Leandro Paredes hamwe na mugenzi wabo Marco Verrati bakinana muri PSG. Mu gihe boshika ku masezerano, hoba icitwa Fair-play financier (bivuga ko atoshingira ku mushahara urenze urugero) kuko poritike yo kurondera abakinyi muri rino ci yashingiye cane cane ku kurondera abakinyi bari barangije amasezerano yabo n'imirwi yabo, aha ni nk'umukinyi w'inyuma Sergio Ramos, umukinyi wo hagati Georginio Wijnaldum hamwe n'umunyegori Gianluigi Donnarumma, mu gihe umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'iburyo  Achraf Hakimi nawe yiniye avuye muri Inter Milan.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Mbappe, Haaland, Ward-Prowse, Odegaard, Neves, Laporte, Giroud
text: Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa Paris St-Germain Nasser Al-Khelaifi avuga ko uyu murwi utarota ugurisha umusatirizi wayo w'umufaransa Kylian Mbappe w'imyaka 22. (AS - in Spanish) Umurwi ukeneye kugira umusatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund, Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 20,  muri iri ci utegerezwa gutanga imiriyoni 200 z'ama euros. (AS - in Spanish) Aston Villa iriteguye gutanga amahera kugira igure umukinyi wo hagati wa Southampton umwongereza James Ward-Prowse w'imyaka 26 umusi umwe inyuma y'aho yemereye gutanga amahera atari bwigere abaho muri uyo murwi mu kugura umukinyi wo hagati Emiliano Buendia wo muri Norwich. (Guardian) Southampton imenyesha ko ata mugambi ifise wo kugurisha Ward-Prowse inyuma y'aho umurwi Aston Villa umenyeshereje ko wipfuza uyu kizigenza wayo.  (Mail) Aho vyankiye ko ironka Buendia, intumbero nyamukuru ya Arsenal ubu ni ukugarukana umukinyi wo hagati wa Real Madrid, umunya Norvège Martin Odegaard w'imyaka 22, haba ku ntizo canke bwegu.  (Football London) Wolves iriteguye kwihweza amafaranga azotangwa na Arsenal muri ino ndwi mu kugura umukinyi wo hagati, umunya Portugal Ruben Neves w'imyaka 24. (Mail) Arsenal iriteguye guhangana na Manchester United mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Atletico Madrid umwongereza Kieran Trippier w'imyaka 30. (Metro) Trippier yarabwiye bagenzibe mu Bwongereza ko yiteguye kuva muri Espagne bibaye ngombwa kugira ngo yinjire muri Manchester United. (Sun) Barcelona yasubiye kwerekana ko ishaka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester City umunya Espagne Aymeric Laporte w'imyaka 27, kandi ishobora no gutanga umunya Espagne nyene, Sergi Roberto w'imyaka 29 kugira ngo ironke uyo mukinyi. (Sport - in Spanish) Umusatirizi w'umufaransa Olivier Giroud w'imyaka 34 aracafise akaryo ko kwinjira muri AC Milan, n'aho mu ndwi iheze Chelsea yatangaje ko yamwongerereje uwundi mwaka mu masezerano afitaniye nayo. (Goal) Barcelona yafashe ingingo yo kutadugiriza umushahara Georginio Wijnaldum w'imyaka 30, inyuma y'aho Paris St-Germain yemeye ko ishobora kuduza incuro zirenga zibiri ku mushahara yemerewe na Barca.  Uyu mukinyi wo wo hagati akomoka mu Buholande, akaba afise uburenganzira bwo kwinjira mu murwi uwo ari wo wose ata kirinze gusabwa inyuma y'aho amasezerano afitaniye na  Liverpool arangiriye, ariteguye gutera igikumu ku masezerano y'imyaka itatu na PSG. (Fabrizio Romano, Twitter) Juventus ishobora gusubira kugerageza kurondera uwundi mukinyi asanzwe aronderwa na Barcelona, umunya Hollande Memphis Depay w'imyaka 27 akina imbere, akaba agiye kuva mu murwi Lyon ata kirinze gusabwa.  (Mundo Deportivo) Umumenyereza wa Atletico Madrid Diego Simeone yiteze gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha azomushikana mu 2024 - akaba yamaze gusaba ko uyu murwi watahukanye ihiganwa rya Espagne wogura umusatirizi wa Argentina Lautaro Martinez w'imyaka 23 asanzwe akina muri Inter Milan. (AS - in Spanish) Borussia Monchengladbach ishobora kwemera imirwi yotanga imiriyoni 40 z'ama euro ku mukinyi asanzwe ariko araronderwa na Leicester City, umudagi Jonas Hofmann w'imyaka 28, ariko bikavugwa ko imirwi Tottenham, Chelsea na Atletico Madrid nayo nyene yoba imushaka.  (Leicester Mercury) Ibiganiro hagati ya Real Betis n'umunya Paraguay akina inyuma Fabian Balbuena w'imyaka 29 bigeze kure, mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye na West Ham, agiye kurangira. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Vyitezwe ko muri iyi ndwi Tottenham yemeza igenwa ry'uwahoze amenyereza Juventus Fabio Paratici ngo ayibere umumenyereza mushasha, ni inyuma y'aho inaniriwe no kuzana Antonio Conte na we nyene yahoze amenyereza Juve na  Inter Milan. (Mirror) Muri iyi ndwi, Lazio ishobora kugena uwahoze amenyereza Juventus na Chelsea Maurizio Sarri, w'imyaka 62 ngo ayibere umumenyereza wayo mushasha.  (Corriere dello Sport - in Italian)

headline: Imvo n'Imvano ku musi mukuru wa Noheli abakristu kw'isi bibuka ivuka ry'umwana Yezu/Yesu
text: Ndabaramukije nongera ndabaha n'ikaze mu kiganiro c'Imvo n'Imvano co kuri uyu wa gatandatu igenekerezo rya 25 ukwezi kwa 12 mu 2021. Imvo n'Imvano y'uyu musi yerekeye umusi mukuru wa Noheli, aho abakristu hirya no hino kw'isi bibuka ivuka ry'umwana Yezu/Yesu. Buri mwaka, abemera Kristu imiliyoni n'imiliyoni hirya no hino kw'isi barahimbaza umusi mukuru wa Noheli. Noheli y'uyu mwaka, ibaye mu gihe ikiza Covid kibandanya kuvugwa mu bihugu bitandukanye kw'isi no mu gihe haherutse kugaragara ubundi bwoko bita Omicron bwandukira ku buryo bwihuta. Muri kino kiganiro, twahisemo guha umwanya abakunzi b'Imvo n'Imvano bifuje kutubwira uko bariko barahimbaza umusi mukuru wa Noheli, ari na ko tugenda tubashikiriza uturirimbo dutandukanye two guhimbaza uyu musi. None Noheli yiteguriwe gute muri iyi misi ikiza coronavirus cakwiragiye kw'isi? Ababa mu karere k'ibiyaga binini n'abari mu bindi bihugu eka mbere n'abari mu makambi y'impunzi bariko bayihimbaza gute? Inyishu ni muri kino kiganiro. Mugiye kuba hamwe na Cyriaque Muhawenayo, muri studios za BBC i Nairobi.

headline: Mali: Macron yatangaje ivanwa ry'ingabo inyuma y'imyaka icenda muri ico gihugu
text: Ubufaransa n'ibihugu bifatanije mu ngabo za Buraya bigiye kuvana ingabo zavyo muri Mali inyuma y'imyaka hafi cumi, nk'uko vyatangajwe na prezida Emmanuel Macron. Izo ngabo zari zimaze iyo myaka ziri mu  rugamba rwo kurwanya intagondwa z'aba Islam muri ico gihugu kuva mu 2013. Prezida Macron yavuze ko ingingo yo kuva muri ico gihugu  yatewe n'itituka ry'imigenderanire, mu gihe akagawi k'abasirikare bafashe ubutegetsi muri Mali kabandanya kugaragaza ko katerekwa Ubufaransa. Izo ngabo zica zirungikwa mu bindi bihugu vy'ako karere ka Sahel. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru i Paris ku wa kane, prezida Macron yavuze ati: "Ntidushobora kubandanya turi mu bikorwa vya gisirikare dukorana n'abantu bihariye ubutegetsi, bafise imikenyuro n'imigambi yinyegeje tutemera". Yahakanye ibivugwa ko kuva muri Mali ari ukwemera ko bananiwe aca ashimika avuga ko Ubufaransa buzoguma mu gikorwa co kurwanya ibikorwa vy'intagondwa z'aba Islam muri ako karere. Yamenyesheje ko igihugu ca Niger cemeye kwakira zimwe muri izo ngabo zizoba zikuwe muri Mali. Yavuze ati: "Ubufaransa bwagize uruhara rwo guhuriza hamwe inguvu  muri ico gikorwa mpuzamakungu co gufasha Sahel. "Tuzobandanya urwo ruhara rwo guhuriza hamwe". Igikorwa co kuvanayo izo ngabo, gitegekanijwe kumara ikiringo kiri hagati y'amezi ane n'amezi atandatu, catangajwe inyuma y'inama y'abategetsi ba Buraya na Afrika ku biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubufaransa, Champs Élysée, ku wa gatatu mw'ijoro. Mw'itangazo ryasohotse kuri uyu wa kane mu gitondo, ibihugu bifise uruhara mu mugwi wa Tabuka urongowe n'Ubufaransa rivuga ko bumvikanye ko gushika mu kwezi kwa gatandatu hazoba hashizweho imigambi yo kuguma bafasha  muri ako karere, na cane cane muri Niger no mu bihugu vy'ikigobe ca Guinee. Hafi ingabo 5.000 z'abafaransa ziri mu butumwa bwo kurwanya intangondwa z'aba Islam muri Sahel mu gikorwa kizwi nka Barkhane, izishika 2.400 zikaba ziri mu makambi atatu mu buraruko bwa Mali. Iyo karata iri aho munsi irerekana akarere ka Sahel n'ibihugu karimwo Ariko imigenderanire y'Ubufaransa na Mali, kimwe mu bihugu bikenye cane kw'isi, yaratitutse cane muri iyi minsi kuva igisirikare gifashe igihugu mw'itembagazwa ry'unbutegetsi ryabaye mu kwezi kw'umunani mu 2020. Ibintu vyunyutse kuruta mu kwezi guheze igihe abo basirikare bisubirako ku mwumvikano bari bemeye wo gutunganya amatora mu kwezi kwa kabiri hanyuma bakavuga ko bazoguma ku butegetsi gushika mu 2025, mu nyuma bagahava bakirukana uwuserukira Ubufaransa. Mu kwezi kwa 12, ibihugu birenga 10 vyo mu Burengerazuba vyiyamirije kandi  umuzo w'abacangero b'umugwi ushingiye mu Burusiya wa Wagner muri Mali. Uwo mugwi umaze kugira uruhara mu ntambara zitari nke zikomeye mu bihugu nka Syria, Mozambique, Sudan na Centrafrique. Amatohoza ya BBC yerekanye ko uwo mugwi ufise aho uhuriye n'ivyaha vyo mu ntambara muri Libya. Macron yagabishije avuga ko uwo mugwi waje "gukingira inyungu zawo n'iz'abari ku butegetsi ubwabo". Inkuru y'uko Ubufaransa bukuye akarenge ntiyakiriwe kumwe muri Mali. Umugabo umwe yabwiye BBC ko ivyo "bizozana amahoro mu buraruko bw'igihugu cacu kuko Uburusiya na Wagner ata nkeka ko bazoshigikira ingabo zacu", mu gihe uwundi yavuze ko  ingabo z'Ubufaransa muri Mali zananiwe. Ariko hari abandi bashikirije amakenga ko ibintu biriko birunyuka. Umwe mu bafise impungenge yabwiye BBC ati: "Ejo harabaye igitero  mu gice c'uburaruko bwa Mali... Abasirikare bacu bari mu gice co hagati. Bavuga ko ingabo ziriko zirigarurira uturere. Ariko aho ni mu majahagati y'igihugu gusa. Mu zindi ntara ho gute?" Ivanwa ry'ingabo z'Ubufaransa muri Mali rizogira ingaruka z'umutekano ku bindi bihugu vyo mu karere ka Sahel  navyo nyene bisanzwe bihanzwe n'intagomdwa za Islam. Umukuru wa Côte d'Ivoire Alassane Ouattara yagabishije ko iyo ngingo izosiga igihengeri kizosaba utundi twigoro ama reta y'ibihugu vyo mu karere. Ouattara ati: "Bizodusaba kwongereza ingabo kandi turushirizeho gukingira imbibe zacu." Ariko umukuru wa Senegal Macky Sall avuga ko atahura igituma Ubufaransa bwafashe ingingo yo kuva muri Mali, kandi yizeza ko urugamba rwo kurwanya intagondwa za Islam muri Sahel  ruzokomeza. Hagati aho umukuru wa Ghana  Nana Akufo-Addo yavuze ko ari nkenerwa cane ko ingabo za ONU ziguma zikora muri Mali n'ubwo Ubufaransa buvuyeyo. Umuvugizi wa ONU yavuze ati uko bigenda kwose hazoba "ingaruka ku bikorwa." Hari n'amakenga kuri kazoza k'intumwa za Buraya zo kwigisha abasirikare muri Mali , inyuma y'aho umushikiranganji w'Ubudagi ajejwe  kwivuna abansi Christine Lambrecht  avugiye ko  ata cizere afise ko Ubudagi buzobandanya ubwo butumwa. Yavuze ati: "Twamenye  ingingo y'Ubufaransa yo kuva  kuva muri Mali no kurangiza ubutumwa bwabwo muri ico gihugu, ingingo ata nkeka izogira ingaruka kubo bari bafatanije ubutumwa."

headline: China yanse umugambi wa OMS/WHO wo gukora ayandi matohoza ku mamuko ya Covid
text: Ubushinwa buriyamiriza ibisabwa n'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, vyo gukora ayandi matohoza ku mamuko y'ikiza-karanda ca Covid-19. Umukuru wa OMS Muganga Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus yateye akamo Ubushinwa ko bwokwifatanya n'abazokora ayo matohoza mu kurondera kumenya ingene uwu mugera watanguye, harimwo n'ubugenzuzi ku ma laboratoires. Zeng Yixin, icegera c'umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, avuga ko ibi  vyerekana "agakengere n'agasuzuguro mu bijanye n'ubuhinga". Avuga ko uwu mugambi ufise intumbero za poritike, rero ko Ubushinwa budashobora kuwihanganira. Mu kwa mbere uno mwaka, OMS yashoboye kurungika umurwi w'abahinga i Wuhan - igisagara catowemwo ubwa mbere uwo mugera mu kwa cumi na kabiri 2019 - kugira ngo bihweze amamuko y'iki kiza. Amatohoza yabo yerekanye ko hari amahirwe make cane y'uko coronavirus yoba yacorotse iva muri laboratoire, ariko abantu babandanya bibaza uko. Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, Dr Tedros yashikirije integuro y'aya matohoza agira kabiri asabwa, harimwo gukora umwihwezo ku bigo bijejwe ubushakashatsi mu bijanye n'ubuhinga mu turere twatowemwo uwo mugera ubwa mbere. Asaba Pékin/Beijing "gukorera mu muco, kudahisha na kimwe no gufashanya" n'abajejwe amatohoza kandi igatanga amakuru atatanzwe mu matohoza ya mbere ku barwayi ba mbere . Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru kuri uyu wa kane, Zeng yavuze ko aguye mu gahunwe yumvise ibisabwa na OMS kubera yibanda ahanini ku bivugwa ko Ubushinwa bwahonyanze ingingo ngenderwako zijanye n'ibikorwa vya laboratoire. Avuga ko Ubushinwa "budashobora" kwemera ibisabwa, yongerako kandi y'uko igihugu ubwaco catanze urutonde rw'ivyokorwa  ku bijanye n'amahotoza ku nkomoko y'uwu mugera. Reuters yasubiyemwo amajambo ya Zeng aho yavuga ati: "Twizeye ko OMS izokwihweza neza ivyiyumviro n'intumbero vyashikirijwe n'abahinga b'abashinwa hanyuma igakora amatohoza ku nkomoko ya Covid-19 yisunze ubuhinga, ikikurako abanyaporitike bagomba kuyinjirira". Yuan Zhiming, umukuru wa National Biosafety Laboratory yo ku kigo ca Wuhan cihweza ibijanye n'imigera, Wuhan Institute of Virology, nawe nyene yari muri ico kiganiro n'abanyamakuru. Yavuze ko uwu mugera ufise amamuko kama (origines naturelles), anashimangira ko atari umugera wacorotse laboratoire kandi ko ata mukozi wabo yigeze yandura kuva itangura mu 2019. Abantu barenga imiriyoni zine kw'isi yose baramaze guhitanwa n'iki kiza kuva cadutse, amakungu akaba abandanya asaba OMS gukora ayandi matohoza ku mamuko y'uwu mugera. Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika na we nyene yategetse abajejwe igendereza muri ico gihugu "kwongereza" inguvu mu twigoro twabo two gutohoza ibijanye n'iki kiza.

headline: USA: Ibiciro vy’igitoro vyakorotse ku buryo butari bwaboneke mu mateka yaho
text: Igiciro c'ibitoro muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika cakorotse cane ku buryo butari bwaboneke mu mateka y'ico gihugu. Ivyo bituma abahingura ico gitoro biba ngombwa ko babanza kuriha abakirangura kugira ngo bakibakureko, ku gutinya ko mu kwa gatanu bashobora kubura n'aho bagishira. Abagura igitoro baragabanutse rwose mu gihe ingingo zo kuguma  murugo ahatandukanye kw'isi yose zatumye abantu baguma biyugaranye. Vyatumye amahinguriro y'igitoro akodesha amatanki kugira ngo bashobore kubika ibitoro vy'umurengera, ibiciro mu gihugu cose bikoroka. Igiciro c'akagunguru muri West Texas Intermediate (WTI), ishingiro ry'igitoro ca Amerika, caramanutse kija musi y'amadorari 37.63 ku kagunguru. Stewart Glickman, umushakashatsi wo mu kigo ca Amerika Center for Financial Research and Analysis (CEFRA) kijejwe kwihweza ibijanye n'amafaranga avuga ati: "Ibiriko biraba birarengeye ubwenge. Igabanuka ry'abakiriya ryararengeye ivyo abantu bashobora kuba bari biteze". Avuga ko mu gihe izi ngingo za Guma murugo zobandanya uko ziri bishobora gutuma ibiciro vy'igitoro no mu kwa gatandatu bibandanya bikoroka. Ati: "Ni ukuri nta cizere mfise ko ibintu bishobora kworoha ku makompanyi adandaza igitoro canke ku biciro vyaco". Igisata c'igitoro kiri mu ngorane z'uko abagishaka bagabanutse kubera coronavirus hamwe n'ukutumvikana hagati y'ibihugu bisanzwe bicimbura. Mu ntango za kuno kwezi, ishirahamwe OPEP/ OPEC rihuza ibihugu vyimbura igitoro hamwe n'ibihugu bicuditse vyarahavuye birashika ku masezerano yo kugabanya urugero rw'igitoro cimburwa gushika hafi 10%. Muri ayo masezerano bumvikanye ko urugero rw'igitoro cimburwa rugabanywa ku buryo butari bwigere bubaho. Hagati aho, abahinga babona ko iryo gabanywa ata kintu kinini rizohindura. Stephen Innes ajejwe ubudandaji mu kigo Axicorp avuga ati: "Ntivyafashe umwanya muremure kugira ngo abadandaza igitoro babone ko amasezerano yashitsweko na OPEP/ OPEC - uravye ingene ameze ubu - atazoshobora gutuma  isoko y'igitoro isubira ku murongo". Ku bashoferi ba Amerika, ikoroka ry'ibiciro vy'igitoro - vyamanutse hafi ku bice 2/3  kuva mu ntango z'uyu mwaka - ryaragize ingaruka ku giciro co kw'ipompo, n'aho ejo ku wa mbere  bitakorotse uko vyari vyitezwe. Glickman ati: "Ikiriho ni uko, n'aho woba ukeneye kuja mw'ibarabara kubera imvo iyi canke iriya, ukenera igitoro gike cane gusumba uko vyari bimeze mu mezi ane aheze". "Ingorane nyamukuru kuri benshi muri twebwe ni uko n'aho wocuzuza, uzoja he?". Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika avuga ko leta ishobora kugura igitoro gihingurwa muri ico gihugu. Ariko amakenga ahari ni uko ububiko bwaco bushobora kurengerwa, mu gihe ububiko bw'ikompanyi Cushing, ikompanyi nkuru itanga igitoro muri Amerika, bwarengewe gushika ku bice 50% kuva mu kwa gatatu, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibanki ANZ.

headline: HRW isaba UN kubandanya ishinze ijisho ku Burundi ku gateka ka zina muntu
text: Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu riharanira agateka ka zina muntu, Human Rights Watch (HRW),  ritera akamo akanama ka ONU kajejwe umutekano kubandanya gushinga ijisho ku kungene agateka ka zina muntu kabandanya guhonyangwa mu Burundi. Iryo shirahamwe rivuga riti: "Ibikorwa bibi bijanye n'umutekano hamwe n'inkuru zerekeye ubwicanyi, kunyuruza no guhagarikwa bidakurikije amategeko birabandanya mu Burundi, n'aho hari habonetse icizere c'impinduka inyuma y'amatora ya prezida mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu 2020." Mw'itangazo ryo kw'itariki zine z'ukwezi kwa 12, ryashikirijwe n'igihugu ca Afrika y'epfo kirongoye akanama ka ONU kajejwe umutekano muri kino gihe, hafashwe ingingo yo guhagarika ivyegeranyo vy'urutavanako ku Burundi. Ariko bakabandanya kuganira ku kungene ibintu vyifashe muri ico gihugu mu manama agenewe Afrika y'ibiyaga binini n'iyo hagati. Avuga kuri iyo ngingo, Louis Charbonneau ashinzwe imigenderanire ya HRW na ONU agira ati: "Inama zerekeye Uburundi mu kanama ka ONU kajejwe umutekano zisigaye zitumvikanwako na bose kandi ntizibere ku gihe, mu gihe ico gihugu n'abagishigikiye bagerageza kuburizamwo igenzurwa ry'uko ibintu vyifashe. "Mu bisanzwe, ako kanama kazoguma kagenzura nk'uko kahora uko ibintu vyifashe mu Burundi, ariko abarundi benshi, iyo ngingo n'ubutumwa buteye amakenga mu gihe kitoroshe Uburundi burimwo." Gushika ubu reta y'Uburundi nta co iravuga kuri iryo tangazo, ariko yamye ivuga ko ivyo HRW ivuga ata shingiro bifise kandi bifise intumbero ya politike. Reta y'Uburundi yakiranye umunezero udasanzwe iryo jambo ryashikirijwe n'umukuru w'Inama ya ONU ijejwe umutekano, ku bijanye no gusaba ko Uburundi bwokurwa kuri urwo rutonde. Umukuru w'igihugu Évariste Ndayishimiye yanditse ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter ati: "Ndashimiye Inama Nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano kubona yakirije yompi akamo nayiteye mu nama ya bose." Kubw'iwe, gukura Uburundi ku rutonde rwigwako na ONU bifasha iki gihugu, incuti zaco n'abagenzi kwitaho iterambere n'imibereho myiza y'abenegihugu. Ingingo ya ONU ya 2303, yemejwe mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 2016 bivuye ku mutekano wariko urahungabana n'ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu, yategeka umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU kuza aragira icegeranyo cerekeye uko ibintu vyifashe mu Burundi buri mezi atatu.

headline: 'Bavuga ko ngiye kwiga ububoyi' - Nzitonda Steve Berger
text: Nzitonda Steve Berger aramaze kugira inzu yiwe y'uburiro (restaurant) mu gisagara ca Bujumbura  kandi yatanguye kwiga guteka bamutwenga ngo ariko ariga ububoyi. Uwo musore w'imyaka 32 avuga ko yatanguye gukunda guteka akiri muto, akaba yabigize umwuga afise imyaka 17. Ubu akoresha abakozi indwi. Ariko uwo musore avuga ko kwiga uwo mwuga mu gisagara bitari vyoroshe kuko benshi bamuca intege. Agira ati:"Guteka mu gisagara uri umuhungu, ntivyoroshe. Bamwe mu bagenzi bavuga ko ndiko ndiga umwuga w'ikiboyi". Nzitonda Steve avuga ko abavyeyi bamushigikiye kuko babona ariko akora ivyo akunda. Ati:"Barababwira amajambo ariko kubera babona ndabikunda barandetse. Aranyuzamwo akavuga ko " nkeka na bo nyene hari aho bashika bagakekeranya n'aho batabivuga". Mu bakiriya ba Steve Berger harimwo abamubona baje kugura imfungurwa bagakanguka babonye ari we ariko arabiteka. Darlene Nahayo ati:"Vyari bitangaje uje kugura ikintu ukabona wakiriwe n'umuhungu  hanyuma ukabona niwe ariko aranagitegura. Ubwa mbere twarakanguka." Ariko avuga ko ari ingendo nziza n'abandi bakwiye gukurikiza, bakabona ko ata mwuga udakiza kandi ata mwuga ugenewe abahungu canke abakobwa gusa.

headline: Igikombe c'isi 2022 - Ikirangaminsi c'inkino n'ibitsindo ikibiriraho
text: Kurikirana ngaha Igikombe c'isi mu mupira w'amaguru co muri Qatar 2022, kigira ica 22.

headline: Amahasa yavutse afatanye imitwe yatandukanijwe vy'imbonekarimwe muri Israel
text: Ayo mahasa (impanga)  y'abakobwa bari bavutse bafatanye ku gakomokomo babonanye ubwa mbere inyuma yo gutandukanywa mu gikorwa co kubagwa  muri Israel. Ico gikorwa camaze amasaha 12 mu kigo c'ubuvuzi  ca Soroka mu gisagara ca Beersheba camaze amezi gitegurwa, kandi harimwo no gushira icomeke ku mitwe yabo bompi. Abahinga mirongo bo muri Israel n'ahandi babigizemwo uruhara. Abo bakobwa, batavuzwe amazina, bivugwa ko bariko barakira neza. Eldad Silberstein, umuvugizi w'igisata co kubaga  aho mu kigo ca  Soroka yabwiye ikinyamakuru Channel 12 co muri Israel ko "Bahema kandi barya bo nyene ubwabo". Ni ubwa mbere bene ico gikorwa, kimaze kuba incuro 20 gusa kw'isi yose, kibera muri Israel. Impanga zifatanye ziri 'kugira inshuti ku ishuri' Papa yabatije impanga zari zifatanye bakazitandukanya Bashobora kuzobaho batandukanye? Amezi imbere y'uko babagwa,  mu mitwe yabo hashizwemwo udufuko twa silicone twongerezwamwo impwemu (nk'igipurizo) hanyuma tukaja turagurwa kugira dukwege canke tugarure urukoba. Urwo rukoba nirwo rwakoreshejwe mu kwugara imitwe yabo imaze gutandukanywa. Umwiteguro wagiyemwo kandi kubanza gukora igicapo ca 3D c'ikigirerenayo c'ayo mahasa, nk'uko bivugwa na Mickey Gideon, umuhinga wo kubaga ibijanye n'udutsi nsozabwenge (neuro-chirurgien). Yavuze ati : "Twanezerewe n'uko ibintu vyose vyagenze uko twari twavyifuje". Abo bakobwa bari bavutse mu kwezi kw'umunani mu 2020, bitezwe kuzobaho ubuzima busanzwe ata ngorane n'imwe.

headline: Burundi: Hilaire Manirakiza afasha abafise imbuga hwaniro kuduza ama 'vyuzi'
text: Hilaire Manirakiza yize bimugoye kubera uburyo aho yagiye arahagarika ubu akaba akora akazi katamenyerewe rwose ko gufasha abafise imbuga hwaniro na YouTube kwongereza ababakurikirana (Views). Uwo musore avuga ko yize ivyerekeye ubuhinga bwa none bw'itumatumanako mu mashure yisumbuye, avuga ko yize bimugoye bituma atabandanya kaminuza. Avuga ati:"Nahagaritse imyaka itanu ntiga kubera ubukene, ngaruka kubandanya umwaka w'icenda abo twigana bahejeje. "Narasubiriye ndamara umwaka ntiga banyirukanye kuko nari maze imyaka ibiri ntariha amahera y'ishure." YouTube, iriha abafise 'accounts' bivanye n'igitigiri c'abaraba video bashirako n'igihe bazimarako. Mu Burundi hari benshi bamaze gushinga YouTube channels bashirako videos bafise intumbero yo gukorera ayo mafaranga, vyuzi rero ni wo mukate wabo. Kuri Manirakiza n'abafise ubuhinga nk'ubwiwe n'abo guha vyuzi abo bafise. Ni ubuhinga bushasha bwo kurondera amahera n'aho hari abanebagura uko bukora, hamwe  n'ubwoko bw'amakuru ashirwa kuri izo mbuga mu kurondera vyuzi. Hilaire Manirakiza avuga ko agiheza ishure yaciye aronka akazi ko gufata amasanamu ku mboneshakure yo ku mbuga hwaniro, ariko mu nyuma amasezerano bari bafitaniye aza guhagara. Avuga ko yaciye yigira inama yo kwiga uko yobaho mu gufasha abafise imbuga hwaniro kuduza ama 'vyuzi' (views). Agira ati:"Abafise imbuga hwaniro bampemba hakurikijwe igikorwa bantumye ico ari co. "Uwo mfashije kuronka nk'ama vyuzi 1000 ku musi, ampa ibihumbi 15 vy'amarundi. "Birantunze kuko kuva bampagaritse ku kazi, inzu nguma ndayiriha uko nahora, gufungura canke kwambara ni kwa kundi." Mu kwezi kumwe amaze atanguye ico gikorwa, Manirakiza Hilaire amaze gufasha abantu barenga cumi kuduza ama vyuzi. N'akazi akorera aho ari ho hose, kuri telefone ngendanwa canke ku nyabwonko, ariko akavuga ko afise umugambi wo kwugurura ibiro vyo gukoreramwo. Ahanura urundi rwaruka kwicara rufise ikintu ruzi gukora ku buryo n'aho bokwirukana mu kazi k'ivyo wigiye, ushobora guca wikorera ivyawe.

headline: Burundi-Rwanda: Nta "mugwi w'inkozi z'ikibi wavuye mu Burundi uja mu Rwanda"
text: Igisirikare c'u Rwanda kivuga ko ico gitero c'abarwanyi ba FLN cabaye mw'ijoro ryo ku wa mungu mu gace ka Bweyeye mu karere ka Rusizi baturutse mw'ishamba ku ruhande rw'Uburundi muri komine Mabayi. Mw'itangazo rwasohoye kuri uyu wa kabiri, urwego rwo kwivuna abansi rw'Uburundi "rurabeshuje ko hoba hari umugwi w'inkozi z'ikibi wavuye mu Burundi ukaja mu Rwanda". Itangazo ry'igisirikare c'Urwanda rivuga ko abarwanyi babiri mu bateye bishwe n'ibikoresho vya gisirikare birimwo imyambaro ibiri  y'igirikare c'Uburundi bigafatwa. Igisirikare c'u Rwanda kivuga ko abateye basubijwe inyuma bakajabuka uruzi rwa  Ruhwa rutandukanya Mabayi mu Burundi na Bweyeye mu Rwanda, "basubira mw'ishamba rya Kibira aho bafise ibirindiro." N'ivyo nyene urwego rwo kwivuna abansi rw'Uburundi ruvuga ko "rubeshuje icese ayo makuru avuga ko ku butaka bw'Uburundi hoba hari umugwi w'inkozi z'ikibi zifise umugambi mubi ku gihugu c'Urwanda". Iryo tangazo ryateweko umukono na Colonel Floribert Biyereke avugira urwego rwo kwivuna abansi rw'Uburundi rirangiza rivuga ko ingabo z'Uburundi ''ziri ku rubibe Uburundi busangiye n'Urwanda zama ziriko zirakizura kugira zicungere neza umutekano aho ku rubibe". Uruhande rw'Uburundi ruvuga ko  amakuru avuga ico gitero rwayabonye ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi canke hwaniro (social media). Ntibiramenyekana niba impande zompi ku rwego rwa gisirikakare canke rw'imigenderanire hari ico ziravugana  ku vyerekeye  ico gitero. Si ubwa mbere Urwanda ruvuga ko hari abarwanyi ba Forces de Libération Nationale (FLN) batera ico gihugu baturutse mu Burundi. Ariko hari haheze amezi menshi ata gitero gishasha kivuzwe. Ahubwo ibihugu vyompi vyari bigize igihe bitera intambwe zo kunagura imigenderanire yavyo yahungabanye kuva mu 2015. Aho ni mu gihe Uburundi nabwo hari ivyo bwagiriza Urwanda harimwo guha indaro abashatse gutembagaza ubutegetsi mu Burundi mu  2015.

headline: Burundi: Leta ikemura gute ikibazo c'ikena ry'amahera y'agaciro?
text: Leta y'u Burundi iheruka gufata ingingo mu gisata c'ubutunzi n'urudandazwa benshi bavuga ko zigamije kugerageza kubungabunga amahera y'agaciro ari muri ico gihugu. Muri urwo rwego, Banki ya Republika y'u Burundi iherutse gufata itegeko riraba abinjirana amafaranga muri ico gihugu, harimwo n'abanyamahanga. Iryo tegeko ribabwiriza gukoresha amafranga y'amarundi mu kugura ibintu vyose imbere mu gihugu. Baterezwa kandi  kuvunjisha mu bigo vyemewe n'amategeko amafranga y'agaciro baba bafise, bashaka kuyakoresha. Iyo ngingo yakurikiranye n'iyindi igenga ukudandaza ubutare n'ayandi mabuye y'agaciro muri banki y'igihugu. Ikibazo c'ikena ry'amafatanga y'agaciro mu Burundi bivugwa ko coba kiva ahanini ku bihano u Burundi bwafatiwe n'ishirahamwe rya Buraya, ryahagaritse amahera ryaha ico gihugu kuva mu 2015 igihe hatangura ingorane za politike. Mu gushaka kumenya vyinshi kuri izo ngingo leta y'u Burundi iheruka gufata, Florentine Kwizera yavuganye na Faustin Ndikumana, umuhinga mu vy'ubutunzi. Ushobora kwumva ico kiganiro ngaha

headline: Uganda: Udukingirizo imiliyoni 4 tudakwije ibisabwa bagomba ko tuvanwa mu bantu
text: Abategetsi ba Uganda bategetse ko udukingirizo duherutse gutangwa incuro zibiri n'ishirahamwe Marie Stopes Uganda rijejwe irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza dukurwa mu bantu. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe na muganga Carole Sekimpi, arongoye Marie Stopes, avuga ati: "Turazi ko Life Guard ikwije ibisabwa n'amategeko. Ariko, izatanzwe ku ncuro zibiri ziheruka ntizikwije ivyo dusaba". Arashimangira ariko y'uko iyo ngingo yerekeye iziherutse gutangwa kuri izi ncuro zibiri za nyuma. Ikinyamakuru Daily Monitor kivuga ko utwo dukingirizo tungana n'imiliyoni zine. Ikigo kijejwe imiti muri Uganda (NDA) casohoye urwandiko mu kwezi guheze kivuga ko ibipimo vyerekana "udutoboro n'ibimenyetso bigaragaza ko utwo dukingirizo dushobora guturika". Muri urwo rwandiko, Victoria Nambasa, ajejwe kugenzura ko imiti ikwije ibisabwa n'amategeko muri ico kigo yanditse ati: "Tubahaye indwi zibiri kugira ngo mutwereke ingene muzoba mwazikuye mu bantu n'abakiriya bazoba bazisubije". Ibiharuro bitangwa n'ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara y'abantu muri Uganda bivuga ko udukingirizo hafi imiliyoni 800 ari two dukenewe ngo birinde imbanyi batipfuza, SIDA n'indwara ziciye mu mibonano mpuzabitsina.

headline: Premier Ligue: umufana ari mu minwe y'igipolisi kubera ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba
text: Igipolisi co mu gisagara ca Grand Manchester gitangaza ko cahagaritse umugabo yagirizwa amacakubiri y'urukoba mu rukino rwariko ruhuza Manchester City na Manchester United ku wa gatandatu. Mu gice ca kabiri c'urwo rukino rwabereye ku kibuga ca Man City, umukinyi w'umwirabure wo hagati wa Manchester United, Fred,  yatewe ibintu n'abakunzi ba Man City. Man City ivuga ko "yanabonye ireresi yakwiragijwe ku mbuga hwaniro" isa n'iyerekana umufana ariko yerekana ibimenyetso vy'inguge kuri uyo mukinyi wa Manchester United Frederico Rodrigues de Paula Santos, azwi cane nka Fred. City yaciye isohora itangazo imenyesha ko bagiye gukora amatohoza kuri ivyo bintu. Avugana n'ikinyamakuru c'inkino ca Brezili ESPN Brazil, uyo mukinyi w'umunya Brezili w'imyaka 26 avuga ko ari ibiterasoni kubona ibintu nk'ivyo bikivugwa mu mwaka wa 2019. Ati: " Turacari kumwe n'abantu bakiri inyuma. Birababaje kubona ibintu nk'ibi bigikorwa mu bibuga bimwe bimwe. Hano vyashitse, kandi vyarashikiye bagenzanje muri Ukraine". "Ni ibintu bibabaje, ariko nta mwanya bishobora kudutesha nk'uko bobo bavyipfuza. Navuganye n'umuhagarikizi urukino ruheze, ndizeye ko bazogira ico bakoze, nta bindi"! Mu gihe yari agiye gutera umupira wo mu mfuruka ku munota wa 67, vyabaye ngombwa ko abanza guhagarika agasubira mu kibuga inyuma y'aho abafana ba Manchester City bamuteye ibintu. Umukinyi mugenziwe wa Brezili, Fernandinho, akinira Manchester City, ari kumwe n'abandi bakinyi baciye basaba abafana babo gutekereza. Urukino rwagiye kubandanya haciye akanya, inyuma y'aho umuhagarikizi we nyene akuriye ivyo bintu bari bateye mu kibuga. Kick It Out, ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba, rivuga ko ryashikirijwe amakuru menshi cane rwose inyuma y'aho ayo mabi yerekaniwe n'ama camera. Kick It Out ivuga ko yiteze ko hazokorwa igishoboka cose kugira ngo ababikoze bamenyekane. Abamenyereza b'iyo mirwi barerekanye umubabaro udasanzwe inyuma y'iyo nyifato y'uwo mufana. Ole Gunnar Solskjaer, umumenyereza wa Manchester United avuga ko ivyo bintu "bidashobora kwihanganirwa". Ati: " Nabibonye mw'ireresi kandi ivyo ari vyo vyose uwabikoze ariyagiriza. Ni ikintu tudashobora kwihanganira kandi ndezeye ko uyo muntu ata rukino na rumwe azosubira kuja kuraba". Ku ruhande rwiwe, Pep Guardiola wa Man City avuga ko atipfuza gusubira kubona ibintu bijanye n'ikumira rishingiye ku rukoba. Ati: "Ni urugamba rwa minsi yose, ariko ikibabaje ni uko vyama biba ahantu henshi". Umukinyi Marcus Rashford wa Man United, nawe nyene aherutse gukorerwa ikibi nk'ico igihe yariko akinira umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza muri Bulgaria mu kw'icumi guheze, wewe abona ko kubivuga gusa bidakwiye. Ati: "Ivyo bintu twarabivuzeko cane mu mezi atandatu canke umunani aheze, ariko kubandanya tubivuga uko ntibihagije". "Inzego zibijejwe zikwiye gufata ingingo ruhasha kugira bihagarikwe. Ni ikintu giteza urubwa cane urukino n'igihugu". Umwe amaze guhagarikwa Mwitangazo casohoye ejo ku mugoroba, igipolisi ca Manchester catangaje ko cahagaritse umugabo w'imyaka 41 yagirizwa ako kabi. "Igipolisi caratabajwe ko hari umufana yerekanye inyifato avuga n'amajambo bishingiye kw'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba mu rukino rwariko ruhuza Manchester City na Manchester United". "Umugabo w'imyaka 41 yahagaritswe kubera yikekwa ko yahungabanije umutekano w'abanyagihugu yishimikije ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba, akaba ari mu gasho aho ariko arabazwa".

headline: Alexei Navalny: Amerika yafatiye ibihano Abarusiya
text: Reta Zunze Ubumwe zatangaje ko zifatiye ibihano Abarusiya kubera irogwa ry'uwutavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi Alexi Navaly. Ivyo bihano vyafatiwe bamwe bamwe mu bategetsi bo muri reta n'ibigo bimwe bimwe, kandi babisezeranye n'ishirahamwe rya Buraya,  nk'uko abategetsi ba Amerika babivuze. Bavuze ko iperereza ry'abanyamerika ryatahuye ko  reta y'Uburusiya ariyo yari inyuma y'uburozi bwahatswe kwica Navalny muri Siberie mu mwaka uheze. Navaly niwe azwi cane mu bantu banegura ubutegetsi bwa Prezida Vladmir Putin. Reta y'uburusiya irahakana kuba yaragize uruhara kandi ntiyemera ivyo abahinga b'ibigwanisho b'abanyaburaya batoye, ko ubwo burozi bwitwa Novichok bwakoreshejwe Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru, bavuze ko ivyo bihano vyafatiwe abategetsi indwi b'Uburusiya n'ibigo 14 bifise uruhara mu guhingura uburozi. Nta do n'ido batanze. "Kugerageza  kwica Navalny gukurikira ingendo yo gukoresha uburozi ikoreshwa n'Uburusiya'', nk'uko vyavuzwe n'umnwe mu bategetsi. Nivyo bihano vya mbere bifatiwe Uburusiya na reta ya Prezida Joe Biden. Yafashe ingendo ikaze gusumba uwo yasubiriye Donald Trump ku vyerekeye Prezida Putin. Amaze kuvugana kuri terefone na mugenzie w'Uburusiya mu kwezi guheze, Biden yavuze ko yasiguye atarya umunwa ko iminsi y'aho  Amerika "yasuka  uruho rw'amazi ku bikorwa vy'agasomborotso vy'Uburusiya, kwivanga mu matora,ubugizi bwa nabi buciye kuri interenet, guha uburozi abanyagihugu irangiye''. Mu buryo bakoze bumvikana, ishirahamwe rya Buraya ku wa kabiri ryatangaje ko ryafatiye ibihano abategetsi bane b'Uburusiya. Barimwo Alexandr Kalashnikov,umukuru w'amabohero mu Burusiya, Alexandr Bastrykin, umukuru w'urwego rw'amatohoza, umushikirizamanza mukuru kizigenza Igor Krasnov, na Viktor Zolotov, umukuru w'ingabo zicungera inzego z'igihugu. Ibihano birimwo kutemererwa kugira ingendo mu bihugu vyabifashe hamwe n'ugufatira ubutunzi bwabo. Umunyamakuru wa BBC ari Bruxelles Kevin Connolly avuvga ko ivyo bihano vyabaye  uguheberanira hagati y'ibihugu vyo mu kigobe ca Baltic, bibona Uburusiya nk'umubanyi abangamye, n'ibihugu- nk'Ubudagi - vyiyamabaza Uburusiya mu kugura umwuka (gaz). Uburusiya bwavuze iki kuri izo ngingo? Uburusiya bwari bwamaze kugira ico buvuga n'imbere y'uko Amerika n'Ishirahamwe rya Buraya batangaza izo ngingo. Ministre w'Uburusiya ajejwe imigenderanire Sergei Lavrov yari yavuze hakiri kare ko Abanyaburaya hari ivyo ''banyegeza vyofasha mu gutahura ivyashikiye'' Navalny kandi  ko bafatiye ibihano Uburusiya mu karenganyo. Yavuze ati: "Turamaze gushikiriza kenshi aho duhagaze ku bihano bitemewe...bifatwa na begenzi bacu bo muri Amerika n'abandi babafatirako akarorero, ishirahamwe rya Buraya.'' Yongeyoko ati reta yiwe izosubiriza mu ndumane ibihano vyose. Umuntu asanzwe agwanya ibiturire, amaze igihe kirekire ariwe muntu wa mbere agaragara cane mu batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bwa Putin. Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 44 ashikiriza ivyiyumviro vyiwe ku rubuga rwa internet (blogger), afise abantu baharurwa muri za miriyoni bamukurikira ku mbuga hwaniro. Yarashoboye gutuma bamwe mu bamushigikiye batorwa mu nama z'uburungozi muri Siberia mu 2020. Yararozwe aca ata ubwenge (aja muri coma) ari mu ndege imujanye muri Siberie mu kwezi kw'umunani mu mwaka uheze. Yaciye ajanwa n'indege mu Budagi, aho yavuriwe agakira. Mu kwezi kwa mbere yafashe ingingo yo gusubira mu Burusiya aho yashitse afatwa acururuka indege. Mu kwezi guheze sentare yashinze ko Navalny yarenze ku ngingo zo gutezurirwa akava mw'ibohero mu  rundi rubanza rujanye no kunyuruza  amafaranga mu kuba atitavye uwujejwe dosiye  yiwe igihe yari kwivuza mu Budagi. Umunyororo wo kutamushira mw'ibohero waciye uhinduka uwo kuja mw'ibohero mu kiringo c'imyaka ibiri n'amezi atandatu. Ku ndwi iheze niho yarungikwa mw'ibohero i Moscou gukora ico gihano. Navalny n'abamushigikiye bavuga ko ivyo yagirizwa vyose ari irementanya. Prezida Biden n'ishirahamwe rya Buraya basavye ko yorekurwa ubwo nyene.

headline: Umuntu yokura iki mu rukino rw’Intamba na Nigeria?
text: Robert Patrick Misigaro, BBC. Ku kibuga ca Alexandria Stadium mu muji wa Alexandria, ku kagoroba kameze neza izuba ryarenze ubushuhe bwagabanutse, niho Intamba mu Rugamba zaseseka mu kibuga ngo nazo zandike izina mu makungu. Ku nshuro ya mbere mw'ihiganwa nk'iri, benshi bari bazi ko bitaza kworoha kuko gutangura uhura n'ikipe y'igihangange muri Afrika nka Nigeria wari umurimo utoroshe. Ariko Intamba zari zifitiye icizere kidasanzwe, catanguye kwigaragariza mu kiganiro umumenyereza Olivier Niyungeko yahaye abanyamakuru ku wa gatanu, aho yavuga ko Intamba zitaje kurorera gusa. Mbere yanavuze ko ku rwego nk'uru rw'umukino, amakipe yose aba angana. Ivyo kandi niko vyagaragaye mu ntango z'urukino, Nigeria itangazwa n'abakinyi b'inyuma b'Intamba mu Rugamba ku kuntu bazibirira hamwe mu kwigenza neza kudasanzwe ku makipe atamenyereye amahiganwa nk'aya. Ntivyahereye kandi ku kuzibira gusa kuko iyo itaba umunyegoli wa Nigeria, ku nshuro zirenga zitatu zose mu gice ca mbere, Nigeria yari kuba yinjijwe. Abakunzi ba Nigeria bari mu kibuga, warabona ko batanguye kugira utubazo kuko abasatirizi babo ataco bariko barerekana, igice ca mbere gihera bose banganya. Vyaje guhinduka ku munota wa 77 aho Nigeria yashobora guca mu ryahumye abakinyi b'inyuma b'Intamba ikaronka igitsindo, abakunzi ba Nigeria hamwe n'abakinyi bose barigina cane ubona yuko basa n'abavuye kure. Nigeria vyaraboneka ko imenyereye gukina ku rwego rwo hejuru. Kandi ntibitangaje ku ikipe imaze gukina muri iri higanwa inshuro 17, ikaba imaze no gutwara iki gikombe inshuro zishika zibiri, ubwa nyuma bukaba bwari mu 2013. Ariko icerekanye ubudasa muri uru rukino, ni ubuhinga bw'abakinyi babiri ba Nigeria b'inararibonye, Odion Jude Ighalo akina mu Bushinwa, na Ahmed Musa akina muri Arabie Saudite, bahanahanye umupira n'ubuhinga bwinshi bashobora guca mu ryahumye abakinyi b'inyuma b'Intamba. Ni abakinyi binjiye mu gice ca kabiri bazi neza ico baje gukora, kuko kuva binjiye Nigeria yahinduye isura imbere, ibintu vyibonekeje ko wari umukenyuro w'umumenyereza Gernot Rohr. Ikindi naco ni uko ba rutahizamu b'u Burundi baterekanye ''amanyama'' akenewe kugira basatire cane mu gutera imipira iremereye, kuko uvyihweje, umunyegoli wa Nigeria ntihari kubura ikimuca mu jisho. Kuri ico umumenyereza Niyungeko nawe yaremeye ko akeneye gukorana cane na barutahizamu biwe ku kuntu bategerezwa kwitwara imbere y'igoli. Ku bwiwe ngo ni mu mutwe, si ikibazo c'ubuhinga. Muri rusangi uyu mukino warahaye icizere cane ikipe y'Intamba, kuko gutsindwa kimwe gusa na Nigeria mu mukino wa mbere mw'ihiganwa nk'iri ari ikintu cofatwa nk'intambwe ikomeye ku Ntamba. Gusa iyi kipe ikeneye kwongera ugushaka hamwe n'igikenye mu mikino ikurikira, kuko  uravye ingene ikipe ya Madagascar, nayo iri mw'iri higanwa ku nshuro ya mbere, yavyitwayemwo ihura na Guinea (2-2), harimwo ubudasa bukomeye cane kuko abasore bayo warabona ko ata gufyina kurimwo. Barakoresheje inguvu n'ugushaka kwinshi bahakura ibitsindo bibiri. Uku niko Intamba mu Rugamba zitegerezwa kuvyitwaramwo nizaba zishaka kubandanya muri iri higanwa. Ibishobisho vy'urukino rwa mbere bitegerezwa kuhava, umukino wa kigabo ugakurikira.

headline: A﻿yavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru ku w'Imana 09.10.2022
text: U﻿mukinyi w'imbere wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w'imyaka 37 ashobora kuba yaronse akaberu ko kuva muri Manchester United yerekeza muri Inter Miami, mu mugwi w'uwaze ari rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru David Beckham. (Sun) U﻿munyegoli wa Nice, umunye Danmark Kasper Schmeichel w'imyaka 35 arashobora kwimuka kandi mu kwezi kwa mbere, inyuma y'amezi atandatu gusa avuye mu mugwi wa Leicester.  (L'Equipe via Leicester Mercury) U﻿mugwi wa Barcelone uriko urarondera umukinyi w'inyuma mu buryo Diogo Dalot wa Manchester United, vyitezwe ko amasezerano y'uwo mukinyi wo muri Portugal w'imyaka 23 arangirana n'uyu mwaka.  (Sport) L﻿eeds United bumvikanye na Cody Gakpo, ubu bariko bararaba ingene uwo mukinyi wo muri Hollande w'imyaka 23 yokwimukira mu mugwi wa PSV Eindhoven . (Mirror) Southampton bariko bararondera umukinyi wa Celtic, umunye Portugal Filipe Jota w'imyaka 23.(Football Insider) Liverpool bari mu barondera kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Mali, Yves Bissouma w'imyaka 26 mu ci, imbere y'uko uwo mukinyi aja muri Tottenham Hotspur avuye muri Brighton. (The Athletic). Paris St-Germain ishaka kugarukana muri uwo mugwi Adrien Rabiot w'imyaka 27, ubu amasezerano yiwe afitaniye na Juventus yimirije kurangira mu ci riza.  (Fichajes) A﻿rsenal yananiwe kuzana umukinyi wa Juventus, Manuel Locatelli w'imyaka 24, inyuma y'aho uwo mukinyi wo hagati afatiye ingingo yo kuguma i Turin. (Football London) M﻿anchester United itegekanya kubonana n'abakurikirana inyungu za Alejandro Garnacho kugira bumvikane ku masezerano mashasha y'uwo mukinyi wo muri Argentine w'imyaka 18.  (AS via Sport Witness) Umukinyi w'imbere wa Roma, umwongereza Tammy Abraham w'imyaka 25 yarahiye ararengwa gusubira mu mugwi yarerewemwo wa Chelsea mu misi iri imbere.  (90 Min)

headline: US - Russia: Mu kiganiro ca mbere na Putin, Biden yagarutse ku vyo kwivanga mu matora
text: Umukuru wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Joe Biden yagabishije mugenziwe w'Uburusiya Vladimir Putin ku bijanye no kwivanga mu matora, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu, Maison Blanche/White House. Mu bindi bavuganye harimwo ibijanye n'imyiyerekano y'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ibandanya mu Burusiya hamwe n'amasezerano ya nyuma hagati ya Amerika n'Uburusiya ku bijanye n'ibirwanisho vy'ubumara. Perezida Putin yakeje umukuru w'igihugu mushasha wa Amerika ku ntsinzi yiwe mu matora aheruka, nk'uko biri mw'itangazo rya reta y'Uburusiya. Bompi bumvikanye kuzobandanya bavugana. Rimwe na rimwe, uwahoze ari umukuru wa Amerika Donald Trump yagiye atesha agaciro ubutegetsi bwiwe imbere y'Uburusiya akagirirzwa ko yubaha Putin birenze urugero. Ariko Barack Obama nawe yahoze arongoye Amerika- ico gihe Biden akaba yari icegera ciwe - yagirizwa ko yananiwe no gutera igitsure Uburusiya igihe bwigarurira Crimea, bugatera ubuseruko bwa Ukraine, bukanivanga no mu bibera muri Syria. "Perezida Biden yarasiguye neza ko Amerika izokoresha ubushobozi bwayo bwose mu gukingira inyungu z'igihugu ku bikorwa bizoba bikozwe n'Uburusiya mu guhungabanya Amerika canke ibihugu bigenzi vyayo", nk'uko biri mw'itangazo rya Amerika. Urwandiko rwerekana ivyo bavuganye ejo ku wa kabiri inyuma y'umutaga ruvuga ko aba bakuru b'ibihugu bompi bavuganye ku bijanye n'igitero ku nyabwonko za kompanyi SolarWinds cagirijwe Uburusiya. Bavuze kandi ku makuru avuga ko Kremlin yemereye agashimwe abazokwica abasirikare ba Amerika muri Afghanistani, hamwe kandi n'isumu yahawe uwutavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bw'Uburusiya, Alexei Navalny. Urwandiko rwa Kremlin narwo ruvuga ibijanye n'iki kiganiro nta na hamwe rwigeze ruvuga ko hari ibibazo vyashikirijwe na Perezida Biden bigatera impari, bikaba bizwi ko muri kahise Biden yahoze yita Perezida Putin ko ari "umuhimbiri wa KGB". Abategetsi b'Uburusiya bavuga ko umukuru w'igihugu cabo yavuze ko "imigenderanire myiza hagati y'Uburusiya na Amerika izoba ari ku nyungu z'ibi bihugu vyompi n'isi yose, mu gihe bose bazomenya ko bompi bafise igikorwa kidasanzwe co kubungabunga amahoro n'umutekano kw'isi". Itangazo rya Kremlin ryongeyeko riti: "Muri rusangi, ikiganiro hagati y'abarongoye Uburusiya na Amerika cari gishingiye ku bucuruzi n'ukuvugana ukuri". Aba bategetsi babiri basa n'abumvikanye kunagura amasezerano yo mu gihe ca Obama yo kugabanya ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda vy'ubumara. Aya masezerano yorangiye mu kwezi kuza, Perezida Trump akaba yari yarahiye ararengwa ko adashobora gusubira kuyaterako igikumu. Iki kiyago na Kremlin mu gihe Antony Blinken yagenywe na Perezida Biden ngo abe umunyamabanga wa reta ajejwe imigenderanire yari ahejeje kwemezwa n'inama nkenguzamateka ku majwi 78-22.

headline: Urucanco rwa coronavirus rugeze hehe ?
text: Mugihe ibitigiri vy'abantu bandura ikiza ca coronavirus biguma bigwira hose kw'isi, hitaweho kurondera urucanco. Twarishuye bimwe mu bibazo bikomeye bijanye n'incanco hamwe n'igihe gito gishoboka kugira haboneke urwa coronavirus. Incanco ni nk'abigisha - abanyeshule bazo ni abasoda b'umubiri, hanyuma ubumenyi bwabo, ni uburyo bwo kurwanya indwara zandukira. Incanco zishikana buke buke imigera canke udukoko dutera indwara (canke uduce duto twavyo) mu menyo y'abasoda b'umubiri. Uburyo bwo kwikingira bw'umubiri buca bumenya ko umwansi ateye, bukiga kumurwanya. Mugihe umubiri uba umaze gushikirwa n'uyo mugera, bituma umenya ingene ugwanya ubwo bwandure. Uburyo bwo  gucandaga ukoresheje uyo mugera  ni bwo  bumaze imyaka iharugwa mu mirongo  bukoreshwa. Incanco z'agasama n'amasambambwika zikoreshwa bifashishije iyo migera nyene itakigira ubukare, igatuma umubiri utandura hose. Urucanco rusanzwe rw'ibicurane, rufata ubwoko bwavyo buba bahari muri ico gihe rukabunesha rwose. Mu kurondera urucanco rwa coronavirus hakoreshwa ubundi buryo, kandi butarakoreshwa bw'urucanco bita "plug and play". Kubera tuzi uduce ndangamubiri turanga uyo mugera mushasha, bita Sars - cov-2, ubu turafise ibikenewe kugira twubake uyo mugera. Bamwe mu bashakashatsi bariko barakomeza uduhimba dutoduto twerekana imero z'uyo mugera badushira hamwe n'utundi bigatuma iyo migera itakaza ukubabaza. Ubu rero ushobora kwandura uyo mugera biciye ku gakoko gato cane  kandi bigatuma umubiri wigwanira umugera wa coronavirus. Iyindi migwi iriko irakora uduce dutoduto turanga umubiri (mbere n'uduce turanga umuntu bita ADN bivuye ku kuntu bazobikora) dutuma mugihe twinjijwe mu mubiri dutuma habaho imigera ntanganguvu ituma umubiri umenya ingene ubandanya wigwanira. Hamaze gukorwa iki kugira haboneke urucanco rwa mbere rwa coronavirus? Abashakashatsi baratanguje incanco kandi bariko baratangura kugerageza zimwe muri zo ku bikoko. Niyo rumwe murizo rwaboneka, ruzoboneka gute mu gihe ca vuba? Mu vy'ukuri ruzoboneka mu gice cambere co mu mwaka uza runyarutse. Hariho incanco ziriko  zigeragezwa  ku bikoko, niyo vyagenda neza rushobora kugeragezwa ku  bantu mu mwaka uza. Ariko naho abashakashatsi bokwigina kuboneka kw'urwo rucanco imbere ya Noheli, haracari ikibazo gikomeye c'ukuntu rwohingurwa ku bwinshi. Ibi vyose bibaye mu kiringo c'akanya gatoyi kandi hakoreshejwe uburyo butari bwakoreshwe, rero ntacemeza ko ibintu vyose bizogenda neza. Twibuke ko hari imigera ya coronavirus 4 iza iriko irazunguruka mu abantu. Itera ibicurane bisanzwe kandi nta n'umwe turaronkera urucanco. Rushobora kuzokingira abantu b'imyaka yose? Uko bizogenda kwose, nta kanini ruzomarira amantu bashaje. Si amakosa y'urwo rucanco, gusa ni uko abasoda b'umubiri bashaje batakira neza incanco. Ibi vyibonekeza buri mwaka ku rukingo rw'ibicurane. Imiti yose, mbere na paracetamol, irafise ingaruka mbi. Ariko mu gihe rutarakoreshwa ku bantu, biragoye kumenye ingaruka z'urucanco rukigeragezwa. Mu gihe hataraboneka urucanco, ni iyihe miti ikoreshwa? Incanco zikinga ubwandu kandi kuri ubu uburyo bwiza bwo kubikora ni ukugira isuku. Wanduye, womenya yuko ku bantu benshi ata kuremba kwa cane kuba. Hari imiti imwe ivura imigera iriko rakorerwa ibipimo, ariko ntitwovuga neza na neza ko ari iyikora. Ku bantu boba bafise ubwandu bw'uyo mugera, benshi barababaje. Hariho imiti iriko irageragezwa kuribo, ariko ntitwovugako tuzi neza ko ikora neza.

headline: Wagner: Ivyakozwe n'abacangero ba Russia muri Libya vyashizwe ahabona
text: Amatohoza mashasha ya BBC yashize ahabona urugero rw'ibikorwa vya gisirikare vyakozwe n'umurwi w'abacangero b'Abarusiya ukorera mu kinyegero mu ntambara yo muri Libya, bifitaniye isano n'ivyaha vyo mu ntambara n'igisirikare c'Uburusiya.
