Terefone ngendanwa ya Samsung yatawe n'umurwanyi w'umurwi Wagner irerekana uruhara wagize - hamwe n'amazina yo kwiyoberanya abarwanyi bakoresha. Hanyuma kandi BBC ifise "urutonde" rw'ibikoresho vya gisirikare bigezweho abahinga bavuga ko ahantu honyene vyashobora kuva ari mu gisirikare c'Uburusiya. Uburusiya burahakana ko ataho buhuriye na Wagner. Uwu murwi watanguye kumenyekana mu 2014 igihe wari ushigikiye uruhande rwagomba kwiyonkora, rwari rushigikiwe n'Uburusiya mu ntambara yo mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Ico gihe, wagiye wibonekeza mu bice bitandukanye vy'isi harimwo Syria, Mozambique, Sudan, no muri Centrafrique. Abarwanyi ba Wagner bagiye kuboneka muri Libya mu kwa kane mu 2019 igihe bahambije ingabo z'umu mujenerali yarwanya ubutegetsi, Khalifa Haftar, igihe agabiye igitero kuri reta y'ico gihugu yari ishigikiwe na ONU ku mugwa mukuru, Tripoli. Iyi ntambara yagiye kurangira habaye amasezerano yo kuyihagarika mu kw'icumi mu 2020. Uwu murwi ukorera mw'ibanga rikomeye, ariko BBC yashoboye kuvugana mu buryo budasanzwe na babiri mu bahoze ari abarwanyi bawo. Barahishuye ibirabwa ko muntu ashobora kwinjira muri Wagner - n'ingene ari umurwi utagira amategeko ngenderwako. Nta gukekeranya ko bica impfungwa  - ikintu umwe mu bahoze ari abarwanyi bawo yemeza atarya umunwa. "Nta n'umwe akeneye kugaburira uwundi munwa". Iki kiza gishigikira ibiri mw'ireresi (documentaire)  yiswe Haftar's Russian Mercenaries: Inside the Wagner Group - yateguwe n'ibisata vya BBC  bitangaza amakuru mu carabu no mu kirusiya. Mu bindi vyerekanwa muri yo harimwo ibivugwa ko ari ivyaha vyo mu ntambara, harimwo n'ubwicanyi bwakorewe abasivire n'ibigirankana. Umunyagihugu wo mu kigwati kimwe avuga ko yigize uwapfuye igihe abo mu muryango wiwe bariko  baragandagurwa. Ivyo yavuze vyarafashije BBC kumenya uwikekwa ko ari we yabishe. Asigura ikindi cerekana ivyaha vyo mu ntambara, umusirikare wa reta ya Libya aribuka ingene umugenzi bakorana yishikanye  ku barwanyi ba Wagner ariko akaba yaciye araswa amasasu abiri mu nda. Kuva ico gihe ntiyigeze asubira kumubona, co kimwe n'abandi bagenzi batatu bafashwe ico gihe nyene. Iyo terefone ya Samsung irerekana kandi uruhara rw'abo bacangero mu gucukura ubutare no mu gutega imitego mu turere tubamwo abasivire. Gutega ama mines udashizeho ikimenyetso ni icaha co mu ntambara. Iyi terefone ngendanwa yatawe n'umurwanyi wa Wagner atazwi igihe abarwanyi w'uwu murwi basubira inyuma bavuye mu turere two mu bumanuko bwa Tripoli  ku mpeshi yo mu 2020. Muri yo harimwo amakarata yanditse mu kirusiya aberekana bari ku rugamba, ivyerekana uruhara rudasanzwe rw'uwu murwi Wagner n'ibikorwa vyawo vya gisirikare. Harimwo amashusho ya drone hamwe n'amazina abarwanyi ba Wagner bakoresha, harimwo n'uwo BBC ivuga ko yamenyemwo. Iyi terefone ngendanwa ibitswe ahadata. Urutonde rw'ibirwanisho n'ibindi bikoresho vya gisirikare ruri ku mpapuro 10  ziri mu rwandiko rwo ku wa 19 z'ukwa mbere 2020, rukaba rwahawe BBC n'umukozi wo mw'igendereza rya Libya, rushobora kuba rwatowe ahahoze hari abarwanyi ba Wagner. Uru rwandiko rwerekana abashobora kuba ari bo batanga uburyo bw'amafaranga mu gushigikira urugamba. Rwerekana ibikoresho bikenewe kugira ngo bashike ku "ntumbero ya gisirikare" - harimwo vya bimodoka vya burende (blinde) bine, inkoho za kalashnikov ziharurwa mu majana hamwe n'ivyuma vya radar bigezweho. Umuhinga mu vya gisirikare yabwiye BBC ko ubuhinga bumwe bumwe bwo guhingura ivyo birwanisho bushobora kuba burangwa mu gisirikare c'Uburusiya honyene. Uwundi muhinga, uyu akaba ari umuhinga mu bijanye n'umurwi wa Wagner, avuga ko uru rutonde rushobora kuba rwerekana uruhara rwa Dmitry Utkin. Uyu yahoze akora mu gisata c'igendereza ry'igisirikare c'Uburusiya avugwa ko ari we yashinze uwu murwi Wagner ari na we yawuhaye iryo zina (izina ryahoze ari iritazirano ryiwe). BBC yaragerageje kurondera Dmitry Utkin ariko vyaranse. Hanyuma mu mwihwezo wakozwe kuri uru rutonde hamwe no mu rundi rwandiko, uyu muhinga avuga ko amajambo  Evro Polis na General Director yerekana uruhara rwa Yevgeny Prigozhin, umurwizatunga afitaniye ubugenzi bwa hafi cane na Perezida Vladimir Putin. Igisata kijejwe ikigega ca Amerika (US Treasury) carafatiye ibihano Evro Polis mu 2018, kivuga ko ari ikompanyi y'Uburusiya yakodeshejwe kugira ngo "ikingire" ibibanza vyo muri  Syria bicukurwamwo igitoro "bigenzurwa canke vyegukira" Prigozhin. Amatohoza yakozwe n'abanyamakuru bo mu burengero bw'isi yerekana ko hari isano hagati ya Prigozhin na Wagner. Abandanya ahakana ko ata sano na rimwe afitaniye na Evro Polis canke Wagner. Umuvugizi yabwiye BBC ko Yevgeny Prigozhin ata migenderanire n'imwe afitaniye na Evro Polis canke Wagner. Prigozhin avuga ko ata kintu na kimwe arigera yumva ku vyerekeye ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu muri Libya ryakozwe n'Abarusiya: "Ndazi neza ko iki ari ikinyoma ceruye". Ubushikiranganji bw'Uburusiya bujejwe imigenderanire bwabwiye BBC ko buriko burakora "ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo bushigikire agahengwe n'utwigoro two gutorera umuti ikibazo ca Libya biciye mu nzira ya poritike". Ubu bushikiranganji bwongerako y'uko ibivugwa kuri Wagner muri Libya bishingiye "ku makuru y'ibinyoma" kandi ko bifise intumbero yo "gucafuza poritike y'Uburusiya" muri Libya. Uwu murwi ntubaho ku mugaragaro, ariko abantu bagera ku 10,000 bemeza ko bagiranye amasezerano n'imiburiburi incuro imwe na Wagner kuva itangura kurwana n'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bw'Uburusiya mu buseruko bwa Ukraine mu 2014. Abarwanyi b'aba Wagner bababa 1000 nibo bavugwa ko barwanye ku ruhande rwa Jenerali Khalifa Haftar muri Libya kuva 2019 gushika 2020. BBC mu Burusiya yarasavye umwe mu bahoze ari abarwanyi gusigura ico ari co Wagner. Yishuye ati: "Ni umurwi ufise intumbero yo gutsimbataza no gushigikira inyungu za reta hanze y'imbibe z'igihugu cacu". Nayo ku bijanye n'abarwanyi bayo, avuga ko hamwe usanga ari "abantu bamenyereye ivyo kurwana", abantu barondera akazi canke abakunda igihugu bashaka kugikorera. Uwundi yahoze ari umurwanyi yabwiye BBC ko ata mategeko ngenderwako atomoye uwu murwi ufise. Iyo uwufashwe ata makuru afise atanga, canke adashoboye gukora nk'"umucakara", aha rero "igikurikira kirazwi". Andrey Chuprygin, umuhinga akorana n'inama mpuzamakungu mpanuzwajambo y'Uburusiya (Conseil international de Russie/Russia International Council), avuga ko Uburusiya bwavuga buti: "Reka binjire muri iki kintu, hanyuma turabe ingene bigenda. Tubonye harimwo akarusho, turashobora kugikoresha ku nyungu zacu. Tubonye ivyaco bibaye nabi, twebwe ntaco tuzokibazwako". Itembagazwa rya Gaddafi mu 2011: Ubutegetsi bwa Col Muammar Gaddafi bwari bumaze imyaka irenga mirongo ine bwagiye kurangira muri ca gihuhusi c'imigumuko y'abarabu. Yaragerageje guhunga ariko yarafashwe aricwa. Igihugu carasambutse: inyuma ya  2014, hadutse imirwi yari ihanganye mu buseruko no mu burengero Intambara zashitse i Tripoli mu kwa kane mu  2019: Jenerali Haftar arongoye ingabo zarwanira mu buseruko, yarateye umugwa mukuru Tripoli na reta yari ishigikiwe na ONU. Impande zompi zari zifise ibihugu vy'akarere bizishigikiye mu vya gisirikare n'imigenderanire, n'aho igihugu cari mu bihano cafatiwe na ONU Agahengwe mu kw'icumi mu 2020: Hanyuma mu ntango za 2021 hashinzwe reta y'ubumwe kugira ngo itegure amatora mu kw'icumi na kabiri. Abarwanyi mvakamkungu n'abacangero bategerezwa kuba bagiye, ariko hari ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bakiri mu gihugu.

headline: India: Ingene umwambaro wa hijab wambarwa n'abagore bo muri Islam uteje ibibazo
text: Intara yo mu Buhindi yugaye amashure yisumbuye na kaminuza biturutse ku kibazo c'umwambaro wa hijab kiriko gikurikiranirwa hagufi n'amakungu inyuma y'aho uwuharanira agateka ka muntu Malala Yousafzai yatsindiye agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel avyinjiriyemwo. Reta y'intara ya Karnataka iri mu bumanuko bw'Ubuhindi yafashe iyi ngingo inyuma y'aho abanyeshure bihereye amabarabara mu myiyerekano ishingiye ku bakobwa bambara uwu mwambaro wo mw'idini rya Islam, imyiyerekano yandurutsemwo imigumuko. Kuri uyu wa gatatu, sentare nkuru y'iyo ntara itegekanya kwiga ku rwandiko ruvugira abagore b'aba Islam. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'aho abanyeshure batandatu b'urwaruka bagiriye imyiyerekano imbere y'ishure ryegukira reta ku kibazo co kwambara hijab, imyiyerekano yaciye ikwiragira ku yandi mashure. Abanyeshure batari bake b'aba Hindu nabo baciye biha amabarabara bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu  - ibara ry'ikimenyetso c'idini rya Hindu - mu kwiyamiriza abakobwa b'aba Islam bambara hijab. Ejo ku wa kabiri, umupfasoni Malala - umugore yarokotse igitero c'aba Taliban muri Pakistan afise imyaka 15 ahorwa ko yariko avugira abakobwa ko boronswa uburenganzira bwo kwiga  - yateye akamo abategetsi b'Ubuhindi ko bogira ico bakoze kugira "bahagarike inenwa abagore b'aba Islam bakorerwa". Uyu mupfasoni w'imyaka 24 yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Kubuza abakobwa kuja kw'ishure bambaye hijab zabo ni ibintu bibabaje. Ivyo gufata nabi abagore birabandanya - kubera uko bambaye". Mu Buhindi, uru ruhagarara rwongereje ubwoba n'ishavu mu nkehwa z'aba Islam bavuga ko ibwirizwashingiro ribaha uburenganzira bwo guhitamwo ivyo bambara. Ejo ku wa kabiri, amareresi yakwiragiye cane yerekana umukobwa w'umu Islam ariko azomerwa n'ikirwi c'abagabo bakiri bato  bamuvugiriza induru, n'impari zikomeye hagati y'abanyeshure bambaye hijab n'abandi bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu. Mu bintu bidakunze kuba, umucamanza ariko arakurikirana uru rubanza yateye akamo abanyeshure hamwe n'abandi "kubungabunga amahoro n'umutekano". Ikibazo catanguye kuja hejuru igihe abanyeshure batandatu biga kw'ishure ryisumbuye ryo mu karere ka Udupi mu ntara ya Karnataka batangura imyiyerekano kubera bari babujijwe kuja mw'ishure bambaye hijab. Udupi ni kamwe mu turere dutatu tugize intara ya Karnataka iri ku nkengera - ari naho higanje umugambwe Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) w'umushikiranganji wa mbere Narendra Modi. Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bafata ko iyo ntara ari icicaro gitegurirwamwo poritike y'aba Hindu ari na bo benshi mu gihugu. Umugambwe BJP kandi ni wo urongoye iyi ntara ya Karnataka. Iri shure rivuga ko ryemereye abanyeshure kwambara hijab mu gihe bari mu kigo, ariko bagasabwa gusa kuzikura iyo bari mu masomero. Ariko abari mu myiyerekano  - bose bakaba bari mu mwambaro w'ishure - bavuga ko ari ngombwa ko bemererwa gupfuka imishatsi yabo mu masomero. Umwe muri aba banyeshure Almas AH, yabwiye BBC Hindi ati: "Turafise abigisha bakeya b'abagabo. Rero ni ngombwa ko dupfuka imishatsi yacu imbere y'abagao. Ni co gituma twambara hijab". Aba banyeshure barahakana ivyo bagirizwa ko bazambara babitegetswe n'umurwi Campus Front of India - ishami ry'umurwi w'abanyeshure ugendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vya Islam, Popular Front of India - ari na wo ubavugira. Si kenshi abagore bakunze kuboneka bambaye hijab na burka (umwitwikiro w'umubiri wose mw'idini rya Islam) mu Buhindi, aho kwerekana ibimenyetso vy'idini ku mugaragaro ari ibintu bisanzwe. Ariko umukuru w'iri shure avuga ko ari ngombwa ku mwigisha kubona abanyeshure mu maso, kandi ko umwambaro w'ishure utuma ata vangura riba mu banyeshure. Inama z'urutavanako hagati y'abanyeshure, abarongoye ishure hamwe n'abaserukira reta ntaco zashitseko. Ikibazo c'abanyeshure b'abakobwa b'aba Islam bambara hijab carakwiye mu yandi mashure makuru makeya y'i Karnataka, ariko cagiye kurenga inkombe igihe amasanamu y'aba bakobwa bari mu myiyerekano i Udupi akwirakwirijwe. Ubwo nyene, abanyeshure b'aba Hindu mu yandi mashure amwe amwe baciye batangura kuza mu masomero bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu  - ivyatumye abarongoye ishure bategeka ko iyi myambaro yompi itemewe mu bigo. Mu ndwi iheze, ireresi yafatiwe kw'ishure rikuru rya Kundapur mu karere ka Udupi yerekana abanyeshure bambaye hijab bankiwe kurengana bariyeri, yatumye ibintu biyangara. Imirwi y'abanyeshure b'aba Hindu  - abahungu n'abakobwa - nabo baciye batangura imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza bagenzi babo bigana bambaye hijab. Gusa nta mishamirano yari bwabe gushika ejo ku wa kabiri - hasigaye amasaha makeya ngo sentare itangure kwiga urwo rwandiko - aho baciye batangura guterana amabuye mbere baranaturira mu bisagara bimwe bimwe. Abategetsi b'abakere baciye bashira mu ngiro ingingo ya 144 (Section 144) - itegeko ryo mu gihe c'ubukoloni ryabuza abantu barenga bane gukoranira hamwe - mu ntumbero yo guhagarika iyi migumuko. Mu karere ka Shivamogga, umurwi w'abanyeshure b'abahungu bafashwe amashusho baduza ibendera ry'umutugutu kw'ishure ryabo, reta ica itangaza ko hagiye gukorwa amatohoza. Mu karere ka Mandya, ireresi yazungurutse cane yerekana umukobwa yambaye burka asugerezwa n'umurwi w'abagabo bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu. Mu gihe babandanya bamuzomera bavuga ngo Jai Shri Ram (twogereranya na 'Mana nziza'), nawe yarihagarayeko, ashira ijwi hejuru ati "Allah Akbar" (Imana ni yo nkuru) mu gihe abarongoye ishure bamuherekeza bamuvanaho. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Mu nyuma, uyo mugore azwi kw'izina rya Muskan yavuze ko umukuru w'iryo shure yamwemereye ko azomushigikira. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru The Indian Express ati: "Hari abandi bakobwa b'aba Islam na bo nyene bazomerewe nk'uku. Abarongoye ishure be n'umukuru waryo ubwiwe ntibigeze batubuza kwambara burka, none ni kubera iki nokwumviriza abo hanze?" Umutegetsi mukuru mu gipolisi yabwiye BBC Hindi ko ibi ari "ikibazo gito" kandi ko bafise ibintu mu minwe. Reta y'intara ivuga iki? Umushikiranganji w'indero w'intara ya Karnataka Nagesh ashigikiye abategetsi b'ishure bavuga ko, vyaba ibitambara n'ibisikafu vy'umutugutu, vyaba ibitambara vy'imyitwikiro, vyose ntivyemewe mu bigo vy'amashure. Avuga kandi ko aba banyeshure bagumuwe "n'inkozi z'ikibi". Afatiye ku kungene ishami rya poritike ry'umurwi Popular Front of India ririko rigerageza gushinga imizi mu karere ko ku nkengera, Nagesh yabwiye BBC Hindi ati: "Vyose bishingiye kuri poritike. Ibi vyose biriko biba kubera amatora yimirije mu mwaka uza". Sentare ivuga iki gushika ubu? Sentare yahawe inzandiko zibiri zivugira abari muri iyi myiyerekano. Rumwe ruvuga ko ibwirizwashingoro ry'Ubuhindi ritanga uburenganzira kuri buri muntu guhitamwo ivyo yambara. Urundi narwo rukarwanya itegeko riherutse gushingwa na reta y'intara ritegeka inyambaro yemewe mu mashure, ribuza ibitambara vyo mu mutwe n'ama hijab. Imbere y'uko urubanza rutangura kwigwa, igihe umushingwamanza yari asavye ko rwunguruzwa, umucamanza Krishna Dixit yaranse. Ati: "Ibishobisho vyose bigume hanze. Ibwirizwashingiro ni Bhagavad Gita (igitabo ceranda c'aba Hindu). Jewe nzokorera ku ndahiro nagize igihe ntangura akazi. Si vyiza ko abanyeshure baguma hanze". Uyu mushingwamanza aburanira abari mu myiyerekano avuga ko itegeko rya reta ribuza hijab riteye kubiri n'amategeko kandi ko rihonyanga ibwirizwashingiro - agasaba kandi ko sentare ifata ingingo mfatakibanza yokwemerera abanyeshure kubandanya biga imbere y'uko ibibazo bitangura.

headline: Coronavirus: Ubushinwa buhimiriza imiti kama mu kuvura ako karanda
text: Mu gihe abahinga bari mu ntambara yo kurondera urucanco rwa Covid-19, Ubushinwa bubandanya bushira imbere imiti kama izwi kw'izina rya TCM nk'uburyo bwo kuvura iyo ndwara. Urwandiko ruherutse gusohorwa na leta y'Ubushinwa ruvuga ko ibice 92% vy'abanduye Covid-19 muri ico gihugu bavuwe hakoreshejwe iyo miti. TCM ni imiti imaze igihe kirekire cane ikaba igizwe n'ivyatsi bivangwa bikavugutwa hamwe n'iyindi yo kwirasaga yakunzwe gukoreshwa na Tai Chi. Ni imiti izwi cane mu Bushinwa kuva imyaka n'imyaka, n'aho rimwe na rimwe vyashika hakaba impari zikomeye ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi ku bijanye n'ikoreshwa ryayo. Abahinga bavuga ko Ubushinwa buriko burondera gukwiragiza iyo miti haba mu gihugu hagati canke hanze, ariko abahinga muvyo amagara y'abantu bagumana impungenge ku bijanye n'ubushobozi bwayo bwo kuvura. Mu mategeko ngenderwako ajanye no guhangana na coronavirus, umurwi w'igihugu ujejwe amagara y'abantu warashizemwo ikigabane cerekana ikoreshwa ry'iyo miti, mu gihe ibinyamakuru vya leta bimaze igihe vyerekana uruhara rwayo mu kuvura indwara z'ivyaduka muri kahise, nk'akarorero ikiza ca SARS mu 2003. Hari imiti kama ishika ku ndwi yamamajwe cane nk'imiti ya Covid-19, ibiri muri yo yabaye rurangiranwa ikaba yitwa Lianhua Qingwen - umuvango w'ubwoko 13 bw'ivyatsi bizwi nka forsythia suspense na rhodiola rose - hamwe na Jinhua Qinggan - wakozwe mu gihe c'indwara y'icaduka H1N1 yo mu 2009, ukaba ugizwe n'ubwoko 12 bw'ivyatsi. Abashigikiye ikoreshwa ry'iyo miti bavuga ko ata ngorane uyikoresheje agira, ariko abahinga bavuga ko hakenewe gukorwa ivyigwa vyo kugerageza iyo miti imbere y'uko yemerwa ko ari iyo ukuri. Ikigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu muri Amerika kivuga ko ari vyo ko iyo miti ishobora gupfupfahaza mu kugabanya ububabare kanaka, ariko ko ibijanye n'uko iyo miti ivura coronavirus bitaremezwa. Edzard Ernst, umushakashatsi w'umukukuruke mu bijanye n'imiti, yasubiwemwo amajambo n'ikinyamakuru Nature c'ubushakashatsi ati: "Kuri iyo miti kama, nta cemezo na kimwe co kuyizera gihari, rero uretse ko ikoreshwa ryayo ritemejwe, rifise ingaruka mbi cane". Hagati aho, urugero rw'ikoreshwa ry'iyo miti ruriko rwiyongera cane mu Bushinwa, kandi no kw'isi iriko iraronderwa. Mu mwaka uheze, ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu mu Bushinwa vyavuze ko gushika mu mpera za 2020 imiti kama ishobora kuzoba yinjirije ico gihugu imiliyaridi 420 z'amadorari. Perezida Xi avugwa ko "ashigikiye bikomeye" uwo mugirwa wo muri kahise avuga ko "ari itunga rya kahise k'Ubushinwa". Ariko, Yanzhong Huang, umushakashatsi mukuru muvyo amagara y'abantu mu gisata kijejwe imigenderanire, amenyesha ko "igisata c'imiti kama kiriko gihura n'ibibazo bijanye n'umutekano n'inguvu z'iyo miti, kandi ko Abashinwa hafi bose bipfuza imiti ya none gusumba imiti kama". Mu mwaka uheze, ibipimo vyakozwe kuri yo n'ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe kwihweza imfungurwa n'imiti casanze harimwo isumu. N'aho Ubushinwa bubandanya utwigoro two gukwiragiza iyo miti kw'isi, abantu benshi hanze y'ico gihugu ntayo bazi. Abanegura ico gihugu bacagiriza ko kiriko gikoresha coronavirus nk'inzira yo gukwiragiza iyo miti mu mahanga - ikirego camye ciyamirizwa mu binyamakuru vya leta. Hagati aho, Ubushinwa bubandanya bukwiragiza iyo miti hamwe n'abahinga bayo hampande y'imiti n'ibikoresho burungika muri Afrika, Aziya yo hagati hamwe n'i Bulaya. Yu Yanhong, icegera c'umukuru w'igisata kijejwe ikoreshwa ry'imiti kama y'u Bushinwa, mu kwa gatatu yavuze ati: "Turipfuza gusangiza 'ubuhinga dufise' mu kuvura Covid-19, kandi n'ibihugu vyinshi bikamenya, bigatahura kandi bigakoresha imiti kama y'Ubushinwa". Bwana Huang abona ko uguhimiriza ikoreshwa ry'imiti kama y'Ubushinwa hanze bitumwa n'ugushaka kugira inguvu mu makungu. Avuga ati: "Imvugo y'uko imiti kama y'Ubushinwa ivura Covid-19 ifasha kandi kwerekana ko uburyo Ubushinwa bwakoresheje mu kurwanya Covid ari bwo bufise inguvu, mu gihe uburyo bukoreshwa n'ibihugu vyo mu burengero busa n'ubwananiwe no kuzibira uwo mugera". Mu mwaka uheze, imiti kama yarateye intambwe cane inyuma y'aho ishami rya ONU ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, riyemereye inyuma y'imyaka itari mike Ubushinwa busaba ko yokwemerwa - ingingo yiyamirijwe n'umuryango w'abavuzi kw'isi. Mu nyuma, OMS yongeye kwishira mu bibazo bindi inyuma y'aho ikuriye ku rubuga rwayo amajambo yari mu congereza no mu gishinwa yagabisha kw'ikoreshwa ry'imiti kama mu kuvuga Covid-19. Ikiriho ni uko kubona ata vyigwa vyakozwe kuri iyo miti kama bijanye n'ubushobozi bwo kuvura vyatumye idashobora kwakirwa cane. Mu kwa gatanu, abategetsi ba Suwede barapimye urya muti wa Lianhua Qingwen basanga hari vyinshi biburamwo.

headline: Gukingira ibikorwa mva-bwenge mu Burundi bigeze hehe?
text: Itariki 26 ukwezi kwa kane ni umunsi ngaruka-mwaka uzwi nka World Intellectual Property Day, canke umunsi wo kuzirikana "ibikorwa mva-bwenge". Ni umunsi ushishikariza inyungu ziva ku bikorwa bishingiye ku bwenge  birimo ubugeni, ubuvanganzo, ubusizi, birimo na muzika. Ikigaragara ni uko, mu bihugu vyinshi bikiri mu nzira y'amajambere, bene abo banyabwenge batabona inyungu z'ibikorwa vyabo n'ubwo hari amategeko abarengera. Akarorero ni  mu Burundi, aho kiretse kugira amategeko, banafise ikigo cashinzwe na leta, OBDA (Office Burundais des droits d'auteurs) co gufasha gutoza utwo turusho. Impamvu ituma ayo mategeko atubahirizwa n'izihe? Florentine Kwizera yavuganye na Francis Muhire, umwe mu bafise ibikorwa mva-bwenge, yanakurikiranye n'ivyirwa vy'amategeko ajanye no gukingira ibikorwa nk'ivyo. Yatanguye kumubaza nimba abafise ivyo bikorwa mva-bwenge bumva ko bakingiwe n'ayo mategeko (umva ico kiganiro aho hejuru). Woraba kandi n'ibi:

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru i Bulaya 07/08/2019: Dybala, Eriksen, Coutinho, Ozil, Lukaku
text: Tottenham yashitse ku masezerano n'umurwi Juventus yerekeye kugura umukinyi wa Argentine Paulo Dybala, w'imyaka 25 ku giciro cababa imiliyoni 62 z'amapawundi. (Sky Sports Italia, via Mail) Dybala yiteze kuganira na Tottenham ku biraba amasezerano imbere y'uko ikiringo cagenewe igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi rirangira kuri uyu wa kane. (Goal) Tottenham iracarondera kandi Philippe Coutinho, umunya Brezili w'imyaka 27 asanzwe akina muri Barcelona, mu gihe Arsenal yoyo itigeze imurondera. (ESPN) Uyo mukinyi Coutinho yahoze akinira Liverpool ashobora kuba yipfuza kwinjira mu murwi Manchester United. (Express) Manchester City yitezwe gutangaza ko yamaze kugura Joao Cancelo avuye muri Juventus uno munsi ku wa gatatu, inyuma y'aho uyo mukinyi w'inyuma w'imyaka 25 akomoka muri Portugal ahereje ibipimo vyo kwa muganga muri uyo murwi watsindiye ihiganwa rya Premier League. (Star) Manchester United  iriko yongereza inguvu kugira ngo irabe ko yoshobora kuronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Tottenham Christian Eriksen w'imyaka 27 akomoka muri Danemark. (Telegraph) Kuva amenyeshereje ko yipfuza kuronderera ahandi, Eriksen ntakiri mu bakinyi umumenyereza Mauricio Pochettino  afiseko imigambi miremire.  (Mirror) Manchester United  yafashe ingingo y'ukurondera Eriksen kubera amakenga ifise ku Mufaransa Paul Pogba w'imyaka 26 akina hagati, batabona neza nimba azobandanya ari i Old Trafford mu mpera z'ikiringo cagenewe igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi. (Standard) Igiciro c'amahera catanzwe na Arsenal kingana n'imiliyoni 55 z'amapawundi irondera umukinyi w'inyuma w'Umufaransa, Dayot Upamecano, ciyamirijwe n'umurwi wiwe RB Leipzig. (Bild) Uyo murwi RB Leipzig wo mw'ihiganwa Bundesliga ry'Ubudagi wabwiye Arsenal ko ata mugambi ufise wo kugurisha Upamecano, mu gihe amasezerano ufitaniye nawe avuga ko ikiguzi ciwe ari imiliyoni 92 z'amapawundi. (Mirror) DC United yiteguye kuganira n'abaserukira umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal, Umudagi Mesut Ozil w'imyaka 30, mu gihe iriko irondera uwoshobora gusubirira Wayne Rooney w'imyaka 33 yahoze ari kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza yagiye muri Derby County. (Mirror) Paris St-Germain yemereye imirwi ya Manchester United, Juventus na Real Madrid ko ishobora kugura umukinyi Neymar. Uyo murwi usanzwe ariwo watsindiye ihiganwa ry'Ubufaransa, urarahira ukarengwa ko udashobora kwemerera Barcelona ngo yisubize uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 27 akomoka muri Brezili. (Sport) Liverpool nta mugambi ifise yo kugurisha umunya Brezili Fabinho akina hagati, mu gihe hari ibihuha bivuga ko uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 25 ashobora kuja muri  Real Madrid. (Echo) Leicester City iriko irihweza ingene yogura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Celtic, umunya Norvège Kristoffer Ajer w'imyaka 21, kugira ngo asubirire Umwongereza akina inyuma Harry Maguire w'imyaka 26. (Star) Manchester United iriko yihweza nimba yorondera umusatirizi wa Tottenham, Fernando Llorente w'imyaka 34 - ibitari vyitezwe - mu gihe uyo mukinyi wa Espanye yugururiwe imiryango yo kugenda ku buntu. (Sky Sports Italy, via Metro) Everton iri hafi y'ugushika ku masezerano y'intizo n'umukinyi w'inyuma w'Umufaransa Djibril Sidibé w'imyaka 27 asanzwe akina mu murwi Monaco. (Mail) Umusatirizi wa Manchester United, Umubirigi Romelu Lukaku w'imyaka 26, ntarasubira i Old Trafford mu myimenyerezo mu gihe havugwa vyinshi kuri kazoza kiwe muri uyo murwi. (Mirror) Ku munsi wa kabiri, Lukaku yasubiye gukorana imyimenyerezo n'umurwi wa Anderlecht  w'abatarenza imyaka 18, n'aho ata ruhusha yahawe na Man United rwo kuguma i Buruseri mu Bubirigi.  (Mail) Ubu Man U yiteguriye guca amande uyo mukinyi w'imbere kubera yasivye imyimenyerezo. (Star) Manchester United na Manchester City, zompi zararungitse ba maneko kugira bihweze umukinyi wo hagati w'umunya Norvège Hakon Evjen w'imyaka 19 asanzwe akina mu murwi Bodo/Glimt wo muri ico gihugu. (TV2, via Manchester Evening News) Watford yanse ikiguzi c'imiliyoni 36.7 z'amapawundi catanzwe na Everton ku mukinyi w'Umufaransa Abdoulaye Doucouré w'imyaka 26. (Sky Sports)

headline: Ivyo Manchester city yaraye ikoze, ni ubutumwa bukomeye
text: Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, Manchester City isanzwe ifise igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza, Premier Leaguer, yari mu bibazo - ni inyuma y'aho mu rukino rwo mu ndwi iheze ikubitiwe na Norwich, bituma Liverpool iyisumvya amanota atanu. Rwari urukino rumwe gusa yari itakaje, ariko ivyo vyatumye abatari bake bibaza ingene ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka rizoyigendera kubera babona ko inyuma hajegajega, mu gihe yari yatakaje abakinyi b'inyuma bayo bakomeye kubera inkomere. Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi babona ko ibibazo vyari bigeye kuba umurengera kuko babona ko Man City itashoboye kurondera uwusubirira Vincent Kompany ku ruhande rw'inyuma, mu gihe Aymeric Laporte na John Stones nabo bari bakomeretse. Ku munsi w'ejo, abakinyi ba Pep Guardiola baranumije ababanegura mu buryo bwari bukomeye. Batanguye mu rukino rwo ku wa gatatu mw'ihiganwa ry'imirwi yabaye iya mbere mu bihugu iwabo, Champions League, aho birahiye umurwi Shakhtar Donetsk wo muri Ukraine, ku bitsindo bitatu ku busa bawusanze iwabo. Watford niyo yaraye ikurikiye. N'aho vyari vyitezwe ko uyo murwi wari uramutse wakirwa na Manchester City utari ikibazo kuri yo, nta muntu yiyumvira ko wari kubona ayo waraye ubonye. Eka n'umumenyereza Guardiola asanzwe azwi ko agoye kunezerezwa, yahavuye yemera ko umukino w'umurwi wiwe wari uryoheye ijisho bidasanzwe, mu gihe wari umaze kunyagira Watford ku bitsindo umunani vyose ku busa. Nivyo ko itosya bwose kuko akari imbere karahinda, ariko ico nico abakunzi bayo bahora barondera - bukaba ari n'ubutumwa kuri Liverpool. Nivyo, Liverpool irashobora gutera iyindi ntambwe mu gihe yoja gutsindira Chelsea ku kibuga cayo Stamford Bridge kuri uyu wa Mungu, ariko iza gukina urwo rukino umutima uri mu mutwe, izi neza ko City yagarukanye inguvu zidasanzwe kandi ko igiye kuyisatira. Inyuma y'aho City yirahiriye Watford, Guardiola yavuze ati: "Hariho abantu gushika ubu badatahura - abamenyeshamakuru, abahinga muvyo umupira w'amaguru, eka n'abahoze ari abakinyi - ntibatahura ko gutsindwa ari kimwe mu bigize amahiganwa". "Ni vyiza kwubaha abo muhiganwa. Niho mpagaze gushika ubu, kandi niho nari mpagaze n'inyuma y'aho dutsindiwe na Norwich, rero ni bumve ko atari uko twoba twakinye nabi mu ndwi iheze". "Turashobora gutsindwa mu nkino kanaka, ariko igikenewe ni ingene tuvyifatamwo mu nyuma". Manchester City yatanguye urwo rukino isa n'uko yaje gutanga ubutumwa budasanzwe kuko, mu gihe mbere bamwe mu bakunzi bayo batari bwanashike mu kibuga, City yari yamaze kuronka ica mbere inyuma y'imisegonda 50. Igice ca mbere cagiye kurangira ifise ibitsindo bitanu vyose. N'aho umukinyi Raheem Sterling atakinishijwe kuko yahawe akaruhuko kubera atari bwigere aruhuka kuva ihiganwa ritangura, vyari bigoye kuzibira City. Guardiola ati: "Abakinyi b'imbere berekanye ibintu bikomeye. Ni ibintu bidasanzwe kwinjiza ibitsindo bitanu ku ncuro zitanu nyene twateye mw'igori!" Muvyo ukuri, Manchester city yari kwinjiza ibitsindo birenze umunani, iyo Aguero adahusha igitsindo, igihe ateye umutwe ari wenyene imbere y'umunyegori, ariko umupira ugakubita ku mwamba, hanyuma Riyad Mahrez nawe nyene agahusha ikindi ateye umupira ugakubita ku mwamba. Abakinyi ba Guardiola baje bafise inyota y'ugutsinda kuko bagumye basatira gushika ku munota wa nyuma, nta wuzi ko batariko barondera gusumvya Manchester United mu mwaka wa 1995, igihe inyagiriye umurwi Ipswich  ku bitsindo 9-0, hakaba ata wundi murwi urasubira kwinjiza ibindi bitsindo nk'ivyo muri Premier League.

headline: Russia igiye gukura ingabo zayo hafi ya Ukraine
text: Inyuma y'indwi zitari nke zaranzwe n'uruhagarara rwatewe n'ingingo y'Uburusiya yo kurungika ingabo ku rubibe iki gihugu gihana na Ukraine, umushikiranganji w'ukwivuna abansi w'Uburusiya Sergei Shoigu yategetse ingabo zitari nke gusubira ku birindiro vyazo. Umuryango w'Ubumwe bw'ibihugu vy'Uburayi uvuga ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zirenga 100.000 ari zo zari zegeranirijwe ku rubibe no mu karere ka Crimée/Crimea kigarurirwe n'Uburusiya mu 2014. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ari muri Crimea, umushikiranganji Shoigu yavuze ko ingabo ziri mu myimenyerezo muri ako karere zigiye gusubira ku birindiro vyazo. Yongeyeko ko ico bashaka bagishitseko. Umukuru w'igihugu ca Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky - mu ntango yari yatumyeko Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya kugira babonanire mu karere karimwo imishamirano - yakirije yompi iyi ngingo yo "kugabanya" icuka kibi kirangwa ku rubibe. Umushikiranganji w'ukwivuna abansi w'Uburusiya avuga ati: "Ingabo zarerekanye ubushobozi nyabwo zifise bwo gukingira igihugu". Avuga kandi ko yategetse abarongoye imirwi y' ingabo zirwaniha hasi hamwe n'iyindi y'ingabo zirwanira mu kirere gutangura gusubira ku birindiro kuva kuri uyu wa gatanu gushika ku wa gatandatu w'indwi iza, hazoba ari igenekerezo rya 01 z'ukwa gatanu. Mu ndwi iheze, Perezida Zelensky yari yashikirije iki kibazo abategetsi ba Buraya. Umukuru w'ingabo za Ukraine yavuze ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zariko zigana mu turere twa Rostov, Bryansk na Voronezh hamwe no muri Crimea, mu gihe izindi nazo zari zegeranirijwe ku rubibe. Inyuma y'ivyatangajwe na Shoigu, ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vyo mu burengero ry'ukwivunira umwansi hamwe, OTAN/NATO ryavuze ko ingingo iyo ari yo yose yohagarika uruhagarara izoba ari "kirumara kandi nkenerwa". Rivuga kandi ko ingabo z'iri shirahamwe ryo mu burengero zibandanya zirikanuye. Abategetsi bahurikiye muri OTAN basaba ikoraniro mu kwa gatandatu aho ikibazo c'Uburusiya kizoba muri bikuru bikuru vyo kwihweza. N'aho Uburusiya buhakana ko uku kwegeranya ingabo yari imyiteguro yo kwishura ku bikorwa "biteye amakenga" vya OTAN, amakuru avuga ko buriko butegura  kuzibira uturere turi hafi y'Ikiyaba Cirabura (Mer Noire/Black Sea) kugira ntihagire ubwato mvamakungu buzosubira kwinjira muri iki kiyaga. Ukraine ifise ubwoba ko ibivuko vyayo bishobora kuhagirira ingorane. Uburusiya bwamye buvuga ko ata bindi vyinyegeje inyuma uretse ko ari imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare. Ariko Moscou yari izi neza ko uku kwegeraniriza ingabo hafi ya Ukraine no mu karere ka Crimea kigaruriwe n'Uburusiya vyateye ubwoba abantu benshi: Muri Ukraine, i Buraya no muri America. Iyi ni yo ngorane. Moscou yoba yakoresheje ibi bikorwa vyo kwegeranya izi ngabo kugira ngo ihe ubutumwa Kyiv (umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine), Bruxelles (umugwa mukuru w'Ububirigi kandi icicaro c'umuryango w'ibihugu vya Buraya), hamwe kandi na Washington  cane cane , ko Uburusiya ari igihugu gikomeye gitegerezwa kwitwararikwa. Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika yarumvise aka kamo. Mu ndwi iheze, yahamagaye kuri telefone Perezida Putin amusaba ko bohura bakaganira. Hanyuma kandi yaciye afatira Uburusiya ibihano bikomeye cane "ku bikorwa vyabwo bibi", ariko hagati mu gihugu, Abarusiya babona ko ari ibihano bisanzwe. Ariko kandi, n'aho uruhagarara rwogabanuka, si ukuvuga ko rurangiye. Umushikiranganni w'Uburusiya ajejwe kwivuna abansi aratomora neza ko "Uburusiya bufata ingingo kugira buhangane n'ibikorwa biteye amakenga vya OTAN". Akarorero, Moscou itegekanya kuzibira uturere two ku kiyaga Cirabura (Mer Noire/Black Sea) mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu kugira ibuze ubwato mvamakungu kwinjira muri iki kiyaga. Mw'ijambo yashikirije igihugu ku wa gatatu, Perezida Putin yaragasbishije ibihugu vyo mu burengero ko bitohirahira ngo "birenge umurongo utukura". Avugana n'abanyamakuru inyuma y'aho ingabo zitegetswe gusubira ku birindiro vyazo, Perezida Putin yavuze ati: "Ku bijanye n'imigenderanire hagati y'ibi bihugu vyompi, turiteguye kwakira umukuru w'igihugu ca Ukraine umwanya uwo ari wo wose umworohereza, ariko i Moscou". Hagati aho, ashimangira ko, nimba Perezida Zelensky ashaka kuganira ku kibazo c'ubuseruko bwa Ukraine, ategerezwa kubanza kuvugana n'abategetsi bo muri ako karere. Intambara mu buseruko bwa Ukraine yadutse mu 2014, inyuma y'aho Crimea yonkorewe kuri Ukraine. Inyeshamba zishigikiwe n'Uburusiya zarigaruriye uturere tutari duto tw'intara za Luhansk na Donetsk. Mu ndwi nkeya ziheze, harabaye ihonyangwa ry'amasezerano y'uguhagarika intambara. Ibibombe vyatewe ku wa kane vyarakomerekeje cane umusirikare wa Ukraine, mu co ingabo za Ukraine zivuga ko ari uguhonyanga aya masezerano kwakozwe n'ibigirankana. Kuva iyi ntambara yaduka, abantu bagera kuri 14.000 baramaze kuhasiga ubuzima.

headline: Igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi ku w'Imana 28.08.2022
text: Liverpool iramaze kwumvikana, ariko ku munwa gusa, n'umukinyi wo hagati wa Borussia Dortmund n'Ubwongereza Jude Bellingham kugira azoze gukinira uwo mugwi kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere. (Football Insider) Ajax isaba Manchester United kuriha imiliyoni 84.8 z'amapawundi kugira babahe umukinyi wo muri Brezil Antony w'imyaka 22.  (Mail) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Tottenham Sergio Reguilon w'imyaka 25 yimirije kuja muri Atletico Madrid kw'ideni, gusubirira umukinyi w'inyuma mu ruhande rw'ibubamfu, umunye Brezil Renan Lodi w'imyaka 24, yagiye gukinira Nottingham Forest. (Times - subscription required) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Slovakia, Martin Dubravka w'imyaka 33 yabwiye Newcastle ko ashaka gukura meza aje muri Manchester United. (Sky Sports) Liverpool iriko irakurikirana umukinyi wo hagati wa Wolves na Portugal, Ruben Neves w'imyaka 25, hamwe n'umukinyi wa RB Leipzig na Autriche, Konrad Laimer w'imyaka 25. (90min) Chelsea iriko iriyumvira kurangiza amasezerano y'umukinyi wo hagati w'Ubwongereza Ross Barkley ubu ahembwa amapawundi 200.000 ku ndwi. (Sun) West Ham iri mu biganiro n'uwahoze ari umukinyi wa Manchester United, Adnan Januzaj ngo imugarukane mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza. Uwo mubiligi w'imyaka 27 ashobora kuva mu mugwi wa Real Sociedad ata gisabwe. (Talksport) Brighton irashaka umukinyi wa Rosario Central na Argentine, Facundo Buonanotte w'imyaka 17, kandi iriteguye kuriha imiliyoni 3 z'amapawundi. Bournemouth barashaka gucako Leeds United mu muvuduko wo gutwara umukinyi w'imbere wa Zurich Italia, Willy Gnonto w'imyaka 18. (Football Insider)

headline: Bazamuganga: Kanseri y'ibere... n'abagabo irabafata
text: Kanseri y'ibere ntifata abagore gusa kuko n'abagabo irafata...

headline: Covid-19: indwi barapfuye inyuma yo guterwa AstraZeneca muru UK, biteye amakenga
text: Abantu indwi nibo bamaze gupfa mu Bwongereza kubera ivura ry'amaraso ryabaye inyuma y'aho baterewe urucanco rwa AstraZeneca, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo kijejwe imiti muri ico gihugu. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'aho habonekeye abantu bakeya bagize ikibazo c'amaraso avura bamaze guterwa uwo rucanco. Gushika ku wa 24 z'ukwa gatatu, mu bantu bangana na miriyoni 18 bari bamaze guhabwa uru rucanco, 30 muri bo nibo bagize iki kibazo c'ivura ry'amaraso. Hagati aho, ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO hamwe n'ishirahamwe rya Buraya rijejwe imiti, yompi avuga ko inyungu z'uru rucanco zisumba kure ingaruka rushobora kugira. Umuvugizi wa AstraZeneca avuga ati: "Amagara y'umurwayi nico kintu tubandanya dushira imbere". Abahinga hamwe n'abajejwe kwihweza imiti kw'isi bariko barihweza nimba uru rucanco ari rwo koko rutera iri vura ry'amaraso, urugero bishobora kuba, n'inkurikizi ku mugambi wo gucandaga. Aya makenga niyo yatumye ibihugu bimwe bimwe harimwo Ubudagi, Ubufaransa, Ubuholande hamwe na Canada, bifata ingingo y'uko uru rucanco ruhabwa abatama n'abatamakazi gusa. Ibiharuro vyashizwe ahabona n'ikigo kijejwe kwihweza imiti mu Bwongereza MHRA vyerekana ko abantu 22 aribo bagize ibibazo vy'ivura ry'amaraso mu bwonko, kizwi nka thrombose du sinus veineux cérébral (canke cerebral venous sinus thrombosis,CVST). Hari abandi umunani nabo nyene basanze bafise ibimenyetso bishobora gutuma amaraso yabo avura. Mu butumwa muravyo (e-mail) ikigo MHRA carungikiye BBC, camenyesheje ko "abantu indwi bapfuye". Iyi ngorane kandi iramaze kwibonekeza no mu Budagi, aho abantu 31 ari bo bagize ikibazo c'amaraso kuvura, icenda bakaba barapfuye, ku bantu imiriyoni 2.7 bahawe urucanco rwa AstraZeneca, abenshi muri bo bakaba ari abagore bakiri bato. Iki nico catumye ku musi wa kabiri w'iyi ndwi reta ifata ingingo yo kubangira kurutera abakiri bato. Gushika ubu, ntibiratomoreka. Mu ntango z'ino ndwi, ikigo kijejwe imiti ku mugabane wa Buraya (EMA) cavuze ko ata kivyemeza ariko ko bishoboka. Iki kigo kiriko kirihweza nimba iri vura ry'amaraso ari inkurikizi ry'uru rucanco canke nimba ari ikintu cari gisanzwe cobaye bigaca bihurirana. Ni ikibazo kitoroshe kuko iyaba vyari ibintu bishobora gushikira nk'umwe mu bihumbi cumi, aha vyaca bigaragara neza koko ko ari inkurikizi. Hagati aho, umuhinga mu bijanye n'amagara y'abantu, Prof. Linda Bauld wo kw'ishure kaminuza rya Edinburgh, yabwiyte BBC  ko iki kibazo ari "ikintu kidahuse kiribonekeza" agashimangira ko gushika ubu ata "cemeza nimba koko ari ingaruka z'uru rucanco". Ahanura abantu kubandanya bitabira incaco, akongerako ati: "Covid yonyene ubwayo irashobora gutuma amaraso avura, kandi bishoboka ko ibi ari bimwe mu biriko bituma tubona ibi bintu". Muri kino gihe, isi yose ibandanya isuzuma neza aya makuru, ariko insobanuro nyayo ishobora gufata igihe kitari gito.

headline: Burundi: Abakozi b'ihinguriro ry'inzoga Brarudi bagabisha ko bagiye guhagarika akazi
text: Sendika y'abakozi ba Brarudi, SYLITRAB, itangaza ko igiye guhagarika akazi inyuma y'iminsi itandatu kuva ejo ku wa kane, mu gihe ibibazo bashikirije umukuru w'iryo hinguriro ry'inzoga bitoba biratorerwa umuti, nk'uko biri mu rwandiko bamwandikiye. Dieudonné Nizigiyimana arongoye iyo sendika yabwiye BBC ko ihinguriro ry'inzoga Brarudi ritwawe nabi cane, bakagiriza umukuru waryo ko aho gushira imbere ibiganiro ashima ahubwo gufatira ingingo abamukebura. Mu minsi iheze, Brarudi yaragirijwe ko ibinyobwa isigaye ikora vyataye akanovera, mu gihe hari ibinyobwa bikundwa mu Burundi vyigeze gukena. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC, Dieudonné Nizigiyimana yagiriza umukuru w'iryo hinguriro amakosa atari make, ivyo navyo ngo bikagira ingaruka mbi ku bakozi no kuvyo risanzwe rikora. Mu makosa ashirwa imbere, Bwana Nizigiyimana avuga ko harimwo ko iryo hinguriro risigaye rirangwamwo ubusuma cane cane bukorwa n'abakozi b'abacangero (Sous-traitants), kugabanya imishahara y'abakozi, kwirukana abakozi,  gutanga akazi ku kimenyane n'ibindi. Avuga ko umukuru w'iryo hinguriro aterekwa ibiganiro asabwa n'abakozi kugira ngo bigire hamwe ingene ingorane zihanze Brarudi zotorerwa umuti, ahubwo ko aca yihutira gufatira ingingo bamwe mu babaserukira mu ntumbero yo kubatera ubwoba. Bwana Nizigiyimana ati: "Abakozi babicishije ku basanzwe barongoye sendika yabo barazishikirije umukoresha kugira ngo hagire ikintu cohinduka, ariko wewe ntiyashatse kubumviriza , ahubwo yaciye yigizayo abaserukira abakozi kugira ngo yibandanirize imigambi yiwe igayitse atacamira". BBC yagerageje kuvugana na Remy Ndayishimiye ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru muri Brarudi kugira agire ico ashikirije kuri ivyo bivugwa na sendika y'abakozi bayo ariko akaba yamenyesheje ko ataco bafise babivugako. Hagati aho, uburongozi bw'iryo hinguriro bwasohoye itangazo inyuma y'urwo rwandiko rwa sendika y'abakozi baryo, aho buvuga ko bwubaba uburenganzira bw'abakozi bwo guhagarika akazi mu gihe cose amategeko azoba yakurikijwe. Abarongoye Brarudi bamenyesha ariko y'uko amasezerano bafitaniye n'abakozi bazoba bahagaritse akazi azoca ahagarikwa muri ico gihe batazoba bari ku kazi, kandi ko ata n'imishahara n'utundi turusho bahabwa n'akazi bazoronswa. Mu kwezi kw'icumi umwaka uheze, mushikiranganji w'ubudandaji, amahinguriro n'ingenzi yaragabishije Brarudi ko mu gihugu hari imyidogo yavuga ko ibinyobwa bihingurwa n'iryo hinguriro vyatakaje akanovera, anarikebura ko ryokwikubita agashi rigakora ibinyobwa bitonona amagara y'abavyihereza. Ku ruhande rwaryo, Brarudi yarahumurije abanyagihugu, aho yamenyesheje ko amashiramamwe HEINEKEN na Coca-Cola akorana naryo, yama akora ivyigwa kugira ngo arabe ko inzoga zihingurwa zikwije ibisabwa kandi ko n'ibikoresho vyayo bimeze neza.

headline: US: Umushingamateka Lauren Boebert yarahiye ko azotwara inkoho mu nama nshingamateka
text: Umugore aherutse gutorwa mu bushingamateka yiyemeje gutwara inkoho yo mu ntoke y'ubwoko bwa 'pistolet' mu kiringo azoba ari mu nama nshingamateka i Washington DC. Muri video yasohotse ku wa mungu, uwo mu republicain Lauren Boebert aboneka ariko arashira amasasu mu nkoho yiwe imbere yo gutembera mu gisagara. Muri iyo video imaze kubonwa incuro zirenga miliyoni zibiri avuga ati: "Nzotwara inkoho yanje i Washington mu nama nshingamateka''. Ariko umukuru w'igipolisi muri ico gisagara avuga ko afise umugambi wo kuvugana na Madame Boebert ku vyerekeye amategeko akomeye yo kugendana ibigwanisho bicira umuriro. Madame Boebert afise inzu y'uburiro (restaurant) yitwa Shooters Grill mu gisagara ca Rifle muri Colorado aho abakozi bashishikarizwa kugendana ibigwanisho bicira umuriro. Ikibazo c'uburenganzira bwo gutunga ibigwanisho cagize ikibanza kinini mu myiyamamazo yiwe mu matora yabaye mu kwezi kwa 11. Madame Boebert w'imyaka 34 yatorewe guhagararira intara ya Corolado, avuga muri iyo video yashizwe kuri Twitter ku wa mungu ati:  ''N'ubwo ubu ngiye gukorera muri kimwe mu bisagara vyubahiriza cane ivyiyumviro bitandukanye muri Amerika, ndahakanye guheba uburenganzira bwanje. "Nico gituma nk'umugore wa 1,5m z'uburebure n'ibiro 45 mpitamwo kwikingira jewe nyene uko ndabirekurirwa n'amategeko kuko ntawonkingira kurusha uko jewe ubwanje nikingira'' Ariko igipolisi nticatevye kugira ico kibivuzeko, umukuru w'igipolisi muri Washington DC Robert Contee III yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ati: ''Urya mushingamateka azotangishwa ihadabu nk'iritangishwa uwundi muntu wese afatanywe ikigwanisho mu mabarabara ya Washinton DC''. N'aho ibwirizwa nshingiro rya Amerika riha abantu uburenganzira bwo gutunga no kugendana ibigwanisho, amategeko abigenga ntameze co kimwe hose. Abashingamateka n'abakenguzamateka bararekuriwe gutunga ibigwanisho mu biro vyabo no kubijana i Washington DC ariko bitarimwo amasasu. Ariko, harakenewe uruhusha rwo kugendana inkoho mu mabarabara y'ico gisagara kandi ibigwanisho bivuye mu zindi ntara bitegerezwa kubanza kwandikwa n'abategetsi b'ico gisagara. Mu kwezi guheze, umugwi w'abakenguzamateka b'aba democrate washikirije integuro yo gukaza amategeko ahasanzwe ku bagize inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka.

headline: Ukraine: Umuvugizi wa Kremlin yemeje ko Russia imaze gutakaza vyinshi
text: Uburusiya bwemeye ko "bumaze gutakaza ingabo nyinshi cane" muri Ukraine, ni mu gihe uyu musi ugira 44 kuva iki gitero gitanguye. Umuvugizi w'ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu Dmitry Peskov yabwiye ikinyamakuru co mu Bwongereza Sky News ko Abarusiya bamaze gupfira muri Ukraine ari "amahano akomeye kuri twebwe" . Avuga ko afise icizere ko Moscou igiye gushika kw'ihangiro ry'iyi ntambara "mu misi iri imbere". Amajambo ya Peskov aje inyuma y'aho Uburusiya bwirukaniwe mu Nama ya ONU ijejwe agateka ka zina muntu ku wa gatatu. Ibihugu bishika 93 kuri 193 bigize Inama Nkuru ya ONU bemeje iyi ngingo, inyuma y'aho ingabo z'Uburusiya zagirijwe ko zahonyanze agateka ka zina muntu mu buryo bw'agahomerabunwa mu gisagara zari zigaruriye ca Bucha mu buraruko bwa Ukraine. Mu kwishura, Moscou yaciye itangaza ko itanze imihoho muri iyo nama. Iyi nama imenyesha ko "itewe cane umutima uhagaze n'ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu", mu gihe Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky  wa Ukraine yagiriza Uburusiya ko bwakoze ayandi mahano akomeye i Borodyanka, igisagara kiri hafi y'umugwa mukuru Kyiv. Peskov arahakana ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zishe abantu mu gisagara ca Bucha, yabwiye Sky News ko "turi mu misi y'amarementanya n'ibinyoma". Ata vyemezo atanga, yavuze ko amasanamu y'abasivire bishwe muri ico gisagara ari irementanya. Hagati aho, kwemera ko Uburusiya bwahatakarije abantu benshi ni ikintu kidasanzwe. Ku wa 25 Ntwarante (3), umushikiranganji w'Uburusiya ajejwe kwivuna abansi yavuze ko 1.351 mu basirikare babwo bari biciwe mu ntambara. Ukraine yoyo ivuga ko Abarusiya bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima bababa 19.000. Vyaba ibivugwa n'Uburusiya canke na Ukraine, nta ruhande rwigenga rurashobora kubihinyuza - abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bakagabisha ko Uburusiya bushobora kuba butuvya igitigiri c'ababwo bamaze gupfira mu ntambara, mu gihe Ukraine nayo ishobora kuba ikiduza kugira ngo itere intege abayo. Abategetsi bo mu bihugu vy'Uburengero bemeza ko abasirikare b'Uburusiya bari hagati ya 7.000 na 15.000 ari bo bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima. Peskov, umuvugizi wa Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya kuva mu 2000, avuga kandi ko Uburusiya buriko burarondera ingene bworangiza iyi ntambara. Ati: "Abasirikare bacu bariko bakora uko bashoboye kwose kugira ngo ibi bikorwa vya gisirikare birangire, kandi turizeye ko mu misi iri imbere, atari kure cane, ibi bikorwa bizoshika ku ntego yavyo canke naho birangizwe n'ibiganiro hagati y'intumwa z'Uburusiya n'iza Ukraine". Uburusiya bwarakuye ingabo zabwo ahegereye Kyiv ubu bukaba bwashize inguvu zose mu buseruko bwa Ukraine - ariko nta kimenyetso na kimwe cerekana ko intambara igiye guhagarara. Icegera c'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ukraine atera akamo abanya-Ukraine baba mu buseruko guhunga bakibishoboye, mu gihe ibibombe bibandanya bicucagirwa muri ako karere bitorohereza ibikorwa vyo guhungisha abantu. Ejo ku wa kane, ibihugu vyo mu Burengero vyafatiye ibindi bihano Uburusiya mu vyo ubutunzi mu kwihora ku vyaha vy'intambara bwagirizwa muri Ukraine. Ari imbere y'inama nshingamateka y'Uburusiya, Duma, umushikiranganji wa mbere Mikhail Mishustin yaremeje ko ingaruka z'urukurikirane rw'ibihano zisigura ko iki gihugu kigiye guhura n'ibibazo vyubutunzi bitari bwigere bibaho mu myaka mirongo. Ati: "Nta nkeka, ibibazo biri mu gihugu bishobora gufatwa ko ari vyo vya mbere bikomeye bihanze Uburusiya mu myaka mirongo itatu iheze. Ibi bihano ntivyigeze bifatwa no muri vya bihe vy'umwiza w'igihe c'intambara yo kwikekana [Guerre froire/ Cold War]". Ariko avuga ko ingaruka z'ibihano vyafashwe n'ibihugu vyo mu Burengero zabaye nto, akaba yabwiye abashingamateka ko "ikigega cacu, ari co mushinge w'ubutunzi bwose bw'igihugu, cifashe neza". Inyuma yo gukoroka mu buryo butari bwigere bubaho mu mpera z'ukwa kabiri, ifaranga ry'Uburusiya, Rouble/Ruble, ryivyukiranije risubirana agaciro ryari rifise imbere y'intambara. Perezida Zelensky wa Ukraine yasubiye gutera akamo ibihugu vyo mu Burengero ko vyomuha ibirwanisho bikomakomeye, akavuga ko ingabo ziwe zikeneye "ibirwanisho bizoha igihugu ciwe gutsinda ku rubuga rw'intambara kandi ko ari vyo bizoba ibihano bikomeye ku Burusiya".

headline: Benjamin Acheampong: 'Ntibashobora kudufata nk'ibikoko',bivugwa n'umukinyi 'yahenzwe' agatakaza $1m
text: Benjamin Acheampong  avuga ko yabeshwe rimwe n'umugwi w'umupira w'amaguru  agatakaza miriyoni imwe y'ama dolari ($1m), kandi ko afise ishaka ry'uko ivyo bitazosubira gushika-na cane cane ntibisubire gukorwa n'uwo mugwi nyene. Uwo mukinyi aturuka muri Ghana avuga ko yatakaje umuriyoni w'ama dolari ($1m) mu mpari n'umwe mu migwi ikomeye cane mu Misiri, Zamalek, zihera kuva mu 2018, kandi ko n'ubwo haheze amezi abiri sentare ijejwe amatati y'inkino (Cas) itegetse uwo mugwi umaze gutwara igikombe ca Africa incuro zitanu kumuriha amafaranga angana nayo , n'ubu ata n'urumeya araronka. Uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 30 yabwiye BBC Africa Sport ati: "Ibi si vyo-aka niko kazi kantungiye umuryango.Ntibashobora gufata abantu nk'ibikoko.Turi abantu kandi twazanywe ngaha no gukora." Kubera umwe mu migwi ikomeye cane yo muri Afrika bivugwa ko 'yikitse mu kiza' ku bijanye n'amasezerano y'umukinyi  utari ugikeneye, wagirijwe -na Cas- gukora ''ibitagira ubuntu'',"gutera igitsure",n'inyafato "itagira impuhwe.'' Acheampong, umukinyi w'imbere,yinjiye muri uwo mugwi w'I Cairo ku masezerano y'imyaka ine mu 2017 ariko ayahagarika haheze amezi 11, avuga ko Zamalek itigeze imuhemba uko babisezeranye. Avuga kandi  ko igihe agiriye mu wundi mugwi w'aho mu Misiri nyene, Perojet, ku kiringo c'intizo c'amezi atanu mu 2018,yahenzwe agatera igikumu ku rwandiko rwavuga ko atazoheba umushahara wiwe wa Zamalek mu gihe azoba ari muri Petrojet gusa-ahubwo mu kiringo c'amasezerano yiwe cose. Mu gufata ikaramu agasinya gusa, avuga ko yahevye atabizi amafaranga arenga miriyoni y'ama dolari ($1m). Acheampong ati: "Ivyo nta n'umwe yobikora.Ico nemeye conyene ndakizi kwari uko Petrojet izompemba igice c'ikiringo nari ngiye gukina." Mu kwezi kwa 12, Cas yavuze ko Acheampong agwanira "ikiri ukuri", ku mvo zitandukanye,kuba yarangije ku ngingo yiwe wenyene amasezerano na Zamalek,ubu itegerezwa kumuriha miriyoni 1.1 z'ama dolari. Ariko na none, igihe vyasa n'uko agiye  kuronswa ayo mafaranga, hari icaciye kiba. Mw'ikete yarungikiye Fifa, Zamalek yavuze ko habonetse"umwumvikano n'uwuhagarariye inyungu z'uwo mukinyi " aho uwo munyaGhana yoba yari yemeye guhabwa amafaranga  angana n'ibihumbi 250 ($250.000) vy'ama dolari gusa. Ariko uwo  muntu, yahoze ari capitaine wa Misiri Nader El Sayed-ntagihagarariye inyungu za Acheampong, nk'uko vyemezwa n'uwo mukinyi. Avuga ko uwo munya-Misiri yahinduye inyandiko kugira zerekane ko ariwe yovugana na Zamalek kw'izina rya Acheampong. El Sayed, inyandiko ziwe zivuga ko azoronkako 20%, yabwiye BBC ko izo nyandiko  "zatanzwe n'abazifitiye ububasha" kandi "ariz'ukuri". "Kubona honyene ko Acheampong yoba-indwi zibiri amenyeshejwe ingingo ya Cas-buno nyene agaca aha uruhusha uwundi muntu kwemera amasezerano amuha 25% y'ayo yari kuronka  ntivyumvikana," nk'uko bivugwa na  Roy Vermeer, umuyobozi araba ivy'amategeko mw'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ry'abakinyi Fifpro. Acheampong nta faranga na rimwe arabona muri miriyoni 1.1 z'ama dolari Zamalek yategetswe kumuriha, na cheque y'ama dolari ibihumbi 250- avuga ko yahawe El Sayed kw'izina ryiwe ntayo arabona, uretse ko yo atayo ashaka. Kuri uyu wa kane,Fifa, isanzwe yarugururiye Zamalek  dosiye ya discipline, ishobora gufatira uwo mugwi ingingo yo kudasubira kugura canke kugurisha abakinyi, binashoboka ko unafatirwa kandi ingingo yo  gukurwa amanota canke gusubizwa  mu cicaro co hasi. Acheampong ati : "Bategerezwa guhanwa."

headline: Burundi na Covid-19:Abarenga 70 batowe umugera mu ntara ya Makamba
text: Abajejwe amagara y'abantu mu ntara ya Makamba yo mu bumanuko bw'Uburundi ku rubibe bihana na Tanzania bamenyesha ko gushika uyu munsi abantu 79 bamaze gutorwa umugera wa Covid-19. Komine zitatu z'iyo ntara-Mabanda, Nyanzalac na Vugizo nizo zivugwamwo abo bantu. Mu batowe uwo mugera harimwo abanyeshure n'abigisha. Abo bantu bose ubu bariko barakurinwa kwa mu ganga mu bitaro vya komine za Mabanda, Nyanzalac na Makamba nyene. Haraheze indwi irenga iyo ndwara itanguye kuvugwa muri iyo ntara. Kuva ico gihe haciye hatangura isekeza ryo gupima abokoranyeko n'aba mbere batoweko  uwo mugera. Gushika ubu iyo ndwara iterwa n'umugera corona yahora ivugwa cane na mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Abantu  nibura 140 baratowe uwo mugera um bipimo vyakozwe hagati y'itariki 4 na 10 ukwezi kwa mbere. Ariko muri iyi minsi iravugwa no mu gihugu hagati. Gushika kuri uyu wa kane, mu ntara ya Ngozi iri mu buraruko bw'Uburundi havugwa abantu 22 batowe iyo ndwara, hakurikijwe ibiharo bitangwa n'abajejwe amagara y'abantu n'intwaro. ''Abo ni abari mu ma centres de sante no mu  bitaro, hari abafatira imiti muhira'' nk'uko bivugwa n'umwe mu  baba mu gisagara ca Ngozi. N'umukuru w'intara ya Mwaro amajahagati y'Uburundi ku wa kane yavuze ko hari umuntu yatowe umugera wa Covid-19 muri muri iyo ntara Mu ntara ya Kayanza naho barenga 30 ku bipimo vyakozwe kuva itari 8 z'uku kwezi. Uwo murindi ugira kabiri w'ikwirakwira ry'iyo ndwara ryatumye hafatwa ingingo zindi zirakazwa mu ntumbero yo kwirinda ko ico kiza kibandanya kirandagata. Kuva kuri uyu kuri uyu wa kane mu miduga yo kwiyunguruza rusangi abantu bategerezwa kwambara udufukamunwa. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Uburundi Alain Guillaume Bonyoni yanavuze ko ahantu hose hahurira abanbtu benshi bategerezwa kujayo bambaye udufukamunwa. Yabivuze kuri uyu wa kane ariko aragendera ibigo bipima uwo mugera. Coronavirus yatanguye kuvugwa mu Burundi mu kwezi kwa kane mu mwaka uheze.  Abantu barenga igihumbi baramaze kwandura uwo mugera, babiri nabo uramaze kubahitana, hakurikijwe ibiharuro bitangwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu.

headline: Intanbara ya Ukraine : Abarugwanye biteguriye intambara ku karere kigaruriwe ka Luhansk
text: Urwamo rw'ibisasu bikomakomeye vyumvikana cane igihe twariko turagana ku kirindiro c'abasirikare ba Ukraine i Luhansk. Hari kandi n'urwamo rw'amabombe aho haza haracamwo n'urwo inkoho zito zito. Twari nko ku metero 50 uvuye ku birindiro vy'abarusiya. Iyi ishobora kuba ari intambara yo mu kinjana ca 21, ariko uko ibinogo vyo kwinyegezamwo yimbwe, bisa n'ivyo mu ntambara ya mbere y'isi yose. Ibitero vy'Uburusiya mu buseruko bwa Ukraine biza vyamaze kugwira. Ivyo ushobora kubibonera ku rukurikirane rurerure rw'amamodoka mu burengero rugana ahakiri agahengwe; ushobora no kubibonera ku mabarabara agaragara uriko uraca mu bisagara vya Donbas, kandi ushobora no kuvyumvira ku rwamo rw'ibisasu bikomakomeye vy'Uburusiya. Uburusiya buriko burarungika benshi mu basirikare babwo bahora mu buraruko no mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Intumbero n'iyo kwongereza inguvu mu ntambara iriko ibera i Luhansk na Donetsk - ibice bimwe bimwe vyaho bikaba vyari bisanzwe vyarigaruriwe n'abiyonkoye bashigikiwe n'Uburusiya. Uburusiya buzoharonkera akoyoko mu kuronka inzira ngufi bucishamwo ivyo bukeneye ku rugamba - ivyabateye ikibazo bigatuma bananirwa mu bitero vy'i Kyiv. Uburusiya n'ababuyoboka ubu bagenzura ibice 90% vya Luhansk hamwe n'igice kirenga ca Donetsk - ahahoze ari umutima w'amahinguriro muri Ukraine. Hari umwotsi uri hejuru muri ako karere gasanzwe karasinzikajwe no kwimbwamwo ubutare hamwe n'amahinguriro. Ingabo za Ukraine zimaze imyaka umunani zigwana iyi ntambara ngaha. Muri bo harimwo bamwe mu basirikare karuhariwe b'ico gihugu. Abategetsi ba Buraya bavuga ko ingabo za Ukraine ziri mu karere ka Donbas ari aba mbere mu buhinga bwa gisirikare kandi bafise n'ibigwanisho bigezweho. Mu gihe ingabo z'Uburusiya ziriko ziregerana ziva mu buraruko, mu buseruko no mu bumanuko, hari ubwoba ko bashobora kubakikuza bagasigara mu kangaratete. Uburusiya buramaze kwigarurira igice kinini ca Ukraine. Ariko baracabandanya kwimba ibinogo  mu kubandanya urugamba.  Mu gihe twariko turaca mu buseruko ku birindiro vyabo twabonye ibirindiro vyabo vyo kwivuna umwansi, kandi hari himvye n'ibinogo. Anatoly, umusirikare w'imyaka 52, ariko ararabira mu matarubindi yinyegeje mu kinogo, ahari ibirindiro vy'abarusiya. Yambwiye ati:   "Ndabona abarusiya, turasa". Ariko yari yiteguye kugumya ico kirindiro. Yavuze ati : "Mu gihe bogerageza gufata ikirindiro cacu, nzobica. Ntabishe bazonyica. N'uko intambara imera." Bamwe mu bagabo twavuganye bemeza ko bateguye neza ibinogo binyegezamwo kandi ko uko biteguye kwivuna bibaha inguvu zisumba ababateye. Andrej, umusirikare w'imyaka 27, yari kumwe n'imbwa yiwe yitwa Lucifer mu kinogo. Yambwiye ati: "Dufise ibigwanisho vyiza, kandi dufise aho twinyegeje hakomeye, mu gihe abarusiya bodutera ngaha, bazotsindwa". Izo ngabo zivugako zagumye zirungikirwa ibigwanisho vy'i Buraya nka misile zitwa Javelin zirarasa ibimodoka bitamenwa. Barashima ariko bizeye kuronka vyinshi gusumba. Andrej yavuze ko prezida Putin "afise ingorane mu mutwe" (Psycho) ariko yongerako ko ibiziga vy'abasirikare biwe b'abarusiya bishobora kuba ibitabizo vy'isi yabo. Abo basirikare baboneka nk'abantu barushe  kubera iyo ntambara, ariko bose bavuga ko ishaka rikiri ryose. Icegera c'uwurongoye urugamba, Roman, yamaze imyaka ine yiga ivyigwa vy'inyifato y'abantu (Psychology) muri kaminuza ya Lviv. Iruhande yo kurwana, arafasha abo bari kumwe ku rugamba bafise ibibazo vyo mu mutwe. Ariko yavuze ati: "Mu bisanzwe abantu ntibakeneye ubufasha bwanje. Bafise ishaka rikomeye ryo kugwanira imiryango yabo, abagenzi n'ivyabo ugereranije n'abarusiya agereranya n'agasuzuguro kenshi nka "zombie". Abasirikare ba Ukraine bose barazi neza ko abarusiya bariko bararungika abasirikare benshi mu busruko. Barazi ko hagiye kuba ibintu bibi. Ariko Roman yemeza ko abasirikare ba Ukraine bafise amayeri yo kugwana akomeye. Avuga ko amatwara ya gisirikare y'Uburusiya atarigera atera imbere kuva habaye intambara ya kabiri y'isi yose, aho bishimikiza ibirwanisho birasa kure. Ariko ivyo bigwanisho birasa kure vy'Uburusiya bimaze gutuma abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bata izabo.

headline: 'Singiye gutanga imihoho na gato' – Zinedine Zidane inyuma y'uko Real itsinzwe na Shakhtar
text: Umumenyereza wa Real Madrid, Zinedine Zidane, yavuze ko "atagiye gutanga imihoho" inyuma yo gutsindwa na Shakhtar Donetsk, ivyatumye haba amakenga  ku gushika muri 1/8. Uwo mugwi umaze gutwara ibikombe 13 vy'imigwi yabaye iya mbere ku mugabane wa Buraya (Champions League), ubu uri mu kibanza ca gatatu mw'itsinda B. Imigwi yose ko ari ine ikaba ifise amahigwe yo kubandanya  ihiganwa inyuma y'urukino rwa nyuma ruzoba mu ndwi iza. Real itegerezwa gutsinda umwugwi uri kw'isonga wa Borussia Monchengladbach, kugira ishobore kubandanya ihiganwa. Inyuma yo gutsindwa ibitego 2-0, Zidane yagize ati: "Singiye gutanga imihoho na gato." Uwo mumenyereza w'umufaransa umugwi wiwe wari uherutse gutsindwa na Alaves 2-1 mw'ihiganwa ryo muri Espagne ku munsi wa gatandatu, yongeyeko ati: "Tuzoguma duhura n'ibibazo bitoroshe, tumerewe nabi, ariko dukeneye kwinanata." "Ndafise inguvu zose zikenewe kugira nshobore guhindura ibintu, kandi ngiye kwitanga uko nshoboye mu kubikora. N'abakinyi n'uko. "Twakinye neza, ntitwari dukwiye gutsindwa. Dukeneye gukura amaboko mu mpuzu hanyuma tukiyumvira urukino ruzokurikira." Bwabaye ubwa kabiri Shakhtar itsinze Real mw'ihiganwa ry'uyu mwaka kuko yaheruka kuyitsinda 3-2 mu rukino rwabereye i Madrid. Mu rundi rukino rwo mw'itsinda B rwabaye ku wa kabiri, Romelu Lukaku yinjije ibitego bibiri vya Inter Milan mu ntsinzi y'uwo mugwi ya 3-2 kuri Monchengladbach, bituma bagumana icizere co kubandanya ihiganwa. Uwo mugwi waheruka gutwara igikombe co muri Espagne, wabura abakinyi babiri bakomeye, Eden Hazard na kizigenza wawo Sergio Ramos. Ariko Karim Benzema we yasubiye gukinira kuri ico kibuga baheruka kuronkerako igikombe c'imigwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo mu 2018.

headline: DRC: ONU isaba amatohoza kw’iterabwoba ryo kwicwa rikorerwa Denis Mukwege
text: Michelle Bachelet, umunyamabanga mukuru w'igisata kijejwe agateka ka zina muntu mw'ishiramahwe ONU, asaba Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo gukora amatohoza kw'iterabwoba ryo kwicwa rikorerwa Denis Mukwege. Uyu muganga yahawe agashimwe k'amahoro kitiriwe Nobel  avuga ko yaronse amajambo amubwira ko ashobora kwicwa inyuma y'aho yiyamirije igandagurwa ry'abantu 18 mu ntara ya Kivu y'Ubumanuko mu kwezi guheze. Umupfasoni Bachelet asaba ko haba amatohoza ataho yegamiye kuri iryo terabwoba. Umukuru w'igihugu Felix Tshisekedi yariyemeje ko leta izokora amatohoza kuri iryo terabwoba kandi yiyemeza gukingira umutekano wa Muganga Mukwege. Muganga Mukwege ni umuhinga mu bijanye n'ubuzima bw'irondoka ku bagore (gynécologue), akaba afise ivuriro mu ntara ya Kivu y'Ubumanuko. Yaronkejwe agashimwe k'amahoro kitiriwe Nobel mu 2018 ku gikorwa ciwe co kwitaho abakorewe ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina mu gihe c'intambara.

headline: Akazi: Woshika gute ku bintu vyinshi ukoresheje umwanya muto?
text: Ukivyumva, bishobora kuba ata nsiguro bifise. Wokora gute umwanya muto kugira uronke umwimbu mwinshi? Aha turabasigurira ingene ivyo bishoboka n'ingene bishobora kubafasha mu migambi imwe imwe. Cal Newport, ikigo c'ubuhinga mu kugwiza umwimbu, kiratanga impanuro ku kungene ushobora akazi ku rwenge. Izo mpanuro harimwo ikintu citwa "gukora udakebaguzwa". Mu gutahura ico ari co gukora udakebaguzwa, birakenewe kumenya ico ari co akazi kadashemeye. Kusoma ubutumwa bwa mail, kuraba imbuga hwaniro, gukoresha amanama ku bintu bitihuta cane, ivyo vyose bishobora gufatwa nk'akazi kadashemeye. Ushobora kutavyirengagiza gose, ariko ushobora kubikura ku rutonde rw'ibintu vyo gukora mu mwanya umwe, kugira wihatire ku kandi kazi udakebaguzwa. N'ukwihatira cane ku bikorwa bikenewe cane no kuvyitondera cane. Ushobora no kwiherera kugira ntusamare. Ni vyo umwanditsi Maya Angelou yakunda gukora, mu gihe umugwizatunga Bill Gates azwi nk'umuntu yakunda kwiyugarana ahantu hiherereye kugira akore. Hari uburyo bwinshi bwo gushika ku ntumbero mu buzima. Umugwizatunga Warren Buffet ahanura kugira urutonde rw'ibintu 20 nkenerwa vyo gukora mu buzima, hanyuma ugaca akarongo musi y'ikigira gatanu. Hanyuma, ibindi 15 biri kuri urwo rutonde ivyihoze, gushika ubonye uhejeje ivyo bitanu vya mbere. Umwarimu wa kaminuza Angela Duckworth n'umuhinga muvyo inyifato yateguye indinganizoy'intumbero umuntu yipfuza gushikako. N'ukubigaburamwo ibice vyinshi, ikija hejuru kikaba ari co gekenewe cane (nko kuba umuganga canke gutwara umudari wa olempike). Intera ikurikira irimwo intumbero zito zito zikenewe kugira ushike ku ntumbero nyamukuru. Nk'akarorero, ubushakashatsi bukenewe kugira ukore ibibazo vyotuma uba umunyeshure wa kaminuza muvyo amagara y'abantu, canke imyimenyerezo ikenewe kugira wirukw imetero 100 kugira uronke umudari w'inzahabu. Intera yo hasi irimwo ibikorwa bishigikira ibiri mu ntera yo hejuru, gutyo gutyo gutyo. Mu gihe akazi kamwe katagushikana ku ntumbero nyamukuru, intera iyo ari yo yose kariko, ntugakore. Gukora umusi wose akazi ku muvuduko wa 100km/h si ikintu ciza. Akaruhuko karakenewe, kandi nawe karashobora kugufasha. Francesco Cirillo, umuhinga mu gukoresha neza umwanya, yaratoye igipimo c'akaruhuko ku cuma giharura iminota gifise iforoma y'urutomati yasanze mu gikoni ciwe. Ubwo buhinga buzwi kw'izina rya pomodoro (kivuye mw'izina urutomati mu gitaliyano), bukora mu kugabura akazi kawe mi bice vy'iminota 25. Ugakurikizako iminota 5 y'akaruhuko ifasha mu mwimbu. Sohoka hanze gutembera gato hakuguma uraba imbuga hwaniro - ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko utwo turuhuko dushobora umererwa neza gusumba mu kwitegurira iyindi minota 25 y'akazi. Cal Newport arafise uko afata akazi umuntu adakebaguzwa, ariko arazi kandi kugahagarika no kugira umwanya wiwe. Kugira aheraheze umusi w'akazi, yari afise akamenyero ko guhagarika. N'ukuvuga kumenya ko umusi uheze, kwihweza akazi katashoboye kurangira, gutegura ibizokorwa bukeye, no kugara inyabwonko ngendanwa canke ikaye y'imyimenyerezo no kuvuga ijambo nka "ndaheje kugara burundu". Uko wobivuga kose bikuvako, ariko ayo majambo ategerezwa kwerekana ko uhejeje akazi k'uyo musi n'intango y'akaruhuko, ko widegemvya ushobora kwinezereza. Ako kanya utegerezwa kukaronka! Inkuru yo kuri  BBC Bitesize

headline: Wafcon: 'Sinari nzi ko hariho imigwi y'abagore y'umupira w'amaguru' - Esperance Habonimana
text: Igihe umurundikazi Esperance Habonimana, umukobwa muto mu bitavye ihiganwa rya Wafcon, yatangura gukina umupira w'amaguru, yatanguye nk'abandi bose muri Africa - akina mu migwi y'abagabo. Uwo mukobwa muto cane mw'ihiganwa rya Afrika ry'umupira w'amaguru mu bagore (Wafcon) avuga ko impamvu ari imwe gusa isanzwe. Uwo mukobwa w'imyaka 15 yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati:"Narakina umupira ariko sinigeze menya ko hariho imigwi  y'umupira w'amaguru y'abagore." "Nakina mu migwi y'abagabo na basaza banje kubera mu mutwe wanje sinigera nibaza ko hariho imigwi y'abagore." Ubu ari mu mugwi nserukiragihugu w'Uburundi ishitse mu nkino za nyuma ubwa mbere, n'aho atashoboye gukina inkino zibiri za mbere, yose umugwi wiwe watsinzwemwo, ariko aranezererewe no kuba yaragiye muri Maroc muri iryo higanwa. Uwo mukinyi wo hagati agira ati:"Sinigeze nibaza ko nzoshika ngaha. Narakoze cane, naranezerewe cane banshize ku rutonde." Habonimana akina mu mugwi wo ku mugwa mukuru w'ubutunzi, i Bujumbura mu Burundi. Nk'umwana muto mu muryango, ku myaka 12 yaciye atangura kwigishwa umupira na se wiwe na basaza biwe na bo basanzwe bakina umupira. Habimana asigura ati:"Nahora nsohoka njanye na basaza banje - misi yose naguma ndabasaba kumvyura mu gihe nasinziriye, igihe baba bagiye tugaca tujana." "Umusi umwe, umugore umwe afise umugwi w'umupira w'amaguru w'abagore yarambonye ndiko ndakina mu bagabo, aca ansaba kuja mu mugwi w'abagore, hanyuma yaciye aza muhira aravugana n'abavyeyi banje." Umunezero w'uko Habonimana amenye ko hariho imigwi y'abagore wamaze umwanya urume rumara kuko nyina wiwe ntiyamushigikiye muri urwo rukino. Yibuka ibi:"Mawe yambwiye -'Sindigera mbona abagore bakina umupira w'amaguru, kubera iki guma wihatira kuwukina?"  "Yambwira ko adashaka ko nkina umupira w'amaguru kubera noca nkomera cane nk'abahungu, ariko data aramubwira 'reka umwana yikinire'" "Prezida w'imigwi y'abagore y'umupira w'amaguru yaraje aravugana na mawe amubwira ko hariho abagore bakina umupira w'amaguru kandi ko atari ibintu bibi. Hari abagore bafise abana ariko babandanya gukina, hanyuma mawe aratinda aragondozwa arandeka ndakina." Amakenga ya nyina wa Habonimana ku bagore bakina umupira w'amaguru arumvikana kuko gukina umupira w'amaguru ku abapfasoni mu Burundi bitanguye vuba. Ico gihugu cakinye urukino rwa mbere rwemewe na FIFA mu 2016, ariko carateye imbere cane muri iyi myaka itandatu iheze inyuma yo kuronka imfashanyo z'amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu igenewe guteza imbere umupira w'amaguru ku bapfasoni. Uwo muyabaga yizeye ko ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Burundi rizobandanya gukora mu ntumbero yo guteza imbere umupira w'amaguru ku bagore mu gihugu ciwe, ariko Habonimana aza yamaze gutangura kurota kujana ubumenyi afise muri urwo rukino mu bindi bihugu. Avuga ati:"Ndizera ko nshobora gukina umupia mu bindi bihugu kuko ntushobora gutera imbere ugumye mu kibanza kimwe." Gukinira Uburundi, buri mu kibanza kiri hasi cane mu vyitavye iryo higanwa (buri mu kibanza ca 169 kuri bihugu  181 biri ku rutonde rwa Fifa), muri Wafcon bishobora muri kazoza kumufasha gushika ku ndoto ziwe, kandi uravye imyaka yiwe, arashobora kubishikako. Gutsindwa n'iyindi migwi mishasha, Botswana 4-2 mu rukino rwa mbere, gutsindwa na Afrika y'Epfo 3-1, yabaye iya kabiri mw'ihiganwa riheruka, vyari vyitezwe ariko bisize uwo mugwi habi.

headline: Manchester United: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer yirukanywe inyuma yo gutsindwa na Watford
text: Umumenyereza wa Manchester United Ole Gunnar Solskjaer yasezerewe muri uyo murwi inyuma yo gutsindwa na Watford 4-1 ejo kuwa gatandatu. Mu nkino indwi zose, Man United yatsinzemwo rumwe gusa, muri zo hari urwo yatsindiwe muhira na Liverpool 5-0, n'urwo yatsinzwe na Manchester City 2-0, ubu ikaba iri mu kibanza c'indwi mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza Premier League. Itangazo risohowe n'uyu murwi wa Old Trafford rivuga riti: "Turababajwe n'uko vyabaye ngombwa ko dushika kuri iyi ngingo itoroshe". "N'aho izi ndwi nkeya za nyuma zabaye mbi, ibi ntivyoca bifuta igikorwa yakoze mu myaka itatu iheze co kwubaka umushinge wa kazoza. "Turashimiye cane Ole ku twigoro twiwe nk'umumenyereza tukaba tumwipfurije kuroranirwa mu migambi yiwe yo muri kazoza. "Ikibanza afise muri kahise k'umurwi kizobandanya kibungabungwa, atari nk'umukinyi gusa, ariko nk'umugabo akomeye yadushikanye mu bihe vy'umunezero. Tumuhaye ikaze i Old Trafford mu gihe cose azoba ashatse kugaruka nk'umunyamuryango wa Manchester United. "Michael Carrick niwe azoca afata ibintu mu minwe mu nkino ziri imbere, mu gihe umurwi ukirondera umumenyereza mfatakibanza azowumenyereza gushika mu mpera z'umwaka w'inkino". Iyi ngingo itangajwe inyuma y'aho abategetsi bakuru bakuru w'uyu murwi, harimwo na ba nyenewo, The Glazers, bakoraniye bakaganira kuri kazoza kiwe. Bumvikanye ko uru rukino yatsinzwe na Watford ruba urwa nyuma kuri Solskjaer kandi ko bagiye kwumvikana ku bijanye n'ibogozwa ryiwe. Abategetsi b'uyu murwi bari babanje kwihanganira Solskjaer, bibaza ko yari gushobora guhindura ibintu. Ariko ibintu vyagiye guhinduka ejo aho batsinzwe na Watford, kizigenza nawe, Harry Maguire, agahabwa ikarata itukura. Hanyuma kandi, mu gihe ari ngombwa ko baronka itike yo kubandanya mu mahiganwa ya Champions League, abarongoye Man United baboba ko batoshobora kwigerezako ngo bareke batsindwe na Villareal ya Unai Emery. Hari ababona ko uyu mumenyereza w'imyaka 48 yari yaragiriwe ubuntu kubona muri iki gihe abakinyi bari mu karuhuko k'inkino mpuzamakungu atirukanywe. Gushika ubu uwusobora kumusubirira. Ivyo kuzana Zinedine Zidane bisa n'ivyanse, ariko hari abandi bashobora kwikorwako, muri bo hakaba harimwo Brendan Rodgers wa Leicester, Mauricio Pochettino wa PSG hamwe na Erik ten Hag wa Ajax. Ikibazo ni uko bose bagifitaniye amasezerano n'iyi mirwi, kandi bikaba bitazwi nimba hari n'umwe ashobora kwivana mu murwi wiwe. Umunyegori wa Manchester United David de Gea avuga ko ayo baraye baboneye muri uru rukino ari "ibiterasoni, amahano yiyongera ku yandi". Hampande yo guterwa 4-1, uru rukino rwagiye kurangira kizigenza wa Oldtraford Harry Maguire yirukanywe mu kibuga ahawe ikarata itukura. "Ingene twakinye uno musi ni ibiterasoni. "Mu gice ca mbere twakinye nabi cane - ni ibintu bidashobora kwihanganirwa uravye abakinyi dufise. Ni ayandi mahano. Nivyo twaragize ibibazo, ariko simbona n'ukuri ico novuga. "Naraciye mu bibazo muri uno murwi, ariko ubu ni ibindi bintu - turabura ico dukora dufashe umupira, ahubwo dusanga turiko turatsindwa. Ni ukuri ni ibihe bitoroshe. "Biroroshe kwagiriza umumenyereza n'abo bakorana, ariko ababa bafise ibintu mu minwe ni abakinyi bari mu kibuga kuko nibo bategerezwa kurwana urugamba rwo kurondera ibitsindo. Ni ngombwa ko twiraba, umwe umwe ukwiwe, hanyuma tukagira ico dukoreye umurwi wacu n'abakunzi bawo. Biragoye gusigura igituma twakinye uko twakinye - si mbona ico novuga. "Biragoye gutahura - turababaye, turashavuye. Jewe ubwanje umutima urameneka - ni ibihe bitoroshe ku murwi wose". Urugero rwa Manchester United rwo gutsinda kuva inyuma ya Noel ya 2020 muri Premier League ubu ruri musi ya 50%, aho mu nkino 37 zose imaze gutsinda 18 gusa. Gushika ubu, imaze gutakaza inkino umunani, inganya muri 11, ubu ikaba itari muri zine za mbere. Muri kino gihe, mu nkino 12, uyu murwi umaze gutsindwa ibitsindo 21 mw'ihiganwa. Ifirimbi ya nyuma imaze kuvuga, Solskjaer, gushika ubu atari bwigere atahukana n'igikombe na kimwe kuva ashitse muri uyu murwi mu kwa cumi na kabiri 2018, yazungurutse imbere y'abafana ba Man United abaramutsa ariko mu buryo bwo kubasaba imbabazi. Umukinyi wo hagati, Bruno Fernandes avuga ko baba abakinyi no ku bajejwe ubumenyereza, bose bakwiye gutabwako impfane hakwidogera Solskjaer wenyene. Solskjaer ati: "Igice ca mbere catubereye amahano kandi simbona ingene nosigura igituma twakinye uko twakinye batatwinjirana uko bishakiye. Twararushijwe". "Ubu mu mitwe y'aba bahungu ibintu bimeze nabi cane - twaritaye mu rudubi twongera duta mu rudubi n'abafana bacu. Biragoye guhagarara ng'aha ngo ubisigure, ariko ni umupira w'amaguru, dutegerezwa kuvyakira uko nyene". Ihinduka ni ngombwa Man United yiteze kuja gukina na Villarreal muri Ligue des Champions/ Champions League ku wa kabiri imbere y'uko ihura na Chelsea, uwundi mukeba wo muri Premier League, ku kibuga cayo ca Stamford Bridge ku wa Mungu itariki 28 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe. Yiteze kandi kuzohura na Arsenal, Crystal Palace, Young Boys na Norwich gushika hagati mu kwa cumi na kabiri. Uwahoze akina inyuma muri Arsenal Martin Keown avuga ko kazoza ka Solskjaer muri Man U kari kageze ahatemba. Keown yabwiye BBC ati: "Ni vyo ko ari umwe mu bantu bayo, ni umunyamuryango muri urya murwi, ariko vyongeye ntibashobora kwirengagiza ko afise uruhara mu ngorane barimwo". "Ni ngombwa ko haba ihinduka. Ibintu bimeze nabi cane kuri uyu mumenyereza". Alan Hutton, yahoze ari umukinyi w'inyuma wa Ecosse/Scotland yabwiye BBC Radio 5 Live ko "ibintu vyagenze nabi cane" kuri Manchester United mu gihe "ari umurwi wuzuyemwo ibihangange, mugabo ntaco bawumariye". Hagati aho, si Manchester United yonyene yaraye ihuye n'ingorane, kuko na mugenzi wayo Arsenal,yaraye ibonye ayo imfyisi yaboneye ku mugezo, mu guterwa ibitsindo 4-0 na Liverpool yaboneka ko itashobora kwihanganira ko Chelsea, iri kw'isonga rya Premier League, iyisumvya amanota indwi yose. Arsenal yari imaze gukina inkino cumi zose idatsindwa.

headline: Umuganga atagira imiti yo kuvura abarwayi biwe
text: D﻿amian Zane B﻿BC News Ikena ry’imiti y’ibanze ririca abarwayi mu ntara ya  Tigray  mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia, ubu imaze amezi 23 mu ntambara kandi ikaba yugaranywe ata kintu gishobora kwinjirayo. Impande zompi zarumvikanye kwitaba ibiganiro vy’amahoro muri Afrika y’Epfo, kandi umuganga atakamba asaba ko akaga kugarije abantu koja mu bibazo vya mbere vyo kwiga no gutorera inyishu. Muganga Fasika Amdeslasie avuga nk’uko umenga ntaco bimubwiye, ariko ivyo avuga biteye akoba. “Dukenye imiti yo gutimbisha (gutera ikinya), dukenye serumu, ntihagira antibiotique, niho rero ububona indwara zikomera, mu nyuma abarwayi bagapfa ata gitabara - uzinze amaboko”. Uwo muganga ivyo yabivuze ahamagawe kuri Whatsapp kuri internet ya satellite, imbonekarimwe ku murwa mukuru wa Tigray, Mekelle. Abarwayi ntibagira uko bagira, ariko n’abaganga nico kimwe. Yamara, ariko arakuyagira ingaruka z’intambara ku gisata c’amagara y’abantu aho muri Tigray, Muganga Fasika, akora ku bitaro bikuru vya Ayder ku murwa mukuru Mekelle, mu maso ntiwomenya ko ariko aravuga ibintu bibabaje. Mu kiringo c’imyaka ibiri iheze, Tigray ntizi ibibera ahandi kw’isi. Intambara yatanguye muri Munyonyo (11) mu  2020 igihe ingabo za reta ya Ethiopia zarondera kwaka ubutegetsi bw’iyo ntara umugambwe TPLF (Tigray People’s Liberation Front). Intara ya Tigray yaciye yugaranwa rwose igihe TPLF yatunganya igitero ikisubiza igice kinini c'iyo ntara muri Ruheshi mu 2021. Nta bintu bishobora kwinjira, banki zarahagaze, terefone nazo ziracibwa ku buryo bidashoboka guhamagara umuntu muri iyo ntara. ONU igereranya ko abantu bangana na miriyoni 5.4 – hafi batatu kuri bane mu bantu bose baba muri Tigray – bakeneye imfashanyo y’ivyo kurya kuko intambara yahungabanije uruhererakane rw’ivyo kurya. N’abarwayi ntagahengwe bagirirwa, n’ubwo bo ata ruhara bafise mu rugamba. Hari imiti n’ibikoresho nkoramutima vyazanwe n’ishami rya ONU ryitaho amagara kw’isi hamwe na CICR – ariko iza ryayo ryagiye riba ahandi ntiribe, noneho ibintu birahagarra rwose igihe intanbara zasubira kwaduka muri Myandagaro (8), inyuma y’agahengwe k’amezi atanu. Dr Fasika  yabwiye ikiganiro ca BBC Newsday ati: “Nta miti y’abarwayi bacu dufise, ntitugira ibikoresho vyo kubaga, nta ncanco (inkingo) dufise zo gukingira abana,  nta insuline dufise yo guha abarwaye diabete.” “Abarwayi bose nta gahengwe. Tubabwira gusubira imuhira iwabo tutabavuye.” Imiti yo kuvura abarwaye cancer ntiboneka namba, kandi ntibashobora kugirirwa ‘radiotherapie’ kuko imashini yo kubikora iri ku murwa mpuzantaray, Addis Ababa. Kugendayo ntibishoboka. “Muri make, abarwayi bacu bategerezwa gupfa,” nk’uko bivugwa n’uwo muganga w’imyaka 41 yigeze kuba umukuru w’ishure ry’ubuganga. Abavuzi baguma baraba aho abarwaye amafyigo amagara yabo aguma yunyuka kuko imiti yo gukora dialyse ija iraboneka yongera ibura. Ku bwa Muganga Fasika, “Imiti ya nyuma yaje muri Ruheshi (6),  kuva muri Myandagaro (8) nta kintu na kimwe casubiye kwinjira none ubu ibikoresho vyaduheranye ku barwayi  25 dufise”. Avuga ko abarwayi b’amafyigo 90 bapfuye “bari imbere y’abaganga” akibaza ibigiye gushikira abo 25 basigaye. Ku bijanye no gupima, icumba co gupima (laboratoire) ntikigira imiti ikenewe mu gupima, akenshi abaganga bakaba batamenya neza ingorane umurwayi aba afise. Kuri ivyo vyose hiyongerako ingorane z’umuyagankuba ukunda gucikagurika mu gihe ata bitoro bihari vyo gushira mu moteri zitanga umuyagankuba. Bisigura ko ibitaro bishobora kumara iminsi biri mu kizime. Muri urwo rusobekerane rw’ingorane we n’abo bakorana barimwo, ijwi rya Muganga Fasika ntiriserura uburemere bw’ivyo ariko aravuga. ”Naraheze ibishobisho, bisigaye ari ubuzima bwa minsi yose, ndiko mvuga ivyo mbamwo ku munsi ku munsi. ”Turirinda gutwarwa n’ibishobisho. Tuzomenya umutwaro twiremetse umunsi twavuye  muri ibi. Ubundi ni kamere k’umuntu ko kwirwanako kutavyibaza, ivyo urabireka ugakora ivyo ushoboye gukora.” Ariko abaganga n’abaforoma, co kimwe n’abakozi ba reta, bahanganye no kuba badahembwa kuva mu kwezi kwa Rusama (5). Muganga Fasika arungikirwa amafaranga n’abagenzi n’incuti bari mu mahanga ariko, ivyo bitwara amafaranga menshi kuko abayavunja bakurako menshi kuko bategerezwa kuyinjiza mu mpisho muri Tigray. Muganga Fasika avuga ko “ibi bitaro ari ubuzima bwanje”, agasigura ikimutera kubandanya akora n’aho ahanzwe n’ibibazo vyinshi. “Umwuga uraguhamagara. Iyo ushoboye kugenda ukayagisha abarwayi ukabaha impanuro hanyuma ugakora ivyo ushoboye, ico nico kintu gihambaye. Si jewe gusa, n’abandi bose dukorana ngaha.” Ku kibazo c’ibiganiro bishobora kuba hagati ya reta mpuzantara na TPLF, Muganga Fasika ntashaka kuvuga poritike. Ariko arajwe ishinga n’uko mu gihe ibiganiro ari igikorwa ca poritike, bazoguma mu ngorane mu gihe vyo bishobora kumara igihe imbere y’uko hari ico bishikako. “Ibiganiro bishobora gufata umwanya. Ariko ubuzima bwacu, ubuzima bw’abana, ubuzima bw’abarwayi uwo mwanya ntawo bufise. Nifuza rero ko vyobanza ku kaga kugarije abantu.

headline: Umumenyereza wa Maroc ati ‘Africa izotsindira igikombe c’isi mu myaka 15-20’
text: Afrika izotsindira igikombe c’isi yose “mu myaka 15-20”, niko umumenyereza w’umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Maroc Walid Regragui avuga, akaba ari na we mumenyereza wa mbere wa Afrika ahatswe gushika kuri iyo ntumbero. Barongowe na Regragui, Les Lions de l'Atlas, babaye umurwi wa mbere wo ku mugabane wa Afrika ushitse mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi, aho bagiye gukurwamwo n’Ubufaransa buhejeje ihiganwa muri mu kibanza ca kabiri. Uyu mumenyereza w’imyaka 47 yizeye ko Afrika izoronka akarusho mu myaka iri imbere, aho izoba iserukirwa n’ibihugu birenga bitanu ku ncuro ya mbere kuva mu 2026 no kubandanya. Regragui ati: "Mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi kiri imbere, tuzoba dufise ibibanza icenda, ibi bikazodufasha kwiga gusumba. "Mu myaka 15-20, ndazi neza ko umurwi wa Afrika uzotsindira igikombe. Kuko igihe cose tuzokwama tuhigira vyinshi, rero urwaruka rwacu ruzoba rufise mu maraso igikombe c’isi”. Kuva mu 1994, Afrika iserukirwa n’ibihugu bitanu – ibibanza bike cane ugereranije na 13 vya Bulaya, ikaba isumvya ikibanza kimwe Amerika y’ubumanuko isanzwe ifise ibihugu bike cane rwose, ikanganya na Aziya (iyo itaramutse yakira igikombe). Nyamara iki giharuro kuri Afrika kizokwiyongera hafi incuro zibiri  mbere gishobore gushika no kw’icumi mu gihe hogira igihugu cayo corengana inkino mpuzamigabane za play-off /barrage zo guhiganira ibibanza vy’abazokwitaba ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi. Uyu mugabane ntiworoherwa gushika muri ca gice co gukuranamwo, aho mu 2018 ata murwi n’umwe washoboye gushikayo,  igihe cose ikama iserukirwa n’umwe gusa urengana inkino z’amatsinda kuva mu 1994 wongererejwe igitigiri, kiretse mu 2014 na 2022, aho imirwi ibiri ari yo yashoboye kurengana. Uyo yahoze akinira umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Maroc avuga ati: "Ingorane zacu nk’imirwi ya Afrika, ntarinze kunegura cane, ni uko dufise ibibanza bitanu gusa, rero ibi bigasigura ko muri kino gihe Misiri itari kubamwo, canke Nigeria, Afrika y’Epfo, Mali, n’ibindi. "Rero, igihe cose, kubera twama duhanganye (mu kurondera itike), ntivyoroshe na gato (gushobora kwigira ku gikombe c’isi)”. Inyuma y’aho itsindiwe na Croatia mu rukino rwo kurondera ikibanza ca gatatu ku wa gatandatu, yama iheza iri mu bibanza vya mbere mu mahiganwa atandatu y’igikombe c’isi imaze gukina, Regragui avuga ko bari kuri urwo rugero kubera bobo bama baja muri aya mahiganwa.
