Uyu mugabo yatsindiye ihiganwa ry’imirwi yabaye iya mbere ku mugabane wa Afrika mu ntango z’uno mwaka agira ati: "(Jose) Mourinho – igihe yari muri Manchester United – yaravuze ivyerekeye ADN/DNA y’uyo murwi, ariko ndibaza ko ikintu nk’iki kibaho no mu mirwi nserukirabihugu”. "Kubera iki igihe cose imirwi ya Bulaya (yama ishika mu nkino za nyuma z’igikombe c’isi)? Croatia – kubera iki badutsinze bakarangiza ihiganwa bari mu kibanza ca gatatu? Ni uko bamenyereye cane izi nkino, igihe cose bama baronka itike yo kuja mu gikombe c’isi yose. "Iyo wama witabira buri higanwa ry’igikombe c’isi, ukama ukina izi nkino igihe cose, zirakwigisha, abakinyi bakiri bato barahigira vyinshi. Ibi bituma mw’ihiganwa rikurikira aba bakinyi bakiri bato bazosubirayo bakomeye cane”. Inyuma y’imyaka 20, Maroc yagarutse mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi mu 2018, isubira uno mwaka, ibitari bwigere bibaho ko yikurikiranya uku kuva aho iherukira mu 1994-1998. Muri Qatar, Maroc yateye intambwe zidasanzwe n’aho yahuye n’imirwi y’ibihangange kw’isi: Ububirigi (2), Espagne (7), Portugal (9), ikongera kandi, mu nkino zo mu matsinda, igaca imbere Croatia yari yahejeje ari iya kabiri mu 2018. Umumeyereza wa Maroc yongerako ati: "Twaharonkeye inyigisho z’imyaka myinshi iyo uronse akaryo ko guhura na Croatia incuro zibiri mw’ihiganwa rimwe, igihugu kiza mu kibanza ca gatatu kw’isi”. "Gukina na Espagne, Portugal, Ubufaransa, Ububirigi, na Canada, ni ibintu bidasanzwe – inkino zose zikomeye”. Inyuma yo kwinjizwa igitsindo kimwe gusa mu nkino zitanu za mbere muri Qatar, mu nyuma vyahavuye vyanka kuri Maroc igihe itsinzwe n’Ubufaransa 2-0 mu nkino z’igice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma ku wa gatatu, imbere y’uko itsindwa na Croatia 2-1 ku wa gatandatu. N’aho Regragui yababaye cane kubona Maroc itashoboye kuba umurwi wa mbere wa Afrika wari kuba ushitse mu rukino rwa nyuma canke ngo uhereze mu kibanza ca gatatu, ariteze ko intambwe idasanzwe umurwi wiwe washitseko igiye kwibonekeza ubu bwa vuba. Ati: "Turababaye, ariko ni twikangura tuzomenya neza igikorwa kidasanzwe twashitseko. "Inyuma y’uru rukino rwa nyuma, tuzokwihweza ngene ibintu vyagenze, ndazi ko tuzosanga Maroc yakoze ibintu bikomye cane. Ubu rero, ndazi ko dufise igikorwa kidasanzwe imbere yacu”. Uyu mumenyereza yiteze neza ko n’iyindi mirwi ikomakomeye y’umugabane nayo nyene igiye gukurikiranirwa hagufi muri kazoza. "Ubu hagiye kuba vyinshi vyitezwe ku yindi mirwi ya Afrika irondera gushika ku vyo twashitseko. "Maroc irerekanye ko (imirwi ya Afrika) ishoboye kandi itari kure cane (y’imirwi y’ibihangange), rero itandukaniro hagati y’imirwi ya Bulaya n’iya Afrika ni rito cane gusumba uko vyahoze, kandi ni utuntu duto cane. “Ibi bigiye gutera intege umupira w‘amaguru muri Afrika”.

headline: Man Utd v Tottenham: Ni iki kirindiriye Jose Mourinho niyasubira Old Trafford uno munsi?
text: Jose Mournho arasubira ku kibuga ca Old Trafford ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa gatatu nyuma y'umwaka aho yahaheruka, aho yatsinda Fulham 4-1 itariki 8 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri 2018, ikaba yabaye intsinzi ya nyuma yiwe amenyereza United. Mourinho afashe urugendo mu buraruko bw'Ubwongereza ajanye ikipe ya Tottenham yagaruye udutege kuva aho yirukaniye Mauricio Pochettino itariki 19 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe. Iyi kipe ubu ifise intsinzi zitatu mu mikino itatu nyene, intsinzi zayifashije gushika mu kibanza ca gatandatu muri Premier League. Umukinyi akinira Ubwongereza hagati, Dele Ali, niwe asa n'uwahinduwe cane n'umuzo wa Mourinho. Ku buryo buhushanye, ikipe Mourinho yahoze amenyereza yo ihagaze nabi. Niyinjira mu cumba c'abashitsi ca Old Trafford, icumba bivugwa ko yagabaniye ubwaguke, Mourinho araba yiteguriye guhura na United iri mu kibanza ca 10 ku rutonde. Imaze gutsinda gusa inkino zine muri rino higanwa, ibintu bitari bwayishikire kuva mu 1990. None ninde yungukiye mu kuva kwa Mourinho muri United? Hanyuma abakunzi ba Tottenham bokwiyubara iki hihwejwe igihe uyu munye Portugal yamaze Old Trafford? Mourinho aguma yemanga ko ibiriko biraba muri Tottenham muri uno mwanya atari we babikesha. Ariko ni bake bemera ivyo avuga. Uko bimeze kwose, urusaku ruherekeza Mourinho rwama rutuma ari we agaragara cane, naho yoba atari we bivuyeko. Yakeje agahungu gatora imipira kuba karafashije Tottenham gutsinda Olympiakos mu rukino rwa Champions League itariki 26 k'ukwa cumi na rimwe, aca atumira ako gahumba mu cumba abakinyi bihinduriramwo mu rukino rwo ku wa gatandatu batsinze Bournemouth. Ivyo vyose vyaciye vyegekwa kuri Mourinho. Co kimwe no kwivyukiranya kwa Alli agatangura gukina neza, nakwo kwashizwe kuri Mourinho. Amakuru ava muri Tottenham avuga ko Mourinho gushika ubu ari nk'aho ataco arahindura. Rimwe na rimwe arara mu buraro bw'ikibanza co kwimenyerezamwo ca Tottenham, ariko ivyo ntibizovugisha benshi nk'imyaka ibiri n'igice yamaze mw'ihoteli Lowry i Manchester. Ariko, harabaye agakoryo. Mourinho ntakunda guhatira abakinyi ibikorwa nk'uko vyari kuri Pochettino, rero ntihazobamwo igikenye nk'uko vyahora. Ahubwo, bazokwibanda ku guhagarara neza mu kibuga, baba bafise umupira canke batawufise. Ntibiri mu kuri kuvuga ko Mourinho ari umumenyereza yibanda ku kuzibira - ariko aba yitunganije neza cane. Nk'uko United yabibonye nyuma y'iyirukanwa rya Mourinho, amahirwe Tottenham iriko iraronka ni ayo kugira ijwi rishasha, uburyo bushasha hamwe no gutangura gushasha. Mourinho ntavyo yari gukora birusha butsinda imikino yiwe itatu ya mbere y'amahiganwa. Gutsinda bitagoranye West Ham na Bournemouth, hamwe n'urukino rushushe bakinye na Olympiakos. Subiza amaso ku ntango yiwe muri United. Gutsinda vyoroshe muri Premier League Bournemouth na Southampton, bikurikirwa n'igitsindo co ku munota wa nyuma ca Marcus Rashford kuri Hull catanze intsinzi. Urukino rwa kane nirwo rutagenze neza. Gutsindirwa muhira na Manchester City vyakurikiwe no guhitamwo abakinyi kwa Mourinho kwavuzwe cane. Yasimbuye Henrikh Mkhitarya nyuma y'igice ca mbere. Mourinho, ataduduriyeko, avyita "gukina nabi". Mkhitaryan yaciye amara amezi hafi atatu ata rundi rukino atanguye. Amaze kuva muri United, uwo munye Armenia yavuze ko ukwizerana n'umumenyereza wari kwaratosekaye. Ubudasa bw'ukuntu Mourinho yafashe Eric Dier mu minsi indwi iheze ntikwari kwigaragaza kurusha. Nyuma y'urukino na Olympiakos, aho yasubiriza uwo mukinyi w'Ubwongereza ku munota wa 29, Mourinho yamusavye ikigongwe ku mugaragaro. Yaciye amusubiza mw'ikipe mu rukino rwakugirkiye na Bournemouth, aho Dier yakinye iminota yose 90. Ibi vyoba vyerekana ko Mourinho asigaye afise ubuntu, canke kwoba ari ukwisemba kubera ukuntu yafashe umukinyi wo hagati ameze nk'abo yamwe yikorako mu kumenyereza kwiwe? Ubiravye bisa nk'uko yoba koko asigaye afise ubuntu ufatiye ku kuntu uyu mugabo w'imyaka 56 yakoze ku mutima abakozi ba Tottenham. Muri United, hari icuka c'icizere igihe yatangazwa nk'uwuzosubirira Louis Van Gaal, ariko umupira wa Mourinho ntaco wasumbije uw'uwo Muholandi - kandi ugushaka kwagaragara kwari guke. Mourinho ntiyigeze atinya kuvuga amajambo akwega induru. Muri United, batanguye indwi nyuma y'ugusimburwa kare kwa Mkhitaryan mu rukino rukomeye. Nyuma y'ukundi gutsindwa - na Watford - Mourinho yifatiye mu gahanga Luke Saw nk'inkwezi y'akabi, yagiriza uwo mukinyi wo hagati w'Ubwongereza kuba yari ku metero 25 z'uwo yagomba kuzibira, hako zobaye zitanu, kuri ubwo rero akaba atari gushobora guhagarika umupira wavuyemwo intsinzi ya Watford. Shaw yatanguye urukino rumwe gusa rwa Premier League mu mezi atanu yakurikiye. Mourinho aramaze kwemanga ko akoresha amajambo yo guha ingoga Alli, amubaza niba amaze gusa amezi atanu akinira Tottenham canke niba ari mwene wabo. Umwimbu wabaye akarora uhore - ariko, birashoboka, ko kuronka umwimbu nk'uwo kuri Christian Eriksen bishobora kugorana ufatiye ku kuntu amasezerano uwo munye Danemark afitanye na Tottenham, azohera mu mpera z'amahiganwa y'ubu. Kandi, naho yasohoye hafi miriyoni £400 agura abakinyi akiri Old Trafford, Mourinho asa n'uwufise ikipe ihagaze neza atigeze agira muri Manchester. Mu bantu nka Toby Alderweireld, Jan Vertonghen na Davinson Sanchez, afise abakinyi batatu bo hagati bameze neza cane, ico kibanza akaba ataremerewe kugikomeza mu mwaka wiwe wa nyuma Old Trafford. Alli ubu ariko arakina neza cane mu kibanza ca nimero 10 co kimwe nk'uko Frank Lampard yabikoze - naho we yaba ari imbere cane - igihe Mourinho yashika ubwa mbere mu Bwongereza avuye muri Porto mu 2004. Kandi naho Harry Kane atari Didier Drogba mu kuremwa, arinjiza kenshi kurusha uwo ari we wese muri United kuva umwaka wa mbere wa Zlatan Ibrahimovic muri United wiganjemwo kuvunika, nyuma y'aho uwo munye Swede yinjirije ibitsindo 28 mu nkino 45. Dufatiye ku kuntu yakiriwe Old Trafford igihe aherukayo nk'umusesanguzi wa Sky Sport, Mourinho araza kwakirwa neza n'abakunzi ba United. Kanatsinda, yarabahaye ibikombe bibiri anashikana iyo kipe ku kibanza ciza mw'ihiganwa - ica kabiri - kuva Sir Alex Ferguson agiye mu za bukuru mu 2013. United yari iya gatandatu Mourinho agenda, iyo kipe mu mwiherero ikaba ivuga ko ataciyongereye mu buryo bwo gukina canke mu gutsinda igiye yayimenyereza. Ariko ikibazo uwamusubiriye, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer, afise ni uko - nyuma yo gutangura neza - United yateye intambwe inyuma cane. Kunganya ku wa Mungu i Old Trafford na Aston Villa vyatumye iyo kipe ija mu kibanza ca 10, ikaba imaze gutsinda kane n'amanota 18 mu nkino 14. Kugira ashikane 26 mu nkino 17 bitatumye Mourinho atirukanwa haraciye amaze 12, Solskjaer akeneye gutsinda inkino zitatu zikurikira, zirimwo uruno rwa derby na Manchester City kuwa gatandatu. Nivyo ko uyu munye Norvege agishigikiwe cane imbere no hanze y'ikipe kandi akaba yariyemeje gukinisha abakinyi bakiri bato - ibintu Mourinho atigeze akozwa, naho kenshi yavuze ko ashaka kubikora. Ariko ikipe ya United biragaraga ko hari ivyo ibuze. Bataguze abakinyi mu kwezi kwa mbere, Solskjaer bizomugora gushika muri batandatu ba mebre, aho ntituvuze kuronka ikibanza ca Champions League. Kandi nta n'umwe, naho yoba akunzwe gute, yorusimba mw'ihiganwa ritababarira rya Premier League, abandanije atsindwa.

headline: B﻿urundi: Umwami yashingurwa gute?
text: Urupfu n’ishingurwa vy’Umwamikazi w’Ubwongereza Elizabeth II vyatumye turondera kwibuka ingene abami bo mu karere - na cane cane bo mu Burundi no mu Rwanda - bashingurwa. Mu Burundi, iyo umwami yatanze - ntibavuga ko yapfuye - haba imigirwa myinshi ijanye n’urupfu rwiwe. Ariko abami babiri ba nyuma b’Uburundi ntibayigiriwe. Mu Burundi intwaro y'ubwami yarangiye mu 1966 igisirikare gifashe ubutegetsi kigashinga intwaro  ya repuburika. Umwami wa nyuma - Ntare V (Wa Gatanu) Ndizeye Charles - , nta wuzi aho yahambwe inyuma yo kwicwa mu buryo butazwi aho yari apfungiwe mw’ibohero rya Gitega mu 1972. Se wiwe, Mwambutsa IV (Wa Kane) Bangiricenge, yahambwe muri Suisse iyo yapfiriye mu 1977. Umwigisha w'ikirundi, amateka, n'imico kama y'abarundi,  Denis Bukuru,  avuga ko abantu basanzwe bakoresha ijambo “gutanga” bashaka kuvuga ugupfa kw’umwami,  ariko ngo umwami yashobora gupfa  mu buryo bune butandukanye, n'amajambo yo kubivuga agatandukana. Umwigisha Denis Bukuru avuga ko mu "gucanira abana b'ingoma" aho “umwami bamwubakira ikirwa (uburiri), bakamuha ubuki bwo kunywa, bagaca bamwubakirako inzu itagira urugi, bagaca bayiturira. Vyashika gake ariko vyarigeze kuba”. Ibwami haba hariho umubitsi (umuntu ajejwe kubika canke kumenyesha ko hari uwapfuye). Umwami atanze (apfuye), umubitsi yaca afata inzira ava aho umwami yatangiye agenda arasemerera  amenyesha iyo nkuru gushika ishikire Abiru. Abiru baba mw’ishamba ryari mu makomine ya Muruta na Kabarorore muri Kayanza y’ubu,  ari naho bajana "kubikira" (gushingura)  abami bapfuye. Abiru bamenye inkuru baca baza gutora Ingogo (ikiziga/umurambo) y’umwami bakayijana hamwe n’ibintu vyose vyari ku kirimba aho yatangiye (inka, ibisabo, ivyimburwa biri mu bigega ), bigaherekeza ingogo. Muri ico gihe ababa ku kirimba bose baba bahunze. Bagaruka ari uko Abiru bamaze gutwara Ingogo y’umwami. Nta waherekeza ingogo y’umwami. Abiru bayitwaye aho baca hose abantu baca bahunga n’ivyabo vyose bakagaruka ar’uko Abiru barenganye. Ikindi  kimenyetso n’uko ahahora havuga ingoma ya Karyenda ku kirimba haca havuga iyitwa Hangarizo, ikamenyesha ko habaye guhangaza (n’ukuvuga kugandarira umwami). Abiru bashikanye ingogo y’umwami muri iryo shamba rya Muruta/Kabarore, bayubakira urusenge, bakayishirako, bagacana akariro gake munsi yayo gushika ikiziga gisanguke. Umwigisha Bukuru avuga ko muri iyo migirwa ibivugwa n’ivyakorwa bitandukanye. Mu bivugwa n’uko umwami atahambwa (atashirwa mw'ivu, kuko ngo isi ntiyari gusubira kumera). Umuganwakazi Esther Kamatari avuga ati: “Umwami ntiyahambwa. Yaserukira Imana, kandi ntawuhamba Imana”. Ariko mu vyakorwa, umwigisha Denis Bukuru avuga ati: "Hasigaye amagufa gusa , Abiru barayegeranya bakayahamba, imva y’umwami ikitwa inganzo”. Umwami yapfuye abantu bavuga ko ijuru ryakorotse. Ubuzima bwaca bumera nk’ubuhagaze mu gihugu. Umwigisha Denis Bukuru avuga ati: ”Nta mugabo yasubira kuryama ku buriri. Nta mpfizi yasubira kwegera inka, baca bazitandukanya (nta nka yasubira kwima). "Abagore baca bakura imiringa n’ikindi cose kiranga ugushaza, n’uwo yanse kuvamwo yaca ayifukisha igishambara gisa nabi". "Nta muriro wasubira kwatswa mu nzu". Igihe co kugandara camara hagati y’indwi (iyinga) zitatu gushika ku minsi 40. Ico kiringo carangira ku munsi umwami mushasha yaba yimye.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru : Alli, Pogba, Martial, Lingard, Milenkovic, Vlahovic, Castellanos
text: Newcastle yatanguye kubaza nimba yoshobora kuronka Dele Alli, kandi Tottenham iriteguye kwumviriza umurwi woza urondera uyu mukinyi wo hagati w'imyaka 25.  (Teamtalk) Manchester United iriko irarondera abakinyi bo hagati bashobora gusubirira umufaransa Paul Pogba, 28, biboneka ko azosezera uyu murwi mu gihe amasezerano yiwe n'uyu murwi azorangira mu ci riza.  (Telegraph - subscription required) Atletico Madrid iriko iraraba ingene yoronka umusatirizi wa Manchester United Anthony Martial 26 mu kugumuza n'uwundi. (Eurosport) Manchester United ntiyiteze ko Jesse Lingard azohava ava muri uyu murwi mu kadirisha k'igura n'igurisha ry'abakinyi ko mu kwa mbere, na rirya uyu mwongereza w'imyaka 28 asanzwe akina hagati ariko aregereza amezi atandatu ya nyuma mu masezerano yiwe.  (Manchester Evening News) Nyene umurwi wa Chelsea Roman Abramovich arababajwe n'ingene  Real Madrid yakajije akariro mu kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma w'uyu murwi wa Stamford Bridge, umudagi Antonio Rudiger, 28, kandi ashobora guhagarika umugambi wo kugarukana umusatirizi w'umubirigi Eden Hazard, 30, ubu akina muri uyo murwi wo muri Espagne. (El Nacional, via Mail) Barcelona iriko irihweza nimba yogura umusatirizi wa Gabon Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang yatswe ikibanza ca kizigenza muri Arsenal - ariko ikibazo kikaba umushahara w'uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 32 usanzwe ari munini. (Independent) West Ham iriteguye kubandanya urugamba rwo kurondera umukini w'inyuma Nathaniel Phillips, 24, wa Liverpool mu kwa mbere, n'aho aherutse kuvunika.(Standard) West Ham kandi irafise icizere co kuronka  umukinyi w'inyuma, umunya Serbia Nikola Milenkovic, 24, asa n'uwuherutse kuvyumvikanako na nyene umurwi  wiwe wa Fiorentina, ibi bikumvikana ko ashobora kuba ari mu nzira agenda.  (Teamtalk) Fiorentina yashize igiciro c'imiriyoni 100 y'ama euros ku musatirizi wayo, umunya Serbia Dusan Vlahovic, 21. (Gazzetta dello Sport - subscription required) Paris St-Germain, Barcelona, Liverpool, Manchester City na Tottenham yose ivugwa ko iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi w'umufaransa akina ku ruhande rw'ububamfu inyuma Rayan Ait-Nouri, 20, ariko Wolves ishobora kuzoronswa 50% gusa vy'ayotangwa kubera ingene umurongo werekeye igurishwa rwiwe uvuga.  (Mail) Barcelona iriko irategura ingene yokora igitero ku murwi Chelsea kugira ngo iwutware umukinyi wo kuruhande rw'ibubamfu inyuma, umunya Hollande Ian Maatsen, 19, asanzwe yaratijijwe mu kiringo c'umwaka w'inkino wose mu murwi wo mu cicaro ca kabiri wa Coventry. (Football Insider) Chelsea nta bushobozi ifise bwo kugarukana umukinyi wo hagati w'umwongereza Conor Gallagher, 21, iyo yatijijwe muri Crystal Palace mu kwa mbere kubera mu masezerano y'intizo y'umwaka wose harimwo umurongo uvuga ko ibi bishoboka mu gihe yoba amaze gukina inkino ziri musi ya 50% muri uyu murwi wa Selhurst Park. (Times - subscription required) Real Madrid yaganiriye n'umukuru w'igisata co kwinonora imitsi wa Liverpool Michael Edwards yiteze kuva muri uyu murwi wa Anfield mu mpera z'iri higanwa, kugira no abandanye ico gikorwa nyene i Bernabeu. (Independent)

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Haaland, Lukaku, Grealish, Kane, Pogba, Mbappe, Camavinga
text: Chelsea iriteguye gutanga igifovya c'imiriyoni hafi 179 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo ironke umusatirizi w'umurwi Borussia Dortmund umunya Norvège  Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 22, inyuma y'aho mweneyo Roman Abramovich, atangiye uburenganzira bwo kurondera uyu mukinyi ashobora kuba uwa mbere aguzwe amafaranga menshi muri kahise kayo. (Football Insider) Inter Milan iriko irasaba umurwi Chelsea imiriyoni hafi 141 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo iwuhe umusatirizi w'umubirigi Romelu Lukaku w'imyaka 28, mu gihe aba Blues bonanirwa no kugura Haaland. (Metro) Manchester City yashitse ku masezerano na Jack Grealish ikaba yiteze guha umurwi Aston Villa imiriyoni hafi 124 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo uyihe uyu mukinyi wo hagati w'umwongereza w'imyaka 25. (Football Insider) Manchester City ivuga ko amakuru avuga ko yoba yashitse ku masezerano n'umurwi Tottenham y'imiriyoni 220 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira uyihe umusatirizi Harry Kane ari ubuswaganyi. (Manchester Evening News) Tottenham ibandanya ishimangira ko ata mugambi ifise wo kugurisha uyu kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza w'imyaka 27 muri rino ci. (Football London) Ni mugihe Kane abandanya agira icizere ko Tottenham ishobora kumuha uburenganzira bwo kugenda.  (Times) Manchester City yemeranije na Kane  ko ishobora kumuhemba umushahara w'ibihumbi 481 vy'amadorari y'abanyamerika ku ndwi kandi ko yiteguye kumutangako imiriyoni zshika 165 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Star) Manchester United iriteze ko muri rino ci umurwi Paris St-Germain uyisaba umukinyi wo hagati umufaransa  Paul Pogba w'imyaka 28. (Telegraph) Umusatirizi w'umufaransa Kylian Mbappe w'imyaka 22, yabwiye PSG ko atiteze gutera igikumu ku yandi masezerano yomutuma abandanya ayikinira, mu gihe ayo asanzwe afitaniye nayo azorangira mu 2022, akaba yipfuza kuva muri uwu murwi muri rino ci canke iryo mu mwaka uza.  (AS - in Spanish) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Rennes umufaransa Eduardo Camavinga ashaka ko yokwimukira muri Espagne inyuma y'aho ibiganiro hagati ya Manchester United n'abaserukizi b'uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 18 bibonekeye ko ata cizere biriko biratanga.  (Manchester Evening News) Barcelona ifise icizere ko, mu gihe umusatirizi wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w'imyaka 36 yova muri  Juventus muri rino ci, ko uwu murwi wo mu Butaliyano ushobora kurondera umusatirizi w'umufaransa Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 30 ku masezerano y'intizo, ashobora kujamwo n'ikigabane co gushobora kumugura. (Sport - in Spanish) Umukuru wa Barca Joan Laporta avuga ko uwu murwi "ukeneye cane Antoine" ariko ko "Griezmann ari kw'isoko" kandi ko uwu murwi wa Espagne witeguye kwumviriza umurwi uwo ari wo wose womurondera.  (Goal) Arsenal nta yandi masezerano izoha umusatirizi w'umufaransa Alexandre Lacazette w'imyaka 30 ikaba iriko imuronderako imiriyoni  zababa 20 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo ziyifashe mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa  Chelsea Tammy Abraham w'imyaka 23.  (Sun) Umumenyereza wa Newcastle United  Steve Bruce arashimangira ko uwu murwi wipfuza cane kugura umukinyi wo hagti wa  Arsenal umwongereza Joe Willock w'imyaka 21, ariko ko aba ba Magpies  barindiriye ko aba Gunners na Willock bafata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe. (Sky Sports) Umumenyereza wa Rangers Steven Gerrard w'imyaka 41 yahoze ari kizigenza wa Liverpool, avuga ko yatangajwe kandi ko yakubiswe n'inkuba igihe yumva amakuru yavuga ko yari gushobora kuba umumenyereza wa Everton imbere y'igenwa rya Rafael Benitez. akavuga ko ivyo ata biri mu migambi. (ESPN) Liverpool iriko iraraba ingene yoha ayandi masezerano umusatirizi wayo, umunya Misiri Mohamed Salah w'imyaka 29 mu misi mike iri imbere, mu gihe ayo ifitaniye na we azorangira mu ci ryo mu 2023.  (Liverpool Echo) Fulham iri hafi yo kuronka umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Liverpool  umunya Pays de Galles Harry Wilson w'imyaka  24 mu miriyoni hafi 14 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Sun) Bayer Leverkusen yanse igiciro ca miriyoni 41 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika catanzwe na Aston Villa ku mukinyi wo ku ruhande umunya Jamaica Leon Bailey w'imyaka 23. (Football Insider) Umusatirizi wa Manchester City umunya Brésil Gabriel Jesus w'imyaka 24 ari ku rutonde rw'abaronderwa cane na Juventus muri rino ci. (Calciomercator - in Italian) Juve kandi iriteguye gusubira kugerageza kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Sassuolo umutaliyano Manuel Locatelli w'imyaka 23. (Mail) Umuserukizi w'umusatirizi wa Argentina Paulo Dybala w'imyaka 27 yiteze kuvugana na Juventus ku bijanye n'amasezerano mashasha, m ugihe asigaje umwaka umwe gusa muri uwo murwi wo mw'ihiganwa  Serie A ryo mu Butaliyano. (Calciomercato - in Italian)

headline: Abavugabutumwa bo muri Africa bariko basabira Trump ngo atsinde amatora
text: N'aho asanzwe afise imvugo y'agasuzuguro kuri Afrika, Perezida Donald Trump wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arakunzwe cane na bamwe mu bihaye Imana bo kuri uyu mugabane. Mu nyigisho ziwe yatanze mu kwa gatandatu, Pasitori wo muri Nijeriya, Chris Oyakhilome, umuvugabutumwa azwi cane ku mboneshakure, yagize ati: "Mumusengere [Trump] kuko iyo Imana ishize imbere umwe mu bana biwe, shetani rimwe na rimwe ikora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo imusambure". Agabisha kandi ko abanegura uyu mukuru w'igihugu akomoka mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika ariko arondera kwitoreza ikiringo kigira kabiri mu kwa cumi na rimwe banka urunuka abamushigikiye. Uyu mupasitori akunzwe cane kw'isi yose, harimwo na Amerika avuga ati: "Bafitiye ishavu ryinshi Trump kubera arwanira abakristu/abakristo, ico mukimenye. Rero abankwa ni mwebwe abakristu". Ikigo Pew Research gikora ubushakashatsi ku mibereho y'abantu kivuga ko mu gihe Perezida Trump azwi ko ari umutegetsi yacanishijemwo isi, mu bihugu nka Nijeriya na Kenya arakundwa cane nk'uko amatohoza y'iki kigo yavyerekanye mu kwa mbere uno mwaka. Kivuga ko amajambo yavuze mu 2018 yo kugereranya ibihugu vya Afrika "nk'imisarani" bobo ko ata kibazo ateye. Ibi bihugu vyompi bisanzwe bizwi ko bigendera cane ku madini. Mu bumanuko bwa Nijeriya, igihugu ca Afrika gifise abantu benshi, harangwamwo amashengero menshi, mu gihe muri Kenya naho abanyapolitike bakoresha cane amashengero mu gutanga ubutumwa ku banywanyi babo, ari naco gituma amadini afise ikibanza kinini muri ibi bihugu. Amashengero menshi ya kikristu muri Afrika, asanzwe arwanya cane ivyo gukorora inda, abubakana bahuje ibitsina, bakongera bagashigikira Israyeli, ntibigeze biyumvamwo uwasubiriwe na Trump, umu Democrate Barack Obama, n'aho afise amamuko muri Kenya. Richard Chogo, Pasitori mu rusengero rwa Deliverance ku mugwa mukuru wa Kenya, Nairobi, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ubutegetsi bwa Obama bwarahimirije umugambi w'ukwigenga (liberalisme) hano muri Afrika, kandi uwu mugambi wateje impungenge mu bategetsi bamwe bamwe b'amadini. Rero kabaye agahengwe ku butegetsi bwa Trump yahisemwo gusubiza ibirenge inyuma". Arashimagiza ubutegetsi bwa Trump kubona bwarashoboye guhagarika imfashanyo zahabwa amashirahamwe nka Marie Stopes, yafasha mu buryo bwo kugabanya imvyaro n'ugukoroza inda mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika. Iri shirahamwe ryaraneguye iyi ngingo ya Amerika yo guhagarika izi mfashanyo, rivuga ko rishira "ubuzima bw'abakenyezi mu kaga". Impari ku bijanye no gukoroza inda zimaze imyaka n'imiburiburi irenga 40. Kuva ico gihe, abavugabutumwa b'abazungu bagize uruhara rukomeye mu matora ku ruhande rw'aba Repubulika kandi ivyiyumviro vyabo vyarakwiye kw'isi yose, cane cane muri Afrika. Ibi bimeze uku mu gihe Abaporotesanti b'abirabure benshi muri Amerika bashigikiye umugambwe uharanira Demokarasi kandi bakanegura ubutegetsi bwa Trump, nk'uko icegeranyo gishasha ca  Pew Research kivyerekana. Emeka Ezeji, umupasitori mukuru mw'ishengero rya Anglicani mu ntara ya Enugu iri mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nijeriya, avuga ko ivyiyumviro vyiwe vya politike bishingiye "ku vyanditswe" gusa. Avuga ati: "Abakristu ba Afrika bazi ko umukuru w'igihugu w'umu Repubulika ari we mwiza kuri Amerika no kw'isi". Abandanya asengera Perezida Trump ko yotsinda umukeba wiwe wo mu mugambwe w'abaharanira Demokarasi Joe Biden mu matora ategekanijwe mu kwa cumi na rimwe, kandi ko yari yafashe umwanya iminsi yose wo gusengera uyu mukuru w'igihugu ngo akire igihe aheruka mu bitaro  kubera coronavirus. Nk'uko bimeze kuri Pasitori Chogo, na we nyene abona ko "intege nke" za Trump zidategerezwa kurengera "inyungu rusangi". Nk'akarorero, ariyamiriza rya sekeza rya Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara), isekeza Trump afata ko ari "ikimenyetso c'urwanko", akavuga ko "ryanyazwe intumbero yaryo". Yibaza ibibazo vyinshi aho avuga ati: "Abandi bantu atari abazungu nta vanguraruhu bakorerwa? Ubuzima bw'umwirabure abayabaye ubu bwoba ari bwiza ugereranije n'imyaka indwi iheze? Canke umwirabure abayabaye ubu yoba ageramiwe ubu kuri Trump gusumba kuri Obama?" Bwana Trump arirata ko ari we mu perezida wa Amerika amaze gukorera ivyiza vyinshi Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika gusumba abandi baperezida bose  mu mateka ya  Amerika, kenshi agafatira ku rugero ruto rw'ubushomeri mu myaka itatu ya mbere y'ubutegetsi bwiwe, ico Bwana Ezeji akenguruka cane. Ubunyamabanga bujejwe akazi buvuga ko igitigiri c'abashomeri b'abirabure mu kw'icenda ari co gitigiri gito cane cabayeho kuva butanguye kwegeranya ibiharuro nk'ibi mu myaka ya 1970, n'aho ibi vyahindutse kubera coronavirus. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji  avuga ko Bwana Trump agifise igikorwa kinini ategerezwa gukora ku neza ya bose, aha akaba afatira ku mwami Cyrus (Kuro) w'umu perse avugwa muri Biblia ko yari yatoranijwe n'Imana kugira ngo yigarurire Babiloni, maze abanya Isirayeli bari bahunze  banona gusubira i Yerusalemu. Avuga ati: "Trump niwe we Kuro wa kino gihe". Bwana Emeka  avuga ati: "Imana irabivuze....ni umusuku wanje azorangura ishaka ryanje". Pasitori Juliet Eyimofe Binite ari mu gisagara ca Lagos muri Nijeriya aremeranya nawe. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Yatowe n'Imana". Buri ku ndwi, uyu mupasitori w'umugore yama asengera  Trump ngo atsinde amatora ku ncuro ya kabiri. Avuga ko Imana yamuhaye ubutumwa imbere y'amatora ya 2016 ko hari umuntu atunze cane yinjiye muri politike kandi ko ashigikiye ubwigenge bw'amadini, abakristu babona ko bubangamiwe. Avuga ati: "Yambwiye ko yariko irarondera umukozi, umuntu w'intungane kubera hari ibikorwa bimwe bimwe abantu beza badashobora gukora". "Dukeneye umuntu ashobora kurwanira agateka k'abemera". Avuga kandi ko Trump ataronka amashimwe akwiriye kuri politike yiwe mpuzamakungu, nk'akarorero amasezerano y'amahoro hagati ya Isirayeli na Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abararu (Emirats Arabes Unis). Pasitori Chogo na we nyene niko abibona: "N'aho woba uri Saddam Hussein cane Muammar Gaddafi, ntihabuze nk'ikintu kimwe canke bibiri vyiza wakoreye abanyagihugu bawe". Avuga ko Trump ashigikiwe ku mugabane wa Afrika kubera ukuntu atarya umunwa, aho avuga ko abategetsi ba Afrika bakeneye kubwirwa mu majambo yeruye kugira ngo bashobore gutunganya ibihugu vyabo. Mu butumwa butandukanye yanditse ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Bwana Trump aherutse kwibutsa abakristu bamushigikiye ko ubwisanzure mu vyo gusenga hamwe n'urugamba rwo kurwanya umugenzo wo gukoroza inda bishobora gukwama mu gihe atotsinda amatora yo mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji afata ibintu yishimikije ubuhanuzi bwa Bibiliya buvuga ibihe vya nyuma. Ati: "Ko azotsinda canke atazotsinda, ico si ikibazo ca Trump, ahubwo ni ikibazo c'ivyo Imana ivuga". "Trump ni nka ca giti co muri Biblia abihweza ibirere bafatirako mu kwihweza ibimenyetso vy'ibihe...aramutse atsinze, tuzoba tugifise igihe co kubaho, nayo akaramuka atsinzwe nta gihe tuzoba tugisigaje".

headline: Perezida Petero Nkurunziza agiye kwitwa 'Imboneza yamaho yo kuzirikana gukunda no gukundisha igihugu'
text: Inama nshingamateka yaraye yemeje integuro y'itegeko rivuga ko Petero Nkurunziza agiye kwitwa Imboneza yamaho yo kuzirikana gukunda no gukundisha igihugu mu nama y'ejo yaranzwe n'impari zikomeye. Abashingamateka bo mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi CNDD-FDD barashigikiye cane iyo nteguro, mu gihe abo ku ruhande rw'abatavuga rumwe n'uwo mugambwe bayirwanije. Mu kwezi kwa mbere guheze, iyo nama nshingamateka yaremeje integuro y'itegeko riha uturusho umukuru w'igihugu iyo arangije amabanga, yongera isabira Petero Nkurunziza amazina y'icubahiro. Muri iyo nama, abashingamateka batavuga rumwe n'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi barerekanye ko badashigikiye ko umukuru w'igihugu Petero Nkurunziza ahabwa iteka ry'ukwitwa Imboneza yamaho yo kuzirikana gukunda no gukundisha igihugu. Bafatiye kuvyo bise ibibi vyakozwe mu kiringo c'imyaka 15 amaze ku butegetsi. Umushingamateka Fabien Banciryanino yatowe mu ntara ya Bubanza ku ruhande rw'abigenga bahurikiye mu runani AMIZERO Y'ABARUNDI, ntarya umunwa. Kubw'iwe, imyaka 15 yose Petero Nkurunziza amaze ku butegetsi  yaranzwe n'amabi atandukanye harimwo ubwicanyi, ukunyuruza abantu n'ibindi "ku buryo atohabwa ico kidari mu bihe nk'ivyo". Ati: "Nibaza ko iyi nteguro yabayemwo abitwa ba ndisabiye barondera kweza umuntu uko atari, umukuru w'igihugu wa kino gihe ntabereye kino kidari kuko mbona ashobora mbere no kuja imbere y'intahe". Ku bashingamateka bo mu runani Amizero y'abarundi, iyo nteguro itandukanye n'ingene ibintu bimeze mu gihugu, igashaka gufata ivyemejwe mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi CNDD-FDD ibigire ivyo igihugu cose. Ku ruhande rwabo, abashingamateka bo mu mugambwe CNDD-FDD bashimangira ko Perezida Nkurunziza akwiriye iryo teka kuko yakoreye igihugu bigashimwa nk'uko vyavuzwe n'umushingamateka Nshimirimana Georges. Nayo kubwa Gélase Ndabirabe wewe afata Petero Nkurunziza ko ata wokwigereranya nawe mu bice vyose avuga ati: "Abadashigikiye iyo nteguro ni abansi b'igihugu bakorera inyungu z'abanyabulaya". Iyo nteguro yahavuye yemezwa n'inama nshingamateka, ku majwi 91, batatu nabo barayihakana, 14 nabo bakaba ataco bayivuzeko. Petero Nkurunziza, niwe mukuru w'igihugu agira kabiri yitorewe n'abanyagihugu inyuma ya Melchior Ndadaye yatowe mu 1993 ariko agaca agandagurwa haciye amezi atatu gusa ashikirije amabanga. Mu kwezi kwa gatatu 2018, umugambwe CNDD-FDD waramwemeje nk'Imboneza yamaho muri uwo mugambwe, imbere y'uko amenyesha ko atazosubira kwitoreza ikindi kiringo kigira gatatu nk'uko abenshi babibona. Mu kwezi guheze naho, iyo nama nshingamatekaka yaremeje integuro y'itegeko rigenera Pereto Nkurunziza, co kimwe n'abandi bakuru b'igihugu batowe n'abanyagihugu, imperekeza y'umuliyaridi w'amafaranga y'amarundi, hamwe n'umushahara wa buri kwezi ubuzima bwiwe bwose.

headline: South Africa: Intango yo kurondera kurekurwa vy'agateganyo kwa Oscar Pistorius
text: Umunonotse w'umunye Afrika y'Epfo Oscar Pistorius, ari mw'ibohero azira kwica umukunzi wiwe Reeva Steenkamp, ashobora guhura n'abavyeyi biwe vuba nk'imwe mu nzira yo kumurekura vy'agateganyo nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi. Arashobora kurekurwa inyuma yo kumara igice c'umunyororo yahanishijwe. Ariko ategerezwa ubwa mbere kugira icitwa "ubutungane bunywanisha" (Ugusubira kuvugana hagati ya Pistorius n'umuryango wa Reeva Steenkamp). Pistorius yishe Steenkamp mu 2013 avuga ko yamwihenzeko yibaza ko ari igisuma muhira iwe ku mugwa mukuru Pretoria. Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 34 yarashe incuro zine mu muryango wugaye w'akazu ka surwumwe. Mu 2014, igihe hasozerwa urwo rubanza rwakurikiwe n'isi yose, yari yaciriwe igihano co gupfungwa imyaka itanu ahamwe n'icaha co kwica umuntu atabigambiriye. Ariko mu 2015, muri sentare y'iyungururizo, yahamijwe icaha co kwica, igihano gica gishika ku myaka 13 n'amezi atanu. Mw'itangazo, igisata ca Afrika y'Epfo kijejwe amabohero cavuze ko kiriko kiravugana n'umuryango wa Steenkamp kuvyerekeye uwo mubonano. Basigura kubikenewe gukorwa imbere yo kurekurwa vy'agateganyo, iryo tangazo rivuga ko abakoze icaha bategerezwa "kwemera no kwemanga ivyo bakoze". Nk'intambwe y'ubutungane bunywanisha, hategerezwa kuba "akaryo kuri izo mpande zibiri ko gusubiza hamwe canke ko gusaba ikigongwe". Umushingwamanza w'umuryango wa Steenkamp, Tania Koen, yabwiye radio y'igihugu SABC, ko "ashobora kuja muri ico kiganiro kizohuza uwakoze icaha n'uwagikorewe". Yongeyeko ati:"June [Steenkamp, nyina wa Reeva], yagumye avuga ko yamaze kubabarira Oscar, ariko ko bidasigura ko adategerezwa guhanirwa ivyo yakoze... Barry [Steenkamp, se wa Reeva] aracafise imitima ibiri, ariko n'ibintu ategerezwa kuzogira ico abivuzeko ku mwanya ukwiriye." "Igikomere, n'aho haheze igihe kinini, kiracasamwe". Kuba ushobora kuronswa ikigongwe c'agateganyo ntibisigura ko ubifitiye uburenganzira, kandi ntibinasigura ko wamaze kukironka, nk'uko bivugwa n'uwo mushingwamanza. Abategetsi bategerezwa kandi kwihweza ibindi vyegeranyo vyanditswe n'abarongoye ibohero co kimwe n'izindi nzobere. Ntiharanamenyekana ryari igikorwa co gushaka kumurekura vy'agateganyo kizotangura. Biribazwa ko bitazoshika mu kwezi kwa gatatu mu 2023, ariko umuryango wa Steenkamp "warababajwe unagwa no mu gahundwe" kuba ashobora kuronka ikigongwe c'agateganyo, nk'uko bivugwa na Koen. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC Pumza Fihlani ari i Johannesburg avuga ko, mu gihe yohabwa ico kigongwe, Pistorius ashobora kumara igipfungo gisigaye ari muhira iwe ariko akazoza aritaba abategetsi b'ibohero buri gihe. Imbere y'ubwo bwicanyi, Pistorius yari yabaye umuntu rurangiranwa nk'umunonotsi agendana ubumuga yatwaye umudari w'inzahabu. Mu 2012, yabaye umuntu wa mbere yaciwe amaguru yahiganywe mu kwiruka mu nkino za olempike akoresheje amaguru y'amakorano. Amaguru yiwe yaciriwe musi y'amavi afise amezi 11 kubera yari yavutse hatarimwo amagufa. Iduga n'ikoroka rya Oscar Pistorius

headline: Afghanistan: US ifise ubwoba ko IS ishobora gutera ikibuga c'indege i Kabul
text: Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ziragabisha abanyagihugu bazo kwirinda kuja ku kibuga c'indege mu gihe hari ubwoba ko ishami rya Etat Islamique rikorera muri Afghanistan ryoba ririko ritegura ibitero. Itangazo rigabisha ryaraye risohotse nijoro ku wa gatandatu ribwira abanyamerika kwigira kure kubera "umutekano ushobora guhungabana inyuma ya bariyeri". Abategetsi bo mu bunyamabanga bujejwe kwivuna abansi bwa Amerika bavuga ko bariko barakurikiranira hagufi iki kibazo banarondera n'izindi nzira. Nta nsiguro nyinshi zatanzwe kuri iki gitero kivugwa ko coba kiriko kirategurwa na IS, kandi n'uwu muhari ntaco urigera utangaza ku mugaragaro kijanye n'uko woba uriko urategura ibitero i Kabul. Iri tangazo ryo kugabisha risohotse mu gihe hanze y'ikibuga c'indege harangwa akajagari, hakaba hari amakuru avuga ko hari abantu bahonyanzwe mu gihe ibihumbi n'ibihumbi babandanya bagerageza guhunga Afghanistan inyuma y'aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi. Haraciye indwi uwu muhari wifatiye igihugu cose n'umugwa mukuru Kabul. Abantu benshi babandanya biyegeranya uko bukeye uko bwije, bizeye ko bashobora kwemererwa kwurira indege bakava mu gihugu. Abakoranye na Amerika n'incuti zayo, co kimwe n'abo bose bari mu baharanira agateka ka muntu, baratinya ko aba Taliban bashobora kubatoteza mu gihe vyokwanka ko bava mu gihugu. Ivyabereye ku kibuga c'indege i Kabul ejo ku wa gatandatu ntibiratomoka neza gushika ubu. Ariko, umumenyeshamakuru w'imboneshakure Sky News, Stuart Ramsay, avuga ko abantu "bahonyanzwe gushika barapfa", abasirikare b'abongereza bakaba bariko bafasha kurokora abari bageramiwe kubera ubwinshi bw'abantu. Avuga ko ejo "wari wo musi mubi abonye gushika ubu", akemeza ko hari abantu bahapfiriye. Mu kiganiro c'ejo ku wa gatandatu, ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bwa Amerika bwavuze ko abantu 17.000 bamaze kuvanwa ku kibuga c'indege, harimwo abanyamerika bashika 2500. Hari umutegetsi yavuze ko hari "igitigiri gito" c'abanyamerika n'abanya Afghanistan bakubaguwe bariko barondera kuva mu gihugu. Rimwe na rimwe baranakubiswe mu gihe bari mu nzira batera baja ku kibuga c'indege. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bujejwe imigenderanire yabwiye BBC mu nyuma ko basohoye itangazo ribuza ibirwi vy'abantu benshi hanze ya bariyeri z'ikibuga c'indege. N'ibindi bihugu navyo nyene vyaragabishije abantu bavyo ku biriko biraba. Reta y'Ubudagi yasohoye itangazo aho imenyesha ko "ibintu vyifashe nabi cane kandi ko rimwe na rimwe bigoye gushika ku kibuga c'indege". Ni mu gihe ubushikiranganji bw'Ubuswisi bujejwe imigenderanire nabwo butangaza ko umutekano "wifashe nabi cane kuva mu masaha make aheze", bukaba bwabaye burahagarika urugendo rw'indege rwari rutegekanijwe mu ntumbero yo gukura abanyagihugu babwo i Kabul. Ingabo za Amerika muri kino gihe nizo zigenzura ikibuga c'indege. Ziriko zifasha guhungisha abanyagihugu ba Amerika n'abandi b'ibindi bihugu, harimwo n'abanya Afghanistan bakoranye n'ingabo zo mu bihugu vy'Uburengero, ubu bakaba batinya ko umutekano wabo ushobora guhungabana ku butegetsi bw'aba Taliban. Ariko rero, Amerika ivuga ko igikorwa co guhungisha abayo kizorangira ku wa 31 z'uku kw'umunani, bikaba bitaratomoka neza ingene ibintu bizogenda inyuma y'iryo genekerezo. Umunyamabanga mukuru w'ishirahamwe OTAN/NATO, Jens Stoltenberg, avuga ko ibihugu bitari bike vyo muri iryo shirahamwe bisaba ko ikibuga c'indege ca Kabul kibandanya cuguruwe kugira ngo ibikorwa vyo guhungisha abantu bibandanye inyuma y'itariki 31 z'uku kw'umunani. BBC yabwiwe ko Ubwongereza ari kimwe muri ibi bihugu, kandi ko bwasavye ko iki kiringo congerezwako imisi mikeya. Hari abafise ubwoba ko bitazokunda ko ibihugu vyose bihungisha abantu bavyo, canke abanya Afghanistan bose babona ko umutekano wabo ugeramiwe. Ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Bulaya "riridogera" Amerika ko itorohereza abarondera guhunga, kandi ko ingabo zayo zibuza abanya Afghanistan bakoranye n'abanyabulaya kwinjira ku kibuga c'indege, nk'uko bivugwa na Josep Borrell ajejwe imigenderanire muri iryo shirahamwe. Avugira mw'ikoraniro muri reta ya Alabama ejo ku wa gatandatu, Donald Trump yahoze arongoye Amerika yaraneguye uburyo Joe Biden "yavyifashemwo nabi" mu gukura ingabo za Amerika muri Afghanistan, aho yavuze ko ari "ikintu gitangaje cane cerekana ubushobozi buke bw'umukuru w'igihugu". Eka n'uwahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Tony Blair, ari na we yarungitse ingabo z'Ubwongereza muri Afghanistan haraciye imyaka 20, avuga ko ingingo ya Biden ari iy'"ubujuju...ibabaje, iteye ibibazo kandi itari ikenewe". Mw'ijambo yashikirije icese ubwa mbere kuva aba Taliban bafashe Kabul, Blair yavuze ko ari "nkenerwa ko ingabo z'Ubwongereza ziguma muri Afghanistan gushika abo bose bipfuza guhunga bavanywe muri ico gihugu. Hagati aho, aba Taliban bobo babandanya bagerageza gutsimbataza ubutegetsi bwabo muri Afghanistan. Mullah Abdul Ghani Baradar, umwe mu bashinze uwo muhari, yashitse i Kabul akaba yitezwe kwitaba ibiganiro vyo gushinga reta nshasha. Niwe mutegetsi mukuru w'umu Taliban ari mu gihugu, akaba aboneka ko azoba afise ububasha budasanzwe muri reta iyo ari yo yose izoba irongowe n'aba Taliban. Niwe yateye igikumu ku masezerano na Amerika yo mu 2020, aho Amerika yiyemeza gukura ingabo zayo zose muri Afghanistan.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Varane, Tuanzebe, Ronaldo, Ramsey, Martial, Lukaku, Shaqiri
text: Manchester United igiye kugiriranira amasezerano y'imyaka ine ishobora kwongerwako umwe ikaba itanu n'umukinyi wa Real Madrid umufaransa akina inyuma Raphael Varane, ariko ntibona neza igihe uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 28 ashobora gufatwa ibipimo vyo kwa muganga kubera amategeko ya guma mu rugo. (Athletic - subscription required) Newcastle yongereje akariro mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester United umwongereza Axel Tuanzebe w'imyaka  23. (Telegraph) Juventus iripfuza kugurisha Aaron Ramsey muri rino ci kubera uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 30 wo muri Pays de Galles/Wales akina hagati ari umuzigo kuri uwu murwi. (Gazzetta dello Sport, via Mail) Umukinyi w'inyuma Ben White w'imyaka 23 yiteze gufatwa ibipimo vyo kwa muganga ku wa gatatu kugira yinjire icese muri Arsenal inyuma y'aho Brighton yemereye kumuha aba Gunners ku miriyoni hafi 69 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Sky Sports) Umusatirizi w'umubirigi Romelu Lukaku w'imyaka 28 yumva ko amerewe neza muri Inter Milan kandi ko ata mugambi afise wo kuva muri uwu murwi muri rino ci, n'aho Chelsea imwipfuza. (Express) Manchester United iriteguye kwakira imirwi yorondera abakinyi bayo umunani bose, harimwo n'umusatirizi w'umufaransa Anthony Martial w'imyaka 25, umunya Pays de Gales Daniel James w'imyaka 23 akina ku ruhande, n'umwongereza Phil Jones w'imyaka 29 akina inyuma. (ESPN) Crystal Palace iri hafi yo kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Lyon umunya Danemark Joachim Andersen w'imyaka 25, yari amaze umwaka uheze akina muri Fulham iyo yari yaratijijwe.  (Evening Standard) Tottenham iriko irongereza akariro mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Atalanta umunya Argentine Cristian Romero w'imyaka 23 ku miriyoni zababa 55 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Telegraph) Urugamba  Aston Villa irimwo rwo kurondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Bayer Leverkusen umunya Jamaica Leon Bailey w'imyaka 23 ntirugiye kuyorohera kubera imirwi ya Leicester, Everton, Wolves na Southampton nayo iriko iramurondera, mu gihe igiciro ciwe kiri mu miriyoni zababa 41 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (90min) Abarongoye Juventus babwiye Cristiano Ronaldo ko biteze ko azoguma muri uwo murwi mu mwaka w'inkino wimirije gutangura. Uyu musatirizi w'umunya Portugal w'imyaka 36 yavugwa ko ashobora kuva muri uwu murwi mu gihe asigaje umwaka mu masezerano afitaniye n'uyo murwi. (Sky Sports) Barcelona ntirabona umurwi n'umwe urondera umusatirizi wayo, umufaransa Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 30. (Marca - in Spanish) Xherdan Shaqiri aboneka ko ashobora gusezera Liverpool muri rino ci, mu gihe Napoli na Lazio ziri mu mirwi irondera uyu Muswisi w'imyaka 29 akina ku ruhande. (Goal) Arsenal iriko iraba ko yogura umukinyi akina ku ruhande wa Pacos de Ferreira (umurwi wo muri Portugal) umunya Portugal Matchoi Djalo w'imyaka 18 ari ku giciro c'imiriyoni hafi 1.4 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Sun) West Ham iripfuza kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Udinese umunya Danemark Jens Styger Larsen w'imyaka 30 asigaje umwaka umwe gusa mu masezerano afitaniye n'umurwi wiwe, akaba ashobora kugurwa imiriyoni hafi 5.8 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Football.London) Marko Arnautovic w'imyaka 32 yahoze akina imbere mu mirwi ya West Ham na Stoke yitezwe mu Butaliyano muri ino ndwi  - uyu munya Autriche akaba ariko aratera igikumu ku masezerano azomutuma ava mu murwi  Shanghai Port wo mu Bushinwa akimukira muri Bologna. (Corriere dello Sport - in Italian) Leeds United na Crystal Palace ziriko zirarondera gutira umukinyi wo hagati wa Chelsea Umwongereza Conor Gallagher w'imyaka 21. (Leeds Live) Umunyegori waArsenal umunya Islande/Iceland Alex Runarsson w'imyaka 26 yiteguriye gutizwa mu murwi Altay wo muri Turukiya muri uno mwaka w'inkino uri mu gutangura. (Football.London) Umusatirizi wa Newcastle Umuyapani Yoshinori Muto w'imyaka 29 ari mu biganiro vyo kurondera ingene yokwimukira mu murwi  Aris Salonika w'Ubugiriki, inyuma y'aho umwaka w'inkino uheze yawumaze mu murwi Eibar yari yatijijwemwo. (Newcastle Chronicle) Stoke irashaka ko Aston Villa yoyitiza umusatirizi w'Umwongereza Keinan Davis w'imyaka 23. (Birmingham Mail)

headline: SA: Jonas Gwangwa, umunyamuziki wa jazz yahanganye n'intwaro karyanishamiryango, apartheid
text: Umuziki wa Afria y'Epfo no kw'isi nzima watakaje igihangange inyuma y'urupfu rw'uyu mucuraranzi  Jonas Gwangwa wo mu mudiho wa jazz yakoresha itarumbeta. Uyu mucuraranzi yapfuye ku wa 23 z'uku kwa mbere afise imyaka 83, akaba yahitanywe n'indwara y'umutima. N'aho imyaka myinshi y'ubuzima bwiwe yayimaze mu buhungiro, Gwangwa ntiyamenyekanye cane ku muziki wiwe gusa, azwi ko yagize uhurara rudasanzwe mu kurwanya bwa butegetsi karyanishamiryango bw'inkehwa z'abazungu muri Afrika y'Epfo. Gwangwa yavukiye mu karere ka Soweto mu gisagara ca Johannesburg  ku wa 19 z'ukwa cumi 1937, akaba yamaze imyaka irenga 60 mu muziki watumye amenyekana cane. Muri ico gihe yarumvise akamo yari atewe na Oliver Tambo yari arongoye ANC, kugira ngo arongore umurwi wiswe Amandla. Uyu murwi wari washinzwe mu myaka ya 1980 kugira ngo werekane uruhande rworoshe mu rugamba rwo kurwanya intwaro karyanishamiryango ya apartheid, ukaba warashigikiwe cane mu mpande zitandukanye z'isi. Reta y'umugambwe w'inkehwa z'abazungu, National Party, yabona ko ibikorwa vy'umuziki n'ukurwanira akaranga vya Gwangwa nk'ikibazo gikomeye cane ku nzego z'umutekano, maze zica zitera ibibombe ku nzu yiwe muri Botswana mu 1985. Imana yose ni uko uyu nyakwigendera hamwe n'abandi bose bari basanzwe baba muri iyo nzu ata n'umwe yari ahari. Ukwitanga kwiwe mu rugamba rwo kwibohoza hamwe n'impano idasanzwe mu bijanye n'umuziki vyatumye Gwangwa ahabwa agashimwe kitwa  Ikhamanga in Gold - agashimwe ko ku krwego rwo hejuru mu gihugu. Aka gashimwe yaronse mu 2010 kibutsa ingene "yabaye rurangiranwa kw'isi yose mu buhinga bwiwe nk'umunyatugenegene. Mu myaka irenga 30, yazungurutse isi yose aterwa amashurwe aho yaca hose". Mw'ijambo ryiwe ryo gusezera Jonas Gwangwa, Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa  yasohoye itangazo aho avuga ko "yinjiye mu murwi w'abanyamuziki bakomeye muri kahise kacu, baranzwe n'ubuhinga bukomeye hamwe n'ukwitangira uburenganzira bw'abanya Afrika y'Epfo bose - kandi bagahimiriza isi yose kurwanya intwaro karyanishamiryango ya apartheid". Thabo Mbeki yahoze arongoye igihugu nawe yashimiye uyu mucuraranzi ati: "Kuva mu ntango y'umwuga wiwe, Bra JG, nk'uko yari akunzwe kwitwa mu cubahiro bamuha, yaratahuye akamaro kadasanzwe ko kuvanga akaranga n'utugenegene nk'ikirwanisho nyaco mu rugamba rwo kuhabuza igihugu". "Afadikanije n'abandi bo mu runganwe rwiwe, Gwangwa yarakoresheje inguvu z'umuziki, atari gusa kuryohera abantu, ariko kandi aba icirore c'abanyagihugu yongera aragaragariza isi yose amabi y'ubutegetsi karyanishamiryango bwa apartheid". Akiri muto, Gwangwa yarakunzwe cane n'abakunzi biwe bari barwiriye mu karere ka Sophiatown kari nk'icicaro c'imico y'abirabure mu gisagara ca Johannesburg, gushika aho reta karyanishamiryango ya apartheid  isohoreye itegeko ko kizira ko abirabure bakoranira hamwe, maze ica itangura kubuza ibiteramo vya jazz, hari mu 1960. Ari kumwe n'ibindi bihangange  vya Afrika y'Epfo mu muziki, nka Masekela, Abdullah Ibrahim na Miriam Makeba, Gwangwa yahisemwo guhunga hagupfukamira igikenye ca apartheid. Yatanguye kumenyekana cane kw'isi mu 1965 mu giteramo citiriwe Ijwi rya Afrika (Sound of Africa) i New york ari kumwe n'abandi nka Makeba, Masekela, na Letta Mbulu. Cabaye intango y'igikorwa mpuzamakungu yakoresheje mu rugamba rwo kurwanya ubutegetsi bw'inkehwa z'abazungu rwaguma rutera intambwe uko bukeye uko bwije. Mu 1987, ari kumwe n'umwanditsi w'umuziki w'umwongereza George Fenton, Gwangwa yanditse amajambo y'umuziki w'ireresi yitwa Cry Freedom, ivyatumye ahabwa agashimwe kitiriwe Oscar incuro zibiri. Yararonse kandi n'ubushimwe butari buke muri Afrika y'Epfo. Yashinguranywe iteka ejo ku wa gatanu mu birori vyerekanywe ikibiriraho ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'iradiyo y'igihugu, bikaba vyashoboye guhuza abataherukana kubera ingingo za coronavirus zo kwitaramura. Urupfu rwa Gwangwa  rubaye inyuma y'indwi zibiri gusa inyuma y'urwo umugore wiwie Violet, rukaba rufatwa nk' uruhombo runini ku muziki wa Afrika y'Epfo.

headline: Lithuania isaba abanyagihugu guta amaterefone yo muri China
text: Ubushikiranganji bw'ukwivuna abansi bwa Lithuania buragabisha abanyagihugu ko bakwiye guta amaterefone akorerwa mu Bushinwa kandi bakirinda gusubira kugura ayandi mashasha. Ikigo c'iki gihugu kijejwe umutekano nyabwonko (Cyber Security Centre) kivuga ko cakoze amatohoza ku materefone ngendanwa akoresha 5G yahinguwe n'amakompanyi yo mu Bushinwa. Kivuga ko imwe mu materefone y'ikompanyi Xiaomi ifise muri yo ubuhinga bwo gukurikirana ibiyikorerwamwo, mu gihe iyindi na yo y'ikompanyi Huawei ifise utunenge ku mutekano wa nyene kuyikoresha. Huawei ivuga ko ata makuru y'ibanga ya nyene gukoresha terefone aja hanze, hanyuma Xiaomi ikavuga ko ata vyo gukurikirana amabanga ya nyeneyo ikora. Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi, Margiris Abukevicius, avuga ati: "Duhanura abantu kudasubira kugura amaterefone mashasha y'abashinwa, hanyuma bongere bate vuba bwango ayo bamaze kugura". Icegeranyo c'iki kigo kivuga ko casanze terefone Mi 10T 5G y'ikompanyi Xiaomi irimwo logiciel/software ishobora gutora kandi ikagenzura amajambo kanaka harimwo nk'ayavuga ngo “Rekura Tibet”, "Ni harambe ubwigenge bwa Taiwan" canke "urugambwa rwa demokarasi". Iki cegeranyo cerekana amajambo ashika 449 ashobora kunekwa n'ama apps ari muri terefone za Xiaomi, harimwo no kugenzura imbuga ngurukanabumenyi ziyicako. I Bulaya, ubu buhinga bwarugawe ariko iki cegeranyo kivuga ko bushobora kuvyurwa umwanya uwo ari wo wose hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa none. Umupfasoni avugira Xiaomi yabwiye BBC ati: "Amaterefone ya Xiaomi ntakurikirana ibiyago vya ba nyene kuzikoresha. Xiaomi ntiyigeze ibuza kandi ntizokwigera ibuza canke ibangamira ibikorwa vy'abakoresha amaterefone yacu". Avuga kandi ko iyi kompanyi igendera ku mategeko yose agenga gukingira umutekano w'abakoresha amaterefone yayo. Ubu bushakashatsi kandi bwasanze terefone ya Xiaomi yegeranya amakuru yose aca kuri terefone yayo ikayarungika kuri 'serveur' yayo iri muri Singapour. Iki kigo kiti: "Iki ni ikintu gikomeye, si kuri Lithuania ahubwo ku bihugu vyose bikoresha ubuhinga bwa Xiaomi". Iyi kompanyi ihingura amaterefone ngendanwa iramamaye cane mu bantu kubera amaterefone yayo azimbutse, aho ubutunzi bwayo bwadutse gushika ku bice 64% mu gice ca kabiri c'uno mwaka ugereranije n'umwaka uheze. Iki cegeranyo kandi gishira ahabona inenge iri kuri terefone ya P40 5G ya Huawei, ituma amabanga y'abayikoresha yibwa. Itangazo ryasohowe n'ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi buri kumwe n'ikigo kijejwe umutekano nyabwonko rivuga riti: “Ububiko nyabwonko bwa Huawei, AppGallery, bujana abakoresha amaterefone yayo mu bundi bubiko nyabwonko busanzwe bufise ama apps amwe amwe yihwejwe na programmes zirwanya imigera zigasanga ari apps maneko canke zamaje kwinjirwa n'imigera". Umuvugizi wa Huawei yabwiye BBC ko isanzwe ikurikiza amategeko n'amabwirizwa y'ibihugu ikoreramwo, kandi ko ishira imbere umutekano n'ukubungabunga amabanga ya ba nyene amaterefone. Avuga ati: “Nta mabanga yigera atangwa hanze ku materefone ya Huawei". "Ikintu conyene ni uko AppGallery yegeranya ikanatunganya amakuru akenewe kugira ngo abakiriya bayo bashobore kurondera, gushira mu materefone yabo no gukoresha apps zivuye ahandi, co kimwe no mu bundi bubiko nyabwonko". Avuga kandi ko Huawei ibanza kwihweza neza kugira ngo abakiriya bayo bashobore gukoresha "apps zidatera ingorane". Iki kigo kandi carihweje iyindi terefone ya 5G y'ikompanyi OnePlus ariko kikaba casanze ata ngorane iteye. Iki cegeranyo gisohotse mu gihe icuka kibi hagati ya Lithuania n'Ubushinwa kigenda ciyongera. Mu kwezi guheze, Ubushinwa bwasavye Lithuania gutahukana uwuyiserukira i Pekin/Beijing bunavuga ko na bwo nyene bwari bugiye gutahukana uwubuserukira i Vilnius (umugwa mukuru wa Lithuania). Iki cuka kibi catanguye igihe Taiwan itangarije ko ubuserukizi bwayo muri Lithuania bugiye kwitwa Ibiro vy'ubuserukizi bwa Taiwan (Taiwanese Representative Office). Ibindi biro vy'ubuserukizi bwa Taiwan i Bulaya hamwe na Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bikoresha izina ry'umugwa mukuru w'ico gihugu, Taipei, kugira ngo vyirinde izina ry'iri zinga ubwaryo Ubushinwa buvuga ko ari intara yabwo.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru kuri uyu wa Mungu: Kane, Rodgers, Mourinho, Haaland, Toney
text: Mauricio Pochettino arashaka cane gukorana n'umusatirizi wa Tottenham n'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza, Harry Kane w'imyaka 27 muri Paris St-Germain mu gihe Kylian Mbappe w'imyaka 22 canke mugenziwe bakinana, umunya Brezili Neymar w'imyaka 29 bova muri uyu murwi w'Ubufaransa mu ci riza.  (Sunday Mirror) Umumenyereza wa Leicester, Brendan Rodgers niwe ari imbere mu bantu bashobora kuzosubirira Jose Mourinho nk'umumenyereza wa Tottenham  - mu myaka hafi icenda amaze akora iki gikorwa. (Football Insider) Umusatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund, umunya Norvege Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 20 ariko asaba imirwi imwipfuza mu ci riza amasezerano y'imyaka itanu azomwinjiriza imiriyoni zirenga 109 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Sunday Mirror) Barcelona yamaze gutegura urutonde rw'abo ishobora gutoramwo umusatirizi, harimwo Haaland  hamwe n'umusatirizi wa Manchester City na Argentina, Sergio Aguero w'imyaka 32. (Mundo Deportivo) Leicester iriko iraraba ingene mu ci riza yogura umusatirizi akomeye, umwongereza Ivan Toney w'imyaka 24 asanzwe akinira umurwi Brentford wo mu cicaro ca kabiri mu Bwongereza. (Sunday Mirror) Arsenal yashize umunya cote d'Ivoire Odilon Kossounou w'imyaka 20 akina hagati mu murwi Club Bruges wo mu Bubirigi ku rutonde rw'abakinyi nyamukuru ishobora kurondera mu ci riza. (Sunday Mirror) Eka na Wolves nayo nyene iriko irihweza ingene yoshobora kugura uyu mukinyi afise igiciro kigera ku miriyoni 28 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Sun) Tottenham yiteze kuba mu mirwi iriko irarondera umukinyi wo hagati wa  RB Leipzig umunya Autriche Marcel Sabitzer w'imyaka 26 mu ci riza.  (Team Talk) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Brighton, umwongereza Ben White w'imyaka 23 abandanya akurikiranirwa hagufi na Liverpool,  kugira irabe ko yomugura mu kiringo c'igura n'igurisha ry'abakinyi mu ci riza.  (Football Insider) Manchester United iriko ikurikiranira hagufi umukiny w'inyuma wa Everton umwongereza Jarrad Branthwaite w'imyaka 18 asanzwe yaratijijwe muri Blackburn. (Mail on Sunday) Manchester United ntiravugana n'abaserukira umukinyi w'inyuma wa Real Madrid na Esupanye, Sergio Ramos w'imyaka  34 azorangiza amasezerano yiwe mu ci riza akaba ashobora kuja gukinira umurwi uwo ari wo wose ku buntu.  (Fabrizio Romano, via Caught Offside) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Newcastle United,  umwongereza Kyle Scott w'imyaka 23 ari mu biganiro, kandi bigeze kure, kugira ngo ashobore kwimukira burundu mu murwi FC Cincinnati ukina mw'ihiganwa ryo muir Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (Football Insider) Umukinyi w'umudagi Max Kruse w'imyaka 32 ubu asanzwe akinira umurwi Union Berlin, avuga ko yahatswe kwimukira muri Liverpool mu ci ryo mu 2019 imbere y'uko Divock Origi avyifatamwo neza cane mw'ihiganwa rya Buraya (Champions League) bigatuma Jurgen Klopp ahindura imigambi yari afise. (Der Kickbase podcast, via Mail Online) Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa Brighton Paul Barber asaba abarongoye umupira w'amaguru gukora ivyo bashoboye vyose bakihweza nimba gutera umupira n'umutwe vyoba bifise ingaruka mbi mu buzima bwo muri kazoza k'umuntu.  (Argus)

headline: Burundi: Girumuco Téline atambukira inzu y'imideli Yves St Laurent ati: 'Nakunze umudeli kubera dawe'
text: Umurundikazi Girumuco Téline Féerie afitaniye amasezerano y'umudeli n'inzu rurangiranwa yo mu Bufaransa Yves Saint Laurent, avuga ko yabikunda kuva akiri umwana. Uwo mwigeme avuga ko yatanguye umwuga w'umudeli mu 2016 mu nzu [agence] yitwa Winners' fashion. Agira ati:" Nabikunze nkiri umwana. Ngira aho nabirabira cane hari ku muvyeyi wanje, dawe; yakora mu bintu vy'impuzu." Indoto za Téline ngo zari izo kwambika abantu, agakora impuzu mu Burundi abantu ntibabe bakizikura mu mahanga. Uwo mwigeme yiga mu gisata co gutumatumanako amakuru ngo afise umugambi wo kuva muri ico gisata aje gutangura kwiga gushona imideli. Agitangura ivyerekeye imideli mu Burundi ngo abantu ntibabibona neza. Agira ati:" Abantu babona umenga ndiko ndata akaranga. Abavyeyi banje naragize Imana barantahura bakaza baranshigikira, ariko nk'abandi babibona mu mibano, ntibabibona neza, ariko ubu bariko barabitahura kubera babona urwego maze gushikako." Abandanya avuga ko akiri mu Burundi yagize ivyigwa nkarisha bwenge vyo gushona impuzu, abantu bakabifata nabi, kuko ntibatahura ingene yari azi ubwenge mw'ishure ariko akaja mu vyo gushona impuzu. Yaragira kandi n'ibindi vyigwa bijanye no gushona ku buhinga bwa internet, abamwigisha bakaba bari mu gihugu c'Ubufaransa. Téline afise uburebure bwa metero 1.76, akaba apima ibiro 48. Atera akamo urwaruka na cane cane abigeme gukora cane kuko kenshi mu Burundi imyuga itamenyerewe badakunze kuyishigikira, bigasaba kugira inguvu nyinshi. Nta Mwuga Udakiza ni ikiganiro c'uruhererekane (Series) kizajya gihita kuri radio buri wa gatatu, no ku rubuga rwa BBC Gahuzamiryango. BBC Gahuzamiryango ihaye ikaze ibitekerezo vyanyu kuri iki kiganiro.

headline: Kobe Bryant: Abakunzi biwe baracarira...
text: Abakunzi b'umuhisi Kobe Ryant babandanije kumukeza no kwerekana akabaro batewe n'urupfu rwiwe rwashitse ku wa Mungu itariki 26/01/2020. Bwana Bryant yahitanywe n'impanuka y'indege ya kajugujugu ari kumwe n'umukobwa wiwe n'abandi bantu indwi.

headline: Basketball - Kenya: Umukinyi avuga ko ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina rimaze imyaka myinshi
text: Umugore yahora ari umukinyi wa besketball muri Kenya avuga ko ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina ryamunze urwo rukino mu gisata c'abagore  "kuva kera cane " yamara ko icuka c'ubwoba gituma abarikorerwa batubahuka kubivuga ku mugaragaro. Uwo mugore, ubu afise imyaka 30, avuga ko yahohotewe mu buryo bw'igitsina n'umwe mu bamenyereza biwe igihe yatangura urwo rukino. Ivyo yavuze vyahuriranye n'uko  ku ndwi iheze hasohotse icegeranyo cerekana ido n'ido ry'ingene muri basketball y'abagore "ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina ryabaye nk'iryemewe muri urwo rukino" mu myaka mirongo muri Mali. Uwo vyashikiye muri Kenya twise Rachel kugira dukingire umwidondoro wiwe, yabwiye BBC Sport ati: "Hose muri Kenya, abakinyi ba basket barazi ivyo bintu ariko ntawuvuga. "Abakobwa benshi barakoreshejwe ariko ntibashaka kugira na kimwe bavuze. "Hari abakobwa benshi n'ubu mbona, no mu migwi ikomeye ngaha, ariko ntibakura ururimi mu kanwa. Nibaza ko abantu batinya. Aha muri Kenya, abantu barakoreshejwe." Rachel, atashatse ko umwidondoro wiwe umenyekana, yavuze ko ihohoterwa akenshi ryajana no kwemererwa  gutezwa imbere mu rukino ku bakinyi bakiri bato, benshi baba ari abayabaga (abafise munsi y'imyaka 18) ico gihe. Rachel yabivuze atazi ko hari amatohoza ariko arakorwa na Human Rights Watch (HRW) ku bivugwa ko haba ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina mu rukino rwa baskeball muri Uganda. Iryo shirahamwe mpuzamakungu riharanira agateka ka zina muntu ryaragize uruhara rukomeye mu gufasha bamwe mu bahuye n'ibibazo nk'ivyo muri Mali kugira ijwi ryabo ryumvikane,  bene iryo hohoterwa muri Mali rikaba ryari rimaze imyaka myinshi nk'uko bigaragara mu cegeranyo cakoreshejwe n'urwego rwa basketaball kw'isi Fiba. Ubu rero HMR yahindukiriye Kenya. Minky Worden, umuyobozi muri HRW yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati: "Human Rights Watch iriko irabitohoza kandi iratewe impungenge n'ibivugwa kw'ihohotera ry'abakinyi b'abagore bakiri bato mw'ishirahamwe rya basketball muri Kenya (KBF)." "Abategetsi mw'ishirahamwe  rya basket ry'ibihugu bategerezwa gukingira abakinyi bakiri bato. Fiba, ishirahamwe rya basketball ku rwego rw'isi rifise ukwihangana kungana n'ubusa kw'ihohoterwa mu nkino. "Ni inshingano za Fiba n'amashirahamwe yo mu bihugu  gukingira abakinyi b'imiyabaga, kwirukana mu nkino abakora ihohotera, no gutuma abakorewe ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina baronka ubutungane." 'Nkeneye kwikiza ubwanje' Itangazo rya HRW rije inyuma y'ukwezi kumwe hari umwe mu bagize komite nshingwabikorwa ya KBF  akuweko iceyi mu matohoza yagirizweko kugerageza guhohotera umukinyi w'imyaka 22 ku murwa mukuru wa Kenya, Nairobi. Mu kwezi kw'indwi,  Philip Onyango - afatwa nk'umwe mu bamenyereza beza cane kandi yigeze kumenyereza umugwi wa Kenya w'abakiri bato mu rwego rw'abagore- yaratanze imihoho (yareguye)  ku gushaka kwiwe mu mabanga yari ajejwe yose igihe igipolisi cariko kiramukorako amatohoza ku vyavugwa n'uwo mugore. Umunsi ukurikira KBF yaciye "yirukana [Onyango] mu mabanga n'ibikorwa vyose vya basket" buno nyene ikurikije amatohoza y'ibanze yo nyene yari yakoze. Onyango asanzwe ari n'umumenyeshamakuru akurikirana urukino rwa basket arahakana ivyo aregwa. Mu nyuma igiporisi cahavuye kivuga ko ata kimwagira "bitumwe n'uko ata vyemezo bikwiye" vyabonetse. BBC imurondeye,  uwo mugore  w'imyaka 22 yavuze ko ababajwe cane n'ivyo igiporiri cashitseko mu matahoza yaco. Amatohoza yari yakozwe inyuma y'aho umugenzi w'uwo mugore amufatiye, atabizi, amajwi ariko aramuyagira ingene vyamugendeye. Ayo majwi ntiyarungikiwe KBF gusa, yarahawe kandi benshi mu bahurira ku rukino rwa basket. Rachel avuga ko yatewe intege zo kuvuga yumvise ivyo vyashitse, vyamwibukije ivyo na we yaciyemwo. Avuga ati: "Ni ibintu bizobohora urukino rwa basketball muri Kenya, nta wubizi. "Nkeneye gukingira abandi, kandi nanje nkeneye kwikingira. Ndiko ndakora ikintu kinjana mu nzira yo gukira". Avuga ko atari yigeze abivuga igihe vyamushikira kuko yibaza ko ata n'umwe yovyemera, kandi yemeza ko hari n'abandi benshi batabikoze kuko batinya gutakaza ikibanza cabo mu migwi yabo. BBC  yaravuganye n'abandi bagore batatu bahora ari abakinyi na bo bavuga ko bakorewe ihohoterwa canke bahatswe kurigirirwa igihe bari bakiri abayabaga. Umwe yavuze ati : "Twari tukiri bato cane ku buryo tutashobora kwisigura - ico gihe nta n'umwe yari kukwumviriza. Bari kwibaza ko ubesha." 'Hagarika iburabuzwa rishingiye ku gutsina' Igihe igiporisi cariko kirakora amatohoza, ku mbuga hwaniro muri Kenya haciye hasohoka urwandiko rwiswe "Hagarika ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina" rwatunga agatoki KBF ubwayo ko yaravye hirya ku bivugwa. Urwo rwandiko rwateweko umukono n'abantu barenga 2.000 igihe rwasohoka. Mu kwezi kw'indwi, ubushikiranganji bujejwe inkino muri Kenya bwaciye bushiraho umugwi ku bibazo vy'igitsina wo gushigikira abakinyi b'abagore iyo bikenewe mu migwi y'igihugu. Ubwo bushikiranganji bwasavye abakinyi b'abagore bashikiwe n'icari co cose kubishikiriza uwo mugwi, ariko ntaco urashira ku mugaragaro. Agatima ko gushigikirana Kizigenza w'umugwi wa Kenya w'abagore bakuze muri basketball yavuze ko ashigikiye izo ngingo nshasha. Rose Ouma,  we  avuga ko ata ngorane aragira, yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati: "N'ikibazo kigoye cane, ariko harageze ko kija ahabona". Ku wa gatatu, umugwi wa Kenya warasezeye ihiganwa rya basketball y'abagore muri Africa ririko rirabera muri Cameroun. Muri Mali, abantu indwi bo mw'ishirahamwe rya basketball barahagaritswe mu mabanga n'ishirahamwe ku rwego rw'isi Fiba kubera icegeranyo casohotse ku ndwi iheze. Amatohoza yasanze ishirahamwe rya Mali ryarapfukiriye ihohoterwa ryakozwe n'abakozi baryo bwite, Amadou Bemba yahora amenyereza umugwi w'abakiri bato mu rwego rw'abagore akaba apfunzwe arindiriye urubanza ku vyaha ahakana. Gishingiye ku vyavuzwe n'abantu 31 n'abandi 22 banse kuvuga, ico cegeranyo carakuye iceyi ku mukuru wa Fiba Hamane Niang c'uko yafashe minenerwe iryo hohoterwa igihe yatwara ishirahawe rya Mali hagati ya 1999 na 2007.

headline: Adama Traore muri Barcelona avuye muri Wolves
text: Barcelona yaraye igiriraniye amasezerano y'intizo n'umukinyi Adama Traoré akina imbere ku ruhande rw'i buryo muri Wolves, akaba agiye gukinira uyu murwi gushika ku mpera y'uyu mwaka w'inkino. Uyu murwi wo muri Espagne uzohemba uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 26 ariko urafise uburenganzira bwo kumugura ukamugumya burundu mu gihe wobishaka. Traoré asigaje amezi 18 gusa mu masezerano afitaniye na Wolves kandi gushika ubu ntibarashobora kwumvikana ku masezerano mashasha. Scott Sellars arongoye igisata c'ubuhinga muri Wolves avuga ati: "Nta n'umwe atazi ko Barcelona ari igisagara, kikongera kikaba n'umurwi, gishika ku mutima Adama. Rero kuri we ni indoto igiye mu ngiro". Traoré yatanguriye gukina umupira muri Barcelona imbere y'uko asezera i Nou Camp akaja muri Aston Villa mu 2015. Aho yamaze imyaka ibiri akinira Middlesbrough imbere y'uko yinjira muri Wolves mu 2018 ari we mukinyi aciye umuhigo muri uyo murwi mu kugurwa imiriyoni zirenga 24 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Uyu mukinyi wo ku ruhande amaze gukina inkino 154 muri uyo murwi, akaba amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo 11. BBC Sport yamenye ko Tottenham yari yemeye gutanga imiriyoni zababa 20 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ironke Traoré ariko Wolves yaranse, n'aho hari amakuru ava i Londres ahakana ko Tottenham itigeze yemera gutanga amahera. Sellars ati: "Adama yamye akinana ubuhinga bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru". "Ariko, nta kinyegezwa kirimwo, vyaranse ko dushika ku mwumvikano kugira tumuhe amasezerano mashasha, inyuma y'ibiganiro vyamaze igihe kirekire, kandi icipfuzo ciwe muri kino gihe ni uko aja gukinira uwundi murwi". "Twashitse kandi ku masezerano meza cane mu gihe Barcelona yoshaka kumugura mu ci riza".

headline: Coronavirus: Oxford igiye gusubira gutangura rwa rucanco rwari rwabangiriwe
text: Igerageza rw'urucanco rwa Covid-19 ruriko rutunganywa n'uruganda rw'imiti AstraZeneca n'ishure kaminuza ya Oxford rigiye kubandanya inyuma yo kubangirwa inyuma y'aho bivugiweko hari uwo rwagizeko ingaruka mbi. Ku wa  kabiri w'iyi ndwi, AstraZeneca yavuze ko iri gerageza ryari ribaye rirahagarikwa mu gihe hariko hakorwa amatohoza kugira barabe nimba ivyabaye kuri umwe  mu bantu bariko barugeragerezwako bifitaniye isano. Ariko nijoro ku wa gatandatu, kaminuza ya Oxford yatangaje ko uru rukingo ata ngorane rufise, ko rero rushobora kubandanya. Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza, Matt Hancock, yakiriye n'igishika cinshi iyi nkuru imenyesha ko igeragezwa ry'uru rucanco rigiye kubandanya. "Iyi ngingo yo kubangira yerekana ko twitwararitse ubuzima bwa muntu imbere ya vyose. Tuzoshigikira abahinga bacu kugira no bashobore kuduha urucanco nyarwo vuba bishoboka". Itangazo ryasohowe n'iyi kaminuza rivuga ko vyari "vyitezwe" ko bamwe "mu bariko bageragerezwako uru rucanco bashobora kubona ingaruka mbi" mu magerageza manini cane nk'iri. Ryongerako y'uko ubu bushakashatsi bushobora kubandanya bisunze impanuro bahawe n'umurwi wigenga ujejwe kwihweza ibijanye n'imiti, hamwe n'ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe kugenzura imiti n'ibijanye n'ubuvuzi. Ntiyategerezwa gutanga amakuru yerekeye umurwayi ku mpamvu z'ibanga, ariko ikinyamakuru New York Times carashoboye kumenya ko umwe mu bitanze kugeragerezwako mu Bwongereza yagize ibibazo vy'ubushe ku ruti rw'umugongo. Ishami rya ONU rijewe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO rivuga ko hafi incanco 180 ari zo ziriko zirageragezwa  mu mpande zitandukanye z'isi, ariko ko gushika ubu ata na rumwe rurashobora kurangira. Hari icizere kinini ko uru rucanco rushobora kuba mu za mbere zishobora gutangura gukoreshwa, inyuma y'aho rugeragerejwe ku ncuro ya mbere n'iya kabiri bikagenda neza. Iri gerageza ryo ku ncuro ya gatatu ririko rikorerwa ku bantu bashika 30.000 muri Amerika co mu Bwongereza, Brezili na Afrika y'Epfo. Incuro ya gatatu kenshi ijamwo abantu baharurwa mu bihumbi kandi igashobora no kumara imyaka itari mike. Ku wa gatatu, umuhanuzi wa leta mu bijanye n'ubuhinga mu Bwongereza, Sir Patrick Vallance, yabwiye abanyamakuru ko ivyashitse muri rino gerageza ririko rikorwa na Oxford ari ibintu bitari bimenyerewe.

headline: Ku myaka 99 yaronse umudari w'ifeza w'isi mu kunyonga ikinga
text: Kenneth Judd  afise imyaka 99, ariko mu gukanyaga ikinga/igare ni bitumwako. Uwo mugabo w'imyaka hafi 100 mu kwezi guheze yatsindiye umudari w'ifeza (yabaye uwa kabiri) mw'ihiganwa ry'isi ryo gutwara ikinga ryitabwe n'abantu 5.000. Kugira atsindire ikibanza ca kabiri, Judd yakanyaze ibirometero 3.779 mu minsi irenga 26. N'ukuvuga muri rusangi ibirometero birenga 140 mu masaha 24, ikirere benshi muri twebwe b'imyaka mike cane gusumba tudashobora kumara dukanyaga ikinga ku munsi umwe, ubanje kureka kubikora iyindi minsi 25 ikurikirana. Judd yabikoreye aho avuka muri Yorkshire no muri Lake District (mu Bongereza). Iryo higanwa rimaze imyaka ine ryitwa Road World For Seniors (Isi y'ibarabara y'abageze mu za bukuru). Abemerewe kuryitaba n'abageze mu za bukuru n'abafise indwara zikunda kujana n'ubusaza , abitaba ihiganwa bakaba bakanyaga  amakinga aguma aho ari (nk'arya yo mu nzu zo kwinonora imitsi, gym) akorwa na kompanyi yo muri Norvege Motitech. Ayo makinga aba acometseko imashini  ya ordinateur, nayo ikaba icometse kuri television, uwuriko aranyonga iryo kinga rero akaguma yibona muri  television nk'uko yoba ari mw'ibarabara vy'ukuri. Ubwo buhinga bumaze imyaka bukoreshwa mu ma gym canke ku wushatse kunyonga ikinga ari iwe, ariko  Motiview,  ubuhinga bwa Motitech bwo kwibona muri television, bugenewe cane cane abantu bageze mu za bukuru n'abafise indwara zikunda kujana n'ubusaza. Intumbero n'uko ababukoresha bakanyaga  ikinga bajana na vídeo y'amabarabara, utuyira n'uturere, hafi y'aho babaye bakiri abana canke bakiri imikangara, kugira bagorore imitsi ku mubiri no mu mutwe. Bo nyene canke ababafasha baratora urukurikirane rw'uturirimbo  two kwumviriza kugira bagire ingoga zo kubandanya bakanyaga. Ihinganwa ry'uyu mwaka ryabaye kuva itariki 6 za Nyakanga/Nzeri (ukwezi kw'icenda) gushika kw'itariki ya mbere Gitugutu/Ukwakira (ukwezi kw'icumi). Abatsinze n'abanyonze ikinga ibirometero vyinsi muri ico kiringo -ubwo buhinga buja burandika ikirere bagize. Bwari ubugira kabiri uwo mutama ageze mu myaka ya 90 yitaba iryo higanwa. Uwo yatwara indege mu ntambara ya kabiri y'isi, yabaye uw'indwi mu 2020 (kuko na Covid ntiyabujije ko ihiganwa riba), kuva ico gihe akaba yaciye aguma akora imyimenyerezo kw'ikinga rya Motiview kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere kugira yitegurire ihiganwa ry'uyu mwaka. Avuga ati: "Nashaka kurusha aho nashitse mu mwaka uheze, nca ndakora kugira menye ibirometero n'amasaha nshobora kugira buri munsi". "Nanyonga ikinga ata wundi n'umwe ari hafi, mw'ijoro cane canke mu masaha ya kare cane. Abakora mw'ijoro bari bameze neza cane, baranzanira ivyo nywa n'ubwo icayi canje caruhira guhora kuko nitaho kunyonga ikinga. "Witaho umuvuduko wawe n'aho ushobora gushika. Hari aho nagenda ndaraba Yorkshire, ikindi gihe-nkaraba ibindi- uturere tw'ibiyaga" Lindy Renaud, ajejwe kubaho neza mu kigo c'abageze mu za bukuru i Londres, avuga ko igituma nyamukuru Motiview iriko irakundwa n'abantu benshi, n'uko abo bageze mu za bukuru banyonga amakinga bahimirizwa kwibuka ubuto bwabo. Avuga ati: "Ni vyiza ku bwenge, umubiri n'umushasha vyabo." "Bibibutsa ibihe vyiza aho baca bavuga bati 'Oh, ico ndacibutse'." N'ubwo abantu bageze mu za bukuru bose badakeneye gukoresha ubuhinga (technologie), hariko harahinduka vyinshi mu gukoresha ubuhinga mu kubafasha guhangana n'ibibazo bitandukanye birimwo kuba inyakamwe, umutekano n'indwara, canke kuguma banonotse. Abantu bageze mu za bukuru baguma baba benshi kw'isi: gushika mu 2050, 16% y'abantu bose kw'isi bazoba bafise imyaka irenga 65, mu gihe gushika ubu bari 9%  ku bw'ibiharuro vy'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU. .

headline: Amwe mu mafoto yaranze akarere n'ayavuye ahandi muri ino ndwi ya 13 gushika 20 z'ukwa kabiri 2022
text: Amwe mu mafoto meza twabacaguriye mu karere, muri Afrika n'ahandi kw'isi aya mahpto yose afise abo yitirirwa.

headline: I﻿tiro: Kubera iki ari ngombwa gusinzira n'imiburiburi amasaha atanu buri joro?
text: N﻿k'uko abashakashatsi babivuga, itiro ry'amasaha atanu n'imiburiburi rishobora kugabanya ingorane z'amagara ku bantu barengeje imyaka mirongo itanu. Bemeza ko i﻿ngorane z'amagara zishobora gutuma utaronka itiro, ariko gusinzira nabi bishobora kuba ikimenyetso  c'amagara mabi. Biamaze kwemezwa ko itiro rituma umuntu aruhuka, umubiri n'umushaha bigasubira itoto, ariko  kuba umwanya umuntu amara asinziriye ushobora kuba ari ngirakamaro ntibizwi neza. I﻿cigwa ca PLoS Medicine carakurikiranye amagara n'itiro ku bakozi ba reta b'abongereza. I﻿kibazo gikurikira ni co cabajijwe umwe wese ku bantu 800 bagizweko amatohoza: "Musinzira amasaha angahe mw'ijoro mugereranije buri indwi?" B﻿amwe muri bo bari bafise isaha ku kuboko yo gukurikirana itiro ryabo. K﻿andi baragiriwe ibipimo vy'ingwara zidakira harimwo ingwara y'igisukari (Diabete), kansere (cancer)  n'ingwara ziterwa n'umutima, mu kiringo c'imyaka 20. A﻿basinzira n'imiburiburi amasaha atanu bafise imyaka 50 bagaragara nk'abashobora kugwara ingwara ku bice 30% kurusha abaryama amasaha indwi. Ivyo vyigwa vyerekanye  kandi  ko k﻿uryama umwanya muto ufise imyaka 50 ushobora gupfa, cane cane uzize ingwara zidakira. Kenshi abahinga basaba ko umuntu asinzira amasaha indwi canke umunani, nk'uko bivugwa n'abashakashatsi bo muri kaminuza za College London na Paris  Cite. A﻿bahinga ntavyo baramenya neza, ariko birazwi ko itiro rifasha ubwonko kuguma bwibuka no kugumana akanyamuneza no gukora udakebaguzwa. I﻿tiro kandi n'akaryo ku bwonko ko kwigizayo imicafu. P﻿rof Derk-Jan Dijk arongoye ikigo Surrey Sleep yabwiye BBC News ati: "Ivyo bikorwa vyaje kwemeza ko kuryama umwanya muto atari vyiza kuri twebwe. Muri rusangi, si vyiza ku magara yacu - n'aho kuri bamwe, bisa n'uko ataco bitwaye. "﻿Ikibazo gikomeye n'ukumenya kubera iki abantu bamwe bamwe baryama umwanya muto. Biva kuki? Hari ico dushobora kubikorako? Itiro n'ikintu gishobora gutuma ubuzima buhinduka ku ruhande rumwe." I﻿gihe kirekire co kudasinzira neza gishobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku kungene umuntu abaho. A﻿baganga ubu bandikira gake abagwayi imiti yo gusinzira, ishobora kugira ingaruka zishobora gutuma umuntu aca ayimenyera. A﻿riko ingorane z'itiro zishobora gutorwa inyishu  kandi uburyo bwo gufashwa buriho.

headline: Yataye ibiro 89 mu myaka ibiri... akiza amagara yiwe
text: Yataye ibiro 89 mu myaka ibiri... akiza amagara yiwe, mu gihe abaganga bari bataye icizere kuko ubunini bwiwe bw'ikirenga bwari bwamuteye indwara nyinshi.

headline: Pep Guardiola avuga ko Manchester City ikiri ku rugamba rutoroshe na Liverpool
text: Umumenyereza  wa Manchester City Pep Guardiola avuga ko umurwi wiwe udashobora guhirahira ngo utakaze urukino na rumwe mu nkino zisigaye za Premier League nimba koko bashaka gukubita hasi "umwe mu mirwi ikomeye cane muri kahise k'umupira w'amaguru". City yaraye isubiye mu kibanza ca mbere icatse Liverpool inyuma yo gutsinda Brighton 3-0, iyi mirwi ikaba isumbana inota rimwe gusa mu gihe hasigaye inkino zitandatu. Guardiola yabwiye BBC Sport ati: "Ntituri ibijuju. Mu gihe tworamuka tunganije urukino na rumwe, tugatakaza amanota abiri gusa, Liverpool ica itahukana ihiganwa. "Mu gihe twotsinda inkino zacu zose zisigaye, twoca dutahukana ihiganwa. Abakinyi barabizi". Yongerako ati: "Turazi inkino zigoye dusigaje kandi dutegerezwa gukina nk'uko twakinye muri uru rukino kugira ngo tuzitsinde zose. Mu gihe tworamuka tubishitseko, tuzohimbaza intsinzi, ni vyatwankira, nta kundi, tuzokeza Liverpool". City na Liverpool zagiye zihangana bikomeye muri rino higanwa ryose, aho inkino zompi z'ihiganwa hagati y'iyi mirwi zarangiye ari 2-2, nayo mu rukino rw'igice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma c'igikombe ca FA Liverpool ikaba ari yo yarutahukanye kuri 3-2. Iyi mirwi kandi yompi iri muri ine ya nyuma yo mw'ihiganwa rya Bulaya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League) kandi ikaba ihabwa amahirwe yo guhura mu rukino rwa nyuma. Ariko imbere y'inkino za mbere zo mu gice ca kabiri zishira ica nyuma muri iri higanwa rya Bulaya mu ndwi iza - igihe City izohura na Real Madrid hanyuma  Liverpool nayo igahura na Villarreal - uruhande rwa Guardiola ruzobanza kwakira Watford ku wa gatandatu imbere y'uko abantu ba Jurgen Klopp nabo bahura na Everton ku musi uzokurikira. Mu mwaka w'inkino wa 2018-19, City yatsinze inkino zayo za nyuma 14 zose maze ibona gutahukana ihiganwa, isumvya Liverpool inota rimwe gusa, Guardiola akavuga ko bizosaba ko baguma kuri iyi ntumbero, ntibatirigane, kugira ngo batahukane iri higanwa. Yibaza ko inkino za Champions League n'abanduye imvune - Guardiola avuga ko Nathan Ake na John Stones bavunitse bukebuke mu rukino rwabahuje na Brighton - ko bishobora gutuma ibintu bigenda uko bizogenda. Yongerako ati: "Vyarigeze gushika mu myaka mike iheze  - twatsinze inkino 14 zose kugira dutahukane ihiganwa. Mu gihe twotsinda inkino zose, nka nkeka tuzotahukana ihiganwa. "Bivana n'ingene twoba turushe n'imvune, bivana na Champions League. "Dufise ukwezi kumwe gusa  - kumbure amayinga atanu. Kuva ku mezi cumi na kumwe gushika ku kwezi kumwe, tuzokora uko dushoboye kwose kugira ngo tuvyifatemwo neza muri izi nkino. "Inkino zitatu zigoye tuzokinira hanze y'iwacu [Leeds, West Ham na Wolves] ariko ni inkino zitandatu gusa kandi tuzokora uko dushoboye kwose, inyuma y'aho nta wuzi ingene ibintu bizogenda. "Duhanganye n'umwe mu mirwi ikomeye cane muri kahise k'umupira w'amaguru - bafise vyose. Abakinyi barabizi. Urukino twakiniye hano [aho banganije na Liverpool 2-2] ni twe twakinye neza ariko ntitwashoboye kurutsinda. "Ni ikizira kikaziririzwa ko dutakaza inota na rimwe. Twamye dukina tuzi ko bitoroshe, tuzi ko dutegerezwa gutsinda". Guardiola yari aryohewe cane kubona umurwi wiwe washoboye kwikatira itike izowushikana muri Champions League mu mwaka uza - intambwe washitseko inyuma yo gutsinda Brighton. Ati: "Uwu ni umusi umwe mu misi y'umunezero kuko mu mwaka uza tuzoba turi muri Champions League. Abantu bibaza ko ari ibisanzwe ariko ni ngombwa ko tuja muri Champions League. "Iyo tubishitseko ni uko tuba twavyifashemwo neza cane. Iyo ubajije umurwi uwo ari wo wose intumbero yawo, ni uko bashika muri Champions League. Ivyo rero twasubiye kubishikako".

headline: Mali: Ibihugu vyo mu burengero biriyamiriza irungikwa ry'abacangero b'Abarusiya ba Wagner
text: Ubufaransa n'ibindi bihugu 14 bigenzi vyabwo ku mugabane wa Bulaya hamwe na Canada biriyamiriza ico vyita irungikwa ry'abacangero b'Abarusiya muri Mali. Ibi bihugu bivuga ko  ibi "bishobora gutuma umutekano uhungabana gusumba mu karere ka Afrika y'Uburengero", gahanganye n'imirwi y'abarwanyi biyitirira idini rya Islam. Ibi bihugu vyo mu burengero vyagiriza reta y'Uburusiya ko ari yo itanga uburyo bwo kurungika aba bacangero b'umurwi Wagner. Uburusiya burahakana ko ata migenderanire bufitaniye n'uyu murwi wa gisirikare ukorera mu rufuri. Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya riherutse gufatira ibihano umurwi Wagner, rikawagiriza ko ufise uruhara mu bikorwa bibi vy'ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu. Uyu murwi karuhariwe ukorera mu kinyegero watanguye kumenyekana ubwa mbere mu 2014, igihe yarwana ku ruhande rw'abashaka kwiyonkora bafashwe mu mugongo n'Uburusiya mu ntambara yo mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Kuva ico gihe, warakoreye cane mu bihugu vya Syria, Mozambike, Sudan, Libya na Centrafrique. Mw'itangazo vyaraye bisohoye, ibi bihugu vyo mu burengero bigabisha ko irungikwa ry'abacangero ba Wagner rishobora gutuma "ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu muri Mali rishobora kurenga inkombe, kandi ko rishobora guta mu kaga amasezerano y'amahoro n'ugusubiza hamwe" muri ico gihugu gisinzikajwe n'intambara. Bivuga kandi ko "bibabajwe cane" n'ukuntu abategetsi ba Mali bahisemwo "gukoresha uburyo bw'igihugu busanzwe bukenye cane" mu guhemba abacangero mvamahanga hagufata mu mugongo ingabo z'igihugu. Iri tangazo ryasohowe n'ibihugu vy'Ububiligi, Canada, République Tchèque, Danemark, Estonie, Ubufaransa, Ubudagi, Ubutaliyano, Lituanie, Ubuholande, Norvège, Portugal, Roumanie , Suède n'Ubwongereza. Gushika ubu, nta kintu na kimwe cerekana ko Mali igiye gukorana na Wagner, nk'uko abategetsi ba Mali baherutse kubibwira BBC, ko "ata masezerano ari hagari ya Mali na Wagner". Ubufaransa - igihugu cahoze gitwara Mali muri vya bihe vy'ubukoloni - buherutse gukura ingabo za nyuma mu buraruko bwa Mali muri wa mugambi wo gukura ingabo zabwo zari zarungitswe mu karere ka Sahel kurwanya inyeshamba ziyitirira idini rya Islam. Gushika ubu, Mali ntaco iratangaza kuri ibi bivugwa n'ibi bihugu vyo mu burengero.

headline: Pep Guardiola wa Manchester City avuga ko abatsindiye igikombe ari 'ntibagiranwa'
text: Umumenyereza wa Manchester City Pep Guardiola avuga ko umurwi wiwe ari "ntibagiranwa" inyuma yo gutahukana igikombe ca Premier League kigira kane mu myaka y'inkino itanu.
