City yatahukanye iri higanwa irushije inota rimwe gusa umukeba wayo Liverpool inyuma y'intsinzi ya 3-2 yaraye ironse mu gutsinda bigoranye Aston Villa ku musi wa nyuma w'ihiganwa ku kibuga Etihad Stadium. Ni igikombe kigize 11 Guardiola atahukanye mu myaka itandatu kuva ashitse mu Bwongereza. Guardiola ati: "Turi intibagiranwa. Tuzokwama twibukwa. Aba bakinyi bazokwama bibukwa muri uno murwi". "Ivyo twashitseko, ni ibintu bigoye cane. Sir Alex Ferguson na Manchester United barabikoze, haraciye imyaka - incuro zibiri canke zitatu - ubu rero ndabonye ic'ari co gushika ku kintu nk'iki". Hasigaye iminota 15 gusa ngo urukino ruhere, City yari imaze guterwa 2-0 na Villa imbere y'uko Ilkay Gundogan yinjira agatera ibitsindo bibiri, hagati yavyo umukinyi wo hagati Rodri akaba yashoboye kwinjiza igitsindo, ibintu vyabaye mu minota itanu gusa itahukana intsinzi. Iyo baramuka batsinzwe canke bakanganya gusa, Liverpool niyo iba yaraye mu munezero. Guardiola  ati: "Urukino rwa nyuma igihe cose rwama ari urukino rudasanzwe - ibigumbagumba vyinshi. Aston Villa ntaco batakoze, ariko igitsindo ca mbere cahinduye vyose. Vyari ngombwa ko dufata ibintu mu minwe". "Iyo utsindiye iri higanwa incuro zine mu myaka itanu, ni uko aba bahungu ari ibitangaza. "Gutsindira muhira imbere y'abantu bacu ni ikintu gihimbaye. Igihe tumariye kunganya, twaciye twumva ko twari dufise amahirwe yo gutsinda ica gatatu. "Ni bwo bwa mbere nari mbaye mu bihe nk'ibi kuva nagashika hano". Liverpool yatsinze umurwi wa Wloves 3-1 ku kibuga cayo ariko ntiyashoboye gutesha Manchester City gukingira igikombe cayo yari isanzwe ifise. Mw'ihiganwa ryose rirangiye, iyi mirwi ibiri yatakarije inkino zitanu gusa, Citi zitatu, Liverpool zibiri. Guardiola  yongerako ati: "Ivyo twaraye dushitseko bifitaniye isano n'ubukomezi bw'abakeba bacu kandi sinari bwigere mbona umurwi nka Liverpool mu buzima bwanje. "Turakeje Liverpool - baratumye uko indwi yose irangiye tugenda tuvyifatamwo neza". Abajijwe nimba afise umugambi wo kubandanya amenyereza uyu murwi igihe amasezerano afitaniye nawo azoba arangiye mu mpera z'umwaka w'inkino uza, yavuze ati: "Nta shaka canke icipfuzo co kwiyumvira ivy'umwaka uza mfise muri kino gihe. "Nta mwaka w'inkino woroshe. Sinshobora guhemukira umurwi  - kumbure banshira mu bihe bidasanzwe mu buzima bwanje ariko ntegerezwa kuvyiyumvamwo, abakinyi bategerezwa kuvyiyumvamwo mbere n'umurwi utegerezwa kuvyiyumvamwo. "Ubu ni igihe co kwidagadura. Dusubiriye gutahukana ihiganwa". Umukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Ukraine, Oleksandr Zinchenko yinjiye mu gice ca kabiri aca ahindura ibintu muri Manchester City anagira uruhara rukomeye mu guhereza umupira Rodri agatera ica kabiri. Yahimbaje iyi ntsinzi mu kibuga umupira  uheze afise ibendera ya Ukraine yari akenyeye mu bitugu, yifotoza ayambaye imbere yo kuyambika igikombe aca akorora amosozi. Ati: "[Ibi] ni ibihe vy'ikigumbagumba ntibagiranwa kuri jewe - ku banya Ukraine bose bariko bicwa n'inzara, bari mu magorwa mu gihugu canje kubera igitero c'Uburusiya. "Ndishimiye kuba umunya Ukraine no gutahukana iki gikombe muri Ukraine, kubw'abanya Ukraine bose kubera bagikwiye. "Gisigura vyose kuri jewe - numva nopfira aba banyagihugu n'abadufashe mu mugongo. Ivyo abanyagihugu bampaye n'ivyo bankoreye muri iki gihe - igihe kitoroshe mu buzima bwanje -  ndabishima cane kandi sinzokwigera ndavyibagira mu buzima bwanje bwose". 'Ntuzokwama ubona amahiganwa mensi aryoshe' Uwahoze ari myugariro wa Arsenal Martin Keown avuga ko vyari kuba "biteye agahinda" iyo City ibura igikombe muri uno mwaka w'ihiganwa, mu gihe Liverpool imaze gutahukana ibikombe bibiri mu gihugu kandi ikaba yiteguriye gutana mu mitwe na Real Madrid mu rukino rwa nyuma rw''ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League). Uwahoze ari umusatirizi w'Ubwongereza Alan Shearer nawe yongerako ati: "Twabonye umurwi udasanzwe, umwaka udasanzwe n'urukino rw'umupira w'amaguru rudasanzwe. "Ivyo Pep Guardiola akoze muri Manchester City n'ivyo Jurgen Klopp akoze muri Liverpool ni ibintu bidasanzwe. Wari umutaga uryoheye ijisho ku muntu ataho yegamiye. "Nagumanye umutima uhagaze ariko ntaho nari mpagaze - Imana yonyene niyo izi ivyari mu mitwe y'abafana, kuko uwu ni umuhingamo wari uteye ubwoba. Ibintu bidasanzwe". 'Twasiganywe n'umurwi wa mbere kw'isi yose' Umumenyereza wa Liverpool Klopp avuga ko wabaye "umunezero" kuri we gukorana n'aba bakinyi gihe cose, ariko bari bakeneye " gushiramwo inguvu zisumbirije mu gice ca mbere c'ihiganwa" kugira ngo dushobore gutsinda City muri uru rugamba. Hagati aho, avuga ko ivyo bashitseko bidasanzwe kandi ko bagumye baterana inkokora "n'umurwi wa mbere kw'isi" gushika ku musi wa nyuma. Ati: "Aba bahungu bakinye ihiganwa ridasanzwe. Ntibirangiriye ng'aha, ahubwo niko ihiganwa rirangiye".

headline: Uganda yemeye ko yafashe abarenga 1000 imbere y'amayo yo mu kwa mbere
text: Leta ya Uganda yemeye ko yafashe abantu barenga 1000, bafatwa mu kiringo c'imbere gatoyi y'amatora atavuzweko rumwe yo mu kwezi kwa mbere 2021. Urwandiko rubitangaza rwashikirijwe mu nama nshingamateka n'umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati General Jeje Odongo, ku muhingamo wo kuri uno wa kane. Urwo rwandiko rwerekana yuko mu kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe igihe uwutavuga rumwe na leta Robert Kyagulanyi (Bobi Wine) yafatwa ariko ariyamamaza, abantu 269 barafashwe bahorwa kuja mu myiyerekno yaciye ikurikira. Inyandiko ya leta ivuga ko bamwe bashikanywe imbere ya sentare barashinjwa canke bararekurwa mu gihe abandi bagipfunzwe. Igihe c'amatora hamwe n'icakurikiye gatoyi umunsi w'itora vyaranzwe cane n'ugusemerera kw'imiryango hamwe n'abatavuga rumwe na leta, basaba itohoza ku majana y'abantu bakuwe iwabo canke mu mabarabara. Vyibazwa ko abo bose batwarwa n'abakozi bo mu nzego za Uganda zijejwe umutekano. General Odongo yarigeze kubwira inama nshingamateka ko leta yari ifise abantu 221 bonyene, benshi muri bo bari mu mabohero ya gisirikare. Uwo mushikiranganji yasabwe gukora itohoza rikwiye, kuko umugambwe wa Bobi Wine, National Unity Platform, wabandanije uvuga yuko hari abanywanyi bawo hamwe n'abawushigiye 423 irengero ryabo ritaramenyekana. Urwandiko rwo kuri uno wa kane rwerekana yuko igice gitoyi c'abo bantu ari co kimaze kuboneka, ariko 356 muri bo "ntibaramenyekana" kuko amakuru y'igihe n'aho bafatiwe ataratangwa. Nyuma y'inkuru ya BBC yo mu kwezi kwa gatatu yavuze ku basore hafi 18 bafatiwe mu kigwati ca Kyotera mu bumanuko bushira uburengero bwa Kampala, bose baciye barekurwa ataco bagirijwe babasiga hafi y'ikigwayi cabo hagati mw'ijoro. Abandi benshi bararekuwe muri ubwo buryo nyene, bamwe bakabara inkuru zo gukubagurirwa aho bari bapfungiye. Urwandiko rw'umugwi w'abahinga ba ONU mu bijanye n'agateka ka zina muntu rwasohowe ku wa kabiri, rwahamagariye Uganda guhagarika gutoteza abanyepolitike batavuga rumwe na leta. Urwo rwandiko kandi rwasavye ko hakorwa itohoza ribushitse, hamwe no guhana abahonyanze agateka ka zina muntu mu bikorwa vyabaye mu gihe c'amatora.

headline: Umwamikazi Elizabeth atanguye urugendo rwa nyuma, abanyagihugu baramwunamira
text: Urugendo rwa nyuma kandi rubabaje rw’Umwamikazi  Queen Elizabeth II w’ubwongereza rwatanguye kuri uno wa Mungu, ikiziga ciwe kikaba kivanywe i Balmoral kijanwa ku kirimba c’umwami ca Holyroodhouse muri  Edinburgh. Ibihumbi n’ibihumbi baratonze ku mabarabara mu kwunamira ubwa nyuma umwamikazi. Iyi niyo ntambwe ya mbere y’ibikorwa vyo kumushingura vyitezwe mu ndwi iza i Londres/London. Ikiziga kigenda bukebuka n’imodoka gushika Edinburgh uburebure bw’ibirometero 280. Gicishwa mu bibanza bitandukanye kuva Aberdeen, Dundee, na Perth, uru rukaba ari urugendo ruza kumara amasaha atandatu. Kiza gushikanwa i Holyroodhouse – ingoro y’Umwami w’Ubwongereza ku mugwa mukuru wa Ecosse/Scotland – kikaza gushirwa mu cumba kidasanzwe. Ku muhingamo w’ejo ku wa mbere, hazoba ikigandaro mw’Isengero nkuru yitiriwe Umweranda Giles, kizokwitabirwa n’umuryango w’i bwami. Isandugu izohamara amasaha 24, kugira ngo abantu bashobore kumwunamira ubwa nyuma. Umusi uzokurikira Umuganwakazi Anne azoherekeza ikiziga ca nyina wiwe mu gihe kizoba gitwawe n’indege i Londres.  Isandugu y’ikiziga c’Umwamikazi kizovanwa ku kibuga c’indege ca Edinburgh ijanwe i Buckingham n’indege gigishijwe ku kibuga c’indege ca RAF Northolt. Ku wa gatatu, ikiziga c’Umwamikazi kizojanwa mu ngoro ya Westminster (Westminster Hall) inyuma gatoya y’isaha umunani z’umuhingamo, urugeno ruzomara iminota yaba 40, abanyagihugu bakazoronka akaryo ko kumwunamira muri uru rugendo. Niho kizoguma imbere yo gushingurwa. Ibirori vyo gushingura umwamikazi Elizabeth bizoba ku wa mbere igenekerezo rya 19 Nyakanga (9), 2022 mw’isengero Westminster Abbey, nk’uko itangazo ryasohowe n’ikirimba ca Buckingham ribivuga. Uru rusengero ni urusengero rudasanzwe kuko niho abami n’abamikazi bimikirwa, harimwo n’uyu Mwamikazi nyene mu 1953, rukaba ari narwo rwabereyemwo ubugeni bwiwe n’Umuganwa Philip mu 1947. Nta birori vyo gufuba umwami vyari bwigere bibera muri uru rusengero kuva mu kinjana ca 18, n’aho ibirori vyo gushingura nyina w’uyu Mwamikazi ari ho vyabereye mu 2002. Abakuru b’ibihugu bavuye mu bihugu bitandukanye vy’isi bazofata urugendo bagiye kwifatanya n’umuryango w’I bwami kwibuka ubuzima bw’umwamikazi n’ibikorwa vyiwe. Abanyaporitike bakomakomeye n’abahoze ari abashikiranganji ba mbere b’Ubwongereza nabo nyene bazokwitabira ibi birori. Ibirori bizotangurwa no kuvana isandugu y’ikiziga c’umwamikazi mu cumba ca Westminster itwarwe mu Rusengero rwa Westminster mu modoka y’igisata ca gisirikare kirwanira mu mazi. Inyuma y’ibi birori, ikiziga kizovanwa i Westminster Abbey kijanwe ahitwa Wellington Arch, ari naho kizovanwa kigatwarwa gushingurwa i Windsor.

headline: Akaririmbo k'uyu mu Somaliakazi karakunzwe cane ku mbuga...
text: Urashobora kuba umaze kwumva akaririmbo kakunzwe cane ku mbuga k'uyu mu Somaliakazi. Aha ariganira BBC ingene vyagenze.

headline: Tanzania: Sentare ivuga ko inyandiko zo kuraga itunga ryose Jackline Ntuyabaliwe zitakurikije amategeko
text: Umupfakazi wa nyakwigendera Reginald Mengi, Jackline Ntuyabaliwe, yerekanye akababaro kiwe ku ngingo ya sentare nkuru ya Tanzania yerekeye uwohagarikira itunga ryasizwe n'umugabo wiwe. Yanditse ku rubuga rwa Instagram ati: "Kirakwiye... icegeranyo co kwa muganga ca Dr Reginald Mengi cerekanywe nk'icemezo. Ukuri ku bantu bakunda ukuri. Umugabo wanje yamaze ubuzima bwiwe yubashwe, akerebutse kandi yafashije ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abatanzania." Ntiyari umukehabwenge! Ushobora kuvuga ivyo ushatse vyose, ufate ivyo ushatse, ariko kuri ivyo, nzomuvugira gushika mpfe. Jackline yanditse kuri urwo rubuga hwaniro ashirako n'icegeranyo ca muganga wiwe, yanditse ivyerekeye amagara yiwe, ko ingwara yamufashe ya AVC itatumye atakaza ubwenge. Mu misi iheze, mu gusoma urubanza rw'impapuro 72, umucamanza Mlyambina yavuze ko inyandiko zo kuraga za nyuma za nyakwigendera Dr Mengi zanditswe itariki 17 z'ukwezi kw'umunani mu 2017 zitakurikije amategeko agenga kuraga. Muri urwo rubanza, abana ba Dr Mengi bariko bariyamiriza izo nyandiko zo kuraga bivugwa ko zasizwe na nyakwigendera se wabo, n'umukono wari kuri izo nyandiko nta ho bisa bisana n'izindi ziwe, kandi muri ico gihe se wiwe nta nguvu yari afise zo kwandika kubera ingwara yari afise kuva mu 2016. Abana bakuze ba nyakwigendera bavuga ko izo nyandiko zo kuraga zabirengagije, iragi ryose rihabwa Jackline Ntuyabaliwe n'abana biwe b'amahasa, rero ko izo nyandiko zitakurikije amategeko  kubera zashize ku ruhande abandi bana ata mpamvu. Jackline Ntuyabaliwe azwi kw'izina ry'ubuhizi rya K-Lynn muri BongoFleva yamenyekanye cane mu ndirimbo Nalia Kwa Furaha. Bahuriye n'umugwizatunga w'umutanzania Reginald Mengi mu gihugu c'Ubwongereza mu 2010. Mu 2014 ikinyamakuru candika ku butunzi ca Forbes canditse ko uwo mugabo yari afise imitahe mu bimenyeshamakuru no mu mashirahamwe yimba ubutare, yari afise ubutunzi bungana na miliyoni 560 z'amadolari. Bari bubakanye mu 2015 mu bugeni bwabereye mw'izinga rya Maurice, Dr Reginal Mengi akaba yarusha umupfasoni wiwe imyaka 36. Yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo ari i Dubai afise imyaka 75  itariki 2 z'ukwezi kwa gatanu mu 2019, mu gihe Jackline Ntuyabaliwe yari afise imyaka 39.

headline: Abarundi barenga 200 bari i Dubai babuze epfo na ruguru kubera coronavirus
text: Abarundi barenga 200 baheze mu gisagara ca Dubai kuva mu kwa gatatu kw'uno mwaka kubera vyanse ko batahuka iwabo inyuma y'aho uruja n'uruza ruhagarikiwe bivuye ku kiza ca coronavirus. Bavuga ko bari mu mazi abira, bakabona ko bashobora kwisanga mu mabohero kuko ikiringo bahawe na leta y'igihugu ca Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu kizorangira ku wa 12/08. Bavuga ko barishe amatike  mw'ikompanyi y'indege Kenya Airways, ariko ko mu nyuma iyo kompanyi yababwiye ko idashobora kuja mu Burundi kuko ikibuga c'indege ca Bujumbura kicugaye. Ubuserukizi bw'u Burundi i Dubai burabahumuriza ko ikibazo cabo kiriko kirigwa kandi ko vuba kizotorerwa umuti. Banga Rigumye, umwe muri abo Barundi yagiye arondera akazi, yabwiye BBC ko ibibazo barimwo vyatanguye kuva mu kwagatatu kw'uno mwaka, igihe u Burundi bwugara ikibuga c'indege. "Twari twateguye gutaha ku wa 22 z'ukwa gatatu, iyo tariki nyene leta y'u Burundi ica itangaza ko ikibuga c'indege cugaye mu gihe aha i Dubai naho hari hasohotse itangazo rivuga ko ikibuga cari kwugarwa itariki 25 z'ukwa gatatu". "Twebwe rero twari twateguye kwurira indege kuri iyo tariki kugira ngo ino ntibahave batwugarirako". Avuga ko bahavuye bitura ubuserukizi kugira bubavugire batahe, ariko bikaba bitakunze. Bangarigumye avuga ko leta ya Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu yari yabemereye ko impusha zo kuba muri ico gihugu zari kubandanya gushika mu kwa cumi na kabiri, ariko mu nyuma ivamwo irisubirako. "Twatangarijwe ko kugera kw'igenekerezo rya 12/08 twese twoba twasohotse, atari uko naho uwubishoboye arihe amadolari 700 kugira ngo aronswe visa nshasha. Rero ingorane twebwe Abarundi dufise, kubera coronavirus nta buzi dufise ngo turonke ayo mahera". Avuga ko vyabaye ngombwa ko bagumayo ataco bariko barakora, gushika aho bene amazu babirukana, ubu bamwe bakaba barara bakirirwa hanze, "ivyo gufungura vyovyo bikaba ari umugani". Asaba ubutegetsi bw'u Burundi y'uko bwobacishirizamwo bagatahuka amarembe badateje iceyi igihugu. Eddy Kevin Gahire aserukira abarundi baba muri ico gihugu avuga ko ico kibazo bagishikirijwe, nabo bakagishikiriza ubuserukizi bw'u Burundi i Dubai. Uwuserukira u Burundi muri Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu aremeza ko abo bantu abazi kuko bamwituye kandi ko ariko arakora uko ashoboye kugira ngo ikibazo cabo gitorerwe umuti. Bapfinda Epimeni yabwiye BBC Gahuzamiryango ko mu bisanzwe iyi ngorane iri n'ahandi, ariko ko ikibazo c'abo bari i Dubai gitandukanye kubera abenshi muri bo ari imisore n'inkumi bagiye barondera ubuzi butobuto. Ati: "Barafise ingorane kandi zikomeye cane kuko abenshi ntibafise aho baryama, abenshi ntibafise ingene bashobora no gufungura". "Icabateye ubwoba gusumba ni uko leta y'iki gihugu iherutse gutangaza ko uwo hazogera itariki 12 z'uku kw'umunani azoca atangura gufatwa nk'uwuri mu gihugu bitemewe n'amategeko (overstay)" "Ico gihe bazoca batangura gutozwa ama Durham 100 ku munsi (hafi 525  amafaranga y'amarundi), mu gihe batanaronka n'ayo gufungura". Avuga ko ico bakoze kwabaye ukwandikira ababatwara mu Burundi, kandi ko babishuye bakabasaba  ko botegura urutonde rw'abo bantu. Afise icizere ko mu minsi ikibazo bazogitorera umuti. Abasaba kubandanya barindiriye mu kwihangana gushika ikibuga c'indege ca Bujumbura cuguruwe bagashobora gutahuka kuko basanzwe bararishe amatike y'indege. Arabahumuriza ko ni hagera y'uko ikiringo bahawe kirangira ku wa 12/08 ikibuga c'indege ca Bujumbura kitarugururwa ngo bashobore gutaha ko azobasabira imbabazi mu bushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire ya Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu kugira ngo ntibarihishwe amande.

headline: Ayavugwa mw'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi: Salah, Jesus, Wijnaldum, Ziyech, Ronaldo, Raphinha, Lenglet
text: Liverpool iriko iraraba ko yogurisha Mohamed Salah muri rino ci mu gihe hogira abemera gutanga imiriyoni 60 z'amapawundi, Real Madrid ikaba iri mu mirwi iriko irakurikirana ingene ivy'uyu munyamisiri w'imyaka 30 bigenda.  (Sun) Arsenal yageze ku masezerano na  Manchester City ku munya-Brezili  Gabriel Jesus, aba Gunners bakaba biteguye gutanga imiriyoni 45 z'amapawundi kuri uyu musatarizi w'imyaka 25.  (Fabrizio Romano) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Hollande  Georginio Wijnaldum azokwemererwa kuva muri  Paris St-Germain muri rino ci. Leicester City iripfuza cane uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 31, mu gihe  Everton, Wolves na West Ham nayo nyene iriko irakurikiranira hagufi ingene ibintu bigenda. (90min) Chelsea yegereye Juventus kugira bavugane ingene yoronka umukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya-Hollande  Matthijs de Ligt w'imyaka  22 asigaje imyaka ibiri mu masezerano yiwe. (Goal) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Chelsea Hakim Ziyech yasavye uruhusha rwo kuva muri uyu murwi mu gihe  AC Milan yatanguye ibiganiro n'aba Blues kuri uno munya-Maroc w'imyaka 29. (Sky Sport Italia, iciye kuri Mail) Newcastle, Everton na Aston Villa yose iriko yerekana ko yipfuza Tomas Soucek w'imyaka 27, na rirya kazoza k'uyu munya-République tchèque kadatomoye neza muri West Ham, ni mu gihe agiharira ku bijanye n'amasezerano mashasha.  (Sun) Umukuru wa Bayern Munich  Hasan Salihamidzic avuga ko ata kuri kuri mu bihuha bivuga ko uyu murwi wa  Bundesliga ushaka kugura umusatirizi wa Manchester United umunya-Portugal  Cristiano Ronaldo w'imyaka 37. (Sky Germany - mu kidagi) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Leeds umunya-Brezili  Raphinha w'imyaka 25 yanse imirwi yo muri Premier League  kubera yishakira kwimukira muri  Barcelona. (Sport) Chelsea igiye kwumviriza imirwi yoza ishaka kurondera umunyegori wa Espagne Kepa Arrizabalaga w'imyaka 27 inyuma y'aho abwiriye ikinyamakuru  Marca ko intumbero yiwe nyamukuru ari ugukina. (Mirror) Umumenyereza wa Chelsea  Thomas Tuchel  yemerewe na bene umurwi bashasha kugura abakinyi bashika kuri batandatu muri rino ci. (Telegraph) Atletico Madrid iripfuza kugura umunya-Espagne akina inyuma ku ruhande rw'iburyo  Hector Bellerin w'imyaka 27 muri rino ci inyuma y'umwaka w'inkino yari amaze akina muri  Real Betis yari yatijijwemwo avuye muri Arsenal. (Goal) Barcelona irizeye ko Tottenham ishobora kwumvisha umukinyi w'inyuma w'umufaransa Clement Lenglet w'imyaka 27 ko yokwimukira muri Premier League kugira ngo uyo murwi wa La Liga urabe ingene utangura kwikurako abakinyi bamwe muri rino ci. (ESPN) Tottenham na Middlesbrough ntirumvikana ku kiguzi c'umwongereza akina inyuma mu murwi w'abatarenza imyaka 21 Djed Spence, mu gihe uyu murwi wo mu cicaro ca kabiri (Championship) umushakako imiriyoni zababa 15 z'amapawundi hariko n'uturusho.   (Sun) David Beckham yavuganye n'umunya-Chili akina hagati Arturo Vidal amusaba ko yokwimukira mu murwi wiwe wa  Inter Miami mw'ihiganwa ryo muri Amerika MLS igihe uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 35  azoba avuye muri Inter Milan. (Marca) Umunya-Brezili akina ku ruhande  Anthony w'imyaka 22 - yipfuza cane guhamvya uwahoze ari umumenyereza wiwe Erik ten Hag muri Manchester United -  ejo ku wa gatanu ntiyabonetse igihe  Ajax yatangura imyimenyerezo yo kwitegurira umwaka w'inkino wimirije.  (Mirror) Umunya-Slovakia akina inyuma Milan Skriniar w'imyaka  27, yemeye kwimukira muri  Paris St-Germain avuye muri Inter Milan. (Gazzetta dello Sport - mu Gitaliyano) Paris St-Germain yashitse ku masezerano na Nice ku mumenyereza wayo Christophe Galtier uyu mufaransa akaba yiteze gusubirira Mauricio Pochettino nk'umumenyereza. (Le Parisien - mu Gifaransa )

headline: Tanzania yakiriye incanco za mbere za Covid-19 zitanzwe na US
text: Tanzania yahawe doze zirenga umuriyoni w'incanco za Johnson &Johnson mu mugambi Covx w'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, wo kurwanya ca kiza karanda ca Covid-19. Ni muri wa mugambi wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika wo gufashisha umugabane wa Afrika incanco zigera ku miriyoni 25. Nk'uko bimeze mu bindi bihugu, abazoronka ubwa mbere izi ncanco ni abakora mu bisata bijejwe ubuvuzi hamwe n'abo bandi bose baboneka ko bashobora kwanduzwa uwu mugera ningoga. Ku rubuga rwayo rwa Twitter, ubuserukizi bwa Amerika muri Tanzania buvuga ko bwahaye reta ya Tanzania izo ncanco bubicishije mu mugambi wa Covax, bukoranye kandi n'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Afrika. Uwuserukira Amerika muri ico gihugu Donald J Wright, avuga ko  bariko barakwiragiza izi ncanco kugira no barokore ubuzima mu gufata iya mbere mu rugamba rwo gutuza iki kiza. Itangazo ryasohowe n'umunyamabanga ntayegayezwa mu bushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu wa Tanzania ryaciye mu kinyamakuru The Citizen muri ico gihugu, rivuga ko reta yiteze kuronka ubwoko bune bw'incanco zirindiriwe mu kiringo c'amezi atatu gushika kuri ane ari imbere. Uru rucanco rutangwa kuri doze imwe gusa ruzotangwa ku buntu mu bitaro vyose vya reta. Abazoba bafise ingendo mu mahanga nabo nyene bazohabwa uru rucanco ariko babanje kuriha. Hari haciye indwi zibiri izinga rya Zanzibar ry'ico gihugu ryaratanguye isekeza ryo gucandaga rikoresheje rwa rucanco rw'ahingurwa n'Ubushinwa, Sinovac. Gushika ubu ariko nta biharuro vyerekana abamaze gucandagwa, canke igitigiri c'izo ncanco zatanzwe na reta y'Ubushinwa. Tanzania yari imaze igihe kitari gito idatangaza ibitigiri vy'ingene coronavirus yifashe mu gihugu kuva mu 2020 gushika mu kwa gatandatu uno mwaka, haciye amezi make Perezida Samia Suluhu yimitswe nk'umukuru mushasha w'ico gihugu. Uwo yasubiriye, umuhisi John Pombe Magufuli, yari umwe mu bategetsi b'isi batabona kumwe n'abandi ibijanye na Covid, akaba yari yariyamirije incanco. Iki gihugu ubu kimenyesha ko gihanganye n'igihuhusi kigira gatatu ca Covid. Eritrea n'Uburundi ni vyo bihugu vyonyene ku mugabane wa Afrika bitarasaba incanco muri wa mugambi Covax canke muri wa mugambi w'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Afrika, uzwi nka Vaccine Acquisition Trust.

headline: Champions League: Chelsea v Lille, Man Utd v Atletico, Man City v Sporting, Liverpool v Inter
text: Chelsea isanganywe igikombe izokina na Lille yo mu cicaro ca mbere mu Bufaransa mu  migwi  16 isigaye muri Champions League inyuma y'itomboza ry'ingene zizokuranamwo ryabaye ubugira kabiri. "Ingorane y'ubuhinga" yari yatumye haba ikosa mw'itomboza rya mbere, Uefa ikaba yaciye ivuga ko ribaye impfagusa. Manchester United izohura na Atletico Madrid isanganywe igikombe ca La Liga nayo Manchester City ifise igikombe ca Premier League ikazokina na Sporting Lisbon yo muri Portugal. Liverpool imaze gutwara ico gikombe incuro 6 izohura  na Inter Milan imaze kugitwara 3. Real Madrid imaze gutwara ico gikombe 13 yaguye kuri Paris Saint Germain yo mu Bufaransa  ifise abakinyi ba rututura  cane muri iki gihe. Ingene imigwi izohura mu gice ca 16 gishira ica nyuma: Red Bull Salzburg v Bayern Munich Sporting Lisbon v Manchester City Benfica v Ajax Chelsea v Lille Atletico Madrid v Manchester United Villarreal v Juventus Inter Milan v Liverpool PSG v Real Madrid

headline: Russia yahaye amasaha indwi ingabo za Ukraine ziri i Mariupol ngo zikishikane, zanse
text: Nta kintu na kimwe cerekana ko ingabo za Ukraine zirwanira mu gisagara ca Mariupol cugarijwe zihava zishikana ku ngabo z'Uburusiya, nk'uko zari zatewe akamo n'iki gihugu kimaze igihe cugaye iki gisagara kiri ku nkengera y'inyanja mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Ukraine. Umuhanuzi w'umukuru w'igisagara ca Mariupol, Petro Andriushchenko, yavuze abicishije ku rubuga rwa Telegram ko "n'aho Uburusiya bwatanze 'akanya ko kwishikana' ku ngabo zacu zisigaye" muri ico gisagara "abarwanyi bacu barabandanya urugamba". Umushingamateka wa Ukraine aserukira akarere ka Odesa, Oleksiy Goncharenko, yabwiye BBC ko ingabo za Ukraine ziri i Mariupol zitazokwishikana ku ngabo z'Uburusiya. Ati: "Naravuganye nabo ejo, kandi ndazi ko bazorwana gushika ku wa nyuma". Uburusiya bwari bwemereye ingabo za Ukraine zirwanira mu gisagara ca Mariupol ko zishobora kuticwa - ariko gusa mu gihe zari gushira ibirwanisho hasi kuri uyu wa Mungu zikishikana. Reta y'Uburusiya yavuga ko ingabo za Ukraine "n'abacangero mvamakungu " bakirwana i Mariupol -  igisagara Uburusiya buvuga ko bwigaruriye hafi cose - bari bafise amahirwe yo gushira ibirwanisho hasi hagati y'isaha cumi na zibiri z'agatondo (06h00) gushika isaha indwi z'umurango (13h00) mu masaha ya Moscou hanyuma bagashobora gukira. Yavuga ko abakora ivyo bashobora gufatwa neza hisunzwe amasezerano ya Geneva agenga impfungwa z'intambara. Iri tangazo ntirivuga icoba mu gihe hogira umusirikare n'umwe wa Ukraine yokwanka gushira ikirwanisho ciwe hasi - ariko rikavuga ko reta yemeye ibi "mu kwubahiriza iteka rya kiremwamuntu". Uburusiya buvuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zigisigaye muri ico gisagara zazibiriwe mu gace gatoya ka Azovstal gahingurirwamwo ivyuma. Iri tangazo ryavuga ko ingabo z'Uburusiya "zari kubandanya zisohora" ibiri mu vyo izi ngabo za Ukraine zikiri i Azovstal zemerewe uko iminota 30 iheze ijoro ryose. Uburusiya buvuga ko ingabo za Ukraine ni zemera kwishikana, ingabo z'Uburusiya zari kumanika amabendera atukura isaha cumi na zibiri hanyuma iza Ukraine nazo zigashobora kumanika amabendera yera. Rihimiriza kandi izo ngabo ko zitorinda kurindira uruhusha ruva i Kyiv kugira ngo zishikane, ariko ko zokwifatira ingingo zo nyene. Imbere y'aha, Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky yari yatangaje ko "guhonya" abarwanyi bakirwanira i Mariupol gushobora gutuma ibiganiro n'Uburusiya bihagarara burundu. Ni inyuma y'aho umukuru w'intara ya Donesk iherutse gutangazwa n'Uburusiya ko ari igihugu cigenga (Donetsk People's Republic, DPR) atangarije ko abarwanyi ba Ukraine basigaye i Mariupol bazokwanka kwishikana bazohonywa. Afatiye ku kungene igisagara kiri hafi ya Kyiv casambuwe n'ibibombe, Perezida Zelensky yabwiye urubuga ngurukanabumenyi Pravda  ati: "Mariupol ishobora kuba nka Borodyanka incuro cumi". Muri ino ndwi, Moscou yatangaje ko abasirikare ba Ukraine barwanira mu mazi barenga 1000 bishikanye i Mariupol, ivyo Ukraine yoyo yahakanye. Inyuma y'aho ejo ku wa gatandatu Uburusiya buhereye amasaha make yo kwishikana ingabo za Ukraine zirwanira i Mariupol, Perezida Zelensky yaremeye ko ingabo za Ukraine zigisigaranye agace gatoya gusa ka Mariupol, anavuga ko reta iguma ivugana n'abo bacirwanako. Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters risubiramwo Zelensky avuga ko ibintu bimeze nabi cane. Ariko ntiyavuze ku bivugwa n'Uburusiya ko igisirikare cabwo cakubuye udusigarira tw'ingabo za Ukraine mu gisagara cose kimaze igihe gisatirwa, kiretse izari zikiri ku ruganda rwa Azovstal - uruganda rukomeye ruhingura ubutare bw'icuma. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw'Uburusiya yavuze ko ingabo za Ukraine zababa 2500 ari zo zikiri muri urwo ruganda, kandi ko ata saganirizo zisigaranye kuko zugaraniweyo n'abasirikare b'Uburusiya, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru ca reta TASS. BBC ntiyashoboye guhinyuza aya makuru. Icegera c'umukuru w'ikambi y'umunani mu gisirikare c'Uburusiya, Vladimir Petrovich Frolov, yasize ubuzima mu ntambara muri Ukraine, nk'uko bitangazwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru ry'Uburusiya TASS. Aya makuru yemejwe na buramatari wa St Petersburg,  Alexander Beglov. Beglov avuga ati: "Vladimir Petrovich Frolov yapfuye nk'intwari mu ntambara n'intagondwa za Ukraine". Uyu muburamatari avuga ko Frolov "yitanze kugira ngo abana, abagore n'abatama mu ntara ya Donbas ntibasubire guterwa amabombe". Ariko amabombe menshi aterwa muri Ukraine aterwa n'Uburusiya. Muri ino ntambara, abajenerali b'abarusiya batari bake n'izindi ntwazangabo mu gisirikare c'Uburusiya bavugwa ko bahasize ubuzima. Ni ibintu bidasanzwe kwumva intwazangabo zo ku rwego nk'urwo bishira mu kaga mu kwegera cane urubuga rw'intambara, amakuru ava mu bihugu vyo mu burengero akavuga ko bakora gutyo mu ntumbero yo kuraba ko bofata urugamba mu minwe mu gihe, hamwe hamwe rwagenze nabi.

headline: Diego Maradona: Menya ubuhinga bw'uyu mukinyi n'intege nke ziwe
text: Igitangaza c'umukinyi, agaragara mu kibuga, umuhinga, ntagereranywa, adahuriweko na bose. Diego Maradona. Igihangange mu mupira w'amaguru ateye inkeke. Umwe mu bakinyi b'ibihangange muri uwo mukino, uwo munya Argentine yarishimira uko ahererekanya umupira, ukubona kure n'ubunyarutsi vyashimisha abakunzi biwe. Yaranashavuje abakunzi biwe igihe yinjiza n'ukuboko, mu ciswe 'Hand of God' (ukuboko kw'Imana), aca aja muvyo kunywa ibiyayuramutwe no mu zindi ngorane zimuraba ku giti ciwe atari ku kibuga. Diego Armando Maradona yavukiye mu micungararo  y'igisagara ca Buenos Aires haraciye imyaka 60, akaba yakize ubukene buharangwa mu kuba umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru rurangiranwa bamwe bagereranya mbere ko yasumvya ubuhinga Pele wo muri Brezil. Uwo munye Argentine, yinjije ibitsindo 259 mu nkino 491, yararushije amajwi mugenzi we wo muri Amerika y'epfo mu matora y'umukinyi wa mbere akomeye mu kinjana ca 20, imbere y'uko FIFA ihindura uburyo batoramwo, bose bakaba baciye bagirwa aba mbere. Maradona yerekanye ubushobozi butangaje kuva akiri muto, aho yagejeje umurwi wiwe w'abakiri bato wa Los Cebollitas, ku ntsinzi 136 bikurikiranya, aca agira ugukina umupira w'amaguru umwuga ku myaka 16 n'imisi 120. Mugufi kandi yitsindagiye, ku metero imwe n'igice, si umunonotsi wokwiyumviriye. Ububangutsi bwiwe, ukubona kure, guhagarika umupira, ugucenga no guhereza vyatuma ukutanyaruka cane n'iyongerekana ry'ibiro vyiwe bitagaragara. Ashobora kuba yari umuhinga mu guca mu bakinyi binyuma bahanganye, ariko vyaramugora kwirinda ingorane. Ibitsindo 34 vya Maradona mu nkino 91 za Argentine ni igice kimwe muri kahise kiwe mu gihe yamaze akina. Yarafashije igihugu ciwe gutahukana intsinzi mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi co mu 1986 i Mexico, aranagishikana mu rukino rwa nyuma inyuma y'imyaka ine yakurikiye. Mu nkino z'igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma zaheruka, hari habayemwo ukutumvikana kwari gushobora kugira ingaruka ku buzima bwiwe. Urukino rwabahuje n'Ubwongereza na rwo rwadutsemwo ikindi cuka kibi, intambara ya Falklands War hagati y'ivyo bihugu bibiri yari yatanguye  imyaka ine imbere y'aho. Ku kibuga ho yaciye ikomera gusumba. Mu gihe hari haheze iminota 51 ata gitsindo kiraboneka, Maradona yarwaniye umupira mu kirere n'umunyegoli Peter Shilton aca yinjiza igitsindo. Mu nyuma yavuze ko ico gitsindo cabonetse "hamwe kivuye ku mutwe wa Maradona, ahandi na ho ku kuboko kw'Imana". Inyuma y'iminota ine, yaciye yinjiza igitsindo  kivugwa ko ari "igitsindo c'ikinjana' - yafashe umupira hagati mu kibuga aca arawirukankana, asiga abandi bakinyi inyuma, imbere yo gucenga Shilton, aca arinjiza. Ku ncuro zibiri zose, Maradona yaraguzwe ku giciro kitari bwigere kibaho ku wundi mukinyi  - ava muri Boca Juniors mu gihugu ciwe agana Barcelone muri Espagne ku miliyoni 3 z'amapawundi, n'igihe yaja mu Butaliyano mu murwi wa Napoli, inyuma y'imyaka ibiri ku  miliyoni 5 z'amapawundi. Hari abakunzi b'uwo mugwi barenga 80.000 ku kibuga ca San Paolo, igihe yashika ari muri kajugujugu. Intwari nshasha. Yarakinye mu murwi ukomeye mu Butaliyano, arakundwa n'abarorerezi mu gihe yafasha gutahukana ibikombe vy'ihiganwa rya Buraya mu 1987 na 1990 hamwe n'igikombe ca UEFA co mu 1989. Yaragiriraniye ubucuti n'imirwi y'abicanyi ya Camorra, aja muvyo kunywa ibiyayuramutwe vya cocaine, aranitwarirwa yagirizwa kutemera umwana yavyaye. Inyuma yo gutsindwa igitsindo 1-0 n'Ubudagi mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe c'isi mu 1990 mu Butaliyano, ibipimo vyerekanye ko yanyoye ibiyayuramutwe mu mwaka wakurikiye vyatumye ahagarikwa amezi 15. 1977: Yatanguye mu rukino rwahuza Argentine v Hongrie 1982: Yagiye mu murwi wa Napoli inyuma y'imyaka ibiri yamaze muri Barcelone 1986: Yatahukanye igikombe c'isi akinira Argentine 1990: Yakinye urukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe c'isi ubugira kabiri akinira Argentine, maze itahukana ikibanza ca kabiri. Atwara n'igikombe c'imigwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo akinira Napoli. 1991: Yahagaritswe amezi 15 inyuma yo gusanga yafashe ibiyayuramutwe. 1994: Yakinye mu gikombe c'isi incuro ya kane ariko aca arirukanwa inyuma yo gusanga yafashe ibiyayuramutwe. 1997: Yarasezeye mu mupira w'amaguru inyuma yo gusanga yafashe ibiyayuramutwe ubugira gatatu. 2010: Yahejeje ikiringo ciwe co kumenyereza umurwi wa Argentine inyuma yo gutsindwa mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi. Inyuma y'ibipimo bigira gatatu vyemeza ko yafashe ibiyayuramutwe inyuma y'imyaka itatu, yarasezeye mu mupira w'amaguru afise imyaka 37, ariko abandanya agira n'izindi ngorane. Maradona yaraciriwe urubanza rwo gupfungwa imyaka 2 n'amezi 10 ariko yidegemvya azira kurasa abamenyeshamakuru n'inkoho ikoreshwa mu gukina. Akamenyero kiwe ka cocaine n'akaborerwe vyamuteye ibibazo vy'amagara. Yarongereje ibiro gushika ku 128, agira indwara y'umutima mu 2004, ivyamutumye amara umwanya munini ariko aravurwa. Yarabazwe ku nda kugira bamufashe kugabanya ibiro, araja no kuba muri Cuba mu gihe yariko ararwana no guheba gufata ibiyayuramutwe. N'aho habaye ivyo vyose, nticabujije ko Maradona agenwa kumenyereza umurwi wa Argentine mu 2008 akaba yaranawushikanye mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma mu nkino z'isi yose  inyuma y'imyaka ibiri, imbere y'uko batsindwa n'Ubudagi ibitsindo 4-0.

headline: Lionel Messi yasohowe mu rukino Barca yatsinzwe na Atletic Bilbao muri Super Coupe
text: Lionel Mesi yeretswe ikarata itukura ya mbere kuva akinira Barcelone mu rukino batsinzwemwo na Athletic Bilbao 3-2 mu gikombe ca Super Coupe ca Espagne kuri uyu wa mungu. Messi,mu rukino rugira urwa 753 muri Barca, yasunuye Asier Villalibre mu ma sekunda ya nyuma y'umwanya w'inyongera , ikosa ryabonywe na kamera ifasha abahagarikizi. Barca yagiye imbere kabiri ku bitsindo vyinjijwe na Antoine Griezmann ariko  Atletic ija iragombora buri igihe. Inaki Williams niwe yinjije igitsindo c'intsinzi. Bubaye ubwa kabiri Atletic itwara ico gikombe yaheruka mu 1985. Messi yasunitse rutahizamu Villalibre mu munota ugira 120. Umuhagairikiza ntiyari yabibonye hanyuma aravye kuri video ifasha mu guhagarikira aca asohora Messi. Uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 33 yari amaze guhabwa ikarata itukura kabiri, hompi akinira Argentine-mu rukino rwiwe rwa mbere akinira igihugu na Hongrie mu 2005 no mu 2019 bakinira ikibanza ca gatatu na Chili muri Copa America. Ubu ashobora kubuzwa inkino nibura 3 muri Espagne, igihano gifata no mu mahiganwa y'ibindi bikombe. Urukino ruheze Villalibre yiginye intsinzi mu kuvugiriza urumbete bagenziwe bakiri mu kibuga. Barcelona habuze gato ngo itahukane ico gikombe ubugira 14, kikaba cari kuba igikombe ca mbere batwaye bemenyerezwa na Ronald Koeman. Cari kuba kandi kibaye igikombe ca Super Coupe kigira 8 kuri Messi, mu gihe gishosbora kuba ikiringo ciwe ca nyuma muri Barcelone kuko amasezerano yiwe azohera muri iri ci ryimirije. Bubaye ubwa mbere kuva mu 1960 Atletic itsinda Real na Barca mu nkino zikurikirana. Yari yatsinze Real Madrid mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma 2-1.

headline: Africa-Urudandazwa ku buryo bwa none: Abagore bahevye iduka bakaja kuri terefone zigezweho
text: BBC yibanze ku bagore batatu b'abanya-Afrika - uwahora afise iduka, umwigisha n'umushoferi wa taxi - bongereje amafaranga binjiza kuva batanguye gukora urundadazwa ku buryo bwa terefone zigezweho (smartphones na digital platforms). Ikiza ca coronavirus catumye benshi basubira kwiyumvira ingene boronka ikibabeshaho. Ikigo cigenga gikora ubushakashatsi  Caribou Digital catoye ko abagore muri Kenya, Nigeria na Ghana bariko baravyaza umusaruro uburyo bwo gukora urudandazwa uciye ku buhinga bwa none bwo gutumatumanako (smartphones na digital platforms) kuko bwo bworoshe gushikira  no gukora ibitandukanye -gutyo bagashobora kwinjiza amafaranga kandi bakabandanya n'amabanga yo kwitaho abana babo. Madame Tarit  (mubona kw'ifoto aho hejuru) ntiyibaza ko yoshoboye  kugwiza na kabiri amafaranga yinjiza mu kiringo c'amezi icenda. Ikiza ca Covid cari catumye yugara iduka ryiwe ry'impuzu z'abana muri Eldoret mu burengero bwa Kenya, none gukotesha ibibanza aciye ku bigo bikorera kuri internet nka Airbnb bisa n'ibiriko birazibira igihengeri cari catewe no kwugara urudandazwa rwiwe. Ariko, Madame Tarit w'imyaka 29, ari mu bandi bagore benshi bariko baratera imbere mu gukoresha imbuga nka Facebook, Whatsapp, Instagram na apps z'ama taxi nka Uber na Bolt. Yatanguye urundadazwa rwiwe n'ikibanza kimwe haraheze amezi icenda none ubu afise indwi -ubu akaba akotesha ku gihe kirekire hanyuma nawe agapangisha aciye kuri Airbnb. "Ubu ninjiza amafaranga menshi kurusha ayo nakura mu rudandazwa imbere y'ikiza [ca Covid]," niko yabwiye BBC Daily. Abakoresha urwo rudandazwa ahanini n'abakerarugendo babikisha aho bazorara hamwe n'abagwizatunga bashima kurara muri  Airbnb aho kurara mw'ihoteri. "Mu gihe ca Covid benshi mu  bagenzi banje baratakaje ubuzi baca batangura gukorera ku materefone kugira binjize amafaranga. Ubu bagurisha ivyo kurya baciye kuri internet hanyuma bagakora nk'abashoferi bo kubishira abakiriya", nk'uko Madame  Tarit avuga. Umunsi usanzwe kuri Madame  Adzogble w'imyaka 32, utangurwa no gushira ubutumwa bwo kwamamaza ivyo acuruza kuri Whatsapp no kuri Facebook yibereye i muhira i Acra, umurwa mukuru wa Ghana. Ari mu bariko baravyaza umusaruro zimwe mu mpinduka zikomeye cane mu butunzi muri Afrika -ukwiyongera kw'ibibanza vyo gukoreramwo ubucuruzi kw'isoko ryo kuri internet. Agurisha amaterefone ngendanwa, ivyuma vyo kuzana akayaga mu nzu hamwe n'ama-television, ivyo vyose akavyamamaza aciye ku migwi yashinze kuri Whatsapp na Facebook, hamwe no mu yo asanzwemwo, nk'uwo ahuriramwo n'abo basenga hamwe. Madame Adzogble  yahevye akazi ko kwigisha igifaransa kugira aronke umwanya ukwiye wo gukora urudandazwa rwiwe kuri internet. "Bivamwo amafaranga menshi kurusha kwigisha. Ndashobora kugurisha ikintu kimwe nkinjiza ayaruta ayo mara ukwezi nkorera mu kwigisha. Mfise abana. Nkeneye guha abana banje indero nziza ishoboka,  akaba aribo bampa umwete wo kurondera kwigenga mu bijanye n'amafaranga", niko avuga. Ku bwa Madame Adzogble, kwubaka imigenderanire myiza n'abakiriya n'ikintu nyamukuru ushaka guca amafaranga uciye kuri internet. "Aho baraheza bakakugurira hanyuma bakakuvuga neza." Madame Lawal, w'imyaka 34, akorera  ibigo vy'amataxi uhamagara uciye ku buhinga bwa none Uber na Bolt mu gisagara ca mbere kinini muri Nigeria, Lagos. Ariko, ntibimworohera - uyo mugore areze abana bane wenyene avuga ko hari abagabo banka gutwarwa n'umugore. Lawa avuga ati: "Igihe natangura gutwara taxi muri Lagos, abagabo bose baca bafuta urugendo maze gushika kubajana." "Lagos haragoye , bisaba kuba ukomeye cane kugira ushobore  gutwara imodoka mu gisagara. Abagabo bibaza ko izo nguvu atazo mfise, mbanza kubajijura kugira bemere kwinjira mu modoka." Icigwa ca  Caribou Digital cerekana kandi ko abagore benshi barondera ikibabeshaho baciye ku buhinga bwa digital bafise impungene ku mutekano wabo. Umukuru w'abakoze ubwo bushakashatsi Grace Natabaalo yabwiye BBC ati: "Abagore benshi twavuganye bavuze ko baburagijwe bishingiye ku gitsina iyo bitavye ababa  bafatishije ingendo." Ati: "Mu gihe reta ihimiriza abagore bakiri bato gufata bene aka kazi bakeneye no kumenya urundi ruhande rwako - ko hari ingeramizi kandi zitegerezwa gufatwa nk'ikibazo gikomeye n'inzego z'igiporisi na reta." Ariko Lawal avuga ko ivyiza birimwo biruta cane ibibi. Ati: "Ni vyiza cane kuba ushobora kwironkera ikikubeshaho ariko kandi nshaka no kugira ico ntereye mu butunzi muri rusangi mu gutanga amakori (imisoro). Nsaka ko ubwanje ntera imbere, na Nigeria igatera imbere."

headline: CAN 2021: Mali yatsinze Tunisia mu rukino rwaheze mu mpari
text: Mali yatsinze Tuniziya 1-0 mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika c'umupira w'amaguru, mu rukino  rwarangiye mu mpari zikomeye mu gihe umuhagarikize yavugije ifirimbi yanyuma hataragera. Umumenyereza w'ikipe Aigles du Carthage, Mondher Kebaier hamwe n'abamufasha kumenyereza baciye binjira mu kibuga guhangana n'umuhagarikizi Janny Sikazwe nyuma yo kurangiza urukino hasigaye iminota. Bwana Sikazwe yabanje kurangiza urukino ku munota wa 85, abantu bose bagwa mu gahundwe nawe aravye isaha yiwe arabona yuko yihenze, niho yabaza abo bakorana aca afata ingingo yo kubandanya urukino. Ariko naho nyene ku munota wa 89 yaciye arangiza urukino mu gihe vyagaragara ko hategerezwa kuba umwanya wongerwako. Ikiganiro n'abanyamakuru kimaze gutangura, abateguye ihiganwa bategetse ko urukuno rubandanya gushika ruheze. Ariko, Tuniziya yanse gusubira mu kibuga hanyuma Mali ica yegurirwa intsinzi. Hagati aho, Tuniziya yananiwe penaliti yari yatanzwe naho nyene habanje kuba impari, umuhagarikizi abwirizwa kuraba television imwereka ivyabaye (VAR). Ibindi biraza gukurikira.

headline: Ubutunzi bwa Afghanistani buteye ahatemba
text: Ku musi wa kabiri, itariki 23 Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11), hari hakwiye imisi 100 kuva abatalibani bagarutse ku butegetsi muri Afghanistani. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC, Yalda Hakim yaragendeye akarere ka Kabul, kurondera inkuru yerekeye ubutunzi bwagabanutse kuva imfashanyo y’amakungu ihagaritswe, bituma haba akaga ku bantu.

headline: HRW yagiriza abacangero ba Russia amarorerwa muri Central African Republic
text: Abacangero b'Abarusiya bagirizwa ubwicanyi ndengerabutungane, iyicarubozo, no gukubita abasivire muri Centrafrique (CAR). Ababibonye babwiye ishirahamwe Human Rights Watch (HRW) ko kimwe mu vyabaye mu kw'indwi, abawanyi bavuga ikirusiya barashe n'imiburiburi abantu 12 batari bafise ibirwanisho kuri bariyeri. Bavuga ko abishwe hafi bose batawe mu kinogo gitoya ku nkengera z'ibarabara hafi y'igisagara ca Bossangoa. Reta ya Centrafrique irahakana ko atabacangero b'umurwi Wagner wo mu Burusiya yahaye akazi mu ntambara n'inyeshamba. Muragabe - iyi nkuru irimwo ibintu bishobora gutera ubwoba Abahinga ba ONU nabo nyene baragiriza abacangero b'Abarusiya kugenda bahonyanga bikomeye agateka ka zina muntu muri Centrafrique, kimwe mu bihugu bikenye cane kw'isi ariko gitunze cane ubutare bwa diyama (diamant), inzahabu, na uranium. Umurwi Wagner uravugwa cane ko warungitse ingabo mu tundi turere twa Afrika - muri Mali na Libya - kandi ko wagize uruhara rukomeye cane mu ntambara zo muri Syria na Ukraine. Mu kwezi guheze, abikekwa ko ari abacangero b'abarusiya bari mu bagirizwa kugandagura abanyagihugu bababa 300 muri Mali mu cegeranyo ca HRW. Muri ino ndwi, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Uburusiya Sergei Lavrov yarashimangiye aho Moscou ihagaze kuri uyu murwi, avuga ko Wagner ataho uhuriye na reta y'Uburusiya. Mu cegeranyo cayo, HRW ivuga ko yegeranije ivyemezo bikomeye ko abarwanyi b'Abarusiya bakoreye abasivire amabi y'agahomerabunwa muri CAR kandi ko ata bihano bafatiwe kuva mu 2019. Hagati ya Ruhuhuma (2) 2019 na Munyonyo (11) 2021, iri shirahamwe riharanira agateka ka zina muntu ryavugishije abantu 40, harimwo 10 bakorewe aya mabi hamwe na 15 bavyiboneye, ku bijanye n'amabi yakozwe n'abagabo bavuga ikirusiya. Ababibonye bavuga ko abo bantu bari bafise ibirwanisho bikomeye kandi bambaye impuzu za kaki, ibitambara vyo kunyegeza isura, ibirato vya gisirikare hamwe n'amarori y'izuba. 12 muri abo babajijwe bariboneye ubwo bwicanyi hafi y'igisagara Bossangoa kiri mu burengero ku wa 21 Mukakaro (7) 2021, nk'uko bivugwa na HRW. Aba basore batari banafise n'ibirwanisho bishwe bavuye i Bossangoa bari ku mapikipiki inyuma y'isaha cumi na zibiri (06:00) mu masaha yo muri ico gihugu. Bararenganye ibariyeri bava mu gisagara ariko mu nyuma baza kwicirwa ku yindi yari ku birometero hafi 12 hanze ya Bossangoa, kw'ibarabara abategetsi bavuga ko ryama rigenzurwa n'abarwanyi b'Abarusiya. Bategetswe kuva ku mapikipiki yabo, gushira amaboko hejuru bagashikiriza amaterefone bari bafise. Nk'uko bivugwa na HRW, abagabo bari hagati ya bane na batandatu bavuga ikirusiya baciye babakubita, babasunagura baryamye hasi. Inyuma y'aho, baciye batwarwa umwe umwe, babategeka gupfukama, bagaca babarasa mu mutwe. Bivugwa ko abariko barorera ingene ivyo bintu vyariko biba baciye batangura gusenga bakoma akaruru - ariho muri iyo nduru n'akavuyo babiri muri abo bari bafashwe bashoboye guhunga. HRW yerekana kandi ingene abantu bafashwe bakaborezwa igufa n'abarwanyi b'Abarusiya i Bambari mu 2019. Umudandaza w'iduka yafashwe yiketswe ko ari inyeshamba yavuze ko Abarusiya bamufashe bakamuca urutoke muri Nzero (1) 2019. Avuga ingene yapfunzwe, Mahamat Nour Mamadou agira ati:"Narakubiswe bimwe bibi bakoresheje amaferabeto (Fers à béton) n'imbugita. Bamboshe amaso y'ikirenge. Umwe muri bo yavuze yifashishije umuhinduzi (interprète/translator) ati: 'Turabaca intoke'". "Naraboroga; kuko narababara cane. Hanyuma bafashe umunyororo bawumbohera mw'izosi barakaza cane. Naraguye, ururimi rurasohoka. Umurusiya yafashe itafari arinshira mu kanwa hanyuma arikubita umugere. Amenyo yahatswe kuvayo". Aya mabi yakorewe yayabwiye abanyamakuru mu nyuma, HRW ikavuga ko yahavuye yicwa muri Nyakanga (9) 2019 mu buryo budasobanutse. Ubucuti hagati y'Uburusiya na Centrafrique bwagiye kuja ahabona ubwa mbere mu 2018 aho habereye amasezerano ko abahoze ari intwazangabo z'Uburusiya bari kuza gutanga inyigisho za gisirikare. Ku wa 30 Mukakaro (7) 2018, abanyamakuru batatu b'Abarusiya bariko bakora ireresi y'amatohoza ku ruhara rwa Wagner muri ico gihugu barishwe barashwe - kandi ababikoze ntibigeze babaca n'ikanda. Centrafrique yamye mu ntambara z'urutavanako kuva yikukiye mu 1960. Mu 2013, inyeshamba zigizwe ahanini n'aba-Islam zarigaruriye igihugu kigizwe ahanini n'abakristu. Haciye havuka imirwi yo kwirwanako kugira yivune, ivyatumye haduka ubwicanyi mu gihugu cose bushingiye ku madini. Perezida Faustin-Archange Touadéra aje ku butegetsi mu 2016, igihugu caciye gitangura guha umugongo Ubufaransa bwahoze bukirongoye mu gihe c'ubukoloni, maze ciheka ku Burusiya. HRW ivuga ko ukudahana kwateje indyane nyinshi, igatera akamo reta gukora amatohoza no gushengeza abo bose bagize uruhara mu bwicanyi, ipfungwa riteye kubiri n'amategeko hamwe n'iyicarubozo, harimwo n'ingabo mvamahanga.

headline: Intambara ya Ukraine: G7 yiyemeje gufata mu mugongo Ukraine gushika ku kanyuma
text: Abategetsi b’ibihugu indwi  bitunze gusumba ibindi kw’isi (G7) biyemeje gufasha Ukraine “igihe cose bizoba bikenewe”, hari ku musi ugira kabiri w’ikoraniro barimwo mu Budagi. Mw’itangazo, ibihugu vya G7 bivuga kandi ko Uburusiya butegerezwa guhagarika kuzibira ibifungurwa bubibuza kuva ku bivuko vya Ukraine. Mw’ijambo yashikirije ibi bihugu yifashishije ubuhinga bwa videwo, umukuru w’igihugu ca Ukraine yateye akamo ibihugu vy’Uburengero ko vyomuha ibindi birwanisho vya rutura. Abategetsi ba G7 bari mu ngorane yo kutabona ibintu kumwe mu nzira yavyo ku gitero c’Uburusiya kibandanya cunyura ibintu. Mw’iri tangazo basohoye nijoro ku wa mbere ryarimwo amajambo akomeye, aba bategetsi bavuga bati: “Tuzobandanya dufasha Ukraine mu kuyiha imfashanyo y’amafaranga, y’ubutabazi, ya gisirikare n’imigenderanire, mu gihe cose bizoba ari ngombwa “Turacababajwe kandi tubandanya twiyamiriza igitero c’ubugome, kitagira imvo, kidasiguritse, kandi giteye kubiri n’amategeko kuri Ukraine cakozwe n’Uburusiya bufashijwe na Biélorussie [Belarus]”. Abategetsi ba G7  - Canada, Ubufaransa, Ubudagi, Ubutaliyano, Ubuyapani, Ubwongereza na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika – bahambijwe n’intumwa zibiri zo mu Bumwe bwa Bulaya i Bavière/Bavaria mu Budagi. Ibi biganiro vyo ku rwego rwo hejuru vyabaye mu gihe ingabo z’Uburusiya zongereje akariro mu bitero kuri Ukraine, aho abategetsi bavuga ko inyubakwa y’idandarizo yatewe igisasu ca misire mu gisagara ca Kremenchuk kiri hagati mu gihugu, kigahitana abantu n’imiburiburi cumi, nk’uko bivugwa na buramatari. Igihe yahamagara mw’ihoteri y’akaroruhore iyi nama yariko iberamwo, Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky yasabiye Ukraine ibindi birwanisho vya rutura, anavuga ko yizeye ko intambara ishobora   kuba yarangiye mu mpera z’uno mwaka “imbere y’uko igihe c’ubukonje gitangura”. Hari amakenga ko igihe c’ubukonje (hiver/winter) aho usanga ibirere ari bibi cane gishoboa kubangamira cane ingabo za Ukraine. Yasavye kandi ibihugu vy’uburengero ko vyobandanya bitera igitsure Uburusiya mu kubufatira ibindi bihano. Mw’itangazo rusangi, abategetsi b’ibihugu vya G7 bavuze ko baciyemeje “kugumizaho no kwongereza” ibihano kuri reta ya Perezida Vladimir Putin na Biélorussie imufashe mu mugongo. Hagiye gufatwa ibihano ku bidandazwa vy’i’ nzahabu n’igitoro bishorwa hanze, “abagirizwa ivyaha vyo mu ntambara” na bo nyene bafatirwe ibihano, nk’uko iri tangazo rusangi ribivuga. G7 kandi isaba Kremlin ko yorekura imfungurwa zikava ku bivuko vya Ukraine – yongera yagiriza Moscou kwongereza ubwoba bw’ubukene bw’ibifungurwa kw’isi nk’inkurikizi y’iyi ntambara. Igice kinini c’intete kirumara za Ukraine zategerezwa gushorwa hanze zishobora kuborera mu bubiko mu gihe ingabo z’Uburusiya zikizibiye ibivuko vya Ukraine ku Nyanja Yirabura (Mer Noire/Black Sea). Iri tangazo rya G7 rivuga riti: “Turasaba vyihuta Uburusiya ko buhagarika ataco burinze gusaba ibitero ku nyubakwa z’uburimyi n’amabarabara bukareka ivyimburwa bigasohoka ibivuko vya Ukraine”. Amatohoza ya BBC yatoye ivyemezo vyerekana ko ingabo z’Uburusiya mu turere twa Ukraine zigaruriye zigenda ziba intete hamwe n’ibindi vyimburwa vy’abarimyi.  Mw’ijambo yashikirije muri iri koraniro, umushikiranganji wa mbere w’Ubwongereza Boris Johnson yabwiye BBC ko ari “ngombwa ko igiciro c’ubwigenge cishurwa" mu gufata mu mugongo Ukraine, kandi ko iyi mfashanyo itegerezwa kubandanya itangwa kugira ngo iki gihugu gisanure ubutunzi bwaco, gishore hanze intete congere gikingire abanyagihugu baco. Imbere y’aho ejo ku wa mbere, umushikiranganji Johnson yafashwe isanamu ariko ashinyaguriza Vladimir Putin – akunze kwifotoza agatuza kambaye ubusa – abwira abandi bategetsi ko ari ngombwa ko “twereka [Uburusiya] inguvu zacu”. Mu gihe abategetsi ba G7 bari mu nama yabo ejo ku wa mbere, hari amakuru yasohotse yavuga ko Uburusiya butashoboye kwishura ideni ryabwo ku ncuro ya mbere kuva mu 1998, inyuma yo kunanirwa no kuriha ku gihe imiriyoni 100 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika. Hagati aho, Kremlin ivuga ko ikibazo atari “ingorane yacu”, kubera aya mafaranga yarishwe mu kwa gatanu, ariko akazibirwa n’ibihano vy’Uburengero.

headline: Abaganga b'abanyamahanga 'bavunishwa akazi' bafitiye impungenge abarwayi mu Bwongereza
text: Paul Kenyon & Anna Meisel File on 4 & Newsnight Abanganga barondewe bava mu bihugu bimwe bimwe bikenye cane kw’isi kugira baje gukora mu bitaro vyo mu Bwongereza  bavuga ko bakoreshwa vy’umurengera – kandi bakemeza ko bakoreshwa amasaha menshi cane ku buryo bafise ubwoba bwo gushira mu kaga amagara y’abarwayi. Amatohoza ya BBC yaronse ivyemeza ko abaganga baturuka muri Nigeria bahabwa akazi na kompanyi y’ubuvuzi yo mu Bwongereza aho baba bitezwe gukora mu bitaro vy’abigenga mu buryo butemewe mu gisata c’igihugu citaho amagara y’abantu, National Health Service, NHS. Ishirahamwe ry’abaganga mu Bwongereza (British Medical Association, BMA) rivuga ko ivyo bintu “bishegeshe” kandi ko ico gisata gitegerezwa gushirwa ku murongo w’ingene akazi gakorwa muri NHS. BBC yavuganye n’abaganga benshi – harimwo umuganga w’umunya-Nigeria akiri muto yakoze mu bitaro vy’abigenga mu bitaro vya  Nuffield Health Leeds mu 2021. Augustine Enekwechi avuga ko amasaha yiwe y’akazi yari menshi birengeje -izamu ry’amasaha 24 ku  munsi indwi yose ata munsi uciyemwo - kandi ko atashobora kuva mu kigo c’ibitaro. Avuga ko gukora aho hantu yumva ari nko kuba ari “mu munyororo”. Uburuhe bwari bwinshi cane, ku buryo avuga ko hari igihe yumva ubwoba ko adashora kurangura imirimo neza. Avuga ati : “Nari nzi ko gukora urushe  bituma abarwayi  bashobora kugira ivyago kandi ko nanje bishobora kunshira mu vyago, bigashobora no gukwega imanza. “Numva ntafise uko nogira …ataco nshoboye, urumva, umwitwarariko wa buri igihe no kuguma nibaza ko hari igishobora kwononekara.” Komanyi Nuffield Health irahakana ivy'ayo masaha y’umurengera, ikavuga ko abaganga bayo buri igihe bahabwa umwanya w’akaruhuko, iminsi yo kuruhuka hagati y’ibiringo vy’akazi, hamwe no gushobora kuguza ibiringo vy’akazi iyo bikenewe. Iyo kompanyi yongerako ko “amagara n’ukubaho neza kw’abarwayi n’abakozi b’ibitaro” arivyo bishirwa imbere. Augustine yarungitswe gukora mu bitaro Nuffield Health Leeds na kompanyi yigenga – NES Healthcare. Iyo kompanyi isanzwe ikoresh abaganga bava mu bindi bihugu, benshi baturuka muri Nigeria, bakabakoresha nk’abaganga bariko barimenyereza akazi ( Resident Medical Officers, RMOs)  – akenshi usanga mu bitaro vy’abigenga. Augustine avuga ko yari ashashaye cane kuronka ako kazi ku buryo atanaravye ibiri mu masezerano yiwe y’akazi. Mu vy’ukuri ayo masezerano yamukura mu mategeko asanzwe akingira abakozi bo mu Bwongereza ku masaha y’akazi y’umurengera -ico bita Working Time Directive – kandi agatuma asanga hari amahera menshi yokatwa ku mushashara nk’igihano. Augustine siwe wenyene, haba na gato. BMA n’ishirahamwe riza imbere mu kubavugira, Doctors’ Association,  yemereye ibiganiro File on 4 na Newsnight vya BBC kuraba ivyavuye mu nyishu zatanzwe n’abaganga b’aba RMOs 188 bakozweko amatohoza. Benshi mu baganga bakoreshwa na NES ariko hari bamwe bamwe bakoreshwa n’ibindi bigo. Vyagaragaye ko 92% muri abo baganga bari barondewe muri Afrika  kandi benshi -81% - bava muri Nigeria. Ubwiganze bwabo bidogera amasaha y’akazi y’umurengera hamwe no gukatwa amafaranga mu buryo babona ko baba barenganijwe. Haheze imyaka myinshi ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw’isi (OMS) rigabishije ku kuronderera cane abaganga n’abaforoma  mu bihugu biri mu nzira y’amajambere aho abakizi bo kwa muganga basanzwe ari bake cane. OMS yakoze urutonde rw’ibihugu nk’ivyo 47- vyinshi muri ivyo bikaba biri muri Afrika. Reta y’Ubwongereza urwo rutonde yarushize mu  gitabo c’ivyo yisunga mu gukora- irwita “urutonde rutukura”. Ubu Nigeria reta y’Ubwongereza yayigize igihugu atari ico kuja kurondereramwo abakozi bo kwa muganga. None ubwa mbere ho abo baganga vyagenze gute ngo baje gukora mu Bwongereza? Twarashitse muri Nigeria turabona urundi ruhande rw’iyo nkuru. Mu  ntangaro nini yo gukoreramwo ibibazo i Lagos, igisagara ca mbere kinini muri ico gihugu, twasanze umurongo w’abanganga amajana batonze ngo bakore ikibazo citwa ico gusuzuma ubumenyi  bw’umwuga n’ururimi (Professional and Linguistic Assessments Board)  canke PLAB 1. Ico kibazo gitegurwa n’inama y’ubuganganga i Londres  (General Medical Council, GMC) kandi akaba ariyo ntambwe ya mbere isabwa n’abategetsi bajejwe ivy’amagara mu Bwongereza kugira umuntu aronke uruhusha rwo gukora akazi mu Bwongereza. Abanganga twavuganye bavuga ko bahurumbira imishahara yisumbuye n’uburyo bwo gukoreramwo bwiza kurusha. Ikoreshwa ry’ico kibazo ryari ricungerewe n’abakozi mu mu buserukizi bw’Ubwongereza (British Council)- bwegukira ubushikiranganji bw’Ubwongereza bujejwe imigenderanire. GMC iratanga ico kibazo kandi mu bindi bihugu vyinshi biri ku rutonde rutukura -Ghana, Sudan, Pakistan na Bangladesh. Yaba GMC yaba n’ubuserukizi bw’Ubwongereza birahakaba kuba bigira uruhara rweruye mw’ironderwa ry’abakozi  bikavuga ko vyo ico bikora ari ugufasha kurondera ibikenewe abaganga bashaka kuja mu Bwongereza ku giti cabo – ivyo navyo bikaba vyemewe n’ingingo ngenderwako. Ku bijanye na Augustine, yariko arigira igice ca kabiri c’ivyo bibazo vya PLAB mu Bwongereza, ari naho NES yamurondera hanyuma ikamwemerera kumufasha kuronka uruhusha rwo kuba mu Bwongereza  n’ugushobora kuronka akazi. Mu gihe ivyo bidasa no kurondera umukozi vyeruye -NES ivuga ko atavyo yakoze, kuko idasanzwe ari ikigo kirondera abakozi kandi,  uko biri, ivugana n’abaganga bava mu bihugu vyo hanze, baba basanzwe bariko barangurira umwuga mu Bwongereza. Ariko igisata c’amagara y’abantu no kwitaho imibereho y’abantu batubwiye ko igitabo cabo c’ingingo ngenderwako gikora no kuri NES, ko rero ico kigo caciye kubiri naco. Twavuganye n’abaganga benshi b’abanya-Afrika barondewe muri iyi nzira  na NES.  Bose bari bafise inkuru zisa ku bijanye n’ico amasezerano yabo y’akazi avuga mu vy’ukuri, iyo bamaze kurungikwa gukorera mu bitaro vy’abigenga mu Bwongereza. .  Muganga Femi Johnson yarungitswe mu bindi bitaro bitari ivyo Augustine yarungitswemwo, ariko nawe nyene avuga ko yategerezwa gukora amasaha ari hagati ya 14 na 16 ku munsi kandi agaca arara izamu. Avuga ati: “Narananirwa cane. Narakenera kuryama. Nta muntu ashobora gukora gutyo iminsi yose indwi yose.” Ariko, akeneye kuruhuka kuko yaba yarushe cane ku buryo adashobora kubandanya akora, NES yari ifise uburenganzira bwo kumukata amafaranga ku mushara wiwe. Iyo kompanyi ivuga ko ayo mafaranga ari ayo kurondera umuganga amusubirira, ariko Femi avuga ko bituma abaganga ba NES babura ayo bacira n’ayo bamira. “Mu bihe nk’ivyo, nama nca nivugana imbere muri jewe – ‘Femi ubwo uriko urigirira neza wewe ubwawe kandi uriko uragirira neza umuryayi?’ “Aho bibabarije, n’uko bitama binshobokera kuronka inyishu kuri ico kibazo.” Bamwe mu baganga ba NES bararonse ubufasha bwa Muganga Jenny Vaughan wo mw’ishirahamwe Doctors’ Association. Aronka imyidogo myinshi y’aba RMO kandi avuga ko urwego rwa reta rw’amagara y’abantu rufise ingingo ngenderwako zibiri zitandukanye -imwe y’abanga ba NHS, n’iyindi y’abavuye mu bindi bihugu bakorera ibigo vyigenga. Abaganga ba NHS bakoreshwa amasaha atarenga 48, canke naho babisavye, amasaha 72 ku ndwi. Dr Vaughan avuga ati: “Nta muganga wo muri NHS akoreshwa amajoro ane akurikirana kuko turazi vy’ukuri ko atari vyiza. “Ivyo  n’akazi kameze nk’ako abaja (abacakara) …amasaha y’umurengera, ibintu twagira ngo bimaze imyaka 30 bitakibaho. “Ntawovyemera ku mutekano w’abarwayi. Ntawovyemera ku baganga.” Ivyo twatoye twarabijanye muri BMA – no  ku cegera c’umukuru wayo, Emma Runswick. Yatubwiye ko ivyo bintu ari akamaramaza ku “buvuzi bw’Ubwongereza”. “Bagenzi bacu bavuye mu bindi bihugu baciye kure kugira bashike ngaha hanyuma basanga uburyo bakoreshwamwo atawokwibaza ko bwobayeho.” NES Healthcare yo yatubwiye ko “ingene  abaganga bavuga”  ku gukorana n’iyo kompanyi “ari vyiza cane”. Ivuga ko ifasha abaganga kuronka “inzira nziza yo kubandanya umwuga baba bahisemwo muri NHS  no mu gisata c’ubuvuzi mu Bwongereza muri rusangi, kandi ko igikorwa cabo ari “ngirakamaro cane ku bantu bo mu Bwongereza.”

headline: Ubuserukizi bwa US muri Tanzania bugabisha ko abandura Covid-19 bariko biyongera
text: Ibiro vy'ubuserukizi bwa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika muri Tanzania biragabisha ko ibitigiri vy'abandura ca kiza karanda ca coronavirus biriko biriyongera. Mw'itangazo ivyo biro vyacishije ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rwavyo, ivyo biro bivuga ko bifise amakuru yerekana ko ibitigiri vy'abandura iki kiza bigenda vyiyongera kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere uno mwaka. Bisaba ikigo kijejwe gucungera no gukinga indwara ca Amerika (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention) kubuza ingendo zose z'abashaka kuja muri Tanzania. Reta ya Tanzania yoyo ibandanya ivuga ko ata kiza ca coronavirus gihari, n'aho Prezida John Pombe Magufuli yavuze ko hari abanyagihugu bagiye mu mahanga kwiteza incanco bagaruka mu gihugu banduye ubundi bwoko bw'umugera. Reta y'iki gihugu yamirira kure incanco za Covid-19. Iri tangazo rigabisha ko "mu gihe reta ya Tanzania iheruka gutangaza ingene ibintu vyifashe ku bijanye na Covid-19 mu kwa kane 2020, nta ngingo ziboneka zo guhagarika ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera". Amerika igabisha ko umwanya n'umwanya ibitaro n'amavuriro muri ico gihugu bishobora kurengerwa. Mu gihe hasanzwe hariho ibigo bipima coronavirus muri Tanzania, Amerika igabisha ko hari igihe inyishu zitaboneka ku mwanya utegekanijwe, canke ntizinaboneke bikaba ngobwa ko abapimwe basabwa gusubira kwipimisha haciye imisi. Ubu buserukizi bugabisha ko hari ingenzi ziva muri Tanzania zipimwa, ibipimo bikerekana ko batanduye ariko bashitse iyo bagiye basubiye gupimwa bagasanga baranduye. Muri Tanzania, hari ibigo bitandukanye bigenda bifata ingingo zo gukinga ikwirakwira ry'uwu mugera binagabisha abantu bavyo kuri iki kiza. Ku wa kabiri w'iyi ndwi, kaminuza ya Sokoine yigisha ibijanye n'uburimyi (SUA) yasohoye itangazo aho igabisha abanyeshuri n'abakozi ko borikanura kugira birinde coronavirus. Eka na kaminuza Open University yarasohoye itangazo isaba abantu gufata ingingo zo kwirinda kwandura n'ukwanduzanya. Hagati aho, iri tangazo ryarafuswe n'ubushikiranganji bw'indero buvuga ko riteye kubiri n'ingingo ngenderwako zatanzwe n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu. Mu kwezi guheze, Ekleziya Katorika muri Tanzania yaragabishije abanyagihugu ibasaba gufata ingingo zo kwirinda ubundi bwoko bwa corona buvugwa mu bihugu bimwe bimwe vya Afrika. Hagati aho, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu muri ico gihugu ntibumenyesha nimba hari abanduye ubu bundi bwoko bwa coronavirus canke nimba hari imaze guhitana. Haraciye imisi ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu butangaje ko ata Covid-19 iri muri Tanzania, kandi ko ata ncanco ikeneye, ahubwo buhimiriza abanyagihugu gukoresha imiti kama.

headline: Luis Suarez: 'Barcelona yaramfashe nabi gushika aho ndira imbere y'uko nja muri Atletico Madrid'
text: Luis Suarez avuga ko yarize kubera ingene Barcelona yamufashe nabi imbere y'uko ayivamwo akaja muri Atletico Madrid. Uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 33 akomoka muri Uruguay yarangije ikiringo ciwe c'imyaka itandatu yari amaze muri Barça mu kw'icenda akavuga ko yankiwe kuja mu myimenyerezo n'umurwi mukuru imbere y'uko agenda. Ati: "Iyi minsi yambereye mibi cane. Nararize kubera ivyo nariko ndakorerwa". "Imbere ya vyose nababajwe n'ingene ibintu vyariko birakorwa, kuko umuntu ategerezwa kuvyemera igihe ciwe kirangiye". Suarez yinjiye muri Barcelonamu 2014 avuye muri Liverpool ku giciro c'imiliyoni zirenga 96 z'amadorari akaba yabaye igihangange kigira gatatu ca Espagne yatsinze ibitsindo vyinshi. Yashoboye gutsinda ibitsindo 198, atsindira ihiganwa La Liga incuro zine, atwara n'ibikombe bine vyo mu gihugu hamwe kandi n'igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya (Champions League) mu 2015. Mu mwaka w'inkino wa 2019-2020, yinjije ibitsindo 21, bikaba ari vyo bitsindo bike yinjije mu mwaka wose mu myaka itandatu yose yari amaze muri Barça. Mu gihe atari yitavye inkizo za kivandimwe za Barcelona, ayivuyemwo yari asigaje umwaka umwe ngo amasezerano afitaniye nayo arangire. Atletico yatanze imiliyoni zitarenga zitandatu z'ama euro mu kugura suarez. Amaze gutsinda ibitsindo bibiri mu nkino zitatu amaze gukinira Atletico. Avuga ati: "Sinigeze nizera ubutumwa bama bampa ngo bariko bararondera ingene botorera umuti ikibazo canje kugira ngo ibintu bigende neza". "Si bose bazi ivyabaye ariko ikibabaje gusumba vyose ni ukwitaba imyimenyerezo ariko ugashirwa ku ruhande kubera ntari nemerewe gukina mu nkino za kivandimwe zo kwitegurira ihiganwa". "Umugore wanje yarabona ingene nari mbabaye akipfuza gusubira kumbona ndiko ndamwenyura, rero igihe ndonkeye akaryo ko kuja muri Atletico, sinigeje nijijanya imitima". Lionel Messi, umusatirizi amaze gutsindira ibitsindo vyinshi Barcelona gusumba abandi bose yanditse ubutumwa ku mbuga hwaniro bwo guhoza suarez, avuga ati"yarirukanywe". Suarez ati: "Sinatangajwe n'ingene Messi yanshigikiye ku mugaragaro kuko nanje ndamuzi cane". "Arazi ingene nari mbabaye, nayo kwumva ko nagira nirukanwe nico cambabaje gusumba". "Uburyo babikoze ntibwari bwiza kandi Leo arazi ingene jewe n'umuryango wanje twababaye".

headline: US: B﻿iden arashima ivyavuye mu matora yo hagati muri manda
text: P﻿rezida wa Amerika yiruhukije inyuma y'aho aba demokrate baburije aba republika  kuronka amajwi menshi mu matora yo hagati muri manda. A﻿ba republika babura gato ngo biganze mu nama nshingamateka ariko Biden avuga ko "bataronse intebe nyinshi cane" nk'uko vyari vyitezwe, ku musi wa kabiri ku mugoroba. U﻿mwe muri iyo migambwe ushobora gutsindira kurongora inama nkenguzamateka, intsinzi ikaba ihagaze kubizova mu ntara zitatu aho amajwi gushika ubu yegeranye cane. Mu bisanzwe umugambwe uri ku butegetsi, ubu ukaba ari uw'aba demokrate, ukunze gutsindwa mu matora yo hagati mu kiringo ca mbere ca prezida. A﻿bajejwe imikenyuro mu mugambwe w'aba republika bari bizeye intsinzi itagabanije, bafatiye kw'iduga ry'ibiciro birengeje mu myaka 40 n'ingene abemera politike yiwe bari ku rugero rwo hasi. A﻿riko ibiharuro ngereranywa bivuga ko abitavye amatora boba bahoye aba republika utwigoro twabo two kubuza abantu gukorora imbanyi. A﻿vugira ku kirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu White House, ku musi wa gatatu ku mugoroba, Biden yavuze ko ivyavuye mu matora "vyatumye yiruhutsa". Y﻿avuze ati: "Nibaza ko wari umusi mwiza kuri demokrasi." Y﻿avuze ko icizere ciwe  cagaragaye, aca anebagura abamenyeshamakuru bari bagabishije ko abademokrates bazotsindwa bikomeye. K﻿ubera inguvu ahawe n'amajwi aronse muri iryo joro atari yiteze, Biden yavuze ko ategekanya gusubira kwitoza mu 2024. Biden agiye gukwiza imyaka 80 muri uku kwezi yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ati: "Intumbero yacu n'ugusubira kwitoza, ni yo ntego yacu." H﻿agati aho, aba republika bari begereje kuronka intebe 218 bari bakeneye kugira bakure mu minwe y'aba demokrate inama nshingamateka. M﻿u gihe aba republika botsinda mu nama (shingamateka na nkenguzamateka) iyo ari yo yose muri izo, bazoshobora kuburizamwo imigambi ya prezida. I﻿biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu kandi biriko biritegurira amatohoza y'inama nshingamateka ku butegetsi bwa Biden. B﻿iden yavuze ko yiteguye gukorana n'aba republika kandi ko ashobora gutunganya ibiganiro vy'impande zibiri mu ndwi iza. A﻿riko prezida kandi yavuze ko abanye Amerika bashobora gufata amatohoza yose yoba arongowe n'aba republika "nk'urukino rutwengeje". U﻿mugambwe wose uza gutahukana intsinzi mu ntara zibiri kuri zitatu zikomeye za Arizona, Georgie na Nevada, aca aramutswa inama nkenguzamateka.

headline: Agnes Wanjiru: Kenya isaba UK kuyirungikira umusirikare yagirizwa kwica umunyagihugu wayo
text: Kenya iriko irarondera ko umusirikare w'Ubwongereza yagirizwa kwica umugore wo muri Kenya, haraciye imyaka icenda, arungikwa muri iki gihugu kugira acirirwe urubanza. Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi wa Kenya Eugene Wamalwa yabwiye umurwi w'inama nshingamateka ko reta y'Ubwongereza yemeye gukorana na reta ya Kenya muri iyo ntumbero. Umushikiranganji Wamalwa avuga ko ikiziga ca Agnes Wanjiru, yari afise imyaka 21, catowe inyuma y'aho abasirikare b'Ubwongereza bariko bakora imyimenyerezo muri Kenya batahukiye. Intumwa za reta y'Ubwongereza ziri mu gihugu muri kino gihe aho ziri mu biganiro na bagenzi babo bo muri Kenya, ariko bakaba batashatse kuvugana na BBC. Ejo ku wa kabiri, umushikiranganji Wamalwa yabwiye abashingamateka ko yasomye icegeranyo c'amatohoza cemeza ko Wanjiru yishwe n'abasirikare b'Ubwongereza ku butaka bwa Kenya. Yongerako y'uko reta ya Kenya yavuganye na reta y'Ubwongereza inyuma y'itangazo ryasohowe n'umukuru w'igipolisi ku wa mbere aho yavuze ko urubanza rwasubiye gutangura. Umushikiranganji Wamalwa avuga kandi ko reta y'Ubwongereza yamwemereye ko abo bose bafise uruhara muri ubu bwicanyi, avuga ko bazwi, bazoshobora kurungikwa muri Kenya kugira ngo bashengezwe imbere y'ubutungane.

headline: Igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi: Neymar, De Ligt, Ronaldo, De Jong, Raphinha,  Sterling, Dembele
text: Mu masezerano yo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Juventus umunya-Hollande Matthijs de Ligt w'imyaka 22,  Chelsea iriteguye kwongerako umudagi wayo akina imbere  Timo Werner, w'imyaka 26 (Sky Sports) Manchester United ifise icizere cinshi ko izoruhira gutahukana umukinyi wa mbere irondera cane  Frenkie de Jong, ikaba yiteze kwumvikana na Barcelona ku masezerano y'imiriyoni 69 z'amapawundi kuri uno mukinyi wo hagati w'umunya-Hollande w'imyaka 295.  (Goal) Umusatirizi wa Manchester United na Portugal  Cristiano Ronaldo w'imyaka 37 yabaye ku rutonde rw’ibiganiro igihe nyen'umurwi wa  Chelsea Todd Boehly yavugana n'umuserukizi w'uyu mukinyi Jorge Mendes, mu ndwi iheze.  (The Athletic ) Roma iripfuza kugura Ronaldo ikamushira hamwe n'uwahoze ari umumenyereza wiwe muri Real Madrid, Jose Mourinho. (Retesport) Hagati aho, Manchester United ishobora kwisanga yinjiye mw'ideni ry'umuriyaridi w'amapawundi mu gihe yobandanya n'imigambi yayo yo gukomeza Old Trafford. (Mirror) Porto yiteze ko Liverpool yongereza akariro mu rugamba rwo kurondera umunya-Portugal akina ku ruhande Otavio w'imyaka 27, muri ino ndwi, inyuma y'aho yankiye imiriyoni 26 z'amapawundi yatanzwe na  Leeds United. (Mirror) Arsenal yiteze kwongereza akariro mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa  Leeds na Brezili  Raphinha w'imyaka 25, mu gihe uyu murwi w'i Londres uboneka ko uhabwa amahirwe yo gushika ku masezerano kuri uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 25.  (The Athletic) Juventus na Paris St-Germain zatanguye ibiganiro ku musatirizi wa Brezili Neymar w'imyaka 30, asanzwe kandi ariko araronderwa na  Chelsea. (AS) Umumenyereza wa Chelsea Thomas Tuchel yatanguye kuvugana n'umusatirizi wa  Manchester City umwongereza  Raheem Sterling w'imyaka 27, uyu murwi w'i Londres ukaba wipfuza uyu mukinyi. (Telegraph) Chelsea irarondera Sterling hamwe n'umufaransa akina ku ruhande Ousmane Dembele w'imyaka  25 muri  Barcelona, ubu akaba yidegemvya, mu gihe uyu murwi witeze gusohora imiriyoni zirenga 150 z'amapawundi mu kugura abakinyi muri rino ci. (Mail) Nottingham Forest iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano na  Liverpool ku mukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'i buryo umunya-Pays de Galles Neco Williams w'imyaka 21, ari ku giciro cimiriyoni 15 z'amapawundi, hamwe kandi na Morgan Gibbs-White w'imyaka 22, umwongereza akina hagati muri  Wolves, uyu mukinyi akaba ari ku giciro c'imiriyoni 20 z'amapawundi. (Sun) Everton na Tottenham irabandanya ibiganiro kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umukinyi wo hagati w'aba Spurs, umwongereza  Harry Winks w'imyaka 26. (Sky Sports) Umwongereza akina ku ruhande  Malcolm Ebiowei w'imyaka 18 yanse amahirwe yo kwinjira muri  Manchester United akaba yahisemwo kuja muri Crystal Palace inyuma y'aho amasezerano yari afitaniye na  Derby arangiriye. (Sun) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Middlesbrough Djed Spence yasavye ko ava muri uno murwi n'aho ata masezerano na  Tottenham arashikwako  kuri uno mukinyi w'inyuma w'umwongereza w'imyaka 21.  (Football.London) Leeds United iriko irategura imiriyoni 26 z'amapawundi yo guha Club Bruges kugira irabe ko uyu murwi wo mu Bubirigi woyiha umubirigi Charles de Ketelaere w'imyaka  21. (Mail) Bayern Munich iriko iranka akamo iterwa n'umurwi Barcelona uyibwira ko wipfuza umusatirizi wa umunya Pologne  Robert Lewandowski w'imyaka 33, mu ntumbero yo gushaka kumugumana. (Sport) Umunya-Colombia James Rodriguez w'imyaka 30 yahoze akina hagati muri  Everton aripfuza gusubira gukina i Bulaya igihe azoba avuye muri Al-Rayyan yo muri Qatar. (Fabrizio Romano) Umukinyi w'inyuma  Samuel Umtiti w'imyaka  28 agiye gusezera muri Barcelona muri rino ci, Girona n'iyindi mirwi yo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano Serie A ikaba yipfuza uyu mufaransa.  (Ekrem Konur) Umusatirizi Marco Asensio w'imyaka 26 be n'umukinyi wo hagati Dani Ceballos w'imyaka 25, bompi bavugwa ko bashobora kuva muri Real Madrid muri rino ci.   (Marca )

headline: Thomas Tuchel: Chelsea yagenye uyu yahoze amenyereza PSG inyuma yo kwirukana Frank Lampard
text: Chelsea yagenye uwahoze ari umumenyereza wa Paris St-Germain boss, Thomas Tuchel, nk'umumenyereza mushasha mu masezerano azomara amezi 18 ariko ashobora kwongerezwa. Igiye yameyereza PSG, Tuchel yatsindiye ihiganwa ry'Ubufaransa incuro zibiri, igikombe c'Ubufaransa (Coupe de France) hamwe n'igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bufaransa (Coupe de la Ligue). Tuchel avuga ati: "Mfise igishika cinshi co kubonana n'umurwi wanje mushasha ngahiganwa muri rino higanwa rya mbere mu mupira w'amaguru. Ndishmiye kuba ndi mu muryango wa Chelsea". Chelsea yirukanye Frank Lampard ku wa mbere inyuma y'amezi 18 yari amaze amyimenyereza, yari amaze gutsinda urukino rumwe gusa mu nkino zitanu za nyuma z'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza, Premier League. Tuchel yongerako ati: "Twese turubaha cane igikorwa cakozwe na Frank Lampard n'iragi asize muri Chelsea". Uyu mudagi w'imyaka 47 abaye umumenyereza wa Chelsea agize 11 agenywe na nyene umurwi  Roman Abramovich kuva aho uyu mutunzi ruhebwa awuguriye mu 2003. Umukuru wa Chelsea Marina Granovskaia avuga ko Tuchel ari "umwe mu bamenyereza bakomeye ba Buraya" kandi ko "hakiri vyinshi vyo gukinira na vyinshi vyo gushikako, uno mwaka n'inyuma yaho". Tuchel aza kuba ari muri Stamford Bridge uno musi ku wa gatatu igihe uyu murwi uza kuba uriko urakina na Wloves mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza, Premier League. Tuchel ntashobora gukwepa amategeko ajanye n'itaramurwa rya coronavirus, ariko ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza rizomuha akaryo ko kwitabira inkino n'imyimyenyerezo mu gihe yopimwa agasanga ntiyanduye imbere y'ukwinjira neza na neza muri Premier League. Ku wa Mungu, niho uyu yahoze ari umukinyi wo hagati wa Chelsea Lampard yakinisha urukino rwa nyuma, aho uyu murwi wirahiye Luton 3-1 mu gice ca kane ca rya higanwa ry'igikombe ca FA. Yari yagenywe ngo amenyereze uyu murwi mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu asubiriye Maurizio Sarri i Stamford Bridge mu kw'indwi 2019, akaba yarashoboye gushikana Chelsea mu kibanza ca kane mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza be no mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa FA mu mwaka wiwe wa mbere amenyereza uyu murwi. Mu rukino rwayihuje na Leeds igatsinda 3-1 mu ntango z'ukwa cumi na kabiri, rwatumye ija mu kibanza ca mbere muri Premier League igihe gito, ariko inkino zitanu zose yatakaje ku munani zanyuma zatumye uyu murwi wisanga mu kibanza c'icumi muri uno mwanya. Tuchel agiye kumenyereza Chelsea haciye hafi amezi atanu ashikanye ubwa mbere Paris St-Germain mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo, Champions League. Imbere y'aho yaramenyereje Mainz na Borussia Dortmund yose iri mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubudagi, akaba agiye i Londres azwi ko afise ubuhinga bukomeye. Azwi ko yashikanye imirwi yamenyereje aho itari bwigere ishika. Mw'ihiganwa ry'ubudagi Bundesliga, Tuchel yashoboye kumenyereza Mainz, umurwi wari uherutse kuduzwa mu cicaro ca mbere, ukarangiza uri mu kibanza c'icenda, hari mu mwaka w'igihganwa wa 2009-10. Mu 2016-17, yatsindiye igikombe c'Ubudagi igihe yamenyereza Borussia Dortmund, maze arateza imbere abakinyi Christian Pulisic, Ousmane Dembele na Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang. PSG watsinzwe na Bayern Munich 1-0 mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Champions League mu kwezi kw'umunani umwaka uheze, akaba yirukanywe mu mpera z'ukwa cumi na kabiri uyu murwi utsinzwe mu nkino zine zose, ivyatumye wisanga mu kibanza ca gatatu. Igikorwa ca mbere muri uno murwi mushasha, ni ugushikana Chelsea muri zine za mbere muri Premier League, ikaba ibura amanota atandatu kugira ngo ishobore gushika muri kino kibanza coyituma ija muri Champions League mu mwaka w'inkino uza.

headline: Maradona: Igipolisi ca Argentine mu matohoza ku muganga wiwe ku ruhara mu urupfu rwiwe
text: Abashikirizamanza bo muri Argentine bariko baragira amatohoza ku muganga wa Diego Maradona, bamukekako urupfu rwiwe inyuma y'aho uwo mukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru rurangiranwa yitabiye Imana haraheze imisi itanu. Igipolisi co mu gisagara ca Buenos Aires basatse inzu n'ibitaro vy'uwo muganga - Leopoldo Luque, bagerageza kurondera ko hoba harabayemwo ugusamara mu kuvura Maradona,  inyuma y'aho abagiwe. Muganga Luque nta co aragirizwa. Arahakana kugira icaha na kimwe. Mu ntango z'ukwezi kwa cumi na rimwe, Maradona yarabazwe umutsi wo mu bwonko bivanye n'amaraso yari yavuze, kandi vyari vyagenze neza. Akaba yariko arafata imiti bivanye n'inzoga nyinshi yanywa. Umukobwa wiwe yagumye asaba kuronka izindi nsiguro zerekeye uko se wiwe yariko aravurwa. Mbe amatohoza yerekeye iki muvyo ukuri? Abapolisi bashika 30 basatse inzu ya muganga Luque kuri uyu w'Imana mu gitondo - abandi 20 bakaba bariko barasaka ku bitaro vyiwe biri mu gisagara ca Buenos Aires. Iryo sakwa ryasabwe n'abashikirizamanza bashaka kugerageza kumenya neza uko ubuzima bwa Maradona bwari bwifashe muhira iwe mu minsi yanyuma. Abapolisi  bavuga ko batwaye inyabwonko, amatelefone ngendanwa hamwe n'impapuro yavuriweko. Bakeka ko uwo mukinyi rurangiranwa w'umupira w'amagru yarekuriwe gutaha muhira iwe hadakurikijwe ibisabwa kugira ave mu bitaro, harimwo guhabwa uwumurwaza n'umuforoma wo kumukurikirana amasaha 24 kuri 24, guhabwa umuganga ashobora ku muhamagara igihe cose, hamwe n'imodoka itwara abarwaye irimwo ibikoresho bimufasha guhema. Abapolisi bashaka kumenya ico muganga Luque yakoze mu ntumbero yo kuvura Maradona igihe yari arwariye muhira iwe. Dr Luque yiregura avuga ngwiki? Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru caranzwemwo umubabaro mwinshi kuri uyu w'Imana, muganga Luque - vyavuzwe ko ari muganga wa Maradona ku giti ciwe - yarize, avuga ko yakoze ivyo ashobora vyose mu ntumbero yo gukiza amagara yiwe. Yavuze ko Maradona yari yuzuye agahinda mu misi yiwe ya nyuma. Hageze igihe arakankamira abamenyeshamakuru ati: "Mushaka kumenya ico nari nshinzwe? Kumukunda, kumuvura, kwongereza igihe c'ubuzima bwiwe no kubufata neza gushika kw'iherezo". Muganga avuga ko yakoze "ibishoboka vyose gushika igihe ata co yari agishoboye." Avuga ku bintu abapolisi bashaka kugirako amatohoza, muganga Luque yasiguye akazi yari ashinzwe. Avuga ivyerekeye ibagwa rya Maradona mu kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe, yagize ati: "Umbajije jewe, jewe nari umuganga wo kubaga ubwonko, kandi akazi kanje kararangiye. Ivyiwe nari nabirangije." Yongeyeko ko ivyo kurekura Maradona ngo atahe muhira iwe bitari mu kazi kiwe namba. Muganga Luque yavuze ko "Maradona yategerezwa kujanwa mu kigo kimufasha guhindura inyifato.  Ntiyashatse kubikora". Yongera ko y'uko yari umuntu agoye. Yavuze ko atazi igituma atahawe imodoka itwara abagwayi ifise ibikoresho, canke umuntu yatumye adatwarwa muri iyo modoka gushika ku muhana iwe. Yongeyeko ko: Diego " yari umuntu afise agahinda, akaba yashaka kuba ahantu hawenyene, kandi ko atari uko atakunda abakobwa biwe, umuryango wiwe canke abandi bamwegereye".

headline: OMS: urukingo rwa malaria Mosquirix (RTS,S/AS01) rwemejwe gukoreshwa muri Africa
text: Ishirahamawe rijejwe amagara kw'isi OMS ryemeje ikoreshwa muri Afrika ry'urukingo rw'indwara ya malaria ruzwi nka RTS,S/AS01 canke Mosquirix. Malaria ni indwara yica iterwa n'umubu, ikagaragara cane mu bice bishushe vyo kw'isi harimwo na Afrika . Ibi vyemejwe na OMS ni intambwe igiye mu mateka mu bijanye n'amagara y'abantu kw'isi. Vyibazwa yuko kuri ubu abantu barenga imiriyoni amajana abiri kw'isi bandura malariya buri mwaka, ikica ibihumbi amajana, benshi muri bo bakaba ari abana bo muri Afrika. Nta rukingo rukora neza kandi rwemewe rwa malaria rwari bwaboneke, gushika uno munsi. Mosquirix rwahawe uruhusha rwo gukoreshwa mu nama yahurije hamwe imigwi mpanuzwajambo ya OMS mu bijanye na malaria hamwe no gucandaga. Iyi ngingo yakurikiye igerageza ryagenze neza muri Malawi, Ghana hamwe na Kenya. Uru rukingo rutangwa mu mice ibiri, rugabanya malaria mu bana, kwinjizwa ibitaro hamwe no gukenera kwongerwa amaraso. Vyinshi kuri iyi nkuru muzobikurikirana mu makuru yacu ari imbere...

headline: Uganda - ICC: Umukomanda wa LRA Dominic Ongwen yaciriwe umunyororo w'imyaka 25
text: Sentare Mpuzamakungu Mpanavyaha, CPI/ICC, yaciriye umunyororo w'imyaka 25 uwahoze ari umusirikare w'umwana yahavuye aba intwazangabo mu nyeshamba z'umuhari Lord Resistance Army (LRA) urwanya ubutegetsi bwa Uganda. Mu kwa kabiri uno mwaka, Dominic Ongwen, azwi ku ritazirano rya 'White Ant', yaragiriwe n'ivyaha birenga 80 harimwo ubwicanyi, iyicarubozo, gufata ku nguvu n'ibindi... Abashingwamanza bavuga ko Ongwen yaciriwe umunyororo w'igihe gito kubera yanyurujwe na LRA ari umwana. Haraciye imyaka irenga 30 uyu muhari ushinzwe, ukaba ukorera muri Uganda no mu bihugu bihana imbibe nayo. LRA yarahimbagura abantu mu kubaca ibihimba vyabo vyo mu maso. Umucamanza Bertram Schmitt yari arongoye intahe avuga ko iyi ngingo yashitweko habanje kuba impari. Umwe mu bacamanza, Raul Cano Pangalangan, yari yamusabiye imyaka 30, avuga ko kahise ka Ongwen kadategerezwa kwibagiza amahano y'abakozweko n'amabi yabakoreye. Umucamanza Schmitt avuga ko vyabaye ngombwa ko haba amatora, gutyo uruhande rushigikiye ko ahanishwa imyaka 25 ruba ari rwo rutsinda. Umushingamwanza wa Uganda Sarah Kihika Kasande avuga ko urubanza rwaciriwe Dominic Ongwen ari ubutumwa ko abagirizwa ivyaha bategerezwa kuzobibazwa.
