Umupfasoni Kasande yabwiye televiziyo NBS yo muri Uganda ko hagisigaye vyinshi vyo gukorwa kugira ngo abakozweko n'ivyaha vyo mu ntambara mu buraruko bwa Uganda batunganirizwe. Yavuze yuko n'abandi bagizi ba nabi bategerezwa kubazwa amabi bakoze haba mu gihugu canke ku rwego mpuzamakungu kubera Ongwen ntiyakoze ibi vyaha wenyene.

headline: Coronavirus: New York ifise ibitigiri bibini vy’abanduye gusumba ibihugu vyose kw’isi
text: Intara ya New York muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika muri kino gihe ifise ibitigiri binini vy'abanduye coronavirus gusumba ibihugu vyose kw'isi uretse ico gihugu. Iyo ntara yamenyesheje ko abamaze kwandura Covid-19 gushika ejo ku wa kane bageze kuri 159.937. Iyo ntara ikaba isumbije ibihugu vyari bizwi ko ari vyo bifise abanduye benshi nka Espanye (153,000 ) hamwe n'Ubutaliyano (143,000). U Bushinwa, aho uwo mugera watanguriye mu mpera z'umwaka uheze, bufise igitigiri ca 82.000 c'abantu bose hamwe banduye. Amerika imaze kugera kuri 462.000 banduye uwo mugera hamwe n'abashika hafi 16.500 bahitanywe nawo. Kw'isi yose, abashika umuliyoni 1.6 nibo bamaze kwandura, nayo 95.000 bakaba bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima. N'aho New York ariyo ifise igitigiri kinini c'abanduye coronavirus kw'isi, ico abamaze guhitanwa n'uwo mugera (7000) kiri hasi y'ica Espanye (15.500) n'ico Ubutaliyano (18.000), n'aho gisumba incuro zirenga zibiri ico abahitanywe nawo mu Bushinwa. Hari amasanamu yerekanywe y'abakozi bambaye imyambaro yo kwikingira impanuka bariko barahamba abapfuye mu kinogo kimwe mu gisagara ca New York. Amasanamu yafashwe na za ndege zitagira umudereva, drones, yerekana abakozi bariko bamanuka mu kinogo kirekire bakoresheje ingazi,  aho amasandugu y'ibiziga yariko arashingurwa. Ayo masanamu yafatiwe mu karere kitwa Hart Island, kigeze gukoreshwa n'abategetsi b'ico gisagara imyaka 150 iheze mu guhamba abapfuye batagira ab'iwabo, canke abo mu miryango itari ishoboye kwihambira abayo. Ibikorwa vyo guhamba kuri iryo tongo ry'abapfuye vyariyongereye kubera ico kiza, biva ku munsi umwe mu ndwi bishika ku minsi itanu mu ndwi, nk'uko bimenyeshwa n'igisata kijejwe amabohero. Abapfungwa bo mw'ibohero rya Rikers Island nibo mu bisanzwe bakora ico gikorwa, ariko kubera barengewe, vyabaye ngombwa ko barondera abandi bakozi babikora. Umukuru w'igisagara ca New York, Bill de Blasio yavuze mu ntango z'iyi ndwi ko iryo tongo ry'abapfuye rishobora kwikorwako mu guhamba abahitanywe na kino kiza. Igitigiri c'abahitanwa na coronavirus i New York cariyongereye gushika kuri 799 ku wa gatatu, igitigiri kinini kitari bwahebo ku munsi ugira gatatu. Ariko buramatari w'intara ya NewYork, Andrew Cuomo, yagize icizere kinini inyuma y'aho  igitigiri c'abinjijwe ibitaro kubera covid-19 mu mavuriro ya New York cagabanutse ku ncuro igira kabiri, gushika kuri 200. Avuga ko ivyo vyerekana ko ingingo yo kwirinda kwegerana yazanye akarusho. Avuga ko iki kiza ari "ikibombe kiriko kirakwiragira mu bantu kidacagura, ikibi gisa n'ico twabonye ku wa 11 z'ukw'icenda 2000". Icizere cabonetse kandi ejo ku wa kane aho ibitigiri vyari vyitezwe kurwego rw'igihugu vyagabanutse. Dr Anthony Fauci, umwe mu bategetsi bakomeye bagize umurwi wo kurwanya coronavirus washinzwe n'ibiro vy'umukuru w'iguhugu wa Amerika. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru NBC co muri Amerika ko ibiharuro vyerekana ko Abanyamerika bashobora kuzohitanwa na Covid-19 "bashobora kuba muri 60.000". Mu mpera z'ukwa gatatu, uyo Dr. Fauci yari yavuze ko "abari hagati ya 100.000 na 200.000" aribo baboneka ko bashobora guhitanwa n'uwo mugera. Ico gitigiri ca 60.000 gishobora kungana n'ic'abahitanywe n'indwara y'ibicurane hagati y'ukw'icumi 2019 n'ukwa gatatu 2020 muri Amerika, nk'uko ibiharuro bitangwa n'ubutegetsi bivyerekana. Hagati aho, icegera c'umukuru w'ico gihugu Mike Pence ashimangira ko covid-19 yandukira gusumba indwara y'ibicurane hafi incuro zitatu. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vyarerekanye ubwoba ko abashika imiliyoni 2.2 z'Abanyamerika bashobora guhitanwa na coronavirus mu gihe atacokorwa ngo uwo mugera uhagarare.

headline: Ebola yongeye kwaduka muri DR Congo
text: Indwara ya Ebola yasubiye kwaduka mu ntara ya Kivu muri Repuburilka ya Demokrasi ya Congo (RDC/DRC) nk’uko vyaraye bitangajwe na reta y’ico gihugu. Vyemejwe kandi n’ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw’isi OMS/WHO. Mw’itangazo, OMS ivuga ko  ugutangaza ko iyo ndwara yasubiye kwaduka vyabaye inyuma yo kwemeza ko hari umuntu yishwe n’iyo ndwara muri Nord Kivu, intara yo mu buseruko bwa Congo ihana urubibe n’Urwanda na Uganda. OMS ivuga ko umugore w’imyaka 46 yapfuye itariki 15 ukwezi kw’umunani i Beni, igisagara co muri Nord Kivu. Yabanje kuvurirwa ku bitaro vya Beni, mu ntango ku zindi ndwara, ariko mu nyuma aza kugaragaza ibimenyetso biranga umugera w’indwara ya Ebola. Amashami y’ikigo c’igihugu c’ubushakashatsi ku buvuzi (INRB) i Beni na Goma, yompi yaremeje ko hatowe ibimenyetso vya Ebola mu bipimo vyafashwe kuri uwo murwayi. OMS ivuga ko ivyigwa vyerekanye ko uwo murwayi yafashwe na Ebola ifitaniye isano n’iyari yaradutse mu 2018-2020 mu ntara za  Nord Kivu na Ituri - gushika ubu ariyo yamaze  umwanya munini ikanafata ahantu hanini kurusha izindi. Ariko OMS yizeye ko vuba iyo ndwara izohagarikwa itararandagata cane. Umukuru wa OMS ku mugabane wa Afrika, Dr Matshidiso Moeti, avuga ati: “Ebola yaduka isigaye yaduka yisubiriza kenshi muri Repuburika ya Demokrasi ya Congo, ivyo bikaba biteye impungenge. "Ariko, abajejwe amagara y’abantu muri Nord Kivu baramaze guhagarika akatari gake kandi vuba ivyaduka vya Ebola, bafatiye aho rero nta nkeka ko n’iki c'ubu bazogihagarika”. OMS ivuga ko abakozi bayo bakoranye n’abategetsi ba Congo bariko barakurikirana amagara y’abantu 160 bafise aho bahuriye n’uwo yapfuye mu ntumbero yo kubuza ko iyo ndwara irandagata. Iryo shami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y’abantu rimenyesha ko mu gihugu hasanzwe hari incanco za Ebola 1.000, amajana abiri muri izo zikaba zigiye kurungikwa muri Beni muri iyi ndwi kugira zihabwe abahuye n’uwo yapfuye canke abahuye na bo. Indwara ya Ebola yaheruka kwaduka aho i Beni muri Nord Kivu  mu 2021 aho yamaze emezi abiri ikarangira itariki 16 z’ukwezi kwa cumi na kabiri. Ico gihe hafashwe abantu 11 (harimwo munani bemejwe na 3 biketswe), batandatu muri bo bakaba barapfuye.

headline: Yamato: Ibanga ry'abavuzi b'ingoma bo mu Buyapani
text: Yamato: Ibanga ry'abavuzi b'ingoma bo mu Buyapani, babayeho ku buryo budasanzwe

headline: Tokyo 2020: CNO- Burundi ivuga ko Francine Niyonsaba adafashwa kuko hari ivyo atakwije
text: Umunonotsi w'umurundi Francine Niyonsaba aridoga ko komite olempique y'Uburundi (CNO) idafasha abanonotsi kwitegura mu gihe hasigaye indwi zibiri ngo inkino olempique ya Tokyo zitangure. Mu butumwa yashize kuri Facebook, Niyonsaba avuga ati: "Mugabo ntibizontangaza kubona abaherekeza abanonotsi baba benshi kurusha abitanze kugira baserukire igihugu, none bazoba batugiye inyuma gukora iki?" Salvator Bigirimana umunyamabanga mukuru wa CNO wewe avuga ko Niyonsaba adafashwa kubera hari ivyo atujuje imfashanyo yahabwa igahagarikwa, ko abandi bari kwitegura bobo babafasha. Niyonsaba, umurundi wa kabiri mu mateka wahaye igihugu ciwe ikidari olempike mu gusiganwa ku maguru mu bagore, ntiyavuze birambuye ingene we ubwiwe canke abandi banonotsi badafashwa. Bigirimana avuga ko imbere y'amahiganwa olempike hariho imfashanyo abanonotsi baronka ku kwezi ku kwezi mu mezi 18 CNO ikayibaronsa ivuye muri Comité International Olympique, (CIO). Ariko ko iyo mfashanyo idahabwa abagiye mu mahiganwa olempike yabanje canke abamaze kubona minima zo kujayo. Ati: "Ni abandi baba bagikeneye kuja mu mahiganwa kugira ngo barabe ko nabo boshika kuri urwo rwego." Abanonotsi baronswa iyo mfashanyo Bigirimana avuga ko bategerezwa kugenda bakora ivyo basabwa bagatanga na raporo zavyo. Ati: "Mugabo ku rwego rwa Africa naho hari abaronka imfashanyo, kandi na Francine yarimwo, hanyuma kubera atakoze ibisabwa ngo aze aratanga raporo, ngo agende mu mahiganwa basaba, iyo mfashanyo yiwe barayihagaritse, no muri federation yiwe barabizi." Haraheze hafi amezi abiri Francine Niyonsaba abonye minima zo kuja mu nkino olempike. Bigirimana ati "azoheza aronke mubandi ivyo baba bateguye." Bigiramana avuga ko igitigiri c'abaherekeza abanonotsi mu nkino olempike atari igihugu kigishirako. Ati: "Hariho 'logiciel' ushiramwo abanonotsi bari qualifié igaca iguha igitigiri c'ababaherekeza, abo rero kandi si abo muri CNO ni abo muri federation y'iwabo. "Hari umunonotsi yoshika ku rwego urwo arirwo rwose atagira umumenyereza? Atagira president wa federation? Umuntu siwe yigira, umunonotsi agirwa n'urwego arimwo akagirwa n'umumenyereza, n'ubushobozi bwiwe." Francine Niyonsaba agaragaza ko ariko yitegurira izi nkino:

headline: Ethiopia: Umusigiti wa mbere muri Africa, al-Nejashi, wasambuye n'ibibombe muri Tigray
text: Reta ya Ethiopia yemeye ko igiye gusanura umusigiti wa kera cane wasambuwe mu kwezi guheze mu ntambara ya Tigray mu buraruko bw'ico gihugu. Umusigiti wa al-Nejashi uvugwa ko watewe ibibombe, ivyari muri wo biranyagwa, eka mbere n'imva z'abategetsi b'idini rya Isilamu bo muri kahise zirononekara. Reta ivuga ko n'urusengero rwasambuwe muri ico gihe c'intambara na rwo nyene ruzosanurwa. Abanyagihugu baba muri ako karere bazi ko umugisiti wa al-Nejashi wubatswe n'Aba-Isilamu ba mbere bimukiye muri Afrika mu gihe c'Intumwa Muhammad. Bari bahunze amabi bariko barakorerwa i Makka baca bahabwa ubuhungiro mu cahoze ari ubwami bwa Aksum. Aba-Isilamu bo muri ako karere bazi ko abasangirangendo 15 b'Intumwa Muhammad bahambwe muri izova zasambuwe . Bazi kandi  ko uwo musigiti ari wo wa mbere watanguye kwubakwa muri Afrika, n'aho hari abandi bavuga ko uwa mbere wubatswe muri Afrika uri muri Misiri. Uwo musigiti uri mu gisagara ca Wukro kiri ku birometero hafi 800 uvuye ku mugwa mukuru wa Ethiopia, Addis Ababa. Urusengero Emanueli Mweranda (Saint Emmanuel) rw'Abakristu b'idini rya Orthodoxe na rwo nyene rwarasambuwe ariko nta nsiguro zatanzwe. Mu mwaka wa 2015 hari ishirahamwe ryo muri Turukiya ryatanguje ibikorwa vyo gusanura uwo musigiti, rivuga ko ryashaka "kubungabunga uwo mutungo wo muri kahise", rigahindura ako karere kugira ngo gashobore kwirukirwa n'ingenzi. Uwu musigiti hamwe n'urusengero rwari hafi yawo vyasambuye mu bitero vya gisirikare vyamaze ukwezi kumwe  bifise intumbero yo kwomora ubutegetsi bw'umugambwe Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) wari urongoye akarere ka Tigray. Ishirahamwe ryigenga ry'Ububirigi rikorera muri Afrika rivuga ko ku wa 18 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri uwo musigiti wa al-Nejashi "wabanje guterwa ibombe mu nyuma unyagwa urukombamazi n'abasirikare ba Ethiopia na Eritrea". Iryo shirahamwe rivuga kandi ko ibinyamakuru vya Tigray vyatangaje ko abantu batari bake bishwe bariko bagerageza gukingira uwo musigiti. Reta ntaco irashikiriza kuri ivyo vyegeranyo vy'iryo shirahamwe. Ariko, reta za Ethiopia na Eritrea zompi zirahakana ko hari abasirikare ba  Eritrea bari muri Tigray gufasha mu ntambara yo kurwanya TPLF. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC igisata ca Amharic, icegera c'umukuru w'igisata kijejwe gukingira umurage wo muri kahise, Abebaw Ayalew, yavuze ko ko komite idasanzwe izoshikanwa muri ako karere kugira ngo yige ingene uwo musigiti n'urwo rusengero vyasambuwe imbere y'uko ibikorwa vyo gusanura bitangura. Ati: "Ubu burere ntibuzwi gusa ku bijanye n'ugusenga, ariko kandi ni umutungo wo muri kahise kuri Ethiopia yose". Mu ntango z'ukw'icumi na rimwe, intambara yaradutse mu karere ka Tigray igihe umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia, Abiy Ahmed, yagomora ingabo mu ntumbero yo gutuza abarwanyi ba TPLF. Hari haciye amezi atari make hari ukutumvikana hagati ya reta ya Abiy n'abategetsi ba TPLF, umugambwe wari urongoye Tigray.

headline: Cyril Ramaphosa wa Afrika y’Epfo ashobora kubogozwa ku busuma bwabereye mw’itongo ryiwe
text: N﻿a  Elsa Maishman B﻿BC News Umukuru wa Afrika y’Epfo Cyril Ramaphosa ashobora kubogozwa bitewe n’ikibazo c’ubusuma bwabereye mw’itongo ryiwe, rizwi nka Farmgate. Ramaphosa yagirizwa kunyegeza ubusuma bw’imiriyoni zine z'amadorari y'abanyamerika bwabereye mw’itongo ryiwe mu 2020, harimwo kunyuruza no guha ibiturire abasuma nk’igipfukamunwa. Icegeranyo c'umurwi wigenga cagiye ahabona ariko cari kikiri mw'ibanga gisanga Ramaphosa yakoresheje ububasha afise kandi ko ashobora no kuba yarahonyanze itegeko rirwanya igiturire. Arahakana ivyo yagirizwa, akavuga ko ayo mafaranga yavuye mw’igurishwa ry’imbogo. Ivyo uyu murwi washitseko mu matohoza yawo vyashikirijwe inama nshingamateka kugira ngo ivyihweze hanyuma ifate ingingo nimba bikwiriye canke bidakwiriye ko mu ndwi iza batangura igikorwa co kumubogoza. Haracasigaye ikiringo kiri musi y’ukwezi kugira ngo habe inama izofata ingingo nimba Ramaphosa yokwitoreza ikiringo kigira kabiri mu mugambwe wiwe, uzwi nka African National Congress (ANC), mu 2024. Ibi bishobora kugira ingaruka mbi kuri uno mugambi wiwe. ANC itegura inama y’abagize ibiro nshingwabikorwa vyawo kuri uyu wa kane, aho vyitezwe ko iki kibazo kiza kwigwa. Ikibazo ca Farmgate cagiye ahabona mu kwa gatandatu, aho uwahoze arongoye igisata ca Afrika y’Epfo kijejwe igendereza, Arthur Fraser, yitwaye ku gipolisi yagiriza umukuru w’igihugu ko yahishije ubusuma bw’imiriyoni zine z’amadorari mw’itongo ryiwe rya Phala Phala mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bw’igihugu mu 2020. Fraser, umugenzi pfa-mpfe wa Jacob zuma yahoze arongoye iki gihugu, avuga ko aya mahera ashobora kuba yavuye mu busuma no mu biturire, akagiriza umukuru w’igihugu kunyuruza no guha igiturire abasuma. Kubika amafaranga menshi nk’aya mu madorari bishobora guhonyanga amategeko agenga igenzura ry’ingene amafaranga mvamakungu avunjwa. Ramaphosa aremeza ubu busuma, ariko ko amafaranga yibwe ari make cane ugenereranije n’aya avugwa, agahakana kandi ko atagerageje kubihisha. Avuga ko amadorari 580.000 - yari yishuwe ku mbogo - yibwe aho yari abitswe musi y'imisego y’intebe mu nzu iri muri iryo tongo. Nk’uko bivugwa n’itororokanirizo ry’amakuru AFP, Ramaphosa yandikiye uwo murwi ati: "Ntabwo nakoze uruhigi ku bakoze ubu busuma, nk’uko bivugwa, kandi nta mabwirizwa natanze kugira ngo ibi bibe”. Uyu murwi wanzuye ko habaye ibibazo vyinshi bitishuwe, ukavuga ko ari “ikibazo gikomeye cane”. Nta makuru menshi ahari ku mugabo afatwa ko yatanze amafaranga y’iyi mbogo nk’uko uru rwandiko rubivuga, kandi ko ataratwara izo nyamaswa inyuma y’imyaka ibiri n’igice. Uyu murwi uvuga kandi ko ari ibintu bitumvikana ingene aya mafaranga yagumye anyegejwe mu ntebe, hakuyabika mu gisandugu ntamenwa (safe/coffre-fort) kandi ko yari gushobora kujanwa mw’ibanki. Iki cegeranyo kigira kiti: "Twibaza ko umukuru w’igihugu hari ivyo ategerezwa kwishura ku mamuko y’aya mafaranga mvamakungu yibwe, hamwe n’icerekeye ingene yayaronse”. Congerako kiti: "Umukuru w’igihugu yarakoresheje ububasha bwiwe nk’umukuru w’igihugu kugira ngo ico kibazo ntigikorweko  amatohoza be no mu gusaba umukuru w’igihugu ca Namibia kumufasha kugira ngo uwabikoze ntafatwe”. Umukuru w’igihugu ca Namibia Hage Geingob aherutse guhakana ko ata ruhara afise muri ivyo bintu.

headline: Argentine irigina igarukanwa rya 'maillot' Maradona yari yambaye mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe c'isi
text: A﻿banye Argentines bariko barigina igarukanwa muri ico gihugu  rya 'maillot' rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru Diego Maradona yakinanye mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe c'isi. I﻿nyuma y'imyaka 36 Argentine itsinze Ubudagi mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi co mu 1986, impuzu Maradona yambaye mu gice ca mbere c'urukino yasubijwe ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Argentine, AFA. U﻿wahoze ari umukinyi wo hagati mu Budagi Lothar  Matthäus, yari yaguranye impuzu na Maradona inyuma y'igice ca mbere, yayigabiye abanye Argentine. A﻿FA yarungitse ubutumwa bwo kumushimira kuri Video. I﻿yindi mpuzu ya Maradona, yari yambaye igihe yatsindisha igitego ukuboko, "Hand of God" mu rukino rwabahuza n'Ubwongereza mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi co mu 1986, yaciye umuhigo mu kugurishwa imiliyoni 7.1 mu ntango z'uyu mwaka. Iyo mpuzu yatejejwe icamunara n'uwahoze ari umukinyi wo hagati w'Ubwongereza Steve Hodge. A﻿riko n'aho iyo mpuzu yagurishijwe amahera menshi nkayo Lothar Matthäus yabwiye ikinyamakuru Daily Mail ko atigeze yiyumvira gukura amahera muri iyo mpuzu ya Maradona. Matthäus yeretse iyo mpuzu abanye Argentine mu birori vyabereye mu nzu y'ubuserukizi bwa Argentine i Madrid mu kwezi kw'umunani, avuga ko "Diego ari Imana muri Argentine, ari na co gituma ari ikintu kidasanzwe kubashikiriza iyo mpuzu". A﻿vuga kuri Maradona yapfuye mu 2020 azize ingwara y'umutima, Matthäus yagize ati:"Birababaje kuba atari ngaha uyu musi. Diego azoguma mu mitima yacu." I﻿yi mpuzu izoshirwa muri Legends, inzu ndangamico yerekana ivyaranze umupira w'amaguru muri kahise i Madrid, imbere y'uko ijanwa muri Argentine n'uwusanzwe yegeranya ibintu vyo muri kahise Marcelo Ordás ku musi wa gatatu. M﻿u gushima, AFA yarungitse video y'akamwemwe aho ishimira "umugenzi wacu Lothar Matthäus" mw'izina ry'abanye Argentine. "﻿Iyi n'inkuru ya kizigenza w'Ubudagi yari afise nk'umugenzi kizigenza wa Argentine. Hanyuma nk'abandi bagenzi bose, barahanahanye ibintu vyiza bari bafise, kugwana mu nda, impanuro n'impuzu," uko ni ko uwuvugira muri iyo video yavuze igihe ivyo bihangange bibiri bigaragara bigwana mu nda.

headline: Intambara ya Ukraine: Abanya-Ukraine bisubije uturere mu burengero bwa Kyiv
text: Abasirikare ba Ukraine  bariko baragira ibitero ku ngabo z'Uburusiya mu turere tumwe tumwe tw'igihugu, hoba hari n'inkuru zivugako bamaze kwigarurira  ibibanza hafi y'umugwa mukuru Kyiv. Abategetsi bo muri ico gisagara ca Makariv, mu burengero bwa Kyiv, bavuga ko amadarapo ya Ukraine yasubiye kandi guhungabanayo. Umuvugizi w'igisirikare ca Amerika yavuze ko abanya-Ukraine bariko barahindura uko ibintu vyari vyifashe mu bice bimwe bimwe vyo mu bumanuko. Mu gisagara gito co mu bumanuko ca Voznesensk, ingabo z'Uburusiya zasubijwe inyuma, urukurikirane rw' ibimodoka bitamenwa navyo birasamburwa. Hanyuma muri Kherson, hegereye Crimee, ari naco gisagara ca mbere caguye mu minwe y'Uburusiya, abasirikare ba Ukraine bariko baragerageza kucisubiza. Umusesenguzi mu vyagisirikare  w'umwongereza yabwiye BBC ko uko gusugerezwa k'Uburusiya gushobora gutuma ico gihugu gihindura umukenyuro. Ariko, inkuru zishasha ziva mu bushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw'Ubwongereza zivuga ko ingabo z'Uburusiya ziriko zirava mu buraruko no mu bumanuko kugira "zizunguruke ingabo za Ukraine ziri mu buseruko bw'igihugu". Iyo nyandiko ivuga ko " ingabo z'Uburusiya zisa n'iziriko zirasubira kwisuganya imbere y'uko zisubira kugaba ibitero bikomeye". Ingabo z'Uburusiya kandi zibandanya zitera ibibombe ku gisagara kiri ku kivuko ca Mariupol, n'aho akarere ko ku kivuko ubwako bivugwa ko kamaze kwononekaramwo ibintu bike. Justin Nronk akora mu kigo kiraba ivyo kwivuna abansi n'umutekano mu Bwongereza (Rusi), avuga ko ako kanyarigabo k'abanya-Ukraine kaje mu gihe abarusiya bariko baragerageza kuraba uko bosubira gutera baja imbere. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Biragaragara ko Uburusiya bwananiwe no kwigarurira Ukraine yose ku birindiro vyose bwashitseko. Ubu rero, bariko baragerageza kwegeranya inguvu hanyuma batere ikibanza kimwe icarimwe - na cane cane mu micungararo ya Mariupol hamwe no mu bumanuko." Yavuze ko mu gihe abarusiya bofata Mariupol, imaze indwi zitari zike isugerejwe ikaba ata n'ibintu bigishikayo, bashobora guca bagabura ingabo n'ibigwanisho, ubwa mbere abaja mu karere ko mu buseruko bwa Ukraine Donbas,  hanyuma abashobora kuja mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bw'igisagara ca Kharkiv. Yongeyeko ko mu gihe Ukraine iriko irasubiza ingabo z'Uburusiya inyuma mu micungararo ya Irpin, nko ku birometero 20 uvuye Kyiv, no mu tundi duce twegereye Makariv, bishobora gutuma haburizwamwo umugambi wo gufata umugwa mukuru. Yavuze kandi ati: "Ahanini ico ingabo za Ukraine zigerageza gukora, kubuza ko haba ukuzunguruka Kyiv, bigaca rero bisaba abarusiya gutoborera mu buraruko bagaheba ivyo bindi birindiro, canke Uburusiya bukongereza inguvu nyinshi  mu kugerageza kuhamenera kugira bashireho abasirikare babo." Ku musi wa kabiri, ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi muri Amerika bwaratanze ido n'ido ry'ingene Ukraine iriko iragira ibitero ku ngabo z'abarusiya, buvuga ko bwabonye ibimenyetso vyinshi muri iyi misi ya vuba ko abarusiya bariko barirukanwa mu turere bari barigaruriye. Umuvugizi John Kirby yabwiye CNN ko atoshoka yemeza inkuru ziva mu bategetsi ba Ukraine ko bamaze kwisubiza n'imiburiburi igisagara kimwe, kandi ko biteze no gufata ibindi vyinshi mu misi iri imbere. Uko biri kose, yavuze ko bishobora "kuzoba bijanye n'uburyo bagwana n'ubushobozi twabonye abanya-Ukraine bakoresha". Yavuze ko ingabo z'Uburusiya "zitava aho ziri" kandi ko ziriko zirabura igitoro n'ibifungurwa. Kirby yavuze ko bafise kandi n'ikibazo c'itumatumanako hagati y'ingabo zigwanira mu kirere n'izo hasi, aho bamwe mu barusiya bateba bagakoresha telefone ngendanwa zisanzwe mu kuvugana hagati yabo. Yongeyeko ati:"Ntibava aho bari kandi bikaba biva ku bushobozi buke bafise." Uwundi mutegetsi wo mu bushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi muri Ameika atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru rya AFP, ko bamwe mu basirikare b'abarusiya bakubititse n'imbeho kubera ko badafise impuzu z'imbeho bijanye n'aho bariko baragwanira. Uwo mutegetsi yavuze ko abasirikare bariko barapfa hamwe n'izindi ngorane, igisirikare c'Uburusiya kiri hagati muri Ukraine gifise musi y'ibice 90% vy'ubushobozi bwo kugwana.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Pogba, Chiesa, Correa, Martial, Werner, Griezmann, Ronaldo
text: Juventus yanse imiriyoni zirenga 118 zatanzwe na Liverpool ku mutaliyano akina ku ruhande Federico Chiesa. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 23 yinjiye muri Juventus ku masezerano y'intizo yo mu kwa cumi 2020 imbere y'uko imugura burundu avuye muri Fiorentina.(Repubblica) Arsenal, Tottenham na Everton yose iriko irarondera umusatirizi wa Argentina Joaquin Correa w'imyaka 26 yiteze kuva mu murwi wiwe  Lazio muri rino ci. (Corriere dello Sport) Manchester United ishobora kugurisha umusatirizi w'umufaransa Anthony Martial w'imyaka 25 muri Tottenham isanzwe imwipfuza. (Star) Umumenyereza wa Man U Ole Gunnar Solskjaer ashaka ko Paul Pogba w'imyaka 28 aguma Old Trafford n'aho Paris St-Germain imwipfuza.  (Manchester Evening News) Bayern Munich iripfuza umusatirizi wa Chelsea  umudagi Timo Werner w'imyaka 25 , na rirya uwahoze ari umumenyereza wiwe muri  RB Leipzig, Julian Nagelsmann, ubu ari we amenyereza uyo murwi uherutse gutahukana ihiganwa ry'Ubudagi Bundesliga. (Football Insider) Manchester City iriteguye kudugiriza umushahara incuro zibiri umukinyi wayo w'inyuma, umunya Portugal Ruben Dias w'imyaka 24 kubera ingene yavyifashemwo neza mw'ihiganwa ry'umwaka w'inkino uheze wa 2020-21. (Star) Umusatirizi w'umufaransa  Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 30 abona ko kugira ngo ave muri Barcelona ari uko yoronka akaryo ko gusubira mri  Atletico Madrid yahoze akinira. (Sport) Umukinyi wo hagati aherutse kwinjira muri PSG umunya Hollande Georginio Wijnaldum w'imyaka 30 avuga ko atumva ko yari akunzwe kandi ko bamutyoza ku mbuga hwaniro imbere y'uko ava muri  Liverpool mu kwa gatandatu guheze. (Observer) Icegera c'umukuru wa Juventus Pavel Nedved avuga ko umusatirizi wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w'imyaka  36 azoguma muri uwo murwi. Ronaldo asigaje umwaka umwe mu masezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi wa Serie A akaba yavugwa ko yashobora kuwusezera. (Sky Sports Italia, via Football Italia) Kizegenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza Harry Kane w'imyaka 27 yiteze gutakaza inkino za mbere za Premier League kubera  inguvu nyinshi cane yakoresheje mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Bulaya. Uyu musatirizi wa Tottenham aripfuza kwimukira muri Manchester City.(Telegraph) Arsenal yiteze kwemeza igurwa ry'umukinyi w'inyuma wa Brighton Ben White w'imyaka 23 ku giciro c'imiriyoni hafi 69 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, akaba iteze gukorerwa ibipimo vyo kwa muganga vuba.  (Mail) Aba Gunners kndi bariko bararaba ingene bogura umukinyi wo hagati w'umuswisi Denis Zakaria w'imyaka 24 yamaze gushikiriza ko yipfuza gusezera Borussia Monchengladbach. (Mirror) Crystal Palace iri hafi yo kuronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Lyon umunya Danemark Joachim Andersen w'imyaka 25 ku miriyoni zababa 27 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, kandi irabandanya n'ibiganiro vyo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Schalke umunya Turukiya Ozan Kabak w'imyaka  21. (Mail)

headline: Impunzi z’Abarundi zivuga iki ku mushikiranganji wa Tanzania yazisavye gutaha?
text: Inyuma y'urugendo rw'umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati muri Tanzania yagize mu makambi y'impunzi z'Abarundi mu ntara ya Kigoma, bamwe mu mpunzi bafise ubwoba ko impera n'imperuka bazohava batahukanwa ku nguvu. Umushikiranganji George Simbachawene yabwiye impunzi ko zokwiyandikisha zigahunguka "kuko u Burundi ari nyabagendwa, amahoro ari yose". Umwe mu baserukira impunzi mw'imwe muri izo nkambi ariko atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana, avuga ko atari we yari akwiye kubabonera ko hari amahoro, ko ari bo bonyene ubwabo bakwiye kuvyibonera. Ati: "Kutubwira y'uko iwacu ari amahoro natwe ari twebwe tuzi ico twahunze, si ivy'iwe kuko ni twebwe dukwiye kubona ko hari amahoro, ivyo rero vyaradutangaje". Inyuma y'urugendo yagize mu makambi ya Nyarugusu, Nduta na Mtendeli mu ntara ya Kigoma ku wa mbere no ku wa kabiri w'iyi ndwi, umushikiranganji Simbachawene yategekanya guca arubandaniriza mu makambi ya Ulyankulu mu ntara ya Tabora, hamwe na Mishamo na Gatumba ari mu ntara ya Katavi. Aya makambi arimwo impunzi zahunze ubwicanyi bwa 1972. Avugana na BBC, uyo ari mu baserukira izindi mpunzi abona ko ubutumwa bashikirijwe na leta ya Tanzania ari ubwo bumvikanye na Leta y'u Burundi ariko atariko izo mpunzi zozo zibona ibintu. Afise ubwoba ko impera n'imperuka leta ya Tanzania ishobora gukoresha inguvu kugira ngo bave muri ico gihugu. Leta ya Tanzania yoyo ivuga ko gushika ubu bahimiriza impunzi gutahuka ku bushake bwazo. Hagati aho, uyo aserukira abandi aremeza ko "abantu bariko baratahuka kandi ko n'abandi babandanya biyandikisha," ariko y'uko ari ya mvugo ngo 'ntahatagira imva'. Ati: "Turavye ukuntu dufashwe n'ukuntu turi, abantu babona ko aho ari ho hose umuntu ashobora gutakaza ubuzima, bakabona ko hako bomererwa nabi mu buhungiro, bopfuma bahitamwo kugenda, na kare ntarusi rudahamba". Ariko avuga ko we ubwiwe atiteguye guhunguka, ko ico yahunze ari co kigihari, kandi ko icuka kiri mu gihugu kitamuhumuriza. Avuga ko hari abari bahungutse ariko bakaruhira gusubira guhunga, ubu bari kumwe mu nkambi. Asaba leta ya Tanzania n'ishirahamwe ONU ko boba barabagumiza aho bari canke n'aho bakabaronderera ahandi hantu baba barabashira "nimba Tanzania yoba irushe". Ati: "Ariko nimba itarushe naho ibandanye yubahiriza amategeko atugenga". Mugenziwe wo mw'ikambi ya Nyarugusu avuga ko koko mu nkambi zose hari abafashe ingingo yo guhita bataha inyuma yo kugenderwa n'umushikiranganji Simbachawene, ariko ko bakiri bake ugereranije n'abatuye muri izo nkambi. Mu gihe abarenga 250.000 bazwi ko bahungiye muri ico gihugu, gushika kuwa 30 z'ukwa gatandatu, abashika 87.194 nibo bari bamaze guhunguka, nk'uko vyemezwa n'ishirahamwe ryitaho impunzi HCR mu Burundi. Ariko ibitigiri bigenda vyiyongera cane kuko hari ababandanya bahunguka.

headline: Uganda: Uwahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Anglican yahagaritswe yagirijwe kurenga ibigo
text: Ishengero rya Anglican muri Uganda ryahagaritse uwahoze ari musenyeri mukuru Stanley Ntagali, mu mabanga yo gusoma misa no guserukira iryo shengero gushika ingingo ihindutse, yagirizwa kurenga ibigo. Ntagali yatanze imihoho mu mabanga mu kwa gatatu kw'umwaka uheze inyuma y'imyaka 43 yari amaze ari umupasitori. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe ku wa 13 z'uku kwa mbere ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'ishengero rya Anglican, uwamusubiriye, Dr. Stephen Samuel Kaziimba, yavuze ko Ntagali yarenze ibigo aryamana n'umugore afise umugabo, kandi na we nyene akaba yaravyiyemereye. Dr Kaziimba ati: "Yarahemukiye ibiro vy'abepiskopi, arenga indahiro yiwe yo kwimikwa, hamwe n'ivyo yari yiyemeje mu nyifato yiwe." Dr Kaziimba avuga ko ishengero rya Uganda ryiyemeje gukorera mu muco no kwitwararika abo bose bagizweko ingaruka n'ivyabaye, asaba ko abagore bompi bosengerwa, abihana bakihana, abakizwa bagakizwa. Musenyeri mukuru wa Anglican muri Amerika ya Ruguru, Foley Beach, na we nyene yasohoye itangazo aho avuga ko ababajwe n'ivyabaye. Ati: "Stanley ni mwenewacu muri Kristo, kandi ndashima ingene twakoranye mu myaka iheze. Birambabaje cane kwumva ko yatirimutse kw'ibanga". "Ndasaba Imana ko Stanley yobandanya n'inzira yo kwihana, yongere ihe ukwihangana abo bose bakozweko n'icaha ciwe". Uyu yahoze ari umwepiskopi mukuru ntiyabonetse kugira ngo ashobore kugira ico abivugako. Ariko abanya Uganda bazokwama bamwibukira ku majambo yavuze ku vyo yafata nk'ubutabanga mu gihugu. Mu 2019, yasubiwemwo n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu ariko ahanura abantu ko "bokwigumya mu vyipfuzo vyabo mu bijanye n'uguhuza ibitsina". Ishengero Anglican muri Uganda rifise abanywanyi bashika imiriyoni 13.

headline: Minembwe: FARDC ivuga ko ata mutwe n'umwe uzotunga ibirwanisho
text: Tumaze iminsi tubabwira ku ngaruka z'ibitero vyagabwe ku mihana itandukanye yo muri territoire ya Minembwe muri Kivu y'epfo. Muri ako karere k'ubuseruko bwa Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo, imigwi ya Mai Mai Twirwaneho na Mai Mai Biloze Bishambuke isanzwe ishamiranye. Umuvugizi wa gisirikare muri ako gace, Major Dieudonne Kasereka, avuga ko abanyagihugu barenga 3000 bataye ingo zabo, ubu begeranirijwe mw'ikambi mfatakibanza iri ahitwa Baraka, aho barindiririye imfashanyo. Major Dieudonne Kasereka yavuganye na Florentine Kwizera wa BBC Gahuzamiryango, abanza kumubwira uko umutekano wifashe muri ako gace (umviriza ico kiganiro aho hejuru).

headline: Prince Philip: Ivyaranze ubuzima bwiwe n'icubahiro yagize hose
text: Umuganwa  Philip, Duc wa Edinburgh, yabashije kugira icubahiro hose kubera gushigikira cane Umwamikazi kandi igihe cose. Rwari uruhara rutoroshe ku w'ariwe wese, ubaye urareka umugabo yari amenyereye ivya gisirkare kandi yari afise aho ashingiye bikomeye ku bibazo bitari bike. Ariko n'izo nguvu nyene z'inyifato yiwe zamufashije kurangura neza ivyo yari  ajejwe maze akabona gushigikira atiziganije umugore wiwe mu mabanga yiwe y'Umwamikazi. Yari umugabo w'Umwamikazi ari ku ngoma ariko Philip nta ruhare  rw'ibwirizwa nshingiro yari afise. Ariko nta n'umwe yari hafi y'Umwamikazi kurusha we canke ngo abe akomeye kuri we kurusha uko we. Umuganwa Philip w'Ubugiriki yari yavutse itariki 10 ukwezi kwa 6 mu  1921 kw'izinga rya Corfu. Urupapuro  rwiwe rw'amavuko rwerekana ko yavutse itariki 28/5/1921 kuko Ubugiriki butari bwatangure gukoresha ikirangamisi ca Gregoire (calendrier Gregorien). Inyuma y'itembagazwa  ry'ubutegetsi mu 1922, se yaciye acibwa na sentare y'impinduka. Ubwato bw'intambara bw'Ubwongereza  bwarungitswe na  muvyarawe wa kabiri, Umwami George V, bwaciye bujana umuryango mu Bufaransa. Umwana  Philip ahanini yamaze urwo rugendo rwo mu mazi mu gatebe gakozwe mu dusandugu twari twavuyemwo imicungwe. Philip yatanguriye ishure mu Bufaransa ariko ku myaka 11, yaciye aja kubandanya n'incuti ziwe mu Bwongereza aho yize ishure  nteguza i Surrey. Philip yari yavutse nk'umuganwa w'umugiriki ariko yamuka ku banye Danemark n'Abarusiya. Ico gihe nyina yari yatowe indwara ya schizophrenie aca ajanwa aho bene abo bantu barwarira. Umwana Philip yabonana gake cane nawe gushika akure. Mu 1933 yarungitswe kwiga kuri Schule Schloss Salem mu Budagi bw'ubumanuko , ishure ryari rirongowe n'umuntu yari imbere mu barondera guteze imbere amashure Kurt Hahn. Ariko mu mezi make, Hahn, yari Umuyahudi,yaciye yomoka ahunga ihigwa n'aba Nazi. Hahn yaciye aja muri Ecosse aho yaciye ashinga ishure rya Gordonstoun, ari naryo Philip yaciye yimukiramwo amaze ibice bibiri mu Budagi. Ingendo nk'iya Sparte yaranga ishure rya Gordonstoun, yari ishingiye ku kwibako, niyo yari ijanye n'umwana w'umuyabaga yari yatandukanye n'abavyeyi biwe akaba nka nyamwigendako. Mu ntambara Intanbara ya kabiri y'isi iriko iregereza, Philip yaciye ahitamwo kuja mu gisirikare. Yashaka kuja mu ngabo zikoresha indege ariko umuryango wa nyina wari usanzwe ufise kahise mu vy'imirimo yo mu mazi uca umuhanura kwinjira mw'ishure ry'ingabo zo mu mazi  rya Royal Naval College i Dartmouth. Aho niho yashingwa guherekeza Abaganwakazi bari bakiri bato Elizabeth na Margaret, mu gihe Umwami George VI n'Umwamikazi Elizabeth  bariko barazunguruka iryo shure. Ku bw'ababibonye, Philip yariyerekanye cane. Umuganwakazi Elizabeth yari afise imyaka 13 yahavuye agenda aramutangarira. Philip ntiyatevye kuba inkerebutsi kuri iryo shure rya Gordonstoun. Yavyerekanye mu kuba uwa mbere mw'ishure ryiwe, mu 1940 aca atangura kuja ubwa mbere mu bikorwa vya gisirikare ahereye  mw'ibahari Indiano. Yaciye arungikwa ku bwato bw'intambara HMS Valiant muri Mediterranee aho yavuzwe ku ruhara mu ntambara ya Cape  Matapan mu 1941. Nk'intwazangabo yari ajejwe amatara yo kurondeza y'ubwo bwato, yagize uruhara runini  muri ico gikorwa gikomeye co mw'ijoro. Hashitse mu kwezi kw'icumi mu 1942 ariwe mu lieutenant yari akiri muto kurusha abandi mu ngabo zo mu mazi yakora ku bwato  bw'intambara HMS Wallace. Gutangaza ivy'umubano Muri ico gihe we n'Umuganwakazi Elizabeth baraja bararungikirana amakete, akaba yaratumiwe kuza kumara iminsi mu muryango w'i bwami akatari gake. Rimwe yaje kubaramutsa, mu gihe ca Noel yo mu 1943, niho Elizabeth yashira ifoto ya Philip mu mwambaro wa uniforme z'ingabo zo mu mazi ku meza yategurirako impuzu ziwe. Imigenderanire yabo yarabandanije mu gihe c'amahoro, n'ubwo hari abatabishaka mu batoni b'i bwami-muri bo hari umwe yavuze ngo Philip "arahuruduka kandi ntafise  inyifato nziza''. Ariko Umuganwakazi yari yamukunze cane hanyuma muci ryo mu 1946, Philip aca asaba Umwami kumuha umukobwa wiwe ngo bubakane. Ariko imbere y'uko hatangazwa ko vyemewe, Umuganwa Philip yategerezwa kuronka ubwenegihugu bushasha hamwe n'izina ry'umuryango. Aca aheba izina ryiwe ry'Ubugiriki, aba umwenegihugu w'Umwongereza, aca afata izina rya nyina rivuzwe mu congereza, Mountbatten. Umunsi umwe imbere y'uko ubukwe buba, Umwami George VI yaciye aha Philip  icubahiro  c'abo mu nda y'ubwami, bukeye mu gitondo c'ubukwe, aba yagizwe Duc wa Edimburgh, Earl wa Merioneth hamwe na Baron wa Greenwich. Ubukwe bwabereye Westminster Abbey ku wa 20/11/1947. Vyari ibirori, nk'uko Winston Churchill yabivuze, vy'umwakaka w'amabara' mu Bwongereza bwari bucijiriwe inyuma y'intambara. Umuganwa Philip yarasubiye mu kazi kiwe ko mu ngabo zo mu mazi aca arungikwa gukora muri Malte, aho ubwa mbere nibura, we n'umugore, bashoboye kubaho nk'uwundi muryango wose wari mu butumwa  bw'akazi. Umuhungu wabo, Umuganwa Charles, yavukiye ku kirimba Buckingham mu 1948 mu gihe Umuganwakazi Anne yabonetse  mu 1950. Mu 1952, bafashe urugendo rwo kuzunguruka Commonwealth, basezewe n'umwami Geaorge VI we, atazwi n'umwuzukuru wiwe w'umukobwa, yari afise indwara ya cancer. Umuganwa Philip yabaye uwa mbere yakeje Umwamikazi igihe yimikwa. Abari bahari ico gihe bavuga ko yari gushobora guca ashikira, iyo abishaka, icubahiro ca First Sea Lord. Ahubwo yaciye yironderera ico yokora na cane cane, aho Elizabeth abareye umwamikazi. Yari afise ivyiyumviro vyinshi vyo kugira ivyo ahinduye mu ntwaro ya cami ariko abanyamabanga b'ikirimba ntibabimwemereye. Umuganwa Philip ntiyari  umugabo aha ikibanza ivyo kwicuza, ariko mu nyuma yaravuze ko yababajwe n'uko atashoboye kubandanya igisirikare. Kuvugurura intwaro y'ubwami. Igihe bari bacumbitse mu nzu  iri mu kibira c'ibikoko  muri Kenya mu kwezi kwa kabiri niho hatangura kuvugwa ko umwami yapfuye. Yari yafashwe n'indwara yo kuvura amaraso yo mu mutima idatevya kwica. Vyaguye kuri Philip kuba ariwe amenyesha ubwa mbere umugore wiwe ko yabaye Umwamikazi. Umwe mu bagenzi babo yavuze ko ico gihe Philip yaciye asa n'uko "igice c'isi" kimuguyeko. Aho yagumanye ububasha bwiwe bwose  mu guha indero abana biwe. Niwe yarungitse umuhungu wiwe w'imfura Charles mw'ishure nawe yari yarizemwo rya Gordonstoun, ariko ntiryamuguye neza namba, mbere yahavuye ariheba. Inkino Umuganwa Philip yarakunda inkino. Yasoza ubwato, agakina cricket na polo, yari azi cane kugendesha ibitwazi bikwegwa n'amafarasi akaba yaranabaye imyaka myinshi umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'isiganwa ku mafarasi. Kuba yari umuntu yavuga atarya umunwa rimwe na rimwe vyaramutera ibibazo. Yahavuye afatwa nk'umuntu atari azi kuraba aho avugira na cane cane iyo yaba ari mu mahanga. Ari mu Bushinwa mu 1986 mu rugendo hamwe n'Umwamikazi, yabwiye abanyeshure b'Abongereza ati ''nimwamara igihe kinini ngaha amaso yanyu azomera nk'ayabashinwa''. Muri Australia naho mu 2002 abaza umugwizatunga w'umu Aborigene niba ''mugiterana amacumu.'' Ukutumvikana n'umuhungu w'imfura wiwe vyagiye gusubira kuja ahabona hasohotse igitabo ku buzima bwiwe canditswe n'umunyamakuru Jonathan Dimbleby. Vyavuzwe ko Philip ariwe yatumye Prince Charles arongora atabishaka Diana Spencer. Ibihe bikomeye N'ubwo Philip yababajwe cane n'ukubona ingo z'abana biwe batatu kuri bane zisambuka, yagumye yanka kugira ico avuze ku bibazo bimuraba ubwiwe aho yabwiye ikinyamakmuru mu 1994 ati ntiyari bwabikore gushika ico gihe kandi ntagiye kubitangura. Gushigikira ubwami Yigeze kubwira BBC ati : ''Nakoze gushika aho nibaza ko ariho nashobora kugeza. Sinshobora guhindura ingene nkora. Niko meze''. Ministre wa mbere David Cameron yarabimushimiye buca ahimbaza isabukukuru yiwe y'imyaka 90. Yavuze ati ''yamye ari umuntu akora ibintu mu buryo bwiwe ata wundi yomwigana, afatiye ku buzima busanzwe mu buryo nibaza ko Abongereza bakunze''. Umuganwa Philip yarashoboye gukoresha ikibanza ciwe kugira hagire ico afashije mu buzima bw'Ubwongereza, hanyuma aragira uruhara mu gufasha intwaro y'ubwami kwisunga ivyagenda birahinduka mu buryo abantu babona ibintu uko imyaka yagenda irahera. Ariko kimwe mu bintu bikomeye yashitseko, kwabaye ugushigikira adahesha Umwamikazi mu myaka myinshi y'ingoma yiwe. Igihe bahimbaza imyaka 50 bari bamaze bubakanye, umwamikazi yarakeje umugabo wiwe, yabaye umugabo w'umwamikazi wa mbere yaramvye ku ngoma muri kahise k'Ubwongereza. ''N'umuntu adakunda cane gushimagizwa, ariko  yabaye inkomezi zanje, kandi akiriko muri iyi myaka yose. Hanyuma jewe n'umuryango wiwe wose tumufitiye  umwenda uruta uwo ashobora kutwishuza canke tutazokwigera tumenya uko ungana.'' Kurwanira ibidukikije Umugamwa Philip yaritanze cane mu  gukingira ibidukikije na cane cane amashamba hamwe n'ibikoko. Niwe yatanguje ikigega World Wildlife Fund cahavuye gihinduka World Wide Fund, gifasha mu gukingira ibidukikije. ''Nibaza ko twebwe abantu niba dufise ububasha bwo kwica no gukiza, dutegerezwa kubukoresha tubanje kwibaza ico dukora. Kuki twohonya ikintu bidakenewe?''. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC, yavuze ati: "Nibaza ko biteye igomwe kubona abantu, kuri iyi si, tuba mu buzima butandukanye kandi budasa, mugabo hakaba ugufashanya". "Nibwira kandi ko, twebwe abantu, nimba dufise ingabirano zo kuvyara, tugashobora gukiza canke kwica - kubaho canke guhona-, tubwirizwa kubigendera dukoresheje amabanga y'ubuntu twahezagijwe. Kubera iki twokwica kandi tutabwirizwa kwigenza uko?" Abagendera imico n'imigenzo y'abongereza ba kera ntibashimye ingene yashigikiye ko inyoni z'inkware ziraswa. "Iyo uzi ko hari inkino zifasha abantu kuramba, dufate nk'uguhiga, ntaho bitandukaniye n'abarima, bakorora. Ni nka kurya twamura ingemwe ku biterwa. Ntituba turiko turabihonya". Imvugakuri Umuganwa Philip yarashimiwe cane ku ngendo n'ibikorwa vyiwe vyo gukingira amashamba mw'isi, hamwe n'ibikorwa vyiwe vyo kurwanya ukuroba kurenze urugero, mu mabahari. Umuganwa Philip yaranzwe no gushigikira iterambere ry'amahinguriro. Yaratemberera cane inganda zitandukanye. Ni uko yiswe umuvunyi w'amahinguriro, ubu tuzi nk'ikigo kidaharanira inyungu zitandukanye, gifasha mu migambi canke ibikorwa vy'ubushakashatsi vy'abakozi, mu Bwongereza -"Work Foundation"-. Mu 1961, yabwiye umurwi w'abarongoye amahinguriro ati: "Bagenzi, harageze ko duhagarika guta umwanya. Twerekane ivyo dushoboye". Iyi ngendo yo kutarya umunwa, yatumye bamwe bamufata nk'umuntu atubaha abandi, ivyanamuteye ingorane, rimwe na rimwe. Hari abamufashe nk'umuntu w'akagaye, cane cane ibihe yaba ari mu ngendo mu mahanga. Mu gihugu c'Ubushinwa, niho yavugiye ijambo rimwe mu yatazokwibagirwa. Hari mu mwaka w'1986, igihe yari mu rugendo, yaherekeje Umwamikazi. We yavuze ko yakoresheje imvugo ngereranyo, afatiye ku maso mato mato y'ubwoko bw'abanye Asia, cane cane Abashinwa. Naho bagerageje gusukamwo mabisi, imvugo yiwe yarababaje abantu mu Bushinwa. Mu mwaka wa 2002, ari mu rundi rugendo mu gihugu ca Australiya, yabajije umwe mu bagwizatunga w'umusangwabutaka  ati "Muracabandanya guterana amacumu"? Naho abatari bake, mu mice itandukanye bamunebagura, hari abandi ahubwo bamubona nk'umunyakuri, yanse guhindura ico ari ngo afate ingeso n'imvugo vy'abakinyi ba politike. Nkako, hari abasigura ko ivyo bita "amakosa" ata kabi karimwo, uretse inyifato yiwe yo gushaka kugabanya imitwaro y'abantu, mu kubatwenza. Mu buzima bwiwe, umuganwa Philip  yamanye urukundo rw'inkino. Yarakina inkino zo kugendesha ubwato buto buto, agakina inkino za cricket na polo. Yari umuhinga mugutwara imodoka zikwegwa n'indogobwe. Ndetse yaranarongoye, imyaka myinshi, ihuriro mpuzamakungu ry'amashirahamwe y'abakina inkino zikoreshwamwo indogobwe. Ukutumvikana n'umuhungu wiwe mukuru, kwagiye kwigaragaza kuva aho umumenyeshamakuru Jonathan Dimbleby ashiriye ahabona inyandiko ku vyaranze ubuzima bw'umuganwa Charles. Umuganwa Philip , ari na Duc wa  Edinburgh, vyavugwa ko yoba yagize uruhara mu bukwe  bw'umuhungu wiwe mukuru Charles , mu kwubakana na  Lady Diana Spencer. Urengeye uko abamunebagura bavuga, umuganwa Philip  yarazwi nk'umuntu yahagaritswe umutima n'ibiringo bigoye abana biwe baciyemwo, mu ngo zabo. Yarashize imbere y'ibindi vyose ugutahura izo ngorane, kumbure afatiye ku vyamushikiye n'ivyo yibuka bigoye, mu muryango w'i bwami. Umuganwa Philip yaratewe agahinda n'ingene abana biwe batatu bose ivy'ingo  vyabananiye, kuva ku muganwakazi Anne  gushika ku baganwa Andrew na Charles. Ico atigeze akora, ni ukuvuga ibijanye n'ubuzima bwiwe bwite. Mu 1994, yabwiye ikinyamakuru ko atariko yarezwe, kandi ko atibona agiye guhindura imibereho yiwe. No mu gihe yariko arasaza, imibereho yiwe ntiyahindutse. Yabandanije agendera amakungu. Yaba agiye mu bikorwa vyiwe bijanye no gushigikira ikigega mpuzamakungu co gukingira ibinyabuzima, canke aherekeje umwamikazi mu ngendo zijanye n'imirimo yiwe. Mu 1994, yaragize urugendo rurerure, aca no mu bibanza vyeranda, aranashika n'ahari imva y'umuvyeyi yamwibarutse. Mama wiwe yari yaripfuje guhambwa I Yerusalemu, nk'uko vyagenze. Uwundi munsi wari uhambaye mu buzima bwiwe, ni igihe amakungu yibuka itsindwa ry'Ubuyapani mu ntambara  ya kabiri y'isi yose -"VJ Day"-. Uyo mwaka wa 1945, umuganwa Philip  yakorera igisirikare co mu mazi. Yari no mu bwato bw'Ubwongereza, bumwe mu bwatera kandi bwari hafi ya Tokyo, umurwa mukuru w'igihugu c'Ubuyapani. Mu kwibuka uwo munsi, ibirori biba uko umwaka utashe. Mu 1995, yari akwije imyaka 50 y'amavuka. Yifadikanije n'abandi bakukuruke mu gisirikare bagiye kurwanira mu bihugu vya Asia  y'ubuseruko. Umwamikazi yarateye iteka ivyo birori vyabereye mu kibanza cagutse gikunze gukoraniramwo abantu, kiri hafi y'ikirimba - Buckingham Palace-. Imvugo ihumuriza Umuganwa Philip yararemesheje, aranakeza abari baragizwe imbohe. Abenshi muri bo barahahamuwe n'ivyo baciyemwo, ndetse hari n'abatashoboye guharira Abayapani babagize imbohe. . Ubukari bw'amajambo yiwe bwagiye buragabanuka mu myaka yakurikiye, bitumwe n'uko igihugu kitakiriye neza iyo nyifato yo ku kirimba, na cane cane inyuma y'isanganya ryahitanye umuganwakazi Diana. Mu mwaka w'i 2007, hari amakete umuganwa Philip  yandikiraniye n'umuganwakazi Diana yashizwe ahabona. Intumbero ikaba yari ukubeshuza amakuru yavugwa ko umuganwa Philip  atumvikana n'uwo mukazana wiwe. Amajambo Diana yakoresha mukwandikira sebukwe, umuganwa Philip, yemeje ko yamubereye nk'umuvyeyi mu kumushigikira mu bihe bitandukanye. Mu matohoza ku rupfu rw'umuganwakazi Diana, Mohamed Al Fayed, se wa Dodi, umugabo yagendanye n'umuganwakazi Diana mu minsi ya nyuma, wewe yari yavuze ko umuganwa Philip ariwe ari inyuma y'urwo rupfu, ivyemezo vyatewe ivyatsi n'uwari ajejwe kwemeza ko Diana yacikanye. Umuganwa Philip  akaba na Duc wa Edinburgh, yari umuntu w'ishaka. Kandi mu nyifato y'ubwigenge bwiwe, vyamugize umuntu w'icubahiro gikomeye mu Bongereza. Inyifato ifise ifatiro n'ihangiro Umuganwa Philip yari umuyobozi kamere, kandi ibikorwa vyiwe vyamuhaye ikibanza ca kabiri mu buyobozi bw'Ubwongereza. Yari umurwanashaka atarazi kuruhuka, kandi atitaho cane ivy'ikibanza ciwe. Umunsi umwe yabwiye BBC ati: "Narakoze ivyo numva nabwirizwa gukora kandi uko nashoboye". Yongeye ati:  "Sinshobora guhindura rimwe na rimwe uko mbona canke nkora ibintu, canke ngo mpindure uko ndemye, canke ibindaje ishinga". Ibi yavuze vyanemejwe n'umushikiranganji wa mbere David Cameron mu mwaka wa 2011, mu birori vyo gukeza umuganwa Philip , aho yahimbaza imyaka 90 y'amavuka. Yavuze ati: "Yamye arangura imigambi n'ivyiyumviro vyiwe mu buryo yisangije kandi busanzwe, nk'umuntu wo kuri iyi si. Ndemera ko ari kimwe muvyo abongereza bamukundira". Akaruhuko ko mu za bukuru Mu bikorwa vy'igihugu, umuganwa Philip yagiye mu karuhuko k'izabukuru mu kwezi kw'umunani mu  2017. Yari amaze imyaka ashigikira umwamikazi, yongera akorera canke aserukira amashirahamwe atandukanye yari arongoye, canke yashinze. Ikirimba ca  Buckingham giharura ko umuganwa Philip yaranguye, canke yaterereye mu migambi 22.219  ku gatwe kiwe, kuva mu mwaka wa 1952. Umushikiranganji  wa mbere Theresa May yaramushimiye cane, ati: "Ni ibikorwa biboneka mu buzima bw'igihugu". Philip  yarashoboye gukoresha ububasha n'ikibanza igihugu kimuha, mu guterera agacumu k'ubumwe mw'iterambere ry'Ubwongereza. Yaranafasha uburongozi bwo ku kirimba guhindura ibitari bike mu mibereho yari imaze imyaka. Ariko igikorwa nyamukuru kwabaye ugukoresha inguvu ziwe mu gushigikira Umwamikazi mu kiringo ciwe kirekire, yari amaze arongoye ubwami bw'Ubwongereza. Nk'uko yabiganiriye umwanditsi w'ivyaranze ubuzima bwiwe, Umuganwa Philip yaremeza ko umurimo wiwe mukuru kwari "Ugufasha Umwamikazi kurongora ubwami". Mu birori vyo guhimbaza imyaka 50 bamaze bubakanye, Umwamikazi yarashimye , anakeza umuganwa Philip, nk'uwabaye uwa mbere yamaze imyaka myinshi ari umufasha w'Umwamikazi, muri kahise k'ubwami bw'Ubwongereza. Umwamikazi yavuze ijambo ryabaye rurangiranwa ati, "N'umuntu adakunda cane gushimirwa no gukezwa, ariko yarambereye inguvu, ambera intahemuka iyi myaka yose. Kandi ahanje, umuryango wiwe wose, Ubwongereza hamwe n'ibindi bihugu vyinshi, tumufitiye ideni rinini, rikomeye ku buryo adashobora kuryishuza canke ngo tunamenye n'ibirigize". Amafoto yose yatangiwe uburenganzira.

headline: Kuba uwahoze ari Prezida wa USA bimera gute?
text: Kuba uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu wa Amerika bimera gute? Igihe ca Donald Trump muri White House kigira gihere. Ariko ntivyari bikwiye kumubabaza kuko kuva muri Oval Office bijana n'imperekeza nyinshi. Hari amafaranga, abarinzi bafise inkoho, kuronswa amakuru y'ibanga eka mbere n'iposita bwite...

headline: Novak Djokovic yemeye ko yarenze ku mategeko yo kuguma ukwa wenyene kandi yaranduye Covid
text: Icamamare muri tennis Novak Djokovic yemeye ko habaye amakosa mu mpapuro ziwe zo  gusohoka no guhura n'umumenyeshamakuru kandi yari yatowe ko yanduye Covid, mu gihe Australia ikirondera kumwirukana mu gihugu. Djokovic ivyo yavyemeye mu butumwa yanditse kuri Instagram  kugira atange umuco "ku makuru atariyo abandanya gutangwa" ku ngendo ziwe. Uwo aza kw'isonga mu rukino rwa tennis mu bagabo yizeye gukina muri Australian Open ku ndwi iza. Ariko ukwitaba izo nkino kwasutsweko igipfungu n'impari ku ruhusha rwiwe (visa) rwo kwinjira muri Australia. Djokovic, asanzwe atarafata urucanco, visa yiwe yarafuswe itariki 6 ukwezi kwa mbere gato inyuma yo gushika muri Australia bivuye ku bibazo ku ruhusha rwiwe rwo kudaterwa urucanco rwoba rwatumye yemererwa kwinjira muri ico gihugu. Ariko ku wa mbere, mu buryo bwatangaje, umucamanza iyo ngingo yarayisheshe aca ategeka ko uwo mukinyi  arekurwa. Ariko reta ntiravuga ko idashobora kumufatira iyindi ngingo - bishoboka ko umushikiranganji ajejwe abinjira n'abasohoka ashobora gufuta visa yiwe ubugira kabiri iminsi mike imbere y'uko ihiganwa ritangura. Alex Hawke  ashobora gufuta iyo visa ashingiye ko kuba waranduye Covid muri kahise bidaharurwa nk'ibitanga uruhusha rwo kudaterwa urucanco. Visa ya Djokovic ishobora gufutwa kandi ku "mvo z'inyifato"  bishingiye ku matohoza ku mpapuro ziwe zo kwinjira n'uko ashobora kuba yararenze ku mategeko ya Covid yo muri Serbia. Hamwe Djokovic yotsinda Australian Open - grand slam yiwe igira 21- yoba abaye umukinyi wa mbere wa tennis w'intsinzi nyinshi  muri kahise k'urwo rukino. Mu butumwa bwiwe kuri Instagram, Djokovic yavuze ko yemeye gutanga ico kiganiro n'umunyamakuru w'ikinyamakuru co mu Bufaransa L'Equipe, kuko "atashaka gutererana uwo munyamakuru". Yavuze ati: "Nagumye ncunga ko turi kure na kure kandi nguma nambaye agafukamunwa kiretse igihe nariko ndafatwa ifoto". L'Equipe yemeje mu nkuru yayo ko uwo rurangiranwa wa tennis yagumye yambaye  agafukamunwa  gushika ikiganiro gihere, mbere n'igihe umunyamakuru waco yamusaba kugakura mu kiringo c'iminota itanu gusa. Uwo munyamakuru, Franck Ramella, yavuze ko yari yabwiwe kutabaza Djokovic ivyerekeye kwicandagisha kwiwe canke ibijanye n'inkino za Australian Open zimirije arico "gituma ntamubajije niba yaribajije kugirisha igipimo". Ramella ati "naho nari kumubaza, vyari kuba bimaze iki?" Djokovic  yemeye kandi ko yujuje ibitari vyo ku rupapuro rwiwe rw'urugendo imbere yo kwinjira muri Australia avuga ko umugwi w'abamufasha wahaye abategetsi  inkuru z'inyongera. Avuga ko uwutunganya ibijanye n'ingendo ziwe  yihenze igihe yariko aruzuza igice c'urupapuro cerekeye ingendo yaheruka gukora. Urwo rupapuro rwavuga ko  ata ngendo yagize mu minsi 14 y'imbere y'uko ashika muri Australia. Ariko ivyegeranyo bishasha vyerekana ko uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 34 yagiye muri Serbia hanyuma muri Espagne imbere y'uko afata urwo rugendo. Yanditse ati: "Uwumfasha  yarasavye imbabazi kuri iryo kosa mu kwuzuza urwo rupapuro. "Uko kwabaye ukwihenda kw'umuntu gusanzwe, nta nkeka ko atari ibigirankana." Uwu mukinyi yahakanye kuba yaritavye  ibindi birori  hari ivyarimwo abana - kandi yari yaranduye Covid. Yanditse kuri Instagram ko yafahe igipimo ca PCR ku wa 16 ukwezi kwa 12 inyuma yo kurorera urukino rwa basketaball iminsi ibiri imbere y'aho, aho abantu benshi mu nyuma baciye  batorwa ko banduye. Djokovic avuga ko yari yafashe igipimo cihuta imbere yo kwitaba ivyo birori kandi ko yagiye kumenya ko PCR yiwe yerekanye ko yanduye mu nyuma itariki 17 z'ukwezi kwa 12. Urwego rwa Australia rujejwe imbibe, rwavuze ku wa kabiri ko ruriko rurakora amatohoza ko "yatangaje ibitari vyo" - ico kikaba coca kiba imvo yo gufuta visa yiwe. Abajejwe ihiganwa rya tennis ry'abagabo bavuga ko ari ngombwa  ko harushiriza kuba umuco mu mategeko yo kwinjira muri Australia hanyuma basaba abakinyi kwicandagisha.

headline: Bazamuganga: Kanseri y'ibere ifata gute, ivurwa gute?
text: Menya ingene kanseri y'ibere ifata, ingene ivurwa n'ingene woyirinda canke womenya hakiri kare ko. uyirwaye

headline: Ebola ngo nta mpungenge iteye irushanwa rya volley beach mu Rwanda
text: Mu Rwanda kuva uyu munsi hariko habera amahiganwa mpuzamakungu y'urukino bita volley yo ku mucanga canke volley beach. Ayo mahiganwa asanzwe atunganywa n'urunani  rw'amashirahamwe y'urukino rwa Federation International de Volley Ball canke FIVB. Ayo mahiganwa yitabiriwe n'imigwi yo mu bihugu bitandukanye birenga 20, birimwo 2 vyo muri Afrika n'ukuvuga u Rwanda nyene na Cote d' Ivoire, akazobera mu karere ka Rubavu hafi y'urubibe n'umuji wa Goma. Florentine Kwizera yabajije umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaboko Volley Ball mu Rwanda, Leandre Karekezi, nimba ata mpungenge bafise ku ngwara ya Ebola na burya ivugwa hakurya y'umupaka kandi izo nkino zikaba zikwega abantu benshi.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru i Bulayi 05/10/2019: Griezmann, Neymar, Maddison, Mandzukic, Willian, Odegaard
text: Barcelona irashobora gutanga umusatirizi w'umufaransa Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 28 mu buryo bwo kurondera kwisubiza umukinyi w'imbere wa Brezil Neymar mu mwaka uza, ubu akaba asanzwe akinira Paris St-Germain.  (Le10Sport) Tottenham yashize umukinyi wo hagati wa Leicester City, umwongereza James Maddison w'imyaka 22, kw'isonga ry'urutonde rw'abo irondera, mu ntumbero y'ugusubiriza umukinyi w'umunya Dannemark, Christian Eriksen w'imyaka 27, amasezerano yiwe akazorangira mu mpera z'uyu mwaka w'inkino. (Mirror) Chelsea irafise icizere ko umukinyi w'inyuma  Fikayo Tomori w'imyaka 21, be n'umusatirizi  Tammy Abraham w'imyaka 22,  bazosinya ayandi masezerano  mu ndwi nkeya ziri imbere. Abo bakinyi bompi basanzwe bari ku rutonde rw'umurwi w'Ubwongereza mu nkino z'uku kwezi zo kurondera uburenganzira bw'ugukina ihiganwa ry'imirwi nserukirabihugu ry'i Bulaya (Euro 2020). (Standard) Chelsea iri hafi yo gutangura ibiganiro n'umukinyi w'imbere, umunyabrezili Willian w'imyaka 31, amasezerano yiwe akaba ategekanijwe kurangira mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'uyu mwaka. (Express) Manchester City ivuga ko ata mugambi ifise w'ukurondera  umukinyi wo hagati Martin Odegaard, umunya Norvege w'imyaka 20, asanzwe yatijijwe umurwi Real Sociedad avuye muri Real Madrid. (Manchester Evening News) Umumenyereza wa Manchester City, Pep Guardiola, avuga ko umukinyi wo ku ruhande Kyle Walker w'imyaka 29, ashobora kuronka ikibanza n'aho umukeba wiwe, umunya Portugal Joao Cancelo w'imyaka 25 abandanya avyifatamwo neza.  (Times) Umunyegori wa Liverpool Loris Karius asanzwe yaratijijwe mu murwi Besiktas wo muri Turkiya avuga ko ashobora gusubira gukinira umurwi wiwe  ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka rirangiye. Uyo munyegori w'imyaka 26 avuga kandi ko ashobora  kwimukira mu wundi murwi wo mu Bwongereza canke agasubira mu gihugu ciwe. (Guardian) Umumenyereza wa Everton, Marco Silva , avuga ko umukinyi wo hagati, Anthony Gordon w'imyaka 18, asanzwe akina mu murwi w'Ubwongereza w'abatarenza imyaka 19, ari hafi kuronka ikibanza mu murwi wa mbere wa Everton. (Liverpool Echo) Manchester United  iriko ikurikiranira hagufi umukinyi w'umurwi Club Leon, umunya Mexique Juan Macias w'imyaka 20, asanzwe abonwa nka 'Javier Hernandez'. (Marca via Express) West Ham  iripfuza kuronka umukinyi wo hagati, umunya Bolivia Daniel Camacho w'imyaka 20, asanzwe akina mu murwi Club Aurora. (Diez via Sport Witness) Real Madrid yari yashatse kuzana uwahoze amenyereza Chelsea Antonio Conte ngo ayibere umumenyereza inyuma y'aho yirukaniye Julen Lopetegui mu mwaka uheze, ariko ikaba yagiye guhindura ku mpanuro za kizigenza wayo Sergio Ramos. (Fichajes.net via Mail) Manchester United  irakurikiranira hafi umukinyi wo hagati, umurusiya Aleksandr Sobolev w'imyaka 22 asanzwe akina mu murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Uburusiya, PFC Krylia Sovetov Samara. (Mirror) Ihuriro ry'amashirahamwe muri Mexique, Orlegi Sports risanzwe rirongowe n'umutunzi karuhariwe, Alejandro Irarragorri, ryari hafi kugura umurwi Newcastle mu ci riheze, imbere y'uko rikuramwo akarenge rigahitamwo umurwi Atlas wo muri Mexique.  (Chronicle) Hagati aho, irindi huriro rirongowe n'uwigeze kuba ari umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa w'imirwi Manchester United na Chelsea Peter Kenyon ritegura imiliyoni 300 y'mapawundi kugira rigure Newcastle. (Sun) Umumenyereza wa Anderlecht Vincent Kompany ariko arondera ko yoronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Pays de Galles, Ashley Williams, mu gihe uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 35 akinira Bristol City  azoba arangije amasezerano yiwe mu kwa mbere kuva. (Sun) Uwahoze ari umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Tottenham na Arsenal Sol Campbell hamwe na Henrik Larsson yahoze ari umusatirizi wa Celtic na Barcelona barakoreshejwe ibibazo kugira bafate ikibanza kigaragara c'umumenyereza w'umurwi Southend. (Sky Sports) Umusatirizi w'umunya Croatia, Mario Mandzukic w'imyaka 33 asanzwe ariko aronderwa na Manchester United , ari mu bakinyi batatu bashobora kugurishwa na Juventus mu kwa mbere.  (Calciomercato)

headline: Iran: 'Abanyabulaya icenda' bahagaritswe mu myiyerekano ibandanya
text: Abanyabulaya icenda bahagaritswe mu myiyerekano yo muri Irani yandurutse ku mugore yapfiriye mu gasho, ikaba imaze guhitana abatari bake. Abajejwe igendereza bahagaritse abantu bikekwa ko ari “abakozi b’ibigo vyo mu mahanga bijejwe igendereza” bamwe bari mu myiyerekano nyene, abandi nabo bagakorera binyegeje, nk’uko ibinyamakuru vy’ico gihugu bibivuga. Iyi migumuko nta kintu na kimwe cerekana ko yimirije guhagarara, mu gihe abapfa babandanya biyongera. Iyi migumuko yadutse ku mugwa mukuru Tehran ica ikwira igihugu cose inyuma y’aho umugore w’umu-kurde, Mahsa Amini, apfiriye inyuma y’imisi ari mu gasho k’igipolisi. Uyu mugore w’imyaka 22 ava mu gisagara ca Saqez kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero, yahagaritswe i Tehran ku wa 13 z’uku kw’icenda n’abapolisi bajejwe imico myiza, bamwagiriza ko yahonyanze itegeko risaba abagore gupfuka imishatsi yabo na wa mwambaro wa hijab canke n’igitambara co mu mutwe. Abategetsi ntibavuga aho aba banyabulaya bahagarikiwe ariko batanga uburorero cumi bavuga ko ari ubwo abanyamahanga bagizemwo uruhara hamwe n’imirwi itavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi iri hanze ifise uruhara muri ino myiyerekano. Aba bahagaritswe bava mu bihugu vya Pologne, Suède, Ubudagi, Ubutaliyano, Ubufaransa hamwe n’Ubuholande, nk’uko ubushikiranganji bwa Irani bujejwe igendereza bubivuga. Ibiro vy’ubuserukizi bw’Ubudagi, Ubufaransa, Ubwongereza n’ubwa Suède, biri mu vyagabishijwe ku ruhara rw’abakozi bavyo muri iyi myiyerekano yo kurwanya reta, nk’uko ubu bushikiranganji bubivuga. Buvuga kandi ko imbere be n’igihe c’iyi myiyerekano, habanje kuba izindi nteguro nyinshi mu kuyitegurira canke kugira ngo bihurirane, harimwo ibitero nyabwonko hamwe n’ikwiragizwa “ry’amakuru y’ibinyoma ashigikira imigumuko” buvuga ko vyakorwa n’ibinyamakuru bitegamiye reta, nk’igisata ca BBC gikoresha ururimi rw’igi perse, hamwe na Iran International. Uyu mugore Amini yaguye mw’ibohero yari yatwawemwo kugira ngo “yigishwe” akaba yapfiriye mu bitaro aho yari amaze imisi itatu yataye ubwenge (coma). Umuryango wiwe wemeza ko yakubiswe n’abapolisi ariko igipolisi kibandanya gishimangira ko yapfuye ahitanywe n’indwara y’umutima yamufashe giturumbuka. Iran yagiriza “abansi b’abanyamahanga” ko bafise uruhara mu kaduruvayo kakurikiye, kakaba kamaze guhintana ababarirwa muri mirongo. Mu biharuro vyaryo biheruka vyacishijwe ku rubuga rwa Twitter, ishirahamwe riharanira agateka ka zina muntu, Iran Human Rights (IHR), rifise icicaro muri Norvège/Norway, rivuga riti: "Abantu n’imiburiburi 83, harimwo n’abana, nibo bamaze kwemezwa ko bapfuye muri iyo migumuko ya Iran”. Abandi 19 bavugwa ko bapfuye ejo ku wa gatanu inyuma y’imishamirano hagati y’igipolisi n’abari mu myiyerekano ku kirindiro c’igipolisi i Zahedan, umugwa mukuru w’intara ya Sistan-Baluchistan  iri mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko. Muri aba bapfuye harimwo umukoroneri wo mu gisirikare, nk’uko vyandikwa n’itororokanirizo ry’amakuru AFP, n’aho bitashotse bimenyekana nimba iyi mishamirano ifitaniye isano n’iyo migumuko yatewe n’urupfu rwa Amini. Buramatari w’intara Hossein Khiabani  yabwiye imboneshakure y’igihugu ati: "Abantu 19 barishwe abandi 20 barakomereka muri iyi mishamirano. Uwushinzwe igendereza rya gisirikare mu ntara Koloneli Ali Mousavi nawe nyene yishwe”. Intara ya Sistan-Baluchistan isanzwe ihana urubibe na Afghanistan hamwe na Pakistan ikunze kuberamwo imishamirano n’imirwi y’inkozi z’ikibi idandaza ibiyayuramutwe, hamwe n’inyeshamba zo mu nkehwa z’aba Baluchi hamwe n’imirwi y’intagondwa z’aba Islam bo mw’ishami ry’aba Sunni. Mu gatondo k’ejo ku wa gatanu, ibinyamakuru vya reta vyatangaje ko inzego zijejwe umutekano zarasanye n’abitwaje ibirwanisho bari batye ikirindiro c’igipolisi i Zahedan.

headline: Ukraine ivuga ko Russia yacucagiye za  misire mu buseruko no mu bumanuko
text: Ibitero vya rokete n’ibisasu vya misire vyononye ibitari bike mu bisagara vyo mu buseruko no mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine, nk’uko abategetsi b’akarere babivuga. Abasivire bane barapfuye mu gitero cabaye mu gisagara ca Siversk mu ntara ya  Donetsk, nk’uko buramatari Pavlo Kyrylenko abivuga. Uturere dutuwemwo n’abasivire twa Druzhkivka muri iyi ntara nyene natwo nyene twaratewe. Inyubakwa y’akaguriro yarasambuwe no mu micungararo hasigara ikinogo kinini. BBC ntiyashoboye guhinyuza ibivugwa kuri ibi bitero biheruka. Ingabo z’Uburusiya zirwanira hasi zisa n’izitashoboye gutera intambwe ikomeye mu masaha 24 arangiye mu rugamba rwazo rwo kwigarurira igice gisigaye c’intara ya Donetsk. Abategetsi ba Ukraine kandi bavuga ko ibisasu vya misire vyatewe mu turere twa Kharkiv mu buraruko, Mykolaiv mu bumanuko, na Kryvyi Rih, igisagara kiri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Mykolaiv. Ingabo za Ukraine ziriko zirarwana n’inguvu zazo zose mu gukingira Mykolaiv, igisagara gikomeye kiri ku nkengera  y’uruzi kw’ibarabara rikomeye rija i Odesa, igisagara nyamukuru Ukraine icishako ibidandazwa ishora hanze. Amato y’intambara y’Uburusiya aracabuza Ukraine gushora hanze intete ziva i Odesa. Icegera c’umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ukraine Iryna Vereshchuk asaba abanyagihugu kuva mu duce twigaruriwe n’ingabo z’Uburusiya mu bisagara vya Kherson na Zaporizhzhia mu bumanuko. Aka kamo gasa n’akerekana ko ingabo za Ukraine zoba ziriko zitegura ibindi bitero vyo kwivuna. Abarusiya barigaruriye igisagara ca Kherson, ariko ingabo za Ukraine zarashoboye kwisubiza uduce tumwe tumwe tw’ako karere. Igipolisi muri iyo ntara cagiriza Uburusiya guhonya n’ibigirankana ibiterwa. Mu butumwa cacishije ku rubuga rwa Facebook, cerekana imirima iriko irasha, kikavuga kiti: “Imiriro myinshi yama yaduka uko bukeye uko bwije, amajana n’amajana y’amahegitari y’ingano, hamwe n’izindi ntete aramaze guturirwa”. Cagiriza kandi ingabo z’Uburusiya gusambura ibigega n’ibikoresho vyo mu burimyi, kandi zikanabuza abanyagihugu kuzimya iyi miriro.  I Kryvyi Rih, vya muzinga vyarononye ishure n’inzu y’uburaro, vyica umugore w’imyaka 41, nk’uko bivugwa na buramatari Valentyn Reznichenko. Ubushikiranganji bw’Uburusiya bujejwe kwivuna abansi buvuga ko ingabo zabwo zabomoye ikigangara cari kibitswemwo ibirwanisho vyo mu bwoko bwa M777 vyatanzwe na Amerika i Chasiv Yar hafi ya Kramatorsk. Slovyansk na Kramatorsk vyitezwe kuba ibindi bisagara nyamukuru gukiririmbirwamwo n’Uburusiya muri Donetsk. Amerika ivuga ko igiye kurungikira Ukraine ibindi birwanisho bidahusha bitera ibisasu vya rokete. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine avuga ko ibisasu vya muzinga vyo mu bwoko bwa HIMARS  biriko birakoreshwa mu gutera ububiko bw’ibirwanisho mu turere turi mu minwe y’Uburusiya, ibituma Moscou itoroherwa na gato mu kurungika ibindi. Mu Bwongereza, ibigo vya gisirikare biriko birakoreshwa mu kwigisha ingabo za Ukraine ubuhinga bwo kurwana, nk’uko reta y’Ubwogereza ibivuga. Ni mu ntumbero yo kwigisha abanya-Ukraine 10.000 mu mezi ari imbere. Mu yandi makuru y’igendereza, igisirikare c’Ubwongereza kivuga ko Uburusiya buriko buregeranya izindi ngabo mu gihugu cose buzegereza hafi ya Ukraine mu kwitegurira ibindi bitero.

headline: Coronavirus: OMS iti ‘Afrika ntizoba urubuga rwo kugerageza urucanco urwo ari rwo rwose".
text: Umukuru w'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi,OMS/WHO ariyamiriza amajambo "y'ivanguramoko" yashikirijwe n'abaganga babiri b'Abafaransa aho bavuze ko urucanco rwa covid-19 rwogeragerezwa muri Afrika. Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus arongoye OMS ati: "Afrika ntishobora kuba kandi ntizigera iba urubuga rwo kugeragerezako urucanco urwo ari rwo rwose". Ayo majambo yashikirijwe mu kiganiro caciye kuri televiziyo yarateye icuka kibi, abo baganga bakaba baragirijwe ko bafata Abanyafrika "nk'imbeba z'inzungu". Vyabaye ngomwa ko umwe muri bo asaba imbabazi. Abajijwe ku bijanye n'ivyashikirijwe n'abo baganga mu kiganiro OMS yariko igirana n'abanyamakuru, Dr. Terdros yabonetse ko arakaye, aho yavuze ko ivyo vyerekana  "ivyiyumviro vy'ubukoloni". Ati: "Ni ibintu biteye isoni kandi bibabaje kwumva mu kinjana ca 21 hakiri abahinga bashobora gushikiriza amajambo nk'ayo. Turavyiyamirije twivuye inyuma, kandi turabijeje ko ivyo bitazigera bisubira". Mu kiganiro caciye kuri televiziyo y'abafaransa LCI, ku wa 01 z'uku kwa kane, Dr Camille Locht  ajejwe ubushakashatsi mu kigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu n'ubushakashatsi (Inserm), yariko avuga ibijanye n'igerageza ry'urucanco i Bulaya na Australia. Niho rero Dr Jean-Paul Mira, ajejwe kuvura indembe ku bitaro vya Coshin i Paris yinamura akavuga ati: "Ngerageje kuvuga mu majambo yo nyayo, kubera iki tutogeragereza urwo rucanco muri Afrika, ahantu ata dutambara two kwikingira bafise, ata miti bafise, ata n'uburyo bafise bwo gutabara indembe?" "Erega ni nk'uko bisanzwe bigenda ahandi mu bushakashatsi bumwe bumwe kuri SIDA. Nko mu ba maraya, turahakorera igerageza kuko tuzi ko ari bo babangamiwe kandi kubera tuzi ko batikingira". Niho muganga Locht, yaca ashigikira mugenziwe, muganga Mira, avuga ati: "Uvuze ukuri, turategekanya ubushakashatsi nk'ubwo bwokorwa no muri Afrika". Imbere y'aho, muganga Mira yari yerekanye amakenga kuri iryo gerageza ririko riraba, avuga ko atizeye ko bashobora gushika ku vyo bipfuza muri Australia n'i Bulaya kubera bobo bafise ibikoresho vyo kwikingira iyo bari ku kazi. Ayo majambo yatumye Abanyafrika mu bice vyose vy'uwo mugabane bashangashirwa, harimwo n'uwahoze ari umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru, Didier Drogba, yavuze ko ayo majambo ari ayo ivanguramoko rishingiye ku rukoba. Yavuze kandi ati: "Kirazira ko abanya Afrika bafatwa nk'imbeba! Ako ni akagaye". Mugenziwe Samuel Eto'o nawe nyene yahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa umupira w'amaguru, wewe yavuze ko abo baganga ari "abicanyi". Amajambo y'abo baganga kandi yongereje ubwoba bwari busanzwe buhari muri Afrika ko Abanyafrika bashobora gufatwa nk'imbeba z'inzungu bakageragerezwako urucanco rushasha rwa coronavirus.

headline: Intambara hagati ya Ethiopia na Tigray: Kubera iki isi yose ifise impungenge
text: Umunyamabanga wa Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire Antony Blinken ari mu rugendo muri Kenya, aho yiteze kuganira n'abategetsi bayo ibijanye n'intambara yo mu gihugu kibanyi ca Ethiopia. Amerika n'Ubwongereza vyaramaze gusaba abanyagihugu bavyo kuva muri Ethiopia kandi ko indege zo kubibafashamwo ziteguye, nk'uko bivugwa n'umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza. Aka kamo, akamo kibutsa Kabul mu kw'umunani guheze, gatewe mu gihe inyeshamba zo mu ntara ya Tigray yo mu buraruko ziboneka ko zishobora kwinjira ku mugwa mukuru, Addis Ababa. Inyuma y'umwaka wose iyi ntambara imaze, ikaba inateye ikibazo c'ibikorwa vy'ubutabazi, impungenge z'amakungu zigenda ziyongera cane. Afrika na Amerika zibandanya zita ku rutare mu gihe ibiriko bibera muri Ethiopia bifise ingaruka zikomeye mu karere kose no mu bindi bice vy'isi. Ibiharuro vyonyene birateye ubwoba. Abantu n'imiburiburi 400.000 mu buraruko bw'igihugu bahanzwe na kigoyi, mu gihe ibice 80% vy'imiti nkenerwa atayiriho, abantu barenga imiriyoni zibiri nabo bakaba barataye izabo. Reta y'igihugu iragirizwa kubuza n'ibigirankana ko imfashanyo zishika mu ntara ya Tigray, ivyo yoyo ihakana. Hejuru y'ibi, hari ivyemezo vy'ubwicanyi ndengerabutungane, iyicarubozo n'ivyo gufata abagore ku nguvu vyagirizwa impande zompi. Ariko kandi hari n'izindi nyungu zikomeye. Ethiopia, igihugu giharurwamwo abantu imiriyoni 110 kikaba kiza ku mwanya ugira kabiri muri Afrika, gisanzwe ari incuti ikomeye y'ibihugu vyo mu burengero bw'isi muri ako karere karangwamwo umutekano ukunze guhungabana. Hari amakenga ko iyi ntambara ishobora guteza umudugararo muri iki gihugu kirangwamwo amoko menshi ugashobora mbere no gutuma gisambuka. Bibaye ngombwa ko imiriyoni z'abantu zihunga mu gihe intambara zoba ndanse, ibihugu bibanyi bishobora kuhagirira ingorane. Ethiopia ni igihugu kidafise umuhora ugishikana kw'ibahari, ikaba ihana urubibe n'ibihugu bitandatu, bibiri muri vyo birangwamwo umutekano muke - Sudani y'Epfo na Somalia - ikindi naco, Sudan, kikaba kivugwamwo coup d'Etat, aho igisirikare giherutse gutembagaza ubutegetsi. Ifise abasirikare mu ngabo za Afrika zagiye kurwanya intagondwa ziyitirira idini rya Islam muri Somalia, aha rero hakaba hari ubwoba ko ishobora kubatahukana mu gihe vyoba nkenerwa. Imbere y'uko ava muri uru rugendo, Blinken agabisha ko uyu mudugararo ushobora "guteza akaga gakomeye ku banyagihugu ba Ethiopia hamwe no mu karere kose". Ingabo za Eritrea zisanzwe ziriko zirarwana muri Ethiopia, mu gihe rero iyi ntambara yobandanya n'ibindi bihugu bibanyi bishobora kwinjiramwo. Ariko n'ibihugu vya kure navyo nyene biravugwa ko vyoba vyaramaze kwinjira muri yo. Mu kwezi guheze, itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ryavuze ko Turukiya yemeye guha Ethiopia za ndege za gisirikare zitagira abadereva, zizwi nka drones. Ibi biteje impungenge ku migenderanire hagati ya Turukiya na Misiri isanzwe iri mu mpari na Ethiopia ku bijanye na rwa rugomero rwa rutura ruriko rurubakwa ku ruzi Nil, nk'uko Reuters ibivuga. Ethiopia kandi imaze kugura ibirwanisho mu Bushinwa no muri Irani, aho indege ziva muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu (Emirats Arabes Unis/United Arab Emirates) ari zo ziriko zirakoreshwa mu kubishikana mu gihugu, nk'uko bivugwa n'urubuga ngurukanabumenyi Oryx rusanzwe rutangaza amakuru ajanye n'ivyo kwivuna abansi. Kuri Amerika, Ethiopia ni incuti ya kera yizigiwe cane, cane cane mu citwa Urugamba rwo kurwanya Iterabwoba. Ethiopia iri mu ntambara n'intagondwa ziyitirira idini rya Islam muri Somalia, ikaba yaranemereye Amerika gukoresha ikirere cayo muri ya ntambara ya Irak. Iri mu bihugu bike vya Afrika vyifatanije na Amerika mu runani mpuzamakungu rwari rurongowe na Amerika muri iyi ntambara ya Irak. Ubutegetsi butajegajega muri Ethiopia bwagize uruhara runini muri ubu bucuti. Amerika irabushigikiza imfashanyo y'amafaranga, aho hagati y'imyaka ya 2016 na 2020 yabuhaye imiriyaridi 4.2 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Ariko intumwa ya Amerika mu karere, Jeffrey Feltman, ntarya umunwa mu kunegura reta y'igihugu, akavuga ko poritike yayo yatumye igihugu giterwa n'inzara, akayigereranya n'ubutegetsi bwa Bashar al-Assad muri Syria. Inyuma y'aho abarwanyi b'umuhari Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) bateye basugereza umugwa mukuru kw'ibarabara rikuru riva mu buraruko rija i Addis Abeba, icuka caraduze bikomeye. Amerika yarateye akamo abanyagihugu bayo kuva muri Ethiopia, umushikiranganji wa mbere nawe, Abiy Ahmed, atangaza ibihe bidasanzwe, aca atera akamo ko abanyagihugu binjira mu gisirikare. Abategetsi ba Addis Ababa basavye abanyagihugu kwandikisha ibirwanisho vyabo bakitegurira kurwanya inyeshamba. Hari kandi uwundi muhari w'inyeshamba wishize hamwe na TPLF uriko usugereza umugwa mukuru. Icuka kibi muri iki gisagara carunyuwe n'uko gituwemwo n'amoko menshi, mbere bamwe bakagiriza ubutegetsi ko butoteza abanya Tigray bahagarikwa agasakisaki. Ariko abarwanyi ba Tigray baracari kure, ku birometero birenga 300 uvuye mu gisagara - mu micungararo y'igisagara ca Kombolcha. Tibor Nagy yahoze ari icegera c'umunyamabanga wa reta ya Amerika muri Afrika, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ntabwo ari ba Batalibani bagenda bifatira ibisagara uko bashatse muri Afghanistani ata n'urusoro na rumwe rurashwe". "Aho TPLF ikorera hari intambara zikomeye...Addis Ababa ishobora gusesekamwo amaraso ateye ubwoba". Yemeza ko ivyo gufata umugwa mukuru biriko bikoreshwa mu gutera ubwoba co kimwe n'uko igihugu gifise ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda vy'ubumara cogira mu gutera ubwoba ko kigomba kibirekure. TPLF ivuga ko ico yipfuza ari ukwugurura inzira kugira ngo imfashanyo zishobore kwinjira muri Tigray. Umuvugizi wayo, Getachew Reda, yabwiye ikiganiro Focus on Africa ca BBC ati: "Tuzobandanya urugamba [dusugereza Addis Ababa]… ariko ikituraje ishinga si Addis Abeba kuko dushaka kugondoza Abiy ngo yugurure inzira". Reta ya Ethiopia yaramaze gutangaza TPLF nk'umuhari w'iterabwoba, umushikiranganji wa mbere nawe akaba yariyemeje kuyirwanya. Mu ntango z'uku kwa mbere, Abiy yavuze ati: "Tuzohamba uyu mwansi n'amaraso n'amagufa yacu kugira ngo tugarukane icubahiro ca  Ethiopia". Amakenga ni uko iyi ntambara iriko irafata iyindi ntera kandi bikazogenda bigorana ko hagira uruhande rwemera gusubira inyuma. Hari kandi n'ubwoba ko iyi ntambara ishobora gukwira mu gihugu cose. TPLF yarishize hamwe n'iyindi mirwi itari mike irwanya reta mu runani rushasha rurondera kurandurana n'imizi ubutegetsi bwa Abiy. Intumwa y'Ubumwe bwa Afrika muri ako karere, Olusegun Obasanjo yahoze arongoye Nigeria, avuga ko hakiri "akadirisha gato k'amahirwe". Amaze kuganira n'impande zompi mu rugendo aherukamwo muri Ethiopia, yabwiye inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano ati: "Igihe ni gito ku mfashanyo iyo ari yo yose". Atera akamo ko hoba ibiganiro vy'amahoro kugira ngo batorere umuti iyi ntambara bagatora inyishu biciye mu nzira y'amahoro, n'aho ataravuga ingene vyogenda. Inyishu itangwa n'uwuserukira Ethiopia mw'ishirahamwe ONU irerekana ibibazo abahuza bashobora kugira. Avuga ko yubaha aka kamo ariko akabandanya avuga ko TPLF ari "umurwi w'inkozi z'ikibi". Aho nyene, umuvugizi wa TPLF, Getachew, wewe yanditse ku rubuga rwa Twitter ko "utwigoro hafi twose tw'amahoro" turondera kurokora  [Umushikiranganji wa mbere] Abiy, aho kurondera gutorera umuti ibibazo nyamukuru vya poritike bihanze igihugu". Ibi birumvikana ko ibiganiro vyo guhagarika intambara biri hagati y'impande zankana urunuka. Nagy avuga ko imwe mu nzira yotuma impande zompi zicara zikaganira ari uko Amerika n'Ubushinwa vyompi, biri kumwe n'ibindi nka za Turukiya, vyokorera hamwe. Ati: "Abiy ntashobobora guhangana na Amerika n'Ubushinwa mu gihe vyoba bivuga rumwe". Avuga ko ikintu ca mbere ari ugukora kugira ngo intambara zihagarare hanyuma imfashanyo zigashikira abo zigenewe, hanyuma buke buke hagatorwa inzira za poritike. Umuzi w'iyi ntambara ni ukutumvikana hagati y'umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy na TPLF, umugambwe wamaze hafi imyaka 27 ari wo urongoye igihugu cose, atari Tigray gusa. Umushikiranganji Abiy yashitse ku butegetsi mu 2018 inyuma y'imyiyerekano y'urutavanako yakozwe n'abo mu bwoko bw'aba Oromo. Aba Oromo - ubwoko bunini gusumba ubundi bwose muri Ethiopia - bwumva ko bwari bumaze igihe kirekire bwarakumiriwe. Abiy we nyene ubwiwe umu-Oromo kandi akaba ari mu runani rurongoye igihugu, yaboneka nk'umuntu ashobora gutorera umuti iki kibazo. Mu rukurikirane rw'impinduka, aho yatanze uburenganzira bwa poritike mbere akagiriranira amasezerano y'amahoro na Eritrea inyuma y'imyaka itari mike ibi bihugu vyari bimaze birabana urunuka, TPLF yashizwe ku ruhande. Icuka kibi cari hagati ya TPLF na Abiy cagiye kwadukamwo intambara mu mezi 12 aheze, igihe ingabo za Tigray zagirijwe ko zateye ibirindiro vy'igisirikare c'igihugu kugira ngo zinyage ibirwanisho, ariho reta y'igihugu nayo yaca yihora.

headline: DR Congo: WHO mw'itohoza ku bakozi bayo baregwa amabi ku bagore mu gihe barwanya Ebola
text: Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO ryemeye ko rigiye gukora amatohoza ku bakozi bari bajejwe kurwanya ikiza ca Ebola muri Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo bavugwa ko boba barakoreye vya mfurambi abagore. Abakozi ba OMS/WHO hamwe n'abandi b'amashirahamwe y'abagiraneza baragirijwe n'abagore 50 mu matohoza yakorewe hamwe n'amatororokanirizo abiri y'amakuru. Abagore bo mu burere bariko bakoreramwo bavuga ko bahawe ibinyobwa, baterwa mu mavuriro, maze bategekwa gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina, mbere babiri muri bo bakaba baratewe inda. Ibi bivugwa ko vyoba vyakozwe hagati ya 2018 n'ukwa gatatu uno mwaka wa 2020. Amatororokanirizo abiri y'amakuru, New Humanitarian, hamwe na Thomson Reuters Foundation amaze hafi umwaka wose akora amatohoza. OMS ivuga ko itegerezwa gukora "amatohoza yimbitse" kuri ibi birego bitegerezwa. Mw'itangazo yasohoye, OMS ivuga iti: "Umuntu uwo ari we wese azoboneka ko yagize uruhara azobibazwa, kandi abone n'ingaruka mbi yavyo, harimwo no kwirukanwa ubwo nyene". "Guhemukira abanyagihugu turiko turafasha birahanwa". Ishirahamwe ONU hamwe n'amahirahamwe y'abagiraneza yaratangaje ko atazigera yihanganira ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina inyuma y'ibirego bisa n'ibi ku bakozi babo bo mu bindi bihugu. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire y'Ubwongereza avuga ko bazokwihweza neza ibizova mu matohoza ya OMS. Ati: "Ugusambanya n'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina ni ikibi kibishe. Igihe cose twama dusuzuma abafatanyabikorwa bacu bose ku bijanye n'inyifato itegerezwa kubaranga". Abaregwa n'aya matohoza gusumba abandi? Abavugwa hafi bose muri ibi bikorwa vy'ubusambanyi n'uguhohotera abagore ni abagabo, harimwo n'abaganga, bavugwa ko bakorera ishirahamwe OMS. N'imiburiburi abagore 30 nibo babagirije nk'uko aya matororokanirizo y'amakuru abivuga. Abandi benshi bagirizwa ni abagabo bavugwa ko bakomoka mu bushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu bwa Congo, aho bagirizwa n'abagore umunani. Hari n'ayandi mashirahamwe abiri yegukira ishirahamwe ONU, hamwe n'amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu y'abagiraneza ane, nayo nyene aravugwa muri iki cegeranyo. Bamwe mu bagabo bagirizwa ibi bavuye mu Bubirigi, Burkina Faso, Canada, Ubufaransa, Guinea-Conakry hamwe na Cote d'Ivoire. Benshi muri bo baranse no kwambara udukingirizo, abagore n'imiburiburi babiri bakavuga ko batewe inda basambanijwe, nk'uko aya matororokanirizo y'amakuru abivuga. Umugore w'imyaka 25 yari afise akazi ko gukora isuku yasubiwemwo amajambo avuga ko yatumiwe muhira ku muganga wa OMS kugira ngo bavugane ingene ashobora kumuronderera akandi kazi kisumbuye. Uyu mugore ati: "Yaciye yugara umuryango aca ambwira ati: 'Ubanza kwemera ikintu kimwe. Tubanza kuryamana ubu nyene',". "Yaciye atangura kunyambura impuzu. Naciye nigira inyuma ariko arabandanya ankura impuzu. Naciye ntangura kurira antegeka kunuma...ntiyahagaritse. Niho nugurura umuryango nca ndiruka". Uwundi mugore w'imyaka 32 yarokotse Ebola yabwiye aya matororokanirizo y'amakuru ko yatumiwe mw'ihoteli kugira ngo agirwe inama y'ingene akwiye kwifata. Mu kumuhenda, bamuhaye ikinyobwa. Avuga ko yagiye kwikangura haciye amasaha, asanga ari gusa kandi wenyene mu cuma c'iyo hoteli, avuga ko yasambanijwe ku nguvu. Kubera iki aba bagore bakorewe vya mfura mbi? Benshi muri abo bagore bavuga ko bategetswe gusambanywa kugira bahabwe akazi. Abagore bavuga babasanga mu maduka manini mu gisagara ca Beni kiri mu buseruko bwa Congo, mu bigo bishinzwe kurondera akazi, hamwe no ku mavuriro, amahanikwa intonde z'abashoboye guhabwa akazi. Umugore umwe yasubiwemwo amajambo aho avuga ati: "Ingeso y'abagabo yo gusaba igitsina  imaze kumenyerwa cane ku buryo aribwo buryo bwonyene bwo guhabwa akazi". Abarenga 2,000 nibo bahitanywe na Ebola muri Congo. OMS yafashe iya mbere mu twigoro tw'amakungu two kurwanya iki kiza, mu kwa gatandatu kw'uyu mwaka ikaba yatangaje ko caheze.

headline: Coronavirus: Prezida Jair Bolsonaro wa Brazil yayanduye - amakuru avugwa n'ahandi
text: Inyishu z'ibipimo vyafashwe ejo ku wa mbere ku mukuru w'igihugu ca Brazil Jair Bolsonaro zerekana ko yamaze kwandura umugera  wa coronavirus. Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa kabiri niho hari hitezwe inyishu z'ivyo bipimo inyuma y'aho yumvise ibimenyetso vy'iyo ndwara. Bwana Bolsonaro azwi ko yafashe minenerwe uwo mugera mu gihe Brazil ari co gihugu kiza ubwa kabiri kw'isi mu bihugu bifise abawurwaye benshi. Wewe yivugira ko kubona yarashoboye gusimba urupfu igihe aterwa ari mu myiyamamazo mu 2018, "adashobora guterwa ubwoba n'ako gacurane gato". Ejo ku wa mbere yahagaritse ingingo yategeka Abanyabrazil kwambara udupfukamunwa mu mabohero arimwo abapfungwa benshi. Mu Bwongereza, ibice bitatu vya bine vy'abantu - 78% - nta bimenyetso vya coronavirus berekana kandi bapimwe bagasanga baranduye, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'ibiharuro bitangwa n'ikigo kijejwe rusansuma. Ivyo biharuro, vyabonetse inyuma y'aho bapimiye abantu mu kivunga babasanze mu mihana yabo muri ico gihugu.
