Mu ndwi zibiri ziheze ibiharuro vy'abandura vyasubiye kwiyongera mu gisagara ca Melbourne, ivyatumye batekerwa n'ubwoba. Mu kwikingira, abanyagihugu baciye batangura guhagarika ingendo mu zindi ntara, bavuga bati "ni vyiza ko twobanza tukarindira kugira ngo turabe". Imbere y'aho, abayagihugu ba Australia bari biteze ko bashobora kurandurana n'imizi ico kiza, inyuma y'aho bamariye ikiringo c'ukwezi kwose atawusohoka. Ariko, ku ncuro ya mbere muri ico gihugu, biboneka ko iriko ikwirakwira mu kibano. Mu mpera z'indwi iheze, abanduye bararenze 100, uno munsi naho hafi abagera ku 200 ni bo banduye. Ku muhingamo w'uno munsi niho ingingo ya guma mu rugo yasubira gutangazwa, inyuma y'indwi nkeya basubiye mu mwidegemvyo. Ubu ikiriho, ni uko abaja gusuma bariko bacanacanako. Babona ko iyi ngingo izobakorako cane, haba mu mubereho canke mu butunzi. Ikibabaje gusumba ni uko ico gisagara ari co conyene gikozweko n'iyo ngingo kuko ibindi bice vy'igihugu bisa n'ivyanesheje coronavirus canke umurindi ukagabanuka bimwe biboneka. Amategeko mashasha asaba ko abantu bari mu mazu y'ubunywero n'ayo uburiro batandukana n'imiburiburi imetero yatanguye gushirwa mu ngiro muri Suède. Imbere y'aho, abarongoye igisata c'amagara y'abantu ntiberekana neza ingene abantu bakwiye gutandukana, n'aho abari bafise ibibanza baranguriramwo imirimo bahimirizwa kwigisha abantu gutandukana no kwirinda kuja mu kirwi. Abategetsi ba Suède baraneguwe kubera batari bashoboye gutanga neza impanuro z'ingene abantu bakwiye gutandukana. Kuva kuri uyu wa kabiri rero, abategetsi b'uburere bahawe itegeko ryo kwugara ayo mazu atazoba yakurijie ingingo yo gutandukana n'imiburiburi imetero imwe. Mu minsi iheze, abagenduzi b'igisata kijejwe ibidukikije barazungurutse mu bisagara bikuru bikuru baraba ko abantu bakurikiza ingingo yo gutandukana. Barugaje vy'agateganyo amazu arangurirwamwo imirimo ashika 40 kubera ukurundana kw'abantu vyatera impungenge ko vyari gutuma banduzanya. Abanduye umugera wa coronavirus muri Afrika y'Epfo uno munsi barenze 200,000. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu w'ico gihugu, Zweli Mkhize, avuga ko intara zine zishobora kubona ibitigiri birenze - akongerako y'uko zishobora gufatirwa ingingo za guma mu rugo. Intara zibangamiwe cane ni Gauteng, Western Cape, Eastern Cape hamwe na KwaZulu-Natal. Ku munsi ku munsi abantu baharurwa mu bihumbi ni bo bandura mu gihugu. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu avuga ko ibintu vyari kwunyuka iyo ico gihugu kidafata ingingo za guma mu rugo. Afrika y'Epfo iriko igenda itezura ingingo yafashe mu ntumbero yo kuzibira ikwirakwira rya coronavirus, zimwe muri zo zikaba zijanye no gusubira kwugurura amashure. Ico gihugu kiri mu bindi biriko birageragereza ku bantu urucanco rwa Covid-19 rwakorewe kuri Kaminuza ya Oxford mu Bwongereza. Hafi imiliyoni 11 z'abanyeshure b'Abashinwa batanguye mu bwoba bwinshi ibibazo vy'iminsi ibiri muri ico gihugu bitanga uburenganzira bwo kuja kuri kaminuza, inyuma y'uko vyungurujwe mu kiringo c'ukwezi kubera coronavirus. Ivyo bibazo bifise kugora cane kubera amashure mu gihugu cose yari yugawe igihe uwo mugera wizizira ico gihugu mu ntango z'uno mwaka. Ibinyamakuru vya leta bivuga ko zimwe mu ngingo zafashwe muri ico kiringo c'ibibazo ari ukwongereza ivyumba vyo gukoreramwo kugira ngo abanyeshure bashobore gutandukana bikwiye, gupima abigisha n'abahagarikizi, hamwe rero no gupima abanyeshure. Abanyepolitike n'abigisha baranegura ingingo yo kwaka uburenganzia bwo kuba muri ico gihugu ku banyeshure b'abanyamahanga inyuma y'ingingo yo kwigishirizwa ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi. Igisata kijejwe uruja n'uruza muri Amerika (ICE) kivuga ko hari abantu bashobora gusubizwa iwabo kiretse  bimukiye ku mashure yigishiriza mu masomero. Hari amashure atari make muri ico gihugu ariko yihweza ingene mu mwaka w'ishure uza bokwigishiriza ku buhinga ngurukanabumenyi kubera coronavirus. Ntibiboneka neza igitigiri c'abanyeshure bazokorwako n'iyo ngingo. Ayo makuru atangajwe ku munsi nyene ishure kaminuza rya Havard ritangarijeko ko ivyigwa vyose bizokwigishirizwa ku buhinga ngurukanabumenyi mu mwaka uza, harimwo mbere no ku banyeshure bakeya basanzwe bemerewe kuba mu ndaro. Umukenguzamateka Elizabeth Warren wo mu mugambwe w'aba Democrates ati: "Kwirukana abanyeshure b'abanyamahanga muri kino gihe c'ikiza gihanze isi yose ni uguhohotera abanyeshure". "Nta shingiro bifise, ni ubukozi bw'ikibi kandi bwerekana urwanko ku banyamahanga". Eka na Samantha Power yahoze aserukira ico gihugu mw'ishirahamwe ONU ni uko nyene, aho avuga ko iyo ngingo ata shingiro ifise kandi ko kwigishiriza ku buryo ngurukanabumenyi bitazokunda ku mashure hafi yose. Umunyamakuru Elizabeth Spiers, asanzwe yigisha kw'ishure kaminuza rya New York, avuga ko iyo ngingo itazokwohoreza benshi bari basanzwe barihirwa n'amaleta yabo, kubera ubutandukanye bw'amasaha hagati ya Amerika n'ibihugu bakomokamwo.

headline: Umugabo acuraranga urumbete akoresheje amano
text: Felix Klieser ni umunyamuziki yavutse atagira amaboko. Uwo mudagi w’imyaka 30 akoresha ukuguru kumwe mu kuvuza urumbete. Ubu ari kumwe na korale Bournemouth Symphony, imwe mu zikomeye cane mu Bwongereza. Felix azoguma akorana ibiteramo na bo muri iyi myaka ibiri iri imbere.

headline: Mboma na Masilingi bo muri Namibia bompi ntawuzokwiruka 400m muri olympic kubera testosterone nyinshi
text: Umukobwa w'umuyabaga wo muri Namibia  Christine Mboma - yaciye umuhingo wa metero 400 wari umaze imyaka 30 - mu batarenza imyaka 20 ku wa gatatu - yavuye mu bazohiganwa kuri uwo mwanya mu nkino za olympic za Tokyo kuko basanze umubiri wiwe ufise inkabuzo/umusemburo kamere wa testosterone uri ku rugero rurenze urwemerwa n'urwego ruraba izo nkino kw'isi,  World Athletics. Umwanya wari wagizwe n'uwo mukobwa w'imyaka 18 Mboma ku wa gatatu mu gisagara co muri Pologne ca  Bydgoszcz waza ubigira ndwi mu myanya mito ku 400m wirutswe n'umugore gushika ubu - ukaba wamuha amahirwe yo kuronka umudari w'inzahabu kuri izo metero i Tokyo. Ariko komite ya olympic ya Namibia (NNOC - CGA) yemeje ko abo bakobwa bompi batazoshobora guhiganwa kuri izo metero kubera amategeko ya  World Athletics ku bagore bari mu mugwi w'abafise  "Differences of Sexual Development", canke DSD, inyuma yo gupimwa n'urwo rwego. NNOC -CGA yavuze mw'itangazo ko  "bikenewe cane ko abantu bumva ko abo banonotsi bompi atawari azi ko afise ico kibazo. Nta n'uwo mu muryango yari abizi, naho n'umumenyereza wabo canke NNOC -CGA." Mboma yari amaze umwaka atera imbere bigaragara, agumya asumvya aho yari amaze kugera, anaca imihigo mu gihugu,  ku mugabane mbere no kw'isi ku metero 400. Umwanya wiwe w'amasekunda 48.54 -hafi ica cenda kuri cumi (9/10) wihuse kurusha umwanya wa mbere  mwiza wari uhari gushika ubu wagizwe n'umudagikazi wo mu buseruko  Gritt Breur mu 1991 - wari muto cane ku buryo ubwo nyene yaciye aba umwe mu bohiganiwe umudari w'inzahabu na cane ko muri iyo ndwi uwundi mukeba kuri izo metero, Salwa Eid Naser wo muri Bahrain, yari yafatiwe ibihano vy'imyaka ibiri kubera kurenga ku mategeko yo gufata imiti yongereza inguvu zo kwiruka. Ariko uko gutera imbere cane kwatumye World Athletics imukurikiranira hafi, ica isaba ko hasuzumwa  ibipimo vya mbere vyari vyakorewe muri Namibia. Ibindi bipimo vyaciye bikorwa mur iyi ndwi aho bompi Mboma na Masilingi bagirira imyimenyerero ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubutariano Roma, ''inyishu ikaba yaje ivuga ko abo banonotsi bompi umubiri wabo usanzwe ufise inkabuzo kamere za testosterone zirenze urugero". Itangazo ry'urwego rwa Namibia rujejwe inkino za olympic rivuga ko "NNOC -CGA n'umuganga wacu aguma avugana n'umuganga wa World Athletics ku vyerekeye ibigiye gukurikira kuri abo banonostsi babiri." "Tuzokwihweza inkuru zose. Turizeye kazoza kabo nk'abanonostsi bo mu rwego rwo hejuru. Christine na Beatrice bompi bazoshobora guhiganwa ku metero 100 na 200. "Umumenyereza ariteguye kubandanya akorana n'abo bakobwa kuri izo metero mu gihe tukiraba ikigiye gukurikira." Mboma na Masilingi bompi bazohiganwa ubwa mbere mu nkino za olympic i Tokyo mu Buyapani, aho izo nkino zitegekanijwe hagati y'itariki 23 ukwezi kw'indwi n'itari 8 ukwezi kw'umunani. World Athletics irabuza abagore bari mu mugwi wa DSD guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya metero 400 na mile imwe (1,6km) mu mugwi w'abagore kiretse babanje gufata imiti igabanya urugero rw'inkabuzo ya testosterone. Ni co cakuye  umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba, umunya-Afrika y'Epfo Caster Semenya n'umunya-Kenya Margaret  Wambui mw'ihiganwa ku metero 800 mu  nkino za Tokyo. Uko ari batatu nibo bari baronse imidari kuri izo metero mu nkino za Rio mu 2016. Francine Niyonsaba ubu azogeragaza amahirwe yiwe ku metero 5,000 mu gihe  Caster Semenya we vyamunaniye kuronka umwanya usabwa kugira aronke uburenganzira bwo guhiganwa kuri izo metero mu nkino za Tokyo. World Athletics ivuga ko urugero runini rw'iyo nkabuzo rwongereza  kutaruha no gukomera kw'imitsi bigaha amahirwe abafise ururi hejuru cane kurusha abandi. Caster Semenya amaze igihe  yarajanye urubanza muri sentare kugira iyo ngingo ivanweho, ubu akaba arugejeje muri sentare ya Buraya yubahiriza agateka ka zina muntu. Avuga ati: ''Iyo ngingo nta nsiguro igira. Nzoguma ngwanira uburenganzira bwanje."

headline: Abantu bashika 30 bahitanywe n'ibisasu hirya no hino muri Afuganisitani
text: Abantu bashika 30 bahitanywe n'urukurikirane rw'ibisasu vyaturikiye mu mpande zitandukanye z'igihugu ca Afuganisitani. Abashika ku munani baguye ku murwa mukuru Kabul, igihe ibisasu bitatu vyaturika bikurikirana mu mwanya muto. Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati bwavuze ko mu gitero kimwe, umwiyahuzi yagereye ibisi yari itwaye abakozi ba leta. Mu ntara ya Takhar, mu buraruko bwa Kabul, igitero c'aba Taliban kuri bariyeri zibiri cahitanye abapolisi batandatu, nayo i Nangarhar, abandi bantu indwi bahitwanywe n'igisasu caturikiye mu mpande z'ibarabara. Abahinga mu vy'umutekano bavuga ko ibitero vy'aba Taliban bigenda biraba vyinshi kugira biyongere igihagararo mu gihe bari mu biganiro na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.

headline: Kidum nawe yasohoye indirimbo ihimiriza kwirinda coronavirus
text: Umuririmvyi Jean Pierre Nimbona, Kidum, nawe yasohoye indirimbo ihimiriza kwirinda coronavirus. Abajijwe igituma yasohoye  iyi ndirimbo Kidum yagize: "Ni kubera ari ikiza kuri ubu kibangamiye isi yose kandi caduteye umutima uhagaze twese". Umviriza iyo ndirimbo aho hejuru.

headline: US: Uko abategetsi bamwe barimo n'uw'u Burundi bakiriye intsinzi ya Joe Biden
text: Kuva Joe Biden yatangazwa ko yatsindiye kuba Perezida w'Amerika - na Kamala Harris akaba Visi Perezida we, ubutumwa bw'abategetsi batandukanye ku isi bwakomeje kwisukiranya - bwinshi muri bwo bw'abishimiye intsinzi ye.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Bellingham, Fofana, Dembele, Alaba, Mbappe, Neymar
text: Chelsea iripfuza kugura umukinyi wo hagati umwongereza Jude Bellingham w'imyaka 17 akina muri Borussia Dortmund iyi nayo ikaba imushakako imiriyoni zirenga 138 z'amadorari ya Amerika. (Eurosport) Manchester United iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Leicester City, umufaransa Wesley Fofana w'imyaka 20. (Foot Mercato - in French) Liverpool iripfuza kugura umukinyi w'imbere wa Barcelona  umufaransa Ousmane Dembele w'imyaka 23 kugira asubirire umunya Senegal Sadio Mane w'imyaka 29. (Fichajes - in Spanish) Arsenal iripfuza umukinyi w'imbere wa  Inter Milan  umunya Uruguay Martin Satriano w'imyaka 20, akaba kandi ariko aronderwa na  Chelsea hamwe na Manchester City. (Mail) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Bayern Munich umunya Autriche David Alaba w'imyaka 28 ashobora kuja gukinira Real Madrid mu ci riza ataco irinze gutanga, ariko uyu murwi wo muri Espagne ntaco wipfuza gutangaza imbere y'uko ihiganwa ry'uyu mwaka rirangira. (Marca) Manchester City iriteguye kugiriranira ayandi masezerano n'umukinyi Phil Foden, umwongereza w'imyaka 20 akina hagati, amasezerano azotuma ahembwa ibihumbi birenga 138 vy'amadorari ya Amerika ku ndwi. (Mirror) Tottenham iripfuza umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Barcelona umunya Bresil Emerson w'imyaka 22 ubu asanzwe akina muri Real Betis, aho yatijijwe. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Umumenyereza wa Paris St-Germain Mauricio Pochettino arizeye ko abakinyi Neymar, umunya Bresil w'imyaka 29, hamwe na  Kylian Mbappe, umufaransa w'imyaka 22, bazoguma muri uyo murwi.  (Cadena SER - in Spanish) Real Madrid irashaka kugurisha mu ci riza umukinyi w'imbere Gareth Bale w'imyaka 31 akomoka muri Pays de Galles (Wales), ubu akaba akina muri Tottenham, iyo yatijijwe, hamwe n'umufaransa akina inyuma Raphael Varane, w'imyaka 27, kugira ngo ishobore kuronka amafaranga yo kugura Mbappe hamwe n'umusatirizi Erling Braut Haaland, umunya Norvege w'imyaka 20 akina muri  Borussia Dortmund. (Marca) Umunya  Uruguay Lucas Torreira w'imyaka  25 akina muri Arsenal, ariko ubu akaba akina muri Atletico Madrid iyo yatijijwe, avuga ko yipfuza kuja gukina muri Boca Juniors ku ntizo. (Perfil Bulos) Umukuru wa Barcelona Joan Laporta avuga ko yizeye neza ko umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Argentina Lionel Messi ubu afise 33 yipfuza kuguma muri uyo murwi.  (Deportes Cuatro - in Spanish) West Ham ifise amahirwe menshi yo kugura umusatirizi wa Celtic umufaransa Odsonne Edouard w'imyaka 23 mu gihe hari ibihuha ko Leicester nayo nyene yoba iriko iramwiyumvirako. (Football Insider) Umukinyi w'imbere wa Eintracht Frankfurt Andre Silva w'imyaka 25 asanzwe ariko aronderwa na Manchester United hamwe na Atletico Madrid, nta gice kiri mu masezerano yiwe kimuha uburenganzira bwo kugenda.  (Goal) Barcelona nayo nyene yariko irondera Silva ariko yafashe ingingo yo kuvyihoza.  (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Liverpool yumva ko idashaka guhindura aho ihagaze mu biganiro irimwo n'umukinyi wo hagati Georginio Wijnaldum, umunya  Hollande w'imyaka 30, vyumvikana ko ashobora kugenda mu mpera z'iri higanwa atarinze kugurwa.  (Liverpool Echo) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa RB Leipzig, umufaransa  Ibrahima Konate w'imyaka 21, avuga ko ata kintu  Liverpool iravuga n'aho hari amakuru avugwa ko yoba ari mu kuja gukina mw'uyo murwi ufise igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza Premier League. (Bild - in German) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Real Madrid umunya Croatia Luka Modric w'imyaka 35 yemeye gukatwa umushahara mu masezerano mashasha y' umwaka umwe muri uyu murwi.  (AS)

headline: Wuhan: Abahaba bose bagiye gupimwa kubera icaduka gishasha c'umugera
text: Abategetsi mu gisagara ca Wuhan mu Bushinwa bagiye gutangura gupima abakibamwo bose inyuna y'aho baboneye ko hari abantu bake batowe umugera wa corona. Aho muri Wuhan hatowe abantu indwi banduriye aho  nyene - bakaba aribo bantu banduriye imbere mu gisagara mu kiringo kirenga umwaka. Ico gisagara c'abantu miriyoni 11 camenyekanye  cane kw'isi inyuma y'aho coronavírus ihatorewe ubwa mbere mu 2019. Ubushinwa muri iyi minsi buhanganye n'icaduka ca mbere kinini mu mezi atari make , aho hamaze gutorwa abantu 300 banduye mu minsi 10. Intara 15 mu gihugu ziramaze kubonekamwo abarwaye, ivyo bikaba vyatumye igihugu gifata ingingo zo gupima ikivunga no kugabanya uruja n'uruza. Abategetsi bavuga ko iryo kwirakwira ry'umugera ryavuye ku bwoko bwawo bwandukira cane bwa Delta hamwe n'igihe c'ubukerarugendo mu gihugu. Gutangaza ko muri Wuhan abantu bose bagiye gupimwa bije mu gihe mu gihugu  hatowe abandi bantu 90 banduye umugera kuri uyu wa kabiri. Umugwi w'igihugu ujejwe amagara wavuze ko 61 muri abo bantu banduriye aho basanzwe baba - ugereranije na 55 banduye nk'uko ku munsi w'imbere yaho. Ubushinwa bwari bwarashoboye ahanini kurwanya umugera imbere mu gihugu. Ariko iri kwirakwira rishasha, ryabonywe ubwa mbere ku kibuga c'indege gikora cane ca  Nanjing kwasubiye gutera amakenga. Abategetsiu bapimye incuro zitatu abantu bose baba muri Nanjing uko ari miriyoni 9,2  baca bategekega abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi kudasubira kuva i muhira. Ariko mu mpera z'indwi, amaso yahindukiriye ahantu hagenderwa cane hitwa Zhangjiajie mu ntara ya Hunan ahatowe  benshi mu banduye bashasha .  Abantu baturuka muri Nanjing vyibazwa ko bagendeye ico gisagara muri iyi minsi. Abajejwe amagara babanje kuronderera ku nyubakwa y'ibiteramo (theatre) muri Zhangjiajie ubu naho bakaba bariko baragerageza gukurikirana abantu bashika ibihumbi 5000 bitavye ibiteramo  hanyuma bagasubira mu bisagara iwabo. Zhong Nanshan, umuhinga w'Ubushinwa ku ndwara zo guhema yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ati: "Zhangjiajie ubu niyo yabaye intango nshasha y'ikwiragira ry'ikiza mu Bushinwa". Ico caduka gishasha canashitse ku murwa mukuru Beijing , aho abategetsi bemeza ko hari abantu benshi banduriye imbere mu gisagara nyene.

headline: North Korea: umukuru w'iki gihugu Kim Jong-un aragabisha ko 'ibintu bitoroshe'
text: Umukuru wa Koreya y'Uburaruko Kim Jong-un asaba abanyagihugu ko bokwitegurira ibihe "bitoroshe", inyuma y'aho abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu bagabishirije ko igihugu gihanzwe n'ubukene bw'imfungurwa mu gihe ubutunzi butifashe neza. Mw'ijambo yashikirije mw'ikoraniro ry'umugambwe, Kim yagereranije ingene ibintu vyifashe ubu n'amapfa yo mu myaka ya 1990 yihaye inkumbi. Koreya y'Uburaruko yarugaye imbibe zayo kubera ikiza karanda ca coronavirus. Vyatumye urudandaza hagati y'iki gihugu n'Ubushinwa ruhagarara mu gihe rwari bwo buraro n'uburamuko bw'ubutunzi bwaco. Ibi vyaje vyiyongera ku bihano vy'ubutunzi iki gihugu cafatiwe n'amakungu kubera umugambi waco wo guhingura ubutare bw'ubumara. Mu majambo atamenyerewe kuri we yo kwemera ko hari ibihe bigoye biri imbere, uyu mutegetsi yateye akamo ejo ku wa kane abategetsi b'umugambwe "kwitegurira urundi 'Rugendo Rutoroshe' (Arduous March/Marche Ardue)  kugira ngo abanyagihugu bacu baronke agahengwe n'akanya na gato". Ijambo  Arduous March (Urugendo Rutoroshe) ni ijambo risanzwe rikoreshwa n'abategetsi ba Koreya y'Uburaruko bagomba kuvuga urugamba rw'iki gihugu mu gihe c'amapfa yo mu myaka ya 1990 yihaye inkumbi, igihe icahoze ari Reta Zunze Ubumwe z'Abasoviyeti casambuka, Koreya y'Uburaruko igasigara yifumbereje. Bivugwa ko hafi abantu imiriyoni zitaru ari bo bapfuye muri ico gihe. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, Kim yaragabishije ko igihugu ciwe gihanzwe "n'ibihe bidasanzwe bitari bwigere bibaho" hamwe "n'ingorane nyinshi mu buryo butari bwigere bubaho". Haciye amezi atari make haba ukugabisha ko abanyagihugu ba Koreya y'Uburaruko bari mu ngorane. Amakuru avuga ivy'ubuzima bugoye asa n'ayava cane cane mu bisagara biri hafi y'urubibe iki gihugu gihana n'Ubushinwa, aho abatari bake bari babeshejweho n'urudandaza rwa magendo. Igiciro c'ibigori, imfungurwa nyamukuru ku banyagihugu batari bake ba Koreya y'Uburaruko baba mu misozi, kivugwa ko caduze cane gushika n'aho ikiro kimwe c'ibigori cagurwa igiciro kirenga umushahara w'ukwezi. Lina Yoon, umushakashatsi mw'ishirahamwe Human Rights Watch, mu cegeranyo giheruka asubiramwo ibivugwa n'abantu atavuze umwidondoro, yavuze ko "haheze hafi amezi abiri bisa n'uko ata mfungurwa zinjira mu gihugu zivuye mu Bushinwa". "Hari benshi basigaye babeshejweho no gusegerereza, abantu bamwe barapfuye bishwe n'inzara mu karere k'umupaka, kandi nta sabune, nta muti w'amenyo, canke amabeteri". Mu kwezi guheze, itumwa idasanzwe ya ONU mu murwi wa Koreya y'Uburaruko ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu, Tomás Ojea Quintana, yasohoye icegeranyo agabisha ko "hari ikibazo gikomeye c'ubukene bw'imfungurwa" cariko gitera indwara z'ugufungura nabi n'inzara. "Hari amakuru avuga ko hari abapfuye bahitanywe na kigoyi, kandi ko ibitigiri vy'abana n'abatama basigaye babeshejweho n'ugusegerereza vyiyongereye, kubera imiryango yabo itagishoboye kubatunga". Kubera iki Koreya y'Uburaruko iri mu bibazo? Ubutunzi bwa Koreya y'Uburaruko buri mu butunzi bwugaranywe cane kw'isi kandi buvugwa ko budahagaze neza, ni mu gihe busanzwe bugenzurwa bikomeye na reta. Ibikorwa vy'ugukomeza inzego za gisirikare n'iz'umutekano  bituma abanyagihugu basanzwe ba Koreya y'Uburaruko basigara bifumbereje. Ibihano vy'ubutunzi Koreya y'Uburaruko yafatiwe n'amakungu mu ntumbero yo kuyitera igitsure ngo ihebe umugambi wayo wo guhingura ubutare bw'ubumara vyarunyuye ibintu, co kimwe n'ingingo ya reta yo kwugara imbibe z'iki gihugu mu ntumbero yo kuzibira coronavirus. Kuva mu ntango za 2020, urudandaza hagati y'iki gihugu n'Ubushinwa, ari rwo buraro n'uburamuko bw'abanyagihugu, rwarahagaze. Koreya y'Uburaruko ivuga ko iyi ngingo yo kwugara imbibe yatumye Covid-19 idashika mu gihugu, n'aho abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bafise amakenga kuri aya makuru.

headline: Cynthia Ishimwe: Umurundikazi  wa mbere  w'umuhagarikizi wa Beach Soccer  muri Afrika
text: Cynthia Ishimwe ni we mugore wa mbere muri Afrika w'umuhagarikizi muri Beach Soccer, umupira w'amaguru ukinirwa ku musenyi. Ari mu bahagarikizi bitavye ihiganwa rya Afrika CAF ririko rirabera muri Mozambique. U﻿wo murundikazi ni na we abaye umugore wa mbere ahagarikiye inkino nk'izo muri Afrika. U﻿mviriza ikiganiro Cynthia Ishimwe yagiranye na BBC Gahuzamiryango. Avugana na Florentine Kwizera

headline: Emile Smith Rowe na Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang binjije ibitsindo vya Arsenal vyakuyemwo Newcastle
text: Ibitsindo bibiri vyinjijwe mu gice c'inyongera (Prolongation) na Emile Smith Rowe na Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang nivyo vyatumye Arsenal iserezera Newcastle yari yababijije akuya  mu nkino z'igice gice ca gatatu mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca FA. Imbere y';uko yinjiza igitsindo ca mbere, umukinyi aboneka ko ariko araduga Smith Rowe yari yinjiye mu gice ca kabiri yarahatswe kugira umusi mubi igihe yahabwa ikarata itukura, ariko rero igafutwa hifashishijwe ubuhinga bwa videwo (VAR). Hasigaye iminota irenga gato itatu ngo ico gice c'inyongera kirangire, Aubameyang yaciye yinjiza igitsindo kigira kabiri ku mupira mwiza yahawe na Kieran Tierney, Newcastle iba irasezeye. Andy Carroll yahushije amahirwe meza cane abiri yose yo kwinjiza mu monita 90 y'urukino, ariko ananirwa no gusezerera Arsenal. Arsenal, umurwi umaze gutwara iki gikombe incuro 14 zose, urindiriye kumenya umurwi uzohura nayo mu gice ca kane. Ariko amakuru aba avuga ukundi iyo umusatirizi Andy Carroll w'imyaka 32 agashobora gufata mu minwe amahirwe yiwe, cane cane akaryo kagira kabiri yaronse ku munota wa nyuma w'iminota 90 ya mbere. Arsenal yagarukiye ku munwa w'urupfu, mbere ikaba yahabonye umunyegori Bernd Leno yakoze nk'ingwe agakurayo umupira ukomeye wari wa Caroll. Uyu Caroll yahoze ari umusatirizi w'Ubwongereza yari yahushije igitsindo ku munota wa 55 ateye umupira ugaca imbere y'igori gato. Arsenal isanzwe ifise ingorane z'ubusatirizi, ariko Smith Rowe, n'ishaka ryinshi ryo kurondera ikibanza muri uyu murwi, yongereje inguvu z'ubusatirizi muri zino ndwi za nyuma. Inyuma y'igice ca mbere kitabonetsemwo ibintu vyinshi, uyu mukinyi mpuzamakungu w'Ubwongereza mu rwego rw'imiyabaga yahavuye yinjizwa mu kibuga n'umumenyereza Mikel Arteta ku munota wa 56, kandi yashitse ahindura urukino. Ariko, mu minota ya nyuma yahawe ikarata itukura n'umuhagarikizi w'urukino Chris Kavanagh kw'ikosa yari akoreye umukinyi wo hagati wa Newcastle, Sean Longstaff, ariko biba ngombwa ko ahindura iyi ngingo abanje kuja kuraba neza ivyabaye kuri VAR. Kubona yashoboye kugirirwa ayo mahirwe ingingo igahindurwa maze akaguma mu kibuga, mbere agashobora no kwinjiza igitsindo, Smith Rowe yavuze ati: "Ni ukuri nanezerewe cane. Inyuma ya rirya kosa nari nakoze ntabishaka, numvise intege zicitse, ariko mu nyuma umutima usubira mu nda". "Ndaryohewe kubona nashoboye kwinjiza igitsindo mbere tugashobora kurengana". Arsenal niyo isanzwe ifise igikombe ca FA, ikaba yatahukanye ikigira 14 mu mwaka uheze aho yatsinda Chelsea mu rukino rwa nyuma rwabaye ku wa 01 z'ukwa munani 2020, rukarangira Arsenal iteye Chelsea 2-1. Ibitsindo vyompi vya Arsenal vyinjijwe n'umunya Gabon, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang. Vyari bimenyerewe ko imisi nk'iyi irangiza indwi mu Bwongereza haba inkino za Premier League, ariko habandanya iz'iki gikombe ca FA. Inkino za Premier League zizosubira gutangura ku wa kabiri, aho Newcastle izokwakirwa n'umurwi Sheffiled United kuri uwo musi, Arsenal nayo ikazokwakira Crystal Palace isaha zitanu z'ijoro ku wa kane.

headline: OMS ivuga ko Tanzania itagomba kumenyesha ibijanye na Ebola
text: Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS, ryagiriza Tanzania ko itariko iratanga amakuru ku vyerekeye indwara ya Ebola ivugwa ko ishobora kuba imaze kwibonekeza muri ico gihugu. OMS ivuga ko yaronse amakuru yavuga ko hari umwe yoba yarahitanywe n'iyo ndwara i Dar es Salaam, mu nyuma bararonka n'ayandi yavuga ko hari babiri boba barafashwe nayo, ariko ikaba itaronse amakuru atomoye n'aho yagumye ibisaba. Tanzania yoyo ivuga ko ata muntu yigeze yikekwa canke ngo yemezwe ko yanduye Ebola. Ikiza ca Ebola kiragisibije mu buseruko bwa Congo aho kimaze guhitana abarenga 2000, mu gihe Uganda nayo iriko irarwana kugira ngo ntigikwiragire muri ico gihugu. Ishirahamwe OMS rivuga ko ryaronse amakuru yavuga ko hari umuntu wa mbere ashobora kuba yaranduye iyo ndwara mu gisagara ca Dar es Salaam, gisanzwe gituwemwo n'abantu benshi gusumba ibindi bisagara muri ico gihugu. Iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko uyo muntu yari yarabaye muri Uganda, akaba yarerekanye ibimenyetso vya Ebola mu kwezi kw'umunani, basanga koko yari ayirwaye, kandi akaba yaje gusandaba kw'igenekerezo rya 08 z'uku kwezi kw'icenda. Rivuga kandi ko ababonanye n'uyo mukenyezi baciye bashirwa ahantu ha bo nyene kugira bakurikiranwe. OMS ivuga ko ifise amakuru ataremezwa neza ko hoba hari n'abandi bantu babiri boba baranduye iyo ndwara. Iti: "N'aho twabisavye kenshi, abategetsi ba Tanzania nta nsiguro zihagije barashikiriza OMS  ku biraba ko hoba hari abandi bantu bamaze kuboneka ko bafise ibimenyetso vy'iyo ndwara". Yongerako iti: "Biraduteye ingorane kuko tudashobora kumenya ibishobora kuba kubera abategetsi ba Tanzania badashaka kuduha amakuru". Ku wa 14 z'uku kwezi kw'icenda, Tanzania yamenyesheje ko ata muntu yikekwa ko yoba yaranduye canke ngo yemezwe ko afise iyo ndwara ya Ebola mu gihugu. Hagati aho, nta nsiguro canke ayandi makuru yatanze kuri uyo mugore avugwa na OMS ko yoba yahitanywe na Ebola. Mu ndwi iheze, umunyamabanga wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Alex Azar, yaraneguye Tanzania kubona idashaka gutanga amakuru ku biraba ko hoba hari abanduye iyo ndwara. Biboneka ko idashaka kwemeza ko hoba hari abamaze gufatwa n'iyo ndwara kubera vyogira ingaruka mbi ku gisata c'ingenzi gisanzwe kiri mu bisata vyinjiriza Tanzania amafaranga menshi. Mu gihugu kibanyi ca Congo, ikiza ca Ebola kihadutse ku ncuro ya 10 mu mateka, kikaba ari co ca kabiri gikomeye kw'isi, aho ubu abamaze kwandura Ebola barenga 3000. Ikiza gikomeye ca mbere ca Ebola kurusha ibindi ni iciganziye ibice bimwe vyo mu burengero bwa Afrika kuva mu mwaka wa 2014 kugera mu wa 2016, kikaba cahitanye abantu barenga 11,000.

headline: Abagore bashika 50 bo muri Afrika y’Epfo 'bagizwe ingumba kubera barwaye umugera wa SIDA'
text: Amatohoza yakozwe muri Afrika y'Epfo yerekana ko abagore bashika 50 basanzwe baranduye umugera wa SIDA bagizwe ingumba ku nguvu imbere y'uko bibaruka mu bitaro bitandukanye muri ico gihugu. Umurwi ujejwe uburinganire hagati y'abagabo n'abagore muri ico gihugu (CGE) uvuga ko ibitaro vya leta vyahonyanze agateka k'abakenyezi mu gihe "ubugumba batewe ku nguvu butuma bafatwa nabi bakabaho mu gatotezo". Ayo matohoza yashizwe ahabona ejo ku wa mbere yatanguye gukorwa mu 2015 igihe amashirahamwe abiri aharanira agateka k'abagore yitura uyo murwi afise amazina y'abantu 48 bavugwa ko bagizwe ingumba ku nguvu, nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters. Uwo murwi waciye utangura kwegeranya ivyemezo kuri abo bagore bavugwa ko batewe ubugumba. Uwo murwi wasanze abaganga bo mu bitaro bimwe bimwe vya leta batera ubugumba abagore bategerezwa gukorwa mu kuvyara, bababwira ko abanduye umugera badategerezwa kuvyara abana, ngo kandi ko bashobora gupfa mu gihe bosubira kuvyara. Ico cegeranyo kivuga kiti: "Rimwe rimwe, mu gihe bari mu bubabare burenze urugero bari ku bise, abo bagore bategekwa gutera igikumu ku nguvu ku rwandiko bagiye kumenya mu nyuma ko rwari urwo kwiyemeza ko batanze uburenganzira bwo gukoresha uburyo bwose kugira babatere ubugumba". Abakoze ayo matohoza basanze hari abaganga muri ivyo bitaro batera ubwoba abo bagore ko mu gihe batotera igikumu kuri urwo rwandiko badashobora kubafasha kuvyara. Ubwo bubisha buvugwa muri ico cegeranyo bwakozwe hagati ya 2002 na 2015. Uwo murwi kandi wagiriza abo baganga ko barenze ku "masezerano biyemeje yo kuvura abantu". Ico cegeranyo cashikirijwe ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu bwa Afrika y'Epfo. Uwo murwi umenyesha ko vyabaye ibintu bigoye kurangiza ayo matohoza kubera amafishe y'abo bagore "yari yatakaye" mu bitaro. Umukuru w'uwo murwi, Tamara Mathebula, avuga ko "bitaboneka neza ingene ico kibazo cifashe muri Afrika y'Epfo, ariko turizeye ko ivyo twasavye bizotuma imiryango yuguruka maze ibinyegejwe bikamenyekana". Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, Zwelini Mkhize, yasavye umubonano wihuta n'umupfasoni Mathebula  kugira ngo bavugane kuri ico cegeranyo, nk'uko bivugwa na Reuters isubiramwo ivyavuzwe n'ubwo bushikiranganji.

headline: Paris St-Germain: Mauricio Pochettino yasubiriye Thomas Tuchel nk'umumenyereza
text: Mauricio Pochettino  yahoze amenyereza Tottenham na Southampton yagenywe kuba umumenyereza w'umurwi wo mu Bufaransa, Paris St-Germain. Uyu munya Argentine w'imyaka  48 asubiriye Thomas Tuchel, akaba yateye igikumu ku masezerano yo gushika ku wa 30 z'ukwa gatandatu 2022, ariko akaba amuha akaryo ko kwongereza ikiringo c'umwaka. Pochettino yigeze gukinira PSG hagati ya 2001 na 2003, nta kazi yari afise kuva yirukanywe na Tottenham mu kwezi kw'icumi na rimwe 2019. PSG iza mu kibanza ca gatatu mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira  w'amaguru mu Bufaransa, Ligue 1, ikaba izohura na Barcelona mu gice c'umunani gishira ica nyuma mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Buraya, hazoba ari mu kwa kabiri n'ukwa gatatu. Uyu mudagi Tuchel yirukanywe muri uyo murwi ku wa 29 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri guheze, inyuma y'imyaka ibiri n'igice yari amaze awumenyereza. Kuri uyu wa Mungu Pochettino niho atangura imyimenyerezo n'uyu murwi muri kino gihe abakinyi bari mu karuhuko k'urushana. Avuga ko anezerewe kandi ko ari iteka kuri we kubona ahawe aya mabanga, kandi ko uyu murwi yamye awufise ku mutima. Ati: "Ngarutse muri uno murwi mfise imigambi myinshi, kandi ndipfuza gukorana na bamwe mu bakinyi b'ibihangange kw'isi". "Uyu murwi urimwo abantu bafise ubushobozi buteye igomwe, rero jewe n'abo turi kumwe tuzokora ibishoboka vyose kugira twubake Paris St-Germain ikomeye mu mahiganwa yose. Tuzokora kandi ivyo dushoboye vyose kugira ngo abakunzi bayo banezerererwe umurwi ukomeye kandi utsinda". Umukuru wa PSG Nasser Al-Khelaifi avuga ko Pochettino "ari we azoshika ku ntego" zabo, akongerako ati: "Ni ikindi kiringo kiryoshe ku murwi kandi ni umuntu nizeye ko azokundwa n'abafana". Pochettino yatanguriye ibikorwa vy'umumenyereza mu murwi wa Espanyol, akaba yamaze amezi 18 amenyereza Southampton imbere y'uko aja muri Tottenham mu kwa gatanu 2014. Mu mwaka wa mbere yashoboye gushikana uyu murwi mu rukino rwa nyuma  rw'igikombe c'ihiganwa (Coupe de la ligue/League cup)  anawushikana mu kibanza ca kabiri mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza Premier league mu mwaka wa 2016-2017. Uyu yahoze aci cugazo c'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina yarashoboye kandi gushikana Tottenham mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'ihiganwa ry'imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Buraya, Champions League, mu 2019, urukino rwagiye gutsindwa na Liverpool. Haciye amezi atanu, yaciye yirukanwa vyanse muri Tottenham, aho uyu murwi wagiye kwisanga uri mu kibanza ca 14 muri Premier League, aca asubirirwa na Jose Mourinho. Urukino rwa nyuma rwa Tuchel nk'umumenyereza wa PSG ni urwayihuje n'umurwi Strasbourg, rwarangiye ku ntsinzi ya PSG, 4-0, hari ku wa 23 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri guheze, ivyatumye ija mu kibanza ca gatatu, inyuma ya Lyon ifise ikibanza ca mbere na Lille iza ubwa kabiri, ariko zompi zikaba ziyisumvya inota rimwe gusa. PSG iriko irondera ko Tottenham yoyitiza umukinyi Dele Alli muri uku kwa mbere, umukinyi asanzwe adakinishwa cane.

headline: Kenya yasubije muri Tanzania abanyamahanga 182 banduye coronavirus
text: Abajejwe amagara muri Kenya yasubije inyuma abanyamahanga bagerageje kwinjira ku mbibe zitandukanye ico gihugu gihana na Tanzaniya bamaze kubasangamwo coronavirus. Muri abo basanze baranduye, 126 ni abaciye ku rubibe rukuru rwa Namanga. Abandi bapimiwe ku mbibe zindi zine. Ubwenegihugu bw'abo banyamahanga ntibwatangajwe. Kuwa gatandatu umukuru w'igihugu ca Kenya, Uhuru Kenyatta, yarugaye imbibe igihugu gihana na Tanzania hamwe na Somalia kubera ukwiyongera kw'abanduye baca ku mbibe. Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Kenya, Mutahi Kagwe, kuwa kabiri yabwiye ibinyamakuru ati: "Ntidushobora kwemerera abantu bavuye hanze kwinjira muri Kenya badafise icemezo c'uko batarwaye Covid-19. "Ni co kimwe n'uko tutariko turemerera abashoferi b'abanye Kenya kuva mu gihugu badafise ico cemezo. "Icari gushika iyo tudafata icemeze co gupima abantu ku rubibe ni uko ibitigiri vy'abaharurwa ko banduye mu gihugu vyari guca biduga cane". Abandi bantu 18 banduye coronavirus babasanze ku rubibe rwa Kenya na Somalia mu karere k'uburaruko bwa Kenya. Cumi na bane muri bo bagerageje kwinjira baciye i Wajir mu gihe abandi babiri bashaka guca Garissa.

headline: 12 bahagaritswe bagirizwa kubomora imva ya DJ Arafat muri Côte d'Ivoire
text: Igipolisi ca Côte d'Ivoire cahagaritse abantu 12 bagirizwa kubomora imva y'umuririmvyi azwi cane muri ico gihugu bapfundurura isandugu yari yahambwemwo. Abanya Côte d'Ivoire benshi bababajwe n'ireresi yazungurutse ku mbuga hwaniro yerekana abakunzi ba DJ Arafat,  yasandavye mu kwezi guheze mw'isanganya,  bakura isandugu yiwe mu ruhafu barayugurura kugira ngo barabe koko y'uko irimwo ikiziga ciwe. Ivyo bibaye inyuma y'urukurukuru n'ibihuha vyakwiragijwe bivuga y'uko yoba atapfuye. Ku munsi wa gatanu w'indwi iheze, abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi baritavye igiteramo cabereye ku kibuga c'umupira mu ntumbero y'ukwibuka ubuzima bwiwe. DJ Arafat, izina ryiwe ry'ukuri akaba yari Ange Didier Houon, yari yavutse ku wa 26 z'ukwa mbere 1986 asandaba ku wa 12 z'ukwezi kw'umunani guheze azize isanganya ry'ipikipiki. Yari azwi cane nk'umuririmvyi w'umucuraranzi rurangiranwa muri Côte d'Ivoire no muri Afrika yo munsi y'ubugaragwa bwa Afrika. Yafatwa nk'icirore c'umuziki wo mu mudiho witwa Coupé-décalé wabiciye bigacika mu myaka ya 2000 na 2010, umudiho wahavuye wizizirwa n'urwaruka rwa Côte d'Ivoire muri kino gihe.

headline: Umushikiranji w'amagara muri Kongo yasezeye kubera ukutumvikana mu kurwanya Ebola
text: Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo yatanze imihoho mu kwiyamiriza ingingo ya leta yo mu ndwi iheze yo kwifatira mu minwe kurwanya ebola mu buseruko. Olly Ilunga yanditse ikete ryo gutanga imihoho aho yavuze yuko hari ukwivanga gukabije mu gutunganya ibikorwa vyo guhangana n'iki kiza, ca kabiri muri kahise kimaze guhitana benshi. Yiyamirije kandi igitsure co hanze catumye hakoreshwa urikingo rwa kabiri rwa Ebola rukigeragezwa, kandi yari yasavye ko rutokoreshwa. Kuva mu kwezi kw'umunani abantu barenga igihumbi n'amajana indwi baramaze kuhasiga ubuzima. Mu ndwi iheze ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS, ryavuze ko ico kiza ubu kimaze gufatwa nk'ikibazo mpuzamakungu.

headline: Serum Institute: Umuriro wishe batanu mw'ihinguriro rya mbere rinini ry'inkingo
text: Abantu batanu bapfuye bahitanywe n'umuriro wadutse mw'ihinguriro rya mbere rinini ry'incanco mu burengero bw'Ubuhindi. Uwo muriro wahereye mu nyubakwa yari ikiriko iruduzwa mu kigo ca Serum Institute co mu Buhindi ahitwa Pune  ku muhingamo w'uyu wa kane. Amasanamu yerekanye umwotsi mwinshi uduga uva muri imwe mu  nyubakwa z'ico kigo gikwiye irya n'ino. Ico kigo ariko cavuze ko  ata ngaruka ivvaye bizogira ku bikorwa vyo gukora incanco. Icatumye uwo muriro waduka ntikiramenyekana. Uwo muriro bahavuye bashobora kuwuzimya ariko umukuru w'igisagara yemeje ko abantu batanu bapfuye. Umukuru w'ico kigo Adar Poonawalla yavuze ko ata ngaruka uwo muriro uzogira ku bikorwa vyo gukora urucanco rwa Oxford-AstraZeneca ruzwi aho mu Buhindi nka Covishield ''kubera inyubakwa nyinshi zo gukoreramwo urwo rucanco nategekanije habaye nk'ibi vyashitse.'' Covishield ni rumwe mu nkingo zemewe na leta y'Ubuhindi batara abantu mu kubakingira kwandura umugera utera indwara ya Covid-19, umugambi wo gucanca mu Buhindi watanguye ku ndwi iheze kandi niwo wa mbere muni kw'isi. Ico gihugu gitegekanya guha incanco abantu miliyoni 300 bitarenzae mu ntango z'ukwezi kw'umunani. Hari n'ibindi bihugu vy'uburyo buke canke ububayabaye navyo birindiriye urucanco  rwa Oxford-Zeneca rukorwa n'ico kigo ca Serum Institute co mu Buhindi. Ubuhindi buza ubugira kabiri kw'isi mu bihugu birimwo abantu benshi banduye corona inyuma ya Reta zunze ubumwe za Amerika. Kuva uwo mugera utanguye kuvugwa muri ico gijhugu, kimaze kwemeza abanduye barenga miliyoni 10.6 n'abamaze gupfa hafi 153.000, ku biharuro bitangwa na Kaminuza ya Hopkins.

headline: Ukraine: Video ya Schwarzenegger igwanya intambara yakwirakwiye henshi mu Burusiya
text: Ivyo umukinyi wa filime Arnold Schwarzenegger yashikirije abarusiya abicishije kuri Twitter biri mu vya mbere biriko birakwiragira cane mu Burusiya kuri uyu wa gatanu, binavugisha benshi ahantu hatandukanye. Muri iyo video, aragabisha abarusiya ko bariko barahabwa amakuru atari yo ku bitero igihugu cabo kiriko kiragira kuri Ukraine. Yavuze ko ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya vyababeshe n'impaka bivuga ko ivyo bitero bifise intumbero yo "kwirukana" aba nazi" muri Ukraine. Ukraine si yo yasomborokeje intambara, ariko"Abari ku butegetsi mu Burusiya" ni bo babikoze. Abwira prezida w'Uburusiya Vladimir Putin, yagize ati:"Ni we watanguje iyi ntambara kandi ushobora no kuyihagarika." Muri iyo video imara iminota icenda, yerekana ubwicanyi n'isamburwa ry'inyubakwa muri Ukraine, uwo mu kinyi wa filime ubu ari umunye politike ahamagarira abantu kumenya inkuru zitari zo na propagande. Agira ati:"Ndiko ndabwira mwebwe uyu musi kuko hari ibintu biriko biraba mw'isi babanyegeje, ibintu biteye ubwoba mwategerezwa kumenya." Uwo yahoze arongoye intara ya California yanibukije ko prezida wa Ukraine ari umuyahudi, ko"Ukraine ntiyasomborokeje iyi ntambara, canke itanguzwe n'aba 'nationalistes' canke aba Nazi." Ati:"Iyi si intambara y'abanyagihugu b'abarusiya." Uwo yahoze ari umunonotsi wo gukomeza umubiri yambuka muri Autriche - filime yakinyemwo ya Red Heat yabaye iya mbere yo muri Amerika ikiniwe mu 'kibanza gitukura' i Moscou - yavuze no ku gishika afitiye abarusiya. Yagize ati:"Inguvu n'umutima vy'abanyagihugu b'abarusiya vyagumye ari icitegererezo cane. Ari na co gituma nizeye ko mundeka nkababwira ukuri kuri iyi ntambara ya Ukraine." Yabandanije avuga ati:"Iyi n'intambara y'ububeshi. Ubuzima bwanyu, ibihimba vyanyu, kazoza kanyu vyatanzweko inkuka mu ntambara itagira mvura yiyamirizwa n'amakungu yose." Iyo video imaze kurabwa n'abantu bababa imiliyoni 24 abandi barenga 310.000 baramaze kuyikwiragiza, ikaba iri mu nkuru ziri kuri Twitter ziriko zimaze gukwiragizwa cane ku wa gatanu mu gitondo. Abakurikirana cane uwo mukinyi wa filime kuri Twitter  harimwo abarusiya bakoresha ikirusiya n'abakoresha icongereza. Amajambo yiwe yashimagijwe n'abarusiya badashigikiye intambara. Ku rubuga rwa Telegram, uwutavuga rumwe na reta y'Uburusiya Lev Shlosberg yagize ati:"Arnold Schwarzenegger afise ubushobozi yisangije bwo kugondoza uwo ari we wese, mu cubahiro no mu majambo atarengera. Umutima nama, ubushobozi n'ubutungane. Vyiyumvire. Utahure." Uwundi, umumenyeshamakuru Anton Orekh yagize ati:"Ndazi ko wabonye amajambo ya Arnold Schwarzenegger. Murazi igituma ari meza? Yavuzwe aduha icubahiro, twebwe abarusiya. Dusigaye turi ibicibwa kw'isi kandi urwanko rw'abanka abavuga ikirusiya rwahira rukoreshwa muri propagande, kubwo imana mbi ruriko ruraja mu bikorwa.  Arnold n'umwe mu bantu bake avugisha abarusiya nk'abantu atari inyamaswa zataye inzira." Ariko urubugwa rw'uwiyita Barack Obmana ashigikiye ubutegetsi bw'Uburusiya kuri Twitter we yakoresheje imvugo itandukanye:"Ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire ya Amerika bwibaza ko ivyiyumviro vy'abantu baguzwe na Amerika bifise ico bivuze kuri twebwe. Uburusiya bwagumye busemerera ko intambara yo muri Ukraine ari "ibikorwa bidasanzwe" vyo gukingira abanye Ukraine bavuga ururimi rw'ikirusiya.

headline: Bayern Vs Bremen: Hari ubwoba ko Mane atazokina muri Qatar 2022 kubera imvune yaraye yanduye
text: Imvune ya Sadio Mane yateje igipfungu intsinzi ikomeye ya Bayern Munich yaraye yirahiye Werder Bremen 6-1 mw’ihiganwa ry’Ubudagi, Bundesliga. Vyabaye ngombwa ko Mane ava mu kibuga akaja kuvurwa inyuma y’iminota 20 kubera imvune yo mw’ivi, aca asubirirwa na Leroy Sane. Ibi bibaye mu gihe hasigaye imisi 13 gusa imbere y’uko Senegal ya Mane ikina urukino rwayo rwa mbere mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose ca 2022 cimirije gutangura muri Qatar, ikazohura n’Ubuholande. Hagati aho, Bayern yatahukanye intsinzi ikomeye cane, aho Serge Gnabry yateye bitatu wenyene. Uyu musatirizi Mane yahoze akinira Liverpool yaciye agenda ubutarariye mu cumba c’ukwihinduriramwo amaze gusubirizwa kugira ngo abadanye avurwa. Nk’umukinyi mwiza w’umwaka wa Afrika incuro zibiri, Mane ni kirumara mu murwi nserukira gihugu wa Senegal iherutse gutahukana igikombe ca Afrika mu mupira w’amaguru, aho uzohura n’Ubuholande mu rukino rwa mbere rw’itsinda A ku wa 21 Munyonyo (11), imbere y’uko uhura na Qatar yateguye iri higanwa, hanyuma na Equateur/ Ecuador. Igitsindo ca nyuma ca Mane kuri penalty mu rukino rwa nyuma rwabahuje na Misiri catumye Senegal itsindira igikombe ca Afrika ku ncuro ya mbere, hari mu ntango z’uno mwaka. Imvune ya Mane ntiyabujije Bayern gusayangana maze ishobora kurangiza inkino zo hagati muri ino ndwi ari iya mbere muri Bundesliga. Jamal Musial ni we yinjije ica mbere ku munota wa gatanu w’urukino, ariko rero haciye akanya gato Bremen iragikurayo ku mupira mwiza bagiye bahanahana imbere y’uko Anthony Jung atsinda umunyegori Manuel Neuer. Bayern yaciye ihindura umukino maze yinjiza ibitsindo bitatu mu minota umunani, aho Leon Goretzka  yijije kimwe, Gnabry nawe atera bibiri, maze mu minota 30 Bayern imaze kunyagira Bremen 4-1. Ibintu vyari kuba vyamaze kuba nabi gusumba muri uwo mwanya iyo umunyegori Jiri Pavlenka adakurayo penalty y’umunya-Cameroun Eric-Maxim Choupo-Moting ku munota wa 17. Bayern yabandanije yiyoroheje gushika mu mpera z’urukino, aho ku munota wa 82 Gnabry yinjije igitsindo ciwe kigira gatatu, ata n’akanya gaheze umusore w’umufaransa  Mathys Tel aca asongera isibe.

headline: Covid-19: abahinga bavuga ko imigera yayo yoba yari imaze imyaka itari mike izunguruka mu buhungarema
text: Imigera ya coronavirus yandukira abantu ifise kuba yari imaze imyaka iharurwa muri mirongo izunguruka mu buhungarema (uducurama mu kinyarwanda) ariko itarashobora kumenyekana. Ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko hari ubwoko bwa hafi cane bw'uwu mugera utera Covid-19 woba watanguye kuboneka mu buhungarema mu myaka irenga 40 iheze. Abahinga bavuga ko yamaze igihe igenda ihinduka mu buryo bwo gushobora kwandukira abantu. Bavuga kandi ko ibi bitera amadidane ku bivugwa na bamwe n'abandi ko uwu mugera utera covid-19 woba wacorotse amazu y'ubushakashatsi (laboratoires). Prof. David Robertson yigisha kuri kaminuza ya Glasgow mu Bwongereza ni umwe mu bakoze ivyo vyigwa vyagiye gutangazwa mu kinyamakuru c'ubushakashatsi Nature Microbiology. Yavuze ko iyi migera itera coronavirus yari mu buhungarema kandi ko yagiye ihinduka mu kiringo c'imyaka mirongo n'iyindi. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Ivyo bivuga ko  iyi migera yashobora kwandukira kiremwamuntu haciye igihe". "Igikenewe ubu cane cane ni ukumenya ukungene yashoboye gutandukira umuntu. Nimba koko twemera ko iyi migera yari imaze igihe izunguruka mu buhungarema, dukeneye kurushirizaho mu kwihweza iki kintu". Kubw'iwe, ni nkenerwa ko hakurikiranwa neza izindi ndwara zishobora gutandukira abantu, hakabandanya hakorwa ubushakashatsi ku buhungarema mu ntumbero yo gukinga ibizakaranda nk'ibi muri kazoza. Prof Robertson avuga ati: "Nimba uwu mugera umaze imyaka iharurwa muri mirongo, ni ukuvuga ko waronse akaryo ko kwandukira n'ibindi biremwa, harimo n'abantu". Abashakashatsi bagereranije ibice nyubakamubiri vya Sars-CoV-2 n'ivyo mu mugera  ugendanwa n'ubuhungarema, umugera uzwi kw'izina rya RaTG13, hamwe n'iyindi migera ifitaniye isano n'iyo mu buhungarema. Yose ifise amamuko amwe, umwe umwe wose ukaba wagiye uhindagurika ukwawo mu kiringo c'imyaka itari mike. Prof Mark Pagel yigisha kuri kaminuza ya Reading ariko atari mu bakoze ubwo bushakashatsi avuga ko imigera ya coronavirus yandukira abantu imaze imyaka hagati ya 40 na 70  izunguruka mu buhungarema ariko ikaba itashoboye kuboneka. "Iki ni ikintu gikomeye cane cerekana ingene ibikoko bishobora kwanduza abantu - rero hashobora kuba hari imigera myinshi yinyegeje mu bikoko kandi itaramenyekana ishobora kwandukira abantu". Iyo migera ishobora kuba yagiye yinjira no mu bindi bikoko vyo mw'ishamba, ariko gushika ubu ibimenyetso vyerekana ko ubuhungarema ari wo muhora nyawo wo gukwiragira.

headline: Coronavirus: OMS itangaza ko habonetse igitigiri c’abanduye kitari bwigere kibaho mu munsi umwe
text: Ishami rya ONU ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS nijoro ryatangaje ko igitigiri c'abanduye umugera wa coronavirus kw'isi cageze ku bantu 260.000 mu masaha 24, igitigiri kitari bwigere kibaho. Nk'uko bivugwa na OMS, nibwo bwa mbere igitigiri c'abanduye ku munsi kirenga ica kane c'umuliyoni kuva ico kiza karanda caduka. Ibitigiri binini vy'abanduye vyibonekeje mu bihugu vya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Brezili hamwe na Afrika y'Epfo. Igitigiri c'abahitanywe n'uyu mugera naco nyene caraduze gushika ku 7.360 - kikaba ari co kinini kuva ku wa 10 z'ukwa gatanu. Gushika ubu abamaze kwandura coronavirus kw'isi bararenga imiliyoni 14, nayo abarenga 600.000 baramaze guhitanwa nayo, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'ibiharuro vyegeranijwe n'ishure kaminuza yo muri Amerika John Hopkins. Muri Amerika, ibitigiri bibandanya biduga mu ntara zitari nke, cane cane mu ntara zo mu bumanuko mu ntango zabanje kunana mu gufata ingingo za Guma mu rugo canke gutegeka abanyagihugu kwambara udupfukamunwa. Intara za Texas, Florida na Arizona nizo ntara zabonye ibitigiri birenze vy'abandura. Mu gufata ingingo zo guhagarika ikwirakwira ry'uwu mugera haragiyemwo cane politike muri ico gihugu. Umuhinga mukuru mu vyo indwara zandukira muri ico gihugu, Muganga Anthony Fauci, asaba abategetsi b'intara n'uburere gushiramwo inguvu  bagategeka abanyagihugu bambare udupfukamunwa. Hagati aho Perezida Donald Trump avuga ko ata tegeko ashobora gutanga ku rwego rw'igihugu ngo abanyagihugu batwambare. Ibindi bihugu bibangamiwe harimwo Berezili, igihugu kigira kabiri kw'isi mu bitigiri vy'abanduye coronavirus. Ikindi gihugu ni Ubuhindi, aho ku wa gatandatu abanduye bashitse ku 34.884 mu masaha 24, nayo 671 bakaba barahitanywe nayo. Ikindi gihugu kiri ku mugabane wa Afrika, ico naco ni Afrika y'Epfo, iki naco kikaba ari co gihugu ca mbere kuri uyu mugabane gifise ibitigiri binini vy'abanduye. Mu masaha 24, handuye abarenga 13.00, mu gihe aba,aze kwandura bose hamwe bashika 350.879. Ku mugabane wa Bulaya, ibihugu bitari bike vyo mu burengero vyovyo biriko biratezura ingingo za Guma mu rugo kubera vyashoboye kurwanya biboneka uyu mugera. Hagati aho, hari uburere bumwe bumwe bw'igihugu ca Espanye buriko bubona ibitigiri vy'abandura bigenda vyiyongera, akarere kabangamiwe kakaba ari Catalonye kari mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko. Hari ingingo ziriko zirafatwa mu ntumbero yo guhagarika uwo mugera. Igihugu c'u Bufaransa gihana urubibe n'ico gihugu naco nyene kiriko kiraraba ingene cokwugara uruja n'uruza kuri urwo rubibe kugira ngo gishobore guhangana n'iryo yongerekana rya coronavirus muri Espanye.

headline: Guhiganirwa kuja mu gikombe c'isi n'ica Afrika vyahinduwe amatariki
text: Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika (Caf) ryahinduye amatariki y'inkino zo muri Afrika zo guhiganirwa kuja mu gikombe c'isi mu 2022 hamwe n'igikombe ca Afrika co mu 2021. Ibi bikurikiye ingingo y'ejo kuwa gatatu yo kwimurira mu kwezi kwa mbere n'ukwa kabiri ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika co mu 2021 muri Kameruni, ryobaye mu kwa gatandatu n'ukw'indwi. Inkino zo guhiganirwa igikombe ca Afrika zotanguye mu kwezi kw'umunani, ariko zimuriwe mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Guhiganirwa kuja mu gikombe c'isi 2022 vyimuriwe mu kwezi kwa cumi kugira bijane n'ivyo bindi vyahinduwe. Ingunga zibiri z'inkino zo guhiganirwa kuja mu gikombe ca Afrika zizoba mu kwezi kwa gatatu, ingunga imwe ishirwe mu kwa gatandatu imbere y'uko haba inkino za nyuma zo kuva itariki 31 z'ukwa munani gushika itariki 8 z'ukwa cenda. Amakipe 24 azoja mu gikombe ca Afrika niyamara kumenyekana, guhiganirwa kuja mu gikombe c'isi bizoca bitangura mu kwezi kwa cumi - iyindi ngunga ibe mu kwezi gukurikira. Umwe mu bamenyereza batashimishijwe n'ayo mahinduka ni umumenyereza wa Gambiya, Tom Saintfiet. Yabwiye BBC Sport ati: "Ntivyari bikenewe guhindagura kuko biduteje ibibazo vyinshi mu gihe twari tumaze gutunganya inkino za kivukanyi kandi twaragiranye amasezerano n'abazitunganya. "Twari twateguye kugerageza abakinyi bamwe mu kwezi kwa gatatu n'ukwa gatandatu kuko nshaka kwubaka ikipe, ariko ubu ivyo ntibigishoboka imbere y'urukino na Gabon (rwo guhiganirwa igikombe ca Afrika 2021)." Gutomboza imigwi igize amakipe yo guhiganirwa kuja mu gikombe c'isi 2022 vyashizwe kw'itariki 21 z'ukwa mbere. Ku wa gatatu hafashwe ingingo y'uko igikombe ca Afrika kizotangura itariki 9 z'ukwa mbere kubera ikibazo c'ikirere muri Kameruni mu kwezi kwa gatandatu n'ukw'indwi, igihe hashobora kuba hari imvura nyinshi. Gusubiza iryo higanwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika mu kwezi kwa mbere bizoca bituma ridahurirana n'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi c'amakipe, rizobera mu Bushinwa mu kwa gatandatu 2021.

headline: Qatar 2022: Ni nde Goncalo Ramos - umukinyi yasubiriye Cristiano Ronaldo?
text: Na  Harry Poole Umunyamakuru w'inkino wa BBC Imbere y’uko urukino rutangura, havugwa gusa ivyo kudakinisha Cristiano Ronaldo. Ariko ifirimbi ya nyuma iheze, ivyavugwa vyose vyari kuri Goncalo Ramos. Igihe afata ikibanza ku ntebe y’abasubirizi mu rukino rwa nijoro n’Ubuswisi mu gice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose muri Qatar, amakamera yose (cameras) yari yarabishijwe kuri uno mukinyi amaze kwinjiriza Portugal ibitsindo vyinshi gusumba abandi bakinyi bose muri kahise k’umupira muri ico gihugu. Inyifato yagize igihe asubirizwa mu rukino rwaheruka yararakaje umumenyereza Fernando Santos. Intebe yari ikikujwe n’abafotozi barwana barondera gufata isanamu ya Ronaldo yari ababaye kubera atari ku rutonde rw’abakinyi 11 bategerezwa gutangura mu rukino rukomeye nk’uru. Bwari bwo bwa mbere bimugendeye uko kuva mu 2008. Ariko rero haciye akanya gato, amaso yose yaciye ahindukirira ku vyariko bibera mu kibuga, aho umukinyi w’imyaka 21 yamusubiriye yandikishije izina mu gutsinda ibitsindo bitatu vyose muri uru rukino rwarangiye Portugal inyagiye Ubuswisi 6-1. Igihe umumenyereza wa Portugal Santos afata ingingo yo kudatanguza Ronaldo muri uru rukino, ntiyari yiteze ibintu vyiza nk’ivyo yaraye abonye. Uretse ko umurwi wiwe watsinze ibitsindo bitandatu mu gice co gukuranamwo mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose, umusore yakinishije mu kibanza ca Ronaldo yateye ibitsindo bitatu wenyene muri iri joro rya mbere rikomeye kuva atanguye umwuga wiwe. Ku myaka 21 n’imisi 169, Ramos ni we mukinyi wa mbere akiri muto yinjije ibitsindo bitatu mu rukino rumwe mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose kuva ku munya-Hongrie Florian Albert mu 1962. Uyu musatirizi wa Benfica vyamusavye iminota 17 gusa kugira atangaze izina ryiwe muri Qatar, igihe atera umupira ugaca iruhande y’umunyegori w’Ubuswisi Yann Sommer hejuru mu mfuruka z’igori, aba ashize Portugal imbere. Inyuma y’iminota mikeya igice ca kabiri gitanguye, yateye igitsindo ciwe ca kabiri ku mupira wo hasi yari ahawe na Diogo Dalot, maze biba bibaye 3-0. Igitsindo ca Raphael Guerreiro cinjiye imbere y’uko Ramos atera iciwe ca gatatu muri urwo rukino – ubwa mbere muri rino higanwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose – igitsindo yinjije arovye umunyegori Sommer. Yagiye gusubirizwa ku munota wa 74 amaze gutera ibitsindo vyiwe bitatu, tutavuze imipira yahereje n’iyo yateye mw’igori ishika itanu. Igihe Ramos yari asubirijwe, Rob Green yahoze ari umunyegori w’Ubwongereza yavugiye kuri BBC Radio 5 Live ati: " Goncalo Ramos yakoze ibintu bitangaje. Ivya mbere muri kino gikombe c’isi yose gushika ubu, n’ibindi vyose vyoba bimaze kuba”. Mu gihe Ronaldo atarashobora kwinjiza igitsindo na kimwe mu nkino zitandatu zose zo gukuranamwo Portugal imaze gukina muri rino higanwa, n’aho amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo umunani mu mahiganwa y’igikobe c’isi yose, Ramos wewe amaze kwinjiza bitatu. Ramos, umukinyi yakuriye mu murwi w’urwaruka rwa Benfica, yari amaze gukinira Portugal iminota 33 yonyene mu nkino zitatu yari amaze gukina, imbere y’uko igihugu ciwe gihura n’Ubuswisi nijoro ku wa kabiri. Aha harimwo iminota 23 yakinye mu rukino rwa kivandimwe Portugal yahuye na Nigeria mu kwa cumi na rimwe rwarangiye Portugal itsinze Nigeria igitsindo kimwe ku busa, iminota ibiri mu rukino rwa Ghana hamwe n’iyindi umunani yakinye mu rwa Uruguay mu nkino zo mu matsinda. Kuva ico gihe yashizwe ku rutonde rw’abasubirizi akaba atakinishijwe igihe Portugal itsindwa na Korea ya Ruguru, ariko ikaba yari yamaze kuronka itike yo kubandanya. Hagati aho, inyuma yo gushirwa ku rutonde rw’abatangura mu kibuga ku ncuro ya mbere ku rwego mpuzamakungu  mu nkino zo gukuranamwo muri rino higanwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose, yakoze ibintu bikomeye aboneka nk’uko umengo ni ibintu yari amaze imyaka myinshi akora. Ku bitsindo 14 n’imipira itandatu yatanze ikavamwo ibitsindo mu nkino 21 za Benfica muri uno mwaka w’inkino – hiyongereyeko ibitsindo indwi yinjije mu nkino zitandatu mw’ihiganwa riheruka – Ramos nta nkeka ubu ni umukinyi yiyemera. Ariko indoto yonyene yari afise ni ukungene yari kuvyifatamwo ku rukino rwiwe rwa mbere ashizwe ku rutonde rw’abatangura mu kibuga mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose. Ni we mukinyi wa mbere yinjije ibitsindo bitatu, ikizwi nka hat-trick, ku rukino rwiwe rwa mbere atangujwe mu kibuga mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi kuva ku mudagi Miroslav Klose mu 2002- umukinyi wa mbere amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo vyinshi mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi ku ruhande rw’abagabo – akaba kandi n’umukinyi akiri muto agira kabiri amaze kwinjiriza Portugal ibitsindo muri kahise k’ik igihugu mu gikombe c’isi yose, inyuma ya Ronaldo mu 2006. Inyuma y’urukino rudasanzwe rwa nijoro, arumva neza ko yakoze ivyo yashobora gukora vyose kugira ngo igihugu ciwe kibandanye mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma aho kizohura na Maroc. Abajijwe ivya Ronaldo ifirimbi ya nyuma ivuze, Ramos yavuze ati: "Cristiano Ronaldo aramvugisha kandi avugisha uwo ari we wese mu murwi. Ni we kizigenza wacu kandi yama agerageza kudufasha”. Irangira ry’urukurikirane rw’inkino 31 atanguzwa mu kibuga  kuri uyu yahoze ari umusatirizi wa Real Madrid, Juventus na Manchester United ryategerezwa kuba inkuru ikomeye cane. Ariko na we nyene ashobora kuba yaratangajwe n’ingene yavuzwe cane imbere y’uko urukino rwa nijoro rutangura, mu gihe ikintu kinini yashoboye gukorera abakunzi baguma basaba ko yinjizwa mu gice ca kabiri ari igitsindo canswe kubera yari yaraririye. Uravye ivyo Ramos yaraye akoze, nta cizere kinini asigaranye c’uko ku myaka 37 Ronaldo azohava asaba gutanguzwa mu kibuga mu rukino rwo ku wa gatandatu aho Portugal izoba ihura na Maroc. Umumenyereza wa Portugal Santos avuga  ati "koko sinashimishijwe" n’inyifato ya Ronaldo igihe asubirizwa ku munota wa 65 igihe itsindwa na Korea y’Epfo mu rukino rwa nyuma rwo mw’itsinda ryabo, bikaba bisa n’ingene yaje kurangiza giturumbuka muri Manchester United mu kwezi guheze. Uyu mukinyi yatsindiye Ballon d’Or (Umupira w’Inzahabu) incuro zitanu arahakana ko atarakariye umumenyereza wiwe, ariko ibi nticabujije ko yisanga ku rutonde rw’abasubirizi mu rukino n’Ubuswisi. Inyuma yo kuba umukinyi wa mbere yinjije ibitsindo mu mahiganwa atanu y’igikombe c’isi yose imbere y’aha, ibitangaza umurwi wiwe waraye ukoze bishobora gutuma Ronaldo ata kundi vyogenda atari kwemera ikibanza giciriritse mu gihugu ciwe. Mu kiganiro n’imboneshakure ITV, uwahoze ari umusatirizi w’Ubwongereza, Ian Wright avuga ati: "Uyu ni umurwi ushobora neza na neza kubandanya gushika kw’iherezo kandi Ronaldo aracashoboye gufasha. "Mu gihe yokwipanga neza, birashobora kurangira abinjirije igitsindo c’intsinzi mu rukino rwa nyuma”.

headline: Margaret Wambui: Umunya-Kenya afise umudari wa olympic asaba ko haba umugwi wa gatatu w'abanonotsi
text: Urwego ruraba inkino z'abanonotsi (World Athletics) rukwiye gushiraho umugwi ugira gatatu mu mahiganwa kugirango ruhe amahirwe abafise urugero runini rwa testosterone yo guhiganwa ku nkino bifuza, ivyo vyasabwe n'umugore w'umunya-Kenya, Margaret Wambui yiruka imetero 800. Co kimwe n'abandi banonotsi  bashirwa mu mugwi w'abafise icitwa 'Differences of Sexual Development' canke DSD -Wambui ntashobora guhiganwa ku kirere kiri hagati y'imetero 400 na mile imwe (1.6km) hamwe n'abandi bagore kiretse abanje gufata imiti igabanya iyo nkabuzo canke uwo musemburo ya/wa testosterone. Uwo munya-Kenya yatsindiye umudari wa bronze ku metero 800 mu nkino za Olympic zo mu 2016. Wambui yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati: "Vyoba vyiza bashizeho umugwi ugira gatatu w'abanonotsi bafise testosterone nyinshi - kuko sivyo kubuza abantu gukoresha impano zabo." Urwego rujejwe izo nkino kw'isi , World Athletics, ruvuga ko ata mugambi wo gushiraho uwo mugwi rufise kandi ko ruzobandanya gushira abanonotsi mu migwu ibiri ihasanzwe y'abagabo n'abagore. Iciyumviro c'umugwi ugira  gatatu mu nkino zo kunonora imitsi cari kimaze kuvugwa, ariko Wambui abaye uwa mbere agishigikiye ku mugaragaro. Yavuze  ati: "Twoba aba mbere duhiganywe muri uwo mugwi - twoca duha intege abandi banyegeza ingene baremwe. "Twobereka ko atari amakosa yabo, ko uko ariko baremwe, kandi ko ata kibi bakoze." Uwo munonotsi w'imyaka 25, atarahiganwa kuva mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 2019, ntazokwitaba inkino za olympic za Tokyo, mu gihe vyamugoye guhitamwo kwiruka ku metero nke (100-200) canke ku kirere kirekire. Kuva World Athletics ishizeho ingingo zigenga abanonotsi bafise DSD mu 2018, nta n'umwe mu bari batahanye imidari ku metero 800 mu nkino za Rio arasubira kwiruka izo metero mu mahinganwa mpuzamakungu. Mu nkino za 2016, Wambui yabaye uwa gatatu inyuma ya Caster Semenya wo muri Afrika y'Epfo yaronse umudari w'inzahabu n'umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba yaronse umudari w'ifeza. Wambui ati: "Birababaje kubona muri abo batatu bose ata n'umwe azoba ahari. ''Baratubujije kubandanya amahiganwa, kuko siko twari twabiteguye. Ndababaye kubona ntazokwitaba Olympic  kubera amategeko ya World Athletics." Ku wa gatatu  Francine Niyonsaba yaronse umwanya usabwa kugira azohiganwe ku metero 5000. Abo batatu bashirwa mu mugwi y'abafise "differences of sexual development" kubera urugero ruruni kurusha urusanzwe ku bagore rw'umusemburo(inkabuzo) wa testosterone. Ku mategeko ya World Athletics yasohotse mu 2018, abanonotsi b'abagore bafise DSD ntibashobora guhiganwa ku birere biri hagati ya metero 400 na mile imwe (1.6km) - kiretse babanje kugabanura urwo rugero rwa testosterone, World Athletics ivuga ko ruha abanonotsi akarusho kadakwiriye ku bandi baba bariko barahiganwa nabo. Urwo rwego ruvuga ko testosterone bimwe mu vyo ituma ariko ishobora kwongereza ubushobozi bwo kutaruha n'inguvu z'imitsi, kandi ko amategeko ajanye n'aba DSD akenewe kugira ''habe ihiganwa ritarenganya kandi riri n'ico rivuze mu murwi w'anbagore". Abanonotsi barashobora  kugabanya urugero rwa testosterone mu gufata iminti canke mu kwibagisha - n'ubwo kwibagisha bidahanurwa cane. Semenya yatwaye umudari w'inzahabu wa Olympic kabiri, ari imbere ku rugamba rwo kurwanya amategeko ajanye n'abafise DSD. N'ubwo amaze gutsindwa kenshi muri sentare za Buraya, aracabandanya urugamba. Mu kwezi kwa kabiri, yajanye urubanza rwiwe muri sentare ya Buraya y'agateka ka zina muntu, avuga ko ingingo yo gusaba abanonotsi ko bahindura imibiri yabo ari ugohonyanga uburenganzira bwa zina muntu. Umugwi w'abuganganira Semenya (w'imyaka 30) , baranakema icitwa urwego rujejwe inkino - gushika ubu rufatwa nk'amashirahamwe yikorera ivyayo - mu nzira yo kurwanya amategeko ya DSD ya World Athletics. Patrick Bracher  , umwe mu bunganizi mu mategeko avuga ati: "Hamwe tworonka ingingo ya sentare ya Buraya ijejwe agateka kja zina muntu ivuga ko inzego mpuzamamakungu z'inkino atari inzego zikorera ivyazo kandi zirengeye amasezerano mpuzamakungu yereyeke agateka ka zina muntu, ico coba ari ikintu gihambaye cane ku nkino muri rusangi." "Inzego mpuamakungu z'inkino zizoca ziba nk'inzego zikora imirimo ijanye n'ama reta - kuko zitunganya ibintu ku rugero mpuzamakungu - ico coba ari ikintu gihambaye ku nkino. "World Athletics izotegerezwa guca ibifatirako kuko bazoca bamenye ko iyo bagiye muri sentare ica imanza z'inkino (urwego rw'amategeko rwa mbere rwisumbuye mu nkino) muri kazoza, amaherezo bazotegerzwa kwisunga ibintu mu buryo bwagutse gusumba: mu yandi majambo, ibibazo vy'agateka ka zina muntu." Hamwe botsindwa,  Bracher avuga ko urugamba rw'amategeko rwa  Semenya ruzoba rurangiye. Bibonwa mu buryo butandukanye Ariko , bitandukanye na Wambui, Semenya  ntashaka ko hazanwa umugwi wa gatatu mu nkino z'ubunonotsi. Bracher avuga ati : " Caster Semenya yavutse, akura, yiga kwiruka, abaho yongera ahiganwa nk'umugore, urubanza rwose rero rukaba ar'urwo uburenganzira bwiwe bwo kubikora." "Bibi gusumba ngaho ni uko ushizeho umugwi nk'uwo, bivuga ko ata muntu n'umwe yoheza ngo yiruke muri uwo mugwi atabanje kwerekana icese ibijanye n'amagara yiwe. Vyoba bisubiye kuba ibindi bipimo bifatiye ku gitsina biciye ku ngingo y'uko umuntu abivuga ubwiwe." Hagati aho World Athletics yarahakanye ko ata mugwi wa gatatu uzoshirwaho. Mw'itangazo yahaye BBC, World  Athletics yavuze iti: " Abanu bamenye ko  abanonotsi bafise DSD bagize 0.7% y'abanonotsi bose b'abagore, gutyo umugwi ugira gatatu ntiwkora ku nkino zitari nke." Gufata ibintu gutyo bisigura ko Wambui - avuga ngo "gufata imiti [igabanura testosterone] ntivyigeze binca mu mutwe" - ntazokwigera ashobora gusubira  guhiganwa ku kirere yifuza. Amaze kuvyiyumvira cane , uwo munonotsi w'imyaka 26, yaciye ahitamwo kugerageza imetero 5000, bivuze ko azomara igihe atasubira guhiganwa kuko azofata umwanya wo kumenyera ico kirere. Avuga ati: "Bizombabaza kuraba inkino za Olympic kuri television kandi nari kuba nashoboye kuzitaba. "Ariko nzoziraba kuko inkino [Sport] zindi mu maraso."

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Ronaldo, Raphinha, De Jong, Tielemans, Neves, Gnabry, Dembele
text: Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa Manchester United  Richard Arnold ariko arakora uko ashoboye kugira ngo yumvishe umusatirizi wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w’imyaka 37, guhagarika ivyo kurondera kuva muri uno murwi. (Times) United kandi yagiranye ibiganiro na Stuttgart kugira irabe ko yoronka umusatirizi wa Autriche Sasa Kalajdzic w’imyaka 25. (Sky Germany – mu kidagi) Barcelona yemeye igiciro c’imiriyoni 65 z’amapawundi zisabwa na Leeds United ku mukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Brezili Raphinha w’imyaka 25, ubu uyu murwi wo muri Espagne ukaba urajwe ishinga no kugurisha umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umunya-Hollande Frenkie de Jong w’imyaka 25 muri  Manchester United.(Mirror) Chelsea isa n’iyiri inyuma ya Barcelona mu rugamba rwo kugura Raphinha, aba-Blues bakaba bashobora guca bavuvudikira umusatirizi wa Bayern Munich umudagi Serge Gnabry w’imyaka 26. (Mail) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Leicester City umudagi Youri Tielemans w’imyaka 25, hamwe n’umunya Portugal akina hagati muri Wolves Ruben Neves w’imyaka 25, bari ku rutonde rw’abo Manchester United ishobora kwikorako mu gihe itoronka De Jong. (Talksport) Brentford iri hafi yo kuronka umwongereza akina ku ruhande mu murwi nserukiragihugu w’abatarenza imyaka 21 Keane Lewis-Potter w’imyaka 21 ku miriyoni 16 z’amapawundi avuye muri Hull City. (Athletic) Brentford kandi irizeye ko izotsinda Manchester United mu rugamba rwo kurondera umunyegori wa Albania, Thomas Strakosha w’imyaka 27 asanzwe yirebanga. (Mail) Amasezerano y’umusatirizi w’umufaransa Ousmane Dembele w’imyaka 25 mu murwi Barcelona arangira muri rino ci, ariko akaba yiteze gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha azotuma abandanya akina muri Nou Camp gushika mu 2024. (Marca) Wolves yanse igiciro c’imiriyoni 25 z’amapawundi zitangwa na Everton ku mwongereza akina hagati Morgan Gibbs-White w’imyaka 22. (Mail) Everton kandi iripfuza umwongereza akina hagati Conor Gallagher w’imyaka 22, ariko Chelsea izovyihoza gushika mu mpera z’iri ci imbere y’uko ifata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe. (The i) Fulham imaze kuvugana na Tottenham mu kurondera kugura umukinyi w’inyuma wa Pays de Galles/Wales Joe Rodon w’imyaka 24. (Football Insider) Fulham iri mu biganiro bigeze kure mu rugamba rwo kugura umukinyi w’inyuma, umuswisi Kevin Mbabu w’imyaka 27, asanzwe akina mu murwi w’Ubudagi wa Wolfsburg mu masezerano y’imiriyoni zitanu. (Evening Standard) Sevilla iripfuza umukinyi w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu wa Tottenham umunya-Espagne Sergio Reguilon.(Mail) Arsenal yemeye gutanga imiriyoni 5.9 z’amapawundi ku mukinyi w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu wa Benfica umunya-Espagne Alex Grimaldo w’imyaka 26, inyuma y’aho umunya-Ecosse Kieran Tierney amariye iminota 30 yonyene mu kibuga asubiriye gukina inyuma y’imisi yari amaze yaravunitse. (Star) Juventus na Roma yerekana ko yipfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Arsenal Lucas Torreira inyuma y’aho  Fiorentina ifatiye ingingo yo kutagura uyu munya-Uruguay w’imyaka 26 yari amaze umwaka w’inkino akina muri uno murwi wo mu Butaliyano yari yaratijijwemwo. (Evening Standard)

headline: Kenya: Evariste Ndayishimiye asaba abagwizatunga ba Kenya kujana imitahe mu Burundi
text: Prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye atera akamo abagwizatunga ba Kenya kujana imitahe yabo mu Burundi  kuko ngo mu myaka ibiri canke itatu iri imbere bashobora kuzoba bacerewe. Agishika muri Kenya, yaciye aca mu burengero bw'ico gihugu mu gisagara ca Kisumu, aho prezida n'abagize reta ya Kenya bari, bitegurira guhimbaza umusi mukuru wa Madaraka Day kuri uyu wa kabiri. Mu kiganiro bahaye abamenyeshamakuru, abakuru b'ibihugu Uhuru Kenyatta na Evariste Ndayishimiye bashimagije umubano mwiza, gufashanya muri politike, ubutunzi, gutsimbataza amahoro n'ishaka bafise ryo kubitsimbataza. Prezida Ndayishimiye yavuze ko amaze kuza muri Kenya kenshi, ariko ko ari ubwa mbere ashitse mu gisagara ca Kisumu. Yagize ati:"...Ntangajwe n'ubwiza hamwe n'iterambere nsanze muri kino gisagara." Yavuze ko Uburundi bumaze gutera intambwe mu mahoro n'umutekano, ko butakiri ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bitarangwamwo amahoro muri Onu, ashimira prezida Kenyatta ko "we ubwiwe yabigizemwo uruhara." Prezida Ndayishimiye yavuze ko ubu, Uburundi buriko burashira inguvu cane mu guteza imbere ubutunzi, aranashima ko uguhanahana ibidandazwa hagati ya Kenya n'Uburundi bigenda vyiyongera. Yvuze ati:"Ndateye akamo abagwizatunga bo muri Kenya kuza mu Burundi kukoni co gihe ciza, kurindira imyaka ibiri canke itatu, mushobora gusanga mwacerewe." Umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi kandi yatumiye mugenzi we wa Kneya Uhuru Kenyatta kugendera Uburundi.

headline: Hannah Alateju ni rurangiranwa kuri Instagram naho yacitse ibihimba

headline: U﻿kraine: Isi itegerezwa guhagarika umugambi wa nicleyere w'Uburusiya - Zelensky
text: P﻿rezida wa Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky yavuze ko abategetsi b'Uburusiya batanguye "gutegura abanyagihugu babo" kw'ishobora gukoreshwa ry'ibigwanisho vya nicleyere. A﻿riko yongeyeko ko atemeza ko Uburusiya bwiteguye kubikoresha. M﻿u kiganiro yatanze kuri BBC, prezida Zelensky yahakanye kuba yarahamagariye kugira ibitero ku Burusiya, yemeza ko ivyo aheruka kuvuga babitahuye ukutariko. A﻿vuga ku bihano, yagize ati:"Mutegerezwa gutera imigere yo kwikingira, si ugutera." M﻿u ndwi ziheze, igisirikare ca Ukraine carisubije uturere twinshi tw'igihugu mu bitero vyatumye abasirikare b'Uburusiya bata ibirindiro vyabo bari bamazemwo igihe. M﻿uco Ukraine yise inyishu y'Uburusiya ku gutsindwa, prezida Vladimir Putin yarigaruriye uturere tune twa Ukraine. I﻿co gikorwa ciyamirijwe n'abantu benshi kuko kidakurikije amategeko, catumye haba ubwoba ko iyo ngwano imaze amezi indwi ishobora kwongerekana. Prezida Putin n'abandi bategetsi b'Uburusiyabavuze ko ibigwanisho vya nicleyere - bishobora kuba ari bito bito - bishobora gukoreshwa mu ntumbero yo gukingira utwo turere, n'aho abategetsi ba Buraya bemeza ko ata kimenyetso kihari cerekana ko Uburusiya bwiteguye kubikora. A﻿vugira mu biro vyiwe i Kyiv mu congereza, prezida Zelensky yagize ati:"Batanguye gutegura abanyagihugu babo. Birateye ubwoba. "﻿Ntibiteguye kubikora, kubikoresha. Ariko batanguye kubivugako. Ntibazi nimba bazobikoresha canke batazobikoresha. Nibaza ko biteye n'ubwoba kubivuga gusa." H﻿anyuma mu ki Ukrainiya, yavuze, ariko arasubirwamwo n'umusemuzi:"Ivyo tubona n'uko abari ku butegetsi mu Burusiya bakunda iraha, rero nibaza ko ikoreshwa ry'ibigwanisho vya nicleyere atawoshoka avyemeza nk'uko abahinga bamwe babivuga, kuko barazi ko ata gusubira inyuma umaze kubikoresha, atari ku gihugu cabo gusa, ariko no kuri bo bo nyene nk'abantu." A﻿riko yahakanye ko yahamagariye kugira ibitero ku Burusiya ku mbuga hwaniro ku musi wa kane, yemeza ko ijambo yakoresheje ryo mu ki Ukrainiya ryatahuwe nabi. I﻿vyo yari yavuze vyatanguye kwiyamirizwa n'umuvugizi w'ibiro vya prezida mu Burusiya, Dmitri Peskov avuga ko "ari nk'akamo ko gutanguza intambara nshasha y'isi", mu gihe umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire y'Uburusiya n'amakungu, Sergueï Lavrov, yavuze ko bije kwerekana impamvu yumvikana yatumye Uburusiya butera Ukraine. Inyuma y'uko gusubiramwo ivyo yavuze, P﻿rezida Zelensky yagize ati:"bafashe [abarusiya] inzira bashaka, uko babona vyobagirira inyungu, baca batangura kubisigura babitumbereza mu zindi nzira."

headline: Kurandura malaria burundu – intumbero ya hafi ya OMS
text: Icegeranyo c'ishirahamwe OMS kivuga ko hari icizere ko isi ishobora kwiganzura malaria - imwe mu ndwara zimaze igihe kirekire kandi ziha inkumbi -  mu kiringo kitari kure. Buri mwaka, abarenga imiliyoni 200 barandura malaria, indwara yica cane cane abana bakiri bato. Ihitana abantu barenga 435.000 ku mwaka, abenshi bakaba ari abana. Mu Burundi igisata ca ONU kijejwe ubutabazi, OCHA, kivuga ko abantu imiliyoni zitanu n'ibihumbi amajana indwi banduye malariya muri uno mwaka, igitigiri kingana hafi igice c'abanyagihugu bose muri ico gihugu. Muri abo bantu bose, abangana 1801 barahitanywe n'iyo ndwara iterwa n'umubu kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere gushika ku wa 21 z'ukw'indwi. Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko kurandurana n'imizi malaria itakiri indoto ya kure, n'aho gukuraho umugera uyitera bishobora gusaba imiliyaridi zishika zibiri ziyongera ku mafaranga akoreshwa ku mwaka. Abahinga bavuga ko kurandurana n'imizi malaria ari yo "ntumbero nyamukuru". Isi iramaze gutera intambwe itari nto mu kurwanya iyo ndwara. Kuva mu 2000: Ibi vyatumwe n'uko uburyo bw'ukwikingira imibu bwakwiragiye, nk'akarorero gukoresha imisegetera irimwo umuti, hamwe n'imiti ikomeye y'ukuvura abafashwe n'iyo ndwara. Hagati aho, Dr Winnie Mpanju-Shumbusho, umwe mu bakoze ico cegeranyo akomoka muri Tanzania, avuga ati: "N'aho hari intambwe ishimishije, malaria ibandanya kuba intambamyi kw'iterambere". "Ivyo biribonekeza cane muri Afurika, aho ibihugu bitanu gusa vyikoreye hafi igice c'abarwaye malaria kw'isi". Ari nka hamwe malaria yoshobora kurwanywa burundu kw'isi, yoba ari intambwe y'akataraboneka. Ico cegeranyo casabwe n'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, mu myaka itatu iheze kugira ngo bihweze ingene vyogenda n'uburyo bukenewe. Abahinga karuhariwe mu biraba malaria n'abo mu butunzi, bashitse ku cegeranyo ko ivyo bishoboka gushika mu mwaka wa 2050. Ico cegeranyo casohotse mu kinyamakuru c'ubushakashatsi mu vy'amagara y'abantu ca Lancet, kivugwa ko ari co ca mbere kibayeho muri urwo rwego. Sir Richard Feachem, umwe muri abo bashakashatsi, avuga ati: "Kuva kera, kurwanya malaria burundu yamye ari indoto ya kure, ariko ubu turafise ivyemezo ko ishobora kandi itegerezwa kuba yaranduranywe n'imizi gushika mu 2050". Hagati aho, aragabisha ko ivyo bizosaba "ingingo zikomeye" kugira ngo iyo ntumbero ishikweko. Muri ico cegeranyo, niho abahinga bavuga ko baravye ingene ibintu bimeze ubu, "igice kinini ku isi kizoba cariganzuye malaria" imbere ya 2050. Hagari aho, hazokwibonekeza akarere malaria izobandanya yigira ndanse muri Afrika, kava muri Senegali mu buraruko bushira uburengerazuba, gushika muri Mozambike mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Afrika. Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko kugira ngo malaria izobe yaranduranywe n'imizi gushika mu 2050, bizosaba ko ubuhinga busanzwe buriho ubu bukoreshwa neza gusumba, kandi hagatorwa n'ubundi buryo bushasha. Ubwo buhinga buriko bwiyumvirwako ni ubuzotuma imibu idashobora kurondoka bigatuma igabanuka mu bwinshi, canke bugatuma  itagira ubushobozi bwo gukwiragiza iyo migera. Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko gushika ubu, amafaranga akoreshwa kuri malaria arenga gato imiliyaridi 4.3 z'amadolari buri mwaka. Hazokenerwa izindi miliyaridi zibiri z'amadolari buri mwaka kugira ngo isi ishobore kwiganzura malaria gushika mu 2050. Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko kuronka ayo mahera yiyongerako ari "ikintu kitoroshe".  Hagati aho kivuga ko kwiganzura malaria bizogira ingaruka nziza ku mibereho n'ubutunzi bw'ibihugu "gusumba kure n'iyo ayo mahera akenewe". Umukuru wa OMS, Dr Tedros Ghebreyesus, ati: "Kurwanya malaria ni imwe mu ntumbero y'inzego zijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi mu kiringo c'ikinjana cose, ariko biboneka ko kikiri mu bibazo ngorabahizi gushika ubu". Aremera ko malaria idashobora kurwanywa ngo ihere hagikoreshwa uburyo busanzwe buhari, na rirya avuga ko nka bwose ari ubwatanguye gukoreshwa mu kinjana giheze canke imbere y'aho.

headline: Qatar 2022: Luis Suarez yanse gusaba imbabazi ku vyo yakoreye Ghana mu 2010
text: Umusatirizi wa Uruguay Luis Suarez yanse gusaba imbabazi ku mupira yateye n’amaboko igihe igihugu ciwe gikina na Ghana mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose mu 2010. Suarez yahawe ikarata itukura ku munota wa nyuma wa ya minota 30 y’inyongera mu rukino rw’igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, ivyatumye umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Ghana, Black Stars, babura igitsindo ku mupira wari ugeze ku murongo w’igori ugiye kwinjira, ariko agaca awutera n’amaboko n’ibigirankana. Iyo ico gitsindo cinjira, caca gituma Ghana iba igihugu ca mbere ca Afrika cari kuba gishitse mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi mu mateka y’umupira w’amaguru ku mugabane wa Afrika. Ghana yaciye ihabwa penaliti, ni ukuvuga wa mupira baterera ku metero 11 uvuye kw’igori, ariko Asamoah Gyan, kizigenza wa Black Stars ico gihe, arayihusha, maze Uruguay ica iba ari yo ibandanya. "Umukinyi wa Ghana niwe yahushije penalty, si jewe", niko Suarez yavuze imbere y’uko ino mirwi isubira guhura mu rukino rwa nyuma rwo mw’itsinda G kuri uyu wa gatanu, mu gikombe c’isi yose. Ghana iza guhura na Uruguay izi neza ko mu gihe yoramuka itsinze ica ibandanya mu gice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma - igice ca mbere co gukuranamwo  – ariko mu gihe yotsindwa, uyo murwi wo muri Amerika y’Epfo ni woca ubandanya bishitse Korea y’Epfo ikananirwa no gutsinda Portugal. Ari nka hamwe Uruguay na Korea y’Epfo vyompi vyotsinda, boca baraba uwusumvya uwundi ibitsindo -  bibaye ngombwa bagaharura ibitsindo vyinjijwe – kugira ngo hamenyekane uwubandanya hagati y'ibi bihugu bibiri, bikaba bizwi ko uyu murwi nserukira gihugu wo muri Aziya ufise ideni ry’igitsindo kimwe. Ni bwo bwa mbere Ghana na Uruguay bizoba bihuye inyuma y’urwo rukino haraciye imyaka 12, Suarez yahoze ari umusatirizi wa Liverpool akaba yumva ko adakeneye kwigaya, inyuma y’aho umunyamakuru wa Ghana amubwiriye ko bamwe mu banyagihugu b’iki gihugu ca Afrika bamubona “nk’ishetani nyayo”. Ati: "Nta Mbabazi nshobora kubisabira. Nosaba imbabazi mu gihe hari uwo navunye canke nakomerekeje, ariko kuri urya mupira nateje ukuboko, narawuherewe igihano c’ikarata itukura. "Si ikosa ryanje kuko si jewe nahushije penaliti". Inyifato yiwe yateje uburakari muri Ghana, bitewe cane cane n’ingene yatamvye agatarika ari hanze y’ikibuga igihe Uruguay itsinda ku mapenalti. Umurwi wa Suarez wagiye gutsindirwa mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma n’Ubuholande. Hagati aho, abakinyi b’umurwi nserukiragihugu ba Ghana b’iki gihe barondera kwima amatwi abavuga ivyo kwihora Suarez na Uruguay, mu gihe kizigenza wayo André Ayew – ari na we mukinyi wenyene asigaye mu bakinye mu 2010 – avuga ko yishakira kubandanya n’ibiri imbere. Ati: "Bose barababaye cane [mu 2010] ariko kuri jewe, nshaka ko mbandanya ku ntambwe ikurikira. “Kwihora canke kutihora, twipfuza ko twese tugenda dufise ishaka rimwe ryo gutsinda. "Ivy’inyuma si ndaba, si nshaka kurazwa ishinga n’ivyabaye muri kahise”.

headline: M﻿ukansanga: Kuva mu Rwanda  gushika Qatar 2022 - 'kwugururira' abandi bagore
text: Umunyarwandakazi Salima Mukansanga yizeye ko kuba yatowe ngo ahagarikire inkino z'igikombe c'isi 2022 bizofasha kwugurura imiryango ku bandi bagore bo muri Afrika bavyifuza. Muri uyu mwaka, yabaye umugore wa mbere mu guhagarikira urukino rw'abagabo mu gikombe ca Afrika, mu gihe mu mwaka uheze yari yahagarikiye mu nkino za Olympic i Tokyo. Uwo mugore w'imyaka 34 yizigiye ko kuba ari mu bagore batandatu ba mbere b'imboneza -hamwe na bagenziwe batatu b'abahagarikizi Stephanie Frappart na  Yoshimi Yamashita hamwe n'abunganizi b'abahagarikizi batatu nyene - mw'ihiganwa ry'abagabo bizotanga amahirwe ku bagore benshi. Mukansanga yabwiye BBC Sport Afrika ati: "Ni iteka n'ibakwe kuko ntivyari bwigere biba". "Bivuze ko ugiye kuba uwa mbere kandi ugiye kwugurura umuryango ku bandi bagore, na cane cane abagore bo muri Afrika." "Uba wiremetse  vyinshi ku bitugu vyawe, kandi  utegerezwa kuvyiremeka neza, kugira abandi babone ko umuryango wuguruye ubu bashobora kuwucamwo. "Biraryoshe kandi ni amahirwe abagore baronse. Bisigura ko amahiwe ahari - ni twebwe rero dutegerezwa kuyafata hanyuma  tukayakoresha mu gutera imbere." Mukansanga asanzwe ari umumenyereza w'urwego rw'umupira w'amaguru kuva mu 2012, yavuye kure imbere yo gushika mu rwego rwa mbere rw'umupira w'amaguru  muri Afrika igihe yaja guhagarikira muri Cameroun. Akiri umukobwa muto, yabwiwe ko atari bwakure bihagije kugira aje mu mugwi w'igihugu w'abatarakwiza imyaka 17 muri basketball gutyo aca ahitamwo gushimikira ku mupira w'amaguru. Amaze akanya gato nk'umukinyi, yabonye itangazo ryo guhamagara abashaka kwiga ivyo guhagarikira - kandi nti bwari ubwa mbere -ati ivyo ntivyoncika. Yaciye yegera urwego rw'Urwanda rw'umupira w'amaguru (Ferwafa) asaba kuja mu cigwa c'uguhagarikira buno nyene agiheza amashure yisumbuye ariko baramwankira, naho nyene bashingiye ku myaka yiwe. Gutyo Mukansanga yacviye yiyigisha wenyene  ivyo guhagarikira, amategeko y'urukino, mu nyuma arahava arahabwa amahirwe na Ferwafa  yo kwigana n'abandi bashaka kuba abahagarikizi. Iyo nzira itamworoheye ubu yamuvanye guhagarikira inkino z'abagabo mu gihugu ciwe c'Urwanda, ashika  mu gikombe ca Afrika c'abagore co mu 2016, mu gikombe c'isi c'abagore mu 2019 hanyuma no mu nkino za Olympic zabereye Tokyo. Mu Buyapani yahagarikiye inkino z'abagore z'Ubwongereza na Chili  na Australia n'urwa Hollande n'Ubushinwa. Itariku 18 ukwezi kwa mbere  yanditse amateka  ari mu yatumye ashika ku ntabwe agezeko ubu. Niwe yari ahagarikiye mu kibuga hagati urukino rw'abagabo rwahuza Zimbabwe na Guinea mu gikombe c'isi ca Afrika  cabereye muri Cameroun. Mu gihe yari yabanje kwankirwa akatari gake hanyuma akakirwa ata gishika cinshi mu gisata gisanzwe ciganziwe n'abagabo, uwo munyarwandakzi yarahanganye n'intambamyi zijane n'uwo mwuga. Asigura ati: "Dutegerezwa gukora cane, cane cane mu gisata ciganziwe n'abagabo. Utegerezwa gukora incuro zibiri gusumba. "Hanyuma ukaba uvyiyumvamwo cane, kuko udafise kuvyiyumvamwo, uca uruha hanyuma ukabiheba. Ariko ntidushaka guheba. "Dutegerezwa kuba twateye intambwe imbere hanyuma tugakorera hamwe, tugakira ico dushitseko hanyuma uruganba tukarufatanya."
