Umwigisha mu vyo guhagarikira wo mu rwego rw'umupira muri Afrika (Caf) Jerome Damon yemeza ko Mukansanga aho ageze ahakwiye vy'ukuri, kuba yahagarikiye inkino za mbere zikomeye ku rwego rw'umugabane wose  haba mu bagabo canke mu bagore. Damon avuga ati: "Ni intambwe y'igitangaza- ari mu kibanza kimuha amahirwe ata wundi afise aho ari umwe muri bake bashobora kuja mu gikombe c'isi c'abakuze mu bagabo no mu bagore". "Ntivyari bwabe muri kahise, ivyo bivuga vyinshi kw'iterambere ry'uguhagarikira muri Afrika." Damon, yahagarikiye  mu  mahiganwa y'ibikombe bine vya Afrika, avuga ko abo bagore batandatu batowe  ubwa mbere muri kahise k'igikombe c'isi bashitse muri ivyo bibanza babikwiye -kandi hazorabwa cane ivyo bazokora kurusha ko ari ab'igitsinagore. Ashimika avuyga ati: "Dukeneye gutahura ko kuba abagore bashizwe mu mahiganwa bitabaye kubera ari abagore. Ni ukubera babishoboye, kuko ari abahagarikizi ku rwego rwo hejuru". Mukansanga azoba ari kumwe muri Qatar na  Frappart wo mu Bufaransa na Yamashita wo mu Buyapani, hamwe n'abunganizi b'abahagarikizi Neuza Back wo muri Bresil, na  Karen Diaz Medina wo muri Mexique hamwe  na  Kathryn Nesbitt wo muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (US). Mukansanga ati: "Turashigikirana kuko tuva mu mihingo itandukanye ariko tugiye kuzokorera hamwe kugira abagore  bashobore ". "Umugore ashigikiye uwundi mugore, nta keka muzobona umusaruro. "Hari inzitizi, hari imitego hari ingorabahizi. Tugiye guhangana n'ivyo. Nta na kimwe dushobora kubikorako kiretse kuja kurugamba n'umutima uri hmwe, n'umwete hanwe no kwitanga - aho rero tuzoheza tubineshe." Mukansanga yahagarikiye urukino rw'umupira w'amaguru ahantu hambere hakirurutse ku musozi wa Kilimanjaro muri Tanzania haraheze imyaka itatu, arazi ko i Qatar azoba ahanzwe n'amaso menshi kurusha uravye ingene igikombe c'isi ari ihiganwa rya mbere rikomeye muri uwo mukino. "Abantu ntibashobora kwama bagushima, na cane cane uwutsinzwe. Wewe ico ukora rero ni ugukora ico utegerezwa gukora - kuguma ku murongo, ntuje inyuma y'ingene amategeko y'umukino ategerezwa gutahurwa, uyakurikize hamwe n'ico urukino rusaba. "Hanyuma , basubiye inyuma bakaraba, bazovuga bati, 'Ego, ivyo yakoze vyari vyo."

headline: Trump asaba ko US yokwitaho umutekano w'amashure imbere ya Ukraine
text: Uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Donald Trump atera akamo abashingamateka b'iki gihugu kwitaho gushira amafaranga mu mutekano w'amashure hakurungika imfashanyo ya gisirikare muri Ukraine. Mw'ijambo yashikirije mu nama ihuza abashigikiye itegeko riha uburenganzira abanyagihugu gutunga inkoho, Trump ntabona ukungene Amerika "ishobora kuba ifise imiriyaridi 40 z'amadorari yo kurungikira Ukraine" ariko ikaba idashobora gukingira umutekano w'amashure. Inama y'ishirahamwe ryishinze gukingira itegeko riha uburenganzira abanyagihugu gutunga inkoho, National Rifle Association (NRA), iriko ibera i Houston. Avuze aya majambo inyuma y'imisi mike abantu 21, harimwo abana 19, biciwe mu gitero c'umusore yitwaje inkoho kw'ishure rimwe ryo muri Texas. Mw'iri jambo yashikirije nijoro ku wa gatanu agakomerwa amashi menshi cane, Trump avuga ati: "Imbere y'uko tuza kwubaka ibindi bihugu kw'isi, twategerezwa kubanza kwubakira abana bacu amashure atekanye mu gihugu cacu". Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka za Amerika  (Congrès/Congress) zaremeje ku rugero runini imfashanyo ya gisirikare kuri Ukraine ingana hafi n'imiriyaridi 40 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Yose hamwe, abashingamateka n'abakenguzamateka bamaze kurungika imiriyaridi 54 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika muri Ukraine kuva Uburusiya buteye iki gihugu mu kwa kabiri. Trump abandanya ati: "Congrès yategerezwa kwemeza vuba bwango kugarukana ifaranga ryose turakoreshejwe muri ya mafaranga yo gufasha abakozweko na Covid. "Intara ni ziyasubize hanyuma akoreshwe ningoga mu gushiraho uburyo butavogerwa bwo gucungera umutekano ku mashure yose yo ku butaka bwacu". Trump ariyamiriza abasaba ko hoba ugucungera ibijanye no gutunga inkoho, akavuga ko abanyamerika bategerezwa kugira uburenganzira bwo kwivuna "akabi". Ahubwo asaba ko hosubirwamwo "kuva hasi gushika hejuru" integuro ijanye no gucungera umutekano w'amashure, nko gushinga irembo rimwe ricungerewe cane ku bigo vy'amashure, harimwo ubuhinga bwo gucungera ko ata muntu yinjiza icuma kandi ishure ryose rikaba rifise n'imiburiburi umupolisi yohabwa ikirwanisho. Yagiriza aba Democrats kuzibira ingingo zo gucungera umutekano nk'izi. Uyu mu Repubulika yahoze arongoye Amerika yatanguye ijambo ryiwe asoma amazina y'abaguye mu gitero c'umusore yitwaje inkoho i Uvalde, rimwe rimwe ryose rigakurikirwa n'inkengeri. Ahejeje gusoma amazina y'abantu 21 bose biciwe muri ico gitero kw'ishure i Uvalde, Trump yavuze ati: "Kubera hari ikibi, ni kimwe mu bituma vyiza cane bituma itegeko rirekurira banyagihugu gutunga ikirwanisho, ntiribaka ikirwanisho". Iyi nama ya NRA - rifise abanywanyi imiriyoni zitanu -  yama iba uko umwaka utashe, iriko ibera ku birometero 450 uvuye i Uvalde, ahabereye iki gitero c'agahomerabunwa. Imbere y'uko iyi nama itangura, abatari bake mu bashikirije ijambo bo ku ruhande rw'aba Conservateurs/Conservative hamwe n'abanyamuziki batangaje ko biyonjoroye - harimwo buramatari wa Texas  Greg Abbott, umukenguzamateka John Cornyn hamwe n'uwahinguye irya nkoho yakoreshejwe mu gitero ca Uvalde. Trump yifatiye mu gahanga abo biyonjoroye, mu kubwira abari aho ati: "Jewe sinabahemukiye ngo ndeke kwitaba nk'abo bandi". Mw'iryo jambo ryiwe, Trump kandi yateye akamo Amerika "guhindura cane integuro ijanye n'abafise ibibazo vyo mu mutwe". Yarateye akamo nk'ako igihe yari akiri umukuru w'igihugu, n'aho muri ico gihe abamunegura bamwagirije ko yariko agerageza guhagarika amafaranga yari agenewe imigambi y'ubuvuzi harimwo no kwitaho abafise ibibazo vyo mu mutwe. imbere y'uko Turmp ashikiriza ijambo, umukenguzamateka wo muri Texas Ted Cruz yavuze ko ibitero vy'abarasa abantu mu kivunga biva kuri ba serugo batitaho imiryango, abantu batakija mu masengero, imbuga hwaniro hamwe n'amavidewo y'udukino. Umukenguzamateka Cruz ashimangira ko ashigikiye cane iri tegeko riha uburenganzira abanyagihugu gutunga inkoho, aca asaba abari bitavye iyi nama "ko mu kwishura ikibi batoca bahonyanga ibwirizwashingiro canke uburenganzira bw'abanyagihugu bagendera ku mategeko". Hanze y'aho iyo nama ibera, habaye imyiyerekano yahuriyemwo amajana n'amajana y'abatera ivyatsi ishiramawe NRA. Bari bafise ivyapa vyanditseko ngo "NRA yica inzoya",  "kingira abana hagukingira inkoho", bafise n'imisaraba hamwe n'amasanamu y'abaguye muri ico gitero.

headline: Vincent Kompany ariko arondera abakinyi muri TP Mazembe ya Kongo
text: Umumenyereza mushasha w'umurwi wa Anderlecht, Vincent Kompany, ariko arondera abakinyi muri Kongo mu twigoro two gusubira gukomeza uwo murwi wo mu Bubirigi. Anderlecht ntiyashoboye kuronka uburenganzira bw'uguhiganirwa ibikombe ku rwego rw'umugabane wa Bulaya mu mwaka uza w'inkino. Uyu murwi witeguye kugura abakinyi Meschak Elia na Arsene Zola basanzwe bakina muri TP Mazembe muri Kongo. TP Mazembe iremeza igurishwa ry'abo bakinyi, ariko nta nsiguro itanga. Eka n'umurwi Anderlecht ntaco uratangaza. Umukinyi Elia w'imyaka 22 asanzwe akina ku ruhande, yaheruka kuja kwimenyereza mu murwi Standard Liege, yaranageragejwe mu murwi Bursaspor wo muri Turukiya, ariko bikaba bitagenze neza. Asanzwe ari i Cairo mu Misiri mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Kongo uri mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika (CAN 2019), witeze gukina na Madagascar mu gice c'umunani gishira ica nyuma. Bitegekanijwe ko azova i Cairo agenda i Buruseli mu Bubirigi, ivya Kongo muri iryo higanwa birangiye. Arsene Zola wewe yitezwe i Buruseli ejo ku munsi wa gatandatu nk'uko bitangazwa n'ibinyamakuru vy'Ububirigi. Zola yavutse ku wa 23 z'ukwa kabiri 1996 nk'uko vyerekanwa ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'umurwi TP Mazembe. Haciye imyaka itatu atanguye gukina, akaba yarerekanye ubuhinga bukomeye igihe umurwi TP Mazembe watsindira igikombe c'imirwi yabaye iya mbere muri Afrika mu mwaka wa 2017. Sibwo bwa mbere umurwi TP Mazembe ugurisha abakinyi mu gihugu c'Ububirigi. Mu kwa mbere kwa 2017, waragurishije abakinyi Merveille Bokadi, Jonathan Bolingi na Christian Luyinduma mu murwi Standard Liege. Hari haciye imyaka indwi umurwi Anderlecht uguze abakinyi Patou Kabangu na Bedi Mbenza bompi ibakuye muri TP Mazembe nyene, ariko bikaba bitabagendeye neza.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira i Buraya: Mourinho, De Gea, Aguero, Bissouma, Zidane, Benteke, Silva
text: Igenwa rya Jose Mourinho ngo abe umumenyereza wa Roma mw'ihiganwa ry'umwaka uza w'inkino rishobora gutuma umukinyi wo hagati w'umutariyano Lorenzo Pellegrini w'imyaka 24 yimukira muri Liverpool, ni mu gihe Mourinho ashaka kugura abakinyi asanzwe azi cane, harimwo Nemanja Matic, umunya Serbia w'imyaka 32 asanzwe akinira Manchester United.(Mirror) Mourinho kandi arizeye ko, mu gihe azoba atanguye ibikorwa muri Roma, ashobora gukorana n'umunyegori wa Manchester United, umunya Espagne David De Gea w'imyaka 30. (Todofichajes - in Spanish) Barcelona yatanguye ibiganiro n'abaserukira wa musatirizi w'umunya Argentina Sergio Aguero w'imyaka 32 yiteze kurangiza amasezerano afitaniye na  Manchester City mu ci riza. (Sky Sports) Arsenal iri imbere mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Brighton Yves Bissouma w'imyaka 24, ni mu gihe Tottenham, West Ham na Everton na yo nyene iriko iramurondera.  (Express) Manchester City nayo nyene iriko iraraba ingene yogura uyu mukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Mali Bissouma, inyuma y'aho ikuriyemwo akarenge mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wa  West Ham, Declan Rice w'imyaka 22. (Star) Manchester United yabwiwe ko nimba mu ci riza yipfuza umusatirizi wa  Eintracht Frankfurt, umunya Portugal Andre Silva w'imyaka 25 itegerezwa kwegeranya imiriyoni zirenga 48 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Express) Umumenyereza wa Brighton & Hove Albion, Graham Potter ubu afise imyaka 45, ashobora kutemererwa kuva muri uyo murwi mu gihe  Tottenham, isanzwe itagira umumenyereza, yomurondera, ibi bivugwa n'umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa Brighton & Hove Albion Paul Barber. (Argus) Umumenyereza wa Leeds United umunya Argentina Marcelo Bielsa aripfuza kugumana umukinyi w'inyuma wo ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu Ezgjan Alioski w'imyaka 29, ariko ntabona neza kazoza k'uyu munya Macedonia asanzwe ariko araronderwa na  Galatasaray yo muri Turukiya. (Yorkshire Evening Post) Chelsea irondera kugabanya abakinyi b'inyuma kugira ngo irondere amahera yo kugura abakinyi bandi mu ci, bikaboneka ko umunya Espagne Marcos Alonso w'imyaka 30 n'umutariyano akina inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu Emerson Palmieri w'imyaka 26 bashobora gusezera Stamford Bridge. (Goal) Hagati aho, Chelsea na Inter Milan ziteguriye kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Bosnia,  Miralem Pjanic w'imyaka 31 adakunze gukinishwa cane muri Barcelona yashitsemwo mu ci riheze avuye muri Juventus. (Sport) Umukinyi Ashley Young w'imyaka 35 avuga ko bishobora kumugora kwirengagiza gusubira mu murwi wamureze Watford mu gihe womurondera ntanashobore kugiriranira ayandi masezerano mashasha na Inter Milan mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'umwaka w'inkino uza. (Sky Sports) Umukinyi w'inyuma w'umufaransa Florian Thauvin w'imyaka 28, umukinyi ari mu rutonde rw'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubufaransa uherutse gutsindira igikombe c'isi yose, yanse kuja gukinira Crystal Palace ahubwo akaba azova mu murwi wiwe Marseille akaja gukina mu murwi  Tigres wo muri Mexique mu ci riza. (La Provence - in French) Abakinyi ba Real Madrid bafise ubwoba ko umumenyereza wabo, umufaransa Zinedine Zidane w'imyaka 48 "arushe kandi ashavuye", kandi ko azohava ava muri uyu murwi mu ci riza atanarangije amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi asigaje umwaka umwe.  (Goal) Inyuma y'aho Real Madrid ikuriwe na Chelsea mw'ihiganwa ry'imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Buraya (Champions League) igeze mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma, abakinyi Eden Hazard umubirigi w'imyaka 30, umunya Bresil Marcelo w'imyaka 32 akina inyuma, hamwe n'umunya Espagne   Isco w'imyaka 29 akina hagati, baboneka ko batari muri kazoza k'uyu murwi.  (Marca - in Spanish) Umukinyi w'imbere wa Crystal Palace n'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ububirigi Christian Benteke  ashobora kuja gukinira umurwi Fenerbahce, atagisabwe, ni mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n'uyo murwi azorangira ku wa 30 z'ukwa gatandatu. (Sun) Everton yemereye amasezerano mashasha umukinyi w'inyuma w'Umwongereza Joe Anderson w'imyaka 20 mu gihe imirwi itari mike yo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza iriko iramurondera cane, na rirya amasezerano afitaniye n'umurwi wiwe azorangira mu ci riza. (Liverpool Echo) Atletico Madrid irashaka kugura mu ci riza umukinyi wa Barcelona, umunya Espagne Riqui Puig w'imyaka 21. (Fichajes - in Spanish) Barcelona na Paris Saint-Germain ziriko zirarondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Monaco, umunya Bresil Caio Henrique w'imyaka 23. (UOL - in Portuguese)

headline: Umuti wa mbere wa SIDA uterwa mu rushinge ukamara igihe kirekire wemejwe
text: Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi barwaye umugera wa SIDA bagiye guhabwa umuti uterwa mu rushinge ukamara igihe kirekire, maze bagahagarika vya binini bama bafata buri musi. Abagiraneza bishimiye cane uyu muti mushasha wemejwe n'ikigo kijejwe ubuvuzi mu Bwongereza NHS. Uyu muti utuma umugera ugabanya inguvu, ukaba ukora co kimwe na vya binini vyo gupfupfahaza bisanzwe bifatwa buri musi. Vyitezwe ko mu Bwongereza abantu bababa 13.000 bashobora guca bahindukirira uyu muti. Imiti Cabotegravir (uzwi kandi kw'izina rya Vocabria ukaba wahinguwe n'ikigo ViiV Healthcare) hamwe na rilpivirine (uwu nawo ukaba uzwi kandi nka Rekambys wahinguwe na Janssen) ni imiti iterwa incuro zibiri rumwe rumwe ukwarwo rimwe mu mezi abiri. Hagati aho, uwu muti ugirira akamaro gusa barya bantu bageze ku rugero rw'aho umugera utakiboneka mu maraso inyuma y'igihe bariko barafata vya binini. Abahinga bavuga ko uwu muti ushobora kugirira akamaro abantu benshi. Umwigisha wa kaminuza Chloe Orkin, akaba ari umuhinga mu bijanye n'umugera wa SIDA kuri kaminuza ya Queen Mary i Londres/London, avuga ko uwu muti ushobora kugabaniriza abarwayi umuzigo wo kwama bafata vya binini buri musi, kuko wowo bazowuterwa incuro zitandatu gusa mu mwaka. Muganga Sanjay Bhagani, arongoye ishirahamwe European Aids Clinical Society, avuga ati: "Iki ni ikintu gikomeye cane". "Kunenwa ni ikibazo gikomeye cane ku banduye umugera wa SIDA, kandi abatari bake ntiboroherwa no gufata ibinini imisi yose. Ibi rero bizotuma abenshi baronswa uwu muti uterwa mu rushinge". Alex Sparrowhawk w'i Manchester, asanzwe akora mw'ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya SIDA rizwi nka Terrence Higgins Trust. Haciye imyaka 12 yanduye umugera wa SIDA, kuva ico gihe akaba ari ku binini vya  ART imisi yose. Avuga ko ari ikintu kiryoheye ugutwi kwumva ko hari uwundi muti ushobora kugabanya uwu muzigo. "Iyi nkuru ni ikintu abantu benshi bari bamaze igihe kirekire barindiranye igishika. "Iciyumviro co guterwa umuti incuro zitandatu gusa mu mwaka hagufata imiti ya misi yose ni ikintu gishimishije cane. Kwibuka ko wama ufata imiti ya SIDA  buri musi vyama bwikwibutsa ko urwaye SIDA  kandi ntibishobora kukuvamwo. "Hari abantu bashobora kuba babana n'abandi batazi ko banduye canke batanduye umugera, canke usanga bakora mu buzi bubatuma bazunguruka irya n;ino kw'isi, ibi bigashobora kuba inzitizi ku kwama umuntu afata imiti imisi yose". Kubw'iwe, abakwiye gushirwa imbere mu kuronswa uwu muti ni abo bose bawukeneye cane gusumba abandi, nk'akarorero abasanzwe bahura n'ikibazo co kunenwa.

headline: Uganda Election 2021: Bariko baraharura amajwi y'amatora
text: Hatanguye guharurwa amajwi y'amatora yabaye kuri uyu wa kane muri Uganda mu mutekano wakajijwe cane kuva hasigaye isaha imwe ngo gutora birangire. Imodoka zzirimwo abasirikare zanyuragiye ku murwa mukuru Kampala, igipolisi naco n'banyagihugu bicungerera umutekano bakaba bariko barakizura. Mu bibanza bimwe bimwe gutira kwabandanije inyuma y'isaha ico gikorwa categerezwa  gugararariko. Amategeko agenga gutora avuga ko abantu bose basanzwe  ku mirongo barekuriwe gutora inyuna y'isaha yo guhagarika ico gikorwa. Prezida Yoweri Museveni amaze imyaka 35 atwara Uganda arondera ikindi kiringo kigira gatandatu c'ubutegetsi. Museveni w'imyaka 76 ahiganwa n'abandi 10, ukomeye cane muri bo akaba ari Robert Kyagulanyi azwi cane nka Boby Wine, umuririmvyi n'umunyepolitike w'imyaka 38. Imyiyamamazo yaranzwe n'intureka irimwo n'ubwicanyi vyatose cane cane abatavuga rumwe na reta. Ku munsi w'amatora ariko  ahanini nta ngorane z'umutekano zavuzwe. Ivyavuye mu matora bizomenyeshwa ku wa gatandatu. Internet n'imbuga hwaniro   vyarahagaritswe. N'uburyo bwo guhanahana amafaranga ku buhinga bushasha ntibwakora.

headline: Umushikiranganji wa mbere w’ Ubuyapani aragabisha Afrika ku madeni y’umurengera
text: Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubuyapani aragabisha abategetsi ba Afrika ku ngaruka z'ugufata amadeni menshi, nk'uko bishikirizwa n'itororokaniriza ry'amakuru AFP. Ayo majambo ya Shinzo Abe afatwa nk'igabisha ku ruhara rw'Ubushinwa muri Afrika mu gihe buvugwa ko bushira imbere amakompanyi yabwo mu migambi ikomeye kuri uwo mugabane. Yabwiye abategetsi bari mu nama i Yokohama muri ico gihugu yerekeye iterambere rya Afrika ko Ubuyapani bwipfuza guteza imbere imitahe "ngirakamaro" yoshigikirwa n'amashirahamwe y'Ubuyapani. AFP ivuga ko ico gihugu gitegekanya kwigisha abahinga 30 bava mu bihugu vya Afrika  mu myaka itatu iri imbere ku buryo bwo guhangana n'ibiza n'amadeni ku gihugu. Avuga ko abakora imigambi y'iterambere boterwa intege kugira ngo bashobore guteza imbere ubutunzi ku mugabane wa Afrika. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubuyapani yasubiwemwo amajambo avuga ati: " Mu gihe ibihugu bigenzi vyugarijwe n'amadeni y'umurengera, bica biba inzitizi kuri uyo wese yari afise imigambi y'ukuzana imitahe yabo". Bwana Abe ari mu barongoye inama mpuzamakungu ya Tokyo kw'iterambere rya Afrika (Ticad), ikaba yateguwe mu gihe Ubushinwa buriko bushinga imizi muri Afrika. Ubuyapani buvuga ko intumbero bufise kuri Afrika ari ukuyifata mu mugongo mu buryo bw'amafaranga n'ikoreshwa ryayo, intumbero itandukanye n'iyo Ubushinwa.

headline: Messi ashaka Manchester City gusumba PSG, Klopp ati: 'nta wutamushaka mu murwi wiwe'
text: Jurgen Klopp, umumenyereza wa Liverpool avuga ko ata mugambi afise wo kurondera Lionel Messi, ariko akavuga ko uyu mukinyi vyomubera vyiza agiye gukina mw'igihangwa ry'Ubwongereza, Premier League. Mu gihe kazoza k'uyu mukinyi kariko kavugwako vyinshi cane kuva amenyesheje ko yipfuza kuva muri Barcelona, Klopp avuga ko "ata mahirwe" ko uyu mukinyi akinira Liverpool. Abajijwe nimba yoba yipfuza kugura uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 33, Klopp yishuye ati: "Ni nde mumenyereza atipfuza kubona Messi mu murwi wiwe?" "Ikibazo si imyaka kuri twebwe, ariko dukeneye umukinyi mwiza, aho rero mvugishije ukuri". Messi avugwa ko yipfuza gusubirana n'uwahoze ari umumenyereza wa Barça Pep Guardiola ubu asanzwe amenyereza Manchester City. Ku rundi ruhande, ikinyamakuru co mu Bufaransa L'Equipe kivuga ko Lionel Messi ashima Manchester City gusumba Paris St-Germain, nk'uko bivugwa na se wiwe, akaba ari nawe amuserukira. Ku wa kabiri, imbere y'uko amenyesha Barcelona ko yipfuza kuva muri uyu murwi, Messi yabanje no guterefona Pep Guardiola, umumenyereza wa Man city, yigeze no kumenyereza Barça. Yamubwiye ati: "Ndipfuza gutsindira imipira y'inzahabu ibiri iri imbere, kandi mbona ko ibi nobishikako mu gihe noba ndi kumwe nawe". Klopp avuga ko coba ari ikintu gikomeye mu gihe Messi yokwinjira muri Manchester City woca ukomera cane kandi bikaba ari ibintu vyogora kuwutsinda. Ni mu gihe hari amakuru yavuga ko Manchester City yashobora gutanga Bernardo Silva, Riyad Mahrez na Gabriel Jesus ikabaguza na Messi, ariko uyu murwi warabihakanye. Klopp ati: "Kuri Premier League, coba ari ikintu gikomeye, ariko sinibaza ko vyorinda guca hiyo hose". "Ntarigera akina mu rindi higanwa. Umupira w'amaguru hano uratandukanye n'ahandi. Nipfuza kubona akina hano, ariko zinsi ko bizokunda". Ni mu gihe bivugwa ko uwujejwe kwinonora imitsi muri PSG, Leonardo, yahamagaye Jorge Messi, se wa Messi amubaza ibijanye n'ivy'uyu musatirizi akomoka muri Argentine. PSG yoyo ikaba ihakana aya amakuru. Amakuru avuga ko Jorge Messi yamubwiye neza ko umuhungu wiwe yipfuza kuja gukinira Manchester City. Hagati aho, umukuru wa Barcelona, Josep Maria Bartomeu, yanse umubonano na Messi kugira ngo baganire ivyo kuva muri uyo murwi.

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Foden, Kante, Eriksen, Martinez, Dybala, Raphinha, de Ligt
text: Amakuru avugwa cane ni uko Chelsea yumyikanye na Manchester City ku giciro c’umwongereza Raheem Sterling akina ku ruhande. Ni mu masezerano y’imiriyoni 50 z’amapawundi, akaba yiteze gushika i Stamford Bridge gukinira uyu murwi mu kiringo c’imyaka itanu, akaba kandi afise amahirwe yo kwongerako umwaka umwe. Uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 27 azotegerezwa kubanza gukorerwa ibipimo vyo kwa muganga imbere y’uko aya maezerano atangazwe. Umusatirizi w’umwongereza Phil Foden w’imyaka 22 ariteguye gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha y’imyaka itandatu muri Manchester City ku mushahara w’amapawundi  200.000 ku ndwi. (Star) Arsenal ishobora, mu buryo butangaje, kwegera Chelsea iyisaba umukinyi wo hagati w’umufaransa N'Golo Kante w’imyaka 31. (Star) Manchester United izi neza ko umunya-Danemark akina hagati Christian Eriksen  w’imyaka 30 azokwimukira i Old Trafford n’aho hari amakuru ava muri Brentford ko ashobora kubandanya ayikinira. (ESPN) Ajax yabwiye Manchester United ko yokwongereza amahera ishaka gutanga irondera umunya-Argentina akina inyuma Lisandro Martinez w’imyaka 24, ikaba yari yemeye gutanga imiriyoni 43 z’ama-euros. (90 Min) Erik ten Hag kandi arashaka kwongereza akariro mu rugamba rwo kurondera umunya-Argentina Antony w’imyaka  22 asanzwe akinira Ajax nyene. (Times) United yasabwe kuzana Paulo Dybala nk’uwushobora gusubirira umusatirizi wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w’imyaka 37 yipfuza gusezera muri rino ci. Uyu musatirizi w’umunya-Argentina w’imyaka 28 arigenga inyuma y’aho aviriye muri Juventus mu mwaka w’inkino waraye urangiye. (Star) Aba ba Red Devils (Amashetani atukura) bariko barasunikwa n’abatanga uburyo ko bogumya Ronaldo, umukinyi yatsindiye ka gashimwe ka Ballon d'Or incuro zitanu. (Mirror) Barcelona yashikanye imiriyoni 60 z’amapawundi, harimwo n’uturusho, zitangwa na Chelsea ku musatirizi wa Leeds United umunya-Brezili Raphinha w’imyaka 25. (Goal) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Hollande Frenkie de Jong w’imyaka 25 yamaze gutegura umutima wiwe ko azoguma muri Barcelona akaba yiteguye kwankira Manchester United. (Sport – mu ki Espangol) Juventus irazi ko hari ibiganiro hagati y’abaserukizi ba Matthijs de Ligt na Bayern Munich ariko uno murwi wo mw’ihiganwa ry’Ubutaliyano Serie A ntawurigera awushikira awusaba uyu mukinyi w’inyuma wa Hollande afise imyaka 22, avugwa kandi ko aronderwa na Chelsea. (Fabrizio Romano) Chelsea yabwiwe ko Bayern ishobora gushira kw’isoko umukinyi w’inyuma w’Ubufaransa Dayot Upamecano w’imyaka  23, mu gihe uyu murwi watahukanye ihiganwa ry’Ubudagi Bundesliga woronka De Ligt. (90 Min) Arsenal iriko irategura amahera yotanguza mu gusaba ko Benfica yoyiha umukinyi wayo w’inyuma, umunya-Espagne Alex Grimaldo w’imyaka 26. (Jornal de Noticias, iciye kuri Express) Everton ntabwo iriko irarondera umusatirizi wa Watford umunya-Nigeria Emmanuel Dennis n’aho hari amakuru avuga ko yoba yipfuza uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 24. (Football Insider) Manchester United iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano n’umunyegori wa Albania Thomas Strakosha w’imyaka 27 yigenga inyuma y’aho aviriye muri Lazio. (Talksport) Brighton iri mu biganiro ku masezerano yosa n’ayisumbuye gatoya n’umukinyi wa Espagne akina inyuma  Marc Cucurella w’imyaka 23, mu gihe ariko arabwa ryiza na Manchester City. (Athletic) Everton yongereje icizere co kuronka umusatirizi wa Chelsea  Armando Broja inyuma y’aho uyu murwi wa Stamford Bridge ufatiye ingingo yo kudatwara uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 20 mu bandi bafashe urugendo baja muri Amerika mu ntumbero yo kwitegurira ihiganwa ryimirije. (Liverpool Echo) Aston Villa iri mu biganiro na Sevilla ku mukinyi w’inyuma wa Suède, Ludwig Augustinsson w’imyaka 28. (Mail) Umukuru wa Napoli  Cristiano Giuntoli avuga ko umusatirizi w’Ububirigi Dries Mertens w’imyaka 35 yanse amasezerano mashasha n’uyu murwi. (Fabrizio Romano) Borussia Dortmund nta mugambi ifise wo gutiza umusatirizi wayo, umunyamerika Gio Reyna w’imyaka 19 ariko ararabwa ryiza na Rangers. (Fabrizio Romano) Brentford yegereye Wolfsburg iyisaba umunyamisiri akina imbere Omar Marmoush w’imyaka 23, ariko uyu murwi w’Ubudagi uracijijanya imitima ku vyerekeye ivyo kugurisha uyu mukinyi. (Sky Sports – mu kidagi)

headline: Ikiganiro ca Meghan na Oprah: Impungenge ku "bwirabure" bw'umwana wa Meghan
text: Mu kiganiro ca Meghan na Oprah Winfrey, Meghan, umugore w'igikomangoma Harry, yavuze ko hari impungenge mu muryano w'Ubwami bw'Ubwongereza ku kuntu "ubwirabure" umwana wiwe Archie yari kuvukana bwari kungana

headline: Ukraine: Kurwanira Mariupol, 'umutima w'iyi ngwano'
text: Hari ibimenyetso ko Uburusiya bushobora kuba buri hafi yo kwigarurira vyuzuye Mariupol, igisagara co ku kivuko mu bumanuko cugarijwe kandi kimaze amayinga atandatu gicucagirwa ibisasu ubu vyagisambuye cane. Ingabo za Ukraine zivuga ko zicigwanako kandi ko "zivugana buri gihe"  n'iziri ku bukata. Ariko ziremera ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zirondera  kugenzura vyuzuye ico gisagara, mu gihe umwe mu ndongozi z'abiyonkoye bashigikiwe n'Uburusiya avuga ko Mariupol iri hafi yo gufatwa. Ingabo za Ukraine zaravuze ko zaheranywe n'ibigwanisho, kandi zivugwa ko zasubijwe inyuma zikaja mu duce tuburi twirebanga dufatanye n'inkengera. Kazoza k'ico gisagara gashobora kuba nkoramutima ku ntambwe ikurikira y'iyo ngwano. Kiri mu minwe y'Abarusiya, kizobaha kugenzura igice kinini c'igihugu gituma Moscou ihuza  inzasiro  (ubwinshi bw'urwasiro) zibiri mu bumanuko no mu buseruko. Vyoca bituma ingabo nyinshi zishobora kwimurirwa ahandi, bigaha  prezida Putin "intsinzi y'umukenyuro mu gihe intambwe ya mbere y'igitero ciwe yaranzwe n'akajagari. Bwoba bubaye ubuhombe bukomeye cane, hamwe ubu bwoba bwitezwe, ku butegetsi bwa Ukraine bwavuze ko Mariupol  ari "umutima y'iyi ngwano uyu munsi". Ingabo z'Uburusiya zatanguye kugota Mariupol mu ntango z'ukwezi kwa gatatu. Iryo yugarizwa rimaze gugwamwo abanyagihugu basanzwe ibihumbi rituma abandi baja mu rugamba rwo kugerageza kumara kabiri ku bacugaraniwe ngaho. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi barahungiye amajaruguru, bafata urugendo rubangamye rubaciha  mu rwasiro rw'intambara. Aha muri Zaporizhzhia narabonye abanyagihugu  basanzwe bashika ku munsi ku munsi, bavuga ingene babonye igisagara kiriko kirasamburwa. Muri iyi minsi ingabo z'Uburusiya vyizabazwa ko zigiwe imbere mu gucamwo kabiri ikirindiro abagwanira Mariupol  bari basigaranye , nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo gikora ivyigwa bijanye n'ingwano  Institute for the Study of War. Vyibazwa ko ingabo za Ukraine zasubijwe inyuma mu gace k'ikivuko na Azovstal , uruganda runini cane rukora ivyuma aho bari bahereye mu kugaba ibitero vyo kwivuna muri aya mayinga aheze. Video zabonetse zerekana abagwanyi bishoboka ko ari abo muri brigade ya 36 y'abagwanira mu mazi barahira ko batazoshira amaboko hejuru. "Nta gace na kamwe k'igisagara tuzorekura aho bishoboka hose", bivugwa n'umwe muri video yashizwe ku mbuga hwaniro ku wa kabiri. "Ariko ukuri ni uko igisagara gikikujwe kandi kizibiwe kandi nta bikoresho vyo kurwana n'ivyo kurya bishobora gushika," nk'uko abandanya avuga. Igice kimwe c'iyo video kimwerekana we n'abandi ba-marine benshi bari mu cumba gisa n'ubwihisho bwo mu munsi. Umwe muri abo bagabo afise ibibando vyo gucumbagirirako vyegetse ku ntebe yiwe. Kuri page yayo kuri Facebook,  imwe mu nyandiko z'iyo brigade yavuga ko uko ibintu bimeze  hageze "kurwana irya nyuma...N'ugupfa kuri bamwe muri twebwe no kugirwa imbohe ku bandi." Yongereko ko "bigijwe inyuma" kandi bakikujwe   n'ingabo z'Uburusiya. Abasesenguzi b'abanya-Ukraine  ntibahuza ku kuba iyo nyandiko ari iyo ukuri, bamwe bakavuga ko iyo page  yaa Fecebook  ishobora kuba yaravogerewe. Ariko inyuma y'amasaha arenga 36, iyo nyandiko yari ikiri ku rubuga. Kuba Mariupol igoswe, bituma gutumatumanako bitagishoboka , maze bikagorana guhinyuza ibivugwa ku bigenda birahinduka ku rubuga. Nta nkeka ko ingabo za Ukraine zikeneye cane kuronka ibindi bigwnisho n'ibikoresho, ivyo kurya hamwe n'amazi. Mu minsi iheze bivugwa ko igisirikare ca  Ukraine cashobora kurungikira  ingabo ivyankenerwa ariko uko iminsi ihera niko vyagiye biragorana. "Amaherezo, igisagara caciye gikikuzwa vuba muri ico gitero ku buryo hatigeze haboneka akaryo ko kurunda ivya nkenerwa", bivugwa na  Justin Bronk wo muri Royal United Services, ikigo c'abahinga bihweza ibintu n'ibindi. "Barihagazeko cane, cane birenze ivyo umuntu  uwo ari we wese  wo hanze yari kwibaza ko vyoshoboka. Ubu rero biragoye kwibaza  ingene igihe bashobora kubandanya gutyo kingana", akabandanya avuga ati bashitse "ku bintu vy'igitangaza n'uburyo buke". No kugombora ingabo canke kujana abakomeretse navyo vyagumye bibangama ku banya-Ukraine mu gihe abarusiya bakajije kwugariza ico gisagara. Ubushikiranganji bw'Uburusiya bwo kwivuna abansi mu ndwi zibiri ziheze bwavuze ko bwakoroye indege ya Mi-18 ku 5km uva ku nkengera z'ikiyaga Azov. Vyibazwa ko yari ivuye muri ico gisagara. Ku wa kabiri, bwavuze ko ingabo zishika 100  za Ukraine zagerageje guca inzira yo kuva mu ruganda rw'ivyuma - ariko buvuga ko ica kabiri cabo bishwe n'ibisasu vya muzinga n'ibitero vy'indege vy'Uburusiya , hanyuma abarenga 40 nabo bakishikana. Mw'ijambo ryiwe ryo kuri video yashikirije igihugu ku wa kabiri prezida wa Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky yavuze ati: "Kazoza  ka Ukraine gahaze ku nguvu zacu zo kwihagararako mu buryo bwose. Kazoza kacu twese, kimwe kimwe cose mu bisagara vyacu, kimwe kimwe cose mu bigwati vyacu. "Kandi ndashimira cane uwubitahura. Adahagarika kwihagararako no mu gihe ico bitanga kiba gisa n'ikiri kure cane. Kuko Umwanya w'umuzimiza wama uza imbere y'umutwenzi". Hagati aho ivyavuzwe n'ingabo ziri aho ko Uburusiya bwazanye ibigwanisho vy'ubumara muri Mariupol muri iyi ndwi  ntibiremezwa. N'icibutsa ingene intabara ishobora mu kanya gato gufata intera ibangamye cane. Mariupol ifashwe yose vyoca bituma ingabo z'Uburusiya zikoreshwa mu kuzibirira ko iza Ukraine  zironswa ivyangombwa, zica zisubira kwisuganya zikajanwa ahandi, na cane cane mu bindi bice vya Donbas vyo mu buseruko, aho Moscou iriko irategura igitero gikomeye cane. Vyonatuma kandi Uburusiya buca butera intambwe bugana mu buraruko bwa Mariupol, ariyo mpamvu abanya-Ukraine baguma biboheye mu kurwanira ico gisagara, ku bwa Bronk. Izo ngabo kandi zishobora gukoreshwa mu kwongereza inguvu  mu gisagara ca Kherson cifatiwe n'Uburusiya aho ingabo za Ukraine zimaze igihe zigerageza kwigarurira uturere kandi zisa n'izibishikako. Prezida Zelenshky yabandanije gukoresha imvugo ngereranyo y'uko Mariupol ari umutima w'ingwano. Ati : "Hamwe wohagarika gutera,  aho rero twoca...tugoyagoya".

headline: Barcelona 0-3 Bayern Munich: Thomas Muller yaraye asubiye guhumira Barca yari yakiriye Bayern
text: Ibitsindo vya Thomas Muller na Robert Lewandowski ni vyo vyabanguranije iyi mirwi ibiri y'ibihangange mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya mu murwi E, mu rukino rwa mbere rwatsinzwe na Bayern Munich yari yakiriwe na Barcelona. Uyu murwi watahukanye ihiganwa ry'Ubudagi ry'umwaka uheze wafashe mu minwe uru rukino, Muller akaba yanashoboye kwinjiza  igitsindo kigize indwi atsinze Barcelona. Lewandowski niwe yatsindagiye, mu gutsinda ibitsindo bibiri vyose, aho yatanguye kwinjiza igitsindo ciwe ca 74 muri Champions League ku mupira watewe ugakubita kw'igori ukamugarukako agaca yinjiza igitsindo igori riri gusa, inyuma y'uko umunyegori Jamal Musiala yirashe ku ruhande akurikirana umupira igori rigasigara rigaragara. Muri uru rukino rwa mbere rwa Champions League ikinye kuva inyenyeri yayo  Lionel Messi ayisezeye, Barca vyaranse, irarushwa cane, gushika n'aho atigeze ishobora gutera mw'igori. Barcelona itakaje urukino rwa gatatu iri ku kibuga cayo incuro zitatu yikurikiranya mu mahiganwa ya Bulaya, ubwa mbere muri kahise kayo. Yararushijwe cane na Bayern, n'aho na yo nyene itakinye urukino rukomeye cane nk'uko abantu bari bayizi. Uyu murwi w'Ubudagi ni wo ufata ikibanza ca mbere mu murwi E, mu gihe urundi rukino hagati ya Benfica na Dinamo Kiev rwarangiye ari 0-0. Hari haciye amezi 13 kuva Bayern ibagiye ibisiga uyu murwi, icashize aheru ibibazo vyatera vyiyongera muri Barcelona, mu rukino rwarangiye Bayern inyagiye Barcelona ibitsindo umunani vyose kuri bibiri. Barcelona ntiyamenya ko ibintu vyari kugenda vyunyuka mu mezi yakurikiye, aho mbere ibibazo vy'amafaranga vyatumye Lionnel Messi ata akagenda, akimukira muri Paris St-Germain muri rino ci. Ubu isa n'ikibarara c'ikintu cigeze kuba gikomeye kera - igenda itabona iyo iriko iraja, yiteze kubona amarushwa mu gihe yohura n'umurwi wipanze neza, umurwi wo ku rwego mpuzamakungu nk'uko vyaraye biyigendeye kuri Bayern Munich nijoro. Igihe ikubitwa 8-2 Messi yakinanye na Luis Suarez nk'abasatirizi, hari mu 2020. Mu rukino rwa nijoro, Barca yakinishije abasatirizi bahoze bakina muri Premier League y'Ubwongereza, Memphis Depay na Luuk de Jong, kubera Martin Braithwaite yavunitse. Bayern yasa n'uko ataco yinona n'aho rimwe na rimwe yabura umupira, ariko iramutse igiye imbere, vyaba ngombwa ko Barcelona yisanga uruhande rw'inyuma iriko ikinisha batanu hakuba batatu isanzwe ikinisha. Gerard Pique, umwe muri aba bakinyi batatu b'inyuma, ati: "Ni uko nyene bimeze. Turi uko tumeze, ni uko nyene". Ariko uwo bakinana inyuma wewe Garcia abibona ukundi, aho avuga ati: "Burya ibitsindo birarenganya. Ica mbere cinjiye kubera umupira wanciyeko, ica kabiri umupira wakubise kw'igori uca ugaruka mu kibuga ukorokera kuri Lewandowski. "Si nibaza ko tuba twaratsinzwe ibitsindo nk'ibi vyose. "Nimba tutashoboye kugumana mupira hagati, ivyo ari vyo vyose ni uko twariko dukina na Bayern - kumbure umurwi wa mbere i Bulaya. Twari tuzi neza ko rwari urukino rutoroshe na gato". Bayern ubu ifise umumenyereza mushasha akiri muto Julian Nagelsmann w'imyaka 34 gusa, yasubiriye Hansi Flick, akaba aboneka ko afise ubushobozi bwo gushikana kure Bayern muri rino higanwa. Ubu Bayern ntirigera itsindwa mu nkino 19 zose zo ku rwego rwa Bulaya ikiniye hanze.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru kuri uyu wa gatandatu: Kane, Conte, De Gea, Van de Beek
text: Umusatirizi wa Tottenham Harry Kane w’imyaka 29, akaba na kizigenza w’umurwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubwongereza yabaye arahagarika ibiganiro bijanye n’amasezerano mashasha gushika inyuma y’igikombe c’isi yose. Aba Spurs kandi baripfuza gushika ku masezerano mashasha n’umukinyi wo hagati wa Danemark Pierre-Emile Hojbjerg w’imyaka 27 be n’umwongereza Eric Dier w’imyaka 28 akina inyuma. (Evening Standard) Umusatirizi wa Tottenham Harry Kane araronderwa na Bayern Munich inyotewe ibitsindo vya Robert Lewandowski kuva yimukiye muri Barcelona mu ci. (Express) Juventus irashaka umumenyereza wa Tottenham Antonio Conte kuva mu ntango z’umwaka w’inkino uza inyuma y’aho uyu murwi umaze gutsindira ihiganwa ry’Ubutaliyano incuro 36 ikuriwe mw’ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League). Amasezerano Conte afitaniye n’aba Spurs azorangira mu mpera z’uno mwaka w’inkino ariko bakaba bafise akaryo ko kuyongerereza ikiringo c’umwaka. (Gazzetta dello Sport – mu gitaliyano) Newcastle United iripfuza umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Brezili Eguinaldo  w’imyaka 18 akina mu murwi Vasco da Gama wo mu cicaro ca kabiri. Mu masezerano afitaniye n’uyu murwi, harimwo umurongo uvuga ko umurwi womukenera utegerezwa gutanga imiriyoni 26 z’ama pawundi. (Chronicle) Umumenyereza wa Newcastle Eddie Howe arahakana ko ata biganiro bijanye n’amasezerano bariko baragiriranira n’umukinyi akina hagati Miguel Almiron w’imyaka 28. (Sky Sports) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Juventus umunya-Brezili Arthur Melo w’imyaka 26 azobandanya akinira Liverpool yatijijwemwo gushika uno mwaka w’inkino urangire n’aho yavunitse. Melo amaze gukina iminota 13 yonyene kuva agiye muri Liverpool mu kw’icenda. (Mirror) Umunyegori wa Manchester United  David de Gea w’imyaka 31, ntazoja mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose muri Qatar bikavugwa ko umumenyereza wa Espagne atamushize ku rutonde mfatakibanza. (Mail) Newcastle iriko itegura guha amasezerano mashasha n’umunya-Brezili akina hagati Bruno Guimaraes w’imyaka 24, amasezerano azomutuma ahembwa amapawundi 200.000 ku ndwi, mu ntumbero yo kwigizayo Chelsea na Real Madrid imukanuriye maremare. (Evening Standard) Valencia na Inter Milan ishobora kurwanira umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umunya-Hollande Donny van de Beek w’imyaka 25, mu kwa mbere. (Todofichajes.com – mu ki Espagnol) Manchester United iri mu biganiro vyerekeye amasezerano y’igihe kirekire n’umukinyi wo kuruhande babonamwo amahirwe menshi cane, umunya- Argentina  Alejandro Garnacho w’imyaka 18. (Fabrizio Romano kuri Twitter) Umukinyi wa Chelsea ntazoshoka afata ingingo yo kuva muri uyo murwi gushika yumvise ko Barcelona iriko iramurondera. Uyu mukinyi wo hagati w’Ubutaliyano afise imyaka 30 ashobora kuzokwimukira mu murwi uwo ari wo wose atakirinze gusabwa mu mpera z’iri higanwa amasezerano afitaniye n’umurwi wiwe arangiye. (Sport – muki Espagnol) Arsenal, Newcastle na West Ham irarwanira umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Danemark Gustav Isaksen w’imyaka 21 asanzwe akinira  Midtjylland ariko imurwanira na AC Milan. (Calciomercato - mu gitaliyno) Leeds iriteguye gusubira kurondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa PSV Eindhoven umunya-Hollande Cody Gakpo w’imyaka 23,bakaba bamushaka mu ci riza. Gakpo yagize uruhara rukomeye igihe PSV yirahira Arsenal mw’ihiganwa Europa League ku wa kane. (Express) Umukinyi w’inyuma wa West Ham umwongereza Craig Dawson w’imyaka 32, arashaka kuva muri uyo murwi mu kwa mbere inyuma y’aho atakarije ikibanza mu bakinyi batangura mu kibuga. (Football Insider) Barcelona, Paris St-Germain na Real Madrid yose irarondera kugura umusatirizi wa Brezili  Endrick w’imyaka 16 asanzwe akina muri Palmeiras. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) Brighton ifise icizere ko izoronka umukinyi wo hagati wa  Argentina Facundo Buonanotte w’imyaka 17, asanzwe akinira Rosario Central. (Fabrizio Romano kuri  Twitter)

headline: République tchèque: Abantu ibihumbi bakoze ibirori vyo gusezera coronavirus
text: Mu gihe ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS muri ino ndwi ryagabishije ko ikiza ca coronavirus kitariko kirahera ubu bwa vuba, mu gihugu ca Repubulika ya tchèque hoho bari mu minsi mikuru yo kugisezera. Abantu baharurwa mu bihumbi bakoraniye ku meza ipima uburebure bwa metero 500 ku kiraro Charles Bridge kiri ku mugwa mukuru Prague ku wa kabiri banywa bongera bafungura ivyo baje bitekereye. Abari batumiwe muri ico kirori basabwa gusangira n'abo begeranye kandi na ya ngingo yo gutandukana ntibayikurikije, ivyo ababa mu bihugu bikigendera kuri ya ngingo ya guma mu rugo babona nk'umugani. Muri ico gihugu kirimwo abantu bangana n'imiliyoni cumi, abashika hafi 12,000 ni bo banduye iyo ndwara, abashika 350 nabo irabahitana. Uwateguye ivyo birori yavuze ko vyashobotse kubera ata bakerarugendo bakiri muri ico gisagara kizwi ko kiri mu bisagara biteye igomwe. Amasanamu yava muri ivyo birori yerekana abari muri vyo bicaye hamwe, banywa bongera barorera abariko bakora ibikino. Ondrej Kobza, asanzwe afise inzu y'uburiro akaba ari nawe yateguye ivyo birori, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP ati: "Twashatse kwigina ko coronavirus yaranduranywe n'imizi mu gutumira abantu kugira ngo basubire baramukanye kandi berekane ko badatinya kuramukanya, ko batanatinya no gusangira umukate n'abagenzi". Ibibanza vyari vyateguwe vyose vyari vyuzuye. Repubulika ya tchèque yihutiye gufata ingingo za guma mu rugo hakiri kare ikaba yarashoboye kugabanya ubukari bw'ico kiza kitarasasika inganda. Mu ndwi iheze, leta yararekuye amakoraniro y'abantu bashika 1,000. Ibibanza vy'ubwogero, amazu ndangakaranga, ibibanza vy'iyororero ry'ibikoko n'amazu y'amakoraniro ubu arashobora kwugururwa akakira abantu bose bashoboka. Amazu y'uburiro n'ay'ubunywero arashobora kwakira abakiriya mu kiringo c'ukwezi. Ikiboneka ni uko abanyagihugu b'Aba-tchèque bashoboye guhangana n'ico kiza kubera ububangutsi mu gufata ingingo ruhasha. Hagati aho, nivyo ko gutezura ingingo za guma mu rugo kutatumye ibitigiri vyiyongera; ariko hariho mu burere bwa kure cane uvuye ku mugwa mukuru Prague hakiboneka abandura, mu gihe muri ico gisagara hibonekeza abatarenga 15 gusa bandura ku munsi.

headline: Liverpool 0-1 Real Madrid: Umwaka mwiza cane urangiye mu mubabaro inyuma y'imidugararo y'i Paris
text: Umwaka wiza cane wa Liverpool yari yitezemwo umunezero w'ibikombe bine  waraye urangiye mu marira inyuma y'imidugararo yabereye i Paris imbere y'urukino. Ijoro ryakeye ryabaye akamuna kuri Liverpool n'abafana bayo ku ngero zose umuntu yokwiyumvira mu gihe Real Madrid yoyo yakoze ivyo yama ikora hanyuma iterura igikombe ca Ligue des Champions/Champions League, ku ncuro igira 14. Intsinzi ya Real y'igitsindo kimwe cinjijwe na  Vinicius Junior ku munota wa 59, yandikishije izina ry'umumenyereza  Carlo Ancelotti mu gitabo ntibagiranwa c'amateka atahukanye igikombe kigira kane nk'umumenyereza muri rino higanwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League). Kuri Liverpool uyu musi mubi kuri bo wugaye imisi itandatu y'amarira inyuma y'aho itakarije ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza Premier League aho ku musi wa nyuma  Manchester City ariyo yahavuye igitahukana, isumbije Liverpool inota rimwe ritarenga ntirirenguke, hanyuma ikaba yaraye itakaje imbere y'uyu murwi w'igihangange kandi ufise uburambe, Real Madrid. Ariko, uru rukino rwa nyuma rwaraye rukinywe ntiruzokwibukirwa ku gutsindwa kwa Liverpool n'intsinzi ya Real gusa. Ruzokwibukwa kandi ku midugararo yabereye hanze y'ikibuga Stade de France mu masaha makeya imbere y'uko rutangura, aho ibarabara rigana mu nzira yo mu kuzimu hapande y'ikibuga ryuzuye isinzi ry'abafana ba Liverpool  mu buryo buteye ubwoba. Wegereye aba bafana, warashobora kwumva ingene bari bashushe mbere uko iminota yagenda niko uburakari bwagenda bwiyongera mu gihe batashobora kuva aho bari kubera ubwinshi bwabo. Vyari ibintu bitaryoheye ijisho. Mu gihe icuka kibi cagenda kiduga, n'imirongo miremire yagenda yiyongera ku miryango y'ikibuga, vyagiye kurangira igipolisi c'Ubufaransa gikoresheje ivyuka vy'ipiripiri na vya vyuka vyokera kugira birukane abafana, biba ngombwa ko urukino rutangura rucerewe iminota 36 yose mu gihe uruhande rw'ikibuga rwari rwateguriye Liverpool rwagumye rufise abantu bake cane. Liverpool yasavye ko haba amatohoza ku vyabaye mu gihe UEFA ivuga ko inzitiro "zazibiwe n'ibihumbi vy'abafana bari baguze amatike y'amanyanga ataco yabafashije". Iki nico cuka caranze uru rukino aho Liverpool yagerageje incuro nyinshi kurondera igitsindo ariko ikiseka ku munyegori yari yahumaganye, Umubirigi Thibaut Courtois. Mu gihe abakinyi ba Liverpool bari baguye bukwi mu kibuga, Trent Alexander-Arnold wewe yamaze iminota itari mike yajumarariwe, atabona iyo aja n'iyo ava. Jurgen Klopp n'abahungu biwe ntibazokwibagira uyu mwaka w'inkino berekaniyemwo ubuhinga n'inguvu zidasanzwe mu gutsindira ibikombe bibiri ariko ukaza kurangira mu mubabaro. Alexander-Arnold yaboneka ko yari yacitse intege bidasanzwe, atari gusa umubabaro wo gutsindwa,  ahubwo ku kungene Vinicius yamuciye inyuma akamutsindana igitsindo cagiye kuvamwo intsinzi ya Real. Ariko rero hariho ibintu vyo kwihweza neza, cane cane ku murwi nk'uyu w'igihangange kandi uzwi ko usatira bikomeye. Liverpool yatahukanye ibikombe Carabao Cup na FA Cup, vyompi kuri ya mipira itererwa ku metero 11 (penalties) itsinze Chelsea.  Ibi bisigura ko mu nkino zitatu za nyuma zose (finales) Liverpool itashoboye gutsinda igitsindo na kimwe mu kiringo c'urukino, harimwo mbere no mu biringo bibiri vy'inyongera (prolongations/extra-time). Mu gihe uyu murwi ufise abasatirizi badasanzwe nka Mohamed Salah, Sadio Mane, Luis Diaz, Roberto Firmino na Diogo Jota, ntivyumvikana na gato ukungene badashobora gutera ibitsindo. Muri Carabao Cup na FA Cup nta ngaruka vyagize, ariko nijoro vyaragize ingaruka. Hanyuma uwatumye ibi vyose ni Courtois yari yambaye urwaga, mu gukurayo imipira itandatu yose ya Salah wenyene, hamwe n'uwundi ukomeye watewe na Mane  akawuzibira hanyuma useka ku cuma c'igori imbere yo kwisanga hanze. Ijoro ryakeye ryari nk'ukwihora kuri Salah inyuma y'ivyabaye mu 2018 mu rukino rwa nyuma nyene  aho asekaniye na Sergio Ramos bikaba ngombwa ko ava mu kibuga, akorora amosozi y'umubabaro inyuma y'iminota 30 gusa, urukino rukaba rwagiye kurangira Real ikubise Liverpool 3-1 i Kyiv muri Ukraine. Salah azokwama yibaza igihe cose ingene vyanse ko yinjiza igitsindo na kimwe hano. Ashobora kumara amajoro atari make mu ndoto mbi aho azokwama abona Courtois, uyu muntu umwe yamubereye ifuro ry'igiti. Muri zino ndwi za nyuma, Liverpool yaboneka ko isa n'iyishaka gucika intege kubera ingene bitanga bidasanzwe ariko bikanka ko batsinda, kandi vyaraboneka mu minota ya nyuma uravye ingene bita kugira ngo bisubize iteka, ariko bikaba ivy'ubusa imbere y'uyu murwi w'igihangange wiganje muri iri higanwa rya Champions League, uzi kandi n'ingene ukenyura uwo bahanganye. Muri uno mwaka urangiye, Klopp n'abahungu biwe ntaco batakoze, mbere kuri uyu wa Mungu bakaba biteze kwerekana ibikombe vyabo vya Carabao Cup na FA Cup mu mabarabara ya Liverpool, ariko wibaze ingene vyari kugenda iyo baramuka bateruye iki gikombe ca Champions League ku ncuro igira indwi. Nta muntu n'umwe yiyumvira ko Liverpool yari kurangiza uyu mwaka w'inkino mu mubabaro uravye ingene basugereje Manchester City, muri Premier League gushika ku musi wa nyuma. Uyu murwi wa Pep Guardiola wavuye iyo rwotera izuba ku musi wa nyuma w'ihiganwa kuko wabanje guterwa bibiri vyose ku busa na Aston Villa, imbere y'uko bivyukiranya bagatsinda bitatu mu minota itarenga itanu, gutyo babona kwigizayo Klopp n'abiwe. Ariko mu rukino rwa nijoro, iyo ataba ubuhinga budasanzwe bwa Coutrois, iki gikombe ubu kiva kivugira i  Merseyside. Nta nkeka ko Real yaciye mu nzira zitoroshe, kandi nk'umurwi washoboye gutsinda Paris St-Germain, Chelsea, Manchester City na Liverpool, koko urakwiye iki gikombe ca Champions League. Aha nta keka. Kuri Liverpool kumbure nta muntu yovuga ko uyu mwaka wabaye mubi - kuko bawumaze berekana ubuhinga bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru  - ariko akari ukuri karavugwa, urangiriye i Paris mu buryo budashimishije, mu mubabaro.

headline: Tanzania: Ekleziya Katorika iragabisha ko Covid-19 iriko iriyongera ku rugero ruteye ubwoba
text: Ekleziya Katorika muri Tanzania yaraye isohoye itangazo aho igabisha ko ibitigiri  vy'abandura coronavirus n'abicwa na Covid-19 bigenda vyiyongera, ihamagarira abanyagihugu gukurikiza ingingo zose zo kwikingira. Iri tangazo ryo kugabisha ryasohowe n'umukuru w'Inama y'Abepiskopi Katorika muri Tanzania  (TEC), Musenyeri Gervas Nyaisonga ku wa kabiri. Ariko , ntirivuga nimba no muri Tanzania hariho abariko barandura bwa bwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus, rigasaba abantu kuba maso bafatiye ku bivugwa mu zindi mpande z'isi. Iri tangazo rya Ekleziya Katorika rivuga riti: "Mu mwaka uheze igihugu cacu carashoboye kurwanya uwu mugera. Abandura baragabanutse  mu nyuma turizera ko twatsinze". "Ubu hari iyongerekana rishasha ry'abandura. Ibihugu bitari bike biremeza ko biri mu bihe bitoroshe aho corona iriko iriyongera abantu bagapfa. Igihugu cacu si izinga, ni ngombwa ko twikingira, tukaba maso, tugatakambira cane Imana kugira ngo iturinde". Ekleziya Katorika muri ico gihugu yagiye ifata ingingo zitandukanye kuva mu 2020 igihe iki kiza gitangazwa ko cinjiye muri Tanzania, iri tangazo rigasaba ko izo ngingo zibandanya zikurikizwa. Rishimangira riti: "Duhimirize intambara yo kurwanya umugera wa coronavirus mu gukoresha ibirwanisho vyose vy'umutima, umubiri, ubuhinga no mu kibano. Ntiturambirwe no guhimiriza igisabisho, kwirinda gukorakorana, gukaraba n'amazi n'isabuni igihe cose, gufata ingingo igihe cose twiketse ibimenyetso vyayo, tukirinda kandi no kwegerana". Umunyamabanga mukuru w'Inama y'Abepiskopi, Patiri Charles Kitima, yabwiye BBC igisata c'igiswahili ko vyabaye ngombwa ko Ekleziya isohora iri tangazo ryo kugabisha mu gihe bakirindiriye insiguro z'abahinga zizotangwa na reta ku bijanye n'iki kiza karanda. Ati: "Duherutse kubona impfu ziyongera. Mu bisagara, twari tumenyereye kugira imisa imwe canke zibiri mu ndwi zo gusabira abapfuye, ariko ubu ni imisi yose. Hategerezwa kuba hari ikintu kitagenda neza". Abategetsi ba Tanzania babandanya bemeza y'uko ata mugera wa coronavirus uri mu gihugu. Inyuma y'iri tangazo, icegera c'umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, Dr Goodluck Mollel, yabwiye ikinyamakuru Mwananchi co muri ico gihugu ko abanyagihugu bobandanya batekanye mu kurindira amabwirizwa bahabwa na reta. Dr. Mollel ati: "Ibi bintu reka tubirekere abahinga. Mu gihe hoba ingorane, reta izobisigura. Abantu bobandanya n'ibikorwa vy'ukugwiza umwimbu". Mu mpera z'indwi iheze, ibinyamakuru vyo muri Danmark vyatangaje ko ingenzi zibiri zari zivuye muri Tanzania zatowe umugera mushasha wa coronavirus wadutse muri Afrika y'Epfo. Mu ndwi iheze nyene, reta y'Ubwongereza yarafashe ingingo yo kubuza ingenzi zivuye nuri  Tanzania na Repubulika ya Demokrasi ya  Congo kwinjira muri ico gihugu mu ntumbero yo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry'ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera wa Covid-19 bwatowe ubwa mbere muri Afrika y'Epfo. Ibihugu bindi 12 nivyo bimaze guhagarikirwa ingendo muri ico gihugu hagati y'ukwa cumi na kabiri n'intango y'ukwa mbere.

headline: Prezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko umuryango wa Buyoya ufise uburenganzira bwo kumushingura mu Burundi
text: Umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko uwahoze arongoye ico gihugu Petero Buyoya aherutse kwitaba Imana afise uburenganzira bwose bwo gushingurwa mu gihugu ciwe. Ibi yabivugiye mu kiganiro yagiranye n'abamenyeshamakuru hamwe n'abanyagihugu ku mugwa mukuru Gitega, inyuma y'amezi atandatu amaze ashikirijwe amabanga y'umukuru w'igihugu. Inyuma y'aho asandabiye ahitanywe n'ikiza ca Covid-19, Petero Buyoya yashinguwe kuri uyu wa kabiri muri Mali aho yahora arangurira amabanga yiwe yo guserukira umuryango w'ubumwe bwibihugu vya Afrika muri ico gihugu no mu karere ka Sahel. Muri ico kiganiro, Prezida yishuye no ku bindi bibazo bitari bike vyo mu bisata bitandukanye bijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu. Abajijwe igituma reta ata kigandaro yatunganije mbere ntihagire n'ico ivuga ku rupfu rwa nyakwigendera Petero Buyoya kandi yahoze arongoye igihugu, Prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye  yishuye ko ibijanye n'urupfu rwiwe vyega umuryango ubwawo, na rirya yaciriwe igihano. Prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko amategeko atamuha uburenganzira bwo gukorerwa ivyo abahoze ari abakuru  b'ibihugu bategekanirizwa n'amategeko iyo bashengeye, kubera yamaze gucirirwa urubanza, reta igafata ko yari mu gihano. Ati: "Amategeko y'igihugu aratomoye. None murigera mwumva uwupfunzwe aja gutora? Hari uburenganzira bwa politike aba afise? Iyaba yari abufise aba apfunzwe?'' "Uwakubiswe intahe mu gahanga aba apfunzwe, none hari ivyo reta iba itegerezwa kumukorera nk'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu? Haba hasigaye umuryango". Abajijwe nimba ibisigarira vya Petero Buyoya bishobora gutahanwa mu gihugu, Prezida Ndayishimiye yavuze ko ico kibazo yakivuganyeko n'umuryango wiwe kandi ko yabemereye neza ko ari uburenganzira bwabo bwo kumushingura mu gihugu. Ati: "Umurundi wese afise uburenganzira bw'ugushingurwa aho ibisekuru vyiwe biri, arabifitiye uburenganzira". Mu bibazo bindi  bitari bike yabajijwe, harimwo  ikibazo kijanye n'ugutorera inyishu ubusumbasumbane hagati y'amoko bwibonekeza mu mashirahamwe cane cane mpuzamakungu akorera mu Burundi, hamwe n'ayandi amwe amwe yo mu gihugu. Prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze ko ari ikibazo kitoroshe, ko kidashobora gushoka gitorerwa umuti ubwo nyene uravye inkomoko yaco kuva muri kahise k'Uburundi, cane cane karanzwe n'amacakubiri y'amoko. Ati:"Igihugu cari carabaye nk'akantu umwe wese yitorera uko ashaka kubera inzego z'igihugu wamengo nabo nyene umwe yaje yiyakirira akiwe ngo yigire". Ati: "Rero muri ico gihe, abo bava hanze barashitse na bo baritunganiriza ivyabo kugira ngo na bo baronkeko akibare, ari co gituma baca babitunganya uko bavyumva kuko igihugu cari mu macakubiri". Mu kwezi kw'icenda 2018, reta y'Uburundi yarahagaritse mu kiringo c'amezi atatu amashirahamwe mva makungu yakorera muri ico gihugu, asabwa kwiyandikisha bushasha, bimwe mu vyo yasabwa hakaba harimwo ukwerekana neza ingene azogenda atorera inyishu ikibazo c'ubusumbasumbane hagati y'amoko mu bakozi b'abarundi akoresha. Prezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko reta imaze gufata ingingo yo kuyasubiramwo, hariho n'ayahisemwo gukura akarenge, akavuga ko yari yaje gusahura. Ati: "Vyarantangaje cane kubona hari amashirahamwe yaciye ahitamwo kwugara, ni ukuvuga ko yihaye karangamuntu y'uko ari yo yarimwo amacakubiri mu Burundi". Prezida Ndayishimiye avuga ariko y'uko hari ayemeye kwikosora maze aca ahabwa ikiringo, akavuga ko ubushikiranganji buyajejwe bugiye gutunganya vuba isuzuma kugira ngo barabe aho bagejeje. Avuga ko n'amashirahamwe yo mu Burundi na yo nyene yakoze nk'ayo ya mpuzamakungu. Hagati aho, aremera ko gutorera inyishu iki kibazo atari ic'umwanya muto, na rirya abayakoramwo baba bafitaniye  amasezerano y'akazi (contrants). Cari ikiganiro  kigize kabiri agiriraniye n'abanmeneyshamakuru hamwe n'abanyagihugu ku bibazo bitari bike, nk'ivyerekeye ubutunzi, ubutungane, imigambi y'iterambere, intwaro ibereye, amagara y'abantu, umutekano, imigenderanire, n'ibindi  bitari bike ku buzima bw'igihugu mu bisata bitandukanye.

headline: 'Tanzania ntiyirukira urucanco rwa Corona' - Prezida Magufuli
text: Prezida wa Tanzania John Pombe Magufuli yagabishije abajejwe amagara y'abantu ku kuzana incanco za Covid-19 - baterekanye ivyemeza - kuko zishobora kubangamira amagara y'abanyagihugu. Magufuli yavuze ati: "Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu ategerezwa kuhagabira, bashobora kwirukira izo ncanco hadakozwe ubushakashatsi, si incanco zose ari nziza kuri twebwe, dutegerezwa kwivyitondera. "Incanco si nziza. Iyaba umuzungu yashobora gutora incanco, yobaye yaratoye urucanco rwa Sida, Cancer na TB." Prezida wa Tanzania, John Pombe Magufuli yagabishije kuvyerekeye urucanco rwa Covid-19 rumaze gutangura gutangwa mu bihugu bitandukanye vy'isi. Igihe yariko arugurura icese iterwa ry'ibiti mw'ishamba mu karere ka Chato mu ntara ya Geita, yagize kandi ico avuga ku kungene ingwara ya Corona yifashe mu gihugu, aca ahamagarira abanyagihugu  kubandanya gusenga no kwiyubikira. Yagize ati: "Tubandanya kwiyubara, no kwiyubikira hamwe no gusenga, mu gihe tubandanya n'akazi ka misi yose, murye neza muhage Corona inanirwe kwinjira mu mibiri yanyu." Na yo kuvyerekeye ko hariho ubundi bwoko bwa Corona, Magufuli yavuze ko hariho aba Tanzania baja gucancwa hanze y'igihugu ariko bakagaruka bazanye ubundi bwoko bwa Corona. Prezida Magufuli yagize ati: "Ndazi ko hariho aba Tanzania bamwe bamwe bavuye muri kino gihugu baja hanze gucancwa, bahejeje bagaca baza batuzaniye iyindi Corona y'ubundi bwoko." "Ntituze turirukira incanco incanco, si buri rucanco rutugirira akamaro, ni ngombwa ko aba Tanzania tuba maso, tugabe, tuzogeragezwa, tubandanya gusenga Imana yacu kandi tubandanye kwinengesera." Ivyo prezida Magufuli abivuze mu gihe Ekleziya Katorika muri Tanzania yaraye isohoye itangazo aho igabisha ko ibitigiri vy'abandura coronavirus n'abicwa na Covid-19 bigenda vyiyongera, ihamagarira abanyagihugu gukurikiza ingingo zose zo kwikingira.

headline: Ivanguraruhu: BBC yavuganye n'umwe mu batyoje Bukayo Saka, ati 'ndasaba imbabazi'
text: Ikiganiro ca BBC File on 4 kimaze igihe gikora amatohoza kw'ityozwa rishingiye kw'ivanguraruhu ryakorewe abakinyi b'abirabure b'Abongereza biciye ku mbuga hwaniro mu ntumbero yo kumenya ico vyavuyeko, ni inyuma y'urukino rwa nyuma rwa Euro 2020. Iki kiganiro cavuganye n'abatari bake muri aba bantu, umwe muri bo yatyoje Bukayo Saka ku mbuga hwaniro avuga ko ubu yipfuza gusaba imbabazi. Saka, Marcus Rashford na Jadon Sancho bose bahuye n'imvura y'ibitutsi vy'ivanguraruhu ku mbuga hwaniro inyuma y'aho bose bahushirije ama penalties muri urwo rukino rwa nyuma. Umwe muri aba babatyoje - umugabo ari mu myaka ya 20 akomoka muri Arabia Saoudite - yamurungikiye uducapo twinshi (emojis) tw'inkende ku rubuga rwa Instagram. Mu nyuma y'aho, konte yiwe ya Instagram yarahagaritswe mu kiringo c'amasaha 24, ariko ubu avuga ko yategerezwa guhagarikwa burundu ku mbuga hwaniro. Amaze kwerekwa ivyo yakoze, yaremeye kuvugana na File on 4. Avuga ko yari ashigikiye Ubwongereza muri urwo rukino rwa nyuma arico gituma yagize "uburakari" igihe uyu murwi utsindirwa ku mapenalties. Aremera kandi y'uko yari azi neza ko ivyo yariko arakora vyari ivanguraruhu: "Ni ikosa rikomeye. Nari narakaye kandi sinari nzi ingene Saka yari kwiyumva agiye abona inkende. Nabonye abandi bariko bararungika utwo ducapo nanje nca njako". "Ndashaka n'ukuri gusaba imbabazi Saka, ryari ikosa kandi sinzosubira kubimugirako canke kubigira ku mukinyi w'umwirabure uwo ari we wese." Uyu muntu yavuze ko konte yiwe yahagaritswe na Instagram ikiringo c'amasaha 24. Ariko avuga ko ubu yemera ko yategerezwa guhagarikwa "burundu" kubera ivyo yashize ku rubuga ari "ivanguraruhu ryeruye". Nedum Onuoha wahoze ari umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester City - avuga atarya umunwa ku vyerekeye umupira w'amaguru n'ivanguraruhu - ko yibaza y'uko ibivugwa n'uyu mugabo ata kintu kirimwo. Onuoha yabwiye BBC ati: "Aha avuga ngo, 'Nategerezwa guhagarikwa burundu'. Bisa n'uko abivuga kubera yibaza ko ari ko yategerezwa kuvuga". "Yagiye kuri konte ya Bukayo Saka kuri Instagram ashirako emoji y'inkende nk'iciyumviro yari ashikirije ku vyari ku rubuga kandi azi neza ko atategerezwa kubikora, ariko yabikoze kubera abandi bose bariko barabikora". "Kumbure yibaza ko bose bari barakaye nka we. Ndatahura akababaro ariko igiteye ishavu ni iyo urenze umurongo, kuko bituma abantu bakora nkawe, ibi navyo nkabona ko ari amakosa". Konte z'ivanguraruhu ziracari ku rubuga Konte y'uyu mugabo ni imwe muri 105 zamenyeshejwe na Instagram ko zacishijweko ibitabereye inyuma y'uru rukino rwa nyuma rwa Euro, ariko File on 4 yasanze 79 muri zo zikiri ku mbuga inyuma y'indwi zirenga zitandatu. Callum Hood, wo mu kigo kirwanya amajambo y'urwanko acishwa ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, Centre for Countering Digital Hate, akaba yaranafashije gukora aya matohoza, avuga ko ivyo babonye ari uko amakompanyi akoresha imbuga hwaniro ata shaka afise yo kurandurana n'imizi ivanguraruhu ricishwa ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi. Ati: "Instagram yo nyene ubwayo yaratangaje mu ntango z'uno mwaka ko izohagarika amakonte azorungika amajambo y'ivanguraruhu ku bakinyi, rero bariko bararenga ku vyo biyemeje". "Turiko tuvuga abantu bakoresha rya jambo ritangurwa na N (N-word) mu gutyoza abakinyi, abantu bakoresha ama emojis y'inkende, babwira abantu ngo taha iwanyu". "Imbuga hwaniro zifise ingingo zazo ngenderwako zivuga ko zidashobora kwemera ivanguraruhu, ko ivangiraruhu ridafise ikibanza ku mbuza zazo, ariko ibikorwa vyabo birerekana neza ko ataco bakora kugira ngo batorere umuti iki kibazo". Instagram ivuga ko yafuse konte zitari nke n'amajambo y'ibitutsi kuri uru rubuga kubera abarenze ku mategeko inyuma y'amatohoza yakozwe na File on 4. Istangram ivuga ko abahonyanze amategeko abuza amajambo y'urwanko bashobora kudashoka batakaza konte zabo ubwo nyene, ariko ko aya majambo aca afutwa. Ivuga kandi ko yashizeho ubuhinga butari buke buzotuma amajambo y'ibitutsi ataja ku mbuga. Igipolisi kiriko kirakora amatohoza ku majambo yo gutyoza yakurikiye uru rukino rwa nyuma kivuga ko mu butumwa 396 buriko burakorwako amatohoza, inusu muri bwo ari ubwavuye hanze, hafi bwose bukaba bwavuye hanze y'imigabane na Asia n'Ubulaya. Gushika ubu, abantu 12 nibo bamaze guhagarikwa mu Bwongereza umwe muri bo akaba amaze kuburanywa. Hampande y'ibi, ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu rijejwe umupira w'amaguru FIFA, ryatanguye kwiga ibihano bibereye vyohabwa abafana ba Hongrie inyuma y'ityozwa rishingiye ku rukoba ryakorewe abakinyi b'Abongereza igihe ico gihugu cakina n'Ubwongereza kigatsindwa 4-0 i Budapest. 'Ndababazwa n'ivyama biriko biraba' Tony Burnett, umukuru w'ishirahamwe rikuru ryishinze kurwanya ivanguraruhu, Kick It Out, abona ko imbuga hwaniro zikeneye gushiramwo inguvu gusumba kugira ngo zihashe ivanguraruhu ryakorewe abakinyi b'Abongereza muri uru rukino rwa nyuma rwa Euro2020. "Ndababazwa n'ivyama biriko biraba. Nari kuri final kandi twari tuzi neza ivyari bigiye gukurikira inyuma y'aho tunaniriwe kwinjiza arya ma penaliti". "Rero kubera twari tubizi, imbuga hwaniro zategerezwa kuba zamenye ivyari bigiye gukurikira hanyuma zigakora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo zikingire aba bahungu bateye arya ma penaliti yacu".

headline: Gabon: Igihugu ca mbere co muri Africa gihawe amafaranga yo gukingira amashamba yaco
text: Gabon cabaye igihugu ca mbere muri Afrika gihawe amafaranga kubera kugabanya imyuka yonona ikirere no gukingira amashamba cimeza yaco. Umugambi Central African Forest Initiative (Cafi) ushigikiwe na ONU watanze miriyaridi 17 z'ama dorari - igice ca mbere ca miriyoni 150 z'ama dorari (miriyaridi zirenga 300 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) mu mwumvikano wabaye mu 2019. Ku rugero hafi rwa  90% , Gabon igizwe n'ishamba, rikaba rikwega imyuka ya carbone (gaz carbonique canke CO2) kuruta iyo igihugu gisuka ku kirere. Amashamba cimeza  ni kirumara mu kugabanya imyuka ihumanya ikirere igatuma ubushuhe bwongerekana kw'isi. Gabon yashoboye kwerekana ko yagabanije guhonya amashamba gutyo igabanya imyuka yonona ikirere mu 2016 na 2017 ugereranije n'imyaka 10  yari iheze, nk'uko bivugwa na Cafi. Kuri izo mpamvu, biciye muri Cafi, Norvege yahaye Gabon miriyoni 17 z'ama dorari ifatiye ku matoni y'iyo myuka ubundi yari kuba yisutse mu kirere. Ayandi mafaranga kuri izo miriyoni 150 z'ama dolari  azoja aratangwa  ku kiringo c'imyaka cumi iri imbere. Amafaranga yatanzwe angana na 0.1 %  y'umwimbu wose wa Gabon ku mwaka ariko umushikiranganji wa mbere Lee White yabwiye BBC ko ari intambwe ya mbere ifadika. Gabon ni kimwe mu bihugu bifise  ishamba rinini cane kw'isi kandi ivyigwa vya vuba vyerekanye ko ririnda  ihindagurika ry'ibidukikije kurusha mbere ishamba rya rutura rya Amazon. N'ukubera  ritononekaramwo ibiti vyinshi. Ariko igihugu carakoze cane kugira kibe kiri kuri iyi ntambwe. Mu 2007, hashinzwe impongore kama 13 - ziri kuri 21% y'ubutaka bwose bw'igihugu ca  Gabon. Reta y'ico gihugu iherutse kandi gushira inguvu hamwe n'ikigo Environment Invvestigation Agency kugira kiyifashe gukurikirana abaca ibiti mu buryo butemewe n'amategeko hamwe n'ukutegeranya neza imbaho - ari nayo nzira ya mbere yo kurekura imyuka  yonona ikirere muri ico gihugu. Ariko ico gihugu gishaka kwinjiza amafaranga menshi avuye mu mbaho kikavuga ko kizobandanya guca ibiti no kwongereza agaciro c'ico gisata mu kurushiriza guhingurira  mu gihugu ibiva muri ayo mashamba. Ikigo co mu Bwongereza Rainforest Foundation UK, cishinze gukinigira amashamba cimeza n'amategeko ajanye n'uburenganzira bw'abanyagihugu ku butaka, cabwiye BBC ko naho guhabwa amafaranga yo gukingira amashamba ari ikintu  gikomeye, ayo yatanzwe ashobora kuba gusa ''igikorwa co kumenyekana". Cerekana icegeranyo c'umugwi ucungera ivy'amashamba  Global Forest Watch cerekana ko mu 2017 habaye urugero rwa mbere runini kuruta izindi rwo kugabanuka kw'amashamba muri Gabon kuva mu 2001. Reta ivuga ko ubugenduzi bwayo bwerekana ko igihugu gishobora kutongereza imyuka ihumanya ikirere biciye mu migambi iramba yo kubungabunga amashamba. .

headline: DR Congo: Tshisekedi yababariye abagabo babiri bagize uruhara mw'iyicwa rya Perezida Laurent Kabila
text: Abagabo babiri bagiriwe n'icaha co kwica uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu ca Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, Laurent-Désiré Kabila haraciye imyaka 20, bahawe ikigongwe. N'aho Perezida Kabila yarashwe n'uwamucungerera ubuzima, babiri mu bategetsi biwe bo hejuru, Koroneri Eddy Kapend na Georges Leta, baragize uruhara mw'iryo gandagurwa. Mu kwa gatandatu kw'umwaka uheze, Perezida Félix Tshisekedi yagabanije igihano c'urupfu bari baciriwe. Iki kigongwe gitanzwe mu gihe hari ukutumvikana hagati ya Perezida Tshisekedi n'uwo yasubiriye, umuhungu wa Laurent Kabila ari we Joseph Kabila. Joseph Kabila yafashe ubutegetsi inyuma y'urupfu rwa se wiwe mu 2001, akaba yarongoye DR Congo mu kiringo c'imyaka 18 imbere y'uko Perezida Tshisekedi atsinda amatora yo mu kwa cumi na kabiri 2018. N'aho bwari bwo bwa mbere habaye uguhererekana ubutegetsi mu mahoro kuva mu myaka hafi 60 yari iheze, abatari bake mu bafise uruhara mu buzima bwa politike ya Congo bariyamirije ivyavuye muri ayo matora. Hari benshi bazi ko uyu mukuru w'igihugu mushasha yagiranye amasezerano yo mu mpisho na Joseph Kabila, gushika n'ubu agifise inguvu nyinshi mu gihugu. Giscard Kusema, umwe mu bajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP ko Koroneri Kapend hamwe na bamwe mu bo bapfunganywe "baronse ico kigongwe c'umukuru w'igihugu..ikaba ari ingingo iraba benshi ata nkunzi". Koroneri Kapend yari umwishikira cane kwa Perezida Laurent Kabila. Sentare yasanze ari we yateguye igandagurwa ryiwe, afatanije n'abandi bari bajejwe umutekano w'uyo yahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu, harimwo mbere n'uwari ajejwe ibiro vy'igendereza ico gihe,  Georges Leta. Bompi barahakana ko ata ruhara babigizemwo. Iki kigongwe gitanzwe inyuma y'indwi nkeya Perezida Tshisekedi asambuye ihuriro ryiwe n'umugambwe wa Kabila usanzwe ari wo wiganje mu nama nshingamateka, inyuma y'umwaka wose barabana urunuka. Muri kino gihe, Perezida Tshisekedi ariko arondera urundi runani rwomutuma agira inguvu zikwiye mu nama nshingamateka. Laurent-Désiré Kabila yari yafashe ubutegetsi ku wa 17 z'ukwa gatanu 1997, atembagaje intwaro ya Mobutu Sese Seko Kuku Ngbendu Wa Za Banga mu ntambara yamaze amezi hafi indwi, afashijwe n'ingabo cane cane z'u Rwanda, Uganda na Angola, maze  yomora uyu mukuru w'igihugu citwa Zaire ico gihe yari amaze imyaka ishika 32 agitwaza umukazo. Ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Kabila ntibworohewe kuko haciye imisi mike imigenderanire hagati yiwe na bamwe mu bamufashije gufata ubutegetsi, u Rwanda na Uganda, yaratitutse bituma haduka intambara ya kabiri mu 1998, intambara ivugwa ko yagizwemwo uruhara n'ibihugu icenda, harimwo Zimbabwe, Angola na Namibia vyagiye kumufasha kurwanya abari bateye igihugu ciwe. Yagiye kugandagurwa ku wa 16 z'ukwa mbere 2001, amaze imyaka itatu n'amezi hafi umunani, maze inama nshingamateka ica yemeza ko umuhungu wiwe,  Joseph Kabila, yomusubirira. Joseph Kabila nawe yagiye kuva ku butegetsi atsinzwe muri ayo matora yo mu 2018, amatora yabayemwo impari, akiyamirizwa na bamwe mu batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bwa Kabila, cane cane  Martin Fayulu avuga ko ari we yayatsinze ariko akanyarwa intsinzi.

headline: Djokovic yashitse iwabo muri Serbia inyuma yo kwirukanwa na Australia ku mpari za visa
text: Novak Djokovic  yashitse muri  Serbie inyuma yo kwirukanwa muri Australia. Uwo mugabo ari kw'isonga mu rukino rwa tennis  mu bagabo, yirukanywe atsinzwe urubanza rwa visa rwari rushingiye ku kuba aticandagishije. Abamushigikiye bari baje ku bwinshi ku kibuga c'indege ca Belgrade bazungagiza amabendera y'igihugu basemerera ngo "turakunda Novak" . Umwe mu bafana yavuze ati: "Birateye isoni ivyo bakoreye Novak muri Australia. "Birateye isoni aho isi igeze. "Jewe naricandagishije, natewe incanco zibiri, ariko nibaza ko ata n'umwe yari akwiye guhatirwa gukora ikintu…yaciriwe urubanza kubera uburenganzira bwiwe bwo guhitamwo ico ashaka". Australian Open  y'uwu mwaka  yatanguye i Melbourne kuri uyu wa mbere. Djokovic yari ategekanijwe gukina  kuri uyu wa mbere, ariko iyirukanwa ryiwe ryatumye harangira amahirwe yiwe yo kuba uwa mbere mu gutsinda Grand  Slam ya 21. Hisunzwe amategeko ya  Australia agenga abasohoka n'abinjira, Djokovic w'imyaka 34,  ntazosubira kuronka iyindi visa mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu. Ariko umushikiranganji wa mbere Scott Morrison yavuze ko ashobora gusubira kwemererwa kwinjira muri ico gihugu vuba "mu gihe kibereye". Mu kiganiro na radiyo yo muri Australia 2GB ku wa mbere, yavuze ati: [Ingingo ibuza kwinjira] irarenga ikiringo c'imyaka itatu, ariko hariho amahirwe yo  kugaruka  "mu gihe kibereye" kandi ivyo bizokwigwa hageze". Itegeko rya Australia rirategekanya imvo zishobora gutuma  iyo ngingo y'ikiringo c'imyaka itatu ivanwaho. Ivyo bisigura ko Djokovic ashobora kwitaba Australian Open mu mwaka uza. Ariko ubu hari n'ikibazo c'ukwitaba kwa Djokovic ihiganwa rya French Open, Grand Slam ikurikira ku rutonde rw'uyu mwaka. Inama nshingakateka y'Ubufaransa yaraye yemeje itegeko risaba abantu  barenza imyaka 16 kuba bafise icemeza ko bicandagishije kugira bemererwe kwinjira ibibanza rusangi, harimwo n'ibibanza vy'inkino. Ubushikiranganji bw'Ubufaransa bujejwe inkino bwavuze ku wa mbere ko ata muntu n'umwe buzoha uruhusha rudasanzwe rwo kutisunga iryo tegeko ry'urupapuro rwo kwicandagisha, buvuga ko rikora no ku bakinyi babibigize umwuga co kimwe n'abaja kurorera. Ariko umuvugizi yavuze ko hari naho ibintu vyoba vyahindutse imbere y'uko iryo higanwa riba mu kwezi kwa Rusama (ukwa 5). Djokovic  yahatiwe kuva muri Australia inyuma y'aho abacamanza bemereje ingingo y'umushikiranganji ajejwe abasohoka n'abinjira  Alex Hawke yo gufuta visa yiwe ku mvo z'amagara y'abanyagihugu. Iyo ngingo yarangije igihe ca wavahe wajahe aho uwo munya-Serbia yariko arakora ivyo ashobora vyose kugira agume muri ico gihugu agwanire ikibanza ciwe ca mbere muri tennis. Ubwa mbere yari yahawe uruhusha rwo kwa muganga rwo kwinjira muri Austrialia n'imigwi ibiri itandukanye y'abahinga mu vy'amagara y'abantu - umwe wari  warondewe n'urwego rwa tennis muri Australia, uwundi nawe warondewe na reta y'intara ya Victoria - inyuma yo gupimwa ko yanduye coronavirus mu kwezi kwa Kigarama(12). Ariko kuba uwo mukinyi yagerageje kwinjira muri ico gihugu aticandagishije vyateye ishavu mu banyaguhugu. Urwego rwa Australia rujejwe imbibe rwaciye rumupfunga  itariki 5 Nzero (ukwa mbere) kubera kutuzuza ibisabwa mu bijanye na coronavirus, visa yiwe ica irafutwa. Umucamanza yarasheshe iyo ngingo  ku wa mbere uheze, ariko reta mu nyuma ikoresha izindi ngingo irongera irafuta visa yiwe. Iyo ntambara y'amategeko yaheze ku wa gatandatu igihe abacamanza bemereje ingingo ya reta, bituma Djokovic ata yindi nzira asigarana atari ukuva muri ico gihugu.

headline: Mu mafoto: Umwami Charles ku musi wa mbere atanguye amabanga
text: Ku wa gatanu mu gatondo, niho Umwami mushasha w'Ubwongereza Charles III yava i Balmoral akaja i Londres /London, inyuma y'urupfu rwa nyina wiwe, Umwamikazi. Muri urwo rugendo ari kumwe n'umutambukanyi wiwe, Camilla Umwami yafashe indege yamuvanye i Aberdeen imujana ku kibuga c'indege ca RAF Northolt imbere y'uko aja gushikiriza ijambo igihugu aciye ku mboneshakure. Ashitse ku kirimba ca Buckingham, yasanganiwe n'abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bamwipfuriza kuroranirwa muri  bino bihe bishasha. Ejo ku wa gatanu nyene, abahungu biwe, Abaganwa William na Harry, niho bava i Balmoral. Umwami Charles III yururutse imodoka ku kirimba ca  Buckingham nk'Umwami ku ncuro ya mbere

headline: US: Biden yiyemeje gutanga incanco imiliyoni 100 mu misi ijana ya mbere ari ku butegetsi
text: Prezida wa Amerika aherutse gutorwa, Joe Biden, yiyemeje gutanga incanco imiliyoni ijana mu kiringo c'imisi ijana ashikiriye ubutegetsi. Yavuze ko bishoboka ko mu mezi yiwe ya mbere adashobora gutuza ico kiza, aca yerekana ido n'ido y'ingene azovyifatamwo, ariko avuga ko ashobora kuzohindura uko Covid-19 yifashe ubu. Igihe yariko yerekana abazoba bagize umugwi ujejwe amagara y'abantu igihe azoba ashikiriye ubutegetsi itariki 20 z'ukwezi kwa mbere, yahamagariye abanyamerika "kwambara udupfukamunwa imisi 100". Ku musi wa kabiri, icegeranyo caruguruye inzira ry'iyemezwa ry'urucanco Pfizer/BioNTech n'itangwa ryarwo ku banyamerika. Hagati aho, Prezida Donald Trump yari yitavye inama ku kirimba iwe kuri White House/Maison Blanche, yerekeye umugambi ku rucanco rwa Covid-19 wiswe 'Operation Warp Speed', akaba yashimagije ingene urwo rucanco rugiye kwemezwa. Igitigiri kimaze kwandukira iyo ngwara muri Amerika kirenga imiliyoni 15, abarenga 286.000 ni bo bamaze gupfa, nk'uko biri mu bushakashatsi bwa Kaminuza ya Johns Hopkins. Ukwandura iyo ngwara kuriko kuriyongera mu bice vyinshi vy'igihugu. Hakaba hari igitigiri kitari bwigere kiboneka mu bitaro, bamwe mu bahinga bakaba batunga urutoke ingendo z'imiliyoni n'imiliyoni z'abantu mu gihe c'ibiruhuko biherutse vy'umusi mukuru wa 'Thanksgiving'.

headline: Urucanco rwa malaria 'ruzohindura ubuzima bw'Abanya-Africa ubudasubirwamwo'
text: "Twamana malaria. Abagenzi banje bose nta wutayirwara, nanje narayirwara, abo tuvukana n'abavyeyi kwari uko." Bello Abdul Hakeem Bolaji n'umwe muri miriyoni z'abantu muri Afrika bakuranye na malaria. Uwo munya-Nigeria w'imyaka 25 avuga ko ingingo yo gucandaga abana muri Afrika yose ari ikintu kigiye "guhindura ubuzima". Iyo ndwara mu bindi bice vy'isi nticica abantu cane ariko muri Afrika iracari  iya mbere mu kwica abantu, aho yahitanye abana bashika 260.000  mu 2019. Bello akora  mu vy'ubuhinga bwa none avuga ati: "Ni inkuru ije guhindura umukino". "Igihe nayumva ubwa mbere, nagize ibishobisho. Ubuhinga nibwo bugenga ibihe vya none nazo inyishu nk'incanco muri kahise zarakijije isi  ubukangwe (polio), agasama, mbere na Covid -19." Malaria n'indwara ikwiragizwa n'imibu,  yica cane cane inzoya n'abana bakiri bato. Gukora urucanco inyuma y'imyaka 100 rugeragezwa bibonwa nka kimwe mu bintu bikomeye cane bishitsweko n'ubuvuzi. Bello yaragwaje mushikiwe mutoya igihe yafatwa na malaria afise imyaka 12. Yari asanzwe afise iyindi ndarwa  y'amaraso, gutyo aca  arasinzikara cane. Avuga ati ico gihe "abavyeyi bari mu mahanga, nari jenyene, kandi aho nari ngifise imyaka 17 canke 18". "Hari mw'ijoro hagati, aca atangura kurira, adahwa, ubushuhe bwiwe buraduga gushika n'aho atari agishobora kumbona. "Naragize ubwoba bwinshi cane, ntangura gukoma induru kugira ababanyi baze kumfasha. "Naciye  ndamwirukana kwa muganga, bamushiramwo umwuka wo guhumeka (oxygene), serumu, hanyumma bamukorera ibipimo." Bello avuga ko yari mu bari bafise amahirwe kuko abavyeyi biwe bashoboye kuriha amafaranga yo gushira  mushikiwe ku miti - ariko benshi ntavyo bashobora. Bello avuga ko hari abagenzi biwe n'abo bigana benshi bishwe na malaria - bamwe bakaba bapfuye batararenza n'imyaka itatu. "Novuga ko bihahamura gusubira kuvyibaza no kwibuka abantu twakuranye, benewacu n'abandi bo mu muryango wagutse, abo twigana n'abagenzi. "Abo n'abantu tuba dukunda kandi tuba twifuza kugumana, abantu ubuzima bwabo buhagarikwa n'iyo ndwara. "Abo ni abantu bashobora kuba bavuyemwo abaganga bakomeye, abahinga bakomeye mu bisata bitandukanye, abazana impinduka, indongozi zikomeye zari kuba zagize ivyo zihindura ku bijanye n'ibidukikije canke ubuzima mu kibano". "Ariko nta n'amahirwe bigeze baronka". 'Ibishobora gushika ni bibiri: urupfu canke ubukene' Bello avuga ko imiryango  myinshi  iba munsi y'umurongo w'ubukene, idashobora  kuriha amafaranga yo kuja mu bitaro kwivuza. "Ikigoye n'uko imiryango myinshi idashobora kwirinda kwandura malaria, ntishobore kuriha amafaranga yo kwivuza, y'ivyo kurya canke y'umwuka wa oxygene. Akenshi  abo bana amaherezo barapfa. "Hari ibintu bibiri bishika kubera malaria - urupfu canke ubukene. Mu gihe imiryango myinshi yategerezwa kuba iriko irashira uburyo mu bikorwa vyo kwiteza imbere canke mu mashure y'abana bayo, basohora  amafaranga mu kwivuza malaria." Nico gituma kuri Bello, urucanco rugiye kuba ikintu "gihindura umukino". "Abana benshi twakuranye ntibashobora kuriha amafaranga y'ishure, canke ngo bagure umwambaro w'ishure kandi rimwe na rimwe ntibashobora no kurya kuko amafaranga yaherera mu bitaro. "Niho rero wasanga amaherezo bamwe bahevye ishure bagaca baja mu buzima bw'amabi canke  mu buzi buhemba intica ntikize". 'Ni ngombwa ko bose babasha kururonka' Ndifanji Namacha, umuganga  akorera  muri Malawi avuga ati: "Sinzi ingene nogaragaza ingene niyumva". "Kuva tukiri abana, twari tuzi ko malaria ari indwara idashobora kwirindwa. Wakura wumva ngo abana mwigana ntibashoboye kuza kw'ishure kuko barwaye." Ndifanji avura malaria akanahimiriza abantu kumenya ibijanye n'iyo ndwara mu gihugu. "Afrika itakaza amafaranga menshi kubera malaria. "Ayo mafaranga bahora basohora kugira baje kwivuza, ubu bashobora kuyakoresha mu kwiteza imbere." Urwo rucanco rushasha rwatunganijwe na kompanyi ikora imiti yo mu Bwongereza GlaxoSmithKline, bikaba vyatanguye kugaragara ko rukora haraheze imyaka itandatu. Ndifanji avuga ati: "Ukorera mu bitaro vyo muri Malawi, na cane cane mu gihe malaria iba ikaze, urabona abavyeyi bazana abana baravye kubera malaria yabasinzikaje." "Urabona abagore bafise inda baremvye, mbere n'inda zigakoroka kubera malaria, abana bakavukana ibiro bidakwiye kubera malaria. Usanga bimeze nk'ibintu ugera aho ukamenyera." N'ubwo urwo rucanco rwemerewe gukoreshwa, Ndifanji avuga ko atazoreka kubandanya ahimiriza reta yiwe. "Dukeneye ko urwo rucanco ruba urushobora gushikirwa n'abantu bose, aho niho tuzomenya ingene abantu barwakiriye n'ingene rukora."

headline: Kenneth Kaunda: Habaye ibirori vyo gusezera uwabaye prezida wa mbere wa Zambia
text: Ibirori vyo gusezera uwabaye prezida wa mbere wa Zambia, Kenneth Kaunda, vyabaye harimwo no kurasa ibisasu vya muzinga 21 hamwe  n'urukurikirane rw'indege za gisirikare mu kirere. Kaunda yashengeye afise imyaka 97 inyuma yo kurwara umusonga (pneumonie) mu kwezi guheze. Niwe yari uwanyuma mu  runganwe rw'abategetsi b'Abanyafrika bagwanije intwaro ya gikoroni, hanyuma aca aba umukuru wa Zambia imaze kuronka intahe yo kwikurira mu 1964. Ibirori vyabereye mu kibuga c'inkino ku murwa mukuru  Lusaka, aho abategetsi bavuye mu bindi bihugu bamwunamiye bakanavuga amajambo yo kumushimagiza. Muri ico kibuga, abanya-Zambia benshi nabo bazungagije udutambara twera mu kwibuka uwo yahoze ari indongozi yabo  atakunda kuboneka adafise bene ako gatabara mu ntoke. Amaze gupfa, reta yashinze ikigandaro c'indwi zitatu aho ibintu vyose vyo kwiryohera vyahagaritswe. Ikiziga ciwe caracishijwe kandi mu gihugu kugira abanyagihugu  bamwunamire. Prezida wa Zambia Edgar Lungu yatanze kandi  ikiruhuko ku gihugu cose ku minsi yo kwunamira ubwa nyuma no gushingura umuhisi Kaunda - kumushingura bikazoba ivy'umuryango gusa ku ndwi iza. Mu bitavye ibirori vyo kuri uyu wa gatanu harimwo abategetsi ba Kenya na Ghana, hamwe n'uwa Afrika y'Epfo Cyril Ramapfosa, yashize amafoto yiwe muri urwo rubanza ku mbuga hwaniro. Kaunda - yari azwi cane nka KK - yashigikiye cane ibikorwa vyo kuvanaho intwayo y'amacakubiri y'abazungu muri Afrika y'Epfo, apartheid. Yari kandi mu bari imbere mu gushigikira imihari yo kurondera ubwigenge muri Mozambique no mu kiri ubu Zimbabwe. Afashe ijambo muri ivyo birori, umukuru w'urwego rutwara ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Afrika, Moussa Faki Mahamat, yavuze ko Kaunda  ari ''igihangange mu bagabo'' akaba ''n'uwanyuma mu bashinze ishirahamwe bakanaha ubwigenge ibihugu atari iciwe gusa''. Yongeyeko ati: "Iyo hataba ukwitanga k'urunganwe rwiwe ico gihe, simba ndiko ndavugira imbere yanyu kuko Ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Afrika ritaba ririho." "Tuzokwama dufitiye umwenda Kenneth Kaunda n'abanya-Zambia ." Kaunda yamenyekanye nk'umuntu akomeye mu myaka ya 1950 mu muhari wo kurondera ubwigenge bw'icitwa ico gihe Northern Rhodesia yatwarwa gikoroni n'Ubwongereza. Hari bamwe bamutaziriye "Ghandhi wo muri Afrika" kubera intumbero itarangwa n'intureka mu  bikorwa vyiwe vyo guharanira ubwigenge. Nk'umukuru w'umugambwe w'umurongo w'aba socialiste United National Independence Party (UNIP) , Kaunda yaciye atwara igihugu mu butegetsi bw'umugabwe umwe. Ariko ugukundwa mu gihugu kwahavuye gutituka kuko uko iminsi ihera yagiye arongereza gutwaza igitugu, hanyuma ava ku butegetsi atsinzwe amatora y'imigambwe myinshi mu 1991.
