Mu buzima bwakurikiye, Kaunda yaciye  yijukira kurwanya umugera wa SIDA inyuma y'aho umwe mu bahungu biwe, Masuzyo, yiciwe n'indwara ifatiye kuri uwo mugera. Yabwiye itororokanirzo ry'amakuru Reuters mu 2002 ati: "Twaragwanije ubukoroni. Dutegerezwa gukoresha umwete nk'uwo nyene mu kurwanya SIDA igeramiye kuzimanganya Afrika".

headline: Trump yarahawe amakuru y'uko Uburusiya bwafashije kwica Abanyamerika muri Afghanistan
text: Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vya Amerika, Maison Blanche, biriko bitegekwa gusigura ingene ubutegetsi bwafashe amakuru yerekna ko Uburusiya bwahaye amafaranga aba Talibani kugira ngo bice abasirikare ba Amerika. Abategetsi babandanya bashimangira ko Perezida Donald Trump "we ubwiwe" ata makuru yahawe ku nteguro mbi muri Afghanistan mu 2019. Hagati aho, amakuru avuga ko Perezida Trump yahawe urwandiko rwerekana izo nteguro mu ntango z'uno mwaka. Hari amakenga ko Trump yoba yarahawe amakuru y'integuro mbi ku basirikare ba Amerika ariko akaba yayafashe minenerwe. Aya makuru yoba yagiye ahabona mu gihe Amerika yariko igerageza kurondera ibiganiro vyo kurangiza intambara imaze imyaka 19 muri Afghanistani, kandi Trump nawe akaba ariko arondera kunagura imigenderanire n'umukuru w'igihugu w'u Burusiya Vladimir Putin. Amakuru atangazwa n'ibinyamakuru New York Times, Washington Post na Wall Street Journal, asubiramwo abategetsi ba Amerika batavuzwe amazina, bavuga ko igisata kijejwe igendereza mu gisirikare c'Uburusiya coba carahaye amahera abarwanyi begamiye aba Talibani kugira ngo bice abasirikare ba Amerika muri Afghanistan. Uburusiya burahakana aya makuru mu gihe Abatalibani bavuga ko ata masezerano bigeze bagiriranira n'igendereza ry'Uburusiya. Aya makuru kandi aje mu gihe Bwana Trump ariko arondera kwitoreza ikiringo kigira kabiri mu matora ategekanijwe mu kwa cumi na rimwe uno mwaka. None igishasha muri ivyo ni igiki? Ejo ku wa mbere, ikinyamakuru New York Times casubiyemwo amakuru y'abategetsi babiri ba Amerika kitavuze izina, aho bavuga ko muri raporo y'umunsi ihabwa umukuru w'igihugu yatanzwe mu kwa kabiri uno mwaka harimwo ayo makuru. Ibinyamakuru CNN na Associated Press navyo vyandika ko umukuru w'igihugu yahawe ayo makuru mu ntango z'uyu mwaka. Umunyamabanga ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru muri Maison Blanche, Kayleigh McEnany, ntiyishuye ku kibazo cabajijwe n'abanyamakuru nimba Perezida Trump yarahawe icegeranyo kirimwo ayo makuru, akaba  yavuze gusa ko Bwana Trump "we ubwiwe ata makuru yahawe". Umupfasoni McEnany avuga kandi ko "abajejwe kwegeranya amakuru y'igendereza batashoboye guhuriza hamwe" ku vyerekeye ayo makuru. Hagati aho, abahoze ari abategetsi mu gisata c'igendereza babwiye ibinyamakuru vya Amerika ko, mu butegetsi bwo mu myaka iheze, amakuru nk'aya akomeye yategerezwa gushikirizwa umukuru w'igihugu, n'aho ata vyemezo vyaba bihari. Abashingamateka umunani bo mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika bari bitavye inama ejo ku wa mbere mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu yari irongowe na John Ratcliffe arongoye igendereza mu gihugu, Mark Meadows umukuru w'ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu, hamwe na Robert O'Brien  umuhanuzi mukuru mu vyo umutekano. Bamwe bateye akamo basaba ko hofatwa ingingo ku Burusiya n'umukuru w'ico gihugu Vladimir Putin mu gihe bosanga ayo makuru akiriko arihwezwa vyoboneka ko ari ay'ukuri. Abashingamateka Adam Kinzinger na Michael McCaul ari mu murwi ujejwe imigenderanire mu nama nshingamateka, basohoye itangazo bavuga bati: " Mu gihe vyoboneka ko aya makuru ari ay'ukuri, dusaba dushimitse ko ubutegetsi bufatira ingingo ruhasha ubutegetsi bwa Putin". Abo bategetsi batavuzwe amazina basubiwemwo n'ikinyamakuru  New York Times bavuga ko ibigo bijejwe igendereza vya Amerika haciye amezi vyerekanye neza ko igisata kijejwe igendereza mu gisirikare c'Uburusiya carondeye guhungabanya ibihugu vy'abakeba mu gutanga amahera ku bitero vyakorwa ku ngabo mpuzamakungu. Ico kinyamakuru kimenyesha ko bizwi ko abarwanyi b'idini rya isilamu, canke imirwi y'inkozi z'ikibi zegamiye abo barwanyi bahawe amahera muri iyo ntumbero. Abanyamerika bashika 20 barishwe muri Afghanistan mu 2019, ariko New York Times ivuga ko bitaboneka neza aboba bishwe muri uwo mugambi. Abo bategetsi basubiwemwo na New York Times bavuga ko abahanuzi mu vyo umutekano mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu bariko bihweza ico bokora, harimwo no gufatira ibihano Uburusiya. Inkuru y'ico kinyamakuru yo ku wa gatanu w'indwi iheze ivuga ko Perezida Trump yahawe ayo makuru mu kwa gatatu uno mwaka. Hagati aho, Bwana Trump arahakana ko atavyo yabwiwe. Abicishije kuri Twitter ku wa Mungu, aho yandika avuga ko yaba we canke icegera ciwe Mike Pence batigeze babwirwa "ibijanye n'ivyo bitero vy'Abarusiya ku ngabo zacu muri Afghanistani".

headline: Abakuru ba US na China bavuganye kuri terefone ubwa mbere mu mezi indwi
text: Prezida w'Ubushinwa  Xi Jinping yavuganye na mugenziwe wa Amerika Joe Biden ku wa kane, bukaba ari bwo bwa mbere bavuganye kuri terefone mu mezi indwi. Itangazo ry'ibiro vy'umukuru wa Amerika, Maison Blanche/White House ryavuze ko bavuganye "vyinshi bijanye n'aho inyungu zabo zihurira". Bubabye ubwa kabiri gusa bavugana kuri terefone kuva prezida Biden ashitse ku butegetsi. Imigenderanire hagati y'Ubushinwa na Amerika imaze igihe irangwa  n'icuka kibi,   bitumwe n'imvo zirimwo kunyinyana ku bijanye n'urudandazwa, ukwabura n'ikiza ca  Covid. Itangazo rya Maison Blanche ryongeye riti: "Uko kuvugana, nk'uko prezida Biden yabisobanuye neza, kwari mu murongo w'utwigoro Amerika ibandanya tw'uko  Amerika n'Ubushinwa vyokwitwara neza mw'ihiganwa hagati yavyo". "Abo bategetsi babiri bavuganye inshingano za buri gihugu zo kwirinda ko ihiganwa hagati yavyo  ridahinduka rikavamwo intambara." Mu ntango  z'uyu mwaka, ibiganiro vyo ku rwego rwo hejuru hagati y'ubutegetsi bwa Biden n'Ubushinwa vyaranze no guterana amajambo hagati y'intumwa z'ivyo bihugu. Abategetsi b'Ubushinwa bari bagirije Amerika gukokeza ibihugu "gutera Ubushinwa", nayo Amerika ivuga ko Ubushinwa "bwaje kwiyerekana neza gusa". Ni ibiki Ubushinwa na Amerika batumvikanako? Ni vyinshi cane ugiye kubiraba. Hari ibibazo bitari bike bikomeye cane ivyo bihangange bibiri mu butunzi binyinyanirako - kimwe muri ivyo kikaba ari uburengenzira bwa zina muntu na demokrasi. Amerika yagiriza Ubushinwa gukora ihonyabwoko ku bwoko bw'aba Uighur mu ntara ya Xinjiang. Ivuga kandi ko reta y'Ubushinwa ihonyanga uburenganzira bwa demokrasi muri Hong Kong biturutse kw'itegeko rishasha ry'umutekano abarinegura bavuga ko rikoreshwa mu gucinyiza abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi. Ubushinwa nabwo bumaze kubwira Amerika kenshi guhagarika kwivanga mu vyo buvuga ko ari ibiraba ico gihugu ubwaco, bukagiriza Amerika "gukengera" umugambwe w'aba Communiste. Hari n'ikibazo c'urudandazwa. Ivyo bihugu vyompi biri mu ntanbara y'urudandazwa yatanguye mu 2018 ku ntwaro ya prezida Donald Trump. Amerika yashinze  amafaranga arihwa ku bidandazwa  biva mu Bushinwa biciye miriyari 360 z'ama dorari , Ubushinwa nabwo buca bubikora ku bidandazwa biva muri Amerika biciye miriyariri 110 z'ama dorari. Joe Biden ntaco arahindura ku hari hahagaze uwo yasubiriye ku vyerekeye imigenderanire n'Ubushinwa mu bijanye n'urudandazwa, ivyo rero bikaba bibushavuza cane. Ariko na Afghanistan ishobora kuba iyindi mvo yo kutumvikana. Muri iyi ndwi, umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'Ubushinwa bujejwe imigenderanire Wang Wenbin yaneguye cane ukuvana  ingabo za Amerika muri Afghanistan avuga ko ari "ugusiga akajagari". Yagirije kandi Amerika kuba yetumye Abanya-Afghanistan "batakaza vyinhi cane".

headline: Kenya: Reta yahevye amakori yari yatumye ikena ry'imiti yo gupfupfahaza Sida
text: Kenya yahevye amakori ku mfashanyo y'imiti yo gupfupfahaza Sida yari imaze amezi atatu iri mu mpari zatumye iyo miti ikena mu gihugu. Umushikiranganji ajejwe ikigega ca reta yavuze ko uko guheba  amakori kuri iyo mfashanyo ya USAID (Urwego rwa Amerika rujejwe iterambere mpuzamakungu) kubaye inyuma y'aho umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu avugiye ko miriyoni z'abanya Kenya bari ku miti yo gupfupfahaza Sida (ARV) bariko barayibura. Ibitaro vyinshi ubu vyari bisigaye bitanga iyo miti ku rushi, kugira birabe ko iyo bifise mu bubiko imara igihe kirekire gishoboka. Kare abarwayi ba Sida bahora bahabwa imiti ibamaza amezi atandatu icarimwe,  ariko ubu bari basigaye habwa iyimara indwi imwe gusa. Iryo kena bivugwa ryatanguriye aho USAID yankiye kwinjiza imiti ibicisihije mu rwego rwa Kenya rujejwe imiti , KEMSA,  ivuga ko ari ku mpamvu z'ibiturire n'ikoreshwa nabi ry'iyo miti. USAID yahisemwo gucisha iyo miti mw'ikompanyi yigenga mu kuyinjiza no kuyikwiza mu gihugu. Imiti ibiri nkenerwa cane,  Nevirapine na Zidovudine banywa, yo ntihari hagisigaye namba. Umwe ufasha kurwanya ubwiyongere bw'umugera , uwundi na wo ufasha kubuza ko umuvyeyi yanduza umwana ari munda n'iyo amaze kumuvyara. Ku bw'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu, mu mwaka uheze abana bashika 6.800 baravukanye umugera wa Sida kuko abavyeyi babo batafashe imiti neza  igihe bari bafise inda no mu nyuma yo kwibaruka. Abajejwe amagara y'abantu baja batanguye gusemerera bavuga ko ibitigiri vy'abavyeyi banduza abana vyaduze. Ubu abavyeyi bagiriwe inama yo kudasubira kwonsa abana babo kuko  abo bana batariko bararonka imiti nk'uko itegerezwa kubangikana.

headline: Samuel Eto'o: Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru yarokotse impanuka y'umuduga
text: Samuel Eto'o, yatsindiye agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza w'Umunyafrika inshuro zine, yararusimvye mu mpanuka y'imodoka ejo ku wa Mungu. Bwana Eto'o w'imyaka 39, yari mu rugendo aja mu gisagara ca Douala, ca mbere mu bikorwa vy'ubutunzi muri Kameruni, nk'uko bitangazwa n'umuryango wiwe. Yari avuye mu muji wa Bafoussam, mu burengero bwa Kameruni, aho yari yitavye ibirori vy'isabukuru mu mpera z'indwi. Bivugwa ko umuduga wasovye umushoferi akagonga imiduga ibiri mu yari mu rukurikirane ruherekeje Eto'o. Uyu mugabo yahoze ari rutahizamu wa Barcelona,  ari kwa muganga, nk'uko bitangazwa n'umwe mu bo mu muryango wiwe. Umuvugizi wiwe yabwiye igisata ca BBC gitangaza mu rurimi rwa Pidgin, yuko Eto'o ameze neza kandi yuko umuduga wiwe wononekaye. Frank Happi, avugira Eto'o, yabariye kandi BBC Africa Sport ko Eto'o yanse kwitwarira uwo yari atwaye uwo muduga wundi, yari yabanje guhunga mu nyuma agafatwa akajanwa ku biro vy'igipolisi. Mu nyuma, amasanamu yerekana Eto'o avugana n'uyo mushoferi, amusaba kuja atwara afise umwitwarariko gusumba. Urashobora gushima gusoma n'ibi:

headline: Sentare mu Burundi yanse ibisabwa n'abaregwa kwica Ndadaye
text: Sentare ntahinyuzwa mu Burundi yanse ivyasabwe n'abunganizi b'abaregwa kugira uruhara mw'igandagurwa ry'uwari umukuru w'igihugu c'u Burundi, Melchior Ndadaye mu 1993. Mu cemezo ca sentare catangajwe ku munsi w'ejo, abacamanza baranse kandi ko abaregwa batari mu Burundi boserukirwa n'ababunganira mu mategeko. Abo banyamategeko bavuga ko sentare itari ikwiye kwirengagiza ko uru rubanza rwari mu zigomba kwigwa n'akanama kajejwe ukuri no kwunga abarundi nk'uko biri mu masezerano ya Arusha. Ikindi ngo ni uko abantu bashinjwa bafise ubudahangwarwa bahabwa n'amasezerano ya Arusha. Melchior Ndadaya yagandaguwe bunyamaswa itariki 21 z'ukwa cumi 1993, yicwa n'umugwi w'abasirikare wamufashe umukuye iwe ku kirimba. Ico gihe kandi abakorana vya hafi na Prezida Ndadaye nabo baragandaguwe, gushika ubu nyuma y'imyaka ishika 26 abakoze iryo bara bakaba bataracibwa urubanza. Iyicwa rya ndadaya ryataye igihugu mu kaga, abanyagihugu bacanamwo baragandagurana, vyadukamwo intambara y'amoko hagati y'abahutu n'abatutsi yaheze mu 2001. Urubanza rw'abagandaguye Ndadaye rwarigeze gutanguzwa mu mpera z'imyaka y'1998, ariko hafatwa abo benshi bavuze ko bari abantu bato bato cane batari kuba ari bo bateguye igandagurwa ry'umukuru w'igihugu. Leta y'u Burundi iriho ubu iheruka gusohora imitahe yo gufata abari abasirikare bakomakomeye hamwe n'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu, Pierre Buyoya. Iyo mitahe yariyamirijwe na bamwe mu batavuga rumwe na leta y'u Burundi, bavuze ko ifise intumbero za politike. Umviriza ngaha umwe mu baserukiye abaregwa, Umushingwamanza Gustave Niyonzima, yavuganye na BBC

headline: Qatar World Cup 2022: Paris mu bindi bisagara bitazerekana inkino
text: I﻿gisagara ca Paris kibaye ica vuba mu Bufaransa kimenyesheje ko kitazoshira imboneshakure nini abafana borabirako umupira mu gihe himirije inkino z'isi zizobera mu gihugu ca Qatar. I﻿co gisagara kivuga ko bitewe n'imvo z'agateka ka zina muntu hamwe n'ibidukikije mu gihugu kizakira iryo higanwa. I﻿bisagara vya Lille, Marseille, Bordeaux, Strasbourg na Reims  na vyo biramaze kumenyesha ko bitazerekana izo nkino bifatiye kuri izo mpamvu nyene. P﻿ierre Rabadan ajejwe igisata ca Sport mu gisagara ca Paris, avuga ko no kuba izo nkino zateguwe kuba mu gihe c'ubukonje na vyo vyatumye hafatwa iyo ngingo. I﻿vyo vyatanguye ku musi wa gatandatu aho umukuru w'igisagara ca Lille wo mu mugambwe w'aba socialiste, Martine Aubry, avugiye ko inkino z'igikombe c'isi muri Qatar "ata gaciro zifise uravye agateka ka zina muntu, ibidukikije na Sport". C﻿o kimwe n'abandi bakuru b'ibisagara, ariyamiriza uko uburenganzira bw'abakozi bwubahirizwa muri Qatar; ibivugwa ko hari igitigiri kinini c'abapfuye  mu bakozi b'abanyamahanga; hamwe n'ingaruka y'ibibuga vyubatswe ku bidukikije, vyose bifise ubuhinga bwo gutanga akayaga hanze yavyo. I﻿ Marseille, harabaye imigambi yo gushiraho imboneshakure nini mu gihe Ubufaransa bwoshika mu rukino rwa nyuma, ariko ubu ivyo bikaba vyahagaritswe. U﻿mukuru w'ico gisagara w'umu socialiste, Benoit Payan, yavuze ko iryo higanwa "ryagiye rihinduka buhoro buhoro iryo gusinzikaza agateka ka muntu no kutubahiriza ibidukikije, ibitajanye n'inyifato twari twiteze muri Sport - na cane cane mu mupira w'amaguru - dukwiye guteza imbere". N﻿tibiramenyekana igitigiri c'ibisagara vyo mu Bufaransa biriko birategura ikibanza aho abakunzi b'umupira bashobora gukurikiranira umugwi w'Ubufaransa, ufise igikombe c'inkino zabereye mu Burusiya mu 2018.

headline: Omicron: Ni ibihe bimenyetso bizwi vy'ubu bwoko bushasha bwa Covid-19?
text: Ubwoko bwa Covid-19 buzwi nka Omicron bukwiragira ku murindi munini cane kw'isi, abahinga bakavuga ko ari bwo bwandukira cane gushika ubu. Ariko ubu bwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus busa n'ubwerekana ibimenyetso bidakaze cane ugereranije n'ubwoko bwari bumaze kuboneka, ibi bigatuma vyoroha kuyitiranya n'ibicurane bisanzwe. Hagati aho, umuvuduko udasanzwe wa Omicron mu kwandukira ubandanya kuba ikibazo ngorabahizi ku bisata bijejwe amagara y'abantu kandi ibandanya kubangamira cane abantu bataricandagisha canke abantu bari mu mirwi ikarirwa cane. Ariko none, twoshobora gutandukanye gute Covid-19 n'iyindi ndwara ifatira mu bice vyo guhumeka? Prof. Tim Spector, umuhinga mu bijanye n'indwara z'ivyaduka kw'ishure kaminuza King's College London, akaba arongoye ikigo Zoe Covid Study, yabwiye BBC ati: "Twibaza ko Omicron isa n'ibimenyetso bito bito vy'ubundi bwoko nka Delta twabonye mu bantu bacandazwe". Spector na bagenziwe begeranije amakuru ava mu bantu ibihumbi binjiye muri app yabo bagatanga ibimenyetso vyabo. Aba bashakashatsi bihweje ibimenyetso bifitaniye isano na Delta hamwe na Omicron. Gushika ubu, ibimenyetso bitanu bihurirwako na bose ni: Kimwe mu bituma haba ibi bimenyetso bidakaze ni cane cane kubera igitigiri kinini c'abicandagishije canke imibiri yabo ifise ubudahangarwa. Haracari kare kumenya ingene Omicron ishobora kugira ingaruka ku bantu bataricandagisha canke abantu bafise ibibazo mu bijanye n'ubudahangarwa bw'umubiri. Prof Spector avuga ko kubera vyinshi mu bimenyetso vya Omicron bizwi gushika ubu  bisa n'ivy'ibicurane bisanzwe, bishobora gutuma abantu batamenya ko banduye Covid-19. Ibi bisigura ko mu turere twiganjemwo Omicron yandukira ku muvuduko munini, birashoboka cane ko umuntu afise ibimenyetso vy'ibicurane yisanga yaranduye Covid-19, nk'uko bimeze i Londres, igisagara kirangwamwo abantu benshi banduye Omicron. Wiketse ko ufise uwu mugera, ikintu nyamukuru ni ukwipimisha vuba bishoboka. N'abantu bafise ibimenyetso bito bito canke baterekana ibimenyetso na bimwe bashobora kwanduza abandi. Ubwoko bwa Covid-19 bw'imbere y'aha bwari bufise ibimenyetso nk'inkorora, kumeneka umutwe, gutakaza ubushobozi bwo kwumva akanovera (goût/taste) no kutamoterwa. Ariko, nk'uko bivugwa n'uyu mwigisha wa King's College London, abantu nka bose bavuga ko banduye ntiberekana ibi bimenyetso "bisanzwe bimenyerewe". Ikigo c'Ubwongereza kijejwe amagara y'abantu (British National Health Service, NHS) gihanura ko twokwitwararika ibimenyetso bikurikira: Hagati aho, ku bantu bamwe bamwe, Covid-19 ishobora kurangwa "n'ibicurane bikomeye", hamwe n'ibindi nko kumeneka umutwe, kubabara mu muhogo n'ibiseru. Ubushuhe ubwo ari bwo bwose buri hejuru ya 37.8C bufatwa ko burenze. Ubushuhe bushobora kuza mu gihe umubiri uriko urarwana n'umugera uwo ari wo wose, atari Covid-19 yonyene. Ni vyiza gukoresha agapimabushuhe (thermomètre/thermometer). Ariko mu gihe utagafise, ikore ku gikiriza canke ku mugongo kugira wumve ko ushushe. Ibicurane bisanzwe bishobora kudatera ubushuhe. Rero, mu gihe wumvise ko ufise umuriro mwinshi, bisabwa ko wipimisha. Iyo urwaye ibicurane, birashobora kukuviramwo inkorora canke ibindi bimenyetso. Ibicurane mu bisanzwe biza giturumbuka kandi ababirwaye ugasanga bababara mu mitsi, bagakanya, bakameneka umutwe, bakumva uburuhe, bakababara mu muhogo, hanyuma bakarekura ibiseru canke amazuru akaziba, bikajana n'inkorora. Ibicurane bigenda vyiyongera ariko kandi ntibisinzikaze umuntu cane, n'aho bishobora kudutuma twumva ko turwaye. Hampande y'inkorora, hari ukwasamura, kubabara mu muhogo, n'ibiseru. Ubushuhe, kwumva imbeho, kubabara mu mitsi no kumeneka umutwe biboneka gake. Inkorora ya Covid-19 yerekanwa no gukorora kenshi cane mu kiringo kirenga isaha, canke ibihe vyo gukorora umwanya muremure bitatu canke birenga mu kiringo c'amasaha 24. Iyo wanduye inkorora nshasha kandi ikagenda ibandanya, ni vyiza kuja kwipimisha. Ibi ni ibimenyetso bikomeye vya Covid-19 kandi bisigura ko utegerezwa kwipimisha. Urashobora kuba ucumva ibicurane bisanzwe. Ariko ni vyiza kwipimisha, n'aho woba utumva ko ukomerewe, kugira ngo ntushobore gusanga uriko urakwiragiza uwu mugera. Ukwasamura nti kuri mu bimenyetso bisanzwe vya coronavirus kandi, kireste iyo wumva ufise ubushuhe, inkorora canke ugatakaza ubushobozi bwo kwumva akanovera no kumoterwa, ugatakaza n'akayabagu, nta ngorane zategerezwa kuhaba. Ariko kandi, ukwasamura bishobora kuba biterwa n'ubwandu, rero ni vyiza gukoresha agatambara iyo wasamuye - hanyuma kandi ugakaraba iminwe uhejeje. Ntibiri mu bimenyetso bikomeye vya coronavirus, ariko ubushakashatsi butari buke bwerekanye ko abantu bapimwe bagasanga baranduye usanga bafise ibi bimenyetso. Nk'akarorero, mu mabwirizwa y'isuku ya Amerika, ivy'ibiseru canke kuziba amazuru ntibiri mu bintu bishobora kwerekana coronavirus, ariko kandi hakiyongerako ugucibwamwo. Amakuru ava muri Afrika y'Epfo nayo arerekana ko abantu bamwe bamwe berekanye ibibazo vyo mu nda nk'ikimenyetso gishoboka ca Omicron. Ariko mu Bwongereza, Prof Tim Spector avuga ko ibimenyetso vya Omicron bisa n'ibigomba kumera nk'ivy'ubundi bwoko bwa Covid-19 buheruka - ibi na vyo cane cane bikaba ari ibibazo bifatira mw'ihemero. None nobandanya mfise ubwoba ko ndwaye Omicron? Ibiharuro vya mbere n'ubushakashatsi kuri Omicron vyerekana ko ubu bwoko butababaza cane ugereranije n'ubw'imbere yabwo. Ibi biterwa hamwe hamwe n'ihinduka ry'uwu mugera, ariko imbere ya vyose inguvu z'incanco n'ubudagangarwa kama bw'umubiri. Hagati aho, umurindi Omicron ikwirakwirako, umuvuduko munini cane gushika uno musi, uracari ikibazo kandi benshi, cane cane abarwaye basanzwe bafise ibindi bibazo vy'amagara, nibo babangamirwa. Abantu banduye coronavirus bafise kwerekana ibimenyetso bitari bike kuva kuri bitoya gushika kuri binini. Hari n'abaterekana ibimenyetso na bimwe ariko bagashobora kwandukiza abandi. Ibimenyetso bishobora kumara indwi zishika kuri zibiri kugira ngo biboneke inyuma yo kwandura umugera, ariko kenshi bikunze kwibonekeza ku musi ugira gatanu. Ingorane zo guhema zishobora kuba ikimenyetso c'uko umuntu asinzikaye.

headline: Papa Francis yemeye ko yananiwe kwihangana akubita urushi umukenyezi yariko amukwega
text: Papa Francis yasavye imbabazi  inyuma y'aho akubitiye urushi ku kuboko umwe mu bakirisu bari mu rugendo rweranda bakoraniye ku kibanza citiriwe umweranda Petero i Roma. Papa yariko aramutsa abana n'abandi bari bakoraniye muri ico kibanza hanyuma agize ngo aragiye, umukenyezi umwe muri bo amukwega ukuboko n'inguvu nyinshi gushika n'aho ahakwa kumugwisha hasi. Ivyo vyatumye Papa ahindukira agerageza kumwikura vyanka, aca amukubita urushi ku kuboko ashavuye abona kumurekura. Niho mu nyuma Papa yemera ko vyanse ko yihangana aremera ko nawe nyene acumura nk'ikiremwamuntu nk'abandi. Ati: "Kenshi biranka ko twihangana. Naje birashobora kunshikira. Nico gituma nsavye imbabazi ku vyashitse nijoro". Ivyo vyatangaje benshi kuko imbere y'aho, mu gihe yashikiriza ijambo ry'ukwipfuriza umwaka mushasha abakirisu, yariyamirije ihohotera rikorerwa abakenyezi.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amakuru ku wa mbere: Fellaini, Kane, Lingard, Salah, Pedri, Thauvin, Cavani
text: Umumenyereza wa Tottenham Jose Mourinho ariko arondera ingene yogura uwahoze akina hagati mu murwi nserukiragihugu Marouane Fellaini. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 33 yahoze akina muri Manchester United igihe yamenyerezwa na Mourinho, asanzwe akina mu murwi  Shandong Luneng wo mu Bushinwa kuva avuye Old Trafford mu 2019. (Voetball 24 via Sun) Arsenal itegura kuzunguruka  West Ham mu nteguro yayo yo kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United n'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza Jesse Lingard w'imyaka 28 mu ci riza, ubu akaba asanzwe akina muri  West Ham aho yatijijwe . (Star) Leicester City iri imbere y'imirwi ya Manchester United na Tottenham mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati w'umufaransa  Boubakary Soumare w'imyaka 22 asanzwe akina muri  Lille. (Star) Bayern Munich iriko irarondera ko kuzana umumenyereza wa  Liverpool Jurgen Klopp muri uyo murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'ubudagi, Bundesliga, mu ci riza mu gihe uwusanzwe awumenyereza ubu Hansi Flick yova muri uyu murwi akaja kumenyereza umurwi nserukiragihugu. (90mins) Umukuru wa Bayern  Herbert Hainer avuga ko yizeye neza ko Flick azobandanya amenyereza Bayern Munich. (Sky Sport Germany via Goal) Liverpool itegerezwa kwihuta ikagura umukinyi wa Barcelona umunya Espagne Pedri w'imyaka 18 kubera ko mu gihe yotera igikumu ku yandi masezerano igiciro ciwe kizoca kiduga cane. (Star) Paris St-Germain iramaze kuvugana n'abaserukizi ba Mohamed Salah kugira bavugane ingene mu ci riza uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 28 w'umunya Misiri yova muri Liverpool akaja gukinira uyo murwi wo mu Bufaransa. (Telefoot on Twitter - in French) Umumenyereza wa PSG akaba kandi yahoze amenyereza Tottenham, Mauricio Pochettino, aramaze kuvugana n'umusatirizi wa Tottenham n'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza, Harry Kane w'imyaka 27 kugira ngo arabe ko yosubira kumwiyegereza mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubufaransa. (Telefoot on Twitter - in French) Manchester United "irarajwe ishinga cane" no kugura umukinyi w'inyuma wa Villarreal n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Espagne Pau Torres w'imyaka 24, akaba kandi ariko aronderwa n'imirwi  Bayern Munich na Real Madrid. (AS via Team Talk) Crystal Palace yahindukiriye umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa  Marseille umufaransa Florian Thauvin w'imyaka 28, mu gihe biboneka ko ifise amahirwe make yo kuronka umukinyi w'inyuma wa Watford umunya Senegal Ismaila Sarr w'imyaka 23 mu ci riza. Hagati aho Thauvin ubu yaramaze gutangura ibiganiro na  AC Milan. (Sun) Edinson Cavani  kuva muri  Manchester United ntibizokworoha kubera mu masezerano y'ubuguzi harimwo umurongo uvuga ko umurwi umushaka uzotegerezwa gushirako imiriyoni 2.7 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Uyu musatirizi wa Uruguay w'imyaka  34 ariko araronderwa cane n'umurwi Boca Juniors wo muri Argentina. (Mirror) Inter Milan nta mugambi ifise wo kugiriranira ayandi masezerano n'umukinyi wo hagati w'umutariyano Nicolo Barella w'imyaka 24, n'aho asanzwe ariko aronderwa cane na  Chelsea, Bayern Munich na Atletico Madrid. (ESPN) West Ham iripfuza kugura umunyegori Seny Dieng, umunya Senegal w'imyaka 26 asanzwe asamira umurwi QPR ukina mu cicaro ca  kabiri  QPR. (Sun) Ibiganiro hagati ya Juventus n'umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Argentina Paulo Dybala w'imyaka 27 biracagoranye kubera ibibazo vy'amafaranga uyu murwi ufise, ni mu gihe  Manchester United iriko iramurondera, nk'uko bivugwa n'umukuru w'igisata kijejwe imyimenyerezo muri Juventus,  Fabio Paratici. (Sky Italia via Goal) AC Milan ntirota igurisha umukinyi wayo w'imbere Rafael Leao w'imyaka 21 munsi y'imiriyoni 50 y'ama euro. Uyu munya Portugal yarigeze kuronderwa n'imirwi ya Everton na Juventus. (Calciomercato - in Italian) Leicester City iri hafi yo kugura umunyegori Brad Young, umwongereza w'imyaka 18 asanzwe akina mu murwi Hartlepool. (Sun)

headline: Ingabo za Ukraine i Kharkiv ziriko zisubiza inyuma ingabo za Russia
text: Ingabo za Ukraine mu gisagara kigira kabiri c'iki gihugu zasubije inyuma Aburusiya ku buryo vya muzinga vyabwo bidashobora kuzishikira, nk'uko umunyamakuru wa BBC uriyo abivuga. Muri iyi ntambara, ingabo z'Uburusiya zari zimaze imisi 70 yose zicucagira Kharkiv amabombe y'urutavanako, mu gihe zoba zasubijwe inyuma iki gisagara coba cinjiye mu gahengwe. Agace ka nyuma kabohowe ni ikigwati ca Pytomnyk, nk'uko vyaraye bitangajwe n'igisirikare ca Ukraine. Hagati aho, ingabo z'Uburusiya ntiziriko zirasubira inyuma - nk'uko vyagenze mu micungararo ya Kyiv. Zivugwa ko ziriko ziriyegeranya, aho ingabo zirwanira ku butaka ziva mu mabatayo (bataillons) atari make ziriko zirahamvya abandi. Nayo mu ntara ya Donbas, igisirikare ca Ukraine congeye gutangaza ko casambuye ibiraro vyakoreshwa n'ingabo z'Uburusiya mu kujabuka uruzi ruri mu karere ka Luhansk mu buseruko bw'igihugu ahamaze imisi habera intambara zikomeye. Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi wa Ukraine yasohoye amasanamu avugwa ko ari ibifaru vy'Uburusiya n'ibindi bimodoka vyasambuwe mu kigwati ca Bilohorivka, hafi y'igisagara ca Lysychansk kiri mu minwe ya reta ya Ukraine. Umukuru w'akarere ka Luhansk Serhiy Haidai avuga ko Bilohorivka ari "ikirindiro ntamenwa" cari "gihanganye n'igitigiri kinini" c'ingabo z'Uburusiya - nk'uko bimeze i Mariupol. Igisirikare c'Uburusiya ntaco kiravuga kuri ibi bivugwa na Ukraine, bitaremezwa n'uruhande rwigenga. Inyuma y'aho bunaniriwe no gufata umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine, Kyiv, mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bw'igihugu mu  ndwi za mbere z'iyi ntambara, Uburusiya bwavuze ko bugiye gushira inguvu zose mu buseruko kugira bwigarurire uturere twa Luhansk hamwe na Donetsk. Gushika ubu, Moscou ntirashobora gushika kuri iyi ntumbero. Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi w'Ubwongereza Ben Wallace avuga ko Uburusiya buzova muri iyi ntambara muri Ukraine bwatakaje inguvu ugereranije n'aho bwari bugeze imbere y'igitero cabwo. Avugana n'abanyamakuru i Washington - aho yabonaniye n'umushikiranganji wa Amerika ajejwe kwivuna abansi Lloyd Austin - Wallace yavuze ko Vladimir Putin ari we wenyene "ashobora kumenya iyo azoshikana igihugu". Ati: "Impera n'imperuka ategerezwa kwemera ko yataye umutwe. "Uko vyogenda kwose, reka tuvuge ko Ubusuriya ari igihugu giciriritse gusumba uko cari kimeze imbere y'iki gitero". Wallace avuga kandi ko igisirikare c'Uburusiya "gishaje" kandi ko gishobora kugira ingorane zo gusubira kwiyubaka kubera ibihano ruhasha igihugu cafatiwe. Vyongeye, Wallace avuga ko yemera ko Ubushinwa bugenda butinya ibiriko bikorwa n'Uburusiya, bukabona ko atari vyiza mu bijanye n'ubudandaji. Ati: "Si incuti yo kwizera. Ntushobora kumwizera ngo uherezeko".

headline: Coronavirus: Dexamethasone niwo muti wa mbere umaze kuboneka ko ushobora gukiza
text: Umuti uzimbutse kandi uri mu burere bwose bwo kw'isi umaze kugaragara ko ushobora kurokora ubuzima bw'abarwayi ba coronavirus basanzwe baremvye. Abahinga b'abongereza bavuga ko uwo muti, uzwi kw'izina rya dexamethasone ari intambwe ikomeye cane mu rugamba rwo kurwanya iyi ndwara ruhonyabantu. Niwo muti wa mbere kw'isi umaze kuboneka ko ukomeye mu miti yose iriko irageragezwa kw'isi mu kuvura coronavirus. Uwo muti ushobora kurokora ku rugero rw'ica gatatu ubuzima bw'abantu basanzwe bariko bavurwa hakoreshejwe vya vyuma bifasha guhema. Ushobora kandi kurokora ku rugero rw'ica gatanu ubuzima bw'abarwayi nabo bariko bavurwa mu guhabwa impemu zo guhema. Abashakashatsi babona ko iyo uwo muti uba warakoreshejwe mu kuvura abarwaye iyo ndwara kuva mu ntango mu Bwongereza, ubuzima bw'abashika 5000 buba bwararokotse. Uwo muti uboneka kandi ko ushobora kugira akarusho kadasanzwe mu bihugu bikenye bifise ibitigiri binini vy'abarwaye Covid-19. Leta y'Ubwongereza ku ruhande rwayo yarategekanije mu bubiko bwayo uwo muti wo kuvuga abantu bashika 200.000. Ivuga ko igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu NHS kizoronswa uwo muti kugira ngo kiwuhe abarwayi bizoba ari nkenerwa ko bawuhabwa. Hafi 19 kuri 20 banduye coronavirus barayikira batarinze kurazwa mu bitaro. Nayo ku basanzwe barajwe mu bitaro, abenshi barakira ariko hari bamwe biba ngombwa ko bahabwa impemu canke bakambikwa vya vyuma bibafasha guhema. Abantu nk'aba rero nibo barwayi baba babangamiwe, bikaba ngombwa ko bahabwa dexamethasone. Mu bikorwa vyo kugerageza uwo muti vyari birongowe n'ishure kaminuza rya Oxford, hafi abarwayi 2000 bari barwariye mu bitaro barahawe dexamethasone baca bakorerwa umwihwezo bagereranije n'abandi 4000 batahawe uwo muti. Ku barwayi bariko baravurwa hifashijijwe vya vyuma bibafasha guhema, urugero rwo gushobora gupfa rwaragabanutse kuva ku bice 40% gushika kuri 28%. Ku barwayi bari basanzwe bariko bahabwa impemu, urugero rwo gushobora gupfa rwaragabanutse kuva ku bice 25% gushika kuri 20%. Umwigisha Peter Horby yari ajejwe amatohoza avuga ati: "Uwu niwo muti wonyene gushika ubu werekanye ko ushobora kugabanya urugero rw'abahitanwa n'iyo ndwara - kandi wararugabanije biboneka. Ni intambwe ikomeye cane". Umwigisha Martin Landray arongoye ubwo bushakashatsi avuga ko mu vyo batoye, uwo muti ushobora kurokora ubuzima: Ati: "Hariho koko akarusho kagaragara. Uwo muti umurwayi awukoresha gushika ku minsi 10 ukagurwa hafi amadolari 6.29 kuri buri murwayi. "Rero mu bisanzwe kugira ubuzima bw'umurwayi burokorwe, hakenewe amadorari hafi 44. Uwu ni umuti uri mu burere bwose kw'isi". Umwigisha Landry avuga ko aho bishoboka, abarwayi bakwiye gutangura kuwuhabwa vuba bishoboka. Hagati aho, si ukuvuga ko abantu boca baja kuwugura ngo bawufatire muhira. Dexamethasone bisa n'uko atari umuti wo gufasha abantu bafise ibimenyetso bito  vya coronavirus atari ba bandi ari ngombwa ko bafashwa guhema. Umuti witwa hydroxychloroquine usanzwe uvura malaria ukaba wariko ugeragezwa mu kuvura coronavirus kuva mu kwa gatatu uherutse guhagarikwa kubera ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko ushobora gusongera isibe aho gukiza. Hari uwundi, remdesivir, uvura imigera wowo uriko urarwizwa mu bigo vya NHS kuko wabonetse ko ufise akarusho mu kuvura coronavirus kuko ufasha kugira ngo abarwayi bakire ningoga.

headline: USA-Iran: Amerika ‘yiteguye kuja mu biganiro nyavyo’ na Irani ata kirinze gusabwa
text: Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zivuga ko "ziteguye kuja mu biganiro vyo nyavyo na Irani atakirinze gusabwa"inyuma y'aho ivyo bihugu bishamiraniye. Mw'ikete yandikiye ishirahamwe ONU,  Amerika isigura ko igandagurwa rya Jenerali Qasem Soleimani ryabaye mu buryo bwo kwivuna. Irani yarihoye mu kurasa ibisasu vya misire ku birindiro vy'abasirikare ba Amerika muri Iraq ariko ntawe vyahitanye. Nayo nyene yabwiye ONU ko yakoze ico gitero mu buryo bwo kwivuna. Jenerali Soleimani yaboneka ko ari we mutegetsi agira ubwa kabiri mu gihugu. Nk'umukuru w'ingabo zidasanzwe, Quds, zo mu gisata ca gisirikare kijejwe gukingira ubutegetsi bwa ki isilamu (Iranian Revolutionary Guards'), politike ya Irani mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo hagati yari ihagaze kuri we. Mw'iryo kete ryarungikiye Inama Nkuru y'umutekano y'ishirahamwe ONU, uwuserukira Amerika muri ONU Kelly Craft , avuga ko Amerika yiteguye kuganira "mu ntumbero yo kubuza Irani ko ihungabanya amahoro n'umutekano vy'isi". Rivuga kandi ko Amerika izofata n'izindi ngingo "mu gihe vyokenerwa" mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo hagati kugira ngo ikingire abakozi bayo n'inyungu zayo. Hagati aho, uwuserukira Irani muri ONU, Majid Takht Ravanchi, avuga ko ata muntu yokwemera ivyo ibiganiro bivugwa na Amerika, mu gihe ibandanya ifatira Irani ibihano ruhasha mu vyerekeye ubutunzi. Bwana Trump yarigeze kumenyesha ko yipfuza kuganira na Irani atakirinze gusabwa - mbere ko yobonana na Perezida Hassan Rouhani. Mu kwezi kw'icenda guheze, Ayatollah Khamenei  yavuze ko Irani itarota ija mu biganiro na Amerika, akavuga ko ari uburyo bwayo bwo kurondera "gushira igitutu kuri Irani". Ayatollah Khamenei avuga ko, mu gihe Amerika yosubira mu masezerano yivumbuyemwo mu 2018 yerekeye umugambi wa Irani w'uguhingura ubutare bw'ubumara, Irani ishobora kuja mu biganiro bishobora kuyihuza n'ibindi bihugu vyose biri muri ayo masezerano. Mw'ikete rya Irani, Bwana Ravanchi yanditse avuga ko Irani "idashaka intambara" inyuma y'aho ikoreye igitero co kwivuna ku kirindiro c'ingabo za Amerika. Yanditse ati: "Ico gitero cakozwe uko categuwe kandi gikorwa ku birindiro vya gisirikare, ari naco gituma ata banyagihugu basanzwe bahasize ubuzima, eka n'inyungu zabo zikaba ataco zabaye mu karere". Inyuma y'ico gitero ca Irani, Perezida Trump avuga ko Irani isa n'iyahesheje. Mark Esper   avuga ko Irani yateye ibisasu vya misire 16, aho 11 vyaguye ku kirindiro ca Al Asad, ikindi kikagwa ku kirindiro ca Irbil. Avuga ko ibindi vyaguye kure y'aho vyategerezwa kugwa.

headline: South Africa yoba yarinubwe ku bumenyi bwayo ko Omicron idakaze cane?
text: Abahinga bo muri Afrika y'Epfo - bashimagizwa n'amakungu kuba ari bo ba mbere babonye ubwoko bushasha bwa Omicron - bagiriza ibihugu vy'uburengerazuba kwirengagiza ivyemezo vya mbere ko ubwo bwoko bushasha bwa Covid bwari bworoshe "cane bitangaje" ugereranije n'ubwari bumaze gushegesha isi gushika ico gihe. Babiri mu bahinga bakomeye cane mu bijanye na coronavirus bo muri Afrika y'Epfo babwiye BBC ko ukwinuba kw'ibihugu vyo mu burengerazuba ku gikorwa cabo gushobora gufatwa nk'"ivanguramoko," canke, nibura, guhakana "kwemera ubuhinga/ubumenyi kuko buvuye muri Afrika". "Bisa nk'uko ibihugu bikize bimeze nk'ibishobora kurusha kwakira inkuru mbi ivuye mu bihugu nka Afrika y'Epfo," ivyo bivugwa n'umwigisha wa kaminuza Prof  Shabir Madhi, umuhinga mu ncanco wo kuri kaminuza ya Witwatersrand y'i Johannesburg. "Iyo dutanze inkuru nziza, buno nyene haca hatangura ukwinuba. Ivyo novyita ivanguramoko." Prof Prof Salim Karim,yigeze kuba ariwe mukuru w'inama mpanuzwajambo  ya reta ya Afrika y'Epfo mu kurwanya Covid akaba n'icegera c'umukuru w'inama mpuzamakungu ya science (International Science Council)  nawe aravyemera. Yavuze ati: "Dukeneye kwigira bamwe ku bandi. Ubushakashatsi bwacu bukorwa neza cane. Umuntu wese yari yiteze  akaga [kuri Omicron], aho rero batakaboneye, baciye batangura kwibaza niba ivyo twari twihweje vyari vyakozwe neza hisunzwe ubuhinga," akanemera ko incuro nyinshi z'ingene Omicron yagumye yihindagura zishobora kuba zatumye haba ukwiyubara cane. Umupfunda wa vuba wa Covid muri Afrika y'Epfo, watanguye mu mpera z'ukwezi kwa Munyonyo (ukwa 11) mu 2021, ubu uriko uragabanuka cane ku murindi nk'uwo wari wazananye kandi usa n'uwushobora gutangazwa ko waheze mu gihugu cose mu minsi iza. Haracari impungenge ko urugero abantu bandurako rushobora kwongera kuduga kubera amashure yasubiye gutangura, ariko, muri rusangi, umupfunda watewe na Omicron ushobora kumara ica kabiri c'umwanya iyindi mipfunda yamaze. Mu ntango z'ukwezi guheze, abahinga n'abaganga ngaha bari batanguye guhanahana ivyemezo ko Omicron, naho yandukira cane,  ituma abantu bake ari bo binjizwa ibitaro canke bapfa ugereranije na Delta. Prof Marta Nunes , umushakashatsi mukuru mu gisata gisesangura ibijanye n'incanco n'indwara z'ibisebuzi kuri kaminuza ya  Witwatersrand avuga ati: "Imburi twari twatanze mu kwezi kwa cumi na kabiri n'ubu iracafise agaciro. Omicron ntiyakara cane. Mu buryo butangaje. Umugera uriko utera umenyera umubiri w'umuntu, kugira uzohave uba nk'uwuja uragaruka ku gihe runaka. Ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi OMS riragabisha ku kuvuga ko Omicron "idakaze cane", rikavuga ko ukwandukira  cane kwayo kwateye "tsunami" kw'isi, igatuma inzego z'ubuvuzi zihakwa kurengerwa. Ariko abashakashatsi bo muri Afrika y'Epfo baguma bahagaze ku bushakashatsi bwabo. Prof Karim avuga ati: "Urugero rw'apfa ruratandukanye cane [kuri Omicron]. Twabonye urugero rwo gupfa ruri hasi cane," agashimikira ku biharuro vya vuba  vyerekana ko abinjiye ibitaro ari incuro zine munsi y'abavyinjiye kubera Delta, nk'uko n'abarwayi bakenera guhabwa gufashwa guhumeka nabo bagabanutse nk'uko nyene. Prof Karim yongerako ati: "Nta n'indwi zibiri vyafashe kugira bitangure kugaraara ko ari ubwoko budakara nk'ubwahahora. Hanyuma aho tumariye kubimenyesha abandi kw'isi, haciye haba ukuvyinuba. Vyaravuzwe ko Afrika - canke nibura bimwe mu bice bimwe bimwe vy'uwo mugabane- yisangije uko iriko irahura n'ico kiza kubera ingene uko abayibako bameze, canke kubera izindi mvo. Muri Afrika y'Epfo, , nk'akarorero, muri rusangi umuntu afise imyaka 17 y'ubuto kurusha uwo mu Bwongereza. Ariko abahinga bavuga ko muri Afrika ico boba barusha abandi  ufatiye ku bantu bahaba ku vyerekeye Covid birengewe kure n'ingorane z'amagara ziharangwa. Abantu bose bamaze gupfa muri rusangi mu bihe vy'ikiza muri Afrika y'Epfo ubu bangana na 290.000 - ni ukuvuga 480 ku bantu 100.000 - igitigiri cikuba kabiri ku co mu Bwongereza. Prof Madhi avuga ati: "Ukuri ni uko Afrika y'Epfo ifise abantu bashobora gukarirwa n'indwara kurusha abo mu Bwongereza iyo haje indwara ikaze. Nivyo dufise abanyagihugu bakiri bato… ariko natwe dufise abanyaguhugu b'amagara atako yifashe kubera ibindi bituma bibangamira amagara nk'ukuvyibuha birengeje canke umugera wa Sida (HIV)." Prof Karim avuga ati: "Igihugu cose kirafise ivyo cisangije.  Ariko turamaze kumenya ingene duhereye hamwe dushobora kubona ivyoshika ahandi". Igitigiri ca 290.000 c'abantu bamaze gupfa bose mu gihe c'ikiza ntikiremezwa ko arico nyaco cerekana abo ikiza kimaze guhitana muri Afrika y'Epfo. Kiri incuro zitatu igitigiri kizwi icese c'impfu zitewe na Covid-19. Ariko abahinga  ngaha bibaza ko abenshi muri abo bose bapfuye muri iki gihe c'ikiza  bishoboka ko bahitanywe n'ikiza. Ica kabiri cabo bapfuye mu gihe ca Delta, ariko, gushika ubu, 3% bonyene nibo bamenyekanye mu gihe c'umupfunda wa  Omicron, nk'uko bivugwa na Prof Madhi. Reta ya Afrika y'Epfo yaranse gufata ingingo zikaze kurusha mu gihe c'umupfunda wa Omicron, yongera iranegura  cane ibihugu vyo hanze vyari vyaciye vyihuta mu gufata ingingo zo kubuza ingendo z'indege ziva canke zija muri ako karere. Abahinga ngaha muri rusangi barashimye iyo nyifato yoroshe kuri ico kibazo, ubu bakaba bibaza ko n'ibindi bihugu bikwiye gufata ako karorero. Prof Nunes avuga ati:  "Turemeza ko uwo mugera utagiye kurandurwa mu mubiri w'umuntu. Ubu dutegerezwa kwiga ingene tuzobana n'uwo mugera hanyuma nawo uzokwiga ingene utegerezwa kubana na twe." Prof Madhi avuga ati: "[Urugero rw'abicwa na Omicron] rwerekana ko turi ku ntera itandukanye y'ikiza. Nobigereranya n'igihe c'ukwiyandaza iyo wahora urwaye". Asanga Afrika y'Epfo, "ibiravye hasi hejuru"  yararetse ivyo gushira abantu ukwa bonyene no kuguma irondeza aboba barakoranyeko n'abanduye, hanyuma agasaba reta kureka gupima Covid-19  ku rugero rwo mu kibano avuga ko bidakenewe. Ahubwo avuga ko ico gushira imbere ari ukugabanya abantu binjizwa ibitaro kubera Covid-19. Prof Madhi anashikiriza amakenga ko ubutumwa bunyuranye ku kugene Afrika y'Epfo iriko iravyifatamwo neza mu kurwanya ikiza bushobora "kugabanya icizere ku ncanco [n'ubwo ikiri co  ari uko]  tuzi ko zibuza umuntu kurwara akaremba. N'ubwo Afrika y'Epfo iza inyuma cane y'ibihugu nk'Ubwongereza uravye urugero rw'abantu bahawe incanco, nibura  bitatu kuri bine vy'abanyagihugu barakingiwe bifadika biciye ku bufatanye bwo kuba warigeze kwandura umugera hamwe no gucandagwa. Prof Karim aremera ko ukwandukira vyihuse kwa Omicron bitera ingorane ku gihugu nka Amerika, ariko afatiye ku biriko biraba muri Afrika y'Epfo, avuga ati "iciza n'uko kubera [urugero rwo kwandura] rwaduze vuba gutyo, no kumanuka niko ruzokwihuta, gutyo ibitaro ntibizoheza ngo birengerwe cane".

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Eriksen, Mane, Pogba, Lukaku, Raphinha, Vinicius Jr
text: Manchester United yemereye umukinyi wo hagati wa Danemark Christian Eriksen w’imyaka 30 ko ishobora kumwakira mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye na Brentford azorangira mu mpera z’uku kwezi. (The Athletic) Kubona Manchester United irondera  Eriksen ntibisigura ko yahagaritse kurondera Frenkie de Jong w’imyaka 25 ari imbere ku rutonde rw’abo irondera, mu gihe ibiganiro bibandanya hagati y’uyu mukinyi wo hagati w‘Ubuholande n’umurwi wiwe wa Barcelona. (Mail) De Jong avuga ko aryohewe kwumva United imurondera ariko ko ubu ari mu murwi wa mbere  kw’isi. (Metro) Bayern Munich iriko irategura imiriyoni 34.6 z’amapawundi mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi w’umunya Senegal Sadio Mane inyuma y’aho  Liverpool yankiye ibiciro bibiri vya mbere kuri uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 30 ubu. (Bild, iciye kuri Mail) Juventus iri hafi yo kwemerera amasezerano umukinyi wo hagati umufaransa Paul Pogba w’imyaka 29 yiteze gusezera mu murwi wiwe wa Manchester United igihe amasezerano afitaniye nayo azoba arangiye muri kuno kwezi. (Fabrizio Romano) Manchester City ishobora kegeranya amafaranga arenga imiriyoni 200 z’amapawundi mw’igurishwa ry’abakinyi muri rino ci mu gihe uyu murwi urondera kuzana umukinyi wo hagati wa Leeds United, umwongereza Kalvin Phillips  w’imyaka 26. (Telegraph) Umusatirizi wa City umunya Brezili Gabriel Jesus w’imyaka 25 yipfuza kwimukira muri Arsenal kugira ngo asubirane n’umumenyereza w’aba Gunners Mikel Arteta yahoze ari icegera c’umumenyereza muri Etihad Stadium. (Evening Standard) Umusatirizi wa Everton Richarlison w’imyaka 25 yanse kwimukira muri Arsenal – mu gihe  Chelsea na Tottenham Hotspur ivugwa ko ari yo mirwi uyu musatirizi wa Brezili yipfuza kwimukiramwo. (UOL iciye kuri Liverpool Echo) Inter Milan iriko irasatira mu rugamba rwo kugura umusatirizi wa  Chelsea  Romelu Lukaku w’imyaka 29, uyu mubirigi kaba yiteguye kugabanirizwa umushahara kugira ngo asubire muri uyo murwi wo mw’ihiganwa ry’Ubutaliyano, Serie A. (Fabrizio Romano) Real Madrid iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano mashasha n’umusatirizi wa Brezili Vinicius Jr w’imyaka 21. (Goal) Leeds United yashitse ku masezerano yo ku munwa  yo kugura umukinyi wo hagati w’umunya Espagne Marc Roca w’imyaka 25, asanzwe akina muri Bayern Munich amasezerano y’imyaka ine ku miriyoni 12 z’ama euro hamwe n’uturusho. (Fabrizio Romano) Umunya Nigeria Victor Osimhen  asanzwe aronderwa na Arsenal avuga ko azofata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe mu ci inyuma y’aho uyu musatirizi wa Napoli w’imyaka 23 yemereje ko hari imirwi yo mu Bwongereza no muri Espagne imurondera. (Standard) Umukinyi w’inyuma wa Manchester City umuyapani Ko Itakura w’imyaka 25 araronderwa na Borussia Monchengladbach. (Lyall Thomas, iciye kuri Mail) Chelsea iriko iraraba ingene yoronka umunyegori wa Lazio umunya-Albania Thomas Strakosha w’imyaka 27 mu gihe umunya Espagne Kepa w’imyaka 27 yova muri uyu murwi muri rino ci. (Fabrizio Romano) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Leeds  Raphinha w’imyaka 25 araronderwa cane n’imirwi ya Arsenal na Tottenham Hotspur muri rino ci, mu gihe hari amakenga ko  Barcelona itazoronka uburyo bwo kugura uyu mukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Brezili. (The Athletic) Tottenham na Juventus yatewe akagere mu rugamba rw’iyi mirwi rwo kurondera umutaliyano Destiny Udogie w’imyaka 19 akina ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu inyuma mu murwi Udinese. (Sun) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Uruguay Lucas Torreira w’imyaka 26 azosubira muri Arsenal inyuma  Fiorentina itafiye ingingo yo kutagumya burundu uyu mukinyi inyuma y’ikiringo yari amaze akinira uyu murwi yari yatijijwemwo. (Standard) West Ham iripfuza kugura umubirigi Adnan Januzaj w’imyaka  27 akina hagati muri Real Sociedad. (Mirror) Nantes yamenyesheje ko yipfuza kugura umunyegori wa Nottingham Forest umukongomani Brice Samba w’imyaka 28. (Football Insider) Wolves iracafise icizere ko izoruhira kuronka umunya Portugal akina hagati Joao Palhinha w’imyaka 26 asanzwe akinira Sporting Lisbon n’aho Fulham iriko ikora uko ishoboye ngo imutware. (Sun) Bournemouth niyo ihabwa amahirwe imbere ya Nottingham Forest na Fulham yo kuronka umwongereza akina hagati Joe Rothwell w’imyaka 27 asanzwe akinira Blackburn Rovers. (Football Insider)

headline: Uganda: ‘Kenya igize umeze nkanje, u Rwanda uko...twokubaka Afrika nziza’ – Katumba
text: Cyriaque MUHAWENAYO/BBC Gahuzamiryango i Kampala John Katumba niwe mukandida mutoya mu 10 bashaka gusubirira Kaguta Museveni, nawe yipfuza kuguma ku butegetsi, Katumba avuga ko atowe agomba gusubizaho ibiringo vy'umukuru w'igihugu. Mu kwezi kwa mbere umwaka ushize nibwo yahejeje amashure y'ubudandaji muri kaminuza ya Makerere, yaratunguranye ubwo yemerwa nk'umukandida mu matora azoba kuwa kane w'iyi ndwi. Imbere y'iwe ariko hariho abakandida 10 batoroshe, barimwo Yoweri Museveni - John Katumba bagiye guhatana yavutse asanga amaze imyaka 10 ategeka, n'ubu yipfuza gukomeza. Mu 2017, Uganda yavuguruye ibwirizwashingiro, imyaka ntarengwa (hagati ya 35 na 75) ivanwa mu bisabwa uwipfuza gutwara Uganda. Mu myiyamamazo agira ati: "Ndabasavye nshimitse dushireho ibiringo, ntituzopfira ku butegetsi… turakeneye iragi..iragi rya prezida''. "Ubu mfise imyaka 24, ibaye myinshi notwara imyaka cumi, nohava mba umuhanuzi w'umukuru w'igihugu ku neza y'abariko baravuka''. "Mbaye umuhanuzi wa prezida, Kenya ikaronka uwumeze nkanje, u Rwanda uko nyene…twoba turiko turubaka Afrika nziza." Katumba ntafise akazi kazwi akora kuko ahejeje amashure vuba, avuga ko ataje avuga ku majambo gusa ko ibintu bikwiye guhinduka, ahubwo ko aje guhindura ibintu. Ati: "Ubu muri Afrika turahanzwe n'ikibazo co gukoresha neza amabanga tujejwe…igiturire cariraye, ni co gituma mvuga ko nzokuraho inyifato yahahora nzane ubundi buryo bwo gukora." Yipfuza kunagura igisata c'indero uhejeje amashure yisumbuye azoba afise umwuga ushobora kumutunga. Iyo biguma uko John Katumba ubu yari gutegereza indi myaka 11 kugira yemerwe guhatanira uyu mwanya w'ubutegetsi. Imyiyamamazo y'amatora y'umukuru w'igihugu y'abakandida 11 barimwo umugore umwe,  bitegekanijwe ko irangira ejo kuwa kabiri. Yaranzwemwo imishamirano hagati y'abatavuga rumwe na reta n'inzego zijejwe umutekano aho hari n'abapfuye abandi barapfungwa, benshi bakaba ari abayoboke ba Bobi Wine ahanganye cane rwose na prezida Museveni muri ayo matora.

headline: Rwanda - Coronavirus: abantu 42 bahagaritswe barenze ku mategeko abuza amakoraniro
text: Abantu 42 bahagaritswe n'igipolisi c'u Rwanda mu karere ka Gatsibo mu murenge wa Rugarama, inyuma y'aho kibasanze bakoraniye hamwe bariko basenga. Amakuru yatangajwe ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'igipolisi c'u Rwanda avuga ko abo bantu bafashwe ejo ku wa 17 kubera bahonyanze amategeko abuza abantu gukoranira hamwe mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry'ikiza karanda ca COVID-19. Amategeko asaba abanyagihugu kuguma mu rugo ashirwa mu ngiro n'abajejwe umutekano mu Rwanda, babuza abantu gusohoka mu ngo zabo. Gusa, Guma mu rugo yaraheze kireste uduce tumwe tumwe i Kigali,  Nyamagabe na Nyamasheke. Umuvugizi w'igipolisi mu ntara y'Iburasirazuba, Chief Inspector of Police (CIP) Humdun Twizeyimana, avuga ko baronse amakuru y'abo bantu bariko bakoraniye hamwe bayahawe n'abanyagihugu. Ati: "Abaturage baduhaye amakuru ko hari abantu barenze ku mabwiriza ya Leta yo kurwanya Koronavirusi". "Twahise dutegura igikorwa co kubafata, nibwo twabasanze bateraniye ahantu mu bisambu bari mu masengesho". Leta y'u Rwanda iheruka gufungura amasengero inyuma y'amezi ane yugawe kubera coronavirus, gusa yatanze ingingo ategerezwa gukurikiza. Nk'uko amakuru ari kuri urwo rubuga abandanya abivuga, CIP Twizeyimana yagiriza abo bantu ko "bari bakoranye batubahirijwe n'ingingo n'imwe kandi bavuye mu mihingo itandukanye". Avuga kandi ko ata n'umwe yari yambaye agapfukamunwa, batanubahirije ingingo yo kutegerana kandi ata n'amazi yo gukaraba yari ahari, ngo ivyo bigashobora gutuma banduzanya. Ati: "Bose bari bazi neza ko ivyo barimwo bitemewe ariko babirenzeko barabikora.... Hariya bari bateraniye nta bwirinzi ubwo aribwo bwose bubahirije ku buryo umwe muri bo abaye yanduye yashobora kwanduza abandi." Mu Rwanda, abantu bashika 1,473 nibo batangajwe ko banduye umugera wa coronavirus, muri bo bane bakaba barapfuye. Iki gihugu camaraze igihe c'iminsi 45 mu mategeko ya guma mu rugo, ubu akaba yaratezuwe. Hagati aho, hari uturere duherutse gusubizwa muri ayo mategeko, ubutegetsi bukavuga ko bwafashe iyi ngingo inyuma y'ubusesanguzi bwakozwe n'inzego z'ubuzima ku kiza karanda ca coronavirus" muri utwo turere.

headline: Umuyobozi wa Bujumbura agabisha ko CHOLERA yateye igisagara ca Bujumbura
text: Umukuru w'igisagara ca Bujumbura, Freddy Mbonimpa, aragabisha ababa muri ico gisagara ko indwara ya CHOLERA yamaze kubashikamwo. Mw'itangazo yasohoye ejo ku wa mbere igenekerezo rya 05 z'ukwa munani, Bwana Mbonimpa amenyesha ko abantu 126 bamaze kwandura iyo ndwara. Avuga ati: "Gushika ubu ama zone abangamiwe kurusha ayandi ni KANYOSHA, BUYENZI, BUTERERE, na CIBITOKE". CHOLERA yandukira mu kunywa amazi canke gufata imfungurwa zandujwe n'amazirantoke arimwo imigera yayo. Bwana Mbonimpa agabisha ko "hari ibibanza bikoraniramwo abantu benshi bitubahiriza isuku, nk'amazu y'uburiro n'ubunywero ...". Avuga ko ku munsi ku munsi "hibonekeza abarwayi  bashasha bane canke batanu". Umukuru w'igisagara atangaza ingingo zafashwe mu ntumbero y'uguhangana n'iyo ndwara. Muzi izo ngingo harimwo guhagarika: "Ubunywero n'uburiro bikorera mu masoko, mu ma parking y'imiduga, iruhande y'amabarabara canke ku miserege y'amazi". Meri ya Bujumbura kandi yahagaritse "uruja n'uruza rw'amasorori arimwo imfungurwa, urudandazwa rw'abatembereza amazi yo kunywa ari mu ma sachets, imitobe n'izindi mfungurwa ku ma parking n'ibindi bibanza vy'ihuriro". Meri kandi yabujije kuvoma no gukoresha amazi y'inzuzi canke y'imiserege. Freddy Mbonimpa asaba ko ahantu hose hugawe hatokwugururwa abajejwe intwaro n'amagara y'abantu batabonye ko hakwije ibisabwa  mu vyo isuku. CHOLERA ni indwara yandukira cane kandi yica ningoga mu gihe umurwayi atavuwe hakiri kare.

headline: Ukraine: Putin yategetse ingabo kubandanya zisatira inyuma yo gufata Lysychansk
text: Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya yategetse umushikiranganji wiwe wo kwivuna abansi kubandanya basatira Ukraine inyuma y’aho ingabo z’ico gihugu zigaruriye igisagara ca Lysychansk. Perezida Putin yerekanywe ku mboneshakure y’Uburusiya atera akamo ingabo ziri hakurya kubandanya intumbero yazo nk’uko biri “mu nteguro zamaze kwemezwa”. Ifatwa rya Lysychansk risigura ko ubu intara ya Luhansk yose iri mu minwe y’Uburusiya. Mu ntango buramatari w’umunya-Ukraine yavuze ko iki gisagara bakivuyemwo kugira ngo Abarusiya ntibagisambure bibereye kure. Abasirikare ubu bagiye ku bindi birindiro bishasha vyakomejwe, nk’uko buramatari Serhiy Haidai yabibwiye BBC. Avuga ko guhebera Abarusiya iki gisagara n’intara ya Luhansk cabaye ikintu kibabaje, ariko akongerako ati: “Iyi ni intambara imwe gusa dutakaje, nti dutakaje urugamba”. Yasavye ibindi birwanisho biva mu Burengero kugira ngo bashobore guhangana n’inguvu z’Uburusiya. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky arizeza ko ingabo za Ukraine zizosubirayo kugira zisubize Lysychansk "kubera ibirwanisho bigezweho biriko birongerezwa”. Uburusiya bwarongereje inguvu mu bitero vy’amabombe mu bisagara vyegereye akarere ka Donbas, aho uduce turi mu micungararo ya Sloviansk n’ibarabara riri hagati ya Lysychansk na Bakhmut ari two twiziziwe, nk’uko ingabo za Ukraine zibivuga. Intara za Donetsk na Luhansk zose hamwe nizo zigize akarere k’amahinguriro ka Donbas. Perezida Putin yabonetse abwira umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi  Sergei Shoigu ko ingabo zagize uruhara mw’ifatwa rya Luhansk zikwiye “kuruhuka kugira ngo zitegurire urundi rugamba”. Avuga ati: "Iyindi mirwi y’ingabo, harimwo umurwi wo mu Buseruko n’umurwi wo mu Burengero, itegerezwa kurangura imirimo yayo hakurikijwe integuro zamaze kwemezwa”. Yizeye kandi ko no kuri izo mpande zindi bazoshika ku ntambwe nk’iyatewe mu ntara ya Luhansk. Imbere gato y’uko atanguza igitero kuri Ukraine ku wa 24 Ruhuhuma (2), Putin yari yemeje Luhansk na Donetsk nk’ibihugu vyigenga. Inyeshamba zegamiye Uburusiya zatanguje intambara muri ako karere mu 2014 - umwaka nyene Uburusiya bwigarurira akarere ka Crimea. Haraciye indwi irenga ingabo z’Uburusiya zigaruriye Severodonetsk – igisagara cabaye umunyota kubera ibibombe vy’Uburusiya. Avuga ku ngingo yo kuva muri Lysychansk, Haidai yavuze ati: "Igisirikare cacu kiba caragumije iki gisagara igihe kirekire, ariko ingabo z’Uburusiya ubu zifise amahirwe menshi ku birwanisho vya rutura n’amasasu. Zari gusambura iki gisagara zibereye kure, rero ntaco vyari bimaze kugumayo”. Haidai avuga ko ubu ingabo zimukiye ku birindiro biri mu ntara ya Donetsk ihana urubibe na Luhansk, ariko ko abantu 10.000 bakiri muri iki gisagara.

headline: DRC: Abantu 25 nibo bagandaguwe buca ari ubunani
text: Abategetsi bo mu buseruko bwa Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo batangaza ko n'imiburiburi abantu 25 bishwe mu gitero kivugwa ko cakozwe n'umuhari Allied Democratic Forces, ADF. ADF ni umwe mu mirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho iharurwa muri mirongo igisibije mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu. Yagirizwa ko uyu mwaka urangiye yagandaguye abasivize baharurwa mu majana. Aba baguye muri iki gitero cakozwe mu kigwati ca Tingwe kiri mu karere ka Beni mu ntara ya Kivu y'Uburaruko  hafi bose bari abarimyi bari bigiriye mu mirima yabo buca ari ubunani. Abarwanyi ba ADF bavugwa ko babicishije inkoho abandi bakakata imitwe bakoresheje imipanga. Umutegetsi w'akarere avuga ko abasirikare ba Congo batututse ku biziga vy'aba bantu igihe bariko barakurikirana aba barwanyi. Uyu muhari ADF watanguye mu myaka ya 1990 nk'umuhari warwanya ubutegetsi bwa Uganda ukorera mu buseruko bwa Congo. Nta ntumbero ya politike nyezina uyu muhari wigeze ugira, ariko umaze imyaka itari mike ugisibije muri ako karere. Bimwe mu bitero ukora bisa n'ibifise intumbero yo guhana abanyagihugu yagiriza ko bakorana canke bagatanga amakuru ku gisirikare ca Congo.

headline: Iran: Igisirikare ca Amerika cemeza ko cishe umukuru w’ingabo zidasanzwe za Quds, Qasem Soleimani
text: Jenerali Qasem Soleimani, umukuru w'ingabo zidasanzwe, Quds, zo mu gisata c'igisirikare kijejwe gukingira ubutegetsi bwa ki isilamu (Iranian Revolutionary Guards'), yishwe n'ingabo za Amerika muri Irak. Ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bwa Amerika, Pentagon, bwemeza ko yishwe "kw'itegeko ry'umukuru w'igihugu". Igihe yahitanwa n'ico gitero c'indege za Amerika, Jenerali Soleimani yari mu modoka  imureruye imukura ku kibuga c'ingege  ca Baghdad, ari kumwe n'umurwi w'abarwanyi ushigikiwe na Irani. Indongozi  nkuru ya Irani, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, avuga ko "igihugu kizokwihora bikomeye inkozi z'ikibi" zakoze ico gitero. Yatangaje kandi ikigandaro c'iminsi itatu. Jen. Soleimani yari umuntu akomeye mu butegetsi bwa Irani. Ingabo ziwe, Quds, zakukira Ayatollah Ali Khamenei ubwiwe kandi yafatwa nk'incungu y'igihugu. Hagati aho, Amerika yafata ingabo za Quds n'umukuru wazo nk'umurwi w'iterabwoba, kandi ikabagiriza ko aribo bishe abanyamerika baharurwa mu majana. Aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, umukuru w'igihugu ca Amerika Donald Trump yakwiragije ibendera rya Amerika iyo nkuru imaze kumenyekana. Inyuma gato y'ico gitero, ibiciro vy'igitoro vyaciye biduga gushika ku bice birenga 4%. Ibinyamakuru vya Amerika bivuga ko Jen. Soleimani n'abategetsi b'umurwi w'abarwanyi ushigikiwe na Irani bariko bava ku kibuga c'indege ca Baghdad bari mu modoka zibiri igihe baterwa n'indege hafi y'ahashikira imizigo. Jen. Soleimani avugwa ko yoba yari avuye muri Libani canke Syria. Ibisasu vya misire bitari bike vyateye abari muri urwo rugendo, bikavugwa ko abantu bashika batanu ari bo baguye muri ico gitero. Igisirikare kijejwe gukingira ubutegetsi bwa ki isilamu muri Irani kimenyesha ko umukuru w'umuhari w'abarwanyi ba Irak, Abu Mahdi al-Muhandis, ari mu bahitanywe n'ico gitero. Itangazo rya Pentagon rivuga riti: "Kw'itegeko ry'umukuru w'igihugu, igisirikare ca Amerika cakoze igitero gikomeye co kwivuna kugira ngo gikingire abanyamerika bakorera mu mahanga mu kwica Qasem Soleimani". Ryongerako riti: "Iki gitero cari gifise intumbero yo gusambura integuro z'ibitero vyategurwa na Irani. Amerika izobandanya ifata ingingo zikenewe kugira ngo ikingire abanyagihugu bacu n'inyungu zacu aho zizoba ziri hose kw'isi". Ico gitero ca drone cabaye  inyuma y'aho abari mu myiyerekano batereye ibiro vy'ubuserukizi bwa Amerika ku mugwa mukuru Baghdad, aho batanye mu mitwe n'ingabo za Amerika zicungereye ivyo biro. Pentagon ivuga ko Jen. Soleimani yatanze uruhusha rw'ivyo bitero kuri ivyo biro vy'ubuserukizi. Ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Trump bwagiriza ingabo za Quds  ko ari "umurwi nyamukuru wa Irani ukwiragiza ukanafasha" imirwi y'iterabwoba irwanya Amerika mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo hagati, mu kuyiha ibirwanisho, amahera, imyimenyerezo n'ibindi. Muri iyo mirwi harimwo Hezbollah yo muri Libani, hamwe na Islamic Jihad yo muri Palestina, Umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Irani, Javad Zarif, avuga ko ivyabaye ari "igikorwa c'iterabeoba mpuzamakungu", akavuga ko Amerika "ariyo izobazwa ibizokurikira ico gitero c'ubuhimbiri". Mohsen Rezaei yahoze arongoye igisata  kijejwe gukingira ubutegetsi bwa ki isilamu, avuga ko Irani "izokwihora Amerika bikomeye". Uumvugizi wa leta ya Irani amenyesha ko igisata  c'igihugu kijejwe umutekano gitegura kubonana mu nama yo "kwihwereza hamwe ivy'ico gitero". Kuva mu 1998, Jenerali Majoro Qasem Soleimani yari arongoye ingabo za Quds, ingabo zidasanzwe z'igisata  kijejwe gukingira ubutegetsi bwa ki isilamu, zisanzwe zikora ibitero vyo mu kinyegero hanze ya Irani. Zagize uruhara rudasanzwe mu ntambara ya Syria, aho zafashe mu mugongo ingabo za Perezida Bashar al-Assad w'ico gihugu, zongera zifasha mu buryo bwa gisirikare abarwanyi ibihumbi n'ibihumbi b'aba Isilamu bari kumwe muri iyo ntambara. Eka no muri Irak uwo murwi usanzwe ufasha abarwanyi b'aba Shia bafashije kurwanya umurwi Etat Islamique. Izo ntambara nizo zatumye Jen. Soleimani aba rurangiranwa muri Irani.

headline: Zimbabwe-Covid : Reta itegeka abakozi bayo kwicandagisha canke guheba akazi
text: Reta ya Zimbabwe ibwira abakozi bayo guhitamwo gufata urucanco canke guheba akazi, aho ni mu gihe abo bakozi barindiriye kuronka uracanco rwa Covid -19. Reta ivuga ko iyo ngingo ari iyo kugerageza kurwanya gukwiragiza uwo mugera mu bandi bantu. Mu kiganiro n'amaradiyo yo mu gihugu, ministre wa Zimbabwe ajejwe ubutungane Ziyambi Ziyambi avuga ko abakozi bibaza ko bafise uburenganzira bwo kwiteza canke kutiteza urucanco bihenda. Imbere y'aho, reta yari yashinze ingingo z'uko amazu y'uburiro n'amashengero yakira abantu ari uko berekanye ikarata y'uko biteje urucanco. Intumbero n'ukugirango reta irabe ko yohangana n'ikibazo c'uko abantu bakigonanwa kuja kwicandagisha. Ico gihugu gushika ubu kimaze gucandaga abantu bashika miriyoni imwe n'ibinhumbi amajana indwi, n'ukuvuga 12%  y'abantu barenga kuri  miriyoni 15 baba muri ico gihugu co mu bumanuko bwa Afrika. Ku mugabane wose wa Afrika, abamaze kuronka incanco zuzuye ni hafi 3% gusa. Gushika ubu nta gihugu co muri Afrika kirashinga amategeko atuma urucanco rwa  Covid  ruba ngombwa. Ariko abahinga bavuga ko bishobora kwumvikana ko bene ayo mategeko ajaho nk'inzira yo guhangana n'ico kiza n'amabi yaco ku magara y'abantu.

headline: Burundi: Abantu ijana bashasha batowe umugera wa Covid-19
text: Abantu ijana bashasha batowe umugera w'indwara ya Covid-19 nk'uko bitangazwa n'umushikiranganji w'Uburundi ajejwe  amagara y'abantu, mu gihe uyu munsi ariho hatangura ingingo yo kwugara imbibe zo hasi z'Uburundi mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera. Mu kiringo kidakwiye n'indwi, babaye abantu 140 batowe uwo mugera hari haheze amezi abiri ata muntu avuzwe ko yanduye mu gihugu hagati. Ku wa gatatu uheze , ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu bwari bwatangaje ko mu minsi ibiri gusa bwatoye abantu 40 banduye uwo mugera mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Umushikiranganji w'Uburundi ajejwe amagara y'abantu  Thadee Ndikumana yanditse kuri twitter ati : ''kwandura coronavirus birahumaganye mu Burundi''. Amenyesha ko abo bantu ijana bashasha banduye batowe mu bantu 5300 bapimwe kuko hari aho bahuriye n'abo 40 bari batowe mu bipimo vyo kw'itariki 4 na 5 z'ukwezi kwa mbere. Abantu ijana babaye igitigiri  ca mbere kinini gisahsha c'abantu batorewe uwo mugera icarimwe  kuva utangura kuvugwa mu gihugu  mu kwezi kwa gatatu mu mwaka uheze. Uyu munsi niho hatangura kuja mu ngiro ingingo yo  kwugara imbibe zo hasi no mu mazi. Uretse  ibidandazwa,  abashobora kwinjira mu Burundi bakaba ari abagenda n'indege gusa. Nabo nyene bashika bashirwa ukwa bonyene mu mahoteri  iminsi indwi bagapimwa coronavirus bagishika bagasubira ku munsi ugira gatandatu. Hanatangujwe mu gisagara ca Bujumbura isekeza ry'iminsi 30 ryo gupima uwubishaka wese mu gihe yiyumviseko  ibimenyetso vy'indwara ya Covid-19. Uburundi buri hafi yo gushika abantu igihumbi -barenga 980 bamaze kwandura coronavirus na babiri bamaze kwicwa n'iyo ndwara hakurikijwe ibiharuro vy'ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara y'abantu.

headline: Afghanistan: Abana bashonje bahabwa imiti yo gutora itiro hakanagurishwa ingingo z'umubiri
text: Na Yogita Limaye BBC News, Herat A﻿banya-Afghanistan basigaye baha imiti abana babo kugira babasinzirize - abandi bagurisha abakobwa babo n'ingingo z'umubiri kugira babe baramaze kabiri. Ku gihe  c'imbeho (hiver/winter) kigira kabiri kuva aba-Taliban bagarutse ku butegetsi hanyuma imfashanyo ziva hanze zigahagarikwa,  abaharurwa muri za miriyoni bugarijwe n'inzara. A﻿bdul Wahab avuga ati: "Abana bacu baguma barira, kandi ntibasinzira. Nta vyo kurya dufise." "﻿Duca tuja kuri farumasi, tukazana ibini tugaha abana bacu kugira bashobore gutora itiro." U﻿wo mugabo aba mu nkengera za Herat, igisagara kiza ubugira gatatu mu bunini muri ico gihugu, mu kigwati  c'utuzu duto duto tw'ivyondo cagiye kiraguka kuva mu myaka iheze, kikuzura abantu bomowe n'intambara n'ibindi biza vyizana. A﻿bdul ari mu mugwi w'abantu hafi 10 baje begera aho turi. Twarababajije, tuti ni bangahe baha imiti abana babo kugira babasinzirize?  Nabo bishura bati: "Benshi, twese". Ghulam Hazrat  yaciye akora mu mufuko wiwe asokorora agapfungo k'ibinini.  Vyari ibinini vya  alprazolam - ibinini ku bisanzwe bihabwa abantu baba bafise ingorane z'umwitwarariko mwinshi. Ghulam afise abana batandatu, umuto muri bo afise umwaka umwe. Ati: "Nawe nyene ndamuha". Abandi batweretse ibinini vya escitalopram na sertraline bavuze ko baha abana babo. Ivyo navyo ku bisanzwe vyandikirwa abayinze n'abafise umwitwarariko mwinshi. A﻿baganga bavuga ko iyo ihawe abana bakiri bato kandi bataronka ivyo kurya bihagije, imiti bene iyo yonona igitigu (umwijima mu kinyarwanda), igatera 'izindi ngorane nyinshi nko kwama ufise uburuhe, n'ihungabana ryo gusinzira n'inyifato. K﻿uri farumasi imwe, twasanze ushobora kugura ibinini bitanu vy'iyo miti ikoreshwa ku ma Afghani (amafaranga yo muri Afgnistan) 10, (nka 200 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi), ayagura ikimanyu c'umukate. Myinshi mu miryango twahuye yasangira ibimanyu bikeye vy'imikate buri munsi. Umugore umwe yatubwiye ko bari bariye umukate wumye mu gitondo, mw'ijoro naho bakuwudumba mu mazi kugira worohe. O﻿NU ivuga ko ubu "akaga" kariko karaba muri Afghanistan. Abagabo benshi mu karere kari ku nkengera ya Herat bakora ibikonkwano vyo ku munsi mu mirima. Bamaze imyaka babayeho ubuzima bugoye. Hagati aho, igihe aba-Taliban bafata ubutegetsi mu kwezi kw'umunani, ariko reta yabo ntiyemerwe n'amakungu, amafaranga yaja muri Afghanistan avuye hanze yaciye ahagarikwa, bituma ubutunzi butembagara, gutyo bituma abagabo benshi kenshi bakabura  ico bakora. K﻿u munsi bagize igihamana bakaronka akazi, baca nk'ama Afghani 100 (ni ibihumbi bibiri birenga gato mu mafaranga y'Uburundi). A﻿ho twagiye hose twasanze abantu bafata ingingo zikomeye cane kugira imiryango yabo ntiyicwe n'inzara. Ammar (siryo zina ryiwe ry'ukuri) yavuze ko yabazwe kugira bamukuremwo ifyigo haraheze amezi atatu aca aratwereka n'inkovu ndende y'aho babaze - n'ahaciye inyuzi hagitukura - kuva mu kaziba k'inda utera uja mu mugongo. A﻿ri mu myaka ya 20, yategerezwa kuba  ari mu myaka iryoshe y'ubuzima bwiwe. Twanyegeje umwidondoro wiwe kugira tumukingire. Y﻿avuze ati: "Nta kundi nari kugira. Numvise ko ushobora kugurisha ifyigo ku bitaro vya hano. Nca ndajayo hanyuma ndababwira ko nshaka [kurigurisha]. Haheze amayinga make, naciye nvumva bampamagaye bansaba kuja ku bitaro." "﻿Barakoze ibipimo bikeya, hanyuma bantera umuti watumye ntasubira kumenya ubwenge. Naragize ubwoba ariko nta kundi nari kugira." Ammar bamuhaye ama Afghani hafi 270.000 (arenga miriyoni 6,2 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) kuri iryo fyigo, amenshi akaba yagiye mu kuriha amafaranga yari yaguranye kugira asumire ivyo kurya umuryango wiwe. "﻿Iyo turiye muri iri joro, irikurikira ntiturya. Maze kugurisha ifyigo ryanje, numva umenga nsigaye ndi umuntu adakwiye. Numva nihebuye. Hamwe ubuzima bwobandanya gutya, numva nzohava mpfa," niko avuga. K﻿ugurisha ingingo z'umubiri si ikintu gishasha muri Afghanistan. Vyahora bikorwa n'imbere y'uko aba-Taliban bafata ubutegetsi. Ariko n'iyo abantu bafashe ingingo nk'iyo ibabaza cane, n'ubundi basanga badashobora kuronka uburyo bwo kubaho. M﻿u nzu ata na kimwe kirimwo, yuzuye imbeho, twahasanze umugore avuga ko hari haheze amezi indwi agurishije ifyigo ryiwe. Bakoresheje ayo mafaranga mu kuriha ideni - amafaranga bari baguranye ngo bagure ubusho bw'intama. Ariko izo ntama zaciye zipfa zihitanywe n'imyuzure mu myaka iheze, gutyo baca baratakaza aho bahora bakura uburaro n'uburamuko. A﻿ma-Afghani 240.000 (miriyoni hafi 5,5 mu marundi) yaronse kuri iryo fyigo ntakwiye. "﻿Ubu nta kundi turi bugire atari ukugurisha umwana wacu w'umukobwa w'imyaka ibiri. Abatuguranye amafaranga batwamizako induru, batubwiye ngo duhe umukobwa wanyu niba mudashoboye kutwishura," niko avuga. "﻿Ndamaramazwa cane n'aho tugeze. Rimwe na rimwe numva ari vyiza gupfa kuruta kubaho gutya," ivyo navyo bivugwa n'umugabo wiwe. Kenshi cane, twarumvise inkuru z'abagurisha abakobwa babo. Nizamuddin ati: "Naragurishije umukobwa wanje w'imyaka itanu ku ma Afghani 100.000." A﻿yo ntashika ayo ifyigo rigurwa, nk'uko twabibonye. U﻿bu agateka k'abantu b'aha mu kubaho karatabagajwe n'inzara. A﻿bdul Ghafar, umwe mu ndongozi z'aho ati: "Turumva ko biteye kubiri n'amategeko ya Islam kandi ko dushira ubuzima bw'abana bacu mu kaga, ariko nta yindi nzira ihari."  M﻿u rugo rumwe twahasanze Nazia, akana k'agakobwa k'imyaka ine kariko karakina kagira utugugu na Shamshullah, musazawe w'amezi 18. S﻿e wiwe, Hazratullah, ati: "Nta mafaranga dufise yo kugura ivyo kurya, none aho nari ku musigiti natangaje ko nshaka kugurisha umukobwa wanje." N﻿azia yaragurishijwe ngo arongorwe n'umuhungu wo mu muryango wo mu ntara yo mu bumanuko ya Kandahar. Ku mwaka 14 azoca arungikwa. Gushika ubu Hazratullah amaze kwakira kabiri amafaranga yo kumugura. Hazratullah avuga ko menshi muri ayo mafaranga yakoreshejwe mu kugura ivyo kurya, ayandi imiti y'umuhungu wiwe muto. A﻿ti: "Murabe, arwaye indwara zo kurya nabi" aho akaba yaciye aduza ishati yiwe ngo atwereke ingene akada kiwe gafoye. Urugero runini rw'abana batarya ibidakwiye ni ikimenyetso c'ingaruka inzara iriko iragira ku bana bafise munsi y'imyaka itanu muri Afganistan. Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) ivuga ko igitigiri c'abana bazanwa ku mavuriro yayo yitaho abana barwaye kubera kurya nabi mu gihugu ciyongeye gushika ku 47% uyu mwaka ugereranije no mu mwaka uheze. I﻿kigo ca MSF gitanga ingaburo muri Herat nico conyene gifise ivya nkenerwa bikwiye, ariko ntigifasha abo muri ico gisagara gusa, cakira kandi abo mu ntara bihana urubibe za Ghor na Badghis aho abafise izo ngorane biyongeye gushika ku 55% mu mwaka uheze. K﻿uva mu mwaka uheze, barongereje ibitanda kugira bashobore kwakira abana bakeneye kuvurwa. Ariko n'ubu ico kigo cama kirengewe. Uko iminsi ihera, niko abana bazanwa usanga bakeneye kuvurwa indwara zirenga imwe. O﻿mid, ku mezi 4, apima ibiro 4 gusa. Abaganga batubwiye ko umwana asanzwe kuri ayo mezi aba apima nibura ibiro 6,6. Nyina, Amana vyabaye ngombwa ko agurana amafaranga kugira afate urugendo rwo gushika ku bitaro aho aboneye ko atanguye kudahwa cane.  T﻿wabajije Hameedullah Motawakil, umuvugizi wa reta y'intara ya Herat ico bakora kugira bahangane n'ikibazo c'inzara. A﻿ti: "Ibi bintu vyatumwe n'ibihano mpuzamakungu vyafatiwe Afghanistan hamwe no gufatira amatungo ya Afghanistan. Reta yacu iriko iragerageza guharura abakeneye gufashwa ingene bangana. Benshi barabesha ingene bamerewe kuko bibaza ko baca bafashwa." Ni insiguro yagumye ahagazeko n'ubwo twamubwiye ko twari twabonye ibimenyetso vyeruye vy'ingene ibintu bimeze nabi cane. Y﻿avuze kandi ko aba-Taliban bariko baragerageza kugwiza ubuzi. "﻿Turiko turagerageza kwugurura ibirombe vy'ubutare bwa fer hamwe n'umugambi wo kwubaka umuringoti utwara gaz." N﻿tibisa n'uko ari ibintu bizoba ubu vuba. A﻿bantu batubwiye ko bumva barahebwe na reta y'aba-Taliban hamwe n'amakungu. I﻿nzara ni rwica-ruhoze, ingaruka zayo ntizama zica zigaragara buno nyene. K﻿ure y'amaso y'amakungu, urugero rw'akaga kariko karaba muri Afghanistan rushobora kutamenyekana, kuko ata n'umwe ariko araharura.

headline: Ibibazo vyanyu kuri Covid-19 birishurwa na Muganga
text: Turasubira kubatumikira nk'uko twabibemereye ku minsi ya mbere no kuwa gatatu, mu kubaronderera inyishu ku bibazo vyanyu vyerekeye  ingwara ya Covid-19. Uno munsi abitwa Klemento Ndayisenga, Jean Pierre Ndayishimiye na Juvel Mbazumutima bahuriye ku kibazo co kumenya nimba umuntu ashobora gusubira gufatwa n'umugera wa corona yarigeze kuwandura. Umva inyishu aho hejuru na Muganga Leonard Nduwayo, yavuganye na Florentine Kwizera.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru kuri uyu wa gatatu: Ramsey, Pogba, Gerrard, Coutinho, Rodgers, Kounde, Bowen
text: Everton na Newcastle United iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Juventus, umunya Pays de Galles/Wales Aaron Ramsey, 30. (Goal) Manchester United iriteguye kugurisha umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umufaransa Paul Pogba, 28, mu kadirisha ko kugura no kugurisha abakinyi ko mu kwa mbere, imbere y'uko amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi arangira mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'uno mwaka w'inkino. (Star) Aston Villa izotegerezwa guha umurwi Rangers imiriyoni 2.7 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika mu gihe uyo murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza Premier League wofata ingingo yo kugena Steven Gerrard nk'umumenyereza. (Express) Umumenyereza mushasha wa Newcastle United Eddie Howe ariko ararondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Atletico Madrid, umwongereza Kieran Trippier, 31, ikaba umukeneye mu kwa mbere. (Express) Abakinyi bakomakomeye ba Barcelona babandanya kutishimira umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umunya Bresil Philippe Coutinho, 29, bakamwagiriza ko atagishaka gukina, ni mu gihe hari ibihuha ko ashobora kwigira muri Newcastle United. (Star) Umumenyereza wa Leicester City Brendan Rodgers niwe ahabwa amahirwe menshi yo gushobora gusubirira Ole Gunnar Solskjaer nk'umumenyereza wa Manchester United. (Eurosport) Manchester United irafise icizere ko izoshobora gukubita hasi Chelsea mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma, umufaransa Jules Kounde, 22, asanzwe akinira Sevilla. (AS via Express) Liverpool iripfuza umukinyi wo ku ruhande rw'i buryo wa  West Ham umwongereza Jarrod Bowen, 24, ariko nta mugambi ifise wo kumugura mu kwa mbere. (Mirror) Newcastle United ishobora kuronka umusatirizi w'umufaransa Ousmane Dembele, 24, ata rufaranga na rumwe itanze mu gihe yokwanka gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha na Barcelona. (Express) Ariko Barcelona iriteguye kugiriranira ayandi masezerano na Dembele ariko bikavana n'umwanya ashobora kumara mu kibuga. (Sport) Umumenyereza wa Genoa Andriy Shevchenko aripfuza kugura umusatirizi wa Chelsea umunyamerika Christian Pulisic, 23. (Secolo XIX - in Italian) Victor Font yahoze arongoye Barcelona avuga ko uyu murwi ukwiye kuzogarukana wa musatirizi wa Argentina Lionel Messi, 34, mu igihe amasezerano afitaniye na Paris St-Germain azoba arangiye. (Marca) West Ham ishobora kwankira imirwi iyo ari yo yose yoza irondera umukinyi wo hagati, umwongereza Declan Rice ashobora no kugurwa imiriyoni zirenga 130 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, kuko ishaka kwiyubaka ishingiye kuri uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 22.  (Sun) Utwigoro twa Arsenal two kurondera umusatirizi wa Fiorentina Dusan Vlahovic, 21, twigonze ku rukuta inyuma y'aho abaserukizi b'uyu munya Serbia bankiye ibiganiro.  (Mail) Newcastle yatanguye ibiganiro n'abaserukizi b'umudagi  Niklas Sule 26 akina inyuma mu murwi Bayern Munich. (Newcastle World) Umurwi wo mu Budagi Borussia Monchengladbach uriko urihweza ingene mu kwa mbere yoronka umusatirizi wa Arsenal Eddie Nketiah, 22. (Sun) Giovanni Simeone, umuhungu w'umumenyereza wa Atletico Madrid Diego Simeone, ni we aza ubwa mbere ku rutonde rw'abasatirizi baronderwa na West Ham. Uyu munya Argentina w'imyaka 26 akina mu murwi nserukiragihugu ubu asanzwe akina muri Verona, umurwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano, aho yatijijwe avuye muri Cagliari. (Express)

headline: Roman Abramovich: Ivyemezo bishasha vyerekana amasezerano y'ubuguzi yaranzwe na ruswa
text: Amatohoza ya BBC yashize ahabona ivyemezo vy'amasezerano yaranzwe na ruswa yatumye Roman Abramovich yegeranya ubutunzi. Uyu nyene umurwi wa Chelsea yaregeranije amamiriyaridi n'amamiriyaridi inyuma yo kugura ikompanyi y'igitoro ayiguriye reta y'Uburusiya mu camunara c'amahinyu mu 1995. Abramovich yaguze Sibnef ku miriyoni zababa 250 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika imbere y'uko asubira akayigurisha kuri reta y'Uburusiya nyene ku miriyaridi 13 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika mu 2005. Abashingwamanza biwe bavuga ko ata kintu na kimwe c'ishingiro cerekana ko yegeranije ubutunzi bwinshi cane mu manyanga. Mu ndwi iheze, uyu mutunzi ruhebwa w'Umurusiya yarafatiwe ibihano na reta y'Ubwongereza kubera ubucuti afitaniye na Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya. Amatungo ya Abramovich yarafashwe aca aramburwa amabanga yo kurongora Chelsea. Uyu mutunzi ruhebwa w'Umurusiya yari amaze kwemanga muri sentare imwe yo mu Bwongereza ko yatanze ruswa kugira ngo amasezerano yo kugura Sibneft  ashoboke. Yarigeze kuburanywa i Londres n'uwahoze akorana urudandazwa nawe Boris Berezovsky mu 2012. Abramovich yaratsinze urubanza, ariko yarabwiye sentare ingene camunara ya Sibneft  yabayemwo amanyanga akavyungukiramwo, n'ingene yahaye Berezovsky imiriyoni cumi y'amadorari kugira ayahe umutegetsi wo muri Kremlin. BBC Panorama yahawe ikopi y'urwandiko ruvugwa ko rwavuye mu Burusiya mu kinyegero. Umuntu atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana ni we yahaye iyi nkuru iki kiganiro, aho avuga ko uru rwandiko rwagiriwe ikopi mw'ibanga ruvanywe mu zindi nkaratasi zerekeye Abramovich ziri mu minwe y'inyamiramabi mu Burusiya. BBC ntishobora guhinyuza aya makuru, ariko hari abandi mu Burusiya bemeza vyinshi mu biri muri uru rwandiko rw'impapuro zitanu. Uru rwandiko ruvuga ko reta y'Uburusiya yibwe imiriyaridi 2,7 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika mu masezerano ya  Sibneft  - ivyemezwa n'amatohoza y'inama nshingamateka y'Uburusiya mu 1997. Uru rwandiko kandi ruvuga ko abategetsi b'Uburusiya bashatse kwitwarira Abramovich bamwagiriza magendo. Ruvuga ruti: "Igisata c'abajejwe amatohoza mu vy'ubutunzi [Dept. of Economic Crimes] bashitse ku cemezo ko iyo Abramovich arengutswa  mu butungane yari gushobora kwagirizwa magendo...yakozwe n'umurwi w'inkozi z'ikibi". Panorama yararondeye hasi hejuru uwahoze ari umushikirizamanza mukuru w'Uburusiya yakoze amatohoza kuri aya masezerano mu myaka ya 1990. Yuri Skuratov ntiyari azi uru rwandiko rwo mw'ibanga, ariko yaremeje vyinshi mu bivugwa mw'igurishwa rya Sibneft. Skuratov yabwiye iki kiganiro ati: "Mu ntango, wari umugambi w'amanyanga, aho abagize uruhara mw'ishirwa ry'iyi kompanyi mu minwe y'abigenga bari bagize akarwi k'inkozi z'ikibi katumye Abramovich na Berezovsky bazunguruka reta, bituma batariha aya mafaranga yari akwiranye n'iyi kompanyi". Uru rwandiko ruvuga kandi ko Abramovich yari akingiwe ikibaba n'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya Boris Yeltsin. Ruvuga ko inyandiko ziri mu minwe y'inyamiramabi kuri Abramovich zungururijwe muri Kremlin kandi ko amatohoza yariko arakorwa na  Skuratov yahagaritswe n'umukuru w'igihugu. Uru rwandiko ruvuga ruti: "Skuratov yariko arategura urubanza rujanye no kwigarurira Sibneft rushingiye ku matohoza ajanye n'ishirwa ryayo mu minwe y'abigenga. Aya matohoza yarahagaritswe na Perezida Yeltsin … Skuratov yaciye abogozwa mu mabanga yiwe". Skuratov yirukanywe inyuma y'aho hasohokeye ikaseti ivuga ivy'imibonano mpuzabitsina mu 1999. Avuga ko yari amayeri yo kumuteza urubwa no gutesha agaciro amatohoza yiwe. Avuga ati: "Ibi bintu vyose vyarimwo poritike yeruye kubera mu matohoza yanje nari hafi yo gushika ku muryango wa Boris Yeltsin, cane cane biciye muri iri tohoza ku bijanye n'ishirwa  rya Sibneft mu minwe y'abigenga". Abramovich yagumye mu karwi gatoya kegereye Kremlin igihe Vladimir Putin ashikiye ku butegetsi mu 2000. Uru rwandiko rurimwo ayandi makuru avuga iyindi camunara y'amanyanga imyaka ibiri inyuma y'aho, arimwo ikompanyi y'igitoro y'Uburusiya yitwa Slavneft. Abramovich yunze ubucuti n'iyindi kompanyi mu ntumbero y'ukugura Slavneft, ariko iyindi kompanyi yo mu Bushinwa yahiganwa nawe yariko itegura gutanga amafaranga arenga incuro zibiri ayo we yategura gutanga. Hari abantu benshi bakomeye - kuva muri Kremlin gushika mu nama nshingamateka y'Uburusiya - bari kuhahombera iyo iyi kompanyi y'Ubushinwa itsindira iyi camunara. Uru rwandiko ruvuga ko umwe mu bari mu ntumwa z'Ubushinwa yanyurujwe bageze i Moscou barondera iyi camunara. "CNPC, ikompanyi y'Ubushinwa ikomeye cane yarondera cane iii camunara vyabaye ngombwa ko ivanamwo akarenge inyuma y'aho umwe mu ntumwa zayo anyururijwe ashitse ku kibuga c'indege ca Moscou mu nyuma akaza kurekurwa iyi kompanyi itangaje ko ikuyemwo akarenge". Inkuru ivuga ivy'inyuruzwa ry'uyu mushinwa iremezwa n'abantu ku giti cabo batanazi ivy'uru rwandiko. Vladimir Milov yari icegera c'umushikiranganji w'amasoko ntanganguvu igihe Slavneft yari hafi kugurishwa. Ntaco avuga kuri iri nyuruzwa, ariko avuga ko abanyeporitike bo hejuru bari bamaze gufata ingingo ko Abramovich ari we yategerezwa gutsindira iri camunara. "Navuga nti, raba, aba Bashinwa bagomba kuza kandi bashaka gutanga amafaranga menshi cane. Bati ntaco bitwaye, ceceka, ivyo ntibikuraba. Ingingo yamaze gufatwa. Slavneft  ija mu minwe ya Abramovich, twamaze kwemeranya igiciro. Abashinwa bazokwirukanwa ukuntu. Nta cemeza nimba Abramovich yari azi ibijanye n'integuro y'iri nyuruzwa canke nimba yararigizemwo uruhara. Abashingwamanza biwe babwiye BBC ko ivy'iri nyuruzwa "bidafise ishingiro na ritoya" kandi "ntiyari azi na kimwe kuri ibi". Hari imirwi myinshi yarwanira iyi kompanyi Slavneft kandi hari benshi barwanya ko hagira Abashinwa baba mu bayihiganira. Uko vyoba vyaragenze kwose kugira ngo Ubushinwa bwiyonjorore, Abramovich ni we wenyene yari asigaye mw'ihiganwa. Kandi yaguze Slavneft  ku mafaranga make cane. Abashingwamanza ba Abramovich bavuga ko igiturire yagirizwa mu masezerano yo kuri Slavneft na Sibneft ari ibinyoma, kandi nawe agahakana ko atakingiwe ikibaba na Yeltsin.

headline: Ukraine: amabi y’Uburusiya yatumye ibihugu vya OTAN vyegerana gusumba
text: By Katya Adler Umwanditsi ku mugabane wa Bulaya Ishirahamwe OTAN/NATO ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe ryumva ko ryishimiye ukubaho kwaryo muri kino gihe. Ni vyo, iyo uvuganye n’abategetsi i Buruseri (Bruxelles/Brussels) mu Bubirigi, ahari icicaro ca OTAN, nta n’umwe avuga ko anezerejwe n’ingene ibintu bimeze i Bulaya inyuma y’aho Uburusiya butanguriye igitero cabwo kuri Ukraine.
