Ariko bose bihutira kukubwira ingene batangara kandi bafise n’ishaka, kandi ko iri shirahamwe rishize hamwe “cane". Bakubwira kandi ukungene amakungu, mu bwitonzi bwinshi, afatanye mu nda mu gufatira ibihano Uburusiya. Ibi siko vyamye na gato. Umutegetsi wa Amerika i Buruseri yambwiye ati: "Iyo umbaza mu kwa kabiri, canke mu mezi atandatu aheze, sinari gushobora kubona ubumwe dufitaniye muri kino gihe”. None ni igiki gitumye ibihugu vy’Uburengero bishira hamwe gutya? Iyumvire amakuru atagira igitigiri twasoma yerekana ko ibihugu vy’Uburengero bishobora gucanamwo kubera iyi ntambara. "Ukuruhishwa na Ukraine" kwaravuzwe mu ci riheze, inyuma y’amezi atanu intambara itanguye. Inyuma y’ivyo, ubuzima buzimvye n’iduga ry’ibiciro vy’umuyagankuba kubera igitero c’Uburusiya vyaboneka ko bishobora gutuma abategetsi b’Uburengero bagabanya imfashanyo baha Kyiv (umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine). Mu gihe Uburusiya ari bwo bufise ububiko bunini kw’isi yose bw’ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri, hari abibaza ko ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyari gushima kwitandukanya na Ukraine bitinya ko Moscou (umugwa mukuru w’Uburusiya) ishobora kubikorerako. Ariko uko siko vyagenze. Umwe mu bategetsi bakuru ba OTAN  atashimye ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana yambwiye ati: "Icemezo gikomeye tubona ubu co kwifatanya na Ukraine catumwe n’amabi akorwa n’Uburusiya – mu gutera abasivire n’ibigo vya gisivire. "Ivyaha vyo mu ntambara bikorwa buri musi vyabaye akamenyero, ayo masanamu twama tubona ku mboneshakure umusi ku musi. Ibi biragoye kwiregangiza”. Uburusiya bwama buhakana ko ata vyaha vyo mu ntambara bukora. Abategetsi b’Uburengero bavuga ko ibiharuro vya Kremlin (ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu w’Uburusiya)  vyagenze nabi. "[Moscou] iragerageza gutyoza canke kwifatira mu gahanga ibihugu bishigikiye Ukraine ikoresheje amajambo ngo ‘turashobora kukubabaza’”, nk’uko umutegetsi umwe w’igihugu kinini ca OTAN  yambwiye. "Ariko ivyo vyose nta na kimwe vyashitseko. Kurya nyene Uburusiya bwananiwe no kuzimya ubutwari bw’abanya-Ukraine mu gukorera amabi atavugwa igihugu cabo imisi yose”. Ivyo Vladimir Putin yama avuga ko icateye iyi ntambara ari uko OTAN iriko itera yiyagurira akarere amaja mu buseruko vyamuhindukiriye. Suède be na Finland, igihugu kibanyi c’Uburusiya,  vyahisemwo kwinjira muri uru runani rwo kwivunira umwansi hamwe, inyuma y’imyaka mirongo vyari bimaze bitegamiye ku ruhande na rumwe, iyi ikaba ari ingaruka y’ibikorwa vya Kremlin. Abenshi kandi babona ko intambwe itari yitezwe y’igisirikare ca Ukraine yashobotse kubera imfashanyo ikomeye y’Uburengero. Ibihugu vya OTAN  biriko biraraba imwe mu nzira zibiri zo gufasha Ukraine: mu bikorwa no muri poritike. Inzira y’ibikorwa yerekeye cane cane gukora ku buryo inganda zobandanya zihingura zongera ziha ibirwanisho Ukraine. Abategetsi ba OTAN bavuga ko imfashanyo ihabwa Ukraine yigwa neza kandi ikaba ari iyo igihe kirekire muri kino gihe gusumba mu ndwi zibiri za mbere z’igitero c’Uburusiya zarangwa n’ubwoba. Ariko uru runani rurashiraho umurongo hagati y’imfashanyo ya gisirikare ruha abanywayi barwo n’iyo ruha Ukraine, aho ingingo yo gufasha iki gihugu ifatwa n’amareta y’ibihugu biri muri OTAN kandi akaba ari yo nyene yitanga iyi mfashanyo, hako iba OTAN yo nyene iyitanga. Kremlin ntiyemera iri tandukanirizo, ariko ni ngirakamaro kuri OTAN mu gihe ibandanya ikora uko ishoboye kugira ngo ntihave yinjira mu ntambara amaso mu yandi na Moscou, ivyohava bituma ibintu biyangara gushika aho haba intambara ya nikleyeri n’Uburusiya. Rero, OTAN  yarakomeje ibisata vyo kwivuna abansi mu bihugu vy’ubuseruko vyegeranye n’Uburusiya, gusa uru runani ruvuga ko ata gikorwa gisanzwe giteguye co gukorera muri Ukraine. Nta ngabo za Ukraine ruriko rurigisha canke ngo habe imfashanyo ya gisirikare rwo nk’urunani ruriko ruratanga. Inzira ya poritike mu gushigikira Ukraine ni ikintu gitegerezwa gukorwa biciye mu nama nshingamateka n’abanyagihugu bo mu bihugu vya OTAN. Abihweza ibintu n’ibindi bavuga ko igiciro c’imfashanyo ihabwa Ukraine ari nto cane rwose ugereranije n’uburyo bwakoreshejwe na Amerika canke ibihugu vya Bulaya nk’Ubufaransa canke Ubwongereza muri Iraki na Afghanistan, ariko ni ukubirabira mu biharuro ngereranyo biherutse mu Budagi, mu Bufaransa no mu Butaliyano. Ibi biharuro vyerekana ko abanyagihugu bashigikiye ibihano vyafatiwe Uburusiya bigenda bigabanuka (28% gusa mu Bufaransa no mu Budagi hamwe na 26% gusa mu Butaliyano, nk’uko biri mu cigwa cakozwe n’ikigo  c’igendereza Morning Consult ) kubera bigira ingaruka mbi ku giciro c’ubuzima. Hagati aho, abategetsi basa n’abatarota bacika intege mu gufasha Ukraine. Ahubwo ubiravye ubu bashikamye gusumba mu misi ya mbere y’intambara. Bitandukanye na ca giye c’intambara yo mu Kigobe. Ico gihe, Ubudagi n’Ubufaransa ntivyahigitanije mu kwiyonjorora, bitumwe n’uko abanyagihugu bavyo batari bashigikiye intambara. None ubu ni ibiki biriko biraba? Birasanzwe: ku mugabane wa Bulaya, igitero c’Uburusiya kuri Ukraine gifatwa nka ca gitero c’iterabwoba co ku wa 11 Nyakanga (9) 2001 kuri Amerika, nk’uko bivugwa na Camille Grand ari mu gisata kijejwe imigenderaire mu Nama nkuru y’Ubumwe bwa Bulaya. Yambwiye ati: "[Igitero c’Uburusiya] cabaye akamo gakomeye ku vyerekeye umutekano no kwivuna abansi. Igihe gikomeye, cahinduye ibintu, aho intambara yashitse ku mipaka yacu”. Uko vyogenda kwose muri Ukraine, abona ko ibintu bizoguma bigoye ku mugabane wa Bulaya mu kiringo c’imyaka itari mike iri imbere. Umutegetsi wa Amerika i Buruseri wewe aragera kure: "Ivyo Uburusiya bwakoze vyatumye haba impinduka kw’isi yose mu migambi ijanye n’umutekano”. Si OTAN  yonyene yabibonye uku, nk’uko abivuga. N’ibindi bihugu nk’Ubuyapani, Nouvelle-Zélande, Korea y’Epfo na Australia  na vyo nyene bibona ibikorwa vya Vladimir Putin nk’akaga ku ntwaro rusangi kw’isi. Bibona ko mu gihe bomureka “agashika ku vyo yipfuza” muri Ukraine, nta n’umwe yoba agitekaniwe. Gusa si bose babibona uku kw’isi yose. Uburengero n’incuti zabwo bagirizwa uburyarya na ka mwana wa mama uravye ingene baciye bihutira gufasha Ukraine canke kwiyamiriza Uburusiya ku vyaha vyo mu ntambara bukora, mu gihe ingabo z’Uburengero zagirizwa guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu n’ivyaha vyo mu ntambara muri Iraki , nk’akarorero. Hanyuma kandi ingene bakiriye impunzi zo muri Syria zinjiye i Bulaya mu 2015 biratandukanye cane n’ingene bakiriye iza Ukraine muri uno mwaka. Ariko, dusubiye inyuma mu kwa kabiri kuri OTAN, ubwoba bwatewe n’igitero c’Uburusiya kuri Ukraine – hamwe nimpungenge ku ngaruka zikomeye zoba mu gihe bokwihoza ivyo Kremlin iriko irakora – vyatumye Amerika iva ku ntego yari ifise yo kwibanda ku Bushinwa n’akarere ka Indo-Pacifique. Yaciye isubiza amaso ku gisata co kwivuna abansi ca Bulaya – n’aho vyaboneka ko bishobora kugira ingaruka mbi kuri Joe Biden mu matora aheruka ( n’aho ivyayavuyemwo bisa n’uko bitamuhungabanije). Nta gukekeranya ko ingingo ya Amerika, hongeyeko ibikorwa vy’Uburusiya muri Ukraine, yahinduye imbono y’ibintu mu butegetsi bw’Ubufaransa, Ubudagi n’Ubutaliyano  - ibihugu vyaboneka ubwa mbere y’uko bitashaka kwiteranya n’Uburusiya. Berlin (umugwa mukuru w’Ubudagi) na Roma (umugwa mukuru w’Ubutaliyano) vyari bifise imigenderanire ikomeye cane na Moscou mu vyo ubudandaji n’amasoko ntanganguvu. Nayo kuri Perezida Emmanuel Macron, abamunegura babona ko yariko arahendwa n’icaboneka ko ari ubugenzi bwihariye yaboneka ko afitaniye na Vladimir Putin. Umuvuduko wariyongereye ubu, gushika n’aho Ubudagi bwahora buboneka ko butinya buza mu kibanza ca kane mu bihugu biha imfashanyo Ukraine, n’aho iya Amerika isumba kure n’iyo imfashanyo itangwa n’Ubulaya. Ubumwe bwa Bulaya ku rwego rw’igihugu no ku rwego rw’urunani bwakoze uko bushobye kwose kugira ngo bureke kwama buzera uburaro n’uburamuko ku Burusiya mu vyerekeye amasoko ntanganguvu, kandi na Macron muri ino misi ntarya umunwa iyo hageze ikibazo ca Moscou. "Ivyaha vyo mu ntambara bidashobora kugenda gutyo nyene bidahanywe” niko aheruka kuvuga muri ino ndwi ku bitero bibandanya ku basivire no ku bigo vya gisivire. Ibi bitero vyatumye 75% vy’umugwa mukuru Kyiv bibura amazi n’umuyagankuba. Gute naho ku biyago vya terefone hagati y’umukuru wa reta y’Ubudagi Olaf Scholz na Perezida Macron ku ruhande rumwe, hamwe na Vladimir Putin, kandi bibandanya binegurwa? "Imirongo ya terefone [ya Amerika] kandi iguma yuguruye hagati ya Washington na Moscou. Si ukugira bavugane kuri kazoza ka Ukraine – iki ni ikibazo c’abanya-Ukraine bo nyene – ahubwo ni ukugira ngo bavugane ibindi bibazo, nk’ikibazo c’ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda vya nikleyeri”. Jewe ndibaza ico bizozana kuri kazoza. Rimwe na rimwe bisa nk’aho Paris (umugwa mukuru w’Ubufaransa) na Berlin vyibaza ko mu gihe intambara ya Ukraine izoba irangiye bizoshoboka ko ibintu “bibandanya nk’uko vyamye” hagati yavyo n’Uburusiya. Umutegetsi umwe wa Amerika avuga ko ahafitiye amakenga. Ariko ntiwoba wihenze ubajije nimba bishoboka ko hovugwa kazoza ka Bulaya n’ikibazo c’umutekano ubanje kwigizayo burundu Uburusiya. Mu gihe Ubulaya butekewe n’ubwoba bwinshi cane ko butera buja mu gihe c’ubukonje bukanye kurenza ko vyari bimeze imbere y’intambara, nta kimenyetso na kimwe cerekana ko hoba hari ibihugu bikomeye vya OTAN vyoba vyiyumvira inzira y’ibiganiro yorangiza intambara hagati y’Uburusiya na Ukraine. Ico bahurizako bose ni uko Uburengero bwemera ko bahatiye Ukraine mu biganiro n’Uburusiya bitayereye mu 2014, mu nyuma Moscou ikagaruka mu 2022 irondera ibindi vyinshi. Abaserukira ibihugu vya OTAN bifasha Ukraine mu vya gisirikare bavuga ko ubu babona uruhara rwabo mu gufasha Kyiv kugira ngo ikore neza gisirikare, mu ntumbero yo kuyifasha guhagarara neza mu gihe vyoshika hakaba ibiganiro n’Uburusiya. Ariko iki ni ikintu Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky avuga ko kitari mu mutwe ubu bwa vuba. Ariko kandi, n’aho woba uriko uravuga ubumwe burangwa muri OTAN, kwoba ari ukwirengagiza ibintu ubibona mu gihe wovuga ko ata bintu bidahuriweko n’incuti za Ukraine. Ubwongereza bukunzwe kwagirizwa ko bufise umutima “w’ubukoko” kuri Moscou, co kimwe n’ibindi bihugu vya OTAN vyegereye Uburusiya canke bifise kahise kababaje kuri bwo – nk’ibihugu vy’akarere ka Balte hamwe na Pologne. Ubudagi muri ino misi buvugwa ko ari “umufatanyabikorwa ntirumveko”, atanga agaca yinumira . Amerika ifatwa nk’uko iriko igerageza gukinira hose, hagati mu runani no hanze, kugira ngo yirinde imishamirano ya gisirikare amaso mu yandi na Moscou. Gusa ubu budasa hagati y’ibi bihugu gufatwa ko ari “utuntu duto cane” muri kino gihe. Umuhinga mu vyo kwivuna abansi Camille Grand avuga ko ata muti woroshe w’iyi ntambara. Ariko gusa ico bose bipfuza ni kimwe, ko Uburusiya butsindwa. None ubwo Moscou yovyifatamwo gute? Ikibazo nyamukuru ku bihugu vyose bifise uruhara muri ino ntambara ni ingene yorangira mu buryo bwiza. Uko vyogenda kwose.

headline: Africa y'Epfo na Covid-19:Inkingo za mbere zirashika ku wa mbere
text: Afrika y'Epfo ku wa mbere izoronka umuriyoni w'incanco zikinga kwandura umugera wa  Covid-19 zivuye mu Buhindi, nk'uko bivugwa n'umushikiranganji w'ico gihugu ajejwe amagara y'abantu Zweli Mkhize. Ivyo yabivuze mu bikorwa vy'inama ijanye n'umwiteguro wo gutanguza isekeza ryo gutanga inanco muri ico gihugu. Ati: ''Ndahimbawe no kumenyesha ko indege izanye umuriyoni wa mbere w'incanco izohagaruka mu Buhindi ku wa mungu itariki 31 ukwezi kwa mbere 2021 , igaca Dubai hanyuma igashika ku kibuga mpuzamakungu ca OR Thambo ku wa mbere itariki imwe y'ukwezi kwa kabiri.'' Yavuze ko izo ncanco za AstraZeneca zishitse zizobanza gusuzumwa ko ata tunenge zifise. Ati: ''Ico gikorwa co kuzisuzuma kizofata iminsi iri hagati ya 10 na 14 kugira kirangire,aho niho tuzoca dutanga izo ncanco mu ntara zose''. Izindi ncanco 500.000 zitezwe mu kwezi kwa kabiri, zindi miriyoni 20 nazo mu kwezi kwa gatandatu. Afrika y'Epfo ni co gihugu ca mbere cugarijwe cane n'indwara ya Covid-19 muri Afrika. Ubu ihanganye n'ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera utera iyo ndwara kandi bwandukira cane ari nabwo bwatumye ibitigiri vy'abandura uwo mugera biduga cane.

headline: Korea ya Ruguru yagerageje misire incuro zitandatu mu ndwi zibiri
text: N﻿a Jean Mackenzie & Frances Mao Abanyamakuru ba BBC Seoul Korea ya Ruguru yarashe ibindi bisasu vya misire bibiri kuri uno wa kane  - ikaba ibaye incuro/inshuro ya gatandatu igerageza ibi bisasu bibujijwe mu kiringo kiri musi y’indwi zibiri. Ejo ku wa gatatu, Pyongyang (umugwa mukuru wa Korea ya Ruguru) yavuze ko kurekura ibi bisasu ari “ingingo zo kwihora” imyimenyerezo rusangi ya Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika na Korea y’Epfo. Ku wa kabiri, Pyongyang yarashe igisasu ca misire hejuru y’Ubuyapani, ivyatumye Amerika isaba inama yihuta y’Inama Nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano. Muri iyi nama, Amerika yagirije Uburusiya n’Ubushinwa ko bukingira Korea ya Ruguru kugira ntifatirwe ibihano ruhasha. Uwuserukira Amerika muri ONU avuga ko mu kwanka ibindi bihano, Uburusiya n’Ubushinwa “biyaye impigi” Pyongyang. Abaserukira ibi bihugu bibiri ntayegayezwa mu Nama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano bavuga ko gukomeza ibiganiro ari yo nzira nziza gusumba ibihano. Mu mezi abiri aheze, Amerika, Korea y’Epfo n’Ubuyapani vyakoreye hamwe imyimenyerezo rusangi mu ntumbero yo kwimenyereza gutsinda no gutesha igitero cova muri Korea ya Ruguru. Iyi myimenyerezo yashavuje indongozi ya Korea ya Ruguru Kim Jong-un, ayibonamwo nk’icemezo ko abansi biwe bariko bitegurira intambara. Mw’itangazo, Korea ya Ruguru yagiriza Amerika gutuma “icuka kibi kirangwa kuri ico kigwa ca Korea mu rwego rwa gisirikare cunyuka”. Ejo ku wa gatatu, Amerika, Korea y’Epfo n’Ubuyapani vyarabandanije imyimenyerezo, bivuga ko yari iyo kwihora Korea ya Ruguru ku gisasu yari yateye ku wa kabiri. Amerika kandi yasubiye kurungika ubwato butwara indege z’intambara USS Ronald Reagan hafi y’ikigwa ca Korea. Korea y’Epfo n’Ubuyapani bivuga ko igisasu ca mbere ca misire zarashwe kuri uno wa kane cashitse ku birometero 350, congera kigera ku burebure bw’ibirometero 100 uja hejuru, mu gihe ica kabiri cari kuguruka gushika ku birometero 800 be no ku birmetero vyababa 50 uja hejuru. Uru rukurikirane rw’ibisasu biherutse kuraswa rwibutsa igihe c’imbere y’igerageza rya nyuma ry’ikirwanisho c’ubumara mu 2017. Ico gihe, nk’uko biriko biragenda ubu, Korea ya Ruguru yagerageje ibisasu vya misire, nta biganiro na Amerika vyari bwabe, hanyuma Pyongyang itera ibisasu bibiri vya misire hejuru y’Ubuyapani. Amasanamu y’ibigendajuru yerekana ko Korea ya Ruguru iriko irasanura imyobo yayo yo ku kigo c’igeragerezo ry’ibirwanisho vya nikleyeriyari yavuga ko yasambuye mu 2018 igihe haba ibiganiro vy’akanya gato na Amerika ku ntwaro ya Perezida Trump. Mu kwezi guheze, Korea ya Ruguru yasubiyemwo amategeko yayo ajanye na nikleyeri, aho indongozi yayo Kim Jong Un yatangaje ko igihugu ciwe kigiye ku rutonde rw’ibihugu bitunze ibirwanisho vy’ubumara “ubutagisubira inyuma”. Mu gihe ubu ibintu vyose bitunganye, Kim asa n’uwurindiriye akanya keza ka poritike kugira ngo agerageza ikindi gisasu ca nikleyeri ku ncuro igira indwi. Abihweza ibintu n’ibindi babona ko igikorwa co kugerageza iki gisasu gishobora kuba mu kadirisha k’indwi zitatu hagati y’ikoraniro kaminuza ry’umugambwe wa Gikomunista w’Ubushinwa mu mpera za kuno kwezi hamwe n’amatora y’abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka muri Amerika mu ntango za Munyonyo (11).

headline: Ethiopia -Tigray: ONU igabisha ko igihugu gihakwa kuja mu ntambara cose
text: Ishirahamwe mpuzakungu ONU rigasbisha ko Ethiopia ishobora kuja mu ntambara y'igihugu cose hamwe indwano yo mu ntara y'uburaruko ya Tigray itohogarara vuba. Umukuru w'igisata kijejwe ibibazo vya poritike n'ugukomeza amahoro muri ONU  Rosemary DiCarlo avuga ko ata mfashanyo irashika ku murwa mukuru wa Tigray, Mekelle, kuva hagati mu kwezi kw'icumi mu gihe hari abantu bashika miriyoni indwi bayikeneye vyihuta. ONU ivuga ko abantu bashika 400.000 babayeho nko mu bihe vy'amapfa. Kuri uyu wa kabiri, intumwa y'ishirahamwe rya Afrika AU mu bihugu vy'ihembe rya Afrika, Olusegun Obasanjo, yavuze ko yabonanye n'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa  Ethiopia, Abiy Ahmed, n'indongozi y'intara ya Tigray, Debretsion Gebremichael. Avuga ko bompi bemera ko iyo ntambara ari iya poritike ariko ko hatigeze havugwa ibiganiro vy'imbona nkubone hagati yabo. ONU ishaka ko ingabo za reta n'abayigwanya  bahagarika intambara bakava muri ako karere kugira  bishoboke ko hashikayo imfashanyo n'imiti bikenewe cane. Hagati aho Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (US) n'Ishirahamwe rya Afrika bavuga ko babona ko hari amahirwe make yo gutorera inyishu ikibazo ca Ethiopia . Intumwa idasanzwe ya US Jeffrey Feltman aherutse i Addis Abeba aho yabonanye n'abo muri AU hamwe n'abategetsi ba reta. Intumwa ya AU Olusegun Obasanjo yabwiye inama ya ONU ijejwe umutekano ko umwanya uriko urahera kandi ko hazoba akaga gakomeye cane ku bantu hamwe intambara itotorerwa inyishu vuba. Iyo ntambnara yo muri Ethiopia imaze umwaka yadutse hagati y'ingabo za reta mpuza-ntara n'abagwanyi b'umugambwe wahora utwara intara  ya Tigray, TPLF. Abo bagwanyi bavuga ko bagiye gusugereza  umugwa mukuru Addis Ababa mu gihe reta nayo yahamagariye abahora mu ngabo bakukurutse gusubira gufata umuheto bakitaba urugamba. Umuvugizi w'abagwanyi ba Tigray avuga ko bazokomeza gushika reta ivanyeho ingingo zo kwugarana iyo ntara. Getachew Reda yabwiye ikiganiro BBC Focus on Africa ko intambanyi yonyene iri mu nzira y'amahoro muri Ethiopia ari ministre wa mbere Abih Ahmed mu "kwibohera ku nyishu iciye mu nzira ya gisirikare  ku kibazo ahanini ca poritike". Getachew  avuga ati: "Ico dukeneye cane si Addis Ababa, ico dushaka n'uko tugondoza [Abiy] akavanaho ukwugarana intara yacu". "Abiy niwe ategerezwa kwemera ivyo dusaba… hanyuma akarangiza intambara." Uwo muvugizi avuga ko uwahoze ari umukuru wa Nigeria, Olusegun Obasanjo, ari muri Ethiopia kugerageza kuvugana n'impande zose ingene intabara yorangira, yagiranye ibiganiro vyiza n'umukuru wa TPLF, Debretsion Gebremichael.

headline: Taurai Zimunya: Ibibazo inyuma y'aho umuterangumu muri Zimbabwe apfuye kubera ingumu yakubiswe
text: Ibibazo ni vyinshi ku bijanye n'ingene umutekano utunganijwe mu rukino rwo guterana ingumu (boxe) muri Zimbabwe inyuma y'aho Taurai Zimunya apfiriye kubera ingumu yakubiswe mu rukino rwariko rubera i Harare. Uyu mukinyi wa boxe Taurai Zimunya, w'imyaka 24, wo mu murwi w'abafise ibiro vyo hagati na hagati yapfuye ku wa mbere, inyuma y'aho akubitiwe akagwa hasi mu rukino rwabaye ku wa gatandatu. Ni bwo bwa mbere umukinyi wa boxe apfuye muri Zimbabwe ahitanywe n'inkurikizi zo gukubitwa mu rukino. Lawrence Zimbudzana, umunyamabanga mukuru w'ikigo kijejwe uru rukino 'Zimbabwe National Boxing and Wrestling Control Board, (ZNBWCB), avuga ko amatohoza ataratangura. Mu gihe bariko barashingura Zimunya ejo ku wa gatatu, Zimbudzana yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati: "Ubu twitayeho cane ivyo kumushingura, ivyo biheze ni ho tuzokwicara hanyuma tukihweza iki kibazo". Itangazo ryasohowe n'ikigo ZNBWCB rivuga ko "abajejwe ubuvuzi bakoze ivyo bategerezwa gukora kandi ko yabanje no kuronswa ubufasha bwihuta akiri ku kibuga imbere yo kujanwa mu bitaro". Zimunya yakubiswe incuro zitari nke mu mutwe imbere y'uko atsindwa burundu mu gice ca gatatu c'uru rukino rwo gukubitana ingumu rugizwe n'ibice bitandatu. Wari umubabaro udasanzwe ku wahoze ari umumenyereza wiwe Tatenda Gada, avuga ko yari afise kazoza gakomeye. Gada ati: "Turabuze umwe mu bantu beza twari twizigiye. Narakoranye na Taurai mu kiringo c'imyaka irenga ine - narakurikiranye ingene yagenda atera imbere kandi yari umwe mu bantu bari bafise kazoza keza". Se wa Zimunya, Samson, yahoze akina uru rukino mu buryo bwo kwinezereza, akaba yari yizeye ko umuhungu wiwe yoshikanye kure izina ry'umuryango wiwe mbere akanatsindira ihiganwa. Hari haciye igihe gito cane uru rukino rwo guterana ingumu rusubiye gutangura muri Zimbabwe inyuma y'aho reta itezuriye ingingo za guma mu rugo.

headline: Benjamin Mendy: Uyu mukinyi wa Manchester City yagirijwe ibindi vyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu
text: Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester City, Benjamin Mendy, yasubiye kwagirizwa ibindi vyaha bibiri bijanye no gufata ku nguvu. Mendy ategerezwa kwitaba ubutungane muri sentare yo mu karere ka Stockport kuri uyu wa gatatu. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 27, aho ari mu gasho, ubu ahanganye n'ivyaha bitandatu vyo gufata ku nguvu, hamwe n'ikindi caha c'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina. Yitwariwe n'abamwagiriza barenza gato imyaka 16, bakaba bavuga ko yabakoreye ibi vyaha hagati y'ukwa cumi 2020 n'ukwa munani 2021. Uyu mukinyi mpuzamakungu w'Ubufaransa aheruka gukinira Manchester City mu mwaka w'inkino uheze kuva mu 2017, igihe yinjira muri uyu murwi avuye muri Monaco yo mu Bufaransa, aguzwe imiriyoni hafi 70 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Yabaye arahagarikwa n'uyu murwi igihe yagirijwe n'igipolisi, kugira ngo habanze kuba amatohoza. Asangiye ivyaha na mugenziwe yahoze ari umunonotsi Louis Saha Matturie, nawe nyene yagirizwa ivyaha bine nyene vyo gufata ku nguvu yakoze hagati y'ukwa gatatu 2021 n'ukwa munani 2021. Louis Saha Matturie [ntahave yitiranywa na Louis Laurent Saha  yahoze ari umukinyi wa Manchester United], umunya Sierra Leone ubu afise imyaka 40 akaba aba mu karere ka Edwin Ct, Eccles, muri Manchester mu Bwongereza, yagirijwe n'ibindi bibiri nk'ivyo hamwe n'ikindi caha c'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina, akaba nawe nyene yarengukishijwe n'iyo sentare yatumyeko Mendy. Aba bagabo bompi bitezwe gucirirwa urubanza ku wa 24 z'ukwa mbere 2022.

headline: Kenya: abatemera Imana basaba ko amasengesho mu mashure avanwaho
text: Ishirahamwe ry'abahakanyi muri Kenya ryandikiye umushikiranganji w'indero w'iki gihugu rimusaba kubuza ivyo gusenga mu mashure ya reta imbere y'uko ibibazo vya reta bitangura. Iri shirahamwe rivuga ko guhatira abanyeshure gusenga ari uguhonyanga agateka kabo. Amashure ya reta muri Kenya afise umugenzo wo gutegura amasengesho imbere y'uko abanyeshure batangura ibibazo vya reta. Muri ino ndwi, amashure yateye akamo abavyeyi ko bokwifatanya nayo muri ano masengesho  yamaze kuba nk'umugenzo kugira ngo abana babo bitegurire neza ibibazo. Muri uru rwandiko, havuga ngo: "Abanyagihugu ba Kenya benshi bari muri ano mashure ya reta aho ivy'amasengesho ari itegeko". Iri shirahamwe rivuga ko abana bakwiye guhabwa uburenganzira bo nyene bwo kwifatira ingingo ku bijanye n'idini.

headline: Omicron: US igiye kuvanaho kubuza ingendo ziva muri Africa y'ubumanuko
text: Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zigiye kuvanaho ingingo zo kubuza ingendo z'indege ziva mu bihugu munani vyo muri Afrika y'ubumanuko kubera ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera wa coronavirus. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu White House vyavuze ko izo ngingo  zari yafatiwe ibihugu vya Afrika y'Epfo , Botswana, Zimbabwe, Mozambique, Namibia, Lesotho, Eswatini na Malawi ku wa 29 Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11) zizovanwaho buca ari umunsi wa Bonane. Ivyo biro bivuga ko izo ngingo zitagikenewe mu gihe ibitigiri vy'abandura Omicron vyaduze cane muri Amerika. Ubu ubwo bwoko nibwo bwiganje mu bashasha batorwa ko banduye  uwo mugera. "Izo ngingo zaduhaye umwanya wo gutahura Omicron ubu tukaba tuzi ko incanco zihasanzwe zikora kuri Omicron, cane cane iyo umuntu yaronse urwo gushimangira" , vyanditswe kuri Twitter n'icegera c'umunyamabanga ajejwe ivyo kumenyesha amakuru muri White House Kevin Munoz. Izo ngingo zari zafashwe ubwa mbere n'Ishirahamwe rya Buraya n'Ubwongereza. Amerika n'ibindi bihugu bitari bike vyaciye bikurikira. Izo ngingo zaraneguwe cane, umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU Antonio Guterres akaba yazise ko ari "apartheid mu ngendo". Izo ngingo ntizabuza Abanyamerika gusubira mu gihugu iwabo bava muri ico gice ca Afrika, zakora ku bantu batari abanyamerika gusa. Mu gusigura igituma iyo ngingo yafashwe, umujenama mukuru ku bijanye na coronavírus muri biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu White House (Maison Blanche), Dr   Dr Anthony Fauci,  yavuze mu minsi iheze ko vyari "vyakozwe mu gihe ata na kimwe twari bwamenye" kuri Omicron. Yavuze ati: "Twese turababazwa cane n'amagume ashobora kuba yashizwe kuri Afrika y'Epfo, no ku bindi bihugu vyo muri Afrika." Ku ndwi iheze , Canada nayo yakuyeho ingingo zayo yari yafatiye ingenzi z'abanyamahanga ziva mu bihgu 10 vyo muri Afrika. Umutegetsi yavuze ko ukwiyongera kw'abandura uwo mugera mu gihugu gutuma izo ngingo "zitagikenewe". Ibinyamakuru vyo muri Canada imbere y'aho vyari vyavuze ko hari abanya-Canada bategerezwa guca baca muri Ethiopia mu gutaha n'ubwo hari  inama n'ubu ikiri mu ngiro  yo kutagendera ico gihugu co mw'ihembe rya Afrika. Abaganga muri Afrika y'Epfo -aho Omicron yavuzwe ubwa mbere-  bavuze ubu vuba ko kwandura ubwo bwoko bushasha  bitera gusa kurwara bibayabaye. Ivyo vyigwa kuva ico gihe vyarashigikiwe n'ivyigwa vyakzwe mu Bwongereza. Ubwo bwoko bwararandagase kuruta ubundi bwose muri Amerika ariko gushika ubu  nta bitigiri buratuma kwongerekana ku baja mu bitaro. Gushika ubu umuntu umwe wenyene niwe amaze gupfa kw'isano n'ubwoko bwa Omicron: umugabo wo muri Texas afise mu myaka 50 atari yararonse urucanco kandi yari asanzwe agendana izindi ngorane z'amagara.

headline: Ethiopia: Antony Blinken wa reta ya US baganiriye na Abiy Ahmed ku kibazo ca Tigray
text: Umunyamabanga wa  reta ajejwe imigenderanire wa Reta zunze ubumwe za Amerika yaganiriye n'umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia ku kibazo ca Tigray. Antony Blinken yerekanye amakenga ku kungene ibintu vyifashe mu karere ka Tigray mu biganiro bagiranye na Abiy Ahmed. Blinken yahamagariye Abiy kureka imfashanyo zigashika muri ako karere mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ko abantu baguma bapfa. Yanavuze ko Amerika ishigikiye ibikwiye guhinduka muri Ethiopia hamwe n'amatora. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia yashimiye umunyamabanga wa reta ya Amerika "kuba bashigikiye ibiriko birahinduka muri Ethiopia kandi bakaba babibandanya ata kudebukirwa". Ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Abiy yagize ati: "Icipfuzo co gutsimbataza demokrasi no kwubaka igihugu kirangwamwo amahoro n'iterambere kuri bose, bishoboka biciye mu gutsimbataza ubucuti hagati ya Ethiopia na Amerika." Abasirikare bo mu karere ka Tigray batanye mu mitwe n'aba reta ya Ethiopia mu kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi barahunze iyo ntara hanyuma amashirahamwe na yo atanga imfashanyo ntarashobora gushika muri ako karere.

headline: UK: Indege yari gutwara abimukira mu Rwanda yahagaritswe ku munota wa nyuma
text: Indege ya mbere yategerezwa kuvana abimukira ba mbere mu Bwongereza ibatwara mu Rwanda yahagaritswe hasigaye iminota mike ngo iguruke inyuma y’ingingo ya sentare ejo ku wa kabiri mw'ijoro. Abantu bashika indwi nibo bari bitezwe kurungikwa mu Rwanda , ariko urugendo rwarahagaritswe inyuma y’aho Sentare ijejwe agateka ka zinamuntu i Bulaya ( European Court of Human Rights, ECtHR) ihagurukiye ikaruhagarika, bituma havyuka imanza nshasha mu masentare y’Ubwongereza. Umushikiranganji w’intwaro yo hagati Priti Patel avuga ko ababaye, ariko akongerako ati: “ “Imyiteguro y’urugendo rwa kabiri ubu iratanguye”. Kuri ico cemezo c'urukiko rwa buraya, umuvugizi wa leta y'u Rwanda we yatangaje ko ici gihugu kibandanya kiteguye kwakira aba bimukira igihe cose bazoshikira. Hagati aho, James Wilson wo mw‘ishirahamwe riharanira agateka ka muntu, Detention Action, avuga ko ubufasha bw’iyi sentare ku munota wa nyuma bwerekana ingene ivyo kurungika abantu  Rwanda ari “ibintu bishobora guteza akaga”. Avuga ko iyi sentare yemeye ko ata muntu n’umwe akwiye kwurizwa indege ku nguvu imbere y’uko iyi ngingo yihwezwa neza na Sentare Nkuru mu kwezi kuza. Indege yo mu bwoko bwa Boeing 767, yari yakoteshejwe ku giciro c’ibihumbi 500.000 vy’amapawundi, yari yitezwe kuguruka kw’isaha 22.30 mu masaha yo mu Bwongereza muri iki gihe c’ici, ni ukuvuga isaha 23h30 mu masaha yo mu Rwanda no mu Burundi. Ariko ingingo ya sentare ECtHR i Strasbourg yakorotse inyuma y’isaha 19h30, ni ukuvuga isaha 20h30 mu masaha ya Kigali,  yahagaritse itwarwa ry’umugabo umwe yari asigaye ku rutonde rw'abarngikwa, ituma haba urukurikirane rw’imanza mu masentare ya Londres/London. Gushika isaha 22h15 ingenzi zose zari zavanywe mu ndege, maze nayo ica isubira muri Espagne. Sentare ijejwe agateka ka zina muntu i Strasbourg – imwe mu bigize Inama Nkuru ya Bulaya, ikaba igifata amasentare y’Ubwongereza nk’umunywanyi – yavuze ko uwo mugabo aturuka muri Irak azwi nka KN ashobora “kumererwa nabi mu buryo budasubirwamwo” iyo aguma muri iyo ndege. Umunyamakuru mu vyo amategeko n’intwaro yo hagati Vyafashe isaha irenga gato kugira ngo umugambi wose wo kurungika abimukira mu Rwanda ejo ku wa kabiri mw’ijoro uburizwemwo – kubera urukurikirane rw’ingingo kuri iki kibazo, zoze zatumye Sentare ya Bulaya ijejwe agateka ka zina muntu ifata ingingo imwe. Aba bantu indwi bari basigaye ku rutonde bakaba bari bahawe itegeko ryo kwurira iyi ndege Boeing 767 ku kibuga c’indege ca gisirikare Boscombe Down baboneka ko ari baherewe n’ayandi mayeri yose – ariko iyi sentare y’i Strasbourg, ari nayo ifise irya nyuma ku bibazo bijanye n’agateka ka zina muntu i Bulaya, yavuze ko umwe muri bo yashikirije ikibazo nkoramutima ku vyerekeye uwu mugambi kandi ko n’abacamanza b’Ubwongereza batari bihweje neza ingene ibintu bimeze mu Rwanda. Iyi ngingo, ku muntu umwe gusa, yatumye abandi bagabo bari basigaye bunguruza imanza – bamwe muri bo bitura abacamanza b’i Londres. Iyi ngingo yo kwimura aba bandi bose ihagarara yaruhiye guhagarara. Hagati aho, umugambi ntupfuye. Ico tutazi gushika ubu ni ingene abacamanza bazovyifatamwo igihe bazokwihweza umugambi wose wo kwimurira abasaba ubuhungiro mu Rwanda mu kwezi kuza. Uru rugamba – hagati y’abashikiranganji, abashingwamanza bafatwa nk’abansi, ubu naho Sentare ya Bulaya ikaba irwinjiyemwo – niho rero rugitangura. Mu gihe Sentare Nkuru y’igihugu i Londres yari yabonye ko KN yari gushobora gusubizwa mu Bwongereza mu gihe urubanza rwiwe rusaba guhindura ingingo yo kurungikwa mu Rwanda rwokunda, iyi sentare EctHR ivuga ko ata cemeza na kimwe ko amategeko yoshoboye kumwemerera kuvanwa mu Rwanda. Iyi sentare ya Strasbourg ivuga kandi ko ishirahamwe ONU ryashikirije amakenga ko abimukira batwawe mu Rwanda bashobora kudahabwa akaryo “keza kandi nyako” ko gufata ingingo kuri kazoza kabo nk’impuzni. Ivuga kandi ko Sentare Nkuru yemera ko hari ibibazo bikomeye bijanye n’uko Urwanda rushobora kuba rutasuzumwe neza nk’igihugu gitekanye co kwimuriramwo abantu. Umushikiranganji w’intwaro yo hagai avuga ko izi “nzitizi zisubiriza zishingiye ku mategeko” zisa n’izo reta yagize mu bindi bihe vy’irungikwa ry’abimukira, anongerako ko “benshi mu bakuwe muri iyi ndege yategerezwa kugenda bazoshirwa mu yizokurikira”. Umushikiranganji Patel avuga ko yamye abona ko iyi ngingo “itazokworoha gushira mu ngiro” ariko akongerako y’uko ari “ibintu bitangaje cane” kubona iyi Sentare ya Bulaya ivyitamwo mu gihe amasentare y’igihugu yamaze guha reta uburenganzira bwo kurungika aba bantu. Ati: “Abashingwamanza bacu bariko barihweza ingingo imwe imwe yose yafashwe ku vyerekeye uru rugendo kandi imyiteguro y’urukurikira ubu nyene iratanguye”. Reta y’Urwanda ivuga ko iciyemeje gushira mu ngiro amasezerano yagiranye n’Ubwongerezakandi ko “idaciwe intege”n’iburizwamwo ry’uru rugendo rwa mbere. Umuvugizi wayo Yolande Makolo avuga ati: “Urwanda rubandanya rushigikiye ko aya masezerano ashirwa mu ngiro ...Urwanda ruriteguye kwakira aba bimukira igihe cose bazoshikira rukaba indaro n’amahirwe mu gihugu cacu”. Ejo ku wa kabiri mu masaha ya kare, umushikiranganji wa mbere Boris Johnson yabwiye reta ko abantu barwanya iyi ngingo yo kurungika abimukira mu Rwanda bariko “batera intege ibikorwa vy’inkozi z’ikibi”, anavuga ko reta idashobora guhagarika umugambi. Abajijwe n’abanyamakuru nimba Ubwongereza bushobora kwiyonkora ku masezerano ya Bulaya ku bijanye n’agateka ka zina muntu,  ari nayo sentare ya Strasbourg ihagazeko, umushikiranganji wa mbere Johnson yavuze ko “bishobora kuba ngombwa” ko iri tegeko rihinduka. Ariko amashirahamwe ashigikiye abasaba ubuhungiro asaba reta guhindura iyi ngingo igaha abantu bahunga itoteza amahirwe yo kuronka ubuhungiro bwiza mu Bwongereza. Umukuru w’igisata kijejwe impunzi Enver Solomon avuga ko kubona iyi ndege yabujijwe kuguruka “vyerekana ko uwu mugambi utarimwo ubuntu”. Uyu anavuga ko reta yategerezwa gusubira kwihweza imigambi yayo mu “kuganira n’Ubufaransa” ku bijanye n’abimukira bajabuka Umuhora binjira mu Bwongereza. Wilson wo mw’ishirahamwe Detention Action avuga ko Sentare ya Bulaya ijejwe agateka ka zina muntu yashinzwe inyuma y’ihonyabwoko ryakorewe Abayahudi (ikizwi nka Holocaust) “yakoze ico yashingiwe”, ico yita “ijoro rizokwandikwa mu bitabo vya kahise”.

headline: Rwanda: Abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi basaba leta guhagarika ingingo y'ugukata umushahara w'abakozi
text: Amashyaka (imigambwe) abiri atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bw'u Rwanda, ariyamiriza ingingo ya leta y'ico gihugu yo gukata umushahara w'abakozi, ibice bingana na 0.5% buri kwezi aja mu kigega c'ugutegekaniriza kazoza abakozi muri ico gihugu kizwi nka RSSB. Victoire Ingabire, umukuru w'umugambwe DALFA-Umurinzi,  hamwe na Bernard  Ntaganda w'umugambwe PS-Imberakuri, bakorera mu Rwanda, bagiriza umugambwe FPR uri ku butegetsi mu Rwanda ko ugomba kunyaga abakozi ku nyungu zawo. Leta yoyo ivuga ko iyo ngingo yafashwe mu ntumbero yo gushigikira umusanzu w'ubwisungane mu kwivuza, ikanavuga ko yafashwe habanje kuba ibiganiro bitandukanye. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC Gahuzamiryango, Victoire Ingabire avuga ko iyo ngingo ya leta yafashwe hahonyanzwe ibwirizwashingiro ry'ico gihugu hamwe n'itegeko rigenga akazi "kuko umushahara w'umuntu ni umutungo wiwe bwite, ni ntavogerwa, ntabwo umuntu apfa kuwufataho uko yishakiye". Yagiriza ikigega  RSSB c'ugutegekaniriza kazoza abakozi ko cabaye igikoresho c'umugambwe FPR/RPF uri ku butegetsi. Ati: "Kiriya kigo gishirwamwo amafaranga y'ubwishingizi n'ayo gutegekaniriza abakozi RSSB, ni ikigo cabaye nk'inka y'imvyeyi ririya shyaka rivomamo". Umupfasoni Ingabire avuga ko atarwanya uwo mugambi wa leta wo kwunganira umusanzu w'ukwivuza, akabona ko ahubwo leta  ikwiye kuronderera mu bindi bisata maze amafaranga agashobora kuboneka. Avuga ko ingorane nyamukuru ari ingene ayo mafaranga yegeranywa akoreshwa, akabona ko harimwo igipfungu. Ati: "Ntabwo ari ikibazo c'ibura ry'amafaranga, ikibazo ni uburyo amafaranga yo mu bwisungane bwo kwivuza acungwa. Imbere y'uko baja kurondera amafaranga ni babanze bacunge neza n'ayahari". "Iyaba ayahari bayacunga neza, ntabwo uyu munsi baba bariko baja gusonga abakozi bababwira ngo barabakata amafaranga". Leta y'u Rwanda yoyo ivuga ko iyo ngingo yafashwe ku nyungu z'umunyagihugu muri rusangi. Gaspard Musonera,  umunyamabanga uhoraho (ntayegayezwa mu Kirundi) mu bushikiranganji bw'abakozi n'akazi mu Rwanda, avuga ko amafaranga asanzwe atangwa n'umukozi hamwe n'ayo umukoresha amutangira ari ayo kwivuza be n'umuryango wiwe gusa. Avuga ko hakenewe ubundi buryo kugira ngo abanyagihugu bandi nabo bashobore kuvurwa, ari co ayo mafaranga bazokatwa azokora. Ati: "Ayo 0.5 % ku mushahara wabo bwite batahana ku kwezi ni inkunga yabo ku kigega c'ubwishingizi mu kwivuza kuko ayo abaturage basanzwe batanga ni make cane ugereranije n'ayakenewe kugira ngo bashobore kwivuza mu buryo bukwiriye". "Rero ni ngombwa ko hashakwa izindi nzira zo kwunganira ico kikega kugira ngo abaturage bashobore guhabwa serivisi z'ubuzima zikwiriye, inzego z'ubuzima nazo zishobore kugira ubushobozi bwo kubafasha neza". Avuga ko ibivugwa n'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi y'uko ikigo RSSB gikora gihomba kandi ko iyo ntererano isanzwe ikoreshwa nabi, bidafise ishingiro "kuko nta bindi bari kuvuga". Ati: "Ikigo c'ubwisungane RSSB nta kibazo gifise, aho ikibazo kiri, ni uko abaturage basabwa amafaranga makeya ugereranyije n'ayo bategerezwa gutanga kugira ngo bashobore kwivuza". Bwana Musonera avuga ko imbere y'uko iyo ngingo ifatwa habaye ibiganiro bitandukanye vyari bifise intumbero yo kurondera inzira zo kwegeranya ubwo buryo harimwo n'abakozi, akabonako ata mpamvu y'uko yojamwo impari. Ati: "Ivyo ari vyo vyose jewe ico numva abantu bashira imbere ni ukumva akamaro bifitiye buri Munyarwanda wese ndetse n'uyo mukozi". Ku wa 26 z'ukwezi guheze, ni ho umushikiranganji w'abakozi ba leta n'umurimo mu Rwanda yasohora itangazo risaba abakoresha bo mu nzego za leta n'abikorera utwabo gukata 0.5% ku mushahara wa buri kwezi ku bakozi babo  maze bakawushikiriza ikigo c'Ubwisungane mu Rwanda (RSSB). Ni ingingo ishingiye kw'itegeko ry'umushikiranganji wa mbere c'ico gihugu ryo ku wa 13 z'ukwa mbere uno mwaka nyene, ryerekeye ubwisungane mu kwivuza, rikanerekana inzira zitandukanye uburyo bushobora kuvamwo.

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Ronaldo, Griezmann, Kounde, Kimpembe, Kane, Neymar, Lukaku
text: Atletico Madrid yongereje akariro mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Manchester United umunya-Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w’imyaka 37, mu gushira kw’isoko umusatirizi w’umufaransa Antoine Griezmann w’imyaka 31. (Times) United izokwemera gutiza Ronaldo muri rino ci igihe cose azoba yemera ingingo yo gushobora kwongerako uwundi mwaka mu masezerano yiwe kugira ngo ashobore kugaruka i Old Trafford mu mwaka w’inkino ukurikira. (Mirror) Barcelona irizeye gutsinda Chelsea mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w’inyuma w’umufaransa Jules Kounde w‘imyaka 23 ku miriyoni 65 z’ama-euro arihwa bukebuke, mu kwemerera  Sevilla  ko ishobora kuba irayihaye makeya. (Sport - mu espangol). Chelsea izoca ivuvudikira umukinyi w’inyuma wa Paris St-Germain umufaransa Presnel Kimpembe w’imyaka 26, mu gihe Barcelona yoyitwara Kounde. (Express) Bayern Munich yatanguye kuvugana n’abaserukizi b’umusatirizi wa Tottenham umwongereza Harry Kane w’imyaka 28, ni mu gihe ivyo kwimukira muri uno murwi watahukanye ihiganwa ry’Ubudagi mu ci riza bikaba bitamugwa nabi. (Bild – mu kidagi) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Brezili Neymar arahakana amakuru avuga ko ashobora kuva muri Paris St-Germain muri rino ci, mu gihe Chelsea na Manchester City ivugwa ko irondera uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 30. (Mail) Manchester United ifise amahirwe menshi yo kuronka umukinyi w’inyuma wo ku ruhande rw’iburyo wa Inter Milan umunya-Hollande Denzel Dumfries w’imyaka  26. (Calciomercato – mu gitaliyano) Chelsea yageze ku masezerano yemerera Inter Milan kugumana umusatirizi w’umubirigi Romelu Lukaku w’imyaka 29 mu kindi kiringo c’uwundi mwaka mu gihe umwaka wa mbere w’intizo muri uyo murwi wa Serie A uzoba urangiye. (Mail), Newcastle iripfuza cane umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Leicester  umwongereza Harvey Barnes w’imyaka 24 ariko aba ba Foxes bamushakako imiriyoni 54 z’amapawundi. (Sun) Umumenyereza wa Liverpool  Jurgen Klopp yanse ivyo kugura abandi bakinyi kiretse bishitse hakaba imvune mu bakinyi biwe canke uyu murwi ukagurisha abakinyi usanzwe ufise. (Sky Sports) Nice yegereye umunyegori wa Leicester  umunya-Danemark Kasper Schmeichel w’imyaka 35 inyuma y’aho inaniriwe no kugura Yann Sommer akinira Borussia Monchengladbach. (L'Equipe – mu gifaransa) Brighton ntirota iva ku giciro c’imiriyoni zirenga 50 z’amapawundi ku mukinyi wayo w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu, umunya-Espagne Marc Cucurella inyuma yo kwanka amafaranga “y’agashinyaguro” y’imiriyoni 30 z’amapawundi atangwa na Manchester City. (Athletic) Brighton ishobora guca irondera umukinyi w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu wa Manchester United  Brandon Williams w’imyaka 21, ku giciro c’imiriyoni 15 z’amapawundi mu gihe Cucurella yoramuka agiye muri rino ci. (Mirror) Timo Werner asa n’uwushobora kuva muri Chelsea muri rino ci kubera uyu musatirizi w’imyaka 26 ashaka guhabwa umwanya ukwiye wo gukina kugira ngo ashobore kurondera ikibanza mu murwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubudagi mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose. (Sky Sports – mu kidagi) Everton iriteguye kugurisha umukinyi wayo wo hagati umwongereza Dele Alli w’imyaka 26, inyuma y’amezi atandatu gusa imuguriye Tottenham. (Sun) Roma yongereje akariro mu kurondera umukinyi w’inyuma wa Manchester United umunya- Côte d'Ivoire Eric Bailly w’imyaka 28. (Mirror) Arsenal iri mu biganiro vyo kurondera gutiza Atalanta umukinyi w’inyuma wa Portugal Nuno Tavares, inyuma y’aho uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 22 yerekaniye ko ashaka kuva muri Emirates. (Fabrizio Romano) Newcastle iriko irakurikirana ingene ivy’umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Rennes umunya-Ghana Kamaldeen Sulemana bigenda, akaba ari ku giciro c’imiriyoni zababa 30 z’amapawundi kandi yipfuzwa na Bayer Leverkusen na Ajax. (Mail) West Ham iri mu biganiro na Napoli kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi wo hagati wa Pologne Piotr Zielinski w’imyaka 28. (Tuttomercato – mu gitaliyano).

headline: Afghanistan: Umukuru w'ingabo za US ntabona neza nimba 'ba ruburakigongwe' b'aba Taliban bazohinduka
text: Umukuru w'ingabo za Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika avuga ko aba Taliban ari "umuhari ruburakigongwe" akavuga ko bitaboneka neza nimba bazohinduka. Jenerali Mark Milley avuga ariko ko "bishoboka" ko muri kazoza Amerika ishobora kuzokorana n'aba barwanyi bagendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vy'idini rya Islam mu bikorwa vyo kurwanya imirwi y'iterabwoba. Ingabo za Amerika zavuye muri  Afghanistan ku wa 31 z'ukwa munani, ikimenyetso c'uko intambara ya Amerika yari imaze imyaka 20 kuva mu  2001 igihe zikora igitero co kwomora aba Taliban irangiye. Uyu muhari ubu niwo ugenzura igihugu cose ukaba urindiriye gutangaza reta nshasha. Gen Milley yari kumwe n'umunyamabanga ajejwe kwivuna abansi wa Amerika Lloyd Austin, mu kiganiro ca mbere bagize kuva ingabo za nyuma zivuye muri Afghanistan. Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika aranegurwa cane ingene yavyifashemwo, aho yagirizwa guhuruduka mu gutahukana ingabo, ivyatumye ubutegetsi bwa Afghanistan butembagazwa. Umuvuduko udasanzwe w'aba Taliban mu kwigarurira igihugu watumye haba igikorwa kidasanzwe co guhungisha ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abanyamahanga hamwe n'abanya Afghanistan bakorana n'ingabo mvamakungu. Mu kiganiro cabo nijoro ku wa gatatu, aba bategetsi bompi  barashimagije ingabo zakoreye muri Afghanistan hamwe n'igikorwa kidasanzwe co guhungisha abantu benshi mu mwanya muto. Abajijwe ibijanye n'uko bakoranye n'aba Taliban mu guherekeza ku kibuga c'indege abashaka guhunga , Austin yishuye ati: "Hari ibintu bike twakoranye n'aba Taliban, kandi ni ivyo - kugira ngo dushobore guhungisha abantu benshi bashoboka". Yongerako ati: "Mu ntambara ukora ivyo utegerezwa gukora kugira ngo ugabanye ingaruka mbi ku gikorwa ujejwe no ku ngabo, ntutegerezwa gukora ivyo ushaka". Avuga ko bishoboka ko muri kazoza Amerika ikorana n'aba Taliban mu kurwanya umurwi IS-K wegamiye Etat Islamique/Islamic State, uherutse kwiyemerera ko ari wo wakoze igitero giheruka mu micungararo y'ikibuga c'indege mu ndwi iheze kigahitana abarenga 170, harimwo abasirikare 13 ba Amerika. IS-K  ni wo muhari w'intagondwa mubi cane kandi uteye umudugararo gusumba iyindi mihari yose yiyitirira idini rya Islam muri Afghanistan. IS-K irafise ibintu bikomeye utandukaniyeko n'aba Taliban, kuko ibagiriza ko bahemutse bagata urugamba. Hagati aho, Austin avuga ko ataco ashobora kuvuga ku vyo yibaza ku bijanye n'ingene bashobora kuzokorana muri kazoza. Ariko yongerako y'uko abategetsi "bazokora uko bashoboye kwose kugira ngo tubandanye dukurikiranira hagufi IS-K, tumenye neza uyo muhari, hanyuma mu gihe tuzoshakira muri kazoza, bakabazwa ivyo bakoze". Abantu  barenga 123.000 nibo bashoboye guhungishwa muri Afghanistan. Amerika ivuga ko hari Abanyamerika bari hagati ya 100 na 200 bakiri muri Afghanistan. Icegera c'umunyamabanga wa reta ajejwe ibibazo vya poritike Victoria Nuland avuga ko bariko bihweza "uburyo bwose bushoboka" bw'ukungene bovana muri ico gihugu Abanyamerika basigayeyo hamwe n'abo bose bakoranye na Amerika. Hagati aho, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Ubwongereza Dominic Raab avuga ko atazi neza Abongereza boba basigaye muri Afghanistan, ariko ko bashobora kuba ari bake. Aba Taliban barishimiye itahukanwa ry'ingabo mvamakungu, ubu ikibaraje ishinga kikaba ari ugushinga reta. Icegera c'umukuru w'ibiro vya poritike vy'aba Taliban muri Qatar, Sher Abbas Stanekza, yabwiye igisata ca BBC candika mu rurimi rw'igi Pashto ko reta nshasha ishobora gutangazwa mu misi ibiri iri imbere. Avuga ko abagore bashobora guhabwa ibibanza ku nzego zo hasi, ariko atari ku nzego nkuru. Avuga ko abakoreye reta mu myaka 20 iheze badashobora gushirwa muri reta nshasha.

headline: Jose Mourinho avuga ko Samuel Eto’o yari akwiye kuronswa umupira w’inzahabu
text: Jose Mourinho yahoze amenyereza imirwi ya Chelsea na  Manchester United  avuga ko Samuel Eto'o yari akwiye n'imiburiburi incuro imwe kuronswa iteka ry'ukwitwa umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi. Samuel Eto'o ubu afise imyaka 38 yahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa w'umunya Cameroun, aherutse gutangaza ko yahagaritse gukina umupira. Mu myaka 22 yamaze ari rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru, Eto'o yarashoboye gutsindira igikombe ca Afrika incuro zibiri, yongera atsindira n'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya incuro zitatu. Mourinho yatanguye gukorana na Eto'o mu murwi wa Inter Milan wo mu Butaliyano mu mwaka wa 2009/2010, aho uyo murwi watahukanye ibikombe bitatu, igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'ico gihugu Serie A, igikombe c'Ubutaliyano, hamwe n'igikombe c'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya. Bongeye kandi guhurira mu murwi wa Chelsea mu kiringo c'imyaka itabu. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na Radio Cameroun, Mourinho yavuze ati: "Biragoye gutahura ingene Samuel Eto'o atigeze atsindira umupira w'inzahabu na rimwe kandi yari umukinyi rurangiranwa". "Yakinye inkino za nyuma z'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya, atsinda zibiri muri Barcelona kandi hose yagumye yinjiza. Yatsindiye kandi ico gikombe muri Inter Milan, yongera atsindira ibikombe vyinshi mu mahiganwa y'ibihugu". "Yabaye umusatirizi wa mbere kw'isi mu kiringo kitari gito, ari naco gituma yari akwiye kuba yararonse umupira w'inzahabu, n'ahi ivyo birengeye ubushobozi bwacu". Uyo mukinyi ari mu murwi w'abakinyi b'ibihangange muri Afrika harimwo Didier Drogba, Michael Essien na John Obi Mikel bakoranye na Jose Mourinho, ariko uyu mumenyereza yigeze kwitazira 'The Special One', avuga ko Eto'o ari umuntu adasanzwe. Ashimangira ati: " Umukino wa Samuel wari uteye igomwe kandi yabaye mu basatirizi ba mbere bakomeye kw'isi mu kiringo c'imyaka itari mike". "Yari umukinyi rurangiranwa vy'ukuri kandi ikintu nyamukuru ku mukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru ni ico aterera kugira ngo umurwi wiwe utsinde". "Samuel yari umuntu azi gucenga cane, ariko kandi yashima gukinana na bagenziwe". "Yama yitanga igihe cose kugira ngo umurwi wiwe ushobore gutsinda. Ni umukinyi yakina kugira atsindire ibikombe. Yatsindiye amahiganwa akomeye hafi yose, vy'ukuri yakoze ibintu bikomeye". "Yari umukinyi agoye kwaka umupira, ariko inyifato yiwe nk'umuntu nayo cari ikindi kintu. Yari umugenzi mwiza yama akora uko ashoboye kugira ngo umurwi wiwe ushobore gutsinda mu nkino". "Ndibuka muri Inter Milan dukina na Barcelona mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma ca Champions League, twari dusigaye turi cumi mu kibuga, Eto'o yakinye inyuma ku ruhande rw'iburyo hafi urukino rwose. Yaritangiye umurwi bidasanzwe, yemera gukina kuri iyo nomero kugira ngo dutsinde". "Ico ni co umurwi wacu wari ukeneye muri ico gihe. Muri Milan, twatsinze 3-1, tugiye muri Barcelona, ntitwari dukeneye cane gutsinda, twari dukeneye gusa gushika mu rukino rwa nyuma kandi ico yaragitahura. Yarakoze ivyari bikenewe kugira ngo dushike mu rukino rwa nyuma". "Ayo ni amateka akomeye ku muntu kandi ndizeye ko Eto'o azokora ibintu bikomeye inyuma y'uguhagarika gukina". Samuel Eto'o yakiniye imirwi 13 yose mu bihugu bitandatu, akaba yatsindiye umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Cameroun ibitsindo 56 mu nkino 118, ibitari bwabeho mu mateka y'umupira w'amaguru muri ico gihugu.

headline: Umva ngaha ikiganiro Leonce Ngendakumana yahaye BBC nyuma y'aho agenewe guserukira Frodebu muri 2020
text: Umva ngaha ikiganiro Leonce Ngendakumana yahaye BBC nyuma y'aho agenewe guserukira Frodebu muri 2020

headline: DR Congo: FARDC yahaye igisirikare c' u Rwanda inyeshamba 71 zirwanya ubutegetsi bw'ico gihugu
text: Igisirikare ca DR Congo kimenyesha ko ku wa gatandatu w'indwi iheze catahukanye inyeshamba z'u Rwanda 71 ziheruka gufatwa mu rugamba rubandanya rwo kurwanya imirwi y'inyeshamba muri ico gihugu. Kapiteni Dieudonné Kasereka avugira ingabo za Congo ziri muri urwo rugamba, yabwiye BBC ko abo barwanyi ari abo mu murwi Conseil national pour la renaissance et la démocratie (CNRD). CNRD ni umurwi wiyonkoye kuri Forces démocratiques pour la libération du Rwanda (FDLR) ikorera mu buseruko bwa Republika y'Itwaro Rusangi ya Congo. Urugamba rwo kurwanya imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho mu karere ka Kalehe rwatanguye ku wa 26 z'ukwezi kwa 11 mu karere ka Kalehe. Mu kiganiro yahaye BBC, Kapiteni Kasereka avuga ko abo barwanyi bashikirijwe igisirikare c'u Rwanda bari kumwe n'abandi 1471 bagizwe n'imiryango yabo. Amenyesha ko izo nyeshamba n'imiryango yabo bakiriwe na koloneli Patrick Musho ku ruhande rw'u Rwanda. Avuga ko intambara zikibandanya mu karere ka Mwenga, aho abo barwanyi ba CNRD bari bageze bariko berekeza mu karere ka Fizi. Amenyesha ko mu ntambara z'ejo ku wa Mungu mu gace ka Kasika zahuje abasirikare ba Congo n'izo nyeshamba avuga ko ziharurwa mw'ijana zanse gushira ibirwanisho hasi, bashoboye kwica umunyamabanga mukuru wa CNRD, bongera bafata mpiri n'abarwanyi bashika kw'icumi. Ku wa 16 z'uku kwezi, umurwi wa mbere ugizwe n'inyeshamba 291 hamwe n'abana 11 baratahukanywe inyuma y'aho batsindiwe n'igisirikare ca Congo mu ntara ya Kivu y'Ubumanuko. Kapiteni  Kasereka  avuga ko uwo murwi w'abo batahukanywe ku wa gatandatu "ugizwe n'abaheruka gufatwa no kwishikana, baka bari bacungiwe mw'ikambi ya gisirikare ya Nyamunyunyi", iri ku birometero 30 uvuye i Bukavu, umugwa mukuru wa Kivu y'Ubumanuko. Ku wa 08 z'uku kwezi nyene, igisirikare ca Congo cari catangaje ko abantu 1200 b'umurwi CNRD "bagizwe n'abarwanyi hamwe n'imiryango yabo" muri iyo ntara bishikanye. Mu buseruko bwa Congo, haharurwa imirwi  y'inyeshamba ishika 133, imwe igizwe n'abanyekongo iyindi igizwe n'abanyamahanga, muri iyo 35 irwanira muri Kivu y'Ubumanuko, nk'uko bivugwa na Kapiteni Kasereka. Avuga ko igisirikare ca Congo kitarota gihagarika ibitero ku mirwi y'inyeshamba irwanira muri ako karere gushika yemeye gushira ibirwanisho hasi.

headline: Igiturire mu Burundi: OLUCOME isanga Prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye agifise vyinshi vyo gukora
text: Mu gihe Prezida w'u Burundi Evariste Ndayishimiye amaze iminsi afata ingingo zigaragaza kutihanganira igiturire, amashirahamwe akirwanya arashima bimwe ibindi akabinenga. Rimwe muri ayo mashirahamwe ni OLUCOME, ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya igiturire no gusesagura itunga ry'igihugu. Umukuru waryo Gabriel Rufyiri yabwiye Prudent Nsengiyumva wa BBC Gahuzamiryango ko hakenewe ko umukuru w'igihugu yigiza kure abasuma bose. Umviriza aho hejuru...

headline: Amatora muri USA: Bernie Sanders yemeye gushigikira umukeba wiwe Joe Biden
text: Bernie Sanders yariko arondera guserukira umugambwe w'aba Démocrates mu matora yo mu kwa 11uyu mwaka  atangaza ko yemeye gushigikira Joe Biden bariko bahiganirwa gutana mu mitwe na Donald Trump. Mu ndwi iheze, Bwana Sanders yatangaje ko akuyemwo akarenge mu rugamba rwo kurondera guserukira uwo mugambwe, akaryo keza ka Bwana Biden gusigara ari wenyene asigaye muri uyo mugambwe. Mu kiganiro yagiriye ku buhinga bw'ireresi, uwahoze ari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu, Joe Biden, yashimiye uwahoze ari umukeba wiwe kubona yemeye kumushigikira. Umukenguzamateka Sanders yateye akamo Abanyamerika bose kuja hamwe kugira ngo biganzure Perezida Donald Trump. Avuga ko ari "umukuru w'igihugu mubi cane mu bihe vya none mu gihugu". Sanders ati: "Uno munsi, nsavye Abanyamerika bose - aha ndiko nsaba umu Démocrate uwo ari we wese, ndiko nsaba uwigenga uwo ari we wese, ndiko nsaba umu Républicain uwo ari we wese - ko boja hamwe muri rino higanwa bagashigikira umu kandida nshigikiye". "Ni ngombwa ko twese dukorera hamwe". Bwana Biden w'imyaka 77, avuga ko anezerewe cane kubona mugenziwe Sanders yamushigikiye, akavuga ko atamukeneye gusa mu myiyamamazo, ariko mu butegetsi. Ati: "Washize imbere ya vyose inyungu z'iki gihugu be no gutsinda Donald Trump. Nk'uko ukunze kubivuga uti 'si jewe, ni twebwe',". Mw'ijambo yashikirije abanywanyi b'uyo mukenguzamateka, Bwana Biden yavuze ati: "Ndababona, kandi ndabumva, ndatahura ikibaraje ishinga muri kino gihugu, kandi ndizeye ko muzodushigikira". Bwana Biden avuga ko we na Sanders bariko bashinga imirwi yo gukorera hamwe kugira ngo yige ibibazo nkoramutima harimwo ibijanye n'ihindagurika ry'ibihe, amagara y'abantu hamwe n'amafaranga arihwa mu mashure. Ivyo vyabaye inyuma y'aho Biden atsindiye Sanders mu matora y'intangamarara y'aba Démocrates mu ndwi iheze mu ntara ya Wisconsin, amatora yabaye hari ukutumvikana kuvuye ku kiza ca coronavirus. Umukenguzamateka Sanders yahagaritse urugamba rwiwe mu ndwi iheze, aho yabwira abanywanyi biwe ko abona ko adashobora kuronka amajwi akwiye kugira ngo ashobore gutsindira ikibanza co guserukira umugambwe wiwe mu matora. Mu ntango, niwe yari imbere cane, aho cane cane urwaruka rwamubonamwo urukiza, akaba yashira imbere gutorera inyishu ibibazo vy'amagara y'abantu n'ubusumbasumbane bw'imishahara. Hagati aho, mu ndwi nkeya ziheze yagiye atakaza amajwi maze Bwana Biden amuja imbere. Sanders yari amaze kurondera guserukira umugambwe w'aba Démocrates ariko biranka, aho mu 2016 yatsinzwe na Hillary Clinton.

headline: Uganda: Amadini n’abayoboke abangamye kandi abangamiwe
text: “Hari n’abica ku bwa Christ (Kristu)”, ni bimwe biri muri iri tohoza rya BBC Africa Eye. Peter MacJob agaragaza uturorero muri Uganda, aho n’abakiri bato bakoreshwa n’aba ‘pastors’ (abapasitori) bo mu madini atandukanye, n’abantu bakahasiga ubuzima.

headline: DR Congo: Ebola 'yarangiye' mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko
text: Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi  ya Congo itangaza ko akarere k'ubuseruko bw'ico gihugu ubu katakirangwamwo Ebola, inyuma y'amezi arenga abiri ata wundi murwayi abonetse. Ivyo bimenyeshwa n'ishami rya ONU ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi (OMS/WHO) risubiramwo ivyatangajwe na Dr Longondo Eteni, umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Congo. Ivyo bimenyeshejwe haciye iminsi 40 ata wundi murwayi wa Ebola abonetse mu ntara ya Kivu y'uburaruko hamwe na Ituri, zose ziri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Congo. Umurwayi wa nyuma yaheruka kuvugwa ku wa 06 z'ukwa kane. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe OMS muri Afrika Dr Matshidiso Moeti, avuga ko iyo ndwara yarwanijwe muri ako karere kubera ugukorana hagati y'inzego zitandukanye be n'abanyagihugu. Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'abamenyeshamakuru biciye ku buhinga bwa none, Dr Moeti yavuze ati: "Iki ni icizere ko ugufatana mu nda be n'ubuhinga bigiye hamwe indwara z'ivyaduka zishobora kuranduranwa n'imizi". Kugira ngo ikiza gitangazwe ko carangiye, hategerezwa kuba haciye iminsi 42 kuva umuntu wa nyuma avuye mu bitaro amaze gupimwa agasanga ntakirwaye. Ikiza ca Ebola cadutse mu kwa munani 2018 ni co cagira kabiri gikomeye aho abarenga 3400 banduye nayo abarenga 2200 kirabahitana,  inyuma y'ico mu 2014 muri Afrika y'Uburengero. Nico ca mbere kandi cadutse mu karere karimwo intambara, aho ibitero birenga 420 vyakozwe n'imirwi y'inyeshamba ku bigo vy'amavuriro, ivyatumye utwigoro two kurwanya ico kiza tugenda ducumbagira. Iyo nkuru ije nk'ihumure mu gihugu kandi gihanganye na wa mugera coronavirus hamwe n'ikiza c'agasama kitari bwigere kiboneka kw'isi nzima. Hagati aho, haravugwa ko Ebola yibonekeje mu bindi bice vy'igihugu - ku ncuro ya 11 mu mateka y'ico gihugu - mu buraruko bushira uburengero. Ku wa 01 z'uku kwa gatandatu, niho leta y'ico gihugu yatangaza umurwayi wa mbere wa Ebola mu ntara ya Mbandaka.

headline: Ukraine - Russia: Umukenguzamateka wa US yarakaje Abarusiya inyuma y'aho asabiye ko Putin yicwa
text: Umukenguzamateka wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika asaba ko mu begereye Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya  hogira umwe muri bo amwica. Lindsey Graham avuga ko inzira yonyene yorangiza igitero Uburusiya bwakoze kuri Ukraine ari uko hoboneka umuntu "agakuraho uyu mugabo". Mw'itangazo yacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, uyu mukenguzamateka wo mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika azwi ko atarya umunwa abaza nimba hatoboneka umuntu nka "Brutus" mu bantu ba Putin akamwirahira maze intambara igaca ihagarara. Aya majambo yarakaje uwuserukira Uburusiya muri Amerika. Umukenguzamateka Graham aserukira intara ya Caroline du Sud, yanditse ati: "Woba ukoreye igikorwa kidasanzwe igihugu cawe n'isi yose". "Nta mu Brutus mu Burusiya? Nta Colonel Stauffenberg yoba ari mu gisirikare c'Uburusiya?" Brutus yari umunyaporitike w''icahoze ari ingoma y'Abaromani (Empire Romain/Roman Empire) yishe Julius Caesar, mu gihe Koroneri (Colonel) Claus von Stauffenberg wo mu gisirikare c'Ubudagi azwi cane ko yagerageje kwica Adolf Hitler mu 1944. Anatoly Antono aserukira Uburusiya muri Amerika avuga ko aya majambo "ari mabi cane kandi adashobora kwihanganirwa". Avuga ko ata "muntu yari yiteze urwanko nk'uru ku Burusiya muri Amerika". "Ni ibintu bitumvikana kwumva umukenguzamateka w'igihugu gishira imbere ko imico myiza ari yo ikwiye kuba 'inyenyeri' imurikira isi yose ashobora kwiyumvira ko iterabwoba ari yo nzira ya Washington yo gushika ku nyungu zayo ku rubuga mpuzamakungu". Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika ariyamiriza igitero c'Uburusiya kuri Ukraine mbere akaba yarafatiye ibihano abanyaporitike harimwo na Perezida Putin we nyene ubwiwe. Avuga ko Amerika izokingira ibihugu vya OTAN/NATO ariko akaba atazorungika ingabo muri Ukraine. Ejo ku wa gatanu, umunyamabanga ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru muri Maison Blanche/White House Jen Psaki yashimangiye ko amajambo ya  Graham adasigura na gato "aho reta ya Amerika ihagaze kandi ko atari amajambo ushobora kwumva mu kanwa k'umuntu uw'ari we wese akorera ubu butegetsi". Amajambo y'umukenguzamateka  Graham yashavuje kandi umuvugizi wa Kremlin Dmitry Peskov. Igihe yatera akamo Abarusiya bose kuba umwe, yavuze ati: "Ni vyo, muri ino misi hari abantu bashobora kuvuga ibisunitswe n'impemu, si bose bashobora kugira ubwenge buri ku murongo".

headline: Frank Lampard: Ibintu bishobora kuba nabi muri Chelsea, niko Chris Sutton abibona
text: Ibintu "bishobora kuba bibi" kuri Frank Lampard muri Chelsea mu gihe itoronka intsinzi vuba bwango, nk'uko bivugwa na Chris Sutton yahoze ari umusatirizi w'Ubwongereza. Mu nkino zitanu zose ikinye, Chelsea yatahiye amanota ane yonyene inyuma y'aho urukino rwa nijoro ku wa mbere rurangiriye inganya igitindo kimwe na Aston Villa, ica ija mu kibanza ca gatandatu mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza, Premier League. Sutton yabwiye Radio 5 Live yegukira BBC ati: "Muri iki gihe, bari mu bibazo kuko bariko bakina nabi". "Bacitse intege, Frank akeneye ko umurwi wiwe utsinda n'imiburiburi inkino nkeya vuba bishoboka kuko, nk'uko tubizi, ibintu bishobora kuba nabi muri Chelsea". Frank yahoze ari rurangiranwa muri uyu murwi yagenywe kuba umumenyereza wawo mu mwaka uheze, maze ashobora kuwushikana mu mirwi ine ya mbere, anawushikana mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe c'Ubwongereza, FA, catahukanywe na Arsenal. Yarahawe uburyo bwinshi cane kugira ngo ashobore kugura abakinyi, aho yakoresheje imiriyoni zirenga 270 z'amadorari y'Abanyamerika mu kugura Hakim Ziyech, Timo Werner, Kai Havertz, Ben Chilwell hamwe na Edouard Mendy. Ariko Sutton abona ko Lampard atarashobora gushikana uyu murwi ku rugero wategerezwa kuba uriko. Sutton ati: "Tuvyanka tuvyemera, uyu mwaka si mwiza cane kuri Frank. Araremerewe; yakoresheje amahera menshi. Ubu ari mu mazi abira". "Si nipfuza guca urubanza hakiri kare kuri Chelsea na Frank kuko nk'ubu ari nka hamwe botsinda inkino nka zibiri bikurikiranya, barashobora kwisanga mu kibanza ca kabiri, maze icizere co gutsinda ihiganwa kigaca gisubira kuvyuka". "Ariko sinibaza ko Chelsea ishobora gutsinda iri higanwa. Ni babanze bagere ku rugero rwo gukina uko bategerezwa gukina". N'aho Sutton abona nabi ibintu muri Chelsea, ikizwi ni uko mu nkino 14 zayo zose yakiniye ku kibuga cayo, yatsinzwe urukino rumwe rudende, itsinda 10, urwo rukino rukaba ari urwayihuje na Liverpool mu kw'icenda, rurangira itsinzwe 2-0. Hanyuma kandi tugiye muri rya higanwa rya Buraya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo, UEFA Champions League, Chelsea ni iya mbere mu murwi E, kandi mu nkino zose imaze gukina ntirigera itsindwa. Mu gihe Chelsea yamara inkino 17 zose idatsindwa - ivyarangiye itsinzwe na Everton - Lampard yavuze yijiriwe ko ibintu bitararangira. Aho rero nijoro aho umurwi wiwe unganirije na Aston Villa kandi wari muhira, yasubiye kuvuga ko abakinyi biwe bakeneye kwongereza inguvu gusumba uko bariko barakina muri kino gihe. Ati: "Iki nico gihe kigoye muri uno mwanya. Dutegerezwa gukura amaboko mu mpuzu tukarwana urugamba, kandi ndazi ko tuzosubira tukaduga". "Mu gihe nk'iki c'umwaka, uba ukeneye amanota. Ndumva abakinyi bacitse intege kuko bakeneye gutsinda". "Mu ndwi nkeya ziheze, abantu badufata nk'umurwi ushobora gutahukana iri higanwa. Ubu ibintu ntivyoroshe. Ndizeye ko abakinyi bashasha bazogenda bamenyera uko imisi izogenda". Muri aba bakinyi baguzwe ku mahera y'umurengera mu ci riheze, Mendy na Chilwell ni bo bonyene batanguye mu kibuga. Sutton ashira amakosa yose kuri uyu yahoze ari umusatirizi wa Leipzig, Timo Werner, ariko ngo na Kai Havertz ntiyavyifashemwo neza. Werner yinjije ibitsindo 34 mu Budagi mu mwaka w'inkino uheze, ariko mu nkino 16 zose amaze gukina muri Premier League, amaze gutsinda bine gusa. Bitegekanijwe ko ku wa Mungu Chelsea yakira Manchester City, ariko nta wuzi ko ruzoba, kuko na nijoro urukino rwari guhuza City na Everton rwingurujwe kubera abakinyi batari bake bayo banduye wa mugera wa coronavirus.

headline: Xueli Abbing: Umwana w'umwema yatawe n'abavyeyi ubu yabaye umunyamideli wa Vogue
text: Xueli akiri uruyoya, abavyeyi biwe bamutaye mu rugo rw'irerero ry'impfuvyi. Mu Bushinwa, kuvyara umwema bifatwa nko guhumana. Iyo ngorane mvukanwa idakunze kuboneka ituma umuntu atagira irangi nk'iryo abandi, yatumye urukoba n'imishatsi vya Xueli vyera cane. Ubwo bumuga kandi bwatumye uwo mwigeme abangamirwa n'umuco w'izuba. Ariko uko kudasa n'abandi vyatumye Xueli bimwugururira imiryango muvyo umudeli. Ubu ku myaka 16, aragaragara mu kinyamakuru Vogue no mw'imenyekanisha ry'abashonyi b'impuzu rurangiranwa. Xueli yaraganiriye n'umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC Jennifer Meierhans. Abakozi bo mw'irerero ry'impfuvyi banyise Xue Li. Xue bisigura urubura (Neige) hanyuma Li bigasigura mwiza. Nagiye kurererwa mu wundi muryango mfise imyaka itatu, nca nja kubana na mawe na benewacu muri Hollande. Mawe yavuze ko ata rindi zina yiyumvira ryoba ryiza nk'iryo aca yiyumvira ko vyoba vyize ngumanye ikintu cerekana amamuko yanje yo mu Bushinwa. Igihe navuka mu Bushinwa, reta yarakajije itegeko ry'uko imiryango ivyara umwana umwe umwe. Nta mahirwe umuntu yaba afise mu gihe avyaye umwana w'umwema. Abana bamwe bamwe nka nje, baratawe, abandi bakugaranwa canke na ho bagiye kw'ishure imishatsi yabo bakayisiga irangi ryirabura. Ariko mu bihugu bimwe bimwe vya Afrika, barahigwa buhongo, ibihimba vyabo bigahimburwa bakanicwa. Abapfumu bakoresha amagufa yabo mu gukora imiti, abantu bakaba bemera ko ishobora kuvura ingwara, ariko muvyo ukuri, si vyo. Bijanye no kwemera kwa kera. Naragize Imana baranta gusa. Abavyeyi bamvyaye ntibasize ikintu na kimwe kindanga ari na co gituma ntazi igihe navukiye. Ariko nko  mu mwaka umwe uheze, naragirishije ibipimo vya X-ray vy'ikiganza canje kugira ngerageze kumenya imyaka noba mfise hanyuma abaganga bakaba bibajije ko noba mfise imyaka 15. Nagiye muvyo umudeli nk'igihamana mfise imyaka 11. Mawe yari azinanye n'umuntu akora imideli aturuka muri Hong Kong. Yari afise umuhungu afise ubujana (umunwa usatuye), aca afata ingingo yo kumukorera impuzu nziza cane zizotuma abantu batitaho kuraba gusa umunwa wiwe. Iryo sekeza yarise "kugorora ibitameze neza" aca ambaza ko nshaka kuja kwerekana imideli yiwe muri Hong Kong. Vyambereye ibintu vyiza cane. Inyuma y'aho, naratumiwe kwifotoza nk'incuro zibiri, rimwe akaba yari Brock Elbank muri studio yiwe i Londres. Yashize amafoto yanje kuri Instagram. Ikigo c'imideli ca Zebedee Talent carampamagaye kimbaza nimba nshaka kwifatanya na bo mu kurondera abantu bagendana ubumuga bokwerekana imideri yabo. Imwe mu mafoto Brock yamfotoye yashizwe hejuru ku kinyamakuru ca Vogue Italia mu kwezi kwa gatandatu mu 2019 turi kumwe na Lana del Rey. Ico gihe, sinari nzi ko ico kinamyakuru cemewe cane, bikaba vyantwaye akanya kubona ingene abantu vyabanezereje cane. Mu mideli, ukudasa n'abandi n'umuhezagiro s'umuvumo, vyampaye ikibanza co kumenyekanisha ukuba umwema. Isekeza rya Kurt Geiger n'akarorero keza cane k'ingene bandetse nkerekana ubudasa bwanje. Barandetse ndambara uko nshatse hanyuma nereka mwenewacu uko amfotora kubera bivuye ku mategeko yo kwirinda coronavirus, abafata amafoto ntibarekuriwe kuja muri studio. Bisigura ko nifata uko nshatse mu buryo ubwo ari bwo bwose nashaka kandi vy'ukuri naranezerejwe n'ivyavuyemwo. Mu mafoto, abanyamudeli b'abanyamwema bakunze kugereranywa n'abamarayika canke ibisigo, kandi ivyo birambabaza. Na cane cane kubera bibandanya gushigikira imyemerere ituma ubuzima bw'abana b'abanyamwema bugeramirwa mu bihugu nka Tanzania na Malawi. Ukuba umunyamwema kwanje gusigura ko mbona ku bice 8 gushika 10 kw'ijana kand nsinshobora guhangara umuco kuko urababaza amaso yanje. Rimwe na rimwe iyo hari umuco mwinshi ndiko ndifotoza ndasaba nti "Ndashobora gupfunga amaso canke urashobora kugabanya umuco?" Canke nkagira nti "Ok, ushobora gufotora amafoto atatu nuguruye amaso ukoresheje n'umuco ariko nta zindi zirenze izo." Mu ntango bibaza ko bigoye ariko bafashe ifoto ya mbere baratangaye, baranashima cane uko vyagenze. Abankurikirana babwiye abankeneye bati "Nimwaba mudashobora kubitorera inyishu [umuco], ntimushobora kuronka Xueli." Ni ngombwa ko bakora ku buryo niyumva neza. Abantu bambwira ko uko kutabona neza gutuma mbona ukuntu gutandukanye kandi ko mbona ibindi bintu abandi badashobora kubona. Bituma kandi nitaho gake uko ubwiza bubonwa mu mico n'imigenzo. Nkeka kubera ntashobora kubona ibintu vyose neza, nshira inguvu mu kwumviriza amajwi y'abantu n'ivyo bashaka kuvuga. Kubera ivyo, ubwiza bwabo bw'imbere bumfitiye agaciro nta ngere. Ndakunda ivyo umudeli kubera nkunda guhura n'abantu bashasha, kwimenyereza kuvuga icongereza no kubona ingene abantu banezerejwe n'amafoto yanje. Nshaka gukoresha umudeli mu kuvuga ivyerekeye abema, ko ari ingorane ndemanwa atari uguhumana. Uburyo ivugwako n'ukuvuga "umuntu afise ubwema" kubera kuba "umwema" vyumvikana nko kwerekana ico uri. Abantu bambwira ko ntegerezwa kwemera ibintu vyanshikiye muri kahise ariko siko ndabibona. Nemera ko umuntu akeneye kumenya ivyabaye hanyuma agategera igituma ariko ntace avyemera. Sinshobora kwemera ko abana bicwa kubera bavutse ari abema. Nshaka guhindura isi. Nshaka ko abandi bana b'abema - canke bagendana ubundi bumuga canke ibindi bitandukanye - ko bamenya ko bashoboye no kuba ico ari co cose bashaka. Kuri jewe, ndatandukanye n'abandi muri bimwe bimwe ariko  n'abandi n'uko. Ndakunda kwinonora imitsi no kuduga imisozi kandi nshobora kubikora co kimwe n'uwundi uwo ari we wese. Abantu bashobora kuvuga ko udashobora gukora ibi canke biriya, ariko urabishoboye, gerageza guza. Izi foto zose tuzifitiye uburenganzira bwo kuzikoresha

headline: Uyu munsi huzuye imyaka 14 Nkurunziza atorewe kuyobora u Burundi, igihugu gihagaze gute?
text: Nk'uno munsi, kw'igenekerezo rya 19 ukwezi kw'umunani 2005, Petero Nkurunziza yatowe ngo arongore Uburundi, amabanga yaciye arahirira bukeye ku wa 20. Imyaka 14 inyuma igihugu gihagaze gute? Ni inyuma y'amatora yarangije intwaro mfatakibanza yari yavuye mu masezereno y'amahoro ya Arusha yo mu mwaka wa 2000. Amatora amaze gushikana Bwana Nkurunziza n'umugambwe CNDD-FDD ku butegetsi, Abarundi bagaruye icizere co kuronka amahoro n'iterambere. None ubu inyuma y'imyaka 14  igihugu kibonwa gute? Leta y'u Burundi ivuga ko hari iterambere ryashitsweko muri iyi myaka, ibiharuro vy'ibanki  y'isi vyerekana ko ubutunzi bw'u Burundi buhagaze nabi. Umuhinga mu karere k'ibiyaga binini Philippe Reyntjens kuri we, Uburundi ntako bwifashe muri kino gihe. Bwana Reyntjens abona ko ingorane Uburundi burimwo muri kino gihe ari uko kuva Bwana Nkurunziza ashitse ku butegetsi yihutiye cane kuzibira urubuga rwa politike ku batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi, canecane inyuma y'amatora ya 2010. Bwana Reyntjens abona ko ibintu vyagiye kwunyuka gusumba mu mwaka wa 2015, aho avuga ko Perezida Nkurunziza yakoresheje inguvu kugira ngo Sentare yemeze ikiringo ciwe ca gatatu. Ati: "Kuri jewe ivyo ntiyategerezwa kubikora kuko insiguro batanga zitari zifashe na gatoyi". "Kandi noneho twese turazi ko iyo sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro yatewe igitsure, gushika n'aho icegera c'umukuru wayo ata agahunga imbere y'uko inasohora ingingo". Avuga ko kubona hari abarongoye amashirahamwe adaharanira inyungu za politike atari make bataye bagahunga, co kimwe n'abamenyeshamakuru batari bake na bamwe  mu banyepolitike batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi, vyatumye habura ubwisanzure mu gushikiriza ivyuyumviro. Mu mpera z'umwaka wa 2016 ushira umwaka wa 2017, Perezida Petero Nkurunziza yashikirije ijambo igihugu avuga ko ubutunzi bw'u Burundi bwariko buranaguka n'aho igihugu cahagarikiwe imfashanyo n'amahanga. Mu 2011 inyuma y'imyaka itanu y'ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Petero Nkurunziza, yatangaje intumbero yiswe 'Vision 2025' yari igamije guteza imbere ubutunzi n'imibereho y'abarundi, aho ico gihe abakene baharurwa ku bice 67% vy'abarundi bose. Leta, ifatanije n'abasanzwe bayifata mu mugongo, yavuga ko mu 2025 izoba yavanye mu bukene ica kabiri ca bariya 67%. Mu nteguro ya 'Vision 2025' ubutegetsi bwatangaje ko bwifuza ko umurundi ava ku madolari ari munsi ya 140 abona ku mwaka akagera ku madolari 700 mu 2025, ubu (2018) ageze ku madolari 275 ku mwaka (Banki y'isi). Ibiharuro vy'Ibanki y'isi yo mu kwezi kwa gatandatu uyu mwaka ivuga ko Abarundi benshi baba mu mitumba babayeho mu bukene. Ibanki y'isi ivuga ko ubutunzi bw'u Burundi bwasubiye inyuma ku rugero rwa -3.9% mu ndyane zo mu 2016, busubira kandi inyuma kuri -0.6% mu 2016. Ubutunzi bw'iki gihugu bwasubiriye kuduga mu 2018 aho bwageze ku rugero rwa 1,6%. Ibanki y'isi ivuga ko u Burundi bugifise ingorane zo kubona amahera yo gutunga igihugu no gushira mu migambi y'iterambere, hamwe no kubura bikomeye amafaranga y'agaciro. Kuri Bwana Reyntjens ubutegetsi bubi bwa politike bwatumye igihugu kidashobora kubona iterambere muvyo ubutunzi. Agira ati: "Ibiharuro biravyerekana neza". Ku ruhande rwiwe, umuhinga mu vya politike Luc Michel yabwiye BBC ko ingorane Uburundi burimwo ari ikibazo c'intambara y'ukwigarurira isi hagati y'abari ku ruhande rwa Amerika n'incuti zayo, no ku ruhande rw'Uburusiya buri kumwe n'Ubushinwa. Luc Michel yemeza ko hagati ya 2005 na 2015, Uburundi bwari bubeshejweho ahanini n'imfashanyo yatangwa n'ibihugu vy'Uburengerazuba. Kubw'iwe, ibintu vyarahindutse kuva mu 2015, akavuga ko ari ukubera Ubushinwa n'Uburusiya vyashatse kugira uruhara ku mugabane wose wa Afrika, ivyatumye haba ingaruka mbi ku buzima bw'igihugu. Ubutunzi bw'u Burundi bwitezwe kuduga ku rugero rwa 1,8% muri uyu mwaka, nk'uko Ibanki y'isi ibivuga. Mu kwezi kwa gatatu umwaka uheze i Gitega, Perezida Nkurunziza yatangije 'umugambi w'igihugu w'iterambere' (Plan National de Development) wa 2018 - 2027 utegekanya ko ubutunzi bw'igihugu buzokwiyongera ku bice 10,7% muri ico kiringo. Mu kwezi gushize, umurwi ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu w'ishirahamwe ONU wakoze amatohoza uvuga ko wabonye ibikorwa 'bibi cane' bihonyaganga agateka ka zina muntu mu Burundi. Uwo murwi umenyesha Uburundi burangwa n'ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu aho hari "abicwa, abanyuruza, abagapfungwa bitajanye n'amategeko, ukubabarizwa igufa no kuburabuzwa". Bakavuga ko ibi bikorerwa abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi mbere n'imiryango yabo canke abanse kwinjira mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi. Ambasaderi Rénovat Tabu aserukira Uburundi muri uwo murwi wa ONU i Geneve, avuga ko ayo majambo agamije gutyoza igihugu kandi ko ashingiye ku cegeranyo c'ibinyoma. Avuga ati: "Uwo murwi waguye mu mutego w'abanyapolitike". Philippe Reyntjens we avuga ko ubwisanzure buriho mu Burundi ugereranije no mu gihugu kibanyi c'u Rwanda aho avuga ko uwutavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ata kibanza afise. Philippe Reyntjens arizeye ko Petero Nkurunziza atazokwihindukiza mw'ijambo kuvyo yemereye Abarundi n'amakungu ko atazosubira kwitoreza ikindi kiringo. Agira ati: "Bishitse akisubirako akitoza, jewe n'abandi ntivyodutangaza cane, kuko Uburundi bwobonwa nk'ibindi bihugu, aho umukuru w'igihugu adashaka kurekura ubutegetsi". Bwana Reyntjens abona ko mu gihe hoza uwundi mukuru w'igihugu ibintu bifise guhinduka mu bice bitari bike, haba mu migenderanire, muri politike no muvyo ubutunzi kuko yizera ko uwoza yokwihutira gusubiza ibintu ku murongo. Mu ndwi mu kiganiro ku matora caciye kuri radio y'u Burundi umuvugizi w'umukuru w'igihugu Amb Willy Nyamitwe yavuze ko "Uburundi bumaze kwiteza imbere biboneka kandi bwateguye neza amatora ya 2020". Aya matora y'umwaka utaha Bwana Nkurunziza yavuze ko atazokwitoza.

headline: Burundi: Inyuma y'indwi imwe ibitungwa bizosubira kubagwa
text: Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu n'umutekano bumenyesha ko ibitungwa bigiye gusubira kubagwa kuva ku musi wa gatatu w'indwi iza. Ivyo vyashikirijwe n'umunyamabanga ntayegayezwa Martin Niteretse mu nama yagiranye n'abarongoye intara, abarongoye uturere mu gipolisi hamwe n'abajejwe uburimyi n'ubworozi mu ntara. Ingingo yo guhagarika kubaga ibitungwa yari yafashwe kubera iyaduka ry'ingwara y'inyonko yo mu kiyaya ca Rift (Fièvre de la vallée du Rift) Kugira ivyo bishoboke ngo ibitungwa vyo kubagwa bitegerezwa kwegeranirizwa hamwe. Agira ati:"Abayangayanga  bakeneye kuzobaga mubatunganirize aho begeraniriza ibitungwa bashaka kuzobaga mu ndwi iza. "Nta nka izobagwa itavuye aho muri ico kibanza. Kuko ntayizova mu muhana ica ija kubagwa ubwo nyene." Ivyo bitungwa kugira bije kubagwa, bitegerezwa kumara imisi indwi biri mu kibanza categekanijwe mu makomine yose, bigenzurwa ko bitagwaye. Martin Niteretse kandi avuga ko ata nyama izova mw'ikomine zija mu yindi. Nta n'inka zirekuriwe kuvanwa mu ntara zija mu yindi, kiretse ngo izijanywe kubagirwa mu gisagara c'ubutunzi ca Bujumbura. Ariko ngo nko mu ntara zitagira inka nyinshi, abayangayanga baho barashobora kuja kuzigura ahandi, ariko abategetsi b'aho baziguze bategerezwa kubaha urupapuro ruziherekeza. Kandi ico gihe zizoca ziherekezwa n'igipolisi kugira ntihagire izururukira mu nzira canke izuririra mu nzira  zitagenzuwe neza. Icipfuzo ngo n'uko mu ndwi iza hatangura kubagwa inka, hamwe n'impene n'intamaba 'bishobotse'. Abadandaza basabwe kandi kudaca bikika mu kiza ngo baduze ibiciro. Ku bijanye n'urucanco, Martin Niteretse yabasavye kuja gutegura abajejwe ako kazi kugira incanco zishitse bace baja ku kivi. Haraheze amezi arenga abiri hatanzwe itegeko ko kizira kikaziririza kubaga inka, impene n'intama, mu ntumbero yo gukumira inyono yo mu kiyaya ca Rift.

headline: Abashingamateka bane ba Amerika b'abagore bati, 'Ntimugwe mu mutego wa Trump'
text: Abashingamateka bane b'abagore ba Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika batyojwe na Perezida Donald Trump mu butumwa bwiwe ku rubuga rwa Twitter bariyamiriza ivyo yashikirije, bakavuga ko ari ugusamaza. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ejo ku wa mbere, abashingamateka Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, Ilhan Omar, Ayanna Pressley na Rashida Tlaib basaba abanyamerika "kutagwa mu mutego". Umupfasoni Pressley avuga ati: "Ibi ni ugusambura gusa be n'ukurondera gusamaza ngo twibagire amabi atagira izina hamwe n'umugenzo w'igiturire birangwa na buno butegetsi". Perezida Trump yabwiye abo bagore bane - bose bakaba ari Abanyamerika - ko "bashobora kwigira" bakava muri Amerika. Yarishigikiye mu vyo yavuze, ahakana ivyo yagirizwa ko amajambo yiwe yerekana amacakubiri. Abapfasoni Omar hamwe na Tlaib bompi babandanya basaba ko Bwana Trump abogozwa. Ayo majambo ashikirijwe inyuma y'aho ku munsi wa Mungu Bwana Trump ashikirije ubutumwa bw'ugutyoza. Ico gihe yabwiye abo bagore bane - batatu muri bo bakaba bavukiye muri Amerika, umwe nawe, umupfasoni Omar akaba yavukiye muri Somalia - ati: "Ni basubire iyo baje bava, mu bihugu vyabo vyasambutse kandi birangwa n'ubwicanyi". Ayo majambo yariyamirijwe kw'isi yose, akabonwa ko ari amajambo yerekana amacakubiri n'urwanko ku banyamahanga. Umupfasoni Pressley aranegura Prezida Trump avuga ko agerageza "kubashira ku ruhande n'ukubazivya", akongera ko y'uko "barenga abantu bane". Ati: "Umurwi wacu ni munini. Umurwi wacu uhuriyemwo n'umuntu uwo ari we wese anyotewe n'ukwubaka isi y'ubutungane kuri bose". Abo bagore bane b'abashingamateka, bose bakaba batowe mu mwaka wa 2018, rimwe na rimwe bafatwa nk'akarwi. Bose uko ari bane babandanya basaba ko ibibazo bijanye n'amagara y'abantu, ubukozi bw'ikibi buterwa n'ugutunga inkoho, na cane cane ipfungwa ry'abimukira ku rubibe Amerika ihana na Mexique, vyokwitabwaho gusumba. Omar ati: "Amaso yose aduhanze amaso", akiyamiriza "ukwirukana abimukira mu kivunga" hamwe "n'ihungabanywa ry'agateka ka zina muntu ku rubibe". Umupfasoni Omar avuga ko Bwana Trump ukwifatira mu gahanga abo bagore bane batari abazungu "vyerekana umugambi w'ugushira hejuru abazungu", akongera ko y'uko "atakindi yipfuza atari ugucanishamwo igihugu". Nayo umupfasoni Tlaib avuga ko ari "umugambi wiwe w'amacakuri y'urukoba n'urwanko ku banyamahanga ubandanya". Bari imbere y'umurwi w'abashingamateka ku munsi wa gatanu, abapfasoni Ocasio-Cortez, Tlaib na Pressley barerekanye ingene abimukira babayeho nabi mu kigo bashizwemwo. Aba bo mu mugambwe w'aba démocrate bariyamirije cane ingene ubutegetsi bwa Trump buriko burarondera inyishu y'ikibazo c'ugucungera  urubibe, bakavuga ko bufashe nabi cane abimukira. Bwana Trump ashimangira ko hari ikibazo gihanze urwo rubibe, anashigikira ibiriko bikorwa n'intumwa ziwe. Abo bashingamateka bamaze kwerekana ingene bimeze, Bwana Trump yavuze ko ivyo bikorwa vyabanje "kwihwezwa neza". Niho rero yaca atangura kwandika ubutumwa kuri Twitter kuri abo bagore be no ku mupfasoni Omar, akaba yaranabushimangiye ejo ku munsi wa mbere. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru cari  gikaze cane hanze y'ibiro vya Perezida wa Amerika vya Maison Blanche, Bwana Trump yavuze ati: "Nimba utanezerewe, nimba ari ukwama uriko uvuza induru  umwanya wose, urashobora kwigira". Eka no mu gihe abo bagore bariko batanga ikiganiro ku bamenyeshamakuru ku mugoroba wo kuwa mbere, yasubiriye kwandika ashimangira. Ati: "Nimba utanezerewe hano, urashobora kwigira! Urahitamwo, kandi wewe wenyene". Aba démocrate bariyamirije bikomeye umukuru w'igihugu, mu nyuma bakaba bahambijwe n'aba Repubulika batari bake. Bavuga ko amajambo ya Bwana Trump yerekana amacakubiri y'urukoba kandi ko yerekana urwanko ku banyamahanga. Umusenateri w'umurepubulika Mitt Romney yigeze n'ukuba umukandida ku rwego rw'umukuru w'igihugu avuga ko amajambo ya Trump "asambura, asuzuguza kandi acanishamwo". Avuga ati: "Abantu barashobora kudahuza imigambi n'ivyiyumviro vya politike, ariko kubwira Abanyamerika ngo basubire iyo baje bava ni ukurenga umurongo ntarengwa". Umukuru w'inama nshingamateka w'ico gihugu, umu-démocrate Nancy Pelosi, yatangaje urwandiko mu nama nshingamateka rw'ukwiyamiriza ayo "majambo y'agakengere", bikavugwa ko rushobora gucishwa mu nama nshingamateka kugira rwemezwe kuri uyu wa kabiri. Mugenziwe Chuck Schumer wo muri 'Sénat' avuga ko ashobora gutanga ico ciyumviro kugira ngo arabe abarepubulika bashobora kugishigikira. Abakuru b'ibihugu bitari bike vy'incuti za Amerika biyamirije ivyavuzwe na Perezida Trump. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Nouvelle-Zélande, Jacinda Ardern, avuga ko "adashigikiye na gato" Perezida Trump, mu gihe na mugenziwe wa Canada, Justin Trudeau, nawe nyene yiyamirije amajambo ya Bwana Trump. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru yavuze ati: "Uko siko twebwe dukora muri Canada. Umunyacanada ni Umunyacanada". Eka no mu Bwongereza ni uko, aho hampande ya Theresa May, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'ico gihugu, abakandida bompi bariko bahiganirwa ico kibanza bariyamiriza amajambo ya Bwana Trump.
