Jeremy Hunt avuga ko yababajwe cane n'ubutumwa bwo kuri Twitter bwa Bwana Trump, nayo Boris Johnson ati: "Ntushobora gukoresha imvugo nk'iyo y'ukurungika abantu iyo baje bava".

headline: Coronavirus: Ubuhamya bw'umuganga yayirwaye akayikira
text: 'Umusirikare ntatinya gusubira ku rugamba ngo n'uko yahakomerekeye', ayo ni amajambo ya muganga Jean Claude Minani, umwe mu bantu bambere banduye ingwara ya Covid-19  igishika mu Butaliyano, kimwe mu bihugu vyakozweko cane kandi mu minsi ya kare n'iki kiza kicaduka. N'ubwo nawe ubwiwe yayirwaye, ngo ntiyatevye gusubira gutabara abarwayi agitora intege. Yavuganye na Florentine Kwizera kuri ivyo bihe yaciyemwo.... (umva aho hejuru).

headline: Amatora ya France: Macron na Le Pen bagiye guhangana mu gice ca kabiri
text: Emmanuel Macron niwe ari imbere mu gice ca mbere c'amatora y'umukuru w'igihugu yaraye abaye mu Bufaransa, akaba ahanganye n'umukeba wiwe Marine Le Pen wo ku ruhande rw'abagendera ku vyiyumviro vya kera mu gice ca kabiri c'aya matora. Macron yabwiye abanywanyi biwe ati: "Ntihagire uwihenda, ibintu ntibiradadanuka". Yaratsinze cane igice ca mbere c'aya matora, ariko ivyiyumviro biva mu batora vyerekana ko bashobora kwegerana cane mu gice ca kabiri. Umupfasoni Le Pen atera akamo abadashigikye Macron bose kwifatanya nawe "tukagarukana Ubufaransa ku murongo". Mu gihe amajwi 97% amaze guharurwa, Emmanuel Macron afise 27.6% y'amajwi, Marine Le Pen nawe 23.41% mu gihe  Jean-Luc Mélenchon na we afise 21.95%. Umukandida wo ku ruhande rw'abashaka ko ibintu bihinduka Jean-Luc Mélenchon yavyifashemwo neza gusumba mbere mu myaka itanu iheze kandi ubu akaboneka ko ari we afise ububasha bwo kubanguranya. "Kirazira guha ijwi na rimwe Marine Le Pen," niko avuga mu kugabisha abanywanyi biwe, ariko nta kintu na kimwe yavuze co gushigikira umukuru w'igihugu, nk'uko bimeze ku bandi bakandida. Mu masaha yo ku mugoroba w'ejo, abanywanyi ba Mélenchon baranakoraniye ku biro bikuru vyiwe bibaza ko yari kuba n'uwa kabiri ariko siko vyagenze. Mu gihe yaronse ayarenga ica gatanu c'amajwi yose, abatoye Mélenchon bashobora kuba ari bo bafise urupfunguruzo rw'igice ca kabiri c'aya matora, ariko birashoboka ko benshi muri bo bashobora kutitabira igice ca kabiri abandi ntibagire aho bahagaze. Hitoje abantu cumi na babiri, ariko aba ni bo batatu bonyene baronse amajwi arenga 10%. Abenshi mu batora basa n'ababonye ko vyoba vyiza bitoreye muri abo batatu, kuko babona ko abo bandi icenda ata mahirwe na makeya bari bafise yo kuja mu gice ca kabiri. Abenshi muri aba icenda vyaraboneka ko ata mahirwe menshi bari kuronka, ariko amatora ya 2022 azokwama yibukwa ku makuba ashikiye imigambwe ibiri yigeze kuba ari yo yama irongora Ubufaransa, Abarepubulika n'Abasosiyaliste. Yose isa n'iyagiye akagirire, aho umusosiyaliste Anne Hidalgo atashikanye na 2%. Valérie Pécresse wo ku ruhande rw'aba Repubulika yari amaze amezi make ari mw'ihiganwa. Yarakubiswe bimwe bibi, umugambwe wiwe ukaba utanaronse na 5% akenewe kugira ngo usabe ko wosubizwa uburyo wakoresheje mu matora. Iyi ni inkuru y'incamugongo ku mugambwe usanzwe uriko uratabagurika. Imigambwe inaniwe no gushikana 5% ironka gusa ama Euro 800,000 atangwa na reta mu kwitegurira matora , mu gihe Abarepubulika bakoresheje amafaranga arenga kure n'iyo ico gitigiri. Urugamba rwo kurwanira amajwi ruratanguye atavyo gufyina birimwo. Marine Le Pen ashobora gushigikirwa n'abanywanyi ba Eric Zemmour yaje ku mwanya wa kane kubera poritike yiwe ishira imbere inyungu z'Ubufaransa hejuru y'ibindi (nationalism), ku majwi  7%. Eka na Nicolas Dupont-Aignan na we nyene aramushigikiye. Ibi bisigura ko amaze kuronka 33% y'amajwi yose. Abajejwe amatora ku ruhande rwa Macron baza bariko barategura urukurikirane rw'amakoraniro manini hamwe n'ibiganiro bikomeye ku mboneshakure. Abenshi mu bakandida bo ku ruhande rw'abashaka ko ibintu bihinduka (la gauche/the left) baramushigikiye, nka Valérie Pécresse, mbere  uwigeze kwiyamamaza ku ruhande rw'aba Sosiyaliste Ségolène Royal avuga ko umukuru w'igihugu ubu ari ngombwa "gutsinda". Ashikiriza ijambo abanywanyi biwe, Perezida Macron yasa n'uwuvuga yishigikiye akaba yabemereye ko agiye gukora cane gusumba mu gice ca mbere c'imyiyamamazo. Yatanguye imyiyamamazo mu misi umunani imbere y'aha, umutwe wose ukaba wari ku ntambara ya Ukraine. Ati: "Iyo aba bantu bagendera ku vyiyumviro vya kera bikaze mu buryo ubwo ari bwo bwose bafise ikibanza kinini mu gihugu, ntidushobora kuvuga ko ibintu bimeze neza". Yarabwiye ijambo n'abanywanyi ba Le Pen nabo nyene ati: "Ndashaka kubereka mu misi mike iri imbere ko imigambi yacu ari inyishu nyayo ku bwoba bafise n'ibibazo bibahanze muri kino gihe". Umupfasoni Le Pen avuga ko iki gihe ari ico "impinduka zikomeye", ku wa 24 z'uku kwa kane bazotora abantu bafise ivyiyumviro bidasa na gato:  "Hagati y'amacakubiri n'akajagari, canke ugusubiza hamwe Abafaransa n'uburenganzira kuri bose". Yubakiye imyiyamamazo yiwe ku buzima busanzwe buzimvye ku mugabane wose wa Bulaya, yemerera abanywanyi ko azogabanya amakori, akanafuta ikori ku mwimbu ku bantu bari musi y'imyaka 30. Ntiyibanda cane ku gushira imbere inyungu z'Ubufaransa gusa, ariko arashaka ko haba kamarampaka ku bijanye no guhagarika uruja n'uzura rw'abimukira mu gihugu, impinduka zikomeye mw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya hamwe no kubuza za nyambaro za hijab z'aba-Islam mu bibanza bihuriramwo abantu benshi. Imyiyamamazo yagiye gukomera cane mu ndwi zibiri za nyuma, ubwa mbere kubera ikiza ca Covid hanyuma haca haza intambara y'Uburusiya. Ariko igitigiri c'abatoye si gito nk'uko bari bavyiteze, kuko gishika hafi ku 75%. Mw'ijambo yashikirije, vyarumvikana neza ko Macron ategura gukora urugamba rukomeye ku migenderanire ya hafi cane umupfasoni Le Pen afitaniye n'Uburusiya.  N'aho yiyamirije intambara ya Vladimir Putin, yaramugendeye imbere y'amatora aheruka kandi umugambwe wiwe warahawe ingurane n'Uburusiya. Macron ashaka ko Ubufaransa bwunga ubucuti n'ibihugu bikomeye bishira imbere demokarasi kugira ngo bushobore kwikingira, nk'uko abivuga, ha kugira igihugu kizokwitandukanya n'Ubulaya kikarangwamwo n'abanka abanyamahanga. Ica kane c'abatora bashigikiye umukuru w'igihugu, n'aho abarenga ica gatatu bari hagati y'imyaka 18 na 24 bahisemwo Jean-Luc Mélenchon nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo Elabe gikora ivyigwa ku matora. Marine Le Pen yavyifashemwo neza mu bantu bari hagati y'imyaka 35-64,  mu gihe umukuru w'igihugu yakunzwe n'abarenza imyaka 65.

headline: Russia iriko yegeranya ingabo hafi ya Ukraine, OTAN/NATO ifise amakenga
text: Uburusiya buragabisha ishirahamwe ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe OTAN/NATO rihurikiyemwo ibihugu vyo mu burengero ko ritohirahira ngo rirungike ingabo gufasha Ukraine, ni mu gihe hari amakuru avuga ko abasirikare benshi b'Uburusiya bariko biyegeraniriza ku rubibe buhana na Ukraine. Umuvugizi wa Kremlin (ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya), Dmitry Peskov, avuga ko Uburusiya bushobora gufata "izindi ngingo" mu gihe OTAN yofata iyo ngingo. Hari ukurasana kubandanya ku rugero rwo hasi mu buseruko bwa ukraine hagati y'ingabo zayo n'inyeshamba zishaka kwiyonkora zishigikiwe n'Uburusiya. Ingabo za Amerika ku mugabane wa Bulaya zameze magabo cane, zivuga ko "ibitero vy'Uburusiya biriko birarenga inkombe" muri ako karere. Umutegetsi wa OTAN yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ko Uburusiya buriko burahonyanga utwigoro two kugabanya imishamirano mu buseruko bwa Ukraine, kandi ko abaserukira ibihugu vyabo muri iri shirahamwe bakoranye ku wa kane kugira ngo bihweze ingene ibintu bimeze. Ati: "Ibihugu vyose bifise impungenge ku bikorwa vya gisirikare vy'Uburusiya biherutse kuba muri Ukraine no mu micungararo yaho". Umukuru w'igihugu ca Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky nawe yaneguye iyo ngendo y'Uburusiya, akavuga ko "Uburusiya bwamye bufise ingeso yo gukorera imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare ku mbibe no gusotorana". Mu kiyago yaraye agiranye na Perezida Zelensky ejo ku wa gatanu, Perezida Joe Biden  "yashimangiye ko Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zishigikiye cane ubwigenge n'ubusugire bwa Ukraine mu gihe Uburusiya bubandanya ibikorwa vyabwo vy'ubusotoranyi mu turere twa Donbas na Crimea", nk'uko biri mw'itangazo ry'ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu Maison Blanche/White House. Hagati aho, Peskov yagiriza ingabo za Ukraine ziri ku rubuga rw'intambara mu buseruko "ibikorwa vy'agasotoro", aho amasezerano y'uguhagarika intambara yama ariko arahonyangwa uko bukeye uko bwije. Umushikiranganji wa Ukraine ajejwe imigenderanire Dmytro Kuleba yabwiye BBC ko igisirikare c'Uburusiya carungitse ingabo ku rubibe ibi bihugu bisangiye mu buraruko bwa ukraine, co kimwe no mu buseruko, "hamwe kandi no mu karere ka Crimea kigaruriwe bidaciye mu mategeko". Ati: "Twabonye ingabo z'Uburusiya ziriko ziriyubaka mu mpande zitatu. Ukraine ntishaka ko ibintu biyangara, ntabwo dukeneye intambara". Mu gihe amazi yarenga inkombe mu mezi aheze, abasirikare bane ba Ukraine barapfiriye mu gitero cakozwe n'inyeshamba ziharanira ukwiyonkora ku wa 26 z'ukwa gatatu hafi y'umutumba wa Shuma uri mu ntara ya Donesk. Kuva ico gihe hagiye haba ibikorwa bito bito vyo gusotorana. Mu kwezi guheze, Uburusiya bwarakoze imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare mu ntara ya Crimea izungurutswe n'ikiyaga cirabura (Mer Rouge/Black Sea), intara bwigaruriye buyinyaze Ukraine mu 2014. Inyeshamba zirwanira mu ntara ya Donbas iri mu buseruko bwa Ukraine nazo nyene zifashwa n'Uburusiya. Ibihugu vyo mu burengero bivuga ko Uburusiya bubandanya burungika ingabo muri ako gace, hamwe n'ibirwanisjho bikomeye. Kremlin irahakana ayo makuru, ikavuga ko ahubwo "abakorerabushake" b'Abarusiya ari bo bariko bafasha inyeshamba zigaruriye uturere tw'intara za Donetsk na Luhansk mu kwa kane 2014. Hari ireresi itashoboye kwemezwa yakwiragijwe ku rubuga rwa Twitter mu misi iheze yerekana ibimodoka vya burende, inkoho zikomakomeye n'izindi modoka za gisirikare vy'Uburusiya biriko bija ku rubibe rwa Ukraine. Umukuru w'igisirikare ca Ukraine Jenerali Ruslan Khomchak avuga ko Uburusiya bwarungitse za batayo 28 hafi y'urubibe rwa ukraine mu buseruko, hamwe no muri Crimea, ibi bikavuga ko bwoba bwarungitse abasirikare bari hagati ya 20.000 na 25.000. Abategetsi b'Uburusiya ntibemeza aya makuru canke ngo batange ibitigiri nyavyo. Nk'uko Jenerali Khomchak abivuga, Uburusiya bufise hafi  intwazangabo n'abigisha ba gisirikare bababa 3000 mu mirwi y'inyeshamba mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Umuvugizi wa Kremlin  Peskov avuga ati: "Ni uburenganzira bw'Uburusiya kwimurira ingabo zabwo ahantu aho ari ho hose mu gihugu ku butaka bwabwo. Nta n'umwe vyotera umutima uhagaze kandi nta n'umwe bibangamiye". Igisirikare c'Uburusiya cemeje ko muri uno mwaka indege ziriko zirimura abasirikare bangana 4000 zibakura mu ntara ya Volgograd iri mu bumanuko bw'Uburusiya zibajana muri Crimea. Kuva mu 2014, Uburusiya bwarakomeje ibirindiro vy'ingabo zabwo muri Crimea, harimwo n'ikigo gikomeye c'abasirikare barwanira mu mazi kiri ahitwa Sevastopol.

headline: Umunsi ntarengwa ku bihugu vyifuza gusaba kwakira Can 2025
text: Na Oluwashina Okeleji Yandika ku nkino Urwego rw’umupira w’amaguru muri Afrika (Caf) rwashinze itariki 11 Munyonyo(11) nk’umunsi ntarengwa ku bihugu bishaka kumenyesha ko vyifuza kwakira inkino z’igikombe ca Afrika, Can 2025. Hategerezwa kuboneka igihugu gishasha cakira izo nkino inyuma y’aho Guinee (Conakry) yakiwe  uburenganzira kubera amakenga ku bikorwa-remezo vyo kwitegurira izo nkino. Urwo rwego rushaka ko bitarenze itariki 16 Kigarama (12) rwoba rwaronse ku cicaro carwo i Cairo integuro zuzuye z’ibihugu vyifuza kwakira izo nkino zirimwo inyandiko zikenewe, ibisagara vyoberamwo inkino hamwe n’icemezo c’uko reta ibishigikiye. Abagenduzi ba Caf  bazogendera ibihugu bizoba vyatanze integuro z’uko bishaka kwakira inkino kuva itariki 5 gushika kuri 25 Nzero (ukwezi kwa mbere) mu mwaka uza mu butumwa bwo kuja kuraba uwubereye gusubirira Guinee. Ivyo abagenduzi babonye bizoshikirizwa komite nshingwabikorwa ya Caf igizwe n’abantu 24, iyo nayo izoca itangaza igihugu kizokwakira inkino canke ibihugu bizofatanya mu kuzakira ku wa 10 Ruhuhuma (ukwezi kwa kabiri). Umwe mu bategetsi bo hejuru ba Caf yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ko urwo rwego rushaka kwirinda gusubira kumaramara mu guha izo nkino ibihugu “bidashobora kwubaka ibikorwa-remezo n’aho kwakirira abashitsi vyo kwereka amakungu”. Cameroun niyo yakiriye inkino za 2021 uyu mwaka mu gihe Cote d’Ivoire ariyo izokwakira iza 2023, zizokinwa mu ntango z’umwaka wa 2024. Hari ibihugu bimaze kwerekana ko vyifuza gusaba kwakira izo nkino z’igikombe kigira 35, ariko hasigaye ko bibitangaza icese. Moroc, ari nayo yakiriye inkino za nyuma z’igikombe ca Can mu rwego rw’abagore muri Mukakaro(7), ishaka gusaba kwakira inkino z’igikombe c’abagabo naco, nk’uko vyavuzwe n’isoko ryo mu rwego rujejwe umupira w’amaguru muri Maroc. Iciyumviro ca Nigeria co kwakira izo nkino ifatanije na Benin ntaco giherutse kuvugwako kuva Amaaju Pinnick avuye mu mabanga yo kurongora urwego rujejwe umupira w’amaguru muri ico gihugu (NFF). Ivy’uko Algeria, Afrika y’Epfo na Senegal navyo bishobora gusaba kwakira izo nkino vyavuzwe n’abantu gusa, n’ubwo benshi bifuza ko Senegal ariyo yokwakira izo nkino. BBC Sport Africa yamenye ko urwego rw’umupira w’amaguru muri Tunisia rukiriko rurarondera gushigkirwa na reta imbere y’uko ruja mw’ihiganwa. Tunisia niyo yakiriye inkino zo mu 1994 na 2004.

headline: Mason Greenwood: Umusatiziri wa Manchetser United yarekuwe vy’agateganyo
text: Umusatirizi wa Manchester United Mason Greenwood yarekuwe vy'agateganyo inyuma yo guhagarikwa yagirizwa gufata ku nguvu umugore. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 20 yahagaritswe kandi ku wa Mungu yagirizwa ihohotera, inyuma y'uko yagirijwe ku mbuga hwaniro. Mu nyuma yahagaritswe yagirizwa ko yafashe umuntu ku nguvu mbere agatera ubwoba bwo kwica umuntu ku wa kabiri. Manchester United yari yamenyesheje ko uyu musatirizi atari gusubira mu myimenyerezo gushika hafashwe izindi ngingo. Igipolisi ca Greater Manchester cavuze ko Greenwood yahagaritswe inyuma y'aho kimenyeye ko "hari amashusho n'amareresi yashizwe ku mbuga hwaniro n'umugore yavuga ihohotera yakorewe". Iki gipolisi kivuga ko abacamanza bari bategetse ko aguma mu gasho gushika ku wa gatatu ariko ubu yarekuwe vy'agateganyo mu gihe ayandi matohoza akibandanya. Inyuma y'aho uyu musatirizi ahagarikiwe, ikigo EA Sports gikora udukino two kuri videwo cavuze ko Greenwood yakuwe mu dukino twa FIFA. Cavuze ko yari yakuwe mu gakino kitwa FIFA 22 aca akurwa no ku rutonde rw'abo gikoresha mu gakino FIFA Ultimate Team hamwe na Ultimate Draft. Ikompanyi ikora ivyambarwa vy'abanonotsi, Nike, yari yamenyesheje ko ihagaritse imigenderanire n'uyu mukinyi. Umuvugizi wayo yavuze ati: "Turababajwe cane n'ibi birego kandi tuzobandanya dukurikiranira hagufi iki kibazo". Amaze gutangura gukinira Manchester United mu kwa gatatu 2019, Greenwood yarateye igikumu mu kwa kabiri kw'umwaka uheze ku masezerano yo gukinira uyu murwi mu kiringo c'imyaka ine, amaze gutera intambwe nk'umwe mu bigishijwe n'uyu murwi. Ku wa Mungu, uyu murwi wavuze ko "udashobora kwihanganira ihohotera iryo ari ryo ryose" kandi ko wari wamenyeshejwe ivyo uyu mukinyi yagirizwa, ariko ko ataco wari kuvuga imbere y'uko "ukuri kumenyekana ku vyabaye". Mu rindi tangazo ryasohowe ejo ku wa kabiri, uyu murwi washimangiye ko wiyamiriza wivuye inyuma ihohotera iryo ari ryo ryose.

headline: Ukraine: Russia yatanze agahengwe mu bisagara bibiri kugira abahunga bahunge ariko ntikubahirijwe
text: Ingabo z'Uburusiya zabandanije zicucagira ibibombe mu gisagara ca Mariupol kuri uno wa gatandatu, mu gihe bwari bwemeye gutanga agahengwe mu masaha yo mu gitondo - ibi bikaba vyatumye ibikorwa vyo guhungisha abantu bihagarara. Ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw'Uburusiya  bwari bwatangaje  ko butanze agahengwe kuva isaha zine mu masaha ya Moscou mu bisagara bibiri vya  Mariupol na Volnovakha  kugira ngo abasivire bashobore kuva muri ibi bisagara. Ni nyuma y'uko umukuru w'igisagara ca Mariupol asabiye ko botanga agahengwe ku banyagihugu mu gihe kibandanya kizingurijwe, hamwe n'ico yita ibitero vy'ubugome vy'ingabo z'Uburusiya. Ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw'Uburusiya buvuga ko iyi yari ingingo yumvikanyweko n'abategetsi ba Ukraine. Umwe mu baba muri iki gisagara ati: "Ubu ndi muri Mariupol, ndi kw'ibarabara, uko iminota itatu canke itanu iheze numva ibibombe". "Agahengwe katanzwe kugira ngo abantu bashobore gukura meza ntikubahirijwe. Mbona n'amamodoka y'abantu bari bagerageje guhunga ariko aragaruka. Ni akajagari gusa". Kari agahenwe katanzwe inyuma y'aho Vadym Boichenko umukuru w'igisagara ca Mariupol asohoreye itangazo n'umubabaro mwinshi asaba ko amayira y'iki gisagara yokwugururwa kugira abahunga bahunge kuko ata kundi bari bugire. Ati: "Mariupol si amabarabara n'amazu, ni abanyagihugu bayo". Niko gahengwe ka mbere nk'aka kari gatanzwe kuva Uburusiya butanguye igitero ku gihugu ca Ukraine haraciye imisi cumi. Uburusiya buvuga ko bwumvikanye kwugurura amayira hanze y'ibi bisagara. Boichenko ati: "Bivanye n'uko abaduteye babandanya baducucagira amabombe ata kigongwe, nta kundi turi bugire atari uko twoha abahaba … akaryo ko kuva muri Mariupol mu mahoro". Haciye amasaha atatu aka gahengwe kategerezwa gutangura isaha zine mu masaha ya Moscou gatangajwe, abategetsi ba Mariupol bahavuye batangaza ko igikorwa cari gitegekanijwe co guhungisha abantu cahagaze kubera ibibombe vyabandanije vyisukira. Itangazo basohoye rivuga riti: "Dusavye abantu i Mariupol gusubira mu mazu yabo, turabamenyesha ibijanye no kubahungisha ni vyakunda". "Kubera Uburusiya butariko burubahiriza agahengwe bukabandanya butera Mariupol no mu micungararo yayo, ivyo guhungisha abantu bibaye birabangira". Uburusiya ntaco buratangaza kuri ibi bivugwa, ariko umushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi butangaza ko abasivire batakoresheje amayira yari yuguruye kuva i Mariupol na  Volnovakha bwongera bwagiriza abategetsi ba Ukraine ko ari bo babujije abantu guhunga, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ibinyamakuru vy'Uburusiya. Mariupol ni igisagara kiri ku nkengera y'inyanja mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Ukraine gituwemwo n'abantu 450.000, kikaba kigoswe n'ingabo z'Uburusiya kakdn ikbandanya giterwa amabombe. Mu gihe coramuka gifashwe, koba ari akaryo Uburusiya buronse bwo kugenzura kimwe mu bivuko bikomeye vy'igihugu ca Ukraine kandi bugaca buronka umuhora ufatanya ya ntara ya Crimée/Crimea bwigarurira mu 2014 hamwe na twa turere twiganziwe n'inyeshamba zishigikiwe n'Uburusiya mu ntara za Luhansk na Donetsk, Volnovakha yoyo ni agasagara gato kari mu buraruko bwa Mariupol kakaba karangwamwo intambara zikomeye kuva iki gitero gitangura.

headline: Korea ya Ruguru igabisha Amerika ko izofata ‘ingingo ruhasha’ ku myimenyerezo rusangi itanguye
text: Na Yvette Tan BBC News Korea ya Ruguru iragabisha Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ko izofata “ingingo ruhasha” mu gihe zitohagarika imyimenyerezo rusangi ya gisirikare na Korea y’Epfo. Ejo ku wa mbere, Amerika na Korea y’Epfo vyatanguye imwe mu myimenyerezo rusangi ikomeye y’igisirikare kirwanira mu kirere itegekanijwe kurangira ku wa gatanu. Korea ya Ruguru iherutse kandi gutera ibisasu vya misire mu ndwi ziheze mu myimenyerezo nk’iyo itari mike. Ibi bije bikurikira amakuru ava mw’igendereza yerekana ko Pyongyang iriko itegura igerageza ry’ikirwanisho ca nikleyeri ca mbere kuva mu 2017. Itangazo ry’ubushikiranganji bwa Korea ya Ruguru bujejwe imigenderanire rivuga riti: "Mu gihe Amerika yobandanya n’aka gasotoro kabi ka gisirikare, [Korea ya Ruguru] izofata ingingo zindi zikomeye”. "Nimba [Amerika] idashaka ikintu gikomeye kibi ku mutekano wayo, ikwiye guhagarika imyimenyerezo y’intambara ataco imaze ata n’akamaro kayo vuba bwango. Atari uko, niyo izobazwa ibizoshika vyose”. Imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare ya kino gihe yiswe Vigilant Storm (twogereranya mu Kirundi na ‘Igihuhusi kiri maso’), irimwo amajana n’amajana y’indege zikora ibitero vyo gusamaza amasaha 24 kuri 24. Mu ntango z’ukwa cumi, Washington yarungitse ubwato bwa nikleyeri bwikorera indege  USS Ronald Reagan, hafi y’ikigwa ca Korea, ikintu abatari bake babona ko ari ukugabisha Korea ya Ruguru -  ubwo bwato bukaba bwaragize uruhara mu myimenyerezo itari mike yo mu mazi. Seoul (umugwa mukuru wa Korea y’Epfo) ivuga ko irungikwa ry’ibi birwanisho “ridakunze kuba” ryerekanye ko “urunani rwa Korea y’Epfo na Amerika rwiteguye kwivuna bikomeye ku gasotoro ako ari ko kose kova muri Korea ya Ruguru”. Ubu bwato muri kino gihe buri mu bikorwa vy’imyimenyerezo y’indege mu kiyaga Philippine. Mu kw’icumi, Pyongyang (umugwa mukuru wa Korea ya Ruguru) yatangaje ko ibisasu vyayo yarashe kwari “ukwigana” igitero ca nikleyeri kuri Korea y’Epfo. Ivuga ko yiganye neza ibitero bishobora gukorwa ku birindiro vya gisirikare, ibivuko n’ibibuga vy’indege vya Korea y’Epfo, kandi ko ibisasu vya misire vyatewe vyikorera ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri. Mu kw’icenda, indongozi ya Korea ya Ruguru Kim Jong-un yatangaje ko igihugu ciwe ari igihugu ca nikleyeri “mu buryo ntasubira inyuma”, aca ahindura amategeko, kugira agihe uburenganzira bwo gukoresha ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri mu ntumbero yo kuzibira. Poritike ya kare yari iyo gukoresha ibi birwanisho mu kwivuna igitero. Korea yarongereje kandi akariro mw’igerageza ry’ibisasu vya misire muri uno mwaka, aho vyageragejwe incuro zirenga 40 gushika ubu, iki kikaba ari co gitigiri kinini gushika ubu. N’aho yafatiwe ibihano biyiboheye amaboko i mugongo, Pyongyang yaragerageje ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri incuro zitandatu hagati ya 2006 na 2017.

headline: El Clasico: Urukino hagati ya Barcelona na Real Madrid rwigijwe inyuma ku gutinya imvururu
text: Urukino rw'umupira w'amaguru ruzwi nka El Clasico rw'uno mwaka hagati ya Barcelona na Real Madrid rwigijwe inyuma kubera ubwoba bw'uko hokwaduka akaguma. Urwo rukino rwo mu ciciro ca mbere c'umupira w'amaguru wo muri Esipanye, rwagomba kuba itariki 26 z'ukwa cumi, ariko haraciye iminsi hari imyiyerekano i Barcelona. Iyo myiyerekano yatanguye nyuma y'aho abarongozi icenda b'abaharanira ukwiyonkora kw'intara ya Calalonia batariwe muri yombi. Yaba Barcelona canke Real Madrid, zose zaranse ivyasabwa vy'uko urwo rukino rwokwimurirwa i Madrid. Ayo makipe yasavye ko urwo rukino rwokwimurirwa kuwa gatatu itariki 18 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri. Umumenyereza Ernesto Valverde yavuze ko Barcelona idashaka ko urwo rukino rwimurirwa i Madrid kuko bazoja i Salvia Prague mu rukino rwa Champions League itariki 23 z'ukwa cumi, iminsi itatu imbere y'itariki El Clasico yagomba kuberako. Umumenyereza wa Real Madril, Zinedine Zidane, yabajijwe ivyerekeye kwimura urwo rukino mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru uno munsi, aca avuga ati "tuzoba twiteguye gukina kw'itariki tuzobwirwa n'ababijejwe." Yongeyeko ati "tuzokora ivyo vyose tuzosabwa." Uburongozi bw'ihiganwa La Liga bwigije inyuma urwo rukino nyuma yo kubisabwa kubera "imvo zidasanzwe zirengeye ubushobozi bwabwo" kuko hategekanijwe iyindi myiyerekano  ku munsi urwo rukino rwobereyeko.

headline: Whoopi Goldberg yahagaritswe na ABC kubera amajambo yavutse kw’ihonyabwoko ryakorewe Abayahudi
text: Whoopi Goldberg yahagaritswe mu biganiro vyo kuri televiziyo yo muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika inyuma y'aho avugiye ko ihonyabwoko ryakorewe Abayahudi (rikunze kwitwa "Holocaust")  ryavuye ku "mirwi ibiri y'abazungu". ABC News ivuga ko Goldberg azomara indwi zibiri atabonetse inyuma "y'amajambo yiwe y'ibinyoma kandi ababaje". Uyu munyatugenegene akongera akaba umuntu azwi cane ku mboneshakure yavugiye mu kiganiro ca ABC, The View, ko ihonyabwoko aba Nazi bakoreye Abayahudi ritari "rishingiye ku bwoko". Aba Nazi, bo biyita ko ari "ubwoko busumba amoko yose" bw'aba Aryens/Aryan, bagandaguye Abayahudi bagera ku miriyoni zitandatu muri iryo honyabwoko. Yarasavye imbabazi ariko aca akora ayandi makosa mu gihe yariko agerageza gusigura amajambo yavuze mu kiganiro kindi cabaye mw'ijoro. Mw'itangazo ryaraye ryandikiwe abakozi mw'ijoro ry'ejo ku wa kabiri, umukuru wa ABC News Kim Godwin  yanditse ati: "Kuva ubu nyene, ndahagaritse vy'agateganyo Whoopi Goldberg mu kiringo c'indwi zibiri ku majambo yiwe y'ibinyoma kandi ababaje". "N'aho Whoopi yasavye imbabazi, namusavye afate akanya ko kwiyumvira yongere yige ku nkurikizi z'amajambo yiwe. "Ishirahamwe ryose rya ABC News ririfatanije na bagenzacu bose b'Abayahudi, incuti n'umuryango wose w'Abayahudi". Yongerako ati: "Izi ngingo ntizoroshe na gato, ariko ni nkenerwa", nk'uko vyandikwa n'ikinyamakuru Hollywood Reporter co muri Amerika. "Mu ndwi iheze, namenyesheje ko umuco wa ABC News utomoye, usonera buri muntu, uhuza bose, ugasonera bose kandi ukorera mu muco. Amajambo ya Whoopi ntajanye n'izi ndangagaciro". Mu masaha ya kare y'ejo ku wa kabiri, Goldberg yasavye imbabazi ubugira gatatu. "Mu kiganiro, yavuze ati: "Ejo mu kiganiro naravuze nabi". "Ihonyabwoko ryakorewe Abayahudi ubusanzwe rishingiye ku bwoko, kuko Hitler n'aba Nazi bafata ko Abayahudi ari ubwoko bwo hasi". "Ubu, amajambo afise uburemere, kandi na rwanje ni uko nyene. Ndababajwe n'amajambo yanje kandi ndemeye ko nakoze amakosa. Ndifatanije kandi n'abayahudi". Uyu munyatugenegene yigeze gutsindira agashimwe ka Oscar akaba aremesha ikiganiro The View kuva mu 2007, yatanguye kuvuga aya majambo yateje impari mu kiganiro co ku wa mbere igihe yariko avuga ku ngingo y'ishure ryo muri Teneessee yo kubuza igitabo c'ibicapo ku bijanye n'ihonyabwoko ry'Abayahudi ku mvo z'uko ngo cerekana abantu bambaye ubusa, kigacafuza kandi kikerekana abiyahura. Bimaze kuvyura icuka kibi, yaciye asaba imbabazi haciye amasaha make. Ariko  mu kiganiro ca CBS, The Late Show, cari kiremeshejwe na Stephen Colbert ku wa mbere mw'ijoro, mu gihe yariko agerageza gusigura amajambo yashikirije, yavuze ko aba Nazi babeshe kandi ko mu bisanzwe bari bafise ibibazo bishingiye ku bwoko atari ku rukoba, amajambo yateje ibindi bibazo. Si bwo bwa mbere Goldberg ateje ibibazo. Mu 2009, yavuze ko indongozi y'amareresi Roman Polanski  - yari yemeye icaha co gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n'umwana muto" mu 1997 - ata caha co "gufata ku nguvu nya gufata ku nguvu" yakoze. Yarashigikiye kandi Bill Cosby yagirizwa ivyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu, imbere y'uko yigarura amaze kubona ko yateje icuka kibi.

headline: Intambara yo muri Ukraine: Russia yahinduye Donbas umuriro udahera - Zelensky
text: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky yagiriza Uburusiya ko bwahinduye akarere ka Donbas kari mu buseruko bukakagira "umuriro udahera", ni mu gihe intambara aho zibica bigacika. Mw'ijambo yaraye ashikirije mw'ijoro ry'ejo ku mugwa mukuru Kyiv, yavuze ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zasambuye ako karere kose. Ati: "Ibitero ni urutavanako mu karere ka Odesa, ku bisagara vyo hagati muri Ukraine. Donbas yasambuwe rwose". Zelensky yongerako ati: "Uburusiya nta nsiguro ya gisirikare kandi ntayo bushobora kugira mu gukora ibi vyose". "Ubu ni ubukozi bw'ikibi bwo gushaka kwica n'ibigirankana abanyagihugu ba Ukraine benshi bashoboka. Gusenyura imihana myinshi, inyubakwa n'amahinguriro menshi ashoboka". Ejo ku wa kane, umushikiranganji wa Ukraine ajejwe kwivuna abansi yagirije Uburusiya kwongereza ibitero muri Donbas no kubuza abasivire guhunga. Uburusiya bwimuriye urugamba hafi rwose mu buseruko bwa Ukraine, inyuma y'aho bukuriye ingabo zabwo mu micungararo y'umugwa mukuru Kyiv. Urugamba rw'aka karere ka Ukraine kahoze karwiriyemwo amahinguriro kazwi nka Donbas ishobora kwerekana iherezo ry'igitero c'Uburusiya. Donbas irwiriyemwo abakoresha ururimi rw'ikirusiya kandi Abarusiya babandanya bavuga ko bashaka "kubohoza" aka karere karimwo intara zibiri ziherutse gutangaza ko ziyonkoye kuri Ukraine za Luhansk na Donestsk. Kwigarurira aka karere bishobora gutuma Moscou ironka ikiraro c'ubutaka ku rubibe rw'Uburusiya ku ruhande rw'ubumanuko, maze igashobora kugenzura irungikwa ry'amazi mu karere ka Crimée/Crimea yigaruriye mu 2014. Ingabo z'Uburusiya zariko kandi ziragerageza kugota ingabo za Ukraine muri ako karere. Abasirikare ba Kyiv bakomeye kandi bamenyereye intambara bababa 40.000 bari muri Donbas, vyumvikana ko mu gihe Volodymry Zelensky yobatakaza coba ari ikibazo gikomeye kuri we muri ino ntambara. Ariko muri iyi misi ya vuba iheze, abihweza ibintu n'ibindi mu vya gisirikare bavuga ko ibintu bitoroheye Uburusiya, kuko ingabo zabwo zirukanywe mu gisagara ca Kharkiv zigatera zija amaja ku rubibe rw'Uburusiya. Ni mu gihe buramatari mushasha w'intara ya Kherson iri mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine iherutse gufatwa avuga ko vuba izokwegekwa ku Burusiya. Volodymyr Saldo yashizweho n'ingabo z'Uburusiya inyuma yo kwigarurira ako karere mu ntango z'ukwa gatatu, yanditse ku rubuga rwa Telegram ko ishobora kuba "akarere ka Kherson kegukira Uburusiya". Icegera ciwe, Kirill Stremousov, yandika ko ababa muri ako karere bazoshobora gusaba ubwenegihugu bw'Uburusiya mu ndwi ziri imbere igihe ibintu bizoba bisubiye mu buryo. Abategetsi ba Ukraine babandanya bagabisha ko Moscou itegura kamarampaka y'amanyanga yo kwemeza ukwikukira kw'ako karere n'ahandi. Ariko, abategetsi b'Uburusiya ntibaremeza ko uturere buherutse kwigarurira mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine turi hafi yo kubwegekwako, mu gihe umuvugizi wa Kremlin, Dmitry Peskov mu ntango z'uku kwezi yavuze ko kazoza k'aka karere kazovana n'ugushaka kw'abakabamwo.

headline: Ubwo OMS izoshobora guhangana n’ingorane z’uburyo Amerika niyiyonkora?
text: Inyuma y'aho Perezida Donald Trump wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika amenyeshereje ko agiye kwiyonkora mw'ishjirahamwe OMS rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, ibibazo ni vyinshi. David Nabarro, intumwa idasanzwe mu bijanye na Covid-19 mw'ishirahamwe OMS, avuga ko ingingo ya Amerika yo kwiyonkora izotuma uyo muryango utakaza amafaranga atari make. Muganga Nabarro yabwiye BBC ko ubu OMS isanzwe "ifise ubukene bw'amafaranga". OMS isanzwe ironka amafaranga avuye mu ntererano zitegerezwa gutangwa mu buryo ngombwa canke ku gushaka, zigatangwa n'ibihugu biyigize hamwe n'amashirahamwe atari make yigenga. Amerika yategerezwa gutanga ibice 20% mu ntererano ngombwa muri uno mwaka wa 2020 - nta n'urumeya yigeze itanga. OMS isanzwe ifise ingorane z'uko hari ibihugu bitari bike biyiheraniye. Gushika ku wa 30/06 uno mwaka, yaronkejwe uburyo buri musi y'ibice 60% vy'intererano ngombwa muri uno mwaka. Ariko biboneka ko intererano zitangwa ku gushaka ari zo zikomeye gusumba, nk'uko ibiharuro vyo mu 2018 bivyerekana, aho igice kinini c'amafaranga ikoresha cavuye muri iyo ntererano. Muri uyo mwaka, izo ntererano zarenga imiliyaridi zibiri, aho Amerika ari yo yatanze menshi, yangana n'ibice 12%, mu gihe ishirahamwe rya wa mutunzi ruhebwa kw'isi, Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation, naryo ryatanze ibice 10% vy'intererano zitangwa ku gushaka. Intererano zitanzwe ku gushaka zagiye zifata ikibanza kinini uko imyaka yagenda, zigashobora kuba kirumara gusumba muri kino gihe Amerika iriko irivumbura muri iryo shirahamwe,

headline: Xi Jinping w’Ubushinwa ari mu rugendo muri Koreya ya Ruguru mu ntumbero y’ugukomeza ubucuti
text: Umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubushinwa, Xi Jinping, ari mu rugendo muri Koreya ya Ruguru, aho yagiye kubonana na mugenziwe w'ico gihugu Kim Jong-un. Nirwo rugendo rwa mbere akoze muri ico gihugu kuva mu mwaka wa 2005. Hampande y'ivyerekeye ubutunzi, vyitezwe ko abo bategetsi babiri baza kuganira kandi ku vyerekeye ibiganiro vyahagaze ku mugambi wa Koreya ya Ruguru w'uguhingura ibirwanisho vy'ubumara. Ni urugendo rubaye indwi imwe imbere y'uko haba inama izohuza ibihugu 20 bitunze kurusha ibindi kw'isi (G-20) izobera mu Buyapani, aho Bwana Xi yiteze kubonana na Perezida Donald Trump wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi babona ko Bwana Xi akeneye kumenya ivyatumye ibiganiro hagati ya Trump na Kim bihagarara, nimba kandi hashobora kuboneka inzira yo kubibandanya. Bwana Xi ashobora kuvugana na Bwana Trump ku vyo azoba yavuganye na Kim. Ikintu nyamukuru Ubushinwa bwipfuza, ni uko hoba ituze muri Koreya ya Ruguru, maze ivyo bihugu vyompi bigatsimbataza imigenderanire muvyo ubutunzi. Ubushinwa kandi bwipfuza ko bwogira uruhara ruboneka mu biganiro vyerekeye umugambi w'inguvu za nukleyeri. Imigenderanire hagati y'ivyo bihugu vyompi vya gikomuniste imaze igihe kirekire, ariko imigenderanire yarahungabanye mu myaka cumi iheze, kubera Ubushinwa butakiriye neza umugambi wa Koreya ya Ruguru wo guhingura ibirwanisho vy'ubumara. Ikinyamakuru cegamiye ubutegetsi bw'Ubushinwa camenyesheje ejo ku wa gatatu ko urwo rugendo rushobora gutuma abo bategetsi bompi "bashika ku masezerano aboneka ajanye n'ugufashanya". Urwo rugendo ni akaryo ka Bwana Kim ko kwerekana ko agishigikiwe n'Ubushinwa. Jenny Town arongoye urubuga ngurukanabumenyi 38 North rwa Amerika avuga ko Abanyakoreya ya ruguru"bashaka kugumana imigenderanire n'abagenzi babo. Ariko avuga ko batizeranye cane, kandi ko ata gushaka kwinshi kwibonekeza hagati yabo. Ubushinwa bwarashigikiye ibihano muvyo ubutunzi vyafatiwe Koreya ya Ruguru, ariko buripfuza ko vyotezurwa kugira ngo nayo yumve ko yoheba umugambi wayo w'ugukora ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda. Umuhinga ku gihugu ca Koreya ya Ruguru, Peter Ward, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ubushinwa bwipfuza kubona ubutunzi bwa Koreya ya Ruguru butera imbere, kugira ngo nayo ntiyumve ko ikeneye kugerageza ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda vy'ubumara".

headline: Cristiano Ronaldo: indege yakoze imyiyerekano ku vyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu yagirizwa
text: Icapa kiriko ivyandiko vyo gushigikira umugore yagiriza umukinyi rurangiranwa Cristiano Ronaldo ko yamusambanije ku nguvu  cacishijwe hejuru y'ikibuga Old Trafford mu gihe hariko haba urukino rwa Manchester United. Umuhari w'abagore Level Up uvuga ko babikoze kugira ngo bibutse abarorerezi ibijanye n'ivyo uyu mukinyi yagirizwa vyo gusambanya ku nguvu. Kathryn Mayorga avuga ko yafashwe ku nguvu n'uyu mukinyi mw'ihoteri ya Las Vegas mu 2009. Mu 2019, abashikirizamanza ba Amerika bavuze ko Ronaldo, asanzwe ahakana ibi birego, atashobora kurengutswa mu butungane. Indege ifise icapa "#Believe Kathryn Mayorga" (ni ukuvuga ngo "Emera Kathryn Mayorga") yagurutse hejuru y'ikibuga urukino uyu murwi wariko ukina na Newcastle United rutanguye. Uyu mukinyi w'umunya Portugal yinjije ibitsindo bibiri mu rukino rwiwe rwa mbere akiniye Manchester United inyuma y'imyaka 12, aho aba ba Reds birahiye Newcastle United 4-1. Umupfasoni Mayorga avugwa ko yoba yarumvikanye na Ronaldo ko bobirangiza atarinze kwitwara mu 2010, akaba yoba yamwemereye kumuha igipfukamunwa c'amadorari 375.000 y'abanyamerika yemeye ko atazobishira hejuru. Ababuranira Ronaldo bavuga ko uwo mwumvikano "uterekana na gato ko yemera icaha". Bavuga ko uyu mukinyi yemeye gutanga aya mahera akurikije impanuro yahawe "ko yohagarika ibi birego biteye isoni kugira ngo izina ryiwe ntiricafuzwe kubera amateka yiwe yashitseko mu buryo bugoye, kubera ubushobozi bwiwe". Mu 2018, umupfasoni Mayorga yarashatse gusubira kwugurura urubanza, aho umugore amuburanira yavuze ko yatewe intege n'isekeza ryiswe #MeToo (na jewe) ryo kurwanya ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina. Igipolisi ca Las Vegas cakoze amatohoza kuri ibi birego kivuga ko "ata vyemezo nyavyo biriho", ko rero kidashobora gutegeka ko Ronaldo arengutswa mu butungane. Umushikirizamanza w'akarere yavuze ko umupfasoni Mayorga yamenyesheje ko yafashwe ku nguvu mu 2009, ariko akaba yaranse kuvuga aho vyabereye canke kuvuga uwabimukoreye, "ivyatumye igipolisi kidashobora gukora amatohoza yimbitse". Ronaldo ntahakana ko yabonanye n'uyu mugore, ariko ko babonanye bavyumvikanye igihe yari hafi yo kuva muri Manchester United aja muri  Real Madrid. Mu 2018, yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Sinemera na gato ivyo nagirizwa. Icaha co gufata ku nguvu ni icaha c'agahomerabunwa kitajanye n'ico ndi n'ukwizera kwanje". Ishirahamwe Level Up rivuga ko ryashaka "gusambura iri hayagizwa" ry'uyu mukinyi avugwa birenze urugero ko yagarutse muri Manchester United. Umwe mu barirongoye Janey Starling avuga ko bashatse gutanga "ubutumwa ku bakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru ko ibirego vyo gufata ku nguvu atawushobora kubizibira mu kibuga".

headline: Pierre Buyoya yahoze arongoye u Burundi yashengeye ku myaka 71
text: Pierre Buyoya yabaye Prezida w'Uburundi mu biringo bitandukanye gushika ku myaka 13, yashengeye afise imyaka 71. Umuntu umwe wo muryango wiwe yabwiye BBC ko yahitanywe na Covid-19 kandi ko yaguye i Paris mu Bufaransa. Umudipolomate umwe w'igihugu ca Buraya na we yemeje inkuru y'urupfu rwa Pierre Buyoya. Mu kwezi kw'icumi k'uyu mwaka, ubucamanza bw'Uburundi bwamuciriye igihano co gupfungwa ubuzima bwiwe bwose ahamwe n'ivyaha bine bifatiye kw'igandagurwa ry'umuhisi Prezida Melchior Ndadaye. We co kimwe n'abandi 18 bagirizwa kugira uruhara mw'igandagurwa ry'umukuru w'igihugu wa mbere yatowe n'abanyagihugu mu nzira ya demokarasi, Prezida Melchior Ndadaye. Mu kwezi kwa 11, Buyoya  yatangaje ku mugaragaro ko atanze imihoho mu mabanga yiwe aho yahora aserukira ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Afrika muri Mali no mu karere ka Sahel. Mu kiganiro ico gihe yagiranye n'abanyamakuru i Bamako muri Mali, Buyoya yavuze ko ari ingingo yafashe we nyene ubwiwe kugira ngo ahangane n'uru rubanza.

headline: Ukraine: ikivuko ca Odesa catewe amabombe inyuma y’amasaha make habaye amasezerano
text: Ibibombe vyanyiganyije ikivuko gikomeye ca Ukraine inyuma y’umusi umwe gusa Kyiv na Moscou bashitse ku masezerano yotumye intete za Ukraine zisubira gushorwa hanze. Ibisasu bibiri vya misire vyatewe mu gisagara ca Odesa gifise ikivuko mu masaha yo mu gaturuturu ko kuri uno wa gatandatu, nk’uko igisirikare ca Ukraine kibimenyesha. Nk’uko biri muri ano masezerano yaraye ashitsweko, Uburusiya bwemeye kudatera ibivuko bizoba bifise intete ziriko zishorwa hanze. Ishirahamwe ONU  rivuga ko ano masezerano ari “ikimenyetso c’umwizero” inyuma y’intambara imaze amezi. Mu butumwa bwacishijwe ku mbuga hwaniro, ibiro vya gisirikare mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine bivuga ko ibisasu bibiri vya misire zo mu bwoko bwa Kalibr vyaguye kuri iki kivuko, mu gihe ibindi bibiri navyo vyakorowe n’igisata kirwanira mu kirere. Oleksiy Honcharenko, umushingamateka w’akarere, yanditse kuri Telegram ko iki gitero catumye haduka umuriro mu kivuko c’iki gisagara. "Iyi mihimbiri itera igikumu ku masezerano n’ukuboko kumwe mu gihe ukundi nako gutera misire”, niko Honcharenko yanditse. "Nico gituma dukeneye indege kugira ngo dusenyure amato y’intambara yose y’Uburusiya ari mu Nyanja yirabura. Iyi ni yo nzira yonyene yo gushobora gushora hanze intete”. Ntibiramenyekana neza nimba hari abapfuye n’abakomeretse, canke nimba hari ibintu vyononekaye. Ejo ku wa gatanu, abategetsi ba Kyiv na Moscou barateye igikumu ku masezerano yotumye imiriyoni n’imiriyoni z’amatoni y’intete zugaraniwe muri Ukraine zishobora gushorwa hanze. Nk’uko bivugwa n’abaserukizi b’ibihugu, bimwe mu vyo bemeranije ni uko Uburusiya budatera ibivuko mu gihe bizoba biriko birasohora ibidandazwa hanyuma Ukraine nayo ikaba yemeye guherekeza imizigo mu mazi yuzuye ama mines. Aya masezerano – akaba yafashe amezi abiri kugira ashikweko – yiteze kubandanya mu kiringo c’imisi 120, akazoba ahagarariwe kandi akurikiranirwa hagufi n’ibiro bizoshingwa i Istanbul muri Turukiya, bikazoreramwo abategetsi ba ONU, Turukiya, Ukraine n’ab’Uburusiya. Arashobora kwongerezwa ikiringo mu gihe impande zompi zovyumvikanako. Andriy Yermak, umukuru w’ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu Volodymyr Zelensky, ariyamiriza iki gitero akagiriza Uburusiya ko “bubandanya buteza ikibazo c’imfungurwa”. Umuvugizi w’ubushikiranganji bwa Ukraine bujejwe imigenderanire, Oleh Nikolenko yongeyeko ati: "Iyi misire y’Uburusiya ni amate Vladimir Putin aciriye ku munyamabanga mukuru w’ishirahamwe ONU, António Guterres no kuri Perezida Recep Erdogan wa Turukiya, bitanze uko bashoboye kwose habe aya masezerano, mbere Ukraine ikaba ibashimira cane”. Iki gitero kibaye mu gihe abategetsi bo mu bushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw’Ubwongereza bavuga ko ingabo z’Uburusiya mu ntara ya Kherson zishobora kubura ingene zironswa ivya nkenerwa kubera amayira ashobora gukatwa n’ingabo za Ukraine. Kyiv yaratanguje igitero gikomeye co kwivuna mu bumanuko bw’igihugu, kandi ingabo zayo zarakoresheje inkoho zirasa kure ibisasu vya misire zatanzwe na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika  mu gutera ikiraro ca Antonovsky i Kherson. Mu gihe iki kiraro cobomorwa, Uburusiya ntibwokworoherwa gushikira ingabo zabwo.

headline: Imvo n'imvano iganira na bamwe mu barundi ku matora yo ku wa 20.05.2020 mu Burundi
text: Muri kino kiganiro Imvo n'imvano, Prudent Nsengiyumva aganira na bamwe mu banyagihugu b'Abarundi ku vyerekeye amatora yo ku wa 20.05.2020 mu Burundi.

headline: Qatar 2022-Brezili Vs Croatia: 'Uzoba umubabaro w’igihe kirekire’
text: Ntivyategerezwa kurangira uko vyarangiye. Brezili yarakinye, iragenda gushika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma (1/4) muri rino higanwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose, ariko rero indoto z’uko yari igiye kwerekana ubuhinga budasanzwe gushika muri finale zaraye zirangiye mu marira mu kibuga Education City Stadium. Croatia yarakweze Brezili buke buke gushika muri wa mwanya w’ama-penalties kugira ngo iyizimirize ibizigizigi vyayo vy’igikombe kigira gatandatu, igihugu co ku mugabane wa Bulaya kikaba caraye gisubiye kuyitembagaza mu kuyikura mw’ihiganwa. Igihe Neymar yinjiza igitsindo muri wa mwanya w’inyogera, igitsindo catumye anganya ibitsindo na ca gihangange Pele mu murwi nserukiragihugu ku ruhande rw’abagabo, vyaboneka ko yagomba abe intwari ariko yagiye kuva mu kibuga arira, muri uru rukino rushobora kuba ari rwo rwa nyuma kuri we mu gikombe c’isi yose. Inyuma y’urukino, vyaremejwe ko umumenyereza Tite agiye gutanga imihoho, uyu mugabo w’imyaka 61 akaba yarananiwe no guha igihugu irindi teka ryokwiyongereye ku ryo yagiteye mu 2019 mu gutsindira Copa Amerika, ihiganwa ry’igikombe ca Amerika y’Epfo, mu gihe Neymar nawe yavuze ko ashobora gukukuruka mu nkino mpuzamakungu. Bamaze gutsindwa, Tite  yavuze ati: "Mu vy’ukuri biragoye cane. Ariko ni iherezo ryanje mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Brezili. Narabivuze haraciye umwaka n’inusu”. Umuhinga mu bijanye n’umupira w’amaguru muri Amerika y’Epfo Tim Vickery yavugiye kw’iradiyo BBC Radio 5 Live ati: "Uru ni urupfu mu muryango. "Niko bigiye kugendera abafana ba Brezili mu masaha ari imbere. Croatia irashize mu kigandaro iki gihangange mu mupira w’amaguru. Ni ukuri iki kizotera umubabaro w’igihe kirekire . "Ndizeye ko abantu batazobatako ishavu. Abanyabrezili barashobora kurakara. Ariko ndizeye ko ata ngaruka mbi iza kuba kuko si yo mpembo uyu murwi ukwiriye”. Iminota 90 ya mbere yari iryoheye ijisho, ariko impande zompi vyaranse ko zitsindana, biba ngombwa ko baja muri wa mwanya w’inyongera (prolongation/Extra time). Croatia imaze gushika aho incuro umunani mu nkino icenda yakinye muri ca gice co gukuranamwo mu nkino nkuru nkuru. Neymar yibajije ko yari agarukiye igihugu ciwe mu gihe nyaco cari kimukeneye cane, maze yinjiza igitsindo ku mupira bari bagiye bahererekanya n’ubuhinga bwinshi. Igitsindo yinjije ku munota wa 106 cagize 77 atsindiye igihugu ciwe, gutyo aba anganije n’igihangange Pele nk’uko ibiharuro vya FIFA bivyerekana. Ariko Bruno Petkovic yarakigomboye inyuma y’iminota ine gusa – mbere ukaba ari wo mupira wonyene Croatia yateye mw’igori (ikizwi nka tir cadre/shot on target) – cayigaruriye amahirwe yo kubandanya, iritwara neza ishobora gushika muri wa mwanya w’ama-penalties. Abakeba ni bo batamvye baratarika mu gihe Neymar wewe vyanse ko yigumya mu kibuga, ararira, arihanagura, biranka! Ni we yari gutera iya gatanu ariko ntivyakunze inyuma y’aho Marquinhos atereye iya kane ikagwa ku nkingi y’igori, biba birarangiye. Si ryo herezo rya mbere riteye agahinda kuri we. Mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose ryabereye mu gihugu ciwe mu 2014, Neymar yarirangije n’imvune mu mugongo, ubu hakaba haciye imyaka ine bakubiswe n’Ububirigi bageze aho nyene. Mu rukino rwa nijoro, yabaye umwe mu bakinyi bavuye mu kibuga ubwa nyuma, abafana ba Brezili bicaye mu kibuga badatahura ivyari bihejeje kuba, ivyizigiro bari bafise muri Qatar bigeye akagirire. Tite ati: "Neymar yari kuba uwa gatanu kuko iyi niyo ikomeye. "Umutima ntuba uri hamwe na gato, gusa abakinyi baba biteguye iyo bazi ko ari bo batera penalty ya nyuma”. Ariko uwahoze ari umusatirizi w’Ubudagi Jurgen Klinsmann ntavyemera, aho ku mboneshakure BBC One ati: "Iyaba jewe ni we yari gutera penalty ya mbere. Ni co gihe uba umukeneye kugira ngo ahumurize imitima”. Urugendo rwa Brezili mu gikombe c’isi yose rwaraye rusubiriye guhagarikwa n’igihugu c’Ubulaya ku ncuro ya gatandatu yikurikiranya, igihe ca nyuma iheruka gutsinda igihugu co kuri uno mugabane hakaba hari mu 2002 itsinze Ubudagi muri finale. Uwo mwaka kandi ni ho iherukira gutwara igikombe c’isi yose,  ica nyuma muri bitanu ifise, hakaba haciye imyaka 20 kuva igihugu atari ico ku mugabane wa Bulaya gitwaye iki gikombe. Ibi biharuro si vyiza kuri Brezili. Iki gihugu co muri Amerika y’ubumanuko gitangura cikwega, kikaba mbere carananiwe no kwinjiza mu gice ca mbere c’urukino mu nkino zaco indwi ziheze muri iri higanwa. Iyo Vinicius Junior canke Neymar bagakoresha amahirwe bagiye baronka mu gihe ca mbere, vyari kuba ibindi bindi. Uyu murwi wa Tite wabaye kandi umurwi wa mbere muri kahise k’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose ukuriwe mw’ihiganwa mu gice co gukuranamwo mu gihe ari wo watanguye kwinjiza ica mbere muri wa mwanya w’inyongera. Hagati aho, igihe igihugu kiza mu kibanza ca mbere kw’isi giherukira mu nkino z’igice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma ni mu 1998, ikaba yari Brezili nyene. Tite ati: "Si jewe jenyene ntakaje, ni umurwi wose. Twagerageje gukoresha amahirwe yose twaronse ariko biranka. Twayarwijije  - twaronse amahirwe 19 dutera mw’igori 11. Bobo nta na rimwe bari bwaronke akaryo na kamwe ko gutera mw’igori. "Ndatahura ko ari jewe wa mbere vyavuyeko, ariko ugutsindwa kwacu kwatuvuyeko twese. Ni umupira w’amaguru nta kundi. Igihe kimwe uratsinda, ikindi gihe ugatsindwa”. Umukuru w’igihugu wa Brezili aherutse gutorwa, Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva, yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Brezili yarakoze cane. Neymar yinjije igitsindo ciza cane kandi abakinyi bategerezwa kubishimirwa. Ndahereza icubahiro canje abakinyi n’umumenyereza. "Reka tubandanye urugendo kuko mu buzima nta gucika intege”. Urubuga ngurukanabumenyi rwo muri Brezili Globo Esporte rwanditse inkuru y’umubabaro “y’irangira ry’indoto”. Inkuru kuri tite, abakinyi biwe n’abafana bose ba Brezili ikaba igarukiye aho.

headline: Tigray: Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia ariyamiriza ibiganiro vy’amahoro
text: Leta ya Ethiopia itangaza ko idashobora kwicarana n'abarongoye intara (Leta) ya Tigray yo mu buraruko bw'iki gihugu kugira ngo barangize intambara, nk'uko umwe mu bahanuzi bakuru b'umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed yabibwiye BBC. Mamo Mihretu avuga ati: "Ntituganira n'inkozi z'ikibi…ahubwo turabarengutsa imbere y'intahe, ntitwicarana nabo ku meza y'ibiganiro". Aha ni inyuma y'aho umuryango w'ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Afrika usabiye ubutegetsi bwa  Ethiopia kuganira n'abarongoye leta ya Tigray. Iyi ntambara ivugwa ko imaze guhitana abaharurwa mu majana, abandi nabo baharurwa mu bihumbi bakaba bamaze guta izabo. Ishirahamwe ONU riragabisha ko ibintu bishobora kuyangara. Ku wa gatanu, umukuru w'igihugu ca Afrika y'Epfo, Cyril Ramaphosa, asanzwe arongoye umuryango w'Ubumwe bwa Afrika, yaragenye abahoze ari abakuru b'ibihugu batatu - Joaquim Chissano wa Mozambike, Ellen Johnson Sirleaf wa Liberiya na Kgalema Motlanthe wa Afrika y'epfo -  kugira ngo bahagararire ibi biganiro. Ariko ubutegetsi bwa Ethiopia buvyamirira kure, bukavuga ko ibikorwa vya gisirikare bifise intumbero yo kugarukana iyubahirizwa ry'amategeko mu gihugu. Ingabo za leta zitangaza ko zimaze kwigarurira ibisagara bikuru bikuru muri iyo leta kandi ko ziriko ziritegura gufata umugwa mukuru wa Tigray, Mekelle. Bwana Mamo avuga ati: "Igikorwa nyamukuru benewacu na bashikacu ba Afrika bokora ni ugutera igitsure TPLF ikamanika amaboko, kuri iki kintu rero, ntibikenewe ko hari uwurinda kuja i Tigray canke Mekelle kubibumvisha". Avuga ko aba bahoze barongoye ibihugu - biteze gushika mu gihugu mu minsi iri imbere - batazoshobora kugendera Tigray kubera ibikorwa vya gisirikare bibandanya. Ibikorwa vy'ugutumatumanako amakuru no kwunguruza abantu vyarahungabanye cane kuva iyi ntambara yaduka. Bwana Mamo avuga ko leta iriko irakora "uko ishoboye kwose" kugira ngo amashirahamwe y'abagiraneza  ya ONU ashobore gushira imfashanyo abanyagihugu ba Tigray. Kuri uyu wa Mungu, igisirikare ca Ethiopia catangaje ko kiriko citegurira gufata Mekelle. Koloneli Dejene Tsegaye, umuvugizi w'igisirikare, yabwiye ikinyamakuru ca leta Ethiopia Broadcasting Corporation, ati: "Igice gikurikira ni igikorwa gikomeye, kikaba cerekeye kuzinguriza Mekelle dukoresheje amaburende, kurangiza intambara zibera mu misozi hamwe no gutera tuja imbere ku rugamba". Aya makuru avuga kandi ko abanyagihugu bagabishijwe ko  vya muzinga ari vyo bizokoreshwa muri iki gitero.

headline: Umukinyi wa Manchester City Benjamin Mendy arahakana ivyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu yagirizwa
text: Umukinyi wa Manchester City Benjamin Mendy yahakanye ivyaha icenda bishingiye ku gitsina yagirizwa ko yakoreye abagore batandatu. Imbere ya Sentare ya Chester Crown, Mendy w'imyaka 27 aba ahitwa Prestbury mu karere ka Cheshire, yahakanye ivyaha vyose yagirizwa, harimwo indwi vyo gufata ku nguvu. Uyu mukinyi mpuzamakungu w'Umufaransa yagirizwa kandi ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina no kugerageza gusambanya ku nguvu. Bivugwa ko ibi vyaha vyabereye i muhira iwe hagati ya Gitugutu (10) 2018 na Myandagaro (8) 2021. Uyu yagirizwa yiteze gucirirwa urubanza ku wa 25 Mukakaro (7) 2022. Uwo bagirizwa hamwe Louis Saha Matturie, aba ahitwa Eccles mu karere ka Salford, na we nyene yahakanye ivyaha 12 yagirizwa. Uyu mugabo w'imyaka 40 ahakana ivyaha umunani vyo gufata ku nguvu hamwe n'ibindi bine vy'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina, yagirizwa ko yakoreye abagore umunani hagati ya Mukakaro (7) 2012 na Myandangaro (8) 2021. Bompi babandanya bidegemvya vy'agateganyo. Inyuma yo kwagirizwa ibi vyaha, Mendy yaciye ahagarikwa vy'agateganyo gukinira umurwi wiwe wa Manchester City inyuma y'inkino 50 za Premier League yari amaze kuyikinira kuva yinjiye muri uwo murwi avuye muri Monaco mu 2017, akaba amaze kandi gukinira Ubufaransa inkino cumi.

headline: Ibivugwa mu mupira w'amaguru i Buraya ku wa gatatu itariki 27.02.2021: Di Maria, Upamecano, Garcia, Zirkzee, Tarkowski, Benteke
text: Umugwi wa Tottenham uramaze kuvugana n'umukinyi wo hagati wa PSG  na Argentine Angel di Maria kugira aze gukinira uwo mugwi. Uwo mukinyi yahoze muri Man United w'imyaka 32 ashobora kwimukira mu wundi mugwi ata gisabwe muri uyu mwaka. (L'Equipe via Talksport) Umugwi wa PSG urizeye kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Tottenham n'Ubwongereza Dele Alli, 24, kw'ideni mu kiringo gisigaye c'uyu mwaka. Tottenham na yo iriko iriyumvira kuzana umukinyi wa Borussia Monchengladbach n'Ubudagi Florian Neuhaus,23, kugira ace asubira mu kibanza ciwe. (Mirror) Tottenham kandi irashirwa mu majwi ko ishaka kuzana umukinyi w'inyuma wa Naple na Serbia Nikola Maksimovic, 29, amasezerano yiwe azorangirana n'uyu mwaka. (Spazio Napoli via Sport Witness) Biravugwa ko Thomas Tuchel agiye guhita aja ku kivi muri iyi misi iri imbere nk'umumenyereza wa Chelsea. Uwo mudagi yasubiriye Frank Lampard ku kibuga ca Stamford Bridge  ku musi wa kabiri, avuga ko umukinyi w'inyuma w'umugwi wa RB Leipzig n'Ubufaransa Dayot Upamecano, 22, ari umwe mu bakinyi yipfuza cane, (SportBild via Team Talk) Vyitezwe ko umukinyi wo ku ruhande rw'i bubamfu wa Chelsea Baba Rahman, aba umukinyi wa mbere avuye muri uwo mugwi kava umumenyereza Lampard yirukanywe mu mabanga yiwe, mu gihe vyitezwe ko uwo mukinyi wo muri Ghana w'imyaka 26, aja mu mugwi wo mu Bugiriki, PAOK Salonika kw'ideni. (Sport24 via London.Football) Vyitezwe ko umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Manchester United Facundo Pellistri wo mu gihugu ca Uruguay w'imyaka 19 ava muri uwo mugwi kw'ideni, akaba aronderwa n'imigwi ya Club Bruges na Alaves, aho yari yagiye muri uwo mugwi wa The Red devils ava muri Penarol  mu kwezi kwa cumi. (Goal) Umukinyi w'imbere w'Ububiligi, Christian Benteke w'imyaka 30, yitezwe kuguma mu mugwi wa Crystal Palace n'aho aronderwa cane n'umugwi wa West Bromwich Albion. (Sky Sports) Leicester ifise icizere co kugura umukinyi yari imaze umwanya muremure irondera James Tarkowski wo mu mugwi wa Burnley mu mpera z'uyu mwaka. Uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 28 asigaje amezi 17 mu masezerano bafitaniye n'umugwi wiwe, ariko ntarafata ingingo yo kuva muri uwo mugwi wiwe. Iyindi migwi yari yarigeze kumurondera ni The Forex na West Ham. (Mirror) Arsenal ifise akazi katoroshe ko ko guhiganwa na Barcelone kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester City w'imyaka 21, Eric Garcia, vyitezwe ko agiye kurangiza amasezerano yari afitaniye n'uwo mugwimuri uyu mwaka. (Mundo Deportivo via Express)

headline: Abantu mw'isi batera bakunda isukari, none hari ikibazo biteye, kiriko gikorwako iki?
text: Icigwa  ciswe Global Burden of Disease, catangajwe mu kinyamakuru The Lancet,  mu ntango z'uyu mwaka, casize itangazamakuru ryo muri Israel  mu kanyamuneza Umwihwezo w'ibiharuro vyerekana uko amagara y'abantu yifashe mu bihugu bigera ku 195, werekana ko Israel ari co gihugu kiza imbere kw'isi mu bihugu bidafise ikibazo c'impfu ziturutse ku ngwara zitegwa n'ibifungurwa. Ivyo vyakurikiwe n'isekeza ry'inkuru zandikwa mu binyamakuru zihimiriza abantu "gufungura nk'abanya Israel" "Akaga" Muri 2018, muri Israel hafunguwe kg 60 z'isukari ku muntu, n'ukuvuga amagarama 165 ku munsi. Urwo ni rugero ruri hejuru kurusha ahandi hose kw'isi, ufatiye ku biharuro BBC yaronse, bitangwa n'ikigo gikurikirana ikoreshwa ry'isukari ISO -International Sugar Organisation. Professor Itamar Raz, umukuru w'ikigo ca Israel kijejwe kurwanya diabete akaba n'umuhinga mu kuvura diabetes ku rwego mpuzamakungu, agira ati "Muri Israel, urugero rw'isukari umuntu akuze afata ku munsi, usanga rugeze ku tuyiko 30, ibi ni agahomeramunwa. Ibindi bihugu biza imbere mu gukoresha isukari nyinshi birimwo Malaysia, Barabados , Fiji na Brezil. Abaza inyuma ya bose mu gukoresha isukari nkeyi ni abanya Korea ya ruguru, aho batarengeje kg 3.5 ku muntu mu 2018. Aho ni mu gihe abazimyamuriro babo bo muri Korea y'epfo, ibiharuro vyo muri uwo mwaka vyerekana ko bageze ku kg 30.6 ku muntu. Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, aho usanga haboneka ibiharuro bikwiye ku ngwara zifatira ku vyo abantu bafungura, bigaragara ko bakoresheje kg 31.1 ku muntu, ariko ntibari no mu bihugu 20 vya mbere bikoresha isukari nyinshi. Umuntu agiye kuraba uko ibintu bimeze, asanga Ubuhinde arico gihugu kiza ubwa mbere mu gukoresha isukari nyinshi, aho hariwe toni miriyoni 25.39 muri 2018 - isumba isukari ikoreshwa hose mu bihugu vyose bigize Ubumwe bwa Bulaya. Ibiharuro bitangwa ku gufungura isukari ntivyerekana gusa iyo abantu biyongerera mu bifungurwa n'ibinyobwa ubwabo gusa. Hari n'ivyo abahinga mu magara y'abantu bita 'free sugar', iyo ikaba irimwo iyo ibifungurwa vyongerwamwo bikiriko biratunganywa mu mahinguriro canke vyisanganiwe ubwavyo, nk'ivvyamwa canke umutobe wavyo. Ivyo vyose biza vyiyongera, ugasanga muri rusangi isukari abantu bihereza yaraduze iva kuri toni 123,4 mu 2001, ija kuri toni 172,4 mu 2018, nk'uko biboneka mu biharuro bitangwa na ISO. Usaranganije iyo sukari yose ku gitigiri c'abantu kw'isi, usanga umwe yoba afungura kg 22.6 ku mwaka. Ariko ni kuki dufungura isukari nyinshi? Impamvu n'uko isukari yamye ari igifungurwa kizimbutse kandi gishobora gushikirwa na bose gitanga inguvu zikenewe n'imibiri yacu. Ishami ry'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryitaho infungurwa FAO rimenyesha ko nk'akarorero, isukari mu Buhinde, ari "igifungurwa nkenerwa kiribwa na bose kandi gikenewe kugirango abakene baronke inguvu zikwiye mu mubiri wabo ku giciro giciririkiye". Igitigiri c'abakunda ibisosa cariyongereye cane muri ico gihugu, kuva mu myaka y'intango za 1960s  gushika hagati mu za 1990s, urugero rw'isukari rufungurwa rwariyongereye kuva kuri toni miriyoni 2.6 ruja kuri toni miriyoni 13. Ibifungurwa biciye mu nganda vyaramaze kumenyerwa gukoreshwa na benshi kw'isi mu buzima bwabo bwa minsi yose. Ibiharuro bituruka muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, vyerekana ko bene ivyo bifungurwa biri kuri 77%  vy'ibifungurwa vyose vyagurishijwe mu 2002. Isukari ni kirumara mu bifungurwa bica mu nganda, irakoreshwa mu kwongera uburyohe canke mu kwongereza igihe ibifungurwa bimara bibitse. Abenshi mu bahinga b'amagara y'abantu bavuga ko urugero runini rw'isukari arirwo kibazo gikuru mu bitera ubuvyibuhe burenze bwabaye nk'ikiza. Mu 2015, OMS yaragabanije urugero rw'isukari igira inama abantu kutarenza. Iki gihe OMS igira inama abakuze n'abana kugabanya isukari isanzwe iri mu vyo bafungura itari iyongewemwo, ikagera munsi ya 10% vy'inguvu umubiri ukeneye. OMS iravuga kandi ko kugabanyako ibindi bice 5% , n'ukuvuga gm 25 (utuyiko 6) ku munsi "bishobora kuzana inyungu ku magara y'abantu". Umutegetsi mu buyobozi bw'ikigo British Heart Foundation, Victoria Taylor, avuga ko 'bigaragara ko abategetsi mu magara y'abantu bahanura abantu kugabanya isukari'. Avuga ko "Uko ibintu bihagaze kino gihe, bigaragara ko isukari ifungurwa ku rugero rurenze haba mu bana canke abakuze, eka no ku ngero zose z'abantu mu  bijanye n'ubutunzi." Gutangisha amakori ku birimwo isukari vyatumye ibihugu bimwe bimwe bitera intambwe kuruta gutanga impanuro gusa: mu myaka mike ishize, ibihugu bigera ku 20 vyashize amakori ku bifungurwa n'ibinyobwa birimwo isukari nyinshi. Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, Singapore cabaye igihugu ca mbere cabujije amatangazo yamamaza ibinyobwa birimwo isukari, iryo tegeko rikazoshirwa mu ngiro mu mwaka uza. Umwe mu  bategetsi b'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu muri Singapore Edwin Tong, avuga ko "abaturiye isi bagenda barwiramwo abasaza muri rusangi, kandi ingwara zidakira zitera ziyongera, ivyo bigatera bijana isi mu bibazo vy'amagara kandi bitwara amafranga menshi, isi itazoshobora kwiyugurura hamwe atacokorwa. Gushimikira ku binyobwa bisosa nka za fanta, ntibabikura ku busa. Ibi ni ibinyobwa birimwo isukari nyinshi cane kandi ata kintu c'ingirakamaro vyongera umubiri. Ariko rero ibi binyobwa ubisanga henshi cane, nka hose kw'isi. Witegereje ibiharuro vyegeranijwe  n'ishure rya Harvard ritanga inyigisho ku magara y'abanyagihugu, fanta orange ya ml  355 irimwo utuyiko 11 tw'isukari. Ivyirwa vyinshi vyarerekanye isano riri hagati ya bene ivyo binyobwa n'ubuvyibuhe, hamwe rero n'impungenge zo gufatwa n'ingwara za diabete bita 'de type 2,' umutima canke umuntu akaba yopfa imburagihe. Ariko hari abibaza ko itangazamakuru ari ryo rivuga nabi isukari Uwukuriye ikigo kijejwe isukari mw'isi -International Sugar Organisation,  Jose Orive yabwiye BBC ko 'isukari itoranywa ikavugwa nabi', igakurwa mu bindi bifungurwa abantu bafungura bifise ingaruka ku magara yabo. Yagize ati: "Isukari iravugwa nabi, ariko ntawokwirengagiza kahise kayo ko kuba igifungurwa c'ifatiro mu kuronsa umutnu inguvu akeneye. Isanzwe iri no mu maberebere". Kubwiwe ngo ntikwiye kwizizirwa mu bikwiye kwirindwa ku bantu bashka kugabanya ikibazo c'ubuvyibuhe bw'umurengera cabaye nk'ikiza, kuko ngo n'ibindi bituma bifise uruhara, harimwo ko abantu batakiva aho bari ngo bagorore imitsi, canke ivyo bafungura muri rusangi Orive agira ati : "turazi neza ko gufungura birengeje ata n'umwe bigirira neza" "Infungurwa nzima ziracaboneka?" Holly Gabriel, umwe mu banonosoye inyigisho ku bifungurwa - nutritioniste wo mu kigo 'Action Sugar' kigizwe n'abashakashatsi, bahimiriza leta gushiraho politike zigabanya isukari, nawe aremeza ko ikibazo atari isukari gusa. Avuga ko ikibazo c'ubuvyibuhe burenze giterwa n'inyifato n'imibereho ituma abantu bavyibuha birenze, eka n'ibifungurwa bisigaye bitunganywa nabi. Izo nizo mpamvu avuga ko hari hakwiye kugira igikorwa mu gushiraho ingingo zifasha gusubiza ibintu mu buryo. Orive avuga ko atabona neza nimba ikibazo co gushira amakori ku bidandazwa bimwe bimwe bishobora kugira ico bifashije ku gihe kire kire, ariko ntikimubuza kunegura amahinguriro y'ibinyobwa n'ibifungurwa kw'ikoreshwa ry'isukari. Isukari ntishirwa mu bifungurwa ngo yongereze ubusose gusa, ishobora no gufasha kugirango bibikike igihe kire kire. Gushira amakori ku  bifungurwa, vyagaragaye ko bifasha gusa mu kwinjiza amakori muri leta. Orive yemeza ko:"Ariko amahinguriro y'ibifungurwa birakenewe ko agira uruhara akareka kwihisha." Amahinguriro y'ibifungurwa n'ibinyobwa aramaze kugira urwo ruhara mu bihugu bimwe bimwe. Mu kwezi kwa cumi na kabiri umwaka wa 2018, amahinguriro menshi akomeye mu Budagi yarunvikanye na leta kugabanya isukari mu bifungurwa vyayo kuva mu 2025 , harimwo n'ibinyobwa vyoroshe, aho urugero rwayo ruzokurwako 15 %. Ariko amakori nayo? Yo hari ico afasha? Ibindi bifungurwa bikorwa ma mafu nk'ama gato vyovyo? Mu cirwa cakozwe n'abashakashatsi bo muri kaminuza ya Otago muri Nouvelle Zelande, basanze amakori ya 10% ku binyobwa vyoroshe birimwo isukari yaratumye kugura no kwihereza ivyo binyobwa kugabanuka ku bice 10%. Mu bibanza bimwe, kubuza isukari vyatumye amahinguriro y'ibifungurwa n'ibinyobwa ahindura kugirango yirinde gutozwa amakori -mu Bwongereza, ikigo 'Action on Sugar', kimenyesha ko urugero rw'isukari mu binyobwa rwagabanutse ko 28.8 % mu binyobwa kuva mu 2018. Kubera ayo amakori atanguye gutozwa vuba mu bihugu vyinshi, ico bishobora kuba vyarafashije ku buzima bw'abanyagihugu ntikiragaragara neza. Ariko rero abigisha bo kuri kaminuza ya 'London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine mu Bwongereza, bakoze ikimeze nko gushiraho amakori ku bifungurwa vy'utuntu duto duto two gupfuvya inzara (snacks) nk'ibisuguti, gato n'imbombo, basanga vyoshobora gufasha. Mu gikorwa kaminuza ya Oxford bafatanijemwo na kaminuza ya Cambridge, bitegereje ico kwongera ibice 20% ku kiguzi c'ibifungurwa birimwo isukari  bishobora gufasha. Basanze muri rusange, kwongereza ico giciro ku binyobwa bisosa vyotuma abantu batakaza kg 1.3 mu mwaka umwe. Pauline Scheelbeek ari mu banditse ivyavuye mu cigwa c'izo kaminuza avuga ko "Ubwongereza buri mu bihugu bishobora gufatwa nk'akarorero k'uburyo inkurikizi z'ingingo za leta zishobora gukurikiranwa, ico zashitseko kigeragezwa. Scheelbeek n'abandi bashakashatsi bagenzi we basanze ikori ku tuvunamusase, rishobora gufasha kugabanya ubuvyibuhe burenze - obesite -, ku bice 2.7 % mu banyagihugu b'Ubwongereza mu kiringo kitarenze umwaka. Avuga ko kuri bo basanga ikori rishobora gufasha, n'ubwo atawovuga ko hari ubufindo umuntu ashobora gukoresha mu gukuraho bwangu ikibazo c'ubuvyibuhe bw' umurengera no guhindura mu nziza uburyo abantu bafungura. Ariko rero ngo igikenewe n'ukumenya ko kugabanya isukari ari ngombwa mu bikeneye gukorwa.

headline: Ni ibiki Donald Trump yagiye avuga ku bijanye na Coronavirus?
text: Perezida Donald Trump ni we mutegetsi akomeye kw'isi yanduye indwara ya Covid-19. Mw'ijoro ryo ku wa 01 z'uku kw'icumi, Perezida Trump yamenyesheje ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter ko we n'umugore wiwe Melania banduye. Iyi nkuru ije mu gihe gikomeye c'imyiyamamazo mu matora ategekanijwe ku itariki 3 z'ukwa 11, mu gihe kandi iki kiza karanda ca coronavirus kimaze guhitana Abanyamerika barenga 200,000, mu gihe abarenga miliyoni 7 banduye. Ibinyamakuru vya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bimenyesha ko uyu ari we mukuru w'igihugu wa Amerika agize ibibazo vy'amagara akiri ku butegetsi mu myaka mirongo iheze. Ivyagiye bitangazwa na Perezida Trump ku bijanye na coronavirus vyagiye bitera impari zikomeye, mbere akaba yaraneguwe cane ku kungene yavyifashemwo ku biraba iki kiza. Ng'ibi bimwe mu bikomeye yagiye aravuga kuri Covid-19: Ku wa 22 z'ukwa mbere, haciye iminsi ibiri gusa habonetse umuntu wa mbere yanduye coronavirus muri Amerika, Perezida Trump yahaye ikiganiro televiziyo CNBC yo muri Amerika, aho yafashe minenerwe Covid-19, avuga ko ata kibazo iteye ku gihugu. "Ibintu biri ku murongo. Ni umuntu umwe avuye mu Bushinwa, kandi ibintu turabifise mu minwe. Nta ngorane zizoba". Ku wa 27 z'ukwa kabiri, abantu bari banduye Covid-19 muri Amerika bari 25 gusa, ariko Trump yabwiye Abanyamerika ko ibintu vyategerezwa "kuba bibi imbere y'uko biba vyiza". Ico gihe, Trump yari agifise icizere ko uwu mugera ushobora kuranduranwa n'imizi. Mu nama mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu Maison Blanche/White House, Trump yavuze ati: "Izogenda amazimayongo. Ni umunsi umwe gusa, ni nk'igitangaro, izorangira". Ayo majambo yagumye ayasubiramwo mu ndwi nkeya zakurikiye, aho yavuga ko ibitigiri vy'abandura mu minsi mike vyariko "biregereza ubusa[zeru]". Mu kwa gatanu, Bwana Trump  yavuze ko kubona ibiharuro vy'abandura bigenda vyiyongera muri Amerika cari "ikimenyetso ciza". Mu nama nshikiranganji yerekanywe ku mboneshakure, yavuze ati: "Iyo tugize abantu benshi banduye, jewe si mbona ko iyo ari ingorane". "Jewe ingene ndabifata, ku ruhande rumwe, ndabifata ko ari ikintu ciza kuko vyerekana ko ubushobozi bwacu bwo gupima bukomeye cane". Yavuze ivyo yishimikije ibiharuro vyerekana ko ico gihe Amerika ari yo yari imaze gupima abantu benshi gusumba ibihugu vyose kw'isi, n'aho yaza inyuma mu bijanye n'urugero rw'abantu bari bamaze gupimwa ico gihe. Ku wa 22 z'ukw'indwi, Perezida Trump yavuze ko imyiyerekano yo muri rya sekeza Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara) mu bisagara bitari bike vya Amerika ari yo yabaye intandaro y'irwirirana rya Covid-19 mu gihugu. Ati: "Ibiharuro vy'abandura vyatanguye kwiyongera mu Banyamerika bakiri bato inyuma gato y'imyiyerekano, ari yo nk'uko mubizi neza, ariyo yatumye haba ukudebukirwa mu twigoro two kurwanya iki kiza mu gihugu". Mu gihe abahinga mu vy'amagara y'abantu bari bagize ubwoba ko iyi myiyerekano yari gutuma ibitigiri vy'abandura vyiyongera, ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko ata kivyemeza ko ibi ariko vyagenze. Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n'ibigo vya Kaminuza vya Harvard na Northwestern bwerekana ko iyi myiyerekano "yari ifise uruhara ruto cane rwose" mw'irwirirana ry'abanduye uwu mugera mu kwa gatandatu no mu kw'indwi. Uko iki kiza cagenda ciyongera muri Amerika, Perezida Trump yagenda yipimisha coronavirus iminsi yose. Abajijwe ibijanye n'uku kwipimisha kwa minsi yose, ku wa 21 z'ukwa gatanu yatanze inyishu nk'uko umengo ntaco bimubwiye. Imbere yuko yurira kajugujugu ari imbere ya Maison Blanche, yavuze ati: "Inyishu z'ibipimo ni vyiza cane". "Rero muri kino gitondo, ibipimo vyerekana ko nkomeye, si ko? Rero, ibipimo ni vyiza cane. Ni ukuvuga ko ata mugera nanduye". Mu gihe ibitigiri vy'abandura vyariko biraduga cane muri Amerika, Perezida Trump, ku wa 04 z'ukw'indwi, umunsi w'ukwikukira kwa Amerika, yavuze ko ibice 99% vy'abanduye Covid-19 muri Amerika "ata ngorane na ntoya bateye". Ati: "Ubu tumaze gupima abantu hafi imiliyoni 40. Twakoze gutyo, turerekana ibitigiri vy'abanduye, 99% muri vyo nta ngorane na ntoya biteye". Aya majambo yaciye yiyamirizwa ubwo nyene na Anthony Fauci, umukuru w'ikigo kijejwe kurwanya indwara zandukira mu gihugu (National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases), hamwe n'umuhinga wa leta yiwe mu bijanye na Covid-19. Muganga Fauci ati: "Ibi si ko bimeze na gato". Ikiganiro ca mbere hagati y'abahiganirwa ikibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu ku wa 29 z'ukw'icenda, caranzwe n'uguterana amajambo hagati ya Bwana Trump n'umukeba wiwe wo mu mugambwe w'abademokarate, Joe Biden. Bimwe mu vyo yanegura, Perezida Trump yarifatiye mu gahanga Biden k'ukungene yitwararika cane ingingo zo kwirinda Covid-19. Ati: "Igihe cose uzomubona, azoba yambaye agapfukamunwa". "Ashobora kuba ariko avugira ku metero 60 uvuye ... ariko ukabona yambaye agapfukamunwa kanini bitari bwigere bibaho". Mu ntango, Perezida Trump yaranse kwambara agapfukamunwa n'aho yaba ari mu bibanza rusangi, akaba yatanguye kukambara ubwa mbere mu kw'indwi, mbere no ku wa 22 z'ukwa cenda akaba yaritavye ikoraniro ashikiriza n'ijambo ata gapfukamunwa yambaye. Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, Perezida Trump yarafashe minenerwe ivyo kwambara agapfukamunwa, n'aho abahinga bobo bavuga ibindi. Ubutumwa bwa Bwana Trump kuri Twitter amenyesha ko we n'umugore wiwe banduye Covid-19, bwaherekejwe n'ubundi butanga icizere mu gihe hari abari bafise amakenga ku magara yiwe. Ubwo butumwa buvuga buti: "Muri iri joro, ibipimo vyerekana ko @FLOTUS [Madamu wa Perezida, mu mfunyafunyo] na jewe twanduye COVID-19. Dutanguye igihe ca guma mu rugo ubu nyene. Ibi tuzobirengana TURI KUMWE TWESE!" Uyu mukuru w'igihugu w'imyaka 74, ari mu murwi w'abantu bafatwa n'abahinga ko babangamirwa cane, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo kijejwe kurwanya indwara muri Amerika (Centre for Disease Control, CDC). Kugeza kw'itariki 30 z'ukw'icenda, Covid-19 yari imaze kwica Abanyamerika barenga 41,000 bafise hagati y'imyaka 65 na 74, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikigo CDC.

headline: Itegeko rya Sharia ni iki? Rivuze iki ku bagore bo muri Afghanistan?
text: Aba Taliban bavuga ko bazotwara Afghanistan hisunzwe ata guhesha ingingo z'amategeko  ya Islam zizwi nk'itegeko rya Sharia. Uwo mugwi washikiriye intsinzi umaze gufata umugwa mukuru Kabul, gutyo urangaza  imyaka hafi 20 y'uruhara rw'ingabo mpuzamakungu zari zirongowe na Amerika uri ico gihugu. Hariko haba iki muri Afghanistan? Mu kiganiro ca mbere n'abamenyeshamakuru inyuma yo gufata Kabul, umuvugizi w'aba Taliban yavuze ko ibibazo bimwe bimwe nk'ivyerekeye ibinyamakuru n'uburenganzira bw'abagore bizokwubahirizwa hisunzwe "itegeko rya Islam", ariko uwo mugwi nturasigura ico ivyo bizoba bivuze mu ngiro canke mu bikorwa. Uwatsinzindiye agashimwe k'amahoro ka Nobel Malala Yousafzai - yarashwe n'aba Taliban afise imyaka 15 ahorwa guharanira uburenganzira bw'abakobwa bwo kuja mu mashure muri Pakistan - yagabishije ko ingene aba Taliban batahura itegeko rya Sharia bishbora kuba akaga ku bakobwa n'abagore muri Afganistan. Yabwiye BBC ati: " Nararonse akaryo ko kuvugana na bamwe mu baharanira uburenganzira muri Afghanistan, barimwo abo mu mashirahamwe y'abagore, nabo barafise ayo makenga ko batazi ico ubuzima bwabo bugiye kuba." "Benshi baribuka ivyariko biraba mu 1996-2001, gutyo bakaba bafise amakenga menshi ku mutekano wabo, uburenganzira bwabo, ugukingirwa [no] gusubira kuja mu mashure." Igijhe aba Taliban baheruka ku butegetsi  abagore ntibari bemerewe gukora akazi canke kuja mw'ishure. Kuva ku myaka umunani, abakobwa bategerezwa kwambara burka, abagore nabo bakaba bari barekuriwe kuja ahabona  ari uko baherekejwe n'umuntu w'umugabo wo mu muryango. Abagore babirenzeko barakubitwa abantu barorera. Ministre w'Ubwongereza ajejwe intwaro yo hagati Madame Priti Patel, avuga ku migambi ya reta yo kwakira impunzi 20.000 z'abanya-Afghanistan mu Bwongereza, yavuze ko atizeye ukwizeza kwatanzwe [n'aba Taliban]. Yabwiye BBC ko uwo mugwi ufise kahise ko gukandamiza abagore, kandi ko "ivyo bitagiye guhinduka buno nyene". Itegeko rya Sharia n'indinganzizo y'amategeko ya Islam. Riva muri Koran, inyandiko shingiro ya Islam, hamwe na fatwa - imanza ziba zaciwe n'inzobere mu vyigwa vya Islam. Sharia ubundi risigura  "inzira igaragara, icamwo abantu benshi igana ku mazi". Itegeko rya Sharia rikora nk'igitabo c'ingingo zigenga ukubaho aba Islam bose bategerezwa kwisunga, harimwo amasengesho, kwisonzesha no gufasha abakene. Rigamije gufasha aba-Islam gutahura ingene bategerezwa kwigenza mu kintu icarico cose c'ubuzima bwabo hisunzwe ingene Imana ibishaka. Sharia rishobora guha insiguro icarico cose kijanye n'ubuzima bwa minsi yose  bw'umu-Islam. Nk'akarorero, nk'umu-Islam atazi neza ico yokora aronse ubutumire bw'abo bakorana kugira bajane mu kabare inyuma y'akazi  ashobora kuraba inzobere mu vyigwa vya Islam kugira amugire inama maze akore ibijanye n'amategeko y'idini ryabo. Ibindi bice vy'ubuzima bwa minsi yose aho aba-Islam bashobora kubaza inzobere ingene bovyifatamwo n'amategeko agenga umuryango, amafaranga hamwe n'imirimo y'ubugwizatunga. Sharia ishira ivyaha mu migwi mikuru mikuru ibiri: ivyaha vya ''hadd", biba ari ivyaha bikomeye cane bifise n'ibihano bizwi, hamwe n'ivyaja vya ''tazir'' aho igihano gishingwa n'umucamanza. Ivyaha vya ''hadd'' birimwo ukwiba, gushobora guhanishwa guca ikiganza c'uwagiriwe n'ico caha, hamwe n'ubusambanyi bw'abarenze ibigo, bushobora guhanishwa kwicishwa amabuye. Amwe mu mashirahamwe ya Islam avuga ko hari inzitizi  nyisnhi hamwe n'umurundo w'ivyemezo bikenerwa mw'ishirwa mu ngiro ry'ibihano vya hadd. Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU ryariyamirije kwicisha  amabuye, rivuga ko ari ''iyica rubuzo canke ubundi buryo bwo gufata canke guhana umuntu  bunyamaswa, ata buntu, butesha agaciro ko rero bubujijwe". Si ibihugu vyose vya Islam bishira mu ngiro  ivyo bihano vya hadd  kandi amatohoza amaze kwerekana ko  aba-Islam babona mu buryo butandukanye cane  ibijanye n'ibihano ruhasha. Apostasy, canke uguta ukwemera, n'ikibazo kitavugwako rumwe cane mu ba-Islam kandi abahinga bavuga ko inzobere nyinshi mu vyigwa vya Islam zivuga ko ico caha gihanishwa urupfu. Ariko hari umugwi muto w'incabwenge z'aba Islam cane cane abakorana n'ibihugu vya Buraya, bavuga ko ukuri kw'isi ya none gusigura ko ''igihano'' gikwiye kurekerwa Imana - kandi ko Islam ubwayo itageramiwe n'uguta ukwemera. Na Koroan ubwayo ivuga ko ''ata guhata'' mu bijanye n'idini. Nko ku yandi mategeko yose, Sharia rirazitanye kandi kurishira mu ngiro bihagarara ahanini ku bwiza n'ubumenyi bw'abahinga. Abanyamategeko b'aba-Islam batanga intumbero n'ingingo bashinze. Intumbero ifatwa nk'urubanza rwaciwe yitwa fatwa. Hari amashure atanu  atandukanye y'itegeko rya Sharia. Hari inyigisho zine za Sunni: Hanbali, Maliki, Shafi'i na Hanafi, hamwe rero n'inyigisho imwe ya Shia, yitwa  Shia Jaafari. Izo nyigisho zitanu zitandukanye ku buryo   zisobanura, ijambo ku rindi, inyandiko itegeko rya Sharia rikomokako.

headline: Diego Maradona yaraye ashinguwe, Argentine isigaye mu marira
text: Uyu yahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa w'umupira w'amaguru Diego Maradona yashinguwe mu birori vyihariye inyuma y'umusi umwe habaye ibikorwa vyo kumusezerana umubabaro mwinshi ku mugwa mukuru wa Argentine Buenos Aires. Ibiroro vyo kumushingura nijoro ku wa kane vyabandanijwe  n'abantu bakeya bagizwe n'abanyamuryango n'incuti ziwe za hafi. Imbere y'aho, isinzi ry'abantu ryaritabiriye ibirori vyo ku musezera ubwa nyuma, abenshi buzuye amarira. Maradona yitavye Imana ku myaka 60 ku wa gatatu ahitanywe n'indwara y'umutima. Urupfu rwiwe rwababaje isi yose, ariko igihugu ciwe carababaye gusumba na rirya bamufata nk'incungu. Isandugu y'ikiziga ca Maradona  - ipfutse ibendera rya Argentine n'impuzu y'umupira w'amaguru yanditseko inomero 10 inyuma kuko ari yo yambara igihe yari agikina - yashizwe imbere y'ikirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu ku wa kane. Leta yavuga ko yari yiteze abantu bashika umuliyoni bari gushika ku kirimba gusezera Maradona ubwa nyuma. Gushika hagati inyuma y'umutaga, imirongo miremire y'abaje kumusezera yarenga ikirometero niyo yibonekeza, mbere igipolisi kikaba carashamiranye n'abashaka gushika ku kirimba amasaha yategekanywa ataragera. Hari n'amakuru avuga ko igipolisi kijejwe kurwanya imigumuko cakoresheje vya vyuka bikoroza amosozi n'amasanu ya plastiki mu gihe cariko kigerageza kuzibira isinzi ry'abantu. Umwe mu bari bahari , Rubén Hernández, abona ko igipolisi carengeje urugero. Yasubiwemwo amajambo n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters avuga ati: "Twari twitekaniye dutonze umurongo, ubwo nyene igipolisi gitangura kudutera amasasu ya plastiki. Ubu ni ubusazi, jewe nishakira gusezera Diego". Vyabaye ngombwa ko abategetsi  bahagarika abantu gushikira isandugu kugira ngo umutekano ntuhungabane. Mu murwi w'Ubutaliyano Napoli, umurwi Maradona yakiniye mu kiringo c'imyaka indwi mbere agatuma utera imbere cane, abakunzi bawo basidukanye n'iyonka ku kibuga kugira bamwibuke, bagenda baririmba ngo "Diego, Diego!". Bwari bugize kabiri abanyagihugu birengagiza ingingo za guma mu rugo kubera coronavirus mu gusezera uyu mukinyi rurangiranwa, mu gihe hari hasigaye akanya gato ngo Napoli itane mu mitwe n'umurwi Rijeka wo muri Croatia muri rya higanwa rya Europa League. Muri runo rukino rwaraye rubaye nijoro aho Napoli yatsinze Rijeka 2-0, abakinyi bose ba Napoli babanje kwinjira mu kibuga bambaye udutambara twirabura n'imipira yanditseo inomero 10 Maradona yambara. Umufana Gianni Autiero yabwiye Reuters ati : "Yari umuntu adasanzwe, yatubereye vyose, yari vyose kuri twebwe abanya Napoli. Jewe mu buzima bwanje ni abantu bake cane maze kuririra, Diego ni umwe muri bo".

headline: Covid-19: Afrika y’Epfo yatoye ubwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus
text: Abashakashatsi batoye ubwoko bushasha (variant)  bw'umugera wa coronavirus muri Afrika y'Epfo. Ubwo bwoko bushasha C.1.2, bwatowe ubwa mbere mu kwezi kwa gatanu, ubu bumaze kuboneka mu ntara zitari munsi ya 6 kuri 9 zigize igihugu. Abahinga bavuga ko bwandukira co kimwe n'ubusanzwe bwiganje mu gihugu muri iki gihe aribwo Delta. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru, ikigo c'igihugu gikurikirana indwara zandukira (NICD) cavuze ko ubwo bwoko bushasha "bushobora,  ku bice bikeya,  kunanira ubudahangarwa [ariko] incanco ziguma zitanga urugero runini rwo gukinga kurwara gushika aho uja mu bitaro canke upfa". Cavuze kandi ko n'ubwo gushika ubu atari ubwoko buteye impungenge cane - nka Delta ishobora gutera kurwara ukaremba - burandukira cane. Ikigo NICD cavuze ko ubwo bwoko bishoboka ko bwoba ubwoko buteye amakenga arico gituma abahinga bazoguma bakurikirana ingene bugenda burahindagurika - mu gihe hari amakenga ko hashobora kuba umupfunda mushasha w'indwara ya Covid mu mezi ari imbere bitewe n'ukwihindagura kw'ubwo bwoko. N'ubwo benshi mu bamaze kwandura C.1.2  bavugwa muri Afrika y'Epfo, ubwo bwoko buravugwa mu bindi bihugu bitatu vyo muri Afrika, co kimwe no mu Buswise, Portugal n'Ubushinwa - hakurikirijwe icegeranyo kirindiriye kwigirwa hamwe. Abahinga bariko barihweza ingene ubu bwoko burwana n'abasoda umubiri uhabwa kugira uhangane na coronavirus. Bariko kandi biga ukungene bugenda buhindagurika n'ingene bwandukira. Maria van Kerkhove, ajejwe igisata c'ubuhinga mu vyerekeye Covid-19 mw'ishirahamwe ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO avuga ko ubu bwoko "budasa n'uburiko burakwiragira ku muvuduko munini". Avuga ko gushika ubu, ubwoko bwa Delta ari bwo burwiriye kandi ko OMS/WHO izoburira abantu mu gihe ibi bihindutse. Gushika ubu Afrika y'Epfo nico  gihugu ca mbere kirangwamwo abantu benshi bandura umugera wa corona muri Afrika. Abamaze kwandura bashika  miriyoni 2 n'ibihumbi 700, abamaze kwicwa na Covid nabo barenga ibihumbi 80.

headline: Amatora ya 2020 muri America: Russia, China, Iran, vyipfuza ko ari nde atsinda ?
text: Ubwo Uburusiya bwoba bwipfuza ko "Amerika igumana ijunja ifise"? Ubushinwa bwoba bushigikiye Biden? Ibi ni ibibazo abajejwe igendereza muri Amerika babandanya bibaza mu matora ategekanijwe mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Umutegetsi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru aragabisha ko hhari bihugu vya rutura bizokoresha "amayeri mu buryo bweruye n'ubwihishije" kugira ngo bazimagize abatora muri Amerika. Aha bakaba bavuga Uburusiya, Ubushinwa hamwe na Irani. Ariko rero, vyose ntivyofatwa kumwe kuko, nk'uko abajejwe igendereza muri Amerika bavyerekana, kimwe kimwe cose gifise intumbero n'ubushobozi cisangije. Eka n'ivyegeranyo ubwavyo biracariko birihwezwa - umwe mu nderetsi aherutse kuvuga ko yasabwe gutsinda ubwoba buterwa n'Uburusiya kuko bwatumye "umukuru w'igihugu abonwa nabi". None mu gihe hasigaye indwi zitatu ngo amatora abe, abatora muri Amerika bakeneye kumenya iki? Igendereza rivuga iki? Nta n'umwe atazi uruhara Uburusiya bwagize mu matora yo mu 2016 n'inyuma yayo. Mu majambo make, abajejwe igendereza muri Amerika bemeza ko Uburusiya bwivanze mu matora mu ntumbero yo gufahsa Donald Trump, bagafatira ku manama hagati y'abo bakorana n'abategetsi b'Uburusiya, ubusuma bwo ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi bwakorewe Hillary Clinton n'abo mu mugambwe w'abaharanira Demokarasi, kwinjira mu bubiko nyabwonko bwerekana abatora, hamwe n'inguvu bwashize mu gukwiragiza ibinyoma canke amakuru yegamiye ku ruhande rumwe ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi. Mu kwezi guheze, umurwi w'abakenguzamateka bo mu mugambwe w'Abarepubulika watanze ibindi vyemezo vyerekana ko Uburusiya bwashaka ko Trump ari we atsinda, bavuga ko imyiyamamazo yiwe yari yoroshe kwinjirwamwo n'abanyamahanga, ariko wirinda kuvuga ko hoba harabaye icaha. Uno mwaka wa 2020, uruhigi rwavuye kuri Hillary Clinton ruja kuri Joe Biden.
