Mu cegeranyo ciwe kikirindiriye gushirwa ahabona, umukuru w'ikigo kijejwe umutekano no kurwanya abasumyi b'urusaku (National Counterintelligence and Security Center, NCSC) William Evanina, avuga ko Uburusiya buriko "bukoresha amayeri atandukanye kugira bubanze bucuvye Biden yahoze ari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu". Nayo kuvyo umukuru w'ikigo kijejwe igendereza muri Amerika, FBI, Christopher Wray, abona, Uburusiya ntibwigeze buhengeshanya kwivanga mu vya Amerika, akavuga ko ingene bwakoze mu matora y'abakenguzamateka mu 2018 bwariko "bugerageza amayeri butegekanya gukoresha mu 2020". Uburusiya bwamye bwamirira kure ivyo kwivanga mu matora y'ikindi gihugu. Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, umuvugizi w'ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya (Kremlin)  yavuze ko ibi birego vy'ukwivanga mu matora "ari amajambo y'ubwoba" kandi ati "nta kuri kurimwo". Kuba rero Uburusiya bwoba bushaka canke budashaka ikindi kiringo ca Trump, hari abandi bihweza ibintu n'ibindi babona ko iki gihugu gifise intumbero nini cane yo gutesha umutwe ibihugu vy'abakeba mu gutera amadidane muri vyo. Akarorero muri uno mwaka, hari urwandiko rwashizwe ahabona n'umuryango w'ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Bulaya rwavuga ko hari umugambi w'Uburusiya wo gukwiragiza amakuru y'ibinyoma ku bijanye na coronavirus kugira ngo uyu muryango unanirwe no kumenyesha ingene wariko urahangana nayo. Uburusiya bwavuze ko aya makuru ata shingiro yari afise. Abahiganwa bavuga iki? Joe Biden aherutse kugabisha ko "ibintu bitazokwijana" mu gihe Uburusiya bwobandanya bwivanga mu bibazo vya Amerika, aho yise Uburusiya ko ari "umukeba" wa Amerika. Perezida Trump yamye afata minenenrwe ivyo Uburusiya bwagirizwa bijanye no kwivanga mu matora, ivyo atumvikanyeko n'abiwe bajejwe igendereza. Inyuma y'umubonano na Vladimir Putin mu 2018, abajijwe nimba yizera abajejwe igendereza ba Amerika canke umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburusiya kuri ibi birego, Trump yishuye ati: "Perezida Putin avuga ko atari Uburusiya. Simbona igituma na kimwe bwoba bwo". Mu nyuma yahavuye yigarura avuga ko yavuze nabi. Abajejwe igendereza bavuga iki? Abategetsi bakuru mu butegetsi bwa Trump bavuga ko uno mwaka Ubushinwa ari bwo buteye ikibazo, ko atari Uburusiya. Umushikirizamanza mukuru wa Repubulika,  William Barr , yavuze ati: "Narabonye ivyavuye mw'igendereza. Uko niko nabibonye". Umukuru w'umurwi ujejwe igendereza mu nama nshingamateka, umu democrate  Adam Schiff, yaragije Barr ko ivyo yavuze ari "ikinyoma ceruye". Mu cegeranyo ciwe, Bwana Evanina yavuze ko abajejwe igendereza muri Amerika babona ko "Ubushinwa bushaka ko Perezida Trump - uyo iki gihugu kibona ko adatomoye - atosubira gutorwa". Ati: "Ubushinwa buriko buriko bwongereza inguvu mu  guhindura politike ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, mu gutera igitsure abanyapolitike bubona ko barwanya inyungu z'Ubushinwa, no mu kurwanya ivyiyumviro binegura Ubushinwa". N'aho Ubushinwa bwahinyanyuye amayeri yo  kwinjira mu banyapolitike, cane cane iciye ku buhinga bwa none bwo guhererekanya amakuru, ntibiboneka neza aho bwiteguye gushika. Ariko Bwana Evanina avuga ati: "Ubushinwa bubandanya bwihweza ingaruka n'inyungu bushobora kuvana mu vyo buriko burakora". Kumbure hari naho bwoba buriko burarondera kugira ikibanza gikomeye kw'isi. Facebook iherutse kwugara amakonte ngurukanabumenyi yari afitaniye isano n'Ubushinwa, amenshi muri yo akaba yari ashigikiye iki gihugu. Ubushinwa burahakana ko butivanga mu biraba 'ubuzima bw'ibindi bihugu', bukavuga ko "atavyo bushaka kandi ata n'inyungu bubibonamwo". Abahiganwa bavuga iki? Muri uku kwezi, Perezida Trump yarashize ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter inkuru yanditswe n'ikinyamakuru co ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi, Breitbart, cegamiye Trump, inkuru yavuga ko "Ubushinwa busa n'ubushigikiye Joe Biden mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu". Afatiye ku muhungu wa Joe Biden, Hunter, Trump yanditse ati: "Nivyo nyene, bashaka Biden. Nafashe amamiliyaridi y'amadorari yari mu Bushinwa ndayagarukana mu gihugu, ndayaha abarimyi bacu n'ikigega ca Amerika. Ubushinwa burashaka kwifatira Amerika mu gihe Biden na Hunter bohashika". Imigenderanire hagati ya Amerika n'Ubushinwa iri hasi cane kubera impari muri vyose, kuva kuri coronavirus gushika kw'itegeko rijanye n'umutekano Ubushinwa bwahaye Hong Kong ku nguvu. Joe Biden abandanya agerageza kurwanya ivyo yagirizwa na Perezida Trump ko yorohereza Ubushinwa, akemerera abanyagihugu ko "azokara" ku bijanye n'agateka ka zina muntu n'ibindi bibazo. Hagati aho, abo mu mugambwe w'abaharanira Demokarasi babona ko Uburusiya ari bwo bubangamye  iyo hageze amatora. Umwihwezo ukorwa na Gordon Corera, Umunyamakuru w'umuhinga muvyo umutekano Mu 2016, leta ya Amerika, co kimwe n'amakompanyi y'imbuga hwaniro, ntiyihutiye kurwanya ukwivanga kw'Uburusiya mu matora. Muri kino gihe, nta n'umwe atavuga, ariko gusa ibintu vyarahindutse. Amakompanyi aravuga cane ivyo ariko arakora hanyuma n'igisata kijejwe igendereza naco kikama gishira ahabona ivyegeranyo vyaco. Ariko rero ikibazo cahawe intumbero ya politike. Aba Democrates barajwe ishinga n'ingene Uburusiya buriko bwivanga muri aya matora bushaka gufasha Perezida Trump ngo asubire gutorwa, mu gihe abamushigikiye nabo ahubwo barajwe ishinga n'ingene Ubushinwa buriko burakora kugira ngo ntasubire gutorwa. Abajejwe umutekano w'igihugu bagerageza kwiyubara - baremera ko ibi ariko bimeze, ariko bakirinda kwerekana itandukaniro rihari kubera bafise amakenga ko hoca haduka impari zishingiye ku vyiyumviro vya politike. Ukwivanga kw'Uburusiya kuraboneka ko kwateguwe neza kandi mu buryo bwihishije gushika ubu, ariko atari ku rugero rumwe  canke mu buryo bishobora kugira ingaruka nk'izo mu 2016 igihe binjira bakiba ama emails y'aba Democrates. Eka n'amayeri abashaka kwivanga muri ano matora bakoresha yarateye imbere, mu gukorera cane cane ku makuru nyayo ya Amerika, hagukoresha amakuru y'ibinyoma. Hanyuma kandi hari ubwoba ko hashobora no kwaduka n'ibindi bikomeye mu minsi ya nyuma y'imyiyamamazo harimwo mbere n'ukugerageza gutesha agaciro ibizova muri ayo matora yo nyene ubwayo. Abajejwe igendereza bavuga iki? Mw'itangazo ryiwe, Bwana Evanina avuga ko Tehran (umugwa mukuru wa Irani) idakeneye kubona Perezida Trump atwara ikindi kiringo, ikabona ko "ari igitsure ca Amerika kizobandanya kuri Irani mu kurondera guhindura ubutegetsi". Avuga ko Irani izoshira inguvu zayo zose "ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, nko mu gukwiragiza ibinyoma ku mbuga hwaniro be no gukwiragiza amakuru arwanya Amerika". Mu gushimangira ivyashikirijwe n'inzego zijejwe igendereza za Amerika, uruganda ruhingura inyabwonko Microsoft ruvuga ko abasuma bakoresha inyabwonko (pirates informatiques) bafitaniye imigenderanire n'Uburusiya, Ubushinwa na Irani, bariko baragerageza kuneka abantu bakomeye bafise uruhara mu matora ya Amerika. Kuri Irani, Microsoft ivuga ko hari ishirahamwe ryo muri Irani nyene ryitwa Phosphorus ryagerageje kwinjira mu ma konte y'abategetsi bo muri Maison Blanche/White House (ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu muri Amerika) hamwe n'abajejwe imyiyamamazo ya Trump hagati y'ukwa gatanu n'ukwa gatandatu uno mwaka, ariko bibata kuw'amazi. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire wa Irani yavuze ko ibivugwa na Microsoft ari "ibiterasoni". Saeed Khatibzadeh ati: "Ntabwo Irani irajwe ishinga n'uwo ari we wese azotsinda amatora y'umukuru w'igihugu". Hari icegeranyo kivuga ku bijanye n'uruhara rwa Irani mu ntango z'uno mwaka casohowe n'ishirahamwe ryo muri Amerika Atlantic Council kivuga ko Irani irajwe ishinga n'ugukomeza izina ryayo mu makungu, mu kurondera kuba ari yo iri hejuru mu karere iherereyemwo. Abahiganwa bavuga iki? Irani ntivugwa cane mu matora ya Amerika nk'Uburusiya n'Ubushinwa. Perezida Trump yabandanije atera igitsure gikomeye cane Irani, mu kwivumbura muri ya masezerano yerekeye umugambi wa Irani wo kwimbura ubutare bw'ubumara (Accord nucléaire) hamwe no mu gutanga uruhusha rwo kwica wa mu Jenerali yari akomeye cane Qasem Soleimani. Joe Biden avuga ko iyi politike yananiwe.  Mu kiganiro na CNN, yavuze ko "hariho inzira nziza yo gu`tera igitsure Irani", yemera ko azohagarika "ibikorwa bibi" vy'iki gihugu ariko kandi ashire imbere "inzira y'ibiganiro".

headline: Amacakubiri y'akataraboneka mu rukino Ubwongereza bwatsinze Bulgaria 6-0
text: Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Bulgaria, Borislav Mihailov, aratanze imihoho kubera ityozwa rishingiye ku rukoba ryaraye rikorewe abakinyi b'Ubwongereza. Uno munsi, umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Bulgaria yari yamusavye gutanga imihoho kubera iryo abongereza baraye bakorewe mu rukino rwa nijoro ku mugwa  Sofia. Boyko Borissov "ariyamiriza bikomeye" iyo nyifato, yari igizwe n'indamutso y'aba Nazi n'indirimbo z'inguge. Urwo rukino wahagaritswe incuro zibiri zose kubera inyifato y'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba yerekanywe n'abafana ba Bulgaria. Bwana Borisso avuga ati: "Nsavye ko Borislav Mihaylov atanga imihoho mu maguru masha nk'umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Bulgaria. Yari yasavye umushikiranganji w'inkino guhagarika imigenderanire yose n'ishirahamwe, Bulgarian Football Union (BFU), harimwo "n'ayerekeye imfashanyo y'amahera " gushika Borislav Mihaylov atanze imihoho. Muri urwo rukino rw'ukurondera uburenganzira bwo gukinira igikimbe c'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu i Bulaya, Ubwongereza bwatsinze Bulgaria 6-0. Umushikiranganji w'inkino wa Bulgaria Krasen Kralev yavuze ati: "Umushikiranganji wa mbere yampamagaye mu kanya gaheze". "Mu myaka ine iheze, Leta yarakoze ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo umupira w'amaguru muri Bulgaria utere imbere". "Ariko kubera ibiherutse gushika, bafatiye ku kungene umupira w'amaguru wifashe n'ivyaraye bibaye nijoro. "Umushikiranganji wa mbere yantegetse ko kuva uno munsi mpagarika amasezerano yose na BFU, harimwo n'ayerekeye amafaranga, gushika Borislav Mihaylov atanze imihoho". Imbere y'uko urwo rukino rutangura, Mihaylov umukuru wa BFU yahoze ari umunyegori wa Reading, yaritwaye mw'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya, UEFA. Yituye iryo shirahamwe avuga ko ivyariko bivugwa kuri urwo rukino vyari gutuma abantu babona ivy'ikumira ry'abakinyi b'abongereza gusumba urukino nyarwo. Iryo tyozwa ry'ejo ku wa mbere, ryari rigizwe n'indamutso z'aba Nazi n'indirimbo zityoza abirabure ko ari inguge, ryakorewe abakinyi b'Abongereza, bituma urukino ruhagarikwa incuro zibiri mu gice ca mbere. Rwatanguye guhagarikwa ku munota wa 28, umuhagarikizi abanza kuvugana n'umumenyereza w'Ubwongereza Gareth Southgate. Haciye nk'iminota itanu urukino rwahagaze, rwarasubiye rurabandanya gushika ku munota wa 43 aho rwongeye guhagarikwa. Ikibuga ca Vasil Levski gisa n'icari cugawe mu gihe c'urwo rukino inyuma y'aho Bulgaria ifatiwe ibihano kubera inyifato y'ivangura  rishingiye ku rukoba mu nkino zayihuje na Kosovo hamwe na  République tchèque

headline: Malaria-Malawi: Ubwa mbere kw'isi  urucanco rutanzwe mu gihugu cose
text: Malawi yatanguye isekeza ryo gukingira ku bwinshi  abana malaria mu kubaha urucanco rw’iyo ndwara, kikaba arico gikorwa ca mbere nk’ico kw’isi, nk’uko bivugwa na  Muganga Dr Neema Kimambo aserukira muri ico gihugu ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw’isi, OMS. Aho muri Malawi hariko harakoreshwa urucanco  rumwe rwonyene rumaze kwemezwa na OMS. Urwo rucanco ruzwi nka RTS,S rwarageragejwe incuro nyinshi mu bihugu vya Malawi, Ghana na Kenya muri iyi myaka mike iheze. Mw’igeragezwa ryarwo rya vuba kuva mu 2019, OMS yafashije mw’icandagwa  ry’abana 360.000 ku mwaka  muri ivyo bihugu bitatu. Iryo geragezwa ryerekanye ko mu bahawe urwo rucanco, 30% y’abana bafise hagati y’amezi 5 n’amezi 17 baronka ubudahangarwa. Urwo rugero ruri hasi rw’ingene urwo rucanco rukingira vyatumye hari abibaza niba koko bokwirirwa bararurondera. Ishirahamwe Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation risanzwe rishigikira gukora incanco, nta ruhara rutaziguye rifise mu gushigikira iryo sekeza ryatanguye muri Malawi kuko ryibaza ko  vyoba vyiza gusumba gushira amafaranga mu bundi buryo bwo kurwanya malaria hamwe n’izindi ncanco ziriko ziratunganywa, nk’uko bivugwa n’urubuga Devex. RTS,S rwa kompanyi ikora imiti ya GSK (GlaxoSmithKlein) rwari rumaze imyaka 30 ruhingurwa. N’aho urwo rucanco rufise urugero ruri hasi rwo gukinga, rwatumye hiyongera icizere co kubuza gupfa bamwe mu bantu 400.000 bahitanwa buri mwaka n’iyo ndwara ikwiragizwa n’imibu, benshi muri abo  akaba ari abo muri Afrika. Mu 2020, abantu barenga miriyoni 4 muri Malawi barafashwe na malaria, kandi kuri abo barenga 2.500, cane cane bafise munsi y’imyaka itanu, vyaremejwe ko bishwe n’iyo ndwara. Uwujejwe igisata co kurwanya malaria muri ico goihugu, Muganga  Michael Kayange, yabwiye ikiganiro Focus on Africa  ca BBC ko urwo rucanco ubu ruzobuza zimwe muri izo mpfu. Ati: ‘’Turazi neza ko rufise urugero ruto cane rwo gukora… (ariko) mu kurwanya malaria, nta buryo na bumwe buhari bushobora vyose. Ntituriko turavuga ngo urwo rucanco rwa malaria ruje kuyizimanganya burundu, ariko ni bumwe mu buryo bwo kuyizimanganya’’. Izindi ngingo zirimwo gutanga imisegetera irimwo umuti yo kwikingira imibu iyo abantu baryamye. Urwo rucanco ruzotangwa mu gihugu cose. Muganga Kayange yavuze ko abana bose bafise munsi y’imyaka itanu, aho bari hose, bazotegerzwa kururonka. Urwo rucanco rutangwa kane - rimwe buri kwezi mu mezi atatu ya mbere hanyuma irya kane haheze amezi 18.

headline: Umunyamabanga w'ubudandaji wa Amerika Wilbur Ross avuga ko coronavirus izotuma ubuzi bwiyongera
text: Umunyamabanga ajejwe ubudandaji wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Wilbur Ross, avuga ko ikiza ca coronavirus mu Bushinwa gishobora gutuma ubutunzi bwa Amerika bwiyongera. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na televiziyo imwe, Bwana Ross yavuze ati: "Ndibaza ko kizofasha mu kugarukana ubuzi bwinshi muri Amerika ya Ruguru". Ayo majambo yiyamirijwe bikomeye n'abanegura ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Donald Trump. Ikwirakwira ry'ico kiza ryatumye haba ubwoba ko ubutunzi bw'Ubushinwa bushobora kugira ibibazo. Yishura ku kibazo yari abajijwe na televiziyo Fox Business nimba ico kiza gishobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwa Amerika, Bwana Ross yavuze ati: "Si nipfuza kuvuga ko ari intsinzi ntoya mfatiye ku ndwara nk'iyo ije guteza ibibazo, indwara mbi cane". "Ariko ikiriho ni uko ivyo bituma amakompanyi aronka ikindi kintu afatirako mu bikorwa vyayo n'aho akorera... Rero ndibaza ko ivyo bizotuma ubuzi bugaruka muri Amerika ya uguru". Mu nyuma niho ubunyamabanga bw'ubudandaji bwasubiramwo amajambo yiwe buti : "Nk'uko umunyamabanga Ross yabisiguye, igikorwa ca mbere ni ukurwanya uwo mugera no gufasha abawanduye". Umuvugizi wabwo ati: "Ariko kandi ni ngombwa kwihweza neza ibijanye no gukorana n'igihugu kimenyereye kunyegeza ibibazo bihanze abanyagihugu baco n'isi yose". Ayo majambo yiyamirijwe bikomeye n'umushingamateka w'umu Démocrate Don Beyer abona ko ari ugukina ku muvyimba abantu mu gushaka kwungukira ku kiza ruhonyanganda nk'ico. Eka n'abahinga muvyo ubutunzi baneguye ayo majambo ya Bwana Ross. Simon Baptist umuhinga muvyo ubutunzi wo mu gihugu ca Singapour yabwiye BBC ko yakubiswe n'inkuba yumvise amajambo ya Ross. Avuga ko uwo mugera ushobora kugira ingaruka mbi kuri Amerika aho kuzana akarusho. Ati: "Ikiriho ni uko Amerika izohahombera cane kuko n'aho bimeze uko bimaze, Amerika irashorera cane mu Bushinwa. Rero iyo ubutunzi bw'Ubushinwa bugize ibibazo bikomeye, bigira ingaruka mbi kuri Amerika". Ishami ry'ishirahamwe ONU ryitaho amagara kw'isi OMS ryatangaje ko isi iri mu bihe bidasanzwe kubera uwo mugera  ubandanya ukwiragira hanze y'Ubushinwa. Umaze guhitana abantu bashika 213 mu Bushinwa, mu gihe umaze gushika mu bindi bihugu 18. Abahinga muvyo ubutunzi bavuga ko Coronavirus ishobora kugira ingaruka mbi cane ku butunzi bw'isi gusumba ikiza ca SARS co mu mwaka 2002-2003. Ico kiza candukiye abantu barenga 8000, abarenga 700 nabo bahasiga ubuzima, bikaba vyasavye imiliyaridi zirenga 30 z'amadolari kugira kirwanywe. Muri kino gihe, uwu mugera coronavirus watumye amakompanyi mpuzamakungu akomeye harimwo ay'ubuhinga bwa none, ayakora n'ayagurisha imiduga ahagarika vy'agateganyo ibikorwa vyayo mu Bushinwa.

headline: Imvo n'imvano ku ntambara ya Russia na Ukraine yadutse ku wa 24 z’ukwa kabiri uyu mwaka
text: Mu kiganiro c’uyu musi tuganira ku ntambara iriko irabica bigacika mu gihugu ca Ukraine kuva kw’itariki 24 z’ukwezi kwa kabiri uyu mwaka. Uburusiya bwinjiye muri ico gihugu buvuga ko ari igikorwa  kidasanzwe ca gisirikare  “special military operation” ku mvo y’umutekano wabwo. Uburusiya bwinjiye muri Ukraine inyuma y’indwi zitari zike zirundarunze abasirikare  n’ibigwanisho vya rutura ku rubibe rwa Ukraine buvuga ko buri mu myimenyerezo ya gisirikare. Uburusiya buvuga ko budashaka ko Ukraine yinjira mw’ishirahamwe ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe Otan. Buvuga kandi ko bushaka gukingira abanyagihugu bo mu buseruko bwa Ukraine bafise amamuko mu Burusiya  ngo ntibahonywe n’ingabo za Ukraine. Muri iyi ndwi uwuserukira Uburusiya muri ONU Vassily Nebenzia yabwiye inama ya bose y’ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu yari yahamagajwe ngo yige ikibazo ca Ukraine, ko ibitero vy’Uburusiya bifise intumbero yo guhagarika ibikorwa bibi bikorerwa abasivile muri Donetsk na Kuhansk, uturere twa Ukraine duheruka kwemerwa n’Uburusiya nk’ibihugu vyigenga. N’aho Ukraine itari mw’ishirahamwe ryo kugwaniriza umwansi hamwe OTAN, ibihugu 27 biri muri iryo shirahamwe, uretse gufasha abanyagihugu ba Ukraine, vyagize urunani mu gufatira ibihano Uburusiya. Mu ngingo zikomeye zimaze gufatirwa Uburusiya, n’ukubuza ico gihugu guhererekanya amahera biciye mu mabanki kw’isi hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa SWIFT, kwugara ikirere ca Buraya ku ndege zikoreshwa z’abarusiya, gufata ubutunzi bw’abategetsi n’abarwizatunga bo mu Burusiya. Biragaragara ko ingingo zimaze gufatwa zimaze gukumira Uburusiya. Reta ya Ukraine na yo yahagurutse yivuye inyuma mu ntumbero yo kugwanya Uburusiya. Yashinze itegeko rihamagarira abagabo bafise inguvu gufata ibigwanisho bakagwanira igihugu cabo, kandi bakaba batemerewe guhunga. Abariko barahunga n’abagore n’abana. Mw’ijambo yavugiye mu nama nshingamateka y’igihugu ciwe, Prezida Biden wa Amerika yavuze ko prezida Putin yatanguje iyo ntambara azishura ikiguzi kiremereye mu gihe kirekire. Mu gihe iyo ntambara ibandanya, hari ibiganiro vyatanguye mu kugerageza guhagarika iyo ntambara. Intumwa za Ukraine n’Uburusiya ziramaze guhura mu biganiro vyabereye muri Biélorussie/Belarus, ariko nta co vyashitseko. Hategekanijwe ko ivyo biganiro bibandanya. Muri iki kiganiro c’isaha yose, Cyriaque Muhawenayo n’abatumire biwe bagerageza guca hirya no hino uko iki kibazo kimeze, aho kigana, ingaruka zaco n’umuti ukibereye.

headline: Ikiganiro n'umukuru mushasha wa CNDD FDD Gen Evariste Ndayishimiye
text: Umukuru mushasha wa CNDD FDD, Gen Evariste Ndayishimiye, yabwiye BBC ko umugamwe akuriye wemera jenoside yo mu Rwanda, ngo bihushanye n'ivyumviswe na ONU mw'ijambo uwo mugambwe uheruka gushikiriza.

headline: Darya Dugina: Ukraine niyo yishe umukobwa w’uwucuditse na Putin, niko Russia ivuga
text: Uburusiya  bwagirije inzego zidasanzwe za Ukraine kwica umukobwa w’umwe mu bacuditse cane na Vladimir Putin. Umunyamakuru Darya Dugina w’imyaka 29, yapfuye ku wa gatandatu igihe imodoka yari atwaye yaturikira hafi y’umurwa mukuru Mosco. Se wiwe, Alexander Dugin, umuntu w’ivyiyumviro bikaze mu gushira igihugu imbere (ultra-nationaliste) azwi kuba acuditse cane na prezida w’Uburusiya, ashobora kuba ari we yari agambiriwe. Urwego rw’Uburusiya rujejwe umutekano (FSB) ubu ruvuga ko rwahejeje gutohoza rugasanga Ukraine ifise uruhara rutaziguye muri urwo rupfu. Abategetsi ba Ukraine bari basanzwe bamaze guhakana ko ata ruhara bagize muri iryo turika. Ariko mu rwandiko rwashizwe ahabona n’ibinyamakuru vyo mu Burusiya, FSB irabeshuza ivuga ko inzego zidasanzwe za Ukraine zatumye ico gikorwa umuntu yashitse mu Burusiya mu kwezi kw’indwi hagati, ari kumwe n’umwana wiwe w’umukobwa w’umuhererezi. Ivuga ko uwo mugore yafashe inzu mu nyubakwa imwe ma madame Dugina  kugira agendereze ibijanye n’ubuzima bwiwe. Urwo rwego rujejwe umutekano ruvuga ko abo bakekwa bakoresha imodoka ya Mini Cooper yari ifise imparati zitatu zidasa. Uwo akekwa yaciye ahungira muri Estonia  iryo turika rihejeje kuba, nk’uko FSB ivuga. Madame Dugina na se bari mu giteramo hafi ya Moscou ku wa gatandatu ku mugoroba aho se, asanzwe ari umuhinga mu bumenyi  bwo kwiyumvira (philosophe), yariko aratanga icigwa. Bivugwa ko ubwa mbere bari bateguye kugenda bajanye mu modoka imwe,  ariko barabihindura ku munota wa nyuma. Abatohoza bavuze ko hari igiturika cari cashizwe munsi ya Toyota Land Cruiser Madame Dugina yari gutwara, ari co cayiturikije ikaka umuriro ukica uwo mukobwa. Video yashizwe ku mbuga hwaniro yerekanye se wiwe yashegeshwe ariko araraba ingene inzego z’ubutabazi bwihuta zariko zirafasha mu kuzimyya iyo modoka. Madame Dugina yari mu bashigikiye cane  igitero c’Uburusiya kuri Ukraine. Yari yashizwe mu bihano n’Ubwongereza mu kwezi kw’indwi nk’"uwuterera cane kandi kenshi mu makuru yo kuyovya ku kibazo ca Ukraine”. Se wiwe, Alexander, azwi kandi nk’’ubwonko bwa Putin” no kuba yaravugiye ku mugaragaro ko aterekwa Uburaya, ivyatumye amenyekana cane i Moscou- n’ubwo ata kibanza kizwi afise muri poritike. Mu 2014 yabwiye BBC ko intambara na UKraine idashobora kureka kuba, kandi  kuva kera yasaba ko Crimea yigarurirwa, ivyahavuye biba  muri uwo mwaka nyene.

headline: Ihiganwa rya Diamond League: Francine Niyonsaba yatsinze mu kwiruka imetero 5000
text: Umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba yavuze ati " nakoze ivyo nategerezwa gukora"  aho amariye kurusha mukeba wiwe umunya-Kenya Hellen Obiri agatahukana intsinzi ku  metero 5.000  mu gice ca nyuma c'ihiganwa rya Diamond League cabereye i Zurich mu Buswisi. Francine , w'imyaka 28,  yakuwe mw'ihiganwa kuri izo metero mu nkino za Olympic za Tokyo ahejeje igice ca mbere, yerekanye inguvu nyinshi mu kwiruka imetero za nyuma, aca arangiza ku minota 14:28.98. Ubundi Niyonsaba yahora yiruka imetero 800, yahinduye  kubera amategeko mashasha ajanye n'urugero rw'inkabuzo ya testosterone yashizweho kuva mu 2018. Yavuze ati : "Ndaciga kuva mpinduye, nakoze ico nategerezwa gukora". Ku ntsinzi amaze iminsi  atahana, ari mu banonotsi bo kwubaha ku metero 5.000. Ahejeje gutsinda uwufise umuhigo w'isi akagira n'umudari w'ifeza muri Olympic, Obiri, Francine Niyonsaba yavuze ati:  "Si nkiri uwo ku metero 800, ubu ndi uwo ku metero nyinshi. "Igihe twariko turiruka namaze umwanya munini ndi  inyuma , yari imikenyuro yanje. Mfise inguvu nyinshi zo kwivyukiranya hamwe n'ishaka ryinshi." Bamubajije ico yokora hamwe urwego ruraba inkino z'ubunonotsi rwokwagura ibirere (distance)  birabwa n'amategeko yarwo atavugwako rumwe, Niyonsaba yavuze atebura (atwenza) ko yiteguriye gusubira guhindura. "Nshobora kuja muri pole vault (saut à la perche)  canke high jump ( gusimba urukiramende)." Francine mu bisanzwe yari amaze kuba rurangiranwa kw'isi mu gusiganwa imetero 800, akaba mbere yaranatsindiye umudari w'ifeza mu nkino Olempike za Rio 2016. Ariko urwego rujejwe kunonora imitsi kw'isi rwaramubujije gusiganwa ku metero ziri munsi y'2000 ruvuga yuko imisemburo yaremanywe ya kigabo iri ku rwego ruri hejuru rudasanzwe mu bagore, gutyo ngo bikaba bimuha amahirwe y'ikirenga. Guhagarikwa gusiganwa mu metero 800 vyaramubabaje cane, ariko ntiyacitse intege akaba yarabandanije gukorana ubwira ku buryo ubu umuntu yovuga ko ibikorwa vyiwe bitanguye gutanga umwimbu. Francine Niyonsaba avuga ko abandanya amahiganwa kugira afashe guteza imbere inkino kugira ngo n'abandi bamwigireko. Uyu munonotsi w'umurundikazi Niyonsaba, w'imyaka  28, ni umwe mu banonotsi batari bake babujijwe guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya 400 na 1600 kubera urugero rw'inkabuzo (umusemburo) ya testosterone ruri hejuru. Inyuma y'umudari w'ifeza kw'isi no muri Olempike ku metero 800, Niyonsaba aza ku mwanya ugira kane kw'isi muri uno mwaka ku metero 5000 mu rwego rw'abagore. Avuga ku vyerekeye uku guhindurirwa, yagize ati: "Ubuzima ntibwanyoroheye ariko kandi ndakunda guhiganwa n'abandi. Narahanganye navyo n'ishaka ryinshi n'ukudacika intege". "Nta n'umwe yambaye hafi canke yipfuza kumbera umumenyereza mu kuva ku metero nkeya nja kuri nyinshi. Nta n'umwe yari yizeye ko nobishobora ariko jewe ubwanje nariyumvisemwo ko nobishobora". "Ndashobora kuvuga ko nagarutse kugira nteze imbere inkino nongere mbere akarorero abandi. Ndanezerewe cane". Niyonsaba ni umwe mu murwi w'abanonotsi bategetswe guhindura ibisata bahiganwamwo ku ngingo yafashwe n'urwego mpuzamakungu rujejwe inkino zo kwinonora imitsi mu 2019. Umunya-Afrika y'Epfo amaze gutahukana imidari itari mike kw'isi no mu nkino za Olempike ku metero 800, Caster Semenya, yarabuze uburenganzira bwo kuja mu nkino za Olempike ziheruka inyuma y'uko yimukiye ku ntera ndende. Umuyabaga w'umunya-Namibia Christine Mboma yatahukanye umudari w'ifeza ku metero 200 i Tokyo inyuma y'aho ategekewe kuva ku ntera y'imetero 400 yakunda cane, hasigaye indwi ziri ku rushi kugira ngo izo nkino zitangure. Niyonsaba abaye mu bihe vyiza cane mu mpera z'iri higanwa rya  Diamond League, inyuma y'aho mu nkino za Olempike ahejeje ari uwa gatanu ku metero 10.000, akanakurwa mw'ihiganwa ku metero 5000 yagirizwa ko yaciye mu nzira itari rwiwe. Yabaye umukobwa agize gatanu yiruka cane mu bihe vyose ku metero 3000 mu mahiganwa yabereye i Paris mu mpera z'ukwa munani, yongera akubita hasi umukenyakazi yari uwa mbere kw'isi Hellen Obiri  ku metero 5000 mu ndwi iheze i Buruseri (Bruxelles/Brussels) mu Bubirigi.

headline: MSF iratabariza abo muri Kivu ya ruguru kuko yo yarengewe
text: Ishirahamwe ry'abaganga batagira imbibe, Medecins Sans Frontiere canke MSF, risaba gushigikirwa mu bikorwa vy'ubutabazi muri Kivu ya ruguru muri Kongo kuko ryarengewe. MFS ivuga ko imaze igihe kinini ikora yonyene mu buseruko bwa Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo kuko ayandi mashirahamwe yamaze gukura meza kubera ingorane ahura nazo, cane cane umutekano muke. Mu cegeranyo c'iryo shirahamwe ry'abagira neza, rivuga ko mu gihe kingana umwaka umwe rimaze kuvura abana bashika ku 11.000 bafise ingorane zitandukanye zirimwo n'ibikomere vy'amasasu. Iryo shirahamwe kandi rivuga ko ryanavuye abagore n'abakobwa bashika 1800 bahohotewe mu gusambanywa ku nguvu. Aho yavugana na BBC, uwujejwe kumenyesha amakuru muri MSF mu gihu ca Kongo, Mack Alix Mushitsi, yavuze ko iryo shirahamwe rimaze kurengerwa. Yagize ati: "Mu mwaka wa 2018 amashirahamwe yandi y'abagiraneza yatanguye kugenda, ariko mu 2019 hoho vyarunyutse ku buryo dusigaye turi twenyene. "Muri Masisi, Mweso, Walikale na Rutshuru (muri Kivu ya ruguru) nta rindi shirahamwe rihasigaye kiretse MSF. Ntavyo twoshobora twenyene. "Hariho amashirahame aza akamara igihe gito agaca agenda. Dukeneye amashirahamwe aza ku mwanya mure mure". Ako karere ka Kongo karahuye n'ibibazo bikomeye birimwo bitero vy'imigwi yitwaje ibirwanisho co kimwe n'ibiza vy'indwara nka ebola na kolera. MSF ivuga ko abanyagihugu baho ubu babayeho nabi cane, kuko ata mazi meza yo kunywa baronka, ivyo kurya ntavyo bakaba kandi badashobora kuja mu matongo yabo kubera umutekano muke. Iryo shirahamew kandi rivuga ko abanyagihugu bari mu kaga bakeneye gufashwa bashika ku 680.000.

headline: Igisirikare ca Myanmar cagirije Suu Kyi kwakira $600.000 n'inzahabu
text: Abategetsi ba gisirikare muri Myanmar bagirije uwo batembagaje Aung San Suu Kyi kuba yarakiriye mu buryo bunyruranye n'amategeko ibihumbi 600 vy'ama dorari hamwe n'inzahabu. Nivyo bintu bikomeye cane yagirijwe n'abasirikare kuva batembagaje uwo mugore n'uburungozi bwa demokrasi itariki ya mbere ukwezi kwa kabiri. Brigadier general Zaw Min Tun yanagirije ibiturire prezida Win Myint na benshi mu bashikiranganji. Umugambwe wa Madame Suu Kyi, National League for Democracy, batsinze ku bwinshi amatora yabaye mu mwaka uheze, ariko igisirikare kivuga ko amatora yabayemwo ubusuma. Abigenga mpuzamakungu bakurikiranye ayo amatora ntibemera ibivugwa n'ico gusirikare, bavuga ko ata mahinyu babonye muri ayo matora. Madame Suu Kyi haheze indwi zitany apfungiwe mu kibanza kitamenyeshwa akaba yagirizwa ivyaha vyinshi birimwo gutera ''ubwoba no gutera umutima uhagaze", gutunga ama radio mu buryo buteye kubiri n'amategeko, no kurenga ingingo zijanye na Covid. Ico kirego co kwakira amafaranga aciye mu nzira zitemewe n'amategeko cashikirijwe ku wa kane nico gihambaye cane gushika ubu. Agaciro k'izo nzahabu igisirikare kivuga ko yahawe mu buryo bunyuranye n'amategeko zifise agaciro koba gashika mu bihumbi 600 vy'ama dolari. Myanmar cyugarijwe n'imyiyerekano mu mabarabara kuva igisirikare gifashe ubutegetsi kikanapfunga Suu Kyi. Ivyo bikaba vyatumye amenyekana gusumba. Abandi bantu nibura indwi bishwe n'inzego zijejwe umutekano kuri uyu wa kane , abamaze kwicwa bakaba baciye bashika ku 60. Ababibonye bavuga ko hari abari mu myiyerekano barashwe mu mutwe. ONU, Amerika n'ibindi bihugu vyinshi bariyamirije ubwo bwicanyi bw'abanyagihugu basanzwe muri uko guhasha abitaba imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi, basaba abategetsi kwigumya. Igisirikare nticemera ivyo kinegurwa, ahubwo cegeka kuri madame Suu Kyi  intureka iriko iraba.

headline: Ikipe y’Intamba mu Rugamba ngo yiteguriye kwitanga ku rukino rwa kabiri
text: Robert Patrick Misigaro, BBC. Ikipe y'intamba mu Rugamba, ivuga ko itazemera gusubira gutsindwa, mu gihe vyoshika izoca isezera igikombe ca Afrika 2019. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru, umumenyereza Olivier Niyungeko ntiyacishije kure mu kwerekana akamaro urukino wo kuwa kane na Madagascar ufitiye Intamba mu Rugamba. U Burundi buhirahiriye bugatsindwa urwo rukino, nta nkeka bwoca busezererwa muri iri higanwa butarenganye umuce wa mbere, ariko iyo kipe ngo ntiyiteze gukorwa mu jisho kabiri. Bwana Niyungeko yagize ati: " Iyi ni finale (urikino rwa nyuma) ya kabiri tugiye gukina, kuko tutayitsinze bizoba biheze. "Iya mbere yari umukino na Nigeria, kuko bose bavuga ko iyo kipe iza kuduhamba, ariko nayo yadutsinze twarwanye kigabo". Ikipe ya Madagascar u Burundi buzohura nayo ntawoyigereranya na Nigeira mu bukomezi, ariko nayo yarerekanye ko atari iyo gupfa guta mu ndasa aho yakina na Guinea. Madagascar nayo ni ubwa mbere igiye muri iri higanwa, yarihagazeko inganya 2-2 na Guinea. Umukino wayo urimwo igikenya cinshi, ukaba utandukanye n'uw'Intambamu Rugamba. Aho Intamba zobonera akoyoko, ni uko umumenyereza wa Madagascar, Nicolas Dupuis, yavuze ko ikipe yiwe yakuye imvune n'umuruho mu rukino rwa Guinea. Ku rupapuro Intamba zisumvya gato amahirwe Madagascar,  gusa kuri ibi kizigenza w'Intamba, Saido Berahino, yavuze ko ivyo atariko babibona. Saido yagize ati: "Dutegerezwa kububaha kuko twarabonye ko ari abakinyi bakomeye. "Turiteguye neza mu mutwe no ku mubiri, kandi buri mukinyi arazi ingene uru rukino ruhambaye. Tuzoba twameze magabo kuva ku firimbi ya mbere". Nigeria, iri imbere mu mugwi B n'amanota 3/3, yagaragayemwo ibibazo aho bivugwa ko abakinyi uno munsi banse kwimenyereza bivuye ku gashirukabute kabo batarahabwa. Umumenyereza wa Nigeria, Gernot Rohr, yaje wenyene mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru, abajijwe igituma ata mukinyi bazananye nk'uko vyategerezwa avuga ko hari abarwaye abandi nabo bakaba bari mu 'nama yihutirwa'. Ariko mu nyuma vyaje kumenyekana ko ari ikibazo c'imishahara abakinyi batarahabwa, ibintu vyashavuje abakunzi benshi ba Nigeria, berekanira ishavu ryabo ku mbuga hwaniro. Umugwi B ejo kuwa gatatu uzobamwo umukino hagati ya Nigeria na Guinea isaha 16h30, kuwa kane naho u Burundi buhure na Madagascar kuri ayo masaha nyene. Ushaka kumenye uko amakipe ahagaze mu migwi, uko ahura, uko atsindana hamwe n'amanota afise, urashobora kuja NGAHA.

headline: Acat-Burundi: Germain Rukuki yasohotse ibohero inyuma y'imyaka irenga ine
text: Germain Rukuki kuva ku mugoroba wo ku wa gatatu araye yidegemvya inyuma yo gusohoka ibohero rya Ngozi aho yari apfungiwe kuva agifatwa mu 2017, nk'ukwo vyemezwa n'umwe mu bashingwamanza biwe Maitre Ildephonse Congera. Germain Rukuki yari umukozi w'ishirahamwe riharanira agateka ka zina muntu ACAT Burundi, yari yakatiwe gupfungwa imyaka 32 mu 2018 ku vyaha vyo guhungabanya umutekano w'igihugu no kugarariza. Germain Rukuki yagumye ahakana ivyo yagirizwa kuva agifatwa. Yarekuwe hashizwe mu ngiro ingingo ya sentare isubiramwo imanza ya Ntahangwa yavanye igihano yari yaraciriwe c'imyaka 32 mu 2018 na sentare nkuru ya Ntahangwa ikagishira ku mwaka umwe gusa. Hari haheze iminsi icenda sentare iciye urwo rubanza, amashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka zina muntu akaba yari amaze gutangura gushikriza amakenga yo kuba atarekurwa ngo asohoke ibohero kandi sentare yamurekuye. Inyuma y'impari n'intureka vyakurikiye ingingo y'umuhisi prezida Pierre Nkurunziza yo kwitoza ubugira gatatu kurongora Uburundi mu 2015, amashirahamwe menshi adaharanira inyungu za poritike harimwo ayo agateka ka zina muntu yarahagaritswe canke arafutwa. Muri izo harimwo Acat-Burundi, Aprodh, Ligue Iteka, Focode, Forsc, Olucome, na Parcem. Iryo rya nyuma ariko ubu riherutse kwemererwa gusubira gukora. N'ibiro vya ONU bikurikirana agateka ka zina muntu mu Burundi vyarugawe burundu. Kuva ku myaka 32 gushika ku mwaka umwe Mu kwezi kwa gatandatu mu mwaka uheze urubanza rwiwe sentare gasamburamaza yararusambuye ica irusubiza mw'iburanishwa. Yari yasanze hari amategeko ajanye n'iburanishwa ry'imanza atari yubahirijwe igihe rwacibwa. Sentare isubiramwo imanza ya Bujumbura yaciye isubira kuruburanisha, irushira mu mwiherero mu kwezi  kwa gatatu. Yaciye urubanza rwo kugabanya igihano ciwe kuva ku myaka 32 gushika ku mwaka umwe gusa muri uku kwezi kwa gatantatu.

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Kane, Ronaldo,  De Jong, De Ligt, Kounde, Depay
text: Umukuru wa Bayern Munich  Oliver Kahn yashimagije umukinyi w’Ubwongereza na Tottenham, Harry Kane w’imyaka 28, nk’ "umusatirizi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru " n’"indoto ya kazoza", ni inyuma y’aho uyu murwi wemereye kugurisha Robert Lewandowski w’imyaka 33 muri Barcelona. (Bild giciye kuri  Star) Lewandowski yabonanye n’abakinyi bagenziwe bashasha muri Barcelona ku mweha wa Florida inyuma y’aho ibipimo vyo kwa muganga birangiriye maze bikamuha akaryo ko gutera igikumu ku masezerano y’imiriyoni 42,7 z’amapawundi avuye muri  Bayern Munich. (Mail) Barcelona irashaka kugura umufaransa akina inyuma muri Sevilla  Jules Kounde w’imyaka 23, asanzwe kandi aronderwa na Chelsea, inyuma y’aho uyu murwi wa La Liga ushikiye ku masezerano n’umusatirizi wa Pologne Lewandowski. (Marca) Hagati aho, nk’uko amakuru ava ahandi abivuga, Chelsea "iracari imbere" mu rugamba rwo kurondera uyu yahoze akina inyuma muri Bordeaux, Kounde, mu gihe Barcelona iriko itegura kwegera aba ba Blues irondera abakinyi babiri b’inyuma ba Espagne Marcos Alonso w’imyaka 31, hamwe na Cesar Azpilicueta w’imyaka  32. (Mirror) Umukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Hollande Frenkie de Jong ntashaka kwimukira muri Manchester United canke mu murwi uwo ari wo wose wo mu Bwongereza, ahubwo uyu mukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona w’imyaka 25 yoba ashaka kwimukira mu murwi wa Bayern Munich watahukanye ihiganwa ry’Ubudagi, Bundesliga, mu mwaka w’inkino uheze. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) Bayern Munich yemeye gutanga ikindi gifovya c’amafaranga angana n’imiriyoni 59.5 z’amapawundi, no kwongerako uturusho tw’imiriyoni 8.5 z’amapawundi, ku mukinyi w’inyuma wa Juventus umunya-Hollande Matthijs de Ligt w’imyaka 22, ni mu gihe ibiganiro hagati y’iyi mirwi yompi bigeze ku musozo. (Goal) Tottenham iriteguye gutanga imiriyoni 17 z’ama euros ku musatirizi wa Barcelona umunya-Hollande Memphis Depay w’imyaka 28, ariko uyu murwi wa Espagne wowo umushakako imiriyoni 20 z’ama-euro, kandi na we nyene ntarashaka kuva  muri Camp Nou. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) Abarongoye Barcelona bagiriraniye ibiganiro na Depay kugira bumve nimba uyu mukinyi yahoze akinira Manchester United yipfuza kugenda canke kuguma mu murwi. (Fabrizio Romano) Manchester City yongereje akariro mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wa Espagne Marc Cucurella w’imyaka 23 akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu muri  Brighton  mu kurondera gusubiriza umunya-Ukraine Oleksandr Zinchenko w’imyaka 25 asanzwe ariko araronderwa na Arsenal. (Sun) Cristiano Ronaldo w’imyaka 37 aramirira kure ibihuha bivuga ko ashobora gutizwa mu murwi wa Sporting Lisbon yahoze akinamwo. Uyu kizigenza w’umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Portugal yanditse ngo “Fake” mu kwishura inkuru yacishijwe kuri Instagram y’imboneshakure Sport TV Portugal yerekana uyu musatirizi wa Manchester United yashize imodoka yiwe ku kibuga ca Sporting. (Sun) Umusatirizi wa Chelsea umunya-Albania Armando Broja agiye gutizwa muri West Ham mu mwaka umwe w’inkino. Aba ba Hammers bari bashatse kugura burundu uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 20 ariko aba Blues ntibashaka kumugurisha inyuma y’umwaka w’inkino wari uheze akinira Southampton yari yatijijwemwo. (Mail) Umwongereza akina inyuma Levi Colwill w’imyaka 19 ashobora kuraba ko yosezera mu murwi wiwe wa Chelsea mu gihe uyu murwi wa Stamford Bridge wogura abandi bakinyi b’inyuma muri rino ci. (Athletic)

headline: Imvo n'imvano ku kibazo ca Afghanistan
text: Ikiganiro c’uyu musi cerekeye inkuru imaze iminsi ivugwa cane kw'isi, iyo nayo nta yindi n'ikurwa ry'ingabo z'Amerika n'abo bafatanyaga mw'ishirahamwe ryo kwivuna abansi NATO / OTAN mu gihugu ca Afghanistan. Izo ngabo zari zimaze imyaka 20 ziri muri ico gihugu kiri muri Asia yo hagati. Kuri uyu wa gatatu, igenekerezo rya 31 z’ukwezi kw’umunani  ni ho harangira intamabara yahuza Amerika n’incuti zayo hamwe n’aba Talibani  ku mugaragaro nk’uko biri mu masezerano y’i Doha izo mpande zibiri zari zashizeko umukono mu biganiro vyabahurije mu gihugu ca Qatar kw'itariki 29 z'ukwa 2 mu mwaka uheze wa 2020. Amerika yari yagiye muri ico gihugu inyuma y’ibitero vy’iterabwoba vyo kuwa 11 ukwezi kw’icenda mu 2001, vyagizwe i New York bihitana abantu 3.000 mu bibanza bitandukanye, aho ico gihugu cavuga ko kigiye gushigikira demokrasi no kurandurana n’imizi iterabwoba ry’umuhari Al-Qaeda. Ico gihugu n’incuti zaco zihurukiye mw’ishirahamwe ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe OTAN, baciye birukana aba Talibani bari ku butegetsi mu ntambara bivugwa ko yagiye iratwara amadolari imiriyaridi 100 buri mwaka.  Inyuma y’imyaka cumi y’intambara y’urutavanako n’uruhigi rukomeye rwo gufata canke kwica  Osama Ben Laden, yari arongoye umuhari wa Al-Qaeda, Amerika yaje kumwicira mu gihugu kibanyi, Pakistan. Kuva Amerika itanguye gukura abasirikare bayo muri ico gihugu, aba Talibani baciye batangura kwigarurira ibisagara bitandukanye harimwo n’umugwa mukuru Kaboul. Bagifata Kaboul, umuvugizi w’aba Talibani yabwiye BBC ko bijeje abanyagihugu ba Afghanistan muri rusangi, cane cane ababa mu gisagara ca Kaboul vy’umwihariko, ko ivyo batunze, ubuzima bwabo,  vyose biri mu mutekano, ko ata kwihora bizobaho. Ufatiye kuri aya majambo umuntu yovuga ko aba Talibani b’ejo atari bo b’uyu musi? Ko Afghnistani kigiye kuba igihugu kirangwamwo amahoro n’umutekano? Coba kigiye kwemerwa n’amakungu? Kazoza k’iyindi mihari yishimikiza idini rya Islam n’akahe? Muri kino kiganiro Cyriaque Muhawenayo ari kumwe na Manirambona Jean Bosco, umwigisha muri kaminuza y’Uburundi, Ismael Buchana umwigisha kuri kaminuza mu Rwanda, akaba ari n’icegera c’uwurongoye ishirahamwe riharanira iterambere ry’abanyafrika mu Rwanda, hamwe rero na Gilbert Mwenedata umuhinga muvyo gucunga imigambi y’iterambere, akaba yarakoreye mu bihugu nk’Urwanda, Republika ya Demokrasi ya Congo na Afghanistan. Ubu akaba akorerera muri Amerika mu ntara ya Washington DC.

headline: 'Nobwira abigeme ko buri muntu afise ico ashoboye n'ico ashobora gushikako - Sada Nahimana
text: Sada Nahimana, umwigeme abaye rurangiranwa mu rukino rwa tennis, ahamagarira abandi bigeme b'Abarundi kumenya impano bafise bakaziharanira kugira ngo bashobore gushika nk'aho nawe ageze. Ni inyuma y'aho ku wa Mungu uheze atsindiye ihiganwa mpuzamakungu rya Tennis ITF ku ruhande rw'abagore (W15) ryabera muri Turukiya, atsinze urukino rwa nyuma rwamuhuje n'umunya Ukraine Soboleva Anastasiya. Ati: "Nobwira abigeme ko buri muntu afise ico ashoboye n'ico ashobora gushikako, ikiriho rero ni ukukimenya ukakirondera n'umutima wawe wose". Uyu mwigeme w'umurundi w'imyaka 20 niwe mwigeme wa mbere w'umurundi ageze kuri uru rwego muri iri higanwa. Yabwiye BBC ko ryari ihiganwa ritoroshe mbere ko vyamutangaje kubona yarashoboye gutahukana intsinzi ikomeye. Ati: "Sinibaza ko nshobora gutsinda iri higanwa, eka mbere n'ubu ntavyo ndemera. Mfise umunezero mwinshi kubona nshoboye guserukira igihugu canje, akarere ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko eka mbere n'umugabane wose. "Ndazi ko ku mugabane wose wa Afrika ari jewe mukobwa w'umwirabure jenyene ndi kuri uru rwego, ibi bikantuma ngira intege zo kurondera gushika kure, nkagera ku rugero rw'ibihangange kw'isi". Sada avuga ko abigeme b'Abanyafrika badakunze gushika kure kubera batinya, bakibaza ko ataco bashoboye hamwe kandi no kubura uburyo bw'ingene bashobora kwerekana ivyo bazi, agatera akamo abanyafrika muri rusangi gushigikirana. Ati: "Nshaka ko abantu bamenya ko ari ngombwa ko Abanyafrika bo nyene ubwabo ari bo bategerezwa gufasha Abanyafrika bakagera kure". Sada abaye mu Barundikazi bake bageze ku rugero rukomeye ku rwego mpuzamakungu, hampande ya Francine Niyonsaba mu gutsindira amahiganwa mpuzamakungu, ivyo avuga ko bitera iteka igihugu. Ati: "Birandyohera iyo ndi mu gihugu kanaka nkaza numva ngo 'Ah kumbe uva mu Burundi? Urazi Niyonsaba'?". Mu gihe ikiza karanda ca Covid-19 cahungabanije ibisata bitari bike harimwo n'inkino, Sada avuga ko ata kintu kinini iki kiza camugize mu rugendo rwiwe, kuko "bagerageza kudufasha kugira ngo twumve y'uko dukina nko mu bihe bisanzwe". Avuga ariko ko ingorane nyamukuru yari uko basa n'abatamba birorera kubera ata barorerezi bari mu kibuga, kiretse abakinyi n'abamenyereza gusa, ibi navyo bigatuma urukino rutagira akanovera. Ati: "Nivyo ko iyo haba abarorerezi haci ico bifasha, ugasanga urukino ruraryoshe nawe ukumva inguvu zirongerekanye. Ariko twebwe nk'abakinyi tuba dushaka guhiganwa. Jewe nta ngorane vyanteye kuko nagumye ku ntumbero yanje". Ivanguraruhu - yirinda gutwarwa n'ishavu Sada yatanguye gukina tennis afise imyaka umunani, avuga ko igihambaye ari ukugumiza umutima hamwe, umuntu agashira imbere intumbero ashaka gushikako, hagutwarwa n'ishavu . Aremeza ko ivyo bibazo biriho ariko ko bo nk'abakinyi bisa n'aho batahuye navyo. Ati: "Jewe ntaco bimbwiye. Ndazi ko hari abafise ivyo vyiyumviro mu mitwe. Abitwaza ivanguraruhu ntaco bambwiye, ndabafata uko nyene kuko abantu bari uko bari, nta kundi. "Jewe naratembereye mu bihugu vyinshi; ikintu nyamukuru kuri jewe ni ukugumiza umutima hamwe, ugashira imbere urukino, nkirinda gutwarwa n'ishavu". Uyu mwigeme akomoka mu Buyenzi mu gisagara ca Bujumbura - ubu asanzwe aba mu Bufaransa - avuga ko intumbero yiwe ari ukubandanya aja imbere gushika ashitse ku rwego rw'ibindi bihangange vy'abakobwa/abagore kw'isi . Ati: "Ico nipfuza ni uko nogera ku rugero rwo guhiganwa n'ibihangange kw'isi nka Serena Williams n'abandi, ngatsindira ubushimwe bukomeye. "Si nshaka gusumba uwo ari we wese, nshaka gusumba uko nari ejo, nkabandanya nserukira Afrika".

headline: Ukraine: Umusirikare w'Uburusiya yaciriwe uwo guherayo ku caha co mu ntambara
text: Sentare muri Ukraine yaciriye urubanza rwo gupfungwa ubuzima bwose umusirikare w'Uburusiya yategeka ikiduga c'intambara kubera kwica umunyagihugu asanzwe mu rubanza rwa mbere rw'ivyaha vyo mu ntambara kuva igitero gitangura. Uwo musirikare yafatiwe ku rugamba Sgt  Vadim Shishimarin yagiriwe n'icaha ko kwica Oleksandr Shelipov, w'imyaka 62, mu kigwati Chupakhivka co mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko ku wa 28 ukwezi kwa Ruhuhuma(2). Yemeye ko yarashe  Shelipov  ariko avuga ko yagendera ku mategeko hanyuma asaba imbabazi umupfakazi w'uwo yishe. Ibindi vyaha vyinshi vyo mu ntambara biriko birakorwako amatohoza muri Ukraine. Uburusiya burahakana kuba abasirikare babwo baratose abanyagihugu basanzwe muri ico gitero, n'ubwo hari ivyemezo vyinshi vyerekana igihushane c'ivyo,  mu gihe Ukraine ivuga ko ivyaha birenga 11.000 bishobora kuba bimaze gukorwa. Ubutegetsi bw'Uburusiya bwavuze ku wa mbere ko butewe impungene n'ivyerekeye umusirikare wabwo kandi ko bugiye kuraba ingene bwomuburanira. Umuvugizi wa Kremlin, Dmitry Peskov yavuze ko  yamara, Uburusiya ''budafise ubushobozi bwo guhagararira inyungu ziwe amaso mu yandi''. Ubuserukizi bw'Uburusiya i Kyiv ubu burugaye. Amuha igihano co gupfungwa ubuzima bwose, umucamanza  Serhiy Agafonov yavuze ko Shishimarin yashize mu ngiro ''itegeko ry'icaha'' ahawe  n'uwumukurira. ''Kubera icaha cakozwe ari icaha ku mahoro, umutekano, zina muntu n'amategeko mpuzamakungu ... sentare  ntibona ingene yoca  igihano co gupfungwa kigufi kurusha ico,'' nk'uko yavuze. Shishimarin, yari yambaye agapira nk'inkofero k'amabara ry'ubururu n'igipfungu (gris), yakurikiye isomwa ry'urubanza ari mu kumba k'ibiyo muri sentare kandi akaba ata kimenyetso yigeze yerekana ko hari ico bimubwiye. Umushingwamanza wiwe yavuze ko azokwunguruza. Urwo rubanza rwabereye ku murwa mukuru wa Ukraine, Kyiv, rubonwa nk'akaryo  kuri Ukraine ko kwerekana ko umusikare w'Uburusiya yishe umunyagihugu asanzwe atitayeho amategeko y'intambara. Imbere y'uko urwo rubanza rusomwa, umushingwamanza wa  Shishimarin -yatanzwe na reta- yabwiye BBC News  ko ko ata mutegetsi w'Uburusiya n'umwe yarondeye ko bavugana. Igihe uwo muntu yaraswa, Shishimarin w'imyaka 21, n'abandi basirikare bariko bagendera mu mudoka bari bafashe  urukurikirane barimwo rumaze kuraswa hanyuma bagatandukana n'abandi bari kumwe. Niho babona  Shelipov ariko aravugira kuri terefone, nk'uko  Shishimarin yabwiye sentare. Avuga ko yaciye abwirwa kumurasa akoresheje inkoho. Uwumwunganira mu mategeko yabwiye sentare ku wa gatanu ko  Shishimarin  yarashe inyuma y'incuro zibiri yanka amategeko yo kurasa kandi ko rumwe gusa mu masasu atatu cane ane arirwo rwagemye uwo yariko ararasa. Yavuze ko Shishimarin yarashe kubera ubwoba bw'umutekano wiwe akaba yabajije niba uwo yunganira koko  yari agambiriye kwica. Mu gihe kimwe c'urubanza, umupfakazi  Kateryna Shelipova yahanganye na  Shishimarin. Aramubaza ati : "Mbwira, ndagusavye. Kubera iki baje (Abarusiya) ngaha? Kudungikira? " aho akaba yasubiyemwo ivyavuzwe na prezida w'Uburusiya Vladimir Putin atanga imvo yo gutera Ukraine. "Mudukingira nde? Mwankingiye umugabo wanje, uwo mwishe?" Uwo musirikare nta nyishu yari afise kuri ivyo bibazo. Asaba ikigongwe umupfakazi, yavuze ati: " Ariko ndumva ko udashobora kumbabarira." Madame Shelipova yabwiye BBC ati: "Arambabaje ariko ku caha nk'ico -sinshobora kumubabarira." Kuva prezida Putin ateye Ukraine ku wa 24 Ruhuhuma (2), nibura abanyagihugu basanzwe 3.838 baramaze kwicwa abandi 4.351 barakomereka, ku bwa ONU. Mu bishwe harimwo benshi bikekwa ko baguye mu vyaha vyo mu ntambara mu bisagara vyifatiwe n'Uburusiya nka Bucha. Mu minsi iheze y'uku kwezi nyene, BBC yararonse amasanamu ya CCTV y'iyicwa ry'abanyagihugu basanzwe babiri n'abavugwa ko ari abasirikare b'Uburusiya, urwo rupfu ubu rukaba ruriko ruratohozwa n'abashikirizamanza nk'igishobora kuba ari icaha co mu ntambara.

headline: Kurondera amamuko nyafrika y''intambo y'intambara ya Brazil, capoeira
text: Brésil  izwi nk'amamuko y'ubuhinga bwo kurwana busa n'intambo buzwi kw'izina rya capoeira, ariko amamuko nyezina mu bisanzwe yinjiye aciye mw'ibahari Atlantic. Marcia Veiga yandika ko muri Angola hari umugabo umwe ariko aragerageza kuvyura iyi ntambo yo muri kahise kugira ngo afashe abantu gusubira kw'iragi ryabo. Gatatu mu ndwi, ubushuhe bwo ku mugoroba burakubita, Lucio Ngungi ari mu kibuga ahantu hamwe i Luanda ku mugwa mukuru wa Angola. Akurikira akayira kagana ku kibuga c'umupira w'amaboko, mu gihe izuba ririco riracokera, hatangura kwumvikana amashi, indirimbo n'ingoma vy'abanyamuziki. Ku muzingi, abanyeshure bambaye T-shirts z'umuhondo ziriho 'masks' za kera, barindiranye igishika cinshi co kwinjira mu muzingi  babiri babiri. Bose ica rimwe, batangura bazunguruka bunamye i buryo n'i bubamfu, mu ntambo izwi nka Ginga. Umwe muri bo, asa n'uwataye umutwe, Ngungi, umukuru wabo yatwawe n'akaririmbo ngo: "Nta kindi gisigaye, hari ubumenyi butandukanye". Iyi rero ni Capoeira Angola, ubuhinga bundi bwo kurwana ariko bukoreshwa gake cane muri Bresil no muri Angola yo nyene ubwayo. Ariko izina ryayo ubwaryo rirerekana amamuko yayo yo mu binjana bitari bike - imbere y'uko abantu bagirwa abaja bakavanwa muri ako karere ko mu bumanuko bwa Afrika bakajanwa muri Amerika y'Ubumanuko kuba abacakara. Yavuyemwo ico icitwa Brésil ubu ibona ko ari umudiho ukomoka mu karanga nyafrika. Ibicurarangisho bifise uruhara ntangere mu gusamaza abarorerezi. Capoeira Angola irimwo akantu ko guterekera, kandi usanga ahanini batambira hasi cane. Nico gituma n'umuziki ugenda buke buke ugereranije n'umudiho uzwi cane, unzwi nka Capoeira Regional. Itandukaniro riri hagati ya  Capoeira Angola na Capoeira Regional ntiryoroshe kubona, ariko muri Capoeira Angola harimwo ibicurarangisho vyinshi kandi abayikora bumva ko ari nk'umugenzo wo gusenga. Intumbero ya Ngungi ni uko ubu bwoko bw'iyi ntambo bumenyekana cane mu bantu. Hafi imyaka 20 iheze, yatanguye kwimenyereza muri Capoeira Regional, ariko haciye imyaka indwi, yahavuye yumva ivya Capoeira Angola aca atahura ko Regional itari rwiwe. Uyu mugabo w'imyaka 36 ati: "Nagumye nibaza nti kubera iki mbandanya nkina Regional kandi nshobora kwishikira ku muzi w'igihugu canje". N'aho ata makuru akwiye yari afise, yarondeye kumenya umunya Brésil Pedro Trindade - yari azwi kandi nka Mestre Moraes - akaba yari yarigishijwe ko ari we muhinga yafashe iya mbere mu kunagura Capoeira Angola mu myaka ya 1980. Ngungi ati: "Rimwe rimwe ndashavura iyo niyumviriye ingene uruhara rwa Angola muri capoeira rwibagiwe". Mestre Moraes avuga ko uruhara rwa Afrika rwasuzuguwe, kimwe mu vyabitumye kikaba ari ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba. Asigura ati: "Yaramenyekanye nka kimwe mu karanga ka Afrika hanyuma ifatwa ko yari iyo kurwana kubera ishirahamwe ry'abacakara". Hagati mu kinjana ca 16, mu gihe bariko barakora mu mirima, abacakara batanguje icagiye kuba ishusho ya mbere ya capoeira ya Brésil, yahinduwe ubuhinga bwo kurwana buba nk'intambo kama. Inyuma y'aho ubucakara buvaniweho muri Brésil mu 1888, reta yarabujije capoeira, kubera ubwoba ko abacakara baronse ubwigenge bashobora kuyikoresha mu migumuko yari kugorana guhagarika. Yarabandanije mu kinyegero kandi abirabure benshi babandanije bakora icitwa ubu Capoeira Angola bakorera mu bibanza bitazwi, kandi bakoresha amazina atari yo mu kwiyoberanya. Mu myaka ya 1930, Reis Machado, azwi cane kw'izina rya Mestre Bimba, yatanguje uburyo bwo kwigisha capoeira bwatumye yoroha kwiga. Amaze kwumvisha ubutegetsi agaciro k'ubu buhinga bwo kurwana mu mico, bwahavuye bukuraho itegeko ryabuza capoeira, ivyamuhaye akaryo ko gutanguza ishure rya mbere ryigisha capoeira muri Brésil. Hagati aho, capoeira yabandanije gusuzugurwa, cane cane n'abanya Brésil bisununuye. Abonye bimeze uko, Mestre yaciye ashiraho ayandi mategeko ngenderwako - ategeka ko kuja muri yo utegerezwa kuba wambaye impuzu yera kandi nziza, ategeka abanyeshure kuza basa neza, mbere aca ashiraho n'uburyo bwo gutanga amanota ku barusha abandi. Ibi vyatumye capoeira ikwega abantu bashasha baciye batangura gukorera  capoeira mu nzu. Aha rero niho hatanguriye Capoeira Regional. Bitumwe n'uko hari bamwe babandanije bagendera kw'ishusho ya kera, bahavuye bemeranya ko boyita Capoeira Angola  kugira ngo bayitandukaye na capoeira Regional. Ariko uko imyaka yagiye iragenda, niko yagiye ishirwa ku ruhande ivamwo iribagirwa cane. Regional ifise umudiho unyaruka ugereranije na Capoeira Angola. Mestre Bimba yarongeye aravyorosha mu bicurarangisho bikoreshwa, aca akoresha cane umuduri n'ingoma. 'Yarangabanirije ishavu' N'aho yitwa gutyo, ibivugwa ko capoeira ifise amamuko muri Angola biracateye amadidane, kuko abacakara bavuye ku bivuko vya Luanda bari abavanywe mu turere dutandukanye twa Afrika yo hagati n'ubumanuko twose. Ariko ifitaniye isano n'intambo za Angola, nk'akarorero iyizwi nka N'golo - aho imisore ibiri irwana yigana ingene imparage zibiri zirwana barwanira umukobwa. Ariko, n'aho amamuko nyezina ataboneka neza, Ngungi yariyemeje gusubira muri kahise karanze igihugu imbere y'ubucakara yongere ahimirize abanya angola kwishimira akahise kabo. Yahunze afise imyaka 15 mu gihe ca ya ntambara yo muri Angola, ariko atahutse mu gihugu mu 2014, yashatse gufasha kuzana impinduka mu gihugu. Ngungi yabaye umuntu afasha abanyagihugu, hanyuma atanguza ishure ya mbere ya Capoeira muri Angola, Escola de Capoeira Angola Okupandula, bisigura ngo "ndagushimira wewe ngashimira na ba sokuruza". Yahawe ipete rya Contramestre (bisigura umuyobozi), kandi afise akarwi gato, ariko gafise ishaka, k'abanyeshure. Utujwi tw'ibi bicurarangisho -  agogô (amafirimbi), atabaque (ingoma) n'imiduri vyumvikana mu micungararo y'iri shure turyoheye ugutwi. Umunyeshuri w'imyaka 17 yitwa Kelly agira ati: "Nari mpagaze ku rubaraza neraguza irya n'ino kugira menye iyo ayo majwi yariko arava, ariho nagiye mbona Contramestre". Eka na Marcos w'imyaka 18 ni uko nyene, aho yagiye kumenya Capoeira Angola yumvise uwo muziki igihe yari ku rubaraza, haraciye imyaka itanu. Ati: "Nkina  Capoeira Angola imisi itanu mu ndwi kandi ndakunda ingene ingabaniriza ishavu, ikamfasha kwiyumva neza, ikamara irungu, kandi ikamfasha kwibagira ivyo hanze". Ukwigisha abanyeshure insiguro ya kahise ka Angola hampande y'umuco w'abanyaburaya ni ngombwa kuri iyi shure. 'Mu kintu kinini cane' Aguinelo umunyeshure akiri muto w'imyaka 15 ati: "Nize vyinshi ku muco wanje ndetse n'igihugu canje biciye muri Capoeira Angola gusumba kw'ishure". Mestre Moraes agereranya Capoeira Angola na ca kimenyetso cerekana isi idahera (symbole de l'infini/infinity symbol), ashaka kuvuga ko hagati mu muzingi umucapoeirista (ni ukuvuga uwukora capoeira) yumva ata mipaka ihari kandi ata n'umwe asumba uwundi. Ati: "Ikwigisha ko uri mu kintu kinini cane" . Abanyeshure ba Ngungi ni bo kimenyetso cavyo. Marcos ati: "Numva nishimiye kuba mfise ikibanza mu kintu kimbohoza cavuye mu bucakara, nk'umuntu nigenga". Indoto ya Ngungi ni uko umusi umwe yozogura ubutaka bukwiye yokwubakamwo ishure kugira ngo abandanye ahimiriza urwaruka gukoresha Capoeira Angola. "Nditaho cane abantu banje kandi nama ndiko ndiyibutsa ko kwishura ivyiza bankoreye atari agahato ahubwo ko ari igikorwa ntegerezwa gukora".

headline: Papa Francis yagenye abakardinali bashasha: Harimwo Umunyarwanda Antoine Kambanda
text: Papa Francis ahejeje gutangaza amazina y'abakardinali bashasha 13 muri bo hakaba harimwo Musenyeri mukuru wa Kigali, Antoine Kambanda. Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda ni we Munyarwanda wa mbere agenywe kuba umukardinali. Muri abo 13, icenda bari munsi y'imyaka 80, bafise uburenganzira bwo kuba mu murwi w'abakardinali bashobora gutora umusubirizi wa Papa mu gihe yokwitaba Imana canke agatanga imihoho. Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda afise imyaka 61, yavukiye mu Bugesera, mu 2018 nibwo Papa Francis yamugize Musenyeri mukuru (Arkepiskopi) wa Kigali canke umukuru wa Ekleziya Gatolika mu Rwanda. Kambanda yize amashuri mato n'ayisumbuye mu Burundi, muri Uganda no muri Kenya imbere yo kurangiza  ivyigwa vya Tewolojiya muri Seminari nkuru ya Nyakibanda mu Rwanda. Inyandiko za Ekleziya mu Rwanda zivuga ko mu kwezi kwa cenda mu 1990 aribwo Papa Paul II yamugize umupatiri. Kuva mu 1993 yagiye kwiga i Roma aho yavanye impamyabushobozi y'ikirenga muri Tewolojiya. Inyuma y'amashuri yiwe, igihe kinini yari umwigisha muri seminari nkuru ya Nyakibanda, aza no kuyiyobora kugeza mu 2013. Muri uwo mwaka wa 2013 nibwo Papa Francis yamugize musenyeri wa Diyosezi ya Kibungo kugeza mu 2018 ahabwa amabanga yo kuyobora kiliziya mu Rwanda. Kardinali ni rwo rwego rukuru rwo mu butegetsi bwa ekleziya umuntu ashobora kugerako imbere yo kuba Papa, umuyobozi wa Ekleziya Gatolika kw'isi. Ekleziya Gatolika yari isanzwe ifise abakardinali 219, muri abo 29 gusa ni bo bo muri Africa, mu gihe igihugu nk'Ubutaliyano conyene gifise abakaldinali 41. Ibihugu vya Africa bisanzwe bifise abakardinali ni: Aba bakardinali bashasha 13 batowe na Papa Francis bazemezwa kuri iyo mirimo kw' igenekerezo 28 z'ukwezi kwa 11 nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru gitangaza amakuru ya Vatican. Muri bo harimwo uwitwa Mauro Gambetti yari asanzwe ari umupatiri. Urwego rw'abakardinali rumeze nka reta ya Papa. Bamwe bakorera i Vatican abandi baguma bakorera mu bihugu vyabo bakajayo igihe batumijwe. Amategeko abagenga avuga ko Abakardinali igikorwa cabo ca mbere ari ugutora umu Papa mushasha iyo uwusanzwe ahari apfuye canke avuye mu mirimo. Gusa muri bose, 120 ni bo baba bagize inama itora Papa mushasha. Bashingwa kandi iyindi mirimo itandukanye harimwo gukurikirana ibikorwa vy'abasenyeri, guhagararira amashuri ya Ekleziya, ivugabutumwa, eka bakagira n'inteko ijejwe sentare zitatu za ekleziya. Abakardinali ariko kandi baba bajejwe guhagararira diyoseze n'imiburiburi zibiri canke zirenga mu bihugu bakomokamwo. Abakardinali bambara ibara ry'umutuku kuvyo amategeko ya katolika asobanura ko baba "biteguye kumena amaraso yabo mu gukorera uwo basubiriye intumwa Petero."

headline: Umusoda ari muzabukuru yarangije urugendo rudasanzwe muri Afrika yigisha ingwara itamenyerewe
text: U﻿musirikare w'ipete rya Colonel ari mu karuhuko k'izabukuru afise ingwara ya Parkinson's yarangije urugendo rwiwe yakoze ari wenyene muri Afrika rwo guhimiriza abantu kumenya ivyerekeye iyo ngwara. G﻿uy Deacon aturuka mu karere ka Dorset mu Bwongereza, yagiye arafata amasanamu y'urugendo rw'ibirometero vyababa ibihumbi 20 atwaye imodoka kuri uwo mugabane, rwarangiriye i Cape Town mu ndwi iheze. U﻿wo mugabo w'imyaka 60, yasanganywe ingwara ya Parkison haraciye imyaka 11, yavuze ko urwo rugendo "rwasa n'urudashoboka" mu gihe iyo ngwara yaguma yiyongera. Hari i﻿kiganiro kuri urwo rugendo rwiwe kizokorwa amaze gusubira mu Bwongereza. U﻿wo yahoze arongoye ikambi ya Bovington avuga ko muri Afrika batazi vyinshi ku vyerekeye Parkinson, aho abafise iyo ngwara bafatwa nk'ibivume. A﻿vuga ko yavugiye kuri Radio no ku mboneshakure vy'igihugu mu gufasha "kubandanya bavuga ivyerekeye iyo ngwara. Parkinson’s ni ingwara igenda ikura mu mubiri, ikaba ifata igice c’ubwonko gikora imisemburo yitwa dopamine, ikamugaza ubushobozi bw’umubiri bwo kugenzura ivyo ukora (movement/mouvement). Nta muti w’iyi ngwara uraboneka. Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y’abantu kw’isi rivuga ko ariyo ngwara ifata ubwonko iriko iriyongera cane kurusha izindi kw’isi. A﻿riko Deacon, yamaze igihe muri Afrika aciga kuri kaminuza n'igihe yari mu gisirikare, yaragize ikibazo co guhangana n'iyo ngwara ariko arashiramwo inguvu nyinshi mu kuyimenyekanisha. Y﻿agize ati: "Igihe nari muri Ghana, naramerewe nabi. Nafashe imiti atari yo, nca ndatakara, nahatswe kuja mu bitaro. "﻿Ariko hari umugabo yaje kuntora, arandeka ndaryama mu cumba c'umukobwa wiwe. Uwo muryango warangwajije, bari bafise umutima mwiza." A﻿vuga ko atigeze agira ingorane n'abantu, kandi ko "bitanze uko bashoboye kugira bamufashe. Vyari bitangaje". A﻿gira ati: "Bafise bike, bagatanga vyinshi." K﻿uba uwo mu Colonel ari mu karuhuko k'iza bukuru afise ingwara ya Parkinson bisigura ko adashobora kwandika "kubera intoke zanje ntizigikora neza", bigatuma "bigorana gukoresha ibintu bimwe bimwe nk'amahera". A﻿riko avuga ko gutwara imodoka vyamworoheye kuko yashira intoke ziwe aho zitegerezwa kuja kuri vola. D﻿eacon yagize ati: "Uko iyo ngwara yagenda ikomera, vyari "ibintu bisanzwe kudashobora kwikomakoma. "﻿Narerekanye ko nshobora kubikora, ariko bingoye. Vyasa n'ibidashoboka, bisa n'uko ingwara ya Parkisnon yantsinze." A﻿shitse muri Afrika y'Epfo, uwo mugabo w'imyaka 60 yagize ati: "Gutura umuzigo nari nikoreye vyaranduhuye cane. "N﻿arazimije imodoka, nca ndyamika umutwe kuri vola. Nari ndushe cane." U﻿mukinyi wa Cinema Rob Hayward, yahuye na Deacon incuro zine mu gufasha kwerekana ivyo yaciyemwo, yagize ati: "Wari warengewe Guy, iminwa yawe yariko iragugumwa." U﻿yo mu Colonel na we yaravyemeje agira ati: "Vyari bigoye cane. Ariko muri jewe nariyumvira [nti] hari ico nsigaje mpomba? "﻿Bazombona uko meze. Ntawuzi ububi bw'iyi ngwara. Naravuze ntaciye ku ruhande. "﻿Ku muntu yaciye mu gisirikare, kurira imbere ya Camera, bisigura ikintu".

headline: Iran: Abantu bashika 50 baguye mu birori vyo kwunamira Soleimani
text: Abantu bashika 50 basize ubuzima mu musunikano w'abantu isinzi bari mu  birori vyo gushingura umutegetsi wa gisirikare wa Irani yishwe n'igitero ca drone y'abanyamerika mu ndwi iheze. Abashika 200 nabo bakomeretse. Vyari vyitezwe ko Soleimani ashingurwa uno munsi ku wa kabiri mu gatondo. Ivyo vyatumye ifubwa ry' uyo mutegetsi, Qasem Soleimani, ribanza kuba rirahagaritswe umwanya mutoya. Soleimani azoshingurwa mu gisagara yari asanzwe avukamwo ca Kerman, aho abantu baharurwa mu mamiliyoni  bavugwa ko bamaze kwuzura amabarabara mu birori vyo kumushingura. Igandagurwa ryiwe ryatumye haba ubwoba ko hashobora kwaduka intambara hagati ya Amerika na Irani. Soleimani yafatwa nk''umutegetsi agira kabiri havuye indongozi nkuru ya Irani Khamenei. Amerika yoyo yamufata nk'umuntu akora iterabwoba kandi abangamiye ingabo za Amerika. Icateye uwo musunikako gushika ubu ntikiramenyekana neza, ikizwi gusa ni uko amabarabara ya Kermen yari yuzuye abantu isinzi. Muri ivyo birori vyo kumushingura vyari vyitezwe havugiwe amajambo menshi akomeye, aho abategetsi ba Irani basubiye gutangaza ko batetegerwa kwihora. Jenerali-Majoro Hossein Salami, umwe mu bategetsi ba gisirikare yabwiye isinzi ryari aho ati: "Incungu yacu Qassem Soleimani ni umuntu akomeye…raba rero yapfuye!" Nk'uko bivugwa n'abamenyeshamakuru bari aho, abari ku kigandaro baririmba ngo "Amerika uragapfa" hamwe na "Trump uragapfa". Umunyeshure w'imyaka 18 yari aho yabwiye umumenyeshamakuru wa AFP ati: "Soleimani yari umuntu akomeye cane yari yiteguye gukorera igihugu…uko bizogenda kwose azohorwa". Ejo ku wa mbere, Ayatollah Khamenei niwe yarongoye igisabisho a Tehran, harageze igihe arakorora amosozi yegamiye kw'isandugu irimwo ikiziga ca Soleimani.

headline: Twitter itegura kubonana na Manchester United kw’ityozwa rya Pogba
text: Twitter igiye kubonana n'umurwi Manchester United n'abarongoye ishirahamwe Kick It Out  inyuma y'ityozwa rya Paul Pogba rishingiye ku macakubiri y'urukoba. Uyo mukinyi w'umwirabure akomoka mu Bufaransa yabaye umukinyi agize gatatu mu ndwi imwe gusa atyojwe ku mbuga hwaniro, inyuma y'uguhusha penalty . Abagenzi batari bake bakinana na Pogba bariyamirije iryo tyozwa. Umumenyereza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'abagore w'Ubwongereza, Phil Neville, wewe akaba yasavye abakinyi "guheba gukoresha" imbuga hwaniro. Twitter ivuga ko izobonana n'abo bose vyegwa kugira ngo yerekane ko iriko irakora "ibishoboka vyose" kugira ngo ihagarike ityozwa. Mw'itangazo yasohoye, yagize iti: "Ingendo y'amacakubiri nta kibanza ifise ku rubuga rwacu kandi turayiyamirije cane". "Mu ndwi nkeya ziri imbere, abarongoye Twitter bazobonana na Manchester United, n'amashirahamwe yandi ataho yegamiye abifisemwo uruhara yipfuza kumenya igikorwa Twitter iriko irakora kugira ngo ihagarike ityozwa rishingiye ku macakubiri y'urukoba rikorerwa abakinyi bamwe bamwe mu Bwongereza". "Kuri iyo mvo, turiteguye gukorana gusumba n'incuti zacu kugira ngo dutorere hamwe inyishu kuri iki kibazo". Twitter yoba iriko ifata ingingo izahe? Ingingo ngenderwako za Twitter zirabuza abanywanyi bayo ubugizi bwa nabi, iterabwoba n'uguhohotera abantu bisunze ku rukoba, ubwoko canke n'iyindi mirwi y'abantu itegerezwa gukingirwa. Kuva mu 2018, igitigiri c'ama 'comptes' yahagaritswe cariyongereye kubera yarenze kuri izo ngingo gushika ku bice 45%, ico gitigiri kikaba cariyongereye incuro zitatu mu masaha 24 inyuma y'aho ironkeye ayo makuru. Pogba yateye 'penalty' ku munota wa 68 ica ifatwa n'umunyegori Rui Patricio, mu rukino rwahuza Man United na Wolves ku wa mbere rwarangiye iyo mirwi yompi inganya igitsindo kimwe ku kindi. Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Man United Harry Maguire yasavye amakompanyi y'imbuga hwaniro "guhagarika ubutumwa bubiba urwanko". Nawe umusatirizi Marcus Rashford ati "ibi bintu birarenze, bitegerezwa guhagarikwa". Phil Neville yahoze akina mu murwi Manchester United avuga ati "guheba gukoresha" imbuga hwaniro vyotanga "ubutumwa bukomeye". Umurwi Manchester United nawo uvuga ko uriko "ukora  uko ushoboye kugira umenye" abatyoje Pogba. Eka n'urubuga rwa Facebook rwasohoye itangazo aho rumenyesha ko "rugiye gushirako uburyo bwo kuzibira ityozwa n'ihohotera", kandi ko abantu bazorenga kuri izo ngingo "bazosezererwa burundu".

headline: France: Cardinali Ricard ari mu basenyeri 11 bagirizwa guhohotera abana
text: Umu cardinali w’Umufaransa Jean Pierre Ricard yavuzwe izina na Ekleziya Katolika nk’umwe mu basenyeri 11 bagikorera canke bigeze gukorera iryo shengero bagirizwa guhohotera abana Mw'itangazo, uyo mu cardinali yanditse ko yahohoteye  umwana w'umukobwa w’imyaka 14 igihe yari akiri padiri kw'iparuwase haraheze  imyaka mirongo 35,  kandi ko ubu ashobora gukura meza mu mabanga yiwe. H﻿araciye umwaka, umugwi washinzwe utoye ivyemeza ko hari ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abantu bashurashuza abana, bakorera mw'ishengero Katolika ry'Ubufaransa mu myaka irenga mirongo ibiri. Uko   bagirizwa ari 11 bose barashengejwe mu butungane canke bahabwa ibihano na Ekleziya Katolika. I﻿bi vyagiye ahabona mu gihe mu gihe hariko haraba inama y'abepisikopi b'Ubufaransa i Lourdes, mu bumanuko bushira uburengero bw'Ubufaransa. Musenyeri mukuru Eric de Moulins-Beaufort yabariye abamenyeshamakuru ko muri abo 11 harimwo Musenyeri wa Creteil Michel Santier yagiye mu karuhuko ko muzabukuru mu mwaka uheze inyuma yo kwagirizwa ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina mu myaka  mirongo ibiri iheze. Bamwe bariko bakorwako amatohoza ajanye n'ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina  mu gihe abandi bagirizwa kubinuma. Musenyeri mukuru yasomeye ku mugaragaro ikete rya Cardinali Ricard, aho yavuze ko yitwaye nabi "mu buryo bukwiye guhanwa" ku mwana w'umukobwa w’imyaka 14 kandi ko  mu vy’ukuri imyitwarire yiwe yagize ingaruka mbi kandi  zitazopfa zibagiwe kuri uwo mwana w'umukobwa. Mu gihe ubu ari mu karuhuko k'iza bukuru inyuma y'imyaka 18 ari musenyeri wa Bordeaux, uwo mu cardinali w'imyaka 78 yavuze ko yamusavye ikigongwe kandi asaba n'imbabazi ku bantu bose yababaje. M﻿usenyeri ahari ubu, Jean Paul James, yavuze ko yifatanije umubabaro n'abakorewe icaha, aca asubira gutera akamo uwo ari we wese yoba yarahohotewe muri iyo diyoseze kubivuga. Umukuru w'imana y'abepisikopi yavuze ko kiretse uwo mu Cardinali na Michel Santier, abasenyeri batandatu bagirijwe n'ubutungane canke ishengero kandi ko  umwe aza yaramaze gupfa. Yongeyeko ati:"A﻿bandi bahoze ari abasenyeri bariko baragirwako amatohoza n'ubutungane mu gihe uwundi wa gatatu amaze kwitaba abashikirizamanza." Mu cegeranyo cayo co mu kwezi kwa 10 mu 2021 , akanama kigenga kashizweho na Ekleziya Katolika yo mu Bufaransa kasanze abana ibihumbi 216 barahohotewe kuva mu myaka ya 1950, benshi muri bo bakaba bari abana b’ababahungu bari gahati y’imyaka 10 na 13. Umukuru w'ako kanama yavuze ko hari ivyemezo ko hari abakoze ihoterwa bashika 3.200 kandi ko ivyo vyemezo vyarahawe  abashikirizamanza mu mice 22 aho ingingo zo gukurikiranwa kuri ivyo vyaha zishobora gufatwa. U﻿bufaransa ni kimwe mu bihugu aho ibivugwa ko habaye ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina vyateye vyanyiganyije ishengero ya Ekleziya Katolika. Mu mwaka uheze, Papa Francis yarahinduye amategeko agenga ishengero Katolika kugira ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina, kwiyegereza abana ugamije kubashurashuza, gutunga ama film y’abana bariko barahuza ibitsina hamwe no gukingiranira ikibaba ku caha c'ihohoterwa, ko ari icaha gihanwa n'amategeko ya Vatikano. Mu butumwa yatanze imbere y'uko hatangura iyo nama y'abepisikopi i Lourde, Papa yavuze ko ishengero ryo mu Bufaransa ryaguye mu gahundwe kubera ihohoterwa ryakozwe na bamwe mu bungere baryo. I﻿yo nama yari ifise intumbero yo guteza imbere uburyo bwo guhanahana amakuru no gukorera mu muco ku mabi y'ihohoterwa ishengero rifisemwo uruhara.

headline: Coronavirus: Iki kiza kiriko gikora ibara mu turere tw’abirabure b’Abanyamerika
text: Ibiharuro biteye agahinda bitangwa n'abajejwe amagara y'abantu mu gisagara ca Chicago vyerekana ibitigiri vy'umurengera vya coronavirus mu banyamerika b'abirabure. Abirabure bo muri Chicago bangana hafi igice c'abamaze kwandura coronavirus muri ico gisagara, hamwe n'ibice birenga 70% vy'abamaze guhitanwa n'uwo mugera, n'aho bangana n'ibice 30% vy'abanyagihugu baba muri ico gisagara. Eka n'ibindi bisagara bifise abirabure benshi, harimwo Detroit, Milwaukee, Nouvelles Orléans na New York, navyo nyene vyabaye ikiririmbiro rya coronavirus. Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ziharurwamwo hafi abantu 370.000 bamaze kwandura uwo mugera, hamwe n'abashika 11.OOO bamaze gupfa. Gushika ku wa 05 z'uku kwa kane, abantu 1824 kuri 4680 bari bamaze kwandura Covid-19 muri Chicago, bari abirabure, nk'uko vyashikirijwe n'abarongoye ico gisagara ejo ku wa mbere. Aho ni mu gihe abazungu bari bamaze kwandura ari 847, aba Hispanic (abanyamerika bava muri Amerika y'Epfo bavuga iki Espagnole) 478, hamwe na 126 bakomoka muri Aziya. Gushika ku wa Mungu, Chicago yari imaze guharurwamwo abantu 98 bamaze gupfa, muri bo ibice 72% bakaba ari abirabure. Ubwo busumbane buribonekeza mu ntara yose ya Illinois, aho abamaze guhitanwa na Covid-19 ibice 41% ari abirabure, mu gihe bagize ibice 14% vy'abanyagihugu bose baba muri iyo ntara. Umukuru w'igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu mu gisagara ca Chicago, Dr Allison Arwady, avuga ko abirabure bari basanzwe babayeho mu buzima bubayabaye ugereranije na bagenzi babo b'abazungu. Umukuru w'ico gisagara, Lori Lightfoot, avuga ko coronavirus "ibandanya  yiha inkumbi mu birabure ba Chicago". Avuga ko abagenzuzi b'igisagara bashobora kuzunguruka mu maduka kugira ngo barabe ko bose bakurikiza ingingo zo kutegerana. Umupfasoni Lightfoot, avuga y'uko bibaye ngombwa bashobora gutera umukwabu bagahagarika uruja n'uruza mu turere abantu bakoraniramwo bihereza inzoga zikaze cane, nk'uko vyandikwa n'ikinyamakuru gikorera aho muri Chicago, Sun-Times. N'aho coronavirus ivugwa ko "itarenganya", ibiharuro birerekana ko uburere bwose butabangamiwe ku rugero rumwe. Muri Michigan, Abanyamerika b'abirabure bangana ibice 14% vy'abanyagihugu bose, ariko mu bantu bose bamaze kwandura abirabure bangana n'ibice 33%, nayo mu bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima abirabure bangana n'ibice 41%, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu muri iyo ntara ejo ku wa mbere. Muri abo bamaze kwandura muri iyo ntara nyene, abazungu ni ibice 23% , hamwe na 28% vy'abamaze gupfa, nk'uko ivyo biharuro bivyerekana. Mu gisagara ca Detroit muri iyo ntara ya Michigan, abirabure bangana n'ibice 80%, abashizwe ukwabo muri ico gisagara no mu micungararo yaco bakaba ari ibice 80%. Ubwo busumbane kandi buribonekeza mu gisagara ca Milwaukee c'intara ya Wisconsin, kiri mu bisagara vyashizwe inyuma cane muri Amerika. Mu bantu hafi 1000 banduye ku wa gatanu w'indwi iheze muri Amerika, hafi inusu y'abanduye mu gisagara ca Milwaukee bari abirabure, bakaba kandi bangana n'ibice 81% muri 27 bapfuye muri ico gisagara, n'aho abirabure baba muri co bangana n'ibice 26%, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'icigwa cakozwe n'ikigo ProPublica. Mu ntara ya Louisiana, ibice hafi 40% vy'abamaze guhitanwa na coronavirus biri mu karere ka Nouvelle-Orléans gasanzwe gatuwemwo n'abirabure benshi gusumba abandi. Muri Amerika, ico kiza kiriko kirunyura ubusumbasumbane bufatiye ku butunzi n'amoko, nk'uko Dr Cameron Webb, umunyamerika w'umwirabure ariko yiyamamariza ubukenguzamateka mu ntara ya Virginia yabibwiye BBC. Ati: "Ni ukuri kiriko kiragaragaza ubusumbasumbane buri mu gihugu cacu".

headline: UK: umushikiranganji yasavye imbabazi inyuma y'amashusho amwerekana asomana n'umufasha
text: Imiryango yaburiye ababo muri ca kiza karanda Covid-19 iragabisha ko umushikiranganji Matt Hancock yubahutse agasomana n'umufasha mu biro iwe bishobora gutesha urubwa reta, bigatuma abantu bahonyanga amabwirizwa ajanye no kutegerana mu ntumbero yo kurwanya iki kiza. Vyabaye ngombwa ko uyu mushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu asaba imbabazi inyuma y'aho amashusho avugwa ko yafashwe ku wa 06 z'ukwa gatanu amwerekaniye ariko asomana na Gina Coladangelo. Ishirahamwe riharanira agateka k'ababuze ababo bahitanywe na Covid-19 (Covid-19 Bereaved Families for Justice) rivuga ko mu gihe vyonanirana ko Hancock yirukanwa bishobora kugira ingaruka mbi nk'izabaye kuri Cummings, maze abantu bagahonyanga amabwirizwa. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wewe abona ko ikibazo carangiye. Umuvugizi w'ibiro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere avuga ko Boris Johnson yemeye imbabazi zasabwe na Hancock, kandi ko afitiye icizere uyu mushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu. Ishirahamwe Covid-19 Bereaved Families for Justice ryandikiye umushikiranganji wa mbere Johnson rimusaba kwirukana Hancock mu gihe atotanga imihoho, rikibaza mbere nimba uyu mushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu akibereye kuba umutegetsi yofata ingingo zijanye na Covid. Rivka Gottlieb wo mw'iryo shirahamwe yavugiye mu kiganiro The World Tonight ca BBC Radio 4 ati: "Mu gihe yoramuka atangaje izindi ngingo za guma mu rugo canke ayandi mabwirizwa, ubona hari n'umwe yokwumvira umuntu na we ubwiwe adakurikiza amabwirizwa"? "Ivyo twese vyaratubabaje. Kuri Cummings ntacabaye, yibandanirije akazi kiwe, ehe raba ivyabaye, abantu baciye batangura guhonyanga amabwirizwa. Mfise ubwoba ko ivyo ari vyo bishobora kuba". ingingo yo kutegerana ku kazi si itegeko, ariko reta isaba ko abantu batandukana imetero zibiri aho bishoboka - canke imetero imwe, hampande y'izindi ngingo zo kugabanya ikwirakwira, nk'izijanye n'ukwambara udupfukamunwa. Mu kwa gatatu kw'uno mwaka, umuhanuzi mukuru w'umushikiranganji wa mbere ico gihe, Dominic Cummings, yaniramuye afata urugendo rw'ibirometero birenga 418 ava i Londres aja mu karere ka  Durham kandi igihugu cari ingingo za guma mu rugo. Ico gihe reta yari yafashe amategeko akomeye yo kugabanya uruja n'uruza Mu nyuma we n'umugore wiwe bagiye kwandura Covid. Abanyagihugu bariyamirije Cummings, ariko umushikiranganji wa mbere yaramuryamaryamyeko, mu kuvuga ko ata "kundi yari kugira" atari ugufata urwo rugendo. Prof Stephen Reicher, wo kuri kaminuza yigisha ibijanye n'inyifato, University of St Andrews' School of Psychology, avuga ko icatumye inyifato ya Cummings ibonwa "nabi cane" si ukubera vyakozwe n'umuhanuzi wa reta, ariko ni ukubera ingene Boris Johnson yamuvugiye. Prof Reicher yabwiye Newsnight ca BBC Two ati: "Ugusamara kw'umuntu umwe kwatumye abantu bibaza ibibazo ku ntwaro, aho babona ko hari itegeko rituraba twebwe irindi rikaraba abandi". "Mu gihe igihugu gihanzwe n'ibibazo bikomeye, dukeneye reta twizeye, kandi dukeneye reta dushobora kwumviriza". Abashikiranganji bandi bari muri reta bashigikiye uyu mugenzi wabo ajejwe amagara y'abantu. Ariko Sir John Curtice yigisha ibijanye na poritike kuri kaminuza ya Strathclyde yabwiye BBC BBC Radio 4 ivyo ari vyo vyose umushikiranganji Hancock ata mahoro azoronka. Ikinyamakuru The Sun, ari naco ca mbere cerekanye aya masanamu ya Hancock n'umupfasoni Coladangelo kikayashikana mu biro bijejwe amagara y'abantu, yerekana n'ayandi mashusho y'aba bantu babiri ingene bavyifatamwo. Iki kinyamakuru kivuga ko iyi sanamu iheruka yerekana Hancock n'umupfasoni Coladangelo bari mu nzu y'uburiro ku wa 23 z'ukwa gatanu - haciye imisi 17 herekanywe amashusho y'ingene bariko basomana.

headline: South Korea: Kompanyi y'amata yasavye imbazi kubera yerekanye abagore nk'inka
text: Kompanyi ya mbere nini y'amata muri Korea y'Epfo vyabaye ngombwa ko isaba imbabazi kubera video yo kwamamaza (publicité, advert) yerekana abagore nk'inka. Iyo video ya Seoul Milk yerekana umugabo ariko afata rwihishwa amashusho y'abagore bari mu murima, mu nyuma baca bahinduka inka. Imaze kunegurwa cane, iyo kompanyi yaciye ivana iyo publicité kuri YouTube, ariko kuva ico gihe imaze guhererekanywa cane inyuma yo gusubizwa  ku mbuga n'abakoresha internet. Bamwe bagereranije kandi inyifato y'uwo mugabo na "molka", ingeso itemewe yo gufata amashusho abantu rwihishwa. Ishami rya Seoul Milk, Seoul Dairy Cooperative ryavuze mu mbabazi ryashize kuri internet riti: "Turasavye imbabazi bivuye ku mutima ku muntu wese yababajwe n'iyo publicité y'amata yasohotse itariki 29 mu kwezi guheze". "Twemera ko iki kibazo gikomeye kandi tozokwisuzuma, hanyuma turushirizeho kwiyubara kugira ibintu nk'ibi ntibisubire gushika muri kazoza. Turicishije bugufi mu gusaba imbabazi". Iyo video itangura yerekana umugabo afise camera ariko yitembereza mu gahinga. Ijwi ry'umugabo ryumvikana rivuga ngo: "Amaherezo twashoboye kubafata amashusho na camera mu kibanza ciza cane". Aho haca hakurikira uwo mugabo yinyegeje mu bisaka, ariko afata amashusho rwihishwa umugwi w'abagore bariko baranywa amazi mu mugezi bongera bagira yoga. Hagera aho uwo mugabo ahonyora atabishaka kw'ishami ry'igiti, abo bagore bagaca bikanga buno nyene bagaca bahinduka inka. Iyo publicité irangizwa n'aya majambo: "Amazi meza, indya nziza, amata ya Seoul Milk ni  100%. Amata atagira akanenge, avuye mw'iraro ritagira akanenge mu murima uteye igomwe wa Cheongyang." Iyo publicité/advert yatumye haba impari zikomeye mu gihugu ku bijanye n'ivangura n'ibindi bibazo bishingiye ku bitsina ariko ibineguro ntivyagarukiye ku kwerekana abagore nk'inka gusa. Bamwe barerekanye amakenga yo kuba umugabo afata rwishishwa amashusho y'abagore, mu gihe ivyaha vyo gufata amashusho rwishishwa vyagwiriye cane muri Korea y'Epfo muri iyi myaka. Molka, bisigura "camera yinyegeje", ubu yabaye ikibazo kidasanzwe ku bagore muri Korea y'Epfo. Si ubwa mbere Seoul Milk ivugwa mu binyamakuru kubera imvo zitari nziza. Mu 2003, iyo kompanyi yatunganije agakino aho abanyamideri bari gusa basukanako ikivuguto   (yoghurt). Umukuru w'igisata co kwamamaza muri Seoul Milk hamwe n'abagize uruhara muri ako gakino baratangishijwe ihadabu kubera kwerekana ibiterasoni.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru: Bellingham, De Jong, Lindstrom, Mudryk, Gomes, Kiwior
text: Borussia Dortmund imenyesha ko umurwi uwo ari wo wose urondera umwongereza akina hagati Jude Bellingham w’imyaka 19, asanzwe aronderwa na Manchester United be na Liverpool, woba uregeranya imiriyoni zababa 130 z’amafaranga y'abongereza ,pound (ni ukuvuga imiriyoni zirenga 147 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika).  (Athletic) Ikintu ca mbere Bellingham ashira imbere mu ci riza ni uko yokwimukira muri Real Madrid. (El Chiringuito kibicishije muri Marca ) Arsenal yavuganye na Jesper Lindstrom w’imyaka 22 akina muri  Eintracht Frankfurt  kugira irabe ko yoronka uyu mukinyi wo hagati w’umunya-Danemark ku miriyoni 17 z’ama-pound mu kwa mbere. (Bild ). Arsenal ishobora guhangana na Brighton mu rugamba rwayo rwo kurondera umunya-Ukraine akina ku ruhande, Mykhaylo Mudryk w’imyaka 21, asanzwe akina muri Shakhtar Donetsk, mu kwa mbere. (Express) Igiciro c’imiriyoni 30 z’ama-euro zitangwa na Everton kuri Mudryk camiriwe kure mu gihe  Shakhtar imushakako imiriyoni zirenga 50 z’ama-euros, ariko Arsenal ikaba ataco iravuga. (Fabrizio Romano) Umukinyi wo hagati Frenkie de Jong w’imyaka 25 akomoka mu Buhollande avuga ko "yamye yipfuza kuguma muri Barcelona" inyuma yo kwanka kwimukira muri Manchester United ku miriyoni £65 z’ama-pound mu gihe c’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi giheze. (Mirror) Icegera c’umukuru w’umurwi Flamengo wo muri Brezili avuga ko ata murwi n’umwe urigera umushikira urondera Joao Gomes w’imyaka 21, uyu munya-Brezili akina hagati akaba aronderwa na Liverpool be na Manchester United. (ESPN) Manchester United yaripfuje gutanga umubirigi akina hagati Andre as Pereira w’imyaka 28 kugira imuguze na Gomes mw’igura n’igurishwa riheze, imbere y’uko yimukira muri Fulham. (Talksport) Umumenyereza wa Celtic Ange Postecoglou avuga ko guheba uyu murwi ngo aje kumenyereza Leicester City  bitari mu mutwe iwe. (Sky Sports) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona  Sergio Busquets  w’imyaka 34 aripfuza kuja gukina muri Inter Miami ya David Beckham yo mw’ihiganwa Major League Soccer ryo muri Amerika amasezerano yiwe arangiye mu ci riza. (Sport) Umusatirizi wa Espagne Marco Asensio w’imyaka 26 ntarahebura ku mugambi wiwe wo kuva muri Real Madrid akimukira mu bakeba ba Barcelona.
