(Sport – kibicishije muri  El Partidazo de Cope) Amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri yateweko igikumu mu kw’indwi n’umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona umufaransa Ousmane Dembele w’imyaka 25, arimwo igice kivuga ko uwuzomwipfuza ashobora kuzomuronka ku miriyoni 50 z’ama-euro, iki kikazobandanya gushika mu ci riza. (L'Equipe) Barcelona iragabisha ko ishobora kwitwarira ikinyamakuru El Mundo inyuma y’aho gitangarije amakuru aramvuye ku bijanye n’ibiganiro uyo murwi wagiriraniye na Lionel Messi ku bijanye n’amasezerano imbere y’uko yimukira muri Paris St-Germain. (Mail) Nta murwi n’umwe washoboye gushitsa ibisabwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi riheze ku mukinyi wo ku ruhande wa PSV Eindhoven, umunya-Hollande Cody Gakpo  w’imyaka 23, yari asanzwe aronderwa na Manchester United, Southampton, Leeds United na Arsenal. (Voetbal International kibicishije muri TalkSport)

headline: Burundi: leta itangaza ko hari abandi 21 banduye Covid-19
text: Leta y'Uburundi itangaza ko hari abandi barwari 21 bashasha banduye wa mugera karanda wa coronavirus. Mwitangazo ryasohowe nijoro n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu, abo 21 batowe mu bantu 202 biketswe ko banduye bapimwe hagati yo ku wa 27 gushika ku wa 30 z'ukwezi guheze kwa gatandatu. Iryo tangazo rimenyesha ko mu barwayi 54 bari basanzwe bariko baravurwa, batatu muri bo ari bo bapimwe bagasanga nta migera bagisigaranye. Umukuru w'igihugu aherutse gutangaza ko agiye kwitwararika gusumba kurwanya iki kiza, akaba mbere yaranatangaje ingingo zitandukanye mu ntumbero yo guhangana naco. Gushika ubu, ibiharuro vyerekana ko abantu 191 aribo bamaze kwandura uwo mugera; muri abo 118 bakaba bamaze gukira, nayo 72 bakaba ari bo bakirwaye, umwe akaba yaritavye Imana. Ubushikiranganji bubandanya busaba abanyagihugu gukurikiza ingingo zo kuzibira kwandura canke kwandura, izo nazo zikaba zirimwo gukaraba n'amazi meza n'isabuni canke arimwo umuti wica imigera. Ubwo bushikiranganji busaba kandi abanyagihugu kwirinda kuramukanya no guhoberana, kwirinda kwasamurira mu bandi, kwambara udupfukamunwa ku bavuzi, abarwaye covird-19 n'abamaranye umwanya b'abarwaye. U Burundi ni kimwe mu bihugu ata mategeko ruhasha vyafashe agamije kurwanya ikiza coronavirus, bikaba mbere vyaratumye bwiyamirizwa henshi mu makungu. Hagati aho, umukuru w'igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye aherutse kumenyesha ko atanguje urugamba rwo kurwanya ico kiza karanda. Mw'ijambo aherutse gushikiriza inama nshingamateka ku musi wo kuzahiza leta nshasha ku wa 30/06/2020, Perezida Ndayishimiye yatangaje ingingo zitari nke mu ntumbero yo kurwanya ico kiza. Yagize ati: "Turasavye umurundi wese, hamwe n'umunyamahanga ari muri iki gihugu guhaguruka kuko akatavuga ntigahenda akavuga". KLeta y'u Burundi iherutse kwirukana abaserukiye ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS biturutse ku kutabona kumwe ikibazo ca coronavirus. Hari n'abavuga ko leta yoba inyegeza ibitigiri nyavyo vy'abanduye uwo mugera, ivyo abategetsi b'u Burundi bamirira kure.

headline: Iran-USA: Igitigiri c’Abanyamerika bagize ibibazo vyo mu bwonko mu gitero ca Iran congerekanye
text: Amerika ivuga ko igitigiri c'abasirikare bayo bagize ibibazo vyo mu bwonko (traumatic brain injuries, TBI) kubera ca gitero ca Iran ku ngabo za Amerika muri Iraq mu kwa mbere kigeze kuri 109. Ico gitigiri kirengeye kure cane n'igitigiri ca 64 caheruka kumenyeshwa n'ibiro vyo kwivuna abansi bwa  Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Pentagon. Mu ntango, Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika wewe yari yamenyesheke ko ata Munyamerika n'umwe yigeze agira ikibazo muri ico gitero. Bwana Trump yamenyesheje ivyo ashaka gusigura igituma Amerika itasubije ico gitero co ku wa 08 z'ukwa mbere. Ico gitero cakozwe na Iran mu kwihora igandagurwa ry'umujenerali w'ico gihugu ryakozwe n'igisirikare ca Amerika. Itangazo ryasohowe na Pentagon rivuga ko hafi ibice 70% ry'abasirikare bagize ibibazo basubiye ku kazi kabo. Mu kwa mbere, Pentagon yavuze ko igituma ibitigiri vy'abagize izo ngorane zo mu bwonko biguma biduga ari uko ibimenyetso bimwe bimwe bifata umwanya muremure kugira ngo vyibonekeze. Ejo ku wa mbere, umushingamateka wa Amerika Joni Ernst wo mu mugambwe w'abarepubulikani yasavye izindi nsiguro. Ati: "Ni ngombwa ko haba integuro yo kuvura aba basirikare bagize ibibazo". "Nasavye Pentagon ko ubuzima bw'ingabo zacu zarungitswe muri Iraq bwokurikiranwa kubera  zishobora guhura n'ibitero vy'amabombe". Mu kwezi guheze, Perezida Trump yafashe ko ibibazo vyo mu bwonko izo ngabo zagize nk'inkurikizi y'ico gitero ari ingorane nto cane. Ati: "Narumvise ko hari abari bamenetse umutwe, bagira n'ibindi bibazo bimwe bimwe, ariko mvuga nti, kandi ndavyemeza, si ibintu bikomeye". "Si mfata ko ari ububabare bukomeye mfatiye ku bwo nabonye muri kahise". Igisirikare ca Amerika kivuga ko ibibazo vyo mu bwonko ku basirikare bari mu karere k'intambara ari ibintu vyama vyabaye. Ikigo ca gisirikare kijejwe kwitaho abahuye n'ibibazo vyo mu bwonko kivuga ko ingorane zo mu mutwe ku basirikare bari ku rugamba ziva ahanini ku bibombe baterwa. Abasirikare barenga 400.000 barahuye n'ivyo bibazo kuva mu mwaka wa 2000 nk'uko bivugwa na leta ya Amerika.

headline: Umuntu agira kabiri vyemejwe ko yahitanywe na Ebola muri DRC
text: Umurwayi agira kabiri yahitanywe na Ebola muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo nyuma yaho ikiza gishasha cadukiye mu muji wa Mbandaka, mu ntara ya Equateur. Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS, ryavuze yuko uwo muntu wa kabiri ari umugore wo mu muryango w'uwapfuye ubwa mbere. Mu kiganiro kuri telefone, Dr Gervais Folefack yabwiye BBC ko "vyari bigoye kugira umugwi w'abajejwe kurwanya ico kiza ushobore kumenya iyo yagiye kuko yawutorotse akaja mu masengesho". Yongeyeko ati "igihe uwo mugwi washikira uwo mugore, amazi yari yamaze kurenga inkombe. Yacikanye atararonswa ubuvuzi na bumwe. Abo bose uko ari babiri bapfubwe hisunzwe amategeko yo kwirinda". Kuwa mbere abajejwe ivy'amagara bavuze yuko abantu barenga 100 bamaze kumenyekana ko bashobora kuba barahuye n'abo bahitanywe na Ebola, hakaba hitezwe ko urucanco rutangwa muri ino ndwi. Kongo iramaze kubonekamwo ibiza vya Ebola 13, harimwo kimwe caheze mu myaka ibiri iheruka, kikaba carahitanye abantu barenga 2000. Ibipimo vyasuzumwe mu kigo gikuri gipima indwara i Kinshasa vyerekana yuko iki kiza gishasha ataho gihuriye n'ivyakibanjirije. Amatohoza arabandanya yo kumenya aho iki kiza coba carazananye. Inkingo 1.300 zirategekanywa kurungikwa i Mbandaka zivuye i Goma mu buseruko bw'igihugu, gukingira bice bitangura kuwa gatatu.

headline: Taiwan: Umudereva w'indege yanduje abantu Covid yirukanywe mu kazi
text: Umudereva w'indege yagirizwa iyandukiza ry'umugera wa coronavirus ubwa mbere (inyuma y'amezi menshi) muri Taiwan, yirukanywe ku kazi na kompanyi yo muri iryo zinga yitwa Eva. Ku musi wa kabiri, uwari yamanye n'uwo mudereva bamutoye uwo mugera, aca arangiza imisi 253 yari iheze ata mu ntu wo muri ico gihugu yanduye iyo ngwara. Kuva ico gihe, bimwe mu bikorwa vya Noel vyahagaritswe, reta na yo ikavuga ko abantu bategerezwa kuguma muhira mu ntango z'umwaka mushasha. Muri rusangi, Taiwan, izinga riruta gato Uburundi mu bunini,  ifise abantu bamaze kwandura bashika 777, hakaba hamaze gupfa indwi. Vyibazwa ko uwo mudereva yanduye coronavirus mu ntango z'ukwezi kwa cumi na kabiri, ariko ntiyaca agaragarako ubugwayi. Abadereva bagarutse muri iryo zinga bavuye mu rugendo bategerezwa kwigumana bonyene mu kiringo c'imisi itatu, ariko ntibapimwa kiretse gusa babonetseko ibimenyetso. Mu gihe atari abizi ko afise uwo mugera, yabandanije ingendo, bikavugwa ko yakorora igihe yari mu ndege ija Taiwan avuye muri Amerika. Bamusanganye Covid- 19 itariki 20 z'uku kwezi kwa cumi na kabiri. Inyuma y'imisi ibiri, Taiwan yaciye ironka umuntu wa mbere yanduriye muri ico gihugu muri aya mezi. Abategetsi baciye batangura kurondera nimba uwo mupfasoni atigeze yegera uwo mudereva. Abategetsi baciye uwo mugabo amande y'amadolari 10,600 kubera atigeze avuga abo babonanye n'ibikorwa yakoze ku butegetsi. Kompanyi ya Eva Air ivuga ko uwo mudereva yirukanywe kubera atubahirije amategeko ngenderwako, harimwo kutambara agapfukamunwa aho yicara ariko aratwara indege. Uretse uwo mupfasoni, vyibazwa ko yanduje babiri mubo bakorana, umudereva wo mu Buyapani hamwe n'uwundi wo muri Taiwan. Yaba abategetsi canke iyo kompanyi, nta n'umwe aravuga izina ry'uwo mudereva ariko Eva Air yavuze mw'itangazo ko "inyifato y'umukozi ku giti ciwe, yateye ikibazo mu twigoro twa buri muntu two kugwanya ico kiza" kandi akaba yateye "igihombo gikomeye kw'isura n'akaranga vy'iyo kompanyi" Kubera uwo muntu wa mbere yanduye, abategetsi baritegurira gukomeza ingingo zo kugwanya Covid mu ndege.

headline: Burundi - Covid: Igiporisi kivuga ko igitigiri c'abandura ciyongeye muri iyi minsi
text: Umukuru w'igipolisi c'Uburundi, Frederic Budomo, yandikiye abajejwe ibisata vy'urwego ajejwe, abahamagarira  gusubira gukaza iyubahirizwa ry'ingingo zo  kugwanya Covid avuga ko ibitigiri vy'abandura vyasubiye kwiyongera. Muri uri urwo rwandiko, avuga ko abantu basubiye kwimenyera, hakaba hari ivyegeranyo bivuga ko ibiharuro vy'abanduye umugera wa Covid vyongerekanye cane muri iyi misi. Avuga kandi ko n'igipolisi cadebukiwe mu kwubahiriza ingingo zo kugwanya Covid. Umukuru w'igipolisi c'Uburundi Frederic Budomo agira ati: "Igipolisi ntikiriko kirubahiriza ingingo zari zafashwe zo kubuza ama karaokes [ibiteremwo bavuzamwo umuziki], kutugurura inzu z'ubutambiro (boites de nuit) hamwe n'izindi." N'umukuru w'igisagara ca Bujumbura, Jimmy Hatungimana, yateye akamo ababa muri ico gisagara ngo kubera ibiharuro vy'abanduye vyongerekanye mu makomine yose agize ico gisagara. Asaba ashimitse ko abantu boreka kwijajara bakubahiriza za ngingo z'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu zirimwo gukaraba kenshi, kudasomana, kuramukanya indamutso y'amahoro  no kwambara agafukamunwa aho bikenewe. Jimmy Hatungimana abasaba gushira mu bikorwa umugambi wa "Ndakira, sinandura kandi sinanduza Corona virus" washizwe imbere n'umukuru w'igihugu, Evariste Ndayishimiye mu kurwanya ico kiza. Ku rubuga rw'ishami rya Onu rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS/WHO handitse ko kuva itariki 3 z'ukwezi kwa mbere 2020 gushika itariki 10 z'ukwezi kwa cumi na kabiri 2021, abantu bamaze gutorwa  umugera wa Covid-19 mu Burundi ari 20.666, muri bo 14 bakaba bamaze gupfa. Iryo shirahamwe kandi rivuga ko igitigiri c'abamaze kwicandagisha mu Burundi ari 3.396, ni urugero rwa 0,02%  ku bantu barenga miriyoni 12 Uburundi bufise. Reta y'Uburundi ntawe ihimiriza kuja kwicandagisha, umuntu agenda ku bushake bwiwe.  Gutanga urucanco vyatanguye mu kwezi kw'icumi. Nta biharuro bishasha birashirwa ahabona vyerekana ingene abanduye biyongereye n'ikiringo vyabereyeko muri iyi minsi. Mu gihe isi  itewe impungene n'ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera wa corona wandukira cane watowe ubwa mbere muri Afrika y'Epfo  mu kwezi guheze, Omicron, mu Burundi gushika ubu ntawurahavugwa.

headline: Ukraine: Uburusiya bwarekuye drone 30 mu minsi ibiri – Zelensky
text: Prezida wa Ukraine Volodymir Zelensky avuga ko Uburusiya bwakoze ibitero vya drone 30 kuri Ukraine mu minsi ibiri gusa. Yanavuze kandi  ko vyose hamwe, Uburusiya bwakoze ibitero vya misire 4.500 n’ibitero vy’indege birenga 8.000. Avugira i Kyiv kandi ahagaze iruhande y'ikiboneka ko ari drone yakorowe (yahanuwe) yo mu bwoko bwa Shahed ikorerwa muri Iran, Zelensky yiyemeje "guca amababa" y’ububasha bwo mu kirere bwa Moscou. Abategetsi b’ibihugu  vy’uburengero bemera ko Iran yahaye Uburusiya drone nyinshi, ariko Uburusiya na Iran birabihakana. Bishitse mu gihe umushikiranganji wa Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire Antony Blinken yavuze ko agasomborotso k’Uburusiya k’ikoreshwa rya drone ari ibintu "biteye iseseme". Uwo mu-diplomate wa Amerika yagirije Uburusiya gukoresha  izo ndege zitagira abadereva mu "kwica abanyagihugu basanzwe ba Ukraine no mu gusambura ibikorwa-remezo bazerako amatara, amazi, gususurutsa amazu”, aho yari mu rugendo ku murwa mukuru wa Canada, Ottawa. Muri izi ndwi za vuba, ibitero vy’Uburusiya vyatumbereye cane cane ibikorwa-remezo bisanzwe vya Ukraine, vyonona uruhererekane rw'amatara n’amazi mu gihe ikiringo c’imbeho nyinshi (hiver) kiri hafi. Ibihugu vy’iburengero bivuga ko Iran iha Uburusiya drone isanzwe ikora kandi ko abahinga ba gisirikare b’abanya-Iran bari muri Crimea yigaruriwe n’Uburusiya guha abadereva ubufasha bw’ubuhinga. Ukraine yarabonye ko zimwe muri drone zakoreshejwe mu bitero bimwe bimwe ku bikorwa-remezo vyayo ari Shahed-136 zikorerwa muri Iran. Zizwi nka drone “kamikaze” [z’ubwiyahuzi] kuko zica zisambuka mu gitero – zikaba zahawe izina nk’iry’aba dereva b’Ubuyapani batwara indege z’intambara mu ngwano ya kabiri y’isi. Ukraine ivuga ko drone zirenga 400 zimaze gukoreshwa n’Uburusiya, ku bigwanisho vyose hamwe bimaze gukoreshwa bigereranywa gushika 2.000. Ariko ubutegetsi bwa Iran bwagumye buhakana buvuga ko butigeze bugiranira amasezerano y’ibigwanisho  n’Ubususiya, mu gihe Uburusiya nabwo buhakana gukoresha drone zo muri Iran. Ku wa gatatu umushikiranganji ajejwe imigenderanire wa Iran Hossein Amir-Abdollahian yavuze ko ivyo birego "bitagira ishingiro" aca asaba Ukraine "kwerekana ico ivyo birego bishingiyeko”. Yongeyeko ati: “Hamwe… twobona ko bigaragara neza ko Uburusiya bwakoresheje drone za Iran mu ntambara muri Ukraine, nta nkeka ko tutazoraba hirya kuri ico kibazo”. Umukeba wa Iran muri ako karere, Israel, nayo yagirije Iran kuri ivyo bivugwa ko irungikira drone Uburusiya. Mu mubonano na Prezida wa Amerika Joe Biden kuri Maison Blanche/White House ku wa kane, Prezida Isaac Herzog yateye ivyatsi ibikorwa vya Iran. Imbere y’urwo rugendo, yari yiyemeje ko azokwereka Biden icemeza ko Iran itanga ibigwanisho. Hagati aho Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zamenyesheje ko zigiye guha Ukraine iyindi mfashanyo ya gisirikare ya miriyoni 275 z’amadorari, ku bw’amakuru y’itororokanirizo Associated Press. Ku rubuga, intambara yagabanuye umurindi muri iyi minsi, gutera intambwe imbere kwa Ukraine kwari kurindiriwe cane muri Kherson kukaba kwahagaze kubera ibihe bibi.

headline: Ubukoloni: Bemeye amabi ariko nta mpozamarira
text: Umwami Philippe w'Ububiligi ari muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Congo ubwa mbere, mu ntumbero yo kunagura imigenderanire n'ico gihugu, imyaka 60 inyuma yo kwikukira. Umwami yaherekejwe n'umugore wiwe, umwamikazi Mathilde  hamwe n'abagize reta y'Ububiligi, harimwo umushikiranganji wa mbere Alexander De Croo, mu rugendo rw'imisi itandatu ku butumire bwa prezida wa RD Congo, Felix Tshisekedi. N'urugendo rw'akataraboneka muri RD Congo, kuko n'ubwa mbere  rugizwe n'umuryango w'ubwami mu myaka 12. Urwo rugendo rubaye kandi inyuma y'imyaka ibiri umwami avuze ko "yicuza" ku "bibi" vyakozwe n'abakoloni b'igihugu ciwe. Umwami Philippe yamuka ku mwami Léopold II, yatwaye mu kinjana ca 19, aho intwaro yiwe yahitanye abanye Afrika imiliyoni 10 mu bwicanyi bw'agahomerabunwa bwabaye mu gihe c'ubukoloni. Mw'ikete yandikiye Tshisekedi, mu gihe hahimbazwa imyaka 60 igihigu ca Congo cikukiye, umwami Philippe, ku ncuro ya mbere,  yaricujije, ariko adasavye imbabazi. Urwo rugendo rwafashwe nk'akandi karyo ko gusaba imbabazi ku mugaragaro  abanye Congo. Ariko si ubwa mbere umutegetsi w'i Buraya ahangana n'amabi yakozwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni. Bimwe mu bihugu vyarasavye ikigongwe ku mugaragaro, mu gihe ibindi bigiye kwemera muri iyi misi ya vuba ko hari ibintu bimwe bimwe bibi vyabaye. Abanebagura iyo ngendo bavuga ko izo mbabazi zabaye izo hejuru kuko zitadoma urutoke ku bubisha bwakozwe muri kahise hamwe n'iragi ry'igihe kirekire c'ubukoloni. Muri iyi myaka iheze, ibihugu nk'Ubwongereza, Ubudagi n'Ubufaransa, vyarashinzwe ijisho cane ku bikorwa vyakozwe n'abahoze babitwara. Aha turihweza ingene abantu bakiriye imbabazi ibihugu bimwe bimwe vya buraya vyasavye, binashira n'umukono ku masezerano yerekeye kahise k'ubukoloni. Umwami Léopold II w'Ububiligi yarahawe igice kinini c'ahazanana uruzi rwa Congo n'abategetsi ba Buraya igihe haba inama rukokoma i Berlin 1885, aho bagabangana umugabane wa Afrika. Umwami yaciye yita ako karere, 'Congo yigenga' - akarere kiwe bwite aho yari afise uburenganzira bwo gukora ico ashaka  cose. Vyihuse, haciye haba akarere kiganziwe n'intwaro y'umukazo ishingiye ku bikorwa vyo ku gahato mu kurima no mu kudandaza ibintu bimwe bimwe nka kawucu, amenyo y'inzovu hamwe n'ubutare. Abategetsi baraca ibihimba vy'abantu batashikanye ivyo bari bategerezwa gukora hakurikijwe itegeko ry'umwami. Mu gihe imyiyerekano ya Black Lives Matter yaba kw'isi yose, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'ababiligi vyarihereje amabarabara basaba ico gihugu kwihweza neza kahise kaco. Ibishushanyo vy'umwami Léopold II mu bisagara vy'ico gihugu vyaramenaguwe, hanyuma ubutegetsi bufata ingingo yo kubikura mu bibanza bihuriramwo abantu benshi. Mu rugendo rw'ubwami bw'Ubwongereza mu mazinga ya Caraïbes mu kwezi kwa gatatu, umuganwa William yarerekanye "agahinda" ku vyerekeye ubuja mw'ijambo yavuze ariko arasangira n'abategetsi ba Jamaique. Uwo muganwa yavuze ko ubuja ari icaha c'agahomerabunwa, ko " bitari bikwiye kubaho" kandi ko "vyateye iceyi ubudahanagurika kahise kacu". Ariko ababinegura bavuga ko kwerekana "akababaro" no kwemera ivyabaye muri kahise bitigera birenga aho. Urwo rugendo rwakiriwe n'imyiyerekano ihamagarira ubwami gutanga indishi ku buja, Jamaique na yo yake ikibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu umwamikazi  Elizabeth. Mu 2021, Ubudagi bwaremeye ku mugaragaroko  ko iyicwa ry'abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi muri Namibia yari jenocide. Hagereranywa ko aba Ovaherero 60.000, n'ukuvuga abarenga 80% y'abanyagihugu bagize ubwo bwoko muri ako karere, aba Nama 10.000, n'ukuvuga 50% vy'abo, barishwe n'abakoloni b'abadagi  hagati ya 1904 na 1908. Amatongo yabo n'ubworozi na vyo baravyatswe mu kubahana kubera bagiye mu migumuko. Ubudagi bwariyemeje kugira "ikimenyetso mu kwemera amabi menshi babakoreye.". Ariko ntibigeze bacisha mu kanwa ivyerekeye indishi y'akababaro, ahubwo ayo masezerano yari yerekeye imfashanyo muvyo iterambere ingana na miriyaridi 1.3 z'amadolari. Ayo mahera yategerezwa gutangwa mu kiringo c'imyaka 30 ku bantu bakomoka ku ba  Ovaherero n'aba Nama. Ariko abasigwa bo muri ayo moko avugwa , nka Uahimisa Kaapei, ntiyashimye ayo masezerano. Avuga ati:"N'akajoreza ko muri iki kinjana. Dukeneye ko baza [reta y'ubudagi] gusaba imbabazi. Amahera akoreshwa gusa mu kuvuga ivyo badukoreye. Hafi ica kabiri c'ibihugu vyo muri Afrika vyarigeze kuba biganzwa n'Ubufaransa. Inyuma y'imyaka 60 vyinshi muri vyo vyikukiye, abubu baracabona ingaruka mbi y'ubukoloni. Muri uyu mwaka, Algeria yahimbaje imyaka 60 imaze yikuye mu nzara  z'Ubufaransa , inyuma y'intambara yamaze imyaka umunani , hamwe n'inyuma y'ikiringo kirenga ikinjana bari mu bukoloni gushika mu 1962. Ubufaransa co kimwe n'ibindi bihugu vy'abakoloni, vyaranse kwemenga bimwe mu vyaranze kahise k'ubukoloni. Mu kwezi kwa mbere mu 2021, ibiro vya prezida Macron vyamenyesheje ko Ubufaransa "butazicuza canke ngo busabe imbabazi" ku mabi yakorewe muri Algeria mu myaka 132 bwategetse ico gihugu. Ariko ko buzokora "ibikorwa bimeze nk'ibimenyetso" bifise intumbero yo guteza imbere igikorwa co gusubiza hamwe. Ariko inyuma y'umwaka urenga, inama nkenguzamateka y'Ubufaransa yarasavye ikigongwe abasirikare ba Algeria , bitwa Harkis, bagwanye ku ruhande rw'Ubufaransa mu ntambara yo kwikukira ya Algeria, aho vyuguruye imiryango kukuronswa impozamarira. Prezida w'Ubufaransa Emmanuel Macro yari yasavye "ikigongwe" anemera ko azoshiraho itegeko rigena impozamarira hamwe n'icibutso. Igihe yariko arashikiriza ijambo mu kwezi kw'icenda mu 2021, Macron yarazomerewe  na bamwe mu banyagihugu. N'aho nyene hariho bamwe bamwe bashimye kuba yasavye imbabazi. Uwahoze ari Harki, Serge Carel yagize ati:"Bisa n'uko ku ncuro ya mbere, prezida wacu w'ubu afise ishaka ryo kuvuga ukuri." "Urakoze kuri iryo shaka, niharambe Republika, niharambe Ubufaransa". Mu myaka mirongo iheze, imigwi itandukanye n'ibihugu vyahoze mu bukoloni  bagumye basaba gutera intambwe bakava muvyo gusaba ikigongwe gusa ahubwo hagatangwa impozamarira. Mu gihe imvugo yo kwicuza no gusaba imbabazi bitanguye gusa n'ibimenyerewe, gutanga impozamarira canke ubundi buryo ubwo ari bwo bwose bujanye n'amahera biboneka gake. Uburundi na Republika ya Demokrasi ya Congo vyasavye impozamarira y'imiriyaridi 43 z'ama dolari Ububiligi hamwe n'Ubudagi. Abanye Congo benshi nta cizere kinini bafise, nka Junior Bombi, umudandaza wo mw'isoko nkuru i Kinshasa. Agira ati:"Kubwanje, uru rugendo nta co ruzoshikako, kuko guhamagara umwami w'ababiligi muri Congo bimaze iki? "Badusize twenyene, atawutwitayeho, baratwara ubutunzi bwacu, ubu rero murasubiye guha ikaze umwami w'ababiligi ngaha? "Abandi bizeye ko intambwe za mbere zo gusubiza hamwe - kwemera no kwibuka abishwe mu kiringo c'ubukoloni - zizoshikwako. "Nihaba hari ikintu gikomeye twiteze, n'uko umwami agarukana ibisigarira vya Patrice Emery Lumumba nk'uko yavyemeye." Umwigisha w'akahise muri kaminuza Antoine Roger Lokongo avuga ati:" Ni co kintu gikomeye turindiriye." Lumbuma ni we yabaye umushikiranganji wa mbere, wa mbere w'igihugu aranagishikana ku ntahe yo kwikukira mu kwezi kwa gatandatu mu 1960. Yaciye apfungwa aca yicwa ata n'umwaka uheze. Umupolisi w'umubiligi yariyemereye ko yashize ikiziga ciwe muri acide aca aturira ibisigarira vyiwe, ariko avuga ko yabitse iryinyo. Ububiligi bwaremeye uruhara bwagize muri urwo rupfu, rukekwamwo n'igisata c'iperereza ca Amerika CIA. Igarukanwa ry'ibisigarira vya Lumumba ryari ryatebejwe n'ikiza ca coronavirus. Ariko ibirori vyo gushikiriza iryo ryinyo bitegekanijwe muri uku kwezi i Bruxelles. Muri uru rugendo, umwami yarashikirije kimwe mu bintu biranga akaranga 80.000 vyibwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni muri Congo.

headline: Ingabo zidasanzwe za Australia zagirizwa kwica abasivire muri Afghanistani
text: Hari ivyemezo nyavyo vyerekana ko ingabo zidasanzwe za Australia zishe mu buryo buteye kubiri n'amategeko abantu 39 mu gihe c'intambara muri Afghanistani, nk'uko biri mu cegeranyo cari kirindiranywe igishika. Igisirikare ca Australia, Australian Defence Force (ADF), cerekanye ivyavuye mu matohoza yari amaze imyaka ine ku nyifato itabereye y'ingabo zaco. Kivuga ko igipolisi gitegerezwa gukora amatohoza ku bantu 19 bahoze canke bari mu ngabo zidasanzwe kuri ubu bwicanyi  bwakorewe "impfungwa, abarimyi canke abasivire" hagati ya 2009 na 2013. ADF ivuga ko ibi vyaha vyakozwe kubera "akageso k'uburwanyi" kari mu basirikare bamwe bamwe bananiwe kwigumya. Muri rino tohoza, Jenerali-Majoro Paul Brereton yarikoze yavuganye n'ivyabona birenga 400. Vyabonetse ko: Afghanistani ivuga ko Australia yayijeje ko yiyemeje "gushira imbere y'ubutungane" ababikoze. Dr. Samantha Crompvoets yakoze amatohoza y'intangamarara kuri ibi vyaha, yabwiye BBC ko vyakozwe "n'ibigirankana, bikorwa incuro nyinshi kandi ko ari ivyaha vyo mu ntambara", kandi ko iki cegeranyo camurenganuye. Australia ifise ingabo muri Afghanistani kuva mu 2002, inyuma y'itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi bw'abatalibani, mu ntambara yari iyobowe na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Mu ntango, igikorwa c'ingabo mpuzamakungu cari ukwigisha ingabo za Afghanistani, ariko rero mu nyuma zikaba zagiye zigira uruhara mu gikorwa co kurwanya inyeshamba. Kivuga ko abasirikare 25 bo mu ngabo zidasanzwe bagize uruhara mu bwicanyi ndengerabutungane bo nyene ubwabo canke "batumye abandi", mu vyaha bitandukanye 23. Kivuga ko ivyaha 36 ari vyo bitegerezwa gukorwako amatohoza. Umukuru w'igisirikare ca Australia, Angus Campbell, avuga ko hari ivyemezo ko abasirikare bamwe bo mu gisata kirwanira mu kirere, Special Air Service (SAS), bakoze ivyo bishakiye bitajanye n'amategeko. Avuga ko ababikoze bari bazi neza ivyo bariko barakora. Ati: "Iki cegeranyo cerekana ko iyi ngeso yatewe intege na bamwe mu ngabo z'inararibonye, kandi zifise igihagararo mu ntumbero yo kwerekana ko bakomeye kandi ari ba kibirengeye". Dr Crompvoets avuga ati: "Ibisongerezi barahimiriza canke bagatera intege abasirikare bakiri bato kugira bice impfungwa kugira ngo bashike ku ntego yabo yo kwica ku ncuro ya mbere, uko niko bahimiriza aba basirikare bakiri bato, mu buryo bwo kubaha urwinjizo muri uru rwego - iki nico cari kibabaje cane". Iri tohoza ryakozwe mu mpisho, vyumvikana ko gushika ubu ari bike bimaze kumenyekana. Mu ndwi iheze, umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Australia, Scott Morrison, yaragabishije ko iki cegeranyo kirimwo "amakuru aremereye cane kandi agumye ku banya Australia" ku vyerekeye ingabo zayo zidasanzwe. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu wa Afghanistani Ashraf Ghani bivuga ko Bwana Morrison yamuhamagaye kuri telefone amubwira ko "ababajwe cane" n'ibiri muri kino cegeranyo. Umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'iki gihugu yasubiwemwo n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP avuga ko ivyaha bivugwa muri iki cegeranyo "bidashobora kubabarirwa", ariko ko kubona vyagiye ahabona ari "intambwe ikomeye yo gushika ku butungane". Umurwi wigenga ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu muri Afghanistani wakiranye igishika kino cegeranyo, ariko ukavuga ko kidatanga ivyemezo bihagije kugira ngo ubutungane bubikorereko. Uvuga ko ari ngombwa ko iki gikorerwako kandi "hagatangwa n'indishi y'akababaro nyayo" bidatevye. Elaine Pearson wo mw'ishirahamwe Human Rights Watch riharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ibi ni ivyemezo nyavyo - ivyemeza neza ko ibi vyaha vyakozwe". Dr Crompvoets avuga ko mu ntango "yarwanijwe cane" igihe icegeranyo ntangamarara gisohokeye, ariko ko vyabonetse y'uko ivyo yavuga atarira busema. Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, sentare mpuzamakungu mpanavyaha (ICC) yaratanguye gukora amatohoza ku vyaha bivugwa ko vyakozwe n'abasirikare ba Amerika hamwe n'abandi bagize uruhara mu ntambara ya Afghanistani. Ivyaha vyakozwe n'aba Talibani, ingabo za Afghanistani n'iza Amerika kuva mu 2003 vyitezwe gukorwako amatohoza. Icegeranyo c'iyi sentare co mu 2016 carerekanye ko hari ibimenyetso nyavyo vyerekana ko igisirikare ca Amerika cakoze ivyaha vyo kuboreza igufa abantu vyakorewe mu busho bwo mu kinyegero bw'ikigo kijejwe igendereza CIA. Iki cegeranyo kandi kivuga ko hari ivyemezo vy'uko ingabo za Afghanistani zaboreje igufa impfungwa, kandi ko aba Talibani bakoze ivyaha vyo mu ntambara nk'ubwicanyi bw'agahomerabunwa bwakorewe abasivire. Eka n'Ubwongereza buriko burakora amatohoza mu ntumbero yo kumenya niba ibirego vy'ubwicanyi ndengerabutungane bwakozwe n'ingabo zidasanzwe z'Ubwongereza bwarakorewe amatohoza neza.

headline: Britney Spears: Se yasavye guhagarika guhagararira inyungu ziwe zose
text: Se wa Britney Spears yatanze impapuro muri sentare ya Los Angeles asaba kurangiza ubuhagarikizi yari amazemwo imyaka 13 bwatuma akurikirana ubuzima n'amatungo vy'umukobwa wiwe. Jamie Spears yanditse ko Britney "afise uburenganzira ko iyo sentare yokwihweza yitonze ko ubwo buhagarikizi butagikenewe". Britney yaragerageje kumwaka ubwo burenganzira incuro zibiri zose mu myaka ibiri iheze. Uwo muririmvyi rurangiranwa wa Pop yavuga ko imigenderanire bafitaniye yari iyo "agacinyizo" aranahagarika kuremesha ibiteramo igihe yari akimuhagarariye. Se wiwe yandikiye sentare inyuma y'amezi abiri uwo muririmvyi afata ibiyayuramutwe atangiye ubuhamya bukarishe muri sentare, asaba ko ubwo buhagarikizi burangira vuba na bwangu. Muri izo mpapuro zarungikiwe sentare nkuru ya Los Angeles handitswe ngo:" Ibiherutse kuvuga kuri ubwo buhagarikizi bwazanye ikibazo co kumenya nimba icatumye buhaba carahindutse ku buryo bitagikenewe ko bubandanya?" Urwo rwandiko rurabandanya, avuga ko umukobwa wiwe yipfuza kwikurikiranira ibibazo vyo kwa muganga hamwe n'ivyerekeye amahera. Rubandanya rugira ruti "Nk'uko Spears atahengeshanije kubivuga, ico ashaka gusa n'icobera ciza umukobwa wiwe." "Niyaba Britney Spears ashaka kurangiza ubwo buhagariki kandi akaba yumva ko ashobora ashobora gufata mu minwe ivyerekeye ubuzima bwiwe, se wiwe Spears avuga ko akwiye guhabwa ayo mahirwe." Britney Spears yigeze kuvuga ko se wiwe amufata nabi cane kandi ko yigeze kumutera ubwoba ko azomubuza kuraba abana biwe mu gihe atokwemera ivyo amusaba. Mu kwezi kw'indwi, yabwiye umucamanza ko yipfuza kwitwarira se wiwe, w'imyaka 69, ko yakoresheje nabi ububasha bwo guhagarikira inyungu ziwe. Twashitse aha gute? Ubuhagarikizi bwategetswe gushirwaho mu 2008 igihe hari amakenga ku magara yo mu mutwe y'uwo muririmvyi. Sentare yahaye uburenganzire Jamie Spears kugenzura inzu y'umukobwa iwe hamwe n'ibindi bintu bijanye n'ubuzima bwiwe. Ubwo buhagarikizi bwari mu bice bibiri. Kimwe kubijanye n'inzu hamwe n'amahera, ikindi cerekeye umukobwa wiwe ubwiwe nk'umuntu. Spears yatanze imihoho mu bijanye no gukurikirana umukobwa wiwe mu 2019 kubera ubugwayi yari afise, ariko abandanya kuraba ivyerekeye ibikorwa vyiwe bimwinjiriza amahera.

headline: Burundi: BRB yugaye amashirahamwe agurisha amafaranga
text: Ibanki Nkuru y'Uburundi, BRB, yaraye ifashe ingingo yo kwaka impusha amashirahamwe yose acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro yari asanzwe yemewe. Mwitangazo ryasohowe n'umukuru w'iyo banki, Ciza Jean, avuga ko iyo ngingo izotangura kuja mu ngiro mu ndwi iza, igenekerezo rya 15 z'uku kwa kabiri. Yagiriza ayo mashirahamwe ko atashoboye gukurikiza ibiri mu rwandiko rwerekana ingene amafaranga mvamakungu avunjwa, ivyo ngo bikaba vyaragize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'igihugu. Mu kwezi kw'icenda umwaka uheze, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Muri iryo tangazo, Bwana Ciza ategeka abafise amazu yo kugura n'ukugurisha amafaranga y'agaciro gukuraho vuba na bwango ivyapa n'ibindi bimenyetso biyaranga. Amenyesha ko kuva ubu, amazu yemerewe kugura n'ukugurisha amafaranga mvamakungu ari ayegukira amabanki. Mu rwandiko rwasohowe ku wa 15 z'ukw'icenda umwaka uheze wa 2019, buri shirahamwe ryategerezwa kuvunja amafaranga ryisunze igiciro cashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu "ritarengeje inyungu y'ibice 15%". Iyo ngingo isa n'iyagoranye gushira mu ngiro, ari co catumye mu kwezi kwa 11 umwaka uheze, BRB isohora itangazo, aho yagabisha ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kandi amafaranga y'agaciro akena.

headline: MINUSCA: ONU iriyamiriza iyicwa ry’umusirikare w’Umurundi muri
text: Umusirikare w'Umurundi yari mu ngabo zagiye kubungabunga amahoro muri Centrafrique yarishwe ku munsi wa gatanu mu gitero cakozwe n'inyeshamba mu karere ka Grimari, k'intara ya Ouaka, nk'uko itangazo ry'Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU ribivuga. Iri tangazo rivuga ko inyeshamba ziyita Coalition des Patriotes pour le Changement(CPC) zakoze igitero ku ngabo za MINUSCA zari mu bikorwa vyo gucungera umutekano muri ako karere, zikica uyo musirikare zinakomeretsa n'abandi babiri. Abaye umusirikare agize kane w'Umurundi yishwe muri ico gihugu mu kiringo kidashika ukwezi, inyuma y'abandi batatu bishwe ku wa 25 z'ukwezi guheze. Uburundi bwararungitse ingabo zababa 760 muri Centrafrique mu rwego rwa MINUSCA (Mission multidimensionnelle Intégrée des Nations Unies pour la Stabilisation en République Centrafricaine) mu ntumbero yo kugarukana amahoro muri ico gihugu kiri mu ntambara kuva imyaka itari mike. Iryo tangazo ryasohowe n'umuvugizi w'umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU, Stéphane Dujarric, rivuga ko mu gatondo ko ku munsi wa gatanu, ingabo za MINUSCA zikomoka mu Burundi no muri Bangladesh zariko zirakizura mu micungararo ya Grimari, zigwa mu mitego ibiri ikurikirana y'izo nyeshamba. Riti: "Uyu musirikare w'Uburundi yishwe mu mutego ugira kabiri. Abasirikare babiri bava muri Bangladesh barakomeretse muri ivyo bitero". Umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU asaba abategetsi ba Centrafrique gukora uko bashoboye kwose bakamenya abakoze ibi bitero kugira ngo babashire imbere y'ubutungane. Yibutsa ko ibitero ku ngabo za ONU zagiye kugarukana amahoro n'umutekano bishobora kuba ivyaha vyo mu ntambara kandi ko "bitegerezwa guhanwa". Umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU aratewe impungenge n'umutekano ubandanya uhungabana muri ico gihugu, agasaba impande zompi guhagarika intambara bagatorera inyishu y'ibibatandukanya mu mahoro. Uyu musirikare w'Umurundi yishwe inyuma y'iminsi ibiri hishwe umusirikare w'u Rwanda muri ico gihugu nyene. Ejo ku wa gatandatu, Inama Nkuru y'umutekano mw'ishirahamwe ONU yasohoye itangazo aho yiyamiriza  igandagurwa ry'aba basirikare, uw'u Rwanda ku wa 13 z'uku hafi y'umugwa mukuru  Bangui , nayo ubo Uburundi ku wa 15 . Rivuga ko abagize inama nkuru y'umutekano "biyamiriza bivuye inyuma ibitero vyose, agasotoro no gukokeza ibitero vy'imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho n'abandi bagizi ba nabi ku ngabo za MINUSCA". Rivuga kandi ko abagize inama nkuru y'umutekano bashimangira ko bari inyuma ya MINUSCA, kandi ko bashimira cane ibihugu vyarungitse abasirikare n'abaporisi bavyo muri ico gikorwa co kugarukana amahoro muri ico gihugu. Abagize iyi nama nkuru y'umutekano basaba ko ari nkenerwa y'uko MINUSCA  ihabwa ibikoresho nkenerwa kugira ngo bashobore kurangura amabanga yayo yongere ikingire n'umutekano w'ingabo za ONU.

headline: Covid-19 mu 2021: Ivyo tumaze kumenya gushika ubu kuri uwo mugera
text: Mu kiringo c'umwaka uheze ishami rya ONU ryitaho amagara kw'isi ritangaje ikiza ca Covid-19, twarabonye inguvu zidasanzwe z'abahinga zo kugerageza gutahura/gusobanukirwa ibijanye n'uwo mugera. Abashakashatsi kw'isi nzima barakoranye uko bitari bwigere biba ku buryo ibintu ubundi vyari kumara imyaka n'iyindi kugira bimenyekane - mu bumenyi, ubushakashatsi n'ugukora incanco - vyakozwe mu kiringo c'amezi gusa. Ibi ni bimwe mu vyo twamenye muri ayo mezi 12 aheze. Ibimenyetso vy'iyo ndwara vyamenyekanye ubwa mbere vyari ubushuhe n'agakorora. Bidatevye, abantu benshi bafise iyo ndwara batanguye kwumva batakimoterwa canke/kandi batumva ico bariye ingene kimeze ivyo bica vyongerwa ku rutonde rwa OMS rw'ibimenyetso bikunda kugaragara. Uko ico kiza cagiye kirakomera, ibindi bimenyetso bitagaragara kuri benshi vyarabonetse, harimwo: OMS igira inama abantu barwaye cane kwihuta kuja kwa muganga. Ibimenyetso bikomeye bishobora kubamwo ingorane zo guhema, kunanirwa kuvuga canke kwiyunguruza, kutamenya neza ibiriko biraba, canke kwumva ububabare mu gikiriza. Turazi ko umuntu asanganywe izindi ngorane z'amagara bishobora gutuma asinzikazwa na Covid -19 ari naco gituma OMS ihanura abantu basanganywe ibibazo vy'amahaha, diabete, indwara z'umutima canke cancer gufata ingingo zo kwirinda kwandura uwo mugera. N'ubwo benshi mu banduye iyo ndwara bakira vuba, ivyigwa vyerekana ko kuri bamwe Covid -19 ishobora gutera ingaruka z'igihe kirekire ku bice bimwe bimwe vy'umubiri harimwo umutima n'amahaha. Mu mezi ya mbere y'ico kiza, OMS yashimika ivuga ko Covid -19 yandukira iyo abantu bakoroye canke basamuye, utuma/udutonyanga tugakorokera ku  kintu aho kuguma mu kirere. Nico gituma gukaraba vyafashwe nk'imwe mu ngingo zikomeye zo kwirinda - kugira abafise iyo ndwara ntibanduze aho bakoze, ariho hokwanduruka gukwirakwiza umugera. Ariko icigwa ca vuba casohotse mu kinyamakuru British Medical Journal cerekana ko ukwandukirwa na SARS-CoV-2 imaze kuja ku kintu ubu bifatwa ko bikara buke ugereranije n'uguca mu buhumekero. Ibiherutse gutorwa vyerekana ko Covid -19 ahanini yandukira hagati y'abantu begeranye biciye mu tuma/udutonyanga tuba turi mu kirere. Ibi bishobora gushika imbere mu nzu, ahantu hari abantu benshi kandi hadahita akayaga neza, aho umuntu umwe canke benshi baba bafise umugera bamarana umwanya mununi n'abandi, nk'uko bivugwa na OMS. Ari naco gituma vyinshi mu vyahagaritswe mu buzima bwa minsi yose kwari kubuza abantu guhura ari benshi ahantu hapfunze. Incanco za Covid -19 zisa n'iziriko ziragira ico zihinduye Gucandaga biriko biragira ico bihinduye gikomeye ku gitigiri c'abantu baja mu bitaro kubera Covid -19 mu Bwongereza, ubu ibiharuro bikaba vyerekana ko incanco ziriko ziragabanya abantu baja mu bitaro n'abapfa, co kimwe n'ukwandukizanya. Umwigisha wa kaminuza Calum Semple, umuhinga ari mu bajenama ba reta y'Ubwongereza avuga ati: "Biranezereye cane kuboba ibiharuro bifatiye ku buzima bwa minsi yose vyerekana ko urucanco rukora neza". Mu bisanzwe bishobora gufata imyaka 10 kugira urucanco rukorwe - ariko nk'iza Pfizer, Moderna na AstraZeneca za Covid -19 zakozwe mu mwanya muto cane ugereranije n'uwo, bivuye mu  ruhande rumwe kubera ubuhinga bwa none, ukwongereza uburyo hamwe no kugabanya uruhererakane rwo mu biro. Ariko n'ubwo gukora incanco vyafashe amezi, abantu benshi bazorindira imyaka kugira baruterwe. Hari ubusumbane bunini cane kw'isi iyo hageze gusabikanya incanco hagati y'ibihugu bikize n'ibikenye. Kandi mu gihe urucanco ata nkeka ko ruzogwanya uwo mugera, rushobora kudatanga ubudahangarwa buhoraho kuko abasirikare b'umubiri haragera igihe bagasaza. Haheze amezi barwaye iyo ndwara, hari abantu benshi babandanya kugaragaza ibimenyetso bitari bike, bizwi nka Covid ndende. OMS ivuga ko abantu bashika umwe kuri 10 bibashikira kandi bakagira uburuhe bwinshi, kumeneka umutwe, kubabara mu gikiriza n'akabonge. Ikiza kigitera, abantu baragira ikibazo c'uko bitabwaho muri izo ngaruka z'igihe kirekire, n'ubu abahinga ntibaramenya igituma bamwe bazigira abandi ntibazigire. Abahinga baraciga ingaruka z'igihe kirekire za Covid b-19, icigwa giherutse gusohoka kikaba cerekana ko abantu bigeze kurwara uwo mugera, naho boba batababaye cane, baba bafise ivyago vyinshi vyo gupfa canke kurwara bakaremba mu mezi atandatu akurikira ukurwara. Ziyad Al-Aly, umwigisha w'umwunganizi mu vy'ubuvuzi kuri kaminuza ya Washington muri Saint Louis, avuga ati: "Kubera ibibazo biterwa na Covid-19 bishobora  kuba bikomeye, ingaruka z'iyo ndwara zishobora kuguma zisubiriza ku myaka myinshi". "Abaganga bategerezwa kuhagabira ku gusuzuma abantu baba bararwaye Covid -19. Bene abo bantu bakenera kwitabwaho mu buryo bufatiye ku ngero nyinshi." Hari ubwoko butandukanye ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bwa Covid butembera. Ivyo ni ukuvyitega, kuko imigera irihindura kugira ikwiragire, ikagenda irafata iyindi sura. Akenshi ubwo budasa ntaco buba buvuze, ariko hari igihe butuma umugera ubangama canke wandukira gusumba. Ubwoko bwo mu Bwongereza, Afrika y'Epfo, Brezil, n'Ubuhindi bwose bwarahindutse agace kabwo kamata ku turemangingo tw'umuntu. Guhinduka umugera ukaba N501Y nk'akarorero, bisa n'ibituma umugera winjira mu turemangingo kandi ukwirakwira neza gusumba. Aho ni mu gihe ubwoko bwo mu Bwomgereza, B.1.1.7, hari ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko bushobora kuba bufitaniye isano n'urugero rwo gushobora gupfa rushika ku 30%. Ariko icigwa ntikiraba kanuni. Abana bafise urugero ruto cane rwo kurwara Abana barashobora kwandura Covid -19 ariko ivyemezo bihari vyerekena ko bafise urugero ruri hasi cane rwo gushobora kurwara cane ugereranije n'abakuze, gushika ubu, kandi  bisa n'uko n'urugero rw'uko bashobora kwanduza ari ruto. Abahinga bariko bariga ngo barabe niba ubwoko bushasha burimwo ubushobora kuba bwandukira abakiri bato gusumba. Mu kwezi guheza, vyavuzwe ko hagati y'ukwezi kwa kabiri mu 2020 n'itariki 15 ukwezi kwa gatatu mu 2021, Covid -19 yahitanye abana b'abanya-Brezil 852 bo gushika ku myaka icenda, harimwo inzoya 518 zifise munsi y'umwaka, hisunzwe ibitigiri bitangwa n'ubushikiranaganji bwa Brezil bujejwe amagara. Abahinga bavuga ko ibitigiri vy'abanduye Covid muri ico gihugu -  igitigiri ca kabiri kini kw'isi, vyatumye ivyago vy'uko abana bo muri Brezil bandura vyongerekana. Ibindi bibazo biri muri ico gihugu birimwo kudakora ibipimo, abana bafise ibindi bimenyetso nko gucibwamwo canke kubabara mu nda, canke kubura amikoro yo kwivuza. Ingaruka ziziguye z'uwo mugera nazo zirakora cane ku bana, mu gihe ukunanirwa kw'inzego z'ubuvuzi biturutse kuri Covid-19 bisobora gutuma haba impfu 239.000 z'abavyeyi n'abana muri Asia y'Epfo, hakurikijwe icegeranyo ca ONU casohotse mu ntango z'uwu mwaka. . Igihe ikinyamakuuru Nature cabaza abantu 100 b'abahinga, abashakashatsi, abakurikirana indwara z'imigera n'izandukira bakora kuri Covid -19, hafi 90% bavuze ko bibaza ko izohinduka indwara yama iri ngaho. Bibaza ko uwo mugera uzobandanya "kuguma utembera mu duce tumwe tumwe tw'abantu kw'isi mu myaka iri imbere". Ariko n'ubwo twotegerezwa kwiga kubana na Covid-19, ivyo ntibisigura ko tuzoguma tubona urugero rwo gupfa no kwandura twabonye muri uyu mwaka urangiye. Akamangu (influenza) karacahitana abantu ibihumbi n'ibihubi buri mwaka ariko abantu ubu baramenyereye kutagira ico ibagize cane. Covid nayo ishobora guhinduka indwara nk'iyo; imwe usanga hari gihe ivumbuka, kandi abantu bashobora kurwara akarenga rimwe. Mu ntango z'iki kiza, impanuro zo gukwirakwiza Covid -19 ntizari zimwe, mu gihe hari ama reta mu bihugu bitandukanye yatanga inama zitandukanye nyene ku banyagihugu bayo. Ariko ubu OMS ifise intumbero itomoye y'ibikeneye gukurikizwa mu kwirinda. Kutegerana cane mu gusiga nibura imetero hagati y'umuntu n'uwundi, kwambara agafukamunwa gafuka amazuru n'umunwa, no gukaraba, nivyo nyamukuru. Wogerageza kandi mu vyumba hakaguma haca akayaga, hanyuma ukurinda ahantu harundanye abantu benshi. Ukeneye gukorora, kororera mu mfuruka y'inkokora canke mu gatambara. Hanyuma wemerewe urucanco, rufate vyihuta, kuko OMS ihanura ko "incanco zemewe za Covid -19, zitanga urugero runini rwo gukingira umuntu gusinzikazwa no kwicwa n'iyo ndwara". Haracari vyinshi tutaramenya kuri Covid-19 N'ubwo hari ibintu vyinshi ubushakashatsi bumaze gutora kuri Covid -19, hari vyinshi n'ubu tutaramenya kuri uwo mugera - na cane cane iyo hageze ikibazo co kumenya ryari tuzoshika ku budahangarwa bw'ikivunga, kubera iki abantu basinzikara kurusha abandi, canke ubwa mbere ho ingene uwo mugera winjiye mu muntu. Haracari kare kuvuga igihe ubudahangarwa bushobora kumara, canke niba hari ubudasa hagati y'ugukingirwa bitangwa n'urucanco, canke ukuje inyuma yo kurwara. Ntituzi kandi incuro umuntu ashobora gusubira kwandura uwo mugera wa Covid -19, canke niba iyo ndwara iza idakaze iyo ije ubugira kabiri. Abashakatsi barabandanya kwiga ivyo bintu vyose, no kwiga ingene umugera ugenda urihindugura mu bice bitandukanye vy'isi. Icizere n'uko ivyo bariko barakora bizotuma twisuganye kigira duhangane n'uwo mugera n'ubwoko bwayo bushasha, muri kazoza.

headline: Uganda- Covid: Batonze imirongo barondera urucanco
text: Abantu amajana n'amajana batonze imirongo ku biro vy'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara kugira baterwe urucanco rwa Covid - 19 mu gihe Uganda  ubu yinjiye mu musuniranyo wa kabiri w'ico kiza. Ibibanza bitanga urwo rucanco bivugwa ko  ata  rwari rusigaye isaha indwi z'umururango mu masaha yo muri Uganda. Abakoresha imbuga hwaniro bamye bahanahana inkuru z'ingene bavuye mu kibanza kimwe baja mu kindi barondera aho boterwa urucanco. Umuyobozi mukuru um bushikiranganji bujejwe amagara , Henry Mwebesa, yavuze  ko vyafashe iminsi itanashika 10 kugira umusumiranyo  wa kabiri ushikire urugero rw'ikiza. Yanavuze ko incanco zari  zarungitswe mu gihugu hagati zizovanwayo zigarukanwe  ku murwa mukuru Kampala n'uturere tuwegereye aho abazishaka ari benshi cane. Igihugu catanguye isekeza ryo gutanga incanco mu kwezi kwa gatatu inyuma yo kuronka incanco 840.000 za AstraZeneca mu mugambi wa Covax. Abakozi b'ubuzi butuma bagira ivyago vyinshi vyo kwandura nk'abakora mu buvuzi, abigisha, abajejwe umutekano n'abantu bose barenza imyaka 70 bari mu bashizwe imbere. Ariko ivyo vyahavuye bisubirwamwo kugira bashiremwo abafise canke barenza imyaka 50, ariko abantu ntibitabiriye cane kwiteza urucanco. Gushika ubu abantu barenga gato 550.000 nibo bamaze kurwiteza. Hagati aho reta ya Uganda iriko  iribaza gufata  ubugira kabiri ingingo z'ukugabanya canke guhagarika uruja n'uruza kugira   ihagarike ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera. Abajejwe amagara y'abantu bavuga ko ubwoko bwa corona bwandukira cane, na cane cane ubwo mu Buhindi, Nigeria, Ubwongereza na Afrika y'Epfo, aribwo bwatumye hongerekana ibitigiri vy'abandura muri iyi minsi. Muganga Diana Atwine wo mu bushikiranganji bw'amagara yavuze ati: "ibice bimwe bimwe vy'igihugu bitegerezwa  kuja mu ngingo z'uguhagarika uruja n'uruza kiretse abantu bemeye kwubahiriza ingingo ngenderwako zihasanzwe. Yavuze ati: "ahandi ho amavuriro yacu azorengerwa hanyuma dusange turi mu bihe nk'ivyo twabonye mu bindi bihugu bimwe bimwe". Ariko abaraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko reta nayo yagize uruhara mw'iyongerekana ry'ibitigiri vy'abandura kuko yatezuye ku ngingo zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry'iyo ndwara inyuma y'amatora yo mu kwezi kwa mbere. Gushika ubu ibitigiri bizwi icese vy'abamaze kwandura corona muri Uganda ni 44.594, n'abo imaze kwica  361. Uganda haharuwe abanduye coronavirus barenga 800  mu mashure gusa muri uku kwezi , bituma abanduye mu gihugu cose  bashika hafi 1.000  mu gihe mu yandi mezi batarenga mirongo ku munsi.

headline: Imishamirano ya Ukraine: US ivuga ko Russia itegerezwa guhitamwo hagati y'ibiganiro canke guhangana
text: Icegera c'umunyamabanga wa Reta wa Amerika Wendy Sherman aragabisha Uburusiya ko butegerezwa guhitamwo hagati y'inzira y'ibiganiro canke bugahangana n'Uburengero. Yabivuze inyuma y'ibiganiro hagati ya OTAN/NATO n'Uburusiya, kimwe mu vyaranze ibikorwa vya diplomasi muri ino ndwi mu ntumbero yo kugabanya imishamirano kuri Ukraine. Icegera c'umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Uburusiya Alexander Grushko avuga ko OTAN idashobora kwihitiramwo gusa ibiyorohereza mu vyo Uburusiya busaba. Mu vyo busaba harimwo ko Ukraine itokwigera yinjira muri OTAN. Abasirikare b'Uburusiya bababa 100.000 bavugwa ko biyegeranirije hafi y'urubibe rwa Ukraine, ivyatumye haba ubwoba ko hashobora kuba igitero. Sherman ashimangira ko Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n'ibindi bihugu vya OTAN bidashobora kwemera ko Ukraine ibuzwa kwinjira muri iri shirahamwe, akerekana ko imiryango y'iri shirahamwe rya gisirikare yugururiwe uw'ari we wese. Intego yo kwinjira muri OTAN iri mw'ibwirizwashingiro rya Ukraine. Ariko avuga ko hakiriho akaryo ko kwumvikana, kandi ko Uburusiya butegerezwa guhitamwo ico bwipfuza ko gikurikira. Ati: "Uburusiya, cane cane buzotegerezwa guhitamwo nimba koko bushaka umutekano, aha naho bugategerezwa gufata inzira, canke nimba ibi vyose vyari urwitwazo. Kandi bashobora kuba batarabimenya". Avuga ko Amerika na OTAN bariko bitegurira ico cose coshobora gushika. Uburusiya bwarasohoye urutonde rw'ivyo bwipfuza bifise intumbero yo kubuza OTAN ko ibandanya yiyagurira akarere amaja mu buseruko, hanyuma iri huriro rikagabanya akariro ko gusugereza imbibe z'Uburusiya. OTAN iriyamiriza yivuye inyuma ibisabwa n'Uburusiya ariko ikavuga ko yiteguye kuganira ku bindi bibazo harimwo kugenzura ibirwanisho no kugabanya imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare. OTAN/NATO (Organisation du Traité de l'Atlantique Nord/North Atlantic Treaty Organisation), ni ishirahamwe ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe rigizwe n'ibihugu 30, rikaba ryashinzwe mu 1949. Avugira Uburusiya inyuma y'ibiganiro vy'ejo ku wa gatatu i Buruseri (Bruxelles/Brussels) mu Bubirigi, Grushko yagabishije ko mu gihe umubano wokwononeraka bishobora kugira ingaruka umuntu atazi ku mutekano wa Bulaya. Iri gabisha risa n'amajambo y'umunyamabanga mukuru wa OTAN Jens Stoltenberg avuga ko "hashobora kwaduka iyindi ntambara i Bulaya". Irungikwa ry'ingabo z'Uburusiya hafi y'urubibe buhana na Ukraine ryateje ubwoba ko buriko butegura igitero. Mu 2014, Uburusiya bwarigaruriye akarere ka Crimea kegukira Ukraine, inyuma y'aho abanya Ukraine batembagarije umukuru w'igihugu cabo yari yegamiye ku ruhande rw'Uburusiya. Inyuma y'aho, muri uyo mwaka nyene, inyeshamba zishaka kwiyonkora zishigikiwe n'Uburusiya zarigaruriye uturere tutari duto two mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Uburusiya bushimangira ko iri rungikwa ry'ingabo ridakwiye gutera ubwoba umuntu n'umwe. Ariko Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya avuga ko azofata "ingingo za gisirikare" mu gihe Uburengero bwobandanya poritike y'"agasotoro". Kuri uyu wa kane, hari ibiganiro biza kubera ku cicaro c'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya rijejwe umutekano n'imigenderanire (Organisation for Security and Co-operation in Europe) i Vienne muri Autriche, ubwa mbere muri ino ndwi Ukraine ikaba iza kuronka ikibanza muri iyo nama.

headline: FAO ivuga ko DR Congo ari co gihugu 'ca mbere cugarijwe n'ibura ry'ibifungurwa kw'isi'
text: Ishami rya ONU rijejwe uburimyi n'imfungurwa kw'isi (FAO) riragabisha ko abantu bashika hafi imiliyoni 22 muri Republika ya Demokarasi ya Congo bahanzwe n'ibura ry'ibifungurwa, ico gitigiri kikaba kibandanya kwiyongera kuva mu mwaka uheze. Mu cegeranyo, iryo shirahamwe rigira riti: "Igitigiri c'abantu bahanganye n'ibura ry'ibifungurwa rikomeye canke bageramiwe cane gusumba, cariyongereye birenze urugero - kuva ku miliyoni 15.6 mu 2019 gushika ku miliyoni 21.8." Iryo shirahamawe rivuga ko intambara hamwe n'ikiza coronavirus, vyagize ingaruka ku biciro vy'ibifungurwa hamwe no ku bundi buryo bwo kubaho, vyatumye ibintu biba bibi gusumba. Ico cegeranyo kivuga kiti: "Ivyo bintu vyatumye hakenerwa imfashanyo nyinshi kandi ubu ico gihugu ni co ca mbere gifise ikibazo c'ibifungurwa kw'isi." FAO iradoma urutoke kw'"igabanuka ry'ubutunzi rifitaniye isano n'ita ry'agaciro k'ifaranga  rya Congo, igabanuka ry'umwimbu w'amahera igihugu cinjiza buri mwaka hamwe n'ibiza", nk'umwuzure, nk'ibintu bigira uruhara muri izo ngorane. Benshi mu bantu bagizweko ingaruka n'ico kibazo, bari mu ntara za Kivu ya ruguru n'iyo epfo, Ituri hamwe na Kasai yo hagati, nk'uko bimenyeshwa na FAO. Iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko ibintu bigoye cane vy'umwihariko ku bahungiye hagati mu gihugu hamwe n'abasubijwe mu zabo "kenshi basubira iyo baje bava bagasanga ata kintu na kimwe gihari cobafasha gusubira mu buzima bwa misi yose". FAO iragabisha ko, kubera ico kigoyi, uwohirahira agatera ingorane zotuma imfashanyo zidashikira abo zigenewe, azoba atumye abantu bamererwa nabi gusumba no kuburizamwo utwigoro two gutorera inyishu ico kibazo.

headline: Itegeko rya Islam Sharia rirabuza umuziki, kubera iki? Haruna Nkunduwiga arasigura
text: Inyuma y’aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan, ikintu ca mbere batangaje ni uko iki gihugu gitegerezwa kugendera kw’itegeko rya Islam, rizwi nka Sharia.

headline: Francine Niyonsaba ntazoja mu mahiganwa mpuzamakungu yo kwinonora imitsi yimirije
text: Peres Jepchirchir  yatahukanye ihiganwa rya Olempike mu kwiruka marathon ku ruhande rw’abagore, hamwe na Francine Niyonsaba ntibazoja mw’ihiganwa mpuzamakungu ryo kunonora imitsi (World Athletics Championships) muri kuno kwezi. Uyu munya-Kenya Jepchirchir yarahinyagaye mu mafyigo, na yo umurundikazi Niyonsaba yagize ikibazo mu kuguru. Jepchirchir yabwiye ikinyamakuru co muri Kenya The Nation ati: "Ndababara mu mafyigo no mu kuguru kwose”. Niyonsaba, umunonotsi yatahukanye umudari w’ifeza mw’ihiganwa rya Olempike mu gusiganwa ku metero 800 mu 2016, yimuriwe ku ntera za 5000 na 10000. Uyu murundikazi w’imyaka 29 yabujijwe kwiruka kuri izi ntera 800 yari amenyereye mu 2019 kubera ikibazo c’imisemburo ya testosterone iri ku rugero rwo hejuru. Jepchirchir w’imyaka 28, yaratahukanye umudari w’inzahabu i Tokyo mu mwaka uheze mu kwiruka ku mwanya w’amasaha abiri n’iminota 27 n’amasegonda 20, atsinda mugenziwe Brigid Kosgei n’umunyamerikakazi Molly Seidel. Uyu munonotsi yatsindiye amahiganwa mpuzamakungu ya marathon ku ruhande rw’abagore mu 2016 na 2020 yongerako ati: "Ndababaye cane ariko sinohava nunyura imvune na rirya tugifise irindi higanwa mu mwaka uza imbere y’uko nja kurwanira intsinzi yanje ya Olempike mu 2024 mu nkino zizobera i Paris”. Jepchirchir yatsindiye ihiganwa rya mbere rya marathon i Boston mu kwa kane akaba yaratevye gushirwa ku rutonde rw’umurwi w’abakenyakazi bane ba Kenya bazohiganwa muri marathon i Eugene. Ku ruhande rwiwe, Niyonsaba avuga ko ata kundi yari kugira atari ukuva muri iri higanwa rizobera muri Amerika. Aciye ku rubuga rwa Instagram yanditse ati: "Haraciye hafi ukwezi kumwe ntanguye kwumva imvune yo mu kirenge. Jewe n’abo dufashanya twarakoze ibishobora vyose kugira nkire. "Ubu meze neza ariko sinashoboye kwimenyereza muri iki kiringo cose, rero uko meze ubu sinumva ko vyonshobokera guhiganwa uko ndavyipfuza”. Niyonsaba, Umurundikazi wenyene amaze gutsindira umudari wa Olempike, yarakoze birashimwa mw’ihiganwa Diamond League ryabereye i Doha mu kwa gatanu, aho yiruka imetero 3000. Mu mahiganwa ya Olempike y’umwaka uheze, yahejeje ari mu kibanza ca gatanu ku metero 10000 ku ruhande rw’abagore, akaba yaciye umuhigo, kuko yari ahejeje guhindura intera ahiganwako inyuma yo kubuzwa guhiganwa hagati y’imetero 400 na 1500 kubera imisemburo ya testosterone irenze urugero. Aya mahiganwa mpuzamakungu yo kwinonora imitsi (World Athletics Championships) azotangura ku wa gatanu akazorangira ku wa 21 Mukakaro (7).

headline: Leta ya Tanzania yasubije abagaya ingene iriko irahangana na coronavirus
text: Tanzania yiyamirije ivyagiriji vy'uko itariko irakora ibihagije mu kurwanya ikiza ca coronavirus cugarije ibihugu nka vyose vyo kw'isi. Iki gihugu kivuze ibi nyuma y'umunsi umwe ibiro biserukiye Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika i Dar es Salaam, bivuze ko ico kiza gishobora kwimonogoza vuba muri ico gihugu. Umuvugizi wa leta Dr Hassan Abbas yabwiye BBC ko ibiro vy'igihugu biberamwo ubushakashatsi n'ibipimo bicugaye kandi ko gupima vyahagaritswe. Ivyo ngo ni kubera yuko bariko barakora itohoza ku bikoresho vyifashishwa mu gupima, ngo ariko abarwayi bafise ibimenyetso vya Covid-19 barabandanya kuvurirwa mu bitaro hose mu gihugu. Uwo muvugizi yagize ati: "Dushaka kwihitiramwo tubanje kwihweza uburyo bwose bwo gupima bukoreshwa kuri ino ndwara, kandi turiko turatera intambwe. "Kandi abanye Tanzania barabandanya ubuzima bwabo. Hari uwufise ibimenyetso, turamaze kuvuga ko akwiye guca aja ku bigo vy'ubuvuzi biri hirya no hino. "Rero ivy'uko tutariko turahangana na Covid-19 mu gihugu, si vyo". Iki gihugu co mu buseruko bwa Afrika nta mategeko akaze cashizeko yo kubuza uruja n'uruza kubera iki kiza kandi nta cahindutse ku buzima ugereranije n'uko bwari aho ico kiza catangazwa ubwa mbere mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Amasoko hamwe n'ibibanza vy'urudandazwa vyama vyuzuye abantu, bigatera impungenge ko iki kiza gishobora gukwiragira vuba. Abantu benshi ubu bahitamwo kwambara udufuka-munwa hamwe n'ibindi bifuka mu maso mu kwikingira. Ku buryo bugenda burigaragaza, amaduka, amasoko, ububare hamwe n'ibibanza biberamwo amasengesho, haza harashirwa indobo z'amazi n'isabune ku bwinjiriro bagahimiriza abantu gukaraba intoke imbere yo kwinjira.

headline: Intambara ya Ukraine: Poland ivuga ko izobaho n'aho Russia yoyima gaze
text: Pologne ivuga ko izoshobora "kubaho" inyuma y'aho Uburusiya buhagarikiye igurishwa rya gaze muri ico gihugu kuri uno wa gatatu, nk'uko amakuru abivuga. Ikompanyi ntanganguvu y'Uburusiya Gazprom yabwiye Pologne na Bulgarie ko izohagarika igurishwa rya gaze mu bihugu "vy'abakeba" vyanse kuriha mu ma rouble. Amakuru ava mu bigo vy'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya bijejwe gaze yerekana ko gaze yahora irungikwa muri Pologne ubu yahagaze. Pologne ivuga ko izoronka gaze ahandi. Ntibiramenyekana neza nimba Bulgarie nayo nyene yakatiwe gaze. Ibi bihugu vyompi vyaranse kuriha mu ma roubles - ifaranga ry'Uburusiya. Ikompanyi ya Pologne ijejwe gaze, PGNiG, ivuga ko yari yabwiwe ko imihora yose ya gaze yategerezwa kwugarwa kuva isaha zibiri mu masaha yo mu ci ya Bulaya yo hagati (ni co kimwe n'ay'Uburundi no mu Rwanda). Ubushikiranganji bwa Bulgaria bujejwe amasoko ntanganguvu buvuga ko bwabwiwe ko irungikwa rya gaze muri iki gihugu rihagarikwa kuva kuri uwu wa gatatu. PGNiG igendera kuri Gazprom ku rugero hafi rwose rwa gaze yinjiza mu gihugu, 53% ya gaze yinjije mu gihugu yayiguze mu Burusiya mu gice ca mbere c'uno mwaka. Ivuga ko iri hagarikwa ry'igurishwa ari uguhonyanga amasezerano, ikavuga kandi ko izofata izindi ngingo kugira ngo isubire kuronka gaze. Bulgaria,  igihugu gisanzwe kigendera kuri Gazprom ku rugero rurenga 90% rwa gaze gikoresha, ivuga ko yafashe ingingo zo kurondera ayandi masoko ariko nta mategeko yafashwe ku bijanye n'ikoreshwa rya gaze muri kino gihe. Ubushikiranganji bw'ico gihugu bujejwe amasoko ntanganguvu buvuga ko Bulgarie yakoze ivyo yategerezwa gukora mu masezerano isanzwe ifitaniye na Gazprom kandi ko bwarishe ivyo bwategerezwa kuriha. Buvuga kandi ko uburyo bushasha bwo kuriha bwashizweho n'Uburusiya buhonyanga amasezerano asanzwe ahari. Aya makuru amaze kuja ahabona, ubushikiranganji bwa Pologne bujejwe ikirere buvuga ko iki gihugu gifise amasoko ntanganguvu akwiye. Umushikiranganji ajejwe ikirere Anna Moskwa avuga ko bidakenewe kwikora kuri gaze y'integabizoza kandi ko badashobora guhagarika gaze ku bakiriya. Icegera c'umushikiranganji wa Pologne ajejwe imigenderanire, Marcin Przydacz, avuga ko igihugu ciwe cari camaze kwitegura ko Uburusiya bwari gushobora kugabanya igurishwa rya gaz mu gihugu ciwe, gica kirondera ayandi masoko. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Ndazi neza cane ko tuzotorera inyishu iki kibazo". Avuga kandi ko iyi ngingo yo kwugara imihora ya gaze yerekana ko Moscou itari "incuti y'umwizigirwa mu gikorwa ico ari co cose c'ubucuruzi" aca asaba ibindi bihugu vya Bulaya nk'Ubudagi gushigikira ingingo yo guhagarika gukoresha amasoko ntanganguvu y'Uburusiya. Polonge yari isanzwe iri mu nteguro zo guhagarika kugurira gaze mu Burusiya gushika mu mpera z'uno mwaka, aho amasezerano y'igihe kirekire na Gazprom azoba arangiye. PGNiG ivuga ko ububiko bwayo bwo mu kuzimu bwari bwuzuye gushika ku rugero rwa 80% kandi ko, kubera ici ririko riregereza, atari benshi bayisaba. Pologne nayo nyene irafise ayandi masoko, harimwo ikigo ca gaze y'amazi (gaz naturel liquéfié/liquefied natural gas, GNL/LNG) kiri ahitwa Swinoujscie. Ku wa 01 Rusama (5), vyitezwe ko uwundi muringoti wa gaze iva muri Lithuania na woe nyene uzokwugururwa, bikazotuma Pologne ironka gaze ivuye muri ico gihugu. Ni mu gihe uwundi muringoti mushasha uva muri  Norvège, uzwi nka "Baltic Pipe", uzotangura gukora muri Gitugutu (10). Ushobora kwuzura rwose gushika mu mpera z'uno mwaka ugashobora guca usubirira gaze yose yava mu Burusiya. Ibice vyababa 40% vya gaze ibihugu vyo mw'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya bikoresha isanzwe iva mu Burusiya. Hagati aho, ibihugu vyinshi vyaramaze gufata ingingo yo kuvavanura n'amasoko ntanganguvu y'Uburusiya mu kwihora igitero cabwo kuri Ukraine. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zaramaze guhagarika burundu igitoro, gaze n'ibizuku (charbon) vy'Uburusiya. Ni mu gihe Ubwongereza butegura guhagarika kugurira igitoro mu Burusiya imbere y'uko uno mwaka urangira, hakazokurikira gaze vuba bishoboka, mu gihe Ubumwe bwa Bulaya nabwo buriko buragabanya gaze bugurirayo gushika ku bice bibiri vya bitatu.

headline: OMS yihagazeko ku miti y'inkorora "ibangamye" ikorerwa muri India
text: OMS ivuga ko n'ubu igihagaze hahandi nyene   inyuma y'aho Ubuhindi buvugiye ko imiti ine y'inkorora ifitaniye isano n'impfu z'abana muri Gambia yujuje ibisabwa igihe yapimwa muri ico gihugu. OMS yari yasohoye  imburi mu kwezi kwa Gitugutu  (10) igira inama abacungera ibijanye n'imiti kudasubira kugurisha iyo miti inyobwa (Sirop/syrup) ikorwa na kompanyi yo mu Buhindi. Umutegetsi wo muri reta y'Ubuhindi yabwiye BBC ko OMS "yahurudutse" mu kwagiriza iyo miti. Ariko iryo shami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi ryavuze ko ryakoze ico rijejwe. Umutegetsi wo muri OMS yabwiye BBC kuri email ati: "Inshingano za OMS n'ukuburira isi ku bishobora kubangama. OMS ihagaze ku co yakoze." OMS yongeyeko ko izo "sirop zibangamye kandi zidakwiye kuba mu muti n'umwe, na gato. Mu mpera z'ukwezi kwa Mukakaro (kw'indwi) abategetsi muri Gambia babonye ko hari ukwiyongera mu gukomereka amafvyigo mu bana bafise munsi y'imyaka itanu. Reta mu nyuma yavuze ko abana 69 bapfuye  biturutse kuri izo ngorane ku mafyigo. Mu kwezi kwa Gitugutu (10) , OMS yavuze ko izo mpfu zishobnora kuba zifitaniye isano n'imiti y'inkorora inyobwa ine  ikorwa na Maiden Pharmaceuticals, kompanyi yo mu Buhindi. OMS ivuga ko yapimye iyo miti - romethazine Oral Solution, Kofexmalin Baby Cough Syrup, Makoff Baby Cough Syrup na  Magrip N Cold Syrup - hanyuma igasanga yarimwo urugero rutemewe rwa diethylene glycol  na  ethylene glycol nk'ibihumanya". Diethylene glycol na ethylene glycol ni ubumara ku muntu kandi ishobora kwica umuntu ayifashe. \n\nUbuhidi bwaciye buvuga ko bugiye gutohoza kuri iyi miti buca butegeka Maiden Pharmaceuticals guhagarika kuyikora mw'ihinguriro ryayo rikuru riri mu ntara ya Haryana iri mu buraruko. Ku wa  13 Kigarama (12), Muganga  VG Somani, umugenduzi mukuru w'imiti mu Buhindi, yandikiye ikete OMS avuga ko ibipimo vyakozwe kur iyo miti muri laboratoire ya reta  vyerekanye ko iyo miti "itari ihumanijwe" n'ivyo OMS yavuze. Yongeyeko ati: "Dukurkije ivyegeranyo vya laboratoire ya reta , ibipimo vyo gusuzuma kuri iyo miti yose uko ari ine vyatoye ko yari yujuje ibisabwa ." Ivyerekanywe n'ibimo biriko birihwezwa kandi n'umugwi w'abahinga b'Abahindi. Umujenama mukuru mu bushikiranganji bw'Ubuhindi bujejwe amakuru yabwiye BBC ko OMS "yahurudutse" mu kwagiriza ko iyo miti y'inkorora ko ariyo yateye impfu  z'abana. Kanchan Gupta yavuze ko OMS yihuse kwemeza ibintu ata vyemeza vy'ubuhinga ifise. Yoyo (OMS), ivuga ko "iyo abana bapfuye ku bwinshi bitewe n'indwara y'amayobera, kaba ari akaga bisigura ko OMS itegerezwa gufata ingingo  yihuta". OMS ivuga ko "Laboratoire zatumwe na OMS muri Ghana no muri Suisse zapimye izo sirop ziketswe muri Gambia hanyuma ziremeza ko harimwo urugero rurengeje rwa  ethylene glycol na  diethylene glycol," ikabandanya ivuga ko buno nyene yaciye imenyesha ivyavuyemwo abategetsi bo muri Gambia n'Ubuhindi, yongera ibimenyesha abategetsi ba Maiden Pharmaceutical. Mw'ikete ryiwe, Muganga  Somani avuga ko uwo mugwi w'abahinga wasavye OMS  izindi nkuru zihariye zifasha kwemeza ko iyo miti ishobora kurwaza ariko ko gushika ubu utarayabwa. Iryo kete ntiryavuga neza neza ico uwo mugwi wasaba ico ari co. BBC irondeye ibiro vya Muganga  Somani, vyayibwiye kubariza mu bushikirnganji bw'Ubuhindi bujejwe amagara. BBC yabwandikiye ngo bugire ico buvuze. Ubuhindi buhingura ica gatatu c'imiti yo kw'isi, cane cane mu buryo bwa "generique". Mu Buhindi niho habarizwa amwe mu mahinguriro  y'imiti atera imbere ku muvuduko mununi cane, ico gihugu ubu kikaba gifatwa nka "farumasi (pharmacie) y'isi" ,kandi  nico ahanini gikora imiti ikoreshwa muri Africa.

headline: Igikombe ca Afrika Misiri 2019 - Imigwi, inkino n'uko batsindana
text: Uru ni urutonde rw'imigwi y'amakipe ari mu gikombe ca Afrika Misiri 2019, ugashobora kubona amakipe aza guhura, uko batsindanye hamwe n'ukuntu bahagaze mu manota. Ushobora gukurikirana ngaha umunsi ku munsi ukuntu izi nkino ziriko ziragenda

headline: Olaf Scholz: Chancelier mushasha w'Ubudagi ni nde?
text: Yatsinze amatora rusangi, none uwo yari amaze imyaka itatu ari icegera ca Chancelier [Umushikiranganji wa mbere] Angela  Merkel ubu aramusubiriye muri ico kibanza. Olaf Scholz yigeze guhabwa agatazirano ka "Scholzomat" (Scholzomaton) - ariko ubu yarashoboye gushira ku ruhande ivyo abantu bamuziko vyo gukora nk'imashini, arumvikana  n'imigambwe y'aba-Greens (Verts) na Free-Democrats (Liberaux Democrates). Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 63 yahoze ari umukuru w'igisagara ca Hamburg yemereye abatora kubandanya uko ibintu vyahora inyuma y'imyaka itandatu iheze Ubudagi butwarwa na Angela Merkel w'umu conservateur (Conservative), n'ubwo yari ahagarariye umugambwe bahiganwa wa Parti Social Democrate (SPD). Uburyo yifashe neza mu gutunganya ikibazo ca Covid bwamutumye  gushimagizwa no kuduza amajwi y'abamushima. Abatamwemera bafatira ku vyo yaranguye nk'umushikiranganji ajejwe ikigega ca reta, bakamwagiriza kuba yarananiwe cane  mu kibazo c'incuro zibiri z'akamaramaza kajanye n'amafaranga. Nk'umushikiranganji ajejwe ikigega ca reta,  Olaf Scholz ni we yari ajejwe uburyo bungana na miriyaridi 884 z'amadorari zegeranijwe na reta y'Ubudagi kugira zifashe  abagwizatunga muri ico gihugu guhangana n'ingaruka z'ikiza. "Iyi ni yo bazooka [ubwoko bw'inkoho] ikenewe kugira akazi gakorwe." Ni we yakoresha amanama y'abashikiranganji igihe Chanceliere Merkel atava i muhira   mu kwiyubara kwandura. N'ubwo wari umuruho guhangana n'ikibazo ca Covid, kuri  Scholz kabaye akaryo ko gutunganya uburyo bunini cane bw'ineza y'igihugu no kurwanira itekane ry'ihihugu, bijanye cane n'imizi yiwe y'ivyiyumviro vy'aba socialiste. Imbere y'uko bitangazwa ko ashaka kwitoza kw'izina ry'umugambwe wiwe  SPD mu kibanza ca chancelier yarakunda kuvuga, iyo abajijwe niba azokwitoza, ati "dukeneye gukora aho kuja mu vyo kwirata". Hamwe n'Ubufaransa, Scholz  yabaye kirumara mu gushika ku mwumvikano wo gusohora amafaranga angana na miriyaridi 750 z'amafaranga y'amanyaburaya Euros yo kwivyukiranya ikiza ca Covid. Hanyuma  inyuma y'imyaka ya Merkel yaranzwe n'imigenderanire ya hafi cane n'Ubufaransa, ivyo Scholz yakoze mu gukomeza ugushigikirana hagati y'Ubufaransa n'Ubudagi na we bigiye kumugirira akamaro. Umushikiranganji w'Ubufaransa ajejwe ikigega Bruno Le Maire, uretse kumukeza ku gushigikirana n'Ubufaransa, yanamukeje kandi kuba uwo bavukana,  muganga Jens Scholz, yarafashije kujana mu bitaro vya Kiel n'indege abafaransa batandatu bari baremvye cane kubera Covid -19. Ni igikorwa co gukiza ubuzima cari  kizimvye cane, carishwe na reta y'Ubudagi. "None warakoze cane, Olaf, ku vyo umaze gukora vyose. Ariko kandi n'uwo muvukana yarakoze. Vy'ukuri n'umuryango nyawo w'Abadagi, umuryango w'aba Scholz", uko niko Le Maire yabivuze. Mu  mugambwe wa SPD, yamara, Olaf Scholz abonwa nk'umu-conservateur. Uwo mugambwe afatanije kuwurongora na  Saskia Esken na  Norbert Walter-Borjans, bo basanganywe umurongo w'aba-socialiste ukaze gusumba. Scholz, afise umugore na we w'umunyaporitike w'umu-SPD  Britta Ernst, yakuriye i Hamburg aca yinjira muri poritike nk'indongozi y'urwaruka rw'aba-socialiste, inyuma yo kwiga amategeko ajanye n'akazi. Yabaye umukuru w'igisagara ca Hamburg kuva mu 2011 gushika mu 2018,  ico gihe akaba ari ho ivyiyumviro vyiwe vyagabanuka ubukari bwa gi-socialiste. Yatowe ubwa mbere kuba umushingamateka mu 1998.

headline: Rwanda - Coronavirus: Katolika yafashe ingingo zijanye no gukinga ico kiza
text: Ekleziya Katolika mu Rwanda ihamagarira abakirisu gukurikiza amategeko atangwa n'inzego zijejwe amagara y'abantu mu ntumbero yo kwirinda wa mugera ruhonyabantu coronavirus, yiswe Covid-19. Ivyo biri mw'itangazo ryaraye risohowe na Antoine Kambanda, Umwepiskopi mukuru wa Diyoseze nkuru ya Kigali akaba n'icegera c'Inama y'Abepiskopi Gatolika mu Rwanda, aho amenyesha ingingo zafashwe mu makoraniro zizofasha abakirisu babo kudakoranako ngo bahave bandukizanya. Ibihugu bishika umunani ku mugabane wa Afrika bimaze gutangaza ko uwo mugera wamaze kubishikamwo, leta z'u Burundi n'u Rwanda zikaba ziherutse gutangaza ingingo zafashe mu ntumbero yo kwirinda no gukinga uwo mugera. Mw'iryo tangazo, Inama y'Abepiskopi Gatolika mu Rwanda isaba abakirisu "guhana amahoro ya Kristu ku mutima gusa ata guhana ibiganza canke guhoberana". Isaba kandi ko "mu gihe co gusangira (guhazwa mu Kinyarwanda) ari ugutega ibiganza, atagutega ururimi". Iyo nama yafashe kandi ingingo yo gukura "amazi y'umugisha" (amazi ahezagiye mu kirundi) mu twombo yashirwamwo mw'isengero, maze abakirisu bakaja barayakoramwo mu kugira urumenyetso rw'umusaraba. Basaba abakirisu kudasubira gukora aho yahora ashirwa kuko atakirimwo "kugeza igihe ikibazo kizoba gikemutse". Muri iryo tangazo, Inama y'Abepisikopi Gatolika mu Rwanda, yemereye abakirisitu ko izobandanya ikurikirana uko bimeze, ikazofata n'izindi ngingo zo kwikingira ni vyaba ngombwa. Gushika ubu, ibihugu birenga 80 biramaze guterwa n'uwo mugera watanguriye mu gisagara ca Wuhan c'intara ya Hubei mu Bushinwa. Ku mugabane wa Afrika, ibihugu vya Togo, Nigeria, Senegal, Misiri, Algeria, Tuniziya, Afrika y'Epfo na Cameroon nivyo bimaze guterwa n'uwo mugera. Mu ntumbero yo kurwanya uwo mugera, ibihugu vy'u Rwanda n'u Burundi biherutse gutangaza ingingo vyafashe mu ntumbero yo gukinga ko ishika muri vyo. U Burundi  bwatangaje ko ingenzi zivuye mu bihugu vy'u Bushinwa, Koreya y'epfo, Iran, Ubutaliyani, Ubudage, Ubufaransa, Ubuyapani na Espanye zizobanza gushirwa mu kibanza categuwe ukwazo nyene mu kiringo c'iminsi 14. Nayo mu Rwanda, leta isaba abanyagihugu "kugabanya ingendo zitari ngombwa" mu bihugu birangwamwo coronavirus, yongera kandi itangaza n'ingingo zitandukanye harimwo n'izo isuku, kugira ngo birinde kwandura.

headline: Coronavirus: WHO yemeje amategeko yo gupima imiti kama nyafrika
text: Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO yemeje amategeko aha uburenganzira igerageza ry'imiti kama nyafrika mu rugamba rwo kurwanya Covid-19. OMS ivuga ko ubushakashatsi bwimbitse ari bwo bukwiye kuba umushinge wonyene mu buvuzi kama. Umuti kama uwo ariwo wose woboneka ko ufise akarusho vyoba ngombwa ko hashirwamwo ishaka rinini kugira ngo ukorwe ku rugero runini . Umukuru w'igihugu ca Madagasikari yamaze igihe yamamaza umuti kama utarapimwa avuga ko ushobora gukiza Covid-19 n'ubwo OMS igabisha kw'ikoreshwa ry'imiti itarapimwa. OMS ivuga ko aya mategeko mashasha afise intumbero yo gufasha no gutera intege abahinga muri Afrika kugira ngo bashobore gukora neza amagerageza y'imiti. Iyi ngingo ije mu gihe igitigiri c'abanduye coronavirus kw'isi carenze imiliyoni 30, n'ayo abo imaze guhitana bakaba barenga 957,000. Muri Afrika, abarenga umuliyoni 1.3 nibo bamaze kwandura, nayo agarenga 33,000 bakaba bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima. Gushika ubu, incanco zababa 140 nizo ziriko zirageragezwa kw'isi, iziharurwa muri mirongo zikaba ziriko zirageragerezwa ku bantu. Hampande y'utu twigoro, uruhusha rwaratanzwe kugira ngo imiti kama nyafrika ishobore kugeragezwa ku ntambwe ya gatatu. Umurwi w'abahinga washizweho na OMS, ikigo ca Afrika kijejwe gukurikirana no gukinga indwara, hamwe n'umurwi w'ishirahamwe ry'umuryango w'ibihugu vya Afrika ujejwe imibano, wemeje aya mategeko. Igerageza ry'imiti rigeze ku ntambwe ya gatatu mu bisanzwe riba rifise intumbero yo kugeragereza iyi miti ku murwi munini w'abantu. Umukuru w'uyu murwi, Prof Gilbert Matsabisa avuga ati: "Kwemeza izi ngingo ngenderwako bizotuma ibizokwemezwa n'amavuriro ko bikurikije amategeko mpuzamakungu bishobora gutuma iyi miti yizerwa ko ishobora kuvura Covird-19 itagize ingaruka mbi ku magara y'abantu". Mw'itangazo ryasohowe na muganga Prosper Tumusiime wo mw'ishirahamwe OMS, avuga ati: "Igihe Covid-19 yaduka, co kimwe n'igihe ca Ebola muri Afrika y'Uburengero, vyarerekanye ko ari nkenerwa gutegura imigambi nyayo yo kwitaho amagara hamwe no kwihutisha integuro z'ubushakashatsi n'iterambere, harimwo no ku miti kama". Mu kwa kane, Perezida Andry Rajoelina wa Madagascar yaratanguje isekeza ryo gutanga umuti witwa Covid-Organics ku bantu benshi, avuga ko ukiza kandi ugakinga iyi ndwara. Wari wageragerejwe ku bantu 20 gusa mu kiringo c'indwi zitatu zonyene. Bwana Rajoelina ashigikiye uwu muti kama, n'aho iri zinga ryo mw'ibahari Indiyano rifise abantu 15.925 banduye coronavirus hamwe na 216 bishwe na Covid-19. Uwu muti wo kunywa wakozwe n'ikigo c'ubushakashatsi ca Madagascar, Malagasy Institute of Applied Research, mu giterwa citwa Artemisia gisanzwe gihingurwamwo imiti yo kuvura malaria hamwe n'ibindi biti vyo muri ico gihugu. Uramaze guhabwa n'ibindi bihugu bitari bike vyo ku mugabane wa Afrika. Muganga Tumusiime avuga ko biciye mw'ihuriro ry'ishirahamwe OMS ku mugabane wa Afrika (African Vaccine Regulatory Forum ), ubu hari uburyo bwo gupima imiti mu karere igashobora gusuzumwa no kwemezwa mu kiringo iminsi 60.

headline: Ingwano ya Ukraine: Roman Abramovich yafatiwe ibihano n'Ubwongereza
text: Nyene umurwi  wa Chelsea Roman Abramovich yafatiwe ibihano na reta y'Ubwongereza (UK)  mu murongo w'ingingo zifatwa kubera igitero Uburusiya bwagize muri Ukraine. Ari mu batunzi ruhebwa indwi bakozweko n'ibihano  vya vuba, harimwo gufatira amatungo yabo no kubima impampuro zo kwinjira muri ico gihugu. Urwo rutonde ruriko kandi abafise amafaranga aharurwa muri za miriyaridi z'ama dorari  Igor Sechin na Oleg Deripaska, bose babonwa nk'abakorana na  prezida Vladmir Putin. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson yavuze  ko "hadashobora kuba aho kwibera ata nkomanzi" kuri abo bashigikiye igitero. Johnson yavuze ati: "Ibihano vy'uno munsi n'intambwe ya vuba yerekana ukudahesha kw'Ubwongereza mu gushigikira abanya-Ukraine. Nta mpuhwe tuzogira mu gukurikirana abafasha iyicwa ry'abanyagihugu basanzwe, ugusambura ibitaro n'ukwigarurira  mu buryo bunyuranye n'amategeko ibihugu ducuditse vyigenga." Reta yari imaze iminsi yotswa igitutu kugira ifatire ibihano Abramovich, yavuze ko yafashe "ingingo itoroshe" yo kugurisha Chelsea FC mu ntango z'uku kwezi. Chelsea yatswe Abramovich mu gufatira amatungo yiwe, kugirisha uwo murwi rero bikaba bibaye birahagarara. Reta ivuga ko uwo murwi uzohabwa uruhusha rudasanzwe rwo kubandanya inkino zitegekanijwe, abakozi bahembwe hanyuma abari bamaze kugura ama tike nabo bashobore kuraba inkino. Abasanzwe bafise ama tike y'ikiringo c'inkino barashobora kubandanya kuraba izo bafitiye ama tike ariko ubu uwo murwi nta tike n'imwe wemerewe gusubira kugurisha. Inzu yo kugurishirizamwo ibicuruzwa na Chelsea nayo igiye kwugarwa. Abramovich, w'imyaka 55,  bivugwa ko afitaniye imigenderanire ikomeye na prezida w'Uburusiya Vladimir Putin, ariko ivyo arabihakana. Reta ivuga ko Abramovich, aharurwako itunga ribona rya miliardi  zirenga 12 mu ma dorari, ari umwe mu batunzi ruhebwa bake bo kuva mu myaka ya 90 bagihagaze neza ku ntwaro ya Putin". Abramovich afise imitahe mu ruganda rukomeye Evraz ruhingura acier (ivyuma)  no muri Norilsk Nickel akaba yagurishije imitahe yari afise muri kompanyi yo mu Burusiya y'ibitoro  Sibneft kuri kompanyi ya reta ya gaz Gazprom kuri miriyaridi zirenga 13 z'ama dorari mu 2005. Mu gihe gufatirwa ibihano bituma kazoza ka Chelsea kaja mu mayira abiri, abashikiranganganji bagerageje kwzeza uwo murwi ko "utazogirwako ingaruka mu bidakenewe". Muri tweet, umushikiranganji ajejwe umuco Nadine Dorries yavuze ko  igishirwa imbere ari uko abafashije intwaro ya Putin" babibazwa. Yanditse ati:  "Ndazi ko ivyo bizana kuja mu madidane, ariko reta izokorana n'ishirahamswe ry'umupira w'amaguru n'imigwi kugira umupira ugume ukinwa ariko kandi ibihano navyo bikore kuri abo vyerekeye".

headline: Coronavirus-Afrika: ibitigiri vy’abanduye bigenda vyiyongera muri Algeria na Senegal
text: Igitigiri c'abamenyekanye ko banduye wa mugera ruhonyabanyu wa coronavirus muri Algeria caraye kiduze gushika kuri 17 muri iri joro ryakeye ku wa gatatu, mu gihe Senegal nayo itangaza ko abantu bantu babiri bawanduye bakaba baheruka i Bulaya. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Algeria atangaza ko abantu icenda bo mu muryango umwe baba mu karere ka Blida mu buraruko bw'ico gihugu ku birometero 30  uvuye ku mugwa mukuri Alger, basanze baranduye. Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ritangaza ko mu kwezi guheze uyo muryango wari wakiriye incuti zabo z'Abafaransa bapimwe bagasanga baranduye bamaze gusubira mu Bufaransa. Nayo muri Senegal umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu avuga ko hari abandi babiri banduye ejo ku wa gatatu, gutyo igitigiri c'abanduye muri ico gihugu gica gishika kuri bane. Umwe mu batangajwe ko banduye ni umwongerezakazi afise imyaka 33 yinjiye ku mugwa mukuru w'ico gihugu, Dakar, ku wa 24 z'ukwa kabiri avuye i Londres. Uwa kabiri ni umufaransakazi w'imyaka 68 yinjiye ku wa 29 z'ukwa kabiri. Hirya y'ejo ku wa kabiri, umugabo wiwe yari yapimwe basanga yaranduye. Abo bantu babiri bashasha banduye barwarijwe mu bitaro, aho bivugwa ko amagara yabo atabangamiwe. Muri Afrika, igitigiri c'abamaze kumenyekana ko banduye coronavirus gishitse kuri 26:  Algeria 17, Senegal bane, Misiri babiri, Maroc, Nigeria na Tuniziya umwe umwe.

headline: Burundi: Abatimbo ba Gishora baracishuza leta imiliyoni 12 kubera ikiraka batswe
text: Umugwi ndangakaranga w'abatimbo b'u Burundi wo mu Gishora (Gitega) uvuga ko wishuza leta amafaranga miliyoni 12 wakoresheje mu myiteguro y'urugendo rwo  guherekeza umukuru w'igihugu. Uwo mugwi wa Gishora niwo wari watoranijwe ngo uherekeze Prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye mw'isabukuru ryabereye i Dubai (Dubai Expo 2020) ryatanguye mu kwezi kwa Gitugutu 2021, uca ukurwa muri urwo rugendo ku munota wa nyuma. Aho mu Gishobora, niho hasanzwe hari  umuzi w'umuco wo kuvuza ingoma z'u Burundi, umuco w'ubuhinga bivugwa ko ushobora kuba umaze imyaka amajana. Mu kwitegurira urwo rugendo, uwo mugwi uvuga ko wakoresheje amafaranga menshi mu gufata ingendo baja i Bujumbura kurondera impapuro za nkenerwa, kuriha aho barara hamwe n'ivyo bafungura. Abo batimbo ba Gishora bavuga ko ico bobo bakeneye ari gushumbushwa ivyo bakoresheje bitegurira urugendo rwaje kujamwo abandi ku munota wanyuma kandi ku buryo butumvikana. Bavuga yuko ikibazo cabo cakomeje guteragiranwa n'ubushikiranganji butandukanye. Florentine Kwizera yavuganye n'umuyobozi wabo, Pacifique Nshimirimana, atangura amusigurira uko ico kibazo giteye (urashobora kwumva ico kiganiro aho hejuru). Ibi ni ibindi woraba:

headline: Burundi: Basaba ko ingingo yo gukata umushahara w'abigisha ibangira
text: Umurwi w'igihugu wigenga ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu mu Burundi CNIDH usaba ko ingingo yo gukata intererano ku mishahara y'abigisha ihagarara kuko yafashwe abo vyega batagishijwe inama. Urunani rw'amasendika y'abigisha COSSESONA yarafashe ingingo y'uko kuva muri uku kwa mbere 2020 buri mwigisha, yaba uwuri muri sendika canke atarimwo, azokatwa amafaranga 500 mu ntumbero yo gushigikirana hagati y'abigisha. Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru kuri uyu wa kabiri, Sixte Vigny Nimuraba arongoye CNIDH asaba urwo runani guhagarika igikorwa cose co gukata ayo mafaranga y'intererano. Avuga ko barindira urutonde rushasha rw'abanywanyi bazoba binjiye mu wo mugambi. Abarongoye ama sendika SYGEPEBU na SEPEDUC barapfunzwe kuva ku wa 08 z'uku kwezi inyuma y'aho biyamirije iyo ngingo ya COSSESONA bavuga ko abayirongoye bashaka kwiba abigisha izuba riva. Muri ico kiganiro, Bwana Nimuraba avuga ko umurwi CNIDH ushigikiye umugambi wo gufatana mu nda wiyumviriwe n'urunani COSSESSONA, kuko ujanye n'itegeko ry'umukuru w'igihugu rishirasho umunsi wahariwe ugufatana mu nda. Hagati aho, avuga ko CNIDH inegura amasezerano yashizweko igikumu mu Kayanza ategekanya gutaka amafaranga ku mishara y'abigisha bose, abari mu ma sendika n'abatari muri yo. Ati: "Ntiyakurikije amategeko y'igihugu hamwe n'amategeko mpuzamakungu", akavuga ko ari uguhonyanga uburenganzira bwabo. "Ingingo yafashwe yo gukata umushahara abakozi batagishijwe inama ari uguhohotera uburenganzira bwo ku mutungo wabo". Emmanuel Mashandari, icegera c'urunani COSSESONA yabwiye BBC ko ingingo yo gukata abigisha bose yafashwe kubera ko nabo nyene iyo hari ivyo basavye bakavyemererwa, nabo nyene babironkako. Ati: "Twabigize kubera y'uko na twebwe iyo tugiye gusaba ivyo dusaba, bigashika mbere n'umushahara bakawudukata kubera tuba twahagaritse akazi, ivyo tuzanye barabironkako". "Duca tugira tuti rero ko amasendika arinda arwanira ivyo arwanira hanyuma akazana kandi bakaronkako bose, no kuri iki ciyumviro co gufashanya bategerezwa kuyatanga bose". CNIDH yo ivuga ko COSSESSONA yategerezwa "kubanza kuja inama n'ingingo n'abigisha ikabasigurira inyungu zo kwinjira muri uwo mugambi imbere y'uko babakata intererano ku mishahara yabo". Bwana Nimubara ati: "N'aho CNIDH ishigikiye umugambi w'igihugu wo gushigikirana, ugukata imishahara y'abakozi biba inyuma y'uko abantu bagishijwe inama kandi bikagaragarira mu rwandiko ruriko umukono nk'uko bigenda mu ntererano zindi zitangwa mu ma sendika". "Kireste uburenganzira leta ihabwa n'amategeko agenga igihugu n'ibindi bimwe bimwe bishobora kurekurwa n'ayo mategeko, umushahara nta n'umwe ashobora kuwihagira". Bwana Mashandari aragiriza Antoine Manuma arongoye SYGEPEBU hamwe na Gérard Niyongabo arongoye SEPEDUC ko bifatiye mu gahanga abarongoye COSSESONA mu kubatuka baciye ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi. CNIDH  iranegura iyo ngendo, igahamagarira ahubwo abegwa n'ayo matati gushira imbere ibiganiro aho kwama batyozanya. Isaba ko iyo ngingo yo gukata amahera ku mishahara iba irahagaze kugira abigisha bavyiyumvamwo babanza kuvyiyemeza bo nyene ubwabo, batarinze guterwa ubwoba.
