Isaba kandi igipolisi kurekura "abari mu mashirahamwe aharanira inyungu z'abigisha bapfunzwe bariko baharanira amateka yabo kugira ngo hashirwe imbere umwumvikano hagati y'abari mu matati". Iyo ngingo yo gukata amafaranga yafashwe inyuma y'ayandi mafaranga yakaswe ku mishahara y'abigisha mu 2017 na 2019. Bwana Nimuraba asaba urunani COSSESONA kwerekana ku mugaragaro ingene ayo mafaranga yakoreshejwe kugira ngo buri mwigisha wese abikeneye abimenye. Ati: "Ivyo vyotuma haba umuco no mu kwumvisha abigisha ikoreshwa ryiza ry'amafaranga bakaswe". COSSESONA (Coalition Spéciale des Syndicats des Enseignants pour la Solidarité Nationale) ni urunani rw'amasendika atandukanye y'abigisha rwatangujwe mu 2017.

headline: Afrika y'Epfo-Covid: Prezida yatanze akarorero mu guterwa urucanco
text: Umukuru wa Afrika y'Epfo Cyril Ramaphosa yatewe urucanco rwa coronavirus  ubwo igihugu catanguye gutanga urucanco rwa Johnson & Johnson. Yetewe urucanco imbere y'abafata amasanamu mu bitaro vya district ya Khayelitsha muri Cape Town-mu nyuma yandika kuri twitter ati: "Guterwa urucanco vyanyarutse, vyari vyoroshe kandi ntivyababaza cane.'' "Nsavye abakozi bacu  bo kwa muganga bose kwiyandikisha kugira bahabwe urucanco kuko aribo baza imbere mu kurwanya iki kiza ca coronavirus." Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara Zweli Mkhize hamwe n'abandi bakozi bo kwa muganga nabo  bacandazwe mu mugwi wa mbere w'incanco ibihumbi 80 za Johnson & Johnson zashitse mu gihugu ku wa kabiri ku mugoroba. Ikinyamakuru co ku mbuga-hwaniro  News24 kivuga ko prezida Cyril Ramaphosa yavuze ahejeje guterwa urucanco ati: "Uyu munsi n'intambwe ikomeye kuri twewe nk'abanya-Afrika y'Epfo,ko impera n'imperuka incanco zashitse kandi ziriko ziratangwa." Ico gihugu ca  mbere mu gusinzikazwa n'ikiza ca coronavirus muri Afrika cari kuba catanguye gutanga incanco ku ndwi iheze ariko ntivyabaye bikiba kubera amakenga ko urucanco rwa Astra-Zeneca rwagomba gukoreshwa, rwoba rudakinga ubwoko bushasha buriko burakwiragira kuva butowe ubwa mbere muri Afrika y'Epfo mu kwezi kwa 11. Kubera urucanco rwa Johnson & Johnson rutangwa rimwe gusa rukaba rukwiye, biranoroshe kurukoresha.

headline: Nkurunziza ati: ‘U Burundi ntibwatewe n’abasirikare bo mu Rwanda rwatewe n’igihugu c’u Rwanda’
text: Perezida Petero Nkurunziza yasubiye gushimangira ko igihugu c'u Rwanda cateye igihugu c'u Burundi mu gitero giheruka ku kirindoro c'igisirikare muri komine Mabayi y'intara ya Cibitoke, hari mu kiganiro yagiranye n'abamenyeshamakuru n'abanyagihugu i Gitega . Muri ico kiganiro, Perezida Petero Nkurunziza yamenyesheje ko atari ubwa mbere ico gihugu gitera u Burundi, akavuga ko ibimenyetso vyose bihari. Leta y'u Rwanda yarahakanye ivyo yagirizwa, ikavuga ko ari ibirego isanzwe imenyereye kuva kera kandi ko ata mwanya ishobora kubatesha. Mu ntango za kuno kwezi, Inama mpuzamakungu ijejwe akarere k'ibiyaga binini (CIRGL/ICGLR) iherutse gushinga umurwi wo gukora amatohoza kuri ico gitero; gushika ubu nta cegeranyo cawo kiraboneka. Muri ico kiganiro, Perezida Nkurunziza yavuze ko leta y'u Burundi ifise ivyemezo nyavyo vyerekana ko igitero cabaye ku wa 17 z'ukwezi kwa 11 uyu mwaka, ku mutumba wa Marura muri komine Mabayi cakozwe n'abasirikare b'igihugu c'u Rwanda. Ati: "Aha rero nashaka gukebura Abarundi (…)mumenye neza y'uko atari abasoda bo mu Rwanda bateye u Burundi, ni igihugu c'u Rwanda cateye u Burundi". "Kuko uteye abasirikare b'ikindi gihugu bacungera imbibe uba uteye igihugu. Ntabwo bateye ikirindiro c'abasirikare b'u Burundi, bateye igihugu c'u Burundi". Umurwi w'Inama mpuzamakungu ijejwe akarere k'ibiyaga binini (CIRGL/ICGLR)  wagenywe gukora amatohoza kuva ku wa 03/12 gushika ku wa 10/12, 2019 gushika ubu nturashikiriza icegeranyo c'ivyo wabonye. Perezida Nkurunziza avuga ko atari ubwa mbere bibaye haba abantu batera u Burundi bavuye mu Rwanda, akavuga ko vyatanguye mu 2014 bikabandanya mu 2015, 2016, 2018. Amenyesha ko abafashwe bose bagafatanwa n'ibirwanisho bemeza ko baronkeye imyimenyerezo n'igihugu c'u Rwanda. Ati:  "Abo dufata baratubwira bati 'twebwe twaronse imyimenyerezo mu Rwanda duca muri Congo tuje gutera u Burundi'". Avuga ko gushika ubu leta y'u Burundi ifise ibirwanisho vyababa 1000 vyafashwe vyinjiye bivuye mu Rwanda bikaba vyaraneretswe n'ishirahamwe CIRGL. Mu gihe u Rwanda rwatwagirije u Burundi ko ruhaye indaro inkozi z'ikibi zirondera kudurumbanya umutekano mu gihugu c'u Rwanda, Perezida Nkurunziza avyamirira kure. Ati: "Twarababwiye ko twebwe mu mateka y'u Burundi tutigeze tubika inkozi z'ikibi, nta munsi n'umwe igihugu c'u Burundi cateje ingorane ikindi gihugu tubana muri kano karere". Avuga ko u Rwanda rwari rwaranse umurwi mpuzamakungu uza guhinyuza ibirego ivyo bihugu vyompi vyagirizanya, kuri we ivyo bikerekana ko hari ico rwiyotsa. "Tuvuze tuti abadutera baturuka mu Rwanda, abaza guhinyuza baraje mu Burundi barabona ko ivyo u Rwanda rwagiriza u Burundi atari vyo, hama natwe dusaba ko bogenda mu Rwanda kuturabira ko ivyo tuvuga atari vyo, ariko u Rwanda rwaranse". Leta y'u Burundi yaritwariye u Rwanda, ariko gushika ubu bisa n'akamizwe n'ingoma. Petero Nkurunziza ati: "Ibihe ni umutahe ukomeye cane, hari ibidakunda uno munsi ariko ejo bizokunda. Urubanza ntirubungwa". "Harya urubanza rwarinjiye, kumbure uno munsi ntibikunda, mugabo Abanyarwanda bicare bazi y'uko n'aho hoca imyaka ijana canke amajana abiri, Abarundi bazokwishuza urubanza". Leta y'u Rwanda yoyo ibandanya ivuga ko ibivugwa n'u Burundi bifise intumbero y'ugusamaza amakungu ku kibazo nyamukuru kiri mu karere, kandi ko atari ubwa mbere. Kuva mu mwaka wa 2015 aho hadukiye uruhagarara rwa politike mu Burundi, u Burundi n'u Rwanda vyakomeje kwagirizanya kimwe cose ku ruhande rwaco, ko ari umukeba afasha imirwi y'inyeshamba ishaka guhungabanya umutekano kubutaka bwaco.

headline: A﻿gathon Rwasa yareze leta y'u Burundi muri sentare ya EAC
text: Amakuru aturuka muri sentare ya Afrika y'ubuseruko EALA, avuga ko sentare y'intago y'uwo muryango, yakiriye ikirego catanzwe n'umugambwe CNL utavuga rume na leta y'u Burundi. Ico kirego cerekeye amatora aheruka kuba yemeje abashingamateka bazoserukira u Burundi mu nama nshingamateka ya EALA. Umugambwe CNL waramaze gutangaza ko utemera ukuntu ayo matora yagenze. Mu kiganiro twagiranye n'umuyobozi wa CNL, Agathon Rwasa, Florentine Kwizera yabanje kumubaza niba ikirego cabo carakiriwe.

headline: "Babigize ikinyegezwa, bihungabanya ubuzima bwanje, ngiye kubigwanya"
text: Peter Musembi B﻿BC Sport “Kuri twebwe  iwacu muri muri Tanzania, kari kuba kabaye akaga.” Se w’umunya-Tanzania wa mbere yaronse umudari wa Olympic mu kwoga ariko arayaga n’umukobwa wiwe, yemera ukuri, agerageza kumusigurira igituma yamuhishije ingorane y’amagara yishe nibura batanu bo mu muryango wabo. Iyo ngorane – kubera kudasuzumwa – yatumye kunyarukanwa kwa muganga mu mpera z’umwaka uheze, ico gihe havanwa  mu nda ya Magdalena Moshi  ibiro hafi bine (4kg)  vy’ibivyimba bita fibromes  inyuma yo gukorwa (kubagwa) vyihuta. Imisi y’ububabare yaciye ikurikira imyaka n’iyindi  yari amaze yama agenda yumva atamerewe neza kuva mu myaka ya mbere yiwe y’ubuyabaga, aho akaba yari afise iyo ngorane ata nkeka ko yahungabanije umwuga wiwe wo kwoga. None, kubera iki Alex, se wiwe, atigeze amubwira na kimwe ku bijanye n’ibivyimba vya fibromes mu muryango wabo? Ati: “Abantu barashobora guca batangura gutungwa urutoke ngo ni intavyara” imbere yo kwongerako ati: “Ni rumwe mu mpome z’Abanya-Afrika dukeneye kumenya ko zihari kugirango dushobore kuzisenyura.” Mu kugira ico akoze, Magdalena yiyemeje kurwanya umuco wo kutubahuka kuvuga ibibazo vy’amagara ajanye n’irondoka (santé  reproductive/ reporoductive health) mu gihugu ciwe za Tanzania. Kuko, bwabaye ubwa mbere, igihe yariko arakira inyuma yo kubagwa muri Australia iyo yari yagiye kwiga, amenya ko yari afise ingorane ya fibromes kandi yari  isanzwe iri mu muryango iwabo kuva kera, mu gihe kandi ishobora guhererakanywa mu muryango. N’ubwo yajanwa mu bitaro kenshi ku murwa mukuru Dar Es Salaam afise ingorane zijanye n’irondoka  mu myaka yiwe ya mbere y’ubuyabaga, ubwoba bwo gutungwa agatoki kubera fibromes bwatumye kuba Magdalena ashobora kuba afise iyo ngorane babimunyegeza. “Nibaza ko ata gice canje na kimwe kizokwigera kibabarira uwo muco wo gukora ivyo”, niko uwo mugore w’imyaka 32 yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ari i muhira iwe hashasha muri Adelaide, muri Australia. TURAGABISHIJE:  Iyi nkuru irimwo ifoto yerekana uko vyakabaye ibivyimba (fibromes) vyavanywe muri Magdalena Moshi. Magdalena yanyarukanywe kwa muganga muri Nyakanga/Nzeri (9) mu 2021 inyuma yo kwumva ububabare bw’umurengera mu ntantu igihe yari mu nzu yo kwinonora imitsi (gym). “Nibuka ikintu ca mbere numvise nikanguye n’uko umuganga asinziriza yariko aravuga  ngo ‘Kirya kivyimba cari kinini – cari cashitse mu mbavu!”’ nk’uko vyibukwa n’umugore ariko araca urupauro rw’umutsindo rwa PhD mu vyigwa vy’amagara. Nk’uko yahavuye abimenya ubwiwe, fibromes ni ibivyimba bitarimwo cancer biza mu gitereko canke iruhande yaco kandi kenshi bikaza mu myaka umukobwa aba ashobora kurondoka (ashobora kuvyara). Iyo ngorane ishikira abagore b’abanya-Afrika  kurusha abandi bose, umuganga wa Magdalena akaba yamubwiye ko amamuko yiwe y’ubunya-Afrika yatumye “ibivyimba vyiwe vyinshi vya fibromes vyagiye kumenyekana bitevye’. Muganga Tran Nguyen yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati :’’Abagore b’abamamuko ya Afrika bafise ivyago bingana incuro zibiri gushika kuri zitatu zo kugira fibromes kurusha bagenzi babo b’abazungukazi”. Amaze kuva mu bitaro, Moshi yaronse terefone ya se wiwe Alex, muri Tanzania, amuhishurira ko fibromes ari ingorane iri mu muryango hanyuma amubwira arira ko yicuza kuba yarabimuhishije. Aca yongerako ati: “Kwumva ko igituma umuryango wa data utavuga ico kibazo ari ukubera  fibromes zijanye no gutera kutavyara, gutuma inda zikoroka no kuvyara abana bapfuye - no kwumva ko bene ivyo bintu vyari kumbuza amahirwe yo gushobora kuronka umugabo. “Intumbero ni ukubinuma, bakurungike kurongorwa hanyuma ico kibazo uzomenye ingene ucifatanwo mu nyuma.” Ubu Moshi ariko aragirirwa ubuhinga bw’uko imbuto z’umugabo n’izo umugore zihurizwa hanze (In Vitro Fertilization, IVF), hanyuma zigaca zijanwa mu gitereko mu gihe be n’umuhungu bakundana bariko baragerageza kuronka umwana. Moshi yabaye umunya-Tanzania wa mbere akiri muto yaronse umudari wa Olympic igihe yawutsindira mu nkino za Beijing 2008  ku myaka 16. Yarahiganywe kandi mu nkino za 2012 na 2016 ariko ntiyigeze arenga intambwe ya mbere kuko uretse ko yarwana n’abakeba, yarwana kandi  n’ububabare bwo mu mugongo butahera. Avuga ati: “Mu nyuma niho nagiye kumenya ko kimwe mu bimenyetso bikomeye vya fibromes ari ukubabara umugongo.” “Ingene vyanyononeye umwuga wo kwoga, numva  mu mutwe `ntashaka no gusubira kuvyiyumvira kuko vyombabaza cane”. Igihe yariko arakira aho bamukoze, Magdalena – n’ubu acitaba amahiganwa yo kwoga – yarahamagaye se kuri video kugira bavugane ico kibazo. Mu gihe yari yarengewe n‘ivyashitse, yashaka kumenya igihe se yari amaze azi ko fibromes ari ingorane iri mu  muryango, igituma yakomeje kubimuhisha kandi Magdalena yaguma yerekana ibimenyetso  mu myaka ya mbere y’ubuyabaga hamwe n’ivyigwa umuryango ushobora kuvanamwo. BBC Sport Africa yemerewe gukurikira  ico kiyago.  Vyashotse bigaragara ko Alex yari amaze imyaka myinshi azi ko abantu ba hafi mu muryango bari barivuje ama fibromes, harimwo babiri babanje kubagwa nk’uko vyagendeye Magdalena. "Urumva ikibazo nari nsanzwe ndakizi, kandi nzi ko cama kijana no kuvyara. Mu nyuma narabuze abandi bavyara, mu nyuma ndamenya ko na mama yari afise ingorane nk’izo.” Abajijwe igituma ibibazo vya Magdalena bijanye n’irondoka mu gihe c’ubuyabaga no kwama ariko araja kwa muganga itabaye imvo ikwiye kugira bahishure ikibazo, Alex yishuye ati: “Hari ibintu bitavugwa hagati y’umukobwa na se.” “Mu mico yacu, ku bijanye no kurongorwa, abantu akenshi bagerageza guhisha aho bafise ingorane. Mu mibereho yacu, vyamye bimeze nk’ikibazo co kwigwanako – bisigura ko wama ugerageza kurondera uwo mwubakana akomeye neza cane bishoboka.” “Kubera izo mvo, vyinshi muri ivyo bintu mu mico yacu vyarahishwa. "Ku binyerekeye, nabaye nka ya nyoni bita autruche  - iyo autruche  ifise ingorane, inyegeza umutwe, ikibaza ko umutumba wayo wose ata ngorane uja kugira. Nibaza ko natwe bizotungendera neza. Ntivyigeze biba uko.”  Ivyashitse vyatumye Alex asubira kwibaza ico yokora kuri uwo muco wo guhakana no kuguma mu gacerere muri Tanzania. Ubu ibitahora bivugwa arabivuga akaba yarabwiye abakobwa n’abagore bose bakiri bato mu muryango wiwe kugenda kwipimisha barabe ko ata vyago bafise vyo kugira fibromes canke izindi ngorane zijanye n’irondoka. Ubwo butumwa yaranabushikanye  mu muryango iyo  avuka, ku mucamo w’umusozi Kilimanjaro mu buraruko bwa Tanzania. Igihe bariko barayaga, Alex yabwiye Magalena ati iyo apfa yari kuba ibaye ingaruka ya mbere mbi – ariko ko kudashora kuronka abana vyari kuba “akaga”. Mu nyuma Mgadalena aramubaza ati: “None wamerewe gute wumvise ko ubwa mbere , fibromes zagarutse hanyuma ubwa kabiri, ko bariko barankorera IVF  kubera ivyo?” “Amajambo yaramperanye.” Magdakena we ntiyamuheranye, kandi avuga ko azobandanya guharanira ko haba ibiyago ku magara ajanye no kurondoka muri Afrika. Inyuma y’ingorane ziwe, yararondeye adatevye abo mu muryango bashobora kuba bafise ingorane nk’izo, kandi nabo batubahuka kuzivuga. Yasiguye ati: “Narahamagaye  bavyaranje bose ndababira ko mfise ico kibazo kandi ndabumvisha ko bategerezwa kwipimisha.” “Ubutumwa bwanje ku bakobwa n’abagore bakiri bato muri Afrika y’Ubuseruko na Afrika yose  ni ubu: niba ufise ingorane z’amagara afatiye kw’irondoka, ntibituma ubugore bwawe bugabanuka, rero bivuge hanyuma urondere ubufasha.” Aho ashoboreye kuzibira ivyago vyari gushikira abo mu muryango wiwe batari bafise amahirwe nk’ayiwe, Magdalena ubu ariko atera iyindi ntambwe, yizigiye ko gutuma abantu bamenya ivyerekeye fibromes muri Tanzania no mu bindi bihugu bishobora gufasha abandi mu kuvanaho ivyo gutinya gutungwa agatoki. Gutinya gutungwa agatoki vyatumye yoga ukuboko kumwe gufashe mu mongongo, mu nkino no mu buzima. “Vyashize  amagara yanje ku gihe kirekire, ubuzima bwanje  n’ubushobozi bwanje bwo kuronka abana mu ngorane zikomeye”.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru i Bulaya: Kante, Mane, Pogba, Lewandowski, Dembele, Calvert-Lewin
text: Umumenyereza mushasha yitezwe muri Manchester United  Erik ten Hag ariko ararondera umufaransa akina hagati muri  Chelsea N'Golo Kante w'imyaka 31, mu giha ariko arondera kunagura uyu murwi wa Old Trafford. (Mirror) Umusatirizi wa Liverpool, umunya Senegal  Sadio Mane w'imyaka 30 agiye kuronderwa na Bayern Munich mu gihe umusatirizi wayo, umunya Pologne Robert Lewandowski yova muri uyu murwi mu ci riza. (Bild - in German) Lewandowski w'imyaka 33 yemeye kuja gukinira Barcelona mu masezerano y'imyaka itatu. (Times - subscription required) Lewandowski ashobora kunyuranwa n'umusatirizi wa Barcelona umufaransa  Ousmane Dembele w'imyaka  24 ari ku rutonde rw'abakinyi baronderwa na Bayern Munich. (Sky Sports) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona umunya Hollande Frenkie de Jong w'imyaka  25 ariteguye guheba imiriyoni hafi zitandatu z'amapawundi (amafaranga y'abongereza) ni ukuvuga arenga imiriyoni 7,3 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika, kugira ngo ashobore kuja gukinira Manchester City. (Sun) Juventus iriteguye kugarukana muri uyo murwi umukinyi wo hagati wa  Manchester United umufaransa Paul Pogba w'imyaka 29  muri rino ci. Uyu mufaransa afise amasezerano azorangira mu mpera z'uno maka w'inkino.  (Goal) Newcastle iramaze kugiriranira ibiganiro vy'intangamarara n'umusatirizi wa Everton umwongereza Dominic Calvert-Lewin w'imyaka 25 ariko wewe yishakira kuja muri Arsenal. (Football Insider) Arsenal yemeye kuriha gushika ku miriyoni  25 z'ama euro ku mukinyi w'inyuma wa Bologna, umunya Ecosse Aaron Hickey. (Calciomercato - in Italian) Aba ba Gunners kandi bari hafi yo gushika ku masezerano y'imiriyoni 3.5 y'ama euro kugira baronke umusatirizi wa Sao Paulo umunya Brezili Marquinhos  w'imyaka 19. (ESPN) Ni mugihe kandi Arsenal iriko irategura amafaranga yo kugura umusatirizi wa Manchester City umunya Brezili Gabriel Jesus w'imyaka 25. City imushakako imiriyoni hagati ya 50 na 60 y'ama euro. (Fabrizio Romano) Manchester City izokenera kugura abandi bakinyi inyuma y'umusatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund  umunya Norvège Erling Haaland w'imyaka 21 yitezwe vuba, ikazokenera cane cane umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu be n'uwo hagati ku ruhande rw'inyuma. (Mail) Mu 2016, Everton yaratakaje akaryo ko kugura Haaland ku miriyoni 60.000 y'ama pawundi kubera bibaza ko ashobora "gutakaza inguvu" yari afise uko yari kugenda akura.  (Times - subscription required) West Ham, Southampton na Brentford iripfuza umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'i buryo wa Fenerbahce umunya Nigeria Bright Osayi-Samuel w'imyaka 24. (Football Insider) Aston Villa yahambije Crystal Palace na Brentford mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Rangers wahoze umenyerezwa na Steven Gerrard, umunya Nigeria Joe Aribo w'imyaka 25.  (Sun) Umumenyereza wa Real Madrid  Carlo Ancelotti yemeje ko umukinyi wo hagati umubirigi Eden Hazard w'imyaka 31 azoguma muri uyu murwi muri rino ci. (Goal)

headline: Covid -Omicron: Abagwayi biyongereye incuro zibiri muri South Africa mu masaha 24
text: Abajejwe amagara y'abantu bavuze ko ubwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus, Omicron ubu  aribwo bwiganje cane  muri Afrika y'epfo kandi ko bwongereje igitigiri c'abariko barandura bashasha. Abagwayi bashasha ba Covid bashika 8500  ni bo bamaze kumenyekana  mu biharuro vya buri munsi vyo muri iyi misi ya vuba. Ivyo biharuro ni nk'incuro zibiri igitigiri  ca 4300 bari bemejwe ko bandukiwe n'iyo ngwara ejo hahise. Ubu Omicron imaze gutorwa mu bihugu 24 hirya no hino kw'isi nk'uko bishikirizwa n'ishami rya Onu rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi WHO/OMS. Afrika y'epfo ni co gihugu ca mbere catanguye gutora ubwo bwoko bushasha buhindagurika cane. Ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe ingwara zandukira (NICD) kivuga ko urugero rurenga  70% vy'ibipimo vyose vyakozwe mu kwezi guheze vyatowemwo ubwo bwoko bushasha. Ubuhinde, Ghana, Saudi Arabia na Reta Zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu ni bimwe mu bihugu biherutse kwemeza vyabonetsemwo Omicron. Ibindi harimo Ubwongereza, Reta Zunze Ubumbwe za Amerika n'Ubudagi vyarabonetsemwo  abantu banduye ubwo bwoko bushasha bwa corona. Haracari ibibazo vyinshi kuri Omicron bitararonka inyishu, harimwo kumenya icerekeye ubushobozi incanco z'ubu zifise bwo gukinga uwo mugera. WHO yabwise "ubwoko bwa corona buteye umutima uhagaze" inavuga ko ibiherutse kugaragara vyerekana ko ugusubira kwandura iyo ngwara bishoboka ku rugero rwo hejuru. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, ibihugu vyo hirya no hino kw'isi vyarahagaritse ingendo z'indege ziva muri Afrika y'Epfo  igihe hamenyekana ko buriko burakwiragira. Ibi  vyatumye umushikiranganji wa Afrika y'Epfo ajejwe imigenderanire yidoga ko bahanywe - hagukomerwa amashi - kuba batoye ubwo bwoko bwa Omicron. Umukuru w'igihugu ca Afrika y'Epfo Cyril Ramaphosa nawe yavuze ko "ababajwe cane"  n'ihagarikwa ry'ingendo, yavuze  ko ata shingiro rifise. Umukuru wa WHO Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus yaragabishije ko izo ngingo ku kiza Covid zihana Afrika y'ubumanuko. Urugero rw'abandura  ubwo bwoko bushasha rwitezwe kuduga mu gifatwa ubu nk'intango y'umupfunda ugira kane muri Afrika y'Epfo, igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu muri ico gihugu kikavuga n'igitigiri c'abinjira ibitaro kimaze kwiyongera gato. Umunyamakuru wa BBC mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu Nick Triggle avuga ko ico ivyo bisigura ku zindi mpande z'isi zisigaye kitagaragara, narirya Afrika  y'Epfo yigeze kugira ikindi gitigiri kinini c'abagwayi b'ubundi bwoko bwa corona - Beta - butigeze butera ingorane zikomeye mu bindi bice vy'isi. Kubera ubwo bwoko bwa Beta na Delta, ishusho nyayo y'ingene ibintu vyifashe muri Afrika y'Epfo ntiizogaragara gushika "abantu bagware cane bakenere kuja mu bitaro" , ivyo navyo bikaba bishobora gufata "indwi zitatu, zine.." nk'uko bivugwa na Prof Salim Abdool Karim wo mu mugwi ujejwe kurwanya Coronavirus. Yabwiye ikiganiro ca BBC Newsday ati: "Inyishu turonka iva ku rubuga n'uko bidakabije cane - nta kintu giteye ubwoba gitandukanye n'ivyo tubona canke n'ivyo tumenyereye kubona." Benshi mu bagiye mu bitaro muri Afrika y'Epfo ntibari baricandagishije coronovirus nk'uko bivugwa n'igisata ca NICD. Nta bukene bw'incanco buri mu gihugu, kandi prezida Ramaphosa yahamagariye abantu bose kwicandagisha, avuga ko ari bwo buryo bwonyene busigaye bwo kugwanya uwo mugera. Abanya-Afrika y'Epfo bashika ku bice 24% ni bo bamaze guterwa incanco zose - baruta kure abarenga i 6% bamaze kubikora ku mugabane wa Afrika wose mu kwezi kwa cumi, ariko bakaba bari hasi cane y'ibiharuro vya vuba vyo ku mugabane wa Buraya aho abamaze gukingirwa bishika ku 54%.

headline: Umushikiranganji w’ikigega wa Afrika y’Epfo asaba ko urucuruza rw’urumogi rwemerwa n’amategeko
text: Umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca leta ya Afrika y'Epfo,  Tito Mboweni, asaba leta y'ico gihugu ko urucuruza rw'urumogi rwemerwa n'amategeko kugira ngo amakori yiyongere. Yatangaje ivyo aciye ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter, aho yamenyesheje ko ico kibazo azogishikiriza mu nama y'abashikiranganji. Kuri urwo rubuga rwiwe, yashizeko n'isanamu yerekana ingene ico giterwa gitera gikura. Amategeko ya Afrika y'Epfo yari asanzwe avuga ko ukugurisha urumogi, uko rwoba rungana kwose biteye kubiri n'amategeko. Hagati aho, mu mwaka wa 2017, ico gihugu caremereye abantu gukoresha urumogi mu mihana iwabo, ariko nticarekuye kururima canke kurugurisha. Mu bihugu vyinshi vya Afrika, harimwo n'u Burundi n'u Rwanda, kurima, gukoresha canke kudandaza urumogi ntivyemewe n'amategeko kubera rufatwa nk'ikiyayuramutwe. Hagati aho, hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe birukoresha ku rugero runini. Muri ivyo harimwo igihugu ca Lesotho gisanzwe gikikujwe na Afrika y'Epfo, aho urumogi rurimwa ku rugero runini cane, rukaba rwemewe mu vyo ubuvuzi gusa. Mu myaka ya 2000, amakuru yavuga ko ibice 70% vy'urumogi rwagurishwa muri Afrika y'Epfo rwava muri ico gihugu ca Lesotho. Abarimyi bo mu gihugu ca Lesotho basanzwe barima urumogi mu ntumbero yo kurukoresha mu mihana iwabo, hamwe no kurugurisha hanze kubera ubukene basanzwe babamwo. Usanga abanyagihugu bato bato barima urumogi bakarurimana n'ibindi biterwa nk'ibigori kugira ngo barushore muri Afrika y'Epfo. Igihugu ca Zimbabwe naco nyene giherutse kwemera ko urumogi rushobora kurimwa rukimburwa muri ico gihugu, ni inyuma y'aho cemereye ikoreshwa ryarwo muvyo ubuvuzi n'ubushakashatsi mu 2018. Zambia yoyo iherutse gutangaza ko ubu vyemewe n'amategeko gutunganya urumogi no kururungika mu mahanga ku mpamvu z'urudandaza n'ubuvuzi. Leya y'ico gihugu yafashe ico cemezo mu nama yayo yabaye ku wa 04 z'ukwa 12 kw'umwaka uheze nk'uko vyatangajwe na Dora Siliya avugira leta. Ikindi gihugu gikoresha urumogi ku rugero runini cane ni Korea y'Uburaruko, aho mbere n'amashirahamwe ya reta aja kurugurisha mu bindi bihugu kugira baronke amahera y'agaciro. Abashakashatsi bavuga ko bitazwi neza ko hoba hariho amategeko abuza ikoreshwa ry'urumogi, kandi ico gihugu ntikibona ko ikoreshwa ry'urumogi ari ukurenga ku mategeko.

headline: Nigeria: Umupasitori atangisha 700$ kugira yereke abantu 'irembo ribashikana mw’ijuru’
text: Umuvugabutumwa muri Nigeria ari mu yabira inyuma yo kubwira abantu ko azi irembo ribashikana mw'ijuru riri mu bumanuko bushira uburengero bw'ico gihugu, ariko ko kugira aribereke bategerezwa gutanga amafaranga. Pasitori Ade Abraham yarezwe mu gipolisi n'umwe mu banywanyi biwe avuga ko uyo mu pasitori yamutangishije 310.000 y'amanaira (amafaranga yo muri Nigeria), angana n'amadorari y'abanyamerika 750, kugira ngo bashobore kubona iryo rembo avuga ko riri mu gisagara ca Araromi-Ugbeshi, mu ntara ya Ekiti. Uyu muvugabutumwa yemereye BBC ko koko yabwiye abantu ivy'iryo rembo, akavuga ko ari "Imana akorera" yarimweretse mu ntumbero yo kuraba aho abanyashengero biwe bageza mu kwemera kwabo, ariko akavuga ko ata muntu n'umwe aramuha amafaranga. Ishirahamwe ry'Abakristu muri Nigeria ryasohoye itangazo ryikurako uyo mupasitori Ade Abraham, igipolisi co mu ntara ya Ekiti naco kikaba cegeranije inzandiko z'abanywanyi b'ishengero ryiwe, kikaba catanguye amatohoza. Ishengero rya Pasitori Ade Abraham ryahora rifise icicaro mu ntara ya Kogi, mu nyuma ryimukira mu ntara ya Kaduna, imbere y'uko ryimukira amaja mu bumanuko n'abanywanyi baryo, mw'ikambi yubatse mu ntara ya Ekiti. Uyu munyashengero yamureze ku gipolisi yaciye yisubirira muhira iwe i Kaduna kuva ico gihe, ariko umugore wiwe yaranse kumukurikira, akavuga ko "igihe c'umunezero" cari kigiye gushika vuba. Ariko uyu mugabo n'umugore badashaka ko amazina yabo amenyekana babwiye BBC ko babandanya bavugana kuri terefone umusi ku musi. Pasitori Ade, azwi kandi kw'izina rya Noah Abraham (Nowa Aburahamu), aherutse kwerekanwa mw'ireresi yazungurutse cane, aho yariko asaba abasenga Imana gutera akamo incuti zabo ziri mu mahanga gutanga intererano y'amafaranga mu rusengero rwiwe.

headline: Amasasu ku murwa mukuru wa Somalia mu myiyerekano y'amatora
text: Amasasu menshi yasiranye ku murwa mukuru wa Somalia mu gihe  indongozi z'abatavuga rumwe na reta barenze ku ngingo ibuza amakoraniro y'abantu benshi mu kugira imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza ugucereza amatora. Ikiringo c'umukuru w'igihugu caheze ku ndwi iheze ariko hadatowe uwumusubirira bituma Sonalia ija mu mayirabiri ya politike. Mw'ijoro, reta yavuze ko abantu bitwaje ibigwnisho bateye ibirindiro vy'ingabo za reta i Mogadisho hafi y'ikirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu. Menshi mu mabarabara yo muri ico gisagara yugawe, ingabo zidasanzwe nazo ziragomorwa. Prezida Mohamed Abdullahi Mohamed, azwi kandi nka "Farmajo", yitezwe kugira  inama n'abakuru b'intara zitanu zigize Somalia mu ntumbero yo kugerageza kurangiza izo ngorane. Indege ziva mu bindi bihugu zigana ikibuga gikuru c'indege ca Mogadishu zahagaritswe kujayo kubera amasasu na vya muzinga vyasirana mu micungararo y'ico kibuga, nk'uko bivugwa n'umunyamakuru wa BBC Bella Hassan ari muri ico gisagara. Imyiyerekano y'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi yariko irabera kw'ibarabara rikuru ry'ikibuga c'indege igihe ayo masasu yaduka. Amakuru avuga ko abajejwe umutekano barashe mu kirere kugira bashwiragize abari mu myiyerekano. Umwe mu bari mu myiyerekano Farah Omar yabwiye Reuters kuri telephone ati: "Ingabo nyinshi zaduteye, ubu nubitse inda mu kayira." Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU ryavuze ko rihagaritswe umutima cane n'imishamirano hagati y'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi n'inzego zijejwe umutekano mw'ijoro ryakeye no ku wa gatanu mu gitobndo. Ryasavye ko haba "'ituze n'ukwifata ku mpanse zose" n'uko "amayira yo kuvugana aguma yuguruye kugira icuka kibi kigabanuke".

headline: Abantu 148 bapfunzwe mu migumuko yadutse nijoro PSG itsinzwe na Bayern
text: Igipolisi c'u Bufaransa kimenyesha ko cataye muri yompi abantu 148 inyuma y'imigumuko yadutse ku mugwa mukuru iturutse ku gutsindwa kwa Paris St-Germain mu rukino rwa nijoro. Nijoro ku wa Mungu, uyu murwi wo mu Bufaransa PSG watsinzwe igitsindo kimwe ku busa n'umurwi Bayern Munich wo mu Budagi mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi ybaye iya mbere i Bulaya (Champions League). Iyo mishamirano yadutse kw'ibarabara Champs-Élysées no mu micungararo yikibuga c'umupira ca PSG, Parc des Princes, ahari hakoraniye abafana b'uyu murwi baraba uru rukino kuri televiziyo nini. Muri iyo migumuko, amamodoka yaraturiwe amadirisha y'amaduka nayo aramenagurwa nk'uko bivugwa n'igipolisi. PSG yariko irondera gutsindira iryo higanwa ubwa mbere mu mateka yayo, ariko ntivyayikundiye. Muri urwo rukino, Kingsley Coman yahoze akinira uyu murwi nyene wa PSG niwe yawuhumiye ku munota wa 59 muri urwo rukino rutari rworoshe, mu kwinjiza igitsindo n'umutwe ku mupira yari ahawe na Joshua Kimmich. Mu gihe amaso yose yari ku bakinyi b'ibihangange babiri ba PSG, Neymar na Kylian Mbappe, umunyegori wa Bayern Manuel Neuer yarababereye ifuro ry'igiti mu guhagarika imipira yari igoye yaboneka ko yashobora kuvamwo ibitsindo.

headline: Amafoto ya Africa hagati ya 28 z'ukwa mbere na 3 z'ukwa kabiri mu 2022
text: Aya masanamu akeneye urusha mu gukoreshwa

headline: Gerard Houllier yahoze amenyereza Liverpool yapfuye afise imyaka 73
text: Gerard Houllier yahoze ari umumenyereza wa Liverpool yapfuye afise imyaka 73. Uwo mumenyereza w'Umufaransa yamenyereje uwo mugwi hagati y'imyaka ya 1998-2004, aho yatwaye ibikombe 5, harimwo ic'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza (FA Cup), ic'imigwi yagize umwuga umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza hamwe n'ic'imigwi yabaye iya mbere ku mugabane wa Buraya, UEFA mu 2000-01. Imbere yo kuza muri Liverpool, Houllier yaramenyereje Lens, Paris St-Germain hamwe n'umugwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubufaransa, hanyuma avuye muri Liverpool, yaratwaye ibikombe bibiri mw'ihiganwa ryo mu Bufaransa amenyereza umugwi wa Lyon. Yarangirije akazi kiwe k'umumenyereza mu mugwi wa Aston Villa, aho yakuye meza inyuma y'amezi icenda gusa mu 2011, kubera ingorane z'umutima. Mw'itangazo, Liverpool yavuze ko "ibabajwe cane" n'urupfu rwa Houllier. Uwo mugwi wagize uti: "Turagandariye Gerard Houllier yadushikanye ku ntsinzi zitatu mu mwaka umwe." "Umuntu wese ari mu mugwi wa Liverpool yifatanije n'umuryango wa Gerard hamwe n'abagenzi benshi." Aston Villa yagize iti: "Twese muri Aston Villa turababajwe n'inkuru z'urupfu rwa Gerard Houllier, yamenyereje uyu mugwi mu mwaka wa 2010/2011. "Twifatanije n'abakunzi ba Gerard muri ibi bihe bitoroshe." Houllier yatanguye kumenyekana cane ari mu mugwi wa Lens na Paris St-Germain mu myaka ya 1980, imbere yo kugenwa kumenyereza umugwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubufaransa mu 1992. Ariko inyuma y'aho Ubufaransa bunaniriwe kuja mu gikombe c'isi mu 1994 - aho Houllier yataye ishavu ku mukinyi wo ku ruhande David Ginola avuga ko  amakosa yakoze ari yo yatumye batsindwa - yaciye atanga imihoho. Mu 1998, yahavuye yimukira mu Bwongereza aho yaciye amenyereza umugwi wa Liverpool ari kumwe na Roy Evans. Evans yaciye atanga imihoho inyuma y'amezi atatu, Houllier aca aramutswa uwo mugwi, arawubaka, anawufasha gutwara ibikombe bitatu mu 2000-01.

headline: Hassan Sheikh Mohamud: Prezida mushasha wa Somalia ni nde?
text: Prezida mushasha wa Somalia, Hassan Sheikh Mohamud, si mushasha muri ayo mabanga. Yabaye umukuru wa Somalia agira uwa munani kuva mu 2012 gushika mu 2017 aca atsindwa amatora yo mu 2017 n'uwahora ari umukuru w'igihugu Mohamed Abdullahi "Farmajo". Yongeye kwandika amateka ku wa mungu mu gutorwa irigira kabiri mw'ihiganwa rya mbere rikomeye cane muri kahise k'ico gihugu, amatora yashitse ku ncuro ya gatatu. Ukwiyamamaza kw'uwo yahoze aharanira kugarukana amahoro kwari gushingiye ku gusubiza abanya -Somalia hamwe  no kubana mu mahoro n'amakungu - ikintu atibagiwe kugarukako buno nyene agiheza kurahirira amabanga ku wa mbere mu gitondo. Yavuze ati: "Ndabemereye ko tuzokorana cane n'ibihugu bibanyi hamwe n'abo dusanzwe dufashanya mu makungu." Mw'ijwi yumvikana nk'umuntu ashaka gusubiza hamwe kandi yemerera abanya-Somalia ko azokorera bose. Amaherezo yatahukanye ubwiganze bw'amajwi menshi muri ayo matora yabaye mu ncuro zitatu, aho yaronse amajwi 214,  uwo bahiganwa Farmajo akaronka 110, gutyo aca yihora uwari yamurushije mu 2017. Mohamud yari amaze imyaka ibiri iheze  ahanini aba i Mogadishu, aguma yamamaza ko amatora yoba ku gihe kandi nk'uko vyemewe. Yari umwe  mu runani rw'aba-kandida batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bari bateye kubiri n'ingendo ya prezida Farmajo yo kurondera kwongera imyaka ibiri ku kiringo ciwe. Mu kwezi kwa kabiri mu 2021, abajejwe umutekano barateye ihoteri yabamwo i Mogadishu kugira bahagarike imyiyerekano abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bashaka kugira ku murwa mukuru. Ari mu bategetsi bake bagumye muri Somalia mu myaka 30 ico gihugu kimaze mu ntambara yo mu gihugu hagati. Uwo agiye kuba umukuru wa Somalia atoranye igihugu gihanzwe na vyinshi, harimwo n'uruzuba rukaze cane ONU ivuga ko rushobora gutera inzara hamwe atacokorwa. Abantu bashika miriyoni 3.5 bakeneye imfashanyo y'ivyo kurya yihuta kandi barashobora kwicwa n'inzara. Azotegerezwa guhangana kandi n'ubuzima buguma buzimba hamwe n'ibiciro biguma vyiyongera vyaje gusongwa  n'ingwano yo muri Ukraine. Urundi rugamba rumurindiriye n'ingene  intara  zikomeza kutiyumva mu butegetsi mpuzantara, ico kibazo kikaba cagumye mu vyari bihanze ubutegetsi bwahahora. Ni ikibazo asanzwe ashobora gutorera inyishu mu gihe zimwe muri izo ntara ari we yazishinze igihe yatwara ikiringo ca mbere. Abasesenguzi bavuga ko azotegerezwa gusanura imigenderanire n'ibihugu nka Kenya, Djibouti na Reta Zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu (UAE). Ubutetegetsi bwahahora bwarahagaritse imigenderanire na Kenya  ku ncuro zitandukanye  kandi baragiraniye amatati afatiye ku rubibe rwo mu mazi. Mu 2012, yatumye Somalia yongera kugira imigenderanire inyuma y'ama reta y'imfatakibanza, aca asubira kwunga imigenderanire n'ibihugu vya Buraya hamwe n'ivyo muri Afrika. Ariko yaraneguwe cane mu kunanirwa gutorera inyishu ibiturire vyavugwa mu butegetsi bwiwe. Uwo mugabo yavukiye muri Hiran yo hagati mu 1955. Yakuriye mu kibano cifashe muri Mogadishu aca atsinda amashure kuri kaminuza y'igihugu ya Somalia mu gisata c'ubuhinga mu 1981. Abo bakuranye bavuga ko yari umuntu avuga make kandi yicisha bugufi aca aba umwigisha imbere y'uko aja kubandanya amashure kuri kaminuza ya Bhopal mu Buhindi. Agarutse yaciye aja mu bushikiranganji bw'indero aho yashinzwe umugambi w'inderabigisha ku buryo bwa ONU. Igihe reta mpuzantara yatembagara mu 1991, yaciye aja gukora muri Unicef  ajejwe gukurikirana inyigisho, agendera intara zo hagati n'ubumanuko bwa Somalia, ingendo zamufashije kubona "ingene igisata y'amashure cariko kiratabagara." Inyuma y'imyaka itatu yaciye ashinga rimwe mu mashure ya mbere y'intango i Mogadishu kuva intambara yaduka. Afitaniye isano na al-Islah, ishami rya Somalia rya Muslim Brotherhood, ryafashije cane  mu gusubira kuvyura ibijanye n'amashure muri ico gihe c'intambara. Barubutse amashure menshi ashingiye kuri Islam nk'ayo usanga muri Sudan na Misiri ariko akaba ateye kubiri  cane n'umugwi wa jihad al-Shabab  ubu ushamikiye kuri al-Qaeda. Umugabo avugwa kuba umu-Islamist  yoroheje mu gihugu ciganjemwo aba-Islam hafi cose,  Mohamud avugwa kandi ko yigeze kuba afise imigenderanire na Union of Islamist Courts  (UIC),  urufatane rw'ama sentare  mu ntango rwashinzwe n'abagwizatunga kugirango barabe ko bazana amategeko muri ico gihugu kitarangwamwo amategeko inyuma y'imyaka myinshi y'ingwano. UIC zarazanye agahengwe k'amahoro mu gihugu mu 2016, imbere y'uko Ethiopia itera ikazisambura - itewe ubwoba n'uko al-Shabab yariko irazigarurira buke buke. Abamuyoboka bavuga ko mu nyuma yashigikiye igikorwa cose coza kigarukama amahoro n'amaragano. Mu myaka ya 1990, Mohamud yaragize uruhara rukomeye mu mashirahamwe adaharanira inyungu za poritike, kandi abantu bamuzi bavuga ko yafashije cane mu gutatura amatati yo mu miryango (clans). Ica mbere yashitseko gikomeye muri iyo nzira kwabaye ukwitaba ibiganiro vyo mu 1997 vyavanyeho icari kizwi nka "Green Line", umurongo wagaburamwo Mogadishu kabiri hagati y'abakuru b'imiryango. Uwo murongo wavugwa na bamwe mu myaka ya 1990 nka "cancer ya  Mogadishu "  watuma ubuzima bugorana cane ku baba muri ico gisagara co kimwe no ku banya-poritike. Mu 2001, yagiye gukora mu kigo c'ubushashakatsi n'ibiganiro (Centre for Research and Dialogue)  nk'umushakashatsi mu gusanura ibihugu bivuye mu ntambara - ikigo  gikunze kunegurwa ko cegamiye cane ibihugu vya Buraya - yaranakoze cane nk'umuhinga w'inzego zitandukanye za ONU mu gihe ca reta mfatakibanza. Ivyo bikorwa nta nkeka ko bizomufasha mu gihe azoba ariko aragerageza kuvana Somalia mu myaka 30 y'ingwano y'urutavanako.

headline: Ubwa mbere mu mateka ya Katolika, Papa yagenye umugore muri sinodi y'abepiskopi
text: Ubwa mbere mu mateka ya Ekleziya, Papa yagenye umugore nk'icegera c'umunyamabanga w'inama nkuru y'Abeposkopi. Umubikira Nathalie Becquart, ava mu Bufaransa, azoba afise uburenganzira bwo gutora muri iyo nama, isanzwe ihanura Papa kandi ikaganira ku bibazo bimwe bimwe nkoramutima muri Ekleziya Katolika. Umubikira Becquart yari asanzwe akorana n'iyi sinodi y'Abepiskopi (inama nkuru y'abasenyeri yiga ibibazo nkoramutima vya Ekleziya Katolika) kuva mu 2019 nk'umujenama. Umunyamabanga mukuru w'iyi nama nkuru, Kardinali Mario Grech avuga ko iri genwa ryerekana ko "umuryango wuguruye". Avuga ko iyi ngingo yerekana ko Papa yipfuza ko "abagore bagira uruhara runini mu gufata ingingo muri Ekleziya". Umunyamakuru wa BBC John McManus avuga ko iyi ngingo iterekana ko abagore bashobora kwatirwa mw'ibanga ry'ubusaserdoti, n'aho bamwe mu badashima iyi ngingo babona ko ari yo ibintu bitera bija. Luis Marín de San Martín, umupatiri wo muri Esupanye, na we nyene yagenywe kuba icegera c'umunyamabanga w'iyi nama. Muri ino myaka iheze, Sinodi y'Abepiskopi yaraganiriye ku bibazo nkoramutima bijanye n'ukwemera kw'Ekleziya, harimwo ikibazo c'ingene bakwiye gufata Abakatolika bubatse n'abapfakaye. Iyi ngingo ije haciye ikiringo kidashika ukwezi Papa Francis ahinduye itegeko rya Ekleziya kugira ngo yemerere abagore gusangiza no kurangura amabanga ya Arutari, n'aho iri tegeko rishimangira ko ibanga ry'ubusaserdoti ribandanya kuba iry'abagabo gusa. Hagati aho, mu mwaka uheze, Papa yaragenye abagore batandatu mu nama nkuru ijejwe gukurikirana ikigega ca Vaticano.

headline: Coronavirus: Uwa kabiri yanduye muri Senegal, nayo Kenya yahagaritse ingendo z'indege mu Butaliyano
text: Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Senegal amenyesha ko hari uwundi muntu agira kabiri yanduye wa mugera ruhonyabantu coronavirus muri ico gihugu. Uyo murwayi ni umutama w'umufaransa w'imyaka 80 yinjiye muri ico gihugu ku wa 29 z'ukwa kabiri. Ariko aravurirwa mu bitaro bivura indwara zandukira ku mugwa mukuru Dakar, aho uwundi mufaransa nyene yavuriwe uwo mugera mu ndwi iheze. Uyo murwayi yemejwe muri Senegal abaye uwugira 12 yanduye uwo mugera ku mugabane wa Afrika. Ibindi bihugu vyamenyesheje ko abantu bavyo banduye ni Algeria hamaze kuboneka batanu, Misiri abantu babiri, hamwe n'umw'umwe muri Maroc, Nijeriya hamwe na Tuniziya. Senegal ni kimwe mu bihugu 33 biri musi y'ubugaragwa bwa Sahara gifise ubushobozi bwo gupima coronavirus. Abategetsi bayo bamenyesha ko biteguriye guhangana n'uwo mugera. Ku wa mbere w'iyi ndwi, ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, ryabwiye BBC ko ibihugu 12 bisigaye bitararonswa ibikoresho vyo gupima uwo mugera bizobironswa mu kiringo w'indwi zibiri. Mu gihe ibihugu vya Tuniziya na Nijeriya biriko bivura abarwayi binjiye bavuye mu Butaliyano, umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Kenya, Mutahi Kagwe, yatangaje ko ico gihugu cahagaritse vy'agateganyo ingendo z'indege mu bisagara bibiri vyo mu buraruko bw'u Butaliyano. Umushikiranganji Kagwe ati: "Umurwi udasanzwe ujejwe kurwanya coronavirus wafashe ingingo yo guhagarika vy'agateganyo ingendo z'indege mu buraruko bw'u Butaliyano, cane cane mu bisagara vya Verona na Milan kuva ku wa 03/03/2020". "Ako karere k'u Butaliyano gahanganye na coronavirus, ivyo bigashobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku magara y'abanyagihugu ba Kenya". Muri ico gihugu c'u Butaliyano, abantu barenga 2.502 nibo bamaze kwandura uwo mugera, muri bo 79 bakaba bamaze kwitaba Imana, abenshi muri bo bakaba ari abatama. Nico gihugu kibangamiwe na coronavirus gusumba ibindi bihugu ku mugabane wa Bulaya, kigakurikirwa n'u Bufaransa hamwe n'u Budagi. Mu ndwi iheze, Kenya yarahagaritse kandi vy'agateganyo ingendo zo mu Bushinwa.

headline: India: Umukoresha yanebaguwe ku ciyumviro co gukora amasaha 18 ku musi
text: Umukuru w'ikompanyi imwe mu Buhindi yanebaguwe inyuma yo kuvuga ko abakozi bashasha mu kazi akari ko kose bategerezwa gukora amasaha 18 mu myaka yabo ya mbere ine canke itanu bakironka akazi. Shantanu Deshpande, yatanguje kompanyi yo kumwa ya Bombay Shaving Company, asaba abakozi bakiri bato "gukunda akazi" no kutaguma bidoga nk'uko yavyanditse ku mbuga hwaniro. Abantu bashavuye banditse ku mbuga hwaniro bamwagiriza gukokeza "umuco w'akazi k'uburozi". Ubuhindi bufise amategeko genga akazi akaze cane, ariko abaharanira agateka k'abakozi bavuga ko abategetsi bakeneye gushiramwo inguvu nyinshi kugira ashirwe mu ngiro. Mu 2020, umwe mu batanguje ikompanyi ya Infosys yaranebaguwe cane aho yavuga ko abahindi bategerezwa bakora amasaha 64 buri ndwi mu myaka ibiri canke itatu mu ntumbero yo kuzibira igihengeri c'ubutunzi catewe n'iyugaranwa rivuye kuri coronavirus. Urugero rw'icizere c'abakozi rwa LinkedIn mu 2020 ruvuga ko abakozi babigize umwuga babiri  kuri batanu mu Buhindi baramaze kugira ikibazo co kugira umutima uhagaze n'umwitwarariko. Ku rubuga rwa LinkedIn ku musi wa kabiri, Deshpande   yavuze ko "hakiri kare" ku bakiri bato kumenya ingene bokwifata hagati y'akazi n'ubuzima igihe ari ho bagitangura akazi. Umwe mubakoresha urubuga rwa Twitter yavuze ko Deshpande yariko arashigikira "umuco w'akazi k'uburozi" igihe  "vyari vyabaye ibisanzwe ko amakompany menhsi agitangura yirukana abantu benshi." Uwundi wo kuri Twitter nyene yavuze ko Deshpande atigeze avuga ko "yoriha amahera y'agasunuzo" abantu bakoze amasaha menshi. Yagize ati:"Amakompanyi afise intumbero yo kurya imitsi abantu bakora amasaha menshi. Kenshi na kenshi bigatuma baruha kare bakiri bato, bigatuma bashira mu kaga akazi kabo." Kubera inebagurwa ryakwiye hose kubera ivyo yanditse, Deshpande yongeyeko ati:" Urwo rwanko rwose ruvuye ku masaha 18 y'akazi?" Yongeyeko ko abo biyumvira ku muco wo gukora muri kompanyi yiwe bahawe ikaze kubiyaga n'abakozi biwe. Ivyo Deshpande yavuze vyakurikiye igihe ijambo "Hagarika mu mutekano" ryakwiragira ku mbuga hwaniro. Iryo jambo risigura gukora ivyo ujejwe gusa ata kindi urengejeko. Ryatangujwe muri video y'umunyamerika ari ku rubuga rwa TikTok ahanura "akazi si ubuzima bwawe". Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC Perisha Kudhail yanditse ko iryo sekeza rishobora kuba ryatanguriye mu Bushinwa , aho ijambo ubu ryabujijwe gukoreshwa #tangping risigura "ryama urampije" ryakoreshejwe mu kwiyamiriza umuco wo gukoreshwa amasaha menshi.

headline: Kuba wararwaye Covid-19 bishobora gutanga 'amezi y'ubudahangarwa'
text: Benshi mu bantu barwaye Covid-19 baba bakingiwe gusubira kuyandura mu kiringo nibura c'amezi atanu, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'icigwa cakozwe na Public Health England. Kuba warigeze kuyirwara bituma ugira amahirwe ashika kuri 83% yo kudasubira kuyandura, ugereranije n'ababa batarigera bayirwara, nk'uko abahinga babitoye. Ariko baragabisha ko abantu basubira kwandura Covid-19 kandi bakanduza abandi. Abategetsi rero bahimiriza abantu kwubahiriza amategeko yo kuguma mu ngo zabo-baba barigeze canke batigeze bandura uwo mugera. 'Rokora ubuzima' Umwigisha wa kaminuza Susan Hopkins, yari arongoye ico cigwa, avuga ko ivyavuyemwo bitera intege, avuga ko ubudahangarwa bumara igihe kirekire gusumba uko abantu bavyibaza, ariko agashimangira ko kwikingira arico gikomeye gusumba. Avuga ko vyateye umutima uhagaze kubona abasubiye kwandura babasangamwo urugero runini cane rw'uwo mugera, n'iyo boba ata bimenyetso berekana, kandi bakaba bashobora kwanduza abandi. Avuga ati: "Ibi bisigura ko naho woba wibaza ko wamaze kurwara iyo ndwara none ukaba ukingiwe, umenye ko ufise amahirwe menshi yo kudasubira kurwara cane ariko biguma bishoboka ko wandura kandi ukanduza". Ati :"Ubu gusumba na mbere, birakenewe cane ko tuguma i muhira kugira dukingire igisata cacu c'amagara y'abantu twongere turokore ubuzima." Kuva mu kwezi kwa gatandatu gushika mu kwa cumi na rimwe mu 2020, hafi abantu ibihumbi 21.000 bakora kwa muganga mu Bwongereza bwose baragiye barapimwa kugira basuzumwe ko; Mu batasanganywe abasirikare b'umubiri bo kurwanya uwo mugera, bisigura ko atawo bigeze bandura, 318 barawanduye muri ico kiringo nk'uko ibipimo vyavyerekanye. Ariko ku bantu 6.614 bari bafise abasirikare mu mubiri, ico gitigiri cabaye  44 gusa. 'Amahirwe y'igihe kirekire' Abahinga bazokomeza gukurikirana abakozi bo kwa muganga mu kiringo c'amezi 12 kugira barabe igihe ubudahangarwa bushobora kumara. Bazokurikiranira hafi kandi abanduye ubwoko bushasha bwa corona-kuko butari bwakwiragire cane igihe iki cigwa cakorwa-bongere barabe ubudahangarwa bw'abahawe urukingo. Muganga Julian Tang, umuhinga w'imigera kuri  kaminuza ya Leicester, avuga ko ivyo batoye muri iki cigwa bihumuriza abakozi bo kwa muganga. Yongeye ati: "Guhabwa urukingo imyuma yo gukira Covid-19 nta kibazo...kandi bishobra kwongereza ubudahangarwa umuntu asanganywe. "Turabibona no ku rukingo rw'igihe ku bicurane. "Twizigiye ko ibiri muri iki cigwa bizogabanya amakenga ya bagenzanje b'abakozi bo kwa muganga bafise ubwoba bwo kandura Covid-19 ubugira kabiri."

headline: Pierrot Kaluba arongoye ubwoko bw’Abanyindu abwira BBC ibijanye n'intambara z'i Minembwe
text: DR Congo - Kuva ku mu ndwi iheze kugeza kuwa gatatu mu duce dutandukanye tw'Akarere ka Minembwe muri teritwari ya Uvira, Kivu y'Epfo, ni mu buseruko bwa Repubulika y'Intwaro rusangi ya Congo, haravugwa intambara zikomeye hagati y'imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho ishingiye ku moko y'Abanyamulenge, Abanyindu,Abafulero n'abandi. Umviriza ingene Pierrot Kaluba arongoye ubwoko bw’Abanyindu abwira BBC ku bijanye n'izo ntambara.

headline: Icegera ca mbere c'umukuru wa Zanzibar n'umugore wiwe batowe Covid-19
text: Icegera ca mbere c'umukuru wa Zanzibar, Seif Sharif Hamad, be n'umugore wiwe batowe indwara ya  Covid-19. Bamwe mu bo bakorana mu biro nabo nyene baratowe umugera, nk'uko bivugwa n'umugambwe wiwe ACT Wazalendo mw'itangazo. Hamad ari mu bitaro, bikwavugwa ko amagara yiwe aguma atera imbere. Uwo mugambwe utavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi wasavye aba Tanzania gukurikiza ingingo zo kwirinda kwandura no gukiwirakwiza uwo mugera. Iyo nkuru imenyekanye haheze iminsi prezida wa Tanzania John Pombe Magufuli agabishije abajejwe  amagara y'abantu ko batokwihutira kuzana inkingo za Covid-19 badafise ivyemezo,avuga ko zishobora kubangamira amagara y'abantu. Kuva mu kwezi kwa gatandatu, reta ya Tanzania ntihora ibiharuro bijanye na coronavirus kuva umukuru w'ico gihugu atangaje ko kitakirangwamwo uwo mugera. Mu minsi iheze ariko Eklezia Katorika yaragabishije ko hari ibimenyetso ko uwo mugera wasubiye kugwirirana mu gihugu iravye ubwinshi bw'imisa y'abpfuye isigaye isomwa buri munsi

headline: Ibibazo vyanyu kuri Coronavirus: Mbe bashize icuma aho bateye urukingo, kimatako?
text: Muganga Leonard Nduwayo akorera mu Bufaransa abandanya gusubiza ku bibazo vyanyu ku kiza ca Coronavirus. Aha ahera ku kibazo cabajijwe na Ncutikuneza Baransegese Chris abaza ati: None ni vyo koko ushize icuma aho baguteye urucanco gica gifatako?

headline: Euro 2020 - France 1-0 Germany: Benshi barakomeretse mu myiyerekano y'uwakoroka mu mutaka
text: Abantu batari bake bari mu bitaro aho bariko baravurwa inyuma y'aho bakomerekejwe n'umugabo yariko akora imyiyerekano agendera mu mutaka hanyuma akorokera mu kibuga, hari imbere y'urukino hagati y'Ubufaransa n'Ubudagi. Ishirahamwe rijejwe umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya, UEFA, rivuga ko "abajejwe amategeko bazofata ingingo zikenewe" ku vyo ryise igikorwa "c'ugusamara kandi cateye akaga". Imyanda yaguye mu kibuga igihe uwo mutaka wafatwa n'intsinga zifata kamera yo hejuru. Mu kwururuka, uyu mugabo yituye hasi mu kibuga. Yari afise umutaka wanditseko amajambo ngo "Kick out oil Greenpeace", bikaba vyabaye ngombwa ko abaganga babanza kumusuzuma imbere y'uko abajejwe umutekano bamusohora. Ishirahamwe riharanira ibidukikije Greenpeace rivuga ko ari ryo ryatunganije iki gikorwa. Mw'itangazo ryasohoye rikaba risaba imbabazi abo bose bakomeretse, rikavuga ko "habaye ingorane z'ubuhinga", ivyatumye uyu mugabo akorokera mu kibuga atabishaka. Benjamin Stephan wo mw'ishirahamwe Greenpeace avuga ko intumbero yari iyo "guca hejuru" y'ikibuga hanyuma akarekura umupira w'umuco ufise ubutumwa bwo gusaba ihinguriro ry'Ubudagi rikora imodoka Volkswagen "gusiramwo inguvu igakingira ikirere". Iri tangazo ryongerako y'uko "umutekano ari co kintu kiza imbere ya vyose mu bikorwa vya Greepeace" kandi ko rizoshigikira itohoza iryo ari ryo ryose. Stephan ati: "Turasavye imbabazi n'umutima wacu wose ku bantu bakomeretse, turizeye ko bagiye gukira vuba. Turasavye imbabazi kandi abakinyi n'abarorerezi vyateye ubwoba". " Mw'itangazo, UEFA ivuga ko ivyabaye ari "igikorwa kirimwo ugusamara kandi giteje akaga". Abarongoye UEFA bavuga bati: "Iki gikorwa kitabereye - igikorwa cari gushobora kugira ingaruka zikomeye ku bantu benshi bari bahari - cakomerekeje abantu benshi bitabiriye uru rukino ubu bari mu bitaro kandi abajejwe amategeko bazofata ingingo zikenewe". Ubufaransa bwatsinze uru rukino ku gitsindo kimwe cinjijwe na Mats Hummels w'Ubudagi yiyinjije mu gice ca mbere.

headline: Ubufaransa bwemeje amakori ataguye neza Amerika
text: Inama nshingamateka y'Ubufaransa yemeje integuro y'itegeko rigena amakori acibwa ibigo bikomakomeye nka Google, Facebook na Apple. Guca 3% nk'ikori ku bikorwa vy'ibigo bikoresha itumatumanako bigera ku 30 birwiriyemwo ivyo muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bishobora kuzanira leta y'Ubufaransa miliyoni 400 z'ama euros muri uyu mwaka wonyene. Abashingamateka birengagije akamo ka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zavuga ko ari akarenganyo, kandi ko zigiye kwihora mu kuzoshiraho amakori nk'ayo. Umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca Leta w'Ubufaransa Bruno Le Maire yiyamirije impungenge za Amerika, avuga ko ibintu nk'ibi bikwiye gutoregwa umuti mu biganiro. Ubufaransa buvuga ko bikwiye ko ibigo vyifashisha itumatumanako, bitanga amakori aho bikorera aho kuyatanga aho bifise icicaro gikuru, ivyinshi bikaba bibarizwa muri Amerika. Ubufaransa bwananiwe kwumvisha ibindi bihugu gufatira hamwe iyo ngingo mw'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya, bari kwita 'GAFAs' mu majambo avunaguye, n'ukuvuga Google, Apple, Facebook na Amazon. Ubu rero bwahisemwo gutangura bwo nyene guca ayo makori, ariko bukizera ko iyi ngingo yabwo izoba iy'igihe gito. Hari ibiganiro hagati y'ibihugu bitunze kuruta ibindi bigize umugwi G7 hamwe n'ikigo kijejwe kuraba  imigenderanire mu butunzi n'iterambere mu kugabangana amakori avanwa mw'ikoreshwa ry'itumatumanako muri kino gihe rifise ikibanza gikomeye. Gutyo rero hakaboneka umwumvikano uvuye mu nama ugasubirira ingingo nka bene iyi y'Ubufaransa. Ubwongereza bwatangaje umugambi wo gushiraho amakori asa n'aya y'Ubufaransa, ico cemezo kikazoshobora kuja mu bikorwa mu mwaka uza. Espagne yo yakoze umushinge w'itegeko muri uyu mwaka. Umunyamakuru Dave Lee akorera muri Amerika ya ruguru ati 'Ubufaransa burikumiriye'. Ubutegetsi bwa Washington bwamaze kuvuga ko bugiye kwugurura ingingo yitwa 'Section 301', mu nzira yo gutohoza nimba hari aho burenganywa. Ni ingingo yakoreshejwe mbere, nk'inzira yo gushiraho ibiciro bishasha ku bihugu ubutegetsi bwa Trump bwibaza ko biriko biburiramwo mbege. Nimba Ubufaransa bugiye gukura miliyoni amajana z'ama euros mu mifuko y'ibi bihangange vyo muri Amerika, Amerika nayo ishobora kuvuga iti :'kuki tweho tutokura amafranga mu vyo Ubufaransa bukorera iwacu?' Uko niko vyagenze ku Bushinwa,  bigahamba Amerika mu ntambara y'ubudandaji ishobora no gukomera muri kazoza. Amakori ku bikorwa vy'itumatumanako, ni ikibazo giteye impungenge ku Bufaransa, kuko bwikumiriye. Ibiganiro vyigeze gutangura hagati y'ibihugu kuri ayo makori vyahavuye biburizwamwo kuko bamwe muri bo batari bashigikiye ayo makori. Aha umuntu yovuga nka Irland yavyungukiyemwo mu guhamagara abashoramitahe bashaka isoko ku mugabane wa Bulaya. Ibindi bihugu nk'Ubwongereza, Espagne na Autriche biracagonanwa gufata iyo nzira. Ico impande zompi zihuriyeko n'uko igihe carenze co kwiyumvira ingene ibigo vyungukira mw'itumatumanako bitozwa amakori. Ubufaransa bushobora kwitega ibintu bibiri. N'uko ibihugu bitera ikirenge mu cabwo bishiraho amategeko yavyo, bigatuma Ubufaransa butaba nyamwigendako. Ikindi n'uko iyo ntambwe Ubufaransa bwateye ishobora gutuma n'ibindi bihugu bibona ko hageze kwumvikana uko bitoza ayo makori biri hamwe. Ivyo vyotuma amafranga ivyo bigo vyahora vyikwegerako ataha mu bigega vy'ibihugu.

headline: Ingabo za Ethiopia zigenzura 70% ya Tigray – reta
text: Reta ya Ethiopia ivuga ko ingabo z’igihugu ubu zigenzura ahangana na 70 % h’intara ya Tigray iri mu buraruko bw’igihugu, ivyo umutegetsi wo muri iyo ntara igeramiwe n’ntambara yamirira kure. Umuhanuzi w’umushikiranganji wa mbere mu vyo umutekano, Redwan Hussien, yanditse kuri Twitter ko “70% ya Tigray igenzurwa n’ingabo za Ethiopia”. Avuga  kandi ko imfashanyo ziriko “zirinjira ku rugero rutari bwigere ruhaho”, harimwo no mu turere avuga ko tutagenzurwa n’ingabo za reta. Umuvugizi w’umugambwe Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF), Getachew Reda, arahakana aya makuru nk’uko vyandikwa n’itororokanirizo ry’amakuru AFP. Getachew asubirwamwo avuga ati: "Ivyo avuga abikura mu kirere”. Abaserukira Tigray na reta ya Addis Abeba bari bagize imisi mu biganiro muri Kenya muri ino ndwi kugira bavugane ingene boshira mu ngiro amasezerano y’amahoro yateweko igikumu mu ndwi iheze muri Afrika y’Epfo. Izi mpande zompi zarateye igikumu kuri ano masezerano ziyemeza kurangiza intambara zimaze imyaka ibiri muri Tigray. Mu yandi makuru, ababibonye babwiye BBC ko abasivire batari bake bishwe mu gitero c’indege mu gisagara ca Mandi kiri mu burengero bwa Ethiopia. Ababa muri ako karere bavuga ko ico gitero cabaye mu masaha yo gufungura ku wa gatatu muri ico gisagara kimaze imisi kigenzurwa n’abarwanyi b’umuhari w’inyeshamba za Oromo Liberation Army (OLA) inyuma yo gutana mu mitwe n’ingabo za reta. Umunyagihugu atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana yabwiye BBC ko reta yashaka gutera inyeshamba ariko ko benshi mu bapfuye n’abakomeretse ari abasivire. Umuvugizi wa OLA, Oda Tarbi, avuga ko abasivire 30 ari bo bapfuye, ariko ntavuga igitigiri c’abarwanyi bayo bishwe. Abanyaporitike bariyamiriza iki gitero c’umuhari OLA bavuga ko ari ic’”ubugome”, bagasaba na reta kudakora ibitero ku basivire. Reta ya Ethiopia ntaco iravuga kuri ibi. BBC yagerageje kuvugana n’umukuru w’igisata kijejwe umutekano mu ntara ya Oromia, ariko yanse kugira ico ashikirije.

headline: Helen Nkwocha - umumenyereza wa mbere w'umugore w'ikipe ikomeye y'abagabo i Buraya
text: Helene Nkwocha yari afise ishaka n'ukwihagararako igihe yagurisha inzu yiwe agafata icemezo co kuba mu nzu y'ubwato kugira aronke amahera yo kuriha ishure ryo kuba umumenyereza w'umunyamwuga. Ariko nta na hamwe mu ndoto ziwe higeze habamwo ivy'uko yobaye umumenyereza wa mbere w'umugore w'ikipe y'umupira w'amaguru y'abagabo yo ku rwego rwo hejuru i Buraya. Tvoroyrar Boltfelag ni imwe mu makipe ya kera cane mu mazinga ya Faroe. Ariko mu gihe umwaka w'inkino utagenze neza wagomba uhere - mu gihe bari bamaze kuwuronkamwo amanota atatu gusa - biyambaje Nkwocha, yakora muri iyo kipe nk'umumenyereza w'abakiri bato, ngo ababere umumenyereza mu mikino itandatu isigaye. Uyu mudamu yavukiye i London yabwiye BBC Sport ati "Ntivyansavye kwiyumvira". "Uko abantu babifata ntibihuje na jewe kuko bobo batangazwa n'igitsina canje. Ariko kuba ndi umugore ndabimenyereye. Nta gishasha kirimwo kuri jewe. "Naho kuba nkorana n'abakinyi b'abagabo? Nakoranye n'abakinyi b'abagabo benshi kurusha abagore. Kuba nkora akazi kuri uru rwego, ego, ivyo ntibisanzwe. Ariko gukorana n'abakinyi b'abagabo ivyo kuri jewe nta gishasha kirimwo." Igihe BBC Sport yavugana na Nkwocha mu 2015 yari mu ntango y'urugendo rwamushikanye mu bihugu vyinshi, harimwo Ubushinwa na Amerika, arondera akazi. Uyu mudamu w'imyaka 45 agira ati "Vyari bigoye cane kuko akazi ko kumenyereza karahiganirwa cane". "Utegerezwa kuba umuntu atadebukirwa kandi kuba mu nzu y'ubwato bwari bwo buryo bwiza kuri jewe bwo kuziganya amahera nari nkeneye kugira mbeho, kandi nshobore kubona umwanya wo kumenyereza kuko ku rwego nk'urwo nta mahera menshi uronka. "Vyansavye ukwitanga kudasanzwe mu bijanye n'amafaranga hanyuma mu bijanye n'aho nategerezwa kuba ndi, naguma ngendagenda cane ndondera amahirwe yo kwiga no gutera imbere." Nkwocha yariko arakorera i Chicago igihe yumva ko hari akazi mu mazinga ya Faroe. Mu gihe Covid yagomba itangure guhagarika ubuzima, yararavye asanga ivyo ako kazi kari kumuzanira vyari bigoye kwivyiyumanganya. Ntiyari bwashike mu mazinga ya Faroe na rimwe. Agira ati "Ni nk'ahantu ho mu migani myiza. Ni heza cane, nibaza yuko ari ho hantu heza maze kubona. "Nta bantu benshi bahari - hatuwe n'abantu 2.000 - kandi nyinshi mu nkino dukina dutegerezwa gufata ubwato, hanyuma imodoka kugira dushike iyo dukinira. Kandi hari umuyaga mwinshi umupira nawo ukama uri mu kirere bisigura ko ari ahantu hagoye ku mupira w'amaguru." Mu nkino zibiri ari umumenyereza mfatakibanza, Nkwocha yarananiwe guhagarika gutsindwa kwa TB. Ariko mu mpera z'indwi batsinzwe 1-0 gusa, kandi hari umukinyi wabo yahawe ikarata itukura. Nkwocha azoguma akora uko ashoboye, yirinda kwiyumvira ivya kazoza ka nyuma y'impera z'umwaka w'inkino. Uko vyogenda kwose, nta n'umwanya ukwiye afise wo kwiyumvira cane ivya kazoza. Igihe BBC Sport yavugana nawe, yari ahejeje akazi kiwe k'uwo munsi - kumenyereza bamwe mu bakiri bato mw'ikipe ya TB. Namubwiye nti Pep Guardiola wa City ntategerezwa kwigisha incuke hamwe n'abakuze. Nkwocha yaciye afatwa n'agatwengo. Aca agira ati "Ntagiye mu vyo gutera inkuru, uravye uko imyimenyerezo igenda, urashobora kuvuga ko na Helen atavyo akora".

headline: Misire yo gucungera ikirere ya Syria yaguye hafi y'ikigo ca nikleyeri ca Israel
text: Igisasu ca misire gikorora indege ca Syria caturikiye mu bumanuko bwa Israel, ku birometero 30 gusa uvuye ku kigo c'ibanga ca nucléaire. Amahona yo gutabaza (sirènes) yatanguye kwumvikana imbere y'uko ico gisasu giturika mu karere ka Dimona. Nta wakomeretse kandi nta vyononekaye. Igisirikare ca Israel kivuga ko iyi misire ari imwe mu yandi atari make yatewe imbere y'aho ku ndege ya Israel. Nayo yaciye yihora mu gutera ibirindiro bitari bike muri Syria vyo gucungera ikirere. Igisirikare ca Syria kimenyesha ko izo misire za Israel zaguye hafi y'ibigo biri hafi y'umugwa mukuru Damas/Damascus. Igisirikare ca Syria kivuga kandi ko nyinshi muri izo misire zategerewe mu kirere zikamanurwa, ariko ko abasirikare bane bakomeretse, kandi ko hari "ibintu bimwe bimwe vyononekaye". Ishirahamwe rikurikiranira hagufi ibijanye n'agateka ka muntu muri Syria, Syrian Observatory for Human Rights, rifise icicaro mu Bwongereza, rivuga ko misire za Israel zatewe ku kirindiro co gucungera ikirere mu gisagara ca Dumayr kiri ku birometero 40 mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Damas. Ako karere kazwi ko ari bwo bubiko bw'ibirwanisho vy'abarwanyi bashigikiwe na Iran basanzwe barwana ku ruhande rw'igisirikare ca reta ya Syria mu ntambara iri muri ico gihugu. Mu misi iheze, hari amakuru yavuga ko ibirindiro vyo gucungera ikirere vya Israel biri hafi ya Dimona hamwe no ku kivuko ca Eilat kiri ku kiyaga gitukura (Red Sea) vyongerejwe inguvu mu kwicungera mu gihe hoba igitero c'abarwanyi bashigikiwe na Iran muri ako karere, harimwo n'abari muri Syria. Icuka kibandanya kiba kibi hagati y'ibi bihugu bisanzwe birabana ribi, Iran ikagiriza Israel ko ari yo iherutse gukora igitero ku kigo ca Natanz gihingura ubutare bwa uranium mu ntango z'uku kwezi. Israel ntiyigeze ivuga ko ari yo yakoze ico gitero. Ikigo ca nucléaire ca Dimona muri Israel  kivugwa ko cahinguye ibirwanisho vy'ubumara. Israel ntihakana canke ngo yemeze ko ifise ibirwanisho vy'ubumara.

headline: Anthony Martial: Yatyojwe kuri Instagram kubera ibara ry'urukoba rwiwe
text: Umusatirizi wa Manchester United Anthony Martial yatyojwe ku rubuga rwa Instagram mu butumwa bw'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba yarungikiwe inyuma y'urukino rwahuje umurwi wiwe na West Brom ku wa Mungu rukarangira iyo mirwi yompi inganya 1-1. Bugize kabiri mu ndwi zitatu gusa Martial atyojwe, inyuma ya bagenzi we Marcus Rashford na Axel Tuanzebe nabo nyene baherutse guhura n'iki kibazo c'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi. Mu ndwi iheze, Facebook, ari yo mwene Instagram, yatangaje ko itazohagarika umwe mu bakoresha uru rubuga yatyoje umukinyi wa Swansea Yan Dhanda kubera ari umwirabure. Troy Townsend wo mw'ishirahamwe Kick It Out rirwanya ivangura ati: "Raba birasubiriye kandi". "Ubu ni ibintu vyibonekeza cane". "Ndiko ndibaza nimba iyi konte bazoyihagarika mu kiringo c'ukwezi kumwe gusa, tuze twumva gusa bwa bujambojambo ngo 'ntusubire gukora ivyo' dusanzwe tumenyereye". Uyu musatirizi Martial w'imyaka 25 akomoka mu Bufaransa yakinye iminota 66 muri uru rukino rwarangiye Man U inganya na West Brom igitsindo kimwe kuri kimwe. Aya majambo yo gutyoza Martial yaherekejwe n'ubundi butumwa bwinshi bwahamagarira urubuga rwa Instagram kugira ico rukoze kuri kino kibazo. Manchester United ivuga ko igihagaze mu biri mw'itangazo yasohoye mu mpera z'ukwa mbere, aho yatangaza ko "ibabajwe cane" n'iri hohotera, ikanasaba imbuga hwaniro hamwe n'abajejwe kuzigenzura "gufata ingingo ruhasha kugira ngo bahagarike iyi ngeso". Igiporisi camaze kumenyesha ibijanye n'ubu butumwa bw'ivangura. Ku wa 7 z'uku kwa kabiri, umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea Antonio Rudiger yavuze ko yatutswe "bikomeye" mu butumwa bw'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba yarungikiwe ku mbuga hwaniro. Umukinyi Dhanda wa Swansea avuga ko kubona imbuga hwaniro ata ngingo zifata kuri iri tyozwa rishingiye ku rukoba biha ingoga  abantu "kubandanya bakora aka kabi". Uyu mwongereza Dhanda w'imyaka 22 akomoka muri Aziya yaratyojwe kuri Instagram inyuma y'aho umurwi wiwe utsindiwe na Manchester City mu nkino z'igikombe ca FA. Ico gihe, Facebook yatangaje ko yahagaritse uwabikoze gusubira kurungika ubutumwa kuri Instagram. Iyi kompanyi ivuga ko abantu bakeneye kuronswa akaryo ko kwigira ku makosa bakora. Umuvugizi wa Facebook ati: "Ntidushaka amacakubiri n'urwanko bishingiye ku rukoba ku mbuga zacu". Facebook na Twitter zompi zivuga ko ziyemeje kurwanya ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ku mbuga zazo. Mu ndwi iheze, Facebook yatangaje ko konte zizobandanya zicishwako amajambo yo gutyoza kuri Instagram zitazohagarikwa mu mwanya kanaka, ko ahubwo zizohagarikwa burundu kubera kubandanya ico caha. Mu ndwi nkeya ziheze, abakinyi ba Premier League batari bake  - harimwo Romaine Sawyers wa West Brom,  Reece James akina muri Chelsea inyuma hamwe na mushikiwe, umusatirizi Lauren James wa Manchester United  - bararungikiwe ubutumwa bw'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba bucishijwe ku mbuga hwaniro. Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza Football Association (FA) risaba reta gufata ingingo, mu gihe iherutse gutangaza ko amakompanyi y'imbuga hwaniro ashobora gutozwa "amahadabu manini" ashobora guharurwa muri za "miriyoni z'amapawundi" mu gihe yoyanirwa no gutorera umuti iki kibazo c'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ku mbuga zayo.

headline: Igitero ca Russia: Putin aracarondera kwigarurira igice kinini ca Ukraine - Amerika
text: Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya aracarondera kwigarurira igice kinini ca Ukraine, nk’uko bivugwa n’ibisata vya Amerika bijejwe igendereza. Hagati aho, abategetsi ba Amerika babona ko ingabo za Moscou ziruhishijwe cane n’iyi ntambara, bakabona ko ico bashoboye ubu ari ukwigarurira uduce duto tw’ubutaka bwa Ukraine. Bisigura ko iyi ntambara ishobora kumara igihe kirekire, nk’uko umukuru w’ikigo c’igihugu kijejwe igendereza, Avril Haines, abivuga. Mu kwa gatatu, Moscou yafashe ingingo yo gushira inguvu zose ku karere ka Donbas kari mu buseruko bwa Ukraine inyuma y’aho inaniriwe no gufata umugwa mukuru Kyiv n’ibindi bisagara. Putin aracafise intumbero zisa n’izo yari afise igihe intambara itangura, ukwigarurira Ukraine yose, nk’uko uyu mutegetsi mukuru w’igendereza rya Amerika Haines abivuga. Ariko, avuga ko Uburusiya bushobora kudashika kuri iyi ntumbero ubu bwa vuba.  Yabwiye inama y’ishami ry’ubucuruzi muri Amerika ati: "Hano turabona ko hari ubudasa hagati y’intumbero za gisirikare Putin ashaka mu kiringo gito, n’ubushobozi bw’igisirikare ciwe, bikaba bidahuye n’ivyo yifuza ndetse n’ivyo ingabo zishobora gushikako". Kuva aho bunaniriwe gushika ku ntumbero yabwo yo gufata Kyiv, Uburusiya bwibanze kwigarurira ubutaka mu karere ka Donbas  - akarere kagutse karimwo amahinguriro, Putin akitwaza ko Ukraine ikorera ihonyabwoko abavuga ikirusiya. Ingabo z’Uburusiya zarateye intambwe muri ako karere, aho ziherutse kwigarurira igisagara ca Severodonetsk, ariko zikaba zigenda bukebuke na rirya ingabo za Ukraine zibandanya zihagararako. Mw’ijambo rya mbere ashikirije icese kuva mu kwa gatanu ku vyerekeye ingene igendereza rya Amerika ribona iyi ntambara, umupfasoni Haines avuga ko igitero c’Uburusiya gishobora kubandanya “igihe kirekire” kandi ko “ishusho ibandanya iba mbi”. Avuga ko ibisata bijejwe igendereza bibona ibintu bitatu bishoboka ku kungene iyi ntambara ishobora kubandanya, ikintu gishoboka cane kikaba ari uko intambara ishobora kubandanya ku muvuduko muto, aho Uburusiya “buzogenda bufata uturere ariko ntihagire ico bifasha”. Ibindi bishoboka, ariko ku rugero ruto, harimwo ko Uburusiya bushobora gutera intambwe ikomeye, canke bugashobora gutsimbataza ibirindiro vyabwo ku rubuga rw'intambara,  Ukraine nayo igashobora gutera intambwe ntoya. Ibi bishobora gusigura ko Moscou ishobora gukoresha cane uburyo bw’intambara butamenyerewe mu gutera abansi bayo, harimwo n’ibitero nyabwonko, kugenzura amasoko ntanganguvu n’ibirwanisho ruhonyanganda vy’ubumara. Haines yashikirije aya majambo ejo ku wa gatatu inyuma y’aho abategetsi ba OTAN biyemeje gushigikira Ukraine mu gihe cose bizoba ari ngombwa – mu kwongereza ingabo zayo ku mugabane wose w’Ubulaya no mu kwemerera Finland na  Suède/Sweden kwinjira muri iri huriro ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe. Umunyamabanga mukuru wa OTAN Jens Stoltenberg avuga ko izi ari zo mpinduka zikomeye gusumba izimaze gukorwa inyuma ya ya ntambara y’ukwikekana (Guerre Froide/Cold War), aho Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika avuga ko OTAN   “izokomezwa mu buryo bwose ku mpande zose  - ku butaka, mu kirere no mu mazi”. Yishura ku kibazo c’uko ibi bihugu bibiri vyo mu Buraruko bishobora kwinjira mw’ishirahamwe OTAN, Perezida Putin yagirije iri huriro rya gisirikare ko ririko ryunyura icuka kibi n’ibigirankana. Igihe yari mu rugendo muri Turkmenistan, Putin yavuze ati: "Mu gihe ingabo n’ibikoresho vyoramuka birungitswe,  bizoba ngombwa ko [Uburusiya] bwihora”. Hagati aho, reta y’Ubwongereza yiteguye guha Ukraine imfashanyo ya gisirikare ingana n’imiriyaridi 1.2 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika, hafi incuro zibiri z’iyo Ubwongereza bumaze guha gushika ubu iki gihugu gihanganye n’Uburusiya. Amerika yonyene niyo imaze guha Ukraine imfashanyo isumba iy’Ubwongereza. Umukuru w’igihugu ca Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky avuga ko igihugu ciwe gikeneye imiriyaridi zababa zitanu z’amadorari y’abanyamerika buri kwezi kugira ngo gishobore guhangana n’Uburusiya.

headline: Qatar 2022 - Portugal: Ivya Cristiano Ronaldo  vyoba birangiriye aha?
text: Na Chris Bevan BBC Sport ku kibuga Al Thumama Stadium, Doha Indoto za Cristiano Ronaldo zo gushobora gutsindira igikombe c’isi yose zirarangiye, kandi bisa n’uko ari ubutakigaruka – ariko none twovuga ko umwuga wiwe urangiye burundu? Aho ashiriwe ku rutonde rw’abasubirizi inyuma yo gushwana n’umumenyereza, urugendo rwa Ronaldo muri rino higanwa ntirwigeze ruboneka ko rwari guhava rurangira mu mahoro – ariko gusa amarira yagize inyuma y’’aho Portugal ikuriwe mw’ihiganwa yabaye incamake y’ingene ibintu bimeze ubu. Inyuma yo gutsindwa na Maroc bisigura ko uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 37 gushika ubu ata mudari w’intsinzi y’igikombe c’isi yose agiye yambaye – agashimwe konyene agiye ataronse – mu gihe ubu ari ishusho kw’isi yose ariko idafise umurwi n’umwe yovuga iti ‘aha ni muhira’, inyuma y’aho aviriye muri Manchester United mu buryo atari bwiza, hari mu kwezi guheze. Ico gihe abantu bari basanzwe bariko bibaza nimba yari gusubira gukinira umurwi wiwe, ubu naho, mu gihe abantu muri Portugal bakimukunda cane, hakaba hagiye gukurikira ibibazo kuri kazoza kiwe mu gihugu. Ronaldo yavuye muri Man U hasigaye igihe gito ngo ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose ritangure, ariko Qatar yatanguye neza kuri we. Igitsindo yinjije kuri penalty yateje impari mu rukino rwa mbere rwa Portugal mw’itsinda ryayo igihe ikina na Ghana cabaye ico “ubuhinga budasanzwe” ku bwa Fifa, kikaba camutumye yitwa umukinyi wa mbere yinjije mu mahiganwa atanu y’igikombe c’isi yose. Ariko kuva ico gihe ibintu vyaciye bitangura kugenda nabi, mbere akaba atashoboye no kwinjiza igitsindo na kimwe mu nkino zibiri zakurikiye atanguzwa mu kibuga, imbere y’uko acanamwo n’umumenyereza  Fernando Santos inyuma y’aho amusubirije mu rukino rwabahuje na Korea y’Epfo. Inyuma yo gushirwa ku ntebe y’abasubirizi mu rukino n’Ubuswisi mu gice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma – bukaba bwari bwo bwa mbere adatangujwe mu kibuga mu nkino zikomeye nk’izi kuva mu 2008 - umusore yamusubiriye Goncalo Ramos yateye bitatu wenyene, ubwo nyene Ronaldo aca yitwa igihangange co ku ntebe y’abasubirizi. Ni nako yakinishijwe mu rukino rwa nijoro na Maroc, n’aho yahawe hafi igice ca kabiri cose, kuva ku munota wa 51, aho nyene igihugu ciwe camaze kurya kimwe ku busa. Kuboneka mu kibuga vyonyene vyasiguye ko yari aciye uwundi muhigo  - urukino mpuzamakungu rwiwe rwa 196, aca anganya n’umusatirizi wa Koweit  Bader Al-Mutawa ku ruhande rw’abagabo – ariko nta kintu kinini yakoze ugereranije n’ivyo yagiye arakora mu myaka iheze. Ronaldo yari asanzwe yaraciye umuhigo ku bitsindo vyinshi mu nkino mpuzamakungu ku ruhande rw’abagabo, aho afise 118, ariko ntiyigeze aboneka ko yari gushobora kwiyongera iteka imbere ya Maroc yaboneka ko yari yariye amavubi. Ronaldo yashoboye gukora ku mupira incuro cumi gusa kandi vyamusavye ko akina gushika ku munota wa 91 kugira ngo ashobore gutera mw’igori, ariko ukaba wari umupira utari ufise inguvu nyinshi zo gutera ubwoba umunyegori wa Maroc, Yassine Bounou, azwi cane nka Bono. Mu gihe Ronaldo yagumye yerekana ishaka, arindiriye ko aronka umupira mwiza kugira ngo akure mu kabaregwa igihugu ciwe, ntiwigeze ushika. Igihe umupira wari utewe na Rafael Leao ku munota wa 97 ukamuca hejuru imbere y’uguterwa n’umutwe na Pepe akawutera inyuma, Ronaldo, ari muri ka gace ka mukorumbone, yakubise amavi hasi n’umwiheburo, yiremeka amaboko, icerekana ko yasa n’uwari abonye ko ivyiwe birangiye. Ifirimbi ya nyuma imaze kuvuga, yararamukanije na bamwe mu bakeba biwe, hanyuma aca ava mu kibuga ubudakebuka, aherekejwe n’uwufata amashusho (cameraman). Mu kanya isase, umufana yagerageje guca mu ryahumye abajejwe umutekano arondera ingene yomusaba kwifotoza i selfie nawe, ariko biranka. Ronaldo amaze kuzimangana mu kibuga yerekanywe ariko atera aja mu cumba c’iyambariro n’amarira, amosozi azokwibutsa ingene avuye mw’ihiganwa, hampande y’ugucanamwo n’umumenyereza wiwe. Inyuma y’aho, Santos yafashe nk’ibisanzwe uku gucanamwo kwiwe na Ronaldo, mu kuvuga ati: "Si nibaza ko ivyashikiye Ronaldo hari ingaruka vyagize ku rukino, n’aho hari ababineguye. Twese turi hamwe. "Nimba twovuga ko hari abantu babiri bababaye cane, ni Ronaldo na jewe nyene. Iki kiri mu bigize akazi ku mumenyereza n’umukinyi”. Bafise kuba bunze ubumwe, ariko Portugal iratashe – inyuma y’ibibazo vyinshi, aho abantu bibaza nimba koko umurwi w’iki gihugu hari ico woshikako utari kumwe n’iyi nyenyeri yawo. Ibihe biha ibindi kandi ni ibisanzwe ko imirwi ikomeye itsindwa mu nkino zikomeye, ariko, n’aho Santos yogenda canke akaguma ari umumenyereza, Ronaldo si umuntu agiye kwibagirwa vuba. Aracafise iteka mu gihugu ciwe inyuma y’ivyo yagikoreye mu gutsindira igikombe ca Bulaya mu 2016 (Euro 2016), igikombe ca mbere gikomeye mu nkino nkuru nkuru. Igitigiri c’abafana ba Portugal bari bambaye imipira yanditseko 'Ronaldo 7' hanze y’ikibuga Al Thumama Stadium ejo ku wa gatandatu kirerekana neza ko batibagira ibihe vyiza vya kahise kiwe n’aho ibiherutse kuba mu ndwi nkeya ziheze atari vyiza. Mushiki wa Ronaldo, Katia Aveiro, yaravugiye abatari bake abicishije mu butumwa bwuzuye umubabaro ku rubuga rwa Instagram inyuma yo gutsindwa na Maroc. Yatanguye ati: "Igihe abuzukuru banje bazombaza ivyerekeye urugamba, iteka, icubahiro, akazi, ukwitanga, inzitizi, ububi bw’abantu buciye kw’ishari; ni bansaba kuvuga ivyerekeye ibikombe, ibitsindo, ubushimwe, inyandiko z’umurage utarigera uboneka, nzobabwira ivyerekeye musazanje, se wabo”. Arangiza avuga ati: "Nzobabwira ivyerekeye ubwami yubatse, nzobabwira inguvu ziwe, ivyo yemeye n’ivyo yakoze, nzobabwira amateka yiwe, nzobabwira ko atigeze acika intege n’igihe baba bamaze kumwimbira icobo. Nzobereka firime [film], firime nyayo y’ubuzima bwa se wabo”. Ntituzi ingene iyo firime izorangira, ariko mu gihe vyoshika agakina ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose rigira gatandatu, vyoba ari ibintu bitangaje cane. Ico gihe, ni ukuvuga mw’ihiganwa rindi ry’igikombe c’isi yose, azoba afise imyaka 41, ariko nimba yipfuza irindi teka, aracafise amahirwe mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe ca Bulaya kizoba mu 2024. Ikindi kibazo nyamukuru ni ukumenya ni uyuhe murwi asobora kuzoba akinira. Hari imirwi itari mike yipfuza kugura Ronaldo muri ka kanya k’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi ko mu kwa mbere, harimwo Al-Nassr  wo muri Arabia Saoudite wamaze no kumwemerera agashahara gafadika mu ndwi iheze. Uburasirazuba bwo hagati si ahantu yaronderera na gato – ariko mu misi dushobora kuba ari yo tuzomubona.

headline: Covid-19: Africa irasaba UN gutegura inama yo kwiga ingene incanco zotangwa ata bugunge
text: Ikigo kijejwe kurwanya indwara muri Afrika CDC gisaba ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU gutumako inama idasanzwe kugira ngo higwe ingene incanco za Covid-19 zitangwa ata kugunga ibindi bihugu. Umukuru w'iki kigo, Muganga John Nkegasong, avuga ko bafise amakenga ku kungene ibihugu bitunze biriko birakorana n'amahinguriro akora imiti kugira ngo bibe ari vyo vyironkera izi ncanco. Ihuriro ry'amashirahamwe y'abagiraneza rivuga ko, mu gihe iki kibazo kitokwigwa vuga bwango, ibihugu bikenye  vyokwisanga igice kimwe kw'icumi c'abanyagihugu bavyo ari bo bonyene bashoboye gukingirwa. Mu gihe abajejwe ubuvuzi muri Canada n'Ubwongereza bamaze kwemeza urucanco rwa Pfizer/BioNtech, abahinga mu vyo ubuvuzi babona ko ibi bihugu bitunze biriko vyigungirako incanco. Iri huriro ry'amashirahamwe, ribona ko vyovyo gushika mu mpera za 2021 bizoba vyamaze gucandaga abanyagihugu bavyo bose. Muganga Nkegasong avuga ko bizoba bibabaje cane mu gihe ibi bihugu bitunze bizoba vyitekaniye Afrika nayo iriko iratarataza irondera incanco. Bitegekanijwe ko uyu mugabane ushobora kuronswa incanco zigera ku miriyoni 220 z'incanco biciye mu mugambi mpuzamakungu wiswe  COVAX. Izi ncanco zizotegerezwa gusaranganywa mu bihugu 55 vyose. Hagati aho, hari ababona ko izi zidahagije. Hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe vya Afrika vyatanguye kwegera aya mahinguriro y'imiti vyo nyene ubwavyo, co kimwe n'ibifise ubucuti bwa hafi n'aya mahinguriro, kugira ngo bishobore kuronswa izo ncanco. Ariko ikigo CDC ca Afrika kibona ko vyoba vyiza ibihugu vyose vya Afrika bigeye hamwe maze bigashobora kwegera aya mahinguriro ari ikintu kimwe, hako buri gihugu kigenda ukwaco. Aya makenga ku kungene izi ncanco ziriko ziratangwa ashizwe ahabona mu gihe ubwandu bw'iki kiza karanda bwiyongereye ku bice 7.8 kw'ijana mu karere ka Afrika yo musi y'ubugaragwa bwa Sahara mu minsi indwi iheze. Gushika ubu, abarenga imiriyoni 2.3 ku mugabane wose wa Afrika nibo bamaze kwandura Covid-19.

headline: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Messi, Gordon, Kante, Martinez, Pickford, Juranovic, Saka
text: Everton iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano n’umukinyi wo ku ruhande umwongereza Anthony Gordon w’imyaka 21 kugira ngo Chelsea ntibandanye imwirondeza. (Telegraph) Umukinyi wo hagati w’Ubufaransa, N'Golo Kante w’imyaka 31 ariko arasatira kugira ngo arabe ko yokwimukira muri Barcelona igihe amasezerano afitaniye na Chelsea azoba aragiye mu ci riza, ibiganiro vy’intangamarara bikaba bigeze kure. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) Paris St-Germain igiye gutangura ibiganiro n’umusatirizi wa Argentina Lionel Messi w’imyaka 35, inyuma y’ibikorwa bidasanzwe yakoreye mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose, mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n’uyu murwi azorangira mu ci riza. (RMC iciye kuri Mail) Bayern Munich iripfuza kugura umunyegori wa Argentina na Aston Villa  Emiliano Martinez w’imyaka 30. (MediaFoot – mu gifaransa) Ariko umunyegori wa  Borussia Monchengladbach n’Ubuswisi Yann Sommer, w’imyaka 34 na we ari mu biganiro na Bayern Munich vyo kumugura inyuma y’aho Umudagi Manuel Neuer avunikiye ukuguru. (Goal) Umumenyereza wa Real Madrid Carlo Ancelotti yitandukanije n’ibivugwa ko Brezili imukeneye, agashimangira ko yipfuza kuguma muri uno murwi uherutse gutahukana igikombe c’ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya (European champions). (Rai Radio 1 iciye kuri Mail) Kuri uno wa kabiri, umusatirizi w’Ubufaransa Kylian Mbappé w’imyaka 24 ashobora gutangaza mu kanya kari imbere ko azova muri PSG uno mwaka w’inkino urangiye, Real Madrid ikaba imwipfuza. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) Barcelona iripfuza kugura umukinyi w’inyuma wa Celtic na Croatia Josip Juranovic w’imyaka 27,  ariko ikaba imurwanira na Atletico Madrid hamwe n’imirwi yo muri Premier League. (Sky Sports) Umukuru wa Napoli Cristiano Giuntoli yankiye Newcastle amahirwe yo kugura umusatirizi wa Georgia Khvicha Kvaratskhelia w’imyaka 21. (Sport Express, iciye kuri Fabrizio Romano) Tottenham iriko irihweza ingene yoronka umunyegori wa Everton,  umwongereza Jordan Pickford w’imyaka 28  nk’uwushobora gusubirira umufaransa Hugo Lloris w’imyaka 35. (Football Insider) Arsenal igiye gutangura ibiganiro n’umusatirizi wayo, umwongereza Bukayo Saka w’imyaka 21, mu “ndwi n’amezi ari imbere” mu ntumbero yo kumuha ayandi masezerano. (Caught Offside) Uwahoze ari umumenyereza wa Real Madrid Zinedine Zidane ashobora gusubirira umufaransa mugenziwe Didier Deschamps nk’umumenyereza w’umurwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubufaransa inyuma y’aho butsindiwe na Argentina mu rukino rwa nyuma rw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose. (Mundo Deportivo – mu ki Espagnol) Arsenal na Leeds yinjiye mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Brezili Matheus Cunha,w’imyaka 23, mu gihe Atletico Madrid iriko irategura kumugurisha. (Goal) Chelsea irafise icizere ko ishobora kuronka umukinyi w’inyuma wa RB Leipzig na Croatia Josko Gvardiol w’imyaka 20, n’aho izi ko hari umukeba amurondera. (90 min) Chelsea kandi iri mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund umudagi Youssoufa Moukoko w’imyaka 18 mu kwa mbere. (Give Me Sport) Inter Milan iriko irihweza nimba yogura uwahoze ari umukinyi wo hagati wa Watford Roberto Pereyra w’imyaka 31, igihe amasezerano y’uyu munya-Argentina afitaniye na Udinese azoba arangiye. (Fichajes – mu ki Espagnol) Uwahoze akina inyuma muri West Ham na QPR  Anton Ferdinand avuga ko yari kuba yaragiye gukinira Barcelona ariko ko uwahoze ari umumenyereza w’aba Hammers (West Ham ) Alan Pardew atamwemereye. (TalkSPORT)

headline: Uganda - DR Congo: Hatanguye ibitero vy'indege ku bagwanyi ba ADF
text: Igisirikare ca Uganda catanguje ibitero vy'indege n'ibikoho vya rutura ku bagwanyi b'umuhari wa Allied Democratic Forces (ADF). Umuvugizi w'igisirikare ca Uganda Brigadier General Flavia Byekwaso yemeje ivyo bitero ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter. Yavuze ko ivyo bitero vyabaye bafashanije na RD Congo ku muhari wa ADF, ariko nta zindi nsiguro yatanze ku turere twabereyemwo ivyo bitero. Bisanzwe bizwi ko abagwanyi ba ADF bafise ibirindiro mu buseruko bwa RD Congo. Abategetsi ba Uganda bagiriza ADF, ifitaniye ubucuti n'icitwa Islamic State (IS), ibitero bitandukanye vya bombe muri ico gihugu kuva mu kwezi kwa cumi. Mu ndwi iheze, umukuru w'igihugu ca Uganda, Yoweri Museveni yavuze ko umuhari Allied Democratic Forces (ADF) ugendera ku vyiyumviro vya Islam utegerezwa kwishikana, agashimangira ko reta yavuye hasi mu kuyirwanya. Mw'ijambo yashikirije inyuma y'ibitero bibiri vya bombe vyakozwe ku wa kabiri ku mugwa mukuru Kampala, Museveni avuga ko ADF yibaza ko ikomeye cane rwose kubera abayo bashobora kwigira utwo bashatse ku birindiro vyabo muri DR Congo, kandi kubera babona bimba ubutare bakanagurisha n'imbaho uko bashatse . Avuga ko Uganda izobandanya kubahiga buhongo, agatera akamo abo bose batarasubiza ibirwanisho hasi kubikora vuba bwango.
