Mu ndwi zibiri ziheze, umuhari wa IS waremanze ibitero vya bombe vyabereye rimwe k gituro c'igipolisi kiri hanze y'umugwa mukuru Kampala n'iruhande y'inama nshingamateka. N'imiburiburi abantu batanu ni bo basize ubuzima muri ivyo bitero vya bombe, bimwe muri ivyo vyari ivyo ubwiyahuzi nk'uko bivugwa n'igipolisi ca uganda. Mu ndwi iheze, umuhari wiyitirira Reta ya ki Islam canke Etat Islamique/Islamic State (IS) warigamvye ibitero vy'ubwiyahuzi vyawo vya mbere muri Uganda, haciye ukwezi kumwe uvuga ko utanguye gukorera muri ico gihugu. IS yiyitiriye ibi bitero iciye mu citwa Intara yayo yo muri Afrika yo hagati, ISCAP, ikorera kandi no muri Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo hamwe na Mozambike. Abategetsi ba Uganda bagirije umuhari Allied Democratic Forces (ADF), umuhari wo muri Uganda wiyitirira idini rya Islam uherutse gutangaza ko winjiye muri IS uciye muri ISCAP, ko ari wo wakoze iki gitero. Gushika ubu, IS imaze kwiyitirira ibitero bitatu muri Uganda, vyose ku mugwa mukuru Kampala. Igitero ca mbere cabaye ikibombe caturikiye ku kirindiro c'igipolisi ku wa 07 z'ukw'icumi, IS ikaba yavuze ko cakomerekeje abantu. Ica kabiri ni ikibombe catezwe ku nzu y'uburiro mu kerere kahuriramwo abantu benshi ku mugwa mukuru ku wa 23 z'ukwa cumi, hanyuma kiraturika gihitana umukozi w'iyo nzu y'uburiro. Ica gatatu, cari kigizwe n'ibitero bibiri vyakozwe n'abiyahuzi batatu, hafi y'ibiro bikuru vy'igipolisi no ku nyubakwa y'inama nshingamateka ku wa 16 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe. Umukuru w'igihugu Yoweri Museveni yavuze ko abo biyahuzi ari abanywanyi ba ADF, akaba yabise "ingurube". Amakuru aherutse gutangazwa ku bikorwa vya ISCAP mu mezi ane aheze yavuga ko hamaze gukorwa ibitero bine muri Uganda. IS ifise kuba yaharuye ko ibitero vya bombe vyo ku wa 16 z'uku kwa cumi na rimwe ari ibitero bibiri bitandukanye, ari co gituma yaciye ivuga ko ari bine imaze gukora muri Uganda. Ariko kandi, iki gishobora gufatwa nk'ica kane gishobora kuba ari icakozwe n'umwiyahuzi ku modoka yunguruza abantu ku wa 25 z'ukwa cumi hafi y'I Kampala, kivugwa ko cahitanye uwo nyene yagikoze, gusa ntawaciyitiriye. Abategetsi ba Uganda bavuga ko ico gitero c'ubwiyahuzi capfuvye cakozwe n'umunywanyi wa ADF. Mu bintu vyose ivuga, IS ivuga ko ibitero vyayo bikorwa kuri reta ya Uganda n'igipolisi cayo vy' "abapagani". Mu kwiyitirira ibi bitero, IS irigamba ko yishe canke igakomeretsa "Abakiristu" kandi ko yateye n'inama nshingamateka ya Uganda "igizwe n'abasenga ibigirwamana".' Mu gitero cayo co ku wa 23 z'ukwezi guheze ku nzu y'uburiro, uyu muhari wasiguye ko wakoze ico gitero ku "kabare" gakunzwe kugenderwa "n'abanywanyi hamwe n'abakorera igendereza rya reta y'Abapagani ya Uganda". Imbere y'ibi bitero, Uganda ntiyari ikunze kwumvikana mu butumwa bw'iterabwoba bwasohorwa na IS. Mu gusigura igituma yakoze igitero co ku wa 16 z'uku kwa cumi na rimwe, IS yavuze ko Uganda ari "kimwe mu bihugu biri mu ntambara n'abarwanyi ba Etat Islamique muri Afrika yo hagati". Mu vyo yavugiye mu kinyamakuru cayo al-Naba ku wa 18 z'uku kwa cumi na rimwe, IS yavuze ko ibi bitero vy'ubwiyahuzi "vyuguruye intambwe nshasha y'intambara hagati y'aba mujahidin na reta y'abapagani ya Uganda", kubera, nk'uko yabisubiyemwo, uruhara rwayo mu kurwanya abarwanyi biyitirira idini rya Islam muri "Afrika yo hagati". Muri ubwo butumwa yanditse, harimwo uwundi murongo uvuga ko Uganda iriko "irishura ku ruhara rwayo mu ntambara n'aba mujahidin hagati mu gihugu [Uganda] no hanze". Mu mpera z'ukw'icumi, uyu murwi usa n'uko wababajwe n'uko Uganda itemeye uruhara rwawo muri ibi bitero biheruka. Ivuga ku gitero c'ubwiyahuzi co ku wa 23 z'ukwa cumi ku nzu y'uburiro, IS, iciye mu kinyamakuru al-Naba, yaragabishije Uganda ku vyo ivuga ko ari utwigoro twa reta two gufata minenerwe ibikorwa vya IS mu kubifata ko ari ibitero bito bisanzwe bikorwa n'umuhari w'abarwanyi wo muri ico gihugu - uzwi nka ADF. IS ivuga ko Uganda yihenda cane mu kutemera ko iki gitero [ku nzu y'uburiro], ica kabiri gikozwe muri ubu buryo, cakozwe na Etat Islamique. IS ibandanya isigura ko Uganda yifatanije n'abansi bayo mu "kurungika ingabo" muri DR Congo kurwanya abarwanyi bayo muri iki gihugu, "inyuma y'aho igisirikare ca Congo kinaniriwe no gutera intambwe n'imwe ku rubuga". Ni igihe gusa kitari bwashike imbere y'uko IS yinjira muri Uganda, mu nteguro yayo yo kwagura akarere mu ntambara yayo, ahatanguriye umuhari ukorana nayo wa ADF. Ufatiye ku bivugwa na IS ubwayo, bisa n'uko uyu muhari ufata ko Uganda yongereje inguvu mu kurwanya incuti zawo mu buseruko bwa Congo, ikaba rero yikika inyuma y'ibi kugira ngo itere Uganda. N'aho hari ibiganiro hagati ya Uganda na DR Congo mu ntumbero yo gukorera hamwe mu kurwanya abarwanyi biyitirira idini rya Islam mu karere, gushika ubu nta bikorwa vyo gukorera hamwe biratangura. Ivyo kurungika ingabo muri DR Congo ni ibintu vyo kwitondera cane, ufatiye ku kungene Uganda yafashije inyeshamba zarwanya ubutegetsi bwa Congo mu myaka ya 1990. Mu kw'icumi, Perezida Museveni yatangaje ko igihugu ciwe "citeguriye kuja gufasha" kurwanya umuhari ADF ku butaka bwa Congo, "mu gihe abategetsi ba reta ya Congo bovyemera". Ariko gushika ubu nta tangazo rivuga ivyo gukorana ririgera rishirwa ahabona. Kubona rero ibitero vy'i Kampala bibaye muri kino gihe, bishobora kuba ari amayeri ya IS yo guhamagarira abanya Uganda ngo biyamirize irungikwa iryo ari ryo ryose ry'ingabo za Uganda muri DR Congo. Abarwanyi ba ki Islam bashobora kwama bikika kuri iri rungikwa ry'ingabo muri Congo mu gutera abasivire ba Uganda. Nk'akarorero, ni igitero c'ubwicanyi gikomeye giheruka gukorwa i Kampala mu 2010, ciswe "World Cup"bombings, kubera cabaye ku bantu bariko barorera urukino  rwa nyuma rw'igikombe c'isi yose mu mupira w'amaguru kigahitana abantu 74. Umuhari al-Shabab ni wo waciyitiriye, uvuga ko washaka kwihora Uganda kubera yarungitse ingabo muri Somalia. Ku wa 23 z'uku, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Uganda Henry Okello-Oryem yasubiwemwo n'ikinyamakuru Red Pepper avuga ko ata gikorwa na kimwe co kurungika ingabo muri DR Congo gishoboka abategetsi ba Kinshasa badatanze uruhusha. Ati: "Ni ngombwa ko ubironkera uburenganzira. Ntushobora kwishora ku butaka bw'uwundi uko nyene". IS iri mu rugamba rutoroshe mu buseruko bwa DR Congo kuva mu kwa gatanu aho reta yatangaza ibihe bidasanzwe muri ako karere ica ishinga ubutegetsi bwa gisirikare mu ntara za Kivu ya Ruguru na Ituri ziri ku rubibe ico gihugu gihana na Uganda, akarere IS isanzwe ikoreramwo cane. Igotwa ry'izi ntara ryagumye ryisubiriza kandi n'ubu riracabandanya. Inyuma y'ukwezi iri gotwa ritanguye, IS yakoze kw'itama reta ya Congo ko yananiwe no guhagarika ibikorwa vyayo mbere iranigamba ko yakoze igitero "ca mbere" hagati mu gisagara ca Beni c'intara ya Kivu ya Ruguru. Ico gihe, yatangaje ko abarwanyi bayo ari bo bakoze igitero ca bombe kw'isengero hamwe n'ikindi c'ubwiyahuzi mu kabare, ari co ca mbere muri DR Congo. Imbere y'aho, ibitero vyabera hanze y'igisagara ca Beni. Mu kw'icumi, umunyamakuru Nicaise Kibel'Bel Oka, umwanditsi w'ibitabo vyinshi bivuga ku ntambara ya ki islam mu karere ka Beni, yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: "Intumbero y'igisirikare mu kugota aka karere ni uguhagarika uruja n'uruza rwa ADF ku butaka bwa DR Congo, mu ntumbero yo kurondera kubirukana bagasubira muri Uganda". Iki gitero gishasha ca IS muri Uganda kiri mu rwego rw'ibikorwa vy'uyu muhari vyo kurondera kwimukira muri Afrika kuva mu 2019, inyuma y'aho utakarije ibirindiro vyawo vya nyuma mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo hagati, hamwe n'umugambi wawo wo kurondera kwiyagurira akarere. Ubucuti ufitaniye na ADF muri Uganda buwuha akaryo ko gukorera muri Uganda mu buryo bworoshe. Butuma kandi uyu muhari wa IS wegera buke buke iyindi mihari ikorana nawo muri "Afrika yo hagati", neza na neza muri DR congo, Uganda na Tanzania aho IS imaze kwiyitirira ibitero bibiri gusa, hamwe rero na Mozambike.

headline: Ethiopia-Tigray: America na Buraya bariyamiriza igitero c'indege caguyemwo abantu benshi
text: Ingabo za Ethiopia zahakanye zivuye inyuma ko zitatumbereje ku banyagihgu basanzwe mu gitero c'indege co ku wa kabiri mu kigwati ca Togoga mu ntara ya Tigray. Ariko BBC yabonye ivyemezo vy'abagore  n'abana bakomeretse bariko baravurirwa mu bitaro vya Aider vyo muri Mekelle imyuma y'ico gitero. Umuganga kuri ivyo bitaro yabwiye BBC ko nibura abantu 60 bishwe n'abandi 40 bakomeretse. Bamwe mu bakomeretse bagaragara bafise ibikomere bikomeye bisa n'uko vyatewe n'ibivunji vy'ama bombe. Abaforoma muri ivyo bitaro babwiye BBC ko abantu bakomerekejwe kandi n'amabuye yaturikijwe n'ayo mabombe. BBC yabwiwe kandi ko abasirikare ba Ethiopia babujije nyinshi mu modoka zitwara abarwayi -  ambulance - gushika muri Togoga - zibiri zonyene akaba arizo zemerewe kurengana. Abashoboye gushika ku bitaro bavuga ko babonye abandi benshi barambaraye hasi ariko ko batamenye niba bari bapfuye canke bagihema. Ayo makenga afiswe kandi n'umuryango utarabara imbabare CICR wavuze uti: "Birakenewe cane ko intumwa z'ubuvuzi zubahwa kandi zigakingirwa buri igihe." Ishirahamwe rya Buraya na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bariyamiriza  igitero c'indege bivugwa ko cagabwe n'ingabo zo mu kirere za Ethiopia kigahitana ubuzima bw'abantu baharurwa muri mirongo mw'isoko rw'ikigwati kiri hafi y'umurwa mukuru wa Tigray, Mekelle. Ishirahamwe rya Buraya rivuga ivyashhitse ''biteye impungenge cane'' aho abanyagihugu basanzwe (aba civil) batumberejwe  n'ibigirankana. Ababibonye babwiye BBC ko ku wa kabiri igisirikare cya Ethiopia kirwanira mu kirere cyarashe ku mujyi wa Togoga, uri ku ntera ya kilometero 25 uvuye ku murwa mukuru Mekelle wa Tigray. Ingabo za Ethiopia zirahakana kuba zaratumbereje  abanyagihugu basanzwe ariko zemeza ko zasubiriye kugaba ibitero kuri Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) - wahoze ari umugambwe utwara intara ya Tigray - zifashishije ibitero vy'indege. Amerika yasavye ko haba amatohoza yigenga kandi abakozweko n'ico gitero bashikire ubuvuzi ata ntambamyi. Intabara yo muri Tigray imaze kuvugwamwo kenshi ibikorwa vyo guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu n'amarorerwa. Ico gitero c'indege muri Togoga bivugwa ko cahitanye benshi bagapfa abandi bagakomereka. Umuryango utabara imbabare CICR uvuga ko wafashije kujana kwa muganga abakomeretse. Ubu hari  amakenga ko  ugukomera kw'intabara  mu bice bitandukanye vya Tigray hagati y'abagwanyi ba TPLF n'ingabo za reta - zifashijwe n'iza Eritrea - bizotuma  akaga abantu barimwo muri iyo ntara kaba nabi gusumba, kuko ubu amashirahamwe y'abagiraneza ahura n'intambanyi zo gushikira abantu baharurwa muri za miriyoni bakorwako n'iyo ntambara. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi, nkuko bivugwa n'amashirahamwe afasha, ntibashikirwa n'ubufasha, gutyo bakaba bashobora guhura n'ikibazo gikomeye co kubura ico barya.

headline: Cristiano Ronaldo: Uyu musatirizi wa Portugal na Juventus bamusanzemwo coronavirus
text: Umusatirizi wa Portugal na Juventus Cristiano Ronaldo yapimwe asanga yaranduye wa mugera wa coronavirus, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Portugal, FPF. Itangazo rya FPF rivuga ko uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 35 "ameze neza, nta bimenyetso yerekana, kandi yishize ukwiwe". Ejo ku wa gatatu, bitegekanijwe ko Portugal ihura na Suwede mw'ihiganwa ry'imirwi nserukirabihugu, Nations League. Abandi bakinyi bose ba Portugal bapimwe, inyishu zikerenaka ko ata mugera bafise, kandi bakaba biteguye gukina. Urukino ruheruka rwayihuje n'Ubufaransa ku wa Mungu rukaba rwarangiye iyi mirwi ata n'umwe ushoboye gutsinda igitsindo. Ni yo iri hejuru mu murwi irimwo, ariko ikaba inganya amanota n'Ubufaransa. Ronaldo, kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Portugal, ni we mukinyi wa mbere wo ku mugabane wa Bulaya yatsinze ibitsindo 100 mu nkino mpuzamakungu ku ruhande rw'abagabo, igihe igihugu ciwe gikina na Suwede mu kw'icenda guheze. Kubera yinjiye mu kiringo ca guma mu rugo, Ronaldo ntazoshobora gukina urukino rwa Juventus ku wa 17 z'uku aho izohura na Crotone, hamwe kandi n'urukino rwa mbere ruzoyihuza na Dynamo Kiev ku wa 20 z'uku kw'icumi nyene, muri rya higanwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya (Champions League). Mu nyuma y'aho, Juventus izohura na Verona ku wa 25 z'uku nyene. Ejo ku wa mbere mw'ijoro, Ronaldo yerekanye ku mbuga hwaniro isanamu yifashe ari kumwe na bagenziwe ba Portugal, yanditseko ati :"Turi bamwe haba mu kibuga canke hanze!".

headline: Uganda – Afghanistan: Impunzi za mbere zashitse i Kampala
text: Itangazo ryo mu bushikiranganji bwa Uganda  bujejwe imigenderanire rivuga ko umugwi wa mbere washitse ku kibuga c'indege ca Entebbe mu ndege yari igenewe kubazana kuri uyu wa gatatu mu gitondo. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ni zo zasavye Uganda ko yokwakira bamwe mu banye Afghanistan bariko barahunga ico gihugu kuva aba-Taliban basubiye kwigarurira ubutegetsi. Ubushikiranganji bwa Uganda bujejwe imigenderanire buvuga ko abo bantu baciye muri Uganda ariko ameherezo bazotera baja muri Amerika n'ibindi bihugu. Ariko ntibiramenyekana igihe bazomara muri Uganda ingene kingana. Abashitse uyu munsi barimwo abagabo, abagore n'abana. Itangazo rivuga ko bashitse bapimwa Covid, hanyuma bongere bazomare igihe bari  ukwa bonyene. Ku ndwi iheze umutegetsi wo muri reta ya Uganda yari yabwiye BBC ko ico gihugu cemeye kwakira abanye Afghanistan ibihumbi 2 ku busabe bwa reta ya Amerika. Ariko mu nyuma abategetsi benshi bavuze ko ibiganiro bikibandanya. Amerika ivuga ko yasavye Uganda kwakira impunzi kubera ingene ico gihugu gisanzwe kizwi neza mu kwakira impunzi. Uganda isanzwe ihaye indaro umuriyoni w'impunzi zahunze intambara n'ibindi vyago bitandukanye mu bihugu vya Afrika y'Ubuseruko.

headline: Lionel Messi yemeye amasezerano na Paris St-Germain - Guillem Balague
text: Lionel Messi yemeye amasezerano yo gukinira umurwi Paris St-Germain mu kiringo c'imyaka ibiri, inyuma y'aho aviriye muri  Barcelona, nk'uko bivugwa n'umunyamakuru w'inkino wa BBC Guillem Balague. Aya masezerano aja mu ngiro inyuma y'ibipimo vyo kwa muganga. Uyu kizigenza wa Argentina w'imyaka 34 yavuye muri Barcelona - umurwi wonyene yari amaze gukinira  - inyuma y'aho uwu murwi unaniriwe no kumuha ayandi masezerano kubera amategeko y'ihiganwa rya Espagne, La Liga, yerekeye ikoreshwa ry'amafaranga. Umurwi  PSG umenyerezwa na Mauricio Pochettino warangije ihiganwa Ligue 1 ry'umwaka uheze mu Bufaransa, ari uwa kabiri, inyuma ya Lille. Balague yabwiye BBC Radio 5 Live ati: "Vyamaze kwemezwa. Lionel Messi agiye kuba umukinyi wa PSG. Ni uko. Vyaheze. Haciye iminota mike bibaye". "Muri uno mwanya, abaporisi bari mu kibuga bangana n'abafana. Ibi bigiye guhinduka mu kanya. Hari ama camera umunani, ibi kandi bigiye guhinduka mu kanya. Umengo ni amasezerano y'imyaka ibiri, ashobora kwongerwako n'uwundi umwe". "Icipfuzo ciwe kwari uko yari kugiriranira aya masezerani na Barcelona ariko bigiye kuba muri PSG.  Hanyuma mu gihe azoba yumva ko ata ngorane, kumbure ashobora no kuzokwiyongeza uwundi mwaka. Ariko uko vyogenda kwose, intumbero yiwe ni muri PSG hanyuma yongere arabe ko yovyifatamwo neza mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi yose i Qatar". Nk'umwe mu bakinyi b'ibihangange baranze amateka y'umupira w'amaguru, Messi yinjije ibitsindo 672 mu nkino  778 yakiniye Barcelona, umurwi yari yinjiyemwo afise imyaka 13. Yatsindiye wa mupira w'inzahabu (Ballon d'Or) incuro zitandatu zose, yongera aterura ibikombe 35 vyose muri uyo murwi. Messi agiye gusubira gukinana n'uwo bahoze bari hamwe muri Barcelona Neymar i Parc des Princes - akaba ari umwe mu bakinyi bakomeye  cane bahanzwe amaso muri kahise k'umupira w'amaguru. Kiretse hagize icoza mu nyuma, agiye kuba umukinyi agize kane yinjiye muri PSG atakirinze gusabwa muri rino ci, inyuma y'umukinyi wo hagati Georginio Wijnaldum, umukinyi w'inyuma Sergio Ramos n'umunyegori Gianluigi Donnarumma. Achraf Hakimi, umukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'i buryo na we nyene abonwa nk'igihangange, yarinjiye avuye muri Inter Milan. Messi yari yemeye amasezerano mashasha ngo abandanye akinira Barcelona aho yari yemeye kugabanirizwa ibice 50% vy'umushahara yahora afata, ariko uwo murwi warananiwe no kuyashira mu ngiro kubera wasanze wosanga uri hejuru y'urugero rw'umushahara ntarengwa muri La Liga. Mu gihe bonyarutsa agatera igikumu kuri aya masezerano, ashobora gukina urukino rwa mbere muri PSG ku wa gatandatu igihe uwu murwi uzoba wakira Strasbourg.

headline: US yafuse ibihano ubutegetsi bwa Trump bwafatiye umushikirizamanza mukuru wa CPI / ICC
text: Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zakuyeho ibihano vyari vyafatiwe umushikirizamanza mukuru wa Sentare mpuzamakungu mpanavyaha ( CPI/ICC), Fatou Bensouda. Ibi bihano vyari vyafashwe ku butegetsi bw'uwahoze arongoye iki gihugu Donald Trump inyuma y'aho itangarije ko yari igihe gukora amatohoza ku vyaha vyo mu ntambara vyoba vyarakozwe n'abasirikare ba Amerika muri Afghanistan, hamwe n'incuti ya Amerika Israel mu turere twa Palestina. Igihe yamenyesha iyi ngingo, umunyamabanga wa Reta ajejwe imigenderanire wa Amerika, Antony Blinken, yavuze ko ibi bihano "bitari bikwiye gufatwa kandi ko ataco vyari bimaze", aca asaba ko hoba ugukorera hamwe. Amerika ntiri muri sentare mpuzamakungu mpanavyaha. Amerika kandi yakuye ku rutonde rudasanzwe rw'abantu bakurikiranirwa hagufi Phakiso Mochochoko arongoye igisata ca CPI kijejwe imanza, ubwuzuzanye n'ugufashanya, yongera kandi ifuta ingingo yo kwima impusha zo kwinjira muri Amerika abakozi ba CPI yari yafashwe mu 2019. Blinken yavuze ko Amerika ibandanya "yiyamiriza yivuye inyuma ingingo za CPI ku bijanye n'ivyabereye muri Afghanistan hamwe na Palestine", kandi ko yamirira kure "ingendo ya CPI yo gucira imanza abantu bo mu bihugu bitari muri iyo sentare nka Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika na Israel". Ati: "Hagati aho, twemera ko impungenge zacu kuri ibi bibazo zotorerwa umuti biciye mu gukorana n'abo bose bafise uruhara mu bikorwa vya CPI aho kubicisha mu bihano". Avuga ko Amerika yakiriza yompi impinduka ziriko zirategurwa kugira ngo CPI ifashwe "kwitaho cane gusumba ivya nkenerwa vyayo no gushika ku ntego yayo nyamukuru yo kuba sentare ya nyuma mu guhana no guhagarika ivyaha vy'agahomerabunwa". Mu mwaka uheze, ubutegetsi bwa Trump bwaragirije CPI kuvogera ubusugire bwa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika igihe yatanguza amatohoza ku vyaha vyo mu ntambara bishobora kuba vyarakozwe n'ingazo za Amerika, iz'Abatalibani hamwe n'iza Afghanistani muri Afghanistan. Igihe yatangaza ibi bihano, uwasubiriwe na Blinken, ari we Mike Pompeo, yavuze ko iyi sentare ari "urwego rwapfuye rubi kandi rwamunzwe na ruswa". CPI yishuye ko ibi bihano ari igitero gikozwe ku butungane n'amategeko mpuzamakungu. Umupfasoni Bensouda azorangiza ikiringo ciwe mu kwa gatandatu, akazosubirirwa n'umunyamategeko w'umwongereza Karim Khan asanzwe ari mu baharanira agateka ka kiremwa muntu.

headline: Rwanda-Covid: reta yatezuye ingingo ariko uticandagishije ntugiye kworoherwa
text: Reta y'Urwanda yafashe ingingo zo gutezura amabwirizwa yo gukumira ikiza ca Covid-19, ariko igategeka ko Abanyarwanda n'abandi bose basanzwe baba muri iki gihugu bategerezwa kwicandagisha vyuzuye kugira bemererwe kuja ahahurira abantu benshi. Nk'uko biri mw'itangazo ryasohowe inyuma y'inama nshikirangaji yakoranye  ejo ku wa gatanu, ingingo zaraye zifashwe zitangura gukurikizwa kuva kuri uyu wa 05 Ntwarante (Werurwe mu Kinyarwanda), zikazosubirwamwo inyuma y'ukwezi kumwe "hashingiwe kw'isesengura ry'inzego z'Ubuzima". Amakoraniro rusangi kandi aruguruwe guhera ku wa mbere igenekerezo rya 07 z'uku ariko bikaba ngombwa kwerekana ko bipimishije Covid-19 mu gihe c'amasaha 48 (ni ukuvuga imisi ibiri) imbere yob kuyitabira. Zimwe mu zindi ngingo zafashwe ni uko kuva ku musi wa mbere igenekerezo rya 07 uku kwezi imbibe zo ku butaka zizoba zuguye, ariko bibaye ngombwa ingenzi zibanze gusuzumwa Covid-19 imbere yo kwinjira. Ingendo n'ibikorwa vyose biremerewe kubandanya amasaha 24/24, havuyemwo ibiteramo vy'umuziki, amazu y'ubutambiro, ububare, ibirori vyo kwiyakira (receptions) hamwe n'ibikino vy'akamari (betting) bidategerezwa kurenza isaha umunani z'ijoro. Kwunguruza abantu ku mamodoka rusangi, ku mapikipiki no kumakinga birarekuwe ariko bigasaba ko bene kuvyurira no kubikoresha babanza kwerekana ko bicandagishije. Amanama n'amakoraniro rusangi, amasengero, amazu y'uburiro, nay'ubunywero, ibibanza vy'inkino n'ibigo vy'imyimenyerezo ngororamubiri biremewe, ariko ibi vyose ni ngombwa ko ababijamwo bategerezwa kuba "barikingije Covid-19 mu buryo bwuzuye". Ibigo vy'inzego za reta n'ivy'abikorera utwabo navyo nene biremerewe gukoresha abakozi bavyo bose, ariko ni ngombwa ko abakozi bose bo mu gisata c'abikorera utwabo "baba barikingije Covid-19 mu buryo bwuzuye. Ubushikiranganji bw'ubuzima bushobora kwugara vy'agateganyo inyubakwa zaba iza reta canke iz'abikorera utwabo mu gihe bibonetse ibitigiri binini vy'abanduye Covid-19 , nk'uko iri tangazo rya reta ribivuga. Eka n'bikorwa vyo mu gisata c'ingenzi birabandanya ukuri kwamye ariko reta igasaba ko amabwirizwa yo kwirinda Covid-19 yubahirizwa. Urwanda ni kimwe mu bihugu biri imbere mu gukingira abanyagihugu bavyo muri Africa, kikaba ica mbere mu karere k'ibiyaga binini. Abantu benshi mu Rwanda barikingije ku gushaka kwabo mbere n'abajejwe amagara y'abantu bavuga kwikingiza bikorwa ku gushaka, ariko hari abanyagihugu bamwe mu ntara za ruguru bavuga ko abatabishaka bacandagwa ku ngufu.

headline: Burundi : 17 bapfunzwe bikekwa gushaka kunyaga abanyagihugu mu rudandazwa rw'amafaranga
text: Abantu 17 bo mw'ishirahamwe Crowd1 ricuruza amafaranga ku buhinga ngurukanabumenyi bari mu minwe y'igipolisi bagirizwa gukora inama y'ishirahamwe ritazwi n'amategeko. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'umutekano yabwiye Radio Isanganiro ko abo barobowe mu bandi barenga 300 bari bafashwe bari muri iyo nama ejo ku wa kabiri ku mugoroba n'igipolisi c'u Burundi. Pierre Nkurikiye avugira ubwo bushikiranganji avuga y'uko abo bantu bafashwe n'igipolisi bari mu nama muri zone Rohero mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Avuga ko abari mu minwe y'igipolisi ari abariko bakorwako amatohoza kubijanye n'uko  ishirahamwe Crowd1 ryoba rifise intumbero yo kwiba abanyagihugu. Haciye amezi make ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, igabishije Abarundi kwirinda urudandazwa rw'amafaranga rukorwa biciye mu mihora ngurukanabumenyi bita 'monnaies virtuelles' canke crypto-monnaies. Mw'itangazo yasohoye mu kw'umunani umwaka uheze, BRB yavuze ko urudandazwa rw'amafaranga yo kuri iyo mihora nka Bitcoin, Ether, Litecoin, Onecoin,  Fahari Cash Coin, Ello Cash Coin rutemewe. Jean Ciza, umukuru w'iyo banki, yavuze ko ayo mafaranga akoreshwa mu buryo butagira amategeko bwisunga ahantu na hamwe kw'isi, kuko ngo nta banki n'imwe y'igihugu kw'isi yose irayemera. Ati: "Ivyo bituma ibikorwa muri ayo mafaranga bisa n'ivyo ubusuma…" Abatari bacye muri iki gihe barinjira mu rudandazwa rw'amafaranga mu buryo butandukanye leta z'ibihugu zimwe zivuga ko rutemewe.

headline: Russia yirukanye abakora mu buserukizi bw'ibihugu vy'Ubulayi 'bagiye mu myiyerekano' ya Navalny
text: Uburusiya bwirukanye abakora mu biro vy'ubuserukizi bw'Ubudagi, Suwede na Polonye bagirizwa ko bifatanije n'abari mu myiyerekano yo gushigikira wa munyapolitike atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi Alexei Navalny, yapfunze mu ntango z'iyi ndwi. Umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Uburusiya avuga ko aba batatu bagiye mu "myiyerekano iteye kubiri n'amategeko" ku wa 23 z'ukwa mbere. Ibihugu vyabo biriyamiriza iyi ngingo, co kimwe n'Ubwongereza, Ubufaransa hamwe n'ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Bulaya. Navalny ni umukeba ruhebwa wa Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya. Iyi ngingo yo kwirukana aba bantu yagiye gutangazwa haciye amasaha makeya gusa umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Bulaya, Josep Borrell, abonanye n'umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Uburusiya Sergei Lavrov i Moscou. Ku wa 23 na 31 z'ukwa mbere, abantu ibihumbi amajana n'amajana baragiye mu myiyerekano yo gushigikira Navalny mu gihugu cose. Abaharurwa mu bihumbi barahagaritswe. Ubudagi buriyamiriza iyi ngingo bukavuga ko "ata nsiguro n'imwe ifise" kandi ko idashobora kwijana mu gihe Uburusiya butokwisubirako. Suwede ivuga ko ibivugwa ko umuntu wabo yagiye muri iyo myiyerekano yo ku wa 23 z'ukwa mbere ata shingiro bifise kandi ko ifise uburenganzira bwo gusubiriza mu ndumane Uburusiya. Polonye ivuga ko iyi ngingo yo kwirukana umuntu wayo ishobora gutuma "ibintu vyunyuka mu cuka kibi kiri hagati y'ibihugu vyompi". Josep Borrell, kw'izina ry'ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Bulaya, avuga ko yiyamirije yivuye inyuma iyi ngingo kandi ko yiyamirije ivyo bagirizwa ko bakoze ibikorwa bitajanye n'amabanga yabo nk'abakora mu biro vy'ubuserukizi bw'ibihugu vyabo. Hagati aho, umushikiranganji Lavrov avuga ko ibihano ivyo ari vyo vyose vyofatwa n'Ubulayi ku kibazo ca Navalny vyoba biteye kubiri n'amategeko. Ubudagi na Polonye, bivuga ko vyatumyeko abaserukira Uburusiya muri ibi bihugu vyompi kugira vyerekane impungenge zavyo kuri iyi ngingo yo kwirukana abantu bavyo - ingingo ishobora gutuma haba ukwihora mbere n'abandi bategetsi bo mu biro vy'ubuserukiri bakirukanwa. Mu kwezi kw'umunani kw'umwaka uheze, Alexei Navalny, umunyapolitike w'imyaka 44 anegura bikomeye ubutegetsi bwa Putin, yarahawe isumu  yahatswe kumutwara agatwe, biba ngombwa ko ajanwa kuvurirwa i Berlin mu Budagi. Yagarutse mu mpera z'ukwezi kwa mbere guheze, n'aho yari yagabishijwe n'ubutegetsi bw'Uburusiya ko ashobora guca ahagarikwa. Yaciriwe gupfungwa imyaka itatu n'igice ku birego vy'uko yarenze ku mategeko ajanye no gupfungwa ic'amaso kubera ivyo yagirizwa vya magendo mu 2014. Navalny yagiriza Perezida Putin kurongora ubutegetsi bwamunzwe n'igiturire kandi ko yateguye igitero c'isumu camukozweko kigahakwa kumwica. Haciye akanya gato gusa ashitse mu Burusiya, Navalny yaciye asohora ireresi ku rubuga rwa Youtube yerekana ingoro yubatswe ku kiyaga Cirabura (Mer Noire/Black Sea) avuga ko ari iyo umutunzi ruhebwa w'Umurusiya yagabiye umukuru w'igihugu. Abantu barenga imiliyoni 100 bararavye iyo reresi. Perezida Putin arahakana ko iyi ngoro atari rwiwe. Mu ndwi iheze, umurwizatunga ruhebwa, Arkady Rotenberg yegereye cane Putin, yavuze ko iyi nyubakwa ari rwiwe, ko haciye imyaka ibiri ayiguze. Navalny yiteze gusubira muri sentare ku wa 12 z'uku kwa kabiri yagirizwa gutyoza abakukuruke babiri barwanye intambara ya kabiri y'isi yose.

headline: Burundi – Covid: 'Twahisemwo kuba turatenyenya' ku ncanco
text: Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu mu Burundi avuga ko ico gihugu cahisemwo kubangira ku bijanyanye n'incanco za Covid-19 zatanguye gutangwa  mu bihugu bitari bike birimwo n'ivyo mu karere. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru harangiye inama y'umugwi ujejwe kurwanya ikiza ca Covid-19 mu Burundi, Ministre Thadée Ndikumana yamenyesheje kandi ko abandura n'abarwara iyo ndwara ubu bagabanutse ugereranije no mu ntango z'uyu mwaka. Asaba abantu kwipimisha iyo biketseko ibimenyetso vya corona, aha akanegura abantu bize ngo bateba kuja kwipimisha. Mu gihe umwaka uri hafi guhera hatowe umuntu wa mbere yanduye umugera wa corona, umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu mu Burundi avuga ko abamaze kwandura bose ari 2618, abamaze gupfa ni 6, abari ku miti ubu ni  192. Ku bahitanwa n'iyo ndwara, umushikiranganji avuga ko hatangazwa ibiharuro vy'ababa bipimishije  bagatorwa corona, bakavurwa mu nyuma bigashika bagapfa. Ni mu gihe bivugwa ko abamaze kwicwa na corona mu Burundi bashobora kuba barenga kure abo batandatu bazwi  ku mugaragro. Ministre Thadée Ndikumana avuga ko ku bayirwaye, abashika 96 kw'ijana bayikira. Yamenyesheje kandi aho reta y'Uburundi ihagaze ku kibazo c'inkingo zatanguye gutangwa mu bihugu vyinshi vyo kw'si harimwo n'ibihugu bibanyi nk'u Rwanda, Uganda na Kenya. Yagize ati: "Ku bisanzwe abakoze zirya ncanco barafise  umwanya, ico bita recul, wo kuraba ko ata ngaruka mbi canke nziza urucanco rugirira uwo baruteye. "Nabo nta recul bariha... rero igihugu cose kiraraba kiti twoba turazikoresheje mu kurindirako ubushakashatsi bubandanya... Turavye rero ngaha mu Burundi ibitigiri vy'abashobora gukira, twavuze tuti tube turatenyenya, ntitwanse incanco". Ministre Ndikumana asaba abantu kubandanya kwubahiriza ingingo zo kwirinda kwandura no kwanduza, no kunyaruka kwipimisha iyo biketseko ibimenyetso. Aranegura abantu bize avuga ko baja  kwipimisha batevye bigaca bigora kubavura. Ikindi  anegura cane, ni bimwe mu bitaro vyigenga  avuga ko vyihutira gukora ibipimo vy'amafaranga menshi  cane hakubanza gukoresha uburyo bworoshe kandi burihwa na reta, bikaja kwibaza gupima corona ari uko umuntu amaze gusinzikara. Ati: "Ugasanga abantu aho kumugirira test rapide [igipimo cihuta] acinjira, yoroshe, atariha, ugasanga bamugiriye scanner ...y'ibihumbi amajana atatu...birababaje". Avuga ko agiye kugira inama na bene ivyo bitaro kugira bibukanye ingene ibintu vyokorwa neza gusumba.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru kuri uyu wa kane 01/08/201: Dybala, Pepe, Coutinho, Rugani, Koscielny, Sane
text: Manchester United  irabandanya yihweza ingene yoronka umunya Argentine Paulo Dybala, w'imyaka 25, yitezwe gushika muri iyi ndwi mu murwi Juventus asanzwe akinamwo kugira avugane nawo kuri kazoza kiwe. (Manchester Evening News) Dybala yabwiye Manchester ko itegerezwa kumuha umushahara ungana n'ibihumbi 350 vy'ama pawundi mu gihe yoba imwipfuza.  (Mail) Umukuru w'umurwi Lille wo mu Bufaransa, Gerard Lopez, aremeza ko umukinyi wa Côte d'Ivoire Nicolas Pépé w'imyaka 24 azogurishwa muri Arsenal ku miliyoni 80 z'ama euro (angana na pawundi 73). (RMC Sport - in French) Umurwi Napoli  uriteguye gutanga imiliyoni 60 z'amapawundi  ku mukinyi wa Côte d'Ivoire Wilfried Zaha asanzwe akina muri Crystal Palace, inyuma y'aho vyankiye ko uronka umukinyi Pepe. (Mail) Umurwi Barcelona uripfuza kugurisha umukinyi wo hagati w'umunya Brezili, Philippe Coutinho w'imyaka 27, ariko ingorane ukaba utarabona umurwi umurondera. (ESPN) Everton iriko ikora hasi hejuru kugira ngo ironke umukinyi w'umunya Côte d'Ivoire, Jean-Phillipe Gbamin w'imyaka 23, asanzwe akina mu murwi Mainz. (Liverpool Echo) Arsenal  iriko irarondera ko yotizwa mu kiringo c'imyaka ibiri umukinyi w'inyuma w'umutaliyano Daniele Rugani w'imyaka 25 asanzwe akina mu murwi Juventus. (Gazzetta dello Sport, via Sun) Kizigenza w'umurwi Arsenal, umufaransa Laurent Koscielny w'imyaka 33, aracahagaze ku cipfuzo ciwe co kugenda n'aho hari ibiganiro hagati yiwe n'uyo murwi.  (Independent) Arsenal iriteguye muri rino ci kugurisha umukinyi w'inyuma, umudagi Shkodran Mustafi w'imyaka 27, ariko umurwi Roma umurondera ukaba utaramusaba.  (Romanews, via Star) Uwujejwe ukwinonora imitsi mu murwi Bayern Munich usanzwe ufise igikombe c'Ubudagi, Hasan Salihamidzic, avuga ko Manchester City ikwiye gusabwa imbabazi inyuma y'aho umumenyereza Niko Kovac atangarije ko uyo murwi wari witguye kugura umukinyi Leroy Sane, umudagi w'imyaka 23. (Sport Bild - in German) Ubu rero uwo murwi wanditse umenyesha ko wipfuza kugura Sane, ukaba mbere wanamushikirije urwandiko rumwereka ibijanye n'ivyo Bayern yipfuza kuri uyo mukinyi. (Bild+) Umurwi Zenit St Petersburg witeze gutangaza ko waguze umukinyi wo kuruhande wa, Barcelona, umunya Brezili Malcolm w'imyaka 22, inyuma y'aho  iyo mirwi yompi yumvikanye  ku kiguzi cimiliyoni hafi 36,5 y'amapawundi. (Goal) Manchester United iriteguye guhangana na Barcelona muri rino ci mu kurondera umukinyi w'imbere w'umufaransa Isaac Lihadji w'imyaka 17. (La Provence, via Mail) Manchester United yashitse ku masezerano y'ugushobora kugura umukinyi wo hagati muri Monaco, umufaransa Hannibal Mejbri w'imyaka 16, ku giciro c'imiliyoni icenda z'amapawundi. (Mail) Everton ni umwe mu mirwi isanzwe iriko irondera ko yotizwa umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea, Fikayo Tomori w'imyaka 2. (Evening Standard) Marco Verratti  asanzwe akinana na Neymar mu murwi Paris St-Germain avuga ko uyo murwi ukwiye kugurisha uyo mukinyi mugenziwe w'umunya Brezili w'imyaka 27 mu gihe vyoboneka ko atipfuza kubandanya awukinira, n'aho umumenyereza wawo Thomas Tuchel yipfuza ko Neymar aguma muri uwo murwi. (Express) Uwahoze ari umukinyi w'inyuma wa Barcelona, Carles Puyol w'imyaka 41, avuga ko umurwi Real Madrid wamurondeye incuro zibiri zose ariko akanka. (AS in Spanish) Umumenyereza w'umurwi Rangers, Steven Gerrard, aremeza ko utwigoro tw'ukurondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Liverpool Ryan Kent w'imyaka 22 ataco twashitseko kandi ko udafise ubushobozi bwo gushobora kumugura burundu. (Daily Record) Biragaragara ko umukinyi Danny Drinkwater yiteguye kuguma muri Chelsea mw'ihiganwa ryimirije mu gihe uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 29 atararonka umurwi umwipfuza. (Evening Standard)

headline: US: Umuganga w'umwirabure yishwe na Covid avuga azize ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba
text: Umuganga w'umwiraburekazi mu gisagara ca Indianapolis yishwe na Covid-19 haciye indwi nkeya yagirije umuganga w'umuzungu ko yanse kumuvura kubera ibara ry'urukoba rwiwe. Mw'ireresi yasohoye ari mu bitaro vy'ishure kaminuza ya Indiana, Susan Moore yavuze ko yarinze  "kwitakambira" ngo avurwe. Mu guhoza umuryango wabuze, abarongoye ibitaro bavuga ko bafashe nka nkama ibi birego vy'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ariko ntaco bavuze ku barwayi bandi boba bashobora kuba bahura n'ibi bibazo. Muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Abirabure nibo babangamiwe cane na Covid gusumba Abazungu, nk'uko ubushakashatsi buvyerekana. Muganga Moore w'imyaka 52, yapfiriye ku rindi vuriro ku wa Mungu. Mu butumwa yari yanditse ku rubuga rwa Facebook ku wa 04 z'uku, asigura ukuntu umuganga avuga ko yari umuzungu yirengagije ububabare bwiwe, mu gihe yariko arira atakamba kandi vyanka n'uko ahema. Yanditse ati: "Nta n'uko yumva amaborogo y'amahaha yanje, ntiyigeze ankorakora kugira anyumvirize. Yaranse no kumfata ibipimo. Namubwiye nti 'we ntushobora kwibaza ingene merewe'." Itangazo ryasohowe n'ibi bitaro rivuga riti: "Nk'ishirahamwe ryiyemeje guharanira uburinganire n'ukurwanya ubusumbasumbane bushingiye ku rukoba mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu, dufashe nka nkama cane ibirego vy'ivanguramoko kandi tugiye gukora amatohoza". "Turishimiye ukwitanga n'ubuhinga bw'abakozi bacu n'ingene bitaho neza abarwayi bacu imisi yose". 'Uku niko abirabire bicwa' Muganga Moore yatowe Covid ku wa 29 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe, akaba yajanywe mu bitaro amenetse umutwe cane kandi akorora amaraso, vyanka n'uko ahema. Ariko, n'aho na we nyene yari umuganga, yavuze ko vyagoranye kugira ngo yakirwe. Muganga Moore yavuze ko yatakamvye asaba ko bomuha wa muti wo kurwanya imigera, Remdesivir, kandi ko bomupima mu gikiriza. Yavuze ko uyo muganga w'umuzungu igihe kimwe yamubwiye ko ata burenganzira afise bwo guhabwa uwo muti, amutegeka gutaha. Ku rubuga rwa Facebook, Muganga Moore yagize ati: "Yantumye numva ko umengo nsa n'umuntu afata ibiyayuramutwe. Ariko kandi yari azi ko ndi umuganga. Nta biyayuramutwe mfata, kandi nari mu bubabare budasanzwe". Muganga Moore avuga ko yari yasavye umwunganirizi mu vyo ubuvuzi, kandi ko yari yasavye y'uko yopfuma arungikwa kuvurirwa ahandi. Yahavuye arekurwa arataha, ariko biba ngombwa ko asubizwayo haciye amasaha makeya gusa bisubiye kwanka. Muganga Moore ati: "Uku niko abirabure bicwa. Iyo ubarungitse muhira kandi badashobora kuronka ingene birwanira". Muri ubwo butumwa, yaranditse avuga ko umuyobozi mukuru w'ivyo bitaro yari yavuze ko abakozi bari guhabwa inyigisho ku bijanye n'ubutandukane bw'abantu. Hagati aho, uyu muganga w'umuzungu yagirijwe ntiyigeze asaba imbabazi nk'uko yari yavyemeye. Muganga Moore yabandanije avuga ati: "Jewe mvuga, kandi mbandanya ndabivuga, ko iyaba nari umuzungu, ibi bibazo ntavyo nari kugira". Ivyabaye kuri Muganga hamwe n'urupfu rwiwe vyarateje induru nyinshi ku bijanye n'ibibazo vy'ivanguramoko bihanze abirabure ba Amerika mu bijanye n'ubuvuzi. Uwu mugera urasinzikaje cane abirabure n'izindi nkehwa muri Amerika. Abirabure muri Amerika bafise igihamana kibi co guhitanwa n'uwu mugera ku ncuro zitatu zose gusumba abazungu.

headline: India: Umupatiri n’umubikira bakatiwe guherayo bagirizwa kugandagura uwundi mubikira
text: Umupatiri w'umugatorika n'umubikira bo mu Buhindi baciriwe umunyororo w'ubuzima bwose bagiriwe n'icaha co kugandagura uwundi mubikira, haraciye  imyaka irenga 28. Patiri Thomas Kottoorna hamwe n'Umubikira Sephy baciriwe urubanza ku wa kabiri bagiriwe kwica uwundi mubikira yari afise imyaka 21, Umubikira Abhaya mu 1992, maze baca bazimanganya ivyemezo vy'ubu bwicanyi. Aba bantu babiri bagandaguye uyu mubikira mu gihe yari abafashe bari mu busambanyi. Mu ntango, igiporisi cari cibajije ko uyu mubikira yari akiri muto yoba yariyahuye. Ariko haciye hatangura amatohoza yimbitse inyuma y'aho umuryango wiwe n'abaharanira agateka ka muntu berekaniye amakenga ku rupfu rwiwe. Sephy w'imyaka  55 ntaco aravuga kuri uru rubanza, ariko Patiri Kottoor ubu afise imyaka 69 ashimangira ko ari umwere. Ejo k uwa gatatu asomewe urwo rubanza, yabwiye ibinyamakuru vyo muri ici o gihugu ati: "Jewe nta caha nakoze. Imana iri kumwe nanje". Hari uwundi mupatiri agira gatatu, Patiri Jose Poothrikkayil, na we yagirijwe n'abashikirizamanza ko yasambanije Umubikira Sephy. Yarahagaitswe mu 2008 kuri ubu bwicanyi ariko mu nyuma ararekurwa kubera habuze ivyemezo. Ikiziga c'uyu mubikira Abhaya catowe mu kinogo hafi y'uburaro bw'ababikira bwitiriwe umweranda Piyo mu gisagara ca Kottayam kiri mu bumanuko bw'Ubuhindi. Sentare yavuze ko imbere y'uko yicwa, Abhaya yaravyutse mu gaturuturu ku wa 27 z'ukwa gatatu 1992, aja mu gikoni c'ubwo buraro bw'ababikira agiye gutora amazi yari muri firigo. Mu gihe yashika mu gikoni, yafashe mpiri Kottoor na Sephy. Sentare ivuga ko ku gutinya ko yohava abamenera ibanga, baciye bamwica hanyuma banyegeza ikiziga. Amatohoza ku rupfu rw'uyu mubikira yari akiri muto yarabaye ikibazo ngorabahizi mu Buhindi. Mu ntango, igiporisi c'akarere n'ic'igihugu vyari vyavuze ko yari yariyahuye. Ariko, mu 1993, ikigo c'Ubuhindi kijejwe igendereza (Central Bureau of Investigation, CBI) caciye gifata mu minwe iki kibazo, maze gisanga yarishwe, ariko nticashoka gitora abamugandaguye. Kw'itegeko rya sentare nkuru y'igihugu mu 2008, CBI yaciye isubira kwugurura amatohoza, irahagarika yongera iragiriza Kottoor, Sephy na Patiri Jose Poothrikkayil, ariko mu nyuma bararekuwe batanze ingwati. Niho haca hakurikira urubanza rwamaze igihe kirekire. Jomon Puthenpurackal aharanira agateka ka zina muntu akaba ari mu baharaniye ko uwakoze aka kabi kabishe akubitwa intahe mu gahanga avuga ati: "Ubutungane burarenganuye Umubikira Abhaya. Agiye kwiruhukira mu mahoro".

headline: Ebola: DR Congo yatanguje isekeza ryo gucandaga i Butembo
text: Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo yatanguje isekeza ryo gucandaga abanyagihugu bo mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu inyuma y'aho ikiza ca Ebola gisubiriye kwibonekeza muri ako karere nk'uko bivugwa n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO. DR Congo itangaza ko abantu bane ari bo bamaze kwanduka Ebola kuva gisubiriye kwibonekeza ku wa 07 z'ukwa kabiri  mu karere ka Butembo. OMS ivuga ko abakozi bo ku kigo c'ubuvuzi muri ako karere habonetsemwo umuntu wa mbere yayanduye ari bo bahereyeko gucandaga. Aya makuru aje haciye umusi umwe gusa igihugu ca Guinée kiri mu burengero bwa Afrika gitangaje ko catewe  n'iki kiza. Ikiza ca Ebola muri DR Congo cari catangajwe ko carangiye mu kwa gatandatu kw'umwaka uheze wa 2020. Cari cahitanye abantu 2.287 kuva mu kwa munani 2018. Doze zishika 8.000 z'urucanco rwa Ervebo, zari zasigaye igihe iki kiza gitangazwa ko carangiye, nizo ziriko  ziratangwa muri rino sekeza, nk'uko bivugwa n'umunyamakuru wa BBC akorera i Kinshasa Emery Makumeno . Ervebo ni rwo rucanco rwa Ebola rwemejwe ubwa mbere n'ikigo ca Amerika kijejwe imiti n'imfungurwa (FDA) mu kwa cumi na kabiri 2019. Ku wa Mungu, Guinée yatangaje ko ikiza ca Ebola casubiye gutera muri ico gihugu, inyuma y'aho habonekeye abantu indwi banduye hamwe na batatu cahitanye. Batanguye bacibwamwo, badahwa kandi bava amaraso inyuma y'aho bitabiriye igikorwa co gufuba umubikira hafi y'igisagara ca Nzérékoré kiri mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bw'ico gihugu. Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP risubiramwo Alfred George Ki-Zerbo, aserukira OMS muri Guinée aho avuga ati: "OMS iri maso kandi iriko iravugana n'ihinguriro ry'urucanco kugira ngo haboneke doze zikenewe kugira ngo tukirwanye amazi atararenga inkombe". Hagati ya  2013 na 2016, abarenga 11.000 nibo bahitanywe n'ikiza ca Ebola mu burengero bwa Afrika cari catanguriye muri Guinée nyene. Umukuru w'igihugu wa Liberia George Weah yasavye abajejwe amagara y'abantu kumera magabo kugira ngo ico kiza ntigihave kibinjirana. Umunyamakuru wa BBC muri Sierra Leone, Umaru Fofana, avuga ko mu gihugu abanyagihugu bafitiye ubwoba Ebola gusumba Covid-19. Avuga ko kuba hari incanco nshasha bibaha umwizero  - ni mu gihe hari doze 500.000 zategekanijwe mu runani mpuzamakungu rw'incanco, Gavi. Ibi bihugu bitatu bifise abantu baharurwa muri miriyoni 22,5, ibitera impungenge ko abahingura izi ncanco bashobora kutaronka umwanya uhagije wo gukora izindi ncanco mu gihe zokenerwa kubera ubu hagezweho incanco za Covid, nk'uko uyu munyamakuru abivuga. Ebola ni iki?

headline: Pierre Buyoya yahoze arongoye Uburundi yashinguwe uyu musi i Bamako muri Mali
text: Pierre Buyoya yarongoye Uburundi incuro zibiri akaba aheruka gushengera ku myaka 71 uyu munsi yashinguwe ku mugwa mukuru wa Mali, Bamako, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibimenyeshamakuru vyo muri iki gihugu. Imisa yo kumusezera muri Grande Cathedrale de Bamako, yitabiriwe n'abo mu muryango wiwe, intumwa zaserukiye leta ya Mali, n'izaserukiye Ubumwe bw'Afrika eka n'abahagarariye ibihugu vyabo muri Mali. Nta baserukiye reta y'Uburundi barungitswe mu birori vyo kumushingura nk'uko ibinyamakuru byo muri Mali bibivuga. Reta y'i Gitega ntiraba ryiza uyu muhisi. Hanyuma yashinguwe mw'itongo ry'abapfuye rya Ekleziya Gatolika i Bamako. Buyoya yatwaye Uburundi mu 1987 - 1993 na 1996 - 2003 hose afashe ubutegetsi ku nguvu, intwaro yiwe ikaba itavugwako rumwe. Mu 1993 yatsinzwe mu matora n'umuhisi Perezida Melchior Ndadaye, yemeye aho intahe ishize atanga ubutegetsi mu mahoro. Mu kwezi kwa 10 uyu mwaka yakatiwe umunyororo wo guherayo na sentare mu Burundi, yagirizwa uruhara mw'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye mu 1993. We yahakana ivyo yagirijwe akavuga ko urwo ari urubanza rufise imvo za politike. Mu kwezi guheze yavuze ko 'yatanze imihoho kugira aronke umwanya wo kweza izina ryiwe'. Haciye indwi zirenga gatoya zibiri Buyoya yarashengeye giturumbuka, umuntu umwe wo muryango wiwe yabwiye BBC ko yahitanywe na Covid-19 kandi ko yaguye i Paris mu Bufaransa. Hari ababona Buyoya nk'uwahisemwo inzira y'amahoro ku Burundi, akemera amasezerano ya Arusha akarekura ubutegetsi ku neza mu 2003. Hanyuma y'ibi akagirwa intumwa idasanzwe y'Ubumwe bwa Afrika mu bikorwa vyo kugarukana amahoro muri Sahel. Uyu munsi, i Bujumbura naho nyene habaye imisa yo kumusezera.

headline: Malawi irasaba Tyson kuyibera intumwa ku giterwa c'urumogi
text: Umushikiranganji wa Malawi ajejwe uburimyi yandikiye rurangiranwa mu gukubitana ingu mu mugwi w'abaremereye cane Mike Tyson amusaba kuba intumwa y'ico gihugu ku giterwa c'urumogi. Umushikiranganji Lobin Lowe avuga ko amategeko agenga urumogi yemejwe mu mwaka uheze muri Malawi yatanze akaryo kubaba mu gihugu hagati no kw'isi yose. Uwo mushikiranganji yavuze ko ishirahamwe ry'urumogi muri Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ryafashije gushika ku masezerano na Tyson. Lowe yanditse ati:"Malawi ishobora kutikorana yonyene kuko ivyerekeye ico giterwa kigoye bikaba bikenewe gukorera hamwe. Nshobora rero kukugena wewe Tyson, nk'intumwa iserukira igisata c'urumogi rwo muri Malawi." Tyson kandi ni umugwizatunga akaba yarashize n'umutahe mw'irima ry'urumogi. Ibinyamakuru vyo muri marawi vyanditse ko Tyson yari yitezwe muri Malawi mu ndwi iheze ariko ko urugendo rwiwe rwungururijwe ku rindi sango. Urumogi rwo muri Malawi, na cane cane uruzwi kw'izina ry'inzahabo ya Malawi, rufatwa n'abarunywa mu kwinezereza nka rumwe mu ruryoshe cane.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru i Bulaya 06/08/2019: Zaha, Eriksen, Rooney, Pogba, Koscielny
text: Everton yegeranije imiliyoni 100 z'amapawundi kugira ngo ishobore kugura umukinyi Wilfried Zaha w'imyaka 26 asanzwe akinira Crystal Palace, ishizeko abakinyi Cenk Tosun, umunya Turukiya akina imbere, be na James McCarthy, umunya Ireland akina hagati, bompi bafise imyaka 28. (Sun) Uyo mukinyi mpuzamakungu Zaha wa Côte d'Ivoire yitezwe muri Everton mu mpera z'ikiringo c'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi, Palace ikaba yitezwe kwemera kumutanga  ku miliyoni 65 z'amapawundi.  (Independent) Juventus iriko itegura gutanga abakinyi batatu ikabaguza n'umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United Paul Pogba w'imyaka 26 asanzwe anakinira n'umurwi w'Ubufaransa. (Mirror) Manchester United iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano n'umukinyi Christian Eriksen wa Tottenham akomoka muri Danemark, inyuma y'aho umunya Portugali Bruno Fernandes w'imyaka 24 asanzwe akina muri Sporting Lisbon - uwundi yariko aronderwa na Man United - amenyeshereje ko yipfuza kwinjira muri Tottenham. (AS) Tottenham iriko yitegurira ko imirwi y'i Bulaya itanga ibiciro vyo hasi ku mukinyi wo hagati Eriksen mu gihe uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 27 atoshobora kugurishwa imbere yo ku munsi wa kane aho ikiringo c'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi muri Premier League kizoba kirangiye.  (Telegraph) Burnley iriko irondera umukinyi yahoze akina muri Man United kandi yabaye na kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza Wayne Rooney asanzwe akina muri DC United muri Amerika. Uyo mukinyi w'imbere w'imyaka 33 aherutse kugiriranira ibiganiro na Derby County imurondera nk'umukinyi n'umumenyereza. (Burnley Express) Leicester City ntizoshobora kugura umukinyi w'inyuma Nathan Aké w'imyaka 24 muri kino kiringo c'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi, mu gihe Bournemouth imushakako igiciro c'imiliyoni 75 z'amapawundi. (Sky Sports) Arsenal yagerageje kwumvikana na kizigenza wayo Laurent Koscielny, ariko uyo mukinyi w'inyuma w'imyaka 33 yanse kujana na Arsenal mu nkino z'imyiteguro, yaranse ibiganiro. (Mirror) Arsenal  ishobora kuronderera muri RB Leipzig  ku mukinyi w'inyuma w'Umufaransa Dayot Upamecano w'imyaka 20, mu kibanza c'umukinyi wa Juventus Daniele Rugani - ariko intambamyi ikaba ari igiciro c'imiliyoni 50 z'amapawundi imuronderako.  (Mirror) Wolves imaze gutanga igiciro c'imiliyoni 30 z'amapawundi isaba uyo mukinyi w'umutaliyano Rugani. (Times) Norwich City  iripfuza umukinyi w'Umwongereza Danny Drinkwater w'imyaka 29 asanzwe akinira Chelsea, aboneka nk'umuzigo i Stamford Bridge. (Mail) Bournemouth  iri hafi gushika ku masezerano n'umurwi Liverpool, kugira ngo ushobore kuyitiza umukinyi wo ku ruhande Harry Wilson w'imyaka 22 akomoka muri Pays des Galles. (Mail) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Tottenham Jan Vertonghen w'imyaka 32 akomoka mu Bubiligi, ashimangira ko yishimiye kuguma muri uyo murwi w'i Londres, mu gihe asigaje umwaka umwe gusa ngo amasezerano afitaniye nawo arangire. (Goal.com) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester City, Fernandinho w'imyaka 34 akomoka muri Brezili, aremeza ko ashobora kuzokinishwa ku ruhande rw'inyuma mu nkino zimwe zimwe, inyuma y'aho haziye umukinyi Rodri w'imyaka 23 akomoka muri Espanye avuye muri Atletico Madrid. (Manchester Evening News)

headline: Umunyarwandakazi Isabelle Kamariza ku rutonde rwa Forbes
text: Umunyarwandakazi Isabelle Kamariza ari ku rutonde rw'ikinyamakuru co muri Amerika, gitanga udushimwe, Forbes. Ni urutonde rw'abagore 8 ba mbere muri Afrika, baranzwe n'ibikorwa bihindura ubuzima bw'abandi cane cane abari mu bibazo bakeneye gufashwa. Isabelle Kamariza yashimwe kubera ikigo ciwe 'SolidAfrica', kigemurira abarwayi badashobora kwifungurira mu bitaro bine mu Rwanda. Yavuganye na Florentine Kwizera, atangura amubaza uko yakiriye ako gashimwe (umviriza aho hejuru).

headline: Abahitanywe na Covid-19 bamaze kurenga imiriyoni zitatu kw'isi
text: Abantu bamaze guhitanwa na ca kiza karanda ca Covid-19 kw'isi barenze imiriyoni zitatu, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishure kaminuza Johns Hopkins rikurikiranira hagufi iki kiza. Ibi bimeze uku mu gihe umukuru w'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, agabisha ko isi "iriko yegereza igitigiri kitari bwabeho c'abandura" gushika ubu. Ubuhindi - igihugu gihanzwe n'ubwoko bugira kabiri bwa coronavirus - catangaje ko abantu barenga 230.000 ari bo banduye ku musi w'ejo wa gatandatu wonyene. Hafi abantu imiriyoni 140 nibo bamaze kwandura uwu mugera kuva wadutse. Ku wa gatanu, Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus arongoye OMS yagabishije ko "ibitigiri vy'abandura n'abapfa bibandanya biduga ku rugero ruteye ubwoba". Yongerako y'uko "mu mezi abiri aheze, ibitigiri vy'abandura ku ndwi vyiyongereye hafi incuro zibiri kw'isi". Ishure kaminuza Johns Hopkins rivuga ko Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Ubuhindi na Brezil - ibihugu bifise abanduye benshi gusumba ibindi kw'isi - vyonyene biteranije ibitigiri vy'abamaze guhitanwa n'uwo mugera barenga umuriyoni. Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP rivuga ko mu ndwi iheze, abantu bashika 12.000 kw'isi yose bahitanye n'iki kiza. Hagati aho, ibitigiri bitangwa n'ibihugu vyinshi kw'isi bishobora kuba atari vyo. Amadoze arenga imiriyoni 800 y'incanco za coronavirus aramaze guhabwa abantu mu bihugu 165 kw'isi yose. Hagati aho, Dr Tedros yabwiye abategetsi ba ONU ku wa gatanu ati: "Ubusumbasumbane mu bijanye no kuronswa incanco nico kibazo nyamukuru muri kino gihe - kandi turiko turananirwa". Ibihugu bimwe biramaze kuronka no gucandaga abanyagihugu bavyo batari bake. Ivyo bihugu bifise ibitigiri binini vy'abanyagihugu bavyo bamaze gucandagwa, aha harimwo nk'Ubwongereza na Israel, bifise agahengwe kuko ibitigiri vy'abandura vyagabanutse cane rwose. Abahinga bo kw'ishure kaminuza  Imperial College London bavuga ko isekeza ry'ugucandaga ririko riragabanya abandura, abapfa n'abinjizwa ibitaro. Muri iyi ndwi, umuganga akomeye w'umunya Israel yavuze  y'uko yemera ko Israel - aho abarenga igice c'abanyagihugu bose bamaze gucandagwa - iri mu gushika ku rugero rw'aho igihugu cose kizoba gikingiwe. Ibi rero biri uko mu gihe hari ibihugu vyinshi bikirindiriye kuronswa incanco za mbere. Ibi nivyo vyatumye OMS igabisha ko hari ubusumbasumbane mu kuronswa incanco, aho biboneka ko zitariko zitangwa ku rugero rumwe hagati y'ibihugu bitunze n'ibikenye. Dr Tedros avuga ko mu bihugu bitunze, ica kane (1/4) c'abanyagihugu bamaze gucandagwa, mu gihe mu bihugu bikenye ari umwe ku bantu amajana ane (1/400). OMS iriko ikorana n'umugambi mpuzamakungu covax, mu guhimiriza ko ibihugu bitunze vyosangiza incanco ibihugu bikenye. Gushika mu mpera z'unwo mwaka, covax itegekanya ko yoba imaze gutanga imiriyaridi zibiri z'amadoze kw'isi yose, gusa incanco zimwe zisaba ko umuntu aterwa doze zibiri. Abahinga kandi bafise impungenge ku kuntu izi ncanco ziriko ziratangwa ubu zidashobora kurwanya ubwoko bushasha bw'iyi ndwara bukwirakwira ku muvuduko udasanzwe. Hariko harakorwa ubushakashatsi kugira ngo incanco zisubirwemwo kugira zishobore kurwanya ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera. Prof. Adam Finn ari mu murwi w'Ubwongereza ujejwe incanco (JCVI), avuga ko yiteze ko incanco zigiye kugenda zita inguvu buke buke uko uwu mugera uzogenda uhinduka.

headline: US na China vyoba bitera bija mu ntambara kubera Taiwan?
text: Inyuma y’indwi nkeya umukuru wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika agabishije Ubushinwa kuri Taiwan, Pékin iriyamiriza bikomeye aya majambo, ivuga ko izorwanya n’inguvu zayo zose iciyumviro ico ari co cose c’ukwikukira kwa Taiwan. Ku wa Mungu, umushikiranganji w’Ubushinwa ajejwe kwivuna abansi Jenerali Wei Fenghe yaragirije cane cane Amerika ko ishigikiye ukwikukira kw’iri zinga, avuga ko iriko “irahonyanga ivyo yiyemeje kuri Taiwan” no “kwivanga” mu bibazo vy’Ubushinwa. Ari mw’ikoraniro Shangri-la Dialogue, ikoraniro ryiga ku bijanye n’umutekano wa Aziya ririko ribera muri Singapour, yavuze ati: “Reka ntomore iki kintu neza: mu gihe hogira umuntu uwo ari we wese yohirahira gutandukanya Taiwan akayikura ku Busshinwa, ntituzohingitanya kurwana. "Tuzorwana n’inguvu zacu zose gushika ku wa nyuma. Aya niyo mahirwe yonyene y’Ubushinwa”. Avuze aya majambo inyuma y’ubutumwa Perezida Joe Biden aherutse guha Ubushinwa ko buriko “bufyina ahafyikiye” mu kugururira indege zabwo hafi ya Taiwan. Yiyemeje ko azokingira iri zinga mu gihe ryoramuka ritewe. Taiwan, izinga ryifata nk’igihugu cigenga, yamye irwanirwa n’Ubushinwa. Ariko Taiwan kandi igendera kuri Amerika nk’incuti yayo ya hafi gusumba, mu gihe Washington ifise itegeko riyisaba gufasha iri zinga kwivuna umwansi. Ivyo guterana amajambo vyagiye kwunyuka igihe Ubushinwa burungitse indege z’intambara mu kirere ca Taiwan – mu gasotoro kanini cane muri uno mwaka, aha hakaba hari mu kwezi guheze – mu gihe Amerika nayo yarungitse amato y’intambara mu mazi ya Taiwan. None ubwo Amerika n’Ubushinwa vyoba biriko bitera bija mu mishamirano ya gisirikare? Hari ubwoba bwinshi ko hashobora kwaduka intambara mu gihe Ubushinwa bwotera Taiwan. Pékin yarigeze kuvuga ko izokwisubiza iri zinga hakoreshejwe inguvu bibaye ngombwa. Ariko abihweza ibintu n’ibindi babona ko ibi bidashoboka  - muri iki gihe. Hari impari nimba Ubushinwa koko bufise inguvu za gisirikare zihagije kugira ngo ikore igitero, mu gihe Taiwan ibandanya yegeranya inguvu zo mu kirere no mu mazi. Ariko abenshi baremera ko Pékin izi neza ko yohahombera cane kandi ko vyotera akaga – atari ku Bushinwa gusa, ariko no kw’isi yose. "Hari vyinshi bivugwa, ariko Abashinwa bategerezwa kuhagabira cane nu gihe boba bategura gutera Taiwan, cane cane ko ari ikibazo cegeranye n’ica Ukraine. Ubutunzi bw’Ubushinwa burafitaniye isano rinini cane n’ubutunzi bw’isi gusumba uko ubwo Uburusiya bumeze”, ibi bikaba bivugwa na William Choong wo mu kigo gikurikirana ibibazo vyo mu karere ka Aziya y’ubumanuko bushira ubuseruko (Institute of Southeast Asian Studies). Ubushinwa bubandanya busaba ko “busubirana na Taiwan mu mahoro” – ico Jenerali Wei yashimitseko ku wa Mungu – kandi ko buzofata ingingo mu gihe gusa bwosotorwa. Rero icotuma umuriro waka ni uko Taiwan itangaza ku mugaragaro ko yikukiye. Ariko iki nico Perezida Tsai Ing-wen azibira, n’aho yama avuga ko ari igihugu cigenga. Abanya - Taiwan hafi bose barashigikiye iki ciyumviro, ko ibintu vyoguma uko biri, n’aho hari inkehwa bavuga ko bashaka gushika ku bwigenge. Ariko kandi, ni nk’uko Amerika idashaka kwinjizwa mu ntambara yotuma ikoresha uburyo bwinshi bwa gisirikare muri Aziya, kandi ibandanya ivuga ko itipfuza intambara. Umunyamabanga wa reta ajejwe kwivuna abansi, Lloyd Austin nawe nyene akaba yaritavye iri koraniro, mw’ijanbo yashikirije yavuze ko Amerika idashigikiye ukwikukira kwa Taiwan, kandi ko idakeney “intambara nshasha y’ukwikekana [Guerre froide/Cold War]). Collin Koh, umushakashatsi kw’ishure S Rajaratnam School of International Studies  avuga ati: "Impande zompi ntizirota zidegura ku kibazo ca Taiwan. "Ariko bategerezwa kuraba neza, na rirya batagomba kuboneka ko ari bo batuma ibintu bisubira inyuma”. “Ariko aho nyene kandi, barazi neza  ko bitokworoha mu gihe boja mu ntambara yeruye. "Bariko barabana ku jisho ivyo umwe wese avuga, kandi buri ruhande ruriko rugerageza kworosha ibintu”. Kubona Jen Wei na Austin babonana ukwabo mw’ikoraniro Shangri-la Dialogue cabaye ikintu ciza, kuko bisigura ko impande zompi zishaka kwerekana ko “bagishaka kwicara bakabiganirako, bagashika mu masezerano, bakemera ko hari ivyo badategerezwa kubona kumwe”. Koh avuga ko ibi bishobora gutuma haba ibiganiro hagati y’ibi bisirikare bibiri vyotuma icuka kibi coteza intambara kivaho, hanyuma hagasubira kunagurwa “ingendo y’ibiganiro” yari ibuze mu gihe c’ubutegetsi bwa Donald Trump. Ariko n’aho biri uko, uku guterana amajambo hagati y’Ubushinwa na Amerika kwitezwe kuzobandanya uku. Ubushinwa bufise mbere no kwongereza “ibikorwa vy’agasotoro” mu ntumbero yo gutesha umutwe ingabo za Taiwan  - nko kurungika izindi ndege z’intambara  - canke mu gukwiragiza ibinyoma, nk’uko bivugwa na Dr. Ian Chong, umuhinga w’umushinwa kuri kaminuza ya Singapour. Taiwan yarigeze kwagiriza Ubushinwa ko bwateguye isekeza yo gukwiragiza ibinyoma muri ino misi iri zinga ryegereje amatora, bikaba vyitezwe ko iri zinga ritegura amatora akomeye mu mpera z’uno mwaka. Kuri Amerika n’Ubushinwa n’ibura, “nta shaka ririho ryo guhindura aho bihagaze” ubu, na rirya cane cane himirije ibikorwa bikomye – amatora yo muri Munyonyo (11) muri Amerika, hamwe n’ikoraniro rigira 20 ry’umugambwe w’aba Komunista  mu Bushinwa mu gice ca kabiri c’uno mwaka aho Perezida Xi Jinping yiteze gutsimbataza ubutegetsi bwiwe. Dr Chong ati: “Iciza kihari ni uko ata ruhande na rumwe rushaka ko ibintu vyunyuka”. “Ariko n’aho ibintu bitokwunyuka ntibisigura ko tuzoba duhagaze neza. Rero twese turacari muri iki kibazo mu gihe kanaka”.

headline: Chris Brown yagirijwe ko yahaye ibiyayuramutwe umugore aca amusambanya ku nguvu mu bwato
text: Chris Brown yagirizwa ko yahaye ibiyayuramutwe umugore aca aramusambanya ku nguvu, ubu akaba ariko mu rubanza rushobora kumutwara imiriyoni 20 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Iki caha co gufata ku nguvu kivugwa ko cabereye mu bwato (yacht) ku wa 30 kigarama (ukwa cumi na kabiri) 2020 i Miami mu ntara ya Florida. Ikiganiro Newsbeat ca Radio 1 cagerageje kuvugana n'abaserukira Chris Brown kugira ngo bagire ico bavuze ariko gushika ubu ntaco barishura. Chris Brown asa n'uwishuye aciye ku rubuga rwa Instagram, aho avuga ko ariko arakurikiranwa kubera ariko ategura gusohora umuziki. Yanditse ati: "NDIBAZA KO ARI IVYO MUBONA MWESE....ni igihe cose ngiye gusohora umuziki canke mfise imigambi kanaka". Uru rubanza rwugurujwe n'umunyamuziki atashatse kumenyekana, azwi gusa kw'izina rya 'Jane Doe' mu nzandiko z'amategeko. Izi nyandiko zerekana ibirego bitanu bitandukanye kuri uyu munyamuziki - gufata ku nguvu, ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina, guturubika n'ibigirankana, guturubika umuntu kubera urwangara hamwe no gupfunga umuntu atabifitiye uburenganzira kandi amuturubitse. Uyu mugore avuga ko afise "ubwoba ko ashobora kwicwa canke gutakaza akazi" . Avuga ko yahawe ubutumire muri ubwo bwato bwegukira umunyamuziki wo mu mudiho wa rap (rapper) akongera kaba n'umu 'producer',  Diddy, ari naho habereye iki caha kivugwa. Nk'uko uru rwandiko Newsbeat yashoboye kubona rubivuga, uyu mugore avuga ko amaze gushika, Brown  yamuhaye ikinyobwa mu nyuma aca yumva "umubiri urahindutse giturumbuka mu buryo atashobora gusigura". Uru rwandiko ruvuga ko "yataye umutwe, inguvu ziramuherana, aca afatwa n'itiro", imbere y'uko atwarwa mu gitanda ariho bivugwa ko Brown yaciye amwambura impuzu amusambanya ku nguvu. Brown avugwa ko ku musi wakurikiye yahamagaye uyo mugore, amubwira ko yofata imiti kugira ntasame imbanyi. Newsbeat kandi yagerageje no kuvugana n'abaserukizi ba Diddy, ariko nta nyishu baratanga.

headline: Ballon d'Or: France Football yakoze impinduka mu gutora uwuronswa aka gashimwe
text: Agashimwe k'Umupira w'Inzahabu, Ballon d'Or, gahabwa umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi haba ku ruhande rw'abagabo canke rw'abagore, kuva ubu kagiye gutangwa hisunzwe ingene abakinyi bavyifashemwo mu kiringo c'umwaka w'inkino (saison) aho kwisunga umwaka usanzwe (année civile). Ikinyamakuru France Football - ari naco gitegura aka gashimwe k'iteka  - cafashe kandi ingingo yo kugabanya abagize umurwi w'abafata ingingo. Uyu murwi w'abanyamakuru 170 wagabanijwe gushika kw'ijana ku ruhande rw'abagabo, mu gihe ku ruhande rw'abagore uyu murwi uzoba ugizwe n'abantu 50. Pascal Ferre umukuru wa France Football avuga ati: "Imbere y'aha, twahora dufata ingingo dufatiye ku bice bibiri vy'imyaka y'inkono ibiri itandukanye. Ubu rero ibintu bigiye gutomoka neza". Uyu mukuru wa France Football  ati:  "Ni akaryo keza ko kuyiha inguvu nshasha". Izi mpinduka zitangajwe inyuma y'aho umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain Lionel Messi acaguriwe nk'umukinyi yatsindiye Ballon d'Or mu 2021, abatari bake bakaba barabineguye cane, aho abakunzi benshi b'umupira w'amaguru babona ko umusatirizi wa Bayern Munich Robert Lewandowski  ari we yari akwiye kuronswa aka gashimwe. Messi yatsindiye aka gashimwe k'iteka ku ncuro igira indwi mbere akaba ari we aciye umuhigo, ariko Lewandowski - yaje mu kibanza ca kabiri  - yari yinjije ibitsindo 41 mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubudagi, Bundesliga, mu mwaka w'inkino wa 2020-21 anafasha Bayern gutsindira iri higanwa ku ncuro igira icenda yikurikiranya. Ferre avuga kandi ko bazokwibanda cane cane ku vyo abakinyi bazoba bashitseko ku gatwe kabo hakwibanda ku bikombe umurwi kanaka uzoba watsindiye. Impinduka zabaye ku gitigiri c'abagize umurwi ufata ingingo zizoshira hamwe abanyamakuru 100 bava mu bihugu vy'ibihangange mu mupira w'amaguru ku ruhande rw'abagabo, hamwe na 50 kandi bava mu bihugu vy'ibihangange mu mupira w'amaguru ku ruhande rw'abagore. Ibindi birori vyimirije vyo gutanga udushimwe twa Ballon d'Or bizoba mu kw'icenda canke ukw'icumi 2022 kandi tukaba tuzokwisunga umwaka w'inkino uzorangira mu kw'indwi hamwe n'ihiganwa ry'abagore Euro 2022. Ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi yose ku ruhande rw'abagabo  - rizobera muri Qatar mu kw'icumi na rimwe na cumi na kabiri - ntirizokwisunga gushika mu bushimwe bwa 2023.

headline: Shakira na Jennifer Lopez baraye babiciye biracika
text: "Hello Miami!" niyo majambo yari mu ndirimbo zari ziherekejwe n'ingoma hamwe n'amatarumbete. Mu rukino rwari rurindiriwe cane rwa Super Bowl muri Amerika ejo ku wa Mungu, abaririmvyi rurangiranwa babiri Shakira hamwe na Jennifer Lopez bari barindiriwe n'abantu isinzi bitezwe muri ico gihe. Bwari bwo bwa mbere muri kahise k'urukino Super Bowl rurorerwa n'abantu benshi gusumba izinki nkino muri Amerika abaririmvyi babiri bompi bakomoka muri Amerika y'Epfo baririmba mu gihe c'akaruhuko. Iryo higanwa ryabereye ku kibuga ca Hard Rock mu gisagara ca Miami c'intara ya Floride rikaba ryariko rihuza imirwi ya Kansas City Chiefs na San Francisco 49ers. Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru wa Amerika (NFL) rimenyesha ko urwo rukino rufise abafana bashika mu miliyoni 30.2 bakomoka muri Amerika y'Epfo canke bavuga ururimi rw'iki Espanyole, bakaba barengako imiliyoni zibiri ku bari bazwi mu 2017. Imbere y'uko batangura ico giteramo, Jennifer Lopez yabwiye  Shakira  ati: "Reka twereke isi ico aba bakowa babiri bakomoka muri Americas y'epfo bashoboye". Kuva bimenyekanye ko ivyo bihangange bizoririmba mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'iryo higanwa rigira 54 ry'umupira w'amaguru wa Amerika, rwabonetse ko ari rwo rukino rwa nyuma rukomeye ku ba nya Amerika y'Epfo. Wari umunezero urenze urugero inyuma y'aho ivyo bihangange mu muziki berekaniye ubuhinga bwabo kuri ico kibuga i Miami, aho baririmvye nyinshi mu ndirimbo zakunzwe cane. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru mu ndwi iheze, Shakira yari yavuze ko ico giteramo cari nk'umunsi mukuru uzoba ugizwe n'ukwerekana imico n'imigenzo bitandukanye". Cabaye igiteramo herekaniwemwo imidiho itandukanye kuva kuri za Salsa, tukaja kuri za reggae, za hip-hop  gushika mbere no ku midiho ifise inkomoko ya Afrika. Harageze igihe mbere baririmbira hamwe zimwe mu ndirimbo zabo zabiciye bigacika, harimwo na ya ndirimbo Waka Waka ya Shakira yafatwa nk'indirimbo ndanga mahiganwa y'igikombe c'isi yose yo mu 2010. Muri ico giteramo baboneyeko no kwibuka umukinyi w'umupira w'amaboko Kobe Bryant yapfuye mu ndwi iheze mw'isanganya rya kajugujugu ari kumwe n'umukobwa wiwe n'abandi bantu batanu. Imbere y'uko kiba, Lopez yamenyesheje ko yari yamye yipfuza kwibuka uyo munonotsi kuva umukunzi wiwe Alex Rodriguez  amumenyesaheje ivyari bihejeje gushika. "Nari mu myimenyerezo nsubiramwo indirimbo igihe Alez aje kundaba akorora amosozi, ambwira ati: 'Ntushobora kwibaza ibintu bihejeje gushika'. Ntiyavyumva". Ati: "Ndibaza ko ivyashitse bikorako benshi kuko bitwibutsa ingene ubuzima ari amazi aseseka ntibayore". Hasigaye amasaha makeya ngo ihiganwa ritangure, abo baririmvyo Shakira na J. Lo babanje guhanahana ubushimwe batsindiye. Hari haciye imyaka itari mike iyo mikono yakira abaririmvyi rurangiranwa nka ba Michael Jackson , Justin Timberlake canke Lady Gaga imbere y'uko uno mwaka iryo higanwa riterwa iteka n'abo baririmvyi bakomoka muri Colombia na Porto Rico. Umuririmvyi akomoka muri Amerika y'Epfo yaheruka guterwa iryo teka ni Gloria Estefan, yatanguye mu 1992 asubira mu 1999.

headline: Champions League: Real Madrid igikombe ca 14, Liverpool mu marushwa
text: Ivyizigiro vya Liverpool vyo gutsindira igikombe kigira indwi co mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere I Bulaya (Champions League) birangiye mu mubabaro aho iguye mu minwe ya Real Madrid i Paris. Umusatirizi wa  Brezili Vinicius Jr, niwe ayihumiye, mu kwinjiza igitsindo kimwe rudende mu rukino rwose, aho yari yiketswe ko yoba yari yaraririye, Trent Alexander-Arnold akaba ari we yatumye ahagarara neza, bituma Real Madrid itahukana iki gikombe kigize 14, aho nyene niyo iherutse gutsindira ihiganwa rya Espagne, La Liga. Liverpool yaronse amahirwe menshi yo gutsinda ariko umunyegori Thibaut Courtois  yari yariye amavubi, uyu yahoze asamira Chelsea akaba yabanje gukurayo umupira wari utewe na Sadio Mane, imbere yo gukurayo uwundi mupira ukomeye wari utewe mw'igori na Mohamed Salah. Mohamed Salah, yateshejwe iki gitsindo mu gihe yarondera kwihora ivyo yabonye mu rukino nk'uru nyene rwo mu 2018 na Real Madrid nyene, aho vyabaye ngombwa ko ava mu kibuga mu gice ca mbere kubera imvune. Uru rukino rwategerezwa gutangura isaha imwe z'ijoro mu masaha mpuzamakungu (ni ukuvuga isaha zitatu z'ijoro mu masaha y'Uburundi n'Urwanda)  rwatanguye rucerewe iminota 36 yose, kubera "ibibazo vy'umutekano" inyuma y'aho hari amasanamu asohote yerekana isinzi ry'abantu hanze y'ikibuga bariko bagerageza kwinjira mu kibuga ca Stade de France. Gutsindwa kwa Liverpool gutumye uyu murwi warondera gukora ibidasanzwe mu mupira w'amaguru mu gutahukana ibikombe bine muri uno mwaka w'inkino urangiye, utahira bibiri gusa, ica FA (FA Cup) hamwe n'ica Carabao (Carabao Cup).
